Mu lirakikha Wele abaang'ana
Liloba se liaba ne efwaani tawe, lundi se liabamo siindu tawe ne sisiilima siaba khu lusiba, mala roho owa Wele
Wele abona ali buwaanga bwaba bulayi, mala aukhasia buwaanga khukhwama khu siilima.
Atiuukha buwaanga ali, “Kumuusi” ne sisiilima asitiuukha ali, “Siilo.” Bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo eye khunyoa.
Wele akhola embaka mala aukhasia kameechi kakaaba asi wayo khukhwama khwako kakaaba angaaki wayo. Mala kaba kario.
Nio Wele atiuukha embaka eyo ali, “Likulu.” Bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo eya khabili.
Nio Wele alaka ali, “Kameechi kaali asi we likulu kebuusie abuundu alala, mala sibala sibonekhe.” Mala kaba kario.
Wele atiuukha sibala ali, “Liloba,” ne kameechi kakebuusia alala aakatiuukha ali, “Chinyanja.” Mala Wele aabona ali bili bilayi.
Wele alaka ali, “Liloba likhusie bimelwa chingano choosi: bibiama bumiicho ne bibiindi bibiama kamatuunda, buli silala khuloondekhana ne lukano lwasio khu sibala.” Mala kaba kario.
Liloba liarusia bimelwa chingano choosi, mala Wele abona ali bili bilayi.
Bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo ekhola khataru.
Ne Wele alaka ali, “Bikhosia bibeo mu mbaka mwe likulu biaukhasie kumuusi khukhwama khu silo, mala bibe bibiekesia biise
bibe buwaanga mu mbaka mwe likulu bikhosie khu liloba.” Mala kaba kario.
Nio Wele akhola bikhosia biboofu bibili. Sikhosia siboofu siamiie kumuusi ne sitiitikho siamiie siilo, lundi akhola ching'enieesi chosi.
Mala Wele abira mu mbaka mwe likulu bikhosie khu liloba,
biamiie kumuusi ne siilo, mala biaukhasie buwaanga khukhwama khu siilima. Mala Wele abona ali bwaba bulayi.
Bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo ekhola khane.
Wele alaka ali, “Kameechi kabemo bie bulamu bikali, ne chinyuni chibe mu mbaka mwe likulu.”
Nio Wele abaang'ana naliiria kimiboofu kie munyanja alala nende bioosi bie bulamu bibiechula mu meechi khuloondekhana ne chingano chabio, ne chinyuni chingano choosi. Mala Wele abona ali bwaba bulayi.
Mala Wele abibiita chikhabi ne aloma ali, “Saalana mukuche, mwichule mu nyanja, ne chinyuni chikuche khu liloba.”
Bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo ekhola kharaano.
Nio Wele alaka ali, “Liloba lirusie bie bulamu khuloondekhana ne chingano chabio, chikhaafu ne bibiindu bimoola ne chisaang'i che mundaa ne chisolo khuloondekhana ne chingano chacho.” Mala kaba kario.
Wele akhola chisaang'i che mundaa ne chisolo khuloondekhana ne chingano chacho, ne chikhaafu khuloondekhana ne chingano chacho, nende buli sisiindu simoola asi khuloondekhana ne lukano lwasio. Mala Wele abona ali bwaba bulayi.
Mala Wele ababiita chikhabi ne aloma ali, “Saalana mukuche, mwichusie liloba mala libe mu bunyali bwenywe, mwamiie khu ng'eeni ne khu nyuni ne khu bioosi bie bulamu bikeenda khu liloba.”
Mala Wele aloma ali, “Namuele enywe buli simelwa sisiama bumiicho, sili khu liloba lioosi, nende buli murongooro kwe bibiaamo bilimo chimiicho bibe biakhulia bienywe.
Ne biakhulia bia buli saang'i ne nyuni, buli siindu simoola khu liloba, nende buli siindu siilimo kumuuya kwe bulamu, bilalia bisaala.” Mala kaba kario.
Wele abona buli sisiindu nisio akholile, mala bwaba bulayi lukali. Bwaba ekolooba, bwelabula mala bwasia, endaalo ekhola sita.

Nio likulu ne liloba ne bibiindu bilimo bioosi biawa khubaang'anwa.
Nio Wele abiita endaalo eya saba chikhabi mala akira alubeka nga endaalo emboofu sikila khu niyo Wele aola khukhwama khu milimo kiewe kioosi nikio aaba ne akholile
Lino lili liliakukha lie likulu ne liloba ne bimaliilwe khubaang'anwa ne khubuumbwa.
Mu ndaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
simelwa se siabao khu liloba tawe. Ne kimirongooro kie mundaa se kiaba kiamela tawe, sikila abeele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhola efula yakwa khu liloba tawe. Lundi omundu olima liloba se abao tawe,
Ne kakhali kameechi kamaanga asi we liloba ne kasanya liloba.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ara kumukuunda mu Edeni e Bukwe, mala aramo omundu niye aba ne abuumbile.
Ne khukhwama mwiloba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola buli murongooro kusiimisia chimoni, lundi kumulayi khu siakhulia, khuchoa. Ne akari we kumukuunda, kwabao kumurongooro kwe bulamu, ne lundi kumurongooro kwe bukesi bwe khumanya kamalayi ne kamamayaanu.
Luluuchi lwama mu Edeni lulwachukhilisianga kumukuunda, mala ebweeni wa Edeni, lwakabukhanamo lwabamo chinjichi chine.
Lwe khunyoa lwaba Pisioni, nilwo lubirira mu sibala sia Habila sioosi niio esahabu eli.
(Ne esahabu eye sibala esio eli endayi. Kamabaale kalaangwa kali budeliumu ne kamafura kaunya kumuuya kumulayi kakalaangwa bali Onikisi kosi kaliyo.)
Ne lisina lie luluuchi lwa khabili lili Kihoni. Nilwo lulwabotookha sibala sia Kushi
Ne lisina lie luluuchi lwa khataru bali Tikiri. Nilwo lubirira e bukwe wa Ashuru. Ne luluuchi lwa khane luli Efurati.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abukula omundu owe siseecha mala amura mu mukuunda kwa Edeni, alime ne khukuliinda.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka omundu ali, “Oli omulekhuule khulia bibiaamo bia buli murongooro kuuli mu mukuunda.
Ne kakhali, bibiaamo bie kumurongooro kwe bukesi bwe khumanya kamalayi ne kamamayaanu
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Se buli bulayi omundu owe siseecha khumenya yeng'ene tawe, ndamukholela omuyeeti omukhoyela niye.”
Nio khukhwama khu liloba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abuumba eyafuma esaang'i, ne esolo ne eyafuma enyuni mala abireera bioosi khu mundu abone nga ne abitiuukha kamasina. Ne buli lisina nilio omundu atiuukha sibuumbe, liakwa nilio lisina liasio.
Omundu atiuukha chisaang'i choosi, ne chinyuni ne chisolo choosi che mundaa. Ne kakhali se anyoolekha omuyeeti okhoyela niye tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola liilo lisiro liaamba omundu owe siseecha oyo. Ne nga aba ne alikho akona Wele asasula lubafu lulala mala afunikhao enyama.
Ne lubafu nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne asasuule khukhwama khu mundu owe siseecha alukholamo omukhasi mala amureerera.
Mala omundu chana aloma ali,
“Luno oyuno nono ali sikuumba sie mu bikuumba bie kumubili kwase,
lundi enyama eye munyama che kumubili kwase,
lisina liewe lilaba bali, ‘Omukhasi,’
sikila ama khu mundu owe siseecha.”
Omuseecha no mukhasi wewe baba sichula ne se baambwa chisoni tawe.

Omukhasi akobosia endemu ali, “Khunyala khwalia kamatuunda ke kimirongooro kie mu mukuunda,
ne kakhali Wele aloma ali, ‘Mukhalia kamatuunda ke kumurongooro kuuli akari we kumukuunda tawe, lundi mukhakutiilakho tawe. Mwakhola murio, mulafwa.’ ”
Endemu yakobosia omukhasi eli, “Se mufwa tawe.
Sikila Wele amanyile ali mwaliaakho kamatuunda kakwo, chimoni chenywe chilekulibwa mala mube busa nga Wele,
Nio nga omukhasi ne abona ali kumurongooro okwo kuli kumulayi khu siakhulia, kusiimisia, ne lundi kuli kumurongooro kwe khukhwekoombwa, khukhola omundu abe omukesi, abuta lituunda liakwo mala alia, ne liliindi aelesia omuseecha wewe yesi alia.
Nio chimoni chabwe chekulibwa mala bamanya bali bali sichula. Banaba kamasaafu ke kumutuli bang'oonamo chingubo bebiimba.
Nio ekolooba bweene ao, enje ne elengaalile, baulila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alikho akeenda mu mukuunda. Omuseecha no mukhasi wewe bekisa khukhwama khu Wele mu mirongooro kie mu mukuunda.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga omuseecha mala amureeba ali, “Oli waena?”
Omuseecha akobosia ali, “khuuliile ne olikho okeenda mu mukuunda naba ne buuri, sikila ndi sichula khwako nekisile.”
Wele amureeba ali, “Naanu okhuboolele ali oli sichula? Oliile kamatuunda ke kumurongooro nikwo nakhulaka ndi okhalia tawe?”
Omuseecha aloma ali, “Omukhasi niye ewe wamba oli amenye nase niye oumbele lituunda nalia.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela endemu ali,
“Sikila wakholile kano,
oli omulaame khukhila bibaywa bioosi,
khukhila chisaang'i che mundaa choosi,
Okhekhururirenge enda yowo,
ne okhalie lipukhuulu,
mu bulamu bwowo bwoosi.
lundi akari we lulwibulo lwowo ne lulwibulo lwewe.
Lulikhutubundula kumurwe,
ne lulwibulo lwowo lulimuluma ekhukunyu.”
Khu mukhasi Wele aloma ali,
“Ndakhutasa buchuuni bukali mu khusaala.
Mu buchuuni okhasaale babaana,
ne kakhaba kario, liliekoomba liowo liliba khu museecha wowo,
ne niye alikhwamiia ewe.”
“Sikila warekereesie kamakhuwa ko mukhasi wowo,
mala waliile kamatuunda ke kumurongooro nikwo nakhulaka ndi okhaliakho tawe.
Liloba lili lilaame sikila ewe.
Mu khunanisibwa okhalie khukhwama khwiloba
chindaalo che bulamu bwowo choosi.
Liloba likhakhurusile enyoonyi ne kamawa,
mala okhalie bimelwa bie mundaa.
Mu maani kowo okhalie siakhulia,
khukhwola nga ne okobola khu liloba.
Sikila ewe waama khu liloba, oli lipukhuulu,
ne okhakobole khu lipukhuulu.”
Adamu
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholela Adamu no mukhasi wewe chingubo che kamasieelo mala abafwara.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuoona arura mu mukuunda kwa Edeni, alime liloba nilio arusibwakho.
Wele aoona omundu khukhwama mu mukuunda kwa Edeni, mala e bukwe we kumukuunda okwo araayo chikerubi

Adamu aaba no mukhasi wewe Hawa, Hawa aesia mala asaala, mala aloma ali, “Nasaalile omwana omusoleeli khulwe buyeeti bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Amutiuukha ali Kaini.
Enyuma wako lundi, Hawa asaala Apili wandaaye owa Kaini. Apili aaba omwaayi owe kamakheese, ne Kaini aaba omulimi.
Enyuma we biise, Kaini areera siaanwa sie likesa lie bibiaamo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Apili areera limeeme libele lie likheese lilala lie kumunyele kwewe, eera mala aana khu Wele bitonyi binefu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiimisibwa ne Apili lundi asiimisibwa ne siaanwa siewe,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aasiimisibwa ne Kaini ne siaanwa siewe tawe. Nio Kaini akhalala lukali, anyiisia mumoni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba Kaini ali, “Siina sikila ne okhalaale, lundi siina sikila ne onyisiisie?
Waaba ne okhola bulayi, se olafukiililwa ta ku? Ne waaba ne okhakhola bulayi tawe bubwoni bwakhwibuliile amuliango bwikoomba bukhukuure, ne kakhali wenyekhana obuule.”
Kaini Aboolela Apili wandaaye ali, “Khuche khukeende mu mukuunda.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba Kaini ali, “Apili wandaayo ali wae?” Kaini akobosia ali, “Ese, semanya tawe. Ese niye omuliindi wewe?”
Ne ewe luno walaamilwe khukhilakho liloba liliakaaniile kamafuki ko mwana wenywe niko ewe ochukhile.
Ne olima kamaloba, se kacha khwaama khuloondekhana ne kamaani kaako tawe, olaba omula lundi omuuyauuyi khu liloba.”
Kaini aboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Siiukuumo siase sili sikali lukali khwise khusinyala.
Wamboonile ndure mu maloba lundi ndure mu mumoni mwowo, ne ndaba omula, omuuyauuyi khu liloba mala omundu yesi yesi ounyoola alinjira.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Se kali kario tawe. Omundu yesi yesi ne eera Kaini aliyachwa khukhwola saba.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ara simanyisio khu Kaini khukaania omundu yesi yesi omwakaanana akhakhola ario amwiira tawe.
Mala Kaini arura ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha amenya mu sibala silaangwa bali Noti, e bukwe wa Edeni.
Kaini akona no mukhasi wewe aesia mala asaala Enoka. Kaini ombakha lukoba mala alutiuukha ali Enoka, lisina lio mwana wewe.
Enoka asaala Irati, Irati aaba raraawe owa Meuyaeli, ne Meuyaeli aaba raraawe owa Metusiaeli, ne Metusiaeli aaba raraawe owa Lameki.
Mala Lameki aareera bakhasi babili. Lisina lio omukhulu bali Ada ne omuro bali Silai.
Ada asaala Yabali, oyo niye owaba raraawe owe babayi be chikhaafu babamenyanga mu maeema.
Lisina lia wandaaye liaba bali Yubali. Lisaaye lia Yubali baaba babaandu babapaanga kamatuungu ne kimilele.
Silai asaala Tubali-kaini owabasa
Lameki aboolela bakhasi bewe ali,
“Ada ne Silai ndekeeresie,
enywe bakhasi base,
ulila lilomaloma liase.
Nerire omundu sikila ambunile,
Nerire omuele sikila ambumiisie ese.
Kaaba bali khukhwira Kaini khwenya liliyacha saba,
ese aba ndenyekha liliyacha sabini na saba,
kaaba bali omundu yesi yesi anjira.”
Adamu akona no mukhasi wewe lundi, aesia mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli amutiuukha ali Seti
Seti naye asaala omwana amutiuukha ali Enosi. Mu siise esio babaandu barakikha khukhwisaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Abuumba omuseecha no mukhasi, ababiita chikhabi mala abatiuukha ali babaandu.
Nga Adamu ne amenya ola kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, asaala omwana owe sisoleeli owe lukoondo lwewe lundi omufwaana, mala amutiuukha ali Seti.
Enyuma we khusaala Seti, Adamu amenya kimiiko chimia munaane mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli ne sikhaana.
Adamu aamenya kimiiko chimia tisa ne kamakhumi kataru mala afwa.
Nga Seti aamenya ola kimiiko emia ndala na kiraano asaala Enosi.
Enyuma we khusaala Enosi, Seti amenya kimiiko chimia munaane ne saba, mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Seti aamenya kimiiko chimia tisa ne kimiiko ekhumi na kibili, mala afwa.
Nga Enosi aamenya ola kimiiko kamakhumi tisa, asaala Kenani.
Enyuma we khusaala Kenani, Enosi aamenya kimiiko chimia munaane ne ekhumi na kiraano mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Enosi amenya kimiiko chimia tisa na kiraano mala afwa.
Nga Kenani aamenya ola kimiiko kamakhumi saba asaala Mahalaleli.
Enyuma we khusaala Mahalaleli, Kenani aamenya kimiiko kikiindi chimia munaane ne kamakhumi kane mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Kenani amenya kimiiko chimia tisa ne ekhumi mala afwa.
Nga Mahalaleli amenya ola kimiiko kamakhumi sita ne kiraano asaala Yareti.
Enyuma we khusaala Yareti, Mahalaleli aamenya kimiiko chimia munaane ne kamakhumi kataru, mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Mahalaleli amenya kimiiko chimia munaane ne kamakhumi tisa na kiraano mala afwa.
Oli Yareti amenya ola kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi sita na kibili asaala Enoka.
Enyuma we khusaala Enoka, Yareti amenya kimiiko chimia munaane mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Yareti aamenya kimiiko chimia tisa ne kamakhumi sita na kibili, mala afwa.
Nga Enoka amenya ola kimiiko kamakhumi sita na kiraano asaala Metusela.
Enyuma we khusaala Metusela, Enoka amenya mu busaangi ne Wele khulwe kimiiko chimia chitaru mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Enoka amenya kimiiko chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi sita na kiraano.
Enoka aakeenda ne Wele mala akoriokha busa khubao tawe, sikila Wele aamubukula.
Nga Metusela amenya ola kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane ne saba, asaala Lameki.
Enyuma we khusaala Lameki, Metusela amenya kimiiko chimia saba ne kamakhumi munaane ne kibili mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Metusela amenya kimiiko chimia tisa ne kamakhumi sita na tisa mala afwa.
Nga Lameki amenya ola kimiiko emia ndala ne kimiiko kamakhumi munaane na kibili asaala omwana owe sisoleeli,
amutiuukha lisina ali, “Noa.”
Enyuma we khusaala Noa, Lameki amenya kimiiko chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi tisa na kiraano mala asaala babaana babaandi be sisoleeli nende be sikhaana.
Khwako Lameki amenya kimiiko chimia saba ne kamakhumi saba na saba, mala afwa.
Enyuma wa Noa khukhwosia kimiiko chimia chiraano, asaala Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa.

Babaana ba Wele babona bakhaana be babaandu khuuba ne lukoondo lulayi, mala beroborelamo bakhasi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kumwoyo kwase se kulafukiilila babaandu bamenye mindali na mindali tawe, sikila bali be khufwa, khwako balamenya kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili.”
Mu ndaalo echo, lundi aakhaba enyuma wacho, Banariiria baaba khu sibala. Nibo babaana ba Wele basaala mu bakhaana be babaandu. Bano baaba babaandu be kamaani ne fuma engali mu bise bie khaale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi esonia sikila abuumba omundu mu sibala mala liamubelesia kumwoyo.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndabunia babaandu nibo nabuumba barure khu sibala, babaandu ne chisaang'i, ne chisolo ne bimoola ne chinyuni, sikila nisonia ndi nabuumba bioosi.”
Ne kakhali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiimisibwa ne Noa.
Noa aaba ne babaana bataru, Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa.
Nono babaandu baaba bamayaanu mumoni cha Wele. Sisiayuumba siaba buli abuundu khu sibala.
Wele abona ali sibala sili simayaanu, sikila babaandu boosi bakhola kamamayaanu mu limenya liabwe khu sibala.
Mala Wele aboolela Noa ali, “Nabisiisie khukhwakamia babaandu boosi, sikila sibala siechusiibwe sisiayuumba khubirira mu nibo. Ndababunia alala ne sibala.
Yeyombakhila emeeli eye kimirongooro kimilayi. Yombakhamo chisiro mala okimaalile embuula mu kari ne enje.
Kiombakhe ori: buleeyi bikele chimia chitaru, bukhiikha bikele kamakhumi karaano ne khuniina mungaaki bikele kamakhumi kataru.
Yombakhakho lulama ne lekhakho bubweyaangu bubwola sikele silala, mala ore kumuliango mumbafu mwe emeeli. Wombakhemo bisekese bitaru mala bibe ne amukhe ataru.
Sikila nja khureera kameechi kechule khu sibala, khukhwonaka bie bulamu bioosi biili asi we likulu, ne buli siindu sili khu sibala sikhafwe.
Ne kakhali ndakhola endakaano yase ne nawe mala olengila mu meeli ewe, babaana bowo, omukhasi wowo ne bakhasi be babaana bowo.
Ne olengisia mu meeli buli bie bulamu bibili bibili, siseecha ne siikhasi chingano choosi. Obiliinde bibe bilamu alala ne nawe,
khu nyuni khuloondekhana ne lukano lwacho, ne chisaang'i ne chisolo khuloondekhana ne lukano lwacho, ne bimoola khu sibala khuloondekhana ne lukano lwabio, bibili bibili, siseecha ne siikhasi, olengila nabio obiliinde bibe bilamu.
Lundi, bukula buli siakhulia, obuunge mu meeli. Silaba siakhulia siowo ne nabio.”
Noa akhola buli siindu nisio Wele amulaka.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Noa ali, “Yingila mu meeli ewe nende be nju yowo boosi, sikila naboone ndi oli omuluungi ebweeni wase mu selukho yino.
Bukula chisaang'i chingwalaafu, ekhasi ne seecha, khukhwola saba, nende chikhali chingwalaafu tawe, chibili chibili, ekhasi ne seecha.
Lundi bukula chinyuni, ekhasi ne seecha, chibili chibili, khukhwola saba, oliinde lukano lwacho nio lube lulamu khu sibala.
Sikila enyuma we chindaalo saba ndikho nja khureera efula khu sibala ekwe chindaalo kamakhumi kane, siilo ne kumuusi. Ndabunia buli sie bulamu nisio nabuumba sirure khu sibala.”
Mala Noa akhola buli siindu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Noa aaba kimiiko chimia sita nga kameechi ne kechula khu sibala.
Niye no mukhasi wewe ne babaana bewe ne bakhasi be babaana bewe, bamulila mu meeli khukhwilukha kameechi kakechula.
Khu saang'i chingwalaafu ne chikhali chingwalaafu tawe ne chinyuni na buli siindu simoola khu sibala,
bibili bibili, siseecha ne siikhasi biengila mu meeli alala ne Noa nga Wele ne aaba ne amulakile.
Enyuma we chindaalo saba, kameechi kecha khu sibala.
Efula yakwa khu sibala chindaalo kamakhumi kane, siilo ne kumuusi.
Khu ndaalo eyo Noa no mukhasi wewe ne babaana bewe Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa ne bakhasi babwe, bengila mu meeli.
Alala ne nabo chisaang'i ne chisolo chingano choosi, chikhaafu khuloondekhana ne chingano chacho, nende buli simoola khuloondekhana ne lukano lwasio, nende buli lukano lwe nyuni,
Siseecha ne siikhasi sia buli siindu sie bulamu biengila mu meeli ne Noa.
Ne bioosi bibiengilamo, siseecha ne siikhasi, sie bibuumbe bioosi biengilamo nga Wele ne aaba ne alakile Noa. Mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekalila Noa mu meeli.
Kameechi kachiililila khukhwichula khu sibala khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane. Kaaba kamakali mala kakila emeeli yakelakela khu meechi khungaaki khwe sibala.
Kameechi kechula kakucha khu sibala mala emeeli yakelakela khu ngaaki khwako.
Kameechi kechula lukali, kafuunikha bikulu bileeyi bie khu sibala sioosi.
Kameechi katasa khuniina kola bikele ekhumi na biraano angaaki we bikulu bileeyi khu sibala.
Buli siindu sie bulamu khu sibala siafwa, chinyuni, chisaang'i, chisolo, nende buli mundu aafwa. Buli siindu simoola khu liloba siosi siafwa.
Buli siindu sisiaba khu sibala sieela kumuuya kwe bulamu siafwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia buli sibuumbe sie bulamu sisiaba khu sibala, babaandu, chisaang'i, ne bibiindu bimoola bioosi ne chinyuni choosi biabuna biarura khu sibala. Noa ne nabo nibo aaba nabo mu meeli bong'ene barama.
Kameechi karama ne kechuule khu sibala khu ndaalo emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano.

Ne kakhali Wele aakhebulila Noa ne chisaang'i ne chisolo choosi nicho aaba nacho mu meeli. Akhola ekhuungu yaucha khu sibala, mala kameechi karakikha khuboomba.
Chimoni che kameechi ke asi we sibala ne chinuma che mwikulu chekalwa. Efula khukhwama mwikulu yemisibwa,
mala kameechi kanywelelelwa khu liloba kalaa kalaa. Enyuma we chindaalo emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano, kameechi kaba kaboombile.
Khu ndaalo eye khumi na saba eye kumwesi kwa saba, emeeli yacha yema khu sikulu sia Ararati.
Kameechi kachiililila khuboomba. Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe ekhumi, khungaaki khwe bikulu khwabonekha.
Enyuma we chindaalo kamakhumi kane, Noa ekula enuma niyo aakhola khu meeli,
mala aruma khooro kwapurukha eyi ne neyi, nabwila kameechi ne kateenya khu liloba.
Nio Noa aruma liuusi lilole kameechi ne kateenyile khu sibala.
Liuusi se lianyoola niio likwa tawe, sikila kameechi kaba kasiili khu sibala. Liamukobolela mu meeli, arusia kumukhono liakwakho mala aliingisia mu meeli.
Alindiilila chindaalo saba chawa mala aruma lundi liuusi.
Liamukobolela ekolooba ne lisaafu litoro lie kumurongooro kwa miseituni khu munwa kwalio, nio Noa amanya ali kameechi kateenyile khu sibala.
Noa aliinda lundi chindaalo saba, mala aruma liuusi lundi ne luno se liamukobolela tawe.
Noa ne ali bukhulu bwe kimiiko chimia sita na mulala khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa, kameechi kaba kateenyile khu sibala. Mala Noa arusia lulama khu meeli, alola mala abona ali sibala siabalakaale.
Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na saba, eye kumwesi kwa khabili sibala siaba siomeele elala.
Wele aboolela Noa ali,
“Khorure mu meeli, ewe no mukhasi wowo, ne babaana bowo, ne bakhasi babwe.
Khorure nende buli sie bulamu siili nawe, chinyuni ne chisaang'i ne chisolo ne bimoola bioosi, nio bisaalane lukali mala bikuche khu sibala.”
Nio Noa arura mu meeli, niye no mukhasi wewe, ne babaana bewe ne bakhasi babwe.
Buli esaang'i ne solo, buli siindu simoola, ne chinyuni choosi, biarura mu meeli mu matuuli khuloondekhana ne lukano lwabio.
Nio, Noa ombakha alutare khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aabukula khu buli saang'i engwalaafu ndala, nende khu buli nyuni engwalaafu ndala, mala abiaana nga embosio eye khukhwosia khu alutare.
Esilikakha eye embosio eyo yasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma mu mwoyo kwewe ali, “Se ndilaamakho lundi sibala sikila omundu tawe, sikila liliibaasia lie kumwoyo kwewe lili liibi khukhwama mu buele bwewe, lundi se ndibuniakho buli sibuumbe sie bulamu nga ne kholile tawe.
Nga sibala ne sisiilio, siise sie khumiicha ne khukesa, sie fula ne siimiyu, sie kumunaane ne siruumbi, kumuusi ne siilo, se biliwao tawe.”

Buli esaang'i ne solo eli khu sibala, buli enyuni, buli siindu sioosi simoola khu sibala, ne ching'eeni choosi, biareerwe asi we bunyali bwenywe. Bilamuria mala mulaba ne bunyali khu nibio.
Buli sisiindu silamu sikeenda silaba siakhulia sienywe. Nga namuelesia bimelwa, namuele bibiindu bioosi.
Ne kakhali mukhalia enyama esilimo kamalasile tawe sikila bulamu buli mu malasile.
Sikila ndibanja sifuki sienywe, khukhwama khu saang'i, khu solo, ne khu mundu yesi yesi owiira omundu, ndibanja bulamu bwo mundu oyo.
Buli omundu ochukha sifuki sio mundu aliirwa no omundu, sikila Wele abuumba omundu mu fwaani yewe.
Ne enywe saalana mukuche. Mube ne babaana bakali mala mukuche khu sibala.”
Wele aboolela Noa ne babaana bewe ali,
“Nono ndikho khola endakaano yase ne nanywe ne lisaaye lienywe enyuma wenywe,
nende buli sibuumbe siili ne nanywe, ne chinyuni, ne chisolo ne chisaang'i, nende buli siindu sisiama mu meeli ne nanywe.”
Ndikho khola endakaano yase ne nanywe, ne suubisia ndi bibuumbe bie bulamu bioosi se bilibunakho khulwe khukhwichula khwe kameechi tawe ne se kalibao lundi kameechi kamakali kabunia sibala tawe.
Mala Wele aloma ali, “Sino sili simanyisio sie endakaano niyo ndikho khola akari wase ne nanywe nende buli sibuumbe sie bulamu sili ne nanywe. Endakaano yino eli eye chiselukho chichiicha choosi:
ndikho ndao lufutu mu maleesi ne lulaba simanyisio sie endakaano akari wase ne sibala.
Ndiba oli ndeera kamafuumbi khu sibala ne lufutu lubonekha mu maleesi,
ndikhebulila endakaano yase eli akari wase ne nanywe nende buli sibuumbe sie bulamu, ndi kameechi se kaliicha lundi khukhwonaka bie bulamu bioosi tawe.
Nga lufutu ne luliba mu mafuumbi, khalulole mala khebulile endakaano eya mindali na mindali akari wase nende buli siindu sie bulamu sili khu sibala.”
Wele aboolela Noa ali, “Sino sili simanyisio sie ndakaano niyo kholile akari wase nende bie bulamu bioosi bili khu sibala.”
Babaana ba Noa babarura mu meeli baaba Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa. Hamu aaba raraawe owa Kanaani.
Babaana ba Noa bataru bano nibo ba baaba bakuuka be babaandu be khu sibala sioosi.
Noa aaba omulimi owe khunyoa ne aaba ne liruuti lie kimisabibu.
Anywa endali ameela akona sichula mu liiema liewe.
Nga Hamu, raraawe owa Kanaani, abona sichula sia raraawe arura enje aboolela bawandaaye babili.
Nio Shemu ne Chafwesa babukula engubo, bakitilila khu mabeka kabwe boombi bacha mafutaare babiimba sichula sia paapa wabwe, mala se babona sichula siewe tawe.
Nga Noa ne ameelulukha amanya niko omwana wewe omutua amukholeele,
aloma ali,
“Kanaani ali omulaame,
alabeela elala nasioobi khu bawandaaye.”
Lundi aloma ali,
“Shemu abiitwe chikhabi ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase,
mala lekha Kanaani abe nasioobi wewe.”
“Wele balaayia Chafwesa,
amenye mu maeema ka Shemu,
ne lekha Kanaani abe nasioobi wewe.”
Enyuma we kameechi kakechula, Noa amenya kimiiko chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi karaano.
Kimiiko kioosi nikio Noa amenya kiaba chimia tisa ne kamakhumi karaano mala afwa.

Lino lili lisaaye lie babaana ba Noa, Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa. Babaana bataru bano basaala babaana be sisoleeli enyuma we khukhwichula khwe kameechi khu sibala.
Ba okhwa Chafwesa baba: Komeri ne Makoki ne Matai ne Yabani ne Tubali ne Mesheki ne Tirasi.
Ba okhwa Komeri baaba: Ashikenasi, ne Rifati, ne Tokarima.
Ba okhwa Yabani baba: Elisha, ne Tarishishi ne Kitimu ne Totanimu.
Khukhwama khu bano chikholo che sia nyanja chamalatana. Bano bali be lisaaye lia Chafwesa mu bibala biabwe, buli sia mulala ne lulomo lwewe, khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe, mu kholo chabwe.
Ba okhwa Hamu baba: Kushi, Misiri, Putu ne Kanaani.
Ba okhwa Kushi baba: Seba, Habila, Sabata, Raama ne Sabuteka. Ba okhwa Raama baba: Sheba ne Dedani.
Kushi asaala Nimuroti, niye owaba owe khunyoa khu liloba khuuba omundu owe kamaani.
Aaba omuaayi owe kamaani ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe buyeeti bwa Wele, khwako kalomekha bali, “Nga Nimuroti omuaayi owe kamaani ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Khurakikha khwe bubwami bwewe khwaba Babeli ne Ereki ne Akati, bioosi bie mu sibala sia Sinari.
Aama mu sibala esio acha Ashuru mala ombakha lukoba lwa Ninefe, Rehoboti-iri, Kala,
ne Reseni luli akari wa Ninefe ne Kala, olwo luli lukoba luboofu.
Misiri aaba raraawe owa Lutimu, Anami, Lehabi, Nafutuhi,
Paturusi, Kasiluhi. (Lisaaye lie Bafilisiti liama khu bano) ne Kafutorimu.
Kanaani asaala Sidoni, omwana wewe omubele, ne Heti,
lundi aaba kuuka owe Bayebusi, Baamori, Bakirikashi,
Bahibi ne Baariki, Basini
Baaribati, Basemari ne Bahamasi. Enyuma Bakanaani bakucha mala bamalatana.
Lulwakha lwe Bakanaani lwarakikhila khukhwama Sidoni owa Kerari khukhwola Kasa lundi khukhwama ebweeni wa Sodomu, Komora, Atima ne Seboimu khukhwola Lasia.
Bano boosi baba be lisaaye lia Hamu, khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe ne chinomo chabwe ne bibala biabwe, ne chikholo chabwe.
Shemu yesi, wandaaye owa Chafwesa omukhulu, owaba kukaawe owe babaana Baeberi boosi, asaala babaana.
Babaana ba Shemu baba Elamu, Ashuru, Arifakisati, Luti ne Aramu.
Ba okhwa Aramu baba Usi, Huli, Keteri ne Masi.
Arifakisati aaba raraawe owa Sela ne Sela aaba raraawe owa Eberi.
Eberi aaba ne babaana babili, mulala bali Peleki, sikila mu ndaalo chewe babaandu be khu sibala baukhana, ne wandaaye aaba bali Yokitani.
Yokitani aaba raraawe owa Alimotati, Shelefu, Hasari-mabeti, Yera,
Hatoramu, Usali, Dikila,
Obali, Abimaeli, Seba,
Ofiri, Habila ne Yobabi. Bano boosi baba ba okhwa Yokitani.
Sibala nisio bamenyangamo siama Mesha khukhwola Sefari, mu sibala sie sikulu sie bukwe.
Lino lili lisaaye lia Shemu, khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe ne chinomo chabwe, ne bibala biabwe ne chikholo chabwe.
Bano boosi bali be lisaaye lia Noa, khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe, mu bibala biabwe, ne khukhwama khu nibo, chikholo chasalanikha khu sibala enyuma we khukhwichula khwe kameechi.

Nono babaandu be khu sibala sioosi baba ne lulomo lulala ne lilomaloma lifwaanane.
Nga bauyauuya khukhwama ebukwe banyoola sibala sie kumweyeeywe sia Sinari mala bamenyayo.
Baboolana bali, “Yiicha khuupe kamatifari mala khu koosie bulayi.” Nio mu bweyaangu bwe kamabaale baba ne kamatifari, ne mu bweyaangu bwe simendi baaba ne laamu.
Nio, baloma bali, “Yiicha khwiyombakhile lukoba nende endeleelwa yole mwikulu nio khwikholele lisina khukhakhola khurio khwasalanisibwa khu sibala sioosi tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekha asi khubona lukoba ne endeleelwa niyo babaandu baba ne bombaakhe.
Mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola babaandu bano bali ekholo ndala, lundi balomaloma lulomo lulala, ne kano kali busa khurakikha khwe kamakali niko banyala bakhola, mala se siliio silabakhiingilila khukhola nisio benya khukhola tawe.
Yiicha khwikhe khuche khukoyaanie lulomo lwabwe nio balekhe khuuliilisiana mu khuloma.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abasalanisia khukhwama abwenao balekha khukhwombakha lukoba basalanikha mu sibala sioosi.
Khwako batiuukha lukoba olwo bali Babeli,
Lisaaye lia Shemu nilio lino: Enyuma we kimiiko kibili, khukhwichula khwe kameechi ne khuwele, Shemu aaba ali ne kimiiko emia ndala, mala asaala Arifakisati.
Enyuma we lisaalwa lia Arifakisati, Shemu amenya kimiiko chimia chiraano mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Nga Arifakisati amenya ola bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kiraano asaala Sela,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Sela, Arifakisati amenya kimiiko chimia chine na kitaru, mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Nga Sela amenya ola bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru, asaala Eberi,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Eberi, Sela amenya kimiiko chimia chine na kitaru mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Oli Eberi ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kine asaala Peleki,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Peleki, Eberi amenya kimiiko chimia chine ne kamakhumi kataru mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Nga Peleki amenya ola bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru asaala Reu,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Reu, Peleki amenya kimiiko chimia chibili na tisa mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Oli Reu ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kibili asaala Seruki,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Seruki, Reu amenya kimiiko chimia chibili na saba mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Nga Seruki amenya ola bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru asaala Naori,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Naori, Seruki amenya kimiiko chimia chibili, mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Oli Naori ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na tisa asaala Tera,
ne enyuma we lisaalwa lia Tera, Naori amenya kimiiko emia ndala ne likhumi lilala na tisa, mala asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Oli Tera ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi saba asaala Aburamu, Naori ne Harani.
Lisaaye lia Tera nilio lino: Tera aaba raraawe owa Aburamu, Naori ne Harani. Harani aaba raraawe owa Luti.
Harani anyoa afwa, Tera raraawe ne asiili. Afwila mu sibala nisio asaalilwamo sia Uri sie Bakalitayo.
Mala Aburamu ne Naori bareera bakhasi, mukha Aburamu aaba Sarai ne mukha Naori aaba Milika, omukooko owa Harani. Harani aaba raraawe owa Milika ne Isika.
Mala Sarai aaba omukuumba, se aaba no mwana tawe.
Tera abukula Aburamu omwana wewe, ne Luti omwana owa Harani, omwichukhulu wewe, ne Sarai omukhaana wewe, mala auuya nabo barura mu sibala sia Uri sie Bakalitayo bacha mu sibala sia Kanaani, ne nga boola Harani bamenyayo.
Tera amenya kimiiko chimia chibili ne kiraano mala afwila mu Harani.

Ne ndakhukhola obe ekholo emboofu. Ndakhuelesia chikhabi mala khole lisina liowo lifumikhane, nio obe owe chikhabi.
Ndabiita chikhabi abo bakhubiita ewe chikhabi, ne ndalaama abo bakhulaama ewe. Mala khubirira mwiwe bibala bioosi bie khu liloba bilabiitwa chikhabi
Nio Aburamu acha nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne amubooleele. Luti aacha ne naye. Aburamu arura Harani ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi saba na kiraano.
Aburamu abukula Sarai omukhasi wewe, ne Luti omwana owa wandaaye, ne kimiaandu kiabwe kioosi nikio baaba ne banyoolile, ne nasioobi nibo banyoola mu Harani, mala barakikha lukeendo lwe khucha mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Nga boola mu sibala sia Kanaani,
Aburamu engilamo mala acha ola abuundu atakatifu e kumurongooro kumuboofu kwe More mu Shekemu. Mu biise ebio Bakanaani baaba mu sibala esio.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Aburamu mala amuboolela ali, “Ndielesia lisaaye liowo sibala sino.” Nio Aburamu ombakhilayo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, owaba ne amubonekheele, alutare.
Khukhwama abwenao aacha mu sibala sie bikulu ebukwe wa Beteli, mala ombakha liiema liewe akari wa Beteli, lubeka lwe mumbo ne lukoba lwa Ai, ebukwe. Ne, abweneo ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare mala amwesaaya.
Mala Aburamu acha kumukhono kwe siafubo owa Kanaani.
Enjala yaba mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala yaba engali lukali. Nio Aburamu ekha acha mu sibala sia Misiri amenyekhoyo khulwe siise.
Nga aaba ne ali siimbi khukhwingila mu Misiri, aboolela Sarai, omukhasi wewe ali, “Manyile ndi ewe oli omukhasi owe lukoondo lulayi,
Nga Bamisiri ne kane bakhubone kane balome bali, ‘Lola omukhasi wewe,’ balanjira ese mala bakhulekhe ewe omenye.
Baboolele oli ewe oli omukooko wase, nio okile bambukule bulayi bakhanjira tawe.”
Nga Aburamu engila mu Misiri, Bamisiri babona bali omukhasi wewe ali owe lukoondo lulayi.
Bakhulu be mu bwami bwa Farao owa Misiri babona Sarai mala bamufumia khu Farao. Sarai abukulwa ayilwa munju yo mwami.
Mala Sarai akila Farao akholela Aburamu kamalayi. Aburamu aaba ne kamakheese, chikhaafu, chipunda chiseecha ne chikhasi, banasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi ne chingamia.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera lufu lubi lukali khu Farao nende be lichipi liewe sikila mukha Aburamu.
Nio Farao alaanga Aburamu amureeba ali, “Siina nisio ukholeele sino? Siina sikila ne okhambooleele oli, Sarai ali omukhasi wowo?
Siina sikila ne wambooleele oli ali omukooko wowo, mala wakila namubukula abe omukhasi wase? Nono, omukhasi wowo niyooyu mu bukule mala oche.”
Nio Farao arakho bakholi bewe, baroongie Aburamu alala no mukhasi wewe, nende buli siindu nisio aaba nasio.

Nio Aburamu aniina khurura mu Misiri, niye no mukhasi wewe nende buli siindu nisio aaba nasio alala ne Luti. Bengila mu sibala sie lubeka lwe siafubo wa Kanaani.
Aburamu aaba omuiinda lukali mu biaayo, efwesa, ne mu sahabu.
Arekukha arura sibala sie siafubo wa Kanaani oola Beteli, abuundu niio ombakha liiema mu khurakikha, akari wa Beteli ne Ai.
Oola abuundu niio ombakha alutare lwe khunyoa. Abwenao Aburamu esaayilao Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Luti yesi, owarekukha ne Aburamu, aaba ne bibiaayo, chikhaafu, ne kamaeema.
Khwako kamaloba kababoombela, sikila bibaywa biabwe biaba bikali lukali, se banyala khukhwayila alala tawe.
Mala bulomani bwabao akari we babaayi ba Aburamu ne babaayi ba Luti. (Mu ndaalo echo Bakanaani ne Baperisi nibo ba bamenyanga mu sibala esio.)
Nio Aburamu aboolela Luti ali, “Bulomani bukhabaao akari wase ne nawe, namwe akari we babaayi befwe tawe, sikila efwe khuli balebe.
Sibala sino sioosi se sili ebweeni wowo ta ku? Khwaukhane. Waaba nocha kumukhono kumukhasi, ese ndacha kumukhono kumuseecha, namwe waaba nocha kumukhono kumuseecha aba ese ndacha kumukhasi.”
Nio Luti eroborera litooma lia Yoritani lioosi mala arekukha alola lubeka lwe bukwe. Khwako baukhana.
Aburamu amenya mu sibala sia Kanaani ne Luti naye amenya mungoba che mu litooma, mala auuyisia liiema liewe aliyila siimbi Sodomu.
Nono babaandu ba Sodomu baaba bamayaanu, lundi babooni lukali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga Luti aukhana ne Aburamu, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aburamu ali, “Suta chimoni khukhwama niio wimile, mala olole ebunaswa, siafubo, ebukwe ne mumbo,
sikila sibala sioosi nisio obona khakhue ewe ne lisaaye liowo khulwa mindali.
Ndakhola lisaaye liowo libe likali nga kumuyekhe. Kaaba bali omundu anyala abala kumuyekhe, aba babaana bowo bosi balibalikha.
Keenda mu sibala sino obone buleeyi ne bukhiikha bwasio sikila khakhuelesie ewe.”
Nio Aburamu auuyisia liiema liewe acha amenya amikhoonge kia Mamure kiili Heburoni mala ebweeneyo ombakhayo alutare khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Babao babaami bane, Amurafeli omwami owa Sinari, Arioki omwami owa Elasari, Ketorilaomari, omwami owa Elamu ne Titali omwami owe Koiimu.
Babaami bano bebwaakala babaami baraano Bera, omwami owa Sodomu, Birisa, omwami owa Komora, Sinabu, omwami owa Atima, Shemeberi, omwami owa Seboimu no mwami owa Bela (namwe Soari).
Babaami baraano bano bareera alala banamae babwe mu Litooma lia Sitimu (enyanja eye kumuunyu.)
Khulwe kimiiko ekhumi ne kibili, baaba asi we bunyali bwa Ketorilaomari ne babaami ba baaba ne naye, ne mumwiiko kukhola ekhumi na kitaru babakaluukhanakho.
Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi ne kine Ketorilaomari ne babaami ba baba ne naye, becha ne banamae babwe mala baula Barefaimu mu Asiterosi-karinaimu, Basusi mu Hamu, Baemi mu Siabehi-kiriataimu,
ne Bahori mu sikulu siabwe sia Seiri khukhwola Eli Parani khu lwakha lwe mu sichiimi.
Mala bakobolayo boola Enimi-sipati (niyo Kateshi) mala baula sibala sioosi sie Baamaleki, ne Baamori babamenya mu Hasasoni-tamari.
Nio omwami owa Sodomu, owa Komora, owa Atima, owa Seboimu no mwami owa Bela (namwe Soari) barura mala baambanila mwiie, mu Litooma lia Sitimu,
mala bapana ne Ketorilaomari omwami owa Elamu, Titali omwami owa Koiimu, Amurafeli omwami owa Sinari ne Arioki omwami owa Elasari. Babaami bane bapana ne babaami baraano.
Litooma lia Sitimu liabamo kamaloo kamakali ke elamu. Ne nga babaami ba Sodomu ne Komora baaba ne belukha bakwa mu maloo ke lamu chana ako ne babaandi bataru belukhila mu bikulu.
Nio banamae babukula kimiaandu kioosi kia Sodomu ne Komora ne biakhulia biabwe bioosi mala barekukha.
Babukula akhaba Luti yesi, omwana owa wandaaye owa Aburamu, owaba ne amenyile siimbi Sodomu ne kimiaandu kiewe mala barekukha.
Ne mulala owelukha, echa aboolela Aburamu, Omueburania, owaba ne amenya amikhoonge kia Mamure Omuamori. Mamure ne bawandaaye Eshikoli ne Aneri baba bauliilisiana ne Aburamu.
Nga Aburamu ne aulila ali baambile omulebe wewe, arangirira banamae be siseecha chimia chitaru ne likhumi lilala na munaane nibo ekesia liie, ba basaalwa munju yewe, mala abaloondakho, atima khu baami baane abo khukhwola Dani.
Abwenao akabukhasiamo banamae bewe mala bapana ne basiku mu silo. Niye ne bakholi bewe ba baapa ne khubatimania aboosia Haba, lubeka lwe bunaswa lwa Damasika.
Mala Aburamu akobosia kimiaandu nikio baaba ne banuulile kioosi, ne Luti, omwana owa wandaaye, ne kimiaandu kiewe ne bakhasi ne babaandu nibo baaba ne baambile.
Nga Aburamu ne akobola ne aulile Ketorilaomari ne babaami ba baba ne naye, omwami owa Sodomu arura khucha khumwakaanila mu Litooma lia Siabe (Litooma lio mwami).
Ne Melikisedeki, omwami owa Salemu, lundi omusaayi owarumikhiranga Wele owe Angaaki Lukali, asuta kumukaati ne ndali khukhwakaanila Aburamu.
Nio Melikisedeki amubiita chikhabi ne aloma ali,
“Aburamu abiitwe chikhabi ne Wele owe Angaaki Lukali,
owabuumba likulu ne liloba.
Ne afume Wele owe Angaaki Lukali,
ooreere basiku bowo mu makhono kowo.
Mala Aburamu aelesia Melikisedeki,
sitonyi silala khu likhumi sia buli siindu.”
Nio omwami owa Sodomu aboolela Aburamu ali, “Mbe ese babaandu ne ewe obukule kimiaandu nikio okoboosie.”
Ne kakhali Aburamu akobosia omwami owa Sodomu ali, “Nechubile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe Angaaki Lukali, owakhola Likulu ne liloba,
ndi se ndabukula aakhaba luusi namwe lukoye lwe siraaro namwe sisiindu siosi siosi siili sisiowo tawe, okhakhola orio waloma oli, ‘Nakholile Aburamu khuuba omuiinda tawe.’
Se ndabukula sisiindu siosi siosi tawe ne kakhali busa siakhulia nisio babaandu base baliile, ne kumukabwa kwe babaandu bachile ne nase kwong'ene. Lekha Aneri, Eshikoli ne Mamure babukule kumukabwa kwabwe.”

Enyuma we kamakhuwa kano, elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Aburamu mu malola ne eloma eli, “Aburamu, okharia tawe, Ese ndi engabo yowo, ne kumuruuru kwowo kulaba kumukali.”
Ne kakhali Aburamu aloma ali, “Ee, Omwami WELE, okhambe sina, ese se ndikho no mwana tawe, ne oliila khu miaandu kiase ali Elieseri owa Damasika?
Se wayimba omwana tawe. Nasioobi owasaalwa munju mwase niye oliila khu miaandu kiase.”
Nio elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Aburamu lundi eli, “Nasioobi yuno se aliila khu miaandu kiowo tawe, omwana wowo niye osaala niye oliila khu miaandu kiowo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amurusia enje mala aloma ali, “Lola khwikulu mala obale ching'enieesi, kaba bali onyala khuchibala. Lisaaye liowo lilaba lirio.”
Mala Wele aloma ali, “Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owakhureera khukhwama mu sibala sia Uri sie Bakalitayo khu khua ewe sibala sino sibe sisiowo.”
Nio Aburamu areeba ali, “Ee, Omwami WELE, manya ndiena ndi sibala sino silaba sisiase?”
Amukobosia ali, “Nderere emasoti eyolile kimiiko kitaru, esubeeni eyolile kimiiko kitaru, limiiku liliolile kimiiko kitaru, ne liuusi ne libongo-bongo.”
Mala amureerera bino bioosi, buli silala asikhalamo bitonyi bibili mala abianja lubeka ne lubeka ne khali chinyuni se achiikhalamo khabili tawe.
Nga chingosia checha khu nyama che mbosio echo, Aburamu achioona.
ne kakhali ndireera sinyaasio khu sibala nisio balikholela nga banasioobi, mala enyuma wako baliruramo ne kimiaandu kimikali.
Ne ewe wamwene okhafwe kamakora mala osiikhwe mu muleembe.
Ne khu selukho ekhola khane, lisaaye liowo balikobola, sikila se kharusie mu sibala sino Baamori tawe khukhwola nga bumayaanu bwabwe bukhabe bukali nio libe mbo khukhwola mbaukuume.”
Ne nga enyanga yakwa mala bwatiimba, kumulilo kwe liliisi kwaburukha, ne enjaso etirira biabiira akari we bitonyi bie embosio ebio.
sibala sie Bakenayi, Bakeini, Bakatimoni,
Bahiti, Baperisi, Barefaimu
Baamori, Bakanaani, Bakirikashi nende sie Bayebusi.”

Sarai, omukhasi owa Aburamu, se amusaalila babaana tawe. Ne Sarai aaba ne nasioobi, omukhaana Mumisiri, owalaangwa bali Hakari.
Mala Sarai aboolela Aburamu ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ayikhiingilila ese khusaala babaana. Khowiile khu nasioobi wase nio wakana khola ndio nanyoolela babaana khu niye.” Aburamu afukiilila kamakhuwa ka Sarai.
Enyuma wa Aburamu khumenya mu sibala sia Kanaani kimiiko ekhumi, Sarai, omukhasi wewe, abukula Hakari, nasioobi wewe, omukhaana Mumisiri, mala amua Aburamu, omuseecha wewe, abe omukhasi wewe.
Nio Aburamu akona naye mala aesia. Ne nga Hakari abona ali aesiisie, alekelesia Sarai.
Nio Sarai aboolela Aburamu ali, “Bubi nibwo kholelwe bukhoya bwaaba khwiwe! Nakhua nasioobi wase, ne khukhwama nga ne amanyile ali ali nda, andekeleesie ese. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhalaka akari wase ne nawe!”
Ne kakhali Aburamu aboolela Sarai ali, “Lola, nasioobi wowo ali mu bunyali bwowo, mukhole nga ne wenya.” Nio Sarai amunaania mala omukhaana oyo amwilukha.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyoola Hakari asebele mu sichiimi, amuyila kucha Shuri.
Malaika areeba ali, “Hakari, nasioobi owa Sarai, wama wae ne olikho ocha waena?” Hakari akobosia ali, “Ndikho nilukha omukhaaye Sarai.”
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Kobola wo mukhaaye wowo mala weboombie.”
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela lundi ali, “Ndakucha lisaaye liowo libe likali, liikhabalikha tawe.”
“Lola waesiisie, ne olasaala omwana owe sisoleeli, mala olimutiuukha oli Ishimaeli, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi auliile lilila lie khunaanisibwa khwowo.
Ne omwana wowo aliba nga epunda eye mundaa, aliba omusiku owa buli mundu, ne buli mundu aliba omusiku wewe, ne aliiyaula khu balebe bewe amenye yeng'ene.”
Nio Hakari alaanga lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owalomaloma ne naye ali, “Ewe oli Wele oobona,” sikila ereeba ali, “Ese naboone Wele mala enyuma we khumubona naramire omulamu?”
Khwako esebele yalaangwa bali Beeri-lahai-roi, eli akari wa Kadeshi ne Bereti.
Hakari asaalila Aburamu omwana owe sisoleeli mala Aburamu amutiuukha ali Ishimaeli.
Aburamu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane ne sita nga Hakari ne amusaalila Ishimaeli.

Aburamu ne ali kimiiko kamakhumi tisa na tisa, Wele Owe bunyali bwoosi amubonekhela, mala amuboolela ali, “Ese ndi Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi, keenda ebweeni wase mala okhabakho ne liibi liosi liosi likila wekiichibwa tawe.
Ne ndakhola endakaano yase akari wowo ne nase, mala ndatasa lisaaye liowo.”
Mala Aburamu akwa asi mafuumala mala Wele amuboolela ali,
“Nakholile endakaano yino ne nawe, ne olaba paapa owe chikholo chingali.
Lisina liowo se lilaba lundi bali Aburamu tawe, ne kakhali lilaba Aburahamu, sikila nakhukholile paapa owe chikholo chingali.
Ndakhola lisaaye liowo libe likali po, ndakhola bibala biame mwiwe, ne babaami balama mwiwe.
Ne ndikhua sibala nisio olikho omenyamo nga omukwa, ne enyuma wowo ndiia lisaaye liowo sibala sioosi sia Kanaani, sibe sisiabwe mindali na mindali. Ndaba Wele wabwe.”
Nio Wele aboolela Aburahamu ali, “Ne ewe olaliinda endakaano yase, ewe ne lisaaye liowo enyuma wowo, mu selukho chabwe choosi.
Yino niyo endakaano yase niyo olaliinda, akari wase ne nawe nende we lisaaye liowo enyuma wowo: Buli owe siseecha mwinywe akhakhebwe.
Mulakhebwa kamafuunga kenywe, mala silaba simanyisio sie endakaano akari wase ne nanywe.
Mukhebe buli mwana owe sisoleeli owe chindaalo munaane mwinywe, mu selukho chenywe choosi. Akhaba nasioobi oosalwa mungo, namwe owakulwa ne chirupia, khukhwama khu mureende yesi yesi ookhali owe lisaaye lienywe tawe.
Nasioobi owasaalwa munju yenywe namwe owakulwa ne chirupia chenywe alakhebwa. Nio endakaano yase elaba mwinywe khulwa mindali.
Buli musiinde akharusibwe mu baandu bewe sikila aba afunaake endakaano yase.”
“Ne khukhwama luno okhalaanga omukhasi wowo oli Sarai tawe ne kakhali lisina liewe lilaba bali Sara.
Ndamubiita chikhabi, mala khutasa khwako, alakhusaalila omwana owe siseecha. Ndamubiita chikhabi mala abe maayi owe chikholo; ne babaami be babaandu baliama mu niye.”
Nio Aburahamu akwa mafuumala mala achekha ne elomela ali, “Omundu owe kimiiko emia ndala anyala khusaala omwana ku? Sara anyala asaala omwana nga ali ari ne kimiiko kamakhumi tisa?”
Aburahamu aboolela Wele ali, “Ishimaeli andi amenyile khulwe chikhabi chowo.”
Nio Wele aboolela Aburahamu ali, “Tawe, ne kakhali Sara, omukhasi wowo, alakhusaalila omwana mala olimutiuukha oli Isaaka, ne ndiraao endakaano yase ne naye ne lisaaye liewe enyuma wewe.
Ne nauliile lilienya liowo khu Ishimaeli. Ndimubiita chikhabi ne khumukhola abe ne babaana bakali, ne lisaaye liewe lilikucha lukali. Aliba paapa owe babaana likhumi na babili be bubwami, mala ndimukhola abe ekholo emboofu.
Ne kakhali endakaano yase ndikikhola ne Isaaka, niye Sara akhakhusaalile, mu sise sino kumwiiko kukwiicha.”
Ne nga amala khulomaloma naye, Wele arekukha aniina.
Mala Aburahamu abukula Ishimaeli, omwana wewe, ne nasioobi boosi babasaalwa munju yewe namwe nibo akula ne chirupia chewe, buli owe siseecha khu baandu be munju mwewe, abakheba endaalo eyo nga Wele aaba ne alomile.
Aburahamu akhebwa ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi tisa ne tisa.
Ne Ishimaeli akhebwa ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na kine.
Aburahamu no mwana wewe Ishimaeli, bakhebwa endaalo ng'eneyo,
ne babaandu be siseecha boosi be munju eya Aburahamu ne banasioobi babasaalwa munju mwewe ne naabo boosi babakulwa ne chirupia khukhwama khu mureende, bakhebwa alala ne Aburahamu.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Aburahamu a mikhoonge kia Mamure, nga aaba ne ekhaale a muliango kwe liiema liewe kumuumu ne kurafue.
Asuta chimoni abona babaandu bataru bemile ebweeni wewe. Nga ababona arura muliango mwe liiema atima acha khubakaanila. Enama bubweeni bwetiila asi,
mala ababoolela ali, “Baami base, naaba nefukiililwe mumoni chenywe, nemusiima mukhabira busa khu mukholi wenywe tawe.
Kameechi matiiti kari kareerwekho musaabe bikele bienywe mala muolelekho a murongooro ano,
ne nja khureera kumukaati, muliekho nio mubire, sikila mwechile wo mukholi wenywe.”
Nio bamuboolela bali, “Khola nga olomile.”
Aburahamu acha khangu mu liiema khu Sara mala amuboolela ali, “Khola khangu bufu bunosie bikelo bitaru, okaande mala upe kimikaati.”
Mala Aburahamu atima khangu sie tuuli abukula emoosi ekhomefu lundi endayi akiia omukholi wewe akhola khangu khukibaaka.
Aburahamu abukula kamafura ke kamabeele ne kamabeele ne chinyama aelesia bakeni bewe mala abemao mu murongooro nga baaba ne balia.
Bamureeba bali, “Omukhasi wowo Sara ali waena?”
Abakobosia ali, “Ali mu liiema.”
Sara aaba enyuma wewe, amuliango kwe liiema arekereesie.
Nono Aburahamu ne Sara baba bakofuule lukali, ne Sara aaba ayakama khukhwikhebukha.
Nio Sara achekha mala aloma busa yeng'ene ali, “Ese nakofuule, ne omuseecha wase yesi akofuule nyala neulila khuba no museecha ku?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba Aburahamu ali, “Siina sikila Sara ne achekha ne khuloma ali, ‘Ese ng'ali nyala khusaala omwana nga ne ngofuule ndi ku?’
Siindu siliio sili siaandalafu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ku? Kumwiiko kukwiicha siise nga sino siri ekhakobole mala Sara akhasaale omwana owe sisoleeli.”
Nio Sara ekaana ali, “Se njekhile tawe.” Sikila buuri bwamuaamba. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Tawe ochekhile.”
Nio babaandu abo barekukha bacha lubeka lwa Sodomu, Aburahamu acha ne nabo khubaroongia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Nyala nakisa Aburahamu nisio ndi siimbi khukhola ku?
Ne lisaaye liewe licha khuba ekholo emboofu lundi eye kamaani, ne khubirira mu niye bibala bioosi bie khu sibala bilibiitwa chikhabi?
Tawe, sikila namuroboore niye alakiliisie babaana bewe, nende be nju yewe enyuma wewe, barie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhola buluungi ne bung'ali nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholele Aburahamu nga ne amusuubiisie.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sikila bililo khu Sodomu ne Komora biabeele bikali ne bubwoni bwabwe buli bubi lukali,
ndikho nikhayo mbone, ne kali bali niko bakholile kali bulayi bwene nga bililo nibio ndereerwe namwe ne kakhali kario tawe, ndamanya.”
Nio bayuukha khukhwama ao barakikha khucha Sodomu, ne kakhali Aburahamu aaba asiili ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aburahamu eseenda siimbi mala areeba ali, “Olikho ng'ali ocha khubunia omuluungi no mumayaanu?
Kaaba bali baliyo baluungi kamakhumi karaano mu lukoba, se olalekha khubunia lukoba sikila baluungi kamakhumi karaano balimo abo ta ku?
Likhuwa lie khukhwira omuluungi no mumayaanu likhakhubamo tawe! Omuluungi akhaba busa nga omumayaanu tawe. Lilieneli likhakhubamo tawe. Omukhalaki owe sibala se akhoyela khukhola kali ng'ali ta ku?”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Nanyoola mu Sodomu baluungi kamakhumi karaano ndalekha lukoba lwoosi sikila nibo.”
Aburahamu akobosia ali, “Sikila nabeele omunyindaafu lukali khulomaloma khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhaba ne ndi busa lipukhuulu lundi likokhe.
Nono baaba ne bakhali kamakhumi karaano tawe, ne kakhali bali kamakhumi kane na baraano? Olabunia lukoba sikila baramiirekho baraano nio boole kamakhumi karaano?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Se mbunia lukoba baaba ne balimo baluungi kamakhumi kane na baraano tawe.”
Aburahamu aloma lundi ali, “Nosiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okhaambwa lirima tawe, ndakhureebakho lundi, ne kaaba bali banyoolekhanamo kamakhumi kataru bong'ene?” Akobosia ali, “Nanyoolamo kamakhumi kataru se mbunia lukoba tawe.”
Aburahamu aloma ali, “Nosiima umbeele khuchiililila khulomaloma khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne banyoolekhanamo kamakhumi kabili?” Akobosia ali, “Sikila kamakhumi kabili, se endabunia lukoba tawe.”
Aburahamu aloma ali, “Nosiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okhaambwa lirima tawe, ndalomaloma busa luno lulala lwong'ene. Banyoolekhanamo ekhumi bong'ene?”
Akobosia ali, “Sikila ekhumi, se ndalubunia tawe.”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amala khulomaloma ne Aburahamu, arekukha, mala Aburahamu akobola engo.

Malaika babili abo boola Sodomu ekolooba. Luti aaba ekhaale a silibwa sie lukoba. Nga Luti ne ababona enyokha acha khubakaanila, enamikha bubweeni bwetiila asi,
mala aloma ali, “Baami base, musaba mwaukhe mwiche munju yo omukholi wenywe, musaabe bikele mala mukone, mutikhinyi munyala mwauuna mwacha.”
Bakobosia bali, “Tawe, khulakona enje mu lukoba.”
Ne kakhali Luti abekoonjelela lukali mala ekhumaliilikha baukha bacha naye bengila munju mwewe. Abakholela naikara, aapa kimikaati kikhalimo kamamela ta mala balia.
Bakeni abo ne bakhakona tawe, babaandu be mu lukoba lwa Sodomu, basoleeli ne basaakhulu, babaandu boosi, khukhwola khu mu maliilisi babotookhelela enju.
Balaanga Luti bamureeba bali, “Babaandu babechile mu mwowo siilo sino bali waena? Barusie, okhurereere, khubakhole bakhasi.”
Luti arura enje ekala kumuliango,
mala ababoolela ali, “Bawandaayase, mwikoonjelela, mukhakhola sikholwa sie sifwaabi tawe!
Ese ndi ne bakhaana base babili bakhabaakho no mundu owe siseecha tawe, khe mbarusie mala mubakhole nga mwenya. Ne kakhali mukhakhola sikholwa siosi siosi khu baandu babili bano tawe, sikila bengiile munju mwase.”
Ne kakhali bamuboolela bali, “Rura ebweeni wefwe!” Mala baloma bali, “Omundu yuno omukwa busa mala enya khuuba omukhalaki? Nono khulakhukhola ewe kamabi lukali khukhilakho nibo.” Nio basiindikha Luti, mala beseenda siimbi khufunaka lulwiki.
Babaandu babili abo barusia kamakhono bakhweesa Luti bamwingisia munju nimwo baaba, mala bekala lulwiki.
Babofusia babaandu ba baaba khu muliango kwe enju batiiti ne bakhulu, nio balua khuabaasia khuyiima kumuliango, khunyoola tawe.
Nio babaandu babili abo baboolela Luti bali, “Olikho no mundu okundi ano? Bamusaani bowo, basoleeli bowo, bakhaana bowo, namwe okundi yesi yesi mu lukoba luno? Barusie abuundu ano.
Khulikho khucha khubunia abuundu ano sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi auliile biliilo bie babaandu khu baandu bano mala akhurumire efwe khubunie Sodomu.”
Nio Luti acha khu bamusaani bewe, ba baba ne balikho bacha khuaakha bakhaana bewe mala ababoolela ali, “Khola khangu mwinyokhe murure abuundu ano, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali siimbi khubunia lukoba luno.” Ne kakhali nibo bebaasia bali alikho akhola chingacho busa.
Oli makhelebeende, malaika bakhaka khukhola Luti abe khangu baloma bali, “Yinyokha obukule omukhasi wowo ne bakhaana bowo babili nibo oli nabo, okhakhola orio waelela mu munaanio kwe lukoba luno tawe”
Luti naye aboyookhana. Nio, babaandu abo bamutiila niye no mukhasi wewe ne bakhaana bewe kamakhono, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamukholela siisa, mala babarusia mu lukoba babara enje.
Mulala khu malaika aloma ali, “Tima mwilukhe! Mukhekhebukhakho namwe mwimekho abuundu osi osi mu Litooma tawe, yilukhila mu bikulu, mukhakhola murio mwerwa tawe.”
Luti akobosia ali, “Ee, kakhaba kario tawe baami base,
lola, omukholi wenywe afukiililwe mu moni chenywe, mala mwamukholeele kamalayi khulwe khuonia bulamu bwewe. Ne kakhali bikulu bili aleeyi lukali se enyala natima nolayo tawe, butinyu bukhola burio bwanyoola mala nafwa.
Lola eyo, lukoba lutiiti olwo luli siimbi, nyala nelukhilayo. Lekha mulile ebweeneyo. Luli lukoba lutiiti busa, mala bulamu bwase buone!”
Amukobosia ali, “Bulayi nakhufukiiliile, se ndabunia lukoba nilwo olomile tawe
Khangu! Yilukhila ebweeneyo! Sikila se ndakhola sisiindu siosi siosi ne okholayo tawe.”
Khwako lisina lie lukoba olwo lialaangwa lili Soari.
Enyanga yaba yasoile nga Luti oola Soari.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aanya khu Sodomu ne Komora kumulilo kumubuusi khukhwama mwikulu,
mala abunia chingoba echo, ne Litooma lioosi ne babamenya mungoba boosi nende buli simelwa sioosi.
Mukha Luti, owaba enyuma wa Luti ekhebukha mala ekela libaale lia chumbe.
Aburahamu acha bwangu makhelebeende kumutikhinyi abuundu niio eema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Alola mu maayo mwa Sodomu ne Komora ne mu Litooma lioosi, mala abona liliisi ne lituukha khukhwama asi nga liliisi lie sisiooso siboofu.
Nio liaba lirio, nga Wele ne abunia chingoba che mu litooma, nicho Luti amenyangamo. Wele aakhebulila Aburahamu mala arusia Luti khukhwama mu libuna elio.
Luti arura mu Soari acha amenya mu bikulu ne bakhaana bewe babili, mu libina, sikila aria khumenya mu Soari.
Omukhaana omubele aboolela omuro ali, “Paapa asaakhuluwe mala se aliio omundu khu sibala sioosi oonyala akhureera mala khwasaala babaana nga kumwiima kwe sibala sioosi tawe.
Yiicha khunywesie paapa endali anywe ameele mala khukone naye nio khunyoole lisaaye khubirira khu niye.”
Nio siilo esio banyweesia paapa wabwe endali ameela mala omukhaana omubele akona naye. Luti se amanyakho nga omukhaana ne echa amukonao namwe nga arekukha tawe, sikila aaba ameelile lukali.
Endaalo eloondakho omubele aboolela omuro ali, “Ese ngonile ne paapa siilo, Khumunywesie lundi endali siilo sino siosi, mala wesi okone naye, nio fwembi khunyoole lisaaye khubirira khu paapa.”
Nio siilo esio banyweesia paapa wabwe endali ameela, mala omukhaana omuro acha akona naye, ne Luti se amanyakho nga omukhaana ne echa amukonao namwe nga arekukha tawe, sikila aaba ameelile lukali.
Mungila yino bakhaana ba Luti boombi banyoola chinda khukhwama khu paapa wabwe.
Omubele asaala omwana owe sisoleeli, mala amutiuukha lisina ali Moabu. Niye oli paapa owe ba Moabu khukhwola khu ndaalo yino.
Omukhaana omuro yesi asaala omwana owe sisoleeli mala amutiuukha lisina ali Benami. Niye oli paapa owe Baamoni khukhwola khu ndaalo yino.

Aburahamu auuya khukhwama Mamure acha lubeka lwe sibala sie siafubo owa Kanaani Nekebu mala amenya akari wa Kadeshi ne Suri, lundi auuyila mu Kerari.
Mala Aburahamu aloma ali Sara omukhasi wewe, ali ali omukooko wewe. Nio Abimeleki omwami owe Kerari amurumania mala abukula Sara.
Oli mu silo Wele abonekhela Abimeleki mu marooro amuboolela ali, “Ewe wafwiile wekhale busa sikila omukhasi oyo niye obukuule ali omukhasi owo mwene.”
Abimeleki aaba asiili akheseenda niio Sara aaba tawe, nio aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ocha khwira babaandu bakhali ne bumayaanu tawe?
Se ali Aburahamu omwene olomile ali, ‘Ali omukooko wase ta ku?’ Mala Sara omwene yesi aloma ali, ‘Ali wandaayase’ Mu bung'ali bwe kumwoyo kwase ne kamakhono kase kakhalimo kamakhiikha tawe, nakholile kano.”
Nio Wele aboolela Abimeleki mu marooro ali, “Yee, manyile ndi okholile kano mu bung'ali bwe kumwoyo kwowo ne ese niye okhukhiingiliile khukhukholela ese bumayaanu, khwako se khulekhile wamutilakho tawe.
Nono kobosia omukhasi yuno khu museecha wewe sikila ali omung'oosi, ne alakhusabila mala olaba omulamu. Ne waaba ne okhamukobosiayo tawe, manya busa oli olikho ocha khufwa, ewe ne babaandu bowo boosi.”
Nio Abimeleki enyokha makhelebeende, mala alaanga bakholi bewe boosi mala ababoolela kamakhuwa kano koosi, nio baba ne buuri lukali.
Abimeleki alaanga Aburahamu mala amureeba ali, “Okhukholeele siina sino? Ne nakhukholeele bubi siina bubwakilile wanderera ese ne khu bwami bwase kumusaango kumukali nga kuno kuri? Wakholeele ese bibiindu bikhenyekha biakholekha tawe.”
Mala Abimeleki areeba Aburahamu ali, “Siina sisiakilile nokhola ori?”
Aburahamu akobosia ali, “Nakhola ndio, sikila nebaasia ndi, omundu owaria Wele ano se alikhoo tawe, mala balanjira bele khu mukhasi wase.
Ne khutuba khwako ng'ali ali omukooko wase, omwana owa paapa niye, ne kakhali maayi babukhana, mala namureera ali omukhasi wase.
Ne nga Wele ne akhola narura munju eya paapa naba omukwa mu sibala sikeni, naboolela Sara ndi, ‘Buno buli bulayi nibwo kenyikha uukholele. Buli abuundu niio khucha, loma oli ese ndi wandaayo.’ ”
Nio Abimeleki abukula kamakheese ne chikhaafu ne banasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi abaelesia Aburahamu, mala amukobosela Sara omukhasi wewe.
Abimeleki aloma ali, “Sibala siase sili ebweeni wowo, menya niio osiimile.”
Khu Sara aloma ali, “Lola naeele wandaayo bitonyi eelefu ndala bie fwesa, bili simanyisio mumoni che babaandu baali ne nawe, buli mundu amanye ali se oli ne kumusaango tawe.”
Nio Aburahamu asaba Wele mala Wele aonia Abimeleki akhaba ne omukhasi wewe ne banasioobi bewe be siikhasi nio banyale khusaala babaana.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abeele aakumbaasiisie be nju eya Abimeleki sikila Sara mukha Aburahamu.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita Sara chikhabi nga aaloma, mala amukholela nga aamulaka.
Sara aesia mala asaalila Aburahamu omwana owe sisoleeli mumase keewe ke busaakhulu, mu siise nisio Wele aaba ne amubooleele.
Aburahamu atiuukha omwana wewe owe sisoleeli, niye asaala mu Sara, ali Isaaka.
Mala Aburahamu akheba omwana wewe Isaaka ne ali ne bukhulu bwe chindaalo munaane, nga Wele aamulaka.
Aburahamu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala, nga Isaaka ne asaalwa.
Mala Sara aloma ali, “Wele andereere chinjekho. Buli mulala okane aulile alachekha ne nase.”
Mala achiililila khuloma ali, “Naanu abeele onyala aboolela Aburahamu ali Sara akhanuunie babaana? Ne luno namusaaliile omwana owe sisoleeli mu busaakhulu bwewe.”
Omwana achoa, bamulatia, mala Aburahamu akhola naikara emboofu khu ndaalo ng'eneeyo.
Sara abona omwana niye Hakari, Omumisiri, asaalila Aburahamu, ne enyaa no mwana wewe Isaaka.
Nio aboolela Aburahamu ali, “Oona omukhasi nasioobi yuno alala no mwana wewe, sikila omwana owo mukhasi nasioobi yuno se aliba owiila khu miaandu alala no mwana wase Isaaka tawe.”
Ne likhuwa lino se liasiimisia Aburahamu tawe sikila omwana wewe Ishimaeli.
Ne kakhali Wele aboolela Aburahamu ali, “Okhabiililwa sikila omusoleeli wowo no mukhasi wowo nasioobi tawe, siosi siosi nisio Sara akhuboolela, khola nga akhubooleele, sikila khubirira mu Isaaka olanyoola lisaaye nilio nakhulaka.
Ne nja khukhola omwana wo mukhasi nasioobi yesi abe ekholo, sikila ali lisaaye liowo.”
Nio Aburahamu enyokha makhelebeende, abukula kumukaati, eoochwa eye lisielo eye kameechi, aelesia Hakari, amura khu mabeka, no mwana mala amuoona. Mala Hakari arekukha ayiiyayiiya mu sichiimi sia Beerisheba,
Nga kameechi mu oochwa eye lisielo ne kawa anjukha omwana wewe mu khachakha khalalakho.
Esendakho sinao, buleeyi bwe bikele emia ndala, mala ekhala asi, sikila aalola ali, “Se nenya nabona omwana yuno nafwa tawe.” Mala Hakari alila burafu.
Wele aulila kumumilo kwo omusoleeli oyo, mala malaika owa Wele alaanga Hakari amureeba ali, “Hakari, siina sikhunaania? Okharia tawe, sikila Wele aulile liilila lio musoleeli niio ali ao.
Yinyokha, obukule omusoleeli, omumeeme mala omuoleelesie sikila ndamukhola abe ekholo emboofu.”
Wele akhola Hakari abona esebele eye kameechi acha echusia kameechi mu oochwa eyo, mala aelesia omusoleeli aanywa.
Wele aaba no musoleeli oyo mala achoa. Amenya mu sichiimi sia Parani mala aba omuaayi we buyiingo, oomanyile khuburumikhira bulayi.
Maawe amunyoolela omukhasi khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri.
Nono njechubile ano, ebweeni wa Wele, oli se oliikholela ke bubeeyi namwe okholele babaana base namwe lisaaye liase tawe. Ne nga naba omuri khwiwe wesi okhakholela orio alala ne sibala nisio omenyilemo sino.”
Aburahamu amuboolela ali, “Ndakhwichubila.”
Nga Aburahamu eloochela Abimeleki ke esebele niyo bakholi ba Abimeleki baaba ne bakhayiilekho,
Abimeleki amuboolela ali, “Se emanya okholile likhuwa lino tawe, ne se naulilekho ta khukhwola luno.”
Nio Aburahamu abukula kamakheese ne chikhaafu aelesia Abimeleki, mala boombi bakhola endakaano.
Aburahamu aukhasia kamasubeeni saba khukhwama mu lituuli akara alubeka.
Abimeleki areeba Aburahamu ali, “Kamasubeeni saba niko oreere alubeka kano ka siina?”
Aburahamu amukobosia ali, “Kamasubeeni saba kano bukula, mala obe omuloli wase, oli ese niise owayaba esebele yino.”
Khwako abuundu ao alaangwa bali Beerisheba sikila abwenao boombi bechuba.
Nio bakhola endakaano a Beerisheba. Enyuma wako Abimeleki ne Fikoli, komanda owe banamae bewe, barekukha bakobola mu sibala sie Bafilisiti.
Aburahamu abiaala kumurongooro kumutamarisiki mu Beerisheba, mala esaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa mindali na mindali.
Aburahamu aaba omukwa mu sibala sie Bafilisiti chindaalo chingali.

Nio Aburahamu enyokha makhelebeende, asaaka chiikhu che khukhwosia embosio mala achira khu mukoongo kwe epunda. Nio abukula bakholi bewe babili, no mwana wewe Isaaka, arekukha acha abuundu niio Wele aaba ne amubooleele.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, Aburahamu abona abuundu chana sinaaokho.
Aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Enywe rama ano ne punda. Ese no musoleeli yuno khulacha eyo khwisaaye Wele ne mala khukobole.”
Aburahamu atiuukha Isaaka, omwana wewe, chiikhu che khukhwosia embosio ne niye omwene asuta kumulilo ne kumubano. Nio boombi bacha alala.
Isaaka alaanga raraawe ali, “Paapa!” Afukiilila ali, “Siina mwana wase?” Isaaka areeba ali, “Lola khuli ne kumulilo ne chiikhu, ne limeeme lie khukhwosia embosio lili?”
Aburahamu amuboolela ali, “Wele omwene kane erusilie limeeme lie embosio eye khukhwosia mwana wase.” Nio boombi bachiililila khukeenda alala.
Nio Aburahamu abukula kumubano akhale omwana wewe enjasi.
Ne kakhali malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga Aburahamu khukhwama mwikulu ne aloma ali, “Aburahamu, Aburahamu!” Aburahamu akobosia ali, “Ese niyooyu.”
Malaika aloma ali, “Okhayila kumukhono khu mwana namwe omukhole sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, sikila luno namanyile ndi ewe waria Wele, naboone se unyimile omwana wowo omuteelwa tawe.”
Aburahamu ekhebukha enyuma mala abona limiiku liaambiilwe kimisaanga mu sichakha. Acha alibukula mala aliaana nga siaanwa sie mbosio sie khukhwosia mu bweyaangu bwa Isaaka omwana wewe.
Nio Aburahamu atiuukha abuundu ao lisina ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Alaana.” Nga lilomwanga khukhwola endaalo eya luno lili, “Khu sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siliaanwa.”
Mala malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga Aburahamu lukhola khabili khukhwama mwikulu,
mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘nechubile mu lisina liase nga okholile lino, ne se olobile khu khumbelesia omwana wowo omuteelwa tawe,
khwako nja khukhubiita chikhabi, lundi nja khukucha lisaaye liowo libe nga ching'enieesi lundi nga kumuyekhe. Ne lisaaye liowo likhaule basiku baalio.
Aburahamu akobola niio bakholi bewe baaba mala barekukha alala bakobola e Beerisheba mala amenyayo.
Nio, enyuma wa kano, Aburahamu aboolelwa ali, “Milika yesi asaaliile, wandaayo, Naori babaana.
Omubele bali Usi, okundi bali Busi, nende Kemueli raraawe owa Aramu,
Keseti, Haso, Pilitasi, Chitilafi ne Betueli.”
Betueli aaba raraawe owa Rabeka. Milika asaala babaana munaane bano khu Naori, wandaaye owa Aburahamu.
Ne lundi Reuma, omukhasi niye Naori aamenyia busa nga omusaale, asaala Teba, Kahamu, Tahasi ne Maaka.

Sara amenya kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na saba.
Mala Sara afwila e Kiriati-Ariba (Olwo nilwo lukoba lwa Heburoni) mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala Aburahamu abeelela ne khumulila.
Aburahamu enyokha alekha omufu wewe acha aboolela Bahiti ali,
“Ese ndi omureende omukwa mwinywe, mbe kamaloba mwinywe ke khusiikhamo, mala siikhe omufu wase.”
Bahiti bakobosia Aburahamu bali,
“Omwami, khuulile, ewe oli omundu omukali mwifwe. Siikha omufu wowo mu siliindwa silayi nisio olarobora mu biliindwa biefwe, se aliio khwifwe olakhwimana siliindwa siewe namwe olakhukhiingilila khusiikha omufu wowo tawe.”
Aburahamu enyokha mala enama ebweeni we Bahiti, babaandu be mu sibala esio,
mala ababoolela ali, “Mwaaba ne mufukiliile siikhe omufu wase ano, aba ndeebere Efuroni okhwa Soari,
ambe libina lia Makipela, nilio ali nalio lili khundulo khwe kamaloba kewe. Ambe khu bukusi nibwo enya ngule mumoni chenywe libe nga nilio nyoolile lie khusiikhamo.”
Ne Efuroni omwene aaba ekhaale mu Bahiti basie. Akobosia Aburahamu mala Bahiti boosi ba baaba mu muse kwe akookwa eye lukoba lwewe baulila.
Aloma ali “Omwami, se kali kario tawe, mbulile. Nakhuele kamaloba ne libina liilimo. Ndikho khuelesia mumoni che balebe base osiikhemo omufu wowo.”
Nio Aburahamu enama ebweeni we Bahiti
mala aboolela Efuroni, babaandu be sibala esio ne baulila, ali, “Ne kakhali, nosiima mbulile. Fukiilila kumuruungo kwase mala ngule kamaloba esiikhemo omufu wase.”
Efuroni akobosia Aburahamu ali,
“omwami wase mbulile, kamaloba kakulikha bitonyi bie fwesa chimia chine, bibienebio bili siina akari wase ne nawe? Nono siikha omufu wowo.”
Aburahamu auliilisiana ne Efuroni, mala amukelela bitonyi bie efwesa chimia chine nga abele omwene ne ararirekho Bahiti ne bauliile, khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie baboofuli ba babao biise ebio.
Nio kamaloba koosi kakaba ka Efuroni mu Makipela, kakaba ebukwe owa Mamure, kaba ka Aburahamu. Kamaloba kano kabamo libina ne kimirongooro.
Kamaloba kamanyikha khuuba ka Aburahamu ebweeni we Bahiti boosi ba baaba mu muse.
Nio Aburahamu asiikha Sara, omukhasi wewe, mu libina mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Bahiti baeelesia Aburahamu kamaloba ne libina kabe abuundu e khusiikha.

Nono Aburahamu aaba akofuule lukali, ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba amubiita chikhabi mu biindu bioosi.
Mala Aburahamu aboolela omukholi wewe, omukhulu khu bakholi be nju yewe, owemeelelanga buli siindu nisio aaba nasio, ali, “Ra kumukhono kwowo akari we kamaraango kaase.
Yichuba mwisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we likulu ne liloba, oli se olibukulila omwana wase, omukhasi khukhwama mu bakhaana be Bakanaani nibo namenyamo bano tawe.
Ne kakhali, olicha mu sibala siase, mu balebe base mala obukulileyo omwana wase Isaaka omukhasi.”
Omukholi areeba Aburahamu ali, “Wakana omukhaana se anyala afukiilila khukhwicha ne nase mu sibala sino tawe. Aba nisieyo omusoleeli wowo mu sibala nisio waamamo?”
Aburahamu amukobosia ali, “Okhakhola orio wakobosiayo omwana wase tawe!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe mwikulu, owandusia munju eya paapa wase, ne mu sibala siase nisio nasaalwamo, lundi owandomela ne echuba ali, ‘Ndiia lisaaye liowo sibala sino,’ alaruma malaika wewe ebweeni wowo, mala olabukulila omwana wase omukhasi khukhwama ebweeneyo.
Ne omukhaana oyo aba nakhafukiilila khukhwicha ne nawe tawe, aba oli omulekhuule khukhwama mu liechuba liase. Ne kakhali okhesiayo omwana wase tawe.”
Nio omukholi ara kumukhono kwewe akari we kamaraango ka Aburahamu, omwami wewe, mala amwichubila khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lino.
Omukholi chana abukula chingamia ekhumi cho omwami wewe, biaanwa lukano na lukano nibio arobora khukhwama mu miaandu kio mwami wewe, mala enyokha, arekukha acha mu sibala sia Mesopotamia mu lukoba lwa Naori.
Nga ola, asikamia chingamia enje we lukoba, a sebele mu siise sie ekolooba, nisio bakhasi bachilangamo khutaa kameechi.
Asaba ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owo mwami wase Aburahamu, khusaba umbe bukhili luno, mala wekesie busiime bwowo buchiililila khu mwami wase Aburahamu.
Lola, nemile a sebele, ne bakhaana be babaandu be mu lukoba balikho barura becha khutaa kameechi.
Lekha omukhaana niye kane ndome ndi, ‘Nosiima ruura enyuungu mala umbe kameechi nywe,’ ne okane angobosie ali, ‘Khonywe, ne ese ndanyweesia aakhaba ne chingamia chowo,’ abe niye ewe oroboreere Isaaka omukholi wowo. Khulwa kano ndamanya ndi ewe wekeesie busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe khu mwami wase.”
Oli asisaba, Rabeka, omukhaana owa Betueli, omwana owa Milika ne Naori, wandaaye owa Aburahamu, echa asutile esoongo yewe khwibeka.
Aaba omukhaana owe lukoondo lulayi lundi owe yabwana, okhakonakho no museecha tawe. Ekha mu sebele echusia esoongo mala aniina.
Omukholi oyo atima acha amwakaanila, mala amuboolela ali, “Nosiima, mbeekho kameechi matiiti kari khukhwama mu soongo mwowo nywe.”
Omukhaana amukobosia ali, “omwami khonywe.” Mala omukhaana aruura esoongo khangu khukhwama khwibeka khwewe akitililila mala amunywesia.
Oli amunywesia amala amuboolela ali, “Ndatayila aakhaba chingamia chowo chosi, nabwila nga choosi ne chimala khunywa.”
Nio omukhaana oyo achukha khangu kameechi ke mu soongo mwewe khu lwelo nilwo bibiaayo binywelangakho mala atima mu sebele asombelela kameechi kamakali khukhwola nga chingamia chanywa choosi.
Omukholi owa Aburahamu oyo amulolelela ne asilile busa, mu khweyika amanye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akholile lukeendo lwewe khuba ne bukhili namwe tawe.
Oli chingamia chamala khunywa, omundu oyo abukula embete eye sahabu eye bukusi bukali ne chipangili chimboofu chibili che sahabu achira khu makhono ko mukhaana.
Mala amureeba ali, “Mboolele ewe oli omukhaana owa naanu. Bubweyaangu bulikho munju mwa paapa wowo niio efwe khunyala khwakona?”
Omukhaana amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi omukhaana owa Betueli, omusoleeli owa Milika, niye Milika asaalila Naori.”
Atasakho ali, “Ewefwe khuli ne chikhanja ne biakhulia bikali bie bibiaayo ne lusiro nilwo bakeni banyala bakonamo.”
Omukholi oyo asikama asi mala esaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Aloma ali, “Afume Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owo Mwami wase Aburahamu. Wele okhalekhile busiime bwewe buchiililila lundi bubweikinwa khu mwami wase tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andangiriire khukhwola khunju eye balebe bo mwami wase.”
Nio Omukhaana atima acha aboolela be munju eya maayi wewe bibiindu bino bioosi.
Rabeka aaba ne wandaaye niye batiuukha bali Labani, Labani arura atima acha niio omundu oyo aaba, a sebele.
Labani aboona embete ne chipangili khu makhono ko mukooko wewe lundi aulila kamakhuwa niko omundu chana aboolela Rabeka. Acha niio omukholi owa Aburahamu aaba ne emile siimbi ne chingamia a sebele.
Amuboolela ali, “yiicha, mungo, omubiite owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siina sikila ne wima enje? Nakhung'ooneele lusiro ne abuundu e chingamia.”
Omundu oyo engila munju. Labani akangulula bibiaba khu ngamia mala achielesia chikhanja ne biakhulia bie bibiaayo, lundi aelesia omundu oyo ne babaandu nibo aba nabo kameechi basaabe bikele.
Nga siakhulia ne siareerwa ebweeni wewe aloma ali, “Se ndalia nekhaboola sisindeerire tawe.”
Labani amuboolela ali, “Loma.”
Aloma ali, “Ese ndi omukholi owa Aburahamu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita omwami wase chikhabi chingali, mala abeele omukali lukali, amua kamatuuli ne kiminyele, efwesa ne esahabu, banasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi, chingamia ne chipunda.
Ne Sara, mukho omwami wase, aamusaalila omwana mu buloosi bwewe. Ne omwami wase aelesia omusoleeli oyo buli siindu nisio ali nasio.
Omwami wase anjechubia ne aloma ali, ‘Yichuba oli se olibukulila omwana wase omukhasi khukhwama mu bakhaana be Bakanaani nibo namenyamo tawe.
Ne kakhali olicha munju eya paapa, mu balebe base, mala obukulileyo omwana wase omukhasi.’
Nakobosia omwami wase ndi, ‘Wakana omukhaana se akhafukiilile khukhwicha nase tawe!’
Omwami angobosia ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye naria, akharume malaika wewe ache ne nawe mala akhole lukeendo lwowo lube ne bukhili, mala olibukulila omwana wase omukhasi khukhwama mu balebe base lundi munju eya paapa.
Ne olaba omulekhuule khukhwama mu khwichubia khwase, waaba ne woola khu balebe base mala baloba khukhua omukhaana.’
“Nga ne nolile asebele luno, sabile ndi, ‘Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owo mwami wase Aburahamu, mbe bukhili mu niko endikho ekhola.
Lola nemile asebele, ne omukhaana olarura eche khutaa kameechi ndamusaba ambeekho kameechi ke khunywa.
Ne olamba lundi anywesie chingamia chase choosi lekha abe omukhasi niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aroboreere omwana owo mwami wase.’
Ne khamala lisaba liase mu mwoyo tawe, Rabeka echa ne soongo yewe khu mabeka, mala ekha mu sebele ataa kameechi. Namusaba ndi, ‘Nosiima mbeekho kameechi nywe.’
Aruura esoongo khangu khukhwama khwibeka mala aloma ali, ‘Khonywe, mala nase ndanyweesia aakhaba ne chingamia chowo choosi.’ Nio ese nanywa mala aanyweesia ne chingamia choosi.
Nio namureeba ndi, ‘Ewe omukhaana owa naanu?’ Aloma ali, ‘Ese omukhaana owa Betueli, omwana owa Milika ne Naori.’ Nio namura embete khu lioolu ne chipangili khu makhono kewe.
Mala nasikama asi, nesaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owo Mwami wase Aburahamu, oundangiriire mbukule omukhaana owe balebe bo mwami wase, abe omukhasi owo mwana wewe.
Nono luno, mwaba ne mulakholela omwami wase bubweikinwa ne bung'ali, mumboolele, ne kakhali kario tawe, mboolele, nio manye nilio nyala nakhola.”
Nio Labani ne Betueli bakobosia bali, “Likhuwa lino liamile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se khunyala khwalomaloma khwiwe liosi liosi tawe.
Rabeka ali ebweeni wowo, mubukule oche, mala abe omukhasi owo mwana owo mwami wowo, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene ne alomile.”
Nga omukholi owa Aburahamu ne aulila niko baloma enama asi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Arusia bibiindu bie efwesa, esahabu ne chingubo mala abiia Rabeka. Lundi aelesia wandaaye owa Rabeka ne maawe, bibiindu bie bukusi bukali.
Nio niye ne babaandu nibo aaba nabo balia ne khunywa mala bakonayo siilo esio. Nga bwasia benyokha, omukholi aloma ali, “Ndekhuule ngobole wo mwami wase.”
Mala wandaaye owa Rabeka ne maawe baloma bali, “Lekha omukhaana amenyekho nafwe khu siise, chindaalo ekhumi, nechiwele anyala arekukha.”
Omukholi abakobosia ali, “Mukhanjikhasia tawe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile lukeendo lwase lwabeele ne bukhili. Khemundekhuule ngobole wo mwami wase.”
Bakobosia bali, “Lekha khulaange omukhaana omwene mala khumureebe.”
Balaanga Rabeka mala bamureeba bali, “Wenya oche ne omundu yuno?”
Abakobosia ali, “Yee, ndacha ne naye.”
Nio balekhuula Rabeka ne omukeesia wewe, ne omukholi owa Aburahamu ne babaandu bewe.
Mala babiita Rabeka chikhabi ne baloma bali,
“Mukooko wefwe, obe maayi owe chielefu,
owe chielefu kamakhumi.
Lisaaye liowo liule chingoba che basiku balio!”
Nio Rabeka ne bakholi bewe benyokha mala baniina khu ngamia, bacha ne omukholi owa Aburahamu.
Isaaka aaba echile mu sichiimi sisialaangwa Beeri-lahai-roi mala amenyanga siafubo owa Kanaani.
Nono Isaaka arura acha mu lukoongo ekolooba, khukhwibaasia kakeewe. Alola, mala abona chingamia chilikho chiicha.
Rabeka nga abona Isaaka, ekha arura khu ngamia,
mala areeba omukholi owa Aburahamu ali, “Naanu olikho okeenda mu lukoongo ne eecha oyo?” Omukholi amukobosia ali, “Omwami wase niye.” Nio Rabeka abukula eneti mala efuuma mumoni.
Nio omukholi oyo aboolela Isaaka bibiindu bioosi nibio aaba ne akholile.
Nio, Isaaka engisia Rabeka mu liiema nimwo Sara, maayi wewe amenyanga, amubukula aaba omukhasi wewe mala amusiima. Nio Isaaka aolelesibwa enyuma we lifwa lia maawe.

Aburahamu areera omukhasi okundi lisina liewe bali Ketura.
Amusaalila Simurani, Yokisiani, Metani, Midiani, Isibaki ne Siua.
Yokisiani aaba raraawe owa Sheba ne Dedani. Babaana ba Dedani baaba Asiurimu, Letusimu ne Leumimu.
Ba okhwa Midiani baaba Efa, Eferi, Hanoki, Abida, ne Elida. Bano boosi baaba babaana ba Ketura.
Aburahamu aelesia Isaaka bioosi nibio aaba nabio.
Ne babaana be bakhasi bewe babaandi nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale, abaelesia biianwa, mala ne asiili omulamu abarusia niio omwana wewe Isaaka aaba bache mu sibala sie bukwe.
Chino nicho chindaalo che kimiiko kie bukhulu bwa Aburahamu, emia ndala kamakhumi saba ne kiraano.
Aburahamu akwiisia kumwoyo, mala afwa bulayi ne akofuule. Afwa acha khu baandu bewe.
Basoleeli bewe, Isaaka ne Ishimaeli bamusiikha mu libina lia Makipela ebukwe we Mamure, mu maloba ka Efuroni okhwa Soari Omuhiti.
Ako niko ka kaaba kamaloba niko Aburahamu akula khukhwama khu Bahiti. Aburahamu no mukhasi wewe Sara basiikhwa abwenao.
Enyuma we lifwa lia Aburahamu, Wele aelesia chikhabi Isaaka omwana wewe. Mala Isaaka amenya e Beeri-lahai-roi.
Lino nilio lisaaye lia Ishimaeli okhwa Aburahamu, niye Hakari omukhaana Mumisiri, nasioobi owa Sara, asaala khu Aburahamu,
khuloondekhana ne lisaalwa liabwe: Naboati, omubele owa Ishimaeli, Kedari, Atibeeli, Mibusamu,
Mishima, Tuma, Masa,
Hatati, Tema, Yeturi, Nafisi ne Ketema.
Abo nibo ba okhwa Ishimaeli, ne ako niko kamasina kaabwe khuloondekhana ne birekere ne abuundu niio bamenyanga. Babaana ekhumi na babili be bubwami khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe.
Kino nikio kimiiko kie bulamu bwa Ishimaeli, kimiiko emia ndala, ne kamakhumi kataru ne saba mala akwiisia kumwoyo, afwa mala acha khu baandu bewe.
Lisaaye lia Ishimaeli liamenya mu sibala siili akari owa Habila ne Suri, sibala sisialolelelalana ne Misiri lubeka lwe Ashuru. Baba be busiku bukali khu bawandaaye.
Lino lili lisaaye lia Isaaka okhwa Aburahamu: Aburahamu aaba raraawe owa Isaaka.
Isaaka ne ali bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane, areera Rabeka nga omukhasi wewe, omukhaana owa Betueli Omusiami owe Padani-aramu, omukooko owa Labani Omusiami.
