Ne Isaaka asaabila omukhasi wewe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila aaba omukuumba. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila lisaba liewe mala Rabeka omukhasi wewe aesia.
Babaana barekanila munda mwewe. Rabeka aloma ali, “Siina sikila ne menya?” Nio acha areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Bibala bibili bili munda mwowo,
okhasaale babaandu babili mala bakhabiilane,
mulala akhabe owe kamaani khukhilakho okundi,
omukhulu akhakholele omukeekhe.”
Nga siise sie khusaala siola, asaala bukhwana.
Mukhwana asaalwa omubesemu pe. Aaba ne kamaswa kumubili kwosi nga engubo eye bufuumbo, khwako, bamutiuukha bali Esau.
Enyuma wewe, Mulongo asaalwa ne atiilile ekhukunyu eya Esau nio lisina liewe liaba Yakobo. Nga Rabeka ne abasaala, Isaaka aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi sita.
Nga basoleeli bano bachoa, Esau aaba omuaayi owamanya lukali buaayi, omundu owasiima limenya lienje, ne Yakobo aaba omundu owasila mala ekhalanga mungo.
Isaaka asiima Esau, sikila alichanga chinyama che mu buaayi bwewe, ne Rabeka asiima Yakobo.
Endaalo ndala Yakobo aba afuluke sifuluko sie kamakaanda, Esau aloota khukhwama mu lukoongo, mala enjala yaba yamukhayile.
Esau asaba Yakobo ali, “Nosiima lekha ekhombekho sifuluko sibesemu sino sikila enjala yakhayile lukali!” (Khwako bamutiuukha lisina bali Edomu.)
Yakobo amukobosia ali, “Nyoa ungusie kumukabwa kwe bubele bwowo nio.”
Esau aloma ali, “Ese ndi siimbi khufwa, kumukabwa kwe khuba omubele kuli na bukhala siina khwise?”
Yakobo amua kumukaati ne sifuluko sibesemu alia, mala enyokha arekukha. Esau alekelesia ario kumukabwa kwewe kwe khuba omubele.

Enjala ekiindi yabao mu sibala nga eyabao mu ndaalo cha Aburahamu. Isaaka acha e Kerari owa Abimeleki, omwami owe Bafilisiti.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubonekhela mala amuboolela ali, “Okhekha wacha e Misiri tawe, menya mu sibala nisio kane khuboolele.
Menya mu sibala sino, ne ndaba ne nawe mala ndakhubiita chikhabi. Ndakhuelesia ewe ne lisaaye liowo kamaloba kano koosi. Ndakhola nga nechubila Aburahamu, paapa wowo.
Ndakucha lisaaye liowo libe likali nga ching'enieesi mala ndilielesia kamaloba kano koosi. Ne khubirira mu lisaaye liowo bibala bioosi bie khu sibala bilibiitwa chikhabi.
Ndakhuelesia chikhabi sikila Aburahamu aria kumumilo kwase ne kamalaka kase.”
Nio Isaaka amenya e Kerari.
Nga babaandu be abuundu ao bamureeba ko mukhasi wewe, abakobosia ali, “Yuno ali omukooko wase,” sikila aria khuloma ali, “Yuno ali omukhasi wase.” Ebaasia ali, “Babaandu be abuundu ano bakhola bario banjira sikila Rabeka,” Rabeka aaba omukhasi owe lukoondo lulayi.
Nga Isaaka amenya siise sileeyi, Abimeleki omwami owe Bafilisiti alolela mu numa mala abona Isaaka enyaa ne atiila tiila Rabeka, omukhasi wewe.
Abimeleki alaanga Isaaka mala amureeba ali, “Yuno ali omukhasi wowo, sina sikila ne oloma oli, ‘Ali omukooko wase?’ ”
Isaaka amukobosia ali, “Sikila nebaasia ndi bakhola bario banjira.”
Abimeleki amureeba ali, “Sina nisio okhukholeele sino? Mulala khu baandu base wakana andi akonile no mukhasi wowo, mala andi akhurereere efwe kumusaango.”
Nio Abimeleki akaambila babaandu bewe boosi ne aloma ali, “Omundu yesi yesi otiila khu mundu yuno namwe khu mukhasi wewe, aleerwa.”
Isaaka amiicha mu sibala esio biakhulia, mala kumwiiko okwo akesa khukhwola emia khukhila nga amiicha. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubiita chikhabi,
Mala Isaaka aba omuiinda. Achiililila khunyoola kimiaandu khukhwola nga aba omuiinda lukali.
Aba ne kiminyele ne kamatuuli kamakali, lundi aba ne banasioobi bakali, mala liakila Bafilisiti bamukhendekhela.
(Nono Bafilisiti baba bechusie ne liloba ne khukhwililisia chisebele choosi nicho bakholi ba raraawe bayaba mundaalo cha Aburahamu, ne asiili omulamu.)
Abimeleki aboolela Isaaka ali, “Rekukha okhururemo, sikila ewe oli omukali lukali khukhukhila efwe.”
Nio Isaaka arekukha arura ebweeneyo acha mu Litooma lia Kerari mala amenyayo.
Isaaka akoota lundi chisebele chichaba ne chayabwa mu ndaalo cha raraawe Aburahamu, sikila Bafilisiti baba bachililisia enyuma we lifwa lia Aburahamu, mala achitiuukha kamasina niko yaba raraawe achitiuukha.
Bakholi ba Isaaka bayaba mu Litooma banyoola emoni eye kameechi.
Babaayi ba Kerari balomana ne babaayi ba Isaaka ne baloma bali, “Kameechi kano kali kakeefwe.” Nio Isaaka atiuukha esebele lisina ali, “Eseki” sikila baingana ne naye.
Bayaba esebele ekiindi lundi balomana khu ng'eneyo yosi. Mala akitiuukha lisina ali, “Sitina.”
Arura abwenao mala ayaba esebele ekiindi. Khwiyo se balomanilakho tawe, nio akitiuukha lisina ali, “Reoboti.” Aloma ali, “Sikila luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukholeele bubweyaangu mala khulakucha mu sibala sino.”
Khukhwama abwenao Isaaka acha e Beerisheba.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubonekhela siilo esio amuboolela ali, “Ese ndi Wele owa Aburahamu paapa wowo. Okharia tawe, sikila Ese ndi ne nawe mala ndakhubiita chikhabi, ne khukucha lisaaye liowo sikila omukholi wase Aburahamu.”
Nio Isaaka ombakha alutare abwenao mala esaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Asimikhao liiema liewe. Ne abwenao bakholi ba Isaaka bayabao esebele.
Isaaka abareeba ali, “Enywe mwambiyila, mwamboona mururemo, ne luno mwichile khukhumbona sikila siina?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Khwaboone abuwaanga khuli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nawe, khwako khuloma khuli, khukhole endakaano ne nawe.
Khwenya khuli se olakhukholela efwe kamabi tawe, mungila ng'ene nga efwe fwesi ne khukhakhutilakho tawe ne se khwakhukholakho siindu sibi tawe, ne kakhali kamalayi kong'ene, mala khwakhuoona mu muleembe. Ewe luno oli omubiite chikhabi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Isaaka abakholela naikara, balia mala banywa.
Oli makhelebeende benyokha bechubanila, mala Isaaka abaroongia barekukha mu muleembe.
Khu ndaalo eyo ne ng'ene bakholi ba Isaaka becha bamuboolela ke esebele niyo baaba ne bayabile bali, “Khwanyoolile kameechi.”
Atiuukha esebele ali Shiba, khwako lisina lie lukoba lili Beerisheba khukhwola endaalo yino.
Oli Esau ali bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane areera bakhasi babili, Yutiisi omukhaana owa Beeri Omuhiti, ne Basemati omukhaana owa Eloni, Omuhiti.
Bakhasi abo bakhola limenya lia Isaaka ne Rabeka liaba lie bubeeleli bukali.

Nga Isaaka akofula, aabofula chimoni. Nio alaanga Esau, omwana wewe omubele, mala aloma ali, “Mwana wase!”
Esau afukiilila ali, “Paapa.”
Amuboolela ali, “Ese nakofuule, se manya endaalo eye lifwa liase tawe.
Nono banula bulwaani bwowo, situukhu sie buembo ne buyiingo oche mu lukoongo oaaye esaang'i wire,
mala wiche undeekhele siakhulia silayi nisio nasiima undeerere ndie nio khubiite chikhabi ne ekhafwa tawe.”
Nga Isaaka ne aboolelanga Esau, Rabeka aaba arekeeresie. Nio oli Esau arekukha acha mu lukoongo khuaaya chisaang'i,
Rabeka aboolela Yakobo ali, “Nama khuulila raraao aboolela wandaayo Esau ali,
‘Cha oaye esaang'i mala undeekhele siakhulia nisio nasiima, ndie, khubiite chikhabi mumoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ekhafwa tawe.’
Nono khwako, mwana wase, ndekeeresie mala okhole nga khulaka.
Cha mu munyele mala undeerere chimbusi chimeeme chibili ndekhele raraao siakhulia silayi nisio asiima.
Mala omuyilile alie, nio akhubiite chikhabi ne akhafwa tawe.”
Ne kakhali Yakobo aboolela maawe ali, “Wandaayase Esau ali omundu owe kamaswa ne ese ndi omumiuufu.
Wakana paapa akhola ario ambabaasia mala nabonekhana omubeeyi, mala nireerere silaamo, chilekhe khuba chikhabi tawe.”
Maawe amuboolela ali, “Mwana wase silaamo siowo sibe khwise, ne kakhali nenya orie likhuwa liase mala oche undeerere chimeeme.”
Nio acha achireerera maawe mala ang'oona siakhulia silayi nisio raraawe asiima.
Rabeka abukula chingubo cha Esau chindayi nicho aaba nacho munju mwewe mala achifwara Yakobo, omwana wewe omukeekhe.
Nio amufuuma bisieelo bie chimeeme khu makhono ne mwikosi mwewe.
Arusia siakhulia silayi ne kumukaati nikwo aaba ne ang'oonile mala aelesia omwana wewe Yakobo.
Nio Yakobo acha munju nimwo raraawe aaba mala alaanga ali, “Paapa!”
Akobosia ali, “Ee, ewe naanu mwana wase?”
Yakobo akobosia raraawe ali, “Ese ndi Esau omwana wowo omubele. Nakholile nga umbooleele. Nosiima yinyokha wikhale, olie enyama eye esaang'i niyo embaayile mala umbiite chikhabi.”
Ne kakhali Isaaka amureeba ali, “Mwana wase, okinyoolile khangu oriena?”
Amukobosia ali, “Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wowo ambelesie bukhili.”
Isaaka aloma Yakobo ali, “yiicha siimbi ano, khuabaasie, manye ng'ali ne oli omwana wase Esau namwe tawe.”
Yakobo eseenda siimbi niio Isaaka raraawe aaba, amuabaasia mala aloma ali, “Kumumilo kuli kwa Yakobo ne kamakhono kali ka Esau.”
Mala khumumanyilisia tawe, sikila kamakhono kewe kaba ne kamaswa nga ka wandaaye Esau, nio amubiita chikhabi.
Amureeba ali, “Ng'ali ewe oli omwana wase Esau?”
Amukobosia ali, “Ee, ese niye.”
Nio Isaaka amuboolela ali, “Ndeerere, ndie enyama niyo omwana wase aayile mala mubiite chikhabi.” Yakobo amureerera siakhulia mala alia, lundi amureerera endali anywa.
Nio raraawe amuboolela ali, “Mwana wase khowiche siimbi unjikwayile.”
Echa siimbi amukwayila. Isaaka aunyila kumuuya kwe chingubo chewe mala amubiita chikhabi ne aloma ali,
“Lola, khuunya khwo mwana wase,
khuli busa nga khuunya khwe kumukuunda,
nikwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiitile!
Wele akhoya akhua luume lwe mwikulu,
ne engakha eye khu liloba,
ne bikeswa bikali ne endali.
ne bibala bikhwinamile.
Ba omwami khu bawandaayo,
ne babaana ba maao bakhwinamile.
Alaamwe yesi yesi okhulaama,
ne abiitwe chikhabi buli mundu okhubiita chikhabi!”
Oli Isaaka amalile khubiita Yakobo, nga Yakobo arura busa ari ebweeni wa Isaaka raraawe, Esau aulukha khukhwama mu khuaya khwewe.
Yesi ateekha siakhulia silayi mala asireerera raraawe. Aboolela raraawe ali, “Nosiima paapa yinyokha olie khu nyama niyo omwana wowo aayile mala umbiite chikhabi.”
Isaaka raraawe amureeba ali, “Ewe naanu?”
Amukobosia ali, “Ese Esau omwana wowo omubele.”
Isaaka areenga lukali mala areeba ali, “Ne, naanu oayile esaang'i mala andeerera nalia ne okhecha ta mala namubiitile chikhabi? Ne alarama owe chikhabi.”
Nga Esau aulila kamakhuwa ka raraawe, alila lukali ne burafu ne aloma ali, “Paapa nosiima, mbiite aakhaba sesi!”
Isaaka aamuboolela ali, “Wandaayo echile aambea mala aabukuule ekhabi yowo.”
Isaaka aakobosia Esau ali, “Namukholile abe omwami khwiwe, lundi namuele bawandaaye bewe boosi babe bakholi bewe. Namuele bikeswa ne ndali. Nono ewe mwana wase khukholela siina?”
“Olamenya mu sibala siikhali sie ngakha tawe
se olanyoola luume lulwama mwikulu tawe.
ne olikholela wandaayo,
ne kakhali ne olimwaukhakho,
olifunaka lichooki liewe khukhwama khwikosi khwowo.”
Esau abiyila Yakobo sikila chikhabi nicho raraawe aaba ne abiitile Yakobo, mala Esau elomela ali, “Chindaalo che khulila paapa chilikho chimbiia mala khere Yakobo.”
Ne kakhali Rabeka aulila kamakhuwa ka Esau, omwana wewe omukhulu. Arumania alaanga Yakobo, omwana wewe omuro, mala amuboolela ali, “Wandaayo Esau alikho eoleelesia ne lilibaasia lie khukhwiira ewe.
Nono khwako, mwana wase, mbulile, yinyokha, wilukhile wa wandaayase Labani mu Harani.
Omenye naye khulwe siise khukhwola nga burafu ne
lirima lia wandaayo ne biliwa, mala ebilile niko wamukholeele. Nio ekharume omundu akhukobosie. Siina sikila efwiisie enywe mwembi endaalo ndala?”
Nono Rabeka aboolela Isaaka ali, “Naluiiliile ne limenya liase sikila bakhaana Bahiti ba mukha Esau. Kaaba bali Yakobo yesi acha khureera mulala khu bakhaana Bahiti, aba limenya liase lili na bulayi siina?”

Isaaka alaanga Yakobo mala amubiita chikhabi ne amulaka ali, “Okhayila mulala khu bakhaana Bakanaani tawe.
Yinyokha oche e Padani-aramu munju eya Betueli kukaao mala oyile omukhasi khukhwama ebweeneyo, mulala khu bakhaana ba Labani khochao, wandaaye owa maao.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi akhubiite chikhabi mala akhue babaana bakali lundi akhukuche mala obe paapa owe babaandu bakali.
Akhoya akhuua chikhabi nga cha Aburahamu, ewe ne lisaaye liowo nio obukule sibala nisio olimo omukwa nisio Wele aelesia Aburahamu!”
Isaaka aruma Yakobo ario, mala acha Padani-aramu owa Labani, okhwa Betueli Omuarameani, wandaaye owa Rabeka, maayi owa Yakobo ne Esau.
Esau amanya ali Isaaka aaba abiitile Yakobo chikhabi ne khumuruma e Padani-aramu ayileyo omukhasi. Lundi amanya ali amulaka ali, “Okhayila mulala khu bakhaana Bakanaani tawe.”
Yakobo aba ariire raraawe ne maawe mala acha e Padani-aramu.
Nio nga Esau ne abona ali bakhaana Bakanaani se basiimisia Isaaka tawe,
acha owa Ishimaeli okhwa Aburahamu, mala ayila omukhaana wewe lisina bali Mahalati, omukooko owa Nabaiothi.
Yakobo arura Beerisheba acha lubeka lwa Harani.
Ne ola abuundu nabulebe mala enyanga yakwa, akonao siilo esio. Abukula libaale abuundu ao, etikiya emurwe mala akona.
Aroora ali engaasi yemisiibwe khu sibala abuundu ao ne emurwe wayo yolile mwikulu, ne malaika ba Wele baba balikho baniinilakho ne khukhwikhilakho!
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba emile khu ngaaki, emurwe wayo mala aloma ali, “Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa paapa wowo Aburahamu lundi Wele owa Isaaka,” sibala nisio okonilekho sino, ndikhua ewe ne lisaaye liowo.
Lisaaye liowo lilaba likali nga lipukhuulu mala olibalaa khu sibala lubeka lwe mumbo, ebukwe, ebunaswa, ne siafubo. Khubirira mwiwe ne mu lisaaye liowo, chikholo choosi chilibiitwa chikhabi.
“Ese ndi ne nawe mala ndakhuliinda buli abuundu osi osi niio ocha, mala ndikhukobosia mu sibala sino sikila se ndikhulekha tawe, khukhwola nga ndikhola niko khuboolele kano.”
Nio Yakobo asisimukha khukhwama mu lilo liewe, mala aloma ali, “Ng'ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali abuundu ano, ne ese abeele se namanyilekho tawe!”
Mala aria lukali ne aloma ali, Abuundu ano ariisia lukali! Ano se ali abuundu aandi busa tawe ne kakhali ali enju eya Wele, mala ano sili silibwa sie mwikulu.
Nio Yakobo enyokha makhelebeende abukula libaale nilio aaba ne eetikiiye emurwe mala alisimikha nga enjeko mala achukha kamafura khungaaki khwalio.
Atiuukha abuundu ao ali Beteli (ne lisina lie lukoba lwe abuundu ao mu khunyoa liaba bali Lusi).
Yakobo echuba ne aloma ali, “Kaaba bali Wele alaba ne nase, mala alaniinda khu lukeendo nilwo ndikho nja luno ne alamba siakhulia ne chingubo,
mala noole munju eya paapa mu muleembe, aba nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaba Wele wase.
Libaale lino nilio simiikhe nga enjeko lilaba enju eya Wele. Ne khu bioosi nibio umba ndaamua sie ekhumi.”

Yakobo achiililila ne lukeendo lwewe, mala ola mu sibala sie babaandu be bukwe.
Nga alola, abona esebele mu lukoongo olwo, mala kiminyele kitaru kie kamakheese kiaba kiakonile andulo wayo. Kiminyele ekio kianywechanga mu sebele yino. Libaale libalaayi liaba emunwa we sebele.
Yabechanga oli kiminyele kioosi kiechile alala, ne babaayi bapiringisia libaale lirura emunwa we sebele, banyweesia kamakheese, oli bamala ne bakobosia libaale emunwa we sebele.
Yakobo areeba babaayi ali, “Bawandaayase, enywe mwama waena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Efwe khwama Harani.”
Abareeba ali, “Mumanyile Labani okhwa Naori?” Bamukobosia bali, “Yee, khumumanyile.”
Abareeba ali, “Ali omulamu?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Ali omulamu, ne lola, omukhaana wewe Raeli niye olikho wicha ne kamakheese oyo!”
Yakobo aloma ali, “Enje esiili kumuusi busa ne siise sikhola nisio bibiaayo bibusilamo alala tawe. Nywesia kamakheese mala muche mukaaye?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Se khunyala khwakhola khurio tawe, khukhwola nga kiminyele kioosi kiebuusie alala, mala khupiringisie libaale ne khunywesia kamakheese.”
Nga aba asilomaloma Raeli ola ne kamakheese ka raraawe, sikila aaba omwaayi wako.
Nga Yakobo abona Raeli, omukhaana owa khocha wewe Labani, ne kamakheese, Yakobo acha apiringisia libaale lirure emunwa we esebele, mala anyweesia kumunyele kwa khochaawe Labani.
Nio Yakobo ekwayila Raeli, mala alila lukali mu busangaafu.
Yakobo aboolela Raeli ali, “Ndi omulebe owa paapa wowo, omwana owa Rabeka.”
Raeli atima acha khuboolela raraawe.
Nga Labani aulila kamakhuwa ko mwiwana wewe, atima aacha amwakaanana mala amukwakho amwekhoyela mala amureera munju mwewe. Yakobo aboolela Labani buli sisiindu,
Mala Labani amuboolela ali, “Yee, ng'ali ewe oli sikuumba siase ne, kamafuki kase.” Yakobo amenya naye kumwesi mulala.
Labani aboolela Yakobo ali, “Ukholele busa bali sikila oli omulebe wase ku? Mboolele. Kumuruungo kwowo kulaba siina?”
Nono Labani aaba ne bakhaana babili, lisina lio omukhulu bali Lea ne omuro bali Raeli.
Lea aaba ne chimoni chindekhele ne kakhali Raeli aaba omukhaana owe lukoondo lulayi lundi osiimisia.
Yakobo asiima Raeli mala aloma ali, “Ndakhukholela kimiiko saba nio mbile Raeli.”
Labani amukobosia ali, “Buli bulayi khue ewe khukhila ne mba omundu okundi. Menya ne nase.”
Yakobo akhola kimiiko saba khulwe khuyila Raeli. Khu niye siise siabonekha sie chindaalo ngekhe busa chiri, sikila busiime nibwo aaba nabwo khu Raeli.
Nio Yakobo aboolela Labani ali, “Namalile siise siase, mbe omukhasi wase mala mbe naye.”
Nio Labani abuusia babaandu be abwenao boosi alala mala abakholela naikara eye siselelo.
Ne kakhali ekolooba ao, Labani abukula omukhaana wewe Lea mala amuyilila Yakobo, Yakobo aaba naye.
(Labani abukula omukhaana, nasioobi wewe bali Silipa aelesia Lea ache amukholelenge.)
Ne nga bwasia, Yakobo amanya ali, Lea niye. Areeba Labani ali, “Siina nisio ukholeele sino? Se nakhukholeele sikila Raeli ta ku? Siina sikila nono ne umbea?”
Labani amukobosia ali, se khukholanga khurio mu sibala siefwe tawe. Omukhaana omuro se achichanga munju, omukhulu ne asiili tawe.
Liinda lichuuma lie kumuyimo kwe khukhwana kwa yuno liwe, mala khulakhua okundi yesi, khulwe kumuruungo kwe bukholi bwe kimiiko kikiindi saba.
Yakobo akhola ario. Amala lichuuma lie kumuyimo kwe khukhwana ne Lea, nio Labani amua omukhaana wewe Raeli abe omukhasi wewe.
(Labani aelesia Raeli omukhaana wewe omukholi bali Biliia nga omukholi wewe.)
Nio Yakobo aba ne Raeli yesi mala amusiima lukali khukhila Lea. Yakobo akholela Labani kimiiko kikiindi saba.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona ali Lea aaba nabulobe, amwikula enda, ne Raeli aba omukuumba.
Lea aesia mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli amutiuukha ali, Rubeni
Aesia lundi mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli, aloma ali, “Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila ali nabiilwa, ambeele omwana owe sisoleeli yuno lundi,” ne amutiuukha ali, Simioni
Lundi aesia asaala omwana owe sisoleeli mala aloma ali, “Luno omuseecha wase alaambana ne nase, sikila namusaaliile basoleeli bataru,” khwako lisina liewe lialaangwa bali Lawi.
Ne aesia lundi mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli mala aloma ali, “Siise sino ndafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,” khwako amutiuukha lisina ali, Yuda,

Nga Raeli ne abona ali se asaalila Yakobo omwana tawe, abubila wandaaye mala aboolela Yakobo ali, “Mbe babaana, namwe ese ndafwa!”
Yakobo akhalalila Raeli mala aloma ali, “Ese ndi mu bubweyaangu bwa Wele owakhukhiingilila khusaala babaana?”
Raeli amuboolela ali, “Nasioobi wase Biliia ali ano mubukule mala okone naye, asaalile, nio nyoole babaana khubirira mu niye.”
Nio amua Bilia abe nga omukhasi wewe mala Yakobo akona ne Biliia.
Biliia aesia mala asaalila Yakobo omwana owe sisoleeli.
Ne Raeli aloma ali, “Wele akhalakile bulayi, lundi aulile lisaba liase mala ambeele omwana owe sisoleeli.” Khwako amutiuukha lisina ali Dani
Biliia, omukholi owa Raeli, aesia lundi mala asaalila Yakobo omwana owe sisoleeli okhola khabili.
Raeli aloma ali, “Narekaane chimbasi burafu ne wandaayase mala nauliile”, nio amutiuukha lisina ali Nafutali
Nga Lea amanya ali ayakama khusaala babaana, abukula Silipa, omukholi wewe, amua Yakobo nga omukhasi wewe.
Silipa asaalila Yakobo omwana owe sisoleeli.
Mala Lea aloma ali, “Ekhabi endayi.” Nio amutiuukha lisina ali Kati
Silipa asaalila Yakobo omwana okhola khabili.
Mala Lea aloma ali, “Ndi ne busangaafu sikila bakhasi baliindanga bali musangaafu,” nio amutiuukha lisina ali Asieri
Mu ndaalo che khukesa engaanu Rubeni acha emukuunda anyoolayo chimbuunwe mala achireerera Lea maayi wewe. Raeli asaba Lea ali, “Nosiima mbeekho chimbuunwe
Lea aamureeba ali, “Okhanyalikha ne khukhumbukula omuseecha tawe? Luno wenya khubukula aakhaba chimbuunwe cho mwana wase chosi?”
Raeli aaloma ali, “Silo sia luno kane abe ne nawe khulwe chimbuunwe cho omwana wowo.”
Oli ekolooba, Yakobo akobola khukhwama emukuunda, Lea arura acha amwakaanila mala amuboolela ali, “Luno ocha khukona mu mwase sikila nakhukulile khulwe chimbuunwe cho omwana wase.” Nio siilo aaba ne Lea.
Wele aulila lisaba lia Lea mala aesia, asaalila Yakobo omwana owe sisoleeli okhola kharaano.
Lea aloma ali, “Wele ambeele kumuruuru kwase, sikila naelesia omuseecha wase omukholi wase.” Nio amutiuukha lisina ali Isakari
Lea aesia lundi, mala asaalila Yakobo omwana owe sisoleeli okhola sita.
Lea aloma ali, “Wele ambeele siaanwa silayi. Luno omuseecha wase alangoosia, sikila namusaaliile babaana be sisoleeli sita” Nio amutiuukha lisina ali Sebuluni
Enyuma wa kano Lea asaala omwana owe siikhaana mala amutiuukha ali Tina.
Wele akhebulila Raeli, mala auulila lisaba liewe, amwikula enda.
Aesia mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli. Aloma ali, “Wele andusiisiekho chisoni chase”
Amutiuukha lisina ali Yosefu
Oli Raeli asaalile Yosefu, Yakobo aboolela Labani ali, “Ndekhuule nje, ngobole engo mu sibala siase.
Mbe bakhasi base ne babaana base nibo nanyoola khulwe khukhukholela ewe, mala undekhe nje, sikila ewe omanyile bukholi nibwo nakhukholeele.”
Ne Labani amukobosia ali, “Waaba ne ufukiilila, ndaloma ndi, namanyile khubirira mu bulakusi bwase ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambiitile ese chikhabi sikila ewe.
Boola kumuruungo kwowo, mala ndakhua.”
Yakobo amukobosia ali, “Ewe wamwene omanyile nga nakhukholeele, lundi nga chikhaafu chowo ne chakuchile mu bwaayi bwase.
Ese ne ekhecha tawe, waba nacho ngekhe busa chiri, ne luno chakuchile lukali. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubiitile ewe chikhabi buli abuundu niio ese nacha
Labani amureeba ali, “Khuruunge siina?”
Yakobo amukobosia ali, “Se nenya kumuruungo kwosi kwosi tawe. Waaba ne ukholela nga nja khuloma, aba nja khukhwayila kamatuuli kowo lundi.
Ndekhe mbire mwituuli liowo endaalo yino ndusiemo buli likheese ling'enda nende lie kamapala nende buli limeeme limali,
Nio mu ndaalo chichiicha bubwiyikinwa bwase bubweene bulibonekha, nga ne oliicha khukhunduunga. Ne olinyoola embusi ekhali eng'enda namwe eye kamapala tawe namwe limeeme liosi liosi likhali limali tawe, lilibalikha nga lie bubwifwi.
Labani akobosia ali, “Bulayi! Lekha kabe nga ne olomile.”
Ne endaalo eyo Labani arusia mu munyele chindurume ching'enda nende che kamapala ne bisoonga bing'enda nende bie kamapala. Buli eyabakho lipala liwaanga ne buli limeeme limali, mala arakho babaana bewe basoleeli khubiliinda,
mala abiaula khukhwama khu nibio niye ali nabio biaba nga lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru khukhwama ao. Mala Yakobo aya kumunyele kukwarama.
Yakobo abukula chisaala chindeeyi che kumwilima kumubisi, ne alumondi lwe kumwarakuumba achoobula kamoola akhola kimitiindi kimiwaanga kibonekhele mu sakia ng'ene echo.
Abukula chisakia nicho aaba ne obuule, mala achira amafubukho niio bibiaayo biechanga ne binywelao kameechi. Ne nga bibiaayo bielukhanga ne bichile khunywa,
kiminyele kielukhila ebweeni we chisakia echo, nio kiasaala chimelamela, ching'enda nende che kamapala.
Yakobo aula kamameeme mala akobosia ematuuli ke chinjululusi ne kamamali koosi mu lituuli lia Labani. Mala aula lituuli liewe aliira alubeka, se alitubasia ne lia Labani tawe.
Ne nga bibiaayo binefu bie mu lituuli bielukha, Yakobo abukula lusaala olwo arura mu mafubukho ebweeni we lituuli.
Ne ebiaayo bing'au mu lituuli se arechangayo lusaala chana tawe, mala bing'au biaba bia Labani, ne binefu bia Yakobo.
Mungila yino Yakobo aaba omuiinda lukali. Aaba ne kamatuuli kamakali ne nasioobi be siikhasi nende be siseecha bakali, ne chingamia ne chipunda.

Yakobo aulila ali ba okhwa Labani baaba baloma bali, “Yakobo abukule bia paapa bioosi, ne khukhwama khu bia paapa anyooleelekho kimiaandu kino kioosi.”
Lundi Yakobo abona ali Labani se alamulolanga bulayi nga ne aaba mu khurakikha tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yakobo ali, “Kobola mu sibala sie bapaapa bowo ne balebe bowo, mala ndaba ne nawe.”
Yakobo arumania mala alaanga Raeli ne Lea mu lukoongo nimwo kiminyele kiewe kiaba.
Ababoolela ali, “Naboone ndi paapa wenywe se alandolanga bulayi nga mu khurakikha tawe. Ne kakhali Wele owa paapa wase abeele ne nase.
Enywe mumanyile muli nakholela paapa wenywe ne kamaani kase koosi.
Ne paapa wenywe ambeyile ne khukaluukhasia kumuruungo kwase kamakhabi ekhumi, ne kakhali Wele se amuelesia kumunwa khukhumbumisia tawe.
Kaaba bali aaloma ali, ‘bibiaayo bie kamapala bilaba kumuruungo kwowo,’ kumunyele kwosi kwasaala bie kamapala. Ne aloma ali, ‘Bibiaayo bie chinjululusi bilaba kumuruungo kwowo,’ kumunyele kwosi kwasaala bie chinjululusi.
Mungila yino Wele abukula bibiaayo bia paapa wenywe mala amba ese.
“Mu ndaalo nicho kumunyele kwelukhilamo nabona mu marooro chindurume chichaoona kiminyele chaba ching'enda, che kamapala ne chimelamela.
Nio malaika owa Wele anaanga mu marooro ali, ‘Yakobo’, mala nakobosia ndi, ‘Yee!’
Mala aloma ali, ‘Suta chimoni mala obone, chindurume choosi chilikho ne chioona kiminyele chili ching'enda, che kamapala, ne chimelamela, sikila naboone koosi niko Labani alakhukholelanga.
Ese ndi Wele owa Beteli, niio wachukha kamafura khu njeko mala wanjichubila. Nono yinyokha, orure mu sibala sino okobole mu sibala nisio wasaalwamo.’ ”
Nio Raeli ne Lea bakobosia Yakobo bali, “Sisiindu siosi siosi namwe kumukabwa kwaramiile khwifwe mu nju eya paapa ku?
Se akhubalaanga efwe nga baakwa busa? Sikila akhukusia, mala aarumikhira chirupia nicho bamua khwifwe.
Kimiaandu kiosi nikio Wele abukula paapa wefwe kili kikiefwe ne babaana befwe, nono, khola niko Wele akhubooleele.”
Nio Yakobo enyokha, mala aniinia babaana bewe ne bakhasi bewe khu ngamia,
mala aloonda bibiaayo biewe bioosi ne buli siindu nisio anyoola mu sibala sia Padani-aramu. Arekukha akobole mu sibala sia Kanaani khu raraawe Isaaka.
Labani aaba achiile khukhala bufuumbo bwe kamakheese kewe, mala Raeli eba bifwaani bie bawele be munju mwa raraawe.
Yakobo abacha Labani Omusiami sikila se amuboolelakho ali, enya khukhwilukha tawe.
Elukha ne bibiindu bioosi nibio aaba nabio, akhola khangu ambukha luluuchi lwa Efurati mala acha e sibala sie bikulu sia Kileati.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru Labani aboolelwa ali Yakobo elukhe.
Abukula balebe bewe mala amutimakho khulwe chindaalo saba, amuloondakho enyuma khukhwola nga amunyoolela mu bikulu bia Kileati.
Ne kakhali Wele echa khu Labani Omusiami, mu marooro, mu siilo, mala amuboolela ali, “Yiyaya okhakhola orio waloma Yakobo likhuwa lilayi namwe libi tawe.”
Labani ola khu Yakobo. Yakobo aaba asimiikhe liiema liewe mu sibala sie bikulu, ne Labani ne balebe bewe bombakha mu sibala sie bikulu sia Kileati.
Labani aboolela Yakobo ali, “Siina nisio ukholeele, wambeyile, mala wabukula bakhaana base nga baambe be mwiie?
Siina sikila ne wilukha mu bwikisi, ne umbea, mala se umboolela tawe, andi nakhulekhuulile ne liliekhoya ne kimienya kie chitamburini ne kamatuungu?
Ne siina sikila ne okhandekhile nekwayila babechukhulu base ne babaana base nio? Nono wakholile ke busilu.
Ndi ne bunyali khu khukholakho libi. Ne kakhali Wele owa raraao alomalome khwise siilo ali, ‘Yiyaya okhakhola orio waloma Yakobo likhuwa libi namwe lilayi tawe.’
Nono warekuukhe sikila wekoombile lukali enju eya raraao. Ne siina sikila ne webile bifwaani bie bawele base?”
Yakobo akobosia Labani ali, “Sikila naba ne buuri, ndi onyala wanuula bakhaana bowo.
Yesi yesi niye olanyoola ne ali ne bifwaani bie bawele bowo, aleerwa. Ebweeni we balebe befwe yekesia nisio ese ndi nasio sili sisiowo mala osibukule.” Ne Yakobo se amanya ali Raeli aaba ebile bifwaani bie bawele ba Labani tawe.
Nio Labani engila mu liiema lia Yakobo ne mu liiema lia Lea, ne mumaeema ka nasioobi babili, ne se abinyoolamo tawe. Arura mu liiema lia Lea mala engila mu lia Raeli.
Raeli aaba abukule bifwaani bie bawele be munju mwa raraawe abireere mu masisinwe ke engamia mala abiikhalekho. Labani apula mu liiema mwoosi, mala khubinyoola tawe.
Raeli aboolela raraawe ali, “omwami okhaambwa lirima, sikila se enyala nakhwinyokhela tawe, ndi mu ndaalo chase chimbi.” Nio apula mala khunyoola bifwaani bie bawele be munju mwewe tawe.
Nio Yakobo naye aambwa lirima mala akhalalila Labani. Yakobo amureeba ali, “Bubi bwase buli siina? Bubwonaki bwase buli siina bukilile wandimakakho?
Wakhaba ne opulile mu biindu biase bioosi, wanyoolilemo siina khu bioosi bie munju mwowo? Sire ebweeni we balebe base ne babowo, mala bakhalake akari wowo ne nase.
Kimiiko kamakhumi kabili nikio nabele ne nawe, kamakheese kowo ne chimbusi se chauusiakho tawe, ne se naliakho kamamiiku ke muminyele kiowo tawe.
Sisiaayo nisio esolo yeera, se nakhurereranga tawe samwene nakhuruunganga. Wandeebanga khuruunge siakhaba ne siebwa kumuusi namwe siilo.
Naba ndio, kumuumu kwanjosia kumuusi, ne siilo embeo yambwelakho mala liilo liimbwa.
Kimiiko kamakhumi kabili kano naba munju yowo. Nakhukholela kimiiko ekhumi na kine khulwe khuyila bakhaana bowo babili ne kimiiko sita khulwe kumuruungo kwe lituuli liowo. Mala wakaluukhasia kumuruungo kwase khukhwola ekhumi.
Abanga bali Wele owa paapa wase, Wele owa Aburahamu ne buuri bwa Isaaka khu Wele, se bwabeele lubeka lwase tawe, ng'ali ewe andi umboonile busa makhono mataaka. Ne Wele abone kumunaanio kwase ne kimilimo kiase mala siilo sia luno ekhurafwiriire.”
Labani akobosia Yakobo ne aloma ali, “Bakhaana bali bakhaana base ne babaana bali babaana base, ne kiminyele kili kiminyele kiase, ne bioosi nibio obona bino bili bibiase. Ne kakhali endaalo yino nyala nakhola siina khu bakhaana base bano namwe khu baana babwe nibo basaala?
Yiicha, ese ne nawe khukhole endakaano mala ebe buloli akari wowo ne nase.”
Nio Yakobo abukula libaale mala alisimikha nga enjeko.
Mala aboolela balebe bewe ali, “Buusia kamabaale.” Babuusia kumweeka kumuboofu kwe kamabaale mala balia siakhulia amweeka ao.
Labani atiuukhao lisina ali, Yakari-saatuta
Labani aboolela Yakobo ali, “Kumweeka kwe kamabaale kuno kuli buloli akari wowo ne nase endaalo eya luno.” Khwako akutiuukha ali Kaleeti
ne enjeko akilaanga ali Misipa
Waaba ne upia siibi bakhaana base namwe waaba ne oyila bakhasi babaandi otube khu bakhaana base, aakhaba bali omundu se ali ne nafwe tawe, khebulila oli Wele ali omuloli akari wowo ne nase.”
Labani atasakho ali, “Lola kumweeka kwe kamabaale ne enjeko nibio simiikhe akari wowo ne nase.
Kumweeka kuno ne enjeko yino bili buloli: ese se endibira kumweeka niche khwiwe khurangane tawe, ne ewe wesi se olibira kumweeka kuno ne njeko yino wiche khwise undangane tawe.
Wele owa Aburahamu ne Wele owa Naori Wele owe bapaapa babwe, abe omukhalaki akari wefwe.” Nio Yakobo echuba ne Buuri bwa raraawe Isaaka.
Ne Yakobo aana embosio khu sikulu, mala alaanga balebe bewe balie siakhulia. Balia mala bekhala khu sikulu siilo sioosi.
Oli bwasia, makhelebeende, endaalo eloondakho, Labani enyokha, ekwayila babechukhulu ne bakhaana bewe, ababiita chikhabi, mala arekukha akobola engo.

Nga Yakobo aba ne achiililila ne lukeendo lwewe, malaika ba Wele bamwakaanana.
Ne nga ababona aloma ali, “Abano bali banamae ba Wele!” Nio atiuukha abuundu ao lisina ali Mahanaimu
Yakobo aruma barumwa ebweeni wewe khu Esau wandaaye, e Seiri, mu sibala sia Edomu.
Abalaka ali, “Mulaboolela omwami wase Esau muli: Omukholi wowo Yakobo aloma ali, ‘Nacha wa Labani mala namenyayo khukhwola luno.
Ndi ne chikhaafu, chipunda, kiminyele, nasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi. Narumanie khu mwami wase nio nyoole kumwalaalo ebweeni wowo.’ ”
Barumwa nga bakobola khu Yakobo baloma bali, “Khwolile khu wandaayo Esau mala alikho echa ne babaandu chimia chine khukhwakaanana ewe.”
Nio Yakobo aria lukali ne khukhwiembeelela. Akabamo babaandu ba baba ne naye, ne kiminyele ne kamatuuli ne chingamia, mu bipupu bibili.
Ebaasia ali, “Esau aba ne ebwaakala sipupu silala, siramire sinyala sielukha.”
Yakobo asaba ali, “Ee, Wele owa kuuka Aburahamu ne Wele owa paapa wase Isaaka, Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wamboolela oli, ‘Kobola mu sibala siowo ne khu balebe bowo, mala ndakhukholela kamalayi.’
Se nolaana ne butiiti khu busiime bwowo bwa busiele ne bubweyikinwa nibwo wekeesie khu mukholi wowo tawe. Ese nambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani luno ne esiimbo yase yong'ene, ne luno ndi ne bipupu bibili.
Mbonie khukhwama mu mukhono kwa wandaayase Esau, sikila namuriire. Akhakhola ario echa akhwiira fweesi, bamaayi ne babaana babwe tawe.
Ewe wamboolela oli, ‘Khakhukholele kamalayi mala khole lisaaye liowo libe likali nga kumuyekhe kukhabalikha tawe’ ”
Yakobo akona abwenao siilo esio. Abukula khu nibio aba nabio mala abiaana nga siaanwa khu wandaaye Esau,
chimbusi chikhasi chimia chibili ne chindurume kamakhumi kabili, kamakheese kamakhasi chimia chibili ne kamamiiku kamakhumi kabili,
chingamia kamakhumi kataru che chimoosi, chikhaafu chikhasi kamakhumi kane ne chiuunwa ekhumi, chipunda chikhasi kamakhumi kabili ne chiuunwa ekhumi.
Akabamo bibiaayo bino mu matuuli mala buli lituuli liaba liong'ene ne omwaayi walio. Aboolela bakholi ali, “Rangira ebweeni wase mala mulekhe bubweyaangu akari khukhwama khu lituuli khukhwola khu liindi.”
Alaka owe bweeni ali, “Nga wandaayase Esau ne akhwakaanana, mala akhureebe ali, ‘Ewe owa naanu ne olikho ocha waena? Ne bibiaayo biili ebweeni wowo bino, bia naanu?’
Loma oli, ‘Bili bio omukholi wowo Yakobo, mala bili siaanwa khu mwami wase Esau, ne Yakobo alikho echa enyuma wefwe eyi.’ ”
Alaka ario aakhaba owa khabili nende owa khataru ne babaandi boosi babaloonda khu matuuli ali, “Kane muboolele Esau murio, ne mwakaanana naye.
Lundi mumuboolele muli, ‘Ne alala ne kameenako omukholi owowo Yakobo ali enyuma wefwe eyi.’ ” Ebaasia ali, “Wakana khola ndio namuoosia kumwoyo ne siaanwa sirangiire ebweeni wase mala enyuma wako samwene mubone moni na moni. Wakana anyala afukiilila ese.”
Nio siaanwa siarangira ebweeni wa Yakobo ne niye omwene siilo esio akona mu lukoba.
Mu siilo esio ne sisiene Yakobo enyokha abukula bakhasi bewe babili, nasioobi bewe babili ne babaana bewe ekhumi na mulala mala ambukha lifubukho lia Yaboki.
Abambusia luluuchi ne buli sisiindu nisio aba nasio.
Niye omwene arama enyuma yeng'ene, mala omundu amurekania khukhwola nga enje ne bwasia.
Nga omundu oyo ne abona ali se akhayile Yakobo tawe, amutiila khu ndeelwa, mala endelwa eya Yakobo yamutekukha ne ali mukhurekana naye.
Mala omundu oyo aboolela Yakobo ali, “Ndekhuule nje sikila bulikho busia.”
Ne kakhali Yakobo amuboolela ali, “Se ndakhulekhuula oche ne okhambiitile chikhabi tawe.”
Areeba Yakobo ali, “Lisina liowo bali naanu?” Mala amukobosia ali, “Yakobo.”
Amukobosia ali, “Siina sikila ne undeeba lisina liase?” Mala abwenao abiita Yakobo chikhabi.
Nio Yakobo atiuukha abuundu ao lisina ali Penieli
Enyanga yasoa Yakobo ne alikho arekukha a Penieli ne ayikila sikila endeelwa yatekukha.
Khwako, khukhwola endaalo eya luno lisaaye lia Isiraeli se lilichanga enyama eye ndeelwa tawe. Sikila amutiila khu ndeelwa.

Yakobo alola, abona Esau alikho echa ne babaandu chimia chine. Nio aukhasiamo babaana ba Lea, Raeli nende be bakholi babwe babili.
Ara nasioobi ne babaana babwe ebweeni, Lea ne babaana bewe baloondakho, ne Raeli ne Yosefu baba bamaliilisi khu boosi.
Niye omwene arangira ebweeni wabwe mala enama asi khukhwola saba nabwila nga ne embiya khu wandaaye.
Ne kakhali Esau atima khumwakaanila, amukwa mwikosi amwikwayila mala boombi balila.
Ne nga Esau abona bakhasi ne babaana, areeba ali, “Naanu bali ne nawe bano?”
Yakobo akobosia ali, “Babaana nibo Wele mu mwalaalo kwewe aelesia omukholi wowo.”
Nasioobi ne babaana babwe becha siimbi mala benama ebweeni wa Esau.
Lea yesi ne babaana bewe becha mala benama. Ne ekhumaliilikha Yosefu ne Raeli becha siimbi, benama asi.
Esau areeba ali, “Ne bipupu bibiindi nibio nakaanane bili ne sifuno sina?”
Yakobo akobosia ali, “Bie khunyoola kumwalaalo mumoni mwo omwami wase.”
Esau akobosia ali, “Wandaayase, ndi ne bibinjola. Ba busa nende nibio oli nabio.”
Yakobo aloma ali, “Tawe, khusaba, naaba ne nyoolile kumwalaalo mumoni chowo, fukiilila siaanwa siase, sikila khubona bubweeni bwowo khuli nga khubona bubweeni bwa Wele, ne kumwalaalo nikwo unjakaanilemo kuno.
Khusaba ofukiilile siaanwa siase nisio khurereere sikila Wele ayikholela ke kumwalaalo mala ndi nabio bibinjola.” Yakobo amwikoonjelela, abukula.
Nio Esau aloma ali, “Lekha khuchiililile ne lukeendo lwefwe, mala ese ndarangira.”
Ne kakhali Yakobo amukobosia ali, “omwami wase, omanyile oli babaana bali batekhele, ne bibiaayo binuunia bienya buliindi bwase, bialoondwa khangu khangu khulwe ndaalo ndala, binyala biafwa bioosi.
Nosiima omwami rangira, omukholi wowo alakhuloondakho kalaa khuloondekhana ne likeenda lie bibiaayo ne lie babaana, nabwila nga nola wo mwami wase mu Seiri.”
Nio Esau amukobosia ali, “Lekha ese khulekhele balala khu baandu nibo ndi nabo.”
Ne Yakobo akobosia ali, “Mbaao sifuno tawe. Nosiima lekha nyoole
Nio Esau ayuukha endaalo ng'eneyo akobola e Seiri.
Ne kakhali Yakobo akeenda acha e Sukoti, mala ombakha enju yewe ne kamataala ke bibiaayo biewe, khwako lisina lia abuundu ao lialaangwa bali Sukoti
Khukhwama Padani-aramu, Yakobo ola mu muleembe mu lukoba lwa Shekemu, luuli mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala ombakha ekambi siimbi ne lukoba.
Akula kamaloba khukhwama khu ba okhwa Hamori, raraawe owa Shekemu, khu bitonyi emia ndala bie efwesa.
Abwenao ombakha alutare mala akitiuukha ali, El elohe Isiraeli (Wele owa Isiraeli).

Endaalo ndala, Tina, omukhaana niye Lea asaalila Yakobo, arura acha khukeniia bakhaana be mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Ne nga Shekemu, okhwa Hamori Omuhiti, omwana owe bubwami bwe mu sibala esio, amubona, amukwakho ne kamaani mala akona ne naye amufwolobia.
Kumwoyo kwewe kwaba khu Tina, omukhaana owa Yakobo. Amusiima, mala amulomalomakho bulayi
Nio Shekemu aboolela raraawe Hamori, ali, “Mbukulile omukhaana yuno abe omukhasi wase.”
Yakobo aulila ali Shekemu aba afwolobie Tina omukhaana wewe. Basoleeli bewe baba basamuusie chikhaafu mu lukoongo. Nio Yakobo asila busa nabwila baloota.
Hamori, raraawe owa Shekemu arura acha alomaloma ne Yakobo.
Nga ba okhwa Yakobo baloota khukhwama mu lukoongo, bakaulila. Mala babiililwa ne khuambwa lirima lukali, sikila Shekemu areera ekifocholi mu Isiraeli khulwe khukona ne omukhaana owa Yakobo. Sisiindu nga esio sirio se sienyekhana khukholwa tawe.
Hamori alomaloma nabo ali, “kumwoyo kwo omusoleeli wase kwasiimile omukhaana wenywe. Musaba mufukiilile bayilane.
Khuuliilisiane khukhwaane. Khuelesie bakhaana benywe khukhwe, ne enywe mukhwe babefwe.
Mulamenya ne nafwe ne sibala sili nga sisienywe, mumenye ne khukhola bubwofuli, mala munyoolemo kimiaandu.”
Lundi Shekemu yesi aboolela raraawe owa Tina ne bawandaaye ali, “Kholele kumwalaalo kuno, mala ndamuua siosi siosi nisio mwenya.
Reeba bukhwe ne biaanwa biakhaba bie angaaki mala ndamuua khuloondekhana nga muloma. Ne kakhali musaaya mumbe omukhaana abe omukhasi wase.”
Ba okhwa Yakobo babea Shekemu ne raraawe Hamori, sikila aba afwolobie omukooko wabwe Tina.
Babaloma bali, “Se khunyala khukhola likhuwa lino tawe. Lili lie chisoni khwifwe khua omusiinde omukhaana wefwe.
Khunyala khwauliilisiana nanywe khu likhuwa lilala lino liong'ene: khuli enywe mulaba nga efwe khulwe khukheba buli yesi yesi owe siseecha.
Nio khumue bakhaana befwe muyile babe bakhasi benywe ne fwesi khuyile bakhaana benywe babe bakhasi befwe ne khulamenya ne nanywe mala khulaba siindu silala.
Ne mwaba baali se mufukiilila likhuwa liefwe mala mwakhebwa tawe aba khulabukula omukooko wefwe mala khurekukhe.”
Kamakhuwa kabwe kasiimisia Hamori no musaani wewe Shekemu.
Ne Shekemu se alindiilila khukhola nisio baloma tawe, sikila omukhaana owa Yakobo amusiimisia lukali. Shekemu aba owakoosibwa lukali mu luuya lwabwe.
Nio Hamori no musaani wewe, Shekemu, bacha a silibwa sie lukoba, mala balomaloma khu baandu be siseecha be mu lukoba lwabwe, baboola bali,
“Babaandu bano bali basaale befwe. Khe bamenye mu sibala mala bakholemo bubwofuli, sikila lola sibala sili sibalaayi siboola bulayi. Khe khuyile bakhaana babwe babe bakhasi befwe, ne fwesi khubae bakhaana befwe bayile babe bakhasi babwe.
Khu likhuwa lino liong'ene babaandu bano balafukiilila khumenya nafwe khube siindu silala: bali buli yesi yesi owe siseecha mwifwe akhebwe nga nibo.
Chikhaafu chabwe, kimiaandu kiabwe ne bibiaayo biabwe bioosi se bilaba bibiefwe ta ku? Lekha efwe khuuliilisiane busa ne nabo mala balamenya ne nafwe.”
Ne babaandu be lukoba olwo boosi bafukiilila kamakhuwa ka Hamori no musaani wewe, mala buli owe siseecha owacha mu silibwa sie lukoba akhebwa.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, oli babiimbile, ba okhwa Yakobo, Simioni ne Lawi, bawandaaye ba Tina, babukula chimbalu chabwe mala bengila mu lukoba olwo babaandu ne bakhamanya tawe mala beera be siseecha boosi.
Beera Hamori no musaani wewe Shekemu, babukula Tina khukhwama munju eya Shekemu barekukha ne naye.
Ba okhwa Yakobo bayaaya bibiindu enyuma we khukhwira babaandu sikila omukooko wabwe aaba afwolobisiibwe.
Babukula kiminyele ne kamatuuli kabwe chipunda ne buli sisiindu siosi siosi sisiaba mu lukoba ne mu lukoongo.
Babukula kimiaandu kiabwe kioosi ne bakhasi babwe ne babaana, ne buli sisiindu sisiaba mu chinju.
Yakobo aboolela Simioni ne Lawi ali, “Mwandereere sibi, luno Bakanaani ne Baperisi ne buli mundu owe mu sibala sino alambiila. Babaandu base bali batiiti, ne baaba bali bebuusia alala banjibwaakala nderwa alala ne be nju yase yoosi.”
Ne kakhali Simioni ne Lawi baloma bali, “Khumulekhe akhole omukooko wefwe khuuba omutaamba?”

Nio Yakobo aboolela be munju mwewe ne naabo ba baba ne naye boosi ali, “Mwaata bifwaani bie bawele bakeni boosi nibio muli nabio mwikwalaasie mala mufware chingubo chimiiliu.
Mala khwinyokhe khuche e Beteli, nio nombakheyo alutare khu Wele owanjeeta mu ndaalo eye sibi siase, lundi owabeele ne nase buli abuundu osi osi niio nacha.”
Nio baelesia Yakobo bifwaani bie bawele bakeni bioosi nibio baba nabio, ne chimbete chichaba khu maru khwabwe, mala Yakobo abisiikha asi we kumurongooro kukwaba siimbi e Shekemu.
Mala nga Yakobo ne babaana bewe bachiililila ne lukeendo, Wele akhola babaandu be chingoba chichaba siimbi baaba ne buuri bukali bwaakila khutima khu ba okhwa Yakobo tawe.
Yakobo ne babaandu bewe boosi boola Lusi, (Lukoba lulwamanyikhana nga Beteli) luli mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Abwenao ombakhao alutare mala atiuukhao ali “El-Beteli,” sikila Wele amubonekhela abwenao nga ne aba ne elukha khukhwama khu wandaaye.
Debora, omulesi owa Rabeka afwa mala asiikhwa asi we kumurongooro amwalo owa Beteli. Nio lisina liao lialaangwa bali Aloni-bakuti (kumurongooro kwe khulila).
Nga Yakobo ne ama e Padani-aramu, Wele amubonekhela lundi mala amubiita chikhabi.
Wele amuboolela ali, “Lisina liowo lili Yakobo, ne khukhwama luno se lilaba Yakobo tawe ne kakhali lilaba Isiraeli.” Nio Wele amutiuukha lisina ali Isiraeli.
Wele achiililila khumuboolela ali, “Ese ndi Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi. Saala babaana bakali mala okuche, ekholo ne bipupu bie chikholo biliama mwiwe ne babaami baliama mu lisaaye liowo.
Ndakhua ewe sibala nisio naelesia Aburahamu ne Isaaka, mala ndiaa lisaaye liowo enyuma wowo.”
Nio Wele arekukha khukhwama abuundu niio alomaloma ne naye.
Yakobo asimikha enjeko eye kamabale abuundu niio Wele alomalomelao ne naye ao mala achukhakho siaanwa sie endali ne kamafura.
Nio atiuukha abuundu niio Wele akachula naye ali Beteli.
Barekukha khukhwama e Beteli mala nga ne baba ne basilikho sinao khukhwama Efurati, Raeli alumwa burafu bwe khusaala omwana.
Oli alikho asaala, owamusaasia amuboolela ali, “Okharia tawe sikila luno olasaala omwana owe sisoleeli okundi.”
Ne nga Raeli aba ne akwiisia kumwoyo (sikila afwa) amutiuukha lisina ali Benoni
Nio Raeli afwa mala asiikhwa angila echa Efurati (olwo nilwo lukoba lwa Betelehemu).
Yakobo ara enjeko khu siliindwa siewe, enjeko eyo yekesia siliindwa sia Raeli khukhwola khu ndaalo yino.
Isiraeli achiililila ne lukeendo acha ombakha liiema liewe ebweeni we endeleelwa eya Eteri.
Ba okhwa Yakobo baba ekhumi ne babili.
Babaana ba Lea baba Rubeni (omubele owa Yakobo), Simioni, Lawi, Yuda, Isakari ne Sebuluni.
Babaana ba Raeli baba, Yosefu ne Benjamini.
Babaana ba Biliia, omukholi owa Raeli baba Dani ne Nafutali.
Babaana ba Silipa, omukholi owa Lea baba Kati ne Asieri. Bano nibo babaana ba Yakobo nibo asaalila mu Padani-aramu.
Isaaka amenya osia kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane.
Nio Isaaka akwiisia kumwoyo, acha khu baandu bewe. Aaba akofuule mala babaana bewe, Esau ne Yakobo, bamusiikha.

Lino nilio lisaaye lia Esau (niye Edomu).
Esau ayila bakhaana Bakanaani babe bakhasi bewe. Ada, omukhaana owa Eloni, Omuhiti, Oholibama, omukhaana owa Ana, okhwa
ne Basemati, omukhaana owa Ishimaeli, omukooko owa Nabayoti.
Ada asaalila Esau Elifasi, Basemati asaala Reueli,
ne Oholibama asaala Yeushi, Yalamu ne Kora. Bano nibo ba okhwa Esau nibo asaalila mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Esau abukula bakhasi bewe, babaana bewe be sisoleeli ne siikhaana nende be munju mwewe boosi, chikhaafu ne bibiaayo, bibiindu nibio aba ne anyoolile mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala auuya acha mu sibala sisiindi, aleeyi khukhwama khu Yakobo wandaaye.
Auuya sikila niye ne wandaaye baba ne kimiaandu kimikali mala kamaayilwe kaboomba mu sibala nisio bamenyangamo nga baakwa.
Nio Esau amenya Seiri, mu sibala sie bikulu (Esau niye Edomu).
Lino lili lisaaye lia Esau kuuka owe Baedomu mu Seiri, sibala sie bikulu.
Kano kali kamasina ke babaana ba Esau: Elifasi, omwana owa Ada, mukha Esau, Reueli omwana owa Basemati mukha Esau.
Ba okhwa Elifasi baba Temani, Omari, Sefo, Katamu ne Kenasi.
(Timuna aaba omukhasi niye Elifasi okhwa Esau aamenyia busa nga omusaale. Timuna asaala Amaleki khu Elifasi). Bano nibo babaana ba Ada mukha Esau.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Reueli: Nahati, Sera, Siama ne Misa. Bano nibo babaana ba Basemati mukha Esau.
Bano nibo babaana ba Oholibama omukhaana owa Ana, okhwa Sibeoni mukha Esau: Yeushi, Yalamu ne Kora.
Bano nibo bakasa be babaana ba Esau. Babaana ba Elifasi, omubele owa Esau, baaba Temani, Omari, Sefo, Kenasi,
Kora, Katamu ne Amaleki, abano nibo bakasa babaama khu Elifasi mu sibala sia Edomu, babaana ba Ada.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Reueli, okhwa Esau: omukasa Nahati, Sera, Siama ne Misa. Bano nibo bakasa babaakukha khu Reueli mu sibala sie Edomu, baba babaana ba Basemati mukha Esau.
Bano nibo bakasa babaama khu Oholibama mukha Esau, omukhaana owa Ana, Yeushi, Yalamu, ne Kora,
Bano nibo ba okhwa Esau (niye Edomu) ne bano nibo bakasa babwe.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Seiri Omuhori, babamenya mu sibala sia Edomu: Lotani, Siobali, Sibeoni, Ana,
Dishoni, Eseri ne Tishani, bano bali bakasa be Bahori, ba okhwa Seiri mu sibala sie Edomu.
Ba okhwa Lotani baba Hori ne Hemani, ne Timuna aba omukooko owa Lotani.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Siobali: Alibani, Manahati, Ebali, Shefo ne Onamu.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Sibeoni: Aya ne Ana. Ana yuno niye owanyoola chisebele che kameechi kamabile mu sichiimi nga aba ne aaya chipunda cha Sibeoni, raraawe.
Bano nibo babaana ba Ana: Dishoni, ne omukhaana bali Oholibama.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Dishoni: Hemutani, Esibani, Itirani ne Kerani.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Eseri: Biliani, Saabani ne Akani.
Bano nibo ba okhwa Tishani: Usi ne Arani.
Bano nibo bakasa babaakukha khu Bahori: Lotani, Siobali, Sibeoni, Ana,
Dishoni, Eseri ne Tishani, bano nibo bakasa babaama khu Bahori khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe mu sibala sia Seiri.
Bano nibo babaami babamia mu sibala sia Edomu, ebweeni, omwami yesi yesi ne akhamiiakho khu Baisiraeli tawe.
Bela okhwa Beori, amiia mu Edomu. Lukoba lwewe lwaba Tinihaba.
Bela afwa, mala Yobabu, okhwa Sera owa Bosira amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Yobabu afwa, mala Husiamu owe mu sibala sia Batemani, amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Husiamu afwa, mala Hatati okhwa Betati, owaula Midiani mu sibala sia Moabu, amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe. Lisina lie lukoba lwewe lwaba Abiti.
Hatati afwa, mala Samula owe Masireka amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Samula afwa mala Shauli, owe Rehoboti, khu luuchi lwa Efurati, amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Shauli afwa mala Baali-hanani, okhwa Akibori amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Baali-hanani, okhwa Akibori afwa, mala Hatari amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe. Lisina lie lukoba lwewe liaba Pau ne lisina lio omukhasi wewe liaba Meotabeli, omukhaana owa Matureti, omukhaana owa Mesahabu.
Akano kali kamasina ke bakasa ba Esau khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe ne abuundu niio bamenya, ne kamasina kabwe: Bakasa Timuna, Aliba, Yateti,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinoni,
Kenasi, Temani, Mibisari,
Makitieli ne Iramu. Abano nibo bakasa ba Edomu (niye Esau raraawe owa Edomu) khuloondekhana ne abuundu niio bamenya mu sibala siabwe.

Yakobo amenya mu sibala nisio raraawe auyilamo, sibala sia Kanaani.
Luno nilwo lukano lwe luuya lwa Yakobo.
Yosefu ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na saba ayaanga kumunyele ne bawandaaye, babaana ba Biliia ne Silipa, bakhasi ba raraawe. Yosefu aboolela raraawe kamabi niko bawandaaye bakholanga.
Isiraeli aaba asiima Yosefu khukhila babaana bewe boosi, sikila aaba omwana niye asaala ne asaakhulue. Mala amunabila engubo endeeyi eye kamakhono kamaleeyi
Ne nga bawandaaye babona bali paapa wabwe asiima Yosefu khukhilakho nibo boosi, bamubiila mala khulomaloma naye mu muleembe tawe.
Siilo silala, Yosefu aroora, ne nga aboolela bawandaaye kamarooro kewe batasa khumubiila.
Ababoolela ali, “Rekeeresia muboolele kamarooro niko ndoorire kano.
Khubeele khulikho khuboa binywa mu mukuunda mala nabona sinywa siase sienyokha siema bukololofu, ne binywa bienywe biebuusia biabotookhelela sisiase, mala biasisikamila.”
Bawandaaye bamureeba bali, “Ng'ali ewe olaba omwami mala okhwamiie efwe?” Nio batasa khumubiila lukali sikila kamarooro ne kamakhuwa kewe.
Yosefu aroora kamarooro kakaandi mala aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Lola, ndoorire kamarooro kakaandi, mala mboone, enyanga, kumwesi ne ching'enieesi ekhumi ne ndala abele bilikho bisikamila ese.”
Ne nga akaboolela raraawe ne bawandaaye, raraawe amuyibila mala amureeba ali, “Kamarooro lukano siina niko oroorire kano? Ewe wibaasia oli ese, ne maao ne bawandaayo khukheche khwiname asi ebweeni wowo?”
Mala bawandaaye bamukhendekhela, ne kakhali raraawe amenya ne liboola lino mu mebaasio kewe.
Endaalo ndala bawandaaye ba Yosefu basamusia bibiaayo bia paapa wabwe mumayilwe siimbi ne Shekemu.
Nio Isiraeli aboolela Yosefu ali, “Bawandaayo se basamuusie bibiaayo e Shekemu ta ku? Yiicha khurume khu nibo.”
Yosefu akobosia ali, “Yee, ese ndi ano.”
Nio raraawe amuboolela ali, “Khoche, mala obone bawandaayo ne bali bulayi lundi obone bibiaayo undeerere likhuwa.” Nio raraawe amuruma khukhwama mu litooma lia Heburoni acha ola e Shekemu.
Omundu okundi amunyoola mundaa ne alikho acha eyi ne neeyi mala amureeba ali, “Olikho oenja siina?”
Amukobosia ali, “Ndikho mbenja bawandaayase, khusaba umboolele niio balikho baaya bibiaayo.”
Omundu oyo aloma ali, “Barekuukhe, sikila mbuliile ne baloma bali khekhuche e Dotani.” Nio, Yosefu aloonda khu bawandaaye abanyoola e Dotani.
Bamubona ne asiili ataayi ne akhaboolakho tawe mala bamwikuta bali bamwire.
Baboolana babeene ne babeene bali, “Namarooro oyosi alikho echa.
Yiicha khumwire mala khumumwaate mu lilala khu maloo kano mala khuche khuboole khuli esolo eye mundaa emuliile, nio khubone nga kamarooro kewe kacha khuba.”
Ne nga Rubeni aulila lino, akhaka khumuonia, ababoolela ali, “Khukhamwiira tawe.”
“Mukhachukha sifuki tawe, mumwaate busa mwiloo lie mu sichiimi lino, ne kakhali mukhamutilakho tawe.” Rubeni enya khumuonia, nio amukobosie khu raraawe.
Nga Yosefu ne ola khu bawandaaye, bamufuula engubo eye kamakhono kamaleeyi ne kamapala esiimisia, niyo aaba ne afwarire eyo.
Bamuaamba bamumwaata mwiloo. Liloo se liabamo kameechi tawe.
Nga ne bekhala asi, baaba ne balia, babona Baisimaeli balikho bama Kileati ne chingamia chabwe bekha e Misiri. Baba basutile ekamu, kamafura ne manemane.
Yuda aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Lili na bukhala sina khwire wandaayefwe mala khukise sifuki siewe?
Khekhumukusie khu Baisimaeli. Khukhamuyilakho kamakhono kiefwe tawe sikila ali wandaayefwe, lundi ali kamafuki kefwe ne enyama eye kumubili kwefwe.” Mala bawandaaye bafukiilila kakeewe.
Ne nga Bamidiani baboofuli baba ne balikho babira siimbi, bawandaaye
Nga Rubeni akobola sie loo mala alola khubonamo Yosefu tawe, atabula chingubo chewe
mala akobola khu bawandaaye abareeba ali, “Omusoleeli se ali mwiloo tawe, aba ese ndacha waena?”
Beera embusi, mala babukula engubo eya Yosefu basiikha mu malasile.
Baayila engubo eye kamapala kasiimisia khu paapa wabwe, baloma bali, “Khunyoolile engubo yino, kilole ne eli eyo omwana wowo namwe tawe.”
Akimanya mala aloma ali, “Eli engubo eyo omwana wase! Esolo eye mundaa yamuliile, ndi nang'ali ndi esolo yatabulaake Yosefu mu bitonyi.”
Yakobo atabula chingubo mala afwara likunia munda mala alila omwana wewe khulwe chindaalo chingali.
Babaana bewe basoleeli ne bakhaana benyokha bacha khumuoleelesia, ne kakhali aloba khuolelesibwa mala aloma ali, “Tawe ndekhe enje emakoombe khu mwana wase ne siliila busa ndi,” raraawe achiililila khumulila ario.
Ne Bamidiani baba bamukusiisie mu Misiri khu Potifa, omukhulu owe kamae ka Farao kakamuliindanga.

Mu biise ebio Yuda ekha arura mu bawandaaye acha amenya wo omundu okundi Omuatulami owalaangwa bali Hira.
Ebweeneyo Yuda abonayo omukhaana owo Omukanaani okundi, lisina liewe liaba bali Siua. Amuyila,
mala amusaalila omwana owe sisoleeli. Yuda atiuukha omwana lisina ali Eri.
Aesia lundi mala amusaalila omwana owe sisoleeli okundi mala mukha Yuda amutiuukha lisina ali Onani.
Lundi asaala omwana okundi owe sisoleeli amutiuukha lisina ali Shela. Yuda aba e Kesibu nga omwana yuno ne asaalwa.
Nio Yuda abukulila omwana wewe omubele Eri, omukhasi. Lisina lio mukhasi liaba bali Tamari.
Ne kakhali Eri, omubele owa Yuda, aba omumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwiira.
Yuda aboolela Onani ali, “Kobosia mukha wandaayo okone naye mala osaalile wandaayo babaana.”
Ne kakhali Onani amanya ali babaana se balaba babewe tawe. Khwako amalilaanga anje kamaani kewe ko museecha nga ne aakonaanga nende ngwa wandaaye, sikila akhakhola ario asaalila wandaaye babaana tawe.
Ne nilio akhola, se liasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwiira yesi.
Nio Yuda aboolela omukhaana wewe Tamari ali, “Khoche ewenywe, omenye busa nga namulekhwa khukhwola nga omwana wase Shela ne achoa.” Yuda aria ali Shiela yesi akhola ario afwa nga bawandaaye. Tamari acha amenya munju mwa raraawe.
Enyuma we biise, mukha Yuda, omukhaana owa Siua afwa. Oli kamasika kaweele, Yuda ne omusaale wewe Hira, Omuatulami baniina bacha Timuna niio kamakheese ka Yuda kabekelwa bufuumbo.
Ne nga Tamari aboolelwa ali, “Masalaao alikho aniina Timuna khubeka bufuumbo bwe kamakheese kewe,”
efuula chingubo chewe che bunamulekhwa mala ebiimba eneti mumoni mala ekhala asilibwa sia Enaimu lukoba luli amuyila kuucha Timuna, sikila abona ali Shela achoyile mala se aelesibwa amuyile nga omukhasi tawe.
Nga Yuda ne amubona ebaasia ali ali omulaaya, niye sikila aaba efumile mumoni.
Acha niio aaba amuyila ao mala amureeba ali, “Nenya ngone ne nawe,” sikila se amanya ali ali omukhaana wewe niye tawe. Amureeba ali, “Ne okona ne nase olambelesia siina?”
Amukobosia ali, “Kane khurumire emeeme khukhwama mwituuli liase.” Tamari amukobosia ali, “Okhupa sina kumusiingo khukhwola nga ne oreera?”
Yuda amureeba ali, “Khupila musiingo sina?” Amukobosia ali, “embete eye simanyisio siowo, ne lukoye ne esiimbo yowo.” Nio amua, akona naye mala aesia.
Tamari enyokha acha engo, afuula lububi mala afwara chingubo chewe che bunamulekhwa.
Nga Yuda aruma omusaale wewe, Omutulami ne emeeme asikule bibiindu biewe khukhwama khu mukhasi oyo, se amunyoola tawe.
Mala areeba babaandu be Enaimu ali, “Omulaaya owaba Enaimu amuyila ali waena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Ano omulaaya se alikhoo tawe.”
Akobola khu Yuda mala amuboolela ali, “Se namunyoolile tawe lundi babaandu be abwenao balomile bali, ‘Omulaaya se alikhoo ano tawe.’ ”
Nio Yuda akobosia ali, “Lekha abe ne bibiindu ebio, babaandu bakhola bario bakhuchekha efwe. Bona, murumiile emeeme mala ewe khumunyoola tawe.”
Oli embi kimieesi kitaru Yuda aboolelwa ali, “Omukhaana wowo Tamari akholile bueeyani ne khutasa khwako anyoolile enda.” Yuda aloma ali, “Khemumurusie mala osibwe.”
Nga nilwo aba ne alikho arusibwa arumania likhuwa khu masalaawe ali, “Ndi ne enda eyo omundu omwene biindu bino, Khusaba ololeelesie omanye bili bia naanu, embete eye simanyisio, lukoye ne esiimbo.”
Yuda abimanya mala aloma ali, “Tamari ali owa ng'ali khukhukhila ese, sikila nga ne khamuua omusoleeli wase Shela.” Mala Yuda khukona naye lundi tawe.
Nga siise sie khusaala ne siola aba ne bukhwana munda.
Ne nga aba ne alikho asaala, omwana mulala arusia kumukhono mala osaasia akutila aboakho lukoye lubesemu ne aloma ali, oyuno anyoile echa.
Ne kakhali nga akobosiayo kumukhono kwewe, wandaaye asaalwa. Osaasia aloma ali, “Oata ebweeni busa oriena!” Khwako bamutiuukha bali Peresi
Wandaaye amaliilikha asaalwa ne lukoye lubesemu khu mukhono kwewe mala bamutiuukha bali Sera.

Nono Yosefu ayilwa e Misiri, mala Potifa, omukhulu owe banamae babaliindanga Farao, amukula khukhwama khu Baisimaeli ba baaba ne bamuyilile emwalo eyo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne Yosefu, ne aba omundu owe bukhili mala amenya munju eyo omwami wewe Omumisiri.
Omwami wewe abona ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne Yosefu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola koosi niko Yosefu akhola khuba kamalayi.
Nio Potifa asiima Yosefu mala amukhola abe omukholela, amukhola abe owimeelela enju yewe mala amua bunyali khu buli sisiindu nisio aba nasio.
Khukhwama khu siise nisio amukhola omwimeelesi we enju yewe, ne khumua bunyali khu buli siindu nisio aba nasio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita enju eyo Omumisiri sikila Yosefu. Chikhabi cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chaba khu bioosi nibio aba nabio munju ne emukuunda.
Nio alekha bioosi nibio aba nabio mu bwimeelesi bwa Yosefu. Ne nga aba naye se ebaasiakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, ne kakhali siakhulia nisio alichanga siong'ene.
Yosefu aba ne kamaani lundi aaba owe lukoondo lulayi,
Enyuma we siise, omukhasi wo mwami wewe amwikoomba mala amuboolela ali, “Kona ne nase.”
Ne kakhali Yosefu aloba mala amuboolela ali, “Lola, omwami wase se enaniangakho khu siindu siosi siosi munju yewe tawe, mala ara buli siindu mu bunyali bwase,
se aliio omukhulu munju yino khukhukhila ese tawe, namwe se ayinyima sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, ne okhali ewe wamwene, sikila oli omukhasi wewe. Nono ese nyala nakhola ndiena sifwaabi siboofu sino, mala khole bubwoni khu Wele?”
Ne akhaba ne areebanga Yosefu buli busiele, Yosefu se arekeeresianga kakeewe tawe mala se afukiilila khukona ne naye tawe.
Ne kakhali endaalo ndala, nga Yosefu ne engila munju khukhola kimilimo kiewe, omundu okundi khu bakholi be munju se abamo tawe,
mukha Potifa amukwakho atiila engubo yewe aloma ali, “Kona ne nase.” Ne kakhali Yosefu afwarukha mungubo akilekha mu makhono kewe, elukha mala arura munju.
Ne nga abona ali efubarure alekhile engubo yewe mu makhono kewe, mala elukhe arurire munju,
alaanga bakholi be munju mwewe, mala ababoolela ali, “Lola, omuseecha wase areera Omueburania yuno muno khukhufwolobia efwe, ama khwicha mu lusiro nilwo ndi bali angwekho, mala nakukuula lukali,
ne nga ne aulile ne ngukuula, elukhe arura munju alekha engubo yewe.”
Omukhasi abiikha engubo eya Yosefu nabwila omwami owa Yosefu nga ne aloota.
Nio omukhasi amuboolela kamakhuwa mene ako ali, “Nasioobi mueburania niye ewe wakhureerera echile mu lusiro niio ndi bali afwoloobie ese,
ne nga ngukuulile elukhe arura munju alekha engubo yewe niio ndi.”
Nga omuseecha wewe ne aulila kamakhuwa niko omukhasi wewe amuboolela ali, “Kano niko omukholi wowo akholele ese,” Aambwa lirima lukali.
Abukula Yosefu amuyila mu siboe, abuundu niio baboe bo mwami baboangwa mala amenya mubwenomwo.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne Yosefu mala amwekesia busiime bukhawao tawe, ne khumua kumwalaalo mumoni mwo muliindi we mu siboe.
Omuliindi we mu siboe akhola Yosefu khuba omwimeelesi owe baboe boosi. Ne siosi siosi sisiekholekhanga mu siboe, Yosefu niye owakholanga.
Omuliindi we mu siboe se enaana mu siindu siosi siosi sisiaba mu bwimeelesi bwa Yosefu tawe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne Yosefu, ne buli siindu nisio akhola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asikhola khuba silayi.

Enyuma we siise, Omukhulu owe bakholi ba bang'oonelanga Farao we Misiri endali ne khumuelesia, no mukhulu owe babaandu ba bapaanga kimikaati kia Farao, bakhola kamabi khu Farao.
Nio Farao akhalalila bakhulu bewe babili abo, omukhulu owe bakholi ba bamung'oonelanga endali no mukhulu owe bakholi ba bapaanga kimikaati kiewe,
mala abekalila munju eyo mukhulu owe kamae, munju nimwo Yosefu aaba ne abowa.
Bamenya mu siboe omwo khu siise mala omukhulu owe kamae akhola Yosefu khuba omwimeelesi, lundi omuliindi wabwe.
Nio siilo silala, omukhulu owe bakholi bang'oonanga endali oyo no mukhulu owe khu khuupa kimikaati kia Farao owa Misiri, ba baba mu siboe, baroora, buli mulala kamarooro kewe, ne buli kamarooro ne sifuno siako.
Nga Yosefu ne abachaakho kumutikhinyi abona balikho baayaaya,
abareeba ali, “Siina sikila luno ne mwiembeleele?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Khuroorire kamarooro, ne se aliio omundu onyala akhuboolela sifuno siako tawe.”
Yosefu abakobosia ali, “Wele niye oanaanga bunyali bwe khubuula bifuno. Ese musaba, mumboolele kamarooro kenywe.”
Nio, omukhulu owe khung'oona endali, aboolela Yosefu kamarooro kewe ali, “Mu marooro kase mboone kumusabibu ebweeni wase,
kulikho chisakia chitaru. Khangu busa, nga kwasisina kamasaafu, kwamulikha mala kwaama chisabibu, mala charoba.
Sikoombe sia Farao siaba mukhono mwase, nabuta chisabibu nakhamululilamo mala naelesia Farao sikoombe esio.”
Yosefu amukobosia ali, “Sino nisio sifuno siako: chisakia chitaru chili chindaalo chitaru.
Mu ndaalo chitaru Farao alakhubeela, mala akhukobosie khu milimo kiowo, ne olamwakaanisia sikoombe nga wakholanga khale ne oli omukhulu owe khung'oona endali yewe.
Ne nosiima khebulile, nga buli siindu ne silikhubeela silayi, mala ukholele kamalayi, undomalomekho khu Farao mala unjeete ndure munju yino.
Ese nebwa busa khukhwama mu sibala sie Baeburania ne akhaba eno yosi se nakhola sisiindu nisio khoyela khureerwa mu siboe tawe.”
Nga omukhulu owe khung'oona kimikaati ne abona ali sifuno sie kamarooro sili silayi, aboolela Yosefu ali, “Ese, sesi ndoorire kamarooro, abele netiuukhile khu murwe bikono bie kimikaati bitaru
ne sikono sie khungaaki khu bioosi sibelemo chingano choosi che biakhulia bia Farao, ne kakhali chinyuni chibibochilenge khukhwama mu sikono khu murwe kwase.”
Ne Yosefu amukobosia ali, “Sifuno siako nisio sino: bikono bitaru bili chindaalo chitaru.
Mu ndaalo chitaru Farao akhakhurusiekho kumurwe! Ne akhasuunge kumubili kwowo khu murongooro mala chinyuni chikhakhubooche.”
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, yaba eye khukhebulila khusaalwa khwa Farao, Farao akholela bakholi bewe naikara emboofu. Arusia omukhulu owe khumung'oonela endali no mukhulu owe khung'oona kimikaati mu siboe, mala abareera ebweeni we bakholi bewe.
Akobosia omukhulu owe khumung'oonela endali khu milimo kiewe mala akaanisia Farao sikoombe mu makhono.
Ne kakhali asunga omukhulu owe khung'oona kimikaati khu murongooro, khuloondekhana nga Yosefu ne ababoolela.
Ne kakhali, omukhulu owe khung'oonela Farao endali se akhebulila Yosefu tawe amwibilila.

Enyuma we kimiiko kibili kimimufu, Farao aroora ali, aaba emile a luuchi lwa Naili.
Nio chikhaafu saba chindayi lundi chikhomefu charura mu Naili mala chaaya bunyaasi.
Chikhaafu chichiindi saba chifutuufu lundi ching'au charura mu Naili chachiloondakho enyuma, mala checha chema siimbi achiindi echo khu sikiingi sia Naili.
Mala chikhaafu chifutuufu lundi ching'au echo chalia chikhaafu chimiufu lundi chikhomefu. Mala Farao asisimukha.
Akona mala aroora lukhola khabili. Abona bikala saba bie engaanu, biboofu lundi bitukunyafu ne bilikho bichoela khu sisina silala.
Ne enyuma wabio bikala saba biamela, bie kamatere busa, ne luucho lwe mu sichiimi lwaba lwabiomia.
Nio bikala bie kamatere busa, biamila bikala saba biboofu lundi bitukunyafu ebio. Mala Farao asisimukha, mala amanya ali kamarooro niko.
Nio kumutikhinyi eembeelela, mala arumania alaanga be kamaya ne bakesi boosi be mu Misiri mala ababoolela kamarooro kewe ne se abao onyala khumuboolela sifuno siako tawe.
Nio omukhulu owang'oonelanga Farao endali amuboolela ali, “Endaalo yino nakhebuliile kamakhiikha kase.
Nga Farao ne akhalalila bakholi bewe mala anda ese ne omung'ooni owe kimikaati mu siboe, munju eyo omukhulu owe kamae kakaliindanga Farao,
khwaroora silo silala, niye ne nase. Buli mulala aaba ne kamarooro ne sifuno siako.
Omusoleeli Mueburania abayo ne nafwe, aba omukholi owo mukhulu owe kamae kakaliinda omwami. Aakhuboolela bifuno bie kamarooro kefwe, buli sia mulala khuloondekhana ne kamarooro kewe.
Ne nga akhuboolela, kecha kaba kario, ese nakalusibwa khu milimo kiase, ne omung'ooni we kimikaati asungwa.”
Farao arumania, alaanga Yosefu, mala bamureera khangu khukhwama mu siboe. Ne nga ne abeka akaluukhasia chingubo, echa ebweeni wa Farao.
Nio Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Ndoorire kamarooro mala se aliio omundu onyala amboolela namanya sifuno siako tawe, ne nauliile ne baloma khwiwe bali ne oulila kamarooro onyala waboola sifuno siako.”
Yosefu akobosia Farao ali, “Ese senyala tawe, ne kakhali Wele alaelesia Farao sifuno sisienyekhana.”
Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Mu marooro kase mbele nemile khu sikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Naili,
mala chikhaafu saba chikhomefu lundi chimiufu miu, charura mu Naili mala charakikha khukhwaaya bunyaasi.
Ne chikhaafu chichiindi saba charura enyuma wacho, chimbi, chifutuufu lundi ching'au lukali nicho khaabonakho mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi tawe.
Nio chikhaafu ching'au lundi chifutuufu echo chalia chikhaafu che khunyoa chikhomefu echo.
Ne nga chaba ne chichiliile, mbao abele omundu onyala amanya ali chachiliile tawe, sikila charama busa chifutuufu nga mu khurakikha. Mala nasisimukha.
Lundi naroora, nabona mu marooro kase bikala saba bie engaanu bili khu sisina silala. Biaba biboofu lundi bibiafumbara bulayi.
Ne bikala bibiindi bibianiaala, bitiiti bibiomisibwa ne luucho lwe bukwe biamela enyuma we ebio.
Nio bikala bitiiti biamila bikala saba bilayi. Mboleele bakhola kamaya, ne se abeleo onyala amboolela sifuno tawe.”
Nio, Yosefu aboolela Farao ali, “Kamarooro ka Farao kali busa malala, Wele afunuliile Farao nisio ali siimbi khukhola.
Chikhaafu saba chindayi chili kimiiko saba ne bikala saba bilayi bili kimiiko saba, kamarooro kali busa malala.
Chikhaafu saba ching'au lundi chifutuufu chicharura enyuma we echo chili kimiiko saba ne bikala saba biikhalimo sindu tawe bibiomisibwa ne luucho lwe bukwe bioosi bili kimiiko saba kie enjala.
Kali busa nga mboleele Farao, Wele ekeesie Farao niko ali siimbi khukhola.
Kileecha kimiiko saba kie enjikura engali lukali mu sibala sia Misiri siosi.
Ne kakhali enyuma wakio kileechao kimiiko saba kie enjala, mala enjikura yoosi ekhebililwe mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Enjikura se elimanyikha mu sibala tawe, sikila enjala elikiloondakho, sikila eliba endafu lukali.
Ne khukalukhilamo khwe kamarooro ka Farao khwekesia khuli Wele arereo likhuwa lino mala alalikhola likholekhe mu ndaalo ngekhe chichiicha.
“Nono, khwako Farao kharobore omundu oli owe limanya lundi omukesi, mala amure mu bwimeelesi bwe sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Lekha Farao arobore baloleelesi khu sibala siosi, mala babukule silala khu biraano bie biakhulia bie sibala sia Misiri mu siise sie kimiiko saba kie enjikura.
Mala babuusie biakhulia bioosi bie kimiiko kimilayi kilikho kikiicha kino babibuunge asi we bunyali bwa Farao, mu ngoba, mala babiliinde.
Biakhulia ebio biliba libiikhilo khulwe sibala mu miiko saba kie enjala elikho yiicha mu sibala sia Misiri. Nio babaandu bakhafwa mu njala tawe.”
Likhuwa lino liaba lilayi khu Farao ne bakasa bewe.
Mala Farao areeba bakasa bewe ali, “Khunyala khwanyoola omundu nga Yosefu yuno niye Roho owa Wele alimo ku?”
Nio Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Sikila Wele akhwekeesie ewe kano koosi, se aliio yesi yesi owe limanya lundi omukesi nga ewe tawe.
Ndakhura khu bwimeelesi bwe enju yase, ne khu baandu base boosi balaria kamalaka kowo, ne kakhali khuloondekhana ne bubwami bwong'ene ese ndaba angaaki wowo.”
Mala Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Nakhuroboore ewe obe omwami khu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.”
Farao afuula embete eye simanyisio khukhwama khu mukhono kwewe akifwara khu mukhono khwa Yosefu. Amufwara chingubo chimiufu cha katani mala amufwara lunyololo lwe sahabu mwikosi.
Nio amwikhasia mu likaari liewe lia khabili mala babaandu batima ebweeni wewe ne balaangilila khu baandu bali, “Sikama!” Farao amiisie Yosefu khu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Lundi Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Ese ndi Farao, mbao omundu mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi, olasuta kumukhono namwe sikele ewe ne okhaanile kumunwa tawe.”
Nio Farao atiuukha Yosefu lisina ali Safenati-panea, mala amua Asenati, omukhaana owa Potifera, omusaayi owa Oni, amuyile abe omukhasi wewe. Nio Yosefu akeenda mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Yosefu aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru nga engila mu bukholi bwa Farao omwami owa Misiri. Mala Yosefu arura ebweeni wa Farao, acha mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Mu miiko saba kie enjikura sibala siama bibiaamo bikali lukali.
Ne Yosefu abuusia biakhulia bioosi bie kimiiko saba nga enjikura yaba mu sibala sia Misiri. Mala abuunga biakhulia mu buli lukoba, khukhwama mu mikuunda kikiaba siimbi.
Mala Yosefu abuunga biakhulia bikali lukali nga kumuyekhe nabwila alekha khubipiima, sikila biatuuma sikelo.
Kimiiko kie enjala ne kisiili khukhwola tawe Yosefu aba asaalile babaana babili mu Asenati, omukhaana owa Potifera, omusaayi owa Oni.
Yosefu atiuukha omubele lisina ali Manase
Lisina lio mwana owa khabili, atiuukha ali Efuraimu
Kimiiko saba kie enjikura kikiaba mu sibala sia Misiri kiawa,
mala kimiiko saba kie enjala kiarakikha nga Yosefu ne aloma. Enjala yabao mu bibala bioosi, ne kakhali mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi, biakhulia biabamo.
Nga enjala ne yakwa mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi, babaandu balilila Farao abae siakhulia. Mala Farao aboolela ba Misiri boosi ali, “Khemuche khu Yosefu. Siosi siosi nisio amuboolela, khola.”
Nio, nga enjala ne yamalatana khu sibala sioosi, Yosefu ekula birara, mala akusia biakhulia khu Bamisiri, sikila enjala yaba endafu lukali mu sibala sia Misiri.
Khutasa khwako, babaandu becha e Misiri khu Yosefu khukula siakhulia, sikila enjala yaba endafu mu sibala mwoosi.

Nga Yakobo ne aulila ali biakhulia biaba bili e Misiri, aboolela babaana bewe ali, “Siina sikila ne mulolelelana busa?
Nauliile bali biakhulia bili e Misiri, yiikha muche mukuleyo biakhulia enjala ekhakhwira tawe.”
Nio bawandaaye ba Yosefu ekhumi, bekha bacha e Misiri khukula biakhulia.
Ne Yakobo se aruma Benjamini, wandaaye owa Yosefu, alala ne bawandaaye tawe, sikila aria ali busiku bukhola burio bwamunyoolayo.
Ba okhwa Yakobo bacha bario, ne babaandi, khukula biakhulia sikila enjala yaba mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Nono, Yosefu aaba omuruki owe mu sibala sia Misiri, niye owakusianga biakhulia khu baandu boosi khukhwama mu sibala sioosi. Nio bawandaaye ba Yosefu bacha mala basikama ebweeni wewe benama bubweeni bwabwe asi.
Yosefu abona bawandaaye abamanya, ne kakhali ababukula busa nga bareende, mala abayiibila. Abareeba ali, “Enywe mwama waena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Efwe khwama mu sibala sia Kanaani khwichile khukula biakhulia.”
Akhaba Yosefu ne amanya ali bawandaaye, nibo se bamumanya tawe.
Akhebulila kamarooro niko aroora khu nibo, mala ababoolela ali, “Enywe muli bayooti, mwechile mubone butekhele bwe sibala sino.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Tawe omwami, ne kakhali bakholi bowo bechile khukula biakhulia.
Efwe khuli babaana bo omundu mulala, ne khuli babaandu babeyikinwa, se khuli bayooti tawe.”
Yosefu abakobosia ali, “Tawe mwichile mubone niio butekhele buli mu sibala siefwe.”
Nio bamukobosia bali, “Efwe nasioobi bowo khwaba babaana ekhumi ne babili bo omundu mulala mu sibala sia Kanaani. Omutua ali engo ne paapa wefwe, ne mulala se aliio tawe.”
Yosefu abakobosia ali, “Kali busa nga ne ndomile ndi enywe muli bayooti.
Mulakelekwa khu lino: mwichubila enywe mu lisina lia Farao ndi, se mularura ano tawe khukhwola nga wandaayenywe omutua ne echa ano.
Ruma mulala khwinywe ache areere wandaayenywe. Babaandi balarama mu siboe nabwila kamakhuwa kenywe ne kakelwa, kekesie bung'ali ne bumulimo. Ne kakhali kario tawe, ese mwechubila mu lisina lia Farao ndi, enywe muli bayooti.”
Mala abekalila boosi alala mu siboe khulwe chindaalo chitaru.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru Yosefu ababoolela ali, “Khola muri mala mulamenya, sikila ese ndi omundu owaria Wele:
Mwaba ne muli babaandu babeyikinwa, lekha mulala khwinywe abe mu siboe, ne babaandi basute biakhulia bayilile babaandu benywe engo, sikila enjala.
Mala mureere wandaayenywe omutua khwise, nio kamakhuwa kenywe kekesie kali mwalomile bung'ali ne se mulafwa tawe.” Mala bakhola bario.
Nio balomaloma babene ne babene bali, “Mu bung'ali khuli ne bubi khulwa wandaayefwe, khwabona bubeeleli bwe kumwoyo kwewe, nga ne akhwikoonjelela mala se khwarekeeresia tawe, nisio sikila butinyu buno ne bukhwichilekho.”
Se bamanya bali Yosefu aulile niko baloma tawe, sikila abao omukaluukhasi akari wabwe ne Yosefu.
Yosefu abarurao mala arakikha khulila. Akelao echa alomaloma ne nabo lundi. Ne abukula Simioni amuboa kimikoye ebweeni wabwe.
Nio Yosefu arusia lilaka bechusie kimifuko kie bawandaaye ne biakhulia mala babakoboseleyo chirupia cha buli mundu mu mufuko kwewe mala babae siakhulia sie khu lukeendo. Kano kakholwa kario.
Bawandaaye ba Yosefu baboa biakhulia biabwe khu punda mala barekukha.
Oli bali abuundu niio bakona siilo, mulala khu nibo akangulula kumufuko kwewe, aelesie epunda siakhulia, mala abona chirupia chewe emunwa we kumufuko.
Mala aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Bakobosiemo chirupia chase, nicheechi emunwa we kumufuko!” Lino liabakhola besiindukha kumwoyo, baterema ne baloma bali, “Wele akhukholeele siina sino?”
Nga bola khu Yakobo paapa wabwe, mu sibala sia Kanaani, bamuboolela koosi kakabekholekhakho, bali,
“Omundu, Omwami we sibala esio, akhulomalomela mu bukhalafu mala akhuraakho ali khuli bayooti mu sibala esio.
Ne kakhali khwamukobosia khuli, ‘Efwe se khuli bayooti tawe, khuli babeyikinwa.
Khwaba babaandu ekhumi ne babili babaana bo omundu mulala, ne mulala khwifwe se aliio tawe ne omutua ali ne paapa wefwe mu sibala sia Kanaani.’
Omundu chana, omwami we mu sibala esio, akhukobosia ali, ‘Ndamanyila khu lino ndi muli babeyikinwa: lekha mulala khu bawandaayenywe bano ne nase mala mubukule biakhulia muyilile babaandu benywe engo sikila enjala.
Mureere wandaayenywe omutua khwise, nio ndamanya ndi se muli bayooti tawe, muli babeyikinwa, ne ndamulekhuulila wandaayenywe, mala mulakhola bubwofuli mu sibala sino.’ ”
Nga barusia biakhulia khukhwama mu mifuko kiabwe, liboo lie chirupia cha buli mundu chaba mu mufuko kwewe. Ne nga nibo ne paapa wabwe babona kamaboo ke chirupia ako, baba ne buuri.
Nio Yakobo paapa wabwe aloma ali, “Enywe mulerisianga babaana base: Yosefu se aliio tawe, Simioni se aliio tawe, ne luno mwenya mubukule Benjamini yesi. Bumiinikhi buno bwoosi bwechile khwise!”
Nio Rubeni aboolela raraawe ali, “Mbe ese omwana muliinde, mala khamukobosie, ne naaba ne khamukobosia tawe, yiira babaana base be sisoleeli boombi.”
Ne kakhali Yakobo aloma ali, “Omwana wase se kane ache ne nanywe tawe, sikila wandaaye afwa mala arama yeng'ene. Yaaba bali kamabi kamukwakho ne muli khulukeendo nilwo mwenya khucha, bubeeleli nibwo ndiba nabwo bulinjira busa omusaakhulu nga ne ndii ndi.”

Enjala yaba endafu lukali mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Ne nga balia biakhulia nibio bakula khukhwama e Misiri biawa, paapa wabwe ababoolela ali, “Cha lundi mukhukulilekho biakhulia bikeekhe biri.”
Yuda amukobosia ali, “Omundu oyo akhukaania lukali ali, ‘Wandaayenywe ne akhali ne nanywe mukhambonekhelakho tawe.’
Waaba ne olikho okhuruma ne wandaayefwe, khuleekha khuche mala khukhukulile biakhulia
ne waaba ne okhamuruma ne nafwe tawe se khuleekha khuche tawe, sikila omundu oyo akhuboolela ali, ‘Wandaayenywe ne akhali ne nanywe tawe mukhambonekhela tawe.’ ”
Isiraeli aloma ali, “Siina sisiakila ne mwakholela bubi murio ne muboolela omundu oyo muli muli ne wandaayenywe okundi?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omundu oyo akhureeberesia ka kefwe ne ke balebe befwe lukali, ali, ‘Paapa wenywe asilio ku? Muli ne wandaayenywe okundi ku?’ Khwakobosia nga ne akhureeba. Khwaba khunyala khwamanya khuriena khuli kane alome ali, ‘Reera wandaayenywe?’ ”
Yuda aboolela raraawe Isiraeli ali, “Ndume ese ne omwana, ne khulenyokha khuche, mala khuone enjala ekhakhwira efwe ne nawe ne bakeekhe boosi tawe.
Ese naanile bulamu bwase khubela niye. Olindeeba ese omwana yuno, naaba ne khamukobosia namura ebweeni wowo tawe, lekha nikiichwe mindali na mindali.
Sikila abanga se khwakhiinda tawe, andi luno khwakoboole khabili.”
Nio Isiraeli Paapa wabwe ababoolela ali, “Kaaba bali khukhwola kabe kario, aba khola muri; bukula bibiaamo bili bilayi bie mu sibala muno kamafura makeekhe kari, bubuukhi bukeekhe buuri, ekamu, manemane, chimaito ne chimbande mala mure mu mufuko muyilile omundu oyo nga siaanwa.
Bukula chirupia khukhwola khabili, mukobosieyo chirupia chichakobolela mu mifuko kienywe. Wakana likoyana liabao.
Bukula akhaba wandaayenywe mala mwinyokhe muche khu mundu oyo lundi.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi akhoya amukholela siisa ebweeni wo omundu oyo, mala amulekhuulile wandaayenywe okundi oyo ne Benjamini. Naaba ne fwisiisie babaana base aba nafwisiisie.”
Nio basoleeli ba Yakobo babukula biaanwa ne chirupia khukhwola khabili ne Benjamini mala benyokha bacha e Misiri, bema ebweeni wa Yosefu.
Nga Yosefu ne abona Benjamini ne nabo, aboolela omukholi omukhulu owe munju yewe ali, “Yila babaandu bano munju. Yiira sisiaayo mala muteekhe siakhulia, sikila balalia siakhulia sie kumuusi ne nase.”
Omukholi oyo akhola nga ne alakwa, ayila babaandu abo munju mwa Yosefu.
Nio babaandu abo baria, sikila bareerwa munju mwa Yosefu mala baloma bali, “Chirupia chichakalusibwa mu mifuko kiefwe mu siise sie khunyoa nicho chikilile ne khureerwa muno, nio akhwaangalisiekho bubweyaangu akhuambe khube nasioobi bewe, mala akhunuule chipunda chefwe.”
Nio nga boola amuliango kwe enju eya Yosefu baboolela omukholi omukhulu owe munju mwa Yosefu,
bali, “Nosiima omwami, khwecha eno lulala khukula biakhulia,
ne nga khwola niio khwakona siilo, khwakangulula kimifuko kiefwe mala chirupia cha buli mulala chaba emunwa we kumufuko kwewe, chirupia chefwe busa choosi. Khwako, khwechile nacho lundi.
Ne khwechile ne chirupia chichiindi mu makhono kefwe khukule biakhulia. Se khumanya owakobosia chirupia chefwe mu mifuko kiefwe tawe.”
Omukholi abakobosia ali, “Mukheembeelela namwe mukharia tawe, Wele wenywe ne Wele owa paapa wenywe amureera chirupia mu mifuko. Ese nanyoola nicho mwandunga.” Nio arusia Simioni amureera khu nibo.
Nga omukholi ne aba abareerire munju mwa Yosefu, ne khubaa kameechi basiinge bikele, aelesia chipunda siakhulia.
Berekekha ne biaanwa sikila Yosefu aaba alikho echa engo khu siakhulia sie kumuusi, sikila baba baulile bali balaliayo siakhulia.
Nga Yosefu ne echa engo bamureerera munju biaanwa nibio baba ne nabio, mala benama ebweeni wewe bola asi.
Nio abareeba kamakhuwa kabwe, mala aloma ali, “Paapa wenywe, omusaakhulu niye mwaboola ali omulamu? Asiilio omulamu?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omukholi wowo, paapa wefwe ali omulamu, asiilio.” Mala benama ebweeni wewe, mu liria.
Ne nga Yosefu abona wandaaye Benjamini, omwana owa maawe, aloma ali, “Oyuno niye wandaayenywe omutua niye mwamboolela? Wele akhuue kumwalaalo mwana wase!”
Yosefu arekukha khangu, sikila kumwoyo kwewe kwekoomba wandaaye mala ayiima abuundu niio alililao. Engila mu lusiro mwewe mala alililamo.
Mala esaaba mumoni arura ekhaliilikha aloma ali, “Reera siakhulia.”
Bamuua siakhulia yeng'ene, ne bawandaaye bong'ene, ne Bamisiri babalichanga ne naye bong'ene, sikila Bamisiri abeele se banyala balia ne Baeburania tawe, sikila lilienelio lili lie sibiilisio khu Bamisiri.
Nio bekhala ebweeni wewe khuloondekhana ne bukhulu bwabwe, khukhwama khu mubele khukhwola khu mutua, mala baloleelelana mu liuka busa.
Babaelesia sikelo sie biakhulia khukhwaama khu siaalwa sia Yosefu, ne kakhali Benjamini anyoola sikelo siboofu khukhwola kharaano khukhila bawandaaye. Nio banywa basangaala alala ne naye.
