Yosefu alaka omukholi omukhulu owe munju mwewe ali, “Yichusia biakhulia mu mifuko kie babaandu bano, nga kimifuko kiabwe ne kinyala kiasuta mala okobosie chirupia cha buli mundu emunwa we kumufuko kwewe.
Ne ra sikoombe siase sie efwesa emunwa we kumufuko kwo omukeekhe khu boosi, ne chirupia chewe che biakhulia.” Mala akhola nga Yosefu ne amuboolela.
Nga bwasia busa buri, babaandu abo balekhuulwa bacha ne chipunda chabwe.
Nga baba bachiile lukeendo lulwimbi busa khukhwama mu lukoba, Yosefu aboolela omukholi wewe omukhulu ali, “Yinyokha oloonde khu baandu abo, mala ne obanyoola obaboolele oli, ‘Siina sikila ne muruungire bubi khu malayi? Siina sikila ne mwibile sikoombe sie efwesa sio mwami wase?
Se sili nisio omwami wase anyweelangamo lundi nisio alakulilangamo ku? Mwakholile bubi bukali.’ ”
Nga omukholi owa Yosefu abolakho alomaloma kamakhuwa kano.
Bamukobosia bali, “Siina sikila omwami wase ne alomaloma kamakhuwa nga kano. Bakholi bowo se banyala bakhola sisiindu nga sino tawe!
Chirupia nicho khwanyoola emunwa we kimifuko kiefwe, khwachikobosia khukhwama mu sibala sia Kanaani. Nono khunyala khweba khuriena efwesa namwe esahabu khukhwama munju mwo omwami wowo?
Omukholi wowo yesi yesi, niye silanyoolekhakho, lekha erwe ne akhaba efwe khulaba nasioobi bo mwami wefwe.”
Abakobosia ali, “Nafukiiliile nga mulomile, ne niye sikoombe silanyoolekhakho, niye yeng'ene olaba nasioobi wase, ne babaandi se balaba ne lie khubekiicha tawe.”
Khangu busa, buli omundu aruura kumufuko kwewe asi, mala buli mundu akaangulula kumufuko kwewe.
Arakikha khupula, khukhwamila khu mukhulu mala amaliilisia ne omukeekhe khu boosi. Mala sikoombe sianyoolekhana mu mufuko kwa Benjamini.
Nio, bawandaaye batabula chingubo chabwe, ne buli omundu akobosia kumufuko kwewe khu punda bakobola mu lukoba.
Nga Yuda ne bawandaaye bakobola munju mwa Yosefu, aaba asilimo. Baakwa asi ebweeni wewe.
Yosefu abareeba ali, “Sikholwa siina nisio mukholile sino? Se mumanyile muli omundu nga ese nyala nalakula ta ku?”
Yuda amukobosia ali, “Omwami, khukhubolele khuli sina? Khulome siina? Khunyala khwekaana khuriena? Wele afunuule bubi bwe bakholi bowo, nono, efwe khuli nasioobi bo mwami wase, efwe ne noyo niye sikoombe sinyoolekhe mukhono mwewe.”
Ne kakhali Yosefu aloma ali, “Se enyala nakhola ndio tawe! Ne kakhali omundu niye sikoombe sinyoolekhane mukhono mwewe yeng'ene niye olaba nasioobi wase, ne enywe, khe murekukhe muche engo mu muleembe khu paapa wenywe.”
Yuda eseenda siimbi khu Yosefu mala amuboolela ali, “Nosiima, omwami, mbe kumunwa, khusaba, mboolele omwami wase likhuwa. Okhaambwa lirima khu mukholi wowo tawe, sikila ewe oli nga Farao omwene.
Omwami, ewe wareeba bakholi bowo oli, ‘Muli ne paapa wenywe namwe wandaayenywe okundi?’
Mala khwakobosia omwami wase khuli, ‘Khuli ne paapa mala ali omusaakhulu ne wandaayefwe omukeekhe, niye paapa asaala ne ali omusaakhulu. Ne wandaaye aafwa arama yeng'ene khu baana ba maawe, ne paapa wefwe amusiima lukali.’
Ewe waloma bakholi bowo oli, ‘Cha, mumureere nenya khumubona.’
Khwaboolela omwami wase khuli, ‘Omwana oyo se anyala alekha raraawe tawe, ne aaba bali amulekha anyala afwa.’
Ne ewe, omwami wakhuboolela efwe, bakholi bowo oli, ‘Mukhambonekhela ne mukheechile ne wandaayenywe omukeekhe tawe.’
“Nga khwakobola engo khu mukholi wowo, paapa wefwe khwamuboolela kamakhuwa ko mwami wase.
Ne nga paapa ne akhubooleele ali, ‘Khemuche lundi e Misiri, mukuleyo biakhulia bitiiti,’
Khwamukobosia khuli, ‘Se khunyala khwekha lundi e Misiri, kaaba bali wandaayefwe omukeekhe se alikho acha ne nafwe tawe. Aba khuleekha khucha, sikila se khufukiililwa khubona omundu oyo wandaayefwe omukeekhe, ne akhali ne nafwe tawe.’
Ne omukholi wowo, paapa wase akhuboolela ali, ‘Enywe mumanyile muli omukhasi wase Raeli asaalila ese babaana babili,
mulala afwa ayindekha, mala naloma ndi, ng'ali atabulakwa mu bitonyi ne solo eye mundaa, ne khamubonakho khukhwama ao tawe.
Mwaba ne mumbukula yuno yesi mala kamabi kamukwakho, bubeeleli nibwo khabe nabwo bulinjira busa omusaakhulu nga ne ndii ndi.’
“Khwako, omwami, nga ne ngobola khu mukholi wowo, paapa wase, mala omwana se ali ne nafwe tawe, mala bulamu bwewe bwabowa mu bulamu bwo omwana yuno,
nga ne alabona ali omwana se ali ne nafwe tawe alafwa, mala aba bakholi bowo, khulafwiisia omusaakhulu paapa mu bubeeleli.
Ese, omukholi wowo naana bulamu bwase khulwo mwana yuno khu paapa ne ndoma ndi, ‘Naaba ne khamukobosia khwiwe tawe, lekha mbe ne liliekicha mumoni cha paapa wase mu bulamu bwase bwoosi.’
Nono, khwako ekhusaba, ese ndame mu bweyaangu bwo omwana yuno, nga nasioobi wo mwami wase, mala olekhe omwana yuno akoboleyo ne bawandaaye,
sikila ese nyala nakobola ndiena khu paapa wase omwana yuno aaba ne akhali ne nase tawe? Ndi ne buuri khubona kamabi kaacha khuba khu paapa.”

Mala alila lukali Bamisiri nende be munju mwa Farao boosi baulila.
Nio Yosefu aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Ese ndi Yosefu, paapa asiili omulamu ku?” Ne kakhali bawandaaye se bamukobosia tawe, sikila baria lukali ebweeni wewe.
Yosefu aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Musaba mwisende siimbi.” Mala beseenda siimbi. Ababoolela ali, “Ese ndi wandaayenywe, Yosefu, niye mwakusia mu Misiri.
Nono mukheembeelela namwe mukhebiiya khukhungusia muno tawe, sikila Wele anduma ese ebweeni wenywe embonie bulamu.
Sikila enjala yabeleo mu sibala kimiiko kibili kino, mala kiaramire kimiiko kiraano nikio khulima namwe khukesa se khulabao tawe.
Wele anduma ese ebweeni wenywe khumuonia enywe ne khukhola lisaaye lienywe lirame khu sibala.
Se muli enywe mumwandeera eno tawe ne kakhali Wele niye wandeera, lundi akholile mbe raraawe owa Farao, no mwami owe enju yewe yoosi ne khu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.
Olamenya mu sibala sie Kosieni ne olaba siimbi ne nase, ewe ne babaana bowo ne babechukhulu bowo ne kiminyele ne kamatuuli ne bibiindu bioosi nibio oli nabio.
Ne oli Kosieni, ndakhuliinda, sikila kiaramire kimiiko kiraano kie enjala kilikho kikiicha, busa ewe ne be nju yowo, ne bibiaayo biowo mukhafwe enjala.’ ”
Yosefu achiililila khuloma ali, “Luno enywe mweesi, ne akhaba ewe Benjamini, mwabone muli ese ng'ali Yosefu.
Kenyekhana muboolele paapa wase luyali lwase mu Misiri, ne niko mubone koosi. Mukhole khangu mureere paapa wase emwalo eno.”
Nio akwa mwikosi mwa wandaaye Benjamini mala alila, akhaba Benjamini yesi alila.
Ekwayila ne buli sia mulala khu bawandaaye boosi mala abalililakho. Enyuma wako bawandaaye bakachula ne naye.
Nga kamakhuwa ne kola munju mwa Farao bali bawandaaye ba Yosefu bechile, liasiimisia Farao alala ne bakholi bewe.
Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Boolela bawandaayo oli, ‘Khola muri: boa kimifuko kienywe khu punda chenywe mala muche mu sibala sia Kanaani,
mubukule paapa wenywe nende be munju yenywe boosi mwiche khwise. Ndamua kamaloba kamalayi mu Misiri khukhila abuundu aandi oosi, mala mulalia bilayi bie sibala sino.’
Lundi baboolele oli, ‘Khola muri; bukula kamakaari khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri khulwe babaana bakeekhe ne bakhasi benywe, mureemo paapa wenywe mala mwiche.
Mukhebaasia khu biindu bienywe tawe, sikila kamaloba kamalayi khukhila koosi, ka Misiri kali kakenywe.’ ”
Ba okhwa Isiraeli bakhola bario mala Yosefu abaelesia kamakaari, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Farao, lundi abaelesia biakhulia bie khu lukeendo.
Aelesia buli mulala chingubo che khukhwekaluukhasia ne Benjamini amua bitonyi chimia chitaru bie efwesa, ne chingubo chiraano che khukhwekaluukhasia.
Arumira raraawe chipunda ekhumi, nicho baboakho bibiindu bilayi bia Misiri chipunda chikhasi ekhumi chichasuta biakhulia, kimikaati ne biakhulia bibiindi bie khu lukeendo lwa raraawe.
Akheesia bawandaaye ne nga baba ne balikho barekukha aloma ali, “Mukhalomanila khungila tawe.”
Nio baniina, barura mu Misiri, mala bola mu sibala sia Kanaani, khu paapa wabwe Yakobo.
Bamuboolela bali, “Yosefu asilio omulamu mala ali omwami owe sibala sia Misiri sioosi!” Mala Yakobo esiindukha kumwoyo sikila se abasuubila tawe.
Ne kakhali nga ne bamuboolela kamakhuwa ka Yosefu koosi, niko aba ne ababoolele, lundi nga ne abona kamakaari niko Yosefu aaba ne arumire kamumeeme, kumwoyo kwa paapa wabwe Yakobo kwanyoola kamaani.
Mala Isiraeli aloma ali, “Kanyalile kario, omwana wase Yosefu asiili omulamu, ndacha mubone ne ekhafwa tawe.”

Nio Isiraeli arakikha lukeendo nende nibio aaba nabio bioosi ola e Beerisheba mala aana embosio khu Wele owa raraawe Isaaka.
Mala Wele alaanga Isiraeli mu malola ke siilo ali, “Yakobo, Yakobo.” Ne Yakobo akobosia ali, “Ndi ano.”
Wele aloma ali, “Ese ndi Wele, Wele owa paapa wowo, okharia khukhwiikha oche e Misiri tawe, sikila ebweeneyo ndakhukhola obe sibala siboofu.
Ndacha e Misiri ne nawe mala lundi ndiniinia lisaaye liowo likobole mu sibala sino. Ne Yosefu niye olikhumiina chimoni ne olikho ofwa.”
Yakobo arekukha khukhwama e Beerisheba. Babaana ba Isiraeli bameemela paapa wabwe, babaana babwe bakeekhe, ne bakhasi babwe, mu makaari niko Farao aruma kabameeme.
Babukula akhaba chikhaafu chabwe ne bibiindu biabwe nibio baba ne banyoola mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala bacha e Misiri. Yakobo ne lisaaye liewe lwoosi,
babaana bewe, babechukhulu bewe, bakhaana bewe ne babechukhulu bewe bakhaana bacha e Misiri.
Kano niko kamasina ke lisaaye lia Isiraeli babacha mu Misiri, Yakobo ne babaana bewe Rubeni, omwana wewe omubele.
Ne ba okhwa Rubeni, Anoki, Palu, Hesironi ne Karimu.
Ba okhwa Simioni baba: Yemueli, Yamini, Ohati, Yakini, Soari ne Shauli, babaana bo omukhaana omukanaani.
Ba okhwa Lawi baba: Kerishoni, Koati ne Merari.
Ba okhwa Yuda baba: Eri, Onani, Shela, Peresi, Sera (ne kakhali Eri ne Onani bafwila mu sibala sia Kanaani). Ba okhwa Peresi baba: Hesironi ne Hamuli.
Ba okhwa Isakari baba: Dola, Puba, Yobu ne Simuroni.
Ba okhwa Sebuluni baba: Sereti, Eloni ne Yaeleeli.
Bano bali babaana ba Lea nibo asaalila Yakobo mu Padani-aramu alala ne omukhaana wewe Tina. Boosi alala babaana bewe basoleeli ne bakhaana baba kamakhumi kataru ne bataru.
Ba okhwa Kati baba: Sifioni, Hagi, Siuni, Esiboni, Eri, Aroti ne Areli.
Babaana ba Asieri baba Imuna, Isiba, Isibi, Beria ne Sera omukooko wabwe. Babaana ba Beria baba: Heberi ne Malikieli.
(Bano baba babaana ba Silipa, niye Labani aelesia omukhaana wewe Lea, mala asaalila Yakobo babaandu ekhumi na sita.)
Babaana ba Raeli, mukha Yakobo baba: Yosefu ne Benjamini.
Ne Yosefu asaalila mu sibala sia Misiri: Manase ne Efuraimu nibo Asenati, omukhaana owa Potifera, omusaayi owa Oni, amusaalila.
Ne ba okhwa Benjamini baba: Bela, Bekeri, Asibeli, Kera, Naamani, Ehi, Roshi, Mupimu, Hupimu ne Ariti.
(Babaandu ekhumi na bane bano lili lisaaye nilio Raeli asaalila Yakobo.)
Ba okhwa Dani baba: Hushimu.
Ba okhwa Nafutali baba: Yaiseeli, Kuni, Yeseri ne Silemu.
(Babaandu saba bano bali lisaaye nilio Bilia, nasioobi niye Labani aelesia omukhaana wewe Raeli, asaalila Yakobo).
Babaandu ba Yakobo boosi babeecha mu Misiri, ba baba lisaaye liewe, ne okhatubilekho bakhasi be babaana bewe tawe, baba kamakhumi sita na sita boosi alala.
Ne babaana ba Yosefu babasaalwa mu Misiri baba babili: Babaandu be enju eya Yakobo boosi babeecha mu Misiri baba kamakhumi saba.
Yakobo aruma Yuda arangire ache areebe Yosefu akaanile paapa wabwe e Kosieni, mala boola mu sibala sia Kosieni.
Yosefu arekekha kamakaari kewe, mala acha khukhwakaanila Isiraeli raraawe mu Kosieni. Amwakaanila mala amukwa mwikosi alililamo khulwe siise.
Isiraeli aboolela Yosefu ali, “Luno nakhafwa khefwe, sikila nakhuboone, mala namanyile ndi ewe osiliio omulamu.”
Yosefu aboolela bawandaaye nende be munju eya raraawe ali, “Ndaniina nje mboolele Farao, ndi ‘Bawandaayase ne be nju eya paapa wase bababeele mu sibala sia Kanaani, bechile khwise.
Ne babaandu bano bali babaayi be chikhaafu, mala bechile ne kiminyele kiabwe ne kamatuuli kabwe, ne bibiindu bioosi nibio bali nabio.’
Farao ne amulaanga mala ne amureeba ali, ‘Kimilimo kienywe kili siina?’
Mumukobosia muli, ‘Bakholi bowo bali babaayi be chikhaafu khukhwama mu buele khukhwola luno luri, efwe ne bapaapa befwe.’ Nio mumenye mu sibala sia Kosieni, sikila buli omwaayi owe chikhaafu ali sibiilisio khu mu Misiri.”

Nio Yosefu acha mwa Farao mala amuboolela ali, “Paapa wase ne bawandaayase, ne kiminyele kiabwe, ne kamatuuli kabwe, ne bibiindu biabwe bioosi, bechile khukhwama mu sibala sia Kanaani, siise sino bali e Kosieni.”
Ne khukhwama mu bawandaaye, abukulamo basaani baraano, mala abekesia khu Farao.
Farao areeba bawandaaye ali, “Kimilimo kienywe kili siina?” Bakobosia bali, “Bakholi bowo bali babaayi be bibiaayo nga bapaapa befwe ne baaba.”
“Khwichile khumenyekho mu sibala sino, sikila bakholi bowo se bali ne kamaayilwe ke bibiaayo tawe, lundi enjala eli endafu lukali mu sibala sia Kanaani. Nono khukhusaba okhue efwe bakholi bowo kumunwa khumenye mu sibala sia Kosieni.”
Nio, Farao aboolela Yosefu ali, “Paapa wowo ne bawandaayo bechile khwiwe.
Sibala sia Misiri sili ebweeni wowo, elesia paapa wowo ne bawandaayo kamaloba kamalayi khukhila koosi mu sibala sino bamenyemo. Lekha bamenye mu maloba ka Kosieni. Ne waaba ne omanyile mu nibo, basaani banyala khukhunjayila chikhaafu chase bareekho banjayile.”
Yosefu areera Yakobo, raraawe, amwekesia khu Farao mala Yakobo abiita Farao chikhabi.
Nio Farao areeba Yakobo ali, “Ewe oli ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kinga?”
Yakobo akobosia Farao ali, “Bulamu bwase bwe khuuya-uuya buli kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru. Kimiiko ekio kili mikeekhe mala kie butinyu ne se kilekhaana ne kimiiko kimikali kie bulamu bwe khuuya-uuya bwe bakuuka base tawe.”
Nio Yakobo abiita Farao chikhabi mala arura ebweeni wewe.
Yosefu amenyia raraawe ne bawandaaye, abaa kumukabwa mu sibala sia Misiri, mu maloba kamalayi khukhila koosi, mu lukoongo lwe Ramusesi nga Farao ne aaba ne alaka.
Nio Yosefu aelesia raraawe, bawandaaye ne babaandu boosi be munju mwa raraawe siakhulia, khuloondekhana ne babaandu nibo baba ne nabo.
Nono Siakhulia se siabakhoo mu sibala tawe. Enjala yaba endafu lukali, mala babaandu be mu Misiri ne mu Kanaani bang'aa lukali sikila enjala eyo.
Yosefu abuusia chirupia mu sibala sia Misiri ne sia Kanaani nga kumuruungo kwe biakhulia nibio babaandu bakula mala achiyila mwichipi lia Farao.
Ne nga chirupia choosi chaba ne chiweele mu sibala sia Misiri ne mu sibala sia Kanaani, Bamisiri boosi becha khu Yosefu mala baloma bali, “Khue biakhulia! Okhakhulekha khwafwila mumoni chowo tawe, sikila chirupia chefwe choosi chaweele.”
Yosefu abakobosia ali, “Chirupia chenywe chaba ne chiweele, mbe bibiaayo ne ese ndamuua enywe biakhulia.”
Nio bareera bibiaayo khu Yosefu, mala Yosefu abaa biakhulia khulwe khukulasia ne chifarasi, ne kiminyele, kamatuuli, ne chipunda chabwe. Kumwiiko okwo abaelesia biakhulia khulwe khukulasiamo bibiaayo biabwe bioosi.
Nga kumwiiko okwo ne kwawa, becha khu Yosefu mala bamuboolela bali, “Omwami se khulakhukisa tawe, chirupia chefwe choosi chaweele, ne bibiaayo biefwe bioosi, luno bili bibiowo. Se siliio siramire nisio khunyala khwakhua tawe, ne kakhali fwabene ne kamaloba kefwe.
Okhakhulekha khwafwila mumoni chowo tawe. Khukule efwe ne kamaloba kefwe mala efwe ne kimikuunda kiefwe khulaba nasioobi ba Farao, khue biakhulia khulie enjala ekhakhwira tawe, lundi khue bumiicho khumiiche mu mikuunda kikhaba busa tawe.”
Nio Yosefu akulila Farao kimikuunda kie mu sibala sia Misiri kioosi, sikila Bamisiri boosi bakusia kimikuunda kiabwe khulwe enjala eyaba endafu lukali khu nibo.
Mala akhola babaandu mu Misiri mwoosi baba nasioobi ba Farao.
Kimikuunda kie basaayi kiong'ene nikio akhakula tawe, sikila basaayi baba ne sikelo sie biakhulia buli lwoosi khukhwama khu Farao, mala bamenyela khulwe khunyoola biakhulia nibio Farao abaechanga. Khwako se bakusia kimikuunda kiabwe tawe.
Nio Yosefu aboolela babaandu ali, “Lola endaalo yino namukulile enywe ne kimikuunda kienywe mube ba Farao. Nono bumiicho obusiina mumiichemo.
Ne khukhwola mu likesa, mulielesia Farao silala khu biraano sie likesa lienywe ne biramire bibe biakhulia bienywe ne bumiicho.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Wakhuoniisie: Omwami nosiima efwe khulaba nasioobi ba Farao.”
Nio Yosefu alikhola liaba lilaka mu sibala sia Misiri, ali silala khu biraano sie likesa sili sia Farao. Lilaka lino lisiliio khukhwola luno. Kamaloba ke basaayi kong'ene kakhaba ka Farao tawe.
Baisiraeli bamenya mu sibala sia Misiri, mu lukoongo lwa Kosieni mala banyoolamo kimiaandu lundi basaalana baba bakali lukali.
Nio Yakobo amenya mu sibala sia Misiri kimiiko ekhumi ne saba, nio kimiiko kie bulamu bwa Yakobo kiaba emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane ne kimiiko saba.
Ne nga siise siola sie lifwa lia Isiraeli, alaanga omwana wewe Yosefu amuboolela ali, “Naaba luno ne nyoolile kumwalaalo mumoni mwowo, ra kumukhono kwowo akari we kamaraango kase mala unjechubile oli se olisiikha mu sibala sia Misiri sino tawe.
Nenya siikhwe niio bapaapa bali, sute undusie mu Misiri mala musiikhe niio nibo basiikhwa.”
Yosefu akobosia ali, “Ndikhola nga ne olomile.”
Ne Isiraeli amuboolela ali, “Njechubile.” Mala Yosefu amwichubila. Nio Isiraeli enamikha bubweeni bwetiila khu sitanda siewe.

Enyuma wa kano Yosefu aboolelwa ali, “Paapa wowo ali omulwale.” Nio abukula babaana bewe babili, Manase ne Efuraimu acha khumubona.
Nga Yakobo ne aboolelwa ali omwana wewe Yosefu echile khumubona, eandalasia enyokha ekhala khu sitanda siewe.
Aboolela Yosefu ali, “Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi ambonekhela e Lusi, mu sibala sia Kanaani mala ambiita chikhabi.
Amboolela ali, ‘Ndikhukhola obe ne lisaaye likali mala ndikhutasa babaana ne ndikhukholamo sipupu sie chikholo chingali mala ndiia lisaaye liowo, enyuma wowo sibala sino. Siliba sisiabwe mindali na mindali.’
“Babaana bowo babili, Efuraimu ne Manase, nibo wasaalila mu Misiri ese ne khecha khwiwe tawe, bali babaase. Balaba babaase, nga Rubeni ne Simioni ne bali.
Ne babaana balisaalwa enyuma wabwe baliba babowo balilaangilwa khu lisina lie bawandaayabwe mu khunyoola kumukabwa kwabwe.
Sikila nga necha khukhwama e Padani-aramu, Raeli, mu bubeeleli bwase, afwila mu sibala sia Kanaani khungila, ne khusilikho aleeyi khukhwola Efurati, mala namusiikha angila echa Efurati.” (Olwo nilwo lukoba lwa Betelehemu.)
Nga Isiraeli ne abona babaana ba Yosefu areeba ali, “Bano naanu nibo?”
Yosefu akobosia raraawe ali, “Bano bali babaana base nibo Wele ambeele mu Misiri muno.”
Yakobo amuboolela ali, “Nosiima bareere ano mbabiite chikhabi.”
Nono chimoni cha Isiraeli chaba chabofula sikila kamakora, aaba se abona bulayi tawe. Yosefu areera basoleeli bewe siimbi mala Isiraeli abekwayila ne khubekhoyela.
Isiraeli aboolela Yosefu ali, “Abele se nebaasia ndi ndikhubona tawe, ne bona Wele akholile naboone akhaba ne babaana bowo bosi.”
Nono Yosefu abarusia khu bikele biewe mala asikama, enama bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi.
Mala Yosefu ababukula boombi, Efuraimu mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha, nio abe emukhono kumukhasi kwa Isiraeli ne Manase mu mukhono kwewe kumukhasi, nio abe emukhono kumuseecha kwa Isiraeli, mala abareera siimbi khu Yakobo.
Ne Yakobo aborania kamakhono, ayila kumuseecha atiila khu murwe kwa Efuraimu owaba omukeekhe, ne kumukhasi atiila khu murwe kwa Manase owaba omubele.
Mala abiita Yosefu ne aloma ali,
“Wele niye bapaapa base Aburahamu ne Isaaka bakholela,
Wele oobeele omwaayi wase mu bulamu bwase bwoosi khukhwola endaalo yino,
Malaika owaasikula khukhwama mu busiku bwoosi,
biita babaana bano chikhabi,
ne mu nibo, lekha lisina liase nende lie bapaapa base Aburahamu ne Isaaka litiuukhwe,
mala lisaaye liabwe libe likali khu sibala.”
Nga Yosefu abona raraawe atiilile kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha khu murwe kwa Efuraimu se asiimisibwa tawe, mala abukula kumukhono kwa paapa akurusie khu murwe kwa Efuraimu akure khu murwe kwa Manase.
Nio Yosefu aboolela raraawe ali, “Se kario tawe paapa, sikila yuno ali omubele, tiila kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha khu murwe kwewe.”
Ne kakhali raraawe aloba mala aloma ali, “Namanyile mwana wase, namanyile ndi lisaaye lia Manase liosi likhabe ne babaandu bakali, lundi yesi akhabe omundu omukali. Ne kakhaba kario, wandaaye omukeekhe akhabe omukali khumukhila, ne lisaaye liewe liliba chikholo chingali.”
“Baisiraeli balirumikhira kamasina kenywe ne balikho babiita chikhabi.
Ne bakhalomenge bali,
‘Wele akhukhole nga Efuraimu ne Manase.’ ”
Mu ngila yino ara Efuraimu ebweeni wa Manase.
Isiraeli aboolela Yosefu ali, “Lola ese ndi siimbi khufwa, ne Wele aliba alala ne nanywe. Alimukobosia lundi mu sibala sie bapaapa benywe.
Khutuba khwako nakhuele ewe, ne se bali bawandaayo tawe, lubeka lulala lwe Sikulu, nilwo napana nanuula khukhwama khu Baamori ne embalu yase ne buyiingo bwase.”

Yakobo alaanga babaana bewe mala aloma ali,
“Yibuusia alala mala ese muboolele enywe kacha khumwikholekhakho mu ndaalo chichiicha.
Yibuusia alala murekeeresie enywe baana ba Yakobo,
mala muulile niko paapa wenywe aloma.
Rubeni, ewe oli omubele wase.
Oli kamaani kase, omwana owe khunyoa owe lukoosi lukali khukhila boosi,
owe lukoosi lukali khukhila boosi
lundi owe bunyali bukali khukhila boosi.
Omaasia busa nga kameechi,
ne se olinyoola bukhili khu boosi tawe,
sikila wakona ne mukha raraao.
Waloba khuria sitanda sia paapa wowo!
Simioni ne Lawi bali bawandaaye,
bulwaani bwe sisiayuumba buli chimbalu chabwe.
Ewe mwoyo kwase, okhengila mu muse kwe simoonyo siabwe tawe,
ewe mwoyo kwase, okhaambaana mu libuusiana liabwe tawe.
Sikila mu lirima liabwe beera babaandu,
ne mukhwirania khwabwe, barema chiuunwa kimikotio.
Silaamo sibe khu lirima liabwe, sikila lili lirafu,
ne bukhalafu bwabwe, sikila se bulimo siisa ta!
Ndabaukhasia mu Yakobo,
mala mbasalanisie mu Isiraeli.
Yuda, bawandaayo balikhufumia ewe,
kumukhono kwowo kuliba khwikosi khwe basiku bowo,
babaana ba paapa wowo balikhusikamila.
ebuulilaanga, eera, mala akobola mu libina liewe.
Eema, ekolola, akona asi nga e talang'i,
ne nga e talang'i ekhasi,
naanu onyala amwinyosia?
Endebe eye bubwami se elirura mu Yuda tawe,
namwe esiimbo eye bubwami se elirura mu lisaaye liewe tawe,
khukhwola nga Silo ne echa
mala chikholo choosi chilimuria.
Aliboa epunda yewe eng'ana khu musabibu,
khu musabibu kumurobore.
Asiinga chingubo chewe mu ndali,
ne ekutuusi yewe mu mafuki ke kimisabibu.
Endali elirobia chimoni chewe,
ne kameno kewe kaliwangiisibwa ne kamabeele.
Sebuluni alimenya khu sikiingi sie nyanja,
ne aliba nga ekambi eye chimeeli,
ne lulwakha lwewe luliba e Sidoni.
Isakari ali epunda eye kamaani,
akonaanga akari we bisutwa nibio asuta.
Abona ali abuundu ekhuolela ali alayi,
ne kamaloba kaba kamalayi,
nio enamia kamabeka,
mala akwa nasioobi owe kimilimo kie khuyingiililwa.
Dani alikhalakila babaandu bewe
nga ekholo ndala eya Isiraeli.
Dani aliba endemu khu muyila,
nafwo khu ngila eluma ekhukunyu eye farasi,
nio okitimia akwe enyuma.
Nalindiilila buonia bwowo, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Banamae banuuli balibwaakala Kati,
ne kakhali alibebwaakala khukhwama enyuma.
Biakhulia bia Asieri biliba bilayi,
ne aliomolela babaami.
Nafutali ali emboongo,
emboongo ekhasi endekhuule,
esaala ching'ana chindayi
Yosefu
lusakia lulwaama a sebele,
chisakia chewe chilea chatuma lisiisi.
Basiku be buyiingo bamwibwaakala,
bamulasa mala bamunaania lukali.
Ne kakhali luyiingo lwarama busa tati,
kamakhono kewe kakholwa ke kamaani
sikila kamaani
(Khulwe lisina lio omwaayi, Lulwanda lwa Isiraeli),
khulwa Wele owa paapa wowo olikhuyeeta,
khulwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi olikhubiita ewe
ne chikhabi che mwikulu mungaaki,
chikhabi che mu lusiba chichetiila asi,
chikhabi che bibaywa bikali,
ne babaana bakali.
Chikhabi cha paapa wowo,
chili che bunyali khukhila chikhabi che bikulu
bibiindu bilayi bie bikulu bia mindali,
chikhoya chaba khumurwe kwa Yosefu,
ne khu bweeni bwo oyo owaukhasibwa khukhwama khu bawandaaye.
Benjamini ali sisuuche sirafu,
kumutikhinyi alia nibio aayile,
ne ekolooba akaba biaambe.”
Chino choosi chili chikholo ekhumi ne chibili cha Isiraeli. Ne kano kali niko paapa wabwe abaloma nga ne ababiita chikhabi, buli sia mulala khuloondekhana ne chikhabi chikhoyela khu niye.
Nio abalaka ne aloma ali, “Ndikho nja khufwa, siikhe niio bapaapa base bali, mu libina lili mu mukuunda kwa Efuroni Omuhiti.
Mu libina liili mu mukuunda e Makipela lubeka lwe ebukwe owa Mamure, mu sibala sia Kanaani. Elio nilio libina nilio Aburahamu akulila mu mukuunda khukhwama khu Efuroni Omuhiti, nga abuundu e khusiikhao.
Abwenao niio basiikha Aburahamu ne omukhasi wewe Sara. Abwenao niio basiikha Isaaka ne omukhasi wewe Rabeka. Lundi abwenao niio nasiikha Lea.
Kumukuunda ne libina lilimo biakulwa khukhwama khu mu Hiti.”
Nga Yakobo ne amala khulaka babaana bewe, akololosia bikele, abikobosia khu sitanda mala akwiisia kumwoyo, afwa.

Nio Yosefu akwa khu raraawe amulililakho ne amwekwayila.
Mala alaka bakholi bewe basilikhi, baakhe raraawe kamalesi ke khukhwoomia kumubili. Nio basilikhi bomisia Isiraeli.
Chindaalo kamakhumi kane chawa, chichenyekha khukhwoomia omundu. Mala Bamisiri balila Isiraeli khu ndaalo kamakhumi saba.
Nga chindaalo che khumulila ne chawa, Yosefu alomaloma khu be nju eya Farao ali, “Naaba luno ne nyoola kumwalaalo mumoni chenywe, musaba mulomalome khu Farao muli,
paapa wase anjechubia aloma ali, ‘Ese ndi siimbi khufwa, ne mu lisiikha mu siliindwa nisio samwene neyabila sili mu sibala sia Kanaani.’ Khwako khusaba umbe kumunwa nje siikhe paapa mala khakobole.”
Farao amukobosia ali, “Paapa wowo nga akhwechubia, cha omusiikhe.”
Nio Yosefu aniina acha khusiikha raraawe. Bakholi ba Farao boosi ne basaakhulu be munju mwewe, ne basaakhulu be mu sibala sia Misiri,
akhaba be munju mwa Yosefu boosi, ba wandaaye, be munju mwa raraawe bacha ne naye. Ne kakhali babaana bong'ene, kiminyele, ne kamatuuli niko kakarama mu sibala sia Kosieni.
Mala baniina bachayo ne naye, alala ne kamakaari ne batimia chifarasi. Siaba sipupu siboofu lukali.
Nga bola aluyia lwe khuula lwa Atati, luli ebweeni owa Yoritani, baliila ne bubeeleli bukali lukali, mala Yosefu akhola kamasika ka raraawe kaba chindaalo saba.
Nga bamenywa be mu sibala sia Kanaani, babona kamasika khu luuya lwe khuulilakho lwa Atati, baloma bali, “Kano kali kamasika ke bubeeleli bukali khu Bamisiri.” Khwako abuundu ao alaangwa lisina ali Abeli-misiraimu,
Babaana ba Yakobo bamukholela bario nga aba ne abalaka,
sikila babaana bewe bamusuta bamuyila mu sibala sia Kanaani, mala bamusiikha mu libina lie mu mukuunda e Makipela, ebukwe owa Mamure, nilio Aburahamu akula mu mukuunda khukhwama khu Efuroni Omuhiti, abe awewe ekhusiikhao.
Enyuma wa Yosefu khusiikha raraawe, akobola e Misiri ne bawandaaye ne nabo boosi ba baba ne bachile ne naye khusiikha raraawe.
Nga bawandaaye ba Yosefu babona paapa wabwe afwiile baloma bali, “Wakana Yosefu alakhubiila mala akhuruungie khulwe kamabi niko khwamukholela.”
Nio baruma likhuwa khu Yosefu ne baloma bali, “Paapa wowo ne akhafwa tawe akhulaka efwe ali,
Boolela Yosefu muli, ‘Khusaba obeele bawandaayo bubwoni bwabwe ne kamabi kabwe sikila bakhukholela kamamayaanu.’ Ne nono luno khukhusaba obeele bubwonaki bwe bakholi ba Wele owa paapa wowo.” Yosefu alila lukali nga ne bamulomalomakho.
Bawandaaye becha basikama ebweeni wewe mala baloma bali, “Lola, efwe khuli nasioobi bowo.”
Ne kakhali Yosefu abakobosia ali, “Mukharia tawe, ese se nyala nabukula bubweyaangu bwa Wele tawe.
Enywe mwenya khukhukholela kamabi, ne kakhali Wele akakhola khuba kamalayi, khukakhola kabe ke khuonia babaandu bakali nga ne kali luno.
Mukharia tawe, ndamuua biakhulia enywe ne bakeekhe benywe.” Abeyikinia ario mala abaoleelesia kimiooyo.
Nio Yosefu amenya mu Misiri, niye nende be munju eya raraawe. Ne Yosefu amenya kimiiko emia ndala ne ekhumi.
Mala abona babaana ba Efuraimu be eselukho ekhola khataru, akhaba babaana ba Makiri okhwa Manase bosi balelwa ne Yosefu.
Nio Yosefu aboolela bawandaaye ali, “Ese ndi siimbi khufwa, ne Wele alimukhebulila mala amurusie mu sibala sino, amuyile mu sibala nisio echubila Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.”
Nio Yosefu echubia babaana Baisiraeli ne aloma ali, “Wele alimukhebulila, mala mulisuta bikuumba biase muche nabio.”
Nio Yosefu afwa ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne ekhumi. Bamuakha kamalesi ke khumwomia mala bamura mwisanduku lie bafu mu sibala sia Misiri.

Baaba Rubeni, Simioni, Lawi, ne Yuda.
Isakari, Sebuluni ne Benjamini.
Dani, Nafutali, Kati ne Asieri.
Lisaaye lia Yakobo lioosi alala liaba bukali bwe babaandu kamakhumi saba.
Ekhumaliilikha Yosefu, ne bawandaaye boosi, ne eselukho eyo yoosi bafwa.
Aaboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Lola Baisiraeli bano bali bakali lukali lundi bakhukhila efwe kamaani.
Khe mwiche, khukanakane nisio khukhola. Ne busa balatasa khuba bakali nio oli liie likhukwakho, baambaane ne basiku befwe bakhuule mala belukhe khukhwama
Khwako Bamisiri babaraakho babemeelesi be kimilimo babakhosie kimilimo kimisiro. Baisiraeli bombakhila Farao chingoba che kamabiikhilo cha Pitomu ne Ramusesi.
Ne kakhali nga nilwo bapisibwa siibi lukali, nga bachiililila khukucha ne khusalaanila buli abuundu. Khwako Bamisiri baria Baisiraeli.
Bamisiri bakhosia Baisiraeli kimilimo kimirafu.
Bakhola limenya lie Baisiraeli liaba lilume khubirira mu khubaelesia kimilimo kimiandalafu kie bubwombakhi ne kimilimo chingano choosi mu mikuunda. Se bakholelakho Baisiraeli siisa tawe.
Nio omwami owe Bamisiri alomaloma ne bakhasi Baeburania basaasianga. Mulala aba bali Sifura, ne okundi bali Pua. Aababoolela ali
“Ne mulikho ne musaasia bakhasi Baeburania, loleelesia. Omwana aaba ne ali omusoleeli mu mwiira, ne aaba omukhaana, mulekha amenye.”
Ne kakhali ba basaasianga abo baria Wele. Se bakhola nga omwami aabalaka bakhole tawe. Ne kakhali balekha babaana be sisoleeli bamenya.
Nio omwami owe Bamisiri alaanga basaasianga chana mala abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mukholile lino? Siina sikila ne mukheerire babaana basoleeli tawe?”
Bakhasi basaasianga baboolela Farao bali, “Sikila bakhasi Baeburania se bali nga bakhasi Bamisiri tawe. Banyindaafu lundi basaala obasaasia ne asiili khubolakho tawe.”
Khwako Wele aaba omulayi khu bakhasi basaasianga abo mala Baisiraeli baaba bakali lundi be kamaani.
Wele aelesia bakhasi basaasianga abo lisaaye liabwe sikila bamuria niye.
Nio Farao lundi alaka babaandu bewe boosi ali, “Buli mwana Omueburania osaalwa, mucha mu mumwaate mu luuchi lwa Naili. Ne kakhali lekha bakhaana boosi bamenye.”

Mu siise esio omundu mulala khukhwama mu kholo eya Lawi acha aakhwa omukhasi khukhwama mu kholo yewe.
Omukhasi oyo aesia mala asaala omwana owe sisoleeli. Nga omukhasi oyo ne abona ali omusoleeli aba owe lukoondo lulayi, aamukisa kimieesi kitaru.
Ne nga akhilwa khumukisa khukhilakho ao, aabukula sikono sie bisele mala amaala enje wasio embula khukhiingilila kameechi kakhasiingilamo tawe. Nio araamo omwana oyo mala asira mu bisele bisiimbe bileeyi asikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Naili.
Omukooko owo mwana oyo emela sinaao abone siina silamwikholekhakho.
Omukhaana owa Farao eekha acha mu luuchi lwa Naili khukhwisiinga, bateendi bewe bakeendelanga khu sikiingi sie luluuchi. Omukhaana owa Farao aabona sikono mu bisele mala aruma omukholi wewe owe siikhaana khusireera.
Nga ne asifuunula aabona omwana owe sisoleeli. Omwana oyo aba alikho alila, mala omukhaana owa Farao aamukholela siisa. Aaloma ali, “Yuno ali mulala khu baana be Baeburania.”
Nio omukooko owo omwana oyo areeba omukhaana owa Farao ali, “Wenya nje khulangile omukhasi mueburania akhulelele omwana yuno?”
Omukhaana owa Farao aamukobosia ali, “Yee, khoche.” Nio acha areera maawe owo mwana omwene.
Omukhaana owa Farao amuboolela ali, “Bukula omwana yuno mala undelele. Khakhuruunge.” Nio omukhasi oyo aabukula omwana mala amulela.
Omwana nga ne achoa omukhasi oyo amuyilila omukhaana owa Farao. Omukhaana owa Farao amubukula aaba omwana wewe. Aamutiuukha lisina ali Musa
Musa alola eyi neyi. Nga ne akhabonakho omundu yesi yesi omuboone tawe, eera Omumisiri oyo mala aamusiikha mu muyekhe.
Nga ne akobolayo endaalo eya loondakho, aabona Baeburania babili balikho bapana. Aaboolela mulala owaba ne alikho arangana okundi ali, “Siina sikila ne uupa Omueburania wasio?”
Omundu oyo aamukobosia ali, “Naanu owakhurobora ewe khuba omwami lundi omukhalaki wefwe? Wenya khu khunjira nga ne werire Omumisiri oyo?” Nio, Musa aaria mala ebaasia ali, “Khane ng'ali babaandu bamanyile sisiindu nisio nakholile.”
Nga Farao ne aulila kakekholekha, enya khukhwira Musa. Ne kakhali Musa elukha khukhwama khu Farao mala acha amenya mu sibala sia Midiani.
Endaalo ndala, nga Musa aaba ne ekhaale a sebele,
bakhaana saba ba Yetiro, Omusaayi owe Midiani, becha khutaa kameechi bechusie bibiindu bie khunyweseliakho bibiaayo bia paapa wabwe.
Ne kakhali babaayi balala becha mala batimania bakhaana abo. Musa aacha abareesia, mala abanyweselia ne bibiaayo biabwe.
Nga bakobola owa paapa wabwe Yetiro, aabareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mukoboole khangu luno?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omumisiri niye okhureesiisie khukhwama khu baayi, lundi akhutayiile kameechi ne khu khunyweselia bibiaayo biefwe.”
Yetiro areeba bakhaana bewe ali, “Ali waena? Siina sikila ne mu mulekhile? Mulaange, eche khulie siakhulia naye.”
Nio Musa afukiilila khumenya eyo, mala Yetiro aamuelesia omukhaana wewe Sipora aaba omukhasi wewe.
Sipora asaala omwana owe sisoleeli mala Musa aaloma ali, “Ese ndi omukwa mu sibala sino, khwako ndamutiuukha lisina ndi, Kerishomu.”
Enyuma we kimiiko kimikali omwami owe Misiri aafwa. Baisiraeli baba balila khulwe kimilimo kiabwe kimisiro. Benya buyeeti mala khulila khwabwe khwolela Wele.
Wele aulila khulila khwabwe mala aakhebulila endakaano yewe ne Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.
Wele aabona Baisiraeli mala aamanya niko babaamo.

Endaalo ndala Musa aba alikho aaya bibiaayo bia Yetiro raraawe omukhwe, owaba omusaayi owa Midiani. Musa aayila bibiaayo lubeka lwe mumbo mwe sichiimi mala ola khu sikulu sitakatifu sia Sinai.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubonekhela mu lumemu lwe kumulilo akari we sichakha. Musa aalola mala abona sichakha ne siburukha kumulilo. Ne kakhali se siaba silikho siya tawe.
Aaloma ali, “Lekha nisende siimbi mala mbone kamayia kano, siina sikila sichakha ne sikhalikho ne siya tawe!”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona Musa ne eseenda siimbi khubona, aamulaanga khukhwama akari we sichakha mala aloma ali, “Musa! Musa!” Musa afukiilila ali, “Yee,”
Wele amuboolela ali, “Okhecha siimbi tawe. Fuula biraaro biowo, sikila abuundu niio wimile ali atakatifu.”
Wele aloma ali, “Ese ndi Wele owe bakuuka bowo, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo.” Nio Musa efuuma mumoni mwewe, sikila aria khulola Wele.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Naboone linaanisibwa lie babaandu base bali mu Misiri. Lundi nauliile khulila khwabwe nga babemeelesi be kimilimo ne ba bapia siibi. Manyile khunyasiikha khwabwe.
Nekhile asi khubareesia khukhwama khu Bamisiri. Nenya khubarusia mu bunyali bwe Bamisiri. Nenya khubayila mu sibala silayi lundi siili sibalaayi, sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga, sibala sie Bakanaani, Bahiti, Baamori, Baperisi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi.
Lola nauliile bililo bie babaandu base Baisiraeli, mala naboone nga nilwo Bamisiri ne balikho ba bapia siibi.
Yiicha, khurume khu Farao nio oraangirire babaandu base Baisiraeli barure mu Misiri.”
Ne kakhali Musa akobosia Wele ali, “Ese ndi naanu onyala acha khu Farao mala areera Baisiraeli khukhwama mu Misiri?”
Wele aamukobosia ali, “Nja khuba nawe. Ne sino sicha khuba simanyisio khwiwe sisiekesia sili ese nakhurumire, ne omalile khureera babaandu khukhwama mu Misiri, mukhasaaye ese khu sikulu sino.”
Lundi Wele aboolela Musa ali, “Boolela Baisiraeli oli ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo, andumire khwinywe.’ Lino nilio lisina liase lia mindali na mindali. Ndimanyikhana ne lisina lino khu selukho choosi.
Khoche obuusie basaakhulu Baisiraeli alala mala obaboolele oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo, ambonekheele. Amboleele ali namuloleelesie mala naboone niko Bamisiri balikho bamukhola.
Ne ndikho ndaka ndi enja khumurusia mu butinyu nibwo mulimo mu Misiri, mala emuyile mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga, sibala sie Bakanaani, Bahiti, Baamori, Baperisi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi.’
“Basaakhulu be Baisiraeli bacha khu khurekeeresia. Khwako okhoya oche ne basaakhulu be Baisiraeli khu mwami owe Misiri mala omuboolele oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baeburania, akhubonekhele efwe. Nono khukhusaba okhufukiilile khuche lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru mu sichiimi khuaanile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe chimbosio.’
Manyile ndi omwami owa Misiri se acha khumufukiilila muche ne akhayingiliilwe khukhola ario tawe.
Ne kakhali enja khurumikhira bunyali bwase mala ndeere siiuukuumo khu Misiri khubirira mu khukhola bibiindu bie liukia ebweeneyo. Enyuma wako acha khu mulekhuula enywe muche.
Buli mukhasi muisiraeli acha khucha khu wasie Omumisiri nende khu buli mukhasi omukwa omenyile munju mwewe mala amusabe chingubo, esahabu ne efwesa. Bamisiri bacha khumuelesia bibiindu bino mala mubielesie babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana. Mulasuta kimiaandu kie Bamisiri muche nakio.”

Nio Musa akobosia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ne kaaba bali Baisiraeli se basuubila namwe bandekeeresia tawe? Ne lundi baaba ne baloma bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aakhubonekhela tawe?’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amureeba ali, “Waambile siina mukhono mwowo?” Musa akobosia ali, “Esiimbo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kimwaate asi.” Aakimwaata asi, yekela endemu, mala Musa akiilukha.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Yinama mala okitiile kumukhiinga.” Musa enama mala akitiila mukhono, yekela esiimbo lundi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khola kano khukhwekesia Baisiraeli bamanye bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Wele owe bakuuka babwe, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo, akhubonekheele.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa lundi ali, “Ra kumukhono kwowo mu ngubo yowo.” Musa aara kumukhono kwewe mu ngubo yewe. Ne nga akurusia enje, kwaba kwanyoolile bulwaale bwe kamakele. Kwaba kumuwaanga nga kamaarara.
Nio Wele aaloma ali, “Kobosia kumukhono kwowo mu ngubo yowo.” Musa akobosia kumukhono kwewe mu ngubo. Ne nga akurusiamo, siise sino kwaba kumulamu nga kumubili kwewe kwoosi.
Wele aaloma ali, “Baaba ne bakhakhusuubila namwe barekeeresia khu sikholwa sie kamayia sie khunyoa tawe, wakana banyala basuubila sie khabili.
Ne baaba ne bakhasuubila akhaba kamayia kabili kano namwe khu khureekeresia ewe tawe, ocha otae kameechi khukhwama mu luuchi lwa Naili mala okachukhe osi. Kameechi ako kacha khwikela kamafuki.”
Ne kakhali Musa aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese se ndi omulomalomi omulayi tawe khukhwama khale. Lundi khukhwama nga orakikhe khulomaloma khwise se ndomaloma bulayi tawe. Ese ndi owikhoyoola mu khulomaloma lundi owe siilimi. Okhanduma ese tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amureeba ali, “Naanu owakhola kumunwa kwo omundu? Naanu omuaandia lulimi? Naanu omuminyaasia? Naanu omukhola abona, namwe aamubofusia? Se ndi ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe ku?
Nono, khoche, ndakhuboolela niko olomaloma.”
Ne kakhali Musa aamukobosia ali, “Tawe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nosiima ruma omundu okundi.”
Abweene ao Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalalila Musa mala aaloma ali, “Ne wandaayo Aruni, Omulawi se aliio? Manyile ndi anyala alomaloma bulayi. Ne lola alikho echa khukhwakaanana nawe. Ne alakhubona ewe alekhoya.
Olamukachulila mala omuboolele niko aloma. Nja khumuyeeta mwembi khulomaloma, lundi nja khumuboolela mwembi niko mulakhola.
Acha khuba omulomalomi wowo mala akhulomalomele khu baandu. Khwako akhabe nga wele khu niye, ne omuboolela niko alomaloma.
Bukula esiimbo yino, mala okirumikhire khukhola kamayia.”
Nio Musa aakobola owa Yetiro, raraawe omukhwe, mala aamuboolela ali, “Nosiima ndekhe ngobole khu balebe base baali e Misiri mbabone baaba ne bali balamu.” Yetiro aamukobosia ali, “Cha mu muleembe.”
Musa ne asiili mu Midiani, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela ali, “Kobola e Misiri sikila babaandu boosi babenyanga khukhwira ewe baafwa.”
Musa abukula omukhasi wewe ne babaana bewe mala abara khu punda mala aarakikha lukeendo lwewe lwe khukobola e Misiri. Asuta esiimbo eya Wele mukhono mwewe.
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Ne okobola e Misiri, khaka nga onyala okhole kamayia koosi niko khuelesie bunyali khukhola ebweeni wa Farao owa Misiri. Ne ndakhola kumwoyo kulume nio akhafukiilila babaandu bache tawe.
Boolela Farao oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aloma ali, ‘Isiraeli ali omwana wase omubele.
Ne khuboolela ndi lekha omwana wase ache anjisaaye. Ne oloba khumulekhuula ache, luno enja khwira omwana wowo omubele owe sisoleeli.’ ”
Abuundu niio bakona ne bali khu lukeendo lwe khucha e Misiri, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakaanana ne Musa mala enya khumwiira.
Nio Sipora aabukula libaale liliooki akhala lifuunga lio mwana wewe, mala alitiisia khu bikele
Sipora aloma ali, “Ng'ali ewe oli omuseecha owe kamafuki khwise.” Aloma ario sikila siikhebo. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekha khumwiira.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aruni ali, “Khoche mu sichiimi wakaanane ne Musa.” Aruni acha, aamwakaanana a sikulu sitakatifu, mala aamwikwayila.
Nio Musa aboolela Aruni kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuruma khukhola ne kamayia koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamulaka khukhola.
Musa ne Aruni bacha babuusia alala basaakhulu be Baisiraeli boosi e Misiri.
Aruni aaloma kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa. Ne Musa aakhola kamayia ebweeni we babaandu.
Babaandu basuubila. Ne nga baulila bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abakholeele siisa mala abone butinyu bwabwe, benamia asi kimirwe kiabwe mala besaaya.

Enyuma wako, Musa ne Aruni bacha khu Farao owa Misiri mala bamuboolela bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe Baisiraeli aloma ali, ‘Lekha babaandu base bache, bakholele ese naikara mu sichiimi.’ ”
Ne kakhali Farao owe Misiri areeba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye naanu niye khoyela muulile nio endekhe Baisiraeli bache? Se emanyile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Ne lundi kakhaba kario se nja khulekhuula Baisiraeli bache tawe.”
Musa ne Aruni bamukobosia bali, “Wele owe Baeburania akhubonekheele efwe. Khu khusaba, khufukiilile khuche lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru mu sichiimi mala khuaane embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Ne khukhakhola khurio tawe, acha khukhwira ne lufu namwe liie.”
Ne kakhali omwami owa Misiri aareeba Musa ne Aruni ali, “Siina sikila ne murusia babaandu khu milimo kiabwe? Kobola khu milimo kienywe!
Lola Baeburania babeele bakali mala luno mwenya khubakhola balekhe khukhola kimilimo!”
Endaalo eyo ne ng'ene Farao arusia lilaka khu ba bakhosianga banasioobi kimilimo ne babemeelesi. Aaloma ali,
“Mukhaelesiakho babaandu bunyaasi bwe khukholela kamatifari nga mwakholilenge tawe. Khukhwama luno babeene bache beyiimile.
Ne kakhali bakhoya baape kamatifari kamakali nga niko bapaanga. Mukhabuboombiakho tawe. Sikila Baisiraeli bali bakara, liakilile balikho balila bali, ‘Khulekhe khuche khuaane chimbosio khu Wele wefwe chimbosio.’
Baelesie kimilimo kimisiro, nio balekhe khurekeeresia kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi.”
Ba bakhosianga banasioobi kimilimo ne babemeelesi barura enje mala baboolela Baisiraeli bali, “Farao alomile ali se acha khumuelesia bunyaasi lundi tawe.
Ali mukhoya mwabeene muche mulole osi osi niio mubunyoola lundi mukhoya murusie kamatifari kamakali nga khale.”
Babaandu basalasala mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi ne bayiima bunyaasi.
Ba bakhosianga banasioobi kimilimo ba bayuyuukhasia ne baloma bali, “Maliila kimilimo kienywe kia buli ndaalo nga mwakholilenge ne muli ne bunyaasi.”
Bamisiri ba bakhosianga banasioobi kimilimo, baapa babemeelesi Baisiraeli, nibo barakho khukhwimeelela Baisiraeli khukhola kimilimo. Babareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne mukhakhola kamatifari kamakali nga niko mwakholilenge anyuma ao tawe?”
Nio babemeelesi Baisiraeli bacha khu Farao mala beloocha bali, “Siina sikila ne okhukholela kano?
Se khulikho khunyoola bunyaasi tawe. Ne kakhaba kario bakhuboolela bali khukhole kamatifari! Ne luno khulikho khupwa, mala babaandu bowo babeene nibo babekhiikhile.”
Farao aabakobosia ali, “Enywe muli bakara lukali, mala liliene elio liakilile mulikho muloma muli ‘Khulekhe khuche khuaane embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’
Cha mala mukhole kimilimo! Se mucha khunyoolakho bunyaasi bwosi bwosi tawe. Ne kakhaba kario khola kamatifari kamakali nga niko mukholanga.”
Babemeelesi be babaandu ba Isiraeli bamanya bali bali mu butinyu bukali. Bamanya bario sikila benyekhana bakhole kamatifari kamakali nga buli endaalo.
Nga baba ne balikho barekukha khukhwama wa Farao, bakaanana Musa ne Aruni, ba baliindile.
Baboolela Musa ne Aruni bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboone niko mukholile mala alamuukuuma enywe sikila mwakilile Farao owa Misiri ne bakholi bewe bakhubiile efwe. Mwakilile benya khukhwiira efwe.”
Nio Musa aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siina sikila nokholela babaandu bowo kamabi? Siina sikila ne wanduma ese?
Sikila khukhwama nga necha khu Farao khumuboolela niko wanduma, Farao aabakholeele bukuluumi ne ewe se wabayeetilekho tawe!”

Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Luno olabona niko ndakhola khu Farao. Enja khurumikhira kamaani kaase kamakali khu niye. Lino lilakila atimanie babaandu bano barure mu sibala siewe khangu.”
Nabonekhela Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo nga Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi. Ne kakhali se nebuula khu nibo ndi lisina liase lili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Lundi nakhola endakaano yase nabo khubaelesia sibala sia Kanaani, mu sibala nisio bamenyamo nga bakwa.
Khutasa khwako, nauliile khulila khwe Baisiraeli, nibo Bamisiri bara mu bunasioobi, lundi nakhebuliile endakaano yase.
Nono boolela Baisiraeli oli, ‘Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nja khumurusia enywe khukhwama khu milimo kimisiro nikio Bamisiri bamurakho. Enja khumuonia khukhwama mu bunasioobi. Lundi enja khumusikula enywe khulwe kamaani kase nende khulwe khukhalakila Bamisiri.
Enja khumubukula nga babaandu base babeene, lundi ndaba Wele wenywe. Nio mulamanya muli ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamurusia khukhwama mu bunasioobi mu Misiri.
Nja khumuelesia enywe sibala nisio nelakana khuelesia Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo. Ne nja khumusielesia enywe nga kimiaandu kienywe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Musa aaboolela kano Baisiraeli, ne se bamurekeeresia tawe, sikila kimiooyo kiabwe kiaba kiafuuniikhe khulwe bukuulumi bwe bunasioobi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Cha oboolele Farao omwami owa Misiri alekhuule Baisiraeli barure mu sibala siewe.”
Ne kakhali Musa aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Kaaba bali Baisiraeli se bandekeeresia tawe, kalaba kariena nio Farao omwami owa Misiri andekeeresie ese? Ese ndi omundu okhamanyile khulomaloma bulayi tawe.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma khu Musa ne Aruni mala abaelesia lilaka khu Baisiraeli ne Farao. Alaka Musa ne Aruni khurusia Baisiraeli khukhwama e Misiri.
Rubeni, okhwa Yakobo omubele aba ne babaana bane basoleeli: Anoki, Palu, Hesironi ne Karimi. Baba bakuuka be chikholo chichalangilwa khu masina kabwe.
Simoni aba ne babaana basoleeli sita: Yemueli, Yamini, Ohati, Yakini, Soari ne Saulo. Saulo aba omwana owo mukhaana mukanaani. Baba bakuuka be chikholo chichalangilwa khu masina kabwe.
Lawi aba ne babaana basoleeli bataru: Kerishoni, Koati, ne Merari. Baba bakuuka be chikholo chichalangilwa khu masina kabwe. Lawi amenya ambi kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru ne saba.
Ba okhwa Kerishoni baba babili: Libini ne Shimei. Baba baakuka be chikholo chabwe.
Ba okhwa Koati baba bane: Amuramu, Ishihari, Heburoni, ne Usieli. Koati amenya embi kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru ne kitaru.
Ba okhwa Merari baba babaana basoleeli babili: Mayili ne Musiyi. Chino nicho chinju cha Lawi khuloondekhana ne lisaaye liabwe.
Amuramu akhwa sengeewe Yakobeti, omukooko owa raraawe. Amusaalamo Aruni ne Musa. Amuramu amenya kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru ne saba.
Ba okhwa Ishihari baba bataru: Kora, Nefeki, ne Sikiri.
Ba okhwa Usieli baba Mishaeli, Elisafani, ne Sitiri.
Aruni akhwa Elisieba, omukhaana owa Aminatabu, lundi omukooko owa Nasioni. Elisieba asaalila Aruni Natabu, Abiiu, Eliesa, ne Itamari.
Ba okhwa Kora baba bataru: Asiri, Elikana, ne Abiasafu. Baba bakuuka be chinju che luuya lwa Kora.
Eliesa okhwa Aruni akhwa omukhaana owa Putieli, mala amusaalila Fineasi. Bano nibo babemeelesi be kholo eya Lawi ne kimiliango kiabwe ne chinju chabwe.
Aruni ne Musa bali nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela ali, “Yimeelela chikholo cha Isiraeli chirure mu Misiri.”
Nibo ba baboolela Farao owe Misiri bali alekhuule Baisiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma ne Musa mu sibala sie Misiri.
Aloma ali, “Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Boolela Farao omwami owa Misiri buli siindu nisio khuboolela.”
Ne kakhali Musa aboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ewe omanyile oli, ese ndi ne siilimi. Farao kane aambulile ariena?”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Lola, nakhukholile ewe nga wele khu Farao. Ne wandaayo Aruni acha khuba nga Omung'oosi khwiwe.
Boolela Aruni buli siindu nisio khulaka, mala niye aboolele Farao alekhuule Baisiraeli barure mu sibala siewe.
Ne kakhali enja khulumia kumwoyo kwa Farao. Akhaba ne ndakhola bimanyisio ne bie khuukia bikali mu Misiri,
Farao se acha khumuulila enywe tawe. Nio ndeere siiukuumo sikali khu Misiri mala ndangirire chikholo che babaandu base barure mu sibala.
Ne Bamisiri bacha khumanya bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga ndabaelesia siiukuumo mala ndusie Baisiraeli mu sibala siabwe.”
Musa ne Aruni bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabalaka.
Mu siise nisio baboolelamo Farao, Musa aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane. Ne Aruni aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane na kitaru.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Farao ne aloma ali, ‘Yimanyisia mwabeene khulwe khukhola kamayia,’ boolela Aruni abukule esiimbo yewe, mala akimwaate asi ebweeni wa Farao, echa khwikela endemu.”
Nio Musa ne Aruni bacha khu Farao mala bakhola nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabalaka. Aruni amwaata esiimbo yewe asi ebweeni wa Farao ne bakholi bewe mala yekela endemu.
Nio Farao alaanga babaandu bakesi ne balakusi ne bafumu be Misiri, mala bosi bakhola kamayia kaabwe bario.
Bamwaata asi chisiimbo chabwe, mala chekela chindemu. Ne kakhali esiimbo eya Aruni yamila chichaabwe.
Kakhaba kario, kumwoyo kwa Farao kwaluma, ne se aulila Musa ne Aruni tawe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne alomile.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Kumwoyo kwa Farao kwalumile. Alobile khulekha babaandu bache.
Cha mutikhinyi omwakaanane ne alikho ekha e luuchi lwa Naili. Bukula esiimbo eyekela endemu, mala omuliindiilile khu sikiingi sie luluuchi.
Olaboolela Farao oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baeburania, aandumire khwiwe khuboolele, olekhuule babaandu bewe bache, nio bamusaayile mu sichiimi. Ne lola khukhwola luno, se wariire tawe.
Luno, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lino lilakila omanye oli ese niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi’, enja khupila esiimbo kameechi ke mu luuchi lwa Naili, mala kameechi kacha khwikela kamafuki.
‘Ching'eeni mu luuchi lwa Naili chiicha khufwa ne luluuchi lucha khuunya bubolo bukali. Bamisiri se bacha khunyala khulunywamo tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Boolela Aruni abukule esiimbo yewe mala akiekesielele khu njichi chabwe choosi, ne kameechi ke mumiliinda, ne chisebele chabwe choosi ne kameechi ke mu matiisi nio keekele kamafuki. Ne kamafuki kacha khuba khu sibala sioosi sie Misiri, mu njelo ne mu chinyuungu.”
Nio Musa ne Aruni bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abalaka. Ebweeni owa Farao ne bakholi bewe, Aruni aasuta esiimbo yewe aapa khu meechi ka Naili, mala kameechi kamwo koosi keekela kamafuki.
Ching'eeni che mu luuchi chafwa, mala lwaunya bubi lukali. Liakila Bamisiri khulunywamo tawe. Kamafuki kasalaasala buli abuundu mu Misiri.
Ne kakhali be kamaya be mu Misiri bakhola bulayi bwene nga Musa ne Aruni bakhola. Nio Farao alumia kumwoyo kwewe nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma.
Farao engila munju yewe, ne se enaana khukanakana likhuwa lino tawe.
Bamisiri boosi bayaba khundulo khwe luluuchi lwa Naili banyoole kameechi ke khunywa, sikila se banyala khunywa kameechi ke mu luuchi tawe.
Chindaalo saba enyuma wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukaluukhasia kameechi ka Naili chabira.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Cha khu Farao mala omuboolele oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali ‘Lekha babaandu base bache, nio basaaye ese.
Ne kakhali waaba ne oloba khubafukiilila bache, nja khu khusindikhila butinyu bwe chikhele mu sibala siowo sioosi.
Luluuchi lwa Naili lucha khwichula chikhele, chiicha khururamo mala chingile munju mwowo ne mu lusiro nimwo okona, khu sitanda siowo, ne munju che bakholi bowo nende che babaandu bowo. Lundi chiicha khwingila mu mayika kowo ne mu bibuumba bie khung'oonelamo kimikaati.
Chiicha khusuna khwiwe, khu baandu bowo, ne khu bakholi bowo boosi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Boolela Aruni abukule esiimbo yewe akiekesielele khu njichi, khu miliinda kie kameechi, ne khu matiisi, nio akhole chikhele chirure chiiche mu sibala sia Misiri.”
Kwako Aruni ekesielelela kumukhono kwewe ne esiimbo yewe khu meechi ka Misiri. Aakhola chikhele charura mala chechula mu sibala.
Ne kakhali bafumu ba Misiri bakhola kamayia kabwe nga ka Musa ne Aruni, mala bosi bakhola chikhele checha khu sibala sia Misiri.
Farao aalaanga Musa ne Aruni mala aloma ali, “Saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andusieo chikhele ne khu baandu base, mala ndalekhuula babaandu bowo bache, nio baane chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Musa aakobosia Farao ali, “Rekekha siise nisio khusabila ewe, bakholi bowo, ne babaandu bowo. Nio chikhele chirure mwinywe ne munju chenywe mala chirame mu luuchi lwa Naili.”
Farao amukobosia ali, “Sabile muchuli.”
Musa aaloma ali, “Ndakhola nga nilwo osaba. Nio omanye oli se aliio Wele okundi oli nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe tawe.
Chikhele chiicha khurusibwa mwinywe ne munju chenywe, khu bakholi benywe, ne babaandu benywe, mala chirame mu luuchi lwa Naili mwong'ene.”
Nio Musa ne Aruni balekha Farao, mala Musa asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khurusiao chikhele khuloondekhana nga aaba ne afukiilisiane ne Farao.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola nga Musa ne asaba. Chikhele che mu chinju chafwa, che mu chingo, ne che mumikuunda.
Bamisiri bachibungikha mu bituumi bikali, mala sibala siaunya bubolo.
Ne kakhali Farao nga abona ali banyoolile siiuluukho, alumia kumwoyo kwewe lundi, nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Boolela Aruni ape lipukhuulu ne esiimbo yewe. Mu sibala sioosi sia Misiri lipukhuulu lilekela chiinda.”
Khwako bakhola bario: Aruni aapa lipukhuulu ne esiimbo yewe. Nio lipukhuulu lioosi mu Misiri liekela chiinda. Mu Misiri mwoosi lipukhuulu liakaluukhana liekela chiinda. Chiinda echo chaniina khu buli mundu ne buli saang'i.
Bafumu bakhaka khurumikhira kamaya kabwe khukhola chiinda chibonekhe, mala bakhilwa. Nio chiinda chaba khu buli mundu nende khu buli saang'i.
Nio be kamaya baboolela Farao bali, “Wele niye okholile kano.” Ne kakhali Farao alumia kumwoyo ne se abaulila tawe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Yinyokha muchuli mu makhelebeende mala olindiilile Farao, ne alikho arura ne acha eluuchi. Muboolele oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lekha babaandu base bache, nio basaaye ese.
Ne waaba ne oloba khufukiilila babaandu base bache, lola, enja khu khurumira ewe chiisi chingali ne khu bakholi bowo, ne khu baandu bowo, ne munju chenywe. Ne chinju che Bamisiri chiicha khwichula chiisi. Ne sibala sioosi silifuunikhwa nacho.
Ne kakhali mu ndaalo ng'eneyo nja khwaula kamaloba ka Kosieni, niio babaandu base bamenyile, nio chiisi chikhabayo tawe, nio omanye oli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli khu liloba.
Khwako ndarao lulwaakha
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario. Chiisi chingali checha munju mwa Farao ne munju che bakholi bewe. Sibala sioosi sia Misiri siabunisibwa sikila chiisi.
Nio Farao alaanga Musa ne Aruni mala aloma ali, “Khemuche muaane chimbosio khu Wele wenywe mu sibala sino.”
Musa aamukobosia ali, “Se khukhoyeele khukhola khurio tawe, sikila khucha khuaana chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe nicho Bamisiri bakhenyanga tawe. Khwaaba ne khuaana chimbosio chisinyisia Bamisiri, se bacha khu khupa efwe kamabaale bakhwiire?
“Khukhoyeele khuche lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru mu sichiimi mala khuaane chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe khuloondekhana nga ne acha khu khulaka efwe.”
Farao aaloma ali, “Ndamulekhuula muche muaane chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu sichiimi. Ne kakhali mukhacha aleeyi tawe. Khe musabile ese seesi.”
Nio Musa aaloma ali, “Nga ne nja khu khururao ndi, ndasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio chiisi chikhururekho, ne khu bakholi bowo, ne khukhwama mu baandu bowo, muchuli. Ne kakhali lundi okhakhola bubeeyi khulwe khulekha khufukiilila babaandu bache khuaana chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
Nio Musa alekha Farao mala acha aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola nga Musa aasaba, mala aarusia chiisi khu Farao, khu bakholi bewe, ne khukhwama mu baandu bewe. Mbao akhaba ndala eya sikala tawe.
Ne kakhali Farao alumia kumwoyo kwewe akhaba mu siise sino siosi. Se aafukiilila babaandu bacha tawe.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Khoche khu Farao mala omuboolele oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baeburania, aloma ali, ‘Lekha babaandu base bache, nio basaaye ese.
Sikila waaba ne oloba khubafukiilila bache mala ochiililile khubakhosia kimilimo,
ndakhureerera kumunaanio kwe lufu lurafu khu bibaywa biowo, chifarasi, chipunda, chingamia, chikhaafu, kamakheese ne chimbusi.
Ne kakhali ndarao lulwaakha akari we bibaywa bie Baisiraeli nende bie Bamisiri. Ne mbao sibaywa akhaba silala sie Baisiraeli siicha khufwa tawe.
Nerekeekhe muchuli siise nga sino siri nisio khakholelekho kano.’ ”
Oli bwasia, endaalo eyaloondakho, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola nga aaloma, mala bibaywa bioosi bie Bamisiri biaafwa. Ne mbao sibaywa akhaba silala sie Baisiraeli sisiafwa tawe.
Farao arumania bareeberesie kakekholeekhe khu bibaywa bie Baisiraeli. Aaboolelwa ali mbao sibaywa akhaba silala sie Baisiraeli sisiaba ne sifwiile tawe. Ne kakhali Farao alumia kumwoyo ne se alekhuula babaandu bacha tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ne Aruni ali, “Bukula chifuusi che likokhe khukhwama mu siooso. Lekha Musa aliiaanye mu ngaaki ebweeni wa Farao.
Licha khwikela lipukhuulu linosie khu sibala sie Misiri sioosi. Lipukhuulu lino lilareera kamabiimba kaakhekhole kamakoonjo khu baandu, khu saang'i ne khu bibaywa mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi.”
Nio babukula likokhe khukhwama mu siooso, mala beema ebweeni wa Farao. Musa aliiaanya mu ngaaki. Liekela kamabiimba kakeekhola kamakoonjo khu baandu, khu saang'i ne khu bibaywa.
Be kamaya se banyala khukhwima ebweeni wa Musa tawe, sikila bosi baba ne kamabiimba nga Bamisiri babaandi boosi.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalumia kumwoyo kwa Farao mala Farao khurekeeresia Musa ne Aruni tawe. Se abarekeeresia tawe bulayi bwene nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aboolela Musa.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Yinyokha muchuli makhelebeende wime ebweeni wa Farao, mala omuboolele oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baeburania, aloma ali, ‘Lekha babaandu base bache, nio basaaye ese.
Siise sino ndaruma butinyu bukali khwiwe ne khu bakholi ne khu baandu bowo nio omanye oli mbao akhaba mulala oli nga ese mu sibala sioosi tawe.
Khukhwola siise sino andi narumikhira kamaani kaase nakhureerera ewe ne babaandu bowo lufu nakhurusiao khu sibala.
Ne kakhali khulwe sifuno sino nakhulekha omenye nio khwekesie kamaani kaase mala lisina liase lifume mu sibala sioosi.
Osiili ne sileka lundi se wenya olekhuule babaandu base bache tawe.
Lola, muchuli siise nga sino siri ndakhola kamaarara kamasiro kakwe. Kamaarara nga ako kario kakhakwakho mu Misiri, khukhwama endaalo niio sibala sianyoola bubwami khukhwola luno tawe.
Khwako, luno, rumania mala obuusie chikhaafu ne bibiaayo biowo bioosi nibio oli nabio biili mu maayilwe. Biyile abuundu alayi niio bieyikama. Khola orio sikila kamaarara kacha khukwa khu buli mundu ne khu bibaywa biili mu ndaa, mala bicha khufwa bioosi.’ ”
Balala khu bakholi ba Farao baria niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma. Lino liakila balootia banasioobi babwe ne bibaywa biaabwe.
Ne kakhali abo bakhaulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe balekha banasioobi babwe ne chikhaafu chabwe mu ndaa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Suta kumukhono kwowo mu ngaaki, nio efula eye kamaarara ekwe khu sibala sia Misiri sioosi. Lundi ekwe khu baandu, khu saang'i ne khu bimelwa bioosi biili mu ndaa.”
Khwako Musa aasuta esiimbo mu ngaaki, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaruma likukuma lie efula ne kamaarara. Lueni lwameniuukha sibala sioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaruma efula eye kamaarara engali ne lueni lwachiililila khumeniuukha mu fula. Kaba kamaarara kamasiro niko sibala sia Misiri siaba siikhabonakho khukhwama nga sianyoola bubwami tawe.
Efula eye kamaarara yonaka buli sisiindu sisiaba mu ndaa mu sibala sia Misiri sioosi. Lundi yonakaka babaandu boosi ne chisaang'i ne bibiaayo. Yonaka bimelwa bioosi bibiaba mundaa ne khufuniakaka kimirongooro kioosi.
Abuundu niio kamaarara kakhaapa tawe, aba mu maloba ka Kosieni kong'ene, nimwo Baisiraeli bamenyanga.
Farao aarumania balaange Musa ne Aruni mala aababoolela ali, “Mu siise sino nakholile bubwoni, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ng'ali, ne kakhali samwene ne babaandu base se khuli ng'ali tawe.
Saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Khwanyalikhe ne likukuma lino ne kamaarara! Ndamulekhuula muche. Se muramakho ano lundi tawe.”
Musa aamuboolela ali, “Nga ne ndarura mu lukoba busa ndi, ndasuta mu ngaaki kamakhono kase mala sabe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Likukuma lie efula licha khwakama, ne kamaarara se kacha khubao lundi tawe. Nio ewe omanye oli sibala sili sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali manyile ndi ewe ne bakholi bowo mukhaba ne liria khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
(Efwamba ne shayiri bionekha, sikila eshayiri yaba yalabile, ne efwamba yaba yanile.)
Ne kakhali mbao engaanu akhaba ndala eyalala tawe, sikila niyo ekhula kalaa.
Nio Musa alekhana ne Farao owa Misiri, arura enje we lukoba, mala asuta kamakhono kewe mu ngaaki aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne libalukhaka, kamaarara, ne efula biawa.
Ne kakhali nga Farao abona ali efula ne kamaarara ne likukuma biaweele, niye ne bakholi bewe bakhola bubwoni. Mala Farao alumia kumwoyo kwewe.
Kumwoyo kwa Farao kwaluma ne se alekhuula Baisiraeli baacha tawe. Se akhola ario tawe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khubirira khu Musa.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Cha mala obonane ne Farao. Nalumiisie kumwoyo kwewe ne kimiooyo kie bakholi bewe, nio mbekesie nibo kamayia kano.
Nio nyale khuboolela babaana bowo ne babechukhulu bowo nga ne naba omurafu khu Bamisiri lundi nga ne nakhola kamayia. Nio mu manye muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Musa ne Aruni bacha khu Farao mala bamuboolela bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baeburania areeba ali, ‘Oliloba khukhwola liina khukhwiboombia ebweeni wase? Lekha babaandu base bache, nio basaaye ese.
Waaba ne oloba khulekhuula babaandu base bache, nja khureera chisike mu sibala siowo muchuli.
Chiicha khufunikhila elala sibala, se aliio okhabone liloba tawe. Chiicha khulia kamasaafu koosi ke kimirongooro kiili mu mikuunda kienywe.
Chiicha khwichula chinju chowo ne chinju che bakholi bowo boosi nende che babaandu bowo boosi. Chiicha khuba chisike chingali khukhilakho nicho paapa benywe ne bakuuka benywe babona khukhwama khu siise nisio barakikha khumenya mu sibala khukhwola luno.’ ” Nio Musa aarura niio Farao ali mala acha.
Bakholi ba Farao baboolela Farao bali, “Omundu yuno acha khu khunaania efwe khukhwola liina? Lekha Baisiraeli bache, nio basaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe. Ewe okhoola omanya oli sibala sia Misiri siabunile tawe?”
Khwako Musa ne Aruni bareerwa lundi owa Farao, mala Farao aloma ali, “Cha mala mukholele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.” Ne kakhali Farao aabareeba ali, “Naanu baalacha?”
Musa aamukobosia ali, “Khulacha ne baele befwe ne bakhulu befwe, ne babaana befwe basoleeli ne bakhaana. Lundi khulacha ne bibiaayo biefwe, sikila khwenyekhana khukholele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e naikara.”
Omwami Farao aaloma ali, “Naaba bali mulekhuula muche ne babaana benywe boosi aba ng'ali muli ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Enywe muli ne sifuno simayaanu.
Tawe! Babaandu be siseecha bong'ene banyala bacha basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila liliene elio nilio mwenya.” Musa ne Aruni baoonwa barura ebweeni wa Farao.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Kololosia kumukhono kwowo khu sibala sia Misiri nio chisike chiche. Chiicha khwicha mala chilie buli simelwa nende buli siindu nisio kamaarara kakhonakaka tawe.”
Khwako Musa aakololosia esiimbo yewe khu sibala sia Misiri, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola luucho lwama e bukwe lwaba khu sibala kumuusi okwo kwoosi ne siilo esio sioosi. Yaba oli busia luucho lwaba lwareerire chisike.
Chisike checha mu bipupu mala chaba khu sibala sioosi sia Misiri. Siaba sipupu sikali sie chisike. Sipupu nga esio sirio siaba siikhabonekhanakho ne se silibonekhakho lundi tawe.
Chisike chafuunikha liloba lioosi mala chalitiimbia tiimbo. Chalia bimelwa bioosi bibiaba khu sibala alala ne bibiaamo bie khu mirongooro bioosi nibio kamaarara kakhonakaka tawe. Mbao sisiindu siosi siosi sibisi sisiarama tawe, sibeele khu murongooro namwe khu bimelwa bie mu mikuunda, mu sibala sioosi sia Misiri.
Nio Farao aalaanga Musa ne Aruni khangu mala aloma ali, “Nakholeele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne nanywe bubwoni.
Khwako, musaba mumbeele bubwoni bwase luno lwong'ene, mala musabile ese khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe andusiekho siiukuumo sie lifwa sino.”
Musa alekha Farao mala acha asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aayuusia luucho lwe mumbo lwaba lwe kamaani lukali, lwasuta chisike mala lwachiyila chaweela mu nyanja eya Shamu. Mbao esike akhaba ndala eyarama mu sibala sia Misiri tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalumia kumwoyo kwa Farao, se aalekhuula Baisiraeli bache tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Suta kumukhono kwowo mu ngaaki, sisiilima sibeo mu sibala sia Misiri. Sisiilima sino sicha khuba sikali lukali.”
Khwako Musa asuta kumukhono kwewe mu ngaaki, mala sisiilima sikali siaaba khu sibala sia Misiri sioosi khu ndaalo chitaru.
Bamisiri se babonanakho tawe. Ne mbao akhaba mulala owarurakho munju yewe mu siise esio tawe. Ne kakhali Baisiraeli baba ne buwaanga niio bamenyanga.
Nio Farao alaanga Musa mala amuboolela ali, “Khemuche musaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Munyala mwacha akhaba ne bakhasi ne babaana benywe. Ne kakhali mulekhe bibiaayo bibe ano.”
Ne kakhali Musa amukobosia ali, “Okhoya okhulekhele bibiaayo nibio khunyala khwaanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe chimbosio ne biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Khukhoya khwacha ne chikhaafu chefwe. Se khulalekhakho akhaba ndala enyuma tawe. Khukharumikhire bilala khu biaayo bino khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Ne ne khusiili khwolayo, se khumanya biaayo siina nibio khumurusilia nga embosio tawe.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalumia Farao kumwoyo mala khubafukiilila bache tawe.
Farao aaboolela Musa ali, “Ndureo! Khaka nga ne onyala khakhubonakho lundi tawe! Endaalo niyo ndikhubonelakho, olifwa!”
Musa aamukobosia ali, “Nga ne oloma! Se olimbonakho lundi tawe.”

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, Ndaruma butinyu lulala lwong'ene khu Farao ne khu baandu bewe. Ekhumaliilikha acha khumulekhuula murekukhe muche. Nga ne akhamulekhuule, akhamutimanisilie elala.
Nono boolela Baisiraeli oli buli mundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi asabe owasie kamamili ke efwesa, nende ke esahabu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola Bamisiri baria Baisiraeli. Khutasa khwako Musa aaba omundu omukali mu sibala sia Misiri. Lundi aaba omukali ebweeni we bakholi ba Farao ne babaandu.
Nio Musa aaboolela Farao ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Kane mbirire mu sibala sia Misiri.
Buli mwana omubele mu sibala sia Misiri alafwa. Balafwa khukhwamila khu mubele owa Farao, owila khu ndebe eye bubwami, khukhwola khu mwana omubele owo omukhasi nasioobi osieela khu lususi. Akhaba chimoosi chimbele choosi chilafwa.
Ne bililo bikali bicha khuba mu sibala sia Misiri. Bililo nga ebio birio bikhabakhoo ne se biliba mu sibala sia Misiri lundi tawe.
Ne kakhali akhaba embwa yong'ene se elisamila Baisiraeli namwe bibiaayo biabwe tawe. Nio omanye oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola bubwaukhani akari we Bamisiri ne Baisiraeli.’ ”
Musa aamaliilisia ali, “Ne bakholi bowo bano boosi bakheche khwise mala banjinaamile. Balimboolela ndekukhe ne babaandu base boosi mala khuche. Enyuma wako ndirekukha.” Nio Musa alekhana ne Farao ne ali ne lirima likali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Farao se alakhurekeeresia tawe. Alaloba khu khurekeeresia nio kamayia kaase katasikhe mu sibala sia Misiri.”
Musa ne Aruni bakhola kamayia kano koosi ebweeni wa Farao. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alumia kumwoyo kwa Farao mala khufukiilila khulekhuula Baisiraeli barure mu sibala siewe tawe.

“Kumwesi kuno kulaba kumwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko khwinywe.
Boolela libuusiana lioosi lia Isiraeli muli kumwesi kuno ne kuli ekhumi, buli mundu akhoya arobore limeeme namwe embusi emeeme khulwe enju yewe.
Kaaba bali be enju yewe ne bali batiiti khulia sisiaayo sioosi, niye ne owasie banyala bakabana sisiaayo silala. Bakabane khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe babaandu ne sikelo nisio buli mulala anyala aalia.
Limeeme liseecha namwe embusi emeeme eseecha, bikhoya bibe bie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala bikhalikho ne libi liosi liosi tawe.
Mubibiikhe khukhwola endaalo eye likhumi na chine eye kumwesi kuno. Endaalo ng'ene eyo Baisiraeli boosi bakheere sisiaayo ekolooba, buli mundu munju mwewe.
Nio babukule kamalasile mala bakaanyake khu mitalaachi kibili ne khu ngaaki khwe bisiindi bie kimiliango kie chinju nicho bacha khuliilamo bibiaayo.
Bacha khwosia enyama yayo siilo esio bakilie, mala bakiliila chinyenyi chindulu ne kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe.
Mukhakilia embisi namwe endeekhe tawe. Ne kakhali kilie ne yosebwe yoosi, kumurwe, bileenge, nende bie munda biayo bioosi.
Ne mukhakilekhakho yakona khukhwola kumutikhinyi tawe. Ne yaaba ne erama mukioosie.
Mucha khukilia muri: Mube baberekeekhe, mwifware biraaro ne chisiimbo mu makhono kenywe, mala mukilie khangu. Eli Epasaka ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Sikila siilo siene esio, ndabira mu sibala sia Misiri, niire buli babele boosi be babaandu ne chisaang'i. Ne khuukuuma bawele be Bamisiri boosi. Ese endi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kamalasile khu mitalaachi kie kimiliango kalaba simanyilo khukhwekesia chinju nicho mu menyilemo. Ne mbona kamalasile, ndimubirakho ne se nja khumureerera butinyu khumubunia enywe nga ne mbukuuma sibala sia Misiri tawe.
Mukhoya mwakhebulila endaalo yino nga emboofu mala mukilinde nga endaalo eya naikara khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kikhebulile mu selukho choosi nga lilaka lia mindali.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, “Khu ndaalo saba mulalia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe. Khu ndaalo enyoa mukhoya murusie limela lioosi munju chenywe, sikila omundu yesi yesi aaba ne alia kumukaati kulimo limela mu ndaalo saba echo, acha khurusibwao mu Isiraeli.
Mu ndaalo enyoa nende eya saba, mukhoyeele mwakaanane khulwe libuusiana litakatifu. Kumulimo kwosi kwosi kukhakholwa mu ndaalo ng'enecho tawe. Ne kakhali munyala mwateekha siakhulia.
Khebulila khukhola naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe. Sikila yaba khu ndaalo yino niyo narusiliamo chikholo chenywe charura mu sibala sia Misiri. Mu biise bioosi bibiicha mukhoya mukhebulile endaalo yino nga lilaka lia mindali na mindali.
Khukhwama ekolooba we chindaalo ekhumi na chine che kumwesi kwe kunyoa khukhwola ekolooba we endaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na ndala, mukhalie kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe.
Limela likhanyolekhanakho munju chenywe khu ndaalo saba tawe, sikila omundu yesi yesi aaba ne alia siilimo limela, omundu oyo acha khurusibwa mu Isiraeli, abeele omukwa namwe Omusaalwa owe mu sibala.
Mukhaliaakho siosi siosi silimo limela tawe. Mu bumenyo bwenywe bwoosi lia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe.”
Musa aalaanga basaakhulu be Baisiraeli boosi mala ababoolela ali, “Yeroborera kamameeme ne chimbusi chimeeme khuloondekhana ne chinju chenywe mala mwiire khulwe Epasaka.
Bukula sisiaangu, mala osisiikhe mu malasile ke bibiaayo kaali mu lweelo
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabira mu Misiri khukhwira Bamisiri. Ne alabona kamalasile khu miliango, se acha khufukiilila Malaika owe lifwa engile mu nju chenywe amwire enywe tawe.
Mukhoya mukhole naikara yino nga lilaka khwinywe ne khu lisaaye lienywe mindali na mindali.
Ne nga mulingila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka khumuelesia, mukhoya mwakhola sikholwa sino.
Babaana benywe ne bamureeba bali, ‘Sikholwa sino sili ne sifuno siina?’
Mulibakobosia muli, ‘Eli embosio eye Epasaka eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila abira khunju che Baisiraeli mu Misiri, eera Bamisiri mala alekha chinju chefwe.’ ”
Baisiraeli benamia kimirwe kiabwe mala basaaya.
Nio bacha bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa ne Aruni.
Siilo esio, Farao, bakholi bewe, ne Bamisiri boosi benyokha. Bililo bikali biaba mu Misiri mwoosi sikila mbao akhaba munju ndala nimwo omundu akhafwa tawe.
Siilo esio ne sisieene Farao alaanga Musa ne Aruni mala aaboolela ali, “Yinyokha murure mu baandu base, enywe ne babaandu ba Isiraeli. Khe muche musaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne mwalomile.”
Bukula bibiaayo bienywe, nga mwaloma mala murekukhe. Sabile seesi chikhabi.
Bamisiri baba khangu khuoona Baisiraeli barure mu Misiri. Baloma bali, “Ne busa fweesi khulafwa mwaba ne mukharekukha tawe.”
Khwako, babaandu babukula sifu ne bakharaamo limela tawe, baboela bipaakhilo biabwe mu ngubo, mala babisutila khu mabeka kabwe.
Baisiraeli baba bakholile nga Musa ne ababoolela. Baba basabile bareebire Bamisiri kamamili ke esahabu ne efwesa, ne chingubo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola Bamisiri baria Baisiraeli mala baelesia Baisiraeli siosi siosi nisio basaba. Mu ngila yino Baisiraeli bayaaya kimiaandu kie Bamisiri.
Baisiraeli bakeenda khukhwama e Ramusesi khukhwola e Sukoti. Baba babaandu embi chielefu chimia sita be siseecha, ne okhabalilakho bakhasi ne babaana tawe.
Babaandu babaandi bakali bakhaaba Baisiraeli tawe ne kamakheese kamakali, chimbusi, ne chikhaafu bioosi biacha nabo.
Lundi baapa kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, khukhwama khu sifu nisio bamia e Misiri. Bakhola bario sikila barura khangu mu Misiri ne se baba ne biise bie khukhola biakhulia tawe.
Endaalo niyo kimiiko chimia chine ne kamakhumi kataru yawelamo, chikholo choosi che babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi charura e Misiri.
Siilo esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaliinda ne khubarusia mu Misiri. Nono siilo sino sisieene sili siilo nisio Baisiraeli boosi barengechanga buli mwiiko khulwe khuaana luyali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lirengecha lino lienyekha khukholwa ne chiselukho choosi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali, “Kano kali kamalaka ke Epasaka: Omukwa akhalia khu siakhulia sie Epasaka tawe.
Ne kakhali nasioobi yesi yesi niye mwakula ne chirupia anyala aaliakho enyuma we khukhebwa.
Omuuyauuyi namwe omukholi owe kumuruungo akhaliakho tawe.
Siakhulia sioosi siikhoya sialiilwa munju ndala yong'ene. Enyama yosi yosi ekharusibwa enje tawe. Namwe mukhafunakakho bikuumba bie sisiaayo tawe.
Baisiraeli boosi bakhoyeele bakhole naikara yino.
Omukeni muuyi yesi yesi ouyila mwinywe mala enya khukhola nanywe Epasaka eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhoya aakheba babaandu bewe be siseecha boosi. Enyuma wako anyala echa mala akhola Epasaka. Alibalwa nga Omuisiraeli omusaalwa. Ne omusiinde akhaliakho Epasaka eyo tawe.
Kamalaka kano kali malala busa khu Baisiraeli ne khu bakeni ba babamenyamo.”
Baisiraeli boosi bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa ne Aruni.
Endaalo eyo ne eng'ene Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aarusia Baisiraeli khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Njaulile ese babele boosi. Buli osaalwa omubele mu Baisiraeli abeele omundu namwe esaang'i bali babaase.”
Musa aaboolela babaandu ali, “Khebulila endaalo yino, endaalo niyo mwarurira e Misiri, abuundu niio mwaba banasioobi. Sikila kamaani ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko kakamurusia enywe khukhwama abuundu ano. Mukhalia kumukaati kulimo limela tawe.
Luno mu mwesi kwa Abibu mulikho murura mu Misiri.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamwolisie mu sibala sie Bakanaani, Bahiti, Baamori, Baifi, ne Bayebusi, nisio echubila bakuuka benywe khumua enywe. Sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga. Ne mwolilemo, mukhoya mwakhola naikara yino mu mweesi kuno.
Chindaalo saba mulalia kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe. Ne khu ndaalo ekhola saba naikara ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khubao.
Lia kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe mu ndaalo saba. Mukhabonekhakho ne kumukaati kulimo limela, namwe limela likhabonekhakho mwinywe mu maloba kenywe koosi tawe.
Khu ndaalo eyo oliboolela omwana wowo oli, ‘Kano koosi kekholekha sikila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakholela nga ne narura e Misiri.’
Naikara yino eliba likhebusia khwiwe nga sisiindu siboelwe khu mukhono kwowo namwe mu bweeni mwowo. Lundi naikara yino elimukhebusia khulomaloma kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila aabarusia e Misiri ne kamaani kewe kamakali.
Khwako olaloonda lilaka lino mu siise sialio sisiarebwao buli mwiiko.”
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khumureera mu maloba ke Bakanaani, niko echubila enywe ne bakuuka benywe. Ne acha khumuelesia enywe,
mukhoya mwara alubeka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bibele bioosi. Buli sibele siosi siosi sie chiuunwa sili sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne okhoya osikule buli punda embele ne limeeme. Ne okheenya khukisikula tawe, kiborore likosi lifunikhe. Okhoya wasikula buli mwana wowo omusoleeli omubele.
Biise bibiicha omwana wowo omusoleeli ne alireeba ali, sino sili ne sifuno siina? Olimukobosia oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhurusia efwe mu Misiri ne kamaani kamakali khukhwama mu banasioobi.
Nga Farao ne aluma kumwoyo aaloba khu khufukiilila efwe khuche, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eera buli sibele mu sibala sia Misiri. Eera babele be babaandu ne bibele bie chisaang'i. Esio sikila ne khuaana bibele bioosi nga chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali babaana babele khubasikula.’
Sino sicha khuba nga simanyisio khu mukhono kwowo ne khu bweeni bwowo khukhwekesia mbo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhurusia mu Misiri ne kamaani kewe kamakali.”
Nga Farao ne alekhuula babaandu bacha, Wele se afukiilila babirire khu ngila eye mu sibala sie Bafilisiti tawe, akhaba niyo ne yaba enyiimbi. Sikila Wele aloma ali, “Bakhakhola bario bakaluukhana ne babona liie, mala bakobola e Misiri tawe.”
Ne kakhali Wele aabayilila khu ngila eye mu sichiimi elola lubeka lwe Nyanja eya Shamu.
Musa aabukula kamakuumba ka Yosefu acha nako. Yosefu aba aakhola Baisiraeli bechuba. Aaloma ali, “Wele alibakhebulila, ne mukhoya musute kamakuumba kaase khukhwama abuundu ano.”
Baisiraeli ne bama e Sukoti bacha Etamu, khu ndulo khwe sichiimi.
Kumuusi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabarangirira ne njeko eye lifuumbi khubekesia engila, ne siilo aabarangirira ne njeko eye kumulilo khubawa buwaanga, nio banyale khukeenda siilo ne kumuusi.
Enjeko eye lifuumbi yaba buli lwosi ebweeni we babaandu kumuusi, ne enjeko eye kumulilo siilo.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Baisiraeli bakoboleyo mala bape ekambi ebweeni wa Pi-hairoti, akari wa Mikitoli ne nyanja eya Shamu. Bakhoya bape ekambi ebweeni wa Baali-sefoni.
Farao acha khwibaasia ali Baisiraeli balikho babubuukila mu sibala lundi ali sichiimi siabakhingiliile.
