Ndalumia kumwoyo kwa Farao ne acha khubaloondakho. Ne liula liase khu Farao ne banamae bewe boosi licha khundeerera ese efuma. Nio Bamisiri bacha khumanya bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Mala Baisiraeli bakhola bario.
Nga omwami owa Misiri ne aboolelwa ali babaandu beluukhe, niye ne bakholi bewe bakaluukhasia chinganakani chabwe baloma bali, “Siina nisio khukholile sino? Khwalekhile Baisiraeli bachiile. Khwatibiisie bakholi befwe.”
Nio Farao aarekekha likaari liewe lie liie. Aabukula banamae bewe alala ne naye.
Lundi aabukula kamakaari ke liie chimia sita kakaroborwa, ne kamakaari kakaandi koosi ke sibala sia Misiri alala ne banamae bakhulu buli khu likaari.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alumia kumwoyo kwa Farao omwami owa Misiri, mala Farao atima khu Baisiraeli. Ne kakhali Baisiraeli barekukha ne bakheembeelelakho tawe.
Banamae be sibala sia Misiri boosi alala ne chifarasi, ne kamakaari, kabwe batima khu Baisiraeli mala ba banyoola embi ne nyanja eya Shamu a Pi-hairoti ebweeni wa Baali-sefoni. Baba bapile abwenao ekambi.
Baisiraeli nga babona Farao ne banamae bewe ne balikho becha baria lukali mala balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete.
Baboolela Musa bali, “Abeele biliindwa mu Misiri se bilimo tawe sikila ne wakhurusiisieyo khufwiile mu sichiimi? Siina nisio okhukholeele sino khulwe khu khurusia efwe mu Misiri?
Se kali kano niko khwakhuboolela ne khuli mu Misiri khuli khulekhe busa mala khuchiililile khuba banasioobi be Bamisiri? Bwakhabeele bulayikho khuba banasioobi ebweeneyo khukhila khufwila mu sichiimi muno.”
Ne Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Mukharia tawe! Yiima busa, ne kane mubone buonia nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khumuelesia enywe luno. Bamisiri nibo mubona bano se mucha khubabona lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khumupanila, ne mukhoya musile busa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba Musa ali, “Siina ne undilila? Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli bachiililile ebweeni ne lukeendo.
Suta angaaki esiimbo yowo, mala okiekesielele khu nyanja okabukhasiemo kameechi, nio Baisiraeli bambukhile khu liloba liliomu mu nyanja.
Ne nja khukhola kimiooyo kie Bamisiri kilume nio bamuloondekho mu nyanja. Ne nja khunyoola efuma sikila Farao ne banamae bewe boosi, kamakaari kewe, ne babaandu bewe batimia chifarasi.
Ne malile ndio, Bamisiri balimanya bali, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Malaika owa Wele, owaba ebweeni we banamae ba Isiraeli, aakobola enyuma. Enjeko eye lifuumbi yosi yakobola enyuma wabwe yaba
akari we Bamisiri ne Baisiraeli. Lifuumbi liareera sisiilima khu Bamisiri. Ne kakhali liakhosiela Baisiraeli. Banamae be Bamisiri se banyala khukhwimbiya Baisiraeli tawe.
Musa aakololosia kumukhono kwewe khu nyanja, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi auucha ekhuungu esiro eye ebukwe siilo sioosi. Ekhuungu eyo yakhola engila enyomu yabonekhana mu nyanja, ne kameechi kakabukhanamo.
Baisiraeli bambukhila khu liloba libalakafu, batikiywa chimbeka chombi ne kamasiisi ke kameechi.
Bamisiri baabatimakho mala bengila mu nyanja ne chifarasi chabwe, kamakaari nende batimia chifarasi.
Oli makhelebeende, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalola banamae be Bamisiri asi khubirira munjeko eye kumulilo ne lifuumbi mala abakoyania.
Akhola kimikuu kie kamakaari kiaanda. Nio Bamisiri baloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho apanila Baisiraeli khukhuula efwe. Lekha khwilukhe!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Kololosia kumukhono kwowo khu nyanja, nio kameechi kakobole khu Bamisiri, khu makaari kabwe ne khu batimia chifarasi babwe.”
Khwako Musa aakololosia kumukhono kwewe khu nyanja. Oli bwasia, kameechi kelao mu bweyaangu bwako. Bamisiri bakhaka khukhwibacha kameechi. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia Bamisiri mu nyanja.
Kameechi kakobola mala kafuunikha kamakaari, batimia chifarasi, ne banamae boosi be Bamisiri ba baba ne baloondile khu Baisiraeli mu nyanja. Mbao akhaba mulala khu nibo owarama tawe.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli bakeenda khu liloba liliomu ne batikiiywe chimbeka chombi ne kamasiisi kabili ke kameechi.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaonia Baisiraeli khukhwama khu Bamisiri endaalo ng'eneyo. Baisiraeli babona Bamisiri bafwiile, bali khu sikingiki sie nyanja.
Nga Baisiraeli ne babona kumulimo kumuboofu nikwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola khu Bamisiri, bamuria mala bamusuubila niye ne omukholi wewe Musa.

“Ndembela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila aanyolile bukhili mu luyali,
efarasi no mundu ookitimia,
abimwaatile mu nyanja.
Abeele buonia bwase.
Yuno ali Wele wase, khamufumie.
Wele owa paapa wase, khamuelesie luyali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omunamae.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili lisina liewe.
“Kamakaari ke liie ka Farao ne banamae bewe,
amwaata mu nyanja.
Ne banamae bewe bakhulu balayi,
besiikhile mu nyanja eya Shamu.
Kameechi kakechuule kabafuuma,
besiikha mu lusiba nga libaale.
“Kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
kuli ne kamaani.
Kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
kuula omusiku.
Mu bukali bwe kamaani kowo,
oula basiku bowo,
ewe orumanga lirima liowo,
liboosia nga kumulilo ne kwosia lukhaanja.
Khulwe khufua kumuuya khwowo,
kameechi kebuusia alala,
enyanja yebuusia alala mu situumi,
kameechi ke lusiba kaandalala asi we enyanja.
Omusiku aloma ali, Ndabatimakho mbanyoole.
Ndakabaniamo kimiaandu kiabwe,
mala mbukule bioosi nibio nenya.
Ndachoola embalu yase, mala mbabunie.
Ewe wakhola embeo yowo yaucha,
mala enyanja yabafuuma,
besiikha nga sibia mu meechi kamakali.
“Naanu mu bawele ooli nga ewe, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Naanu ooli nga ewe,
ooli omutakatifu lukali,
onyala aakhola bikholwa bie khuukia ne kamayia?
Ewe wasuta kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha,
mala liloba liabamila.
Warangiriire babaandu nibo wasikula,
mu busiime bukhawa tawe.
Wabarangirira ne kamaani kowo,
khukhwola mu maloba kowo kamatakatifu.
Babaandu be chikholo bauliile,
ne balikho barenga.
Bireengo biaamba Bafilisiti.
Babemeelesi ba Edomu barangaraarwe.
Babemeelesi ba Moabu, literema liabaambile.
Bamenywa ba Kanaani boosi bafwiile kumwoyo.
Literema ne buuri biabechilekho,
khulwe kamaani kowo,
basilile busa nga libaale,
khukhwola nga babaandu bowo nibo wakula,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne babira.
Okhabengisie, mala obabiaale khu sikulu siowo sisieene,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, abuundu niio warobora omenyeo,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Abuundu Atakatifu niio wamweene wombakha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamiie mindali na mindali.”
Baisiraeli bambukha enyanja khu liloba liliomu. Ne kakhali nga kamakaari ne chifarasi cha Farao ne bachitimia bengilamo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakobosia kameechi, mala kabafuuma.
Nio Omung'oosi Miriamu, Omukooko owa Aruni, aabukula etamburini yewe, mala bakhasi boosi bamuloondakho, baapa chitamburini ne khukhina.
Miriamu abembela ali,
“Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila aniinisiibwe mu luyali,
amwaatile mu nyanja chifarasi nende bachitimia.”
Nio Musa arangirira Baisiraeli khukhwama khu nyanja eya Shamu bacha mu sichiimi sia Siuri. Bakeenda mu sichiimi khu ndaalo chitaru ne se banyoolakho kameechi tawe.
Nio boola abuundu alaangwa bali Mara. Ne kameechi ke ebweeneyo kaba kamalulu. Khwako se banyala khukanywa tawe. Esio siakila balaanga abuundu ao bali Mara
Babaandu belung'unya khu Musa ne bamureeba bali, “Khucha khunywa siina?”
Musa aalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwekesia sitonyi sie kumurongooro. Musa asimwaata mu meechi, mala kameechi kaaba kamalayi khulwe khunywa. Ebweeneyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia kamalaka ke khumenya mala abakhaka. Aaloma ali,
“Mwaaba ne mundiira elala mala mukhole kaali ka ng'ali ebweeni wase ne muliinda kamalaka kase, se nja khumureererakho enywe bulwaale nibwo nareerera Bamisiri tawe. Khakhole ndio sikila Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omuonia wenywe khukhwama khu bulwaale bwenywe.”
Nio boola e Elimu, niio chisebele che kameechi ekhumi na chibili chaba ne kimirongooro kie kamakheendu kamakhumi saba. Bapa ekambi a meechi ao.

Baisiraeli bama e Elimu, mala boosi bacha mu sichiimi sia Sini siili akari wa Elimu ne Sinai. Eyo yaba endaalo eye likhumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kwe khabili khukhwama nga ne barura e Misiri.
Baisiraeli boosi beng'ulung'unya khu Musa ne Aruni mu sichiimi.
Baboolela Musa ne Aruni bali, “Andi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhwiirira mu sibala sie Misiri. Ebweeneyo abeele khwikhala ne khulia biuumbu bie chinyama ne kimikaati. Enywe mwakhureerire efwe mu sichiimi muno nio mukhwiire fweesi ne enjala?”
Khu ndaalo ekhola sita berekekhe nibio bacha khwangala, mala bicha khuba bikali khukhwola khabili khukhilakho nibio bangalaanga buli ndaalo.”
Khwako Musa ne Aruni baboolela Baisiraeli bali, “Luno ekolooba kane mumanye muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owabarusia mu Misiri.
Kumutikhinyi mucha khubona luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sikila auliile lililung'unya lienywe khu niye. Sikila khuli naanu nio mukhwilung'unyilekho?”
Nio Musa aababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khumuelesia enyama ekolooba ne kimikaati kumutikhinyi mulie mwikure. Alakhola ario sikila auliile lililung'unya lienywe likali khu niye. Efwe khuli naanu? Liling'ulung'unya lienywe se lili khwifwe tawe, lili khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Musa aboolela Aruni ali, “Boolela libuusiana lie Baisiraeli lioosi oli, ‘yiicha siimbi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila auliile lililung'unya lienywe.’ ”
Nga Aruni ne aboolela libuusiana lie Baisiraeli lioosi, bayuukha baloleelela lubeka lwe mu sichiimi. Ne lola, luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabonekhela mu lifuumbi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Nauliile lililung'unya lie Baisiraeli. Baboolele oli, ‘Ekolooba kane mulie enyama, ne kumutikhinyi mucha khunyoola kimikaati kimikali. Nio mulamanya muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.’ ”
Ekolooba chisiindu checha mala chechula mu kambi ne kumutikhinyi luume lwabotookhelela ekambi.
Nga luume ne lwabalakala, bibiindu nga bikaati bitiiti biabonekha nga lifuro khu ngaaki khwe liloba.
Nga Baisiraeli ne babibona, se bamanya biina nibio tawe, mala bareebana bali, “Bino binaanu?” Musa aababoolela ali, “Sino sili siakhulia nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho amuelesie enywe mulie.
Lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile: ‘buli mundu khwinywe angale nibio anyala khulia. Yangala, buli mundu endubi ndala khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe babaandu mu liiema liewe.’ ”
Baisiraeli bakhola bario. Balala bangala bikali, babaandi bikeekhe.
Nga ne babikela mu ndubi, babangala bikali se baba ne bibiarama tawe, ne abo babangala bikeekhe se bataamba tawe. Buli mulala angala nibio enya.
Musa aababoolela ali, “Omundu akhalekhakho biarama khukhwola kumutikhinyi tawe.”
Ne kakhali balala se baulila Musa tawe mala balekha biakhulia biarama khukhwola kumutikhinyi. Nga bwasia biaba biechulemo chinyeende lundi biunya bubolo. Nio Musa abaambila lirima.
Buli mutikhinyi sia mulala angala bikali nga nibio anyala khulia. Ne buli nga kumuumu ne kwarafuanga, bibiarama khu liloba biayengukhanga ne biwao.
Khu ndaalo ekhola sita bangala biakhulia khukhwola khabili, chindubi chibili buli mundu. Babemeelesi boosi be libuusiana becha mala baboolela Musa niko babaandu bakholile.
Musa aababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile ali kumutikhinyi eli ndaalo eye khuola. Eli esabato endakatifu ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khupa kimikaati nikio mwenya khuupa, lundi muteekhe luno nibio mwenya khuteekha. Siosi siosi sicha khurama sikhoya sialekhwa mala siabiikhwa khulwe kumutikhinyi.”
Nono, babiikha sisiarama khukhwola endaalo eloondakho nga Musa ne abalaka. Ne se sionekha namwe siabamo chinyeende tawe.
Musa aloma ali, “Lia sino khu ndaalo yino, sikila luno eli esabato eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Luno se mucha khunyoola siosi siosi enje tawe.
Mukhoyeele mwangale biakhulia khulwe chindaalo sita, ne kakhali endaalo eya saba, eli endaalo eya sabato. Mbao siakhulia sicha khubao tawe.”
Khu ndaalo eya saba babaandu balala barura enje khukhwangala biakhulia. Ne se banyoolakho siosi tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aareeba Musa ali, “Mulaloba khuria kamalaka kaase khukhwola liina?
Lola! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuelesie enywe endaalo eye sabato. Khwako, khu ndaalo ekhola sita acha khumuelesia siakhulia simala chindaalo chibili. Buli sia mulala ekhale niio ali khu ndaalo eya saba mala akharura mungo mwewe tawe.”
Nio babaandu baola khu ndaalo eya saba.
Musa aaloma ali, “Lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile: ‘Lekha endubi ndala eya mana mubiikhe khulwe chiselukho chenywe choosi nio chibone siakhulia nisio namuelesia enywe ne muli mu sichiimi lundi nga namwamia e Misiri.’ ”
Musa aaboolela Aruni ali, “Bukula esaachi, mala oreemo endubi ndala eya mana, mala ebiikhwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe chiselukho chenywe choosi.”
Aruni akira ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano nio ebiikhwe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Baisiraeli balia mana khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane, khukhwola nga ne boola mu sibala sinyala siamenywamo. Balia mana khukhwola nga boola khu lwakha lwe sibala sia Kanaani.
(Endubi yaba sikelo silala khukhumi sie siikula).

Khwako, Baisiraeli balomania Musa ne baloma bali, “Khue kameechi khunywe.” Musa abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mundomania? Siina sikila ne mukhaka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Ne kakhali babaandu baba ne bulesia bukali bwe kameechi ebweeneyo mala belung'unya khu Musa. Baaloma bali, “Siina sikila ne wakhwamisia e Misiri khukhwiira efwe ne babaana befwe ne chikhaafu chefwe khulwe bulesia?”
Nio Musa aalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Khola ndiena babaandu bano? Bali siimbi khu khukhupa ese kamabaale.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Bukulakho basaakhulu balala Baisiraeli ne nawe, mala murangire ebweeni we babaandu. Bukula ne esiimbo niyo wapila luluuchi lwa Naili mala oche.
Lola! Ndeema ebweeni wowo khu lwanda a Sikulu sia Sinai. Olapa lulwanda mala kameechi kalatubukhakho nio babaandu banywe.” Musa aakhola ario ebweeni we basaakhulu ba Isiraeli.
Aatiuukha abuundu ao ali Masa ne Meriba.
Nio Baamaleki becha bapana ne Baisiraeli a Refidimu.
Musa aaboolela Yoshua ali, “Khuroborere babaandu mala muche mupane ne Baamaleki. Kumutikhinyi khwima khu sikulu khu ngaaki ne esiimbo eya Wele mu mukhono kwase.”
Yoshua aakhola nga Musa ne amulaka mala aacha apana ne Baamaleki. Musa, Aruni ne Huri baniina khu sikulu.
Buli lwosi nga Musa ne aasutanga kumukhono kwewe mu ngaaki, Baisiraeli bakhilanga. Ne buli lwosi nga ne ekhisianga asi kumukhono, Baamaleki bakhilanga.
Ne kakhali kamakhono ka Musa kaluilila. Nono babukula libaale bamureerera ekhalakho. Ne Aruni ne Huri basuta kamakhono kewe angaaki, mulala lubeka lulala okundi lubeka luluundi. Nono kamakhono ka Musa kaba mu ngaaki khukhwola nga enyanga ne yakwa.
Khwako Yoshua aulila elala Baamaleki.
Nio Musa ombakha alutare mala akilaanga ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ependera yase.”
Aaloma ali, “Suta angaaki ependera eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khuchiililila khu khupana ne Baamaleki mindali na mindali.”

Omusaayi owa Midiani Yetiro, paapa omukhwe owa Musa, aaulila koosi niko Wele aakholela Musa ne Baisiraeli. Aaulila nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne abarusia mu Misiri.
Nono Yetiro, paapa omukhwe owa Musa aba areera Sipora mukha Musa sikila beele Musa aamulekha ewabwe.
Sipora akobolayo ne babaana bewe babili. Mulala khu baana bewe aba bali Kerishomu,
Ne lisina lio okundi liaba bali Elieseri,
Yetiro aacha ne mukha Musa ne babaana ba Musa babili mu sichiimi niio Musa aaba ne apile ekambi a lukulu lwa Wele.
Omundu aaboolela Musa ali, “Lola, raraao alikho echa niio oli no mukhasi wowo ne babaana.”
Musa aarura acha khukhwakaanana ne raraawe omukhwe. Musa aamusikamila mala enyokha amwikwayila. Bareebana ke bulamu bwabwe nio bengila mu liiema lia Musa.
Musa aaboolela Yetiro koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akholeele Farao ne babaandu ba Misiri khulwe Baisiraeli. Lundi amuboolela akhaba ke butinyu nibwo babaandu banyoola khu ngila nende nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aabaonia.
Yetiro asangaalila kamalayi koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akholeele Isiraeli, nga ne abaonia khukhwama khu Bamisiri.
Yetiro aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele omuonisie enywe khukhwama khu Bamisiri ne khu Farao.
Luno namanyile ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omukali khukhila bawele babaandi boosi, sikila aonia Baisiraeli khukhwama khu Bamisiri babalekeelesia Baisiraeli.”
Nio Yetiro aana siianwa sie khukhwosia ne chimbosio khu Wele. Aruni aacha ne basaakhulu Baisiraeli boosi khulia siakhulia ne paapa omukhwe owa Musa ebweeni wa Wele.
Endaalo eyaloondakho Musa ekhala khuyaasia babaandu balomana. Babaandu bamwimao khukhwama kumutikhinyi khukhwola ekolooba.
Yetiro nga ne abona koosi niko Musa aba ne akholela babaandu, amureeba ali, “Siina nisio olakholelanga babaandu sino? Siina sikila ne wikhala weng'ene ne babaandu boosi bakhwimileo khukhwama kumutikhinyi khukhwola ekolooba?”
Musa akobosia raraawe omukhwe ali, “Khoyela khole lino sikila babaandu banjichakho khureeba lilienya lia Wele.
Babaandu ne bali ne bulomani, banjichakho, ne khalakila omundu nowasie. Ne mbaboolela kamalaka ka Wele ne bukhalaki bwewe.”
Nio Yetiro aloma ali, “Niko olikho okhola se kali kamalayi tawe.
Ewe ne babaandu nibo oli nabo bano mulaluwa, sikila kimilimo kili kimisiro khwinywe. Se onyala wakikhola weng'ene tawe.
Nono ndekeeresie! Ndakhukaambila mala Wele abe ne nawe! Cha ebweeni wa Wele khulwe babaandu mala oyile chikesi chabwe khu niye.
Okhoyeele obekisie kamalaka ka Wele ne bukhalaki bwewe ne khubenooselia nga nilwo bakhoyeele khumenya nende nisio bakhoyeele khukhola.
Ne khutasa khwako, robora babaandu banyala khukhwama mu baandu bano boosi, babe nga babemeelesi be babaandu, babemeelesi be chielefu, chimia, kamakhumi karaano, ne kamakhumi. Bakhoyeele babe babaandu ba baria Wele banyala beyikinwa mala bakhanyala bafukiilila asoya tawe.
Lekha nibo bakhalake chikesi che babaandu biise bioosi. Banyala bakhureerera chikesi chimbandalafu, ne nibo babeene banyala bakhalaka bulomani butiiti. Elio licha khwanguya kimilimo kiowo, nga ne bacha khuyeetana busiro nawe.
Waaba ne okhola orio, nga Wele ne akhulaka, ocha khunyala kimilimo kiowo, ne babaandu bano boosi balaloota engo mu muleembe.”
Musa aulila likaambila lia Yetiro mala akhola koosi niko Yetiro aaloma.
Musa aarobora babaandu banyala khukhwama mu Isiraeli mwoosi mala aabakhola khuba babemeelesi khu baandu. Baba babemeelesi be chielefu, chimia, kamakhumi karaano ne kamakhumi.
Babaandu abo bakhalakanga chikesi che babaandu biise bioosi. Bareeranga chikesi chimbandalafu khu Musa ne kakhali bulomani butiiti babeene bakhalakanga.
Nio Musa alekha raraawe omukhwe aarekukha. Ne Yetiro aakobola mu sibala siewe.

Baisiraeli bama mu sibala sia Misiri mala boola mu sichiimi sia Sinai khu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kwa khataru.
Nga baama Refidimu boola mu sichiimi sia Sinai baapa ekambi ebweeneyo. Ekambi yino yaba embi ne sikulu sia Sinai.
Nio Musa aacha khu sikulu khukhwakaanana ne Wele.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamulaangila khu sikulu mala amuboolela ali, “Boolela Baisiraeli, lisaaye lia Yakobo oli,
‘Mwaboone niko nakholela Bamisiri nende nga nilwo namusuta enywe nga efuruusi ne sutila binywinywi biayo khu ndaa, mala namureera ano khwise.
Enywe mucha khuba bubwami bwe basaayi, lundi ekholo endakatifu. Kano niko kamakhuwa niko okhoyeele oboolele babaana Ba Isiraeli.’ ”
Khwako Musa eekha asi mala alaanga basaakhulu be babaandu mala ababoolela kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne amulakile.
Nio babaandu boosi bakobosia alala bali, “Khucha khukhola koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile,” Ne Musa ayilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi likobosia lie babaandu.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Lola, ndakhwichila mwifuumbi lisiro, nio babaandu baulile ne ndikho ndomaloma nawe mala bakhusuubile ewe wesi buli lwosi.”
Musa aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko babaandu baloma.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Cha mala orekekhe babaandu luno ne kumutikhinyi. Bakhoya basiinge chingubo chabwe mala berekekhe endaalo eye khataru.
Endaalo eye khataru ng'eneyo ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kheekhe asi khu Sikulu sia Sinai, niio babaandu boosi balimbona.
Ra lulwaakha lubotookhelele sikulu mala oboolele babaandu oli bakhaniina khu sikulu namwe khukhwimbiya lulwakha tawe. Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne etiila khu sikulu, acha khufwa.
Omundu oyo akhaapwe kamabaale namwe alaswe buyiingo. Ne omundu yesi yesi se akhamwetiilekho tawe. Abeele omundu akheerwe, ebeele esaang'i akheerwe. Ne ekhoombi ne yiipa siise sileeyi, babaandu banyala baniine khu sikulu.”
Nio Musa ekha asi khukhwama khu Sikulu mala aacha arekekha babaandu. Khwako basiinga chingubo chabwe.
Ne Musa ababoolela ali, “Mwirekekhe khu ndaalo ekhola khataru. Khu ndaalo eyo mundu akhabaakho no mukhasi tawe.”
Nio Musa arusia babaandu khukhwama mu kambi bache khukhwakaanana ne Wele. Babaandu beema mu maayo mwe sikulu.
Sikulu sia Sinai sioosi siafuumwa ne liliisi, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiikhakho mu mulilo. Liliisi khukhwamakho lianiina mu ngaaki nga liliisi lie liruumbi. Sikulu sioosi siaterema lukali.
Nga luyoka lwe khoombi ne lwachiililila khuba lukali, Musa aalomaloma mala Wele amukoboselia mu likukuma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekha asi khu sikulu sia Sinai, khu ndeleelwa eye sikulu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga Musa ache khu ndeleerwa khwe sikulu. Musa aniina khu sikulu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Yiikha asi mala okaanie babaandu ne busa bakhola bario bakhalisia lulwakha bambona mala bakali khu nibo bafwa.
Ne lundi lekha basaayi babeecha niio ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi betakaase ne busa nja khubaelesia kumunaanio.”
Musa aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Babaandu se banyala baniina khu sikulu sia Sinai tawe, sikila ewe wamweene wakhulaka oli khure khu sikulu lulwakha mala khulutakaase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela ali, “Yiikha asi mala oniine wiiche ne Aruni. Ne okhalekha basaayi ne babaandu bakhalisiakho lulwakha becha niio ndi tawe. Ne busa ndababunia.”
Nono Musa ekha asi mala aboolela babaandu niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne alomile.

Wele aloma kamakhuwa kano koosi, ali:
“Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamurusia enywe mu sibala sia Misiri, khukhwama munju eye bunasioobi.
“Okhaba ne bawele babaandi tawe ne khali Ese.
Okhabinamila namwe obikholele tawe. Sikila Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ndi owe likhendekha. Ndeera siiukuumo khu bapaapa khu baana babwe khukhwola khu selukho eya khataru ne eye khaane eye abo babambiila Ese.
Ne kakhali nekesia busiime buchiililila khu baandu bakali ba basiima ne khuria kamalaka kase.
Khu ndaalo sita khola kimilimo, mala okhole kimilimo kiowo kioosi.
Ne kakhali endaalo eya saba eli endaalo eya sabato khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Khu ndaalo ng'eneyo okhakhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe, obeele ewe, namwe omwana wowo omusoleeli namwe omukhaana, namwe nasioobi wowo owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi, namwe chikhaafu chowo namwe omureende yesi yesi omenyile nawe.
Sikila khulwe chindaalo sita Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola likulu ne liloba, enyanja ne bioosi bilimo mala aola khu ndaalo eya saba. Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita chikhabi endaalo eya esabato mala aakitakaasa.
Baboolela Musa bali, “Ewe lomaloma khwifwe ne khulaulila. Ne kakhali okhalekha Wele aalomaloma khwifwe tawe. Ne busa khukhola khurio khwafwa.”
Nio Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Mukharia tawe, sikila Wele echile khumukhaka enywe ne khumukhola muchiililile khumuria niye nio mukhakhola bubwoni tawe.”
Babaandu bachiililila khukhwiima sinaao. Ne kakhali Musa eseenda siimbi a siilima sikali niio Wele aba.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Mwaboone muli Ese, nalomaloome khwinywe khukhwama mwikulu.
Mukhekholela mwabeene bawele be efwesa namwe esahabu ne mundubakho ese tawe.
Kholele Ese alutare eye liloba, mala mwoseliekho kamakheese kenywe ne chikhaafu chenywe nga biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie kumuleembe. Buli abuundu niio namuroborera khulwe khukhusaaya, kheeche mwinywe mala mubiite chikhabi.
Ne mwaba ne mukholela ese alutare eye kamabaale mukhakiombakhila kamabaale kamachoonge tawe. Mwaba ne muchongakho ne sisiindu siosi siosi aba mwonaake libaale elio likharumikhirwa tawe.
Mukhaniina khu alutare khu ngaaki tawe. Mwakhola murio, mukhabonekhe sichula sienywe mwabeene.’ ”

Wele aaboolela Musa ali, “Kano kali kamalaka niko okhoyeele oeleesie Baisiraeli.
Ne okula nasioobi omueburania, acha khukhukholela kimiiko sita. Ne mu mwiiko kwa saba alekhuulwe busa akharuungakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
Aaba ne echa ne ali omusuumba, akobolayo ne ali omusuumba. Aaba ne echa no mukhasi wewe akobolayo naye.
Ne omwami wewe aaba ne amukhweela omukhasi, mala omukhasi oyo amusaalila babaana basoleeli namwe bakhaana, omukhasi ne babaana bewe baba bo mwami wewe. Ne nasioobi oyo akhoyeele aacha yeng'ene.
Ne kakhali wakana nasioobi anyala aloma ali asiima omwami wewe, omukhasi wewe, ne babaana bewe, mala se enya khulekhwa abe omulekhuule tawe.
Ne akhola ario, omwami wewe acha khumuyila khu Wele. Acha khumwiimia ebweeneyo a muliango namwe khu mwitalaachi kwe enju mala amufutule liiru ne lukela. Khwako nasioobi oyo acha khuba nasioobi wewe mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.
“Omundu aaba ne akusia omukhaana wewe abe nasioobi, omukhaana oyo se acha khulekhwa, nga nasioobi owe siseecha tawe.
Aaba ne akhasiimisia omwami wewe, owenya khumukhwa nga omukhasi wewe tawe, aba omwami oyo acha khumulekha asikulwe no mulebe wewe. Omwami wewe oyo se acha khuba ne bunyali bwe khumukusia khu mureende tawe sikila omwami wewe abeele se aba omusuubilwa khu nasioobi oyo tawe.
Omwami oyo aaba ne akula nasioobi owe siikhasi oyo khukhwela omwana wewe omusoleeli, akhoya amukholela nga omwana wewe owe siikhaana omwene.
Omundu aaba ne akhwa omukhasi okundi, akhaboombia biakhulia bio mukhasi omukhulu, namwe, chingubo, lundi akhalekha khuuba naye nga omukhasi wewe tawe.
Ne aaba ne akhamukholela bibiindu bitaru bino tawe, akhoyeele amulekhe ache busa mala akharuungiakho omukhasi yuno kumuruungo kwosi kwosi tawe.”
Ne kakhali aaba ne amwiira ne akhamwiluungikhe tawe, anyala amulila abuundu niio nja khumuroborera.
Ne Omundu aaba ne eera owasie ne amwiluungikhe, mucha khumurusia khu alutare yase mala akhoya eerwe.
“Omundu yesi yesi oupa raraawe namwe maawe akhoya erwa.
“Babaandu babili ne balomana mala omundu mulala aapa owasie libaale namwe sifuusi, mala alekha khumwiira tawe, ne kakhali omundu niye apile alwaale.
Enyuma wako aba ne enyokha mala akeendela khu siimbo yewe, omundu owamupa akhoya amuruunge khulwe biise nibio omulwale atibia, mala amusilikhe khukhwola nga ne aliona. Ne kakhali owamupa oyo akheerwa tawe.
“Omundu aapa nasioobi wewe, akhaba owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi ne siimbo, mala nasioobi afwila mu makhono kewe, omundu oyo akhoya auukuumwa.
Ne nasioobi oyo ne akhafwa endaalo ng'eneyo namwe eloondakho tawe, omwami wewe se akhoya auukuumwa tawe, sikila nasioobi ali wewe.
“Babaandu babili ne bapana mala baumisia omukhasi owaesia enda yarura. Ne kakhali omukhasi oyo ne akhaumiiakho osi osi tawe, omundu omuumisie akhoya aruunge kumuruungo. Ne akharuunge kumuruungo nikwo omuseecha owo mukhasi enya khuloondekhana ne likhalaka lie bakhalaki.
Ne omukhasi omwene aaba ne aumiia, siiukuumo sicha khuba bulamu buruunga bulamu.
Emoni eruunga moni, liliino liruunga liliino, kumukhono kuruunga kumukhono, sikele siruunga sikele,
liliosia liruunga liliosia, bukhupe buruunga bukhupe, ling'uukha liruunga ling'uukha.
“Omundu aaba ne aapa nasioobi wewe owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi emoni mala amubofusia, akhoya alekhuule nasioobi ache khulwe khuruunga emoni yewe.
Ne aaba ne amupongola liliino, akhoya alekhuule nasioobi ache khulwe khuruunga liliino liewe.
“Euunwa yaunaka omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi afwa, ekhoya yipwe kamabaale yiirwe. Ne enyama yayo ekhaliibwa tawe. Ne kakhali omweeneyo se ali ne bubi tawe.
Ne euunwa yaaba ne yanala khuuna babaandu ne bakhakaambila omweeneyo se akiboa tawe, nio yaunaka omundu aafwa, yiipwe kamabaale efwe, ne akhaba omweeneyo yesi eerwe.
Kakhaba kario, omwene aaba ne enya khukhwisikula aonie bulamu bwewe, akhoya aruunge kumuruungo nikwo bamurakho.
Euunwa yaaba ne yiira omusoleeli namwe omukhaana owo mundu, omundu owe khaafu eyo akholelwe khuloondekhana ne lilaka lino liliene.
Euunwa yaaba ne yiira nasioobi owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi, omweeneyo acha khuruunga omwene nasioobi bitonyi bie efwesa kamakhumi kataru, ne euunwa eyo echa khupwa kamabaale efwe.
“Kaaba bali omundu afuunula liloo namwe ayaba liloo mala alekhe khu lifuunikha tawe, mala eeyi namwe epunda yo mundu okundi ekwemo,
akhoya aruunge chirupia khu mweeneyo, mala efwiile echa khuba yewe.
Ne euunwa yo mundu yaaba ne yiira euunwa yo wasie, babaandu abo boombi bacha khukusia enamu mala bakabane chirupia, lundi bacha khukabana enyama eye uunwa efwiile.
Ne liaba ne limanyikhana lili euunwa abeele eli ne kumwiima kwe khuuna ne owakibaya se akiliinda tawe, akhoyeele aane euunwa khuruunga euunwa efwiile.

“Omundu aaba ne eeba eeyi namwe likheese mala eera namwe aakusia, akhoya aane chieeyi chiraano khuruunga eeyi ndala, ne kamakheese kane khuruunga likheese lilala. Akhoya aruunge nibio eeba. Ne aaba ne akhalikho ne sisiindu tawe, acha khukusibwa khulwe bubwifwi bwewe.
Omwifwi ne anyoolekhwa ne alikho aatula enju siilo mala eerwa, omwirire se ali ne kumusaango kwe khuchukha sifuki tawe.
Ne kakhali omwifwi oyo aambwa enyanga ne erurire mala eerwa, aaba omwirire oyo ali ne kumusaango. Omwifwi oyo akhoya khuruunga. Ne kaaba bali se ali ne sisiindu sie khuruunga tawe, niye omwene alakusibwa khuruunga bubwifwi bwewe.
“Ne sibaywa nisio eebile esio ne sinyoolekhana mumakhono ko mwifwi oyo ne sili silamu, omwifwi oyo alaruunga khukhwola khabili, ebeele ekhaafu, epunda namwe likheese.
“Omundu aaba ne akila bibaywa biaaya mu mukuunda namwe mu liruuti lie kimisabibu lio owasie, namwe alekhuula bibaywa biewe biengila mu mukuunda
“Omundu aaba ne aambia kumulilo mu mukuunda kwewe mala kumulilo kwosia bisaala kwamalatana kwola mu mukuunda kwo mundu okundi mala kwosia biakhulia biewe owaambia kumulilo omwene akhoya aruunge bibioneekhe.
“Omundu aaba ne afukiilila khubiikhila omundu okundi chirupia namwe kimiaandu kiewe mala bakiibila munju mwo oyo owabiikha, omwifwi aaba ne anyolekhana, acha khuruunga khabili.
Ne omwifwi aaba ne akhanyolekhana tawe, omundu owaba ne abiikha kimiaandu acha khwicha ebweeni wa Wele mala okesie ne ali niye oweeba kimiaandu kio owasie namwe tawe.
“Mu musaango kwosi kwosi kwe lilomana lie kimiaandu, liakhaba ne lili lie eeyi, epunda, likheese, engubo, namwe sisiindu siosi siosi sitibile, babaandu babili balomanila khu miaandu bakheche ebweeni wa Wele. Ne niye Wele acha khuloma ali, ali ne bubi acha khuruunga okundi khukhwola khabili.
Omundu anyala afukiilila owasie amwekekha epunda yewe, eeyi, likheese, namwe sibaywa siosi siosi amwayile. Sibaywa esio sinyala siafwa namwe siaumisibwa namwe siebwa, omundu yesi yesi ne akhaboone tawe.
Niye bekekha akhoya ache ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala echube ali se eeba kimiaandu kio owasie tawe. Omweenesio afukiilile sisiechubo, ne niye ekekha akhalakilwa khuruunga tawe.
Ne kakhali siaaba ne sieebwa khukhwama khu niye, akhoya aruunge omweeneyo.
Siaaba ne sieerwa ne chisaang'i che mundaa, akhoya areere biramirekho nga buloli. Se akhoyeele aruunge sisiriirwe ne chisaang'i che mundaa tawe.
“Omundu ne eola owasie sibaywa mala siaumiia namwe siafwa omweenesio ne akhaliio tawe, akhoya aruunge.
Ne elio liekholekha omweenesio ne ali nasio, owasisaba akharuunga tawe. Ne siaaba ne siabukulibwa khulwe kumuruungo, kumuruungo okwo kulisiruunga.
Ne paapa wo mukhaana aaba ne alobela elala khuelesia omundu oyo omukhaana, akhoya aruunge paapa wo mukhaana chirupia chicholaana ne bukhwe bwe be eyabwaana.
Mukhapia siibi namulekhwa yesi yesi namwe omufuubi tawe.
Mwaba ne mubakholela murio mala bandilila ese, ng'ali khaulile bililo biabwe.
Mwakhola murio lirima liase likhabe likali mala mwiire enywe. Bakhasi benywe baliba banamulekhwa ne babaana benywe baliba bafuubi.
Waaba ne obukula engubo yo wasio nga kumusiingo oli kane akhuruunge, okhoya okikobosieyo enyanga ne khaakwa tawe.
Sikila niyo yong'ene eeli sisibiimbilo siewe simuelesia luluuya. Ebiimba siina? Kaaba bali andilila ese, ndamuulila sikila Ese ndi owe siisa.
“Okhaayilila khuaana biianwa khukhwama mu likesa liowo ne khukhwama mu ndali yowo ne bilabile tawe.
“Mbelesie babaana bowo babele be sisoleeli.
Okhole orio akhaba ne chikhaafu chowo chimbele ne kamakheese. Lekha esaliilwe embele ebe ne maawe khulwe chindaalo saba, mala umbelesie khu ndaalo ekhola munaane.

Okhaloonda bakali mu khukhola kamabi tawe. Ne okharusia buloli mu makhuwa kosi kosi mu khuloonda busa ke bakali tawe. Wakhola orio aba ocha khwonaka bung'ali.
Ne okhakholela omutaambi siisa mu musaango kwewe sikila ali omutaambi tawe.
Ne obona epunda yo mundu owakhubiila ne ekonile asi khulwe bisutwa bisiro okhalekha khumuyeeta tawe. Muyeete enyosie epunda yewe.
Okharakho omundu kumusaango kwe bubeeyi tawe. Lundi okheera omundu okhali ne bubi namwe omuluungi tawe, sikila se nja khubeela omundu okhola bumayaanu nga obwo tawe.
Okhafukiilila asoya tawe. Sikila asoya ebofusia babemeelesi ne khurusia babaandu khu bung'ali.
Ne kulekhe kukonele mu mwiiko kukhola saba, okhakulima tawe. Bataambi banyala balia sibuukhamo, ne chisolo che mundaa nacho chinyala chalia nibio bataambi balekhamo. Khola orio ne khu mikuunda kiowo kie kimisabibu nende kie kimiseituni.
“Ba barekeerefu khukhola koosi niko muboolele. Okhalomaloma khu masina ke bawele babaandi tawe, kamasina kano kakhaamakho mu khanwa mwowo tawe.
“Mukhakholelenge ese chinaikara chitaru mu mwiiko.
Khola naikara eye Ndaalo eye Kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe. Nga ne namulaka, lia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe khu ndaalo saba mu siise sisiaroborwa mu mwesi kwa Abibu. Sikila kumwesi okwo nikwo mwamilamo e Misiri. Omundu akheecha ebweeni wase ne akhali ne sisiindu tawe.
Babaandu benywe bakhoya becha ebweeni wo Mwami WELE khukhwola khataru mu mwiiko.
“Mukhambelesia kamalasile ke embosio alala ne kumukaati kwe limela tawe. Kamafura ke siianwa sia naikara chino kakharamakho khukhwola kumutikhinyi tawe.
“Okhateekha limeeme namwe embusi emeeme mu mabeele ka maawe tawe.
“Lola, ndaruma Malaika ebweeni wenywe amuliinde khu lukeendo mala amwosie abuundu niio murekekheele.
Muulile lundi mu murekeeresie nga ne aloma. Mukhamukholela sileka tawe, sikila mwakhola murio se acha khumubeela kamabi kenywe tawe. Ali ne kamaani kase.
Ne kakhali mwaba barekeerefu khurekeeresia niko aloma, mala mukhole koosi niko emuboolela, aba ndaba omusiku khu basiku benywe ne khubiila abo bamubiila enywe.
Malaika wase alamurangirira mala amuyile enywe mu sibala sie Baamori, Bahiti, Baperisi, Bakanaani, Baifi, ne Bayebusi. Ne ndabunia babaandu bano.
Mukhenamila bawele babwe namwe mukhabasaaya tawe, lundi mukhaloonda kimiima kiabwe tawe. Ne kakhali mwonakake bawele babwe ne khutechula chinjeko che bawele babwe.
Mukhoya mukholele ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, ne ese ndabiita chikhabi biakhulia bienywe ne kameechi ne khurusiao bulwaale akari wenywe.
Mbao omukhasi ocha khukhobokha, namwe abe omukuumba mu sibala sienywe tawe. Ndamukhola enywe mu menye lukali.
“Ndara bireengo mu baandu baali ebweeni wenywe mala ngoyanisie babaandu nibo mukhakaanane. Khakhole basiku benywe boosi bamwilukhe enywe.
Khare bireengo
Se nja khubatimania mu mwiiko mulala tawe. Nakhola ndio, sibala sinyala sianjukhwa, ne chisolo che mundaa chinyala chatasikha mala chamuminya enywe bukali.
Ne kakhali khabaoone sia batiiti, khukhwola nga ne mulitasikha mwoole munyala mwabukula sibala.
Khareeo chinjakha che sibala sienywe chaame khu nyanja eya Shamu khukhwola khu nyanja eye Bafilisiti, lundi khukhwama mu sichiimi khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Efurati. Khare bamenywa be mu sibala esio mu bunyali bwenywe mala mucha khubaoona barure ebweeni wenywe.
Se mukhoya mwakholakho endakaano yosi yosi nabo namwe ne bawele babwe tawe.
Se bakhoyeele bamenye mu maloba kenywe tawe. Bakhola bario bakila mwakholela ese bubwoni sikila mwaba ne mukholela bawele babwe, ng'ali kucha khuba kumureko khwinywe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Yiicha niio ndi, ewe ne Aruni, Natabu, Abiiu, ne basaakhulu kamakhumi saba be Baisiraeli, mala musaayile ese sinaao.
Ne kakhali ewe weng'ene owiicha niio ndi, babaandu nibo wichile nabo bakhanjimbiya tawe. Ne Baisiraeli bakhaniinakho becha khu sikulu tawe.”
Musa acha aboolela babaandu kamakhuwa koosi ne kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela. Babaandu boosi bakobosia alala bali, “khucha khukhola koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.”
Ne Musa aandika kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi koosi. Oli kumutikhinyi makhelebeende, ombakha alutare mu maayo mwe sikulu mala arao kamabaale ekhumi na kabili, khuloondekhana ne chikholo ekhumi na chibili che Baisiraeli.
Nio aruma basoleeli baele ba Isiraeli baana biianwa bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio che kumuleembe che chieeyi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Musa abukula malala khu malasile akachukha khu bibuumba, ne kakaandi akaanyaka khu alutare.
Nio abukula sitabu sie ndakaano, mala asisoma babaandu ne barekereesie. Bakobosia bali, “Khularia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhola koosi niko akhulakile.”
Nio Musa, Aruni, Natabu, Abihu, ne basaakhulu Baisiraeli kamakhumi saba baniina khu sikulu
mala babonana ne Wele owa Isiraeli. Asi wewe siabao sisialolekhana nga amukhe we kamabaale kamabuusi. Asi ao aba nga likulu likhalikho kamafuumbi tawe.
Ne Wele se akholakho basaakhulu be Baisiraeli bubi tawe. Babonana ne Wele, mala balia ne khunywa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali “Yiicha khu sikulu niio endi, mala olindilekho. Nja khukhuelesia kamabaale kabili ke kamalaka ne kamekisio niko naandika khulwe khukhwekesia babaandu.”
Musa ne omukholi wewe Yoshua bacha
Musa aboolela basaakhulu ali, “Khuliindile ano khukhwola nga ne khukobola. Lola Aruni ne Huri bali ne nanywe ano. Yesi yesi oli ne likhuwa, ache khu nibo.”
Nio Musa aniina khu lukulu lwa Sinai, mala lifuumbi lialufuuma.
Luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwaba khu lukulu lwa Sinai, mala lifuumbi lialufuuma khu ndaalo sita, ne khu ndaalo ekhola saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alangila Musa khukhwama mu lifuumbi.
Khu baandu Baisiraeli, libonekha lie luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaba nga kumulilo kuburukha khu ndeleerwa khwe sikulu.
Ne Musa engila mu lifuumbi nga aba ne aniina khu lukulu. Amenya ebweeneyo khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane kumuusi ne siilo.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Baisiraeli bakholele siianwa. Bukula siianwa khukhwama khu buli mundu owirusia khukhumbaanila ese.
Biianwa bino nibio okhoyeele obamiekho: esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa,
buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu, engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi, engubo eye bufuumbo bwe chimbusi,
kamasieelo ke kamamiiku kaakhilwe erangi embesemu, kamasieelo ke chimbusi, kumurongooro kumunyaali,
kamafura ke mu chitaa, bibiindu bing'ayilisia bulayi khulwe mumafura ke khuchukha khu barobore ne khulwe bupaani,
kamabaale ke bukusi, ne kamabaale kakaandi ke khurekekha mu efodi nende khulwe ngubo eye mu sifuba.
Lekha babaandu bakholele Abuundu Atakatifu, nio embamenyemo.
Khola liiema litakatifu lino ne bibiindu biamwo bioosi khuloondekhana ne sifwaani nisio kane emwekesie.
“Lekha bakholele lisanduku khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali, buleeyi bikele bibili ne nusu, bukhiikha sikele silala ne nusu, ne buniina sifuba silala ne nusu.
Lifuunikhe ne esahabu yong'ene mukari ne nje ne olimalilile chimbeka choosi ne esahabu.
Ne okhang'oone kamakhono kane ke khulisuta kae esahabu mala okikakie khu bikele bialio bine, kamakhono kabili buli lubeka.
Khola chinguulo che kumurongooro kumunyaali ochifuunikhe ne esahabu.
Ne ochire mu mikhono kibili buli lubeka lwe lisanduku chisute lisanduku.
Chinguulo chirame mu makhono ne chikharusibwamo tawe.
Ne olara mwisanduku kamalaka niko nja khukhuelesia.
Ne khola chikerubi chibili khukhwama khu esahabu. Bikhole khundulo khwe chimbeka chombi che sifuunikho.
Chikerubi chibili echo chikhoya chaba siindu silala ne sifuunikho. Khola ekerubi ndala lubeka lulala ne ekiindi lubeka luluundi lwe sifuunikho.
Chikerubi chikhoya chaba ne chindaa chacho angaaki mala chifuunikhe sifuunikho. Chikerubi echo chikhoya chiloleelelane khu sifuunikho.
Ra sifuunikho khungaaki khwe lisanduku. Ne ra mu lisanduku omwo kamalaka niko endikho nja khukhuelesia.
Nja khumwakaanana ebweeneyo. Ne khukhwama khu sifuunikho akari we chikerubi chibili che chindaa khu Lisanduku lie ndakaano, nja khukhuelesia kamalaka kase koosi khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli.
“Khola emesa eye kumunyaali, eye buleeyi bikele bibili, bukhiikha sikele silala, ne buniina sifuba silala ne nusu.
Kifuunikhe esahabu yong'ene mala okimalilile ne esahabu okibotookhelesie.
Khola kumutalaachi kubotookhelesie emesa kukwoola bubalaayi sikalabo silala mala omaale esahabu khubotookhelesia kumutalaachi.
Khola kamakhono kane ke esahabu khulwe emesa mala okiboe khu mbeka chine, niio bikele bine bili.
Kamakhono kakhoya kaba ambi ne kumutalaachi nio kabe kamakhono ke khuramo chinguulo chisuta emesa. Bikhoya biaba ambi ne lukhingiki.
Khola chinguulo che kumurongooro kumunyaali mala ochifuunikhekho esahabu. Emesa ekhasutwe ne chinguulo chino.
Kholela emesa chipwakuli, ne bibuumba, khulwe bupaani, lundi khola bibuumba ne kimieendo khulwe khuchukha biianwa bie khunywa. Ebino bioosi bikhoya biakholwa khukhwama khu esahabu yong'ene.
Kimikaati kie khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kikhoya kirebwe khu mesa ebweeni wase buli lwosi.
“Khola siteetwe sie taa sie esahabu yong'ene. Sibale siasio ne kumukhono kwasio bikhoya bikholwe khukhwama khu esahabu embase. Bikoombe biasio ne bimuli biasio bikhoya bibe sisiindu silala ne siteetwe.
Chisakia sita chiicha khukhwama khu mbeka che siteetwe, chitaru khukhwama buli lubeka, chitaru lubeka lulala ne chitaru lubeka luluundi.
Bikoombe bitaru bikholwe nga bimuli bie kumurongooro alimondi ne bituumi biasio alala ne bimuli biasio khu lusakia lulala, ne lusakia luluundi lwosi lube lurio.
Ne khu siteetwe sie taa sisieene bikhoya biabakho bikoombe bine bibiakholwa nga bimuli bie kumurongooro kwa alimondi alala ne bituumi ne bimuli.
Buli simuli silala siikhoya siaba asi owa buli chisakia chibili khukhwama mu siteetwe. Ne simuli siikhoya siafwaanana siakholwa khukhwama khu siindu silala ne sie siteetwe.
Bimuli ne chisakia chabio, ne siteetwe sie taa bikhoya biakholwa khukhwama khu siindu silala. Bioosi bibe bibiabaswa khukhwama khu esahabu yong'ene.
Khola chitaa saba khulwe siteetwe mala ochire angaaki nio chikhosie ebweeni we siteetwe.
Chindaambi chayo ne chisahani chayo chibe che esahabu yong'ene.
Khola siteetwe khukhwama khu sitonyi silala sie sahabu yong'ene alala ne bibiindu bino bioosi.
Khaka nga ne onyala mala obone oli wakholile bibiindu bino khuloondekhana ne sifwaani nisio nakhwekesia khu lukulu.

“Khutasa khwako, khola mukari mwe liiema litakatifu chipasia ekhumi che ngubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi ne buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, ne bubesemu. Naba khu pasia chino chikerubi mu busicha.
Khola buli engubo eya katani, buleeyi bikele kamakhumi kabili na munaane ne bukhiikha bikele bine. Chipasia choosi chikhoya chalekhaana, buleeyi ne bukhiikha.
Nabila alala chiraano lundi nabila chiraano chichiindi alala orio.
Ne rakho chimbete che ngubo embuusi khu likemo lienje lia buli sitonyi sie enje sie chisuuka nicho onabiile alala.
Ra chimbete kamakhumi karaano khu situumi silala sie chisuuka ne chimbete kamakhumi karaano obibotookhelesie khu bumaliilisi bwe situumi sie khabili mala chimbete echo chiloleelelane.
Khola chingaki che esahabu kamakhumi karaano mala ochirumikhire khuboa alala bipupu bie chipasia bibili bie liiema litakatifu nio libe lilala.
“Lundi khola sifuunikho khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe chimbusi obiimbile enje we liiema. Chipasia chino choosi alala chibe chipasia ekhumi na ndala.
Khola choosi chilekhaane, buleeyi bikele kamakhumi kataru ne bukhiikha bikele bine.
Olara alala chipasia chiraano chong'ene, ne chichiindi sita ochire alala. Fumbamo khabili esuuka ekhola sita eleleeche ebweeni we liiema litakatifu.
Khola chimbete kamakhumi karaano khu likemo lie pasia emaliilisi lubeka lwe enje lwe chipasia che khunyoa chiraano. Lundi khola orio khu pasia chichiindi chosi.
Khola chingaki kamakhumi karaano che kumukasa mala ochikakie mu mbete oambaanie liiema litakatifu nio libe lilala.
Ne Suunga sitonyi sie chipasia siramire e mukoongo we liiema litakatifu.
Sitonyi sie chipasia siramire, silasuungwa chimbeka chombi che liiema litakatifu mala chilifuunikhe.
“Khola sifuunikho khulwe liiema litakatifu. Sikhole khukhwama khu masieelo kamabesemu ke kamamiiku ne chimbusi.
“Khola kimitalaachi kie kumurongooro kumunyaali nikio emia khulwe liiema litakatifu.
Buli kumutalaachi kukhoya kube buleeyi bikele ekhumi, ne sikele silala ne enusu bukhiikha.
Buli kumutalaachi kube ne biaambaania bibili biaambaania alala kimitalaachi. Khola orio khu mitalaachi kioosi kie liiema litakatifu.
Khola kimitalaachi kamakhumi kabili khulwe lubeka lwe ebunafubo we liiema litakatifu.
Ne khola bibale bie efwesa kamakhumi kane, bibili asi owa buli kumutalaachi khulwe biaambaasia bibili.
Lundi khola kimitalaachi kamakhumi kabili khulwe lubeka lwe ebunaswa we liiema litakatifu.
Ne kholela kimitalaachi ekio bibale kamakhumi kane bie efwesa, buli bibili asi owa buli kumutalaachi.
Khola kimitalaachi sita, khulwe enyuma we liiema litakatifu lubeka lwe mumbo.
Lundi khola kimitalaachi kibili khulwe chikhuumbo che enyuma we liiema.
Kimitalaachi kie mukhuumbo kino kikhoya kiakabukhanamo asi, ne kakhali kikhoya kiaambanisibwa mungaaki mu mukhono kwe khunyoa. Kimitalaachi kibili ekio kikhoya kiakholwa mungila yino. Kiombi kilaba chi khuumbo chibili.
Khwako kicha khuba kimitalaachi munaane alala ne bibale biakio bie efwesa ekhumi na sita. Buli bibale bibili asi owa buli kumutalaachi.
“Khola kimilapa khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali. Kiraano khulwe kimitalaachi kie lubeka lulala lwe liiema,
kiraano khulwe kimitalaachi kie lubeka luluundi lwe liiema, ne kiraano khulwe kimitalaachi kie lubeka lwe mumbo, enyuma we liiema.
Khola kumulapa kwe akari kubire akari we kimitalaachi lubeka lulala lwe liiema khukhwola lubeka luluundi.
Fuunikha kimitalaachi ne esahabu ne okikholele kamakhono ke esahabu khutiililila kimilapa. Nio ofuunikhe, kimilapa kiosi ne esahabu,
Yimisia liiema khuloondekhana ne lirekekha nilio wokesebwa khu sikulu.
“Khola epasia eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi. Epasia eyo ekhoya enabilwekho chikerubi mu busicha.
Suunga epasia yino ne biaambaania bie esahabu khunjeko chine che kumurongooro kumuyaali chichafuunikhwa ne esahabu. Ne chire mu bibale bie efwesa bine.
Ne suunga epasia eyo mungakia chayo. Reere Lisanduku lie ndakaano eye kamalaka mala olire enyuma we epasia. Epasia eyo elakabukhasia Abuundu Atakatifu khukhwama Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali.
Ra sifuunikho khu Lisanduku lie Ndakaano liili Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali.
Ne yimisia emesa enje we epasia lubeka lwe ebunaswa, ne siteetwe sie etaa lubeka lwe ebunafubo we liiema, siloleelelane ne emesa.
“Khola epasia khulwe kumuliango kwe liiema. Epasia eyo ebe eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne bwe engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi mu busicha.
Kholela epasia eyo chinjeko chiraano che kumurongooro kumunyaali mala ofuunikhe chinjeko echo ne sahabu. Akhaba chingaki chacho chosi ochifuunikhe ne esahabu. Nio ochikholele bibale bie kumukasa biraano.

“Khola alutare khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali. Kikhole ebe elekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha. Ekhoya ebe eye buleeyi bikele biraano ne bukhiikha bwosi bikele biraano. Ne buniina bube bifuba bitaru.
Kikholele chinjika chine khu khuumbo che chimbeka chayo chine. Chinjika echo chikhoya chaba siindu silala ne alutare. Ne obifuunikhe ne kumukasa.
Kikholele chinyuungu khulwe likokhe, chimbako, bibuumba, chiuma, ne chinjo. Bibiindu bino bioosi bikhoya biakholwa khukhwama khu mukasa.
Khola lutiimba lwe kumukasa mala ore khu khuumbo chine che lutiimba olwo kamakhono kane ke kumukasa.
Ra lutiimba olwo lubeka lwe asi we likemo lia alutare, nio lutiimba olwo lwoole enusu eya alutare.
Kholela alutare chinguulo che kumurongooro kumunyaali, mala ochifuunikhe ne kumukasa.
Ra chinguulo echo mu makhono, chimbeka chombi cha alutare khulwe khusuta alutare.
Khola alutare elangililile, eye chimbao, khuloondekhana nga ne wokesebwa khu sikulu.
“Khola lumako lwe chipasia khulwe liiema. Lubeka lwe ebunafubo lumako lukhoya lwaba lwe chipasia cha katani endayi. Epasia eyo ebe eye buleeyi bikele emia ndala. Olwo lubeka lulala.
Chinjeko che chipasia echo chibe kamakhumi kabili, ne bibale bie kumukasa kamakhumi kabili. Ne kakhali chingaki ne kimitiindi kiacho kie chinjeko bibe bie efwesa.
Akhaba lubeka lwe ebunaswa we lumako, epasia eye lumako ebe eye buleeyi bikele emia ndala chinjeko ne bibale biacho kamakhumi kabili bibe bie kumukasa. Ne kakhali chingaki ne kimitiindi bibe bie efwesa.
Lubeka lwe mumbo lwe lumako chipasia chibe bukhiikha bikele kamakhumi karaano, chinjeko ekhumi ne bibale ekhumi.
Bukhiikha bwe chipasia che lumako ebweeni lubeka lwe ebukwe bube bikele kamakhumi karaano.
Chipasia khulwe lubeka lulala lwe silibwa chibe bikele ekhumi na biraano, ne chinjeko chitaru ne bibale bitaru.
Ne lubeka luluundi lwe silibwa chipasia chibe buleeyi bikele ekhumi na biraano ne chinjeko chitaru ne bibale bitaru.
Silibwa sie lumako sibe ne epasia ekhiinga eyoola bikele kamakhumi kabili. Epasia eyo ebe eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne bwe engubo endayi eya katani eyanabwa mu busicha. Epasia eyo ebe ne chinjeko chine ne bibale bine.
Chinjeko choosi chibotookhelesia lumako chirebwekho kimitiindi kie efwesa. Chingaki chacho chosi chibe che efwesa ne bibale bibe bie kumukasa.
Buleeyi bwe lumako lube bikele emia ndala, bukhiikha bikele kamakhumi karaano ne buniina bifuba biraano. Chipasia chikhoya chibe che engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi ne bibale bie kumukasa.
Bibiindu bioosi bie mu liiema litakatifu khulwe burumikhi bwosi bwosi, chingaki choosi, ne chingaki choosi che lumako bibe bie kumukasa.
“Laka Baisiraeli bakhureerere kamafura kamalayi ke kumuseituni khulwe etaa, nio etaa eaambisibwe buli ekolooba.
Aruni ne babaana bewe bakhoya baambisie e taa mu liiema lie kumuse enje we epasia eli ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Ekhoya eburukhe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama ekolooba khukhwola kumutikhinyi. Lilaka lino likhoya liabiikhwa khulwa mindali mu Baisiraeli khulwe chiselukho chichiicha.

“Reera Aruni wandaayo ne babaana bewe, Natabu, Abihu, Eliesa, ne Itamari niio oli. Baaule khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli, nio bakholele nga basaayi.
Nabila wandaayo Aruni chingubo chindakatifu che khumuelesia lukoosi ne lukoondo lulayi.
Laanga babaandu basicha boosi nibo naelesia bukesi, mala obaboolele bakholele Aruni chingubo chindakatifu nio abe omwaule khukhukholela nga omusaayi mu milimo kiase.
Chino nicho chingubo nicho bakhoyeele bakhole: Engubo eye mu sifuba, efodi, engubo endeeyi, ekaanjo eyanabwa mu busicha, sileemba ne kumusiipi. Banabile wandaayo Aruni ne babaana bewe chingubo che busaayi chino, nio bakholele nga basaayi.
Bakhoya barumikhire buusi bwe esahabu, bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu, nende bwe engubo endayi eya katani.
“Lekha bakhole efodi eye buusi bwe esahabu, bubuusi bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani endayi. Bunabi bube bwe busicha.
Efodi eyo ekhoya ebe ne bilaka bibili bie khu mabeka biaambaanie alala chikhuumbo chombi che kamabeka.
Lukhoba lulwanabwa mu busicha khulwe efodi lukhoya lwanabwa khukhwama khu siindu silala. Kukhoya kukholwe ne buusi bwe esahabu, bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne bwe engubo endayi eya katani.
Bukula kamabaale kabili kamelamela mala okaandikekho kamasina ke babaana ba Yakobo.
Kamasina ke babaana sita kaandikwe khu libaale lilala ne kamasina kakaandi sita khu libaale liliindi lilala. Ne kamasina ako kaandikwe khuloondekhana ne lisaalwa liabwe.
Aandika khu mabaale kabili ako kamasina ke ba okhwa Yakobo, nga omundu oandika kamasina khu miuuri. Nio okafuunikhe ne esahabu.
Bukula kamabaale kabili ako mala okare khu bilaka bibili biili khu mabeka ka efodi. Lekha kabe nga kamabaale ke likhebulila khulwe babaana ba Isiraeli. Aruni acha khusutila kamasina kaabwe khu mabeka kewe, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe likhebulila.
Khola chinyilili chibili che esahabu chitiila kamabaale.
Lundi khola kiminyololo kibili kimiborore nga kimikoye kie esahabu yong'ene mala okire mu nyilili che esahabu.
“Ne naba engubo eye musifuba khulwe khurumikhira khukhola bukhalaki. Kikhole mu ngila eye busicha. Ekhoya yakholwa nga efodi ne yakholwa. Ekholwe ne buusi bwe esahabu, bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne bwe engubo endayi eya katani.
Ebe elekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha. Ebe eye chisendimita kamakhumi kabili na chine. Ebe enyala yafumbwamo khukhwola khabili.
Kirekho chinyilili che kamabaale chine. Lunyilili lunyoa libaale libesemu lukali, linamaki ne libesemu.
Mu lunyilili lwa khabili, lie lubookha, libuusi, ne lie kumutooba.
Mu lunyilili lwa khataru libaale linakhanyuusi, lulwanda lumelamela ne linapeenda.
Ne mu lunyilili lwa khane, lie lubookha lukali limelamela ne lie kumutooba. Rumikhira esahabu khura kamabaale kano khu ngubo eye musifuba.
Buli libaale khu mabaale ekhumi na kabili kano likhoya liaandikwakho lisina lia buli mwana owa Yakobo. Kamasina kano kabe nga kimiuuri, khulwe chikholo ekhumi na chibili.
Khola kiminyololo kie esahabu yong'ene kikiabororana oli kumukoye khulwe engubo eye musifuba.
Ne okholeele engubo eyo chimbete chibili che esahabu mala ore chimbete echo khu khuumbo chibili che silaka.
Ra kiminyololo kibili kie esahabu ekio mu mbete chibili chiili mu koona che silaka.
Chwiisilia chindulo chibili che kiminyololo khu nyilili chibili che esahabu eng'enang'ena mala obire khu bilaka bibili bie khu mabeka ka efodi ebweeni.
Nio khola chimbete chibili che esahabu mala ochichwiisilie khu likemo lie mukari lie engubo eye khu musifuba ambi ne efodi.
Khola chimbete chibili che esahabu mala ochichwiisilie ebweeni khu likemo lie bilaka bibili bie khu mabeka ka efodi mu munabo kwe lukhoba lwa efodi.
Boela alala chimbete che khu silaka sie khu sifuba ne chimbete cha efodi ne kumukoye kwe buusi bubuusi. Khola murio nio silaka sie khu sifuba sitiile khu lukhoba lundi silekhe khutebateba khu efodi tawe.
“Aruni akhasutile kamasina ke babaana ba Isiraeli mu silaka sie khu sifuba sie bukhalaki amwoyo kwewe ne alikho ne acha Abuundu Atakatifu. Kaliba kario nga likhebulila ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli lwosi.
Ra Urimu ne Tumimu
“Engubo endeeyi mukari mwa efodi ebe eye buusi bubuusi.
Ekhoya yaaba ne kumwanya kwe kumurwe. Kumwanya kuno kukhoyeele kubotookhelesibwe ne buusi nio efodi ekhatabukha tawe.
Khu likemo lie engubo eyo kholakho bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga ke buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda ne bubesemu kalibotookhelesie. Ne chikengele che esahabu chibe akari we bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga.
Buli e keengele eye esahabu ekhoya eloondekhane ne sifwaani sie lituunda likomanga. Khola murio khubotookhelesia likemo lioosi lie engubo.
Aruni akhoya efware engubo eyo ne akhola kimilimo. Chikengele chayo chipe chiuliilikhane ne alikho ne engila Abuundu Atakatifu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lundi ne arurao nio akhafwa tawe.
“Khola limili lie esahabu yong'ene mala oandikekho nga kumuuri oli ‘Endakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’
Ne ochwiisilie limili elio khu sileemba khulwe khurumikhira kumukoye kwe buusi bubuusi. Limili elio libe sileemba ebweeni.
Aruni efwaare limili elio mala ebukulile kamabi kosi kosi kanyoolekhwa mu siianwa sitakatifu nisio Baisiraeli baleera nga biianwa biabwe bitakatifu. Limili elio libe khumurwe kwa Aruni nio biianwa ebio bifukiililwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Engubo eye lukoondo lulwaukhaane ebe engubo eya katani endayi, ne sileemba siosi sibe sie engubo eya katani endayi ne kakhali naba kumusiipi kwe buusi mu busicha.
“Nabila ba okhwa Aruni chikaanjo, chikhoba ne chikuutwa. Bibiindu ebio bikholwe khubaelesia luyali ne lukoondo lulayi.
Ofwaare Aruni wandaayo ne basoleeli bewe bibiindu bino mala obachukhekho kamafura, obarekho kamakhono, obaaule nio bakholele ese nga basaayi.
Banabile chisirwari cha katani khulwe khubiimba siichula siabwe. Naba chisirwari chichama mu sibuno khukhwola khu maraango.
Aruni ne basoleeli bewe befwaare chisirwari chino ne bengila mu liiema lie kumuse namwe ne bacha siimbi ne alutare khukhola kimilimo Abuundu Atakatifu. Bakhola bario nio bakhereerera bumayaanu mala bafwe tawe. Elino liliba lilaka lia mindali khu Aruni ne lisaaye liewe enyuma wewe.

“Elino nilio okhoyeele okholeele Aruni ne babaana bewe khubaaula bakholele nga basaayi. Bukula euunwa ndala endoro ne kamamiiku kabili kakhalikhoomo bubi tawe.
Bukula kumukaati kwe ngaanu kukhalimo limela tawe ne chikeki chiikhalimo limela tawe nicho batubasiisie ne kamafura lundi obukule akhaba ne chipisikuuti chitambamo limela chiaakhilwekho kamafura.
Ra bioosi mu sikono silala mala obireere alala ne euunwa ne kamamiiku kabili.
“Reera Aruni ne babaana bewe amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, obasiinge ne kameechi.
Nio fwara Aruni chingubo che busaayi, ekaanjo, engubo endeeyi eya efodi, ne engubo eye mu sifuba mala omuboe ne lukhoba lwa efodi lulwanabwa mu busicha.
Mufwaare sileemba khu murwe mala okelekhekho limili litakatifu.
Nio bukula kamafura ke khuchukha okachukhe khu murwe kwewe, mala omwaaule.
“Nio reera babaana bewe mala obafwaare chikaanjo.
Baboe chikhoba munda mwabwe mala obafwaare chi kuutwa khu mirwe kiabwe. Ne busaayi buliba bubwabwe khulwa mindali. Mungila yino yaaulilamo Aruni ne basoleeli bewe.
“Nio reera euunwa ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse. Aruni ne babaana bewe bare kamakhono kabwe khu murwe kwayo.
Khonyela euunwa eyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Bukulakho kamalasile ke euunwa khu lwaala lwowo okare khu njika cha alutare. Nio chukha kamalasile karama a sibale sia alutare.
Lundi, bukula kiminawa kikiafuunikha bie munda kioosi, ne abuundu alayi e siini, ne chimbiko chibili ne kiminawa kiacho mala obioselie khu alutare.
Ne kakhali yoselia enje we kambi enyama eye euunwa ne lisieelo liayo, ne kamasisie kaayo. Esino sili siianwa sie khumalao bumayaanu.
“Bukula lilala khu mamiiku mala oboolele Aruni ne babaana bewe bare kamakhono kabwe khu murwe kwalio.
Nio yiira limiiku elio mala obukule kamalasile kaalio okaanyake khu alutare okibotookhelesie.
Ne omalile, tonyaka limiiku mu bitonyi. Siinga bie munda bialio bioosi ne binama bialio mala ore alala bitonyi bie chinyama chalio ne kumurwe.
Yoselia limiiku lioosi khu alutare. Sili siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kuli kumuuya kumulayi kwe siianwa sisiosebwe sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Bukula limiiku liliindi, mala oboolele Aruni ne babaana bewe bare kamakhono kabwe khu murwe kwalio.
Liire, mala obukule kamalasile kaalio malalakho okare khundulo khwe liiru liseecha lia Aruni ne ndulo khwe kamaru ke babaana bewe. Lundi kare khu njala chabwe chikhuumwa cha buli mukhono museecha ne khu njala chabwe chikhuumwa che khu bikele biabwe biseecha. Chukha kamalasile karamire khu alutare okibotookhelesie.
Nio bukula kamalasile malala kaali khu alutare ne kamafura, mala okachukhe khu Aruni ne khu ngubo chewe ne khu baana bewe ne khu ngubo che babaana bewe. Mu ngila yino Aruni, babaana bewe, ne chingubo chabwe balaba batakatifu.
“Bukula lundi kamafura ke limiiku ne ke kumusieembe, kamafura, kakafuunikha bie munda, lubeka lulayi lwe siini, chimbiko chibili ne kamafura kacho, ne sinama sie kumukhono kumuseecha. (Khola orio sikila lino lili limiiku lie liliaaula).
Bukula kumukaati mulala, ekeeki ndala eye kamafura ne episikuuti ndala khukhwama mu sikono sie kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe kiili ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Elesia Aruni ne babaana bewe bibiindu bino bioosi mala obaboolele babiaane nga biianwa khwise Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio obibukule khukhwama khu nibo mala obioselie khu alutare khutasa khu biianwa bie khukhwosia. Biaane nga biianwa bie kumuuya kusiimisia ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ebino bili biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Bukula enyama eye lituru eye limiiku lie liliaaula lia Aruni mala okiaane khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sitonyi sino silaba sisiowo.
“Ne bukula enyama eye lituru ne sinama sie limiiku bibiarumikhirwa khuura Aruni ne babaana bewe mu wakifu khuuba basaayi. Bitonyi bino bilaba bibiabwe.
Ebino bikhabe bitonyi bia Aruni ne basoleeli bewe buli lwosi khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli. Kaliba kario sikila bitonyi bie basaayi bikhoya biianwa ne Baisiraeli khukhwama khu biianwa biabwe bie kumuleembe. Ebino bili biianwa biabwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Chingubo cha Aruni che busaayi chilirumikhwa ne lisaaye liewe enyuma wewe. Baliefwara ne balikho bachukhwakho kamafura ne balikho baaulwa khuba basaayi.
Omwana okobola mu bweyaangu bwa Aruni nga omusaayi, akhoya efwaare chingubo echo khulwe chindaalo saba ne engila mu liiema lie kumuse khukhola kimilimo abuundu atakatifu.
“Bukula enyama eye limiiku lie liliaaula mala okiteekhele Abuundu Atakatifu.
Aruni ne basoleeli bewe baliile enyama eyo ne kumukaati kuuli mu sikono a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Balalia biianwa bibiarumikhirwa khurusiao bumayaanu bwabwe nio bauulwa mala bakholwa batakatifu. Ne kakhali omundu okundi akhaliakho biianwa bino tawe sikila bili bitakatifu.
Ne enyama yosi yosi eye liliaaula namwe kumukaati biarama khukhwola kumutikhinyi, mukhoyeele mubioosie. Se bikhoyeele bialiibwa tawe sikila bili bitakatifu.
“Kholela Aruni ne basoleeli bewe khuloondekhana ne koosi niko ekhulakile. Baaulwe khulwe chindaalo saba.
Buli endaalo oaane euunwa nga siianwa sie bumayaanu khulwe khurusiao bumayaanu. Lundi aana siianwa sie bumayaanu khulwa alutare ne olikho orusiakho bumayaanu. Nio okichukhekho kamafura mala okiaule.
Rusia bumayaanu khu alutare khulwe chindaalo saba mala okiaule. Nio alutare elaba endakatifu lukali. Buli siindu sisietiila khu alutare sienyekha sibe sitakatifu.
“Bino nibio oliaana khu alutare: buli endaalo oliaana kamameeme kabili kaali bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala biise bioosi.
Aana limeeme lilala kumutikhinyi ne liliindi ekolooba.
Ne limeeme linyoa aana ne sikelo silala khwi khumi mu siikula sie bufu bunosie bwe engaanu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura kamalayi ke kumuseituni matiiti mu chuupa. Chukha endali ndiiti mu chuupa nga siianwa.
Aana limeeme liliindi ekolooba, mala oliaane ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne sie khunywa. Khola ekolooba bulayi bwene nga ne okhola kumutikhinyi. Siianwa sisiosebwe sili siianwa sie kumuuya kumulayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khulwe biise bioosi bibiicha, siianwa sie khukhwosia sino siikhoya siaanilwe ebweeni wase ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, amuliango we liiema lie kumuse buli lwosi khulwe chiselukho choosi. Ao niio nja khwakaanana ne nanywe mala ndomalome ne nanywe.
Lundi ebweeneyo ndiakaanana ne babaandu ba Isiraeli, ne abuundu ao aliaulwa khubirira khu luyali lwase.
Ndiaula liiema lie kumuse ne alutare. Lundi ndiaula Aruni ne ba okhwa Aruni khukhukholela nga basaayi.
Ne ndimenya mu baandu ba Isiraeli, ne nja khuba Wele wabwe.
Balimanya bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe owabaamia mu sibala sie Misiri nio embamenyamo. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.

“Khola alutare khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali khulwe khukhwoseliakho bupaani.
Ekhoya ebe elekhaana bukhiikha ne buleeyi. Bukhiikha bube sikele silala ne buleeyi bwosi sikele silala. Buniina bube bifuba bibili. Bifwaani bie chinjika biayo bikhoya bikholwe khukhwama khu siindu silala ne sia alutare eng'ene.
Fuunikha khu ngaaki khwayo, chimbeka choosi chine, ne bifwaani bie chinjika biayo ne esahabu yong'ene. Ne kibotookhelesie ne kumutiindi kwe sahabu.
Khola chimbete chibili che esahabu chibe asi we kumutiindi khu mbeka chombi chichaloleelelana cha alutare. Ra kamakhono ako khu ndulo khwe chimbeka chayo chibili khutiila chinguulo nicho basutila.
Khola chinguulo chibe che kumurongooro kumunyaali mala ochifuunikhe ne sahabu.
Ra alutare eyo ebweeni we neti eeli siimbi ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Ekhoya ebe ebweeni we endebe eye siisa, eli khu lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Abweene ao niio ndiakaanana ne nanywe.
Aruni alioseliangakho bupaani bwe kumuuya kumulayi buli kumutikhinyi ne acha khurekekha chitaa.
Akhoya akhole ario ne alikho ne aambia chitaa ekolooba. Siaanwa sie bupaani buno bukhoya bwachiililila ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu selukho chenywe choosi.
Okhaanila khu alutare yino biiunya bulayi biikhali bitakatifu tawe, siakhaba siianwa sie khukhwosia, namwe sie biakhulia. Ne okhakichukhakho kamalwa kosi kosi tawe.
Aruni akhakhole siianwa sirusiao bumayaanu lulala khu mwiiko. Akhaane siianwa sirusiao bumayaanu khulwe khurumikhira kamalasile ke siianwa sie khurusiao bumayaanu. Elino likhoya liekholekha buli mwiiko mu selukho chenywe choosi. Alutare yino eli endakatifu lukali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Ne olikho ne obala babaandu ba Isiraeli, buli mundu akhoya anduunge kumuruungo khulwe bulamu bwewe. Bakhole bario nio butinyu bulekhe khubechakho ne olikho obabala tawe.
Buli mundu obalwa akhoya aruunge enusu eye sitonyi sie eshekeli khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie Abuundu Atakatifu, ne nusu eye sitonyi sie eshekeli silala nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buli mundu obala mu libalwa, oli ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo, aliaana siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omundu omuiinda se aruunga khutuumao enusu eye shekeli tawe. Ne omutaambi se aruunga asi we nusu eye shekeli ta, ne balikho ne baruunga biianwa bino khulwe bulamu bwabwe.
Bukula chirupia che khurusiao bumayaanu khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli mala ochaule khulwe kimilimo kie liiema lie kumuse. Busuuru buno bucha khuba likhebulila khulwe Baisiraeli ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio berusiekho bumayaanu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Khola lulweelo lwe kumukasa ne bibale bialwo bie kumukasa khulwe khukhwisiinga. Lure akari we liiema lie kumuse ne alutare, mala oluchukhekho kameechi.
Aruni ne babaana bewe balirumikhira kameechi ako khusaaba kamakhono ne khusiinga bikele biabwe.
Bakhesiinge ne bengila mu liiema lie kumuse namwe ne bembiisia alutare khukhola kimilimo nga kie khukhwosia biiunya bulayi ne busa bafwa.
Bakhoyeele basaabe kamakhono kabwe ne khusiinga bikele biabwe, nio balekhe khufwa tawe. Elino lili lilaka lia mindali khu Aruni ne lisaaye liewe khulwe chiselukho chichiicha choosi.”
“Bukula biiunya bulayi binosie. Bibe chishekeli chimia chiraano che kamafura ka manemane, bibiindu biiunya bulayi khukhwama khu murongooro kumudalasini bibioola chishekeli chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, ne biiunya bulayi bie kumwiba kumunulu bioosi chishekeli chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano.
Bukula akhaba kamoola ke kumurongooro kwa kida kaunya bulayi chishekeli chimia chiraano. Bino bioosi bikelwe khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie Abuundu Atakatifu. Tasakho kamafura ke kumuseituni chichupa chiraano.
Nio khola khukhwama mu bino kamafura kamaule ke khuchukha, kamafura katubanisibwe mu busicha.
Nio ochukhe kamafura ako khu liiema lie kumuse ne lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Chukha kamafura ako khu mesa ne bibiindu biayo bioosi, khu siteetwe sie etaa ne bibiindu biasio bioosi, ne khu alutare eye khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Lundi chukha kamafura ako khu alutare eye biiunya bulayi ne alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia ne bibiindu biayo bioosi alala ne lulweelo ne sibale sialwo.
Yaula bibiindu bino nio bibe bitakatifu lukali. Siosi siosi sibietisiakho sikhoya sibe sitakatifu.
Ne chukha khu Aruni ne khu baana bewe kamafura nio bakholele nga basaayi.
Ne boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Kano niko kamafura kase kamatakatifu ke khuchukha mu selukho chenywe chichiicha choosi.
Mukhakachukha khu baandu busa tawe, lundi mukharumikhirakho engila ng'eneyo khukhola kamafura kosi kosi tawe. Kali kamafura kamatakatifu ne kakhoya kabukulibwe khuuba kamatakatafu khwinywe buli lwoosi.
Yesi yesi okholakho kamafura nga ako kario namwe yesi yesi olikachukha khu mukwa akhanjukhwe ne babaandu bewe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Bukula bibiindu biiunya bulayi lukano na lukano mala obitubaasie mu bikelo bilekhaana.
Khola bibiindu biiunya bulayi bibiatubaanisibwa mu busicha. Tasamo kumuunyu kubikhole khuba bimiliiu lundi bitakatifu.
Chunga bilala bibe binosie mala obire ebweeni we lisanduku lie Ndakaano mu liiema lie kumuse, nimwo ndiakaananila ne nanywe. Bikhoya biaba bitakatifu elala khwinywe.
Mukhang'oona biiunya bulayi bienywe mwabeene khulwe khurumikhira engila niyo emwekesie yino tawe. Bukula engila yino khuuba endakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne akhola bioosi biili nga nibio mala abirumikhira nga biiunya bulayi bie khukhwiakha acha khwanjukhwa ne babaandu bewe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Lola, naroboore Besaleli, okhwa Uri lundi omwichukhulu owa Huri, khukhwama mu kholo ya Yuda.
Ne namwichuusie ne Roho
Namukholile endio nio anyale khukhola bibiindu mu busicha khukhwama mu sahabu, efwesa, ne kumukasa.
Lundi khulwe khukhalaka kamabaale ke khurekekha, khulwe khubeecha kimirongooro, ne khulwe khukhola kimilimo chingano choosi.
Naroboore akhaba Oholiabu okhwa Ahisamaki, khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani, khukhola ne naye. Lundi naelesie akhaba babaandu babaandi boosi basicha kamaani nio banyale khukhola bioosi nibio namulaka.
Balakhola liiema lie kumuse, Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ne ndebe eyayo eye siisa, ne bibiindu bioosi bie mu liiema.
Bakhakhole akhaba emesa ne bibiindu biayo, siteetwe sie sahabu yong'ene ne bibiindu biasio bioosi ne alutare eye bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Lundi bakhakhole alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia ne bibiindu biayo bioosi, lulweelo ne sibale sialwo,
chingubo chindakatifu chichanabwa bulayi khulwa Aruni ne khulwe babaana bewe nga basaayi,
kamafura ke khuchukha, ne bibiindu biiunya bulayi khulwe Abuundu Atakatifu. Bakhakhole khuloondekhana nga ne namulaka enywe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli ‘Liinda chindaalo chase che Sabato, sikila eli simanyisio akari wenywe ne nase khulwe chiselukho chenywe choosi, nio mumanye muli ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namutakaasile enywe.
Liinda e Sabato, sikila eli endakatifu khwinywe. Omundu yesi yesi okhakiliinda tawe, akhoya erwe. Yesi yesi okhola kimilimo khu ndaalo ng'eneyo, akhoya anjukhwa khukhwama mu baandu bewe.
Khola kimilimo kienywe khu ndaalo sita, ne endaalo eya saba eli endaalo eya sabato eye khuola eli endakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Yesi yesi okhola kimilimo mu ndaalo eya sabato akheerwe.
Khwako babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhoya baliinde endaalo eya sabato mala bakikhole ebe likhebulila mu selukho chabwe choosi nga endakaano echiililila.
Sili simanyisio sia mindali akari wase ne babaandu ba Isiraeli sili, khu ndaalo sita Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola likulu ne liloba. Ne khu ndaalo eya saba alekha kimilimo mala aola.’ ”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amala khulomaloma ne Musa khu sikulu sia Sinai, amuelesia kamabaale kabili ke kamalaka kakaandikwa ne lulwala lwa Wele.

Aruni ababoolela ali, “Bukula bipalakasa bie sahabu nibio bakhasi benywe, babaana benywe be sisoleeli, nende be siikhaana befwarire khu maru, mala mundereere.”
Nono babaandu boosi, babukula bipalakasa biabwe bie sahabu bibiaba khu maru kabwe mala bareerera Aruni.
Aruni abukula bipalakasa, abiyenguusia, achukha esahabu akiroka, mala akhola emoosi euunwa eye sahabu.
Babaandu baloma bali, “Ee Isiraeli, Oyuno niye wele wenywe, owamurusia enywe khukhwama mu sibala sie Misiri!”
Nio Aruni nga ne abona kano, ombakha alutare ebweeni we euunwa eye esahabu mala alaangilila ali, “Kumuchuli naikara eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhabeo.”
Babaandu benyokha kumutikhinyi makhelebeende mala baana biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kimileembe. Babaandu bekhala asi khulia ne khunywa mala benyokha bakhina.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Yiikha asi, sikila babaandu bowo, nibo warusia khukhwama e Misiri, bakholile bumayaanu.
Balekhile khaangu engila niyo nabalaka khu kiloonda. Bekholeele emoosi khukhwama khu sahabu eyenguukhe mala bakisaayile niyo lundi bakiaaniile niyo embosio. Balikho baloma bali, ‘Oyuno niye wele wenywe, ee Isiraeli owamurusia enywe khukhwama mu sibala sie Misiri!’
Ese naboone babaandu bano ne lola bali babaluma emirwe.
Nono khwako, ndekhe seng'ene mala lirima liase libe likali khu nibo mala mbabunie. Ne kakhali endakhola lisaaye liowo libe likali.”
Bamisiri bakhakhola bario baloma bali ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne sifuno simayaanu sie khusikula babaandu bewe. Abasikula nio abeerere mu bikulu mala ababunisilie elala khukhwama khu sibala.’ Lekha khukhalala. Yebiiya lilibaasia liowo lie kamabi lino mala okhareera butinyu khu baandu bowo tawe.
Khebulila bakholi bowo Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo. Khebulila liliechuba nilio wamweene wabaelesia mala wababoolela oli, ‘Ekhatase lisaaye lienywe likuche libe nga ching'enieesi ne khulielesia kamaloba kabe kumukabwa kwabwe mindali na mindali.’ ”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ebiiya butinyu nibwo aba ne ebaasia khukholela babaandu bewe.
Ne Musa ayuukha ekha khukhwama khu sikulu, ne asutile kamabaale kabili kakaandikwakho kamalaka chimbeka chombi.
Wele omwene akhola kamabaale mala aandikakho kamalaka.
Nga Yoshua ne aulila babaandu ne bayokela, aboolela Musa ali, “Luyoka lwe liie luli mu kambi.”
Ne kakhali Musa aloma ali, “Se nauliile kumumilo kwe luyoka lwe bukhili namwe kwe lilila lie khuulwa tawe, ne kakhali nauliile luyoka lwe khukhwimba.”
Ne nga Musa ne embiya ekambi busa ari mala abona emoosi ne babaandu balikho bakhina, lirima liamubamo likali. Amwaata kamabaale ke kamalaka niko aba ne asutile mala akaarira mu maayo mwe sikulu.
Abukula euunwa niyo baba ne bakholile, akiosia, akisia yaba nga bufu mala abuchukha mu meechi. Nio akhola babaandu ba Isiraeli banywa kameechi ako.
Musa areeba Aruni ali, “Babaandu bano bakhukholela siina, nio ewe wabakhola bakhola bumayaanu bukali buno?”
Aruni amukobosia ali, “Okhaba ne lirima likali khwise tawe Omwami. Ewe omanyile kimiooyo kie babaandu bano nga kierekekha khukhola bumayaanu.
Bambooleele ese bali, ‘Khukholele wele onyala akhwimeelela. Efwe se khumanya sisiekholekha khu Musa yuno, omundu owakhurusia efwe khukhwama mu sibala sie Misiri tawe.’
Ese nabakobosia ndi, ‘Lekha yesi yesi oli ne esahabu akirusie.’ Nono bambelesia mala nakimwaata mu mulilo mala euunwa emoosi yino yamamo.”
Musa abona ali babaandu balobile khuba asi we bubwimeelesi (Aruni abalekha balobe bubwimeelesi nio baambwe chisoni ebweeni we basiku babwe).
Nono Musa eema asilibwa sie kambi mala areeba ali, “Naanu oli lubeka lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi? Yiicha ano.” Balawi boosi bamwebuusiao.
Ne aboolela Balawi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Buli mundu abanule embalu yewe mala ache buli mu silibwa mu kambi yoosi mala eere omulebe wewe, omusaale, no wasie.’ ”
Balawi bakhola bario mala beera babaandu be siseecha ambi chi elefu chitaru endaalo ng'eneyo.
Musa aboolela Balawi ali, “Endaalo eya luno mweyaule
Endaalo eyaloondakho Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Mwakholile bumayaanu bukali. Nono ndikho nja khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wakana nyala nanyoola sibeelwa khulwe bumayaanu bwenywe.”
Nio Musa akobola khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma ali, “Babaandu bano bakholile bumayaanu bukali. Bekholeele wele khukhwama khu sahabu.
Ne kakhali luno, babeele bumayaanu bwabwe. Ne waaba ne okhababeela tawe, ekhusaba orusie lisina liase nilio wamala khuandika khukhwama mu sitabu nisio waandikamo kamasina ke babaandu bowo.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia Musa ali, “Oyo okholile bumayaanu niye lisina liewe licha khurusibwa khukhwama mu sitabu siase.
Ne kakhali cha oraangirire babaandu bache abuundu niio nakhubooleele. Lola malaika wase acha khubarangirira. Kakhaba kario endaalo ne yoola eye khuaana kumunaanio, ndibaa kumunaanio khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe.”
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera butinyu khu baandu, sikila bakhola Aruni abakholela emoosi euunwa eye sahabu.

Nja khuruma malaika amurangirile, ne nja khuoonamo Bakanaani, Baamori, Bahiti, Baperisi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi.
Cha mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga. Ne ese se endacha ne nanywe tawe, sikila muli babaandu babaluma emirwe, khwako ekhola ndio namubunisilia khu ngila.”
Babaandu nga ne baulila kamakhuwa kamabi kano, barakikha khulila mala se befwara kamamili lundi tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba abooleele Musa ali, “Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Enywe muli babaandu ba baluma emirwe. Naaba ne nja ne nanywe akhaba khulwe siise, nyala nababunisilia elala. Nono fuula kamamili kenywe nio emanye nisio emukholela.’ ”
Nono babaandu ba Isiraeli se bafwarakho lundi kamamili tawe khukhwama nga ne barura a sikulu sia Sinai, khuchiililila.
Nono buli lwosi Musa abukulanga liiema ne alira enje we kambi, sinaao ne kambi. Alilaanga ali liiema lie kumuse. Buli mundu yesi yesi oyiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba anyala acha mu liiema lie kumuse liliaba enje we kambi.
Musa buli lwosi nga ne achichanga mu liiema, babaandu boosi baba banyala beema a miliango kie kamaeema kabwe mala baloleelela Musa khukhwola nga ne engila mwieema lie kumuse.
Nga Musa ne engilanga mu liiema, lifuumbi liekhaanga asi mala liba a muliango we liiema, ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Musa.
Ne nga babaandu boosi ne babonanga lifuumbi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, boosi benyokhanga ne basaayila buli omundu amuliango kwe liiema liewe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomalomanga ne Musa moni na moni, nga omundu ne alomaloma ne omusaale wewe. Enyuma wako, Musa akobolanga mu kambi. Ne omuyeeti wewe omuele, Yoshua okhwa Nuni se aruranga mu liiema lie kumuse tawe.
Musa alomaloma ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Lola ewe wambooleele ese oli ndangirire babaandu bano ne se wambooleele unduma ne naanu tawe. Ne walomile oli umanyile ese ne lisina lundi oli nakhusiimiisie.
Nono khwako ekhusaba, naaba ne ekhusiimisie, mboolele chingila chowo nio ese ekhumanye ewe mala khusiimisie. Lundi khebulila oli ekholo yino eli babaandu bowo.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ese samwene ndacha ne nanywe, mala nja khumuelesia kumuleembe.”
Musa aloma ali, “Waaba ewe wamweene ne okhacha ne nafwe tawe, okhakhukhola khwama ano tawe.
Sikila lilamanyikhana liriena lili ese ne babaandu bowo khwakhusiimisie ewe? Khucha khwowo ne nafwe khucha khukhwaukhasia efwe khukhwama khu baandu babaandi be khu liloba.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Nisio olomile sino nisio nja khukhola sikila wasiimiisie ese lundi ese ekhumanyile.”
Nio Musa asaba ali, “Nosiima, njekesie luyali lwowo.”
Ne kakhali se nja khukhufukiilila obone bubweeni bwase tawe, sikila mbao omundu yesi yesi onyala wambona mala amenya tawe.
Lola aliio abuundu embi ne nase niio onyala weema khu lwanda.
Luyali lwase ne lubira, nja khukhura mu lubangaachi lwe lulwanda mala ekhufuunikhe ne kumukhono kwase khukhwola nga ne nja khubira.
Nio ndusieo kumukhono kwase, mala ocha khubona kumukoongo kwase ne se ocha khubona bubweeni bwase tawe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Choonga kamabaale kabili nga ke khunyoa. Nja khukaandikakho kamakhuwa ka kaaba khu mabaale ke khunyoa niko waraakaka.
Yirekekha kumutikhinyi mala wiiche niio ndi khu ndeleelwa khwe sikulu sia Sinai.
Mbao omundu akhaba mulala onyala wecha ne nawe tawe. Ne omundu akhaba mulala akhabonekhakho khu lubeka lwosi lwosi lwe sikulu tawe. Ne kamakheese namwe chikhaafu chosi chosi chikhaayakho khu sikulu tawe.”
Nono Musa achonga kamabaale kabili nga ke khunyoa. Enyokha makhelebeende kumutikhinyi kukwaloondakho akasuta acha nako khu Sikulu sia Sinai, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhela mu lifuumbi, eema ne Musa ebweeneyo, mala alaangilila lisina liewe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
