Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abira ebweeni wa Musa ne elaanga ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele ooli ne kumwalaalo ne siisa, ookhali ne lirima lia khangu tawe, lundi owe busiime bukali bukhawa tawe ne busuubilwa.
Ekesianga busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe khu selukho chielefu
Musa khangu busa enama asi mala asaaya.
Musa aloma ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, waaba ng'ali ne osiimisibwa ne nase, ekhusaba oche ne nafwe, babaandu bowo bakhaba ne baluma emirwe. Ne khubeele bumayaanu bwefwe ne kamakhiikha, mala okhufukiilile nga babaandu khuuli kumukabwa kwowo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Ese ndikho ekhola endakaano ne babaandu ba Isiraeli. Nja khukhola bibiindu bie liukia ebweeni we babaandu bowo bisiili khwikholekhakho osi osi khu liloba namwe mu kholo yosi yosi tawe. Babaandu boosi nibo mumenyile nabo balibona bikholwa biase, sikila nja khumukholela enywe sisiindu sie liriisia.
Loonda kamalaka niko Ese ndikho emuelesia endaalo eya luno. Nja khuoona Baamori, Bakanaani, Bahiti, Baperisi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi barure ebweeni wenywe.
Yeliinda mukhakhola murio mwakhola endakaano ne bamenywa be mu sibala nimwo muchamo tawe, sikila okuno kunyala kwaba kumureko akari wenywe.
Mukhatechulake chi alutare chabwe, mufuniakake chinjeko chabwe, mala muremakakile asi bifwaani bia wele wabwe Ashera.
“Mukhasaayakho wele okundi tawe, sikila Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, olaangwa bali Likhendekha ndi ne likhendekha.
Mukhakhola endakaano ne babaandu be sibala esio tawe. Busa bakhola bario bamulaanga enywe ne balikho besaaya bawele babwe ne khubaanila chimbosio. Nio mukhola murio mwalia chinyama che chimbosio chabwe.
Babaana benywe be sisoleeli bakhola bario bakhwa bakhaana babwe. Lundi bakhaana babwe bakhola bario bakhola bueeyani ebweeni we bawele baabwe mala bakhole babaana benywe be sisoleeli basaaye bawele baabwe.
Ne sikula epunda embele ne likheese khulwe khuruunga likheese. Ne waaba ne okhakhola orio mala wakisikula kiborore likosi lifunikhe. Musikule buli omwana owe sisoleeli omubele.
“Mbao akhaba mulala obonekha ebweeni wase ne akhali ne siianwa tawe.
“Babaandu bowo bakhoya beche banjisaaye Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, khataru buli kumwiiko.
Ekhatimanie chikholo ebweeni wenywe ne khubalaayisia chinjakha che sibala sienywe. Mbao omundu akhaba mulala ocha khukhwikoomba sibala sienywe mu biise bitaru bie kumwiiko nibio muchilakho ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
“Okhateekha limeeme ne likhalukuwa tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Andika kamakhuwa kano. Sikila nakholile endakaano ne nawe ne Isiraeli khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa menako.”
Musa aba ebweeneyo ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe chindaalo kamakhumi kane, siilo ne kumuusi ne akhalia namwe ne akhanywa sisiindu siosi siosi tawe. Aandika khu mabaale kamakhuwa ke ndakaano, Kamalaka Likhumi ako.
Aruni ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli nga ne balola Musa mala babona bali bubweeni bwewe bwaba bulikho bukhosia, baaria khumwimbiya niio aba.
Ne kakhali Musa abalaanga. Ne Aruni ne babemeelesi boosi be libuusiana bacha niio aba mala Musa alomaloma ne nabo.
Enyuma wako, babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli babuusiana niio Musa aba mala abaelesia kamalaka khuloondekhana ne koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela khu Sikulu sia Sinai.
Musa nga ne amala khulomaloma ne nabo, efuuma bubweeni bwewe ne neti.
Ne kakhali buli lwosi nga Musa ne engilaanga mu liiema khulomaloma ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, afuulanga e neti khukhwola nga ne aruranga. Ne nga aruranga enje, aboolelanga babaandu ba Isiraeli buli sisiindu nisio aba ne alakiilwe.
Baisiraeli babona bali bubweeni bwa Musa bwaba ne bukhosia. Nio Musa afwaraanga e neti lundi khukhwola siise sisiindi nisio achilakho khulomaloma ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Musa abuusia libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli lioosi alala. Ne ababoolela ali, “Ebino bili bibiindu nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulakile enywe khukhola.
Muli ne chindaalo sita che khukholelamo kimilimo, ne endaalo eya saba eli endakatifu, eye sabato, eye liola lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omundu yesi yesi okhola kimilimo khu ndaalo ng'eneyo eerwe.
Mukhabwaanakho kumulilo mu chingo chenywe mu sabato tawe.”
Musa aboolela libuusiana lioosi lie babaandu ba Isiraeli ali, “Elino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile.
Buli mulala mwinywe aanile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa. Lekha omundu yesi yesi owe kumwoyo kwe khuaana areere siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sie esahabu, efwesa ne kumukasa.
Lundi areere buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu, engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi ne bufuumbo bwe chimbusi.
Enyekha lundi areere akhaba engubo eye bufuumbo bwe kamamiiku nibwo baakhile erangi embesemu, kamasieelo ke chimbusi, chimbao che chinyaali.
Lundi areere kamafura ke chitaa, bibiindu bing'ayilisia khulwe mumafura ke khuchukha khu barobore ne khulwe bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Lundi areere kamabaale ke bukusi ne kamabaale kakaandi ke khurekekha mu efodi ne khulwe engubo eye musifuba.
“Lekha buli mundu mwinywe oli omusicha eeche mala akhole koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile.
Lekha bakhole liiema litakatifu, liiema lialio lie enje ne sifunikho sialio. Lundi bakhole chingaki ne kimitalaachi kialio kimilapa kialio, chinjeko chalio ne bibale bialwo.
Lekha bakhole akhaba lisanduku lie Ndakaano, chinguulo chalio, endebe eye siisa ne lububi lukikhiinga.
Bakhole emesa, chinguulo chayo ne bibiindu biayo bioosi, ne kumukaati kwe khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lundi siteetwe sie taa khulwe buwaanga ne bibiindu biasio, chitaa chasio ne kamafura khulwe buwaanga.
Bakhole alutare eye biiunya bulayi ne chinguulo chayo ne kamafura ke khuchukha khu barobore, biiunya bulayi ne epasia khulwe kumuliango kwe liiema litakatifu.
Alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia alala ne bitiila bie kumukasa, chinguulo chayo, bibiindu biayo bioosi, enjikha ne sibale siayo.
Chipasia che luuya chinjeko chacho ne bibale, ne epasia khulwe silibwa sie luuya bioosi bikholwe.
Bitiila liiema litakatifu ne bitiila luuya ne kimikoye kiabio,
ne chingubo chichanabwa bulayi nicho basaayi befwara ne balikho bakhola Abuundu Atakatifu, chingubo chindakatifu khulwo Omusaayi Aruni ne khulwe babaana bewe khulwe kimilimo kiabwe nga basaayi.”
Nio libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli lioosi liarekukha liarura niio Musa aba.
Buli owaba ne lilienya ne kumwoyo kwe khukhola ario areera siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe liiema lie kumuse nende khulwe kimilimo kioosi ne chingubo chindakatifu.
Nono babaandu boosi ba baaba ne kumwoyo becha, be siseecha nende be siikhasi. Bareera bipiini, chindeekwe, bipalakasa bie khu maru, chimbete, ne bibiindu bioosi bibiang'oonwa khu sahabu. Buli mundu aana siianwa sie esahabu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buli yesi yesi owaba ne buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, namwe bubesemu bwe engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi namwe bufuumbo bwe chimbusi, namwe kamasieelo ke kamamiiku namwe kamasieelo ke chimbusi abireera.
Boosi babanyala khuaana siianwa sie efwesa namwe kumukasa basireera nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne buli mundu owaba ne kumurongooro kumunyaali kukwanyala khukhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi akureera.
Ne bakhasi boosi ba baaba ne banyala khukhwokusa ne kamakhono kabwe bareera nibio baba ne bokuuse bie buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne bwe engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi.
Lundi bakhasi boosi ba baaba ne kumwoyo kwe khukhola kimilimo bakhola buusi bwe bufuumbo bwe chimbusi.
Babemeelesi bareera kamabaale kamelamela ne kamabaale kakaandi ke khurekekha khulwe efodi ne khulwe engubo eye mu sifuba.
Bareera akhaba bing'ayisia bulayi ne kamafura khulwe chitaa, khulwe khuchukha khu barobore ne khulwe bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi.
Babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli, be siseecha nende be siikhasi babeenya khureera sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe kimilimo nikio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa kiekholekhe, babireera nga biianwa bie khukhwerusia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Musa aboolela Baisiraeli ali, “Lola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aroboore Besaleli, okhwa Uri lundi omwichukhulu owa Huri, khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda.
Ne amwichuusie ne Roho
Anyala akhola bibiindu mu busicha khukhwama khu sahabu, efwesa ne kumukasa.
Anyala akhala kamabaale khulwe khurekekha, ne khubeecha kimirongooro, ne khulwe kimilimo chingano choosi.
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesiisie Besaleli ne Oholiabu okhwa Ahisamaki, khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani, kumukabwa kwe khukhwikisia.
Abaelesie bukesi bwe khukhola kimilimo chingano choosi nga khuchoonga, khuchoora, khunaba bie buusi bubuusi, buufwaana buseemwa, bubesemu nende bwe engubo eya katani endayi. Banyala khukhola bibiindu bie khurukwa ne kamakhono ne bibiindu bie bufundi.

“Nono Besaleli ne Oholiabu, ne bakholi babaandi boosi nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia sinani ne bukesi khumanya khukhola kimilimo khu Lukaangu, balakhola khuloondekhana nende koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile.”
Musa alaanga Besaleli ne Oholiabu, alala ne bakholi babaandi boosi banyala, nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia sinani lundi ba baaba ne kumwoyo kwe khuyeeta, beeche bakhole kimilimo.
Banyoola khukhwama khu Musa biianwa bie khukhwerusia bioosi nibio Baisiraeli bareera khulwe khukhwombakhila Abuundu Atakatifu. Ne babaandu ba Isiraeli bachiililila khureerera Musa biianwa bie khukhwerusia buli kumutikhinyi.
Nio bakholi be sinani boosi ba baaba ne balikho bakhola kumulimo bacha barura buli mundu khukhwama khu mulimo nikwo aba ne alikho akhola.
Ne baboolela Musa bali, “Babaandu balareeranga khutuumia sikelo sisienyekhana khulwe kumulimo nikwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka khukhola.”
Nono Musa aaana lilaka, mala likhuwa lialaangililwa mu kambi lili, “Mbao omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi yesi yesi ocha khuaana lundi khulwe liiema litakatifu tawe.” Nio babaandu bakhiingililwa khuaana.
Kaba kario sikila bibiindu nibio bakholi be mu liiema litakatifu baba ne nabio biaba bioola khukhola kimilimo kioosi mala bisikale.
Babaandu boosi ba banyala, bakhola liiema litakatifu. Balikhola khulwe khurumikhira chipasia ekhumi. Chipasia echo chaba chanabwa khukhwama khu ngubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi ne buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu mala chanabwakho ekerubi mungila eye busicha.
Buleeyi bwa buli epasia bwaba bikele kamakhumi kabili na munaane ne bukhiikha bikele bine. Chipasia choosi chaba chindekhaane buleeyi ne bukhiikha.
Banabila alala chipasia chiraano ne chichiindi chiraano bachinabila alala.
Bakhola chimbete chimbuusi khu likemo lie epasia eye enje khu buli sipupu sie chipasia.
Bakhola chimbete kamakhumi karaano khu pasia chiraano che khunyoa ne chimbete kamakhumi karaano bachibotookhelesia khu pasia che khabili. Chimbete echo chaloleelelana.
Bakhola chingaki che esahabu kamakhumi karaano, nicho baambanisilia chipasia bipupu bibili, buli sipupu khu sindi nio liiema litakatifu liaba busa lilala.
Nio bakhola chipasia khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe chimbusi, khulwe sifuunikho sie liiema litakatifu. Choosi alala chaba chipasia ekhumi na ndala.
Buleeyi bwa buli epasia bwaba bikele kamakhumi kataru ne bukhiikha bikele bine. Chipasia ekhumi na ndala echo choosi chaba chilekhaana, buleeyi ne bukhiikha.
Banabila alala chipasia chiraano. Lundi chichiindi sita bachinabila alala.
Banabila chimbete kamakhumi karaano khu likemo lie epasia eye enje eye chipasia che khunyoa ne chimbete kamakhumi karaano bachinabila khu likemo lie enje lie chipasia che khabili.
Ne akhola chingaki kamakhumi karaano che kumukasa khuambanisilia alala liiema litakatifu nio libe lilala.
Akholela liiema sifuunikho sie kamasieelo kamabesemu ke kamamiiku ne ke chimbusi.
Nio akhola kimitalaachi nikio emia khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali khulwe liiema litakatifu.
Buli kumutalaachi kwaba buleeyi bikele likhumi ne bukhiikha sikele silala ne enusu.
Buli kumutalaachi kwaba ne biaambaania bibili khulwe khuambaania alala. Aakhola ario khu mitalaachi kioosi kie liiema.
Eyino niyo engila niyo bakholelamo kimitalaachi kie liiema litakatifu: kimitalaachi kamakhumi kabili kialoleelela lubeka lwe ebunafubo.
Ne akhola bibale kamakhumi kane bie efwesa asi we kimitalaachi kamakhumi kabili. Bibale bibili biaba asi we kumutalaachi mulala khulwe khutiililila biaambaania bibili. Ne bibale bibiindi bibili biaba asi we kumutalaachi kukuundi.
Bakhola kimitalaachi kamakhumi kabili lubeka lwe ebunaswa we liiema litakatifu.
Kimitalaachi kiaba ne bibale biakio kamakhumi kane bie efwesa. Biabao bibale bibili asi owa buli kumutalaachi.
Ne khulwe enyuma we liiema litakatifu, lubeka lwe mumbo balikholela kimitalaachi sita.
Bakhola kimitalaachi kibili khulwe chikhuumbo che liiema litakatifu enyuma.
Kimitalaachi kie mu khuumbo kino kiakabukhanamo asi ne kakhali kiaambaana kiombi mu mukhono kwe khunyoa khucha angaaki. Nono bakhola kimitalaachi kibili khulwe chikoona chibili.
Khwako kiabao kimitalaachi munaane ne bibale biakio bie efwesa. Biaba bibale likhumi na sita, bibale bibili asi owa buli kumutalaachi.
Bakhola kimilapa kie kimirongooro kiminyaali, kiraano khulwe kimitalaachi kiili khu lubeka lulala lwe liiema,
kiraano khulwe kimitalaachi kie lubeka luluundi lwe liiema, ne kiraano luundi khulwe kimitalaachi kie enyuma, lubeka lwe mumbo.
Bakhola kumulapa kwe akari kwabira khukhwama khu ndulo khulala khwe liiema litakatifu khukhwola khu luundi.
Bafuunikha kimitalaachi ne esahabu mala barakho kamakhono ke esahabu khulwe khutiila kimilapa. Akhaba kimilapa kiosi kiafuunikhwa ne esahabu.
Banaba epasia eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi. Lundi balunabilakho chikerubi mu ngila eye busicha.
Bakholela epasia eyo chinjeko chine che kimirongooro kiminyaali, mala bakifuunikha ne esahabu. Chingaki che chinjeko chaba che esahabu. Nio bakhola bibale bine bie efwesa bie khurakho chinjeko.
Lundi bakholela kumuliango kwe liiema epasia. Epasia eyo yanabwa ne buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda ne bubesemu ne engubo endayi eya katani mu bunabi bwe busicha.
Bakhola chinjeko chiraano khulwe epasia yino ne chingaki chacho. Bafuunikha bimuli ne chimbete chabio ne esahabu. Ne kakhali bibale biacho biraano biaba bie kumukasa.

Besaleli akhola Lisanduku lie ndakaano khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali. Buleeyi bwe lisanduku elio bwaba bikele bibili ne enusu, bukhiikha sikele silala ne enusu ne buniina sifuba silala ne enusu.
Alifuunikha ne esahabu yong'ene mukari ne enje mala alimalilila khu ndulo khwalio ne esahabu alibotookhelesia.
Arakho kamakhono kane ke esahabu khulwe chikhuumbo chalio. Ara kamakhono kabili buli lubeka.
Alikholela chinguulo che kumurongooro kumunyaali, mala achifuunikha ne esahabu.
Ara chinguulo echo mu makhono ako, kakaba buli lubeka lwe lisanduku khulwe khulisuta.
Akhola sifuunikho sie esahabu yong'ene. Siaba buleeyi bikele bibili ne enusu ne bukhiikha sikele silala ne enusu.
Nio abasa chikerubi chibili che esahabu yong'ene. Chikerubi echo achikhola chibe khu ndulo khwe sifuunikho.
Ekerubi ndala yaba khu ndulo khulala khwe sifuunikho ne ekiindi khu ndulo khukhuundi. Akhola chikerubi chibili echo ne sifuunikho biaba siindu silala.
Chikerubi echo chabalaaya chindaa chacho chafuunikha sifuunikho. Chikerubi chaloleelela sifuunikho. Lundi chaloleelelana.
Lundi akhola emesa eye kumurongooro kumunyaali. Buleeyi bwaba bikele bibili, bukhiikha sikele silala ne buniina sifuba silala ne enusu.
Afuunikha emesa eyo ne esahabu yong'ene mala lundi akimalilila ne esahabu akibotookhelesia.
Akibotookhelesia ne kumutalaachi kuuli bukhiikha sikalabo silala. Amalilila kumutalaachi okwo ne esahabu akubotookhelesia.
Ara khu mesa okhwo kamakhono kane ke esahabu mala akara khu khuumbo chine che bikele biayo bine.
Kamakhono kaba siimbi ne kimitalaachi nio katiile chinguulo chisuta emesa.
Akhola chinguulo che khusuta emesa khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali mala achifuunikha ne esahabu.
Ne akholela emesa bibiindu bibienyekha khukhwama khu sahabu yong'ene. Bibiindu ebio biaba: chipwakuli, bibuumba khulwe bibiindu biiunya bulayi, bibuumba ne kimieendo kie khuchukha biianwa bie khunywa.
Lundi akhola siteetwe sie taa sie esahabu yong'ene. Sibale siasio ne kumukhono kwayo biakholwa ne esahabu embase. Bikoombe biasio, ne bimuli biasio biaba siindu silala ne sie siteetwe.
Chisakia sita chacha khukhwama chimbeka chasio, chitaru khukhwama buli lubeka.
Buli lulala musakia sita echo lwabakho bikoombe bitaru bibiakholwa nga bimuli bie kumurongooro alimondi. Buli sikoombe siabakho situumi ne simuli.
Ne khu siteetwe sie taa khubwene khwabakho bikoombe bine bibiakholwa nga bimuli bie kumurongooro kwa alimondi alala ne bituumi biabio ne bimuli biabio.
Buli asi we chisakia chibili siabakho simuli. Buli simuli siakholwa siaba siindu silala ne lusakia.
Bimuli, chisakia, ne siteetwe sie taa bioosi biaba biakholwa khukhwama khu siindu silala. Bioosi biaba biakholwa ne bubasi bwe esahabu yong'ene.
Akhola chitaa saba khulwe siteetwe mala akhola chindaambi chayo ne chisahani chayo che esahabu yong'ene.
Akhola siteetwe sie taa ne bibiindu biasio bioosi khulwe khurumikhira chikiilo kamakhumi kataru na chiraano che esahabu yong'ene.
Akhola alutare khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali, khulwe khukhwoseliakho biiunya bulayi. Yaba elekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha. Buleeyi bwayo bwaba sikele silala ne bukhiikha bwayo bwaba sikele silala. Buniina bwayo bwaba bifuba bibili. Bifwaani bie chinjika biayo biaba biakholwa khukhwama khu siindu silala ne nayo.
Afuunikha khu ngaaki khwayo, chimbeka choosi chine, ne bifwaani bie chinjika biasio ne esahabu yong'ene mala amalilila esahabu khu ndulo khwayo asibotookhelesia.
Akhola kamakhono kabili ke esahabu mala akara asi we bumalilile bwe sahabu. Kamakhono ako akakhola khu mbeka chibili cha alutare kaloleelelana. Kamakhono ako kaba ke chinguulo khulwe khusuta alutare.
Akhola chinguulo che kumurongooro kumunyaali mala achifuunikhila esahabu.

Akhola alutare khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali khulwe biianwa bie khukhwosia. Alutare eyo yaba elekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha: Buleeyi bwaba bikele biraano, bukhiikha bikele biraano, ne buniina bifuba bitaru.
Akikholela chinjika khu khuumbo chayo chine mala achifuunikha ne kumukasa. Chinjika chayo chakholwa chaba siindu silala ne alutare.
Akhola bibiindu bioosi khulwa alutare eyo: Akhola chinyuungu, chimbako, bibuumba, chiuma, ne chinjo. Bibiindu bino bioosi biakholwa khukhwama khu mukasa.
Akhola lutimba lwe kumukasa lubalaayi asi we sibale sia alutare abotookhelesia sibale. Lutimba lwoola akari wa alutare khukhwama asi.
Akhola kamakhono kane khu khuumbo chine che epasia che kumukasa. Kamakhono ako kaba ke khutiila chinguulo che khusuta alutare.
Akhola chinguulo echo khukhwama khu murongooro kumunyaali mala achifuunikha ne kumukasa.
Ara chinguulo mu makhono ke mukhuumbo cha alutare nio chisute alutare. Akhola alutare eye chimbao mala mukari mwayo mwalaangilila busa.
Akhola lumako lwe liiema. Lubeka lwe ebunafubo arayo chipasia che engubo eya katani endayi. Engubo eyo yaba yoola bikele emia ndala buleeyi.
Chinjeko chacho chaba kamakhumi kabili ne akhaba bibale biacho bioosi biaba kamakhumi kabili. Chinjeko echo ne bibale biaba biakholwa khukhwama khu mukasa. Ne chikhali chingaki che chinjeko ne kimitiindi biaba biakholwa khukhwama khu fwesa.
Lubeka lwe ebunaswa lwosi arayo chipasia buleeyi bikele emia ndala. Chinjeko chacho chaba kamakhumi kabili. Bibale bioosi biaba kamakhumi kabili. Chinjeko ne bibale biaba bie kumukasa. Ne chingaki chacho ne chinjeko ne kimitiindi biaba bie efwesa.
Lubeka lwe mumbo chabayo chipasia buleeyi bikele kamakhumi karaano. Chinjeko chacho chaba likhumi ne bibale likhumi. Chingaki che chinjeko ne kimitiindi biaba bie efwesa.
Lubeka lwe bukwe lwaba buleeyi bikele kamakhumi karaano.
Chipasia lubeka lulala lwe silibwa chaba buleeyi bikele likhumi na biraano ne chinjeko chitaru ne bibale bitaru.
Akhaba lubeka luluundi lwe silibwa lwosi lwaba lurio: chipasia chaba buleeyi bikele likhumi na biraano ne chinjeko chitaru ne bibale bitaru.
Chipasia choosi chichabotookhelesia lumako chaba che engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi.
Bibale bie chinjeko biaba bie kumukasa. Ne chikhali chingaki che chinjeko ne kimitiindi kiacho biaba bie efwesa. Ne bituumi bie chinjeko bioosi biafuunikhwa ne efwesa. Chinjeko che lumako choosi chaba ne kimitiindi kie efwesa.
Epasia eye silibwa sie lumako yaba yanabwa ne buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda ne bubesemu ne bwe engubo eya katani endayi. Epasia eyo yaba eye buleeyi bikele kamakhumi kabili ne buniina bifuba biraano. Buniina bwe epasia eyo bwalekhaana ne buniina bwe chipasia che lumako lwe liiema litakatifu.
Epasia eyo yaba ne chinjeko chine ne bibale biacho bine bie kumukasa. Chingaki ne kimitiindi biaba bie efwesa. Ne bituumi biafuunikhwa ne efwesa.
Biaambania bioosi bie mu liiema ne chipasia che lumako choosi khubotookhelela biaba bie kumukasa.
Ebino nibio bibiindu bibiarumikhwa mu liiema litakatifu. Biabalwa khubirira khu lilaka lia Musa khulwe kimilimo kie Balawi. Balawi bemeelelwa ne Itamari okhwa Aruni omusaayi.
Besaleli okhwa Uri lundi omwichukhulu owa Huri, khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, akhola koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa.
Ne Oholiabu okhwa Ahisamaki, khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani aba omuyeeti wewe. Oholiabu aba anyala akhola bibiindu khukhwama khu buusi bubuusi ne bunapeenda ne bubesemu ne akhaba bwe chingubo cha katani chindayi.
Esahabu yoosi eyaanwa khulwe khurumikha khukhola kimilimo kioosi kie liiema litakatifu yakelwa. Yaba yoosi alala bitonyi kamakhumi kabili na tisa ne chishekeli chimia saba ne kamakhumi kataru. Yakelwa khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne efwesa yaama mu libuusiana lie babaandu ba babalwa. Yoosi yaba bitonyi emia ndala ne chishekeli eelefu ndala ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi saba na chiraano. Efwesa yosi yakelwa khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Buli mundu arusia enusu eye eshekeli khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie Abuundu Atakatifu. Babaandu boosi babalwa khukhwama khu bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khuniina. Baba boosi alala babaandu chielefu chimia sita na chitaru, ne chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi karaano.
Bitonyi bie efwesa emia ndala biarumikhwa khulwe khura bibale Abuundu Atakatifu ne bibale bie lububi. Buli sitonyi silala siaba khulwe sibale, nio biaba bitonyi emia khulwe bibale emia ndala.
Ne akhola chingaki che chinjeko, afuunikha bituumi biacho ne khuchikholela kimitiindi khulwe khurumikhira chishekeli chimia saba ne kamakhumi saba na chiraano.
Kumukasa nikwo bareera kwaba busiro bitonyi kamakhumi saba ne chishekeli chielefu chibili ne chimia chine.
Arumikhira kumukasa okwo khukhola bibale bie kumuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, alutare ne neti yayo ne bibiindu bioosi bie mu alutare.
Lundi akurumikhira khukhola bibale bibiabotookhelesia lumako ne bibale bie silibwa sie lumako ne biaambaania bioosi bie liiema litakatifu ne biaambaania bibiabotookhelesia lumako.

Banabila Aruni chingubo che busaayi. Nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka, banaba chingubo che buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani endayi khulwe khukhola kimilimo Abuundu Atakatifu.
Bakhola efodi khukhwama khu sahabu, buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani endayi.
Bakhola esahabu mala bakitonyaka yaaba oli bufu mala bakinabila mu ngubo eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, ne bubesemu engubo eya katani endayi.
Bakholela efodi bilaka bibili khu mabeka koombi. Bilaka ebio babiaambanisilia khu khuumbo chibili cha efodi.
Lundi barakho lukhoba luboa efodi lulwakholwa mu ngila eye busicha. Lukhoba olwo lwaba lwakholwa lwaba siindu silala ne efodi. Lundi bunabi bwaba bufwaanana. Lwakholwa ne esahabu, buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda ne bubesemu ne engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Barekekha kamabaale ke kamelamela. Bara kamabaale ako mu nyilili che esahabu kaaba nga buaandike bwe kumuuri. Bakaramo khuloondekhana ne kamasina ke ba okhwa Yakobo.
Babukula kamabaale ako bakara khu bilaka bia efodi bie khu mabeka kabe kamabaale ke likhebulila khulwe babaana ba Isiraeli nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Banaba engubo eye musifuba mu ngila eye busicha nga nilwo bakhola efodi. Bakikhola khukhwama khu sahabu, buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo endayi eya katani.
Engubo eyo yalekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha, chisendimita kamakhumi kabili na chine. Yafumbwamo khabili.
Bara mu ngubo omwo chinyilili chine che kamabaale. Lunyilili lunyoa, lwaba lwe libaale libesemu lukali, linamaki ne libesemu.
Mu lunyilili lukhola khabili, libaale lie lubookha, libuusi, ne lie kumutooba.
Mu lunyilili lukhola khataru, libaale linakhanyuusi, lulwanda lumelamela ne linapeenda.
Ne lunyilili lukhola khane, libaale lie lubookha lukali, limelamela ne lie kumutooba. Arumikhira esahabu khura kamabaale kano khu ngubo eye musifuba.
Kabao kamabaale ekhumi na kabili, kakaandikwakho kamasina khuloondekhana ne ba okhwa Yakobo. Kamasina ako kaba nga kimiuuri buli libaale ne lisina lialio khulwe chikholo ekhumi na chibili cha Isiraeli.
Bakhola kiminyololo kie esahabu yong'ene, eyabororwa nga kimikoye, khulwe engubo eye musifuba.
Bakhola chinyilili chibili che esahabu ne chimbete chibili che sahabu, mala baara chimbete chibili echo khu khuumbo chibili che silaka sie engubo eye musifuba.
Baboela chingoye chibili che esahabu khu mbete chibili chichaba khu likemo lie engubo eye mu sifuba.
Bara chindulo chibili che kiminyololo kibili ekio khu nyilili chibili che esahabu. Bakira ebweeni bilaka bie khu mabeka bia efodi.
Bakhola chimbete chibili che esahabu mala bachaambanisia khu likemo lie mukari lie engubo eye khu sifuba, embi ne efodi.
Bakhola chimbete chibili che esahabu bachira ebweeni asi we bilaka bibili bia efodi. Bachira ambi ne kumunabo, angaaki we lukhoba lwa efodi lulwanabwa mu busicha.
Nio baboela engubo eye musifuba a mbete chayo mala bachwisilia alala ne chimbete cha efodi ne lukoye lubuusi. Bakhola bario nio silaka esio sibe khu lukhoba lwa efodi lulwakholwa mu busicha, lundi nio silaka esio silekhe khurura khu efodi tawe. Kano koosi kakholwa nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Lundi banaba engubo endeeyi mukari mwa eya efodi.
Kumwanya kwe kumurwe kwe engubo eyo kwanabwakho silaka sisiro nio engubo ekhatabukha tawe.
Babotookhelesia likemo liayo ne bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga ke buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda, bubesemu ne engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi.
Lundi bakhola chikengele che esahabu yong'ene mala bachira akari we bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga bibiaba mu makemo ke engubo endeeyi babotookhelesia.
Buli ekengele yaloondela sifwaani sie lituunda likomanga khubotookhelela kamakemo ke engubo eye kimilimo. Kaba kario khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Musa.
Banabila Aruni ne babaana bewe chikaanjo che buusi bwe engubo eya katani endayi.
Akhaba banaba sileemba sie khumurwe, chikuutwa ne chisirwari. Bioosi bino biaba bie engubo eya katani eyanabwa bulayi.
Lundi bakhola kumusiipi kwe engubo eya katani eye buusi bubuusi, bunapeenda ne bubesemu kukwanabwa bulayi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Bakhola limili litakatifu lie esahabu yong'ene. Ne baandikakho kamakhuwa kakafwaana oli kumuuri bali, “Litakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio baboakho kumukoye kwe buusi bubuusi khuchwiisilia khu sileemba angaaki. Kano kakholwa nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Nono kimilimo kioosi kie liiema litakatifu lie kumuse kiawa. Baisiraeli bakhola buli sisiindu khuloondekhana nende koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa.
Bareerera Musa liiema litakatifu ne bibiindu biamwo bioosi: liiema lialio lienje, chingaki chalio, kimitalaachi kialio, kimilapa kialio, chinjeko chalio, ne bibale bialio.
Lundi bareera kamasieelo ke kamamiiku, kamasieelo ke chimbusi ne epasia.
Bareera akhaba lisanduku lie Ndakaano, chinguulo chalio ne endebe eye siisa.
Bareera emesa ne bibiindu biakhwo bioosi, ne kumukaati kwe khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhaba bareera siteetwe sie taa eye esahabu yong'ene, chitaa chasio, bibiindu biasio bioosi, ne kamafura ke chitaa.
Alutare eye esahabu, kamafura kamatakatifu ke khuchukha, biiunya bulayi, ne epasia khulwe kumuliango kwe liiema bioosi biareerwa.
Lundi bareera alutare eye kumukasa ne neti yayo lwe kumukasa, chinguulo chayo, ne bibiindu biayo bioosi. Bareera lulweelo ne sibale sialwo.
Bareera chisuuka che lumako, chinjeko chalio, bibale bialio ne lububi khulwe silibwa sie lumako. Lundi bareera kimikoye, bitiila ne bibiindu bioosi khulwe kimilimo kie liiema litakatifu lie kumuse.
Khutasa khwibio, bareerera Aruni omusaayi ne babaana bewe chingubo chindakatifu che busaayi. Chingubo echo chaba chakholwa bulayi khulwe kimilimo kie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Baisiraeli bakhola kimilimo kioosi khuloondekhana nende koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa.
Musa alola buli sisiindu mala abona ali siekholeekhe. Abona ali bakhola khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio Musa ababiita chikhabi.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Khu ndaalo enyoa
eye kumwesi kunyoa yombakha liiema lie kumuse.
Liremo Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Ne mukhoya mulikhiinge ne epasia.
Ra emesa mu liiema mala murekekhekho bibiindu biayo nga bienyekha. Lundi ramo siteetwe sie taa mala musirekho chi taa.
Lundi ra alutare eye esahabu khulwe biiunya bulayi ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Ne mure epasia emuliango we liiema.
Ra emuliango we liiema lie kumuse alutare eye khukhwosia.
Lundi ra lulweelo akari we liiema ne alutare mala muluchukhekho kameechi.
Ne khola lumako lubotookhelesie liiema mala mure epasia esilibwa walio.
“Nio obukule kamafura ke khuchukha mala ochukhe khu alutare khulwe khukiaula ne bioosi bikilimo. Ne omalile orio liiema lilaba litakatifu.
Lundi, okhoyeele ochukhe kamafura khu alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia ne bibiindu biayo bioosi mala waule alutare. Nio alutare elaba endakatifu lukali.
Akhaba lundi chukha kamafura khu lwelo ne bibale bialwo mala olwaule.
“Nio reera Aruni ne babaana bewe amuliango we liiema lie kumuse mala obasiinge ne kameechi.
Ne fwara Aruni chingubo che busaayi, omuchukhekho kamafura, mala omwaule, nio akholele ese nga omusaayi.
Reera babaana bewe boosi obafwaare chikaanjo.
Nio obachukhekho kamafura, bulayi bwene nga ne ochukhile khu raarawabwe. Nio boosi banyale khukhukholela ese nga basaayi. Liliaaulwa liabwe lino likhabengisie mu busaayi mu biise bioosi ne chiselukho chabwe choosi.”
Musa akhola koosi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Nono mu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kunyoa kwe kumwiiko kukhola khabili ne bamalile khukhwaama e Misiri, liiema liemisibwa.
Musa akholela liiema litakatifu bibale, kimitalaachi, chinguulo ne chinjeko.
Ara liiema lienje khu liiema litakatifu mala alifuunikha nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Nio abukula kamalaka mala akara mu Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Nio ara chinguulo khu Lisanduku lie ndakaano mala ara endebe eye siisa khu ngaaki khwalio.
Nio aara Lisanduku mu liiema litakatifu mala emisia epasia akhiinga lisanduku elio nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Ara emesa mu liiema lie kumuse, lubeka lwe ebunaswa, we liiema litakatifu enje we epasia.
Ne akirakho kumukaati kumutakatifu nga kenyekha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio aara siteetwe sie taa mu liiema lie kumuse lubeka lwe ebunafubo, sialoleelelana ne emesa.
Arekekha chitaa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aara alutare eye esahabu mu liiema lie kumuse, ebweeni we epasia.
Musa oselia bimuli biiunya bulayi khubwenokhwo, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aara epasia a muliango kwe liiema.
Ara alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia a muliango kwe liiema litakatifu lie kumuse. Khu alutare okhwo aanilakho biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie biakhulia nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Musa ara lulweelo akari we liiema lie kumuse ne alutare mala aluchukhakho kameechi ke khusaaba.
Musa ne Aruni, ne ba okhwa Aruni basaabanga kamakhono kabwe ne khusiinga bikele biabwe mubweene omwo.
Basaabanga nio ne bengila mu liiema lie kumuse namwe ne bembiiya alutare nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Musa ombakha lumako lwabotookhelesia liiema ne alutare mala ara khu silibwa sie lumako olwo epasia. Nono Musa amala kimilimo.
Musa se anyala khukhwingila mu liiema lie kumuse tawe sikila lifuumbi liabakho ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwaba lwechuusiemo.
Mu ngendo che Baisiraeli choosi, lifuumbi nga ne lienyokhanga khu liiema litakatifu Baisiraeli baba banyala bachiililila ne lukeendo.
Ne kakhali yaba lifuumbi ne likhenyokhekho tawe, se bachiililila tawe khukhwola siise nisio lifuumbi linyokhela khu liiema.
Mu ngendo chabwe choosi, lifuumbi lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liabechanga khu liiema litakatifu kumuusi ne kumulilo kwabamo siilo. Kano kekholekha Baisiraeli boosi ne babona.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalanga Musa mala amulomalomakho khukhwama mu liiema lie kumuse, amuboolela ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omundu yesi yesi khwinywe aba ne areera siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhoya areera embosio yewe khukhwama mu lituuli liewe lie chikhaafu namwe lie bibiaayo.
Embosio yewe yaaba neli eye khukhwosia khukhwama mu lituuli liewe, khukhwola ebe euunwa ekhalimo bubi tawe. Akhoya akiaanile amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, nio afukiililwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Alara kumukhono kwewe khumurwe kwe mbosio eye khukhwosia, mala elafukiililwa nga embosio emalao bubwoni bwewe.
Nio aleera euunwa eyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne bokhwa Aruni basaayi, balaana kamalasile khu Mwami. Bakhoya baanye kamalasile ne babotookhelesia khu ndulo khwe alutare eli amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Ne omundu oaana embosio eyo akhoya akibaake mala akitonyemo.
Ne bokhwa Aruni omusaayi balanja chiikhu chiloondekhane bulayi khu alutare mala babwaane kumulilo khu alutare.
Ne ba okhwa Aruni basaayi chana bakhare bitonyi bie chinyama, kimirwe ne kiminawa, khukhu chiili khu mulilo khu alutare.
Ne kakhali bie munda ne bileenge bikhoya bisiingwe. Ne omusaayi aloselia embosio yoosi khu alutare, nga embosio eye khukhwosia. Eyino eli embosio eye khukhwosia eaanwa ne kumulilo, ne khuunya khwayo khulayi khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kaaba bali omundu aana siianwa siewe sie khukhwosia khu khwama mu makheese, namwe mu mbusi, akhoya aane endurume namwe limiiku likhalimo bubi tawe.
Alaliirira ebunaswa we alutare ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne ba okhwa Aruni, basaayi balaanyaka kamalasile kabotookhelele alutare.
Ne omundu oyo alakitonya bitonyi, ne omusaayi alabira sitube alala ne kumurwe ne kiminawa khukhu chiburukha khu alutare.
Ne kakhali omundu oaana alasiinga bie munda ne bileenge.Ne omusaayi alaana embosio emuufu, mala akioselie khu alutare, eyino eli embosio eye khukhwosia, ne khuunya khwayo khulayi khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Kaaba bali siianwa siewe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sili sie khukhwosia chinyuni, akhoya aane kamabongobongo namwe kamauusi kamaana.
Ne omusaayi alalireera khu alutare mala atile kumurwe aborosie ne khulioselia khu alutare. Ne kamalasile kaalio koosi kache khu ndulo khwe alutare.
Alenyosiakho lisakhilo ne bibiindu bilimo mala abichukhe ebukwe we alutare, abuundu nio bachukhanga likokhe.
Akhoya alitiile chindaa mala aliswabulemo, ne kakhali akhalikabukhaniamo tawe. Ne omusaayi alalioselia khu alutare, khukhu chili khu mulilo. Esino sili sianwa sie khukhwosia, khuunya khulayi khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

“Omundu yesi yesi ne areera siianwa sie likesa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siianwa siewe sikhoya sibe sie bufu bunosie. Alabuchukhakho kamafura ne khuburakho biiunya bulayi.
Ne amalile ario abukule bufu obwo, abuyile khu bo khwa Aruni basaayi. Ne omusaayi alabukhwayakho efuusi ndala sitube ne kamafura, ne biiunya bulayi bioosi. Ne omusaayi alabwoselia khu alutare nga simanyilo sie likhebulila, siianwa sie kumulilo, khuunya khulayi khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne siianwa sie biakhulia siramirekho silaba sia Aruni ne babaana bewe basoleeli. Sili sikelo sitakatifu lukali sie biianwa bie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne noreera siianwa sie likesa esio sitekhiilwe mu ndekhelo nga siianwa, siikhoya siaba sie kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, kie bufu bunosie burokiirwe ne kamafura, namwe kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, kiaakhiilwe kamafura.
“Ne siianwa siowo sie likesa siaba ne siiliile khu lucho, siikhoya siaba sie bufu bunosie bukhalimo limela tawe, butubaanisibwe ne kamafura.
“Olasimesula mu bimesu mala lundi osichukhekho kamafura. Sikila sili siianwa sie likesa.
“Ne siianwa siowo siaba ne sili sie likesa, siiliile khu lucho, siikhoya siikholwe khukhwama khu bufu bunosie ne kamafura.
Ne olareera siianwa sie likesa siing'oonilwe khukhwama khu biindu bino khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sieelesibwe omusaayi, naye alasireera khu alutare.
Ne omusaayi alabukulakho khu sianwa sie likesa bitiiti biri bie likhebulila mala abioselie khu alutare nga siianwa sie kumulilo, sie kumuuya kulayi kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
Ne siianwa sie likesa siramirekho silaba sia Aruni ne babaana bewe. Sili sitonyi sitakatifu lukali sie biianwa bie khuaana sie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Siianwa sie likesa nisio olareera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siikhabamo limela tawe. Okhoosiakho limela namwe bubuukhi nga siianwa sie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Munyala mwabireera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga biianwa bie bibiaamo bie khunyoa, ne se bikhoya biianwa khu alutare khulwe khuaana kumuuya kumulayi tawe.
Ra chumbe mu buli siianwa sie likesa sioosi, mukhalekha chumbe eye ndakaano ne Wele wenywe yataamba mu siianwa sienywe sie likesa tawe. Mukhoya mure chumbe khu biianwa bienywe bioosi.
“Kaaba bali oaana siianwa sie likesa sienywe sie khunyoa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhoya oaane siakhulia sie likesa sienywe sie khunyoa, aana siakhulia sisioosie namwe siuule.
Ne olasirakho kamafura ne biiunya bulayi. Sili siianwa sie likesa.
Ne omusaayi alosia sitonyi esio nga sie khukhebulila, alala ne kamafura ne biiunya bulayi bioosi. Sili siianwa siing'oonilwe ne kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

“Kaaba bali siianwa sio mundu sili embosio eye kumuleembe, ne asiaamia mwituuli lie chikhaafu chewe, euunwa namwe emasoti, ekhoya ebe endayi ekhalimo bubi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Omundu oyo alara kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwe siianwa siewe mala asirere amuliango kwe Liiema lie kumuse. Ne ba okhwa Aruni basaayi, balaanyaka kamalasile babotookhelesie chimbeka chine choosi cha alutare.
Ne khukhwama khu siianwa sie mbosio sie kumuleembe, akhoya aane embosio eye kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhoya aane kiminawa kie munda kiosi,
chimbiko chombi ne kiminaawa kichilikho, asi we yatibini, ne alenyosiakho chimbiko alala ne ndurwe.
Nio basaayi ba okhwa Aruni balabioselia khu alutare sitube ne biianwa bie khukhwosia, biili khu mulilo. Eli embosio eanilwa khu mulilo. Ne kumuuya kwayo kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Kaaba bali siianwa siewe sie mbosio eye kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sili sisiaayo khukhwama mwituuli, siseecha namwe siikhasi, sikhoya siatambamo bubi.
Ne aaba naana limeeme nga siianwa siewe, akhoya aliaana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne akhoya arekho kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwe siianwa siewe mala asireere ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse. Ne ba okhwa Aruni balaanyaka kamalasile babotookhelesie chimbeka chine choosi cha alutare.
Nio khukhwama khu siianwa sie kumuleembe, akhoya aane embosio eye kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhoya aane kiminaawa kialio, kumusieembe kumumuufu, kiminawa kiili siimbi khu mukoongo, ne kiminawa kioosi kikiafuunikha bie munda bioosi.
Ne lundi alaana chimbiko chombi, alala ne kiminaawa kichilikho. Alenyosiakho chimbiko alala ne lubeka lulayi lwe siini.
Ne omusaayi alabioselia khu alutare nga siakhulia siaanilwe ne kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kaaba bali siianwa siewe sili embusi, akhoya akiaana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhoya arekho kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwayo mala akiirire ebweeni we Liiema lie kumuse. Ne ba okhwa Aruni balaanyaka kamalasile babotookhelesie chimbeka chine chosi cha alutare.
Ne alasiaana nga siianwa siewe, sie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhoya aane kiminaawa kie munda kiosi,
ne chimbiko chombi ne kiminaawa kiacho kiosi ne lubeka lulayi lwe siini, nisio alenyosiakho alala ne chimbiko.
Omusaayi alabioselia bioosi khu alutare nga siakhulia siaanilwe khu mulilo ne siuunya bulayi khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kiminaawa kioosi kili kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lino likhabe lilaka khu selukho chenywe choosi, ne abuundu osi osi niio mulimenya: mukhaliakho kiminaawa namwe kamalasile tawe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omundu yesi yesi ne akhola bubwoni nibwo akheteekile tawe khu siindu siosi siosi nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaania, akhoya akhola kano:
“Ne aaba ne ali Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owachukhwakho kamafura, niye okholile bubwoni mala asaalila babaandu kumusaango, akhoya aane euunwa ekhalimo bubi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Akhoya areera euunwa amuliango kwe Liiema lie kumuse ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khura kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwe uunwa, mala eerere euunwa chana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owachukhwakho kamafura alabukulakho kamalasile ke uunwa chana mala akareere a Liiema lie kumuse.
Ne Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali alaronga lulwala lwewe mu malasile mala akaanye khukhwola saba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ebweeni we ngubo ekhiinganga Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne omusaayi akhoya are kamalasile khu njika che khu alutare eye biiunya bulayi chili ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mu Liiema lie kumuse. Ne kamalasile ke uunwa karamire acha khukachukha asibale sia alutare eye siianwa sie khukhwosia eeli amuliango kwe Liiema lie kumuse.
Ne akhoya arusiekho kiminaawa kioosi kie uunwa eye siianwa sie bubwoni, kiminaawa kie khumala ne kie munda kioosi.
Ne lundi abukule chimbiko chombi ne kiminaawa kikiachifuunikha ne lubeka lulayi lwe siini alala ne chimbiko.
Akhoya akhola bulayi bwene nga kiminaawa kirusibwangakho khukhwama khu uunwa eye siianwa sie kumuleembe. Ne Omusaayi akhoya abioselie khu alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Ne omusaayi akhoya abukule lisieelo liayo, chinyama chosi, kumurwe, bileenge biayo, ne bie munda alala ne kamalasile kaayo.
Akhoya asute bioosi abirusie enje we kambi abiiyile abuundu amiliiu. Akhoya abioselie khu mulilo niyo bachukhanga likokhe.
“Kaaba bali babaandu boosi bakhola bubwoni nibwo bakhetekile tawe mala bubwoni obwo se bwamanyikhaane ne babaandu babaandi tawe, bwe khufunaka lilala khu malaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akania, aba bali ne kumusaango.
Ne nga becha khumanya bubwoni nibwo bakholile, bakhoya baane euunwa endoro nga siianwa sie bubwoni mala bakireere ebweeni we Liiema lie kumuse.
Ne babemeelesi be kumuse bare kamakhono kaabwe khu murwe kwayo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Omusaayi omuchukhekho kamafura alabukulakho kamalasile ke uunwa mala akareere mu liiema lie kumuse.
Ne omusaayi acha khuroonga lulwala lwewe mu malasile mala akaanye khukhwola kamakhabi saba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ebweeni we ngubo ekhiinga Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne akhoya are kamalasile kakaandi khu njika che khu alutare eli mu liiema lie kumuse ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kamalasile karamire alakachukha asibale sia alutare eye siianwa sie khukhwosia eeli amuliango kwe Liiema lie kumuse.
Ne alenyosiakho kiminaawa kie uunwa kioosi mala akioselie khu alutare.
Alakhola ario khu uunwa yino bulayi bwene nga ne akhola khu uunwa eye siianwa sirusiao bubwoni. Ne mungila yino, Omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe bubwoni bwabwe nio Wele ababeele.
Ne omusaayi alasuta euunwa akirusie enje we kambi, mala akiosie nga ne oosia euunwa eye khunyoa. Esino siianwa sirusiao bubwoni bwe babaandu.
“Omuruki nakhola bubwoni nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaania, nakhetekile tawe, aba ali ne kumusaango.
Ne nga bubwoni bwewe ne bumanyikha, akhoya areere endurume ekhalimo bubi tawe.
Omuruki alarakho kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwe mbusi mala akiirire abuundu niyo bakhonyelaanga biianwa bie khukhwosia ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Esino sili siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Nio omusaayi alabukulakho kamalasile ke siianwa sirusiao bubwoni khu lwala lwewe mala akaakhe khu njika cha alutare eye siianwa sie khukhwosia. Ne karamire koosi omusaayi akachukhe asibale owa alutare eye siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Akhoya osie kiminaawa kie mbusi kioosi khu alutare, nga ne osiaanga kiminaawa kie chimbosio che kumuleembe. Mungila yino omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe bubwoni bwewe, ne Wele alamubeela.
Ne kakhali nga omundu ne amanya bubwoni bwewe nibwo akholile akhoya areere siianwa sie mbusi ekhasi ekhalimo bubi tawe.
Ne akhoya are kumukhono kwewe khu murwe khwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni mala asiirire abuundu niio bereranga biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Ne omusaayi alaroonga lulwala lwewe mu malasile mala akaakhe khu njika cha alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia, mala achukhe karamire asibale sia alutare.
Nio omusaayi, alakhalaka kiminaawa kiayo kioosi nga kiminaawa ne kikhalakangwa khukhwama khu biianwa bie kumuleembe. Omusaayi oyo alakioselia khu alutare khulwe kumuuya kumulayi kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne alaana embosio khulwe bubwoni bwewe mala alabeelwa.
“Ne omundu yuno aaba ne areera limeeme nga siianwa siewe khulwe bubwoni, likhoya libe lisubeeni lilayi likhalimo bubi tawe.
Akhoya are kumukhono kwewe khu murwe kwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, mala alirire abuundu niio bakhonyelaanga biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Ne omusaayi alaroonga lulwala lwewe mu malasile ke biianwa birusiao bubwoni, mala akaakhe khu njika cha alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia, achukhe karamire asibale sia alutare.
Nio omusaayi arusiemo kiminaawa kie limeeme nga kiminaawa ne kikhalakwa khukhwama khu biianwa bie kumuleembe. Ne omusaayi alakioselia khu alutare, khu biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe bubwoni bwewe nibwo akholile, ne alabeelwa.”

Omundu yesi yesi aaba nalaangwa mu muse khuaana buloli khu niko abona namwe aulila, mala aloba, aba ali ne kumusaango.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba natiila khu siindu siikhali sitakaase nga esaang'i efu, aba yesi salaba omutakaase tawe. Lundi alaba ne kumusaango khukhwama khu siise nisio amanyila ali etiilile khu siindu esio.
Omundu aaba natiila khu siindu simayaanu sio mundu, siakhaba sialukano siina nakhamanyile tawe, ne nga namanya nisio akholile, alaba ne kumusaango.
Omundu yesi yesi ne echuba khangu ne akhakanakaane tawe, khukhola liosi liosi, liliechuba liosi liosi lia khangu nilio babaandu bechubaanga, nakhamanyile tawe, nga namanya nilio akholile, aba ali ne kumusaango.
Omundu yesi yesi ne ali ne kumusaango mu kano akhoya eyame bubwoni bwewe.
Akhoya areere siianwa sie bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhoya areere limeeme lisubeeni, namwe embusi ekhasi, khukhwama mwituuli liewe nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni. Omusaayi alamalao bubwoni bwewe.
Ne kakhali omundu aaba nakhali ne limeeme tawe, akhoya areere kamauusi kamabaya kabili, namwe kamabongobongo kabili khulwe bubwoni nibwo akhola. Lilala lilaba khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, ne liliindi khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Akhoya akareere khu musaayi, mala omusaayi anyoe aane liuusi lie siianwa sirusiao bubwoni. Ne lundi omusaayi aborore likosi lie liuusi ne akhakusula kumurwe kwalio kwenyokhakho tawe.
Akhoya aanye kamalasile malala ke siianwa sirusiao bubwoni mu ndulo mwa alutare ne karamire akachukhe asibale sia alutare. Esino sili siianwa simaalao bubwoni.
Nio omusaayi alaana liuusi liliindi, nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khuloondekhana ne lilaka. Ne mu ngila yino, Omusaayi alamalao bubwoni nibwo omundu oyo akhola ne alabeelwa.
Ne omundu aaba nakhali ne kamauusi kabili kamabaya namwe kamabongobongo tawe, akhoya areere sikelo sie khumi sie bufu bunosie bubwoola endubi ndala, khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni nibwo akholile. Akhaburakho kamafura namwe bibiindu biiunya bulayi tawe, sikila buli siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Akhoya abureere khu musaayi, ne omusaayi abukhwayekho efuusi nga sitonyi sie khukhebulilwa, mala abwoselie khu alutare, khu ngaaki khwe biianwa biaanilwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sino sili siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Khwako omusaayi alamalao bubwoni nibwo akholile mu ngila yino, omusaayi alabeela bubwoni nibwo omundu oyo akholile mala omundu oyo alabeelwa. Bufu buurama buli bwo musaayi, bulayi bwene nga biianwa bie biakhulia biramanga ne bibechanga bio musaayi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Omundu yesi yesi nakhola bubwoni nibwo akheteekile tawe, khu siindu siosi siosi sitakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhoya areere siianwa sie kumusaango khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, limiiku likhalimo bubi tawe, khukhwama mu lituuli lie bibiaayo biewe. Bukusi bwalio bube mu bitonyi bie efwesa khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie bukusi bwe abuundu atakatifu. Sili siianwa sie kumusaango.
Omundu oyo akhoya aruunge khulwe bumayaanu nibwo akholile khu siindu sitakatifu. Akhoya atasekho silala khu biraano bie bukusi bwasio mala aelesie omusaayi. Nio omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe bubwoni bwewe mala omundu oyo alabeelwa.
“Omundu yesi yesi nakhola bubwoni, khu siindu siosi siosi nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaania, akhaba nakhetekile tawe, aba ali ne kumusaango, mala omwene okumala.
Akhoya arereere omusaayi limiiku likhalimo bubi tawe khukhwama mu lituuli lie bibiaayo biewe. Bukusi bwalio buloondekhana ne sikelo sie siianwa simala bubwoni. Omusaayi alaana embosio emaalao bubwoni nibwo omundu oyo akholile nakhamanyile tawe, mala alabeelwa.
Sili siianwa simala bubwoni. Sikila ali ne bubwoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

“Omundu yesi yesi nakhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khulekha khuruunga owasie sitonyi sie kumusiingo, namwe khulwe bunuuli namwe khulwe khukhupia siibi owasie
namwe abe ne anyoolile sisiindu siitibile mala echube ne aboola ali se asiboonekho tawe.
Omundu nakhola bubwoni mala amanye ali, ali ne kumusaango, khukhwola aruunge buli sindu nisio anyoola mu bunuuli namwe nisio anyoola mu khupia okundi siibi, namwe kumusiingo nikwo anyoola khu wasie namwe nisio angala.
Akhoya akalusieo mu bwichufu sisiindu siosi siosi nisio echubilakho mu bubeeyi. Ne akhoya atasekho sitonyi silala khu biraano, mala aelesie omwene siindu esio khu ndaalo yewe eye siianwa sirusiao kumusaango.
Akhoya areere khu musaayi nga siianwa siewe sirusiao kumusaango khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, limiiku likhalimo bubi tawe khukhwama mu lituuli liewe. Ne bukusi bwalio bukhoya bwaba bumanyikhaane bwa ng'ali.
Mungila yino, omusaayi alaana embosio emalao bubwoni bwo mundu oyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala alabeelwa sisiindu siosi siosi khu biindu nibio aaba ne akhola mala kwaba kumusaango.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni ne babaana bewe oli, Lino nilio lilaka lie siianwa sie khukhwosia. Siianwa sie khukhwosia siikhoya sibe khu alutare siilo sioosi ne kumulilo kuburukhe khu khwola nga busia.
Ne omusaayi akhoya afware chingubo chewe cha katani mukari ne khungaaki. Akhoya ayole likokhe lie siianwa sie khukhwosia nisio kumulilo kwosiisie khu alutare mala are andulo we alutare.
Namalile ario, efuule chingubo chewe cha katani, mala efware chingubo chichiindi nio asute likokhe khukhwama ao aliyile enje we kambi abuundu amiliiu.
Kumulilo khu alutare kukhoya kwachiililila khuburukha ne kukhasimakho tawe. Buli kumutikhinyi omusaayi alaambia chiikhu ne khurakho siianwa sie khukhwosia khu alutare mu khuloondekhana. Nio oseliakho kiminaawa kie siianwa sie kumuleembe.
Buli lwosi kumulilo kukhoya kuchiililile khuburukha khu alutare ne kukhasimakho tawe.
“Ne lino lili lilaka lie khuaana biianwa bie biakhulia: Ba okhwa Aruni balabiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ebweeni wa alutare.
Ne omusaayi alakhwayakho mu fuusi bufu bunosie bwe siianwa sie biakhulia ne kamafura kabwo ne biiunya bulayi biili khu siianwa sie biakhulia mala abioselie khu alutare nga sitonyi sie likhebulila, Kumuuya kumulayi kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Aruni ne babaana bewe balalia bisikaale. Balabilia nga kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe Abuundu Atakatifu. Babiliile khu luuya lwe liiema lie kumuse.
Bakhapilamo limela mu mikaati tawe. Nabaeleesie nga sikelo siabwe sie biianwa biase bikholebwa ne kumulilo. Sili sisiindu sitakatifu lukali nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni lundi ne siianwa sie kumusaango.
Buli mundu we siseecha mu baana ba Aruni anyala aliakho. Sikhoya siaba sikelo sie siianwa siabwe sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu selukho choosi. Ne yesi yesi otilakho alaba omutakatifu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Esino sili siianwa nisio Aruni ne babaana bewe balarusilia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu ndaalo niyo Aruni aliaulilwakho. Bakhoya barere silala khwi khumi sie sikelo sie bufu bunosie nga siianwa sie biakhulia sia buli lwosi. Enusu kumutikhinyi lundi enusu ekolooba.
Bulang'oonwa ne kamafura khu siikhalangilo, bureerwa ne butubaanisibwe bulayi, bwarerebwemo kimikaati nga siianwa sie biakhulia mala mu buaane khulwe kumuuya kumulayi kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omusaayi mulala mu be lisaaye lia Aruni, niye bachukhilekho kamafura oli nga Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, alabiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga lilaka lia buli lwosi. Bikhosebwe mu bwichufu.
Buli siianwa sie biakhulia sio musaayi sikhoya siosibwe simuufu, se siliibwa tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni ne babaana bewe oli, lino nilio lilaka lie biianwa birusiao bubwoni. Abuundu niio biianwa bie khukhwosia biirirwa, biianwa birusiao bubwoni bioosi bilererwao ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bino bili biianwa bitakatifu lukali.
Omusaayi oaana khulwe bubwoni, akhoya aliile abuundu atakatifu, khu luuya lwe Liiema lie kumuse.
Siosi siosi sisitiila khu nyama yayo silaba sitakatifu. Ne kamalasile kayo kosi kaaba ne kaanyiikhe khu ngubo, engubo eyo elasiingibwa Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne eningilo eteekhile enyama eyo ekhoya yarwe. Ne yaaba ne tekheelwe mu ningilo eye kumukasa, ekhoya earakarwe mala esiingwe ne kameechi.
Buli mundu we siseecha mu basaayi anyala aliakho siianwa esio. Sili sitakatifu lukali.
Ne kakhali siianwa sie bubwoni nisio kamalasile kasio kosi kosi kareerwa mu liiema lie kumuse khuosia abuundu atakatifu, se siilibwa tawe. Sikhoya siosibwa busa.”

Lino lili lilaka lie siianwa sie kumusaango. Lili litakatifu lukali.
Abuundu niio bakhonyela siianwa sie khukhwosia, bakhoya bakhonyelao siianwa sie kumusaango. Ne kamalasile kayo kakhoya kaanywe kabotookhelele alutare.
Ne kiminaawa kiayo kioosi kinyosebwekho mala kiaanwe khu alutare kiminaawa kie kumusieembe, ne kiminaawa kie munda.
Lundi chimbiko chombi, ne kiminaawa kichilikho ne siini. Alabukula bioosi alala ne chimbiko.
Omusaayi alabioselia khu alutare nga siianwa sie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Esino sili siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Buli omusaayi owe siseecha yesi yesi anyala waliakho, ne akhoya waliila Abuundu Atakatifu. Sili siianwa sitakatifu lukali.
Siianwa sie kumusaango sili nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni. Lilaka liako lili lilala. Omusaayi oaana embosio akhoya aloonde lilaka lino.
Ne omusaayi oaana siianwa sie khukhwosia sio omundu yesi yesi, akhoya abukule lisielo lie siianwa sie khukhwosia nisio aanile sibe sisiewe.
Ne buli siianwa sie biakhulia nisio boselie khu mayika ne kikiindi kiosi nikio bapiile khu sifuria, kilaba kio musaayi oanile embosio.
Ne buli siianwa sie biakhulia bitubasibwe ne kamafura namwe bibiomu bilaba bie babaana ba Aruni. Lundi bikhoya bikabwe khu buli mulala mu khwakana.
Elino lino lili lilaka lie embosio eye siianwa sie kumuleembe nisio omundu anyala aanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aaba nabiaana khulwe khukhupa orio, akhoya aane siianwa sie khusiima sie kimikaati kikhalimo kamamela tawe, kitubasibwemo kamafura, mandasi kakhalimo limela tawe, kabakhilwekho kamafura, ne chikeki kie bufu bunosie kitubasibwemo kamafura.
Khu biianwa biewe bie kumuleembe bie khu khupa orio, akhoya areera siianwa siewe ne kimikaati kilimo kamamela.
Akhoya aane khu buli mulala kimikaati ekio, nga siianwa siboofu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siianwa sibe sio musaayi oanya kamalasile ke biianwa bie kumuleembe khu alutare.
Ne enyama eye mbosio eye biianwa bie kumuleembe khulwe khukhupa orio, ekhoya eliibwe khu ndaalo eng'ene. Se akhoya yarama yoola kumutikhinyi tawe.
Ne aaba bali omundu aana embosio yewe eli eye khukhwechuba namwe siianwa sie lilienya liewe, embosio eyo ekhoya yaliibwa khu ndaalo niyo eanilekho. Ne bisikale binyala bialiibwa kumutikhinyi.
Ne enyama eye mbosio eramirekho khukhwola khu ndaalo ekhola khataru ekhoya yosibwa.
Enyama yosi yosi eye mbosio eye siianwa siewe sie kumuleembe ne eliibwa khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, okiaana safukiililwa tawe, namwe se ebalikhwakho khu niye tawe. Elaba enyaalu. Ne yesi yesi okilia alaba ne kumusaango.
“Enyama eyitiila khu siindu siosi siosi siikhali sitakaase tawe se laliibwa tawe, ekhoya yosibwa busa. Boosi bali bakwalaafu banyala balia enyama.
Ne kakhali omundu yesi yesi olia enyama eye siianwa sie kumuleembe sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakhetakaasile tawe, omundu oyo alarusibwa mu baandu bewe.
Ne lundi omundu yesi yesi natiila khu siindu siikhali sitakaase tawe, akhaba ne buli bunyaalu bwo mundu, namwe esaang'i ekhali endakase tawe namwe sisiindu siosi siosi siikhali sitakaase, ne mala alie khu siianwa sie kumuleembe kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omundu oyo alarusibwa mu baandu bewe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, se muliakho kiminaawa kie khaafu, kie likheese namwe kie mbusi tawe.
Kiminaawa kie sisiaayo sifwiile busa sisiene, ne kiminaawa kiesio nisio esaang'i eye mundaa yiriire, kinyala kiakhola kimilimo kikiindi kiosi ne kakhali se mukhoyele mwakilia tawe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi olia kiminaawa kie sisiaayo, sie khukhwosia siaanilwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, alarusibwa mu baandu bewe.
Litasa khwilio, mu limenya lienywe liosi se mulia kamalasile kosi kosi tawe, akhaba ne kali ke nyuni namwe ke saang'i.
Ne omundu yesi yesi olia kamalasile alarusibwa mu baandu bewe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omundu yesi yesi oreera siianwa siewe sie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, alareera nga embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama khu siianwa siewe sie kumuleembe.
Akhoya omwene areere ne kumukhono kwewe biianwa bibiosibwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhoya areere kiminaawa ne sitindimilo mala abiiane nga siiaanwa siboofu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omusaayi alosia kiminaawa khu alutare ne sitindimilo silaba sia Aruni ne babaana bewe.
Ne sie lubeka luseecha alaelesia omusaayi nga siianwa khukhwama khu mbosio yewe eye siianwa siewe sie khuosia sie kumuleembe.
Ne oyo mu ba okhwa Aruni orusia kamalasile ke siianwa sie kumuleembe ne kiminaawa, abukula sietakho sie lubeka luseecha sibe nga kumukabwa kwewe.
Nabukula sitindimilo ne sinama sietakho khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli, nga siianwa siabwe sie kumuleembe mala abielesie omusaayi Aruni ne babaana bewe nga sikelo siabwe sia buli lwosi khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Sino sili sikelo sia Aruni ne babaana bewe khukhwama khu biianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bibiosibwa. Baelesibwa kumukabwa kuno khukhwamila khu ndaalo niyo bareerwakho kumukhono babe basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Baisiraeli babaelesie sikelo sino, khukhwamila khu ndaalo niyo bareerwakho kumukhono. Sino sili sikelo sie siakhulia khu selukho chabwe choosi.”
Lino lilaka lie siianwa sie khukhwosibwa, sie biakhulia, sie khurusiao bubwoni, sie kamabi, sie khukhweyaula ne siianwa sie kumuleembe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Musa kamalaka kano khu sikulu sia Sinai, khu ndaalo niyo alakilisiliakho Baisiraeli mu sichiimi khureera biianwa biabwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Bukula Aruni alala ne babaana bewe ne chingubo che basaayi, ne kamafura ke khubaakha ne uunwa eye siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, kamamiiku kabili, ne sikono sie kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe.
Lundi buusia alala sipupu sie babaandu boosi emuliango we Liiema lie kumuse.”
Musa akhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka, mala babaandu babuusiana emuliango we liiema lie kumuse.
Nio Musa aboolela sipupu sie babaandu esio ali, “Sino sili sisiindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakilisie siikholwe.”
Nio Musa areera Aruni ne babaana bewe abasiinga.
Afwara Aruni likooti ne khumuboa kumusiipi, lundi amufwara ekutuusi, mala amuboa engubo eye khusaayilamo.
Lundi amuraakho engubo eye khu sifuba. Ne khumurakho urimu ne tumimu.
Lundi amufwara sileemba khu murwe, ne khu sileemba chana ebweeni, araakho esahabu, ekuutwa endakatifu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alakiilisia Musa.
Nio Musa abukula kamafura ke khuakha mala aakha liiema lie kumuse ne nebio bioosi bilimo mala abikwalaasia biaba bitakatifu.
Ne kakaandi akaanyaka khu alutare khukhwola kamakhabi saba. Ne khuchukha kamafura khu alutare ne khu biindu bioosi birumikhwangakho, ne sibuumba ne mwalo wasio, khubikhola bibe bitakatifu.
Ne achukha kamafura ke khukhwamiia khu murwe kwa Aruni mala amuakha khu mukhola abe omutakatifu.
Lundi Musa areera ba okhwa Aruni mala abafwara kamakooti ababoa kimisiipi ne khubafwara chikuutwa che chingubo nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alakiilisia Musa.
Nio areera euunwa eye siianwa sirusiao bubwoni mala Aruni ne babaana bewe baara kamakhono kabwe khu murwe kwe uunwa eye siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Nio Musa akikhonya, mala abukula kamalasile, arongamo lulwala lwewe ne khu kaakha khunjika che khu alutare, achibotookhelela ne khu kwalaasia alutare. Lundi aachukha kamalasile asi wa alutare, nio akhola alutare yaba endakatifu ne khu kikwalaasia.
Musa abukula kiminaawa kie munda kiosi ne siini ne chimbiko chombi ne kiminaawa kiacho mala Musa abioselia khu alutare.
Ne kakhali abukula bitonyi bie uunwa bibiarama alala ne lisielo liayo, chinyama ne kamasisie mala abioselia enje we kambi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne aalaka Musa.
Nio arusia limiiku lie siianwa sie khukhwosia. Ne Aruni ne babaana bewe bara kamakhono kabwe khu murwe kwe limiiku.
Mala Musa aalikhonya ne khuanyaka kamalasile abotookhelesie alutare.
Ne nga limiiku ne liasachwa, Musa osia kumurwe ne chinyama nicho basachile ne kiminaawa.
Ne nga bie munda ne bileenge ne biasiingwa, Musa osia limiiku limuufu khu alutare, nga siianwa sie khukhwosia, kumuuya kusiimisia, siianwa sie khukhwosibwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga omwene ne alaka Musa.
Nio Musa arusia limiiku liliindi khulwe khukhwaulwa khwa Aruni ne babaana bewe. Aruni ne babaana bewe bara kamakhono kabwe khumurwe kwe limiiku elio.
Nio Musa aalikhonya, mala abukulakho kamalasile kalio aara khu khuru khwa Aruni khu seecha ne khu lwala luboofu lwe kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha ne khu lwala luboofu lwe sikele siewe siseecha.
Ba okhwa Aruni bareerwa mala Musa aabara kamalasile khu khuru khu seecha ne khunjala chabwe chimboofu cha buli mukhono kumuseecha ne khunjala chabwe chimboofu che bikele biseecha, mala Musa aanyaka kamalasile abotookhelesia alutare.
Nio abukula kiminaawa ne kumusieembe kulikho kiminaawa, ne kiminaawa kie munda kie khwisombo, ne siini, ne chimbiko chombi, ne kiminaawa chakio nende sietakho siseecha.
Ne khukhwama mu ndubi eye kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, kikiaba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, abukulamo kumukaati mulala kukhalimo limela tawe, ne kumukaati mulala kwe kamafura, ne mandasi, mala abira khu minaawa khu ngaki ne khu sietakho siseecha.
Nio abukula bino bioosi aelesia Aruni ne babaana bewe, mala abireera nga siianwa sie khuaana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Musa abibukula khukhwama mukhono mwabwe mala abioselia khu alutare ne siianwa sie khukhwosia nga siianwa sie khukhwaula. Kumuuya kumulayi kusiimisia, siianwa sie khukhwosibwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Musa abukula sitindimilo mala asireera nga siianwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siaba sikelo sia Musa sie limiiku lie khukhwaulwa, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Nio Musa abukula malala khu mafura ke khuaakha ne kamalasile kakaba khu alutare mala aara khu Aruni ne khu ngubo chewe, lundi akhaba khu ba okhwa Aruni ne khu ngubo chabwe. Nio akhola Aruni ne chingubo chewe aba omutakatifu, akhaba babaana bewe ne chingubo chabwe bosi baba batakatifu alala ne naye.
Nio Musa aboolela Aruni ne babaana bewe ali, “Tekhela chinyama amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, mala mulileo ne kimikaati kiili mu ndubi eye biianwa bie khukhwaulwa, nibio nakhulakiilisia ne mboola ndi, ‘Aruni ne babaana bewe bakhoya balie.’
Ne enyama erama ne kimikaati yosibwe ne kumulilo.
Ne khulwe chindaalo saba se mularura amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse elio tawe, nabwila nga chindaalo che khukhwaulwa ne chiliwa. Sikila khuchukhwakho kamafura lilabukula chindaalo saba.
Kakholekhe endaalo eya luno, kaalakwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kakholwe khumurusiakho enywe bubwoni.
Mukharame amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse kumuusi ne silo, khulwe chindaalo saba, ne mukhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakiilisia, mukhakhola murio mwafwa tawe kamenako niko naboolelwa.”
Nio Aruni ne babaana bewe bakhola bibiindu bioosi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka khubirira khu Musa.

Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane Musa alanga Aruni ne babaana bewe ne babemeelesi be Baisiraeli.
Aboolela Aruni ali, “Bukula euunwa esilikho eng'ana eye siianwa siirusiao bubwoni, ne limiiku lie siianwa sie khukhwosia, bibiaayo bioombi biikhalimo siindu sibi tawe, oane khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne oboolele babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Bukula endurume eye siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, emoosi ne limeeme. Bikhoya biaba bie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, biikhalimo ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe, khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi bukula euunwa ne limiiku khulwe biianwa bie kumuleembe, biaane nga embosio ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne biianwa bie siakhulia bitubasibwe ne kamafura, sikila luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamubonekhela enywe.’ ”
Nio bareera ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse nibio Musa alaka, mala babaandu besenda siimbi bebusia boosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Musa ababoolela ali, “Sino sili sisiindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka mukhole, nio luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lumubonekhele.”
Nio Musa aboolela Aruni ali, “Yesenda siimbi khu alutare mala oane siianwa siowo sirusiao bubwoni ne siianwa sie khukhwosia mala weosie lundi oosie babaandu babaandi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka.”
Nio Aruni eseenda siimbi khu alutare mala eera euunwa eng'ana nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni bwewe.
Babaana ba Aruni bamureerera kamalasile arongemo lulwala lwewe mala aakhe kamalasile khunjika che khu alutare, ne khuchukha kasikale koosi asibale sia alutare.
Ne kakhali ooselia kiminaawa, chimbiko ne lubeka lulayi lwe siini khu alutare, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Ne kakhali enyama ne lisielo aabioselie enje we kambi.
Nio eera siianwa siewe sie khukhwosia. Babaana ba Aruni bamureerera kamalasile, mala aakaanyaka nabotookhelesia alutare.
Bamwakaanisia siianwa sie khukhwosia, kumurwe ne bitonyi bie bibiindi, mala abioselia khu alutare.
Asiinga bie munda ne bileenge mala abioselia alala ne biianwa bie khukhwosia khu alutare.
Oli amala ario arusia siianwa sie babaandu babaandi, lundi abukula embusi yaba ne eanilwe khulwe bubwoni bwe babaandu mala akiira. Akireera nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni mungila niyo aanilamo lwe bweeni.
Lundi aareera siianwa sie khukhwosia, mala aasiaana khuloondekhana ne kamalaka.
Arusia siianwa sie biakhulia mala afumbarakho bufu mu fuusi, mala abwoselia khu alutare. Sino siatasikha khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli mutikhinyi.
Eera eeyi ne limiiku nga embosio eye siianwa sie kumuleembe khulwe babaandu. Babaana bewe bamureerera kamalasile mala aakaanyaka nabotookhelesia alutare.
Aruni abuusia kiminaawa kie eeyi nende kie limiiku, kumusieembe ne kiminaawa kie bie munda, chimbiko ne kiminaawa kie khu sini,
ba okhwa Aruni baara khu ngaaki khwe bitindimilo bie bibiaayo mala Aruni abioselia khu alutare.
Aana bitindimilo ne sietakho siseecha nga siianwa siboofu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe basaayi nga Musa ne alaka.
Musa ne Aruni bacha bengila mu liiema lie kumuse, ne nga barura enje, babiita babaandu chikhabi, ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabonekha mu baandu boosi.
Ne kumulilo kwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala kwosia biianwa bie khukhwosia ne kiminaawa bibiaba khu alutare. Nga babaandu boosi ne babona bario, bayokela, mala benama bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila asi.

Ba okhwa Aruni, Natabu ne Abihu, buli mulala abukula lucho lwe khukhwanjala kumulilo, mala barakho kumulilo ne biiunya bulayi. Baana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumulilo kukhaba kumutakatifu tawe. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi beele se abalaka khukhola khurio tawe.
Kumulilo kwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala kwosia Natabu ne Abihu bafwila ebweeni wewe.
Nio Musa aboolela Aruni ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba nako nga aloma ali, boosi babakholela khukhwola barie butakatifu bwase. Khoya naelesebwa luyali ne babaandu boosi.” Ne kakhali Aruni asila busa.
Musa alanga Mishaeli ne Elisafani, ba okhwa Usieli raraawe owa Aruni omuro, mala ababoolela ali, “Khe mwiche ano, mala musute kimilaambo kie bawandaayenywe mukirusie mu liiema litakatifu mala mukire enje we kambi.”
Nio becha mala bakisuta bakirusia enje we kambi mungoba chabwe, nga Musa ne abalaka.
Ne Musa aboolela Aruni ne babaana bewe Eliesa ne Itamari ali, “Mukhalekha khuchanua lichuune lienywe, namwe mwatabula chingubo chenywe tawe. Mukhola murio mwafwa, namwe lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liekha khu baandu boosi. Ne kakhali balebe benywe be nju eye Baisiraeli yoosi, efukiililwa khusooma abo nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abuniisie ne kumulilo.
Mukharura amuliango we liiema lie kumuse tawe, mukhola murio mwafwa. Sikila enywe mwaroborwa mwarebwa alubeka, khulwe khuchukhwakho kamafura ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nio bakhola nga Musa ne ababoolela.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aruni ali,
“Ewe ne babaana bowo mukhanywakho endali namwe kamalwa tawe, mwaba ne mucha khukhwingila mwieema lie kumuse. Ne busa mwicha khufwa. Lino licha khuba lilaka khu be lisaaye liowo lioosi.
Okhoya waukhasia akari we kamatakatifu ne karumikha busiele, akari we siikhali sitakaase tawe ne sitakaase.
Okhoya wekesie babaandu ba Isiraeli kamalaka koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesie khubirira khu Musa.”
Liila Abuundu Atakatifu, sikila kuli kumukabwa kwowo ne babaana bowo khukhwama khu siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ako niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andaka khukhuboolela.
Ne kakhali ewe ne babaana bowo basoleeli ne bakhaana munyala mwalia sitindimilo nende sietakho abuundu osi osi akwalaafu. Sikila biaanilwe nga kumukabwa kwowo ne babaana bowo, khukhwama khu mbosio che biianwa bie kimileembe bie babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Ne sietakho ne sitindimilo bikhoya biareerwa ne bitonyi bie kiminaawa kikiaanwa nga biianwa biboofu bibiosie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kuno kuli kumukabwa kwowo ne babaana bowo mindali na mindali, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka.”
Musa areeba ke mbusi eye siianwa sirusiao bubwoni mala anyoola bali yosibwe khale. Lino liamukhola aambila lirima Eliesa ne Itamari ba okhwa Aruni babarama. Abareeba ali,
“Siina sikila ne mukhaliliile siianwa sirusiao bubwoni abuundu atakatifu? Sili sisiindu sitakatifu lukali. Ne lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesie enywe khulwe khurusiao bubwoni bwe sipupu sie babaandu bano ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne lola kamalasile kayo se kareerirwe mu kari mwe abuundu atakatifu tawe. Lundi mwenyekhe mukiilile Abuundu Atakatifu nga namulaka.”
Aruni akobosia Musa ali, “Lola babaandu baanile biianwa biabwe birusiao bubwoni nende bie khukhwosia ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhaba kario kamamayaanu kakholekhane khwise. Wibaasia oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhafukiilile ese nalia siianwa sirusiao bubwoni luno ku?”
Nga Musa ne aulila lino asangaala.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Chino chili chisaang'i nicho mukhoyela khulia:
mukhoya mwalia esaang'i eye bikhakayu bibiakabukhanamo ne lundi eyo enyanyanga ekamuula.
Ne kakhaba kario, chiliio chisaang'i mwicho, chinyanyanga ekamuula namwe chichakabukhanamo bikhakayu nicho mukhakhoyela khulia tawe: Nga engamia, sikila enyanyanga ekamuula ne se eli ne bikhakayu bibiakabukhanamo tawe, eli enyaalu khwinywe.
Ne bikoneelwa bie mu lwanda, sikila binyanyanga ekamuula ne se bili ne bikhakayu bibiabukhanamo tawe, bioosi bili binyaalu khwinywe.
Ne enduuyu yosi, sikila enyanyanga ekamuulo ne se eli ne bikhakayu bibiabukhanamo tawe, eli enyaalu khwinywe.
Ne ngurwe yoosi, mukhalia tawe, sikila enyanyanga ekamuula ne se eli ne bikhakayu bibiabukhanamo tawe, eli enyaalu khwinywe.
Mukhalia chinyama che chisaang'i chino, lundi akhaba ne chifwiile mukhachitiilakho tawe, sikila chili chinyaalu khwinywe.
“Munyala mwalia buli ng'eeni eli ne chindaa ne kamakakambu, eli mu nyanja ne muluuchi.
Ne kakhali mukhalia sisiindu siosi siosi simenyile mu meechi siikhali ne chindaa ne kamakakambu tawe bili binyaalu khwinywe. Bioosi bikeendela mu meechi ne bimenyilemo bili binyaalu khwinywe.
Ne nga bibuumbe ebio ne bili binyaalu, mukhalia chinyama chabio namwe mukhabitilakho ne bifwiile tawe.
Ne sisiindu siosi siosi simenyile mu meechi, mala se sili ne chindaa ne kamakakambu tawe sili siikhali sitakaase tawe.
“Ne chino chili chinyuni chinyaalu nicho mukhakhoyela khulia tawe: Efuruusi, chetooto, engosia, namulobi,
siruchu, ling'ang'a khuloondekhana ne lusio lwayo,
buli khooro ne lusio lwakwo,
enyeefwe, lubukabuka, liyoyo, kisilili khuloondekhana ne lusio lwakwo,
Kusiikhiikhi, ling'ang'a, tenende,
ne efutubile ne namuningie, ne khooro kutondoolwa,
ne namukhooli, ne koikoi khuloondekhana ne lusio lwayo ne kwesule ne wambuuto.
“Bioosi bipurukha ne lundi bikeendela bikele bine bili binyaalu. Ne bie chindaa ne bikele bine se mulia tawe,
ne kakhali ebio bisuna.
Munyala mwalia chisike, chisienene namwe kamatete khuloondekhana ne lusio lwako.
Ne kakhali bibiindu bibiindi bioosi bitiiti bipurukha ne akhaba bimoola bili binyaalu khwinywe.
“Yesi yesi otiila khu saang'i chino ne chifwiile salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne yesi yesi otiila khu sifwiile, alasiinga chingubo chewe, mala salaba omutakaase tawe, khukhwola ekolooba.
Buli saang'i eli ne bikhakayu bibiabukhanamo mala se nyanyanga ekamuula tawe, eli enyaalu khwinywe. Ne buli omundu okitiilakho salaba omutakaase tawe.
Ne chisaang'i choosi chiili ne bikhumbu mala chikeendelanga bikele bine, chili chinyaalu khwinywe, ne yesi yesi ochetiilakho ne chifwiile salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne yesi yesi ochitiilakho ne chifwiile alasiinga chingubo chewe mala salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba. Sechili chindakaase tawe.
“Ne biindu bibiekhuruurira asi bili binyaalu khwinywe. Akhaba biiu ne namuchunjusi, ne chimbakilia khuloondekhana ne lusio lwacho.
Namukhokhome, chikwena, chimbakilia, chimbulu, ne chikhaaniafu.
Chino chili chinyaalu mu chosi chikeenda. Ne omundu yesi yesi ochitiilakho ne chifwiile salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne khu siindu siosi siosi nisio chetiilakho ne chifwiile silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe. Lino lili khu siindu siosi siosi, sibele lukhu, engubo, lisielo namwe likunia, yakhaba sisiindu siosi siosi sirumikhwa, siikhoya siareebwa mu meechi. Ne kakhaba kario, silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba nio sibe sitakaase.
Ne yaba ne chifwiile mala chakwa munyuungu buli sisiindu silimo silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe, ne mukhoya mwaare enyuungu eyo.
Siakhulia siosi siosi sitekheelwe kameechi ako silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe. Akhaba kameechi ke khunywa kakama mu nyuungu omwo koosi kali kamanyaalu.
Sisiindu siosi siosi nisio siifu esio sietilakho sialaba siikhali sitakaase tawe. Ne akhaba ne kali kamayika kosi kosi namwe sibero kalatechulwa, kali kakhali kamatakaase khwiwe.
Ne kakhaba kario, esebele namwe liloo lie kameechi bilaba bikwalaafu. Ne kakhali yakhaba siosi siosi ne sietiila khu biifu sili siikhali sitakaase tawe.
Ne kaaba bali silala khu biifu sikwa khu bumiicho bucha khumiichwa, bumiicho obwo bulasikala busa bukwalaafu.
Ne kakhali bwaba bumiicho ne bwinikhwe mu meechi mala silala khu biifu siabwetiilakho, bumiicho obwo bulaba bunyaalu khwiwe.
“Yaaba esaang'i yosi yosi enyala yaliibwa nefwa, omundu yesi yesi okitiilakho salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne omundu yesi yesi nalia enyama eye saang'i efu chana, akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe, ne kakhaba kario alaba asiili busa okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba. Ne yesi yesi osuta esaang'i efu khukhwola asiinge chingubo chewe, ne salaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
“Buli simoolela asi siosi siosi sili siikhali sitakaase tawe, ne se sikhoya sialiibwa tawe.
Ne akhaba bimoola asi namwe bikeenda ne bikele bine, namwe bie bikele bikali ne bimoolela asi, bioosi, mukhalia tawe, sikila bili binyaalu.
Mukhenyaalutia mwabene ne bibiindu bimoola bino tawe. Mukhola murio mwaba banyaalu.
Ese ndi Omwami Wele wenywe, ne yetakaasa mwabene mala mube batakatifu, sikila ese ndi omutakatifu. Mukhenyaalutia mwabene nende bioosi bioosi bimoolela asi tawe.
Sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owamurusia enywe mu sibala sia Misiri nio mbe Wele wenywe, Mukhoya mube batakatifu sikila ese ndi omutakatifu.”
Nono lino lili lilaka khulwe chisaang'i, ne chinyuni, nende buli siindu sie bulamu siosi siosi sikeenda mu meechi namwe khu sibala.
Mukhoya mwaukhasie akari we sisiindu sitakaase ne siikhali sitakaase tawe ne siikhali sitakaase, akari we chisaang'i chichenyibwa khulibwa ne chikhenyibwa khulibwa tawe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omukhasi nasaala omwana omusoleeli, alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khulwe chindaalo saba. Alaba okhali omutakaase tawe busa nga nabechanga mu ndaalo chewe chimbi.
Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane omwana alakhebwa.
Khwako alamala chindaalo chichiindi kamakhumi kataru na chitaru nio abe omukwalaafu khuloondekhana ne kumwiima khulwe khutibia kamafuki. Omukhasi oyo se akhoyela khutiila khu siindu siosi siosi sili sitakatifu, namwe engila mu liiema litakatifu tawe, khukhwola nga siise siewe sie khukwalaasibwa ne siwela elala.
“Ne asaala omwana omukhaana, se alaba omutakaase tawe khulwe kamachuuma kabili, nga nabechanga mu ndaalo chewe chimbi. Nono alamala chindaalo chichiindi kamakhumi sita ne chindaalo sita nio abe omukwalaafu khuloondekhana ne kumwiima kwe khutibia kamafuki.
“Nga siise sie khukhwikwalaasia ne siwa, abele khulwe omwana omusoleeli namwe omukhaana, alareera limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khu musaayi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia, namwe liuusi liliaana namwe libongobongo, khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Omusaayi alasiiana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala akhole kumwiima kwe khurusiao bunyaalu bwo mukhasi oyo, mala alaba omukwalaafu. Kano niko omukhasi akhoya khu khola enyuma we khusaala.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Aaba omundu yesi yesi nali ne kamakoonjo namwe kamabiimba namwe kamaboondo kanyala kekhola bulwaale bwe kamakele, akhoya areerwa khu Aruni omusaayi namwe mulala khu baana bewe basaayi.
Omusaayi oyo alamenieelesia likoonjo lili khumubili kwewe. Ne yaba bufuumbo bwe abwenao bwaba ne bwekholile buwaanga, mala likoonjo liayabile lukali liekha khukhila siikhoba sisialibotookhelesia, aba buno buli bulwaale bwe kamakele nibwo. Ne omusaayi namalile khumenieelesia omundu oyo alamanyisia babaandu ali omundu yuno se ali omutakaase tawe.
Ne kaaba bali likoonjo lili liwaanga mala se libonekha ne liyabile lukali khukhila siikhoba sisialibotookhelesia tawe, lundi bufuumbo se bwakaluukhane bwakwile buwaanga tawe, omusaayi alaula omundu oyo arure mu baandu abe yeng'ene khulwe chindaalo saba.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi khu ndaalo eya saba, ne mumebaasio kewe aba likoonjo ne libonekhana nga liaba, mala se liabalaayile tawe, alamwaula, amurusie mu baandu khulwe chindaalo chichiindi saba.
