Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi khu ndaalo saba, ne liaba likoonjo ne lifulaafulane mala se liamalataane khu siikhoba tawe, omusaayi alamumanyisia khuba omukwalaafu, Aba lili likoonjo liong'ene. Omundu oyo alasiinga chingubo chewe mala abe omukwalaafu.
“Ne kakhali likoonjo liaba ne limalatane enyuma wo musaayi khumumenieelesia ne khumulaanga ali, ali omukwalaafu, akhoya lundi abonekhe ebweeni wo musaayi.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi, ne liaba ne limalatane mu siikhoba, alamulaanga khuba okhali omutakaase tawe. Buno aba buli bulwaale bwe siikhoba.
“Omundu yesi yesi aaba nali ne bulwaale bwe kamakele, alareerwa khu musaayi.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia. Aba nali ne libiimba liwaanga khu mubili kwewe, likaluukhasie bufuumbo bwakwa buwaanga, lundi lili ne kamayila kamakali,
aba buli bulwaale bukhaona tawe. Ne omusaayi alamanyisia babaandu ali, omundu yuno se ali omutakaase tawe. Se amwaukhasia abe yeng'ene tawe, sikila kali busa abuwaanga bali ali okhali omutakaase tawe.
Kaaba kamakele ne kamalatane kamala kumubili kwosi, khukhwama khu murwe khukhwola khu siikhandakilo khuloondekhana nga omusaayi nabona,
omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi, aba nanyoola ali kamakele kamalatane kumubili kwosi, alekesia omundu oyo khuba omukwalaafu. Siaba siikhoba siewe siosi ne sikaluukhane siakwa siwaanga, alaba omukwalaafu.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali likoonjo liliindi liruriramo, omundu oyo aba se ali omutakaase tawe.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi ne aba ne abona likoonjo lisising'eng'ile alamanyisia babaandu ali, akhatakaasibwa tawe. Likoonjo lilising'eng'ile lili linyala, sikila buli bulwaale bwe kamakele.
Ne kakhali liaba likoonjo ne lioona mala awangia lundi, omundu oyo alacha khu musaayi.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi. Liaba likoonjo ne likaluukhane liawangia, aba omusaayi alekesia babaandu ali, ali omutakaase.
“Aaba omundu nali ne libiimba mala liaona,
ne abuundu niio libiimba liaba khandu khawaanga namwe khabesemu khabonekha, akhoya acha eyekesia khu musaayi.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia, ne yaba ne liyabile liekha khukhila siikhoba sisialibotookhelesia, mala kamaswa mu bwenomwo bwakaluukhane bwakwile buwaanga, omusaayi alekesia omundu oyo khuba nali okhali omutakaase tawe. Aba buli bulwaale bwe kamakele burakikhire mwibiimba.
Ne aaba omusaayi namenieelesia mala anyoole ali kamaswa kalimo se kakaluukhane mala bwakwile buwaanga tawe, lundi liboondo se liayabile lukali khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao tawe, ne kakhali awangie, omusaayi alamwaukhasia mu baandu abe yeng'ene khulwe chindaalo saba.
Liaba likoonjo ne limalatane khu siikhoba, omusaayi alekesia omundu oyo khuba okhetakaasile tawe Sikila ali ne bulwaale.
Ne liaba ne lisikala busa lirio ne likhamalatane tawe, aba eli embala busa eye libiimba. Ne omusaayi alekesia ali, ali omutakaase.
“Ne omundu aya kumulilo ne lubabia ne lukwa luwaanga namwe lubesemu,
omusaayi alamumenieelesia. Kaaba kamaswa ka abuundu ao ne kakaluukhane kakwa buwaanga mala abonekhana ayabile lukali, achile mukari khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao aba kamakele niko. Aba karakikhile mumbala. Ne omusaayi alekesia ali, se ali omutakaase tawe. Buli bulwaale bwe kamakele.
Ne kakhali omusaayi alemenieelesiao mala kaaba bali kamaswa ke abwenao se kakaluukhane akwile awaanga tawe, ne se ayabile achile mukari khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao tawe, ne kakhali alikho awaanga atiiti, omusaayi alamurusia mu baandu abe yeng'ene khulwe chindaalo saba.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi khu ndaalo eya saba. Ne aba ne lilikho limalatana khu siikhoba, aba buli bulwaale bwe kamakele, ne omusaayi alekesia ali, omundu oyo se ali omutakaase tawe.
Ne kakhali aba na asikale busa ario khukaluukhanakho tawe, namwe se alikho amalatana tawe, ali busa awaanga, aba se kali kamakele tawe. Omusaayi alekesia ali, ali omutakaase sikila lili busa likoonjo lie khuya kumulilo.
“Kaaba bali omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi ali ne liboondo khu murwe namwe khu silefu,
omusaayi alalimenieelesia. Liaba ne libonekha ne liyabile abuundu ao lukali khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao, mala lichuune lie abuundu ao liarandaarire lundi lisaapuufu, aba kali kamakele niko, ne omusaayi alalanga omundu oyo ali, se ali omutakaase tawe.
Ne aba oli omusaayi amumenieelesia, liboondo se libonekha khuba liyabile liacha mukari khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesia abuundu ao tawe, ne kakhaba kario, khachuune khasili busa khasapufu, alaukhasibwa arure mu baandu abe yeng'ene khulwe chindaalo saba.
Omusaayi alamenieelesia liboondo elio lundi khu ndaalo eya saba. Ne liaba ne likhamalatana tawe, lundi khachuune kharandaafu akho se khalio tawe, lundi se abonekha nga ayabile acha mukari khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao tawe,
omundu oyo alebekwa. Ne se bamubeka ekoonjo tawe. Omusaayi alamwaukhasia arure mu baandu abe yeng'ene khulwe chindaalo chichiindi saba.
Ne khu ndaalo eya saba, omusaayi alamenieelesia liboondo elio. Ne liaba ne likhamalatane tawe lundi se libonekha liayabile liacha mukari khukhila siikhoba sisiabotookhelesiao tawe, omusaayi alekesia ali, omundu oyo ali omutakaase. Omundu oyo alasiinga chingubo chewe mala alaba omutakaase,
Ne aba liboondo ne limalatane khu siikhoba enyuma we khumanyisibwa bali omutakaase,
omusaayi alamumenieelesia lundi. Liaba liboondo ne limalatane khu siikhoba, se enana khulola lichuune ne lirandarire tawe, omundu oyo aba ng'ali ali okhali omutakaase.
Ne kakhali omusaayi ne ebaasia ali liboondo se liamalataane tawe, lundi lichuune limali lilikho lichoa, abuundu ao aba na aonile, omusaayi alekesia ali, omundu oyo ali omutakaase.
“Aba omundu we siseecha namwe owe siikhasi nali ne abuundu awaanga khu siikhoba siewe,
omusaayi alamenieelesia omundu oyo. Aba abuundu ao nakhali awaanga lukali tawe, aba siindu sibi sili busa khu siikhoba, aba omundu oyo ali busa omutakaase.
“Lichuune lio mundu ne likhunyukha khumurwe alaba ne sisiole, ne kakhali alaba busa omutakaase.
Ne lichuune lio mundu liaba ne likhunyukha khukhwamila khu meyelo, alaba ne sisiole, ne kakhali alaba busa omutakaase, sino se simukhola aba okhali omutakaase tawe.
Ne liaba liboondo libesemu-liwaanga ne libonekha mu siole aba buli bulwaale bwe kamakele.
Omusaayi alamumenieelesia. Ne liabao liboondo lie bubesemu ne buwaanga,
omusaayi alekesia ali, omundu oyo se ali omutakaase tawe, sikila bulwaale bwe kamakele buli khu murwe khwewe.
“Omundu oli ne kamakele akhoya afware bitabutabu, ne akhachanua lichuune liewe tawe. Akhoya abimbilile kumunwa kwewe naloma ali ‘Sendi omutakaase tawe, sendi omutakaase tawe!’
Kamakele ne kasiili khuona, alaba busa okhali omutakaase tawe ario. Akhoya amenye enje we kambi aleeyi khukhwama khu baandu babaandi.
“Kaaba bali engubo yapa lukukhu akhaba neli eye bufuumbo bwe likheese, eya katani,
eye silaka siosi siosi sia katani namwe sie buusi, namwe liaafu, namwe siindu siosi siosi sisiang'oonwa khukhwama khwiaafu,
kaaba bali lukukhu olwo luli lubookha namwe lurandaafu khu ngubo eyo, aba engubo eyo eli ne lukukhu mala yekesibwe omusaayi.
Omusaayi alasimenieelesia mala asiaukhasie asire abuundu siong'ene khulwe chindaalo saba.
Alamenieelesia bulwaale obwo lundi khu ndaalo eya saba. Ne sisipa lukukhu khu silaka sia katani sie buusi namwe sie liaafu, silaka esio aba sili siikhali sitakaase tawe.
Omusaayi akhoya osia engubo eyo, ebeele eya katani, eye bufuumbo bwe likheese, namwe liaafu, sikila lukukhu lwe kamakele lulikho, mala ekhoya yosibwa.
“Ne aba oli omusaayi asimenieelesia ne anyoola ali lukukhu se lwamalataane khu ngubo eya katani, eye buusi namwe khwiaafu tawe,
alalaka sisiingwe, mala basire alubeka siong'ene khulwe chindaalo chichiindi saba.
Omusaayi alasimenieelesia lundi ne bamalile khusisiinga. Ne aba lukukhu ne lukhakaluukhasia lukoondo tawe, akhaba ne lukhamalatane tawe, sisiili busa siikhali sitakaase tawe. Mukhoya mwosie sisiindu esio, akhaba ne siipile lukukhu alubeka lwe bweeni namwe lwe nyuma lwong'ene.
Ne aba omusaayi ne asimenieelesia anyoola ali lukukhu lwafulaafulane, alatabula abuundu ao arusie khu ngubo namwe khwiaafu okhwo.
Nono aba lukukhu ne lusibonekha khu ngubo, eya katani, eye buusi namwe liaafu lundi ne lulikho lumalatana, siikhoya siosibwa.
Ne aba engubo, eya katani, eye buusi namwe liaafu nilio basiingile liawangia, alalisiinga lundi, ne lilaba litakaase.
“Nono lino lili lilaka khulwe bulwaale bwe kamakele khu ngubo eye bufuumbo bwe likheese namwe eya katani namwe silaka sia katani namwe eye buusi, namwe khu siindu siosi siosi sisiang'oonwa khukhwama khwiaafu.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Lino nilio lilaka lio mundu owe bulwaale bwe kamakele khu ndaalo eye khutakaasibwa khwewe. Akhoya areerwa khu musaayi.
Ne omusaayi alamurusia enje we kambi mala amumenieelesie. Ne bwaba bulwaale bwe kamakele ne buonile,
omusaayi alalaka bamureerere chinyuni chibili chindakaase alala ne chiikhu che kumutarakwa, ne silaka sibesemu ne sisiaangu.
Omusaayi alalaka enyuni ndala yiriirwe khu sibuumba siilikho kameechi kamakwalaafu.
Alabukula enyuni ekiindi enamu alala ne chiikhu che kumutarakwa, ne silaka sibesemu ne sisiaangu mala abisiikhe mu malasile ke nyuni eyiriirwe.
Alaanyaka kamalasile khukhwola kamakhabi saba khu mundu olikho otakaasibwa khukhwama mu bulwaale bwewe bwe kamakele, nio alaboolela baandu ali, omundu oyo ali omutakaase. Nio omusaayi alalekhuula enyuni enamu eyo epurukhe eche mundaa.
Ne omundu otakaasibwa alasiinga chingubo chewe, abeke lichuune liewe lioosi, mala esiinge ne nono aba omutakaase. Enyuma wa kano, anyala engila mu kambi, ne kakhali akhoya amenye enje we liiema liewe khulwe chindaalo saba.
Khu ndaalo eya saba lundi, alabeka lichuune liewe lioosi, bunwanwa, bufuumbo bwe khu bisike, ne kamaswa koosi khu mubili kwewe. Nio asiinge chingubo chewe mala esiinge, ne alaba omutakaase.
“Khu ndaalo eya munaane alareera kamameeme kamaseecha kabili kakhalimo bubi tawe, ne limeeme lisubeeni lie kumwiiko mulala likhalimo bubi tawe, siianwa sie biakhulia sie bufu butiiti buri bunosie mu ndubi, butubaasibwe ne kamafura. Ne kamafura elita ndala.
Omusaayi omutakaasisie alabukula omundu otakaasibwe oyo ne biianwa biewe abiile ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne omusaayi alabukula limeeme liseecha khu kabili ako, mala aane nga siianwa sirusiao kamabi, alala ne kamafura elita ndala. Alabiaana nga siianwa siboofu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Alereera limeeme abuundu niio bereranga siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni ne biianwa bie khukhwosia Abuundu Atakatifu. Sikila siianwa sirusiao kamabi sili sio musaayi bulayi bwene nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni ne sili. Sili sitakatifu lukali.
Omusaayi alabukulakho kamalasile ke siianwa sirusiao kamabi mala akaakhe khu mburukunyi khu seecha khwo oyo otakaasibwe, ne khu lwala lukhumwa lwe kumukhono kumuseecha, ne khu lwala luboofu lwe khu sikele siseecha.
Omusaayi alabukula kamafura ke kimiseituni mala akachukhe mu sikalabo siewe siikhasi.
Ne lundi asiikhe lulwala lwe kumukhono kwewe mu mafura kaali kumukhono kwewe kumukhasi mala aanyake kamafura ne lulwala lwewe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwola kamakhabi saba.
Ne kamafura karamire mu sikalabo mwewe, omusaayi alakaakha khu mburukunyi khu seecha khwo oyo otakaasibwa, ne khu lwala lukhumwa lwe kumukhono kumuseecha, ne khu lwala luboofu lwe sikele siseecha, kamalasile ke siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Ne omusaayi alachukha kamafura kasikaale mu sikalabo siewe khumurwe kwo mundu otakaasibwe oyo. Ne omusaayi alakhola embosio eye khurusiao bubwoni khu mundu oyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Omusaayi alaana siianwa sirusiao bubwoni khu takaasibwa. Enyuma wa kano aleera sisiaayo khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Ne omusaayi alaana siianwa sie khukhwosia nende sie biakhulia khu alutare. Mungila yino omusaayi alamurusiakho bubwoni mala omundu oyo alaba omutakaase.
“Ne kakhali aba omundu oyo nali omutaambi okhanyala aana sisiindu khukhilakhoo tawe, aba alareera khulwe khutakaasibwa khwewe limeeme liseecha nga siianwa sie khumurusiakho bubwoni. Alareera ekilo ndala eye bufu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi alareera kamabongobongo kabili namwe kamauusi kamabaya kabili kamaana nga nanyala. Bilala khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, ne sisiindi khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane eye khuakasibwa khwewe, alabireera khu musaayi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omusaayi alabukula limeeme lie siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, kamafura ke kimisabibu mala abiaane nga siianwa siboofu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne omusaayi aleera limeeme lie siianwa sirusiao bubwoni. Ne alaakha kamalasile ke siianwa sirusiao bubwoni khu mburukunyi khu seecha khwo mundu ne khu lukhumwa lwe kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha ne khu lwala luboofu lwe khu sikele siewe siseecha.
Omusaayi alachukha kamafura khu sikalabo sie kumukhono kwewe kumukhasi.
Ne alaanyaka kamafura kaali mumukhono kwewe kumukhasi ne lulwala lwe kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwola kamakhabi saba.
Omusaayi alaakha kamafura kaali mukhono mwewe khu mburukunyi khu seecha khwo mundu otakaasibwa, khu lukhumwa lwe kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha, ne khu lwala luboofu lwe sikele siewe siseecha niio bara kamalasile ke siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Kamafura kakaandi koosi niko omusaayi ali nako khu sikalabo siewe, omusaayi alakachukha khu murwe kwo mundu otakaasibwa, mala mu ngila yino akhola embosio eye khurusiao bubwoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono alaana kamabongobongo ako, namwe kamauusi kamabaya kamaana nga nanyala.
Silala silaba siianwa sirusiao bubwoni ne sisiindi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia, alala ne siianwa sie siakhulia. Mungila yino omusaayi alakhola embosio khurusiao bubwoni khuyo otakaasibwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lino lili lilaka khulwo mundu oli ne bulwaale bwe kamakele, okhanyala khuaana biianwa bibienyekha khulwe khutakaasibwa tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Ne mwoola mu sibala sia Kanaani, nisio ndikho muelesia sibe sisienywe, ne ndera lukukhu munju yo mundu mu sibala sienywe.
Omwene enju oyo akhoya aboolele omusaayi ali bulwaale buli munju mwase.
Omusaayi alalaka ali, buli sisiindu sirusibwe munju eyo nakhacha khumenieelesia bulwaale obwo tawe, akhakhola ario abale buli siindu munju eyo khuba siikhali sitakaase tawe. Enyuma wakano, omusaayi alacha munju eyo akibone,
ne khumenieelesia bulwaale obwo. Ne lukukhu olwo lwaba ne luli khwisiisi lie nju ne bipoondo bie lubookha namwe bubesemu, ne khubonekha oli biyabile mwisiisi,
omusaayi alarura munju eyo mala akikale khulwe chindaalo saba.
Khu ndaalo eya saba omusaayi alakobola mala akimenieelesie lundi. Aba lukukhu ne lumalatane khwisiisi khwenju.
Omusaayi alarusia lilaka ali kamabaale niko lukukhu lunyoolekhanekho katechulwe, karusibwe khunju, mala kamwaatwe abuundu anyaalu enje we lukoba.
Enyuma wako lisiisi lie mukari lioosi nilio baapa epulasita, likhoya liaarakarwa mala epulasita eyaba ne yapwa echukhwe abuundu anyaalu enje we lukoba.
Ne balabukula kamabaale kakaandi bakobosie niio ako karusibwe, mala epulasita embia yipwe khukhwikasia lisiisi.
“Lwaaba lukukhu ne lukobola lundi munju enyuma we kamabaale khurusibwa khunju, ne enju chana khuarakarwa ne khukhupwa epulasita,
omusaayi acha alole. Ne lukukhu lwaba ne lumalatane munju eyo, aba seli endakase tawe.
Enju eyo ekhoya etechulwe alala ne kamabaale kayo, ne kimirongooro kiayo ne epulasita yayo yoosi. Ne khukhwola esutwe eyilwe enje we lukoba, abuundu anyaalu.
Buli mundu yesi owingila munju eyo ne yikaalwe alaba omunyaalu khukhwola ekolooba,
Omundu yesi yesi okona asi munju eyo namwe oliamo, akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe.
“Ne kakhali kaaba bali omusaayi echa khulola enju enyuma we khumala lundi, ne anyoola lukukhu se lwamalataane tawe alaboola ali, enju eli endakase, sikila lukukhu lwarusiibweo elala.
Mukhutakaasa enju omusaayi alabukula chinyuni chibili, ne chiikhu che kumurongooro kumutarakwa, ne silaka sibesemu ne sisiaangu.
Alereera enyuni ndala khu sibuumba sie liloba silikho kameechi kamakwalaafu.
Nio alabukula chiikhu che kumutarakwa, sisiaangu, silaka sibesemu, ne nyuni enamu mala alabisiikha mu malasile ke nyuni eyiriirwe ne mumeechi kamakwalaafu. Mala alaanyaka khunju khukhwola kamakhabi saba.
Mungila yino alatakaasa enju ne kamalasile ke nyuni ne kameechi kamakwalaafu, enyuni enamu, chiikhu che kumutarakwa, sisiaangu, ne silaka sibesemu.
Ne alalekhuula enyuni enamu epurukhe erure mu lukoba eche mundaa. Ne mungila yino alakhola embosio khulwe nju yino mala elaba endakase.”
Elino nilio lilaka khuloondekhana ne bulwaale bwe kamakele nende bwe lukukhu.
Bulwaale buno buli bwe khukhwiyakala, lwe chingubo ne chinju,
kamabiimba, kamaboondo namwe kamakoonjo.
Kamalaka kano kokesia siise siina nisio sisiindu sili siikhali sitakaase tawe, ne siise siina nisio sindu sili similiiu.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omundu owe siseecha yesi yesi oli ne bulwaale bwe khucha kamayila, namwe kameechi aba se ali omutakaase tawe.
Kumubili kwaba ne kurura bibiindu ebio namwe bikwikasie, aba se ali omutakaase tawe.
Khu sitanda nisio oocha kamayila ekhalakho namwe akonakho, siliba siikhali sitakaase tawe. Ne buli siindu siosi siosi nisio ekhalakho silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi owetiila khu sitanda siewe, alasiinga chingubo chewe, mala esiinge, ne arama okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Namwe owikhala khu siindu siosi siosi nisio omundu oyo ekhalakho, khukhwola alasiinga chingubo chewe, mala esiinge, ne alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Omundu yesi yesi otiila khu mundu oocha kamayila, kamafuki namwe kameechi akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe mala esiinge ne asikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne omundu ocha kamayila, kamafuki namwe kameechi oyo ne afucha khu mundu yesi yesi oli omutakaase omundu oyo akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe mala esiinge, ne aba alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Khu ndebe yosi yosi niyo omundu oocha kamayila, kamafuki namwe kameechi ekhalakho selaba endakase tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi owetiila khu siindu siosi siosi nisio omundu oyo ekhalekho, se alaba omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba. Omundu yesi yesi osuta sisiindu siosi siosi nisio omundu ocha kamayila ekhalekho, khukhwola alasiinga chingubo chewe mala esiinge ne alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Omundu ocha kamayila alatiila khu mundu yesi yesi, nakhanyoile asaaba kamakhono kewe tawe, omundu niye atiililekho oyo akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe lundi esiinge, mala alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Enyuungu yosi yosi niyo omundu ocha kamayila atiilakho khukhwola yarwe. Ne sibuumba siosi siosi sisiabeechwa khukhwama khu murongooro nisio omundu oyo atiilakho, khukhwola sisiingwe.
“Ne omundu naonile bulwaale bwewe khukhwola alinde chindaalo saba chiwe nio asiinge chingubo chewe mala esiinge mu meechi kamakwalaafu, ne alaba omutakaase.
Khu ndaalo eya munaane alabukula kamabongobongo kabili namwe kamauusi kamabaya kamaana kabili mala akayile amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala akakaanisie omusaayi.
Omusaayi alaana lilala khu kabili nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni ne liliindi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia. Mungila yino omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe khurusiao bubwoni bwo mundu oyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne omundu aba ne arusia kamaani ko museecha, khukhwola esiinge buli abuundu, ne alaba nakhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne buli engubo yosi yosi namwe lisielo nibio kamaani ko omuseecha ako kachilekho bikhoya biasiingwa, ne bilaba biikhali bitakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Enyuma wo mundu khuba ne omukhasi, boombi bakhoya besiinge, mala balasikala bakhali batakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
“Omukhasi ne ali mu ndaalo chewe chimbi, alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khulwe chindaalo saba. Ne omundu yesi yesi omutiilakho alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Sisiindu siosi siosi nisio ekhalakho namwe akonakho mu ndaalo echo silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi otiila khu sitanda sio mukhasi oyo alasiinga chingubo chewe mala esiinge, ne alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne omundu yesi yesi otiila khu siindu siosi siosi nisio omukhasi oyo ekhalekho, alasiinga chingubo chewe, mala esiinge, ne alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Sibele sitanda namwe sisiindu siosi siosi nisio omukhasi oyo ekhalangakho, omundu osietiilakho alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Ne omundu naba ne omukhasi oyo mu ndaalo chewe chimbi, alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khulwe chindaalo saba. Ne sitanda siosi siosi nisio akonakho silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe.
“Omukhasi ne akhobokha khulwe chindaalo chingali khukhila nga abechanga mu ndaalo chewe chimbi, alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe mu ndaalo chosi nicho atasilekho. Kalaba busa nga nabechanga nali mu ndaalo chewe chimbi.
Buli sitanda nisio akonakho, mu siise sie khukhobokha silaba siikhali sitakaase tawe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi otiila khu biindu bino alaba okhali omutakaase tawe, ne akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe mala esiinge, ne alasikala okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Namalile khukhobokha, akhoya alindiilile chindaalo saba ne aba omutakaase.
Khu ndaalo eya munaane alabukula kamabongobongo kabili namwe kamauusi kamabaya kabili kamaana ayile khu musaayi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Omusaayi alaana lilala khu niko nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni ne liliindi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia. Ne mungila yino omusaayi alaana embosio khulwe khurusiao bubwoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa khu kaambila babaandu ba Isiraeli khuloondekhana ne khulekha khu takaasibwa nio balekhe khu nyaalutia Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liliaba akari we kambi, busa bakhafwiile mu bwoni.
“Kano kali kamalaka khu mundu ocha kamayila, kamafuki, kameechi namwe orura kamaani ko museecha.
Lundi kosi kali kamalaka ko mukhasi oli mu ndaalo chewe chimbi. Ne lundi kali khu mundu oba no mukhasi oli mundaalo chewe chimbi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma khu Musa enyuma we basoleeli babili ba Aruni ne bamalile khufwa, nga baba ne balikho baanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumulilo kukhali kumutakatifu tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Boolela wandaayo Aruni oli akhechaka siise siosi siosi, enyuma we pasia Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali ebweeni we ndebe eye siisa eli khwi Sanduku lie Ndakaano tawe. Akhola ario afwa.
Eyino niyo engila niyo Aruni anyala achelamo Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali: Akhoya khureera euunwa endiiti khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, ne limiiku khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
“Aruni akhoya abe ne esiingile, mala efwaare likooti lie katani likatakatifu ne sirwari eye katani, eboele kumusiipi kwa katani ne sileemba sia katani. Chino chili chingubo chindakatifu.
“Alabukula khukhwama mu libuusiana lie babaana ba Isiraeli chindurume chibili khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni ne limiiku khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Ne Aruni alarusia euunwa nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni bwewe omwene, ne bubwoni bwe luuya lwewe.
Ne alabukula chindurume chibili ayile ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuliango kwe Liiema lie kumuse.
Abwenao Aruni alapa chikura khu mbusi chibili, ndala ekwila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ekiindi ekwila Asaseli.
Aruni alarusia embusi ekwilile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala akiaane nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Ne kakhali embusi ekwilile Asaseli elaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi neli enamu mala eyilwe mu sichiimi khu Asaseli, nio emaleo bubwoni bwe babaandu.
“Aruni alaana euunwa nga siianwa sie bubwoni bwewe omwene ne bwe luuya lwewe. Aleera euunwa nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni bwewe.
Alanjala kumulilo kwe kamaanda kukwising'eng'ile kwichule lukaraya lwe khukhwanjalilakho, khukhwama khu alutare ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne chifuusi chibili che bupaani bunosie mala abireere Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali.
Ne akhoyela aree bupaani khu mulilo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio liliisi lie bupaani lilafweela lifunikhe endebe eye siisa eeli khu lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Nio akhakhola ario alibona mala afwa tawe.
Alabukula kamalasile ke euunwa eyo aroongemo lulwala akaanyake khu ngaaki khwe ndebe eye siisa ne lundi aanyake kakaandi khukhwola kamakhabi saba ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Mungila yino alarusiao bubwoni Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali khubela bunyaalu bwe babaandu ba Isiraeli, ne kamabi kabwe koosi. Ne lundi akhoya akhole ario khu Liiema lie kumuse, sikila lili akari we kambi ekhali endakase tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi akhabakho mu Liiema lie kumuse khukhwama siise nisio Aruni engila Abuundu Atakatifu khumalao bubwoni khukhwola nga narura enje tawe. Kakhoya kabe kario khukhwola nga emalakho bubwoni bwewe omwene, be luuya lwewe, ne khulwe babaandu boosi Baisiraeli.
Enyuma wakano acha khu alutare eli ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu kikwalaasia. Alabukula kamalasile ke euunwa ne ke mbusi mala akaakhe khunjika che khu alutare.
Akhoya aanya kamaalasile ne lulwala lwewe khu alutare khukhwola kamakhabi saba. Mungila yino alakikwalaasia khukhwama khu bwoni bwe babaana ba Isiraeli ne khukikhola ebe endakatifu.
“Aruni namalile khukwalaasia Abuundu Atakatifu, Liiema lie kumuse, ne alutare, alareera embusi enamu.
Aruni alarakho kamakhono kewe koombi khu murwe kwe mbusi enamu mala ekanilekho kamabi kewe koosi nende ke babaandu ba Isiraeli. Bubwoni ne kamabi kabwe koosi akare khu murwe kwe mbusi. Namalile ario omundu oroborwe alatimania embusi ne khu kiyila mu sichiimi.
Embusi elasuta bubwoni bwabwe bwoosi ebuyile mu sichiimi nimwo omundu akhamenyile tawe.
Ne alesiinga Abuundu Atakatifu, mala afware chingubo chewe. Namalile ario alarura enje ache aane siianwa sie khukhwosia khurusiao bubwoni bwewe omwene ne bwe babaandu bewe.
Aloselia khu alutare kiminawa kie sisiaayo khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni.
Ne omundu otimaanie embusi aayiila mu sichiimi khu Asaseli, akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe, mala esiinge, nio engile mu kambi.
Euunwa ne mbusi birumikhirwe khulwe siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, nibio kamalasile kabio kareerwa Abuundu Atakatifu khurusiao bubwoni, bilasutwa birusibwe enje we kambi. Kamasielo, chinyama ne kamasisie kabio bilosibwa.
Yesi yesi obiosia akhakobola mu kambi tawe, akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe ne khukhwesiinga.
Khu ndaalo eyo mukharusibwe khukhwama mu bwoni bwenywe bwoosi. Mukhatakaasibwe khukhwama mu bwoni bwenywe bwoosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Endaalo eyo elaba esabato endakatifu lukali eye khukhebulila, lundi eli endaalo eye khulola. Lili lilaka lia mindali.
Omusaayi owachukhwakho kamafura owarebwakho kumukhono ne khuroborwa abukule khukhwila mu bubweyaangu bwa raraawe alakhola kumulimo kwe khutakaasa. Alafwara chingubo che busaayi.
Alatakaasa Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, ne Liiema lie kumuse ne alutare, basaayi ne babaandu boosi.
Lino likhabe lilaka lia mindali khwinywe. Kumwiima kuno khukhwola kukholwe lulala khu mwiiko, khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli, sikila bubwoni bwabwe bwoosi.” Nio Musa aakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne amulakile.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Lomaloma khu Aruni ne babaana bewe ne babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi. Baboolele oli, lino nilio lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omuisiraeli yesi yesi owirira ekhaafu namwe limeeme namwe embusi mu kambi, namwe enje we kambi,
ne se abireera emuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, alaba nga ochukhile sifuki, alarusibwa mu baandu bewe.
Sifuno sie lilaka lino sili bali, luno babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhoya khureera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bibiaayo nibio bereeranga busa mundaa. Luno balabireera khu musaayi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse mala babiire bibe nga biianwa bie kumuleembe bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omusaayi alaanyaka kamalasile khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, mala osie kiminaawa kirusia kumuuya kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baisiraeli se bakhoya balooba khuba basubilwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khulwe khu khwirira chimosi chabwe mundaa nga chimbosio khu bisieeno tawe. Babaandu baisiraeli khukhwola baabikhe lilaka lino mindali na mindali.
“Baboolele muli, Omuisiraeli yesi yesi namwe omukwa obamenyilemo, orusia siianwa sie khukhwosia namwe embosio,
ne se areera amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse, khuaana nga embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, omundu oyo se alaba lundi mulala khu baandu ba Wele tawe.
Bulamu bwa buli sindu buli mumalasile, nisio sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alakiilisia ali kamalasile koosi khukhwola kachukhwe khu alutare khurusiao bubwoni bwe babaandu. Kamalasile niko bulamu, mala niko karusiao bubwoni.
Nisio sikila ne nabooleele babaandu ba Isiraeli ndi, omundu yesi yesi mu nibo namwe omukwa owa bamenyamo akhalia kamalasile tawe.
“Ne Omuisiraeli yesi yesi namwe omukwa owabamenyamo yesi yesi naaya esaang'i namwe enyuni enyala yaliibwa mala akiire, alachukha kamalasile kayo mala akafuunikhe ne liloba.
Sikila bulamu bwa buli sibuumbe silamu buli mu malasile kasio. Kamenako niko kakila nemboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ndi, bakhaliakho enyama esilimo kamalasile tawe, sikila bulamu bwe sibuumbe siosi siosi buli mu malasile. Ne yesi yesi okalia se alaba lundi mulala khu baandu bewe tawe.
“Omundu yesi yesi, Omuisiraeli namwe omukwa, olia enyama eye san'gi efwiile namwe eyirirwe ne saang'i, akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe, lundi esiinge mala alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba, nio abe omutakaase.
Aaba ne akhachisiinga namwe esiinga tawe, aba aletiuukha bubwoni bwewe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Mukhaloonda bikholwa bie Bamisiri niio mwamenyanga tawe, namwe bikholwa bie Bakanaani niio ndikho muyila tawe. Mukhaloonda kamalaka kabwe tawe.
Ria kamalaka kase mala mukaloonde. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Khwako loonda kamalaka ne bikholwa nibio ndikho muelesia, mulamenya mwaba ne mukhola murio ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana kamalaka kano. “Okhakhola sifwaabi no mulebe yesi yesi tawe.
Okhaambia raraao chisoni khulwe khukhola sifwaabi ne maao tawe.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne mukha raraao tawe.
Okhakhola sifwaabi no mwichukhulu wowo tawe, sikila chino chili chisoni khwiwe.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne wandaayo omukhaana owe khuluyia tawe sikila yesi ali wandaayo niye.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne sengeo tawe, sikila ali wandaye owa raraao.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne wandaaye owa maao tawe sikila yesi ali maao.
Okhakhola sifwaabi nende bamukha raraao babaandi tawe sikila bali mukha wandaye ba raraao.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne mukho mwana wowo tawe, sikila ali omukhwe.
Okhakhola sifwaabi ne mukha wandaayo tawe sikila ali omukhasi owa wandayo.
Okhakhola sifwaabi sie khubukula maawe no mwana khuba nga bakhasi bowo tawe. Sikila olwo luli luuswa nilwo.
Okhareera mulamuo omukhasi wowo omwene nasiili omulamu tawe.
Okhakhola sifwaabi no mukhasi owa bene tawe, sikila wenyaalutia.
Okharusia balala khu baana bowo obaane khubirira mumulilo nga siianwa khu sifwaani wele Moleki, mala obiiye Lisina lia Wele wowo tawe, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Okhakhola sifwaabi no museecha wasio tawe. Sikila luli luuswa lubi.
Omundu yesi yesi akhakhola sifwaabi ne saang'i tawe. Sikila sili sikholwa siibi lukali.
“Mukhenyaalutia mwabene ne bibiindu bino tawe, sikila bino bioosi nibio chikholo nicho ndikho ndimania ebweeni wenywe chenyaalutianga nabio,
mala sibala siekhola siikhali sitakaase tawe, nio nasielesia kumunaanio. Mala sibala chana sialoba babaandu baba ne bamenyilemo.
Ne kakhali murie kamalaka kase ne mukhakholakho silala khu bie sifwaabi bino tawe. Abeele omusaalwa namwe omukwa.
Sikila babaandu be sibala sino ba baaba ebweeni wenywe bakhola sifwaabi, mala sibala siaba sinyaalu.
Sibala siikhakhola sirio siamuloba enywe ne mu sinyaalutia tawe. Nga sialoba babaandu babamenyangamo enywe ne mukhachayo tawe
Sikila omundu yesi yesi oolikhola sifwaabi sino se aliba mulala khu baandu bewe tawe.
“Nono, ria kamalaka niko ndusia mala mukhakholakho kimiima kisinyisia kikiakholwa ne babaandu ba baamenya mu sibala enywe ne mukhachamo tawe. Mukhenyaalutia nakio tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.”

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu Baisiraeli oli, ba batakatifu, sikila, Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ndi Omutakatifu.
Buli mulala khwinywe khukhwola arie maawe ne raraawe ne lundi mulinde chisabato chase. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“Ne muaana embosio eye siianwa sie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mukhoya muaane mungila niyo munyala mwafukiililwamo.
Sikhoya siliibwe khu ndaalo eng'ene niyo musiaanilekho, namwe khu ndaalo eloondakho, ne siosi siosi sisikala khukhwola khu ndaalo eya khataru, khukhwola siosibwe.
Kaaba bali siliibwa khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, aba se sili sitakaase tawe, se sifukiililwa tawe,
ne buli mundu osilia alaba ne bubwoni, sikila aba anyaalutie sisiindu sitakatifu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne omundu nga oyo ario salaba lundi nga mulala khu baandu bewe tawe.
Ne mukhafuna kimisabibu mwamalilakho elala tawe, namwe khukhwangala kamatuunda kakwile asi tawe, mukhoya mulekhelekho bataambi ne baakwa: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Mukhechuba mu lisina liase mu bubeeyi mala mwonake lisina liase tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhalaama omumiinyi, namwe mure sisiindu ebweeni wo mubofu etuyekho tawe, ne kakhali murie Wele wenywe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Okhasalanisia bubeeyi khu baandu mu baandu tawe, ne okhakholakho sisiindu siosi siosi sisionaka bulamu bwo mundu tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukharuungisia bubi ne bubi khu mundu yesi yesi tawe namwe oambile siikhoonde babaana be balebe benywe tawe. Ne kakhali siima owasio nga ne wesiima wamwene. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Omundu nakhola sifwaabi no mukhasi oli nasioobi, oseleelwe no mundu okundi mala okhali omulekhuule tawe, babekhasia musiina ne se baleerwa tawe, sikila omukhasi oyo se ali omulekhuule tawe.
Ne kakhali omundu oyo alareera limiiku emuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse nga siianwa sie kamabi kewe omwene khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne omusaayi alakhola embosio eye khumumalao bubwoni ne limiiku lie siianwa sirusiao bubi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu bwoni nibwo akhola, ne abeelwa bubwoni nibwo akholile.
“Ne mwingila mu sibala sia Kanaani mala mwabiaala kimirongooro kia buli lukano khulwe biakhulia, mukhoya khubukula kamatuunda kakio nga kumusilo khukalia,” Kamatuunda kakio se kaalibwa tawe khulwe kimiiko kitaru kie khunyoa.
Ne mu mwiiko kukhola khane kamatuunda kakio koosi kalaba kamatakaase, nga siianwa sie efuma khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali khu mwiiko kukhola kharaano munyala mwalia kamatuunda kakio, mungila yino kimirongooro kienywe kilama kamatuunda kamakali lukali: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wenywe.
Mukhabeka kimirwe kienywe binyoosi, namwe mwabeka bunwanwa bwenywe tawe.
Mukhekhalakaka mwabene sikila ofwiile, namwe mwesalaka chisale tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Liinda chi sabato chase mala murie abuundu ase atakatifu. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Mukhoya mwenyokhela basaakhulu ne khuria babaandu bakhulu. Ria Wele wenywe: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kholela omukwa niye omenyile ne naye nga omusaalwa, mala omusiime nga wesiima wamwene, sikila mwesi mwaba baakwa mu sibala sie Misiri: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Murumikhire bipiimilo bia ng'ali, bipiima busiro ne bipiima buleeyi buuli bwa ng'ali. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamurusia mu sibala sie Misiri.
Murie kamalaka kase koosi, mukarumikhire. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, omundu yesi yesi mu baandu ba Isiraeli, namwe omukwa yesi yesi omenyile mu Isiraeli, oaana babaana bewe khusaaya Moleki, aleerwa, babaandu be sibala esio bakhamupe kamabaale.
Ne ese samwene ndamufutarira mala murusie khukhwama mu baandu bewe, sikila aelesie Moleki mulala khu baana bewe. Mungila yino onake abuundu ase atakatifu ne lisina liase litakatifu.
Ne kaaba bali babaandu be sibala esio basila busa omundu oyo ne alikho naana mulala khu baana bewe khu Moleki, mala se bamwiira tawe,
nono ese ndamufutarira niye nenju yewe yoosi, mala mbarusie khukhwama mu baandu babwe. Ndamurusiamo niye nende abo boosi basaaya Moleki.
“Omundu yesi yesi nayiima buyeeti khu balakusi, ne khu bamakoombe, ndamufutarira mala murusie khukhwama mu baandu bewe.
Khwako yetakaasa mwabene mala mube batakatifu, sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Ria kamalaka kase mala mukaliinde. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omukhola enywe khuba batakatifu.”
Omundu okona no mukhasi owa raraawe, aba asimbule sichula sia raraawe. Ne abo boombi, niye no mukhasi oyo, balerwa. Babeene balasuta sifuki siabwe.
Omundu okona nende mukho mwana wewe, boombi berwa. Aba bakholile ke luuswa, ne sifuki siabwe sili khu beene.
Omundu nakhola sifwaabi no museecha wasie, boombi bakholile sisiindu sie luuswa. Ne boombi bakhoya berwe ne sifuki siabwe sibe khu beene.
Omundu ne ayila omukhaana mala lundi ayile masalaawe, luli luuswa. Boosi balosebwa nio luuswa luno lurureo.
Omundu ne akhola sifwaabi ne saang'i, aleerwa. Ne esaang'i yosi eleerwa.
Omukhasi nakhola sifwaabi ne saang'i, niye aleerwa ne saang'i yosi eleerwa. Omukhasi oyo alasuta sifuki siewe, ne esaang'i eyo elasuta sifuki siayo.
Omundu naba ne omukhasi oli mu ndaalo chewe chimbi, boombi batimanisibwa barure enje we kholo eya Isiraeli. Sikila baafunake kamalaka ke khukhweliinda mu bumiliiu.
Omundu nakhola sifwaabi ne mukha khochaawe namwe mukha raraawe wandaaye owa raraawe. Bombi balasuta luuswa lwabwe mala bafwe bukuumba.
Omundu ne akona nende mukha wandaaye, sili sifwaabi. Aba aambisie wandaaye chisoni. Bombi balafwa bukuumba.
“Khwako, liinda kamalaka kase koosi, nio sibala nisio ndikho muyilamo siikhamuloba tawe.
Mukhakhola kimiima kie babaandu nibo ndikho ndusia ebweeni wenywe tawe. Sikila bakhola kamabi kano koosi, mala nabaleka.
Ne kakhali ese namusuubiisie ndi, ‘Mukhabukule sibala siabwe, ne khamuelesie enywe sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga, sibe sisienywe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, owamwaula khukhwama khu kholo chichiindi.
Khwako mukhoya mukabukhasie chisaang'i ne chinyuni nicho balia nende nicho bakhalia tawe. Mukhalia chisaang'i ne chinyuni chinyaalu namwe sisiindu siosi simoola tawe. Naboolile ndi chili chinyaalu ne khuchilia lilamukhola enywe khuba bakhali batakaase tawe.
Mukhoya mwaba batakatifu khwise sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi Omutakatifu. Namwabukhasie enywe khukhwama khukholo chichiindi nio mube babaandu base.
“ ‘Omundu yesi yesi owe siikhasi namwe owe siseecha oli omulakusi namwe omulosi akhoya erwa. Bakhoya berwa ne kamabaale ne sifuki siabwe siliba khu beene.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Boolela basaayi, ba okhwa Aruni oli, ‘Omusaayi yesi yesi akhatiila khu mufu tawe, busa aba okhali omutakaase tawe,
nakhali omulebe wewe owe aembi, maawe namwe raraawe, omusoleeli wewe, omukhaana wewe, namwe wandaaye omusoleeli.
Ne lundi akhaba wandaaye omukhaana okhacha munju omenyile naye tawe.
Akhekhola okhali omutakaase khulwe lifwa lie bakhwe bewe tawe.
Bakhoya babe batakatifu lundi bakhonaka lisina lia Wele wabwe tawe. Sikila baananga biianwa bibiosie khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siakhulia sia Wele wabwe, khwako bakhoya babe batakatifu.
Basaayi bakhayila bakhasi bataamba, namwe omukhaana okhali ne yabwana tawe. Ne lundi bakhayila bakhasi babalekhana ne baseecha babaandi tawe. Sikila basaayi bali batakatifu khu Wele wabwe.
Babaandu bakhoya babukule omusaayi nga omutakatifu, sikila aananga biakhulia khu Wele wabwe. Akhoya aaba omutakatifu khwinywe. Sikila Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi Omutakatifu, mala kholanga babaandu base baba batakatifu.
Omukhaana wo musaayi naba omutaamba, aambia raraawe chisoni. Akhoya osibwa aafwa.
“ ‘Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali mu basie, owachukhwakho kamafura khu murwe kwewe, mala owareebwa alubeka khufwara chingubo che busaayi, akhalekha khuchanua lichuune liewe, namwe wetabula chingubo chewe tawe.
Sakhoya engila niio kumulaambo kuli namwe alobe khuba omutakaase akhaba ne ali raraawe namwe maawe ofwiile tawe,
Akharura Abuundu Atakatifu namwe onakake Abuundu Atakatifu a Wele wewe tawe. Sikila atakaaswa khulwe khu chukhwakho kamafura ka Wele wewe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhoya ayile omukhaana we yabwana.
Akhareera namulekhwa namwe owalekhana no museecha wewe, namwe omukhasi owabechanga omutaamba tawe. Akhoya akhwe omukhaana we yabwana yeng'ene khukhwama mu kholo yewe omwene.
Akhola ario niio alekhe babaana bewe babe batakaase. Sikila Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omutakaasa.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni oli, Se alibao mulala khube lisaaye liowo mu ndaalo chichiicha oli ne buleme bwosi bwosi oliaana biakhulia khu Wele tawe.
Omundu oli ne buleme bwosi bwosi akhaana siianwa tawe. Omundu nga: omubofu, omuleme, owe chimbala mu bweeni, namwe owatooya,
lundi omundu owalemala siikhandakilo, namwe kumukhono,
omundu owe siruumba namwe omwiimbi, owe ndesi ne kamasiu, owe siikhuya, owe chingooso, namwe omuchili.
Omundu yesi yesi owe lisaaye lio musaayi Aruni oli ne buleme se akhoyela aana siakhulia nga siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sie kumulilo tawe.
Omundu nga oyo ario anyala alia khu siakhulia siase. Anyala alia khu siakhulia sitakatifu lukali ne khu biindu bili bitakatifu.
Ne sikila ali ne buleme se akhoyela echa siimbi apasia endakatifu, namwe ache khu alutare tawe. Akhola ario onaka Abuundu Atakatifu. Sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabikhola bitakatifu.”
Nono kano niko Musa aboolela Aruni, ne babaana bewe be seecha ne Baisiraeli boosi.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni ne babaana bewe oli, bakhonakaka bibiindu bitakatifu nibio babaandu Baisiraeli bambanila tawe. Bakhola bario bonaka lisina liase litakatifu. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baboolele oli, ‘Omundu yesi yesi owe lisaaye liowo lioosi, nakhali omutakaase tawe, ne echa siimbi ne biianwa bitakatifu nibio babaandu ba Isiraeli baanile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se alichakho lundi ebweeni wase tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“ ‘Omundu yesi yesi we lisaaye lia Aruni oli ne bulwaale bwe kamakele namwe oronya kamayila, kamafuki namwe kameechi, se anyala alia khu biindu bitakatifu tawe khukhwola nga nalaba omutakaase. Lundi omusaayi anyala khuba okhali omutakaase tawe aba natiila khu siindu siosi siosi siikhali sitakaase tawe, nga khu mufu, namwe kaamani ko museecha.
Lundi yesi yesi otiila khu simoola sinyaalu namwe khu mundu yesi yesi omukhola aba okhali omutakaase tawe, se alaba omutakaase tawe.
Omundu otiila khu siindu nga esio alaba okhali omutakaase tawe khukhwola ekolooba, ne lundi se aliakho bibiindu bitakatifu ne akhesiingile tawe.
Nga enyanga nekwa, naba omutakaase. Ne enyuma wako anyala alia khu biindu bitakatifu, sikila bili biakhulia biewe.
Se akhoya alia enyama eye sisiaayo sifwiile busa, namwe eye sisiaayo sisirirwe ne saang'i eye mundaa tawe, elamukhola abe okhali omutakaase tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“ ‘Khwako basaayi boosi balaliinda kamalaka kase. Ne bakhakhola bario tawe balaba ne kumusaango mala bafwa. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi obakhola babe batakatifu.
“ ‘Omundu wenje akhaliakho sisiindu sitakatifu tawe. Omundu omenyile no musaayi namwe omukholi akhaliakho sisiindu sitakatifu tawe.
Ne kakhali omusaayi aaba nakula nasioobi nga kimiaandu kiewe khulwe chirupia, nasioobi oyo anyala asiliakho. Ne abo basaalwa munju mwewe, banyala balia khu siakhulia nisio omusaayi anyoolanga.
Omukhaana wo musaayi orerwa no mundu okhali omusaayi tawe se alia khu siianwa siosi siosi sitakatifu tawe.
Ne aaba omukhaana wo musaayi nali namulekhwa namwe naba okhali ne babaana tawe, mala owakobola khumenya mungo mwa raraawe, nga aba nasili omwana anyala alia khu siakhulia sia raraawe. Ne omundu okundi akhaliakho tawe.
“ ‘Kaaba bali omundu yesi yesi alia khu siindu sitakatifu nakheluungikhe khukhola ario tawe, akhoya aruunge omusaayi kumuruungo kwasio mu bwichufu nga sili, mala atasekho kamakhumi kabili khu mia ke bukusi bwe siakhulia nisio alile.
Basaayi bakhakhola biianwa bitakatifu bie Baisiraeli nibio baana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bialoba khuba bitakatifu tawe.
Ne mubalekha ne babilia, bibareerere kumunaanio. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi obakhola khuba batakatifu.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni ne babaana bewe, ne babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi oli, Omuisiraeli yesi yesi namwe omukwa yesi yesi omenyile mu Isiraeli anyala enya khuaana siianwa siewe, sibele kumuruungo, namwe endakaano, namwe siianwa sie khukhwerusia, namwe siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se sikhoya siabamo bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Ne kaaba bali bifukiililwa akhoya aane, sibe siseecha, siikhalimo libi namwe silekwa tawe, khukhwama khu uunwa, kamakheese ne chimbusi.
Mukhaana sisiaayo siosi siosi silikho bubi bwosi bwosi tawe, sikila se silafukiililwa khulwe enywe tawe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi naana embosio eye kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, yakhaba ne khuli khutabusia niko echuba namwe nga siianwa sie khukhwerusia, khukhwama mwituuli lie chikhaafu namwe kamakheese, nio sifukiililwe. Sikhabakho ne bubi tawe.
Mukhaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bibiaayo bioosi bioosi bili bibofu, namwe bileme namwe bireme namwe biicha kamayila, bie kamasolosi namwe biili ne kamabambu namwe chingooso tawe. Mukharusia bibiaayo birio khu alutare nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Ne nga siianwa sie khukhwirusia, onyala waana euunwa namwe limeeme lilialemala. Ne kakhali se sifukiililwa nga siianwa sie khukhwechuba tawe.
Okhaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sisiaayo siosi siosi nisio balata namwe sisiauumiia mungila yosi yosi tawe. Lino se lifukiililwa mu sibala sienywe tawe.
“Ne lundi nga siakhulia sia Wele wenywe, mukhaana sisiaayo siosi siosi nisio mwanyoola khu mundu omukwa tawe. Bibiaayo nga bibienebio se bifukiililwa tawe sikila bilimo buleme.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Euunwa namwe likheese namwe embusi ne saalilwe, ekhoya erame ne maawe chindaalo saba. Ne khurakikhira khu ndaalo eya munaane enyala yafukiililwa nga siianwa sie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukheera maawe eye moosi namwe eye limeeme ne eng'ana yayo khu ndaalo ndala tawe.
Ne muaana embosio eye kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, loonda kamalaka ke khuaana biianwa nio mufukiililwe.
Embosio ng'eneyo ekhoya yaliibwa khu ndaalo eyo neng'ene, ne mukhakiramia yola muchuli tawe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Nono khemurie kamalaka kase, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhonaka lisina liase litakatifu tawe. Ne kakhali khoya nariibwa ne babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omukhola enywe khuba batakatifu.
Niise owamurusia mu sibala sia Misiri khuba Wele wenywe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu Baisiraeli oli, chindaalo chicharoborwa che libuusiana litakatifu ne naikara eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nicho chino:
Muli ne chindaalo sita mu nicho munyala mwakholelamo kimilimo kienywe, ne kakhali khebulila endaalo ekhola saba, eli e sabato, eli endaalo eye khuuluukha. Khu ndaalo ng'eneyi mukhakhola kimilimo tawe, ne kakhali yebuusia alala khusaaya. Esabato eli ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, osi osi niio mumenyile.
Chino chili chi naikara chindobore cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, libuusia litakatifu, nicho mukhekesie mu biise bibiaroborwa.
Naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela erakikha khu ndaalo eye likhumi na kharaano. Ne khulwe chindaalo saba, mulalia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe.
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa yino mulaba ne libuusiana litakatifu. Ne se mukholakho kumulimo kumuandalafu tawe.
Mulaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa sie khukhwosia khulwe chindaalo saba. Khu ndaalo eya saba libao libuusiana litakatifu. Ne khu ndaalo eyo se mukholakho kumulimo kumuandalafu tawe.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Nga ne mwingila mu sibala nisio ndikho muelesia, ne mukesile, mukhoya muyilile omusaayi sinywa sie likesa lienywe lie khunyoa.
Omusaayi alaana sinywa esio ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nio mufukiililwe. Omusaayi alaana sinywa khu ndaalo eloondela e sabato.
Khu ndaalo niyo oanilakho sinywa sie likesa olaanilakho lundi limiiku lie kumwiiko mulala, lilayi likhalikho bubi tawe, nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne lundi okhoya oaane bufu butiiti mu ndubi butubaasibwe ne kamafura nga siianwa sie kumulimo siunya bulayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi mukhoya muaane endali endiiti eli nga siianwa sie khunywa.
Mukhaliaakho kumukaati namwe biakhulia bikhalange, namwe biibisi khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo mureerera biianwa bino khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lilaka lino licha khubao khu selukho choosi che lisaaye lienywe, khulwa mindali.
Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi karaano, khu ndaalo eloondela esabato eya saba, aana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa sie biakhulia biyaaya.
Mulareera kimikaati kibili khukhwama niio mwamenya mala kiaanwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kimikaati kino kikholwa khukhwama khu bufu bubwola enusu eye ndubi bukhalimo limela tawe.
Ne alala ne kumukaati mukhaane kamameeme saba ke kumwiiko mulala kakhalikho ne bubi tawe, euunwa enjoka ndala ne kamamiiku kabili, bilaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga biianwa bie khukhwosia, alala ne biianwa bie biakhulia ne biianwa bie khunywa, ne kumuuya kumulayi kusimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne lundi mulaana endurume nga siianwa sirusiao bubwoni, ne kamamiiku kamaana kabili ke kumwiiko mulala nga embosio eye kumuleembe.
Ne omusaayi alabiaana ne kumukaati kwe bibiaamo bie bweeni nga biianwa bie khusuta ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne kamameeme kabili, bilaba bitakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe basaayi.
Khu ndaalo eyo mukhakhola kimilimo kienywe kia busiele tawe, nekhali mulebuusia alala khulwe lisaaya.Lilaka lino licha khuba khu selukho choosi che lisaaye lienywe.
Nga ne mukesa biakhulia bienywe, mukhakesa biakhulia bie khundulo mu mikuunda kenywe tawe, ne lundi mukhakobolamo mwakesa biramireo tawe. Lekhela bibienebio bataambi ne baakwa. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, mu mweesi kwa saba, khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi, mukhakikhole endaalo eye khuuluukhila elala, endaalo eye khukhebulila khukhwicha alala ne khusaaya nga chikhoombi ne chipa.
Mukhakhola kimilimo kienywe kia busiele tawe, muaane siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
“Khu ndaalo eye khumi eye kumwesi kwa saba, eli endaalo eye khurusiao bubwoni. Ekhabe khwinywe endaalo eye libuusiana litakatifu. Ne lundi endaalo ng'eneyi mukhaliakho siindu tawe, yebuusia alala khu saaya mala muaane siianwa sie biakhulia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhakhola kimilimo kiosi kiosi khu ndaalo eyo tawe. Sikila eli endaalo eye khukhola kimilukha khurusiao bubwoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omundu yesi yesi oliakho siindu siosi siosi khu ndaalo eyo se alabalikha khuba omundu owa Wele mu baandu bewe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi okhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi khu ndaalo eyo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene akhamwire.
Lilaka lino lili khulwe babaandu be lisaaye lienywe boosi khulwa mindali niio bamenyile osi osi.
Khu khwama nga enyanga ekwa endaalo eya tisa eye kumwesi khu khwola nga ekwa endaalo eye likhumi bukula endaalo yino khuba emboofu eye khuuluukha. Siise sino mbao siilibwa tawe.”
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘Naikara eye Bisali eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi elarakikha khu ndaalo eye khumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kwa saba mala echiililile khulwe chindaalo saba.
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa mu ndaalo chino, mulebuusia alala khulwe lisaaya. Ne mukhakhola kumulimo kumuandalafu tawe.
Khulwe chindaalo saba, mulaana biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne khu ndaalo ekhola munaane mulecha alala lundi khulwe lisaaya mala muaane siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Eli endaalo eye lisaaya, ne mukhakholakho kumulimo kumuandalafu tawe.
“ ‘Chino chili naikara chindobore cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nicho mukhakhole nga libuusiana litakatifu, khulwe khureera biianwa bie kumulilo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khuaana biianwa bie biakhulia, biianwa bie khukhwosia, chimbosio ne biianwa bie khunywa. Buli sibira siekholekhe khu ndaalo yasio.
Naikara chino chili busa khutasa khwicho che chisabato cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khu biianwa bienywe, nende nibio mweana khurusilia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“ ‘Khu ndaalo eye likhumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kwa saba nga ne muba ne mukesile biakhulia bienywe, mukhole lisaaya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe chindaalo saba. Ne mukhoya mwauluukha khu ndaalo eye khunyoa nende endaalo ekhola munaane.
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa, mulabuta kamatuunda malala kamalayi khukhila koosi khukhwama khu mirongooro kienywe kie kamatuunda. Ne lundi mulabuta chisakia che kamakheendu ne chisakia che kamasaafu kamakali. Mulekhoya ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khulwe chindaalo saba.
Mukhakhebulilenge naikara eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu ndaalo saba buli mwiiko. Lilaka lino lilaliindwa ne lisaaye lienywe khulwa mindali. Mukhakholenge khu mwesi kwa saba.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi balamenya mu bisali khulwe chindaalo saba.
Kano kalakhola be lisaaye lienywe bamanye bali ese nakhola babaandu ba Isiraeli bamenya mu bisali nga ne nabarusia mu sibala sie Misiri. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“ ‘Nio mungila yino Musa aana kamalaka khuloondekhana ne chindaalo chindobore che chi naikara cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Aana kamalaka khu baandu ba Isiraeli bareere kamafura ka miseituni kaali kamakwalaafu lukali khulwe chitaa. Kamafura kano kali ke chitaa nio chichiililile khuburukha.
Aruni akhoya aambia chitaa chiburukhe khukhwama ekolooba khukhwola kumutikhinyi mwieema lie kumuse ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Achira ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Lilaka lino likhabeo khulwa mindali.
Aruni alara chitaa khu siteetwe sie sahabu yong'ene mala khukhwola abone ali chiburukha busiele ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ra kimikaati mu nyilili chibili. Ra kimikaati sita khu buli lunyilili khu mesa yafunikhwa ne sahabu yong'ene.
Ra khu buli lunyilili biiunya bulayi, bube nga simanyisio sie siakhulia sie khukhwosia siaanilwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumulilo.
Buli e sabato Aruni arechenge kimikaati ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli lwosi khulwe babaandu Baisiraeli nga endakaano eya mindali.
Siakhulia sili sia Aruni nende be lisaaye liewe, ne balasilila Abuundu Atakatifu, sikila sino sili sitonyi sie siakhulia sitakatifu lukali sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe basaayi.”
Abao omundu mulala owaba ne raraawe Omumisiri ne maawe Omuisiraeli niye balanga bali Shelomiti, omukhaana owa Tibiri khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani. Arura khukeenda mu baandu Baisiraeli. Kamaaya kenyokha akari wo mundu yuno no Muisiraeli mu kambi.
Omundu yuno akhoma lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu silaamo. Nio bamubukula bamuyila khu Musa.
Bara omundu oyo mu buliindi, mala balindiilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ababoolele nisio bakhoyela khukhola omundu oyo.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Rusia enje we kambi omundu owakhoma Wele. Ne buli omundu owaulila ne akhoma are kamakhono kewe khu murwe kwo mundu oyo, khurusia buloli bali ali ne kumusaango. Nio libuusiana lie babaandu boosi limupe kamabaale afwe.
Nono boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, buli mundu yesi yesi oolaama Wele wewe, akhoya asute bubwoni bwewe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi okhoma Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aleerwa. Libuusiana lioosi limupe kamabaale. Abele omukwa namwe omuisiraeli okhoma Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhoya eerwe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi owira sisiaayo sio mundu okundi, amukalusilieo sisiindi silamu.
“Omundu yesi yesi nalemasia okundi, nisio akholile esio ne sisiene, silakholwa khu niye.
Aaba nafuna omundu sikuumba, aba silala khu bikuumba biewe silafunwa. Aaba ne aara emoni eyo wasie, yesi emoni yewe ndala elaarwa. Ne aba napongola liliino, yesi liliewe lilapongolwa. Yesi yesi oumisia okundi, yesi alaoumisibwa ario.
Yesi yesi owira sisiaayo sio kundi akhoya khukobosiao sisiindi, ne kakhali omundu yesi yesi owira owasie, akhoya yesi eerwa.
Lilaka lino lili khu baakwa bamumenyilemo ne mwabene. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.”
Nga Musa ne amala khuboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli kano, babukula omundu chana bamurusia enje we kambi mala bamupa kamabaale bamwiira. Mungila yino babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa.

“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli kano: ‘Nga ne mwingila mu sibala nisio nja khumuelesia, mulaliinda esabato ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kimikuunda kienywe kikonele buli mwiiko kukhola saba.
Mulamiicha biakhulia, khuremula kamaruuti kenywe ke kamatuunda ne khukesa bibiaamo khulwe kimiiko sita.
Ne kakhali kumwiiko kukhola saba, kulaba kumwiiko nikwo kimikuunda kikonelakho elala. Kumwiiko kwe sabato ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mukhamiicha biakhulia mu mikuunda namwe mwaremula kamaruuti kenywe tawe.
Mukhakesa sisiamo nisio mukhaamiicha tawe. Lundi mukhabuta chisabibu khu mirongooro nikio mwalekha khuremula tawe. Kuli kumwiiko kwe kamaloba khukonela elala.
Siosi sisiama mu maloba ne kakhaalimwa khu mwiiko okwo tawe, silaba siakhulia sienywe, nasioobi benywe be siikhasi nende be siseecha nende nibo mwaandika, ne baakwa ba bamenya ne naywe.
Siosi sikhabe siakhulia sie bibiaayo bienywe, ne chisaang'i che mundaa mu mikuunda kienywe. Buli sisiindu siikhamele sisiene.’ ”
“Bala kimiiko saba khukhwola saba kibe kimiiko kamakhumi kane na tisa.
Nono khupa ekhoombi khu ndaalo ekhola ekhumi eye kumwesi kwa saba. Ne khu ndaalo eye khurusia bubwoni, ruma omundu akhupe ekhoombi mu sibala sioosi.
Okhakhole kumwiiko kwe kamakhumi karaano kube kumutakatifu lekha babaandu be mu sibala siowo boosi babe balekhuule. Kumwiiko kuno kukhabe kwe khukobosiayo nibio mwabukula. Sikila buli mulala khwinywe alakobosebwa kimiaandu kiewe lundi alakobola ewabwe.
Kumwiiko kwe kamakhumi karaano kukhabe khwinywe kumwiiko kwe khu khwikhoya. Se mukhamiche biakhulia mu mikuunda kienywe namwe mukese biakhulia bibiamela busa bibieene tawe, namwe mukhabuta chisabibu mu maruuti niko mukharemulila tawe.
Sikila lili likhebulila. Kumwiiko kwoosi kulaba kumutakatifu khwinywe. Ne mulalia biimela bie mu mikuunda bibieene.
“Mu mwiiko kuno kwe likhebulila buli mulala khwinywe alakobosebwa kimiiandu kiewe nikio akusia.
Ne waaba nokusia owasio sisiindu, namwe nomukulakho, mukhabeana tawe.
Nokula kumukuunda khukhwama khu wasio, olabala kimiiko khukhwama khu mwiiko kwe likhebulila lie kimiiko kie kamakhumi karaano. Bukusi nibwo akhukholela bulaloondekhana ne kimiiko kiramire kie likesa.
Kimiiko kiaba ne kili kimikali bukusi bulaba angaaki ne kiaba ne kili kimiiko mitiiti busa kiri, bukusi bulaba asi. Sikila siilikho sikusibwa sili siakhulia sisiamela busa sisiene.
Mukhabeana tawe, ne kakhali murie Wele wenywe. Sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“Khwako ria kamalaka kase koosi ne khukaliinda nio mumenye mu muleembe mu sibala.
Sibala siikhabemo bibiaamo biasio mala mulie mwikure, ne khumenyamo mu muleembe.
Ne kaaba bali omundu anyala areeba ali siakhulia sina nisio khukhalie mu mwiiko kwa saba, kaaba bali se khubiaala namwe khukesa bibiaamo tawe?
Khabiite kamaloba kenywe mu mwiiko kwa sita, nio kaame biakhulia bie kimiiko kitaru.
Nga mumiicha kimikuunda kienywe mu mwiiko kwa munaane mukhabe musilia nibio mwakesa khale. Mukhalie nibio mwamiicha khale khukhwola nga ne mukesa biakhulia nibio mumiichile kumwiiko kwa tisa.
“Mukhakusilia elala kamaloba kenywe tawe, sikila kamaloba se kali kakenywe tawe, kali kakaase. Enywe muli busa nga baakwa lundi bauuyi.
“Kamaloba koosi kaali kakenywe ne kakusibwe khukhwola omweneko omutaayi oyo akakule.
Mulala khwinywe nakwa omutaambi mala akusiekho kamaloba kewe, omulebe wewe owa siimbi anyala akakula khukakobosia.
Ne omundu ne akhali ne omulebe onyala akakula kakobola tawe, anyala atambulukha mala akakula khu kakobosia.
Akhoya abala kimiiko khukhwama ne akakusia mala atase chirupia omundu owakula. Nio nakholile ario, akobole khu maloba kewe.
Ne kakhali aaba nakhali ne chirupia che khukula kamaloba kewe kakobole tawe, kalasikala asi wo mundu wakakula khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe likhebulila. Khu mwiiko kwe likhebulila okwo kalakobolela omweneko.
“Kaaba bali omundu akusia enju mu lukoba lusire, anyala akisikula akikobosie mu mwiiko kwe khunyoa kumumuufu ne kukhawa tawe, khukhwama khu siise sie khukusibwa.
Ne aaba omwene nakhakisikula yakobola kumwiiko ne kukhawa tawe, aba elarama khu mundu owakikula nende be lisaaye liewe. Ne se likobosibwayo mu mwiiko kwe likhebulila tawe.
Ne chinju che mu birekere chikhali mu lukoba tawe, chilakholwa busa nga kimikuunda. Chinyala chakulwa, mala chakobosebwa omwene mu mwiiko kwe likhebulila.
Kakhaba kario, Balawi bali ne bunyali mu siise siosi siosi khukula ne khukhwekoboselia chinju chiili mu chingoba chabwe.
Omundu okula enju khukhwama khu Mulawi mungoba chino, mala khukulwa yakobolayo tawe, ekhoya ekobosebweyo mu mwiiko kwe likhebulila. Sikila chinju nicho Balawi bali nacho mu chingoba chabwe, chili kimiaandu kiabwe mu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali kamaayilwe kakabotookhelelanga chingoba chabwe se kakusibwa tawe. Sikila kili kimiaandu kiabwe khulwa mindali na mindali.
Aaba mulala khwinywe nakwa omutaambi mala se anyala weliinda tawe, mukhoya mu muelesie nibio enya. Muyeete nga muyetaanga omundu omukwa, nio anyale khuchiililila khumenya nanywe.
Okharakho bukhala bwosi bwosi khu siindu nisio omwekopiisie tawe, ne kakhali ria Wele, mala lekha Omuisiraeli wasienywe amenye siimbi nanywe.
Mukhamukhola aruunga bukhala khu rupia nicho mumwekopisie tawe, lundi mukhakhola bukhala khu siakhulia nisio mu mukusia tawe.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, owamurusia mu sibala sia Misiri ne khu muelesia sibala sia Kanaani, ne mbe Wele wenywe.
Alamenya nanywe nga omundu omuandike lundi nga omukwa khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe likhebulila.
Ne niye ne babaana bewe balakhulekha mala akobole khu be nju yewe ne khu miaandu kie bakuuka bewe.
Sikila bali bakholi base nibo narusia mu sibala sia Misiri. Bakhakusibwa nga banasioobi tawe.
Okhaba omurafu khu niye tawe, ne kakhali ria Wele wowo.
Mwaba ne mwenya nasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi, munyala mwabakula khukhwama mu kholo chichamubotookhelela.
Ne lundi munyala mwakula banasioobi mu baana be baakwa bamumenyilemo. Babaana nga abo banyala bakwa kimiaandu kienywe.
Ne munyala mwabalekhela babaana benywe nga kimiaandu nikio banyoolile khwinywe. Munyala mwabakhola banasioobi benywe. Ne kakhali mukhaba barafu khu Baisiraeli basienywe tawe.
“Kaaba bali omukwa owamenya nawe aindiaala, ne wandaayo akwa omutaambi mala ekusia nga nasioobi khu mukwa oyo namwe khu mundu we munju yewe,
enyuma we khukusibwa omutaambi oyo akhoyelwa akulwe mala abe omulekhuule. Mulala khu balebe bewe akhoya amuonia.
Raraawe omuro namwe omwana owa raraawe okundi namwe khu balebe bewe ba siimbi anyala amusikula mala amukobosia. Namwe omwene nakelao aba omuiinda, anyala esikula omwene.
Akhoya afukiilisiane ne noyo owamukula, mala babale kimiiko khukhwamila khu siise nisio ekusiliakho omwene khukhwola kumwiiko kwe likhebulila. Bukusi bwe khumulekhuula buloondekhana ne kimiiko nikio omundu oyo akholile.
Kiaba ne kiramire kimiiko kimikali khuloondekhana ne nabo alakobosiayo khukhwama mu bukusi nibwo aruungwa khulwe khusikulwa khwewe.
Kiaba ne kiramire kimiiko mitiiti busa kiri khukhwola khu Mwiiko kwe likhebulila, bauliilisiane naye khuloondekhana ne kimiiko kie bukholi busikaale khu niye, mala aruunge khuloondekhana ne khusikulwa khwewe.
Akhoya aliindwa nga yaba owaandikwa khulwe khufukiilisiana khwe kumwiiko mulala. Ne omwami wewe akhaba omurafu khu niye tawe.
“Ne aba nakhalekhuliilwe mungila yino tawe, aba niye ne babaana bewe bakhalekhuulwe mu mwiiko kuloondakho khu kwe likhebulila.
Sikila ba Isiraeli bali khwise nga bakholi. Bali bakholi base nibo nakula khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.”

Liinda chisabato chase mala murie abuundu ase atakatifu. Sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
ndamureerera efula mu siise sisienyekha. Ne kamaloba kalarusia bibiaamo bikali ne kimirongooro kilaama kamatuunda.
Khuula khwenywe khwe biakhulia khukhachiililile, khukhwola likesa lie kimisabibu, ne likesa lie kimisabibu khukhwola biise bie khumiicha. Mukhabe ne buli siindu nisio mwenya khulia, mala mukhamenye mu muleembe mu sibala sienywe.
“Khamuelesie kumuleembe mu sibala sienywe, mala mukone busa ne mukheendekhelele omundu yesi yesi tawe. Ndarusiao mu sibala sienywe chisaang'i che mundaa chindafu, ne liie se likhabemo lundi tawe.
Mukhatimianie basiku benywe, ne khubeerera mwiie.
Babaandu baraano benywe bakhatimanie basiku emia ndala, ne babaandu benywe emia ndala bakhatimanie basiku chielefu ekhumi.
Ne mukhaule basiku benywe ne khuberera mwiie. Khamubiite chikhabi mala muelesie babaana bakali, mala ndinde endakaano niyo nakhola nanywe.
Mukhabe musilia biakhulia bienywe nibio mwabuunga, mukhabuungulule nio mubuunge biiyaya.
Ekhamenye ne nanywe ne se khamubiile tawe.
Khabe ne nanywe, ne lundi ese khabe Wele wenywe ne enywe mukhabe babaandu base.
Ese ndi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, owamurusia mu sibala sia Misiri, nio mulekhe khuba lundi nasioobi babwe tawe. Namurusiisiekho bunyali bubwamubaakho mala namukholile mukeende ne muli balekhuule.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ne kakhali mwaba ne mu khandekeresia ne khuloonda kamalaka kano tawe,
mwaba ne muloba khuria kamalaka kase ne khukalekelesia, aba mwafunaake endakaano yase ne nanywe.
Khamuelesie kumunaanio kuno: Ndamusiindusia ne literema ne bulwaale bukhaona tawe. Ndamureerera kumurengo kuulamubofusia ne khusasia bulamu bwenywe. Mukhamiiche, ne kakhali se mulanyoolamo sisiindu tawe. Sikila basiku benywe bakhamukhile mala balie nibio mwamiicha.
Ndamufutarira nio mukhilwe ne basiku benywe. Ne abo babamubiila balamwamiia, ne mulaba bari lukali, mala mulatima busa omundu nakhamutimaanie tawe.
“Ne enyuma wa kano koosi mwaba ne musili khukhundia tawe, ndatasa kumunaanio kwenywe khukhwola kamakhabi saba sikila bubwoni bwenywe.
Ndarusiao sileka sienywe siboofu sie khukhwelola, ne ndakhola likulu libe liliomu para nga sichuuma ne sibala sienywe siloma mala siaandalale nga siibia.
Kimilimo kienywe kioosi se kilamukholelakho sioosi tawe. Sikila kamaloba kenywe kalaba ka busa, yakhaba kimirongooro kienywe kie kamatuunda se kilaama tawe.
“Ne mwaba ne muchiililila khukhumbingania ne khuloba khukhundia, lundi aba ndatasa kumunaanio kwenywe khukhwola saba khuloondekhana ne bubwoni bwenywe.
Ndalekhuula chisaang'i che mundaa chindafu khwinywe mala chilera babaana benywe, ne chikhaafu chenywe. Chilamuramia batiiti busa bari nio kimiila kienywe kilaba busa mundu kho tawe.
“Ne mwaba bali, enyuma we siiukuumo sino sioosi, musichiililila khukhundekelesia,
aba sesi ndamuloba mala muelesie kumunaanio khukhwola saba khulwe bubwoni bwenywe.
Khamureerere liie, khulwe khufunaka endakaano yefwe. Ne mwaba ne mwebuusia mu chingoba chenywe khulwe khukhwekhiinga busiku, ndaruma bulwaale bukhaona tawe akari wenywe mala khukhwola mweane khu basiku benywe.
Ne khakhole siakhulia sitambeo. Ne bakhasi ekhumi bakhamutekhelenge biakhulia khwiika lilala. Ne bakhamue biakhulia bienywe mu bikelo. Mukhalie ne se mukheekure tawe.
“Ne mwaba ne mumbiingania ne khulekha khukhumbulila akhaba kano ne kali kario,
Aba mu lirima liase sesi ndamuloba. Ne samwene ndamua kumunaanio kumukali khukhwola kamakhabi saba, khulwe bubwoni bwenywe.
Mukhalie babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Ndasambula abuundu enywe e khusaaya ne khutechula alutare chenywe che biiunya bulayi ne khumwaata kimilaambo kienywe khu bifwaani bienywe bibiafwa khale ebio, lundi ndamubiila.
Khakaluukhasie chingoba chenywe chibe kamakubili, mala sambuule abuundu enywe e khusaaya. Ne lundi ndaloba khung'ayilisia biiunya bulayi bienywe.
Khonakile elala sibala sienywe, mala basiku bakhasingisie bakhauke khusibona.
Khamusalanisie mu bibala bikeni, mala muloondiekho liie. Chingoba chenywe chiicha khutechulwa ne kamaloba kenywe kalaba busa.
Ne muli mu sibala sie basiku, sibala sienywe siikhekhale busa siikharie chindaalo che khukonela.
Nga ne silaba ne sikonela sirio, silakonela khukonela nisio siikhaanyoolangakho mu sabato chenywe nga mwamenyangamo tawe.
“Ne khwinywe ba barama, khabakhole babe bari lukali, ne baulila embeo neucha kamasaafu ne belukha. Bakhelukhe nga nibo balikho batimania mwiie. Ne bakhakwe busa akhaba omusiku ne akhabatimania tawe.
Bakhetuyanekho oli ne belukha liie, akhaba omundu nakhaliio obatimania tawe. Se mukhabekho ne kamaani ke khukhwima ebweeni we basiku benywe tawe.
Mukhafwiile mu sibala sie basiku benywe mala musiikhwe ebweeneyo.
Batiiti khwinywe baakhabe balamu mu sibala sie basiku benywe, mukhanaanisibweyo busa sikila bubwoni bwenywe mwabene ne bubwoni bwe bakuuka benywe.
“Ne kakhali baba ne beyama bubwoni bwabwe, ne bubwoni bwe bakuuka babwe, ne sileka nisio baakholela,
bubwakila nababiila mala nabayila mu sibala sie basiku babwe, ne aaba babaandu be sileka bano ne beboombia mala bafukiilila kumunaanio sikila bubwoni bwabwe,
aba khakhebulile endakaano yase ne Yakobo, ne Isaaka ne Aburahamu, ne lundi kha khebulile sibala.
Ne kakhali bakhaanjukhe kamaloba mala kabe busa mundu mo tawe. Ne khukhwola banyoole kumunaanio sikila bubwoni khulwe khulekelesia kamalaka kase.
Ne kakhaba kario, nga ne basiili bario mu sibala sie basiku babwe, se ndabalekha namwe se ndababiila namwe mbabunisilie elala namwe funake endakaano yase ne nabo tawe. Sikila Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.
Ne kakhali khulwabwe, ndakhebulila endakaano niyo nakhola ne bakuuka babwe nibo narusia mu sibala sia Misiri ebweeni we chikholo chichiindi nio mbe Wele wabwe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Kano kali kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola akari wewe ne Baisiraeli khu sikulu sia Sinai khubirira khu Musa.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu Baisiraeli oli, ‘Ne abao osuubisia khuaana omundu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kumuruungo kuno kukhoya khuaanwa.
Bukusi bwo omundu we siseecha khukhwamila kimiiko kamakhumi kabili khukhwola kamakhumi sita alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi kamakhumi karaano bie fwesa khuloondekhana ne bukusi bwe Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne nali omukhasi alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi kamakhumi kataru bie fwesa.
Ne omundu owamila kimiiko kiraano khukhwola kimiiko kamakhumi kabili alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi kamakhumi kabili ke efwesa, nali owe siseecha, namwe bitonyi likhumi nali owe siikhasi.
Ne omwana omutoro omusoleeli khukhwamila kumwesi mulala khukhwola kimiiko kiraano, alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi bie efwesa biraano, khulwo mwana omutoro omukhaana, khukhwamila kumwesi mulala khukhwola kimiiko kiraano, alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi bie fwesa bitaru.
Ne omundu we siseecha nali khukhwamila kimiiko kamakhumi sita khucha angaaki alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi ekhumi na biraano bie efwesa, ne omuloosi owe kimiiko kamakhumi sita khucha angaaki alaba bukusi bwe bitonyi ekhumi bie fwesa.’ ”
“Ne omundu oweaana nali omutaambi lukali, ne se anyala aruunga bukusi bubwarebwao tawe, alareera omundu oyo khu musaayi mala omusaayi alakhalakakho bukusi khuloondekhana nende nisio omundu oyo anyala khuruunga.
“Sisiaayo nisio babaandu baana nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siianwa nga esio sirio silaba sitakatifu.
Ne omundu oaana akharusiao sisiaayo silayi nisio arobore mala areo sisiindi sibi tawe. Ne aba nakhola ario, bibiaayo bioombi bilaba bitakatifu.
Ne aba naana esaang'i enyaalu ekhafukiililwa nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, esaang'i eyo ekhoya yailwa khu musaayi.
Omusaayi alarao bukusi bwayo khuloondekhana ne bulayi bwayo namwe bubi bwayo. Ne bukusi nibwo omusaayi arao bulaba busa burio.
Aaba omweneyo ne enya khukisikula, akhoya atasekho silala khu biraano sie bukusi bwayo.
“Kaaba bali omundu aana enju yewe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omusaayi arakho bukusi khuloondekhana ne bulayi bwayo namwe bubi bulimo. Ne bukusi nibwo omusaayi arakho, bulaba busa burio.
Ne omundu oaana enju ne enya khukisikula, akhoya aruunge bukusi bwayo mala atasekho sitonyi silala khu biraano sie bukusi bwayo, nio enju eyo ebe eyeewe.
“Omundu aba naana sitonyi sie kamaloba kewe ke kumukabwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bukusi bwasio bularebwakho khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie bumiicho nibwo sibukula. Bilaba bitonyi bie efwesa kamakhumi karaano khulwe chikiilo kamakhumi kabili che eshayiri.
Kaaba bali omundu aana kamaloba mu mwiiko kwe likhebulila, bukusi buliio bulaba busa burio.
Ne kakhali aaba naana kamaloba kewe enyuma we kumwiiko kwe likhebulila, omusaayi alebaasia bukusi nibwo arakho, khuloondekhana ne kimiiko kiramire khukhwola khu Mwiiko kuloondakho kwe likhebulila. Ne bukusi bulekhisibwakho.
Kaaba bali omundu oaana kamaloba enya khukasikula, akhoya aruunge bukusi bwako, mala atasekho sitonyi silala khu biraano sie bukusi obwo ne kamaloba kalaba kakewe lundi.
Ne kakhali aaba ne akhasikula kumukuunda kwewe tawe, namwe nakukusiisie khu mundu okundi, se kusikulwa lundi tawe.
Ne kakhali kumukuunda ne kuaanwa mu ndaalo che likhebulila kumukuunda okwo kukhabe kumutakatifu kukwaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kulaba kwe basaayi.
“Kaaba bali omundu aana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumukuunda nikwo akulile, kukhali kwe kumukabwa tawe,
omusaayi alarakho bukusi bwakwo khuloondekhana ne kimiiko kiramire khukhwola khu Mwiiko kwe likhebulila. Ne omundu oyo akhoya aruunga bukusi khu ndaalo eyo neng'ene, nga sisiindu sili sitakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khu Mwiiko kwe likhebulila, kumukuunda okwo kulakalusibwa omwene omubula wakwo, omubula wakwo khukhwama khu be lisaaye liewe.
“Bukusi bwoosi bularebwao khuloondekhane ne bukusi bubwafukiililwa ne Abuundu Atakatifu.
“Ne omundu akhaana sisiaayo sibele tawe, sikila sili khale sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ebeele ekhaafu namwe likheese sikila bili bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne ekhaafu eyo namwe sisiaayo siaaba ne sili sinyaalu aba alabikula khulwe bukusi bubwareebwao, ne khutasakho silala khu biraano sie bukusi bwayo. Yaba ne bikhasikulwa tawe, binyala biakusibwa khu mundu okundi khulwe bukusi bubwarebwao.
Omundu yesi yesi oaanwa khubunisibwa se anyala asikulwa tawe, akhoya erwe.
Ne aaba omundu ne enya khusikula silala khu khumi siewe, akhoya atasekho silala khu biraano.
Ne buli sitonyi sie likhumi sie chikhaafu ne kamakheese, biili asi wo mwayi, silaba sitakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwene biaayo akharoboramo bilayi namwe biibi tawe. Namwe akhakaluukhasia akobosiao sisiindi tawe. Ne aakhola ario, aba bibiaayo bioombi bilaba bitakatifu. Ne aba se bilasikulwa tawe.
“Kano kali kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Musa khu sikulu sia Sinai khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli.”

“Bala babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi, khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe. Babale khuloondekhana ne bukali bwabwe, buli owe siseecha, mulala sia mulala.
Bala buli owe siseecha owe bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili namwe khukhilakhoo. Bala boosi mu Isiraeli banyala bacha mwiie, ewe ne Aruni, sipupu ne sipupu.
Reeba omwimeelesi owa buli luuya khukhwama buli mu kholo akhuyeete.
Kano niko kamasina ke babaandu bakhakhuyeete. Khukhwama mu kholo eya Rubeni, Elisuri okhwa Sheteuri.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Simioni, Shelumieli okhwa Surisiatai.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, Nasioni okhwa Aminatabu.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Isakari, Netaneli okhwa Suari.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Sebuluni, Eliabu okhwa Heloni.
Khukhwama mu baana ba Yosefu, mu kholo eya Efuraimu, Elisiama okhwa Amihudi, ne khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase, Kamalieli okhwa Petausuri.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini, Abitani okhwa Gidioni.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani, Aieseri okhwa Amisiatai.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Asieri, Pakieli okhwa Okirani.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Kati, Eliasafu okhwa Teueli.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Nafutali, Aira okhwa Enani.”
Bano nibo babaroborwa khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli. Baba babemeelesi be chikholo chabwe lundi babemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli.
Musa ne Aruni, babukula babaandu babaroborwa bano.
Mala khu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kukhola khabili, babuusia babaandu boosi, ba andika kamasina kabwe khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju. Kamasina ke babaandu be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili namwe khukhilakhoo, baandikwa, mulala sia mulala.
Musa akhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka. Abalila babaandu mu sichiimi sia Sinai.
Ekholo eya Rubeni, omubele owa Yakobo babalwa. Be siseecha boosi, babanyala khucha liie mala ba baba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo babalwa. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babaandu be ekholo eya Rubeni baba chielefu arubaine na sita ne chimia chiraano.
Ekholo eya Simioni babalwa. Babaandu boosi be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo, abo ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa mulala sia mulala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Simioni yaba chielefu khamusini na tisa ne chimia chitaru.
Ekholo eya Kati ebalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakho, ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa mulala sia mulala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Kati yoosi yaba chielefu arubaine natano ne chimia sita ne kamakhumi karaano.
Ekholo eya Yuda babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo, ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa mulala sia mulala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Yuda boosi baba chielefu sabini naine ne chimia sita.
Ekholo eya Isakari babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo, lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa mulala sia mulala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Isakari baba babaandu chielefu khamusini naine ne chimia chine.
Ekholo eya Sebuluni babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi babanyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa mulala sia mulala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babaandu be kholo eya Sebuluni baba chielefu khamusini na saba ne chimia chine.
Ekholo eya Yosefu, be luuya lwa Efuraimu, babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo, ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Efuraimu baba babaandu chielefu arubaine ne chimia chiraano.
Ekholo eya Manase babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Manase baba babaandu chielefu salasini na mbili ne chimia chibili.
Ekholo eya Benjamini babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Benjamini baba babaandu chielefu salasini natano ne chimia chine.
Ekholo eya Dani babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Dani baba babaandu chielefu sitini nambili ne chimia saba.
Ekholo eya Asieri babalwa. Babalwa be siseecha boosi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakho, lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Ekholo eya Asiera baba babaandu chielefu arubaine namocha ne chimia chiraano.
Babaandu be ekholo eya Nafutali babalwa. Babalwa boosi be siseecha ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi ba baaba banyala khucha mwiie. Babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
