Ekholo eya Nafutali baba babaandu chielefu khamusini natatu ne chimia chine.
Bano nibo ba babalwa ne Musa ne Aruni ne bayeetwa ne babemeelesi be Baisiraeli ekhumi na babili, buli mulala khukhwama mu kholo yewe.
Babaandu boosi babalwa. Babalwa boosi be siseecha ba baba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakhoo lundi ba baaba ne banyala khucha mwiie mu Isiraeli.
Boosi baba chielefu chimia sita na chitaru, ne chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi karaano.
Ne kakhali Balawi se babalwa alala ne chikholo chichiindi tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Okhabala ekholo eya Lawi tawe.
Ne kakhali, bare mu bwimeelesi bwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne bibiindu bilimo bioosi. Balisuta liiema lino ne bibiindu bialio bioosi. Balikhola ekambi yabwe ebotookhelele liiema lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala baliliinde.
Buli lwosi ne muuya liiema, Balawi balilitikulula. Ne lundi buli lwosi nga liiema ne lienyekhana liombakhwe, Balawi nibo baliliombakha. Ne omundu okundi yesi yesi ne eseenda siimbi aliirwa.
Baisiraeli balikhola chikambi chabwe mu bipupu. Buli mundu mu sipupu siewe asi we pendera yabwe.
Ne kakhali Balawi bakhakhole ekambi ebotookhelele liiema lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu liliinda, nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekhe khuaambila Baisiraeli lirima.”
Khwako Baisiraeli bakhola bario. Bakhola koosi khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Babaandu ba Isiraeli balakhola ekambi, buli mundu asi we pendera yabwe, ne bimanyisio bie luuya lwabwe. Balakhola chikambi chiloleelele liiema lie kumuse buli lubeka.
Bakhola ekambi lubeka lwe bukwe, niio enyanga esoela, balaba be ekambi ne pendera eye kholo eya Yuda. Omwimeelesi wabwe alaba Nasioni okhwa Aminatabu.
Ne bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu sabini naine ne chimia sita.
Bakhola ekambi yabwe siimbi ne nabo balaba ekholo eya Isakari. Omwimeelesi wabwe alaba Netaneli okhwa Suari.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu khamusini naine ne chimia chine.
Ne ekambi eye ekholo eya Sebuluni elaloondakho. Omwimeelesi wabwe alaba, Eliabu okhwa Heloni.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu khamusini na saba ne chimia chine.
Bukali bwe babaandu boosi be kambi eya Yuda, mu bipupu biabwe, baba chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane na sita, ne chimia chine. Be kambi eya Yuda yino nibo bacha khunyoa khurekukha mu lukeendo.
Bakhola ekambi lubeka lwe bunafubo, bali asi we pendera eye kholo eya Rubeni. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Elisuri okhwa Sheteuri.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe nga ne babalwa bwaba babaandu chielefu arubaine na sita ne chimia chiraano.
Ne babakhola ekambi embi ne nabo bali ekholo eya Simioni. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Shelumieli okhwa Surisiatai.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu khamusini na tisa ne chimia chitaru.
Ekambi eyaloondakho yaba eye ekholo eya Kati. Ne omwimeelesi wabwe ali Eliasafu okhwa Reueli.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu arubaine na chiraano ne chimia sita ne kamakhumi karaano.”
Bukali bwe kambi yoosi eya Rubeni, mu bipupu biabwe, buli chielefu miamoja khamusini na moja ne chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano. Be kambi eya Rubeni yino bacha khuba be khabili mu khurakikha lukeendo.
Balawi ne barura ne liiema lie kumuse, balikeendela akari we chikambi chichiindi. Chikholo chilirura bulayi bwene nga chamenya mu kambi, buli ebira asi we pendera yayo.
Bipupu bie ekholo eye Efuraimu biliba lubeka lwe mumbo asi we pendera yabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Elisiama okhwa Amihudi.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu arubaine ne chimia chiraano.
Ne baloondakho balaba ekholo eya Manase. Omwimeelesi wabwe alaba Kamalieli okhwa Petausuri.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu salasini na mbili ne chimia chibili.
Ne eloondakho eli ekholo eya Benjamini. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Abitani okhwa Gidioni.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu salasini na chiraano ne chimia chine.
Bukali bwe babaandu boosi ba Efuraimu, mu kambi chabwe, baba chielefu emia ndala na munaane, ne mia ndala. Be kambi eye ekholo eya Efuraimu nibo bacha khuba be khataru mu khurakikha lukeendo.
Bipupu bie ekholo eya Dani biliba lubeka lwe ebunaswa asi we pendera yabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Ahieseri okhwa Amisiatai.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu sitini na mbili ne chimia saba.
Baloondakho bacha khuba ekholo eya Asieri. Omwimeelesi wabwe ali Pakieli okhwa Okirani.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu arubaine na moja ne chimia chiraano.
Ne eyaloondakho yaba ekholo eya Nafutali. Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Ahira okhwa Enani.
Bukali bwe babaandu bewe bwaba chielefu khamusini na tatu ne chimia chine.
Babaandu boosi babalwa mu kambi eya Dani baba chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano ne saba, ne chimia sita. Sipupu sie babaandu ba Dani Sicha khuba simaliilisi mu khurura mu kambi asi we pendera yabwe.
Bano bali babaandu ba Isiraeli ba baabalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya lwabwe. Boosi mu kambi ba babalwa khuloondekhana ne bipupu biabwe baba chielefu chimia sita ne chitaru ne chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi karaano.
Ne kakhali Balawi se babalilwa mu baandu ba Isiraeli tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi beele alaka Musa ario.
Baisiraeli bakhola bario. Khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa, bakhola chikambi asi we chipendera chabwe. Nio barakikha lukeendo bario buli mundu mu be nju yewe khuloondekhana ne luuya lwewe.

Bano bali be nju eya Aruni nende be nju eya Musa mu sise nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Musa khu sikulu sia Sinai.
Kano kali kamasina ke basoleeli ba Aruni: Natabu aba omubele, ne Abiiu, Eliesa ne Itamari.
Abo nibo basoleeli ba Aruni, ba bachukhwakho kamafura khuba basaayi. Aruni abarobora khukhola kimilimo kie busaayi.
Ne kakhali Natabu ne Abiiu beerwa sikila babwanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumulilo kukhenyekhana tawe, mu sichiimi sia Sinai. Ne se babakho ne babaana tawe. Nio Eliesa ne Itamari bakhola kimilimo kie busaayi mu bulamu bwa paapa wabwe Aruni.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Reera ekholo eya Lawi siimbi mala obare ebweeni wo musaayi Aruni nio bamuyeete.
Bacha khuyeeta Aruni ne libuusiana lioosi, a liiema lie kumuse. Balikhola kimilimo mwiiema litakatifu.
Bacha khuliinda bibiindu bioosi biili mu liiema lie kumuse, ne khukhola kimilimo kioosi khulwe Baisiraeli a liiema litakatifu.
Elesia Balawi khu Aruni ne babaana bewe. Baebwa elala khu Aruni khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Lundi orobore Aruni ne basoleeli bewe, khukhola kimilimo kie busaayi. Ne kakhali kaaba bali omundu yesi yesi eecha siimbi abiindu bitakatifu aleerwa.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Lola nabukuule Balawi khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli. Nababukuule mu bweyaangu bwa buli mubele khukhwama mu Baisiraeli. Balawi bacha khuba babaase.
Sikila babeele boosi babaase. Khu ndaalo niyo neera babele boosi mu sibala sia Misiri, neyaulila babele boosi, bo mundu ne esaang'i. Baliba babaase, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa mu sichiimi sia Sinai ali,
“Bala Balawi khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe. Bala buli mwana owe siseecha owe bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala namwe khukhilakhoo.”
Nio Musa aria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala abala babaandu.
Ne bano nibo basoleeli ba Lawi. Kerishoni, Koati ne Merari.
Ne bano nibo basoleeli ba Kerishoni khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe: Libini ne Shimei.
Basoleeli ba Kohati khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe, baba: Amuramu, Ishihari, Heburoni ne Usieli.
Ne basoleeli ba Merari khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba, Maila ne Musihi. Abo nibo ba baba chinju che Balawi khuloondekhana luuya lwabwe.
Chinju cha Libini ne Shimei chaama khu luuya lwa Kerishoni.
Bukali bwabwe khuloondekhana ne babaana be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala namwe khukhilakhoo, baba chielefu saba ne chimia chiraano.
Luya lwa Kerishoni lwakhola ekambi eyabwe enyuma we liiema litakatifu, lubeka lwe mumbo.
Eliasafu okhwa Laeli aba omwimeelesi wabwe.
Bakerisioni baliindanga liiema litakatifu, liiema lie kumuse ne sifuunikho sialio, epasia eye kumuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse,
ne chimbata che luuya, epasia eye kumuliango kwe luuya lulwabotookhelela liiema litakatifu ne alutare, ne kimikoye kiayo. Lundi bakhola kimilimo kioosi khuloondekhana ne bibiindu bino.
Chinju che Baamuramu, Baasiari, Baeburoni, ne Bausieli chaama mu kholo eya Koati.
Bukali bwe babaana be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala namwe khukhilakhoo baba chielefu munaane ne chimia sita. Bakholanga kimilimo kie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ekholo yino yakhola ekambi eyayo lubeka lwe bunafubo we liiema litakatifu.
Elisafani okhwa Usieli aba omwimeelesi owe nju eye Bakoati.
Kumulimo kwabwe kwaba khuliinda lisanduku lie ndakaano, emesa, siteetwe, chialutare, bibiindu bie abuundu atakatifu, nibio basaayi bakholelangakho kimilimo, epasia ne kimilimo kioosi khuloondekhana ne bibiindu ebio.
Eliesa okhwa Aruni omusaayi, aba omwimeelesi owe babemeelesi be Balawi. Lundi emeelelanga abo ba bakholanga kimilimo Abuundu Atakatifu.
Chinju che Bamaili ne Bamusiihi chama mu luuya lwa Merari.
Bukali bwe babaana be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala namwe khukhilakhoo baba chielefu sita ne chimia chibili.
Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Surieli okhwa Abihaili. Bakhola ekambi lubeka lwe bunaswa we liiema litakatifu.
Kimilimo kiabwe kiaaba khuliinda biteechi bie liiema litakatifu, kimitalaachi, chinjeko, chinguulo, ne bibiindu bialio bioosi, ne kimilimo kioosi khuloondekhana ne bibiindu bino.
Lundi baba ne kimilimo kie khuliinda chinjeko chichabotookhelela, bibale, bisiindi ne kimikoye.
Ne abo babakhola chikambi ebweeni we liiema litakatifu lubeka lwe bukwe, ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse lubeka nilwo enyanga esoelanga, baba Musa ne Aruni ne babaana bewe. Bemeelelanga kimilimo kikiekholekha abuundu atakatifu, siosi siosi sisienyekhana khukholwa khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli. Ne omundu okundi yesi yesi owecha siimbi Abuundu Atakatifu enyekhana eerwe.
Musa ne Aruni babala Balawi khuloondehana ne chinju chabwe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka. Boosi baba chielefu ishirini na mbili. Ba babalwa baba be kumwesi mulala ne khukhilakhoo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Bala babaana be siseecha babele boosi ba Isiraeli khukhwamila kumwesi mulala khuchiililila. Babale khulwe khubukula kamasina kabwe.
Mbukulile Balawi sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bweyaangu bwe babele mu baandu ba Isiraeli ne chikhaafu che Balawi mu bweyaangu bwe chimoosi che babaandu ba Isiraeli.”
Nio Musa aabala babele mu baandu ba Isiraeli nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Ne babaana be sisoleeli babele, khukhwama bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala ne khuchiililila baba chielefu ishirini na mbili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi saba na bataru.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Bukula Balawi mu bweyaangu bwe babele mu Baisiraeli ne chikhaafu chabwe mu bweyaangu bwe che Baisiraeli. Balawi bali babaase: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mu Isiraeli balimo babaana babele chimia chibili ne kamakhumi saba na bataru khukhila Balawi. Khusikula bano,
bukula bitonyi biraano bie e Shekeli khu buli mulala. Loonda sikelo sie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Elesia Aruni ne babaana bewe chirupia che khusikula Baisiraeli chimia chibili ne kamakhumi saba na bataru bano.”
Musa abukula chirupia che khusikula Baisiraeli nibo Balawi bakhanyala khubukula bubweyaangu bwabwe tawe.
Khukhwama khu buli omubele owa Isiraeli, Musa aabukula chishekeli eelefu ndala ne chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi sita na chiraano. Chakelwa khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Musa aelesia chirupia che khusikula khu Aruni ne babaana bewe khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Bala luuya lwe Balawi Bakoati khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Bala abo boosi be siseecha be bukhulu bwe kimiiko akari we kamakhumi kataru ne kamakhumi karaano, banyala bakhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Kimilimo kie Bakoati kiaba khu biindu bitakatifu mu liiema lie kumuse.
“Baisiraeli ne balikho barekukha, Aruni ne babaana bewe bacha khukhwingila mwiiema lie kumuse khukangulula e pasia ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano, mala bakifuunikhile lisanduku.
Khu ngaaki khwalio bakhareekho lisieelo lie mbusi mala babimbekho engubo embuusi, mala bareekho kimisaala kie khusuta.
“Ne khu mesa eye kumukaati kwe khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babimbekho engubo embuusi mala bareekho chisaani, bibuumba bie khukhwoseliakho bupani, chipwakuli, ne chisoongo che khuanilamo siianwa sie khunywa. Buli lwosi kumukaati kukhoya kwaba khu mesa.
Lundi bakhabimbekho engubo embesemu khwoosi. Ne khu ngaaki bakhabimbekho lisieelo lie mbusi mala barekho chinguulo che khusuta.
Ne bakhabukule ngubo embuusi mala babiimbe khu siteetwe sie taa, ne chitaa chasio, bibioso, chibeseni, ne bibiindu bibiikha kamafura bioosi.
Bakhaboe bibiindu bioosi mu lisieelo lie mbusi mala bare khu mitalaachi kie khusutilakho.
“Lundi bakhabiimbe ngubo embuusi khu alutare eye sahabu mala bafuunikhekho lisieelo lie mbusi mala bareekho chinguulo che khusuta.
Bakhabukule bibiindu bioosi birumikha Abuundu Atakatifu, babiboe mu ngubo embuusi mala babifunikhekho lisieelo lie embusi ne khubira khu mitalaachi kie khusutilakho.
Bakharusieo likokhe khu alutare mala babimbekho engubo enapeenda.
Khu alutare bakhareekho bibiindu bioosi birumikhwa khu milimo alutare: bifuria, chiuma, bipakuo, ne chibeseni ne bibiindu bioosi bie khu alutare. Lundi bakhareekho lisieelo lie mbusi ne khuraamo kimitalaachi kie khusuta.
Aruni ne babaana bewe bakhabimbe bario liiema litakatifu ne bibiindu bialio bioosi. Ne bamalile, nga Baisiraeli ne barekukha khukhwama mu kambi, babaana be luuya lwa Koati bakhasute liiema litakatifu. Ne kakhali bakhatiila khu biindu bitakatifu tawe, busa bakhola bario bafwa. Bino nibio bibiindu bie liiema lie kumuse nibio basoleeli be luuya lwa Koati bakhasute.
“Ne Eliesa okhwa Aruni omusaayi, acha khuebwa kimilimo kwe khuliinda liiema lioosi nende bioosi bilimo, abuundu atakatifu ne bibiindu biliio. Acha khuliinda kamafura, bupani, siianwa sie khuchiilila sie siakhulia, ne kamafura ke khuchukha khu baandu khulwe kumulimo khu Wele.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Okhalekha Bakoati
babuna khukhwama mu Balawi khulwe khukhwicha siimbi ne bibiindu bitakatifu tawe. Nio bakhabuna tawe, Aruni ne babaana bewe bakhache mukari mala ba bakabe buli mundu kumulimo nikwo anyala aakhola.
Ne kakhali bakhengila mwiiema mala balola bibiindu bitakatifu, khwakhaba khu siise sitiiti tawe sikila bakhola bario bafwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Bala luuya lwa Kerishoni khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Bala buli mundu owe bukhulu bwe akari we kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kamakhumi karaano, onyala aakhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Kimilimo kiabwe kicha khuba kino.
Khusuta chipasia che liiema, liiema ne sifuunikho sialio ne lisieelo lie mbusi lili khu ngaaki khwalwo ne pasia eye liiema lie kumuse.
Bacha khusuta akhaba kimikoye kikiabotookhelela luuya lwe liiema, ne pasia eye kumuliango kwe luuya ne alutare ne bichaangi biayo ne bibiindu bioosi bie kimilimo kiabwe. Bakhakhole koosi niko benyekha bakhole.
Kimilimo kioosi kie luuya lwa Kerishoni kilaba asi owa Aruni ne babaana bewe. Alabekesia bioosi nibio benyekhana bakhole ne khusuta.
Ekio nikio kimilimo kie luuya lwa Kerishoni mwiiema lie kumuse. Bacha khuba asi we bubwimeelesi bwa Itamari okhwa Aruni omusaayi.”
Bala luuya lwa Merari khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Bala boosi be bukhulu bwe akari we kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kamakhumi karaano, banyala bakhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Kino nikio kimilimo kiabwe nikio benyekha khukhola mwiiema lie kumuse. Khusuta chimbao che liiema ne bichuuma biacho ne chinguulo chalio, ne bibale bie liiema.
Lundi bakhasute chinjeko che luuya, bisiindi bialio, ne kimikoye ne bibiindu biloondekhana ne nalio bioosi. Lundi okhekesie buli mundu nisio akhoyeele asute.
Ekio nikio kimilimo kie luuya lwa Merari lucha khukhola mwiiema lie kumuse. Bacha khukhwimeelelwa ne Itamari okhwa Aruni omusaayi.
Musa ne Aruni ne babemeelesi be libuusiana babala luuya lwa Koati. Ba babala khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babala abo ba baaba ne bukhulu khukhwamila kimiiko kamakhumi kataru khukhwola kamakhumi karaano babanyala khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Ne boosi ba babalwa boola chielefu chibili ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi karaano.
Abo nibo ba babalwa mu luuya lwa Koati. Boosi bakhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse. Musa ne Aruni ba babala khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu Musa.
Luya lwa Kerishoni lwabalwa, khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babalwa khukhwamila bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru khukhwola karaano; buli mundu owanyala khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Boosi baba chielefu chibili ne chimia sita ne kamakhumi kataru.
Abo nibo ba baaba be luuya lwa Kerishoni, ba bakhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse. Musa ne Aruni ba babala khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu be luuya lwa Merari babalwa khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babalwa khukhwamila bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru khukhwola khu miiko kamakhumi karaano, buli mundu owanyala khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Bukali bwabwe bwaba babaandu chielefu chitaru ne chimia chibili.
Abo nibo ba baaba be luuya lwa Merari nibo Musa ne Aruni babala khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Musa ne Aruni ne babemeelesi ba Isiraeli babala Balawi boosi khuloondekhana ne luuya ne chinju chabwe.
Babala babaandu khukhwamila khu kimiiko kamakhumi kataru khukhwola karaano buli mundu owanyala khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse ne khusuta bibiindu.
Abo ba babalwa boosi baba chielefu munaane ne chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi munaane.
Khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu Musa, buli mundu aebwa kumulimo nikwo enyekha akhole namwe asute. Khwako babalwa ne Musa nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Laka babaandu ba Isiraeli barusie mu kambi omundu yesi yesi oli ne bulwaale bwe kamakele, bulwaale bwe khurura kamayila nende nabo bali banyaalu khulwe khutiila khu mufu.
Mubarusie boosi baseecha ne bakhasi enje we kambi eye babaandu, nio balekhe khunyaalutia ekambi niyo bamenyilemo.”
Baisiraeli bakhola bario mala ba barusia enje we kambi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
“Boolela Baisiraeli oli, omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi ne akholela owasie kamabi, aba se ali omweyikinwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Omundu oyo aba akholile libi.
Omundu akhoyeele eyame bubwoni bwewe nibwo aakholile mala aruunge kumuruungo kwoosi khulwe bubwoni bwewe. Alala ne khutasakho kumuruungo kukwola sitonyi silala khu biraano sie kumuruungo khu mundu niye akholeele bubi.
Omundu oyo aba ne afwa mala se ali ne omulebe niye banyala baruunga tawe, kumuruungo okwo bakuelesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwo musaayi. Khu muruungo okwo akhoyeele arusie limiiku khulwe khurusiao bubi bwewe.
Ne buli siianwa ne bibiindu bitakatifu bioosi nibio Baisiraeli bareera khu musaayi, biliba bio musaayi.
Siianwa sitakatifu nende siosi siosi siianwa khu musaayi, Sicha khuba sio musaayi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Baisiraeli oli omukhasi wo mundu anyala alekha khuba omweyikinwa
khulwe khuba ne omundu okundi. Bumayaanu bwewe se bunyala bwamanyikhana khu museecha wewe tawe. Wakana omundu yesi yesi se amubona tawe ne se bamutiila tawe.
Ne kakhali omuseecha wewe amubonela bubi mala amwibaasilia ali aaba no mundu, omukhasi wewe oyo akhaba ne aaba no mundu okundi namwe tawe,
omundu oyo aayila omukhasi wewe khu musaayi. Lundi akhareere siianwa sisienyekhana khu mukhasi wewe. Siianwa sino siliba bufu bwe shayiri butiiti buri mu siikula. Se akhabureemo kamafura ne bupani tawe. Sikila sili siianwa sie biakhulia sie khubona bubi, lundi siianwa sie biakhulia sie likhebulila, siikhebusia bumayaanu.
Omusaayi akhareere omukhasi oyo mala amwimikhe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne omusaayi akhabukule kameechi kamatakatifu mu sibuumba mala abukule lipukhuulu khukhwama asi we liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala alire mu meechi.
Nio omusaayi akhemie omukhasi oyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala amukangulule lichuune. Ne akhare siianwa sie siakhulia sie likhebulila siili lundi siianwa sie khubona bubi mu makhono ko mukhasi oyo. Ne omusaayi akhabe ne kameechi kamalulu kareera silaamo.
Nio omusaayi amwichubie ali, ‘Kaaba bali se wabelekho no mundu okundi yesi yesi tawe, ne lundi se wakholilekho bumayaanu bwosi bwosi tawe, nga waba mu bunyali bwo museecha wowo, se olanyoola silaamo sireerwa ne kameechi kamalulu kano tawe.
Ne waaba ne wabele no mundu okhali omuseecha wowo tawe ne oli mu bunyali bwo omuseecha wowo,
(lekha omusaayi akhole omukhasi oyo alome liliechuba lie silaamo, mala amuboleele ali) babaandu bakhuchube ne khu khuloba. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhole enda yowo ebiimbe lundi akhakhukhole obe omukuumba.
Ne kameechi kano kareera silaamo kakhoya kabira munda mwowo mala kakhole kumubili kwowo kubiimbe, lundi obe omukuumba.’ Ne omukhasi akhalome ali, ‘Amina, Amina.’
“Omusaayi akhaandike bilaamo bino mu sitabu ne khusiinga kamakhuwa ke bilaamo mu meechi ke bululu.
Omusaayi akhanywesie omukhasi oyo kameechi ke bululu kareera silaamo ne kameechi ako kakhakhole omukhasi achuunwe lukali.
Omusaayi akhabukule siianwa sie biakhulia sie khubona bubi khukhwama mu makhono ko mukhasi, asibisie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala asire khu alutare.
Nio musaayi afumbare efuusi ndala eye siianwa nga eye likhebulila mala asiosiele khu alutare. Ekhumaliilikha, amunywesie kameechi.
Aaba ne aba omundu, mala anywa kameechi ke khureera silaamo, kameechi ako kakhengile munda mala kamureerere buchuuni bukali. Enda yewe ekhabiimbe, lundi acha khuba omukuumba. Babaandu bewe bakhamulobe.
Ne kakhali aaba ne akhabakho no mundu tawe, akhabe omulekhuule khu silaamo sino ne alisaala babaana.
“Lino nilio lilaka lie chikesi che khubona bubi. Ne kakhabe kario khu mukhasi ooli asi we bunyali bwo museecha wewe ne efwolobia.
Namwe likhekholekhe lirio aaba bali omundu abonela omukhasi wewe bubi. Omusaayi akhemie omukhasi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala akhole koosi khu niye khuloondekhana ne lilaka lino.
Omuseecha se akhabe ne bumayaanu tawe ne kakhali omukhasi niye okhasute bumayaanu bwewe omwene.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli omundu yesi yesi owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi ne echuba, khuba Omunadhiri, nio eyaule Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
akhoyela eyaule khukhwama mu khunywa endali ne kamalwa. Se akhoyeele anywakho enduruuchi khukhwama mu ndali namwe khu malwa tawe. Ne akhaliakho kimisabibu kimibisi namwe kimiomu tawe.
Siise sioosi sie bunadhiri, akhaliakho sisiindu siosi siosi sisiama mu ndali eye kumusabibu tawe, chakhaba chimiicho namwe kamoola kakhwo tawe.
“Chindaalo choosi che sisiechubo sie bunadhiri, se akhoyeele abeka lichuune liewe tawe. Aliba omutakatifu mu biise bioosi nibio eyauule khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Alilekha lichuune liewe lilee.
Mu ndaalo choosi nicho eyaula khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se akhesendekho siimbi ne omufu tawe.
Akhaba raraawe namwe maawe namwe wandaaye omusoleeli namwe omukhaana ne afwa tawe, akhenyaalutia khulwe khubachao siimbi tawe. Sikila sifuno sie khukhwiyaula khwewe khu Wele sili khu murwe khwewe.
Mu ndaalo choosi che khukhwiyaula khwewe, ali omutakatifu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kaaba bali omundu amufwilao lifwa lia matundubiikha, aba anyaalutisia kumurwe kwo omunadhiri kumwaule. Omunadhiri oyo akhoya aabeka kumurwe kwewe khu ndaalo ekhola saba eye khukhwikwalaasia.
Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane akhareere kamauusi kabili ke mundaa namwe kamaana kabili ke kamauusi kamabaya khu musaayi, muliaango mwe liiema lie kumuse.
Omusaayi acha khuaana liuusi lilala khulwe siianwa sie bubwoni, ne likhola khabili khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia. Akhakhole ario nio arusieo bubwoni bwo omunadhiri owakhola bumayaanu khulwo mufu. Nio akhaule kumurwe kwewe lundi khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omunadhiri akhoya eyaule lundi Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu ndaalo chewe che khukhwiyaula. Akhareere limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala nga siianwa sie kamakhiikha. Ne biise bie nyuma se bikhabalwe tawe sikila khukhwiyaula khwewe khwanyaalutisibwa.
mala aane siianwa siewe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siliba, limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala likhalimo libi tawe khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia, limeeme likhasi lie kumwiiko mulala likhalimo libi tawe khulwe siianwa sie bubwoni, ne limiiku lilala likhalimo libi tawe khulwe siianwa sie kumuleembe.
Lundi alirusia endubi ndala eye kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, chikeki che bufu bunosie chichakholwa ne kamafura ke chiseituni ne chipisikuuti chikhakholwa ne kamafura ke chiseituni, alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne biianwa bie ndali.
Omusaayi acha khuaana bioosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khuaana siianwa sie bubwoni nende sie khukhwosia.
Lundi acha khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi limiiku nga embosio eye siianwa sie kumuleembe ne kimikaati endubi ndala kikhalimo limela tawe. Lundi omusaayi acha khuaana siianwa sie siakhulia nende sie ndali.
Nio munadhiri abeke kumurwe kwewe kumwaule a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse. Ne lundi akhabukule lichuune lino alimwaate mu mulilo kukwosia siianwa sie kumuleembe.
“Nio musaayi abukule enyama eye siambele eye limiiku ne likho etutuba nende ekeeki ndala ekhalimo limela tawe khukhwama mu ndubi nende episikuuti mala abire mu makhono ko munadhiri. Omusaayi akhakhole ario, omunadhiri ne amalile khubeka lichuune liewe.
Omusaayi akhasiaane ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa sie khusuta khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siianwa sino sicha khuba sio musaayi alala ne sitindimilo nisio asuta ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nende sietakho siaanilwe. Enyuma wako Omunadhiri anyala anywa endali.
“Elio nilio lilaka khu munadhiri okhola sisiechubo. Siianwa siewe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siliba khuloondekhana ne sisiechubo siewe nga omunadhiri, khutasa khu siindi siosi siosi nisio anyala aana. Enyekhana olisie sisiechubo siewe khuloondekhana ne lilaka lie bunadhiri nga nilwo echuba.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Aruni ne babaana bewe oli mulibiita babaandu ba Isiraeli ne kamakhuwa kano,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubiite chikhabi lundi amuliinde enywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abe omulayi lundi owe kumwalaalo khwinywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuliinde ne khumuelesia enywe kumuleembe.
Nga basaayi ne bakhalomalome kamakhuwa kano, ese khakarumikhire khubiita babaandu ba Isiraeli chikhabi.”

Khu ndaalo niio Musa amala khusimikha liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aalichukhakho kamafura mala aalielesia alala ne bibiindu bialio bioosi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aachukha lundi kamafura khu alutare ne khukiaana ne bibiindu biayo bioosi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babemeelesi ba Isiraeli; babemeelela chinju che bakuuka babwe, ne babemeelesi be chikholo chabwe babemeelela babaandu ba babalwa becha siimbi.
Bareera ne khuaana biianwa biabwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kamakaari sita ne chieeyi ekhumi ne chibili. Bareera likaari lilala khu buli bemeelesi babili ne eeyi ndala khu buli mwimeelesi mulala. Babiaana ebweeni we liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Yakaanila biianwa bino khulwe burumikhi bwe kimilimo kie mwiiema lie kumuse, mala obieelesie Balawi khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kia buli sia mulala.”
Khwako Musa aabukula kamakaari ne chieeyi aelesia Balawi.
Aelesia be luuya lwa Kerishoni kamakaari kabili ne chieeyi chine khuloondekhana ne kumulimo kwabwe.
Ne ba Merari abaelesia kamakaari kane ne chieeyi munaane khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiabwe. Baba asi we bubwimeelesi bwa Itamari okhwa Aruni omusaayi.
Ne kakhali Musa se akabakho be luuya lwa Koati kamakaari namwe chieeyi tawe, sikila kimilimo kiabwe kiaba khuliinda bibiindu bitakatifu, bibienyekhana bisutwe khu mabeka kabwe.
Babemeelesi baana biianwa khulwe khukhwaula alutare khu ndaalo niyo yachukhwakho kamafura. Babemeelesi baana biianwa biabwe khu alutare.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Baboolele oli buli mwimeelesi acha khuaana siianwa siewe buli khu ndaalo khulwe khukhwaula alutare.”
Nasioni okhwa Aminatabu niye owanyoa khuaana siianwa siewe khu ndaalo enyoa khulwe ekholo yewe eya Yuda.
Siianwa siewe siaba esaani ndala eye fwesa. Busiro bwayo bwaba chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, e beseni ndala eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Busiro buno bwakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie eshekeli eye Abuundu Atakatifu. Buli siindu siechusibwakho bufu bunosie bubwatubaanisibwamo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie siakhulia.
Aana lundi sibuumba sie esahabu eli ne busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi, sisiaba ne sichuule bupani.
Lundi aana euunwa enjoka, limiiku, limeeme lilala lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, khuba siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Aana ne endurume khulwe siianwa sie bumayaanu.
Ne khulwe siianwa sie kumuleembe aana chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke kumwiiko mulala karaano. Esio siaba siianwa sia Nasioni okhwa Aminatabu.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khabili, Netaneli okhwa Suari omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Isakari, aana siianwa siewe.
Aana esaani ndala eye fwesa. Busiro bwayo bwaba chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru. Lundi aana lulweelo lwe fwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Abiaana khuloondekhana ne bikelo bie abuundu atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechulakho bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi aana sibuumba sie esahabu. Busiro bwasio bwaba chishekeli likhumi lundi siaba siechulakho bupani.
Aana euunwa enjoka, limiiku, ne limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Aana ne ndurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi aana chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano, ne kamameeme karaano ke kumwiiko mulala khulwe embosio eye siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Netaneli okhwa Suari.
Khu ndaalo eya khataru, Eliabu okhwa Heloni omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Sebuluni areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiaba ne sichuusibwekho bupani.
Eliabu areera lundi euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Areera ne endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano. Sino siaba siianwa sia Eliabu okhwa Heloni.
Khu ndaalo eya khane, Elisuri okhwa Sheteuri, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Rubeni areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie bubwatubanisibwamo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiaba ne sichuulemo bupani.
Elisuri areera ne euunwa embangaachi, limiiku ne limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi areera endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Elisuri okhwa Sheteuri.
Khu ndaalo eya kharaano, Shelumieli okhwa Surisiatai, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Simioni areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, eyaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Shelumieli areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino sisiaba siianwa sia Shelumieli okhwa Surisiatai.
Khu ndaalo eya sita, Eliasafu okhwa Teueli, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Kati areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisichuulekho bupani.
Eliasafu areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino sisiaba siianwa sia Eliasafu okhwa Teueli.
Khu ndaalo eya saba, Elisiama okhwa Amihudi, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Efuraimu, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, eyaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Elishama areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino sisiaba siianwa sia Elisiama okhwa Amihudi.
Khu ndaalo eya munane, Kamalieli okhwa Petausuri, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Manase, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Kamalieli areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Kamalieli okhwa Petausuri.
Khu ndaalo eya tisa, Abitani okhwa Gidioni, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Benjamini, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Abitani areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Abitani okhwa Gidioni.
Khu ndaalo eye ekhumi, Aieseri okhwa Amisiatai, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Dani, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Ahieseri areera euunwa embangaachi, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Ahieseri okhwa Amisiatai.
Khu ndaalo eye ekhumi na ndala, Pakieli okhwa Okirani, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Asieri, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Pakieli areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Pakieli okhwa Okirani.
Khu ndaalo eye ekhumi na chibili, Ahira okhwa Enani, omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Nafutali, areera siianwa siewe.
Siianwa sino siaba esaani eye efwesa, yaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru, lulweelo lwe efwesa eye busiro bwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Bibiindu bino biakelwa khuloondekhana ne sipiimilo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Bibiindu bino bioombi biechusibwa bufu bunosie butubaanisibwemo kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia.
Lundi areera sibuumba sie esahabu sie busiro bwe chishekeli ekhumi sisiichuulekho bupani.
Ahira areera euunwa enjoka, limiiku ne limeeme lie bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Lundi aana endurume khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi areera chieeyi chibili, kamamiiku karaano, chindurume chiraano ne kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala karaano khulwe siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe. Sino siaba siianwa sia Ahira okhwa Enani.
Sino siaba siianwa sie khukhwaula alutare, khu ndaalo niyo bakichukhilakho kamafura, khukhwama khu bemeelesi ba Isiraeli. Chisaani likhumi na chibili che efwesa, chibeseni likhumi na chibili che fwesa, bibuumba likhumi na bibili bie esahabu.
Buli esaani eye efwesa yaba busiro bwe chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru ne buli lulweelo lwaba lwe chishekeli kamakhumi saba. Chifwesa choosi che bibiindu chaba chielefu chibili ne chimia chine che chishekeli khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu.
Bareera bibuumba likhumi na bibili bie esahabu, bibiechulakho bupani. Biaba ne busiro bwe chishekeli likhumi buli silala khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie chishekeli che Abuundu Atakatifu. Esahabu eye bibuumba bioosi yaba chishekeli emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili.
Chikhaafu choosi che siianwa sie khukhwosia chaba chiuunwa likhumi na chibili, kamamiiku likhumi na kabili, kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala ekhumi na kabili, alala ne siianwa siabwe sie biakhulia, ne chindurume likhumi na chibili khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Lundi chikhaafu choosi khulwe embosio eye siianwa sie khureerao kumuleembe chaba chiuunwa kamakhumi kabili na chine, kamamiiku kamakhumi sita, chindurume kamakhumi sita, kamameeme ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala kamakhumi sita. Esio siaba siianwa sie khukhwaula alutare, ne malile khuchukhwakho kamafura.
Ne nga Musa engila mwiiema lie kumuse khulomaloma ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aulila kumumilo ne kumuboolela khukhwama mu ngaaki mwe ndebe eye kumwalaalo eyaba khu lisanduku lie ndakaano akari we bifwaani bie chikerubi chibili. Nio Musa alomaloma naye.

“Boolela Aruni oli, ne ara chitaa khu siteetwe, akhoyeele areekho chitaa saba nio buwaanga bukhosie ebweeni wasio.”
Ne Aruni akhola ario. Arao chitaa charusia buwaanga ebweeni we siteetwe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Siteetwe siakholebwa mu ngila eloondakho yino. Khukhwama khu sibale khukhwola khu bimuli biasio, siteetwe siapibwa kumukuba ne esahabu, khuloondekhana ne sifwaanane nisio Wele ekesia Musa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Yaula Balawi khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli mala obakwalaasie.
Khubakwalaasia, bakholele kano, baanyekho kameechi ke khukwalaasia khukhwama mu bwoni bwabwe, mala beebeke buli abuundu. Lundi baboolele khusiinga chingubo chabwe nio bekwalaasie.
Nio babukule euunwa enjoka ne siianwa sie bufu, bubwatubanisibwamo kamafura, mala obukule euunwa ekiindi enjoka khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Nono akhareere Balawi ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse, mala obuusie babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi.
Ne oreerire Balawi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhabareekho kamakhono.
Ne Aruni akhaane Balawi nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama mu Baisiraeli, nio bakhole kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Balawi nabo bakhare kamakhono kabwe khu mirwe kie chiuunwa chibili, mala okhaane ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni ne ekiindi khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia, khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khurusiao bubwoni bwe Balawi.
“Khola Balawi bayeete Aruni ne babaana bewe mala obaane nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mu ngila yino okhaaule Balawi khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli, babe babaase.
Ne omalile khukhola orio Balawi bakhache bakhole kimilimo a liiema lie kumuse ne obakwalaasiisie ne khubaana nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Balawi bali khale baane khwise khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli. Nababukuule mu bweyaangu bwe babele boosi be babaandu ba Isiraeli babe babaase.
Babele boosi be ba Isiraeli bali babaase, akhaba babaandu namwe bibiaayo. Khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo neera babele boosi mu sibala sia Misiri naaula babele ba Isiraeli khuba ba base.
Luno nabukuule Balawi mu bweyaangu bwe babaana babele mu baandu ba Isiraeli boosi.
Lundi naanile Balawi khu Aruni ne babaana bewe nga siianwa khukhwama mu Baisiraeli. Nakholile ndio nio bakholele Baisiraeli mwiiema lie kumuse. Bakhayeete mu milimo kie khurusiao bubwoni bwe Baisiraeli nio Baisiraeli bakhaba ne butinyu bunyala bwabanyoola ne becha siimbi Abuundu Atakatifu tawe.”
Nono Musa, Aruni, ne Baisiraeli boosi bakhola bario khu Balawi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Balawi babeene bekwalaasia khukhwama mu bwoni mala basiinga chingubo chabwe. Ne Aruni abaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa. Lundi Aruni aabakholela siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khubakwalaasia.
Enyuma wako Balawi bengila mwiiema lie kumuse mala bakhola kimilimo kiabwe. Bemeelelwa ne Aruni ne babaana bewe. Bakholela Balawi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali,
“Lino nilio lilaka khuloondekhana ne Balawi, buli Mulawi ooli ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko khukhwamila kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano ne khukhilakhoo anyala akhola kimilimo kie mwieema lie kumuse.
Ne oolile bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi karaano akhoyeele alekhe khukhola kimilimo.
Enyuma wako anyala ayeeta Balawi basie mu khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse. Ne kakhali se enyekhana khukhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi yeng'ene tawe. Mu ngila yino okhaelesie kimilimo Balawi.”

“Lekha Baisiraeli babe ne ndaalo eye Epasaka mu siise sisiaroborwa.
Khu ndaalo eye likhumi na chine eye kumwesi kuno, ekolooba, mulaba ne Epasaka khu siise nisio yaroborwa. Mulaba nayo khuloondekhana ne kamalaka kayo koosi.”
Nio Musa aboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali bakhoya baba ne Pasaka.
Baisiraeli baba e pasaka mu mwesi kwe khunyoa khu ndaalo eye likhumi ne chine, ekolooba mu sichiimi sia Sinai. Bakhola bario khuloondekhana nende koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa.
Ne babao babaandu babaandi baba banyaalu sikila aba batiilile khu mufu. Khwako se banyala khuba ne Pasaka endaalo ng'eneyo tawe. Nio baacha khu Musa ne Aruni khu ndaalo ng'eneyo.
Babaandu abo baloma bali, “Efwe khuli banyaalu sikila khwatiilile khu mufu. Ne sikila siina ne khukhiingililwa khuaana siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa siewe khu siise sisiaroborwa mu baandu ba Isiraeli?”
Ne Musa ababoolela ali, “Liinda mbulile nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alalakiilisia khuloondekhana ne nanywe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, “Omundu yesi yesi khwinywe namwe owe lisaaye lienywe akhaba ne ali omunyaalu khulwe khutiila khu mufu, namwe ali aleeyi mu lukeendo, alaba ne Pasaka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mu mwesi kwe khabili khu ndaalo eye likhumi na chine, ekolooba, bakhabe ne Pasaka. Bakhakikhole khulwe khulia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe ne chinyenyi chindulu.
Bakhalekhakho siakhulia siayo khukhwola kumutikhinyi namwe bafunakho sikuumba sie sikele sie sisiaayo tawe. Bakhakhole e Pasaka khuloondekhana ne kamalaka kayo koosi.
Ne kakhali omundu yesi yesi oli omukwalaafu okhali khu lukeendo tawe, mala alekha busa khuba ne pasaka, se akhabalwe nga mulala khu baandu base tawe. Sikila niye se aana siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu biise bibiaroborwa tawe. Omundu mwene oyo akhasute bubwoni bwewe omwene.
Ne omundu omukwa owa mumenyamo busa ne enya abe ne pasaka eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhoya akikhola khuloondekhana ne kamalaka kayo. Muliba ne lilaka lifwaanana khu baakwa ne khwinywe mwabene.”
Khu ndaalo niyo liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liasimikhwa, lifuumbi liecha mala lialifuuma. Khukhwama ekolooba khukhwola kumutikhinyi lifuumbi lialolekhana nga kumulilo.
Biachiililila birio; lifuumbi lialifuunikha kumuusi ne musilo kumulilo kwalifuunikha.
Buli lwosi nga lifuumbi ne lisutwa angaaki we liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, babaandu ba Isiraeli barekukha. Ne abuundu niio lifuumbi liekhanga, abwenao Baisiraeli bakhola ekambi.
Khulwe lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Baisiraeli barekukha khu lukeendo ne lundi khulwe lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bakhola ekambi. Khu siise sioosi nisio lifuumbi liaba khu ngaaki khwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Baisiraeli barama mu kambi.
Ne lifuumbi liakhaba ne liarama khu ngaaki khwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siise sileeyi, Baisiraeli baria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala se barekukha tawe.
Biise bilala lifuumbi liabechanga khu ngaaki khwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe chindaalo ndiiti busa. Ne khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi barama mu kambi namwe barekukha.
Biise bilala lifuumbi liabechanga khukhwama ekolooba khukhwola kumutikhinyi ne lirurao. Ne liarurangao kumutikhinyi Baisiraeli barekukhanga. Buli lwosi lifuumbi ne liniina angaaki, ne kuli kumuusi namwe silo Baisiraeli barekukhanga.
Yakhaba ne chili chindaalo chibili, namwe kumwesi, namwe khu siise sileeyi, khuloondekhana nga lifuumbi ne liabechanga khu ngaaki khwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se barekukha nga tawe. Ne nga lifuumbi ne liesutanga angaaki, barekukhanga.
Khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bakholanga ekambi namwe barekukhanga. Baliinda lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alilaka khubirira khu Musa

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Khola chikhoombi chibili che efwesa eyosebwe ne kumukuba. Okhachirumikhire khulwe khulaanga babaandu alala ne lundi khulwe khukhola baandu barekukhe.
Chikhoombi ne chiipwa chombi, babaandu boosi balibuusiana niio oli, a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Ne baapa ekhoombi ndala yong'ene, babemeelesi be chikholo cha Isiraeli bong'ene balibusiana niio oli.
Ne mupa chikhoombi khu siise sitiiti, chikholo chiili elubeka lwe bukwe chilirekukha.
Ne ne mupa chikhoombi siise sitiiti lukhola khabili, chikholo chiili elubeka lwe ebunafubo chilirekukha. Babaandu ne benya khurekukha, chikhoombi chilipwanga khu siise sitiiti.
Ne mwenya khulaanga babaandu boosi alala, chikhoombi chilipwa khu siise sileeyi.
Babaana ba Aruni, basaayi, niibo bakhape chikhoombi. Lilaka lie chikhoombi liliba liloondwa mu selukho chenywe choosi.
Ne mucha mwiie mu sibala sienywe, ne khu khuupana ne omusiku omunaania, khupa chikhoombi khu siise sitiiti. Ne mukhola murio Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, ndimuyeeta ne khumuonia khukhwama khu basiku benywe.
Lundi mu ndaalo chenywe che khoyo, ne mu naikara chenywe chicharoborwa nende che kumwesi, mulipa chikhoombi ne mulikho muaana biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio che biianwa bienywe bie kumuleembe. Biianwa bino bikhabe likhebusia khwinywe ebweeni wa Wele wenywe. Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.”
Mu mwiiko kukhola khabili, khu mwesi kukhola khabili, khu ndaalo ekhola kamakhumi kabili, enyuma we babaandu ba Isiraeli khurura e Misiri, lifuumbi liarura khu ngaaki khwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baisiraeli barakikha lukeendo lwabwe khukhwama mu sichiimi sia Sinai khukhwama abuundu alala khukhwola aandi. Lifuumbi liecha liafuunikha sichiimi sia Parani.
Barakikha lukeendo khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama khu Musa.
Nga barekukha, babanyoa khucha baba babaandu ba baaba asi we pendera eye ekholo eya Yuda. Barekukha mu bipupu biabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Nashoni okhwa Aminatabu.
Ne Netaneli okhwa Suari aba omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Isakari.
Eliabu okhwa Heloni, aba omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Sebuluni.
Ne nga liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne liatikululwa ba okhwa Kerishoni ne ba okhwa Merari barakikha lukeendo.
Ne ependera eye sipupu sia Rubeni yarekukha. Barekukha mu bipupu biabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Elisuri okhwa Sheteuri.
Shelumieli okhwa Surisiatai aba omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Simioni.
Omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Kati aba Eliasafu okhwa Teueli.
Nio Bakoati barekukha ne basutile bibiindu bitakatifu. Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lienyekhana liasimikhwa mu kambi ekiindi, nibo ne bakhoola tawe.
Babaloondakho, baba bali asi we pendera eye ekholo eya Efuraimu. Barekukha mu bipupu biabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Elisiama okhwa Amihudi.
Omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Manase aba Kamalieli okhwa Petausuri.
Ne Abitani okhwa Gidioni aba omwimeelesi we ekholo eya Benjamini.
Ekhumaliilikha, ba baaba asi we pendera eye ekholo eya Dani barekukha. Niibo baba nga baliindi be lubeka lwe enyuma we bipupu bioosi. Barekukha mu bipupu biabwe. Omwimeelesi wabwe aba Ahieseri okhwa Amisiatai.
Ne omwimeelesi owe ekholo eya Ashera aba Pakieli okhwa Okirani.
Owemeelela ekholo eya Nafutali aba Ahira okhwa Enani.
Eyino niyo yaba engila niyo Baisiraeli barekukhilamo, khuloondekhana ne bipupu biabwe.
Musa aboolela mukhwewe Hobabu, okhwa Reueli, Omumidiani ali, “Khulikho khucha abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali alakhukhuelesia efwe. Yiicha oche ne nafwe. Efwe khula khukholela kamalayi, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakile Baisiraeli kamalayi.”
Ne kakhali Hobabu aloma ali, “Se endacha nanywe tawe. Ndikho ngobola mu sibala siase ne mu baandu base.”
Musa aloma ali, “Nosiima okhakhulekha tawe. Ewe omanyile nga khunyala khwombakha ekambi mu sichiimi. Ewe onyala wakhurangirira.
Ne waaba bali ocha nafwe, kamalayi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhukholele efwe, fwesi khukhakhukholele ewe.”
Babaandu barura khu sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bacha lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru. Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liarangira ebweeni wabwe khu ndaalo chitaru echo khuyiima abuundu niio banyala bombakha ekambi.
Ne lifuumbi lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaba angaaki wabwe kumuusi buli lwoosi nga barekukhanga khukhwama mu kambi.
Buli lwosi nga Lisanduku lie ndakaano ne liarekukhanga Musa alomalomanga ali, “Yinyokha, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala basiku bowo basalanikhe. Lekha abo ba bakhubiila bakhwilukhe.”
Ne buli lwosi nga Lisanduku lie ndakaano ne liemanga, alomanga ali, “Kobola, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khu baandu bowo ba Isiraeli bali bakali, bakhabalikha tawe.”

Babaandu barakikha khukhweng'ulung'unya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe butinyu bwabwe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne aulila, aambwa lirima mala aruma kumulilo kwewe kwaburukha akari wabwe. Kumulilo kuno kwosiakho chindulo che ekambi yabwe.
Nio babaandu baalilila Musa, mala Musa asaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kumulilo kwasima.
Khwako abuundu ao alaangwa Tabera
Nono babaandu be situluungu ba baaba mu Baisiraeli baba ne kumuluungo kumukali kwe khulia. Ne Baisiraeli bosi barakikha khulila lundi baloma bali, “Khaba khwanyoolakho enyama khwalia!
Khukhebulila ching'eeni nicho khwalia busa e Misiri ne khukharuungakho sisiindu tawe. Malenge, kamaoondo, chinyenyi, bituungulu, ne bituungulu bia saumu.
Ne luno se khulikho ne kamaani tawe. Mbao nisio khunyala khwalia tawe ne ekhali mana yino yong'ene.”
Babaandu babuusianga mana mala bakisia khu lususi namwe bakichungila mu bibwiili. Ne basiele bakitekhelanga mu ndekheelo mala bakholamo chikeki. Ne bunulu bwe mana bwaba nga bunulu bwe chikeki, chichakholwa ne kamafura.
Nga luume ne lwamanga khu kambi mu silo, mana yakwa ne nalwo.
Musa aulila babaandu ne balila chinju chabwe ne buli mundu a muliango kwe liiema liewe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambwa lirima likali ne Musa abona bubi.
Musa areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Siina sikila ne ukholele ese omukholi wowo kamabi? Siina sikila ne ekhanyoolile kumwalaalo ebweeni wowo tawe? Siina sikila ne underekho busiro bwe babaandu bano boosi?
Ese niye owaesia babaandu bano? Ese niye owabasaala, nio ewe umboolele oli mbalele nga omulesi ne alela omwana omung'aalia, khukhwola mu sibala nisio walaka bakuuka babwe?
Naamia waena enyama niyo nyala naelesia babaandu bano boosi? Sikila balikho bandilila bali ese mbaelesie enyama balie.
Seng'ene se nyala khusuta babaandu bano tawe. Buli busiro bukali khwise.
Ne waaba ne ukholela kano, khusaba unjire siise sino nio ndekhe khubona butinyu bwase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Mbusilie babaandu kamakhumi saba bamanyikhaane khwiwe nga basaakhulu be Baisiraeli. Bareere a liiema lie kumuse mala wimeo nabo.
Ndekha asi mala ndomalome ne nawe abwenao. Ndabukulakho roho oli khwiwe mala mure khu nibo. Ne balikhuyeeta khusuta busiro bwe babaandu nio ewe olekhe khubusuta weng'ene.
Ne boolela babaandu oli: Yikwalaasia mwabene sikila kumuchuli, mukhalie enyama. Enywe mwalilile mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaulile. Mwalomile muli, ‘Naanu olakhuelesia enyama khulie? Khwaba bulayi mu Misiri.’ Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabaelesia enyama mala mulie.
Se mukhalie khulwe ndaalo ndala yong'ene namwe chibili, namwe chiraano, namwe likhumi namwe akhaba chindaalo kamakhumi kabili tawe.
Ne kakhali mulikilia khulwe kumwesi kwoosi nabwila nga ne eli mururira mu moolu, ne khumusinya. Lino licha khwikholekha sikila mwalobile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli mwinywe lundi mwengu'lung'unya muli, ‘Siina sikila ne khwarura e Misiri?’ ”
Musa aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Babaandu nibo ndakeendanga ne nabo bali chielefu chimia sita, mala ewe oloma oli, ‘Ocha khubaelesia enyama balie khu mwesi kwoosi.’
Chikhaafu ne kamakheese kanyala kerwa kaboola ku? Namwe ching'eeni choosi chinyala chalobwa chaboola ku?”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia Musa ali, “Siindu siina sinyala siakhaya Ese? Nono olabona elomo yase ne elaba eya ng'ali namwe tawe.”
Nio Musa arura enje aboolela babaandu niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma. Mala abuusia babemeelesi be Baisiraeli kamakhumi saba abakhola bema babotookhelela liiema lie kumuse.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekha asi mwifuumbi mala alomaloma ne Musa. Abukulakho roho eyaba khu Musa mala akielesia babemeelesi kamakhumi saba. Ne roho nga abechakho bang'oola. Ne kakhali se bachiililila tawe.
Nono babaandu babili baba barama mu kambi. Baba Elidadi ne Medadi. Roho abechakho baba balala khu bemeelesi kamakhumi saba. Ne kakhali se bacha a liiema lie kumuse tawe, nio bang'oola mu kambi.
Omusoleeli mulala atima acha aboolela Musa ali, Elidadi ne Medadi balikho bang'oolela mu kambi.
Ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni, owaba omuyeeti owa Musa khukhwama mu buele bwewe, aboolela Musa ali, “Omwami wase Musa, bakaanie!”
Ne kakhali Musa amureeba ali, “Ewe obuba siina? Andi ese obubile. Nikoomba ndi babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi boosi babe bang'oosi ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesie Roho wewe!”
Nio Musa alala ne basaakhulu ba Isiraeli bakobola mu kambi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arumania embeo yareera chisiindu khukhwama mu nyanja chakwa embi ne kambi, ambi buleeyi bwe lukeendo lwe endaalo ndala lubeka olu, ne lukeendo lwe endaalo ndala ekiindi lubeka luluundi, khubotookhelela ekambi, mala choola embi emita ndala khukhwama khwiloba.
Babaandu benyokha endaalo ng'eneyo yoosi, ne silo sioosi, ne ndaalo eyaloondakho yoosi, baamba chisiindu. Owatiila ndiiti khukhila babasie atiila chechula chindubi chibili, mala bachanikhila enje choosi khubotookhelela ekambi.
Ne basiili ne enyama mu meno kabwe; ne basiili khukinyanya tawe, lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaburukha khu nibo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abareerera butinyu bukali.
Elio liakila lisina lie abuundu ao lialaangwa Kiburoti-Hataaba, sikila abwenao niio basiikha babaandu be kumuluungo kwe enyama.
Khukhwama Kiburoti-Hataaba babaandu bakeenda boola Haseroti, bakholao ekambi.

Musa akhwa omukhasi Omukushi. Nio Miriamu ne Aruni bamwikiicha.
Bareeba bali, “Ng'ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomalome khubirira khu Musa yeng'ene? Se alomalome khubirira khwifwe fwesi?” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila kano.
Musa aaba omuolu lukali khukhila babaandu boosi be khu sibala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Musa, Aruni, ne Miriamu, “Yiicha enywe bataru a liiema lie kumuse.” Mala bataru abano barura enje.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekha asi mwifuumbi, eema amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse mala alaanga Aruni ne Miriamu. Bombi besende ebweeni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Nono rekeeresia kamakhuwa kase: Omung'oosi aaba ne aliio akari wenywe, Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nyala neyekesiana samwene khu niye mu malola. Ndomalome naye mu marooro.
Ne se kali kario khu mukholi wase Musa tawe. Namweyikina khukhwimeelela Baisiraeli boosi.
Khu niye ndomalomanga naye moni na moni, se kali musimo tawe. Lundi abona lukoondo lwase! Siina sikila nono ne mukharire khukhwikiicha omukholi wase Musa?”
Lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaba likali khu nibo mala arekukha.
Ne nga lifuumbi lienyokha khu liiema lie kumuse, Miriamu aba ne bulwaale bwe kamakele kumubili kwoosi. Kwaba kumuwaanga chwe, nga kamaarara. Ne Aruni alola Miriamu mala amubona ali ne bulwaale bwe kamakele.
Aboolela Musa ali, “Nosiima, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhakhuelesia kumunaanio tawe sikila khwakholile bumayaanu mu busilu.
Okhamulekha afwaana nga owafwa tawe. Okhamulekha abe nga owonakwa kumubili lubeka lulala nga ne asaalwa khurura munda mwa maawe tawe.”
Nio Musa alilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, “Ekhusaba omuonie ee Wele.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Kaaba bali raraawe amufucha kamare mu moni, andi se akhabeele ne chisoni khu ndaalo saba? Lekha ekalilwe enje we ekambi chindaalo saba. Ne chiweele anyala akalusibwa mu kambi lundi.”
Nio Miriamu ekalilwa enje we ekambi khu ndaalo saba. Ne babaandu se bachiililila ne lukeendo tawe khukhwola nga ne bareera Miriamu mu kambi.
Enyuma wako babaandu barekukha khukhwama e Heseroti, mala baapa ekambi mu sichiimi sia Parani.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Ruma babaandu nga bayooti bache mu sibala sia Kanaani nisio ndikho mbelesia babaandu ba Isiraeli. Ruma omwimeelesi mulala khukhwama mu buli ekholo.”
Nio Musa aabaruma khukhwama mu sichiimi sia Parani. Aabaruma khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Boosi abo baba babemeelesi be ba Isiraeli.
Ne kano niko kakaba kamasina kabwe, khukhwama mu kholo eya Rubeni, Siamua okhwa Sakuri.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Simioni, Siafati okhwa Hori.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, Kalebu okhwa Yefune.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Isakari, Ikali okhwa Yosefu.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Efuraimu, Hosea okhwa Nuni.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini, Paliti okhwa Rafu.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Sebuluni, Katieli okhwa Soti.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Yosefu (ekholo eya Manase), Kati okhwa Susi.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani, Amieli okhwa Kemali.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Asieri, Seturi okhwa Mikaeli.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Nafutali, Nabi okhwa Wofisi.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Kati, Keueli okhwa Maki.
Abano nibo bayooti nibo Musa aruma khucha nga bayooti mu sibala. Musa akaluukhasia lisina lia Hosea okhwa Nuni, amulaanga ali Yoshua.
Musa aabaruma khukhola buyooti mu sibala sia Kanaani. Ababoolela ali, “Cha khukhwola ebunafubo owa Kanaani ne sibala sie bikulu.
Muloole sibala sifwaana siriena, ne babaandu babasimenyamo ne bali be kamaani namwe bali batekhele, bali bakali namwe batiiti.
Lola sibala nisio bamenyilemo ne sili silayi namwe sibi, ne chingoba nicho bamenyilemo ne chili che chikambi namwe chisire.
Lola sibala ne sili sitaambi namwe siyiinda, lundi ne silimo kimisiru namwe tawe. Ba banyindaafu mala mureerekho bilala khu biaamo bie sibala esio.” (Nono siise siaba sie khuroba khwe kimisabibu kinyoa).
Nio bayooti bacha nga bayooti mu sibala khukhwama mu sichiimi sia Sini khukhwola Reobu, embi abwingililo bwa Hamati.
Bacha e lubeka lwe ebunafubo owa Kanaani mala bola Heburoni niio chikholo cha Ahimani, Sheshai, ne Talimai baba be lisaaye lia Anaki, bamenya. (Lukoba lwa Heburoni lwombakhwa kimiiko saba ebweeni we lukoba lwa Soani mu Misiri).
Bola mwitooma lie Eshikoli, ne ebweeneyo barema lusakia lulala lulwabakho sisusuuchu sie chisabibu. Lwasutwa ne babaandu babili khu lukuulo akari kari wabwe, lundi bareera kamakomanga ne chinduli.
(Abuundu ao alaangwa bali mwitooma mwe Eshikoli
Enyuma we khukhola buyooti mu sibala khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane, bayooti bakobola.
Bakobola khu Musa ne Aruni, ne babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi e Kadeshi mu sichiimi sie Parani. Baboolela babaandu niko babona ne khubekesia bibiaamo bie sibala esio.
Baboolela Musa bali, “Khwola mu sibala nisio wakhuruma. Sili sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi beseleetekhanga. Ne lola bibiaamo biasio ebisina.
Ne kakhali babaandu basimenyilemo bali be kamaani, ne chingoba chabwe chili chisire lundi chimboofu. Khutasa khwako khwabonayo be lisaaye lia Anaki.
Baamaleki bamenyile ebunafubo we sibala sienesio. Ne Baiti, Bayebusi ne Baamori bamenyile khu sikulu sie sibala esio. Ne Bakanaani bamenyile embi ne nyanja ne khu sikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Yoritani.”
Ne kakhali Kalebu aasisia babaandu ebweeni wa Musa, mala aloma ali, “Lekha khuche mala khutiile sibala; khuli ne kamaani kamakali khusiiula.”
Nio babaandu ba bacha ne Kalebu baloma bali, “Tawe, se khunyala khwasitiila tawe. Babaandu abo bali ne kamaani khukhukhila efwe.”
Nio bareera kamakobosio kamabi khu Baisiraeli, khuloondekhana ne sibala nisio baruma baandu khuyoota. Baloma bali, “Sibala esio sili sibunia basimenyilemo. Ne babaandu boosi nibo khuboonemo bali baleeyi lukali.
Lundi khwabonayo kamanani (lisaaye lie Baanaki). Efwe khwabonekha busa bakeekhe nga kamatete.”

Nio libuusiana lioosi liayokela. Babaandu balila silo esio.
Babaandu boosi beng'ulung'unya khu Musa ne Aruni. Boosi baloma bali, “Bwakhabeele bulayi khwafwila mu sibala sia Misiri namwe khufwila mu sichiimi sino!
Sikila siina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhurera mu sibala sino khwirirwe mwiie. Bakhasi ne babaana befwe bakhatiilwe. Se bwakhabeele bulayi khukobole e Misiri?”
Nio babolanila bali, “Lekha khurobore omwimeelesi mala khukobole e Misiri.”
Nio Musa ne Aruni benama bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila asi ebweeni we libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni ne Kalebu okhwa Yefune, babili khu ba bayoota sibala esio, batabulaka chingubo chabwe.
Baboolela libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli bali, “Sibala nisio khwabiriramo nga bayooti, sili sibala silayi lukali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne asiima, alakhuyilayo mala akhuelesie efwefwe sibala esio, nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga.
Lekha khukhwaukha khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne mukharia babaandu bamenyile mu sibala esio tawe. Khulabaula bwangu busa. Buliindi bwabwe bwabarurirekho. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nafwe mukhabaria tawe.”
Ne kakhali babaandu boosi beenya khubapa kamabaale. Nio luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabonekha a liiema lie kumuse khu baandu boosi ba Isiraeli.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Babaandu bano bacha khundekelesia khukhwola siise sina? Ne khulwe siise sina nisio bakhalobe khukhusuubila ese, akhaba ne mbakholeele kamayia kano koosi akari wabwe?
Ndabarumira bulwaale bubi mala mbalobe. Ne ndikhukhola ewe obe sibala sili siboofu lundi sie kamaani khubakhila nibo.”
Bamisiri bacha khuboolela babaandu bamenyile mu sibala sino. Babaandu bamala khuulila bali ewe Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli ne babaandu abano. Ewe obonekhanga moni na moni, ne lifuumbi liowo limanga angaaki wabwe. Ne ewe obarangilira mu lukeendo ne lifuumbi kumuusi, ne mu mulilo silo.
Nono kaaba bali wira babaandu abano boosi, chikholo chichaulila khu fuma yowo chiicha khuloma chili,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se anyala khurera babaandu abano mu sibala nisio abechubila khubaelesia tawe. Elio liakila aberera mu sichiimi.’
Nono khusaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kamaani kowo kabe kamakali nga ne walaka. Waloma oli,
‘Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi kalaa khuba ne lirima, ne endi ne busiime bwa mindali bukali. Mbeelanga bumayaanu ne kamabi. Ne kakhaba kario mbaananga kumunaanio khulwe bumayaanu. Mbaananga kumunaanio kwe bakuuka khu baana, babechukhulu, bisoni ne bimiila.’
Nosiima beela bumayaanu bwe babaandu bano, khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe busiime bwowo bwa mindali. Babeele nga wababeela khukhwama nga barura e Misiri khukhwola luno.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Nababeleele, nga nilwo osabile.
Ne kakhali nga nilwo menya, ne nga liloba lioosi ne lilichusibwa luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nichuba ndi:
Babaandu bano boosi babona luyali lwase ne kamaya kase niko nakhola e Misiri ne mu sichiimi. Ne kakhali balekha khu khundia mala bakhaka ese khukhwola ekhumi.
Nono mbao yesi yesi ocha khubona sibala nisio nalaka bakuuka babwe tawe. Mbao yesi yesi owandekelesia okhasibone tawe.
Ne kakhali omukholi wase Kalebu, sikila ali ne roho eyaaukhana ne ali omweyikinwa khwise elala, khamwolisie mu sibala nisio anyoa khubona ne lisaaye liewe licha khunyoola sibala esio.
Nono sikila Baamaleki ne Bakanaani bamenyilemo mu matooma kobola muchuli mala muche mu sichiimi khubirira khu ngila echa khu Nyanja eya Shamu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Babaandu bamayaanu bano bacha khunjeng'ulung'unyakho khukhwola liina? Nauliile khukhwilung'unya khwe babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Baboolele oli, ‘Nga nilwo emenya, ndibakholela nga nilwo mwaloma.’
Mulafwa ne kimibili kienywe kicha khukwa mu sichiimi sino. Buli mulala khwinywe oli ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakho lundi owabalwa ne babaandu, owelung'unya yesi yesi acha khufwa.
Mbao yesi yesi ocha khwingila mu sibala, akhaba mulala, nisio nalaka ndi nja khubaelesia mumenyemo tawe. Kalebu okhwa Yefune ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni bong'ene bacha khwingila mu sibala esio.
Ne kakhali babaana benywe nibo mwaloma muli baliba baambe balicha mu sibala nisio mwaloba siliba sisiabwe.
Ne enywe mucha khufwila mu sichiimi muno.
Ne lisaaye lienywe licha khuyiyila mu sichiimi muno khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane. Balinanisibwa sikila enywe mwalekha khuuba babeyikinwa, khukhwola nga omumaliilisi khwinywe ne afwila mu sichiimi.
Mucha khunaanisibwa khulwe bumayaanu bwenywe khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane, kumwiiko mulala khulwe buli endaalo ndala niio mwarumikhira khuyoota mu sibala. Nio mumanye lirima liase:
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ng'ali nalomile. Ng'ali nja khukhola kano khu libuusiana limayaanu lino libuusiane khukhundoba ese. Mu sichiimi muno bacha khwicha khu siakamo. Balifwila mu sichiimi.”
Nio babaandu balala nibo Musa aruma khucha khukhola buyooti mu sibala bareera elomo embi khu baandu. Bakila babaandu beng'ulung'unya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu abo babareera elomo embi bafwa bulwaale ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali Yoshua okhwa Nuni ne Kalebu okhwa Yefune barama khwaabo babacha nga bayooti be sibala.
Musa aboolela Baisiraeli boosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma. Ne babaandu balila lukali.
Benyokha makhelebeende kumutikhinyi barakikha khucha sibala sie sikulu. Baloma bali, “Lola khuli ano, khulacha abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulaka sikila khwakholile bumayaanu.”
Ne kakhali Musa abareeba ali, “Siina sikila nono ne mulikho mulekha khuria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi? Se mucha khukhila tawe.
Mukhacha tawe mukhola murio mwaulwa ne basiku benywe, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se ali ne nanywe tawe.
Ebweeneyo Baamaleki ne Bakanaani baliyo. Ne mucha khwirwa sikila enywe mwalekhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se acha khuba ne nanywe tawe.”
Ne kakhali babaandu balekelesia mala bacha boola khungaaki khwe sikulu sie sibala sie bikulu. Bacha ne kakhali Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namwe Musa se arura mu kambi tawe.
Nio Baamaleki ne Bakaanani ba baamenya mu sibala esio bekha mala babaula. Babatimania khukhwola e Horima.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli ne boola mu sibala nisio nja khubaelesia khuba sisiabwe,
bakhoya bambanila biianwa bie khukhwosia. Biianwa bino bikhoya bibe bie chiuunwa, chimbusi, kamakheese. Bareere biianwa bie khukhwirusia, namwe siianwa sie khukhwosia namwe embosio namwe siianwa sie khukhwolesia nisio echuba namwe chimbosio che biise bibiaroborwa nio bakhole kumuuya kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Yesi yesi oaana siianwa sie biakhulia aliaana silala khwikhumi sie siikula sie bufu bunosie. Bufu buno bukhatubanisibwe ne kamafura echuupa ndala.
Endali khulwe siianwa sie khunywebwa, echuupa ndala, elikholwa khu buli siianwa sie khukhwosia namwe embosio eya buli limeeme.
Ne limiiku ne liaanwa, khola siianwa sie biakhulia sisioola bibili khwikhumi bie siikula sie bufu bunosie butubaanisibwe ne kamafura echuupa ndala.
Ne khulwe siianwa sie khunywa, mukhaane echuupa ne nusu eye endali kumuuya kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne mulirekekha euunwa nga siianwa sie khukhwosia, namwe embosio, khukhwolesia nisio echuba namwe siianwa sie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Siianwa sie euunwa esio siliaanwa ne siianwa sie siakhulia sili silala khu bitaru sie siikula sie bufu bunosie butubaanisibwe ne kamafura chichupa chibili.
Ne siianwa sie khunywa, mulisiaana ne endali chichupa chibili nga siianwa sisiakholwa ne kumulilo sili sie kumuuya kusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Mulikhola murio khu buli euunwa, limiiku, namwe limeeme, namwe emeeme.
Mulikholela buli silala murio khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe biianwa nibio murekekha.
Buli Omuisiraeli akhoyeele akhole ario mu khuaana siianwa sie khukhwosia sisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne aaba bali omukwa namwe omundu yesi yesi oli nanywe chiselukho choosi amumenyilemo, ne enya khuaana siianwa sie khukhwosia sie silikakha, sisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, alikhola nga nilwo enywe mukhola.
Lilibao lilaka lilala khwinywe ne khu baakwa mu biise bioosi. Baakwa baliba nga enywe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lilaka liliba lilala khwinywe ne khu baakwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Baisiraeli oli, ne mwola mu sibala nisio ndikho mbayilamo,
ne mulia biakhulia bie sibala esio mukhoya mwaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa.
Khu biakhulia bienywe bie khunyoa, muliaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumukaati mulala nga siianwa. Mukhakwaule nga siianwa bulayi bwene nga siianwa sie biakhulia biyaaya.
Khu biise bioosi bibiicha, mulichiililila khuaana siianwa sie biakhulia bienywe bie khunyoa.
“Ne mwaba ne mwibilila khuria lilala khu malaka kano niko naelesia Musa mukhola muriena?
(Koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka enywe khubirira khu Musa, khukhwama endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aanila kamalaka ne khuchiililila mu selukho chenywe), Mukhola muri:
Kaaba bali babaandu balekha khuria sikila se baba ne limanya tawe, libuusiana lioosi liliaana euunwa endoro, balikiaana nga siianwa sie khukhwosia, esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Balikiaana alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa khuloondekhana ne lilaka. Khutasa khwako, baliaana endurume nga siianwa sie bumayaanu.
Ne omusaayi acha khubayeeta khurusiao bumayaanu, ne bacha khubeelwa bubi bwabwe. Sikila bwaba bubi nibwo bareerire siianwa sie silikakha ne siianwa sie bubi bwabwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi balibeelwa alala ne omukwa obamenyilemo, sikila buli mundu yesi yesi aba mu bubi obwo.
Ne omusaayi acha khuyeeta khurusiao bubi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwo mundu okholile bubi. Ne omundu oyo acha khubeelwa.
Mucha khuba ne lilaka lifwaanana khu yesi yesi okhola bubi nakhang'aliilemo tawe, abeele Omuisiraeli, namwe omukwa owamumenyamo.
Ne omundu yesi yesi okhola bubi ne amanyile abeele Omuisiraeli, namwe omukwa, aba akhomile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne aliirwa.
Aliirwa sikila aalekelesia elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi afunake lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omundu oyo aliirwa. Bubi bwewe buliba khu mwene.”
Baisiraeli ne basiili mu sichiimi, banyoola omundu mulala ne alikho areenya chiikhu khu ndaalo eya sabato.
Ba bamunyoola bamuyila khu Musa, ne Aruni, ne babaandu boosi.
Bamura asi we buliindi, sikila se liamanyikhana nilio banyala bamukholela tawe.
Mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Omundu oyo akhoya werwa. Babaandu boosi bamupe kamabaale bamwirire enje we kambi.”
Khwako babaandu boosi bamurusia enje we ekambi mala bamupa kamabaale bamwiira nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli banabe buusi khu ndulo khwe chingubo chabwe bufwaane nga buyenje mala rakho lukoye lunyelele lubuusi khu buli luyenje. Bakhoya bakholanga bario buli muselukho chabwe choosi.
Mulilola khu buyenje obwo mala mukhebulile kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi koosi. Nio mukhole ne khulekha lilienya ne liliekoomba lienywe mwabeene nilio mwenya khuloondakho.
Nio mulikhebulila ne khukhola nga kamalaka kase koosi ne kenyekhana. Ne muliba batakatifu khu Wele wenywe.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, owamurusia mu sibala sia Misiri, khuba Wele wenywe: Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.”

Babaandu bano babukula babemeelesi be Baisiraeli chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, ba bamanyikhana mala baroborwa ne libuusiana lie babaandu.
Bebuusiana ebweeni wa Musa ne Aruni. Ba baboolela bali, “Mwachiile aleeyi lukali! Libuusiana lioosi lie babaandu lili litakatifu. Buli mulala ali omutakatifu. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali akari wabwe. Siina sikila enywe ne mweniinia khu baandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Musa nga aulila kano, akwa asi mafumala.
Aboolela Kora ne sipupu siewe sioosi ali, “Kumutikhinyi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhwekesia fweesi naanu oli wewe, ne naanu oli omutakatifu. Oyo niye alirobora alimuchao.
Ewewe ne sipupu siowo bukula bibuumba bie khukhwoseliamo bupani.
Biremo kamanda ke kumulilo mala murekho bibiindu biiunya bulayi, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumutikhinyi. Ne omundu niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akharobore akhabe niye omutakatifu. Mwachile aleeyi lukali baana ba Lawi!”
Musa achilila khuboolela Kora ali, “Rekeeresia, enywe Balawi:
enywe mulola muli lili likhuwa likeekhe Wele owe Baisiraeli khubaaula enywe khukhwama mu libuusiana lie Baisiraeli boosi? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amureera enywe embi khu niye omwene. Enya mumukholele kimilimo mu liiema litakatifu lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Enya mukholele babaandu.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amureerire siimbi ne naye omwene alala ne bawandaayo bakhwa Lawi ne nanywe. Ne enywe luno mwenya akhaba busaayi?
Khwako mwakholile likhasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe khulwe khukhola ekwangwaani yino, ewe ne sipupu sino. Aruni ali siina nio mumweng'ulung'unye?”
Nio Musa arumania khulaanga Tatani ne Abiramu, ba okhwa Eliabu. Ne nibo baloma bali, “Se khwicha ebweeneyo tawe.
Lili likhuwa litiiti ewe khukhurusia mu sibala sia Misiri nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga khukhwirira mu sichiimi muno nio ewe wekhole omwimeelesi wefwe?
Khutasa khwako ewe se wakhureera mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga, namwe okhakhuakho kamaloba ne kimikuunda kie kimisabibu nga kimiaandu kiefwe tawe. Olikho obea babaandu bano? Se khwicha tawe.”
Musa akhalala lukali mala aboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Okhafukiililakho biianwa biabwe tawe. Se nababukulakho akhaba epunda ndala tawe. Se nabakholelakho bubi tawe.”
Musa aboolela Kora ali, “Kumuchuli ewewe ne sipupu siowo mukhoya mwiche ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aruni yesi acha khubao.
Buli sia mulala khwinywe abukule sibuumba siewe mala arekho bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Ne buli sia mulala arere lucho lwewe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bibuumba bioosi bie chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano. Aruni yesi acha khureera sibuumba siewe.”
Nio buli mundu abukula sibuumba siewe, mala arakho kamanda ke kumulilo ne bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Bema amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse alala ne Musa ne Aruni.
Nio Kora abuusia babaandu boosi balobe Musa ne Aruni amuliango kwe liiema lie kumuse. Ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabonekhela libuusiana lioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Yiyaula khukhwama mu libuusiana lino, nio mbabunie bwangu.”
Ne Musa ne Aruni benama asi bubweeni bwoola khwiloba mala baloma bali, “Ee Wele, Wele we bie bulamu bioosi omundu mulala anyala akhola bumayaanu bukile ewe okhalalile libuusiana lioosi?”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela libuusiana linyokhe a maeema ka Kora, Tatani ne Abiramu.”
Nio Musa, alala ne babemeelesi be Baisiraeli, acha khu Tatani ne Abiramu.
Aboolela babaandu ali, “Musaba murure a maeema ke babaandu bamayaanu bano. Mukhatilakho sisiindu sili sisiabwe tawe. Ne busa, mukhola murio mwabunila mu bumayaanu bwabwe.”
Nio benyokha a maeema ka Kora, Tatani ne Abiramu. Tatani ne Abiramu barura enje mala bema amuliango kwe kamaeema kabwe, alala ne bakhasi babwe, ne babaana babwe bang'alia.
Ne Musa aboola ali, “Luno mulamanya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anduma ese khukhola kimilimo kino kioosi ne se lili lilienya liase tawe.
Kaaba bali babaandu bano bafwa lifwa nga lia buli mundu namwe banyoola butinyu nga bunyoolanga buli mundu, aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se anduma ese tawe.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola sisiindu siiya, mala liloba liasama ne khubamila alala ne bibiindu biabwe, mala bache asi balamu mu sibala sie bafu, nio mulamanya muli babaandu bano baleka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nga amala khulomaloma, liloba asi we babaandu abo liatikhamo.
Liabamila ne babaandu babwe, alala ne sipupu sia Kora ne kimiaandu kiabwe kioosi.
Nio nibo ne bibiindu biabwe bioosi besiikha ne bali balamu mu sibala sie makoombe. Liloba liabafuuma, mala babuna khukhwama mu libuusiana lie babaandu.
