Baisiraeli boosi ba baaba siimbi barwandukha chimbilo nga ne baulila ne balikho ne balila. Baloma bali, “Sibala sikhola sirio siakhumila fwesi!”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma kumulilo kwosia babaandu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano ba baaba ne baana bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela Eliesa okhwa Aruni, omusaayi arerure bibuumba bie khukhwoseliakho bupani khukhwama khu mulilo mala asalanisie kamanda sikila kali kamatakatifu.
Bukula bibuumba bie khukhwoseliakho bupani bie babaandu baberwa khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe mala obibasemo kamapaati kafuunikha khu alutare. Khola orio sikila ba biaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bili bitakatifu. Biliba simanyisio khu Baisiraeli.”
Nio Omusaayi Eliesa abukula bibuumba bie kumukasa nibio babaandu baya kumulilo baana. Abibasamo kamapaati ke khufuunikha khu alutare.
Elino liaba likhebusia khu Baisiraeli lili, yesi yesi okhali omusaayi wenju eya Aruni akhecha niio alutare eli khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi tawe. Akhola ario abuna nga Kora ne sipupu siewe. Kano koosi kekholekha khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aboolela Eliesa khubirira khu Musa.
Ne kakhali endaalo eloondakho babaandu boosi beng'ulung'unyila Musa ne Aruni ne baloma bali, “Mwerire babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nga ne bamala khubusiana khulwe khuloba Musa ne Aruni, bekhebukha sie liiema lie kumuse mala babona lifuumbi lialifumile, ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabonekha.
Ne Musa ne Aruni bacha ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Rura a libuusiana lie babaandu lino, nio mbabunie siise sino. Ne kakhali nibo benama asi.”
Musa aboolela Aruni ali, “Bukula sibuumba siowo sie kumulilo, ramo kamanda ke kumulilo khukhwama khu alutare. Ne omalile orio rakho bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Nio otime nasio khangu niio babaandu bali mala obayeete khurusiao bumayaanu bwabwe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne lirima likali mala butinyu bwarakiikhe.”
Nio Aruni akhola nga Musa ne amuboolela aatima engila mwituuli lie babaandu. Butinyu bwaba bwarakiikhe khale. Aambia bibiindu biiunya bulayi mala ayeeta babaandu khubeelwa bumayaanu bwabwe.
Eema akari we bafwiile ne balamu mala butinyu bwakama.
Nono babaandu babafwa baba chielefu ekhumi na chine ne chimia saba khutasa khwaabo ba bafwila mu makhuwa ka Kora.
Aruni akobola khu Musa a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse nga butinyu ne bwawa.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhuelesie chisiimbo likhumi na chibili, buli ndala khukhwama khu buli omwimeelesi owe luuya lwa Isiraeli. Andika lisina lia buli mundu khu siimbo yewe.
Ne andika lisina lia Aruni khu siimbo eye Balawi. Echa khubao esiimbo ndala khu buli omwimeelesi owe luuya.
Ne ochiile mwiiema lie kumuse mala ochire ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano, niio ese nakaananilanga ne nawe.
Ne esiimbo eyo mundu niye ndobore echa khu sisina. Khwako nja khumalao khukhweng'ulung'unya khwe Baisiraeli khuno khwiwe.”
Musa alomaloma ne Baisiraeli mala babemeelesi babwe boosi bamuelesia chisiimbo, ndala khukhwama mu buli nju choosi likhumi na chibili. Ne esiimbo eya Aruni yosi yabamo.
Mala Musa ara chisiimbo choosi mwiiema lie kumuse ebweeni we lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Musa arusia enje chisiimbo choosi khukhwama ebweeni owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi achekesia Baisiraeli boosi mala buli mundu abukula esiimbo yewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Kobosiamo esiimbo eya Aruni ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Esiimbo eyo ebiikhwe ebe simanyisio khu Baisiraeli be sileka khwise nio wakamie khukhweng'ulung'unya khwabwe. Busa bakhola bario bafwa.”
Musa akhola ario nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Ne babaandu ba Isiraeli baboolela Musa bali, “Lola khulikho khubuna. Khwabuna fweesi.
Omundu yesi yesi owicha siimbi ne liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khufwa, aba kenyekhana fweesi khufwe?”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aruni ali, “Ewe, basoleeli bowo nende be lisaaye lienywe mulabiiywa khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kie liiema litakatifu. Ne akhaba lundi ewe ne basoleeli bowo mulabiiywa khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kie busaayi.
Reera balebe bowo, ekholo eye ba raraao eya Lawi, bakhole ne nawe khu khuyeeta wamwene ne basoleeli bowo ne mulikho mukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie buloli.
Bacha khukhukholela kimilimo ne khukhola kimilimo kioosi kie mwieema. Ne kakhali bakhecha siimbi abiindu bie Abuundu Atakatifu namwe a alutare tawe. Bakhola bario, nibo ne nawe mulafwa.
Balaambana ne nawe khukhola kimilimo kie mu liiema lie kumuse. Mbao omundu yesi yesi okundi okheeche siimbi ne nanywe tawe.
Ewe ocha khukhola kimilimo kie Abuundu Atakatifu ne alutare, nio lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lilekhe khukhwicha lundi khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Naroboore balebe bowo Balawi khukhwama mu Baisiraeli nga siianwa khwinywe. Baanilwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nio bakhole kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse.
Ne ewe ne basoleeli bowo mucha khukhola kimilimo kie busaayi kiloondekhana ne alutare ne buli siosi siosi sisiili mukari mwe epasia. Namueleesie kimilimo kie busaayi nga siianwa. Ne omundu okundi yesi yesi owicha siimbi alafwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aruni ali, Nakhuelesie biianwa bioosi nibio Baisiraeli bambelesia ese. Bibiindu nibio Baisiraeli banjaulila bioosi nakhuelesie ewe ne basoleeli bowo nga sitonyi sie kumukabwa kwowo elala.
Ebio bilala bibiowo khukhwama khu biindu bitakatifu bikhosebwa tawe. Buli siianwa siabwe, buli siianwa sie siakhulia ne buli siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni; nisio bambelesia siliba sisiowo ne basoleeli bowo.
Wenyekhana oliile bibiindu bino Abuundu Atakatifu. Be siseecha bong'ene bakhaliekho. Okhoyela obibukule khuba bitakatifu.
Khutasa khwako, biianwa bibiindi nibio Baisiraeli bambelesia bicha khuba bibiowo. Ndabielesia ewe, ne babaana bowo be siseecha, nende be siikhaana biise bioosi bibiicha. Buli omundu oli omutakatifu munju mwowo anyala aliakho.
Kamafura kamalayi koosi, ne endali endayi yoosi ne biakhulia ne kamatuunda ke khunyoa niko Baisiraeli bambelesia nakhuele ewe.
Bibiaamo bie khunyoa bili mu mikuunda kiabwe kioosi nibio barera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biliba bibiowo.
Buli siindu siosi mu Isiraeli sisiaebwa khwise sili sisiowo.
Buli omwana omubele namwe esaang'i embele niyo Baisiraeli bacha khumbelesia echa khuba eyowo. Ne kakhali ofukiilile kumuruungo kwe khusikula buli omwana omubele, ne kumuruungo kwe khusikula kwa buli esaang'i embele ekhali endakatifu tawe.
Bibiindu ebio ne babaandu bakhoyela basikulwe ne bali ne bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala. Basikule khulwe kumuruungo kwe bitonyi biraano bie chishekeli che efwesa, khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie Abuundu Atakatifu.
Ne kakhali emoosi embele ne limeeme libele, ne meeme embele, okhachisikula tawe, sikila chili chindakatifu. Ocha khuanya kamalasile kacho khu alutare. Lundi ocha khwosia kamafura kacho nga siianwa sili esilikakha eyisiimisia.
Ne kakhali chinyama chacho chiliba chichenywe nga sitindimilo ne nyama eye sietakho sie lubeka luseecha siaanwe khwinywe.
“Biianwa bioosi bitakatifu nibio Baisiraeli baana, nakhuelesie ewe ne basoleeli bowo, alala ne bakhaana bowo. Nakhuele nga siianwa biise bioosi. Yino eli ndakaano eya chumbe mindali na mindali niyo kholile ne nawe ne lisaaye liowo.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Aruni ali, “Se ocha khubakho ne kumukabwa mu sibala siabwe tawe. Namwe se ocha khubakho ne sitonye siosi siosi mu nibo tawe, Ese niye sitonyi siowo lundi kumukabwa kwowo mu baandu Baisiraeli.”
Ne khukhwama luno khuchiililila, Baisiraeli bakhechakho embi ne liiema lie kumuse tawe, ne busa becha banyoolekhana ne bubwoni mala bafwa.
Ne kakhali Balawi bong'ene bacha khukhola kimilimo mwiiema lie kumuse ne khusuta bubwoni bwe Baisiraeli. Lino lili lilaka lia mindali khu selukho choosi. Balawi se bacha khubakho ne kumukabwa mu Isiraeli tawe.
Sikila nabaeleesie sitonyi sie ekhumi nisio Baisiraeli bambelesia nga siianwa siase. Elio nilio likila ne ndaka ndi se bacha khubakho ne kumukabwa mu Isiraeli tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Lundi olaboolela Balawi oli, ‘Ne munyoola khukhwama khu Baisiraeli siianwa sie ekhumi nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesia enywe, mukhoya murusie siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siianwa esio siikhoya sibe sie ekhumi eye siianwa sie khumi nisio munyoola.
Siianwa sienywe Sicha khuba nga siianwa nisio Omulimi arusia khulwe biakhulia biyaaya ne endali embia khukhwama mwiloo lie khusuuriramo endali.
Nio mwesi mucha khuaanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa khukhwama khu biianwa bioosi bie ekhumi bienywe nibio munyoola khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli, mala khukhwama mu nibio mucha khuaana biianwa bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bino khu musaayi Aruni.
Khukhwama khu biianwa bioosi nibio munyoola, mucha khuaana buli siianwa sisienyekhana siaanwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa silayi khu bioosi nibio munyoola.
Ne mumalile khuaana sitonyi silayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, munyala mwabiikha biramire, nga nilwo omulimi ne abuunga biramire enyuma ne amalile khuaana siianwa siewe.
Ne nono munyala mwalia siramire, enywe ne babaandu be chinju chenywe. Munyala mwalila abuundu osi osi, sikila kuli kumuruungo kwenywe khulwe kimilimo kienywe kie mwiiema lie kumuse.
Se mucha khubakho ne bubwoni ne mulia tawe, ne mumalile khuaanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi silayi. Ne mukhola murio aba se mwanyaalutisie bibiindu bitakatifu bie Baisiraeli tawe. Ne lundi ne mukhola murio se mulafwa tawe.’ ”

Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ne Aruni ali,
“Elesia Baisiraeli lilaka lino: Baboolele bareere ekhaafu emasoti embesemu ekhalikho ne bubi namwe buleme tawe lundi niyo bakharakho lichooki tawe.
Ne balakielesia Omusaayi Eliesa. Omusaayi akirusie enje we ekambi mala bakirire ebweeni wewe.
Nio Omusaayi Eliesa abukule malala khu malasile kayo ne lulwala lwewe aanye ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse khukhwola kamakhabi saba.
Ne emasoti eyo yoosi alala ne lisielo liayo, enyama, kamalasile ne kamala, biosebwe bioosi ebweeni wo omusaayi.
Nio Omusaayi abukule lukhu lwe kumutarakwa, ne lusaala luleeyi ne engubo embesemu eye bufuumbo ne khubimwaata mu mulilo kulikho kukwosia ekhaafu eyo.
Enyuma wako, omusaayi asiinge chingubo chewe, ne khukhwisiinga, nio engile mu kambi, kakhaba kario, omusaayi alaba omunyaalu khukhwola ekolooba.
Omundu owosia ekhaafu akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe ne khukhwisiinga, ne yesi alaba omunyaalu khukhwola ekolooba.
Nio omundu oli omumiliiu acha khubuusia likokhe lie khaafu eyo, ne khulira abuundu ali amiliiu enje we kambi. Ne licha khubikhwa khulwe libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli khurumikhira mu khwing'oonela kameechi ke khukhwinyosiao bubwoni.
Omundu obuusia likokhe akhoya asiinge chingubo chewe, ne aba omunyaalu ario khukhwola ekolooba. Lilaka lino lili ne kamaani mu biise bioosi bibiicha, khulwe Baisiraeli ne baakwa boosi bamenyile ne nabo.
“Yesi yesi otiila khu mufu acha khuba omunyaalu khu ndaalo saba.
Omundu oyo akhoya esiinge endaalo ekhola khataru ne ndaalo eya saba, nio abe omumiliiu. Ne alekha khukhwesiinga endaalo eya khataru ne ndaalo eya saba se acha khuba omumiliiu tawe.
Yesi yesi otiila khu mufu mala alekha khu khwekwalaasia tawe, anyaalutia liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne omundu nga oyo alaulwa khukhwama khu Baisiraeli, sikila kameechi ke khukwalaasia omundu se kamuanyukhekho tawe alaba busa omunyaalu, bunyaalu bwewe bulaba busa khu niye.
“Elino nilio lilaka khuloondekhana ne omundu ofwila mu liiema lie kumuse: Buli yesi yesi oli mwieema namwe owingilamo aba omunyaalu khu ndaalo saba.
Ne buli siindu sili mwiiema sitambakho sifunikho sili sinyaalu.
Yesi yesi oli mu lukoongo mala atiila khu mundu owirirwe ne mbalu namwe ofwiiliile mundaa namwe atiila khu makuumba ko mufu namwe siliindwa, acha khuba omunyaalu khu ndaalo saba.
Khukhwinyosiao bunyaalu buno, likokhe khukhwama khu khaafu emasoti embesemu eyosebwa khulwa siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni licha khubukulwa mala lireebwe mu nyuungu, mala bachukhemo kameechi.
Nio omundu yesi yesi oli omumiliiu alabukula sisiaangu, asisiikhe mu meechi, mala aanye kameechi khwiiema, ne buli khu siindu silimo, ne khu baandu balimo boosi. Aliianya ne khu mundu yesi yesi otiilile khu makuumba ko omufu, namwe omundu owirirwe namwe khu mufu namwe khu siliindwa.
Omundu oli omumiliiu oyo aanye kameechi khu mundu oli omunyaalu, khu ndaalo eya khataru ne eya saba. Khu ndaalo eya saba amusiinge, ne amalile khusiinga chingubo chewe ne khukhwesiinga kameechi, acha khuba omumiliiu ekolooba.
“Ne omundu yesi yesi oli omunyaalu ne se eenya khukhwesiinga tawe acha khwirwa, sikila kameechi ke khukhwisiinga se kamuanyukhekho tawe. Anyaalutia liiema litakatifu lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhoya mwatiila lilaka lino mu biise bioosi bibiicha. Omundu oanya kameechi ke khusiinga bubi akhoya yesi asiinge chingubo chewe. Ne yesi yesi otiila khu meechi acha khuba omunyaalu khukhwola ekolooba.
Siosi siosi nisio omundu omunyaalu atiilakho siba sinyaalu, ne yesi yesi ositilakho arama omunyaalu khukhwola ekolooba.”

Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi boola mu sichiimi sia Sini. Bolayo mu mwesi kwe khunyoa. Bamenya e Kadeshi. Ne Miriamu aafwiila ebweeneyo mala aasiikhwa.
Babaandu se baba ne kameechi tawe. Nio babaandu babuusiana mala bakaluukhana khu Musa ne Aruni.
Babaandu beng'ulung'unya khu Musa bali, “Liakhabeele lilayi efwe khufwa nga bawandaayefwe ne bafwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Siina sikila ne wareera libuusiana lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu sichiimi nio khufwiile muno alala ne bibiaayo biefwe?
Siina sikila ne wakhurusia e Misiri mala wakhureera abuundu butinyu ano? Se alikho abuundu we biakhulia, namwe chinduli namwe chisabibu namwe kamakomanga tawe. Ne kameechi ke khunywa se kalikhoo tawe.”
Ne Musa ne Aruni barura niio babaandu babuusianila bacha ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse. Benama bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila asi. Luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwababonekhela.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Bukula esiimbo mala ewe ne Aruni wandaayo mubuusie babaandu. Boolela lulwanda luli ebweeni wabwe lutubukhe kameechi kalwo. Nio mungila yino ocha khureera kameechi khukhwama mu lwanda khulwe babaandu ne bibiaayo biabwe khunywa.”
Musa abukula esiimbo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Musa ne Aruni babuusia babaandu alala ebweeni we lulwanda, mala Musa aloma ali, “Rekeeresia, enywe bareengu. Khumureerere kameechi khukhwama mu lwanda luno?”
Nio Musa asuta esiimbo mala apa lulwanda khabili, nio kameechi katubukha kamakali mala babaandu boosi ne bibiaayo banywa.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekiicha Musa ne Aruni. Aloma ali, “Enywe se mwaba ne lisuubila khwise tawe. Se mwambelesia lukoosi ebweeni we Baisiraeli nga omutakatifu tawe. Sikila kano se mucha khubarangirira khuboosia mu sibala nisio nabaelesia tawe.”
Kano kali kameechi ke Meriba
Musa aruma barume khukhwama e Kadeshi khu Mwami owa Edomu. Aloma ali, “Bawandaayo Baisiraeli baloma bali: omanyile butinyu bwoosi nibwo khwanyoola.
Mumanyile nga nilwo bakuuka befwe bacha e Misiri, niyo khwamenya e Misiri kimiiko kimikali. Bamisiri bakhupia sibi ne bakuuka befwe.
Ne khwalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhuyeeta. Wele aulila khulila khwefwe mala akhurumira malaika, owakhurusia e Misiri. Luno luri khuli e Kadeshi, lukoba luli embi ne lulwakha lwe sibala siowo.
Nono khufukiilile khubire mu sibala siowo. Se khulabirira mu mikuunda kienywe namwe mu misabibu kienywe tawe. Se kane khunywe kameechi khukhwama mu sebele tawe. Khucha khuloonda khu muyila kumuboofu ne se khucha khwaukhakho tawe khukhwola nga ne khucha khurura mu sibala siowo.”
Ne kakhali omwami owa Edomu abakobosia ali, “Se mulabirira muno tawe. Mwakhola murio khucha khumwibwaakala.”
Babaandu ba Isiraeli baloma bali, “khucha khubirira khu muyila kumuboofu. Ne kaaba bali efwe namwe bibiaayo biefwe khunywa khu meechi kenywe, khucha khuruunga. Khulekhe khubire busa khu bikele.”
Ne kakhali omwami owa Edomu abakobosia ali, “Se mucha khubirira ano tawe.” Nio babaandu ba Edomu barura bakali ne banamae be kamaani khukhwibwaakala babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Mungila yino Baedomu se bafukiilila Baisiraeli khubirira mu sibala siabwe tawe. Baisiraeli bakobolayo bachila khu ngila ekiindi.
Babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli barura e Kadeshi mala boola khu sikulu sia Hori,
sisiili siimbi ne lulwakha lwa Edomu. Ebweeneyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Musa ne Aruni. Ababoolela ali,
“Aruni se acha khwingila mu sibala nisio ndaelesia Baisiraeli tawe. Acha khufwa sikila mwembi mwaloba lilaka liase e Meriba.
Bukula Aruni ne omusoleeli wewe Eliesa mala obarere khu sikulu sia Hori.
Ebweeneyo, fuula Aruni chingubo chewe che busaayi mala afware Eliesa. Aruni acha khufwila ebweeneyo.”
Musa akhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka. Baniina khu sikulu sia Hori Baisiraeli boosi ne ba baloleleele.
Ne Musa afuula Aruni chingubo che busaayi ne khufwara Eliesa. Aruni afwila ebweeneyo khu sikulu. Ne Musa ne Eliesa bekha khukhwama khu sikulu.
Ne babaandu boosi nga bamanya bali Aruni afwiile, bamulila khu ndaalo kamakhumi kataru.

Ne Baisiraeli bechuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Kaaba bali ocha khukhunyalila khuule babaandu bano, aba khucha khubunisila elala
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila Baisiraeli mala ara Bakanaani mu bunyali bwabwe. Nio Baisiraeli babunia Bakanaani boosi alala ne chingoba chabwe. Nio lisina lie abuundu ao lialaangwa bali Horima.
Mala babaandu baloma kamabi khu Wele ne Musa. Beng'ulung'unya bali, “Siina sikila ne mwakhurusia Misiri nio khufwiile mu sichiimi sino? Siakhulia namwe kameechi se biliio tawe. Ne khwabiile siakhulia siikhali ne bukhala sino tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma chindemu che buchiba mu baandu. Chaluma babaandu ba Isiraeli mala bakali mu nibo bafwa.
Babaandu bacha khu Musa mala baloma bali, “Khwakholile bubwoni sikila khwalomalome kamabi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne nawe. Saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhwinyosieo chindemu chino.” Nio Musa aasabila babaandu.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa khukhola endemu eye kumukasa mala akira khu lukuulo, nio yesi yesi niye endemu yaluma ne akalama alola endemu eye kumukasa aona.
Nio Musa akhola endemu eye kumukasa mala akira khu lukuulo. Omundu yesi yesi niye yaba endemu eluma aalolanga khu ndemu eye kumukasa ne aona.
Baisiraeli bacha baapa ekambi a Oboti.
Enyuma we khukhwama Oboti, baapa ekambi e Iye-abarimu, mu sichiimi siloleelela e bukwe we sibala sie Bamoabu.
Khukhwama ao barekukha mala baapa ekambi mwitooma lia Sereti.
Khukhwama ao bacha baapa ekambi lubeka luluundi lwa Arinoni, mu sichiimi Sicha mu sibala sie Baamori. (Arinoni yaba lulwakha akari we Bamoabu ne Baamoni,)
Lino likila Sitabu sie kamae ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne siloma sili:
“Lukoba lwe Bahebu mu Sufa,
ne mu matooma ka Arinoni,
ne khu ndeelwa khwe kamatooma,
lucha khukhwola e Ari,
ne khuchiililila khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Moabu.”
Khukhwama ao bachiililila bola abuundu alaangwa bali Beeri. Abwenao niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Buusia babaandu alala, nja khubaelesia kameechi.”
Mu siise esio babaandu ba Isiraeli bemba kumwenya kuno:
“Tubukha kameechi,
ee esebele, kimbile!
Esebele niyo babaami balima,
niyo babaandu be fuma be babaandu bakhola,
ne esiimbo eye bubwami alala ne chisiimbo chabwe.”
Ne khukhwama mu sichiimi bacha e Matana.
Khukhwama ao bacha boola e Nahalieli ne khukhwama Nahalieli khukhwola Banoti,
ne khukhwama Banoti khukhwola mwitooma mu sibala sie Bamoabu, khu ngaaki khwe sikulu sia Pisika, sisialoleelela sisiangalaamwe.
Nio babaandu ba Isiraeli baruma barume khu mwami owe Sihoni Baamoni. Bamuboolela bali,
“Khulekhe khubirire mu sibala siowo. Se khucha khwinyokha khumuyila khwingile mu mikuunda namwe mu misabibu tawe. Lundi se khucha khunywakho kameechi khukhwama mu sebele chowo tawe. Khucha khuba busa khu ngila emboofu khukhwola ne khucha khurura mu sibala siowo.”
Ne kakhali Sihoni se afukiilila babaandu ba Isiraeli khubirira mu sibala siewe tawe. Abuusia banamae bewe arura acha e Yahasi mu sichiimi mala ebwaakala Baisiraeli.
Ne Baisiraeli bera Sihoni mwiie ne khubukula sibala siewe khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Arinoni khukhwola Yaboki. Se batuma lulwakha lwe Baamoni e Yaseri tawe sikila lwaba lusire.
Baisiraeli babukula chingoba che Baamoni mala bachimenyamo. Bamenya akhaba mu Heshiboni ne birekere bialwo bioosi.
Heshiboni lwaba lukoba lwo mwami Sihoni owe Baamoni. Sihoni apana liie no mwami we khaale owa Moabu mala abukula sibala siewe sioosi khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Arinoni.
Elio nilio likila babeembi ne bemba bali,
“Yiicha e Heshiboni, lekha lwombakhwe lundi,
lekha lukoba lwa Sihoni lwimikhwe.
enjaso khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Sihoni,
yabunia lukoba lwa Ari mu Moabu,
babaami be bikulu bia Arinoni.
Akhoo, Moabu!
Mwabuna, ee baandu ba Chemoshi!
Chemoshi alekhile babaana bewe be siseecha,
khuuba babeluukhe mwiie.
Ne bakooko bewe khutiilwa mu mbaambe ne omwami Sihoni owa Amori.
Nio lisaaye liabwe liabuna,
khukhwama Heshiboni khukhwola Diboni,
khwonaka sibala khukhwola nga kumulilo kwola Meteba.”
Nio babaandu ba Isiraeli bamenya mu sibala sie Baamori.
Ne Musa aaruma babaandu bakhola buyooti khu lukoba lwa Yaseri mala babukula birekere bialwo nio Baamori batibia bumenyo bwabwe.
Baisiraeli bakobola baloonda engila echa Bashani. Ne Oku omwami owa Bashani arura ne banamae bewe boosi becha khu khupana liie e Etrei.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Okhamuria tawe. Ndakhua kamaani ke khumuula niye ne babaandu bewe boosi, ne sibala siewe. Mukhole nga nilwo wakhola Sihoni, omwami owe Baamori owamenyanga e Heshiboni.”
Nio Baisiraeli bera Oki ne basoleeli bewe ne babaandu bewe boosi. Se balekhakho omundu akhaba mulala tawe. Nio babukula sibala siewe.

Baisiraeli bacha mala baapa ekambi mu siangalaamwe sia Moabu ebweeni wa Yoritani, e Yeriko.
Ne Balaki okhwa Sipori, abona koosi niko Baisiraeli bakholela Baamori.
Bamoabu baria lukali sikila Baisiraeli baba bakali.
Bamoabu baboolela babemeelesi be Bamidiani bali, “Sipupu siboofu sino luno Sicha khu bukula buli siindu siili siimbi nafwe, nga euunwa ne yaya bunyaasi mu mayilwe.” Balaki aba omwami owa Moabu mu siise esio.
Aruma barume khulaanga Balamu okhwa Beori, owaba ne ali Petiori embi ne luluuchi lwa Efurati mu sibala sia Amawa. Amuboolela ali, “Lola, babaandu barurire e Misiri. Bali bakali lukali, ne bamenyile embi ne nase.
Nono yiicha luno mala undaamile babaandu bano sikila bali ne kamaani lukali khukhila ese. Nio wakana khola ndio nabaula ne khubatimania khurura mu sibala. Manyile ndi yesi yesi niye obiita chikhabi aba ne khabi, ne oyo niye olaama alaamwa.”
Nio basaakhulu be Bamoabu nende be Bamidiani babukula kumuruungo khulwe bulakusi. Bacha khu Balamu, mala bamuelesia burume bwa Balaki.
Balamu ababoolela ali, “Kona ano silo sia luno, ne kumuchuli nja khumuboolela liosi liosi nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamboolela.” Nio babaami ba Moabu bekhala ne Balamu.
Wele echa khu Balamu mala areeba ali, “Baandu siina bali ne nawe bano?”
Balamu aboolela Wele ali, “Omwami owa Moabu, Balaki okhwa Sipori, arumanie khwise. Aloma ali,
‘Babaandu bakali lukali bechile khukhwama e Misiri. Nono yiicha undaamile babaandu bano. Wakana khola ndio nanyala khu khupana ne nabo mala nabatimania.’ ”
Wele aboolela Balamu ali, “Okhachakho ne babaandu bano tawe. Okhalaama babaaandu bano tawe, sikila bali ba babiitwa chikhabi.”
Nio Balamu enyokha makhelebeende mala aboolela babemeelesi ba Balaki ali, “Kobola mu sibala sienywe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alobile khukhufukiilila enje ne nanywe.”
Nio babemeelesi bakobola khu Balaki mala bamuboolela bali, “Balamu alobile khukhwicha ne nafwe.”
Nio Balaki aruma lundi babemeelesi babaandi bakalikho, lundi be lukoosi khukhila babanyoa.
Becha khu Balamu mala bamuboolela bali, “Balaki aloma ali, ‘Siindu siosi siosi siikhakhukhiingilila khukhwicha khwise tawe.
Ng'ali nja khu khuruunga kumuruungo kumuboofu lukali. Ne siosi siosi nisio umboolela ndakhola. Nosiima yiicha mala undaamile babaandu bano.’ ”
Ne kakhali Balamu abakobosia ali, “Akhaba bali Balaki ambelesia enju yewe eyichuule efwesa ne esahabu, se nja khuloma liosi liosi likhali lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase tawe.
Ne nemusiima khemukone, ano silo sino siosi nio manye liliindi liosi liosi nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala aba ne amboolela.”
Ne silo esio Wele echa khu Balamu ne aloma ali, “Babaandu bano baaba ne bechile khukhulaanga ewe yinyokha oche ne nabo. Ne kakhali ocha khukhola ako niko ekhuboolela kong'ene.”
Nio Balamu enyokha kumutikhinyi aniina khu punda yewe, mala acha ne babemeelesi ba Moabu.
Ne kakhali Wele aaba ne lirima sikila Balamu acha. Ne malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eema ebweeni wa Balamu nga omusiku wewe. Balamu aba khu punda ne bakholi bewe babili baba ne naye.
Epunda yabona malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emile khu ngila aatilile embalu. Nio yalekha engila yaukha yacha mundaa. Balamu apa epunda khukikobosia khu ngila.
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eema khu ngila enyelele akari we kimikuunda kibili kie kimisabibu kikiaba ne lisiisi buli lubeka.
Nga epunda ne yabona malaika, yacha yeminila khwisiisi mala yang'uurirakho sikele sia Balamu. Balamu apa epunda lundi.
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha ebweeni eema abuundu e sibaanga sitiiti niio bubwangu bukhali bwe khukhwaukha tawe chimbeka chombi.
Ne nga epunda yabona malaika, yakona asi. Balamu aba ne lirima mala apila epunda esiimbo yewe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaelesia epunda bunyali bwe khulomaloma, mala yareeba Balamu eli, “Khukholele siina sikila ne ukhupa kamakhabi kataru kano?”
Balamu akobosia ali, “Sikila wanjinyayile. Abanga mba ne mbalu, andi khwirire.”
Epunda yakobosia Balamu eli, “Ese sendi epunda niyo otimilangakho mu bulamu bwowo bwoosi khukhwola luno? Kholanga endio ku?” Balamu aloma ali “Tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Balamu abona malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emile ebweeni ne mbalu yewe, mala Balamu enama asi khwiloba bubweeni bwetiila asi.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, “Sikila siina ne upile epunda yowo kamakhabi kataru kano? Lola nechile khukhiingilila ewe, sikila khucha khwowo khuli khumayaanu.
Epunda yowo yimbone mala yaukha kamakhabi kataru kano. Abanga se yinjaukhekho tawe, andi nakhwirire mala ndekha epunda.”
Balamu akobosia malaika ali, “Nakholile bumayaanu, se manyile ndi ewe wemile khungila wakhiingilile tawe. Nono lili libi khwiwe ese khuchiililila, nja khukobola engo.”
Ne malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Balamu ali, “Cha ne babaandu bano, ne lomaloma nilio khuboolela liong'ene.” Nio Balamu acha ne babemeelesi ba Balaki.
Balaki nga ne aulila bali Balamu alikho echa, acha amwakaanila mu lukoba lwa Ari, mu sibala sia Moabu. Bakaanana khu ndulo khwe lulwakha lwa Moabu.
Balaki areeba Balamu ali, “Se narumania bakhulange? Siina sikila ne okhecha nga ne nakhulaanga tawe? Webaasia oli se nyala nakhua kumuruungo tawe?”
Balamu amukobosia ali, “Nechile. Ne kakhali ndi na bunyali siina bwe khuloma liosi liosi? Nja khuloma niko Wele amboolela khuloma kong'ene.”
Nio Balamu acha ne Balaki. Boola e Kiriati-husoti.
Balaki eera chimbosio che chikhaafu ne kamakheese mala aelesia chinyama Balamu ne babemeelesi ba baaba ne naye.
Bwasia kumutikhinyi Balaki abukula Balamu amuniinia khu Bamoti-Baali nio Balamu anyala khubona babaandu ba Isiraeli ba baaba siimbi.

Balamu aboolela Balaki ali, “Njombakhile anano chi alutare saba, mala underere anano chiuunwa saba ne kamamiiku saba.”
Balaki akhola nga ne bamuboolela. Ne Balamu ne Balaki baana euunwa ne limiiku buli khu alutare.
Nio Balamu aboolela Balaki ali, “Yiima siimbi ne siianwa siowo sie khukhwosia, ne ese ndacha. Wakana ndakaanana ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne liosi liosi nilio acha khunjekesia kane khuboolele.” Nio Balamu waniina yeng'ene khu ngaaki khwe sikulu.
Wele akaanana ne Balamu. Balamu amuboolela ali, “Narekeekhe chi alutare saba ne naanile euunwa ne limiiku buli khu alutare.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Balamu nilio enyekhana alome. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali kobola khu Balaki mala omuboolele burume buno.
Nio Balamu akobolayo anyoola Balaki ne asimanga busa a siianwa siewe sie khukhwosia, alala ne babemeelesi boosi ba Moabu.
Balamu alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Khukhwama Aramu omwami Balaki anderire,
omwami owa Moabu khukhwama e bikulu bie ebukwe.
‘Yiicha undaamile babaandu ba Yakobo.’
‘Ne yiicha undafwirire Isiraeli’
Nyala ndiena nalaama
babaandu nibo Wele akhalaamile tawe?
Nyala ndiena narafwira
babaandu nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akharafwiirire tawe?
Sikila khukhwama khu ngaaki khwe lukulu, nababoone.
Khukhwama khu bikulu nababoone;
naboone babaandu bamenyile bong'ene,
bebaasia bali baabukhana ne chikholo chichiindi!
Naanu onyala abala babaandu ba Isiraeli?
Namwe khubala e roho eye babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Lekha efwe lifwa lio omuluungi,
ne lekha maliilisie nga nibo!”
Nio Balaki areeba Balamu ali, “Siina nisio ukholile sino? Nakhureerire undaamile basiku base, ne koosi niko okholile khuli khubabiita chikhabi.”
Balamu akobosia ali, “Se nenyekhana mbe omurekeerefu ndome niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andakho ndome kong'ene tawe ku?”
Nio Balaki aboolela Balamu ali, “Bira khuche fwembi lubeka luluundi niio onyala wababonela. Olabona Baisiraeli bali siimbi bong'ene, ne se olababona boosi tawe. Ndaamile khukhwama elubeka lwenolwo.”
Balaki amuyila mu mukuunda kwa Sofimu khu lukulu lwa Pisika. Ebweeneyo ombakhayo chi alutare saba ne khuana euunwa ndala ne limiiku lilala khu buli alutare.
Balamu aboolela Balaki ali, “Yiima a siianwa siowo sie khukhwosia, ese nja khwakaanana ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyeyo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaanana ne Balamu, mala amuboolela nilio enyekhana alome. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali kobola khu Balaki mala omuboolele burume buno.
Nio akobolayo anyoola Balaki asimaanga niio siianwa siewe sie khukhwosia sili. Ne babemeelesi ba Moabu baba alala ne naye. Balaki amureeba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali siina?”
Mala Balamu alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Yinyokha Balaki mala oulile,
ndekeresie, ee okhwa Sipori:
Wele se ali omundu tawe, ne se abea tawe,
se ali omundu tawe, ne se anyala akaluukhasia chinganakani tawe,
siosi siosi nisio aloma ali akhola, asikhola;
siosi siosi nisio alaka siikholekha.
Nanyoola lilaka khubabiita chikhabi,
ne Wele ne abiita chikhabi,
se nyala nachirusiao tawe.
Wele se aboone bumayaanu mu baandu ba Yakobo tawe,
se abona kamabi mu Isiraeli tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe ali ne nabo,
ne bafumia Wele oli Omwami wabwe.
Wele abarusia khukhwama e Misiri,
bali ne kamaani nga emboongo.
Mbao bubacha bunyala bwekholekha,
khu baandu ba Isiraeli,
namwe bulakusi buunyala bwabeekholekhakho tawe.
Luno babaandu bacha khuloma khu Isiraeli bali,
‘Lola niko Wele akholeele Isiraeli!’
Baisiraeli benyokha nga etalang'i ekhasi,
lundi nga etalang'i eseecha,
se ekona asi tawe, khukhwola nga ne elia siakhulia siayo,
lundi khukhwola nga ne enywa kamafuki ke siifwiile.”
Nio Balaki aboolela Balamu ali, “Okhabalaama namwe wababiita chikhabi tawe.”
Ne kakhali Balamu akobosia Balaki ali, “Se nakhuboolela ndi koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma nenyekhana ekhole?”
Balaki aboolela Balamu ali, “yiicha khuyile abuundu aandi. Wakana Wele anyala akhufukiilila ewe wandaamila ba Isiraeli khukhwama ebweeneyo.”
Nio Balaki aayila Balamu khu ngaaki khwe sikulu sia Peori sisialoleelela sisiangalaamwe.
Balamu amuboolela ali, “Njombakhile anano chi alutare saba mala underere chiuunwa saba ne kamamiiku saba.”
Balaki akhola nga ne bamuboolele mala waana euunwa ne limiiku buli khu alutare.

Balamu amanya ali liasimiisie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubiita Baisiraeli chikhabi. Nio se aniina acha khuyima kakaandi nga ne akholilenge mu khunyoa tawe. Ne kakhali aloleelela e sichiimi.
Balamu alola mala abona babaandu ba Isiraeli bakholile chikambi khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe. Nio Roho owa Wele amwichakho,
mala alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Burume bwa Balamu okhwa Beori,
burume bwo omundu oobona bulayi,
burume bwo omundu oulila chilomo cha Wele,
oobona buloli bwa Wele, Owe Bunyali Bwoosi,
akwa asi ebweeni wa Wele,
ne kakhali se afunyikha chimoni chewe tawe.
Kamaeema ke Baisiraeli kali kamamiliiu lukali!
Akhaba chikambi chenywe, Ee Isiraeli.
Bili nga kamatooma kamabalaayi,
nga biluundu biili khu luuchi,
nga kumurongooro kukwabiaalwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
namwe nga kimitarakwa kie khu ndulo khwe sebele.
Kameechi kakheekhe khukhwama khu ndoo che Baisiraeli,
ne bibiaamo biabwe bilinyoola kameechi kamakali,
omwami wabwe aliba omukali khukhila Akaki,
ne bubwami bwewe bulikaliia.
Wele abarusia khukhwama e Misiri,
alibapanila nga emboongo,
balitabulaka basiku babwe,
balifunaka kamakuumba kabwe mu bitonyi tonyi,
ne khubalasa ne buembo bwewe.
nga etalang'i ekhasi, nanu onyala abenyosia?
Ali ne ekhabi oobabiita chikhabi,
ne alaamwe yesi yesi omulaama.”
Balaki aambila Balamu lirima mala afumbara bifuusi biewe mala aboolela Balamu ali, “Nakhulaanga undaamile basiku base, ne lola kamakhabi kataru kano ewe wababiitile chikhabi.
Nono khwako yilukha oche engo. Naloma ndi, ‘Khakhuruunge.’ Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekale kumuruungo kwowo.”
Balamu akobosia Balaki ali, “Se naboolela barume nibo waruma khwise ndi,
wakhamba enju yowo eyichuulemo efwesa ne esahabu, se enyala nakhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhenya tawe. Se enyala nakhola libi namwe lilayi mu lienya liase samwene tawe. Nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma nilio ese ndomaloma.”
“Nono ndikho ngobolayo khu baandu base. Nono nenya khukhumanyisia niko babaandu ba Isiraeli bacha khukhola khu baandu bowo mu biise bibiicha.”
Nio alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Burume bwa Balamu okhwa Beori,
burume bwo omundu obona bulayi,
burume bwo omundu oulila chilomo cha Wele,
lundi onyoola limanya lie owe Angaaki Lukali,
obona kamalola ka Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.
Aakwa asi ebweeni wa Wele,
ne kakhali se afunyikha chimoni chewe tawe.
Naboone, omundu oliicha,
ne kakhali aliicha mu biise biikhali bie aembi tawe.
Eng'enieesi echa khwinyokhela mu kholo eya Yakobo,
omwami aliama mu Isiraeli,
alitubundula babemeelesi ba Moabu,
ne khubunia lisaaye lia Seti lioosi.
Sibala sia Edomu siliiulwa,
basiku ba Isiraeli Baedomu baliulwa,
ne kakhali Baisiraeli bakhaindiaale.
Omwami aliama mu kholo eya Yakobo,
ne alibunia abo balirama mu lukoba!”
Nio Balamu mu malola kewe abona Baamaleki mala alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Ekholo eya Amaleki yaba eye kamaani khukhila chikholo choosi,
ne kakhali ekhumaliilikha echa khubunila elala.”
Balamu alola Bakenayi, mala alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Abuundu niio omenyile ali e kumuleembe,
ali e kumuleembe nga siswi siili mwibaale.
Ne kakhaba kario Bakenayi mucha khubuna,
Baashuru bakhamubukule muche mu mbaambe.”
Balamu alomaloma bung'oosi buno:
“Naanu onyala amenya Wele ne akhola kano?
Ne chimeeli chiliicha khukhwama Kitimu,
ne chiliiula Ashuru ne Eberi,
ne bosi balibuna.”
Nio Balamu enyokha mala akobola engo, ne Balaki yesi acha engila yewe.

Baisiraeli nga ne baba e Sitimu barakikha sifwaabi ne bakhasi Bamoabu.
Bakhasi bano babalanga khu naikara eye khukhola embosio khu bawele babwe. Baisiraeli balia biakhulia mala basaaya bawele babwe.
Nio Baisiraeli barakikha khusaaya Baali, Wele owa Peori. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Isiraeli lirima.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Bukula babemeelesi ba Isiraeli be bueeyani boosi mala mubasuunge kumuusi nio lirima liase liwe khu Baisiraeli.”
Musa aboolela bakhalaki ba Isiraeli ali, “Buli mulala khwinywe eere babaandu bewe ba basaaya Baali owa Peori.”
Ne omundu mulala owa Isiraeli areera omukhasi Omumidiani munju yewe, ebweeni wa Musa ne ebweeni we libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli lioosi. Baisiraeli baba balikho balilila a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse.
Fineasi okhwa Eliesa, omwichukhulu owo omusaayi Aruni nga abona ario. Enyokha alekha kumuse acha abukula lifumo liewe.
Aloonda khu mundu owa Isiraeli oyo khukhwola mwieema. Abauna lifumo boombi. Nio bulwaale bwakama mu Baisiraeli.
Ne kakhaba kario babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili na chine bafwa khulwe bulwaale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Fineasi okhwa Eliesa, omwichukhulu owo omusaayi Aruni akholile lirima liase liaweele khu Baisiraeli. Abiila bumayaanu nga samwene, akila nalekha khukhwira Baisiraeli mu lirima liase.
Nono boolela Fineasi oli ndakhola endakaano eye kumuleembe ne naye.
Endakaano yino echa khuba khu niye ne lisaaye liewe, enyuma wewe. Baliba basaayi khulwa mindali sikila Fineasi ayiimila Wele wewe lukoosi, mala Wele aabeela Baisiraeli.”
Lisina lio Omuisiraeli owerwa ne omukhasi Mumidiani liaba Simuri okhwa Salu. Aba omwimeelesi wenju eye ekholo eya Simioni.
Ne lisina lio omukhasi Omumidiani liaba Kosibi. Aba omukhaana owa Suri owaba omwimeelesi owe enju ndala eye Bamidiani.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Biila Bamidiani mala obeere,
sikila Bamidiani bamukholela bubi nga ne bamubea e Peori. Lundi bakhole murio sikila bamubiila enywe sikila lifwa lia Kosibi omukhaana owo mwimeelesi owa Midiani owerwa khu ndaalo eye bulwaale bubwaba Peori.”

“Bali libuusiana lioosi lie babaandu ba Isiraeli khukhwama khu bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakho. Babale khuloondekhana ne chinju che bapaapa babwe banyala bacha mwiie.”
Musa ne Eliesa balomaloma ne babaandu khu siangalaamwe sia Moabu khu luuchi lwa Yoritani mu Yeriko. Bababoolela bali,
bala babaandu khukhwama khu bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili khuchiililila nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa. Abano nibo babaandu ba Isiraeli babama mu sibala sia Misiri:
Lisaaye lia Rubeni (Rubeni aba okhwa Yakobo omubele) yabalwa. Khukhwama khu Hanoki yamamo ekholo eye Baanaki. Khukhwama khu Palu yamamo ekholo eye Bapalu.
Hesironi, arusia ekholo eye Bahesironi ne Karimi arusia ekholo eye Bakarimi.
Lisaaye lie Barubeni liabalwa liola babaandu chielefu arubaine na tatu ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi kataru.
Omusoleeli owa Palu aba Eliabu
ne babaana ba Eliabu be siseecha baba Nemueli, Tatani, ne Abiramu. Tatani ne Abiramu baba babemeelesi be babaandu bayingania Musa ne Aruni mala baloonda khu Kora nga ne aukha khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Liloba liasama mala liabamila ne Kora. Bafwa khu siise silala ne babaandu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano ba babunisibwa ne kumulilo. Babaandu abo nga ne bafwa, baba likaania khu baandu.
Ne kakhali ba okhwa Kora se bafwa tawe.
Ne lisaaye lia Simioni khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba: Nemueli, Yamini, Yakini,
Sera, ne Shauli.
Lisaaye lino liabalwa liola babaandu chielefu ishirini na mbili ne chimia chibili.
Lisaaye lia Kati khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba lisaaye lia Sefoni, Haki, Shuni;
Osini, Eri,
Aroti, ne Areli.
Khukhwama munju cha Kati chino babaandu ba babalwa baba chielefu kamakhumi kane, ne chimia chiraano.
Ba okhwa Yuda baba Eri ne Onani. Eri ne Onani bafwila mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Ne be kholo eya Yuda khuloondekhana ne lisaaye liabwe baba: lisaaye lia Shela, Peresi, ne Sera.
Be nju eya Peresi, baba Hesironi, ne Hamuli.
Boosi baba babaandu boola chielefu sabini na sita, ne chimia chiraano.
Lisaaye lia Isakari: khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba lisaaye lia Dola, Puba,
Yashubu, ne Shimuroni.
Chino nicho chichabalwa. Boosi baba babaandu chielefu sitini naine ne chimia chitaru.
Lisaaye lia Sebuluni khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba: lisaaye lia Sereti, Eloni, ne Yaileeli.
Boosi baba babaandu chielefu kamakhumi sita ne chimia chiraano.
Babaana ba Yosefu baba Manase ne Efuraimu.
Lisaaye lia Manase yabamo, Makiri, Makiri aba paapa owa Kileati, niye chikholo che Bakileati bakukhakho.
Lisaaye lia Kileati liaba Yeseri Heleki,
Asirieli, Shekemu,
Shemita, ne Heferi.
Nono Selofehadi okhwa Heferi se abakho ne babaana be siseecha tawe, ne bakhali bakhaana bong'ene. Kamasina kabwe kaba, Maila, Noa, Hokila, Milika, ne Tirisa.
Abo nibo baba lisaaye lia Manase. Boosi baba babaandu chielefu khamusini na mbili ne chimia saba.
Elino nilio lisaaye lia Efuraimu: lisaaye lia Shutela, Bekeri, ne Tahani.
Lisaaye lia Erani liakukha khu Shutela.
Elino nilio lisaaye lia Yosefu. Boosi baba chielefu kamakhumi kataru na chibili, ne chimia chiraano.
Lisaaye lia Benjamini khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe baba: lisaaye lia Bela, Asibeli, Ahiramu,
Shefufamu, ne Hufamu.
Luya lwa Bela lwabamo Ariti ne Naamani.
Abo nibo baba lisaaye lia Bela. Boosi baba babaandu chielefu arubaine na tano ne chimia sita.
Lisaaye lia Dani liabamo luuya lwa Siulamu,
lulwabalwa lwabamo babaandu chielefu sitini naine ne chimia chine.
Lisaaye lia Asieri liaba: lisaaye lia Imuna, Isibi, ne Beria,
Luya lwa Beria lwabamo Heberi ne Malikieli.
Asieri aba ne omukhaana bali Sera.
Lisaaye lia Asieri lioosi liaba babaandu chielefu khamusini na tatu ne chimia chine.
Lisaaye lia Nafutali khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe liaba: lisaaye lia Yaiseeli, Kuni,
Yeseri, ne Shilemu.
Elio nilio lisaaye lia Nafutali. Boosi baba babaandu chielefu arubaine na tano ne chimia chine.
Babaandu Baisiraeli boosi nga babalwa baba chielefu chimia sita na endala ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi kataru.
“Khu bano kamaloba kalikabwa khuloondekhana ne chikholo.
Khu kholo eli engali ocha khukikaba kumukabwa kumukali. Ne ekholo engeekhe ocha khukikaba kumukabwa kumukeekhe, buli ekholo khuloondekhana ne bukali bwayo.
Ne kakhali, kamaloba kakabwa khulwe khukhupa ekura. Baandu banyoole kamaloba khuloondekhana ne chikholo che bakuuka babwe.
Kumukabwa kwabwe kucha khukabwa khuloondekhana ne ekura, akari we bukali ne bukeekhe bwabwe.”
Abano nibo Balawi ba babalwa khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe: lisaaye lia Kerishoni, Koati, ne Merari.
Abano bosi baba lisaaye lia Lawi: lisaaye lia Balibuna, Baeburoni, Bamaili, Bamusi ne Bakora. Koati aaba raraawe owa Amuramu.
Omukhasi owa Amuramu aba Yakobeti, omukhaana owa Lawi. Lawi amusaala ne ali e Misiri. Yokebeti asaalila Amuramu babaana bataru, Aruni ne Musa, ne omukooko wabwe Miriamu.
Ne Aruni aba ne babaana be siseecha bane, Natabu, Abihu, Eliesa, ne Itamari.
Ne kakhali Natabu ne Abihu bafwa nga ne baana kumulilo kukhali kumutakatifu tawe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaana be siseecha Balawi ba baaba be bukhulu bwe kumwesi mulala namwe khukhilakho baba chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chitaru. Babalwa bong'ene khukhwama khu Baisiraeli babaandi, sikila se babakabakho kumukabwa kwe kamaloba kosi kosi mu Isiraeli tawe.
Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa babala babaandu bano boosi. Baababalila khu siangalaamwe sia Moabu siimbi ne luluuchi lwa Yoritani e Yeriko.
Ne kakhali mbao omundu yesi yesi owalekhwa mu nibo tawe. Musa ne omusaayi Aruni bamala khubala mu khunyoa mu sichiimi sia Sinai tawe.
Khu nibo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Boosi bacha khufwila mu sichiimi,” Se aaramakho omundu akhaba mulala tawe ne akhali Kalebu okhwa Yefune ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni.

Mahila Noa, Hokila, Milika ne Tirisa, baba bakhaana ba Selofehadi becha siimbi. Selofehadi aba okhwa Heferi, omwichukhulu owa Kileati, lundi sisoni sia Makiri, okhwa Manase. Manase aba okhwa Yosefu.
Beema ebweeni wa Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa, ne babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi. Beema ebweeni we a muliango kwe liiema lie kumuse mala baloma bali,
“Paapa wefwe afwila mu sichiimi. Se aba mulala khwaabo ba babuusiana alala ne Kora khulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Niye afwa khulwe bumayaanu bwewe omwene. Ne se aba ne babaana be sisoleeli tawe.
Lisina lia paapa wefwe lilatiba sikila se aba ne babaana be siseecha tawe. Khuelesie efwe kumukabwa mu balebe bapaapa wefwe.”
Musa ayila kamalilo kabwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Nilio bakhaana ba Selofehadi benya lili lia ng'ali. Baelesie kumukabwa mu balebe ba rarawabwe. Lekha kumukabwa kwa rarawabwe kuche khu nibo.
Boolela Baisiraeli oli, omundu yesi yesi nafwa ne akhalikho ne omwana owe siseecha tawe, omwana wewe owe siikhaana anyala ela khu miaandu kiewe.
Ne aba ne akhali ne omwana owe siikhaana tawe, bawandaaye ba raraawe okundi banyala bela khu miaandu.
Ne aba ne akhalikho ne bawandaaye ba raraawe okundi tawe, bawandaaye ba raraawe banyala bela khu miaandu.
Ne raraawe aba ne akhali ne bawandaaye tawe, elesia kimiaandu omulebe owe aembi mu bulebe. Babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhoya balibukule likhuwa lino nga lilaka lilienyibwa, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.”
Ne omalile khu sibona, ocha khufwa, nga wandaayo Aruni ne afwa.
Olafwa sikila waleka lilaka liase mu sichiimi sia Sini. Nga babaandu boosi ne bakholela situluungu emeechi ka Meriba mwaloba khunjokesia ese nga omutakatifu ebweeni wabwe.” (Meriba luli luluuchi luli e Kadeshi mu sichiimi sia Sini.)
Musa asaba ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe chiroho che babaandu boosi, robora, omundu onyala emeelela babaandu bano.
Robora omundu onyala abemeelela mu buli siindu nio babaandu bowo balekhe khuba nga kamakheese kakhali ne omwaayi tawe.”
Mwimisie ebweeni wo musaayi Eliesa ne babaandu boosi, mala omure khu milimo ebweeni wabwe.
Muelesiekho bunyali bwowo, nio babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli bamurie.
Acha khwima ebweeni womusaayi Eliesa. Eliesa acha khunyoola bukambisi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu khurumikhira Urimu ne Tumimu.
Musa akhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka. Abukula Yoshua mala amukhola eema ebweeni we omusaayi Eliesa, ne libuusiana lioosi.
Musa ara kamakhono kewe khu murwe kwa Yoshua mala amura khu milimo nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Laka Baisiraeli oli, ‘siianwa khwise sie biakhulia khulwe khukhwosia, sisiimisia siikhoya siaanwe khwise mu biise bibienyekhana.’
Ebino bili biianwa bie khukhwosia nibio mukhoya mwaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi: kamameeme kabili ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala kakhalikho ne butekhele tawe. Aana buli endaalo nga siianwa sia buli lwosi.
Aana limeeme lilala kumutikhinyi ne likhola khabili ekolooba.
Aana lundi buli silala khwikhumi sie siianwa sie bufu siikula silala, butubaanisibwe ne kamafura echuupa endala ke kumusabibu.
Sino sili siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi nisio sisiarebwao sibeo khu sikulu sia Sinai. Siianwa sino sili sie khukhwosia nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aana siianwa sie khunywa echuupa endala khu buli limeeme. Mulisichukha Abuundu Atakatifu siianwa sie khunywa sie ndali endulu.
Ekolooba aana limeeme likhola khabili. Liaane bulayi bwene nga siianwa sie biakhulia sie kumutikhinyi lundi nga siianwa sie khunywa. Mukhasiaane khulwe khukhwosia. Sili ne silikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Khu ndaalo eya sabato aana kamameeme kabili ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala buli lilala, kakhalikhoomo butekhele tawe, ne chibili khwikhumi che bufu butubaasibwe ne kamafura khulwe siianwa sie biakhulia ne sie khunywa.
Sino nisio siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli esabato khutasa khu siianwa sia buli lwosi alala ne siianwa sie khunywa.
“Aana siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli kumwesi ne kunyoa. Aana chiuunwa chindiiti chibili, limiiku lilala, kamameeme saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, koosi kakhalimo butekhele tawe.
Aana lundi siianwa sie biakhulia, aana bitaru khwikhumi bie bufu bunosie mu siikula butubaasibwe ne kamafura khu buli euunwa, bibili khu khumi bie bufu bunosie nga siianwa sie biakhulia bitubanisibwe ne kamafura khu buli limiiku.
Ne khu buli limeeme aana silala khwi khumi sie bufu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura nga siianwa sie biakhulia. Siaane nga siianwa sie khukhwosia, nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Siianwa sie khunywa siabio siliba endali chichupa chibili khu buli euunwa ne echuupa ne nusu khu buli limiiku, ne echuupa ndala khulwa buli limeeme. Ebio nibio bicha khuba biianwa bie khukhwosia bia buli mwesi khu miesi kioosi kie kumwiiko.
Lundi muliaana endurume khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni. Siliaanwa khutasa khu siianwa sia buli lwosi sie khukhwosia ne siianwa sie khunywa.
Ne khu ndaalo eye ekhumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kuno, eliba eya naikara. Khu ndaalo saba kumukaati kukhalimo limela kwong'ene nikwo kuliibwa.
Khu ndaalo enyoa eya naikara mube ne libuusiana litakatifu. Ne mukhakholakho kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe.
Ne kakhali aana siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aana chiuunwa chibili chindiiti, limiiku lilala, ne kamameeme ke siseecha saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, koosi kakhalimo ne butekhele tawe.
Lundi aana siianwa sie biakhulia sie bufu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura. Aana bitaru khwi khumi mu siikula bie bufu khu buli euunwa, ne bibili khwikhumi khu buli limiiku,
ne silala khwikhumi khu buli limeeme khu mameeme.
Lundi aana endurume ndala nga siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khulwe khureera khubeelwa bubwoni bwenywe.
Mulaana biianwa bino khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sie kumutikhinyi, sili siianwa sia buli lwosi.
Mungila yino ne eng'ene, mulaana buli endaalo khu ndaalo saba siianwa sie biakhulia, khulwe khukhwosia esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Muaane khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi ne siianwa sie khunywa.
Mubuusiane khulwe khukhwesaaya endaalo eya saba. Ne mu khakholakho kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe.
Ana siianwa sie khukhwosia nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aana chiuunwa chibili chindiiti, limiiku lilala, ne kamameeme ke siseecha saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala.
Lundi aana siianwa sie biakhulia sia abweene sie bufu butubaasibwe ne kamafura, aana bitaru khwi khumi sie siikula sie bufu khu buli euunwa, ne bibili khwikhumi khu buli limiiku,
ne silala khwikhumi khu buli limeeme.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe khurusiao bubwoni, khulwe khurusiao bubwoni bwenywe.
Aana lundi biianwa bie khunywa khutasa khu bie khukhwosia bia buli lwosi ne biianwa bie biakhulia. Mukhoya mubone muli se bilikhomo butekhele tawe.”

Khu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kukhola saba mube ne libuusiana litakatifu khulwe khukhwisaaya. Mukhakholakho kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe. Endaalo yino eliba eye khukhupa chikhoombi.
Mukhaane siianwa sie khukhwosia nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aana euunwa ndala endiiti, limiiku lilala, ne kamameeme ke siseecha saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, kakhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Lundi aana siianwa sie biakhulia sie bufu butubaasie ne kamafura: bitaru khwikhumi bie siikula sie bufu khulwe buli euunwa, bibili khwikhumi khu buli limiiku,
ne silala khwikhumi khu buli limeeme khu mameeme saba.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni bwenywe.
Aana bino khutasakho khu siianwa sie khukhwosia khulwe endaalo enyoa eye kumwesi, alala ne siianwa siayo sie biakhulia, ne siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi alala ne siianwa siayo sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa. Biaane khuloondekhana ne lilaka liabio khulwe khubiosia nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siianwa sie khukhwosia, nga esilikakha emusiimisia. Mukhaane euunwa endiiti, limiiku lilala, ne kamameeme ke siseecha saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, koosi kakhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Muaane siianwa sie biakhulia sie bufu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura: bitaru khwikhumi bie siikula sie bufu khu buli euunwa, bibili khwikhumi khu limiiku,
ne silala khu buli limeeme.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie bubwoni, khutasa khu siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, ne siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa.
Mukhaane siianwa sie khukhwosia, nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aana chiuunwa chindiiti ekhumi na chitaru, kamamiiku kabili, ne kamameeme ke siseecha ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala likhumi na kane, koosi kakhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Aana siianwa sie biakhulia sie bufu butubaanisibwe ne kamafura. Aana bitaru khwikhumi bie siikula silala sie bufu khu uunwa ekhumi na chitaru ne bibili khwikhumi bie bufu khu buli limiiku khu mamiiku kabili,
silala khwi khumi sie bufu khu buli limeeme.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwa siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi alala ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola khabili eya naikara aana chiuunwa chindiiti likhumi na chibili, kamamiiku kabili, kamameeme ke siseecha ekhumi na kane ke kumwiiko mulala buli lilala bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Biaane alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa khulwe chiuunwa, kamamiiku, ne kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Aana lundi endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne biianwa biayo bie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru eya naikara aana chiuunwa chindiiti likhumi na ndala, kamamiiku kabili, ne kamameeme ke siseecha ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala likhumi na kane, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Aana ebio alala ne siianwa siayo sie biakhulia ne biianwa bie khunywa khu chiuunwa, kamamiiku, ne kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne siianwa siasio sie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola khane aana chiuunwa likhumi chindiiti, kamamiiku kabili ne kamameeme ke siseecha likhumi na kane ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Aana alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne sie khunywa khulwe chiuunwa, khulwe kamamiiku, ne khulwe kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Aana lundi ne endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bumayaanu, khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi, ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne sie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola kharaano aana chiuunwa chindiiti tisa, kamamiiku kabili ne kamameeme ke siseecha ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala likhumi na kane, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Aana alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa khulwe chiuunwa, kamamiiku, ne kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khumalao bubwoni khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne sie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola sita aana chiuunwa munaane chindiiti, kamamiiku kabili, ne kamameeme ke siseecha ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala likhumi na kane, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Biaane alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa khulwe chiuunwa, kamamiiku ne kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Lundi aana endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi, ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne biianwa biabio bie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola saba aana chiuunwa saba chindiiti, kamamiiku kabili, ne kamameeme ke siseecha ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala likhumi na kane, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Aana alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne siianwa sie khunywa khulwe chiuunwa, kamamiiku, ne kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Aana lundi endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi, ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia, ne biianwa siasio sie khunywa.
“Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane buusiana alala, mukhakholakho kumulimo tawe.
Ne kakhali mukhaane siianwa sie khukhwosia nga esilikakha esiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mukhaane euunwa ndala endiiti, limiiku lilala, ne kamameeme ke siseecha saba ke bukhulu bwe kumwiiko mulala, bioosi bikhalikhoomo butekhele tawe.
Mukhaane alala ne siianwa sie biakhulia ne biianwa bie khunywa khulwe euunwa, limiiku, kamameeme, khuloondekhana ne lilaka.
Lundi mukhaane endurume ndala khulwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, khutasa khu siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli lwosi ne siianwa siasio sie biakhulia ne siianwa siasio sie khunywa.
“Bino bioosi mukhaane khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu naikara chicharoborwa. Mukhabiaane khutasa khu biianwa nibio mwechuba khuaana ne biianwa bie khukhwirusia, bie khukhwosia, bie biakhulia, biianwa bie khunywa ne biianwa bienywe bie kumuleembe.”
Nio Musa aboolela Baisiraeli buli sisiindu bulayi bwene nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.

Musa aboolela babemeelesi be chikholo che Baisiraeli ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka,
Omundu ne echuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namwe ne echuba khulwe ndakaano, se akhoyeele afunaka khu khwechuba khwewe tawe. Akhoyele akhole buli sisiindu nisio echuba.
Omukhasi omuele osiimenya mungo mwa raraawe ne echuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala ne echuba khulwe endakaano,
akhoya akhole buli sisiindu nisio alaka namwe echuba. Akhoya akhola niko alaka aaba bali raraawe aulila niko echuba mala se amukaania tawe.
Ne kakhali raraawe amukhiingilila khukhwichusia endakaano yewe khu ndaalo niyo aulila aba omukhasi oyo se enyibwa khukibiikha tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimubeela, sikila raraawe amukhiingilila.
Ne aaba omukhasi oyo ne alabeela ne asiili asi we endakaano, namwe aba ne ali asi we endakaano eye kamakhuwa niko aloma ne akhebaasia tawe,
akhoya akhole buli sisiindu nisio alaka namwe echuba. Akhabikhe khukhwechuba khwewe aaba bali omuseecha wewe aulila mala se amukhiingilila tawe.
Ne omuseecha wewe amukhiingilila khukhwichusia endakaano, khu ndaalo niyo akiulila omukhasi oyo ne echuba se akhoyeele wakibiikha tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimubeela.
Namulekhwa namwe omukhasi owalekhana ne omuseecha akhoya eechusie buli endakaano niyo akhola.
Omukhasi oli ne omuseecha aaba ne akhola endakaano namwe echuba,
akhoya akhola buli sisiindu nisio alaka namwe echuba. Akhoya akhola ario aaba bali omuseecha wewe aulila mala se amukhiingilila tawe.
Ne kakhali omuseecha wewe aaba ne aulila mala amukhiingilila, se akhoyeele echusia khukhwechuba tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimubeela, sikila omuseecha wewe amukhiingilile khukhwichusia endakaano yewe.
Omuseecha wewe ali ne bunyali khufukiilila namwe khuloba endakaano yosi yosi namwe khukhwechuba khwosi khwosi nikhwo akholile.
Ne omuseecha wewe aaba ne akhalomakho liosi liosi buli endaalo tawe aba afukiilile khukhwechuba khwo omukhasi khwoosi ne ndakaano yewe yoosi niyo akhola. Aba afukiilile aaba ne akhalomakho liosi liosi tawe khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo aulilila.
Ne aaba ne akelao aloba endakaano, enyuma we siise khuulila, aba alanyoola bumayaanu bukhoyeele bwecha khu mukhasi wewe.”
Kano kali kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Musa kabeo akari wo mundu ne omukhasi wewe ne akari wa paapa ne omukhaana wewe osiili omuele munju eya raraawe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Rungia bubi khu Bamidiani khu niko bakholela Baisiraeli. Ne nyuma wako olafwa.”
Nio Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Rekekha babaandu mwinywe khulwe liie, nio bache bebwaakale Midiani. Balacha khuruungisia bubi ne bubi khu Bamidiani nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne enya.
Khukhwama buli mu kholo eya Isiraeli ruma babaandu eelefu ndala khucha mwiie.”
Nio babaandu eelefu ndala baroborwa khukhwama buli mu kholo, boosi alala baba babaandu chielefu likhumi na chibili khulwe liie.
Musa aaruma babaandu bano mwiie. Fineasi okhwa Eliesa omusaayi, acha ne nabo. Asuta bibiindu bie Abuundu Atakatifu ne chikhoombi che khukhwekesia simanyisio sie liie.
Bebwaakala Midiani, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa, mala bera babaandu be siseecha boosi.
Bera babaami baraano ba Midiani. Babaami abo baba: Evi, Rekemu, Suri, Huri ne Reba. Bera akhaba ne Balamu okhwa Peori.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli baamba embaambe bakhasi ne babaana be Bamidiani. Babukula chikhaafu chabwe choosi ne kamakheese kabwe koosi ne kimiaandu kiabwe kioosi.
Boosia chingoba nicho bamenyamo ne chikambi chabwe choosi.
Babukula nibio banuula bioosi nende nibo baamba; babaandu ne bibiaayo.
Babireera khu Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa ne libuusiana lie babaandu ba Isiraeli, ba baaba a kambi khu siangalaamwe sia Moabu, sikelekha sia Yoritani, e Yeriko.
Musa, Eliesa omusaayi ne babemeelesi boosi be babaandu barura enje we kambi khukhwakanila banamae.
Musa akhalalila babemeelesi be banamae babemeelela banamae be bipupu chimia ne chielefu babakobola khukhwama mwiie.
Abareeba ali, “Sikila siina ne mulekhile bakhasi boosi baba balamu?
Khebulila muli bakhasi nibo babaloonda kamekisio ka Balamu e Peori bakila babaandu baleka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Elio nilio liliareera butinyu khu baandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono khwako yiira buli mwana owe sisoleeli nende buli mukhasi owabakho ne omundu.
Ne kakhali mulekhe bakhaana boosi basiili khubakho ne omundu tawe khuba babenywe.
Kona enje we kambi khu ndaalo saba. Ne yesi yesi mwinywe owera omundu namwe owatiila khu mufu esiinge alala ne baambe benywe. Bakhole bario khu ndaalo eya khataru ne khu ndaalo eya saba.
Musiinge buli siindu sisiang'oonwa khukhwama khu lisielo ne bioosi bibiakholwa khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe chimbusi, ne buli sioosi sisiakholwa khukhwama khu murongooro.”
Omusaayi Eliesa aboolela babaandu babakobola khukhwama mwiie, “Kano kali kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Musa:
esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa, ne sichuuma, machwenu, sibia;
bioosi bikhanyala biaya tawe bilisiingwa khubirira mu mulilo biliba bimiliiu. Ne kakhaba kario bilisiingwa ne kameechi ke khumiliisia. Ne siosi siosi sinyala siaya mukhasiingile kameechi.
Mwenyekhana khusiinga chingubo chenywe khu ndaalo ekhola saba, ne mukhabe bamiiliu enyuma wako mukheche mu kambi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Ewe ne omusaayi Eliesa, alala ne babemeelesi be babaandu, bala buli sisiindu nisio baamba, baboe ne bibiaayo.
Kabania bioosi mu bitonye bibili. Sitonyi silala sibe sie banamae babacha mwiie ne sitonyi sisiindi sibe sie libuusiana lie babaandu lioosi.
Khukhwama mu sitonyi sie banamae babacha mwiie, bukulamo busuuru bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bukula omuambe mulala khukhwama khu buli baambe chimia chiraano. Ne khola orio akhaba khu khaafu, khu punda ne khu makheese.
Bibukule khukhwama khu sitonyi siabwe mala obieelesie Eliesa omusaayi nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne khukhwama mu sitonyi sie Baisiraeli olarusia mulala khu buli kamakhumi karaano, khu baandu, ne khu khaafu, khu punda, ne khu makheese, khu biaayo bioosi, oeleesie Balawi, babemeelela liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Musa ne Eliesa bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne abalaka.
Nono bino bili bibiindu bibiarama khu biindu nibio banamae babukula mwiie: kamakheese chielefu chimia sita ne chielefu kamakhumi saba na chiraano.
Chielefu kamakhumi saba ne chibili che chikhaafu,
chipunda chielefu sitini na moja,
ne bakhasi boosi baba chielefu salasini na mbili basiili ne yabwana.
Ne sitonyi sie abo babacha mwiie siaba kamakheese chielefu mia tatu salasini na saba ne chimia chiraano.
Ne busuuru bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwaba kamakheese chimia sita ne kamakhumi saba na karaano.
Chikhaafu chaba chielefu salasini na sita ne chikhaafu kamakhumi saba na chibili baruunga busuuru khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Chipunda chaba chielefu kamakhumi kataru, ne chimia chiraano ne busuuru bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwaba chipunda kamakhumi sita na ndala.
Ne babaandu baba chielefu likhumi na sita ne kamakhumi kataru na babili baba busuuru bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Musa aelesia omusaayi Eliesa busuuru bubwaba siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Musa aaula sitonyi sie babaandu busa khukhwama khu sitonyi sie banamae.
Nono sitonyi sie babaandu busa siaba: kamakheese chielefu mia tatu salasini na saba ne chimia chiraano,
chikhaafu chielefu salasini na sita,
ne chipunda chielefu salasini ne chimia chiraano,
ne babaandu chielefu ekhumi na sita.
Khukhwama mu sitonyi sino Musa aabukula mulala khu baboe kamakhumi karaano ne bibiaayo, abielesia Balawi ba bemeelelanga liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amulaka.
Nio babemeelesi be banamae bipupu chielefu ne chimia bacha khu Musa.
Baboolela Musa bali, “Khwabalile banamae bali asi we bunyali bwefwe. Ne mbao akhaba mulala otibile tawe.
Ne khwareerire siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nisio buli mundu anyoolile: bibiindu bie esahabu, chipangili, chinaalo, chimbete, bipalakasa bie mu maru, ne bibiuma. Khubiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga kumuruungo kwe bubwoni bwefwe, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa babukula esahabu ne bibiindu bibiindi bioosi
ne esahabu eye siianwa yoosi niyo baana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama khu banamae babemeelesi be bipupu chielefu ne chimia chaba chishekeli chielefu ekhumi ne sita ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi karaano.
Buli omunamae ebukulila kimiaandu.
Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa babukula esahabu khukhwama khu banamae babemeelesi be bipupu chielefu ne chimia mala bakirera mwieema lie kumuse. Bakirera nga likhebusia khulwe Baisiraeli ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Chikholo cha Rubeni ne Kati chaba ne chikhaafu chingali lukali. Babona bali sibala sia Yaseri ne Kileati siaba silayi khu khaafu.
Nio be lisaaye lia Rubeni ne Kati bacha khu Musa ne omusaayi Eliesa, ne khu bemeelesi be babaandu mala baloma bali,
“Ataroti, Diboni, Yaseri, Nimura, Heshiboni, Eleale, Sebamu, Nebo, ne Beoni,
chili chingoba nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia ebweeni we libuusiana lie Baisiraeli. Sibala sino sili silayi khulwe chikhaafu, ne efwe khuli ne chikhaafu.”
Nio baloma bali, “Nosiima khuelesie efwe sibala sino khuba sisiefwe. Okhakhwambusia engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani tawe.”
Ne kakhali Musa areeba be lisaaye lia Kati ne Rubeni ali, “Mwenya murame anano, ne Baisiraeli basienywe bacha mwiie?
Siina sikila ne murusia kumwoyo mu baandu ba Isiraeli khucha mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia?
Elio nilio bakuuka benywe bakhola nga ne nabaruma khukhwama e Kadeshi-barinea khubona sibala.
Nga bacha bola mwitooma lia Eshikoli balola sibala, barusia kumwoyo mu baandu khulekha khucha mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne lirima likali endaalo ng'eneyo mala echuba ali,
‘Kang'ali mbao omundu khwaabo babarura e Misiri, owe bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili namwe khukhilakho ocha khucha mu sibala nisio nalaka khuelesia Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo tawe. Sikila se bandia ese ne kumwoyo kwoosi tawe,’
se aliio omundu okhachemo tawe ne akhali Kalebu okhwa Yefune omukeeni ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni, sikila nibo baloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwoosi.
Nio lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Baisiraeli liaba likali. Aabakhola bayiiyayiiye mu sichiimi khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane, khukhwola nga eselukho eyakhola bubwoni ne yabunisibwa.
Mala luno mwabukuule bubweyaangu bwe bakuuka benywe, babaandu babooni, khutasa lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili likali khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Sikila enywe babaandu ba Rubeni ne Kati mwaba ne muloba khuloonda khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khulekha babaandu bano boosi mu sichiimi, ne enywe ninywe mucha khukila babaandu bano boosi babune.”
Bacha khu Musa mala baloma bali, “Khulombakha kamataala ano khulwe kamakheese kefwe ne chingoba khulwe batiiti befwe.
Ne kakhali efwe khukherekekha khucha mwiie ne Baisiraeli basiefwe khukhwola nga khuboosia mu maloba kabwe. Ne batiiti befwe banyala bamenya anano mu ngoba chisire, sikila babaandu be sibala sino.
Se khucha khukobola mu chingo chefwe tawe, khukhwola nga Baisiraeli ne banyoola buli mundu kumukabwa kwewe.
Efwe se khucha khubukulakho kumukabwa mu nibo elubeka luluundi lwa Yoritani tawe, sikila khwanyoolile kumukabwa kwefwe anano lubeka lwe ebukwe owa Yoritani.”
Musa abakobosia ali, “Mwaaba ne mukhola murio, bukula bulwaani muche mwiie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buli mundu mwinywe okangiile bulwaani alambukha Yoritani ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mulakhola murio khukhwola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aoona basiku bewe,
lundi khukhwola nga sibala ne siuulwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Enyuma wako, munyala mwakobola, ne mulaba balekhuule khulwe kumulimo kwenywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khu Baisiraeli. Ne kamaloba kano kacha khuba kakenywe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali mwaba ne mukhakhola murio tawe, aba mwakholile bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne ba ne bung'ali muli bubwoni bwenywe bulamubuula.
Yombakhila babaana benywe chingoba ne kamataala khulwe kamakheese kenywe, mala mukhole niko mulakile.”
Be lisaaye lia Kati ne Rubeni baboolela Musa bali, “khucha khukhola nga ne olakile.
Bakhasi befwe ne babaana, ne kamakheese kefwe ne chikhaafu chefwe choosi bicha khurama ano mu ngoba cha Kileati.
Ne kakhali efwe fweesi khucha khwambukha engelekha khuche mwiie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala khupane, nga nilwo okhulaka.”
“Be lisaaye lia Kati ne Rubeni baberekeekhe khulwe liie balacha ne nanywe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Balambukha engelekha wa Yoritani mala batiile sibala ebweeni wenywe. Nio mukhabaelesie sibala sia Kileati nga kumukabwa kwabwe.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali se balambukha engelekha wa Yoritani nanywe ne bulwaani bwabwe tawe, bacha khunyoola kumukabwa kwabwe mwinywe mu sibala sia Kanaani.”
Babaandu ba Kati ne ba Rubeni bakobosia bali, “Omwami, efwe khulakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhuboleele efwe bakholi bowo.
Khulambukha ne khukangile bulwaani ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali kumukabwa kwefwe kulaba engelekha owa Yoritani eno.”
Nio Musa aakaba khu kholo cha Kati ne Rubeni ne balala khu kholo eya Manase sibala sio mwami Sihoni owe Baamori ne sibala sio mwami Oku owa Bashani, sibala sioosi alala ne chingoba chasio.
Ekholo eya Kati yombakha chingoba cha Diboni, Atiroti, Aroeri,
Atiroti-shofani, Yaseri, Yokibea,
Beti-nimura ne Beti-Harani. Echo chaba chingoba chisire. Bombakha ne kamataala ke kamakheese.
Ekholo eya Rubeni yombakha Heshiboni, Eleale, Kiriataimu,
Nebo, Baali-meoni (kamasina kano kakaluukhasibwa) ne Sibuma. Baana kamasina kakaandi khu ngoba nicho bombakha.
Luya lwa Makiri okhwa Manase lwebwaakala sibala sia Kileati, lwasibukula, ne khutimania Baamori ba babamo.
Nio Musa aelesia luuya lwa Makiri sibala sia Kileati, mala basimenyamo.
Yairi, okhwa Manase, aamba birekere bie Bakileati mala abilanga ali, “Hafoti-yairi.”
Noba acha aamba lukoba lwa Kenati ne birekere bialwo, ne khubilanga ali, Noba, lisina liewe omwene.

Kano niko kamasina ke abuundu niio Baisiraeli babirira nga baba ne barura e Misiri. Musa ne Aruni babemeelela mu bipupu.
Musa aandika kamasina ka buli abuundu niio baapa chikambi nga baba ne babirira khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kano niko kamasina ako:
Babaandu ba Isiraeli bama e Misiri abuundu bali Ramusesi. Bamayo khu ndaalo eye ekhumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kunyoa. Yaba endaalo ndala enyuma we e Pasaka. Baisiraeli barekukha ne bunyindaafu ebweeni we Bamisiri boosi.
Bamisiri baba balikho basiikha babaana babwe babele nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eera. Mu khukhola ario, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arusia bukhalaki khu bawele be Bamisiri.
Nio Babaandu ba Isiraeli bama e Ramusesi mala baapa ekambi e Sukoti.
Bama e Sukoti bola e Etamu, eli khundulo khwe sichiimi mala baapa ekambi.
Khukhwama ebweeneyo bakobola e Pi-hairoti, ebukwe owa Baali-sefoni, mala baapa ekambi siimbi ne Mikitoli.
Bama e Pi-hairoti mala babirira akari we nyanja eya Shamu ne khukhwingila mu sichiimi sia Etamu. Bacha lukeendo lwe chindaalo chitaru mala bakhola ekambi e Mara.
Khukhwama ao bacha Elimu. Abwenao chabao chisebele ekhumi na chibili ne kimirongooro kimikheendu kamakhumi saba. Bapao ekambi.
Bama e Elimu mala baapa ekambi siimbi ne nyanja eya Shamu.
Bama sia nyanja eya Shamu baapa ekambi yaabwe eloondakho baapa mu sichiimi sia Sini.
Barekukha e Sini baapa ekambi e Tofika.
Bama e Tofika, baapa ekambi Alushi.
Bama ao bacha bakhola ekambi e Refidimu. Ao niio bakhanyoolakho kameechi ke khunywa tawe.
Bama e Refidimu baapa ekambi mu sichiimi sia Sinai.
Bama mu sichiimi sia Sinai, baapa ekambi e Kiburoti-Hataaba.
Bama e Kiburoti-Hataaba baapa ekambi e Haseroti.
Bama Haseroti bakhola ekambi e Ritima.
Bama e Ritima baapa ekambi e Rimoni-peresi.
Bama e Rimoni-peresi baapa ekambi e Libuna
Bama e Libuna, baapa ekambi e Risa.
Bama e Risa, baapa ekambi e Kehelata.
Bama e Kehelata, baapa ekambi khu sikulu sia Sheferi.
Bama khu sikulu sia Sheferi, baapa ekambi e Harata.
Bama e Harata baapa ekambi e Makheloti.
Bama e Makheloti, baapa ekambi e Tahati.
Bama e Tahati, baapa ekambi e Tera,
Bama e Tera, bapa ekambi e Mitika.
Bama e Mitika, baapa ekambi e Hasimona.
Bama e Hasimona, baapa ekambi e Moseroti.
Bama e Moseroti, baapa ekambi e Bene-yaakani.
Bama e Bene-yaakani, baapa ekambi e Hori-hakitikati.
Bama e Hori-hakitikati, baapa ekambi e Yotibata.
Bama e Yotibata, baapa ekambi e Aburona.
Bama e Aburona, baapa ekambi e Esioni-geberi.
Bama Esioni-geberi, baapa ekambi mu sichiimi sia Sini (eyo niyo e Kadeshi.)
Bama Kadeshi, baapa ekambi khu sikulu sia Hori, khu lwakha lwe sibala sia Edomu.
Ne Aruni aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na kitaru nga ne afwa khu lukulu lwa Hori.
Khukhwama khu sikulu sia Hori Baisiraeli bacha baapa ekambi e Salimona.
Bama e Salimona, baapa ekambi e Punoni.
Bama e Punoni, baapa ekambi e Oboti.
Bama e Oboti, baapa ekambi e Iye-abarimu, mu sibala sia Moabu.
Bama Iye-abarimu, baapa ekambi e Tiboni-kati.
Bama e Tiboni-kati, baapa ekambi e Alimoni-dibulataimu.
Bama Alimoni-dibulataimu, baapa ekambi khu bikulu bia Abarimu, siimbi ne sikulu sia Nebo.
Bama khu bikulu bia Abarimu, baapa ekambi mu siangalaamwe sie sibala sia Moabu, engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, e Yeriko.
Baapa ekambi siimbi ne Yoritani khukhwama Beti-yeshimoti khukhwola e Abeli-shitimu mu siangalaamwe sie sibala sia Moabu.
Ebweeneyo mu siangalaamwe sia Moabu, e sikelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani e Yeriko, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Musa. Amuboolela ali,
“Boolela Baisiraeli oli, ‘Ne mulambukha Yoritani ne mwingila mu sibala sia Kanaani,
mukhoyele mwatimania babaandu boosi bamenyile mu sibala esio. Yonakaka kamabaale ne kamapaati kabwe nende bioosi nibio bakhola nga bawele babwe ne khukhwonaka abuundu niio basaayilanga.
Menya mu sibala siabwe, sikila namueleesie enywe musimenyemo.
Mukhakabane kamaloba khulwe khukhupa ekura khuloondekhana ne chinju chenywe. Khu kholo emboofu kielesie kumukabwa kumukali ne khu kholo endiiti kielesie kumukabwa mutiiti. Niye ekura ekwila okwo kulaba kumukabwa kwewe.
Ne kakhali mwaba ne mukhatimania bamenywa be mu sibala omwo tawe balimureerera enywe butinyu, baliba nga bisosono mumoni chenywe ne kamawa mumbafu mwenywe. Bakhamunanie mu sibala nisio mumenyamo.
Ne aba ndimukholela enywe niko nebaasia khu bakholela nibo.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Laka babaandu Baisiraeli oli, nocha mu Kanaani, (sibala nisio ndikho muelesia nga kumukabwa, sibala sia Kanaani sioosi)
lubeka lwenywe lwe ebunafubo lucha khwama mu sichiimi sia Sini khuloonda khu lwakha lwa Edomu. Ne lulwakha luno elubeka lwe bukwe lucha khwama sia Nyanja eya chumbe.
Nio lulwakha lwenywe luyukhe ebunafubo lucha khwambukha Akurabimu, ne khuchiililila khukhwola Sini ne khukhwola ebunafubo owa Kadeshi-barinea. Nio kuyukhe kulole lubeka lwe bunaswa owa Hasari-adari, ne khukhwola Asimoni.
Ne lulwakha lucha khuyukhila Asimoni luche mwitooma khu lwakha lwa Misiri lukhamaliilikhile khu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
“Lulwakha lwe mumbo lucha khuba enyanja eya Mediterenia.
“Lulwakha lwe ebunaswa lucha khwama khu nyanja eya Mediterenia khukhwola khu sikulu sia Hori.
Ne khukhwama abwenao khukhwola abwingililo owa Hamati, lucha lwoole Setati
Ne lukhache khukhwola Sifuroni lutabusibwe e Hasari-enani. Oluno nilwo lucha khuba lulwakha lwenywe lwe ebunaswa.
“Lulwakha lwe bukwe lucha khwama Hasari-enani khukhwola Shefamu.
Nio lwole Ribula, ebukwe owa Aini, ne khucha khukhwola khu nyanja eya Chumbe ebukwe.
Khukhwama ao lukhache khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Yoritani mala luweele khu nyanja eya chumbe. Sino sicha khuba sibala sienywe ne chinjakha chasio choosi khubotookhelela.”
Chikholo cha Rubeni ne Kati banyoola kumukabwa kwabwe alala nende balala khu kholo eya Manase.
Chikholo chibili ne balala khu kholo eya Manase bali ne kumukabwa kwabwe engelekha owa Yoritani, e Yeriko khucha ebukwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali,
“Omusaayi Eliesa ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni nibo bacha khukabania babaandu kamaloba.
Lundi bukula omwimeelesi mulala khukhwama mu buli ekholo abayeete khukabania.”
Kano niko kamasina ke babemeelesi: khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, Kalebu okhwa Yefune.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Simioni, Shemweli okhwa Amihudi.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini, Elidadi okhwa Kisiloni.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani, Buki okhwa Yokili.
Khukhwama mu lisaaye lia Yosefu: mu kholo eye Manase, Hanieli okhwa Efodi,
Ne mu kholo eya Efuraimu, Kemueli okhwa Sifutani.
Ne mu kholo eya Sebuluni, Elisafani okhwa Parinaki.
Khukhwamamu kholo eya Isakari, Palitieli okhwa Asani.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Asieri, Ahihudi okhwa Shelomi.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Nafutali, Petaeli okhwa Amihudi.
Abano nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka khukabania kimikabwa khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli mu sibala sia Kanaani.

“Laka Baisiraeli oli, khu miaandu nikio mwanyoolile elesia Balawi chingoba nicho bamenyamo ne sibala sie kamayilwe kabotookhelela chingoba.
Chingoba chino chiicha khuba che Balawi, ne bacha khumenya ebweeneyo. Sibala sie kamayilwe Sicha khuba khulwe chikhaafu chabwe ne bibiaayo biabwe ne bibaywa biabwe bioosi.
Kamayilwe niko mucha khuelesia Balawi kakhoya kaaba khukhwama khwisiisi lie lukoba, bikele eelefu ndala, khubotookhelela lukoba.
Ne enje we lukoba kela bikele chielefu chibili buli lubeka: ebukwe, mumbo, ebunaswa ne ebunafubo.
Chingoba nicho muelesie Balawi chiicha khuba sita che khumulilamo. Mu nicho omundu anyala ekisa aba ne eera owasie matundubiikha. Khutubakho, baelesie chingoba kamakhumi kane na chibili chichiindi.
Chingoba choosi nicho muelesia Balawi chibe kamakhumi kane na munaane, alala ne kamayilwe kacho.
Ne chingoba nicho muelesia Balawi muaana muri: khukhwama mu kholo chimboofu, bukulamo chingoba chingali ne mu kholo ndiiti bukulamo chingoba chindiiti. Buli lukoba nilwo muaana lube khuloondekhane ne bubalaayi bwe kamaloba kabwe.”
“Boolela babaandu Baisiraeli oli, ne mwambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne khukhwingila mu sibala sia Kanaani,
murobore chingoba che khumulilamo. Chiliba chingoba nicho omundu anyala elukhilamo aba ne eera owasie matundubiikha.
Chingoba chino nicho mulimulilamo khukhwilukha omwiyachi nio owirire oyo akhafwa tawe khukhwola nga eema ebweeni we libuusiana khulwe bukhalaki.
Rusia chingoba chenywe sita che khumulilamo.
Rusia chingoba chitaru elubeka we ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne chitaru mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Chino chiicha khuba chingoba che khumulilamo khulwe Baisiraeli ne baakwa bamenyile ne nanywe. Omundu yesi yesi owira okundi matundubiikha anyala elukhila mu ngoba ng'enecho.
“Ne kakhali aba ne amupila sichuuma, nio afwe, omundu oupile oyo ali omwiiri. Ne omwiiri eerwa.
Namwe aaba ne amupila libaale, nilio omundu anyala afwa, mala afwa, omundu oupile oyo aba omwiiri. Ne omwiiri eerwa.
Namwe aaba ne amupila lukhu, mala lwakila omundu afwa, omundu oupile oyo ali omwiiri. Ne omwiiri acha khwirwa.
Omundu oruungisia bubi ne bubi omwene niye oliira omwiiri oyo.
Ne omundu aaba ne eera okundi khulwe khumusindikha asi namwe khumuchukucha sisiindu
namwe amwiira khulwe khumupa sikila ali omusiku, omundu omwirire acha khwirwa, sikila ali omwiiri. Oruungisia bubi ne bubi alimwiira aaba ne amunyoola.
“Ne wakana omundu anyala eera okundi, ne akhali omusiku wewe tawe, khulwe khumusindikha asi namwe khulwe khumuchukucha sisiindu.
Namwe liaba ne lili, khulekha khulola, omundu achukucha libaale liera okundi, ne akhali ne busiku naye tawe, ne lundi se enya khumuumisia tawe.
Mu musaango okwo libuusiana lie babaandu licha khukukhalaka akari wo omwiiri ne oruungisia sifuki khuloondekhana ne kamalaka kano.
Libuusiana likhasikule omwiiri khukhwama khu mundu oruungisia bubi. Ne libuusiana likhamukobosie mu lukoba lwewe mu bwilukhilo nimwo aba elukhileyo. Akhoya amenya ebweeneyo khukhwola nga Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owachukhwakho kamafura kamatakatifu ne afwa.
Omundu omwiiri oyo aaba ne enyokha mu lukoba mwe khumulila nimwo ekisa
ne oruungisia bubi namunyoola mala amwire, sikholwa sino sie khukhwiyacha se sili bubwoni tawe.
Sikila omwiiri akhoya arame mu lukoba mwe khumulila khukhwola nga Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne afwa. Ne enyuma we lifwa lio Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali omwiiri oyo anyala akobola engo wewe.
