“Kamalaka kano kali khu selukho chenywe choosi buli niio mumenya.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne eera owasie, acha khwirwa khulwe buloli burusibwa ne babaandi. Ne kakhali mbao omundu ocha khwirwa khulwe buloli bwo omundu mulala yeng'ene tawe.
Khutasa khwako mukhafukiilila kumuruungo khulwe bulamu bwo omwiiri oli ne bubwoni bwe khukhwira tawe. Ne kakhali omwiiri oyo akhoya erwa.
Ne lundi mukhafukiilila kumuruungo khulwe omundu owilukhiile mu lukoba lwe khumula, aaba bali akobola khumenya mungo mwewe Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne akhafwa tawe.
Nono mukhanyaalutiakho sibala nisio mu menyilemo tawe sikila sifuki sinyaalutia sibala. Ne mbao sinyala siarusiao bubwoni bwe sifuki ne siikhali sifuki sio omundu owirire tawe.
Mukhanyaalutia sibala nisio mumenyilemo tawe, sikila Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi menyile akari we babaandu ba Isiraeli.”

Babemeelesi be luuya lwa Kileati, bacha khu Musa ne khu bemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli. (Kileati aba okhwa Makiri, omwichukhulu owa Manase lundi sisoni sia Yosefu.)
Baloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulaka ewe khukaba babaandu Baisiraeli kamaloba khulwe khukhupa chikura. Lundi akhulaka khuana kimiaandu kia wandaayefwe Selofehadi khu bakooko bewe.
Ne kakhali baaba ne bacha khu baseecha be ekholo ekiindi eya Isiraeli, kumukabwa kwabwe aba kucha khuba kwe ekholo eyo. Nio kimiaandu kiefwe kicha khubukulwa khukhwama mwifwe.
Ne siise sia naikara eye likhebusia eye Baisiraeli ne sioola kumukabwa kwabwe kulitasikha khu mukabwa kwe kholo niyo balimo. Nio kumukabwa kwabwe kulibukulibwa khukhwama mumukabwa kwe kholo eye bakuuka befwe.”
Musa alaka babaandu Baisiraeli khuloondekhana ne lomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aaloma ali, “Nilio ekholo eya Yosefu elomile lia ng'ali.
Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka khu bakooko ba Selofehadi ‘Lekha bateekhe khu niye benya. Ne kakhali babeywe munju eye kholo eya paapa wabwe.
Kumukabwa kwe Baisiraeli se kucha khurura khu kholo ndala kuche khu kiindi tawe. Buli mulala khu Baisiraeli acha khurama mu mukabwa kwe kholo eye bakuukawe.
Ne buli mukooko owila khu mukabwa mu kholo yosi yosi eye Baisiraeli akhoya abeela khu museecha owe kholo ng'eneyo. Mu ngila yino buli muisiraeli acha khwila khu mukabwa kwe bakuuka bewe.
Khwako kimiaandu se kicha khwama mu kholo ekiindi kiche mu kholo ekiindi tawe. Buli kholo echa khurama ne kumukabwa kwayo.’ ”
Bakooko ba Selofehadi bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Musa.
Mahila, Tirisa, ne Hokila, Milika ne Noa, bakooko ba Selofehadi babeela khu basoleeli ba baaba sianang'ina babwe.
Babeela khu lisaaye lie kholo eya Manase okhwa Yosefu. Nio kumukabwa kwabwe kwarama mu kholo eya paapa wabwe.
Kano kali kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Baisiraeli. Aabaelesia khubirira khu Musa khu siangalaamwe sia Moabu embi ne luluuchi lwa Yoritani e Yeriko.

Kano niko kamakhuwa niko Musa aboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi nga ne baba mu sichiimi ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani. Baba mu Litooma lia Yoritani siimbi Sufu akari we lukoba lwa Parani lubeka lulala, ne chingoba cha Tofeli, ne Labani, ne Haseroti ne Tisahabu lubeka luluundi.
Luli lukeendo lwe chindaalo ekhumi na ndala, khukeenda khukhwama khu sikulu sia Sinai khukhwola Kadeshi-barinea khubirira khu ngila eye sibala sie bikulu sia Edomu.
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe khumi na mulala kwe kumwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kane khukhwama nga Baisiraeli ne barura mu Misiri, Musa aboolela babaandu kamalaka koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesia khubaboolela.
Lino liekholekha enyuma wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuula Omwami Sihoni owe Baamori owamiianga lukoba lwa Heshiboni, ne Omwami Oku owe Bashani, owamiia mu ngoba cha Asitaroti ne Etrei.
Musa arakikha khukhwinooselia babaandu kamalaka kano ne bolile mu maloba ka Moabu, ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Musa aloma ali,
“Nga ne mwabeele a sikulu sia Sinai Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe akhuboolela efwe ali, ‘Mwamenyile siise sileeyi a sikulu ano mwanyalile murio.
Kobolayo mala muchiililile ne lukeendo. Cha mu sibala sie bikulu sie Baamori nende be bibala biili siimbi bioosi bali mu litooma lia Yoritani. Cha mwole mu sibala sie bikulu ne sie mumaayo, mwole mu ngoongo che bunafubo nende sia nyanja eya Mediterenia. Cha mu sibala sia Kanaani engelekha we bikulu bia Lebanoni khukhwola khu luuchi luboofu lwa Efurati.
Lola namuele enywe kamaloba kano. Yingilamo mala mubukule kamaloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echuba khua bakuuka benywe Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo. Alaka khubaelesia nibo ne lisaaye liabwe enyuma wabwe.’ ”
Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Siise esio, namuboolela ndi, ‘Kimilimo kie khumurangirira enywe kili kimikali lukali khwise. Ese senyala nakikhola seng'ene tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amukholile muli bakali nga ching'enieesi.
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, amukhole mutasiikhe mube chielefu khukhilakhoo mala amubiite chikhabi nga ne amulaka.
Ese seng'ene se nyala busiro bwenywe, butinyu ne bulomani tawe.
Robora babaandu bakesi, be limanya lundi babakholakho kimilimo kino khukhwama buli mu kholo mala ese ndabakhola babe babemeelesi benywe.’
Ne enywe mwafukiilila muli nilio naloma liaba lilayi khukhola.
Nio ese nabukula babaandu bakesi lundi bakholile kimilimo bamanya nibo enywe mwarobora khukhwama mu kholo chenywe mala ese nabara mu bwimeelesi khwinywe. Balala baba babemeelesi be babaandu eelefu ndala, babaandi be babaandu emia, babaandi be babaandu kamakhumi karaano ne babaandi be babaandu ekhumi.
“Ne siise esio naboolela bakhalaki benywe ndi, ‘Rekeeresia kamalilo ke babaandu mala mukhole bukhalaki bubwenyekha akari we Baisiraeli babili namwe akari wo Omuisiraeli ne omukwa.
Khola kakenyekha mu bukhalaki bwenywe. Khalakila be asi nende be bunyali nga kenyekha. Mukharia omundu yesi yesi tawe, sikila bukhalaki nibwo mukhola buli bwa Wele. Reera kimisaango kimiaandalafu khwise ne ese ndakhalaka.’
Siise esio ese namulaka koosi niko mukhoyela khukhola.
“Khwakhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe akhulaka. Khwarura a sikulu sia Sinai mala khwabira mu sichiimi sibalaayi esio sioosi, lundi siriisia. Khwabirira mu sibala sie bikulu sie Baamori. Nga ne khwola Kadeshi-barinea,
namuboolela enywe ndi, ‘Mwolile mu sibala sie bikulu sie Baamori nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe alikho akhuelesia efwe.
Lola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe areere sibala sino ebweeni wenywe. Cha musibukule sibe sisienywe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we bakuuka benywe ne amulaka. Mukharia, namwe mwarangararwa tawe!’
“Nenywe mweesi mwanjichakho mala mwaloma muli, ‘Lekha khurume babaandu ebweeni wefwe bache bayoote sibala nio bakhuboolele engila endayi khukhila choosi niyo khubirirakho ne chingoba nicho khukhoyeele khuchemo.’
“Enganakani eyo yaba endayi. Nono narobora babaandu ekhumi na babili, mulala khukhwama mu buli kholo.
Bacha mu sibala sie bikulu khukhwola khu Litooma lia Eshikoli mala basiyoota.
Khukobola bakhureerera efwe malala khu matuunda niko banyoolayo. Bakhuboolela bali kamaloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe alikho akhuelesia efwe kali kamalayi.
Mwaloma muli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubiila efwe. Elio nilio liliakila akhurusia mu sibala sie e Misiri akhure mu bunyali bwe Baamori mala bakhubunie.
Khulikho khucha waena? Balebe befwe nibo khwaruma bakhukholile khwariire. Bakhuboolele bali, Babaandu abo bali bakali lundi baleeyi khu khukhila efwe. Chingoba chabwe chili chimboofu, che kamasiisi kakoola mwikulu. Khutasa khwako khuboone babaandu baboofu lundi be kamaani ebweeneyo.’
“Nese namuboolela ndi, ‘Mukharia babaandu abo tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamurangirira mala omwene alamupanila. Kalaba bulayi bwene nga akhola e Misiri ne muloleleele.
Ne mwabone mu sichiimi nga ne amureerire mu muleembe khu lukeendo, oli paapa ne ameema omwana wewe. Aakholile ario khu lukeendo lwenywe lwoosi khukhwola abuundu ano.’
Ne kakhaba kario, se mweyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli lwosi amurangiriranga ebweeni, khumuyiimila abuundu niio mukhola ekambi ne khumwekesia enywe engila. Arangiranga ebweeni wenywe mu silo mu mulilo ne kumuusi amurangirira mu lileesi.
‘Se aliio omundu khu baandu be selukho emayaanu yino okhabone kamaloba kamalayi niko nasuubisia bakuka benywe tawe.
Kalebu okhwa Yefune yeng'ene niye olikabona. Ne ndielesia niye ne lisaaye liewe sibala nisio aalambula sino. Ndikhola ndio sikila Kalebu anondile ne kumwoyo kwoosi.’
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambambila sesi lirima sikila enywe. Aloma ali, ‘Akhaba ewe wesi Musa se olingila mu sibala esio tawe.
Ne akhali Yoshua okhwa Nuni omuyeeti wowo niye olingilamo. Nono muremo kumwoyo sikila alirangirira Isiraeli khubukula sibala esio.
Khutasa khwako, babaana benywe basiili batoro nibo mwaloma muli balikwa mu mireko, bakhamanyile bubi ne bulayi tawe, balingila mu sibala esio. Ndibaelesia sibala esio mala balisibukula sibe sisiabwe.
Nenywe kobolayo muche mu sichiimi lubeka lwe sia nyanja eya Shamu.’
“Mwangobosia muli, ‘Khwakholile bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khulacha mala khupane nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhulaka.’ Nono buli mulala khwinywe erekekha ne bulwaani bwewe khulwe liie. Mwebaasia muli liaba liliangu khukhwingila mu sibala sie bikulu.
“Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Baboolele oli mukhacha mwebwaakala namwe mwapana tawe sikila ese sendi ne nanywe tawe. Basiku benywe balamubunia enywe.’
Nono ese namuboolela enywe ne se mwarekeeresia tawe. Ne kakhali, mwalekelesia lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mwaba ne lilielola mala mwacha mu sibala sie bikulu.
Nio Baamori ba bamenyanga mu sibala sie bikulu esio barura khukhupana ne nanywe. Bamutimania oli enjukhi ne mutimania mala banuula khukhwama Edomu khukhwola e Horima.
Ne enywe mwakobola mala mwalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se aaulila namwe arekeeresia kakenywe tawe.
Nono mwarama e Kadeshi khulwe siise sileeyi nisio mwamenyayo.

“Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
‘Mwabotookheleele sibala sie bikulu sino khulwe siise sileeyi. Cha lubeka lwe ebunaswa.
Boolela babaandu oli, muli siimbi khubira mu sibala Edomu sie balebe benywe be lisaaye lia Esau. Balaba bari khwinywe.
Nono, rekeeresia bulayi mukharakikha liie ne nabo tawe, sikila se ndikho nja khumuelesiakho kamaloba kabwe, siakhaba sikele silala tawe. Sikila naelesia lisaaye lia Esau sikulu sia Edomu nga kumukabwa kwewe.
Mukule siakhulia ne kameechi ke khunywa khukhwama khu nibo.’
“Khebulila nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne amubiita enywe chikhabi mu buli siindu nisio mwakhola. Aamuliindile enywe nga mwabirire mu sichiimi sibalaayi sino. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abele ne nanywe khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane kino. Se mwatambilekho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
“Khwako khwachiililila ne lukeendo khwabira busa khu balebe befwe be lisaaye lia Esau ba baamenya Edomu khwayukha khwalekha kumuyila kukwama Elati ne Esioni-geberi mala khwalola lubeka lwe mu sichiimi sia Moabu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Mukhanania babaandu ba Moabu, namwe mwapana ne nabo tawe kabe kario sikila ese se ndamuelesiakho enywe kamaloba kabwe kosi kosi tawe. Naelesia lukoba lwa Ari khu lisaaye lia Loti nga kumukabwa.’
“(Ekholo eye babaandu be kamaani lundi baboofu lukali, balaangwa bali Baemi bamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Ari. Baba baleeyi busa nga Baanakimu. Baanakimu eli e kholo ekiindi eye babaandu baboofu lukali.
Nga Baanakimu, Baemi bosi bamanyikhana bali Barefaimu, ne kakhali Bamoabu babalanganga bali Baemi.
Baori bosi bamenyanga mu Edomu ekhunyoa. Ne kakhali be lisaaye lia Esau babatimania baruramo, mala bamenya mu maloba ako mu bweyaangu bwe Baori. Be lisaaye lia Esau bakholela bulayi bwene nga Baisiraeli ne babakholela. Baisiraeli bosi batimania Baori khukhwama mu maloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne aelesia Baisiraeli.)
“Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolela ali, ‘Nono yinyokha mala mwambukhe luluuchi lwa Sereti.’ Nio khwenyokha khwambukha luluuchi lwa Sereti.
Khukhwama e Kadeshi-barinea khukhwola nga ne khwambukha litooma lia Sereti khwakhubukula kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na munaane. Babaandu boosi ba baaba banamae baba bafwiliile mu kambi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aba ne abalaka.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ababiila khukhwola nga ne ababunia khukhwama mu kambi.
“Enyuma we banamae abo boosi khufwa,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
‘Endaalo yino mucha khubirira siimbi ne lulwakha lwa Moabu e Ari.
Ne mwimbiya Baamoni, mukhabanaania namwe mwabarangana tawe. Kabe kario sikila ese se nja khumuelesiakho enywe kamaloba ke Baamoni kosi kosi tawe. Kamaloba ako kali ke lisaaye lia Loti.’ ”
(Akhaba lundi kamaloba kano kamanyikhana nga kamaloba ke Barefaimu, lisina lie babaandu babamenyangamo. Baamori babalanganga bali Basamusumimu.
Barefaimu baba baleeyi lukali nga Baanakimu. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ababunia ebweeni we Baamoni. Baamoni babatimania mala bamenya mu bweyaangu bwe Barefaimu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba akholele ario Baedomu, be lisaaye lia Esau. Abunia Baori ebweeni we Baedomu, akhola Baedomu baoona Baori khukhwama mu sibala siabwe mala bamenyamo mu bweyaangu bwabwe khukhwola luno.
Ne Bakatitori nabo babunia Bahibi babamenyanga mu birekere biicha khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Kasa mala bamenya mu bweyaangu bwabwe.)
“Yinyokha oche wambukhe litooma lia Arinoni. Nareere Sihoni omwami owe Baamori owamenya mu lukoba lwa Heshiboni mu sibala siewe mu bunyali bwowo. Mwibwaakale, mala murakikhe khukhwingisia sibala siewe.
Khukhwama endaalo yino ndarakikha khukhola babaandu be khu sibala bamurie enywe. Buli mundu olaulila kakenywe alareenga mala abe omuri.
“Nio naruma barume khukhwama mu sichiimi sia Ketemoti bacha khu mwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni ne kamakhuwa ke kumuleembe. Naloma ndi,
‘Nosiima khulekhe khubirire mu sibala siowo. Khulaloonda busa kumuyila kwong'ene se khulaukhakho tawe.
Khularuunga siakhulia nisio khulia ne kameechi niko khunywa. Ne kakhali khulekhe khubirire mu sibala siowo.
Khola orio nga be lisaaye lia Esau bamenyile Edomu ne bakhukholela efwe. Akhaba Bamoabu bosi bakhukholela bario. Khukholele orio khukhwola nga khwingila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe akhuelesia efwe.’
“Ne kakhali omwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni se akhulekhuula khubira mu sibala siewe tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe aba amuminyaasia nio amure mu bunyali bwenywe nga lili luno.
“Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Lola narakikhe khura omwami Sihoni ne sibala siewe, mu bunyali bwenywe. Rakikha khukhwingisia sibala siewe mala musimenyemo.’
Sihoni ne babaandu bewe boosi barura khukhupana ne nafwe siimbi alukoba lwa Yaasi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe amura mu bunyali bwefwe mala khwamuula. Khwamwiira niye ne babaana bewe, ne babaandu bewe boosi.
Khwaamba chingoba chewe choosi. Khwonakakila elala buli lukoba, baseecha, bakhasi, ne babaana. Se khwaramiakho omundu omulamu tawe.
Khwabukula chikhaafu chong'ene nga kimiaandu ne kimiaandu kie mu ngoba.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe ara chingoba choosi khukhwama Aroeri, khu ndulo khwe litooma lia Arunoni, ne lukoba luli akari we litooma elio khukhwola Kileati mu bunyali bwefwe. Se lwabao lukoba lulwaba luleeyi khwifwe tawe.
Ne se khwacha siimbi e sibala sie Baamori namwe khu sikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Yaboki namwe khu ngoba che mu sibala sie bikulu namwe abuundu osi osi niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe aba ne akhulaka ali mukhachayo tawe.

“Nio khwacha lubeka lwe bunaswa khwaluungikha sibala sia Bashani. Ne omwami Oku owa Bashani arula ne babaandu bewe boosi akhwibwaakala siimbi alukoba lwa Etrei.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Mukhamuria tawe. Ndikho nja khura niye ne babaandu bewe ne sibala siewe sioosi mu bunyali bwenywe. Mukhole niko mwakholela Sihoni omwami owe Baamori owamenyanga mu Heshiboni.’
“Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ara akhaba omwami Oku ne babaandu bewe mu bunyali bwefwe mala khwabeera boosi.
Siise esio khwaamba chingoba chewe choosi. Se lwabao lukoba nilwo khukhatiila tawe. Khwatiila chingoba choosi alala kamakhumi sita, ne lukoongo lwa Arikobu lwosi niio Omwami Oku amiianga.
Chingoba chino choosi chaba chabotookhelelwa ne lisiisi lileeyi lukali, bilibwa bileeyi ne bichuuma bibiikala bilibwa. Lundi biabao birekere bikali bikhaba ne biabotookhelesibwa ne kamasiisi tawe.
Khwababunia elala nga khwakhola omwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni, khwonakaka buli lukoba, khwabunia baseecha, bakhasi ne babaana.
Ne kakhali khwabukula chikhaafu choosi ne kimiaandu kie mungoba.
“Nono siise esio khwanuula babaami be Baamori babili abo sibala siili ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani khwatiila, khukhwama mu litooma lia Arinoni khukhwola khu sikulu sia Herimoni.
(Basidoni balanganga sikulu sia Herimoni bali Sirioni ne Baamori basilanganga bali Seniri)
Khwatiila sibala sioosi sisieteleela ne kamaloba koosi ka Kileati ne ka Bashani khucha khukhwola ebukwe khu chingoba cha Saleka ne Etrei.”
(Omwami Oku yeng'ene owarama khu Barefaimu. Sitanda
“Nga Khwabukula sibala siaba sisiefwe. Naelesia chikholo cha Rubeni ne Kati sibala khukhwama khu lukoba lwa Aroeri siimbi ne litooma lia Arinoni ne akhaba ne malala khu maloba ke sibala sie bikulu sia Kileati alala ne chingoba chasio.
Ne balala khu kholo eya Manase nabaelesia sibala sisiaba ne sisikale sioosi sia Kileati, ne Bashani sioosi nisio Oku aba ne amiia lukoongo lwa Arikobu lwoosi.” (Bashani siaba siamanyikhana nga sibala sie Barefaimu.
Yairi khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase abukula lukoongo lwoosi lwa Arikobu, Bashani, khucha khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Keshuri ne Maaka. Atiuukha birekere ebio lisina liewe. Abitiuukha ali Hafoti-yairi mala bisimanyikhana busa birio khukhwola luno,)
“Naelesia be nju eya Makiri khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase kamaloba ka Kileati.
Ne khu kholo cha Rubeni ne Kati nabaelesia sibala sisiama khu Kileati khukhwola khu litooma lia Arinoni. Akari we litooma niio aaba lulwakha lwabwe khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Yaboki niio lulwakha lwe Baamoni lwaba.
Lubeka lwe mumbo lulwakha lwola khu luuchi lwa Yoritani, lwacha khukhwama khu nyanja eya Kalilaya lubeka lwe ebunaswa, lwekha khukhwola khu nyanja eya Araba, yaani enyanja eya Chumbe khukhwola khu miikha kia Pisika lubeka lwe ebukwe.
Ne kakhali bakhasi benywe bong'ene, ne babaana ne chikhaafu (manyile ndi muli ne chikhaafu chingali) balasikala enyuma mungoba nicho muelesie enywe.
Mukhole murio khukhwola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ayeeta babasienywe ne bengila mu maloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abaelesia engelekha owa Yoritani. Enyuma wako munyala mwakobola buli mulala mu maloba kewe niko namuelesia.’
“Ne nalaka Yoshua ndi, ‘Wabona koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wowo akholela babaami babili abo, Sihoni ne Oku. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhole busa ario khu bwami bwoosi nibwo muchamo.
Okhabaria tawe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamupanila.’
‘Ee Omwami WELE, ewe niwe orakikhe khukhunjekesia ese omukholi wowo bukali bwowo ne kamaani kowo, se aliio wele okundi mwikulu namwe khu sibala, onyala wakhola bibiindu bie khuukia nga bibiowo tawe.
Nosiima, khusaba ndekhuule nje mbone kamaloba kamalayi engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, sibala silayi sie bikulu bia Lebanoni.’
“Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambambila lirima sikila enywe mala amboolela ali, ‘Wanyalile orio! Okhararakho khu kano lundi tawe!
Cha khu ndeleelwa khwe sikulu sia Pisika. Ne wolilekho, lola ebunaswa, ebunafubo, ebukwe, ne mumbo. Loleelesia bulayi nisio obona, sikila ewe se olambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani luno tawe.
Ne kakhali eelesia Yoshua kamalaka mala omuremo kumwoyo omutinyilisie. Niye olemeelela babaandu bano mala banyoole kamaloba niko olabona ako.’
Nio khwasikala mwitooma lilialoleelela lukoba lwa Beti-peori.”

Nio Musa aboolela babaandu ali, “Baisiraeli, ria kamalaka koosi niko ndikho mwekisia enywe mala mukhole nga kenyekha. Mwakhola murio, mulayindila mala mwingile ne khumenya mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe alikho amuelesia.
Mukhatasakho liosi liosi khu niko ese mulakile tawe, lundi mukharusiakho liosi liosi tawe. Ria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, niko muelesie enywe.
Enywe mwabene mwabona niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola a sikulu sia Baali-peori. Eera buli mundu owasaaya Baali,
ne kakhali enywe mumwasuubila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu siili balamu khukhwola endaalo yino.
“Lola ese namwekisia enywe kamalaka koosi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase ne aandaka, mukhoya mukhole khuloondekhana ne nako ne mucha mu sibala nisio mucha khumenya.
Ba barekeerefu mukhuria kamalaka kano. Ne mukhola murio, mulekesia babaandu be chikholo chichiindi muli enywe muli bakesi lundi be liiulila.
“Se eliio ekholo ekiindi yakhaba ne eli eye kamaani kamakali eli ne wele ooli siimbi ne nayo, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ne ali nafwe tawe. Buli lwosi ne khwenya buyeeti khumusaba, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abechanga siimbi ne nafwe.
Se eliio ekholo ekiindi yakhaba ne eli eye kamaani lukali, eeli ne kamalaka kaali busa nga niko ese mwekeesie enywe endaalo yino tawe.
Ba barekerefu nio mulekhe khukhwibilila niko mwabona ne chimoni chenywe. Boolela babaana benywe ne babechukhulu benywe.
Khebulila endaalo niyo mwemela ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe a sikulu sia Sinai
Baboolele nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alomaloma ne nanywe khukhwama mu mulilo, nga ne mwamuulila ne alikho alomaloma ne se mwamubonakho mu sifwaanani siosi siosi tawe.
Amuboolela ke endakaano yewe niyo aakhola ne nanywe mala aamuboolela khuria kamalaka kewe ekhumi. Aakaandika khu mabaale kabili.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese mweyikie enywe kamalaka koosi niko mularia mu sibala nisio muli siimbi khwingilamo.
“Endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma khwinywe khubirira mu mulilo khu sikulu sia Sinai, se mwabonakho efwaani yosi yosi tawe. Khwako ba barekerefu.
Mukhakhola murio mwakhola bubwoni khulwe khukhwikholela bifwaani bie sisiindu siosi siosi siakhaba sio omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi tawe.
Mukhekholelakho sifwaani sie esaang'i namwe enyuni,
namwe sie sisiindu siosi siosi simoola namwe eng'eeni tawe.
Mukhakhola murio mwasaaya bie mu ngaaki nga enyanga namwe kumwesi namwe ching'enieesi namwe sisiindu siosi siosi sie mu ngaaki tawe. Ebio bili bibiindu nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aelesia babaandu babaandi boosi buli abuundu khu sibala khubisaaya.
Ne kakhali enywe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamubukula amurusia khukhwama mu Misiri, sibala sisiaba nga sisiooso khwinywe nio mube babaandu be kumukabwa kwewe nga ne muli luno.
Khutasa khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambambila ese lirima sikila enywe, nio echuba ali ese se nambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani tawe. Amboolela ali ese se khache mu sibala silayi nisio niye alikho acha khumuelesia enywe nga kumukabwa tawe.
Ese ndafwila mu sibala sino. Se ndambukha luluuchi tawe. Ne kakhali enywe muli siimbi khulwambukha mala mubukule kamaloba kengakha ako.
Ba barekerefu. Mukhebilila endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhola ne nanywe tawe. Mukhakhola murio mwekholela bifwaani nibio; Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamukaania enywe tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali ne likhendekha, ali nga kumulilo kuburukha.
“Akhaba enyuma we khumenya mu sibala khulwe siise sileeyi ne khusaala babaana ne babechukhulu, lundi mwasaakhulua, mukhakhola bubwoni khulwe khukhwikholela sifwaani sie sisiindu siosi siosi tawe. Buno buli bubwoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Ne mukhola murio mulaambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima.
Likulu ne liloba bili buloli khwinywe endaalo yino, mwaba ne mukharia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, mulabunisibwa elala mu sibala nisio mulikho mucha khwambukha Yoritani mala mwingisie. Se mucha khumenyamo siise sileeyi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamusalanisia enywe mu baandu Be chikholo chichiindi, lundi mube batiiti mu kholo nimwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimusalanisiamo.
Ebweeneyo mulikholela bawele ba bakholwa ne babaandu, bababechwa khukhwama khu mirongooro ne khu mabaale. Baliba bawele bakhanyala babona namwe baulila, namwe balia, namwe baunyila tawe.
Ne kakhali akhaba ebweeneyo mukhaenje Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mwaba ne mu muenja ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi mukhamunyoole.
Kamakhuwa kano ne kamwekholekhakho mala mube mu butinyu mu biise ebio, muliyuukha khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala mumuulile.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali owe siisa. Se alimulekha enywe, namwe amubunie, namwe ebilile endakaano niyo akhola ne bakuuka benywe tawe.
“Yibaasia ke biise bibiabira, mu biise nibio mwaba ne mukhasaalwa tawe. Lola enyuma khukhwola khu biise nibio Wele abaang'anilamo omundu khu sibala. Lola buli abuundu khu sibala. Sisiindu siosi siosi siboofu nga sino sisiekholekhakho namwe siauliilikhakho ku?
Babaandu bosi bosi, ba baamenya enyuma we khuulila Wele ne alomaloma khu nibo khubirira mu mulilo nga enywe ne mwaulila balikhoo ku?
Namwe wele yesi yesi oweaana khucha mala abukule babaandu be ekholo khukhwama mu kholo ekiindi, mala abakhole babe babewe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne aamukholela enywe mu Misiri alikhoo ku? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukholela enywe ario khulwe khurumikhira kamakhako, bimanyisio, bie khuukia, liie, kamaani ne bibiindu bie khuriisia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwekesie enywe lino nio mumanye muli niye ali Wele ne okundi se aliio tawe.
Aakhola enywe muulile kumumilo kwewe khukhwama mwikulu. Aamwekesia kumulilo kwewe kumukali khukhwama khu sibala mala alomaloma khwinywe khubirira mu mulilo okwo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima bakuuka benywe, mala aamurobora enywe, omwene aamurusia enywe khukhwama mu Misiri khubirira mu bunyali bwewe bukali.
Aoona chikholo chichiindi chimboofu lundi che kamaani lukali khumukhila enywe nio aamureera enywe mala aamuelesia sibala siabwe khuuba sisienywe. Sili sisienywe khukhwola luno.
Manya mala musuubile endaalo yino, khebulila muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele mwikulu ne khu sibala Wele okundi se aliio tawe.
Khwako ria kamalaka kewe koosi niko ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino, mala mulaba bulayi, enywe ne lisaaye lienywe. Ne mukhola murio, mulayindila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe mindali na mindali.”
Nicho omundu yaba anyala elukhilamo mala aona aaba ne eriire omundu ne akheteekile khumwiira tawe. Oyo ofwiile ne akhabechanga omusiku wewe tawe, omwiiri anyala elukhila mu lulala khu ngoba chino mala aona.
Khu be kholo eya Rubeni lwabayo lukoba lwa Beseri khu mweyeywe kwe mu sichiimi, khu be kholo eya Kati lwabayo lukoba lwa Ramoti, mu sibala sia Kileati ne khu be kholo eya Manase lwabayo lukoba lwa Kolani, mu sibala sia Bashani.
Kano kali kamalaka ka Wele niko Musa aelesia Baisiraeli.
Aababoolela ne bamalile khurura mu Misiri.
Baba engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani mu litooma lilialoleelela Beti-peori, mu sibala sia Sihoni. Sihoni aba omwami owe Baamori ba bamenyanga Heshiboni. Musa ne babaandu ba Isiraeli baula Baamori nga Baisiraeli baba ne bamile e Misiri.
Baisiraeli bengisia sibala sia Sihoni ne sibala sia Oku omwami owa Bashani. Abo baba babaami babili be Baamori babamenyanga ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Sibala sino siama khu lukoba lwa Aroeri khu ndulo khwe litooma lia Arinoni khukhwola khu sikulu sia Sirioni,
Lundi siatubaasia ne litooma lioosi liliaba ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala siacha khukhwola khu Nyanja eya chumbe eli asi we sikulu sia Pisika.

Musa aalaanga alala babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi mala aababoolela ali, “Isiraeli enywe Ulila kamalaka niko ndikho muboolela endaalo yino. Keyike mala mube barekerefu khukaria.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe aakhola endakaano a sikulu sia Sinai.
Se aakhola endakaano eyo ne bakuuka benywe bong'ene tawe, ne kakhali akhola ne nafwe fwesi khuli balamu endaalo yino.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma khwinywe moni na moni a sikulu khubirira mu mulilo.
Ese nema akari wenywe ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siise esio khumuboolela enywe niko aaloma. Nakhola ndio sikila enywe mwaria kumulilo, ne se mwanyala khuniina khu sikulu tawe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, ‘Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamurusia enywe khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri munju eye bunasioobi.
“ ‘Okhaba ne bawele babaandi nekhali ese tawe.
Okhabinamila namwe obikholele tawe, sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ndi Wele owe likhendekha. Ese mbukuuma babaana sikila bubwoni bwe basaasi babwe, khukhwola khu bechukhulu ne khu bisoni biaabo babambiila ese.
Ne kakhali nekesia busiime bwase bwa buli lwosi khu baandu bakali
Khu ndaalo sita khola kimilimo kiowo kioosi.
Ne kakhali endaalo eya saba eli endaalo eya sabato khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Khu ndaalo ng'eneyo okhakhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe, obeele ewe namwe omwana wowo omusoleeli namwe omukhaana namwe nasioobi wowo owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi namwe eeyi yowo namwe epunda namwe ekhaafu yowo namwe omukwa yesi yesi niye ewe omenyile ne naye tawe. Nokhola orio, akhaba nasioobi bowo bosi banyala baola.
Khebulila oli waba nasioobi mu sibala sia Misiri, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo aakhurusiamo mu ngila eye kamaani kamakali ne bunyali. Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo aakhulaka khuliinda endaalo eya sabato.
“Nga sikulu siaba ne siburukha enywe mwaulila kumumilo khukhwama mu siilima. Nio babemeelesi benywe ne basaakhulu be mu chikholo chenywe banjichakho.
Baloma bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhwekesie efwe luyali ne kamaani kewe. Ne efwe khwauliile kumumilo kwewe khubirira mu mulilo. Endaalo yino khwaboone khuli Wele anyala aalomaloma ne omundu mala omundu achiilila khuba omulamu.
Nono siina sikila khufwe? Kumulilo kumukali kuno kulakhubunia efwe. Khwaulila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ne alomaloma lundi, khulafwa.
Aliio omundu yesi yesi owamenya, enyuma we khuulila Wele omenyile mindali ne alomaloma khukhwama mu mulilo nga efwe ne khuli ku?
Ewe Musa cha siimbi, mala orekeeresie buli siindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhuboolela. Enyuma wako, olakhuboolela efwe niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhuboolele ewe. Ne efwe khulaulila mala khukhole nga aloma.’
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaulila niko mwamboolela. Amboolela ali, ‘Nauliile niko babaandu bano balomile. Niko balomile koosi kali ng'ali.
Bakhoya babe ne liiria khwise bario buli lwosi ne khuria kamalaka kase koosi nio nibo ne lisaaye liabwe babe bulayi khulwa mindali na mindali.
Cha mala obaboolele oli, “Kobola mu maeema kenywe.”
Ne kakhali ewe yiima siimbi nase, ne ese ndakhuboolela kamalaka koosi niko ocha khubeyikia. Bakhoya bakarie ne bali mu sibala nisio ndikho mbaelesia khuuba sisiabwe.’
“Khwako mukhoya mube barekerefu khukhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne amulakile. Mukhakalekha tawe.
Khe murie koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amulakile. Khola murio nio mumenye, lundi nio mube bulayi ne khuyindila mu maloba niko mulikho munyoola khuuba kakenywe.”

“Lino lili lilaka nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aandaka ese mwiyikie enywe. Murie kamalaka kano ne muli mu sibala nisio muli siimbi khwingisia mala mumenyemo.
Enywe ne lisaaye lienywe khe murie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khubirira mu khuria kamalaka kewe koosi niko ndikho muelesia enywe. Khola murio mu limenya lienywe lioosi nio muyindile.
Khwako Isiraeli ulila mala mube barekerefu khukaria nio mube bulayi lundi nio mutasiikhe lukali ne mumenya mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe aamusuubisia enywe.
Okhoya osiime Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi, ne kamaani kowo koosi.
Khebulila kamalaka niko ese ndikho khuelesia endaalo yino.
Yekisia babaana bowo kamalaka kano. Kalomalome ne wikhaale munju mwowo, lundi ne olikho okeenda khu ngila, ne olikho ouluukha lundi ne olikho okhola kimilimo.
Kaboe khu makhono kowo mala okafware mwikosi kabe kakhukhebusia.
Kaandike khu lwiiki lwowo ne khu bilibwa biowo.
Lundi sili ne chinju chichechula bibiindu bilayi nibio mukharaamo tawe. Lundi sili ne chisebele nicho enywe mukhaayaba tawe, nende kamaruuti ne kimikuunda kie kimiseituni nikio enywe mukhabiaala tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amureera mu sibala sino, mala mulie mwikure,
mukheebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owamurusia mu Misiri niio mwaba banasioobi tawe.
Ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mukholele ne khumusaaya niye yeng'ene ne khukhwechuba mu lisina liewe.
Mukhasaaya bawele be babaandu babaandi nibo mumenyile nabo tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ooli mwinywe yuno ali Wele owe likhendekha. Mwaba ne mukhakhola niko enya tawe, alimuambila lirima mala amubunie murure khu sibala.
Mube barekerefu mu khuria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niko aamuelesia enywe.
Khola kaali kamaluungi lundi kamalayi, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio mube bulayi, nio mwingisie ne khubukula kamaloba kamalayi ke kumukabwa. Kali kamaloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aasuubisia khuelesia bakuuka benywe.
Mulaoona basiku benywe baalimo boosi, basiku baali ebweeni wenywe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne asuubisia.
“Mu siise sisiicha babaana benywe balimureeba enywe bali, ‘Sifuno sie kamalaka kano sili siina?’
Baboolele muli, ‘Efwe khwaba banasioobi bo mwami Farao owe Misiri. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhureesia efwe khubirira mu bunyali bwewe bukali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola kamaya nende bie khuukia biboofu lundi biriisia mu sibala sia Misiri ne khu Farao ne enju yewe.
Akhurusia efwe khukhwama Misiri khukhureera efwe ano ne khukhuelesia efwe sibala sino, nga ne aaba ne aasuubisia bakuuka befwe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe aakhulaka efwe khurie kamalaka kano koosi ne khumuria niye. Khwaaba ne khukhola khurio, khuliba bulayi buli lwosi nio achiililile khu khuliinda efwe nga luno.
Khwaaba ne khuria buli sisiindu mu burekeerefu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe nga aakhulaka, aba silaba sisiindu sie buluungi.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhare babaandu bano mu bunyali bwenywe mala mubaule. Mukhoya mubabunisilie elala. Mukhakholakho endakaano yosi yosi ne nabo, namwe mubakholele siisa tawe.
Mukhakhwanakho ne nabo tawe, lundi mukhafukiilila babaana benywe basoleeli nende bakhaana bayilana nabo tawe.
Mwakhola murio, babaandu abo baliyuusia babaana benywe balekhe khuloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala basaaye bawele babaandi. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamuambile enywe lirima mala amubunie khangu murure mu sibala.
Ne kakhali mukhabakholele muri: Mukhatechulake chialutare chabwe, muumbulake chinjeko chabwe ne khurema bifwaani biabwe bia wele Asiera. Lundi mwosie bifwaani biabwe.
Mukhakhole lino sikila enywe muli batakatifu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Aamurobora enywe khukhwama mu baandu be khu sibala boosi mube babaandu be kumukabwa kwewe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aamusiima enywe mala aamurobora sikila mwaba bakali khukhila babaandu babaandi tawe. Enywe mwaba ekholo endiiti khu sibala sioosi.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamusiima enywe mala eenya khuliinda liliechubo nilio aakhola khu bakuuka benywe. Lilienelio nilio likila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amuonia enywe ne kamaani kewe kamakali mala aamukhola mube balekhuule khukhwama munju eye bunasioobi, khukhwama mu bunyali bwa Farao omwami owa Misiri.
Khwako manya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali Wele. Lundi ali omusuubilifu. Aliindanga endakaano ne khukhwekesia busiime bwewe bwa buli ndaalo mu selukho chingali chaabo ba bamusiima niye ne khuria kamalaka kewe.
Ne aananga kumunaanio khwaabo babamubiila niye mu ngila eye khubabunia. Se alekhaanga khuaana kumunaanio khwaabo babamubiila tawe.
Khwako ba barekerefu khukhola khuloondekhana ne kamalaka niko ndikho muelesia enywe luno.
Alamusiima enywe ne khumubiita enywe chikhabi, nio amukhole mutasiikhe mube bakali mala mube ne babaana bakali. Alaana chikhabi khu mikuunda kienywe, nio mube ne bibiaamo, endali ne kamafura. Alamubiita enywe chikhabi khulwe khumuelesia chikhaafu chingali ne kamakheese. Alamueleselia enywe chikhabi chino choosi mu sibala nisio aasuubisia bakuuka benywe ali alimuelesia enywe.
Enywe mulibiitwa chikhabi khukhila chikholo choosi. Buli omuseecha namwe omukhasi aliba no mwana. Ne chikhaafu chenywe se chikhasuune tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhamurusiekho bulwaale bwoosi. Bulwaale bumayaanu bwe e Misiri nibwo mwamanya se bulimwichakho tawe. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alielesia bulwaale obwo boosi babamubiila enywe.
Ne mukhoya mubunie babaandu boosi nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alira mu bunyali bwenywe. Mukhabakholela siisa namwe mwasaaya bawele babwe tawe, sikila lilienelio liliba kumureko khwinywe.
“Mukhaloma muli, ‘Babaandu bano bali be kamaani khu khukhila efwe, nono se khunyala khwabarusiamo tawe.’
Mukhabaria tawe. Ne kakhali khebulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aakholela Farao omwami owe Misiri ne khu baandu bewe boosi.
Khebulila kamakhako kamakali niko mwabona, bimanyisio ne bibiindu bie khuukia ne kamaani ne bunyali bukali nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe arumikhira khumukhola enywe mube balekhuule. Alibunia babaandu nibo muriire bano boosi, mu ngila ng'eneyo.
Khutasa khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alabarumira nibo butinyu
Mukharia babaandu bano tawe, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali ne nanywe, ali Wele omukali lundi niye babaandu baria.
Akhaoone chikholo chino chirure ebweeni wenywe siangeekhe siangeekhe. Se mulanyala khuchibunia choosi khangu busa mu siise silala tawe, sikila mwaba ne mukhola murio chisaang'i che mundaa chilatasikha mala chibe ne kamaani lukali khwinywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhare basiku benywe mu bunyali bwenywe mala abakoyaanie bamwiembeelele khukhwola nga ne babunisibwa.
Akhare babaami babwe mu bunyali bwenywe. Mukhabeere mala balibililwa se aliio olinyala khumukhiingilila enywe tawe, mulabunia buli mundu.
Mulaambia bifwaani bie bawele babwe biye. Mukhekoomba efwesa namwe esahabu eeli khu bifwaani tawe lundi mukhabukula ebe eyenywe tawe. Mwaba ne mukhola murio, ebio bilaba kimireko khwinywe. Bibiindu ebio bisinya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Mukhareerakho silala khu bifwaani bino mu chingo chenywe tawe, busa mukhola murio mwaba silaamo nga nibio. Bibukule khuba biibi lundi bisinya, sikila bili asi we silaamo sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

“Ria mu burekeerefu kamalaka koosi niko naama khumuelesia enywe endaalo yino, nio mumenye, mutasiikhe mube bakali mala mwingisie sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asuubisia khuelesia bakuuka benywe.
Khebulila nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne amurangirira enywe khu lukeendo luleeyi khubirira mu sichiimi kimiiko kibirire kamakhumi kane kino. Aamukhola mweboombia mala aamukela enywe nio amanye nisio mwenya khukhola, ne munyala mwaria kamalaka kewe namwe tawe.
Aamukhola enywe mweboombia mwaulila enjala, mala amuelesia mana mwalia, siakhulia nisio enywe ne bakuuka benywe mwaba musiili khuliakho tawe. Aakhola lino khumwekesia enywe ali omundu se amenya khulwe kumukaati kwong'ene tawe, ne kakhali khu buli sisiindu siosi siosi nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma.
Chingubo chenywe se chatabuukhe khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane kino namwe enywe se mwabimbile bikele tawe.
Manya nono muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amuukuuma enywe nga paapa owe babaana ne auukuuma babaana bewe.
Nono, mukhoya murie kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Loonda chingila chewe mala mu murie niye.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amureera enywe mu sibala siili silayi sie chisebele che kameechi chichukha mu matooma ne mu bikulu.
Sili sibala sie ngaanu ne shayiri, chisabibu, chinduli, kamatuunda kamakomanga, kimiseituni ne bubuukhi.
Kali kamaloba niko muliliamo siakhulia siikhawa tawe, se mulitaamba tawe, chinyaanda che sibala esio chili bichuuma, ne munyala mwayaba koopa khukhwama mu bikulu biasio.
Mukhalie mala mwikure mala musiime Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khulwe khumuelesia enywe sibala sie ngakha.
Mukhalie mwikure, mwombakhe chinju chindayi che khumenyamo.
Chikhaafu chenywe ne kamakheese, efwesa yenywe ne esahabu, ne bibiindi bioosi nibio muliba nabio bilitasikha.
Ne munyoolile bibiindu bino bioosi mukheniinia mala mwebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamureesia enywe khukhwama Misiri niio mwaba banasioobi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamurangirira mwabira mu sichiimi sibalaayi lundi siriisia, niio chindemu che bufwisi ne walute chaba. Sichiimi esio siaba sisioomu, lundi siikhali ne kameechi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola kameechi kaama mu lwanda.
Aamuelesia enywe mana mu sichiimi mwalia, siakhulia nisio bakuuka benywe baba ne bakhaliakho tawe. Amukholela ario nio amukhole mweboombie lundi amukele nio ekhumaliilikha amukholele bulayi.
Mukhaloma muli, ‘Kamaani kefwe ne bunyali bwefwe nibio bibiakila khwanyoola buiinda buno tawe.’
Mukhoya mukhebulile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Niye omuelesianga bunyali bwe khuba baiinda. Akholanga ario sikila aliinda endakaano niyo aakhola ne bakuuka benywe nga ne kali luno.
Ne mwaba ne mwibilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala mwasaaya bawele babaandi ne khubakholela, ese mukaania enywe luno ndi ng'ali mukhabune.
Mulibuna nga chikholo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakholanga ne chibuna enywe ne muloleleele. Kaliba kario mwaba ne mukharia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe.

“Isiraeli ulila. Endaalo yino oli siimbi khwambukha Luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala wingisie sibala sie chikholo chimboofu lundi che kamaani lukali khukhukhila ewe. Chingoba chabwe chili chimbalaayi, ne kamasiisi kamaleeyi kakaniina mu ngaaki.
Babaandu abo bali baleeyi lundi be kamaani. Bali be lisaaye lia Anaki, mwaulila ne liboolwa lili, ‘Mbao onyala eema ebweeni we Baanaki tawe.’
Khwako manya endaalo yino muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niye olarangira ebweeni wenywe nga kumulilo kutirira. Akhabaule mala ababunie. Ne enywe mukhabaoone mala mubabunie khangu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulakile.
“Enyuma wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khurusiamo babaandu bano, mukhaloma muli, ‘Khwaba baluungi nio liakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhureera mu sibala sie engakha sino tawe.’ Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhatimanie chikholo echo sikila bumayaanu bwacho.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se alikho atimania chikholo chino ebweeni wenywe sikila buluungi bwenywe namwe bung'ali bwenywe tawe. Ne kakhali alikho akhola ario sikila bumayaanu bwe chikholo chino nio echusie likhuwa nilio aalaka bakuuka benywe Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.
Khwako manya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se alikho amuelesia enywe sibala sie ngakha sino sikila muli baluungi tawe. Enywe muli babaandu be sileka.
“Mukhebilila nga mwaambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe lirima likali mu sichiimi tawe. Khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo mwarekukhilakho khukhwama e Misiri khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo mwoleelekho ano, mwaba barengu khu niye.
Akhaba a sikulu sia Sinai mwaambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima likali mala aaba eenya khumubunia enywe.
Naniina nacha khu sikulu khukhwakaanila kamabaale ke kamalaka, kamalaka ke endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ne nanywe. Namenyayo chindaalo kamakhumi kane mala se nalia namwe nanywa sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesia ese kamabaale kabili niko omwene aandikakho. Kamabaale ako kabaakho kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma ne nanywe khukhwama mu mulilo khu ndaalo niyo mwebusiliakho a sikulu.
Enyuma we chindaalo kamakhumi kane, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesia ese kamabaale kabili ke kamalaka ke endakaano.
“Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Yiikha asi khangu sikila babaandu bowo, nibo warangirira khukhwama mu Misiri bakholile kakhali ng'ali tawe. Bayuukhile khale balekhile niko nabalaka. Bekholeele sifwaani.’
“Khutasa khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Naboone ndi babaandu bano bali ne sileka.
Ndekhe mala mbabunie, nio akhabao omundu olibakhebulila lundi tawe. Ne ese, ndakhukhola ewe obe ekholo emboofu lundi eye kamaani khukhila nga nibo ne bali.’
“Nio nayukha nekha khukhwama khu sikulu. Ne naba nasutile kamabaale kabili kakaandikwakho endakaano. Chimemu che kumulilo charuranga khukhwama mu sikulu.
Nalola mala nabona ndi enywe mwaba mwakaluukhane khale mwalekhile niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne amulaka. Mwaba mwekholeele sifwaani sie euunwa endoro.
Nio ese, namwaata asi kamabaale kabili ke kamalaka ako, nakaarakakila ebweeni wenywe.
Nakona mafumala ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga yaba ne nakholanga khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane. Se nalia namwe nanywakho sisiindu tawe. Nakhola ndio sikila enywe bubwoni bwoosi nibwo mwakhola ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mwamuambia lirima.
Ese naria lirima lirafu lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila enywe. Naria ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eenya khumubunia enywe. Ne kakhali biise ebio, aambulila ese.
Lundi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aakhalalila Aruni lukali eenya khumwiira. Ne kakhali siise sienesio nasabila Aruni yesi.
Ese nabukula sisiindu simayaanu, sifwaani sie euunwa nisio mwakhola nasioosia, nasiarakaka, nasisia siaba sinosie nga lipukhuulu. Naanya lipukhuulu elio mu luuchi lulwama mu sikulu.
Ne nga aamuruma khukhwama Kadeshi-barinea namulaka muche mubukule sibala nisio aaba ne alikho amuelesia enywe mwingisie, mwamukholela sileka. Se mwamusuubila namwe mwamuria tawe.
Mwaba barengu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama nga ese ne mumanya enywe.
“Nio nakona mafumala ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane echo, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba abisiisie khumubunia enywe.
Ne kakhali ese nasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi, ‘Ee Omwami WELE, okhabunia babaandu bowo ne kumukabwa kwowo tawe. Ewe wamwene owabareesia khukhwama Misiri ne kamaani kowo kamakali ne bunyali.
Khebulila bakholi bowo Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo mala okhaloleelesia sileka sie babaandu bano namwe, bubi ne bubwoni bwabwe tawe.
Wakhola orio, be mu sibala nimwo wakhurusiamo baliloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se anyala khubayila mu sibala nisio aabalaka tawe sikila beele ababiila. Abarusia e Misiri nio abeerere mu sichiimi.”
Kakhaba kario babaandu bano bali babowo, nibo ewe warusia mu Misiri ne bunyali bwowo bukali ne kamaani.’

“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, ‘Becha bipao bibili bie kamabaale nga bie khunyoa. Lundi khola lisanduku khukhwama khu murongooro mala oniine wiche khu sikulu niio ndi.
Ndaandika khu mabaale ako kamakhuwa kakaba khu mabaale ke khunyoa niko ewe waara. Ne ewe ocha khura kamabaale ako mu lisaanduku.’
“Nio nang'oona lisanduku lie kumurongooro kumunyaali, mala nabukula kamabaale kabili kafwaana nga ke khunyoa mala nakabukula nakayila khu sikulu.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aandika khu mabaale ako nga aakhola ekhunyoa. Akaandikakho kamalaka likhumi niko aamuboolela enywe a sikulu khukhwama mu mulilo khu ndaalo niyo mwaba ne mwibusiisie. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesia ese kamabaale ako.
Nio nayuukha nekha khukhwama khu sikulu. Ese nara kamabaale ako mu lisanduku nilio naba ne ng'oonile. Kamabaale kali ano nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne andaka.”
Baama ebweeneyo bacha Kutikota mala bachiililila boola Yotibata, abuundu alayi e kameechi.
Biise ebio,
Khwako Balawi se bali ne sitonyi siosi siosi namwe kumukabwa alala ne bawandaayabwe tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali kumukabwa kwabwe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne aaloma.)
Amboolela ali, ‘Cha oraangirire babaandu khu lukeendo, mala bengile mu sibala nisio nasuubisia bakuuka babwe.’
“Nono, Baisiraeli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe eenya mu murie, muloonde kakewe mala mu musiime ne khumukholela niye ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eenya murie kamalaka kewe koosi niko ndikho muelesia enywe luno khulwe bulayi bwenywe.
Akhaba likulu liili angaaki lukali lili lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhaba liloba lili liliewe, alala nende buli siindu silikho.
Ne kakhaba kario Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima bakuuka benywe lukali mala arobora lisaaye liabwe, enywe mu kholo choosi nga muli luno.
Khwako, khebwa kimiooyo kienywe mala mukhaba sitanya murwe lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali Wele owe bawele lundi Omwami owe babaami. Ali owe kamaani, owe bunyali. Ali lundi oriisia. Se ababilanga lundi safukiililanga asoya tawe.
Akhalakanga bung'ali bwe bafuubi nende bwe banamulekhwa. Asiima baakwa, lundi abaelesianga siakhulia ne chingubo.
Khwako siima baakwa, sikila enywe mwaba baakwa mu Misiri.
Ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala mu mukholele ne khumusaaya niye yeng'ene.
Mufumie niye. Ali Wele wenywe owamukholela enywe bibiindu biboofu lundi bie khuukia nibio muboone bino.
Bakuuka benywe ba bacha e Misiri baba kamakhumi saba bong'ene. Ne luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamukholile mwabeele bakali nga ching'enieesi.

“Khwako siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala murie kamalaka kewe koosi buli lwosi.
Khebulila siiukuumo sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe luno. Khebulila bukali bwewe kamaani kewe ne bunyali bwewe. Ese se ndikho mboolela babaana benywe bakhamanyile namwe bakhaboone tawe.
Khebulila kamayia kewe ne bikholwa nibio akholela Farao omwami owe Misiri ne khu sibala siewe sioosi.
Khebulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholela banamae ba Misiri, alala ne chifarasi chabwe, ne kamakaari kabwe khulwe khubamwaata mu nyanja eya Shamu, nga baba ne balikho bamutimania enywe.
Khebulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamukholela enywe mu sichiimi khukhwola nga mwola ano.
Khebulila niko akholela Tatani ne Abiramu ba okhwa Eliabu owe kholo eya Rubeni. Lundi khebulila nga liloba liapa lulwafwa, liekukha mala liabamila alala nende be chinju chabwe, kamaeema kabwe, ne bakholi babwe boosi, ne bibiaayo biabwe Baisiraeli ne baloleleele.
Enywe mwabene mwaboone bibiindu biboofu bioosi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola.
“Khwako, ria kamalaka koosi niko ndikho muelesia endaalo yino. Khola murio nio munyoole kamaani mwingisie ne khubukula sibala nisio mulikho mucha khubukula.
Lundi khola murio nio mumenye siise sileeyi mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga nisio nasuubisia khuelesia bakuuka benywe ne lisaaye liabwe.
Sibala nisio muli siimbi khukhwingisia, se sili nga sibala sia Misiri niio mwamile tawe. Ebweeneyo, mwamiichanga, ne khuchukhiilila kimikuunda oli ne muchukhiilila siluundu sie chinyenyi.
Ne kakhali sibala nisio muli siimbi khukhwingilamo sili sie bikulu ne kamatooma, sibala nisio efula ekwichangamo.
Sili sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aliindanga ne khusiloleelesia mu mwiiko kwoosi.
Mwaba ne mukhola murio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaruma efula ekwe khu sibala sienywe mu siise sisienyekha, mu munaane ne mwikesa. Nio mufune biakhulia bienywe ne endali ne kamafura ke chiseituni.
Lundi akhamuelesie bunyaasi khulwe chikhaafu chenywe. Muliba ne biakhulia bioosi nibio mwenya.
Ba barekerefu mu khakhola murio mwebea mala mwayuukha mwakholela bawele babaandi ne khubasaaya tawe.
Mwaba ne mukhola murio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimuambila enywe lirima. Alitiila efula ekhakwa tawe, mala kamaloba kenywe kalioma para. Bibiaamo se bilachoa tawe. Ne, siakhaba ne sili sibala silayi, nisio alikho amuelesia, enywe mulibuna khangu mururemo.
Keyikie babaana benywe. Kakachulekho ne mwikhaale munju mwowo, ne olikho okeenda khu ngila, ne olikho okona, lundi ne winyokha.
Kaandike khu mitalaachi kie chinjiki che chinju chenywe ne khu bilibwa bienywe.
Khola murio nio enywe ne babaana benywe mumenye siise sileeyi mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aasuubisia khuelesia bakuuka benywe. Mulamenyayo mindali na mindali.
“Ba barekerefu khuria kamalaka koosi niko ndikho muelesia: khu siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, khuloonda kakewe ne khuuba basuubilwa khu niye.
Mwakhola murio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhatimanie chikholo chino choosi. Lundi aba enywe mukhamenye mu sibala sie chikholo chiili chimboofu lundi che kamaani khumukhila enywe.
Kamaloba koosi niko mulakhandakakho kalaba kakenywe. Lulwakha lwe sibala sienywe lulaba khukhwama khu sichiimi lubeka lwe ebunafubo khukhwola khu sikulu sia Lebanoni lubeka lwe ebunaswa. Lundi khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati ebukwe, khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia mumbo.
Osi osi niio mulacha mu sibala esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alakhola babaandu bamwo bamurie enywe nga ne amusuubisia enywe. Se alibao omundu yesi yesi olimukhiingilila enywe tawe.
“Endaalo yino ese ndikho muelesia enywe burobosi akari we khabi ne silaamo.
Mulanyoola ekhabi, mwaba ne muria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niko ndikho muelesia endaalo yino.
Ne mulanyoola silaamo, mwaba barengu khu malaka kano mala mukaluukhane mulekhe kamalaka niko ndikho muelesia luno lundi mwaba ne musaaya bawele babaandi nibo mukhamanyile tawe.
Nga Wele ne amuyila mu sibala nisio mulikho mucha khwingisia, mukhalaangilile ekhabi ne muli khu sikulu sia Kerisimu, ne mukhalaangilile silaamo ne muli khu sikulu sia Ebali.
Bikulu bibili bino bili lubeka lwe mumbo mwe Luluuchi lwa Yoritani mu sibala sie Bakanaani bamenyile mu Litooma lia Yoritani. Bialoleelela lubeka lwe mumbo, siimbi ne kumurongooro kumukhoonge kwa More siimbi ne Kilikali.
Enywe muli siimbi khukhwambukha Luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala mwingisie sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia. Ne musinyoola mala mwombakhe mumenyemo,
mube barekerefu khuria kamalaka koosi niko ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.

“Kano kali kamalaka niko mukhoyela khuria ne mumenya mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe alikho amuelesia enywe mu menyemo. Karie biise bioosi nibio mumenya mu sibala.
Mukhoya mwonakake abuundu oosi niio beele babaandu be chikholo nibo mubukula bumenyo bwabwe basaayilanga bawele babwe. Basaayilanga khu bikulu bileeyi, ne khu bikulu bitiiti, nende asi we kimirongooro.
Techula chialutare chabwe ne khuumbulaka chinjeko chabwe. Yosia bifwaani bia wele wabwe Asiera. Lundi kwisia bifwaani bie bawele babwe bikwe nio bakhasaayila abuundu ao lundi tawe.
“Mukhasaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu ngila niyo babaandu bano basaayilangamo bawele babwe tawe.
Ne kakhali eenja abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamuroborera khukhwama mu kholo chenywe choosi khulwe khusaaya ne khumufumia. Mulacha abwenao
mala muyileo biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio chenywe. Mukhayileo biaanwa bie sitonyi silala khwikhumi ne biianwa bienywe bie khukhwechuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, biianwa bie mu lienya lienywe, ne chikhaafu chenywe chimbele ne kamakheese.
Ebweeneyo enywe nende be chinju chenywe mukhayile ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhwikhoyela nibio mwakhola lundi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamuelesia.
“Mukhakhola mu ngila niyo khulikho khukholelamo biise bino tawe. Biise bino buli mulala alikho akhola niko abona ali kali kamalayi khu niye.
Mulakholanga murio sikila mukhanyoola buuluukhi ne khukhwingila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amueleesie enywe tawe.
Mulambukha Luluuchi lwa Yoritani, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulekhuule enywe mwingisie sibala esio, nisio omwene amuelesie, lundi mumenyeyo. Alamuliinda khukhwama khu basiku benywe mala mulamenya mu muleembe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amalile khukhola ario alarobora abuundu alala ong'ene ekhusaayalao. Abwenao, mureerere buli siindu nisio ese mulaka: biianwa bie khukhwosia bienywe ne chimbosio, biaanwa bie sitonyi silala khwikhumi, biianwa bienywe bibiindi ne biianwa nibio mwasuubisia khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhoya mwikhoye ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alala ne babaana benywe basoleeli nende bakhaana, banasioobi benywe be siseecha nende be siikhasi, ne Balawi bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe, sikila Balawi se bali ne kumukabwa namwe sitonyi nga enywe tawe.
Ba barekerefu nio mukhaanila biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosia buli abuundu niio mubona tawe.
Ne kakhali khe mu biaanile abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alarobora mu sibala sie kholo ndala khu kholo chenywe. Abwenao niio enywe mukhaanile biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosibwa ne khukhola bibiindu bioosi nibio ese mulaka.
“Kakhaba kario, muli balekhuule khukhoonya bibiaayo ne khuliila abuundu osi osi niio mumenyile. Munyala mwalia bikali nga, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne amuelesianga, aakhaba ooli omukwalaafu namwe omunyaalu khuloondekhana ne kumwiima anyala abilia busa nga oolia enyama eya kicheu namwe eye ekhisi.
Ne kakhali mukhalia kamalasile kacho tawe, mukachukhe mu liloba nga kameechi.
Mukhaliila sitonyi silala khwikhumi sienywe abuundu niio mwamenya tawe, siakhaba ne sili sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie biakhulia bienywe, endali yenywe, namwe kamafura namwe chikhaafu chenywe chimbele ne kamakheese kamabele, biianwa nibio mwasuubisia khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, biianwa bie mu lienya lienywe namwe biianwa bienywe bibiindi bioosi bioosi tawe.
Enywe ne babaana benywe alala ne banasioobi benywe ne Balawi bamenyile mungoba chenywe, mulalila biianwa bino ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene alarobora abuundu alala ekhusaayilao. Mukhoya mwikhoye ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu koosi niko mukhola.
Ba barekerefu, mukhalekelesia Balawi nga mulamenya mu sibala sienywe tawe.
“Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne aabalaaya sibala sienywe, nga ne aamusuubisia, munyala mwalia enyama niyo mwenya khulia.
Aaba abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe arobora ekhusaaya nali aleeyi lukali, munyala mwakhonya yosi yosi khu khaafu namwe likheese nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesia, nga aamulaka. Ne munyala mwaliila enyama eyo mungo, nga ne mwenya.
Omundu yesi yesi ooli omukwalaafu namwe omunyaalu anyala alia enyama eyo, bulayi bwene nga ne alia enyama eya kicheu namwe eye ekhisi.
Ne kakhali ba nang'ali muli se mulia enyama kamalasile ne kasiilimo tawe, sikila bulamu buli mu malasile, ne se munyala mwalia bulamu ne enyama tawe.
Mukhalia kamalasile tawe, ne kakhali mukachukhe khu liloba nga kameechi.
Mwaba ne muria lilaka lino, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alasiimisibwa mala enywe ne lisaaye lienywe mulaba bulayi.
Yila bibiindu bienywe bitakatifu, ne biianwa bienywe nibio mwasuubisia khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abuundu niio alarobora.
Aanila abuundu ao biianwa bie khukhwosia, enyama ne kamalasile. Biianwa khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Chukha kamalasile khu alutare. Ne kakhali munyala mwalia enyama.
Ba barekerefu mu khuulila kamakhuwa niko ndikho mulaka kano koosi. Khola murio nio enywe ne lisaaye lienywe mube bulayi khulwa mindali, sikila mulaba mulikho mukhola kamalayi lundi kamaluungi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe acha khubunia babaandu be chikholo nibo mucha khubukula ne khukhwingisia kamaloba kabwe. Ne amalile khukhola ario,
ba barekerefu mukhakhola murio mwarekwa mu khuloonda kimiima kie chikholo echo tawe. Mukhaenja khumanya nga basaayanga bawele babwe nio mwesi musikame ne khusaaya mu ngila ng'eneyo tawe.
Mukhasaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu ngila niyo nibo basaayilangamo tawe. Nibo bakholelanga bawele babwe buli siindu siili sie lisinye khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi nisio niye abiila. Akhaba, baananga babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana nga biianwa bie khukhwosia khu alutare chabwe.

“Omung'oosi namwe omundu obonela bibiindu mu marooro ne enyokha mwinywe mala amuelesie simanyilo namwe ke liukia,
ne simanyilo sienesio namwe ke khuukia menako keche kekholekhe, mala amuboleele ali, ‘Lekha khuche khusaaye ne khurumikhira bawele babaandi,’
mukhacha tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amurumikhira niye khu mukhaka enywe abone mwaba ne mwasiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.
Loonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mala mumurie. Murie kamalaka kewe, mumusikamile nende mumusaaya niye yeng'ene mala mube basuubilifu khu niye.
Ne kakhali khe mwire omundu obuula kamarooro oyo namwe omung'oosi oyo sikila amuboolela enywe mube barengu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, owamureesia mwarura e Misiri, niio mwaba banasioobi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario sikila enya enywe mumenye nga niye ne aamulaka. Nono rusia bumayaanu akari wenywe.
“Wandaayo namwe omwana wowo omusoleeli, namwe omwana wowo omukhaana, namwe omukhasi wowo niye wasiima, namwe omusaale niye wasiima lukali anyala akhuchuuba mu simoonyo ali, ‘Khukholele bawele babaandi.’ Bawele abo bali nibo ewe namwe bakuuka benywe bakhasaayanga tawe.
Balala khu bawele be babaandu abo banyala baaba siimbi nanywe namwe aleeyi. Bali khukhwama lubeka lulala lwe sibala khukhwola khu luundi.
Ne okhafukiilila niko omundu oyo aloma tawe, okhamurekeeresiakho tawe. Okhamukholelakho siisa tawe, lundi okhamubabila tawe.
Mwire! Ba owe khunyoa khumupa libaale, mala olekhele buli mundu amupe libaale.
Mupe kamabaale afwe! Sikila akhaka khu khutiimia orure khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo owa khurusia e Misiri, niio mwaba banasioobi.
Nono babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi bakhaulile mala barie ne omundu okhakhole lundi sisiindu siibi sirio se alibaao tawe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamuelesia enywe chingoba mumenyemo. Enyuma wako, mulaulila
muli babaandu balala be sipoli bengiile mwinywe mala barenguisie babeene lukoba khulwe khubaboolela nibo basaaye bawele nibo abeele enywe mukhamanyile tawe.
Kaaba ne kali ng'ali mbo sisiindu siibi sino siakholekha, reeba, muloleelesie mu burekeerefu.
Khe mwire babaandu boosi be mu lukoba omwo, alala ne chikhaafu chabwe choosi. Bunisilia elala lukoba olwo.
Buusia kimiaandu kioosi kie babaandu babamenyamo, mala mukibungikhe mu sikuuri sie mu lukoba. Yosia lukoba ne bibiindu bilimo bioosi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia simuufu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Lukoba olwo lulaba situumi khulwa mindali na mindali ne se lukhombakhwe lundi tawe.
Mukhabukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi sie mu lukoba omwo tawe, nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekhe lirima liewe lirafu mala amukholele enywe siisa. Alaba owe siisa khwinywe mala amukhole mube ne babaandu bakali nga ne asuubisia bakuuka benywe.
Mwaba ne muria kamalaka kewe koosi niko amuelesie luno, ne khukhola niko eenya, kalaba kario.”

Enywe muli babaandu batakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamurobora enywe khukhwama mu baandu boosi bamenyile khu sibala, mube babaandu bewe.
“Mukhalia sisiindu siosi siosi nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiila tawe.
Munyala mwalia chisaang'i chino: ekhaafu, likheese, embusi,
kicheu, ekhulo, koongoni, emboongo, embusi eye mundaa, ekhisi, ne likheese lie mundaa.
Lia chisaang'i chosi chosi chiili ne bikhakayu bibiakabukhanamo lundi akhaba chinyanyanga ekamuula.
Chiliio chisaang'i chikhali ne bikhakayu bibiabukhanamo tawe, mala chinyanyanga ekamuula. Ching'enecho mukhachilia tawe. Chisaang'i echo chili, chingamia, chinduyu, ne chisaabale. Chibukule khuuba chinyaalu.
Mukhalia chingurwe tawe. Chibukule khuuba chinyaalu chili ne bikhakayu bibiakabukhanamo ne kakhali se chinyanyanga ekamuula tawe. Mukhaliaakho khu saang'i chino namwe mukhatiila khu saang'i efwiile tawe.
“Munyala mwalia siosi siosi sie mu meechi siili ne sibeye ne kamakakaambu.
Ne kakhali sisiindu siosi siosi simenyile mu meechi siikhali ne bibeye ne kamakakaambu mukhalia tawe. Sikhoya sibalwe khuuba sinyaalu.
“Munyala mwalia enyuni engwalaafu yosi yosi.
Ne mukhalia chiloondakho chino tawe: efuruusi, engosia, namulobi,
waasio, ne siruuchu khuloondekhana ne luusio lwabio.
Buli khooro kumali khuloondekhana ne luusio lwako,
enyeefwe, naololo, liyoyo, kisiilili khuloondekhana ne luusio lwakwo,
naololo kimitiiti ne naololo kimiboofu, efutubile eye khu luuchi
ne chetooto ne ling'ang'a ne munandi.
Likhuyi, nalukosi, kwesule ne wambuto.
“Bimoola bie chindaa bioosi bili binyaalu mukhabilia tawe.
Munyala mwalia bie chindaa bikwalaafu bioosi.
“Mukhalia sisiaayo siosi siosi sifwiile sisiene busa tawe. Munyala mwalekhela bakeni bamumenyilemo basilia, namwe munyala mwasikusia khu bakwa, sikila enywe muli batakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“Okhateekhela enyama eye sisiaayo sitoro mu mabeele ka maawe tawe.
Cha abuundu alala ao niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aarobora abe ekhusaayilao. Abwenao ebweeni wewe lia sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie biakhulia bienywe, endali ne kamafura nende ekhaafu embele ne likheese libele. Khola lino nio mweyike khuuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe buli lwosi.
Abuundu e khusaayilao anyala aaba aleeyi lukali. Khwako se munyala mwasuta mwayilayo sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie bibiaamo nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, amubiitile chikhabi mala mwanyoola tawe. Kaaba kario,
kusia bibiaamo bienywe mala mubukule chirupia muche nacho abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobore e khusaaya.
Chirumikhire khukula sisiindu siosi siosi nisio mwenya khulia, kula enyama ye khaafu, eye likheese, endali ne kamalwa. Biliile ebweeneyo, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, enywe nende be chinju chenywe mulalia mala mwekhoye.
“Mukhalekelesia Balawi bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe tawe. Se bali ne sitonyi namwe kumukabwa kwabwe tawe.
Buli mwiiko kukhola khataru ne kwolile khu siakamo siakwo, mureere sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie bibiaamo bienywe bioosi mala mubibuunge mu ngoba chenywe.
Sino sili siakhulia sie Balawi sikila se bali ne kumukabwa kwabwe tawe, lundi sili sie bakeni, bafuubi ne banamulekhwa bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe. Baleecha mala banyoole nibio benya bioosi. Khola lino mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe naye amubiite enywe chikhabi mu buli siindu nisio mukhola.”

“Khumaliilikha khwa buli mwiiko kukhola saba beela abo baali ne kamakobi kenywe.
Kalakholwa kari: buli mundu yesi yesi owekopia kimiaandu khu Muisiraeli wasie alamubeela likobi lienelio. Akheenya owe likobi aruunge tawe. Mukhole murio sikila siise esio sili sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nisio alomile ali sibe sie khubeelanila kamakobi.
Munyala mwakaanila nibio bakeni bekopa ne kakhali mukharuungana mwabene ne mwabene nibio mwekopiana tawe.
“Omutaambi se alabaao mwinywe tawe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamubiita enywe chikhabi mu sibala nisio alikho amuelesia enywe nga kumukabwa.
Mwaba ne muba barekerefu mu khumuria niye ne khuuria kamalaka kewe koosi niko ndikho muelesia luno.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamubiita enywe chikhabi nga ne asuubisia. Mulekopia kimiaandu khu kholo chingali, ne kakhali enywe se mulekopa khu kholo yosi yosi tawe, mulamiia chikholo chingali ne kakhali nicho se chilamwamiiakho enywe tawe.
Ne kakhali, ba baani mala mubaelesie bikali nga ne benya.
Mukhanyoola chinganakani chimayaanu tawe, mukhaloba khukhwikopia babaasienywe baali babanani sisiindu, sikila kumwiiko kwe kamakobi kuli siimbi tawe. Mukhalekha kamabi nga ako kario kengila mu mebaasio kenywe tawe. Ne muloba khubekopia balalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mulanyoolekhana khuuba bamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baelesie mu bulekhuule ne mukhabeelela ne mulikho mubaelesia tawe. Kano kalakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amuelesie enywe chikhabi mu milimo kienywe kioosi.
Bataambi se balilekha khubao mu sibala sienywe tawe. Khwako ese mulaka enywe ndi aana mu bulekhuule khu bawandaayenywe bataambi ne babanani baali mwinywe.
Ne ne olekhuula nasioobi khucha, akhacha makhono mataaka tawe.
Ne omulekhuula, okhamulekha aacha makhono mataaka tawe muelesie bilalakho khu nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuelesie ewe nga chikhabi: kamakheese, biakhulia nende endali.
Khebulila oli mwesi mwaba banasioobi e Misiri mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamuelesia enywe bulekhuule. Lino nilio likila ese ne khuelesia ewe lilaka lino luno.
“Ne kakhali nasioobi wowo aaba ne akhenya khucha tawe, sikila aakhusiima ewe nende be nju yowo mala asienya khumenya,
mubukule omuyile amuliango kwenju yowo mala abwenao omufutulileo liiru liewe. Nono, alaba nasioobi wowo mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi. Kholela nasioobi wowo owe siikhasi mu ngila ng'ene eyo.
Okhalola khuuba lilume ne olekhuula nasioobi tawe. Kakhaba kario, aakhukholeele ewe kimiiko sita mala aakholeele e nusu
Buli mwiiko, enywe nende be chinju chenywe mukhalie bibiaayo abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora, ebweeni wewe.
Ne kakhali sisiindu siibi siaaba ne sili khu biaayo ebio, biaaba ne bili bileme, namwe bibofu namwe sisiindu siibi lukali siosi siosi, mukhabikhola biaaba embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe.
Ne kakhali munyala mwaliila sisiaayo esio mu lukoba lwenywe. Omundu omukwalaafu namwe omunyaalu khuloondekhana ne kumwiima, anyala aabilia, bulayi bwene busa nga ne mulichanga enyama eya kicheu namwe eye ekhisi.
Mukhalia kamalasile kabio tawe, ne kakhali mukachukhe asi nga kameechi.”

Cha abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alirobora khulwe khusaayilao mala okhonyeleo lilala khu makheese kowo namwe ekhaafu khulwe embosio eye Pasaka ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
Mukhalia embosio eyo ne kimikaati kiilimo limela tawe. Chindaalo saba mulalia kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, sikila mwarura mu sibala sia Misiri khangu. Lia kimikaati kino, nio mu bulamu bwenywe bwoosi mukhebulile endaalo niyo mwarurirakho e Misiri.
Chindaalo saba se aliio omundu yesi yesi mu sibala sienywe olaba ne kamamela tawe. Ne enyama eye embosio niio muaana ekolooba khu ndaalo eye khunyoa ekhoya eliibwe yoosi siilo esio, ekharama khukhwola kumutikhinyi tawe.
“Mukhaanila embosio eye Epasaka mu lukoba lwosi lwosi mu ngoba nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe tawe.
Ne kakhali kiaanile abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alirobora, khumusaayilao. Abwenao muaanileo embosio ekolooba, a siise nisio mwaruriramo e Misiri.
Teekha enyama mala mukiliile abuundu alala niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora e khusaayilao. Oli kumutikhinyi ne mukobola mu mu maeema kenywe.
Khulwe chindaalo sita chiloondakho mulia kumukaati kuukhalimo limela tawe ne kakhali khu ndaalo ekhola saba buusiana alala Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Ne mukhakhola kimilimo khu ndaalo eyo tawe.
Nio mukhole Naikara eye Likesa khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Mureerere siianwa sie khukhwerusia khuloondekhana ne chikhabi nicho akhuelesia.
Ne buli mundu ekhoye ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, alala ne babaana bowo basoleeli ne bakhaana, banasioobi bowo be siseecha nende be siikhasi ne Balawi ne bakeni ne bafuubi ne banamulekhwa bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe. Khola murio abuundu alala e khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Khebulila muli mwaba banasioobi mu Misiri khwako ba barekerefu khuria kamalaka kano.
Kikhoyele ne babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana, banasioobi bowo be siseecha nende be siikhasi, ne Balawi ne baakwa ne bafuubi ne banamulekhwa bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe.
Khola naikara Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khulwe chindaalo saba abuundu aaroborwa e khusaayilao. Khola murio sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alaana chikhabi nibio mukesa bioosi ne kimilimo kienywe kioosi mala enywe mulaba basangaafu lukali.
“Babaandu benywe be siseecha boosi bakheeme ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akharobore. Bakheeche kamakhabi kataru khu mwiiko, siise sia naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, Naikara eye Likesa nende Naikara eye Bisali. Buli mundu areere siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khuloondekhana ne chikhabi nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe amuelesie.
“Robora bakhalaki ne babemeelesi bakhulu babaandi buli mu lukoba nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamuelesia khulwe chikholo chenywe. Babaandu bano balakhalakila babaandu mu buluungi.
Bakhaba babaandu bakhali bang'ali tawe, namwe bakonele lubeka lulala mu bukhalaki bwabwe tawe. Ne se balafukiilila asooya tawe. Asooya ebofusia chimoni che babaandu bakesi ne khukaluukhasia bung'ali bwa abo bali baluungi.
Buli lwosi khola kaali ng'ali, nio mumenye lundi mube mu sibala nimwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe.
Lundi okhombakha sifwaani sie njeko eye kamabaale tawe, bifwaani bili lisinya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.”

“Mukhaelesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe chikhaafu namwe kamakheese nga chimbosio mala chilimo sisiindu siibi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abiila lino.
“Kaaba bali omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi anyoolekha ne akhola bumayaanu mu ngoba nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho amuelesia enywe,
mu ngila eye khukholela bawele babaandi ne khubasaaya nibo namwe enyanga namwe kumwesi namwe ching'enieesi nibio Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ngaania.
Lundi mwaba ne muboolelwa namwe mwaulila muulila likhuwa lirio, lireeberesie bulayi. Liaba ne lili ng'ali mbo sisiindu siibi sino siakholeekhe mu Isiraeli,
bukula omundu oyo mumurusie enje we lukoba mala mu muupe kamabaale afwe.
Omundu oyo akhoya eerwe kaaba bali baloli babili namwe bataru baboolile bario khu niye. Omundu akheerwa khulwe buloli bwo mundu mulala yeng'ene tawe.
Baloli balaba be khunyoa khumuupa kamabaale nio babaandu babaandi baloondiekho. Mu ngila yino murusieo bumayaanu akari wenywe.
“Kimisaango milala kinyala kiabao nga kie bubwiri, bulomani namwe khukhwibwaakala. Kimisaango nga ekio kinyala kiaba kimiandalafu khwinywe. Khwako kimisaango nga ekio khe mukiyile abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alarobora.
Cha khu basaayi balawi ne khu mukhalaki ooli mu bwimeelesi mu biise ebio, mala balekhele nibo bakhalake kumusaango okwo.
Ne enywe mukhola nga ne bakhuboolela.
Fukiilila bukhalaki bwabwe mala muloonde niko bamuboolela enywe mu bwichufu.
Omundu yesi yesi okhaka khuuba omureengu khu mukhalaki namwe khu musaayi ooli khu milimo aleerwa. Mu ngila yino mularusiao bubi mu Isiraeli.
Lundi buli mundu olaulila kano alaba omuri ne se aliio akhaba mulala olaba ne sileka lundi tawe.”
Ba ng'ali khurobora omundu niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe arobora khuuba omwami wenywe. Akhoya abe mulala khu baandu be kholo yenywe mukhakhola omukwa abe omwami wenywe tawe.
Omwami se akhoyeele abe ne chifarasi chingali namwe se akhoyeele akobosie babaandu e Misiri khureera chifarasi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Mukhakobolayo lundi tawe.’
Omwami akhaba ne bakhasi bakali tawe, sikila lino lilamukhola aaukhe khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi akhaba ne efwesa ne esahabu engali tawe.
Nga ne alaba omwami mu bwami bwewe, niye omwene alaandika mu sitabu kamalaka malalakho khukhwama khu basaayi ne Balawi.
Alaba ne sitabu sino mala asisome mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi, nio eyike khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe ne khuuria kamalaka kewe koosi ne khukhola nga kaboola.
Lino lilamuliinda nio akhebaasia ali niye ali omulayi khukhila Baisiraeli basie tawe, lundi nio akhaba omureengu khu malaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Akhola ario nio niye ne lisaaye liewe bamiie Isiraeli mindali na mindali.”

“Ekholo eye busaayi eya Lawi se alanyoola sitonyi sie kamaloba mu Isiraeli tawe. Ne kakhali balamenyela biianwa bie khukhwosia bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sino sili sitonyi siabwe.
Se balaba ne kamaloba, nga chikholo chichiindi tawe, sitonyi siabwe sili bubweyaangu bwe khuuba basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene ne aalaka.
“Buli lwosi ne muaana ekhaafu namwe likheese nga embosio, basaayi balaelesibwa kamayi, chinyanyilo nende bie munda.
Balanyoola sitonyi sie khunyoa sie biakhulia, endali ne kamafura ne bufuumbo bwe kamakheese.
Khola murio sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aabarobora nibo khukhwama mu kholo chenywe choosi khumukholela niye.
“Omulawi yesi yesi owenya, anyala aama mu lukoba lwosi lwosi mu Isiraeli aacha abuundu aaroborwa khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Anyala akholayo nga omusaayi wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe, nga Balawi babaandi bakholanga ebweeneyo.
Alanyoola sikelo sie siakhulia silekhaana nga sie basaayi babaandi lundi alatasa khu nibio anyoola khukhwama engo wewe.
“Nga ne mulengila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe, mukhaloonda kimiima kimibi kie chikholo chiili ebweeneyo tawe.
Mukhoosia babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana nga chimbosio namwe biianwa tawe. Lundi omulakusi namwe omung'oosi omubeeyi, namwe omumenieelesi namwe omulosi akhabao mwinywe tawe.
Omundu oyeeta babaandu khulwe khurumikhira kamayia akhabao tawe. Omubini namwe orumikhira babafwa khumanya ke biise bibiicha akhabao tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abiila babaandu bakhola bibiindu bie khusinya bino. Niko kakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alikho aoona chikholo chino chirure mu sibala ebweeni wenywe.
Enywe mukhabaakho ne buubi bwosi bwosi bukila mwekiichibwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe.”
“Chikholo nicho mucha khukhwingisia kamaloba kacho chiulilanga ke bafumu ne balakusi. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se amufukiilila enywe mukhole lino tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamurumira enywe omung'oosi nga ese khukhwama mwinywe babeene, mala mukhoya mu murie niye.
“Khu ndaalo niyo mwakhung'aana a sikulu sia Sinai lino nilio mwakhola. Mwaloma muli, ‘Se khwenya khuulilakho lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ne alomaloma, namwe mubone kumulilo kwewe kumukali tawe, busa khukhola khurio khwafwa!’
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese ali, ‘Niko balomile kali ng'ali.
Ndibarumira omung'oosi nga ewe khukhwama mu baandu babwe babeene. Ese khaboolele omung'oosi nisio alomaloma, mala akhaboolele babaandu buli siindu nisio ese mulaka.
Akhalomalome mwisina liase ne ese khaukuume buli mundu okhalobe khumuria niye.
Ne omung'oosi yesi yesi ne akhaka khulomaloma burume mu lisina liase, mala Ese se namulakile khukhola ario tawe, namwe aaba ne ali omung'oosi olomaloma mu lisina lie bawele babaandi, akhoya afwe.’
“Munyala mwebaasia muli, ‘Khumanya khuriena burume bwo mung'oosi ne bwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?’
Omung'oosi aaba ne alomaloma mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala niko aloma se kakholekha tawe, aba se buli burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Omung'oosi oyo akhoya alomalome mu bunyali bwewe omwene, mala mukhamuria niye tawe.”

Robora chingoba chitaru alubeka mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe khuuba sisienywe.
Lima kimiyila mala mukabemo bitonyi bitaru sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe khuuba sisienywe. Khola murio. Omundu yesi yesi owera owasie anyala elukhilamo.
Lino nilio lilaka khuloondekhana ne omundu owilukhila mu ngoba echo khulwe khuonia bulamu bwewe ne eera owasie matundubiikha okhaaba omusiku wewe tawe.
Omundu anyala aacha ne owasie mu musiru khurema kimirongooro. Anyala aaba arema kumurongooro akwisie ne eaywa esabukhamo mala yiira owasie. Omundu oyo anyala elukhila mu lukoba lulala khu ngoba chitaru chino mala aaona.
Busa omulebe owo mundu ofwiile, oweyacha anyala anyoola lirima mala atimania omwiiri. Lukoba lwaba aleeyi, omulebe oyo anyala eera omwiiri akhaba omundu oyo nakhenyekha afwe tawe. Omundu oyo se ang'alilamo khukhwira owasie tawe.
Lino nilio likila ne mulaka enywe murobore chingoba chitaru echo.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhabalaaye sibala sienywe, nga ne aasuubisia bakuuka benywe mala amuelesie sibala sioosi nisio aasuubisia.
Alakhola ario mwaba ne muria kamalaka kewe niko ndikho muelesia luno khulwe khumusiima niye, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne khuloonda chingila chewe. Enyuma wako murobore chingoba chichiindi chitaru che khukhwilukhilamo.
Khola lino, nio babaandu bakhali ne bubi bakheererwa mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia khuuba sisienywe tawe. Ne mukhola murio aba enywe se mulaba ne kumusaango kwe khufukiilila lifwa lie babaandu bakhali bamayaanu tawe.
“Omundu anyala aaba omusiku khu wasie, mala ekise alindiilile ebwaakale owasie oyo amwire, mala elukhile mu lulala khu ngoba echo.
