Mu sikholwa nga esio baliindi be lukoba lwewe babeene barumania areerwe mala bamwakaanisie omulebe wo mundu niye eera owenyebwa eyache lifwa elio, nio oyo eerwe.
Mukhamukholela siisa tawe. Rusia mu Isiraeli kumusaango kwe khukhwira babaandu bakhalikho ne bubi tawe nio enywe mube bulayi.
Omuloli aaba ne akiikhila busa omundu khumuraakho kumusaango,
boombi balacha abuundu alala ebweeni wa Wele ne basaayi ne bakhalaki baali mu bukhalaki biise bienebio.
Bakhalaki balaloleelesia kumusaango okwo. Buloli bwaaba ne buli bwe bubeeyi, omundu aaba ne akiikhila busa owasie,
mukhoya mumureekho niko niye enyile khuura khu wasie oyo. Ne mukhola murio aba mularusia bumayaanu akari wenywe.
Ne babaandu babaandi balaulila ako balaria, ne mbao omundu mwinywe olakhola bumayaanu nga obwo burio lundi tawe.
Mukhekesiakho siisa tawe. Kalaba kari; bulamu khulwe bulamu, emoni khulwe moni, liliino khulwe liliino, kumukhono khulwe kumukhono ne sikele khulwe sikele.

“Ne mucha khupana ne basiku benywe mala mubone kamakaari ke mwiie, ne chifarasi ne banamae bakali khukhila babenywe, mukhabaria tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe owamureesia enywe khukhwama e Misiri, ali nanywe.
Ne muchiile mwiie, omusaayi eecha ebweeni mala alomalome ne banamae.
Akhamuboolele enywe ali, ‘Baisiraeli rekeeresia! Endaalo yino mulikho mucha khuupana ne basiku benywe. Mukhafwa kimiooyo tawe, mukhaba baari khu basiku benywe tawe, namwe mwareenga mwaayaaya tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho acha nanywe mala alamupanila mala amuelesie enywe bukhili.’
“Banamae bakhulu bakhalomalome khu baandu bali, ‘Aliio omundu ano owombaakhe enju embia mala akhaakira ebweeni wa Wele mu lisaaya tawe? Aaba naliio akhoya ache engo. Lekha akhole ario, ne busa akhola ario eererwa mwiie, mala omundu okundi aana enju yewe eyo ebweeni wa Wele mu lisaaya.
Aliio omundu yesi yesi ano owabialile busa ari liruuti lie kimisabibu, ne akhanyoola bubweyaangu bwe khubuta kimisabibu tawe? Aaba ne aliio akhoya ache engo. Lekha akhola ario, ne busa akhola ario eererwa mwiie, mala omundu okundi eekhoyela kamatuunda.
Aliio omundu ano okhwele omukhaana abe omukhasi wewe mala akhamubukula tawe? Aaba ne aliio ache engo. Lekha akhola ario, ne busa akhola ario eererwa mwiie, mala omundu okundi aabukula omukhaana niye oyo aakhwa.’
“Babemeelesi bakhulu balareeba lundi babaandu bali, ‘Aliio omundu niye kamafuki kewe keelulukha sikila buuri? Kaaba kario ache engo. Akhola ario akila babaandu boosi bafwa kimiooyo.’
Babemeelesi ne bamalile khulomaloma khu banamae, banamae babemeelesi baroborwe khukhwimeelela buli sipupu sie banamae.
“Nga ne mucha khwibwaakala lukoba, lie khunyoa eelesia babaandu be lukoba olwo bubweyaangu bwe khureerao kumuleembe akari wenywe nabo.
Baaba ne bafukiilila kumuleembe mala bekula bilibwa biabwe sikila enywe, babaandu be lukoba olwo boosi balaba banasioobi benywe.
Ne kakhali babaandu be lukoba olwo ne bakhafukiilila khuuba ne kumuleembe ne nanywe tawe ne kakhali baarobora khu khuupana, botookhelela lukoba olwo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne ara lukoba olwo mu bunyali bwenywe, yiira buli mundu owe siseecha olimo.
Ne kakhali munyala mwabukula bakhasi ne babaana, bibiaayo nende buli siindu siili mu lukoba. Munyala mwalia buli siindu sie basiku benywe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amueleesie enywe.
Mulakholela murio chingoba choosi chiili aleeyi, chikhali che chikholo chiili siimbi ne nanywe tawe.
“Ne nga ne muaamba chingoba chiili mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia, mukhalekhakho sisiindu siosi siosi ne sili silamu tawe.
Bunisilia elala babaandu boosi: Bahiti, Baamori, Bakanaani, Baperisi nende Bahibi ne Bayebusi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne alaka.
Beere nio bakhamweyikia enywe khukhola bibiindu biabwe bioosi bie khusinya nibio bakholelanga bawele babwe tawe. Mwakhola murio, aba mukhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
“Ne mubotookhelela lukoba khulwe biise bileeyi ne khulwibwaakala nio mulubukule, mukharema kimirongooro tawe. Munyala mwalia kamatuunda kakio. Kimirongooro se kili basiku benywe tawe.
Ne kakhali munyala mwarema kimirongooro nikio mumanya muli se kili kie kamatuunda tawe mala mukirumikhire khuyaba kamaloo ne khubuusia liloba lie khukhwibuulilamo khukhwola nga lukoba ne luambwa.”

“Omundu anyoolekha ne ererwe mu lukoongo mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho acha khumuelesia mala enywe se mwamanyile omwiirire tawe.
Kaaba kario, aba babemeelesi ne bakhalaki benywe banyala barura bache mala bapiima buleeyi bwe khukhwama niio kumubili kunyoolekhe khukhwola khu buli lukoba khu ngoba chiili siimbi.
Babemeelesi be lukoba luli siimbi khukhila chichiindi khukhwola niio kumubili kwanyooleekhwe balarobora emasoti endayi.
Bakibukula bakiyile mu litooma nilio bakhalimakho namwe liabiaalwamo tawe, litooma elio libe lie khakheechi. Ebweeneyo bakikhonyeleyo.
Basaayi balawi boosi balachayo, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aabarobora nibo khumukholela niye ne khuaana chikhabi mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nibo babisia kimisaango kie bulomani ne burangani.
Ne Basaakhulu boosi khukhwama mu lukoba luuli siimbi lukali abuundu niio kumubili kwo mundu oweriirwe, balasaabila kamakhono kabwe khu mosoti niyo bakhonyela mu litooma.
Barusie buloli ne baloma bali, ‘Efwe se khwerire omundu yuno tawe lundi se khwaboone ne bamwiira tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi beela Isiraeli babaandu bowo nibo wareesia barura Misiri. Khubeele, mala okhabalila Isiraeli mu khwirwa khwo mundu okhali ne kamakhiikha yuno tawe.’ Ne mukholile murio mulabeelwa bubi bwenywe.
Nio, mu khukhole niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enya, semulabalilwa mu bwiri bwo mundu oyo tawe.”
“Ne mucha mwiie khu khuupana ne basiku benywe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alimuelesia enywe bukhili mala mubabukule nga baboe.
Mulala khwinywe ne aboone omukhasi owe lukoondo lulayi mu baboe abo anyala amukhwa mala oyo aaba omukhasi wewe.
Mubukule omuyile engo wowo. Ebweeneyo alabeka lichuune
Ekaluukhasie chingubo. Alamenya munju mwowo alililemo paapa ne maawe khu mwesi mulala. Enyuma wako, onyala wamukhwa aaba omukhasi wowo. Alaba omukhasi wowo ne ewe olaba omuseecha wewe.
Ne okhasiimisibwa ne naye tawe, mulekhuule ache osi osi niio enya. Se okhoyeele omukusie namwe omukhole khuuba nasioobi tawe, sikila aba wamalile khumurusiamo lukoosi lwewe.”
“Omundu aaba ne bakhasi babili. Anyala asiima mulala mala abiila okundi. Bakhasi abo boombi banyala bamusaalila babaana basoleeli ne omubele wewe se ali omwana wo omukhasi niye asiima tawe.
Nga Omundu oyo ne abisia khukaba kimiaandu, akhababila omusoleeli wo mukhasi niye asiima khulwe khumuelesia sitonyi sio omubele tawe.
Akhoya aane sitonyi siboofu khukhwola khabili sie kimiaandu kiewe khu musoleeli wewe omubele, akhaba ne akhali omusoleeli wo omukhasi niye akhasiima tawe. Omundu oyo akhoya aelesie omusoleeli wewe omubele bung'ali bwewe sikila omwenoyo niye ooli kamaani kewe ke khunyoa.”
“Omundu aaba no omusoleeli onaania lundi omureengu, omusoleeli okharia paapa ne maawe tawe, akhaba ne bamukololosia.
Raraawe ne maawe bakhoyeele bamuyile ebweeni we basaakhulu babemeelesi be lukoba niio bamenyile mala bamwimisie a silibwa.
Balaboolela basaakhulu bali, ‘Omusoleeli wefwe yuno ali omureengu, owe sileka lundi ali ne mbelekeu. Ali owe kumuliuliu lundi omumeesi.’
Nio babaandu be lukoba olwo boosi balamupa kamabaale afwe. Murusie bumayaanu akari wenywe. Buli mundu mu Isiraeli alaulila sisiekholeekhe mala alaria.”
“Omundu ne akholile bumayaanu nibwo akhoyeele eerwe, akhoya eerwe mala kumubili kwewe kusungwe khu murongooro.
Ne kakhali kukhasungwachakho siilo sioosi tawe. Kukhoya kusiikhwe endaalo eyo neng'ene, sikila omundu niye kumubili kwewe kusungwacha khu murongooro ali ne silaamo sia Wele. Mukhanyaalutia sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe tawe.”

Ne omwenelio aaba ne amenyile aleeyi, namwe ewe waaba ne okhamanyile omwenelio tawe, libukule oche nalio engo wowo. Omwenelio ne eecha khulienja, muelesie.
Waaba ne onyoola epunda, khola orio, akhaba engubo yewe, namwe sisiindu siosi siosi nisio Omuisiraeli wasio atibiisie mala ewe wasinyoola, okhalekha khuyeeta tawe.
“Ne obona epunda yo Muisiraeli wasio namwe ekhaafu yakwile khu ngila, okhalekha khumuyeeta tawe. Muyeete enyosie sisiaayo siewe.
“Babaandu be siikhasi bakhafwara chingubo che babaandu be siseecha tawe namwe babaandu be siseecha bakhafwara chingubo che babaandu be siikhasi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abiila babaandu bakholanga bibiindu nga ebio.
“Ne onyoola siswi sie nyuni khu murongooro namwe asi, ne enyuni eng'ene yakoneele kamaki namwe kamaana, okhaamba maawe ne kamaana tawe.
Onyala wabukula kamaana, ne kakhali okhoya opurusie maawe, nio omenye bulayi lundi nio oyindile.
“Ne wombakha enju embia, khupilakho ererwe obotookhelesie. Nio okhaba ne kumusaango kwe sifuki sio omundu owamakho aakwa afwa tawe.
“Okhaboa eeyi ne punda khu lichooki lilala chilime tawe.
“Okhafwara engubo eyakholwa khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe kamakheese alala nende bwe ngubo eya katani tawe.
“Omundu anyala aakhwa omukhaana abe omukhasi wewe, mala enyuma abisie ali se amwenya tawe.
Anyala alomaloma bubi khu mukhaana oyo mala aambie omukhaana oyo chisoni. Anyala aloma ali nakhwa omukhasi yuno, ne kakhali nga aaba naye, omukhaana yuno se aanyoolekha khuuba owe yabwana tawe.
“Kaaba kario, raraawe ne maawe bo mukhaana bakhoya bareere simanyisio khu basaakhulu be lukoba asilibwa sisiokesia sili omukhaana aba owe yabwana.
Raraawe owo mukhaana alaboolela basaakhulu abo ali: Naelesia omundu yuno omukhaana wase amukhwe abe omukhasi wewe ne luno se amwenya tawe.
Omundu yuno alomile ke chisoni khu mukhaana ali, ‘Omukhaana wenywe se aaba owe yabwana tawe.’ Ne kakhali sino nisio sisiekesia sili omukhaana wenywe aaba owe yabwana. Ne balaala chingubo echo ebweeni we basaakhulu be lukoba.
Nio basaakhulu be lukoba abo balabukula omuseecha oyo mala bamupe kimikhomwa.
Balamuraakho kumuruungo kwe chishekeli bitonyi emia ndala che efwesa mala baelesie raraawe owo mukhaana chirupia echo, sikila omundu oyo areerire chisoni khu mukhaana Muisiraeli. Khutasa khwako, omukhasi oyo, alachiililila khuuba omukhasi wewe, mala mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi se amuoona tawe.
“Ne kakhali niko omundu oyo aloma kaaba ng'ali, sisiekesia sili omukhaana aba owe yabwana siaaba ne siikhaliio tawe,
babukula omukhasi oyo bamurusie enje we enju eya raraawe, niio babaandu be lukoba olwo balamupila kamabaale bamwire. Akholile sisiindu sie chisoni mu baandu befwe khulwe khukhola bueeyi ne asimenya munju eya raraawe. Mu ngila yino mularusiao bumayaanu akari wenywe.
“Omundu aanyoolekha ne alikho akona ne omukhasi wo owasie, boombi bakhoya berwa. Mu ngila yino mularusiao bumayaanu akari wenywe.
“Omundu aanyoolekha mu lukoba ne alikho akona ne omukhaana niye omundu okundi akhwele.
Bombi bakhoya bayilwe enje we lukoba mala bapwe kamabaale bafwe. Omukhaana afwa sikila se aakukuula khulaanga buyeeti tawe, akhaba ne aba mu lukoba. Ne omundu oyo afwa sikila akona ne omukhaana niye owasie aba ne akhwele. Mu ngila yino mularusia bumayaanu akari wenywe.
“Omundu aakwa khu mukhaana niye omundu okundi akhwele ne bali mundaa, omundu oyo yeng'ene niye owirwa.
Se siliio silekholekha khu mukhaana tawe, sikila se akholile bumayaanu bubwolaana lifwa tawe. Kumusaango okwo kuli nga kwo mundu owibwaakala omundu okundi mala amwiira.
Omundu oyo akwile khu mukhaana oyo mundaa, ne akhaba ne akukuulile omundu omuyeeta se abeleo tawe.
aruunge raraawe wo mukhaana bitonyi kamakhumi karaano bie fwesa mala omukhaana oyo alaba omukhasi wewe sikila aamukwakho busa ne kamaani mala aamwoonaka. Aba se alimuoona mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi tawe.

“Mbao omundu owalatwa, namwe niye kumubili kwe buseecha kwakhalwa onyala engila mu libuusiana khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
“Mbao omundu oweyasiimba namwe owe lisaaye liewe okhengile mu libuusiana lie babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Kali kario sikila nibo bamwimana enywe biakhulia ne kameechi nga ne mwaba khu lukeendo ne mwama e Misiri. Lundi baruunga Balamu okhwa Beori khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Petiori mu Mesopotamia khu mulaama enywe.
Kakhaba kario Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se aarekeeresia ka Balamu tawe, ne kakhali aakaluukhasia silaamo siaaba chikhabi, sikila aamusiima enywe.
Mukhaenja khuuba ne kumuleembe ne chikholo chino namwe mubenyele buiinda mu bulamu bwenywe bwoosi tawe.
“Mukhabiila Baedomu tawe, bali balebe benywe. Lundi mukhabiila Bamisiri tawe, sikila mwaba baakwa mu sibala siabwe.
Khukhwamila khu selukho eya khataru khuchiililila be lisaaye lie Baedomu ne Bamisiri banyala bengila mu libuusiana lie babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne muli mu kambi siise sie liie, mukhoya mulobe sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala siamukhola enywe mwaba banyaalu khuloondekhana ne kumwiima.
Omundu omunyaalu aaba ne aliio mwinywe sikila eroorere ne ali mu marooro siilo, akhoya arure enje we kambi akhakobola tawe.
Oli ekolooba esiinge, mala oli enyanga ekwa akobole mu kambi.
“Ba nende abuundu enje we kambi niio babaandu banyala bacha khukhwiyeeta.
Suta lusaala ne bulwaani bwowo. Ne wenya khukhwiyeeta onyala wayaba liloo wachaamo mala ne omalile welilisia.
Ekambi yenywe ekhoya ebe endakatifu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akeendangamo khumuonia enywe ne khukhwira basiku benywe. Khola murio nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabona sisiindu siosi siosi sinyaalu sinyala siakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amufutarira tawe.
“Nasioobi aaba ne elukha khukhwama wo mukhulu wewe mala eeche khwiwe omuyeete okhamukobosiayo tawe.
Anyala aamenya mu lukoba lwosi lwosi khu ngoba chenywe, nilwo omwene arobore mukhaba bakhalafu khu niye tawe.
Mukhayila chirupia chinyoolekhe khukhwama mu bueeyi namwe che chingila chimayaanu munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiila bikholwa bioombi ebio.
Onyala waraakho bukhala khu nibio wikopia baakwa, ne okhakholela orio Omuisiraeli wasio tawe. Khola orio nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhuelesie ewe chikhabi mu buli sisiindu nisio okhola mu sibala nisio olikho ocha khumenya.
Ne waaba ne okhechuba tawe, aba se wakholile bumayaanu tawe.
Okhoya okhole nisio oloma oli okhola sikila wamwene wechubile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
“Ne wingila mu liruuti lio wasio lie kimisabibu, onyala walia kamatuunda ke kimisabibu niko wenya. Ne okharaakho liosi liosi mu ndubi tawe.
Ne wingila mu lusaambu lwe biakhulia lwo wasio, onyala walia biakhulia bioosi bioosi nibio onyala wabuta ne kamakhono kowo, ne kakhali okhabikesakho ne ngeso tawe.

Ne arurire mungo omwo, anyala aacha khuteekha khu museecha okundi.
Omuseecha owe khabili oyo yesi anyala alekhe khusiimisibwa ne omukhasi oyo. Yesi aandike chibarwa che khumulekha, amuelesie mala amuoone arure mungo mwewe. Namwe omuseecha wewe owa khabili anyala aafwa.
Omuseecha wewe owe khunyoa se amukobosia lundi tawe, sikila omukhasi oyo abeele omunyaalu. Aaba ne amwiilakho lundi bulaba bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mukhareera bumayaanu buno mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia khuuba sisienywe tawe.
“Omundu ne ali no mukhasi omwea, akhacha mwiie, namwe akhole kimilimo kikiindi kiosi kiosi tawe alabeelwa, akhakhola kimilimo tawe, khulwe kumwiiko mulala, nio amenye engo asangaasie omukhasi wewe.
“Ne wikopia omundu sisiindu, okhabukula lususi lwewe nilwo arumikhirangakho khusia tawe, sikila aba alikho aruunga bulamu bwewe.
Omundu aanyoolekha ne eeba Omuisiraeli wasie eelukha naye mala aamukhola nasioobi wewe namwe aamukusia mu bunasioobi, omundu oyo akhoya eerwe. Mu ngila yino mularusiao bumayaanu akari wenywe.
Khebulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhola Miriamu nga ne mwaba ne mwama e Misiri.
Lindila enje mala olekhe omwene akhureerere sie khuambiilila.
Aaba ne ali omutaambi okhasibiikha siilo sioosi tawe.
Mukoboselie buli ekolooba nio ebiimbe akone liilo mala alakhubiita chikhabi. Ne niko okholile ako kalaba kamaluungi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
Buli endaalo enyanga ne siili khukwa tawe, muruunge khulwe kimilimo kie ndaalo eyo. Sikila ali omutaambi mala chinganakani chewe choosi chili khu rupia echo. Khola orio ne busa akhola ario aalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala ewe onyoolekhe khuuba omumayaanu.
Khebulila muli enywe mwaba banasioobi mu Misiri mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amusikula khukhwama ebweeneyo. Khwako mulaka enywe mukhole lino.
“Ne okesa biakhulia biowo khukhwama mu mukuunda mala wibilile bilala nibio okesile, okhakobolayo wabibukula tawe. Bili bie baakwa, bafuubi, nende banamulekhwa. Khola orio nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhuelesie chikhabi mu buli siindu nisio okhola.
Ne obuta kamatuunda ke kumuseituni, okhakobolayo wabuta kasikalekho tawe, kali ke baakwa, bafuubi nende banamulekhwa.
Ne obuusia kamatuunda ke kumusabibu, okhakobolayo khu bisina lukhola khabili tawe, kamatuunda ke kimisabibu kasikalekho kali ke baakwa, bafuubi nende banamulekhwa.
Khebulila muli enywe mwaba banasioobi mu Misiri, khwako ese mulaka enywe, mukhole lino.”

“Baisiraeli babili banyala baaba ne bulomani mala baacha mu koti. Omukhalaki anyala abisia akari wo oyo owe bumayaanu nende ooli ne kumusaango.
Omundu aaba owe kumusaango ne akhalakilwe bukhupe, omukhalaki alamwalisia mafumala mala bamupe biboko omukhalaki ne aloleleele. Akhoya anyoole bukali bwe bukhupe khuloondekhana ne kamakhiikha niko akholile.
Akhoya aebwe biboko bibioola kamakhumi kane, ne se bibira ao tawe. Khubisia ao khukhila owasio afwocholwa mu baandu.
Omwana owe sisoleeli omubele niye balasaala alatiuukhwa lisina lia raraawe owafwa, nio lisaaye liewe lichiililile mu Isiraeli.
Ne wandaaye woyo owafwa ne akhenya khukobosia mulamue tawe, namulekhwa oyo alacha khu bemeelesi be lukoba asilibwa mala alome ali, ‘Mulamwa se eenya lisina lia wandaaye lichiililile mu Isiraeli tawe. Se eenya khukholela ese kimilimo nikio wandaaye aakholanga tawe.’
Babemeelesi be lukoba balalaanga omundu oyo mala balomalome naye. Aaba ne asiloba khukobosia namulekhwa,
namulekhwa oyo alamuchaakho ebweeni we babemeelesi be lukoba, amufuule siraaro silala, amufuuche mu moni mala alome ali, ‘Kano niko kakekholekha khu mundu okhenya lisaaye lia wandaaye lichiililile tawe.’
Enju yewe elamanyikha mu Isiraeli nga, ‘Enju yo mundu owafuulwa siraaro.’ ”
“Babaandu babili baaba ne balikho bapana mala omukhasi owa mulala khu nibo aakhaka khuyeeta omuseecha wewe khulwe khukhala omundu okundi oyo kumubili,
okhamukholela siisa tawe mukhale kumukhono.
Okhaba ne bikelo bibili munju mwowo, sibalaayi ne sitiiti tawe.
Rumikhira sipiimilo ne sikelo sisienyekha lundi sia ng'ali, nio omenye kimiiko kimikali mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo alikho akhuelesia ewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiila babaandu babeanga ne bakhola bibiindu nga ebio.
Se baba ne buuri khu Wele tawe. Bamuloondakho bamwibwaakala khu lukeendo nga ne mwaba ne mulwiile mala beera balala mwinywe ba baba enyuma.
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe acha khumuelesia sibala mala amukhole mwingilemo sibe sisienywe. Alamuelesia kumuleembe. Basiku bamenyile siimbi nanywe se balaba butinyu khwinywe tawe. Ne amalile khukhola ario, yiira Baameleki boosi, nio akhabao olibakhebulila lundi tawe. Mukhebilila lino tawe.

“Mulengisia sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia sibe sisienywe mala mu sibukule ne khu simenyamo. Ne mumalile murio,
buli mulala khwinywe akhoya abiikhe mu sikono sitonyi sie khunyoa sia buli sibiaalwa nisio akesile khukhwama mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe mala ache nabio abuundu aaroborwa e khusaaya.
Ache khu musaayi ooli omwimeelesi siise esio mala omuboolele ali, ‘Ese luno fukiilila ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ndi nengile mu sibala nisio niye asuubisia bakuuka befwe ali akhakhuelesie efwe.’
“Omusaayi alakaanila sikono mala asire ebweeni wa alutare ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
Ne ewe mu moni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo olakobolela mu makhuwa kano: ‘Kuuka wase aba omuuyauyi busa, Omuaramu. Acha ne be nju yewe batiiti busa mala ebweeneyo baaba ekholo emboofu eye kamaani lundi eye babaandu bakali.
Bamisiri bakhukholela efwe kamabi, bakhunaania mala bakhuyingilila khwakhola kimilimo nga banasioobi.
Nio khwalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we bakuuka befwe akhuyeete efwe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaulila khulila khwefwe aabona khunaanisibwa, khwefwe, kimilimo ne bumiinikhi nibwo khwabamo.
Nio aakhurusia efwe e Misiri ne bunyali bwewe bukali ne kamaani. Aakhola kamayia, kamakhuwa ke khuukia nende, bibiindu biriisia.
Akhureera efwe ano mala akhuelesia efwe sibala sino nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga.
Nio, luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ese ndikho khureerera ewe sitonyi sie khunyoa sie likesa nilio wambelesie.’
“Olara asi sikono ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo mala omusaayileo.
Lundi okhoya wekhoyele bibiindu bilayi bioosi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhuelesie ewe nende be nju yowo, Balawi nende baakwa nibo omenyile nabo.
boolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo oli, ‘Narusiisie sitonyi sitakatifu khukhwama munju mwase. Nasiieleesie khu Balawi, baakwa, bafuubi, nende banamulekhwa, khuloondekhana ne lilaka liowo. Se nabeele omureengu namwe se nebiliile liosi liosi khu malaka kowo ka silala khwikhumi tawe.
Se naliile silala khwikhumi ne ndi mu masika namwe nga nabeele omunyaalu tawe. Se naanile silala khwikhumi nga esaka khulwo omufu tawe. Nariire lilaka liowo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, mala nakhola khuloondekhana nende koosi niko ewe wandaka khukhola.
Ne oli abuundu wowo atakatifu mwikulu, lola asi, mala obiite babaandu bowo Isiraeli chikhabi, biita chikhabi akhaba sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga nisio wakhuelesie efwe, nga ne wasuubisia bakuuka befwe.’
“Endaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amulaka murie kamalaka koosi. Khwako, ba barekerefu mukarie ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi ne liiba lienywe.
Endaalo yino wafukiiliile oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele wowo, lundi wafukiiliile oli olamuria, ne khuloonda kamalaka kewe koosi, ne khukhola koosi niko alaka.
Endaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amufukiilile enywe nga babaandu bewe, nga ne aamusuubisia enywe, mala aamulaka murie kamalaka kewe koosi.
Alamukhola enywe mube bakali khukhila ekholo ekiindi yosi yosi niyo aabuumba. Alakhola ario khulwe efuma

Nono Musa alala ne babemeelesi ba Isiraeli, balaka babaandu bali, “Ria kamalaka koosi niko ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.
Khu ndaalo niyo mwambukhilakho luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala mwingile mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe, mularaao kamabaale kamabalaayi mala mukaakhe luloongo.
Mukhaandikekho kamalaka kano koosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we bakuuka benywe alikho amuelesia enywe sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetikhanga nga ne aamusuubisia enywe.
Ne mumalile khukhwambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani, yimisia kamabaale kano khu sikulu sia Ebali, nga ese ne ndikho mulaka endaalo yino mala muakhekho luloongo.
Ebweeneyo mukhombakheyo alutare eye kamabaale khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Alutare eyo ekharwakho sichuuma siosi siosi tawe.
Alutare yosi yosi niyo muliombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ekhoya yombakhilwe kamabaale kakhabeechwa tawe. Khubwenokhwo mukhaanilekho biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Lundi mukhaanilekho chimbosio che kumuleembe mala muliileo. Ebweeneyo mukhekhoye ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Khu mabaale kakaakhwakho luloongo ako, andikakho kamalaka koosi karuriirikhe bulayi.”
Musa, ne basaayi Balawi baboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi bali, “Isiraeli sila, mala mundekeeresie. Endaalo yino enywe mwabeele babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Khwako khe mumurie mala muliinde kamalaka kewe koosi niko ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.”
Endaalo eyo eng'ene Musa aboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali,
“Enywe ne mwambuukhe luluuchi lwa Yoritani, chikholo chino chileema khu sikulu sia Kerisimu khulwe khumubiita chikhabi. Chikholo cha Simioni, Lawi, Yuda, Isakari, Yosefu ne Benjamini.
Ne chikholo chino chileema khu sikulu sia Ebali khulwe khulaama: Rubeni, Kati, Asheri, Sebuluni, Dani ne Nafutali.
Balawi balaboolela babaandu kamakhuwa kano ne kumumilo kuuliilikhana:
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
“Omundu yesi yesi owira owasie mu bwikisi alaamwe.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
“Omundu yesi yesi ofukiilila asoya khukhwira omundu okhali ne bubi tawe alaamwe.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”
Ne babaandu boosi balikobosia bali, “Kabe kario.”

Ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala chikhabi chino choosi chilaba chichenywe:
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabiita chikhabi chingoba chenywe ne kimikuunda kienywe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamubiita enywe chikhabi musaale babaana bakali munyoole biakhulia bikali, chikhaafu chingali ne bibiaayo bikali.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabiita chikhabi bibiaalwa bienywe nende biakhulia nibio mwamiamo bioosi.
“Alamubiita enywe chikhabi mu buli siindu nisio mukhola.
“Basiku benywe ne bamwibwaakala enywe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabakhole bakhilwe. Ne becha khumwibwaakala enywe balechela khu ngila ndala ne kakhali bakhelukhile khu ngila saba.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabiite chikhabi bibiaaki bienywe ne khubiita chikhabi kimilimo kienywe kioosi. Alamubiita enywe chikhabi mu sibala nisio alikho amuelesia khuuba sisienywe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamukhole enywe mube ekholo endakatifu nga ne aamusuubisia enywe. Alakhola ario mwaba ne muria kamalaka kewe ne khuloonda koosi niko amulaka.
Ne chikholo choosi che sibala chilabona chili enywe muli babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala chilamuria enywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamuelesia enywe babaana bakali, chikhaafu chingali ne bibiaamo bikali lukali mu sibala nisio aasuubisia bakuuka benywe ali akhamuelesie enywe.
Alareera efula mu siise sisienyekha khukhwama mu ngaaki, mala abiite chikhabi kimilimo kienywe kioosi. Enywe mulekopia chikholo chichiindi ne kakhali enywe se mulekopa khukhwama khu kholo yosi yosi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamukhola enywe mube nga babemeelesi ne se muliba baloondi tawe, buli lwosi mulaba angaaki we chikholo chichiindi. Kaliba kario mwaba barekerefu mu khuria kamalaka niko ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.
Ne mukhalekha kamalaka niko ndikho muelesia endaalo yino mala mwasaaya ne khukholela bawele babaandi tawe.
“Ne kakhali mwaba be sileka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe namwe mulekhe khuuba barekerefu mu khuria kamalaka koosi niko ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino, aba bilaamo bino bioosi bilamwichakho.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alalaama chingoba chenywe ne kimikuunda kienywe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alalaama bibiaalila bienywe nende biakhulia nibio mwamiamo.
“Lisaaye lienywe lilalaamwa, alala ne bibiaamo bienywe ne chikhaafu ne kamakheese.
“Mulalaamwa mu buli siindu nisio mukhola.
“Mwaaba ne mukhola kamabi ne mulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamureerera bilaamo, likoyaana ne changalaalo, buli mu siindu nisio mukhola khukhwola nga ne mulabunisibwa khangu.
Alareerao lufu khukhwola nga lulamumala enywe mweesi, se akhabeo okharame mu sibala nimwo muli siimbi khucha tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, alareera lufu lwe khuambisiana, ne kamabiimba ne kamaima, siimiyu ne khuungu eye khukhwoomia yonake bibiaamo bienywe. Kamaraba kano kalaba ne nanywe nabwila mufwa.
Efula se likwa tawe ne kamaloba kenywe kaloma kaandalale nga sichuuma.
Mu bweyaangu bwe efula Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alareera lutamuusi lukali ne khuungu engali elimo kumuyekhe nabwila mulabuna.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhola basiku benywe bamuule enywe. Mulichila khu ngila ndala ne mulikho mucha khubebwaakala ne kakhali mukhelukhile khu ngila saba mala chikholo che khu sibala chikhareenge sikila kamwekholekha khwinywe.
Ne mufwa, kimibili kienywe kikhabe siakhulia sie chinyuni ne chisaang'i. Ne se alabao omundu olachioona tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alareera kamabiimba khwinywe nga ne aakhola khu Bamisiri. Alakhola kimibili kienywe kibe ne kamaboondo, kimibili kienywe kilechulakho chingooso, muleyakalaka ne se mulaona tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukhola enywe mukwe kamalalu, lundi mubofule mala mukoyaane mu bwongo.
Mulaabaasia busa eyi neyi kumuusi nga babofu mala mulatiimatiima busa, se mulanyoola chingila tawe. Mulamiinwa ne khunuulwa buli lwosi se alabao omundu akhaba mulala olamuyeeta enywe tawe.
“Mwinywe omundu alikhwa omukhasi mala omundu okundi niye olamubukula abe omukhasi wewe. Olombakha enju, ne se olamenyamo tawe. Olabiaala kimisabibu mwiruuti ne se olaliakho kamatuunda ke kimisabibu tawe.
Chikhaafu chowo chilakhoonyelwa ebweeni wowo, ne se olaliaakho enyama yosi yosi tawe. Chipunda chowo chilakhuruurwa chibukulwe ne ololeleele ne se balakhukoboselia tawe. Kamakheese kowo kalaelesibwa khu basiku bowo ne se alabao omundu akhaba mulala olakhuyeeta ewe tawe.
Babaana bowo basoleeli ne bakhaana balaanwa nga banasioobi khu baakwa ewe ne ololeleele. Buli ndaalo olaluiilila chimoni chowo ne olindiilila oli wakana babaana bowo balakalukha.
Ekholo engeni elabukula bibiaamo biowo bioosi bie mu mukuunda kwowo ne kimilimo kiowo. Okhapisibwe siibi ne khukhwomwa mu bulamu bwowo bwoosi.
Nibio obona bilakhulalusia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaelesia bikele biowo ne kamasikamo kamaboondo kamarafu kakhanyala kaona tawe. Kamabiimba kalakhwichulakho khukhwama khu murwe khukhwola khu siikhandakilo.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamubukula enywe nende omwami wenywe niye mwarobora amuyile mu sibala sikeni nisio enywe namwe bakuuka benywe mukhamanya tawe. Ebweeneyo mulakholela bawele ba babeechwa khukhwama khu mirongooro nende khu mabaale.
Mu bibala nimwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamusalanisiemo, babaandu bakhesiindukhe sikila sisiikholeekhe khwinywe. Mukhabe lusimo lundi be khuchekheelelwa.
“Mulamiicha bumiicho bukali ne mulakesa busa bikeekhe, sikila chisike chilalia bibiaamo bienywe.
Mulabiaala kimisabibu mu mikuunda kienywe mala mukiliinde, ne kakhali se mulanywa endali namwe mulie kamatuunda ke kimisabibu tawe, sikila biisa bilalia chisakia.
Mukhabiaale kimiseituni buli abuundu mu sibala sienywe ne kakhali se mukhanyoolekho kamafura ke kimiseituni tawe, sikila chiseituni chilakhukhumukha asi ne chisiili chimbisi.
Mulasaala babaana basoleeli ne bakhaana mulabatibia sikila balayilwa nga mu mbaambe eye liie.
Kimirongooro kienywe kioosi ne bibiaamo bilaliibwa ne chisike.
“Baakwa bamenyile mu sibala sienywe balanyoola bunyali buli lwosi, ne kakhali enywe mulaboombelelwa bunyali buli lwosi.
Balaba ne chirupia che khumwekopia enywe ne kakhali enywe se mulaba ne chirupia che khubekopia nibo tawe. Ekhumaliilikha balamwamiia enywe.
“Bilaamo bino bioosi bilamwichakho, mala bilaba khwinywe nanywe khukhwola nga ne mubuna, sikila se mwaria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne khuliinda kamalaka niko aamuelesia enywe tawe.
Bino bikhekesie bukhalaki bwa Wele khwinywe ne khu lisaaye lienywe mindali na mindali.
Kalaba kario sikila aba se mwakholeele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu liekhoya ne busangaafu tawe, aakhaba ne mwabeele nende buli siindu.
Khwako, mulakholela basiku benywe nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho acha khuruma beche mwinywe. Mulaba ne njala, bulesia ne sichula, mulataamba buli siindu. Balamurakho lichooki lie sichuuma khukhwola nga ne mubunila elala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alalekhuula ekholo khukhwama aleeyi, ekholo eye lulomo nilwo enywe mukhamanyile tawe. Balamwichamo khangu nga efuruusi.
Bali barafu lundi se balaba ne siisa khu mundu yesi yesi omuele namwe omusaakhulu tawe.
Balalia chikhaafu chenywe ne bibiaamo mala enywe mufwe njala. Se balamulekhela enywe siakhulia siosi siosi, endali, kamafura ke chiseituni, chikhaafu namwe kamakheese tawe, khukhwola nga enywe ne mubuna.
Chikholo chino chiliibwaakala buli lukoba mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe. Chingoba chichabotookhelesibwa ne kamasiisi kamaleeyi mu nicho mwasuubilamo chilakwa.
“Ne enywe mukhalie babaana benywe babeene nibo musaala, basoleeli ne bakhaana nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamuelesia mulakhola murio nga basiku benywe ne balamwibuulila ne busulunyu nibwo mulabamo.
Akhaba omundu we lukoosi lukali lundi owasaalwa khu luuya lwe bubwami yesi alemana wandaaye ne omukhasi wewe omwene niye asiima ne babaana bewe siakhulia.
Se akhaelesiekho yesi yesi khu nibo, enyama yosi yosi eye babaana bewe nibo alikho alia tawe, sikila se ali ne sisiindu sisikaale tawe, mukhwibuulila ne mu siibi nisio basiku benywe balamupisia enywe mu ngoba chenywe.
Omukhasi omukoosi lukali lundi owasaalwa khu luuya lwe babaami mwinywe okhaswalanga siikhandakilo siewe asi tawe sikila ali omukoosi lukali yesi akhabe ne chinge nga omusaakhulu wewe.
Nga basiku ne bakhebuulile lukoba lwewe akhabe ne njala lukali mala eenye siakhulia ne enyuma akhalie mu bwikisi omwana niye asaalile ne ngobi, omuseecha wewe niye asiima namwe babaana bewe se bakhamanyekho tawe.
“Mwaaba ne mukharia mu busuubilifu kamalaka kano koosi kakaandikwa mu sitabu sino tawe, mwaba ne mukharia lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamureerera enywe ne babaana benywe kiminaanio kie khuukia, kimirafu mala kia mindali alala ne bulwaale bubi bwa mindali.
Lundi alamureerera enywe buli bulwaale bubi nibwo mwabona mu Misiri ne se mulaona tawe.
Lundi akhamureerere enywe bulwaale chingano choosi ne kiminaanio kikhaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamalaka sino tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamukholele enywe ario khukhwola nga mubuna.
Aakhaba ne muli bakali nga ching'enieesi, bakeekhe mwinywe bong'ene bakhaone, sikila mwaba barengu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne asangaalila khumukhola enywe muindiaale ne khumukhola enywe mutasikhe, akhasangaalile ario khumureerera enywe butinyu ne khumubunia. Mukharusibwe mu sibala nisio muli siimbi khwingisia.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamusalanisia enywe mu kholo choosi che mu sibala buli abuundu mala ebweeneyo mulakholela bawele ba babeechwa khukhwama khu mirongooro ne khu mabaale, wele nibo enywe namwe bakuukawenywe abeele bakhasaayanga tawe.
Se mulinyoola kumuleembe abuundu osi osi mu kholo chino tawe. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhare mwinywe liliembeelela, chisoni ne khufwa kumwoyo.
Buli lwosi bulamu bwenywe bukhabe mu butinyu. Kumuusi ne siilo mukhabe ne buuri bukali lukali, lundi buli lwosi mulamenya mu buuri bwe lifwa.
Buli siindu nisio mubona, kimiooyo kienywe kikhaape lukali. Buli mutikhinyi mukhekoombenge muli andi ebeele ekolooba, buli ekolooba mwikoomba muli andi kubeele kumutikhinyi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukoboselia enywe mu meeli e Misiri aakhaba ne aaloma ali se mulikobolayo tawe. Ebweeneyo mukhakhake khukhwekusia khu basiku nga banasioobi, ne kakhali se akhabeeo okheenye khumukula enywe tawe.”

Kano niko kamakhuwa ke ndakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka Musa akhole ne babaandu ba Isiraeli mu sibala sia Moabu. Endakaano yino yaba khutasa khu niyo aakhola nabo a sikulu sia Sinai.
Musa aalaanga alala babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi mala aababoolela ali, “Mwabeene mwabona koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola khu Farao, omwami owe Misiri, ne bakholi bewe ne khu sibala sioosi ebweeni wenywe.
Mwabona kamakhako, kamaya, nende bie khuukia biboofu nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola.
Ne khukhwola khu ndaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamuelesia enywe limanya, libona namwe liiulila tawe.
Khu miiko kamakhumi kane ese namwimeelela mwabira mu sichiimi, ne kakhali chingubo chenywe se chatabuukhe tawe, namwe biraaro bienywe se biatabuukhe tawe.
Se mwalia siakhulia namwe mwanywa endali namwe kamalwa tawe. Kaba kario nio enywe mumanye muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ali Wele wenywe.
Ne kakhali efwe nga khwola abuundu ano, omwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni ne omwami Oku owa Bashani barura bakhwibwaakala efwe, mala efwe khwabaula.
Khwabukula sibala siabwe, mala khwasikaba chikholo cha Rubeni, Kati nende balala khu kholo eya Manase.
Khwako ba barekerefu khukhola koosi kaali mu ndakaano yino nio muindiaale.
“Endaalo yino enywe mweesi mwemile ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Babemeelesi benywe ne basaakhulu ne banamae bakhulu babaandu be siseecha boosi.
Aakhaba bakhasi, nende babaana ne baakwa bamenyile mwinywe, nende bamwasakilanga enywe chiikhu ne khumusutila kameechi bosi bali ano.
Mweesi muli ano endaalo yino, khukhola endakaano ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, niyo alikho akhola ne nanywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eenya amukhole enywe luno khuuba babaandu bewe, alaba Wele wenywe, nga ne aamusuubisia enywe nende bakuuka benywe, Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alikho akhola endakaano eye liliechuba yino ne nanywe mweng'ene tawe.
Alikho akhola ne nafwe fweesi khukhwimile ano ebweeni wewe, endaalo yino akhaba nende be lisaaye liefwe bakhasaalwa tawe.
“Enywe mumanyile nga ne khwamenya mu Misiri, lundi nga ne khwabira mu sibala sie chikholo chichiindi.
Mwabona bifwaani biabwe bie khusinya bibiakholwa khukhwama khu mirongooro, kamabaale, efwesa nende esahabu.
Ba burekeerefu nio akhabao omundu owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi, be munju yosi yosi namwe ekholo eyimile ano endaalo yino olekelesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe mala ache akholele bawele be chikholo chichiindi tawe. Kano kaliba nga lusia lwe kumurongooro kukhula kube simelwa silulu lundi sie bufwisi.
Omundu akhabao endaalo yino olikho oulila kamakhuwa ke endakaano eye liliechuba yino mala ebiite omwene chikhabi ne aloma ali, ‘Ndaba busa bulayi nakhakhola sileka.’ Lilienelio lilamubunia enywe mweesi, balayi ne baabi sitube.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alabeela omundu nga oyo ario tawe. Ne kakhali lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne likhendekha bilamuburukhirakho, mala bilaamo bioosi bibiaandikwa mu sitabu sino bilamwichakho nabwila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamubunisila enywe elala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukhola niye abe silolelo ebweeni we chikholo choosi cha Isiraeli. Kakhekholekhe kario khuloondekhana ne bilaamo bioosi bie endakaano bibiaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamalaka sino.
“Mu selukho eyiicha, lisaaye lienywe enyuma wenywe ne baakwa khukhwama mu bibala bie aleeyi balibona butinyu ne bulwaale nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areerire mu sibala sienywe.
Kimikuunda kiliba bitalalie bikhasaala bibiaamo tawe, kikhafuunikhwe ne kumulilo nende chumbe se siliio silibiaalwa tawe. Aakhaba enyoonyi se limelamo tawe. Sibala sienywe sikhabe busa nga chingoba cha Sodomu ne Komora nende Atima ne Seboimu nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia nga ne aba ne akhalala lukali.
Chikholo choosi chilireeba chili, ‘Siina sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhola kano khu sibala sino? Sifuno sie lirima liewe lirafu sili siina?’
Ne babaandu bakhakobosie bali, ‘Sikila balekelesia endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe aakhola ne nabo nga ne aabarusia mu Misiri.
Bakholela bawele babaandi ne khubasaaya, bawele nibo yaba bakhamanya namwe basaayanga tawe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila babaandu be sibala sino lirima mala areera khu sibala siabwe bilaamo bioosi bibiaandikwa mu sitabu sino.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabarusia mu sibala siabwe mu lirima liewe likali mala abamwaata mu sibala sikeni, khukhwola endaalo yino bali ebweeneyo.’
“Bibiindu bikhamanyikhaane bili bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ne kakhali nibio niye aakhwekesia bili bibiefwe ne lisaaye liefwe khulwa mindali na mindali. Khukhoya khurie kamalaka kano koosi.

“Luno ese namueleesie enywe burobosi akari we chikhabi ne silaamo. Nga bibiindu bino bioosi ne bikhabe ne bimwekholekhekho mala mumenye mu kholo nimwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamusalanisiamo, khebulila kamakhuwa kano.
Enywe nende be lisaaye lienywe mukhakobolele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mala mukhamurie niye ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi ne liiba lienywe lioosi. Mukhare kamalaka kewe niko ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.
Enyuma wako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamukholele enywe siisa. Akhamukobosie murure mu kholo nimwo aamusalanisiamo, lundi akhamukhole enywe mube baiinda lundi.
Aakhaba ne mwasalanisibwa mu sibala sie aleeyi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamubuusie enywe alala mala amukobosie.
Nio amureere enywe mu sibala nimwo bakukawenywe bamenyanga khale mala alamukhola mube baiinda lukali lundi bakali khukhila bakuukawenywe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamuelesie enywe kimiooyo kie liiria, nio mu musiime niye ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi ne liiba lienywe lioosi mala muchiililile khumenya mu sibala esio.
Akhakobosie bilaamo bino bioosi khu benywe basiku, babamubiila enywe ne khumupia enywe siibi.
Enywe mukharie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khuloonda kamalaka kewe koosi niko ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamukhole enywe muindiaale mu bioosi nibio mukhola, muliba ne babaana bakali, ne chikhaafu chingali, ne kimikuunda kienywe kikhamemo bibiaamo bikali lukali. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhasangaale khumukhola enywe baiinda nga aakhola bakuukawenywe baaba baiinda.
Kakhabe kario mwaba ne mumuria niye ne khuloonda kamalaka kewe koosi kakaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamalaka kewe sino. Mukhoya mukobolele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi ne liiba lienywe lioosi.
“Lilaka nilio ese ndikho muelesia enywe endaalo yino se lili liaandalafu lukali namwe se lili aleeyi lukali khukhwama khwinywe tawe.
Se lili mwikulu tawe, nio akhabao oreeba ali, ‘Naanu olacha mwikulu alireere asi khwifwe nio khuliulile mala khulirie tawe?’
Namwe se lili sikelekha sisiindi sie nyanja nio abeo oreeba ali, ‘Naanu khwifwe olambukha akhureerere efwe nio khuulile mala khurie?’ Tawe.
Likhuwa lili siimbi lukali ne nanywe. Lili mu minwa kienywe ne mu miooyo kienywe, khwako khe mulirie.
“Endaalo yino ese ndikho muelesia enywe burobosi akari we bulamu ne lifwa nende akari we kamalayi ne kamabi.
Murie kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niko ndikho muelesia endaalo yino khulwe khumusiima niye, ne khukhola niko niye eenya ne khuliinda kamalaka kewe koosi. Mwakhola murio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamubiita enywe chikhabi mu sibala nisio muli siimbi khukhwingisia.
Ne kakhali mwaba ne mulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mala mulekhe khumuulila, ne eyi musaaya bawele babaandi ne khubakholela,
ese muboolela enywe endaalo yino ndi mulabuna. Se mulamenya lukali mu sibala siili engelekha owa Yoritani esio nisio ooli siimbi khukhwingisia tawe.
Luno likulu ne liloba bili buloli bwase bili ese ndikho muelesia enywe burobosi akari we bulamu ne lifwa, kari we chikhabi ne silaamo. Khwako robora bulamu nio enywe ne lisaaye lienywe mumenye.
Siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mu murie niye mala mube basuubilwa khu niye nio mube balamu lundi nio mumenye lukali mu sibala nisio aasuubisia khuelesia bakukawenywe, Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.”

Musa achiililila khuboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi kamakhuwa kano.
Aababoolela ali, “Ese luno ndi bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili. Se nyala khumwimeelela enywe lundi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali ese se ndambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe omwene niye olamuraangirira enywe ebweeni wenywe mala abunie chikholo chimenyileyo, nio enywe mwingisie sibala siabwe. Ne Yoshua alaba omwimeelesi wenywe nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikholela babaandu be chikholo echo niko aakholela Sihoni ne Oku, babaami be Baamori mala aababunia nibo ne sibala siabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamuelesia enywe bukhili khu nibo mala mukhoya mubakhole busa bulayi bwene nga ese mulakile.
Ba ne kamaani ne bunyindaafu. Mukhabaria namwe mwabareengera tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alaba ne nanywe. Se alamuchangalaasia namwe aamwanjukhe enywe tawe.”
Khwako, Musa aalaanga Yoshua mala aamuboolela mu moni che babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi ali, “Ba ne kamaani lundi omunyindaafu. Ewe niwe olemeelela babaandu ba Isiraeli bano khukhwingila mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aasuubisia bakuuka babwe, bayeete khukhwola nga ne basingisia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene alakhuraangirira ewe mala abe ne nawe. Se alikhuchangalaasia namwe akhwanjukhe ewe tawe. Khwako okharia namwe wafwa kumwoyo tawe.”
Nio Musa aandika Lilaka lino mala aaelesia basaayi balawi ba basutanga lisanduku lie ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khu bemeelesi ba Isiraeli boosi.
Musa aabalaka ali, “Somela Baisiraeli lilaka lino enyuma wa buli miiko saba khu mwiiko nikwo kamakobi kalekhuulilwangakho ne kwolile. Lundi soma kano lukali a Naikara eye Bisali,
babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi ne becha khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abuundu aaroborwa. Soma boosi ne barekeeresie.
Laanga alala babaandu be siseecha, be siikhasi ne babaana ne baakwa bamenyile mu ngoba chenywe nio buli mundu akaulile ne khukhweyika khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne khukhola nga kamalaka kano koosi ne kaloma.
Mu ngila yino be lisaaye liaabwe bakhaulilakho Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe baleyika khumuria niye mu bulamu bwabwe bwoosi nibwo balamenya mu sibala nimwo muli siimbi khumenyamo, engelekha owa Yoritani.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Musa ali, “Se olamenya siise sileeyi tawe. Laanga Yoshua mala mwingile mu Liiema lie kumuse, nio ese muelesie lilaka lie bunyali.” Musa ne Yoshua baacha mu Liiema lie kumuse.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aababonekhelayo mu lileesi liliema amuliango kwe Liiema.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Musa ali, “Oli siimbi khufwa, ne enyuma we lifwa liowo babaandu se balaba basuubilifu khwise tawe. Balafunaka endakaano niyo ese nakhola ne nabo. Balandekha mala basaaye bawele be sibala nisio balikho bengilamo.
Khwako ese ndabaambila lirima, mbekisekho mala mbalekhe mala babunisibwe. Butinyu bukali ne bumayaanu bikhabakwekho. Nio balome bali, ‘Bibiindu bino bilikho bikhwekholekhakho sikila Wele wefwe se ali ne nafwe tawe.
Ne ng'ali ese khabalekhe endaalo eyo sikila bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo bakhola bwe khusaaya bawele babaandi.
“ ‘Khwako, aandika kumwenya kuno mala okweyikie babaandu ba Isiraeli. Lekha bembe sikila kuliba buloli bwase khu nibo.
Ndabayila mu sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga nisio nasuubisia bakuuka babwe. Ebweeneyo balaba ne biakhulia bioosi nibio benya mala balamenya bulayi. Enyuma wako, balaaukha mala bakholele bawele babaandi, bandeekelesie ese ne khufunaka endakaano yase.
Ne kakhali enyuma we butinyu bukali ne bumayaanu ne bibanyoolile, kumwenya kuno kukhabareebe, sikila kulaba ne kusimbwa busa ne lisaaye liabwe. Aakhaba ese ne siili khabengisie mu sibala nisio nabasuubisia khu baelesia tawe, namanyile niko balikho bebaasia.’ ”
Endaalo eyo ne ng'ene Musa aandika kumwenya mala ekisia babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Musa aandika kamakhuwa ke Lilaka lino mu sitabu. Se alekhakho sisiindu siosi siosi enje tawe.
Nga ne aamala aaboolela basaayi balawi, ba basutanga Lisanduku lie ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali
“Bukula sitabu sie kamalaka sino mala musire siimbi ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Sikhoya simenyeo nga buloli khwinywe.
Sikila ese manyile po nga ne muli bareengu lundi be sileka. Lola, mwabeele bareengu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bulamu bwase, aba mulaba bareengu muriena ese ne fwiile.
Buusia alala ebweeni wase basaakhulu boosi ne banamae bakhulu be chikholo chenywe nio, mbaboolele bibiindu bino. Likulu ne liloba bibe buloli bwase khwinywe.
Manyile ndi enyuma we lifwa liase ng'ali mulaba baabi mala mulalekha kamalaka niko ese mulakile. Ne mu biise bibiicha, butinyu bukhamukwekho mwaba ne mukhola kamabi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khumuambia niye lirima khubirira mu bikholwa bienywe.”
Nono, Musa aaloma kamakhuwa ke kumwenya kwoosi khukhwola nga ne aamala babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi ne barekeeresie:

Likulu ulila, ne ese ndomaloma,
lekha sibala siulile niko ndomaloma.
Lekha kamekisio kase kakwe nga kamame ke efula,
kamakhuwa kase kabe khu liloba nga luume,
nga efula namonyekeele khu bunyaasi butoro,
lundi nga efula efunyakala khu bimelwa bitoro.
Sikila ndilangilila lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
fumia Wele sikila ali omukali!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuliindi wase owe kamaani,
kimilimo kiewe kili kimimiliiu,
sikila chingila chewe choosi chili bung'ali.
Wele omusuubilifu ookhali ne bumayaanu tawe,
ali owa ng'ali lundi omuluungi.
Ne kakhali enywe mwamukholeele bubwoni,
se mwolaana khuuba babaana bewe lundi tawe,
sikila bumayaanu bwenywe,
eselukho emayaanu lundi embeeyi.
Enywe babaandu basilu bataamba likesi,
mwenya muruungie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Se ali paapa wenywe, owamubuumba enywe,
owamukhola enywe mala akhola mwakaliia?
Khebulila biise bibiabira,
yibaasia ke chiselukho che kimiiko kikiabira,
reeba kukaao, ne alakhwekesia,
basaakhulu benywe, ne balamuboolela.
nga ne aaukhasia babaandu,
aarao chinjakha che babaandu khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe babaandu bewe.
Kumukabwa kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kuli babaandu bewe,
Baisiraeli bali kumukabwa kwewe.
Aabanyoola mu sibala sie sisiangalaamwe,
mu sichiimi sie ekhuungu, sitambamo siindu,
aabaelesia buliindi, aabalela,
abaliinda nga oliinda endolelo ye emoni yewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhiingilila Isiraeli khukwa,
nga efuruusi ne yekesia kamana kayo khupurukha,
ne ketiila khu ndaa chayo,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene niye owabemeelela,
wele omukwa se amuyeeta niye tawe.
Aabara mu bikulu mala aabaliisia bibiaamo bie mu mukuunda.
Aabaelesia bubuukhi khukhwama khu lwanda,
ne kamafura khukhwama mu mabaale ke lulwaanda luandalafu.
Chikhaafu chabwe ne chimbusi biaana kamabeele kamakali,
baba ne chikhaafu chindayi ne chimbusi,
baba ne ngaanu endayi ne kumuketu kwe endali endayi.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli banera, mala baapa liteki,
banera, bamiuukha,
mala balekha Wele owababuumba,
mala balekha lulwanda lulwabaonia.
Bakhola Wele aaba ne likhendekha khu bawele baakwa,
bikholwa biabwe biamuaambia lirima.
khu bawele nibo bakhamanya tawe,
khu bawele bakeni babechao ekhumaliilikha,
nibo bakuukawenywe bakharia tawe.
Se mwenaana khu Lwanda lulwamuelesia enywe bulamu tawe,
mwebilila Wele owamusaala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona lino, mala ababiila,
sikila bubeeleli khu baana bewe basoleeli nende bakhaana.
Aaloma ali, “Ndabekisakho,
ndabona khutabusia khwabwe nga khulaba,
sikila bali eselukho emayaanu, babaana bakhali basuubilwa tawe.
bambaambiisie lirima sikila bifwaani biabwe.
Nono ndarumikhira babaandu bakhali ne bukhala tawe,
khubaraamo likhendekha
ndabaambia lirima khubirira khu kholo esilu.
Lirima liase lilaburukha nga kumulilo,
kwaburuukhe kwolile emakoombe,”
kwosia sibala ne bibiaamo biasio,
lundi kwoosia kimisiingi kie bikulu.
Ese ndababuusiakho butinyu,
ndabalasa mbamalilekho buembo bwase,
balaulila enjala,
balabunisibwa ne kumuumu kumurafu ne lufu luubi.
Ese ndabarumira chisaang'i che mundaa,
ne chindemu che bufwisi.
Liie lilareera lifwa khu ngila che chingoba,
ne butinyu mu chingo.
Basoleeli baele ne bakhaana be eyabwaana balibunisibwa,
akhaba onuuna nende owe chimbuchi.
Neenya ndi, “Mbabunisilie elala,
nio omundu olibakhebulila akhabao tawe,”
Ne kakhali se neenya mbaambwe lirima sikila omusiku tawe,
busa basiku babwe bakheniinie,
balome bali, “efwe khwakhilile,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akholile lino tawe!”
Bali ekholo ekhaulila tawe,
lundi se bali ne limanya tawe.
Baba bakesi, aandi bamanyile lino,
bakhamanyile kamakhuwa kalibekholekhakho biise bibiicha!
Omundu mulala yeng'ene aapa ariena babaandu eelefu?
Ne babaandu babili bong'ene baapa bariena babaandu chielefu ekhumi?
Ne kakhali aba kamaani ka Wele kabalekhile,
aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabalekhile.
Bawele babwe se bali nga Wele wefwe tawe,
aakhaba basiku babeene bamanyile kano.
Kamatuunda ke kimisabibu kabwe,
kaama khu misabibu kia Sodomu, mu mikuunda kia Komora.
Chisabibu chabwe chili che buchiba,
kamatuunda ke kimisabibu kabwe kali ke buchiba, chisakia chakio chili chindulu,
endali yabwe eli buchiba bwe chindemu,
buchiba burafu bwe kamaaramba.
“Ese se namanya kano,
se kekalilwa mu mabiikhilo kase?
baali siimbi khukwa,
endaalo eye butinyu bwabwe eli siimbi,
ne kumunaanio kwabwe kulikho kwicha khangu.
ne kakhali alaba ne siisa khu bakholi bewe,
lundi abona kamaani kabwe ne kawele,
ne se aliio oramire, nasioobi namwe omulekhuule tawe.
Nio alome ali, ‘Bawele babwe bali waena?’
Lulwanda nilwo belukhilamo.
Naanu babalichanga kiminawa kie chimbosio chabwe,
ne banywa endali eye biianwa biabwe bie khunywa?
Lekha bawele abo beche bamuyeete,
lekha nibo bamuliinde.
Nono bona muli ese seng'ene ndi Wele,
ne Wele okundi se aliio ne khali ese tawe.
Niira lundi ndamusia,
mbumisia lundi mbonia likoonjo,
ne se aliio onyala efubarura khwise tawe.
Ese suta kumukhono kwase mu ngaaki ne nichuba ndi,
nga ne menya khulwa mindali,
ndaakala embalu yase eye bumemu
ne ndakirumikhira mu bukhalaki,
ndeyacha basiku base,
ne khuelesia kumunaanio abo babambiila.
Buembo bwase bulechulakho kamafuki kabwe,
ne embalu yase eleera babaandu boosi babakhiingilila ese.
Sifuki silama khwaabo babeerwa nende baali mu mbaambe,
khukhwama khu bemeelesi be basiku be lichuune lileeyi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aukuumanga boosi babeera babaandu bewe,
eyachanga khu basiku bewe,
lundi abeelanga bubwoni bwe babaandu bewe.”
Musa ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni bacha mala bembela babaandu kumwenya kuno kwoosi.
Nga Musa ne aaba ne amala khuboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi kamakhuwa kano koosi,
aababoolela ali, “Bona bung'ali muli muria kamalaka niko ese naama khumuelesia enywe endaalo yino koosi. Boolela babaana benywe barie mu burekeerefu kamekisio ka Wele koosi.
Kamekisio kano se kali kamakhuwa ka busa kakhalimo bukhala tawe. Kali bulamu bwenywe. Khemukarie mala mulamenya kimiiko kimikali mu sibala siili engelekha owa Yoritani esio nisio muli siimbi khumenyamo.”
“Niina khu bikulu bia Abarimu khu sikulu sia Nebo mu sibala sia Moabu sisialoleelela lukoba lwa Yeriko, mala obone sibala sia Kanaani nisio ndi siimbi khuelesia babaandu ba Isiraeli bamenyemo.
Olafwila khu sikulu sienesio nga wandaayo Aruni ne aafwiila khu sikulu sia Hori.
Kalaba kario sikila enywe mwembi mwakholela ese bumayaanu nga ne mwaba a meechi ka Meriba, siimbi ne lukoba lwa Kadeshi mu sichiimi sia Sini. Mwaba bareengu khwise, se mwambelesia ese luyali mu moni che babaandu ba Isiraeli muli ese ndi omutakatifu tawe.
Olabona sibala esio aleeyi, ne se olengila mu sibala nisio ndikho mbelesia babaandu ba Isiraeli tawe.”

Chino nicho chikhabi nicho Musa omundu owa Wele aabiita babaandu ba Isiraeli ne akhafwa tawe.
Aaloma ali:
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aama khu sikulu sia Sinai,
enyokhela khwifwe khukhwama Edomu,
aakhosia buwaanga bwewe khukhwama khu sikulu sia Parani
aarura mu batakatifu chielefu ekhumi,
ne kumulilo kwe bumemu mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima babaandu bewe,
boosi nibo arobora bali mu buliindi bwewe,
mala bakhuloonda ewe,
lundi baloonda kakowo,
nga Musa ne aakhuelesia kamalaka,
kabe ke babaandu ba Yakobo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba omwami mu Yesuruni,
nga babemeelesi be babaandu babuusiana,
chikholo cha Isiraeli choosi alala.
Lekha ekholo eya Rubeni emenye, ekhafwa tawe,
aakhaba babaandu bayo ne bali batiiti.”
Aaloma kano khu kholo eya Yuda,
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rekeeresia kamalilo ke ekholo eya Yuda,
mala obakobosie khu basiaabwe.
Bapanile mala obayeete khu khuupana ne basiku babwe.”
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, elesia balawi Tumimu,
ne Urimu,
Ewe wabara khwikela e Masa,
wabayinganisilia a meechi ka Meriba.
Balekha bapaapa babwe ne ba maayi babwe,
se babaliinda tawe,
balekha bawandaaye ne babaana babwe,
sikila baria likhuwa liowo,
mala baliinda endakaano yowo.
Bakhekisie Baisiraeli kamalaka kowo ne kamekisio kowo,
bakhoselie bupani ebweeni wowo,
ne biianwa bie khukhwosia bimuufu khu alutare yowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, biita chikhabi bibiindu biabwe,
lundi fukiilila kimilimo kiabwe,
khupa oule basiku babwe,
abo ba baabiila nio bakhanyoola kamaani lundi tawe.”
Khu kholo eya Benjamini aaloma ali,
“Basiime ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali asi we buliindi bwewe,
abaliindanga biise bioosi,
aakhaba ne bauluukha babechanga mu buliindi bwewe.”
Ne khu kholo eya Yosefu aaloma ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abiite chikhabi kamaloba kaabwe,
abareerere kamame khukhwama mu ngaaki,
ne chinuma che kameechi chirubure,
ne kamatuunda kamalayi karobera kumuumu,
ne bibiaamo bikali bie kimieesi kie likesa,
ne bibiaamo bilayi bie mu ngulu,
ne bibiaamo bibioola bie bikulu bia mindali,
alala ne biianwa bilayi bie khu liloba,
ne asiimisibwa oyo omenyile khu Sinai.
Lekha chikhabi chino chibe khu kholo eya Yosefu,
sikila aaba omwimeelesi mu bawandaaye.
Yosefu ali ne kamaani ke euunwa embele,
ne chinjika chewe chili chinjika che emboongo,
alabirumikhira khusindikha babaandu be chikholo chichiindi,
boosi, khukhwola be aleeyi lukali.
Bano bali chielefu ekhumi ba Efuraimu
lundi chielefu chingali ba Manase.”
Ne khu kholo eya Sebuluni aaloma ali,
“Ekholo eya Sebuluni yekhoya ne murura,
ne ekholo eya Isakari sangaalila mu maeema kenywe.
Bakhalaange babaandu bache khu sikulu,
ne ebweeneyo bakhaane chimbosio chindayi,
bumenyo bwabwe buli mu bie mu nyanja
ne kimiaandu kiabwe mu muyekhe kwe enyanja.”
Khu kholo eya Kati aaloma ali,
“Fumia Wele oelesia be kholo eya Kati kamaloba!
Bakati bakhamenyeyo nga etalang'i
bakhatabulake kamakhono ne kimirwe kie babaandu.
Beroborera sibala silayi,
babemeelesi baebwa sitonyi siabwe,
bafukiilila lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
nga babemeelesi ba Isiraeli ne bebuusia alala.”
Ne khu kholo eya Dani aloma ali,
“Ekholo eya Dani eli etalang'i endoro,
esunanga khukhwama Bashani.”
Ne khu kholo eya Nafutali aaloma ali,
“Ekholo eya Nafutali, busiime bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubanyala,
muli ne chikhabi chingali cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enyanja eya Kinereti mumbo ne ebunafubo elaba eyenywe.”
Ne khu kholo eya Asieri aaloma ali,
“Ekholo eya Asieri ebiitwa chikhabi lukali mu baasiabwe,
lekha sibala siewe sibeemo kimiseituni kimikali khulwe kamafura.
Bilibwa bienywe bikhakholwe khukhwama khu bichuuma ne kumukasa,
ne kamaani kenywe kakhabeemo buli lwosi.”
Musa amaliilisia mu khuloma ali,
“Yeshuruni, se aliio oli nga Wele tawe,
okeendanga mu ngaaki khumuyeeta enywe,
owe kamaani ne ali mu ngaaki.
Wele owa mindali ali bumenyo bwowo,
kamakhono kewe ka mindali kalamuliinda enywe.
Alitimania basiku benywe ebweeni wenywe mala
amuboleele enywe ali, ‘Babunie.’
Khwako Baisiraeli balamenya mu muleembe,
babaana ba Yakobo bong'ene,
mu sibala sie biakhulia ne endali,
niio likulu likwisianga kamame.
Baisiraeli muli ne chikhabi,
mbao baali nga enywe tawe,
babaandu nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaonia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali engabo yenywe,
ne embalu eye bukhili bwenywe!
Basiku benywe bakhamwichekho ne buuri,
ne kakhali mukhabaswalakilile asi.”

Musa arura khu sibala sie kumweyeywe sia Moabu, aaniina aacha khu sikulu sia Nebo khu ndeleelwa khwe sikulu sia Pisika, ebukwe owa Yeriko. Ebweeneyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamwekesia sibala sioosi khukhwama Kileati khucha khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Dani
lundi aamwekesia sibala sioosi sia Nafutali, sibala sia Efuraimu ne Manase sibala sia Yuda sioosi khukhwama mumbo khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia ebukwe.
Aamwekesia sibala sia Yuda ne sie kumweyeywe ne litooma lioosi lia Yuda khukhwola Soari. Yeriko lulwalangangwa lukoba lwe kimikheendu.
Nio, aboolela Musa ali, “Sino sili sibala nisio nasuubisia Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo ndi, ndielesia be lisaaye liabwe. Nakhufukiilile osibone, ne kakhali se ndakhulekha wambukhe ocheemo tawe.”
Nio, Musa omukholi wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aafwiila ebweeneyo mu sibala sia Moabu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amusiikha mu litooma lilialoleelela lukoba lwa Beti-peori. Ne khukhwola endaalo yino se aliio omundu omanyile abuundu abweene niio aasiikhwa tawe.
Nga Musa ne afwa aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili. Aba busa ne kamaani nga buli lwosi, ne chimoni chewe se chabofula tawe.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli bamulila khu ndaalo kamakhumi kataru mu mweyeywe kwa Moabu. Nio siise sie khumulila siaawa.
Yoshua okhwa Nuni echusibwa ne bukesi sikila Musa aba aamurobora niye. Babaandu ba Isiraeli baria Yoshua mala baliinda kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesie khubirira khu Musa.
Akhabakhoo omung'oosi okundi owakholakho kamayia nende bie khuukia nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma Musa khukhola mu sibala sie Misiri tawe. Musa aakhola kano khu Farao omwami owa Misiri nende khu bakholi bewe boosi ne khu sibala siewe sioosi.
Akhabakhoo omung'oosi okundi onyala aaba ne kamaani kamakali ne khukhola bikholwa bikali lundi biriisia nibio Musa aakhola ebweeni we Baisiraeli tawe.

Enyuma we lifwa lia Musa omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalomaloma no muyeeti owa Musa, Yoshua okhwa Nuni.
Amuboolela ali, “Omukholi wase Musa afwiile. Nono yirekekha, ewe ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli, mala mwambukhe luluuchi lwa Yoritani mwingile mu sibala nisio ndikho mbaelesia.
Nga naboolela Musa, nakhuele ewe ne babaandu base boosi sibala sioosi nisio mucha khu keendakho.
Chinjakha chenywe chicha khwama mu sichiimi, ebunafubo, khukhwola mu bikulu bia Lebanoni, ebunaswa, khukhwama khu luuchi luboofu lwa Efurati, ebukwe, khubirira mu sibala sie Bahiti, khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia, lubeka lwe mumbo.
Yoshua, mbao yesi yesi ocha khukhuula ewe mu limenya liowo lioosi tawe. Ndaba nawe nga ne naba ne Musa. Ndaba nawe buli lwoosi. Se nja khukhukwisia namwe khukhulekha tawe.
Ba ne kamaani ne bunyindaafu. Ocha khuba omwimeelesi owe babaandu bano. Ne bacha khunyoola sibala nisio nalaka bakuuka babwe.
Ba ne kamaani lundi ba omunyindaafu lukali. Okhoya orie lilaka lioosi nilio omukholi wase Musa aakhua. Okhalilekelesia tawe nocha khuba ne bukhili osi osi nio ocha.
Okhoya okhole sitabu sie lilaka sisomwe buli lwoosi. Sieyike siilo ne kumuusi. Okhoya orie buli siindu sisiaandikwamo. Nio oindiaale ne khukhila.
Khebulila oli nakhulakiliisie obe ne kamaani lundi omunyindaafu! Okharia tawe, namwe okhafwa kumwoyo tawe, sikila Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo, ndi ne nawe osi osi niio ocha.”
Nio Yoshua alaka babemeelesi
khucha mu kambi. Baboolela babaandu bali, “Rekekha biakhulia sikila mu ndaalo chitaru mucha khwambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani khuaamba sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alikho amuelesia enywe.”
“Khebulila likhuwa nilio Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka ali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhamuelesie sibala sino lubeka lwe ebukwe owa Yoritani khuba sisienywe mumenyemo.
Bakhasi benywe, babaana benywe, bacha khurama ano ne chikhaafu. Ne banamae benywe, bakangile bulwaani bwe liie, bacha khunyoa khukhwambukha ebweeni we Baisiraeli basiaabwe nio babayeete.
Mulikhola murio nabwila banyoola kamaloba mumbo mwa Yoritani niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abaelesia. Chikholo che Baisiraeli choosi ne chimalile khunyoola kumuleembe ne kamaloba kabwe munyala mwakobola mala mwamenya mu maloba kenywe ebukwe owa Yoritani, sibala nisio Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia.”
Bakobosia Yoshua bali, “khucha khukhola buli sisiindu nisio okhubooleele ne khucha oosi oosi niio okhuruma.
Khucha khukhuria nga ne khwarichanga Musa. Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhoya abe ne nawe nga aba ne Musa.
Yesi yesi olekelesia bunyali bwowo namwe alekhe khuria lilala khu malaka kowo, acha khwirwa. Ba ne kamaani ne bunyindaafu!”

Omwami owa Yeriko aulila bali babaandu Baisiraeli batiiti bari bechile siilo khukhola buyooti mu sibala.
Nio aruma likhuwa khu Rahabu ali, “Babaandu babechile munju mwowo bechile khukhola buyooti mu sibala sioosi! Barusie enje!”
Ne kakhali Rahabu aba akisile babaandu abo, nio akobosia ali, “Ng'ali babaandu babaandi bechile munju mwase. Ne kakhali se enyala namanya niio bamile tawe.
Bachile enyanga ne elikho ekwa, bilibwa bie mu lukoba ne bikhekalwa tawe. Se manya niio bachile tawe. Ne mwaba ne mubatimakho munyala mwabanyoola.”
(Abeele Rahabu aniiniisie bayooti abo khungaaki khwe enju ne khubakisa, mala ababiimba bunyaasi nibwo aba ne arerekho.)
Nono babaandu bo mwami owa Yeriko batima khu bayooti Baisiraeli khukhwola mwifubukho lia Yoritani. Ne nga babaandu bo mwami bano barura busa mu lukoba bari, silibwa siekalwa.
Bayooti ne basiili khukona tawe Rahabu aniina khunju
mala ababoolela ali, “Manyile ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesie enywe sibala sino. Fweesi mu sibala sino khwamuriire enywe. Enywe mwakhurengiisie. Ne babaandu boosi bayenguukhile kimiooyo ebweeni wenywe.
Khwaulile nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne oomia enyanja eya Shamu ebweeni wenywe nga ne mwarura e Misiri. Khwaulile lundi nga ne mwera Sihoni ne Oku, babaami babili be Baamori be bukwe owa Yoritani.
Nga khwaulila busa khuri, kimiooyo kiefwe kiayenguukhile sikila enywe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wenywe niye ali niye ooli Wele owe mwikulu ne mu liloba.
Nono khe mwechube khwise mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi muli mucha khukholela enju yefwe bulayi nga ese emukholeele enywe. Mbelesie simanyisio,
muli mucha khuonia paapa ne maayi, bawandaayase basoleeli ne bakooko basiaase, ne chinju chabwe choosi! Mukhakhulekha khwerwa tawe!”
Nio bayooti abo bamuboolela bali, “Bulamu bwefwe buli khwiwe ne bulamu bwowo buli khwifwe! Walekha khuboolelakho omundu yesi yesi niko khulikho khukhola tawe, khukhulaka khuli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne acha khukhua efwe sibala sino, khucha khukhukholela kamalayi mu busuubilwa.”
Rahabu aba amenya munju eyombakhwa khwisiisi lie lukoba, mala ekhisia asi babaandu abo ne kumukoye khubirira mu numa.
Aloma ali, “Khe muche mu bikulu, ne busa babaandu bo mwami bacha khu munyoola. Mwikise eyo khu ndaalo chitaru khukhwola nga bakobola. Enyuma waako munyala mwachiililila ne lukeendo lwenywe.”
Bayooti baboolela Rahabu bali, “khucha khukhola niko wakhwechubiisie efwe.
Ne khulibwaakala sibala sino, kano niko olikhola: oliboa kumukoye kumubesemu kuno mu numa nimwo wakhwikhisila. Olibukula raraao ne maao, bawandaayo be sisoleeli ne lisaaye lia raraao lioosi alala munju yenywe.
Omundu yesi yesi ne arura munju mala afwa kumusaango kuliba ku kwewe. Ne omundu se alikhubiiya efwe tawe. Ne kaaba bali omundu yesi yesi oli ne nanywe erwa, aba khubiiye.
Khebulila oli waboolelakho omundu yesi yesi niko khukholile, aba khucha khuba balekhuule mu niko ewe wakhwechubia.”
Rahabu afukiilila mala abalekha bacha. Ne bamalile khucha, aboa kumukoye kumubesemu mu numa niyo bekhelamo.
Bayooti bacha mu bikulu mala bekisa. Babaandu bo mwami baabayima khu muyila kwoosi khu ndaalo chitaru, mala khubanyoola tawe, nio bakobola e Yeriko.
Bayooti abo beekha khukhwama mu bikulu, bambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala bakobola khu Yoshua. Bamuboolela buli siindu sisiabekholekhakho.
Baloma bali, “Khuli na ng'ali khuli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhueele efwe sibala sia Kanaani sioosi. Babaandu boosi bali ebweeneyo bafwiile kimiooyo sikila efwe.”

Bwasia kumutikhinyi Yoshua ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli benyokha makhelebeende barura mu kambi e Sitimu, mala bacha e Yoritani, niio bapayo e kambi ne basiliindiilila khukhwambukha.
Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru babemeelesi bacha mu kambi,
mala baboolela babaandu bali, “Ne mubona basaayi Balawi ne basutile lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, yinyokha mala muliloondekho.
Bacha khubeekesia engila niyo muchilakho sikila mukhabaakho ano tawe. Ne mukhesenda embi ne Lisanduku lie ndakaano tawe. Mukhoya mube enyuma ambi bikele chielefu chibili.”
Yoshua aboolela babaandu ali, “Mwikwalaasie mwabeene, sikila kumutikhinyi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhole kamayia mwinywe.”
Nio aboolela basaayi babukule Lisanduku lie ndakaano mala barangire ne nalio ebweeni we babaandu. Bakhola nga ne aaloma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Endaalo yino ndarakikha khukhukhola obe omukali ebweeni we babaandu Baisiraeli boosi, nio bamanye bali Ese ndaba nawe nga ne naba ne Musa.
Ne olilaka basaayi basute Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Ne boola khu sikiingi sie luluuchi, bengile mu meechi mala beme.”
Nio Yoshua aboolela babaandu ali, “Khe mwisende siimbi murekeeresie kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Nga ne muchiililila, mu bung'ali, Wele acha khutimania Bakanaani, Bahiti, Bahibi, Baperisi, Bakirikashi, Baamori ne Bayebusi. Mucha khumanya muli Wele omenyile mindali ali ne nanywe.
Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe liloba lioosi licha khwaambukha Yoritani ebweeni wenywe.
Nono robora babaandu be siseecha likhumi ne babili, mulala khukhwama mu buli ekholo eya Isiraeli.
Basaayi bakhasute Lisanduku lie ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe liloba lioosi. Nga bakhaswale bikele biabwe mu meechi ka Yoritani busa bari, kameechi kakhemikhwe khukhwiikha. Ne kameechi kakaama lwe engaaki kaliima nga siikulu alala.”
Nio babaandu barekukha khukhwama mu maeema kabwe khukhwaambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne barangiriirwe ne Basaayi.
Basaayi nga boola khu Yoritani ne basutile lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele, baswala mu meechi. (Luluuchi lwa Yoritani lwichuulanga ne lubira bikiingi bialwo mu biise bioosi bie likesa.)
Kameechi kaakama khukhwiikha mala keema. Luluuchi lwakama engaaki a lukoba lwa Adamu, lukoba luuli ambi ne Saretani. Kameechi kakeekha mu nyanja eya chumbe kekhela elala, ne babaandu bambukhila embi e Yeriko.
Nga Baisiraeli baaba ne balikho baambukha, basaayi ba baaba ne basutile Lisanduku lie ndakaano bema abuundu abalakafu akari we luluuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwola nga babaandu boosi ne bambukha.

Nga babaandu boosi ne bamala khukhwambukha Yoritani, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Yoshua.
Amuboolela ali, “Robora babaandu be siseecha likhumi na babili, mulala khukhwama mu buli ekholo.
Balake babukule kamabaale likhumi na kabili khukhwama akari we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, abuundu abwene niio basaayi bemaanga. Baboolele basute kamabaale kano ne khukara asi niio mulakona siilo sia luno.”
Nio Yoshua alanga babaandu be siseecha likhumi ne babili nibo arobora khukhwama mu baandu ba Isiraeli, mulala khukhwama mu buli ekholo.
Ababoolela ali, “Khe muche mu luuchi lwa Yoritani ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Buli mulala khwinywe asute libaale lilala khwibeka liewe. Buli lilala lilaba mu bweyaangu bwe ekholo eya Isiraeli.
Kamabaale kano kacha khuba simanyisio mwinywe. Mu biise bibiicha, babaana benywe ne balireeba sifuno sie kamabaale kano.
Mulibaboolela muli, ‘Kameechi ka Yoritani keema khukhwiikha nga Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne liambusibwa luluuchi!’ Kamabaale kano kacha khuba likhebusia khu baandu ba Isiraeli mindali na mindali.”
Babaandu ba Isiraeli baloonda kamalaka ka Yoshua. Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Yoshua, babukula kamabaale ekhumi ne kabili khukhwama akari we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, khuloondekhana ne chikholo cha Isiraeli. Bakasuta khukhwola abuundu we khukona, mala bakaruura asi ebweeneyo.
Yoshua yesi emia kamabaale ekhumi ne kabili akari we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, niio basaayi babasuta lisanduku lie endakaano beema. (Kamabaale kano kaliio khukhwola luno.)
Basaayi beema akari we luluuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwola nga buli sisiindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Yoshua khuboolela babaandu siekholekha. Kano koosi kakholekha nga Musa ne alaka Yoshua. Babaandu bambukha bwangu.
Ne bamalile khukhwaambukha, basaayi ne lisanduku lie endakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babira ebweeni we babaandu.
Babaandu Be Chikholo cha Rubeni ne Kati ne balala khu kholo eya Manase, babira ebweeni we Baisiraeli ne bakangile bulwaani nga Musa ne abalaka.
Babaandu embi chielefu kamakhumi kane baberekekhera liie bambukha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu siangalaamwe sia Yeriko.
Khu ndaalo eyo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaalia Yoshua ebweeni we Baisiraeli boosi mala baelesia Yoshua liria, mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi nga baba ne baria Musa.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali,
“Laka basaayi basutile Lisanduku lie ndakaano barure mu Yoritani.”
Nio Yoshua alaka basaayi ali, “Rura mu luuchi.”
Nga basaayi ne barura mu luuchi lwa Yoritani bikele biabwe biola khu sikiingi sisioomu, kameechi karakikha khukhwiikha mala kechusia bikiingi bialwo lundi.
Babaandu barura mu luuchi lwa Yoritani mu ndaalo eye likhumi mu mwesi kunyoa mala baapa ekambi e Kilikali, ebukwe owa Yeriko.
Yoshua emia e Kilikali kamabaale likhumi, na kabili niko babukula khukhwama mu luuchi lwa Yoritani.
Aboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali, “Mu biise bibiicha, babaana benywe ne balimureeba sifuno sie kamabaale kano,
mulibaboolela muli, ‘Biise ebio Baisiraeli bambukha Yoritani asi abalakafu.’
Mukhababoolele muli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe oomia kameechi ka Yoritani sikila enywe khukhwola nga ne mwambukha, bulayi bwene nga ne oomia Enyanja eya Shamu nio efwe fweesi khwambukha.
Sikila kano, babaandu boosi be mu sibala balimanya bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali owe kamaani. Nio murie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mindali na mindali.”

Babaami be Baamori boosi be mumbo mwa Yoritani, ne babaami be Bakanaani boosi sia nyanja eya Mediterenia baulila bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omisie Yoritani khukhwola nga babaandu ba Isiraeli ne bambukha. Sikila kano, babaami abo baria ne khuyengukha kimiooyo.
Mu siise esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Khola kimibano kie kamabaale mala okhebe Baisiraeli sisiingilo sikhola khabili.”
Nono Yoshua akhola kimibano kie kamabaale mala aakhebela Baisiraeli a Kibea-haaraloti.
Ne sino nisio sifuno sisiakila Yoshua abakheba: babaandu be siseecha boosi babaama Misiri, babaandu be siseecha boosi banamae, bafwila khu ngila mu sichiimi, enyuma we khurura e Misiri.
Akhaba babaandu boosi ba baarura e Misiri ne baba ne bakhebwa, babasaalwa khu ngila mu sichiimi baba basiinde.
Baisiraeli bakeenda mu sichiimi khu miiko kamakhumi kane. Mu biise ebio, babaandu boosi be liie bafwa sikila se baria Wele tawe. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echuba ali se balibona sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetekhanga nisio alaka ali alielesia bakuuka babwe tawe.
Babaana be babaandu bano bali nibo Yoshua akheba sikila se bakhebwa ne bali khu lukeendo tawe.
Enyuma we khumala siikhebo, ekholo yoosi yarama mu kambi khukhwola nga baona.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Luno namurusiisiekho chisoni che khuuba ba nasioobi mu Misiri.” Elio liliakila abuundu ne alaangwa Kilikali
Endaalo ekhola khabili yaba eye bweeni khu nibo khulia biakhulia bie mu Kanaani, balia biakhulia bibiosie ne kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe. Yaba endaalo eloondela eye pasaka.
Endaalo eloondakho biakhulia bia mana biakama khukwa, mala Baisiraeli khubaakho lundi ne nabio tawe. Khukhwama mu siise esio khuchiililila, balia biakhulia bimiichwa mu Kanaani.
Yoshua ne ali embi Yeriko, abona omundu emile ebweeni wewe, atiilile embalu. Yoshua acha niio ali mala amureeba ali, “Ewe oli mulala khu banamae befwe, namwe oli owe basiku?”
Omundu oyo akobosia ali, “Khaba tawe, endi ano nga komanda owe banamae ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Yoshua akwa asi khwiloba mala asaaya, aloma ali, “Wenya ese omukholi wowo khole siina Omwami?”
Omwimeelesi owe banamae ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Fuula biraaro biowo, sikila wemile Abuundu Atakatifu.” Mala Yoshua akhola ario.

Nono bilibwa bie lukoba lwa Yeriko biekalwa lundi bialiindwa khukhiingilila Baisiraeli. Mbao yesi yesi owengila namwe owarura khukhwama mu Yeriko tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Ndikho nda lukoba lwa Yeriko mu makhono kowo, ne Babaami balwo, ne banamae balwo boosi.
Ewe ne banamae bowo mucha khukeenda ne mulubotookhelela lulala buli ndaalo, khu chindaalo sita.
Basaayi saba, buli mulala asute ekhoombi eye lulwiika lwe limiiku, barangire ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Ewe ne banamae bowo mu ndaalo eya saba mucha khukeenda mubotookhelele lukoba olwo khukhwola saba ne Basaayi nende balikho baapa chikhoombi.
Bakhape ekhoombi ne kamaani. Ne nga mukhaulile ekhoombi, babaandu boosi bakhoya bayokele lukali. Kamasiisi ke lukoba kakhakwe asi. Nio babaandu boosi bengile mukari buli mundu khukhwama niio ali balwibwaakale.”
Nio Yoshua omwana owa Nuni alaanga basaayi mala ababoolela ali, “Bukula Lisanduku lie ndakaano, mala basaayi saba barangire ebweeni walio, ne basutile chikhoombi.”
Mala alaka babaandu bewe khurakikha khukeenda khubotookhelela lukoba. Banamae baba ebweeni we lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga Yoshua ne alaka babaandu, basaayi saba barangira ne baapa chikhoombi. Enyuma wabo, Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liabaloondakho.
Banamae ba baaba ne bakangile bulwaani bacha ebweeni we basaayi babaapanga chikhoombi. Ne Banamae be enyuma baloonda khu Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Chikhoombi chapa ne chichiililila.
Ne kakhali Yoshua aba alakile babaandu bewe ali bakhayokela namwe balomakho likhuwa liosi liosi tawe khukhwola nga ne arusia lilaka.
Nio babotookhelela lukoba lulala ne basutile Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala becha bengila mu kambi bakonamo siilo esio.
Yoshua enyokha makhelebeende endaalo eloondakho mala basaayi basuta Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Basaayi saba basutile chikhoombi saba barangira ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano, ne balikho baapa chikhoombi. Banamae bakangiile bulwaani bacha ebweeni wabwe. Ne banamae be enyuma baloonda khu lisaanduku lie ndakaano. Ne chikhoombi chapwa buchiililila.
Mu ndaalo ekhola khabili bakeenda lundi babotookhelela lukoba khukhwola lulala mala bakobola mu kambi. Bakhola bario khu ndaalo sita.
Khu ndaalo ekhola saba benyokha makhelebeende mala babotookhelela lukoba bario khukhwola saba. Endaalo yino yong'ene niyo babotookhelela khukhwola saba.
Lukhola saba, basaayi ne bamalile khu khuupa chikhoombi, Yoshua aboolela babaandu ali, “Yokela, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amueele lukoba luno!
Lukoba nende buli sisiindu silulimo bikhoya bionakwe bioosi nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali omueeyi Rahabu nende be munju yewe balekhwe, sikila akisa bayooti befwe nibo khwaruma.
Mukhabukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi siikhoyeele sionakibwe nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Mwakhola murio mucha khurera bubwonaki mu kambi eya Isiraeli mala mukhureerere butinyu.
Ne efwesa ne esahabu ne bibiindu bibiakholwa khukhwama khu mikasa ne bichuuma bili bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bikhoya biabiikhwa mu libiikhilo lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Beera buli mundu mu lukoba ne mbalu; be siseecha nende be siikhasi, baele ne basaakhulu. Beera akhaba chikhaafu, kamakheese ne chipunda.
Nio Yoshua aboolela babaandu babili babayoota sibala esio ali, “Khe muche munju mwo omueeyi oyo mala mumurusie enje ne babaandu bewe, nga ne mwamwechubila.”
Nio babaandu babili abo bacha mala barusia enje Rahabu, raraawe ne maawe, bawandaaye ne babaandi nibo amenyanga nabo. Bababukula boosi, balebe ne banasioobi, babayila enje mu kambi eye Baisiraeli.
Nio baambia kumulilo lukoba lwaya lwakwa, alala ne buli siindu sisiabamo. Ne kakhali babukula efwesa, esahabu ne bibiindu bibiakholwa khukhwama khu mikasa ne bichuuma, babibukula mala babira mwibiikhilo lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mu biise ebio Yoshua arusia liliechuba ali,
“Yesi yesi okhakakho khukhwombakha lundi lukoba lwa Yeriko,
acha khuba asi we silaamo sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Yesi yesi orakikha khukhwombakha kamasiisi,
acha khufwiisia omwana wewe omubele,
