Yesi yesi owombakha bilibwa,
acha khufwiisia omwana wewe omutua.”
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne Yoshua, ne efuma eya Yoshua yaba mu sibala sioosi.

Baisiraeli se baria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lie khubakaania khubukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi sisienyekhana sionakwe khukhwama e Yeriko tawe. Akani okhwa Karimi, omwichukhulu owa Sabuti okhwa Sera, owe ekholo eya Yuda aabukula bilala khu biindu bibiaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala liakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalalila Baisiraeli.
Yoshua aaruma babaandu khukhwama Yeriko khucha Ai, lukoba luli e bukwe owa Beteli, embi ne Beta-beni. Abaruma khucha khukhola buyooti mu sibala esio. Nga ne bacha bakhola bario,
bakobola baboolela Yoshua bali, “Mbao sifuno sikila babaandu boosi bebwaakale Ai tawe. Ruma ambi babaandu chielefu chibili namwe chielefu chitaru bong'ene. Okharuma banamae boosi ebweeneyo khu khuupana tawe, sikila babaandu baliyo bali batiiti lukali.”
Khwako ambi Baisiraeli chielefu chitaru bacha bebwaakala Ai, mala babaandu ba Ai babatimania.
Babaandu ba Ai batimania Baisiraeli khukhwama musilibwa sie lukoba khukhwola Shebarimu. Beera Baisiraeli ambi kamakhumi kataru na sita khungila eyiikha mumaayo mwe sikulu. Nio Baisiraeli bayengukha kimiooyo lundi baba ne buuri.
Yoshua ne babemeelesi ba Isiraeli batabulaka chingubo chabwe, bakwa asi ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala bakona ao khukhwola ekolooba. Bachukha lufuumbi khu mirwe kiabwe.
Mala Yoshua aloma ali, “Ee Omwami WELE, sina sikila ne wakhwambusia Yoritani wakhura mu makhono ke Baamori bakhubunie efwe? Siina sikila ne okhakhulekha khwamenya engelekha owa Yoritani?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndoma ndi siina, ne bona Isiraeli yelukhe khukhwama khu basiku?
Bakanaani ne babaandu babaandi be mu sibala muno bakhauliile kano. Bakhakhubotookhelele mala bakhwire efwe buli sia mulala! Olakhola oriena khuliinda lisina liowo liboofu?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Yinyokha! Siina sikila ne okona asi ori?
Isiraeli yakholile bubwoni! Bafunake endakaano ne nase niyo nabalaka khuliinda. Baabukuule bibiindu bilala bibiakhalakilwa khukhwonakwa. Babiiba, mala babea. Babitubania alala ne bibiindu biabwe.
Sino nisio sikila Baisiraeli ne bakhanyala khuula basiku babwe tawe. Baulilwe sikila babeene bakhalakiilwe khukhwonakwa. Se nja khuba nanywe lundi ne mukhonaake bibiindu nibio mwakaambilwa khulekha khubukula tawe!
Cha okwalaasie babaandu kimiooyo mala berekekhe khukhwicha ebweeni wase. Baboolele berekekhe kumutikhinyi. Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli, ndoma ndi, ‘Isiraeli, mu biindu bienywe bilimo bibiindu bibiaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bionakibwe. Se munyala mwaula basiku benywe ne mukhenyosiemo bibiindu bino tawe!’
Nono baboolele oli, kumutikhinyi bakhareerwe ebweeni, buli ekholo sia ndala. Ekholo niyo mbukula niyo echa khwicha ebweeni, luuya sia lulala, luuya nilwo mbukula lucha khwicha ebweeni, enju sia ndala. Enju niyo mbukula echa khwicha ebweeni, omundu sia mulala.
Omundu ocha khubukulwa mala anyoolekhane khuuba ne bibiindu biianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bibienyekhana bionakwe aliosibwa, alala ne enju yewe ne buli siosi nisio ali ne nasio, sikila akholile sisiindu sie chisoni mu Isiraeli lundi afunaake endakaano yase.”
Nio Yoshua enyokha kumutikhinyi makhelebeende ayila Baisiraeli ebweeni, ekholo sia ndala, mala ekholo eya Yuda yabukulwa.
Areera ekholo eya Yuda ebweeni, luuya sia lulala, luuya lwa Sera lwabukulwa. Nio abukulamo luuya lwa Sera, enju sia ndala, ne enju eya Sabuti yabukulwa.
Nio abukula enju eya Sabuti, omundu sia mulala. Akani, omwana owa Karimi, omwichukhulu owa Sabuti, abukulwa.
Nio Yoshua amuboolela ali, “Mwana wase, boola bung'ali mala wiyame ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Mboolele luno niko okholile. Okhakhakakho wangisa tawe.”
Akani akobosia Yoshua ali, “Buli bung'ali, nakholile bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Ne kano niko nakholile:
Mu biindu nibio khwaamba nabonamo engubo endayi eya Sinari, ambi bitonyi chimia chibili bie efwesa, ne bitonyi bie esahabu kamakhumi karaano. Nabiekoomba lukali nio nabibukula. Nabikisa asi mwiloba mu liiema liase, ne efwesa eli asi wabio.”
Nio Yoshua aruma babaandu batima bacha niio liiema lili mala banyoola bali ng'ali bibiindu chana ebio biaba biasiikhwa mwieema, mala efwesa yaba asi.
Babirusia enje we liiema babiyila khu Yoshua ne khu Baisiraeli boosi. Babira asi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Yoshua alala ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli, babukula Akani, ne efwesa, ne engubo eya Shaniri ne sibia sie esahabu, alala ne babaana bewe basoleeli ne bakhaana, chikhaafu chewe, chipunda, kamakheese, liiema liewe, nende buli siindu siosi nisio aaba nasio, mala babayila mwitooma lia Akori.
Yoshua aloma ali, “Siina sikila ne wareerire butinyu khwifwe? Luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khureera butinyu khwiwe!” Nio Baisiraeli boosi barakikha khu khuupa Akani kamabaale, bamwiira. Lundi baapa kamabaale ne khukhwosia lisaaye liewe ne kimiaandu kiewe.
Bamubungikhakho situumi sikali sie kamabaale. Situumi sino sisiliio khukhwola luno. Sino nisio sikila abuundu ao ne asilaangwa ali Litooma lia Akori. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akama khuba ne lirima.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Bukula banamae boosi mala muche Ai. Mukharia namwe mwafwa kimiooyo tawe. Nja khumua enywe bukhili khuula omwami owa Ai ne babaandu bewe. Lukoba, ne sibala siabwe sicha khuba sisienywe.
Kholela Ai ne omwami walwo niko mwakhola khu Yeriko ne omwami walwo. Ne kakhali siise sino munyala mwabukula kimiaandu kie lukoba ne chikhaafu bibe bibienywe. Yirekekha khukhwibwaakala lukoba matundubiikha khukhwamila enyuma.”
Nono Yoshua erekekha khucha e Ai ne banamae bewe boosi. Arobora banamae bewe balayi chielefu kamakhumi kataru mala abaruma siilo.
Abalaka ali, “Kane mwikise enyuma we lukoba, ne mukhaba sinao khukhwama mu lukoba tawe, mwirekekhe khukhwibwaakala.
Ese ne babaandu boosi nibo ndi nabo khulacha e lukoba. Babaandu ba Ai ne becha khu khuupania efwe, khulabafutarira mala khwilukhe nga ne khwakhola ekhunyoa.
Bacha khukhuloondakho khukhwola nga ne khubayila sinao khukhwama mu lukoba. Bacha khwibaasia bali khulikho khubelukha, nga ne khwakhola mu khunyoa.
Abwenao, enywe mularura niio mwikisile mala mubukule lukoba. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe acha khumua enywe lukoba olwo.
Ne mumalile khuaamba lukoba chana, mulwoosie, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka. Kano niko ese mulakiliisie.”
Nono Yoshua abaruma, mala bacha abuundu wabwe e khukhwikisa, baliindila ebweeneyo, akari we lukoba lwa Ai ne Beteli, lubeka lwe mumbo mwa Ai. Yoshua akona siilo esio mu kambi.
Kumutikhinyi makhelebeende Yoshua enyokha mala alaanga banamae alala. Nio niye ne babemeelesi ba Isiraeli barangirira Baisiraeli khukhwola Ai.
Banamae ne naye bacha elubeka lwe silibwa sie khukhwingila mu lukoba. Baapa ekambi lubeka lwe ebunaswa owa Ai. Litooma liaba akari wabwe ne Ai.
Yoshua abukula babaandu embi chielefu chiraano mala abakisa mumbo mwe lukoba, akari wa Ai ne Beteli.
Nono beemia banamae, ebololi emboofu yaba ebunaswa we lukoba ne ebololi eye enyuma lubeka lwe mumbo. Yoshua akona mwitooma siilo esio.
Omwami owa Ai abona babaandu ba Yoshua. Akhola khangu, niye ne babaandu bewe. Nio boosi barura bacha lubeka lwe mwitooma lia Yoritani khu khuupana ne Baisiraeli. Se aamanya ali acha khwibwaakalwa khukhwamila enyuma we lukoba tawe.
Yoshua ne babaandu bewe baomela oli balikho babunisibwa, mala belukha bacha lubeka lwe sichiimi.
Babaandu boosi be mu lukoba lwa Ai baba balangiilwe alala khuloonda khu Baisiraeli. Nga bachiililila khubatimakho, bachiililila khuba sinao ne lukoba.
Buli mundu mu Ai ne Beteli
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Yekesielela Ai lifumo liowo. Ndikho nda lukoba olwo mumakhono kowo.” Nio Yoshua okesielela lifumo liliaba mukhono mwewe e lukoba olwo.
Ne nga ne asuta kumukhono kwewe, babaandu ba baaba ne bekisile benyokha khangu, batima bengila mu lukoba, baluaamba, mala ao ne nao baluaambia.
Nio babaandu ba Ai nga balola enyuma, babona liliisi lituukha ne liniina mungaaki. Se ba baakho ne bunyali bwe khukhwilukha bache eyi namwe eyi tawe, sikila Baisiraeli ba baaba ne batima ne belukhila lubeka lwe mu sichiimi, ba bakaluukhanakho khubebwaakala.
Nga Yoshua ne babaandu bewe ne babona bali babasiaabwe Baisiraeli babukuule lukoba, lundi baluambiisie, bakobola enyuma mala barakikha khukhwira babaandu ba Ai.
Baisiraeli ba baaba mu lukoba beekha baambana ne nabo mwiie. Nono babaandu ba Ai banyoolekhana ne bakariirwe ne Baisiraeli, mala boosi berwa. Mbao owelukha namwe owaona tawe,
nakhali omwami owe Ai. Bamuaamba bamuyila khu Yoshua.
Baisiraeli beerera buli mundu mu sibala sie sichiimi nisio babaandu ba Ai babatimanisiliamo. Nio bakobola e Ai mala beera buli mundu ebweeneyo.
Babaandu boosi ba Ai baberwa endaalo eyo be siseecha nende be siikhasi baba chielefu likhumi na babili; babaandu boosi ba Ai.
Yoshua achiililila ne khukhwekesielela lifumo liewe e Ai mala se alira asi tawe khukhwola nga buli mulala ebweeneyo ne erwa.
Baisiraeli babukula chikhaafu ne kimiaandu kie lukoba olwo, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aboolela Yoshua.
Nono Yoshua osia Ai mala alulekha mwimuusi. Lukoba lwa Ai lusiili lurio khukhwola luno.
Asuunga Omwami owa Ai khu murongooro mala alekhakho kumubili kwewe khukhwola ekolooba. Ekolooba Yoshua alaka Baisiraeli basuungula kumubili okwo, mala bakumwaata asi mu silibwa nisio bengilila mu lukoba. Bafuuma khu mubili okwo situumi siboofu sie kamabaale. Situumi esio sisiilio khukhwola luno.
Akhola khuloondekhana ne kamalaka niko Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aelesia Baisiraeli. Lilaka lia Musa liaandikwa lili: “Alutare elikholwa khukhwama khu mabaale niko bakhabeechakho ne embasa eye sichuuma tawe.” Baanila khu alutare ng'eneyo biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lundi barusirakho biianwa biabwe bie kumuleembe.
Abwenao, mumoni che Baisiraeli, Yoshua aandika khu mabaale kamalaka niko Musa aandika.
Baisiraeli boosi: bakasa, ne babemeelesi babwe, banamae, bakhalaki, basaalwa, alala ne baakwa ba babamenyamo, bema chimbeka chombi che Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Boosi baloleelela basaayi ba baaba Balawi, babaasuta lisaanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Enusu eye babaandu bema ne bapile kimikoongo kiabwe ebweeni we sikulu sia Kerisimu ne babaandi bema ne bapile kimikoongo kiabwe ebweeni we sikulu sia Ebali. Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ababoolela khukhola bario siise ne siola khu nibo khubiitwa chikhabi.
Enyuma wa kano, Yoshua asoma kamalaka koosi, alala ne chikhabi ne bilaamo, nga ne biaandikwa mu sitabu sie lilaka.
Yoshua asoma kamalaka koosi niko Musa aamulaka. Libuusiana lie Baisiraeli boosi: be siseecha, nende be siikhasi, babaana ne bakwa boosi baulila kamakhuwa ka Yoshua.

Bukhili bwa Isiraeli bwauliilikhana khu baami boosi ba baaba lubeka lwe mumbo mwa Yoritani, mumaayo mwe bikulu, ne elubeka lwoosi lwe nyanja eya Mediterenia khukhwola elubeka lwe ebunaswa owa Lebanoni. Babaami be lubeka lwe mumbo mwa Yoritani bano baba be Bahiti, be Baamori, be Bakanaani, be Baperisi, be Bahibi nende be Bayebusi.
Bebuusiana alala mala baambania banamae babwe khu khuupana ne Yoshua ne Baisiraeli.
Ne nga babaandu be e Kibeoni, baulila niko Yoshua akhola e Yeriko ne Ai,
bakhalaka khubea Baisiraeli. Babukula biakhulia biabwe mala bala khu punda chabwe kamakunia kamatabukhake ne chioochwa che ndali chikhale nicho banabilisia.
Bafwara chingubo che bitasitasi lundi biraaro bibiawelelela. Siakhulia nisio basuta nasio siaba sisioomu lundi sisiapa lukukhu.
Nio bacha mu kambi eye Kilikali mala baboolela Yoshua ne babaandu Baisiraeli bali, “Khwama mu sibala sie aleeyi. Khwenya khukhole endakaano ne nanywe.”
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli bareeba bali, “Siina sikila efwe khukhole endakaano ne nanywe? Wakana mumenyile aembi?”
Baboolela Yoshua bali, “Efwe khuli bakholi bowo” Yoshua abareeba ali, “Enywe muli naanu? Ne mwama waena?”
Nio bamuboolela bali: “Khwama mu sibala sie aleeyi lukali. Khwechile khulwe lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Khwaulile koosi niko aakhola mu Misiri.
Lundi khwaulile niko aakhola khu baami babili be Baamori lubeka lwe ebukwe owa Yoritani: Omwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni ne omwami Oku owa Bashani, babaamenya mu Asitaroti.
Ne babemeelesi befwe ne babaandu boosi baamenyile mu sibala siefwe bakhuboolela efwe bali khubukule biakhulia mala khwiche khumwakaanane enywe. Bakhuboolela bali khube bakholi bowo. Nono khu khusaba okhole endakaano ne nafwe.
Lola siakhulia siefwe. Nga ne khwarura engo khukhwakaanana, siaba sisibilile. Ne luno sili sisioomu lundi siapile lukukhu.
Nga ne khwechusia endali mu oochwa chino, chaba chimbia ne lola chatabuukhe! Chingubo chefwe chatabuukhe ne biraaro biefwe biaweleleele sikila lukeendo luleeyi.”
Nono Baisiraeli babukula biakhulia biabwe, ne se bareeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nisio benyekhaane bakhole tawe.
Yoshua akhola endakaano eye kumuleembe ne babaandu ba Kibeoni ne khubafukiilila bamenye. Babemeelesi be Baisiraeli balaka bali bacha khukhola nga endakaano ne yenyekhana.
Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru endakaano ne malile khukholwa, Baisiraeli baulila bali babaandu bano bali be aembi.
Baisiraeli barakikha lukeendo mala enyuma we chindaalo chitaru bola mu ngoba nimwo babaandu bano bamenya. Chingoba chino chaba: Kibeoni, Kefira, Beeroti, ne Kiriati-Yearimu.
Baisiraeli se babeera tawe, sikila babemeelesi babwe baba babechubile mwisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Nio Baisiraeli boosi belung'unya khu bemeelesi babwe.
Ne kakhali babemeelesi baboolela Baisiraeli boosi bali, “Khwechubila ba Kibeoni mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Luno se khunyala khwabakholela bubi tawe.
Khukhoya khubalekhe bamenye sikila khwabechubila. Khwaaba ne khukhakhola khurio tawe, Wele acha khukhua kumunaanio.
Balekhe bamenye, ne kakhali bacha khukhwasakila chiikhu ne khukhuchiila kameechi.” Lino nilio babemeelesi babisia mala kaba kario.
Yoshua alaka babaandu be e Kibeoni baleerwe ebweeni wewe, mala abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mwakhubea ne mukhuboolela muli mwama aleeyi, ne khane mwamenya busa aembi?
Sikila mwakholile murio, Wele abalaamile, ne muliba nasioobi befwe. Muliasaka chiikhu ne khusuta kameechi khulwe enju eya Wele wase.”
Bakobosia Yoshua bali, “Khwakhola khurio, sikila khwaba ne buuri khuli mulakhwira. Khwaulila khuli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alaka omukholi wewe Musa khumuelesia enywe sibala siosi ne khukhwira babaandu babasimenyamo. Khwaria sikila bulamu bwefwe mala khwakhola likhuwa lino.
Ne nono luno khuli mu bunyali bwenywe, mukhukholele nilio mwibaasia muli lili lilayi khwinywe lundi lia ng'ali.”
Nono lino nilio Yoshua akhola: abaliinda ne se aalekha Baisiraeli babeera tawe.
Ne kakhali abakhola khuba babasaaka chiikhu ne khucha kameechi khulwe Baisiraeli ne khulwe alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khukhwola endaalo eya luno basichiililila khukhola kumulimo kuno abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aarobora khumwisaayilao.

Atoni-Seteki, omwami owa Yerusalemu
Atoni-Seteki aria lukali sikila Kibeoni lwaba lukoba luboofu nga chingoba chichiindi chichaba ne babaami. Kibeoni lwaba lukoba luboofu khukhila lukoba lwa Ai, ne babaandu balwo baba be kamaani.
Nono Atoni-Seteki omwami owa Yerusalemu aruma likhuwa khu mwami Hohamu owa Heburoni, omwami Piramu owa Yarimuti, Yafia, omwami owe Lakishi, ne omwami Tebiri owa Ekironi.
Ababoolela ali, “Yiicha munjeete mala khwibwaakale lukoba lwa Kibeoni, sikila babaandu balwo bakholile kumuleembe ne Yoshua ne babaandu ba Isiraeli.”
Babaami baraano be Baamori: omwami owa Yerusalemu, omwami owa Heburoni, omwami owa Yarimuti, omwami owa Lakishi, ne omwami owa Ekironi, babuusia banamae babwe mala bacha e Kibeoni, balusira mala balwibwaakala.
Babaandu be lukoba lwa Kibeoni barumira Yoshua likhuwa mu kambi eyaba e Kilikali bali, “Okhakhulekha tawe! Yiicha khangu okhuyeete mala okhuonie! Babaami boosi be Baamori babaamenya mu sibala sie bikulu babuusiisie alala banamae babwe mala bakhwibwakaale.”
Nio Yoshua ne banamae bewe boosi, alala ne babaandu bewe be kamaani, baniina khukhwama e Kilikali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Okhabariakho tawe. Namalile khukhua bukhili khale. Mbao khu nibo ocha khukhwima ebweeni wowo tawe.”
Siilo siosi Yoshua ne banamae bewe bakeenda khukhwama e Kilikali boola e Kibeoni, mala bebwaakala Baamori matundubiikha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Baamori bareenga ebweeni we banamae ba Isiraeli. Baisiraeli baberera e Kibeoni mala babatimania khubirira khu muyila khubira emwaalo owa Beti-horoni. Bachiililila khubaapa khukhwola ebunafubo e Aseka ne Maketa.
Ne nga Baamori ne baaba ne belukha banamae ba Isiraeli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola kamaarara kamaboofu khukhwama khwikulu kabapila khu ngila, khukhwola e Aseka mala bafwa. Bakali beerwa ne kamaarara khukhila nibo Baisiraeli beera ne embalu.
Endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaelesia Baisiraeli bukhili khu Baamori, Yoshua alomaloma ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ebweeni we Baisiraeli ali,
“Enyanga, yiima khungaaki khwa Kibeoni,
Ne ewe kumwesi, yiima khungaaki khwe litooma lia Aiyaloni.”
Se yabakhoo endaalo nga eyo namwe ekhabaakhoo endaalo ekiindi nga endaalo eyo niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaulila omundu tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi apanila Isiraeli.
Enyuma wa kano Yoshua ne banamae bewe bakobola mu kambi e Kilikali.
Babaami be Baamori baraano, kakhaba kario, baba beluukhe mala bekisile mwibina lie e Maketa.
Omundu mulala abanyoola, mala aboolela Yoshua niio bekisile.
Nio Yoshua aloma ali, “Piringisia kamabaale kamaboofu kafuunikhe e muliango we libina elio. Rayo baliindi ebweeneyo,
ne kakhali enywe mwabeene mukhekhalayo tawe. Tima khu basiku mala mubebwaakale khukhwamila enyuma, mukhabalekha boola mungoba chabwe tawe! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amuelesie bukhili khu nibo.”
Yoshua ne Baisiraeli beera basiku. Ne kakhali balala banyala khukhwilukhila mungoba chabwe chisire, khwirwa tawe.
Nio babaandu boosi bakobola khu Yoshua bulayi mu kambi e Maketa. Mbao omundu yesi yesi mu sibala owakhakakho khukuta Baisiraeli tawe.
Nio Yoshua aloma ali, “Ikulayo emuliango we libina mala mundeerere babaami baraano abo.”
Khwako libina liekulibwa, ne babaami ba Yerusalemu, Heburoni, Yarimuti, Lakishi, ne Ekironi barusibwa enje.
Mala bayila babaami abo khu Yoshua. Yoshua alanga babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli. Aboolela bakhulu be banamae ba baaba ne bachile ne naye ali, “Yiicha siimbi mala mure bikele bienywe khu makosi ke babaami bano.” Nio becha siimbi mala bara bikele biabwe khu makosi ke babaami abo.
Nio Yoshua ababoolela ali, “Mukharia namwe mwafwa kimiooyo tawe. Ba ne kamaani ne bunyindaafu, sikila kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khukholela basiku benywe boosi nibo mulipana nabo.”
Enyuma wako, Yoshua eera babaami baraano abo mala abasuunga khu mirongooro kiraano. Basikala khu mirongooro ekio khukhwola ekolooba.
Oli enyanga echa khukwa, Yoshua arusia lilaka kimibili kiabwe kiasungulwa mala bakimwaata mwibina nimwo abeele baba ne bekisile. Bara kamabaale kamaboofu e muliango we libina. Kamabaale ako kasiilio khukhwola luno.
Yoshua aamba lukoba lwa Maketa endaalo eyo mala aluulila elala ne omwami walwo khulwe khurumikhira embalu. Abunisilia elala buli mundu mu lukoba olwo, mbao niye alekha tawe. Akhola khu mwami owa Maketa niko akhola khu mwami owa Yeriko.
Nio Yoshua ne Baisiraeli boosi bacha khukhwama e Maketa boola mu lukoba lwa Libuna, mala balwibwaakala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi aelesia Baisiraeli bukhili khuula lukoba luno no mwami walwo. Beera bamenywa bamwo boosi khuramiakho akhaba omundu namulala yeng'ene tawe. Bakhola omwami walwo niko bakholela omwami owa Yeriko.
Enyuma wa kano, Yoshua ne Baisiraeli boosi bacha khukhwama e Libuna bola khu lukoba lwa Lakishi, balukara mala balwibwaakala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Baisiraeli bukhili khuula Lakishi mu ndaalo ekhola khabili eye liie. Baluulila elala khulwe khurumikhira embalu. Beera buli mundu walwo, nga nilwo bakhola Libuna.
Omwami Horamu owa Keseri echa khuabina Lakishi. Yoshua amwiira ne babaandu bewe ne se abakhoo owarama tawe.
Nio, Yoshua ne Baisiraeli boosi bacha khukhwama e Lakishi boola mu lukoba lwa Ekironi, balusira mala balwibwaakala.
Baluaamba, endaalo eyo ne khuluulila elala khulwe khurumikhira embalu. Babunisilia elala buli omundu mu lukoba omwo endaalo eyo nga bakhola e Lakishi.
Enyuma wa kano, Yoshua ne Baisiraeli boosi baniina khukhwama Ekironi khukhwola mu Heburoni.
Balwibwaakala mala baluaamba. Baluulila elala ne omwami owe mu lukoba ne chingoba chalwo chindiiti, ne buli mundu khulwe khurumikhira embalu. Se baramiakho omundu tawe, nga bakhola khu Ekironi, balubunisilia elala nende buli mundu walwo.
Nio Yoshua ne Baisiraeli boosi bakobola e Tebiri mala balwibwaakala.
Aluaamba no mwami walwo ne chingoba chalwo chindiiti choosi. Bachiulila elala, nende buli mundu owalwo khulwe khurumikhira embalu. Se baramiakho omundu tawe. Bakholela Tebiri no mwami walwo nga nilwo bakholela Heburoni ne Libuna ne babaami balwo.
Nono Yoshua aula sibala sioosi. Akhila babaami be sibala sie mu bikulu bie ebukwe, ne mumaayo mwe bikulu bie mumbo, alala ne naabo be mungoongo lubeka lwe ebunafubo. Se alekhakho na mulala tawe. Buli mundu erwa. Lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli alaka.
Yoshua aula khukhwama e Kadeshi-barinea, lubeka lwe ebunafubo, khukhwola e Kasa ne sibala sioosi sia Kosieni khukhwola e Kibeoni.
Yoshua aula babaami be bibala bino bioosi mu khupana lulala, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, apanila Isiraeli.
Enyuma wa kano, Yoshua ne banamae bewe bakobola mu kambi e Kilikali.

Efuma eye khuula khwe Baisiraeli yolela omwami Yabini owa Hasori. Yabini arumania likhuwa khu mwami Yobabu owa Matoni ne khu baami be Shimuroni ne Akishafu,
ne khu baami be mu sibala sie bikulu lubeka lwe bunaswa. Arumania khu baami be mwitooma lia Yoritani lubeka lwe ebunafubo we Enyanja eya Kinereti, mu bikiingi, ne khu lukhingiki embi e Tori.
Lundi arumania likhuwa khu Bakanaani ba baaba chimbeka chombi cha Yoritani ne khu Baamori, Bahiti, Baperisi, ne Bayebusi mu sibala sie bikulu, akhaba ne khu Bahibi ba baamenya mu maayo mwe sikulu sia Herimoni mu sibala sie Misipa.
Babaami bano becha ne banamae babwe boosi, mala baba bakali nga kumuyekhe. Becha ne chifarasi chingali ne kamakaari.
Babaami bano boosi baambania banamae babwe mala babusiana alala a meechi ka Meromu, nio bapane ne Isiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali, “Okhabaria tawe. Nga mu siise sino muchuli ndaba nabareere mu bunyali bwa Isiraeli. Mukhareme kimikotio kie chifarasi chabwe ne khukhwosia kamakaari kabwe.”
Khwako Yoshua ne babaandu bewe be liie babebwaakala matundubiikha a meechi ka Meromu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Baisiraeli bukhili, mala Baisiraeli babebwaakala ne khubatimania khukhwola lubeka lwe ebunaswa, khukhwola e Misirefoti-maimu ne e Sidoni, ne lubeka lwe ebukwe khukhwola mwitooma lia Misipa. Khu khuupana khwachiililila khukhwola nga basiku ne bafwa boosi.
Yoshua abakholela nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aamulaka: aarema kimikotio kie chifarasi chabwe ne khukhwosia kamakaari kabwe.
Yoshua akobola mu siise sienesio, aamba lukoba lwa Hasori mala eera Omwami walwo. (Mu siise esio Hasori nilwo lulwaba lukoba lulwemeelela chingoba chino choosi.)
Beera buli mundu, ne lukoba lwa Asori lwosibwa, mbao owalekhwa omulamu tawe.
Yoshua aamba chingoba chino choosi ne babaami baacho ne khukhwira buli sia mulala, nga Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka.
Kakhaba kario, Baisiraeli se boosia lukoba lwosi lwosi lwe chingoba chichombakhwa khu biili tawe, ne lukhali lukoba lwa Hasori, nilwo Yoshua osia.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli babukula bibiindu bioosi bie bukhala ne chikhaafu khukhwama mungoba chino biaba bibiaabwe. Ne kakhali beera buli mundu.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aaelesia kamalaka kewe khu mukholi wewe Musa, Musa naye akaelesia Yoshua, ne Yoshua aakhola buli siindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka Musa.
Yoshua aamba sibala sioosi. Aamba sibala sie mu bikulu nende sie mu maayo, e bunaswa ne ebunafubo, sirekere sioosi sia Kosieni ne lukoongo lwe sibala ebunaswa wasio, akhaba ne litooma lia Yoritani.
Sibala siabalaa khukhwama khu sikulu sia Halaki lubeka lwe ebunafubo embi Edomu, khukhwola Baalakati ebunafubo. Sibala sino siabalaa sioola mwitooma lia Lebanoni, ebunafubo we sikulu sia Herimoni. Aamba babaami abapa ne khubera boosi.
Yoshua apana liie ne babaandu be bibala bino khulwe siise sileeyi.
Mbaao lukoba lulwakhola endakaano eye kumuleembe ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ne lukhali lwa Kibeoni, nilwo Bahibi bamenyamo tawe. Chichiindi choosi chaulwa mwiie.
Mu siise sino Yoshua acha mala abunia ekholo eye Baanaki ba baamenya mu sibala sia Heburoni, Tebiri, Anabu, ne mu sibala sioosi sie sikulu sia Yuda ne Isiraeli. Yoshua ababunisilia elala ne chingoba chabwe.
Mbao Omuanaki na mulala owalekhwa mu sibala sia Isiraeli tawe. Ne kakhali batiiti barama mu Kasa, Katihi, ne Ashitoti.
Nono Yoshua aamba sibala siosi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka Musa. Yoshua aelesia Baisiraeli sibala nga kumukabwa. Akaba bitonyi khuloondekhana ne chikholo che Baisiraeli, mala sibala siaba ne kumuleembe khukhwama khu liie.

Mulala aaba Sihoni, omwami owe Baamori owaamiia khukhwama e Heshiboni. Bubwami bwewe bwamalatana khukhwama Aroeri (khundulo khwe litooma lia Arinoni) ne lukoba luli akari
Bubwami buno bwoola khu litooma lia Yoritani khukhwama khu nyanja eya Chumbe, ebunafubo owa Beti-yeshimoti (ebukwe we Enyanja eya chumbe) ne khukhwola mumaayo mwe sikulu sia Pisika.
Baisiraeli lundi baula omwami Oku owe Bashani, owaba mulala khu Barefaimu babarama, owamiia khukhwama e Asitaroti ne Etirei.
Bubwami bwewe bwaambaania sikulu sia Herimoni, Saleka ne Bashani yoosi khukhwola khu baandu Bakesiuri ne Bamaaka. Oki lundi amiia silala khu bibili sie sibala sio mwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni.
Bano bali babaami be sibala nisio Yoshua ne Baisiraeli baula mu maloba ke mumbo mwa Yoritani. Baula khukhwama e Baalikati mwitooma lia Lebanoni khukhwola khu sikulu sia Halaki. Yoshua aakabamo sibala sino mala aelesia chikholo cha Isiraeli khuba kumukabwa kwabwe elala.
Sitonyi sino sibukula sibala sie sikulu, bikulu bie mumaayo lubeka lwe mumbo, litooma lia Yoritani ne bikulu biayo bie mumayo, sichiimi, ne sibala sie ebunafubo owa Kanaani. Sibala sino nisio Bahiti, Baamori, Bakanaani, Baperisi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi bamenyangamo.
Baisiraeli baula babaami be chingoba chiloondekhana chino: Yeriko, Ai (ambi Beteli),
Yerusalemu, Heburoni,
Yarimuti, Lakishi,
Ekironi, Keseri,
Tebiri, Keteri,
Horima, Arati
Libuna, Atulamu,
Maketa, Beteli,
Tapua, Heferi,
Afeka, Lasiaroni,
Matoni, Hasori,
Shimuroni meroni, Akishafu,
Taanachi, Mekido,
Kadeshi, Yokineamu (mu Karimeli),
Tori (khu nyanja), Koiimu (mu Kalilaya),
ne Tirisa. Boosi babaulwa baba babaami kamakhumi kataru ne mulala.

Nono Yoshua aaba omusaakhulu ne kimiiko kimikali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Ewe oli omusaakhulu ne kimiiko kimikali ne kamaloba kasiilio kamakali kakenyekhana khubukulwa.
Kamaloba karamire koosi kali: ka Filisiti ne Keshuri,
akhaba ne kamaloba koosi ka Abimu elubeka lwe ebunafubo. (Kamaloba khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Sihori, khu lwakha lwa Misiri, khukhwola ebunaswa khu lwakha lwa Ekironi kebaasibwa khuba ke Bakanaani, Babaami be Bafilisiti bamenya e Kasa, Ashitoti, Ashikeloni, Kati ne Ekironi.)
Kamaloba koosi ke Bakanaani kasiliinge busa, ne Meara (kasiili ke Basidoni) khukhwola Afeka, khu lwakha lwe Baamori,
kamaloba ke Bakebali, Lebanoni yoosi lubeka lwe bukwe, khukhwama Baalikati, mu maayo mwe sikulu sia Herimoni khukhwola khukhwingilila khwa Hamasi.
Kamaloba kakaandi kano kaaramire kali kamaloba koosi ke Basidoni, bamenyile mu sibala sie sikulu akari we bikulu bia Lebanoni ne Misirefoti-maimu. Nja khutimania babaandu bano bosi barure nga Baisiraeli ne bechamo. Okhoya okabanie kamaloba khu Baisiraeli nga nakhulaka khukhola.
Khwako, kabania kamaloba kano khu kholo tisa ne balala khu be kholo eya Manase, kabe nga kumukabwa kwabwe.”
Kamaloba kabwe kamalatana khukhwama Aroeri (khu sikiingi sie litooma lia Arinoni) ne lukoba lulwaba akari we litooma elio ne kumweyeywe kwosi khukhwama e Meteta khukhwola e Diboni.
Chingoba choosi chichaba asi we bubwami bwo Omwami Sihoni owe Baamori, owamiia khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Heshiboni chaba mu maloba kano.
Kileati ne bibala bia Keshuri, ne Maaka, ne sikulu sia Herimoni sioosi, ne Bashani yoosi khukhwola Saleka.
Bubwami bwoosi bwa Oku mu Bashani owamiia Asitaroti ne Etirei. Oku yeng'ene niye owarama mu batiiti ba Efuraimu. Musa aula babaandu bano ne khubatimania barure mu maloba kabwe.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli se batimania babaandu ba Keshuri ne Maaka tawe. Khwako basimenya mu Isiraeli khukhwola luno.
Ekholo niyo Musa akhaelesia kumukabwa kwe kamaloba tawe yaba eya Lawi yong'ene. Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aababoolela ali, kumukabwa kwabwe kwaba bilala khu biianwa bibiosebwa khu alutare khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli.
Musa aelesia kumukabwa khu kholo eya Rubeni khuloondekhana ne babaandu ba buli luuya mu kholo eyo.
Kamaloba kabwe kamalatana khukhwola Aroeri (khulukhingiki lwe Litooma lia Arinoni) ne lukoba luuli akari we litooma elio. Kamaloba ke kumweyeywe ka kakara Meteba kabamo.
Heshiboni ne chingoba choosi che kumweyeywe, chichaba Diboni, Bamoti-Baali, Beti-Baalimeoni,
Yahasi, Ketemoti, Mefati,
Kiriataimu, Sibima, Sereti-Sahari khu sikulu sie mwitooma,
Beti-peori, mu bikulu bia Pisika, ne Beti-yeshimoti, choosi chabamo.
Kamaloba ke kholo eya Rubeni kabamo lundi chingoba choosi che kumweyeywe ne bubwami bwosi bwo mwami Sihoni owe Baamori, owamiia khukhwama Heshiboni. Musa aula Sihoni, ne babaami Bamidiani ba baaba Efi, Rekemu, Suri, Huri, ne Reba. Boosi baamiia sibala khulwo mwami Sihoni.
Mu baandu nibo Baisiraeli beera ne embalu, abamo omufumu Balamu okhwa Beori.
Luluuchi lwa Yoritani lwaba lulwakha lwe mumbo lwe kholo eya Rubeni. Chingoba chichekesiibwe mu nyilili chino chaba chingoba nicho bakabila lisaaye lie kholo eya Rubeni nga kumukabwa kwabwe khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe.
Musa lundi aakaba kumukabwa kwe kamaloba khu kholo ya Kati khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Kamaloba kabwe kabaamo Yaseri ne chingoba chosi cha Kileati, malala khu maloba ka Amoni khukhwola Aroeri, kaali ebukwe owa Raba.
Kamaloba kabwe kamalatana khukhwama Heshiboni khukhwola Ramati-Misipe ne Betonimu, khukhwama Mahanaimu khu lwakha lwa Tebiri.
Ne mwitooma lia Yoritani kaba kamaloba ka Beti-haramu, Beti-nimura, Sukoti, Safoni, ne sibala sioosi sisiaba sio mwami Sihoni owa Heshiboni; lubeka olwo lwoosi lwaba ebukwe wa Yoritani khukhwola emwaalo khu siakamo sie nyanja eya Kinereti.
Chingoba chino ne birekere bino nibio bibiaebwa khu miliango kie kholo eya Kati khuba kumukabwa kwabwe.
Musa aaba aakaba kamaloba malala nga kumukabwa khu lisaaye lilala lia Manase khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe.
Kamaloba kabwe kamalatana khukhwama Mahanaimu mala kabamo Bashani ne bubwami bwoosi bwa Oku, omwami owa Bashani, akhaba ne chingoba kamakhumi sita choosi cha Yairi mu Bashani.
Kamaloba kano kabamo e nusu khu maloba ka Kileati akhaba Asitaroti ne Etirei, chingoba chimboofu che bubwami bwa Oku mu Bashani. Chino chosi chaebwa khu balala khu lisaaye liliama khu Makiri okhwa Manase, khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Kimikabwa ekio nikio Musa akabania ebukwe owa Yeriko ne Yoritani mu mweyeywe kwa Moabu.
Ne kakhali se aakho kumukabwa khu kholo eya Lawi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, ali kumukabwa kwabwe nga ne aababoolela.

Kino kili kimikabwa kie Baisiraeli khu maloba ke sibala sia Kanaani, niko Omusaayi Eliesa, Yoshua okhwa Nuni, ne babemeelesi be lisaaye lie chikholo cha Isiraeli bakaba.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka Musa, kamaloba ke chikholo tisa ne nusu elubeka we mumbo mwa Yoritani kakabwa khulwe khukhupa chikura.
Musa aaba aamala khukaba kamaloba elubeka we bukwe owa Yoritani khu kholo chichiindi chibili na ndala khu chibili.
(Be lisaaye lia Yosefu baba chikholo chibili: Manase ne Efuraimu.) Musa se aelesia Balawi sitonyi sie kamaloba tawe. Ne kakhali, banyoola chingoba nicho bamenyamo, ne kamaayilwe ke chikhaafu ne bibiaayo biabwe.
Baisiraeli bakaba kamaloba nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka Musa.
Naba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane nga omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Musa ne anduma khukhwama Kadeshi-barinea khukhola buyooti mu sibala sino. Ne namureerera e ripoti eya ng'ali nga nilwo nasuubila mu mwoyo kwase.
Ne kakhali babaandu babaacha nase, bakhola babaandu befwe baria. Ne ese neyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase.
Nga neyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Musa anjichubila ali, kamaloba niko nakeendakho kaliba kumukabwa kwase ne babaana base mindali.
Ne luno, lola kiaweele kimiiko kamakhumi kane na kiraano khukhwama nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aboolela Musa ario. Abwenao yaba Isiraeli basikeenda khubirira mu sichiimi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne echuba, asiniinda khukhwola luno. Luno endi ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane na kiraano.
Siili busa ne kamaani luno bulayi bwene nga ne naba endaalo niyo Musa andumira. Siilii ne kamaani khu khuupana liie namwe khukhola kimilimo kiosi kiosi.
Nono luno, mbe ese sibala sie sikulu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aandaka endaalo eyo. Ewe waulila oli babaandu baboofu ba balaangwa Baanaki babaayo mu ngoba chimboofu che kamasiisi. Wakana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khuba nase, ne nja khubatimania baruremo, nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma.”
Nio Yoshua abiita Kalebu okhwa Yefune chikhabi mala amua lukoba lwa Heburoni nga kumukabwa kwewe.
Nono Heburoni lwekhola lukoba lwe lisaaye lia Kalebu okhwa Yefune omukenisi, khukhwola luno sikila eyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Kano ne kakhabao tawe, Heburoni lwalaangwa lukoba lwa Kiriati-Ariba (Ariba aaba omundu omukhulu owe Baanaki.)
Nio kumuleembe kwabao mu sibala, liie khubaao tawe.

Kamaloba ka kaakabwa Lisaaye lie ekholo eya Yuda kakabwamo khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe. Kamaloba kamalatana khucha ebunafubo khu lwakha lwa Edomu, mu sichiimi sia Sini ebunafubo aleeyi.
Ne lulwakha lwabwe lwe ebunafubo lwama khundulo khwe Nyanja eya chumbe khukhwama khu mukhono kwe enyanja kukwaloleelela ebunafubo.
Lwacha elubeka we ebunafubo khukhwama khu ngila eya Akirabimu ne khukhwola khu Sini. Lwacha lwola elubeka we ebunafubo owa Kadeshi-barinea, mala lwabira Hesironi lwola khu Atari. Khukhwama abwenao lwakobola lwola e Karika mala,
lwacha lwola Asimoni. Lwaloonda luluuchi khu lwakha lwa Misiri lwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Olwo lwaba lulwakha lwa Yuda elubeka we ebunafubo.
Lulwakha lwe bukwe lwaba Enyanja eya Chumbe, khuchiililila khukhwola niio luluuchi lwa Yoritani luchukhila mu nyanja.
Lulwakha lwe ebunaswa lwarakikhira amukhono kwe nyanja niio luluuchi lwa Yoritani luchukhila mu nyanja,
lwacha lwola khu Beti-Hokula, mala ebunaswa owa Beti-araba. Nio lwaniina lwola khu libaale lia Bohani okhwa Rubeni.
Nio lulwakha lwe ebunaswa luno lwacha khukhwama mwitooma lia Akori khukhwola khu Tebiri, mala lwakobola lwe bunaswa lwalola e Kilikali eli siimbi ne ngila echa Atumimu elubeka we ebunafubo we litooma. Khukhwama abwenao lulwakha lwacha khukhwola khu meechi ka Eni-Siemesi nende ka Enirokeli.
Nio lulwakha lwaniina lwabirira mwitooma lia Beni-Hinomu lubeka lwe ebunafubo we lukoba lwe Bayebusi (lulwalaangwa Yerusalemu). Mala lulwakha lwachiililila khuniina khukhwola khu ngaaki khwe sikulu elubeka lwe mumbo mwe Litooma lia Hinomu, elubeka we khumaliilikha khwe ebunaswa we Litooma lie Barefaimu.
Khukhwama khu ngaaki khwe sikulu lulwakha lwacha lwola khu moni eye luluuchi lwa Nefutoa ne khucha khukhwola khu ngoba chichaba siimbi ne sikulu sia Efuroni. Abwenao lulwakha lwakobola lwalola Baala (lukoba lulwalaangwa Kiriati-Yearimu).
A Baala ao lulwakha lwaukha lwacha elubeka we mumbo mwa Baala khucha e sikulu sia Seiri. Lwachiililila elubeka we ebunaswa we sikulu sie Yearimu (namwe Kesaloni), lwola e Beti-shemesi. Khukhwama abwenao lwabirira e Timuna.
Lulwakha lwacha lwoola a sikula elubeka we ebunaswa owa Ekironi. Khukhwama abwenao lwakobola lwacha e Sikeroni, lwabirira khu sikulu sia Baala, mala lwacha Yabineeli lwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Enyanja eya Mediterenia ne chinjakha chayo nibio bibiaba lulwakha lwe lubeka lwe mumbo. Olwo nilwo lulwakha lulwabotookhelela babaandu ba Yuda khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Kalebu atimania lisaaye lia Anaki khurura mu lukoba, chikholo cha Sheshai, Ahimani, ne Talimai.
Khukhwama abwenao acha khusera babaandu ba baamenya mu Tebiri (lukoba luno khale lwalaangwa luli Kiriati-Seferi.)
Nio Kalebu aloma ali, “Omundu yesi yesi ocha khukhwibwaakala Kiriati-Seferi mala alubukule, ese ndamuelesia omwana wase omukhaana abe omukhasi wewe.”
Nio Otinieli, okhwa Kenasi (Kenasi aba wandaaye owa Kalebu), aamba lukoba olwo. Kalebu amua omukhaana Akisa abe omukhasi wewe.
Nga aamwichakho, Akisa aboolela Otinieli areebe raraawe Kalebu amue kumukuunda. Akisa aaba ekhaale khu punda. Nga ne ekha asi khukhwama khu punda yewe, Kalebu amureeba ali, “Wenya siina?”
Akisa akobosia ali, “Mbelesie siianwa, sikila kamaloba niko ewe wambeelesia kali mu sibala sisioomu. Mbelesie ne chisebele che kameechi chosi.” Nio Kalebu aelesia Akisa chisebele che kameechi che ngaaki nende che mwaalo.
Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Yuda khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Chingoba che ekholo eye babaandu ba Yuda chaba ebunafubo lukali lubeka lwe lulwakha lwa Edomu, chaba Kabuseeli, Eteri, Yakuri,
Kina, Timona, Atata,
Keteshi, Hasori, Itinani,
Sifi, Telemu, Beoloti,
Hasori-Hatata, Kerioti-Hesironi (namwe Hasori),
Amamu, Shema, Molata,
Hasar-Kada, ne Heshimoni, Beti-peleti,
Hasari-shueli, Beerisheba, Bisiotia,
Baala, Limu, Esemu,
ne Elitolati, ne Kesili, ne Horima.
Sikilaki, Matimana, Sanisana,
Lebaoti, Shilihimu, Aini, Rimoni. Choosi chaba chingoba kamakhumi kabili ne tisa, alala ne birekere biacho.
Chingoba chichaba mumaayo mwe sikulu chaba Eshitaoli, Sora, Ashina,
Sanoa, Enganimu, Tapua, Enamu,
Yarimuti, Atulamu, Soko, Aseka,
Shaaraimu, Atitaimu, Ketera, ne Keterotaimu. Choosi chaba chingoba likhumi ne chine, alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi chabayo chingoba cha Senani, Hatasia, Mikitalikati,
Tileani, Misipa, Yokiteli,
Lakishi, Bosikati, Ekironi,
Kaboni, Lamami, Kitilishi,
Keteroti, Beti-takoni, Nahama ne Maketa. Choosi chaba chingoba likhumi ne sita, alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi chabayo chingoba cha Libuna, Eteri, Ashani,
Yifuta, Ashina, Nesibu,
Keila, Akisibu, Maresha. Choosi chaba chingoba tisa, alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi baebwa lukoba lwa Ekironi alala ne chingoba chalwo ne birekere biacho,
khukhwama Ekironi khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia, bioosi bibiaba lubeka lwa Ashitoti ne birekere biabio.
Lwabayo Ashitoti ne Kasa, alala ne chingoba chabwe ne birekere khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Misiri ne khundulo khwe nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Chingoba chichaba mu sibala sie bikulu chaba Shamiri, Yatiri, Soko,
Tana, Kiriati-Seferi (namwe Tebiri),
Anabu, Ashitemoa, Animu,
Kosieni, Holoni, ne Kilo. Choosi chaba chingoba likhumi ne lulala, alala ne birekere biacho.
Baebwa akhaba chingoba cha Arabu, Tuna ne Eshani,
Yanimu, Beti-Tapua, Afeka,
Humuta, Kiriati-Ariba (nilwo Heburoni) ne Siori. Choosi chaba chingoba tisa, alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi baebwa chingoba cha Maoni, Karimeli, Sifu, Yuda,
Yesireeli, Yokiteamu, Sanoa,
Kaini, Kibea, Timuna, choosi chaba chingoba likhumi, alala ne birekere biacho.
Chabayo Halihuli, Beti-suri, Ketori,
Maarati, Betamoti, ne Elitekoni: choosi nicho baebwa chaba chingoba sita, alala ne birekere biacho.
Chabayo Kiriati-Baali (namwe Kiriati-Yearimu) ne Raba. Choosi chaba chingoba chibili alala ne birekere biacho.
Mu sichiimi mwabamo Beti-araba, Mitini, Sekaka,
Nibushani, lukoba lwa chumbe, ne Engedi. Choosi chaba chingoba sita, alala ne birekere biacho.
Ne kakhali babaandu ba Yuda bakhilwa khutimania Bayebusi, ba baamenya mu Yerusalemu. Bayebusi basimenya alala ne babaandu ba Yuda khukhwola luno.

Kamaloba ka kaakabwa khu lisaaye lia Yosefu karakikhira siimbi khu luuchi lwa Yoritani ebukwe we kameechi ka Yeriko, khubirira mu sichiimi, khukhwola e sibala sie bikulu ne khucha khukhwola Beteli.
Khukhwama e Beteli, lulwakha lwamalatana khukhwola Lusu, lwachiililila lwola khu Ataroti-atari, niio Baariki bamenya.
Mala lwacha elubeka we mumbo elubeka we Bayafuleti, khukhwola elubeka lwe mwaalo owa Beti-horoni. Lwama ao lwacha lwola khu Keseri, mala lwaweela mu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Lisaaye lia Yosefu, ekholo eya Efuraimu ne ekholo eya Manase eyaba lubeka lwe mumbo, banyoola kamaloba kano nga kumukabwa kwabwe.
Kano kaba kamaloba ke lisaaye lia Efuraimu: Lulwakha lwabwe lwama khu Ataroti-Atari khucha ebukwe khukhwola Beti-horoni eya ngaaki,
mala khukhwama ao khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Mikimetati siaba lubeka lwabwe lwe bunaswa. Ebukwe eye lulwakha lwalola Taanati-shilo mala lwacha lwabirira ebukwe owa Yanoa.
Mala lwekha khukhwama Yanoa lwola Ataroti ne Naara, khukhwola Yeriko mala lwakamila khu luuchi lwa Yoritani.
Lulwakha lwacha lubeka lwe mumbo khukhwama Tapua khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Kana mala lwakama khu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Kano kali kamaloba ka kaakabwa khu lisaaye lie kholo eya Efuraimu nga kumukabwa kwabwe.
Chingoba chindalakho ne birekere bibiaba mu sibala sisiakabwa khu Manase, biatasibwa khu Baefuraimu.

Sidoni sisiindi sie kamaloba ka kaaba mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Yoritani kakabwa khu lisaaye liliindi lia Manase owaba omubele owa Yosefu. Makiri, raraawe owa Kileati, owaba omubele owa Manase owaulanga kamae, akabwa Kileati ne Bashani.
Kamaloba elubeka lwe mumbo mwa Yoritani kakabwa khu lisaaye liliarama lia Manase: Abieseri, Heleki, Asirieli, shekemu, Heferi, ne Shemita. Bano baba babechukhulu be siseecha ba Manase okhwa Yosefu, ne ba baaba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe.
Salofehati, okhwa Heferi, okhwa Kileati, okhwa Makiri, okhwa Manase, se abakho ne babaana be siseecha tawe, ne bakhali be siikhaana bong'ene. Kamasina kabwe kaba Mahila, Noa, Hokila, Milika, ne Tirisa.
Bacha khu musaayi Eliesa ne khu Yoshua okhwa Nuni ne khu bemeelesi, mala baloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka Musa khukhuelesia efwe ne balebe befwe, sitonyi sie kumukabo kwe kumukuunda.” Nono nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka, babaelesia kamaloba alala ne balebe babwe.
Elio liakila Manase anyoola kimikabo likhumi khutubakho khu Kileati ne Bashani lubeka lwe bukwe owa Yoritani.
Bakhaana be lisaaye lia Manase boosi banyoolela kamaloba alala ne basoleeli. Kamaloba ka Kileati kakabwa khu be lisaaye lia Manase ba barama.
Kamaloba ka Manase kama Asheri khukhwola Mikimetati, e bukwe owa Shekemu. Nio lulwakha lwacha siafubo lwola khu babaandu ba Endapua.
Kamaloba kakaba siimbi Tapua kaba ka Manase, ne lukoba lwa Tapua, khu lwakha, luli lwe babaana ba Efuraimu.
Nio Lulwakha lwekha emwaalo khu luuchi lwa Kana. Chingoba che mwaalo siafubo we luluuchi chaba cha Efuraimu, chakhaba ne chaba mu sibala sia Manase. Lulwakha lwa Manase lwaloonda lubeka lwe bunaswa we luluuchi ne khumaliilikha mu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Efuraimu aba e ebunafubo, ne Manase aba e bunaswa, ne nyanja eya Mediterenia yaba lulwakha lwabwe lwe mumbo. Asheri siaba e bunaswa, ne Isakari siaba e bukwe.
Mu bibala bia Isakari ne Asheri, Manase aaba ne Beti-sheani ne Ibuleamu, alala ne chingoba chabwe chichaba siimbi, akhaba ne Tori (lulala luli khu lukuku lwe nyanja), Endori, Taanachi, Mekido, ne chingoba chabwe chichaba siimbi.
Babaandu ba Manase, kakhaba kario, se banyala khutimania babaandu khumenya mu chingoba echo tawe, ne kakhali Bakanaani bachiililila khumenyamo.
Akhaba Baisiraeli bakelao banyoola kamaani, se batimania Bakanaani tawe, ne kakhali babaingiilila khubakholela kimilimo.
Be lisaaye lia Yosefu baboolela Yoshua bali, “Sikila siina ne okhuele sitonyi kumukuunda mulala kwong'ene khuba nga kumukabwa kwefwe? Se obona khuli bakali lukali sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubiitile chikhabi?”
Yoshua abakobosia ali, “Mwaba ne muli bakali ne sibala sie sikulu sia Efuraimu sili sitiiti lukali khwinywe, khe muche mu sichiimi sie Baperisi ne Barefaimu mala mubere mwabeene.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Sibala sie sikulu se siikhwola efwe tawe, ne bona Bakanaani bamenyile mu maayo bali ne kamakaari ke bichuuma, bakhaba abo bamenyile mu Beti-sheani ne chingoba chayo ne nabo bamenyile mwitooma lia Yesireeli.”
Yoshua aboolela chikholo cha Efuraimu ne Manase ali, “Ng'ali muli bakali lukali, lundi muli ne kamaani kamakali. Se mukhoya mwanyoola kumukabwa mulala kwong'ene tawe.
Sibala sie sikulu Sicha khuba sisienywe. Siakhaba ne sili sichiimi, mu sibere mala sibe sisienywe khukhwama khu ndulo eyi ne neyi. Ne Bakanaani, mucha khubatimania barure, bakhaba ne bali ne kamakaari ke bichuuma lundi ne bali ne kamaani.”

Enyuma we khuula sibala, Baisiraeli boosi babusiana e Shilo mala basimikhayo liiema lie kumuse.
Chabayo chikholo saba che Baisiraeli chichaba ne chisiili khunyoola kumukabwa kwabwe kwe kamaloba.
Nono Yoshua aboolela Baisiraeli ali, “Mulaliinda khukhwola liina nio mwingile ne khuaamba kamaloba niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, amuelesia?
Khe mumbe babaandu be siseecha bataru khukhwama buli mu kholo. Nenya khubaruma bache khulambuula, mala bachoore epicha eye kamaloba niko mwenya kabe kakenywe, mala bangobolele.
Bacha khukaba kamaloba mu bitonyi saba, lisaaye lia Yuda licha khumenya mu maloba kabwe ebunafubo, ne lisaaye lia Yosefu mu maloba kabwe e bunaswa.
Ne bamalile khuandika kimikabwa saba kie kimikuunda kino banderere. Nio ekhupe chikura
Balawi, se balanyoola kumukabwa kwe kamaloba ne nanywe tawe, sikila kumukabwa kwabwe kuli busaayi, khukholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kimilimo. Chikholo cha Kati, Rubeni, nende balala khu kholo eya Manase chamala khunyoola kamaloba kabwe ebukwe owa Yoritani, niko Musa, Omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aabaelesia.”
Nio Babaandu barakikha lukeendo. Yoshua alaka ba bacha khu choora efwaani eye kamaloba ali, “Cha mulambuule kamaloba koosi, muchoore nga ne kali mala mungobolele. Ne ese ndareeba bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Shilo.”
Nio babaandu abo bacha balambuula kamaloba mala bachoora efwaani yako mu sitabu, buli lukoba mu bitonyi saba. Nio bakobolela Yoshua mu kambi e Shilo.
Yoshua apa chikura khu maloba ako ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala akaba Baisiraeli buli ekholo ne abuundu wayo.
Kamaloba ke lisaaye lie ekholo eya Benjamini khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo niko kakanyoa khukabwa. Kamaloba kano kaba akari we chikholo cha Yuda ne Yosefu.
Lulwakha lwabwe lwarakikhira lubeka lwe bunaswa khu Yoritani, mala lwaniina lwacha lwekha mu maayo mwe ebunaswa owa Yeriko. Lundi lwaniina mumbo mwe sibala sie bikulu lwamaliilikhila mu sichiimi sie Beta-beni.
Khukhwama ao lulwakha lwabirira mu maayo ebunafubo lwola Lusi (lisina liliindi bali Beteli). Nio lwekha Atoroti-atari ne khu sikulu sili ebunafubo we emwaalo owa Beti-horoni.
Khukhwama Beti-horoni, lulwakha, lwakobola lubeka luluundi lwe mumbo siafubo we sikulu sino mala lwacha khu Kiriati-Baali (namwe Kiriati-Yearimu) luli lwe kholo eya Yuda. Luno nilwo lulwakha lwe mumbo.
Lulwakha lwe lubeka lwe siafubo lwarakikhira embi ne Kiriati-Yearimu mala lwacha Efurani lundi lwacha lwola khu numa eye kameechi ka Nefutoa.
Nio lwekha mu maayo khu lwakha lwe sikulu sili siimbi ne Litooma lio musoleeli owa Hinomu, khundulo khwe bunaswa we Litooma lia Refaimu. Nio lundi lwacha ebunafubo lwabirira mwitooma lia Hinomu, ebunafubo we lukoba lwe Bayebusi khukhwola Enirokeli.
Nio lwakobola lubeka lwe ebunaswa lwacha Enishemeshi mala lundi lwacha e Kililoti, eyaloleelela Engila echa Atumimu. Mala lulwakha lwekha emwaalo khu libaale lia Bohani (Bohani aba okhwa Rubeni)
mala lwabirira ebunaswa we lubeka lulwaloleelela Litooma lia Yoritani.
Khukhwama eyo, lwabirira e bunaswa we lubeka lwa Beti-Hokula, mala lwamaliilikhila ebunaswa we kumukhono kwe enyanja eya chumbe, niio luluuchi lwa Yoritani luweelamo. Luno nilwo lulwakha lwe ebunafubo.
Yoritani lwaba lulwakha lwe lubeka lwe ebukwe. Kuno kwaba kumukabwa kwe kholo eya Benjamini khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo buli ekholo ne lulwakha chimbeka choosi.
Chingoba chichaba che kholo eya Benjamini chaba Yeriko, Beti-Hokula, Emeki Kesisi,
Beti-araba, Semaraimu, Beteli,
Abimu, Para, Ofura,
Kefari-amoni, Ofuni, Keba: chingoba likhumi ne chibili alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi chabayo chingoba cha Kibeoni, Rama, Beeroti,
Misipa, Kefira, Mosa,
Rekemu, Iripeeli, Tarala,
Sela, Haelefu, Yebusi (namwe Yerusalemu), Kibeati, Kiriati-Yearimu: chingoba likhumi na chine alala ne birekere biacho. Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwe kholo eya Benjamini khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.

Kumukabwa kukwakholekha lukhola khabili kwaba khulwe lisaaye lie kholo eya Simioni khuloondekhana ne kimilango kiabwe. Kumukabwa kwabwe kwaba akari we ekholo eya Yuda.
Kaambaania Beerisheba, Sheba, Molata,
Hasari-shueli, Bala, Esemu,
Etolati, Betuli, Horima,
Sikilaki, Beti-marikaboti, Hasari susa,
Beti Lebaoti, ne Sharuheni: chingoba likhumi ne chitaru alala ne birekere biacho.
Lundi chabayo Aini, Rimoni, Eteri, ne Ashani: chingoba chine alala ne birekere biacho.
Birekere bino biaambaania chingoba khukhwola Baalati-Beeri ne Rama eye ebunafubo. Kuno nikwo kukwaba kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Simioni khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.
Kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Simioni kwabamo malala khu maloba ka Yuda. Sikila sitonyi sie ekholo eya Yuda siaba sikali lukali khu nibo.
Kumukabwa kwe khataru kwaba khwe ekholo eya Sebuluni khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo. Kumukabwa kwabwe kwacha kwola Sariti.
Khukhwama eyo lulwakha lwabwe lwacha lwe mumbo khukhwola Mareli, lwatiila Tabesheti ne khu luuchi ebukwe owa Yokineamu.
Ne lubeka luluundi lwa Sariti lwacha ebukwe khu lwakha lwa Kisiloti Tabori, nio khu Teberati mala lwakobola lwola khu Yafia.
Khukhwama ao lwachiililila ebukwe khukhwola Kati-heferi ne Etikashi, lwakobola khungila eya Nea echa e Rimoni.
Ebunaswa lulwakha lwakobola lwalola Hanationi, lwamaliilikhila mwitooma lia Ifuta-eli.
Lwaambaania Katati, Nahalali, Shimuroni, Itala, ne Betelehemu: chingoba likhumi ne chibili, alala ne birekere biacho.
Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Sebuluni khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo, chingoba alala ne birekere biacho.
Kumukabwa kwe khaane kwaba khulwe ekholo eya Isakari khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.
Kamaloba kakwo kabaamo Yesireeli, Kesuloti, Shunemu,
Hafaraimu, Shioni, Anaharati,
Rabiti, Kishioni, Ebesi,
Rameti, Enganimu, Enihata ne Betipasesi.
Lulwakha lwosi lwatiila Tabori, Shahasuma, ne Beti-shemesi, lwamaliilikhila mu Yoritani, choosi chaba chingoba likhumi ne sita alala ne birekere biacho.
Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Isakari, khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo, chingoba ne birekere biacho.
Kumukabwa kwe kharaano kwaba khulwe ekholo eya Asheri khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.
Kamaloba kayo kabaamo Helikati, Hali, Beteni, Akishafu,
Alamumeleki, amati, ne Mishali. Lubeka lwe mumbo lwetiila khu Karimeli ne Shihori libunati.
Nio lwakobola elubeka we ebukwe, lulwakha lwacha khu Beti-dakoni, lwetiila khu Sebuluni ne khwitooma lie Ifuta-eli lubeka lwe ebunaswa owa Betemeki ne Neyeli. Lwachiililila ebunaswa khukhwola e Kabuli,
Eburoni, Rehobu, Hamoni, ne Kana, khukhwola aleeyi e Sidoni Emboofu.
Nio lulwakha lwakobola lwalola Rama, lwola mu lukoba lwe Tiro, nio lwakobola lwalola e Hosa mala lwamaliilikhila mu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Lwaambaania Mahalabu, Akisibu,
Uma, Afeka, ne Rehobu: chingoba kamakhumi kabili ne chibili, alala ne birekere biacho.
Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwe kholo eya Asheri khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo, chingoba chino ne birekere biacho.
Kumukabwa kwa sita kwaba khulwe ekholo eya Nafutali khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.
Lulwakha lwakwo lwacha khukhwama Helefu khukhwola khu mukhoonge kuuli mu Saananimu, khukhwola khu Ataminekebu khukhwola khu Yabineeli, ne lundi khukhwola aleeyi e Lakumu, mala lwamaliilikhila mu luuchi lwa Yoritani.
Lulwakha lwakobolela lubeka lwe mumbo lwalola e Asinoti Tabori, khukhwama ao khukhwola e Hukoki, lwatiila Sebuluni e lubeka lwe siafubo, Asheri lwe mumbo, ne Yoritani lwe ebukwe.
Chingoba chichasirwa ne liisiisi chaba, Sitimu, Seri, Hamati, Rakati, Kinereti,
Atama, Rama, Hasori,
Kadeshi, Etirei, Enihasori,
Ironi, Mikitaleli, Horemu, Betanati, ne Beti-shemesi: chingoba likhumi ne tisa alala ne birekere biacho.
Chingoba chino ne birekere biacho nibio kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Nafutali khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Kumukabwa kwa saba kwaba khulwe ekholo eya Dani khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiabwe.
Lulwakha lwakwo lwaambaania Sora, Eshitaoli, Tirishemeshi,
Shaalabini, Aiyaloni, Itila,
Eloni, Timuna, Ekironi,
Eheka, Kibetioni, Baalati,
Yehuti, Bene-Beraki, Kati-Rimoni,
Meyarikoni, ne Rakoni, alala ne kamaloba kakaloleelelana ne Yopa.
Chingoba chino ne birekere biacho nibio mu kumukabwa kwe ekholo eya Dani khuloondekhana ne kimiliango kiayo.
Baisiraeli nga ne bamala khukaba chinjakha che kamaloba nga kimikabwa, baelesia Yoshua okhwa Nuni kumukabwa.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aalaka, baelesia Yoshua lukoba lwa Timunati-Sera nilwo Yoshua omwene aasaba. Lukoba olwo lwaba mu sikulu sia Efuraimu. Yoshua ombakha lukoba lundi mala amenyamo.
Kino nikio kimikabwa nikio omusaayi Eliesa, Yoshua okhwa Nuni, ne babemeelesi be lisaaye lie chikholo cha Isiraeli bakabania bitonyi bie kamaloba ako khulwe khukhupa chikura e shilo, amuliango kwe liiema lie libukaana. Nono bamaliilisia khukabamo kamaloba.

“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli oli, ‘robora chingoba che khumulilamo nga ne namuboolela enywe khubirira khu Musa.
Naloma ndi omundu owiira okundi ne akhang'aliilemo tawe anyala elukhilayo. Chingoba echo chikhabe chichenywe khumulilamo khukhwilukha oyo owenya khumwiyacha.
Anyala elukhila mu lulala lwe chingoba mala eema mu silibwa sie lukoba, eloocha kamwikholeekhekho khu basaakhulu be lukoba. Nio basaakhulu abo bamubukule bamuyile mu lukoba, bamue abuundu mala asikale ebweeneyo ne nabo.
Ne omundu owe khukhwiyacha sifuki ne amutimakho, se bakhoya bamwakaanisia omwiiri tawe. Sikila eera owasie ne akhang'aliilemo tawe, ne se aabakho ne busiku ne naye tawe.
Ne akhoya arama mu lukoba omwo khukhwola nga ne aliima ebweeni we kumuse khulwe khukhalakilwa ne lundi khukhwola khu lifwa lio Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe siise esio ne lilioola. Nio omwiiri oyo anyala akobola engo mu lukoba lwewe ne mungo mwewe, nilwo elukhamo.’ ”
Nono, Baisiraeli barobora Kadeshi mu Kalilaya, mumbo mwa Yoritani, mu sibala sie bikulu sia Nafutali, Shekemu, mu sibala sie sikulu sia Efuraimu, ne Heburoni, mu sibala sie sikulu sia Yuda.
Elubeka lwe bukwe owa Yoritani, mu siangalaamwe sisieteleela ebukwe owa Yeriko, barobora Beseri mu sibala sia Rubeni, Ramoti mu Kileati, mu sibala sia Kati, ne Kolani mu Bashani, mu sibala sia Manase.
Chino chaba chingoba che khumulilamo chicharoborwa khulwe babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi ne baakwa ba baamenyamo. Yesi yesi owiira omundu ne akhang'aliilemo tawe anyala amulilayo khukhwama khu mundu oenja khumwiyacha. Nono yaba se anyala erwa ne akhamalile khukhwiima ebweeni we kumuse tawe.

Nio babemeelesi be lisaaye lie Balawi bacha khu musaayi Eliesa ne Yoshua okhwa Nuni, ne khu bemeelesi be lisaaye liosi lie chikholo cha Isiraeli.
Baba e Shilo mu maloba ka Kanaani bababoolela bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka khubirira khu Musa ali khuebwe chingoba nicho khumenyamo, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe ke chikhaafu chefwe.”
Nono khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babaandu ba Isiraeli baelesia Balawi chingoba chichiindi ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe khukhwama khu ngoongo chabwe babeene.
Lisaaye lie kumuliango kwe Balawi kwa Kohati nilio lilianyoa khukabwa chingoba. Lisaaye lie Balawi liliama khu musaayi Aruni liaebwa chingoba likhumi ne chitaru khukhwama khu ngoongo cha Yuda, Simioni, ne Benjamini.
Kumuliango kwa Kohati kukwarama kwakabwa chingoba likhumi khukhwama khu chingoongo cha Efuraimu, Dani, ne Manase eye mumbo.
Be kumuliango kwa Kerishoni bakabwa chingoba likhumi na chitaru khukhwama khu maloba ka Isakari, Asheri, Nafutali, ne Manase eye bukwe.
Lisaaye lie kumuliango kwa Merari liakabwa chingoba likhumi na chibili khukhwama khu maloba ka Rubeni, Kati, ne Sebuluni.
Khulwe khu khuupa chikura, babaandu ba Isiraeli bakaba chingoba ne kamaloba kabwe ke kamaayilwe khu Balawi, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka khubirira khu Musa.
Kano niko kamasina ke chingoba khukhwama khu maloba ka Yuda ne Simioni ka kaakabwa
khu lisaaye lia Aruni, be kumuliango kwa Kohati, enda eya Lawi. Kumukabo kwabwe nikwo kukwanyoa khukholekha.
Babaelesia lukoba lwa Kiriati-Ariba, (Ariba aaba raraawe owa Anaki). Olwo nilwo lukoba lwa Heburoni, mu sibala sie sikulu sia Yuda, alala ne kamaayilwe ka kalubotookhelela.
Ne kakhali, kimikuunda kie lukoba, alala ne birekere, biaba biamalwa khukabwa khu Kalebu okhwa Yefune nga kumukabo kwewe.
Khutubakho Heburoni (lulala khu ngoba che omwiiri khumulilamo), chingoba chiloondakho chakabwa khu lisaaye lio omusaayi Aruni. Chingoba echo chaba Libuna
Yatiri, Eshitemoa, shemeshi,
Holoni, Tebiri,
Aini, Yuda, ne Beti-shemesi, alala ne kamaayilwe kabwe. Chingoba tisa chichakabwa khukhwama khu kholo cha Yuda ne Simioni.
Khukhwama mu ekholo eya Benjamini babaandu ba Aruni lundi bakabwa chingoba chine: chingoba chino chaba, Kibeoni, Keba,
Anatoti, ne Alumoni, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Nono chingoba likhumi ne chitaru choosi alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe biakabwa khu basaayi, be lisaaye lia Aruni.
Lisaaye liliindi lie kumuliango kwe Balawi be owa Kohati bakabwa chingoba chichiindi khukhwama khu kholo eya Efuraimu.
Bakabwa chingoba chine: Shekemu mu lukoongo lwe bikulu bia Efuraimu (lukoba olwo lwaba lwa omwiiri khumulilamo), Keseri,
Kibisaimu, ne Beti-horoni, ne kamaloba kabwe ke kamaayilwe.
Khukhwama khu kholo eya Dani bakabwa chingoba chine: Eliteke, Kibetioni,
Aiyaloni, ne Kati-Rimoni, ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase eye mumbo, bakabwa chingoba chibili: Taanachi, ne Kati-Rimoni, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Lisaaye lino lie kumuliango kwa Kohati lia nyoola chingoba likhumi chong'ene, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Sipupu sisiindi sie Balawi kumuliango kwa Kerishoni, sianyoola khukhwama khu kholo eya Manase eye Bukwe chingoba chibili: Kolani mu Bashani (lulala khu ngoba che omwiiri khumulilamo) ne Beeshitera, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Isakari banyoola chingoba chine: Kishioni, Taberati,
Yarimuti, ne Enganimu, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Asheri banyoola chingoba chine: Mishali, Abitoni,
Helikati, ne Rehobu, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Khukhwama khu kholo eya Nafutali banyoola chingoba chitaru: Kadeshi mu Kalilaya, (Kateshi luli lulala khu ngoba che omwiiri khumulilamo), Hamoti Tori, ne Karitani, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Lisaaye liliindi liliaukhaane lie kumuliango kwa Kerishoni lianyoola chingoba choosi likhumi ne chitaru alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Ne Balawi babarama, be kumuliango kwa Merari, banyoola khukhwama khu kholo eya Sebuluni chingoba chine, Yokineamu, Karita,
Timuna, ne Nahalali, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kabwe.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Rubeni banyoola chingoba chine: Beseri Yahasi,
Ketemoti, ne Mefati alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Kati banyoola chingoba chine: Ramoti mu Kileati, (Ramutohi lwaba lulala khu ngoba cho mwiiri khumulilamo), Mahanaimu,
Heshiboni, ne Yaseri, alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe kaabwe.
Khwako ekholo eya Merari yakabwa bukali bwe chingoba likhumi ne chibili.
Khukhwama mu maloba niko babaandu ba Isiraeli baba nako, kaba bukali bwe chingoba kamakhumi kane,
alala ne kamaloba ke kamaayilwe khubibotookhelela, kakabwa Balawi.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe Baisiraeli abaa kamaloba koosi niko aba alaka bakuuka baabwe. Ne nga bamala khukaamba, bakamenyamo.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia kumuleembe mu mbeka choosi, nga aalaka bakuuka baabwe. Mbao omusiku wabwe akhaba mulala owanyala khubaula tawe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aa Baisiraeli bukhili khu basiku baabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola koosi niko aasuubisia Isiraeli. Sesiabakhoo siosi siosi silayi nisio aasuubisia mala alekha khusikhola tawe.

Nio Yoshua alaanga alala babaandu be chikholo cha Rubeni, Kati, ne Manase, mala
ababoolela ali, “Mwakholile buli siindu nisio Musa omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela khukhola, lundi mwariire kamalaka kaase koosi.
Mu biise bino bioosi mukhalobakho Baisiraeli basienywe tawe. Mwabeele barekerefu mu khuria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Nono, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aelesie Baisiraeli basienywe kumuleembe nga aabalaka. Khwako kobola engo niio kamaloba ke kumukabwa kwenywe kali, kamaloba kali elubeka luluundi lwa Yoritani niko Musa omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuelesia.
Mukhoya murie lilaka nilio Musa amuelesia. Siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, khola lilienya liewe, ria kamalaka kewe, ba babeyikinwa khu niye mala mu mukholele niye kimilimo ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi, ne liba lienywe lioosi.”
Nio Yoshua ababiita chikhabi mala abasibula bache engo. Ababoolela ali,
“Mulikho muloota engo ne muli baiinda lukali, ne bubayi bukali, chifwesa, chisahabu ne kimikasa, ne bichuuma, ne chingubo chingali lukali. Kabana ne babaasienywe nibio mubukuule khukhwama khu basiku benywe.” Nio bacha engo.
Musa aaba aaelesia kamaloba ke ebukwe owa Yoritani, khu kholo eya Manase, ndalakho ne Yoshua aelesia ekholo eyasikala kamaloba ke mumbo mwa Yoritani, alala ne chikholo chichiindi.
Nono babaandu Be Chikholo cha Rubeni, Kati, nende be bukwe mwa Manase bakobola engo. Balekha Baisiraeli babaandi e Shilo mu maloba ka Kanaani mala bacha mu maloba kabwe kameene ka Kileati. Kamaloba ako niko babukula nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne abalaka khubirira khu Musa.
Ne nga chikholo cha Rubeni, Kati, nende balala khu be kholo eya Manase, ne choola Keliloti lubeka lwe mumbo mwa Yoritani, chombakha alutare emboofu ambi ne luluuchi.
Baisiraeli babolelwa bali, “Lola! Be owa Rubeni Kati ne balala khu be owa Manase bombakhe khu ndulo alutare a Keliloti e Yoritani khu lubeka luli ambi ne nafwe.”
Ne, nga Baisiraeli ne baulila kano, babusiana e Shilo, khu khuupana ne chikholo che Bukwe.
Nio Baisiraeli baruma Fineasi okhwa Eliesa omusaayi khu be owa Rubeni, be owa Kati ne khu be owa Manase eye Bukwe mu maloba ka Kileati.
Fineasi acha ne babemeelesi ekhumi, mulala khukhwama buli mu kholo che mumbo ne buli mulala omwimeelesi owe luuya.
Nio becha khu be owa Rubeni, be owa Kati, nende be owa Manase, mu maloba ka Kileati.
Mala bababoolela bali libuusiana lioosi lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liloma lili, “Siina sikila ne mukholile bumayaanu khu Wele owa Isiraeli! Mwarurire khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga mweyombakhiile alutare. Se musimuloonda lundi tawe!
Bubwoni nibwo khwakhola e Peori sebwolaana ta ku? Se mubona muli khusili khukhwitakaasa mala kumunaanio kwabwo kusiinania babaandu bo Mwami Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi ta?
Mulikho mucha khuloba khumuloonda nono? Mwaba ne murura khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luno, acha khuba ne lirima khu buli mulala mu Isiraeli kumutikhinyi.
Nono, aba kamaloba kenywe ne kakhali kamalayi ke khukhwisaayilamo tawe, khe mwiche eno mu maloba ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niio Liiema liewe lili. Khe mukhusabe kamaloba kakaandi mwifwe. Ne mukharura khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namwe mukhole efwe khumururekho ne mwombakha alutare khutasa khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe tawe.
Khebulila nga nilwo Akani okhwa Sera aaloba khuria lilaka khu biindu bitakatifu, mala Baisiraeli boosi banyolelakho kumunaanio. Ne Akani se aafwa yeng'ene sikila bumayaanu bwewe tawe.”
Nio be owa Rubeni, be owa Kati, nende be owa Manase babakobosia ne khuboolela babemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli bali,
“Omunyali ali Wele! Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Omunyali ali Wele! Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Amanyile sikila ne khwakhola lino, ne lekha Baisiraeli boosi bamanye!
Khwaaba bali se khwarire Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe mala khwombakhe alutare yefwe busa niio khuanilemo biianwa bie embosio, namwe bie biakhulia namwe bie kumuleembe, lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhue efwe kumunaanio.
Tawe! Khwakhola khurio sikila khwaba ne buuri khuli mu siise sisiicha babaana benywe banyala bareeba babaana befwe bali, ‘Enywe muli na siina khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli?
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola Yoritani khuba lulwakha akari wefwe ne nanywe, babaandu ba Rubeni ne Kati. Se mulikho ne sitonyi siosi siosi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.’ Nono babaana benywe banyala bakhola babaana befwe balekha khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono khwaloma khuli, khakhwombakhe alutare, ne se elaba eye khukhwoseliakho biianwa namwe chimbosio tawe.
Ne kakhali sibe simanyisio khwifwe ne nanywe, ne chiselukho chefwe chichiicha enyuma wefwe, mbo ng'ali khusaayanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu liiema liewe khubirira mu biianwa biefwe bie khukhwosia, ne chimbosio ne biianwa bie kumuleembe. Se khwenya lisaaye lienywe lilomele liliefwe mu bise bibiicha lili, ‘Enywe se mulikho ne sitonyi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.’
Ne khwebaasia khuli, lino liaba ne lilomekha khwifwe namwe khu lisaaye liefwe munyanga chichiicha khunyala khwaloma khuli, ‘Lola! Bakuuka befwe bakhola alutare bulayi bwene nga eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se yaba eye chimbosio tawe, ne kakhali eli simanyisio khu baandu befwe ne babenywe.’
Se khwalekhilekho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, namwe se khwalekhile khumuloonda nio khwombakhe alutare khulwe biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie biakhulia namwe embosio tawe. Se khunyala khwombakha alutare ekiindi ne ekhali alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe eli ebweeni we liiema liewe tawe.”
Nga omusaayi Fineasi ne bakasa ekhumi nende be kumukaanda bakhulu be chinju cha Isiraeli ba baaba ne naye, ne baulila kamakhuwa niko be owa Rubeni nende be owa Kati nende be owa Manase balomaloma, kabasiimisia lukali.
Nio Fineasi, okhwa Eliesa omusaayi, aboolela be owa Rubeni, Kati, nende be owa Manase ali, “Luno khwamanyile khuli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali nafwe. Sikila enywe semwamulekhile tawe. Nono mwaoniisie babaandu ba Isiraeli khukhwama mu sinyaasio sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Fineasi okhwa Eliesa ne babemeelesi balekha be owa Rubeni nende be owa Kati mu maloba ka Kileati, bakobola e Kanaani khu baandu ba Isiraeli, mala bababoolela nga kaba.
Kano kasiimisia Baisiraeli mala bafumia Wele. Ne se balomalomakho lundi kamakhuwa ke khucha khusera chikholo che ebukwe namwe khukhwonaka kamaloba niko bamenyamo tawe.
Be owa Rubeni nende be owa Kati baloma bali, “Alutare yino eli buloli khwifwe fweesi mbo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ali Wele.” Mala bakitiuukha bali “Buloli.”

Siise sileeyi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne eleesie Baisiraeli kumuleembe khukhwama khu basiku baabwe ba baabotookhelela. Siise esio, Yoshua aba omukofu lukali.
Alaanga Baisiraeli boosi: basaakhulu, babemeelesi, bakhalaki ne banamae bakhulu be babaandu mala aloma ali, “Luno luri nabeele omusaakhulu lukali.
Mwaboone buli siindu nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akholile khu bibala bino sikila enywe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amupaniile.
Namukabile kamaloba ke bibala bibiarama nga kumukabwa kwe chikholo chenywe. Lundi namueleesie kamaloba ke bibala nibio malile khuula, khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Yoritani, elubeka lwe bukwe, khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia, elubeka lwe mumbo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe acha khubakobosia enyuma, ne khubatimania khukhwama khwinywe nga ne mucha khubolakho. Mucha khuaamba kamaloba kaabwe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne amusuubisia.
Khwako mube barekerefu ne khuria buli siindu sisiaandikwa mu sitabu sie lilaka lia Musa. Mukhalekelesiakho liosi liosi tawe.
Ne lundi mukhatubaanakho ne babaandu be bibala bibiarama akari wenywe namwe mukhalangakho kamasina ke bawele baabwe namwe khukechuubila mu lilomaloma lienywe, namwe khusaaya bawele abo namwe khubasikamila tawe.
Ne kakhali, mukhoyela mwaria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga mwabele khukhwola luno.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atimaanie chikholo chingali lundi che kamaani ebweeni wenywe. Mbao yesi yesi owanyalile khu khuupana ne nanywe tawe.
Ne mulala khwinywe anyala akhola babaandu e elefu ndala belukha, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niye omupanila, nga nilwo amusuubisia.
Nono ba barekerefu mukhusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Sikila mwaba ne mukobola enyuma lundi mwaambana ne chikholo echo chisiili akari wenywe, mukhwaane nabo,
mukhoya mumanye muli aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se acha lundi khumutimanisilia chikholo chino chirure ebweeni wenywe tawe. Ne kakhali chicha khuba basiku khwinywe nga kumureko namwe liloo lundi nga buchuuni bwe kumukhomwa khu mukoongo kwowo namwe kamawa mumoni chenywe. Ne kano kakhekholekhe khukhwola nga mubuna mwesi khukhwama mu maloba kamalayi kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aamuelesia.
“Ne siise siase sie khufwa, siolile. Buli mulala khwinywe amanyile mu mwoyo kwewe omwene ali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amalile khubaa bibiindu bilayi bioosi nibio abasuubisia. Buli lisuubisia nilio aasuubisia, aakhola. Mbao akhaba lilala likholisibwa tawe.
Ne nga nilwo akholile bibiindu bilayi bioosi nibio aamulaka, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala khurera kamabi koosi khukhwola nga ne amubunia khukhwama mu liloba lilayi lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amuelesia.
Mwaba ne mukhaliinda endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe amulaka khuliinda tawe, lundi mwaba ne mukholela ne khukhwinamila bawele babaandi, mu lirima alimubunia. Ne mbao khwinywe ocha khurama mu maloba kamalayi kano niko aamuelesia tawe.”

Yoshua abuusia alala chikholo choosi cha Isiraeli e Shekemu. Alaanga basaakhulu ne bakasa, babemeelesi, ne banamae Baisiraeli, mala beecha ebweeni wa Wele.
Yoshua aboolela babaandu boosi ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli aboola, ‘Khaale bakuuka benywe ba baamenyanga lubeka lwe sikelekha sie luluuchi lwa Efurati, ne basaaya bawele babaandi. Mulala khu bakuuka benabo aba Tera, raraawe owa Aburahamu ne Nahori.
Nio nabukula Aburahamu, kuuka wenywe, khukhwama mu sibala engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati mala namurangirira khukhwola mu sibala sia Kanaani. Namua lisaaye likali. Namua Isaaka,
ne Isaaka namua Yakobo ne Esau. Naelesia Esau sibala sie sikulu sia Seiri nga kimiaandu kiewe, ne kuuka wenywe Yakobo ne babaana bewe beekha e Misiri.
Nio naruma Musa ne Aruni, mala nareera butinyu bukali khu Misiri. Enyuma wako namurusia mu Misiri.
Narusia bakuuka benywe khukhwama e Misiri. Mala Bamisiri ba batimania ne kamakaari ne chifarasi khukhwola khu Nyanja eya Shamu.
Nga balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete, arao sisiilima akari wabwe ne Bamisiri. Akhola enyanja yafuuma Bamisiri mala yabeera. Mumanyile niko nakholela Misiri. Mwamenya mu sichiimi siise sileeyi.
Nio namureera mu sibala sie Baamori, ba baamenya lubeka lwe bukwe owa Yoritani. Baamori bamupania enywe, ne kakhali namua enywe bukhili khubaula. Mwaba bukula kamaloba kaabwe, mala nababunia mumoni chenywe.
Nio Balaki omwami owe Baamori okhwa Sipori, echa apania Baisiraeli. Arumania elomo khu Balamu okhwa Beori eche amulame enywe.
Ne kakhali se nenya mbulile Balamu tawe, khwako amubiita enywe chikhabi, mala mu ngila ng'eneyo nabaonisia khukhwama khu Balaki.
Mwambukha Yoritani mweecha e Yeriko. Babaandu be Yeriko ba baapania nga Baamori ne bakhola, Baperisi, Bakanaani, Bahiti, Bakirikashi, Bahibi, ne Bayebusi. Ne kakhali namuelesia enywe bukhili khu boosi.
Nga ne mwachiililila, naruma kamaaraamba katimania babaami babili be Baamori. Chimbalu chenywe ne buyiingo bwenywe mbao sioosi nisio biakhola tawe.
Nabaa sibala nisio mukhaalimamo ta ne chingoba nicho mukhoombakha tawe. Luno mumenyileyo mala mulikho mulia bibiaamo khukhwama khu misabibu nikio mukhaabiaala tawe, ne kimiseituni khukhwama khu bisaala nibio mukhaabiaala tawe.’ ”
“Nono, chiililila khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mumukholele ne kumwoyo kwe bung'ali ne busuubilwa. Mwata bawele nibo bakuuka benywe basaayanga ne bali e Mesopotamia ne mu Misiri, mala musaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono mwaba ne mukhenya khukholela Wele kimilimo tawe, robora luno niye mucha khukholela, bawele nibo bakuuka benywe bakholelaanga mu Mesopotamia namwe bawele be Baamori, mu sibala nimwo mumenyile luno. Ne kakhali ese ne enju yase, khulakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio babaandu bakobosia Yoshua bali, “Likhuwa lie khulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala khukholeele bawele babaandi likhoya liaba aleeyi ne nafwe!
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe niye owakhurusia efwe ne bakuuka befwe khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri, khukhwama munju eye bunasioobi e Misiri ne efwe khwabona kamaya kamaboofu niko aakhola. Aakhuliinda buli abuundu niio khwachichanga, ne mu baandu boosi nimwo khwabiraangamo.
Nga khweecha mu sibala sino, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aatimania ebweeni wefwe Baamori boosi ba baamenyanga mu sibala sino. Nono efwe fweesi khucha khukholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila ali Wele wefwe.”
Ne kakhali Yoshua aboolela babaandu ali, “Se munyala mwakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, sikila ali Wele omutakatifu. Ali Wele owe likhendekha, se akhamubeele bumayaanu bwenywe namwe kamakhiikha kenywe tawe.
Ne mulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mwakholela bawele Be Chikholo chichiindi, acha khumuukuuma ne khumua butinyu. Acha khumumila, akhaba ne aaba omulayi khwinywe e khunyoa.”
Babaandu baboolela Yoshua bali, “Tawe! Khulakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Yoshua aboolela babaandu ali, “Enywe muli baloli mwabeene muli mwaroboore Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mumukholela?” Baloma bali, “Ee, khuli baloli.”
Nio Yoshua aloma ali, “Nono khe mulekhane ne bawele be chikholo chichiindi baali mwinywe, mala mure kimiooyo kienywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.”
Nio babaandu baboolela Yoshua bali, “khucha khukholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Ne kumumilo kwewe khucha khukuria.”
Nio Yoshua akhola endakaano ne babaandu endaalo ng'eneyo, abakholela kamalaka e Shekemu bweneyo.
Mala Yoshua aandika kamakhuwa kano mu sitabu sie Lilaka sia Wele. Abukula libaale liboofu mala alira asi we kumukhoonge abuundu e khusaayilao Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mala Yoshua aboolela babaandu boosi ali, “Libaale lino licha khuba buloli khwifwe. Liauliile kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboleele efwe. Nono licha khuba buloli khwinywe, nio mukhakhola murio mwakhola bubeeyi khu Wele wenywe tawe.”
Nio Yoshua alekhuula babaandu bacha, buli mulala mu mukabwa kwewe.
Enyuma wako, Yoshua okhwa Nuni, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afwa ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne likhumi.
Bamusiikha mumukabwa kwewe a Timunati-Sera eli mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu ebunaswa we sikulu sia Kaasi.
Baisiraeli bakholeela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biise bioosi nibio Yoshua aba omulamu. Akhaba enyuma we lifwa liewe, bachiililila khukhola bario nga babemeelesi bababona niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakholela Isiraeli baba ne basiili balamu.
Eliesa okhwa Aruni afwa mala asiikhwa e Kibea, lukoba luuli mu sibala sie sikulu sia Efuraimu sisiakabwa khu mwana wewe Fineasi.

Enyuma we lifwa lia Yoshua, Baisiraeli bareeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Kholo siina khu kholo chefwe elaba eye khunyoa khucha khukhwibwaakala Bakanaani?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Ekholo eya Yuda niyo elanyoa eche. Ndikho mbaa sibaba esio sibe mu bunyali bwabwe.”
Babaandu ba Yuda baboolela babaandu ba Simioni bali, “Yiicha khuche ne nanywe mu maloba niko bakhueele efwe, mala mukhuyeete khupane ne Bakanaani. Ne fwesi khukhache khumuyeete khukhupanila kamaloba keenywe.” Nio chikholo cha Simioni
ne Yuda chacha mwiie alala. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaa bukhili khu Bakanaani ne Baperisi mala baula babaandu chielefu likhumi a Beseki.
Ebeseki banyoolayo Atonibeseki omwami we lukoba mala bapana ne naye. Ne abwenao baulila elala Bakanaani ne Baperisi.
Atonibeseki elukha, ne bamutimania, bamuaamba, mala bamukhala chinjala chikhuumwa che khu makhono ne khu bikele.
Atonibeseki aloma ali, “Babaami kamakhumi saba babakhalwa chinjala chikhuumwa che khu makhono ne chinjala chikhuumwa che khu bikele bangalaanga bitonyi bie biakhulia bibiakwichanga asi asialwa siase. Luno, Wele akholeele ese niko nabakholela.” Abukulwa ayilwa e Yerusalemu mala afwilayo.
Babaandu ba Yuda bebwaakala lukoba lwa Yerusalemu mala balubukula. Beera babaandu balwo ne khulwosia.
Enyuma we khukhwosia lukoba luno, bacha khu khuupana ne Bakanaani babamenyanga mu sibala sie bikulu, mu maayo mwe bikulu ebunafubo owa Kanaani.
Bacha bengilila Bakanaani babamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Heburoni lulwalaangwa luli, Kiriati-Ariba. Ebweeneyo baula chikholo cha Sheshai, Ahimani, ne Talimai.
Khukhwama ao babaandu ba Yuda bacha khukhwibwaakala lukoba lwa Tebiri. Mu khunyoa lukoba luno lwalaangwanga luli, Kiriati-Seferi.
Ne mulala khu nibo owalaangwanga bali Kalebu aloma ali, “Omundu yesi yesi olebwaakala Kiriati-Seferi mala alubukule, ndamuelesia omukhaana wase Akisa abe omukhasi wewe.”
Otinieli okhwa Kenasi, (Kenasi aba wandaaye owa Kalebu) abukula lukoba olwo. Nio Kalebu aamuelesia omukhaana wewe Akisa aaba omukhasi wewe.
Khu nyanga eye siselelo Otinieli aboolela
Akisa amukobosia ali, “Nenya chisebele che kameechi sikila wamba kamaloba kali khusiangalaamwe sie ebunafubo owa Kanaani.” Nio Kalebu aaelesia Akisa chisebele che ngaaki nende che mwaalo.
Be lisaaye lia Hobabu Omukenayi, paapa owo mukhasi owa Musa, bachiililila ne lukeendo ne babaandu ba Yuda khukhwama e Yeriko, lukoba lwe kamakheendu, boola mu sichiimi embi ne Arati mu Yuda. Ebweeneyo bamenya mu Baamaleki
Bayuda bacha alala ne babaandu ba Simioni mala alala baula Bakanaani babamenyanga mu lukoba lwa sefati. Balwonakila elala, nio balutiuukha bali Horima
Yuda aamba
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ayeeta babaandu Bayuda mala baamba kamaloba ke mu sikulu. Ne se banyala khuonamo bamenywa be mu maayo tawe, sikila baba ne kamakaari ke liie ke bichuuma.
Heburoni lwaebwa khu kholo eya Kalebu nga Musa ne aloma. Nio Kalebu aoona chikholo chitaru che Baanaki.
Ne kakhali babaandu be kholo eya Benjamini se baoona Bayebusi ba baamenya mu Yerusalemu baruramo tawe. Mala Bayebusi bachiililila khumenyamo ne Babenjamini khukhwama endaalo eyo khukhwola luno.
Enju eya Yosefu (Chikholo cha Efuraimu ne Manase) yosi yacha khu khuupana ne Beteli mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeeta.
Nio enju eya Yosefu yaruma bayooti khupelelesia Beteli (Lisina lie lukoba luno mu khunyoa liaba bali Lusi.)
Bayooti abo babona omundu alikho arura mu lukoba omwo ne acha, mala bamuboolela bali, “Khwekesie nga ne khunyala khwengila mu lukoba muno, mala efwe khulakhukholela kamalayi.”
Nio abekesia, mala be owa Efuraimu ne Manase beera buli mundu mu lukoba omwo, ne kakhali balekha omundu yuno nende be enju yewe.
Enyuma wa kano omundu niye bayooti balekha acha mu sibala sie Bahiti mala ombakhayo lukoba nilwo atiuukha ali Lusi, nilio lisiili busa lisina lialwo khukhwola luno.
Nga Baisiraeli ne banyoola kamaani bayingiilila Bakanaani babakholeleenge kimilimo, ne kakhaba kario se babaoona boosi baruramo tawe.
Ekholo eya Sebuluni se yaoona babaandu babamenyanga mungoba cha Kitironi ne Nahaloli baruramo tawe. Nio Bakanaani bachiililila khumenyayo ne nabo, mala ekholo eya Sebuluni babayiingiilila khu bakholela kimilimo.
Ekholo eya Asieri se yaoona babaandu ba bamenyanga mu ngoba cha Ako, Sidoni, Ahilabu, Akisibu, Heliba, Afeki ne Rehobu, baruramo tawe.
Babaandu ba Asheri bamenya ne Bakanaani ba baaba siimbi ne nabo sikila se babaoona baruramo tawe.
Ekholo eya Nafutali se yaoona bamenywa be mu ngoba cha Beti-shemesi ne Betanati khururamo tawe. Babaandu ba Nafutali bamenya ne Bakanaani ba baaba siimbi ne nabo, ne kakhali babayiingiilila babakholele kimilimo.
Baamori baminakilisia babaandu be ekholo eya Dani bakobole mu maloba ke bikulu sikila se babafukiilila bekha mu maayo tawe.
