Ne Baamori bachiililila khumenya e Aiyaloni, Siaalibimu ne a sikulu Heresi. Ne chikholo cha Efuraimu ne Manase babamiia mala babayiingiilila babakholele kimilimo.
Lulwakha lwe Baamori

Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aama e Kilikali acha Bokimu mala aboolela Baisiraeli ali, “Namurusia e Misiri mala namureera mu sibala nisio nalaka bakuuka benywe. Naboola ndi, ‘Ese se ndifunaka endakaano yase ne nanywe tawe.
Mukhakholakho endakaano yosi yosi ne babaandu bamenyile mu sibala sino tawe. Mutechule ne khukhwonaka chi alutare chabwe.’ Ne kakhali se mwariire lilaka liase tawe. Siina nisio mukholile sino?
Nono, muboolela enywe ndi se enja khuona babaandu bano barure ebweeni wenywe nga ne muliba ne mulikho muchiililila khuula tawe. Baliba basiku
Nga malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma lino, babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi barakikha khulila.
Nio balaanga abuundu ao bali Bokimu
Yoshua alekhuula babaandu ba Isiraeli bache, mala buli omundu acha abukula kumukabwa kwewe kwe kamaloba.
Nga Yoshua aba ne asiilio omulamu, Baisiraeli bakholelanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne enyuma we lifwa liewe bachiililila khukhola bario. Bakhola bario nga babemeelesi babona bibiindu biboofu bioosi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akholeele Isiraeli ne basiili balamu.
Omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Yoshua okhwa Nuni, afwa ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne likhumi.
Asiikhwa mu maloba kewe omwene e Timunati-Sera mu sibala sie lukulu lwa Efuraimu ebunaswa we sikulu sia Kaashi.
Eselukho eyo yoosi yafwa mala eselukho eyaloondakho yebilila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akholeele Isiraeli.
Mala Baisiraeli bakhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga barakikha khusaaya Baali.
Baloba khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we bakuuka babwe, Wele owabarusia e Misiri. Baisiraeli barakikha khusaaya bawele babaandi, bawele be babaandu ba baba siimbi. Babasikamila mala baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima.
Baloba khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bakholela ba Baali ne Ashitoreti.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba omurafu lukali khu Baisiraeli. Alekha banuuli babebwaakala mala babanuula kimiaandu. Alekhuula basiku ba baba siimbi babakhila kamaani mala Baisiraeli se banyala khukhweliinda lundi tawe.
Buli lwosi nga ne bachichaanga mwiie, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abechanga lubeka lwabwe tawe, bulayi bwene nga aaba ne aboolile. Baba mu butinyu bukali.
Nio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Baisiraeli babemeelesi ba babaonia khukhwama khu banuuli.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli se baulila ke babemeelesi babwe tawe. Se baba bang'ali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, mala basaaya bawele babaandi. Bakuuka baabwe baba baria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali lisaaye lie bakuuka bano lialekha khuria kamalaka.
Buli lwosi nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aechanga Baisiraeli omwimeelesi, amuyetaanga mala abaonia khukhwama khu basiku babwe mu bulamu bwo omwimeelesi oyo bwoosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabakholelaanga siisa mu buchuuni bwabwe ne mu minaanio.
Ne buli lwosi omwimeelesi ne afwiile, babaandu bakaluukhananga bakobola khungila chikhale ne likhola libi khukhila eselukho eyaba ne ebirire. Bakholelanga ne khusikamila bawele babaandi mala baloba khulekha chingila chabwe chikhiikha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambwa lirima khu Baisiraeli. Aaloma ali, “Ekholo yino yafunaake endakaano niyo nalaka bakuuka baabwe baliinde. Se bandiire ese tawe.
Se ndaoona lundi chikholo chichaba ne chisiili mu sibala nga Yoshua ne akhafwa, chiruremo tawe.
Ndachirumikhira khukela Baisiraeli ndole baloonda chingila chase nga bakuuka baabwe ne bakhola namwe tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekha chikholo echo chisikale mu sibala omwo. Se akhola Yoshua abaula tawe, namwe se abaoona khangu baruramo enyuma we lifwa lia Yoshua tawe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalekha chikholo chindala mu sibala khukhaka Baisiraeli bakhaabirira mwiie mu Kanaani tawe.
Akhola lino nio ekesie buli eselukho eye Baisiraeli ke liie, lukali khu abo abele bakhabakho mwiie tawe.
Babalekhwa mu sibala baba babaami baraano be Bafilisiti, Bakanaani boosi, Basidoni ne Bahibi bamenyile mu bikulu bia Lebanoni khukhwama khu sikulu sia Baali-Herimoni khukhwola khu silibwa sie Hamati.
Chikholo chino chaba likhako khu Isiraeli khumanya ne kali bali Baisiraeli balaria kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne aele bakuuka baabwe khubirira khu Musa namwe tawe.
Khwako, Baisiraeli bamenya mu maloba ke Bakanaani, Bahiti, Baamori, Baperisi, Bahibi ne Bayebusi.
Bakhwaana ne nabo mala basaaya bawele baabwe.
Baisiraeli bebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe bamukholela bumayaanu mala basaaya bawele Baali ne Asieroti.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Baisiraeli lirima mala alekha omwami Kushani Rishadhaimu owe Mesopotamia abape ne khu baula. Baba asi wewe kimiiko munaane.
Nio Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma omundu abaabine. Oyuno aba Otinieli okhwa Kenasi. (Kenasi aba wandaaye owa Kalebu.)
Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwichakho, mala aaba omwimeelesi owe Baisiraeli. Otinieli acha mwiie mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuyeeta aula omwami owa Mesopotamia oyo.
Kumuleembe kwaba mu sibala khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane ne Otinieli afwa.
Baisiraeli lundi bakhola kamamayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sikila kano, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola omwami Ekironi owe Bamoabu aba ne kamaani khukhila Baisiraeli.
Ekironi aambana ne Baamoni ne Baamaleki baula Baisiraeli mala baamba Yeriko, lukoba lwe kamakheendu.
Baisiraeli baba asi we bunyali bwa Ekironi khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na munaane.
Lundi Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aruma omundu abaabina. Oyuno aba Ehudi omundu we kumukoota owaba okhwa Kera, khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini. Baisiraeli baruma Ehudi khu mwami Ekironi owe Bamoabu amuyilile biianwa.
Ehudi aba abasile embalu buleeyi bwe liraango, eyokiia chimbeka chombi. Akiboa khu nduukhu eye sikele siewe siseecha mala akwisiakho chingubo.
Nio abukula biianwa ayilila Ekironi owaba omundu omunefu lukali.
Nga amala khumua biianwa, Ehudi aboolela babaandu bababisuta barekukhe bache.
Ne Ehudi omwene ayuukha akobolela amabaale kamabeche siimbi Kilikali, khu Ekironi mala aloma ali “Omwami, ndi ne likhuwa lia babili fweng'ene.”
Nio omwami arusia lilaka khu bakholi bewe ali, “Rura, mukhulekhe fweng'ene!” Boosi barura enje.
Nga omwami ne aba ne ekhaale yeng'ene mu lusiro lunyifu lwe munju angaaki, Ehudi amuchao mala aloma ali, “Ese ndi ne likhuwa liowo khukhwama khu Wele.” Omwami enyokha eema.
Ne kumukhono kumukoota Ehudi abukula embalu khukhwama khu nduukhu eye lubeka luseecha mala auuna omwami enda.
Embalu yoosi yengila ne siini siosi mala kiminaawa kiakifuunikha. Ehudi se akikhweesa yarura munda mwo omwami tawe.
Nio Ehudi arura mu lusiro acha anje, ekala kimiliango akikhomekha,
mala arekukha. Bakholi becha mala babona kimiliango kimikhomekhe ne bebaasia busa bali omwami ali mukari alikho eyeeta.
Baliinda siise sileeyi mala nga ne akhekula kumuliango tawe, babukula lufunguo mala bakwikula. Ne abwenao banyoola omwami wabwe akwile amukhe afwiile.
Nga baba ne basiliindiilila Ehudi elukha. Acha abirira emabaale kamabeche mala elukhila e Seira.
Nga ne olayo, mu ngulu cha Efuraimu, apa ekhoombi, khulaanga Baisiraeli bache mwiie, nio abaraangirira bekha khukhwama khu bikulu.
Aloma ali, “Nondekho! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amueele buuli khu basiku benywe, Bamoabu.” Nio, baloonda khu Ehudi bekha mala baamba kamafubukho niko Bamoabu baba bacha khwambukhilamo Yoritani. Se bafukiilila omundu akhaba mulala yeng'ene ambukhe tawe.
Endaalo eyo beera ambi chielefu ekhumi che banamae balayi lukali be Bamoabu. Se aliio owelukha aona tawe.
Endaalo eyo Baisiraeli baula Bamoabu mala kumuleembe kwaba mu sibala khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane.
Omwimeelesi oloondakho aba Siamukari okhwa Anasi. Yesi aonia Baisiraeli khulwe khukhwira Bafilisiti chimia sita ne siimbo eye chikhaafu.

Enyuma we khufwa khwa Ehudi, Baisiraeli lundi bakhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abalekhela Yabini aabaula. Yabini aaba omwami Omukanaani owamiia mu lukoba lwa Hasari. Komanda wewe owe liie aba Sisera, owamenyanga e Harosheti-hakoimu.
Yabini aba ne kamakaari ke bichuuma ke liie chimia tisa. Mala amiia Baisiraeli ne burafu ne sisiayuumba khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili. Nio Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete.
Nono Debora mukha Lapitoti aaba omung'oosi lundi omwimeelesi owe Baisiraeli mu siise esio.
Ekhalanga asi we kumukheendu akari wa Rama ne Beteli mu sibala sie lukulu sia Efuraimu, ne Baisiraeli bachichangayo khulwe bukhalaki bwewe.
Endaalo ndala arumania balange Baraka okhwa Abinoamu khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Keteshi mu Nafutali. Nio amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, akhulaka ali, ‘Bukula babaandu chielefu likhumi khukhwama mu kholo cha Nafutali ne Sebuluni, mala obayile khu sikulu sia Tabori.
Ndareera Sisera omukhulu we banamae ba Yabini akhupane ne nawe a luuchi lwa Kishoni. Alaba ne kamakaari ke bibia ne banamae, ne ese ndakhukhola omuule.’ ”
Nio Baraka akobosia ali, “Ndacha, ewe waaba ne olacha alala ne nase, ne waaba ne okhacha ne nase tawe, sesi se endacha tawe.”
Debora amukobosia ali, “Bulayi; ndacha ne nawe, ne ewe se olanyoola efuma khulwe khuula tawe sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaana Sisera khu mukhasi.” Nio Debora arura acha Keteshi alala ne Baraka.
Baraka alanga chikholo cha Sebuluni ne Nafutali chiche e Keteshi mala babaandu chielefu likhumi bamuloondakho. Debora acha ne naye.
Mu siise esio Heberi Omukenayi aaba oombakha liiema liewe e Keteshi, siimbi amuruba a Saananimu. Aba auuya acha aleeyi khukhwama khu Bakenayi babaandi be lisaaye lia Hobabu mukhwewe owa Musa.
Sisera amanya ali Baraka aba aniinile khu sikulu sia Tabori.
Nio alaanga bamureerere kamakaari kewe ke bichuuma chimia tisa ne babaandu bewe boosi. Nio abaruma khukhwama e Harosheti-hakoimu bache khu luuchi lwa Kishoni.
Nio Debora aboolela Baraka ali, “Cha! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akhurangirira ewe. Endaalo yino olaula Sisera.” Nono, Baraka arekukha ekha khukhwama khu sikulu sia Tabori ne babaandu bewe chielefu likhumi.
Nga Baraka ne banamae bewe ne bebwaakala, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akoyaania Sisera alala ne babaandu bewe be kamakaari ke mwiie. Sisera ekha arura mu likaari liewe mala atima ne bikele elukha.
Baraka atimania kamakaari ne banamae khukhwola Harosheti-hakoimu mala banamae ba Sisera boosi berwa, se aliio omundu owarama tawe.
Sisera elukha acha engila mu liiema lia Yaeli. Yaeli aba mukha Heberi Omukenayi. Sisera engila mu liiema lia Yaeli sikila omwami Yabini owa Hasori aba ne kumuleembe nende be enju eya Heberi.
Yaeli arura acha akaanila Sisera mala amuboolela ali, “Omwami, yiicha mu liiema liase okharia tawe.” Nio echa engila mala Yaeli amubiimba liruungeeti.
Sisera aboolela Yaeli ali, “Ndikho mbulila bulesia, nosiima mbekho kameechi enywe.” Yaeli afunula eoochwa
Nono Sisera amuboolela ali, “Yiima amuliango kwe liiema ne omundu yesi yesi ne echa ne akhureeba ali, ‘Naanu oli muno?’ Muboolele oli mundumo tawe.”
Sisera aba aluile lukali, liilo liamuaamba. Nio Yaeli abukula enyundo ne sichaangi sie liiema, amuchao mala amwiira khulwe khumukhoma sichaangi. Akhoma siabira mu siaanga siengila mwiloba.
Nga Baraka ne echa ne alikho ayiima Sisera, Yaeli arura acha amwakaanila, mala amuboolela ali, “Yiicha ano! Ndakhwekesia omundu niye olikho oyiima.” Nio Baraka engila mwiiema anyoola Sisera afwiile. Sichaangi sie liiema siaba siabirire mu murwe kwewe.
Endaalo eyo Wele aelesia Baisiraeli bukhili khu Yabini omwami owe Bakanaani.
Baisiraeli bachiililila khuloondelesia Yabini, omwami owa Kanaani khukhwola nga bamubunia.

Nio Debora ne Baraka okhwa Abinoamu bemba kumwenya khu ndaalo eyo bali,
Babemeelesi barangirira babaandu mu Isiraeli,
nio babaandu beaana babeene.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume!
Ulila, Ee baami; rekeeresia, Ee bakhulu;
khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndemba,
ndemba kumwenya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele owe Baisiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga ne waama mu bikulu bie Seiri,
nga ne waama mu sibala sia Edomu,
liloba liaterema, mala efula yakwa,
Yee, kamafuumbi kachukha kameechi.
niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Sinai,
Wele owe Baisiraeli.
Mu ndaalo cha Siamukari, okhwa Anati,
mu ndaalo cha Yaeli, kimiila kiawa,
ne bakeendi batalaandilanga khu ngila che khu ndulo.
Bukhili bwawa, bwawa mu Isiraeli,
khukhwola nga Debora
wema nga maayi owe Baisiraeli.
Nga ne barobora bawele bayia,
liie liaba mu bilibwa.
Engabo namwe lifumo biabonekhakho
mu baandu chielefu arubaine mu Isiraeli?
Kumwoyo kwase kuli alala ne banamae bakhulu be Baisiraeli,
babeaana babeene khukhwama mu baandu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume!
Kaboole
enywe mumwikhalila kamasisinwa kamalayi,
ne nanywe mubira khu ngila.
Rekeeresia! Kumumilo kwe babaandu balikho beemba a sebele che kameechi,
abwenao baboola bikholwa bie bukhili bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
bukhili bwe Baisiraeli!
Nio babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bakeenda boola khu bilibwa biabwe.
Yinyokha, yinyokha Debora!
Yinyokha, yimba kumwenya, yinyokha!
Yinyokha Baraka, okhwa Abinoamu,
yimeelela baambe be mwiie bowo!
Nio babalekhwa bekha beecha khu baandu be efuma,
babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi beekha becha
baula babaandu be efuma.
Becha khukhwama Efuraimu bekha mu litooma
enyuma we ekholo eya Benjamini ne balebe bayo.
Banamae bakhulu bakeenda bekha khukhwama e Makiri,
ne basuti be siimbo yo mwimeelesi, baama e Sebuluni.
Babemeelesi ba Isakari becha ne Debora,
ekholo eya Isakari yaba eyeyikinwa khu Baraka.
Baatima bacha mwitooma ne baloonda khu Baraka,
mu kholo eya Rubeni.
Liabamo lireeberesia likali mu miooyo!
Sikila siina ne mwekhala mu matuuli ke kamakheese?
Khurekeeresia babaapa kumulele kulaanga lituuli lie kamakheese?
Mu kholo eya Rubeni,
liabamo lilireeberesia liboofu mu miooyo!
Kileati amenya ebukwe owa Yoritani.
Ne Dani, sikila siina ne ekhala sia meeli?
Asieri ekhala nasilile khu sikiingi sie enyanja,
mala aliindilila a mafubukho keewe.
Babaandu ba Sebuluni nende ba Nafutali
beaana bulamu bwabwe abuundu aesuta
Babaami becha bapana,
bapana ne babaami ba Kanaani,
a Taanachi ambi ne kameechi ka Makito.
Bapana ne se banuula efwesa bacha ne nayo tawe.
Ching'enieesi che mwikulu chapana,
Mu mbilo chabwe chapana ne Sisera.
Luluuchi lwa Kishoni lweeya,
lweeya babaandu ba Sisera.
Luluuchi lwe kamaani, luluuchi lwa Kishoni,
mwoyo kwase, keenda, ne bunyindaafu!
Nio chifarasi chapukuta asi bikhakayu,
chapukuta ne ndiri, ne kamaani kaacho.
“Laama Merosi,” malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
laama ne burafu bamenywa balwo,
sikila se beecha baabina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
se beecha khuaabina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwaama khu be kamaani tawe.
Yaeli abe ne chikhabi mu bakhasi boosi,
mukha Heberi Omukenayi,
owe ekhabi lukali,
mu bakhasi bamenyile mu maeema.
Sisera asaba Yaeli kameechi,
mala niye amua kamabeele;
amureerera kamabeele kamabou,
khu sibuumba sie bubwami.
Yaeli aamba sichaangi sie liiema,
ne kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha
aamba sikweelo sie bakholi;
apa Sisera amutubundula kumurwe,
mala amuuna amufutula siaanga.
Sisera ayeekha, akwa,
alambaala a bikele bia Yaeli,
a bikele bia Yaeli ayeekha, akwa;
niio ayeekha, akwa afwilao.
Maayi owa Sisera alolela
maayi owa Sisera alolela mu numa;
“Sikila siina kamakaari kewe ne kakhakhola khangu tawe?
Sikila siina chindiri che chifarasi chewe ne chiaayiliile khukhwola?”
Bakholi bewe be siikhasi bakesi bamukobosia,
naye, omwene, ekobosia ali,
“Banyala baba ne balikho bakabana bibiindu nibio baambile mu mbaambe,
omukhaana mulala namwe babili khu buli mundu.
Chingubo che bukusi bwe angaaki khu Sisera,
chingubo che kamapala kang'enang'ena mwikosi mwa kwini.”
Nono, bakhoya babuna, basiku bowo boosi,
ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Ne basaale bowo bakhoya baaba nga enyanga,
ne esoa mu maani kaayo.
Nio sibala siaba ne kumuleembe khu miiko kamakhumi kane.

Lundi Baisiraeli bakhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekhuula Bamidiani babamiiakho khulwe kimiiko saba.
Bamidiani baba be kamaani khu Isiraeli mala Isiraeli bekisa khukhwama khu nibo mu mabina ne mu bikulu.
Buli lwosi nga Baisiraeli bamiichanga bumiicho bwosi bwosi Bamidiani ne Baamaleki bechanga ne chikholo che mu sichiimi mala ne babebwaakala.
Baapa ekambi khu maloba kabwe mala bonaka bibiaalwa khukhwama ebunaswa khukhwola khu lukoongo luli siimbi Kasa. Babukula kamakheese koosi, chikhaafu ne chipunda mala se balekhelakho Baisiraeli sisiindu siosi siosi sie khulia tawe.
Becha ne chikhaafu chabwe ne kamaeema kamakali nga chisike. Nibo ne chingamia chabwe baba bakali abeele se banyala babalwa tawe. Becha mala bonaka kamaloba lukali.
Baisiraeli se baba nende nisio bakhola ebweeni wabwe tawe. Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete.
Nga Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete khulwe Bamidiani,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abarumira omung'oosi. Omung'oosi aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, namurusia mu bunasioobi mu Misiri.
Namureesia khukhwama khu Bamisiri ne khukhwama khu baandu ba bamunaania mu sibala sino. Naoona Bakanaani nabarusia khukhwama mu maloba kabwe mala namua enywe kamaloba ako.
Namuboolela ndi ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mukhasaaya bawele be Baamori nibo mu menyile mu maloba kabwe tawe. Ne se mwandekeresia tawe.”
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khu sirekere sia Ofira mala ekhala asi we kumukhoonge kukwaba kwa Yoashi owe luuya lwa Abieseri. Omusoleeli wewe Gidioni aba alikho aulula engaanu mu bwikisi mwiloo lie khukhamululilamo endali, nio Bamidiani bakhakhola bario baboona engaanu tawe.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Gidioni ebweeneyo mala aloma ali, “Ewe oli omundu omunyindaafu lundi owe kamaani, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nawe!”
Gidioni amureeba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne ali ne nafwe sina sikila kano koosi ne kakhwekholekhakho? Bili waena bibiindu bie khuukia nibio bapaapa befwe bakhuboolela nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholanga nga ne abareera khukhwama Misiri? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhumwaata, mala akhulekha khu siisa sie Bamidiani.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amurakho omwene ali, “Khoche ne kamaani kowo kano mala oreesie Isiraeli khukhwama khu Bamidiani. Ese samwene niise olikho okhuruma.”
Gidioni akobosia ali, “Ne ese nyala ndiena khureesia Isiraeli? Luuya lwase nilwo lutekhele mu kholo eya Manase mala lundi ese ndi omukeekhe lukali mu baandu be enju yefwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Ese ndakhuyeeta mala ewe olatubuundula Bamidiani oli fwana ne bali omundu mulala yeng'ene.”
Gidioni akobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi waaba ne osiimisiibwe ne nase, mbelesie simanyisio oli ewe niwe olikho olomaloma.
Nosiima okharekukha tawe khukhwola nga ndakhureerera siianwa sie biakhulia.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndaliinda khukhwola nga ne okobola.”
Nio Gidioni engila munju yewe mala ateekha emeeme, arumikhira bufu chikiilo likhumi khuteekha kumukaati kukhalimo limela liosi liosi tawe. Ara enyama mu sikono ne kumuunyu akuchukha mu saachi mala abireera khu malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asi we kumukhoonge.
Malaika amuboolela ali, “Ra enyama ne kumukaati khu lwanda luno mala obichukhekho kumuunyu.” Gidioni akhola ario.
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aayila esiimbo niyo aaba ne nayo akitiisia khu nyama ne khu mukaati. Kumulilo kwama mu lwanda mala kwosia enyama ne kumukaati. Mala malaika chana aakoriokha.
Nio Gidioni amanya ali aaba aboone malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma ali, “Njete ee Omwami WELE! Sikila ese naboone malaika wowo moni na moni!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “kumuleembe kube ne nawe. Okharia tawe. Se olafwa tawe.”
Gidioni ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare mala akitiuukha ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali kumuleembe.” (Khukhwola luno alutare yino esiima busa e Ofira lukoba lwe kumuliango kwa Abieseri.)
Siilo esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Gidioni ali, “Bukula euunwa eya raraao ne euunwa ekiindi eye bukhulu bwe kimiiko saba. Techula alutare eya raraao eya Baali mala rema okwisie asi sifwani sia Asiera, sili siimbi a alutare.
Yombakha alutare endaayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo khu ngaaki khwe sisiili sino. Mala bukula euunwa eya khabili, mala okiosie nga siianwa khulwe khurumikhira chiikhu che sifwani sia Asiera nisio oremiremo wakwiisia.”
Nio Gidioni abukula bakholi bewe ekhumi mala akhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne amubooleele. Gidioni aba omuri lukali khu baandu be enju yewe, ne khu baandu be mu lukoba khukhwombakha alutare kumuusi, nio akhola ario silo.
Nga babaandu be lukoba ne benyokha makhelebeende endaalo eloondakho, banyoola alutare eya Baali ne sifwani sia Asiera biaremirwe biakwile, mala euunwa eya khabili yaba yoseebwe khu alutare eyaba ne yombakhweo.
Bareebana bali, “Naanu okholile kano?” Bareeberesia mala banyoola bali, Gidioni okhwa Yoashi niye owaba ne alikholile.
Nio baboolela Yoashi bali, “Reera omusoleeli wowo ano khumwire! Sikila atechuule alutare eya Baali mala aremire akwisiisie asi sifwaani sia Asiera siili a alutare.”
Yoashi aboolela boosi ba baaba ne bamwichilekho ali, “Enywe mwemile ano khulwa Baali? Mulikho mu mupanila? Yesi yesi olamupanila aleerwa ne bukhaasia tawe. Kaaba bali Baali ali wele, lekha omwene ekhupanile khulwa Alutare yewe yatechulwa.”
Nono khukhwamila ao Gidioni alaangwa Yerubaali
Nio Bamidiani boosi, Baamaleki ne chikholo che mu sichiimi chebuusia alala, chambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani mala bebuusia mu litooma lia Yesireeli.
Gidioni echusibwa ne Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala apa ekhoombi khulaanga babaandu be Babieseri bamuloondekho.
Aruma barume mu sibala sia Manase yoosi khubalanga bamuloondekho. Aruma barume khu kholo cha Asieri, Sebuluni ne Nafutali, mala akhaba boosi becha baambaana ne naye.
Nio Gidioni aboolela Wele ali, “Waloma oli ocha khureesia Isiraeli khubirira khwise.
Ndikho nda bufuumbo bwe kamakheese asi khu liloba niio khuulilaanga engaanu. Yaaba kumutikhinyi luume ne lulaba khu bufuumbo bwong'ene, ne se lulaba ne asi tawe, aba ndamanya ndi olikho ocha khukhundumikhira ese khuonia Baisiraeli.”
Nio kaba kario. Nga Gidioni ne enyokha makhelebeende endaalo eloondakho akhamulula bufuumbo arusiamo luume lwechula sibuumba.
Lundi Gidioni aboolela Wele ali, “Khakhuaambia lirima tawe, lekha ndomalomekho lundi lulala lwong'ene. Nosiima lekha khole likela liliindi ne bufuumbo. Siise sino lekha bufuumbo bube bubalakafu ne asi abe anyifu.”
Silo esio Wele akhola ario. Endaalo eloondakho makhelebeende, bufuumbo bwaba bubalakafu, ne asi khwiloba aaba luume lwanyisisieo.

Endaalo ndala Gidioni ne babaandu bewe boosi benyokha makhelebeende mala bebuusia a Sebele eya Haroti: Ekambi eye Bamidiani yaba mu litooma ebunaswa siimbi ne lukulu lwa More.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Gidioni ali, “Babaandu nibo oli ne nabo bali bakali lukali khwise khubakhola baule Bamidiani. Banyala bebaasia bali babeene nibo babaulile mala balobe khukhumba ese efuma.
Boolela babaandu oli, ‘yesi yesi oli omuri akhoya ache engo ne efwe khulekhala a Sikulu sia Kileati ano.’ ” Nio babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne kabili bakobola engo, ne chielefu likhumi bekhala.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Gidioni ali, “Osiili ne babaandu bakali lukali. Babukule obayile eluuchi mala ebweeneyo ese ndakhwaukhasiliamo. Ne khuboolela ndi omundu ache ne nawe ne akhache. Ne khuboolela ndi omundu se acha ne nawe tawe, ne se akhache tawe.”
Gidioni abukula babaandu abekhisia eluuchi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Yaukhasia buli sia mulala okamulila busa kameechi ne lulimi lwewe nga embwa, khukhwama khu buli sia mulala osikama asi khu masikamo kewe nio anywe.”
Babaandu chimia chitaru baanyaka busa kameechi ne kamakhono mala ne bakamulila busa. Ne babaandu babaandi boosi basikama khu masikamo kabwe nio banywa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Gidioni ali, “Ndakhuonia mala khukhole oule Bamidiani ne babaandu chimia chitaru bakamulile busa kameechi. Boolela babaandu babaandi boosi bache engo.”
Nio Gidioni abukula biakhulia biabo ba baaba ne bacha ne chikhoombi, abasibula bache engo wabwe niye aarama nende babaandu chimia chitaru echo. Ekambi eye Bamidiani yaba emwalo wabwe mwitooma.
Siilo esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Gidioni ali, “Yinyokha wibwaakale ekambi eye Bamidiani, ese ndakhukhola oule.
Ne waaba noli omuri khukhwibwakala, yiicha oche mu kambi no mukholi wowo Pura.
Olaulila niko balikho baloma, ne olanyoola kamaani ke khukhwibwaakala.” Nio Gidioni no mukholi wewe Pura beekha bacha khu ndulo khwe kambi yo musiku.
Bamidiani, Baamaleki ne chikholo che mu sichiimi baba basalaniile mu litooma nga sipupu sie chisike mala baba ne chingamia chingali nga kumuyekhe khu sikiingi sie nyanja.
Nga Gidioni ne ola aulila omundu ne alikho aboolela omusaale wewe ke kamarooro. Aba alikho aloma ali, “Ndoorire ndi kumukaati kwe eshayiri kupiringiikhe kwengila mu kambi eye Bamidiani mala kwekuba liiema liakwa mala liaba busa asi.”
Omusaale wewe akobosia ali, “Eli embalu yo Muisiraeli, Gidioni okhwa Yoashi! Se sinyala siaba sisiindu sisiindi siosi siosi tawe! Wele amukholile akhukhile efwe Bamidiani ne banamae boosi.”
Nga Gidioni ne aulila kamarooro ko mundu oyo ne liboola liako, akwa asi asikama mala asaaya Wele. Nio akobola mu kambi eye Baisiraeli mala aloma ali, “Yinyokha sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukhola enywe muule banamae be Bamidiani.”
Aabukhania babaandu chimia chitaru mu bipupu bitaru mala aelesia buli mundu ekhoombi ne chisaachi ne chinjaso mukari mwacho.
Ababoolela ali, “Nga ne noola khu ndulo khwe kambi, ndoleelele mala nisio ese khola mwesi khola.
Nga sipupu siase ne nase ne khupa chikhoombi chefwe, nono enywe mwesi khupa chichenywe ne mubotookhelela ekambi yoosi mala muyokele muli, ‘Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khulwa Gidioni!’ ”
Gidioni ne babaandu bewe chimia chitaru beecha khu ndulo khwe kambi ne sisikaale siise sikeekhe khukhwola chisa sita che silo enyuma we khukaluukhania baliindi be silo. Nio baapa chikhoombi mala barakaka chisaachi nicho abeele ne batilile.
Nio bipupu bibiindi bibili bioosi biakhola birio. Boosi batiila chinjaso chabwe mu mikhono kiabwe kimikhasi ne chikhoombi mu mikhono kiabwe kimiseecha mala bayokela bali, “Embalu eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nende eya Gidioni!”
Buli mundu eema abuundu wewe babotookhelela ekambi, mala banamae bo musiku boosi belukha ne bakukuula burafu.
Ne nga babaandu ba Gidioni baba balikho baapa chikhoombi chabwe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola banamae basiku bebwaakalane babene ne babene buli mulala no kundi ne chimbalu chabwe. Banamae basiku chana belukha balola Beti-shita lubeka lwa Saretani boola e Beti-sua, boola khu lukoba lwa Abeli-mehola siimbi ne Tabati.
Nono, babaandu khukhwama mu kholo cha Nafutali, Asheri, nende bewa Manase boosi balaangwa barure, mala batimania Bamidiani.
Gidioni aruma barume mu ngulu cha Efuraimu choosi khuboola ali, “Yiikha mwiche mupane ne Bamidiani. Tiila kamafubukho ke luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne chinjichi khukhwola e Beti-bara khuliinda Bamidiani bakhambukha tawe.” Baefuraimu be siseecha balaangwa alala, mala batiila luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne chinjichi khukhwola Beti-bara.
Baamba babaami babili ba Midiani Orebu ne Seebu, berera Orebu a lwanda lwa Orebu, ne Seebu niio bakhamululilanga Endali eya Seebu. Bachiililila khutimania Bamidiani. Bareera kimirwe kia Orebu ne Seebu khu Gidioni owaba ne ali ebukwe owa Yoritani.

Nio Baefuraimu baboolela Gidioni bali, “Siina sisiakila ne okhakhulaanga nga wacha khu khuupana ne Bamidiani? Siina sikila ne okhukholela efwe kano?” Beng'ulung'unya burafu.
Mala Gidioni aababoolela ali, “Niko ese kholile se kalekhaana nende niko enywe mukholile tawe. Akhaba matiiti niko enywe Baefuraimu mukholile kali ke bukhala khukhila niko be kumuliango kwase kwoosi.
Wele areerire Orebu ne Seebu, babaami be Bamidiani mu makhono kenywe. Ese ekholile siina ne khulekhaania nende niko enywe mukholile?” Nga ne aloma ario se baba lundi ne lirima tawe.
Gidioni ne babaandu bewe chimia chitaru baba bechile khu luuchi lwa Yoritani mala abeele balwambukhe. Baba baluile lukali, ne baba basiitimania basiku Bamidiani.
Nga boola e Sukoti, aboolela babaandu be mu lukoba ali, “Ne musiima eelesiakho babaandu babanondilekho bano kimikaati; sikila baluile, mala ese ndikho ndimania Seebu ne Salimuna babaami ba Midiani.”
Ne babemeelesi ba Sukoti baloma bali, “Se waambile khale Seba ne Salimuna tawe mala wenya khuelesie banamae bowo kimikaati?”
Nio Gidioni aloma ali, “Bulayi nono! Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alara Seba ne Salimuna mu makhono kase, khamupile enywe kamawa ne lunani khukhwama mu sichiimi.”
Gidioni ama ao mala achiililila ola e Penueli mala aaboolela babaandu be ebweeneyo nga aaboolela ba Sukoti.
Nio aababoolela ali, “Ndikho nja mala nga ne ngobola ne esili omulamu mu muleembe, khatechule endeleelwa yenywe ngikwisie asi!”
Seba ne Salimuna baba bali e Karikori ne banamae babwe. Khu banamae boosi be chikholo che bukwe, embi babaandu chielefu likhumi ne chiraano bong'ene ba baaba ne baramire. Banamae eelefu ndala ne kamakhumi kabili baba beriirwe.
Gidioni aniina achiila khu muyila kwe babaandu babamenyanga mu maeema ebukwe owa Noba ne Yokibea, mala bebwaakala banamae khulwe khubasiindusia busa.
Babaami babili ba Midiani, Seba ne Salimuna, belukha, ne Gidioni abatimania mala abatiila. Lino liakila banamae Bamidiani bareenga.
Nio Gidioni okhwa Yoashi akobola khukhwama mwiie, khubirira Heresi.
Nga ola Heresi, atiila omusoleeli mulala khukhwama e Sukoti mala amureeba. Omusoleeli oyo aandikila Gidioni kamasina kamakhumi saba na saba ke babemeelesi ba Sukoti.
Nio Gidioni acha khu baandu ba Sukoti mala ababoolela ali, “Mukhebulila nga ne mwalobile khukhunjeeta? Mwaboola muli se munyala mwambelesia siakhulia siosi siosi khu banamae baluile tawe, sikila abeele khatiila Seba ne Salimuna tawe!”
Nio abukula kamawa ne lunani khukhwama mu sichiimi mala abirumikhira khuelesia babemeelesi ba Sukoti kumunaanio.
Lundi atechula endeleelwa e Penueli mala eera babaandu be lukoba olwo.
Nio Gidioni areeba Seba ne Salimuna ali, “Babaandu nibo enywe mweera e Tabori bali waena?” Bakobosia bali, “Baba bafwaana nga ewe. Buli mulala khu nibo aba afwaana busa nga omwana owo mwami.”
Nio Gidioni aloma ali, “Baaba wandaayase be sisoleeli, babaana ba maayi. Nga Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, abanga se mwabeera ta, andi ese se ndamwiira enywe tawe.”
Nono Gidioni aboolela Yeteri omusoleeli wewe omubele ali, “Chiililila obeere!” Ne omusoleeli se arusia embalu yewe tawe; aba ariire sikila abeele asili omwana.
Nio Seba ne Salimuna baboolela Gidioni bali, ewe wamwene yiicha okhwiire sikila kamaani ko omundu kalekhaana no omwene. Nio Gidioni eera Seba ne Salimuna mala abukula kimikasa kikiaba mu makosi ke chingamia chabwe.
Enyuma wako Baisiraeli baboolela Gidioni bali, “Ba omwami wefwe, ewe ne lisaaye liowo no mwichukhulu wowo okhuonisie khukhwama khu Bamidiani.”
Gidioni akobosia ali, “Ese se ndaba omwami wenywe tawe, namwe omwana wase se alaba tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamuruka enywe.
Lekha ese musabe enywe sisiindu silala. Buli mulala khwinywe ambelesie ese bipalakasa bie khu maru nibio mwabukuule.” (Bamidiani bafwaranga bipalakasa bie sahabu busa nga Baisimaeli.)
Baisiraeli bakobosia bali, “Khulaba ne bulekhuule khukhuelesia ewe.” Baala esuuka asi mala buli sia mulala araakho bipalakasa bie khu maru.
Bipalakasa bie sahabu nibio Gidioni asaba biaba embi busiro bwe chikiilo kamakhumi kabili ne bino se biaba alala ne kimikasa, ne chingubo chinapenda nicho babaami ba Midiani bafwaranga tawe, namwe chikaala chichaba mu makosi ke chingamia chabwe.
Gidioni akhola sifwaani sie sahabu eyo mala asira mu lukoba lwe mungo mwewe, lwa Ofira Baisiraeli boosi balekha Wele mala bacha Ofira khusaaya sifwaani esio. Sifwaani sino siaba kumureko khu Gidioni ne enju yewe.
Nio Bamidiani bakhilwa ne Baisiraeli mala se babariikhirisia lundi tawe. Sibala siaba ne kumuleembe khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane nabwila Gidioni ne afwa.
Yerubaali akobola mungo mwewe mala amenyamo.
Aaba ne babaana basoleeli kamakhumi kabili sikila aba ne bakhasi bakali.
Lundi aaba no mukhasi okundi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale mu Shekemu. Omukhasi oyo amusalila omwana omusoleeli mala amutiuukha lisina ali Abimeleki.
Gidioni okhwa Yoashi afwa busaakhulu, mala asiikhwa mu siliindwa sia raraawe Yoashi, e Ofira, mu lukoba lwe kumuliango kwa Abieseri.
Nga Gidioni ne afwa busa ari, babaandu ba Isiraeli, bakobola lundi basikamila Baali. Bakhola baaliberiti khuba wele wabwe.
Mala babaandu ba Isiraeli se bakhebulilakho wele wabwe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabasikula khukhwama mu makhono ke basiku baabwe chimbeka choosi tawe.
Ne se babaakho ne busiime khunju eya Gidioni khu bulayi nibwo Gidioni akholela Isiraeli tawe.

Abimeleki okhwa Gidioni acha khu balebe ba maawe e Shekemu. Nga olayo ababoolela
bareebe babaandu ba Shekemu bali, “Enywe murobora lilala siina? Ba okhwa Gidioni kamakhumi saba bamwaamie namwe omundu mulala? Khebulila muli Abimeleki ali owenywe lundi kamafuki kenywe.”
Balebe ba maawe baboolela babaandu ba Shekemu kamakhuwa ako koosi, mala babaandu ba Shekemu bakhalaka khuloonda Abimeleki sikila aba omulebe wabwe.
Bamua bitonyi bie fwesa kamakhumi saba khukhwama mu lukaangu lwa Baali. Chirupia chino aana nga kumuruuru khu baandu be sipoli lundi be situluungu mala baamuloondakho.
Nio acha munju eya raraawe e Ofira mala erera bawandaaye be sisoleeli kamakhumi saba khu libaale lilala. Yotamu, wandaaye omusoleeli omutiiti owa Gidioni ekisa mala khwirwa tawe.
Nio babaandu be chingoba cha Shekemu nende be mu sibala sie kimiliinda Beti-milo bebuusia alala mala bacha a murongooro kumukhoonge e Shekemu bamiia Abimeleki.
Nga Yotamu aulila kakekholeekhe, acha eema khu ngaaki khwe sikulu sia Kerisimu mala apa luyoka ne ababoolela ali, “Enywe baandu ba Shekemu, ndekeresie, nio Wele yesi amurekeeresie enywe!
Khaale kimirongooro kiebuusia alala khurobora omwami wakio, kiaboolela kumurongooro kumuseituni kili, ‘Ewe khwaamie efwe.’
Kumurongooro kumuseituni khwakobosia kuli, ‘Enywe mwenya ese ndekhe khurusia kamafura kase karumikhanga khuelesia bawele, ne babaandu lukoosi mala emwamiie?’
Nio kimirongooro kiaboolela kumurongooro kumutuli kili, ‘Ewe yiicha okhwaamie efwe.’
Ne kumutuli kwakikobosia kuli, ‘Ese ne mwaamiie aba nenyekhana ndekhe khurusia bibiaamo bilayi lundi binulu.’
Nio kimirongooro kiaboolela kumusabibu kili, ‘Ewe, yiicha obe omwami wefwe.’
Kumusabibu kwakobosia kuli, ‘Ese ne mwaamiia enywe, nenyekhana ndekhe khurusia endali ekholanga bawele ne babaandu basangaala.’
Nio kimirongooro kioosi kiaboolela sichakha sie kamawa kili, ‘Ewe yiicha okhwaamie efwe.’
Sichakha sie kamawa siakobosia sili, ‘Mwaaba ng'ali ne mwenya ese mbe omwami wenywe, yiicha mala mwikhale mu siiniini siase. Mwaba ne mukhakhola murio tawe, kumulilo kulaburukha khukhwama musakia chase che kamawa mala kwoosie kimirongooro kimitarakwa kia Lebanoni.’ ”
Yotamu areeba babemeelesi ba Shekemu ali, “Enywe ng'ali mwabeele ne bung'ali ne bubweyikinwa nga mwakholile Abimeleki abe omwami wenywe? Mwakhebuliile khukholela Gidioni nende be enju yewe bulayi, nga sikholwa siewe ne siolana khukholelwa ku?
Khebulila muli paapa wase amupanila enywe, aana bulamu bwewe khumuonia enywe khukhwama khu Bamidiani.
Ne endaalo yino enywe mwakalukhaane khu be enju eya paapa. Mwerire basoleeli bewe, kamakhumi saba khu libaale lilala. Ne mwakholile Abimeleki, omwana owo mukholi owa Gidioni omukhaana khuba omwami amiie babaandu ba Shekemu; khubeela bali nga ne ali omulebe wenywe.
Nono liaba nilio mukholile endaalo eya luno khu Gidioni ne khu be enju yewe lili lilieyikinwa lundi lia ng'ali sangaalila Abimeleki, mala mulekhe yesi amusangaalile enywe.
Ne liaba ne likhali lirio tawe, kumulilo kukhoya kuburukhe khukhwama khu Abimeleki mala kwoosie babaandu ba Shekemu nende be mu sibala sie kimiliinda Beti-milo; mala kwosie Abimeleki.”
Nio Yotamu elukha acha amenya a Beeri sikila aba ariire Abimeleki wandaaye.
Abimeleki amiia Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko kitaru.
Nio Wele akhola Abimeleki ne babaandu ba Shekemu babiilana mala bamukaluukhanakho.
Wele akhola kano nio Abimeleki ne babaandu ba Shekemu, babamuramo kumwoyo khukhwira basoleeli ba Gidioni kamakhumi saba, banyoole kumuruungo kwe kamamayaanu kabwe.
Babaandu ba Shekemu bara babaandu khu sikulu khungaaki bekise mala bebwaakale Abimeleki, lundi banuula buli mundu owabira khu ngila yabwe. Abimeleki aboolelwa lino.
Nono Kaali okhwa Ebeti acha e Shekemu ne bawandaaye mala babaandu ba Shekemu baba ne lilieyikina mu niye.
Babaandu abo bacha mu mikuunda kiabwe babuusia kamatuunda ke kimisabibu bareera mala bang'oona endali mala baba ne naikara. Bacha bengila munju eya wele wabwe, niio baalia ne khunywa ne khukhoma Abimeleki.
Kaali aloma ali, Abimeleki niye nanu? “Efwe khuli babaandu ba lukano siina mu Shekemu? Siina sikila ne khukholela Abimeleki? Niye ali naanu? Okhwa Gidioni! Ne Sebuli amwamisiangakho kamalaka, ne efwe siina sikila ne khumukholela? Ria kuuka wenywe Hamori, owanjisia luuya lwenywe!
Mbanga bali ese owemelelela babaandu bano, andi narusiao Abimeleki! Nakhaboolele
Sebuli omuruki we lukoba lwa Shekemu nga aulila kamakhuwa ka Kaali okhwa Ebeti aba ne bubeeleli bukali.
Arumania
Nono ewe ne babaandu bowo baali ne nawe khe muche mukone mu mikuunda.
Mwinyokhe makhelebeende enyanga ne soa mala mwibwaakale lukoba khangu. Nga Kaali ne babaandu bewe barura mupane. Bape lukali nga munyala!”
Nio Abimeleki ne babaandu bewe boosi bacha silo mala bekisa enje wa Shekemu mu bipupu bine.
Nga Abimeleki ne babaandu bewe babona Kaali arura enje mala eema a silibwa sie lukoba olwo, benyokha niio baba ne bekisile.
Kaali ababona mala aboolela Sebuli ali, “Lola! Babaandu balikho bekha bama khu ngaaki khwe lukulu!” Nio Sebuli amukobosia ali, “Abo se bali babaandu tawe. Ebio bibiniini bie bikulu busa.”
Kaali aloma lundi ali, Lola! “Babaandu balikho beekha mu luongwa lwe sikulu becha, mala sipupu silala silikho siichila khu muyila kwe a murongooro kumukhoonge kwo mulakusi.”
Nio Sebuli aboolela Kaali ali, “Lilomaloma liowo lie khukhwilola khuboofu lili waena? Ewe se oli niwe owareebire oli sina sikila efwe ne khukholelanga omundu Abimeleki yuno? Abano bali babaandu nibo ewe walekelesienge! Nono rura oche upane ne nabo.”
Kaali arangirira babaandu ba Shekemu mala apana ne Abimeleki.
Kaali elukha mala Abimeleki amutimakho. Babaandu bewe bakali baumiia, yakhaba esilibwa e lukoba.
Abimeleki amenya abuundu bali Aruma. Ne Sebuli arusia Kaali ne bawandaaye mu Shekemu mala khumenyayo lundi tawe.
Endaalo eloondakho Abimeleki amanya ali babaandu ba Shekemu baba balikho berekekha khurura bache mwiie,
Abukula babaandu bewe abakabukhasia mu bipupu bitaru mala ekisa mundaa. Nga ne abona babaandu ne barura mu lukoba ne becha, arura niio aba ne ekisile abeere.
Abimeleki ne sipupu siewe batima bacha bema a silibwa ne bipupu bibiindi bibili ebio biebwaakala babaandu ba baaba enje mu mikuunda mala biabeera boosi.
Bukhupani bwachiililila endaalo emuufu. Abimeleki ne babaandu bewe baamba lukoba, beera babaandu baalwo. Nio atechula lukoba chana mala aluchukhakho chumbe.
Nga babemeelesi be mu lukoba lwa Shekemu ne baulila kakekholekha, belukhila mu nju eya Eliberiti eyasirwa bulayi.
Abimeleki aboolelwa ali bengilemo.
Niye ne babaandu bewe baniina mu sikulu sia Salimoni embi ne Shekemu. Ebweeneyo abukula eaywa, arema lusakia khu murongooro, mala alura khwibeka. Aboolela babaandu bewe bakhole khangu nga niye akhola.
Nio buli mundu arema lusakia lwe kumurongooro, mala babaandu abo boosi baloonda khu Abimeleki mala babungikha chisakia a nju eya Eliberiti. Baambia enju eya Eliberiti mala boselia babaandu ba baabaamo boosi, mukari. Boosi bafwa eelefu ndala, bakhasi ne baseecha.
Nio Abimeleki acha khu lukoba lwa Tebesi alubotookhelela mala alubukula.
Mukari mwe lukoba endeleelwa eye kamaani yabaamo, mala buli mundu mu lukoba omwo, elukhilamo. Beyikalila mukari mala baniina mu sisuli.
Abimeleki echa khukhwibwaakala endeleelwa. Acha emuliango khukhwosia endeleelwa eyo;
nio mukhasi mulala apiringisiakho lususi lwamukwa khu murwe mala lwamwara siianga.
Alaanga khangu omwimeelesi owamusutilanga bulwaani mala amuboolela ali, “Rusia embalu yowo mala unjire. Se nenya babaandu balome bali omukhasi niye wanjira ese tawe.” Nio omwimeelesi oyo auna Abimeleki lifumo afwa.
Nga Baisiraeli ne babona bali Abimeleki afwiile, boosi bakobola engo.
Mungila yino Wele aruunga Abimeleki kamamayaanu niko akholela raraawe nga ne eera bawandaaye kamakhumi saba.
Lundi Wele akhola babaandu ba Shekemu banyoola butinyu khu mamayaanu kaabwe, nga Yotamu, okhwa Gidioni, ne abalaama.

Enyuma we lifwa lia Abimeleki, Dodo, okhwa Pua, omwichukhulu owa Dodo, echa khuonia Isiraeli. Dola ama mu kholo eya Isakari, ne amenyanga e Shamiri mu sibala sie lukulu sia Efuraimu.
Aba omwimeelesi owa Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kitaru. Nio afwa mala asiikhwa e Shamiri.
Enyuma we lifwa lia Dola, Yairi khukhwama e Kileati aba omwimeelesi owa Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kibili.
Aaba ne basoleeli bewe kamakhumi kataru ba bakeendelanga khu punda kamakhumi kataru. Babaana bano baba ne chingoba kamakhumi kataru mu sibala sia Kileati. Chingoba echo chisilaangwa bali birekere bia Yairi khukhwola luno.
Yairi afwa mala asiikhwa e Kamoni.
Lundi Baisiraeli bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kamamayaanu khulwe khukhwesaaya Babaali ne Baasitoreti, bawele be Basiria, Basidoni, Bamoabu, Baamoni ne Bafilisiti. Balekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala khusaaya niye tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambwa lirima ne Baisiraeli mala alekha Bafilisiti ne Baamoni babaula.
Khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na munaane chikholo echo chapia Baisiraeli boosi sibi babamenyanga mu sibala sie Baamoni ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani mu Kileati.
Baamoni bambukha Yoritani khu khuupana ne chikholo cha Yuda, Benjamini ne Efuraimu, mala Baisiraeli baba mu munaanio kumukali.
Nio Baisiraeli balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baloma bali, “Khwakholile bubwoni sikila khwakhulekha ewe Wele wefwe mala khwakholeele Babaali.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia babaandu ba Isiraeli ali, “Nga Bamisiri, Baamoni, Bafilisiti,
Basidoni, Baamaleki ne Bamoani bamunania chindaalo chichabira mala enywe mwandilila, se namuonia khukhwama khu nibo?
Nono luno mwandekhile ne khukholela bawele babaandi. Nono se ndikho nja khumuonia enywe lundi tawe.
Cha mulilile bawele nibo mwaroboore. Lekha nibo bamusikule enywe mu biise bie butinyu bwenywe.”
Babaandu ba Isiraeli baboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Efwe khwakholile bubwoni. Khola siosi siosi nisio wenya. Ne kakhali, nosiima endaalo yino khuonie.”
Nio barusiao bawele be chikholo chichiindi nibo baba nabo mala bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholela Isiraeli siisa nga ne ababona mu butinyu.
Nio banamae ba Amoni berekekha khucha mwiie, mala bebuusia mu Kileati. Babaandu ba Isiraeli bebuusia alala mala baapa ekambi e Misipa.
Ebweeneyo babemeelesi ba Isiraeli bareebana ne baloma bali, “Naanu olanyoa khu khuupana ne Baamoni? Omundu olanyoa, akhabe omwimeelesi owe babaandu boosi ba baamenya mu Kileati.”

Nio Yefuta aba omunamae omunyindaafu khukhwama e Kileati, ne kakhali aba omwana owo mukhasi omueeyani. Raraawe aba bali Kileati.
Omukhasi niye Kileati akhwa aba ne babaana babaandi basoleeli. Nga babaana abo ne bakhula, baoona Yefuta arura mungo. Baloma bali, “Ewe se olinyoolakho sisiindu siosi siosi khukhwama khu paapa wefwe tawe, sikila oli omwana owo mukhasi okundi.”
Yefuta elukha bawandaaye mala acha amenya mu sibala sia Tobu. Ebweeneyo anyoola babaandu be sipoli mala arakikha khukeenda ne nabo ne bakhola bunuuli.
Enyuma we siise Baamoni bacha bapana liie ne Baisiraeli.
Nga liie ne liabao basaakhulu ba Kileati bacha bakobosia Yefuta khukhwama mu maloba ka Tobu.
Bamulomela bali, “Yiicha obe komanda wefwe, nio khupane ne Baamoni.”
Ne kakhali Yefuta abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwambiila ese lukali, mwamboona narura munju eya paapa. Siina sikila ne mwicha luno khwise ne muli mu butinyu?”
Baboolela Yefuta bali, “Khwicha khwiwe luno sikila khwenya ewe oambaane ne nafwe, khuche mala khupane ne Baamoni mala wimeelele babaandu ba Kileati boosi.”
Yefuta aboolela basaakhulu ali, “Mwaaba ne mulikho mungobosia engo khu khuupana ne Baamoni mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola khwaula ndaba omwami khwinywe”
Bakobosia bali, “Khwafukiilile ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye omuloli wefwe.”
Nio Yefuta acha ne babemeelesi ba Kileati mala babaandu bamukhola aba omwami lundi komanda. Yefuta elamo kamakhuwa ke endakaano koosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, e Misipa.
Nio Yefuta aruma barumwa khu mwami owa Amoni ne aloma ali, “Ese nakhukholela siina, sikila ne wibwaakala sibala siefwe?”
Omwami owa Amoni aakobosia barumwa ba Yefuta ali, “Khulikho khupana sikila Baisiraeli nga ne bama e Misiri baamba kamaloba kase khukhwama khu Luuchi lwa Arinoni khukhwola khu Luuchi lwa Yaboki ne Luluuchi lwa Yoritani. Nono khukoboselie kamaloba kefwe mu muleembe.”
Yefuta aruma lundi barumwa khu mwami owa Amoni
ne aloma ali, “Isiraeli se yabukula kamaloba ka Moabu namwe ka Amoni tawe.
Ne kakhali nga Baisiraeli ne barura Misiri babirira mu sichiimi boola khu Nyanja eya Shamu mala boola Kadeshi.
Nono Isiraeli baruma barumwa khu mwami owa Edomu khumusaba kumunwa babire mu sibala siewe. Ne omwami owa Edomu se abafukiilila tawe. Lundi bareeba Omwami owa Moabu ne yesi se abafukiilila babire mu maloba kewe tawe. Nio Baisiraeli bamenya Kadeshi.
Nio bacha babirira mu sichiimi ne baloonda khu lwakha lwe sibala sia Edomu ne sie Moabu. Baisiraeli bacha bola ebukwe we sibala sia Moabu mala baapa ekambi lubeka lwe Luluuchi lwa Arinoni. Ne kakhali se bengila mu sibala sia Moabu tawe, sikila luluuchi lwa Arinoni nilwo lulwaba lulwakha lwe sibala sia Moabu.
Nio Baisiraeli baruma barumwa khu Sihoni, omwami we Baamori owe lukoba lwa Heshiboni, mala bamusaba babirire mu sibala siewe bache mu siabwe.
Ne kakhali Sihoni se afukiilila Baisiraeli khubirira mu sibala siewe tawe. Nio Sihoni areera banamae bewe boosi alala, mala bebuusiana e Yahasi, mala bapana ne Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli akhola Baisiraeli bakhila Sihoni ne banamae bewe. Nio kamaloba koosi kakabechanga ke Baamori kaba ke Baisiraeli.
Nio Baisiraeli baamba kamaloba ke Baamori khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Arinoni ebunafubo khukhwola Yaboki ebunaswa ne khukhwama e bukwe we sichiimi khukhwola khu Yoritani mumbo.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli niye owatimania Baamori sikila babaandu bewe, Baisiraeli.
Nono enywe mulola muli munyala mwatimania Baisiraeli barura mu maloba kano? Enywe bukula nisio wele wenywe Chemoshi abaelesia. Efwe khulabukula nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhuelesie efwe.
Wibaasia oli ewe oli omulayi khukhila Balaki okhwa Sipori, omwami owa Moabu? Aalomanakho namwe aapanakho ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ku?
Khulwe kimiiko chimia chitaru Baisiraeli bamenya Heshiboni ne Aroeri ne chingoba chichabotookhelela luluuchi lwa Arinoni choosi. Siina sikila ne mukhachibukula mwakobosia chingoba echo biise ebio bioosi?
Ese nono se nakhukholeelekho ewe kamamayaanu kosi kosi tawe. Ewe ne unjibwaakala aba olikho ukholela kamamayaanu. Wele akhoya aba omukhalaki luno akari we Baisiraeli ne Baamori.”
Ne kakhali omwami owa Amoni alekelesia burume khukhwama khu Yefuta.
Nio Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khu Yefuta acha abira mu Kileati ne Manase mala akobola e Misipa eya Kileati ola Amoni.
Yefuta echuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Waaba ne ukhola naula Baamoni,
khakhwoselie omundu yesi yesi nga siianwa, okhabe owe khunyoa khukhwama munju yase khukhwicha anjakanile, nga ne khabe ne ngobola ne khilile liie. Khaane omundu khwiwe nga embosio.”
Nio Yefuta ambukha akhupane ne Baamoni, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amua bukhili.
Abapa khukhwamila Aroeri khukhwola khu lukoongo luli siimbi Miniti, chingoba kamakhumi kabili choosi khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Abeli-keramimu. Beera bakali. Nono Baamoni bakhilwa ne Baisiraeli.
Nga Yefuta akobola engo e Misipa, omukhaana wewe aba owe khunyoa khukhwicha khumwakaanila, aba alikho akhina ne khusakasia bichenje. Aba omwana wewe omuteelwa.
Nga Yefuta ne amubona atabula chingubo chewe mu bubeeleli mala aloma ali, “Ee, mwana wase! Wakholile ese nabeele ne bubeeleli bukali sikila nechubile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne se enyala nalekha khukhola ndio tawe!”
Omukhaana aamuboolela ali, “Waaba ne wechuubile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khola nisio walomile oli okhakhole khwise, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukholile waruungisia bubi basiku bowo, Baamoni.”
Ne areeba raraawe ali, “Kholele sisiindu silala sino. Ndekhe mbe khulwe kimieesi kibili, nio enje ne basaale base ngenda keende mu bikulu mala ndile ne khubeelela khulwe nga ne ndi omukhaana we yabwana.”
Yefuta amulekha ache, khulwe kimieesi kibili. Niye ne basaale bewe baniina mu sikulu mala alila ne khubeelela sikila alikho acha khufwa ne asiili ne yabwana.
Enyuma we kimieesi kibili akobola khu raraawe akhola nisio aba ne echubile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala afwa ne asiili ne yabwana.
Khukhwamila ao kumwiima kwarakikha mu Isiraeli
bali bakhaana Baisiraeli bachichaanga buli mwiiko khulwe chindaalo chine khuliila sikila omukhaana owa Yefuta Omukileati.

Baefuraimu berekekha khukhapana liie, bambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani boola e Safoni mala baboolela Yefuta bali, “Siina sisiakilile ewe ne otuuma lulwakha wiche upane ne Baamoni mala khukhulaanga efwe khwacha ne nawe tawe? Khulakhwosela munju!”
Ne Yefuta abakobosia ali, “Ese ne babaandu base khwaba ne lilomana likali ne Baamoni. Namulaanga, mala se mweecha khukhunjeeta tawe.
Nga ne nabona se mulikho mwicha khukhunjeeta tawe, neaana bulamu bwase mala natuuma lulwakha khucha khu khuupana ne nabo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amba bukhili. Ne sina sikila luno ne mwicha khu khuupana ne nase?”
Nio Yefuta abuusia babaandu ba Kileati alala, bapana ne babaandu ba Efuraimu. Bakileati baula Baefuraimu. (Baefuraimu balaanga Bakileati bali, babelukhila mu Efuraimu ne Manase).
Bakileati baamba kamafubukho ka Yoritani. Nga Omuefuraimu yesi yesi owaba ne alikho elukha, Bakileati bamureebanga bali, “Ewe oli Omuefuraimu?” Kaaba bali aloma ali, “Tawe”
Bamuboolela alome ali, “Shiboleti” Ne naye aloma ali “Siboleti.” Sikila babaandu Baefuraimu se banyalanga khuloma likhuwa elio bulayi tawe. Nono liakila Bakileati ne babereera mu lifubukho lia Yoritani. Siise esio Baefuraimu chielefu kamakhumi kane ne chimia chibili beerwa.
Yefuta emeelela Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko sita. Afwa mala asiikhwa mu lukoba lwe mungo
Enyuma we lifwa lia Yefuta, Ibusani owe Betelehemu emeelela Isiraeli.
Aaba ne babaana be sisoleeli kamakhumi kataru nende be siikhaana kamakhumi kataru. Aakha bakhaana bewe khu baandu be enje bakhali be ekholo eyeewe tawe, lundi areera bakhaana kamakhumi kataru khukhwama enje we kholo yewe khu basoleeli bewe bakhwe babe bakhasi babwe. Ibusani emeelela Baisiraeli khulwe kimiiko saba.
Afwa mala asiikhwa e Betelehemu.
Enyuma we lifwa lia Ibusani, Eloni khukhwama mu kholo eya Sebuluni emeelela Baisiraeli khulwe kimiiko likhumi.
Nio afwa mala asiikhwa e Aiyaloni mu maloba ka Sebuluni.
Enyuma we lifwa lia Eloni, Abutoni okhwa Hileli khukhwama Pirationi emeelela Baisiraeli.
Aba ne basoleeli kamakhumi kane ne babechukhulu be sisoleeli kamakhumi kataru, babakeendelanga khu punda kamakhumi saba. Abutoni emeelela Baisiraeli khulwe kimiiko munaane.
Nio Abutoni afwa mala asiikhwa e Pirationi mu maloba ka Efuraimu mu sibala sie lukulu lwe Baamaleki.

Baisiraeli lundi bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kamamayaanu. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abalekhuulila Bafilisiti babamiia khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane.
Mu siise esio omundu abao lisina liewe bali Manoa, khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Sora. Aaba owe ekholo eya Dani. Omukhasi wewe aaba omukuumba.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela omukhasi wewe mala amuboolela ali, “Ewe oli omukuumba, ne olaesia mala osaale omwana omusoleeli.
Nono okhanywa endali namwe kamalwa namwe okhalia siakhulia sie kumusilo tawe.
Ne enyuma omusoleeli wowo ne asaaliilwe, se olimubekakho lichuune tawe, sikila khukhwama khu ndaalo eye lisaalwa liewe aliaanwa khu Wele nga Omunadhiri.
Nio omukhasi owa Manoa acha mala aboolela omuseecha wewe ali, “Omundu owa Wele ambonekheele. Abeele owe khurisia busa nga malaika owa Wele. Se mureebire niio amile tawe, lundi se amboleele lisina liewe tawe.
Ne kakhali amboleele ali, ndaesia mala saale omwana omusoleeli. Amboleele ali khanywakho endali namwe kamalwa, namwe nalia siosi siosi sisiakanisibwa tawe, sikila omwana yuno akhabe Omunadhiri khu Wele mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.”
Nio Manoa asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nosiima lekha omundu owa Wele niye ewe warumire, akobole lundi khwifwe mala akhwekesie efwe nisio khukhoyeele khukhola khu mwana olisaalwa.”
Wele akhola nga Manoa ne asaba, mala malaika owa Wele akobola lundi khu mukhasi owa Manoa nga aba ne ekhaale mu mukuunda. Omuseecha wewe se aba ne naye tawe.
Nio omukhasi atima acha amuboolela ali, “Lola! Omundu wechile endaalo eyo ambonekheele lundi.”
Manoa enyokha aloonda khu mukhasi wewe. Aacha khu mundu oyo mala amureeba ali, “Ewe niye omundu olomalomenge no mukhasi wase?”
Akobosia ali, “Yee.”
Nio, Manoa areeba ali, “Kamakhuwa kowo nga kakheche khukhwikholekha, siina nisio omwana oyo enyekhana akhole? Limenya siina nilio akhoyeela amenye?”
Malaika amukobosia ali, “Omukhasi wowo akhoya akhola buli siindu nisio muboolele.
Se akhoyeela alia siakhulia siosi siosi siing'oonwa khukhwama khu musabibu tawe, se akhoyeele anywe endali yosi yosi namwe kamalwa, namwe alie siakhulia siosi siosi sisiakaanisibwa tawe. Akhoya akhole buli siindu nisio namulaka.”
Manoa aaboolela malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Khukhusaaya nosiima yikhalakho akeekhe mala khukhwirire emeeme khu khung'oonele siakhulia.”
Ne malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia Manoa ali, “Akhaba ne unjingisia, se ndalia khu siakhulia siowo tawe. Ne kakhali ne okhola siianwa sie khukhwosia siaane khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” (Manoa aloma ario sikila se amanya ali oyo aba malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.)
Manoa areeba malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Khuboolele lisina liowo nio khukhue lukoosi kamakhuwa kowo ne kaliba ng'ali.”
Nio Manoa abukula emeeme ne siakhulia mala abianila khu alutare eye lulwanda khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okholanga ke kamakana.
Nga kumulilo ne kwaba ne kulikho kutirira khukhwama khu alutare, Manoa no mukhasi wewe babona malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alikho aniinila mu lumemu lwe kumulilo ne acha mwikulu. Manoa ne omukhasi wewe bekhupa asi.
Nio Manoa bamanya bali omundu oyo aaba malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se babonakho malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oyo lundi tawe.
Manoa aboolela omukhasi wewe ali, “Efwe ng'ali khulafwa sikila khwaboone Wele!”
Ne kakhali omukhasi wewe amukobosia ali, “Abaanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enyile khukhwiira efwe andi se afukiilile biianwa biefwe tawe. Andi se akhwekeesie efwe kano koosi namwe akhubooleela bibiindu nga ebio birio tawe.”
Mukha Manoa asaala omwana owe sisoleeli mala amutiuukha lisina ali, Samusoni. Omwana oyo achoa mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubiita chikhabi.
Ne Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arakikha khumuramo kamaani nga aaba ne ali Mahane-tani akari wa Sora ne Esitaoli mu Dani.

Endaalo ndala Samusoni ekha acha e Timuna abonayo omukhaana Omufilisiti.
Akobola engo mala aboolela paapa ne maawe ali, “Aliio omukhaana Omufilisiti emwalo e Timuna ousiimisie lukali. Cha munderere, nenya abe omukhasi wase.”
Paapa ne maawe bamureeba bali, “Siina sikila nocha mu Bafilisiti basiinde bano oenjemo omukhasi? Se onyala wanyoola omukhaana mu kholo yefwe tawe?”
Ne Samusoni aboolela raraawe ali, “Yuno niye kumwoyo kwase kwenya.”
Paapa ne maawe se bamanya bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owenya kano kakholekhe tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ayiimanga bubweyaangu bwe khukhwibwaakala Bafilisiti. (Mu siise sino Bafilisiti baba bamiia Baisiraeli.)
Nio Samusoni ekha acha e Timuna ne paapa ne maawe. Nga ne baba ne balikho babira mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu aulila etalang'i ne eulukhuma ne yiicha niio Samusoni aaba.
Abwene ne abwene Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khu Samusoni aaba ne kamaani mala atabulaka etalang'i mu bitonyi ne kamakhono busa nga otabulaka emeeme. Ne se aabakho ne sisiindu mukhono tawe. Mala se aboolela basaasi bewe nisio aba ne akholile tawe.
Nio acha mala akachula nomukhaana mala omukhaana amusiimisia.
Enyuma we chindaalo ngekhe, Samusoni akobolayo khucha khubukula omukhaana oyo abe omukhasi wewe. Oli bali khu lukeendo aukha arura khu ngila acha khulola etalang'i niyo eera, mala auka khubona sisusuuchu sie enjukhi yengisiemo ne bubuukhi buli mu talang'i eyafwa chana.
Ataula bubuukhi mu makhono akeenda ne alia. Nio acha niio paapa ne maawe baba mala abaelesia bubuukhi bubuundi. Babulia, ne Samusoni se ababoolela nio abwamiisie tawe.
Paapa owa Samusoni acha munju eyo mukhaana Omufilisiti oyo, mala Samusoni akholela babaandu naikara emboofu lukali khuloondekhana ne kumwiima kwe baele.
Nga Bafilisiti ne bamubona baruma basoleeli baele kamakhumi kataru bekhale ne naye.
Mala Samusoni ababoolela ali, “Khayo mupile kumunayi. Ne mwaba ne munyala mwamboolela nisio kuboola khulwe chindaalo saba cha naikara yino, aba ese ndamua enywe chingubo cha katani kamakhumi kataru ne chingubo cha naikara kamakhumi kataru.
Ne mwaba ne mukhanyala khukhumboolela nisio kuboola tawe, aba enywe mulamba ese chingubo cha katani kamakhumi kataru ne chingubo cha naikara kamakhumi kataru.” Mala bamukobosia bali, “Khuupile efwe kumunayi kwowo khukuulile.”
Samusoni aloma ali,
“Khukhwama mu esio siilia,
siamamo sie khulia.
Khukhwama mu esio sie kamaani,
siamamo sinulu.”
Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru baele abo se baba babuulile kumunayi okwo tawe.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khane
Nio mukha Samusoni acha khu Samusoni ne alikho alila mala aloma ali, “Ewe se wayisiima tawe! Wayimbiila! Ewe wapiile babaandu base kumunayi, ne se umboolela nisio kuboola ta!”
Samusoni amukobosia ali, “Lola, se naboolelakho akhaba paapa ne maayi tawe, siina sikila ekhuboolele ewe?”
Mukha Samusoni alila ario khu ndaalo saba cha naikara choosi. Ne khu ndaalo eya saba Samusoni amuboolela nisio kumunayi kuboola, sikila omukhasi amuyingiilila lukali. Nono mukha Samusoni abuulila Bafilisiti kumunayi.
Nio oli khu ndaalo ekhola saba Samusoni ne akhacha munju eye khukona
“Siina sinulu khukhila bubuukhi?
Siina sie kamaani khukhila etalang'i?”
Nio Samusoni ababoolela ali,
“Mubaanga se mulimiile emasoti yase endoro tawe
andi se mubuulile kumunayi kwase tawe.”
Abwene ne abwene Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwingilamo amua kamaani mala Samusoni ekha e Ashikeloni, erayo babaandu kamakhumi kataru, abafuula chingubo mala aelesia babaandu bababuula kumunayi chingubo cha katani chana. Enyuma wako akobola engo ne akhalaale lukali khu ka kekholekha.
Nio omukhasi owa Samusoni aebwa omundu owaba omukeesia wewe khu ndaalo eye siselelo.

Enyuma we siise Samusoni akeniia omukhasi wewe mu siise sie khukesa engaanu aamuyilila emeeme. Aaboolela paapa owo mukhasi wewe ali, “Nenya khubona omukhasi wase mu lusiro lwewe.”
Ne paapa owo omukhasi wewe se aamufukiilila engilemo tawe.
Aboolela Samusoni ali, “Ng'ali nebaasia ndi wamubiila, nio namuelesia omukeesia wowo. Ne kakhaba kario wandaaye wewe omukeekhe ali ne lukoondo lulayi khukhilakho omukhulu. Onyala wamubukula mu bweyaangu bwo oyo?”
Samusoni aloma ali, “Siise sino se ndabiiywakho khu nisio ndakhola Bafilisiti tawe!”
Nio Samusoni acha mala aamba chinjusi chimia chitaru. Aamba chibili chibili achiboa kimikhiinga kiacho alala mala aboelela enjaso khu lifundikho lie kimikhiinga ekio.
Aambia chinjaso mala alekhuula chinjusi echo chengila mu sambu che Bafilisiti che engaanu. Mu ngila yino osia engaanu niyo baaba ne bakesile, akhaba ne neeyo eyaba ne siili mu mikuunda kie kimiseituni kiosi.
Nga Bafilisiti bareeba owaba ne akholile kano, baboolelwa bali aaba Samusoni sikila paapa owo omukhasi wewe, omundu owa Timuna aba aelesie omukeesia owa Samusoni omukhasi owa Samusoni. Nio Bafilisiti bacha bosia omukhasi
Samusoni aboolela Bafilisiti ali, “Sikila mwakholile murio, nja khumuruungia.”
Abebwaakala mala eera bakali, mala acha amenya mu lubangaachi lwe libina e Edamu.
Bafilisiti becha baapa ekambi mu Yuda mala bebwaakala lukoba lwa Lehi.
Babaandu ba Yuda babareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne mukhuseera?”
Bafilisiti babakobosia bali, “Khwichile khuamba Samusoni mala khumukholele nga niye yesi ne aakhukholele efwe.”
Nio babaandu ba Yuda chielefu chitaru bacha sie bina mu lubangaachi e Etamu mala baboolela Samusoni bali, “Ewe se omanyile oli Bafilisiti nibo bakhwamiia efwe tawe? Nono okhukholeele efwe siina sino?” Samusoni abakobosia ali, “Mbakholeele niko baakholela.”
Baboolela Samusoni bali, “Efwe khwechile khukhuboe nio khuche khukhwakaanisie khu Bafilisiti.”
Samusoni aboola ali, “Suubisie muli enywe mwabeene se mulanjira tawe.”
Baloma bali, “Tawe, efwe khulakhuboa busa mala khukhwakaanisie khu Bafilisiti. Se khukhwira tawe.” Nio bamuboa ne kimikoye kibili mala bamurusia mu libina.
Nga ne oola e Lehi, Bafilisiti becha chimbilo niio ali, bamuyokelela. Abwene ne abwene Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwichakho ne kamaani, mala Samusoni akitula kimikoye kikiaba khu makhono kewe, nga luusi luaambile kumulilo.
Samusoni ayuula sikuumba sie lunyaanyilo lwe punda eyaba ne efwiile busa embi ari. Ne sikuumba esio eera babaandu eelefu ndala.
Nio Samusoni emba ali,
“Ne sikuumba sie lunyaanyilo lwe punda,
nabuusia bipupu ne bipupu
ne sikuumba sie lusaya lwe punda
neera babaandu eelefu.”
Nga amala khuloma ario amwaata eyo sikuumba sie lunyaanyilo lwe epunda olwo. Abuundu niio kano kekholekhela alaangwa bali Ramati-lehi
Nio Samusoni aulila bulesia bukali, asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma ali, “Ewe niwe oumbeele ese, omukholi wowo bukhili bukali buno. Nono fwe sikila bulesia? Ndiilwe ne Bafilisiti basiinde bano?”
Wele ara abuundu enuma e Lehi eyo, mala kameechi katubukha. Samusoni anywa mala eulila bulayi. Nio esebele eyo akilaanga lisina ali, Eni-hakore
Samusoni emeelela Baisiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili mu ndaalo che Bafilisiti.

Endaalo ndala Samusoni acha mu lukoba lwa Kasa mala anyoolayo omukhasi omueeyani mala akona naye.
Babaandu ba Kasa baboolelwa bali Samusoni ali mu lukoba lwabwe. Nio babotookhelela abuundu ao mala bamwekhinila a silibwa sie lukoba siilo siosi. Basila chi ne bamonyana busa bali, “Khulinde khukhwola nga bulasia makhelebeende mala khumwire.”
Ne kakhali Samusoni akona khu sitaanda khukhwola mu silo akari, mala enyokha aamba kumuliango kwe silibwa sie lukoba ne kamatooche mala abisuta mungaaki abira khu mabeka kewe. Abisuta abioosia khu ngaaki khwe lukulu lulwaloleelela lukoba lwa Heburoni.
Enyuma wa kano Samusoni asiima omukhasi lisina bali Delila, owamenyanga mu litooma lia Soreki.
Babaami be Bafilisiti bacha khu Delila mala bamuboolela bali, “Reka Samusoni mala omanye sikila ne ali ne kamaani kamakali ne engila niyo khunyala khwamukhayilamo kamaani mala khwamuboa, khwamukhila. Ne buli mulala khwifwe alakhua bitonyi bie fwesa chimia ekhumi na ndala.”
Nio Delila aboolela Samusoni ali, “Nosiima mbolele siikhukholanga ne oba ne kamaani kamakali po orio. Omundu ne enya khukhuboa mala akhuminye kamaani, anyala akhola ariena?”
Samusoni amukobosia ali, “Baaba ne bamboela chisia che buyiingo chimbia saba chikhali chinyomu tawe, ndaba omutekhele nga omundu yesi yesi okundi.”
Nio babaami Bafilisiti barerera Delila chisia che buyiingo chimbia saba chikhali chinyomu tawe, mala aboela Samusoni.
Delila aaba ne babaandu baliindile mu lusiro lwe mukari. Aboolela Samusoni ali, “Samusoni! Bafilisiti balikho beecha!” Ne Samusoni akitulaka chisia che luyiingo nga luusi ne lukitukhanga ne luaambile kumulilo. Nio bung'ali bwe kamaani kewe khumanyikhana tawe.
Delila aboolela Samusoni ali, “Lola ewe olakholanga ese omusilu, mala se olamboolelanga bung'ali tawe. Nosiima mboolele nga omundu anyala akhuboa ewe.”
Samusoni aloma ali, “Kaaba bali bamboa kimikoye kimiya nikio bakhaboelakho sisiindu tawe, nyala naba omutekhele nga omundu okundi yesi yesi.”
Nio Delila abukula kimikoye kimiya amuboa mala aloma ali, “Samusoni! Bafilisiti balikho beecha!” Babaandu baba baliindiilile mu lusiro lwe mukari. Nio akitula kimikoye kiarura khu makhono kewe nga luusi.
Delila aboolela Samusoni ali, “Ewe osiikhola busa ese omusilu mala se olikho umboolela bung'ali tawe. Mboolele nga omundu ne anyala akhuboa.”
Samusoni aloma ali, “Waaba ne osuuka bituuta saba bie lichuune liase mala obiboe alala mala oliboe khu sichaangi ndaba omutekhele busa nga omundu yesi yesi okundi.”
Nga Samusoni aaba ne akona Delila abukula bituuta saba bie lichuune liewe, abiruka biaba kumukoye abiboa khu sichaangi, mala aloma ali, “Samusoni! Bafilisiti balikho beecha!” Enyokha akhweesa akhuula sichaangi, kumukoye kwe lichuune kwachunukha.
Nio Delila aloma ali, “Onyala waloma oriena oli wasiima, mala kumwoyo kwowo se kuli khwise tawe? Ewe wakholile ese omusilu khukhwola khataru mala se wambooleele siikhukholaanga noba ne kamaani tawe.”
Delila nga achiililila khumureeberesia buli ndaalo, Samusoni aluilila.
Mala ekhumaliilikha Samusoni aboolela Delila bung'ali ali, “Lichuune liase likhaabekwakho ne lubeko tawe. Ese naanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga omunadhiri
Nga Delila ne amanya ali amuboleele bung'ali arumania likhuwa khu baami Bafilisiti ne aloma ali, “Kobola lundi lulala luno. Amboleele bung'ali.” Nio beecha, mala bareera ne chirupia.
Delila aoleelesia Samusoni khu bikele biewe akona liilo. Nio Delila alanga omundu mala aabeka
Nono Delila ayokela ali, “Samusoni! Bafilisiti balikho beecha!” Samusoni enyokha khukhwama mwiilo ebaasia ali, “Ndenyokha mala ndekukhe mu bulekhuule nga kholanga busiele.” Se amanya ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulekhile tawe.
Bafilisiti bamuaamba mala bamufutula chimoni. Bamuyila e Kasa bamuboa khu minyololo kie kumukasa mala bamura khu milimo kie khusia nali mu siboe.
Ne kakhali lichuune liewe liarakikha khumela lundi.
Babaami be Bafilisiti bebuusia alala khukhwekhoya ne khukhola kumulukha khu wele wabwe Dakoni. Bemba bali, “Wele wefwe akhukholile khwatiila omusiku wefwe Samusoni!”
Nga babaandu ne babona Samusoni, bemba khufumia wele wabwe bali,
“Wele akhueele bukhili khu musiku wefwe,
omusiku owonaka sibala siefwe,
ne khukhwira babaandu befwe bakali.”
Nga babaandu baba ne bekhoya baloma bali, laanga Samusoni eeche akhusangaasie.
Samusoni aboolela omusoleeli owaba ne amuraangirire khulwe khumutiila kumukhono ali, “Lekha niaambe khu njeko chichatiila enju. Nenya netiilekho.”
Enju yaba yechuule babaandu baseecha ne bakhasi. Babaami boosi be Bafilisiti babamo. Baseecha chielefu chitaru ne bakhasi baba khu ngaaki khwe enju baloleleele Samusoni nga aba ne asangaasia baandu.
Nio Samusoni aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ee, Omwami WELE, nosiima khebulile, nosiima mbe kamaani luno lwong'ene lundi, nio nyale khuruungia Bafilisiti bano khulwe khufutula chimoni chase chombi.”
Samusoni eamba khu njeko chibili che akari chichatiila enju. Eamba kumukhono mulala buli khu njeko.
Nio Samusoni aloma ali, “Lekha ese efwe ne Bafilisiti!” Nio asindikha ne kamaani kewe koosi mala enju yakwa khu baami be Bafilisiti nende buli mundu. Samusoni eera babaandu bakali mu lifwa liewe khukhila nibo eera ne asiili omulamu.
Nio bawandaaye nende be enju eya Samusoni bekha becha bamubukula mala bamusiikha akari wa Sora ne Esitaoli mu siliindwa sia Manoa, raraawe. Samusoni aba omwimeelesi owe Baisiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili.

Abao omundu lisina liewe bali Mika. Amenyanga mu sibala sie lukulu lwa Efuraimu.
Aboolela maawe ali, “Ese ndi nende elefu ne emia ndala che fwesa eyeebwa. Nauliile ne olaama omwifwi. Ese niye owabukula.”
Maayi wewe aloma ali, “Mwana wase, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhubiite chikhabi.”
Nio akoboselia maawe chirupia echo. Maawe aloma ali, “Khukhwimia silaamo mwana wase, siikhakhubakho tawe, ese samwene naanile efwesa yino khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Chilarumikhirwa khubeecha sifwaani sie khukhwisaaya mala sifunikhwe ne efwesa. Nio luno ndakhukoboselia ewe bitonyi bie fwesa.”
Nga akoboselia maawe, maawe abukula bitonyi chimia chibili bie efwesa abielesia omubasi owang'oona sifwaani sie khusaaya, mala siareebwa munju mwa Mika.
Ne Mika aba ne abuundu wewe e khukhwisaaya wele. Akhola bifwaanane ne Efodi
Se abao omwami mu Isiraeli mu ndaalo echo tawe; buli omundu akholanga siosi siosi nisio enya.
Siise esio aabao omusoleeli Omulawi owamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Betelehemu mu Yuda.
Aarekukha aarura e Betelehemu acha ayiima abuundu aandi amenyeyo. Nga aba ne ali khu lukeendo, ola khunju eya Mika mu sibala sie lukulu sia Efuraimu.
Mika amureeba ali, “Waama waena?”
Amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi omulawi khukhwama e Betelehemu lwe Buyuda. Ndikho mbiima abuundu e khumenya.”
Mika amuboolela ali, “Menya ne nase. Ba omukambisi wase lundi omusaayi wase, mala ndakhua bitonyi bie efwesa buli kumwiiko, chingubo ne siakhulia siowo.” Nio omulawi acha.
Omulawi omuele oyo afukiilila khumenya ne Mika mala aba nga omwana wewe
Mika amurobora abe omusaayi wewe, mala amenya mungo mwa Mika.
Mika aloma ali, “Luno namanyile ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khukhola bibiindu bibe bilayi khwise sikila ndi no omusaayi ooli omulawi.”

Mu ndaalo echo se abao omwami mu sibala sie Baisiraeli tawe. Mala mu ndaalo ng'ene echo ekholo eya Dani yayimaanga kamaloba emenyemo sikila se baba banyoola kamaloba kabwe kosi kosi mu kholo cha Isiraeli tawe.
Nio babaandu ba Dani barobora babaandu baraano be kamaani khukhwama mu kholo chabwe choosi mala babaruma mu ngoba cha Sora ne Esitaoli balambuule sibala mala basiyoote. Bababoolela bali, “Cha mulambuule sibala.” Nga bola mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu, bakona munju eya Mika.
Nga ne baba mwa Mika, bamanya lilomaloma lio omulawi omuele oyo. Bamureeba bali, “Naanu owakhureera ano? Ewe olikho okhola siina ano? Kimilimo kiowo kili siina?”
Ababoolela ali, “Khwauliilisiana ne Mika, anduunge khu mukholela nga omusaayi wewe.”
Baboolela Omusaayi oyo bali, “Nosiima reeba Wele khwaba ne khulikho khucha khunyoola bulayi khu lukeendo lwefwe.”
Omusaayi ababoolela ali, “Cha mu muleembe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhoyeele lukeendo luno.”
Nio babaandu baraano abo barekukha bacha boola khu lukoba lwa Laishi. Babona babaandu be mu bwene omwo. Baba ne bamenya mu buliindi bulayi nga Basidoni. Babona bali babaandu ba Laishi baba be kumuleembe, babasila busa; se benana bali banyala bebwaakalwa tawe. Baba ne bibiindu bioosi nibio benya. Bamenyanga aleeyi khukhwama khu Basidoni ne se baba ne sisiindu siosi siosi nisio bakholanga ne babaandu babaandi bosi bosi tawe.
Nga babaandu baraano abo bakobola e Sora ne Esitaoli, balebe babwe babareeba bali, “Muboone muriena sibala esio?”
Bakobosia bali, “Khwaboone sibala esio, mala sili silayi lukali. Khuche khusibwaakale. Mukhela busa ano ne mukhali nende nisio mukhola tawe! Khola khangu, khuche mala khutiile kamaloba!
Nga ne mucha, mulanyoola babaandu bakhebasiangakho bali banyala bebwaakalwa tawe. Kamaloba kali kamakali kaali nende buli sisiindu. Wele akhueele efwe kamaloba kano.”
Nio babaandu chimia sita khukhwama mu kholo eya Dani barura e Sora ne Esitaoli ne bakangile bulwaani bwe liie.
Bacha baapa ekambi mu lukoba lwa Kiriati-Yearimu mu Yuda. Sisiene esio nisio sisiakila abuundu ao ne asilaangwa ali e Mahane-tani. Lukoba luno luli lubeka lwe Mumbo mwa Kiriati-Yearimu.
Bachiililila khukhwama abwenao mala bola khu nju eya Mika mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu.
Nio babaandu baraano abo ba baaba ne bacha khupelelesia sibala sisiaba siimbi Laishi, baboolela balebe babwe bali, “Mumanyile muli ndala khu chinju chino elimo efodi sifwaani sie khukhwisaaya sisiaakhwakho efwesa ne sifwaani sisiabeechwa. Mukhoya mwakanakana nisio mulakhola.”
Bengila munju eya Mika, niio omulawi omuele amenyanga mala bareeba Omulawi oyo nga ne achiililila.
Babaandu ba Dani chimia sita ba baba ne bakangile bulwaani bwe liie baba bemile e silibwa.
Bayooti baraano abo bengila munju mala babukula sifwaani sisiabeechwa khu murongooro sisiaakhwakho efwesa, ne efodi. Omusaayi aaba ali e silibwa ne banamae bakangiile bulwaani.
Nga babaandu abo baacha bengila munju mwa Mika mala babukula bibiindu bitakatifu ebio, omusaayi abareeba ali, “Mulikho mukhola siina?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Sila okhalomakho likhuwa tawe. Yiicha oche ne nafwe mala obe omusaayi lundi omukambisi wefwe. Buli bulayi obe omusaayi khu kholo yoosi eye Baisiraeli namwe obe omusaayi owe enju eyo omundu mulala?”
Lino liasangaasia omusaayi nio abukula bibiindu bitakatifu mala arekukha ne nabo.
Nio barekukha ne barangiisie babaana babwe, chikhaafu chabwe, ne bibiindu biabwe.
Baba bachile aleeyikho khukhwama khu nju eya Mika, nio babaandu ba baamenya siimbi ne Mika babaloondakho bapane. Banyoola Batani
mala babayokelela. Babaandu ba Dani bakobola mala bareeba Mika bali, “Makhuwa siina? Sipupu sino sioosi sia siina?”
Mika abakobosia ali, “Mwabukuule omusaayi wase ne bawele base nibo nakhola mwarekuukhe ne nabo mala mulikho mundeeba muli makhuwa sina? Siina nisio mundekhile nasio?”
Babaandu ba Dani bamuboolela bali, “Bwakhabeele bulayi ewe olekhe khulomakho likhuwa liosi liosi tawe; busa babaandu bano bakhola bario baambwa lirima mala bakhuseera, ewe nende be enju yowo boosi baafwa.”
Nio, babaandu ba Dani bachiililila ne lukeendo lwabwe. Mika aabona ali bali ne kamaani khumukhila niye, mala akobola engo.
Enyuma we babaandu ba Dani khu bukula omusaayi ne bibiindu nibio Mika aba ne akhola, bacha mala bebwaakala Laishi. Lukoba luno lwaba lwe kumuleembe lundi lwe babaandu bakhebasiangakho bali banyala bebwaakalwa tawe. Babaandu ba Dani beera ba baamenya mu lukoba olwo mala balwosia.
Se baba nende obaabina tawe, sikila Laishi lwaba aleeyi khukhwama e Sidoni mala se baba ne likhuwa liosi liosi ne babaandu babaandi tawe. Lukoba lwa Laishi lwaba mwitooma lia Beti-rehobu. Babaandu ba Dani bombakha lundi lukoba lwa Laishi mala bamenyamo.
Bakaluukhasia lisina lialwo liliaba Laishi liaba Dani, lisina lia kuuka wabwe Dani, okhwa Yakobo.
Babaandu ba Dani baarao sifwaani sisiabeechwa nisio basaaya mala Yonasani okhwa Kerishomu omwichukhulu owa Musa aba omusaayi khulwe Badani. Be lisaaye lia Kerishomu bakhola nga basaayi be kholo ya Dani nabwila babaandu ne babukulwa bayilwa mu mbaambe.
Sifwaani sie khukhwisaaya sia Mika siaramayo siise sioosi nisio Liiema nilio basaayilangamo Wele liaba e Shilo.

Mu ndaalo echo Isiraeli ne ekhaba no mwami tawe abao omulawi owaba omukwa mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Aabukula omukhaana khukhwama e Betelehemu mu Yuda abe omukhasi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale.
Omukhasi oyo aaloba omulawi oyo mala aakobola munju eya raraawe e Betelehemu, amenyayo kimieesi kine.
Nio omuseecha wewe amuloondakho khu musaaya akobole naye. Omundu oyo acha ne omukholi wewe ne chipunda chibili. Eecha munju eya paapa owo mukhasi wewe ne nga paapa owo mukhaana oyo ne abona omulawi oyo, amwakaanila ne busangaafu.
Paapa owo mukhaana oyo amusaba abeekhoo khu siise mala abao khu ndaalo chitaru. Nio ne balia, ne banywa ne khukonayo.
Kumutikhinyi kwe ndaalo ekhola khane benyokha makhelebeende mala berekekha khurekukha bache. Ne kakhali paapa owo mukhaana aboolela omulawi oyo ali, “Liakho sisiindu nio muche.”
Nio lundi babaandu babili abo, paapa owo mukhaana no mulawi, bekhala asi mala balia, banywa alala. Nio paapa owo mukhaana aboolela mulawi ali, “Nosiima kona eno mala kumwoyo kwowo kusangaale.”
Omulawi enyokha ali arekukhe, mala paapa owo omukhasi amusaba akone. Nio akonayo siilo sisiindi.
Endaalo ekhola kharaano, Omulawi enyokha kumutikhinyi makhelebeende ali arekukhe, ne kakhali paapa owo omukhaana aloma ali, “Nosiima liakho sisiindu mala oliinde khukhwola ekolooba.” Nio babaandu babili abo, paapa owo mukhaana ne omulawi baliila alala.
Nga omundu oyo no mukhasi wewe no mukholi berekekha khurekukha, paapa owo mukhaana aboolela omulawi ali, “Lola, bwelabuule, nosiima kona lundi silo sino. Sisiilima silikho siamba, kona ano mala ouluukhe. Kumutikhinyi onyala wenyokha makhelebeende oche engo.”
Ne kakhali omulawi oyo se enya khukonayo siilo sisiindi tawe, nio niye no mukhasi wewe barakikha lukeendo lwabwe. Baba ne chipunda chibili ne chilikho khale bibiindu bie khwikhala kho mu mikoongo kiacho.
Yaba oli ekolooba enje ne elikho etiimba, bola siimbi e Yebusi (nilwo lukoba lwa Yerusalemu). Nio omukholi aaboolela omwami wewe ali, “Lekha khwingile mu lukoba luno lwe Bayebusi mala khukonemo silo sino.”
Ne kakhali omwami wewe aloma ali, “Se khulikho khucha khwima khwingile mu lukoba lwe bareende, babaandu bakhali Baisiraeli tawe. Khulabira khwole Kibea.”
Nio aaboolela omukholi wewe ali, “Yiicha khubire mala khuchekho ebweeni nio khukonele e Kibea namwe Rama.”
Nio babira e Yebusi mala bachiililila ne lukeendo lwabwe. Enyanga beele yakwile nga boola Kibea mu sibala sie ekholo eya Babenjamini.
Baacha bakone mu lukoba omwo siilo esio. Bacha mu lukoba mala bekhala akari we lukoba sikila se abao omundu yesi yesi owababukula bache bakone munju mwewe tawe.
Nga ne baba abwenao omusaakhulu echa niio bali khukhwama khu milimo kiewe mu mukuunda. Omusaakhulu yuno ama mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu, aaba omukwa mu Kibea. (Babaandu be abwenao baba be ekholo eya Benjamini.)
Omusaakhulu oyo aabona omukeni akari we lukoba mala amureeba ali, “Ewe wama waena? Ne olikho ocha waena?”
Omulawi amukobosia ali, “Khwama e Betelehemu mu Yuda. Khuli khu lukeendo lwefwe khucha engo
Mbao omundu oumbukuule nje ngone munju mwewe tawe. Khuli ne siakhulia ne bunyaasi bwe chipunda, kumukaati ne endali bio mukhasi wase ne nase ne omukholi wase yesi. Khuli nende buli siindu nisio khwenya.”
Omusaakhulu oyo aloma ali, “Ese namwakaaniile mukone mungo mwase! Ndamuliinda, mukhakona enje mu lukoba tawe.”
Nio abayila mu mwewe, mala aliisia chipunda chabwe. Bakeni bewe besiinga bikele mala balia ne khuunywa.
Omusaakhulu oyo arura enje mala ababoolela ali, “Balebe base, ne musiima mukhakhola sisiindu sie sifwaabi nga esio sirio tawe! Omundu yuno ali omukeni wase.
Lola, khuli ano no mukhasi wewe niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale, no mukhaana wase owe yabwana. Khe mbarusie enje, mala munyala mwakona nabo, mu bakhole nisio mwenya. Ne kakhali mukhakhola sisiindu sibi lukali sirio khu mundu yuno tawe!”
Ne babaandu abo se bamurekeeresia tawe. Nio omulawi oyo abukula omukhasi wewe chana mala abarusia enje. Baakwa khu mukhasi oyo siilo sioosi nabwila nga bwasia.
Oli bulikho busia omukhasi oyo echa, mala akwa amuliango we enju eyo musaakhulu oyo, niio omuseecha wewe aaba nali. Omukhasi oyo aaba amuliango ao khukhwola nga enje ne yabaayukha.
Omuseecha wewe enyokha kumutikhinyi mala nga ne ekula kumuliango, narakikhe lukeendo lwewe, anyoola omukhasi wewe alambaliile ebweeni we nju, mala aakolosiisie kamakhono khukhwola khu muliango.
Amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha khuche.” Ne se amukobosia tawe. Nio aara kumubili khu punda, mala arakikha lukeendo lwewe lwe khucha engo.
Nga ne ola engo, engila munju mwewe aabukula kumubano mala akhalamo omukhasi wewe omufu oyo, bitonyi likhumi ne bibili. Ayila bitonyi bino mu kholo yoosi eya Isiraeli.
Buli mundu owabonakho sitonyi esio aloma ali, “Sisiindu nga sino siri, sikhakholekhakho namwe siabonekhakho khukhwama nga Baisiraeli barekukha barura e Misiri tawe! Khukhoya khukholekho sisiindu khu lino! Silaba silala sina?”

Nio Baisiraeli boosi khukhwama a Dani lubeka lwe ebunaswa khukhwola e Beerisheba lubeka lwe ebunafubo, ne akhaba khukhwama mu sibala sia Kileati lubeka lwe bukwe, bafukiilila kumulaango. Bebuusia alala boosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Misipa.
Babemeelesi be chikholo che Baisiraeli choosi babao mu khubuusiana alala khwe babaandu ba Wele. Babao banamae bakeenda busa khu bikele chielefu chimia chine.
Mu siise esio babaandu Babenjamini baulila bali Baisiraeli boosi bebuusiisie e Misipa.
Baisiraeli bareeba bali, “Khuboolele kamamayaanu kano kakholekhe kariena?”
Omulawi, omwene mukhasi niye beera akobosia ali, “Ese no mukhasi wase khwacha e Kibea mu sibala sie ekholo eya Benjamini khukonayo.
