Babaandu be Kibea becha khukhuseera. Mu silo babotookhelela enju. Benya khu khunjira ese, ne kakhali bakwa khu mukhasi wase siilo sioosi mala afwa.
Nabukula omufu namutonyatonyamo bitonyi, mala nayila sitonyi buli mu kholo ndala eya Isiraeli: Babaandu bano bakholile sikholwa simayaanu sie sifwaabi mu Isiraeli.
Enywe mwesi Baisiraeli muli ano, mukholakho siina khu lino?”
Babaandu boosi bema alala mala baloma bali, “Se aliio mulala khwifwe olacha engo tawe.
Lino nilio khulakhola: Khulapa chikura mala khurobore babaandu bebwaakale Kibea
Khakhubukule babaandu batiiti khukhwama mu buli ekholo eye Baisiraeli barusie siakhulia khu banamae ne babaandi bache mala baruunge Kibea
Nio Baisiraeli boosi bebuusia alala ne sifuno silala, khukhwibwaakala lukoba lwa Kibea.
Baisiraeli baruma babaandu mu lukoongo lwe ekholo eya Benjamini lwosi balome bali, “Enywe mwakholile sifwaabi sina sino?
Nono rusia bamayaanu abo mu Kibea efwe khubeere, mala khurusie mu Isiraeli bumayaanu buno.” Ne kakhali babaandu ba Benjamini balekelesia Baisiraeli basiaabwe.
Babaandu bama mu ngoba cha Benjamini chosi becha e Kibea khu khuupana ne Baisiraeli babaandi.
Babaandu ba Benjamini balaanga banamae endaalo eyo chielefu kamakhumi kabili, ne chielefu sita khukhwama mu ngoba chabwe.
Alala ne nabo, babaandu ba Kibea babuusia baseecha chimia saba ba baaba be kumukoota. Buli mulala khu nibo aba anyala achukucha libaale liacha liapa omundu niye enyile omwene.
Ekholo eya Benjamini ne ekhalikho tawe, Baisiraeli bebuusia alala chielefu chimia chine che banamae babamanya khu khupana liie.
Baisiraeli bacha abuundu we khukhwisaaya e Beteli mala ebweeneyo bareeba Wele bali, “Kholo sina elanyoa yibwaakale babaandu ba Benjamini?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Ekholo eya Yuda.”
Nio Baisiraeli barakikha lukeendo kumutikhinyi endaalo eloondakho mala baapa ekambi siimbi ne lukoba lwa Kibea.
Baacha khukhwibwaakala banamae Babenjamini mala bemisia banamae baloleelela mu lukoba.
Banamae Babenjamini barura mu lukoba lwa Kibea beera banamae Baisiraeli chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chielefu chibili endaalo ng'eneyo.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli bachuubana banyoola kamaani mala lundi bema berekekha khu liie abuundu ao ne abwene niio baba endaalo eye khunyoa.
Baisiraeli baacha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bekhalayo balila khukhwola ekolooba mala basaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Lundi khuche mwiie khupane ne bawandaayefwe Babenjamini?” Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Cha mupane ne nabo.”
Nio Banamae ba Isiraeli bacha khu banamae ba Benjamini lukhola khabili.
Babenjamini boosi barura mu Kibea lukhola khabili, mala siise sino beera banamae be Baisiraeli chielefu ekhumi ne munaane.
Nio babaandu Baisiraeli bacha e Beteli mala balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se balia siakhulia tawe khukhwola ekolooba. Baana biianwa bie khuosia nende bie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio basaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi (Mu ndaalo echo Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liaba ebweeneyo.
Ne Fineasi okhwa Eliesa, Eliesa okhwa Aruni akholanga ebweeni walio mu ndaalo echo). Baloma bali, “Khuche lundi mwiie khupane ne bawandaayefwe, Babenjamini, namwe khulekhe?” Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Cha sikila kumutikhinyi khamukhole enywe mu bakhaye.”
Nio Baisiraeli banamae babotookhelela mu bwikisi Kibea.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, Baisiraeli bacha khu khupana ne ba Benjamini. Berekekha a Kibea nga bakholanga buli siise.
Babenjamini barura bapane mu lukoba, nga bakholanga, barakikha khukhwirira Baisiraeli balala khu muyila kucha e Beteli ne khu muyila kucha e Kibea. Beera embi Baisiraeli kamakhumi kataru.
Babenjamini baloma bali, “Khulakhaya busa nga ne khwabakhayile.” Ne kakhali Baisiraeli baloma bali, “Lekha khwilukhe mala bakhuloondekho khubarusie mu lukoba bache khu muyila.”
Nio nga banamae be Baisiraeli besendekhelela enyuma mala beema a Baalitamari, Baisiraeli ba baaba ne bekisile barura khaangu khukhwama mumbo mwa Keba.
Baisiraeli chielefu ekhumi, babaroborwa khukhwama mu Isiraeli yosi bebwaakala Kibea mala liie liaba litinyu. Babenjamini se bamanya ne bali siimbi khubunisibwa tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Isiraeli yakhaya banamae be Babenjamini. Baisiraeli beera basiku babwe chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chielefu chiraano, ne mia ndala, endaalo eyo.
Mala Babenjamini bamanya bali bakhiliilwe.
Banamae be Baisiraeli beela enyuma khukhwama khu Babenjamini sikila baba beyikiine babaandu babekisa babotookhelela mu bwikisi Kibea.
Baisiraeli babekisa batimaka khangu bacha e Kibea, mala beerayo buli mundu.
Banamae be Baisiraeli ne babaandu babebuulila baba barao simanyisio. Simanyisio siaba liliisi ne lilikho liniina mu ngaaki khukhwama mu lukoba.
Baisiraeli ba baaba mwiie bakobola nga baboona liliisi. Khulwe siise sino Babenjamini baba beerire khale Baisiraeli kamakhumi kataru. Bebaasia bali babakhayile busa nga mataayi.
Nio, simanyisio sie liliisi siabonekha ne lirakikha khuniina mu ngaaki khukhwama mu lukoba. Babenjamini balola enyuma wabwe, mala barangararwa khubona lukoba lwosi lulikho luya.
Nio Baisiraeli bakobola mala Babenjamini baayaaya lukali sikila bamanya bali, bali siimbi khubuna.
Bakobola enyuma khukhwama khu Baisiraeli, mala belukha ne bacha engila echa mu sichiimi. Ne kakhali baambilwa akari kari we banamae Baisiraeli ba baaba luno ne balikho bama mu lukoba
Baisiraeli beera omusiku wabwe. Babatimania mala bababunisila a Noha lubeka lwe ebukwe owa Kibea.
Banamae be Babenjamini chielefu ekhumi ne chielefu munaane beerwa.
Banamae babaandi belukha bacha lubeka lwe musichiimi bola khu lwanda lwa Rimoni. Khu nibo chielefu chiraano cheererwa khu miila. Baisiraeli bachiililila khutimania baramire boola e Kitomu, babeera chielefu chibili.
Nio Babenjamini babeerwa endaalo eyo boosi alala baba chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chiraano. Baba boosi banamae banyindaafu.
Ne kakhali Babenjamini chimia sita banyala khukhwilukha bekhupa mu sichiimi bola e Lwanda lwa Rimoni mala bamenyayo khulwe kimieesi kine.
Baisiraeli bakobola khu Babenjamini ba baaba ne baramire mala beera babaandu boosi, bakhasi ne babaana ne bibiaayo bioosi. Boosia buli lukoba luliyo.

Nga Baisiraeli ne baba ne bebuusiisie e Misipa, bechuba lukali bali, “Se alio mulala khwifwe olifukiilila Omubenjamini akhwe omukhaana khukhwama mwifwe abe omukhasi wewe tawe.”
Nio, Baisiraeli bacha mu lukoba lwa Beteli mala bekhala ebweeni wa Wele khukhwola ekolooba. Balila mu bubeeleli bukali.
Baloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, siina sikila lino ne liekholekhe? Siina sikila ekholo eya Benjamini ne eli siimbi khuela mu Isiraeli?”
Makhelebeende, nga ne bwasia kumutikhinyi babaandu Baisiraeli benyokha bombakhayo alutare. Baana biaanwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kumuleembe.
Nio Baisiraeli bareeba bali, “Elikhoo ekholo yosi yosi khukhwama mu kholo che Baisiraeli choosi ekhaacha ne nafwe khukhwebusia alala ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Misipa Ku?” (Bareeba lireeba lino sikila baba bechuba burafu bali omundu yesi yesi okhachiile e Misipa tawe aleerwa.)
Baisiraeli bakholela bawandaayabwe Babenjamini siisa mala baloma bali, “Endaalo yino Isiraeli yatibiisie ekholo ndala khu kholo chayo.
Khwechuba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuli se khulilekhuulakho Babenjamini bakhwe bakhaana befwe tawe. Khukhola khuriena nio babaandu Babenjamini banyoole bakhasi?”
Nga ne bareeba khumanya kaaba bali se yabao ekholo yosi yosi mu kholo che Baisiraeli ekhaacha mu libuusiana e Misipa ne babaandi tawe, banyoola bali se abayo omundu yesi yesi khukhwama mu kholo eya Yabesi mu Kileati tawe.
Nga kamasina ne kalaangwa ke banamae, se abao omundu khukhwama e Yabesi owafukiilila tawe.
Nio sisiikhasio sie Baisiraeli siaruma banamae babwe banyindaafu chielefu ekhumi ne chibili ne khubalaka bache beere buli mundu mu Yabesi, akhaba bakhasi ne babaana.
Bababoolela bali, “Yiira babaandu be siseecha boosi ne akhaba buli mukhasi okhali ne eyabwaana tawe.”
Banyoola mu baandu be Yabesi bakhaana be yabwana chimia chine, nio babareera mu kambi e Shilo, lukoba luli mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Nio libuusiana lioosi liaruma likhuwa khu Babenjamini ba baaba e Lwanda lwa Rimoni bababoolele bali khumale liie.
Babenjamini bakobola, mala Baisiraeli babaandi babaa bakhaana khukhwama e Yabesi nibo baba bakheriire tawe. Ne se baboola tawe.
Baisiraeli bakholela Babenjamini siisa sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aukhasia chikholo cha Isiraeli.
Nio babemeelesi bakhulu Baisiraeli baloma bali, “Bakhasi be babaandu ba Benjamini beriirwe. Khulakhola khuriena nio khunyoolele Baseecha baramire bakhasi?
Isiraeli se ekhoya yatibia ndala khu kholo ekhumi ne chibili tawe. Khukhoya khuyiime engila mala ekholo eya Benjamini ebeo.
Ne fwe se khufukiilila bakhwe bakhaana befwe tawe, sikila khwara silaamo khu mundu yesi yesi ofukiilila omubenjamini akhwe mulala khu bakhaana befwe.”
Nio bebaasia bali, “Naikara eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eya buli mwiiko e Shilo elikho echa khubao.” (Shilo eli lubeka lwe ebunaswa owa Beteli, lubeka lwe ebunafubo owa Lebona, lundi lubeka lwe ebukwe we kumuila kuuli akari wa Beteli ne Shekemu.)
Baboolela Babenjamini bali, “Khemuche mala mwikise mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu mala mulindiliile.
Nga bakhaana ba Shilo ne becha khukhina, murure khukhwama mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu mu siise sia naikara. Buli mulala khwinywe aambe omukhaana ne kamaani khukhwama mu bakhaana bano mala amubukule akobole ne naye mu sibala sia Benjamini.
Ne bapaapa babwe namwe bawandaayabwe basoleeli ne bamwichakho bamuyinganie mubaboolele muli, ‘Ne musiima mukhulekhele sikila se khwababukulile mwiie khukhwama mwinywe babe bakhasi befwe tawe. Ne, enywe se mwafunaake khukhwechuba khwenywe tawe, sikila se mwakhuele busa mwabeene tawe.’ ”
Nono Babenjamini bakhola bario. Buli mulala khu nibo arobora omukhaana khukhwama mu bakhaana ba baaba ne balikho bakhina e Shilo mala acha ne naye aba omukhasi wewe. Nio bakobola mu sibala siabwe nisio Wele abaelesia, bombakha lundi chingoba chabwe mala bamenyamo.
Ne Baisiraeli babarama boosi barekukha, mala buli mundu akobola khu kholo ne khu be nju yewe, ne khu maloba kabwe niko Wele abaelesia.

Mu ndaalo nicho babemeelesi bemeelelanga, enjala yabao mu sibala sia Isiraeli. Nio omundu mulala owa Betelehemu mu Yuda, auyila mu sibala sia Moabu. Aaba no mukhasi ne babaana bewe babili be sisoleeli.
Lisina lio mundu oyo liaba bali Elimeleki ne lisina lio mukhasi wewe liaba bali Naomi. Ne kamasina ke babaana bewe kaba bali Mahiloni ne Kilioni. Babaandu bano baba Baefurati khukhwama e Betelehemu mu Yuda. Bacha mu sibala sia Moabu mala bamenyayo.
Ne kakhali Elimeleki afwa, mala Naomi alekhwa yeng'ene ne babaana bewe boombi.
Basoleeli abo batekhia bakhaana Bamoabu: Oripa ne Ruthi. Naomi ne babaana bewe boombi bamenya embi kimiiko ekhumi, mala
Mahiloni ne Kilioni boosi bafwa. Nio Naomi afwilwa omuseecha ne babaana bewe boombi.
Enyuma we siise Naomi aulila ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aeleesie babaandu bewe likesa lilayi. Nio Naomi ne mukha walimusaani barekukha khukhwama Moabu
khukobola Yuda. Ne basiili khu ngila,
Naomi aboolela bakhaana bewe abo ali, “Khe mukobole engo wa maayi benywe, buli sia mulala. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya aaba omulayi khwinywe nga ne mwabeele balayi khwise ne babaafwa.
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amunyalile munyoole baseecha mala mube ne chinju.” Abwenao Naomi abakheesia, abekwayila ne ababoolela ali, “Bulayi, muliindwe.” Ne kakhali barakikha khulila.
Bamuboolela bali, “Tawe! Efwe khulacha ne nawe mu baandu bowo.”
Naomi abakobosia ali, “Kobolayo bakhaana base. Siina sikila ne mwenya khucha ne nase? Ese se nyala nasaala babaana babaandi bamwilakho tawe.
Khe mukobole engo wenywe. Ese naloosiaalile. Se nyala naba no museecha lundi tawe. Ne akhaba ne nibaasia khuuba no museecha siilo sia luno mala esaale babaana,
munyala khuliinda nabwila bachoa ku? Munyala mwamenya kimiiko kimikali ne mukhali ne baseecha ku? Tawe bakhaana base. Mumanyile muli kano se kanyalikha tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ayimwaata, mala ese mukholela enywe siisa
Bakhasi abo balila lundi. Nio Oripa ekwayila masalaawe Naomi ne aloma ali, “Bulayi, nono oliindwe.” Ne Ruthi akhayila khu masalaawe.
Nio Naomi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Wangooyo akoboole mu baandu bewe ne khu bawele bewe. Wesi kobolayo nga niye.”
Ne kakhali Ruthi naye amukobosia ali, “Okhanjikoonjelela ese khukhulekha namwe khukobola ewefwe tawe! Niio ocha, ndacha ne niio omenya, ndamenyayo nawe. Babaandu bowo balaba babaandu base, ne Wele wowo alaba Wele wase.
Niio olifwiila, sesi ndifwilao, lundi abwenao niio endisiikhwa. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya ambeelesie kumunaanio kaba bali se embiikha endakaano yino tawe. Lifwa liong'ene
Nga Naomi ne abona ali Ruthi erusilie elala khucha ne naye, se aalomalomakho khu niye lundi tawe.
Nono Naomi ne Ruthi bachiililila nabwila nga boola e Betelehemu. Nga boola e Betelehemu, babaandu boosi be mu lukoba besiindukha. Mala bakhasi bareebana bali, “Oyuno niye Naomi ku?”
Naomi abakobosia ali, “Mukhanaanga muli Naomi tawe. Naange muli Mara. Sikila Owe Bunyali bwoosi akhola limenya liase liaba lilume.
Nga ne naama ano, naba naindiaala, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi angoboosiisie ne ekhalikho ne sisiindu tawe. Siina sikila ne munaanga muli Naomi mala Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andereere kumunaanio ne siibi?”
Nono Naomi no mukhaana wewe Omumoabu bakobola khukhwama mu sibala sia Moabu. Nga ne boola e Betelehemu, eshayiri yaba yolile likesa.

Nono Naomi aba ne omulebe omuiinda bali Boasi. Ne Boasi aaba owe luuya lwa Abimeleki.
Endaalo ndala Ruthi Omumoabu aboolela Naomi ali, “Khayo nje mu mukuunda nangale biakhulia nibio bakesa balekhile enyuma. Ndi na ng'ali ndi ndanyoolayo omundu okane akholele siisa andekhele nangale nibio niye alekha enyuma.” Naomi amukobosia ali, “Khoche mukhaana wase.”
Nio Ruthi arekukha asamula e mukuunda, mala aloonda enyuma we bakesa ne angala biakhulia nibio balekhanga enyuma. Ruthi oola mu mukuunda kwa Boasi owe luuya lwa Elimeleki ne akhamanya tawe.
Enyuma we siise sitiiti, Boasi omwene echa khukhwama e Betelehemu. Akheesia bakholi bewe ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abe ne nanywe!” Ne bakholi bakobosia bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubiite ewe chikhabi.”
Boasi areeba omukholi owaba omwimeelesi owe likesa ali, “Omukhasi omuele oyo owa naanu?”
Omwimeelesi amukobosia ali, “Ali omukhaana Mumoabu owakoboole ne Naomi khukhwama mu sibala sia Moabu.
Andeebire mulekhe aloonde enyuma we bakesa ne angala biakhulia nibio balekha enyuma. Akholile khukhwama makhelebeende khukhwola siise sino ne se aolilekho ne atiiti ene tawe.”
Mala Boasi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Rekeeresia mukhaana wase, okhacha wangala biakhulia mu mukuunda kukuundi busa tawe. Lundi okhalekhakho kumukuunda kuno tawe. Chiililila khuloonda khu bakholi base be siikhasi.
Loleelesia mu mikuunda nikio bachamo khukesa biakhulia mala obaloondekho. Nakambiile bakholi base baele be siseecha bakhakhunaania tawe. Ne oli ne bulesia onyala wacha mala wanywa kameechi ke mu soongo niko bakholi base be siseecha baele bechuusie.”
Nio Ruthi enama ebweeni wa Boasi bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi. Ruthi aloma ali, “Siina sikila ne ukholela siisa mala ese omukwa busa?”
Ne kakhali Boasi amukobosia ali, “Naulila koosi niko wakholela masalaao khukhwama nga omuseecha wowo ne afwa. Lundi nauliile nga walekha raraao ne maao ne sibala siowo, mala wecha khumenya mu baandu nibo abeele okhamanya khale tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhuruunga niko wakhola. Okhoya wanyoola kumuruuru kumwichufu khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli, niye ewe wechilekho khuyiima buliindi.”
Ruthi akobosia ali, “Mwami wase ewe wakholeele siisa lukali. Sikila ewe wamboleele ne khukhundomalomela bulayi akhaba ese ne ekhali mulala khu bakholi bowo tawe.”
Mu siise sie khulia, Boasi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Khe wiiche ano olie siakhulia. Bukulakho kumukaati oronge mu muunyu.” Nono Ruthi ekhala embi ne bakholi, ne Boasi amusendao biakhulia bibioosie. Alia khukhwola nga ne ekura, biarama.
Nga ne enyokha khucha khukhwangala, Boasi alaka bakholi bewe be siseecha ali, “Lekha angale akhaba akari we binywa, ne mukhamurafwira tawe.
Ne lundi musomolele bilala khukhwama mu binywa mumulekhele angale. Ne mukhamurafwira tawe.”
Nono Ruthi achiililila khukhwangala eshayiri mu mukuunda khukhwola ekolooba. Nio akiuula anyoola ali echuusie siikula silala sie eshayiri.
Abukula biakhulia asuta ayila mu lukoba ekesia masalaawe Naomi bioosi nibio angala. Amua akhaba ne biakhulia nibio aliayo biarama.
Naomi areeba Ruthi ali, “Wangaale waena bino bioosi? Okholile mu mukuunda kwa naanu? Wele aane chikhabi khu mundu okhukholeele bulayi buno!” Nio Ruthi aboolela Naomi ali, “Kholile mu mukuunda kwo omundu bali Boasi.”
Naomi aloma ali, “Chikhabi cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chibe khu Boasi. Bulayi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se bulekhanga balamu ne babaafwa tawe!” Boasi ali omulebe wefwe owe aembi
Nio Ruthi Omumoabu aloma ali, “Lundi, ambooleele ali ‘Chiililila khuuba embi ne bakholi base khukhwola nga ne bamala likesa.’ ”
Naomi aboolela Ruthi omukhaana wewe ali, “Buli bulayi mukhaana wase oche ne bakholi bewe be siikhasi ne busa okhola orio wacha mu mukuunda kukuundi bakhunanisiliamo.”
Nono Ruthi achiililila khukhola embi ne bakholi ba Boasi khukhwola nga likesa lie eshayiri ne ngaanu ne liawa. Ruthi achiililila khumenya ne masalaawe.

Endaalo ndala Naomi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Mukhaana wase, se ekhoya ekhuyimile enju nio nawe obe bulayi tawe ku?
Boasi, owe bakholi nibo wakholilenge nabo, ali omulebe wefwe. Nono rekeeresia. Luno ekolooba kane auule eshayiri.
Nono yisiinga, wiakhe kamafura, mala wifwaare chingubo chowo chindayi lukali mala oche niio auulila biakhulia. Ne kakhali okhemanyisia khu niye tawe, nabwila amala khulia ne khunywa.
Ne manyilisia abuundu niio acha khukona. Ne liilo ne limuambile, cha omusiimbule ebikele biewe mala okoneo. Alakhuboolela nisio okhola.”
Ruthi amukobosia ali, “Ndakhola buli siindu nisio olomile.”
Nio Ruthi acha niio bauulila mala akhola bulayi bwene nga masalaawe ne aamuboolela.
Nga Boasi ne amala khulia ne khunywa, ekhoya. Acha niio biakhulia biabuusibwa, akona andulo wabio, liilo liamuaamba. Ruthi acha simiinywi, amusiimbula mala akona ebikele biewe.
Oli mu silo akari, Boasi atitukha, eyuusia, mala auka khunyoola omukhasi amukonile ebikele.
Areeba ali, “Ewe naanu?” Ruthi amukobosia ali, “Omwami, ese ndi Ruthi. Mbiimbe engubo yowo sikila ewe oli omulebe
Boasi aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubiite chikhabi mukhaana wase. Bulayi nibwo okholile buno bukhila bwe khunyoa. Sikila se wiyiimiile babaandu baele baali baiinda namwe batambi tawe.
Nono mukhaana wase, okheendekhelela tawe. Ndakhukholela buli siindu siosi siosi nisio osaba. Sikila buli mundu yesi mu lukoba luno, amanyile ali ewe oli omukhasi omweyikinwa.
Kali kang'ali ese ndi omulebe wenywe, ne kakhali aliio omulebe okundi owe enju yenywe owe aembi khukhuukhilakho ese.
Rama ano siilo siramire sino. Kumutikhinyi khulamanya kaaba bali akhwilakho namwe tawe. Akhola ario, aba bulayi, ne alekha khukhola ario, Nga Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ndakhwilakho. Nono khokone nabwila busia.”
Nono Ruthi akona abikele bia Boasi nabwila bwasia. Ne anyoa enyokha makhelebeende enje ne esiili emali. Enyokha makhelebeende sikila Boasi se enya Ruthi amanyikhane ne omundu yesi yesi bali abeleo tawe.
Boasi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Reera engubo yowo.” Ruthi akhola ario. Nio Boasi amuchukhilakho eshayiri eyoola embi biikula bibili. Boasi amuyeeta khukhwetiuukha mala Ruthi akobola mu lukoba ne biakhulia ebio.
Nga Ruthi ola engo, masalaawe Naomi amureeba ali, “Maayi, ke lukeendo?” Ruthi amuboolela koosi niko Boasi amukholeele.
Aloma ali, “Boasi ambooleele ali, se khoyela khukobola niio oli mu makhono busa tawe. Nio amba eshayiri biikula bibili bino.”
Naomi aboolela Ruthi ali, “Nono yifwiilisia, nabwila obona sikane siikholekhe. Boasi se kane aole nakhatabusia kamakhuwa kano luno tawe.”

Boasi acha khu kookwa eli a silibwa sie lukoba, mala ekhala asi. Omulebe owe enju eya Elimeleki, niye Boasi alomalomakho echa. Nio Boasi amuboolela ali, “Khe wiiche ano mulebe wase, wikhale asi.” Nio acha, ekhala asi.
Boasi alaanga basaakhulu ekhumi be lukoba, mala ababoolela bekhala asi.
Ne bamalile khukhwikhala, aboolela omulebe oyo ali, “Naomi akoboole khukhwama mu sibala sia Moabu. Mala alenyanga khukusia sitonyi sie kumukuunda kukwaba kwa walimusaani, omulebe wefwe Elimeleki.
Nono nibaasiisie ndi ekhuboolele. Ne wenya khukukula, kukule ebweeni we sisiikhasio sino ne basaakhulu be babaandu base. Ne waaba ne okhenya khukusikula tawe, mboolele. Sikila omundu okhoyela khukusikula ali ewe. Ewe niwe onyoa nio ese nondekho.” Omundu chana aloma ali, “Ndakusikula.”
Nio Boasi akobosia ali, “Waaba ne osikula kumukuunda kuno khukhwama khu Naomi, aba nono oleela akhaba khu Ruthi
Nio omulebe oyo akobosia ali, “Kaaba kario aba ese se endakukula tawe. Sikila nakhola ndio, ndonaka kumukabwa kwe babaana base. Khokusikule. Ese se nyala tawe.”
Nono nga omulebe oyo aboolela Boasi ali, “Khokukule wamwene,” afuula siraaro
Nio Boasi aboolela basaakhulu ne babaandu ba babao boosi ali, “Endaalo eya luno enywe mweesi muli baloli. Nakulile khukhwama khu Naomi buli siindu sisiaba sia Elimeleki ne babaana bewe babili babaafwa, Kilioni ne Mahiloni.
Lundi, Ruthi omukhaana Mumoabu, ngwa Mahiloni, abeele omukhasi wase. Lino lilalindila be enju eya walimusaani kimiaandu. Lundi lisaaye lia walimusaani lilachiililila akari we babaandu bewe ne mu lukoba lwewe. Enywe muli baloli endaalo eya luno.”
Babaana nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kane akhuue mu mukhasi omuele yuno, bakhoya bakhole enju yowo ebe nga eya Peresi niye Tamari asaalila Yuda.”
Nono Boasi ela khu Ruthi, mala Ruthi aba omukhasi wewe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita Ruthi chikhabi, aesia asaala omwana owe sisoleeli.
Nio bakhasi baboolela Naomi bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, ookhakhulekhile ne okhali no mulebe tawe. Ne lisina lio mwana yuno, likhoya liamanyikhana mu Isiraeli!
Omwana yuno niye okhakhuwe kamaani mala akhuliinde mu buloosi bwowo. Mukho musaani akhusiima, lundi akhila babaana saba be siseecha. Luno akhusaaliile omwichukhulu owe sisoleeli.”
Nio Naomi abukula omwana amulela, ne khumuliinda.
Bakhasi ba bamenya aembi batiuukha omwana lisina bali Obedi. Baboolela buli mundu bali, “Naomi anyoolile omwichukhulu owe sisoleeli!” Obedi aaba raraawe owa Chesi, ne Chesi aaba raraawe owa Daudi.
Nono lino nilio lisaaye lia Peresi: Peresi aaba raraawe owa Hesironi,
Hesironi aaba raraawe owa Ramu, Ramu aaba raraawe owa Aminatabu,
Aminatabu aaba raraawe owa Nashoni, Nashoni aba raraawe owa Salimoni,
Salimoni aaba raraawe owa Boasi, Boasi aaba raraawe owa Obedi
Obedi aaba raraawe owa Chesi, ne Chesi aaba raraawe owa Daudi.

Abao omundu mulala lisina liewe bali Elikana owamenyanga Ramataimu-sotimu mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Elikana aba okhwa Yeroamu. Yeroamu aba okhwa Eliiu. Eliiu aba okhwa Tohu ne Tohu aba okhwa Sufu.
Elikana aba ne bakhasi babili. Mulala aba bali Hana ne okundi bali Penina. Penina aba ne babaana ne kakhali Hana se aba ne babaana tawe.
Nono buli mwiiko Elikana aniinanga khukhwama mu lukoba lwewe khucha khusaaya Wele, ne khuaana biianwa khu Mwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owe Banamae e Shilo. Ebweeneyo niio ba okhwa Eli babili Hofini ne Fineasi baba basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buli siise nga Elikana aananga biianwa, aelesianga Penina bitonyi bie nyama ne buli mulala khu baana bewe basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Ne akhaba ne asiima Hana amuelesianga busa sitonyi silala, sikila
Penina abelesianga wangoye Hana lukali mala ne amurangana, sikila yaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekala Hana enda.
Lino liachiililila lirio buli mwiiko. Buli lwosi nga Hana achichanga munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Penina arangananga Hana. Nono Hana alilanga mala se anyala khulia tawe.
Nio omuseecha wewe Elikana aamureeba ali, “Hana siina sikila ne olila? Siina sikila ne okhalia tawe? Siina sikila kumwoyo kwowo ne kubeleele lukali? Ese se ndi ne bukhala khwiwe khukhila babaana ekhumi tawe ku?”
Enyuma we khulia ne khunywa e Shilo, Hana enyokha. Nono Eli Omusaayi aba ekhaale khu ndebe siimbi ne kumuliango kwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Hana aba ne bubeeleli bukali mala asaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne alila burafu.
Hana echuba ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owe Banamae, ng'ali bona kumunaanio kwo mukholi wowo. Mala ukhebulile, okheebilila omukholi wowo tawe. Ne kakhali elesia omukholi wowo omwana omusoleeli. Waaba ne umba omwana yuno, khamuaane khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chindaalo che limenya liewe choosi. Ne lubeko
Nga Hana ne achiililila khusaba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Eli aloleelelanga kumunwa kwewe.
Hana asabilanga mu mwoyo kwewe. Kiminwa kiewe kiong'ene kikiapakilisianga ne kumumilo kwewe se kwauliilikhanangakho tawe. Nio Eli ebaasia ali Hana ameelile.
Ne amureeba ali, “Olachiililila ne bumeesi khukhwola aasi? Meelulukha!”
Ne kakhali Hana aamukobosia ali, “Tawe, mwami wase. Ese ndi omukhasi owe butinyu bukali. Ese se nanyweelekho endali namwe sisiindu sie limela siosi siosi tawe. Ne kakhali naama khuboolelanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi butinyu bwase bwoosi.
Okhebaasia oli ese ndi omukhasi owe sipoli tawe. Biise bino bioosi nama khusaayanga mu bubeeleli bwase bukali ne butinyu.”
Nio Eli amukobosia ali, “Cha mu muleembe mala Wele owa Isiraeli akobosie lisaba liowo nilio omusabile luno.”
Mala Hana aaloma ali, “Lekha omukholi wowo anyoole siisa ebweeni wowo.” Nio omukhasi oyo aacha, aalia siakhulia ne se abaakho ne bubeeleli lundi tawe.
Elikana nende be enju yewe benyokha makhelebeende endaalo eyaloondakho, mala basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio bakobola mungo mwabwe e Rama. Elikana aaba ne omukhasi wewe Hana, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhebulila Hana.
Enyuma we siise Hana aaesia mala asaala omwana omusoleeli. Aamutiuukha lisina ali Samweli
Elikana nende be nju yewe boosi baniinanga ne bacha e Shilo buli mwiiko khuaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi embosio ne khukhola niko Elikana echubila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Hana se aniinanga ne achayo tawe. Aaboolela omuseecha wewe ali, “Nga omwana ne alata, khamureere ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala amenyeyo mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.”
Omuseecha wewe Elikana aamukobosia ali, “Khola likhusiimisia ewe. Liinda khukhwola nga ne omulatia. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya aakhola nga likhuwa liewe
Enyuma we khumulatia amubukula amuyila e Shilo. Aabukula ne euunwa
Nio beera euunwa, mala bayila omwana khu Eli.
Ne Hana aloma ali, “Ee omwami wase! Nga ne omenya, Ese niye omukhasi owaba ne emile ano ebweeni wowo ne saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwana yuno niye nasaba. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakobosie lisaba nilio namusaba niye.
Nono, namureerire khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi, aelesibwe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio basaaya

“Kumwoyo kwase kwasangaala lukali mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi;
kamaani kase katasikha mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Njekheelela basiku base,
sikila esangaalila buonia bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Se aliio ooli omutakatifu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
se aliio okundi ne okhali ewe tawe;
se luliio lulwanda nga Wele wefwe tawe.
Mukhalomalomakho ne lilielola tawe,
lilomaloma lie lilielola likhaamakho mu minwa kienywe tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele owe limanya,
ne khubirira khu niye bikholwa bikelwa.
Buyiingo bwaabo be kamaani bwafuniikhe
ne kakhali batekhele banyoolile kamaani.
Abo ba baaba ne nabio luno babeele bakholi nio banyoole siakhulia.
Ne abo ba baaba ne enjala luno se bali ne nayo tawe.
Omukuumba asaalile babaana saba,
ne kakhali oyo ooli ne babaana bakali ali busa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eraanga lundi alamusia;
areeranga babaandu emakoombe lundi abakobosia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholanga babaandu balala baba batambi ne babaandi baiinda,
aboombianga, balala ne babaandi abaniinia.
Aniinianga batambi khukhwama mwipukhuulu;
aniinianga babanani khukhwama mwikokhe,
khubakhola bekhale ne babaami,
mala banyoole kumukabwa kwe ndebe eye lukoosi.
Sikila chinjeko che liloba chili cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khu nicho arakho sibala.
Akhaliinde bikele bia abo baali babeyikinwa bewe,
ne kakhali bamayaanu bakhabunile mu siilima;
sikila omundu se akhakhile khulwe kamaani kewe tawe.
Basiku ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bakhatonyekhe mu bitonyi;
Wele owe Angaaki Lukali akhabakukumile nga lueni khukhwama mwikulu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhalakile chimbeka choosi che sibala,
akhaelesie omwami wewe kamaani,
mala aniinie kamaani ko oyo niye aakha kamafura.”
Nio Elikana akobola engo e Rama. Ne omwana Samweli aakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asi wo musaayi Eli.
Nono, ba okhwa Eli baba be sipoli. Balekelesianga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kumwiima kwe basaayi ne babaandu kwaba kuri; omundu yesi yesi ne aana embosio, omukholi owo musaayi eecha ne euma eye kameno kataru enyama ne esiitutuba,
omukholi oyo aabukulanga euma eyo akiuna mu sifuria namwe epinika namwe mu ningilo, namwe mu saachi. Bioosi nibio euma yarusiangamo omusaayi ebukulilanga. Bakhola kano e Shilo khu buli Muisiraeli owechayo.
Khutasa khwako, kiminawa ne kikhaaya tawe, omukholi owo musaayi echanga mala aboolela omundu olikho oaana embosio ali, “Mbelesie enyama eyo omusaayi ache oosie. Se alafukiilila enyama endeekhe khukhwama khwiwe tawe ne ekhali embisi yong'ene.”
Ne omundu oyo amuboolela ali, “Lekha khwosie kiminawa nio, ne onyala wabukula sikelo nisio wenya,” omukholi wo musaayi amuboolelanga ali, “Tawe! Mbelesie siise sino. Ne okhambelesia tawe ndakibukula ne kamaani!”
Nono bumayaanu bwe basoleeli ba Eli bwaba bukali lukali mu moni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila babaandu abo se babechanga ne buuri khu siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Samweli akholelanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Afwaranga engubo bali efodi eya katani.
Buli mwiiko maawe amunabilanga engubo endiiti ne amuyilila. Akholanga ario nga ne aniinanga ne omuseecha wewe e Shilo khuaana embosio eya buli mwiiko.
Ne Eli abiitanga Elikana ne omukhasi wewe chikhabi ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhue ewe babaana khubirira mu mukhasi yuno mu bweyaangu bwo mwana niye aana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Enyuma wako bakobolanga engo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhebulila Hana, mala Hana asaala babaana babaandi basoleeli bataru ne bakhaana babili. Omusoleeli Samweli achoela mu bukhalabani bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono, Eli aba akorire lukali. Ne aulila koosi niko babaana bewe bakholelanga Isiraeli yoosi. Lundi aulila nga ne bakonaanga ne bakhasi babakholanga a silibwa sie liiema lie kumuse.
Nio aabareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mukhola bibiindu birio? Nauliile bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu khukhwama khu baandu boosi.
Tawe baana base. Nilio mbuliile babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baloma se lili lilayi tawe.
Omundu ne akholela omundu okundi bumayaanu, Wele anyala amusoola, ne omundu ne akholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bumayaanu, naanu onyala amusoola?”
Ne se baulila kumumilo kwa Paapa wabwe tawe. Sikila liaba lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali abeere.
Omundu owa Wele echa khu Eli mala amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali, ‘Nemanyisia samwene khunju eya raraao nga baba ne basiili e Misiri. Baba bali banasioobi be enju eya Farao.
Mala narobora enju eya raraao khukhwama mu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli khuba basaayi base. Nenya nibo baniine khu alutare khukhwosia bupani. Lundi bafware efodi
Siina sikila nono, ewe ne olola biianwa biase ne chimbosio nibio nalaka ne chimoni che kumuliuliu? Siina sikila ne oelesia babaana bowo lukoosi khukhila ese ne munerera bitonyi bilayi bie biianwa birobore bie babaandu base?’ ”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Nalaka ndi enju eya raraao ninywe mumukholela ese mindali na mindali.” Ne kakhali luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Elio likhoya liaba aleeyi ne nase.” Ndaana lukoosi khwaabo ba bambelesianga ese lukoosi, ne kakhali abo ba bandekelesia ndibalekelesia.
Siise silikho siicha nisio khakhubunie ewe lundi mbunie nju eya raraao. Nio se akhabeo omundu okhamenye abe omusaakhulu khukhwama munju yowo tawe.
Mu munaanio kwowo okhakhendekhele bukhili bwoosi bukhabe khu Isiraeli. Ne omundu omusaakhulu se akhabekho munju yowo khulwa mindali na mindali tawe.
Omundu
Ne lino nilio likhekholekhe khu basoleeli bowo babili, Hofini ne Fineasi. Bakhabe simanyisio khwiwe. Bombi bakhafwe khu ndaalo ndala.
Ese kharobore omusaayi omweyikinwa, okhakhole khuloondekhana nende kali mu mwoyo kwase ne munganakani chase. Lundi khakhole lisaaye liewe lichiililile. Akhakhole ebweeni wo omwami wase omurobore mindali na mindali.
Ne yesi yesi okhasikale munju yowo aliicha khu musaayi oyo amusabe efwesa namwe kumukaati. Lundi akhalome ali, “Khole mbe mulala khu basaayi nio ndieekho sitonyi sie kumukaati.”

Nono omusoleeli Samweli akholelanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asi owa Eli. Ne likhuwa khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se liasalanga tawe, ne buloli bwosi se bwabechangao lukali tawe.
Siise esio chimoni cha Eli chaba charakiikhe khubofula, abeele se abona tawe. Aaba alikho akona abuundu wewe.
Etaa eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba ekhasima tawe. Ne Samweli aba akonile munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niio Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele liaba.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga ali, “Samweli! Samweli!” Samweli aakobosia ali, “Ee omwami!”
Mala aatima acha khu Eli aaloma ali, “Ese niye oyu. Unaangile!”
Ne Eli amukobosia ali, “Se ekhulangile tawe, kobolayo okone.” Nio Samweli akobolayo akona.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga lundi ali, “Samweli!” Mala Samweli enyokha aacha khu Eli mala aaloma ali, “Ese niye oyu. Unaangile?” Ne kakhali Eli aamukobosia ali, “Mwana wase ese se nakhulangilekho tawe. Khe okone lundi.”
Nono Samweli abeele akhamanya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe; ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abeele likhafunulibwakho khu niye tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga Samweli lundi lukhola khataru. Nio enyokha acha khu Eli mala aloma ali, “Ese niye oyu. Unaangile?”
Nio Eli amanya ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owaba ne alikho alanga omusoleeli.
Nono Eli amuboolela ali, “Khe oche okone, ne akhulaanga lundi loma oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lomaloma omukholi wowo arekereesie.’ ” Nio Samweli akobola akona abuundu wewe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa eema, alaanga bulayi bwene nga ne alaanga lutaayi ali, “Samweli! Samweli!” Ne Samweli akobosia ali, “Lomaloma. Sikila omukholi wowo aarekeereesie.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Samweli ali, “Ndikho nja khukhola sisiindu khu baandu ba Isiraeli sie khuukia. Buli mundu oulilakho akhauke lukali.
Khu ndaalo eyo khakhole niko naloma khunju eya Eli, khukhwama mu khurakikha khukhwola esiakamo.
Namuboolela
Nono nechubila enju eya Eli ndi se elio embosio namwe siianwa silinyala khurusiao kamakhiikha kabwe mindali na mindali tawe.”
Samweli aakona khukhwola nga ne bwasia nio ekula kimiliango kie nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Samweli aba ne buuri khuboolela Eli ke buloli.
Ne kakhali Eli alaanga Samweli ne aloma ali, “Samweli, mwana wase.”
Samweli aakobosia ali, “Ese niye oyu.”
Ne Eli amureeba ali, “Siina nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolele? Okhangisa tawe. Wele akhoya aakhuwa ewe kumunaanio kumukali kaaba bali ungisa ese sisiindu siosi siosi nisio niye akhubooleele ewe.”
Nio Samweli amuboolela buli siindu, ne se amukisa sisiindu siosi siosi tawe. Eli aaloma ali, “Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lekha akhole lili lilayi khu niye.”
Nio Samweli achoa mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne naye. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aalekhakho buli siindu nisio Samweli aloma sialekha khwikholekha tawe.
Nio Isiraeli yoosi khukhwama Dani khukhwola Beerisheba bamanya bali ng'ali Samweli ali omung'oosi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi achiililila khubonekhana e Shilo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emanyisia omwene khu Samweli e Shilo khubirira khu likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Likhuwa lia Samweli liecha khu Isiraeli yoosi. Nio
Bafilisiti bebwaakala Isiraeli ne nga liie liachiililila, baula Isiraeli. Bafilisiti beera embi babaandu chielefu chine mwiie.
Ne nga banamae ba Isiraeli bakobola mu kambi basaakhulu ba Isiraeli bareeba bali, “Siina sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alekhile efwe khwabunisibwa ne Bafilisiti endaalo yino? Lekha khuche khureere eno Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama Shilo. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eche abe alala ne nafwe mala akhuonie efwe khukhwama khu maani ke basiku befwe.”
Nio Babaandu barumania e Shilo mala bareera Lisanduku lie ndakaano eyo Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owe Banamae ooli mu ndebe eye chikerubi. Ba okhwa Eli babili, Hofini ne Fineasi babaayo ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Nga Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ne liola mu kambi, Baisiraeli boosi bekhoya lukali sibala siareenga.
Bafilisiti baulila luyoka mala baloma bali, “Luyoka luno lwoosi mu kambi eye Baeburania lwekesia siina?” Nga ne bamanya bali Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaba liechile mu kambi,
Bafilisiti baria sikila baloma bali, “Bawele bechile mu kambi.” Lundi baloma bali, “Efwe khwabuna! Sisiindu siri abeele siikhakhwekholekhakho tawe.
Efwe khwabuna! Naanu onyala akhuonia efwe khukhwama khu maani ke bawele be kamaani abo? Nibo bawele babarerera Bamisiri buli butinyu mu sichiimi.
Bafilisiti mube banyindaafu mala mwirekekhe nga baseecha. Mwalekha khukhola murio tawe aba khulekela ba nasioobi be Baeburania nga nibo ne babeelenge banasioobi khwinywe. Nono yirekekha nga baseecha mala mupane.”
Nono Bafilisiti bapana mala baula Baisiraeli. Baisiraeli bacha buli mundu mungo mwewe. Ne bwabao bubwiri bukali. Sikila banamae ba Isiraeli chielefu kamakhumi kataru ba bakeendelanga khu bikele beerwa.
Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liabukulwa mala ba okhwa Eli Hofini ne Fineasi boombi beerwa.
Omundu khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini aatima chimbilo khukhwama abuundu niio liie liaba oola Shilo endaalo eyo ne eng'ene, chingubo chewe chaba chatabukhaake ne lipukhuulu liaba khumurwe kwewe.
Nga ne oola, Eli aba ekhaale khu ndebe yewe a muyila. Eli aba aunguusile busa sikila aba ne buuri khulwe Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele. Nga omundu oyo ne eecha mu lukoba aboola kakekholekha, lukoba lwoosi lwalila.
Nga Eli ne aulila bililo, areeba ali, “Luyoka luno lwoosi lwa siina?” Omundu oyo acha khangu niio Eli aaba amuboolela kamakhuwa kakekholekha.
Nono Eli aba ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi tisa ne kimiiko munaane. Ne aba abofuliile elala.
Omundu oyo aboolela Eli ali, “Ese niye owamile mwiie. Ese nilukhe khukhwama mwiie luno.”
Eli aamureeba ali, “Mwana wase liie libeele liriena?”
Omurumwa oyo aamukobosia ali, “Isiraeli yilukhe Bafilisiti. Ne lundi babaandu bafwiile bakali. Ne basoleeli bowo Hofini ne Fineasi bafwiile. Ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liabukuliibwe!”
Nga omundu oyo ne aloma ke Lisanduku lie Ndakaano, Eli akwila kumukoongo khukhwama khu ndebe yewe a silibwa. Aba asaakhuluwe lukali, mala omusiro nono aafunikha likosi mala aafwa. Aaba emeelele Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane.
Nono omukhaana owa Eli, mukho musaani wewe Fineasi aba ne enda mala siise sie khusaala omwana siaba siimbi. Mukha Fineasi aulila bali Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liaba liabukuliibwe. Lundi aaulila bali masalaawe ne omuseecha wewe bafwiile. Enama mala asaala, sikila arakikha khulumwa.
Siise siewe sie khufwa ne sili siimbi, omukhasi owamusaasia amuboolela ali, “Okharia tawe, sikila wasaalile omwana omusoleeli.” Ne kakhali niye se amukobosia namwe aulila tawe.
Atiuukha omwana ali Ikabodi
Mala aaloma ali, “Luyali lwarurire khu Isiraeli, sikila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liabukuliibwe.”

Nga Bafilisiti ne babukula Lisanduku lie Ndakaano balisuta baliamia e Beneseri baliyila Ashitoti.
Nio Bafilisiti lundi babukula Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele baliyila munju eya Dakoni mala balira embi ne Dakoni.
Nga babaandu ba Ashitoti benyokha makhelebeende endaalo eyaloondakho, Dakoni aba akwile mafumala ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio babukula Dakoni bamura abuundu wewe.
Ne kakhali nga benyokha makhelebeende endaalo eyaloondakho, lundi Dakoni aba akwile mafumala ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano, eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kumurwe kwewe ne kamakhono kewe koombi kaba kakhalikhe kalambaalile muliango. Kumubili kwewe kwong'ene kukwaba ne kuramire.
Lino nilio likila basaayi ba Dakoni nende boosi babengilanga munju eya Dakoni, ne bakhemanga a muliango kwa Dakoni e Ashitoti khukhwola luno tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia babaandu ba Ashitoti kumunaanio. Abarengia mala aelesia nibo nende babaandu ba bamenyanga siimbi nabo butinyu bwe bulwaale bwe khubiimba.
Babaandu ba Ashitoti nga babona bibiindu nga ne bili baloma bali, “Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli se likhoya liarama mwifwe tawe. Sikila kumunaanio kwewe kwabeele kumusiro khwifwe ne khu Dakoni, wele wefwe.”
Nio barumania mala babuusia alala Babaami be Bafilisiti mala babareeba bali, “Khukhola khuriena ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli?”
Babaami bakobosia bali, “Lekha lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli liyilwe e Katii.” Nio balibukula baliyila e Katii.
Ne kakhali enyuma we khulireera, kumunaanio kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwaba lundi khu lukoba olwo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia lukoba olwo lireenga liboofu, aelesia babaandu be lukoba kumunaanio, bakhulu ne batiiti. Bulwaale bwe kamabiimba bwabakwakho.
Nio bayila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele e Ekironi. Ne kakhali nga Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele ne liecha Ekironi, babaandu ba Ekironi balila ne baloma bali, “Bakhurereere ano Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli, khukhwira efwe ne babaandu befwe!”
Nio lundi baruma babuusia alala babaami be Bafilisiti boosi mala baloma bali, “Yila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli, likobole abuundu walio. Nio likhakhwira efwe ne babaandu befwe tawe.” Sikila linikina liboofu lukali liabao mu lukoba lwoosi.
Babaandu bakhafwa tawe, babiimba kamabiimba mala biililo bie lukoba bianiina bioola mwikulu.

Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liaba mu sibala sie Bafilisiti khu miesi saba.
Ne Bafilisiti balaanga basaayi ne bafumu mala babareeba bali, “Khukhola khuriena ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi? Khuboolele khukhalikobosieyo nende siina?”
Bakobosia bali, “Ne mukobosiayo Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele owa Isiraeli, mukhaliyila busa tawe. Mukhoya mulikobosieyo ne siianwa sirusiao bubi. Ne muona bulwaale aba mu limanya muli mwanyoola butinyu sikila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio bareeba bali, “siianwa siina sirusiao bubi nisio khukhoyeele khumukoboselia?” Basaayi ne bafumu bakobosia bali, “Bifwaani bie kamabiimba ke esahabu biraano ne bifwaani bie chimbeba bie esahabu biraano, khuloondekhana ne Babaami be Bafilisiti. Sikila butinyu nga obwo bwaba khwinywe ne Babaami benywe.
Nono mukhoya mung'oone bifwaani bie kamabiimba ne bifwaani bie chimbeba bibionakanga liloba lundi mukhoya muelesie Wele owa Isiraeli luyali. Nio wakana Wele owa Isiraeli alirusia khwinywe kumunaanio ne khu bawele benywe ne khu maloba kenywe.
Siina sikila mulumie kimiooyo kienywe nga Bamisiri ne Farao bakhola? Enyuma wa Wele khubaelesia kumunaanio, se balekhuula Baisiraeli bacha?
Nono bukula mala murekekhe likaari liiya ne bisonga bibili bie chikhaafu nicho bakhaboakho khwichooki tawe. Chire khwichooki mala muchiboe khwikaari. Ne kakhali mukobosie chimoosi chacho engo, aleeyi ne chikhaafu.
Bukula Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mulire khwikaari. Mala mure mu Lisanduku liili siimbi ne nalio bifwaani bie sahabu nibio mulikho mu mukoboselia niye nga siianwa sirusiao bubi. Mala mulirume mulekhe liche.
Nio muloleleele, ne liniina mu sibala sialio e Beti-shemesi, aba Wele owe Baisiraeli niye owakhureerere efwe butinyu bukali buno. Ne liaba ne likhacha lirio tawe, aba khulamanya khuli se ali niye owakhurereere efwe butinyu tawe, ne kakhali liakholekha matundubiikha.”
Bakhola niko baboolelwa, mala babukula chikhaafu bisonga bibili mala bachiboa khwikaari, mala baboa chimoosi engo.
Baara Lisanduku lie Ndakaano mwikaari alala ne lisanduku liliabaamo bifwaani bie chimbeba ne bifwaani bie kamabiimba kabio.
Chikhaafu chacha chaluungika busa khu kumuyila kwe e Beti-shemesi. Chaluungikha kumuyila mulala, kumuniina ne kumwiikha. Se chaukhakho kumukhono kumuseecha namwe kumukhasi tawe. Ne Babaami be Bafilisiti bachiloondakho khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Beti-shemesi.
Nono babaandu ba Beti-shemesi baba balikho bakesa engaanu mwitooma. Nga basuta chimoni, babona Lisanduku lie Ndakaano, bekhoya khulibona.
Likaari liecha mu mukuunda kwa Yoshua owamenyanga mu Beti-shemesi mala liema ebweeneyo. Lulwanda luboofu lwabaayo. Babaandu basaaka chiikhu che likaari mala beera bisonga ebio mala babiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia.
Ne Balawi basuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lisanduku liliabamo bifwaani mala balira khu lwanda luboofu. Babaandu ba Beti-shemesi baana siianwa sie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie khuosia endaalo eyo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaami baraano be Bafilisiti nga babona lino bakobola Ekironi endaalo eyo.
Bino nibio bifwaani bie kamabiimba bie esahabu nibio Bafilisiti bakalusia nga siianwa simala bubi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Biaba: silala khu lukoba lwa Ashitoti, silala khu Kasa, silala khu lukoba lwa Ashikeloni, silala khu lukoba lwa Katii ne sisiindi khu Ekironi.
Lundi bifwaani bie sahabu bie chimbeba khuloondekhana ne chingoba choosi che Bafilisiti che Babaami baraano; birekere bibiasirwa nende biikhasirwa tawe. Lulwanda luboofu luli siimbi nende niio baara Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilio liili buloli khukhwola luno mu mukuunda kwa Yoshua owe e Beti-shemesi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eera babaandu balala ba Beti-shemesi sikila balola mu Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Eera babaandu kamakhumi saba. Mala babaandu balila sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eera babaandu bakali.
Nio babaandu ba Beti-shemesi bareeba bali, “Naanu onyala eema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele omutakatifu yuno? Acha owa naanu nio akhururemo?”
Nio baruma barumwa khu bamenywa ba Kiriati-Yearimu ne baloma bali, “Bafilisiti bakaluusie Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Yiikha mwiiche mala mulibukule.”

Lisanduku lie Ndakaano liamenya Kiriati-Yearimu siise sileeyi, kimiiko kamakhumi kabili. Ne mu siise sino enju eya Isiraeli yekoomba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Samweli aboolela enju eya Isiraeli yoosi ali, “Mwaaba ne mukobola khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi, aba rusiao bawele be chikholo chichiindi ne Ashitoreti khukhwama mwinywe. Mure kimiooyo kienywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala mukholele niye yeng'ene. Niye akhamusikule khukhwama khu Bafilisiti.”
Nio Baisiraeli barusiao ba Baali ne Ashitoreti mala bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene.
Nio Samweli aloma ali, “Buusia Baisiraeli boosi e Misipa mala ese ndamusabila enywe khu Wele ebweeneyo.”
Nio bebuusia e Misipa Bataa kameechi mala bakachukha aasi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala basila khulia endaalo eyo yoosi. Baloma bali, “Khwakhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nio Samweli emeelela babaandu ba Isiraeli e Misipa.
Nono nga Bafilisiti baulila bali Baisiraeli baba bebuusiisie e Misipa, babaami be Bafilisiti bacha khukhwibwaakala Isiraeli. Nga Baisiraeli baulila, baria Bafilisiti.
Mala baboolela Samweli bali, “Okhalekha khukhulilila efwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe tawe, wakana akhuonia khukhwama khu Bafilisiti.”
Nono Samweli aabukula limeeme linuuna mala aliaana nga siianwa sie khukhwosia simuufu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Samweli alilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwa Isiraeli mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamukobosia.
Nga Samweli aaba ne alikho aana siianwa sie khukhwosia, Bafilisiti besenda siimbi khukhwibwaakala Isiraeli. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulukhumila Bafilisiti ne kumumilo kwe kamaani endaalo ng'ene eyo, mala aabakoyaania. Beerwa ne Baisiraeli.
Nio Baisiraeli barura e Misipa mala batimania Bafilisiti ne babeera khukhwola e Beti-kari.
Samweli aabukula libaale aliimia akari wa Misipa ne Chesana mala alilaanga lisina ali Ebenesa, sikila aloma ali, “Khukhwola luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuyeetile efwe.”
Nono Bafilisiti bakhilwa mala se bengilakho lundi mu sibala sia Isiraeli tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabiila Bafilisiti mu ndaalo cha Samweli choosi.
Chingoba nicho Bafilisiti baba ne baamba khukhwama khu Isiraeli chabakobolela, khukhwama Ekironi khukhwola Katii. Baisiraeli basikula kamaloba kabwe khukhwama khu Bafilisiti. Lundi kumuleembe kwabao akari wa Isiraeli ne Baamori.
Samweli emeelela Baisiraeli mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.
Buli mwiiko akeendelelanga Beteli, Kilikali ne Misipa. Emeelelanga Isiraeli abuundu ao oosi.
Nio yaba anyala akobola engo Rama sikila mungo mwewe mwaba ebweeneyo. Ne ebweeneyo yosi emeelelanga Isiraeli mala ombakhilayo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare.

Nga Samweli ne asaakhuluwa, akhola basoleeli bewe baaba bakhalaki mu Isiraeli.
Omusoleeli wewe omubele aaba bali Yoeli, ne okhola khabili aaba bali Abicha. Baba bakhalaki e Beerisheba.
Ne kakhali babaana ba Samweli se baloonda liiba lilayi lia raarawabwe tawe. Bayimanga bukhala nende asooya ne se bakholanga ke bung'ali tawe.
Nio basaakhulu ba Isiraeli babuusiana alala, bacha khu Samweli e Rama.
Mala bamuboolela bali, “Lola, ewe oli omusaakhulu, ne basoleeli bowo se bali ne liiba lilayi nga liliowo tawe. Nono robora omwami akhwamiie efwe nga bibala bibiindi bioosi.”
Ne kakhali likhuwa lino se liasiimisia Samweli nga baloma bali, “Khuelesie omwami akhwamiie efwe” tawe. Mala Samweli asaba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela ali, “Rekeeresia nga babaandu ne baloma sikila se bakhulobile ewe tawe. Ne kakhali bandobile ese nga Omwami khu nibo.
Balikho bakhola nga ne bakholanga buli lwosi. Nga ne nabarusia e Misiri, bandekha mala bakholela bawele babaandi. Balikho bakhukholela wesi bario.
Nono rekeeresia kakabwe, obakaambile ne kamaani mala obekesie liiba lio mwami okhabamiie.”
Nono Samweli aaboola kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi koosi khu baandu ba baaba ne bamureeba bali abaelesie omwami.
Aaloma ali, “lino nilio liiba lio mwami okhamwaamie enywe: akhabukule babaana benywe be sisoleeli abarobore bakhole khu makaari kewe ne lundi babe batimia chifarasi ne babaandi barangirira kamakaari kewe.
Aliroborera babemeelesi bipupu chielefu ne babemeelesi bipupu kamakhumi karaano. Balala bakhamulimile kimikuunda kiewe ne bakesa biakhulia biewe ne khung'oona bulwaani bwewe bwe liie ne bibiindu bie kamakaari kewe.
Akhabukule babaana benywe bakhaana bamung'oonele bibiindu biiunya bulayi ne khuba bateekhi ne bakhupi be kimikaati.
Alibukula ne kamaani kimikuunda kienywe kimilayi, kimikuunda kie kimisabibu nende kie kimiseituni nende kie chimbande mala aelesie bakholi bewe.
Alibukula ne kamaani ekhumi eye biakhulia bienywe ne kimikuunda kienywe kie kimisabibu aelesie babemeelesi bewe ne bakholi bewe.
Alibukula bakholi benywe be siseecha nende be siikhasi ne chikhaafu chenywe chindayi lukali ne chipunda chenywe khumukholela enywe kimilimo.
Alibukula sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie bibiaayo bienywe ne enywe mukhabe banasioobi bewe.
Ne siise esio mukhalile sikila omwami wenywe niye mwabeene mweroborera. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhamukobosie enywe siise esio tawe.”
Ne kakhali babaandu baloba khuulila ka Samweli. Baloma bali, “Tawe! Efwe khulaba ne omwami akhwamiie,
nio fwesi khube nga chikholo chichiindi. Lundi nio omwami wefwe akhwamiie lundi akhwimeelele efwe ne khu khuupana kamae kefwe.”
Nga Samweli ne aulila kamakhuwa ke babaandu koosi, akakobolelamo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Samweli ali, “Ulila kakabwe mala obaroborere omwami.” Nio Samweli aaboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali, “Cha buli mundu mu lukoba lwewe.”

Abao omundu owe ekholo eya Benjamini bali Kishi. Kishi aba okhwa Abieli. Abieli aba okhwa Serori. Serori aba okhwa Bekorati. Bekorati aba okhwa Afia. Kishi aba omuiinda.
Kishi aba ne omwana lisina liewe bali Saulo owe lukoondo lulayi. Se abao omundu mu Isiraeli owaba ne lukoondo lulayi khukhila Saulo tawe. Khukhwama khu mabeka kewe khuniina aba omuleeyi khukhila babaandu boosi.
Nono chipunda cha Kishi chindala chatiba nio aboolela Saulo omwana wewe ali, “Bukula omukholi mulala, mala oche oenje chipunda.”
Ne bacha babirira mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu ne mu sibala sia Salisa ne se bachinyoola tawe. Babirira mu sibala sia Siaalimu, ne chipunda se chabaayo tawe. Nio babirira mu sibala sia Benjamini, ne se bachinyoola tawe.
Nga ne boola mu sibala sia Sufu, Saulo aaboolela omukholi wewe owaba ne naye ali, “Lekha khukoboleyo, busa Paapa akhola ario alekha khukhwibaasia ke chipunda mala aarakikha khukhwiembeelela efwe.”
Omukholi aakobosia ali, “Aliio omundu owa Wele mu lukoba luno. Ne ali omundu niye babaandu baelesia lukoosi sikila buli siindu nisio aboolanga sibechanga ng'ali. Lekha khucheyo wakana anyala aakhuboolela ke lukeendo nilwo khukeendile.”
Nio Saulo areeba omukholi wewe ali, “Ne khwaaba ne khucha khulayilila omundu oyo siina? Sikila siakhulia nisio khwasutile siaweele mala se khuli ne sisiindu nisio khunyala khwayilila omundu owa Wele tawe. Khuli nende siina?”
Omukholi oyo akobosia lundi Saulo ali, “Ese ndi ne khafwesa khatiiti khari. Ndakhaelesia khu mundu owa Wele akhuboolele ke lukeendo lwefwe.”
(Siise esio mu Isiraeli omundu yaba ne enya khuyima bungali bwe sisiindu khukhawama khu Wele alomanga ali, “Yiicha khuche khu muloli.” Sikila olaangwa luno bali omung'oosi abechanga khaale omuloli.)
Nio Saulo akobosia omukholi wewe ali, “Ewe walomile bulayi. Yiicha khuche.” Nio bacha mu lukoba nimwo omundu owa Wele aaba.
Nga baba ne baniina a sikulu khucha mu lukoba, bakaanana ne bakhaana ba baaba ne balikho barura ne bacha khutaa kameechi. Mala bareeba bakhaana abo bali, “Omuloli ali ano?”
Bakhaana abo bakobosia bali, “Yee aliio. Ali busa ebweeni wenywe eyi siimbi khola khangu. Aama khwola siise sino mu lukoba, sikila babaandu bali ne siianwa sie khukhwosia abuundu aesuta.
Nga ne mulengila mu lukoba, mulamunyoolamo ne akhaniina aacha abuundu aesuta khulia tawe. Sikila babaandu se balarakikha khulia tawe, nabwila echa. Ne niye akhoya aabiita chikhabi embosio nio babaandu balangiilwe balie. Nono niina sikila mulamunyoola khangu.”
Nio Saulo ne omukholi wewe baniina boola mu lukoba. Nga baba ne balikho bengilamo, babona Samweli alikho arura eecha khubakaanana khu lukeendo lwewe lwe khucha abuundu aesuta.
Nono endaalo nio busie Saulo ache, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba amanyisie Samweli ali,
“Muchuli embi khu siise nga sino siri, khakhurumire omundu khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini, okhamuchukhekho kamafura abe omwami owe babaandu base Isiraeli. Akhasikule babaandu base khukhwama khu Bafilisiti. Sikila Naboone khunaanisibwa khwe babaandu base ne khulila khwabwe khwanjoleele.”
Nga Samweli ne abona Saulo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Yuno niye omundu niye nakhubooleele. Niye olamiia babaandu base.”
Nio Saulo aacha siimbi ne Samweli asilibwa mala aamureeba ali, “Mboolele, enju eyo muloli eli waena?”
Samweli aamukobosia ali, “Ese niye omuloli. Rangira oche ebweeni wase abuundu aesuta. Endaalo yino olalia ne nase. Ne muchuli makhelebeende khakhulekhuule oche mala khakhuboolele koosi kaali mu nganakani chowo.
Ne mukhara chinganakani chenywe khu punda chichaatibile chindaalo chitaru chichabirire tawe. Sikila chanyoolekhaane khale. Ne naanu niye enju eya Isiraeli elikho eyima lukali? Se oli ewe ne enju yoosi eya paapa wowo?”
Saulo aakobosia ali, “Ese ndi omutiiti mu kholo eya Benjamini ekholo endiiti lukali mu kholo cha Isiraeli. Siina sikila nono ne olomaloma khwise mu ngila yino?”
Nio Samweli abukula Saulo ne omukholi wewe aabengisia mu bwelu mala aabaelesia bubwangu ebweeni nende abo ba baaba ne balangiilwe. Ba baba ne balangiilwe baba babaandu kamakhumi kataru.
Nio Samweli aboolela omuteekhi ali, “Reera sitonyi nisio nakhuelesia ne khuboolela ndi ‘Sire alubeka.’ ”
Nono omuteekhi areera enyama eye sinama ne lia siiso mala abira ebweeni wa Saulo. Ne Samweli aboolela Saulo ali, “Lola, nisio babiikha bareere ebweeni wowo lia, sikila siabiikhilwa ewe khukhwola siise sisiaroborwa, nio olie ne bakeni.”
Saulo, aalia ne Samweli endaalo eyo.
Nga ne bekha mu lukoba khukhwama abuundu aesuta sitaanda siaba sialiilwe khulwa Saulo, khu silama
mala aakonakho.
Nio nga bwasia, Samweli alaanga Saulo khukhwama khunju khungaaki ali, “Yinyokha ekhuroongie.” Nono Saulo enyokha mala niye ne Samweli barura bechela khu ngila eye mu lukoba.
Nga ne baba ne balikho barura mu lukoba, Samweli aboolela Saulo ali, “Boolela omukholi arangire ebweeni wefwe. Ne amalile khubira, ewe sikalakho enyuma atiiti. Nio khumanyisie likhuwa lia Wele.”

Nio Samweli aabukula kumwendo kwe kamafura mala akachukha khu murwe kwa Saulo. Amwikwayila ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhuchukhilekho kamafura obe omwami owe babaandu bewe Isiraeli. Olamiia babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala obasikule khukhwama khu basiku ba bababotookhelela. Ne sino silaba simanyisio khwiwe sili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhurobore ewe obe omwami owe kumukabwa kwewe.
Nga ne khulalekhana ne nase, endaalo yino olakaanana ne babaandu babili siimbi a siliindwa sia Raeli e Selisa mu maloba ka Benjamini. Ne balakhuboolela bali, ‘Chipunda nicho wachiile khuyiima chanyoolekhe. Ne luno liliembeelela lia raraao liarurire khu punda liakoboole khwiwe. Alareebanga ali, “Omwana wase, ekhola ndiena?’
Nio olachiililila khukhwama abwenao nabwila wola khu murumba kwe Tabori. Ebweeneyo olakaanana babaandu bataru balikho bacha khu Wele e Beteli. Mulala alaba aasutile chimeeme chitaru, ne okundi alaba asutile kimikaati kitaru, ne owe khataru alaba asutile eoochwa eye endali.
Ne balakhukheesia mala bakhuelesie kimikaati kibili nikio olafukiilila.
Enyuma wako olacha Kibeati-eloimu niio ekambi eye banamae be Bafilisiti eli. Ebweeneyo nga ne wingila mu lukoba olakaanana ne sipupu sie bang'oosi silikho siikha khukhwama abuundu aesuta ne baapa kamatuungu, etamburini, kimilele ne siilili. Balaba balikho bakhola bung'oosi.
Nio Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhwichakho ne kamaani mala olakhola bung'oosi nabo mala okaluukhane obe busa omundu okundi.
Nono bimanyisio bino ne bikhwichakho, khola nisio onyala wakhola sikila Wele ali ne nawe.
Ne okharangire ebweeni wase oche e Kilikali. Ndikho nicha khwiwe khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia ne khuaana biianwa bie kumuleembe. Okhaliinde chindaalo saba nabwila nicha khwiwe mala khwekesie nisio okhola.”
Nga Saulo ne ayuukha alekha Samweli, Wele aakaluukhasia kumwoyo kwa Saulo. Ne bimanyisio ebio bioosi biakholekha endaalo eyo.
Nga Saulo ne omukholi wewe baba Kibea, sipupu sie bang'oosi siamwakaanana. Ne Roho owa Wele eecha khu Saulo ne kamaani mala Saulo akhola bung'oosi nabo.
Ne nga babaandu ba baaba ne bamumanya khale bamubona nga ne arusianga bung'oosi ne bang'oosi bareebana bali, “Siina sisiikholeekhe khu okhwa Kishi? Saulo yesi ali mulala khu bang'oosi?”
Ne Omundu mulala owamenya abwenao areeba ali, “Ne Paapa owe bang'oosi bano niye naanu?” Lireeba bali, “Saulo yesi ali mulala khu bang'oosi?” Liekhola lusimo.
Nga Saulo ne amala khukhola bung'oosi, aniina abuundu aesuta.
Paapa owa Saulo okundi areeba Saulo ne omukholi wewe ali, “Mwachilenge waena?”
Saulo aakobosia ali, “Khuyiima chipunda. Nga ne khwaboone khuli se chinyala chanyoolekhwa tawe, khwacha khu Samweli.”
Ne Paapa owa Saulo okundi chana areeba ali, “Nosiima mboolele niko Samweli akhubooleele.”
Ne Saulo akobosia raraawe oyo ali, “Akhuboolele buwaanga ali chipunda chanyoolekhe.” Ne kakhali kamakhuwa ke bubwami, niko Samweli aalomaloma, Saulo se aboolelakho raraawe okundi oyo sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
Nono Samweli alanga babaandu alala khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Misipa.
Mala ababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Narusia Isiraeli khukhwama e Misiri mala namusikula enywe khukhwama khu Bamisiri ne khu bwami bwoosi bubwaba ne bwamumiina enywe.’
Ne kakhali luno mwalekhile Wele wenywe, omusikulanga khukhwama mu minaanio kienywe kioosi ne mu butinyu. Lundi mwalomile muli, ‘Tawe! Ne kakhali khwamiisilie omwami.’ Nono, yiicha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuloondekhana ne chikholo chenywe.”
Nio Samweli akhola chikholo choosi checha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala ekholo eya Benjamini yabukulwa khubirira mu kura.
Samweli aareera ekholo eya Benjamini khuloondekhana nende buli luya lwabwe. Ne luuya lwa maturi lwabukulwa khubirira mu kura. Ekhumaliilikha aareera ebweeni luuya lwa Maturi omundu sia mulala mala Saulo okhwa Kishi aaroborwa. Ne kakhali nga ne bamuenja, se anyoolekhana tawe.
Bareeba lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Omundu oyo echile ano?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakobosia ali, “Aliio ekisile mu bikuku.”
Nio batimaka bacha bareera Saulo khukhwama ebweeneyo. Ne nga eema ebweeni we babaandu, aba omuleeyi khukhila babaandu boosi, khukhwama mu mabeka khuniina.
Ne Samweli areeba babaandu boosi ali, “Mwaboone omundu niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aroboore? Se aliio omundu nga niye mu baandu boosi tawe.”
Ne babaandu boosi bayokela bali, “Omwami akhoya ayindila!”
Nio Samweli aaboolela babaandu bunyali ne kimilimo kie bubwami. Ne abiaandika mu sitabu mala ara sitabu esio ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio Samweli aboolela babaandu bacha buli mundu engo wewe.
Saulo yesi akobola engo wewe e Kibea. Acha ne babaandu be kamaani nibo Wele atiila kimiooyo.
Ne kakhali babaandu balala be sipoli baloma bali, “Omundu yuno anyala akhusikula efwe ariena?” Mala balekelesia Saulo ne se bamureererakho biianwa tawe. Ne kakhali Saulo asila busa.

Nio Nahasi Omuamoni aniina abotookhelesia Yabesi-Kileati. Ne babaandu ba Yabesi baboolela Nahasi bali, “Khola endakaano ne nafwe mala efwe khulakhukholela.”
Ne kakhali Nahasi Omuamoni akobosia ali, “Ese ndakhola endakaano ne nanywe khu likhuwa lilala. Murusiemo buli mundu emoni eye kumukhono kumuseecha mala khu lino ndeere chisoni khu Isiraeli.”
Basaakhulu ba Yabesi bamuboolela bali, “Khuelesie chindaalo saba che kumuleembe khurume barumwa mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi. Ne omundu aaba ne akhalimo onyala aakhusikula efwe tawe, aba nono khuleana fwabene khwiwe.”
Barumwa nga bacha boola e Kibea niio Saulo amenyanga, baboola kamakhuwa ako babaandu ne barekeeresiisie. Mala boosi barakikha khulila lukali.
Nono, Saulo aba alikho aama e mukuunda, enyuma we chieeyi. Ne Saulo areeba ali, “Siina silikho silisia babaandu?” Nio bamuboolela ke babaandu ba Yabesi.
Nga Saulo ne aulila kamakhuwa kano, Roho owa Wele amwichakho ne kamaani mala lirima liamuaamba likali.
Abukula chieeyi chibili, achibakamo bitonyi bibili mala abiyila ne barumwa mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi ne ababoolela ali, “Kano niko kakhekholekhe khu khaafu cho mundu yesi yesi okhaloonda khu Saulo ne Samweli mwiie tawe!”
Liria lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liecha khu baandu, mala boosi barura busa oli omundu mulala.
Saulo aababuusia alala e Beseki. Baba babaandu chielefu chimia chitaru khukhwama mu Isiraeli. Ne babaandu ba Yuda baba chielefu kamakhumi kataru.
Nio baboolela barumwa babaama Yabesi bali, “Boolela babaandu ba Yabesi-Kileati muli, ‘Muchuli, khukhwola mwiangilwe, mukhabe mwasikulibwe.’ ” Nga barumwa ne bacha baboolela babaandu ba Yabesi, babaandu abo bekhoya lukali.
Nono babaandu ba Yabesi baboolela Nahasi bali, “Muchuli khukheaane khwiwe mala onyala wakhukhola nisio abona oli silayi khwiwe.”
Nga bwasia, Saulo aara babaandu bewe mu bipupu bitaru. Mala becha akari we kambi makhelebeende. Beera Baamoni khukhwola mwiangilwe. Ne babarama basalaanila, buli mundu yeng'ene.
Nio, babaandu bareeba Samweli bali, “Naanu ba balomile bali Saulo se aba omwami wefwe tawe? Reera babaandu abo mala khubeere.”
Ne kakhali Saulo aaloma ali, “Se aliio omundu oleerwa endaalo yino tawe. Sikila endaalo yino eli niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asikuliile Isiraeli.”
Samweli aaboolela babaandu ali, “Yiicha khuche e Kilikali mala khurakikhisie bubwami.”
Nio babaandu boosi bacha e Kilikali mala ebweeneyo bakhola Saulo khuuba omwami ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi ebweeneyo bakhola chimbosio che biianwa bie kumuleembe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mala lundi ebweeneyo Saulo ne Baisiraeli boosi bekhoya lukali.

Nio Samweli aboolela Isiraeli yoosi ali, “Ese nauliile koosi niko mwalomile mala namueleesie enywe omwami.
Nono luno muli no mwami nga omwimeelesi wenywe. Ne ese ndi omusaakhulu, ne chimbuchi, ne basoleeli base bali ne nanywe. Ese nabeele omwimeelesi wenywe khukhwama mu buele bwase khukhwola luno.
Ese niye oyu. Lomaloma bubi bwase ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ebweeni wo omuchukhekho kamafura wewe. Eeyi eya naanu niyo nabukula? Epunda eya naanu niyo nabukula? Namwe naanu niye nabukula bibiewe khulwe khurumikhira bubeeyi? Naanu niye naumisia? Namwe naanu owambongelakho khubofusia chimoni chase? Rusia buloli bwe bubi bwase mala endaruunga.”
Babaandu bakobosia bali, “Tawe ewe se wakhubukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe khurumikhira bubeeyi, namwe se wakhuumisiakho efwe tawe. Ne ewe se wabukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi khukhwama khu mundu tawe.”
Nio Samweli ababoolela ali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye buloli khwinywe, ne oyo ooli omurobore niye omuloli endaalo yino khukhwekesia bali se mwanyoolilekho ne kamabi tawe.
Bakobosia bali, “Yee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye omuloli wefwe.”
Nono, yiima niio muli ao. Ne ese ndamulilila enywe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuloondekhana ne bikholwa bioosi bie buonia bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nibio aamukholela enywe ne bapaapa benywe.
Nga Yakobo ne acha Misiri, Bamisiri baapia siibi lisaaye liewe. Nio lisaaye liewe lialilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma Musa ne Aruni, ba baabarusia nibo khukhwama mu Misiri mala baabakhola baamenya abuundu ano.
Ne kakhali bebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abara mu bunyali bwa Sisera komanda owe banamae bo mwami Yabini, omwami owa Hasori. Lundi aabalekhuulila Bafilisiti ne Bamoabu ba bapana ne nabo.
Ne balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baloma bali, ‘Khwakholile bubwoni sikila khwalekhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala khwakholeele Baali ne Asitaroti. Ne kakhali luno khusikule khukhwama khu Basiku befwe, ne khulakhukholela ewe.’
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma Yerubaali, ne Baraka ne Yefuta ne Samweli. Mala amusikula enywe khukhwama khu basiku benywe chimbeka choosi mala mwamenya mu muleembe.
Ne nga mwabona Nahasi omwami owa Amoni echa khumwibwaakala, mwamboolela muli ‘Tawe, ne kakhali omwami alakhwamiia efwe’, akhaba ne mwamanya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aba omwami wenywe.
“Nono luno Omwami niye mwaroboore niye oyu, omwami niye mwareebire niye oyu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwamiisilie omwami.
Murie omwami mala mumukholele. Muulile ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne mukhaukhakho khukhwama khu malaka kewe tawe. Mwakhola murio mala enywe ne omwami wenywe mwaloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, mukhabe bulayi.
Ne mwaloba khuulila ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala mwarura khu malaka kewe, akhamubiile enywe ne omwami wenywe.
Nono yiima mala mubone sisiindu siboofu sino nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhole mu moni chenywe.
Sino se sili siise sie khukesa engaanu? Ndasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areere likukuma lie likulu ne efula. Ne mukhamanye ne khubona muli bubwoni bwenywe buli bukali, niko mwakholeele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khukhwiyenyela omwami.”
Khwako Samweli asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma likukuma lie likulu ne efula endaalo eyo. Babaandu boosi baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne Samweli lukali.
Ne babaandu boosi baboolela Samweli bali, “Sabila bakholi bowo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo, nio khukhafwa tawe. Sikila khwatasile khu bwoni bwefwe bwoosi bumayaanu buno, khukhwiyenyela omwami.”
Samweli akobosia babaandu ali, “Mukharia tawe. Mwakholile bumayaanu buno, ne kakhali mukhaukhakho mwalekha khuloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, ne kakhali, mukholele ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.
Mukhaukhakho mwaloonda bawele bakhali ne bukhala tawe. Sikila se bakhamuyeete namwe bamuonie tawe sikila se bali ne bukhala tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhamwaate babaandu bewe tawe khulwe lisina liewe liili liboofu. Ne lundi asiimisibwa khumukhola enywe mube babaandu bewe.
Lundi bubwoni bwe khukhwakama khumusabila enywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bukhoya bwaba aleeyi ne nase. Ne ndamwekesia enywe kaali kamalayi lundi ka ng'ali.
Khukhila koosi, ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mumukholele mu bweikinwa ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi. Khebulila bibiindu biboofu nibio amukholeele enywe.
Mwaba ne muchiililila khukhola bumayaanu, enywe ne omwami wenywe mukhabunisibwe.”

Saulo aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko. . .
Saulo arobora babaandu chielefu chitaru ba Isiraeli. Ne babaandu chielefu chibili baba ne Saulo e Mikimashi ne mu sibala sie chingulu sia Beteli. Ne babaandu eelefu ndala nabo baba ne Yonasani e Kibea mu Benjamini. Ne babaandu babasikala boosi Saulo ababoolela bakobole engo buli mundu mu liiema liewe.
Yonasani aula banamae be Bafilisiti mu Keba mala Bafilisiti bakaulila. Nio Saulo apa ekhoombi mu sibala sioosi ne aloma ali, “Lekha Baeburania baulile.”
Baisiraeli boosi baulila bali Saulo erire banamae be Bafilisiti mala ako kakilile Bafilisiti babiile Baisiraeli. Nio babaandu balaangwa khuambaana ne Saulo e Kilikali.
Ne Bafilisiti bebuusia alala khu khuupana ne Baisiraeli. Bafilisiti baba ne kamakaari ke liie chielefu kamakhumi kataru ne babaandu batimia chifarasi che mwiie chielefu sita, ne banamae bakali nga kumuyekhe kwe mu nyanja ne bali alala. Bacha mala baapa ekambi e Mikimashi, ebukwe owa Beta-beni.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli nga babona bali mu butinyu sikila babaandu baba baminikhwa, bekisa mu mabina ne mumaloo ne mu mabaale nende niio biliindwa biaba ne kamaloo kakayabwa ke kameechi.
Babaandu bambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani bacha mu sibala sia Kati ne Kileati.
Saulo aba asili e Kilikali. Ne babaandu boosi bamuloondakho ne bareenga.
Saulo alindiilila Samweli khulwe chindaalo saba, siise nisio Samweli arobora. Ne Samweli se echa e Kilikali tawe. Ne Babaandu baba balikho basalaanila khukhwama khu Saulo.
Nio Saulo aloma ali, “Ndereere ano siianwa sie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie kumuleembe.” Mala aana biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Nga ne amala busa ari khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia, Samweli echa. Saulo arura khucha khumwakaanana ne khumukheesia.
Mala Samweli amureeba ali, “Siina nisio okholile sino?”
Ne Saulo amukobosia ali, “Mboone babaandu balikho basalaanila khukhwama khwise mala ewe se wechile mu ndaalo chichenyekhana tawe. Lundi abeele Bafilisiti bebuusiisie e Mikimashi.
Nio nebaasia ndi, ‘Bafilisiti balikho becha khu khunjibwaakalila e Kilikali, mala se nareebire kumwalaalo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.’ Nio niyingiliile, mala naana siianwa sie khukhwosia.”
Samweli akobosia Saulo ali, “Okholile ke busilu. Ewe se wariire lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo nilio akhulaka tawe. Nono luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakholile bubwami bwowo bwachiililila mu Isiraeli mindali na mindali.
Ne kakhali luno bubwami bwowo se bulachiililila tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ayiimile omundu osiimisia kumwoyo kwewe. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amurobore niye khuba omwami owe babaandu bewe. Sikila ewe se wariire niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulaka tawe.”
Samweli enyokha mala acha khukhwama e Kilikali khukhwola e Kibea eya Benjamini. Saulo abala babaandu nibo aba nabo. Baba babaandu chimia sita.
Ne Saulo ne omusoleeli wewe Yonasani ne babaandu ba babao bamenya Keba mu sibala sia Benjamini. Ne Bafilisiti baapa ekambi e Mikimashi.
Ne banuuli barura khukhwama mu kambi eye Bafilisiti mu bipupu bitaru. Sipupu silala sialola lubeka lwa Ofura, mu sibala sia Saulo.
Sipupu sisiindi sialola sibala lubeka lwa Beti-horoni ne sipupu sie khataru sialola lubeka lwe khu lwakha lulwaloleelela litooma lia Seboimu lubeka lwe mu sichiimi.
Nono omubasi se aabao mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi tawe. Sikila Bafilisiti baloma bali, “Baeburania bakhola bario babasa chimbalu ne kamafumo.”
Ne kakhali buli Muisiraeli achichanga khu Bafilisiti khuakala chisungura, chimbako, chiaywa ne chingeso.
Kumuruungo kwe khuakala eaywa nende khukhwiikha kwaba esimiri ndala. Ne kumuruungo kwe khuakala esungura namwe embako kwaba chisimiri chitaru.
Nono khu ndaalo eye liie se abao omundu khu baandu ba baba ne Saulo ne Yonasani owaba ne embalu namwe lifumo tawe. Ne kakhali Saulo ne omwana wewe Yonasani bong'ene ba baba ne nabio.
Ne banamae be Bafilisiti bacha a sibanga sie khukhwingila e Mikimashi.

Endaalo ndala Yonasani, okhwa Saulo aboolela omuele owamusutilanga bulwaani bwewe ali, “Khuche mu kambi eye banamae be Bafilisiti eeli lubeka olwo.” Ne kakhali Yonasani se aboolelakho raraawe tawe.
Saulo amenyanga a lwakha lwe lukoba lwa Kibea, a murongooro kumukomanga kuuli e Mikironi. Babaandu nibo aba ne nabo baba chimia sita.
Ne Ahiya yesi abayo. Aba efwarire Efodi. (Ahiya aba okhwa Ahitubu, Ahitubu aba wandaaye owa Ikabodi. Ikabodi aba okhwa Fineasi. Ne Fineasi aba okhwa Eli, omusaayi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Shilo). Ne babaandu se bamanya bali Yonasani aba achile tawe.
Sibaanga nisio Yonasani ayima khubirira ache mu kambi eye banamae be Bafilisiti, siabamo kamabaale kamaleeyi kamooki chimbeka chombi. Libaale lilala lilangaangwa bali Bosesi ne liliindi bali Sene.
Bubwooki bulala bwalola ebunaswa ebweeni wa Mikimashi ne bubuundi bwaloleelela ebunafubo ebweeni wa Keba.
Ne Yonasani aboolela omuele wewe owasutanga bulwaani bwewe ali, “Yiicha khuche mu kambi eye banamae basiinde bano. Wakana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhuyeeta. Sikila mbao sinyala siakhiingilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuonia khulwe khurumikhira batiiti namwe bakali tawe.”
Ne owamusutilanga bulwaani oyo amukobosia ali, “Khola bioosi nibio wibaasia khukhola. Ese ndi ne nawe. Kamebaasio kowo niko kakaase.”
Nio Yonasani aaloma ali, “Khulambukha khuche niio babaandu abo bali mala khweyekesie fwabene khu nibo.
Baaba ne bakhuboolela bali, ‘Liinda khukhwola nga khumwolakho’ aba khulema niio khuli ne se khulacha niio nibo bali tawe.
Ne baaba ne bakhuboolela bali, ‘Yiicha niio khuli’ ne efwe khucha. Sikila aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuele efwe bukhili khu nibo. Ne sino silaba simanyisio khwifwe.”
Nono boombi bacha beyokesia ebweeni we banamae be Bafilisiti. Ne Bafilisiti baloma bali, “Lola, Baeburania balikho becha khukhwama mu maloo nimwo bekisilenge!”
Ne babaandu be kambi balaanga Yonasani ne omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe bali, “Yiicha niio khuli mala khulamwekesia sisiindu.”
Ne Yonasani aboolela omusuti owe bulwaani bewe ali, “Nondekho, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aele Isiraeli bukhili khu nibo.”
Nio Yonasani aaniina aacha khulwe khurumikhira kamakhono ne bikele ne omusuti wewe owe bulwaani aba amuloondilekho. Ne Bafilisiti bakwa ebweeni wa Yonasani mala omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe aloondakho abeera.
Ne liliira lie khunyoa elio nilio Yonasani ne omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe bakhola, liaba lie babaandu embi kamakhumi kabili. Liriira elio liakholekhela mu sitonyi sie bulime.
Ne liabao lireenga mu kambi, mu mikuunda ne mu baandu boosi. Ekambi eye banamae ne banuuli bosi banikina. Sibala siareenga, mala liaba lireenga liboofu.
Ne baliindi ba Saulo Kibea mu sibala sia Benjamini balola mala babona sipupu silikho sisalaanila eyi ne eyi.
Nio Saulo aboolela babaandu ba baaba ne naye ali, “Bala mala mumanye naanu okhulekhile.” Ne nga bamala khubala, Yonasani ne omusuti owe bulwaani se babao tawe.
Nio Saulo aboolela Ahiya ali, “Reera ano Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele.” Sikila Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele liaba mu baandu ba Isiraeli mu biise ebio.
Nga Saulo ne aba ne alikho alomaloma ne omusaayi khurangararwa khukali khwatasikha mu kambi eye Bafilisiti. Ne Saulo aboolela omusaayi ali, “Rusiayo kumukhono kwowo.”
Nio Saulo ne babaandu boosi ba baaba ne naye bebuusia alala mala bacha mwiie. Banyoola Bafilisiti baba balikho bapana babene ne babene mala baba ne likoyaana likali.
Baeburania balala baba lubeka lwe Bafilisiti biise bibiaba ne bibirire mala bacha mu kambi ne Bafilisiti. Baeburania abo bosi bakaluukhana mala baambana ne Saulo ne Yonasani.
Baisiraeli balala baba bekisa mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Boosi nga baulila bali Bafilisiti balikho belukha, baloonda khu Baisiraeli mwiie.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asikula Isiraeli endaalo eyo. Ne liie liachiililila liabira Beta-beni.
Endaalo eyo babaandu ba Isiraeli bamiinikhwa sikila Saulo aana liliechubo khu baandu ne aloma ali, “Omundu yesi yesi olia siakhulia ne ekhola ekolooba tawe mala ese ne ekheyachile basiku base tawe alaamwe!” Nono mbakhoo omundu owalia siakhulia tawe.
Ne babaandu boosi bacha mu musiru. Ebweeneyo banyoolayo bubuukhi asi.
Babaandu nga bengila mu musiru, babona bubuukhi bulikho buchichukha, se aliio omundu owabukhombakho tawe. Sikila babaandu baria liliechubo.
Ne kakhali Yonasani aba se aulila raraawe ne aelesia babaandu liliechubo tawe. Nono arusia esiimbo niyo aba nayo akironga mu masasara ke bubuukhi mala aakhomba. Ne eulila bulayi.
Nio omundu mulala amuboolela ali, “Raraao abooleele babaandu mu khutanyilila ali, ‘Omundu oolia siakhulia endaalo yino alaamwe. Nono babaandu se bali ne kamaani tawe.’ ”
Yonasani aakobosia ali, “Paapa areerire butinyu khu baandu. Lola nga ne niiulila bulayi! Sikila akhoombilekho bubuukhi buno butiiti.
Abanga babaandu baliile endaalo yino biakhulia nibio banulile khukhwama khu basiku babwe andi babeele bulayi. Lundi andi berire Bafilisiti bakali khukhilakho.”
Endaalo eyo Baisiraeli beera Bafilisiti khukhwama Mikimashi khukhwola Aiyaloni. Mala babaandu baluwa lukali.
Babaandu basuna khu nibio baambile babukula kamakheese ne chieeyi ne chimoosi beerera abwene, mala balia chinyama kamalasile ne kasiilimo.
Nio likhuwa lioolela Saulo bali, “Lola babaandu balikho bakhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khulia chinyama chilimo kamalasile.”
Ne Saulo aloma ali, “Mwakholile bubwoni. Piringisia libaale liboofu mundeerere ano.”
Ne aloma ali, “Salaanila mu baandu mala mubaboolele muli lekha buli mundu areere ano eeyi yewe namwe likheese liewe, mubikhonyele ano mala mulie. Ne kakhali mukhakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubwoni khulwe khulia chinyama chilimo kamalasile tawe.” Nio buli mundu areera eeyi siilo esio mala bakhonyela ebweeneyo.
Ne Saulo ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare. Eyo niyo eyaba alutare eye khunyoa niyo Saulo oombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Saulo aloma ali, “Lekha khwikhe khuloonde khu Bafilisiti mala khubebwaakale mu silo khubanuule khukhwola nga busia. Khukhalekhakho omundu khu nibo tawe.”
Babaandu bamukobosia bali, “Khola nilio olola oli lili lilayi khwiwe.”
Ne omusaayi aloma ali, “Lekha khureebe Wele nio.”
Nio Saulo areeba Wele ali, “Nibwaakale Bafilisiti? Olakhukhola khubaule?” Ne kakhali endaalo eyo Wele se akobosia tawe.
Nio Saulo aloma ali, “Yiicha ano, babemeelesi be babaandu mweesi, mulole mala mumanyilisie bubwoni siina bubwekholeekhe.
Sikila khukhwola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, oosikulanga Isiraeli, akhaba ne ali omwana wase Yonasani, alafwa.” Ne kakhali se abao omundu mu baandu boosi owamukobosia tawe.
Nio aboolela Isiraeli yoosi ali, “Mulaba lubeka lulala. Ese ne omwana wase Yonasani khulaba lubeka luluundi.” Nio babaandu baboolela Saulo bali, “Khola nisio olola oli sili silayi khwiwe.”
Nio Saulo aaloma ali, “Khupa chikura akari wase ne omwana wase Yonasani.” Nio Yonasani aabukulwa khubirira mu khuupa chikura.
Nio Saulo areeba Yonasani ali, “Mboolele nisio okholile.”
Ne Yonasani amuboolela ali, “Khombilekho busa bubuukhi butiiti buri khulwe khurumikhira esiimbo eye mukhono mwase. Ese niye oyu. Nenyikhane efwe ku?”
Ne Saulo aloma ali, “Wele akhoya ambelesie ese kumunaanio Yonasani waaba bali se ofwa tawe.”
Nio babaandu bareeba Saulo bali, “Yonasani anyala afwe enyuma we khurera bukhili bukali buno mu Isiraeli? Tawe! Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, aakhaba lichuune lilala lie khumurwe kwewe se lilakhunyukhakho likwe asi tawe.
