Niko akholile endaalo yino akholile ne buyeeti bwa Wele.” Nono babaandu basikula Yonasani mala khwirwa tawe.
Nio Saulo aalekha khutimania Bafilisiti, mala bakobola ewabwe.
Nga Saulo ne abukula bubwami bwa Isiraeli, apana ne basiku bewe boosi chimbeka choosi. Apana ne Bamoabu, Baamoni, ne Baedomu. Apana akhaba ne babaami ba Soba, ne Bafilisiti. Buli abuundu niio apana akhilanga.
Apana ne bunyindaafu mala eera Baamaleki. Asikula Baisiraeli khukhwama khu abo ba babanuulanga.
Nono ba okhwa Saulo baba: Yonasani, Isibi ne Malikishua. Lisina lio mukhaana wewe omubele liaba bali Merabu ne omuro aba bali Mikali.
Ne lisina lio mukhasi owa Saulo liaba bali Ahinoamu, omukhaana owa Ahimasi. Ne lisina lia komanda owe banamae bewe liaba Abuneri okhwa Neri. (Neri aba raraawe owa Saulo omuro.
Kishi aba raraawe owa Saulo. Ne Neri raraawe owa Abuneri, aba okhwa Abieli.)
Mu bulamu bwa Saulo bwoosi bukhupani burafu ne Bafilisiti bwabao. Ne buli lwosi nga Saulo ne abonanga omundu we kamaani namwe omunyindaafu amubukulanga amukholela niye.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali aloma ali, ‘Khaelesie Baamaleki kumunaanio sikila niko bakholela Baisiraeli nga babakhiingilila ne balikho barura Misiri.
Nono cha mala wiire Baamaleki mala obunisilie elala buli siindu nisio bali ne nasio. Okhalekhakho sisiindu tawe. Yiira be siseecha nende be siikhasi, babaana nende bang'alia, chieeyi ne kamakheese, chingamia ne chipunda.’ ”
Nono Saulo alaanga babaandu e Telemu mala aababala. Baba babaandu chielefu chimia chibili babakeendelanga khu bikele ne babaandu chielefu ekhumi mu Yuda.
Nio Saulo ne babaandu bewe bacha mu lukoba lwe Baamaleki mala bekisa mwitooma balindiilila.
Ne Saulo aboolela Bakenayi ali, “Cha murure khukhwama mu Baamaleki ne busa ndamubunia enywe alala ne nabo. Sikila enywe mwekesia bulayi khu baandu ba Isiraeli boosi nga ne baba ne bama e Misiri.” Nono Bakenayi bacha barura mu Baamaleki.
Saulo aula Baamaleki khukhwama Habila khukhwola Siuri lubeka lwe bukwe owa Misiri.
Abukula Akaki omwami owe Baamaleki ne ali omulamu mala aabunisilia elala babaandu boosi mu khurumikhira embalu
Ne kakhali Saulo ne babaandu bewe balekha Akaki. Lundi se aabunia kamakheese kamalayi, ne chieeyi chindayi, ne kamameeme namwe bioosi bibiaba bilayi tawe. Babunisilia elala bioosi bibialekwa nende bikhaaba bie bukhala tawe.
Likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liecha khu Samweli lili,
“Nebiiya nga nakhola Saulo aaba omwami. Sikila anjaukhekho mala se anondilekho tawe. Ne se akholile nga kamalaka kase ne kali tawe.” Samweli aambwa lirima mala alilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siilo sioosi.
Nio enyokha makhelebeende endaalo eyaloondakho mala aacha khukhwakaanana ne Saulo. Ne babaandu baboolela Samweli bali, “Saulo achile Karimeli niio eyombakhile sifwaani mala ayukha aacha e Kilikali.”
Samweli acha niio Saulo ali. Ne Saulo amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhubiite ewe chikhabi. Nakholile nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aandaka.”
Ne Samweli amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mbulila kamakheese ne kameleela ne chikhaafu ne chimoloola?”
Saulo amukobosia ali, “Babireerire khukhwama khu Baamaleki. Balekhile kamakheese kamanefu ne chikhaafu chinefu babiaane nga embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Ne bibiindi bioosi khubibunisilie elala.”
Nio Samweli aboolela Saulo ali, “Sila. Endakhuboolela niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambooleele siilo sibirire sino.”
Saulo aaloma ali, “Mboolele.”
Samweli aaloma ali, “Akhaba ne oli omukeekhe, ewe oli omwimeelesi owe chikholo cha Isiraeli. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuchukhakho kamafura obe omwami owa Isiraeli.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuruma okhole kimilimo ne aloma ali, ‘Cha obunisilie elala bamayaanu Baamaleki. Khupana ne nabo khukhwola nga ne beerwa boosi.’
Siina sikila nono ewe ne okharia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe? Siina sikila ne otima khuyaayana bie mwiie, mala ne okhola kaali kamamayaanu mumoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Nio Saulo amukobosia ali, “Ese nariire Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nakholile niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aanduma khukhola. Nareerire Akaki omwami owo Amaleki ne nabunisilie elala Baamaleki.
Ne kakhali babaandu babukule bie mwiie, kamakheese ne chikhaafu ne bibiindu bilayi bibienyekha khubunisibwa, nio babiaane nga embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo e Kilikali.”
Ne Samweli areeba ali,
“Siina sisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukali?
Biianwa bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio,
namwe khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Khuria khukhila embosio,
ne khuulila khukhila kamamiiku kamanefu.
Khulekha khuria khuli nga bumayaanu bwe bulakusi
ne sileka sili nga bumayaanu bwe khusaaya bifwaani.
Sikila walobile likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulobile ewe nga omwami.”
Mala Saulo amukobosia ali, “Nakholile bumayaanu. Sikila nalekeleesie lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kamakhuwa kowo. Naria babaandu mala nakhola niko benya.
Nono luno khusaba umbeele bubwoni bwase mala okobole ne nase e Kilikali, nio saaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Ne kakhali Samweli aboolela Saulo ali, “Se ndakobolayo ne nawe tawe. Sikila ewe walekile likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulobile ewe nga omwami owa Isiraeli.”
Ne Samweli amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atabuule bubwami bwa Isiraeli khukhwama khwiwe endaalo yino. Ne abuelesie owasio ooli omulayi khukhukhila ewe.
Wele ooli luyali lwa Isiraeli se akhabee namwe eebiiye tawe. Sikila se ali omundu nio eebiiye tawe.”
Ne Saulo aloma ali, “Nakholile bubwoni. Ne kakhali mbeekho lukoosi ebweeni we babemeelesi be babaandu base nende Isiraeli yoosi. Kobolayo ne nase, nio ese saaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.”
Nono Samweli akobola e Kilikali ne Saulo mala Saulo asaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Samweli aloma ali, “Ndeerere ano Akaki omwami owe Baamaleki.” Ne Akaki acha niio Samweli aba ne busangaafu ne aloma ali, “Ng'ali se efwa lundi tawe!”
Samweli aloma ali, “Nga embalu yowo ne yakhola bakhasi bakali bataamba babaana, luno wesi maao alataamba babaana.” Ne Samweli aremakaka Akaki mu bitonyi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Kilikali.
Nio Samweli aacha e Rama. Ne Saulo acha e Kibea mu lukoba lwewe.
Khukhwola mu lifwa liewe, Samweli se abonakho Saulo lundi tawe. Ne kakhali Samweli abeelela sikila Saulo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eebiiya nga ne akhola Saulo omwami owa Isiraeli.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Samweli ali, “Olabeelela khu Saulo khukhwola liina? Ese namulobile niye khuuba omwami owa Isiraeli. Yichusia mu lwiika lwowo kamafura mala oche. Ndakhuruma khu Chesi omenyile e Betelehemu. Naroboore mulala khu basoleeli bewe abe omwami.”
Ne Samweli aloma ali, “Ndacha ndiena? Saulo ne alaulilakho lino, alanjira.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Bukula emoosi ekhasi oche ne nayo mala olome oli, nechile khuaana embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Laanga Chesi eeche niio olikho oaanila embosio, mala ndakhwekesia nisio kane okhole. Kane ochukhe kamafura khu mundu niye ndakhuboolela lisina liewe.”
Samweli aakhola nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka, mala aacha e Betelehemu. Basaakhulu be lukoba bacha khumwakaanila ne balikho bareenga. Bamureeba bali, “Wechile mu muleembe?”
Aakobosia ali, “Yee, nechile mu muleembe. Nechile khuaana embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Yikwalaasia mu miooyo mala mwiche ne nase abuundu niio mbaanila embosio.” Atakaasa Chesi ne babaana bewe mala abalaanga becha niio aanila embosio.
Nga ne boola, Samweli abona Eliabu mala ebaasia ali, “Ng'ali omuchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Samweli ali, “Okhalola lukoondo lwa Eliabu namwe buleeyi bwewe tawe. Sikila ese namulobile. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alolanga nga omundu busa tawe. Omundu alolanga lukoondo lwe enje, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alolanga kumwoyo.”
Nio Chesi alaanga Abinatabu mala aamukhola abire ebweeni wa Samweli. Ne kakhali Samweli aloma ali, “Akhaba yuno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se amuroboore tawe.”
Ne Chesi areera Shama ebweeni wa Samweli. Samweli aloma ali, “Tawe, akhaba niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se amuroboore tawe.”
Chesi lundi areera basoleeli bewe saba ebweeni wa Samweli. Ne Samweli amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aroboore bano tawe.”
Nio Samweli areeba Chesi ali, “Babaana bowo boosi bali ano?”
Chesi aamukobosia ali, “Asikaleyo omutua ne kakhali achile khukhwaya kamakheese.”
Samweli aboolela Saulo ali, “Rumania eeche ano. Se khulekhala asi tawe, khukhwola nga ne eecha.”
Nio Chesi aarumania mala omwana wewe omutua alaangwa echa. Nono omwana oyo aba omusoleeli omubesemu owe lukoondo lulayi ne chimoni chindayi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Samweli ali, “Niye yuno. Yinyokha oche omuchukhekho kamafura.”
Nio Samweli aabukula lulwiika lwe kamafura mala achukha khu Daudi kamafura ebweeni we bawandaaye. Ne Daudi echusibwa ne Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama endaalo eyo. Ne Samweli enyokha akobola e Rama.
Nono Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arura mu Saulo mala roho omubi aarumwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khumupia siibi.
Bakholi ba Saulo bamureeba bali, “Roho omubi khukhwama khu Wele alikho akhuupia ewe siibi.
Omwami laka bakholi bowo baali ebweeni wowo bayiime omundu omanyile khu khuupa lituungu. Ne nga roho omubi khukhwama khu Wele ne akhwichakho, omundu oyo anyala aapa lituungu liewe mala olaba bulayi lundi.”
Nono Saulo aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Yiima omundu omanyile khu khuupa bulayi mala mundeerere.”
Mulala khu bakholi bewe baele aamukobosia ali, “Nabona omusoleeli owa Chesi omenyile mu lukoba lwa Betelehemu, omukhupi we lituungu omulayi. Ali omundu omunyindaafu, owe lukoondo lulayi omunamae omulayi lundi omulomalomi omulayi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne naye.”
Nono Saulo aruma barumwa khu Chesi ne amuboolela ali, “Ndeerere omusoleeli wowo Daudi owaayanga kamakheese oyo.”
Ne Chesi abukula epunda akirakho kimikaati, eoochwa eye ndali nende emeeme mala aelesia Daudi ayilile Saulo.
Ne Daudi eecha khu Saulo mala arakikha khumukholela. Saulo aasiima Daudi lukali mala aamurobora nga omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe.
Ne Saulo aruma likhuwa khu Chesi ne aloma ali, “Lekha Daudi achiililile khuuba omukholi wase sikila anyoolile kumwalaalo ebweeni wase.”
Ne buli lwosi nga roho omubi khukhwama khu Wele ne echanga khu Saulo, Daudi abukulanga lituungu mala ne aapa. Nono Saulo aulila bulayi mala roho omubi amururakho.

Nono Bafilisiti babuusia banamae babwe alala bapane liie. Bebuusia e Soko, lukoba lwa Yuda, mala baapa ekambi a Efesi-tamimu akari wa Soko ne Aseka.
Ne Saulo ne babaandu ba Isiraeli babuusiana mala baapa Ekambi mwitooma lia Ela mala berekekha khu khuupana ne Bafilisiti.
Bafilisiti bema khu lukulu lubeka lulala ne Baisiraeli bema khu lukulu lubeka luluundi. Litooma liaba akari we Baisiraeli ne Bafilisiti.
Ne omunamae mulala bali Koliati khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Katihi arura mu kambi eye Bafilisiti. Koliati aba embi chimita chitaru buleeyi.
Afwaranga ekofio eye kumukasa khumurwe. Lundi efwaranga engubo eye kimikasa ne busiro bwayo bwaba bulekhaana ne bitonyi chielefu chiraano bie kumukasa.
Afwaranga bikhiingililo bie kumukasa khu bikele biewe, mala aba arechanga khu mabeka kewe lifumo lie kumukasa.
Kumutalaachi kwe lifumo liewe kwaba nga lusaala lwo munabi. Ne lifumo liewe liaba embi busiro bwe chishekeli chimia sita che sichuuma. Omusuti owe engabo arangiranga ebweeni wewe.
Koliati eema mala ayokelela banamae be Baisiraeli ali, “Siina sikila ne mururire mwecha mwiie? Ese ndi omufilisiti, ne enywe muli bakholi ba Saulo. Robora omundu mala eche niio ese ndi.
Aaba ne anyala khu khuupana ne nase mala anjira, aba khulaba banasioobi benywe. Ne ese namuula niye, aba enywe mulaba banasioobi befwe mala mu khukholele.”
Nio Koliati aloma ali, “Ese ndikho efwochola banamae ba Isiraeli luno. Mbelesie omundu niye khunyala khwapana naye.”
Nga Saulo ne Isiraeli yoosi baulila kamakhuwa ko mufilisiti oyo, kamaani kabawamo mala bareenga lukali.
Nono Daudi aba okhwa Chesi Omuefurati khukhwama Betelehemu mu Yuda. Chesi aba ne babaana munaane. Mu ndaalo cha Saulo, Chesi aba asaakhuluwe.
Babaana bewe bataru baba baloonda khu Saulo mwiie. Basoleeli bewe bataru abo baba Eliabu omubele, Abinatabu okhola khabili ne Shama okhola khataru.
Daudi aba omutua. Basoleeli bataru baloonda khu Saulo.
Ne kakhali Daudi achichanga niio Saulo aba ne akobola engo khukhwaya kamakheese ka raraawe e Betelehemu.
Khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane Koliati echanga ebweeni ne abukula bubweyaangu bwewe, ekolooba ne kumutikhinyi.
Chesi aboolela Daudi omusoleeli wewe ali, “Bukula siikula silala sie biakhulia bibiosie ne kimikaati ekhumi kino mala oyilile bawandaayo khangu mu kambi.
Lundi bukula bitonyi bie kamaboonda oyilile komanda owe banamae. Lola nga bawandaayo ne bali, mala oreere simanyisio sisiekesia sili obabone mala bali balamu.”
Nono Saulo Ne basoleeli ba Chesi ne banamae boosi baba bali mu Litooma lia Ela, balikho bapana ne Bafilisiti.
Daudi enyokha makhelebeende mala alekhela omundu okundi bubwaayi bwe kamakheese. Abukula biakhulia mala acha nga Chesi ne amulaka. Nga ola mu kambi, banamae baba balikho bacha khubukula bubweyaangu bwe liie. Baba balikho bayokela ne beyasila liie.
Nio Isiraeli ne Bafilisiti becha mu bweyaangu bwabwe bwe liie, omunamae khu kundi.
Daudi alekhela biakhulia omuliindi we bibiindu, atima engila mu banamae be liie, mala acha akheesia bawandaaye.
Nga aba ne alikho alomaloma ne nabo, omukhili Koliati omufilisiti owa Katihi arura khukhwama mu banamae be Bafilisiti mala aloma kamakhuwa niko aba ne alomilenge khale. Mala Daudi aulila.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi nga babona Koliati, baria mala belukha.
Nio babaandu ba Isiraeli baloma bali, “Se mwabone omundu owichile yuno? Ng'ali echile khufwochola Isiraeli. Omwami alaelesia omundu owira Koliati buyiinda bukali. Lundi omwami alaelesia omundu oyo omukhaana wewe abe omukhasi wewe. Lundi enju eyo omundu owira Koliati se eliruunga busuuru
Daudi areeba babaandu ba baaba siimbi ne naye ali, “Omundu owira Omufilisiti yuno, ne khuana bulekhuule khu Isiraeli khukhwama mu soni chino, alanyoola siina? Omufilisiti, omusinde yuno niye naanu nio afwochole banamae ba Wele omenyile mindali?”
Ne babaandu bamukobosia mu ngila eyo ne eng'ene. Baloma bali, “Nio kaliekholekha busa kario khu omundu owira Koliati.”
Eliabu, wandaaye owa Daudi omukhulu aulila Daudi ne aloma ne babaandu. Eliabu aambwa lirima khu Daudi ne aloma ali, “Siina sikila ne wichile eno? Ne olekheele naanu kamakheese matiiti ako mu sichiimi? Emanyile lukhole lwowo ne bumayaanu bwe kumwoyo kwowo. Wichile ano khuloleelela liie.”
Nio Daudi amureeba ali, “Nono nakholile siina? Ndeebire busa.”
Daudi alekha wandaaye mala acha khu mundu okundi amureeba lireeba elio ne liliene. Ne babaandu bamukobosianga busa nga lwe khunyoa.
Nga babaandu ne baulila kamakhuwa niko Daudi alomaloma, baboolela Saulo. Ne arumania bamulaanga.
Daudi aboolela Saulo ali, omwami, omundu yesi yesi se akhoyeele arie Omufilisiti yuno tawe! “Omukholi wowo alacha apane ne naye.”
Ne Saulo akobosia Daudi ali, “Tawe, ewe se onyala khu khuupana ne Omufilisiti yuno tawe. Ewe oli omuele, ne niye aba omunamae khukhwama mu buele bwewe khukhwola luno!”
Ne kakhali Daudi aboolela Saulo ali, “Omukholi wowo ayanga kamakheese ka raraawe. Buli lwosi nga etalang'i ne yiicha namwe ling'u ne libukula limeeme khukhwama mu lituuli nalitimanianga.
Naloondangakho niira, mala esikula limeeme khukhwama mu munwa kwalio. Ne yaba etalang'i namwe ling'u ne linjunukhila nakwichanga khu mayeeye mala nipa niira.
Omukholi wowo eera chitalang'i ne kamang'u. Ne Omufilisiti omusiinde yuno alaba nga chisaang'i echo, sikila afwochoole banamae ba Wele omenyile mindali.”
Ne Daudi aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owasikula ese khukhwama mu matere ke etalang'i ne mu meno ke ling'u alasikula khukhwama khu mufilisiti yuno.”
Nio Saulo aboolela Daudi ali, “Cha mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abe ne nawe!”
Saulo afwara Daudi bulwaani bwewe, amufwara ekofio ye kumukasa khu murwe, ne likooti lie mwiie.
Daudi akisa embalu yeewe khu ngubo eye liie mala akhaka khukeenda mala khunyala tawe, sikila aba se anala khufwara ario tawe. Nio Daudi aboolela Saulo ali, “Se nyala khucha nende bino tawe, sikila se nabinala tawe.” Nio Daudi abifuula.
Abukula esiimbo yewe, mala acha mu khechi khatiiti angalamo kamabaale kamamiufu karaano akara mu mufuko kwewe kwe bubwaayi. Aba ne lusia luchukucha kamabaale mu mukhono kwewe. Nio acha khukhwakaanana Koliati.
Ne Koliati acha niio Daudi aba, ne omusutila engabo aba ebweeni wewe.
Nga Koliati ne alola mala abona Daudi, arakikha khumufwochola, sikila Daudi aba omuele omulayi lundi omubesemu.
Koliati areeba Daudi ali, “Ese embwa nio unjichekho ne chisaala?” Koliati alaama Daudi khulwe khurumikhira kamasina ke bawele bewe.
Koliati aboolela Daudi ali, “Yiicha mala endaelesia kumubili kwowo khu nyuni che mungaaki ne chisaang'i che mu mikuunda.”
Nio Daudi akobosia Koliati ali, “Ewe olikho wicha khu khuupana ne nase ne embalu ne lifumo, ne ese nicha khu khuupana ne nawe mu lisina lio Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bunyali, Wele owe banamae ba Isiraeli niye ewe ofwocholile.
Endaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhura ewe mu bunyali bwase, ne ndakhwiira mala ndakhukhala kumurwe. Ne ndakabila kimibili kie banamae bafu be Bafilisiti chinyuni che mu ngaaki ne chisaang'i che mundaa. Nio liloba lioosi limanye lili Wele alio mu Isiraeli.
Ne lundi buli mulala oli ano amanye ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aonianga khulwe khurumikhira embalu namwe lifumo tawe. Liie lili lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne niye alamura enywe mu bunyali bwefwe.”
Koliati enyokha mala echa khukhwakaanana ne Daudi. Daudi atima khangu mwiie khucha khumwakaanana.
Daudi ara kumukhono kwewe mu mufuko nikwo aba nakwo, abukulamo libaale, ara khu lusia mala alifuruusia khu Koliati. Liaara Koliati siaanga mala liengila mu bwongo mukari. Koliati akwa asi mafumama.
Nono Daudi aula Koliati ne khumwiira khulwe khurumikhira lusia ne libaale. Amwiira, ne Daudi se aba ne embalu mu mukhono kwewe tawe.
Nio Daudi atima eema khu Koliati. Abukula embalu yewe, mala akirusia mu sibaabi siayo. Eera Koliati ne khukhala kumurwe kwewe khulwe khurumikhira embalu eyo.
Nga Bafilisiti ne babona bali omunamae wabwe omukhulu afwiile, belukha.
Nio Babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda beyasa ne batimania Bafilisiti. Babatimania khukhwola e Katihi ne khu bilibwa bia Ekironi. Bafilisiti babaumiia bakwichanga khu ngila khukhwama Sharaimu, ne khukhwola Katihi ne Ekironi.
Baisiraeli bakobola khukhwama mu khutimania Bafilisiti mala bayaaya bie mu kambi ye Bafilisiti.
Ne Daudi abukula kumurwe kwa Koliati akuyila Yerusalemu. Ne kakhali abiikha bulwaani bwa Koliati mu liiema liewe.
Nga Saulo ne abona Daudi ne acha khu khuupana ne Koliati, areeba Abuneri komanda owe banamae ali, “Abuneri, omwana yuno owa naanu?” Abuneri amukobosia ali, “Omwami, nga ne omenya, se anyala namanya tawe.”
Saulo alaka Abuneri ali, “Reberesia omanye omwana owa naanu niye.”
Nio nga Daudi ne akobola enyuma we khukhwira Koliati, Abuneri amubukula amuyila khu Saulo. Daudi aba asisutile kumurwe kwa Koliati.
Ne Saulo amureeba ali, “Musoleeli, ewe omwana owa naanu?”
Daudi amukobosia ali, “Ese omwana wo mukholi wowo Chesi khukhwama Betelehemu.”

Nga Saulo ne Daudi ne bamala khulomaloma, kumwoyo kwa Yonasani okhwa Saulo kwasiima Daudi. Yonasani asiima Daudi nga ne esiima omwene.
Saulo abukula Daudi endaalo eyo ne se alekhuula Daudi akobola engo tawe.
Nio Yonasani akhola endakaano ne Daudi, sikila asiima Daudi nga esiima omwene.
Ne Yonasani afuula engubo yewe niyo aba ne afwarire mala aelesia Daudi. Lundi amuelesia akhaba ne mbalu yewe, buyiingo ne kumusiipi kwewe.
Daudi arura acha mala aba ne bukhili buli abuundu niio Saulo amuruma. Nio Saulo amukhola khuba omwimeelesi owe banamae boosi. Lino liasiimisia babaandu boosi ne bakholi ba Saulo.
Enyuma wa Daudi khukhwira Koliati, niye ne babaandu bewe bakobola engo. Baba oli bola, bakhasi barura khukhwama buli mu lukoba lwa Isiraeli khukhwakanila omwami Saulo. Baba balikho bemba kimienya kie khukhwekhoya ne bakhina ne khukhupa chitamburini ne kamatuungu.
Bakhasi bemba ne baloma bali,
“Saulo erire chielefu chewe,
ne Daudi chielefu kamakhumi ne kamakhumi.”
Saulo aambwa lirima likali, mala lilomaloma elio liamuumisia lukali. Ne Saulo aloma ali, “Khu Daudi baboola chielefu kamakhumi ne kakaandi ne khwise bali chielefu busa. Siina lundi nisio alanyoola ne bukhali bubwami?”
Mala akhendekhela Daudi khukhwama endaalo eyo ne khuchiililila.
Ne endaalo eyaloondakho roho omubi khukhwama khu Wele, echa khu Saulo. Ne Saulo arakikha khulomaloma ne khukhola bibiindu oli omundu owe kamalalu munju mwewe. Daudi aba alikho apa lituungu nga ne akholanga buli endaalo. Ne Saulo aba ne lifumo mukhono mwewe.
Nio Saulo achukucha lifumo elio ebaasia ali, “Ndaunila Daudi khwisiisi.” Ne kakhali Daudi amwibachakho khukhwola khabili.
Saulo aria Daudi sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba amulekha niye, mala aba ne Daudi.
Nono Saulo arusia Daudi niio aba mala amukhola khuba komanda owe banamae eelefu ndala. Daudi emeelelanga babaandu bewe mwiie.
Ne Daudi aba ne bukhili khu koosi niko akholanga, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne naye.
Ne nga Saulo ne abona ali Daudi aba ne bukhili bukali, atasa khumuria lukali.
Ne kakhali Isiraeli yoosi ne Yuda yasiima Daudi sikila aba omwimeelesi wabwe.
Nio Saulo aboolela Daudi ali, “Omukhaana wase omukhulu Merabu niye oyu. Ndakhuelesia ewe omukhwe. Ne kakhali ba omunyindaafu mala upane liie lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Sikila Saulo ebaasia ali, “Ese ekheera Daudi tawe, lekha Bafilisiti bakhole bario.”
Daudi akobosia Saulo ali, “Ese ndi naanu, nende be kamafuki kase, luuya lwa Paapa wase nilwo naanu mu Isiraeli nio embe musaani owo mwami?
Siise sia Merabu omukhaana owa Saulo nga siola, aebwa Adirieli omumeholati abe omukhasi wewe mu bweyaangu bwa Daudi.”
Nono omukhaana owa Saulo Mikali asiima Daudi. Mala baboolela Saulo. Likhuwa lino liasangaasia Saulo.
Saulo ebaasia ali, “Lekha mbelesie Mikali khu Daudi, nio ekele kumureko khu Daudi, ne Bafilisiti bamuule.” Nono Saulo aboolela Daudi lukhola khabili ali, “Ewe olaba musaani wase.”
Ne alaka bakholi bewe ali, “Lomaloma ne Daudi ne muli mweng'ene mala mumuboolele muli, ‘Omwami akhusiima, ne bakholi bewe boosi bakhusiima. Nono, ba musaani wo mwami.’ ”
Bakholi ba Saulo baboolela Daudi kamakhuwa ako. Ne Daudi abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwibaasia muli lili liliangu khwise khuba musaani wo mwami? Ese ndi omutaambi ne se ndi omanyikhaane tawe.”
Bakholi ba Saulo bamuboolela niko Daudi aloma.
Nio Saulo ababoolela ali, “Boolela Daudi muli, ‘Omwami se enyakho bukhwe tawe. Ne kakhali enya kamafunga ke Bafilisiti emia ndala nio eyache basiku bewe.’ ” Nono Saulo ebaasia khukhola Daudi eerwe ne Bafilisiti.
Ne nga bakholi ba Saulo ne baboolela Daudi kamakhuwa kano, Daudi asangaalila khuba musaani wo mwami. Siise sisienyekha ne siikhawa tawe,
Daudi ne babaandu bewe bacha mala beera Bafilisiti chimia chibili. Daudi areera kamafunga khu omwami mala bamubalila koosi nio Daudi abe musaani wewe. Nio Saulo aelesia Daudi Mikali aba omukhasi wewe.
Ne kakhali Saulo abona mala amanya ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne Daudi. Lundi aulila ali Isiraeli yoosi yasiima Daudi.
Saulo atasa khuria Daudi lukali. Nono Saulo aba omusiku owa Daudi mu limenya liewe lioosi.
Nio Babemeelesi be Bafilisiti bechanga mwiie. Nga bechanga ne belakho, Daudi aba ne bukhili bukali khukhila bakholi ba Saulo boosi. Nono lisina lia Daudi liamanyikhana lukali.

Saulo aboolela Yonasani omusoleeli wewe ne bakholi bewe boosi ali bakhoya beere Daudi. Ne kakhali Yonasani omusoleeli owa Saulo asiima Daudi lukali.
Ne Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Paapa wase alikho ayiima khukhwira ewe. Nono rekeeresia, kumutikhinyi, yikhala niio okhabonekha tawe mala wikiseo.
Ne ese endarura enje niime siimbi ne paapa wase mu mukuunda mala ndomalome ne naye khwiwe. Ne mbulila liosi liosi, ekhakhuboolele.”
Yonasani alomalomela raraawe bulayi khu Daudi. Aloma ali, “Omwami okhakhola kamakhiikha khu mukholi wowo Daudi tawe. Sikila niye se akhukholelakho kamakhiikha tawe. Lundi bikholwa bia Daudi biabeele bie buyeeti khwiwe.
Daudi aana bulamu bwewe khukhwiira Koliati. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera bukhili khu Isiraeli yoosi. Ewe wabona mala wasangaala. Siina sikila nono ne wenya khukhola kamamayaanu khu mundu okhali ne kamamayaanu tawe? Siina sikila ne wenya khukhwiira Daudi ne okhali ne sifuno sie khumwiira tawe?”
Saulo aulila kamakhuwa ka Yonasani. Saulo echuba ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, Daudi se aleerwa tawe.”
Nio Yonasani alanga Daudi mala amuboolela bibiindu bino bioosi. Ne Yonasani ayila Daudi khu Saulo, mala Daudi akholela Saulo nga aba ne akholanga.
Ne liie liabao lundi. Daudi acha, mala apana ne Bafilisiti. Aula bakali mala belukha.
Ne roho omubi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khu Saulo. Saulo aba ekhale munju mwewe ne lifumo liewe mukhono. Ne Daudi aba alikho akhupa lituungu.
Saulo akhaka khuunila Daudi khu lisiisi ne lifumo liewe. Ne kakhali Daudi ebacha mala lifumo liauna mwisiisi. Daudi atima mala elukha.
Nono Mikali ekhisilia Daudi mwitirisia, mala Daudi elukha aona.
Mikali abukula sifwaani asialisia khu sitaanda. Asitikiya lisisinwa nilio baruka khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe chimbusi amurwe kwasio, mala asifumakho chingubo.
Ne nga Saulo ne aruma barume khubukula Daudi, Mikali ababoolela ali, “Ali omulwale.”
Nio Saulo aruma barumwa bache babone Daudi, ne aloma ali, “Ndeerere ne ali mu sitaanda nio emwiire.”
Ne nga barumwa ne bengila munju banyoola sifwaani khu sitaanda basitikiye lisisinwa lie bufuumbo bwe chimbusi emurwe.
Saulo areeba Mikali ali, “Siina sikila ne umbeyile mala wamusia omusiku wase?”
Mikali akobosia Saulo ali, “Daudi amboleele ali, ‘Njeete nilukhe, ne busa ndakhwiira’ ”
Nono Daudi atima, elukha mala acha khu Samweli e Rama. Aboolela Samweli koosi niko Saulo amukholela. Daudi ne Samweli bacha bamenya e Naoti.
Ne Saulo aboolelwa ali “Daudi ali Naoti e Rama.”
Nio Saulo aruma barumwa khucha khubukula Daudi. Barumwa bakaanana ne sipupu sie bang'oosi balikho bang'oola. Samweli aba omwimeelesi wabwe. Nono Roho owa Wele echa khu barumwa ba Saulo mala bosi barakikha khung'oola.
Nga Saulo ne aulila kano, aruma barumwa babaandi, mala bosi barakikha khung'oola. Ne Saulo aruma barumwa lukhola khataru mala bosi bang'oola.
Nio Saulo omwene acha e Rama. Ola khu sebele embalaayi eli Seku. Ne areeba ali, “Samweli ne Daudi bali waena?” Omundu mulala amukobosia ali, “Bali Naoti mu Rama.”
Ne khukhwama ebweeneyo acha Naoti mu Rama. Ne yesi Roho owa Wele amwichakho mala acha ne ang'oola nabwila ola Naoti mu Rama.
Saulo efuula chingubo chewe, mala ang'oola ebweeni owa Samweli. Nio Saulo akona sichula endaalo eyo yoosi ne siilo esio sioosi. Ako kakila babaandu ne bareeba bali, “Saulo yesi ali mulala khu bang'oosi?”

Nio Daudi elukha khukhwama Naoti mu Rama mala acha areeba Yonasani ali, “Siina nisio ekholile? Bumayaanu bwase buli siina? Bumayaanu siina nibwo nakholeele raraao nio ayiime khu khunjira?”
Yonasani amukobosia ali, “Tawe! Se olafwa tawe. Paapa wase se akholanga sisiindu siakhaba siboofu namwe sitiiti ne akhambooleele ese tawe. Ne siina sikila Paapa akise liliene elio khwise? Se kali kario tawe.”
Ne kakhali Daudi akobosia ali, “Raraao amanyile bulayi bwene ali ewe wasiima ese. Ne ebaasia ali, ‘Yonasani akhoya alekha khuulila khu lino tawe, ne busa anyala abeelela.’ Ne bulayi bwene nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ne wesi nga ne omenya ese ndi busa sikele silala khukhwama khu lifwa!”
Nio Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Nilio oloma liosi liosi, ndakhola.”
Raraao ne akhambonao tawe, muboolele oli, ‘Daudi anjikoonjelele mulekhuule atambeo, ache mu lukoba lwewe e Betelehemu. Sikila sili siise sie khuaana embosio eya buli mwiiko eye be luuya lwewe boosi.’
Aaba ne aloma ali, ‘Bulayi!’ Aba naonile. Ne aaba ne aambwa lirima, manya oli abele enya khukhukholela ese kamabi.
Nono, kholela omukholi wowo bulayi sikila wakholile endakaano endakatifu ne nase. Ne kalio kamakhiikha khwise, njire wamwene. Siina sikila unjile khu raraao?”
Yonasani amukobosia ali, “Tawe! Ese ne emanya ndi paapa wase enya khukhukholela ewe kamabi ne ekhuboolela.”
Nio, Daudi areeba Yonasani ali, “Naanu olamboolela ese aaba bali raraao akhukobosia ewe mu burafu?”
Ne Yonasani akobosia Daudi ali, “yiicha khuche mu lukoongo.” Nono boombi bacha mu lukoongo.
Ne Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli abe omuloli wefwe. Muchuli nga siise sino namwe endaalo eloondakho, ekhareebe Paapa. Liba liewe liaba lilayi khwiwe, ekhakhurumire likhuwa.
Kaaba bali paapa wase alikho arekekha khukhukholela ewe kamabi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesie ese kumunaanio, naaba ne ekhakhuboolela okamanye tawe, mala khumusie wilukhe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abe ne nawe nga ne abeele ne paapa wase!
Ne esiliio omulamu, yookesia busiime bwowo bwe bubweyikinwa bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio ekhafwa tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabunisilie elala basiku bowo boosi khukhwama khu liloba. Ne akholile ario, okhakamia bubweikinwa bwowo khu be luuya lwase mindali na mindali tawe.”
Nono Yonasani akhola endakaano ne Daudi. Ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya eyache basiku ba Daudi.”
Yonasani lundi echubia Daudi khukhwekesia ali Daudi amusiima. Sikila Yonasani asiima Daudi nga esiima omwene.
Nio Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Muchuli ekhabe Naikara eye kumwesi kumuyia. Ne khukhakhutambe sikila endebe yowo ekhabe busa.
Ne busiayo, khukhakhutambe lukali. Nono cha wikise abuundu niio wekisa butinyu buno nga bwarakikha, enyuma we situuta sie kamabaale.
Ne ekhalase buembo butaru lubeka lulala lwe situuta nga olasa sisiindu.
Ekharume omusoleeli wase ayiime buembo. Ne emuboolela ndi, ‘Lola buembo buli lubeka lwowo luno bukula,’ aba ndikho ndoma ndi wiche sikila nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, buli bulayi khwiwe. Busiku se buliio tawe.
Ne naaba ne ndoma ndi, ‘Buembo buli lubeka lwowo luluundi olwo,’ aba cha, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akhuyila alayi.
Ne khu ako niko ewe ne nase khulomalomekho, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuloli akari wase ne nawe mindali na mindali.”
Nono Daudi ekisa mu lukoongo. Nga Naikara eye kumwesi kumuyia yola, omwami Saulo ekhala khulia siakhulia.
Omwami ekhala khu ndebe yewe nga biise bibiindi bioosi, siimbi ne lisiisi. Yonasani ekhala lubeka luluundi aloleelela Saulo. Ne Abuneri ekhala aloondekhana ne Saulo. Endebe eya Daudi yaba busa.
Ne Saulo se alomakho sisiindu endaalo eyo tawe. Ebaasia ali, “Wakana sisiindu siekholekhe khu Daudi mala abeele omunyaalu.”
Endaalo ekhola khabili eya naikara eye kumwesi kumuyia, endebe eya Daudi yaba busa. Ne Saulo areeba Yonasani ali, “Siina sikila okhwa Chesi ne akhechile khu naikara likoloba namwe endaalo yino tawe?”
Yonasani akobosia Saulo ali, “Daudi anjekoonjelele mulekhuule ache e Betelehemu.
Alomile ali, ‘Nosiima lekha enje, sikila be luuya lwase bali ne naikara eye embosio mu lukoba mala wandaayase andakile embeyo. Nono luno waaba ne wasiima, lekha enje mala mbone bawandaayase.’ Elio nilio likila ne akhechile mu naikara eyo mwami tawe.”
Nio Saulo aambila Yonasani lirima likali mala amuboolela ali, “Ewe mwana wo omukhasi omumayaanu ne ekileki! Ewe wibaasia oli se namanyile ndi oli lubeka lwa Daudi tawe? Olikho weambia wamwene chisoni ne maao owakhusaala.
Nga okhwa Chesi ne ali omulamu khu liloba, ewe se oliba omwami namwe obe ne bubwami tawe. Nono rumania Daudi mala omureere. Ng'ali alafwa.”
Nio Yonasani akobosia Saulo ali, “Siina sikila afwe? Akholile siina?”
Ne kakhali Saulo amuchukucha lifumo ali amwire. Nono Yonasani amanya ali raraawe aba ne sinani khukhwira Daudi.
Nio Yonasani enyokha khu sialwa mu lirima likali ne se aliakho siakhulia endaalo eye khabili eye kumwesi kumuyia tawe. Sikila abeelela khulwa Daudi nga Saulo ne aambia Daudi chisoni.
Endaalo eyaloondakho Yonasani acha mu lukoongo nga alakana ne Daudi. Abukula omwana omusoleeli acha ne naye.
Nio aboolela omusoleeli oyo ali, “Tima, oyiime buembo nibwo ndikho nja khulasa.” Omusoleeli oyo nga ne atima, Yonasani alasa buembo ebweeni wewe.
Nga omusoleeli oyo ola niio luembo lukwile, Yonasani amulaanga ali, “Luembo luli abwenikho ao!”
Lundi amuboolela ali, “Khola khangu okhaliinda tawe.” Nono omusoleeli owa Yonasani abuusia buembo mala arerera omwami wewe.
Ne omusoleeli se amanya sisiindu siosi siosi tawe. Yonasani ne Daudi bong'ene ba bamanya sisiekholekha.
Yonasani aelesia omusoleeli oyo bulwaani mala amuboolela ali, “Suta obukobosie mu lukoba.”
Ne nga omusoleeli oyo arekukhe busa ari, Daudi enyokha khukhwama lubeka we situuta sie kamabaale. Asikama mala enama bubweeni bwewe bwetiila khu liloba khukhwola khataru. Daudi ne Yonasani bekwayanila ne balilila alala khukhwola nga Daudi ne aola.
Nio Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Cha mu muleembe. Khwechubanile ne nawe mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabe omuloli akari wase ne nawe ne akari we lisaaye liowo ne lisaaye liase mindali na mindali.’ ” Nio Daudi arekukha, ne Yonasani acha mu lukoba.

Daudi akobosia Ahimeleki omusaayi ali, “Omwami andumire ne likhuwa. Amboleele ali, ‘Omundu akhamanyakho nisio ekhuruma khukhola namwe nisio ekhuboleele tawe.’ Nalakile basoleeli baele niio khwakaananila.
Nono, ewe oli ne siina? Mbelesie kimikaati kiraano namwe sisiindu siosi siosi nisio oli ne nasio.”
Nio Omusaayi aboolela Daudi ali, “Ese se ndi ne kimikaati kia buli lwoosi busa tawe, ne kakhali ndi ne kimikaati kimitakatifu. Munyala mwalia kaaba bali basoleeli bowo baele se babelekho ne bakhasi tawe.”
Ne Daudi akobosia ali, “Ng'ali bakhasi se babeele siimbi ne nafwe nga buli lwosi tawe. Bibiindu bie babaandu base bibechanga bitakatifu, akhaba ne khucha lukeendo lwosi lwosi. Ne luno bili bitakatifu khukhila sikila khuli khu lukeendo lutakatifu.”
Nio omusaayi aelesia Daudi kimikaati kimitakatifu sikila kimikaati kikiindi se kiabao tawe ne kikhali kimikaati kie khubao. Buli lwosi nga kimikaati kimitakatifu kiarusibwangao, kimikaati kimitakatifu kiili kimibile kiakalusibwangao.
Nono mulalakho khu bakholi ba Saulo abao endaalo ng'ene eyo. Aba ali mu siboe sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lisina liewe liaba bali Doegi Omuedomu. Aba omwaayi omukhulu owa Saulo.
Ne Daudi areeba Ahimeleki ali, “Ewe oli ano ne lifumo namwe embalu? Kimilimo kio mwami kibeele kia khangu mala kiakila ese khubukula embalu namwe bulwaani tawe.”
Ne Daudi amuboolela ali, “Se alikhoo ekiindi nga eyo tawe. Mbelesie.”
Ne Daudi arekukha, elukha Saulo, mala acha khu Akishi omwami owa Katihi.
Ne bakholi ba Akishi bareeba bali, “Oyuno se ali Daudi omwami we sibala? Se ali Daudi niye bembela ne bakhina ne baloma bali,
‘Saulo erire chielefu chewe,
ne Daudi chielefu kamakhumi ne kamakhumi.’ ”
Nono Daudi akaluukhasia kimiima kiewe ebweeni wabwe ekhola nga owe kamalalu. Arakikha khubwara bwara khu miliango kie silibwa alekha lulekhe ne luchululukhila khu bunwanwa.
Nio Akishi aboolela bakholi bewe ali, Lola! Omundu yuno ali omukwamalalu niye.
Ese endambile bakwamalalu nio munderere omukwamalalu yuno? Omundu yuno anyala echa munju mwase ku?

Buli mundu owaba mu butinyu ne buli mundu owaba ne likobi namwe bakhasiimisibwa tawe boosi bebuusia niio Daudi aba. Ne aba omwimeelesi wabwe. Babaandu ba baaba ne naye baba chimia chine.
Daudi ama abwenao acha e Misipa mu Moabu. Aboolela omwami owa Moabu ali, “Nosiima lekha paapa wase ne maayi wase beche bamenye ne nawe khukhwola nga ne manya nisio Wele alikho acha khukhukholela.”
Ne Daudi alekhela omwami owa Moabu raraawe ne maayi wewe. Mala bamenyayo siise sioosi nisio Daudi aba ne ekisile mu libina.
Nio omung'oosi Kati aboolela Daudi ali, “Okhamenya mu libina tawe. Rekukha mala oche mu sibala sia Yuda.” Nono Daudi arekukha mala acha mu musiru kwa Hereti.
Nono Saulo aulila ali Daudi ne babaandu bewe ba baaba ne naye banyoolekhe. Saulo aba ekhaale e Kibea a murongooro kumutamarisiki ne bakholi bewe baba bamwimileo siimbi. Aba atilile lifumo.
Ne Saulo areeba bakholi bewe ali, “Ulila babaandu ba Benjamini, mwibaasia muli okhwa Chesi akhamuelesie enywe mweesi kimikuunda ne kamaruuti ke kimisabibu? Mwibaasia muli Daudi akhamukhole enywe khuba banamae babemeelesi be babaandu bewe chielefu namwe chimia?
Enywe mweesi se munjenyela bulayi tawe. Mbao oumboolela omwana wase ne akhola endakaano ne okhwa Chesi tawe. Se aliio oukholela siisa namwe amboolela ali omwana wase achongele omukholi wase anjibuulile endaalo yino tawe.”
Ahimeleki areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwa Daudi. Ne aelesia Daudi biakhulia ne embalu yaba eya Koliati Omufilisiti.”
Nio omwami Saulo arumania bareere omusaayi Ahimeleki nende be enju yewe boosi ba baaba bosi basaayi mu Nobu mala becha khu Saulo.
Saulo aboolela Ahimeleki ali, “Rekeeresia nono okhwa Ahitubu.”
Ahimeleki amukobosia ali, “Omwami narekereesie.”
Ne Saulo amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne okhwa Chesi ne mukhanjenyela bulayi tawe? Siina sikila ne omuelesie biakhulia ne embalu mala wamusabila khu Wele? Luno angalukhanekho mala anjibuulile?”
Ahimeleki akobosia omwami ali, “Naanu mu bakholi bowo boosi oli omweyikinwa nga Daudi? Naanu niye musaani owo mwami ne omunamae omwimeelesi owe banamae bowo? Naanu oli ne lukoosi munju yowo?
Luno luli lwe khunyoa ese khureebera Daudi khu Wele ku? Tawe! Omwami akhebaasia kamabi kosi kosi khu mukholi wewe namwe khu nju yoosi eya Paapa wase tawe. Sikila omukholi wowo se amanyilekho siosi siosi khu kekholekhe tawe.”
Ne omwami aboolela Ahimeleki ali, “Ahimeleki! Ewe ne be enju eya raraao ng'ali mulafwa.”
Ne omwami aboolela omunamae omuliindi owaba ne amwimileo ali, “Cha mala wire basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sikila bauliilisiana ne Daudi. Lundi bamanya bali Daudi elukha mala se bamboolela tawe.” Ne kakhali bakholi bo mwami baloba khukhwira basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne omwami aboolela Toeki ali, “Ewe cha mala wire basaayi.” Ne Toeki Omuedomu acha mala eera basaayi. Endaalo eyo eera babaandu kamakhumi munane ne baraano ba baaba ne befwarire efodi.
Lundi akhaba mu lukoba lwe basaayi lwa Nobu, eramo babaandu. Era baseecha ne bakhasi, babaana ne banuuna. Era akhaba chikhaafu ne chipunda ne kamakheese khulwe khurumikhira embalu.
Abiatari mulala khu baana ba Ahimeleki elukha aona. Acha mala aambana ne Daudi.
Abiatari aboolela Daudi ali, “Saulo eriire basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Ne Daudi aboolela Abiatari ali, “Nga ne nabona Toeki e Nobu endaalo eyo namanya ndi ng'ali alaboolela Saulo. Ese niye okilile nio babaandu be enju eya raraao boosi bafwa.
Menya ne nase mala okharia tawe. Sikila oyo oyima bulamu bwase ayima ne bubwowo. Ne oli ne nase, olaona.”

Nono baboolela Daudi bali, “Bafilisiti balikho bapana ne lukoba lwa Keila mala balikho banuula biakhulia khukhwama abiuulilo.”
Nono Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Nje nibwaakale Bafilisiti?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia Daudi ali, “Yee, cha wibwaakale Bafilisiti mala oonie Keila.”
Ne kakhali babaandu ba Daudi bamuboolela bali, “Efwe khuli ne buuri ne khuli mu Yuda muno. Ne aba khularia khuriena, khwaaba ne khucha Keila khukhwibwaakala banamae be Bafilisiti?”
Ne lundi Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Yiikha oche Keila. Sikila ese nja khukhukhola oule Bafilisiti.”
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe bacha Keila mala bapana ne Bafilisiti. Bakobosia chikhaafu chabwe. Daudi eera Bafilisiti bakali mala aonia babaandu ba Keila.
Nga Abiatari okhwa Ahimeleki ne elukha acha niio Daudi aba e Keila, acha ne efodi mu makhono kewe.
Nono Saulo aboolelwa ali Daudi achile Keila. Ne Saulo aloma ali, “Wele areere Daudi mu bunyali bwase. Daudi omwene erekire khulwe khukhwingila mu lukoba lwe bilibwa ne kimiliango kimisiro.”
Saulo alaanga babaandu boosi bacha mwiie mala bache Keila botookhelesie Daudi ne babaandu bewe.
Daudi amanya ali Saulo alikho arekekha kamamayaanu khu niye. Ne aboolela Abiatari omusaayi ali, “Reera ano efodi.”
Nio Daudi aloma ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, omukholi wowo ng'ali aulile ali Saulo alikho arekekha khukhwicha Keila mala onake lukoba sikila ese.
Babaandu ba Keila balanjakanisia ese khu Saulo? Saulo alecha Keila nga omukholi wowo ne aulile? Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ekhwikongochela mboolele ese omukholi wowo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia Daudi ali, “Saulo alecha”
Daudi areeba ali, “Babaandu ba Keila balanjakanisia ese ne babaandu base khu Saulo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Balakhola bario.”
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe ba baaba embi chimia sita benyokha barura mu Keila, mala bacha niio banyala khucha. Nga Saulo ne aulila ali Daudi elukhe khukhwama mu Keila, alekha lirekekha liewe.
Daudi amenya mu libina mu sibala sie lukulu mu sichiimi sia Sifu. Ne Saulo amuyiima buli nyanga, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se ara Daudi mu bunyali bwa Saulo tawe.
Ne Daudi aria Sikila Saulo aba arurire khuyima bulamu bwewe.
Daudi aba mu sichiimi sia Sifu e Horeshi.
Ne Yonasani okhwa Saulo enyokha acha niio Daudi aba e Horeshi mala atasa Daudi bubweyikinwa bwewe mu Wele.
Ne Yonasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Okharia tawe, paapa wase Saulo se akhakhutilekho tawe. Ewe okhabe omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne ese ekhabe siimbi ne nawe. Paapa wase Saulo yesi amanyile lino.”
Ne boombi bakhola endakaano ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala Daudi asikala Horeshi ne Yonasani akobola engo.
Nono omwami waaba ne wenya khukhwiikha wiche ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi, yiikha wiche. Kimilimo kiefwe kilaba khukhwakanisia Daudi khwiwe.”
Ne Saulo abakobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubiite enywe chikhabi khulwe khu khukholela siisa.
Cha mu manyilisie mala mubone abuundu niio ali, lundi mumanye naanu omuboone ebweeneyo. Sikila naulila bali ali omubacha lukali.
Lola nono mala mumanyilisie abuundu oosi niio ekisanga mala mukobole mumboolele bung'ali. Nio ekhache ne nanywe. Ne aaba ne ali mu lukoongo, aba ekhamuyime mu baandu boosi ba Yuda.”
Nio Basifu benyokha mala bacha ebweeni wa Saulo e Sifu. Nono Daudi ne babaandu bewe baba mu sichiimi sia Maoni mu Araba, ebunafubo owa Yesimoni.
Ne Saulo ne babaandu bewe bacha khuenja Daudi mala Daudi aulila. Nono Daudi ekha khu lwanda luli mu sichiimi sia Maoni. Ne nga Saulo ne aulila ako aloonda khu Daudi mu sichiimi sia Maoni.
Saulo ne babaandu bewe bakeendanga ne bacha lubeka lulala lwe lukulu ne Daudi ne babaandu bewe bacha lubeka luluundi. Ne Daudi akeendanga khangu, khukhwilukha Saulo ne babaandu bewe ba baaba ne bembiie Daudi ne babaandu bewe khubatiila.
Abwene ao, omurumwa echa khu Saulo ne aloma ali, “Khola khangu wiche. Bafilisiti balikho bebwaakala sibala.”
Nono Saulo alekha khuloonda khu Daudi mala acha khu khuupana ne Bafilisiti. Nono abuundu ao alaangwa ali, lulwanda lwe khukhwilukha.
Ne Daudi aniina khukhwama abwenao mala amenya mu libina e Engedi.

Nga Saulo ne akobola khukhwama mu khutimania Bafilisiti, aboolelwa ali, “Daudi ali mu sichiimi sia Engedi.”
Nio Saulo aabukula babaandu chielefu chitaru babaroborwa khukhwama mu Isiraeli. Ne acha khuyiima Daudi ne babaandu bewe ebweeni we lulwanda lwe chimbusi che mundaa.
Nga aba ne ali khu lukeendo, oola a biko bie kamakheese. Abwene ao, libina liabao. Ne Saulo engila mu libina elio khucha khukhwiyeta. Nono Daudi ne babaandu bewe baba bekhale mu lusokho lwe libina etaayi.
Ne babaandu ba Daudi baboolela Daudi bali, “Yino niyo endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolela ali, ‘Khare omusiku wowo mu bunyali bwowo, mala okhamukhole siosi siosi siikhusiimisie.’ ” Nio Daudi enyokha kalaa ne mu bwikisi akhalaka silaka khu ngubo eya Saulo.
Ne enyuma wako, Daudi anaanisibwa kumwoyo sikila aba akhalile engubo eya Saulo.
Ne aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhiingilile ekhakhola ndio nakhola sisiindu nga esio khu mwami wase tawe. Kumukhono kwase kukhetila khu Saulo tawe sikila ali omuchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nono Daudi ekoonjelela babaandu bewe ne kamakhuwa kano ne se abalekhuula bebwaakala Saulo tawe.
Ne Saulo enyokha arura mwibina mala arakikha lukeendo lwewe lundi.
Enyuma wako, Daudi enyokha arura mwibina mala alaanga Saulo ali, “Omwami wase!” Ne nga Saulo ne ekhebukha enyuma, Daudi enama bubweeni bwetiila asi ne khukhwekesia liria.
Ne Daudi areeba Saulo ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne orekeeresia kamakhuwa ke babaandu baloma bali, ‘Daudi ayima khukhuumisia?’
Endaalo yino chimoni chowo chabone nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhurere ewe luno mu bunyali bwase mu libina. Ne balala bamboolele khwire, ne kakhali ekhulekhile. Endomile ndi, ‘Se ndeera omwami wase tawe. Ali omuchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’
Paapa wase, lola silaka sie engubo yowo siili mu mukhono kwase. Endabuule silaka sie engubo yowo ne se ekhwirire tawe. Lino liekesia lili sendi ne kamakhiikha namwe se nakhwaukhakho tawe. Ese se nakhukholeele ewe kamamayaanu tawe, akhaba ewe ne oyima khukhunjira.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abe omukhalaki akari wase ne nawe lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya anjiyachila ewe. Ne kakhali kumukhono kwase se kukhwetilakho tawe.
Lusimo lwe khaale luboola luli, ‘Khukhwama mu makhiikha kamangamo kamakhiikha.’ Ne kakhali kumukhono kwase se kukhwetilakho tawe.
Omwami owa Isiraeli arurire khuloonda khu naanu? Olikho otima khu naanu? Olikho otima khu mbwa efu namwe sichiinji?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abe omukhalaki, mala akhalake akari wase ne nawe. Akhoya ambabine mala asikule khukhwama khwiwe.”
Nga Daudi ne amala khuboolela Saulo kamakhuwa kano, Saulo areeba ali, “Mwana wase Daudi, okwo kumumilo kwowo?” Saulo alila lukali.
Aboolela Daudi ali, “Ewe oli owa ng'ali khukhukhila ese. Sikila ewe wakholeele kamalayi, ne ese nakhukholeele ewe kamamayaanu.
Ne endaalo yino wekesie nga ne wakholela bulayi sikila se unjirire ese nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne andeere mu bunyali bwowo tawe.
Omundu ne anyoola omusiku wewe, anyala amulekha acha ne ali omulamu ku? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhuruunge ewe bulayi khu niko ukholeele ese endaalo yino.
Luno nono namanyile ndi ng'ali ewe okhabe omwami. Ne bubwami bwa Isiraeli bukhachiililile asi wowo.
Njechubile nono mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli se okheere lisaaye liase tawe nio lisina liase lilekhe khutamba munju eya paapa wase tawe.”
Ne Daudi echubila Saulo lino.
Nio Saulo acha engo, ne Daudi ne babaandu bewe bakobola mu libina.

Nono Samweli afwa, mala Baisiraeli boosi bebuusia alala bamulila. Ne bamusiikha mungo mwewe e Rama.
Nio Daudi acha mu sichiimi sia Parani.
Abao omundu mu Maoni aba ne kimiaandu kiewe mu Karimeli. Omundu oyo aba omuiinda lukali. Aba ne kamakheese chielefu chitaru ne chimbusi eelefu ndala. Aba alikho akhala bufuumbo bwe kamakheese kewe mu Karimeli.
Lisina lio mundu oyo liaba bali Nabali ne lisina lio mukhasi wewe liaba Abikaili. Omukhasi wewe aba ne limanya lilayi ne lukoondo lulayi. Ne omuseecha wewe aba owe lirima likali ne kimiima kimibi. Omundu oyo aba owe ekholo eya Kelabu.
Nga Daudi aba mu sichiimi aulila ali Nabali alikho akhala bufuumbo bwe kamakheese kewe.
Nono Daudi aruma basoleeli baele ekhumi. Ababoolela ali, “Cha e Karimeli mala mukheselie Nabali.
Ne mulamukheesia muli, ‘kumuleembe kube khwiwe ne khunju yowo ne khu bioosi nibio oli ne nabio.
Mbulila bali oli ne bakhali be bufuumbo bwe kamakheese. Nono babaayi bowo babeele ne nafwe ne se khwabakholile libi tawe, ne se batambile sisiindu siosi siosi tawe siise sioosi nisio babele e Karimeli.
Bareebe mala balakhuboolela. Nono kholela basoleeli base siisa mu moni chowo sikila khwechile endaalo eya naikara. Khu khusaba oeleesie bakholi bowo ne omusoleeli wowo Daudi siosi siosi nisio oli ne nasio.’ ”
Nga babaandu ba Daudi ne becha, baboolela Nabali nga Daudi ne abaruma mala baliinda.
Nabali akobosia babaandu ba Daudi ali, “Daudi niye naanu? Okhwa Chesi niye naanu? Bakholi leelo bakhilile babelukha khukhwama khu baami babwe.
Siina sikila embukule kumukaati kwase ne kameechi kase ne chinyama chase embelesie babaandu nibo ekhamanyile tawe? Bino bili bie babaandu base babeka bufuumbo bwe kamakheese.”
Babaandu ba Daudi bakobola niio Daudi aba mala bamuboolela niko Nabali aba ne alomile.
Ne Daudi aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “buli mundu aboe embalu yewe!” Ne buli mundu aboa embalu yewe. Daudi yesi aboa embalu yewe. Ne babaandu embi chimia chine baloonda khu Daudi ne babaandi chimia chibili basikala khuliinda bibiindu.
Ne kakhali mulala khu bakholi ba Nabali aboolela Abikaili omukhasi owa Nabali ali, “Lola Daudi aruma barumwa bewe balala khukhwama mu sichiimi bakheesie omwami wefwe mala omwami abakhoma.
Ne kakhali nibo baba balayi lukali khwifwe se bakhuumisiakho efwe tawe. Ne efwe se khwatambakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe nga ne khwaba mu lukoongo siise sioosi nisio khwaba ne nabo.
Baba nga lisiisi khwifwe silo ne kumuusi buli lwosi nga ne khwaba ne khwaya kamakheese ne nabo.
Nono luno manya lino mala wibaasie nilio onyala wakhola. Sikila sinyala khuba siieli khu mwami wefwe ne khu be enju yewe boosi. Ali omundu owe liba libi, se anyala arekeeresia ko mundu yesi yesi tawe.”
Nio Abikaili akhola khangu abukula kimikaati chimia chibili mala echusia chioochwa chibili che ndali ne kamakheese ne bikelo biraano bie biakhulia bibiosie bie likesa. Abukula ne bisusuuchu emia ndala ne chinduli chinyomu chimia chibili mala abiboa khu punda.
Nio Abikaili aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Rangira muche ne ese ndamuloondakho.” Ne se aboolelakho omuseecha wewe Nabali tawe.
Ne nga Abikaili ne aba khu punda yewe ne alikho abotookha lukulu, khangu busa Daudi ne babaandu bewe becha niio aba mala abakaanana.
Nono Daudi aba alomile ali, “Nakhola kia busa naliinda kimiaandu kio omundu oyo mu sichiimi. Nono se silikhoo sisiindu siewe sisiatamba tawe. Ne niye andungire ese bubi khulwe Bulayi nibwo namukholela.
Wele akhoya ambelesie ese kumunaanio naaba bali endekhakho omundu wewe owe siseecha yesi yesi khukhwola kumutikhinyi.”
Nga Abikaili ne abona Daudi, ekha khangu khukhwama khu punda. Ne akwa ebweeni wa Daudi enama asi.
Akwa mu bikele biewe ne aloma ali, “Omwami wase, bubi buli khwise seng'ene. Khusaba, lekha omukholi wowo alomalome ne orekereesie mala oulile.
Omwami wase okhaulilakho ka Nabali omundu owe liiba libi oyo tawe sikila ali busa nga lisina liewe ne liloma. Sifuno sie lisina liewe sili bali Omusilu ne busilu bwamuloondakho. Ne ese omukholi wowo se nabona babaandu bowo nibo waruma tawe mwami wase.
Nono mwami wase, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali ne lundi nga wesi ne omenyile; Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukhiinga ewe khukhwama khu mamayaanu ke sifuki ne lundi akhukhiingilila wamwene khukhwiyacha. Nono lekha basiku bowo ne abo bayiima khukholela omwami wase kamabi babe nga Nabali.
Nono sino nisio siianwa nisio endereere omwami wase. Lekha sielesibwe khu basoleeli bali baloondi bo mwami wase.
Ekhusaba umbeele kamakhiikha kase, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alirakikhisia bubwami bwowo bwa mindali na mindali. Ewe olikho upana liie lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne bubi se bulikhunyoolekhakho mu limenya liowo lioosi tawe.
Ne babaandu ne bakhutimakho ne bayiima khukhwira, bulamu bwowo bukhabe mu liboo lie balamu bali mu buliindi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Ne akhamwaate bulamu bwe basiku bowo oli omwaata khukhwama mu khoroto.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamale khukhola kamalayi koosi niko akhulaka. Akhakhukhole ewe obe omwimeelesi owa Isiraeli.
Nio se oleendekhelela namwe onaanisibwe khulwe khukhwira babaandu bakhali ne kamabi tawe. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhuelesie bulayi, khebulila omukholi wowo.”
Nio Daudi aboolela Abikaili ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele owa Isiraeli okhurumire ewe endaalo yino khukhunjakaanana!
Kamebaasio kowo kamalayi kabiitwe chikhabi ne wamwene obiitwe chikhabi sikila wakhiingilile ese khukhwira endaalo yino ne khukhwiyacha samwene.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ne amenya, akhiingilile ese khukhuumisia ewe. Abanga se okholile khangu khukhwicha khu khunjakaanana tawe, ng'ali khukhwola kumutikhinyi se akhabelekhowo omundu owa Nabali owe siseecha akhaba mulala olekhilwe tawe.”
Nio Daudi akaanila nisio Abikaili aaba ne amurereere. Ne aboolela Abikaili ali, “Cha engo wowo mu muleembe. Nauliile kamalilo kowo mala ndakhola nga lilienya liowo.”
Nga Abikaili ne akobola engo khu Nabali, Nabali aba ali ne naikara munju yewe. Yaba oli naikara yo mwami. Ne Nabali aba omusangaafu mu mwoyo sikila aba amelile lukali. Nono Abikaili se aboolelakho Nabali sisiindu siosi siosi tawe khukhwola nga enje ne bwasia.
Ne kumutikhinyi nga kwola, Nabali aba amelulukhe. Omukhasi wewe amuboolela koosi kakaba ne kekholekha. Nabali afwa kumwoyo mala ekela nga libaale.
Enyuma we chindaalo ekhumi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aapa Nabali mala afwa.
Nga Daudi ne aulila ali Nabali afwiile, aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume! Niye oweyachile Nabali nga akhomile. Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhiingilile omukholi wewe khukhola kamamayaanu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruungire Nabali kamamayaanu kewe omwene.” Nio Daudi arumania khureeba Abikaili abe omukhasi wewe.
Nga bakholi ba Daudi ne becha khu Abikaili e Karimeli, bamuboolela bali, “Daudi akhurumire efwe khwiwe khukhubukule khukhuyile khu niye obe omukhasi wewe.”
Ne Abikaili enyokha mala enama bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi. Aloma ali, “Lola, omukholi wenywe ali omukholi osiinga bikele bie bakholi bo mwami.”
Abikaili akhola khangu mala enyokha aniina khu punda. Abikaili abukula bakholi bewe be siikhasi baraano, bamuliinda mala aloonda khu barumwa ba Daudi. Nio Abikaili aba omukhasi owa Daudi.
Daudi lundi abukula Ahinoamu khukhwama Yesireeli. Nono boombi bekela bakhasi bewe.
Saulo aba aelesie Mikali omukhaana wewe, owaba mukha Daudi khu Paliti okhwa Laishi. Paliti aba owe lukoba lwa Kalimu.

Saulo ekha khangu mu sichiimi sia Sifu, alala ne babaandu ba Isiraeli chielefu chitaru nibo arobora. Bacha khuyima Daudi mu sichiimi sia Sifu.
Ne Saulo apa ekambi mu sikulu sia Hakila sili siimbi ne kumuyila kuli ebukwe owa Yesimoni. Ne kakhali Daudi arama mu sichiimi. Nga Daudi ne amanya ali Saulo echile mu sichiimi khumuloondakho, Daudi arumania bayooti,
mala anyoola bung'ali ali Saulo echile.
Nio Daudi enyokha acha niio Saulo aba ne apile ekambi. Daudi abona abuundu niio Saulo ne komanda owe kamae wewe, Abuneri okhwa Neri baba ne bakonile. Saulo aba akonile mu kambi mukari ne banamae baba bamusirire.
Nio Daudi areeba Ahimeleki omuhiti ne Abisai okhwa Seruya (Abisai aba wandaaye owa Yoabu) ali, “Naanu olekha ne nase mu kambi niio Saulo ali?” Ne Abisai amukobosia ali, “Ese ndacha ne nawe.”
Nono Daudi ne Abisai bacha niio banamae baba mala banyoola Saulo akonile mu kambi. Lifumo lia Saulo liaba liasimiikhwe amurwe kwewe. Ne Abuneri ne banamae baba bakonile bamubotookhelele.
Nio Abisai aboolela Daudi ali, “Wele areere omusiku wowo mu bunyali bwowo endaalo yino. Nono, lekha ese emuune ne lifumo mu liloba lulala ne se ndamuuna khabili tawe.”
Ne kakhali Daudi aboolela Abisai ali, “Okhamubunia tawe. Mbao onyala ara kumukhono kwewe khu muchukhekho kamafura owa Wele mala alekha khuba ne kamamayaanu tawe.”
Ne Daudi achiililila ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamwire namwe siise siewe siikhoole mala akhafwe namwe akhache mwiie mala abune.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambeele ekhatilakho khu muchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Ne kakhali nono bukula lifumo lili amurwe kwewe ne sibuumba sie kameechi mala khuche.”
Nono Daudi abukula lifumo ne sibuumba sie kameechi khukhwama amurwe owa Saulo mala bacha. Mbao omundu owabona namwe amanya tawe. Mbao omundu owenyokha tawe. Boosi baba bakonile sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia liilo lisiro.
Nio Daudi acha lubeka luluundi aleeyi eema khungaaki khwe sikulu. Sibaanga siabao siboofu akari wabwe.
Daudi ayokelela banamae ne Abuneri okhwa Neri ali, “Abuneri, olikho ocha khu ngobosia ku?” Ne Abuneri akobosia ali, “Ewe naanu nio olange omwami?”
Ne Daudi areeba Abuneri ali, “Ewe se oli omusaani? Naanu oli nga ewe mu Isiraeli? Siina sikila nono ne okhaliindile omwami wowo tawe? Sikila omundu mulala echile khubunia omwami wowo.
Nilio okholile lino se lili lilayi tawe. Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, wenyekha khufwa sikila se oliindile omwami wowo tawe, omuchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nono lola niio lifumo lio mwami lili, ne sibuumba sie kameechi sibeele amurwe kwewe.”
Saulo amanyilisia kumumilo kwa Daudi mala areeba ali, “Daudi mwana wase, okwo kumumilo kwowo?”
Ne Daudi akobosia ali, “Ee, kuli kumumilo kwase mwami wase.”
Mala amureeba ali, “Siina sikila omwami wase ne atima khu mukholi wewe? Nakholile siina? Mamayaanu siina niko nakholile?
Nono, lekha omwami wase arekeeresie kamakhuwa ko mukholi wewe. Kaaba bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owakhukholile ewe wambiile ese, akhoya afukiilile siianwa. Ne baba ne bali babaandu, bakhoya balaamwe ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sikila bamboonile ese endaalo yino nio khanyoolakho kumukabwa kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Balomile bali, ‘Cha, kholela bawele babaandi.’
Nono, okhandekha ese nafwila aleeyi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Sikila omwami owa Isiraeli echile khu khumbenja busa oli oaaya enyuni esiindu mu chingulu.”
Saulo aloma ali, “Nakholile bubi. Daudi mwana wase, kobola. Se ndikhuumisia lundi tawe sikila luno ewe oriire bulamu bwase. Nabele omusilu lundi nekhiikhile lukali.”
Ne Daudi amukobosia ali, “Omwami wase, lifumo liowo nilio eli. Lekha mulala khu baandu bowo baele eche alibukule.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aananga kumuruuru khu buli mundu khulwe bung'ali bwo mundu oyo ne bubweyikinwa bwewe. Endaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhurere ewe mu bunyali bwase. Ne kakhali se ndililekho kumukhono kwase khu muchukhekho kamafura owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Nga bulamu bwowo ne bubeele bwe bukhala khwise, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yesi akhoya akhola bulamu bwase bwaba bwe bukhala mala ambonia khukhwama mu butinyu bwoosi!”
Nio Saulo alomalomela Daudi ali, “Ewe oli omubiite chikhabi, mwana wase Daudi. Okhakhole bibiindu bikali mala okhakhile.”
Nio Daudi acha khu bwewe, ne Saulo akobola engo.

Daudi ebaasia ali, “Endaalo ndala endibunisibwa ne Saulo. Sisiindu siili silayi khwise khukhola sili khukhwilukhila mu maloba ke Bafilisiti. Nio Saulo akhandusiekho kumwoyo kwewe khukhumbenja mu Isiraeli, ne ekhabe aleeyi khukhwama khu niye.”
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe chimia sita ba baaba ne naye barura mu Isiraeli bacha khu Akishi okhwa Moaki, omwami owa Katihi. Daudi ne babaandu bewe nende be mu chinju chabwe bamenya ne Akishi e Katihi.
Daudi aba ne bakhasi bewe babili: Ahinoamu owama Yesireeli ne Abikaili owama Karimeli, namulekhwa owa Nabali.
Nga Saulo ne aulila ali Daudi elukhile e Katihi, arusiakho kumwoyo khuenja Daudi.
Nio Daudi aboolela Akishi ali, “Waaba ne osiimisiibwe ne nase, mbelesie abuundu mu ngoba chowo lukoba lulalakho lwe khu lukoongo niio enyala namenya. Siina sikila omukholi wowo amenye mu lukoba luboofu ne nawe?”
Nio endaalo eyo Akishi aelesia Daudi lukoba lutiiti lwa Sikilaki. Khwako lukoba lwa Sikilaki luli lwe babaami ba Yuda khukhwama ao khukhwola luno.
Daudi amenya mu sibala sie Bafilisiti kumwiiko mulala ne kimieesi kine.
Nono Daudi ne babaandu bewe baniina bebwaakala babaandu ba Keshuri, Bakirisi ne Baamaleki. Babaandu bano baba bamenya mu sibala sisiama Shuri khukhwola Misiri khukhwama khale.
Daudi apana ne nabo, eera babaandu be siseecha nende be siikhasi mala abukula kamakheese kabwe ne chieeyi, ne chipunda ne chingamia ne chingubo. Nio akobola khu Akishi.
Yaba Akishi ne areeba ali, “Onuulile waena luno?” Daudi abeele anyala akobosia ali achile ebunafubo owa Yuda namwe ebunafubo owa Yeraimeeli namwe mu maloba ke Bakenayi.
Daudi se areerakho omundu yesi yesi omulamu mu Katihi tawe. Ebaasia ali ne areera babaandu ne bali balamu e Katihi, babaandu abo banyala baboolela Akishi bali, “Kano niko Daudi akholile.” Kuno nikwo kukwaba kumwiima kwa Daudi siise sioosi nisio amenya mu maloba ke Bafilisiti.
Nio Akishi eyikina Daudi ne aloma ali, “Daudi omwene akilile babaandu bewe babene Baisiraeli bamubiile lukali. Nono alikholela ese mindali na mindali.”

Biise ebio, Bafilisiti babuusia alala banamae babwe khu khuupana liie ne Isiraeli. Ne Akishi aboolela Daudi ali, “Ewe manya oli ewe ne babaandu bowo mulacha ne banamae base mwiie.”
Ne Daudi akobosia Akishi ali, “Bulayi! Ewe okhamanye niko ese omukholi wowo ndinyala khukhola.”
Akishi aboolela Daudi ali, “Bulayi! Ese ndakhukhola ewe obe omunamae wase ouniinda mu limenya liase lioosi.”
Bafilisiti babuusiana alala mala baapa ekambi mu lukoba lwa Siunemu. Ne Saulo abuusia Baisiraeli baapa ekambi e Kiliboa.
Nga Saulo ne abona banamae be Bafilisiti, aria mala kumwoyo kwewe kwesiindukha.
Ne nga Saulo ne areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se amukobosiakho akhaba mu marooro namwe khulwe khurumikhira Urimu namwe bang'oosi tawe.
Nio Saulo aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Mbenjele omukhasi omufumu mala ndacha mala mureebe.”
Ne bakholi bewe bamukobosia bali, “Mulala ali mu Endori.”
Nio Saulo ekaluukhasia, afwara chingubo chichiindi, mala oli musilo niye ne babaandu bewe babili bacha khubona omukhasi oyo. Saulo aboolela omukhasi oyo ali, “Ndakulile khulwe khurumikhira e roho. Ndereere ano omundu niye ndaloma lisina liewe.”
Ne kakhali omukhasi oyo amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali ewe omanyile niko Saulo akhola. Aona bafumu ne balakusi khukhwama mu sibala sia Isiraeli. Siina sikila nono ewe ne olikho okhaka khu khundeka mala okile niirwe?”
Ne kakhali Saulo echubila omukhasi oyo mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, kumunaanio kwosi kwosi se kulikhwichakho khulwe khukhola kano tawe.”
Nio omukhasi oyo amureeba ali, “Khwinyoselie naanu?”
Ne Saulo amukobosia ali, “Njinyoselie Samweli.”
Nga omukhasi oyo ne abona Samweli, akukuula mala areeba Saulo ali, “Siina sikila ne umbea ese? Ewe Saulo!”
Omwami aboolela omukhasi oyo ali, “Siina nisio oboone?”
Omukhasi oyo amukobosia ali, “Naboone khawele khalikho kharura mu liloba.”
Aamureeba ali, “Khafwaana khariena?”
Omukhasi oyo amukobosia ali, “Omusaakhulu alikho arura, Eboyile engubo.”
Ne, Saulo amanya ali aba Samweli, mala enama asi asikama.
Nio Samweli areeba Saulo ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne unaania, ne unjinyosia?”
Saulo amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi mu butinyu bukali. Bafilisiti balikho berekekha khu khuupana ne nase mala Wele andekhile ne se alikho angobosiakho lundi tawe. Se alikho angobosia khubirira mu bang'oosi namwe mu marooro tawe. Nono nakhulangile ewe umboolele nisio enyala nakhola.”
Ne Samweli amureeba ali, “Siina sikila nono ewe ne undeeba ese, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulekhile, mala ekeele omusiku wowo?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukholele niko aloma khubirira khwise. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atabuule bubwami khukhwama khwiwe mala aelesie chirani wowo Daudi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukholeele ewe lino endaalo yino sikila se wamuria mala wakhola nga lilaka liewe ne liaba, wabunisia Amaleki tawe.
Khutasa khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alira Isiraeli yosi ne nawe mu bunyali bwe Bafilisiti. Ne muchuli, ewe ne basoleeli bowo mukhabe alala ne nase. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhare akhaba banamae ba Isiraeli mu bunyali bwe Bafilisiti.”
Abwene ne abwene Saulo akwa asi, alambaala. Aaba ne buuri bukali khubeela kamakhuwa ka Samweli. Ne se aba ne kamaani tawe sikila aba se aliilekho sisiindu endaalo yoosi ne siilo sioosi tawe.
Nio omukhasi oyo acha niio Saulo aba. Ne nga ne abona ali Saulo aba ariire lukali, amuboolela ali, “Lola omukholi wowo akhuriire. Neanile bulamu bwase mala nakhola niko waloma.
Nono, wesi rekeeresia ko omukholi wowo. Lekha ekhuelesie kumukaati olie nio obe ne kamaani khu lukeendo lwowo.”
Saulo aloba mala aloma ali, “Se endalia tawe.” Ne kakhali bakholi bewe ne omukhasi oyo bamwekoonjelela. Aulila kamakhuwa kabwe enyokha asi, mala ekhala khu sitaanda.
Nono omukhasi oyo aba ne emoosi munju. Ne akikhonya khangu, abukula bufu abukaanda mala apa kimikaati kikhalimo kamamela tawe.
Arekekha sisialwa ebweeni wa Saulo ne bakholi bewe mala balia. Nio benyokha bacha siilo esio.

Nono Bafilisiti babuusia banamae babwe boosi e Afeki. Ne Baisiraeli baapa ekambi a sebele eli e Yesireeli.
Babaami be Bafilisiti babira ne banamae babwe mu bipupu bie chimia ne chielefu. Ne Daudi ne babaandu bewe babiranga enyuma ne Akishi.
Banamae babemeelesi be Bafilisiti bareeba bali, “Siina nisio Baeburania bano balikho bakhola ano?”
Nio Akishi areeba babemeelesi be kamae ke Bafilisiti ali, “Oyuno se ali Daudi, omukholi owa Saulo omwami owa Isiraeli? Abeele ne nase siise sileeyi ne khukhwama nga elukhila ewase, ekhamunyoolakho ne libi tawe khukhwola luno.”
Ne kakhali babemeelesi be kamae ke Bafilisiti bamuambila lirima. Ne bamuboolela bali, “Kobosiayo omundu oyo akobole khu milimo nikio wamuelesia. Se alacha ne nafwe mwiie tawe busa anyala ekela omusiku wefwe. Anyala akhola kumuleembe akari wewe ne omwami wewe khulwe khukhwira efwe.
Se ali Daudi niye bembelanga bali,
‘Saulo erire chielefu chewe,
ne Daudi chielefu kamakhumi ne kamakhumi?’ ”
Nio Akishi alaanga Daudi mala amuboolela ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ewe wabeele omundu owa Ng'ali. Ne khwise liekesia lili okhoya oche ne nase buli abuundu e liie. Sikila se nanyoolakho libi liosi liosi khwiwe tawe khukhwama endaalo niyo wechela khukhwola luno. Ne kakhali babemeelesi be kamae se bakhufukiilile ewe tawe.
Nono khe okoboleyo siise sino mala cha mu muleembe nio okhakhola sisiindu siosi siosi siikhasiimisia babemeelesi be kamae ke Bafilisiti tawe.”
Ne Daudi areeba Akishi ali, “Ne ese nakholile siina? Siina nisio onyoolile khu mukholi wowo khukhwama endaalo niyo narakikha khukhukholela khukhwola siise sino? Siina sikila ne ekhacha mala ekhupane ne basiku bo mwami wase tawe?”
Ne Akishi akobosia Daudi ali, “Ese manyile ndi ewe se oli nende liosi liosi nilio wikiichibwakho mumoni mwase tawe, oli nga malaika owa Wele. Ne kakhali babemeelesi be kamae balomile bali, ‘Se alacha ne nafwe mwiie tawe.’
Nono, yinyokha kumutikhinyi makhelebeende ne bakholi bo mwami wowo niye mwecha ne nabo enje ne bulikho busia.”
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe barekukha makhelebeende khu kobola mu maloba ke Bafilisiti. Ne kakhali Bafilisiti bacha e Yesireeli.

Nono Daudi ne babaandu bewe bacha Sikilaki endaalo eye khataru. Baamaleki baba bebwakaale ebunafubo owa Yuda ne Sikilaki. Baba baulile lukoba lwa Sikilaki mala balwosiisie.
Lundi baba babukule embaambe bakhasi ne abo boosi ba babamo batiiti ne baboofu. Se beerakho omundu tawe ne kakhali bababukula busa bacha ne nabo.
Ne nga Daudi ne babaandu bewe becha mu lukoba, balunyoola lwayiile mala bakhasi babwe ne babaana babwe be sisoleeli nende be siikhaana babukulibwe mu mbaambe.
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe balila khukhwola nga bawamo kamaani ke khulila.
Ba mukha Daudi babili, bosi baba babukulibwe embaambe. Bakhasi abo baba Ahinoamu owa Yesireeli ne Abikaili owaba namulekhwa owa Nabali, khukhwama Karimeli.
Nio Daudi aba ne butinyu bukali sikila babaandu baloma bali bamupe kamabaale. Babaandu boosi babeelela mu miooyo buli mundu sikila babaana bewe be sisoleeli nende be siikhaana. Ne kakhali Daudi anyoola mu kamaani Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe.
Ne Daudi aboolela Abiatari omusaayi okhwa Ahimeleki ali, “Ndereere efodi.” Nio Abiatari arerera Daudi efodi.
Ne Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ndime khu banuuli bano? Ndabatiila ku?” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali, “Batimekho sikila ng'ali olabatiila mala olasikula.”
Nio Daudi arekukha ne babaandu chimia sita ba baaba ne naye. Bacha bola khu kheechi kha Besori mala babaandu chimia chibili basikala ebweeneyo.
Sikila baba baluile lukali khwambukha tawe. Ne Daudi ne babaandu chimia chine bachiililila ne lukeendo.
Nga boola khu lukoongo, banyoola Omumisiri mala bamuyila khu Daudi. Bamuelesia kumukaati alia, bamua kameechi anywa. Ne bamua e keeki eye chinduli ne bisusuuchu bibili.
Ne nga Omumisiri oyo amala khulia, anyoola kamaani sikila aba se alilekho kumukaati namwe kameechi khulwe chindaalo chitaru siilo ne kumuusi tawe.
Ne Daudi amureeba ali, “Ewe oli omukholi owa naanu ne wama waena?”
Omumisiri oyo amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi omusoleeli khukhwama Misiri. Endi omukholi owo omuamaleki. Ne omwami wase andekhile enyuma sikila naba omulwale khulwe chindaalo chitaru.
Khwaba khwebwakaale ebunafubo owa Cheriti ne ebunafubo owa Yuda ne Kalebu. Ne khwosia lukoba lwa Sikilaki.”
Ne Daudi amureeba ali, “Onyala wambila niio banuuli abo bali?” Ne omumisiri oyo amukobosia ali, “Njechubile mu lisina lia Wele oli se olanjira namwe unjakanisie khu mwami wase tawe ne ese endakhuyila niio bali.”
Nio ayila Daudi.
Nga ne bolayo, banyoola banuuli abo basalanile buli abuundu balikho balia ne banywa ne bakhina sikila bibiindu nibio banuula khukhwama khu Bafilisiti ne mu maloba ka Yuda.
Nio Daudi abebwaakala khukhwama enje ne bukhasia tawe khukhwola ekolooba eye endaalo eyaloondakho. Omundu se aonakho tawe ne bakhali basoleeli chimia chine ba baniina khu ngamia mala belukha.
Daudi akobosia bioosi nibio Baamaleki baba ne babukula mala asikula ne bakhasi bewe babili.
Se siliio siikhanyoolekha tawe, sikeekhe namwe siboofu, babaana be sisoleeli nende be siikhaana ne buli sisiindu nisio baba ne banuula biakobola.
Daudi akobosia bioosi. Daudi lundi abukula kiminyele ne kamatuuli ke bibiaayo mala babaandu baloonda chikhaafu echo ebweeni wa Daudi ne baloma bali, “Bino nibio Daudi anuulile.”
Nio Daudi acha niio babaandu chimia chibili abo baba. Babaandu abo baba baluwa ne se baloonda khu Daudi tawe nono baba balekhwa a sebele eya Besori. Ne bacha bakaanana Daudi ne babaandu nibo aba nabo. Ne Daudi abembiia, abakheesia.
Ne kakhali babaandu balala ba baaba ne bacha ne Daudi baba bamayaanu ne chinge. Nono baloma bali, “Sikila se bachile ne nafwe tawe, se khulabawakho bibiindu bioosi bioosi khu nibio khukobosie tawe. Ne kakhali buli mundu alabukula omukhasi wewe ne babaana bewe mala ache.”
Ne kakhali Daudi ababoolela ali, “Bawandaayase, se mulakhola murio khu nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuelesie efwe tawe. Akhuliindile efwe mala ara banuuli babechile khukhwibwaakala mu bunyali bwefwe.
Naanu okana aulile kamalilo kenywe? Ba bachile mwiie ne abo ba basikale baliinda kimifuko boosi balanyoola bilekhaane.”
Daudi akhola lino liaba lilaka mu Isiraeli khukhwama endaalo eyo khukhwola luno.
Nga Daudi acha Sikilaki, aaruma bibiindu bilala khu bie liie khu basaale bewe basaakhulu ba Yuda ne aloma ali, “siianwa siowo nisio sino khukhwama khu biindu bie liie bie basiku ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Aarumania bibiindu ebio khu baandu ba Beteli, Ramoti ne ebunafubo owa Yuda. Aarumanisilia akhaba Yatiri,
Aroeri, Sifimoti, Esitemoa,
ne Rakali. Arumanisilia ne chingoba cha Yeraimeeli, ne Bakenayi,
Horima, Borashani, Atachi ne
Heburoni. Aarumanisilia akhaba babaandu abuundu oosi niio niye ne babaandu bewe bakeenda.

Nono Bafilisiti bapana liie ne Baisiraeli. Ne babaandu ba Isiraeli belukha Bafilisiti mala beererwa khu sikulu sia Kiliboa.
Bafilisiti lundi bapana lukali ne Saulo mala bera Yonasani ne Abinatabu ne Malikishua ba okhwa Saulo.
Bukhupani bwaba burafu, khu Saulo alaswa buyiingo mala achunisibwa lukali.
Nio Saulo aboolela omusuti owe bulwaani wewe ali, “Choola embalu yowo mala unjire, nio Bafilisiti basiinde bano bakhanjira mala banjinyailakho tawe.” Ne omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe se amwiira tawe sikila aria lukali. Nono Saulo abukula embalu yewe eng'ene mala akikwakho.
Ne omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe nga ne abona ali Saulo afwiile, yesi abukula embalu yewe mala akikwakho mala afwa ne Saulo.
Khwako, Saulo ne basoleeli bewe bataru ne omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe bafwiila khulala endaalo eyo.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli ba baaba engelekha we Litooma lia Yesireeli nende be ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani babona bali babaandu ba Isiraeli baba belukhe. Lundi baulila bali Saulo ne basoleeli bewe baba bafwiile. Boosi balekha chingoba chabwe mala belukha. Ne Bafilisiti becha mala bamenya mu chingoba echo.
Endaalo eyaloondakho, nga Bafilisiti ne bacha khuyaaya bie bafu, banyoola kimibili kia Saulo ne babaandu bewe bataru kialambaalile khu sikulu sia Kiliboa.
Nio bakhala kumurwe kwa Saulo, bamufwarura bulwaani bwewe. Nio baruma barumwa mu sibala sie Bafilisiti sioosi khuboolela bifwaani biabwe ne babaandu babwe kamakhuwa kamalayi ako.
Bara bulwaani bwa Saulo mu Lukaangu lwa wele bali Asitaroti mala babambila kumubili kwewe khwisiisi lia Betisiani bakukhomelakho.
Babaandu ba Yabesi-Kileati, baulila niko Bafilisiti bakhola khu Saulo.
Ne babaandu banyindaafu boosi barura bakeenda siilo sioosi bola Betishani bekhisia kimibili kia Saulo ne babaandu khukhwama khwisiisi. Bakobola nakio e Yabesi, mala bakioselia ebweeneyo.
Mala, babukula bikuumba mala babisiikha asi we kumurongooro mu lukoba lwa Yabesi mala balekha khulia khulwe chindaalo saba.

Enyuma we lifwa lia Saulo, Daudi aaba akoboole khukhwama khukhwirana ne Baamaleki, mala amenya mu Sikilaki khu ndaalo chibili.
Endaalo eloondakho omundu echa khukhwama mu kambi ya Saulo. Aba atabulaake chingubo chewe ne khukhwichukhakho liloba khumurwe. Acha niio Daudi aba mala enama ebweeni wewe mu khweboombia.
Daudi amureeba ali, “Ewe wama waena?” Naye amukobosia ali, “Nelukhe khukhwama mu kambi eye Baisiraeli.”
Daudi aloma ali, “Mboolele! Siina sisiekholeekhe?” Akobosia ali, “Banamae befwe beluukhe liie, ne babaandu befwe bakali bafwiile. Saulo no mwana wewe Yonasani bosi bafwiile.”
Daudi amureeba ali, “Omanyile orie oli Saulo no mwana wewe Yonasani bafwiile?”
Omusoleeli oyo amukobosia ali, “Lianyoolekhana busa ndi khu sikulu sia Kiliboa, mala nabona Saulo eunile khwifumo liewe. Ne kamakaari ne babaandu be chifarasi che liie baba bamwimbie.
Nio ekhebukha, ambona mala anaanga. Ne nga nafukiilila,
Andeeba ali, ‘Ewe naanu?’, Mala namukobosia ndi ese Omuamaleki.
Nio aloma ali, ‘Yiicha siimbi mala unjire! Naumiie lukali, ne ndi siimbi khufwa.’
Khwako nacha niio ali mala namwiira. Sikila namanya ndi nga nakwiile ario alafwa siise siosi siosi. Nio namufuula ekuutwa khu murwe kwewe ne lichaabe khu mukhono kwewe mala nabireerire ebweeni wowo omwami.”
Daudi etabulaka chingubo, alala ne babaandu bewe boosi.
Basooma ne khukhweyimana khulia khukhwola ekolooba. Bakhola bario sikila Saulo, ne Yonasani ne babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne be nju eya Isiraeli baba bererwe mwiie.
Daudi areeba omusoleeli omurereere elomo ali, “Ewe wama waena?” Amukobosia ali, “Ese Omuamaleki, ne menyile mu sibala siowo.”
Daudi amureeba ali, “Siina sikila nokharia omurobore owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe?”
Ne Daudi alanga mulala khu basoleeli bewe mala amukobosia ali, “Mwire!” Omusoleeli oyo apa Omuamaleki mala amwiira.
Daudi aboolela Omuamaleki ali, “Wamwene werereere kano. Wekhalakila kumusaango wamwene nga ne wafukiilila oli werire oyo niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aarobora khuba omwami.”
Daudi emba bililo bino khu Saulo ne omwana wewe Yonasani,
aaloma ali, lulwimbo luno lukhoya lwekesibwe khu baandu ba Yuda. Lwaandikwa mu sitabu sia Yasiari.
“Ee Isiraeli luyali lwowo lwaweleele khu bikulu.
Banamae befwe Banyindaafu bakwile barie!
Mukhaboola kano mu Katihi,
namwe khu chingila che lukoba lwa Ashikeloni tawe.
Ne busa bakhaana be ba Filisiti bakhola bario bekhoya,
bakhaana be basiinde bakhola bario beniinia.
“Efula namwe luume bikhakwakho khu bikulu bia Kiliboa tawe.
Buli lwosi kimikuunda kiayo kikhoya kialekha khubamo bibiaamo tawe!
Sikila ebweeneyo niyo engabo yo munyindaafu yafwolobisibwa
engabo eya Saulo se yaakhwa kamafura lundi tawe.
Khukhwama khu sifuki sie babaandu babeerwa,
khukhwama khu mibili kie banamae,
buyiingo bwa Yonasani se bwakobola tawe,
ne embalu eya Saulo se yakobola busa tawe.
“Saulo ne Yonasani, balayi lundi basiime,
mu bulamu ne mu lifwa baaba alala.
Baba babangu khukhila chifuruusi,
be kamaani khukhila chitalang'i.
“Ee bakhaana Baisiraeli lila Saulo,
Owamufwara enywe chingubo chimbesemu cha katani chisiimisia,
ne khumusaa kamamili ke sahabu khu ngubo chenywe.
“Banyindaafu bakwile bariena mwiie!
Yonasani eriirwe akonile khu bikulu bienywe.
“Khulila ewe wandaayase,
Yonasani nga nilwo yaba asiimisia!
Busiime bwowo khwise bwaba bwe liukia
bwaba bukhila busiime bwe bakhasi.
“Banyindaafu bakwile bariena!
Bulwaani bwabwe bwalekhilwe lundi buli busa.”

Enyuma wa kano, Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Nyala nacha namiia lukoba lulala lwa Yuda?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Yee khoche.” Daudi areeba lundi ali, “Lulala siina?” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Heburoni.”
Khwako Daudi acha Heburoni ne bakhasi bewe boombi, Ahinoamu owe Yesireeli ne Abikaili ngwa Nabali, owama e Karimeli.
Lundi Daudi abukula babaandu bewe nende be chinju chabwe, mala bamenya mu ngoba chili aembi ne Heburoni.
Nio babaandu ba Yuda bacha e Heburoni mala bachukha kamafura khu Daudi abe omwami owa Yuda.
Nga Daudi ne aulila ali babaandu ba Yabesi-Kileati nibo babasiikha Saulo,
aruma barume khu baandu Yabesi-Kileati ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya amuelesie chikhabi, sikila nga mwekesie burie bwenywe khu mwami wenywe ne khumusiikha.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya amwekesie busiime ne lisuubila. Ese nja khu mukholela kamalayi sikila niko mukholile.
Khwako, ba ne kamaani lundi banyindaafu! Omwami wenywe Saulo afwiile, ne babaandu ba Yuda banjukhilekho kamafura khuba omwami wabwe.”
Abuneri okhwa Neri, aba komanda owe banamae ba Saulo. Abukula Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo bambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani bacha Mahanaimu.
Ebweeneyo Abuneri akhola Ishibosheti khuba omwami owe bibala bia Kileati, Asieri, Yesireeli, Efuraimu, ne Benjamini, ne khu Isiraeli yoosi.
Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane ne arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli, mala amiia khu miiko kibili.
Ne ekholo eya Yuda nayo yaloonda Daudi.
Daudi amiia Yuda ne ali mu Heburoni khu miiko saba ne kimieesi sita.
Abuneri okhwa Neri, ne bakholi ba Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo, bama e Mahanaimu bacha mu lukoba lwa Kibeoni.
Yoabu okhwa Seruya, ne bakholi ba Daudi bacha babakaanila alitiisi lia Kibeoni. Bekhala asi bosi, sipupu silala lubeka lulala lwe litiisi ne sipupu sisiindi nasio lubeka luluundi.
Abuneri aboolela Yoabu ali, “Lekha babaana basoleeli benyokhe benyae ebweeni wefwe.” Mala Yoabu akobosia ali, “Lekha benyokhe.”
Khwako benyokha mala babala babaandu likhumi na babili ba Ishibosheti ne kholo eya Benjamini, ne likhumi na babili ba Daudi.
Buli sia mulala afwakhila omusiku wewe kumurwe ne khumuuna embalu mumbafu nio bakwa asi bafwila khulala. Nio liakila abuundu ao mu Kibeoni alaangwa “Siwanja sie chimbalu.”
Liie liaba lirafu lukali endaalo ng'eneyo. Abuneri ne Baisiraeli baulwa ne banamae ba Daudi.
Ba okhwa Seruya bataru babaayo: Yoabu, Abisai, ne Asaieli. Asaieli aba anyala atima khangu nga kicheu.
Asaeli arakikha khutimania Abuneri, atima ne amwiluungikhe.
Abuneri ekhebukha mala amureeba ali, “Ewe niye Asaeli?”
Aamukobosia ali, “Yee niise.”
Abuneri aamukobosia ali, “Lola lubeka luseecha namwe lukhasi, otiile mulala khu basoleeli mala obukule siosi siosi nisio ali ne nasio.” Ne kakhali Asaeli achiililila khumutimania.
Abuneri amuboolela lukhola khabili ali, “Lekha khu khundimania! Siina sikila ne wenya khwiire? Nyala nabonana ne wandaayo Yoabu ndiena?”
Ne kakhali Asaheli se alekha khumutimania tawe. Nio Abuneri amuuna engera ye lifumo enda mala yarurira khu mukoongo. Asaeli akwa asi afwa. Ne buli mundu owecha abuundu niio Asaeli afwila emao asila busa.
Ne kakhali Yoabu ne Abisai barakikha khuyiima Abuneri. Oli enyanga ekwa, bacha khu sikulu sia Ama, e bukwe owa Kia, khu ngila echa mu sichiimi sia Kibeoni.
Babaandu khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini bakara Abuneri lundi bebuusia alala khu sikulu.
Abuneri alaanga Yoabu mala aamureeba ali, “Khuchiililile ne khu khupana? Se onyala wabona oli ekhumaliilikha bukhabe buchuuni tawe? Olabukula siise siina nio okaanie babaandu bowo balekhe khu khutimania efwe bawandaayabwe?”
Yoabu aamukobosia ali, “Nga Wele ne amenyile, obanga se olomile tawe, ng'ali andi babaandu base bachiililile ne khu mutimania khukhwola muchuli.”
Nio Yoabu apa ekhoombi, mala babaandu bewe balekha khutimania Baisiraeli, ne khulekha khu khuupana.
