Abuneri ne babaandu bewe bakeenda babirira khwitooma lia Yoritani siilo esio sioosi. Ne enyuma we khukeenda kumutikhinyi kwoosi, boola e Mahanaimu.
Yoabu nga ne alekha khutimania Abuneri, abuusia babaandu bewe boosi mala anyoola ali, likhumi na tisa khu bakholi ba Daudi se balikho tawe, alala ne Asaeli.
Babaandu ba Daudi baba berire babaandu chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi sita ba Abuneri khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini.
Yoabu ne babaandu bewe babukula kumubili kwa Asaeli ne khukusiikha mu siliindwa sienju yabwe e Betelehemu. Nio bakeenda siilo sioosi bwabasiela e Heburoni.

Liie liabao akari wenju eya Saulo ne Daudi khu siise sileeyi. Ne enju eya Daudi yachiililila khunyoola kamaani ne eya Saulo nayo yachiililila khuuba endekhele.
Daudi asaala babaana be siseecha sita nga ne baloondana, basalilwa e Heburoni. Omubele aba Amunoni, ne maawe aba Ahinoamu khukhwama e Yesireeli.
Owe khabili aba Kileabu ne maawe aba Abikaili ngwa Nabali, khukhwama e Karimeli. Owe khataru aba Abusolomu ne maawe aba Maaka omukhaana owa Talimai omwami owa Keshuri.
Owa khane aba Atoniya ne maawe aba Hakiti. Owa kharaano aba Shefatia, ne maawe aba Abitanda.
Owa sita aba Itireamu ne maawe aba Egila. Babaana bano boosi basaalilwa mu Heburoni.
Nga khu khuupana ne khwachiililila akari we nju eya Daudi ne eya Saulo, Abuneri anyoolanga kamaani munju mwa Saulo.
Saulo aba no mukhasi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale bali Risipa omukhaana owa Aya. Endaalo ndala Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo areeba Abuneri ali, “Siina sikila nokonile ne mukha paapa?”
Lino liabeelesia Abuneri. Mala aamukobosia ali, “Wibaasia oli ese ndi kumurwe kwembwa khukhwama Yuda? Mu siise sileeyi khukhwola luno nabeele omweyikinwa khunju eya raraao Saulo, bawandaaye ne basaale bewe. Lundi namuoniisie enywe khulekha khuulwa ne Daudi, ne luno umbiiya sikila omukhasi!
Wele akhoya aelesie Abuneri kumunaanio, ne lukali ese naba bali se kholela Daudi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwechubila tawe.
Kharusie bubwami khukhwama munju eya Saulo ne khukhwimikha bubwami bwa Daudi khu Isiraeli ne Yuda, khukhwama Dani khukhwola Beerisheba.”
Ishibosheti se akobosia Abuneri likhuwa liosi liosi tawe sikila amuria.
Abuneri aruma barume khu Daudi, e Heburoni, ne aloma ali, “sibala sino sia naanu? Khola endakaano ne nase, ne nja khu khuyeeta khureera Isiraeli sioosi sibe asi wowo.”
Daudi akobosia ali, “Bulayi. Nja khukhola endakaano ne nawe. Ne kakhali khwenyakho sisiindu silala: okhambonekhela ne okhareerire omukhaana owa Saulo Mikali tawe.”
Ne Daudi aruma barume khu Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo ne aloma ali, “Ngoboselie omukhasi wase Mikali. Niye nakhwa kamafunga emia ndala ke Bafilisiti.”
Nio Ishibosheti amurusia wo museecha wewe Palitieli okhwa Laishi.
Palitieli amuloondakho khu ngila nalila khukhwola mu lukoba lwa Baurimu. Ne Abuneri aloma ali, “Kobola engo,” mala aakobolayo.
Abuneri acha khu basaakhulu ba Isiraeli mala ababoolela ali, “Khulwe siise sileeyi mwenyile Daudi abe omwami wenywe.
Nono khola murio. Khebulila muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka Daudi ali, ‘nja khurumikhira omukholi wase Daudi khuonia babaandu base Isiraeli khukhwama khu Bafilisiti ne khukhwama khu basiku babwe babaandi.’ ”
Abuneri yesi abolela ekholo eya Benjamini. Nio acha e Heburoni khuboolela Daudi niko babaandu ba Benjamini ne ba Isiraeli bafukiilile khukhola.
Abuneri acha niio Daudi ali e Heburoni, ne babaandu be siseecha kamakhumi kabili. Mala Daudi abakholela bukeni.
Abuneri aboolela Daudi ali, “Luno ndacha mala khubuusilie Isiraeli yoosi nio bakhole endakaano ne nawe. Ne ewe ocha khwamiia abo boosi nibo wenya.” Daudi alekha Abuneri acha khu lukeendo lwewe ne kumuleembe.
Musise sitiiti, Yoabu ne bakholi babaandi ba Daudi bakobola khukhwama mu khuseera. Bareera bibiindu bikali nibio bayaayile. Kakhaba kario, Abuneri se abao ne Daudi e Heburoni tawe. Sikila Daudi aba ambuukhe achiile lukeendo lwewe ne kumuleembe.
Yoabu ne banamae nibo aba nabo nga becha Heburoni baboolela Yoabu bali, “Abuneri echile khu mwami Daudi. Ne omwami amulekha acha mu muleembe.”
Nio Yoabu acha niyo omwami ali ne khumureeba ali, “Okholile siina sino? Abuneri echile niio oli ne siina sikila nomulekhile aacha?
Omanyile oli echile ano khukhubea ne khumanya koosi niko okhola ne oosi niio ocha.”
Enyuma we khulekhana ne Daudi, Yoabu aruma barume khutiila Abuneri mala bamuyusila khu sebele eya Sira. Daudi se amanyakho siosi siosi tawe.
Abuneri nga ne akobola mu Heburoni, Yoabu amuyila alubeka asilibwa, nga owenya khukhwikutakho naye. Abwenao amuuna kumubano munda. Khwako Abuneri eerwa sikila eera Asaeli wandaaye owa Yoabu.
Enyuma wako, nga Daudi ne aulila kano, aaloma ali, “Ese ne bubwami bwase se khuli ne kamabi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuloondekhana ne khukhwirwa khwa Abuneri okhwa Neri tawe.
Kumunaanio kube khu Yoabu ne lisaaye liewe! Buli mu selukho lisaaye liewe likhabemo omundu ooli ne bulwaale bwa kisonono namwe bulwaale bwe kamakele, namwe omuleme okeendela khu siimbo, namwe niye beera mwiie, namwe owe njala!”
Khwako Yoabu ne wandaaye Abisai beera Abuneri sikila eera wandayaabwe Asaeli mwiie liliaba e Kibeoni.
Nio Daudi aboolela Yoabu ne babaandu bewe khutabulaka chingubo chabwe, befware kamakunia mala balile Abuneri. Omwami Daudi omwene akeendela enyuma we lisanduku lio mufu.
Basiikha Abuneri e Heburoni. Ne omwami Daudi aapa lulwang'a mala aalilila khu siliindwa sia Abuneri, mala babaandu boosi balila.
Omwami alila Abuneri ne aloma ali:
“Abuneri akhoyela afwe nga omusilu ku?
Kamakhono kowo se kabowa tawe,
ne bikele biowo se biabowa kimikoye tawe.
Wakwile nga omundu okwa ebweeni we bamayaanu,”
mala babaandu boosi bamulila lundi.
Nio babaandu boosi becha khwikoonjelela Daudi aliekho siakhulia ne kusiili kumuusi. Ne kakhali Daudi echuba naloma ali, “Wele akhoya amba kumunaanio kaaba bali ndia siakhulia namwe sisiindu siosi siosi enyanga ne khakwa tawe!”
Babaandu boosi babona likhuwa elio, mala liabasiimisia. Buli siindu nisio omwami akhola siasiimisia babaandu boosi.
Endaalo eyo, babaandu boosi mu Isiraeli yoosi bamanya bali se liaba lilienya lio mwami khukhwira Abuneri okhwa Neri tawe.
Omwami aaboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Se mumanya muli endaalo eya luno omwami lundi omundu omukali mu Isiraeli amalile khufwa tawe?
Akhaba ne ndi omwami owachukhwakho kamafura, ndi omutekhele luno. Ba okhwa Seruya bano baba ne kamaani khu khukhila. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya aruunga omumayaanu khuloondekhana ne bumayaanu bwewe.”

Nga Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo ne aulila ali Abuneri afwiliile e Heburoni, awa kamaani. Baisiraeli boosi baba ne liayaaya.
Ishibosheti aba ne babaandu babili ba baaba babemeelesi be Baseeri. Mulala aba bali Baana, ne okundi aba bali Rekabu, ba okhwa Rimoni khukhwama Beeroti mu kholo eya Benjamini. (Beeroti lwosi lubalwa khuba lulalakho khu ngoba cha Benjamini.
Bamenywa balwo be khunyoa belukhila e Kitaimu, niio bamenyile nga baakwa khukhwola luno.)
Yonasani okhwa Saulo aba no mwana owalemala bikele bali Mefibosheti. Aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kiraano nga likhuwa ne liama Yesireeli bali Saulo ne Yonasani bafwiile. Chilomo nga ne chama mu lukoba lwa Yesireeli bali Saulo ne Yonasani bafwiile, omulesi wewe amuyula mala elukha. Mu khuyuyukhana, amupa asi mala amutasa buleme.
Nono ba okhwa Rimoni omuberoti, Rekabu ne Baana barakikha lukeendo lwe khucha owa Ishibosheti. Bolayo mwiangilwe ne alikho aola.
Omukhasi omuliindi we kumuliango owaba ne alikho aseesa engaanu aungula mala liilo lia mutiila. Nio Rekabu ne Baana bepiula munju.
Nga bola munju, bacha mu lusiro nimwo Ishibosheti aaba. Bamunyoola alikho akona, mala bamwiira. Nio bamurusiakho kumurwe, bakubukula mala bakeenda siilo sioosi khubirira mwitooma lia Yoritani.
Baelesia omwami Daudi kumurwe okwo e Heburoni. Bamuboolela bali, “Kumurwe kwo musiku wowo Ishibosheti okhwa Saulo omusiku wowo owenyanga khukhwira ewe, kuli ano. Luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhwiyachile Saulo ne lisaaye liewe.”
Ne kakhali Daudi aakobosia Rekabu ne wandaaye, babaana ba okhwa Rimoni omuberoti ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owambonia khukhwama mu busiku bwoosi!
Omundu mulala echa amboolela ali, ‘Lola Saulo afwiile.’ Ebaasia ali andereere kamakhuwa kamalayi. Ne kakhali namutiila mala namwirira e Sikilaki. Okwo kwaba kumuruungo nikwo namuelesia khulwe chilomo chewe nicho andeerera.
Ne bulaba bubi bukali po, khu baandu baabi babeera omundu okhalikho ne kumusaango tawe, owikonela busa liilo munju mwewe? Luno nja khumwiyacha nga ne mwamwirire, mala mubunie khukhwama khu sibala.”
Daudi arusia lilaka, mala basoleeli bewe beera Rekabu ne Baana mala babakhalaka kamakhono kabwe ne bikele. Babasuunga ambi ne litiisi lie mu Heburoni. Ne kakhali babukula kumurwe kwa Ishibosheti bakusiikha mung'ani eya Abuneri e Heburoni.

Nio chikholo choosi cha Isiraeli chacha khu Daudi e Heburoni mala bamuboolela bali, “Efwe khuli babaandu be kamafuki kowo.
Mu biise bibiabira, Saulo nasiili omwami wefwe, niwe owemeelelanga babaandu ba Isiraeli mwiie. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolela ali, ‘Ewe okhabe omwaayi lundi omwami owe babaandu base Isiraeli.’ ”
Nio basaakhulu boosi ba Isiraeli bacha khu mwami Daudi e Heburoni. Ne Daudi akhola endakaano ne nabo e Heburoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bamuchukhakho kamafura nga omwami owa Isiraeli.
Daudi aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru narakikha khuuba omwami. Amiia khu miiko kamakhumi kane.
Amiia Yuda ne ali mu Heburoni khu miiko saba ne kimieesi sita. Ne amiia Isiraeli ne Yuda nali mu Yerusalemu khu miiko kamakhumi kataru na kitaru.
Ne kakhaba kario Daudi aamba lukoba lwabwe lusire lwa Sayuni, lulwecha lwamanyikhana nga Lukoba lwa Daudi.
Endaalo ng'eneyo Daudi aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Omundu yesi yesi onyala aula Bayebusi akhoya aniinile khu ngila eye kameechi nio mala ebwaakale babofu ne baleme nibo Daudi abiila.” Liakila lialomekha lili, “Omubofu no muleme se banyala bengila munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
Daudi nga amala khutiila lukoba, aalumenyamo ne khulutiuukha lisina ali, “Lukoba lwa Daudi.” Ombakha alubotookhelesia khurakikhira mu maloba ke kimiliinda khucha mukari.
Nio Daudi atasa khuuba ne kamaani sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bunyali aba ne naye.
Omwami Hiramu owe Tiro aruma barume be kimilimo khu Daudi. Baba ne kimirongooro kimitarakwa kie khukhwombakha, alala nende babeechi ne babombakhi barumikhira kamabaale, babombakha enju eya Daudi.
Liakila Daudi amanya ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwimiisie niye nga omwami owa Isiraeli lundi akaliisie bubwami bwewe sikila babaandu bewe Isiraeli.
Enyuma we khuuyila Yerusalemu khukhwama Heburoni, Daudi akhwa bakhasi ne khutasakho babaandi nibo aamenyia mu Yerusalemu nga basaale mala asaala babaana basoleeli ne bakhaana babaandi.
Kano niko kamasina ke babaana nibo asaala ne ali mu Yerusalemu: Siamua, Siobabu, Nasani, Solomoni
Ibihari, Elishua, Nefeei, Yafia
Elisiama, Eliata ne Elifeleti.
Nga Bafilisiti ne baulila bali Daudi achukhilwekho kamafura khuuba omwami owa Isiraeli, boosi barakikha khumuyiima. Ne kakhali nga Daudi ne aulila lino, acha mu bwikisi.
Bafilisiti baba bechile mala basalaaniile mwitooma lia Refaimu.
Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Nje nibwaakale Bafilisiti? Ocha khumbelesia bukhili?” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Yee, cha! Nja khu khuelesia bukhili khu nibo.”
Nio Daudi aacha e Baali-perasimu ne ebweeneyo niyo aulila Bafilisiti. Aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abirire mu basiku base nga kameechi kakechuule.” Nio liakila abuundu ao alaangwa bali Baali-perasimu.
Bafilisiti nga ne belukha, balekha enyuma bifwaani biabwe, mala Daudi ne babaandu bewe babisuta.
Nio Bafilisiti bakobola sie tooma lia Refaimu, basalanila lundi.
Ne nga Daudi areeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi, amukobosia ali, “Okhabeluungikha tawe. Babotookhelele, mala obebwaakale khukhwichila lubeka lwe kimirongooro kia misorisati.
Ne noulila chindiri che khukeenda angaaki we kimirongooro, khola khangu. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhuraangirire khukhwira banamae be Bafilisiti.”
Daudi akhola nga nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka, mala atimania Bafilisiti khukhwama e Keba khukhwola e Keseri.

Lundi Daudi abuusia alala babaandu barobore boosi Baisiraeli chielefu kamakhumi kataru.
Daudi enyokha mala aacha ne babaandu nibo aba nabo boosi khukhwama e Baala mu Yuda. Bacha khurusiayo Lisanduku lie ndakaano eyo Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, owikhaale khu kerubi.
Basutila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano khu likaari liiya nilio babukula khukhwama munju eya Abinatabu eyaba khu sikulu. Usia ne Ahio, ba okhwa Abinatabu, nibo babatimia likaari elio ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele.
Ahio aba ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Daudi ne Baisiraeli boosi baba balikho bakhina ne beemba ne kamaani kabwe koosi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baapa biilili, kamatuungu, chitamburini, ching'oma ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya.
Nga ne boola abuulilo bwa Nakoni, chieeyi chetuya, mala Usia atiila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Usia lirima mala amwiira sikila atiila Khwisanduku lie Ndakaano. Usia aafwiila ebweeneyo khu ndulo e Lisanduku lie Ndakaano.
Daudi aba ne lirima sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eera Usia. Nio abuundu ao alaangwa Peresi-usa khukhwola luno.
Daudi aba ne buuri khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi endaalo eyo, mala aloma ali, “Ndabukula ndiena Lisanduku lie Ndakaano?”
Nono Daudi se enya khuyila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lukoba lwewe tawe. Ne kakhali aliausia mala aliyila munju mwa Obedi-Edomu, omukiti.
Liamenyayo kimieesi kitaru, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita chikhabi Obedi-Edomu nende be nju yewe boosi.
Omwami Daudi aulila ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aeleesie be nju eya Obedi-Edomu chikhabi ne bibiindu bioosi nibio aba ne nabio sikila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele. Nio Daudi acha akobosia Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele khukhwama munju eya Obedi-Edomu mala aliyila mu Lukoba lwa Daudi ne khoyo.
Nga abo baba ne basutile Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bamala khucha bikele sita, Daudi mala aanila Omwami embosio eye euunwa ne moosi enefu.
Daudi, efwara engubo elaangwa efodi eya katani mu sibuno mala akhina ne kamaani kewe koosi, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khwako Daudi ne Baisiraeli boosi bayila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano e Yerusalemu ne chingalakala che busangaafu ne luyoka lwe chikhoombi.
Nga Lisanduku ne liaba ne lireerwa mu lukoba, Mikali, omukhaana owa Saulo, alengelelela munuma abona Daudi ne akhina ne khusuna ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala amubonela bubi.
Bareera Lisanduku lie Ndakaano mala balira abuundu walio mu liiema nilio Daudi alikholela. Nio aana biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Daudi nga na amala khuana bianwa bie kumuleembe, abiita babaandu mu lisina lia Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akaba biakhulia khu baandu boosi. Aelesia buli mundu owe siseecha nende we siikhasi mu Isiraeli sitonyi sie kumukaati, sitonyi sie nyama enjosie, ne kimisabibu kimiomu. Nio buli mulala acha engo wewe.
Enyuma wako, nga Daudi akobola engo khukheesia be nju yewe, Mikali omukhaana owa Saulo arura enje khumwakaanila. Aaloma ali, “Omwami owa Isiraeli luno eelesie lukoosi luboofu po! Eyanikhiliile nga omusilu ebweeni we bakhaana be bakholi bewe!”
Daudi aamukobosia ali, “Khinile khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, owandobora ese khukhila raraao, ne khu khukhola ese omwimeelesi owe babaandu bewe Baisiraeli khukhila lisaaye lia Saulo. Ne nja khuchiililila khukhina khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne nja khwiambia chisoni khukhilakho. Bakhaana nibo olomile abo bacha khumbelesia lukoosi khukhilakho.”
Mikali, omukhaana owa Saulo, se abaakho no mwana tawe khukhwola khufwa khwewe.

Nono omwami Daudi amenya mu lichipi liewe mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesia kumuleembe ne basiku bewe boosi ba bamubotookhelela.
Nio omwami aboolela omung'oosi Nasani ali, “Ese namenyile ano munju eyombakhwa ne kimirongooro kimitarakwa ne kakhali Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liabikhwa mu Liiema.”
Nasani akobosia omwami Daudi ali, “Cha okhole liosi liosi lili mu mwoyo kwowo, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nawe.”
Ne kakhali siilo esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Nasani ali,
“Cha oboolele omukholi wase Daudi oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Se oli ewe ounjombakhila ese enju emenyemo tawe.
Khukhwama mu biise nibio nasikulilamo Baisiraeli khukhwama e Misiri khukhwola luno, khamenyakho munju tawe. Nakeendile buli abuundu nendi mu bwikhalo mu liiema.
Buli abuundu niio nacha ne Baisiraeli boosi khareebakho mulala khu bemeelesi Baisiraeli nibo narobora khuliinda babaandu base Baisiraeli ndi siina sikila ne mukhanjombakhila enju eye kimitarakwa tawe.’
“Khwako boolela omukholi wase Daudi oli, ‘Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we banamae aloma ali, nakhurusia khukhwama mu bwayi bwe kamakheese mala nakhukhola khuba omwami owe babaandu base Baisiraeli.
Nabeele ne nawe buli abuundu niio wachilenge ne khukhuulila basiku bowo boosi ebweeni wowo. Nja khu khukhola omanyikhane nga babemeelesi bamanyikhaane lukali mu sibala.
Kharoborere babaandu base Baisiraeli abuundu mala mbare abwenao. Bacha khumenyao ne se bakhanaanisibwe lundi tawe. Babaandu bamayaanu se bakhabapie sibi nga ne bakhola ekhunyoa tawe.
Babaandu bamayaanu bachiililile khukhola bario khukhwama nga naroborera babaandu base Baisiraeli babemeelesi. Ne ndabaelesia kumuleembe khukhwama khu basiku babwe boosi.
Khutasa khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali niye omwene akhamiie enju yowo. Nokhafwe mala osiikhwe, khamiisie mulala khu basoleeli bowo ne khaandalasie bubwami bwewe.
Niye okhanjombakhile enju ne nja khukhola bubwami bwewe bubeeo khulwa mindali.
Khabe raraawe ne niye akhabe omwana wase. Ne akhola bubi, khamuukuume nga paapa ne aelesia omwana wewe siiukuumo.
Se nja khumurusiakho busiime bwase nga nakhola khu Saulo tawe, niye narusia ebweeni wowo nio ewe waaba omwami.
Enju yowo, nende bubwami bwowo bucha khubao kimiiko kioosi.’ ”
Nasani aboolela Daudi kano koosi ne buloli buno bwoosi.
Nio omwami Daudi engila mu Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ekhala ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloma ali, “Yee Omwami WELE, ese se khoyela niko ewe wakholeele ese nende be nju yase tawe.
Omwami WELE, sino siabeele sisiindu sitiiti mumoni chowo, waanile lisuubisia khu lisaaye liase mu miiko kikiicha. Omwami WELE, lundi walomaloome ke chindaalo chichiicha khunju yase, omukholi wowo.
Omwami WELE ese Daudi khuboolele siina! Ewe umanyile ese omukholi wowo.
Sikila lisuubisia liowo ne khuloondekhana ne lilienya liowo, wakholile bibiindu biboofu bino bioosi nio ese omukholi wowo mbimanye.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe oli omukali. Mbao ooli nga ewe tawe, se aliio wele okundi tawe. Buli lwosi khwamanya khuli ewe weng'ene niwe Wele.
Mbao ekholo ekiindi mu sibala eeli nga Baisiraeli tawe. Ewe wabaonia khukhwama mu burumwa ne khubakhola khuuba babaandu bowo. Bibiindu bikali lundi bie liukia nibio wabakholela biasalanisie efuma yowo mu sibala sioosi. Watimania chikholo chichiindi ne ba wele babwe ebweeni we babaandu bowo.
Wakhola Isiraeli khuuba babaandu bowo khulwa mindali na mindali, lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe wabeele Wele wabwe.
“Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aandalasia endakaano niyo wakholela ese ne lisaaye liase. Khola niko waloma oli okhakhole.
Efuma yowo echa khubao buli lwosi. Ne babaandu bakhalome bali, ‘Omwami Owe Banamae niye Wele owa Isiraeli.’ Okhaliinde lisaaye liase buli lwosi.
Sikila ewe Omwami Owe Banamae, Wele owa Isiraeli, wamboolela ese oli ‘Nja khukhwombakhila enju. Niko kakila ese omukholi wowo, ne khusaba ndio.’
“Nono Omwami WELE, ewe oli Wele, ne kamakhuwa kowo kali ka ng'ali. Ewe wasuubisia ese omukholi wowo bibiindu bilayi bino.
Khureeba ewe umbiitile chikhabi lisaaye liase nio lichiililile khuba ne chikhabi chowo. Ee Omwami WELE, ewe wasuubisie oli, olabiita chikhabi lisaaye liase buli lwosi.”

Enyuma we siise, omwami Daudi aseera Bafilisiti mala abaula, ne khubukula lukoba lwabwe lwa Metekama.
Daudi lundi aula Bamoabu. Akhola baboe bakona asi mala mu nyilili chitaru eera chinyilili chibili khu chitaru. Nio Bamoabu baba barumwa bewe ne khuruunga busuuru khu niye.
Akhaba lundi Daudi aula Hatateseri okhwa Rehobu omwami ne sibala sie Soba nga aaba ne ali khu ngila ne acha khukobosia bubwami bwewe engaaki we luluuchi lwa Efurati.
Daudi aamunuula babaandu eelefu ndala ne chimia saba batimia chifarasi ne banamae be khu bikele chielefu kamakhumi kabili. Aabiikha chifarasi chicholaana ne kamakaari emia ndala ne khulemasia chichiindi choosi.
Nga Bashamu ba Damasika ne becha khuyeeta Hatateseri omwami owa saba, Daudi eera babaandu be Bashamu chielefu kamakhumi kabili.
Nio Daudi aaraayo chikambi che banamae mu Aramu e Damasika. Mala Bashamu baaba bakholi bewe ne khuruunga busuuru khu niye. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Daudi khuuba omuuli buli osi niio acha.
Daudi abukula chingabo che sahabu chichaba ne chasutwa ne babemeelesi ba Hatateseri mala aachiyila e Yerusalemu.
Lundi abukula sikelo sikali sie kumukasa khukhwama Beta ne Berotai, chingoba cha Hatateseri.
Omwami Toi owa Amati nga aulila ali Daudi aulile banamae boosi ba Hatateseri,
aaruma omwana wewe Yoramu khukheesia omwami Daudi ne khumusiima nga aapana ne Hatateseri mala amuula. Hatateseri ne Toi baba bapaane khulwe biise bikali. Yoramu ayilila Daudi bibiindu bie efwesa, bie esahabu nende bie kumukasa.
Omwami Daudi abiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alala ne efwesa ne sahabu nibio amia mu kholo choosi nicho aula.
Chikholo chino chaba Edomu, Moabu, Amoni, Filisiti, ne Amaleki akhaba nende bie bunuuli nibio anuula khukhwama khu Hatateseri.
Ombakha chikambi mu Edomu mwoosi, mala Baedomu boosi baaba bakholi bewe. Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Daudi aula buli abuundu niio acha.
Daudi amiia Isiraeli yoosi, mala emeelela mu bung'ali ne mu buluungi babaandu bewe boosi.
Yoabu okhwa Seruya, aba omwimeelesi owe banamae. Yehoshafati okhwa Ahiludi aba omuandiki.
Satoki okhwa Ahitubu ne Ahimeleki okhwa Abiatari baba basaayi. Siausia yesi aba omuandiki.
Benaya okhwa Yehoyata aba omwimeelesi owe Bakeleti ne Bapeleti, nende ba okhwa Daudi baba basaayi.

Abao omukholi owe lisaaye lia Saulo bali Siba. Alaangwa ache niio Daudi ali. Omwami amureeba ali, “Ewe niwe Siba?” Akobosia ali, “Omwami ese ndi omukholi wowo.”
Omwami aareeba lundi ali, “Ali waena?” Siba amukobosia ali, “Ali munju mwa Makiri okhwa Amieli, e Lotebari.”
Nio omwami Daudi arumania bamureera.
Ne Mefibosheti, okhwa Yonasani, omwichukhulu Saulo, nga ne oola ebweeni wa Daudi enama mukhweboombia. Daudi aamulaanga ali, “Mefibosheti.” Naye aakobosia ali, “Omwami, ese ndi omukholi wowo.”
Daudi amuboolela ali, “Okharia tawe. Nja khu khukholela kamalayi sikila raraao Yonasani. Nja khu khukoboselia kamaloba koosi kakaba ka kukaao Saulo. Ne buli lwosi ocha khulia khu mesa yase.”
Mefibosheti lundi enama ebweeni wa Daudi mala aloma ali, “Omwami, siina sikila ukholele bulayi buno mala ese, omukholi wowo ndi busa nga embwa efu?”
Nio omwami alanga Siba, omukholi owa Saulo, mala amuboolela ali, “Ndikho mbelesia Mefibosheti, omwichukhulu owo mwami wowo, buli siindu sisiaba sia Saulo ne lisaaye liewe.
Ewe ne babaana bowo be sisoleeli, ne bakholi bowo mucha khumulimilanga kumukuunda. Lundi mucha khumureereranga biakhulia nio omwichukhulu owo mwami wowo abe ne siakhulia. Ne kakhali Mefibosheti omwichukhulu owo mwami wowo buli lwosi acha khulia khu mesa yase.” Siba aba ne babaana basoleeli ekhumi na baraano ne bakholi kamakhumi kabili.
Siba aboolela omwami ali, “Omwami, nja khukhola buli siindu nisio umboleele.” Nio Mefibosheti aalichanga no mwami nga mulala khu baana be sisoleeli bo mwami.
Mefibosheti aba no mwana omutiiti owe sisoleeli owalaangwa Mika. Babaandu boosi be nju eya Siba baba bakholi ba Mefibosheti.
Nio Mefibosheti, owaba omuleme bikele bioombi, aamenya mu Yerusalemu, ne buli lwosi alia khu mesa yo mwami.

Mu biise bikeekhe omwami Nahasi okhwa Amoni afwa. Mala omwana wewe owe sisoleeli Hanuni eela mu bwami bwewe.
Omwami Daudi aloma ali, “Khoyeele nekesie buriaani khu Hanuni, nga raraawe Nahasi ne akholela.” Nio Daudi aruma barume khumuoleelesia khulwe lifwa lia raraawe.
Ne bakholi ba Daudi bacha mu sibala sie Baamoni.
Nga ne bolayo, babemeelesi ba Amoni baboolela omwami wabwe Hanuni bali, “Ewe wibaasia oli nga Daudi ne arumire babaandu bano khu khuoleelesia abeele ne buuri khu raraao ku? Abarumire ano nga bayooti khuyama lukoba, nio bakhuule.”
Hanuni aamba barume ba Daudi mala aababeka lubeka lulala lwe bunwanwa bwabwe. Aakhalaka chingubo chabwe khukhwola khu nduukhu, mala aabatimania bacha.
Baba ne chisoni khukobola engo. Ne nga Daudi ne aulila kakekholeekhe, aarumania bababoolele barame e Yeriko khukhwola nga bunwanwa bwabwe ne bumela nio bakobole.
Baamoni nga bamanya bali bakholile Daudi khuuba omusiku wabwe, basaba banamae Bashamu chielefu kamakhumi kabili khukhwama e Beti-rehobu ne Soba, babakeendelanga bikele. Lundi basaba banamae chielefu likhumi na chibili khukhwama e Tobu, ne khukhwama khu mwami owa Maaka, eelefu ndala.
Daudi nga aulila aruma Yoabu ne banamae be kamaani.
Baamoni barura enje berekekhera liie esilibwa sie lukoba. Ne Bashamu ba Soba nende ba Rehobu ne babaandu be Tobu nende e Maaka, baba busa bong'ene mu chingoongo.
Nga Yoabu ne abona ali basiku banyala bamwibwaakalila khukhwama ebweeni ne nyuma, arobora banamae Baisiraeli balala barana ne khubara mu bweyaangu berekekhele Bashamu.
Banamae bewe babarama abara mu bunyali bwa wandaaye Abisai, owabara mu bweyaangu bwe khu khupana ne Baamoni.
Yoabu aamuboolela ali, “Waaba nobona oli Bashamu balikho bambula, yiicha unjeete, ne Baamoni baaba ne balikho bakhuula, ndeecha khuyeete.
Ba ne bunyindaafu! Lekha khupane ne kamaani sikila babaandu befwe, chingoba cha Wele wefwe. Ne lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi likhoya liekholekhe.”
Yoabu ne babaandu bewe babebwaakala, mala Bashamu belukha.
Baamoni nga ne babona Bashamu ne belukha, bosi belukha Abisai ne khukobola mu lukoba lwabwe. Nio Yoabu akobola khukhwama mu khuupana ne Baamoni mala aacha Yerusalemu.
Ne nga Bashamu ne bemanya bali bakhililwe ne Baisiraeli, babuusania bosi alala.
Omwami Hatateseri arumania barera Bashamu ba baaba engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati. Becha e Helamu asi we lilaka lia Siobaki komanda owe banamae bo mwami Hatateseri khukhwama Soba.
Daudi nga ne aulila ario, abuusia Baisiraeli boosi, bambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani, mala bacha e Helamu. Bashamu baba berekeekhe khu khuupana ne Daudi mala bukhupani bwarakikha.
Daudi eera Bashamu chimia saba be kamakaari nende be chipunda chielefu kamakhumi kane mala baunaka Siobaki, komanda owe banamae be Bashamu mala afwila ebweeneyo. Nio Bashamu belukha Baisiraeli.
Babaami ba baaba bakholi ba Hatateseri nga ne bamanya bali baulilwe ne Baisiraeli, bakhola kumuleembe ne nabo mala baaba bakholi be Baisiraeli. Khwako Bashamu baria khuabina Baamoni lundi.

Endaalo ndala ekolooba, Daudi enyokha khukhwama khu ndebe yewe eye khuuluukha mala acha khu ngaaki khwenju yewe. Nga ne aba ne alikho ne akeenda khu ngaaki okhwo, abona omukhasi alikho esiinga. Omukhasi oyo aba ne lukoondo lulayi.
Nio arumania amanye omukhasi oyo naanu niye. Bamuboolela bali, “Ali Batisheba, omukhaana owa Eliamu, mukha Uria Omuhiti.”
Nono Daudi arumania barume khureera Batisheba. Bamureerera mala akona ne naye. (Batisheba aba nio aamalile khuuba mu ndaalo chewe chimbi.) Enyuma wako Batisheba akobola engo wewe.
Ekhumaliilikha emanya ali aesiisie mala aruma burume khu Daudi khumumanyisia.
Nio Daudi aaruma burume khu Yoabu ali, “Ndangile Uria Omuhiti eche.” Nio Yoabu aaruma Uria khu Daudi.
Uria nga ne oola, Daudi aamureeba Yoabu ne banamae ne bali balamu, lundi nga khu khuupana ne khulikho khuchiililila.
Nio aboolela Uria ali, “Cha engo wisiinge bikele.” Uria aarekukha, ne Daudi amuloondiakho siianwa.
Ne kakhali Uria se acha engo tawe. Akona amuliango kwenju yo mwami alala ne baliindi bo mwami.
Daudi nga aulila ali Uria se acha engo tawe, amureeba ali, “Ewe wama lukeendo luleeyi busa siina sikila nokhachiile munju mwowo?”
Uria aakobosia Daudi ali, “Baisiraeli ne Bayaudi bali aleeyi mwiie. Bakona mu bisali alala ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Omukhulu wase Yoabu ne babemeelesi bowo, omwami bapile ekambi mundaa. Nyala nacha ndiena engo, nalia lundi nanywa, mala ngone no mukhasi wase? Nosiili omulamu ese ne chuba ndi se khoyeele nakhola ndio tawe!”
Khwako Daudi aaloma ali, “Yikhala ano endaalo yoosi ne kumutikhinyi nio khulekhe okoboleyo.” Nio Uria ekhala mu Yerusalemu endaalo ng'eneyo nende eloondakho.
Daudi alaanga Uria khu siakhulia sie ekolooba mala aamuliisia ne khumunywesia mala aamumeesia. Akhaba siilo esio Uria se acha engo tawe. Ne kakhali akona ne bakholi bo mwami munju niyo baliindilangamo.
Oli kumutikhinyi Daudi aandika ebarwa khu Yoabu akielesia Uria khumuyilila.
Mu barwa omwo aandika ali, “Ra Uria khu mbongi, abuundu niio khu khuupana khuli khutinyu, mala mwile enyuma mu mulekhe bamwire.”
Khwako nga Yoabu neerekekha khutiila lukoba, aruma Uria abuundu niio omusiku ali ne kamaani.
Banamae bo musiku barura enje we lukoba mala baapa banamae ba Yoabu. Balala khu bakholi ba Daudi berwa, akhaba Uria yesi.
Nio Yoabu aruma elomo khu Daudi aamuboolela nga liie ne lili.
Ne ekesia omurume ali, “Enyuma nomalile khuboolela omwami khuloondekhana ne liie,
mala obone ne aambwa lirima, lundi ne akhureeba ali, ‘Siina sikila ne mwacha khu khuupanila alukoba? Se mwamanya muli banyala bamulasila khu masiisi tawe?
Naanu owera Ebimeleki okhwa Yerubesieti? Se aba, omukhasi owamumwaatila lususi asi khukhwama khwisiisi mala amwiira nio afwila e Tebesi?’ Siina sikila ne mwacha siimbi ne lisiisi? Nio okhamukobosie oli, ‘Omukholi wowo Uria omuhiti yesi afwiile.’ ”
Nio omurumwa acha khu Daudi mala amuboolela koosi niko Yoabu amuboolela.
Omurumwa aboolela Daudi ali, “Basiku befwe baba ne kamaani khukhukhila efwe mala barura enje we lukoba khu khuupana nafwe asiangalaamwe. Ne kakhali khwabatimania khukhwola asilibwa sie lukoba.
Nio bakhulasa buembo khukhwamila khwisiisi. Ne balala khu bakholi bowo bafwiile, akhaba omukholi wowo Uria omuhiti yesi afwiile.”
Daudi aboolela omurumwa ali, “Boolela Yoabu oli ‘Kamakhuwa kano kakhakhunaania tawe. Sikila sonyala wamanya naanu onyala afwila mwiie tawe. Muboolele arakikhe liliibwaakala lie kamaani khu lukoba mala aluule.’ Muboolele kano mala omureemo kumwoyo.”
Nga Batisheba ne aulila ali omuseecha wewe afwiile, aamulila.
Nga biise bie kamasika ne biawa, Daudi arumania areerwe munju mwewe. Aaba omukhasi wewe mala amusaalila omwana owe sisoleeli. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se asangaalila niko Daudi akhola tawe.

Omuyiinda aba ne chikhaafu chingali ne bibiaayo.
Ne omutaambi aba ne limeeme lilala liong'ene nilio akula. Aliliinda, mala liakhulila mungo mwewe ne babaana bewe. Anyala abele aliliisia ne biakhulia biewe, linyweela mu sikoombe siewe, ne khulilela khu bikele biewe. Limeeme liaba nga omwana wewe owe siikhaana khu niye.
Endaalo ndala omukeni acha mungo mwo mundu omuiinda. Omuyiinda oyo se eenya khukhwira silala khu biaayo biewe khulwe khumukholela siakhulia tawe. Ne kakhali abukula limeeme lio mutaambi oyo mala eerera omukeni wewe”
Daudi aambila omuiinda oyo lirima likali mala aaloma ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, omundu owakhola lino akhoyela aafwa.
Khulwe khukhola sikholwa siibi nga esio, akhoyeele aruunge khukhwola khane sikila akhola lino ne akhali ne siisa tawe.”
Nasani aboolela Daudi ali, “Ewe niye omundu oyo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli aloma ali, ‘Nakhuchukhakho kamafura obe omwami owa Isiraeli mala nakhusikula khukhwama khu Saulo.
Nakhuelesia enju yewe ne bakhasi bewe. Nakhua enju eya Isiraeli ne Yuda. Abanga bino biaba bitiiti, nakhakhuelesie bibiindi khukhwola khabili.
Siina sikila ne olekelesia likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne okhola bumayaanu mumoni chewe? Werire Uria omuhiti khulwe khurumikhira Baamoni, mala wabukuule omukhasi wewe khuuba omukhasi wowo.
Khwako lifumo se lilirura munju yowo tawe, sikila se wandiire tawe lundi wabukuule mukha Uria omuhiti khuuba omukhasi wowo.
Nja khukhola mulala khu be lisaaye liowo liliene khu khureerera butinyu. Ocha khubona nga ne nja khubukula bakhasi bowo khukhwama khwiwe ne khubaelesia omundu okundi. Ne acha khukona nabo kumuusi para.
Ewe wakhola libi mu bwikisi, ne kakhali ese nja khukhola kano kekholekhe kumuusi para nio Baisiraeli boosi babone.’ ”
Daudi akobosia Nasani ali, “Nakholile bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nasani amukobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubeleele, se ocha khufwa tawe.
Ne sikila walekeleesie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukali mu khukhola kano, nono omwana wowo osaalwa acha khufwa.”
Nio Nasani aacha engo wewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola omwana niye Daudi asaala mu mukha Uria aba omulwale lukali.
Daudi asaba Wele ali omwana aone. Eyimana khulia buli siindu, ne buli siilo acha mu lusiro lwewe ne khukona asi.
Babemeelesi bewe bacha niio ali khumwinyosia ne kakhali aloba ne se aliaakho siakhulia siosi siosi ne nabo tawe.
Enyuma we chindaalo saba, omwana aafwa. Ne kakhali bakholi ba Daudi baria khumuboolela bali omwana afwiile. Baloma bali, “Omwana ne asiili omulamu khwalomalomenge khu Daudi ne kakhali se aakhukobosianga tawe. Khulamuboolela khurie khuli omwana afwiile? Akhola ario eumisia.”
Daudi nga ne abona bakholi nebalikho bamonyana, amanya busa ali omwana aafwiile. Nio aabareeba ali, “Omwana afwiile?” Bamukobosia bali, “Yee, afwiile.”
Daudi enyokha asi, esiinga mala eakha kamafura mala efwara chingubo chichiindi. Aacha asaaya munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nga akobola mu lukoba, asaba siakhulia bamuelesia mala aalia.
Bakholi bewe bamureeba bali, “Olakholanga siina sino? Omwana ne asiili omulamu, wamulila lundi weyimana khulia. Ne kakhali nga afwiile, ne winyokha olia.”
Daudi aakobosia ali, “Yee, neyimana khulia lundi namulila ne asiili omulamu. Nebaasia ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala aakholela ese siisa alekha omwana akhafwa tawe.
Ne luno aafwiile, siina sikila neyimane khulia? Nyala namulamusia aaba omulamu lundi? Endaalo ndala ndicha niio ali, ne niye se anyala aakobola niio ese ndi tawe.”
Nio Daudi aoleelesia omukhasi wewe Batisheba. Aaba naye, mala basaala omwana omusoleeli, niye Daudi alaanga ali Solomoni. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima omwana oyo,
mala aruma omung'oosi Nasani khutiuukha omwana lisina ali Yetita, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amusiima.
Yoabu abwenao achiililila khu khuupana ne lukoba lwa Raba, lwe Baamoni, mala aluaamba.
Yoabu aaruma barume khu Daudi ne aloma ali, “Napaane ne lukoba lwa Raba mala natiilile niio banyoolanga kameechi.
Nono buusia banamae bowo boosi, mala wibwaakale lukoba mala wamwene oluaambe. Ne busa kholandio naluaamba mala lwalaangilwa khwisina liase.”
Nio Daudi aabuusia banamae bewe boosi aacha e Raba, alwibwaakala ne khuluaamba.
Daudi aabukula ekuutwa yo mwami wabwe khukhwama khu murwe khwewe. Busiro bwe kutwa eye esahabu eyo bwaba chikilo kamakhumi kataru na chiraano, ne libaale lie bukusi bwe angaaki liaba mukari mwe kutwa eyo. Babukula mala bakifwara khumurwe kwa Daudi. Lundi aabukula bibiindu bikali bie bunuuli khukhwama mu lukoba olwo.
Ne ayingilila babaandu balwo khukhola kimilimo ne kimisumeno, chisuluulu ne chiaaywa che bichuuma. Abayingiilila khukhola bino bioosi ne khu khuupa kamatifari. Akhola ario akhaba khu baandu be chingoba chichiindi choosi cha Amoni. Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe bakobola e Yerusalemu.

Abusolomu okhwa Daudi aba no mukooko wewe bali Tamari owe lukoondo lulayi. Enyuma we siise, Amunoni, mulala khu ba okhwa Daudi, amusiima.
Amusiima lukali khukhwola nga elwasia sikila Tamari. Tamari aba owe yabwana nono bwaba buandalafu khu Amunoni khuuba naye.
Amunoni aba no musaale wewe bali Yonatabu okhwa Simea, wandaaye owa Daudi. Yonatabu aba omundu omukesikesi.
Yonatabu aboolela Amunoni ali, “Ewe oli omwana wo mwami, ne buli mutikhinyi oli omusulunyu. Makhuwa siina?”
Aamukobosia ali, “Nasiimile Tamari, omukooko owa wandaayase Abusolomu.”
Yonatabu aamuboolela ali, “Yikhola nga olwaala mala okone khu sitanda. Raraao ne eecha khu khubona, muboolele oli, ‘Nosiima boolela omukooko wase Tamari eche ambe siakhulia ndie. Lekha aakholele siakhulia niio enyala namubona, mala omwene ambelesie mala ndie khukhwama mu makhono kewe.’ ”
Nio Amunoni ekholesia nga oolwaala mala aakona khu sitanda. Omwami Daudi aacha khumubona. Amunoni amuboolela ali, “Nosiima lekha Tamari omukooko wase eche akholele kimikaati mikeekhe kiri ne ndoleleele, mala ndie khukhwama khu makhono kewe.”
Khwako Daudi aruma likhuwa khu Tamari ne aloma ali: “Cha munju eya Amunoni mala omukholele siakhulia.”
Nio Tamari acha munju mwa wandaaye Amunoni nimwo aba nakonile. Abukula bufu, abung'oona, mala amukholela kimikaati ne aloleleele.
Aabukula sifuria aamuchukhululila kimikaati alie, ne kakhali se akilia tawe. Aloma ali, “Oona babaandu boosi bache bandureo,” mala boosi bamururao bacha.
Nio Amunoni aboolela Tamari ali, “Reera kimikaati abulili ano mala ndie khukhwama khu makhono kowo.” Tamari abukula kimikaati mala acha nakio niio wandaaye Amunoni aaba.
Nga amuyilila alie, Amunoni amutiila mala amuboolela ali, “Yiicha okone ne nase mwana wefwe.”
Tamari amukobosia ali, “Tawe mwana wefwe. Okhambiingilila khukhola sisiindu sie chisoni nga sino siri tawe. Sisiindu nga sino siri se siekholekhanga mu Isiraeli tawe.
Ese nja khuyila waena chisoni chase? Ne ewe olaba mulala khu be biyiingwa mu Isiraeli. Nono khusaba, nosiima, boolela omwami. Ne ndi na ng'ali ndi anyala ambaana ese khwiwe.”
Ne kakhali Amunoni se amurekeeresia tawe. Khubeela aba ne kamaani khumukhila, amuyingiilila mala amukwakho.
Nio Amunoni amubiila lukali, mala amubiila khukhila nga aaba ne amusiima ekhunyoa. Mala Amunoni amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha oche.”
Tamari aamukobosia ali, “Tawe mwana wefwe. Khu khumboona nje khuli khuubi lukali khukhila niko ukholeele.” Ne Amunoni se amurekeeresia tawe.
Amunoni alaanga omukholi wewe mala amuboolela ali, “Yinyosia omukhasi yuno mu moni chase! Mumwaate enje mala okhomekhe lulwiki.”
Omukholi aamwaata Tamari enje mala akhomekha lulwiki. Tamari aba efwaranga engubo endeeyi eye kamakhono kamaleeyi. Engubo yino niyo bakhaana beyabwaana bo mwami befwaranga mu ndaalo ng'enecho.
Tamari echukhakakho likokhe khumurwe, etabula engubo niyo aaba ne afwarire, mala acha ne alila lukali ne eambile kamakhono khumurwe.
Nga wandaaye Abusolomu ne amubona, amureeba ali, “Wandaayo Amunoni abele nawe? Nosiima mukooko wase, okhabeelela lukali tawe. Ali wandaayo niye, khwako okhaboolelakho yesi yesi tawe.” Tamari aamenya munju mwa Abusolomu, mu busulunyu ne khukhweumba.
Omwami Daudi nga ne aulila sisiekholeekhe, aambwa lirima likali.
Ne kakhali Abusolomu se alomalomakho likhuwa liosi liosi khu Amunoni tawe. Abiila Amunoni lukali nga ne afwolobia omukooko wewe Tamari.
Enyuma we kimiiko kibili, Abusolomu aba nende baabeka kamakheese kewe e Baali-Hasori, ambi ne lukoba lwa Efuraimu. Alaanga babaana basoleeli bo mwami Daudi boosi.
Abusolomu aacha khu mwami Daudi mala aamuboolela ali, omwami ndikho nja khubeka kamakheese kase, nono khusaaya wiche ne bakholi bowo.
Ne kakhali omwami aamukobosia ali, “Tawe, mwana wase. Bucha khuba busiro bukali khwiwe khwaaba ne khucha fweesi.” Abusolomu amuyingilila ne omwami se afukiilila tawe, ne kakhali abiita Abusolomu chikhabi.
Ne Abusolomu aloma ali, “Waaba nokhacha ne nafwe tawe, lekha wandaayase Amunoni eche ache ne nafwe?” Omwami aamureeba ali, “Siina sikila ache nanywe?”
Ne kakhali Abusolomu anialilisia Daudi khukhwola nga afukiilila Amunoni ne babaana bewe babaandi basoleeli bacha ne Abusolomu.
Nio Abusolomu alaka bakholi bewe ali: “Ba na ng'ali muli Amunoni anywele endali engali, mala mumwiire, mukharia tawe. Ba ne kamaani lundi banyindaafu.”
Mala bakholi ba Abusolomu bakhola Amunoni nga Abusolomu ne ababoolela. Ba okhwa Daudi ba barama boosi baniina khu nyumbu chabwe mala belukha.
Ne basiili khwola engo tawe, burume bwolela Daudi buli, “Abusolomu eerire babaana bowo basoleeli boosi mbao oramire tawe!”
Omwami eema etabulaka chingubo mu bubeeleli, mala akona asi. Bakholi ba babao boosi betabula chingubo chabwe.
Ne kakhali Yonatabu, okhwa Simea wandaaye owa Daudi, aamuboolela ali, “Omwami, se beerire babaana bowo be sisoleeli boosi tawe. Amunoni yeng'ene niye ofwiile. Abusolomu arekekha kano khukhwama mu biise nibio Amunoni akwila khu mukooko wewe Tamari.
Nono okhasuubila chimboolelwa oli babaana bowo be sisoleeli boosi bafwiile tawe. Amunoni yeng'ene owiriirwe.”
Mu biise bienebio Abusolomu elukha. Ne asiiloma, omunamae owaba khu milimo abona sipupu sikali sie babaandu khu sikulu khu muyila kukwama Horonaimu.
Yonatabu aboolela Daudi ali, “Babecha abo bali babaana bowo be sisoleeli, nga ndomile.”
Nga ne amala khuloma busa ari, basoleeli ba Daudi baulukha. Nga ne boola boosi ne barakikha khulila. Daudi ne bakholi bewe boosi barakikha khulila lukali.
Ne kakhali Abusolomu elukha, mala aacha wa Talimai okhwa Amihudi omwami owa Keshuri. Daudi achiililila khulila omwana wewe khu ndaalo chingali.
Abusolomu elukha aacha Keshuri mala amenyayo kimiiko kitaru.
Ne kakhali omwami ne malile khuola khu lifwa lia Amunoni, Daudi arakikha khukhwikoomba omwana wewe Abusolomu.

Yoabu okhwa Seruya amanya ali omwami Daudi enya omwana wewe Abusolomu lukali.
Nio Yoabu aalaanga omukhasi omukesi owamenya e Tekoa. Nga ola, amuboolela ali, “Yikhola nga oli mu masika, mala wifware chingubo chowo che kamasika. Ne okheakhakho kamafura tawe. Yikhola khuuba nga omukhasi omenyile mu masika khulwe siise sileeyi.
Nio oche khu mwami mala omuboolele kamakhuwa niko khuboolela kano.” Ne Yoabu amuboolela niko aloma.
Omukhasi owa Tekoa oyo nga oola wo mwami, amwinamila bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi, khukhwekesia buriaani mala aaloma ali, “Omwami njeete!”
Omwami amureeba ali, “Butinyu bwowo buli siina?” Amukobosia ali, “Omwami, ese ndi namulekhwa. Omuseecha wase afwa.
Omwami, naba ne babaana base be siseecha babili. Endaalo ndala balomanila mundaa. Se abao yesi yesi owabakaya tawe, mala mulala apa owasie eera.
Ne luno, omwami, balebe base boosi bambiile. Baloma bali, ‘Reera omundu owerire wandaaye mala yesi eerwe nga niye ne eera wandaaye.’ Bacha khwonaka lilieyikina liase limaliilisi. Bacha khulekha omuseecha wase nakhali no mwana owe siseecha oliinda lisina liewe tawe.”
Nio omwami aboolela omukhasi oyo ali, “Kobola engo, nja khumanya butinyu bwowo.”
Nio omukhasi owa Tekoa oyo aloma ali, “Omwami, Bumayaanu bukhoya bwaaba khu samwene ne khu be nju eya paapa wase. Ne kakhali omwami, ewe ne bubwami bwowo mukhoya mwaba balekhuule khukhwama khu bumayaanu.”
Omwami aamuboolela ali, “Omundu yesi yesi nakhunaania mureere khwise, ne se acha khukhunaania lundi tawe.”
Omukhasi oyo aaloma ali, “Omwami, nosiima saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Nio omulebe wase ooli ne bunyali bwe khukhwiyacha akhera omwana wase okundi oyo tawe.” Daudi amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, sisiindu siosi siosi se sicha khwekholekhakho khu mwana wowo tawe.”
Omukhasi oyo aloma ali, “Nosiima omwami, lekha ndomekho likhuwa lilala liong'ene.” Aamukobosia ali, “Loma.”
Omukhasi oyo aamuboolela ali, “Siina sikila ne okholela babaandu ba Wele kamabi? Se wafukiilila omwana wowo omwene khukobola khukhwama mu mbaambe tawe! Khwako wekhalakiile kumusaango wamwene khuloondekhana nende niko wama khulomaloma.
Fweesi khuli bekhufwa. Khuli nga kameechi kachichukha asi, kakhabuusibwa lundi tawe. Aakhaba Wele se aukhanianga babaandu tawe. Ne kakhali ayiima chingila che khukobosia omundu khukhwama mu mbaambe.
Nono omwami, sifuno sikilile ne nicha khulomaloma ne nawe sili sino. Babaandu bandikhirisia mala nebaasia ndi nolomaloma ne nawe wakana ukholela nilio khureeba.
Nibaasiisie ndi onyala wandekeeresia mala wambonia khukhwama khuyo owenya khukhwira omwana wase ne nase mala akhurusie efwe khu sibala nisio Wele aelesia babaandu bewe.
Ne ndomile ndi endakaano yowo omwami, echa khuniinda ese. Sikila ewe, omwami oli nga malaika owa Wele, lundi onyala waukhasia bulayi ne bubi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo abe nawe!”
Omwami aboolela omukhasi oyo ali, “Ndikho enja khu khureeba lireeba, mala okhoyele umboolele bung'ali bwoosi.” Nio omukhasi oyo aloma ali, “Omwami, ndeebe siosi siosi.”
Omwami aamureeba ali, “Yoabu niye okhuboolele kano?” Amukobosia ali, “Omwami wase, nga nomenya, ng'ali mbao engila yosi yosi ekhiingilila khukobosia lireeba liowo tawe. Ng'ali omukholi wowo Yoabu niye owamboolela niko khola nende niko ndomaloma.
Ne akhola ario khulwe khukaluukhasia kaliio. Ne kakhali omwami ewe oli omukesi nga malaika owa Wele lundi omanyile buli siindu siili khu sibala.”
Enyuma wa kano, omwami aboolela Yoabu ali, “Nakhalake khukhola nilio wenya. Cha oreere omusoleeli Abusolomu.”
Yoabu enama asi ebweeni wa Daudi bubweeni bwetiila asi khukhwekesia buriaani mala aloma ali, “Luno namanyile ndi nakhusiimiisie, sikila wafukiiliile lireeba liase.”
Nio Yoabu enyokha acha e Keshuri mala akobosia Abusolomu e Yerusalemu.
Abwenao omwami arusia kamalaka ali Abusolomu se akhoyeele amenya mu lukoba tawe. Omwami aloma ali, “Se nenya mubonekho tawe,” khwako Abusolomu amenya munju yewe omwene mala se abonekhakho ebweeni wo mwami tawe.
Lundi se abao omundu mu Isiraeli owamanyikhana mu lukoondo lulayi nga Abusolomu tawe. Khukhwama khu siikhandakilo khukhwola khu murwe se abakho ne libi liosi liosi tawe.
Lichuune liewe liaba likali mala alibekanga lulala khu mwiiko ne lileyile lundi ne libeele liisiro. Ne alibekile liaba liola busiro bukhila chikiilo chibili khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie bubwami.
Abusolomu aba ne babaana basoleeli bataru no mukhaana mulala owalaangwa bali Tamari. Tamari aba ne lukoondo lulayi.
Abusolomu amenya mu Yerusalemu kimiiko kibili ne akhabonekhakho ebweeni wo mwami tawe.
Nio alaanga Yoabu amuyile wo mwami. Ne kakhali Yoabu se eecha tawe. Abusolomu aamulaanga lundi ne kakhali lundi Yoabu aloba khukhwicha.
Abusolomu aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Lola, kumukuunda kwa Yoabu kuloondekhana ne kukwase mala kulimo eshayiri. Cha mukwosie.” Khwako bakholi bacha mala boosia kumukuunda.
Yoabu acha owa Abusolomu mala amureeba ali, “Siina sikila bakholi bowo ne boosiisie kumukuunda kwase?”
Abusolomu amukobosia ali, “Sikila se wecha nga nakhulaanga tawe. Nenya oche wo mwami mala omuboolele oli Abusolomu areeba ali, ‘Siina sikila ne nalekha Keshuri mala necha ano? Liakhabeele lilayi ese khuchilila khumenya ebweeneyo.’ Nono ese nenya unjeete mbone omwami. Ne naba ne ndi ne bubi, lekha anjire.”
Khwako Yoabu aacha wo mwami mala amuboolela niko Abusolomu aloma. Omwami alaanga Abusolomu, mala Abusolomu aacha niio ali, enama bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi mu buriaani, omwami ekwayila Abusolomu.

Enyuma wako, Abusolomu aanyoola likaari ne chifarasi, ne babaandu nibo akeenda nabo kamakhumi karaano.
Abusolomu aba anyala enyokha makhelebeende aacha eema khu ngila a silibwa sie lukoba. Ne yesi yesi owechanga ne ali ne kumusaango ne eenya omwami amuyeete, Abusolomu yaba amulaangaanga mala amureeba niio ama ne kholo yewe. Omundu oyo yaba ne akobosia ali, “Naama mu kholo ndalakho eya Isiraeli,”
Abusolomu aba anyala aloma ali, “Lola, khukhwiloocha khwowo khuli khulayi khwa ng'ali. Ne kakhali, omwami se ali no mundu okhurekeeresia tawe.”
Abusolomu abeele anyala atasakho ali, “Nakhabeele omukhalaki mu sibala, omundu yesi yesi ooli ne kumusaango namwe khukhwiloocha akhechilenge khwise ne ese nakhamukholeele bung'ali bwewe.”
Yaba omundu ne eecha khukhwinamila Abusolomu, Abusolomu yaba anyala amutilakho kumukhono kwewe, ne khumwikwayila.
Abusolomu akholela ario buli Muisiraeli owechanga khu mwami khulwe bukhalaki. Lino liakila babaandu bamusiima.
Enyuma we kimiiko kine Abusolomu aboolela omwami Daudi ali, “Omwami, lekha nje e Heburoni khole niko ne chubila khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga namenyanga Keshuri mu Shamu, nasuubisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi, ‘Waaba ne ungobosia e Yerusalemu, khakhusaayile e Heburoni.’ ”
Omwami aamuboolela ali, “Cha ne kumuleembe.” Ne Abusolomu acha e Heburoni.
Ne Abusolomu aruma barume bewe mu bwikisi khu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli ne aloma ali, “Ne muulila chikhoombi, loma muli, ‘Abusolomu ali omwami mu Heburoni!’ ”
Abusolomu acha ne babaandu chimia chibili nibo alaanga khukhwama e Yerusalemu. Se bamanyakho nisio bachiilakho tawe.
Nga aba ne aana chimbosio, Abusolomu lundi arumania khulaanga Aitiofeli Omukiloni khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Kilo. Aitiofeli aba mulala khu bakeleki ba Daudi. Buchongani bwa Abusolomu khu Daudi bwanyoola kamaani, mala baloondi ba Abusolomu batasa khuuba bakali.
Omurume eecha aboolela Daudi ali, “Kimiooyo kie Baisiraeli kioosi kili khu Abusolomu.”
Nio Daudi aaboolela bakholi bewe boosi ba baaba mu Yerusalemu ali, “Lekha khwilukhe khangu. Ne busa khukhola khurio khwakhilwa khukhwilukha khukhwama khu Abusolomu! Khuche ne busa akhola ario oola ano khangu mala akhuula ne khukhwira buli mundu mu lukoba luno mala aakhukholela efwe kamabi!”
Bakholi bo mwami bamukobosia bali, “Yee, omwami. Khwerekeekhe khukhola buli nilio oloma.”
Khwako omwami aarura, alala nende be nju yewe boosi ne bakholi bewe. Ne kakhali aalekha bakhasi likhumi nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale, abalekha enyuma khuliinda enju.
Omwami ne babaandu bewe boosi barura mu lukoba, mala baolela khunju emaliilisi.
Bakholi bewe boosi baba ebweeni wewe, alala Bakeretaite, Bapeletite, ne ba Kitife chimia sita babamuloondakho khukhwama Katihi.
Nio omwami Daudi aboolela Itai, Omukiti ali, “Siina sikila ne olikho nocha nafwe fwesi? Kobolayo mala omenye no mwami Abusolomu. Ewe oli omukwa lundi omuaambe, khukhwama mu sibala siowo.
Wechile busa likoloba lino, siina sikila khukhole ewe oyiiyayiiye nafwe? Ne lundi se manya niio ndikho nja tawe. Kobolayo mala obukule babaana benywe mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhukholela siisa ne bubweyikinwa.”
Ne kakhali Itai akobosia omwami ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne amenyile mindali ne lundi nga wesi omenya, khamenye nawe khukhwola khufwa.”
Daudi aakobosia Itai ali, “Bulayi, khuche!” Khwako Itai aambukha alala ne babaandu bewe boosi ne babaana babwe boosi.
Babaandu boosi balila lukali nga baloondi ba Daudi ne barekukha. Omwami aambukha luluuchi lwa Kitironi alala ne, babaandu bewe mala baacha boola mu sichiimi.
Abiatari achayo nende omusaayi Satoki, alala ne Balawi boosi babasuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele. Balira asi mala se balisuta lundi tawe khukhwola nga babaandu boosi ne barura mu lukoba.
Nio omwami Daudi aboolela Satoki ali, “Kobosia mu lukoba Lisanduku lie Ndakaano. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne asiima, alingobosia ndibone mala mbone ne abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amenya.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne aloma ali, se namusiimisia tawe, lekha omwene aakholele nilio asiima.”
Ne omwami Daudi aboolela Satoki omusaayi ali, “Bukula omwana wowo Aimaasi ne Yonasani okhwa Abiatari mala mukobole mu lukoba ne kumuleembe.
Ese nja khuliindila niio luluuchi lukhalisilia mu sichiimi khukhwola nga nyoola elomo khukhwama khwinywe.”
Khwako Satoki ne Abiatari basuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano bakobosia e Yerusalemu mala barama ebweeneyo.
Daudi aaniina khu sikulu sia miseituni ne alila. Aba busa mu bikele lundi yaba ebiimbilile kumurwe kwewe mu bubeeleli. Boosi babamuloondakho bebimbiilila kimirwe kiabwe boosi ne balikho ne balila.
Nga ne baboolela Daudi bali Aitiofeli yesi aambaanile ne Abusolomu mu buchongani, Daudi aasaba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nosiima, kaluukhasia enganakani eya Aitiofeli khuuba eye busilu busa!”
Nga Daudi ne oola khu ngaaki khwe sikulu, abuundu niio basaayilanga Wele, omusaale wewe Hushai Omuakiti aamwakaanila ne ali mu ngubo chindabukhake ne liloba khu murwe kwewe.
Daudi aamuboolela ali, “Waaba nocha nase ocha khuba busiro khwise.
Ne kakhali, onyala wanjeeta khulwe khukobola mu lukoba ne khuboolela Abusolomu oli luno ocha khumukholela mu bwiyikinwa nga ne wakholelanga raraawe. Ne khaka nga nilwo onyala khuloba enganakani yosi niyo Aitiofeli aana.
Omusaayi Satoki ne Abiatari bali ebweeneyo. Baboolele siosi siosi nisio oulila khuloondekhana nenju yo mwami.
Bali ne babaana babwe basoleeli, Aimaasi okhwa Satoki nende Yonasani okhwa Abiatari, onyala wabaruma khwise ne lomo yosi yosi niyo onyoolile.”
Khwako Hushai, omusaale owa Daudi, aakobola mu lukoba Abusolomu ne alikho oola.

Omwami aamureeba ali, “Oreerire bino biasina?” Siiba aamukobosia ali, “Chipunda chili che babaandu be nju yo mwami khukeendelakho. Kimikaati ne kamatuunda ke siimiyu bili bie baele khulia, ne endali eli eyabo baluwa ne bali mu sichiimi banywe.”
Omwami Daudi amureeba ali, “Mefibosheti ali waena?” Siiba amukobosia ali, “Ali mu Yerusalemu. Sikila ali nang'ali ali luno Baisiraeli bacha khumukoboselia bubwami bwa kukaawe Saulo.”
Omwami aboolela Siiba ali, “Buli siindu sisiaba sia Mefibosheti luno sili sisiowo.” Siiba aamukobosia ali, “Ese khuria ewe. Njalaale omwami wase.”
Nga Daudi ne oola e Baurimu, mulala khu balebe ba Saulo, Simei okhwa Kera, arura aamwakaanila, mala achiililila khumulaama ne alikho eecha.
Simei aarakikha khuchukucha Daudi kamabaale ne babaandu bewe boosi. Ne Daudi aba akariirwe ne babaandu bewe bamuliinda.
Simei amulaama ne aloma ali, “Rekukha oche! Rekukha oche! Omwiiri! Owe sipoli!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akhuukuuma ewe khulwe sifuki sienju eya Saulo, niye wabukula bubwami. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aeleesie bubwami omwana wowo Abusolomu, ne ewe luno wabunile sikila oli omwiiri.”
Abisai okhwa Seruya, aboolela omwami Daudi ali, “Omwami, siina sikila ne olekha embwa efu yino ne ekhulaama? Ndekhe enje ebweeneyo mala murusiekho kumurwe kwewe!”
Ne kakhali omwami akobosia Abisai ali, “Ndi na siina nanywe, baana ba Seruya? Aaba ne andaama sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboleele khukhola ario, naanu ooli ne bunyali bwe khureeba sikila ne alikho akhola ario?”
Mala Daudi aboolela Abisai ne bakholi bewe boosi ali, “Kaaba bali omwana wase omwene eenya khu khunjira, aba Omubenjamini yuno se alakhola ario khukhilakhoo? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboleele khu khundaama, khwako mulekhe akhole niko akhola.
Wakana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabona butinyu bwase mala anduunge bulayi khulwe silaamo nisio ndikho nyoola luno.”
Khwako Daudi ne babaandu bewe bachiililila ne lukeendo lwabwe. Simei aroonga nabo, ne akeendela khu ndulo khwe sikulu. Abalaama ne abachukucha kamabaale ne khubataamusilia lipukhuulu ne akeenda.
Omwami ne babaandu bewe boosi boola e Yoritani ne baluile, mala baolela ebweeneyo.
Abusolomu ne Baisiraeli boosi bengila mu Yerusalemu, ne Aitiofeli yesi aba nabo.
Nga Hushai omuakiti, omusaale owa Daudi ne akaanana ne Abusolomu, aloma ali, “Omwami oyindile! Omwami oyindile!”
Abusolomu amureeba ali, “Buno nibwo buriaani bwowo khu musaale wowo Daudi? Siina sikila ne okhachiile ne naye?”
Hushai akobosia Abusolomu ali, “Ese ndi lubeka lwoyo owaroborwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne Baisiraeli boosi. Omwenoyo niye ndaba naye lundi niye ndamenya naye.
Ne lundi, ndakholela naanu, ne akhali omwana owo mwami wase? Nga ne nakholela raraao, nio nja khu khukholela ewe.”
Nio Abusolomu aaboolela Aitiofeli ali, “Ewe khukelekele, khukhola siina?”
Aitiofeli amukobosia ali, “Cha okone ne bakhasi ba raraao nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale, nibo alekha khuliinda lichipi lio mwami. Nio buli Omuisiraeli acha khumanya ali ewe wabeele omusiku owa raraao. Ne baloondi bowo bacha khuba ne kamaani.”
Nio bombakhila Abusolomu liiema khu ngaaki khwenju, niio buli mundu abona mala Abusolomu engilamo ne khukona ne bakhasi nibo raraawe aamenyia busa nga basaale.
Buli likeleka nilio Aitiofeli aboolanga mu ndaalo echo liafukiililwangwa nga elomo eya Wele, Daudi ne Abusolomu boombi baloondangakho.

Khutasa khwako, Aitiofeli aboolela Abusolomu ali, “Lekha ndobore babaandu chielefu likhumi na chibili mala siilo sino ndaloonda khu Daudi.
Ndamwibwaakala naluile lundi nafwiile kumwoyo. Nja khumuriikhirisia, mala babaandu bewe boosi bacha khwilukha. Nja khwiira omwami Daudi yeng'ene.
Ne ndakhukoboselia babaandu boosi, nga omwea ne acha engo wo museecha wewe. Yiima khukhwira omundu mulala yeng'ene, ne babaandu boosi bacha khuba ne kumuleembe.”
Likaambila lino liasiimisia Abusolomu ne basaakhulu ba Isiraeli boosi.
Abusolomu aaloma ali, “Nono laanga Hushai omuariki khuulile nilio aloma.”
Nga Hushai ne eecha khu Abusolomu, Abusolomu aamuboolela niko Aitiofeli amuboolela. Nio areeba Hushai ali, “Khunyala khwaliloonda? Ne khukhanyala tawe, khuboolele nilio khukhola.”
Hushai akobosia Abusolomu ali, “Likaambila nilio Aitiofeli amukambiile mu siise sino se lili lilayi tawe.
Khutasa khwako omanyile oli raraao ne babaandu bewe bali bakhupani be kamaani lundi be lirima nga lie ling'u likhasi nilio banuulile babaana balio. Raraao ali omanyile liie bulayi ne se anyala afukiilila banamae bewe bakona siilo tawe.
Siise sino ekisile mwibina namwe abuundu aandi. Nga Daudi ne alanyoa khukhwibwaakala babaandu bowo, yesi yesi olaulila alaloma ali ‘Babaandu ba Abusolomu beriirwe.’
Nio akhaba omundu ooli omunyindaafu, yesi yesi ooli ne kumwoyo nga kwe talang'i, acha khuria. Buli mundu mu Isiraeli amanyile ali raraao ali omukhupani owe kamaani lundi banamae bewe bali banyindaafu.
Likaambila liase lili liri, ‘Buusia Baisiraeli boosi alala khukhwama khu Dani khukhwola Beerisheba, bakali nga kumuyekhe. Nio wamwene oche mwiie.
Khulanyoola Daudi osi osi niio ali, mala khumwibwaakale nga kamame ne kakwa khwiloba. Mbao omundu akhaba mulala oocha khuona tawe, akhaba Daudi omwene.
Kaaba bali elukhila mu lukoba, Baisiraeli boosi bacha khureera kimikoye mala bakhwese lukoba luweele mumaayo. Mbao khabaale khacha khuramao tawe.’ ”
Abusolomu ne Baisiraeli boosi baloma bali, “Likaambila lia Hushai omuakiti lili lilayi khukhila lia Aitiofeli.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba aabisiisie ali likaambila lilayi lia Aitiofeli lilekhe khufukiililwa tawe, nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areerere Abusolomu butinyu.
Nio Hushai aboolela basaayi Satoki ne Abiatari likaambila nilio aboolela Abusolomu ne basaakhulu Baisiraeli, lundi ne likaambila nilio Aitiofeli abaelesia.
Hushai atasakho ali, “Nono, rumania khangu burume khu Daudi mumuboolele akhakona siilo sia luno alifubukho niio bambukhilanga luluuchi mu sichiimi tawe. Aambukhe nio niye ne babaandu bewe balekhe khutiilwa ne khukhwirwa tawe.”
Nono Yonasani okhwa Abiatari ne Aimaasi okhwa Satoki baba balindiliile a kheechi kha Enirokeli. Omukholi owe siikhasi abayililanga burume ne bacha khuboolela Daudi, sikila se benyekha babonekhane ne bengila mu lukoba tawe.
Ne kakhali omusoleeli mulala ababona, mala aboolela Abusolomu. Nga babona bario, belukha khangu bekisa munju eyo mundu okundi mu Baurimu. Omundu oyo aba ne sebele mungo mwewe Yonasani ne Aimaasi bengilamo.
Omukhasi wo mundu oyo abukula sifuunikho aasira khu ngaaki khwe sebele mala asalanisiakho bumiicho, mala omundu yesi yesi se amanyakho tawe.
Bakholi ba Abusolomu nga becha munju, bareeba omukhasi oyo bali, “Aimaasi ne Yonasani bali waena?”
Omukhasi oyo aabakobosia ali, “Bambukhe luluuchi.” Ne nga babaandu abo babayima mala khubanyoola tawe, bakobola Yerusalemu.
Oli bamala khurekukha, Aimaasi ne Yonasani barura mu sebele mala bacha baboolela omwami Daudi bali, “Khola khangu wambukhe luluuchi.” Bamuboolela niko Aitiofeli aba ne alomile.
Khwako Daudi ne babaandu bewe boosi barakikha khukhwambukha Yoritani. Nga bwasia boosi baba bamalile khukhwambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Aitiofeli nga abona ali Baisiraeli se baloondile likaambila liewe tawe, aniina epunda yewe mala aakobola mu lukoba lwewe. Enyuma we khuaana kamalaka kewe kamamaliilisi khu be nju yewe, esuunga mala afwa. Asiikhwa mu ng'ani eya raraawe.
Siise nisio Daudi olela mu lukoba lwa Mahanaimu Abusolomu ne Baisiraeli boosi baba bambukhe luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Nono Abusolomu aba ara Amasa khu milimo kie khukhwimeelela banamae mu bweyaangu bwa Yoabu. Amasa aba okhwa Yitira Omuishimaeli, Yitira aba no mukhasi bali Abikali, omukhaana owa Nahasi. Abikali omukooko owa Seruya maawe owa Yoabu.
Abusolomu ne Baisiraeli baapa ekambi mu sibala sia Kileati.
Daudi nga ne oola e Mahanaimu, akaanilwa ne Siobi okhwa Nahasi, khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Raba lwe Baamoni. Lundi akaanana ne Makiri okhwa Amieli khukhwama Lotebari, ne Barisilai omukileati khukhwama Rokelimu.
Babaandu bataru bano bareera bitaanda, bibuumba ne chinyuungu. Lundi bareera engaanu, eshayiri, bufu, biakhulia bibioosie, kamakaanda ne chibalaayo.
Lundi bareera bubuukhi, esiaki, liboonda ne kamakheese. Bamanya bali Daudi ne babaandu bewe baba ne njala ne bulesia, lundi baluwa ne bali mu sichiimi. Nio babareerera biakhulia balie.

Omwami Daudi abuusia alala babaandu bewe, mala abakaba mu bipupu bie emia ndala ne bie eelefu, mala abaelesia babemeelesi babwe.
Nio Daudi abaruma mu bipupu bie banamae bitaru: Sipupu silala asi owa Yoabu, sisiindi asi owa Abisai okhwa Seruya wandaaye owa Yoabu ne sisiindi asi owa Itai omukiti. Omwami Daudi aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Ese samwene ndacha ne nanywe.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Ewe sokhoyeele wacha ne nafwe tawe. Kaaba bali efwe khwilukha mbao olakhweendekhelela efwe tawe. Akhaba babaandu enusu mwifwe khwakherwa, mbao okhweendekhelela tawe. Ne kakhali ewe oli ne bukhala khukhila efwe eelefu ndala. Bwakhabeele bulayi abanga wikhala mu lukoba muno mala okhurumire buyeeti.”
Omwami aabakobosia ali, “Nja khukhola liosi liosi nilio mwibaasia muli lili lilayi.” Nio omwami eema andulo we silibwa banamae bewe ne barura ne bali mu bipupu bie elefu ndala ne chimia.
Omwami Daudi aana kamalaka khu Yoabu, Abisai ne Itai ali: “Khulwase, mukhaumisiakho omusoleeli Abusolomu tawe.” Mala babaandu boosi baulila Daudi ne arusia lilaka lino khu bemeelesi be kamae bewe boosi khuloondekhana ne Abusolomu.
Nio banamae ba Daudi barura bacha bapana ne banamae Baisiraeli mu musiru kwa Efuraimu.
Banamae Baisiraeli baulilwa ebweeneyo ne banamae ba Daudi. Endaalo eyo babaandu berwa baboola chielefu kamakhumi kabili.
Khu khuupana khwamalatana khu sibala sioosi, mala babaandu bakali bafwila mu musiru khukhila babeererwa mwiie.
Abusolomu aatundubikhana ne babaandu ba Daudi. Abusolomu aba alikho atimia enyumbu, ne nga ne yabirira asi we kumurongooro kumuboofu kwe kumukhoonge, kumurwe kwa Abusolomu kwaambwa mu sakia. Enyumbu yatima mala Abusolomu arama ne alikho asungwacha mu sakia.
Mulala khu baandu ba Daudi aamubona mala aboolela Yoabu ali, “Omwami, mboone Abusolomu ne alikho asungwachila khu mukhoonge!”
Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Waaba nomuboone, siina sikila nokhamwirireo? Ese nakhasangaalile ne khukhuelesia chirupia likhumi ne kumusiipi kwo omunamae.”
Ne omundu oyo amukobosia ali, “Wakhamba abele chirupia elefu ndala, abele se nyala nasuta akhaba lulwala lwase lwong'ene naara khu mwana wo mwami tawe. Fweesi khwaulila nga omwami ne akhulaka ewe ne Abisai ne Itai ali, ‘Khulwase mukhaumisiakho omusoleeli Abusolomu tawe.’
Ne abanga se nariire omwami tawe mala neera Abusolomu, mala omwami aulile koosi, ewe se wakhanyalile khu khungaya tawe.”
Yoabu aloma ali, “Se nja khumala biise bikali ne nawe tawe.” Aabukula kamafumo kataru mala aunakila Abusolomu mu sifuba ne asiili omulamu, khu mukhoonge.
Nio banamae ekhumi babasutilanga Yoabu bulwaani babotookhelela Abusolomu bamupa mala bamwiira.
Yoabu aapa ekhoombi khukaania banamae balekhe khutimania Baisiraeli.
Babukula kumubili kwa Abusolomu bakumwaata mwiloo lileeyi mu sichiimi, mala bakuraakho kamabaale kamakali. Baisiraeli boosi belukha, buli mundu acha engo wewe.
Abusolomu ne asiili omulamu aba asimikha enjeko mwitooma mwo mwami, sikila se aba no mwana omusoleeli olangilwa khu lisina liewe tawe. Khwako elaangila khu mwene. Khukhwola endaalo yino, emanyikhaane nga Enjeko eya Abusolomu.
Nio Aimaasi okhwa Satoki aboolela Yoabu ali, “Lekha ese ndime nje mboolele omwami elomo endayi ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuonisie khukhwama khu maani ke basiku bewe.”
Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Okhayila elomo endayi luno tawe. Onyala wakhola orio mu ndaalo ekiindi. Ne kakhali luno omwana wo mwami afwiile.”
Nio Yoabu aboolela omukushi ali, “Cha oboolele omwami niko oboone.” Omukushi enama ebweeni wa Yoabu mu buriaani mala atima acha.
Aimaasi okhwa Satoki lundi aboolela Yoabu ali, “Kakhaba karie ndekhe sesi nonde khu mu Kushi.” Yoabu amureeba ali, “Sikila siina ne wenya khukhola orio, mwana wase? Socha khunyoolakho kumuruuru khu kano tawe.”
Aimaasi amukobosia ali, “Kakhaba karie, ndatima.” Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Nono tima.” Nio Aimaasi atima ekha khu muyila abirira mwitooma lia Yoritani, mala abira omukushi.
Daudi aba ekhaale akari we bilibwa bie lukoba. Omuliindi aniinila khwisiisi mala eema khungaaki khwe silibwa. Alola mala abona omundu alikho atima yeng'ene.
Omuliindi alanga mala aboolela omwami. Omwami aloma ali, “Aaba nali yeng'ene aba alikho areera elomo endayi.” Ne omundu oyo achiililila khukhwimbiya lukoba.
Lundi omuliindi abona omundu okundi alikho atima yeng'ene, alanga omuliindi owe silibwa mala amuboolela ali, “Lola! Omundu okundi alikho atima yeng'ene!”
Omwami amukobosia ali, “Yuno yesi alikho areera elomo endayi.”
Omuliindi aloma ali, “Nibaasia ndi omundu oli ebweeni atima nga Aimaasi okhwa Satoki.” Omwami akobosia ali, “Aimaasi ali omundu omulayi, lundi alikho areera elomo endayi.”
Aimaasi aboolela omwami ali, “Buli siindu sili silayi busa.” Enama ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubweeni bwetiila asi mu buriaani mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo afume, akhuuliile babaandu babakhukaluukhanakho, omwami.”
Omwami amureeba ali, “Omusoleeli Abusolomu omulamu?” Aimaasi akobosia ali, “Omwami, nga omukholi wowo Yoabu ne anduma, naulila luyoka lukali, ne kakhali se namanya lwaba siina tawe.”
Omwami amuboolela ali, “Cha wime ao,” mala acha emao.
Nio omurumwa omukushi ola mala aboolela omwami ali, “Omwami ndi ne lomo endayi khwiwe! Luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuuliile abo ba baaba ne bakhwaukhakho boosi!”
Omwami areeba Omukushi ali, “Omusoleeli Abusolomu omulamu?”
Omukushi amukobosia ali, “Omwami, basiku bowo boosi ne babaandu bakhwaukhakho boosi bakhoya babe nga omusoleeli oyo.”
Omwami esiindukha. Acha mu lusiro lubeka lwe silibwa mala alila. Acha ne alila ali, “Mwana wase! Mwana wase Abusolomu! Abusolomu mwana wase! Ese owakhafwiile mu bweyaangu bwowo, mwana wase! Abusolomu, mwana wase! Mwana wase!”

Yoabu aboolelwa ali omwami Daudi alikho alila ne khusooma sikila Abusolomu.
Ne khwako busangaafu bwe khuula bwekela kamasika khu baandu boosi endaalo ng'eneyo. Sikila babaandu baulila bali, Omwami abeleele sikila lifwa lio mwana wewe.
Babaandu bakobola mu lukoba ne basilile busa endaalo eyo nga banamae baali ne chisoni ne belukha liie.
Omwami efuuma kamakhono kewe mumoni mala alila lukali ne aloma ali, “Mwana wase! Mwana wase Abusolomu! Abusolomu, mwana wase!”
Yoabu aacha munju yo mwami mala aamuboolela ali, “Endaalo yino wamalile khuaambia bakholi bowo boosi chisoni. Waambiisie chisoni babaandu baoniisie bulamu bwowo ne bulamu bwe babaana bowo, basoleeli ne bakhaana nende bwe bakhasi bowo ne bakhasi bowo nibo wamenyia busa nga basaale.
Wabiile abo ba bakhusiima mala wasiimile abo ba bakhubiila! Wekesie busa abuwaanga luno oli banamae ne bakholi bowo se bali sisiindu khwiwe tawe. Nibaasia ndi wakhasangaalile abanga Abusolomu ali omulamu luno ne efwe fweesi bafu.
Khwako yinyokha orure oche luno mala olomalome khu bakholi bowo bulayi. Nichuba mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi waaba ne olekha, mbao akhaba mulala ocha khurama nawe siilo sia luno tawe. Ne obwo bulaba bubi bukali khwiwe khukhila bubi bwoosi bubwakhwichakho khukhwama khale khukhwola luno.”
Nio Omwami enyokha, mala acha ekhala asilibwa sie lukoba. Babaandu boosi baulila bali ali ebweeneyo, mala boosi bacha niio aba. Baisiraeli boosi baba beluukhe bachiile buli mundu engo wewe.
Baisiraeli barakikha khuyiingana babeene khu beene mu sibala sioosi bali, “omwami Daudi aakhuonia khukhwama khu basiku befwe. Aakhuonia khukhwama khu Bafilisiti, ne luno elukhe khukhwama mu sibala sikila Abusolomu.
Khwachukha kamafura khu Abusolomu khuuba omwami wefwe, ne kakhali luno bamwirire mwiie. Khwako siina sikila ne mukhalolakho khukobosia omwami Daudi?”
Daudi aaruma basaayi Satoki ne Abiatari khureeba babemeelesi ba Yuda ali, “Siina sikila enywe ne muba bamaliilisi mu khuyeeta khukobosia omwami mu lukoba kaaba bali niko Baisiraeli balomile koosi koleele omwami?
Enywe muli balebe base babene lundi kamafuki malala, siina sikila ne muba bamaliilisi khu khungobosia?”
Lundi Daudi aboolela Amasa ali, “Ewe oli omulebe wase lundi kamafuki malala, khukhwama luno nakhukholile ewe khuuba komanda owe banamae mu bweyaangu bwa Yoabu. Wele akhoya ambe kumunaanio naaba ne khakhola ndio tawe!”
Chilomo cha Daudi chasiimisia babaandu ba Yuda boosi baaba siindu silala. Nio baruma elomo khu mwami bali akoboleyo ne bakholi bewe boosi.
Nio omwami aakobola khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Yoritani. Bayaudi becha e Kilikali khu mwakaanila ne khumwambusia luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Abwenao Simei okhwa Kera Omubenjamini khukhwama Baurimu akeendelesia khangu ne Bayaudi oola khu luuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwakaanila omwami Daudi.
Aba ne babaandu eelefu ndala khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini. Ne Siiba, omukholi owe enju eya Saulo, yesi eecha ne babaana bewe basoleeli ekhumi na baraano ne bakholi bewe kamakhumi kabili. Bakeendelesia boola e Yoritani ebweeni wo mwami.
Baroongia babaandu bo mwami babaambusia luluuchi ne khukhola nilio omwami eenya.
Omwami nga aba siimbi khukhwambukha, Simei aasikama ebweeni wewe mu buriaani.
Mala aaloma ali, “Omwami nosiima, mbeele bubi nibwo nakhola endaalo niyo warurira e Yerusalemu. Okhasinyikhila namwe okhanjibaasiliakho kamabi lundi tawe.
Omwami, manyile ndi nakhola bubwoni. Lino nilio likila ne mba owe khunyoa khukhwama mu kholo eya Yosefu khukhwicha khukhwakaanila luno omwami.”
Abisai okhwa Seruya aloma ali: “Simei akhoya eerwa sikila alaama niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi achukhakho kamafura khuba omwami.”
Ne Daudi aboolela Abisai ne wandaaye Yoabu ali, “Baana ba Seruya, ndi nasiina nanywe? Siina sikila ne muba basiku base? Luno ese niye omwami owa Isiraeli, ne mbao luno Omuisiraeli ocha khwirwa tawe.”
Nio omwami echubila Simei ali, “Se ocha khwirwa tawe.” Nio omwami echubila Simei ali se ocha khwirwa tawe.
Mefibosheti nga ne oola e Yerusalemu khukhwakaanila omwami, omwami aamureeba ali, “Siina sikila, ne okhacha nase tawe?”
Amukobosia ali, “Omwami, omanyile oli ese ndi omuleme. Naboolela omukholi wase Siiba andekekhere epunda yase nio njiile alala ne nawe, ne kakhali ambea.
Aalomaloma bubeeyi khuloondekhana nase khwiwe omwami wase, ne kakhali ewe oli nga malaika owa Wele, khwako khola nilio olola oli lili lilayi khwiwe.
Lisaaye lia paapa liosi liakhoyela khukhwirwa nawe omwami. Ne kakhali ewe wambelesia bunyali bwe khulia khu sialwa ne nawe. Se ndikho ne bung'ali khukhwenya buyeeti bubuundi khukhwama khwiwe tawe mwami.”
Omwami aamukobosia ali, “Se okhoyele waloma kamakali tawe. Nafukiiliile ndi ewe ne Siiba mucha khukabana kamaloba.”
Mefibosheti aboolela omwami ali, “Lekha Siiba abukule bioosi. Ese nanyalikhe nga omwami nokobole engo bulayi.”
Barisilai aba omusaakhulu lukali. Aba owe bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane. Aba omuiinda lukali lundi niye owarumiranga omwami biakhulia nasimenya e Mahanaimu.
Omwami aboolela Barisilai ali, “Khuche fwembi e Yerusalemu, mala nja khu khuliinda.”
Ne Barisilai akobosia omwami ali, “Se ndamenya kimiiko kimikali tawe, siina sikila enje ne nawe e Yerusalemu omwami?
Ese nosiisie bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane. Se naukhasia siibi ne silayi tawe. Se nyala nachanjama ne khukhwaukhasia nisio ndia namwe enywa tawe. Lundi se nyala naulila kimienya kie babeembi tawe. Nja khuba busa butinyu khwiwe omwami.
Ese se khoyelwa kumuruuru kumukali nga kumwene okwo tawe. Khwako ndambukhakho busa nawe Yoritani.
Lekha engobole engo mala fwiile mu lukoba lwase, a siliindwa sia paapa ne maayi. Omwana wase omusoleeli Kimuhamu ali ano. Cha ne naye omwami mala mukholele likhusiimisia.”
Omwami aamukobosia ali, “Ese ndamubukula mala mukholele nilio wenya. Ne ese ndakhukholela siosi siosi nisio wekoomba.”
Nio Daudi ne babaandu bewe boosi bambukha Yoritani. Ekwayila Barisilai ne khumubiita chikhabi, mala Barisilai aakobola engo.
Nga omwami ne amala khukhwambukha, arongesebwa ne babaandu ba Yuda boosi ne balala khu baandu ba Isiraeli, aacha e Kilikali, mala bacha ne Kimuhamu.
Nio Baisiraeli boosi bacha khu mwami mala bamureeba bali, “Omwami, siina sikila bawandaayefwe babaandu ba Yuda, ne bakhwibile ewe alala nende be nju yowo ne babaandu bowo mala bamwambusia Yoritani?”
Babaandu ba Yuda bakobosia bali, “Efwe khwakhola khurio sikila Omwami ali owe kamafuki kefwe. Nono siina sikila lino ne limuchuunia enywe kimiooyo? Omwami se akhukuliilekho biakhulia namwe aakhuelesiakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.”
Baisiraeli bakobosia ba Yuda bali, “Efwe khuli ne bung'ali khukhwola likhumi bwe khukhwenya omwami, akhaba mu Daudi khuli ne bung'ali khumukhilakho enywe, akhaba ne ali owenywe. Siina sikila ne mukhulekeelesia? Mukhebilila muli niifwe khukhwanyoa khulomaloma khu likhuwa lie khukobosia Omwami tawe.”
Ne kakhali babaandu ba Yuda baba barafu mu likobosia liabwe khukhila babaandu ba Isiraeli.

Khwako Baisiraeli balekha Daudi mala bacha ne Sheba okhwa Bakiri. Ne babaandu ba Yuda nabo baloonda khu mwami wabwe Daudi mu busuubilifu khukhwama Yoritani khukhwola e Yerusalemu.
Omwami aboolela Amasa ali, “Laanga babaandu ba Yuda boosi beche mu ndaalo chitaru, mala wesi okobole nabo.”
Amasa acha khulaanga babaandu ba Yuda, ne se akobola mu siise nisio omwami amulakilamo tawe.
Daudi aboolela Abisai ali, “Sheba okhwa Bikiri acha khukhuelesia butinyu bukali khukhila Abusolomu. Bukula babaandu base mala omuloondekho. Akhola ario engila mu ngoba chisire mala aakhureerera butinyu.”
Khwako babaandu ba Yoabu, ne Kereti, ne Bapeleti, alala ne banamae babaandi be kamaani barura e Yerusalemu ne batima ne baloonda khu Sheba okhwa Bikiri.
Nga ne boola khu libaale liboofu lie Kibeoni, Amasa eecha khubakaanila. Yoabu aba efwarire chingubo che liie. Aba areere embalu mu sibaabi siayo aakichwisiilie khu musiipi kwe mu sibuno. Nga ne aba ne alikho acha, embalu yakwa asi.
Yoabu aboolela Amasa ali, “Oriena, wandaayase?” Mala atiila bunwanwa bwa Amasa ne kumukhono kumuseecha nio amwikwayila.
Amasa se abonakho embalu niyo Yoabu aba ne atiilile mu mukhono kwewe kukuundi tawe. Ne Yoabu amuuna enda mala bie munda biachichukha asi. Amasa afwilao, ne Yoabu se amuuna lundi tawe. Nio Yoabu ne wandaaye Abisai baloonda khu Sheba.
Mulala khu baandu ba Yoabu eema amubili kwa Amasa mala aloma ali, “Buli yesi yesi ooli owa Yoabu ne Daudi aloonde Yoabu.”
Kumubili kwa Amasa kwakona mu mafuki akari we kumuyila. Ne buli mundu owolangao nabona kumubili okwo eemanga. Khwako mulala khu baandu ba Yoabu oyo akukhuruura akurusia khu muyila akuyila mu ndaa mala akubiimbakho engubo.
Enyuma we khurusia kumubili khu muyila, buli mundu acha ne Yoabu mu khuloonda khu Sheba okhwa Bikiri.
Sheba abirira mu kholo cha Isiraeli choosi ne oola khu lukoba lwa Abeli-beti-maaka. Mala babaandu boosi be kholo eya Bikiri babusiana mala bamuloondakho khukhwola mu lukoba.
Babaandu ba baba ne Yoabu bacha mala babotookhelesia lukoba lwa Betimaka. Bombakha liita lie liloba enje we lisiisi mala bayaba lisiisi asi khulikhola likwe.
Abayo omukhasi omukesi mu lukoba owalangila khwisiisi ali, “Rekeeresia, Rekeeresia! Boolela Yoabu eeche ano, nenya ndomalome naye.”
Yoabu acha mala omukhasi oyo aamureeba ali, “Ewe niwe Yoabu?”
Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Yee, niise.” Aamuboolela ali, “Rekeeresia elomo eyo mukholi wowo” Yoabu akobosia ali, “Narekereesie.”
Omukhasi oyo aloma ali, “Khale balomanga bali, ‘Cha onyoole bukeleki mu lukoba lwa Abeli’ mala bakholanga bario khumala butinyu bwabwe.
Ese ndi mulala khu be kumuleembe ne basuubilwa mu Isiraeli. Siina sikila ewe ne wenya khulwonaka? Ewe wenya khubunia kumukabwa kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Yoabu aamukobosia ali, “Se kali kario tawe! Ese se ndibunia namwe nonake lukoba lwenywe tawe.
Obwo se buli bung'ali tawe. Ne kakhali omundu mulala olaangwa Sheba okhwa Bikiri, khukhwama mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu, akalukhaane khu mwami Daudi. Aana omundu yuno yeng'ene ne ese ninyokha mu lukoba.” Omukhasi oyo aamukobosia ali, “khucha khumumwaatila kumurwe kwewe khu ngaaki khwe lisiisi.”
Nio omukhasi oyo acha ne nganakani eye bukesi niio babaandu be mu lukoba bali. Bakhalaka kumurwe kwa Sheba okhwa Bikiri bakumwaatila Yoabu khwisiisi khu ngaaki. Aapa ekhoombi emanyisia babaandu bewe barure mu lukoba, mala bacha engo. Ne Yoabu akobola e Yerusalemu wo mwami.
Yoabu aba omwimeelesi owe kamae ka Isiraeli koosi. Benaya okhwa Yeoyata aba omwimeelesi owe Bakereti ne Bapeleti.
Adoramu aba omwimeelesi owe kimilimo kie buyingiilifu, Yehoshafati okhwa Ahiludi, aba omuandiki.
Shefa aba omuandiki we koti, Satoki ne Abiatari baba basaayi.
Ne Ira khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Yairi yesi aba mulala khu basaayi ba Daudi.

Mu bwami bwa Daudi enjala yabao engali khulwe kimiiko kitaru. Khwako Daudi aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Saulo ne lisaaye liewe bali ne sifuki. Beera babaandu ba Kibeoni.”
Omwami alaanga Bakibeoni (Babaandu ba Kibeoni se baba Baisiraeli tawe, baba Baamori ba barama. Akhaba Baisiraeli ne bechuba khubaliinda Saulo ayiima khubabunia, sikila aba ne sinani sie khuyeeta Baisiraeli ne babaandu Ba Yuda.)
Khwako Daudi alaanga babaandu ba Kibeoni mala abareeba ali, “Mbakholela siina? Nduunga ndie kamabi niko mwakholelwa, nio mubiite chikhabi babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Bakibeoni bakobosia bali, “Se khwenya Saulo ne lisaaye liewe bakhuelesie efwesa namwe esahabu tawe. Ne se khuli ne bunyali bwe khukhwira omundu yesi yesi mu Isiraeli tawe.” Daudi abareeba ali, “Nono siina nisio mwibaasia muli nyala namukholela?”
Bakobosia omwami bali, “Saulo enya khu khubunia efwe lundi se eenya khulekhakho mulala khwifwe amenye osi osi mu Isiraeli tawe.
Khuelesie babaana bewe saba khu baana bewe basoleeli mala khubasuunge ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Kibeoni khu sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Omwami Daudi abakobosia ali, “Ese nja khumuelesia.”
Ne kakhali omwami, abukula Arumoni ne Mefibosheti, babaana basoleeli babili nibo Risipa omukhaana owa Aya asaala khu Saulo. Lundi abukula babaana baraano basoleeli ba Merabu omukhaana owa Saulo, nibo asaala khu Aturieli, okhwa Barisilai, khukhwama Meholati.
Daudi abaana khu Bakibeoni. Babasuungila khu sikulu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala boosi nga ne baba saba bafwila khulala. Beerwa mu ndaalo che khunyoa che likesa lie shayiri.
Nio Risipa, omukhaana owa Aya, efwara likunia mala aaba khu lwanda niio bafu baba. Amenyakho khukhwama nga likesa ne liarakikha khukhwola nga efula ne yakwa. Kumuusi aonanga chinyuni khu bafu, siilo akhiingililanga chisaang'i ne chisolo che mundaa.
Daudi aulila niko Risipa omwana owa Aya akhola. (Aya aaba mulala khu bakhasi nibo Saulo aamenyia nga basaale.)
Nio Daudi acha abukula kamakuumba ka Saulo no mwana wewe Yonasani khukhwama khu baandu ba Yabesi-Kileati. (Bafilisiti beerera Saulo ne Yonasani khu sikulu sia Kiliboa mala basuunga kimibili kiabwe abuwaanga mu Betisani. Enyuma we khusuunga babaandu ba Yabesi-Kileati baba beeba kimibili ekio.)
Daudi abukula kamakuumba ka Saulo nende ko mwana wewe Yonasani mala lundi abuusia kamakuumba ke babaana basoleeli saba ba Saulo ba basuungwa.
Nio basiikha kamakuumba ka Saulo ne Yonasani mu ng'ani eya Kishi raraawe owa Saulo, mu Sela mu sibala sia Benjamini, ne khukhola koosi niko omwami alaka. Ne enyuma wako, Wele akobosia lisaba liabwe khulwe sibala.
Liie liliindi liabao akari we Bafilisiti ne Isiraeli. Ne Daudi acha ne babaandu bewe mala bapana ne Bafilisiti mala Daudi alua.
Ne omufilisiti mulala omuboofu bali Isi-benobu, aba ne lifumo lie kumukasa lilioola busiro bwe chikiilo chitaru ne nusu. Lundi aba ne mbalu embia. Ebaasia ali anyala eera Daudi.
Ne kakhali Abisai okhwa Seruya acha ayeeta Daudi, mala Abisai akwira. Nio babaandu ba Daudi bamuboolela bali se bacha ne naye lundi mwiie tawe. Baloma bali “Ewe niye lilieyikina lia Isiraeli, mala se khwenya khwakhutibia tawe.”
Enyuma wa kano liie liliindi liabao ne Bafilisiti e Kobu, nilio Sibekayi khukhwama Husiati niio eerera Safu.
