Liie liliindi liabayo ne Bafilisiti e Kobu. Ne Elihanani okhwa Yairi khukhwama e Betelehemu eera Koliati khukhwama Katihi. Lifumo liewe liaba ne lubango lutilingifu nga kumutalachi kwe khunaba buusi.
Nio liie liliindi liabao e Katihi, omundu mulala omuboofu okundi owaba ne kamasaasabi khu makhono koombi ne khu bikele bioombi.
Aafwochola Baisiraeli, ne kakhali Yonasani, okhwa Simei wandaaye owa Daudi, amwiira.
Bane bano baba be lisaaye lie babaandu baboofu be Katihi, mala berwa ne Daudi ne babaandu bewe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne aonia Daudi khukhwama khu Saulo ne basiku bewe boosi, Daudi embela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumwenya kuno:
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye omuliindi wase,
niye bubwilukhilo, lundi niye omusikuli wase.
Wele wase, buliindi bwase, niye nilukhilangakho,
engabo yase, ne kamaani ke buonia bwase,
kamaani kase, ne bubwilukhilo bwase,
omuonia wase, oumbonianga khukhwama khu basiku base.
Nanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhoyela efuma,
mala mbonisibwa khukhwama khu basiku base.
Bibuli bie lifwa biambotookhelela,
mala bibuli bie bubi biafuuma.
Butinyu bwe lifwa bwambotookhelela,
kumureko kwe lifwa kwema ebweeni wase.
Nalaanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu butinyu bwase,
ne ali mu Lukaangu lwewe aulila kumumilo kwase,
aulila khulila khwase.
Nio sibala siareenga mala siesisiikha,
likulu liapapaalukha ne khureenga sikila Wele aba aakhalaale!
Liliisi lietuukha khukhwama mu moolu mwewe,
kumulilo kumurafu kwaama mukhanwa mwewe.
Kamaanda kakesing'eng'a kaama mu niye.
Abayuula likulu mala eekha asi,
sisiilima sikali siaba asi we bikele biewe.
Apurukhila khangu khu kerubi yewe eye mwikulu,
akeendela khu ndaa che mbeo.
Akhola sisiilima siamubotookhelela,
kamafuumbi kamasiro, kakechuule kameechi kaba nga liiema khu niye.
Kamaanda ke kumulilo kaburukhila angaaki,
khukhwama mu buwaanga bubwaba ebweeni wewe.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi akukumila mwikulu nga efula,
mala kumumilo kwoyo owe Angaaki Lukali kwauliilikhana.
Aalasa buembo mala asalanisia basiku bewe,
abatimania ne lueni.
Chingila che nyanja chabonekha,
kumusiingi kwe sibala siosi kwabonekha,
mu khurafua khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nga aakhokhela basiku bewe mu lirima.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eekha asi khukhwama angaaki mala andiila,
aakhweesa aandusia mu lusiba lwe kameechi.
Aasikula khukhwama khu musiku wase owe kamaani,
ne khukhwama khwaabo babambiila,
sikila baba ne kamaani kamakali khu khukhila ese.
Ne naba mu butinyu, banjibwaakala,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aniinda.
Anda abuwaanga,
asikula sikila asiimisibwa ne nase.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amba kumuruuru sikila buluungi bwase,
anduunga sikila se naba ne bubi tawe.
Ese naria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ese khalekhakho Wele wase nacha mu bumayaanu tawe.
Ese naria kamalaka kewe koosi,
ne ese khalekhakho kamalaka kewe tawe.
Se ndikho nende liibi lie khukhwikiichibwa ebweeni wewe tawe,
neliinda khukhwama khu bumayaanu.
Ne khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amba kumuruuru sikila buluungi bwase,
sikila amanyile ali ese se ndi ne bubi tawe.
Khwaabo basuubilwa wesi oli omusuubilifu khu nibo,
Oli omukwalaafu khwaabo baali bakwalaafu,
ne oli omurafu khwaabo baali bamayaanu
Khu bamiliiu, wekesia bumiliiu,
ne oli omurafu khwaabo baali babi.
Oonianga abo babeboombia,
mala wisia asi abo babeniinia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli etaa yase,
okaluukhasianga si siilima siase siba buwaanga.
Ne nawe nyala naula basiku base,
nendi ne Wele nyala nakhila bikhiingililo biabwe.
Bikholwa bia Wele bili bilayi,
lisuubisia lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi libechanga lia ng'ali,
ali engabo khwaabo bosi bayiima buliindi bwewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene niye Wele
Wele yeng'ene niye buliindi bwefwe.
Wele niye bubwilukhilo bwase,
akhola engila yase etambakho busiku.
aniinda bulayi mu bikulu.
Anjekesianga khu khuupana liie,
nio nyale khurumikhira buyiingo bwe kumukasa bulume.
Wambelesie engabo eye buonia bwowo,
buyeeti bwowo bwaniniisie.
Wakholile lukeendo lwase lwabeele lulwangu,
ne se miukhilekho tawe.
Natimania basiku base nabaula,
se nakobola tawe khukhwola nga ne nababunia.
Nababunia ne khubaula, nio se banyala khukhwinyokha, lundi tawe,
bakhilwa ebweeni wase.
Ewe wambelesia kamaani ke khu khuupana liie,
lundi wanjeta naula basiku base.
Wakhola basiku base banjilukha,
nabunia abo ba baba ne bambiila.
Bayiima buyeeti, ne kakhali bataamba obaonia,
balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne kakhali se abakobosia tawe.
Nabachungaka baaba nga lipukhuulu,
nabaswalakilila ne khubeemakho nga kamatosi ke khu ngila che mu chingoba.
Wambonia khukhwama mu bulomani ne babaandu,
wakhola ese khuuba omwimeelesi owe chikholo choosi,
babaandu nibo ese khamanya tawe bakholela.
Baakwa banjinamila,
nga ne bambulilakho busa bari, bandia.
Baakwa bawa kamaani, mala becha ne bareenga,
khukhwama mu bwikisi bwabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliio! Omuliindi wase afume,
ne Wele wase afume, omuliindi owe buonia bwase!
Wele ambelesia bukhili,
lundi aakhola namiia chikholo.
Aandusia mu basiku,
aaniinia angaaki we basiku base,
mala aambonia khukhwama khu baandu be sisiayuumba.
ne khu khwimbila kimienya kie fuma.
Wele aelesia omwami wewe bukhili bukali,
lundi ekesia busiime bukhawa tawe khu muchukhwekho kamafura wewe,
khu Daudi ne lisaaye liewe khulwa mindali.

Nono kano kali kamakhuwa ka Daudi kamamaliilisi:
Buno nibwo burume bwa Daudi okhwa Chesi.
Burume bwo mundu niye Wele aniinia,
niye Wele owa Yakobo achukhakho kamafura khuuba omwami,
niye owaba omwiimbi omulayi owe kimienya kia Isiraeli:
Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomalomela mwise,
elomo yewe eli khu lulimi lwase.
Wele owa Isiraeli alomaloome,
omuliindi owa Isiraeli aamboolela ali:
“Omundu ne aamiia babaandu mu bung'ali,
ne amiia mu khuria Wele,
ali nga buwaanga bwe nyanga erura,
enyanga ekhola bunyaasi bwamela efula ne ekwile.”
Lisaaye liase lili lirio ebweeni wa Wele.
Sikila aakhola Endakaano eya mindali na mindali ne nase,
eli eya ng'ali lundi esuubilwa bulayi.
Akhanjeete ne khukhwichusia liliekoomba liase.
Ne babaandu bakhali ne Wele bali nga kamawa kamwaatwa,
se kangalibwa ne kamakhono busa tawe.
Omundu okaangala akhoya arumikhira sichuuma,
namwe ebwooki we lifumo,
ne kosebwanga elala mu mulilo abwene ne abwene.
Kano niko kamasina ke banamae ba Daudi omwimeelesi owe khunyoa aba Yosiebu Basiebeti khukhwama Takimoni, owaba omwimeelesi owa “Bataru.” Aapanila lifumo liewe mala era babaandu be siseecha chimia munaane bosi mwiie lilala.
Oloondakho owamanyikhana khu bataru aba Eliesa okhwa Dodo, omwana owa Ahohi. Aba ne Daudi nga bebwaakala Bafilisiti. Baba ne bebuusiisie khulwe liie. Baisiraeli belukha.
Niye eema busa, mala apania Bafilisiti khukhwola kumukhono kwewe kwaluilila. Ne kumukhono kwewe se kwalekhakho embalu yewe tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaa bukhili bukali endaalo ng'eneyo. Enyuma we liie, Baisiraeli bakobola niio Eliesa aba mala babukula bulwaani khukhwama khu bafu.
Oloondakho khu bataru aba Shama okhwa Akee, khukhwama Harari. Bafilisiti yaba babuusiaane e Lehi, niio kumukuunda kwe siikhubi kwaba. Baisiraeli belukha Bafilisiti.
Ne Shama eema mu mukuunda, akuliinda, mala eera Bafilisiti. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera bukhili bukali endaalo ng'eneyo.
Mu biise bie likesa babemeelesi bataru be babemeelesi be banamae Kamakhumi kataru bacha niio Daudi aba mwibina lia Atulamu. Sipupu sie Bafilisiti siaba siamenyile mwitooma lie Barefaimu.
Mu biise bienebio yaba Daudi ali mu lukoba lusire ne baliindi be Bafilisiti baba mu Betelehemu.
Daudi aba ne bulesia mala aloma ali, “Khola ndiena omundu yesi yesi andeererakho kameechi ke khunywa khukhwama mu sebele eye mu silibwa sia Betelehemu!”
Banamae bataru bakhulu babira ne kamaani mu kambi eye Bafilisiti. Bataa kameechi khukhwama mu sebele, mala bakareerera Daudi. Ne se aakanywa tawe, ne kakhali akachukha enje nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambeele khanywa kameechi kano tawe! Ne nganywa aba ndi nga onywa kamafuki ke babaandu batibiisie bulamu bwabwe!” Khwako aloba khu kanywa. Ebio biaba bikholwa bie bunyindaafu bie banamae bataru bakhulu.
Abisai wandaaye owa Yoabu ba okhwa Seruya niye owaba omwimeelesi owe babaandu ba bamanyikhana kamakhumi kataru. Aapanila lifumo liewe mala eera babaandu chimia chitaru mala amanyikhana nga babaasie bataru.
Niye owamanyikhana lukali mu boosi kamakhumi kataru abo, aba komanda wabwe, ne kakhali se amanyikhaane nga bataru abo tawe.
Benaya okhwa Yeoyata, khukhwama Kabuseeli, aba omunamae omunyindaafu, akhola bibiindu bikali bie liiukia. Eera banamae babili ba Arieli owe Moabu be liiuka. Lulala eekha mwiloo khu ndaalo eye barafu mala eera etalang'i.
Lundi eera Omumisiri owaba omundu owe lukoondo lulayi. Omumisiri aba ne lifumo mukhono. Benaya aamuseera. Benaya aba ne eruungu mala ebwaakala Omumisiri, amunuula lifumo mala amwirira lifumo liewe liliene.
Ebio nibio bibiaba bikholwa bie bunyindaafu bwa Benaya, owaba mulala khu Banamae babemeelesi bataru.
Aba amanyikhana mu banamae kamakhumi kataru ne se amanyikhana lukali nga bataru tawe. Daudi amukhola khuuba omuliindi wewe.
Mu makhumi kataru abo, abamo Asaeli wandaaye owa Yoabu. Eliamani okhwa Dodo owe Betelehemu, Shama nende
Elika khukhwama Haroti, Helesi khukhwama Paliti.
Ira okhwa Ikesi khukhwama Tekoa.
Abiaseri khukhwama Anatoti, Mebunai khukhwama Husia.
Salimoni khukhwama Ahohi, Maharai khukhwama Netofa.
Helebu okhwa Baana khukhwama Netofa, Itai okhwa Rabai khukhwama Kibea mu Benjamini.
Benaya khukhwama Piratoni, Hitai khukhwama mu matooma ambi ne Kaasi.
Abieliboni khukhwama Araba Asimaweti khukhwama Baurimu
Eliaba khukhwama Siaaliboni, babaana ba Yasieni ne Yonasani,
ne Shama khukhwama Harari, Aiamu okhwa Siarari khukhwama Harari.
Elifeleti okhwa Ahasibai, khukhwama Maaka. Eliamu okhwa Aitiofeli khukhwama Kilo.
Hesiro khukhwama Karineli, Paarai khukhwama Arabu.
Ikali okhwa Nasani khukhwama Soba, Bani khukhwama Kati.
Seleki khukhwama Amoni, Naarai okhwa Seruya khukhwama Beeroti, Omusuti we bulwaani bwa Yoabu.
Ira ne Karebu khukhwama Itiri.
Ne Uria Omuhiti. Banamae ba bamanyikhana boosi alala baba kamakhumi kataru na saba.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi aambila Baisiraeli lirima, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Daudi khubareerera butinyu, ne amuboolela ali, “Cha obale babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda.”
Nio Daudi aaboolela Yoabu ne bakomanda be kamae kewe ali, “Cha ne bakholi bowo obire mu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli khukhwama Dani khukhwola Beerisheba, mala obale babaandu. Nenya emanye baliyo benga.”
Ne kakhali Yoabu akobosia omwami ali, “Omwami, lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo atase babaandu ba Isiraeli khukhwola emia babe bakali khukhila luno ewe nosiili omulamu. Siina sikila omwami ne wenya khukhola ori?”
Ne kakhali omwami ayingilila Yoabu ne bakholi bewe bakhola nga ne enya. Yoabu ne babemeelesi be banamae barekukha bacha babala babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Bambukha Yoritani mala baapa ekambi e Aroeri, lukoba luuli akari we litooma, mu sibala sia Kati. Khukhwama eyo bacha ebunaswa owa Yaseri,
mala bacha e Kileati nende e Kadeshi, mu maloba ke Bahiti. Nio bacha e Dani mala babotookha bacha Sidoni.
Nio bacha mu lukoba lusire lwa Tiro, ne mu chingoba choosi che Bahiti ne Bakanaani. Mala ekhumaliilikha bacha e Beerisheba nende ebunafubo owa Yuda.
Khwako ne bamalile khukeenda mu maloba koosi bakobola e Yerusalemu enyuma we kimieesi tisa ne chindaalo kamakhumi kabili.
Yoabu aaboolela omwami bukali bwe babaandu ba baaba ne babaliilwe. Mu Isiraeli baba banamae chielefu chimia munaane, ne mu Yuda chielefu chimia chiraano.
Ne nga Daudi na amala khubala babaandu, omwene aarakikha khukhwebiiya. Aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Naboone bubwoni bukali mu niko kholile. Nosiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mbeele ese omukholi wowo kholeele mu busilu.”
Nga Daudi ne enyokha makhelebeende, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela elomo yewe Kati omung'oosi owa Daudi ali,
“Cha mala oboolele Daudi oli ndikho muelesia bibiindu bitaru aroboorekho silala. Nja khukhola siosi siosi nisio aroboore.”
Kati aacha niio Daudi ali amuboolela niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboleele. Areeba ali, “Siina nisio wenya siekholekhe? Enjala khuuba mu sibala siowo khu miiko kitaru, namwe kimieesi kitaru kie khukhwilukha basiku bowo, namwe chindaalo chitaru che lufu luubi mu sibala siowo? Luno yibaasia mala umboolele nilio ngoboseliayo oundumire.”
Daudi aakobosia Kati ali, “Ese ndi mu butinyu! Ne se nenya ngwe mu bunyali bwe babaandu tawe. Lekha ngwe mu bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila niye ali owe siisa sikali.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaruma lufu luubi mu Isiraeli. Khukhwama kumutikhinyi okwo khukhwola mu siise nisio aroboreramo. Khukhwama Dani khukhwola Beerisheba babaandu chielefu kamakhumi saba bafwa.
Nga Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne ali ambi khunaaya kumukhono khukhwonaka Yerusalemu, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ebiiya khu siiukuumo siewe sie khubunia babaandu. Aaboolela malaika owaba ne alikho abeera ali, “Wanyaliile ao!” Malaika aba abuundu e khuulila biakhulia owa Arauna, Omuyebusi.
Daudi nga ne abona malaika owaba ne alikho eera babaandu, aboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ese niise omumayaanu. Ese niye owakholile kamabi kano. Ne kamakheese kano kakholile siina? Okhoyeele umbunie samwene ne lisaaye liase.”
Endaalo ng'eneyo Kati aacha khu Daudi mala aamuboolela ali, “Cha abuundu e khuulila biakhulia wa Arauna omuyebusi mala wombakhileo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare.”
Daudi aria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala acha aakhola nga Kati ne amuboolela.
Arauna aabona omwami ne bakholi bewe balikho becha niio ali. Arauna aacha ebweeni aasikamila omwami Daudi bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi mu buriaani.
Arauna amureeba ali, “Omwami siina sikila ne wichile owo mukholi wowo?”
Daudi aamukobosia ali, “Nechile khukula abuundu wowo e khuula biakhulia mala nombakhileo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare, nio lufu luubi luno luwe khu baandu.”
Arauna aaloma ali “Mwami wase, bukula, siosi nisio wenya. Chieeyi chili ano khulwe siianwa sie khukhwosia khu alutare. Bibiindu bie khuula biakhulia ne kamachooki ke chikhaafu kabe chiikhu.”
Arauna abielesia bioosi khu mwami mala aamuboolela ali, “Khuelesia bino bioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhoya asiimisibwa ne nawe.”
Ne kakhali omwami Daudi aakobosia Arauna ali, “Tawe, enja khu khukulakho. Sikila se nja khuaanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase biianwa bie khukhwosia nibio khakulile siosi siosi tawe.” Nio Daudi aakula abuundu e khuulila biakhulia ne chikhaafu khulwe chirupia kamakhumi karaano.
Nio ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare ne khumuaanila biianwa bie khukhwosia nende biianwa bie kumuleembe. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakobosia lireeba lia Daudi mala lufu luubi lwawa mu Isiraeli.

Nono omwami Daudi aaba omusaakhulu lukali. Ne akhaba ne bamubiimba kamaruungeti, se anyoolanga luluuya tawe.
Nio bakholi bewe bamuboolela bali, “omwami, lekha khukhuyimile omukhaana owe yabwana amenye nawe akhuliinde, abe omulesi wowo. Lekha akhweumbekho nio onyoole luluuya.”
Bayimilisia mu Isiraeli mwoosi omukhaana owe lukoondo lulayi. Banyoola Abisiagi omukhaana Mushunemi mala bamureera khu mwami.
Abishaki aba owe lukoondo lulayi lukali, mala alela omwami ne khumuliinda. Ne kakhali omwami se abaakho ne naye nga omuseecha no mukhasi tawe.
Raraawe Daudi abeele akharafwirakho omwana wewe akhaba lulala lwong'ene khumureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne okholile kano?” Tawe. Atonicha yesi aaba omundu owe lukoondo lulayi. Niye oloondela Abusolomu mu khusaalwa.
Aalomaloma ne Yoabu, okhwa Seruya ne Abiatari omusaayi. Nio baloonda khu Atonicha mala bamuyeeta.
Ne Satoki omusaayi, Benaya okhwa Yehoyata, Nasani omung'oosi, Shimei, Rei, ne banamae be kamaani ba Daudi se baaba lubeka lwa Atonicha tawe.
Atonicha aana embosio eye kamakheese, chiuunwa ne chimoosi chinefu a lwanda lwe ndemu luuli siimbi e Enirokeli. Alaanga bawandaaye boosi, basoleeli bo mwami Daudi ne bakhulu be banamae boosi khukhwama mu Buyuda.
Ne kakhali se aalaanga Nasani omung'oosi namwe Benaya namwe banamae be kamaani namwe Solomoni wandaaye tawe.
Nono yiicha ekhukaambile mala oonie bulamu bwowo ne bulamu bwo mwana wowo Solomoni.
Cha khangu khu mwami Daudi mala omureebe oli, ‘omwami se wanjechubila oli omwana wase Solomoni aliila khu bwami enyuma wowo mala ekhalile endebe eye bubwami? Ne siina sikila Atonicha ne ali omwami?’ ”
Nasani atasakho ali, “Nga ne olaba ne osilomaloma no mwami Daudi, ese sesi ndakhuloondakho mala mbandalasie kamakhuwa kowo.”
Nio Batisheba acha khubona omwami e lusiro lwewe. Nono Daudi aaba omusaakhulu lukali, ne Abishaki, omukhaana Mushunemi aaba ne amuliinda.
Batisheba enama, asikama ebweeni wo mwami mala omwami amureeba ali, “Wenya siina?”
Amukobosia ali, “omwami, ewe wanjechubila mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo, oli omwana wase Solomoni aliaamiia enyuma wowo ne alikhalila endebe eye bubwami.
Ne luno Atonicha ali omwami mala ewe se wamanyilekho sisiindu siosi siosi khu lienelio tawe.
Aanile embosio eye chiuunwa, chimoosi ne kamakheese kamakali, ne alaangile basoleeli bowo boosi, Abiatari omusaayi, ne Yoabu komanda owe banamae. Ne kakhali se alaangilekho omwana wowo Solomoni tawe.
Nono omwami, Baisiraeli boosi bakhuloleleele ewewe obaboolele naanu olekhala khu ndebe eye bubwami bwowo enyuma wowo.
Ne busa nga ewe ne olirurao, ese ne omwana wase Solomoni khulibalikha nga baabi.”
Nga aba ne asilomaloma, Nasani omung'oosi engilamo.
Omwami aboolelwa ali omung'oosi Nasani echile. Nasani nga engila, enama ebweeni wo mwami bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi.
Nio areeba ali, “omwami, ewe walomile oli Atonicha alaamiia enyuma wowo, mala ekhale khu ndebe eye bubwami?
Sikila endaalo yino ekhile mala aanile embosio eye chiuunwa, kamakheese ne chimoosi mu bukali. Alaangile basoleeli bowo boosi, Yoabu, komanda owe banamae bowo
Ne ese omukholi wowo, ne Satoki omusaayi, ne Benaya okhwa Yehoyata no mukholi wowo Solomoni se akhulaangilekho tawe.
Omwami ewe ofukiilile kano koosi? Ne khaba khuboolelakho bakholi bowo, naanu olekhalila endebe eye bubwami enyuma wowo tawe?”
Nio omwami Daudi akobosia ali, “Ndangile Batisheba.” Batisheba engila mukari mala eema ebweeni wo mwami.
Nio omwami echuba ne aloma ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owasikula ese khukhwama mu busiku bwoosi,
ndakhola luno niko nakhwichubila mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Ndakhola nga nakhwichubila ndi: Omwana wowo Solomoni aliamiia enyuma wase mala ekhale khu ndebe eye bubwami mu bweyaangu bwase.”
Nio Batisheba enama asikamila omwami mala aloma ali, “omwami wase Daudi akhoya ayindile!”
Nio omwami Daudi arumania bamulaangile Satoki omusaayi, Nasani Omung'oosi ne Benaya okhwa Yehoyata. Becha ebweeni wo mwami.
Omwami ababoolela ali, “Bukula bakholi base mala muniinie omwana wase Solomoni khu nyumbu yase, mala mumuroongie mumwikhisie e Kihoni.
Satoki omusaayi, ne Nasani omung'oosi bamuchukhekho kamafura ebweeneyo, bamwamiie abe omwami owa Isiraeli. Nio mupe ekhoombi mulome muli, ‘Oyindile omwami Solomoni.’
Mulamuloondakho mukobole naye ano eche ekhalile endebe yase eye bubwami. Niye olakobola mu bweyaangu bwase abe omwami. Namuroboore abe omwami owa Isiraeli ne Yuda.”
Benaya okhwa Yehoyata akobosia omwami ali, “Kabe kario, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi wo mwami wase akhoya arakho kumukhono.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne abeele no mwami wase, akhoya lundi abe ne Solomoni, mala akhole bubwami bwewe bube bukali lukali khukhila bwo mwami wase Daudi.”
Nio Satoki omusaayi, Nasani omung'oosi, Benaya okhwa Yehoyata ne Bakereti ne Bapeleti bekha ne Solomoni. Bamuniinia khu nyumbu eyo mwami Daudi, mala bamuroongia bamuyila e Kihoni.
Satoki abukula lulwiika lwe kamafura khukhwama mu liiema mala achukha khu Solomoni kamafura abe omwami. Nio baapa ekhoombi, mala babaandu boosi baloma bali, “omwami Solomoni, yindila!”
Nio babaandu boosi baniina bamuloondakho bakobola ne naye ne balikho baapa kimilele ne bekhoya ne busangaafu bukali. Liloba lioosi liaterema sikila luyoka lwabwe.
Atonicha ne bakeni boosi ba baaba naye baulila luyoka nga baba ne bamaliilisia naikara. Ne nga Yoabu ne aulila ekhoombi ne yipwa, areeba ali, “Luyoka luuli mu lukoba luno luli ne sifuno siina?”
Nga aaba ne asiiloma, Yonasani, omusoleeli owo musaayi Abiatari echa. Atonicha amuboolela ali, “Yingila mukari. Ewe oli omundu owe bukhala mala olikho oreera kamakhuwa kamalayi.”
Yonasani akobosia Atonicha ali, “Tawe, omwami wefwe Daudi akholile Solomoni khuba omwami.
Omwami Daudi arumire Satoki omusaayi, Nasani omung'oosi, Benaya okhwa Yehoyata ne Bakereti ne Bapeleti khumuroongia. Bamuniinisie khu nyumbu eyo mwami.
Ne Satoki omusaayi ne Nasani omung'oosi bamuchukhilekho kamafura abe omwami e Kihoni. Ne khukhwama abwenao, bachile ne bekhoya, nio liakila lukoba ne lwichuule luyoka. Luli luyoka olwo nilwo ouuliile.
Solomoni luno ali omwami.
Khutasa khwako bakholi be lichipi bechile khusiima omwami wefwe Daudi, ne baloma bali, ‘Wele wowo akhoya akhole lisina lia Solomoni lifume lukali khukhilakho liliowo. Ne bubwami bwa Solomoni bukhoya bwaba bukali khukhila bubwowo.’ Nio omwami Daudi enama khu sitaanda asaaya Wele.
Aloma ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele owa Isiraeli, ofukiilile mulala khu lisaaye liase ekhalile endebe eye bubwami endaalo eya luno samwene ne mbona ne chimoni chase!’ ”
Nio bakeni boosi ba Atonicha baterema, mala benyokha barekukha. Buli sia mulala achiila khu ngila yewe omwene.
Atonicha aria Solomoni, enyokha acha mala akhamara chinjika cha alutare.
Nio baboolela Solomoni bali, “Atonicha akhuriire, sikila akhamaare chinjika cha alutare.” Alikho aloma ali, “Lekha omwami Solomoni anyoe anjechubile ali se acha khunjira tawe.”
Solomoni aloma ali, “Ekesia ali ali omundu owolaana, mbaao akhaba lichuune liewe lilala lilakwa asi tawe, ne bumayaanu bwanyoolekhana mu niye, alafwa.”
Nio omwami Solomoni arumania barusia Atonicha khukhwama khu alutare. Atonicha acha khu mwami mala asikama ebweeni wo mwami Solomoni, mala omwami amuboolela ali, “Khoche engo wowo.”

Nga Daudi ne aaba ne ali embi khufwa, alaka omwana wewe Solomoni ne aloma ali,
“Siise siase sie khufwa siolile nga bibuumbe bioosi ne bifwichanga. Ba owe kamaani, lundi omunyindaafu.
Khola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhulaka khukhola. Keenda mu ngila chewe ne khuria kamalaka kewe, ne kamakaambilo, nga ne kaandikwa mu Lilaka lia Musa. Wakhola orio, ocha khuindiaala mu niko okhola koosi, ne oosi oosi niio olicha.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhole niko aasuubisia khuloondekhana ne nase nga ne aamboolela ali, ‘Kaaba bali be lisaaye liase bacha khutiila kamalaka kewe ne khumukholela niye mu busuubilwa lundi ne kumwoyo kwoosi, se akhatambemo owamiia Isiraeli mu biise bioosi tawe.’
Mukholele khuloondekhana ne bukesi bwowo. Ne kakhali okhamulekha afwa ne kumuleembe tawe.
Nono okhamubukula nga okhali ne bubi tawe. Ewe oli omundu omukesi, olimanya nisio olimukhola. Ne okhoya wabona oli eriirwe, akhaba ne ali omusaakhulu owe chimbuchi.”
Nio Daudi afwa mala asiikhwa mu lukoba lwewe.
Daudi amiia Isiraeli khu miiko kamakhumi kane. Amiia khukhwama mu Heburoni kimiiko saba ne khukhwama mu Yerusalemu kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kitaru.
Nio Solomoni ekhala khu ndebe eye bubwami bwa raraawe Daudi, mala bubwami bwewe bwaba ne kamaani.
Nio Atonicha, omwana owa Hakiti echa khu Batisheba maayi owa Solomoni. Batisheba amureeba ali, “Wechile ne kumuleembe?”
Amukobosia ali, “Yee, nechile ne kumuleembe.”
Nio atasakho ali, “Ese ndi ne sisiindu nisio nenya khu khuboolela.”
Amukobosia ali, “Mboolele.”
Atonicha aloma ali, “Ewe omanyile oli bubwami bwaba bubwase. Baisiraeli boosi baaniindanga ese namiie. Ne kakhali bubwami bwakalukhaane mala bwabeele bwa wandaayase. Bwaba bubwewe khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne luno ndi ne lireeba lilala. Nosiima okhaloba khu khuukholela tawe.” Batisheba aloma ali, “Reeba.”
Batisheba amukobosia ali, “Bulayi, ndakhulomela khu mwami.”
Nio Batisheba acha khu mwami khulomaloma ne naye kamakhuwa ka Atonicha. Omwami enyokha khukhwakaanila maayi wewe mala amwinamila. Nio Solomoni ekhala khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami, mala arumania bareera endebe mu kari mala Batisheba amwikhala amukhono kumuseecha.
Batisheba aloma ali, “Ese ndikho khureeba unjeete sisiindu sikeekhe siri, nosiima okhaloba khu khuukholela tawe.” Omwami amukobosia ali, “Loma nisio wenya maayi. Se ndaloba khu khukholela tawe.”
Batisheba aloma ali, “Lekha Abishaki, Omushunemi, aebwe khu wandaayo Atonicha abe omukhasi wewe.”
Omwami Solomoni areeba maawe ali, “Sikila siina ne undeeba emuelesie Abishaki. Murebere ne bubwami bwosi. Sikila ali wandaayase omukhulu, ne Abiatari omusaayi ne Yoabu, okhwa Seruya bali lubeka lwewe!”
Nio omwami Solomoni echuba mu lisina lia Wele Omuyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Wele akhoya amba kumunaanio ne ekhakhola Atonicha aruunga ne bulamu bwewe khulwe khureeba lino tawe!
Nono nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ambandalasie ese ne khu khunjikhasia khu ndebe eye bubwami eya paapa wase Daudi, nende be enju yase nga aalaka, Atonicha aleerwa endaalo eya luno.”
Nio omwami Solomoni aruma Benaya okhwa Yehoyata mala Benaya acha eera Atonicha.
Nio Solomoni aoona Abiatari mu khuba omusaayi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khwako akhola kaba ng'ali niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma mu Shilo khuloondekhana khu musaayi Eli ne nju yewe.
Nga Yoabu ne aaulila kakaba ne kekholeekhe, aria. Aaba ayeetile Atonicha ne se ayeeta Abusolomu tawe. Nio elukha acha akhamara chinjika cha alutare.
Omwami Solomoni aulila bali Yoabu elukhiile mu Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala ali a alutare. Solomoni aruma Benaya okhwa Yehoyata khu Yoabu ache amwire.
Benaya acha e Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aboolela Yoabu ali, “omwami alaka ali, rura khubweene okhwo.” Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Tawe ese ndafwila ano.” Benaya akobola khu mwami mala amuboolela niko Yoabu aaba ne alomile.
Solomoni amukobosia ali, “Khola niko Yoabu alikho aloma. Mwire mala omusiikhe. Nio ese namwe okundi yesi yesi khu be lisaaye lia Daudi khurusibwekho sifuki sie babaandu bakhali ne kumusaango tawe nibo Yoabu eera.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khuruunga Yoabu khulwe sifuki nisio aachukha, paapa wase Daudi ne akhamanya tawe. Sikila Yoabu eera babaandu babili baluungi lundi balayi khumukhila niye. Baba Abuneri okhwa Neri komanda owe banamae ba Isiraeli, ne Amasa okhwa Yeteri, komanda owe banamae ba Yuda.
Nono sifuki siabwe siliba khu Yoabu ne khu lisaaye liewe mindali na mindali. Ne kumuleembe kulibao khu Daudi nende be lisaaye liewe, ne enju yewe ne khu bwami bwewe, kumuleembe kulibao khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mindali.”
Nio Benaya okhwa Yehoyata acha eera Yoabu. Yoabu asiikhwa mungo mwewe mu sichiimi.
Omwami akhola Benaya okhwa Yehoyata aaba omukhulu owe banamae mu bweyaangu bwa Yoabu, ne ara Satoki omusaayi mu bweyaangu bwa Abiatari.
Nio omwami arumania alaanga Shimei mala amuboolela ali, “Yombakha enju yowo mu Yerusalemu. Omenyemo ne okharura mu lukoba wachaakho abuundu osi osi tawe.
Sikila endaalo niyo olirurira, mala wambukhe khakheechi kha Kiduroni manya ng'ali oli ocha khufwa.”
Shimei amukobosia ali, “Nilio oloma lilayi, omwami wase nga ne olomile nja khukhola ndio.” Nio Shimei amenya mu Yerusalemu khulwe siise sileeyi.
Ne kakhali, enyuma we kimiiko kitaru, nasioobi babili khu nasioobi ba Shimei belukha bacha owa Akishi okhwa Maaka omwami owe Katihi. Nga Shimei ne aaulila ali bakholi bewe bali mu Katihi,
aniina khu punda yewe mala acha Katihi khu Akishi khuyiima nasioobi bewe. Abanyoola mala abakobosia engo.
Solomoni aulila ali Shimei achiile khukhwama
Yerusalemu khukhwola Katihi ne khukobola. Arumania amulaanga mala amureeba ali, “Ese se nakhukhola wechuba mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi nakhukaania burafu ndi okharurakho mu Yerusalemu tawe? Nakhuboolela ndi ng'ali waaba ne orura wacha abuundu osi osi okhafwe. Ewe wamboolela oli, ‘Nilio oloma lilayi, nariire.’
Siina sikila ewe nono ne okhaliindile sisiechubo sioosi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lilaka nilio ese nakhuelesia?”
Omwami lundi aboolela Shimei ali, “Ewe omanyile bulayi bwene kamamayaanu koosi niko wakholela paapa wase Daudi. Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhukobosela bumayaanu bwowo wamwene.
Ne kakhali alabiita chikhabi omwami Solomoni, ne bubwami bwa Daudi bucha khuluma ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mindali.”
Nio omwami alaka Benaya okhwa Yehoyata, mala acha eera Shimei. Nio bubwami bwemisibwa mu bunyali bwa Solomoni.

Solomoni aakhola liiambaana lie khukhwaana no mwami Farao owe Misiri. Abukula omukhaana owa Farao amenya naye mu Lukoba lwa Daudi Yerusalemu, khukhwola nga ne amala khukhwombakha lichipi liewe, ne enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne lisiisi liliabotookhelela Yerusalemu.
Babaandu baananga chimbosio abuundu aesuta sikila enju se yaba yombakhwa khulwe lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Solomoni asiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aloonda kamalaka ka raraawe Daudi, ne kakhali eera chimbosio ne khukhwosiela bibiindu biiunya bulayi abuundu aesuta.
Solomoni acha e Kibeoni khuaana chimbosio sikila ebweneeyo niyo alutare eyamanyikhana lukali yaba. Solomoni aanilangayo biianwa bie khukhwosia eelefu ndala.
E Kibeoni Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Solomoni mu marooro siilo mala aloma ali, “Saba nisio wenya ekhue.”
Solomoni amukobosia ali, “Ewe wekesia busiime bukali khu paapa wase Daudi omukholi wowo. Wakhola orio sikila akeenda ebweeni wowo mu bwiyikinwa, mu buluungi ne mu bukololofu bwe kumwoyo khwiwe. Ne wachiililiile khumwekesia busiime bwowo bukali lundi buchiililila, khulwe khumua omusoleeli wewe olikho wikhalila endebe eye bubwami luno mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, ewe wakholile ese omukholi wowo khuba omwami mu bweyaangu bwa paapa wase Daudi, nakhaba ne siili omwana omukeekhe. Se manyile khukhwamiia tawe.
Ndi akari we babaandu bowo nibo warobora, babaandu bakali lukali bakhabalikha tawe.
Nono elesia omukholi wowo chinganakani che limanya khukhwamiia babaandu bowo nio manye khukhwaukhasia akari we bulayi ne bumayaanu. Ne busa, naanu onyala khukhwamiia babaandu bowo bakali bano?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asangaala sikila Solomoni aaba asabile lino.
Wele aloma ali, “Sikila wasabile lino, ne se wesabiile wamwene limenya lileeyi namwe buiinda namwe basiku bowo bafwe tawe ne kakhali wasabile limanya,
ndakhola nilio osabile. Ndakhua chinganakani che bukesi ne limanya khumanya bulayi ne bumayaanu. Omundu yesi yesi akhabakhoo owe limanya ne bukesi khukhila nibwo ndikho khuelesia tawe, ne okundi se akhabekhoo nga ewe, enyuma wowo tawe.
Lundi ndikho khua nibio abeele okhasabile tawe: buiinda ne lukoosi, nio mu bulamu bwowo bwosi mbao omwami yesi yesi ocha khukhwekelaaniakho tawe.
Ne waaba ne okeenda mu ngila chase ne oria kamalaka kaase nga paapa wowo Daudi ne akhola, ndakhutasa bulamu.”
Solomoni asisimukha mala khane kaba kamarooro. Nio, acha e Yerusalemu eema ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aana biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kumuleembe. Akhola naikara khu bakholi bewe boosi.
Nio baeeyi babili becha khu mwami Solomoni mala bema ebweeni wewe.
Mulala khu nibo aloma ali, “omwami wase, omukhasi yuno ne nase khumenyile munju ndala. Mala ese nasaalile omwana niye ne aliio.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru ne malile khusaala, yesi asaala omwana. Khwaba munju fwembi fweng'ene ne se abamo omundu okundi tawe.
Nio omwana owo mukhasi yuno afwa musilo, sikila amukonela.
Enyokha mu silo akari abukula omwana wase alubeka lwase, ese ne endi mwilo. Amuyila khu bulili bwewe mala ara omwana ofwiile yuno khu bulili bwase.
Mbeele oli siisimukha kumutikhinyi khunuunia omwana, nabona afwiile. Nga namuloleelela bulayi nabona ndi se ali niye nasaala tawe.”
Ne omukhasi okundi naye aloma ali, “Khaba ta! Omwana omulamu yuno owase niye. Ne ofwiile yuno niye owowo!” Omukhasi owe khunyoa akobosia ali, “Khaba, ta! Omwana ofwiile ali wowo ne omulamu yuno ali owase.” Nono bayinganila ebweeni wo mwami.
Nio omwami Solomoni aloma ali, “Buli mulala khwinywe aloma ali omwana omulamu niye wewe. Ne omufu ali owo kundi.”
Omwami arumania embalu mala bamureerera.
Aloma ali, “Khala omwana oli omulamu yuno mu bitonyi bibili mala oeleesie buli mukhasi sitonyi.”
Nio omukhasi owo omwana owaba omulamu aboolela omwami ali, “nosiima omwami, mue niye omwana omulamu, okhamwiira tawe.” Aloma ario sikila aaba ne siisa sikali mu mwoyo kwewe khu mwana wewe. Ne kakhali omukhasi okundi oyo aloma ali, “Se alaba owase namwe owowo tawe, mukhalemo.”
Nio omwami aloma ali, “Elesia omukhasi owe khunyoa omwana ooli omulamu, ne mukhamwiira tawe. Omukhasi yuno ali maayi owo omwana.”
Baisiraeli boosi nga baulila khukhalaka nikhwo omwami Solomoni akhalaake, bamuria, sikila bamanya bali bukesi khukhwama khu Wele bwamubaakho khukhalaka kimisaango mu bung'ali.

Solomoni aba omwami owa Isiraeli yoosi.
Ne bano nibo ba baaba babemeelesi bewe be angaaki: Omusaayi aba Asaria okhwa Satoki.
Baandiki baaba Elihorefu ne Ahiya, bakhwa Shisha. Omubiikhi owe kamaandiko ako aaba Yehoshafati okhwa Ahiludi.
Omukhulu owe banamae aaba Benaya okhwa Yehoyata. Basaayi baaba Satoki ne Abiatari.
Omukhulu owe babemeelesi aaba Asaria okhwa Nasani. Sabuti okhwa Nasani aaba omusaayi lundi omusaale owo Mwami.
Omukhulu owe bakholi be mu lichipi aaba Ahishari, ne omukhulu owemeelela kimilimo kie khuyingilila aaba Atoniramu okhwa Abuta.
Solomoni aba ne babemeelesi ekhumi na babili khu Isiraeli yoosi babarereranga omwami nende be nju yewe biakhulia. Buli mulala areeranga biakhulia kumwesi mulala mu mwiiko.
Kano niko kamasina kabwe: Benihuri: owe Sibala sie lukulu sia Efuraimu,
Bendekeri owe e Makasi, Shalibimu, Beti-shemesi, ne Elani-beti-hanani.
Beniheseti owe Aruboti ne Soko ne sibala sioosi sia Heferi.
Beni-abinatabu owe Nafati (areera omukhaana owa Solomoni bali Tafati)
Baana okhwa Ahiludi owe Taanachi, Mekido ne Beti-sheani eli embi Saretani emwaalo owa Yesireeli, ne khukhwama Beti-sheani khukhwola Abeli-mehola khucha khukhwola Yokimeamu.
Bangeberi owe Ramoti-kileati, aba ne birekere bia Yairi, okhwa Manase biili mu Kileati lundi aaba ne lukoongo lwa Arikobu mu Bashani. Chabamo chingoba kamakhumi sita chimboofu chisire ne bilibwa bie kumukasa.
Ahinatabu okhwa Ito owe Mahanaimu.
Ahimaasi, owe Nafutali (areera Basemati omukhaana owa Solomoni)
Baana okhwa Hushai owa Asheri ne Bealoti.
Yehoshafati okhwa Parua owa Isakari,
Shimei okhwa Ela owe e Benjamini.
Keberi okhwa Uri owe lukoongo lwa Kileati nilwo omwami Sihoni owe Baamori no mwami Oku owe Bashani bamiia.
Ne abao omuruki mulala mu sibala sia Yuda.
Babaandu be Buyuda baba bakali nga kumuyekhe. Balia ne banywa mala ne basangaala.
Solomoni amiia khu bwami bwoosi khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati khukhwola khu sibala sie Bafilisiti ne lulwaakha lwa Misiri. Bibala bino biareraanga kumuruungo nikwo Solomoni enyanga mala biakholela Solomoni mu limenya liewe lioosi.
Biakhulia nibio Solomoni enyanga khu ndaalo ndala biaba, chindubi emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano che bufu, siakhulia chindubi chimia chitaru,
chikhaafu chinefu ekhumi chichalisibwa biakhulia mungo ne chikhaafu kamakhumi kabili che mumayilwe enje, kamakheese emia, ne khutasakho chikhulo, bikicheu, chimboongo ne chingokho.
Solomoni amiia khu bibala bioosi mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati khukhwama Tifusa khukhwola Kasa. Aba ne kumuleembe chimbeka choosi chichabotookhelela sibala siewe.
Mu bulamu bwa Solomoni bwoosi, babaandu be Buyuda bamenya mu muleembe khukhwama Dani khukhwola Beerisheba. Buli mundu aaba ne kimisabibu ne kimituli kiewe.
Babemeelesi be khureera biakhulia bie lichipi lio mwami Solomoni, buli mulala khu mwesi kwewe, bareera buli sisienyekhana.
Bareeranga akhaba eshayiri ne bunyaasi bwe chifarasi ne bibiaayo bie kimilimo, niio bienyekhana. Buli mundu areeranga khuloondekhana nga enyekhana.
Wele aelesia Solomoni bukesi ne limanya likali. Bukesi bwewe bwaba bukali, bukhanyala bwakelwa tawe nga kumuyekhe.
Nio bukesi bwa Solomoni bwakhila bukesi bwe babaandu boosi be ebukwe ne bukesi bwoosi bwe Misiri.
Aba omukesi khukhila babaandu babaandi boosi. Aba omukesi khukhila Etani omuesra ne Hemani, Kalikoli, ne Darida bakhwa Maholi. Amanyikhana mu bibala bioosi bibiabotookhelela bubwami bwewe.
Omwami Solomoni aboola chisimo chielefu chitaru. Chinyimbo chewe chaba eelefu ndala ne chiraano.
Ekesia khu bimelwa bioosi khukhwama khu mirongooro kimitarakwa kimiboofu kia Lebanoni khukhwola khu nyoonyi ekhulaanga mu masiisi. Ekesia lundi khu saang'i, chinyuni, bimoola ne ching'eeni.
Babaandu bamaanga mu bibala bioosi khurekeeresia ke bukesi bwa Solomoni. Babaami boosi be khu liloba ba baaba ne baulila bukesi bwa Solomoni barumaanga babaandu khu niye.

Nono omwami Hiramu owe Tiro aruma bakholi bewe khu Solomoni, nga ne aulila ali baakhile Solomoni kamafura abe omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe. Hiramu yaba buli lwosi asiima Daudi.
Solomoni akobosia burume bwewe khu Hiramu ali,
“Ewe omanyile oli paapa wase Daudi se aanyala khukhwombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wewe enju tawe, sikila liie nilio apana ne basiku bewe babamubotookhelela. Apana khukhwola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ara basiku bewe asi wewe.
Ne kakhali luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase ambeele kumuleembe khu mbeka choosi che bubwami bwase. Luno sendi ne basiku tawe. Ne mbao busiku khu baandu base tawe.
Nono nenya khukhwombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase enju eye khusaayilamo nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aaboolela paapa wase Daudi. Amuboolela ali, ‘Omwana wowo, niye ekhekhasie khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami mu bweyaangu bwowo, niye okhanjombakhile ese enju.’
Nono rumania bandemere kimirongooro kimitarakwa kie e Lebanoni. Bakholi base bakhakhole kimilimo ne bakholi bowo. Ekharuunge bakholi bowo siosi siosi nisio kane ewe okhalake. Nga nilwo omanyile babaandu base se bamanyile khurema kimirongooro bulayi nga Basidoni tawe.”
Hiramu nga aulila kamakhuwa ka Solomoni, ekhoya lukali mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume endaalo eya luno, oeleesie Daudi omwana omukesi amiie sibala siboofu esio.”
Nio Hiramu arumania khu Solomoni ne aloma ali, “Ese nanyoolile burume bwowo mala nerekeekhe khukhola niko wenya. Ndakhua kimitarakwa, ne Saipurasi.
Bakholi base bacha khwikhisia kimirongooro khukhwama e Lebanoni khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Mala ekhakiboe alala mu bituuli kikelakele kiikhe kiole abuundu niio ewe orobora. Abwenao bakholi base bakhakiasakileo mala okinyoole. Ne ese nenya ewe oeleesie be enju yase siakhulia nga kumuruungo.”
Nio Hiramu aelesia Solomoni kimirongooro kimitarakwa ne Saipurasi kioosi nikio enya.
Mala Solomoni aelesia Hiramu engaanu chindubi chielefu kamakhumi kabili nga siakhulia sie enju yewe, ne kamafura ke kimiseituni chinyuungu chielefu kamakhumi kabili. Solomoni aaelesia Hiramu bibiindu bino buli mwiiko.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaelesia Solomoni bukesi nga nilwo aba ne amulaka. Kumuleembe kwaba akari wa Hiramu ne Solomoni mala boombi bakhola endakaano.
Omwami Solomoni ayiima babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kataru, khukhwama mu Isiraeli yoosi bakhola kimilimo kie khuyingiililwa.
Mala abaruma e Lebanoni. Abakaba mu bipupu bitaru bie babaandu chielefu ekhumi. Buli sipupu siamenya mu Lebanoni kumwesi mulala, ne bakobola ne bamenya engo kimieesi kibili. Adoniramu aba omwimeelesi wabwe.
Solomoni aaba lundi ne babaandu chielefu kamakhumi munane mu sibala sie lukulu babeechi be kamabaale ne babaandu chielefu kamakhumi saba babakasuta.
Khutasa khwabo, babao babemeelesi babaandu chielefu chitaru ne chimia chitaru khukhwimeelela kimilimo nikio bakholaanga.
Omwami Solomoni abalaka khubeecha kamabaale kamaboofu ke bukusi bwe angaaki kabe kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu.
Nio babombakhi ba Solomoni ne Hiramu, ne babaandu ba Kebali babeecha kamabaale ne khukhola kimirongooro kie khukhwombakhila Lukaangu.

Solomoni arakikha khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kimiiko chimia chine ne kamakhumi munane enyuma we Baisiraeli khurura mu Misiri. Okwo kwaba kumwiiko kwe khaane kwe bubwami bwa Solomoni khu Isiraeli. Kwaba kumwesi kwe khabili kulaangwa Sifu.
Enju niyo Solomoni ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba bikele kamakhumi sita buleeyi, bukhiikha bikele kamakhumi kabili ne buniina bifuba kamakhumi kataru.
Ne lusiro lwe khukhwingilila mukari lwaba bikele kamakhumi kabili buleeyi. Lwalekhaana ne bukhiikha bwe enju. Khucha asi yaba bikele ekhumi ebweeni we enju.
Lukaangu lwaba ne kamatirisia kakekulwaangwa ne khukhwikalwa.
Lundi ombakha enju yetiila khu lisiisi chimbeka ne enyuma we Lukaangu. Enju yino yaba chikorofa chitaru.
Chisiro che asi chaba bikele biraano bubalaayi, ne che ekorofa eye akari chaba bikele sita bubalaayi. Ekorofa ekhola khataru yaba ne chisiro che bubalaayi bikele saba. Lisiisi lie Lukaangu liliakhola buli khu bwelu liaba linyelele khukhilakho lie lisiisi lie lusiro lwe asi khu nilio. Chisiro chino chaseendwa khwisiisi lie Lukaangu ne kakhali bisiindi biacho se biombakhwa mwisiisi lino tawe ne kakhali bietilakho.
Enju yombakhwa ne kamabaale kakabechelwa elala niio kaama. Nio luyoka lwe nyundo, namwe eyaywa namwe sisiindu siosi siosi sie sichuuma se lwauliilikhanakho mu Lukaangu nga lwaba ne lwombakhwa tawe.
Silibwa sie khukhwingila mu korofa eye asi
Nono omwami Solomoni amala khukhwombakha Lukaangu. Aruramo sisekese sisiakholwa ne bisiindi ne chimbao che kimitarakwa.
Solomoni ombakha chisiro khu nju yoosi. Buli lusiro
Nono elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Solomoni eli,
“Waaba ne oria kamalaka kase koosi, ndikhukholela niko nalaka paapa wowo Daudi.
Nja khumenya akari we babaandu base Baisiraeli. Ne se nja khubalekha tawe.”
Nono Solomoni amala khukhwombakha Lukaangu.
Kamasiisi ke mukari kafuunikhwa ne chimbao che kumutarakwa, khukhwama a mukhe khukhwola mu sisekese sie enju. Ne amukhe afuunikhwa ne chimbao cha Saipurasi.
Lusiro lwe mukari, lulaangwa bali Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali. Alukhala enyuma mukari mwe Lukaangu. Lwaba buleeyi bikele kamakhumi kabili mala lwakhalwamo lusiro lwe chimbao che kumutarakwa khukhwama amukhe chola khu lisiisi.
Lusiro lwe ebweeni we Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, lwaba buleeyi bwe bikele kamakhumi kane.
Bipichu bie chimbao che kimitarakwa kie mukari mwe enju biabeechwa mu sifwaani sie chimuka ne bimuli. Mukari mwoosi mwafuunikhwa ne chimbao che kumutarakwa. Ne libaale liosi liosi se liabonekhakho tawe.
Lusiro lwe mukari alukhala enyuma mu Lukaangu, khuraayo Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lusiro lwe mukari luno lwaba buleeyi bikele kamakhumi kabili, bukhiikha bikele kamakhumi kabili ne buniina bifuba kamakhumi kabili. Lusiro luno alufuunikha ne esahabu endayi. Lundi akhola alutare eye kumutarakwa.
Solomoni afuunikha mukari mwe Lukaangu ne esahabu. Ara kiminyololo kie esahabu bukhiikha a muliango kwe lusiro lwe Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali. Lusiro lwoosi alufuunikha ne esahabu.
Afuunikha mukari mwe Lukaangu lwoosi ne esahabu, bulayi bwene nende Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali.
Buli lutaa lwe ekerubi lwaba bikele biraano buleeyi. Ne buleeyi bwe khukhwama emusia we lutaa lulala khukhwola emusia we lutaa luluundi, bwaba bikele ekhumi.
Chikerubi chibili echo chaba chalekhaana, lundi chafwaanana.
Buli ebira yaba bifuba, ekhumi, buniina.
Chikerubi echo chabiikhwa mu lukaangu mukari lukali. Lutaa lwe ekerubi ndala lwetiila khwisiisi lubeka lulala ne lwe ekerubi ekiindi lwetiila khu lisiisi liliindi. Chindaa chacho chichiindi chetilanakho akari we enju.
Solomoni afuunikha chikerubi echo ne esahabu.
Abeecha khu masiisi ke Lukaangu ne bifwaani bie chikerubi ne chikheendu ne bimuli mu siro che mukari ne enje.
Asi we enju afuunikha ne esahabu mu siro che mukari ne enje.
Akhola chinjiki che kimiliango kicha Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali khukhwama khu museituni. Chinjiki chino chaba ne bisiindi bibiaba ne chimbeka chiraano.
Abeecha khu miliango kibili kie chikheendu ekio bifwaani bie chikerubi, chikheendu ne bimuli. Abifuunikha bioosi khungaaki ne esahabu.
Kumuliango kwe lusiro luboofu, Solomoni akukholela kimitalaachi kikiama khu lupao lwe kumuseituni.
Chinjiki chabamo chibili chimbambaane che khufuumba chichakhomwa khukhwama khu lupao lwa Saipurasi.
Khu njiki echo abeecha bifwaani bie chikerubi ne chikheendu ne bimuli. Afuunikha bioosi ne esahabu alekhaasia.
Ombakha lisiisi lie luuya lwe mukari ne kamabaale, ne kimitarakwa khu buli chilaini chitaru che kamabaale arao elaini ndala eye lupao lwe kumutarakwa.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khane kwe mu bwami bwa Solomoni kumusiingi kwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwombakhwa. Kwaba kumwesi kwa Sifu.
Ne mu mwesi kwa munane, kulaangwa kwa Buli, mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na mulala kwe mu bwami bwa Solomoni, kimilimo kie khukhwombakha lukaangu kiawela elala. Lwombakhwa khuloondekhana nga lwenyekhana. Lwabukula Solomoni kimiiko saba khulwombakha.

Solomoni ombakha lichipi liewe, khu miiko ekhumi ne kitaru.
Ombakha enju elaangwa eli enju eye kumusiru kwa Lebanoni. Buleeyi bwe enju bwaba bikele emia ndala. Ne bukhiikha bwaba bikele kamakhumi karaano ne buniina bwaba bifuba kamakhumi kataru. Mukari mwe enju eye kumusiru kwa Lebanoni
Ne sisekese siaba sie chimbao che kumutarakwa. Chimbao chichaba mu sisekese chaba kamakhumi kane ne chiraano. Buli e laini yaba ne chimbao ekhumi ne chiraano.
Kamatirisia kakholwa khu laini chitaru mala chaloleelelana.
Kimiliango kioosi ne chinuma
Solomoni akhola lusiro luboofu lulaangwa lwe Bisiindi. Buleeyi bwalwo bwaba bikele kamakhumi karaano. Ne bukhiikha bwalwo bwaba bikele kamakhumi kataru. Sisekese sisiaba ebweeni we enju siafuunikhwa. Siemisibwa khu bisiindi.
Lundi akhola lusiro luboofu lwe Endebe eye Bubwami lulwalaangwa lundi luli lusiro luboofu lwe Bukhalaki. Ao niio Solomoni akhalakilanga kimisaango. Lwaba lwafuunikhwa ne chimbao che kimitarakwa khukhwama asi khukhwola mu sisekese.
Chinju chino choosi chombakhwa ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki khukhwama khu musiingi khukhwola khu sisekese. Kamabaale kano kabeechwa bulayi. Kamiusibwa chimbeka chombi ne kumusiameno. Lundi akhola ario khukhwama khu luuya lwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwola khu luuya luboofu.
Kumusiingi kwaba kwe kamabaale kamaboofu kakaba ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Kaba ke bubalaayi bwe bikele munane ne bikele ekhumi.
Khungaaki khwe kumusiingi kabakho kamabaale kakaandi kakabeechwa khuloondekhana ne bipiimo, ne chimbao che kimitarakwa.
Lisiisi lie luuya luboofu lwe lichipi, liombakhwa ne kamabaale ne chimbao. Khu buli chilaini chitaru che kamabaale ombakhakho elaini ndala eye chimbao che kimitarakwa. Akhaba lusiro lwe luuya lwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumuliango kucha mu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bioosi biombakhwa birio.
Omwami Solomoni arumania bareere omundu bali Huramu khukhwama e Tiro.
Aba omwana owa namulekhwa owe ekholo eya Nafutali. Raraawe aaba Omutiro, omubasi owe kimikasa. Huramu aaba omukesi lundi owe limanya, omusicha mu mulimo kwe bubasi bwe kimikasa. Nio Huramu echa khu mwami Solomoni mala amukholela kimilimo kiewe kioosi kie kimikasa.
Huramu akhola bisiindi bibili bie kumukasa. Buli silala siaba buniina bwe chimita munane. Ne nofuusia biaba ne bubalaayi bwe chimita chiraano ne chisendimita salasini.
Lundi akhola bitumi bibili bie kumukasa. Buli silala buleeyi bwe bikele biraano. Ne abira khu ngaaki khwe bisiindi.
Nio akhola kiminyololo kikiaboraana khu buli situumi. Kiminyololo kino kiafuunikha bitumi khungaaki khwe bisiindi.
Lundi akhola bifwaani bie kamatuunda niko balaanga bali kamakomanga chilaini chibili. Bifwaani bino biafunikha bitumi bibiaba khu bisiindi.
Bitumi bibiaba khungaaki khwe bisiindi biaba bie kumukasa mala biakhengwa nga bimuli. Biaba ne buleeyi bwe bikele bine.
Bitumi biaba khungaaki khwe bisiindi bibili ne aembi ne kiminyololo kikiaboraana. Abuundu bwene ao, biabaao bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga chimia chibili khu laini chibili. Biabotookhelela bitumi.
Huramu asimikha bisiindi bie kumukasa bibili bino ebweeni we silibwa sie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siteechi sie lubeka lwe ebunafubo asitiuukha ali Yakini
Ne khungaaki khwe bisiindi bibiaba bie kumukasa biakhengwa nga bimuli.
Nono kumulimo kwe bisiindi kwawa.
Hiramu aang'oona litangi lie kumukasa lie buleeyi bwe chimita embi chibili ne nusu khucha mungaaki. Abele lusia lwe chimita likhumi na chiraano lunyala lwalibotookhelela. Khukhwama khu lusike khukhwola khu lundi liaba embi chimita chiraano. Liabukula chinyuungu che kameechi chielefu chibili.
Asi walio biabao bifwaani bie chimuka bibiabotookhelela litangi. Bifwaani bie chimuka ebio biaba bikele kamakhumi kataru khubotookhelela litangi, mala biaba mu laini chibili. Abikhola bioosi khulala ne litangi.
Litangi liarengekhwa khu mikoongo kie bifwaani bie chiuunwa ekhumi ne chibili che kumukasa. Chitaru chaloleelela ebunaswa, chitaru chaloleelela mumbo, chitaru chaloleelela ebunafubo, ne chitaru chaloleelela ebukwe.
Litangi liaba ne butilingifu bwe khu ndulo bubwaba lulwaala lulala bubalaayi. Lusike lwalio lwaba nga lusike lwe eseesi. Lwalolekhana nga simuli simulikha. Litangi elio liaba lichamo kameechi chilita kamakhumi kane.
Huramu lundi akhola kamakaari ekhumi ke kumukasa. Buli likaari liaba buleeyi bwe bikele bine ne bukhiikha bwe bikele bine, ne buniina bwe bifuba bitaru.
Kamakaari kaba ne kamabati kakaba mu mitalaachi.
Khu mabati biabaakho bifwaani bie chitalang'i, ne chiuunwa ne chikerubi. Mwitalaachi, angaaki ne asi we chitalang'i ne chiuunwa, chabao chinjooro che chindekwe ne bimuli, chichakhomwa mu mukasa.
Buli likaari liaba ne kimikuu kine kie kumukasa ne biaambaania bie kumukasa bine. Buli mu lusokho siabamo siyeeta enjikha. Biyeeta biaba ne bifwaani bie bimuli.
Khungaaki khwe enjikha khwabaakho liloo. Chisike che liloo chaniina sikele silala. Liloo lino liaba embi bikele bibili. Chisike che liloo chichaniina charonwa. Se liaba liabotookhelela tawe liaba lie bulekhaane embi bikele bibili. Emunwa we kumuliango, bachorakho bifwaani. Bibaanga biaba ne bubalaayi ne bukhiikha bulekhaana ne se biaba bibiabotookhelela tawe.
Kimikuu kiaba asi we bibaanga. Bibia bibiabotookhelela bie kimikuu biaba bifwaanane ne kamakaari. Ne buleeyi bwe kumukuu mulala bwaba embi bikele bibili.
Kimikuu kiakholwa nga kimikuu kie likaari lie liie. Biaamba likaari, ne chingarangarani, chiwaya ne akari we kumukuu biaba biakholwa ne kumukasa.
Biabaao biyeeta bine mu ndulo mwa buli likaari. Biyeeta biakholwa siindu silala biaba busa nga kamakaari.
Ne khungaaki khwa buli likaari khwaba khwabotookhelesibwa ne kumukhandaala kukwaba buniina sitonyi sie sifuba silala. Ne khungaaki khwe likaari ne biyeeta likaari ne bibaanga bialio biaba busa nga siindu silala.
Khungaaki khwe biyeeta likaari ne khu bibaanga khwaronwa ne bifwaani bie chikerubi, chitalang'i ne kimikheendu, khuloondekhana ne bubweyaangu bwabio ne bimuli biabotookhelela.
Mu ngila yino, Huramu akhola kamakaari ekhumi. Koosi kakholwa ne kumukasa. Kafwaanana, ne khulekhaana.
Ara kamakaari karaano lubeka lwe ebunafubo lwe Lukaangu, ne karaano kaba lubeka lwe ebunaswa. Mala ara litangi lubeka akari we ebunafubo ne ebukwe we nju.
Huramu lundi akhola chinyuungu, chimbako ne bibuumba. Nio Huramu amalila elala kumulimo kwewe kwoosi nikwo akholela omwami Solomoni mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bino nibio akhola: bisiindi bibili, bibuumba bibili bie khu ngaaki khwe bisiindi, bunabi bubili bwe lutimba lulwanabwa lwafwaana nga kumunyololo khu ngaaki khwa buli sibuumba,
bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga ke kumukasa chimia chine karekekhwa mu lutimba lwe kumunyololo kabotookhelesia sifwaani khu ngaaki khwe sibuumba,
kamakaari ekhumi ne chinjikha ekhumi khu ngaaki khwe kamakaari.
Akhola litangi ne chiuunwa ekhumi ne chibili asi we litangi.
Huramu lundi akhola chinyuungu, chimbako ne bibuumba bie khuura mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bino bioosi biaronwa ne kumukasa.
Omwami Solomoni abichukha bino bioosi mu bibuumba bie liloba bibiakholwa mu mweyeeywe kwa Yoritani akari wa Sukoti ne Saretani.
Solomoni se akela bibiindu bie kumukasa bino tawe, sikila biaba bikali lukali ne khwako busiro bwabio se bwamanyikha tawe.
biteetwe ekhumi bie esahabu, biraano ebunafubo ne biraano ebunaswa we Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, bimuli, chitaa ne chimbani che esahabu,
chiseesi, kamakaasi kakhala chindaambi, bibuumba, bipwakuli bie khurakho bimuli biiunya kumuuya kumulayi, ne chinjo chisuta kamanda ke kumulilo. Biakholwa khukhwama khu sahabu. Akhola bupata bwe kimiliango kie Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali nende bwe kimiliango kie Lukaangu.

Babaandu boosi bebuusia alala khu Solomoni mu siise sia Naikara eye Bisali. Kwaba kumwesi kwa saba, kulaangwa kwa Etanimu.
Nga basaakhulu boosi ne bebuusia alala, basaayi basuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bareera Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne liiema lie kumuse ne bibiindu bitakatifu bioosi bibiaba mu liiema, mu Lukaangu. Basaayi ne Balawi babireera.
Omwami Solomoni ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli bebuusia alala ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala baana chimbosio che kamakheese kamakali ne chikhaafu chingali, biikhabalikha tawe.
Nio basaayi bayila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Lukaangu mala balira Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, asi we chindaa che chikerubi.
Bifwaani bie chikerubi biabalaaya chindaa chabio chabiimba Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ne bisiindi bie khu lisuta.
Ne bisiindi biabonekha khukhwama Abuundu Atakatifu, mu Lukaangu mukari. Ne kakhali se biabonekha khukhwama enje tawe. Bisiindi ebio bisiliio khukhwola luno.
Sisiindu se siaba mu Lisanduku lie Ndakaano tawe, ne kakhali kamabaale kabili niko Musa aramo, ne ali e Horebu. A Horebu ao niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola endakaano ne Baisiraeli nga baba ne bama e Misiri.
Basaayi se banyala khukhola kimilimo kiabwe sikila luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwechusia enju yewe.
Nio Solomoni aloma ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areere enyanga khwikulu,
ne kakhali alomile ali acha khumenya mu siilima sikali.
Nakhwombakhiile Lukaangu lulayi
abuundu niio ewe omenya mindali na mindali.”
Nga babaandu ne baba ne bemile ao, omwami Solomoni ayuukha abalola mala ababiita chikhabi.
Aaloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele owa Isiraeli. Akholile niko alaka Paapa wase Daudi. Aaloma ali,
‘Khukhwama endaalo niio narusiliamo babaandu base Isiraeli mu Misiri, se naroborakho lukoba lwosi lwosi mu kholo cha Isiraeli choosi nimwo Lukaangu lunyala lwombakhwa tawe, lundi se naroborakho niio lisina liase linyala liamanyikhana tawe. Ne kakhali narobora Daudi amiie babaandu base Isiraeli.’
Nono paapa wase Daudi enya khukhwombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli enju.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela paapa wase Daudi ali, ‘Bwaba bulayi ewe khukhwibaasia khukhunjombakhila enju.
Ne kakhali se ocha khukhwombakha tawe. Omusoleeli wowo niye olisaala niye oliinjombakhila enju.’
“Ne luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amalile khukhwichusia endakaano niyo akhola. Ese nelileo mu bweyaangu bwa paapa wase Daudi. Nekhaliile endebe eye bubwami eya Isiraeli, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka ne nombakhiile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli enju.
Mu Lukaangu omwo nakholile abuundu we khura Lisanduku lie endakaano lilimo endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ne bakuuka befwe nga ne abarusia mu Misiri.”
Nio Solomoni eema ebweeni owa alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Baisiraeli boosi ne baloleleele. Asuta kamakhono kewe mungaaki
mala asaba ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, mbao Wele nga ewe mwikulu mungaaki namwe asi khu liloba tawe. Ewe oliinda endakaano yowo ne babaandu bowo mala wekesianga busiime bwowo buchiililila busa khu bakholi bowo bakeenda ebweeni wowo ne kimiooyo kiabwe kioosi.
Waliindile endakaano niyo walaka paapa wase Daudi. Endaalo eya luno buli likhuwa liamalile khukhwichusibwa.
Nono luno, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, liinda endakaano niyo walaka paapa wase. Waloma oli buli lwosi acha khubao omundu mulala khu be lisaaye liewe oliamiia Baisiraeli, yaaba bali lisaaye lino likhuria ewe nga paapa wase ne akhuria ewe.
Nono, Ee Wele owa Isiraeli, lekha likhuwa liowo nilio walaka paapa wase Daudi, omukholi wowo, libe lia ng'ali.
Ne kakhali ulila lisaba ne lilienya liase. Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase ulila liilila ne lisaba lio mukholi wowo nilio asaba ebweeni wowo luno.
Liinda Lukaangu luno siilo ne kumuusi, abuundu niio ewe warobora khusaayilao. Ulila lisaba nilio esaba abuundu ano.
Ne ulila lilienya lio mukholi wowo nende lie babaandu bowo Isiraeli ne basaba ne baloleelela ano. Ne basaba, ulila khukhwama mwikulu niio omenyile mala ne oulila khubeele.
“Kaaba bali omundu akholeele owasie kamabi, alireerwa a alutare mu Lukaangu muno. Aaba ne echuba ali se ali ne kumusaango tawe,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu, mala okhalake kumusaango oaane kumunaanio khu mundu okholile kamabi. Ne olekhuule okhakholile kamabi tawe.
“Babaandu bowo Isiraeli ne bakhukholela kamamayaanu baliuulwa ne basiku baabwe. Ne kakhali baaba ne bakhukobolela mala bafukiilila lisina liowo mala basaba ne baboola lilienya liabwe mu Lukaangu luno,
nio baulile khukhwama mwikulu. Beela babaandu bowo Baisiraeli kamamayaanu mala obakalusie mu sibala nisio waelesia bakuuka baabwe.
“Ne bakhukholela kamamayaanu, olikhiingilila efula khukwa khu maloba kabwe. Ne baaba ne bakhusaba ne baloleleele abuundu ano, ne bafukiilila lisina liowo mala ne balekha kamamayaanu kabwe,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu mala obabeele bumayaanu bwabwe. Bekesie engila endayi niyo bakhoya khuloonda. Nio aana efula khu maloba kano, niko waelesia babaandu bowo nga kumukabwa kwabwe.
“Biise bilala enjala eliba mu sibala, namwe lufu, namwe siimiyu, namwe ebarafu, namwe bipupu bie chisike, namwe basiku balibebwaakala, namwe baliba ne bulwaale.
Lisaba liosi liosi namwe lilienya lisabwa no mundu yesi yesi namwe ne babaandu bowo boosi ba Isiraeli, buli mulala mu bubeeleli bwewe, ne asuta kamakhono kewe mu lisaba khulosia khu Lukaangu luno,
ulila lisaba liewe khukhwama mwikulu abuundu niio omenyile. Mubeele mala omuyeete nga nilwo omanyile kumwoyo kwewe ne chingila chewe choosi. Ewe weng'ene omanyile kamebaasio ke kumwoyo kwa buli mundu.
Bakholele orio nio babaandu bowo boole khukhuria siise sioosi nisio bamenya mu maloba niko waelesia bakuuka befwe.
“Ne lundi omureende, ne aliama mu sibala sie aleeyi, sikila efuma yowo,
(Sikila baliulila ke lisina liowo lili likali ne kamaani kowo) aliicha khusaba mu Lukaangu luno.
Ne alisaba, rekeeresia lisaba liewe khukhwama mwikulu, niio omenyile. Khola koosi khuloondekhana nga omureende oyo ne akhusabile. Ne okhola orio babaandu boosi be khu liloba balamanya lisina liowo mala bakhurie. Balikhuria nga babaandu bowo Baisiraeli mala bamanye bali enju yino niyo nombaakhe elaangwa khwisina liowo.
“Nga babaandu bowo bacha mwiie khu khuupana ne basiku babwe, lubeka lwosi lwosi nilwo obaruma, mala ne basaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baloleleele lukoba nilwo ewe warobora, ne Lukaangu luno nilwo ekhwombakhiile,
rekeeresia lisaba ne lilienya liabwe. Baulile mala obae bukhili.
“Ne balikhukholela kamamayaanu, sikila se aliio omundu akhaba mulala okhakhola kamamayaanu tawe, mu lirima liowo olilekha basiku baabwe babakhile mala babaambe babayile mu sibala sisiindi, siili aleeyi.
Ne kakhali babaandu bowo ne balisaba khwiwe mu sibala sie embaambe esio bekanile ne bebiiya, ne baloma bali ‘Khwakholile bubwoni, khwekhiikhile khwakholile bumayaanu’
Balibiiya ne kumwoyo kwoosi mu sibala sie basiku baabwe bababaamba embaambe. Balisaba khwiwe ne baloleleele sibala siabwe nisio ewe waelesia bakuuka baabwe. Baliloleleela lukoba nilwo warobora ne Lukaangu nilwo ese khwombakhiile.
Ne bakhola bario, ulila lisaba ne lilienya liabwe khukhwama mwikulu nimwo omenyile mala obayeete.
Beela babaandu bowo bakholile bumayaanu. Khola basiku baabwe ba babaamba mu mambe, babakholele siisa.
(Bakholele orio sikila bano bali babaandu bowo lundi kumukabwa kwowo, nibo warusia mu Misiri, mu siooso sie bichuuma.)
“Bona lilienya lio mukholi wowo ne lilienya lie babaandu bowo Isiraeli. Barekereesie buli lwosi ne bakhusaba.
Ewe wabarobora khukhwama mu baandu boosi be khu liloba, babe kumukabwa kwowo, nga ne waloma khubirira khu mukholi wowo Musa, nga ne warusia bakuuka befwe e Misiri ee Omwami WELE.”
Solomoni ne amalile khusaba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, eema ebweeni wa alutare niio aaba ne asikaame ne khusuta kamakhono mungaaki.
Eema mala abiita libuusiana lie Baisiraeli lioosi chikhabi ne kumumilo kwe angaaki. Aloma ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume oele babaandu bewe Isiraeli kumuleembe, khuloondekhana nende koosi niko aalaka. Mbaao liosi liosi khu makhuwa kamalayi koosi niko alaka khubirira khu mukholi wewe Musa, likhekholekha tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe abe ne nafwe nga ne aaba ne bakuuka befwe. Se akhoya akhulekha namwe akhumwaata tawe,
nio akhole kimiooyo kiefwe kimurie, khukeenda mungila chewe mala khurie kamalaka kewe niko aalaka bakuuka befwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ulila lisaba liase silo ne kumuusi. Okhoya wanjeeta ese ne babaandu bowo Isiraeli, buli endaalo.
Nio chikholo choosi che liloba chimanye chili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele ne se aliio okundi tawe.
Mukhoya mwaba ba ng'ali elala khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, ne mukeenda mu ngila chewe ne muria kamalaka kewe nga ne mulikho mukhola luno.”
Nio omwami Solomoni ne Isiraeli yoosi, baana chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Solomoni aana chikhaafu chielefu shurina mbili ne kamakheese chielefu mia mocha shurini nga biianwa bie kumuleembe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio, omwami ne babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli bara Lukaangu mu wakifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Endaalo ng'ene eyo, omwami aara mu wakifu akari we luuya ebweeni we nju eyo Mwami Wele, sikila ao niio aanilanga biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie biakhulia bie likesa ne kiminaawa kie biianwa bie kumuleembe. Akhola ario sikila alutare eye kumukasa, eyaba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba engeekhe lukali. Yaba se enyala khubukula biianwa bino bioosi tawe.
Nio Solomoni akhola naikara eye bisali mu siise esio ne Baisiraeli boosi. Baaba libuusiana likali khukhwama asilibwa sia Hamati khukhwola a kheechi kha Misiri. Naikara yino yakholwa khu ndaalo saba
Khu ndaalo ekhola munane, Solomoni alekha babaandu bacha chingo chabwe. Babaandu boosi babiita omwami Solomoni chikhabi mala bakobola engo ne bekhoya ne khusangaalila bulayi nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekesia Daudi, omukholi wewe, ne babaandu bewe Isiraeli.

Omwami Solomoni amala khukhwombakha Lukaangu ne lichipi nende buli siindu nisio enya khukhwombakha.
Enyuma wako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubonekhela lukhola khabili nga nilwo amubonekhela e Kibeoni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Nauliile lisaba liowo ne lilienya liowo nga ne osabile ebweeni wase. Nakholile Lukaangu nilwo wombaakhe luno khuba lutakatifu lundi nga abuundu niio ese ndiba. Ndaluloleelela ne khululiinda khulwe biise bioosi.
Ne ewe keenda nga paapa wowo Daudi. Daudi aaba ne kumwoyo kumulayi lundi owa ng'ali khola koosi niko akhulakile. Ria endakaano yase.
Wakhola orio, nja khulumia bubwami bwowo khu Isiraeli khulwa mindali nga nalaka paapa wowo Daudi. Nalaka Daudi ndi, ‘Buli lwosi omundu se alitambao khukhwama khu luuya lwowo oliikhala khu ndebe eye bubwami khuruka Isiraeli tawe.’
Ne kaaba bali ewe namwe lisaaye liowo mungalukhanakho ne khulekha khuria kamalaka kaase niko ekhuele mala wesaaya bawele babaandi,
aba ndauuya babaandu base Isiraeli khukhwama mu sibala nisio mbaeele. Lundi nja khwanjukha Lukaangu luno nilwo nauule nga Abuundu Atakatifu. Ne Baisiraeli bacha khuba lusimo ne silolelo mu kholo choosi.
Ne Lukaangu luno lulaba situuta sie bubwonaki
Nio babaandu balikobosia bali, ‘Sikila barura khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe owarusia bakuuka baabwe mu Misiri. Besaaya bawele babaandi, mala babesaaya ne khubakholela. Esino nisio sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne areera butinyu buno khu nibo.’ ”
Solomoni ombakha Lukaangu lwu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lichipi liewe khu miiko kamakhumi kabili.
Omwami Hiramu owe Tiro amua kimirongooro kie kimitarakwa, Saipurasi ne esahabu bioosi nga nilwo enya khulwe kumulimo kuno. Nga kumuruungo, omwami Solomoni aelesia Hiramu chingoba kamakhumi kabili che mu sibala sia Kalilaya.
Ne kakhali Hiramu acha khukhwama e Tiro khulola chingoba nicho Solomoni aba ne amueele. Ne se chamusiimisia tawe.
Nio areeba Solomoni ali, “Wandaayase, ngoba siina nicho umbeele chino?” Nio chingoba echo chalaangwa bali Kabuli
Hiramu aba arumira Solomoni esahabu chikiilo chielefu chine.
Oluno luli lukano lwe kimilimo kie khuyingilila nikio Solomoni akhola ne arakho babaandu khukhwombakha Lukaangu ne lichipi liewe. Ombakha lundi kimiliinda ne kamasiisi ke chingoba cha Yerusalemu, Hasori, Magido ne Keseri.
(Omwami Farao owa Misiri aba aamba lukoba lwa Keseri mala alwosia. Era Bakanaani, babamenyamo. Nio aluaana nga kumuruungo kwe bukhwe khu mukhaana wewe, mukha Solomoni.
Nio Solomoni alwombakha lundi.) Lundi Solomoni ombakha lukoba lwe e mwalo Beti-horoni,
Baalati, Tamari, mu sichiimi sie Yuda,
ne chingoba che kamabiikhilo ne chingoba che kamakaari ke kamae ne chingoba che banamae be chifarasi nende buli sisiindu nisio enya khukhwombakha mu Yerusalemu, mu Lebanoni ne osi osi mu bwami bwewe.
Babamo mu sibala babaandu babaandi bakhaaba Baisiraeli tawe. Abano baba Baamori, Bahiti, Baperisi, Bahibi ne Bayebusi.
Baaba lisaaye lie babaandu nibo Baisiraeli bakheera tawe. Solomoni abayingiilila bamukholele kimilimo nga nasioobi. Basiikhola khukhwola luno.
Ne kakhali Solomoni se akhola Baisiraeli baba banasioobi tawe. Abakhola khuba nga Banamae, bakholi, babemeelesi be liie, banamae bewe, babemeelesi be kamakaari ke kamae, ne batimia chifarasi.
Babao babemeelesi bakhulu chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi karaano nibo Solomoni aelesia kumulimo kwe khukhwimeelela babaandu babakholaanga kimilimo.
Ne mukha Solomoni omukhaana owa Farao, auuya mu Lukoba lwa Daudi mala acha engisia lichipi liewe nilio Solomoni amwombakhila. Nio Solomoni ombakha kimiliinda.
Omwami Solomoni ombakha lituuli lie chimeeli e Esioni-geberi, embi ne Eloti khu sikiingi sie Nyanja eya Shamu, mu sibala sie Edomu.
Ne omwami Hiramu aruma bakholi bewe, babaandereba be chimeeli, bamanyile kimilimo kie khu nyanja bache alala ne bakholi ba Solomoni.
Bacha bola e Ofiri, bareerayo esahabu chikiilo chielefu ekhumi na chine.

Echa ne sipupu siboofu sie babaandu, ne chingamia chichasuta bing'ayilisia bulayi, esahabu engali ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Nga omukhasi oyo ne ola khu Solomoni amuboolela koosi kakaba mu mebaasio kewe.
Ne Solomoni akobosia kamareeba kewe koosi. Se siabao sisiindu siosi siosi sisiekisa khu Solomoni siamukhaya khumwinoosiela tawe.
Kwini owa Sheba abona bukesi bwa Solomoni, ne lichipi nilio aba ne ombaakhe,
biakhulia bie khu sialwa sia Solomoni, bubwikhalo bwe bakholi bewe bakhulu, kimilimo kie bakholi bewe chingubo nicho bafwara, bakholi babasutanga eseesi eyo omwami, ne chimbosio che khukhwosia nicho aanila mu Lukaangu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bino bioosi biakhola omwami owa Sheba arangararwa.
Aboolela omwami Solomoni ali, “Niko naulila mu sibala siase khu makhuwa kowo
Ne kakhali se nafukiilila niko naulila tawe khukhwola nga ne nichile mala samwene nakabona. Ne khane se naulilakho akhaba sitonyi tawe. Bukesi bwowo, ne buiinda bwowo buli bukali khukhila niko naulila.
Bakhasi bowo
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo afume osiimisiibwe ne nawe ne khukhura ewe khu ndebe eye bubwami mu Isiraeli. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima Isiraeli khulwa mindali, akhukhola ewe omwami nio okhole ka ng'ali ne buluungi.”
Nio Kwini oyo aelesia omwami Solomoni esahabu chikiilo chielefu chine, ne bing'ayilisia bulayi bikali, ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Solomoni se anyoolakho lundi bing'ayilisia bulayi bikali nga nibio Kwini owa Sheba amuelesia tawe.
(Khutasa khwako chimeeli cha Hiramu chareera esahabu khukhwama e Ofiri, lundi chareera khukhwama ebweeneyo kimirongooro kimikali kie kumusandali ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki.
Solomoni arumikhira bisiindi ebio khukhola bisiindi bie Lukaangu ne lichipi, ne lundi khukhola biilili ne kamatuungu ke babeembi be kimienya. Kimisandali kikiindi se kiareerwakho namwe kiabonekhakho mu Isiraeli, khukhwola luno tawe.)
Omwami Solomoni aelesia Kwini owa Sheba buli sisiindu nisio enya khutasa khu biianwa nibio aaba ne amuelesie. Nio Kwini oyo ne bakholi bewe bakobola mu sibala sia Sheba.
Nono omwami Solomoni anyoola buli mwiiko esahabu embi chikiilo chielefu shurini na chitaru.
Esahabu yino yatuba khu eyo eyamaanga khu baboofuli ne bakeendakeenda, bukhala ne busuuru nibwo babaami be sibala sia Arebia baruunga ne babemeelesi be sibala.
Solomoni akhola chingabo chimbalaayi chimia chibili khukhwama khu sahabu. Buli engabo yakholwa khukhwama khu sahabu embi chikiilo saba.
Lundi akhola chingabo chichiindi chimia chitaru che esahabu mala buli ndala yakholwa khukhwama khu sahabu embi chikiilo chibili. Solomoni ara bibiindu ebio mwichipi lie mu musiru kwe e Lebanoni.
Omwami lundi akhola endebe emboofu eye bubwami eye kumusaanga mala akifuumakho esahabu enosie nukhu.
Endebe eye bubwami yaba ne bituumi sita bie khuniinilakho. Ne enyuma wayo siabao sifwaani sie kumurwe kwe euunwa. Buli lubeka lwe endebe lwabakho kamakhono kabili ke khuolelakho. Ne bifwaani bie chitalang'i bibili biema a makhono chana ako.
Bifwaani bie chitalang'i ekhumi ne bibili biema, buli bibili lubeka ne lubeka ekhutabusia khwe situumi, khu bituumi sita. Endebe nga yino eri se yakholwakho mu bwami bwosi bwosi tawe.
Chiseesi cha Solomoni choosi che khunywelamo chaba che esahabu. Ne bibiindu bioosi bie mu lichipi lie kumusiru kwa Lebanoni biaba bie esahabu tikinyi: Mbao sisiaba sie efwesa tawe, sikila efwesa se yabalwa khuba eye bukhala bwosi bwosi mu ndaalo cha Solomoni tawe.
Omwami aba ne kamatuuli ke chimeeli khu nyanja ne kamatuuli ke chimeeli cha Hiramu. Buli enyuma we kimiiko kitaru, kamatuuli ke chimeeli chewe kareeranga esahabu, efwesa, kimisaanga, wambumuli ne chinguke.
Nono omwami Solomoni aba omuiinda lundi omukesi khukhila omwami okundi yesi yesi owe khu liloba.
Ne babaandu be liloba lioosi benyanga khukhwicha mala barekeeresie bukesi nibwo Wele amua.
Buli mulala owecha amureerera siianwa, bibiindu bie efwesa ne esahabu, chingubo, biiunya bulayi, bing'ayilisianga bulayi, chifarasi ne chinyumbu. Bino biechanga buli mwiiko.
Nio omwami akhola efwesa yaba esala busa buli abuundu mu Yerusalemu nga kamabaale. Ne chimbao che kumutarakwa chaba chingali busa nga kimikhuyu kie Shefela.
Solomoni akulaanga chifarasi khukhwama e Misiri
Likaari lie liie liakulibwaanga khukhwama e Misiri khu bukusi bwe efwesa chikiilo embi saba, ne efarasi yakulibwaanga efwesa chikiilo chibili. Nio khubirira khu boofuli bo mwami, kamakaari ke liie ne chifarasi biakusibwa khu baami be Bahiti ne Bashamu boosi.

Niye abakhwa, akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akaania Baisiraeli ali, “Mukhakhwana tawe, sikila ng'ali bacha khumuyuusia enywe muloonde bawele baabwe.” Solomoni naye abasiima lukali.
Solomoni akhwa bakhasi chimia saba khukhwama mu chinju che bubwami lundi aba ne bakhasi babaandi chimia chitaru nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale. Ne bakhasi bewe bamwausia khukhwama khu Wele.
Ne nga asaakhuluwa, bakhasi bewe bamukhola esaaya bawele be chikholo chichiindi. Kumwoyo kwewe se kwaba kwa ng'ali elala khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe, nga raraawe Daudi ne aaba tawe.
Esaaya Ashitoreti, wele owe Basidoni ne Milikomu, wele osinyisia lukali owe Baamoni.
Nono Solomoni akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se aloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi elala nga raraawe Daudi ne aba tawe.
Nio ombakha abuundu aesuta khulwe khukhwisaayila Komeshi, wele osinyisia lukali owe Bamoabu ne abuundu we khukhwisaaya Moleki, wele osinyisia lukali owe Baamoni khu sikulu ebukwe owa Yerusalemu.
Ombakhila bakhasi bewe boosi bakhaaba Baisiraeli tawe abuundu e khukhwisaayila niio banyala khukhwosielia bibiindu biiunya bulayi ne khuanilao chimbosio khu bawele babwe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalalila Solomoni sikila kumwoyo kwewe kwaba kwaukhe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, owaba ne amubonekheele khukhwola khabili.
Wele aba amulaka khu likhuwa lino ne liliene ali okhaloonda bawele babaandi tawe. Ne se aria nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka tawe.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Sikila lino liabeele munganakani mwowo ne se wakholile nga endakaano yase ne yenyekhana nga nakhulaka tawe, ng'ali nja khukhubukula bubwami mala mbuelesie khu mukholi wowo.
Ne kakhaba kario, sikila paapa wowo Daudi, se endakhola lino ne osiili omulamu tawe. Ne kakhali ndakhola ndio mu siise sie bubwami bwo mwana wowo owe sisoleeli.
Kakhaba kario, se endabukula bubwami bwoosi tawe. Ne kakhali ndalekhela omwana wowo ekholo ndala sikila omukholi wase Daudi ne khulwe lukoba lwa Yerusalemu nilwo narobora.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Hadadi Omuedomu owe enju eye bubwami eya Edomu khuba omusiku owa Solomoni.
Khaale kano ne kakhabao tawe, Daudi aula Edomu. Yoabu komanda owe banamae bewe aba achiileyo khusiikha bafu. Yoabu eera buli mundu owe siseecha oli mu Edomu.
(Yoabu ne Isiraeli boosi bamenya Edomu khu miesi sita, mala beera buli mundu owe siseecha mu Edomu).
Ne kakhali Hadadi ne bakholi balala ba raraawe, Baedomu belukhila e Misiri. Mu siise esio Hadadi aba asiili omwana omukeekhe.
Barekukha khukhwama e Midiani mala bacha e Parani. E Parani babukulayo babaandu babaandi bacha ne nabo e Misiri khu Farao omwami owe Misiri. Farao aelesia Hadadi enju ne siakhulia ne amua kamaloba.
Hadadi asiimisia Farao, mala Farao amuakhila mulamue, owaba wandaaye owa Tahipanihesi, (Tahipanihesi aba mukha Farao.)
Wandaaye owa Tahipanihesi asaalila Hadadi omwana owe sisoleeli bali Kenubati. Tahipanihesi mukho omwami amukhusilia mwichipi lia Farao. Kenubati akhulila mwichipi lia Farao alala ne babaana ba Farao.
Hadadi aulila ali Daudi afwa. Lundi aulila ali Yoabu, komanda owe banamae yesi afwa. Hadadi aboolela Farao ali, “Lekha ngobole mu sibala siase.”
Ne kakhali Farao amureeba ali, “Siina nisio otaambile nisio ekhakhueele tawe sikila ne wenya khukobola mu sibala siowo?”
Hadadi akobosia Farao ali, “Ndekhe busa nje,”
Lundi Wele akhola Resoni okhwa Eliada khuba omusiku owa Solomoni. Resoni aba ayilukha khukhwama khu mukhulu wewe, omwami Hadadeseri owa Soba.
Resoni ayiima sipupu sie babaandu mala aba omwimeelesi owe sipupu sino sisiaba sie khukeendakeenda ne khukhwiiba. (Lino liakholekha enyuma, Daudi ne aulile Hadadeseri omwami owa Soba mala eera basaale ba Hadadeseri, Bashamu.) Resoni ne babaandu bewe bacha mala bamenya mu Damasika, niio babaandu bewe bamwaamiisia mu Damasika.
Aba omusiku owa Isiraeli mu bulamu bwa Solomoni bwoosi. Akhola kamabi nga Hadadi ne akhola. Abiila Isiraeli. Amiia khu Shamu
Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati aba mulala khu bemeelesi ba Solomoni. Aba omuefurahimu khukhwama e Sereta. Aba omwana owa namulekhwa bali Serua. Yeroboamu akaluukhana khu mwami Solomoni.
Oluno nilwo lukano lulwekesia nga ne akaluukhana khu mwami: Solomoni ombakha kimiliinda mala afuunikha bibaanga bie lukoba lwa raraawe Daudi.
Yeroboamu aba omusoleeli onyala. Nga Solomoni amubona ali akhola kimilimo ne kamaani, amukhola khuba omwimeelesi owe kimilimo kioosi kie ekholo eya Yosefu.
Endaalo ndala, nga Yeroboamu ne aba ne ali khu lukeendo lwe khukhwama e Yerusalemu, omung'oosi Ahiya, omushilo amwakaanana khu ngila. Nono Ahiya aba afwarire engubo embia. Ne baaba boombi bong'ene abuwaanga.
Ahiya efuula ekutuusi yewe embia niyo aba ne afwaarire akitabulamo bitonyi ekhumi na bibili.
Mala aboolela Yeroboamu ali, “Yibukulila bitonyi ekhumi, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Lola, Ese endikho nja khubukula Solomoni bubwami, mala ndikhua ewe chikholo ekhumi.
Solomoni alarama ne ekholo ndala khulwe omukholi wase Daudi ne Yerusalemu, lukoba nilwo samwene narobora khukhwama mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi.
Endikho nja khukhola lino sikila Solomoni andekhile ese mala esaayile
Kakhaba kario se ndabukula Solomoni bubwami bwoosi tawe. Ne kakhali ndamulekha amiie mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi. Ndakhola lino sikila omukholi wase Daudi, niye samwene narobora mala owaria kamalaka kaase.
Ne kakhali khabukule omwana owa Solomoni bubwami mala ekhue ewe chikholo ekhumi.
Ekharamisilie okhwa Solomoni ekholo ndala, nio buli lwosi mbe ne owe lisaaye lio omukholi owase Daudi ne amiia mu Yerusalemu, lukoba nilwo narobora nga abuundu niio nisaayilwao.
Ne ewe Yeroboamu, ndakhubukula, mala oliamiia khu buli nisio wenya. Ne oliba omwami owa Isiraeli.
Waaba ne oria elala niko ekhulaka mala okeende mu malaka kaase ne khukhola kali kang'ali ebweeni wase nga omukholi wase Daudi, ndaba ne nawe. Ndakhukhola luuya luchiililila lwe babaami, nga nakholela Daudi. Ndikhua Isiraeli.
Sikila bumayaanu bwa Solomoni ndipia sibi be nju eya Daudi ne kakhali se endikhola ndio mindali tawe.’ ”
Khwako Solomoni akhaka khukhwira Yeroboamu. Ne kakhali Yeroboamu amulila wo mwami Shishaki owa Misiri mala amenyayo khukhwola nga Solomoni ne afwa.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Solomoni akhola, bikholwa bie bukesi bwewe, bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie Bikholwa bia Solomoni.
Siise nisio omwami Solomoni amiia Yerusalemu, khu Baisiraeli boosi siaba kimiiko kamakhumi kane.
Solomoni afwa mala asiikhwa mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Omwana wewe owe sisoleeli Rehoboamu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Rehoboamu acha e Shekemu, niio babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli baba ne bebuusiisie bamukhole abe omwami.
Ne nga Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati aulila kamakhuwa kano (aba amulila e Misiri, khukhwilukha omwami Solomoni), akobola khukhwama e Misiri.
Babaandu bamulaanga mala boosi alala bacha khu Rehoboamu bamuboolela bali,
“Paapa wowo Solomoni akhukhosia efwe kimilimo kimiaandalafu. Nono yanguya busiro bwe kimilimo kia paapa wowo ne efwe khulaba bakholi bowo.”
Abakobosia ali, “Cha mala mukobole enyuma we chindaalo chitaru.” Nio babaandu barekukha.
Nio omwami Rehoboamu areeba basaakhulu ba baaba bakeleki ba raraawe Solomoni ali, “Enywe mungelekela ngobosie babaandu bano ndiena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Waaba ne wenya khuba omukholi owe babaandu mala obakholele bulayi, bakobosie likobosia lilayi khu lireeba liabwe, mala buli lwosi baliba bakholi bowo.”
Ne kakhali Rehoboamu alekelesia likeleka lie basaakhulu, mala acha khu baele babachoa ne naye, mala baba luno bakeleki bewe.
Abareeba ali, “Enywe mungelekela khukobosie khuriena babaandu babandeebire bali mbanguisilie busiro bwabwe nibwo bali paapa wase abarakho?”
Baele abo bamukobosia bali, “lino nilio olaboolela babaandu bano: ‘Lulwala lwase lwasobi luli luboofu khukhila mu sibuno mwa paapa wase.
Paapa wase amutiuukha busiro bukali, ese endamutasa busiro khukhilakho. Amupila biboko, ne ese ndamurakho walute bimulume.’ ”
Nono Yeroboamu ne babaandu boosi bakobola khu mwami Rehoboamu endaalo ekhola khataru nga ne abalaka.
Omwami akobosia babaandu ne bukhalafu bukali. Alekelesia likeleka lie basaakhulu nilio bamuboolela.
Aboolela babaandu khuloondekhana ne likeleka lie baele. Aloma ali, “Paapa wase amutiuukha busiro ne ese ndabutasa khukhilakho. Amupila biboko, ne ese ndamurakho walute bimulume.”
Omwami se arekeeresia babaandu tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owakhola kaba kario nio echusie likhuwa liewe nilio aloma khubirira khu Ahiya omushilo khu Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati.
“Efwe khuli na mukabwa siina munju eya Daudi!
Se khuli ne kumukabwa mu okhwa Chesi tawe?
Kobola mu maeema kenywe, Ee Isiraeli!
Liinda enju yowo wamwene Daudi.”
Nio Baisiraeli bakobola mu maeema kabwe,
ne kakhali Rehoboamu amiia khu baandu Baisiraeli ba baamenya mu ngoba cha Yuda.
Nio omwami Rehoboamu aruma Adoramu, owaba omwimeelesi owe kimilimo kie khuyingililwa, khucha khu Baisiraeli. Ne Baisiraeli bamupa kamabaale bamwiira. Nio Rehoboamu akhola khangu aniina mu likaari liewe lie liie mala elukha acha e Yerusalemu.
Khukhwamila khu siise esio, Baisiraeli balobela elala enju eya Daudi khukhwola luno.
Nga Baisiraeli boosi baulila bali Yeroboamu akobole khukhwama e Misiri, bamulaanga mu libuusiana lie babaandu mala bamukhola khuba omwami owa Isiraeli yoosi. Mbao ekholo ekiindi eyaloonda enju eya Daudi, ne ekhali ekholo eya Yuda tawe.
