Nga Rehoboamu ne ola mu Yerusalemu, alaanga alala babaandu boosi ba Yuda ne ekholo eya Benjamini. Baba babaandu chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi munane, banamae barobore khukhupana ne Baisiraeli. Benya khukhupana bakobosie bubwami khu Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni.
Ne kakhali elomo eya Wele yecha khu mung'oosi shemaya eli,
“Boolela Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni, omwami owa Yuda ne nabo boosi be enju eya Yuda ne Benjamini kano.
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, se okhoya wacha wapana ne balebe bowo ba Isiraeli tawe. Buli mundu akobole engo wewe. Sikila likhuwa lino liamile khwise.’ ” Nio boosi baria likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bakobola engo lundi khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Yeroboamu ombakha lukoba lwa Shekemu mu sibala sie bikulu sie Efuraimu mala amenyayo. Arekukha khukhwama ebweeneyo acha ombakha lukoba lwa Penueli.
Nio Yeroboamu ebaasia mu mwoyo kwewe ali, “Luno bubwami bunyala bwakobola munju eya Daudi,
kaaba bali babaandu bano balachiililila khuaana chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Lukaangu e Yerusalemu. Kimiooyo kie babaandu bano kilakobola khu mwami wabwe Rehoboamu lundi. Balanjira ese mala bakobole khu Rehoboamu omwami owa Yuda.”
Emia sifwaani silala mu Beteli ne sisiindi mu Dani.
Likhuwa elio liaba bumayaanu sikila babaandu balala bacha khukhwisaaya sifwaani e Beteli ne babaandi e Dani.
Lundi Yeroboamu ombakha chinju abuundu aesuta mala arobora basaayi khukhwama mu baandu boosi bakhaaba Balawi tawe.
Acha khu alutare niyo akhola e Beteli khu ndaalo eye ekhumi ne chiraano eye kumwesi kwa munane, endaalo niyo niye omwene aba ne ereereo. Arao naikara khu baandu ba Isiraeli, mala acha khu alutare osia bibiindu biiunya bulayi.

Omundu owa Wele echa e Beteli khukhwama Yuda ne arumiirwe ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Yeroboamu aaba amile a alutare khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, alilila a alutare ali, “Ee alutare, alutare, kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma: ‘Omwana alisaalwa munju eya Daudi. Lisina liewe liliba Yosia. Alikhwirirakho basaayi be abuundu aesuta, baana bibiindu biiunya bulayi khwiwe. Kamakuumba ke babaandu kaliosibwa khwiwe.’ ”
Omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chana aana simanyisio endaalo eyo eng'ene ne aloma ali, “Esino nisio simanyisio nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile, ‘Alutare yino echa khwatikhamo bitonyi. Likokhe likilikho likhachukhwe.’ ”
Nga omwami Yeroboamu ne aulila ko omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko aalila sikila alutare eyaba e Beteli, amwekeselela kumukhono aloma ali, “Tiila omundu oyo!” Abwene ne abwene kumukhono nikwo okeselela kwooma mala akhilwa khukukobosiayo.
Alutare yatikhamo mala likokhe liachichukha asi nga omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oyo ne aarusia simanyisio mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami aboolela omundu owa Wele ali, “Nosiima sabile kumwalaalo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo mala omusabe ambonie kumukhono kwase!” Nio omundu owa Wele asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala kumukhono kwo omwami kwaona.
Omwami aboolela omundu owa Wele ali, “yiicha khuche engo mala oliekho sisiindu ne endakhuelesia kumuruuru.”
Omundu owa Wele oyo amukobosia ali, “Wakhamba sitonyi sie enju yowo se ndacha nawe tawe. Se ndalia namwe nywe kameechi abuundu ano tawe.
Sikila nalakwa ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyaloma eli, ‘Se olalia kumukaati namwe onywe kameechi namwe wileyo khu ngila niyo wichiilekho tawe.’ ”
Nio achiila khu ngila ekiindi ne se achiila khu ngila niyo echelakho e Beteli tawe.
Nono abao omung'oosi omusaakhulu owamenyanga mu Beteli. Basoleeli bewe becha mala bamuboolela koosi niko omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akholile mu Beteli endaalo eyo. Ne lundi bamuboolela kamakhuwa niko aaba ne abooleele omwami Yeroboamu.
Paapa wabwe abareeba ali, “Achiliile khu ngila siina?” Babaana bewe bamwekesia engila niyo omundu owa Wele khukhwama Yuda aachilakho.
Mala ababoolela ali, “Ndekekhere epunda.” Nio bamurekekhera epunda mala akiikhalakho.
Aloonda khu mundu owa Wele amunyoola ekhaale asi we kumukhoonge. Amureeba ali, “Ewe niwe omundu owa Wele owamile e Yuda?”
Omundu oyo amukobosia ali, “Yee, niise.”
Nio amuboolela ali, “yiicha khuche engo khulie siakhulia fwembi.”
Ne kakhali omundu owa Wele amukobosia ali, “Se enyala nakobola engo ne nawe namwe niche munju mwowo tawe. Lundi se nyala nalia namwe nanywa sisiindu siosi siosi abuundu ano ne nawe tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andaka ali, ‘Okhalia namwe onywe sisiindu, namwe okhakobolela khu ngila nikhwo ochiliilekho tawe.’ ”
Nio omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo amuboolela ali, “Ese, sesi ndi omung'oosi nga ewe, ne malaika amboleele elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese khuyile munju mwase mala olie siakhulia ne khunywa kameechi.” Ne kakhali omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo amubea.
Nio omung'oosi khukhwama Yuda akobola acha no mung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo mala alia siakhulia ne naye.
Nga baba ne bekhaale a siaalwa, elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu mung'oosi omusaakhulu
mala alilila omundu owa Wele khukhwama Yuda ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali se wariire likhuwa liewe tawe. Se waliindile lilaka nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhulaka tawe.
Ne kakhali, okoboole mala waliila siakhulia abuundu niio akhulaka ali okhaliilao tawe. Sikila kano, kumubili kwowo se kulasiikhwa mu siliindwa sie enju yenywe tawe.”
Enyuma we khumala khulia ne khunywa, omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo arekekhera omundu owa Wele khukhwama Yuda epunda.
Nga omundu oyo ne aaba ne alikho acha, etalang'i yamwakaanana khungila mala yamwiira. Afwa mala alambaala khu ngila. Epunda eyo ne etalang'i biamwimao.
Babaandu babirao mala babona omufu khu ngila ne etalang'i yamwimileo. Bacha baboola niko babona mu lukoba nimwo omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo amenya.
Nga omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo ne aaulila kano, aloma ali, “Oyo ali omundu owa Wele owaloba khuria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arumire etalang'i yamutabulamo mala yamwiira, khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aamuboolela.”
Nio Omung'oosi omusaakhulu aboolela babaana bewe be sisoleeli ali, “Ndekekhere epunda.” Bamurekekhera.
Mala omusaakhulu acha anyoola omufu alambaalile khu ngila, mala epunda ne etalang'i biamwimileo. Etalang'i se yaba yaliile omufu namwe yatabulaake epunda tawe.
Omung'oosi omusaakhulu oyo abukula omufu amura khu punda yewe mala amukobosia mu lukoba lwa Beteli, khumulila ne khumusiikha.
Amusiikha mu ng'ani yewe eng'ene, mala niye ne babaana bewe bamulila ne baloma bali, “Ee, wandaayase!”
Enyuma we khumusiikha, omung'oosi aboolela babaana bewe ali, “Ne efwa, mulisiikha mu ng'ani niio omundu owa Wele asiikhiilwemo. Ra kamakuumba kase embi ne kamakuumba kewe.
Sikila kamakhuwa niko aloma khulwe lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu alutare mu Beteli ne abuundu aesuta e khusaayilao mu ngoba cha Samaria, ng'ali kaliba kario.”
Enyuma we likhuwa lino Yeroboamu se alekha chingila chewe chimayaanu tawe. Ne kakhali achiililila khurobora basaayi khukhwama mu chinju chosi chosi chikhali che busaayi tawe, khukhola khu alutare nicho ombaakhe. Arobora omundu yesi yesi owenya khuba nga omusaayi owe abuundu aesuta.
Likhuwa lino liaba bumayaanu khunju eya Yeroboamu. Areera libunia ne lilionaka likali khunju yewe.

Mu siise esio Abicha, okhwa Yeroboamu alwala.
Yeroboamu aboolela omukhasi wewe ali, “Yikosaasia nio omundu akhakhumanya tawe mala oche e Shilo niio omung'oosi Ahiya amenyile, owamboolela ali ndiba omwami owa Isiraeli.
Muyilile kimikaati ekhumi, chikeki ne bubuukhi echuupa. Alakhuboolela licha khwekholekha khu mwana wefwe yuno.”
Nio mukha Yeroboamu akhola ario. Enyokha acha e Shilo khu Ahiya. Nono Ahiya aba omubofu sikila kamakora.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba abooleele Ahiya ali mukha Yeroboamu alikho echa khukhureeba khu bulwaale bwo mwana wewe owe sisoleeli, ooli omulwale, lundi aamuboolela nga ne amukobosia.
Nga mukha Yeroboamu ne ola, ekosaasia khuuba omukhasi okundi busa.
Ne kakhali nga Ahiya aaulila endiri eye bikele biewe e muliango, aloma ali, “yiicha munju, mukha Yeroboamu. Siina sikila ne wikosaasia khuuba omundu okundi? Ndi ne kamakhuwa kamabi khwiwe.
Cha oboolele Yeroboamu oli, ‘Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli alikho aloma: “Nakhuniinia angaaki khukhwama mu baandu nakhurobora mala nakhukhola khuba omwimeelesi owe babaandu base Baisiraeli.
Nabukula bubwami khukhwama khu be lisaaye lia Daudi mala nakhua ewe. Ne kakhali ewe se wabeele nga omukholi wase Daudi, owaria kamalaka kase, mala anondakho ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi tawe. Akhola ka ng'ali kong'ene ebweeni wase.
Ne kakhali wakholile kamamayaanu lukali khukhila babakhunyoa ebweeni. Wekholeele bawele babaandi, ne bifwaani bibuumbwa. Wambambiisie lirima mala wamwaatile ese.
Sikila kano, ndareera butinyu khunju yowo mala ndiira be siseecha be lisaaye liowo boosi, baboe ne balekhuule sitube mu Isiraeli. Ekhonakile elala enju eya Yeroboamu nga omundu oweeya kamasisie khukhwola nga kawa koosi elala.
Omundu yesi yesi owe enju eya Yeroboamu olifwiila mu lukoba chimbwa chilimulia. Ne yesi yesi olifwiila mu lukoongo chinyuni chilimuboocha. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.’
“Yinyokha nono oche engo wowo. Nga ne olengila mu lukoba, omwana wowo alafwa.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi balimulila mala bamusiikhe. Aliba yeng'ene wenju eya Yeroboamu olisiikhwa bulayi, sikila niye yeng'ene owasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Khutasa khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khurao omwami khu Isiraeli ocha khumalao enju eya Yeroboamu luno.
Khukhwama luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khupa Isiraeli nga kamakoloolwe ne katengaala mu luuchi. Alasuta babaandu ba Isiraeli barure mu sibala silayi sino nisio aelesia bakuuka baabwe, mala alabasalanisia bache ebweeni we luluuchi lwa Efurati. Akhakhole ario sikila bakhola bifwaani bia wele Asherimu mala baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alilekha Isiraeli sikila bumayaanu bwa Yeroboamu nibwo akhola nende nibwo akhola Isiraeli bakhola.”
Mukha Yeroboamu enyokha akobola e Tirisa. Nga ne ola abuundu e khuulila, omwana wewe afwa.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli bamulila mala bamusiikha, khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo aloma khubirira khu mukholi wewe, omung'oosi Ahiya.
Buli sisiindu sisiindi siosi siosi nisio omwami Yeroboamu akhola, kamae niko apana, ne nga amiia, bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Yeroboamu amiia khu miiko kamakhumi kabili na kibili. Afwa mala asiikhwa, ne omwana wewe Natabu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nono Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni amiia mu Yuda. Arakikha khukhwamiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane na mulala. Amiia mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu kimiiko ekhumi na saba, lukoba nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora mu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli nga abuundu e khumwisaayilao. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Nahama, Omuamoni.
Babaandu ba Yuda bakhola kakaba kamamayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bamukhola aba ne likhendekha sikila bumayaanu bwabwe. Bakhola kamamayaanu khukhila niko bakuuka baabwe bakhola koosi.
Beyombakhila abuundu aesuta ne chinjeko ne bawele Asherimu khu buli sikulu ne asi wa buli murongooro kumubisi.
Lundi balaaya be siseecha babao mu sibala esio. Nio babaandu ba Yuda bakhola bibiindu bie khusinyisia lukali bioosi bibiakholwangwa ne chikolo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aoona khukhwama mu sibala, Baisiraeli ne bengilamo.
Ayaaya bibiindu bie libiikhilo lie mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bibiindu bie mu libiikhilo lie lichipi lio mwami. Abukula buli siindu. Abukula lundi chingabo che esahabu nicho Solomoni akhola.
Ne omwami Rehoboamu akhola chingabo chichiindi che kumukasa mu bweyaangu bwacho aelesia bakhulu be babemeelesi be bilibwa bie lichipi.
Ne buli siise omwami ne achichaanga mu Lukaangu, baliindi basutanga chingabo, mala bachikobosia mu lusiro lwe khuliinda.
Nono buli sisiindu sisiindi siosi siosi nisio omwami Rehoboamu akhola siaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Yuda.
Ne liabao liie akari wa Rehoboamu ne Yeroboamu mu biise bioosi.
Rehoboamu afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. (Lisina lia maawe liaba Nahama, Omuamoni). Omwana wewe Abichamu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Mu mwiiko kwe ekhumi na munane nikwo omwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati amiilamo Isiraeli, Abicha arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda.
Amiia mu Yerusalemu khu miiko kitaru. Maayi wewe aba Maaka, omukhaana owa Abishalomu.
Akhola bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo raraawe akhola kumwoyo kwewe se kwabeela elala ng'ali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe, nga sisoni siewe Daudi ne aba tawe.
Kakhaba kario sikila Daudi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe akhola Abichamu amiie mu Yerusalemu mu bweyaangu bwewe mala aliinde Yerusalemu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario sikila Daudi akhola ka ng'ali ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se aleka lilaka liewe liosi tawe, ne kakhali likhuwa lia Uria Omuhiti.
Nono liie liabao akari wa Rehoboamu ne Yeroboamu mu bwami bwa Abichamu bwoosi.
Ne buli sisiindu nisio Abichamu akhola siaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Abichamu afwa, asiikhwa mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Asa omwana wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kabili kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yeroboamu owa Isiraeli, Asa arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda.
Amiia mu Yerusalemu khu miiko kamakhumi kane ne mulala. Lisina lia kukhuwe liaba Maaka omukhaana owa Abishalomu.
Asa akhola kakasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga kuuka wewe Daudi ne akhola.
Aoona balaaya mu sibala mala enyosiao bifwaani nibio bakuuka bewe baaba ne bakholile.
Enyosia khu maawe Maaka lukoosi lwe khuba maayi ooli Kwini
Ne kakhali abuundu aesuta se enyosibwao tawe. Kakhaba kario kumwoyo kwa Asa kwaba kwa ng'ali elala khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.
Asa ara mu Lukaangu biianwa biewe ne bia raraawe, efwesa, esahabu ne chiseesi.
Omwami Asa owa Yuda no mwami Baasha owa Isiraeli, baba ne liie akari wabwe mu bulamu bwabwe bwoosi.
Baasha ebwaakala Yuda mala ombakha lukoba lwa Rama nio akhiingilile babaandu bakhengila mu Yuda namwe baruremo tawe.
Nio Asa abukula efwesa yoosi ne esahabu eyaba ne yarama mu libiikho lie Lukaangu ne mu lichipi mala aelesia bakholi bewe. Abaruma bayile e Damasika khu mwami Beni-hadadi owa Shamu, okhwa Tabirimoni, omwichukhulu owa Hesioni, ne burume buno:
“Khube ne buambaani nga bapaapa befwe ne baba. Narumire siianwa sie efwesa yino ne esahabu khwiwe. Cha wonake buambaani bwowo no mwami Baasha owa Isiraeli, nio andurekho.”
Omwami Beni-hadadi afukiilila likhuwa lia Asa. Aruma bakhulu be banamae bache bebwaakale chingoba cha Isiraeli. Baula lukoba lwa Iyoni, Dani, Abeli-beti-maaka, ne Chinereti yoosi ne sibala sioosi sia Nafutali.
Nga Baasha ne aulila kakaba ne kekholeekhe, alekha khukhwombakha Rama mala acha amenya e Tirisa.
Nio omwami Asa arusia lilaka mu Yuda mwoosi areeba buli mundu yesi yesi, ayeete khusuta kamabaale ne chimbao nibio Baasha arumikhira khukhwombakha lukoba lwa Rama. Asa ombakhila bibiindu bino lukoba lwa Keba mu Benjamini ne lukoba lwa Misipa.
Nono buli bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio omwami Asa akhola, bikholwa biewe bie bunyindaafu, ne chingoba nicho ombakha biaandikwa bioosi mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda. Ne kakhali mu busaakhulu bwewe alwala bikele.
Asa afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi kuuka wewe. Ne omwana wewe Yehoshafati amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Natabu okhwa Yeroboamu arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli, mu mwiiko kwe khabili kwe khukhwamiia khwa Asa omwami owa Yuda. Amiia Isiraeli khu miiko kibili.
Akhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga raraawe owakila Baisiraeli bakhola bumayaanu.
Baasha okhwa Ahiya owe nju eya Isakari, akholela Natabu ekwangwaani mala amwirira e Kibetioni eye ba Filisiti. Abeele Natabu ne Baisiraeli boosi babotookhelesia lukoba lwa Kibetioni khulwibwaakala.
Nio Baasha amwiira mu mwiiko kukhola khataru, Asa ne ali omwami owa Yuda. Khwako Baasha ela mu bwami bwa Natabu nga omwami owa Isiraeli.
Nga aba busa omwami ari, eera be enju eya Yeroboamu boosi. Mbao akhaba mulala owarama tawe. Kano kekholekha, khuloondekhana ne elomo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khubirira khu mukholi wewe, Ahiya Omushilo.
Lino liakholekha sikila Yeroboamu aambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli lirima, khulwe bumayaanu bwewe ne bumayaanu nibwo akhola Isiraeli bakhola.
Nono buli bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Natabu akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Ne liie liabao akari wa Yuda ne omwami Baasha owa Isiraeli mu bulamu bwabwe bwosi.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khataru kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Asa owa Yuda, Baasha okhwa Ahiya arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli yoosi khukhwama e Tirisa. Amiia kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kine.
Akhola kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola kamamayaanu nga niko omwami Yeroboamu akhola. Yeroboamu akhola Baisiraeli bakhola kamamayaanu.

Elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Yehu okhwa Hanani, aboolele Baasha ali,
“Ese nakhuniinia ewe khukhwama khwipukhuulu, nakhukhola waba omwami owe babaandu base Isiraeli. Ne luno ewe wakholile kamamayaanu nga ka Yeroboamu mala wakholile babaandu base khukhola bumayaanu. Wambambiisie lirima sikila bumayaanu bwowo.
Ndakhurusiao ewe ne enju yowo. Ndakhola enju yowo nga nakhola eya Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati.
Owe enju yowo yesi yesi ne alifwiila mu lukoba, chimbwa chilimulia. Ne ne alifwiila mu lukoongo, chinyuni chilimulia.”
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Baasha akhola ne kamaani kewe, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Baasha afwa mala asiikhwa mu Tirisa, mala omwana wewe Ela, amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Khutasa khwako, elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha ne omung'oosi Yehu okhwa Hanani khu Baasha ne khu be enju yewe sikila, kamamayaanu niko Baasha akholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne lirima khulwe bikholwa biewe ne khuba nga be enju eya Yeroboamu. Ne lundi eera be enju eya Yeroboamu.
Mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kabili na sita kwe mu khwamiia khwa Asa omwami owa Yuda, Ela okhwa Baasha arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli. Amiia mu Tirisa khu miiko kibili.
Ne kakhali Simuri, komanda owe nusu ye kamakaari ke liie ko mwami, amukwangwaanila. Nga Ela aba e Tirisa, ne alikho ameelela mungo mwa Arisa owaba omwimeelesi mu lichipi lia
Simuri engila munju amupa mala amwiira. Mala amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe. Lino liakholekha mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kabili na saba nikwo omwami Asa abeela omwami owa Yuda.
Nga Simuri ne ekhala khu ndebe eye bubwami busa ari, eera enju eya Baasha yoosi. Se alekhakho omundu owe siseecha akhaba mulala khu balebe bewe namwe khu basaale bewe tawe.
Ne khwako Simuri onakila elala enju eya Baasha khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo aloma khu Baasha khubirira khu mung'oosi Yehu.
Kano kekholekha sikila bumayaanu bwoosi bwa Baasha ne bumayaanu bwa Ela omwana wewe nibwo bakhola. Lundi akhola Isiraeli yakhola bumayaanu. Baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli lirima khulwe bifwaani bie bawele babwe.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Ela akhola biaandikwa mu Sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kabili na saba kwe mu bwami bwa Asa omwami owa Yuda, Simuri amiia khukhwama e Tirisa, khu Isiraeli khu ndaalo saba. Banamae ba Isiraeli baba bapile ekambi embi a lukoba lwa Kibetioni mu Filisiti khukhwibwaakala.
Nga banamae ne baulila bali Simuri aba akwangwaaniile omwami mala amwirire, Isiraeli yoosi yakhola Omuri, komanda owe banamae, aaba omwami owa Isiraeli.
Nio Omuri ne banamae bewe bama e Kibetioni mala bacha babotookhelela lukoba lwa Tirisa.
Ne nga Simuri ne abona ali lukoba lwabukuliibwe, acha engila mu lusiro lwe lichipi lio mwami osia lichipi mala afwila omwene mu mulilo.
Lino liekholekha sikila bumayaanu bwewe nibwo akhola ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola nga Yeroboamu owakhola Isiraeli yakhola bumayaanu.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Simuri akhola, ne ekwangwaani yewe, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Nio babaandu ba Isiraeli baukhanamo abili: Balala baloonda khu Tibini okhwa Kinati ne babaandi baloonda khu Omuri.
Ne ekhumaliilikha, abo babaloonda Omuri baba ne kamaani khukhila ba Tibini. Tibini okhwa Kinati afwa mala Omuri aba omwami.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na mulala Asa ne ali omwami owa Yuda Omuri arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli. Amiia khu miiko ekhumi na kibili. Kimiiko kie khunyoa sita amiia khukhwama e Tirisa.
Akula sikulu sia Samaria khu bitonyi bie efwesa chikiilo kamakhumi saba na munane khukhwama khu Shemeri. Omuri ombakha lukoba khu sikulu okhwo mala alusira alutiuukha ali Samaria, lisina lia Shemeri, owaba omwene sikulu.
Omuri akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola bumayaanu khukhila boosi babanyoa ebweeni wewe.
Akhola nga Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati ne akhola Isiraeli yakhola bumayaanu. Baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli lirima sikila bifwaani biabwe.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Omuri akhola, ne kamaani niko okesia biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami.
Omuri afwa mala asiikhwa mu Samaria. Omwana wewe Ahabu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na munane kwe bubwami bwa Asa owa Yuda, Ahabu okhwa Omuri arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli. Amiia mu Samaria khu miiko kamakhumi kabili na kibili.
Ahabu akhola kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhila babaami boosi babanyoa ebweeni wewe.
Khutasa khukhola bumayaanu nga nibwo Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati akhola, Ahabu akhola bumayaanu bukali khulwe khukhwa Yesebeli omukhaana owo mwami Etibaali owa Sidoni khuba omukhasi wewe. Akholela Baali ne khumwisaaya.
Ombakhila Baali alutare mu nju eyayo niyo ombakha mu Samaria.
Lundi akhola sifwaani sia wele Ashera. Akhola kamabi lukali khuaambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli lirima khukhila babaami ba Isiraeli boosi babanyoa ebweeni wewe.
Mu bwami bwewe, Hieli khukhwama e Beteli ombakha lukoba lwa Yeriko. Liabukula Hieli bulamu bwa Abiramu, omwana wewe omubele khurao kumusiingi kwe lukoba ne omwana wewe, Sekubu, omuro khukhwombakha bilibwa. Lino liekholekha khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niyo aloma khubirira khu Yoshua okhwa Nuni.

Nio elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Elicha eli,
“Inyokha abuundu ano oche lubeka lwe ebukwe mala wikise embi ne khakheechi kha Keriti, ebukwe owa Yoritani.
Olanywa kameechi ke khakheechi khano mala nalakile khooro chikhureerere siakhulia ebweeneyo.”
Nio Elicha acha akhola khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Acha amenya khu kheechi kha Keriti khaali ebukwe owa Yoritani.
Khooro chamureerera kumukaati ne enyama buli kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba mala anywa kameechi khukhwama mu kheechi.
Enyuma we siise, khakheechi khateenya sikila efula se yabao mu sibala tawe.
Nio elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Elicha eli,
“Yinyokha, oche e Sarefati eli siimbi mu Sidoni mala omenyeyo. Nalakile namulekhwa omenyile ebweeneyo akhuliisie.”
Nio Elicha acha e Sarefati. Nga ne ola a silibwa sie lukoba, abona namulekhwa alikho areenya chiikhu. Amulaanga mala aloma ali, “Nosiima ndererekho kameechi matiiti kari khu seesi nywe.”
Ne nga aba ne alikho acha khumureerera kameechi, Elicha amulaanga aloma ali, “Mala nosiima ndererekho akhaba ne sitonyi sie kumukaati.”
Namulekhwa oyo amukobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ne amenya, se endikho ne kumukaati kwosi kwosi tawe. Ne kakhali ndi ne bufu efuusi ndala yong'ene mu nyuungu, ne kamafura matiiti kari mu mwendo. Nechile ano khureenya chiikhu ndiiti chiri mala ngobole ne nacho engo nje ndeekhe nisio ndi ne nasio. Mala ese no mwana wase khulie mala khufwe enjala.”
Elicha amuboolela ali, “Okheembeelela tawe. Cha okhole nga ne olomile. Ne kakhali nyoa ukholeele ese sitonyi sie kumukaati khukhwama khu bufu ne kamafura niko oli ne nako underere. Enyuma wako yikholela ewe ne omwana wowo.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboola ali, ‘Bufu se bulawa mu nyuungu namwe kamafura se kalawa mu mwendo tawe khukhwola endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikwisia efula khu liloba.’ ”
Namulekhwa acha mala akhola nga Elicha ne aba ne amuboleele. Mala niye no mwana wewe ne Elicha baba ne siakhulia siboola khulwe chindaalo chingali.
Bufu se bwawa mu nyuungu namwe kamafura se kawa mu mwendo tawe, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalaka khubirira khu Elicha.
Enyuma we siise omusoleeli owa namulekhwa alwala. Bulwaale bwewe bwatasa lukali mala ekhumaliilikha afwa.
Namulekhwa aboolela Elicha ali, “Ee, mundu owa Wele, ukholeele siina sino? Ewe wechile ano khukhukhebusia bumayaanu bwase, mala wire omwana wase?”
Elicha amuboolela ali, “Mbe omwana wowo.” Abukula omwana khukhwama khu maawe amumeema aniina ne naye mu lusiro lwewe lwe munju mungaaki nimwo aba ne amenyile mala amwalisia khu sitaanda siewe.
Nio Elicha alilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, wareerire bubi buno khuakhaba namulekhwa yuno niye menyile naye khulwe khukhwira omwana wewe?”
Nio Elicha akona khu mwana khukhwola khataru mala alilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, lamusia omwana yuno.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila lisaba lia Elicha, omwana arakikha khueela mala alamukha.
Elicha abukula omwana amukobosiela maawe mu lusiro lwe asi mala amuboolela ali, “Lola, omwana wowo ali omulamu!”
Namulekhwa akobosia Elicha ali, “Luno nakhamanya ndi ewe oli omundu owa Wele, ne Wele akhulomalomelangamo.”

Enyuma we siise sileeyi, elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Elicha, mu mwiiko kukhola khataru efula ne akhakwa tawe eli, “Cha weyokesiane khu mwami Ahabu, mala ndalekhuula efula ekwe khu sibala.”
Nono Elicha acha khukhwiyokesia khu Ahabu. Nono enjala mu Samaria yaba endafu lukali.
Ahabu alaanga Obadia, owaba omwimeelesi owe lichipi. (Nono Obadia aba aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukali.
Ne nga Yesebeli eraanga bang'oosi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Obadia abukula emia ndala khu nibo, mala abakisa mu mabina kabili, buli mu libina babaandu kamakhumi karaano. Mala abaechanga siakhulia ne kameechi.)
Ahabu aboolela Obadia ali, “Cha okeende buli abuundu niio esebele eli nende buli mu matooma mwosi mu sibala. Wakana khunyala khwanyoola bunyaasi bunyala bwaliinda chifarasi ne chinyumbu chikhafwa tawe. Nio khukhakhola khurio khwatibia busa bibiaayo biefwe tawe.”
Bafukiilisiana lubeka lwe sibala nilwo buli mulala acha khulambuula. Ahabu acha lubeka lulala yeng'ene ne Obadia yesi acha lubeka luluundi yeng'ene.
Nga Obadia ne aba khu lukeendo lwewe, Elicha amwakaanana. Obadia amumanya, mala amwinamila amureeba ali, “Ewe niwe omwami wase Elicha?”
Akobosia ali, “Yee, ese niise. Cha oboolele omukhulu wowo, oli, ‘Elicha ali ano.’ ”
Obadia amukobosia ali, “Bumayaanu siina nibwo ekholile nio unde mu mukhono kwo mwami Ahabu anjire?
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo ne amenya, mbao sibala namwe bubwami niio omwami wase akhaarumania bakhuyiime tawe. Ne omwami yesi yesi ne aloma ali se oli mu sibala siewe tawe, Ahabu amurakho ne echuba ali se oliyo tawe.
Nono ewe wenya ese nje mboolele omwami wase ndi ewe oli ano?
Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario akhusuta akhuyila abuundu aandi ese ne njiile busa ndi. Ekhola ndio nacha naboolela omwami Ahabu ndi oli ano mala eche alekhe khukhunyoolao tawe. Aba alanjira. Khebulila oli ese naria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama mu bwana bwase.
Se waulila niko nakhola nga Yesebeli ne eera bang'oosi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe? Nakisa bang'oosi emia ndala mu mabina mu bipupu bibili bie babaandu kamakhumi karaano nabalisia kimikaati ne kameechi.
Nono onyala oriena wandaka oli nje mala mboolele omwami ndi ewe oli ano? Alanjira!”
Elicha amukobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae ne amenya, niye ese ekholelaanga, khulaka ndi samwene ndeyekesiana ebweeni wo mwami endaalo yino.”
Nio Obadia acha khu mwami Ahabu mala amuboolela. Ahabu arekukha acha khukhwakaanana Elicha.
Nga Ahabu ne abona Elicha aloma ali, “Ewe niwe onaania Isiraeli!”
Elicha amukobosia ali, “Ese se nananiisie Isiraeli tawe. Ewe ne enju eya paapa wowo ninywe munaniisie, sikila mwalekhile kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mwaloondile khu Baali.
Nono rumania balaange babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi beche khwise a Sikulu sie Karimeli. Yiicha ne bang'oosi chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano ba Baali, ne bang'oosi chimia chine ba Ashera, balia khu siaalwa sia Yesebeli.”
Nio Ahabu arumania alaanga Baisiraeli boosi, ne bang'oosi ba Baali a Sikulu sia Karimeli.
Elicha acha embi niio babaandu boosi bali mala aloma ali, “Mulachiililila khuba ne kamebaasio kabili khu siise sina? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne ali Wele, muloondekho ne Baali aaba ne ali wele, muloondekho.” Ne babaandu basila busa.
Nio Elicha aboolela babaandu ali, “Ese, seng'ene omung'oosi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oramire ne bang'oosi ba Baali bali chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano.
Khuelesie chiuunwa chibili. Lekha bang'oosi ba Baali barobore ndala bakiire bakitonyake mu bitonyi mala bakire khukhu. Ne bakhabwaana kumulilo tawe. Ese sesi ndakhola ndio ne uunwa ekiindi.
Nono bang'oosi ba Baali basabe wele waabwe ne ese ndasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne wele olakobosia ne kumulilo, omwene oyo aba niye Wele.” Babaandu baloma bali, “Walomile bulayi.”
Nio Elicha aboolela bang'oosi ba Baali ali, “Yiroborera euunwa ndala mala munyoe mukitonyake sikila enywe muli bakali. Musabe wele wenywe. Ne kakhali mukhara kumulilo mu khu tawe.”
Babukula euunwa niyo babaelesia mala bakitonyaka, mala basaba Baali khukhwama kumutikhinyi khukhwola nga ne liaanga. Baloma bali, “Ee Baali khukobosie!” Ne kakhali sisiindu se siauliilikhanakho tawe. Ne mbao owakobosia tawe. Babotookhelela alutare niyo baba ne bakholile.
Oli liaanga, Elicha arakikha khubakholela siienyameno ali, “Saba lukali, sikila ali wele. Wakana alikho aroora kumuusi namwe achiile khwiyeeta, namwe wakana akeniiye! Namwe alikho akona, mala mukhoya mumwinyosie!”
Nio basaba lukali ne bekhalakaka ne kimibano ne chimbeko khuloondekhana ne kimiima kiabwe khukhwola nga bebeena.
Nga enyanga ne yabira liaanga, bachiililila khukhola bario khukhwola nga siise sie embosio eye ekolooba siola. Ne kakhali sisiindu se siauliilikhanakho namwe omundu akobosia namwe aulila lisaba tawe.
Nio Elicha aboolela babaandu boosi ali, “Njisendeo siimbi.” Mala boosi bamwibuusiao. Arakikha khung'oona alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyaba ne yatechukhaka.
Elicha abukula kamabaale ekhumi na kabili, khuloondekhana ne chikholo ekhumi ne chibili che babaana ba Yakobo. Elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba yecha khu Yakobo eli alilaangwa bali Isiraeli.
Ne kamabaale ako ombakhila alutare khu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ayaba kumuliinda abotookhelesia alutare. Kumuliinda kuno yaba kunyala kwechulamo bumiicho embi sikono silala.
Nio ara chiikhu khu alutare, atonyaka euunwa mu bitonyi, mala akira khu khu. Aloma ali, “Yichusia chinyuungu chine kameechi mala mukachukhe khu siianwa sie khukhwosia ne khukhu.”
Aloma lundi ali, “Chukhakho lukhola khabili.” Mala bakhola bario. Aloma ali, “Chukhakho lukhola khataru.” Mala bakhola bario lukhola khataru.
Kameechi katima keekha kabotookhelela alutare mala kechula mu muliinda.
Oli siise sie khuaana embosio eye ekolooba, omung'oosi Elicha eseenda a alutare mala asaba ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo lekha luno limanyikhane endaalo yino lili ewewe oli Wele mu Isiraeli ne ese ndi omukholi wowo. Mala lundi lili ese nakholile bibiindu bino bioosi khulwe elomo yowo.
Ngobosie, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ngobosie nio babaandu bano bamanye bali, Ewe oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Wele, mala ewe wayuusiisie kimiooyo kiabwe kikhukobolele.”
Nio kumulilo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwosia embosio eye khukhwosia, chiikhu, ne kamabaale. Kwosia akhaba ne liloba mala kameechi kateenya kakaba mu muliinda.
Nga babaandu boosi ne babona lino, bakwa mafuumala mala baloma bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele.”
Ne Elicha aloma ali, “Amba bang'oosi ba Baali, mukhalekhakho akhaba mulala khu nibo elukha tawe.” Babaandu babaamba boosi mala Elicha abekhisia khu kheechi kha Kishoni mala abeererayo.
Nio Elicha aboolela omwami Ahabu ali, “Cha olie lundi onywe, sikila efula engali elikho eoloola, yolile.”
Nio Ahabu acha alia mala anywa. Elicha aniina khu ngaaki khwe sikulu sia Karimeli. Ebweeneyo enama asi kumurwe kwola akari we kamasikamo keewe.
Aboolela omukholi wewe ali, “Niina angaaki olole sia nyanja.” Omukholi aniina, akobola mala aloma ali, “Se nabooneyo sisiindu tawe.” Elicha aloma ali, “Cha lundi khukhwola saba.”
Ne lukhola saba aloma ali, “Naboone lileesi litiiti liri, lili nga kumukhono kwo mundu, lienyookhe khukhwama mu nyanja.” Elicha aboolela omukholi ali, “Cha khu mwami Ahabu mala omuboolele engile mu likaari liewe lie liie mala ekhe akobole engo. Efula ekhamwiyikamia ano tawe.”
Mu siise sitiiti, kamafuumbi kamamali kafuunikha mungaaki. Ekhuungu yarakikha khuucha mala efula engali yarakikha khukwa. Ahabu engila mu likaari liewe lie liie acha e Yesireeli.
Ne kamaani ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kaba khu Elicha eboela chingubo chewe mu sibuno, mala atima chimbilo arangirira Ahabu lukeendo lwosi khukhwola a silibwa e Yesireeli.

Ahabu aboolela omukhasi wewe Yesebeli buli siindu nisio Elicha aba ne akholile ne lundi nga ne aba ne erire bang'oosi ba Baali boosi.
Nio Yesebeli arumira Elicha omurume ne aloma ali, “Bawele bakhoya bamba kumunaanio kumukali kumutikhinyi siise nga sino siri naaba ne ekhakhwirire nga ewe ne wirire bang'oosi tawe.”
Elicha aria mala elukha nio eonie. Ola Beerisheba eye mu Yuda mala alekhayo omukholi wewe ebweeneyo.
Ne niye omwene akeenda lukeendo kumuusi kwosi mu sichiimi. Eema mala ekhala asi we kumurongooro kumunyenya mala ekoomba khufwa. Asaba ali, “Nanyalile endio Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lekha efwe. Ese se ekhila bakuuka base tawe!”
Akona asi we kumurongooro kumunyenya mala liilo liamuaamba. Malaika amutilakho mala amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha mala olie.”
Alola eyi ne neeyi mala abona siakhulia sitekheelwe khu mabaale kamabile ne esaachi eye kameechi embi amurwe kwewe. Alia mala anywa mala akona asi lundi.
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobola lundi lukhola khabili amutilakho aloma ali, “Yinyokha mala olie sikila lukeendo lukhola lurio lwakhubeela luandalafu.”
Elicha enyokha alia lundi anywa mala siakhulia esio siamua kamaani ke khukeenda chindaalo kamakhumi kane kumuusi ne siilo khukhwola khu Horebu, sikulu sia Wele.
Aacha ola mu libina nimwo akona. Elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yamwichakho eli, “Elicha olikho okhola siina ano?”
Akobosia ali, “Nakhakilenge nga nenyala khukhukholela ewe weng'ene Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe kamae. Ne kakhali babaandu ba Isiraeli balekhile endakaano yowo. Batechule alutare yowo yakwile asi. Mala berire bang'oosi bowo boosi. Ese seng'ene niye oramire, mala balikho bakhaka khukhunjira.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia ali, “Rura oche mala wime khu sikulu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abira ebweeni wewe mala ekhuungu eye kamaani yakhoongola kamabaale ke bikulu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aba mu khuungu ng'eneyo tawe. Enyuma we ekhuungu, liabao literema lie liloba, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aba mu literema elio tawe.
Enyuma we literema lie liloba, kumulilo kwabao, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aba mu mulilo tawe. Ne enyuma we kumulilo, liabao lilomaloma lia kalaa.
Ne nga Elicha ne aulila kumumilo ebiimba mu moni engubo yewe mala arura acha eema emuliango kwe libina. Kumumilo kwamuboolela kuli, “Elicha olikho okhola siina ano?”
Akobosia ali, “Nakhakilenge nga ne enyala khukhukholela ewe weng'ene, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe kamae. Ne kakhali babaandu ba Isiraeli balekhile endakaano yowo. Batechule alutare yowo yakwile asi. Mala berire bang'oosi bowo boosi. Ese seng'ene niye oramire, mala balikho bakhaka khukhunjira.”
Ne chukha khu Yehu okhwa Nimushi kamafura abe omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne Elisha okhwa Shafati khukhwama e Abeli-mehola muchukhekho kamafura ele mu bweyaangu bwowo nga omung'oosi.
Omundu yesi yesi owikoba khukhwirwa ne Hasaeli, akheerwe ne Yehu. Ne yesi yesi okhekobe khukhwirwa ne Yehu, akheerwe ne Elisha.
Kakhaba kario khalekhe babaandu chielefu saba balamu mu Isiraeli, abo boosi basiili khwinamila Baali namwe khukhwikwayila sifwaani siewe tawe.
Elicha arekukha khukhwama abwenao mala anyoola Elisha okhwa Shafati alikho alimila chieeyi. Aba ne chieeyi bipupu ekhumi na bibili. Aba alikho alimila sipupu sie ekhumi ne bibili. Elicha amubirao mala ara khu Elisha engubo yewe.
Nio Elisha alekha chieeyi chewe atimaka khu Elicha mala amuboolela ali, “Lekha nje nikwayile paapa ne maayi mbaboolele ndi, ‘Mulindwe,’ nio ngobole nje ne nawe.” Elicha akobosia ali, bulayi “Kobolayo lundi, se khukhiingilila tawe.”
Nio Elisha akobola niio sipupu sie chieeyi siaba mala achikhonya. Abukula kamachooki asaaka ateekhela chinyama. Aelesia babaandu chinyama mala bachilia. Nio enyokha acha aloonda khu Elicha amukholela nga omuyeeti wewe.

Omwami Beni-hadadi owa Shamu abuusia alala banamae bewe boosi. Babaami kamakhumi kataru na babili baba ne naye. Baba ne chifarasi chabwe ne kamakaari ke liie. Acha akara Samaria mala botookhelesie.
Aruma barumwa bewe mu lukoba khu Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli. Barumwa bamuboolela bali, “omwami Beni-hadadi aloma ali:
efwesa yowo ne esahabu yowo bili bibiase. Bakhasi bowo ne babaana balayi bali babaase.”
Omwami owa Isiraeli akobosia ali, “Omwimeelesi ne omwami owase, ese ndi owowo ne bioosi nibio ndi ne nabio.”
Nio barumwa bakobola lundi khu Ahabu mala baloma bali, Beni-hadadi aloma ali, “Nakhurumire likhuwa ndi nenya umbe ese efwesa, ne esahabu, ne bakhasi bowo, ne babaana.
Kakhaba kario, kharume bakholi base kumutikhinyi embi nga siise sino mala bapule mu lichipi liowo, ne mu chiingo che bakholi bowo, mala babukule buli sisiindu sibasiimisia bache nasio.”
Nio omwami owa Isiraeli alaanga basaakhulu be mu sibala siewe ababoolela ali, “Bona omundu yuno nga alikho enya khureera butinyu. Andumiire burume ne enya bakhasi base ne babaana, efwesa yase ne esahabu mala se namwimaane tawe.”
Basaakhulu ne babaandu boosi bamukobosia bali, “Okharekeeresia kakeewe namwe wakafukiilila tawe.”
Nio Ahabu akobosia barumwa ba Beni-hadadi ali, “Boolela omwami wase muli nafukiiliile lilienya liewe lie khunyoa, ne se enyala nafukiilila lia khabili tawe.” Barumwa barekukha, mala bakobola ne burume bubuundi
khukhwama khu Beni-hadadi ali: “Bawele bakhoya bamba kumunaanio kumukali naba bali se nonaka Samaria tawe. Bubweyaangu se bukhanyolekhekho asi nibwo, akhaba mulala khu baandu base anyala ayoola lipukhuulu litiiti liri tawe.”
Omwami Ahabu owa Isiraeli akobosia ali, “Boolela omwami Beni-hadadi muli omundu obanula bulwaani bwe liie se akhoyeele ebonia nga obuanikha tawe.”
Beni-hadadi anyoola likobosia lia Ahabu, ne babaami nibo aambana ne nabo, baba ne balikho banywa kamalwa mu maeema kaabwe. Aboolela banamae bewe khukhwirekekha khukhwibwaakala lukoba olwo. Khwako babanula berekekha khukhupana.
Ne omung'oosi echa embi khu mwami Ahabu mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Waboone lituuli likali lino? Endaalo yino ndarira mu bunyali bwowo mala ewe olamanya oli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Ahabu areeba ali, “Naanu olarangirira khucha khukhwibwaakala?” Omung'oosi akobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, bakholi be babemeelesi be chingoongo.” Omwami areeba ali, “Naanu olarakikha khukhupana?” Omung'oosi amukobosia ali, “Ewewe.”
Nio omwami alaanga bakholi be babemeelesi be chingoongo. Boosi baba chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kataru na babili. Enyuma wabo alaanga banamae ba Isiraeli boosi alala. Baba babaandu chielefu saba.
Bacha enyanga mwiaangilwe. Beni-hadadi ne babaami nibo aambana ne nabo kamakhumi kataru na babili baba balikho bameela mu maeema kaabwe.
Bakholi be babemeelesi be chingoongo banyoa barura. Ne Beni-hadadi aruma bayooti mala beecha bamuboolela bali, “Babaandu balikho beecha khukhwama Samaria.”
Beni-hadadi aloma ali, “Baambe balamu, bakhaba ne balikho becha mu muleembe namwe khukhupana.”
Nio bakholi be babemeelesi be chingoongo barura mu lukoba. Ne banamae baloondakho.
Buli mulala eera omundu niye apana ne naye. Bashamu belukha, mala Baisiraeli babatimania. Ne kakhali Beni-hadadi elukhila khu farasi alala ne batimia chifarasi.
Omwami Ahabu arura, aamba chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie, mala eera Bashamu bakali.
Nio omung'oosi acha khu mwami Ahabu mala amuboolela ali, “Kobolayo oche otase kamaani banamae bowo mala wibaasie bulayi nilio onyala khukhola, sikila omwami owa Shamu alacha khukhwibwaakala lundi kumwiiko kukwiicha.”
Banamae bakhulu bo mwami owa Shamu bamuboolela bali, “Bawele ba Isiraeli bali bawele be mu bikulu. Esio nisio sikila Baisiraeli ne bakhuulile. Ne kakhali lekha khupane ne nabo mu mweyeeywe. Kang'ali khulaba ne kamaani khubakhila.
Ne ewe khola ori: Rusia babaami kamakhumi kataru na babili abo mu bunyali bwe khukhwimeelela banamae mala okobosiemo banamae bakhulu.
Ne laanga banamae bakali nga babakhwanjukha abo, ne bukali bwe chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie. Mala khulapana ne Baisiraeli mu mweyeeywe mala khu siise sino khulaba ne kamaani khukhila nibo.” Omwami Beni-hadadi afukiilila mala akhola ario.
Kumwiiko kuloondakho Beni-hadadi alaanga banamae bewe mala acha mu lukoba lwa Afeki khukhupana ne Baisiraeli.
Baisiraeli balaangwa alala mala baeebwa bulwaani bacha khukhupana. Baisiraeli becha alala mala baba busa nga bipupu bibili bitiiti bie chimbusi. Ne Bashamu bachila buli abuundu.
Omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khu mwami Ahabu mala amuboolela ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Sikila Bashamu balomile bali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi wele owe mu bikulu ne sendi owe mu mweyeeywe tawe, nono ndara lituuli lino mu bunyali bwowo mala ewe olamanya oli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Bashamu ne Baisiraeli baba mu kambi sikelekha khu ndaalo saba. Khu ndaalo ekhola saba barakikha khukhupana. Baisiraeli beera banamae Bashamu chielefu emia ndala be khukeendela khu bikele.
Babaoona belukhila mu lukoba lwa Afeki. Nio lisiisi lie lukoba nalio liakwiila babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne saba.
Beni-hadadi yesi elukhila mu lukoba mala amulila mu lusiro lwe mukari mwe nju.
Bakholi bamuboolela bali, “Khwaulila bali babaami ba Isiraeli bali be siisa. Lekha khufware kamakunia ne kimikoye khu mirwe kiefwe mala khuche khu mwami owa Isiraeli. Wakana akhola ario alekha khukhwira.”
Nio beboela kamakunia mu bibuno biabwe ne kimikoye mu mirwe mala bacha khu Ahabu baloma bali, “Omukholi wowo Beni-hadadi alikho akhwikoonjelela ali okhamwiira tawe.” Ahabu abakobosia ali, “Asilio omulamu? Ali wandaayase.”
Nono babaandu abo baba baloleelela babone simanyisio. Ne nga Ahabu ne aloma ali, “Ali wandaayase” balibukula khangu mala baloma bali, “Ee, wandaayo Beni-hadadi.” Ahabu aloma ali, “Cha mumureere.” Beni-hadadi nga ne oola, Ahabu amwakaanila amwingisia mu likaari lie liie.
Beni-hadadi amuboolela ali, “Ndakhukobosiela chingoba nicho paapa wase anuula paapa wowo mala onyala warakikha abuundu e bubwofuli mu Damasika, bulayi bwene nga paapa wase ne akhola mu Samaria.” Ahabu amukobosia ali, “Khu bireng'amo bino ndakhulekha obe omulekhuule.” Ahabu akhola endakaano ne naye mala amulekha acha.
Omung'oosi mulala khukhwama mu sipupu sie bang'oosi aboolela omung'oosi owasie amupe. Ne omung'oosi oyo aloba khumupa.
Nio amuboolela ali, “Sikila ewe se wariire lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe nga ne olarekukha busa ori, etalang'i elakhwiira.” Ne khangu busa nga ne arekukha, etalang'i yecha mala yamwiira.
Nio omung'oosi oyo anyoola omundu okundi mala amuboolela ali, “Khupe” Omundu yuno amuupa burafu mala amuumisia.
Omung'oosi eboa chingubo mumoni khukhwekosaasia akhamanyikha tawe. Acha eema amuyila, aliinda omwami owa Isiraeli abire.
Nga omwami ne aba ne alikho abira, omung'oosi amulaanga mala amuboolela ali, “Nabeele ndikho khupana mwiie mala omunamae mulala andeerera omunamae omusiku mala aloma ali, ‘Liinda omundu yuno. Kaaba bali elukha okherwe nga kumuruungo, namwe okharuunge kumuruungo kwe chikiilo kamakhumi kataru na chine bie efwesa.’
Ne nga omukholi wowo ne abeele ne kimilimo kikiindi, omundu oyo elukha.” Omwami owa Isiraeli akobosia ali, “Wamwene wekhalakiile. Nono bukhalaki bulaba burio.”
Nio omung'oosi atabula engubo niyo aba ne eboyile mu moni khangu, mala omwami amumanya ali ali mulala khu bang'oosi.
Nio omung'oosi oyo aboolela omwami ali, “Eyino eli elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi: ‘Sikila ewe walekhile omundu niye ese ndakile ndi erwe elukha, ewe olaliruunga ne bulamu bwowo ne ndiira babaandu bowo mu bweyaangu bwe babaandu banamae bewe.’ ”
Omwami owa Isiraeli akobola mu lichipi liewe e Samaria, ne asinyiikhe ne khukhalala.

Nono Naboti Omuyesireeli aba ne liruuti lie kimisabibu embi ne lichipi lio mwami Ahabu, owa Samaria.
Endaalo ndala Ahabu aboolela Naboti ali, “Mbe ese liruuti liowo lie kimisabibu libe nga kumukuunda kwe chinyenyi sikila lili simbi ne lichipi liase. Ndakhua kamaloba kamalayi khukhila kano namwe ne wenya khuruunge chirupia.”
Ne kakhali Naboti akobosia Ahabu ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhiingilile khukhua kumukabwa kwe bakuuka base.”
Ahabu akobola mu lichipi liewe ne asinyiikhe ne khukhalala lukali khu niko Naboti Omuyesireeli aba ne amuboleele. Akona khu sitaanda siewe, aloleelela khwisiisi mala khulia tawe.
Ne kakhali omukhasi wewe Yesebeli amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne okhalaale lukali mala se olikho olia siakhulia tawe?”
Akobosia ali, “Sikila niko Naboti Omuyesireeli amboleele. Nenyile ngule liruuti liewe, namwe aaba ne akana mue kamaloba kakaandi nga kameenako. Ne kakhali alobile.”
Yesebeli akobosia ali, “Ewe se oli omwami owa Isiraeli? Inyokha, olie mala kumwoyo kwowo kusangaale. Ese ndakhua liruuti lia Naboti!”
Nio Yesebeli aandika chibarwa mu lisina lia Ahabu. Achimaalilila kumuuri kwa Ahabu mala achirumira basaakhulu ne babaandu be efuma ba baamenya ne Naboti mu lukoba lwewe.
Chibarwa chaandikwa chiri, “Raao endaalo eye khusila khulia. Laanga babaandu alala mala mue Naboti abuundu e lukoosi.
Bukula babaandu babili be kunywanywa bekhale embi ne Naboti baloleelelane ne naye balome bali, ‘Khumuulile ne alaama Wele no mwami.’ Nio mumurusie enje we lukoba mala mumuupe kamabaale afwe.”
Nio babaandu be lukoba lwa Naboti ne basaakhulu ne babaandu be efuma ba baamenya mu Yesireeli bakhola niko Yesebeli aba ne alomile mu barwa nicho abarumiira.
Baraao endaalo eye khusila khulia. Balaanga babaandu alala mala bekhasia Naboti abuundu e lukoosi.
Be kunywanywa babili abo bachongela Naboti ebweeni we babaandu bali, “Khumuulile ne alikho alaama Wele no mwami.” Khwako bamurusia enje we lukoba mala bamupa kamabaale afwa.
Barumania burume khu Yesebeli bali, “Naboti afwiile.”
Nga Yesebeli ne aulila busa ali, Naboti bamupile kamabaale afwiile, aboolela Ahabu ali, “Naboti wafwiile. Yinyokha oche obukule liruuti nilio aloba khukhukusia libe liliowo.”
Nga Ahabu ne aulila busa ari, ali Naboti afwiile, acha abukula liruuti elio liaba liliewe.
Elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Elicha omutishibe eli,
“Yinyokha oche khu Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli oli e Samaria. Olamunyoola mu liruuti lia walimusaani Naboti nilio achiile khubukula libe liliewe.
Muboolele oli Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndoma ndi, ‘Werire Naboti ne khubukula liruuti liewe. Abuundu niio chimbwa chakhoombela kamafuki ka Naboti chikhakhombeleo ne kakowo koosi.’ ”
Nga Ahabu ne abona Elicha aloma ali, “Wanyoolile, musiku wase?” Elicha akobosia ali, “Yee, nakhunyoolile.” Ewe wekusiisie khukhola kali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndakhureerera libuna. Ndakhwinyosiao elala mala niire buli mundu owe siseecha munju yowo, baboe ne balekhuule sitube.
Be enju yowo balaba nga be enju eyo mwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati. Lundi baliba nga be enju eyo mwami Baasha okhwa Ahiya. Sikila lirima nilio umbambiisie ne khukhola Isiraeli yakhola bumayaanu.
Ne khu Yesebeli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Chimbwa chililiila Yesebeli munjakha che lukoba lwa Yesireeli.’
Omulebe owa Ahabu yesi yesi ofwiila mu lukoba, chimbwa chilimulia. Ne yesi yesi ofwiila mu lukoongo, chinyuni chilimulia.”
(Se abao omundu yesi yesi owekusia khukhola kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Ahabu tawe, niye omukhasi wewe Yesebeli aachilisia.
Akhola kasinyisia lukali mu khwisaaya bifwaani, nga Baamori ne baba ne bakhola, nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atimania mu sibala nisio Baisiraeli baba ne bengisia.)
Nga Ahabu ne aulila kamakhuwa ako, atabula chingubo chewe, afwara kamakunia. Asila khulia, akona mu makunia, lundi akeenda ne asuluunye.
Nio elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Elicha Omutishibe eli,
“Waboone nga Ahabu ne eboombiisie ebweeni wase? Sikila omwene eboombiisie ebweeni wase, se nja khureera libuna mu siise siewe tawe. Ne kakhali nja khureera libuna mu siise sio musoleeli wewe khu nju eya Ahabu.”

Kumuleembe kwabao akari wa Isiraeli ne Shamu khu miiko kitaru.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khataru omwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda acha khubona omwami Ahabu owa Isiraeli.
Ahabu areeba bakholi bewe ali, “Mumanyile muli lukoba lwa Ramoti-kileati lukhoyeele lube lulwefwe mala efwe khwasila busa, mala se khwalubukula khukhwama khu mwami owa Shamu tawe?”
Ne Ahabu areeba Yehoshafati ali, “Onyala wacha ne nase mwiie e Ramoti-kileati?” Yehoshafati akobosia ali, “Ese ndi nga ewe, babaandu base bali nga babowo, chifarasi chase chili nga chichowo.”
Yehoshafati aloma ali, “Khekhunyoe khureebe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio.”
Nio Ahabu alaanga bang'oosi alala, embi chimia chine mala abareeba ali, “Nje nibwaakale Ramoti-kileati namwe tawe?” Bamukobosia bali, “Cha osibwaakale, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhua bukhili.”
Ne kakhali Yehoshafati areeba ali, “Omung'oosi se alikhoo ano okundi niye khunyala khwabirirakho khwareeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe?”
Ahabu amukobosia ali, “Aliio mulala oramire, bali niye khunyala khwareeba Mikaya okhwa Imura. Ne kakhali ese namubiila, sikila se ang'oolelanga kamalayi tawe, ne kakhali kamabi.” Yehoshafati amukobosia ali, “Okhaloma orio tawe.”
Nio Ahabu alaanga mulala khu bemeelesi be lichipi lio mwami mala amuboolela ali, “Ndeerere khangu Mikaya okhwa Imura.”
Nono Yehoshafati ne Ahabu baba bekhaale khu ndebe che bubwami, ne bafwarire chingubo che bubwami, abuundu niio baulila, a silibwa sia Samaria. Ne bang'oosi boosi baba balikho bang'oola ebweeni waabwe.
Nio Sedekia okhwa Kenaana, mulala khu nibo, ekholela chinjika che bichuuma mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ne chinjika chino olapila Bashamu khukhwola nga ne obaulila elala.’ ”
Ne bang'oosi babaandi boosi bang'oola bario. Baloma bali, “Cha e Ramoti-kileati mala okhile. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhukhola obaule.”
Omurumwa owacha khureera Mikaya amuboolela ali, “Lola bang'oosi babaandi boosi bang'oolile bulayi khu mwami. Lekha lilomaloma liowo libe nga liliabwe.”
Ne Mikaya akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela lili nilio ndaloma.”
Nga ne acha ebweeni wo mwami Ahabu, omwami amureeba ali, “Mikaya, khunyala khwacha khwebwakaala Ramoti-kileati namwe tawe?”
Mikaya akobosia ali, “Cha wibwaakale mala okhile. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhukhola oule.”
Ne kakhali areeba Ahabu ali, “Ndikhuboolela khukhwola khenga ndi umbolele bung'ali bwong'ene mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Mikaya akobosia ali, “Mboone Isiraeli yoosi yasalaniile khu bikulu nga kamakheese kakhali no mwaayi tawe. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Babaandu bano se bali no mwimeelesi tawe, lekha buli mulala ache engo wewe mu muleembe.’ ”
Ahabu aboolela Yehoshafati ali, “Ese se khuboolele ndi se anyala ang'oolela kamalayi tawe ne kakhali kamabi!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, ‘Naanu onyala aombelesia Ahabu nio ache mala ererwe e Ramoti-kileati?’ Mulala aloma sisiindu silala, ne okundi aloma sisiindi.
Nio eroho ndala yecha yema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaloma eli, ‘Ese ndamuombelesia.’
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akireeba ali, ‘Olamubea oriena?’ Eroho eyo yakobosia eli, ‘Ese ndacha mala mbe omubeeyi khubirira khu bang'oosi ba Ahabu boosi.’ Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Cha omuombelesie ne olaba ne bukhili. Cha mala okhole orio.’ ”
Mikaya achiililila ali, “Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areere roho owe bubeeyi mu bang'oosi bowo bano boosi. Ne Wele aboolile kamabi khwiwe.”
Nio Omung'oosi Sedekia okhwa Kenaana acha khu Mikaya amupa luui mala amureeba ali, “Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha ariena khukhwama khwise alomaloma ne nawe?”
Mikaya amukobosia ali, “Olimanya endaalo niio olicha khukhwikisa mu lusiro lwe akari.”
Ne omwami Ahabu aloma ali, “Amba Mikaya mala mumukobosie khu Amoni, omwimeelesi owe lukoba ne khu Yoashi omusoleeli wo omwami.
Mulome muli, ‘omwami aloma ali: Ra omundu yuno mu siboe mala mumulisie siakhulia sitiiti ne kameechi, khukhwola nga ne engobola mu muleembe.’ ”
Mikaya aloma ali, “Kaaba bali okobola mu muleembe aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alomaloma khubirira khwise tawe.” Mala atasakho ali, “Ulila, enywe baandu mwesi.”
Nio omwami Ahabu owa Isiraeli no mwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda barekukha bacha e Ramoti-kileati.
Ahabu aboolela Yehoshafati ali, “Ese ndekosaasia fwaane omundu okundi nio nje mwiie. Ne ewe ifwara chingubo chowo che bubwami.” Nio omwami owa Isiraeli engila mwiie ne ekosiaasiisie.
Omwami owa Shamu aba alakile banamae bewe kamakhumi kataru na babili be khu makaari ke liie ali, “Mukhebwaakalakho omundu yesi yesi tawe ne akhali omwami owa Isiraeli yeng'ene.”
Nio nga ne babona omwami Yehoshafati, boosi bebaasia bali ali omwami owa Isiraeli. Bayuukha bamwibwaakala. Yehoshafati alila.
Nga banamae kamakhumi kataru na babili abo bamanya bali se ali omwami owe Isiraeli tawe balekha khumutimania.
Ne kakhali omunamae mulala akhweesa buyiingo bwewe embi ne omwami owa Isiraeli mala amulasa akari we bubwongelo bwe chingubo chewe che liie. Omwami Ahabu aboolela owatimianga likaari liewe ali, “Yuukha, mala undusie mwiie sikila bandasile.”
Liie liaba liamemee endaalo ng'ene eyo. Omwami Ahabu arama ne akalamiliile mu likaari liewe, aloleleele Bashamu. Oli yola akolooba afwa. Kamafuki khukhwama niio bamulasa keekha koola asi we likaari liewe lie liie.
Oli enyanga echa khukwa, lilaka liarura liacha mu banamae ba Isiraeli lili, “buli mundu akobole mu lukoba lwewe ne mu sibala siewe.”
Nio omwami Ahabu afwa mala bamusuta bamureera e Samaria mala bamusiikha.
Basiinga likaari liewe mu litiisi lia Samaria, niio chimbwa chakhoomba kamafuki kewe mala bakhasi baeyani besiinga mu litiisi elio khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo aloma.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio omwami Ahabu akhola, alala ne lichipi liewe lie kimisaanga, ne chingoba choosi nicho ombakha, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Nio Ahabu afwa mala Ahasia omusoleeli wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Yehoshafati okhwa Asa arakikha khukhwaamiia Yuda mu mwiiko kwa khane kwe mu bwami bwa Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli.
Yehoshafati aba bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kiraano nga arakikha khukhwaamiia. Amiia khukhwama Yerusalemu khu miiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano. Maayi wewe aba bali Asuba, omukhaana owa Shilihi.
Yehoshafati akeenda mu ngila choosi cha raraawe. Se akaluukhanakho tawe. Akhola kali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali se arusiao abuundu aesuta tawe. Babaandu bachiililila khuanilao chimbosio ne khukhwosielayo bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Yehoshafati yesi akhola kumuleembe no mwami owa Isiraeli.
Nono bikholwa bioosi nibio Yehoshafati akhola, kamaani kewe niko okesia, ne kamae keewe niko apana, biaandikwa mu Sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Yuda.
Enyosiao balaaya be siseecha boosi mu sibala babaramao khukhwama mu ndaalo cha raraawe Asa.
Sibala sia Edomu se siaba no mwami tawe. Siamiibwa no mwimeelesi.
Omwami Yehoshafati ombakha chimeeli che bubwofuli cheleele chiche e Ofiri khureera esahabu. Ne se chacha tawe sikila bibuli bie kameechi biachipila e Esioni-geberi.
Nio omwami Ahasia okhwa Ahabu aboolela Yehoshafati ali, “Lekha bakholi base bache mu meeli ne bakholi bowo.” Ne kakhali Yehoshafati se enya tawe.
Yehoshafati afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bakuuka bewe mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne Yehoramu omusoleeli wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Ahasia okhwa Ahabu arakikha khukhwaamiia Isiraeli khukhwama Samaria mu mwiiko kwe ekhumi ne saba kwe bubwami bwa Yehoshafati, omwami owa Yuda. Amiia Samaria khu miiko kibili.
Akhola kakaba kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola bumayaanu nga raraawe Ahabu ne maawe Yesebeli. Lundi akhola nga omwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati, owakhola Isiraeli yakhola kamamayaanu.
Ahasia akholela ne khukhwisaaya Baali. Aambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli lirima buli mu siindu nga raraawe ne akhola.

Enyuma we lifwa lia Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli, sibala sia Moabu siarura khu bwami bwa Isiraeli.
Nono omwami Ahasia owa Isiraeli aanukha akwa asi khukhwama mu litirisia lie korofa yewe mu Samaria mala aumiia lukali. Aruma barumwa ne ababoolela ali, “Cha mureebe Baali-sebubu, wele owa Ekironi mulole ne enyala naona bulwaale buno.”
Ne kakhali malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela omung'oosi Elicha Omutishibe ali, “Yinyokha oche wakaanane ne barume bo mwami owa Samaria. Bareebe oli, ‘Siina sikila ne mucha khureeba Baali-sebubu, wele owa Ekironi? Enywe mwibaasia muli Wele se ali mu Isiraeli tawe?’
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Se okharure mu sitaanda nimwo okonile omwo tawe. Ng'ali okhafwe’ ” Nio Elicha arekukha.
Barume bakobola khu mwami, mala abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mukoboole?”
Ne bamukobosia bali, “Omundu echile akhwakaanana akhuboolela ali, ‘Kobola khu mwami omurumire mumuboolele muli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, Wele mu Isiraeli mbamo tawe nio oche oreebe Baali-sebubu, wele owa Ekironi? Nono se olarura mu sitaanda nimwo konile omwo tawe. Ne kakhali ng'ali olafwa.’ ”
Omwami abareeba ali, “Omundu owichile amwakaanana enywe oyo mala amuboolela bibiindu bino abeele omundu owa lukano siina?”
Nio Ahasia aloma ali, “Abeele Elicha Omutishibe.”
Nio omwami aruma omunamae omukhulu ne banamae kamakhumi karaano. Omunamae omukhulu acha khu Elicha owaba ne ekhaale khu lukulu khungaaki. Amuboolela ali, “Mundu wa Wele, omwami aloma ali yiikha asi.”
Lundi omwami aruma omunamae okundi omukhulu ne banamae kamakhumi karaano. Acha mala aboolela Elicha ali, Mundu wa Wele, omwami aloma ali, “Yiikha asi khangu.”
Ne kakhali Elicha akobosia ali, “Ese naaba ne endi omundu owa Wele, lekha kumulilo kwikhe asi khukhwama mwikulu mala kukhwosie ewe ne babaandu bowo.” Nio kumulilo kwekha asi khukhwama mwikulu mala kwosia omunamae omukhulu oyo ne banamae bewe kamakhumi karaano.
Lundi omwami aruma omunamae omukhulu owe khataru ne banamae kamakhumi karaano. Aniina khu lukulu, mala acha asikama asi ebweeni wa Elicha ne amwikoonjelela ali, “Ee mundu wa Wele, ekhusaba ndi lekha bulamu bwase ne bulamu bwe bakholi bowo kamakhumi karaano bano bube ne bukhala ebweeni wowo.
Kumulilo kwamile mwikulu kwosia banamae bakhulu babili bataayi be babaandu kamakhumi karaano ne babaandu babwe boosi. Ne kakhali luno kholele siisa.”
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Elicha ali, “Yiikha asi ne naye. Okhamuria tawe.”
Nio Elicha enyokha mala ekha ne naye bacha khubona omwami. Elicha aboolela Ahasia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, ‘Siina sikila ne waruma barumwa khureeba Baali-sebubu, wele owa Ekironi? Sikila wibaasia oli Wele mu Isiraeli mbamo tawe niye onyala wareeba likhuwa? Nono se olarura khu sitaanda nikhwo okonile tawe. Ng'ali olafwa.’ ”
Ahasia afwa nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma khubirira khu Elicha. Yoramu wandaaye
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bia Ahasia nibio akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.

Siise nga ne sioola nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abukulilakho Elicha ache mwikulu mu siafusia sikali, Elicha ne Elisha baba balikho bacha Kilikali.
Nio Elicha aboolela Elisha ali, “Yikhala ano ekhusaba. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andumire ese enje e Beteli!”
Ne kakhali Elisha akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali ne lundi nga wesi ne omenyile, ese se endakhulekha tawe.” Nio bacha bola Beteli.
Ne sipupu sie bang'oosi ba baamenya e Beteli siacha khu Elisha mala bamureeba bali, “Ewe wamanyile oli luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhubukula omwami wowo?”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Ee namanyile. Ne kakhali okhakalomalomakho tawe.”
Elicha aboolela Elisha ali, “Elisha, ekhusaba rama ano, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andumire ese nje e Yeriko.”
Ne kakhali Elisha akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, lundi nga wesi ne omenyile ese se endakhulekha ewe tawe.” Nio bacha bola e Yeriko.
Sipupu sie bang'oosi ba baamenya e Yeriko bacha khu Elisha mala siamureeba sili, “Ewe wamanyile oli luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhubukula omwami wowo?”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Ee namanyile. Ne kakhali khukhakalomalomakho tawe.”
Nio Elicha aboolela Elisha ali, “Ekhusaba ewe wikhala ano. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andumire ese enje khu Luuchi lwa Yoritani.”
Ne kakhali Elisha akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ne lundi nga wesi ne omenyile ese se ndakhulekha tawe.” Nio bachiililila.
Sipupu sie bang'oosi kamakhumi karaano siosi siabaloondakho e Yoritani. Elicha ne Elisha bema a luuchi, ne bang'oosi kamakhumi karaano abo bema sinao.
Nio Elicha afuula engubo yewe eye khungaaki akiulukusa mala apa kameechi. Kameechi kakabukhanamo keela eyi ne eyi mala niye ne Elisha bambukhilao bacha lubeka luluundi lwe sibala.
Nga bamala khukhwambukha, Elicha aboolela Elisha ali, “Reeba nisio enyala nakhukholela ewe ne ekhabukulwa tawe.”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Nosiima, ndekhele kumukabwa
Elicha akobosia ali, “Wareebire sisiindu siaandalafu. Ne kakhali waaba ne olambona ne endikho mbukulwa khukhwama khwiwe, sikhabe sisiowo. Waaba ne okhambona tawe, se sikhekholekhe tawe.”
Nga baba ne bakeenda ne balomaloma, likaari ne chifarasi che kumulilo biecha biaukhasia Elicha khukhwama khu Elisha. Nio Elicha acha mwikulu khubirira mu siifuusia.
Elisha abona mala ayokela ali, “Paapa! Paapa. Kamakaari ka Isiraeli ne babaandu batimia chifarasi chako!” Ne Elisha se abona Elicha lundi tawe.
Elisha atabulamo engubo yewe mu bitonyi bibili.
Angala engubo eya Elicha eyaba ne ekwile mala akobolayo acha eema khu sikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Elisha apa kameechi khulwe khurumikhira engubo eya Elicha ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Elicha ali waena?” Nga ne apa engubo, kameechi kakabukhana keela eyi ne eyi, mala ambukha.
Nga sipupu sie bang'oosi ba baaba Yeriko ne babona Elisha sinao baloma bali, “Roho owa Elicha luno ali khu Elisha!” Nio bacha khumwakaanana benama asi ebweeni wewe,
bamuboolela bali, “Efwe khuli ano ne babaandu kamakhumi karaano. Nosiima lekha bache baenje omwami wowo. Wakana Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubukuule mala amumwaatile khu lukulu lulalakho namwe mu litooma lilalakho.”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Mukharumania tawe.”
Ne kakhali nga ne bamwikoonjelela, chisoni chamuaamba mala aloma ali, “Rumania.” Nono barumania babaandu kamakhumi karaano Bamuenja khulwe chindaalo chitaru ne se bamunyoola tawe.
Nio bakobola khu Elisha e Yeriko niio aba amenya. Ababoolela ali, “Se namuboolela ndi mukhacha tawe?”
Nono babaandu be lukoba lwa Yeriko bacha khu Elisha mala bamuboolela bali, “omwami lola abuundu niio lukoba luno luli ali abuundu alayi e khumenya. Ne kakhali kameechi kali kamabi ne kamaloba se kalimo engakha tawe.”
Aloma ali, chukha kumuunyu khu sibuumba siiya mala munderere. Bamureerera.
Nio acha amoni eye kameechi mala achukhao kumuunyu okwo ne aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali: ‘Nakholile kameechi kano khuuba kamalayi khukhwama luno khuchilila se kakhareerekho lifwa namwe khuusia tawe.’ ”
Mala kameechi ako kaba kamalayi khukhwamila ao khukhwola luno, bulayi bwene nga Elisha ne aloma.
Elisha acha khukhwama Yeriko khukhwola Beteli. Nga aba ne acha, babaana basoleeli balala bama mu lukoba mala bamukholela embelekeu ne bamuyokelela bali, “Musiole, rura ano”
Elisha ekhebukha ne nga ne ababona, abalaama mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio kamang'u kamakhasi kaama kasuungukha mu sichakha katabulakamo basoleeli kamakhumi kane ne babili abo mu bitonyi.
Elisha ama ao achiililila ola khu sikulu sia Karimeli, mala akobola e Samaria.

Mu mwiiko kwe likhumi na munaane kwe bubwami bwo mwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda, Yoramu okhwa Ahabu aaba omwami owa Isiraeli. Amiia ne ali Samaria khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na kibili.
Yoramu akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kakhaba kario, se aaba nga raraawe ne maawe tawe, sikila arusiao sifwaani sia Baali nisio raraawe aba ne akhola.
Ne kakhaba kario, achiililila khukhola bumayaanu nga Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati owarangirira Isiraeli khukhola bumayaanu. Yoramu se aakama khukhola bumayaanu buno tawe.
Nono Mesha omwami owa Moabu aba abaya kamakheese. Buli kumwiiko aruunganga busuuru khu mwami owa Isiraeli kamameeme chielefu emia ndala ne bufuumbo bwe kamakheese chielefu emia ndala.
Ne kakhali nga omwami Ahabu afwa, Mesha akaluukhana khu mwami owa Isiraeli.
Omwami Yoramu arura khukhwama mu Samaria siise esio mala acha abuusia banamae ba Isiraeli boosi.
Arumania likhuwa khu mwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda ali, “Omwami owa Moabu angalukhaanekho. Onyala wacha nase khwapana ne Moabu?”
Omwami Yehoshafati akobosia ali, “Ee, endacha ne nawe. Ese ndi nga ewe. Banamae base bali nga babowo ne chifarasi chase chili nga chichowo.”
Yehoshafati areeba ali, “Khulamila lubeka siina nio khwibwaakale?”
Yoramu akobosia ali, “Khulabirira mu sichiimi sia, Edomu.”
Nio omwami owa Isiraeli acha ne omwami owa Yuda ne omwami owa Edomu. Enyuma we likeenda lie khubotookhelela chindaalo saba, kameechi kabwe kawa ne se karamakho khulwe banamae namwe chisaang'i nicho baba nacho tawe.
Omwami Yoramu owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Aa! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alangile babaami bataru bano khubara mu bunyali bwa Moabu.”
Omwami Yehoshafati areeba ali, “Se alio omung'oosi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ano niye khunyala khwareeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu niye tawe?”
Nio mulala khu bakholi bo mwami owa Isiraeli akobosia ali, “Elisha okhwa Shafati ali ano. Aba omukholi owa Elicha.”
Omwami Yehoshafati aloma ali, “Ali omung'oosi owa ng'ali.” Nio babaami bataru abo bacha khu Elisha.
Elisha aboolela omwami owa Isiraeli ali, “Sendi nende nisio ekhukholela tawe. Cha khu bang'oosi ba raraao ne maao.”
Yoramu omwami owa Isiraeli amukobosia ali, “Tawe! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye okhulaangile efwe babaami bataru nio akhure mu makhono ko omwami owa Moabu.”
Ne Elisha akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we kamae niye ese ekholelanga ne amenya, abanga se naria omwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda tawe, andi se nakhakhulolile namwe nakhubona ewe tawe.
Nono nderere omukhupi we lituungu.”
Nga omukhupi apa lituungu liewe, kamaani ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kecha mu Elisha.
Elisha aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ekhakhole litooma lino libemo chisebele che kameechi.
Se mulabona efula yosi yosi namwe ekhuungu tawe. Ne kakhali litooma likhechulemo kameechi niko enywe ne chikhaafu chenywe ne chisaang'i chenywe mukhanywe.’ ”
Lino lili likhuwa liliangu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi akhare Bamoabu mu bunyali bwenywe.
Ne mukhaule buli lukoba lusire ne lulayi. Mulikwisia buli murongooro kumulayi mala muliikasia chinuma choosi che kameechi. Ne mulionaka buli mukuunda kumulayi khulwe khukhwichusiamo kamabaale.
Kumutikhinyi kukwaloondakho embi siise sie khuaana embosio, kameechi kecha khukhwama lubeka lwa Edomu keekha khukhwola nga sibala ne siechula kameechi.
Bamoabu boosi baulila bali babaami bataru baba bechile khubebwaakala. Babaandu boosi ba baaba ne banyala khu banula bulwaani khukhwama khu mwana khukhwola khu musaakhulu, balaangwa barura mala balindila khu lwakha.
Ne kakhali nga Bamoabu ne benyokha makhelebeende kumutikhinyi kukwaloondakho, enyanga yaba elikho ekhosia khu meechi. Yaba yakakholile kabonekhe kamabesemu pe nga kamafuki.
Nio baloma bali, “Kano kamafuki niko. Ng'ali babaami bapane mala berane babene ne babene! Khuche khuyaaye kimiaandu kie bafu!”
Ne kakhali nga bola mu kambi ye Baisiraeli, Baisiraeli benyokha babebwaakala mala babatimania khukhwola nga belukha bawa. Baisiraeli baloondakho ne beera Bamoabu.
Batechula chingoba chabwe. Ne bamwaata kamabaale buli abuundu mu buli mukuunda kumulayi. Bemia buli enuma eye kameechi mala bakwisia buli murongooro kumulayi. Lukoba lwa Kiri-Hareseti lwong'ene lulwasikala. Kakhaba kario, banamae bafuruusia chikhoroto becha balwibwaakala mala balubukula.
Nga omwami owa Moabu amanya ali liie liabeele lirafu khu niye, abukula babaandu be chimbalu chimia saba mala bakhaka khukhwikula sibaanga lubeka luluundi lwo omwami owa Edomu
Nio abukula omusoleeli wewe omubele owenyekha khuuba omwami mu bweyaangu bwewe enyuma wewe mala amuaana nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khwisiisi lie lukoba. Ne Baisiraeli nga ne babona bario, babiililwa lukali. Balekha lukoba olwo bakobola mu maloba kabwe.

Nono mukho omung'oosi mulala khu be sipupu sie bang'oosi acha khu Elisha mala amulilila ali, “Omukholi wowo, omuseecha wase afwiile. Ne omanyile oli aba ariia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali omundu niye walimusani aba ne likobi liewe ama khwicha khubukula basoleeli base babili babe nasioobi bewe.”
Ne Elisha amureeba ali, “Khukholele siina? Mboolele, oli na siina engo?” Namulekhwa amukobosia ali, “Sendi ne sisiindu siosi siosi tawe ne ekhali esaachi eye kamafura.”
Nio Elisha amuboolela ali, “Khoche khu bachirani mala osabe chisaachi chiikhalimo sisiindu tawe, chingali nga ne onyala.”
“Nio ewe ne basoleeli bowo muche munju, mwiyikalilemo, mala murakikhe khuketa kamafura mu saachi. Buli eyichula mukire alubeka.”
Nio omukhasi oyo ne basoleeli bewe bengila munju beyikalilamo. Basoleeli bewe bachiililila khureera kamafura ne niye achiililila khuchukha mu saachi.
Nga ne baba ne bechusie chisaachi choosi namulekhwa oyo areeba basoleeli bewe esaachi ekiindi ne eliio. Mulala khu basoleeli bewe amukobosia ali, “Ekiindi se eliio tawe.” Mala kamafura ke chiseituni keema khuketululukha.
Echa aboolela Elisha mala Elisha amuboolela ali, “Cha, okusie kamafura mala oruunge likobi liowo ne chirupia chilakhuramirakho ewe ne basoleeli bowo murumikhire.”
Endaalo ndala Elisha acha Shunemu niio omukhasi omuiinda aba amenya. Omukhasi oyo amulaanga alie siakhulia. Khukhwamila abwenao buli lwosi nga ne achichanga abirangao, engilangamo mala alia siakhulia.
Omukhasi oyo aboolela omuseecha wewe ali, “Ese endola ndi omundu owichangano buli lwosi yuno ali omundu omutakatifu owa Wele.
Lekha khumwombakhile erumu khu korofa khuremo sitaanda, emesa, endebe ne etaa, nio buli lwosi ne akhukeniia anyala akonamo.”
Endaalo ndala Elisha echa Shunemu mala aniina acha mu siseenge khuola.
Aboolela Kehasi, omukholi wewe ache alaange omukhasi Omushunemi oyo. Omukhasi oyo echa eema ebweeni wa Elisha.
Elisha aboolela Kehasi ali, “Boolela omukhasi yuno oli khwaboone nga nilwo akhukhalabaniile; nono enya nafwe khumukholele siindu siina? Enya khumusabile siosi siosi khukhwama khu mwami namwe khu komanda owe kamae?”
Omukhasi Mushunemi oyo akobosia ali, “Ese emenyile mu baandu base babeene.”
Elisha areeba Kehasi ali, “Nono ese nyala namukholela siina?”
Kehasi akobosia ali, “Bulayi, se ali ne omwana omusoleeli tawe, mala omuseecha wewe asaakhulue.”
Elisha aloma ali, “Mulaange.” Echa mala eema muliango.
Elisha amuboolela ali, “Kumwiiko kukwiicha siise nga sino siri okhabe wamemile omwana omusoleeli mu makhono kowo.”
Omukhasi oyo aloma ali, “Tawe! Omwami, ee mundu owa Wele. Nosiima okhambea tawe!”
Ne kakhali nga Elisha aloma ne omukhasi oyo, mu siise sie khumiicha nga esio kumwiiko kukwaloondakho, aesia mala asaala omwana omusoleeli.
Nga omwana ne achoa, endaalo ndala acha niio raraawe aba ne babaandu bakesa.
Aboolela raraawe ali, “Kumurwe kwanjira, kumurwe kwanjira!” Raraawe aboolela omukholi ali, “Yila omwana yuno niio maawe ali.”
Ne nga omukholi amema omusoleeli oyo amuyilila maawe, maawe amulela busa khu bikele khukhwola mwiangilwe mala afwa.
Nio aniina mungaaki mu rumu amura khu sitaanda sia Elisha mala ekalayo kumuliango arura.
Nio alanga omuseecha wewe mala amuboolela ali, “Ruma omukholi mulala ne epunda eche ano. Nenya enje khangu khu Elisha mala engobole.”
Omuseecha wewe amureeba ali, “Siina sikila oche endaalo yino? Se eli e Sabato namwe Naikara eye kumwesi kumuyia tawe.”
Omukhasi amukobosia ali, “Bulaba bulayi.”
Nio arekekha epunda mala aboolela omukholi ali, “Timia epunda khangu ne okhacha kalaa ne ekhakhuboolele ndi khola orio tawe.”
Nono arura, arekukha, mala acha khu Elisha khu sikulu sia Karimeli. Elisha amubona ne echa mala aboolela omukholi wewe Kehasi ali, “Lola Omushunemu engelekha.
Tima khangu oche omwakaanile mala omureebe kaaba bali niye, ne omuseecha wewe ne omwana wewe ne bali bulayi.”
Omukhasi oyo aboolela Kehasi ali buli siindu silayi.
Ne nga ola khu Elisha khu lukulu, asikama ebweeni wewe, mala atiila bikele biewe. Kehasi echa bali amusindikhe amurusieo. Ne kakhali Elisha amuboolela ali, “Mulekhe abe. Se onyala wabona oli ali ne bubeeleli bukali tawe? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi angisile ne se amboolelekho sisiindu tawe.”
Omukhasi oyo areeba Elisha ali, “Omwami nakhusaba omwana omusoleeli? Se nakhuboolela ndi okhambea tawe?”
Elisha aboolela Kehasi ali, “Yirekekha! Bukula esiimbo yase mala oche. Ne wakaanana omundu okhamukheesia tawe, ne omundu yesi yesi ne akhukheesia, okhafukiilila tawe. Yalisia esiimbo yase khu bweeni bwe kumubili kwo omwana.”
Nio omukhasi oyo aboolela Elisha ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ne wesi nga ne omenyile, se ndakhulekha tawe.” Nio Elisha enyokha mala amuloondakho.
Kehasi arangira ebweeni wabwe acha alisia esiimbo eya Elisha khu bweeni bwe kumubili kwo mwana oyo. Sisiindu siosi siosi se siauliilikhanakho namwe simanyisio sie bulamu siosi siosi tawe. Khwako akobolayo khucha khukhwakaanana Elisha mala aboola ali, “Omusoleeli oyo se enyokhe tawe.”
Nga Elisha ne engila mu rumu, abona omwana afwiile akonile khu sitaanda.
Nono engilamo mala ekalila Kehasi ne omukhasi oyo lulwiki enje. Mala asaaya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Acha akona khu musoleeli oyo ara kumunwa kwewe khu munwa kwo mwana, chimoni chiwe khu moni cho mwana, ne kamakhono khu makhono ko mwana. Nga ne akona ekololela khu mwana omufu, kumubili kwo mwana kwarakikha khuba ne luluuya.
Elisha enyokha lundi akeendakho mu rumu ola eyi akobola. Ne lundi akobola akona khu mubili kwo omwana omufu amwikololelakho. Omusoleeli oyo asimula khukhwola saba mala amoka.
Nio Elisha alanga Kehasi mala amuboolela alaange maawe owo omusoleeli oyo. Nga ne engila mukari, Elisha amuboolela ali, “Bukula omwana wowo.”
Omukhasi oyo akwa mu bikele bia Elisha enama bubweeni bwetiila asi mala abukula omwana wewe arekukha.
Enjala nga ne yabao mu sibala sioosi, Elisha lundi akobola Kilikali. Nga aba ne ekhaale ne sipupu sie bang'oosi, aboolela omukholi wewe ali, “Ra endekhelo emboofu khu mayika mala oteekhele sipupu sie bang'oosi sifuluko.”
Mulala khu bang'oosi abo acha khukhwaa chinyenyi. Anyoola lurabu lwe mundaa mala abuta bimuka bialwo bikali nga yaba ne anyala khusuta. Abireera atonya abimwaata mu ndekhelo eye sifuluko. Se amanya bili siina nisio tawe.
Sifuluko siomolwa babaandu balie. Nga baba ne balikho balia, balilila Elisha bali, “Silimo bufwisi!” Ne se banyala khulia tawe.
Elisha ababoolela ali, “Nono mbelesie siakhulia.” Asichukha mu ndekhelo mala aloma ali, “Chukhila babaandu sifuluko balie.” Ne se siabamo sisiindu sibi tawe.
Omundu lundi ama khu Baali Shalisha, areerera Elisha kimikaati kamakhumi kabili, kie eshayiri, ne biakhulia bibiindi biibisi mu likunia. Ebio biaba biakhulia biyaaya. Elisha aboolela omukholi wewe ali, “Elesia sipupu sie bang'oosi silie bino.”
Ne kakhali omukholi amukobosia ali, “Wibaasia oli nyala naelesia babaandu emia ndala siakhulia nga sino?”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Baelesie balie, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, balalia mala birame.”
Nio omukholi abomolela biakhulia. Balia mala biarama khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Bashamu baba bacha khunuula Baisiraeli mala babukula omukhaana mu Isiraeli omutiiti nga omuambe aaba omukholi wo omukhasi owa Naamani.
Endaalo ndala omukhaana oyo aboolela omukhaaye wewe ali “omwami wase akhaboone omung'oosi oli mu Samaria. Omung'oosi oyo akhamuonisie bulwaale bwewe buno.”
Naamani acha khu mwami mala amuboolela niko omukhaana Omuisiraeli oyo amuboolela.
Omwami owa Shamu aloma ali, “Cha luno luri, ne endarumania ebarwa khu mwami owa Isiraeli.”
Nio Naamani abukula bitonyi ekhumi bie efwesa bitonyi chielefu sita bie sahabu ne chingubo ekhumi chindayi mala arekukha.
Ayila ebarwa khu mwami owa Isiraeli eloma eli, “Nga ebarwa yino ne ekhwoolela, manya oli narumire omukholi wase Naamani khwiwe omuonie kamakele kewe.”
Nga omwami owa Isiraeli ne asoma ebarwa, atabula chingubo chewe mala aloma ali, “Ese Wele
Ne kakhali nga omung'oosi Elisha ne aulila ali omwami owa Isiraeli aba atabuule chingubo chewe, arumanisilia omwami burume ali, “Siina sikila ne otabula chingubo chowo? Lekha Naamani eeche luno luri niio endi. Nio alamanya ali omung'oosi ali mu Isiraeli.”
Nio Naamani ne chifarasi chewe ne likaari acha mala eema amuliango kwe enju eya Elisha.
Elisha aruma burume khu Naamani ne aloma ali, “Cha wisiinge mu luuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwola saba mala olaonisibwa kamakele elala obe omumiliiu
Ne kakhali Naamani aambwa lirima mala arekukha ne aloma ali, “Nibaasiisie ndi aleecha niio ndi mala asabe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe. Nibaasiisie ndi alabisia kumukhono kwewe abuundu e kamakele
Chinjichi cha Abana ne Faripari, chiili mu Damasika se chili chindayi khukhila luluuchi lwosi lwosi mu Isiraeli ta ku? Se enyala abeele ne siingamo mala naona? Nio Naamani arekukha ne ali ne lirima likali.”
Ne kakhali bakholi bewe bamuchakho mala bamuboolela bali, “Paapa, abanga omung'oosi akhuboolele khukhola sisiindu siboofu, andi se wakhakholile? Ne buandalafu siina obwo aaba ne aloma ali yisiinga mala oone kamakele?”
Nio Naamani arekukha ekha esiikha mu luuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwola saba nga likhuwa lio omundu owa Wele ne lialoma. Nio siikhoba siewe siakobola siaba nga sio omwana omutoro.
Nio Naamani ne babaandu bewe boosi bakobola khu Elisha. Acha eema ebweeni wa Elisha mala aloma ali, “Lola, luno namanyile endi se aliio Wele mu sibala sioosi tawe ne mukhali mu Isiraeli. Nono, fukiilila siianwa khukhwama khwise.”
Ne kakhali Elisha amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye ekholelanga ne amenyile mindali, se enyala nafukiilila sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.” Naamani amwekoonjelela ne Elisha se afukiilila khubukula siianwa tawe.
Nio Naamani aloma ali, “Waaba ne okhabukula siianwa tawe, ekhusaba liloba litiiti
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya ambeela sisiindu silala: omwami wase ne acha khusaaya mu lukaangu lwa Rimoni mala ese ne ekhachichenge ne naye khukhwisaaya Rimoni.”
Elisha amuboolela ali, “Khoche mu muleembe.”
Ne kakhali nga Naamani ne acha enaakho atiiti,
Kehasi omukholi owa Elisha, omundu owa Wele ebaasia ali, “Lola omwami wase alekhile Naamani omushamu ne se afukiliile nisio Naamani areerire tawe. Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, ndatima muloondekho mala munyoolekho sisiindu.”
Nio Kehasi aloonda khu Naamani. Nga Naamani ne abona omundu amuloondilekho enyuma alikho atima, ekha khukhwama mu likaari mala amureeba ali, “Karieena?”
Ne Kehasi aloma ali, “Kamalayi, omwami wase andumire ndome ndi, bang'oosi babili baele bakhanjichakho luno luri. Bamile mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Ekhusaba umbelesiekho bitonyi bie efwesa ne chingubo chibili che kumulukha.”
Naamani akobosia ali, “Nosiima bukula bitonyi bibili bie efwesa.” Amwekoonjelela, aboa efwesa mu mifuko kibili ne chingubo che kumuulukha chibili aelesia bakholi bewe mala abaruma barangire ebweeni wa Kehasi.
