Nga ne ola a lukulu, Kehasi ababukula kimifuko kibili ekio mala akingisia munju. Akheesia bakholi ba Naamani bakoboleyo.
Kehasi akobola munju mala eema ebweeni wa Elisha, omwami wewe. Elisha amureeba ali, “Kehasi, wama waena?”
Akobosia ali, “Abuundu tawe omwami.”
Ne Elisha amuboolela ali, “Ese se mbeleyo mu roho nga omundu oyo ne ekhile khukhwama khu likaari liewe khukhwakanila ewe ta ku? Esino se sili siise sie khufukiilila chirupia ne chingubo, kimikuunda kie kimiseituni nende kie kimisabibu tawe. Se sili siise sie khufukiilila kamakheese, chikhaafu, namwe bakholi be siikhasi nende be siseecha tawe.
Ne luno kamakele ka Naamani kalakhwichakho, ewe nende be lisaaye liowo mulaba nako mindali na mindali.”
Nga Kehasi ne arekukha aba ne kamakele, siikhoba siewe siaba siwaanga chwe.

Endaalo ndala sipupu sie bang'oosi nisio Elisha aba omwimeelesi wasio siamwiloochela sili, “Abuundu niio khumenyile asi we buliindi bwowo ali atiiti lukali.
Khulekhe khuche e Yoritani mala khureme kimirongooro khukwisie, nio khwombakhile abuundu niio khunyala khwamenya.”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Khe muche.”
Mulala khu nibo aloma ali, “Ekhusaba, lekha khuche ne nawe.” Akobosia ali, “Ndacha nanywe.”
Nono acha ne nabo. Nga bola e Yoritani barakikha khurema kimirongooro.
Ne kakhali Nga mulala khu nibo ne aba ne alikho arema kumurongooro, abwene ne abwene eaywa yakwa mu meechi. Alilila Elisha ali, “Aa! Omwami eaywa eyo ebeele esaba!”
Elisha amureeba ali, “Ekwiile waena?”
Omundu oyo amwekesia abuundu ao, mala Elisha afuna lusaala alumwaata mu meechi, mala akhola eaywa yakelakela khu meechi.
Ne Elisha aloma ali, “Kibukule.” Omundu oyo enama mala akibukula.
Nono omwami owa Shamu acha mwiie ne Isiraeli. Areeba banamae bewe mala arobora abuundu khukhwombakha ekambi.
Nio Elisha arumira omwami owa Isiraeli likhuwa ne aloma ali, “Okhacha siimbi ne abuundu ao tawe, sikila Bashamu balikho bachao.”
Nio omwami owa Isiraeli aloleelesia mala atiila abuundu ao ne se achao tawe. Elisha buli siise akanianga omwami nio omwami aona biise bikali.
Omwami owa Shamu anaanisibwa munganakani lukali khu lino. Alanga bakholi bewe mala abareeba ali, “Naanu khwifwe oli lubeka lwo omwami owa Isiraeli?”
Mulala khu nibo amukobosia ali, “omwami, se aliio tawe. Omung'oosi Elisha aboolelanga omwami owa Isiraeli kamamoonyo niko oboolelanga mu lusiro lwowo.”
Omwami aloma ali, “Yiima mumanye niio ali mala ese ndamuaamba.” Bamuboolela bali Elisha ali e Dotani.
Nio aruma banamae bakali ebweneeyo ne chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie. Bola e lukoba asilo mala balubotookhelesia.
Nga omukholi owa Elisha enyokha arura anje kumutikhinyi, abona banamae ne chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie babotookhelesie lukoba. Akobola munju khu Elisha mala amureeba ali, “omwami! Khwaela! Khulakhola khuriena?”
Elisha amukobosia ali, “Okharia tawe. Efwe khuli ne banamae bakali lubeka lwefwe khukhila bababwe.”
Nio Elisha asaba ne aloma ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhusaba, mwikule chimoni chewe abone!” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia lisaba lia Elisha mala omukholi owa Elisha alola abona lukulu lwechuule chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie ke kumulilo kabotookhelesie Elisha.
Nga Bashamu ne bebwaakala Elisha, Elisha asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma ali, “Ekhusaba obofusie babaandu bano.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia lisaba liewe mala ababofusia.
Nono Elisha ababoolela ali, “Eyino se eli engila tawe ne oluno se luli lukoba nilwo mulayiimanga tawe. Khe munondekho muyile khu mundu niye mulayiimanga.” Mala abaraangirira abayila e Samaria.
Nga ne bengila mu lukoba lwe Samaria busa bari, Elisha asaba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bekule chimoni chabwe mala babone.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abekula chimoni lundi mala babona. Besiindukha khubona bali baba mu Samaria mukari.
Nga omwami owa Isiraeli ne abona Bashamu, areeba Elisha ali, “Paapa mbeere?”
Elisha akobosia ali, “Okhabeera tawe. Se onyala weera akhaba abo nibo aambile embaambe khulwe khurumikhira embalu ne buyiingo tawe. Baelesie kumukaati ne kameechi balie mala banywe bakobole khu mwami wabwe.”
Nio omwami owa Isiraeli abarekekhera naikara emboofu. Nga bamala khulia ne khunywa ababoolela bache mala bakobole khu mwami wabwe. Khukhwamila ao, Bashamu se bakobola lundi khunuula mu sibala sia Isiraeli tawe.
Enyuma we siise, omwami Beni-hadadi owa Shamu emeelela banamae bewe boosi mala baniina Samaria.
Ne Enjala yabao engali mu lukoba lwa Samaria nga baba ne baluboto kheleesie. Nio kumurwe kwe epunda kwakulwa bitonyi kamakhumi munaane bie efwesa ne chikuramu chimia chibili che kamasiliokokho ke kamauusi
Nono, omwami owa Isiraeli aba alikho abira khu lisiisi lie lukoba. Abona omukhasi alikho alila ali, “Njeete omwami.”
Omwami amukobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne akhakhuyeeta tawe, ese ndakhuyeeta ndiena? Ese sendi ne ngano yosi yosi namwe endali tawe.
Butinyu bwowo buli siina?”
Omukhasi oyo amukobosia ali, “Endaalo ndala omukhasi yuno amboolela ali, khulie omwana wase omusoleeli, ne kumuchuli khulie wewe.
Nio khwatekha owase khwalia. Oli bwasia namuboolela ndi khulie wewe ne luno amukisile!”
Nga omwami ne aulila lino atabula chingubo chewe. Nono aba alikho abira khu lisiisi ne efwarire likunia mukari.
Echuba ne aloma ali, “Wele akhoya ambelesie kumunaanio naaba ne ekharusia khu Elisha kumurwe endaalo yino tawe.”
Elisha aba ekhale munju mwewe ne basaakhulu. Nono omwami aba arumire omundu khu Elisha. Ne kakhali omurumwa
Oli asiilomaloma ne nabo, omwami amuulukhakho ne aloma ali, “Butinyu buno bwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Siina sikila ese mulindiilile lundi akhole sisiindu sisiindi?”

Ne kakhali Elisha amukobosia ali, “Rekeeresia nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho aloma. Muchuli siise nga sino, Engaanu chikiilo chitaru namwe eshayiri chikiilo sita bikhakulibwe mu Samaria khulwe sitonyi silala sie efwesa.”
Omwimeelesi omukhulu owo mwami aboolela Elisha ali, “Liliene elio se linyalikhana tawe, akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene ne aruma efula yakwa ao ne nao!”
Elisha amukobosia ali, “Ewe okhalibone ne liekholekha ne se okhaliekho siakhulia siosi siosi tawe.”
Babaandu bane babalwalanga kamakele baba enje we silibwa sia Samaria. Bereebanga babene ne babene bali, “Siina sikila khumenye ano khulindiilila khukhwola nga ne khufwa?
Ne khuloma khuli khuche mu lukoba, enjala elimo ne khunyala khwafwa. Ne khwikhala ano, lundi khulafwa. Nono lekha khuche mu kambi ye Bashamu. Ne bakhulekha aba khulamenya, ne bakhwira aba khulafwa.”
Nio oli bunanubunanu barekukha bacha mu kambi ye Bashamu. Ne kakhali nga bolamo, omundu se abamo tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba akholile banamae be Bashamu baulile kamakaari ke liie ne katima, ne chifarasi ne chipukuta Mala Bashamu bebaasia bali “Lola Isiraeli baba bauliilisiana khu muruungo ne babaami be Bahiti ne Bamisiri beche bakhwibwaakale efwe.”
Nio ekolooba ao Bashamu belukha, balekha kamaeema kabwe, chifarasi, chipunda ne khukhwanjukha ekambi yabwe nio baonie bulamu bwabwe.
Nga be kamakele bane abo bola enje we kambi bengila mu liiema balia ne khunywa bibiabaamo. Basuta efwesa esahabu ne chingubo, mala batima bacha babikisa. Nono bakobola mala bengila mu liiema liliindi, lundi basutamo bibiindu mala bacha babikisa.
Nio babene baboolana bali, “Se khulikho khukhola bulayi tawe. Endaalo yino eli endaalo eye kamakhuwa kamalayi. Khwasila busa mala khwaliinda khukhwola mutikhinyi, khulanyoola kumunaanio. Nono yiicha khuche khuboolele be enju eyo omwami.”
Nio bacha mala balaanga baliindi be silibwa sie lukoba. Bababoolela bali, “Khuchile mu kambi ye Bashamu ne lola se khubonekho omundu namwe khwamuulila tawe. Chifarasi ne chipunda biong'ene bibeele ne biboilwe ne kamaeema kabeele kalekhilwe.”
Nio baliindi be silibwa balaanga be enju eyo omwami baulila.
Nio omwami enyokha mu silo mala aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Endamuboolela niko Bashamu bakhurekekhele efwe! Bamanyile bali efwe khuli ne enjala. Nono barurire mu kambi yabwe bachile khukhwikisa mu lukoongo. Bebaasia bali khularura mu lukoba nio bakhubukule ne khuli balamu mala bengile mu lukoba.”
Ne mulala khu bakholi bewe aloma ali, “Lekha babaandu balalakho babukule chifarasi chiraano chisikale. Sikila khumanyile khuli basikale balaba busa nga bakali ba Isiraeli bamalile khufwa khale. Lekha khurumanie mala khumanye.”
Barobora babaandu balala mala omwami abaruma ne kamakaari ke liie kabili ne khubalakiilisia bache balole sisiaba ne siikholekhe.
Nio babaloondakha khukhwola Yoritani. Khumuyila khwoosi babonakho chingubo ne bibiindu nibio Bashamu baba ne bakwisiisie ne bali mu khangu. Nio barume bakobola mala baboolela omwami.
Nio babaandu barura bacha bayaaya bibiindu bie mu kambi ye Bashamu. Nio nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma sikelo silala sie bufu namwe bikelo bibili bie eshayiri biakusibwa khulwe sitonyi silala sie efwesa.
Nono omwami aba arobora omwimeelesi owaba omuliindi wewe omwene, abe omuliindi owe silibwa. Ne kakhali babaandu bamuswalakilila mu silibwa mala afwa, bulayi bwene nga Elisha ne ang'oola nga omwami aba ne amwichilekho.
Elisha aba aboolele omwami ali, “Bikelo bibili bie e shayiri bikhakulibwe khulwe efwesa ndala ne sikelo silala sie biakhulia sikhakulibwe khulwe efwesa ndala kumuchuli siise nga sino siri a silibwa sia Samaria.”
Omwimeelesi aba akobosia Elisha ali, “Liliene elio se linyala liakholekha tawe, akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene ne aruma efula khukhwama khwikulu yakwa ao ne nao.” Ne Elisha amukobosia ali, “Okhalibone ne likholekha ne kakhali ewe se okhabiliekho tawe.”
Nono kamwikholekhakho busa kario, aswalakililwa ne babaandu asilibwa sie lukoba mala afwa.

Nono omukhasi oyo enyokha acha nga Elisha ne amuboolela. Acha nende be enju yewe mala auyila mu sibala sie Bafilisiti. Aaba omukwa mu sibala sie Bafilisiti khulwe kimiiko saba.
Enyuma we kimiiko saba, omukhasi oyo akobola khukhwama mu maloba ke Bafilisiti. Ne acha khu mwami khureeba akobosebwe enju yewe ne kamaloba kewe.
Nono omwami aba alikho alomaloma ne Kehasi omukholi owa Elisha. Omwami enya khumanya bibiindu bie kamaya nibio Elisha aba ne akholile.
Nga Kehasi aba ne asiboolela omwami nga Elisha ne alamusia omundu, omukhasi niye Elisha alamusia omwana wewe eloochela omwami kakewe. Kehasi aboolela omwami ali, “omwami, omukhasi chana niye oyu niye Elisha alamusilia omusoleeli.”
Ne nga omwami ne areeba omukhasi oyo, omukhasi amuboolela nga ne kaba. Nono omwami aroborera omukhasi oyo omwimeelesi ne aloma ali, “Mukoboselie bioosi bibiaba bibiewe, akhaba biakhulia bie mu mikuunda khukhwama endaalo niyo alekhela kamaloba khukhwola luno.”
Nono Elisha acha Damasika. Beni-hadadi omwami owa Shamu aba alikho alwala. Nga omwami Beni-hadadi ne aboolelwa ali, “Elisha echile,”
omwami aboolela Hasaeli ali, “Yilila Elisha siianwa mala omuboolele areebe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naaba ne endaona namwe tawe.”
Nio Hasaeli acha khukhwakaanana Elisha. Echusia chingamia kamakhumi kane bibiindu bilayi bioosi bie mu Damasika. Nga Hasaeli ne akaanana ne Elisha amuboolela ali, “Omwana wowo, omwami Beni-hadadi andumire khureebe ewe, kaaba bali alaona bulwaale bwewe namwe tawe.”
Elisha amukobosia ali, “Cha omuboolele oli alaona. Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjekesie ali alafwa.”
Nono Elisha aloleelela Hasaeli mu moni lukali khukhwola nga Hasaeli ne aambwa chisoni. Mala Elisha alila.
Hasaeli areeba Elisha ali, “omwami, siina sikila ne olila?”
Elisha amukobosia ali, “Sikila namanyile bumayaanu nibwo ewe okhakholele babaandu ba Isiraeli. Okhosie chingoba chabwe chisire, okheere basoleeli babwe baele mala okhamwaate asi babaana babwe, ne khutabula chinda che bakhasi baesiisie.”
Elisha amukobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjekesie ali ewe olikho ocha khuba omwami owa Shamu.”
Nio Hasaeli alekha Elisha akobola khu Beni-hadadi. Beni-hadadi amureeba ali, “Elisha akhuboolele ali siina?”
Hasaeli amukobosia ali, Amboleele ali ng'ali olaona.
Ne kakhali endaalo eyaloondakho Hasaeli abukula liruungeti ara mu meechi mala afuunikha omwami mu moni khukhwola nga Beni-hadadi ne afwa.
Ne Hasaeli akobola mu bweyaangu bwa Beni-hadadi nga omwami owa Shamu.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kharaano kwe bubwami bwa Yoramu okhwa Ahabu, omwami owa Isiraeli, Yehoramu okhwa Yehoshafati omwami owa Yuda arakikha khukhwamiia.
Yehoramu aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kibili, nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia mu Yerusalemu. Ne amiia khulwe kimiiko munaane.
Aloonda chingila che babaami ba Isiraeli bulayi bwene nga enju eya Ahabu ne yakhola sikila akhwa omukhaana owa Ahabu. Akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kakhaba kario, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se onakaka Yuda tawe khulwa Daudi omukholi wewe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aba alaka Daudi ali niye ne lisaaye liewe nibo balichiililila khukhwamiia.
Nio Yehoramu acha Sairi ne kamakaari kewe ke liie koosi ne bakesia kamakaari. Bera Baedomu ba baaba ne bamubotookheleele. Ne kakhali banamae bewe belukha.
Nono Edomu yarura khu bwami bwa Yuda khukhwola luno. Mu siise esio ne sisiene lukoba lwa Libuna lwosi lwakhola bureengu.
Buli sisiindu sisiindi siosi siosi nisio Yehoramu akhola siaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Yuda.
Nono Yehoramu afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bubwami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne omusoleeli wewe Ahasia akobola mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.
Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na kibili kwe bubwami bwa Yoramu okhwa Ahabu nga omwami owa Isiraeli, Ahasia okhwa Yehoramu arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda.
Ahasia aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kibili, nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia ne amiia ne ali Yerusalemu khulwe kumwiiko mulala. Maayi wewe aba Atalia, omukhaana wo mwami Ahabu, lundi omwichukhulu owo mwami Omuri owa Isiraeli.
Sikila Ahasia aba musaani owo mwami Ahabu, akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga be nju eya Ahabu ne bakhola.
Omwami Ahasia aambana no mwami Yoramu owa Isiraeli mu liie khukhupana no mwami Hasaeli owa Shamu. Banamae bakaananila Ramoti-kileati bapana, mala banamae ba Shamu baumisia Yoramu lukali mwiie.
Nio Yoramu akobola mu lukoba lwa Yesireeli aone kamakoonjo niko anyoola nga ne apana ne Hasaeli e Rama. Ne Ahasia acha khubona Yoramu nga aaba ne alwala.

Nio Elisha omung'oosi alaanga mulala khu sipupu sie bang'oosi mala amuboolela ali, “Yirekekha mala obukule echuupa eye kamafura eyino mala oche e Ramoti-kileati.
Ne wolileyo, yiima Yehu okhwa Yehoshafati omwichukhulu owa Nimushi. Yingila munju mala omwinyosie omurusie mu baasie omuyile mu lusiro yeng'ene.
Nio obukule echuupa eye kamafura mala omuchukhe khumurwe omuboolele oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Nakhuchukhilekho kamafura obe omwami owa Isiraeli.’ Ne omalile orio yikulao lulwiki mala wilukhe okhema tawe.”
Nio omung'oosi omuele oyo acha e Ramoti-kileati.
Nga ne olayo, banamae bakhulu baba bali mu muse. Aboola ali, “komanda, ese ndi ne burume khwiwe.”
Yehu amureeba ali, “Khwifwe fweesi olikho olomaloma khu naanu?”
Akobosia ali, “Khwiwe komanda.”
Nono engila elusiro lwe mukari, mala omung'oosi oyo achukha kamafura khu murwe kwa Yehu ne amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Endikho ekhuchukhakho kamafura obe omwami we babaandu base Isiraeli.
Oleera be enju eyo omwami wowo, okhwa Ahabu oyo. Nio ese niyache enju eya Yesebeli khulwe khukhwira bang'oosi base, ne bakholi base babaandi boosi.
Enju eya Ahabu yoosi elabunisibwa. Endeera buli mundu owe siseecha mu be enju yewe, banasioobi ne balekhuule.
Ndakhola enju eya Ahabu ebe nga enju eya Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati lundi nga enju eya Baasha okhwa Ahiya.
Chimbwa chililiila Yesebeli mu maloba ka Yesireeli. Ne se aliio okhamusiikhe tawe.’ ” Enyuma we khuboola kano, omung'oosi oyo ekula lulwiki mala elukha.
Nga Yehu akobola niio banamae basie bakhulu baba, bamureeba bali, “Karieena? Omundu owe kamalalu oyo akhwenyeele siina?”
Yehu abakobosia ali, “Mumanyile omundu oyo ne kakewe.”
Bamuboolela bali, “Kamene ako se kali ng'ali tawe. Khuboolele siise sino.” Ne aloma ali, “Amboleele ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuchukhilekho kamafura obe omwami owa Isiraeli.’ ”
Nio khangu busa buli mundu khu nibo abukula engubo yewe ara asi Yehu emekho. Baapa ekhoombi ne balangiliila bali, “Yehu ali omwami.”
Yehu okhwa Yehoshafati, lundi omwichukhulu owa Nimushi akholela omwami Yoramu ekwangwaani eye khumwiira. Yoramu ne banamae Baisiraeli boosi baba bachile e Ramoti-kileati khukhupana ne Hasaeli, omwami owa Shamu.
Ne kakhali omwami Yoramu acha aone kamakoonjo niko anyoola khukhwama khu Bashamu. Nio ebweneeyo apana ne Hasaeli omwami owa Shamu. Nono Yehu aloma ali, “Mwaaba ne muli ne kamebaasio malala ne nase, mukhalekhakho omundu yesi yesi arura mu lukoba luno mala ayile likhuwa Yesireeli tawe.”
Nio Yehu aniina mu likaari liewe mala acha Yesireeli niio Yoramu aba ne akonile. Abeele Ahasia omwami owa Yuda ekhile achile khubona Yoramu.
Nono omuliindi aba emile khu ndeleelwa eya Yesireeli. Akhola buyooti khu sipupu sia Yehu nga siaba ne siicha mala echa aloma ali, “Naboone sipupu.” Yoramu amuboolela ali,
“Bukula omundu mulala ne efarasi mala omurume ache areebe ali, ‘kumuleembe nikwo?’ ”
Nono omundu atimia efarasi ola khu Yehu mala amuboolela ali, “omwami enya khumanya waaba ne wichile mu muleembe.”
Yehu amukobosia ali, “Ewe ne kumuleembe muli ne bulebe siina? Yuukha otimie efarasi enyuma wase.” Omuliindi acha aboolela omwami ali, “Omurume olile khu sipupu ne kakhali se alikho akobola tawe.”
Omurume okundi arumwa ne efarasi mala areeba Yehu ali, “omwami areeba ali, wechile mu muleembe?” Ne Yehu akobosia ali, “Ewe ne kumuleembe muli ne bulebe siina? Yuukha otimie efarasi enyuma wase.”
Nio omuliindi lundi aboolela omwami ali, “Omurume olile khu sipupu ne kakhali se alikho akobola tawe. Omwimeelesi alikho atimia likaari oli Yehu okhwa Nimushi silala alikho atimia ne lirima.”
Omwami Yoramu alaka ali, “Ndekekhere likaari.” Barekekha Likaari, Yoramu omwami owa Isiraeli ne Ahasia omwami owa Yuda barura, buli mulala mu likaari liewe bacha khukhwakaanana ne Yehu. Bamwakaananila mu mukuunda kwa Naboti Omuyesireeli.
Nga Yoramu ne abona Yehu, areeba ali, “Wechile mumuleembe Yehu?”
Yehu amukobosia ali, “Muleembe siina kunyala kwabao mala bulosi ne khukhwisaaya bifwaani bia maao Yesebeli biakhilile biri?”
Nio Yoramu ayusia likaari liewe ne ayokelela Ahasia ali, “Ahasia obwo bureengu nibwo,” mala elukha.
Nio Yehu abukula luyingo lwewe alukhwesa ne kamaani kewe koosi mala alasa luembo lwapa Yoramu mu mabeka mala lwafutula kumwoyo. Yoramu akwa mwikaari liewe mala afwa.
Yehu aboolela Bidikari omunamae wewe omuliindi ali, “Bukula kumubili kwewe mala mu kumwaate mu sitonyi sie kumukuunda kukwaba kwa Naboti Omuyesireeli. Khebulila nga ewe ne nase khwaba mwikaari alala enyuma wo mwami Ahabu raraawe owo mwami Yoramu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma kamakhuwa kano khu Ahabu,
‘Ng'ali nga ne naboone sifuki sie babaana bewe, mumukuunda kuno, khakhuruungie ewe mu mukuunda kuno kumwene.’ Khwako mubukule mala omumwaate mu mukuunda omwo nga likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lialoma.”
Nga Ahasia omwami owa Yuda abona kakekholekha, elukha ne alola lubeka lwa Beti-hageni. Yehu amutimania ne aloma ali, “Mwire Yesi.” Mala bamwiirira mu likaari liewe khu muyila kucha Kuri siimbi ne lukoba lwa Ibuleamu. Ne elukhila Mekido mala afwila ebweeneyo.
Bakholi bewe babukula kumubili kwewe bakura mu likaari bakuyila Yerusalemu, mala bamusiikha mu biliindwa bie bakuukawe mu Lukoba lwa Daudi.
Ahasia arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi ne mulala kwe bubwami bwa Yoramu okhwa Ahabu, nga omwami owa Isiraeli.
Nga Yehu ne acha mu Yesireeli, Yesebeli aliulila. Nio Yesebeli arona bisike biewe ang'oona lichuune liewe mala eema alolela mu numa.
Nga Yehu ne engila mu silibwa, Yesebeli amureeba ali, “Ewe Simuri
Yehu asuta chimoni alola mu numa mala aloma ali, “Naanu oli lubeka lwase?” Babaandu be siseecha bachili bakhulu babili namwe bataru bamulolela mu numa.
Ne Yehu ababoolela ali, “Mwata Yesebeli asi.” Bamumwaata asi mala kamafuki kewe malalakho kaanyukha khu lisiisi ne khu farasi, Yehu atimia chifarasi likaari liewe liaswala kumubili kwa Yesebeli.
Nio Yehu engila mu lichipi mala alia ne khunywa. Aloma ali, “Bukula omukhasi omulaame oyo mala mu musiikhe. Sikila ali omukhaana owo mwami.”
Ne kakhali babaandu nga ne bacha khu musiikha se banyoola sisiindu tawe ne siikhali siaanga siewe ne kamakuumba ke kamakhono ne bikele.
Nga bakobola, baboolela Yehu kano. Yehu aloma ali, “Eyino niyo elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo alomaloma khubirira mu mukholi wewe Elicha Omutishibe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Chimbwa chililiila kumubili kwa Yesebeli mu maloba ka Yesireeli.
Ne kamakuumba ke kumubili kwewe karamire kalisalanila buli abuundu nga kamasisie, nio omundu yesi yesi akhamanya ali oyo aba Yesebeli tawe.’ ”

Nono Ahabu aba ne babaana kamakhumi saba. Bamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Samaria. Yehu aandika chibarwa mala achiruma khu bemeelesi be lukoba lwa Samaria. Arumira akhaba basaakhulu ne baliindi be babaana ba Ahabu. Aandika mu barwa echo ali,
“Enywe muliinda lisaaye lio mwami ne kamakaari ke kamae ne chifarasi, bulwaani ne chingoba chisire. Nono nga ne munyoola ebarwa yino,
robora omusoleeli mulala omusicha lundi onyala khukhila boosi khu be nju eyo mwami, mala mulamwamiisia abe omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe mala mupanile enju eyo mwami wenywe.”
Babemeelesi ba Samaria baria lukali baloma bali, “Khunyala khwaba barengu khuriena khu Yehu kaba bali akhaba omwami Yoramu namwe omwami Ahasia se banyala bamukholela bureengu tawe?”
Nio omwimeelesi owe lichipi, ne omuruki owe lukoba, alala ne basaakhulu bamwo ne baliindi baruma burume khu Yehu ne baloma bali, “Efwe khuli bakholi bowo, mala khwerekeekhe khukhola koosi niko okhuboolela. Ne se khulamiisia omundu yesi yesi tawe, ewe khola niko wibaasia oli kali kamalayi khwiwe.”
Nio Yehu abaandikila ebarwa eye khabili ali, “Mwaaba ne muli alala ne nase, mala mwerekeekhe khuria kamalaka kase, muchuli siise nga sino, bukula kimirwe kie be nju eyo omwami Ahabu mala mundeerere e Yesireeli.”
Be enju yo mwami Ahabu, kamakhumi saba baba asi we buliindi bwe babemeelesi be mu lukoba.
Nga banyoola ebarwa eya Yehu, babemeelesi be mu Samaria, beera be nju eya Ahabu kamakhumi saba bara kimirwe kiabwe mu bikono, mala baruma e Yesireeli khu Yehu.
Omurume acha aboolela Yehu ali, “Bareerire kimirwe kie babaana bo mwami.” Yehu aloma ali. “Kiaanje mu bipupu bibili a silibwa khukhwola kumutikhinyi.”
Oli bwasia mutikhinyi, Yehu arura acha anje mala aboolela babaandu boosi ali, “Ese niise owakwangwaanile omwami Yoramu mala namwiira. Sifuki siewe sili khwise se muli enywe tawe. Ne kakhali naanu owirire abano boosi?
Manya nono muli buli likhuwa nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma khuloondekhana ne enju eya Ahabu likhechusibwe, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luno akholile nilio alaka khubirira khu mukholi wewe Elicha.”
Nono Yehu eera balebe ba Ahabu babaandi boosi mu Yesireeli ne babemeelesi bewe bakhulu boosi, basaale bewe ne basaayi. Se aliio akhaba mulala owarama omulamu tawe.
Yehu arura arekukha khucha Samaria. Oli ali khungila abuundu alaangwa “Beti-egedi e Babaayi,”
akaanana ne balebe balala ba walimusaani omwami Ahasia owa Yuda. Nio abareeba ali, “Enywe naanu?”
Bakobosia bali, “Efwe khuli balebe ba Ahasia. Khulikho khukeniia e Yesireeli khucha khubona babaana ba Kwini Yesebeli ne khu baandi boosi be enju eyo mwami.”
Yehu alaka banamae bewe ali, “Baambe busa ne bali balamu!” Babakwakho mala niye abeerera boosi a liloo lia Beti-egedi. Boosi alala baba babaandu kamakhumi kane ne babili ne se aliio niye balekha omulamu tawe.
Nga ne arekukha arurao, akaanana ne Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu abeele echile khumwakaanila. Yehu amukheesia ne amureeba ali, “Ewe unjeyikina ese nga ese ne ekhweyikina ewe?”
Yonatabu amukobosia ali, “Ee” Yehu ayila kumukhono ne aloma ali, “Kaaba kario nono kheesie.” Bakheesiana mala Yehu ayeeta Yonatabu khuniina mu likaari.
Yehu aloma ali, “Khewiche mala obone sinani siase khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nio boombi bachiila mu likaari bola Samaria.
Nga bolayo Yehu eera balebe ba Ahabu boosi. Se aramiakho mulala tawe, khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilio aloma khubirira khu Elicha.
Yehu alaanga babaandu ba Samaria boosi alala mala ababoolela ali, “Ahabu akholelanga Baali atiiti. Ne ese ndamukholela lukali.
Nono ndaangile bang'oosi ba Baali boosi nende basaayi ba Baali boosi ne boosi bamusaayanga bebuusie alala. Mukhalekhakho akhaba mulala arama tawe. Sikila ndi ne embosio emboofu eye khuaana khu Baali. Ne yesi yesi olatambao aleerwa.” (Kuno kwaba busa kumureko kwa Yehu nikwo enyela khukhwirira boosi ba basaayanga Baali)
Nono Yehu alaka ali, “Laanga babaandu beche basaaye Baali.” Nio babalaanga.
Ne Yehu arumania likhuwa mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi. Babasaayanga Baali boosi becha ne se aliio owaramayo okheecha tawe. Boosi bengila munju eya Baali, bakichusia khukhwama lubeka lulala khukhwola khu lundi.
Nono Yehu alaka omusaayi omubiikhi owe chingubo ali, “Reerera Basaayi ba Baali boosi chingubo che khusaaya.” Omwimeelesi oyo abareerera chingubo che khusaaya.
Nio Yehu acha munju eya Baali ne Yonatabu mala aboolela basaaya Baali ali, “Yiima mala mube ne ng'ali muli bakholi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se balikho mwinywe tawe ne kakhali bakholi basaaya Baali bong'ene.”
Nio Yehu engilamo khuaana chimbosio ne biianwa bie khukhwosia. Nono Yehu aba areere enje nibo aboolela ali, “Yesi yesi olalekha mulala khu baandu nibo muelesie bano elukhe alaruunga ne bulamu bwewe!”
Nono nga Yehu aba ne amala khuaana siianwa sie khukhwosia busa ari ne aboolela baliindi ne banamae babemeelesi ali, “Yingila mukari mala mubeere boosi mukhalekha yesi yesi elukha tawe.” Bengila mukari, beera boosi mala bakhurura kimibili kiabwe bakirusia enje. Bachiililila bengila mukari mwe enju eya Baali.
Barusia enje enjeko eya Baali eyabamo, mala bakiosia.
Nio batechula enjeko eya Baali ne lukaangu balukhola khuba esibakala niio babaandu bacha khukhwiyeeta khukhwola luno.
Yehu arusiao ario lisaaya lia Baali khukhwama mu Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali ekelaasia khu bumayaanu bwa Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati. Yeroboamu arangirira Isiraeli khukhola bumayaanu khulwe khusikamila bifwaani bie chimoosi che sahabu nibio emia mu Beteli ne mu Dani.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yehu ali, “Wakholeele bulayi khulwe khukhola kimilimo kimilayi ebweeni wase lundi wakholeele enju eya Ahabu niko ese nenya kekholekhe. Sikila kano, lisaaye liowo eselukho eya khane balaba babaami ba Isiraeli.”
Ne kakhali Yehu se ariira elala Lilaka lia Wele owa Isiraeli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi tawe. Se alekha bumayaanu nga bwa Yeroboamu nibwo arangiria Isiraeli khukhola tawe.
Biise ebio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arakikha khuboombia sibala sia Isiraeli. Hasaeli owa Shamu aula Baisiraeli buli abuundu mu sibala siabwe.
Aula khukhwama Yoritani khulola lubeka lwe ebukwe kamaloba ka Kileati koosi, Bagadi, Barubeni ne Bamanase khukhwola Aroeri mu litooma lia Arinoni (Ako niko kamalaka ka Kileati ne Bashani).
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yehu nende koosi niko akhola ne bikholwa biewe bie bunyindaafu bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano sie Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Nono Yehu afwa mala asiikhwa mu Samaria. Ne omusoleeli wewe Yehoahasi amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Yehu aba amiia ne ali mu Samaria nga omwami owa Isiraeli khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na munaane.

Nono nga Atalia, maayi owo mwami Ahasia ne amanya ali omusoleeli wewe afwiile eera be enju eye bubwami boosi.
Ne kakhali Yoashi omusoleeli owa Ahasia yeng'ene niye owelukha aona. Aba siimbi khukhwirwa ne babaandu ne akhali areesibwa ne sengewe Yehosheba omukhaana owo mwami Yehoramu lundi omukooko owa Ahasia. Yehosheba amubukula niye no mulesi wewe amwingisia mu lusiro lwe Lukaangu. Nono amukisa khukhwama khu Atalia nio se erwa tawe.
Khulwe kimiiko sita Yehosheba achiililila khu mukisa mu Lukaangu. Ne Atalia achiililila khukhwamiia.
Ne kakhali mu mwiiko kwa saba Yehoyata omusaayi arumania babemeelesi be bipupu bie baliindi bo mwami ne baliindi be lichipi mala bababoolela beche mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niio aba. Akhola endakaano ne nabo mala abakhola bechuba munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Abekesia omwami Yoashi okhwa Ahasia.
Ne abalaka ali, “Lino nilio mulakhola: sitonyi silala khu bitaru, mumwichanga khu milimo endaalo eya sabato mulaliinda lichipi.
Bitonyi bisikaale bioosi, silalakha baleema baliinde silibwa sie Suri ne sitonyi sisiindi khu bitaru baleema baliinde asilibwa enyuma we baliindi babaandi. Mu ngila eyino mulaliinda enju yoosi.
Bipupu bibili bikhacha khu milimo mu sabato tawe baleema baliinde enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwo mwami.
Mwirekekhe ne chimbalu muliinde omwami Yoashi. Omundu yesi yesi ne echa siimbi niio muli mumwire. Ba siimbi no mwami buli abuundu niio acha.”
Babemeelesi bakhola koosi khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Yehoyata omusaayi. Buli omwimeelesi areera babaandu bewe bakhaba khu milimo mu ndaalo eya sabato tawe. Areera akhaba abo babenyekha khucha khu milimo.
Nio Yehoyata aelesia babemeelesi bakhulu kamafumo
Baliindi beema buli mundu ne bulwaani bwewe, khukhwama lubeka lwe ebunafubo khukhwola lubeka lwe ebunaswa we Lukaangu. Beema babotookhelesia alutare ne enju.
Nio Yehoyata arusia omwana wo mwami anje mala bamufwara ekuutwa eye bubwami ne kamaandike ke liuliilisiana. Ne Yoashi achukhwakho kamafura khuba omwami. Baapa chimbi ne baloma bali, “omwami oyindile!”
Atalia aulila baliindi ne babaandu ne baapa luyoka. Acha khangu mu Lukaangu, niio babaandu baba.
Nga Atalia ne alola, abona omwami omuyaakha emile anjeko khuloondekhana ne kumwiima. Ne babemeelesi ne bakhupi be chikhoombi baba bamwimileo. Babaandu boosi baba balikho bekhoya ne khukhupa chikhoombi. Atalia atabula chingubo chewe ne aloma ali, “Bureengu! Bureengu!”
Yehoyata se enya Atalia ererwe mu Lukaangu tawe. Nio alaka banamae bakhulu be kamae ali, “Mubukule mumurusie enje mumuyile akari we babemeelesi, mala mwire yesi yesi olakhaka khumureesia.”
Nono bamutiila bacha ne bamubisilia mu silibwa sie chifarasi mala bamuyila munju eyo mwami niio bamwirira.
Omusaayi Yehoyata akhola endakaano akari wo mwami ne babaandu ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bali baliba babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi akhola endakaano akari wo mwami ne babaandu.
Nio babaandu boosi be sibala bacha munju eya Baali mala bakitechula yakwa. Baara alutare ne bifwaani biayo mu bitonyi mala berera Matani, omusaayi owa Baali ebweeni wa alutare echo.
Yehoyata ara baliindi khuliinda enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Abukula banamae bakhulu sipupu siliinda omwami ne baliindi be lichipi ne babaandu boosi be mu sibala mala baelekesia omwami khukhwama munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bamubisilia mu silibwa sie baliindi mala bamuyila mu lichipi.
Nono babaandu boosi be sibala basangaala. Ne lukoba lwaba ne kumuleembe enyuma wa Atalia khukhwirirwa mu lichipi.
Yoashi aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko saba ne arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda.

Mu mwiiko kukhola saba kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Yehu owa Isiraeli, Yoashi arakikha khukhwamiia nga omwami owa Yuda. Yoashi amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane. Maayi owa Yoashi aba Sibia khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Beerisheba.
Yoashi akhola kasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi, sikila Yehoyata omusaayi amwekisia.
Ne kakhaba kario abuundu aesuta se onakwa tawe. Ne ebweeneyo babaandu bachiililila khuaana chimbosio ne khukhwosia bimuli biiunya kumuya kumulayi.
Aboolela buli omusaayi abukule chirupia khukhwama khu baandu bewe, mala chirumikhe khung'oona buli abuundu niio Lukaangu lwonekha.
Ne mumwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili na kitaru kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yoashi, basaayi baba basiili khung'oona abuundu osi osi mu Lukaangu tawe.
Nono omwami Yoashi alaanga Yehoyata omusaayi ne basaayi babaandi mala abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mukhang'oona niio Lukaangu lwonekha tawe? Nono khukhwama luno khuchiililila mukhabukulakho chirupia nicho munyoola tawe. Ne kakhali muchiaane khulwe khung'oona Lukaangu.”
Basaayi bafukiilila lino, lundi bafukiilila bali nibo se balang'oona Lukaangu tawe.
Nio Yehoyata omusaayi abukula lisanduku afutula kumwanya khu sifunikho mala ara lisanduku a alutare, kumukhono kumuseecha kwe khukhwingila munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Basaayi ba baaba baliindi be silibwa bara chirupia choosi chichareerwa mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lisanduku.
Buli lwosi nga chirupia ne chakuchanga mu lisanduku, omuandiki owo mwami no Musaayi Omukhulu Lukali bechanga ne babala mala ne baboa kimifuko kie chirupia chichaba munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Enyuma wako baelesianga chirupia nicho bakelile khu bakholi be kimilimo mu Lukaangu ne lundi charuungwanga khu babeechi be chimbao ne babombakhi.
Lundi baruunganga chirupia echo khu babeechi be kamabaale. Chirupia echo lundi bakulila kamabaale kamabeeche ne chimbao che khung'oona Lukaangu niio lwonekha, ne bibiindi bioosi bioosi bibienyekha.
Kakhaba kario, chirupia se charumikhwakho mu khung'oona bikoombe bie efwesa, bibuumba, chikhoombi, namwe bibiindu bie khukhwimiakho chitaa, namwe sisiindu siosi siosi sie efwesa namwe sie esahabu tawe.
Sikila bioosi biarumikhwa khuruunga bakholi be kimilimo ne khukula bibiindu birumikha mu khung'oona niio Lukaangu lwonekha.
Babaandu babemeelela kimilimo baba babeyikinwa lukali, khwako se babareeba bekesie nga barumikhira chirupia tawe.
Chirupia chichaanwa khu biianwa bie bumayaanu ne biianwa bie kamakhiikha se chareerwa mu Lukaangu tawe, chaba che basaayi.
Mu biise ebio, omwami Hasaeli owa Shamu ebwaakala lukoba lwa Katihi mala aluula. Ne ebaasia khucha khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu.
Omwami Yoashi owa Yuda abukula bibiindu bitakatifu bioosi nibio bakuuka bewe Yehoshafati, Yehoramu ne Ahasia baana bara alubeka nga bitakatifu mala abiyila khu Hasaeli akhaba bibiindu biewe omwene bitakatifu ne esahabu yoosi eyanyoolekhana mu libiikhilo lie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne mu lichipi liewe. Nio Hasaeli arekukha arura Yerusalemu.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bio omwami Yoashi ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Yuda.
Banamae babemeelesi bo mwami Yoashi bamukwangwaanila mala bereera Yoashi munju eye kimiliinda kikiikha e Sila.
Aaba Yosakari okhwa Shimeati ne Yehosabadi okhwa Shomeri, banamae bewe babili nibo babamwiira. Yoashi asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne omusoleeli wewe Amasia amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.

Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili na kitaru kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yoashi okhwa Ahasia nga omwami owa Yuda, Yehoahasi okhwa Yehu arakikha khukhwamiia Isiraeli. Amiia Isiraeli ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko likhumi ne saba.
Yehoahasi akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aloonda bumayaanu bwa Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati. Yeroboamu akhola Isiraeli bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bumayaanu. Yehoahasi se alekha bumayaanu obwo tawe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Isiraeli lirima mala abara mu bunyali bwa Hasaeli omwami owa Shamu no musoleeli wewe Beni-hadadi.
Nio Yehoahasi asaaya khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia lisaaya liewe. Kaba kario sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona bumiinikhi bwa Isiraeli ne lundi nga omwami owa Shamu ne abanaania.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arumira Isiraeli omuonia, owabarusia mu munaanio kwe Bashamu. Nio Baisiraeli bamenya mu chingo chabwe nga ekhunyoa.
Ne kakhaba kario, Baisiraeli se balekha bumayaanu nibwo omwami Yeroboamu abayilamo tawe, ne kakhali bachiililila khubukhola ne sifwaani sia wele owe siikhasi Ashera siarama mu Samaria.
Yehoahasi saba ne banamae tawe ne bakhali banamae be chifarasi kamakhumi karaano, kamakaari ke liie chielefu ekhumi ne banamae bakeendela bikele busa chielefu ekhumi, kaba kario sikila omwami owa Shamu abeera abamala, aabaswalakilila nga lufuumbi abuulilo.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yehoahasi ne koosi niko akhola, ne bikholwa biewe bioosi bie bunyindaafu biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Afwa mala asiikhwa mu Samaria. Nio omusoleeli wewe amiisibwa mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru ne kimiiko saba kie bubwami bwo mwami Yoashi owa Yuda, Yehoashi okhwa Yehoahasi amiisibwa nga omwami owa Isiraeli. Amiia Isiraeli ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na sita.
Yesi akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga omwami Yeroboamu ne akhola khulwe khuyila Isiraeli mu bumayaanu.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Yehoashi akhola, alala ne bikholwa biewe bie bunyindaafu mu liie nga ne apana no mwami Amasia owa Yuda biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Nono Yehoashi afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Samaria. Omusoleeli wewe Yeroboamu owe khabili amiisibwa mu bweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.
Elisha amuboolela ali, “Bukula luyingo ne buembo.” Ne Yehoashi abibukula.
Nio Elisha amuboolela ali, “Yirekekha khulasa.” Omwami akhola ario mala Elisha ara kamakhono kewe khu kio mwami.
Ne Elisha aboolela Yehoashi ali, “Yikula enuma lubeka lwe ebukwe.” Yehoashi ekula. Nio amuboolela ali, “Lasa luembo!” Alasa. Ne Elisha aloma ali, “Luembo lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwe bukhili, luembo lwe bukhili khu Shamu! Oliipana ne Bashamu mu Afweki khukhwola nga ne obaula.”
Nono Elisha aboolela omwami abukule buembo bubuundi mala abulase asi khu liloba. Omwami alasa asi khu liloba khukhwola khataru, mala alekha.
Nio Elisha amuambila lirima, mala aboolela omwami ali, “Andi olasile khukhwola kharaano namwe sita, andi wakhakhiliile elala Bashamu. Ne kakhali nono olabaula busa khataru khong'ene.”
Elisha afwa mala asiikhwa.
Buli kumwiiko bipupu bie banuuli bie Bamoabu biengililanga bibwaakala sibala sia Isiraeli.
Siise silala omundu aba alikho asiikhwa. Silala khu bipupu bie banuuli chana siabonekha, mala babaandu abo bamwaata kumubili kwo omundu oyo mu siliindwa sia Elisha mala belukha. Nga kumubili kwo omundu oyo ne kwetiila khu bikuumba bia Elisha, omundu oyo alamukha mala enyokha eema.
Nono omwami Hasaeli owa Shamu anaania Baisiraeli mu bwami bwa Yehoahasi bwoosi.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba omulayi lundi owe siisa khu nibo. Se alekha babunisibwa tawe. Abakhebulila sikila endakaano yewe ne Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo. Se ebilila babaandu bewe tawe. Akhaba khukhwola luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalekha Isiraeli tawe.
Nga Hasaeli omwami owa Shamu ne afwa, Beni-hadadi, omusoleeli wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nio Yehoashi okhwa Yehoahasi lundi abukula khukhwama khu Beni-hadadi okhwa Hasaeli chingoba nicho abukula khukhwama khu Yehoahasi raraawe.

Mu mwiiko kwe khabili kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yehoashi okhwa Yehoahasi nga omwami owa Isiraeli, Amasia okhwa Yoashi arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda.
Arakikha khukhwamiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kiraano. Ne amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na tisa. Maayi wewe aba Yehoadini khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Akhola kasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kakhali se aba nga omwami Daudi kukaawe tawe. Akhola niko Yoashi, raraawe aba ne akhola.
Se atechula abuundu aesuta tawe. Babaandu bachiililila khuaana chimbosio ne khukhwosielayo biiunya bulayi.
Nga Amasia ne anyoola bunyali busa ari, eera banamae bewe babeera omwami, raraawe.
Ne kakhaba kario se eera babaana babwe tawe. Akhola ario khuloondekhana nende liliaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamalaka sia Musa. Mu malaka omwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka ali, “Ba paapa se beerwa khulwe kamakhiikha niko babaana babwe bakhola tawe. Ne babaana se beerwa khulwe kamakhiikha ke bapaapa babwe tawe. Ne kakhali omundu eerwa khulwe kamakhiikha niko niye omwene akholile.”
Amasia eera banamae ba Edomu chielefu ekhumi mu litooma lie kumuunyu. Aamba lukoba lwa Sela mu liie mala alutiuukha ali Yokiteli. Lukoba olwo lusilaangwa lurio khukhwola luno.
Nio Amasia aruma barumwa khu mwami Yehoashi owa Isiraeli okhwa Yehoahasi (Yehoahasi aba okhwa Yehu) ne amuachilisia ali “yiicha khupane.”
Ne Yehoashi arumira Amasia, omwami owa Yuda likhuwa ali, “Sichakha sie kamawa khu Bikulu bia Lebanoni siaruma burume khu mutarakwa sili, ‘Lekhuula omukhaana wowo akhwalikhe khu musoleeli wase,’ Esaang'i eye Lebanoni yabirao mala yaswalakilila sichakha.
Luno Amasia, ewe waulile Baedomu. Ne liakilile welolile. Nyalikha ne efuma niyo oli ne nayo mala wikhale engo wowo. Siina sikila ne wenya khukhwirerera butinyu bucha khukhurerera libuna ewe ne babaandu bowo Bayuda?”
Ne kakhali Amasia aloba khurekeeresia. Nio omwami Yehoashi owa Isiraeli arekukha acha mala apana ne Amasia e Beti-shemesi eya Yuda.
Isiraeli yaula Yuda, mala banamae bewe belukha bakobola buli mundu mungo mwewe.
Yehoashi aamba Amasia nga omuboe acha ne naye mala aula Yerusalemu. Engilamo atechula lisiisi lie lukoba khukhwama a silibwa sia Efuraimu khukhwola khu silibwa sie khundulo, buleeyi bwe bikele chimia chine.
Abukula efwesa yoosi ne esahabu ne bibiindu bioosi nibio anyoola munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne libiikhilo lie mwichipi lio omwami. Lundi aamba babaandu embaambe mala akobola Samaria.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yehoashi nibio akhola ne bunyindaafu bwewe, lundi nga ne apana ne omwami Amasia owa Yuda biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Yehoashi afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Samaria. Omusoleeli wewe Yeroboamu owe Khabili amiisibwa mu bweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.
Omwami Amasia owa Yuda amenya kimiiko ekhumi na kiraano enyuma we lifwa lio mwami Yehoashi owa Isiraeli.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Amasia akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Ekwangwaani yakholwa mu Yerusalemu eye khukhwira Amasia. Nio elukhila mu lukoba lwa Lakishi. Ne kakhali basiku bewe bamuloondakho mala bamwirirayo.
Basutila kumubili kwewe khu farasi bakukobosia e Yerusalemu, mala bamusiikha mu lukoba lwa Daudi.
Nio babaandu boosi ba Yuda babukula Asaria omwana wewe omusoleeli owe kimiiko ekhumi na sita, bamwamiisia aba omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe.
Asaria ombakha Elati mala alukobosiela Yuda enyuma we lifwa lia raraawe.
Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi ne kiraano kie bubwami bwa Amasia, okhwa Yoashi omwami owa Yuda, Yeroboamu owe Khabili okhwa Yoashi amiisibwa aba omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne amiia ne ali mu Samaria kimiiko kamakhumi kane na mulala.
Akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se alekhela elala bumayaanu bwo mwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati nibwo arangirira Isiraeli yakhola tawe.
Akobosiela Isiraeli lulwakha khukhwama mu silibwa sia Hamati khubira e bunaswa khukhwola khu nyanja eya Araba ebunafubo. Lino liaba lirio khuloondekhana ne lomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli niyo aloma khubirira khu mukholi wewe omung'oosi Yona okhwa Amitai khukhwama e Kati-heferi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona ali linaanisibwa liaba likali khu Baisiraeli. Se abao mulala owalekhwa akhaba nasioobi namwe omulekhuule tawe. Ne mbao owabao khuyeeta Isiraeli tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aloma ali acha khubunisilia elala Isiraeli khulwa mindali na mindali tawe. Khwako abareesia khubirira khu mwami Yeroboamu owe khabili.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Yeroboamu owe khabili akhola, ne bunyindaafu bwewe nga ne apana, mala akobosia khu Isiraeli chingoba cha Damasika ne Hamati, choosi chichaba cha Yuda, bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Isiraeli.
Yeroboamu owe Khabili afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami ba Isiraeli. Ne omusoleeli wewe Sakaria amiisibwa mu bweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.

Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili na saba kwe bubwami bwo mwami Yeroboamu owe Khabili owa Isiraeli, Asaria okhwa Amasia amiisibwa aba omwami owa Yuda.
Aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na sita, mala amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi karaano na kibili. Maayi wewe aba Yekolia khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Asaria aloonda raraawe mu khukhola kasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhaba kario se arusiao abuundu aesuta tawe. Ne babaandu bachiililila khuanilayo chimbosio ne khukhwosia biiunya kumuya kumulayi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Asaria bulwaale bwe kamakele, alwala khulwe bulamu bwewe bwoosi. Amenya munju yeng'ene. Ne omusoleeli wewe Yotamu emeelela be enju eyo mwami Asaria ne khukhwimeelela babaandu be mu sibala esio.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Asaria ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Nio Asaria afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne omusoleeli wewe amiisibwa aba omwami.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na munaane kwe bubwami bwo mwami Asaria owa Yuda, Sakaria okhwa Yeroboamu owe Khabili amiisibwa aba omwami owa Isiraeli. Amiia ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimieesi sita.
Akholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bumayaanu nga bakuuka bewe ne bakhola. Se alekha bumayaanu bwa Yeroboamu nibwo arangirira Isiraeli khukhola tawe.
Shalumu okhwa Yabesi akholela omwami Sakaria ekwangwaani amwirira e Ibuleamu, mala akobola mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Sakaria akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na tisa kwe bubwami bwo mwami Usia owa Yuda, Shalumu okhwa Yabesi amiisibwa aba omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne amiia ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kumwesi mulala.
Nio Menahemu okhwa Kati ama Tirisa acha Samaria. Eera Shalumu mala akobola mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Shalumu akhola alala ne sikholwa sie ekwangwaani yewe biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Mu siise nisio Menahemu aba ne ali khu lukeendo lwewe lwe khukhwama Tirisa khuchiililila, abunisilila elala lukoba lwa Tapua, babamenyamo nende be mu sibala sisialubotookhelesia. Kaba kario sikila be mu lukoba se bafukiilila bubwami bwewe tawe. Lundi atabulaka chinda che bakhasi baesiisie boosi.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na tisa kwe bubwami bwo mwami Usia owa Yuda, Menahemu okhwa Kati amiisibwa aba omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne amiia ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko likhumi.
Akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mu limenya liewe lioosi se alekhakho bumayaanu bwa Yeroboamu bwoosi nibwo arangirira Isiraeli khukhola tawe.
Omwami Puli owa Ashuru ebwaakala Isiraeli mala Menahemu amuelesia chitani eelefu ndala che efwesa nio anyoole buyeeti bwe khutasa kamaani khu Menahemu khukhila sibala. (Omwami Puli lundi alaangwa ali Tikilati Pileseri).
Menahemu anyoola chirupia khukhwama khu baandu baiinda ba Isiraeli boosi khulwe busuuru. Buli mulala arusia bitonyi kamakhumi karaano bie efwesa. Nio aelesia Puli omwami owa Ashuru. Nio omwami owa Ashuru akobolayo ne se amenya mu sibala esio tawe.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Menahemu ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Menahemu afwa mala omwana wewe Pekahia ela mu bweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi karaano kwe bubwami bwo mwami Usia owa Yuda Pekahia okhwa Menahemu amiisibwa aba omwami owa Isiraeli. Amiia Isiraeli ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko kibili.
Akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se alekha bumayaanu bwo mwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati nibwo akhola khulwe khurangirira Isiraeli abengisia mu bumayaanu tawe.
Peka okhwa Remalia, omunamae omukhulu owe banamae ba Pekahia, akhola ekwangwaani ne babaasie kamakhumi karaano khukhwama Kileati. Nio bereera Pekahia mwichipi, mukari mwe lisiisi lie lukoba, mu Samaria. Nio amiia ela mu bweyaangu bwa Pekahia aba omwami.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Pekahia, ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi karaano na kibili kwe bubwami bwo mwami Asaria owa Yuda, Peka okhwa Remalia amiisibwa aaba omwami owa Isiraeli. Amiia Isiraeli ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili.
Akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se alekha bumayaanu bwo mwami Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati, nibwo arangirira Isiraeli khukhola tawe.
Mu ndaalo cha Peka omwami owa Isiraeli, Tikilati Pileseri omwami owa Ashuru aamba chingoba cha Iyoni, Abeli Beti, Maaka, Yanoa, Kedeshi ne Hasori ne bibala bia Kileati, Kalilaya ne Nafutali mala abukula babaandu acha ne nabo e Shamu nga baboe.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili kwe bubwami bwa Yotamu okhwa Asaria nga omwami owa Yuda, Hoshea okhwa Ela akholela omwami Peka ekwangwaani amwiira mala abukula bubweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.
Bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Peka, ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Isiraeli.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khabili kwe bubwami bwa Peka okhwa Remalia nga omwami owa Isiraeli, Yotamu okhwa Usia amiisibwa aba omwami owa Yuda.
Amiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kiraano. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na sita. Maayi wewe aba Yerusha, omukhaana owa Satoki.
Akhola kaali kamalayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Usia raraawe ne akhola.
Kakhaba kario, abuundu aesuta se onakwa tawe. Babaandu bachiililila khuaana chimbosio ne khukhwosielayo bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Yotamu niye owombakha silibwa sie engaaki sie Lukaangu.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yotamu ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Mu ndaalo echo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arakikha khuruma omwami Resini owa Shamu no mwami Peka owa Isiraeli khukhwibwaakala Yuda.
Yotamu afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bubwami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne omusoleeli wewe Ahasi aba omwami mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na saba kwe bubwami bwa Peka okhwa Remalia omwami owa Isiraeli, Ahasi okhwa Yotamu amiia aba omwami owa Yuda.
Amiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na sita. Se akhola kasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Daudi ne akhola tawe.
Ne kakhali aloonda chingila che babaami ba Isiraeli. Lundi osia omusoleeli wewe nga siianwa sie khukhwosia. Ekelaasia khu likhola lie khusinya lie babaandu nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba aoona arusia mu sibala nga Baisiraeli ne baba ne balikho becha.
Lundi aana chimbosio ne khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi abuundu aesuta, ne khu bikulu ne asi wa buli murongooro.
(Mu biise ebio ne bibieene omwami owa Edomu akobosia lukoba lwa Elati, mala aoona babaandu ba Yuda babamenyamo baruramo. Baedomu bengila mu Elati bamenyamo khukhwola luno.)
Ahasi aruma babaandu khu Tikilati Pileseri, omwami owa Ashuru, ne burume ali, “Ese ndi omukholi wowo lundi omwana wowo. Yiicha undeesie khukhwama khu baami ba Shamu ne Isiraeli balikho banjibwaakala.”
Ahasi abukula efwesa ne esahabu khukhwama mu Lukaangu ne mu libiikhilo lie mwichipi mala abirumira omwami owa Ashuru nga siianwa.
Tikilati Pileseri mu khukobosia lilila lia Ahasi arekukha acha khukhwibwaakala Damasika aluaamba. Era omwami Resini mala aamba babaandu abayila Kiri nga baboe.
Nga omwami Ahasi ne acha Damasika khukhwakaanana no mwami Tikilati Pileseri, abona ebweeneyo alutare mala aruma engo khu omusaayi Uria sifwaani sia alutare eyo ne bibiindu biloondekhana nasio bioosi.
Nio Uria ombakha alutare efwaana nga eyo mala akimala Ahasi ne akhakobola tawe.
Oli Ahasi akobola khukhwama Damasika, abona alutare. Esenda siimbi ne alutare eyo mala akiniinakho.
Nio omwami osielakho biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie biakhulia. Lundi achukhakho biianwa bie khunywa ne kamalasile ke biianwa bie kumuleembe.
Arusia alutare eye kumukasa eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama ebweeni we enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Alutare eyo yaba akari we enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alutare yewe. Nga akirusiao, akira ebunaswa wa alutare yewe.
Ne omwami Ahasi alaka Uria omusaayi ali, “Yosiela khu alutare emboofu biianwa bie khukhwosia bie kumutikhinyi, ne biianwa bie biakhulia bie ekolooba ne biianwa bie khukhwosia bio mwami nende bie biakhulia. Lundi yosielakho biianwa bie khukhwosia bie babaandu boosi be sibala nende bie biakhulia nende bie khunywa biabwe. Chukha khu alutare eyo kamalasile koosi ke biianwa bie khukhwosia ne kamalasile koosi ke chimbosio. Ne ekhali alutare eye kumukasa elaba eyase niyo ndeberamo bulakusi.”
Uria omusaayi akhola kano koosi nga omwami Ahasi ne amulaka.
Ne engila eye sabato niyo bombakha mwichipi mukari ne silibwa sisiingila mukari bioosi arusiao munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila omwami owa Ashuru.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Ahasi, nibio akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Ahasi afwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Nio omusoleeli wewe Hesekia amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na kibili kwe bubwami bwo mwami Ahasi owa Yuda, Hoshea okhwa Ela amiisibwa aaba omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne amiia Isiraeli ne ali mu Samaria khulwe kimiiko tisa.
Akholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bumayaanu. Kakhaba kario, se bwaba bukali nga bwe babaami babamiia Isiraeli ebweeni wewe tawe.
Omwami Shalumaneseri owa Ashuru apana ne naye mwiie. Hoshea aba asi owa Shalumaneseri mala amuruunga busuuru buli kumwiiko.
Ne kakhali kumwiiko mulala Hoshea aruma barumwa khu So, omwami owa Misiri ne amureeba buyeeti mala alekha khuruunga busuuru khu Ashuru bwa buli mwiiko. Nga Shalumaneseri amanya lino aamba Hoshea mala amura mu siboe.
Nono omwami Shalumaneseri ebwaakala Isiraeli mala engila mu Samaria. Khulwe kimiiko kitaru, Shalumaneseri abotookhelesia mala ebwaakala Samaria.
Mu mwiiko kukhola tisa kwe bubwami bwa Hoshea, omwami owa Ashuru
Samaria lwakwa sikila Baisiraeli bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe bumayaanu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owabareera khukhwama Misiri, mu bunyali bwa Farao. Ne kakhali Baisiraeli baelesia lukoosi bawele babaandi.
Baloonda kimiima kie babaandu be chikholo nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne aoona barura mu sibala. Bamenya nga babaami babwe bamayaanu babekesia khumenya.
Baisiraeli bakhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wabwe mu bwikisi. Beyombakhila abuundu aesuta mu ngoba choosi khukhwamila khu ndeleelwa khukhwola khu ngoba chisire.
Khu bikulu bioosi ne asi mu siniini sia buli kumurongooro kwe kamasaafu bemisiamo chinjeko che kamabaale ne bifwaani bia Ashera.
Ne bosielia bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi abuundu aesuta oosi nga be chikholo nibo Wele aoona barura mu maloba bakholanga. Baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima ne bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
Ne basikamilanga bifwaani nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne abakaania ali “Mukhakhola kano tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba akaania Isiraeli khubirira khu buli omung'oosi nende buli omuloli. Aloma ali, “Lekha chingila chenywe chimayaanu mala murie kamalaka kase kaali mu lilaka nilio naelesia bakuuka benywe, niko namwakaanisia enywe khubirira khu bakholi base bang'oosi.”
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli se baulila kano tawe. Baba baminyi nga bakuuka babwe ne bakhasuubila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe.
Balekelesia kamalaka kewe ne endakaano yewe niyo akhola ne bakuuka babwe mala balekelesia ne likaania liewe. Basikamila bifwaani biikhali ne bung'ali tawe mala babene bosi bekela bakhali ne bung'ali tawe. Ne baloonda kimiima kie chikholo chichababotookhelesia nicho yaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abalaka ali bakhabaloonda tawe.
Balekha kamalaka koosi ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe mala bakhola bifwaani bie chimoosi bibili. Lundi bakhola sifwaani sia Ashera, mala basikamila ching'enieesi ne khukholela wele Baali.
Boosia babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana nga biianwa bie khukhwosia mala bakhola bufumu ne bulosi, mala beyikusia babeene khulwe khukhola bumayaanu mumoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bamuambia lirima.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Baisiraeli lirima likali mala abarusia mumoni chewe, alekha ekholo eya Yuda yong'ene.
Ne babaandu ba Yuda bosi se baria kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe. Bekelaasia khu miima nikio banyoola khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloba Baisiraeli boosi, abaelesia kumunaanio mala abalekhuulila banuuli mala ekhumaliilikha abarusia mumoni chewe.
Enyuma wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwabukhasia Isiraeli khukhwama khunju eya Daudi, Baisiraeli bamiisia Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati aaba omwami wabwe. Yeroboamu abakhola banjukha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala abaraangirira bakhola bumayaanu bukali.
Baisiraeli baloonda Yeroboamu mala bachiililila khukhola chingano choosi che bumayaanu nibwo niye akhola ne se balekhakho tawe.
Ekhumaliilikha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaana khukhwama ebweeni wewe, nga aba ne abakaania khubirira mu bakholi bewe bang'oosi ali alikhola. Nio babaandu ba Isiraeli babukulwa bayilwa mu mbaambe Ashuru niio basimenyile khukhwola luno.
Omwami owa Ashuru abukula babaandu khukhwama mu ngoba cha Babiloni, Kuta, Afa, Hamati ne Sefaribaimu. Abengisia mu ngoba cha Samaria, mu bweyaangu bwe Baisiraeli babayilwa mu mbaambe. Babukula chingoba echo chaba chichabwe mala bachimenyamo.
Mu khunyoa khwe khumenyayo khwabwe, se basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abarumira chitalang'i mala chera balala khu nibo.
Omwami owa Ashuru aboolelwa ali wele arumire chitalang'i chilikho chiira babaandu babengisia chingoba cha Samaria sikila babaandu abo se bamanya lilaka lia wele owe sibala esio tawe.
Nio omwami owa Ashuru alaka ali, “Rumayo mulala khu basaayi baboe nibo mwareerire, mumukobosieyo
Nio mulala khu basaayi nibo bareera khukhwama Samaria acha mala amenya Beteli, ekesielayo babaandu nga banyala basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali be chikholo babengisia mu Samaria bachiililila khukhola bifwaani biabwe mala babira abuundu aesuta niio Baisiraeli ba Samaria baba ne bombakha. Buli ekholo yachiililila khukhola bifwaani bia wele wayo. Bifwaani ebio babira mu namwima che abuundu aesuta niio Baisiraeli ba Samaria bakhola. Buli ekholo yara bifwaani ebio mungoba nicho yamenyamo.
Babaandu ba Babiloni bakhola bifwaani bia wele Sukoti-Benoti, babaandu ba Kuti bakhola bifwaani bia Nerigali, babaandu ba Hamati bakhola bifwaani bia Ashima.
Babaandu ba Abi nabo bakhola bifwaani bia Nibuhasi ne Taritaki, ne babaandu ba Sefaribaimu bosia babaana babwe nga chimbosio khu wele babwe Atrameleki ne Anameleki.
Lundi babaandu abo basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kakhali barobora babaandu khukhwama mu nibo babeene, bakhola kimilimo nga basaayi ne babaandu chingano na ngano babaana chimbosio a namwima che abuundu aesuta.
Nio basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali basaaya akhaba bawele babwe khuloondekhana ne kimiima kie bibala nibio bamamo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba akhola endakaano ne Baisiraeli ne abalaka ali, “Mukhasaaya bawele babaandi tawe. Mukhabenamila namwe mwabakholela, namwe mwabaanila chimbosio tawe.
Ne kakhali mularia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owamurusia e Misiri ne bunyali bukali ne kamaani. Mulamwinamila niye ne khumuaanila niye chimbosio.
Buli lwosi mulikhola khuloondekhana nende kamalaka ne liilakiilisia nilio aamuandikila enywe. Mukhasikamila bawele babaandi tawe.
Ne mukhebilila endakaano niyo nakhola ne nanywe tawe.
Ne kakhali mulasaaya ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, ne ese ndamureesia khukhwama khu basiku benywe boosi.”
Ne kakhaba kario, Baisiraeli se barekeeresia tawe. Bachiililila khuloonda kimiima kiabwe kie khaale.
Nio babaandu be chikholo abo basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne lundi bakholela bifwaani. Ne lisaaye liabwe basichiililila khukhola busa bario khukhwola luno.

Mu mwiiko kukhola khataru kwe bubwami bwa Hoshea okhwa Ela nga omwami owa Isiraeli, Hesekia okhwa Ahasi amiisibwa aba omwami owa Yuda.
Hesekia arakikha khukhwamiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kiraano. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na tisa. Maayi wewe aba Abi, omukhaana owa Sakaria.
Akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga kukaawe Daudi ne akhola.
Aarusiao abuundu aesuta, atechula chinjeko mala arema akwiisia sifwaani sia Ashera. Lundi atonyaka mu bitonyi endemu eye kumukasa niyo Musa akhola, eyalaangwa bali Nehushitani. Khukhwola khu siise esio babaandu ba Isiraeli baba basiosiela bibiindu biiunya bulayi khundemu eyo.
Hesekia eyikina mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Se abao omwami okundi mu Yuda ebweeni wewe namwe enyuma wewe owaba nga niye tawe.
Aba aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se amulekhakho tawe. Aliinda kamalaka niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne aelesia Musa.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba alala ne naye. Buli sisiindu siosi siosi nisio akhola, akhilanga. Akhola bureengu khu mwami owa Ashuru ne se amukholela tawe.
Aula Bafilisiti khukhwamila khu ndeleelwa ndala khukhwola khu ngoba chisire. Abaula khukhwola lukoba lwa Kasa ne sibala sisialubotookhelesia.
Kumwiiko kukhola khane kwe bubwami bwa Hesekia, kwaba kumwiiko kukhola saba kwe bubwami bwo mwami Hoshea okhwa Ela mu Isiraeli. Mu biise ebio, omwami Shalumaneseri owa Ashuru ebwaakala mala abotookhelesia Samaria.
Enyuma we kimiiko kitaru kie khubotookhelesia, Shalumaneseri abukula Samaria. Ako kekholekha mumwiiko kukhola sita kwe bubwami bwa Hesekia ne kumwiiko kukhola tisa kwe bubwami bwa Hoshea.
Omwami owa Ashuru ayila Baisiraeli Ashuru nga baboe mala engisia balala mu nibo mu lukoba lwa Hala, balala khu ngingi che luluuchi lwa Habori ne Kosani, ne babaandi mu ngoba cha Medesi.
Samaria lwakwa sikila Baisiraeli se baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe. Ne kakhali bafunaka endakaano niyo aba ne akhola ne nabo mala baba barengu khu malaka koosi niko Musa, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne abaelesia. Se bakarekeeresia namwe bakaria tawe.
Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na kine kwe bubwami bwo mwami Hesekia, Senakeribu omwami owa Ashuru ebwaakala chingoba chisire choosi cha Yuda mala achibukula.
Nio Hesekia, omwami owa Yuda aruma burume khu Senakeribu owaba ne ali Lakishi ali, “Nakholile kamakhiikha. Nosiima lekha khukhwibwaakala khwowo. Ne endakhuruunga siosi siosi nisio wenya.” Mu likobosia omwami owa Ashuru enya khukhwama khu Hesekia bitonyi chimia chitaru bie efwesa ne bitonyi kamakhumi kataru bie esahabu.
Ne Hesekia amuelesia efwesa yoosi eye mu Lukaangu nende eye mu libiikhilo lie mwichipi.
Lundi Hesekia amulula esahabu khukhwama khu miliango kie Lukaangu ne esahabu niyo niye omwene aba ne amaala khu mitalaachi kie muliango mala ayilila Senakeribu yoosi.
Omwami owa Ashuru aruma omwimeelesi owe banamae, omwimeelesi omuchili no mwimeelesi omukhulu alala ne banamae bakali boola e Yerusalemu. Bacha bema a mechi kaali angaaki, a muyila niio banabi be chingubo bakholelanga kimilimo kiabwe. Alwakha lureera kameechi khukhwama mu litiisi lie ngaaki.
Nga ne balanga omwami Hesekia, banamae bewe bataru barura bacha khukhwakaanana ne nabo. Baba Eliakimu okhwa Hilikia, owaba omwimeelesi owe lichipi, Shebuna omuandiki ne Yoa okhwa Asafu owaba omubiikhi owe kamaandike.
Ne Rabushake, omwimeelesi komanda owe banamae ba Ashuru ababoolela ali, “Boolela Hesekia muli, omwami omukali owa Ashuru aloma ali: Wareere lilieyikina khu siina?
Ewe wibaasia oli kamakhuwa kong'ene kanyala kaba lilirekekha ne kamaani khulwe liie? Naanu niye weyikiine nga ne okholeele Ashuru bureengu?
Bona ewe weyikiine Misiri. Ne Misiri eli nga lusaala lufuniikhe. Lunyala lwauna kumukhono kwo omundu olwetilakho. Farao akholanga busa ario khu baandu boosi bamweyikinanga.”
“Ne waaba ne onyala waloma oli, ‘Khweyikiine Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe,’ oyo se ali niye Wele owe abuundu aesuta ne chialutare nicho Hesekia atechula ta ku? Hesekia aboolela babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu ali, ‘Mukhoya musikamile alutare ndala yong'ene mu Yerusalemu.’
Nono yiicha khufukiilisiane no mwami owa Ashuru. Ndakhuelesia chifarasi chielefu chibili waaba ne onyala wanyoola babaandu bachitimia.
Waama oriena nono olobe akhaba omukeekhe khu banamae bo mwami owa Ashuru mala weyikine Misiri khulwe kamakaari ke liie ne batimia chifarasi?
Khutasa khwako ewe wibaasia oli nebwakaale sibala siowo ne sendi ne buyeeti bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene niye owambooleele khusiibwaakala ne khusibunia.”
Nio Eliakimu okhwa Hilikia, Shebuna ne Yoa baboolela Rabushake bali, “omwami khukhusaba, lomaloma khwifwe mu lulomo lwa Ashuru sikila khuluulila. Okhalomaloma mu Lueburania tawe, sikila babaandu boosi baali khwisiisi balaulila.”
Ne kakhali Rabushake akobosia ali, “Ewe wibaasia oli omwami andumire ese khuboola bibiindu bino khwinywe ne khu mwami wenywe mweng'ene? Se kali kario tawe. Ese ndikho ndomaloma akhaba khu baandu babekhaale khwisiisi. Bakhalie bunyaalu bwabwe ne khunywa kameenyi kabwe, bulayi bwene nga enywe ne mukhakhole.”
Nio Rabushake enyokha eema mala alaanga lukali muluheburania ali, “Ulila ko omwami omukali owa Ashuru.
Omwami aloma ali, mukhalekha Hesekia amubea tawe. Hesekia se anyala amuonia enywe khukhwama khwise tawe.
Mukhalekha Hesekia amukhola enywe mweyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amuboolela ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ng'ali alakhusikula efwe, ne lukoba luno se lulaelesibwa khu mwami owa Ashuru,’ tawe.
Mukharekeeresia ka Hesekia tawe. Omwami owa Ashuru aloma ali, ‘Khola kumuleembe ne nase mala mwiche khwise. Buli mulala khwinywe alalia chisabibu che kimisabibu. Lundi buli mulala alalia khukhwama khu mutuli kwewe ne khunywa kameechi khukhwama mu sebele chenywe.
Kakhabe kario khukhwola nga ese ne ekhakobole emuyile mu maloba kaali bulayi bwene nga kamaloba kenywe. Kamaloba ako kalimo biakhulia ne endali, engaanu, kimisabibu, kimiseituni ne bubuukhi. Nio mumenye ne se mulafwa tawe. Mukhalekha Hesekia amusilwaasia ne aloma ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamureesia tawe.
Alikhoo wele khu bawele be chikholo chichiindi owaonia bibala biabwe khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru?
Bawele ba Hamati ne Aripoti luno bali waena? Bawele ba Sefaribaimu, Hena ne Iba bali waena? Alikhoo mulala khu beene abo owaonia Samaria?
Naanu mu bawele be bibala ebio bioosi owasikula bibala biabwe khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru? Nono siina sikila enywe ne mwibaasia muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala aonia Yerusalemu?’ ”
Ne kakhali basila busa chii. Se bamukobosia tawe. Omwami Hesekia aba ababoolela ali, “Mukhamukobosia tawe.”
Nio Eliakimu okhwa Hilikia omwimeelesi owe lichipi, Shebuna omuandiki ne Yoa omwimeelesi owe kamaandike batabula chingubo chabwe mu bubeeleli, mala bacha baboolela omwami niko omunamae omukhulu owa Ashuru aba ne aboolile.

Nga omwami Hesekia ne aulila kamakhuwa kabwe, atabula chingubo chewe mu bubeeleli, efwara likunia mala acha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aruma Eliakimu owemeelelanga lichipi lio mwami, Shebuna omuandiki ne basaayi bakhulu bache khu mung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amozi. Boosi baba bafwarire kamakunia.
Baboolela Isaya bali, “Hesekia aloma ali, endaalo yino eli endaalo eye bubeeleli, kumunaanio ne eye chisoni. Khuli nga omukhasi ne ali embi khusaala mala se ali ne kamaani ke khusaala omwana oyo tawe.
Wakana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo auliile kamakhuwa koosi niko Rabushake, niye omwami wewe owa Ashuru arumire khukhoma Wele omenyile mindali. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario aana kumunaanio khu makhuwa niko auliile. Khwako sabila abo balarama.”
Barume bo mwami Hesekia becha khu Isaya.
Isaya ababoolela ali, “Boolela omwami muli, kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma: ‘Mukhaba ne buuri khu makhuwa niko muulile tawe. Mukheembeelela khulwe kamakhuwa kamabi niko bakholi bo mwami owa Ashuru balomile khwise tawe.
Lola, ndamuramo kumwoyo kwe buuri ne alaulila kamakhuwa kakhamanyikhaane tawe mala alakobola mu sibala siewe. Ne endamukhola ererwe mu sibala siewe.’ ”
Rabushake akobolayo mala anyoola omwami owa Ashuru alikho apana ne lukoba lwa Libuna. Aba auliile ali omwami arurire e Lakishi.
Likhuwa liolela omwami bali omwami Tirihaka owa Kushi
“Boolela Hesekia owa Yuda muli, okhalekha Wele niye wiyikina oyo akhubea tawe. Okhamusuubila ne aloma ali lukoba lwa Yerusalemu se lulaebwa khu mwami owa Ashuru tawe.
Lola ewe wauliile niko babaami ba Ashuru bakhola bibala bioosi. Babionakilanga elala. Ewe wibaasia oli olaresibwa ku?
Bakuka base babunia chingoba cha Kosani, Harani ne Resefu. Lundi babunia babaandu ba Beti-edeni babamenyanga mu Telasari. Ne bawele be babaandu babaonia ku?
Babaami be chingoba cha Hamati, Aripadi, Sefaribaimu, Hena ne Iba bali waena?”
Omwami Hesekia abukula ebarwa khukhwama khu barumwa mala akisoma. Acha mu Lukaangu, aara ebarwa eyo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Hesekia asaba ne aloma ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli owekhala khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami angaaki we kerubi. Ewe weng'ene niwe Wele. Ewe Wele owe bubwami bwoosi bwe khwiloba. Wakhola liloba ne likulu.
Rekeeresia Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala oulile. Moka, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala obone. Ulila kamakhuwa ka Senakeribu niko arumaniisie khukhukhoma ewe, Wele omenyile mindali.
Ng'ali ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babaami ba Ashuru babuniisie chikholo chingali ne kamaloba kacho.
Ne bosia bawele babwe sikila se baba wele tawe ne kakhali biaba bikholwa bio omwana owo omundu. Bionakwa sikila biaba kimirongooro ne kamabaale.
Nono luno, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ekhusaba, khureesie efwe khukhwama khu Baashuru nio bibala bioosi bie khwiloba bilamanya bili ewe, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi weng'ene oli Wele.”
Nio Isaya okhwa Amozi aruma burume aboolela omwami Hesekia ali, kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli aloma: Nauliile lisaba liowo khwise khuloondekhana no mwami Senakeribu.
Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khu Senakeribu
“Omukhaana owe eyabwaana owa Sayuni,
akhulekelesia ewe ne khukhukhoma,
omukhaana owa Yerusalemu, akhusisiikhila ewe kumurwe.
Naanu niye okhomile ne khuchekheelela?
Naanu niye olayinganianga ne khukhweniinia?
Wabeele ne mbelekeu khwise, Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli!
Khubirira khu barumwa bowo,
wakhomile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
walomile oli ndi ne chifarasi chase chingali
nachiile khu ngaaki khwe bikulu,
nachiile mu bikulu bileeyi bia Lebanoni,
nareema kimirongooro kimitarakwa kimileeyi,
ne kimirongooro Saipurasi kimilayi,
nacha mukari lukali,
mu musiru kumukali.
Nayaba chisebele,
ne khunywa kameechi ke sibala sikeni,
ne noomia chinuma che kameechi cha Misiri choosi,
khulwe khurumikhira sikele.
Okhaaulilakho oli,
kano kaba munganakani chase khukhwama khale tawe!
Nakarekekha khukhwama khale,
niko ekholile kekholekha luno luri,
nio mukaluukhasie chingoba chisire chibe kamabuumbi ke bubwonaki,
Bamenya barusibwemo kamaani,
bafwiile kimiooyo mala baambiilwe lirima,
babeele nga bunyaasi butoro,
nga bunyaasi buchoa khu nju,
bwauchwa ne ekhuungu ne bukhachoa tawe.
Manyile niio omenyile,
manyile chingila chowo,
lundi manyile nga ne oli ne lirima khwise.
Sikila wambaambiile lirima,
ne lililola liowo naliuulile,
endara lulobo lwase mu lioolu liowo,
ne endakhukhola okobolele khu ngila nikhwo wichiile.”
Isaya aboolela omwami Hesekia ali, “Esino sikhabe simanyisio sie kamakhuwa kaakhekholekhe, kumwiiko kuno mulalia biakhulia bibuukha bibieene, kumwiiko kwe khabili mukhalie biakhulia birombanga khu bibuukha ne kumwiiko kwe khataru miicha biakhulia mala mubikese. Lundi biaala kimisabibu mala mulie chisabibu.
Baaliona mu Yuda bakhasisine nga kumurogooro mala basaale baame kamatuunda.
Ne khukhabe ne babaandu bakharame e Yerusalemu, khu sikulu sia Sayuni babaandu batiiti bakharame. Sinani sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe banamae nisio siikhakhole kano.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khuloondekhana no mwami owa Ashuru ali, se akheche mu lukoba luno namwe alasemo luembo, namwe alwichekho ne engabo namwe ombakhekho abuundu e khubotookhelesia tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali Senakeribu alikobolela khu muyila nikwo echelakho ne kumwene, ne se alingila mu lukoba luno tawe.
Ekhasute lukoba luno nduonie khulwe lisina liase ne khulwo omukholi wase Daudi.”
Siilo esio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha mu kambi eye Baashuru mala eera banamae chielefu emia ndala ne chielefu kamakhumi munane na chiraano. Nga babaandu ne benyokha makhelebeende banyoola bafu bong'ene.
Nio Senakeribu omwami owa Ashuru arekukha mala acha engo, mala amenya e Ninefe.
Endaalo ndala Senakeribu aba alikho esaaya wele wewe Nisiroki munju eya wele wewe. Basoleeli bewe babili, Adurameleki ne Sharesa, bamwiira mala belukhila mu sibala sia Ararati. Nio omusoleeli wewe Esarihatoni amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe aba omwami.

Mu ndaalo echo omwami Hesekia aba omulwale lukali enga khufwa. Omung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amozi acha amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Kololosia kamakhuwa ke nju yowo, sikila se olaona tawe, olafwa.’ ”
Hesekia ayukha alola khwisiisi mala asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali.
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhusaba okhebulile luno oli ese nakhukholela ewe mu busuubili ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi. Ne nakholile kaali kamalayi ebweeni wowo.” Mala Hesekia alila burafu.
Isaya ne akharekukha abira aluya lwe akari lwo omwami tawe, elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yamwichakho eli:
“Kobolayo mala oboolele Hesekia, omwami we babaandu base oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa raraao Daudi aloma ali, ‘Nauliile lisaba liowo. Naboone kamasika kowo. Ndakhuonia ne mu ndaalo ekhola khataru okhache munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ndakhutasa kimiiko ekhumi na kiraano khu bulamu bwowo. Ndakhureesia ewe ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu luno khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru. Endakhiinga lukoba luno khulwe lukoosi lwase samwene, ne khulwo omukholi wase Daudi.’ ”
Nono Isaya aboolela bakholi bo mwami ali tubundula chinduli mala muakhe mu libiimba liewe mala alaona.
Omwami Hesekia areeba Isaya ali, “Simanyisio siina silekesia sili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alambonia, ne khu ndaalo eya khataru khanyale khucha munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Isaya amukobosia ali, “Esino nisio silaba simanyisio sie khukhwekesia sili alaliinda lisuubisia liewe: Ewe wenya sisiiniini siche ebweeni bikele ekhumi namwe sikobole enyuma bikele ekhumi?”
Hesekia akobosia ali, “Lili liliangu khukhola sisiiniini siche ebweeni bikele ekhumi. Sikhole sikobole enyuma bikele ekhumi.”
Isaya asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola sisiiniini siakobola enyuma bikele ekhumi khu ngasi niyo Ahasi aakhola.
Mu siise esio ne sisiene, Merodaki-baladani omwami owa Babiloni aulila ali omwami Hesekia abeele omulwale. Nio Merotaki-Baladani okhwa Baladani amurumira ebarwa ne siianwa.
Hesekia akanila barumwa mala abekesia buiinda bwewe: Enju, efwesa, esahabu ne bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi ne kamafura kaunya kumuuya kumulayi ne bulwaani. Se siabao sisiindu siosi siosi munju mwewe namwe abuundu osi osi mu bwami bwewe nisio akhabekesia tawe.
Nio omung'oosi Isaya acha khu mwami Hesekia mala amureeba ali, “Babaandu bano bamile waena, lundi balomile bali siina?”
Hesekia amukobosia ali, “Bamile mu sibala sie aleeyi. Bamile Babiloni.”
Isaya areeba lundi ali, “Baboone siina munju yowo?” Hesekia akobosia ali, “Baboone buli sisiindu siili munju yase. Se siliio sisiindu mu libiikhilo liase nisio ekhabekesie tawe.”
Nio Isaya aboolela Hesekia ali, “Ulila elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi:
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola biise bilikho biicha nibio buli sisiindu siili munju mwowo nende nisio bakukaao babiikha khukhwola khu ndaalo yino silibukulwa siyilwe Babiloni. Mbao silirama tawe.
Balala khu basoleeli bowo babeene nibo wasaala balibukulibwa. Balikholwa bachili khukhola mwichipi lio mwami owa Babiloni.’ ”
Omwami Hesekia ebaasia ali lino liboola lili kumuleembe kucha khubao ne buliindi bulayi mu siise sie bulamu bwewe, nio akobosia Isaya ali, “Elomo niyo wama khumboolela, khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli endayi.”
Bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio omwami Hesekia akhola, bikholwa biewe bie bunyindaafu bioosi, lundi nga ombakha litiisi ne khuyaba kimiliinda kie khureera kameechi mu lukoba, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Hesekia afwa mala omusoleeli wewe Manase amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Manase aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na kibili nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi karaano na kiraano. Maayi wewe aba Hefisiba.
Akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola ke khusinyisia nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne atimania chikholo nicho aba ne aoona mu sibala nga babaandu bewe Isiraeli ne baba ne bengisia.
Manase ombakha abuundu aesuta lundi niio Hesekia raraawe aba ne atechula. Ombakha chialutare cha Baali mala akhola sifwaani sia Ashera, nga omwami Ahabu owa Isiraeli aba ne akhola. Lundi Manase asaaya ching'enieesi ne khuchikholela.
Ombakha chialutare munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, enju niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba aloma ali, “Mu Yerusalemu khasaayilwemo.”
Lundi Manase ombakha chialutare khulwe ching'enieesi mumbia chibili che enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne osia omusoleeli wewe nga siianwa sie khukhwosia. Akholanga buolelesi ne bufumu ne khureeba balakusi ne basaali. Akhola bumayaanu bukali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala amuambia lirima.
Asimikha sifwaani sia Ashera, nisio aakhola munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba aboolela Daudi ne omusoleeli wewe Solomoni ali, “Munju muno, ne mu Yerusalemu nimwo endoboore khukhwama mu kholo choosi mu Isiraeli, khasaayilwemo mindali na mindali.
Se ekhakhole babaandu ba Isiraeli bauyauye lundi mala barure mu maloba niko nalaka bapaapa babwe tawe. Kaaba bali baba barekerefu mu khukhola koosi niko nabalaka, lundi baloonda kamalaka niko omukholi wase Musa abaelesia.”
Ne se baulila tawe. Manase abakhongelesia bakhola bumayaanu. Bakhola bumayaanu buboofu khukhila be chikholo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia nga Baisiraeli baba ne balikho becha.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma khubirira mu bakholi bewe bang'oosi ali,
“omwami Manase akholile bie khusinya. Akholile bibiindu bimayaanu lukali khukhila bioosi nibio Baamori ba baaba mu Kanaani bakhola ebweeni wewe. Lundi araangirire babaandu ba Yuda mu khusikamila bifwaani.
Sikila kano, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndareera kamabi khu Yerusalemu ne khu Yuda nio buli mulala oliulila khu menako alirangararwa.
Ndaelesia Yerusalemu kumunaanio nga nikwo naelesia Samaria lundi nga nakhola Ahabu ne lisaaye liewe. Ndarusiliayo elala babaandu ba Yerusalemu.
Ndanjukha babaandu babarama, ne ndibalekhuulila basiku babwe babaule. Baliikela embaambe eye basiku babwe boosi. Lundi basiku babwe balibayaaya kimiaandu kiabwe.
Ndikhola ndio sikila bakholeele ese bumayaanu. Bambaambiisie lirima khukhwama siise nisio bakuuka babwe barurirakho mu Misiri khukhwola endaalo yino.”
Manase eera babaandu bakali bakhaba ne bubi tawe. Kimikhula kie sifuki kiechula khungila che mu Yerusalemu. Akhola kano khutasa mu khurangirira babaandu ba Yuda bakhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bia Manase nende koosi niko akhola ne bumayaanu nibwo akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Manase afwa mala asiikhwa mu siliindwa sia Usa. Nio omusoleeli wewe Amoni amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Amoni aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kibili nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kibili. Maayi wewe aba Meshulemeti omukhaana owa Harusi khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Yotiba.
Amoni akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga raraawe Manase ne aakhola.
Akhola koosi niko raraawe akhola mala akholela bifwaani nibio raraawe akholela. Lundi asaaya bifwaani ebio.
Aloba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka bewe, mala khuloonda chingila cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Banamae ba Amoni bamukholela ekwangwaani mala bamwirira mwichipi liewe.
Babaandu ba Yuda bera babaandu babeera Amoni mala bamiisia Yosia omusoleeli wewe aba omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi nibio Amoni akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Amoni asiikhwa mu siluundu sia Usia mala omusoleeli wewe Yosia amiisibwa aba omwami mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Yosia akhola kasiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aloonda limenya lia kukaawe Daudi ne se alekhakho tawe.
Mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na munaane kwe bubwami bwa Yosia, omwami Yosia aruma Shafani omuandiki ache munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Shafani aba okhwa Asalia lundi omwichukhulu owa Meshulamu.
Amulaka ali, “Cha khu Musaayi Omukhulu Lukali Hilikia mala akhuboolele bukali bwe chirupia nicho bareera munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nicho baliindi babuusia khukhwama khu baandu.
Muboolele achielesie babemeelesi be Lukaangu.
