Ne babemeelesi bano bachielesie bakholi bali a lukaangu khu lung'oona. Achielesie babeechi be kimirongooro, babombakhi ne babeechi be kamabaale. Lundi chirupia echo chirumikhe mu khukula chimbao ne kamabaale karumikha mu khung'oona Lukaangu.
Babemeelesi be kimilimo bali babeyikinwa lukali nono mukhabareeba baboole nga ne barumikhira chirupia echo tawe.”
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Hilikia aboolela Shafani ali, “Nanyoolile sitabu sie Lilaka munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Hilikia aelesia Shafani sitabu esio mala Shafani asisoma.
Nio acha khu mwami mala amuboolela ali, “Bakholi bowo babukuule chirupia choosi chibeele mu Lukaangu mala bachieleesie khu bemeelesi be kimilimo kie khung'oona Lukaangu.”
Nio Shafani aboolela omwami ali, “Omusaayi Hilikia ambeleesie sitabu.” Ne Shafani asoma sitabu esio ebweeni wo mwami.
Nga omwami ne aulila kamakhuwa ke sitabu sie Lilaka, atabula chingubo chewe.
Omwami arusia lilaka khu Musaayi Omukhulu Lukali Hilikia, ne Ahikamu okhwa Shafani ne Akibori okhwa Mikaya ne shafani omuandiki ne Asaia omuliindi wo mwami. Aloma ali,
“Cha mundebeere ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khulwe babaandu, ne Yuda yoosi khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ke mu sitabu sinyooleekhe sino. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuambiile efwe lirima likali sikila bakuuka befwe se bakhola niko sitabu sino siboola khuloondekhana ne nafwe tawe.”
Nono Hilikia, Ahikamu, Akibori, Shafani ne Asaia bacha bareeba omung'oosi Hulida, owamenya lubeka lulala lwa Yerusalemu. (Omuseecha owa Hulida aba Shalumu, okhwa Tikiba. Shalumu lundi aba omwichukhulu owa Harihasi. Shalumu emeelelanga e kabati eye chingubo mu Lukaangu.) Babaandu baraano abo bacha khu Hulida.
Omung'oosi oyo ababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Cha muboolele omundu omurumire enywe khwise muli,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lola ndikho nja khureera kumunaanio abuundu ano ne khu bamenywa bao. Ndakhola koosi ke mu sitabu niko omwami owa Yuda asomile.
Kalaba kario sikila babaandu bandekhile ese mala bosiele bawele babaandi bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi. Ne bambaambiisie lirima khulwe bikholwa biabwe bioosi. Khwako, naambiile abuundu ano lirima likhawa tawe.
Ne kakhali boolela omwami owa Yuda omurumire khureeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli aloma ali: khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa niko ouliile,
kumwoyo kwowo kweboombiisie. Ne ewe weboombiisie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ouliile niko endomile khuloondekhana ne abuundu ano ne bamenywa bao. Weboombiisie nga ne ndomile ndi lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lulianjukhwa busa mala luliba silaamo. Kamakhuwa ako kakilile ewe watabula chingubo chowo mala walila ebweeni wase. Sikila kano, sesi nakhuuliile.
Khwako, lola, ndakhukhola ofwe mu muleembe. Ne se okhabone bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo ekhareere mu Yerusalemu tawe.’ ”
Nio babaandu baraano abo bakobola khu mwami Yosia ne burume obwo.

Nio omwami Yosia arumania mala basaakhulu boosi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu bacha niio aba.
Omwami ne babaandu ba Yuda boosi ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu boosi bacha munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhaba basaayi ne bang'oosi alala ne babaandu boosi, bakhulu ne batiiti sitube bacha. Omwami asoma kamakhuwa koosi ke mu sitabu sie endakaano sisiaba ne sinyooleekhe munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babaandu ne barekereesie.
Omwami eema siimbi ne njeko mala akhola endakaano ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuloonda chingila cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khuliinda kamalaka kewe ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi ne bulamu bwewe, ne khukhola ke mu ndakaano. Ne babaandu boosi baambana ne Yosia khukhola endakaano.
Arusiao basaayi nibo babaami ba Yuda barakho kamakhono. Barebwakho kamakhono khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi abuundu aesuta mungoba cha Yuda ne abuundu ali siimbi ne Yerusalemu. Abo babosielanga Baali, ne enyanga, kumwesi, sulwe ne ching'enieesi bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi, boosi arusiao.
Arusia mu Lukaangu sifwaani sia Ashera. Ayila sifwaani esio mwitooma lie luluuchi lwa Kiduroni. Asiosia mala abukula likokhe liasio alisalanisia abuundu niio basiikhanga babaandu.
Atechula chinju che balaaya be siseecha be mu lukaangu
Areera mu Yerusalemu basaayi be bifwaani boosi ba baaba mu ngoba cha Yuda, ne mu sibala sioosi. Onakaka abuundu aesuta oosi niio boseelanga bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi khukhwama Keba khukhwola Beerisheba. Akhaba lundi atechula abuundu aesuta a aaba mu silibwa sia Yoshua omuruki we lukoba. Silibwa esio siaba kumukhono kumukhasi kwe silibwa siboofu sie khukhwingila mu lukoba.
Kakhaba kario basaayi be abuundu aesuta se bacha khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Yerusalemu tawe. Ne kakhali balia kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe khukhwama khu basaayi basiaabwe.
Lundi Yosia arusia chifarasi nicho babaami ba Yuda baba ne bara alubeka khulwe enyanga mala osia kamakaari ke liie kakakholanga kimilimo kie khusaaya khuno. (Bino biaba biabiikhwa siimbi e silibwa ne bumenyo bwa Nasani Meleki omunamae omukhulu.)
Akhweesa arusia chialutare chichaba mu lusiro lwe ekorofa eya Ahasi. Chialutare echo chakholwa ne babaami ba Yuda. Omwami Yosia atechula alala ne chialutare nicho omwami Manase akhola mu mbya chibili che enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, acharamo bitonyi bibili mala achimwaata mu litooma lia Kiduroni.
Yosia onakaka abuundu aesuta niio omwami Solomoni aba ne akhola ebukwe owa Yerusalemu, khulwe khusaaya. Ashitoreti wele owe Basidonia, Chemoshi wele owe Bamoabu ne Moleki wele owe Baamoni. Abuundu ao aba ebunafubo we sikulu sia Miseituni
Omwami Yosia atechula chinjeko mu bitonyi. Aremakakamo wele Asherimu mala abuundu niio biabechanga echusiao kamakuumba ke babaandu.
Yosia alola mala abonayo biliindwa khu lukulu. Arumania barusia kamakuumba kamwo mala bakosiela khu alutare. Mungila yino onakaka alutare eyo khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilio omung'oosi wewe ang'oola. Owang'oola bung'oosi buno,
Areeba ali, “Siliindwa esio sia naanu?”
Babaandu ba Beteli bamukobosia bali, “Sili sio omung'oosi owecha khukhwama Yuda mala ang'oola bibiindu nibio ewe wama khukhola khu alutare.”
Yosia aloma ali, “Lekha sibe. Kamakuumba kewe kakharusibwao tawe.”
Nio bikuumba biewe bialekhwa alala nende bio omung'oosi owama Samaria.
Yosia arusiao binamwima bie abuundu aesuta bibiaba mungoba cha Samaria nibio babaami ba Isiraeli baba ne bakhola mala baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima. Akhola abuundu aesuta ao bulayi bwene nga ne akhola mu Beteli.
Erera basaayi boosi be abuundu aesuta khu alutare mala abosielakho kamakuumba ke babaandu. Nio akobola Yerusalemu.
Omwami Yosia alaka babaandu boosi ali, “Khola e Pasaka khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe nga ne kaandikwa mu sitabu sie endakaano sino.”
Khukhwama mu siise nisio babemeelesi bemeelelanga Isiraeli, Epasaka nga eyo erio yaba ekhakholwakho tawe. Akhaba mu ndaalo che babaami boosi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu, Epasaka erio se yekholekhakho tawe.
Ne kakhali mu mwiiko kwe ekhumi na munaane kwe bubwami bwa Yosia e pasaka yakholwa mu Yerusalemu khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khutasa khwako Yosia arusia balakusi, bafumu, bifwaani biilaangwa Terafimu ne bifwaani bibiindi khukhwama mu maloba ka Yerusalemu ne Yuda. Mu khukhola kano enya emekhe kamakhuwa ke lilaka kakaandikwa mu sitabu nisio omusaayi Hilikia anyoola munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Se abakhoo omwami ebweeni wa Yosia namwe enyuma wewe owakobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi, ne kamebaasio kewe koosi ne kamaani kewe koosi, khuloondekhana nga lilaka lia Musa ne liboola tawe.
Kakhaba kario lirima likali nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba nalio liachiililila khuburukha sikila niko Manase akhola.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndirusiao Yuda khukhwama mumoni chase nga ne nakhola Isiraeli. Ndamwaata lukoba lwa Yerusalemu nilwo narobora luno ne nju niyo naloma ndi balinjisaayilamo.”
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yosia ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Nga Yosia ne aba omwami, Farao Neko owa Misiri arangirira banamae bacha khukhwibwaakala omwami owa Ashuru aluuchi lwa Efurati. Yosia acha khukhiingilila Bamisiri e Mekido mala Neko amwirira ebweeneyo enyuma we khumubona.
Banamae bewe basutila kumubili kwewe mu likaari lie kamae khukhwama Mekido bamuyila Yerusalemu. Bamusiikha mu siliindwa siewe.
Ne babaandu ba Yuda babukula omwana wewe omusoleeli Yoahasi bamukhola omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe.
Yoahasi arakikha khukhwamiia ne ali bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kitaru. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimieesi kitaru. Maayi wewe aba Hamutali, omukhaana owa Yeremia khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Libuna.
Akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga bakuuka bewe ne bakhola.
Bubwami bwewe bwakama nga Farao Neko owa Misiri ne amubukula nga omuboe amuyila Ribula, mu sibala sia Hamati nio akhamwiira mu Yerusalemu tawe. Nio Farao akhola Yuda yaruunga busuuru bitonyi emia bie efwesa ne sitonyi sie esahabu.
Farao Neko amiisia Eliakimu okhwa Yosia aaba omwami owa Yuda mu bweyaangu bubwaba bwa Yosia, mala akaluukhasia lisina liewe liaba Yehoyakimu. Farao Neko abukula Yoahasi amuyila Misiri mala afwilayo.
Omwami Yehoyakimu arusianga efwesa ne esahabu. Lundi areebanga busuuru khukhwama khu baandu khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Farao. Abukulanga busuuru khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie buiinda bwabwe.
Yehoyakimu akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga bakuukawe ne bakhola.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma bipupu bie Bakalidayo, Bashamu, Bamoabu, ne Baamoni bonakake Yuda khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo alomaloma khubirira khu bakholi bewe bang'oosi.
Ng'ali kano kakholekha khu Yuda khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lie khubarusia mumoni chewe sikila bumayaanu bwa Manase bwoosi nibwo akhola.
Lundi kekholekha sikila sifuki sie babaandu bakhali ne kamabi tawe nisio Manase achukha. Manase achukha sifuki sikali mu Yerusalemu sie babaandu bakhaba ne kamabi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se anyala khubeela Yuda tawe, khuloondekhana nende niko Manase akhola.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yehoyakimu ne koosi niko akhola biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda.
Yehoyakimu afwa mala omusoleeli wewe Yehoyakini amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Ne Farao owa Misiri se echakho mu Yuda lundi tawe, sikila omwami owe Bababiloni aba abukuule bibiaba bioosi bia Farao owa Misiri khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati khukhwola ebunaswa khu lwakha lwa Misiri.
Yehoyakini aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na munaane nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia Yuda. Amiia ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimieesi kitaru. Maayi wewe aba Nehushita, omukhaana owa Elinatani khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Akhola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga raraawe ne akhola.
Mu siise sie bubwami bwewe, banamae ba Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni, becha khukhupana ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu mala balubotookhelesia.
Banamae bewe ne basilubotookhelesia, Nebukadinesa omwene echa Yerusalemu.
Ne omwami Yehoyakini omwene alala ne maawe, basoleeli bewe, banamae bewe, ne banamae be lichipi beaana babeene khu mwami owa Babiloni. Nebukadinesa aamba Yehoyakini nga omuboe mu mwiiko kukhola munaane kwe bubwami bwa Nebukadinesa.
Nebukadinesa asuta bibiindu bie mu libiikhilo bioosi bie munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nende bie mu libiikhilo lie mwichipi. Atonya bibiindu bie esahabu bioosi bie munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nibio omwami Solomoni aba ne akhola. Kano koosi kekholekha nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma.
Nebukadinesa abukula babaandu be mu Yerusalemu boosi, babaandu be nju eye bubwami boosi ne babaandu be kamaani boosi nga baboe. Boosi alala baba babaandu chielefu ekhumi baboe. Lundi arusia mu sibala babaandu banabi alala ne baabasi, acha nabo alekha batambi bong'ene.
Lundi ayila Babiloni babaandu be kamaani boosi chielefu saba. Lundi abukula banabi ne baabasi e elefu ndala. Boosi baba babaandu be kamaani lundi baboolana mwiie.
Omwami Sedekia akhola bumayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga omwami Yehoyakimu aaba ne akhola.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila babaandu ba Yerusalemu ne Yuda lirima, nio abauyisia barura mumoni mwewe. Nono Sedekia akholela omwami owa Babiloni bureengu.

Nio lukoba lwabotookhelesibwa khukhwola mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na mulala kwa Sedekia.
Oli khu ndaalo eya tisa eye kumwesi kwe khane kwe kumwiiko kukhola ekhumi na mulala okwo, enjala yaba endafu lukali mala babaandu khuba ne siakhulia tawe.
Baatula lisiisi lie lukoba akhaba Bakalidayo ne baba ne babotookhelesie lukoba. Omwami ne banamae boosi belukha musilo. Belukhila niio baatula, mala babirira mu siluundu sio mwami mala balola mu litooma lia Yoritani.
Ne kakhali banamae Bakalidayo batimania omwami Sedekia, mala bamuambila mu sibala sie keewa sia Yeriko. Banamae bewe boosi bamwaanjukha.
Sedekia abukulwa ayilwa khu mwami Nebukadinesa owaba ne ali mu lukoba lwa Riba mala ebweeneyo Nebukadinesa amukhalakila.
Babaana ba Sedekia beerwa, Sedekia ne aloleleele. Nio Nebukadinesa atomola chimoni cha Sedekia achirusiamo, amuboa kiminyololo, mala amubukula amuyila e Babiloni.
Oli khu ndaalo eya saba eye kumwesi kwa kharaano kwe kumwiiko kwe ekhumi na tisa kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Nebukadinesa mu Babiloni, Nebusaratani omwimeelesi owe baliindi bo mwami acha mu Yerusalemu.
Osia Lukaangu, lichipi ne chinju choosi mu Yerusalemu. Osia buli enju emboofu.
Ne banamae Bakalidayo ba baaba ne Nebusaratani batechula lisiisi liliabotookhelela lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Nono Nebusaratani aamba bakholi basicha, babaandu babarama mu lukoba boosi alala ne nabo babelukhila khu mwami owa Babiloni ne babaandu boosi be sibala abayila mu mbaambe e Babiloni.
Ne kakhali Nebusaratani alekha balala khu baandu bataambi lukali mu Yuda khuba baremuli be kamaruuti ne khulima.
Babukula akhaba chinyuungu, bitaulilo kamakasi ke bibuumba bie khukhwosielakho bibiindu biiunya kumuya kumulayi alala ne bibiindi bioosi bie kumukasa bibiarumikhanga khu mulimo mu Lukaangu.
Babukula ne bifuria ne chipwakuli. Babukula buli sisiindu sie esahabu nende sie efwesa.
Bibiindu bie kumukasa nibio omwami Solomoni akhola khulwe Lukaangu, chinjeko chibili, kamatangi ne biteetwe biaba bisiro bukali lukali.
Buli enjeko yaba buleeyi bwe bikele likhumi lilala na munaane ne buniina bikele bitaru. Chinjeko echo chaba chabotookhelesibwa ne lutiimba lwe kamakomanga. Bioosi bino biaba bie kumukasa.
Khutasakho, Nebusaratani komanda owe banamae baliindi abukula Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Seraya, Sefania omusaayi oloondela omukhulu ne babaandi bataru, baliindi be abuulilo nga baboe.
Mu lukoba abukulamo omunamae omukhulu owemeelela liie, bakeleki baraano bo mwami ba baaba ne basiili mu lukoba, ne omuandiki owaba komanda owemeelelanga babaandu mu liie. Lundi Nebusaratani abukula babaandu kamakhumi sita khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Yuda.
Ababukula mala abayila khu Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni mu lukoba lwa Ribula.
Nebukadinesa abapa abeerera e Ribula mu maloba ka Hamati.
Nio babaandu ba Yuda bayilwa mu mbaame enje we sibala siabwe.
Banamae bakhulu boosi be kamae be lukoongo baulila bali omwami wabwe aroboore Kedalia khuba omuruki. Nga baulila ako, boosi becha ne banamae babwe e Misipa. Banamae bakhulu abo baba Ishimaeli okhwa Netania, Yoanani okhwa Karea, Seraya okhwa Tanihumeti, khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Netofa, ne Yasania khukhwama Maaka.
Kedalia abechubila ne banamae babwe ne aloma ali, “Mukharia sikila babemeelesi Bakalidayo tawe. Menya mu sibala sino, mala mukholele omwami owa Babiloni. Ne buli sisiindu sibe silayi khwinywe.”
Ne kakhali mu mwesi kukhola saba, Ishimaeli, okhwa Netania lundi omwichukhulu owa Elishama wenju eye bubwami echa ne babaandu ekhumi ebwaakala Kedalia, mala amwiira. Lundi eera Baisiraeli ne Bakalidayo ba baaba e Misipa.
Nio Baisiraeli boosi, bakhulu ne batiiti sitube, ne babemeelesi be kamae barekukha belukhila e Misiri sikila baba bariire Bakalidayo.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na saba kwo mwami Yehoyakini owa Yuda khuba mu mbaambe, Ebilimerodaki arakikha khukhwamiia Babiloni. Ako kekholekha khu ndaalo ekhola kamakhumi kabili na saba eye kumwesi kwe khumi na kibili. Nga arakikha khukhwamiia Ebilimerodaki arusia Yehoyakini khukhwama mu mbaame.
Nio Ebilimerodaki alomaloma ne Yehoyakini bulayi. Lundi Ebilimerodaki aelesia Yehoyakini endebe eye lukoosi khukhila chindebe che babaami ba baaba ne naye e Babiloni.
Nio Yehoyakini afuula chingubo chewe che mu siboe, mala mu bulamu bwewe bubwarama bwoosi alichanga khu sialwa sio mwami.
Buli endaalo, khulwe bulamu bwewe bubwarama bwoosi aelesibwanga chirupia che khurumikhira.

Adamu aaba raraawe owa Seti, Seti aaba raraawe owa Enosi, Enosi aaba raraawe owa Kenani,
Kenani aaba raraawe owa Mahalaleli, Mahalaleli aaba raraawe owa Yareti.
Yareti aaba raraawe owa Enoka, Enoka aaba raraawe owa Metusela, Metusela aaba raraawe owa Lameki.
Lameki aaba raraawe owa Noa. Noa aaba ne babaana bewe basoleeli bataru: Shemu, Hamu ne Chafwesa.
Ba okhwa Chafwesa baba: Komeri, Makoki, Matai, Yabani, Tubali, Mesheki ne Tirasi.
Ba okhwa Komeri baba Ashikenasi, Difati ne Tokarima.
Ba okhwa Yabani baba Elisha, Tarishishi, Kitimu, ne Rotanimu.
Ba okhwa Hamu baba Kushi, Misiri, Puti ne Kanaani.
Ba okhwa Kushi baba Seba, Habila, Sabuta, Raama ne Sabuteka. Ba okhwa Raama baba Sheba ne Dedani.
Kushi aba ne omusoleeli bali Nimuroti, owaba ne kamaani khu sibala.
Misiri aaba raraawe owa Lutimu, Anamu, Lehabi, ne Nafutu.
Lundi ne Paturusi, ne Kasilu (niye Bafilisiti baamakho) ne Kafutorimu.
Ba okhwa Kanaani baba, Sidoni omubele, ne Heti.
Lundi Kanaani aaba paapa we Bayebusi, Baamori Bakirikashi,
Bahibi, Baariki, Basini.
Baaribati, Basemari ne Bahamati.
Ba okhwa Shemu baba Elamu, Ashuru, Arifakisati, Luti, Aramu, Usi, Huli, Keteri ne Mesheki.
Arifakisati aaba raraawe owa Shela. Ne Shela aaba raraawe owa Eberi.
Eberi aaba ne basoleeli babili, Peleki
Yokitani aaba raraawe owa Alimotati, Shelefu, Hasari-mabeti, Yera.
Lundi ne Hatoramu, Usali, Dikila.
Ebali Abimaeli, ne Sheba.
Lundi Ofiri, Hafila ne Yobabu.
Lisaaye liliama khu Shemu khukhwola khu Aburamu liabamo babaandu nibo bano: Shemu, Arifakisati, ne Shela.
Eberi, Peleki, ne Reu,
Seruki, Nahori, Tera,
ne Aburamu (owamanyikhana nga Aburahamu)
Aburahamu aba ne babaana basoleeli babili, Isaaka ne Ishimaeli.
Ba okhwa Ishimaeli baba Nebaioti (omusoleeli owa Ishimaeli omubele) Kedari, Atibeeli, ne Mibusamu.
Mishima, Tuma, Masa, Hatati, ne Tema.
Yeturi, Nafisi, ne Ketema.
Aburahamu aaba no mukhasi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale, bali Ketura, basaala babaana basoleeli sita: Simurani, Yokisiani, Metani, Midiani, Isibaki ne Shua. Yokisiani aba ne basoleeli babili, Sheba ne Dedani.
Midiani aba ne babaana basoleeli baraano: Efa, Eferi, Hanoki, Abita ne Elida. Bano boosi baba lisaaye lia Ketura
Aburahamu aaba raraawe owa Isaaka ne Isaaka aba ne babaana babili, Esau ne Isiraeli.
Ba okhwa Esau baba Elifasi, Reueli, Yeushi, Yalamu ne Kora.
Ba okhwa Elifasi baba: Temani, Omari, Sefi, Katamu, Kenasi, Timuna ne Amaleki.
Ne ba okhwa Reueli baba Nahati, Sera, Shama ne Misa.
Bamenywa be khunyoa ba Edomu baama khu ba okhwa Seiri, Lotani, Siobali, Sibeoni, Ana, Dishoni, Eseri ne Dishoni.
Ba okhwa Lotani baba Hori ne Homamu. (Lotani aba ne omukooko bali Timuna).
Bokhwa Siobali baba Aliani, Manahati, Ebali, Shefi, ne Onamu.
Sibeoni aba ne basoleeli babili, Aia ne Ana.
Ana aba ne omwana wewe Dishoni. Ne babaana ba Dishoni baba Hamurani, Esibani Itirani ne Kerani.
Babaana ba Eseri baba Bilihani, Saabani ne Yaakani.
Ba okhwa Dishoni baba Usi ne Arani.
Abano bali babaami babamiia mu sibala sia Edomu ekhunyoa omwami yesi yesi ne akhamiiakho mu sibala sie Baisiraeli tawe:
Bela okhwa Beori khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Tinihaba.
Nga nga Bela ne afwa, Yobabu okhwa Sera khukhwama Bosira amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nga Yobabu ne afwa Husiamu khukhwama mu Temani amiia.
Nga Hushamu ne afwa, Hatati okhwa Betati khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Abiti owapana mala aula Bamidiani mu sibala sia Moabu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nga Hatati ne afwa Samula khukhwama Masireka amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nga Samula ne afwa Saulo owa Rehoboti khu luuchi lwa Efurati amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nga Shauli ne afwa, Baali-hanani okhwa Akibori amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nga Baali-hanani ne afwa Hatati khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Pai amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe. Omukhasi wewe aba bali Mehetabeli omukhaana owa Matureti lundi omwichukhulu owa Mesahabu.
Hadadi afwa. Babemeelesi ba Edomu baba: Timuna, Alia, ne Yeteti.
Oholibama, Ela, ne Pinoni.
Kenasi, Temani, ne Mibisari.
Makitieli ne Iramu.

Bano nibo ba okhwa Yakobo: Rubeni, Simioni, Lawi, Yuda, Isakari, Sebuluni.
Dani, Yosefu, Benjamini, Nafutali, Kati ne Asheri.
Bano nibo basoleeli nibo Yuda asaala, Eri, Onani ne Shela. Bano nibo omukhasi wewe Batishua omukanaani amusaalila. Omusoleeli wewe Eri aba omumayaanu lukali mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwiira.
Mu mukhaana wewe Tamari, ngwa walimusaani Eri, Yuda amusaalamo basoleeli babaandi babili, Peresi ne Sera.
Peresi aba ne babaana bewe basoleeli babili: Hesironi ne Hamuli.
Wandaaye Sera aba ne babaana basoleeli baraano: Simuri, Etani, Hemani, Kalikoli ne Tara.
Akani
Omwana owa Etani aba bali Asaria.
Hesironi aba ne basoleeli bataru: Yeraimeeli, Ramu, ne Kelubai.
Rama aaba raraawe owa Aminatabu, ne Aminatabu aaba raraawe owa Nasioni, Nasioni aba omwimeelesi we babaandu ba Yuda.
Nasioni aaba raraawe owa Salima, Salima aaba raraawe owa Boasi.
Boasi aaba raraawe owa Obeti, Obeti aaba raraawe owa Chesi.
Chesi aba ne basoleeli saba: omubele aba Eliabu oloondakho aba Abinatabu, owa khataru aba Simea.
Owa khane aba Netaneli owa kharaano aba Ratai,
owa sita aba Osemu, owa saba aba Daudi.
Akhaba lundi aba ne bakhaana babili Seruya ne Abikaili.
Seruya omukhaana owa Chesi aba ne basoleeli bataru, Abisai, Yoabu ne Asaeli.
Abikaili aaba mukha Amasa okhwa Yeteri owe lisaaye lia Ishimaeli.
Kalebu okhwa Hesironi aba ne bakhasi babili, Asuba ne Yerioti. Asuba asaalila Kalebu basoleeli bataru: Yesieri, Sobabu ne Aritoni.
Nga Asuba ne afwa, Kalebu areera omukhasi okundi bali Efurati mala basaala omwana omusoleeli bali Huri.
Huri aaba raraawe owa Uri ne Uri aaba raraawe owa Basaleli.
Hesironi ne ali bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi sita, akhwa omukhaana owa Makiri. Makiri aaba raraawe owa Kileati. Hesironi aaba ne omukooko owa Makiri basaala omwana omusoleeli bali Sekubu.
Ne Sekubu aaba raraawe owa Yairi. Yairi amiia
Ne Keshuri ne Aramu baamba Hafoti-yairi, sitube ne Kenati ne birekere bia Yairi. Ne chingoba kamakhumi sita. Lino lioosi liaba lisaaye lia Makiri raraawe owa Kileati.
Enyuma we lifwa lia Hesironi, omusoleeli wewe Kalebu ela khu Efurati owaba mukha raraawe. Asaalamo omwana omusoleeli bali Ashihuri raraawe owa Tekoa.
Yeraimeeli, omubele owa Hesironi asaala basoleeli baraano: Rama aba omubele, Buna, Oreni, Osemu ne Ahiya.
Yeraimeeli aba ne omukhasi okundi bali Atara, owaba maayi owa Onamu.
Rama asaala basoleeli bataru: Maasi, Yamini ne Ekeri.
Onamu asaala basoleeli babili: Siamai ne Yata. Siamai yesi asaala basoleeli babili, Natabu ne Abisiuri.
Lisina lio mukhasi owa Abisiuri aba bali Abikaili. Amusaalila basoleeli babili Abani ne Moliti.
Natabu wandaaye owa Abisiuri asaala basoleeli babili, Seleti ne Apaimu, ne Seleti afwa ne akhasaala omwana tawe.
Apaimu aaba raraawe owa Ishi, Ishi aaba raraawe owa Shesiani ne Shesiani aaba raraawe owa Alai.
Yata wandaaye owa Siamai asaala basoleeli babili: Yeteri ne Yonasani. Yeteri afwa ne akhasaala omwana tawe.
Yonasani asaala basoleeli babili, Peleti ne Sasa. Bano boosi baba be nju eya Yeraimeeli.
Shesiani asaala bakhaana bong'ene. Ne kakhali aaba ne nasioobi Omumisiri lisina bali Yariha.
Shesiani aelesia Yariha mulala khu bakhaana bewe aba omukhasi wewe. Basaala omusoleeli lisina bali Atai.
Atai aaba raraawe owa Nasani, ne Nasani aaba raraawe owa Sabati.
Sabati aaba raraawe owa Efulali ne Efulali aaba raraawe owa Obeti.
Obeti aaba raraawe owa Yehu ne Yehu aaba raraawe owa Asaria.
Asaria aaba raraawe owa Helesi, ne Helesi aaba raraawe owa Eliesa.
Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Sisimai, ne Sisimai aaba raraawe owa Sialumu.
Sialumu aaba raraawe owa Yekamia, ne Yekamia aaba raraawe owa Elisiama.
Kalebu aaba wandaaye owa Yeraimeeli. Omwana owa Kalebu omubele aba Mesia. Mesia aaba raraawe owa Sifu. Sifu aaba raraawe owa Maresha owaba raraawe owa Heburoni.
Heburoni asaala basoleeli bane: Kora, Tapua, Rekemu ne Shema.
Shema aaba raraawe owa Rahamu, Rahamu aaba raraawe owa Yorikeamu. Ne Rekemu aaba raraawe owa Siamai.
Siamai aaba raraawe owa Maoni. Maoni aaba raraawe owa Beti-suri.
Kalebu aaba no mukhasi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale. Lisina liewe bali Efa. Asaala naye basoleeli babaandi bataru: Harani, Mosa ne Kasesi. Harani yesi asaala omusoleeli bali Kasesi.
Yahitai asaala basoleeli sita: Rekemu, Yotamu, Kesiani, Peleti, Efa ne Siaafu.
Kalebu aba ne omukhasi okundi niye aamenyia busa nga omusaale, bali Maaka. Amusaalila basoleeli babili: Sheberi ne Tirihana.
Lundi ekhumaliilikha amusaalila basoleeli babaandi babili: Siaafu ne Shefa. Siaafu aaba raraawe owa Madimana. Ne Shefa naye aaba raraawe owa Makibena ne Kibea khutasa khwaabo Kalebu aba asaala omukhaana lisina bali Akisa.
Bano nibo be nju eya Kalebu: Kalebu ne omukhasi wewe Efurati basaala omusoleeli bali Huri. Huri asaala Siobali, Salima ne Harefu. Siobali aaba raraawe owa Kiriati-Yearimu,
omusoleeli wewe Salima aaba raraawe owa Betelehemu ne omusoleeli wewe Harefu aaba raraawe owa Beti-kateri.
Siobali aaba ne babaana babaandi khukhwama mu baana bano liamamo lisaaye lie Baharoe, balala khu ba Menuhoti.
Ne be luuya ba baamenya mu Kiriati-Yearimu baba bano: Baitiri, Baputi, Basiumati ne Bamisirai khukhwama mu bano bamamo Basorati ne Baesitaoli.
Lisaaye lia Salima liabamo: ba Betelehemu, Banetofati, Bafuroti-beti-Yoabu, ne balala khu Banahati ne Basori,
Be chinju che baandiki, bamenyanga mu Yabesi baba: Batirati, Bashimeati ne Basukati. Bano baba bakenayi babama e Hama, paapa owe be nju eya Rekabu.

Bano bali babaana nibo Daudi asaalila mu Heburoni khuloondekhana ne bukhulu bwabwe:
Omubele Amunoni, maawe aba Ahinoamu khukhwama Yesireeli. Owe khabili aba Danieli, ne maawe aba Abikaili khukhwama Karimeli.
Owe khataru aba Abusolomu, maawe aba Maaka. Maaka aba omukhaana owa Talimai, Talimai aba omwami owa Keshuri. Owe khane Adomiya, maawe aba Hakiti.
Owa kharaano aba Shefatia, ne maawe aba Abitanda. Owa sita aba Itireamu, maayi aba Egila.
Boosi sita basaalwa mu Heburoni mu siise sie kimiiko saba ne kimieesi sita nikio Daudi amiilayo.
Ne mu Yerusalemu, amiia ne alimo khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kitaru.
Babaana ba basaalwa mu Yerusalemu no mukhasi wewe Batisheba, omukhaana owa Amieli baba: Simea, Siobabu, Nasani ne Solomoni.
Daudi asaala babaana basoleeli babaandi tisa: Ibuhari, Elisiama, ne Elifeleti.
Noka, Nefeki, ne Yafia.
Elisiama, Eliata, ne Elifeleti.
Khutasa khu basoleeli bano boosi Daudi asaala babaana basoleeli mu bakhasi bewe nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale. Daudi lundi asaala omwana omukhaana lisina bali Tamari.
Lino lili lisaaye lio mwami Solomoni, Solomoni aaba raraawe owa Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu aaba raraawe owa Abicha, Abicha aaba raraawe owa Asa, Asa aaba raraawe owa Yehoshafati. Ne Yehoshafati aaba raraawe owa
Yoramu, Yoramu aaba raraawe owa Ahasia, Ahasia aaba raraawe owa Yoashi,
Yoashi aaba raraawe owa Amasia, Amasia aaba raraawe owa Asaria, Asaria aaba raraawe owa Yosamu.
Yosamu aaba raraawe owa Ahasi, Ahasi aaba raraawe owa Hesekia, Hesekia aaba raraawe owa Manase.
Manase aaba raraawe owa Amoni ne Amoni aaba raraawe owa Yosia.
Yosia asaala babaana basoleeli bane: Yoanani, Yehoyakimu, Sedekia ne Yoahasi.
Yehoyakimu asaala babaana basoleeli babili: Yekoniya ne Sedekia.
Yekoniya atiilwa mu mbaambe. Abano nibo be lisaaye lia Yekoniya. Yekoniya asaala babaana basoleeli saba: Shealitieli,
Malikiramu, Petaya, Shenasari, Yekamia, Hosiama, ne Netabia.
Petaya asaala babaana basoleeli babili, Serubabeli ne Simei. Serubabeli aba paapa owe babaana basoleeli babili, Meshulamu ne Hanania no mukhaana mulala bali Shelomiti.
Serubabeli lundi asaala babaana basoleeli babaandi: Hashuba, Oheli, Berekia, Hasadia ne Yushabu-Hesedi.
Hanania asaala babaana babili: Pelatia ne Yeshaia. Yeshaia aaba raraawe owa Refaya. Refaya aaba raraawe owa Arinani. Arinani asaala Obadia, Obadia asaala Shekania.
Shekania asaala omwana omusoleeli mulala bali Shemaya ne Shemaya aba ne babaana baraano: Hatushi, Igali, Baria, Nearia ne Shafati.
Ba okhwa Nearia baba bataru: Elioenai, Hisikia ne Asirikamu.
Elioenai asaala basoleeli saba: Hodabia, Eliashibu, Pelaia, Akubu, Yoanani, Telaia ne Anani.

Abano nibo be nju eya Yuda: Peresi, Hesironi, Karimi, Huri, ne Siobali.
Siobali aaba raraawe owa Reaya. Reaya aaba raraawe owa Yahati, Yahati aaba raraawe owa Ahumai ne Lahadi. Abo nibo ba baba bakuuka be babaandu ba Sora.
Bano baba basoleeli ba Etamu: Yesireeli, Ishuma ne Itibashi. Lisina lio mukooko wabwe liaba Haseleliponi.
Penueli aaba raraawe owa Ketori, ne Eseri aaba raraawe owa Hushashi. Bano baba ba okhwa Huri omubele owa Efurati raraawe owa Betelehemu.
Ashihuri, raraawe owa Tekoa aba ne bakhasi babili, Hela ne Naara.
Naara amusaalila basoleeli bane: Ahusamu Heferi, Temeni ne Haahashitari.
Hela asaala basoleeli bataru: Sereti, Isihari ne Etinani.
Kosi aaba raraawe owa Anubu ne Sobeba, lundi aba kuuka owe lisaaye lia Ahariheli aba okhwa Harumi.
Abao omundu lisina bali Yabesi
Nio Yabesi asaba Wele owa Isiraeli ne aloma ali, “Wele mbiite chikhabi mala obalaayie lulwakha lwase. Ba alala ne nase uniinde khanyoolekhana ne butinyu bwe khuchunisibwa tawe.” Nio Wele amuelesia nisio asaba.
Kelabu wandaaye owa Shuha aba ne omusoleeli bali Mehiri. Ne Mehiri aaba raraawe owa Eshitoni.
Eshitoni asaala basoleeli bataru: Beti-rafa, Pasea ne Tehina. Tehina aaba raraawe owa Iri Nahashi. Be lisaaye lie babaandu bano bamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Reka.
Kenasi asaala basoleeli babili, Otinieli ne Seraya. Otinieli yesi asaala basoleeli babili, Hatati ne Meonotai.
Meonotai aaba raraawe owa Ofira.
Seraya aaba raraawe owa Yoabu. Yoabu aaba raraawe owa Keharashimu. Be lisaaye lia Keharashimu balaangwa Bakeharashimu sikila baba bamanya kimilimo bulayi.
Kalebu okhwa Yefune aaba ne babaana basoleeli bataru: Iru, Ela ne Naamu. Ne Ela aaba raraawe owa Kenasi.
Yehaleleli aba ne basoleeli bane: Sifu, Sifa, Tiria, ne Asareli.
Esira aba ne basoleeli bane: Yeteri, Mereti, Eferi ne Yaloni. Meredi akhwa Bitia, omukhaana owa Farao aba omukhasi wewe, mala basaala omukhaana bali Miriamu ne basoleeli babili: Shamai ne Ishiba. Ishiba aaba raraawe owa Eshitemoa.
Meredi lundi akhwa omukhasi khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda mala basaala basoleeli bataru: Yereti raraawe owa Ketori, Heberi raraawe owa Soko, ne Yekutieli raraawe owa Sonoa.
Hodia akhwa omukhaana owa Nahamu. Be lisaaye liabwe nibo babarakikha luuya lwa Keila Omukarimi luuya lwa Eshitemoa Omumaaka.
Shimoni aba ne basoleeli bane: Amunoni, Rina, Benihanani ne Tiloni Ishi aba ne basoleeli babili: Soheti ne Benisoeti.
Shela aba omusoleeli owa Yuda. Be lisaaye liewe baba Eri, raraawe owa Leka. Laada raraawe owa Maresha, nende be chinju chichanabanga chingubo cha katani, babamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Beti-ashibea,
Yokimu ne babaandu ba Koseba ne Yoashi ne Sarafu babaamiia Moabu mala bakobola bamenya mu Betelehemu. (Kamaandike kano kali ke khaale lukali)
Baba babuumbi bo mwami mala bamenyanga mu ngoba cha Netaimu ne Ketera.
Simioni aaba ne babaana bewe basoleeli baraano: Nemueli, Yamini, Yaribu, Sera, ne Shauli.
Okhwa Saulo aaba Sialumu. Ne Sialumu asaala Mibusamu, ne Mibusamu asaala Mishima.
Omwana owa Mishima aba Hamueli. Hamueli naye asaala Sakuri, ne Sakuri asaala Simei.
Simei asaala basoleeli ekhumi ne sita ne bakhaana sita. Bawandaaye basoleeli se baba ne babaana bakali tawe. Khwako enju yabwe se yabalaa nga chinju chichiindi mu Yuda tawe.
Biliha, Esemu, ne Tolati,
Betueli, Horima, Sikilaki,
Beti-marikaboti, Hasarisusimu, Betibiri ne Siaraimu. Chingoba chino chaba che babaandu bano khukhwola nga Daudi ne amiia.
Yakhaba lundi bamenyanga mu birekere bibiindi biraano Etamu, Aini, Rimoni, Tokeni ne Ashani
ne birekere biao bibiabotookhelesia chingoba khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Baali. Ako niko kakaba kamaloba kabwe. Ne babiikha kamaandike ke sikuuka siabwe.
Abano bosi baba be lisaaye lia Simioni: Mesobabu, Yamuleki, ne Yosha okhwa Amasia.
Yoeli, Yehu okhwa Yosibia, Yosibia okhwa Seraya, ne Seraya okhwa Asieli.
Elioenai, Yaakoba, Yeshohaya, Asaya, Adieli, Yesimieli, ne Banaiya.
Sisa okhwa Sifi, Sifi okhwa Aloni. Aloni okhwa Yetaya okhwa Simuri, ne Simuri okhwa Shemaya.
Babaandu bano baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe mala lisaaye liabwe liachiililila khukucha lukali.
Bacha boola asilibwa sie lukoba lwa Ketori
Banyoola kamayilwe kamalayi lundi kamakali. Sibala siaba sibalaayi lundi sie kumuleembe. Babaandu babamenyangayo khale baba Bahamu.
Mu ndaalo cho mwami Hesekia owa Yuda babaandu babalilwe angaaki ao bacha mala bonaka kamaeema ke Bahamu. Lundi babunia Bameuni. Babunisilia elala Bahamu ne Bameuni mala nibo bamenyayo. Bamenyayo sikila bunyaasi bwabayo bulayi khulwe bibiaayo biabwe.
Babaandu babaandi chimia chiraano be kholo eya Simioni bacha lubeka lwe bukwe owa Edomu. Barangirirwa ne ba okhwa Ishi: Pelatia, Nearia, Refaya ne Usieli.
Beerayo Baamaleki ba baaba ne barama mala khu bamenyayo khukhwola luno.

Akhaba ekholo eya Yuda ne yaba ne kamaani mu kholo cha Isiraeli chichiindi mala omwami amamo, ekholo eya Yosefu niyo eyaebwa kumukabwa kwe bubele.
Rubeni omubele aaba ne basoleeli bane: Hanoki, Palu, Hesi ne Karimi.
Lino nilio lisaaye lia Yoeli: Shemaya aba okhwa Yoeli, Koku aaba okhwa Shemaya, ne Simei aaba okhwa Koku.
Mika aaba okhwa Simei, Reaya aba okhwa Mika, ne Baali aba okhwa Reaya.
Beera aba omwimeelesi owe luuya lwe Barubeni. Tikilati-pilineseri omwami owa Ashuru aamba Beera amuyila mu mbaambe.
Kamasina ke bawandaaye ba Yoeli kaandikwa mu ngano che chinju chabwe. Kamasina niko kano: Yeieli aba owe khunyoa, Sakaria,
Bela okhwa Asasi ne Asasi omwana owa Shema. Ne Shema omwana owa Yoeli. Ekholo yino yamenyanga mu Aroeri khukhwola Nebo ne Baali-meoni.
Lundi bamenyanga ebukwe khukhwola khu siangalaamwe siili embi ne luluuchi lwa Efurati. Bamenya bario sikila chikhaafu chabwe chaba chingali mu sibala sia Kileati.
Mu ndaalo cho mwami Saulo, ekholo eya Rubeni yebwaakala Bahachiri yabeerera mwiie mala yengisia sibala siabwe lubeka lwoosi lwe bukwe owa Kileati.
Babaana ba Kati bamenyanga embi ne Rubeni mu sibala sia Bashani khukhwola Saleka.
Yoeli niye owaba omurangilisi ne Siafamu owe khabili. Yanai ne Siafati baba babemeelesi mu Bashani.
Ne balebe babwe babaandi baba chinju saba chino: Mikaeli, Meshulamu, Sheba, Yorayi, Yakani, Sia ne Eberi.
Baba lisaaye lia Abikaili. Abikaili aba okhwa Huri, Huri aba okhwa Yaroa, Yaroa aba okhwa Kileati, Kileati aba okhwa Mikaili, Mikaili aba okhwa Yesisayi, Yesisayi aba okhwa Yahito, ne Yahito aba okhwa Busi.
Ahi aba okhwa Abutieli, Abutieli aba okhwa Kuni. Ahi aba omwimeelesi owe chinju chabwe.
Bamenyanga mu sibala sia Bashani ne Kileati, mu ngoba ebweeneyo ne khu sibala sie kamayilwe sioosi sia Siaroni khukhwola khu njakha chasio.
Kamasina kano kaandikwa mu ndaalo cho mwami Yosamu owa Yuda nende cho mwami Yeroboamu owa Isiraeli.
Mu kholo cha Rubeni, Kati ne balala khu kholo eya Manase babayo banamae chielefu kamakhumi kane ne chielefu chine ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi sita, babekisibwa khurumikhira chingabo, chimbalu ne buyiingo lundi baba berekekha khu milimo.
Bebwaakala chikholo che Bahachiri Bayeturi, Banafishi ne Banodabu.
Basaba Wele mala bamureeba abayeete. Ne Wele akobosia lisaba liabwe mala abakhola baula bahachiri nende babaambana ne nabo.
Baula basiku babwe, chingamia chielefu kamakhumi karaano, kamakheese chielefu chimia chibili ne chielefu kamakhumi karaano ne chipunda chielefu chibili, baamba baboe be mwiie chielefu emia ndala.
Beera basiku bakali, sikila Wele niye owabapanila. Nio bachiililila khumenya mu sibala esio khukhwola khu siise sie mbaambe eye Bababiloni.
Babaandu balala khu kholo eya Manase bamenya mu sibala sia Bashani. Bamenya khukhwola Baali-Herimoni, Seniri ne e sikulu sia Herimoni mala bakucha baba bakali lukali.
Bano baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe: Eferi, Ishi, Elieli, Asirieli, Yeremia, Hotabia ne Yahitieli. Boosi baba banamae be kamaani babamanyikha nga babemeelesi be chinju chabwe.
Ne babaandu baba barengu khu Wele we bakuka babwe bamwanjukha. Ne barakikha khusaaya bawele be chikholo nicho Wele aba ne abunia ebweeni wabwe.
Nio Wele akhola Puli omwami owe Bashamu, no mwami Tikilati-pilineseri owe Bashamu, enya khucha mwiie. Puli abukula chikholo cha Rubeni, Kati, ne balala khu be kholo eya Manase mala abengisia mu Hala, Habori, ne Hara ne khu luuchi lwa Kosani khukhwola luno.

Lawi aba ne babaana basoleeli bataru: Kerishomu, Kohati ne Merari.
Kohati naye aba ne basoleeli bane: Amuramu, Isihari, Heburoni ne Usieli.
Amuramu asaala basoleeli babili, Aruni ne Musa ne omukhaana mulala bali Miriamu.
Aruni asaala basoleeli bane: Natabu, Abihu, Eliesa ne Itamari.
Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Fineasi: Fineasi aaba raraawe owa Abishua.
Abishua aaba raraawe owa Buki aaba raraawe owa Usi.
Ne Usia aaba raraawe owa Seraya, ne Seraya aaba raraawe owa Meraioti.
Meraioti aaba raraawe owa Amariya, ne Amariya aaba raraawe owa Ahitubu.
Ahitubu raraawe owa Satoki, ne Satoki aaba raraawe owa Ahimasi.
Ahimasi aaba raraawe owa Asaria, ne Asaria aaba raraawe owa Yoanani,
Yoanani aaba raraawe owa Asaria (niye owakholanga mu Lukaangu nilwo Omwami Solomoni ombakha mu Yerusalemu)
Asaria aaba raraawe owa Amaria, ne Amaria aaba raraawe owa Ahitubu.
Ahitubu aaba raraawe owa Satoki ne Satoki aaba raraawe owa Shalumu.
Shalumu aaba raraawe owa Hilikia ne Hilikia aaba raraawe owa Asaria,
Asaria aaba raraawe owa Seraya, ne Seraya aaba raraawe owa Yehosataki.
Omwami Nebukadinesa auya Yehosataki alala ne babaandu babaandi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu abayila mu mbaambe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owakhola kano khubirira khu Nebukadinesa.
Kerishomu aaba raraawe owa Libuni ne Simei.
Babaana ba Kohati baba Amuramu, Isihari, Heburoni, ne Usieli.
Ne babaana ba Merari baba Mahili ne Mushi. Chino chili chinju che Balawi khuloondekhana ne bakuuka babwe.
Kerishomu aaba raraawe owa Libuni, Libuni aaba raraawe owa Yahati ne Yohati aaba raraawe owa Sima. Sima aaba raraawe owa Yoa.
Yoa aaba raraawe owa Ito, Ito aaba raraawe owa Sera, Sera aaba raraawe owa Yeaterai.
Kohati aaba raraawe owa Aminatabu, Aminatabu aaba raraawe owa Kora, Kora aaba raraawe owa Asiri,
Asiri aaba raraawe owa Elikana Ebiasafu aaba okhwa Elikana. Asiri aaba okhwa Ebiasafu.
Asiri aaba raraawe owa Tahati, Tahati aaba raraawe owa Urieli, Urieli aaba raraawe owa Usia, Usia aaba raraawe owa Shauli.
Elikana asaala basoleeli babili, Amasai ne Ahimoti.
Ahimoti aaba raraawe owa Elikana, Sofai raraawe owa Nahati.
Eliabu aaba okhwa Nahati, Yerohamu aaba okhwa Eliabu, Elikana aaba okhwa Yerohamu.
Samweli asaala basoleeli babili: Yoeli omubele ne Abicha omuro.
Babaana ba Merari baba Mahili ne Libuni. Libuna aaba raraawe owa Simei, Simei aaba raraawe owa Usa, Usa aaba raraawe owa
Simea. Simea aaba raraawe owa Hakia. Hakia aaba raraawe owa Asaya.
Bano nibo omwami Daudi ara mu bwimeelesi bwe kimienya munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enyuma we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano khuyilwamo.
Nibo babembanga busiele mwieema lie kumuse khukhwola nga omwami Solomoni ne ombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu.
Bano nibo ba baaba babembi ne babaana babwe: Be luuya lwa Kohati aba Hemani okhwa Yoeli, Yoeli okhwa Samweli, Samweli okhwa Elikana,
Elikana okhwa Yerohamu, Yerohamu okhwa Elieli, ne Elieli okhwa Toa.
Toa okhwa Sufu, Elikana okhwa Mahati, Mahati okhwa Amasai.
Amasai okhwa Elikana, Elikana okhwa Yoeli, Yoeli okhwa Asaria, Asaria okhwa Sefania.
Sefania okhwa Tahati, Tahati okhwa Asiri, Asiri okhwa Ebiasafu, Ebiasafu okhwa Kora,
Kora okhwa Isihari, Isihari okhwa Kohati, okhwa Lawi ne Lawi okhwa Yakobo.
Asafu aba omuyeeti owa Hemani owemanga kumukhono kumuseecha. Asafu aba okhwa Berekia, Berekia aba okhwa Simea,
Simea aba okhwa Mikaili, Mikaili aba okhwa Baaseya, Baaseya aba okhwa Malichiya,
Malichiya aba okhwa Etini, Etini aaba okhwa Sera, Sera aaba okhwa Ataya,
Adaia aba okhwa Etani, Etani aba okhwa Sima, Sima aaba okhwa Simei,
Simei aba okhwa Yahati, Yahati aaba okhwa Kerishomu ne Kerishomu aba okhwa Lawi.
Ne babemanga kumukhono kumukhasi baba be lisaaye lia Merari mala baba bano: Etani okhwa Kishi, Kishi okhwa Abudi, Abudi okhwa Maluki,
Maluki okhwa Hashabia, Hashabia okhwa Amasia, Amasia okhwa Hilikia,
Hilikia okhwa Amusia, Amusia okhwa Bani, Bani okhwa Shemeri,
Shemeri okhwa Mahili, Mahili okhwa Mushi, Mushi okhwa Merari, Merari okhwa Lawi.
Bawandaayabwe baroborwa khukhola kimilimo kioosi kie mu liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aruni nende be lisaaye liewe baananga biianwa khu alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia ne khu alutare eye bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Baananga biianwa khu milimo kioosi kie Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali ne khu sabila Baisiraeli babelwe bumayaanu bwabwe. Bakholanga bario khuloondekhana nende koosi niko Musa omukholi owa Wele alaka.
Lino liliaba lisaaye lia Aruni: Aruni aaba raraawe owa Eliesa, Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Fineasi, Fineasi aaba raraawe owa Abishua,
Abishua aaba raraawe owa Buki, Buki aaba raraawe owa Usi, Usi aaba raraawe owa Seraya,
Seraya aaba raraawe owa Meraioti, Meraioti aaba raraawe owa Amaria, Amaria aaba raraawe owa Ahitubu,
Ahitubu aaba raraawe owa Satoki, Satoki aaba raraawe owa Ahimasi.
Kano kali kamaloba niko lisaaye lie Balawi liamenyamo. Lisaaye liewe lie luuya lwa Kohati liaebwa sitonyi sie khunyoa sie kamaloba.
Balielesia lukoba lwa Heburoni mu Yuda ne kamayilwe kakalubotookhelela.
Ne kakhali chisambu ne birekere bie lukoba biaelesibwa Kalebu okhwa Yefune.
Be lisaaye lia Aruni baelesibwa chingoba che khumulilamo: Heburoni ne Libuna, Yatiri ne Esitemoa.
Hileni ne Tebiri.
Ashani ne Beti-shemesi. Babaelesia chingoba chino alala ne kamayilwe kacho.
Lundi be lisaaye lia Aruni baelesibwa chingoba ne kamayilwe ke ekholo eya Benjamini. Baelesibwa chingoba cha Keba, Alemeti ne Anatoti alala ne kamayilwe kacho. Chingoba choosi nicho be chinju chabwe bamenyangamo chaba ekhumi na chitaru.
Be luuya lwa Kohati babarama baelesibwa chingoba ekhumi mu sibala sie balala khu kholo eya Manase, khulwe khu khuupa ekura.
Chinju che luuya lwa Kerishomu chanyoola chingoba ekhumi na chitaru khukhwama mu kholo cha Isakari, Asieri, Nafutali, ne sia Manase mu Bashani. Bakerishomu baebwa chingoba khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe.
Luya lwa Merari lwanyoola chingoba ekhumi na chibili khukhwama mu kholo cha Rubeni, Kati ne Sebuluni. Chosi chaebwa chingoba chino khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli baelesia Balawi chingoba che khumenyamo, alala ne kamayilwe kabwe.
Lundi babaelesia chingoba mu kholo cha Yuda, Simioni ne Benjamini, khulwe khu khuupa ekura.
Be chinju chindala khu baana ba Kohati baelesibwa chingoba mu sibala sie ekholo eya Efuraimu.
Baelesibwa chingoba che khumulilamo chichaba cha Shekemu lukoba lulwaba mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu, Keseri,
Yokimeamu, Beti-horoni,
Aiyaloni ne Kati-Rimoni ne kamayilwe kacho.
Lundi Bakohati baelesibwa chingoba che balala khu kholo eya Manase. Chingoba chino chaba Aneri ne Bileamu alala ne kamayilwe kacho.
Be nju eya Kerishomu baelesibwa chingoba che balala khu kholo eya Manase chichaba Kolani mu Bashani ne Ashitoreti alala ne kamayilwe kacho.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Isakari enju eya Kerishomu yaelesibwa: Keteshi Daberati,
Ramoti ne Anemu ne kamayilwe kacho.
Mu kholo eya Asieri baelesibwa Mashali, Abutoni.
Hukoki ne Rehobu ne kamayilwe kacho.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Nafutali baelesibwa: Kadeshi eye mu Kalilaya, Hamoni ne Kiriataimu ne kamayilwe kacho.
Be chinju cha Merari babarama baelesibwa chingoba che ekholo eya Sebuluni chichaba Rimono, Tabori,
engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, e Yeriko chaba ne elubeka lwe ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani. Banyoola chingoba chino ne kamayilwe kacho. Ne khukhwama mu kholo eya Rubeni banyoola chingoba cha Beseri ne Yahisa,
Ketemoti ne Mefati alala ne kamayilwe kacho.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Kati baelesibwa chingoba cha Ramoti mu Kileati, Mahanaimu,
Heshiboni ne Yaseri alala ne kamayilwe kacho.

Isakari aba ne basoleeli bane: Dola, Pua, Yashubu ne Simuroni.
Ne Dola aaba ne basoleeli sita: Usi, Rafaya, Yerieli, Yahimayi, Ibusamu ne Shemweli. Bano baba babemeelesi be chinju che babaandu be luuya lwa Dola mala baba banamae be kamaani. Mu ndaalo cho mwami Daudi lisaaye liabwe liaba ne babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chibili ne chimia sita.
Usi asaala omusoleeli mulala bali Isirahiya. Isirahiya aaba ne basoleeli baraano, ne bane khu baraano bano baba: Mikaili, Obadia, Yoeli ne Isihia. Baraano bano Boosi baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe.
Babeya bakhasi bakali, basaala babaana bakali lisaaye liabwe liarusia banamae chielefu kamakhumi kataru ne chielefu sita.
Balebe be kholo eya Isakari baba banamae be kamaani chielefu kamakhumi munaane ne saba babaandikwa khuloondekhana ne sikuuka siabwe.
Benjamini asaala basoleeli bataru: Bela, Bekeri ne Yetiaeli.
Bela asaala basoleeli baraano: Esiboni, Usi, Usieli, Yeremoti ne Iri. Baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe. Boosi baba banamae be kamaani. Baba banamae chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chibili ne kamakhumi kataru na chine. Babaandikwa khuloondekhana ne sikuuka siabwe.
Bekeri asaala basoleeli tisa: Semira, Yoashi, Elieseri, Elioenai, Omuri, Yeremoti, Abicha, Anatoti ne Alemeti.
Mu bitabu bie lisaaye liabwe khuloondakhana ne chinju chabwe baandika babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chimia chibili. Baba banamae be kamaani.
Yetiaeli asaala omusoleeli Bilihani yeng'ene. Ne Bilihani naye asaala basoleeli saba: Yeushi, Benjamini, Ehudi, Kenaana, Setani, Tarishishi ne Ahishahari.
Bano boosi baba ba okhwa Yetiaeli lundi baba babemeelesi be chinju mu luuya lwabwe. Boosi baba banamae be kamaani. Baba boosi alala babaandu chielefu ekhumi na saba ne chimia chibili berekekha khu milimo kie liie.
Bashupimu ne Bahupimu baba be lisaaye lia Iri. Ne Bahushimu baba be lisaaye lia Aheri.
Nafutali asaala basoleeli bane: Yahisieli, Kuni, Yeseri ne Shalumu. Bano baba be lisaaye lia Biliha
Arameani omukhasi niye bamenyia busa nga omusaale asaalila Manase basoleeli babili: Asirieli ne Makiri. Makiri aaba raraawe owa Kileati.
Makiri akhwa omukhasi owaba wandaaye owa Hupimu ne Shupimu. Omukooko owa Makiri aba bali Maaka. Omusoleeli owa khabili owa Makiri aba bali Selofehadi. Selofehadi asaala babaana bakhaana bong'ene.
Maaka, mukha Makiri asaala basoleeli babili nibo batiuukha bali Peresi ne Shereshi. Shereshi asaala basoleeli babili: Ulamu ne Rakemu.
Ulamu asaala omusoleeli bali Betani. Bano boosi bali be lisaaye lia Kileati okhwa Makiri. Makiri, aba okhwa Manase.
Hamoleketi omukooko owa Makiri asaala basoleeli bataru: Isihodi, Abieseri ne Mahila.
Shemita asaala basoleeli bane: Ahiani, Shekemu, Likhi ne Aniyamu.
Efuraimu aaba raraawe owa Shutela. Shutela aaba raraawe owa Bereti, Bereti aaba raraawe owa Tahati, Tahati aaba raraawe owa Eleata, Eleata aaba raraawe owa Tahati.
Tahati aaba raraawe owa Sabati, Sabati aaba raraawe owa Shutela. Efuraimu asaala basoleeli babaandi babili Eseri ne Eleati babeerwa nga baba ne balikho bakhaka khukhwiba chikhaafu che babaandu be mu sibala sia Katihi.
Efuraimu paapa wabwe abalila khulwe chindaalo chingali, mala bawandaaye becha bamuoleelesia.
Lundi Efuraimu aaba ne omukhasi wewe mala asaala omwana omusoleeli. Bamutiuukha bali Beria
Efuraimu aaba no omukhaana bali Sheera. Sheera ombakha chingoba cha Beti-horoni lwe ngaaki ne lwe mwaalo ne Useni-Sieera.
Efuraimu asaala omusoleeli bali Refa. Refa asaala Resiefu. Resiefu aaba raraawe owa Tela. Tela aaba raraawe owa Tahani.
Tahani aaba raraawe owa Latani, Latani aaba paapa owa Amihudi, Amihudi aaba raraawe owa Elisiama.
Elisiama aaba raraawe owa Nuni, Nuni aaba raraawe owa Yoshua.
Kamaloba ne bumenyo bwabwe bwaba Beteli ne chingoba chichasibotookhelela Naarani ebukwe ne Keseri mumbo, ne chingoba chichasibotookhelela. Shekemu ne Aya ne chingoba chacho.
Khunjakha che kamaloba ka Manase chabaakho chingoba cha Beti-sheani, Taanachi, Mekido, ne Tori ne birekere bibiaba siimbi.
Ano niio lisaaye lia Yosefu okhwa Yakobo liamenyanga.
Babaana ba Asieri baba basoleeli bane: Imuna, Ishiba, Ishibi ne Beria. Ne asaala omukhaana mulala yeng'ene niye balaanga bali Sera.
Beria asaala basoleeli babili: Heberi ne Malikieli. Malikieli asaala Birisaiti.
Heberi asaala basoleeli bataru: Yafuleti, Shomeri ne Hotamu ne asaala omukhaana mulala bali Siua.
Yafuleti yesi asaala basoleeli bataru: Pasaki, Bimuali ne Asibati.
Siomeri wandaaye owa Yafuleti asaala basoleeli bataru: Roika, Yehuba ne Aramu.
Wandaaye Helemi asaala basoleeli bane: Sofari, Imuna, Shelesi ne Amali.
Babaana ba Sofari baba Sua, Harineferi, Shuali, Beri, Imura,
Lundi ne Beseri Hoti, Shama, Silisha, Itirani, Beera.
Babaana ba Yeteri baba Yefune, Pisipa ne Ara.
Babaana ba Ula baba Ara, Hanieli ne Risia.
Bano boosi baba be lisaaye lia Asheri. Baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe. Baba banamae be kamaani lundi babemeelesi babamanyikhana. Be sikuuka sia Asheri boosi alala sitube baba banamae chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne sita babolaana kimilimo kie liie.

Benjamini asaala basoleeli baraano: Omubele aba Bela, oloondakho Asibeli, nio Ahara,
Noha ne Rafa.
Babaana ba Bela baba Atari, Kera, Abihudi,
Abishua, Naamani, Ahoa,
Kera, Shefufani ne Huramu.
Bakukha khu Ehudi, (baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe babamenyanga Keba. Ne bayilwa mu mbaambe e Manahati).
Baba Naamani, Ahiya ne Kera. Kera owalaangwanga lundi bali Hekilamu aaba raraawe owa Usa ne Ahihudi.
Siaaraimu aaba ne babaana mu sibala sia Moabu. Ebweeneyo aoona bakhasi bewe babili, Hushimu ne Baara.
Ne omukhasi wewe Hoteshi amusaalila basoleeli saba: Yobabu, Sibia, Mesha, Malikamu,
Yeushi, Sakia, ne Mirima. Abano nibo basoleeli bewe ba baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe.
Lundi asaala basoleeli babili ne omukhasi wewe Hushimu: Abitubu ne Elipaali.
Elipaali asaala basoleeli bataru: Eberi, Mishamu ne Shemeti. Shemeti niye owombakha chingoba cha Ono ne Loti ne birekere bibiachibotookhelesia.
Beria ne Shema baba babemeelesi be babaandu babengisia mu lukoba lwa Aiyaloni mala baoona babamenyanga mu lukoba lwa Katihi baruramo.
Babaana ba Beria baba Ahio, Shashaki, Yeremoti,
Sebatia, Arati, Eteri,
Mikaili, Isipa ne Yoha.
Babaana ba Elipaali baba Sebatia, Meshulamu, Hisiki, Heberi,
Isimerai, Isilia ne Yobabu.
Babaana ba Simei baba Yakimu, Sikiri, Sabuti,
Elienai, Siletai, Elieli,
Adaia, Eraya ne Simurati.
Babaana ba Shashaki baba Isupani, Eberi, Elieli,
Abutoni, Sikiri, Hanani,
Hanania, Elamu, Andotiya,
Ifuteya ne Penueli.
Babaana ba Yerohamu baba Siamuserai, Sheharia, Atalia,
Yaareshia, Elicha ne Sikiri.
Abano nibo ba baaba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe khuloondekhana ne chiselukho chabwe. Bamenya mu Yerusalemu.
Yeyieli aba omwimeelesi owe lukoba lwa Kibeoni. Omukhasi wewe aba bali Maaka.
Babaana bewe baba Abutoni, Suri, Kishi, Baali, ne Natabu,
Ketori, Ahio, Sekeri,
ne Mikiloti raraawe owa Simea. Bano boosi bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu, siimbi ne balebe babwe.
Neri aaba raraawe owa Kishi ne Kishi aaba raraawe owa Saulo. Saulo asaala basoleeli bane: Yonasani, Malikishua, Abinatabu ne Eshibaali.
Yonasani aaba raraawe owa Meribaali, Meribaali aaba raraawe owa Mika.
Mika asaala basoleeli bane: Pitioni, Meleki, Tarea ne Ahasi.
Ahasi aaba raraawe owa Yehoata, ne Yeohata aba paapa we basoleeli bataru: Alemeti, Asimabeti, ne Simuri. Simuri aaba paapa owa Mosa,
Mosa aaba raraawe owa Binea. Binea aaba raraawe owa Rafa, Rafa aaba raraawe owa Eliesa ne Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Aseli.
Aseli asaala basoleeli sita: Asirikamu, Bokeru, Ishimaeli, Shearia, Obadia ne Hanani.
Esieki aaba wandaaye owa Aseli. Asaala basoleeli bataru: Ulamu aaba omubele, Yeushi oloondakho nio Elifeleti.
Ba okhwa Ulamu baba banamae be kamaani ne balasi be buyiingo. Baba ne babaana ne babechukhulu bakali, emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano. Bano boosi baba be kholo eya Benjamini.

Khwako babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi baandikwa khuloondekhana ne chiselukho chabwe ne kamakhuwa kano koosi kaandikwa mu sitabu sie Babaami ba Isiraeli.
Babaandu ba Yuda bayilwa mu mbaambe e Babiloni sikila se baba basuubilwa khu Wele tawe.
Babanyoa bakobola mu maloba kabwe ne mu ngoba, baba Baisiraeli, basaayi, Balawi, ne bakholi be mu Lukaangu.
Babaandu khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, Benjamini, Efuraimu ne Manase bacha bamenya mu Yerusalemu.
Baaba Utai okhwa Amihudi, Amihudi aba okhwa Omuri. Omuri aba okhwa Bani. Baba be lisaaye lia Peresi okhwa Yuda.
Babaakukha khu Shilo baaba Asaya ne babaana bewe. Asaya aba omulebe khu luya lwabwe.
Baama khu Sera, baba Yeueli ne balebe babaandi ba Sera. Baba boosi chimia sita ne kamakhumi tisa.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini Salu okhwa Meshulamu. Meshulamu aba okhwa Hotabia, Hotabia okhwa Hasenua.
Ebuneia okhwa Yerohamu, Ela okhwa Usi ne Usi okhwa Mikiri. Meshulamu okhwa Shefatia, Shefatia aba okhwa Reueli, ne Reueli okhwa Ibuniya,
ne balebe babwe khuloondekhana ne chiselukho chabwe baba babaandu chimia tisa ne kamakhumi karaano na sita. Bano boosi baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe.
Basaayi bano bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu: Yetaya, Yehoyaribu, ne Yakini,
Asaria okhwa Hilikia, Hilikia okhwa Meshulamu ne Meshulamu okhwa Satoki, Satoki okhwa Meraioti ne Meraioti okhwa Ahitubu. Ahitubu aba omwimeelesi omukhulu owe nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lundi babaayo Adaia okhwa Yerohamu, Yerohamu okhwa Pashihuri ne Pashihuri okhwa Malichiya. Maasai okhwa Atieli, ne Atieli okhwa Yasera, Yasera okhwa Meshulamu, ne Meshulamu aba okhwa Mesilemiti ne Mesilemiti okhwa Imeri.
Babao Basaayi eelefu ndala ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi sita bano baaba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe. Baba bamanya bulayi khukhola kimilimo kioosi kie mu Lukaangu.
Balawi bano bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu: Shemaya okhwa Hashubu, Hashubu okhwa Sirikamu ne Asirikamu okhwa Hasiabia owe luuya lwa Merari.
Babao babaandi nga Bakibakari, Heresi, Kolali ne Matania okhwa Mika. Mika aba omwana owa Sikiri ne Sikiri okhwa Asafu.
Babaandi baba Obadia okhwa Shemaya, ne Shemaya okhwa Kalali ne Kalali okhwa Yedutuni. Berekia okhwa Asa, ne Asa okhwa Elikana owamenyanga mu birekere bie lukoba lwa Netofa.
Baliindi be Lukaangu baba: Sialumu, Akubu, Talimoni, ne Ahimani ne balebe babwe. Sialumu aba omwimeelesi wabwe.
Bemanga alubeka we ebukwe we silibwa sio mwami khukhwola luno. Bano baba baliindi be bilibwa bie kambi eye Balawi.
Sialumu aba okhwa Kore. Ne Kore aba okhwa Ebiasafu, ne Ebiasafu aba okhwa Kora. Sialumu ne balebe bewe khukhwama mu luya lwa Kora baba baliindi be bilibwa bie Lukaangu. Bakuuka babwe boosi baliindanga silibwa sie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Fineasi okhwa Eliesa aba omwimeelesi owe baliindi be bilibwa mu biise bibiabira. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne naye.
Sakaria okhwa Meshelemia aba omuliindi owe silibwa sie liiema lie kumuse.
Boosi alala babaandu chimia chibili ne ekhumi na chibili baroborwa nga baliindi be bilibwa. Baandikwa khuloondekhana ne chiselukho mu birekere biabwe. Daudi ne omung'oosi Samweli babarobora khu milimo kiabwe sikila babeyikina.
Nibo ne babaana babwe bachiililila khuliinda bilibwa bie Lukaangu. (Lukaangu lwabukula bubweyaangu bwe liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi).
Baliindi be bilibwa baba chimbeka chine, ebukwe, mumbo, ebunaswa ne ebunafubo.
Ne balebe babwe, babamenyanga mu birekere bechangakho ne babayeeta. Buli siise nga bechanga bayeetanga baliindi khulwe chindaalo saba.
Babao baliindi bakhulu bane ba baaba Balawi. Baba ne kimilimo kie khukhwimeelela chisiro che mu Lukaangu ne khulwe khukhwimeelela bibiindu bie bukhala bie munju eya Wele.
Bamenyanga siimbi nenju eya Wele, sikila kiaba kimilimo kiabwe khuliinda ne khukhwikula bilibwa buli makhelebeende.
Balawi babaandi bakhola kimilimo kie bibiindu bie khurumikhirakho mu khusaaya. Babibalanga buli siise nisio birura ne bicha khurumikha lundi ne bikobola.
Balala baroborwa khuliinda bisala ne bibiindu bibiindi bioosi bitakatifu ne bufu, endali, kamafura, bimuli biiunya bulayi ne bing'ayisia bulayi mu biakhulia.
Ne kimilimo kie khutubasia bibiindu bing'ayisia bulayi kiaba kie basaayi.
Omulawi bali Matitia, omusoleeli omubele owa Sialumu owe luuya lwa Kora emeelelanga kimilimo kie khu khuupa kimikaati.
Lundi balala khu balebe babwe be luuya lwa Kora bemeelelanga kimilimo kie khurekekha kimikaati kimitakatifu kie mu Lukaangu buli Esabato.
Be chinju chindala che Balawi bemeelelanga kimienya mu Lukaangu. Balawi bano bamenyanga musiro chindala che mu Lukaangu. Ne se bakholanga kimilimo kikiindi kiosi kiosi tawe, sikila baba khu milimo siise sioosi.
Balawi bano baba babemeelesi be chinju chabwe khuloondekhana ne eselukho yabwe. Baba babemeelesi babamenyanga mu Yerusalemu.
Yeieli amenya mu lukoba lwa Kibeoni. Aaba omwimeelesi owe lukoba luno. Lisina lio mukhasi wewe liaba bali Maaka.
Omusoleeli wewe omubele aaba Abutoni ne basoleeli bewe babaandi baba Suri, Kishi, Baali, Neri Natabu,
Ketori, Ahio, Sakaria ne Mikiloti.
Mikiloti aaba raraawe owa Simeamu. Bano boosi bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu siimbi ne balebe babwe.
Neri aba paapa Kishi ne Kishi aaba raraawe owa Saulo. Saulo asaala basoleeli bane: Yonasani, Milikishua, Abinatabu, ne Esibaali.
Yonasani aaba raraawe owa Meribaali, ne Meribaali aaba raraawe owa Mika.
Mika asaala basoleeli bane: Pitioni Meleki, Tahirea ne Ahasi.
Ahasi aaba raraawe owa Yara, ne Yara asaala basoleeli bataru: Alemeti, Asimabeti ne Simuri, Simuri aaba raraawe owa Mosa.
Mosa aaba raraawe owa Binea, Binea aaba raraawe owa Refaya, Refaya aaba raraawe owa Eliesa ne Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Aseli.
Aseli asaala basoleeli sita: Asirikamu, Bokeru, Ishimaeli, Shearia, Obadia ne Hanani.

Nio Bafilisiti bapana liie ne Baisiraeli. Ne Baisiraeli belukha Bafilisiti mala bererwa khu sikulu sia Kiliboa.
Lundi Bafilisiti batimania Saulo ne babaana bewe mala babanyoola. Beera babaana ba Saulo: Yonasani, Abinatabu ne Malikishua.
Liie liaba lirafu khu Saulo nio omusiku amunyoola amulasa buembo mala amuumisia lukali.
Saulo aboolela omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe ali, “Choola embalu yowo mala unjire, nio Bafilisiti basiinde bano bakhecha banjinyailakho bakholela embelekeu tawe.” Ne kakhali omusuti owe bulwaani bwewe se amwiira tawe, khulwe khuria khukali. Nio Saulo abukula embalu yewe akwakho yamuuna.
Ne omusuti owe bulwaani nga abona ali Saulo afwiile, yesi abukula embalu yewe akikwakho yamuuna mala afwa ne Saulo.
Khwako Saulo afwa, niye ne basoleeli bewe bataru ne be nju yewe boosi bafwila khulala endaalo eyo.
Nga Baisiraeli boosi ba baaba mwitooma baulila bali banamae beluukhe, lundi Saulo ne basoleeli bewe bafwiile, boosi banjukha chingoba chabwe mala belukha. Nio Bafilisiti bacha bachimenyamo.
Endaalo eloondakho, nga Bafilisiti ne bacha khufuula chingubo che bafu, banyoola Saulo ne basoleeli bewe bataru balambalile khu sikulu sia Kiliboa bafwiile.
Bakhala kumurwe barusiakho, bamunuula bulwaani bwewe. Nio baruma barumwa mu sibala sia Filisiti sioosi khuboola kamakhuwa kamalayi khu bifwaani biabwe ne khu baandu babwe.
Baara bulwaani bwewe mu lukaangu lwe bawele babwe mala baanikha kumurwe kwewe mu lukaangu lwa Dakoni wele wabwe.
Nga babaandu ba Yabesi-Kileati boosi baulila koosi niko Bafilisiti baba ne bakholile khu Saulo,
babaandu banyindaafu boosi bacha babukula kumulaambo kwa Saulo nende kie basoleeli bewe mala bakiyila e Yabesi. Babasiikha ebweeneyo asi we kumukhoonge mala beyimana khulia khu ndaalo saba.
ne se ayima buyeeti khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwiira mala aelesia Daudi okhwa Chesi bubwami.

Babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi bacha khu Daudi e Heburoni mala bamuboolela bali, “Efwe khuli babaandu be lisaaye lilala ne nawe.
Mu biise bibiabira, akhaba Saulo nasili omwami wefwe, niwe owarangirira babaandu ba Isiraeli mwiie. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhuboolela ali, ‘Ewe okhabe omwaayi owe babaandu base Isiraeli lundi obe omwami wabwe.’ ”
Nio basaakhulu be Baisiraeli boosi becha khu mwami Daudi e Heburoni. Daudi akhola endakaano ne nabo e Heburoni ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bachukha khu Daudi kamafura bamwamiisia, mala aba omwami owa Isiraeli, khuloondekhana ne lomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu Samweli.
Bayebusi baboolela Daudi bali, “Se wingila muno tawe.” Kakhaba kario Daudi atiila lukoba lwa Sayuni. Lulwamanyikhana nga Lukoba lwa Daudi.
Daudi aloma ali, “Omundu oolaba we khunyoa khukhwira Omuyebusi alaba omunamae omukhulu lundi komanda.” Yoabu, okhwa Seruya, arangirira khukhwibwaakala mala aaba omunamae omukhulu.
Daudi amenya mu lukoba mala lwalaangwa bali, Lukoba lwa Daudi.
Daudi ombakha lukoba khukhwamila emiliinda acha khukhwola khwisiisi libotookhelela lukoba. Ne Yoabu ang'oona chimbeka chicharama che lukoba.
Daudi achiililila khunyoola kamaani kamakali khukhila, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae aaba naye.
Kano niko kamasina ke banamae ba Daudi babamanyikha lundi babakhola bubwami bwewe bwaba ne kamaani. Baisiraeli boosi bamuyeeta mu bwami bwewe. Banamae bano ne Baisiraeli boosi bakhola Daudi aba omwami khuloondekhana nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka Isiraeli.
Kano kali kamasina ke banamae ba Daudi be kamaani. Owe khunyoa aaba Yashobeamu owe lisaaye lia Hakimoni. Aaba omwimeelesi owe bataru owe kamaani. Apanila lifumo liewe khu baandu chimia chitaru mala abeera boosi mu bukhupani bulala bwong'ene.
Okhola khabili mu be kamaani bataru aaba Eliesa okhwa Dodo omuhohi.
Aba ne Daudi e Pasi-Damimu nga Bafilisiti ne becha khu khuupana. Kumukuunda kwe shayiri kwabayo. Baisiraeli barakikha khukhwilukha Bafilisiti.
Ne kakhali niye ne babaandu bewe eema ne chingabo akari we kumukuunda kwe shayiri mala bapana ne Bafilisiti mala babeera. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeeta bakhila lukali.
Endaalo ndala bataru khu banamae babemeelesi kamakhumi kataru abo bacha khu lwanda siimbi ne libina lia Atulamu niio Daudi aaba, siise nisio Bafilisiti baba ne bebuusiisie ne khumenya mwitooma lia Refaimu.
Mu siise esio Daudi aba mu lukoba lusire, ne sipupu sie banamae be Bafilisiti siaba mu Betelehemu.
Daudi ekoomba kameechi mala aloma ali, “Ee khaba omundu acha andayilakho kameechi ke khunywa mu sebele eli a silibwa mu Betelehemu!”
Banamae bataru be kamaani bebwaakala ekambi eye Bafilisiti, bataa kameechi mu sebele mala bakarerera Daudi. Ne Daudi se akanywa tawe ne kakhali akachukha nga sianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Aaloma ali, “Wele anjeete khanywa kameechi kano tawe! Nyala naba nga olikho onywa kamafuki ke babaandu babeanile bulamu bwabwe bano!” Nio aaloba khukanywa. Bino biaba bikholwa bie bunyindaafu nibio banamae bataru be kamaani bano bakhola.
Abisai wandaaye owa Yoabu, aba omwimeelesi owe “Banamae kamakhumi kataru be kamaani.” Apanila lifumo liewe ne babaandu chimia chitaru, abeera boosi mala aaba we fuma engali mu basie bataru.
Aba we fuma engali khukhilakho banamae kamakhumi kataru abo, mala aaba komanda wabwe. Ne kakhali se aaba owe efuma nga Bataru abo tawe.
Benaya okhwa Yohoyata khukhwama Kabuseela aba omunyindaafu. Akhola bikholwa bikali bie bunyindaafu. Eera banamae be kamaani lukali babili Bamoabu. Endaalo ndala arura mu munyiri kwe liiarara mala eera etalang'i.
Lundi eera omumisiri omuboofu lundi omuleeyi bifuba biraano. Omumisiri aba ne lifumo liboofu kumusaala kwe khuboakho biindu. Benaya aamwibwaakala ne eruungu, anuula omumisiri lifumo mala amwirira lifumo elio liliene.
Ebio nibio bikholwa nibio Benaya okhwa Yehoyata akhola. Nio Benaya anyoola efuma nga be kamaani.
Aaba owe fuma mu banamae kamakhumi kataru ne kakhali se yoola nga eya bataru abo tawe. Daudi amukhola omwimeelesi owe baliindi bewe.
Bano nibo ba baaba banamae be kamaani, Asaeli, wandaaye owa Yoabu. Elihanani okhwa Dodo khukhwama Betelehemu.
Siamoti khukhwama Haroti, Helesi khukhwama Peleti.
Ira okhwa Ikeshi khukhwama Tekoa. Ne Abieseri khukhwama Anatoti.
Sibekayi khukhwama Husha, ne Ilai khukhwama Ahohi.
Maharai khukhwama Netofa, Heleti okhwa Baana khukhwama Netofa.
Itai okhwa Ribai khukhwama Kibea mu Benjamini. Benaya khukhwama Pirationi.
Hurai khukhwama sia njichi cha Kaashi, Abieli khukhwama Ariba.
Asimabeti khukhwama Bahurumi, Eliaba khukhwama Shaaliboni.
Hashemu khukhwama Kisoni, Yonasani okhwa Siake khukhwama Harari.
Ahiamu okhwa Sakari khukhwama Harari, Elifali okhwa Uri.
Heferi khukhwama Mekera, Ahiya khukhwama Peloni.
Hesiro khukhwama Karimeli, Naarai okhwa Esibai.
Yoeli wandaaye owa Nasani, Mibuhari okhwa Hakiri.
Seleki khukhwama Amoni, Naharai khukhwama Berofai owasutilanga Yoabu okhwa Seruya bilwaani.
Ira ne Karebu khukhwama Itiri.
Uria Omuhiti, Sabati okhwa Ahilai.
Atina okhwa Shisa, omwimeelesi we kholo eya Rubeni ne sipupu siewe sie banamae kamakhumi kataru.
Hanani okhwa Maaka, Yosiafati khukhwama Mitani.
Usia khukhwama Asitera, Shama ne Yeieli ba okhwa Hotamu khukhwama Aroeri.
Yetiaeli ne Yona ba okhwa Simuri khukhwama Tisi.
Elieli khukhwama Mahaba Yeribai ne Yosiafia, ba okhwa Elinaamu. Itima khukhwama Moabu.
Elieli, Obeti ne Yaasieli khukhwama Mesoba.

Bano nibo babaandu babecha khu Daudi e Sikilaki niio aba ne ekisa khu Omwami Saulo okhwa Kishi. Baba babaandu balala be kamaani babamuyeeta mwiie.
Baba basutile buyiingo. Lundi abele banyala khulasa buembo ne khufuruusia kamabaale khusia ne kumukhono kumuluungi namwe ne kumukoota. Baba Babenjamini.
Ahieseri ne Yoashi baba babemeelesi babwe. Bombi baba ba okhwa Shema khukhwama Kibea. Yesieli ne Peleti ba okhwa Asimabeti. Beraka ne Yehu khukhwama Anatoti.
Ishimaya khukhwama Kibeoni. Aba owe kamaani lundi omwimeelesi owe banamae kamakhumi Kataru. Lundi babao Yeremia, Yahasieli, Yoanani ne Yosabati khukhwama Ketera,
Babao Elusai, Yeremoti, Bealia, Shemaria, ne Siafatia khukhwama Harufi.
Babao Elikana, Isishia, Asareli Yoeseri ne Yashobeamu owe lisaaye lia Kora.
Yoela ne Sebatia ba okhwa Yerohamu khukhwama Ketori.
Babaandu balala khukhwama mu kholo eya Kati bacha niio Daudi aba mu lukoba lusire mu sichiimi. Baba banamae be kamaani, babamanya khu khuupanila chingabo ne kamafumo. Bubweeni bwabwe bwaba oli bubweeni bwe chitalang'i. Baba be chimbilo nga kicheu mu ngulu.
Eseri aba omwimeelesi owe banamae ba Kati, Obadia owe khabili, Eliabu owe khataru.
Mishumana aba owe khane, Yeremia owe kharaano.
Atai owa sita, ne Elieli owa saba.
Yoanani aba owa munaane, Elisabati owa sita.
Yeremia owe khumi, ne Makibanai owe khumi na mulala.
Ba Kati bano baba banamae bakhulu. Omutiiti mu bwimeelesi khubano bemeelela banamae emia ndala ne omukhulu emeelela banamae eelefu ndala.
Bano nibo babambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani mu mwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko, siise nisio Luluuchi lwa Yoritani lwechulanga. Batimania abo boosi babamenyanga mu matooma, ebukwe ne mumbo mwe luluuchi.
Babaandu khukhwama mu kholo cha Benjamini ne Yuda becha mu Lukoba lusire niio Daudi aaba.
Daudi arura enje khu bakanila mala aloma ali, “Mwaaba ne mwichile nga basaale khukhunjeeta ese, mwakaanila. Ne mwaba ne mwenya khukhunjongela ese khu basiku base, nakhaba ne khakholile kamabi tawe, Wele owe bakuuka befwe akhoya amanye mala amuelesie kumunaanio.”
Nio Roho owa Wele echa khu Amasai, omwimeelesi owe banamae kamakhumi kataru, mala aloma ali,
“Efwe khuli babowo, Ee Daudi,
ne khuli ne nawe, ee mwana owa Chesi!
Kumuleembe, kumuleembe kube ne nawe,
ne kumuleembe kube khu bayeeti bowo!
Sikila Wele wowo akhuyeeta ewe.”
Nio Daudi abakaanila mala abakhola babemeelesi be banamae bewe.
Banamae balala khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase batubana ne Daudi alala nga aba ne alikho arura ne Bafilisiti khukhupana no mwami Saulo. Ne kakhali Daudi se ayeeta Bafilisiti tawe. Sikila babemeelesi be Bafilisiti bamurakho acha sikila bebaasia bali akhola ario abanjukha mala abachonganila khu Saulo owaba omwami wewe.
Nga ne ela Sikilaki, bano nibo banamae khukhwama mu kholo eya Manase ba bakobolayo ne Daudi: Atina, Yosabati, Yetiaeli, Mikaili, Yosabati, Elihu, ne Siletai. Buli mulala khu bano aba omwimeelesi owe babaandu eelefu ndala.
Bayeeta Daudi khukhupania ne sipupu sie banuuli sikila baba banamae be kamaani lundi banyindaafu. Lundi baba babemeelesi be banamae.
Embi buli ndaalo babaandu bayaakha baambananga ne Daudi khukhwola nga ne aaba ne banamae bakali. Siise sitiiti siri sipupu sie banamae bewe siaba oli sipupu sie banamae ba Wele.
Ebino nibio bipupu bie banamae babecha khu Daudi e Heburoni. Becha khukaluukhasia bubwami bwa Saulo bwile khu Daudi khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu be kholo eya Yuda baba ne chingabo ne kamafumo baba babaandu chielefu sita ne chimia munaane.
Mu kholo eya Simioni babamo banamae chielefu saba ne emia ndala. Baba babaandu be kamaani lundi banyindaafu mwiie.
Mu kholo eya Lawi baba babaandu chielefu chine ne chimia sita.
Omwimeelesi khukhwama mu lisaaye lia Aruni aaba ne babaandu chielefu chitaru ne chimia saba.
Satoki owaba ne asiili omuele lundi omunyindaafu, aaba ne babemeelesi kamakhumi kabili na babili
Mu kholo eya Benjamini babao babaandu chielefu chitaru. Khukhwola siise sino babaandu bano boosi baba basuubilwa khu nju eya Saulo.
Mu kholo eya Efuraimu baba banamae chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chimia munaane. Baba banamae banyindaafu, lundi bamanyikhana mu chinju chabwe.
Balala khu be ekholo eya Manase baba banamae chielefu ekhumi ndala ne munaane babaandu babaroborwa bache bamiisie Daudi abe omwami.
Mu kholo eya Isakari baba babemeelesi chimia chibili. Bano nibo ba baaba ne limanyilisia lie kamakhuwa kakeecha. Nibo babamanya nisio Isiraeli ekhoyeele ekhole. Ne balebe babwe boosi baba asi wabwe.
Mu kholo eya Sebuluni banamae chielefu kamakhumi karaano. Baba banamae balayi lundi banyala barumikhira buli bulwaani. Berusia khuyeeta Daudi ne kumwoyo kwoosi.
Mu kholo eya Nafutali banamae babemeelesi eelefu ndala. Baba banamae chielefu kamakhumi kataru na saba basuta bulwaani ne chingabo ne kamafumo.
Mu kholo eya Dani babamo banamae chielefu kamakhumi kabili na munaane ne chimia sita baberekekha liie.
Mu kholo eya Asieri babamo banamae chielefu kamakhumi kane ba baaba ne berekekhe khucha mwiie.
Babao banamae chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani khukhwama mu kholo cha Rubeni Kati, ne babaandi mu kholo eya Manase. Baba ne bulwaani bwoosi bwe liie.
Banamae bano boosi baba berekekhe khukhupana liie. Becha Heburoni ne babisiisie khale khukhola Daudi abe omwami owa Isiraeli. Ne lundi babaandu ba Isiraeli babaandi boosi baba ne enganakani ndala eye khukhola Daudi abe omwami.
Bamenyayo chindaalo chitaru ne Daudi, ne balia ne khunywa nisio balebe babwe babarekekhera.
Ne lundi babaandu babamenya siimbi khukhwama mu kholo che aleeyi nga Isakari, Sebuluni ne Nafutali. Bareera biakhulia, bufu, chinduli, chisabibu chinyomu, endali ne kamafura ke chiseituni, chikhaafu ne kamakheese. Basutila biakhulia bino khu punda, chingamia, chinyumbu, ne chieeyi. Bakhola kano koosi sikila liliekhoya liliabao mu Isiraeli.

Omwami Daudi areebana ne babemeelesi bakhulu be banamae bewe boosi be bipupu bie babaandu eelefu ndala ne bie banamae emia ndala boosi.
Ne Daudi alaanga babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi alala mala aloma ali, “Ne mwibaasia muli lili lilayi, lundi lisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, lekha khurume likhuwa. Lekha khuboolele Baisiraeli basiefwe baali mu sibala sioosi sie Baisiraeli, basaayi, ne Balawi bamenyile ne nabo mu chingoba chabwe ne mumayilwe kabwe, mala khubaboolele beche bebuusie ano nafwe.
Ne khukholile khurio, khuche khureere lundi Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele niyo khwalekelesia nga Saulo aba ne ali omwami.”
Libuusiana lie babaandu liafukiilila khukhola lirio, sikila likhuwa liaba lilayi ebweeni we babaandu boosi.
Ne Daudi ne Isiraeli yoosi, bacha mu lukoba lwa Baala, nilwo Kiriati-Yearimu mu sibala sia Yuda. Babukula Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele lilaangwa khulwe lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owekhala khu ndebe eye bubwami angaaki we chikerubi.
Basuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele khukhwama munju eya Abinatabu khwikaari liiya. Usa ne Ahio nibo babatimia likaari.
Ne Daudi ne Baisiraeli boosi bakhina ne bekhoya lukali ebweeni wa Wele ne kamaani kabwe koosi. Bemba ne khu khuupa biilili, kamatuungu, chitamburini, bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, ne chikhoombi.
Nga ne bola abuundu e khuulila biakhulia owa Kitoni chieeyi chatindibala, mala Usa ayila kumukhono atiila khwi sanduku lie Ndakaano.
Ao ne nao Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Usa lirima mala amwiira sikila atiila khwisanduku. Afwila abwenao ebweeni wa Wele.
Daudi aambwa lirima lukali sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mwirima liewe eera Usa. Abuundu ao alaangwa bali Peresi-usa
Nio Daudi aria Wele lukali mala aboola ali, “Nono ese nyala nabukula ndiena Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele nacha ne nalio engo wase?”
Khwako Daudi se abukula Lisanduku acha ne nalio Yerusalemu tawe. Ne kakhali aliyila munju eya Obeti Edomu owa Katihi.
Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele liamenya munju eya Obeti Edomu kimieesi kitaru. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiita chikhabi be nju eya Obeti Edomu ne buli siindu siewe siosi.

Omwami Hiramu owa Tiro aruma barumwa khu Daudi. Amuelesia kimitarakwa ne babombakhi be kamabaale ne babeechi be kimirongooro bamwombakhile lichipi.
Ne Daudi aabona ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukholile khuba omwami owa Isiraeli. Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola bubwami bwa Daudi bwakalia. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario khulwe babaandu bewe Isiraeli.
Mu Yerusalemu, Daudi aatasa khukhwa bakhasi babaandi mala asaala babaana basoleeli babaandi ne bakhaana.
Kano niko kamasina ke babaana nibo asaalila mu Yerusalemu: Siamwa, Siobabu, Nasani, ne Solomoni,
Ibuhari, Elishua, ne Elipeleti.
Noka, Nefeki, Yafia
Elishama, Beeliata Elifeleti.
Nga Bafilisiti baulila bali Daudi achukhilwekho kamafura khuba omwami owe Baisiraeli, Bafilisiti barura boosi khucha khumuyiima. Ne nga Daudi ne aulila arura acha khukhupana ne nabo.
Bafilisiti bola mwitooma lia Refaimu mala barakikha khuyaaya kimiaandu.
Daudi areeba Wele ali, “Nyala nebwaakala Bafilisiti? Olakhola mbaule?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukalusia ali, “Yee bebwaakale! Ndakhukhola obaule!”
Nio Daudi ebwaakala Bafilisiti e Baali-perasimu mala abaula. Ne Daudi aloma ali, “Wele andumikhiile khuatula banamae bo musiku nga kumukhula kwe kamaani.” Khwako abuundu ao alaangwa bali Baali-perasimu
Bafilisiti belukha balekha bifwaani bie bawele babwe, mala Daudi arusia kamalaka babiosie.
Siise sitiiti busa lundi Bafilisiti bakobola bebwaakala mwitooma.
Lundi nga Daudi ne areeba Wele, Wele amukobosia ali, “Okhabebwaakala khukhwama ebweeni tawe, ne kakhali cha obabotookhelele mala obebwaakale khukhwama lubeka lwe kimirongooro kimiforosati.
Nga ne oulila sisiindu ne sikeenda khu ngaaki khwe kimirongooro kimiforosati, ne orakikha khukhwibwaakala. Sikila ese ndarangira ebweeni wowo mbule banamae be Bafilisiti.”
Daudi akhola nga Wele aaba ne amulakile mala atimania Bafilisiti khukhwama Kibeoni khukhwola Keseri.
Efuma eya Daudi yasalanila yola buli abuundu mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola buli ekholo yamuria.

Daudi ombakha chinju chewe mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu. Akhaba lundi arekekha abuundu we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele mala aliombakhila liiema.
Nio Daudi aloma ali, “Balawi bong'ene bakhoyela khusuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele. Sikila bali nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora khu lisuta ne khu mukholela mindali na mindali.”
Nio Daudi alaanga Baisiraeli boosi becha Yerusalemu nio bareere Lisanduku lie Ndakaano abuundu niio aba ne alirekekhele.
Siloondakho, Daudi alaanga lisaaye lia Aruni ne Balawi.
Khukhwama mu lisaaye lia Kohati amamo Urieli owemeelelanga babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili mu lisaaye liabwe.
Mu lisaaye lia Merari Asaya amamo owemeelelanga babaandu babwe chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili.
Mu lisaaye lia Kerishoni amamo Yoeli owemeelelanga babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru.
Mu be lisaaye lia Elisafani amamo Shemaya owemeelelanga babaandu chimia chibili.
Mu lisaaye lia Heburoni amamo Elieli owemeelelanga babaandu kamakhumi munaane.
Mu lisaaye lia Usieli amamo Aminatabu owemeelelanga babaandu emia ndala ne likhumi lilala ne babili.
Nio Daudi alaanga basaayi Satoki ne Abiatari ne Balawi sita: Urieli, Asaya, Yoeli, Shemaya, Elieli ne Aminatabu.
Aboolela Balawi ali, “Enywe muli babemeelesi be lisaaye lie Balawi. Yeyaula alala ne Balawi basienywe, nio mureere Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, mulire abuundu niio ese ndirekekheele.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhuelesia efwe kumunaanio sikila enywe se mwalisuta ekhunyoa tawe. Lundi se mwaliliinda mu ngila eyenyekha tawe.”
Nio basaayi ne Balawi betakaasa nio bauyisia Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Balawi basutila khu mirongooro Endakaano eya Wele khu mabeka kabwe. Bakhola bulayi bwene nga Musa ne alaka khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Daudi alaka babemeelesi be Balawi barobore Balawi basiaabwe bembe ne khukhupa kamatuungu ne biilili ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, ne kimienya kie khu khwikhoya.
Nio Balawi barobora Hemani okhwa Yoeli, ne balebe bewe, Asafu okhwa Berekia, ne Etani okhwa Kushala, owe lisaaye lia Merari.
Siabao sipupu sisiindi sie khabili sie balawi: Sakaria, Yasieli, Shemura-moti, Yehieli, Uni, Eliabu, Benaya, Maaseya, Matitia, Elifelehu ne Mikineya. Lundi barobora baliindi be silibwa, Obeditomu ne Yeieli.
Babeembi, Hemani, Asafu ne Etani bapanga bibiindu bie kumukasa bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya.
Sakaria, Asieli, Shemura-moti, Yehieli Uni, Eliabu, Maaseya ne Benaya bapanga biilili.
Ne kakhali Matitia, Elifelehu, Mikineya, Obedi-Edomu baroborwa bemeelele ne khu khuupa kamatuungu khuloondekhana ne Sheminiti.
Kenania omwimeelesi we kimienya mu Balawi aroborwa khukhwimeelela kimienya sikila aba amanya lukali.
Berekia ne Elikana, baroborwa khuliinda Lisanduku lie ndakaano.
Basaayi Shebania, Yosiafati, Natanieli, Amasai, Sakaria, Benaya ne Elieseri baroborwa barangire ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ne baapa chikhoombi.
Nio omwami Daudi, basaakhulu ba Isiraeli, ne banamae bakhulu be bipupu chielefu, bacha mungo mwa Obedi-Edomu khu bukula Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ne khoyo engali.
Sikila Wele ayeeta Balawi babasuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano, baana embosio eye chiuunwa saba ne kamamiiku saba.
Daudi aba efwarire ekutuusi eye katani emiliiu. Bakhaba Balawi ba basuta Lisanduku lie Ndakaano bosi bafwara bario. Akhaba Kanania omwimeelesi owe babembi yesi afwara ario.
Khutasa khwako Daudi afwara engubo eya efodi. Bareera endakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne luyoka lukali lwe liliekhoya, ne chikhoombi, ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, ne kimienya kie kamatuungu.
Nga Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne liaba ne lilikho lireerwa mu Lukoba lwa Daudi, Mikali omukhaana owa Saulo alengelela mu numa. Nga ne abona omwami Daudi ne alikho akhina ne ekhoya, amuleka.

Baayila Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele mwieema nilio yaba Daudi aling'oonela. Nio baana biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kumuleembe ebweeni wa Wele.
Daudi ne amalile khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kumuleembe, abiita babaandu chikhabi mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aelesia buli mundu, be siseecha nende be siikhasi, kumukaati, sitonyi sie nyama enjosie ne kimisabibu kimiomu.
Nio Daudi arobora Balawi balala bemeelele lisaaya ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baba ne kumulimo kwe khusaba, khusiima ne khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owa Isiraeli.
Asafu aaba omwimeelesi, ne Sakaria aaba omuyeeti owe kimilimo kiewe. Babaandi baba Yeieli, Shemura-moti, Yehieli, Matitia, Eliabu, Benaya, Obedi-Edomu ne Yeieli ba bapanga kamatuungu ne biilili. Asafu aba oupa bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya.
Ne Benaya ne Yahasieli, baba basaayi ba bapanga chikhoombi mu biise bioosi ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano, eya Wele.
Nio khu ndaalo eyo Daudi arobora Asafu ne balebe bewe abaa kumulimo kwe khukhwimba kumwenya kwe khusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
boolela chikholo nisio akholile!
Mwimbile, mu khumufumia,
boola bibiindu bie khuukia bioosi nibio akholile!
Sangaala, sikila muli babewe,
lekha abo boosi bamuyiima, bekhoye!
Yiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kamaani kewe,
yiima buyeeti bwewe buli busiele!
Khebulila bikholwa bie khuukia nibio akhola,
