kamaya niko aakhola, ne bukhalaki nibwo aabisia.
Ee lisaaye lia Isiraeli omukholi wewe,
baana ba Yakobo, barobore bewe!
Niye ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe,
bunyali bwewe buli khu sibala sioosi.
Alikhebulila endakaano yewe mindali na mindali,
likhuwa nilio aalaka, khulwe chiselukho choosi.
liliechuba nilio alaka Isaaka,
nga endakaano eya mindali na mindali khu Yakobo.
Aaloma ali, “Ndakhua ewe sibala sia Kanaani,
sibe kumukabwa kwowo.”
Nga baba batiiti lundi bakhali ne bukhala tawe,
baakwa mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Bayiiyayiiya busa mu sibala,
khukhwama mu bwami bulala khukhwola mu bundi,
arafwira babaami sikila nibo.
Aaloma ali, “Mukhatilakho bachukhekho kamafura base tawe,
mukhaumisiakho bang'oosi base tawe!”
Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sibala sioosi!
Boola khu buonia bwewe buli endaalo.
Boolela chikholo choosi luyali lwewe,
bikholwa bie khuukia mu baandu boosi!
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omukali,
lundi akhoya afumisibwa lukali,
akhoya ariibwa lukali khukhila bawele boosi.
Sikila bawele be chikholo boosi bali busa bifwaani,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabuumba likulu.
Ali ne lukoosi ne luyali,
kamaani ne bunyali bili mu Lukaangu lwewe.
Ee baandu, elesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
elesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luyali ne kamaani!
Elesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luyali,
khemureere siianwa, mala mwiche ebweeni wewe!
Saaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila ali omutakatifu,
reenga ebweeni wewe,
babaandu boosi be khu sibala,
sibala siema busa, se sinyala siesisiikha tawe.
Lekha likulu liikhoye,
ne sibala sisangaale,
lekha babaandu balome bali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amiia!”
Lekha enyanja eoloole alala ne bikilimo,
lekha lusaambu, ne biibiindu bilulimo bioosi biikhoye!
Nio kimirongooro kie mu sichakha kiliimba,
khulwe khukhwekhoya ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila alikho echa khukhalakila sibala.
sikila busiime bwewe buli bwa mindali na mindali!
Muboolele muli: “Khuonie Wele owe buonia bwefwe,
khubuusie alala mala okhureesie,
khukhwama mu kholo chichiindi,
nio khukhusiime ewe omutakatifu, ne khu khufumia.
Afume Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli,
afume mindali na mindali!”
Nio babaandu boosi baloma bali, “Amina” ne khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio omwami Daudi alekha Asafu ne Balawi basie ebweeni we Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bakhole kimilimo.
Daudi lundi alekhao Obeti Edomu ne Balawi babaandi kamakhumi sita na munaane. Hosa ne Obeti Edomu okhwa Yedutuni baliindi be bilibwa.
Daudi alekha Satoki omusaayi ne basaayi basie ebweeni we liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abuundu aesuta e Kibeoni.
Buli mutikhinyi ne ekolooba baananga biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi a alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia khuloondekhana ne kakaandikwa mu Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Isiraeli.
Alala ne nabo babao Hemani, ne Yedutuni ne babaandi ba baaba ne baroborwa khuba bong'ene bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sikila busiime bwewe buli bwa mindali na mindali.
Hemani ne Yedutuni baba ne chikhoombi ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, ne bibiindu bibiindi bie khukhwiimbia kimienya kimitakatifu. Babaana ba Yedutuni baroborwa khuliinda bilibwa.

Nga omwami Daudi ne engila mwichipi liewe, arumania balaange omung'oosi Nasani mala amuboolela ali, “Bona ese menyile ano munju yombakhwa ne kimirongooro kie kimitarakwa, ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liabikhwa mwieema!”
Nasani amukobosia ali, “Khola koosi kaali mu mwoyo kwowo sikila Wele ali ne nawe.”
Ne kakhali mu silo Wele aboolela Nasani ali,
“Cha mala oboolele omukholi wase Daudi oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ewe se olinjombakhila ese enju menyemo tawe.
Khukhwama mu siise nisio namusiliamo babaandu ba Isiraeli barura Misiri khukhwola luno khamenyakho mu nju tawe. Buli lwosi menyanga mu maeema ne khuuyisibwa khukhwama abuundu alala ne khuyilwa abuundu aandi.
Mu likeenda liase lioosi ne babaandu ba Isiraeli, khareebakho yesi yesi khu bemeelesi nibo narobora khuliinda baisiraeli ndi, siina sikila ne bakhanjombakhila enju eye kimitarakwa?’
“Nono boolela Daudi omukholi wase oli, kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe kamae aloma: ‘Nakhurusia mundaa mu bwayi bwe kamakheese nakhukhola obe omwami we babaandu base Isiraeli.
Nabelenge ne nawe buli abuundu osi osi niio wachilenge. Lundi nakhuulile basiku bowo boosi. Ndakhukhola obe ne fuma nga babemeelesi be bunyali khu sibala.
Nja khuroborera babaandu base Isiraeli abuundu ekhumenya, niio balimenya ne bakhaananisibwa lundi tawe. Babaandu babi se bakhanyalekho lundi nga khale tawe.
Babaandu babi se balibanaaniakho lundi nga khale khukhwama mu siise sie babemeelesi be babaandu base Isiraeli tawe. Nja khuula basiku bowo boosi khutasa khwako khuboolela ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhwombakhile ewe enju.
Nga ewe ne olifwa oche e makoombe ese ndiamiisia mulala khu basoleeli bowo abe omwami mala ndiliinda bubwami bwewe bube bwe kamaani.
Niye olinjombakhila ese enju lundi ndikhola bubwami bwewe bubeeo mindali na mindali.
Ese ndiba raraawe ne naye aliba omwana wase. Se ndimurusiakho busiime bwase nga nabukula khu owanyoao nga omwami tawe.
Ndimura mu bwimeelesi bwe enju yase ne khu bwami bwase mindali na mindali.’ ”
Nasani aboolela Daudi buli siindu nisio abona mu malola.
Nio omwami Daudi acha engila mwieema mala acha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala asaba ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Ese naanu ne enju yase eli siina nio umbe efuma ori?
Wele sino siabeele sisiindu sitiiti mu moni chowo. Khutasa khwako wakholile chindakaano khu lisaaye liase mu miiko kikiicha. Lundi wakholile ese khuba omundu owe efuma ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono nga ese Daudi nyala natasakho siina khu lukoosi nilwo unjekeesie luno, ese omukholi wowo? Ewe umanyile ese.
Sikila khulwo omukholi wowo ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khuloondekhana ne kumwoyo kwowo wamwene, wakholile bibiindu biboofu bino ne khubiekesia bimanyikhane.
Se alio oli nga ewe tawe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se aliio Wele okundi ne akhali ewe tawe, khuloondekhana nende koosi niko khwaulila.
Se eliio ekholo ekiindi khu sibala eli nga Isiraeli tawe, niyo ewe wasikula wabakhola babe babaandu bowo babeene. Bibiindu biboofu nende bie khuukia nibio wabakholela nga ne watimania chikholo chichiindi ebweeni wabwe mu sibala sioosi.
Wakhola Isiraeli khuba babaandu bowo khulwa mindali na mindali, lundi ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wekhola Wele wabwe.
“Ne luno ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha elomo niyo wasuubisia ese omukholi wowo ne nju yase ekholekhe. Khola nilio waloma.
Efuma yowo echa khumanyikhana lundi ekuche mu biise bioosi bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae, Wele owa Isiraeli.’ Mala oliliinda lisaaye liase libeo khulwe biise bioosi.
Ndi ne bunyindaafu khukhusaba ewe, Wele lisaba lino, sikila ewe wafunulile ese omukholi wowo kano koosi, mala wambooleele oli, oliombakha enju yase.
Ne nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe oli Wele, mala walaka lisuubisia lie khuukia lino khwise omukholi wowo.
Nono khusaba ewe obiite lisaaye liase chikhabi nio bachiililile khukhwekhoyela kumwalaalo kwowo. Sikila nisio ewe obiita chikhabi ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi siba sibiite mindali na mindali.”

Enyuma we siise omwami Daudi aseera ebwaakala Bafilisiti mala abaula. Abanuula lukoba lwa Katihi ne birekere bibialubotookhelela.
Akhaba lundi aula Bamoabu mala bekela bakholi bewe mala bamuruunganga busuuru.
Daudi lundi aula Hatateseri omwami owa Soba, siimbi ne sibala sia Hamati, nga aaba ne alikho ne acha khubalaayia bubwami bwewe khu luuchi lwa Efurati.
Daudi aamba kamakaari kewe ke liie eelefu ndala, babaandu chielefu saba batimianga chifarasi, ne banamae bakeenda busa chielefu kamakhumi kabili. Abukula chifarasi chichola kamakaari ke liie emia ndala mala afuna bikele chiramire choosi.
Nga Bashamu ba Damasika becha khuyeeta Hatateseri omwami owa Soba, Daudi eera babaandu ba Shamu chielefu kamakhumi kabili na chibili khu nibo.
Nono Daudi eera sipupu sie banamae mu Damasika mu Shamu. Bashamu baaba bakholi bewe mala bamuruunganga busuuru. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Daudi aula buli abuundu niio acha.
Daudi aabukula chingabo che esahabu nicho bakholi ba Hatateseri baba ne basutile mala achiyila e Yerusalemu.
Daudi lundi aabukula kimikasa kimikali khukhwama mu ngoba cha Tibuhati ne Kuni, chingoba cha Hatateseri. Solomoni arumikhira kimikasa kino khung'oona litangi lie mu Lukaangu, chinjeko ne bibiindu bie mu Lukaangu.
Omwami Toi owa Hamati aulila ali Daudi akhilile sipupu sie banamae ba Hatateseri omwami owa Soba sioosi.
Nio Toi aaruma omusoleeli wewe Hatoramu khukheesia omwami Daudi ne khu musiima khulwe khuula Hatateseri. Toi aba apana ne Hatateseri khu biise bikali. Toi arumira Daudi biianwa bikali bie esahabu, efwesa ne kumukasa.
Bino bioosi omwami Daudi abiaana khu Mwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alala ne fwesa ne esahabu niyo abukula khukhwama mu bibala bino: Edomu, Moabu, Filisiti ne Amaleki.
Mala aara bipupu bie banamae mu sibala sia Edomu mwoosi. Baedomu bekela bakholi bo mwami Daudi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Daudi aula buli abuundu niio acha.
Nio Daudi amiia Isiraeli yoosi. Aakholela babaandu bewe bung'ali ne buulekhaasie.
Yoabu okhwa Seruya aaba omwimeelesi owe banamae. Yehoshafati okhwa Ahiludi emeelelanga kamaandike.
Satoki okhwa Ahitubu ne Ahimeleki okhwa Abiatari baba basaayi. Seraya aaba omuandiki.
Benaya okhwa Yehoyata aaba omwimeelesi owe baliindi ba Daudi. Ne basoleeli bo mwami Daudi baaba babemeelesi bakhulu mu milimo kio mwami Daudi.

Enyuma we siise omwami Nahasi owa Amoni afwa mala omusoleeli wewe ela mu bweyaangu bwewe nga omwami.
Daudi aloma ali, “Ndakholela Hanuni kamalayi sikila raraawe Nahasi, akholela ese kamalayi.” Nio Daudi amurumira burume amuolelesie khu lifwa lia raraawe.
Nio bakholi ba Daudi baacha khu Hanuni musibala sia Amoni khumuoleelesia.
Ne babemeelesi ba Amoni baboolela omwami Hanuni bali, “Ewe wibaasia olifwaana Daudi arumire babaandu bano khukhuoleelesia ewe khulwe lukoosi lwa raraao? Se kali kario tawe! Babaandu bano bechile khumenieelesia sibala ne khuyoota ne khusibukula.”
Nio Hanuni aabukula barumwa ba Daudi mala aababeka bunwanwa, aakhala chingubo chabwe amarango mala abaoona bacha.
Nga Daudi ne aulila kakaba ne kekholekhe, aarura khucha khubakanila. Baba baambiilwe chisoni chingali. Omwami ababoolela ali, “Cha mumenye Yeriko nabwila bunwanwa bwenywe ne buchoa lundi.”
Omwami Hanuni ne Baamoni babona bali bakholile Daudi khuuba omusiku wabwe. Nio Hanuni ne Baamoni baruma bitonyi bie efwesa eelefu ndala khureera kamakaari ke liie ne batimia chifarasi khukhwama Mesopotamia, Aramaaka ne Soba.
Baruunga kumuruungo khulwe kamakaari chielefu salasini na mbili no mwami owa Maaka ne banamae bewe. Omwami owa Maaka apa ekambi Meteba. Akhaba Baamoni bosi baama mu ngoba choosi mala berekekhera liie.
Nga Daudi ne aulila ario aruma Yoabu ne banamae be kamaani boosi.
Baamoni barura mala berekekhera liie esilibwa sie lukoba. Ne babaami ba baaba ne bechile nabo baaba bong'ene mu lukoongo.
Yoabu aabona ali basiku balikho becha khu mwibwaakala khukhwama ebweeni ne nyuma. Nio aarobora banamae barana ba Isiraeli aabara ebweeni bapane ne Bashamu.
Yoabu ara banamae babarama mu bwimeelesi bwa Abisai wandaaye. Abisai abarakho khu khuupana ne Baamoni.
Yoabu aboolela Abisai ali, “Waaba ne obona oli Bashamu balikho bakhila wicha umbabine, ne baaba Baamoni ne balikho bakhukhila ewe ndecha khuabine.”
Ba omunyindaafu! Lekha khupanile babaandu befwe ne kamaani ne khulwe chingoba cha Wele wefwe. Ne lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhole nilio enya.
Yoabu ne babaandu bewe bebwaakala Bashamu, mala Bashamu belukha.
Nga Baamoni ne babona Bashamu ne belukha, bosi belukha Abisai, mala bakobola mu lukoba lwabwe. Nio Yoabu akobola e Yerusalemu.
Bashamu nga babona bali baulilwe ne Baisiraeli, barumania khureera babaandu Bashamu ba baaba engelekha we Luluuchi lwa Efurati. Baba asi owa Shofaki, komanda we banamae bo mwami Hadadeseri owa Soba.
Nga Daudi ne aulila ario aabuusia bipupu bie banamae ba Isiraeli alala, mala ambukha nabio luluuchi lwa Yoritani. Daudi abarekekha mu bweyaangu baloleelelana ne Bashamu. Liie liarakikha.
Ne kakhali Bashamu belukha Baisiraeli, Daudi eera babaandu chielefu saba batimia kamakaari ke Bashamu ne banamae Bashamu chielefu kamakhumi kane bakeenda busa. Beera akhaba Siofaki, komanda wabwe.
Nga bakholi ba Hatateseri bamanya bali baulilwe ne Isiraeli, bayiima kumuleembe ne Daudi, mala baba asi wewe. Bashamu se benyakho lundi khuabina Baamoni tawe.

Daudi arusia ekutwa eye bubwami khumurwe kwo mwami wabwe mala akiefwara. Yaba busiro bwe chikiilo embi kamakhumi kataru na chine. Ekuutwa eyo yaba yakholwa khu sahabu ne mukari mwayo abeele baramo kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Daudi lundi ayaya bibiindu bikali khukhwama mu lukoba.
Lundi abukula babaandu be mu lukoba mala abara khu milimo kie khukholela kimisiameno ne chiaywa ne chiuma che bichuuma. Daudi akholela ario babaandu be chingoba chichiindi choosi cha Amoni. Nono niye ne babaandu bewe bakobola e Yerusalemu.
Enyuma wa kano, liie liarakikha lundi ne Bafilisiti e Keseri. Nio Sibekayi Omuhushati eera Sipayi. Aaba mulala khu lisaaye lie babaandu baboofu. Ne bafilisiti bakhilwa.
Liie liliindi liaba e Katihi niio omundu omuboofu owe chinjala sita buli khu mukhono, ne chinjala sita buli khu sikele, choosi alala kamakhumi kabili na chine. Aaba we lisaaye lie babaandu baboofu.
Akhoma Baisiraeli mala Yonasani okhwa Simea, amwiira. (Simea aba wandaaye owa Daudi.)
Babaandu baboofu bataru nibo Daudi ne babaandu bewe beera bano baba be lisaaye lie babaandu baboofu ba Katihi.

Sietani enya khureera butinyu khu baandu ba Isiraeli, nio akhola Daudi abisia khubala babaandu.
Daudi aelesia Yoabu ne babemeelesi be banamae babaandi kamalaka ali, “Cha mu Isiraeli mwoosi khukhwama Beerisheba khukhwola Dani mala mubale babaandu. Mundeerere likhuwa nio manye bali benga.”
Yoabu amukobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akuchisia babaandu ba Isiraeli baba kamakhabi emia khukhilakho nga bali luno. Omwami, bano boosi se bali bakholi bowo? Siina sikila ewe omwami ne wenya khukhola lino mala oreerere ekholo eya Isiraeli yoosi kumusaango?”
Ne kakhali omwami ayingiilila Yoabu akhole nga ne enya. Yoabu aarura aacha akeenda mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi. Nio enyuma akobola e Yerusalemu.
Yoabu areerera omwami Daudi bukali bwe babaandu. Babao babaandu emilioni ndala ne chielefu emia ndala mu Isiraeli banyala khu khuupana. Ne mu Yuda babaamo babaandu chielefu chimia chine ne kamakhumi saba banyala khu khuupana.
Ne kakhali Yoabu se aabala chikholo cha Lawi ne Benjamini tawe. Sikila se asiima lilaka lio mwami tawe.
Wele se asangaalila nisio Daudi akhola tawe, nio areera kumunaanio khu Isiraeli.
Daudi aboolela Wele ali, “Nakholile bumayaanu bukali khulwe khukhola kano! Nosiima umbeele kholile mu busilu.” Nono khusaba umbele nga khukoseele.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Kati, omung'oosi owa Daudi ali,
“Cha oboolele Daudi oli, ndikho muelesia kamakhuwa kataru. Ndamukholela nisio arobora.”
Kati aacha khu Daudi amuboolela ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola: ‘Wamwene orobore.’
Kimiiko kitaru kie njala, namwe kimieesi kitaru wilukhenge banamae be basiku bowo, namwe chindaalo chitaru nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhwibwaakala ewe ne mbalu yewe, lufu lubi lukhasalanile mu sibala siowo khu ndaalo chitaru echo. Malaika wewe alareera lifwa mu Isiraeli mwoosi! Nono mboolele nilio nja khuboolela oundumire!”
Daudi akobosia Kati ali, “Ese ndi mu butinyu lukali! Ne se nenya khunaanisibwa ne babaandu tawe. Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene abe niye ounaania, sikila niye ali owe siisa.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma lufu lubi khu baandu ba Isiraeli, mala babaandu chielefu kamakhumi saba baafwa.
Nio Wele aruma malaika khubunia Yerusalemu. Ne akhakhola ario tawe Wele akaluukhasia kamebaasio mala aboolela malaika ali, “Lekha! Ako kanyalile!” Malaika aaba emile aluyia lwe khuula lwa Onani Omuyebusi.
Daudi aalola aabona malaika wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emile mu mbeo asutile embalu yewe mu mukhono kwewe, erekekhe khubunia Yerusalemu. Nio Daudi ne basaakhulu befwara kamakunia, mala benama bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila asi.
Daudi asaba Wele ali, “Wele ese niise owakholile bumayaanu. Ese niise owarusia lilaka ndi babaandu babalwe. Nono babaandu bano bakholile siina? Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, mbeelesie ese kumunaanio nende be nju yase. Ne okhara bulwaale khu baandu bowo tawe.”
Malaika wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Kati alake Daudi ache ombakhe alutare khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e luya lwe khuulilakho lwa Onani.
Nio Daudi acha khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Kati niyo aloma mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono Onani ne basoleeli bewe bane baba balikho bauula engaanu. Ne nga babona malaika basoleeli belukha bacha bekisa.
Daudi echa khu Onani. Nga Onani ne abona omwami Daudi ne alikho echa, alekha luuya lwe khuulilakho mala asikamila Daudi enama bubweeni bwewe bwetiila asi.
Daudi alomaloma khu Onani ali, “Mbelesie luuya lwowo lwe khuulilakho nio nombakhilekho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare. Ngusie khu bukusi bubwenyekhana manya lufu lubi luno lurura khu Baisiraeli.”
Nio Onani aakobosia Daudi ali, “Kholubukule, mala omwami olukhoolele siosi siosi nisio wenya. Ne lundi lola ndikho mbaana chieeyi chase nga siianwa sie khukhwosia ne kimiini kie khuula nikieki nga chiikhu che khukhwoselia, ne ngano nga siianwa sie biakhulia. Nabiaanile bioosi.”
Ne omwami Daudi aakobosia Onani ali, “Tawe, ndabikula bioosi khu bukusi bubwenyekhana. Se nyala naana sisiindu siosi siosi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa siili sisiowo tawe, lundi se enyala nabukula sisiindu nisio ese kharuungire siosi siosi tawe.”
Nio Daudi aruunga Onani bitonyi chimia sita che esahabu khulwe abuundu ao.
Nio Daudi ombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alutare mala aana biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie kumuleembe. Asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia khulwe khuruma kumulilo khukhwama mwikulu khu alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka aboolela malaika akobosie embalu yewe musibaabi.
Mu biise ebio Daudi nga aabona ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakobosie lisaba liewe khuluyia lwe khuulilakho lwa Onani omuyebusi, aanilao biianwa.
Aanila aluyia ao sikila liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilio Musa aaba ne akhola mu sichiimi, ne alutare eye biianwa bie khukhwosia mu biise ebio biaba bisiili abuundu aesuta e Kibeoni.
Ne kakhali Daudi se anyala khucha mwieema litakatifu khusaba Wele tawe, sikila aria embalu eya malaika wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!

Nio Daudi aaloma ali, “Elaba enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne ano alaba alutare niio Baisiraeli balioselianga biianwa bie khukhwosia.”
Omwami Daudi arusia lilaka bali baakwa boosi ba baamenya mu sibala sia Isiraeli bebuusie alala. Aabara khu milimo kie khubeecha kamabaale ke khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele.
Daudi aana bibia bikali bie khung'oona kimisimari ne bupata bwe bilibwa. Lundi aana ne kumukasa kumukali lukali kutuma sikelo.
Ne lundi aareera kimitarakwa kimikali kikhabalikha tawe. Kimitarakwa kino kiarerwa ne Basidoni ne Batiro khu Daudi.
Daudi aaloma ali, “Omusoleeli wase Solomoni asiili omwana ne lundi akhamanya kamakali tawe. Ne lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilwo ombakha lube lulayi lwe khuukia lundi lwe fuma engali ne luyali mu bibala bioosi. Nono ndikhola lilierekekha khulwe liliombakha.” Nio Daudi ne akhafwa tawe, aarekekha bie khukhwombakhila bikali lukali.
Nio Daudi arumania balanga omusoleeli wewe Solomoni mala amulaka khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Daudi aboolela Solomoni ali, “Mwana wase, nenya nombakhe Lukaangu khulwe khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase.
Nanyoola elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, ‘Daudi weera babaandu bakali lukali ne khukhupana kamae kamakali. Se ocha khu khunjobakhila enju tawe, sikila wachukha sifuki sikali khu sibala.
Ne kakhaba kario asuubisia ali, Olisaala omusoleeli, oliamiia mu muleembe. Sikila ese ndimuelesia kumuleembe khukhwama khu basiku bewe boosi babamubotookhelela. Lisina liewe liliba Solomoni. Sikila mu bwami bwewe ese ndielesia Isiraeli kumuleembe ne buyenjefu.
Alinjombakhila ese Lukaangu. Aliba omusoleeli wase ne ese ndiba raraawe. Lisaaye liewe liliamiia Isiraeli mindali na mindali.’
“Nono mwana wase, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abe ne nawe. Okhoya wombakhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo lukaangu, nga ne aloma ali olikhola orio.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhuelesie ewe bukesi ne limanya. Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhwamiia khu Isiraeli, ria Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
Okhaindiaale kaaba bali oria kamalaka koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Musa khulwa Isiraeli. Ba omunyindaafu lundi owe kamaani. Okhaba omuri tawe, lundi okhaba omwoyokhi tawe.
Nalua khureera bibiindu bibiombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Naanile bitonyi chielefu emia ndala che bitonyi bie esahabu, ne bitonyi emilioni ndala bie fwesa. Bitonyi bie kumukasa ne bichuuma biikhabalikha tawe, sikila bili bikali lukali. Lundi naanile chimbao ne kamabaale. Okhoya watasakho bibiindi.
Oli ne bakholi be kimilimo bakali. Babaandu baliio babechi be kamabaale, babombakhi, ne babeechi be chimbao, ne bakholi babamanya chingano choosi che kimilimo.
Bamanya khukholela esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa ne bichuuma. Nono rakikha kimilimo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abe ne nawe!”
Daudi alaka babemeelesi ba Isiraeli boosi bayeete omwana wewe Solomoni.
Abareeba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe se ali ne nanywe? Ne se amuelesie kumuleembe chimbeka choosi? Sikila aanile babaandu boosi babamenyanga mu sibala sino mukhono mwase. Ne luno luri kamaloba kano kali mukhono mwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne babaandu bewe.
Nono yeaana mwabeene khura kamebaasio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Rakikha khukhwombakha Abuundu Atakatifu wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio muremo Lisanduku lie Ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bibiindu bitakatifu bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bireerwe munju eye khusaaya Wele.”

Omwami Daudi areera alala babemeelesi ba Isiraeli boosi ne basaayi, ne Balawi boosi.
Aabala Balawi baali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru namwe bakhulukhoo. Boosi alala baba chielefu salasini na naane.
Khubano omwami Daudi aelesia babaandu chielefu ishirini naine khukhola kimilimo kie Lukaangu, babaandu chielefu sita khuuba babemeelesi ne bakhalaki.
Ne babaandu chielefu chine khuliinda bilibwa, ne babaandu chielefu chine bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khurumikhira bibiindu bie khukhwimbilamo kimienya nibio omwami Daudi ang'oona.
Daudi akabukhasia Balawi mu bipupu bitaru khuloondekhana ne babaana bataru ba Lawi. Kerishomu, Kohati ne Merari.
Kerishomu asaala babaana basoleeli babili: Latani ne Shimei.
Latani asaala basoleeli bataru: Yehieli, Shetamu ne Yoeli.
Shimei asaala basoleeli bataru: Shelomoti, Hasieli ne Harani. Ba baaba babemeelesi be kimiliango kie babaandu babaakukha khu Latani.
Shimei asaala basoleeli bane: Yahati, Sina, Yeushi ne Beria.
Yahati aba omubele, ne Sina aaba omuloonda. Yeushi ne Beria se baba ne lisaaye likali tawe, nio babalwanga luuya lulala busa.
Kohati asaala basoleeli bane: Amuramu, Ishihari, Heburoni ne Usieli.
Babaana ba Amuramu baba Aruni ne Musa. Aruni ne lisaaye liewe baulwa khuaana khu Wele bibiindu bitakatifu khulwa mindali na mindali. Khukhwosia bimuli biiunya bulayi, ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khu mukholela ne khubiita babaandu chikhabi mu lisina liewe.
Ne ba okhwa Musa, omundu owa Wele, babalwa alala ne Balawi.
Musa asaala basoleeli babili, Kerishomu ne Elieseri.
Omwana owa Kerishomu aaba Shubaeli.
Elieseri asaala omusoleeli mulala yeng'ene bali, Rehabia. Ne Rehabia aaba ne babaana basoleeli bakali.
Okhwa Kohati okhola khabili, Isihari asaala omusoleeli bali Shelomiti.
Okhwa Kohati okhola khataru Heburoni asaala basoleeli bane: Yeria, Amaria, Yehasieli ne Yekameamu.
Okhwa Kohati okhola khane Usieli asaala basoleeli babili: Mika ne Ishiya.
Merari asaala basoleeli babili, Mahili ne Mushi. Mahili yesi asaala basoleeli babili Eliesa ne Kishi.
Ne Eliesa aafwa ne akhasaalakho basoleeli tawe, asaala bakhaana bong'ene. Bakhaana bewe bacha khu basoleeli bararaawabwe omuro bali Kishi.
Okhwa Merari okhola khabili, Mushi asaala basoleeli bataru Mahili, Eteri ne Yeremoti.
Bano baba be lisaaye lia Lawi khuloondekhana ne chinju nga ne babalwa. Buli mulala owaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili namwe butumakhoo, owanyala khukhola kimilimo kie mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abalwa.
Daudi aaloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, aelesie kumuleembe khu baandu bewe, ne niye omwene alamenya mu Yerusalemu mindali na mindali.
Nio luno mbao sifuno siosi siosi khulwe Balawi khusuta liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne bibiindu bibiindi bioosi birumikhanga mu lisaaya tawe.”
Khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Daudi limaliilisi, Balawi boosi babalwa ne boolile bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili.
Ne kakhali baelesibwa kimilimo kie khuyeeta lisaaye lia Aruni khu milimo kie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi baliindanga chisiro chalwo, ne khubiikha mu bukwalaafu buli siindu siili sitakatifu ne kumulimo kwosi kwosi munju eya Wele.
Benyekha khureera kumukaati kumutakatifu khu mesa, khureera bufu khulwe biianwa bie biakhulia khureera kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe, khukhupa kimikaati ne khutubania bufu ne kamafura, mu bikelo bioosi namwe buboofu.
Ne Balawi buli lwosi baaba basiimanga ne khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba.
Ne buli lwosi Balawi baananga khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biianwa bie khukhwosia khu ndaalo eya Sabato, Naikara eye kumwesi kumuya, ne naikara chichiindi khuloondekhana nga benyibwa. Balawi bakhola kimilimo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli endaalo.
Nono Balawi baelesibwa kimilimo kie khuliinda liiema lie kumuse ne liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lundi Basaayi bano bayeeta lisaaye lia Aruni ne kimilimo kie lisaaya mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Bino nibio bipupu bie lisaaye lia Aruni: Aruni asaala basoleeli bane: Natabu, Abihu, Eliesa ne Itamari.
Ne kakhali Natabu ne Abihu baafwa raarawabwe naakhafwa tawe, ne se baba ne lisaaye tawe. Nio bawandaayabwe Eliesa ne Itamari baaba basaayi.
Khuloondekhana ne omwami Daudi buyeeti bwa Satoki owe lisaaye lia Eliesa alala ne Ahimeleki owe lisaaye lia Itamari. Daudi abarekekha khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiabwe nikio babaroborwa.
Babemeelesi bakali bama mu lisaaye lia Eliesa, khukhila lia Itamari. Babemeelesi ekhumi na sita khukhwama munju eya Eliesa, ne munane khukhwama munju eya Itamari.
Babaandu khukhwama mu buli lisaaye lie nju chinju Eliesa ne Itamari baroborwa khulwe khukhupa chikura. Balala baroborwa khukhwimeelela Abuundu Atakatifu ne babaandi baaba basaayi.
Omuandiki Shemaya okhwa Netaneli Omulawi aandika kamasina kaabwe ebweeni wo mwami ne babemeelesi ne omusaayi Satoki, Ahimeleki okhwa Abiatari, ne babemeelesi be chinju che basaayi ne chinju che Balawi. Kimilimo kiakabwa mu khuupa ekura mu chinju cha Eliesa ne Itamari.
Ekura eye khunyoa yakwila Yehoyaribu, eya khabili yakwila Yetaya.
Eya khataru yakwila Harimu, eye khane yakwila Seorimu
Eya kharaano yakwila Malichiya, eya sita yakwila Miyamini.
Eya saba yakwila Hakosi, eya munaane yakwila Abia.
Eya tisa yakwila Yeshua, eye khumi yakwila Shekania.
Eye khumi na ndala yakwila Eliashibu, eya ekhumi na chibili yakwila Yakimu.
Eye khumi na chitaru yakwila Hupa, eye khumi na chine yakwila Yeshebeabu.
Eye khumi na chiraano yakwila Bilika, eye khumi na sita yakwila Imeri.
Eye khumi na saba yakwila Hesiri, eye khumi na munaane yakwila Hapisesi.
Eye khumi na tisa yakwila Petahiya, eye kamakhumi kabili yakwila Yehesekieli.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na ndala yakwila Yakini, eya kamakhumi kabili na chibili yakwila Kamuli.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na chitaru yakwila Delaya eya kamakhumi kabili na chine yakwila Maasia.
Bipupu bie babaandu bano baroborwa khukhola kimilimo mu lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baliinda kamalaka niko baebwa ne kukaawabwe Aruni nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ne amulaka.
Kano niko kamasina kakaandi ke babaandu babaama khu lisaaye lia Lawi khu baana ba Amuramu, Shebueli. Ne khu baana ba Shubaeli, Yeteya.
Ishiya, owe lisaaye lia Rahabia.
Shelomoti owe lisaaye lia Isihari ne Yahati owe lisaaye lia Shelomiti.
Heburoni asaala basoleeli bane: Yeria, Amaria, Yehasieli, ne Yekameamu.
Omwana owa Usieli aaba Mika.
Shamiri aaba omwana owa Mika. Isiya aaba wandaaye owa Mika. Ne Sakaria aba omwana owa Ishiya.
Mahili ne Mushi baaba be lisaaye lia Merari.
Ne Yaasia okhwa Merari asaala lundi raraawe owa Beno: Siohamu, Sakuri ne Iburi.
Mahili asaala basoleeli babili, Eliesa ne Kishi, Eliesa se aaba ne basoleeli tawe,
Ne Kishi asaala omusoleeli mulala bali Yeraimeeli.
Mushi asaala basoleeli bataru: Mali, Eteri ne Yeremoti. Bano baba babaana be balawi khuloondekhana ne chinju che bakuuka babwe.
Omwimeelesi owa buli be nju, ne wandaaye omuro, baapa chikura che kimilimo. Bakhola bario bulayi bwene nga balebe babwe, basaayi babaakukha khu Aruni nga yaba ne bakholile. Omwami Daudi, Satoki, Ahimeleki ne babemeelesi be chinju che basaayi ne Balawi baba baloli.

Omwami Daudi ne babemeelesi be kimilimo be lisaaya barobora balala khu lisaaye lia: Asafu, Henani ne Yedutuni. Kimilimo kiabwe kiaba khukhwilwacha khulwe khurumikhira kamatuungu, biilili ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya. Kano niko kamasina ke babaandu babaroborwa khukhola kumulimo kuno:
Ba okhwa Asafu bane Sakuri, Yosefu, Netania ne Asharela. Belwachanga asi we bubwekisi bwa Asafu khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami Daudi.
Ba okhwa Yedutuni babakhola kimilimo baba sita: Ketalia, Seri, Yeshaia, Simei, Hasiabiya ne Matitia. Baba asi we bubwimeelesi bwa paapa wabwe Yedutuni. Elwacha ne khurumikhira lituungu khufumia ne khusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ba okhwa Hemani baba ekhumi na bane: Bukia, Matania, Usieli, Shebueli, Yeremoti, Hanania, Hanani, Eliata, Kitaliti, Romamuti-Eseri, Yosibekasha, Maloti, Hotiri ne Mahasioti.
Wele aelesia Hemani omung'oosi wo mwami basoleeli ekhumi na bane ne bakhaana bataru. Wele amuelesia babaana bano khuloondekhana nga ne alaka Hemani.
Hemani emeelela basoleeli bewe boosi khukhwimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Lukaangu ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya ne kamatuungu, ne biilili. Okwo nikwo kukwaba kumulimo kwabwe munju eya Wele. Ne Asafu, Yedutuni ne Hemani baba asi we kamalaka ko mwami Daudi.
Babaandu bano ne balebe babwe baba bekesebwa lundi bamanya khukhwimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baba babaandu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Khumanya biise bie kimilimo nikio baelesibwa, boosi baapa chikura, baele ne basaakhulu, babekesia ne babeeka.
Ekura eye khunyoa yakwila Yosefu wenju eya Asafu. Chikura chichaloondakho chakwilaanga babaandu ekhumi na babili khu buli enju.
Eya khabili yakwila Ketalia, babaana bewe ne balebe bewe.
Eya khataru yakwila baandu ekhumi na babili Sakuri, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya khane yakwila baandu ekhumi na babili Isiri, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya kharaano yakwila Nesania, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya sita yakwila Bukia, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya saba yakwila Yesharela, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya munaane yakwila Yeshaya, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eya tisa yakwila Matania, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi yakwila Shimei, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na ndala yakwila Asareli, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na chibili yakwila Hasiabiya, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na chitaru yakwila Shubaeli, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye khumi na chine yakwila Matitia, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na chiraano yakwila Yeremoti, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na sita yakwila Hanania, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na saba yakwila Yeshibekasha, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na munaane yakwila Hanani, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye ekhumi na tisa yakwila Maloti, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye kamakhumi kabili yakwila Eliata, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na ndala yakwila Hotiri, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na chibili yakwila Kitaliti, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na chiraru yakwila Mahasioti, babaana ne balebe bewe.
Eye kamakhumi kabili na chine yakwila Romamuti-Eseri, babaana ne balebe bewe.

Bino nibio bipupu bie baliindi be lukaangu: Khukhwama mu luuya lwa Kora baaba Mesielemia okhwa Kore wenju eya Asafu.
Mesi elemia aba ne basoleeli saba: Sakaria, Yetiaeli, Sebatia, ne Yetinieli,
Elamu, Yehohanani ne Eliehoenai.
Amieli Isakari ne Peule-tai.
Akhaba lundi Shemaya okhwa Obedi-Edomu aba ne basoleeli ba baaba babemeelesi be chinju che bakuukawabwe, sikila baaba babaandu banyala.
Shemaya aaba ne basoleeli sita, Otini, Refaeli, Obeti, Elisabati, Elihu ne Semakia. Elihu ne Semakia baba bakholi be kamaani.
Bano boosi baba be nju eya Obedi-Edomu. Nibo ne babaana babwe ne balebe babwe baba babaandu banyala lundi be kaamani khu milimo. Obedi-Edomu aba ne lisaaye lie babaana kamakhumi sita.
Mesielemia aaba ne babaana ne balebe boosi alala likhumi na munane. Boosi yaba banyala kimilimo.
Hosa khukhwama mu luya lwa Merari aba ne basoleeli bane: Simuri, niye raraawe akhola omwimeelesi, akhaba ne akhaba omubele tawe.
Hilikia, Tebalia ne Sakaria. Boosi alala baba ekhumi na bataru be nju eya Hosa.
Kimikabo kie baliindi be Lukaangu bano khuloondekhana ne babemeelesi baukhasibwa mu bipupu khuloondekhana nende be chinju mala baelesibwa kimilimo munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bulayi bwene nga balebe babwe babaandi ne bakhola.
Baapa ekura khurobora buli nju khuliinda silibwa. Baele ne basaakhulu boosi baapa ekura.
Ekura yakwila Shelemia silibwa sie bukwe. Ne omusoleeli wewe Sakaria, ekura yamukwila khuliinda silibwa sie bunaswa. Buli lwosi Sakaria akaambilanga babaandu bulayi.
Obeti Edomu anyoola silibwa sie bunafubo, ne basoleeli bewe banyoola kimilimo kie khuliinda libiikhilo lie biakhulia.
Ekura yakwila Shupimu ne Hosa silibwa sie mumbo ne silibwa sia Shaleketi, sili kumuila kucha engaaki. Baliindanga elubeka ne lubeka.
Buli endaalo baliindi sita baba ebukwe, bane baba ebunaswa ne bane baba ebunafubo. Baliindi babili buli siise bareebwanga ebiikhilo lie biakhulia buli endaalo.
Babao baliindi babili mwiema lie mumbo, ne bane khu ngila echa mwiiema.
Bino biaba bipupu bie baliindi be bilibwa khukhwama mu luuya lwa Kora ne luuya lwa Merari.
Mu Balawi, Ahiya aaba omwimeelesi owe libiikhilo lia Wele, ne libiikhilo lie bibiindu bitakatifu.
Latani mulala khu bakhwa Kerishomu, aba kukaawe we bipupu bie be chinju chingali, sitube ne be nju eya Yehieli omusoleeli wewe.
Bakhwa Yehueli babili Setamu ne wandaaye Yoeli bemeelelanga libiikhilo lie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babemeelesi babaandi baroborwa mu lisaaye lia Amuramu, Isihari, Heburoni ne Usieli.
Shebueli owe luuya lwa Kerishomu okhwa Musa, aaba niye omukhulu oliinda libiikhilo lie Lukaangu.
Bano baaba balebe khukhwama khu Elieseri wandaaye owa Kerishomu: Elieseri aaba raraawe owa Yoramu, Yoramu aaba raraawe owa Sikiri, Sikiri aaba raraawe owa Shelomiti.
Shelomiti ne balebe bewe bemeelelanga kamabiikhilo ne biianwa bibiaulwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omwami Daudi, ne babemeelesi be chinju, che bapaapa babwe ne babemeelesi be banamae chielefu ne chimia ne banamae bakhulu baana biianwa bino khu Wele.
Babukulakho bibiindu bilala nibio yaba baambile mwiie mala babira alubeka khukhola kimilimo kie khung'oona Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhaba biianwa bibiareerwa no mung'oosi Samweli, no mwami Saulo ne Abuneri okhwa Neri, ne Yoabu okhwa Seruya, nende buli siindu sisiareerwa, bioosi bialindibwa ne Shelomoti ne balebe bewe.
Mu be lisaaye lia Isihari, Kenania ne basoleeli bewe, baebwa kimilimo kienje, khuba babemeelesi ne bakhalaki.
Mu lisaaye lia Heburoni, Hasiabia ne balebe bewe elefu ne chimia saba, boosi baebwa kumulimo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne omwami Daudi mu Isiraeli lubeka lwe mumbo mwe Luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Yeria aba omwimeelesi we lisaaye lia Heburoni. Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kane khukhwama nga Daudi naba omwami, limenieelesia lie lunyilili lwe be nju eye lisaaye lia Heburoni liakholwa mala banamae bakhulu be nju yino banyoolekha bamenya e Yaseri mu sibala sia Kileati.
Omwami Daudi arobora Yeriya ne balebe bewe chielefu chibili ne chimia saba babe babemeelesi be chinju che ba paapa babwe. Baroborwa khukhwimeelela ba Rubeni, ba Kati, nende balala khu ba Manase. Babemeelela mu makhuwa ka Wele ne kimilimo kio mwami Daudi.

Kano kali kamasina ke babemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli, banamae babemeelela chielefu ne chimia ne babemeelesi babakholela omwami. Buli kumwesi sipupu chielefu ishirini naine bakholela omwami.
Yashobeamu okhwa Sabutieli aba omwimeelesi owe sipupu sie khunyoa sie kumwesi kwe bweeni sipupu siewe siabaamo babaandu chielefu ishirini naine.
Yashobeamu okhwa Sabutieli aba owe lisaaye lia Peresi. Lundi aba omwimeelesi owe bakhulu be banamae mu mwesi kwe khunyoa.
Bubwasio bwe kumwesi kwa khabili bwaba bwa Dotai owe lisaaye lia Ahohi.
Komanda we khu bwasio bwe kumwesi kwa khataru aba Benaya okhwa Yehoyata omusaayi. Aaba ne babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili na chine.
Yuno niye Benaya owaba owe kaamani khu banamae kamakhumi kataru. Niye owabemeelela. Omwana wewe Amisabati aaba omwimeelesi owe sipupu siewe.
Bubwasio bwe kumwesi kwe khaane aaba Asaheli, wandaaye owa Yoabu omusoleeli wewe Sabatia ela khu milimo kiewe nga omwimeelesi. Babaamo babaandu chielefu Ishirini naine mu sipupu siewe.
Komanda owa kharaano owe bubwasio bwe kumwesi kwa kharaano aba Shamu-Huti, owe lisaaye lia Isira.
Bubwasio bwe kumwesi kwa sita aba Ira okhwa Ikeshi Omutekoa. Mu sipupu siewe babamo babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili na bane.
Bubwasio bwe kumwesi kwa saba aaba Helesi Omupeloni owe lisaaye lia Efuraimu.
Bubwasio bwa munaane bwe kumwesi kwa munaane aba Sibekayi Omuhushati. Aaba owe lisaaye lia Sera.
Bubwasio bwa tisa kumwesi kwa tisa, aba Abieseri khukhwama Anatoti Omubenjamini.
Bubwasio bwe khumi bwe kumwesi kwe khumi aaba Maharai Omunetofa. Aaba owe lisaaye lia Sera.
Bubwasio bwe khumi na lulala bwe kumwesi kwe khumi na lulala aba Benaya Omupirationi owe lisaaye lia Efuraimu.
Bubwasio bwe khumi na bubili bwe kumwesi kwe khumi na kibili aba Helitai Omunetofati. Aaba owe lisaaye lia Otinieli.
Kano kali kamasina ke babemeelesi be bubwami bwe chikholo cha Isiraeli: Ekholo eya Rubeni aba Elieseri okhwa Sikiri. Ne kholo eya Simioni aba Siafatia okhwa Maaka.
Ekholo eya Lawi aaba Hasiabia okhwa Kemueli. Ne ekholo eya Aruni aaba Satoki.
Yuda Yemeelelwa ne Elihu mulala khu bawandaaye bo mwami Daudi. Ekholo eya Isakari yemeelelwa ne Omri okhwa Mikaili.
Ekholo eya Sebuluni yemeelelwa ne Ishimaya okhwa Obadia. Ne Nafutali yemeelelwa ne Yeremoti okhwa Asirieli.
Efuraimu yemeelelwa ne Hosea okhwa Asasia.
Balala khu kholo eya Manase bemeelelwa ne Yoeli okhwa Petaya. Ne babaandi khu kholo eya Manase bemeelelwa ne Ito okhwa Sakaria. Benjamini yemeelelwa ne Yaasieli okhwa Abuneri.
Dani yemeelelwa ne Asareli okhwa Yerohamu. Bano baba babemeelesi be chikholo cha Isiraeli.
Yoabu okhwa Seruya aarakikha khubala babaandu ne se abala amala tawe. Wele aana kumunaanio khu Isiraeli sikila khubala babaandu khuno. Nio bukali bwe babaandu bumaliilisi se baandikwa mu sitabu sie lukano lwe bubwami bwo omwami Daudi tawe.
Owemelelanga libiikhilo lio mwami aaba Asimabeti okhwa Atieli. Ne owemeelelanga libiikhilo lie mu ngoongo mu ngoba, mu birekere, ne mu chindeleelwa, aaba Yonasani okhwa Usia.
Owemeelelanga bulimi aaba Esiri okhwa Kelubu.
Owemeelelanga kimikuunda kie kimisabibu aba Simei khukhwama e Rama. Ne owemeelelanga kimisabibu kie endali aaba Sabuti khukhwama Shefamu.
Owemelelanga kimiseituni ne kimikhuyu mumbo emaayo we sikulu aba Baali-hanani khukhwama Keteri. Owemelelanga libiikhilo lie kamafura ke kimiseituni aba Yoashi.
Owemelelanga chikhaafu mu Mayilwe ka Siaroni aaba Shitirai. Owasamusianga chikhaafu mu matooma aba Shafati okhwa Adilai.
Owemelelanga chingamia aaba Obili Omuishimaeli. Owemelelanga chipunda aba Yehiteya khukhwama Meronoti. Owemelelanga kamakheese ne chimbusi aaba Yasisi Omuhakiri.
Babaandu bano boosi baba babemeelesi be kimiaandu kio mwami Daudi.
Yonasani, khochaawe owo mwami Daudi aaba omukambisi wewe. Lundi Yonasani aaba omundu owe limanya lundi omuandiki. Niye Yehieli okhwa Hakimoni baliindanga babaana basoleeli bo mwami.
Ahitiofeli aba okaambila omwami ne Hushai aba omusaale owo mwami.
Yehoyata okhwa Benaya ne Abiatari bela mu bweyaangu bwa Ahitiofeli nga bakambisi bo mwami. Yoabu aba komanda owe banamae bo mwami.

Daudi abuusia babemeelesi ba Isiraeli boosi mu Yerusalemu. Babemeelesi bano baba: Babemeelesi be chikholo, babemeelesi be bipupu bibiakholelanga omwami, babemeelesi be banamae chielefu chimia, babemeelesi be kimiaandu, ne basoleeli bo mwami boosi, babemeelesi be lichipi, babaandu be kamaani ne banamae banyindaafu.
Ne kakhali Wele anganisie khukiombakha. Sikila ese ndi omunamae lundi nachukha sifuki sikali.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli andobora ese munju eya paapa khuba omwami khu Isiraeli mindali na mindali. Aarobora ekholo eya Yuda eane bubwimeelesi. Ne khukhwama munju eya Yuda arobora enju eya Paapa wase. Khukhwama mu be nju eyo yoosi basiimisibwa khu khumbukula ese, mala anjamiie mbe omwami khu Isiraeli yoosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambeelesia babaana basoleeli bakali. Ne khukhwama mu nibo aarobora Solomoni amiie Isiraeli mu bwami bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese ali, ‘Omusoleeli wowo Solomoni niye oliombakha Lukaangu lwase. Namuroboore abe nga omwana wase mala ese ndaba nga raraawe.
Ndakhola bubwami bwewe buyindile mindali na mindali aaba ne achiililila khuria kamalaka kase nga ne alikho akhola luno.’
“Nono luno ebweeni we Baisiraeli boosi ne baloleleele, libuusiana lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne mu moni cha Wele wefwe, liinda kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Ne okhola orio enywe mucha khunyoola sibala silayi sino. Ne mulisilekhela chiselukho chichiicha khulwa mindali na mindali.”
“Ne nawe Solomoni, mwana wase, manya Wele owa raraao ne khumukholela ne kumwoyo kwoosi ne lilienya sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amanyile kimiooyo kiefwe kioosi lundi amanyile kamakhuwa kefwe koosi ne chinganakani chefwe choosi. Ne omuyiima ne omunyoola. Ne omuloba, alikhwanjukhila elala.
Okhoya okhebulile oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhurobore ewe khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwewe lutakatifu. Nono ba ne kamaani mala okhole orio.”
Nio Daudi aelesia Solomoni liiandike lie khukhwombakha Lukaangu, chinju che Lukaangu choosi ne chisiro che kamabiikhilo, ne chisiro che mukari ne chikorofa, ne lusiro lwe ndebe eye siisa.
Akhaba lundi amuelesia liiandike lia buli siindu nilio aba nalio mu mebaasio kewe khulwe chimbia che enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne chisiro choosi chichachibotookhelela, kamabiikhilo ke enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kamabiikhilo ke biianwa bibiaulwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhaba lundi Daudi akhola lirekekha lie bipupu bie ba basaayi ne Balawi khukhola kimilimo kiabwe kie Lukaangu. Ne khuliinda bibiindu bie lisaaya mu Lukaangu.
Arekekha efwesa ne esahabu sikelo sisioola khurumikhwa mu khung'oona bibiindu bie mu Lukaangu.
Daudi amwekesia busiro bwe esahabu niyo ang'oonela biteetwe bie chisahabu ne chitaa chabio ne biteetwe bie efwesa ne chitaa chabio. Amwekesia bino bioosi khuloondekhana ne buli kumulimo kwe siteetwe.
Aamukholela lirekekha lie busiro bwe esahabu eya buli emesa eye kumukaati kumutakatifu nende buli esahabu eye chimesa che esahabu.
Akhaba lundi arekekha sikelo sie esahabu yong'ene sisiola sinyala siarumikhwa khung'oona chiuma, bibuumba ne bikoombe, sikelo sia buli esahabu eye bibuumba ne efwesa eye bibuumba,
ne esahabu enosie sikelo siina erumikhwa mu khung'oona alutare eye khukhwoseliakho bibiindu biiunya bulayi ne khung'oona likaari khulwe esahabu khulwe chikerubi chichabalaayanga chindaa chacho ne chifuunikha Lisanduku lie Ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami Daudi aloma ali bibiindu bino bioosi naandika ne ndangirirwe ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aanjeeta khumanya buli siindu mu lirekekha lino.
Daudi aboolela omusoleeli wewe Solomoni ali, “Ba ne sinani ne bunyindaafu. Okharia tawe namwe okhafwa kumwoyo tawe. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase ali ne nawe. Se alakhukwisia namwe akhulekhe tawe khukhwola nga ne omala kimilimo kikienyekha khukhola khu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bipupu bie basaayi ne Balawi berekekha khukhola kimilimo khu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Buli mundu oli ne bukesi bwe kumulimo kwosi kwosi enya khu khuyeeta ewe. Ne babaandu boosi ne babemeelesi babwe baliria lilaka liowo.”

Nakholile kamaani mu ngila choosi khurekekha bibiindu bioosi bibienyekha khulwe enju eya Wele wase nga naba ne nyala. Narekeekhe bino: Esahabu khulwe bibiindu bie esahabu, efwesa khulwe bibiindu bie efwesa, kumukasa khulwe bibiindu bie kumukasa, bichuuma khulwe bibiindu bie bichuuma, kimirongooro khulwe bibiindu bie kimirongooro, kamabaale ke khurona, kamabaale kang'enang'ena ne marimari.
Khutasa khu biindu bino bioosi nibio mbanile khulwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikho ndasakho esahabu ne efwesa yase samwene. Ndikho khola ndio sikila khukhweaana khwase khu Wele. Bino nibio ndikho mbaana.
Bitonyi bie esahabu chielefu chitaru, esahabu eyama Ofiri ne bitonyi bie efwesa yong'ene chielefu saba khulwe khurona lisiisi lie Lukaangu.
Kimilimo kioosi nikio babaandu balakhola, naanile esahabu khulwe bibiindu bie esahabu ne efwesa khulwe bibiindu bie efwesa. Ne naanu owenya khukhweaana khulwe kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kino?”
Nono babemeelesi be banamae chielefu ne chimia ne babemeelesi be chikholo, babemeelesi be banamae chielefu ne chimia ne babemeelesi be kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi barusia biianwa bie khukhwerusia.
Baana bibiindu bino khulwe kimilimo khu Lukaangu, bitonyi chielefu chiraano bie esahabu, bitonyi chielefu ekhumi bie efwesa, bitonyi chielefu ekhumi na munaane bie kumukasa ne bitonyi chielefu emia ndala bie sichuuma.
Abo ba baaba ne kamabaale ke bukusi bakaana khu libiikhilo lie nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Liemeelelwanga ne Yehieli owe lisaaye lia Kerishoni.
Nio babaandu basangaala sikila babemeelesi baana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lilienya liabwe, ne kimiooyo kiabwe kioosi. Akhaba omwami Daudi yesi asangaala lukali.
Khwako ebweeni we libuusiana lie babaandu Daudi afumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma ali: “Khufumia ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli paapa wefwe mindali na mindali!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, owe bukali, bunyali ne luyali, owe lukoosi bukhili ne bubwami bili bibiowo. Buli sisiindu mwikulu ne khu sibala sili sisiowo. Bubwami buli bubwowo ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Ewe oli angaaki khukhila boosi.
Kimiaandu kioosi ne lukoosi biama khwiwe. Ewe wamiia khu buli siindu. Oli ne kamaani ne bunyali. Oli ne kamaani ke khukaliia babaandu ne khubaelesia kamaani.
Khukhusiima Wele wefwe ne khufumia lisina liowo lie luyali.
“Kakhaba kario babaandu base ne samwene, se khunyala ng'ali khwakhuelesia ewe sisiindu siosi tawe, sikila buli siindu siaama khwiwe. Efwe khwakobosie busa nisio wakhuelesia.
Efwe khuli baakwa ne bakeni bauuyi bulayi bwene busa nga bakuuka befwe boosi. Ne chindaalo chefwe khu liloba chili busa nga sisiiniini ne lilieyikina mbamo.
Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe, bibiindu bino bioosi khureerire khukhwombakha Lukaangu khulwe khukoosia lisina liowo litakatifu, bioosi biama khwiwe lundi bioosi bili bibiowo.
Ese manyile Wele ndi ewe opiimaanga kumwoyo kwa buli mundu. Ewe osiimisibwa ne babaandu ne bakhola ng'ali. Mu bung'ali bwe kumwoyo kwase naanile bino bioosi ne lilienya liase khwise. Lundi naboone babaandu bowo babebuusiisie ano, ne baana ne busangaafu ne lilienya liabwe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Wele owe bakuuka befwe Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo. Chiililila khura liiba lino ne chinganakani chino mu miooyo kie babaandu bowo biise bioosi. Lundi bakhole babe ne lilienya lie khu khuria ewe.
Khola omwana wase Solomoni arie kamalaka kowo ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi muyeete ombakhe Lukaangu nilwo ese nakholile lirekekha lialwo.”
Nio Daudi aboolela libuusiana lioosi ali, “Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe!” Mala libuusiana lioosi liafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe. Ne benama asi mala basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khusikamila omwami.
Baana chimbosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne endaalo eyaloondakho baana biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Biianwa bino biaba chiuunwa eelefu ndala, kamamiiku eelefu ndala ne kamameeme eelefu ndala. Lundi bareera biianwa bie khunywa ne chimbosio chingali khulwe Baisiraeli.
Nio endaalo eyo babaandu basangaala lukali nga ne balia ne khunywa mu moni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio bakhola Solomoni okhwa Daudi omwami lukhola khabili. Bamuchukhakho kamafura nga omwami wabwe Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne Satoki nga omusaayi wabwe.
Nio Solomoni ekhala khu ndebe eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe Daudi. Ayindila mala ekholo eya Isiraeli yoosi yamuria.
Babemeelesi boosi ne banamae boosi, ne akhaba basoleeli ba Daudi, basuubisia khuba bariani khu Solomoni nga omwami.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ekholo yoosi yaria Solomoni. Mala aamukhola aaba ne luyali lukali khukhila omwami okundi yesi yesi owaba ne amiia Isiraeli.
Daudi okhwa Chesi amiia khu Isiraeli yoosi.
Amiia khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane. Amiia ne ali mu Heburoni khulwe kimiiko saba ne ali mu Yerusalemu khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru na kitaru.
Afwa ne asaakhuluwe. Afwa ne ali omuiinda ne lukoosi. Omwana wewe Solomoni amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Nono bikholwa bio mwami Daudi bioosi biaandikwa mu bitabu bie chingano che bang'oosi bataru: Samweli, Nasani ne Kati.
Bitabu biboola nga ne amiia, bunyali siina nibwo aaba nabwo ne bibiindu bioosi bibiekholekha khu niye ne khu Isiraeli, ne bubwami bubwamubotookhelela.

Solomoni okhwa Daudi eyombakha mu bwami bwewe. Akhola ario sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne naye mala amukhola aaba omwami omukali lukali.
Solomoni alomaloma khu Baisiraeli boosi, khu bemeelesi be bipupu bie banamae chimia, ne chielefu. Lundi alomaloma khu bakhalaki, ne khu bemeelesi boosi mu Isiraeli yoosi, ne babemeelesi be chinju.
Nono Solomoni ne libuusiana lie babaandu boosi nibo aba ne nabo bacha abuundu aesuta aaba mu lukoba lwa Kibeoni. Bachayo sikila liiema lie kumuse lia Wele, nilio Musa omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ombakha mu sichiimi liabayo.
(Daudi aaba areera Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele khukhwama e Kiriati-Yearimu, alireera abuundu niio alirekekhera. Aaba alisimikhila liiema mu Yerusalemu.)
Khutasa khwako Alutare eye kumukasa niio Besaleli okhwa Uri omwichukhulu owa Huri, aba akhola, yaba mu Kibeoni ebweeni we Liiema lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Solomoni ne libuusiana lie babaandu besaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Solomoni aniina e alutare eye kumukasa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyaba a liiema lie kumuse, mala aana biianwa eelefu bie khukhwosia khu bwene okhwo.
Silo esio Wele abonekhela Solomoni mala amuboolela ali; “Saba nisio wenya khuelesie.”
Solomoni akobosia Wele ali, “Ewe waba ne busiime bukali lundi buchiililila busa khu paapa wase Daudi, mala wakholile ese nabeele omwami mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha lisuubisia liowo khu paapa wase Daudi lichusibwe. Ewe wakholile ese nabeele omwami owe babaandu bakhabalikha tawe.
Nono mbelesie bukesi ne limanya; nio nimeelele babaandu bano bulayi. Sikila se aliio onyala abamiia ewe ne okhamuyeetile tawe.”
Wele akobosia Solomoni ali, “Lino liaba mu mwoyo kwowo ne se wasabile buiinda namwe kimiaandu, namwe lukoosi tawe. Ne lundi se wasabile lifwa lie basiku bowo namwe limenya lileeyi tawe. Ne kakhali wasabile bukesi ne limanya nio wimeelele babaandu base khu nibo ese nakhukholile ewe khuba omwami.
Khwako ese nakhuelesie ewe bukesi ne limanya. Ndikhuelesia akhaba buiinda, kimiaandu ne lukoosi khukhila omwami yesi yesi owabao ewe ne okhabao tawe. Ne se alibao okundi enyuma wowo oliba nabio nga ewe tawe.”
Nio Solomoni aarekukha aarura abuundu aesuta ebweeni we liiema lie kumuse e Kibeoni mala akobola e Yerusalemu. Amiia Isiraeli.
Solomoni aakhola efwesa ne esahabu biasala busa nga kamabaale mu Yerusalemu, ne kimirongooro kimitarakwa kiaba kimikali nga kimikhuyu kia Shefela.
Solomoni akula chifarasi khukhwama Misiri ne khukhwama Kue. Baboofuli bo mwami bachikula khukhwama Kue.
Bakula buli likaari lie liie khukhwama e Misiri khulwe bukusi bwe bitonyi bie efwesa chimia sita ne buli farasi khu bitonyi bie fwesa emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano. Khubirira khu boofuli bano kamakaari ke liie ne chifarasi biakusibwa khu baami boosi be Bahiti ne babaami be Bashamu.

Nono Solomoni aabisia khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwe khusaayilamo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhweyombakhila lichipi.
Aarobora babaandu chielefu kamakhumi saba basuta bisutwa, babaandu chielefu kamakhumi munaane babecha kamabaale mu bikulu ne babaandu chielefu chitaru ne chimia sita baba babemeelela.
Solomoni aruma burume khu mwami Hiramu owa Tiro ne aboola ali, “Njeete nga ne wayeeta paapa wase Daudi khulwe khumurumira kimirongooro kimitarakwa nio ombakhe lichipi liewe.
Ese ndi siimbi khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwe khusaayilamo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, mala nduaane khu niye khulwe khukhwosielamo bibiindu biiunya bulayi ebweeni wewe. Lundi khulachiililila khuaanilamo kumukaati kumutakatifu ebweeni wa Wele, ne khukhwosielamo biianwa bie khukhwosia buli kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba. Ne lundi ndaana Lukaangu mu ndaalo che Sabato ne kimieesi kimiya ne naikara chicharoborwa cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Lino lili lilaka khulwa Isiraeli mindali na mindali.
Enju niyo nenya khukhwombakha eliba emboofu sikila Wele wefwe ali omukali khukhila bawele babaandi boosi.
Ne kakhali se aliio onyala ombakhila Wele wefwe enju tawe. Akhaba mwikulu mwe mu ngaaki lukali se mumwola tawe. Nono ese ndi naanu nio mwombakhile enju? Ne akhali busa abuundu e khumwoseliao bibiindu biiunya bulayi?
Nono ndumire omundu owe bukesi bwe khukhola kimilimo kie esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa ne sichuuma; omanyile alala ne khukhola bibiindu bie buusi buufwaana buseemwa, bubesemu, ne bubuusu. Abe omanyile lundi khuandika khu mabaale. Eche aambaane ne bafundi baali nase mu Yuda ne mu Yerusalemu, nibo paapa wase aarobora.
Ndumire akhaba kimirongooro kimitarakwa, Saipurasi, kimitarakwa khukhwama Lebanoni, sikila emanyile ndi bakholi bowo bali bamanyile khurema kimirongooro e Lebanoni. Bakholi base balabayeeta.
Bakholi bano bandekekhere chimbao chingali, sikila enju niyo ndikho nja khukhwombakha echa khuba emboofu lundi eye khuukia.
Ndaelesia bakholi bowo barema kimirongooro, engaanu esie chindubi chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne eshayiri chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne chinyuungu che endali chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne kamafura ke kimiseituni chinyuungu chielefu kamakhumi kabili.”
Nio Hiramu omwami owa Tiro akobosia Solomoni mu barwa ali, “Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima babaandu bewe, akhukholile ewe obe omwami wabwe.”
Lundi Hiramu aboola ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli afume, owabuumba likulu ne liloba. Aelesia omwami Daudi omusoleeli omukesi oli ne bukesi ne limanya olombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Lukaangu lundi ombakhe lichipi liewe.
“Nono nakhurumiire omufundi oomanyile kimilimo lukali owe bukesi. Lisina liewe bali Huramu-abi.
Maawe ama mu baandu ba Dani, ne raraawe ama e Tiro. Huramu-abi ali omufundi ookhola bibiindu bie esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa, bichuuma, kamabaale ne chimbao. Ne lundi amanyile khukhola bibiindu bie buusi bufwaana buseemwa, bubuusi, bubesemu ne khunaba chingubo che bukusi bwe angaaki cha katani. Huramu-abi ali ne bukesi bwe khukhola akhaba bibeechwa, mala anyala akhola sifwani siosi siosi nisio aebwa khukhola. Alayeeta bafundi bowo ne bafundi bo mwami wase raraao Daudi.
Khwako omwami khurumire efwe engaanu, eshayiri, kamafura ne ndali nga waloma.
Efwe khularema kimirongooro nikio ewe wenya khukhwama Lebanoni. Khukhakhureerere ne kili kimiboe, khu nyanja khukhwola e Yopa, nio onyala wakibukula wakiyila Yerusalemu.”
Nio Solomoni abala baakwa boosi babamenyanga mu sibala sia Isiraeli. Libala lino liaba enyuma we libala lia raraawe Daudi. Babamo bakeni chielefu miamoja khamusini natatu ne chimia sita mu sibala.
Solomoni aarobora babaandu mu nibo chielefu kamakhumi saba basute bisutwa, ne babaandu chielefu kamakhumi munaane babeeche kamabaale mu sikulu. Ne lundi aelesia babaandu chielefu chitaru ne chimia sita mu nibo babe babemeelesi khu baandu bakhola kimilimo.

Solomoni aarakikha khukhwombakha Lukaangu khu mwesi kwa khabili kwe kumwiiko kukhola khane kwe khukhwamiia khwewe.
Ebino nibio bibiaba bipiimilo bia Solomoni bie khukhwombakha enju eya Wele. Buleeyi mu bipiimilo bikhale bwaba bikele kamakhumi sita ne bukhiikha bwaba bikele kamakhumi kabili.
Ne lusiro lwe khukhwingila mukari lwaba bikele buleeyi kamakhumi kabili, lulwaleekhaana ne bukhiikha bwe enju. Ne buleeyi bwalwo bwaba bikele emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili. Aalufuunikha ne esahabu endayi.
Aara chimbao cha Saipurasi khwisiisi lie mukari lie lusiro lubalaayi lwe Lukaangu mala achifuunikha ne esahabu enukhu. Aachora khwisiisi okhwo bifwaani bie kimirongooro kimikheendu ne kiminyololo.
Solomoni aarona Lukaangu ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Ne esahabu niyo arumikhira yama Paribaimu.
Nio aakha esahabu khu Lukaangu, ne khu mitalaachi, kamatooche, khwisiisi ne khu miliango mala aachonga chikerubi khu masiisi.
Busiro bwe kimisumari bwaba bitonyi kamakhumi karaano bie esahabu. Lundi aafuunikha esahabu musiro che khu korofa.
Bubalaayi bwe chindaa che chikerubi chombi bwaba bikele kamakhumi kabili. Lutaa lulala lwe ekerubi lulwaba bikele biraano lwetiila khu lisiisi lie Lukaangu ne lutaa luluundi lulwaba lwosi bikele biraano lwetiila khu lutaa lwe ekerubi ekiindi.
Ne lutaa lulala lwe ekerubi ekiindi yino, lwetiila khu lisiisi lubeka luluundi lwe Lukaangu, mala akhaba lwosi lwaba buleeyi bikele biraano. Lutaa luluundi lwe ekerubi eya khabili lwetiila khu lutaa lwe ekerubi eye khunyoa.
Chindaa che chikerubi chino chaba buleeyi bwe bikele kamakhumi kabili. Chikerubi chino chema chaloleelela e lusiro lubalaayi lwe Lukaangu.
Ebweeni we Lukaangu akhola chinjeko chibili chichaba bikele kamakhumi kataru no biraano khucha angaaki. Buli enjeko yabakho siukutwa khu ngaaki khwayo sie buleeyi bwe bikele biraano.
Akhola kiminyololo nga bibiuma mala aakira khu ngaaki khwe chinjeko. Akhola lundi bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga emia ndala mala akaambaasia ne kiminyololo.
Emisia chinjeko ebweeni we Lukaangu. Enjeko ndala emia lubeka lwe ebunafubo ne ekiindi yema ebunaswa. Enjeko eye ebunafubo akitiuukha ali Yabini ne eye ebunaswa akitiuukha ali Boasi.

Nio aakhola litangi lie kumukasa. Buleeyi bwe khucha asi liaba bikele biraano. Bubalaayi bwaba bikele ekhumi ne khubotookhelela khwaba bikele kamakhumi kataru. Litangi lino liaba liabotookhelela nga engara.
Asi walio biabao bifwaani bie chimuka bibiabotookhelela litangi. Bifwaani bie chimuka ebio biaba bikele kamakhumi kataru khubotookhelela litangi; mala biaba mu laini chibili. Abikhola bioosi khukhwama khu siindu silala ne litangi.
Litangi liarengekhwa khu mikoongo kie bifwaani bie chieeyi ekhumi ne chibili che kumukasa. Chitaru chaloleelela ebunaswa, chitaru chaloleelela mumbo, chitaru chaloleelela ebunafubo, ne chitaru chaloleelela ebukwe.
Lusike lwe litangi lwaba buboofu bwe lulwaala lulala. Lusike lwalio lwaba nga lusike lwe eseesi. Lwalolekhana nga simuli simulikha. Litangi liachamo kameechi embi chilita chielefu sitini.
Lundi akhola chinjelo che khusabilamo. Aara chiraano lubeka lwe ebunafubo ne chiraano ebunaswa. Mu chino basingilangamo biianwa bie khukhwosia. Ne litangi liaba lie basaayi khusabilamo.
Lundi akhola chimesa ekhumi mala achira mu Lukaangu. Aara chiraano lubeka lwe ebunafubo ne chiraano lubeka lwe ebunaswa. Ne abuumba bibuumba bie esahabu emia ndala.
Aakhola luuya lwe basaayi ne luuya luluundi lubalaayi. Akhola kimiliango khulwe luuya mala akifunikhakho kumukasa.
Aara litangi akari we lubeka lwe ebunafubo nende lwe ebukwe lwe Lukaangu.
Huramu-abi lundi akhola chinyuungu, chimbako ne bibuumba. Nio aamalila elala kumulimo kwewe kwoosi nikwo akholela omwami Solomoni mu Lukaangu lwa Wele.
Bino nibio aakhola: chinjeko chibili, bitumi bibili bibiafwaana nga bibuumba bibiaba khu ngaaki khwe chinjeko. Lundi aakhola chindiimba chibili chichafuunikha bibuumba bibili bie bitumi. Bitumi ebio biaba khu kangaaki khwe chinjeko.
Lundi aakhola bifwaani bie kamatuunda kamakomanga chimia chine khulwe chindiimba chibili. Buli lutimba lwaba ne chilaini chibili che kamatuunda kamakomanga.
Aakhola biteetwe mala aarakho chinjelo.
Aara litangi ne bifwaani bie chieeyi ekhumi ne chibili asi we litangi.
Huramu-abi akhola chinyuungu, chimbako ne chiuma ne bibiindu bioosi biloondekhana nabio. Akholela omwami Solomoni bibiindu bie kumukasa kumulayi khulwe nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami Solomoni abikholela mu mweyeeywe kwa Yoritani akari wa Sukoti ne Sereta.
Solomoni aakhola bibiindu bino bioosi, mu bukali nio busiro bwe kumukasa nikwo bakholela se bwamanyikha tawe.
Nio Solomoni akhola bibiindu bioosi bibiaba mu Lukaangu lwa Wele: Alutare eye esahabu, chimeesa che kumukaati kuaanwa khu Wele.
Biteetwe bie chitaa ne chitaa chabio bie esahabu yong'ene chiburukha mu lusiro lwe mukari lwe Abuundu Atakatifu.
Bifwaani bie bimuli, chitaa ne chimbani che esahabu yong'ene.
Kamakaasi kakhala chindaambi, bibuumba, bibwakuli bie bibiindu biiunya bulayi ne chinjo. Bioosi bino bibiakholwa khu sahabu yong'ene. Lundi aakhola chinjiki che Lukaangu khulwe kimiliango kie lusiro lwe Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, ne chinjiki che lusiro luboofu.

Baisiraeli boosi bebuusia ebweeni wo mwami Solomoni mu Naikara eye Bisali mu mweesi kwa saba.
Ne basaakhulu Baisiraeli boosi beecha mala Balawi babukula Lisanduku lie ndakaano.
Ne bareera Lisanduku lie ndakaano, liiema lie kumuse, ne bibiindu bitakatifu bioosi bibiaba mu Liiema. Basaayi ne Balawi nibo ba babisuta babireera.
Ne omwami Solomoni ne libuusiana lie Baisiraeli boosi, ba baaba ne babuusiisie ebweeni wewe, baba ebweeni we Lisanduku lie ndakaano. Nio baana embosio eye kamakheese kamakali lukali ne chikhaafu chingali chikhabalikha tawe.
Nio basaayi bareera Lisanduku lie ndakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi balingisia abuundu walio mu Lusiro lwe mukari lwe Lukaangu, Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, asi we chindaa che chikerubi.
Chikerubi chabalaaya chindaa chabwe angaaki we abuundu e Lisanduku lie ndakaano, nio chikerubi chakhola lulama khu ngaaki khwe Lisanduku lie endakaano ne kimirongooro kialio kie khusuta.
Ne kimirongooro kiaba kimileeyi lukali nio emusia wakio khwabonekha khukhwama Abuundu Atakatifu mu lusiro lwe mukari lwe Lukaangu. Ne kakhali se kiabonekha khukhwama enje tawe. Ne kisiilio khukhwola khu ndaalo yino.
Sisiindu se siaba mu Lisanduku lie ndakaano tawe, ne kakhali kamabaale kabili niko Musa araamo e Horebu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholela endakaano ne Baisiraeli, nga ne baba ne bama e Misiri.
Basaayi barura Abuundu Atakatifu. Basaayi boosi bababao baba betakaasile, ne se benana bubwaukhani bwe kimilimo kiabwe tawe.
Ne Balawi babemba chinyimbo boosi, Asafu, Hemani ne Yedutuni, basoleeli babwe, ne balebe babwe befwara chingubo cha katani. Baba ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu nyimbo, biilili ne kamatuungu. Bema lubeka lwe bukwe we alutare alala ne basaayi emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili, ba baaba bakhupi be chikhoombi.
“Sikila ali omulayi
sikila busiime bwewe buli bwa mindali.”
Enju, enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yechula lifuumbi.
Nio basaayi bakhilwa khukhwima bakhole kimilimo sikila lifuumbi. Sikila luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwechusia enju eya Wele.

Nio Solomoni aloma ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali,
alimenya mu lifuumbi lisiro.
Ese nakhwombakhiile ewe enju eye khuukia,
abuundu niio ewe onyala wamenya mindali na mindali.”
Nio omwami Solomoni ayukha mala abiita libuusiana lioosi lia Isiraeli chikhabi. Libuusiana lino lioosi liaba liemile.
Aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele owa Isiraeli okholile niko alaka paapa wase Daudi. Aboola ali,
‘Khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo nareereramo babaandu base, khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri, se narobora lukoba mu kholo cha Isiraeli choosi nimwo nombakha enju niio basaayila tawe. Ne se narobora omundu nga omwimeelesi owe babaandu base Isiraeli tawe.
Ne kakhali narobora Yerusalemu niio saayilwa, mala narobora Daudi amiie babaandu base Isiraeli.’ ”
Ne Solomoni achiililila ali, “Nono paapa wase Daudi enya khukhwombakha enju eye khusaayilamo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela paapa wase Daudi ali, ‘Wenya khu khunjombakhila enju mu lisina liase, lilienya liowo liaba lilayi.
Ne kakhaba kario ewe se olombakha enju yino tawe. Ne kakhali omusoleeli wowo, niye ewe okhasaale, niye okhombakhe enju mwisina liase.’
“Luno, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echusie niko alaka, sikila ese nemile mu bweyaangu bwa paapa wase Daudi. Nekhaale khu ndebe eye bubwami bwa Isiraeli, nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka. Ne nombakhe enju mwisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Ne mubwenomwo, narereemo Lisanduku lie ndakaano, nimwo endakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo akhola ne Baisiraeli.”
Nio Solomoni eema ebweeni wa alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ebweeni we libuusiana lioosi lia Isiraeli. Asuta kamakhono kewe mu ngaaki.
Solomoni aba akhola situumi sie kumukasa; siaba sialekhaana buleeyi ne bukhiikha, buleeyi bikele biraano ne bukhiikha bwosi bikele biraano. Ne khucha angaaki bwaba bifuba bitaru. Solomoni aasira khu luya mala asimakho. Nio asikama ebweeni we libuusiana lioosi lia Isiraeli mala asuta kamakhono kewe mu ngaaki.
Ne asaba ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, se aliio Wele nga ewe, mwikulu namwe khu sibala tawe. Se aliio oliindanga endakaano ne khukhwekesia busiime bwa mindali na mindali khu bakholi bowo bamenya ebweeni wowo ne kimiooyo kiabwe kioosi tawe.
Ewe wakhola niko walaka omukholi wowo Daudi, paapa wase. Ewe walomaloma ne kumunwa kwowo, mala ne kamaani kowo wakakholile endaalo eya luno.
Khwako luno, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, liinda lisuubisia liliindi nilio walaka omukholi wowo Daudi, paapa wase. Waloma oli, ‘Se alitambao omundu khukhwama munju yowo owikhala khu ndebe eye bubwami bwa Isiraeli tawe. Lino lilekholekha, baaba bali basoleeli bowo beyaya khu ngila yabwe khukeendela mu lilaka liase nga ewe ne wakeenda ebweeni wase.’
Khwako luno, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, lekha elomo yowo niyo ewe walomaloma khu mukholi wowo Daudi ebe erio.
Rekeeresia lisaba lio omukholi wowo ne lilieloocha liewe, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase. Rekeeresia liilila ne lisaba nilio omukholi wowo asaba ebweeni wowo.
Chimoni chowo chibona, kumuusi ne siilo, chibone enju yino niyo ewe warobora ebe eye khu khusaayilamo ewe. Ne rekeeresia lisaba nilio omukholi wowo asabila abuundu ano.
Rekeeresia lilieloocha lio mukholi wowo, ne lie babaandu bowo Isiraeli, nga ne basabila mu Lukaangu luno. Ee, ewe ulila ne oli mwikulu nimwo omenyile, mala nga ne oulila khubeele.
“Omundu ne akholela owasie kamamayaanu alikholwa echube, ebweeni we alutare mu Lukaangu luno.
Nio ulila ne oli mwikulu mala okhole, ne khukhalakila bakholi bowo. Khalakila niye kumusaango kukwolaana, khulwe khumuelesia niye omwene kumunaanio, ne babila omuluungi khulwe khumuruunga khuloondekhana ne buluungi bwewe.
“Babaandu bowo Baisiraeli balikhilwa ebweeni wo omusiku baaba ne bakholile bubwoni khwiwe. Ne baaba ne bakobola lundi bafukiilila lisina liowo mala basaba ne khukhwiloochela ewe mu Lukaangu muno,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu mala obabeele bubwoni bwabwe. Ne bakobosie lundi mu sibala nisio ewe wabaelesia nibo ne bakuuka babwe.
“Efula ekhalekhe khukwa, baaba ne bakhukholele ewe bubwoni. Ne baaba ne basaba ne baloleleele abuundu ano mala bafukiilila lisina liowo mala balekha bubwoni bwabwe, nga ewe ne olibaa kumunaanio,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu mala ababeele bubwoni bwe bakholi bowo, babaandu bowo ba Isiraeli. Bekesie chingila chindayi nicho bakhoyela khu keendamo, mala ofukiilile efula ekwe khu maloba niko ewe waelesia babaandu bowo nga kumukabwa.
“Biise bibiindi enjala eliba mu sibala namwe lufu namwe kumuumu namwe chisike, namwe chikhungu. Ne biise bibiindi nabio, basiku balibebwaakala mu lukoba lwabwe lwosi lwosi, namwe lulibao lufu, namwe bulwaale bwosi bwosi.
Butinyu buno ne bubechakho mala ne basaba lisaba liosi liosi ne lilieloocha lio omundu yesi yesi namwe ne babaandu bowo Isiraeli boosi ulila. Ne basaba, buli mundu ne amanyile buchuuni bwewe ne bubeeleli bwewe, mala ne asuta kamakhono kewe mu ngaaki mu Lukaangu luno,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu nimwo wamenya. Babeele, mala okholeele buli mulala, niye ewe omanyile kumwoyo kwewe, khuloondekhana ne chingila chewe. (Sikila ewe, ewe weng'ene omanyile kimiooyo kie babaandu).
Khola orio nio boole khukhuria ewe mala bakeende mu ngila chowo chindaalo choosi nicho bamenya mu sibala nisio ewe waelesia bakuuka befwe.
“Lundi omukeni okhali owe babaandu bowo Baisiraeli tawe, aliicha khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi sikila lisina liowo lili liboofu ne bunyali bwowo, bukali ne buaani bwowo bukali. Ne aliicha asabile mu Lukaangu muno,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu nimwo wamenya. Ne kholela omukeni oyo koosi khuloondekhana nende niko akhusaba. Nio babaandu be mu sibala boosi boole khumanya lisina liowo mala bakhurie, nga babaandu bowo Baisiraeli ne bakholanga. Nio buli mundu alimanya Lukaangu nilwo ese nombaakhe luno, ali luli lwe khukhusaayilamo ewe.
“Babaandu bowo barirura khucha mwiie khu khuupana ne basiku babwe, mu ngila yosi yosi niyo ewe okhabarumiremo. Ne basaba ewe ne baloleleele lukoba nilwo ewe warobora luno, ne Lukaangu nilwo ese nombakhe khukhwisaayilamo ewe,
ulila khukhwama mwikulu lisaba liabwe ne lilieloocha liabwe mala obaelesie bukhili.
“Baba ne bakhola bubwoni (Sikila se aliio omundu okhakholanga bubwoni tawe) Ne ewe olibakhalalila mala abaane khu musiku, babukulwe nga baboe babayile mu sibala sie aleeyi namwe aembi.
Ne kakhali balibaasia mu mwoyo ne bali mu sibala nisio bayilwamo nga baboe mala bebiiye. Balikhwikoonjelela ne bali mu sibala sie embaambe siabwe bali, ‘Efwe khwakholile bumayaanu. Khwakholile ke sifwaabi ne bumayaanu.’
Lundi baba ne bekanila ne kamebaasio kabwe koosi ne kumwoyo kwabwe kwoosi ne bali mu sibala sie embaambe siabwe nimwo bayilwa nga baboe. Balisaba ne baloleleele sibala siabwe, nisio ewe waelesia bakuuka babwe, lukoba nilwo ewe warobora ne nju niyo ese nombakhe khulwe lisina liowo.
Nio baulile khukhwama mwikulu abuundu a bumenyo bwowo. Ulila lisaba liabwe ne lilieloocha liabwe. Bayeete mala obeele babaandu bowo bakhukholeele ewe bubwoni.
“Nono, Ee, Wele wase, lekha chimoni chowo chibone ne kamaru kowo karekeeresie lisaba lie abuundu ano.
mala oche abuundu wowo we khuola,
ewe ne Lisanduku lie ndakaano eye bunyali bwowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha basaayi bowo banyoole buonia,
lekha batakatifu bowo bekhoyele bulayi bwowo.
Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhaloba omuchukhekho kamafura wowo tawe!
Khebulila busiime bwowo bwa mindali na mindali,
khulwo mukholi wowo Daudi.”

Basaayi se banyala khukhwingila munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, sikila luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwechulamo.
Nga Baisiraeli boosi babona kumulilo ne kwikha asi ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Lukaangu, benama bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila khu liloba khu luya mala basaaya. Lundi basiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baboola bali,
“Sikila ali omulayi,
ne busiime bwewe buchiililila mindali na mindali.”
Nio omwami Solomoni ne babaandu boosi baana chimbosio ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami Solomoni aana nga embosio, chikhaafu chielefu ishirini na mbili ne kamakheese chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili. Nio omwami ne babaandu boosi baara enju eya Wele mu wakifu.
Basaayi bema mu bweyaangu bwabwe ne Balawi bosi mu bwabwe. Bema ne binaanda bie kimienya nibio omwami Daudi aaba ne akholile khulwe khusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Daudi abirumikhiranga khusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma ali, “Busiime bwewe buchiililila buli bwa mindali na mindali.” Buli lwosi nga Daudi ne aananga efuma khubirira mu milimo kie Balawi, basaayi nibo baba baloleelelananga ne Balawi lubeka luluundi, baapa chikhoombi mala Baisiraeli boosi benyokhanga ne bema.
Nio Solomoni aara mu wakifu, akari we luuya lulwaba ebweeni we enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila abwenao aanilao biianwa bie khukhwosia ne kiminawa kie biianwa bie kumuleembe. Aakhola ario sikila alutare eye kumukasa niyo Solomoni aaba akhola, se yaba yolakho embosio eye khukhwosia ne biianwa bie biakhulia ne kiminawa tawe.
Solomoni ne Baisiraeli boosi bakhola Naikara eye Bisali khu ndaalo saba. Baisiraeli baba libuusiana likali, khukhwama ebwingililo bwa Hamati khukhwola khu kheechi kha Misiri.
Baaba ne naikara eye khura alutare mu wakifu khu Wele khu ndaalo saba. Ne naikara bakikhola lundi khu ndaalo saba. Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane, baba ne kumuse.
Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chitaru eye kumwesi kwa saba, omwami Solomoni asibula babaandu bache chingo chabwe. Bacha mu khoyo ne busangaafu sikila bulayi nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne okesie khu Daudi ne khu Solomoni ne khu baandu bewe Isiraeli.
Nio omwami Solomoni amala enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lichipi liewe. Koosi niko Solomoni aaba ne arekekhe khukhola munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne munju yewe omwene abimala bulayi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Solomoni mu silo mala amuboolela ali, “Nauliile lisaba liowo mala neroboreere abuundu ano nga enju eye khuanilao chimbosio.
Ne khiingilila efula ekhakwa tawe, namwe chisike chibwaakale sibala namwe ndume lufu mu baandu base.
Kaaba bali babaandu base balaangwa mu lisina liase, beboombia babeene, ne khusaba, mala bambenje, ne khulekha chingila chabwe che bumayaanu khaulile khukhwama mwikulu. Khababeele bumayaanu bwabwe ne khuonia sibala siabwe.
Luno chimoni chase chilamoka mala kamaru kase kalarekeeresia lisaba lilaba mu Lukaangu muno.
Sikila luno ese naroboore ne khura alubeka Lukaangu luno lube abuundu e khukhusaaya khulwa mindali na mindali. Chimoni chase ne kumwoyo kwase bilabamo siise sioosi.
Ne ewe kholele bulayi bwene nga raraao Daudi ne akholela. Khola khuloondekhana nende koosi niko ese khulakile ne khuloonda kamalaka kase.
Wakhola orio ese ndaandalasia endebe yowo eye bubwami nga nalaka raraao Daudi. Naba naboola ndi, ‘Omundu se alitambao khukhwama khwiwe owamiia Isiraeli tawe.’
“Ne ewe waaba ne waukha mala wanjukha kamalaka kase niko khuelesie, ne wacha wakholela wele babaandi ne khubasaaya,
ese ndamurusia enywe mu sibala nisio namuelesia enywe. Ne ndirusiao enju yino niyo ese nara alubeka khulwe khukhusaaya. Ndikikhola lusimo mala lube lwe khuchekhelelwa ne babaandu boosi.
“Ne enju eye lukoosi lukali luno, buli mundu olakibirao aliuka mala aboole ali, ‘Siina sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne akhola ario khu sibala sino, ne khu nju khulwe?’
Nio baliboola bali, ‘Sikila banjukha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe owabarusia abareera khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri, mala batiilile bawele babaandi ne khubasaaya ne khubakholela. Khwako Wele abareereere butinyu buno bwoosi.’ ”

Liabukula Solomoni kimiiko kamakhumi kabili khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne enju yewe omwene.
Enyuma wako Solomoni ombakha lundi chingoba nicho Huramu aaba namueleesie, mala aramo Baisiraeli bachimenyamo.
Solomoni aamba lukoba lwa Hamatisoba.
Ombakha lukoba lwa Tadimori mu sichiimi, alala ne chingoba choosi che khubungamo nicho ombakha mu Hamati.
Lundi ombakha lukoba lwa Beti-horoni, lwe ngaaki ne lwa Mwalo, chichaba chingoba che kamasiisi, bilibwa ne bibia.
Ombakha lundi Baalati, ne chingoba choosi che khubungamo nicho Solomoni aaba ne nacho, ne chingoba choosi che kamakaari kewe ke liie, ne chingoba che chifarasi chewe, ne siosi siosi nisio Solomoni ekoomba khukhwombakha mu Yerusalemu, mu Lebanoni ne mu sibala sioosi nisio amiianga.
Solomoni akhola Bahiti boosi, Baamori, Baperisi, Bahibi ne Bayebusi, babarama bakhaba Baisiraeli tawe, bakhola kimilimo kie khuyingilila.
Elio liaba lisaaye liabwe liliarama enyuma wabwe mu sibala, nilio Baisiraeli bakhera tawe, khuba nasioobi. Bakhola kimilimo kimiyingilila khukhwola khu ndaalo yino.
Ne kakhali Solomoni se akhola Baisiraeli baba nasioobi khu milimo kiewe tawe. Baba banamae, banamae bakhulu, babemeelesi be kamakaari kewe ke liie, ne babaandu bewe batimia chifarasi.
Ne omwami Solomoni aaba ne babemeelesi bakhulu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, ba baaba ne bunyali khu baandu.
Solomoni aarusia omukhaana owa Farao khukhwama mu Lukoba lwa Daudi amuyila munju niyo aaba ne amwombakhiile. Aaloma ali, “Omukhasi wase se alamenya munju mwa Daudi, omwami owa Isiraeli tawe, sikila abuundu niio Lisanduku lie ndakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liamile ali atakatifu.”
Nio Solomoni aana biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo aaba ne ombakhe ebweeni we Lukaangu.
Akhola ario nga kimilimo kia buli ndaalo ne kienyekha. Aana khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Musa khulwe chisabato, kimieesi kimiya ne chinaikara chitaru che kumwiiko. Chinaikara chino chaba che kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, Naikara eye Likesa, ne Naikara eye Bisali.
Khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia raraawe Daudi, Solomoni arobora bipupu bie basaayi khulwe kimilimo kiabwe. Lundi arobora bipupu bie Balawi khulwe kimilimo kiabwe kie khufumia ne kimilimo kikiindi ebweeni we basaayi, nga kimilimo kia buli ndaalo ne kienyekha. Ne arobora baliindi be bilibwa mu bipupu khuliinda bilibwa. Solomoni akhola ario khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Daudi omundu owa Wele.
Ne se baukhakho khukhwama khu niko Omwami aba ne alaka basaayi ne Balawi, khulwe sisiindu siosi siosi ne khulwe kamabiikhilo tawe.
Khwako kimilimo kioosi nikio Solomoni akhola kiawa khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwombakhilwa khukhwola nga lwawa. Nio Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwawa.
Nio Solomoni acha e Esioni-geberi ne e Eloti khu sikiingi sie enyanja mu sibala sia Edomu.
Ne Huramu arumira Solomoni chimeeli chichemeelelwa ne bakholi ba Huramu. Bakholi bano babamanya enyanja bulayi bacha mu sibala sia Ofiri alala ne bakholi ba Solomoni. Barerera omwami Solomoni khukhwama ebweeneyo, esahabu bitonyi chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano.

Ne Solomoni amukobosia kamareeba kewe koosi. Se siabao sisiindu siosi siosi silume khu Solomoni sisiamukhaya khumwinooselia tawe.
Kwini owa Sheba abona bukesi bwa Solomoni, ne lichipi nilio aba ne ombaakhe,
biakhulia bie khu sialwa sia Solomoni, bubwikhalo bwe bakholi bewe bakhulu, kimilimo kie bakholi bewe chingubo nicho bafwara, bakholi babareeranga biakhulia bio mwami, ne chingubo chabwe ne chimbosio che khukhwosia nicho aanila mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bino bioosi biakhola Kwini owa Sheba arangararwa.
Aaboolela Omwami Solomoni ali, “Niko naulila mu sibala siase khu makhuwa kowo ne khu bukesi bwowo kali ng'ali.
Ne kakhali se nafukiilila niko naulila tawe khukhwola nga ne nichile mala samwene nakabona. Ne se naulilakho akhaba sitonyi sie bukesi bwowo, ne buiinda bwowo buli bukali tawe. Ewe okhila niko naulila.
Babaandu bowo bali ne busangaafu bukali! Ne bakholi bowo bali ne busangaafu bakali bakhukholelanga ewe ne baulila ke bukesi bwowo!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo afume osiimisiibwe ne nawe ne khukhura ewe khu ndebe eye bubwami bwewe, nga omwami Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi wowo. Sikila Wele wowo asiima Isiraeli ne akhabayeete khulwa mindali. Akhukholile ewe Omwami khu nibo nio okhole ka ng'ali ne buluungi.”
Nio Kwini oyo aelesia omwami Solomoni esahabu bitonyi emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili, ne bing'ayilisia bulayi bikali, ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Solomoni se anyoolakho lundi bing'ayilisia bulayi bikali nga nibio Kwini owa Sheba amuelesia tawe.
