(Khutasa khwako bakholi ba Huramu ne bakholi ba Solomoni bareera esahabu khukhwama e Ofiri, ne kimirongooro kimitaare ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki.
Solomoni arumikhira kimirongooro ekio khukhola biteechi bie Lukaangu ne lichipi. Ne lundi akirumikhira khukhola biilili ne kamatuungu ke babeembi be kimienya. Kimitaare nga ekio kirio kiaba kiakhabonekhakho mu sibala sia Yuda tawe.)
Omwami Solomoni aelesia Kwini owa Sheba bioosi nibio eenya. Aamua buli nisio aasaba mala biakhilakho nibio Kwini owa Sheba areera. Nio aakalukha mu sibala siewe ne bakholi bewe.
Nio omwami Solomoni anyoola buli mwiiko esahabu bitonyi chimia sita ne kamakhumi sita ne sita.
Khutasa khu sahabu yino yatuba khu eyo niyo baboofuli, ne baboofuli bakeendakeenda, ne busuuru nibwo babaami be sibala sia Arebia baruunga ne babemeelesi be sibala.
Solomoni aakhola chingabo chimbalaayi chimia chibili khukhwama khu sahabu. Buli engabo yakholwa khu shekeli che sahabu chimia sita.
Lundi aakhola chingabo chichiindi chimia chitaru ne buli ngabo yaba yabukula chishekeli che sahabu chimia chitaru. Solomoni aara bibiindu ebio mwichipi lie mu musiru kwa Lebanoni.
Omwami oyo lundi akhola endebe emboofu eye bubwami eye kumusaanga mala akifuumakho esahabu yong'ene.
Endebe eye bubwami yaba ne bituumi sita bie khuniinilakho ne situma sie esahabu sie khukhwikhalakho. Buli lubeka lwe endebe lwabakho kamakhono kabili ke khuolelakho. Ne bifwaani bie chitalang'i bibili biema a makhono chana ako.
Bifwaani bie chitalang'i ekhumi ne bibili biema, buli bibili lubeka ne lubeka ekhumaliilikha khwe bituumi, khu bituumi sita. Endebe nga yino eri se yakholwakho mu bwami bwosi bwosi tawe.
Bikoombe bia Solomoni bioosi bie khunywelamo biaba bie esahabu. Ne bibiindu bioosi bie mu lichipi lie kumusiru kwa Lebanoni biaba bie esahabu yong'ene. Mbao sisiaba sie efwesa tawe. Sikila efwesa se yabalwa khuba eye bukhala bwosi bwosi mu ndaalo cha Solomoni tawe.
Chimeeli cho mwami chachichanga ne bakholi ba Hiramu. Chachichanga buli enyuma we kimiiko kitaru e Tarishishi. Chareeranga esahabu, efwesa, kimisaanga, chimbuyusi nende chinyuni tausi.
Nono omwami Solomoni aba omuiinda lundi omukesi khukhila omwami okundi yesi yesi owe khu sibala.
Ne babaami boosi be khu sibala benyanga khukhwicha babone Solomoni mala barekeeresie bukesi nibwo Wele amua.
Buli mulala owecha amureerera siianwa, biianwa bino biaba bie efwesa ne esahabu, chingubo, emiri, bing'ayilisianga bulayi, chifarasi ne chinyumbu. Bino biechanga buli mwiiko.
Solomoni aaba ne kamataala ke chifarasi chielefu chine ne kamakaari ke liie. Aaba ne babaandu batimia chifarasi chielefu ekhumi na chibili. Batimia chifarasi balala aabara mu ngoba che kamakaari ke liie, ne babaandi mu Yerusalemu niio aaba.
Ne Solomoni amiia khu baami boosi khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati khukhwola khu sibala sie Bafilisiti ne khu lwakha lwa Misiri.
Ne omwami akhola efwesa yaba esala busa buli abuundu mu Yerusalemu nga kamabaale. Ne chimbao che kumutarakwa chaba chingali busa nga kimikhuyu kie e Shefela.
Bakulila Solomoni chifarasi khukhwama e Misiri ne khukhwama mu bibala bibiindi bioosi.
Bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Solomoni khukhwama khu sie khunyoa khukhwola khu simaliilisi, biaandikwa mu Lukano lwo mung'oosi Nasani ne mu bung'oosi bwa Ahiya Omushilo. Ne lundi biaandikwa mu buloli bwa Ito, owaba ne buloli khuloondekhana ne bubwami bwa Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati.
Solomoni amiia khukhwama mu Yerusalemu khu Isiraeli yoosi khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane.
Nio Solomoni afwa, asiikhwa mu Lukoba lwa Daudi raraawe. Ne Rehoboamu omusoleeli wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Rehoboamu aacha e Shekemu, niio babaandu boosi ba Isiraeli baba ne babuusiisie khu mwamiia.
Ne nga Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati aulila (aaba amulila e Misiri, khukhwilukha omwami Solomoni) kamakhuwa kano, aakobola khukhwama e Misiri.
Babaandu bamulaanga; ne Yeroboamu ne Baisiraeli boosi alala bacha khu Rehoboamu. Baboolela Rehoboamu bali,
“Raraao Solomoni akhukhosia efwe kimilimo kimiaandalafu. Nono yanguya busiro bwe kimilimo kia raraao ne efwe khulaba bakholi bowo.”
Abakobosia ali, “Kobola enyuma we chindaalo chitaru.” Khwako babaandu barekukha.
Nio omwami Rehoboamu areeba basaakhulu ba baaba bakeleki ba raraawe Solomoni ali, “Enywe mungelekela ngobosie babaandu bano ndiena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Wekesia kumwoyo kumulayi khu baandu mala obasiimisie, lundi obaboolele kamakhuwa kamalayi, bakhabe bakholi bowo buli lwosi.”
Ne kakhali Rehoboamu alekelesia likeleka lie basaakhulu, mala aacha khu baele eselukho yewe, mala ba baba bakeleki bewe biise ebio.
Abareeba ali, “Enywe mungelekela khukobosie khuriena babaandu babandeebire bali mbanguisilie busiro bwabwe nibwo paapa wase abarakho?”
Baele abo bamukobosia bali, “lino nilio olaboolela babaandu bano: ‘Lulwala lwase lwasobi luli luboofu khukhila munda mwa paapa owase.
Paapa owase amutiuukha busiro bukali, ese ndamutasa busiro khukhilakho. Amupila kimikhomwa, ne ese nja khumupila siboko sie fubu.’ ”
Khwako Yeroboamu ne babaandu boosi bakobola khu mwami Rehoboamu endaalo ekhola khataru nga ne abalaka.
Omwami akobosia babaandu ne burafu bukali. Alekelesia likeleka lie basaakhulu nilio bamuboolela.
Aaboolela babaandu khuloondekhana ne likeleka lie baele. Aloma ali, “Paapa owase amutiuukha busiro ne ese ndabutasa khukhilakho. Amupila kimikhomwa, ne ese nja khumupila siboko sie fubu.”
Omwami se arekeeresia babaandu tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owakhola kaba kario nio echusie likhuwa liewe nilio aloma khubirira khu Ahiya omushilo khu Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati.
“Efwe khuli na mukabwa siina munju eya Daudi?
Se khuli ne kumukabwa mu okhwa Chesi tawe.
Kobola mu maeema kenywe, ee Isiraeli!
Liinda enju yowo wamwene Daudi.”
Nio Baisiraeli bakobola mu maeema kabwe.
Ne kakhali Rehoboamu amiia khu baandu Baisiraeli ba baamenya mu ngoba cha Yuda.
Nio Omwami Rehoboamu aruma Hadoramu, owaba omwimeelesi owe kimilimo kie khuyingililwa, khucha khu Baisiraeli. Ne Baisiraeli bamupa kamabaale bamwiira. Ne Rehoboamu akhola khangu aniina mu likaari liewe lie liie mala elukha acha e Yerusalemu.
Khukhwamila khu siise esio, Baisiraeli balobela elala enju eya Daudi khukhwola luno.

Nga Rehoboamu ne ola mu Yerusalemu, alaanga alala babaandu boosi ba Yuda ne ekholo eya Benjamini. Baba babaandu chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane, banamae barobore khukhupana ne Baisiraeli. Benya khukhupana bakobosie bubwami khu Rehoboamu.
Ne kakhali elomo eya Wele yecha khu mung'oosi Shemaya eli,
“Boolela Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni, omwami owa Yuda ne Baisiraeli boosi bali mu Yuda ne mu Benjamini kano:
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, se okhoya wacha wapana ne balebe bowo tawe. Buli mundu akobole engo wewe. Sikila likhuwa lino liamile khwise.’ ” Nio boosi baria elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bakobola engo. Ne se bacha bapana ne Yeroboamu tawe.
Rehoboamu amenya mu Yerusalemu mala ombakha chingoba che khukhweliinda busiku mu Yuda.
Ombakha Betelehemu, Etamu, Tekoa,
Beti-suri, Soko, Atulamu,
Katihi, Maresha, Sifu,
Atoraimu, Lakishi, Aseka,
Sora, Aiyaloni ne Heburoni. Chingoba chino chichakarwa ne lisiisi; chili mu Yuda ne Benjamini.
Aakhola buliindi bwe chingoba bwaba bwe kamaani mala aaramo banamae bakhulu. Aramo ne chinju che siakhulia, kamafura ne endali.
Ne aara chingabo ne kamafumo mu ngoba choosi, mala aachikhola chaba che kamaani. Nio chikholo cha Yuda ne Benjamini charama asi we bunyali bwewe.
Ne basaayi ne Balawi ba baaba mu Isiraeli mwoosi becha baba lubeka lwa Rehoboamu.
Balawi banjukha kamayilwe kabwe ne kimiaandu mala becha mu Yuda ne Yerusalemu sikila Yeroboamu ne basoleeli bewe babakhiingilila khukhola kimilimo kiabwe nga basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Yeroboamu arobora basaayi babeewe omwene khulwe abuundu aesuta, ne bifwaani bie chimbusi ne chikhaafu nibio omwene akhola.
Ne abo ba baaba ne kimiooyo kie khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, babaloonda khu Basaayi ne Balawi, khukhwama mu kholo choosi che Baisiraeli. Becha Yerusalemu khuana embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.
Baakhola bubwami bwa Yuda bwaba bwe kamaani, ne khulwe kimiiko kitaru bayeeta Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni aaba ne buliindi bulayi, sikila khulwe kimiiko kitaru bamenya nga yaba ne bamenya asi owa Daudi ne Solomoni.
Rehoboamu aareera omukhasi bali Mahalati omwichukhulu owa Daudi omukhaana owa Yeremoti. Maayi owa Mahalati aba Abihaili omukhaana owa Eliabu okhwa Chesi.
Ne asaalila Rehoboamu basoleeli bataru: Yeushi, Shemaria ne Sahamu.
Enyuma wa Mahalati areera Maaka omukhaana owa Abusolomu. Maaka amusaalila Abicha, Atai, Sisa ne Shelomiti.
Rehoboamu asiima Maaka omukhaana owa Abusolomu khukhila bakhasi bewe boosi ne bakhasi bewe nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale. Akhwa bakhasi ekhumi ne munaane, ne nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale baba kamakhumi sita. Aaba ne basoleeli kamakhumi kabili na munaane ne bakhaana kamakhumi sita.
Ne Rehoboamu arobora Abicha omusoleeli owa Maaka aba omwimeelesi omukhulu mu bawandaaye; sikila ebaasia khumwamiia abe omwami.
Ne Rehoboamu aakhola mu bukesi, ayila balala khu basoleeli bewe khu milimo mu birekere bia Yuda bioosi ne sia Benjamini, mu ngoba che kamasiisi. Abaelesia kimiaandu kimikali mala abakhwela bakhasi bakali.

Nga khukhwamiia khwa Rehoboamu nga khwaandalala mala kwaba ne kamaani, aanjukha lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi; niye ne Baisiraeli boosi.
Shishaki, omwami owa Misiri echa khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu, sikila Rehoboamu ne Isiraeli se baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Shishaki eecha mu mwiiko kukhola kharaano kwe bubwami bwa Rehoboamu.
Eecha ne kamakaari ke liie eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne banamae batimia chifarasi chielefu kamakhumi sita. Ne babaandu nibo eecha ne nabo khukhwama Misiri baba se babalikha tawe. Baba khukhwama Libia, Basukimu ne Baesopia.
Ne Shishaki aamba chingoba chisire cha Yuda mala eecha ola Yerusalemu.
Nio Omung'oosi Shemaya eecha khu Rehoboamu ne khu bemeelesi ba Yuda ba baaba ne babuusiisie e Yerusalemu. Baba babuusiisie sikila Shishaki. Shemaya ababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, ‘Enywe mwanjanjukha nio ese namulekhile mu makhono ka Shishaki.’ ”
Nio babemeelesi be Baisiraeli ne omwami wabwe beboombia mala baboola bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuluungi.”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne abona ali beboombiisie, aboolela Shemaya ali, “Beboombiisie. Se ndabonaka tawe. Ndabaelesiakho buonia butiiti buri. Ne burafu bwase se bulapwomookha khu Yerusalemu khubirira khu Shishaki tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario, balaba bakholi bewe, nio boole khumanya bubwabukhani bwe khu khukholela ese ne khukholela bubwami bwe bibala bibiindi.”
Ne Omwami Rehoboamu akhola chingabo che kumukasa mu bweyaangu bwe echo mala achielesia banamae bakhulu baliindi babaliinda kumuliango kwe enju eyo mwami.
Buli lwoosi nga omwami achichanga mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, banamae baliindi bechanga babukula chingabo echo bacha nacho mala bachikobosia mu lusiro lwe buliindi.
Ne sikila omwami eboombia, burafu bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwawa, nio khubabunia elala tawe, ne limenya liaba lilayi mu Yuda.
Nio omwami Rehoboamu aandalasia bubwami bwewe mu Yerusalemu mala amiia. Rehoboamu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane na mulala nga ne arakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko ekhumi na saba ne ali mu Yerusalemu. Lukoba olwo lwaba nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora mu kholo che Baisiraeli choosi khuba abuundu e khusaayilao. Lisina lia maawe liaba Nahama Omuamoni.
Mala akhola bumayaanu, sikila mu mwoyo kwewe se aenja Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Nono bikholwa bia Rehoboamu khukhwama mu khunyoa khukhwola ematabusia biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano cho omung'oosi Shemaya ne Ito owe kamalola. Liabao liie liliachiililila busa akari wa Rehoboamu ne Yeroboamu.
Rehoboamu aafwa mala asiikhwa mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Abicha omusoleeli wewe amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Mu mwiiko kwe ekhumi na munaane kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Yeroboamu Abicha aarakikha khukhwamiia khu Yuda.
Amiia kimiiko kitaru mu Yerusalemu. Maayi wewe aaba bali Mikaya omukhaana owa Urieli khukhwama Kibea.
Nono liabao liie akari wa Abicha ne Yeroboamu.
Abicha arura aacha mwiie ne ali ne banamae barobore barana chielefu chimia chine ne Yeroboamu eecha ne banamae chielefu chimia munaane barana be kamaani.
Nio Abicha eema khu Sikulu sie Semaraimu, sili mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu mala aboola ali, “Ndekeeresie, Ee, Yeroboamu ne Baisiraeli mweesi!
Enywe se mumanyile muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aelesia Daudi ne basoleeli bewe bubwami khu Isiraeli bwa mindali khulwe ndakaano eye chumbe tawe ku?
Ne kakhali Yeroboamu okhwa Nebati, omukholi owa Solomoni okhwa Daudi, enyokha mala aloba ko mwami wewe.
Ne abuusia babaandu balala be sipoli busa mala bakhola sileka khu Rehoboamu okhwa Solomoni. Rehoboamu aaba asili omwana, ne se aaba ne limanya lie khubakhiingilila tawe.
Ne luno mwibaasia khukhiingilila bubwami bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli mu bunyali bwe basoleeli ba Daudi. Mulikho mukhola murio sikila muli ne banamae bakali lukali ne oli ne bifwaani bie chimoosi bie esahabu nibio Yeroboamu amukholela bibe wele benywe.
Enywe se mwaoona basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bakhwa Aruni ne Balawi mala mwakholile basaayi babenywe nga babaandu be bibala bibiindi? Yesi yesi owicha khu khwekwalaasia ne euunwa endiiti namwe ne kamamiiku saba aba omusaayi owe ebio biikhali wele tawe.
Ne khwifwe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele wefwe. Efwe se khwamwanjukha tawe. Efwe khuli ne basaayi bakholelanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kimilimo, bakhwa Aruni ne Balawi khulwe kimilimo kiabwe.
Baananga khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba biianwa bie khukhwosia ne bimuli biiunya kumuya kulayi. Barechenga kumukaati kwe siianwa khu mesa eye esahabu yong'ene. Lundi baliinda biteetwe bie esahabu nio chitaa chabwe chole khuburukha buli ekolooba. Khukholanga khurio sikila efwe khuliindanga niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe akhulaka khukhole ne enywe mwamwanjukha.
Lola, Wele ali ne nafwe akhuraangirire, ne basaayi bewe bali ne chikhoombi che liie khukhupa khulwe khulaangilila liie khwinywe. Ee, baana ba Isiraeli, enywe mukhapana ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bakuuka benywe tawe. Se munyala mwaula tawe.”
Yeroboamu aba arumire banamae babebuulile khukhwama enyuma. Nono banamae bewe baba ebweeni wa Yuda ne babaandi bebuulile khukhwama enyuma.
Ne nga Bayuda balola, liie liaba ebweeni wabwe ne enyuma mala balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne basaayi baapa chikhoombi.
Nio Bayuda bayokela liyoka lie liie. Ne nga Bayuda bayokela, Wele akhila Yeroboamu ne Baisiraeli boosi ba baba ebweeni wa Abicha, ne Bayuda.
Baisiraeli belukha Bayuda mala Wele aara Baisiraeli mu bunyali bwe Bayuda.
Abicha ne babaandu bewe beera babaandu bakali. Nono Baisiraeli bafwa babaandu chielefu chimia chiraano barobore.
Khwako Baisiraeli bakhilwa mu siise esio mala Bayuda babakhila lukali, sikila beyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.
Ne Abicha atimania Yeroboamu mala amubukulakho chingoba cha Beteli ne birekere bialwo ne Yeshana ne birekere bialwo ne Efroni ne birekere bialwo.
Yeroboamu se anyoola lundi kamaani mu ndaalo cha Abicha tawe, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amupa afwa.
Ne kakhali Abicha anyoola kamaani. Ne akhwa bakhasi ekhumi ne bane mala aba ne basoleeli kamakhumi kabili ne babili ne bakhaana ekhumi na sita.
Bikholwa bia Abicha bibiindi bioosi, limenya liewe ne kiminayi kiewe biaandikwa mu lukano lwo mung'oosi Ido.

Nono Abicha aafwa mala bamusiikha mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Omusoleeli wewe Asa aamiia mu bweyaangu bwewe. Mu ndaalo cha Asa sibala siaba ne kumuleembe khulwe kimiiko ekhumi.
Asa aakhola kamalayi ne kamaluungi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe.
Arusiao alutare chingeni ne abuundu aesuta khutechula chinjeko, mala atonya sifwaani sia wele Asiera.
Ne alaka Bayuda basaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe mala balinde kamalaka.
Lundi aarusiao mu ngoba choosi cha Yuda abuundu aesuta ne alutare bie khukhwosielakho biiunya bulayi. Nio bubwami bwaba ne kumuleembe asi wewe.
Ombakha chingoba chisire mu Yuda, sikila sibala siaba ne kumuleembe. Liie se liabakhoo mu miiko ekio tawe, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesia kumuleembe.
Asa aboolela Bayuda ali, “Khwombakhe chingoba chino mala khuchibotookhelesie ne kamasiisi, chindeleelwa, bilibwa ne bibia. Sibala sisiili busa sisiefwe sikila efwe khusaayile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Khwamusaayile mala akhuelesie efwe kumuleembe chimbeka choosi.” Khwako bombakha mala baindiaala.
Ne Asa aaba ne banamae chielefu chimia chitaru khukhwama mu Yuda babanula chingabo chimbalaayi ne kamafumo. Ne banamae chielefu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi munaane khukhwama mu Benjamini bakangila chingabo ne buyiingo. Abano boosi baba ne kamaani mu khuupana.
Omuesopia bali Sera echa khukhwibwaakala Bayuda ne banamae emilioni ndala ne kamakaari ke liie chimia chitaru. Echa ola e Maresha.
Ne Asa arura khucha amwakaanane mala bema berekekha khukhupana liie mwitooma lia Sefata e Maresha.
Asa aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe ali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se aliio nga ewe oyeeta omutekhele aapane nende owe kamaani tawe. Khuyeete efwe, Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, sikila khwakhweyikina ewe. Ne mwisina liowo khwechile khu khuupana ne lituuli lino. Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli Wele wefwe; omundu yesi yesi akhakhuulakho ewe tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola Asa ne Bayuda baula Baesopia, mala Baesopia belukha.
Asa ne banamae nibo aaba nabo ba batimania khukhwola e Kerari mala Baesopia baafwa boosi sio, sikila baulwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne banamae bewe. Bayuda bayaaya kimiaandu kimikali bacha nakio.
Ne baapa chingoba choosi chichabotookhelesia Kerari, sikila babaandu be mu ngoba echo baaba ne buuri khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bayuda babukula chingoba sikila kiabamo kimiaandu kimikali.
Baapa kamaeema kabo ba baaba ne chikhaafu mala babukula kamakheese kamakali ne chingamia. Nio bakobola e Yerusalemu.

Roho owa Wele eecha khu Asaria okhwa Oteti
Oteti arura aacha khukhwakaanana ne Asa mala amuboolela ali, “Ndekeeresie Asa ne Bayuda ne Babenjamini mweesi: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nanywe, enywe ne muli naye. Mwaba ne mumuyiima mulamunyoola. Ne mwaba ne mumwanjukha alamwanjukha.
Khulwe siise sileeyi, Isiraeli se yaba ne Wele owa ng'ali tawe. Lundi se yaba ne omusaayi owekesia tawe. Lundi se yaba ne kamalaka tawe.
Ne kakhali, mu butinyu bwabwe bakobolelamo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Bamuyiima bamunyoola.
Mu biise ebio kumuleembe se kwabao khuyo orura namwe khuyo owingila tawe; sikila butinyu bukali bwanaania bamenywa boosi mu bibala.
Liabao libuna buli abuundu. Sibala siebwaakala sibala, ne lukoba lwebwaakala lukoba. Sikila Wele abanaania ne butinyu buli lukano.
Ne kakhali enywe mube banyindaafu. Mukhalua tawe sikila mukhanyoole kumuruuru.”
Nga Asa ne aulila kamakhuwa kano, bung'oosi bwa Asaria okhwa Oteti, anyoola kamaani mala arusiao bifwaani bisinyisia bibiarura mu sibala sia Yuda ne Benjamini. Aarusia bifwaani ebio lundi, khukhwama mu ngoba nicho aaba naambile mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Mala ang'oona alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyaba ebweeni we luuya lwe nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne abuusia alala Yuda ne Benjamini boosi ne babaandi khukhwama mu kholo cha Efuraimu ne Manase ne Simioni ba baaba baakwa mu nibo. Bakali bamwichakho khukhwama mu Isiraeli sikila babona bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne naye.
Bebuusia e Yerualemu mu mwesi kwa khataru kwe kumwiiko kwe ekhumi ne kiraano kie bubwami bwa Asa.
Baana embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu ndaalo eyo khukhwama mu biindu nibio baba ne bayaayile bareera: Chikhaafu chimia saba ne kamakheese chielefu saba.
Bakhola endakaano eye khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe ne kumwoyo kwabwe kwoosi, ne liiba liabwe lioosi.
Ne yesi yesi okhasaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli tawe, enyekhana erwe; akhaba ne ali omuele namwe omusaakhulu, owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi.
Bechuba khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ne liyokela ne khu khuupa chitarumbeta ne chikhoombi.
Ne Bayuda boosi bekhoyela liliechuba sikila baba bechuba ne kumwoyo kwabwe kwosi. Ne lundi basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne liliekoomba liabwe lioosi mala bamunyoola. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabaelesia kumuleembe chimbeka choosi.
Omwami Asa aarusiao akhaba Maaka, maawe mu khuba maayi ooli Kwini. Sikila aaba akhola sifwaani sisinyisia sia wele Ashera. Asa areema sifwaani sia Maaka, asitonya asiosela akheechi kha Kiduroni.
Ne kakhali abuundu aesuta se arusibwao mu Isiraeli tawe. Ne kakhaba kario, kumwoyo kwa Asa se kwabamo buubi bwosi bwosi bwe khubiiywakho tawe, mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.
Ne areera mu nju eya Wele biianwa nibio raraawe aaba ne aana khu Wele ne nibio niye omwene yesi aaba ne aanile khu Wele. Aareera efwesa, esahabu ne bibuumba.
Ne liie se liabao lundi tawe khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kataru na kiraano kwe bubwami bwa Asa.

Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru ne sita kwe bubwami bwa Asa, Omwami Baasha owa Isiraeli ebwaakala Yuda. Ombakha Rama, nio akhiingilile omundu yesi yesi khurura namwe khukhwingila mu Yuda.
Nio Asa abukula efwesa ne esahabu khukhwama mu mabiikhilo ke nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhwama mwichipi lio omwami. Nio aachirumira Beni-hadadi omwami owa Shamu owamenyanga mu Damasika.
Asa amuboolela ali, “Lekha ese ne nawe khukhole endakaano akari wefwe nga eyaba akari wa paapa wase ne paapa wowo. Nakhurumire ewe efwesa ne esahabu; cha ofunake endakaano yowo ne Baasha omwami owa Isiraeli mala andurekho.”
Ne Beni-hadadi afukiilila ko omwami Asa mala aruma banamae babemeelesi be banamae bewe bebwaakale chingoba cha Isiraeli. Baula Iyoni, Dani, Abeli-maimu, ne chingoba che kamabiikhilo cha Nafutali choosi.
Ne nga Baasha ne aulila kano alekha khukhwombakha Rama mala kimilimo kiewe kiakama.
Nio Omwami Asa abukula Bayuda boosi mala basuta kamabaale ka Rama koosi ne chimbao chalwo. Bino nibio Baasha aba ne alikho ombakhila. Ne Asa acha ombakhila kamabaale ako ne chimbao echo chingoba cha Keba ne Misipa.
Mu siise esio owe kamalola Hanani eecha khu mwami Asa owa Yuda. Aamuboolela ali, “Sikila ewe weyikina omwami owa Shamu ne se weyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo tawe, banamae ba Shamu bakhwifubarure.
Baesopia ne Balibia se baba banamae bakali lukali ne kamakaari ke kamae kamakali ne batimia chifarasi tawe ku? Ne kakhali sikila weyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, abara mu bunyali bwowo.
Chimoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chibonanga buli abuundu mu sibala sioosi. Chikholanga chirio, khukhwekesia kamaani kewe khulwa abo nibo kumwoyo kwabwe kuli kumuluungi khu niye. Ewe wakholile kano mu busilu, sikila khukhwama luno khuchiililila olaba ne liie.”
Nio Asa aaba omurafu khu we kamalola, mala amuboa kiminyololo mu siboe sikila amuambila lirima khu lino. Ne mu siise esio sisiene Asa apia sibi babaandu balala lukali.
Bikholwa bia Asa khukhwama khu sie khunyoa khukhwola khu simaliilisi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie Babaami ba Yuda ne Isiraeli.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kataru na tisa kwe khukhwamiia khwewe, Asa aaba ne bulwaale bwe bikele. Ne bulwaale bwewe bwachiililila khuba bubi. Kakhaba kario mu bulwaale bwewe se ayiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, ne kakhali aayiima buyeeti khukhwama khu basilikhi.
Nio Asa aafwa mu mwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kane ne mulala kwe khukhwamiia khwewe.
Bamusiikha mu ng'ani niyo omwene ekholela mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Bamwalisia khu sitanda nisio baba ne bechusiekho biiunya kumuuya kumulayi bie chingano chichabukhaane. Biakholwa ne bafundi bang'oona kamafura kaunya bulayi. Babwana kumulilo kumukali khulwe lukoosi lwewe.

Yehoshafati okhwa Asa amiia mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe mala aaba ne kamaani khu khuupana ne Isiraeli.
Ara banamae mu ngoba choosi chisire cha Yuda. Ne ombakha niio banamae bamenya, mu sibala sia Yuda ne mu chingoba cha Efuraimu nicho raraawe Asa aaba ne aamba.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne Yehoshafati, sikila akeenda mu ngila chindaayi che khunyoa cha raraawe, se asaaya Baali tawe.
Ne kakhali esaaya Wele owa raraawe mala akeenda mu malaka ka Wele ne se akeenda khuloondekhana ne chingila che Baisiraeli tawe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aandalasia bubwami mu bunyali bwewe. Ne Yuda yoosi yareera biianwa khu Yehoshafati mala aaba ne kimiaandu kimikali lukali ne lukoosi.
Kumwoyo kwewe kwaba ne kamaani mungila cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne khutasa khwako, arusiao abuundu aesuta ne wele ba Ashera mu Yuda.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khataru kwe khukhwamiia khwewe, arumania babemeelesi bewe: Beni-haili, Obadia, Sakaria, Netaneli, ne Mikaya, khukhwekisia babaandu mu ngoba cha Yuda.
Abaruma ne Balawi: Shemaya, Netania; Sebatia, Asaeli, Shemura-moti, Yehonatani, Atonicha, Tobiya ne Tobatoniya. Balawi bano baba ne basaayi Elishama ne Yehoramu.
Balawi ne basaayi bano bekisia mu Yuda, sitabu sie Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bacha buli abuundu mu ngoba cha Yuda choosi mala bekisia babaandu.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola bubwami bwoosi bwe bibala bibiabotookhelela Yuda bwaambwa buuri. Ne se bakholakho liie khu Yehoshafati tawe.
Bafilisiti balala bareerera Yehoshafati biianwa ne efwesa eye busuuru. Ne Baarabu bosi bamureerera kamamiiku chielefu saba ne chimia saba ne chindurume chielefu saba ne chimia saba.
Ne Yehoshafati akaliya kalaa nio aba omukali lukali. Ombakha mu Yuda chingoba chisire ne chingoba che kamabiikhilo.
Ne aaba ne kamabiikhilo kamaboofu lukali mu ngoba cha Yuda.
Aaba ne banamae, ne bakhupani barana, mu Yerusalemu.
Baba bano khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe: Be nju eya Yuda, ne banamae bakhulu babemeelelanga chielefu baba: Adina komanda owemeelelanga banamae chielefu chimia chitaru baba babaandu be kamaani barana.
Komanda owamulondela aba Yehohanani, ne banamae chielefu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi munaane.
Owaloondela Yehonani aba Amasia okhwa Sikiri owerusia busa khu milimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aba ne banamae be kamaani barana chielefu chimia chibili.
Be nju eya Benjamini baba: Eliata, omunamae owe kamaani omurana, ne banamae chielefu chimia chibili be buyiingo ne chingabo.
Ne owamuloondela aba Yehosabadi, ne banamae chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane be bulwaani bwe liie.
Bano baba mu milimo kio mwami Yehoshafati alala ne babaandi nibo aaba ne ara mu ngoba chisire mu Yuda mwoosi.

Nga Yehoshafati aaba ne kimiaandu kimikali ne lukoosi. Akhola liambaana ne Ahabu khulwe khukhwana.
Enyuma we kimiiko, Yehoshafati ekha akeniia Ahabu mu Samaria. Ahabu amwirira kamakheese kamakali ne chikhaafu niye ne babaandu ba baaba ne naye. Ahabu amuombelesia bache bebwaakale lukoba lwa Ramoti-kileati.
Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli areeba Yehoshafati omwami owa Yuda ali, “Khulacha fwembi e Ramoti-kileati?”
Yehoshafati amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi nga ewe, babaandu base bali nga babowo. Khulaba ne nawe mwiie.”
Ne kakhali Yehoshafati aboolela omwami owa Isiraeli ali, “Nyoa oreebe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio.”
Nio omwami Ahabu alaanga bang'oosi alala, embi chimia chine mala abareeba ali, “Nje nibwaakale Ramoti-kileati namwe tawe?” Bamukobosia bali, “Cha osibwaakale, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhua bukhili.”
Ne kakhali Yehoshafati areeba ali, “Omung'oosi se alikhoo ano okundi niye khunyala khwabirirakho khwareeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe?”
Ahabu amukobosia ali, “Aliio mulala oramire, niye khunyala khwareebakho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bali Mikaya okhwa Imura. Ne kakhali ese namubiila, sikila se ang'oolelangakho kamalayi tawe, ne bukhali bubi bwong'ene.” Yehoshafati amukobosia ali, “Omwami okhaloma orio tawe.”
Nio Ahabu alaanga mulala khu bemeelesi be lichipi lio mwami mala amuboolela ali, “Ndeerere khangu Mikaya okhwa Imura.”
Nono Yehoshafati omwami owa Yuda ne Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli baba bekhaale khu ndebe chabwe che bubwami. Lundi baba befwarire chingubo chabwe che bubwami. Baba bekhaale abuundu niio bauulilanga, a silibwa sia Samaria. Ne bang'oosi boosi baba balikho bang'oola ebweeni waabwe.
Ne Sedekia okhwa Kenaana, mulala khu nibo, akhola chinjika che bichuuma mala aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ne chinjika chino olapila Bashamu khukhwola nga ne obaulila elala.’ ”
Ne bang'oosi babaandi boosi bang'oola bario. Baloma bali, “Cha mu lukoba lwa Ramoti-kileati mala okhile. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhukhola obaule.”
Omurumwa owacha khureera Mikaya amuboolela ali, “Lola bang'oosi babaandi boosi bang'oolile bulayi khu mwami. Lekha lilomaloma liowo libe lilayi nga liliabwe.”
Ne Mikaya akobosia ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, nilio Wele amboolela lili nilio ndaloma.”
Nga ne echa ebweeni wo mwami Ahabu, omwami amureeba ali, “Mikaya, khunyala khwacha mala khwebwakaala Ramoti-kileati namwe tawe?”
Mikaya akobosia ali, “Cha wibwaakale mala okhile. Bacha khureebwa mu bunyali bwowo.”
Ne kakhali Ahabu areeba ali, “Ndikhuboolela khukhwola khenga nio umboolele bung'ali bwong'ene mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Mikaya akobosia ali, “Mboone Isiraeli yoosi yasalaniile khu bikulu nga kamakheese kakhali ne omwaayi tawe. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Babaandu bano se bali ne omwimeelesi tawe, lekha buli mulala ache engo wewe mu muleembe.’ ”
Ahabu aboolela Yehoshafati ali, “Ese se khuboolele ndi se anyala ang'oolela kamalayi khwiwe tawe ne kakhali kamamayaanu?”
Mikaya achiililila ali, “Nono rekeeresia elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi: Naboone Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhaale khu ndebe yeewe eye bubwami ne banamae bewe boosi bamwimileo kumukhono kumuseecha ne kumukhasi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, ‘Naanu onyala aombelesia Ahabu omwami owa Isiraeli nio ache mala ererwe e Ramoti-kileati?’ Mulala aloma lilala, ne okundi aloma liliindi.
Nio roho mulala echa eema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ese ndamuombelesia.’ Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asireeba ali, ‘Olamubea oriena?’
Roho oyo akobosia ali, ‘Ese ndacha mala mbe omubeeyi khubirira khu bang'oosi ba Ahabu boosi.’ Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Cha omuombelesie ne olaba ne bukhili. Cha mala okhole orio.’
Ne Mikaya achiililila ali, ‘Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areere roho owe bubeeyi mu bang'oosi bowo bano boosi. Ne Wele aboolile kamatinyu khwiwe.’ ”
Nio Omung'oosi Sedekia okhwa Kenaana acha khu Mikaya amupa luui mala amureeba ali, “Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha ariena khukhwama khwise alomaloma ne nawe?”
Mikaya amukobosia ali, “Olimanya endaalo niio olicha khukhwikisa mu lusiro lwe akari.”
Ne omwami Ahabu aloma ali, “Amba Mikaya mala mumukobosie khu Amoni, omwimeelesi owe lukoba ne khu Yoashi omusoleeli owo mwami.
Ne mumwosisieyo mulome muli, omwami aloma ali, ‘Ra omundu yuno mu siboe mala mumuliisie siakhulia sitiiti ne kameechi, khukhwola nga ne ngobola mu muleembe.’ ”
Mikaya aloma ali, “Waaba ne okobola mu muleembe aba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alomaloma khubirira khwise tawe.” Mala atasakho ali, “Ulila, enywe babaandu mwesi.”
Nio omwami Ahabu owa Isiraeli ne omwami Yehoshafati owa Yuda barekukha bacha e Ramoti-kileati.
Ahabu aboolela Yehoshafati ali, “Ese ndekosaasia fwaane omundu okundi nio nje mwiie, ne kakhali ewe yefwara chingubo chowo che bubwami.” Nio omwami owa Isiraeli acha mwiie ne ekosiaasiisie.
Nono omwami owa Shamu aaba alakile banamae be kamakaari kewe ke liie ali, “Mukhebwaakalakho omundu yesi yesi tawe ne akhali omwami owa Isiraeli yeng'ene.”
Nio nga ne babona omwami Yehoshafati, boosi bebaasia bali ali omwami owa Isiraeli. Bayuukha bamwibwaakala mala Yehoshafati aliila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuyeeta. Wele abarusia khukhwama khu niye.
Nga banamae kamakhumi kataru ne babili abo bamanya bali se ali omwami owe Isiraeli tawe balekha khumutimania.
Ne kakhali omunamae mulala akhweesa buyiingo bwewe embi ne omwami owa Isiraeli mala amulasa akari we bubwongelo bwe chingubo chewe che liie. Omwami Ahabu aboolela otimianga likaari liewe ali, “Yuukha, mala undusie mwiie sikila bambumisie.”
Liie liaba liamemee endaalo ng'ene eyo. Omwami Ahabu aarama ne akalamiliile mu likaari liewe, aloleleela Bashamu khukhwola ekolooba. Bwaba oli bwelabula ne afwa.

Yehoshafati, omwami owa Yuda akobola mu muleembe munju yewe mu Yerusalemu.
Ne kakhali owe kamalola Yehu okhwa Hanani arura acha khu mwakaanana. Aboolela omwami Yehoshafati ali, “Ewe onyala wayeeta bamayaanu, ne khusiima abo bababiila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi? Sikila kano, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuambile ewe lirima.
Ne kakhaba kario, bulayi bulikho mwiwe butiiti buri, sikila ewe wonaka bifwaani bia wele Asiera barura mu sibala muno, lundi werusiisie khusaaya Wele.”
Yehoshafati amenya mu Yerusalemu. Ne arura acha mu baandu, khukhwama Beerisheba khukhwola mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu. Mala abakobosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.
Arobora bakhalaki mu ngoba cha Yuda choosi chisire khukhwama khu lukoba khukhwola khu lundi.
Aboolela bakhalaki ali, “Mwibaasie niko mukhola, sikila se mucha khukhola bukhalaki khulwo mundu tawe ne kakhali khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali alala ne nanywe nga muaana bukhalaki.
Nono mwesi ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Yibaasia niko mukhola, sikila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe khukhiikha bukhalaki bwa ng'ali namwe khuyekha lubeka lulala, namwe khukhwakaanila asoya mbamo.”
Khutasa khwako, Yehoshafati arobora Balawi balala ne basaayi ne babemeelesi be chinju che Baisiraeli khuana bukhalaki Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhalaka kimisaango kie lilomana mu Yerusalemu. Bubwikhalo bwabwe bwaba mu Yerusalemu.
Ne abalakiilisia ali, “Khwako mukhalake khulwe khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mu bweyikinwa ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.
Buli lwoosi kumusaango kureerwa khwinywe khukhwama khu balebe benywe bamenyile mu ngoba chabwe, khulwe khuchukha sifuki, namwe khufuna lilaka. Nebeecha bekisie, bakhakhola bario banyoola bumayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi likhakhola lirio liecha khwinywe namwe khu bawandaaye benywe tawe, mulikhola murio nio mulekhe khukhola bumayaanu tawe.
Ne lola, Amaria, Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ali angaaki wenywe mu biindu bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne Sebatia okhwa Ishimaeli, omwimeelesi owe enju eya Yuda, amwimeelela enywe khu biindu bioosi bio mwami. Ne Balawi balamukholela enywe kimilimo nga babemeelesi. Khola kimilimo ne bunyindaafu ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya aba ne baluungi!”

Enyuma wa kano, Bamoabu, Baamoni nende balala khu Bameuni becha khukhwibwaakala Yehoshafati.
Babaandu balala becha khu Yehoshafati mala bamuboolela bali, “Lituuli lie babaandu lilikho liicha khukhwama Edomu khukhwibwaakala ewe. Sipupu sino siamile ebweeni we enyanja eya chumbe. Luno luri sili e Hasasoni-tamari.” (Lino lili lisina liliindi lia Engedi).
Nio Yehoshafati aria mala asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aboolela babaandu ba Yuda boosi beyimana khulia.
Bayuda boosi babuusiana khukhwama mungoba choosi cha Yuda khusaba buyeeti khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Yehoshafati eema ebweeni we babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu. Eema mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ebweeni we luuya luya.
Aasaba ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele ewe bakuuka befwe; Owe oli Wele owe mwikulu. Wamiia bubwami bwe bibala bioosi. Bunyali ne kamaani bili bibiowo, mbao onyala eema ebweeni wowo tawe.
Ee Wele wefwe se waoona bamenywa be sibala sino ebweeni we babaandu bowo Isiraeli? Se wasieleesia khulwa mindali, lisaaye lia Aburahamu, omusaale wowo?
Lisaaye lino liamenyile ano mala liombakhe Lukaangu khulwe lisina liowo. Baloma bali,
kamabi ne kakhwichakho: liie, bukhalaki, bulwaale namwe enjala, khuliima mu Lukaangu luno ne ebweeni wowo, sikila ewe oli mu Lukaangu luno. Ne khu khulilila ewe mu butinyu bwefwe ne ewe olikhuulila mala okhuonie.
Ne lola bakhuruungire efwe khulwe khukhuoona mu maloba kowo niko ewe wakhuelesia efwe kabe kakeefwe.
Ee Wele wefwe, baelesie kumunaanio. Sikila efwe se khuli ne kamaani khukhila lituuli liboofu lilikho liicha khukhwibwaakala efwe tawe. Se khumanya nisio khunyala khukhola tawe. Efwe khwakhuloleelele ewe.”
Babaandu ba Yuda boosi bema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne batiiti babwe, ne bakhasi babwe, ne babaana babwe.
Ne Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echa khu Yahasieli okhwa Sakaria, omwichukhulu Benaya. Benaya aba okhwa Yeieli lundi omwichukhulu owa Matania. Matania aba Omulawi, mulala khu baana ba Asafu. Yahasieli aba mu sipupu sie babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Yahasieli aloma ali, “Babaandu ba Yuda mwesi, ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu ne omwami Yehoshafati ulila: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Mukharia namwe mwafwa kumwoyo sikila sipupu siboofu sino tawe. Sikila liie se lili lilienywe tawe; ne kakhali lili lia Wele.
Muchuli khemuche mu bebwaakale. Balaba balikho baniinila a lubangaachi lwa Asisi. Mulabanyoola ekhumaliilikha khwe litooma, ebukwe we sichiimi sia Yerueli.
Se mwenyekhana khu khuupana mwiie lino tawe. Bukula bubweyaangu bwenywe; mwime siriririri mala muboone bukhili bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe enywe, Ee Yuda ne Yerusalemu.’ Mukharia namwe mwafwa kumwoyo tawe. Muchuli cha mubebwaakale. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaba ne nanywe”
Nio Yehoshafati enama kumurwe kwetiila asi. Ne babaandu ba Yuda ne ba Yerusalemu boosi baakwa asi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khumusaaya.
Balawi be bilibwa bia Bakohati ne Bakorahi benyokha khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ne kumumilo kwe angaaki.
Benyokha makhelebeende kumutikhinyi barura mala bacha mu sichiimi sia Tekoa. Nga baba ne barura, Yehoshafati enyokha aloma ali, “Enywe babaandu ba Yuda ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu mbulile: Yeyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne mukhaandalasibwe. Yeyikina bang'oosi bewe ne mulikhila.”
Omwami Yehoshafati ne amalile khukaambila babaandu, arobora abo babembela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khumufumia mu ngubo chindakatifu. Bembanga ebweeni we banamae ne baloma bali,
“Khupila orio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila busiime bwewe buli bwa mindali.”
Ne nga barakikha khukhwimba ne khufumia, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akoyaania babaandu ba Amoni, Moabu nende be esikulu sia Seiri. Babaandu bano babecha khukhwibwaakala Yuda, babunila elala.
Babaandu ba Amoni ne Moabu bebwaakala babaandu be esikulu sia Seiri, mala bababunisilia elala. Nga bamala khubabunia babeene belanakho berana.
Nga babaandu ba Yuda boola khu ndeleelwa, baloola e basiku. Baboona bafu bong'ene bakwiile asi. Mbao akhaba mulala owebacha tawe.
Yehoshafati ne babaandu bewe becha khubukula bibiindu bie mu mbaambe, khukhwama khu nibo. Banyoola chikhaafu chingali, bibiindu, chingubo ne bibiindu bie bukhala. Babukula bibiindu bino khukhwola nga bakhilwa khubisuta. Babukula kimiaandu khu ndaalo chitaru. Biaba bikali lukali.
Khu ndaalo ekhola khane babusiana mwitooma lia Beraka. Abwenao bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khwako lisina lie abuundu ao lilangaangwa lili litooma lia Beraka khukhwola endaalo eya luno.
Nio babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu bakobola Yerusalemu ne busangaafu Yehoshafati ne abaraangirire, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abakhola bekhoya sikila yaba baulile basiku babwe.
Becha e Yerusalemu ne kamatuungu, ne biilili ne chikhoombi munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bubwami bwoosi bwe bibala bwaria Wele nga bwaulila bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi apanie basiku ba Isiraeli.
Nio bubwami bwa Yehoshafati se bwaba ne liie tawe sikila Wele amuelesia kumuleembe chimbeka choosi.
Nono Yehoshafati amiia Yuda. Arakikha khukhwaamia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kiraano. Ne amiia khukhwama mu Yerusalemu khu miiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Asuba omukhaana owa Shilihi.
Akhola kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga raraawe Asa ne aakholanga.
Ne kakhali abuundu aesuta se arusibwao tawe. Kimiooyo kie babaandu se kiaba khu Wele owe bakuuka babwe tawe.
Nono bikholwa bibiindi bioosi bia Yehoshafati khukhwama khu sie khunyoa khukhwola khu simaliilisi, biaandikwa mu ngano cha Yehu okhwa Hanani. Chingano chino chaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Isiraeli.
Enyuma wa kano Yehoshafati omwami owa Yuda aambana ne omwami Ahasia owa Isiraeli owakhola kamamayaanu.
Yehoshafati aambana ne naye khukhwombakha chimeeli chiche e Tarishishi. Bombakhila chimeeli chino e Esioni-geberi.
Nio Elieseri okhwa Dodafau owe Maresha ang'oola khu Yehoshafati. Aloma ali, “Sikila waambanile ne Ahasia, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khwonaka nisio mukholile.” Nio chimeeli chonekha mala khucha e Tarishishi tawe.

Yehoshafati aafwa mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bakuuka bewe, mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Omwana wewe Yehoramu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Bawandaaye ba Yehoramu baba: Asaria, Yehieli, Sakaria, Asaria, Mikaeli ne Shefatia. Bano boosi baba babaana ba Yehoshafati.
Paapa wabwe abaelesia biianwa bikali bie efwesa, esahabu ne bibiindu bie bukhala. Abaelesia lundi chingoba chisire cha Yuda. Ne kakhali aaelesia Yehoramu bubwami sikila niye aaba omwana omubele.
Nga Yehoramu ne eela khu bwami bwa raraawe, mala anyoola kamaani, eera bawandaaye boosi ne balala khu bemeelesi ba Isiraeli.
Yehoramu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kibili ne arakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia khukhwama mu Yerusalemu khu miiko munaane.
Ne akeenda mu ngila che babaami ba Isiraeli, nga enju eya Ahabu ne yakhola. Akhola ario sikila omukhaana owa Ahabu aaba omukhasi wewe. Yehoramu akhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se onaka enju eya Daudi tawe, sikila endakaano niyo akhola ne Daudi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba alaka ali, Daudi ne lisaaye liewe baliaamiia khulwa mindali.
Nio Yehoramu acha ne banamae bewe bakhulu ne kamakaari kewe ke liie koosi e Edomu. Oli musilo eera Baedomu ba baba ne bamubotookheleele niye ne banamae bewe bakhulu.
Nio babaandu ba Edomu baloba bubwami bwa Yuda khukhwola endaalo eya luno. Khu siise esio babaandu ba Libuna boosi baloba bubwami bwa Yuda, sikila Yehoramu aba alekhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka bewe.
Khutasa khwako, Yehoramu akhola abuundu aesuta mu sibala sie bikulu sia Yuda. Ne aakhola bamenywa ba Yerusalemu balekha khuba babeyikinwa khu wele. Ne lundi aakhola babaandu ba Yuda balekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne ebarwa yecha khu niye khukhwama khu mung'oosi Elicha eli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Daudi, kuuka wowo aloma ali, ‘Se wakeendile mu ngila cha raraao Yehoshafati tawe. Lundi se wakeendile mungila cho mwami Asa owa Yuda tawe.
Ne kakhali wakeendile mu ngila che babaami ba Isiraeli. Wakholile babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu khuba bakhali babeyikinwa khu Wele tawe. Wakholile nga enju eya Ahabu eyakhola Isiraeli yatamba bubweyikinwa khu Wele. Lundi werire bawandaayo be enju eya raraao ba baaba balayi khukhukhila ewe.
Sikila kano Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khureera kumunaanio khu baandu bowo, babaana bowo, bakhasi bowo, ne bibiindu biowo bioosi.
Nocha khuba ne lufu lwe munda lurafu. Lulikhuchuuna buli ndaalo khukhwola nga bie munda ne birura.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enyosia lirima lie Bafilisiti ne Baarabu bali embi ne Baesopia, khu Yehoramu.
Becha bebwaakala Yuda mala basuta bacha ne bibiindu bioosi nibio banyoola bibiaba bie enju eyo omwami. Lundi bacha ne babaana bo mwami ne bakhasi bewe. Se arama ne omwana yesi yesi tawe, ne kakhali Yehoahasi, omutua wewe.
Enyuma wakano koosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera khu mwami lufu lwe munda lukhanyala lwasilikhwa tawe.
Enyuma we kimiiko kibili, bie munda yewe biarura sikila lufu, mala afwa mu buchuuni bukali. Babaandu bewe khubwaana sisiooso khumua luyali, nga bibioso bie bakuuka bewe tawe.
Yehoramu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru ne kibili nga ne aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko munaane khukhwama Yerusalemu. Omundu yesi yesi se abelelakho sikila lifwa liewe tawe. Bamusiikha mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne kakhali se bamusiikha mu biliindwa bie babaami tawe.

Bamenywa ba Yerusalemu bamiisia Ahasia omwana owa Yehoramu omutua, mu bweyaangu bwa paapa wewe. Sipupu sie babaandu babeecha ne Baarabu mu kambi, sieera babaana bakhulu ba Yehoramu boosi. Nio Ahasia okhwa Yehoramu, omwami owa Yuda amiia.
Ahasia aarakikha khukhwamiia ne ali ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane ne kibili. Amiia khukhwama Yerusalemu kumwiiko mulala. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Atalia. Atalia aba omwichukhulu owa Omri.
Ahasia akhola kamamayaanu nga enju eya Ahabu, sikila maawe aaba omukaambisi wewe mu khukhola kamamayaanu.
Akhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga enju eya Ahabu ne yakhola. Akhola ario sikila enyuma we lifwa lia raraawe, balala khu be nju eya Ahabu baba bakaambisi bewe. Likaambila liabwe liakwisia Ahasia.
Khuloonda khu likaambila liabwe, acha ne Yoramu okhwa Ahabu, omwami owa Isiraeli, khukhwibwaakala omwami Hasaeli owa Shamu a Ramoti-kileati. Bashamu baumisia Yoramu.
Yoramu aakobola khucha khumenya aone mu lukoba lwa Yesireeli, kamakoonjo niko anyoola e Rama. Akanyoola nga apana ne omwami Hasaeli owa Shamu. Ne Ahasia omwami owa Yuda okhwa Yehoramu acha khubona Yoramu okhwa Ahabu mu Yesireeli sikila aba omulwale.
Ne kakhali Wele aaba akhalake ali, likwa lia Ahasia lienyekhana liiche mu khucha khubona Yoramu khuno. Sikila nga oola e Yesireeli, arura ne Yoramu khukhwakaanana ne Yehu okhwa Nimisi. Yehu aba niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora khubunia enju eya Ahabu.
Nga Yehu ne aba ne alikho aana kumunaanio khunju eya Ahabu, anyoola babemeelesi ba Yuda ne babaana ba wandaaye ba Ahasia, mala abeera. Babaandu bano bakholelanga Ahasia.
Yehu ayiima Ahasia. Babaandu bewe banyoola Ahasia ne ekisile mu Samaria mala bamutiila. Areerwa khu Yehu mala Yehu amwiira. Bamusiikha sikila baloma bali, “Ali omwichukhulu owa Yehoshafati. Yehoshafati aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi.” Ne nju eya Ahasia se yaba, ne omundu onyala khukhwamiia bubwami tawe.
Nono Atalia maayi owa Ahasia nga ne aabona ali omwana wewe afwiile, acha abunia enju yoosi eye bubwami eya Yuda.
Ne kakhali Yeosiabeati, omukhaana wo mwami abukula Yoashi okhwa Ahasia mala amukisa khukhwama khu basoleeli bo mwami ba baba siimbi khukhwirwa. Ara Yoashi no mulesi wewe mu lusiro lwe khukonamo. Mu ngila yino, Yehoshabeati, omukhaana owo mwami ne omukhasi owo omusaayi Yehoyata, (omukhasi yuno aba omukooko owa Ahasia) bakisa Yoashi khukhwama khu Atalia. Atalia se amwiira tawe.
Yoashi aarama ne nabo khu miiko sita munju eya Wele nga Atalia ne aaba ne amiia sibala.

Ne mu mwiiko kukhola saba, Yehoyata anyindaala mala auliilisiana ne babemeelesi be bipupu bie chimia. Babemeelesi bano baba: Asaria okhwa Yerohamu, Ishimaeli okhwa Yehohanani, Asaria okhwa Obeti, Maseeya okhwa Adaia ne Elisiafati okhwa Sikiri.
Bakeenda mu Yuda mala babukula Balawi khukhwama mu ngoba choosi. Babukula ne babemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli mala becha Yerusalemu.
Libuusiana lie babaandu lioosi liakhola endakaano ne omwami munju eya Wele.
Yehoyata ababoolela ali, “Lola omwana owo mwami! Lekha amiie nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aloma khuloondekhana ne lisaaye lia Daudi.
Lino nilio mwenyekhana mukhole: Enywe basaayi ne Balawi, mulecha khu milimo khu ndaalo eye sabato. Ne mwicha, sipupu silala khu bitaru silaliinda bilibwa.
Sikhola khabili silaba munju eyo mwami ne simaliilisi khu bitaru silaba a Silibwa sie kumusiingi. Ne babaandu boosi balaba khu luya lwe nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omundu yesi yesi akhengilakho munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bakhali basaayi ne Balawi bali khu milimo tawe. Basaayi bano ne Balawi banyala bengilamo sikila bali batakatifu. Ne kakhali babaandu babaandi boosi barie lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala barame enje.
Balawi balabotookhelela omwami buli mulala ne bulwaani bwewe mu mukhono mwewe. Ne yesi yesi owingila mu Lukaangu aliirwa. Ba ne omwami buli niio acha.”
Balawi ne babaandu ba Yuda boosi bakhola khuloondekhana ne koosi niko omusaayi Yehoyata alaka. Buli mulala areera babaandu bewe khuliinda ne khurura khu buliindi khu ndaalo eya sabato. Omusaayi Yehoyata se alekhakho enje akhaba sipupu silala sie basaayi tawe.
Yehoyata aelesia babemeelesi be bipupu bie chimia kamafumo ne chingabo chimboofu ne chindiiti chichaba cho mwami Daudi, chichaba chabiikhwa munju eya Wele.
Ne ara babaandu boosi niio beema, buli mundu ne bulwaani bwewe mukhono. Beema khukhwama ebunafubo we enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwola ebunaswa mala babotookhelela e alutare ne Lukaangu.
Nio arusia enje omwana owo mwami. Aamuraakho ekutwa mala amua kamaandike ke liuliilisiana. Bakhola omwana owo mwami aba omwami. Yehoyata ne babaana bewe bachukha khu Yoashi kamafura abe omwami. Mala baloma bali, “Omwami ayindile.”
Nga Atalia ne aulila luyoka lwe babaandu ne batima ne khufumia omwami, acha munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niio babaandu baba.
Nga alola, abona omwami emile anjeko yewe a muliango. Ne banamae babemeelesi ne babapa chikhoombi baba bamwimileo. Abona lundi babaandu boosi be sibala baba bekhoya ne khukhupa chikhoombi. Ne babeemba ne baapa binanda baraangirire naikara. Ne Atalia atabula chingubo chewe mala alila ne aloma ali, “Mwakusiisie sibala! Mwakusiisie sibala!”
Nio omusaayi Yehoyata aaruma babemeelesi ba banamae ne aloma ali, “Murusie mu Lukaangu ne mumubotookheleele. Yesi yesi omuloondakho erwe. Mukhamwirira munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
Nio bamuaamba nga echa a silibwa sie silibwa sie Efarasi sie enju eyo mwami. Bamwiririra abwenao.
Ne Yehoyata aakhola endakaano akari wewe ne babaandu boosi no mwami. Bauliilisiana bali bakhoya baba babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio babaandu boosi bacha khunju eya Baali mala bakitechula. Batonyaka chi alutare chewe ne bifwaani biewe. Lundi beera Matani, omusaayi owa Baali ebweeni we chi alutare.
Yehoyata arao baliindi be enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asi we bubwimeelesi bwe basaayi Balawi ne Balawi nibo Daudi arobora khuliinda enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bano benyekha khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga liaandikwa mu malaka ka Musa. Bakhola bario mu khwekhoya ne khukhwimba, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Daudi.
Yehoyata ara baliindi be bilibwa a bilibwa bie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio omundu yesi yesi okhali omumiliiu mu ngila yosi yosi akhakhola ario engilamo tawe.
Yehoyata abukula banamae babemeelesi, babaandu be fuma mu lukoba, babemeelesi be babaandu ne babaandu boosi be sibala. Barusia omwami khukhwama munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bakeenda babirira mu silibwa sie ngaaki bacha munju eyo mwami. Nio bekhasia omwami khu ndebe eye bubwami.
Ne babaandu boosi be sibala bekhoya. Ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lwaba ne kumuleembe enyuma we lifwa lia Atalia.

Yoashi aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko saba narakikha khukhwamiia. Ne amiia mu Yerusalemu kimiiko kamakhumi kane. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Sibia khukhwama e Beerisheba.
Ne Yoashi akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bulamu bwo musaayi Yehoyata bwoosi.
Yehoyata amukhwela bakhasi babili mala asaala ne nabo babaana be sisoleeli nende be siikhaana.
Enyuma wa kano Yoashi abisia khung'oona enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Alaanga alala basaayi ne Balawi. Ababoolela ali, “Cha mu chingoba cha Yuda choosi mala buusia khukhwama mu Isiraeli yoosi chirupia che khung'oona enju eya Wele. Buusia chirupia chino buli mwiiko. Khola likhuwa lino khaangu.” Ne kakhali, Balawi khukhola khangu tawe.
Nio omwami alaanga omwimeelesi wabwe Yehoyata mala amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne okharakho Balawi khurera busuuru khukhwama Yuda ne Yerusalemu? Busuuru buno, omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Musa aburao khu libuusiana lia Isiraeli khulwe liiema lie kumuse.”
Omwami Yoashi ang'oona Lukaangu sikila babaana ba Atalia, omukhasi omumayaanu beele bafunaka bengila munju eyo MWAMI Wele. Barumikhira bibiindu bitakatifu bie munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Baali.
Nio omwami alaka bakhola lisanduku mala balira enje we silibwa sie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kumulaango kwarura kwoola mu Yuda ne mu Yerusalemu mwoosi. Babaandu baboolelwa khureera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi busuuru nibwo Musa omukholi owa Wele ara khu Baisiraeli mu sichiimi.
Ne babemeelesi boosi ne babaandu boosi bekhoya mala bareera busuuru bwabwe babura mwisanduku khukhwola nga liechula.
Nga Balawi ne bareeranga khu bemeelesi bo mwami lisanduku, babemeelesi bano babonanga bali liechuulemo chirupia. Nio omuandiki owo mwami ne omwimeelesi owo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali barusiangamo chirupia chino mala ne besia lisanduku abuundu walio. Bakhola bario buli endaalo mala babuusia chirupia chingali.
Omwami ne Yehoyata baelesianga chirupia chino khu bemeelesi be kimilimo kie nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baruunga babombakhi be chinju ne babeechi be chimbao khung'oona enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baruunga akhaba babasi be bichuuma ne kimikasa khung'oona enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio babakholanga kimilimo bakikhola ne kamaani. Ne kimilimo kie khung'oona Lukaangu kiachiililila bulayi asi wabwe. Bang'oona enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba endayi lundi eye kamaani.
Nga bamala khung'oona bakosia chirupia chicharama khu mwami ne Yehoyata. Bachirumikhira khukhola bibiindu bie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu milimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khulwe biianwa bie khukhwosia. Lundi bachikholamo bibiindu bie khusuta bibiindu biiunya bulayi ne bibiindu bie esahabu ne efwesa. Nio baana biianwa bie khukhwosia munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli busiele mu bulamu bwa Yehoyata bwoosi.
Nio Yehoyata aaba omusaakhulu lukali mala afwa. Aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru nafwa.
Bamusiikha mu Lukoba lwa Daudi mu biliindwa bie babaami. Bamusiikha abwenao sikila akhola kamalayi mu Isiraeli ne khu Wele ne khunju eya Wele.
Nio, enyuma we lifwa lia Yehoyata, babemeelesi ba Yuda becha mala basikamila omwami. Ne omwami aulila kakabwe.
Balekha enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe mala bakholela wele Asiera ne bifwaani bibiindi. Lirima lia Wele liecha khu Yuda ne Yerusalemu sikila bumayaanu bwabwe buno.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaruma bang'oosi mu nibo khubakobosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bang'oosi bano bababoolela bumayaanu bwabwe ne kakhali se baulila tawe.
Ne kakhali babaandu bachongela Sakaria. Khulwe lilaka lio mwami baapa Sakaria kamabaale khu luuya lwe nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono Yoashi se akhebulila bulayi nibwo raraawe owa Sakaria amukholela tawe. Era omwana wewe. Ne Sakaria nga aba ne alikho afwa aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya amubona mala aruungisia!”
Kumwiiko ne kucha khuwa banamae ba Shamu becha khukhwibwaakala Yoashi. Becha e Yuda ne e Yerusalemu mala babunia babemeelesi boosi be babaandu. Basuta bibiindu bie mu mbaambe bayilila omwami owa Damasika.
Akhaba banamae ba Shamu ne baba batiiti, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia bukhili khu banamae ba Yuda ba baaba bakali. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario sikila ba Yuda baba balekhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe. Mu ngila yino Bashamu bareera kumunaanio khu Yoashi.
Banamae ba Shamu barekukha ne baumisie Yoashi lukali. Bakholi ba Yoashi bachongela Yoashi mala bamwirira khu sitanda siewe. Bamwiira sikila niye eera okhwa Yehoyata omusaayi. Nio Yoashi afwa mala bamusiikha mu Lukoba lwa Daudi. Ne kakhali se bamusiikha mu biliindwa bie babaami tawe.
Abo babamuchongela baba Sabati okhwa Simeati, Omuamoni, ne Yehosabadi okhwa Shimuriti Omumoabu.
Chingano che babaana bewe ne bung'oosi bukali khu niye, ne khukhwombakha lundi enju eya Wele, biaandikwa mu sitabu sisinoosia kamakhuwa ke mu sitabu sie babaami. Omwana wewe Amasia amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Amasia aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano ne aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na tisa mu Yerusalemu. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Yehoadini khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Aakhola kaali kamaluungi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kakhali se akhola ario ne kumwoyo kumukwalaafu.
Nga bubwami bwewe bwaandalala busa buri, Amasia eera bakholi bewe babera omwami, raraawe.
Ne kakhali se eera babaana babwe tawe, khuloondekhana nga liaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamalaka ka Musa. Mu malaka kano Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba aloma ali, “Ba paapa se baliirwa sikila bubwoni bwe babaana babwe tawe namwe babaana se baliirwa khulwe bubwoni bwe bapaapa babwe tawe. Buli mundu aliirwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe omwene.”
Nio Amasia abuusia babaandu ba Yuda mala abara mu bipupu alala ne Babenjamini khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe. Abara asi we bubwimeelesi bwe banamae babemeelela bipupu chielefu ne chimia. Abuusia babaandu ba baba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khucha angaaki. Anyoola ali baba babaandu chielefu chimia chitaru. Babaandu bano babanyala khurumikhira kamafumo ne chingabo.
Aruunga lundi banamae be kamaani, chielefu emia ndala khukhwama mu Isiraeli khumupanila liie. Abaruunga bitonyi bie efwesa emia ndala.
Ne kakhali omundu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amwichakho mala amuboolela ali, “Ee Omwami, okhacha ne sipupu sie banamae ba Isiraeli tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se ali ne Baisiraeli, Baefuraimu bano boosi tawe.
Ne kakhali ne wibaasia oli nocha nabo olaba ne kamaani ke khukhupana lukali, Wele acha khukhukwisia ewe ebweeni we basiku. Wele ali ne kamaani khukhuyeeta namwe khukhukwisia.”
Amasia areeba omundu owa Wele oyo ali, “Khukhola khuriena khu fwesa emia ndala niyo ese ndungire banamae ba Isiraeli?” Omundu owa Wele amukobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala akhuelesie khukhilakho yino.”
Nio Amasia alekha sipupu sie banamae babeecha khukhwama Efuraimu bache engo. Bakobola engo ne bali ne lirima likali khu Yuda.
Ne kakhali Amasia eramo kumwoyo mala arangirira babaandu bewe. Acha mu Litooma lia chumbe eera babaandu ba Seiri chielefu ekhumi.
Babaandu ba Yuda baamba babaandu babaandi balamu chielefu ekhumi. Bababukula babayila khungaaki khwe lulwanda mala babamwaata asi, mala boosi bafwa.
Ne sipupu sie banamae nibo Amasia arakho bakobole engo nibo akhafukiilila ache nabo mwiie tawe, bebwaakala chingoba cha Yuda khukhwama e Samaria khukhwola e Beti-horoni. Bera babaandu chielefu chitaru mala babukula bibiindu biabwe.
Enyuma we khukhwira Baedomu, Amasia areera bawele be babaandu ba Seiri mala asimikha wele bano nga wele bewe. Abesaaya ne khubaanila biianwa.
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambwa lirima khu Amasia mala amurumira omung'oosi. Omung'oosi amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne osaayile bawele be babaandu babaandi bakhaonia babaandu babwe babene khukhwama khwiwe tawe?”
Ne kakhali nga aba ne asiloma, omwami amureeba ali, “Khwakhukholile ewe khuba omukaambisi owe bubwami? Yakama! Siina sikila ne wenya ofwe?” Nio omung'oosi akama khulomaloma. Ne kakhali ne akhakama tawe aloma ali, namanyile ndi Wele enya khu khubunia ewe, sikila ewe wakholile kano ne se warekereesie likaambila liase tawe.
Omwami Amasia owa Yuda aafukiilisiana ne bakambisi bewe. Nio aruma burume khu Yoashi okhwa Yehoahasi, omwichukhulu owa Yehu omwami owa Isiraeli. Amasia alaanga Yoashi ali, “yiicha khuupane.”
Ne Yoashi, omwami owa Isiraeli akobosia Amasia omwami owa Yuda ali, “Liwa lie mu Lebanoni liaruma burume khu murongooro kumutarakwa mu Lebanoni ne liboola lili, ‘Lekhuula omukhaana wowo, akhwalikhe khu musoleeli wase.’ Ne esaang'i yama Lebanoni yecha yaswalakilila liwa elio.
Ewe wibaasia mu mwoyo kwowo oli waula Edomu mala olikho wefumia. Nono yikhala engo! Siina sikila wireerere butinyu mala obune ewe ne babaandu ba Yuda?”
Ne kakhali Amasia se arekeeresia tawe. Wele akhola lino nio aane Amasia ne Yuda khu basiku babwe sikila basaayanga bawele ba Edomu.
Nio Yoashi omwami owa Isiraeli acha khukhwibwaakala Amasia. Bakaanana bapana liie e Beti-shemesi mu Yuda.
Isiraeli yaula Yuda mala buli mundu owa Yuda elukha akobola engo.
Yoashi omwami owa Isiraeli aamba Amasia omwami owa Yuda e Beti-shemesi. (Amasia aba okhwa Yoashi, lundi omwichukhulu owa Ahasia.) Yoashi ayila Amasia e Yerusalemu. Yoashi atechula lisiisi lia Yerusalemu; khukhwama e Silibwa sia Efuraimu khukhwola khu Silibwa sie khumbo. Atechula buleeyi bwe bikele chimia chine.
Yoashi abukula esahabu yoosi ne efwesa, ne bibiindu bioosi nibio anyoola mu Lukaangu lwa Wele. Bibiindu ebio biaba asi we buliindi bwa Obedi-Edomu. Abukula lundi bie mu mabiikhilo ke nju eyo mwami ne khuamba babaandu ba babamo. Nio Yoashi aakobola e Samaria.
Amasia okhwa Yoashi omwami owa Yuda, amenya kimiiko ekhumi ne kiraano; enyuma we lifwa lia Yoashi okhwa Yehoahasi; omwami owa Isiraeli.
Nono bibiindu bibiindi nibio Amasia akhola bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami ba Yuda ne Isiraeli.
Khukhwama khu siise nisio alekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babaandu bamukwangwaanila mu Yerusalemu. Nio elukha acha mu lukoba lwa Lakishi, ne kakhali baruma babaandu bamuloondakho e Lakishi mala bamwiira.
Bara kumubili kwewe khu farasi bakukobosia engo, mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bakuuka bewe mu Yerusalemu, lukoba lwa Daudi.

Babaandu ba Yuda boosi bamiia Usia khuba omwami mu bweyaangu bwa Amasia raraawe. Usia aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi ne sita.
Ombakha lukoba lwa Eloti mala alukhola lwaba lwe sibala sia Yuda lundi, enyuma we khufwa khwa Amasia.
Usia aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi ne sita ne aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia mu Yerusalemu kimiiko kamakhumi karaano ne kibili. Lisina lia maawe liaba Yekolia, khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Usia akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga Amasia raraawe ne akhola.
Usia aria Wele mu bulamu bwa Sakaria bwoosi sikila Sakaria amukaambilanga. Ne biise bioosi nibio Usia aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele amukhola aindiaala.
Usia acha apana liie ne Bafilisiti. Atechula kamasiisi ke chingoba chabwe cha Katihi, Yabune, ne Ashitoti. Nio ombakha chingoba chimbia embi ne Ashitoti ne abuundu aandi mu Bafilisiti.
Wele ayeeta Usia aapana ne Bafilisiti, Baarabu babamenyanga mu Kuribaali ne Bameuni.
Baamoni baruunganga busuuru khu Usia. Lisina liewe liafuma oosi khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Misiri, sikila aaba owe kamaani lukali.
Khutasa khwako Usia ombakha chindeleelwa mu Yerusalemu e Silibwa sie mu koona, e Silibwa sie Mwitooma nende niio lisiisi Liyukhila. Aakhola bilibwa bino biaba bie kamaani.
Lundi ombakha chindeleelwa mu sichiimi mala ayaba chisebele chingali sikila aaba ne chikhaafu chingali khu bikulu bie mumbo ne mu mweyeeywe. Aaba ne babaandu babamukholelanga mu mikuunda ne mu maruuti ke kimisabibu mu bikulu ne mu mikuunda kie ngakha, sikila asiima bulimi.
Usia aaba ne banamae bakali ba baaba ne bekisibwa khukhupana liie. Babalwa mala bareebwa mu mikaanda ne Yeieli omuandiki ne Maaseya omunamae. Hanania mulala khu banamae bakhulu bo mwami aba omwimeelesi wabwe.
Banamae be kamaani boosi khukhwama mu bemeelesi be chinju cha Isiraeli baba chielefu chibili ne chimia sita.
Asi we bunyali bwabwe babao banamae chielefu miatatu na saba ne chimia chiraano. Bapananga ne kamaani khuyeeta omwami khu basiku bewe.
Usia aelesia banamae bewe boosi chingabo, kamafumo, chikofio che bichuuma, bimolo bie bibia, buyiingo ne kamabaale ke khuchukuchila mu mburuusi.
Mu Yerusalemu aramo chiyinjini chichakholwa ne bafundi. Aara chiyinjini chino khu ndeleelwa ne khu koona khwe kamasiisi ke lukoba khulwe khulasa buembo ne kamabaale kamaboofu. Nono Usia afuma buli abuundu sikila anyoola buyeeti bukali khukhwama khu Wele, khukhwola nga ne aba ne bunyali bukali.
Ne nga Usia aaba ne bunyali bukali arakikha khukhwilola. Lino liakila abuna. Aaba omubeeyi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe. Engila mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi khu alutare eye bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Ne kakhali Asaria ne basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babaandi kamakhumi munaane banyindaafu baloonda khu Usia bengila mu Lukaangu.
Bamuboolela bali, “Ewe se wenyekhana khukhwosia biiunya bulayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Basaayi bong'ene be lisaaye lia Aruni nibo ba batakaasibwa khulwe khukhwosia biiunya bulayi. Rekukha orure Abuundu Atakatifu ano, sikila wakholile libi, ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alakhuelesia lukoosi khu lino tawe.”
Nio Usia akhalala. Aba ali nende sie khukhwosiela biiunya bulayi mu mukhono kwewe. Nga aambila basaayi lirima, bulwaale bwe kamakele bwecha mu bweni mwewe ne emile ebweeni we basaayi embi ne alutare eye khukhwosielakho biiunya bulayi.
Ne Asaria, Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne basaayi babaandi boosi bamulola mala babona kamakele mu bweni mwewe! Nio bamurusia khangu khukhwama mu Lukaangu. Ne Usia omwene akhola khangu arura enje, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba alikho amuelesia kumunaanio.
Nio omwami Usia aaba ne kamakele khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo afwilakho. Sikila aaba ne kamakele, amenya munju yeewe yeng'ene. Se afukiililwa khukhwingila mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Omusoleeli wewe Yosamu aaba omuliindi wenju eye bubwami, mala amiia sibala.
Bibiindu bibiindi nibio Usia aakhola ne ali omwami khukhwama e khurakikha khukhwola ekhumaliilikha, biaandikwa ne omung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amosi.
Usia afwa mala asiikhwa ne bakuuka bewe mu biliindwa bie babaami. Bamusiikha bario sikila baloma bali, “Usia ali ne kamakele.” Ne omusoleeli wewe Yosamu amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Yosamu aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko ekhumi ne sita mu Yerusalemu. Lisina lia maawe liaba bali Yerusha omukhaana owa Satoki.
Yosamu akhola kaali kamalayi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aakhola kamalayi bulayi bwene nga Usia raraawe ne akhola. Ne kakhali Yosamu se engilila kimilimo kie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Ne kakhali babaandu bachiililila khukhola kamamayaanu.
Yosamu ang'oona silibwa sie ngaaki sie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala atasa khukhwombakha lukali lisiisi lie Ofeli.
Khutasa khwako, ombakha chingoba mu sibala sie lukulu sia Yuda. Lundi ombakha chingoba ne chindeleelwa mu musiru.
Yosamu aapana ne Baamoni mala abaula. Nono buli kumwiiko khulwe kimiiko kitaru baruunga busuuru khu Yosamu bwe bitonyi bie efwesa emia ndala, biikula chielefu ekhumi bie engaanu ne biikula chielefu ekhumi che Shayiri.
Nono Yosamu aaba ne kamaani sikila aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe.
Nono bibiindu bibiindi nibio Yosamu aakhola ne kamae kewe koosi, ne chingila chewe choosi, chaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Isiraeli ne Yuda.
Yosamu aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko ekhumi ne sita khukhwama mu Yerusalemu.
Yosamu afwa mala asiikhwa mu Yerusalemu, Lukoba lwa Daudi. Omwana wewe Ahasi amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Ahasi aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko ekhumi ne sita mu Yerusalemu. Ne se akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga kuuka wewe Daudi ne akhola tawe.
Ahasi akhola bibiindu bulayi bwene nga babaami ba Isiraeli ne bakhola. Akhola akhaba bifwaani bia Baali.
Oosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi mwitooma lia Beni-hinomu. Lundi oosia babaana bewe nga embosio eye khukhwosia. Akhola ario khuloondekhana ne ke bisinyisia bie chikholo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aoona charura mu sibala ebweeni we Baisiraeli.
Ahasi aana chimbosio ne khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi abuundu aesuta, khu bikulu ne asi wa buli kumurongooro kumubisi.
Khu ndaalo ndala Peka, okhwa Remalia eera banamae banyindaafu chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili mu Yuda. Peka abeera sikila baba balekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.
Ne Sikiri omunamae owe kamaani khukhwama Efuraimu eera Maseeya, omusoleeli wo mwami Ahasi. Era lundi Asirikamu komanda oliindanga lichipi lio mwami, ne Elikana owaba oloondela omwami mu bunyali.
Banamae ba Isiraeli baamba balebe babwe chielefu chimia chibili. Babukula bakhasi, basoleeli ne bakhaana. Lundi bayaaya bibiindu bikali bie mu mbaambe khukhwama mu Yuda, basuta babiila e Samaria.
Ne kakhali omung'oosi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owalaangwa bali Oteti abayo. Arura akaanane ne banamae ba Isiraeli nga baba ne balikho bakobola e Samaria. Ababoolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, amuuelesia enywe sibala sia Yuda, sikila aambila babaandu basio lirima. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abone nga mubeerire mu ngila eye bukhalafu bukali.
Luno mulikho murekekha khukhola babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu be siseecha ne siikhasi khuba nasioobi benywe. Enywe mwesi se muli ne bubwoni bwenywe mwabeene khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe tawe ku?
Nono ndekeeresie. Kobosia engo bawandaayenywe ne bakooko nibo mwaambile sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuambile enywe lirima lukali.”
Nono babemeelesi balala ba Efuraimu nga Asaria okhwa Yoanani, Berekia okhwa Meshilemoti, Yehisikia okhwa Shalumu, ne Amasa okhwa Hadilai, bakhiingilila banamae babama mwiie.
Babakaania bali, “Mukhareera baboe khukhwama mu Yuda ano tawe. Mwakhola murio, aba mwakhurereere efwe kumusaango ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khutasa khu bwoni ne kumusaango nibio khuli nabio. Kumusaango kwefwe kuli khale kumukali lukali mala lirima liewe lirafu lili khu Isiraeli.”
Nio banamae balekhuula baambe ne bibiindu nibio baba ne bayaayile mwiie, ebweeni we babemeelesi ne libuusiana lie babaandu boosi.
Babaandu nibo kamasina kabwe kalaangwa benyokha babukula baambe, ne nibio banamae ba Isiraeli baba ne bayaayile bafwara boosi ba baaba sichula mu nibo. Baelesia baambe chingubo, biraaro, siakhulia bie khunywa ne kamalesi. Bara baambe batekhele boosi khu punda mala babakobosia khu be chinju chabwe mu Yeriko, lukoba lwe kimikheendu. Nio, bakobola engo e Samaria.
Mu siise esio omwami Ahasi aaruma balaange omwami owa Ashuru eche amuyeete.
Baedomu baba bechile lundi bebwaakale ne khuula Yuda, mala baambile babaandu embaambe mala bachile ne nabo.
Bafilisiti bosi bebwaakala ne khuamba chingoba che mu Shefela nende che ebunafubo owa Yuda. Baamba chingoba cha Beti-shemesi, Aiyaloni, Keteroti, Soko, Timuna ne Kimuso ne birekere bibiachibotookhelela. Bafilisiti bamenya mu ngoba echo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areerera Yuda kumunaanio, sikila Ahasi omwami areera bumayaanu mu Yuda mala se aba omweyikinwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Ne kakhali Tikilati-pilineseri omwami owa Ashuru echa khukhwibwaakala Ahasi ne khuelesia Ahasi kumunaanio mu bweyaangu bwe buyeeti.
Ahasi abukula bibiindu bie khukhwama mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khukhwama munju eye bubwami ne khukhwama khu bemeelesi mala abielesia Omwami owe Ashuru, ne kakhali se amuyeeta tawe.
Mu siise sie kumunaanio kwewe Ahasi atasa khuba okhali omweyikinwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Aana chimbosio khu wele be babaandu ba Damasika, ba baba ne bamuulile. Ebaasia ali “Bawele be babaami ba Shamu babayeeta. Ne ese naba ne mbaanila chimbosio banyala banjeeta akhaba seesi.” Ne kakhali bawele bano baba libuna khu Ahasia ne Isiraeli yoosi.
Ahasi abuusia alala bibiindu khukhwama mu Lukaangu lwa Wele mala abibwasulaka mu bitonyi. Lundi ekala kimiliango kie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ombakha chi alutare khu buli khu koona eya Yerusalemu.
Buli mu lukoba mu Yuda, Ahasi akhola abuundu aesuta khukhwosielao bibiindu biiunya bulayi khu wele babaandi. Nio aambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka bewe lirima.
Nono bibiindu nibio Ahasi akhola ne chingila chewe khukhwama mu khurakikha khukhwola ekhumaliilikha biaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Yuda ne Isiraeli.
Ahasi afwa mala asiikhwa mu Yerusalemu ne kakhali se asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie babaami ba Isiraeli tawe. Omwana wewe Hesekia amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Hesekia aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kiraano nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne tisa khukhwama mu Yerusalemu. Lisina lia maawe liaba Abicha omukhaana owa Sakaria.
Hesekia akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga Daudi kuuka wewe akhola.
Mu mwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko kwe khunyoa, kwe bubwami bwewe Hesekia ekula kimiliango kie enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aking'oona.
Hesekia areera basaayi ne Balawi mala ababuusia khu luuya, lubeka lwe bukwe we Lukaangu.
Ababoolela ali, “Balawi, ndekeeresie, luno khemwitakaase mala mutakaase Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe. Rusia buli siindu siili sinyaalu Abuundu Atakatifu.
Bakuuka befwe se baba babeyikinwa tawe mala bakhola kaali kamamayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe. Bamulekha mala balekha khusaayila mu Lukaangu nimwo amenya mala bamuloba.
Lundi bekala kimiliango kie lusiro luboofu lwe Lukaangu mala basimia chitaa. Se bosia bibiindu biiunya bulayi namwe se baana embosio eye khukhwosia Abuundu Atakatifu khu Wele owa Isiraeli tawe.
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu lirima. Abakholile babeele babaandu be khuterema, khuukia ne khukhomwa, nga mwabene ne muboone ne chimoni chenywe.
Bakuuka befwe berwa ne basoleeli befwe ne bakhaana befwe, ne bakhasi befwe baambiilwe embaambe sikila kano.
“Nono ese nebasiisie khukhola endakaano ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, nio lirima liewe lirafu khwifwe liwe.
Basoleeli base, luno mukhaba be sikorerwa tawe, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abarobore enywe mwime ebweeni wewe mumukholele, mube bakholi bewe mala mumwoselie bibiindu biiunya bulayi.”
Nono Balawi bano barakikha kimilimo. Balawi bano baaba:
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Kohati,
Mahati okhwa Amasai ne Yoeli okhwa Asaria.
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Merari,
Kishi okhwa Abuti ne Asaria okhwa Yehaleleli.
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Kerishoni,
Yoa okhwa Sima ne Edeni okhwa Yoa.
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Elisafani,
Shimuri ne Yeueli.
Khukhwama mu lisaaye lia Asafu
Sakaria ne Matania.
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Hemani,
Yehueli ne Shimei.
Khukhwama mu be luuya lwa Yedutuni,
Shemaya ne Usieli.
Balawi bano babuusia bawandaayabwe alala mala betakaasa baba batakatifu khulwe kimilimo mu Lukaangu. Nono bengila mu Lukaangu nga omwami ne alaka khuloondekhana ne Elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khutakaasa enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Basaayi bengila mu lusiro lwe mukari lwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulutakaasa. Barusia enje bibiindu binyaalu bioosi nibio banyoola mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala babira khu luuya lwe Lukaangu. Nono Balawi babukula bibiindu bino bioosi babisuta babiyila a kheechi kha Kiduroni.
Barakikha khutakaasa khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa. Khu ndaalo ekhola munaane eye kumwesi baba bolile mu lusiro luboofu lwe Lukaangu. Ne khu ndaalo munaane batakaasa Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Khu ndaalo ekhola ekhumi ne sita eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa bamala khutakaasa Lukaangu.
Nio basaayi bacha khu mwami Hesekia mala baboola bali, “Khwatakaasile enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yoosi. Lundi khwatakaasile alutare khulwe khukhwosia biianwa ne bibiindu bie khukholelakho kimilimo, ne mesa eye khurakho kumukaati kumutakatifu ne bibiindu bie khukholelakho kimilimo bioosi.
Bibiindu bioosi nibio omwami Ahasi alekha mu bwami bwewe, nga akhaba omweyikinwa khu Wele tawe, khwabing'oonile ne khubitakaasa. Ne lola bili ebweeni wa alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Omwami Hesekia enyokha makhelebeende endaalo eloondakho abuusia babemeelesi be lukoba, mala acha ne nabo mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bareera chiuunwa saba, kamamiiku saba, kamameeme saba ne chindurume saba khulwe siianwa sie khumalao bubwoni khu bwami, khu Lukaangu ne khulwe sibala sia Yuda. Omwami Hesekia alaka basaayi, be lisaaye lia Aruni baane biianwa bino khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono bera chiuunwa, kamamiiku, ne kamameeme mala basaayi babukula kamalasile kabio bakaanyaka khu alutare.
Ekhumaliilikha basaayi bareera chindurume khulwe siianwa sie khumalao bubwoni khu mwami Hesekia ne libuusiana. Omwami Hesekia ne libuusiana bara kamakhono kabwe khu ndurume.
Basaayi bachiira mala barumikhira kamalasile kacho khuaana siianwa sie khumalao bubwoni khu alutare. Bakhola bario khumalao bubwoni bwa Isiraeli yoosi. Sikila omwami aba alakile ali embosio eye khukhwosia ne biianwa bie khumalao bubwoni biaanwe khulwe Baisiraeli boosi.
Omwami Hesekia engisia mu Lukaangu Balawi ba baaba ne bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, kamatuungu ne biilili, nga Daudi ne Kati ne Nasani baba ne balaka (Kati aaba owe kamalola owo mwami ne Nasani aba omung'oosi.) Lilaka lino liama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu bang'oosi bewe.
Balawi bema ne bibiindu bie khurumikhira khukhwimba kimienya ne basaayi bema ne chikhoombi.
Nio omwami Hesekia alaka ali siianwa sie khukhwosia siaanwe khu alutare. Nga siianwa sie khukhwosia siarakikha khuya, kumwenya kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwosi kwarakikha khukhwimbwa. Chikhoombi chapwa, ne kamatuungu ka Daudi omwami owa Isiraeli.
Babaandu boosi basaaya, ne babeembi be kimienya bemba nende be chikhoombi baapa chikhoombi chabwe nabwila siianwa sie khukhwosia ne siawa.
Nga siianwa ne siawa, omwami Hesekia nende buli mundu owaba ne naye basikama basaaya.
Omwami Hesekia ne babemeelesi balaka Balawi khukhwimba kimienya kie fuma khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne barumikhira kamakhuwa niko Daudi ne Asafu owe kamalola baba ne barumikhira. Nio bemba kimienya kie fuma khu Wele ne busangaafu mala basikama asi basaaya.
Hesekia aboolela babaandu ali, “Luno enywe mweanile mwabene khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi; nono khemwiche siimbi. Reera chimbosio ne biianwa bie khusiima munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Nono libuusiana liareera chimbosio ne biianwa bie khusiima. Buli mundu owaba ne lilienya mu mwoyo kwewe areera biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Biianwa bie khukhwosia nibio libuusiana liareera biaba chiuunwa kamakhumi saba kamamiiku emia ndala ne kamameeme chimia chibili. Bibiaayo bino bioosi biaanwa nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Biianwa bitakatifu bioosi biaba chiuunwa chimia sita ne kamakheese chielefu chitaru.
Ne kakhali basaayi baba batiiti lukali khubaaka bibiaayo ebio bioosi khulwe biianwa bie khukhwosia. Nono basaayi babaandi ne bakhetakaasa tawe, balebe babwe Balawi babayeeta nabwila kimilimo ne kiawa. Balawi baba barekerefu mu khwitakaasa khulwe kimilimo kio Mwami Wele khukhila basaayi.
Alala ne biianwa bie khukhwosia, biabao biianwa bie kumuleembe bie kiminawa nende bie khunywa.
Nono lisaaya mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liarakikha lundi.
Omwami Hesekia ne babaandu boosi basangaala lukali sikila niko Wele aaba ne akholele babaandu. Wele akhola likhuwa lino khangu.

Omwami Hesekia aaruma burume khu baandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda boosi. Aandika lundi chibarwa khu baandu ba Efuraimu ne Manase. Hesekia alaanga babaandu bano boosi mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu khukhola Epasaka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Omwami ne babemeelesi bewe, ne babaandu boosi mu Yerusalemu bafukiilisiana khukhola Epasaka mu mwesi kukhola khabili.
Ne kakhali se banyala khukhola Epasaka khu siise siayo tawe. Basaayi se baba betakaasile ne khuboolela babaandu khukhola kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Ne lundi babaandu baba bakheebuusia mu Yerusalemu tawe.
Lirekekha lino liabonekha lilayi khu mwami ne khu baandu boosi.
Nio babisia khurusia kumulaango, buli abuundu mu Isiraeli, khukhwama Beerisheba khukhwola Dani. Baboolela babaandu beche e Yerusalemu khukhola e Pasaka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Sikila khulwe siise sileeyi babaandu se bakholanga e Pasaka mu bukali nga liaandikwa mu lilaka tawe.
Khu lilaka lio mwami Hesekia babaandu babukula chibarwa khukhwama khu niye ne babemeelesi bewe bayila mu Isiraeli mwoosi ne mu Yuda. Chibarwa chaboola chili, “Ee baandu ba Isiraeli kobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo. Mwakhola murio Wele alamukobolela enywe musiili balamu babelukha khukhwama khu baami ba Ashuru.
Mukhaba nga bakuuka benywe ne balebe benywe bakhaaba basuubilwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola babaandu bano baba be khubuna nga mwabene ne muboona.
Mukhaluma kimirwe nga bakuuka benywe ne baba tawe. Ne kakhali mwiaane mwabeene khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mwiche mu Lukaangu lwewe nilwo atakaasa mindali na mindali. Kholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe nio akhamuambila lirima likali tawe.
