Mwaba ne mukobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, balebe benywe ne babaana benywe bacha khukholelwa siisa ne babaandu ba babaamba mala bakobole mu sibala sino. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali omulayi lundi owe siisa. Se alamufutarira mwaba ne mumukobolela tawe.”
Barumwa bacha khukhwama mu lukoba khukhwola khu lundi mu Efuraimu ne Manase; mala bachiililila busa bario boola e Sebuluni. Ne kakhali babaandu babachekheelela ne khu bakhoma.
Ne babaandu balala khukhwama mu Asieri mu Manase ne Sebuluni beboombia mala bacha e Yerusalemu.
Ne Wele aaba ne babaandu ba Yuda, abaambaasia khukhola niko omwami ne babemeelesi balaka khubirira khu lomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu bakali becha alala mu Yerusalemu. Becha khukhola naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe mu mwesi kwa khabili. Baba libuusiana likali.
Babaandu barakikha kimilimo mala basiula barusiao chi alutare chichaba mu Yerusalemu. Lundi barusiao chialutare choosi che khukhwoseliakho bibiindu biiunya bulayi. Bamwaata chialutare echo mu Litooma lia Kiduroni.
Ne khu ndaalo eye khumi ne chine eye kumwesi kwa khabili, beera limeeme lie e Pasaka. Ne basaayi ne Balawi baambwa chisoni, nio betakaasa mala bareera biianwa bie khukhwosia mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babukula bubweyaangu bwabwe nga buli lwosi khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Musa, omundu owa Wele. Basaayi baanyaka khu alutare kamalasile ke chimbosio, niko Balawi babaelesia.
Babaandu bakali mu libuusiana se betakaasa babene tawe. Balawi beera limeeme lie e Pasaka khulwa buli mundu okhaba omutakaase tawe; nio Balawi batakaasa buli limeeme khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Sikila babaandu bakali khukhwama Efuraimu, Manase, Isakari ne Sebuluni se baba betakaasile tawe, mala balia kamameeme ke e Pasaka. Bakhola niko lilaka lia Musa likaania. Ne kakhali Hesekia abasabila. Aaloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Omulayi, beela abo
bakhusaaya ewe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe. Babeele akhaba ne bakhetakaasile khuloondekhana ne kamalaka ke Lukaangu ke khukhwetakaasa tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila Hesekia, mala aonia babaandu.
Baisiraeli ba babao mu Yerusalemu bakhola naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, khulwe chindaalo saba mu busangaafu bukali. Balawi ne basaayi bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli endaalo ne bamwimbila ne kamaani kabwe koosi.
Hesekia alomaloma ne ara kumwoyo mu Balawi boosi babekesia busicha mu milimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaandu balia siakhulia sia naikara khulwe chindaalo saba. Baana biianwa bie kumuleembe ne khusiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.
Nio libuusiana lie babaandu boosi bafukiilila khuchiililila khukhola naikara khulwe chindaalo chichiindi saba. Nio bachiililila khulwe chindaalo chichiindi saba mu busangaafu.
Hesekia omwami owa Yuda aelesia libuusiana lie babaandu chiuunwa eelefu ndala ne kamakheese chielefu saba. Ne babemeelesi baelesia libuusiana lie babaandu chiuunwa e elefu ndala ne kamakheese chielefu ekhumi. Basaayi betakaasa bakali.
Libuusiana lie babaandu ba Yuda boosi ne basaayi, Balawi ne libuusiana liosi liliama Isiraeli, baakwa babecha mu Isiraeli, ne baakwa ba baamenya mu Yuda, boosi basangaala lukali.
Busangaafu bukali bwaba mu Yerusalemu, sikila abele khukhwama khu siise sia Solomoni okhwa Daudi, omwami owa Isiraeli, se siabakhoo sisiindu nga esio sirio mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu tawe.
Nio basaayi ne Balawi benyokha beema mala babiita babaandu chikhabi mala Wele abaulila; lisaba liabwe liola mwikulu mutakatifu nimwo Wele amenyile.

Nga naikara eya e Pasaka ne yawa, Baisiraeli boosi ba baaba mu Yerusalemu barura bacha mu ngoba cha Yuda. Ebweeneyo batechulaka chinjeko mala baremaka sifwaani sia wele Asherimu. Bonakaka abuundu aesuta ne chi alutare che khusaayilakho wele babaandi mu Yuda mwoosi, Benjamini, Efuraimu ne Manase. Nio enyuma ne bamalile khukhwonakaka bioosi, Baisiraeli abo bakobola mu ngoba chabwe ne mu chingo.
Omwami Hesekia arobora bipupu bie basaayi ne Balawi abara khu milimo, buli omusaayi ne omulawi khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiewe. Bipupu bino biaananga biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie kumuleembe, ne khukhola kimilimo mu bilibwa bie chikambi cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khusiima ne khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Hesekia aana bibiaayo khukhwama mwituuli liewe omwene khulwe biianwa bie khukhwosia. Biianwa bie khukhwosia bino biaba bie kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba, ne chindaalo che Sabato, khu siise sie kumwesi kumuya ne khulwe chinaikara, nga liaandikwa mu lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga Baisiraeli banyoola lilaka lia Hesekia busa liri, baana mu bukali biakhulia biabwe bie khunyoa, endali, kamafura, bubuukhi nende buli siindu nisio basaasianga mu mikuunda. Bareera sitonyi silala khwikhumi eya buli siindu.
Ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda ba baamenya mu Yuda bosi bareera sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie chikhaafu ne kamakheese ne sitonyi silala khuwikhumi sie bibiindu bitakatifu bibiaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe mala babira bioosi bieema kumweeka.
Mu mwesi kukhola khataru barakikha khubuusia biianwa bie sitonyi silala khwikhumi ne biianwa bibiindi. Bamala khubuusia mu mwesi kwa saba.
Nga Hesekia ne babemeelesi bewe becha mala babona bituumi, bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne babaandu bewe, Baisiraeli.
Hesekia areeba basaayi ne Balawi khuloondekhana ne bituumi.
Asaria, Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, khukhwama munju eya Satoki akobosia Hesekia ali, “Khukhwama nga babaandu ne barakikha khureera biianwa biabwe mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi efwe khwabeele ne biakhulia bikali. Ne bikali khu biakhulia bino biaramire sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiitile babaandu bewe chikhabi. Nono khuli ne nabino bioosi biramire.”
Nio Hesekia alaka barekekhe chisiro mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Bakhola bario.
Bareera mu bwiyikinwa biianwa ne bibiindu bibiaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne sitonyi silala khwikhumi. Konania, Omulawi aaba niye omwimeelesi omukhulu owe bibiindu bino, ne Shimei wandaaye niye owamuloondela mu bwimeelesi.
Babayeetanga Konania ne Shimei baba babemeelesi, Yehieli, Asasia, Nahati, Asaheli, Yeremoti, Yosabati, Elieli, Isimakia, Mahati, ne Benaya. Omwami Hesekia ne Asaria Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, owe nju eya Wele barobora babaandu bano.
Kore okhwa Imuna Omulawi, omuliindi owe silibwa sie Bukwe, aaba omwimeelesi owe biianwa bie khukhwiaana khu Wele. Kumulimo kwewe kwaba khuaana biaanilwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne biianwa bitakatifu lukali.
Edeni, Miniamini, Yeshwa, Shemaya, Amaria, ne Shekania bayeetanga Kore mu bweyikinwa mu ngoba nimwo basaayi bamenyanga. Baananga khukhwama mu biaanilwe khu basaayi, baele ne basaakhulu sitube.
Khukhwama mu biaba ne biaanilwe, babaandu bano lundi baelesia basoleeli be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kitaru namwe khukhilakhoo, babaandikwa mu ngano che lisaaye lie Balawi. Basoleeli bano bengilanga mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe kimilimo kiabwe kia buli ndaalo, buli sipupu ne kimilimo kiasio.
Basaayi baelesibwa bitonyi bie biianwa khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe. Balawi be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilakho baelesibwa bitonyi khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiabwe ne bipupu biabwe.
Basaayi baebwa siakhulia siabwe nende sie babaana babwe bakeekhe, bakhasi, basoleeli, ne bakhaana boosi. Lino liakholekha sikila basaayi be lisaaye lia Aruni baba babeyikinwa mu khwitakaasa.
Balala khu be lisaaye lia Aruni bamenyanga mu mikuunda embi ne chingoba namwe mungoba. Babaandu baroborwa khuloondekhana ne kamasina khuaana siakhulia khu basaayi bano ne khu buli omulawi owaandikwa.
Kano niko omwami Hesekia akhola mu Yuda mwoosi. Aakhola kaali kamalayi ne kamaluungi nende ke bubwiyikinwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe.
Buli kumulimo nikwo Hesekia akhola khulwe enju eya Wele ne niko akhola khukhwichusia kamalaka ka Wele, ne asaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, akhola ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi, mala aindiaala.

Enyuma we bikholwa bie bubweyikinwa bia Hesekia bioosi Senakeribu, omwami owa Ashuru echa mala ebwaakala Yuda. Akara chingoba che lisiisi ne akanakana ali alachibukula chibe chichewe.
Hesekia amanya ali Senakeribu aba echile Yerusalemu khukhwibwaakala lukoba.
Nono Hesekia ne babemeelesi bewe ne banamae be kamaani babisia khukhiingilila chimoni che kameechi chichaba enje we lukoba. Babemeelesi ne banamae be kamaani bayeeta Hesekia.
Babaandu bakali babuusibwa alala mala bakhiingilila chimoni che kameechi choosi ne luluuchi lulwabira mu sibala. Baboola bali, “Omwami owa Ashuru se akhoya anyoola kameechi kamakali tawe.”
Nono Hesekia ara sinani mukhwombakha kamasiisi kakaba ne katechukha, mala akarakho chendeleelwa. Ombakha lisiisi liliindi enje we lisiisi lie khunyoa, mala asitoya lubeka lwe kimiliinda mu Yerusalemu. Lundi abasa bulwaani bukali ne chingabo chingali.
Hesekia ara bakhulu be banamae balinde babaandu. Ababuusia niye ali embi a silibwa sie lukoba mala abaramo kumwoyo ne aloma ali,
“Ba ne kamaani ne bunyindaafu. Mukharia namwe mweembeelela sikila omwami owa Ashuru ne banamae bakali bali ne naye tawe. Efwe khuli nende owe kamaani khumukhila niye.
Niye ali ne banamae bali babaandu busa ne efwe khuli ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe khu khuyeeta ne khu khuupanila kamae kefwe.” Babaandu baba ne bunyindaafu khulwe kamakhuwa ka Hesekia omwami owa Yuda.
Enyuma wa kano, omwami Senakeribu owa Ashuru owaba ne abotookhelela lukoba lwa Lakishi ne banamae bewe boosi, aruma bakholi bewe e Yerusalemu. Abaruma khu mwami Hesekia owa Yuda ne khu baandu ba Yuda boosi ba baaba mu Yerusalemu. Aboola ali,
“Ese Senakeribu omwami owa Ashuru mboola ndi, ‘Enywe muleyikinanga siina sikila ne mubotookhelela Yerusalemu?
Hesekia se alikho amubea nio amulekhe enywe mufwe khulwe enjala ne bulesia? Alikho amubea ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhakhuonie efwe khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru.
Se ali Hesekia yuno omwene owarusiao abuundu aesuta ne chi alutare cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi? Se ali niye owalaka babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu ali, musaaye ebweeni wa alutare ndala yong'ene, ne khukhwosia chimbosio khu alutare ndala yong'ene?
Enywe se mwamanya niko bakuuka base ne nase, khwakhola khu baandu boosi mu bibala bibiindi tawe ku? Wele be bibala ebio banyala khuonia babaandu babwe khukhwama mu bunyali bwase ku?
Bakuuka base babunia bibala ebio. Se alio mulala khu wele babwe owanyala khubaonia khukhwama khwise tawe. Ne wele wenywe naanu onyala amuonia khukhwama mu bunyali bwase?
Nono enywe mukhalekha Hesekia amusilwaasia namwe amubea mu ngila yino tawe. Ne mukhamweyikina sikila se aliio wele owe sibala siosi siosi namwe bubwami, namwe sibala sinyala khuonia babaandu basio khukhwama khu bakuuka base namwe khwise tawe. Ne wele wenywe ali ne kamaani matiiti ke khumuonia khukhwama mu bunyali bwase.’ ”
Ne babemeelesi ba Senakeribu batasa khulomaloma bubi bubuundi bukali khu Mwami WELE, ne khu mukholi wewe Hesekia.
Lundi Omwami Senakeribu aandika chibarwa che khukhoma Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli. Aandika ali, “Nga bawele be bibala bibiindi se banyalile khuonia babaandu babwe khukhwama mu bunyali bwase tawe, wele owa Hesekia se acha khunyala khuonia babaandu bewe khukhwama mu bunyali bwase tawe.”
Nio bayokela mu lulomo lwe Bayuda khu baandu ba Yerusalemu ba baaba khwisiisi lie lukoba. Babemeelesi bano benya khuriikhirisia babaandu, nio nibo baambe Yerusalemu.
Balomaloma khu Wele owa Yerusalemu nga oli balomaloma khu wele nibo babaandu bakhola ne kamakhono kabwe.
Nio omwami Hesekia ne omung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amosi, basaaya ne balila ne baloleleele mwikulu.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma malaika eera banamae be kamaani, ne banamae bakhulu ne babemeelesi mu kambi yo mwami owa Ashuru. Nio omwami Senakeribu aakobola mu sibala siewe ne chisoni. Nga aba ne engile munju eya wele wewe, balala khu basoleeli bewe babene bamwiira.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aonia Hesekia ne babaandu ba baamenya mu Yerusalemu khukhwama khu Senakeribu omwami owa Ashuru ne khukhwama khu basiku bewe boosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia kumuleembe buli lubeka.
Babaandu bakali baana biianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e Yerusalemu ne lundi bareerera omwami Hesekia owa Yuda biianwa bie bukusi bwe angaaki. Hesekia anyoola lukoosi ebweeni we bibala bioosi khukhwama siise esio khuchiililila.
Mu biise ebio Hesekia aba omulwale lukali aba embi khufwa. Asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia, amuelesia simanyisio.
Ne kakhali Hesekia se asiima Wele khu bulayi nibwo akholelwa tawe, sikila elola. Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila Hesekia ne babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu lirima.
Ne kakhali Hesekia ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu beboombia. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abareerera kumunaanio Hesekia ne asiili omulamu tawe.
Hesekia aba ne kimiaandu kimikali ne lukoosi lukali. Ekholela kamabiikhilo khulwe efwesa, esahabu, kamabaale kewe ke bukusi bukali, bibiindu bing'ayilisia, chingabo, ne bibiindu bibiindi bie bukusi bukali.
Ombakha akhaba chinju che khubungamo biakhulia, endali ne kamafura ne kamataala ke chikhaafu choosi, ne biko bie kamakheese.
Lundi eyombakhila chingoba mala aba ne kamatuuli ke kamakheese ne chikhaafu chingali, sikila Wele aelesia Hesekia kimiaandu kimikali.
Hesekia yuno niye owakhiingilila kumunwa kwe litiisi lie kameechi Kihoni mala ausia kameechi ako akalosia lubeka lwe mumbo lwa Yerusalemu. Ne Hesekia aindiaala buli mu siindu nisio akhola.
Ne siise silala babemeelesi ba Babiloni baruma barume babwe khu Hesekia, ne bamureeba ke simanyisio sisiekholekha mu sibala. Wele alekha Hesekia yeng'ene khu mukhaka nio amanye buli sisiindu sisiaba mu mwoyo kwa Hesekia.
Bikholwa bilayi bia Hesekia khu Wele ne bikholwa bibiindi nibio akhola biaandikwa mu malola ko mung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amosi. Kano kali mu sitabu sie babaami ba Yuda ne Isiraeli.
Hesekia aafwa mala asiikhwa khu sikulu, niio biliindwa bie lisaaye lia Daudi bili. Babaandu ba Yuda boosi ne ba Yerusalemu baelesia Hesekia lukoosi nga aafwa. Omusoleeli wewe Manase amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.

Manase aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi ne kibili nga ne aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia mu Yerusalemu khu miiko kamakhumi karaano na kiraano.
Aakhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aakhola bibiindu bie khusinya nibio chikholo chichiindi chaba ne chikholile, chikholo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne aoona charura mu sibala ebweeni we Baisiraeli.
Manase ombakha lundi abuundi aesuta niiyo raraawe Hesekia atechula. Ombakha alutare khu Baali. Akhola bifwaani bia wele Ashera mala asaaya ching'enieesi ne khuchikholela.
Lundi ombakha chi alutare mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ese khasaaywe mu Yerusalemu mindali na mindali,”
Manase ombakha chi alutare che khusaaya ching'enieesi mu mbia chibili che nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aana basoleeli bewe nga siianwa sie khukhwosia; bosebwa mu Litooma lia Beni-Hinomu. Aakhola buolelesi khumenieelesia, ne bulosi. Ne lundi aima bukambisi khukhwama khu bafumu ne babini. Akhola kaali kamamayaanu lukali ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima.
Manase aakhola sifwaani sie khukhwesaaya mala aasira mu nju eya Wele. Khu nju yino Wele aaba aboolela Daudi ne omusoleeli wewe Solomoni ali, “Mu nju muno ne mu Yerusalemu nilwo ndobore khukhwama mu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli, ese khasaayilwemo.
Se ndikhola lundi Baisiraeli barure mu sibala nisio naelesia bakuuka babwe tawe, baaba ne baria buli sisiindu nisio nabalaka mu mekisio koosi ne kamalaka khubirira khu Musa.”
Ne Manase akila babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu bakhola bumayaanu. Bakhola bumayaanu khukhila chikholo nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abunia ebweeni we Baisiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Manase ne babaandu bewe, ne kakhali se barekeeresia tawe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera banamae bakhulu be sipupu sie banamae sio mwami owa Ashuru khubebwaakala. Baamba Manase ne chindobo bamuboa kamakhono ne kiminyololo kie kumukasa mala bamuyila e Babiloni.
Nga Manase aba mu sibi ekongochela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wewe khulwe buyeeti, eboombia lukali ebweeni wa Wele owe bakuuka bewe.
Manase aasaba, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila liliekoonjelela liewe amukholela siisa. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amureera lundi mu Yerusalemu, mu bwami bwewe. Nio Manase amanya ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ali Wele.
Enyuma wa kano Manase ombakha lisiisi lienje lie Lukoba lwa Daudi. Aliombakha mwitoma, mumbo mwe khakheechi kha Kihoni. Ombakha lundi e muliango kwe Silibwa sie Eng'eeni mala abotookha sikulu sia Ofeli. Aniinia lisiisi lino lialea lukali. Ara banamae bakhulu mu ngoba choosi chisire mu Yuda.
Manase arusiao wele babaandi ne bifwaani khukhwama mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Arusiao lundi chi alutare choosi nicho aaba ne ombakha khu sikulu sie nju ne mu Yerusalemu. Abirusia abimwaata enje we lukoba.
Lundi akobosiao alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aanilakho chimbosio che biianwa bie kumuleembe nende bie khusiima. Manase alaka babaandu ba Yuda basaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Kakhaba kario, babaandu bachiililila khuana chimbosio abuundu aesuta, ne kakhali chimbosio chabwe chaanwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe yeng'ene.
Bibiindu bibiindi nibio Manase akhola, lisaba liewe khu Wele wewe, ne kamakhuwa niko be kamalola bamuboolela mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che babaami Baisiraeli.
Lisaba lia Manase ne siisa sia Wele khu niye, bumayaanu bwewe bwoosi ne khulekha khuba omweyikinwa, abuundu niio ombakha abuundu aesuta ne khusaaya bifwaani bia wele Ashera, ne bifwaani bibiindi, ebweeni ne akheboombia tawe, bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che bang'oosi.
Manase aafwa mala bamusiikha munju yewe. Nio omwana wewe Amoni amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Amoni aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne kibili nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Aba omwami khulwe kimiiko kibili mu Yerusalemu.
Akhola kaali kamamayaanu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulayi bwene nga Manase raraawe ne akhola. Amoni asaaya ne khuana chimbosio khu bifwaani bioosi nibio raraawe Manase aba akhola.
Amoni se eboombia ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga raraawe Manase ne akhola tawe. Ne kakhali Amoni yuno aakhola bumayaanu khutasilila busa.
Bakholi bewe bamukwangwaanila mala bamwirira munju yewe.
Ne kakhali babaandu be mu sibala esio beera boosi babakwangwaanila omwami Amoni mala bamiisia omusoleeli wewe Yosia aba omwami mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe.

Akhola kaali kamalayi ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhola nga kukaawe Daudi akhola mala se alekha khukhola kamalayi tawe.
Mu mwiiko kwewe kukhola munaane nga omwami, Yosia ne asili omwana omusoleeli, aarakikha khusaaya Wele owa kukaawe Daudi. Mu mwiiko kwewe kwe khumi na kibili nga Omwami, aarakikha khurusia mu Yuda ne mu Yerusalemu abuundu aesuta, wele Asiera, ne bifwaani bie khubeecha nende bie bibia.
Babaandu batechula chi alutare cha Baali, nga Yosia ne abalaka. Yosia atechula chialutare che bibiindu biiunya bulayi bibiaba angaaki we chialutare. Afunaka mu bitonyi bifwaani bia wele Ashera ne bifwaani bibiabeechwa nende bie bibia biaba nga lipukhuulu. Aanyaka lipukhuulu elio khu biliindwa bie babaandu ba baana chimbosio khu wele benabo.
Lundi osia kamakuumba ke basaayi be ba wele abo khu alutare chabwe. Nono Yosia arusia lisaaya lie bifwani liarura mu Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Mungoba cha Manase, Efuraimu, ne Simioni, khukhwola khu Nafutali ne khukhwola siimbi mungoba chabwe chichatechulwa,
Yosia atechula chialutare ne bifwaani bia wele Ashera. Akhola bifwaani bino biaba nga lipukhuulu. Atechula chialutare choosi che bibiindu biiunya kumuya kumulayi mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi. Nio akobola e Yerusalemu.
Nio mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na munaane Yosia ne ali omwami, atakaasa Yuda nende Lukaangu. Yosia aruma Shafani okhwa Asalia, Maaseya omwimeelesi owe lukoba, ne Yoa okhwa Yoahasi omuandiki, khung'oona Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Yosia.
Babaandu bano bacha khu Hilikia Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali mala bamuelesia chirupia nicho babaandu bareera munju eya Wele. Balawi baliindi be silibwa baba bachibuusia khukhwama khu baandu ba Manase, Efuraimu ne Baisiraeli boosi babarama balamu ne akhaba khukhwama mu baandu boosi ba Yuda, Benjamini ne Yerusalemu.
Baana chirupia echo khu bemeelesi babaroborwa khukhwimeelela kimilimo khu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Babemeelesi bano baruunga bakholi babakholanga kimilimo kie khung'oona Lukaangu.
Baana chirupia khu baakhola chimbao ne khu bombakhi bakule kamabaale kamabeeche ne kimirongooro. Chimbao charumikhwa khukhola biaambaania enju ne biteechi bie enju, nibio babaami ba Yuda balekha busa bionekha.
Babaandu bakhola kimilimo mu busuubilwa. Babemeelesi babwe baba Balawi Yahati ne Obadia, ba baaba babaana ba Merari, ne Balawi Sakaria ne Meshulamu, ba baaba be lisaaye lia Kohati. Ne Balawi boosi baba ne bukesi bukali bwe khukhuupa bibiindu bie kimienya,
bemeelela bakholi babasutanga bisutwa. Lundi bekesianga boosi babakholanga kimilimo kiosi kiosi. Ne Balawi balala baba baandiki, babemeelesi, ne baliindi be bilibwa.
Nga yaba ne barusia chirupia chichaba chareerwa mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omusaayi Hilikia anyoola sitabu sie Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sisiianwa khubirira khu Musa.
Nio Hilikia aboolela Shafani omuandiki ali, “Nanyoolile Sitabu sie Lilaka mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi” Nio asiakaanisia Shafani.
Shafani abukula sitabu asiyilila omwami Yosia, mala amuboolela ali, “Koosi niko wara khu bakholi bowo, balikho bakhola.
Babukule chirupia choosi chichabeele mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bachielesie babemeelesi ne bakholi.”
Nio Shafani omuandiki owe mu bwami aboolela omwami ali, “Omusaayi Hilikia ambeleesie sitabu sino.” Nio Shafani aasomela omwami sitabu esio.
Nga omwami Yosia ne aaulila kamakhuwa ke Lilaka, atabula chingubo chewe.
Omwami aarusia lilaka khu Hilikia, Ahikamu okhwa Shafani, Abutoni okhwa Mikaya, Shefani omuandiki ne Asaya omukholi owo mwami. Aboola ali,
“Cha mala mundebere Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne mureebere abo babarama mu Yerusalemu ne Yuda, khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ke mu sitabu sisianyoolekhe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuambile efwe lirima lirafu, sikila bapaapa befwe se baria likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Se bakhola khuloondekhana nende kakaandikwa mu sitabu sino tawe.”
Khwako Hilikia ne nabo nibo omwami aaruma bacha khu mung'oosi owe siikhasi bali Huluda. Aaba omukhasi owa Shalumu okhwa Tokhati, omwichukhulu owa Hasira owaliindanga chingubo cho mwami. Huluda aba amenya mu Yerusalemu sitonyi sie khabili.
Huluda ababoolela ali, “lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma: ‘Boolela omundu omurumire khwise oyo muli,
lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola: Ndareera kiminaanio abuundu ano ne khu baandu bamenyile ano. Ndareera bilaamo bioosi bibiaandikwa mu sitabu nisio omwami owa Yuda asomelwe esio.
Babaandu ba Yuda bandekhile mala bosiisie bibiindu biiunya bulayi khu bawele babaandi. Bambambia lirima khulwe bibiindu bioosi bimayaanu nibio bakhola. Khwako ndabaambila lirima likhawa tawe.
Boolela omwami owa Yuda omurumire enywe khu khundeeba muli, lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboola, khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa niko ewe ouliile.
Kumwoyo kwowo kwebiiya mala ewe weboombia ebweeni wa Wele nga waulila kamakhuwa kewe khuloondekhana ne abuundu ano ne bamenyileo. Ne lundi weboombisie wamwene ebweeni wase mala watabuule chingubo chowo ne khulila ebweeni wase. Khwako sesi nakhuulile.
Nono ndikhulekha ofwe mu muleembe. Ewe se okhabonekho butinyu nibwo ese khareere abuundu ano, ne khu baandu bamenyileo tawe.’ ”
Nio babarumwa abo bakoboseela omwami burume.
Nio omwami Yosia arumania alaanga alala basaakhulu boosi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Ne omwami aniina acha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne babaandu boosi khukhwama Yuda ne khukhwama e Yerusalemu bacha ne naye. Basaayi, Balawi ne babaandu boosi, bakhulu ne bakeekhe bacha ne naye. Omwami abasomela kamakhuwa koosi ke mu sitabu sie ndakaano sisianyoolekha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami Yosia enyokha eema abuundu wewe mala akhola endakaano ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhalaka khuloonda Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khuria kamalaka kewe, ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi ne liiba liewe lioosi. Akhalaka khukhola nga kamakhuwa ke endakaano kakaandikwa mu sitabu sino.
Nio Yosia akhola babaandu be mu Yerusalemu ne Benjamini khufukiilila endakaano. Ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu bakhola khuloondekhana ne endakaano eya Wele, Wele owe bakuuka baabwe.
Ne Yosia arusia bibiindu bisinya Wele bioosi biarura mu sibala sioosi sisiaba sie Baisiraeli. Akhola buli omundu mu Isiraeli akholele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe. Mu bulamu bwa Yosia bwoosi babaandu baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe.

Omwami Yosia aakhola e Pasaka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu. Limeeme lie e Pasaka lierwa khu ndaalo ekhola ekhumi ne chine eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa.
Yosia arobora basaayi bakhole kimilimo kiabwe mala abaramo kumwoyo khukhola kimilimo mu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aboolela Balawi babekisianga Baisiraeli boosi lundi ba baba batakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Khemure Lisanduku litakatifu mu nju niyo Solomoni okhwa Daudi, omwami owa Isiraeli ombakha. Se mwenyekhana khulisuta khu mabeka lundi tawe. Luno khemukholele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne babaandu bewe ba Isiraeli.
Yirekekha mwabene khuloondekhana ne lisaaye lienywe ne kimikaanda kienywe, muloonde niko omwami Daudi ne omusoleeli wewe Solomoni baloma.
Ne yiima Abuundu Atakatifu khuloondekhana ne lisaaye lie bawandaayenywe bakhali Balawi tawe. Mala mwimeo mu bweyaangu bwabwe.
Yiira kamameeme ke e Pasaka ne mumalile khukhwitakaasa khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Rekekha balebe benywe, bakhole khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu Musa.”
Nio Yosia aelesia Baisiraeli kamakheese ne chimbusi bioosi alala chielefu kamakhumi kataru khulwe biianwa bie e Pasaka. Lundi aabaelesia chikhaafu chiuunwa chielefu chitaru. Bino bioosi biama mwituuli lio mwami.
Babemeelesi ba Yosia bosi baana ne kumwoyo kwoosi khu baandu, basaayi, ne khu Balawi. Hilikia, Sakaria, ne Yehieli, babemeelesi bakhulu be nju eya Wele, baelesia basaayi kamameeme ne chimbusi chielefu chibili ne chimia sita ne chiuunwa chimia chitaru khulwe biianwa bie e Pasaka.
Babemeelesi be Balawi: Konania ne bawandaaye babili: Shemaya ne Nesaheli, ne Hashabia, Yeieli ne Yosabati baelesia Balawi kamakheese ne chimbusi chielefu chiraano ne chiuunwa chimia chiraano khulwe biianwa bie e Pasaka.
Nga buli sisiindu ne siarekekhwa khulwe e Pasaka, basaayi bacha mu bweyaangu bwabwe ne Balawi bacha mu bipupu biabwe khuloondekhana nga omwami ne alaka.
Beera limeeme lie e Pasaka mala basaayi baanyaka kamalasile niko banyoola khukhwama khu Balawi. Balawi babaaka kamakheese ne chimbusi bie e pasaka.
Nio bara alubeka biianwa bie khukhwosia nio babielesie bipupu bie khu biaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga liaandikwa mu sitabu sia Musa. Bakhola bario chakhaba ne chiuunwa chosi.
Boosia limeeme lie e Pasaka khu mulilo khuloondekhana ne lilaka mala bateekha biianwa bitakatifu mu ndekhelo, mu pinika ne khunjo. Nio baelesia khangu babaandu chinyama.
Enyuma wa lino Balawi barekekha enyama yabwe babene ne eye basaayi, be lisaaye lia Aruni. Enyuma wako Balawi bababikhila chinyama sikila basaayi bakhola kimilimo khukhwola mu silo; baana biianwa bie khukhwosia ne khukhwosia kiminawa kie mbosio.
Babeembi be kimienya be nju eya Asafu bema mu bweyaangu khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami Daudi ne lia Asafu, Hemani, ne Yedutuni owe kamalola owo mwami. Baliindi be bilibwa baba buli a silibwa. Se benyekhana balekhe kimilimo kiabwe tawe, sikila Balawi basiaabwe baba babarekekheele buli sisiindu.
Nio kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi koosi kiarekekhwa endaalo eyo. Kiarekekhwa khulwe khukhola e Pasaka ne khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia khu alutare eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami Yosia.
Baisiraeli ba babayo baba bakhola e Pasaka khu siise esio ne naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, khulwe chindaalo saba.
E Pasaka nga eyo erio se yaba yayikholekhakho mu Isiraeli ta, mukhwama mu ndaalo cho omung'oosi Samweli. Mbao omwami owa Isiraeli owaba ne akholakho e Pasaka nga niio mwami Yosia, basaayi, Balawi, babaandu boosi ba Yuda ne Isiraeli ba babayo, ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu bakhola tawe.
Mu mwiiko kwe likhumi ne munaane, kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yosia, e Pasaka yino yakholwa.
Enyuma wa kano koosi, Yosia ne aarekekhe Lukaangu, Neko omwami owa Misiri acha khukhwibwaakala Karikemishi, lukoba luli khu sikiingi sie luluuchi lwa Efurati. Ne Yosia arura khukhwibwaakala Neko.
Ne kakhali Neko aruma barumwa khu Yosia ne aloma ali, “Liie likhaba akari wefwe tawe. Ese se nechile khukhupana ne nawe tawe ne kakhali ese nechile khukhupana ne basiku base. Wele andakile khole khangu. Lekha khuyingania Wele oli ne nase akhola ario akhubunia.”
Ne kaba kario Yosia se arurayo aukha amulekha tawe. Yosia efwara chingubo chichiindi ekaluukhasia nio omundu akhamumanya ne ali niye tawe. Se aulila kamakhuwa ka Neko, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele tawe. Yosia acha khukhupana khu mweyeeywe kwa Mekido.
Mu liie balasi be buembo balasa omwami Yosia. Yosia aboolela bakholi bewe ali, “Mbukule mundusie ano sikila bandasile burafu.”
Nio bakholi bewe bamubukula bamurusia mwikaari liewe lie liie, bamura mu liindi mala bamuyila e Yerusalemu. Afwila ebweeneyo mala asiikhwa mu biliindwa bie bakuuka bewe. Babaandu boosi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu balila Yosia.
Omung'oosi Yeremia yesi aakhola kimienya kie lilila khu Yosia. Babeembi boosi be kimienya be siseecha ne siikhasi balomalomanga khu Yosia mu mienya kiabwe khukhwola luno. Bakhola lino liaba lilaka mu Isiraeli kimienya kino kiaandikwa mu mienya kie bubeeleli.
Nono bibiindu bibiindi nibio Yosia aakhola, bikholwa biewe bilayi khuloondekhana ne nako kakaandikwa mu lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bikholwa biewe khukhwama khu sie khunyoa khukhwola khu simaliilisi bioosi biaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Isiraeli ne Yuda.

Babaandu ba Yuda barobora Yoahasi okhwa Yosia, bamukhola aaba omwami mu Yerusalemu mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe.
Yoahasi aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kitaru nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia khulwe kimieesi kitaru mu Yerusalemu.
Nio omwami owa Misiri arusia Yoahasi mu bwami mu Yerusalemu. Ne omwami owa Misiri aruungia babaandu ba Yuda busuuru bubwola bitonyi emia ndala bie efwesa ne sitonyi sie esahabu.
Omwami owa Misiri akhola Eliakimu wandaaye owa Yoahasi aaba omwami owa Yuda ne Yerusalemu ne khukaluukhasia lisina liewe lia Eliakimu liaba Yehoyakimu mala abukula Yehoahasi wandaaye owa Yehoyakimu amuyila e Misiri.
Omwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni ebwaakala Yuda mala aamba Yehoyakimu, amuboa kiminyololo mala amubukula amuyila e Babiloni.
Nebukadinesa abukula bibiindu bilala khukhwama mu nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, abiyila e Babiloni mala abira mwichipi liewe.
Nono bibiindu bibiindi nibio Yehoyakimu akhola, ne bibiindi bisinyisia nibio akhola nende buli siindu nisio akhola anyolelakho kumusaango, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie babaami ba Isiraeli ne Yuda. Omwana wewe Yehoyakini amiia mu bweyaangu bwewe.
Yehoyakini aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko munaane nga aarakikha khukhwamiia. Amiia kimieesi kitaru ne chindaalo ekhumi mu Yerusalemu. Akhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mu fula eye khurakikha kumwiiko omwami Nebukadinesa arumania baamba Yehoyakini mala areerwa e Babiloni alala ne bibiindu bie bukusi bwe angaaki bie mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biayilwa e Babiloni. Nebukadinesa akhola Sedekia wandaaye owa Yehoyakini aaba omwami owa Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Sedekia aakhola kaali kamamayaanu ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe. Se eboombia ebweeni wo omung'oosi Yeremia owamuboolela kamakhuwa ka Wele tawe.
Bakhaba basaayi bakhulu boosi ne babaandu ba Yuda baba bamayaanu lukali. Bakhola bibiindu bie khusinya bioosi nga chikholo chichiindi. Banyaalutia enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niyo akhola yaba endakatifu mu Yerusalemu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka babwe aaruma bang'oosi busia na busia, sikila akholela siisa babaandu bewe ne bumenyo bwewe.
Ne kakhali bakhoma barumwa bewe, balekelesia kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala bakholela bang'oosi embelekeu. Bakhola bario khukhwola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aambila babaandu bewe lirima mala khubao engila eye khukhwilukha tawe.
Nebukadinesa asuuta bibiindu bioosi khukhwama mu Lukaangu, biboofu ne bitiiti ne bibiindu bioosi bie mumabiikhilo ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bibiindu bie mumabiikhilo ko mwami, nende bie babemeelesi bewe. Ayila bibiindu bino bioosi e Babiloni.
Nebukadinesa osia enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala atechula lisiisi lie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu. Lundi bonaka bibiindu bie bukusi bwe angaaki bioosi lundi osia kamachipi koosi.
Nebukadinesa abukula babaandu nga baboe, abo ba baba ne baramire balamu, mala baba nasioobi bewe nende be lisaaye liewe. Baramayo nabwila bubwami bwe Bapasha ne bwemisibwa.
Kano kekholekha khukhwichusia elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khubirira khu mung'oosi Yeremia. Sibala sianjukhwa khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi saba khukhwola nga kimiiko kie Sabato nikio babaandu bakhaliindanga tawe kiechusibwa.
Nono Wele eenya khukhwichusia elomo yewe nga aaloma khubirira khu mung'oosi Yeremia. Mu mwiiko kwe khunyoa kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Sairasi owa Pasha, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola omwami Sairasi arusia kumulaango. Kumulaango kuno aakurusia mu bwami bwewe bwoosi lundi akura mu buandiki ali,
“Omwami Sairasi owa Pasha aloma ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe mwikulu ambelesie ese bubwami bwoosi bwe khu sibala. Ne anderekho mwombakhile enju e Yerusalemu, mu Yuda. Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akhoya aaba ne nanywe mweesi muuli babaandu bewe. Muli balekhuule khucha e Yerusalemu.’ ”

Wele akhoya abe ne nanywe muuli babaandu bewe. Muli balekhuule khucha e Yerusalemu eli mu Yuda, mala mwombakhe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe Baisiraeli. Ali Wele oli mu Yerusalemu.
Ne aliio omundu yesi oli mu mbaambe owenya buyeeti akobole, ba bamenya siimbi naye bakhoya bamue buyeeti bwe efwesa ne esahabu, bibiindu ne bibaywa, ne biianwa bie khukhwirusia khwo mundu, khulwe nju eya Wele eli mu Yerusalemu.”
Nio babemeelesi be chinju che chikholo cha Yuda ne Benjamini, basaayi ne Balawi, nende buli yesi yesi niye Wele amala khuramo lilienya berekekha khucha khukhwombakha enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu.
Ba bamenya siimbi naye boosi babayeeta khubaa bibiindu bikali bie efwesa, esahabu, bibiindu ne bibaywa, ne bibiindu bibiindi bie bukusi, ne biianwa bie khukhwiaana.
Sairasi akobosia bibiindu nibio omwami Nebukadinesa abukula khukhwama munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu nibio ara munju eye bawele bewe.
Abiakaanisia Mitiretati, omwimeelesi we libiikhilo lie lichipi. Naye abibala ebweeni wa Shesibasari, omwami owa Yuda.
Ne buno nibwo bubwaba bukali bwabio: Chipeseni che esahabu kamakhumi kataru, chipeseni che efwesa eelefu ndala ne bifuria kamakhumi kabili na tisa.
Bipwakuli bie esahabu kamakhumi kataru, bibuumba bie efwesa chimia chine ne likhumi, ne bibiindu bibiindi eelefu ndala.
Bibiindu bioosi bie esahabu nende bie efwesa biaba chielefu chiraano ne chimia chine. Ebio bioosi nibio Shesibasari asuta, nga be mumbaambe ne bareerwa khukhwama e Babiloni khucha e Yerusalemu.

Bano nibo babaandu be lukoongo babama mu mbaambe nibo yaba omwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni aamba. Bakobola e Yerusalemu ne Yuda, buli sia mulala mu lukoba lwewe.
Becha ne Serubabeli, Yoshua, Nehemia, Seraya, Reelaya, Modekai, Bilishani, Misipa, Bikibai, Reumu, ne Baana.
Kano niko kamasina ke babaandu be bilibwa bia Isiraeli, babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe.
Ba okhwa Paroshi, chielefu chibili emia ndala ne kamakhumi saba na babili.
Ba okhwa Shefatia, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi saba na babili.
Ba okhwa Ara, chimia saba ne kamakhumi saba na baraano.
Ba okhwa Pahati-moabu (abo nibo be lisaaye lia Yeshua ne Yoabu), chielefu chibili, chimia munaane ne likhumi na babili.
Ba okhwa Elamu, eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano na bane.
Ba okhwa Satu, chimia tisa ne kamakhumi kane na baraano.
Ba okhwa Sakai, chimia saba ne kamakhumi sita.
Ba okhwa Bani, chimia sita ne kamakhumi kane na babili.
Ba okhwa Bebai, chimia sita ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Ba okhwa Asikati, eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili na babili.
Ba okhwa Atonikamu, chimia sita ne kamakhumi sita na sita.
Ba okhwa Bikibai, chielefu chibili ne kamakhumi karaano na sita.
Ba okhwa Atini, chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano na bane.
Ba okhwa Ateri ba balangangwa lundi bali, ba okhwa Hesekia, kamakhumi tisa na munaane.
Ba okhwa Besai chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Ba okhwa Yoraha, emia ndala ne likhumi na babili.
Ba okhwa Hasumu, chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Ba okhwa Kibabari, kamakhumi tisa na baraano.
Ba okhwa Betelehemu, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Ba okhwa Netofa, kamakhumi karaano na sita.
Ba okhwa Anatoti, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Ba okhwa Asimabeti, kamakhumi kane na babili.
Ba okhwa Kiriati-Yearimu, ne Kefira, ne Beeroti, chimia saba ne kamakhumi kane na bataru.
Ba okhwa Rama ne Keba chimia sita ne kamakhumi kabili na mulala.
Ba okhwa Mikimashi, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na babili.
Ba okhwa Beteli, ne Ai chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Ba okhwa Nebo, kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Ba okhwa Makibisi, emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano na sita.
Ba okhwa Elamu okundi eelefu ndala, chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano na bane.
Ba okhwa Harimu, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili.
Ba okhwa Loti, ne Hatiti, ne Ono, chimia saba ne kamakhumi kabili na baraano.
Ba okhwa Yeriko, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kane na baraano.
Ba okhwa Senaha, chielefu chitaru ne chimia sita ne kamakhumi kataru.
Kano niko kamasina ke babaandu be bilibwa bie basaayi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe:
Basaayi: Ba okhwa Yetaya, (be nju eya Yeshua), chimia tisa ne kamakhumi saba na bataru.
Ba okhwa Imeri, eelefu ndala ne kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Ba okhwa Pashihuri, eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane na saba.
Ba okhwa Harimu, eelefu ndala ne likhumi lilala na saba.
Bano nibo babaandu be bilibwa bie kholo eya Lawi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe. Ba okhwa Yesua ne ba okhwa Katimieli (abo nibo be lisaaye lia Hodabia) kamakhumi saba na bane.
Babeembi be kimienya: (abo nibo be lisaaye lia Asafu), emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Baliindi be bilibwa bie Lukaangu: (abo be lisaaye lia Shalumu), Ateri, Talimoni, Akubu, Hatita, Shobai, boosi alala baba emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru na tisa.
Bano nibo babaandu be bilibwa bie bakholi be mu Lukaangu babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe. Ba okhwa Siha, ba okhwa Hasufa, ne ba okhwa Tabaoti.
Ba okhwa Kerosi, ba okhwa Siaha, ne ba okhwa Patoni.
Ba okhwa Lebana, ba okhwa Hagaba ne ba okhwa Akubu.
Ba okhwa Hakabu, ba okhwa Sialimai, ne ba okhwa Hanani.
Ba okhwa Kiteli, ba okhwa Kahari, ne ba okhwa Reaya.
Ba okhwa Resini, ba okhwa Nekota, ne ba okhwa Kasamu.
Ba okhwa Usa, ba okhwa Pasea, ne ba okhwa Besai.
Ba okhwa Asina, ba okhwa Meunimu, ba okhwa Nefusimu,
ba okhwa Bakibuki, ba okhwa Hakufa, ne ba okhwa Harihuri.
Ba okhwa Basiluti, ba okhwa Mehida, ba okhwa Harisa,
ba okhwa Barikosi, ba okhwa Sisera, ba okhwa Tema,
ba okhwa Nesia, ne ba okhwa Hatifa.
Bano nibo babaandu be bilibwa bie bakholi ba Solomoni babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe: Ba okhwa Sotai, ba okhwa Hasofereti, ne ba okhwa Peruta.
Ba okhwa Yaala, ba okhwa Tarikoni, ba okhwa Kiteli,
ba okhwa Shefatia, ba okhwa Hatili, ba okhwa Pokereti-hosebaimu, ne ba okhwa Ami.
Bakholi boosi be mu Lukaangu alala ne babaana be bakholi ba Solomoni, baba chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi tisa na babili.
Ne bano nibo babaandu babakobola khukhwama e Teli-mela, ne e Teli-harisha, ne Cherubu, ne Atani, ne Imeri. Ne kakhaba kario se bamanya ne baba be lisaaye lia Isiraeli tawe.
Ba okhwa Delaya, ba okhwa Tobia, ne ba okhwa Nekota, chimia sita ne kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Babaandu be bilibwa bie basaayi bakhamanya sikuuka siabwe tawe baba: Ba okhwa Habaya, ba okhwa Hakosi, ba okhwa Barisilai (Barisilai akhwa omukhaana owa Barisilai Omukileati mala wabukula lisina lia raraawe owo mukhasi wewe.)
Nga bakhilwa khukhwekesia sikuuka siabwe, se bafukiililwa nga basaayi tawe babukulwa khuba banyaalu.
Ne omuruki we Bayaudi ababoolela ali se banyala balia siakhulia siili sitakatifu lukali khu Wele tawe khukhwola Omusaayi abeo oreeba Urimu ne Tumimu.
Libuusiana lioosi alala liaba babaandu chielefu arubaine na mbili ne chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi sita.
Bakholi babwe be siseecha nende be siikhasi nabo baba chielefu saba, ne chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kataru na saba. Baba ne babeembi be kimienya chimia chibili.
Chifarasi chabwe chaba chimia saba ne kamakhumi kataru na sita. Chinyumbu chabwe chaba chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane na chiraano.
Chingamia chabwe, chimia chine ne kamakhumi kataru na chiraano, ne chipunda chabwe chaba chielefu sita ne chimia saba ne kamakhumi kabili.
Nga babaama mu mbaambe ne boola a Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu, balala khu bemeelesi be chikholo barusia biianwa bie khukhwirusia khuyeeta khukhwombakha lundi Lukaangu abuundu alwo akhale ao.
Barusia bibiindu bikali nga nilwo banyala khulwe kumulimo kuno. Mala nibio barusia bioosi biola chikiilo chimia chiraano che sahabu, chikiilo chielefu chibili ne chimia munaane che fwesa alala ne chingubo emia ndala che basaayi.

Kumwesi kwa saba nga ne kwola, babaana Baisiraeli ne bali boosi mu chingoba chabwe, babuusiana mu Yerusalemu.
Nio Yoshua okhwa Yosataki, ne basaayi baasie, ne Serubabeli okhwa Shealitieli, alala ne balebe bewe, baambana khukhwombakha lundi alutare eya Wele owa Isiraeli, nio baanilekho biianwa bie khukhwosia khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Musa, omundu owa Wele.
Bara alutare abuundu niio yaba mu khunyoa, akhaba ne baaba ne buuri khuloondekhana ne babaandu ba baamenya mu sibala esio, mala baanilakho biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba.
Bakhebulila kumulukha kwa Naikara eye Bisali khuloondekhana ne kamalaka, baana buli endaalo biianwa bibienyekhana khulwe ndaalo ng'eneyo.
Khutasakho, baana biiana bia buli ndaalo ne biianwa bie kumwesi kumuyia, ne akhaba mu mabuusiana kakaandi koosi niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aasaywa. Lundi biabao biianwa nibio omundu yesi aananga khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khukhwirusia.
Akhaba babaandu ne baba ne basiili khukhwombakha lundi kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, barakikha khuaanila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biianwa bie khukhwosia endaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kwa saba.
Nio baelesia babombakhi ne babeechi chirupia, mala baana biakhulia nende bie khunywa, ne kamafura biilwe khu baandu be mu chingoba che Tiro ne Sidoni khulwe khukhwofulamo kimirongooro kimitarakwa khukhwama e Lebanoni, kikiareererwa khu nyanja khukhwola e Yafa. Kano koosi kekholekha khulwe lisibula lia Sairasi, omwami owa Pasha.
Nono mu mwesi kwa khabili kwe kumwiiko kwe khabili ne bamalile khukobola khu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu, Serubabeli okhwa Shealitieli, Yoshua okhwa Yosataki ne balebe baramire barakikha kimilimo alala ne basaayi ne Balawi. Babaandu boosi ba baaba ne bamile mu mbaambe bakobola e Yerusalemu, bakhola kimilimo. Barobora Balawi ba baaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili ne khukhilao, ba bara mu milimo kie khukhwimeelela khukhwombakha lundi enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne Yoshua ne babaana bewe be siseecha ne balebe bewe, ne Katimieli ne babaana bewe be siseecha, ne babaana ba Yuda, baambaana alala mu khwimeelela khwe khukhwombakha khwenju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baba alala nende be kholo eya Henatati ne babaana bewe, Balawi ne babaana ne balebe babwe.
Mala bemba ne baakanila, ne baelesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi efuma ne khumusiima bali:
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omulayi,
ne busiime bwewe khu Isiraeli buli bwa mindali na mindali.”
Babaandu boosi bayokela ne kamaani ne bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila kumulimo kwe kumusiingi kwe nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kwaba kwarakiikhe.
Ne kakhali basaayi ne Balawi ne basaakhulu bakali, ne babemeelesi be chikholo ba babona Lukaangu lwe khunyoa, balila nga ne balola kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu luno ne kulikho kwaalwa. Balila lukali. Babaandi bayokela sikila busangaafu.
Mbao na mulala owanyala khukhwaukhasia luyoka lwe busangaafu ne khulila tawe, sikila luyoka nilwo bakhola lwaba lukali. Lwauliilikhana aleeyi.

Basiku ba Yuda ne Benjamini baulila bali babakoboole khukhwama mu mbaambe balikho bombakhila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli Lukaangu.
Enyuma wako bacha khulola Serubabeli ne babemeelesi be chinju mala bababoolela bali, “Lekha khwombakhe ne nanywe, sikila khusaaya Wele mulala niye musaaya, mala khumurusilianga chimbosio khukhwama mu ndaalo cha Esarihatoni, omwami we Ashuru, owakhureera efwe khumenya ano.”
Ne kakhali Serubabeli, Yoshua, alala ne babemeelesi be chinju mu Isiraeli bababoolela bali, “Se khwenya buyeeti bwenywe khukhwombakhila Wele wefwe Lukaangu tawe. Fwabeene kane khwombakhile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli Lukaangu nga Sairasi, omwami wa Pasha, ne akhulaka.”
Nio babaandu ba baaba ne bamenyile mu sibala omwo bakhaka khukhola Bayaudi bafwe kimiooyo ne khubariikhirisia balekhe khukhwombakha.
Babaandu be mu sibala esio baruunga akhaba bakeleki be mu bwami bwa Pasha bonake kimilimo kie Bayaudi. Bachiililila khukhola kano mu bwami bwa Sairasi bwoosi ne mu bwami bwa Dario, omwami owa Pasha.
Lundi, mu bwami bwe Aritashasita, Bisilamu, Mitiretati, Tabeeli nende be bulala bwabwe bamuandikila ebarwa. Ebarwa yaandikwa mu Luaramaiki mala yasomwa ne kaluukhasibwa.
Akhaba Reumu omukhulu owe banamae, ne Simusai omuandiki, aandika ebarwa yino khu mwami Aritashasita khu Yerusalemu ali:
“Khukhwama khu Reumu, omukhulu owe banamae, Shimushai, omuandiki owe sibala, khukhwama khu be bulala babasiaabwe, bakhalaki, ne khukhwama khu baami babaandi bakeekhe babamiia, ba Pasha, babaandu be siseecha babaama Erikewi, ba Babiloni, ne babaandu ba Susa (abo nibo babaandu be sibala sia Elamu).
Ne babaandu babaandi nibo omuiinda lundi owe bunyali Asiuribanipali owauuyisia babaandu khukhwama mu chiingo chabwe mala bamenya mu lukoba lwe Samaria ne mu sibala sie engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati.”
Kano niko kamakhuwa kakaandikwa mu barwa eyo, “Khu mwami Aritashasita: bakholi bowo, be lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati bakhukheesia.
Khwenya omwami omanye oli Bayaudi babeecha ano khukhwama mu bibala biowo bibiindi bachiile mu Yerusalemu. Balikho bombakha lundi lukoba lumayaanu lundi lureengu. Bamalile khung'oona kumusiingi ne balikho bamaliilisia khukhwombakha kamasiisi lundi.
Omwami, lukoba luno lwaba ne lwombakhwa lundi mala kamasiisi kaalwo kawa, babaandu bano bacha khulekha khuruunga busuuru ne chirupia chowo che bubwami chiicha khuboomba.
Sikila kuli kumulimo kwefwe khuria bubwami bwowo, se khwenya khubone kano ne kekholekha tawe. Niko kakila ne khuandikila omanye.
Khwako lola mu libiikhilo lie kamaandike niko bakuuka bowo babiikha. Olanyoola oli lukoba luno buli lwoosi luli lureengu lundi lunaanianga babaami. Babaandu balwo buli lwosi bali baandalafu khubamiia. Lino nilio liliakila lukoba lwonakwa.
Khwako khuli nang'ali omwami khuli, lukoba luno lwombakhwa lundi ne kamasiisi kaalwo kawa, omwami socha khunyala khwamiia lundi lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati tawe.”
Omwami aruma likobosio lino: “Khu Reumu, omwimeelesi, ne khu Simusai omuandiki owe sibala ne babasiaabwe bamenyile mu Samaria ne mu lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati, kimileembe.
Ebarwa niyo mwaruma basomeele bulayi bubwene.
Narusia kamalaka khumenieelesia, mala ng'ali lianyoolekhaane lili khukhwama khale lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lulobaanga khuulila babaami. Lundi luli lukoba lwe bureengu ne kamatinyu.
Babaami be kamaani baamiia Yerusalemu ne lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati. Ne lundi babaandu ba Yerusalemu babaruunga busuuru bubwaukhane.
Khwako rusia kamalaka babaandu abo balekhe khukhwombakha lundi lukoba khukhwola nga ndusia lilaka.
Khola lino khangu, nio butinyu bwosi bwosi bulekhe khukhwikholekha khu mwami Aritashasita.”
Nga ebarwa eyama khu mwami yino ne yasomwa khu Reumu ne Simusai omuandiki, alala ne babaasie, bacha khangu khu Bayaudi e Yerusalemu mala bakhiingilila ne kamaani balekhe khukhwombakha Lukoba lundi.

Mu biise ebio bang'oosi, Hagai ne Sakaria okhwa Ido, mu lisina lia Wele owa Isiraeli, bang'oolela Bayaudi ba baamenya mu Yuda ne mu Yerusalemu.
Nio Serubabeli okhwa Shealitieli ne Yoshua okhwa Yosataki barakikha khukhwombakha lundi Lukaangu mu Yerusalemu. Bang'oosi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi babili abo babayo ne babayeeta.
Mu siise sienesio Tatenai, omuruki we lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati, ne Shetari-Bosenai ne babasiaabwe, ba bechakho mala ba bareeba bali, “Naanu owabalakile khukhwombakha enju yino lundi ne khumala liliombakha lino?”
Lundi ba bareeba bababoolele kamasina ke babaandu balikho bombakha.
Ne kakhali Wele wabwe aaba ne basaakhulu Bayaudi. Se babemisia tawe khukhwola nga likhuwa liolela Dario mala nio bakobosie mu buandike.
Ebarwa niyo Tetanai omuruki we lukoongo lwe Mumbo mwe luluuchi lwa Efurati Shetari-Bosenai ne babasiaabwe barumira omwami Dario yabamo kano:
“Khu mwami Dario, kimileembe kibe ne nawe.
“Omwami okhoya omanye oli khwachile mu sibala sie Yuda munju eya Wele owe bunyali. Elikho yombakhwa ne kamabaale kamaboofu ne kimirongooro kiemisiibwe akari khwisiisi. Kumulimo kulikho kukholekhwa ne busicha mala kulikho kuchiililila bulayi.
“Khureebire babemeelesi be babaandu bakhuboolele owabalakile khukhwombakha lundi enju yino ne khukimalila elala.
Lundi khwabareeba kamasina kabwe. Lundi khwaandika asi kamasina ke babemeelesi babwe nio wesi obamanye.
“Ne lino liaba likobosio liabwe: ‘Efwe khuli bakholi ba Wele owe Likulu ne liloba, mala khulikho khwombakha lundi enju eyombakhwa kimiiko kimikali kikiabira no mwami omukali owe kamaani owa Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali sikila bakuuka befwe bakhalasia Wele owe mwikulu, aabalekha baulwa no mwami Nebukadinesa owe Babiloni Omukalitayo. Onaka enju yino mala aamba babaandu abayila mu mbaambe mu Babiloni.
Kakhaba kario, kumwiiko kunyoa kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Sairasi nga omwami owa Babiloni, Sairasi arusia lilaka ali enju eya Wele yino yombakhwe.
Omwami Sairasi arusia munju eya Wele esahabu ne efwesa ne bibiindu nibio Nebukadinesa aaba aabukula khukhwama mu Lukaangu mu Yerusalemu, mala aaba aabira munju eye bawele bewe mu Babiloni. Sairasi akaanisia bibiindu bino omundu olaangwa Shesibasari, niye arobora khuuba omuruki owe lukoongo lwa Yuda.
Omwami amuboolela ali: “Bukula bibiindu bino obikobosie mu Lukaangu mu Yerusalemu, ne lekha Lukaangu lwombakhwe lundi niio lwaba ekhunyoa.”
Nio Shesibasari yuno echa mala arakikha khukhwombakha kumusiingi kwe nju eya Wele eli mu Yerusalemu. Nio liliombakha liachiililila khukhwamila abwenao khukhwola luno, ne Lukaangu lusiili khuwa tawe.’
“Khwako omwami, ne likhusiimisia, lekha bapule mu libiikhilo likhale lie bubwami bwa Babiloni babone omwami Sairasi ne aarusia kumunwa khukhwombakhwa lundi khwe nju eya Wele mu Yerusalemu. Nio omwami okhuandikile okhuboolele nilio wibaasia.”

Nio omwami Dario arusia lilaka, bapule mu libiikhilo lie biaandike bikhale bie bubwami bibiabiikhwa mu Babiloni.
Kamaandiko kakanyolekha mu lukoba lwa Akibatana mu lukoongo lwa Metia. Kakabakho niko kano:
“Mu mwiiko kunyoa nikwo omwami Sairasi amiilamo arusia lilaka khuloondekhana ne nju eya Wele mu Yerusalemu nga abuundu niio baanila chimbosio ne biianwa bie khukhwosia. Lukaangu lukhoya lube bukhiikha chimita kamakhumi kabili na saba ne buniina bwosi bube burio.
Kamasiisi kalombakhwa ne kamabaale kamaboofu khukhwola khataru ne kimirongooro khukhwola lulala nga ne kawa. Kumuruungo kwosi kucha khuruungwa khukhwama mwibiikhilo lie bubwami.
Akhaba bibiindu bioosi bie esahabu ne efwesa bie nju eya Wele nibio omwami Nebukadinesa areera e Babiloni khukhwama mu Lukaangu e Yerusalemu bikhoya bikobosibwe abuundu abio munju eya Wele.”
Nio Dario aruma likobosio ali:
“Khu Tatenai, omuruki owe lukoongo lwe luluuchi lwa Efurati eye engelekha Shetari-Bosenai, ne babaami baasio be mu lukoongo lwe luluuchi lwa Efurati eye engelekha. ‘Mukhacha sia Lukaangu tawe.
Lekhana ne kimilimo kie enju eya Wele. Lekha omuruki we Bayaudi ne basaakhulu be Bayaudi bombakhe lundi enju eya Wele niio yaba khaale.
Lundi ndikho khulaka nisio okhoya oyeete basaakhulu be Bayaudi bano mukhwombakha enju eya Wele. Kumuruungo kwabwe kularuungwa mu bwichufu mala khangu khukhwama mu rupia chichaama mwibiikhilo lie bubwami che busuuru bubwama mu lukoongo lwe luluuchi lwa Efurati nio kumulimo kulekhe khwima tawe.
Elesia buli ndaalo basaayi baali mu Yerusalemu siosi siosi nisio benya. Aana chiuunwa ching'ana, namwe kamamiiku namwe kamakheese ke biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele owe mwikulu. Lundi aana engaanu, chumbe, endali, ne kamafura nga basaayi ne benya.
Khola murio nio basaayi baane biianwa bisiimisia khu Wele owe mwikulu ne khusabila chikhabi omwami ne babaana bewe be siseecha.
Lundi ndasa khulaka ndi omundu yesi yesi olekelesiakho lilaka lino, ese ndaka ndi bachoole lukuulo khukhwama khunju yewe, mala bamuunakile. Nio enju yewe ekholwe khuba libuumbi lie esiina.
Wele owarobora Yerusalemu nga abuundu niio asaayilwa akhoya aane kumunaanio khu mwami yesi yesi namwe babaandu bakhakaluukhasie kano, namwe khukhaka khukhwonaka enju eya Wele eli Yerusalemu. Ese, Dario, narusiisie lilaka lino. Likhoya liloondwe bulayi.’ ”
Nio omuruki Tatenai, Shetari-Bosenai, ne babaami basie bakhola bulayi bwene nga omwami Dario ne alaka.
Ne babemeelesi Bayaudi bachiililila bulayi khukhwombakha nga baboolelwanga ne bang'oosi Hagai ne Sakaria okhwa Ido. Bamala khukhwombakha nga nilwo balakwa ne Wele owa Isiraeli ne Sairasi, Dario, ne Aritashasita, babaami ba Pasha.
Nga bamala khukhwombakha Lukaangu mu ndaalo eya khataru eye kumwesi kwa Atari, mu mwiiko kwa sita nga omwami Dario arakikha khukhwamiia.
Ne Baisiraeli, basaayi, Balawi, ne babaandi boosi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe baana Lukaangu khu Wele ne busangaafu.
Mu biise bie khuaana Lukaangu khu Wele barusia chiuunwa emia ndala, kamamiiku chimia chibili ne kamameeme chimia chine nga chimbosio, ne chindurume ekhumi na chibili nga biianwa khulwe bumayaanu, buli ndala khulwe ekholo eya Isiraeli.
Nio bara basaayi ne Balawi mu bweyaangu bwabwe, khulwe bukholi bwe Lukaangu lwa Wele luuli mu Yerusalemu, nga ne liaandikwa mu sitabu sia Musa.
Basaayi ne Balawi boosi betakaasa alala, mala boosi baba bamiliiu. Nio beera limeeme lie Epasaka khu babakobola boosi, khulwe Basaayi basiaabwe, ne khu beene.
Baisiraeli boosi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe, balia chimbosio ne naabo boosi babalekha chingila chimayaanu che babaandu babaandi babamenyanga mu sibala omwo mala babecha khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli.
Khu ndaalo saba, balia ne busangaafu Naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe. Basangaala lukali sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aba ayuusiisie kumwoyo kwo mwami owa Ashuru khu nibo, nio abayeeta mu mulimo kwabwe kwe khukhwombakha lundi enju eya Wele, Wele owa Isiraeli.

Enyuma wakano koosi ne kekholeekhe, nga Aritashasita ne aba omwami owa Pasha, abao omundu owalaangwa bali Esira. Esira aba okhwa Seraya, ne Asaria okhwa Hilikia,
ne Hilikia okhwa Sialumu, ne Sialumu okhwa Satoki, ne Satoki okhwa Ahitubu,
ne Ahitubu okhwa Amaria, ne Amaria okhwa Asaria, ne Asaria okhwa Meraioti.
Meraioti aba okhwa Seraya, ne Seraya okhwa Usi, ne Usi okhwa Buki ne,
Buki okhwa Abishua, ne Abishua okhwa Fineasi, ne Fineasi okhwa Eliesa, ne Eliesa okhwa Aruni Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali.
Esira yuno aama e Babiloni. Aaba omuandiki owe bukesi lukali mu lilaka lia Musa nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli amala khua Musa. Nio omwami Aritashasita amua bioosi nibio aasaba, sikila Esira aaba ne chikhabi cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe.
Ne mu mwiiko kwa saba kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Aritashasita, Baisiraeli balala bacha e Yerusalemu alala ne basaayi, Balawi, babembi be kimienya, baliindi, ne bakholi be mu Lukaangu.
Esira echa mu Yerusalemu kumwesi kwa kharaano khu mwiiko kwa saba kwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Aritashasita.
Esira aarura Babiloni khu ndaalo enyoa khu mwesi kwe khunyoa mala Wele abayeeta boola mu Yerusalemu, mu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kwa kharaano.
Sikila Esira yaba erusia ne kumwoyo kwewe khukhweyika Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khulikhola, ne khukhwekesia kamalaka mu Isiraeli.
Yino niyo ebarwa niyo omwami Aritashasita aelesia Esira omusaayi lundi omuandiki, owasomela kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko aelesia Baisiraeli:
“Khukhwama khu mwami Aritashasita omwami owe babaami khucha khu musaayi Esira, omuandiki we lilaka lia Wele owe mwikulu.
“Ndaka ndi yesi yesi khu Baisiraeli boosi, namwe basaayi, ne Balawi bali mu sibala siase, owekoomba khucha ne nawe e Yerusalemu banyala bacha.
Ese ndikho khuruma alala ne bakeleki base saba, oche oreeberesie liiba liili mu Yerusalemu ne mu Yuda khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele wowo, limalile khuaanwa khwiwe.
Ne lundi bukula biianwa bie esahabu ne efwesa nibio ese ne bakeleki base khuaanile khu Wele owa Isiraeli, omenyile mu Yerusalemu.
Wesi bukula efwesa ne esahabu bioosi nibio onyoola mu sibala sia Babiloni sioosi, ne biianwa bie khukhwerusia nibio Baisiraeli ne basaayi babwe baana khulwe enju eya Wele wabwe mu Yerusalemu.
“Ne chirupia chino kula chiuunwa, kamamiiku, kamameeme, biianwa bie biakhulia ne biianwa bie khunywa, mala mu biaanile khu alutare eye nju eya Wele wenywe eli mu Yerusalemu.
Siosi siosi sibonekha khuba silayi khwiwe ne khu basio khukholela efwesa ne esahabu eramire, onyala wakhola, khuloondekhana ne lilienya lia Wele wowo.
Ne bibiindu ebio nibio bakhua khulwe bukholi bwe nju eya Wele wowo, biaane khu Wele owa Yerusalemu.
Ne siosi siosi sisienyekhana khulwe enju eya Wele wowo, nisio wenya khuaana, onyala wasibukula khukhwama mu libiikhilo lio mwami.
“Ne ese, omwami Aritashasita, ndikho ndusia lilaka khu babiikhi boosi be ngelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati khuelesia buli siosi nisio omusaayi Esira, omuandiki we lilaka lia Wele owe mwikulu abasaba. Lundi siikhoya siakholelwa mu burekeerefu bwoosi.
Muelesie sikelo sisioola chikiilo chielefu chitaru ne chimia chine che efwesa, chikiilo kamakhumi ekhumi che ngaanu, chilita chielefu chibili che ndali, chilita chielefu chibili che kamafura ke chiseituni, ne chumbe engali nga yenyekhana.
Siosi siosi silakilwa ne Wele we mwikulu, lekha siikholekhe mu bwichufu khulwe enju eya Wele owe mwikulu nio lirima liewe likhakhola lirio liaba khwise ne babaana base tawe.
Mukhakhola murio mwabuusia busuuru bwosi bwosi khukhwama khu basaayi, Balawi, babembi be kimienya, baliindi, bakholi be mu Lukaangu, namwe omukholi yesi yesi okhola munju eya Wele tawe.
“Ne ewe Esira, khuloondekhana ne bukesi bwa Wele wowo nibwo oli ne nabwo, robora babemeelesi ne bakhalaki bakhalakile babaandu boosi baali engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati bung'ali. Lekha bakhole bario khu baandu boosi bamanyile lilaka lia Wele wowo. Okhoya wekesia Lilaka elio khu buli yesi yesi okhalimanyile tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi nakharia kamalaka ka Wele wowo namwe kamalaka kase tawe, akhoya aebwe kumunaanio, khulwe lifwa, khuyilwa mu mbaambe, namwe khunuulwa kimiaandu kiewe namwe khumura mu siboe.”
Esira aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume, Wele owe bakuuka befwe! Owara sisiindu nga sino siri mu mwoyo kwo mwami, khuelesia lukoosi enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli mu Yerusalemu.
Lundi khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele namalile khusiimwa no mwami, ne bakeleki bewe, ne babemeelesi bewe be bunyali boosi. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase anjeetanga, nanyalile khubuusia babemeelesi be chikholo cha Isiraeli khukhwicha ne nase.”

Kano kali kamasina ke babemeelesi be chinju ne lisaaye liabwe nga baama mu mbaambe mu Babiloni ne Esira mala bakobola Yerusalemu mu biise bie khukhwamiia khwo mwami Aritashasita.
Kerishoni, wenju eya Fineasi, Danieli, wenju eya Itamari. Hatushi, wenju eya Daudi,
Sakaria, wenju eya Paroshi, ne babaandu be siseecha emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano ba baandikwa be sikuuka siabwe.
Eliehoenai okhwa Seraya, wenju eya Pahati-moabu, ne babaandu chimia chibili,
Shekania okhwa Yahasieli, wenju eya Satu, ne babaandu chimia chitaru.
Ebeti okhwa Yonasani, wenju eya Atini, ne babaandu kamakhumi karaano.
Yesiaya okhwa Atalia, wenju eya Elamu, ne babaandu kamakhumi saba.
Sabatia okhwa Mikaeli, wenju eya Shefatia, ne babaandu kamakhumi munaane.
Obadia okhwa Yehieli, wenju eya Yoabu, ne babaandu chimia chibili ne ekhumi na munaane.
Shelomoti okhwa Yosifia, wenju eya Binui, ne babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi sita.
Sakaria okhwa Bebai, ne babaandu kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Yoanani okhwa Hakatani, wenju eya Asikati, ne babaandu emia ndala ne ekhumi.
Elifeleti, Yeueli, ne Shemaya abano nibo ba okhwa Atonikamu, ne babaandu kamakhumi sita (bakobola lwa nyuma).
Usi ne Sakuri, wenju eya Bikibai (Sabuti), ne babaandu kamakhumi saba.
Nababuusia khu luuchi lulwikha mu lukoba lwa Ahava, mala khwapa ekambi ebweeneyo khu ndaalo chitaru. Nga ne namenieelesia babaandu ne basaayi, se nabonamo Balawi tawe.
Nio narumania banaangile Elieseri, ne Arieli, ne Shemaya, ne Elinasani, ne Yaribu, ne Elinatani, ne Nasani, ne Sakaria, ne Meshulamu. Lundi nalaanga Yoyaribu ne Elinasani, babaandu be limanya.
Nabaruma khu mwimeelesi Ido, owaba omwimeelesi owe sirekere sie Kasifia, nababoolela niko bakhoyela baboolele Ido ne bawandaaye, baba bakholi be mu Lukaangu mu Kasifia. Benyekha bakhurumire babaandu bakhola munju eya Wele wefwe.
Ne khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele, bakhurumira Sherebia, omundu omukesi, khukhwama munju eya Mahili owe kholo eya Lawi okhwa Isiraeli. Echa ne babaana bewe be siseecha ne bawandaaye boosi alala baba ekhumi na munaane.
Lundi barumania Hasiabia ne Yeshaya be owa Merari, alala ne balebe babwe, boosi alala baba kamakhumi kabili.
Khutasakho babayo bakholi be mu Lukaangu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili nibo Daudi ne babemeelesi bewe barobora khuyeeta Balawi. Bano boosi baandikwa kamasina.
Nio abwenao, a luuchi lwa Ahaba nalaka lilieyimana lie siakhulia, nio khwiboombie fwabeene ebweeni wa Wele wefwe. Khwakhola khurio nio khumusabe niye akhuraangirire khu lukeendo lwefwe mala akhuliinde efwe ne babaana befwe alala ne kimiaandu kiefwe kioosi.
Sikila naba ne chisoni khusaba omwami sipupu sie banamae ne batimia chifarasi khukhuliinda efwe khukhwama khu basiku be khu ngila. Khwaba khwabooleele omwami khuli, “Kumukhono kwa Wele wefwe kuli kumulayi khu boosi bamuyiima niye, ne kamaani ke burafu bwewe kali khu boosi bamwekaana niye.”
Nono khweyimana siakhulia mala khwasaba Wele khulwe khukhuliinda efwe, mala aulila lisaba liefwe.
Nio naulamo basaayi babemeelesi ekhumi na babili: Sherebia, ne Hasiabia, ne balebe babwe ekhumi.
Nabapimila efwesa ne esahabu, ne biianwa bie nju eya Wele nibio omwami, bakeleki bewe ne babemeelesi, ne babaandu ba Isiraeli bamala khuaana.
Nabapimila efwesa chitani kamakhumi kabili na chibili ne bibiindu bie efwesa emia ndala ne busiro bwabio bwoola chikiilo kamakhumi saba ne esahabu chikiilo chielefu chitaru ne chimia chine
bibuumba bie esahabu kamakhumi kabili busiro bwabio bwoola chikiilo munaane ne bibiindu bibili bie kumukasa bing'enang'ena, bilekhaana ne bukusi bwe bibuumba bie esahabu.
Nababoolela ndi, “Enywe muli batakatifu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we bakuuka benywe. Akhaba bibiindu bie esahabu ne efwesa bireerwa khu niye nga biianwa bie khukhwirusia bioosi bili bitakatifu.
Biliinde bwitelembefu khukhwola nga ne bipiimilwa ebweeni we basaayi ne Balawi ne babemeelesi be Baisiraeli mu Yerusalemu musiro chenju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio basaayi ne Balawi babukula efwesa, ne esahabu, ne bibiindu bibiaba ne bipiimilwe, babireera mu Yerusalemu, mu Lukaangu lwa Wele wefwe.
Nio khwama a luuchi lwa Ahava endaalo eye likhumi na chibili eye kumwesi kunyoa, ne khucha e Yerusalemu. Wele aaba ne nafwe mala akhuliinda khukhwama khu basiku ne naabo ba baaba ne bakhwikhiina khu ngila ne khulikho khucha.
Khwola mu Yerusalemu mala khwaola khu ndaalo chitaru.
Nio khu ndaalo eya khane, khwacha munju eya Wele, khwapiima busiro bwe efwesa, ne esahabu, ne bibiindu, mala khwabiakanisia omusaayi Meremoti, okhwa Uria. Aaba ne Eliesa okhwa Fineasi ne Balawi babili, Yosabati okhwa Yoshua, ne Noadia okhwa Binui.
Buli siindu siabalwa mala siapiimwa busiro bwasio, mala busiro bwa buli siindu bwaandikwa.
Mu biise ebio babaandu babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe, bareera biianwa bie khukhwosia khu Wele owa Isiraeli. Baana chiuunwa ekhumi na chibili khulwe Isiraeli yoosi, kamamiiku kamakhumi tisa na sita, kamameeme kamakhumi saba na saba. Lundi baana chindurume ekhumi na chibili. Bino bioosi baana nga chimbosio che khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khukhwetakaasa.
Bosi babukula ebarwa niyo omwami oyo aabaelesia mala bakielesia babaami bakeekhe ne babemeelesi be sibala sie engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati, nio nabo baana buyeeti khu baandu be nju eya Wele.

Enyuma wakano koosi ne kamalile khukhwikholekha, babemeelesi be Baisiraeli banjichakho mala bamboolela bali, “Baisiraeli, basaayi, ne Balawi basiili khweyaula khukhwama khu baandu be bibala bibiababotookhelela ne bikholwa biabwe bisinyisia tawe. Bakheyaula khukhwama khu Baamoni, Bamoabu, ne Bamisiri, namwe khukhwama khu Bakanaani, khu Bahiti, khu Baperisi, khu Bayebusi, ne khu Baamori tawe.
Bayaudi bakhweele balala khu bakhaana be chikholo chino khuba bakhasi babwe khu beene ne khu baana babwe be sisoleeli. Nono ekholo endakatifu endobore yatubaanile ne babaandu be bibala. Lukali babemeelesi ne babaami nibo bakhasuubilwa tawe.”
Nga ne naulila kano, natabulaka chingubo chase ne kanjo yase, nekhubeka lichuune ne bunwanwa, mala nekhala ne niuunamiile.
Nekhala ne niuunamiile, khukhwola mu siise sie mbosio eye kolooba. Babaandu boosi baria niko Wele owa Isiraeli aaloma khuloondekhana ne khutaamba busuubilwa bwe babaandu babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe nga becha niio naba.
Nga siise ne siola sie embosio eye kolooba, nenyokha niio naba ne nikhaale ne niyimaane siakhulia, ne chingubo ne kanjo biase bitabukhake. Nasikama nasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase nesutile kamakhono kase angaaki.
Naloma ndi, “Ee Wele, ndi ne chisoni chingali khukhwima ebweeni wowo. Sikila bumayaanu bwefwe bwaniinile bwabirire kimirwe kiefwe mala bwolile mu ngaaki.
Khukhwama mu ndaalo che bakuuka befwe khukhwola luno, efwe babaandu bowo, khwakhola bumayaanu bukali. Sikila bumayaanu bwefwe, Efwe, ne babaami befwe, ne basaayi befwe khwamalile khukwa mu bunyali bwe babaami bakeni, mala khwirwa, khuambwa, khunuulwa. Khusiambwa chisoni khukhwola luno.
Khulwe siise sisiimbi sino, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe eekesie siisa khwifwe owakhukholile efwe khwarama ano, lundi aakhua bubweyaangu abuundu atakatifu wewe, nio akhole chimoni chefwe chibone lukali ne khukhuelesia limenya mubunasioobi.
Khuli banasioobi, ne kakhali Wele ewe se wakhwibiliile mu bunasioobi bwefwe tawe. Wakhola babaami ba Pasha khukhukholela siisa. Lundi bakhufukiilila khwamenya ne khukhwombakha enju eya Wele, ne khung'oona bubwatechukha, ne khunyoola kumuleembe mu Yuda ne mu Yerusalemu.
“Ee Wele wefwe, luno khuloma khuli siina enyuma wakano koosi? Khwalekha kamalaka kowo
niko wakhuelesia khubirira khu bakholi bowo, bang'oosi. Bakhuboolela bali, ‘Sibala nisio mulikho mucha khubukula sianyaalutisibwa, sikila babaandu ba basimenyamo bakhola bumayaanu. Ne bikholwa biabwe bisinyisia banyaalutia sibala buli abuundu.
Khwako, mukhafukiilila babaana benywe bakhwana nabo tawe, Mukhekoomba kumuleembe ne buiinda bwabwe tawe. Khola murio nio mube ne kamaani mala mulie bilayi bie mu sibala sino mala lundi lisaaye lienywe khulwa mindali.’
Ne kano koosi kekholekha khwifwe sikila bikholwa biefwe biibi. Kamamayaanu kefwe kali kamakali. Khwaboone khuli ewe, Wele wefwe, wakhuelesie kumunaanio kumukeekhe busa khukhila nga bumayaanu bwefwe bwenyekhana. Lundi walekhile khwifwe balamu.
Nono khwama khuriena khwalekelesia kamalaka kowo mala khwakhwaana ne babaandu bamayaanu bano? Khwaaba ne khukhola khurio se ocha khukhubonela bubi lukali mala okhubunisilie elala tawe ku?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli, ewe oli ng'ali, sikila efwe nifwe khukhwebachile khwarama khukhwola luno. Khweyama bumayaanu bwefwe khwiwe. Se khuli na ng'ali khukhwima ebweeni wowo tawe sikila kano.”

Esira nga naaba ne alikho nasaba ne khukhweyama bumayaanu bwewe, ne alikho alila ne khukwa ebweeni we enju eya Wele, sipupu sikali sie Baisiraeli, be siseecha, be siikhasi, ne babaana sia bamubotookhelela ne khulila lukali.
Nio Shekania okhwa Yehieli, mulala khu ba okhwa Elamu, aboolela Esira ali, “Se khwabeele basuubilwa khu Wele wefwe tawe, mala khwakhweele bakhaana bakeni khukhwama mu baandu Be Chikholo, ne akhaba luno lilieyikina lisiiliio khulwa Isiraeli.
Khwako lekha khukhole endakaano ne Wele wefwe. Lekha khuoone bakhasi bano boosi ne babaana babwe bache, khuloondekhana ne likeleka liowo nende liabo ba baria kamalaka ka Wele. Lekha likholekhe khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele.
Yinyokha, sikila kuli kumulimo kwowo, ne efwe khuli ne nawe. Ba ne kamaani mala okukhole.”
Nio Esira enyokha mala akhola babemeelesi be basaayi ne Balawi ne Baisiraeli boosi bakhola sisiechubo bali bacha khukhola nga nilwo lialomekha, bechuba.
Nio Esira enyokha arura munju eya Wele, mala acha mu lusiro lwa Yehohanani, okhwa Eliashibu. Ebweeneyo niio akona siilo esio. Ne se aliakho siakhulia namwe anywakho kameechi tawe, sikila aaba alikho alilila khutaamba lisuubila khwe babaandu babaama mu mbaambe.
Lilaka liarura mu Yuda mwoosi ne mu Yerusalemu khu boosi ba bakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe bali bakhoya babuusianile e Yerusalemu.
Lilaka liarura khu bemeelesi lili, omundu yesi yesi aaba ne akhilwa khukhwicha mu ndaalo chitaru, aba acha khunuulwa kimiaandu kiewe, lundi niye omwene acha khurusibwa khukhwama mu libuusiana lie be mu mbaambe.
Nio babaandu ba Yuda boosi, ne ba Benjamini, babuusiana e Yerusalemu khulwe chindaalo chitaru. Yaba endaalo eye kamakhumi kabili eye kumwesi kwa tisa. Ne babaandu boosi bekhala khuluya ebweeni wenju eya Wele. Baba balikho baterema sikila likhuwa lino lundi sikila efula engali.
Omusaayi Esira eema, mala ababoolela ali, “Mwakhola bumayaanu, khukhwa bakhaana bakeni, mala mwatasa bubi khu Isiraeli.
Nio luno khemweyame bumayaanu bwenywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bakuuka benywe, mala mukhole kamusiimisia niye. Mulekhane ne babaandu be chikholo chino ne bakhasi bakeni.”
Nio libuusiana lie babaandu boosi bakobosia ne kumumilo kwe angaaki bali, “khucha khukhola nga nilwo olomile.
Ne kakhali babaandu bali bakali, mala mu siise sino efula elikho ekwa engali, se khunyala khwemamo tawe. Namwe kumulimo kuno se kuli kwe ndaalo ndala namwe chibili tawe, sikila khwamala khukhola bumayaanu bukali mu likhuwa lino.
Lekha babemeelesi befwe bemeelele libuusiana lioosi. Lekha boosi baali mu ngoba chefwe babakhwa bakhaana bakeni beche mu biise birobore. Bakhoya beche ne basakhulu ne bakhalaki ba buli lukoba, nabwila burafu bwe lirima lia Wele wefwe khu likhuwa lino ne liwa.”
Yonasani okhwa Asaeli ne Yaseya okhwa Tikiwa bong'ene bakhafukiilila lirekekha lino tawe ne bayeetwa ne Meshulamu ne Siabetai, Omulawi.
Nio babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe bakhola bario. Omusaayi Esira arobora babaandu be siseecha babemeelesi khuloondekhana ne chinju chabwe, mala baandika kamasina kabwe. Mu ndaalo enyoa eye kumwesi kwe khumi bekhala asi barakikha khumenieelesia likhuwa elio.
Khu ndaalo eye bweeni eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa, baba bamalile khumanya babaandu ba baba ne bakhasi bakeni.
Khu baana be siseecha be basaayi ba bakhwa bakhaana bakeni babanyolekhana nibo bano: Ba okhwa Yoshua, ba okhwa Yosataki, ne bawandaaye, Maaseya, Elieseri, Yaribu, ne Ketalia.
Basuubisia khulekhana ne bakhasi babwe, mala baana limiiku nga siianwa sie bumayaanu bwabwe.
Be owa Imeri baba: Hanani ne Sebatia.
Be owa Harimu baba: Maaseya, Elicha, Shemaya, Yehieli ne Usia.
Be owa Pashihuri baba: Elioenai, Maaseya, Ishimaeli, Netaneli, Yosabati, ne Elasa.
Balawi baba: Yosabati, Simei, Kelaya (lundi olaangwa Kelita), Petahiya, Yuda, ne Elieseri.
Babeembi be kimienya: Eliashibu. Baliindi be silibwa sie Lukaangu: Sialumu, Telemu ne Uri.
Babaandi mu Isiraeli: Be owa Paroshi: Ramia, Isia, Malkiya, Miyamini, Eliesa, Malichiya, ne Benaya.
Be owa Elamu: Matania, Sakaria, Yehieli, Abudi, Yeremoti, ne Elicha.
Be owa Satu: Elioenai, Eliashibu, Matania, Yeremoti, Sabati, Asisa.
Be owa Bebai: Yehohanani, Hanania, Sakai, ne Atilai.
Be owa Bani: Meshulamu, Maluki, Adaia, Yashubu, Sheali, ne Yeremoti.
Be owa Pahati-moabu: Atina, Kelali, Benaya, Maaseya, Matania, Besaleli, Binui, ne Manase.
Be owa Harimu: Elieseri, Isiiya, Malichiya, Shemaya, Simioni,
Benjamini, Maluki, ne Shemaria.
Be owa Hasiumu: Matenai, Matata, Sabati, Elifeleti, Yeremai, Manase, ne Simei.
Be owa Bani: Maatai, Amuramu, ne Ueli,
Benaya, Beteya, ne Keluhi
Wania, Meremoti, ne Eliashibu
Matania, Matenai, ne Yaasu.
Be owa Binui: Simei,
Shelemia, Nasani, Adaia,
Makinatebai, Siasai, Sharai,
Asareli, Shelemia, Shemaria,
Sialumu, Amaria, ne Yosefu.
Be owa Nebo: Yeieli, Matitia, Sabati, Sebina, Yatai, Yoeli, ne Benaya.
Babaandu bano boosi baba bakhwa bakhaana khukhwama mu kholo chingeni. Babaoona barekukha ne babaana babwe.

Chino nicho chilomo cha Nehemia okhwa Hakalia.
Mu mwesi kwe Kisilefu, mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kabili naba mu lukoba luboofu lwa Susa.
Hanani, mulala khu bawandaayase ola khukhwama e Yuda alala ne sipupu sie babaandu be siseecha babaandi. Ne abareeba khuloondekhana ne Yerusalemu ne khu Bayuda babaona khukhwama mu
Bamboolela bali, “Abo babarama mu lukoongo
Nga ne naulila kamakhuwa kano, nekhala asi mala nalila. Nalila khu ndaalo chingali. Nachilila khusila khulia ne khusaba ebweeni wa Wele owe mwikulu.
Naloma ndi, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe mwikulu, Wele Omukali lundi owe khuukia, ewe oliinda endakaano yowo ne khuba ne busiime bwa buli lwoosi khwaabo ba baakhusiima ne khuliinda kamalaka kowo.
Rekeeresia mala obone, lisaba lio omukholi wowo nilio ndikho esaba ebweeni wowo siilo ne kumuusi. Esabila bakholi bowo, babaandu ba Isiraeli. Niyama bumayaanu bwefwe nibwo khwakhukholela. Ee, ese ne be nju yefwe khwakholile bumayaanu.
Khwakhukholele kamamayaanu lukali. Se khwaliinda kamalaka niko walaka omukholi wowo Musa tawe.
Khebulila niko walaka omukholi wowo Musa oli, ‘Enywe mwalekha khuba babeyikinwa ta, nja khumusalanisia mu kholo chichiindi.
Ne kakhali mwaba ne mungalukhila mala muliinde kamalaka kase nja khumukobosia abuundu niio narobora khukhunjisaayilao, mwakhaba ne mwasalanila mwiloba lioosi.’
“Bali bakholi bowo, lundi babaandu bowo nibo ewe wasikula ne bunyali bwowo bukali, ne kamaani kowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rekeeresia lisaba lio mukholi wowo, ne lisaba lie bakholi bowo babasiima khuba ne buriaani khwiwe. Ana bukhili khu mukholi wowo, mala okhole omwami akholele siisa.” Nono ese naba omusuti owe sikoombe sio omwami.

Mu mwesi kwa Nisani, kumwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili mu bwami bwa Aritashasita endali yareerwa ebweeni wo omwami. Nabukula endali naelesia omwami. Nono abeele ekhasulunyakho ebweeni wewe tawe.
Nio omwami andeeba ali, “Siina sikila ne osuluunye mala se olikho olwala ta? Okhuno khuli khubiililwa khwe kumwoyo.” Mala naria lukali.
Omwami andeeba ali, “Wenya sinaanu?” Nio nasaba Wele owe mwikulu.
Naboolela omwami Aritashasita endi, “Liaaba ne lisiimisia omwami ne naaba ne enyoola siisa ebweeni wowo, ndekhe enje mu sibala sia Yuda, mu lukoba nimwo bakuuka base basiikhwa, mala ndwombakhe lundi.”
Nio omwami andeeba ali (Kwini yesi aaba amwikhaaleo), “Okhamaleyo siise siina ne olikobola liina?” Nono liasiimisia omwami enje, mala namua biise.
Nio naboolela omwami ndi, “Liaaba ne likhusiimisia mbe chibarwa embilile babemeelesi be lukoongo
Lundi mbe ebarwa mbilile Asafu, omuliindi owe kimisiru kio mwami, ambelesie kimirongooro kie khukhola bilibwa bie lukoba luliinda Lukaangu, ne kamasiisi ke lukoba, ne enju niyo nja khumenyamo.” Omwami Aritashasita ambelesia nibio namusaba, sikila Wele aba ne nase.
Nacha naelesia babemeelesi be lukoongo ebweeni we luluuchi lwa Efurati chibarwa cho mwami. Omwami aba anduma ne babemeelesi be banamae nende be chifarasi.
Ne kakhali Sanibalati, khukhwama mu lukoba lwe Beti-horoni, ne Tobia, omukholi owe mu sibala sia Amoni, baulila kano, liababeelesia lukali. Liababeelesia khuulila bali omundu echile khukholela Isiraeli kamalayi.
Nio nacha e Yerusalemu, mala nabayo khu ndaalo chitaru.
Nio nenyokha mu silo, ne babaandu batiiti bari; ne se naboolelakho omundu yesi yesi nilio Wele ara mu mwoyo kwase khukholela Yerusalemu ta. Esaang'i ekiindi se yabakhowo ta ne ekhali epunda niyo naninakho yong'ene.
Narura silo nabirira mu Silibwa sie Litooma khukhwola khu sebele eye endemu khukhwola khu Silibwa sie Kamasisie. Naloleelesia kamasiisi ka Yerusalemu kakatechukha ne bilibwa bialwo bibiosebwa ne kumulilo.
Nio nacha khu Sebele eye Silibwa ne Litiisi lio mwami. Ne kakhali epunda niyo naba nayo se yanyala khunyoola engila yosi yosi khubirirakho ta.
Narura mu silo nabirira mwitooma, naloleelesia lisiisi. Nio nakobola nelayo khubirira e Silibwa sie Litooma.
Babemeelesi se bamanya niio njile namwe nisio naba ne ekhola ta. Lundi yaba esili khuboolelakho Bayaudi basaayi, bakoosi ne babemeelesi ne babaandi boosi babenyekhana khukhola kumulimo.
Nio nababoolela endi, “Lola butinyu nibwo khulimo, nga lukoba lwa Yerusalemu ne lwonakibwe ne bilibwa bialwo biosebwa. Yiicha khwombakhe lisiisi lie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu mala khwirusiekho chisoni.”
Nababoolela nga Wele ne anjeeta, ne kamakhuwa niko omwami Aritashasita amboolela. Nio baloma bali, “Lekha khwinyokhe mala khwombakhe lundi.” Beelesia kumwoyo khulwe khukhola kimilimo kimilayi.
Ne kakhali nga Sanibalati Omuhoroni, Tobia omukholi Omuamoni owaba omwaraabu olaangwa Keshemu ne baulila niko khwerekekha khukhola, bakhuchekheelela mala bakhulekelesia ne baloma bali, “Siindu siina nisio mulikho mukhola sino? Mulikho muba bareengu khu mwami?”
Nio nabakobosia endi, “Wele owe mwikulu acha khukhukhola efwe khunyale. Efwe khuli bakholi bewe, khucha khwinyokha mala khwombakhe. Ne kakhali enywe se mulikho ne kumukabwa namwe sisienyekhana khuba sisienywe namwe likhebulilwa mu Yerusalemu ta.”

Eliashibu Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne basaayi basie benyokha bombakha
Babaandu ba Yeriko bombakha khuloonda khu niye. Ne Sakuri okhwa Imuri naye ombakha khuloonda khu baandu ba Yeriko.
Ba okhwa Hasena bombakha Silibwa sie Ng'eeni. Basimikha kimitalaachi kiasio ne bilibwa abuundu abio, mala bara bikhomekho ne bibia bie khukhwikalilao silibwa.
Owabaloondakho khukhwombakha aba Meremoti, okhwa Uria omwichukhulu Hakosi. Owamuloondela mu khwombakha aba Meshulamu okhwa Berekia omwichukhulu Meshesabeli. Enyuma wewe Satoki okhwa Baana ombakha.
Babaandu ba Tekoa bombakha khuloonda khu Satoki. Ne kakhali babaandu be lukoosi ba Tekoa se berusia khukhola kimilimo tawe.
Yoyada okhwa Pasea ne Meshulamu okhwa Besodeya bombakha lundi Silibwa Siikhale
Melatia khukhwama e Kibeoni, Yadoni khukhwama e Meronoti, ne babaandu ba Kibeoni ne Misipa bombakha khuloonda khu Yoyada okhwa Pasea. Babaandu ba Kibeoni ne Misipa bemeelelwa ne omuruki owe lukoongo ebweeni we luluuchi lwa Efurati.
Babaloondakho baba Usieli okhwa Hariaya, omubasi. Ombakha sitonyi siloondakho. Owaloondakho mu khwombakha aba Hanania, omukholi owe kamafura kaunya bulayi. Bombakha lisiisi lia Yerusalemu khukhwola khu Lisiisi Libalaayi.
Refaya okhwa Huri, omwami owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Yerusalemu, ombakha sitonyi siloondakho.
Yedaya okhwa Harumafu ombakha sitonyi sisialoondakho sisiaba siimbi ne enju yewe. Hatushi okhwa Hashabuneya ombakha sitonyi sisialoondakho.
Malichiya okhwa Harimu ne Hashubu okhwa Pahati-moabu bombakha sitonyi sisiindi ne Enjeko eye Kamayika.
