Owamuloondela khukhwombakha Shalumu okhwa Haloheshi. Aba omwimeelesi owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Yerusalemu. Ombakha sitonyi esio alala ne bakhaana bewe.
Hanuni ne bamenywa be mu lukoba lwa Sanoa bombakha lundi Silibwa sie Litooma. Basimikha bilibwa, barakho bikhomekho ne bibia khukhwikalilao silibwa, ne khukhwombakha lisiisi bikele eelefu ndala, khukhwola khu Silibwa sie kamasisie.
Malichiya okhwa Rekabu, omwimeelesi owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Beti-hakikeremu, ombakha lundi Silibwa sie kamasisie. Asimikha bilibwa mala aramo bikhomekho ne bibia khulwe khukhwikalilao silibwa.
Shalumu okhwa Kolihose, omwimeelesi owe lukoongo lwa Misipa, ombakha Silibwa sie kumusiingi. Asimikha bilibwa mala aramo bikhomekho ne bibia. Lundi ombakha lisiisi lie litiisi lia Sheba, lie siluundu sio mwami. Ombakha khukhwola bitoboko bibiikha asi khukhwama mu Lukoba lwa Daudi.
Enyuma wewe, Nehemia okhwa Asibuki, omwimeelesi owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Beti-suri, ombakha sitonyi sisiindi. Ombakha khukhwola abuundu e siliindwa sia Daudi, a litiisi ne enju eye banamae.
Enyuma wa Nehemia Balawi bombakha. Owanyoa aba Rehumu okhwa Bani. Owamuloondela aba Hashabiya.
Omwimeelesi owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Keila. Ombakha khulwe lukoongo lwewe.
Enyuma wewe bawandaaye bombakha. Baba Bavai okhwa Henadadi, omwimeelesi owe lubeka lulala lwe lukoongo lwa Keila.
Owamuloondakho aba Eseri okhwa Yeshua, omwimeelesi owa Misipa. Ombakha sitonyi sisiindi ebweeni kumwikha a libiikhilo lie bulwaani mu koona.
Ne Baruku okhwa Sabai ombakha sitonyi sisiindi, khukhwama mu koona khukhwola khu muliango kwe enju eyo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Eliashibu.
Enyuma wewe Meremoti okhwa Uria lundi ne omwichukhulu owa Hakosi, ombakha sitonyi sisiindi. Ombakha khukhwama khu muliango kwe enju eyo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Eliashibu khu ndulo khwe enju yewe.
Enyuma we Balawi basaayi be ekeewa bombakha.
Enyuma wabwe Benjamini ne Hashubu bombakha ebweeni we chinju chabwe. Enyuma wabwe. Asaria, okhwa Maseeya, omwichukhulu owa Anania, ombakha siimbi ne enju yewe omwene.
Enyuma wewe Benui okhwa Henadadi ombakha sitonyi sisiindi, khukhwama khu nju eya Asaria khukhwola khu koona.
Palali okhwa Usai ombakha siimbi ne ekhuumbo ne endeleelwa ebonekhela khu nju eyo omwami a luya lwe buliindi. Enyuma wewe Pedaya okhwa Paroshi ombakha.
Ne baliindi be Lukaangu ba baamenya khu Ofeli, bombakha khukhwola ebweeni we Silibwa sie Kameechi ne ebukwe ne endeleelwa ebonekha.
Enyuma we basaayi babaandu be Tekoa bombakha sitonyi sisialoleelela endeleelwa ebonekha khukhwola khu lisiisi lia Ofeli.
Angaaki we Silibwa sie Efarasi basaayi bombakha buli mulala ebweeni we enju yewe.
Enyuma wabwe Satoki okhwa Imeri ombakha ebweeni we enju yewe. Ne Shemaya okhwa Shekania, omuliindi owe silibwa sie ebukwe, ombakha; enyuma wewe.
Enyuma wewe Hanania okhwa Shelemia, ne Hanuni okhwa Salafu okhola sita, bombakha. Ne Meshulamu okhwa Berekia ombakha ebweeni we enju yewe.
Enyuma wewe Malichiya, mulala khu babasi, ombakha khukhwola khu nju eye bakholi be Lukaangu ne eye babofuli ebweeni we Silibwa Siboofu ne lubeka lwe enju eye ngaaki we koona.
Babasi be bibia ne baboofuli bombakha sitonyi akari we lubeka lwe enju eye engaaki eye mu koona ne Silibwa sie Kamakheese.

Sanibalati nga ne aulila ali khwaba khulikho khwombakha lisiisi, aambwa lirima mala akhalala lukali. Akhoma Bayaudi.
Ebweeni we babaasie ne banamae ba Samaria aloma ali, “Bayaudi batekhele bano balikho bakhola siina kane bakalusie biindu nga biaba ku? Baliaana chimbosio ku? Balanyala khumala kumulimo mu ndaalo ndala ku? Balanyala khukhola kamabaale ke khukhwombakha khukhwama mu makiingwi ke kamaumbu kakaya ku?”
Tobia Omuamoni aba amwimileo, mala amukobosia ali, “Ee, lisiisi nilio balikho bombakha, akhaba enjusi enyala yalitechula!”
“Ulila, Ee Wele wefwe sikila bakhukhomile efwe; bakalusilie likhoma liabwe khu bene. Balekhe banuulwe mu sibala nisio balimo nga baambe.
Okhababeela bumayaanu nibwo bakhola ta, lundi okhabwibilila ta, sikila bakhuambisie lirima ebweeni we babombakha.”
Khwako khwachiililila khukhwombakha lisiisi. Khwombakha liola akari we buleeyi bwalio, sikila babaandu baba ne kumwoyo kwe khukhola kimilimo.
Ne kakhali Sanibalati, Tobia ne Baarabu, Baamoni ne Bashidodi, ne baulila bali khukhwombakha lisiisi lia Yerusalemu khulikho khuchiililila, lundi bali bibaanga bie lisiisi bilikho bikalwa, babona bubi bukali.
Boosi bakhola ekwangwaani khukhwicha khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu ne khusaasia chingoyaani mu lukoba.
Ne khwasaba khu Wele wefwe mala khwarao omuliindi khuliinda siilo ne kumuusi.
Babaandu ba Yuda baloma bali: “Bakholi basuta balikho balua. Ne kamaumbu kakhilile. Se khunyala khukhwombakha lisiisi tawe.”
Ne basiku befwe baloma bali, “Se balamanya, namwe babone ta khukhwola nga ne khucha khubolakho, khubeera ne khukhwimia kimilimo kiabwe.”
Nga Bayaudi ba baamenya ne basiku befwe becha bakhuboolela khukhwola ekhumi bali, “Basiku balama buli abuundu niio bamenya khukhwibwaakala efwe.”
Nara babaandu be chimbalu, kamafumo, ne buyiingo, mu buli abuundu aatomokha, lundi asiangalaamwe enyuma we lisiisi.
Nalola mala nenyokha nio naboolela bakoosi, babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi ndi, “Mukhabaria ta. Khebulila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omukali owe liriisia mala mupanile bawandaayenywe, babaana benywe, bakhasi benywe, ne chingo chenywe.”
Basiku befwe baulila bali khwamala khumanya niko baba ne barekekha, mala bamanya bali Wele onaake lirekekha liabwe. Nio fwesi khwakobolayo khwombakha lisiisi buli mundu khu mulimo kwewe.
Khukhwamila khu ndaalo eyo balala khu bakholi bombakha lisiisi ne babaandi babanula kamafumo, chingabo, ne buyiingo. Mala banamae bakhulu bema enyuma we be nju eya Yuda
ba baaba ne bombakha lisiisi. Abo babasuta bibiindu bibiombakha, bakholela kumukhono mulala, ne kukuundi kwasuta bulwaani.
Ne buli omwombakhi aba eboyile embalu khu nduukhu yewe nga aba ne ombakha. Omundu owaba ne apa e khoombi aba siimbi ne nase.
Naboolela bakoosi ne babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi ndi, “Kimilimo kili kimikali lundi kimibalaayi ne efwe khwasalaniile lukali khwisiisi, omundu khukhwama khu wasie.
Abuundu niio muulila ekhoombi, timao Wele wefwe alakhupanila.”
Nio khwakhola kimilimo ne balala bakangilila kamafumo khukhwama nga busia khukhwola nga ne bwilabula.
Lundi naboolela babaandu mu siise esio endi, “Lekha buli mundu ne bayeeta babwe boosi babe mu Yerusalemu mu silo, nio bakhuliinde mu silo ne khukhola kimilimo kumuusi.”
Nio ese ne babasiange ne bakholi base ne baliindi se khwefuula chingubo siilo tawe. Ne buli mundu asuta bulwaani bwewe mukhono.

Enyuma we siise babaandu bakali, be siseecha nende be siikhasi, barakikha khukhwilila khu Bayaudi basiaabwe.
Balala baloma bali, “Khuli ne lisaaye likali, khwenya biakhulia bikhuyeeta efwe khumenye.”
Babaandi baloma bali, “Khulikho khupa kimisiingo kimikuunda kiefwe ne biluundu bie kimisabibu ne chinju, nio khunyoolemo biakhulia binyala biakhuliinda mu njala.”
Ne babaandi baloma bali, “Khwekopile chirupia khuruunge busuuru bwo mwami bwe kimikuunda ne biluundu biefwe.
Efwe khuli be kholo ndala nga Bayaudi basiefwe. Babaana befwe bali balayi busa nga bababwe. Ne khulayingililanga babaana befwe khuba banasioobi. Balala khu bakhaana befwe babeele banasioobi khale. Ne se khuli nga khunyala ta sikila kimikuunda kiefwe ne biluundu biefwe bie kimisabibu bili mu bunyali bwe babaandu babaandi.”
Nga ne naulila khu kano nakhalala lukali.
Nebaasia mala nekiicha bakoosi ne babemeelesi. Nababoolela ndi, “Mulikho mwenya bukhala khukhwama khu bawandaayenywe.” Nabalaangila libuusiana likali.
Nababoolela ndi, “Efwe nga nilwo khwenyalile, khwasikula bawandaayefwe Bayaudi babakusibwa khu bibala bibiindi. Ne enywe luno mulikho mukusia bawandaayenywe nio bakusibwe khwifwe!” Basila busa ne khuba nende nilio baloma liosi ta.
Nio naloma ndi, “Nilio mulakholanga se lili lilayi tawe. Se mwenyekhana murie Wele wefwe nio mukhiingilile khukhomwa ne basiku befwe Be Chikholo chichiindi?
Khutasa khwako ese ne babasiange ne bakholi base khulikho khubeosia chirupia ne biakhulia. Lekha khubabukulakho bukhala bukali buno.
Bakoboseleyo endaalo eya luno kimikuunda kiabwe, biluundu bie kimisabibu biabwe, biluundu biabwe bie kimiseituni nesichakha sia miseituni, ne chinju chabwe.” Bakobosiele akhaba chirupia, biakhulia, kimisabibu, endali ne kamafura nibio mwababukulanga.
Nio baloma bali, “Khulabakobosiela ne se khulibenyakho siindu tawe. Khulakhola nga nilwo olomile.” Nalaanga basaayi mala nabakhola khukhwechuba khukhola niko balaka.
Nio nasiisimula engubo yase niyo niboela munda mala naloma endi, “Wele akhoya asiisimula buli mundu khukhwama munju yewe ne kimilimo kiewe okhabiikha endakaano yewe tawe. Akhoya asisimulwa mala alekhwe busa.” Ne libuusiana lioosi liakobosia lili, “Kabe kario!” Bafumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Mala babaandu bakhola nga balaka.
Khukhwama mu siise nisio naroborwa khuba omuruki owa Yuda, khukhwama khu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kibili khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kataru na kibili nikio Aritashasita abela omwami, balebe base ne samwene se khwaliakho siakhulia sisienyikha khuuba sisiase nga omuruki tawe.
Babemeelesi ba baaba ebweeni wase bara busiro khu baandu, ne lundi bababukulakho biakhulia ne endali, khutasa khu bitonyi bie efwesa kamakhumi kane. Akhaba bakholi babwe bamiina babaandu. Ne ese se nakhola ndio ta, sikila naria Wele.
Nara kamaani kase koosi mu khwombakha lundi lisiisi, ne se nenya khubukulakho kamaloba tawe. Lundi bakholi base boosi baba mu bwombakhi.
Lundi nalisia Bayaudi ne babemeelesi babwe emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano khutasa khwaabo babecha khwise khukhwama mu kholo chili siimbi.
Buli endaalo nabalisia eeyi ndala, kamakheese kamanefu sita, ne chingokho chingali. Ne buli chindaalo likhumi nabakabila endali. Ne kakhaba kario se nasaba biakhulia nibio benyekhana bambelesie nga omuruki tawe. Nakhola ndio sikila babaandu baba ne busiro bukali.
Khebulila, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe bulayi bwase koosi niko ekholeele babaandu bano.

Sanibalati, Tobia, Keshemu Omwaraabu, ne basiku befwe babaandi boosi baulila bali namalile khukhwombakha lisiisi. Lundi baulila bali mbao bibaanga bibialekhwamo ta, (akhaba ne khwaba ne khusiili khura kimiliango mu bilibwa.)
Khwako Sanibalati ne Keshemu bandumira burume ne baloma bali, “Yiicha khwakaanane, mu sirekere silala mu siangalaamwe sia Ono.” Ne kakhali benya khu khukholela ese kamabi.
Naruma barume khubaboolela endi, “Endikho khola kimilimo kimikali ne se enyala necha tawe. Siina sikila ndekhe kimilimo mala niche niio muli?”
Bandumira burume buno ne bubwene khukhwola khane, ne buli siise nabarumira likalusio liliene ne liliene.
Nio Sanibalati, mungila eng'ene ne eng'ene arumania omukholi wewe khwise lukhola kharaano, ne ebarwa ekhali efuunikhe tawe mu makhono kewe.
Kakabamo kaba: “Kabolekhwe mu chikholo, ne Kashimu yesi alomakho, bali ewe ne Bayaudi mwenya khukhola bureengu. Esino nisio sikila ne mulikho mwombakha lisiisi. Ne ewe wenya khuba omwami wabwe khuloondekhana ne chilomo chino?
Lundi bali khurekekha bang'oosi khulangilila mu Yerusalemu khuloondekhana ne nawe bali, omwami aliio mu Yuda. Ne nono lilaboolelwa omwami khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa kano. Nono yiicha khwakaanane khulomalome khu makhuwa kano.”
Namurumira likalusio ndi: “Mbao sisiikholekha nga nilwo oloma tawe. Wekhochochile busa wamwene.”
Benya khukhuriikhirisia ne bebaasia bali khulareenga mala kimilimo kikhaywe khukhwikholekha. “Nono, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mbelesie kamaani!”
Ne nga nacha munju eya Shemaya okhwa Delaya omwichukhulu owa Mehetabeli, owabowa munju yewe, amboolela ali, “Lekha khwakaanane munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala khukhomekhe kimiliango, sikila balikho becha khukhwira ewe, silo siosi siosi banyala becha khukhwira ewe.”
Ne kakhali nakobosia ndi, “Omundu nga ese nyala nelukha ku? Omundu nga ese nyala nacha mu Lukaangu mala naba omulamu ku? Se endachamo tawe.”
Namanya endi Wele se aba omurumire tawe, ne akhali Tobia ne Sanibalati yaba bamukulile khuloma ario.
Bamukula khulwe sifuno sino: Mbe omuri mala khole bumayaanu nio bambelesie lisina libi mala bakhome.
Nasaba Wele ndi, “Khebulila Tobia ne Sanibalati Ee Wele wase khuloondekhana ne bibiindu nibio bakholile bino. Khebulila omung'oosi omukhasi Noadia ne bang'oosi babaandi boosi babenya khukhundikhirisia.”
Nio lisiisi liawa khukhwombakhwa khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chiraano eye kumwesi kwa Elulu. Lisiisi liabukula chindaalo kamakhumi karaano na chibili khukhwombakhwa.
Nga basiku befwe boosi ne chikholo chichakhubotookhelela ne baulilakho, baria, mala chisoni chabatiila. Babona bali kimilimo kino kiakholeekhe khulwe buyeeti bwa Wele.
Khutasa khwako mu biise ebio bakoosi ba Yuda baruma chibarwa chingali khu Tobia ne Tobia naye yesi abaandikila chibarwa.
Babaandu bakali mu Yuda baba lubeka lwewe mu khwechuba sikila aba musaani owa Shekenia okhwa Ara. Omwana wewe Yehohanani akhwa omukhaana owa Meshulamu, okhwa Berekia.
Lundi balomaloma khu malayi kewe ebweeni wase mala ne bamuboolela niko naloma. Ne Tobia aruma chibarwa khukhundikhirisia.

Lisiisi liombakhwa, bilibwa biemisibwa, ne baliindi babembi be kimienya ne Balawi babaandi baroborwa.
Narao wandaayase Hanani, ne Hanania komanda owe lukoba khuliinda lukoba lwa Yerusalemu. Hanania aba omweyikinwa lundi omundu owaria Wele khukhila babaandi.
Nababoolela ndi, “Bilibwa bia Yerusalemu biikulibwe khukhwola mwiangilwe. Ne lundi mwikale ne khukhomekha kimiliango baliindi ne basiili khurura khu milimo enyanga ne ekwa. Robora baliindi khukhwama mu baandu bamenyile mu Yerusalemu, ne buli mulala khuliinda siimbi ne chinju chabwe.”
Lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lwaba lukali lundi lubalaayi, ne kakhali babaandu ba babaamo baba batiiti, lundi chinju chaba chikhombakhwa tawe.
Wele ambelesia limanya khubuusia bakoosi ne babemeelesi ne babaandu nio babalwe khuloondekhana ne lisaaye liabwe. Nanyoola sitabu sie lisaaye lilianyoa khukobola khukhwama mu mbaambe. Yaba kaandikwamo bali:
Abano nibo babaandu be lukoongo babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe. Bali nibo omwami Nebukadinesa, owa Babiloni abukula ayila mu mbaambe. Bakobola e Yerusalemu ne Yuda, buli sia mulala mu lukoba lwewe.
Bakobola ne Serubabeli, Yoshua, Nehemia, Asaria, Ramia, Nahamani, Modekai, Bilishani, Misipereti, Bikibai, Nehumu, ne Baana.
Obuno nibwo bukali bwe babaandu ba Isiraeli: Lisaaye lia Paroshi liaba babaandu chielefu chibili emia ndala ne kamakhumi saba na babili.
Lisaaye lia Shefatia baba chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi saba na babili.
Lisaaye lia Ara liaba chimia sita ne kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Lisaaye lia Pahati-moabu (ba baaba lisaaye lia Yeshua ne Yoabu) baba chielefu chibili ne chimia munaane ne likhumi na munaane.
Be lisaaye lia Elamu baba eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili kamakhumi karaano na bane.
Be lisaaye lia Satu baba chimia munaane ne kamakhumi kane na baraano.
Be lisaaye lia Sakai, baba chimia saba ne kamakhumi sita.
Be lisaaye lia Binui, baba chimia sita ne kamakhumi kane na munaane.
Be lisaaye lia Bebai, baba chimia sita ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Be lisaaye lia Asigadi, baba chielefu chibili ne chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili na babili.
Be lisaaye lia Adonikamu, baba chimia sita ne kamakhumi sita na saba.
Be lisaaye lia Bikibai, baba chielefu chibili ne kamakhumi sita na saba.
Be lisaaye lia Adini, baba chimia sita ne kamakhumi karaano na baraano.
Be lisaaye lia Ateri (ba Hesekia), baba kamakhumi tisa na munaane.
Be lisaaye lia Hashumu, baba chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Be lisaaye lia Besai, baba chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili ne bane.
Be lisaaye lia Harifu, baba emia ndala ne likhumi na kabili.
Be lisaaye lia Kibeoni, baba kamakhumi tisa na baraano.
Babaandu ba Betelehemu ne Netofa, baba emia ndala ne kamakhumi munaane na munaane.
Babaandu ba Anatoti, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane.
Babaandu ba Boti-Asimaweti, kamakhumi kane na babili.
Babaandu ba Kiriati-Yearimu, Kefira ne Beeroti, chimia saba ne kamakhumi kane na bataru.
Babaandu ba Rama ne Keba, chimia sita ne kamakhumi kabili na mulala.
Babaandu ba Mikimashi, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na babili.
Babaandu ba Beteli ne Ai, emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Babaandu ba Nebo babaandi baba kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Ba okhwa Elamu okundi, elefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano na bane.
Ba okhwa Harimu, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili.
Ba okhwa Yeriko, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kane na baraano.
Ba okhwa Lodi, Hadidi, ne Ono, chimia saba ne kamakhumi kabili na mulala.
Ba okhwa Senaha, chielefu chitaru ne chimia tisa ne kamakhumi kataru.
Chino nicho chikholo che basaayi chichakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe. Ba okhwa Yedaya, (babechukhulu ba Yeshua), chimia tisa ne kamakhumi saba na bataru.
Ba okhwa Imeri, eelefu ndala ne kamakhumi karaano na babili.
Ba okhwa Pashuri, eelefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane na saba.
Bakhwa Harimu, eelefu ndala ne likhumi na mulala na saba.
Abamo nibo balawi, be lisaaye lia Yeshua ne Kadimieli, (babechukhulu ba Hodeba) kamakhumi saba na bane.
Babembi be kimienya be lisaaye lia Asafu baba emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane na munaane.
Balindi be silibwa be lisaaye lia Shalumu, Ateri, Talimoni, Akubu, Hatita, Shabai emia ndala ne kamakhumi kataru na munaane.
Bakholi be Lukaangu baba: Ba okhwa siha, Hasufa, ne Tabaoti.
Ba okhwa Kerosi, Sia, ne Padoni.
Ba okhwa Lebana, Hakaba, ne Sulimui.
Ba okhwa Hanani, Kideli ne Kahari.
Ba okhwa Reaya, Resini, ne Nekoda.
Ba okhwa Easamu, Usa, ne Pasea.
Ba okhwa Besai, Meunimu, ne Nefusimu.
Ba okhwa Bakibukia, Hakufa, ne Harihuri.
Basiluti, Mehida, Herisha,
Barikosi, Sisera, Tema;
Ba okhwa Nesia ne Hatifa. Chikholo che banasioobi ba Solomoni chichakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe.
Be lisaaye lio mukholi owa Solomoni; ba Sotai, Sofereti, Perida,
Yaala, Parikoni, Kideli;
Shefatia, Hatili, Pokereti-hosebaimu ne ba Amoni.
Bakholi be Lukaangu ne lisaaye lie bakholi ba Solomoni baba chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi tisa na babili.
Abano nibo babecha khukhwama Teli-mela, Teli-harisha, Cherubu, Adoni, ne Imeri. Se banyala khukhwekesia ne baba babechukhulu be Baisiraeli tawe.
Baba: Ba okhwa Delaya, Tobia, Nekoda chimia sita kamakhumi kane na babili.
Lundi babao basaayi bakhamanyikhana sikuuka siabwe ne siama Isiraeli namwe tawe. Baba lisaaye lia Hobaya, lia Hakosi ne lia Barisilayi. Barisilayi aba abukula omukhaana owa Barisilayi nga omukhasi wewe mala alaangwa lisina liewe lie luuya lwo omukhasi wewe.
Babaandu bakhilwa khunyoola kamasina ke sikuuka siabwe nono se bafukiililwa khuba basaayi tawe sikila balolekhana khuba banyaalu.
Omuruki owe Bayaudi ababoolela ali se bakhoyeele balia siakhulia siianwa khu Wele tawe, khukhwola nga Omusaayi ne echa khubao onyala arumikhira Urimu ne Tumimu
Bukali bwaabo babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe baba chielefu kamakhumi kane na chibili, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi sita.
Khu bano batasikhakho bakholi babwe be siseecha nende be siikhasi chielefu saba, chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kataru na saba; babembi be kimienya be siseecha nende be siikhasi chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane na baraano.
Chifarasi chabwe chaba chimia saba ne kamakhumi kataru na sita, ne chinyumbu chabwe chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane ne chiraano.
Lundi baba ne chingamia chabwe chimia chine ne kamakhumi kataru na chiraano, ne chipunda chabwe chielefu sita chimia saba ne kamakhumi kabili.
Balala khu bemeelesi be chinju baana buyeeti bwe khung'oona Lukaangu lundi. Omuruki aelesia omubiikhi bitonyi bie sahabu eelefu ndala, bibuumba kamakhumi karaano, chingubo che basaayi chimia chiraano ne kamakhumi kataru.
Babemeelesi Be Chikholo baelesia omubiikhi bitonyi bie sahabu chielefu kamakhumi kabili, bitonyi bie efwesa chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili.
Babaandu babaandi babarama baana bitonyi bie sahabu chielefu kamakhumi kabili, bitonyi bie efwesa chielefu chibili ne chingubo che basaayi kamakhumi sita na saba.

Kumwesi kwa saba Baisiraeli boosi baba ne bamalile khukhwikhala mu ngoba chabwe. Baisiraeli boosi babuusiana mu Yerusalemu, mu siwanja akari we silibwa sie Kameechi. Bareeba Esira Omusaayi lundi omuandiki areere sitabu sie lilaka lia Musa nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Baisiraeli.
Khwako khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwa saba Esira areera sitabu sie lilaka abuundu niio yaba babaandu baba ne babusianile. Babaandu be siseecha, be siikhasi, bakhulu babanyala khuulila ne khumanya bebuusiao.
Abasomela Lilaka khukhwama nga ne bwasia khukhwola mwiangilwe. Asoma ne aloleleele akari we siwaanja embi ne silibwa sie kameechi. Mala boosi bamurekeeresia bulayi.
Esira omuandiki eema khu situumi sie lupao sisiombakhwa khubeela kimilimo ekio. Babaandu babamwimao baba: Matitia, Shema, Anaya, Uria, Hilikia, ne Maaseya khu lubeka luseecha ne Pedaya, Mishaeli, Malichiya, Hashumi, Hashibatana, Sakaria, ne Meshulamu lubeka lukhasi.
Esira ekula sitabu ebweeni we babaandu, nga ne abakho angaaki khubakhila. Ne nga ne ekula sitabu, babaandu boosi benyokha bema.
Esira afumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele omukali. Babaandu boosi basuta kamakhono kabwe mungaaki ne bakobosia bali “Amina, Amina.”
Basikama mala benamila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne bubweeni bwabwe bwaloleelela asi.
Balawi babenoselia Lilaka Baba: Yeshua, Bani, Sherebia, Yamini, Akubu, Shabetai, Hotia, Maaseya, Kelita, Asaria, Yosabati, Hanani, ne Pelaia.
Basoma bulayi ne khukhwinoosia sitabu sie khukhwama mu lilaka lia Wele. Balinoosia
Nio Nehemia, owaba omuruki ne Esira, omusaayi lundi omumanyi owe Lilaka, ne Balawi babenosianga Lilaka baboolela babaandu boosi bali, “Endaalo eya luno eli endakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe. Khwako se mukhoyeele mwabeelela namwe mwalila tawe.” Babaandu boosi baba balikho balila nga baulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Luno khemuche engo mala mulie biakhulia bilayi ne ndali. Mukabekho biakhulia ne bie khunywa bienywe khu baandi bakhali ne nabio tawe. Endaalo eya luno eli endakatifu khu Mwami, khwako mukhasulunya tawe. Sikila busangaafu bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli kamaani kenywe.”
Balawi bachiililila khuoleelesia babaandu ne khubaboolela bali, “Ba baolelefu sikila endaalo yino eli endakatifu. Mukhasulunya ta.”
Khwako babaandu boosi bacha engo mala balia ne khunywa ne busangaafu ne khukabana nibio baba ne nabio ne babaandi, sikila baulila niko babasomela.
Endaalo eya khabili babemeelesi be chikholo boosi, alala ne basaayi ne Balawi, bacha khu Esira khukhweyika kamekisio ke Lilaka.
Banyoola Lilaka nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana khubirira khu Musa liboola lili Baisiraeli bakhoya khumenya mu bisali biise bie mu Naikara eye Bisali.
Babaandu bakhoyelwa khukhwilwacha ne khusalanisia elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu ne mu chingoba chabwe choosi; “Khemuche mu bikulu mala mureere kamasaafu ke khukhwama khu sakia cha miseituni ne kimiseituni kie mundaa, kimibadasi, kiminasi, ne kimirongooro kikiindi kie kamasaafu khukhola bisali khuloondekhana ne kamekisio kakaandikwa mu Lilaka.”
Khwako babaandu bacha banyoola kamasaafu, mala bakhola bisali khu chinju chabwe, mu mako chabwe, mu lumako lwe enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne babaandu boosi baba embi ne silibwa sie kameechi ne silibwa sia Efuraimu.
Babaandu boosi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe bombakha bisali bamenyamo. Bele Baisiraeli basiili khukhola kano khukhwama chindaalo cha Yoshua okhwa Nuni tawe. Buli mundu aba ne busangaafu.
Khukhwama endaalo enyoa eya naikara, khukhwola khu ndaalo emaliilisi, Esira asoma malala khu malaka ka Wele buli ndaalo. Baba ne naikara khu ndaalo saba, mala mu ndaalo eya munaane liabao libuusiana litakatifu khuloondekhana ne lilaka.

Mu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chine eye kumwesi kumwene, Baisiraeli babuusiana khulwe khusila khulia ne khunywa ne khukhwekesia khubeleela khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe. Befwara kamakunia ne khuchukha lipukhuulu khu mirwe khulwe bubwoni bwabwe.
Baisiraeli beyaula khukhwama khu baakwa boosi. Bema ne beyama bumayaanu bwabwe nende bwe bakuuka babwe.
Khulwe ambi chisa chine bema ne basoma khukhwama mu sitabu sie Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe. Ne mu saa chine chichiindi beyama bumayaanu bwabwe mala basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.
Babema khu situumi sie Balawi, baba, Yeshua, Bani, Kadimieli, Shebania, Buni, Sherebia, Bani, ne Kenani. Basaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe ne kumwoyo kwa angaaki.
Nio Balawi; Yeshua, Kadimieli, Bani, Hashabineyi, Sherebia, Hodia, Shebania, ne Petahiya baloma bali,
“Yinyokha angaaki mala mufumie Omwami Wele wenywe,
khukhwama mindali khukhwola mindali.
Lisina liewe lie luyali lifuma,
lili angaaki we chikhabi choosi ne efuma.”
Nio Esira aloma ali, “Ewe, weng'ene oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wakhola likulu ne likulu lie angaaki lukali ne ching'enieesi che mungaaki choosi. Wakhola liloba nende bioosi bilikho. Wakhola enyanja ne bioosi bilimo. Ne ewe oaana bulamu khu buli siindu. Bioosi bili khwikulu bikhusaaya ewe.
Ewe, oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owarobora Aburamu mala wamulaanga khukhwama Uri mu Babiloni; mala wamulaanga lisina liewe oli Aburahamu.
Wabona oli ali omusuubilwa khwiwe, mala wakhola endakaano ne naye. Wamusuubisia khumuelesia sibala sia Kanaani; Sibala sie Bahiti ne Baamoni, sibala sie Baperisi, Bayebusi, ne Bagirikashi, khu lisaaye liewe. Wabiikha endakaano yowo, sikila oli omuluungi.
Wakhola kamaya nende ke khuukia khu Farao ne khu bemeelesi bewe ne khu baandu be sibala siewe boosi, sikila wamanya oli bafwolobia bakuuka befwe. Ewe wanyoola efuma ne efuma yowo esiiliyo na luno.
Wakabukhasia enyanja yela eyi ne neyi ebweeni wabwe nio babira akari we nyanja khwiloba liliomu. Ne kakhali wamwaata abo ba babatimania mu lusiba lwe kameechi; nga libaale ne litumbula mu meechi ke lusiba.
Mu siise sie kumuusi wabarangirira ne lifuumbi, ne siilo wabakhoselia kumulilo khu ngila niyo bakhoyela bachilekho.
Wecha a sikulu sia Sinai mala walomaloma khukhwama mwikulu khu baandu mala wabaa lilaka lilienyekha ne kamekisio ka ng'ali.
Wabekesia khuliinda e Sabato yowo endakatifu, ne wabaelesia kamalaka kowo khubirira khu mukholi wowo Musa.
Ne nga baba ne njala, wabaelesia siakhulia khukhwama mwikulu, ne nga baba ne bulesia wabaelesia kameechi khukhwama mu lwanda. Wabalaka khu bukula sibala nisio wabasuubisia khubaelesia.
Baloba khuria; mala ke khuukia koosi niko wabakholela; Baluma emirwe mala beroborera omwimeelesi khubakobosia mu burumwa e Misiri. Ne ewe oli Wele obeela, owe kumwalaalo ne siisa, lundi oli kalaa mu khuba ne lirima ne oli ne busiime bukali nono se wabalekha tawe.
Akhaba ne bekholela sifwaani mu lukoondo lwe euunwa mala baloma bali, ‘Oyuno niye wele wefwe owakhurusia khukhwama e Misiri,’ bakhukholela kamabi kamakali.
Ne ewe mu siisa siowo sikali se wabalekha mu sichiimi tawe. Lifuumbi lie kamalesi liabemeelela kumuusi ne lifuumbi lie kumulilo liabemeelela mu silo.
Mu bulayi bwowo wababoolela nisio bakhoyeele bakhole; wabaliisia mana ne khubaelesia kameechi ke khunywa.
Wabaliinda khu miiko kamakhumi kane mu sichiimi mala wabaelesia bioosi nibio benya; chingubo chabwe se chatabukha ta, ne bikele biabwe se biabiimba tawe.
Watasa lisaaye liabwe liaba likali nga ching'enieesi che mwikulu, ne khubareera mu sibala nisio wasuubisia khuelesia bakuuka babwe.
Nio lisaaye liabwe liengila mu sibala omwo ne khusibukula. Wabakhilila babaandu Bakanaani ne babaami babamenyamo. Waelesia babaandu bowo bunyali bwe khukhola nga ne benya khu baandu ne babaami ba Kanaani.
Babaandu bowo batiila chingoba chichabotookhelesibwa ne kamasiisi ne sibala sie ngakha. Babukula chinju chichechulamo bibiindu bilayi, chisebele chichayabwa khale, kimirongooro kie miseituni, nende kie kimisabibu ne kimirongooro kikiindi kie kamatuunda kamakali. Balia buli siosi nisio benya mala banera; bekhoyela bibiindu bioosi nibio wabaelesia.
Khwako wabalekha mu makhono ke basiku babwe, mala babaelesia kumunaanio. Ne mu biise bie kumunaanio bino, bakhulilila ewe mala wabaulila khukhwama mwikulu. Mu siisa siowo sikali wabarumira baonia ba baonia khukhwama mu makhono ke basiku babwe.
Kumuleembe nga ne kwakobola, bakhukholela bumayaanu lundi wabalekha mu makhono ke basiku babwe baba ne bunyali khu nibo. Ne lundi nga bakhukobolela ne khukhulilila wabaulila khukhwama mwikulu, mala buli siise wabareesia mu siisa siowo sikali.
Ewe wabakaania nio obakobosie khu malaka kowo. Ne kakhaba kario baba ne kukwibonio mala baloba kamalaka kowo. Baba ne lilielola, batambamo lilienya ne sileka, balekha khuria kamalaka kowo.
Khu miiko kimikali wabekhaliilikhila ne khubakaania khubirira khu roho, bang'oosi bowo. Khwako wabalekha baulwa ne chikholo che bibala bibiindi.
Ne kakhaba kario, sikila siisa siowo sikali ewe se wabalekha namwe wababunia tawe. Khubeela ewewe oli Wele we kumwalaalo ne siisa.
Ewe oli ne bung'ali bwe khu khuukuuma efwe, sikila ewe wabeele omusuubilwa, ne efwe khwakholile bumayaanu.
Babaami befwe, babemeelesi befwe, bakuuka befwe ne basaayi, se baliindile kamalaka kowo namwe bakhola khuloondekhana nako tawe. Se barekeeresia likaania liowo tawe.
Se bakhukholela ewe mu bwami bwabwe tawe, akhaba ne bekhoyela bilayi nibio wabaelesia, ne kamaloba kamakali lundi ke ngakha. Se balekha chingila chabwe che bumayaanu tawe.
Ne luno khuli banasioobi mu sibala nisio waelesia bakuuka befwe khukhwekhoyela kamatuunda ne bibiindu bilayi biamwo.
Ne bibiaamo bilayi bibiama mu maloba kano bicha khu baami nibo wakhurakho sikila bumayaanu bwefwe. Babaami lundi bali ne bunyali khwifwe ne khu khaafu chefwe. Bakhukholela nisio benya. Khuli mu munaanio kumukali.”
Sikila ako koosi, efwe khulikho khukhola endakaano embandalafu mu maandiko. Ne babemeelesi befwe, Balawi befwe, ne basaayi befwe balikho barakho kimiuuri kiabwe.

Abo babara kimiuuri baba omuruki Nehemia okhwa Hakalia, ne Sedekia.
Seraya, Asaria, ne Yeremia.
Pashuri, Amaria, Malichiya,
Hatushi, Shebania, Maluki;
Harimu, Meremoti, Obadia,
Danieli, Kinetioni, ne Baruku.
Meshulamu, Abicha, Miyamini;
Maasia, Bilikai, ne Shemaya. Abo nibo ba baaba basaayi.
Ne Balawi baba: Yeshua okhwa Asania, Binui owe khu baana ba Henadadi, ne Kadimieli.
Ne khu balebe babwe baba: Shebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaia, ne Hanani.
Mika, Rehobu, Hashabiya,
Sakuri, Sherebia, Shebania;
Hodia, Bani ne Beninu.
Ne babemeelesi be babaandu baba: Paroshi, Pahati-moabu, Elamu, Satu, ne Bani.
Buni, Asigadi, Bebai,
Adoniya, Bikibai, ne Adini.
Ateri, Hesekia, Asuri,
Hodia, Hashumu, Besali;
Harifu, Anatoti, Nebai,
Makipiashi, Meshulamu, ne Hesiri.
Meshesabeli, Satoki, ne Yadua;
Pelatia, Hanani, Anaya;
Hoshea, Hanania, Hashubu;
Haloheshi, Piliha, Shobeki,
Rehumu, Hashabina, Maaseya;
Ahia, Hanani, Anani,
Maluki, Harimu ne Baana.
Babaandu babaandi babarama baambana mu liechubo ne silaamo khu Baisiraeli, basaayi, Balawi, baliindi be Lukaangu, babembi be kimienya mu Lukaangu, bakholi be mu Lukaangu, ne babaandi boosi ba baaba bari khwilaka lia Wele beyaula babeene khukhwama khu baakwa. Baba alala ne bakhasi, ne babaana babwe boosi ba baaba bakhulu lundi banyala bamanya siikholekha.
Bano batubaana ne Baisiraeli basiaabwe ne babemeelesi babwe mu khwechuba bali, bacha khumenya khuloondekhana ne Lilaka lia Wele, nilio Wele aana khubirira khu mukholi wewe Musa. Lundi bacha khuria ne khuloonda kamalaka koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhulaka.
Se khucha khukhwaana ne baakwa bamenyile mu sibala siefwe tawe.
Buli mwiiko khucha khuroosia buli mulala bitonyi biraano bie fwesa khuyeeta khulwe kimilimo kie mu Lukaangu.
Kimilimo kino kili: kumukaati kwe khubao, biakhulia bia buli lwoosi, chisabato, kimieesi kimiya naikara chicharoborwa, bibiindu bitakatifu ne biianwa bie khurusiao bumayaanu khulwa Isiraeli. Lundi biaba khulwe kimilimo kioosi kie munju eya Wele.
Lundi efwe, basaayi ne Balawi, khwapile chikura khureera biianwa bie chiikhu munju eya Wele khuloondekhana ne chikholo chefwe. Khukhachireere mu biise bibienyekha buli mwiiko khulwe khufuunikha khu alutare yo mwami khuloondekhana ne kakaandikwa mu lilaka.
Buli mwiiko khucha khuaana mu Lukaangu siianwa sia buli silimwa sinyoa nisio khukesa lundi sia buli lituunda linyoa khuroba khu bisaala biefwe.
Khucha khureera munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khu basaayi bakholamo kimilimo, akhaba babaana befwe babele, chimoosi chimbele, ne kamameeme kamabele, nga kaandikwa mwilaka.
Khucha khuyilila basaayi munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bufu buroke khukhwama khu biakhulia nibio khunyoa khukesa buli mwiiko ne bitura biefwe bibiindi bie ndali, kamafura ke kimiseituni, ne bibiaamo bioosi bibiaukhaane. Khucha khuyilila Balawi, baroosia bitonyi bie likhumi mu mikuunda kie mu birekere biefwe, bitonyi bie likhumi khukhwama mu biamo bibiama mu maloba kefwe.
Ne omusaayi khukhwama munju eya Aruni, abao alala ne Balawi bitonyi bie likhumi ne biroosebwa. Ne Balawi bakhoya bareere mu Lukaangu sitonyi khu nibio barosiisie bare mwibiikhilo.
Sikila Baisiraeli ne Balawi bakhoya khureera biianwa bie biakhulia, endali ne kamafura mu libiikhilo. Ao niio bibiindu bie khulilakho bie Lukaangu bibikhwa lundi niio basaayi bali khu milimo, baliindi be Lukaangu, ne babembi be kimienya kie mu Lukaangu bamenyile. Se khucha khwanjukha enju eya Wele wefwe tawe.

Babemeelesi be babaandu baba bamenya mu Yerusalemu. Ne babaandu babaandi baapa chikura khurobora omundu mulala khukhwama mu buli babaandu likhumi bache bamenye mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, lukoba lutakatifu. Ne tisa babarama bamenya mu chingoba chabwe.
Babaandu babiita chikhabi abo babeaana khumenya mu Yerusalemu.
Abano nibo babemeelesi be birekere ba baamenya mu Yerusalemu: Balala bamenya mu mikuunda kiabwe mungoba cha Yuda: Baisiraeli, basaayi, Balawi, bakholi be mu Lukaangu ne lisaaye lie bakholi ba Solomoni.
Lisaaye liliindi lia Yuda ne Benjamini liamenya mu Yerusalemu. Be kholo eya Yuda baba: Ataya, okhwa Usia. Ne Usia aba okhwa Sakaria. Sakaria aba okhwa Amaria. Amaria aba okhwa Shefatia, omwana owa Mahaluleli. Mahaluleli aba lisaaye lia Peresi.
Maaseya aba okhwa Baruku lundi omwichukhulu owa Kolihose. Ne Kolihose aba okhwa Hasaya. Hasaya aba okhwa Adaia okhwa Yoyaribu. Yoyaribu aba okhwa Sakaria, khukhwama e Sheela.
Lisaaye lia Peresi liliamenya mu Yerusalemu lioosi liaba chimia chine ne kamakhumi sita na munaane.
Be kholo eya Benjamini baba: Salu okhwa Meshulamu lundi omwichukhulu owa Yoedi. Yoedi aba okhwa Pedaya. Pedaya aba okhwa Kolaya. Maaseya aba okhwa Itieli ne Itieli aba okhwa Yeshaya.
Babaloondakililakho baba Sabai ne Salai, balebe be aembi Salu. Boosi alala, Babenjamini baba chimia tisa ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane ba baamenya mu Yerusalemu.
Yoeli okhwa Sikiri aba omwimeelesi wabwe, ne Yuda okhwa Hasenua aba omwimeelesi Omukhulu owa khabili mu bwimeelesi bwe lukoba.
Basaayi babengila mu Yerusalemu baba: Yedaya okhwa Yoyaribu ne Yakini,
Sereya okhwa Hilikia lundi omwichukhulu owa Meshulamu. Meshulamu aba okhwa Satoki, Satoki aba okhwa Merayo, ne Merayo aba okhwa Ahitubu, owaba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali.
Babao balebe babwe babaandi babakholanga munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baba boosi chimia munaane ne kamakhumi kabili na babili. Babaandi baba Adaia okhwa Yerohamu lundi omwichukhulu owa Pelalia. Pelalia aba okhwa Amushi, Amushi aba okhwa Sakaria, Sakaria aba okhwa Pashuri, ne Pashuri aba okhwa Malichiya.
Balebe bewe boosi babemeelela chinju baba chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kane na babili. Lundi abao Amashisai okhwa Asareli omwichukhulu owa Asai. Asai aba okhwa Meshilemoti ne Meshilemoti aba okhwa Imeri.
Alala ne bawandaaye, boosi baba babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na munaane, banamae be kamaani. Omwimeelesi wabwe aaba Sabudieli okhwa Hakedolimu.
Balawi baba: Shemaya okhwa Hasubu lundi omwichukhulu owa Asirikamu. Asirikamu aba okhwa Hashabia ne Hashabia aba okhwa Buni.
Shabetai ne Yosabati, baba Balawi bakhulu babemeelelanga kimilimo kie mu Lukaangu.
Abao lundi Matania okhwa Mika. Mika aba okhwa Sabuti lundi omwichukhulu owa Asafu. Arangiriranga babembi be kimienya mu Lukaangu mu lisaba lie lisiima. Oloondela Matania, aba Bakibukia. Lundi abao Abuda, okhwa Shamu lundi omwichukhulu owa Kalali, lisaaye lia Yedutuni.
Balawi chimia chibili ne kamakhumi munaane na bane bamenya mu lukoba lutakatifu lwa Yerusalemu.
Babemeelesi be bilibwa bie Lukaangu baba: Akubu, Talimoni, ne balebe babwe. Boosi alala baba emia ndala ne kamakhumi saba na babili.
Baisiraeli babaandi ne basaayi, ne Balawi babarama, bamenya mu mikuunda kiabwe mu chingoba choosi cha Yuda.
Bakholi be mu Lukaangu bamenya abuundu alaangwa Ofeli mu Yerusalemu asi owa siha ne Kishipa.
Omwimeelesi we Balawi mu Yerusalemu aba Usi okhwa Bani lundi omwichukhulu owa Hashabia. Hashabia aba okhwa Matania ne Mika, Matania aba okhwa Mika ne Mika aba owe kholo eya Asafu. Abano Baba ne kimilimo kie khukhwimba kimienya mu Lukaangu.
Liabao lilaka khukhwama khu mwami khuloondekhana ne babembi be kimienya mu Lukaangu buli ndaalo.
Petahiya okhwa Meshesabeli, aba omulomalomi owo mwami. Meshesabeli aba owe lisaaye lia Sera okhwa Yuda.
Babaandu balala ba Yuda bamenya mu chingoba chili embi ne kimikuunda kiabwe. Bamenya mu Kiriati-Ariba ne birekere biayo, Diboni, Yakabuseeli, ne mu birekere bibili biacho.
Lundi bamenya mu chingoba cha Yeshua, Molata, ne Beti-peleti.
Bamenya mu Hasari-shueli, mu Beerisheba ne birekere bibiachibotookhelela.
Bamenya mu lukoba lwa Sikilaki, mu Makona ne mu birekere biacho.
Bamenya akhaba mu Enirimoni, mu Sora, ne mu Yarimuti.
Mu Sanoa, mu Adulamu, ne mu birekere bie aembi ne chingoba chino. Bamenya mu Lakishi ne mu mikuunda kili aembi, ne mu Aseka ne birekere biasio. Nono Bayuda bamenya mu sibala sia Beerisheba khukhwola khu Litooma lia Hinomu.
Babaandu be kholo eya Benjamini bamenya mu Keba, Mikimashi, Aiya, Beteli, ne mu birekere bie aembi.
Lundi bamenya Anatoti, Nobu, ne Anania.
Hasori, Rama, ne Kitaimu.
Hadidi, Seboimu, ne Nebalati,
Lodi, Ono, ne mu litooma lie bafundi.
Bipupu bibiindi bie Balawi ba baamenya mu sibala sia Yuda babakabania khumenya alala ne babaandu ba Benjamini.

Kano niko kamasina ke basaayi ne Balawi babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe alala ne Serubabeli okhwa Shealitieli no musaayi Omukhulu Yoshua. Basaayi baba: Seraya, Yeremia, Esira;
Amaria, Maluki, Hatushi;
Shekania, Harimu, Meremoti;
Ido, Kinetioni, Abicha;
Miyamini, Maadiya, Bilikai;
Shemaya, Yoyaribu, Yedaya;
Salu, Amoki, Hilikia, ne Yedaya. Bano baba babemeelesi mu basaayi basiaabwe boosi mu ndaalo cha Yeshua.
Ne Balawi baba: Yeshua, Binui, Kadimieli, Sherebia, Yuda, ne Matania bano boosi baba babemeelesi be kimienya kie khusiima.
Ne Bakibukia, Uno, ne Balawi basiaabwe bang'oona kimienya kie khukhwakanila.
Yoshua aba raraawe owa Yoyakimu; Yoyakimu aba raraawe owa Eliashibu; Eliashibu aba raraawe owa Yoyada;
Yoyada aba raraawe owa Yonasani; ne Yonasani aba raraawe owa Yadua.
Yoyakimu nga ne aba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, basaayi baloondakho ba baaba nibo babemeelesi be chikholo che busaayi: Meraya wenju eya Seraya; Hanania, wenju eya Yeremia;
Meshulamu, eya Esira; Yehohanani, wenju eya Amaria;
Yonasani, wenju eya Maluki; Yosefu, Shefania;
Adina, wenju eya Harimu; Helikai, wenju eya Meraioti;
Helikai wenju eya Meraioti, Sakaria wenju eya Ido, Meshulamu wenju eya Kinetioni,
Sikiri, wenju eya Abia, Miyamini, Pilitai wenju eya Maodia;
Shamua, wenju eya Bilikai, Yehonatani, wenju eya Shemaya;
Matenai, wenju eya Yoyaribu; Usi, wenju eya Yedaya;
Kalai, wenju eya Salai, Eberi, wenju eya Amoki;
Hashabia, wenju eya Hilikia; ne Natanieli, wenju eya Yedaya.
Kamasina ke babemeelesi be chinju che Balawi ne basaayi kaandikwa mu biise bia Eliashibu, Yoyada, Yoanani, ne Yadua. Biise ebio Dario aba omwami owa Pasha.
Babemeelesi be lisaaye lie Balawi, baandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano che Babaami khukhwola mu biise bia Yoanani, okhwa Eliashibu.
Ne babemeelesi be Balawi baba: Hashabia, Sherebia, Yeshua, ne Binui
Balindi be Lukaangu babaliinda chisiro che sirara mu bilibwa bie Lukaangu baba: Matania, Bakibukia, Obadia, Meshulamu, Talimoni ne Akubu.
Babaandu bano babao mu siise sia Yoyakimu, okhwa Yeshua lundi omwichukhulu owa Yosataki. Ne lundi babao mu siise sio muruki Nehemia, lundi mu siise sio musaayi Esira, owaba omuandiki owe Lilaka.
Mu siise sie khuaana lisiisi lie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu khu Wele, Balawi barerwa Yerusalemu khukhwama buli abuundu niio baba ne bamenya. Bakhola naikara eye liaana ne khusiima. Bemba kimienya kie khusiima ne baapa bibiindu bie khu khuupania alala mu mienya, kamatuungu, ne biilili.
Lisaaye lia Lawi lie babembi be kimienya liabuusiana khukhwama mu mbeka nimwo bamenyanga ambi ne Yerusalemu ne khukhwama mu birekere bia embi ne Netofati.
Lundi bama e Beti-Kilikali, Keba, ne Asimabeti. Babembi abo baba bombakha birekere biabwe ambi ne Yerusalemu.
Basaayi ne Balawi bekwalaasia babeene nio bakwalaasia babaandu, bilibwa, ne lisiisi lie lukoba.
Nio nabuusia babemeelesi Ba Yuda khu ngaaki khwe lisiisi ne khubawa buliindi bwe bipupu biboofu bibili khukeenda khubotookhelela lukoba ne, khusiima Wele.
Sipupu silala siacha khu ngaaki khwisiisi kumukhono kumuseecha luloleelela silibwa sie kamaandu
Hoshaya akeendela enyuma wabwe ne balala khu bakhulu Ba Yuda bamuloondakho.
Babaloondakho baba: Asaria, Esira, Meshulamu,
Yuda, Benjamini, Shemaya ne Yeremia.
Basaayi balalakho baele baba ne chikhoombi: Sakaria, okhwa Yonasani lundi omwichukhulu owa Shemaya. Shemaya aba okhwa Matania. Matania aba okhwa Mikaya, ne Mikaya aaba okhwa Sakuri, ne Sakuri aaba okhwa Asafu.
Sakaria aloondakho ne babaandu babaandi be kholo yewe. Baba Shemaya, Asareli Milalai, Kilalai, Maai, Netaneli, Yuda, ne Hanani. Boosi baapa bibiindu bie kimienya bibiapibwa no mwami Daudi omundu owa Wele. Esira omuandiki akeendela ebweeni wabwe.
Bacha khukhwama asilibwa sie sebele baniina bukololofu khu bikiingi bacha khu ndeleelwa khwe Lukoba lwa Daudi. Khubirira anju eya Daudi, ne khukobola khwisiisi asilibwa sie kameechi, lubeka lwe bukwe we lukoba.
Sipupu sie khabili siabo babasiima siacha lubeka lukhasi khu lukhingiki lwe khu ngaaki khwe lisiisi. Mala nasiloondakho ne babaandu balalakho. Khwakeenda khwabirira khu ndeleelwa eye bibiosio khukhwola khu lisiisi libalaayi.
Ne khukhwama ebweeneyo khwacha khwabirira khu silibwa sia Efuraimu, silibwa sia Yeshana
Khwako bipupu bioombi biabo babasiima Wele biema munju eya Wele.
Khutubakho ne balala khu bemeelesi ba baaba ne nase.
Ne sipupu sie basaayi, sisiapa chikhoombi siabamo: Eliakimu, Maaseya, Miniamini, Mikaya, Elioenai, Sakaria, ne Hanania.
Babaandu babaandi ba babayo baba: Maaseya, Shemaya, Eliesa, Usi, Yehohanani, Malichiya, Elamu, ne Eseri. Babembi, bemba kimienya ne bemeelelwa ne Yesirahia.
Endaalo ng'eneyo babaandu baana chimbosio chingali mala baba ne busangaafu sikila Wele abaelesia basangaafu bukali. Bakhasi ne babaana batubaana mu khufumia. Ne luyoka lwe busangaafu mu Yerusalemu lwauliilikhana aleeyi.
Mu siise sienesio babaandu baroborwa khuliinda birara. Birara bino biaba bie khubikhamo biianwa, bibiaamo bie khunyoa, ne sitonyi sie khumi sie babaandu. Babaandu bano baba ne bunyali bwe khuroosia khukhwama mu mikuunda kili mu chingoba chichaukhaane khulwe basaayi ne Balawi khuloondekhana ne lilaka. Babaandu Ba Yuda boosi basangalila khukholela basaayi ne Balawi ba babakholelanga.
Bakhola kimilimo kia Wele wabwe kie khukhwikwalaasia. Babembi ne baliindi be mu Lukaangu bosi bakhola kimilimo kiabwe khuloondekhana ne kamalaka niko omwami Daudi no mwana wewe Solomoni balaka.
Mu siise sio mwami Daudi ne omwiimbi owe kimienya Asafu khale akho, abao omwimeelesi owe babembi owemeelelanga kimienya kie khufumia ne khusiima Wele.
Mu biise bia Serubabeli akhaba ne mu biise bia Nehemia, Baisiraeli boosi baana biianwa bia buli ndaalo khulwe buyeeti bwe babembi be kimienya ne baliindi be Lukaangu. Lundi baukhasia bitonyi bie Balawi. Ne Balawi nabo baukhasia sitonyi sisienyibwa khuelesibwa be lisaaye lia Aruni.

Lino liaba lirio sikila babaandu ba Amoni ne ba Moabu se bawa Baisiraeli siakhulia ne kameechi nga ne baba khu ngila ne bama e Misiri tawe. Ne kakhali bakula Balamu khulaama Isiraeli. Ne kakhaba kario Wele wefwe ayusia silaamo khuba chikhabi.
Baisiraeli nga ne baulila lilaka lino ne lisomwa, barusia baakwa boosi khukhwama mu nibo.
Kano ne kakhekholekha tawe, omusaayi Eliashibu, owaba omwimeelesi owe birara bie Lukaangu, aba auliilisiana ne Tobia.
Afukiilila Tobia khurumikhira lusiro lulala lukali lwe sirara sie khubungamo biianwa bie bilimwa ne biiunya bulayi, biianwa bie bibiindu bie khurumikhira mu Lukaangu, biianwa khulwa basaayi, ne sitonyi sie likhumi sie bilimwa, endali, ne kamafura ke kumuseituni ke Balawi, khu bembi ne baliindi be Lukaangu. Lundi sirara esio siabiikhanga biianwa bie Basaayi.
Kano koosi ne kekholekha ese se naba ne mu Yerusalemu tawe. Kekholekha mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kataru na kibili nikwo Aritashasita
Nga nakobola e Yerusalemu, nesiindukha khunyoola bumayaanu nibwo Eliashibu akhola khufukiilila Tobia khurumikhira lusiro lwe mu Lukaangu.
Naambwa lirima likali mala namwaataka enje bibiindu bia Tobia bioosi.
Nio narusia kamalaka bakwalaasie chisiro. Mala nakalusiamo bibiindu bie nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi: biianwa bie biakhulia nende bie bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Lundi nanyoola Babembi be kimienya mu Lukaangu ne Balawi baba barura mu Yerusalemu bakobola mu mikuunda kiabwe, sikila babaandu se babaelesianga kumukabwa kwabwe tawe.
Nekiicha babemeelesi ne khubareeba ndi, “Siina sikila ne mukhaliinda enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe?” Mala nakobosia Balawi ne babembi khu milimo kiabwe.
Nio babaandu Baisiraeli boosi barakikha lundi khureera mu birara bie Lukaangu sitonyi sie khumi siabwe sie bilimwa, endali, ne kamafura ke kumuseituni.
Narobora babaandu bano khukhwimeelela birara: Omusaayi Shelemia; omuandiki Satoki, ne omulawi Pedaya. Naelesia Hanani okhwa Sakuri, omwichukhulu owa Matania bunyali bwe khuba omuloondi wabwe. Babaandu bano baba babeyikinwa. Kimilimo kiabwe kiaba khukabila bakholi basiaabwe bikabwa.
Khebulile ese, Wele wase, khulwe kimilimo kino kioosi. Okhalekelesia busiime bwase ne kimilimo khulwe Lukaangu tawe.
Babaandu babaandi khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Tiro bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu. Bareera ching'eeni ne bibiindu bie khukusia mu Yerusalemu, ne babikusia khu baandu ba Yuda mu ndaalo eya sabato.
Nio nekiicha babemeelesi Ba Yuda ne khubaboolela ndi; “Mulakholanga bumayaanu siina buno, ne mwonaka endaalo eye sabato?
Bakuukawenywe se bakhola bari nio liakila Wele areera kumunaanio khwifwe ne khu lukoba luno? Mala musichiilililanga khumukhola abe ne lirima likali khu Isiraeli khulwe khukhwonaka endaalo eye sabato.”
Khwako narusia kamalaka bilibwa bioosi bie lukoba bikalwe mu khurakikha khwa buli sabato, khukhwola ekolooba
Lulala namwe khabili bakusi bakusia buli lukano lwe bibiindu bioosi bakona enje we lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Nabakania ndi, “Siina sikila ne mukona khwisiisi lie lukoba? Mwakhola murio lundi, nja khumutimania ne kamaani.” Nio khukhwamila ao se bakobolakho lundi mu ndaalo eye sabato tawe.
Nalaka Balawi khukhwikwalaasia babeene nio bache mala balinde bilibwa khuba nang'ali bali e sabato eli endakatifu. Khebulile, ese Wele, mu kano koosi, mala ukholele siisa sikila busiime bwowo bukali.
Balala khu baana babwe balomalomanga lulomo lwa Ashitoti namwe lulomo luluundi busa ne se banyala khulomaloma lulomo lwe Bayaudi tawe.
Nalomana ne babaandu abo, nabalaama, naapa babaandi mala nabakhunyulaka lichuune liabwe. Nio nabakhola bechuba mu lisina liowo Wele bali “Mukhaelesia basoleeli babwe bakhaana benywe namwe mwaelesia basoleeli benywe bakhaana babwe tawe.
Bakhasi bakwa nibo babakhola omwami Solomoni akhola bumayaanu. Se aabaao omwami okundi mu bibala bioosi nga niye tawe. Wele amusiima mala amukhola niye omwami owa Isiraeli yoosi. Kakhaba kario, bakhasi bakwa bamukhola onaka.
Ne enywe ne mukhola bumayaanu nga buno aba se muli bari tawe. Ne mukhwa bakhasi bakwa aba se muli basuubilwa khu Wele wefwe tawe.”
Khebulila, Ee Wele, sikila babaandu abo banyaalutia busaayi alala ne ndakaano niyo wakhola ne basaayi ne Balawi.
Khwako nakwalaasia babaandu khukhwama mu buli sisiindu sikeni. Nara basaayi ne balawi khu milimo, nio buli sia mulala amanye kamulimo kwewe.
Narekekha chiikhu chirumikha khulwe khukhwosiela biianwa birerwa khu alutare buli lwoosi mu biise bibienyibwa. Lundi naba na ng'ali ndi bimelwa biabwe bie khunyoa biareribwe.
Khebulila kano koosi, Ee Wele, mala ukholele bulayi.

Mu ndaalo ng'ene echo omwami Ahuswero amiia nali mu lukoba luboofu lwa Susa.
Mu mwiiko kukhola khataru kwe bubwami bwewe, akhola naikara khulwe babemeelesi bewe ne bakholi bewe, babemeelesi bakhulu be banamae ba Pasha ne Baametia, babaandu be efuma ne babemeelesi be chingoongo.
Khulwe chindaalo emia ndala ne kamakhumi munane, Ahuswero ekesia buiinda bukali bwe bubwami bwewe, ne efuma yewe.
Enyuma we chindaalo chino, omwami aakhola naikara khulwe babaandu boosi ba baaba mu lukoba lwa Susa, baiinda ne bataambi sitube. Naikara yamala chindaalo saba. Yakholelwa khu luuya lwe siluundu sie lichipi lio mwami.
Abuundu ao aang'oonebwa ne chipasia chiwaanga ne chimbuusi chichabowa khu mikhanda kie engubo eya katani ne enapeenda khu mbete che efwesa ne khu bisiindi bie kamabaale kamawaanga. Biabao bitaanda bie esahabu ne efwesa khu luya lwe kamabaale kamawaanga, kamabesemu, kang'enang'ena, ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki.
Barumikhiranga bikoombe bie esahabu khunywa. Bikoombe bienebio biaba bie chingano chichabukhane. Ne endali eyo omwami yaba engali khuloondekhana ne bulayi bwo mwami.
Mbao owakhiingililwa khunywa tawe namwe mbao owayingiililwa khunywa tawe: Omwami aba aanile lilaka khu bakholi be mwichipi ali buli mundu anywe khuloondekhana nga enya.
Bashiti, mukho omwami yesi akholela bakhasi naikara mu lichipi lio mwami Ahuswero.
Khu ndaalo eya saba eya naikara, omwami Ahuswero aba omusangaafu lukali sikila aba anywele endali. Alaanga bachili saba bababechaanga bakholi bewe: Mehumani, Bisita, Haribona, Bikita, Abakita, Setari, ne Karikasi.
Abalaka bareere omukhasi wewe Bashiti ebweeni wewe ne efwarire ekuutwa eyeewe eye bubwami. Kwini Bashiti aba owe lukoondo lulayi, ne omwami eenya khumwekesia khu baandu ne babemeelesi nga nilwo Bashiti aaba ne lukoondo lulayi.
Ne kakhali Bashiti aloba khukhwicha khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami khubirira khu bachili. Lino liakhola omwami aambwa lirima likali.
Kwaba kumwiima kwo omwami khunyoola likaambila khukhwama khu baandu be limanya. Khwako alaanga babaandu bamanyile kamalaka ne bakhalaki nio bamuboolele nisio akhoyela khukhola.
Babaandu bakesi abo ba baaba siimbi ne naye baba Karishema, Shetari, Adimata, Tarishishi, Meresi, Marisena, ne Memukani. Abano baba babemeelesi saba ba Pasha ne Metia. Babaandu saba bano nibo baba ne bubweyaangu bwe khubona omwami. Abano baba ne bubwimeelesi bwe angaaki mu bwami.
Omwami abareeba ali, “Khuloondekhana ne lilaka, khukhola khuriena kwini Bashiti, sikila alekelesia lilaka lio omwami khubirira khu bachili?”
Nio Memukani alomaloma ebweeni wo mwami ne babemeelesi bewe ali, “Bashiti se akholele omwami yeng'ene bubi tawe. Akholele bubi akhaba babemeelesi bo mwami boosi nende buli mundu oli mu bwami bwa Ahuswero.
Sikila sikholwa sia Kwini Bashiti sino silamanyikhana khu bakhasi boosi mala sibakhole balekelesie baseecha babwe. Balaloma bali, ‘Omwami Ahuswero alaka Kwini Bashiti khukhwicha niio ali, mala aloba khukhwicha.’
Endaalo eya luno bakhasi ba Pasha ne ba Metia bauliilekho kimiima kia Kwini Bashiti, bacha khukiboolela babemeelesi bowo boosi. Liilekelesia ne libiyila bilabaao mu bukali.
Ne liaba ne likhusiimisia omwami, rusia lilaka lie bubwami, mala liaandikwe mu malaka ka Pasha ne Medesi, nio lilekhe khukaluukhasibwa tawe. Lekha liaandikwe lili Bashiti se akhoyela abonekhekho ebweeni wo mwami tawe. Ne omwami akhoya aelesie omukhasi okundi luyali lwe khuba omukhasi owo mwami khukhila Bashiti.
Nga lilaka lio mwami ne lilamanyikhana mu bwami bwewe bubalaayi buno, bakhasi boosi bacha khuba ne liria khu baseecha babwe, akhaba ne bali baiinda namwe bataambi.”
Likaambila lino liasiimisia omwami ne babemeelesi bewe. Nio omwami akhola nga Memukani ne omukelekela.
Aruma chibarwa khu ngoongo che bubwami choosi. Buli lukoongo lwanyoola ebarwa yalwo mu lulomo lwabwe. Chibarwa chaloma chili buli museecha akhoyeele abe omwami owe mungo mwewe.

Enyuma wa kano, lirima lio mwami Ahuswero ne liweele, akhebulila kwini Bashiti, niko akhola, nende niko akhalakilwa.
Nio bakholi babaliindaanga omwami baloma bali, “Khukhoya khuyimile omwami bakhaana be yabwana ne lukoondo lulayi.
Omwami akhoya arobore babemeelesi mu ngoongo choosi mu bwami bwewe mala babuusie bakhaana be eyabwaana be lukoondo lulayi nio babareere mwichipi, mu lukoba lwa Susa. Bakhoya babe mu buliindi bwa Hekai, omuchili omukholi owo mwami oliindaanga bakhasi. Ne bakhoya baebwe kamafura ke khubamiliisia.
Ne omukhaana oosiimisia omwami lukali bamukhole abe Kwini mu bweyaangu bwa Bashiti.” Lino liasangaasia omwami mala akhola ario.
Mu lukoba lwa Susa, abamo Omuyaudi owalaangwa bali Modekai. Aba okhwa Yairi. Yairi aba omwana owa Shimei okhwa Kishi owe ekholo eya Benjamini.
Modekai aba mulala khu baandu babaambwa khukhwama mu Yerusalemu alala ne omwami Yekoniya owa Yuda mala bayilwa mu mbaambe. Omwami Nebukadinesa owe Babiloni niye owabaamba.
Modekai akhusia omwana owa raraawe okundi, bali Esta, owalaangwa bali Hadasa. Amukhusia sikila Esta se aaba ne maayi namwe ne raraawe tawe. Omukhaana yuno aba owe lukoondo lulayi lundi owe kumubili kumulayi. Nga raraawe ne maawe bafwa, Modekai amubukula, ne khumukhusia nga omwana wewe omwene.
Nga omwami ne amala khurusia lilaka liewe, bakhaana bakali bareerwa mu lukoba lwa Susa asi we buliindi bwa Hekai. Akhaba Esta yesi areerwa mwichipi lio mwami asi we buliindi bwa Hekai, owaba omuliindi owe bakhasi.
Esta asiimisia Hekai mala Hekai amusiima. Hekai aba khangu khuelesia Esta kamafura ke khukhwiakha ne siakhulia siewe sie khulia. Amuelesia bakhaana saba babaroborwa khukhwama mwichipi lio mwami khumukholela. Lundi amuelesia niye ne bakhaana bewe abuundu e khumenya alayi mwichipi khukhila boosi.
Nono Esta se amanyisiakho omundu yesi yesi babaandu bewe namwe balebe bewe baaba nanu tawe, sikila Modekai amukaania.
Buli endaalo Modekai akeendanga ebweeni we luuya lwe lichipi lio mwami, khukhwenya khumanya nga Esta ne ali, ne siicha khumwikholekhakho.
Biise bia buli mukhaana bie khukhwirekekheramo khucha ebweeni wo mwami Ahuswero, biaba kimieesi likhumi na kibili. Kano kekholekha enyuma we bakhasi khukhwimiliisia ne kamafura ka marimari khulwe kimieesi sita, ne kamafura kaunya bulayi khulwe kimieesi kikiindi sita. Kano kekholekha khuloondekhana ne kamalaka ke khukhwimiliisia ke bakhasi.
Buli omukhaana nga ne achichanga ebweeni wo mwami mungila yino, bamuechanga buli siindu siosi siosi nisio enyanga khukhwama mwichipi.
Achichangayo ekolooba, ne kumutikhinyi ailwa munju ekiindi eye bakhasi asi we buliindi bwa Shashigasi, omuchili owaba omuliindi owe bakhasi bo mwami nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale. Omukhasi se akobolanga wo mwami lundi ta nabwila omwami ne amulaanga ne lisina liewe kaaba bali amusiimisia.
Siise siola sia Esta khucha wo mwami. Esta aba omukhaana owa Abihaili, raraawe owa Modekai okundi. Modekai aba akhusia Esta nga omwana wewe omwene. Nga bubwasio bwewe khucha ebweeni wo mwami ne bwoola, Esta se asabakho siosi ta ne kakhali nga Hekai omuchili, omwimeelesi we enju eye bakhasi amukelekela. Nio Esta asiimisia buli mundu owamubona.
Esta ailwa ebweeni wo mwami Ahuswero mwichipi lie bubwami, mu mwesi kwe ekhumi, kuuli kumwesi kwa Tebeti. Kwaba kumwiiko kwa saba kwa Ahuswero khuba omwami.
Omwami asiima Esta khukhila bakhasi babaandi boosi. Esta asiimisia omwami lukali khukhilakho bakhaana be eyabwaana babaandi boosi. Amufwara ekuutwa eye khuuba kwini khu murwe kwewe ne khumukhola khuuba kwini mu bweyaangu bwa Bashiti.
Nio omwami aana naikara emboofu khu bemeelesi bewe ne bakholi boosi. Naikara yino yakholwa khulwa Esta. Akhola endaalo eye khuola
Nga bakhaana be eyabwaana babuusibwa alala lukhola khabili, Modekai aba ekhaale a silibwa sio mwami.
Nono Esta, aba asiili khumanyisiakho omundu yesi yesi, balebe bewe namwe babaandu bewe tawe nga Modekai ne amuboolela. Esta aria Modekai bulayi bwene nga ne amuria ne asiili omukhaana omutiiti mu buliindi bwewe.
Mu siise nisio Modekai ekhalaanga a silibwa sio omwami, Bikitana ne Tereshi, bakhalalila omwami Ahuswero, mala benya khumwiira. Babili bano baba bachili bo mwami babaliindaanga luuya lwe khuulilakho.
Nga Modekai ne aulila kano aboolela Esta mukho mwami ne Esta naye aboolela omwami niko Modekai aamuboolela, ne afumia Modekai.
Kamakhuwa kano kamenieelesibwa mala kanyoolekha khuba ka ng'ali. Nio babaandu babili abo basuungwa khu mirongooro. Kano koosi kaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano, ebweeni wo mwami.

Enyuma wa kano, omwami Ahuswero atasa bukhoongo omundu bali Hamani okhwa Hamedata Omuakaki
Ne bakholi bo mwami boosi ba baaba a silibwa sio mwami bekesia liriana liabwe khu Hamani khulwe khumusikamila ne khumwinamila. Omwami yaba enya bakhole bario. Ne akhali Modekai, aloba khukhola ario.
Bakholi basie babaandi mu bukholi bwe bubwami bamureeba bali, “Sikila siina ne okharia lilaka lio mwami tawe?”
Buli endaalo bamuboolelanga, ne se abarekeeresianga tawe. Nio baboolela Hamani. Bakhola bario nio bamanye Hamani ne anyala afukiilila kumwiima kwa Modekai. Modekai aba ababoolela ali niye ali Omuyaudi.
Hamani nga ne amanya ali Modekai se amusikamilanga ne khumwinamila tawe, aambwa lirima.
Ne kakhali Hamani nga ne aamanya ali Modekai aaba Omuyaudi, akhalaka ali khumuukuuma yeng'ene se khwolaana tawe. Khwako akhola ekwangaani khubunia Bayaudi boosi, babaandu be kholo eye Bayaudi mu bwami bwo mwami Ahauswero.
Mu mwesi kwe khunyoa kulaangwa kwa Nisani, mu mwiiko kwe ekhumi na kibili kwe bubwami bwo mwami Ahuswero, baapa chikura nicho balaanga bali puri khurobora endaalo ne kumwesi niyo Hamani akholelamo bibiindu nibio aaba ne apangile. Chikura echo chapilwa ebweeni wa Hamani mala kumwesi kwe ekhumi na kibili kukwalaangwa bali Atari kwaroborwa.
Nio Hamani aboolela omwami Ahuswero ali, “Eliio ekholo eye babaandu eyasalanila mungoongo choosi che bubwami bwowo. Kamalaka kabwe se kali nga ke babaandu babaandi tawe. Lundi, se baria kamalaka ko omwami tawe. Se buli bulayi khwiwe khubekhaliilikha tawe.
Omwami nosiima, lekha lilaka lirure mala babunisibwe. Ne ese ndaelesia bitonyi bie efwesa chielefu likhumi khu bemeelesi be kimilimo kiowo. Ne babemeelesi bakhare bitonyi ebio mu libiikhilo lio mwami.”
Nio omwami afuula embete eyarumikha nga kumuuri, mala akielesia Hamani omusiku owe Bayaudi, okhwa Hamedata omuakaki.
Omwami aboolela Hamani ali, “Nakhuelesie babaandu ne chirupia. Khola khu nibo nilio obona oli lili lilayi khwiwe.”
Nio khu ndaalo eye likhumi na khataru eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa baandiki bo mwami balaangwa. Baandika koosi niko Hamani alaka. Kamaandike ako kayilwa khu bemeelesi be banamae, babemeelesi be chingoongo boosi ne babemeelesi be babaandu boosi. Buli lukoongo lwanyoola ebarwa yalwo ne buli babaandu banyoola ebarwa mu lulomo lwabwe. Ebarwa yaandikwa mwisina lio mwami Ahuswero mala yarebwakho kumuuri kwo omwami.
Barumwa bayila chibarwa khu ngoongo cho mwami choosi. Kamalaka kakabamo kaba bali Bayaudi boosi, baele ne basaakhulu, bakhasi ne babaana babunisibwe, berwe, baweo boosi khu ndaalo ndala, endaalo eye likhumi na khataru eye kumwesi kwe khumi na kibili kukwalaangwa bali Atari. Khutasa khwako, bibiindu biabwe bioosi biyaaywe.
Ebarwa eyo yaebwa nga lilaka mu buli lukoongo, nio babaandu boosi berekekhe khulwe endaalo eyo.
Barume bacha khangu, khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami. Nio lilaka liarusibwa mu lukoba lwa Susa. Omwami ne Hamani bekhala asi khunywa. Ne kakhali lukoba lwa Susa lwabamo lilisiindukha.

Nga Modekai ne amanya kakaba ne kekholeekhe koosi, atabulaka chingubo chewe mala efwara kamakunia, ne khukhwiakha likokhe. Akeenda mu lukoba, ne akukuula lukali ne lirima.
Aacha ola a muliango kwe silibwa sio mwami. Se engilamo tawe sikila se bafukiililanga omundu ofwarire kamakunia khukhwingilamo tawe.
Buli mu lukoongo nimwo lilaka lio mwami liola, khwabechangao khulila khukali khwe Bayaudi. Beyimana khulia, basooma ne khulila. Bakali befwara kamakunia ne khukhwichukhakho likokhe.
Nga bakholi ba Kwini Esta, bakhaana ne bachili bamuboolela niko Modekai akholile, Kwini Esta abona bubi lukali. Arumira Modekai chingubo afware alekhe kamakunia. Ne kakhali Modekai se achifukiilila tawe.
Nio Esta alaanga Hataki, mulala khu bachili be mwichipi owaroborwa ne omwami nga omukholi owa Esta. Aamulaka ache khu Modekai amanye siina sisiaba ne simunania ne siina sikila ne kaba kario.
Hataki acha khu Modekai abuundu abonekha mu lukoba ebweeni we silibwa sio mwami.
Modekai amuboolela buli siindu sisiamwikholekhakho. Lundi amuboolela sikelo sie chirupia yaba nicho Hamani aasuubisia khura mu libiikhilo lie bubwami, khulwe khubunia Bayaudi.
Modekai lundi aelesia Hataki kamaandike yaba kakarusiibwe mu Susa, khulwe khubuna khwe Bayaudi. Modekai aboolela Hataki khukayilila Esta, amwinoosele kamaandike ako, ne khuboolela Esta ache ekoonjelele omwami ne khumuboolela abe ne siisa khu baandu bewe.
Hataki acha aboolela Esta niko Modekai amuboolela.
Nio Esta aelesia Hataki burume khukobosela Modekai.
Esta aloma ali, “Bakholi bo mwami boosi ne babaandu be mungoongo cho mwami bamanyile bali omundu yesi yesi owe siikhasi ne owe siseecha owingila khu luuya lwo omwami lwe mukari ne akhalangilwe tawe, liliio lilaka lilala, enyekhana erwe. Ne kakhali oyo niye omwami okesielela ne esiimbo yewe eye esahabu yeng'ene niye okherwa tawe. Ese se nalangilwekho khucha ebweeni wo mwami tawe chindaalo kamakhumi kataru.”
Mala baboolela Modekai niko Esta aloma.
Ne Modekai aboolela barume bache baboolele Esta bali, “Okhakanakana oli nga ne oli munju eyo omwami okhaone khukhila Bayaudi babaandi tawe.
Waaba ne osila busa mu siise nga sino siri, buyeeti ne buonia bulecha khu Bayaudi khukhwama abuundu aandi. Ne kakhali ewe ne be nju eya raraao mulibuna. Naanu omanya, wakana wecha mu bwami khulwe siise nga sino siri.”
Nio Esta ababoolela bakobosie Modekai bali,
“Cha obuusie Bayaudi boosi alala baali mu Susa mala mwiyimane khulia mu bweyaangu bwase. Mukhalia namwe mukhanywa sisiindu siosi siosi tawe khu ndaalo chitaru, siilo ne kumuusi. Ese ne bakhaana base bakholi fwesi khulakhola khurio. Enyuma wako ndacha khu mwami akhaba ne likhali khuloondekhana ne lilaka tawe. Kaaba bali ndafwa aba, ndafwa.”
Modekai arekukha mala akhola koosi nga Esta ne amulaka.

Khu ndaalo ekhola khataru, Esta efwara chingubo che bubwami mala acha eema mukari mwe luuya lwe lichipi. Aloleelela lusiro lwo omwami. Omwami aba mukari, ekhaale khu ndebe eye bubwami, ne aloleelele e muliango kwe lichipi.
Nga omwami ne abona Esta emile anje, asangaala, mala amwekeselela esiimbo yewe eye esahabu. Esta acha siimbi mala akitilakho emusia.
Omwami areeba ali, “Kwini Esta siina? Wenya siina? Siosi nisio wenya olanyoola, akhaba sitonyi sie bubwami bwase.”
Esta akobosia ali, “Nosiima omwami, ese nenyile ewe ne Hamani mwiche luno mulie siakhulia sie ekolooba nisio ekhurekekheere ewe.”
Mala omwami akobosia ali, “Reera Hamani khangu, nio khukhole nga Esta ne enya.” Nio omwami ne Hamani bacha khulia siakhulia nisio yaba Esta arekeekhe.
Ne nga baba ne balikho banywa endali, omwami areeba Esta ali, “Wenya siina? Olasinyoola. Osaba siina? Akhaba ne osaba enusu eye bubwami bwase, ndakhuelesia.”
Esta akobosia ali, “Lisaba liase ne lilienya liase nilieli:
Omwami naba ne enyoolile busiime ebweeni wowo, ne lundi ewe ne osiimisiibwe nase, khukhukholela nisio nenya, lekha Hamani ne nawe mube bakeni base kumuchuli mu siakhulia sie ekolooba sisiindi nisio khamurekekhere. Ne kumutikhinyi kwene okwo ekhakhukobosie lireeba liowo khu niko nenya.”
Endaalo eyo Hamani ama khu sialwa ne asangaalile. Ne kakhali nga ne abona Modekai a silibwa sie enju eyo mwami, mala Modekai aloba khumwinyokhela namwe khumwekesia buriaani bwosi bwosi nga abira, amuambila lirima likali.
Ne kakhaba kario Hamani efwiilisia mala acha engo. Arumania khulaanga basaale bewe ne omukhasi wewe Sereshi.
Nio Hamani ababoolela khu buiinda bwewe bukali, khu bukali bwe basoleeli nibo ali ne nabo, lundi nga omwami ne amuniinia angaaki mu milimo, khukhila babemeelesi ne bakholi bo mwami boosi.
Hamani lundi atasakho ali, “Niise seng'ene niye kwini Esta, mukho omwami alangile khucha no mwami mu siakhulia sie ekolooba nisio akholile. Lundi andangile ngoboleyo muchuli no mwami.
Ne kakhaba kario, kano koosi se kasangaasia tawe naba ne njililila khubona Omuyaudi Modekai oyo ne ekhaale a silibwa sio omwami.”
Nio omukhasi wewe, Sereshi ne basaale bewe boosi bamuboolela bali, “Simikha sitonyi sie kumurongooro sisioola bifuba kamakhumi karaano. Oli busia mutikhinyi oboolele omwami asuungekho Modekai, nio ewe oche mu siakhulia sie ekolooba no mwami ne oli omusangaafu.” Likhuwa lino liasiimisia Hamani, mala arakho bakhola kumurongooro kwe khukhwirirakho.

Siilo esio omwami se akona tawe. Nio arumania bareere sitabu sie chingano che bikholwa bia buli busiele. Bikholwa ebio biasomwa ebweeni wo mwami.
Sitonyi nisio basoma siabaamo niko Modekai abuula khuloondekhana ne ekwangwaani eye khukhwira omwami Ahuswero. Ekwangwaani eyo yakholwa ne Bikitana ne Tereshi, bachili babili babaliindaanga silibwa sio mwami.
Omwami areeba ali, “siianwa siina namwe lukoosi siina nilwo khwaelesia Modekai khu makhuwa kano?” Bakholi bewe bakobosia bali, “Se siliio siosi siosi nisio bamukholela tawe.”
Omwami areeba ali, “Naanu olikho khu luuya okhwo?” Nono siise esio Hamani aba nio alikho engila khu luuya lwe enje lwe lichipi. Aba echile khureeba omwami ke khusuunga Modekai khu murongooro nikwo aba ne arekeekhe.
Nio bakholi bakobosia bali, “Hamani niye oliio, emile khu luuya.” Omwami aloma ali, “Lekha engile mukari.”
Nio Hamani engila mukari. Omwami amureeba ali, “Siina nisio nyala nakhola khu mundu niye nenya khukoosia.” Hamani akanakana mu mwoyo mwewe ali, “Nono aba naanu niye omwami enya khukoosia lukali ne khali ese?”
Nio Hamani akobosia omwami ali, “Kano niko okhoyeele wakholela omundu niye wenya khukoosia:
Lekha chingubo che bubwami nicho omwami efwaranga chireerwe. Lundi reera efarasi niyo omwami akeendelaangakho, elikho limili lie bubwami.
Bukula mulala khu bemeelesi bowo be efuma mala omuelesie engubo eye bubwami ne efarasi. Lekha omwimeelesi oyo afware omundu niye omwami enya khukoosia. Ne lekha amuniinie khu farasi mala amubisilie akari we lukoba. Lekha omwimeelesi oyo alaangilile ebweeni wo omundu oyo ali, ‘Kano niko kakekholekha khu mundu niye omwami enya khukoosia.’ ”
Mala omwami aboolela Hamani ali, “Khola khangu obukule chingubo ne efarasi nga ne olomile mala okhole orio khu Modekai Omuyaudi owikhaale a silibwa sio mwami. Okhalekhakho khukhola buli siindu nisio olomile tawe.”
Nio Hamani abukula engubo eye bubwami ne efarasi ne khufwara Modekai. Akhola Modekai aniina khu farasi, mala amukesia khubira mu lukoba akari, ne alaangilila ebweeni wa Modekai ali, “Kano niko kakekholekha khu mundu niye omwami enya khukoosia.”
Nio Modekai akobola a silibwa sio mwami. Ne kakhali Hamani ayuya khucha engo ne alikho alila ne khukhwiunamila.
Hamani aboolela omukhasi wewe Sereshi ne basaale bewe boosi buli siindu sisiaba ne simwekholekhekho. Mala omukhasi wewe ne bakambisi bewe bamuboolela bali, “Warakiikhe khutibia bunyali khu Modekai. Ne nga ali mulala khu Bayaudi se onyala khumukhila tawe. Ng'ali ocha khubuna.”
Oli basiloma bario, bachili bo mwami bola mala babukula Hamani khangu bamuyila khulia siakhulia sie akolooba nisio Esta arekekha.

Nio omwami ne Hamani bacha khulia siakhulia ne Esta.
Endaalo ng'ene eyo, nga baba ne balikho banywa endali, omwami areeba Esta lundi ali, “Nono kwini Esta wenya siina? Olasinyoola. Oreeba siina? Ne oreeba akhaba sitonyi sie bubwami bwase ndakhuelesia.”
Esta akobosia ali, “Naba ne nyoolile busiime ebweeni wowo ne liaba ne likhusiimisia fukiilila undekhele bulamu bwase, ne bulamu bwe babaandu base.
Babaandu base ne nase khwakusiibwe khubunisibwa, khukhwirwa, ne khukhwibililwa elala. Abanga khwakusiibwe nga nasioobi, be siseecha nende be siikhasi, andi silile busa. Sikila andi elio se liabele butinyu bunyala bwakhola nanaania omwami tawe.”
Omwami Ahuswero areeba Esta ali, “Naanu owenya khukhola sisiindu nga esio sirio? Omundu yuno ali waena?”
Esta amukobosia ali, “Onaania ne omusiku wefwe, ali omundu omumayaanu Hamani yuno!” Nio Hamani areenga lukali ebweeni wo mwami ne Kwini Esta.
Omwami enyokha mu lirima, arura munju mwa naikara ne ndali, acha enje mu sianyi sie lichipi. Hamani arama enyuma khusaba kwini Esta khulwe bulamu bwewe sikila abona ali omwami nono aaba amukhalakile kamabi khale.
Enyuma wako omwami akobola khukhwama mu sianyi, echa niio banywelanga endali. Mala anyoola Hamani akwile a ndebe eya Esta. Omwami nga abona ario, aloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Omundu yuno enya khukwa khu Kwini ebweeni wase, mala mwichipi?”
Omwami ne akhamala khuloma tawe, bachili bafuuma Hamani mumoni.
Mala Haribona mulala khu bachili bo mwami, aloma ali, “Khutasa khwako Hamani abeele asimikhe kumurongooro engo wewe nikwo enya asuungekho Modekai, owareesia bulamu bwowo omwami. Ne kuli ne buleeyi bwe chimita kamakhumi kabili na chibili.”
Omwami aloma ali, “Suunga Hamani khu murongooro okwo.” Nio Hamani asuungwa khu murongooro nikwo aaba ne arekekheele Modekai. Mala lirima lio mwami liabomba.

Endaalo eyo ne ng'ene omwami Ahuswero aelesia kwini kimiaandu kia Hamani, omusiku we Bayaudi kioosi. Nio Modekai acha ebweeni wo mwami sikila Esta aba abooleele omwami nga bulebe bwewe ne Modekai ne bwaba.
Omwami abukula embete yewe eyarumikha nga kumuuri niyo aba aana khu Hamani mala akielesia Modekai. Esta akhola Modekai aba omuliindi owe kimiaandu kia Hamani kioosi.
Mala Esta alomaloma khu mwami lundi. Amukwa mu bikele biewe, amwikoonjelela ne alila. Amusaba arusieo lirekekha limayaanu nilio Hamani Omuakaki, arekekhera Bayaudi.
Omwami ekesielela Esta esiimbo eye esahabu eye bubwami.
Nio Esta enyokha eema ebweeni wo mwami. Aloma ali, “Liaba ne lisiimisia omwami ne naaba ne nyoolile busiime ebweeni wowo, ne liaba ne lili lie buluungi ebweeni wowo ne naba ne khusiimiisie, lekha lilaka liaandikwe khurusiao chibarwa nicho Hamani okhwa Hamedata Omuakaki aandika khubunia Bayaudi bali mungoongo chowo choosi.
Enyala nekhaliilikha ndiena khubona bali busiku bwicha khu baandu base? Enyala nekhaliilikha ndiena khubuna khwe babaandu base?”
Nio omwami Ahuswero aboolela Esta ne Modekai Omuyaudi ali, “Lola, Hamani asuungilwe khu murongooro khulwe ekwangwaani yewe eye khubunia Bayaudi, ne naeele Esta kimiaandu kiewe.
Nono ewe onyala waandika liosi liosi nilio wenya mu lisina lio mwami mala orekho embete erumikhanga nga kumuuri kwo omwami. Sikila likhuwa liiandiikwe mwisina lio mwami mala liarwakho kumuuri kwewe se linyala liakaluukhasibwa tawe.”
Baandiki bo mwami boosi balaangwa. Kano kakholekha endaalo ekhola kamakhumi kabili na chitaru eye kumwesi kwa khataru, kuli kumwesi kwa Sibani. Likhuwa liaandikwa khuloondekhana ne koosi niko Modekai alaka. Liaandikwa khu Bayaudi, khu bakhoongo, khu bemeelesi, ne khu baruki be chingoongo choosi emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na saba khukhwama India khukhwola Esopia. Chibarwa chaandikwa khu buli lukoongo mu lulimi lwalwo. Ne lundi Bayaudi banyoola ebarwa yabwe mu lulomo lwabwe.
Modekai aandikila chibarwa chino mu lisina lio mwami Ahuswero, mala achirakho kumuuri kwe embete eyo mwami. Chibarwa chailwa ne batimia chifarasi chitima lukali chicharumikhanga khu milimo kio mwami. Chifarasi chaba chachoela mu litaala lio mwami.
Mu barwa chino omwami aelesia kumunwa Bayaudi buli mu lukoba bebuusie mala boosi baliinde bulamu bwabwe. Bonake, banamae namwe lukoongo lwosi lwosi lubebwaakala. Lundi bakhoya babunie bakhasi ne babaana be babaandu babebwaakala ne khunuula kimiaandu kiabwe.
Endaalo ndala yong'ene niio eyarekekhelwa Bayaudi khukhola kano mungoongo choosi cho mwami Ahuswero. Yaba endaalo eye likhumi na chitaru eye kumwesi kwe ekhumi na kibili kwa Atari.
Ebarwa eyaandikwa yarusibwa nga lilaka mu buli lukoongo, yasalanisibwa khu buli mundu mu buli lukoongo. Nio Bayaudi berekekhe khukhwiyacha basiku babwe nga endaalo eyo ne yoola.
Nio barumwa barura khuloondekhana ne lilaka lio mwami baniina khu farasi che kimilimo kio mwami mala bachitimia khangu. Lilaka lino liarusibwa mu lukoba lwa Susa.
Modekai arura munju eyo mwami, ne afwarire chingubo che bubwami, chimbuusi ne chiwaanga, ne ekuutwa emboofu eye esahabu. Lundi aba afwarire engubo enapeenda eya katani emiuufu. Babaandu ba Susa baapa bikalakala ne khukhwikhoya.
Khu Bayaudi sino siaba siise sie busangaafu, liliekhoya, khubona bulayi, ne lukoosi.
Mu buli lukoongo ne mu lukoba nimwo lilaka lio mwami ne kamaandike biolanga, khwaba ne khubona bulayi ne liliekhoya, naikara ne khuola mu Bayaudi. Ne babaandu bakali mu baandu be sibala esio belaanga khuuba Bayaudi sikila baba ne buuri khu Bayaudi.

Lilaka lio mwami nilio alaka lienyekha likholekhe endaalo ekhola ekhumi na khataru eye kumwesi kukwalaangwa bali Atari. Eyino yaba endaalo niyo basiku be Bayaudi bebaasianga khubaula. Ne kakhali kabakaluukhanakho, Bayaudi babaula.
Bayaudi bebuusia mungoba che chingoongo chabwe choosi cho omwami Ahuswero nio bebwaakale abo babenya khubabunia. Se abao omundu owanyala khubakhiingilila tawe. Sikila babaandu boosi baba babarire.
Bakhoongo boosi, babemeelesi be chingoongo ne baruki, ne babemeelesi bo mwami boosi bayeeta Bayaudi sikila baria Modekai.
Baria Modekai sikila aba omundu omukali mwichipi lio mwami. Lundi efuma yewe yaba yasalanila mungoongo choosi. Ne Modekai achiililila khuba ne bunyali.
Nio Bayaudi beera basiku babwe ne chimbalu ne khubabunia. Lundi bakhola nga benya khwaabo ba bababiila.
Mu Susa, lukoba luboofu lulweene, Bayaudi beera babaandu chimia chiraano.
Beera akhaba Parishandata, Dalifoni, Asipata,
Porata, Adalia, Aridata,
Parimashita, Arisai, Aridai, ne Baisata.
Abo baba Babaana ekhumi bakhwa Hamani okhwa Hamedata, omusiku owe Bayaudi. Kakhaba kario, se banuula bibiindi tawe.
Endaalo eyo neng'ene omwami aboolelwa bukali bwe babaandu babeerwa mu Susa.
Omwami aboolela kwini Esta ali, “Mu Susa mwong'ene, Bayaudi beerire babaandu chimia chiraano, alala ne babaana ba Hamani likhumi. Aba nono bakholile barie mu ngoongo chichiindi! Nono wenya siina? Osaba siina lundi nisio wenya, Ne olasinyoola.”
Esta akobosia ali, “Omwami nosiima, lekha Bayaudi bali mu Susa bakhole lundi kumuchuli nga niko bakholile endaalo eya luno khuloondekhana ne lilaka. Ne olake kimibili likhumi kie babaana ba Hamani ekio kisuungwe khu mirongooro.”
Nio Omwami alaka kano kakholwe. Lilaka liarusibwa mu Susa mala kimibili likhumi kie bakhwa Hamani kiasuungwa.
Khu ndaalo eye likhumi na chine eye kumwesi kulaangwa bali Atari, Bayaudi ba Susa babuusiana alala lundi mala beera babaandu chimia chitaru mu lukoba olwo. Ne kakhali se babanuula bibiindu tawe.
Bakhaba Bayaudi ba baaba mungoongo cho mwami bebuusia alala khuliinda bulamu bwabwe mala banyoola bulekhuule khukhwama khu basiku babwe. Beera babaandu chielefu kamakhumi saba na chiraano ba baaba ne bababiila. Ne se banuula bibiindu tawe.
Eyino yaba endaalo eye likhumi na chitaru eye kumwesi kulaangwa bali Atari. Khu ndaalo eyaloondakho eye likhumi na chine, bauluukha mala bakikhola khuuba endaalo eye kumwikhoyo ne naikara.
Ne Bayaudi be mu Susa bebuusia alala khu ndaalo eye likhumi na chitaru nende eye likhumi na chine. Bakhola endaalo ekhola ekhumi na kharaano eye khuola. Bakhola endaalo eyo yaba eya naikara ne khukhwikhoya.
Esino nisio sikila Bayaudi bamenyile mu birekere ne bakhebulilanga endaalo ekhola likhumi na khane eye kumwesi kulaangwa bali Atari. Bakikhebulilanga nga endaalo eye kumwikhoyo ne khuola ne khuelesiana biianwa bilayi.
Modekai aandika koosi kakekholekha, mala aila chibarwa khu Bayaudi ba baamenya mungoongo choosi cho mwami Ahuswero, aembi ne aleeyi.
Ababoolela khukhebulila endaalo eye likhumi na chine ne endaalo eye likhumi na chiraano che kumwesi kulaangwa bali Atari nga che khuola buli kumwiiko.
Ababoolela ario sikila chino chaba chindaalo nicho Bayaudi banyoola buulukhi khukhwama khu basiku babwe. Kuno kwaba kumwesi nikwo bubeeleli bwabwe bwakaluukhanisibwa bwaba busangaafu ne khulila khwabwe khwaba khuola. Ababoolela khukhebulila chindaalo chino nga che khukhola naikara ne khusangaala ne khuechana biianwa alala ne khuaana biianwa khu bataambi.
Nio Bayaudi bafukiilisiana khukhola nga baba ne barakikha khuloondekhana nga Modekai ne abaandikila.
Hamani okhwa Hamedata Omuakaki aaba omusiku owe Bayaudi boosi. Aba akholile ekwangwaani eye khubunia Bayaudi. Aba apa chikura nicho balaanga bali puri khurobora endaalo eye khutubundula ne khubunia Bayaudi.
Ne kakhali Esta acha khu mwami, mala omwami arusia lilaka mu maandike kaboola kali, Hamani omwene anyoole sibi nisio arekekhera Bayaudi. Niye ne babaana bewe basuungwe khu mirongooro.
Khwako balaanga chindaalo echo bali Purimu khukhwama khu likhuwa bali Puri. Bakhola bario sikila koosi niko Modekai abaandikila, ne niko babiriramo ne kakabakwakho.
Lino liakila Bayaudi bakhola kwaba kumwiima khukhebulila chindaalo chibili echo. Kumwiima kuno kwaba khunibo, khu lisaaye liabwe ne nabo boosi babaambana ne nabo. Kumwiima kuno kwaba kuli, bakhoya bakhebulile chindaalo chibili chino khuloondekhana ne kakaandikwa ne buli siise sisiaroborwa buli mwiiko ne bakhalekhakho tawe.
Chindaalo chino chenyekhana khukhebulilwa ne khuliindwa mu buli selukho, mu buli nju, mu buli lukoongo nende mu buli lukoba. Chindaalo cha Purimu chino chenyekhana khukhebulilwa mu Bayaudi boosi. Ne se chenyekha chilekhwekho khukhebulilwa mu selukho chabwe choosi tawe.
Nio kwini Esta, omukhaana owa Abihaili, alala ne Omuyaudi Modekai baandika ebarwa eye khabili khutinyilisia kamakhuwa khuloondekhana ne Purimu.
Chibarwa charumwa khu Bayaudi boosi, bali mungoongo emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na saba che mu bwami bwa Ahuswero. Ebarwa eyo yabamo kamakhuwa ke kumuleembe ne buliindi bulayi.
Bababoolela bali chindaalo cha Purimu chino chikhoya chakhebulilwa mu biise bibiaroborwa nga Modekai ne kwini Esta babekesia. Bekesia Bayaudi nende be lisaaye liabwe khuloondekhana ne khukhweyimana khulia siise sie khusooma.
Lilaka lia Esta lie khutinyilisia kumwiima kwa Purimu liaandikwa mu sitabu.

Omwami Ahuswero arakho busuuru khu baandu bamenyile mungoongo chewe ne babaandu bamenyile siimbi ne enyanja.
Bikholwa bioosi bie kamaani ne bunyali bwo mwami Ahuswero, ne bibiindu bioosi bie lukoosi lwe angaaki nilwo omwami aelesia Modekai, biaandikwa mu sitabu sie chingano sie babaami ba Metia ne Pasha.
Modekai Omuyaudi aloondela omwami Ahuswero mu bwami. Ne Modekai aba omukali ne khumanyikhana ne balebe bewe Bayaudi. Aamanyikhana sikila enyela babaandu bewe bulayi mala apanila kumuleembe mu Bayaudi boosi.

Aabao omundu mu sibala sie Usi, lisina liewe aalaangwa Ayubu, omundu oyo se aabakho ne liibi liosi liosi lie khukhwikiichibwa tawe, lundi aaba omuluungi. Aaria Wele ne se eenya khukhola bumayaanu tawe.
Ayubu aaba ne babaana basoleeli saba ne bakhaana bataru.
Aaba ne kamakheese chielefu saba, chingamia chielefu chitaru, chieeyi eelefu ndala ne chipunda chikhasi chimia chiraano. Lundi aba ne bakholi bakali nio aaba omundu omukali mu baandu be ebukwe boosi.
Babaana bewe basoleeli bakholaanga bubwaasio bwe khukhola chinaikara mu chinju chabwe mala balaanganga bakooko babwe bataru ne becha ne balia lundi ne banywa ne nabo.
Enyuma we khumala buli naikara, Ayubu aarumanianga babaana bewe ne khubakwalaasia. Enyokhanga kumutikhinyi makhelebeende ne aana biianwa bie khukhwosia khuloondekhana ne bukali bwe babaana bewe boosi. Aakholanga ario sikila ebaasia ali abuundi babaana bewe bakhola bario bakhoma Wele mu miooyo kiabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aareeba Sietani ali, “Waama waena?” Sietani aakobosia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Nama khukeenda eyi neeyi ne khuyiiyayiiya mu sibala.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aareeba Sietani ali, “Oboonekho omukholi wase Ayubu ku? Ng'ali mbao akhaba mulala khu sibala ooli omusuubilwa lundi omulayi nga niye tawe. Asaayanga Wele lundi eliinda, se eenyanga khukhola bumayaanu tawe.”
Ewe se wamusira chimbeka choosi, alala ne nju yewe, ne bibiindu bioosi nibio ali ne nabio ku? Ewe wabiita chikhabi kimilimo kie kamakhono kewe lundi kimiaandu kiewe mu sibala kiatasiikhe lukali.
Ne kakhali luno yetiilakho khu bioosi nibio ali nabio, naye alakhulaama ewe ebweeni wowo.”
