Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Sietani ali, “Lola, bioosi nibio ali ne nabio bili mu bunyali bwowo, ne kakhali okhatiila khu Ayubu omwene tawe!” Khwako Sietani aarura ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Endaalo ndala babaana ba Ayubu baba balikho balia naikara mungo mwa wandayaabwe omukhulu.
Omurume aatima aacha khu Ayubu aamuboolela ali, “Chieeyi chibeele chilikho chilima, ne chipunda chibeele chilikho chaaya siimbi nacho,
mala Basabea bachiibwaakala baacha nacho. Berire buli mukholi wowo ese seng'ene niye oramire. Ese seng'ene niye owibachile niiche khu khuboolela.”
Omurume ne asiili khumala khulomaloma, omukholi okundi eecha mala aaloma ali, “Lueni lwe fula lupile kamakheese ne babaayi mala lwabeerire boosi. Ese seng'ene niye owibachile niiche khu khuboolela.”
Ne asiili khumala khulomaloma tawe, omukholi okundi eacha mala aaloma ali, “Bakalitayo barumanisie bipupu bitaru mala beecha bebwaakala chingamia chowo bachibukula, beera bakholi bowo boosi. Ese seng'ene niye owibachile khukhwiicha khukhuboolela.”
Ne asiili khumala khulomaloma, omukholi okundi eecha mala aaloma ali, “Babaana bowo babeele balikho balia naikara mungo mwo mwana wowo omukhulu,
khangu busa ekhuungu yamila mu sichiimi yapa enju lubeka, enju yakwa khu baele abo mala boosi bafwiile. Ese seng'ene niye owibachile necha khu khuboolela.”
Ayubu nga ne aaulila kano, eenyokha aatabulaka engubo yewe. Aabeka kumurwe kwewe aakwa asi aasaaya Wele.
Aaloma ali, “Ese naama munda mwa maayi sichula, lundi khakobole niio naama sichula. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabukule. Lisina liewe lifume.”
Mu koosi kakeekholekha, Ayubu se akholelakho Wele bubwoni namwe aamwikiicha tawe.

Lundi yabao endaalo ndala niyo malaika ba Wele becha khukhweyekesiana babeene ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Sietani lundi eecha ne nabo khukhwiyekesiana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aareeba Sietani ali, “Waama waena?”
Sietani aamukobosia ali, “Nama khukeenda eyi ne neeyi ne khuyiiyayiiya mu sibala.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamureeba ali, “Eku, Oboonekho omukholi wase Ayubu ku? Mbao akhaba mulala khu sibala ooli omusuubilwa lundi omulayi nga niye tawe. Asaayanga Wele lundi eliinda, se enyanga khukhola bumayaanu tawe. Ewe wakila ese namwibwaakala akhaba sikila ne sikhabaao tawe. Ayubu asichiililila khuuba omusuubilwa nga khale.”
Sietani aakobosia ali, “Siikhoba khulwe siikhoba! Omundu anyala aana bioosi nibio ali nabio khulwe khuonia bulamu bwewe.
Ne kakhali luno wamutiilakho busa omwene, niye acha khu khulaama ewe ebweeni wowo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Sietani ali, “Lola, ali mu bunyali bwowo ne kakhali okhamwiira tawe.”
Nio Sietani enyokha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aelesia Ayubu kamakoonjo kumubili kwoosi.
Ayubu aabukula sikoloonjo sie nyuungu nisio eyakalila omwene, mala ekhala mwikokhe.
Nio omukhasi wewe eecha amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne osiili busa ne lisuubila nga khale? Laama Wele mala ofwe!”
Ayubu aamukobosia ali, “Ewe olomaloma nga mulala khu bakhasi basilu. Ne khufukiilila kamalayi khukhwama khu Wele, se khufukiilila ne kamabi tawe ku?” Mu kano koosi Ayubu se akholakho bumayaanu mu niko alomalomanga tawe.
Ayubu aba ne basaale bewe bataru. Nga basaale bewe abo baulila kamabi koosi kakamwichakho, becha buli mulala khukhwama ewewe. Bano baaba Elifasi khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Temani, Bilitati khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Shuhi, ne Sofari khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Naamata. Bafukiilisiana boosi khuucha khumubona ne khumuoleelesia.
Babonela Ayubu sinaao, ne kakhali se bamumanya tawe. Barakikha khu khuupa chimbuungu ne khulila, batabulaka chingubo chabwe mala bechukhakakho lipukhuulu khu mirwe kiabwe.
Nio bekhala ne naye asi chindaalo saba siilo ne kumuusi ne bakhalomakho elomo tawe, sikila babona bali kumunaanio kwewe kwaba kumukali lukali.

Aaloma ali,
“Lekha endaalo eye khusaalwa khwase elaamwe,
alala ne siilo nisio balomelakho bali,
‘Omwana owe sisoleeli aaesiibwe.’
Lekha endaalo eyo ekaluukhane ebe sisiilima
Wele owe angaaki akhenaanakho sikila niyo tawe,
ne buwaanga bukhakikhosiakho tawe.
Lekha sisiilima ne bubeeleli bukibeekho,
lekha kamafuumbi kakibekho,
lekha bumali bwe kumuusi bukiteremie.
Lekha sisiilima sikali sibe khu siilo esio!
Okhasibalila alala ne chindaalo che kumwiiko tawe,
lundi sikhabalilwakho alala ne chindaalo che kumwesi tawe.
Lekha siilo esio sibe sikuumba,
ne busangaafu bukhauliilikhanilamo tawe.
Lekha balaamanga, balaame endaalo eyo,
abo bamanyile khukhiingilila Lefiatani
lekha ching'enieesi che kumutikhinyi kwayo chimaliie,
lekha siilo esio siliinde khunyoola buwaanga,
ne kakhali sikhabunyoolakho tawe,
kumutikhinyi kukheecha kwasibonekhela tawe.
Sikila se siakhiingilila khusaalwa khwase tawe,
se siambiimba khukhwama mu butinyu tawe.
Siina sikila ne khaafwilao enyuma we khusaalwa?
Siina sikila ne kharura munda mwa maayi mala nataambao?
Sikila siina maayi wase ne aasaala ese?
Siina sikila ne nanuuna kamaturu?
Andi luno nakona asi mu muleembe ne silile,
andi luno nakona, mala andi ndikho mbola.
Alala ne babaami ne bakeleki be liloba,
babeyombakhila buyaakha khukhwama mu maumbu,
namwe ne babaami babaaba ne esahabu,
babechusia chinju chabwe efwesa engali,
Siina sikila ese ne khaasiikhwa nga omwana osaalilwe omufu?
Nga omwana omutoro okhaabonakho buwaanga tawe?
Ebweeneyo bamayaanu balekha khunaania,
ebweeneyo baluile baola.
Ebweeneyo baboe bali mu muleembe alala,
se baulila luyoka lwe babaami babwe tawe.
Be asi nende be bunyali baliyo,
ne banasioobi bali balekhuule.
Sikila siina buwaanga ne bukhoselia abo bachiililila khumenya mu butinyu?
Sikila siina bulamu ne buelesibwa abo bali mu bubeeleli?
baliyiima khukhila ne bayiima libiikhilo liliekisa.
Bekhoya lukali,
lundi basangaala ne boola mu siliindwa.
Siina sikila omundu ookhabona tawe anyoole buwaanga,
omundu niye Wele aakhiingilila buli lubeka?
Khusikhiikha khuli nga siakhulia siase,
ne buchuuni bwase buchichukha nga kameechi.
Sikila sisiindu nisio naria nisio sisiimbaamba,
ne sisiimba buuri nisio sisinjichakho.
Se ndi ne kumuleembe namwe buoleelefu tawe,
se ndi ne buuluukhi tawe, butinyu bwong'ene buchiililila khukhwicha.”

Nio Elifasi Omutemani aakobosia ali:
Omundu ne akhaka khulomaloma ne nawe, onyala wakhalala?
Kakhaba kario, se nyala nasila tawe.
Lola, ewe wekisia babaandu bakali,
lundi watinyilisia batekhele.
Ewe waoleelesia abo ba baaba ne bakwa,
lundi wara kamaani mwaabo bakhanyala khukhwima tawe.
Ne kakhali luno nawe bwakhwolilekho ne se oli ne liliekhaliilikha tawe,
butinyu bwakhukwiilekho, mala wabeele ne liaayaaya.
Buriaani bwowo khu Wele se buli lilieyikina liowo?
Ne chingila chowo che buluungi se chili lilieyikina liowo?
Luno yibaasia, naanu owabuna ne akhalikho ne butinyu tawe?
Namwe baluungi, khumwaatwa ku?
Nga manyile, babaandu babiaala bumayaanu,
lundi bamiicha butinyu bakesa bubwene.
Babunisibwa ne kumuuya kwa Wele,
beerwa ne lirima likali lia Wele.
Khukhookha khwe etalang'i, khuulukhuma khwe etalang'i endafu khuwao,
kameeno ke chitalang'i ching'ana kakhoongolwa,
ne etalang'i eyo efwa khulwe enjala,
mala ching'ana chayo chisalaanila.
Elomo yanjichakho mu bwikisi,
liiru liase liaulila khumoonya khwayo.
biise nibio babaandu bali mwiilo likali,
buuri ne literema bianjichakho,
bibiasisiikha kamakuumba kase koosi.
Roho aabira ebweeni wase,
mala kamaswa kaase kenyokha.
Roho eema,
ne kakhali se namanya efwaani yewe tawe,
efwaani yaba ebweeni wase,
buli siindu siasila, nio naulila kumumilo.
“Omundu owabuumbwa Omuluungi ebweeni wa Wele anyala aabaao ku?
Omundu anyala aaba omukwalaafu ebweeni wo Mubuumbi wewe ku?
Wele se eyikina bakholi bewe tawe,
aakhaba bamalaika bewe bali ne kamabi.
Nono se anyala eeyikina omundu ooli sibuumbe sie liloba tawe,
owabuumbwa khukhwama mwipukhuulu
lundi onyala aatubundulwa nga sipurupuru!
Babaandu bakali babunisibwa akari we kumutikhinyi ne ekolooba,
bafwa mala bebililwa khulwa mindali ne se aliio obakhebulila tawe.
Bioosi nibio bali nabio bibukulibwa,
bafwa ne bakhali ne limanya tawe.”

“Ayubu luno laanga,
aliio omundu yesi yesi olakhukobosia ku?
Aliio malaika yesi yesi onyala aakhuyeeta ku?
Ng'ali lirima liira omusilu
ne libuba liira okhali ne limanya tawe.
Nabona basilu ne baindiaala,
ne kakhali nalaama khangu chingo chabwe.
Babaana babwe se banyoola kumuleembe tawe,
baapisibwa siibi mu chikoti,
ne mbao obasoola tawe.
Babaandu be njala bakesa biakhulia bie basilu,
aakhaba nende bibiamela mu mawa,
ne babaandu be kumuliuliu bekoomba kimiaandu kiabwe.
Sikila buchuuni se bwamanga mwipukhuulu tawe,
namwe butinyu se burubura mwiloba tawe,
Ne kakhali omundu asaalwa khunaania
nga chinjaso chiicha mu ngaaki.
Abaanga bali ese niye ewe, andi nakoboleele Wele,
ne khumuboolela butinyu bwase.
Wele ookholanga kamakhuwa ke khuukia,
ke khuukia kamakali kakhanyala kabalikha tawe,
niye ooreeranga efula ekwa khu sibala,
lundi achukhiilila kimikuunda.
Aniinia angaaki abo babeboombia,
ne khuelesia kumuleembe abo balila.
Akoyaania kamarekekha ke bamayaanu,
khwako se banyala khukhola niko barekeekhe tawe.
lundi akoyaania kamarekekha ke baabacha.
Babuubukila mu siilima akhaba ne kuli kumuusi,
akhaba mwiangilwe babuubuka nga siilo.
Ne kakhali Wele aonia bafuubi khukhwama mu lifwa,
aonia babanani khukhwama khwaabo baali be kamaani.
Nio bataambi bali ne lilieyikina,
ne Wele asisia abo bakhali ng'ali tawe.
khwako okhalekeelesia liukuuma lia Wele Owe Bunyali tawe.
aumisianga lundi aonia.
Acha khukhuonia kamakhabi sita,
aakhaba mu makhabi saba ne se oliba ne butinyu tawe.
Mu njala acha khu khusikula khukhwama mu lifwa,
ne mwiie acha khu khuonia khukhwama mu lifwa.
Ocha khukiswa khukhwama khu bukhupe bwe lulimi,
ne se ocha khuria libuna ne liicha tawe.
Ewe ocha khuchekheelela libuna ne njala,
namwe se ocha khuria chisaang'i che mundaa tawe.
Kimikuunda kiowo se kicha khubamo kamabaale tawe,
ne chisaang'i che mundaa chiicha khuba ne kumuleembe ne nawe.
Nio ocha khumanya oli enju yowo eli ne kumuleembe,
ne oyama kamakheese kowo,
ocha khukanyoola koosi ne kali bulayi.
Ewe ocha khumanya oli lisaaye liowo licha khuba likali,
lundi liliba nga bunyaasi bwe khu sibala.
Ewe ocha khufwa ne oli omukofu lukali,
nga engaanu elabile ne ekesibwa mu siise siayo.
Ayubu lola, lino khwaliboone khuli lili lia ng'ali,
nono luno liulile mala olimanye khulwe bulayi bwowo.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali,
“Abanga buchuuni bwase bukelwa,
ne butinyu bwase bwoosi burwa khu bikelo,
bwakhabeele busiro khukhila kumuyekhe kwe mu nyanja,
khwako kamakhuwa kaase kabeele ka khangu.
Sikila buembo bwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi buli mwise,
ne ese nywa buchiba bwabwo,
kumunaanio kwa Wele kuli khwise.
Punda mulia enyala yalila ne eli ne bunyaasi?
Namwe ekhaafu emoloolela mu maayilwe ku?
Ne naanu onyala aalia siakhulia siikhalimo echamu namwe chumbe tawe?
Chamu siina eeli mwiki liwaanga?
Se ndikho ne kameelu khu siakhulia nga sisienesio tawe,
siakhulia nga esio sirio sindwaasia.
“Ng'ali nanyoolakho busa nisio saba,
lundi Wele aambeelesie nisio nenya,
abanga Wele naye aasiimile aanjire,
aakhalekhuulile kumukhono kwewe kwanjira.
Andi lino nilio libeele buoleelesi khwise;
andi nabeele ne busangaafu akhaba mu buchuuni bukhawa buno tawe.
Sikila se naloba kamakhuwa ka Wele ooli Omutakatifu tawe.
Ndi ne kamaani ke khuchiililila khuliindiilila?
Ne khutabusia khwase khuliba khuriena nio nikhaliilikhe?
Eku, kamaani kase kali kamaani ke kamabaale,
namwe kumubili kwase kuli kwe kumukasa?
Ng'ali se ndi nende sinyala sianjeeta tawe,
lundi se ndi nga nyala nanyoola buyeeti tawe.
“Omundu okhekesia bulayi khu wasie tawe,
aba aalekhile khuria Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.
Ne kakhali basaale base babeele baabacha nga luluuchi lubisianga busa mu fula mwong'ene,
bambea ese nga chinjichi chiteenyanga mu milengaala.
Nga chinjichi chichiichuulemo kamaarara,
lundi nicho ebarafu ekhingile.
Ne kakhali siise sie siimiyu, chiwaao,
chiteenya kumuumu ne kwilakho.
Baboofuli barura khu ngila chacho,
baniina khucha mu sichiimi ne khufwiilamo.
Baboofuli khukhwama Tema bayiima kameechi,
baboofuli khukhwama Sheba bakayiima ne lilieyikina.
Bafwa kimiooyo sikila baba ne lilieyikina,
boola siimbi a njichi echo ne bawechekheelela.
Ne enywe mwesi mwabeele nga chinjichi echo khwise,
mubona butinyu bwase ne muba ne buuri.
Eku, ese nalomilekho ndi, mumbelesie siianwa?
Se nalomile ndi ndungire asooya khukhwama khu miaandu kienywe tawe.
Se nalomile ndi sikule ese khukhwama mu makhono ko musiku
namwe khukhuusikula ese khukhwama khu khayiinga tawe.
“Njekisie ese, mala ndasila,
mboolele bubi bwase, ne ese ndaulila.
Kamakhuwa ka ng'ali kali kachuunia,
ne kakhali likaambila lienywe nalio, siina nisio lingaania?
Mwibaasia muli munyala mwabiiya kamakhuwa busa,
mubukula kamakhuwa ko omundu owe butinyu khuuba embeo busa?
Lundi munyala mwapa chikura khu bafuubi,
ne khukusia omusaale wenywe!
Ne kakhali luno, ne musiima ndole,
se ndamubea enywe mwabeene tawe.
Kaluukhasia chinganakani chenywe,
mukhaba bakhali ng'ali khwise tawe.
Luno kaluukhasia chinganakani chenywe,
bulayi bwase se bulikho bufukiililwa tawe.
Niko ndoma kali kamamayaanu?
Ese se ndi ne likesi lie khumanya kamakhuwa kamabi tawe ku?

“Omundu se ali ne kimilimo kimiaandalafu khu sibala?
Bulamu bwewe buli nga chindaalo cho mukholi owe kumuruungo kwa buli ndaalo?
Ali nga nasioobi owekoomba sisiiniini,
nga omukholi olindiilila kumuruungo lukali.
Ne kakhali kimieesi kikhalimo siindu tawe nikio kumukabwa kwase,
ne buli siilo butinyu bwong'ene.
Ne ngona asi nireeba ndi, bukhasie asiina ninyokhe?
Ne kakhali siilo sili sileeyi,
mala ndengeecha khukhwola nga busia.
Kumubili kwase kwechula chinyeende ne kamakoonjo,
siikhoba siase sibiimba nio sikelao situbukha kamayila.
Chindaalo chase chibira khangu khukhila esindani eyo munabi,
chindaalo chiwa lilieyikina ne likhaliio tawe.
Ee Wele, khebulila oli bulamu bwase buli busa kumuuya,
emoni yase se khabonekho kamalayi lundi tawe.
Omundu oumbona se akhambonekho lundi tawe,
okhambeenje ne kakhali ese khabe nachiile.
Bulayi bwene nga lifuumbi ne liwao,
abo baacha emakoombe se bakobola lundi tawe.
Se bakobola munju chabwe lundi tawe,
namwe abuundu niio baamenyanga se akhebulilwa lundi tawe.
Khwako se nyala nasila tawe,
ndalomaloma mu buchuuni bwe kumwoyo kwase,
ndeloocha mu buchuuni bwe kumubili kwase.
Eku, ese ndi enyanja, namwe kuremu,
nio undeekho omuliindi?
Ndoma ndi, ‘Sitanda siase silamboleelesia,
bulili bwase bulaboombia liliiloocha liase,’
Ne ewe undikhirisia ne kamarooro,
lundi undaamo buuri khubirira mu malola,
nio ndobore khukhwekoka
ne lifwa khukhila buchuuni buno.
Nabiile bulamu bwase,
se ndamenya khulwa mindali tawe.
Ndekhe mbe, sikila bulamu bwase buli kumuuya busa.
Omundu ali siina nio ewe ore chinganakani chowo khu niye?
Ewe omukeendelela khumumenieelesia buli mutikhinyi,
khumukela buli siise?
Olalekha liina khu khundoleelela?
Se undekha khaba namila mare?
Ewe omumenieelesi owe babaandu, naaba ne khola bubwoni, aba siina nisio kholile khwiwe?
Siina sikila ne weluungikha ese seng'ene?
Siina sikila luno ese ne ndi busiro khwiwe?
Siina sikila ne okhambeela bubwoni bwase tawe?
Se onyala wandusiakho bumayaanu bwase tawe ku?
Sikila luno ndakona mu siliindwa,
ewe olambeenja ne kakhali se ndabao tawe.”

Nio Bilitati Omushuhi aakobosia ali,
“Olaloma kamakhuwa kano khukhwola asiina?
Kamakhuwa kakaama mwiwe kali nga embeo engali.
Eku, Wele akhiikhanga bung'ali?
Namwe Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhiikhanga kaali ka ng'ali?
Kaaba bali babaana bowo bakhola bubwoni khu Wele,
ne niye abaelesia kumunaanio khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe.
Ewe waaba noyiima Wele
ne khusaba kumwalaalo kwo Oyo Owe Bunyali Bwoosi,
waaba ne oli omukwalaafu lundi omuluungi,
ng'ali, alakhuyeeta ewe,
alakhukholela ewe nga wenyekha okholelwe.
Ne akhaba lirakikha liowo ne liaba likeekhe,
chindaalo chowo chimaliilisi chiicha khuba che buiinda bukali.
“Khusaba oreebe khu ke chiselukho che khaale,
mala wibaasie khu niko bakuuka babwe beyika.
Sikila efwe khwasaalilwe likolooba busa,
se khumanyilekho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe,
chindaalo chefwe khu sibala chili nga sisiiniini.
Babaandu balakhweyikia, bakhuboolele,
mala balome khuloondekhana nende niko bamanya.
“Bisele binyala biachoela niio sireende sikhali tawe ku?
Binyala bianyoolekhana niio kameechi kakhali tawe ku?
Kameechi kaaba ne kateenya nibio binyoa khukhwooma,
ne bisiili bitiiti ne bikhoola khuremwa tawe.
Babaandu babebilila Wele bali nga bisele ebio,
lilieyikina liaabo bakhali ne Wele tawe likhatibe.
Nibio beyikina bitubundukha busa.
Nibio beyikina bili nga buusi bwe lububi.
Lekha beaambe khu nju yabwe, se elema bulayi tawe.
Lekha bakitiile, se elanyalikhana khutiilwa tawe.
Bali nga kimirongooro kikalaasia lukali kumuumu ne kufwa,
kimili kiakio kifuunikha kumukuunda.
Kimili kiakio kiaboranila mu situumi sie kamabaale,
kinyoola bulamu asi mu lwanda.
Ne omundu aakisiuula khukhwama abuundu wakio ao,
abuundu ao akhakiikaane aloma ali,
‘Ese khaamubonakho enywe tawe.’
Lola, esio nisio sisiakamo sie khoyo eye bamayaanu abo,
ne babaandi becha mala babukula bubweyaangu bwabwe.
Lola, Wele se acha khuloba omundu okhali ne kamabi tawe,
namwe ayeete bamayaanu tawe.
Ne kakhali acha khukhukhola ewe ochekhe,
lundi uupe luyoka lwe khoyo.
Acha khuambia chisoni abo ba bakhubiila ewe,
chingo che bamayaanu chicha khuwao.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali:
Ne kakhali omundu busa anyala aaba owa ng'ali ebweeni wa Wele ku?
Omundu aaba ne enya khuyingana ne Wele,
Wele anyala amureeba kamareeba eelefu ndala,
niko akhanyala aakobosia akhaba lilala tawe.
Wele ali omukesi lukali lundi owe kamaani kamakali,
mbao omundu onyala aayingana naye mala aakhila tawe.
Wele auuyisia bikulu omundu ne akhamanya tawe,
lundi abionakaka ne akhalaale.
Wele asisiikha sibala sinyokha mu bukono bwasio,
mala chinjeko chasio chesisiikha,
akaania enyanga mala elekha khurura,
akhiingilila buwaanga bwe ching'enieesi,
niye yeng'ene owarao likulu,
ne khuswalakilila sisieeno.
Orioni, ne Kilimia ne ching'enieesi che bunafubo.
Akhola bibiindu bikali bikhamanyikhana tawe,
akhola kamayia kamakali kakhabalikha tawe.
Wele ambirakho, mala se mubona tawe,
akeenda nase ne se mumanya tawe.
Abukula nisio enya mala mbao omukaania tawe.
Mbao omureeba ali, ‘Olikho okhola siina?’ Tawe.
“Lirima lia Wele se liwechanga tawe,
aula basiku bewe babayeeta Rahabu sisieeno sie mu meechi.
Nono ese nyala namukobosia ndiena,
namwe nyala nayiingana naye ndiena?
Nakhaba ne khali ne kamabi se nyala nakobosiana ne naye tawe,
khoya sabe akholele siisa.
Naaba ne mulaanga mala afukiilila,
se nakhasuubiile ndi beele andekereesia tawe.
Sikila wambuuchile ne khuungu,
ne khu khuundasa ese kamakoonjo kakhali ne sifuno tawe,
se andekha naeela tawe,
ne kakhali anjichusia buchuuni.
Ne kali kamaani Wele ali nako khukhukhila ese
ne buli bung'ali se aliio onyala aloma bubi bwewe tawe.
Nakhaba ne khali ne bubi tawe,
kumunwa kwase kumwene kulakhalakila,
nakhaba ne khali ne kamabi tawe alaamanya khuba omukhiikha.
Ese se ndi ne kamabi tawe,
ne kakhali se nifumia samwene tawe.
Ese ndeka bulamu bwase.
Koosi kali malala, khwako ndoma ndi,
Wele abunia bakhali ne bubi ne bamayaanu sitube.
Butinyu ne bureera lifwa litundubikha,
Wele achekheelela bakhali bamayaanu tawe.
Sibala ne siba mu bunyali bwe bamayaanu,
Wele abofusia bakhalaki basio,
aaba ne akhali Wele okhola kano tawe, naanu niye?
“Chindaalo chase chiiyuula khukhila omutimi we chimbilo,
chiwao khangu ese ne khabona silayi mu nicho tawe.
Bulamu bwase bubira nga liliaaro litima khangu,
nga efuruusi neyuula biakhulia biayo.
Nakhaloma ndi nibilile lilieloocha liase,
ndi ngalukhasie bubeeleli bwase mala sangaale,
ese siili ne buuri khu buchuuni bwase bwoosi,
sikila manyile ndi ewe Wele wayimbukula ese khuba omumayaanu.
Namalile khunyoolekhana khuba omumayaanu,
siina sikila nono khole kimilimo kikhali ne bukhala?
Nakhesiinga ne sabuni,
mala narumikhira esabuni emalakho liikho lioosi,
ewe Wele olimwaata ese mwiloo,
akhaba chingubo chase ching'ene chilimbiila.
Wele se ali omundu niye ese nyala nakobosia niko aloma tawe,
se khunyala khwakaanana ne naye e bakhalaki tawe.
Ne se aliio oonyala aareera kumuleembe akari wewe ne nase tawe,
oonyala abisie khuloondekhana ne bulomani bwefwe.
Kaaba bali se aakhupa ese tawe,
lundi se aandekha naaba ne buuri bukali sikila niye tawe,
ese ndalomaloma ne khali ne buuri sikila niye tawe,
sikila ese se ndi nga nibaasibwa khuuba tawe.”

“Ese ndeka bulamu bwase,
ndaba omulekhuule mu khwiloocha khwase,
ndalomaloma sikila buchuuni nibwo ndi nabwo.
Ndaboolela Wele ndi okhakhalakila ese khuuba omumayaanu tawe,
ne kakhali nenya manye sifuno sie bukhalaki bwowo.
Eku, ewe osiimisibwa khu khuupia siibi?
Ewe olekeelesia kumulimo kwe kamakhono kowo?
Ewe osiimisibwa ne kamarekekha ke bamayaanu?
Eku, ewe oli ne chimoni nga cho omundu?
Eku, ewe obona nga babaandu?
Eku, chindaalo che bulamu bwowo chili nga che babaandu?
Ne kimiiko kie bulamu bwowo kili nga kie babaandu?
Nio likile ewe ne oyiima bubi bwase,
ne oenja bubwoni bwase,
akhaba ewe ne omanyile oli ese se ndi ne bumayaanu tawe,
se aliio oonyala aasikula ese khukhwama mu bunyali bwowo tawe.
Kamakhono kowo niko kakaandekekha ese mala kambuumba,
ne kakhali luno ewe wakaluukhane olikho umbunia.
Khebulila oli ewe owambuumba khukhwama khu liloba.
Eku, ewe wenya ungaluukhasie lundi mbe lipukhuulu?
Se wanjukha ese nga oochukha kamabeele,
mala wamboya ese nga ooboya liboonda?
Ewe wafwara ese siikhoba ne nyama,
mala woonga alala bikuumba biase ne chiisia.
Ewe wambelesia ese bulamu ne khu khunjekesia busiime bukhawa tawe,
mala ese nabaao sikila buliindi bwowo.
Kakhaba kario ewe wakisa bibiindu bino mu mwoyo kwowo,
manyile ndi ewe waba ne sifuno sino mu nganakani chowo.
Ese naaba ne khola bubwoni ewe undoleelela,
ne se umbeela bumayaanu bwase tawe.
Naaba ne khola bumayaanu aba butinyu bwanyoola!
Akhaba ne ndi omuluungi se nyala ne fumia tawe,
sikila mba ne chisoni chingali ne nibaasia buchuuni bwase.
Ne nebonia, ewe umbaaya oli ne oaaya etalang'i,
mala lundi ukholela ese ke khuukia lukali.
Oreera buloli buyaakha khwise,
ne lirima liowo khwise litasikha,
mala undeerera ese banamae bayaakha.
Wele, siina sikila ne wafukiilila ese nasaalwa?
Andi nafwa omundu yesi yesi ne akhaambonakho tawe,
andi nasutwa nayilwa mu ng'ani khukhwama munda,
mala naaba nga ookhaabakhowo tawe.
Eku, bulamu bwase se buli bubwimbi mala buli embi khuwa?
Ndekhe mbe, wakana nyoola liioleelesia litiiti,
ne siili khucha abuundu niio khalikobola lundi tawe,
mu sibala sie sisiilima sikali ne bubeeleli.
Sibala sie sisiilima, ne likoyaana,
niio akhaba buwaanga buli nga sisiilima.”

Nio Sofari Omunaamati aakobosia mala aaloma ali,
“Eku, kamakhuwa kamakali kano kache busa nokhakobosia tawe?
Eku, khulomaloma khukali khukhola omundu aabalwa khuuba ng'ali?
Ayubu, ewe wibaasia oli bubeeyi bunyala bwasisia babaandu?
Ne ewe ne ofwochola mbao okhurafwira tawe?
Sikila ewe oloma oli lisuubila liowo lili ng'ali,
lundi oli ewe oli omukwalaafu ebweeni wa Wele.
Abaanga Wele alomaloma,
khukhukobosia ewe,
aakhakhuboleele chisiiri che limanya.
Sikila limanya lilimo chimbeka chingali.
Nono manya oli, Wele se aabalile bubwoni bwowo bwoosi tawe.
Eku, ewe onyala wamanya chisiri cha Wele?
Onyala bukali bwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi?
Bukali bwewe buli angaaki khukhila likulu,
ewe se onyala sisiindu siosi siosi tawe?
Buli asi mu lusiba khukhila e makoombe,
ewe se onyala wamanya sisiindu siosi siosi tawe?
Bukali bwewe obwo buli buleeyi khukhila sibala,
ne bubalaayi bwabwo bukhila enyanja.
Wele aaba ne eecha mala aara omundu mu siboe,
namwe eecha mala aakhalakila omundu, naanu oonyala aamukhiingilila?
Wele amanyile babaandu bakhali ne bukhala tawe,
ne abona bikholwa bimayaanu, se akholakho siindu tawe ku?
Omundu omusilu se alinyoola limanya tawe,
bulayi bwene nga epundamulia ne ekhanyala yabaywa tawe.
Ayubu, kobolela Wele ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi,
eenja buyeeti bwewe.
Yerusiakho bumayaanu kaaba bali oli nabwo,
okhalekha bumayaanu bwaaba mungo mwowo tawe,
nio okeende ne kamaani ne okhali ne chisoni tawe,
olaba ne kumuleembe ne se olaba ne buuri tawe.
Olebilila butinyu bwowo,
olabukhebulila busa nga kameechi kaamalile khubira.
Bulamu bwowo bulaba buwaanga busa nga enyanga eye mwiangilwe,
sisiilima sie bulamu bwowo silaba busa nga kumutikhinyi.
Olaba bulayi sikila olaba ne lilieyikina.
Olaba asi we buliindi bwa Wele ne khuuluukhila mu muleembe.
Olakona asi ne se aliio oolakhuriikhirisia tawe,
babaandu bakali bakheenye buyeeti khukhwama khwiwe.
Ne kakhali chimoni che bamayaanu chikhabofule,
chingila chabwe che khukhwilukha choosi chikhabatibe,
lilieyikina liabwe liong'ene likhabe khufwa.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali,
“Ng'ali enywe muli babaandu abo,
lundi ne mufwa, limanya likhafwe ne naywe.
Ne kakhali ese ndi ne limanya bulayi bwene nga lilienywe,
enywe se mukhila ese tawe,
naanu ookhamanyile ako tawe?
Ese ndi sieenya meeno khu basaale base,
akhaba ne nasaba Wele mala aangobosia,
akhaba ne njekheelelwa, ese ndi owa ng'ali lundi se ndimo liibi tawe.
Oyo ooli bulayi alekeelesia butinyu,
ebaasia ali abo bamiuukha niibo bakwa mu butinyu.
Babefwi bamenyile mu muleembe,
ne abo baambia Wele lirima baliindwa,
beyikina kamaani kabwe nga wele wabwe.
“Ne kakhali reeba chisolo, mala chilakhwekisia,
reeba chinyuni, ne chilakhuboolela,
namwe reeba bimelwa, mala bilakhwekisia,
reeba ching'eeni che mu nyanja chikhuboolele.
Mu biindu bino bioosi, silala siina siikhamanyile sili,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye ookholile kano tawe?
Bulamu bwa buli sibuumbe,
ne kumuuya kwa buli mundu bili mu bunyali bwewe.
Liiru liiulila kamakhuwa,
bulayi bwene nga lulimi ne luchanjama siakhulia.
Limanya lili mu bakofu,
ne khumenya lukali khulimo bukesi.
Bukesi ne bunyali bili bia Wele,
ali ne likaambila ne busicha.
Wele aaba ne atechula mbao oonyala ombakha lundi tawe,
Wele aaba ne ara omundu mu siboe mbao oonyala aamukangulula tawe.
Wele aaba ne akhiingilila kameechi efula se ekwa tawe,
ne aaba ne akalekhuula, kechula sibala.
Wele ali ne kamaani ne limanya,
niye babea nende oyo obea, boombi bali babewe.
Wele aonanga bakaambisi ne bacha sichula,
ne khusilwasia bakhalaki.
Afuulanga babaami chingubo chabwe che bubwami,
ne khubaboa kimisiipi kie baboe,
Wele alekhanga basaayi ne bakeenda sichula,
ne khuula be bunyali.
Anuulaanga bakambisi bunyali bwabwe bwe khulomaloma,
ne khunuula basaakhulu limanya liabwe.
Aambia baruki chisoni chingali,
mala anuula be bunyali be kamaani kabwe.
Ekesianga abuwaanga chisiba che sisiilima sikali,
ne khureera buwaanga mu siilima sikali.
Akaliianga chikholo mala achibunia,
abalaayianga babaandu mala abasalanisia.
Arusia limanya mu baami be babaandu,
ne khubakhola bayiiyeyiiye mu sichiimi.
Babubuukila mu siilima niio buwaanga bukhali tawe,
lundi abakhola ne bataalitaala nga bameesi.”

Lola, ese samwene naboone kano koosi,
samwene nauliile ne khukamanya koosi.
Niko mumanyile, akhaba seesi ngamanyile.
Enywe se mukhila ese tawe.
Ne kakhali nenya ndomalome khu Munyali owa Bioosi,
nenya mboolele Wele khuloondekhana nende ekesi yase.
Ne kakhali enywe mumbakha ese bubeeyi,
enywe mweesi muli nga basilikhi bataamba bukhala.
Lukhila enywe musile busa,
nio khusila okhwo khulolekhe khuuba limanya!
Rekeeresia niko ndikho nibaasia,
mala muulile ese ne ndoma kakaase.
Eku, siina sikila ne muloma bubeeyi mwisina lia Wele?
Enywe mwibaasia muli munyala mwaloma bung'ali bwa Wele khulwe khubea ku?
Eku, mulikho mubabila Wele?
Mulacha muyeete Wele mu kesi yewe?
Wele aaba ne amuloleelesia enywe anyala aamunyoolamo sisiindu silayi ku?
Enywe mwibaasia muli munyala mwabea Wele nga mubea omundu?
Ng'ali Wele akhamurafwire enywe,
mwaba ne mubabila lubeka lulala.
Eku, luyali lwewe se lukhamuriisie enywe?
Buuri se bukhamutiile enywe sikila niye?
Bukhala bwe chisimo chenywe buli nga bukhala bwe likokhe,
ne kamayiingamo kenywe kali kaumbukha busa nga lisiisi lie liloba.
Khe musile, ndekhe ndomalome,
lekha ako kakeecha khunjekholekhakho kekholekhe!
Siina sikila niyingisie samwene mu butinyu,
mala nde bulamu bwase mu bunyali bwase?
Wele ne enya alanjira, se ndi ne lilieyikina liliindi tawe,
kakhaba kario ndamuboolela ke liiba liase lilayi.
Buno bucha khuba buonia bwase,
omundu okharia Wele tawe se eecha ebweeni wewe tawe.
Rekeeresia bulayi kamakhuwa kaase,
ulila niko ese ndomaloma.
Manya muli nerekeekhe bulayi khuloma kakaase,
ese manyile ndi ndakhalakilwa khuuba ng'ali.
Naanu ooliio oonyala aaloma bubi bwase?
Aaba ne aliio, ndasila busa mala fwe.
Ee Wele, fukiilila bibiindu bibili bino biong'ene,
ne aba ese se nja khukhwekisakho tawe:
Ndusiekho kumunaanio kwowo,
lundi okhalekha buuri bwase khwiwe bwanderemia tawe.
Nio undaange, ne ese ndakhukobosia.
Namwe ndekhe ese ndome, mala ewe ungobosie.
Nakhola bumayaanu ne bubwoni sikelo siina?
Mboolele bubi ne bubwoni bwase.
Siina sikila ne undekha?
Siina sikila ne umbukula ese khuuba omusiku wowo?
Ewe onyala wariikhirisia lisaafu liuchibwe ne mbeo?
Ewe wenya khutimania likhuuchi liliomu?
Sikila oandika kamasitaka kamarafu khuloondekhana nase,
ne khu khundiuukha busiro bwe bubwoni bwe mu buele bwase.
ne undoleelesia buli abuundu niio nja,
omenieelesia akhaba bikhandakilo biase.
Omundu abulungukha nga kumurongooro kubolile,
aweelelela nga engubo niyo kamake katanyakile.

“Omundu owasaalwa no mukhasi amenya busa chindaalo ndiiti,
chindaalo chichechula butinyu bukali.
Nga khamuli amulikha, ne akelao ooma,
eyuula nga sisiiniini, ne awao.
Wele, siina sikila ololeelele omundu nga oyo?
Siina sikila omureere ebweeni wowo akhalakilwe?
Naanu onyala amia sisiindu similiiu mu siindu sinyaalu?
Se aliio akhaba mulala tawe.
Sikila chindaalo che bulamu bwewe chamalwa khubisibwa,
omanyile bukali bwe kimieesi kie bulamu bwewe,
lundi ewe wamala khumureerao sikelo nisio akhanyala aatuuma tawe.
Khwako laangula mala omulekhe,
mulekhe abe nio asangaale nga omukholi oruungwa buli ndaalo.
Kumurongooro ne kuremwa,
lilieyikina lie khusisina lundi liliio,
mala chinduburi chakwo se chifwa tawe.
Kimili kiakwo kiakhaba ne kikofulila mwiloba,
ne sisina siakwo siakhafwila asi mwiloba,
kwakhaunyilakho busa kameechi, kukhasisine,
mala kurekho chisakia nga kumurongooro kumwaana.
Ne kakhali omundu afwa, ne kumubili kwewe kusiikhwa.
Omundu ne amalile khusuumbukha, aba ali waena?
Nga kameechi ne kawelelela khukhwama mu nyanja,
lundi nga luluuchi ne luteenya mala lwooma,
omundu yesi afwa mala se enyokha lundi tawe,
likulu ne lisiiliio se enyokha tawe,
namwe se asiisimusibwa khukhwama mwiilo liewe tawe.
Ee Wele, andi ungisile e makoombe,
andi ungisile khukhwola nga lirima liowo ne liwa,
wakharobore siise nisio oreereo mala wakhebulila ese.
Eku, kaaba bali omundu afwa, anyala aamenya lundi ku?
Ese ndakhola kimilimo kiase biise biase bioosi,
khukhwola nga ne ndilekhuulwa.
Nono andi okhanaange mala fukiilile,
andi okhekoombe khubona sibuumbe nisio ewe obuumbile.
Nio andi okhabale likeenda liase,
ne se okhaloleelesie bubwoni bwase tawe.
Andi bubi bwase bukhaboelwe mu oochwa,
andi se okhakhebulile bumayaanu bwase tawe.
Ne kakhali sikulu sikwa ne sibulungukha,
ne lulwanda lukhuulikha khukhwama abukono walwo,
kameechi kamakali kalia kamabaale,
kumukhula kucha ne liloba,
mu ngila nga eyo ewe wonakaka lilieyikina lio mundu.
Ewe oulila elala omundu khulwa mindali mala achiila elala,
omukaluukhasia lukoondo lwewe ne omurusiao.
Babaana bewe bakhaebwa lukoosi niye se amanya tawe,
babaana bewe bakhaambwa chisoni niye se abona tawe.
Aulila buchuuni bwe kumubili kwewe bwong'ene,
ne elila omwene.”

Nio Elifasi, Omutemani aakobosia ali,
“Eku, omundu owe limanya anyala aakobosia ne kamakhuwa ke busilu?
Anyala aaba ne chilomo chingali busa ku?
Eku, anyala aaloma kakewe mu lomo chikhali chindayi tawe?
Anyala aaloma kakewe mu makhuwa kakhalimo bukhala tawe?
Ne kakhali ewe se olikho oria Wele tawe,
lundi olikho okhiingilila kamasaba khu Wele.
Bumayaanu bwowo bukhuboolela niko oloma,
khwako ewe orobora khurumikhira lulomo lwe babeeyi.
Kumunwa kwowo kumwene kukhukhalakila ewe, se ndi ese tawe,
kamakhuwa kowo kameene kakhubuula.
Eku, ewe niye omundu owanyoa khusaalwa?
Eku, ewe wasaalwa bikulu ne bisiili khuba mu sibala?
Eku, warekeeresia mu muse kwa Wele?
Ewe wikhola khuuba omukesi weng'ene?
Siina nisio omanyile nisio efwe khukhamanyile tawe?
Siina siili mu mebaasio kowo nisio efwe khukhebaasiakho tawe?
Efwe khuli ne basaakhulu lundi be chimbuchi khu mirwe,
bukhulu bwabwe bukhila bukhulu bwa raraao.
Eku, khuoleelesia khwa Wele khuli khukeekhe lukali khwiwe?
Likhuwa nilio akhuboolela mu kalaa se lili siindu khwiwe tawe?
Siina kumwoyo kwowo ne kukhutiimia,
siina sikila chimoni chowo ne chekesia lirima?
Siina sikila ne waukha khu Wele,
lundi ne olomaloma kamakhuwa nga kameenako?
Omwana owo mukhasi yesi yesi anyala aaba omulayi ku?
Lola, Wele se eyikina akhaba batakatifu bewe tawe,
akhaba likulu se lili likwalaafu ebweeni wewe tawe,
aba kalaba kariena khu mundu busa, omundu ooli sisiindu sie lisinye lundi siibola?
Omundu ookhola bumayaanu oli ne anywa kameechi!
Rekeeresia, mala ese ndakhuboolela
ndakhuboolela niko mboone.
Niko be limanya baaloma,
niko bakuuka babwe bakhaakisa tawe.
Niibo bong'ene nibo Wele aaelesia sibala,
ne omukwa se aababiramo tawe.
Babaandu bamayaanu banaanisibwa mu ndaalo chabwe choosi,
ne khu bakuulumi kimiiko nikio baarekekhelwa kioosi.
Baulila luyoka lwe khuriisia lukali,
mu khuindiaala omwonaki eecha khubebwaakala.
Nibo se basuubila bali balirura mu siilima siabwe tawe,
khumaliilikha khwabwe khuli lifwa lie embalu.
Bayiiyayiiya khuyiima siakhulia mala bareeba bali, ‘Sili waena’?
Bamanyile bali endaalo eye sisiilima eli siimbi khwoola,
kumunaanio ne lirima bibateremia,
bibebwaakala nga omwami owerekekheele liie.
Sikila bakholeele Wele sisiayuumba,
ne khuchiililila khulekelesia Wele Omunyali owa bioosi,
bacha khu khupania Wele ne sileka,
ne ngabo emboofu lundi esiro,
sikila banerire mumoni,
ne khunesia chinda chabwe chosi,
bakhamenye mu ngoba chichanjukhwa,
mu chinju nicho omundu akhakhoyeele khumenyamo tawe,
chinju chiili kamakubili.
Bamayaanu se baliindiaala tawe,
kimiaandu kiabwe se kicha khulama tawe,
namwe se kicha khukucha khu sibala tawe.
Bamayaanu se bakhebache sisiilima tawe,
kumulilo kukhomie chisakia chabwe,
ne ekhuungu ekhabarusieo.
Baba basilu lukali mala beyikina bumayaanu bwabwe,
bumayaanu obwo niibwo buucha khuba kumuruuru kwabwe.
Bakharuungwe siise siabwe ne sikhoola tawe,
ne chisakia chabwe se chikhakaliie lundi tawe.
Bakhabe nga kumusabibu kukhukhumusibwa bibiaamo biakwo ne bisiili biibisi,
nga kumuseituni ne kukhukhumusia bimuli biakwo.
Sikila babaandu bakharia Wele tawe bali nga bakuumba,
ne kumulilo kucha khwosia chingo chichombakhwa khubirira mu asoya.
Baesia bubacha ne khusaala bumayaanu,
kimiooyo kiechula kerekekha bubeeyi buli lwosi.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali,
“Nauliile bibiindu bikali nga bibienebio.
Enywe mweesi muli baoleelesi banaania.
Kamakhuwa kenywe kakhali ne bukhala tawe kali ne sisiakamo ku?
Namwe siina sikila ne muchiililila khuyingana?
Abanga bali enywe niye ese ne ese niye enywe andi nakhalomile niko muloma,
nakhalomile kamakhuwa kamakali khwinywe ne khumuchekheelela.
Nakhamutinyiliisie enywe khulwe khumuboolela kamakhuwa busa,
kamakhuwa kase kakhamuoleelesie enywe.
“Ne ndomaloma, buchuuni bwase se buboomba tawe,
nakhaba ne ndekha khulomaloma, koosi malala busa.
Ng'ali Wele, ewe wamalile ese kamaani,
ewe wonakaake biili siimbi nase bioosi.
Ewe wakholile nabeele omung'au,
ne buno buli buloli khwise,
bung'au bwase bwabeele omusiku wase,
burusia buloli khwise ebweeni wase.
Wele aambiile mala mu lirima liewe andabulaake,
aakhalaliile ese,
omusiku wase aakhoondoola ese.
Babaandu banjekheelela ese,
baakhupa ese chimbi ne khu khuukhoma,
boosi basaangilila ese.
Wele aandekhile ese mu makhono ke babaandu be mbelekeu khu niye,
aamwaatile ese mu bunyali bwe bamayaanu.
Naba mu muleembe, ne kakhali Wele aandonyamo,
aakhamara likosi mala aafuniakakamo.
Buembo bwewe khukhwama buli lubeka bwambotookheleele,
aambunaake chimbiko chase ne se aakholela siisa tawe,
achukha asi endurwe yase.
Wele ambunaka ne elang'anakho,
anjibwaakala nga kunariiria.
Nenabila kamakunia niko nifwara,
ne kamaani kase koosi kawela mu lufuumbi.
Chimoni chase chabesema sikila khulila,
ne bisike biase biekesia sisiilima,
akhaba ese ne ekhakholakho sisiindu siosi siosi simayaanu tawe,
ne lisaba liase lili likwalaafu.
Ee, sibala, okhafuunikha kamafuki kase tawe,
ne okhemia lilila liase nio lilekhe khuuliilikhana tawe.
oyo ooli lubeka lwase ali angaaki lukali.
Basaale base bafwochola,
ne ese ndilila Wele.
Nenya omundu ekoonjelele Wele mu bweyaangu bwase,
bulayi bwene nga omundu ne ekoonjelela mu bweyaangu bwo musaale wewe.
Sikila kimiiko mikeekhe kiri kikiicha,
ndachiila khu ngila niyo khanyala nakobolelakho lundi tawe.”

“Kumwoyo kwase kwafwiile,
chindaalo chase chaweele,
eng'ani yanindiilile.
Ng'ali babanjekheelela bambotookheleele,
ne ese mbaloleelela busa.
Wele, njimeelele,
sikila mbao akhaba mulala oonyala aanjimeelela ese tawe.
Ewe wabamiinyasiisie nio bakhaulila tawe,
khwako se olabalekha bakhile tawe.
Omundu alaanga owasie bakabane kimiaandu,
ne eyi babaana bewe omwene bakikona.
Ne luno ese nekholile siienyameno khu baandu,
mala bafucha kamare khwise.
Chimoni chase se chibona bulayi tawe sikila bubeeleli,
kumubili kwase kwoosi kuli nga sisiiniini.
Baluungi basinyisibwa sikila kano,
bakhali ne bubi basinyisibwa ne babaandu bakharia Wele tawe.
Kakhaba kario baluungi bachiililila khukhola buluungi,
ne abo bakhali banyaalu tawe bachiililila khunyoola kamaani.
Ne kakhali enywe mweesi kobola lundi,
ne ese se ndanyoola mwinywe omundu akhaba mulala ooli omukesi tawe.
Chindaalo chase chaweele ne kamarekekha kase konakibwe,
alala ne liliekoomba liase lie kumwoyo.
Babaandu bano balaanga siilo khuuba kumuusi,
baloma bali, ‘Ne bwilabuule aba bwasieele.’
Naaba ne mbukula e Makoombe khuuba engo wase,
naaba ne naala bulili bwase mu siilima,
naaba ne mboolela eng'ani ndi, ‘Ewe oli paapa,’
namwe enyeende ndi, ‘Ewe oli maayi wase,’
namwe, ‘Ewe oli omukooko wase,’
aba lilieyikina liase lili waena?
Naanu obona lilieyikina liase?
Bioosi nibio neyikina bikhache ne nase emakoombe ku?
Khukhakobole mwiloba fwembi ku?”

Nio Bilitati Omushuhi, aakobosia aaloma ali,
“Eku, olaayaaya ne chilomo khukhwola liina?
Se osilakho fwesi khwalomaloma.
Siina sikila ne okhubukula efwe khuuba nga chikhaafu?
Siina sikila ne okhubukula efwe khuuba basilu ebweeni wowo?
Ewe olikho wetabulakamo sikila lirima liowo wamweene.
Eku, sibala sicha khwanjukhwa sikila ewe?
Namwe wibaasia oli lulwanda lukharusibweo sikila ewe?
ne chinjaso che kumulilo kwabwe se chikhakhosie tawe.
Bulamu bwe bamayaanu,
bukhasime nga etaa.
Likeenda liabwe lie kamaani likhembiisibwe,
ne babeene bakhaambilwe mu mireko kiabwe kimimayaanu.
Sikila likeenda liabwe babeene likhabamwaate mu lutimba,
bakhakwe mwiloo ne balikho bakeenda.
Kimireko kikhabatiile bikele biabwe,
luriimba lukhabaambile elala.
Bakisile kumukoye kumuchwisia asi,
kumureko kwareerwe khu ngila yabwe.
Butinyu bubariikhirisia buli lubeka,
mala bubaloondakho buli abuundu niio bacha.
Kamaani kabwe kabawamo sikila enjala,
ne butinyu bwabaliindiliile.
Lufu lulia kimibili kiabwe,
lifwa libabunia.
Barusibwa khukhwama khu nibio beyikina,
ne bayilwa mu lifwa, liili omwami oriisia.
Kamaeema kabwe se kali kakabwe lundi tawe,
boseliamo bibiindu biiunya bulayi khurusiao bubi.
Kimili kiabwe kilioma,
ne chisakia chabwe chiliniaala.
Babaandu be khu sibala balibebilila,
ne kamasina kabwe se kalikhebulilwa tawe.
Balirusibwa khukhwama mu buwaanga khucha mu siilima,
mala balitimanisibwa khukhwama mu sibala.
Se balirama ne babaana namwe babechukhulu mu baandu babwe tawe,
mala mbao olirama niio bamenyanga tawe.
Abo be mumbo baliuka khu kabekholekhakho,
liiterema likali liliamba abo be ebukwe.
Ng'ali elio nilio limenya lie bamayaanu,
abwenao niio abuundu wabo bakhamanyile Wele tawe.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ne aaloma ali,
“Eku, mulanjuunia kumwoyo khukhwola liina?
Mulanaania ne kamakhuwa khukhwola liina?
Enywe mwakhomile kamakhabi ekhumi,
enywe se mulikho ne chisoni khu khuukholela ese kamabi tawe?
Bwakhaba ne buli bung'ali bali nakhola bumayaanu,
bumayaanu obwo buli bubwase samwene.
Mwaba ng'ali ne mulikho mwefumisilia khwise,
ne mubukula kumunaanio kwase khuuba kumusaango khwise,
manya nono muli Wele aangoseele,
mala andekire ne kumureko kwewe.
Lola, nakhalila ndi, ‘Ndi mu butinyu’ mbao oungobosia tawe,
ndila lukali khulwe buyeeti,
ne kakhali mbao bung'ali tawe.
Wele ekaale chingila chase nio se nyala nabira tawe,
mala areere sisiilima khu ngila chase.
Andusiisiekho luyali lwase,
ne khukhufuula ekuutwa eye bubwami.
Ambumisie buli lubeka mala nauliikhe,
andusisiemo lilieyikina nga orusiao kumurongooro.
Wele akhalaliile,
mala ambala ese khuuba nga omusiku wewe.
Banamae bewe becha alala,
berekekha khukhunjibwaakala
bapa ekambi ne babotookhelesia liiema liase.
Wele aakhola basaale base khu khungaluukhanakho,
ne basaale base banjanjuukhe.
Balebe base ne basaale bandekhile,
bakeni base banjibiliile,
bakholi base be siikhasi bambala ese khuuba omukwa,
nabeele omukwa ebweeni wabwe.
Naanga omukholi wase ne se aangobosia tawe,
nenyekha mwikoonjelele.
Kumuuya kwase nikwo mbeela kuunyila omukhasi wase,
ne babaana ba maayi bambiila ese.
Akhaba babaana bakeekhe bandekelesia ese,
bandafwira ese buli nga bakhupiakho chimoni chabwe.
Basaale base be aembi boosi bambiile,
ne abo nibo nasiima bangaluukhanekho.
Nang'ayile nabeele busa siikhoba ne kamakuumba,
lundi naoneele busa esitere emusia.
Basaale base enywe, kholele siisa! Kholele siisa!
Sikila Wele aakhupile nakwiile asi.
Siina sikila enywe mwesi ne muukhupia ese siibi nga Wele?
Se mwanyaliikhe ne butinyu nibwo ndi nabwo tawe?
Nekoomba ndi kamakhuwa kase kaandikwe!
Nekoomba ndi kaandikwe mu sitabu!
Nekoomba ndi kaandikwe khu lwanda,
kaandikwekho ne kalamu eye sichuuma ne sibia nio kabeekho khulwa mindali.
Sikila ese manyile ndi Omusikuli wase amenyile mindali,
ne ekhumaliilikha acha khuba omusooli wase khu sibala sino.
Akhaba kumubili kwase ne kubola,
ese khabone Wele,
samwene khamubone,
khamubone ne chimoni chase,
kumwoyo kwase kwalindiliile!
Mwaba ne muloma muli, ‘Khulachiililila khumupia niye siibi
sikila niye omwene omanyile sifuno sie butinyu buno,’
khe mumanye muli lifwa khwinywe liliio,
sikila lirima lia Wele lilareera kumunaanio,
nio mumanye muli bukhalaki buliio.”

Nio Sofari, Omunaamati, aakobosia aaloma ali,
“Rekeeresia khuboolele, kamebaasio kase kali kamaboofu,
ndi ne silukuluku sie khu khuboolela.
Liliikiicha liowo lili bukhomo khwise,
ne kumwoyo kwase khubira kamebaasio kaase kumbelesia niko khukobosia.
Enywe, se mumanyile kano khukhwama khale tawe,
se mumanyile muli khukhwama nga omundu ne areebwa khu sibala,
busangaafu bwo omumayaanu buli bwe siise sikeekhe,
ne liliekhoya lio omundu okharia Wele se lili khulwe siise sitiiti busa?
Akhaba buleeyi bwewe bwe sileka ne bwitiila khwikulu,
ne kumurwe kwewe ne kwoola mu maleesi,
akheeywe aweeo khulwa mindali nga biibi biewe,
abo babamubona bakhareebe bali, ‘Ali waena?’
Akhaweo busa nga kamarooro,
akhatibe busa nga kamalola ke siilo.
Chimoni chichamubona se chikhamubone lundi tawe,
se chikhamubonekho lundi ne ali abuundu wewe tawe,
Babaana bewe bakhasabe kumwalaalo khukhwama khu bataambi,
lundi babeene bakhakobosieyo kimiaandu kiewe.
Akhaba ne aaba ne kamaani ke sisoleeli,
koosi kakhakobole mwipukhuulu naye.
Akhaba bumayaanu ne buli bunulu mukhanwa mwewe,
akhaba ne abukisa asi we lulimi lwewe,
akhaba ne akhenya khubulekha tawe,
lundi akhaba ne abukuuta mukhanwa mwewe;
kakhaba kario,
siakhulia esio siluluwa ne sioola munda mwewe,
siba nga buchiba bwe ndemu munda mwewe.
Amila buiinda, ne kakhali alaburusia lundi,
Wele akhabakhole barusie buiinda khukhwama munda chabwe.
Bakhanuune buchiba bwe chindemu,
ne lulimi lwe endemu nafwo lukhamwire.
Se akhamenye lukali khukhwola ekhoyele buiinda bwewe tawe,
chinjichi chichechula bubuukhi ne kamabeele kamabou.
Bakhakobosieyo kamatuunda ke kimilimo kiewe,
ne se bakhabiliekho tawe,
se bakhekhoyele bukhala bwe bubwofuli bwewe tawe,
sikila aapia siibi bataambi lundi aabanaania,
aabanuula nibo chinju ne omwene se aachombakha tawe.
Sikila kumuluungo kwewe se kuola tawe,
se aabiikhakho sisiindu siosi siosi nisio aasiima tawe.
Ne alia, mbao nisio asikasia tawe,
khwako buiinda bwewe se buchiililila tawe.
Aba nende buli siindu nisio eenya ne butinyu bumukwakho,
butinyu bukali bumukwakho.
Omumayaanu alia ne ekura lukali,
ne kakhali Wele acha khumurumira lirima liewe,
kumunaanio kumukali oli efula kukhamubeekho kube nga siakhulia siewe.
Ne eebacha embalu eye sichuuma,
buembo bwe kumukasa bukhamulase akwe.
Buembo bubonekha khukhwama mu mukoongo kwewe,
bubwoki buumeniuukha bukhabonekhe khukhwama mu mbiko chewe,
lundi biriisio bie lifwa bikhamuambe.
Sisiilima sikali silindiilila kimiaandu kiewe,
kumulilo kukhabwanwa no omundu tawe kukhamubunie,
bioosi bibiarama munju mwewe bikhosibwe.
Likulu lilibuula bumayaanu bwabwe,
ne sibala silibakaluukhanakho.
Kimiaandu kie munju chewe kikhasutwe,
kikhamwaatwe aleeyi endaalo eye burafu bwa Wele.
Kuno nikwo kumuruuru nikwo omundu omumayaanu anyoola khukhwama khu Wele,
kumukabwa nikwo Wele aakhalaka khulwo omumayaanu.”

“Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali,
Rekeeresia bulayi kamakhuwa kase,
ne lekha lino libe khulwe khu khumboleelesia ese.
Njekhaliilikhe mala ndomalome,
ne malile khulomaloma, chiililila khu khunjekhelela.
Ne kakhali ese, lilieloocha liase se lili khu baandu tawe,
aba se ndi ne sifuno sie khutaamba liliekhaliilikha?
Khe mubone butinyu bwase, mala mulauka,
mulara kamakhono kenywe emunwa sikila khukhwesiindukha.
Ne nibaasia khu kano, mba ne buuri bukali,
ne mbaambwa ne bireengo bikali.
Siina sikila babaandu bamayaanu ne bachiililila khumenya?
Sikila siina ne boola mu bukhulu mala baba ne bunyali?
Babaana babwe baindiaala nibo ne baboone,
lisaaye liabwe lichoa nibo ne baliio.
Chingo chabwe chili ne kumuleembe,
ne siiukuumo sia Wele se sibalikho tawe.
Chiuunwa chabwe se chikhilwa khuoona tawe,
ne bisoonga biabwe bisaala ne se biuusia tawe.
Babaana babwe batiiti batima ne khukhwinyaa nga kamameeme,
babaana babwe bakhina eng'oma.
Bakhina khulwe kimienya kie chitamburini ne biilili,
bekhoyela khu khuupa khwe kumulele.
Bamenya limenya lie buiinda,
lundi bafwa ne bali mu muleembe.
Bamayaanu baboolela Wele bali, ‘Khurureo, khulekhe khube!
Se khwenya khumanya chingila chowo tawe.
Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye naanu nio efwe khumukholele?
Ne efwe khulanyoola bukhala siina ne khumusaba niye?’
Ng'ali khuindiaala khwe bamayaanu se khuli mu bunyali bwabwe?
Kamarekekha kabwe se kali aleeyi ne Wele?
Eku, khukhwola khenga bamayaanu ne bafwa matundubiikha?
Khukhwola khenga ne banyoola butinyu?
Khukhwola khenga ne baukuumwa sikila lirima lia Wele?
Khukhwola khenga ne baba nga chikhaanja mu mbeo?
Khukhwola khenga ne baba nga likhuuchi nilio ekhuungu esuta?
Enywe muloma muli, ‘Wele aelesia omwana siiukuumo sikila bumayaanu bwa raraawe.’
Tawe! Lekha Wele aelesie omumayaanu omwene siiukuumo nio omumayaanu oyo amanye lino!
Lekha omumayaanu omwene eebonelekho libuna liewe,
lekha banaanisibwe ne lirima lia Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.
Omumayaanu enaana siina khu lisaaye liewe nilio alalekha enyuma,
endaalo eye lifwa liewe ne yolile?
Eku, aliio onyala ekisia Wele limanya?
Wele se ali niye okhalakilanga akhaba abo baali angaaki lukali?
Omundu mulala afwa ne aindiaalile lukali,
afwa ne ali mu bukoote ne mu buliindi,
afwa ne ali omunefu,
afwa kamakuumba kewe ne kali ne kamaani.
Omundu okundi afwa ne ali ne bubeeleli mu mwoyo kwewe,
se achanjamakho buiinda bwosi bwosi tawe.
Kakhaba kario, boosi bakhakone mwiloba,
mala chinyeende chibalie boombi.
Lola, ese manyile kamebaasio kenywe koosi,
ne kamarekekha kenywe ke khu khuukholela ese kamabi.
Sikila mureeba muli, ‘Nono enju yo mundu omukali eyo eli waena?
Enju niyo omumayaanu oyo aamenyangamo eli waena?’
Eku, se mwareebakho babaandu bachichanga chingeendo tawe?
Se mufukiilila buloli bwabwe?
Omundu omumayaanu se alekhwangwa khu ndaalo eye butinyu?
Se asikulwangwa khu ndaalo eye burafu?
Naanu okaania bikholwa biewe mu moni chewe?
Naanu onyala amuruungia khu niko akholile?
Ne alikho asutwa khuyilwa sia ng'ani,
siliindwa siewe siba ne baliindi.
Liloba lie mu ng'ani limubeela lilayi,
babaandu boosi bamuloondakho,
ne abo bamuraangirira se babalikha tawe.
Khwako enywe mulamboleelesia ese muriena ne kamakhuwa kakhalimo bukhala tawe?
Mbao liramire khu makobosia kenywe tawe ne bukhali bubeeyi bwong'ene!”

Nio Elifasi Omutemani aakobosia aaloma ali,
Ng'ali oyo ooli ne limanya ali ne bukhala khu mwene yeng'ene.
Eku, ewe wibaasia oli khubirira mu khuba omuluungi onyala wasaangaasia Wele?
Namwe buli bukhala khu niye ewe waaba ne okhalikho ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe?
Eku, Wele akhuukuuma lundi akhukhalakila ewe
khulwe buluungi bwowo?
Tawe, lili sikila bumayaanu bwowo buli bukali!
Bubwoni bwowo buli bukali po!
Ewe waraakho bawandaayo kamakobi ka busa,
lundi wabafuula chingubo chabwe mala barama sichula.
Ewe se waelesia be bulesia kameechi baanywa tawe,
lundi wemana be njala siakhulia.
Ewe waeleesie omundu owe kamaani kamaloba,
walekhile omundu niye osiimiliisiemo amenyemo.
Walekhile banamulekhwa makhono mataaka,
se wayeetile bafuubi tawe.
Khwako kimireko kiakhubotookheelele ewe,
ne buuri bukali bwakhuambile ewe.
Buwaanga bwabeele sisiilima khwiwe, khwako se onyala wabona tawe,
ne kameechi kamakali kakhufuuniikhe!
Ng'ali Wele ali mwikulu angaaki,
lola nga ching'enieesi che angaaki lukali ne chili aleeyi!
Kakhaba kario ewe oreeba oli, ‘Wele amanyile siina?
Anyala aabona khubirira mu mafuumbi kamasiro khu khukhalakila?
Kamafuumbi kamasiro kamukhiingilila niye khubona,
ne akeenda, abotookhelela mu ngaaki mwong'ene.’
Eku, ewe olaloonda engila eye khaale,
niyo babaandu bamayaanu baakeendelakho?
Babaandu abo barusibwao siise siabwe ne sisiili khwoola,
kumusiingi kwabwe kwasutwa ne kumukhula.
Baboolela Wele bali, ‘Khurureo,
siina nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala akhola kwifwe?’
Ne kakhaba kario, Wele niye owechusia mu chinju chabwe bibiindu bilayi,
ne kakhali kamebaasio ke bamayaanu kaukhana ne kakewe.
Babaandu baluungi babona kameene ako mala basangaala,
ne baakhali ne bubi tawe nabo babachekha.
Baloma bali, ‘Ng'ali basiku befwe babunisiibwe,
ne nibio balekha kumulilo kwabiosiisie.’
Nono Ayubu, fukiilisiana ne Wele mala obe ne kumuleembe,
mu ngila yino olaba bulayi.
Fukiilila kamekisio kewe,
mala osuubile kamakhuwa kewe.
Waaba ne wiboombia wamwene,
mala wakobola khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lundi warusia mungo mwowo bumayaanu,
waaba ne okhawesielia bukesi khu miiandu kiowo tawe,
lundi obukule esahabu eye ofiri nga kamabaale ke mu luuchi,
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi aaba ne ali niye esahabu yowo,
lundi efwesa yowo eye bukhala bwe angaaki,
okhasangaalile mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala omweyine khulwe buyeeti.
Okhamusabe mala akhuulile,
nawe okhaliinde lisuubisia liowo khu niye.
Koosi niko wenya khukhola kakhanyalikhe,
lundi buwaanga bukhakhosie khu ngila chowo.
Sikila Wele aboombianga babebonia,
ne kakhali aonianga abo babeboombia.
Wele asikulanga abo bakhali ne bubi tawe,
khwako ewe olasikulwa bikholwa biowo biaaba ne biikhali biibi tawe.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia aaloma ali,
“Aakhaba luno khukhwiloocha khwase khuli khurafu,
kumunaanio kwa Wele khwise kuli kumukali akhaba ne ndikho ndila.
Abaanga bali manyile abuundu niio nyala nanyoola Wele,
andi nachiile niio ali!
Andi namubooleele niye ekesi eeli khwise,
andi namubooleele niye niko ndi nako.
Andi nakhamanyile kamakhuwa niko akhangoboosie,
ne khuulila ako niko akhamboolele.
Eku, Wele akhayingane ne nase ne bunyali bwewe bukali?
Tawe, akhandekeeresie.
Abwenao omundu owa ng'ali anyala aaboolela Wele ekesi yewe,
ne ese khoya naonisibwa no mukhalaki wase khulwa mindali.
Lola, nja ebweeni, ne kakhali Wele se aliio tawe,
ngobola enyuma, ne kakhali se mubona tawe,
muyiima lubeka lwe kumukhono kumukhasi ne kakhali se mupiakho emoni tawe,
ngobola lubeka lwe kumukhono kumuseecha ne kakhali se mubona tawe.
Ne kakhali niye amanyile engila niyo njiilakho,
ne amalile khukhuukhaka ndaba omukwalaafu nga esahabu.
Namuloondilekho buli abuundu mu bweyikinwa,
naloondile engila yewe ne se naukhekho tawe.
Se nalekha kamalaka kewe niko aandaka tawe,
nasuubila kamalaka kewe.
Ne kakhali niye se ali okaluukhana tawe,
ne naanu onyala aamukaluukhania?
Nilio niye enya, liliene elio nilio akhola.
Sikila acha khukhola nisio andekekhela,
ne endekekha ng'eneyo eli ndala khu biindu bikali nibio ali nabio mu mebaasio kewe khwise.
Khwako ndi ne buuri ebweeni wewe,
ne nibaasiakho busa ndi, mba ne buuri sikila niye.
Wele aakholile nabeele omuri,
Owe Bunyali Bwoosi aandikhiriisie.
Sikila nabotookheleelwe ne sisiilima,
ne sisiilima sikali siafuumile ese.

“Siina sikila Wele ne akharao siise sie bukhalaki tawe,
ne siina sikila abo bamumanyile ne bakhabona chindaalo nga echo chirio tawe?
Babaandu benyosiao chinjakha che kamaloba,
bayaaya bibiaayo ne khubiaaya.
Banuula bafuubi chipunda chabwe,
baapa kumusiingo ekhaafu eya namulekhwa.
Bakhiingilila baabanani nio bakhakholelwa bung'ali bwabwe tawe,
bataambi be mu sibala boosi babekisakho.
Bataambi bali nga chipunda che mu sichiimi,
barura ne bacha khukhola kimilimo,
bayiima siakhulia mu sichiimi,
bayiima siakhulia khulwe babaana babwe.
Bataambi bakesa biakhulia biabwe mu mikuunda kiabeene,
lundi bangalisia kimisabibu kie bamayaanu.
Siilo bakona sichula,
lundi se bali ne sisibiimbilo mu mbeo tawe.
Efula eye mu bikulu ebatosia,
mala bebaanda busa mu ndulo mwe kamabaale khukheyikama.
Babaandu bamayaanu nabo banunula omwana omufuubi khwituru lia maawe ne kamaani,
baapa omwana oyo kumusiingo khulwe kamakobi ka maawe.
Bataambi bakeenda sichula ne se bali ne chingubo tawe,
enjala ebalia, aakhaba ne bakesa biakhulia.
Bakhamulula kamafura khukhwama mu misabibu kie bamayaanu,
batiing'a endali khukhwama mu matuunda ke kimisabibu,
ne kakhali baulila bulesia.
Babaandu baali siimbi khufwa balilila mu lukoba,
ne kumwoyo kwoyo niye baunile kulilila buyeeti,
ne kakhaba kario Wele se enaana khu lisaba liabwe tawe.
“Baliio babaandu bamayaanu baaloba buwaanga,
baakhamanyile chingila chabwo tawe,
lundi se benya baloonde chingila echo tawe.
Omwiiri enyokha makhelebeende,
nio ache eere omutaambi nende omubanani,
ne siilo omwiiri chana oyo aba omwifwi.
Aakhaba emoni eyo mueeyi yosi elindiilila sisiilima,
ne aloma ali, ‘Mbao emoni ekane yimbone tawe’
mala akisa bubweeni bwewe.
Mu siilima bafuna chinju,
ne kumuusi beyikaliilila munju,
se bamanyile buwaanga tawe.
Khu nibo boosi sisiilima sikali sili kumutikhinyi,
sikila nibo basiima biriisio bie sisiilima sikali.
“Ewe oloma oli, ‘Babaandu baabi bali nga lunyaasi luyilwa khangu ne kameechi,
Wele aalaama kimikuunda kiabwe,
se aliio oocha khukhola mu misabibu kiabwe lundi tawe.’
Siimiyu ne kumuumu biomia kameechi ke barafu,
Emakoombe yosi eyuula erio babooni.
Bamaawabwe babaasaala babeebilila,
kamasina kabwe se kakhebuliilwa lundi tawe,
nono bumayaanu bufunikha nga kumurongooro ne kuremwa.
“Banaania omukhasi omukuumba ookhali ne omwana tawe,
lundi se bakholela namulekhwa kamalayi tawe.
Kakhaba kario Wele mu bunyali bwewe eera babaami bakuluumi,
benyokha ne bakhali ne lilieyikina lie khuuba balamu tawe.
Wele anyala aabalekha bebaasia bali bali mu muleembe,
ne kakhali aloleelela chingila chabwe.
Bafumikha mu sise sikeekhe ne bawao,
booma ne khuwao nga enyoonyi,
lundi barusibwao nga bikala bie ngaanu.
Kaaba bali se kali kario tawe, naanu onyala ekesia ali ese omubeeyi,
ne khukhwekesia ali mbaamo siindu mu niko ndomaloma tawe?”

Nio Bilitati, Omushuhi, aaloma ali,
“Bubwami ne buuri bili khu Wele,
araao kumuleembe mwikulu mwewe angaaki.
Eku, aliio oonyala aabala banamae bewe?
Eku, aliio abuundu niio buwaanga bwewe bukhakhosianga tawe?
Khwako, omundu anyala aaba omuluungi ebweeni wa Wele ku?
Omundu owasaalwa busa anyala eebala khuuba omukwalaafu ku?
Lola, ebweeni wewe aakhaba kumwesi se kuli ne buwaanga bukali tawe,
lundi ching'enieesi se chili chingwalaafu tawe.
Khwako omundu ooli enyeende busa naye aba ali omulabufu lukali po!
Omundu busa, omundu ooli siroboto!”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia ali,
“Ng'ali ewe wayeetile lukali oyo okhali ne bunyali tawe!
Lundi waoniisie lukali omundu ookhali ne kamaani tawe!
Ewe wakelekeele lukali oyo ookhali na limanya tawe,
ne khuaana likaambila lilayi!
Olomaloome kamakhuwa kano mu buyeeti bwa naanu?
Okhwimeeleele mu khulomaloma ali roho owa naanu?”
“Bafu be emakoombe asi baterema,
bateremela mu meechi ke mu lusiba asi we sibala.
Emakoombe eli khwaasie busa ebweeni wa Wele.
Se siliio sinyala siamukhiingilila niye khubona tawe.
Wele akalaasia embaka eye likulu ebunaswa abuundu aali busa,
mala akhwiikha sibala mu ngaaki abuundu niio sisiindu siosi siosi sikhali tawe.
Wele abuusianga kameechi mu mafuumbi kewe kamasiro,
ne kameechi ako se katabula kamafuumbi tawe.
Akhiingaanga kumwesi kuangaale,
akubiimbangakho lifuumbi liewe.
Aareere engara eye lulwakha khu meechi,
nga lulwakha akari we buwaanga ne sisiilima.
Chinjeko che likulu chiterema,
lundi chiuka lukali sikila khurafua khwa Wele.
Aasisia enyanja khulwe bunyali bwewe,
mala aabunia kukuundu Rahabu khulwe limanya liewe.
Aakwalaasia likulu khulwe kumuuya kwewe,
ne kumukhono kwewe kweera kuremu kukwaba ne kwiilukha.
Bino bili busa bilala khu bikholwa bikali bie bunyali bwewe,
kano kali matiiti busa niko khuulilangakho!
Ne kakhali naanu oonyala aamanya bukali bwe bunyali bwewe?”

Mala Ayubu aachiililila khuloma kamakhuwa kewe ali,
“Nga Wele ne amenyile mindali, Wele oumbukuulekho bung'ali bwase,
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi oukholile ese nabeelela,
ne naaba ne siili omulamu,
mala Wele aaba ne asimbeelesia ese bulamu,
kumunwa kwase se kuliloma lie bubeeyi tawe,
ne lulimi lwase se lucha khuba lwe bubacha tawe.
Se ndilomakho ndi enywe muloma bung'ali tawe,
khukhwola lifwa liase,
ese se khalekhe khukhwebuula khuuba ookhalikho ne bubi tawe tawe.
Ese ndi omuluungi elala, ne se ndilekha khuloonda buluungi tawe,
kumwoyo kwase se kunjikiichakho mu bulamu bwase bwoosi tawe.
“Lekha omusiku wase anyoole siiukuumo sie bamayaanu,
ne lekha oyo oumbiila aukuumwe nga ookhali omuluungi tawe.
Sikila lieyikina siina liliio khu mundu ookhamanyile Wele tawe, Wele ne amubumbuluule,
Wele ne abukula bulamu bwewe?
Eku, Wele alaulila khulila khwewe
butinyu ne bulimukwakho?
Eku, alasangaalila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Akhasabe Wele biise bioosi?
Lekha ese mweyikie khuloondekhana ne Bunyali bwa Wele,
mala ninoosie niko Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi arekekha.
Enywe mweesi mwabuboone mwabeene,
nono siina sikila ne mweluyia mu khuloma kamakhuwa ka busa?”
“Kuno nikwo kumukabwa kwo mundu ooli omumayaanu khu Wele,
nikwo bakuluumi banyoola khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babaana bewe baakhakucha, bakhafwiile mwiie,
ne lisaaye liewe se likhabe ne siakhulia siboola tawe.
Abo baona ako bakhafwe lufu,
ne banamulekhwa babwe se bakhabalile nibo tawe.
Aakhaba ne babuusia efwesa nga kumuyekhe ekhabalikha tawe,
ne khubuusia chingubo chingali,
banyala bachibuusia,
ne kakhali baluung'i bakhachifware,
ne abo bakhalikho ne bubi tawe bakhakabane efwesa.
Bombakha chinju chabwe chiili busa nga biswi,
nga khasali nikho omuliindi owe mukuunda ombakha.
Bakona siyiinda lulala lwong'ene,
ne benyokha aba kimiaandu kiabwe kiachiile.
Biriisio bibapwookhakho nga kumukhula
oli siilo, sisifuusia sibasuta.
Ekhuungu eye ebukwe ebasuta angaaki ne bawao,
ebarusia abuundu wabwe.
Ebauucha ne kamaani ne se eli ne siisa tawe,
bakhaka khukhwilukha khukhwama khu bunyali bwayo.
Ekhuungu ebaapila chimbi mu khubachekheelela,
lundi buli abuundu niio bacha ebariisia khulwe liiulukhuma liayo.”

“Ng'ali efwesa eli ne liloo nilio bakiyabamo,
ne esahabu abuundu we khukikwalaasiliao.
Sichuuma sirusibwanga mwiloba,
ne koopa mu mabaale kayengusiibwe.
Babaandu baayaba kamabaale ke buukusi bwe angaaki bareeranga chitaa mu sisiilima,
bamenieelesianga mu bibale bie kamaloo kamaleeyi lukali,
ne khuyaba kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki mu siilima sikali.
Balima kamaloo mwitooma sinaao khukhwama niio babaandu bamenyile,
beebililwa, se aliio oobirirao tawe,
besungwacha, bali aleeyi khukhwama niio babaandu bali.
Khukhwama mwiloba biakhulia binyoolekhamo,
ne kakhali bibiindu biili asi walio bikaluukhanisibwa oli manya ne kumulilo.
Kamabaale kalio kalimo kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki kamabuusi,
ne lipukhuulu lialio lilimo esahabu.
“Mbao engosia emanyile engila ng'eneyo tawe,
aakhaba emoni eya wasio ekhakibonakho tawe.
Chisaang'i chindafu se chaikiswaalakho tawe,
aakhaba etalang'i se yaikibirirakho tawe.
Omundu asiuulanga kamabaale kamaandalafu po,
asiuubula bikulu khukhwola khu bibale biabio.
Eekulanga bibaanga mu chinyaanda,
ne emoni yewe ebonanga buli libaale lie bukusi bwe angaaki.
Ayaba khunyoola binoko bie kameechi,
ne sisiindu sisiekisa asi asibakala abuwaanga.
“Ne kakhali limanya lilanyoolekha waena?
Abuundu we limanya niio waena?
Se aliio omundu oomanyile engila eye khukhwolela limanya tawe,
lundi se linyoolekhana mu sibala sie balamu tawe.
Chisiba chiloma chili, ‘Limanya se lili mwifwe tawe,’
ne enyanja nayo eloma eli, ‘Se lili ne nase tawe.’
Limanya se linyala liakulwa khulwe sahabu tawe,
aakhaba efwesa engali se nyala yaanwa nga bukusi bwalio tawe,
Limanya se linyala lialeekhasibwa ne bukhala bwe sahabu eya Ofiri tawe,
namwe bukhala bwe kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki ka Satoniki namwe kamabuusi tawe.
Esahabu ne bikiio se bilekhaana nalio tawe
namwe se linyala liakulaanwa ne kamamili ke sahabu enosie tawe.
Bukusi bwe limanya se bulekhaanisibwa ne bukusi bwe kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki ke mu nyanja namwe kang'enang'ena tawe.
Kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki ke mu nyanja kaakhosia ne kali mu buwaanga se kakhila limanya tawe.
Libaale lie Kushi se likelaanisibwa nalio tawe,
lundi se lilekhaanisibwa ne sahabu enosie tawe.
“Nono limanya liama waena?
Ne sinoko sie limanya sili waena?
Liakisibwa khukhwama khu buli siindu sie bulamu,
lundi liakisibwa khukhwama khu nyuni chipurukhanga.
Emakoombe ne Lifwa biloma bili,
‘Khwaulilakho busa khuloondekhana ne limanya ne kamaru kefwe.’
“Wele amanyile engila eye limanya,
lundi amanyile niio limanya lili.
Sikila niye abonanga bibiakamo bie sibala,
lundi abonanga buli siindu asi we likulu.
Nga aelesia embeo busiro bwayo,
ne khukhalakila kameechi lulwakha lwako,
nga aakhalaka niio efula enyala yakwa yoola,
ne engila niyo lueni ne lubalukha lukhoya khuloonda,
Wele aabona limanya mala aalikela,
aalirao mala alimenieelesia.
‘Lola, khuuria Omwami Wele nilio limanya,
ne khulekha bumayaanu khuli khuuba ne limanya.’ ”

Ayubu lundi aachiililila ne lilomaloma liewe aaloma ali,
Ee, andi ndi nga naba khaale,
nga mu ndaalo nicho Wele aanindanga,
nga Wele ne aaba nase buli lwoosi,
nio ese nakeenda mu siilima sikila buwaanga bwewe,
andi ndi nga naba mu ndaalo che buiinda bwase,
biise nibio buliindi bwa Wele bwaba munju mwase.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi aaba ne nase,
ne babaana base baaba nase bangarire.
Chindaalo echo nga naba ne naindiaala lukali,
lundi naba ne kamafura kamakali khukhwama mu miseituni,
nga nachichanga asilibwa mu siikhasio sie basaakhulu be lukoba,
nga nekhalanga khu ndebe yase abuundu we bibiikhasio, q
baele bambonanga mala bandekhela engila,
ne basaakhulu benyokhanga mala beema khukhuumbelesia ese liria.
Babaami nabo balekhanga khulomaloma,
ne khuusuta kamakhono kabwe nio babaandu basile busa.
Babaandu be lukoosi basilanga busa,
se baalomangakho sisiindu tawe.
Buli mundu owaulilangakho efuma yase, aalomanga kamalayi khuloondekhana nase,
akhaba babaambonanga bosi baalomanga bario.
Sikila ese nayeeta bataambi babaasaba buyeeti,
lundi bafuubi bakhaaba nende oobayeeta tawe.
Abo bababechanga siimbi khufwa bambelesianga chikhabi,
ne nakilanga banamulekhwa ne beemba kimienya kie khoyo.
Buluungi bwaba engubo yase,
nakhalakanga bung'ali mala bwambaakho nga ekaanjo ne kofiyo yase.
Khu babofu, ese naba chimoni,
ne khu baleme, bikele.
Khu babanani, ese naba raarawabwe,
lundi ese nakhalakilanga bareende mu bung'ali.
Nafunaka bunyali bwe babaandu bakhali baluungi tawe,
lundi nasikulanga nibo baaba ne baambile.
Nio nebaasia ndi, Ese khafwiile munju mwase,
lundi khamenye siise sileeyi lukali,
nga kumurongooro nikwo chiisi chakwo choola khu meechi,
lundi nikwo chisakia chakwo chibechanga ne luume siilo sioosi.
Lukoosi lwase se lwawechanga tawe,
lundi nabechanga ne kamaani biise bioosi.
Babaandu bandekeeresianga, mala baliinda,
basilanga busa ne baliindile mbakaambile.
Nga namalanga khulomaloma, nibo se balomalomakho lundi tawe,
mala elomo yase yabasiimisianga.
Banindiililanga ese oli baaliindiilila efula,
baba nga balimi baliindiilila efula eye kumunaane.
Nabamunamunilanga ne batibisie lilieyikina,
busangaafu bwase bwabaelesianga kamaani.
Nabemeelelanga ne khubekesia engila,
nabamenyangamo nga omwami mu banamae bewe,
lundi nabaoleelesianga oli ooleelesia baali mu masika.

“Ne kakhali luno banjekheelela,
babaandu nibo ese khulila,
baraara babwe se nababona khuuba babolaana
khubara alala ne chimbwa chiliinda bibiaayo biase tawe.
Eku, kamaani ke kamakhono kaabwe abeele kanjeeta siina?
Babaandu nibo kamaani kaba ne kaweele?
Sikila butaambi ne enjala engali,
baakukuna liloba liliomu lundi lilianjukhwa.
Baa chinyenyi ne kamasaafu ke mundaa
mala balia aakhaba kimili kie kimirongooro kie biyeywe.
Baoonwa khukhwama mu baandu,
babaandu baabayokelela oli manya ne bayokelela babeefwi.
Liabayingilila bamenye khu ndulo khwe chingulu ne mumatooma,
mu maloo asi ne mu mabina ke mu mabaale.
Balilila mundaa nga chisaang'i,
beumba alala niio bisaala biakhuumba.
Baba sipupu sie be siyiingwa!
Babaapwa ne khuoonwa khukhwama mu maloba.
“Nono luno beemba khu khunjekheelela ese,
ese ndi siienyameno khu nibo.
Bambiila, banjibebeea,
nga bambonakho busa ne bafuucha kamare ebweeni wase.
Sikila Wele aamalile kamaani ne khu khuumbaambia chisoni,
babeele balekhuule khukhola khwise koosi niko beenya.
Sipupu siaamila kumukhono kwase kumuseecha khu khuunjibwaakala,
baakhupa ese asi ne khurekekha chingila che libuna liase.
Bonakaka engila yase,
batasa butinyu bwase,
ne se aliio yesi yesi oobakaania tawe.
Beecha oli manya ne babirira mu sibaanga sibalaayi,
basendekhelela ebweeni khangu nga bibuli enyuma we liliibwaakala.
Bireengo bikali bingwakho,
lukoosi lwase luwao oli manya ne lusutilwe ne khuungu,
buiinda bwase bwaweleo nga lifuumbi.
“Nono luno bulamu bwase bulikho buwa,
chindaalo che engunyi chanjolilekho.
Siilo kamakuumba kase koosi kachuuna,
buchuuni bubuunjuuna se buolakho tawe.
Wele aandiliile mu ngubo chase ne kamaani,
aakhamaare ne kamaani khwikosi khwe ngubo yase.
Wele aamwaatile mu matosi,
ese nabeele nga lipukhuulu ne likokhe.
Ese khulilila ne kakhali se ungobosia tawe,
niima khu khusaaya, ne kakhali se umbulila tawe.
Ewe wangaluukhaanekho wabeele omurafu lukali khwise,
ewe ukhupia ese siibi mu bunyali bwowo.
Ewe umwaata mu khuungu ne yimbuucha,
mala umwaata eyi ne eyi mu mbembeesi eye kamaani.
Ng'ali, manyile ndi okhambile busa mu lifwa,
abuundu niio balamu boosi bakhalakwa khukhwakaanana.
“Kakhaba kario, omundu se akaluukhana khu babanani
ne basaba buyeeti butinyu ne bubakwiilekho tawe.
Eku, ese se nalilila oyo owaba mwimenya lie butinyu?
Se nakholela siisa sikali bataambi?
Ne kakhali nga naenja kamalayi, bumayaanu bwecha,
lundi nga nalindiilila buwaanga, sisiilima siecha.
Kumwoyo kwase kuunaania, ne se kweoleelesia tawe,
chindaalo che butinyu chanjichilekho.
Ese mbubuuka eyi ne eyi mu ngunyi,
ninyokha ne niima mu siikhasio ne khusaba buyeeti.
Ese ndi wandaaye owe bisuuche,
lundi owasie owe chinyeefwe.
Sikhoba siase simaliia ne khukhwobukha,
ne kamakuumba kaase kabila sikila kumureengo.
Lituungu liase liabeele lie khu khuupa kumwenya kwe kamasika,
ne kumulele kwase khu mumilo kwaabo baalila.”

“Nakholile endakaano ne chimoni chase,
khwako naama ndiena nekoomba omukhaana owe yabwana?
Ese khanyoole siina khukhwama khu Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi?
Ne kumukabwa kwase khukhwama khuyo Owe Bunyali Bwoosi kuli siina?
Eku, butinyu se bukwa khu bakhali ba ng'ali tawe,
ne libuna khwaabo bakhola bumayaanu tawe?
Eku, se abona chingila chase,
ne khubala bikele biase bioosi tawe?
“Naaba ne ngendeele mu bumayaanu,
ne sikele siase sienyoeleesie khubea babaandu,
lekha ngelwe khu sikelo siili abwene,
lekha Wele amanye bung'ali bwase!
Kaaba bali sikele siase siaba siauukhe khu ngila,
ne kumwoyo kwase kwaloondeleele kameelu ke chimoni chase,
lundi kaaba bali lisaanda liosi liosi liaba liaandile khu makhono kaase,
lekha ese miiche mala okundi abilie,
lundi lekha nibio namiicha bikhuulwake.
“Kumwoyo kwase kwaaba ne kwiikoomba omukhasi,
namwe naaba ne nebuulila a muliango kwo owasiase,
lekha omukhasi wase asieele okundi,
lekha baseecha babaandi bakone naye.
Sikila okwo kwakhabeele kumusaango kumumayaanu,
nikwo bakhalaki khukhwola barusie bukhalaki.
Sikila okwo kuli kumulilo kutirira emakoombe,
mala kwosia buli sisiindu nisio endi nasio.
Naaba ne naloba khurekeeresia omukholi wase owe siseecha namwe owe siikhasi,
ne anjiloochela mu bung'ali bwewe,
khakhole siina Wele ne akhalakila ese?
Nga akhandeebe, khamukobosie ndiena?
Oyo owambuumba ese munda mwa maayi,
se ali niye owabuumba bakholi base boosi tawe ku?
“Ese naloba khuelesia bataambi nisio beenya,
namwe nakila banamulekhwa bafwa kumwoyo?
Ese nalia siakhulia siase seng'ene,
ne bafuubi baonga enjala?
Tawe! Khukhwama mu buele bwase ese nabeele omulesi wabwe,
khukhwama butoro ese nemeleele banamulekhwa.
Kaaba bali nabona omundu ne afwa sikila se ali ne chingubo tawe,
namwe omutaambi ne ali sichula,
mala naye aasabila ese chikhabi ne khu khuukhupila ese orio ne kumwoyo kwoosi,
aakhaba ese ne khamuelesie niye luluuya lwe chingubo che bufuumbo bwe kamakheese kaase tawe?
Kaaba bali narikhirisia omufuubi mu koti,
nemanyile ndi bakhalaki balaba lubeka lwase,
lekha libeka liase likhongokhe,
ne lekha kumukhono kwase kufunikhe khukhwamila mu mayi.
Sikila naria ndi Wele anyala andeerera butinyu,
ese se nyala neema ebweeni we bukali bwewe tawe.
“Eku, ese nareere lilieyikina liase mu sahabu,
namwe nabooleele esahabu engwalaafu ndi, ‘Ewe oli buliindi bwase?’
Eku, ese nasangaalila bukali bwe kimiaandu kiase,
namwe nebonia sikila bikali nibio kamakhono kaase kanyoolile?
Kaaba bali nalola khu nyanga ne efwa,
namwe kumwesi mu chelecheenje yakwo,
mala kumwoyo kwase kwakhweeswa khubisaaya mu bwikisi,
nio ese nekwayila kamakhono kaase mu khubifumia nibio,
buno bwosi buli bumayaanu bukhoyela siiukuumo sie bakhalaki,
sikila aba naba omubeeyi khu Wele Owe Angaaki.
“Eku, ese nasangaaliile khubuna khwo musiku wase,
namwe nekhoya nga butinyu ne bwamukwakho?
Tawe! Se nafukiilila kumunwa kwase khumwenyela niye kamabi,
khulwe khumulaama afwe tawe.
Bakholi base boosi balomelanga busa abuwaanga,
buli mukeni ali omulekhuule khukhwicha mungo mwase.
Ooli khu lukeendo se akona khungila enje we nju yase tawe,
nekuulilao oyo owaba ne abira khu ngila.
Eku, ese nakisile kamabi kase nga babaandu babaandi?
Eku, ese nalobile khukhweyama bubwoni bwase?
Se naria khukhwima ebweeni we sipupu sie babaandu,
namwe nasila busa namwe nefungila munju,
bali sikila nariire birikhirisio ne kileki yabwe tawe.
Ee, abanga bali omundu oundekeeresia aliio!
Nyala napa kumuuri kwase khu buli siindu nisio ndomile.
Lekha Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi aangobosie.
Ee, abanga bali naboolela basiku base bare kamasitako kabwe khwise mu buandike!
Ng'ali nakhakasutile khwibeka khwase,
nakhaketiuukhile nga ekuutwa.
Andi nakhabaliile Wele buli siindu nisio nakhola,
andi muchiileyo ne ndi ne kamaani nga omwana owo mwami.
Naaba ne neeba kamaloba niko miichangamo,
ne khukhola kimifurechi kiako kilile,
sikila nyoolela bukhala mu biaamo biako ne se mbaana kumuruungo tawe,
mala ndeera lifwa khu beene maloba,
khwako lekha kamawa kamelemo mu bweyaangu bwe engaanu,
ne enyoonyi mu bweyaangu bwe shayiri.”
Kamakhuwa ka Ayubu kakamila ao.

Khwako babaandu bataru bano baalekha khukobosia Ayubu, sikila omwene ebona ali ali omuluungi.
Nio Elihu okhwa Barakeli, owe kholo eya Busi, owe nju eya Ramu, aakhalala. Akhalalila Ayubu sikila Ayubu eyibaasilia khuuba omulayi ne khubiiya Wele.
Elihu lundi aakhalalila basaale bataru ba Ayubu sikila bakhilwa khunyoola likobosia, aakhaba ne baakhalakila Ayubu khuuba ne bubi.
Siise esio Elihu aaba aalindiliile khulomaloma ne Ayubu sikila basaale bataru ba Ayubu abo baaba bakhulu khu niye.
Ne nga Elihu aabona ali mbao likobosia khukhwama khu baandu bataru abo tawe, aakhalala.
Mala Elihu okhwa Barakeli, owe kholo eya Busi aakobosia.
“Ese ndi omwana khwinywe,
ne enywe muli bakhulu khwise.
Khwako ese nderema ne khuuria khuboola enganakani yase khwinywe.
Naloma mumwoyo mwase ndi, ‘Enywe mwenyekha mulomalome,
enywe basaakhulu mwenyekha mwekisie limanya lienywe.’
Ne kakhali roho oyo, roho ooli mu mundu,
kumuuya kwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi,
nikwo kukhola omundu aamanya.
Se bali basaakhulu baali bakesi tawe,
namwe bakhulu bamanya bung'ali tawe.
Khwako ese ndoma ndi, ‘Ndekeeresie,
lekha nase muboolele niko nibaasia.’
“Lola, nalindiilila kamakhuwa kenywe,
Narekeeresia lilomaloma lienywe lie bukesi,
nga mwaba ne muyiimilisia nilio muloma.
Namurekeeresia enywe bulayi,
ne kakhali, mbao owekesia bubi bwa Ayubu,
namwe aanyala khukobosia kakhuwa ka Ayubu tawe.
Mube barekeerefu, mukhola murio mwaloma muli,
‘Efwe khwanyoolile limanya; oolakhila Ayubu ali Wele, ne se ali omundu tawe.’
Ayubu se aalomaloome khwise tawe,
khwako se mukobosia niye nga enywe mwakholile tawe.
“Ayubu, babaandu bano barangaraarwe,
se bali ne likobosia liosi liosi khwiwe lundi tawe,
se bali ne likhuwa nilio baloma tawe.
Eku, ese niindiliile sikila se balomaloma tawe?
Sikila bemile eyo basilile busa,
khaba se bakobosia lundi tawe?
Ese sesi ndakobosiamo
ese sesi ndaboola niko nibaasia.
Ndi ne kamakhuwa kamakali ke khuloma,
roho ooli mwise ambingiilila ndomalome.
Ng'ali kumwoyo kwase kuli nga endali ekhali nende niio erusilia kumuuya kwayo tawe,
nga eoochwa eye ndali embia eeli siimbi khwatikha.
Khukhwola ndome, nio mbuluukhe,
khukhwola sute kumunwa kwase mala ngobosie.
Se nja khubabila omundu yesi yesi,
namwe ndome kamakhuwa ke khufumia busa omundu yesi yesi tawe.
Sikila ese se manyile khufumia busa omundu tawe,
nakhola ndio, Wele owambuumba ese anyala aambunia!”

“Nono Ayubu, ulila niko ese ndoma,
mala orekeeresie kamakhuwa kase koosi,
Lola, nerekeekhe khulomaloma kakaase,
ese samwene ndalomaloma.
Kamakhuwa kase kaboola buluungi bwe kumwoyo kwase,
ne niko manyile ndakaloma mu bung'ali.
Roho owa Wele aambuumbile ese,
ne kumuuya kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumbelesia bulamu.
Waaba ne onyala ngobosie,
rekekha bulayi kamayiingamo kowo ebweeni wase,
mala orobore lubeka nilwo olaba.
Ewe ne nase khulekhaana ebweeni wa Wele,
ese sesi nabuumbwa khukhwama khwiloba.
Nono mbao sikila orie ese tawe,
se nja khukhumiina tawe.
Ng'ali, olomile ne mbulila,
lundi nauliile kamakhuwa kowo koosi.
Ewe oloma oli, ‘Ese ndi omumiliiu, se ndikho ne bubi tawe,
ese ndi omukwalaafu, se ndikho ne bumayaanu tawe.
Lola, Wele anjikhakasiangakho busa,
ambukulanga khuuba nga omusiku wewe,
mala aloleelela likeenda liase lioosi.’
“Ne kakhali ese khukobosia ndi: Lola Ayubu, mu kano se oli ng'ali tawe.
Wele ali omukali khukhila omundu busa.
Siina sikila ne omuyingania,
ne oloma oli, ‘Se acha khukobosiakho kamalilo kase tawe,’
Wele alomaloma, ne eelelamo mu ngila ekiindi,
ne kakhali omundu se aulila tawe.
mu marooro ne mu malola,
ne bakonile liilo likali mu bulili bwabwe,
nio eekule kamaru ke babaandu,
ne khubariisia ne chingaani chewe,
nio akaluukhasie babaandu khukhwama mu bikholwa biabwe,
mala abarusiekho sileka siabwe.
Mu ngila yino, Wele akhiingilila kumwoyo kwo mundu khukwa mu buko,
lundi akhiingilila embalu ekhabunia bulamu bwewe tawe.
“Omundu aukuumwa ne buchuuni bwa Wele mu sitanda siewe,
ne kumureengo kuchiililila mu makuumba kewe,
nio omulwale amilwa khulia siakhulia,
aakhaba siakhulia nisio aasiima.
Aba omung'au lukali,
ne khureka enje busa kamakuumba kewe kakaaba mukari.
Aba siimbi lukali khucha mu Buko,
ne bulamu bwewe buli siimbi niio bareera lifwa bali.
Abanga omundu abaayo ooli ne malaika,
omukaya, mulala khu bamalaika eelefu,
khukhwekesia omundu liili lia ng'ali khukhola,
mala amukholela siisa ne aloma ali,
‘Mureesie! Akhacha mu Buko tawe!
Ese nanyoolile kumuruungo kwe khumusikula niye.’
Lekha kumubili kwewe kweyobule,
lekha akobole mu ndaalo che kamaani ke buele,
Omundu oyo asaba Wele, mala afukiililwa,
eecha ebweeni wa Wele ne khoyo,
ne Wele amukobosia niye mu liiba lie buluungi.
Ne emba ebweeni we babaandu ali,
‘Nakhola kamabi ne khufuumbikha bung'ali,
ne se naukuumwa tawe.
Wele aasikula ese khacha nabunila mu Buko tawe,
mala siili omulamu lundi mbona buwaanga.’
“Lola, Wele akhola bibiindu bino bioosi,
akholela omundu ari kamakhabi kamakali.
Khuonia kumwoyo kwewe khukhwama mu Buko,
nio amukhola anyale khubona buwaanga bwe bulamu.
Ayubu ulila, ndekeeresie,
sila busa, mala ese ndomalome.
Waaba ne oli ne likhuwa loma,
lomaloma sikila nekoomba khubona bung'ali bwowo.
Ne kakhali kario tawe, ndekeeresie,
sila busa ne ndakhwekisia ewe limanya.”

Nio Elihu aloma ali,
“Enywe muuli bakesi, ulila kamakhuwa kase,
enywe mumanyile, ndekeeresie,
sikila liiru liiulila chilomo,
bulayi bwene nga lulimi ne luchanjama siakhulia.
Lekha khwiroborere liili lia ng'ali,
lekha fwabene khukhalake liili lilayi.
Sikila Ayubu alomile ali, ‘Ese se ndi ne bubi tawe,
ne kakhali Wele aandusiisiekho bung'ali bwase.
Aakhaba ne khalikho ne bubi tawe, mbalwa busa khuuba omubeeyi,
aakhaba ne khalikho ne kamabi tawe, likoonjo liase se liiona tawe.’
Mundu siina ooli nga Ayubu,
oobukula khukhweundukuma khuuba nga khunywa kameechi?
Owikhala alala ne babaandu baabi,
ne khukeenda ne babaandu bamayaanu.
Sikila aloma ali, ‘Omundu se anyoola bukhala bwosi bwosi,
mu khwenaana khusiimisia Wele tawe.’
“Khwako, baandu be limanya enywe, ndekeeresie!
Wele se anyala aakhola bumayaanu tawe,
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi se anyala aakhola kamabi tawe.
lundi akhabakholele khuloondekhana ne kimiima kiabwe.
Ng'ali Wele se akholanga kamabi tawe,
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi se afumbikhakanga bung'ali tawe.
Eku, naanu owaelesia Wele bunyali bwe khuliinda sibala?
Naanu owamwamiisia khu limala lioosi?
Abanga Wele eyibaasilia busa kakewe omwene,
ne khukhwebukulila kumwoyo ne kumuuya kwewe kwe bulamu khukhwama khu sibala,
andi bibiindu bie bulamu boosi biakhafwiliile khulala,
ne omundu naye aakhakoboole mwipukhuulu.
“Waaba ne oli ne limanya,
rekeeresia niko ese ndoma.
Eku, oyo owabiila bung'ali anyala aaruka?
Onyala wabiiya Wele ooli omuluungi lundi owe bunyali,
ooboolela omwami ali, ‘Ewe se oli ne sipoli,’
ne khu baruki ali, ‘Enywe muli bamayaanu?’
Niye se ababilanga baruki,
namwe asiime baiinda lukali khukhila bataambi tawe,
sikila niye owababuumba boosi.
“Mu siise sikeekhe bafwa,
musilo akari, babaandu besiindukha mala bafwa,
nende be bunyali barusibwao khubirira mu maani kakhali ko mundu tawe.
Sikila Wele aloleelelanga chingila cho mundu,
niye abonanga likeenda liewe lioosi.
Mbao bumali, namwe sisiilima sikali,
nimwo bamayaanu banyala bekisa tawe.
Wele se akhoyeele aboolele omundu yesi yesi,
biise nibio omundu oyo alareerwa ebweeni wewe khukhalakilwa tawe.
Abunianga be bunyali ne asilii khubamenieelesia,
ne khuura babaandi mu bweyaangu bwabwe.
Sikila amanyile biikholwa biabwe,
abarusiakho bunyali mu silo, ne khubabunia.
Aukuuma bamayaanu khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe
ebweeni we babaandu,
sikila balekha khumuloonda niye
mala baaleka chingila chewe choosi,
nio bakhola bataambi balilila Wele,
mala Wele aaulila lilila liaabo babaapisibwa siibi.
Niye nasilile, naanu oonyala aamubiiya?
Niye ne akisile bubweeni bwewe, naanu oonyala aamubona,
ebeele ekholo namwe omundu mulala?
Akhola ario nio omundu okhamanyile Wele,
namwe abo batiimianga babaandu bakharuka tawe.
“Eku, aliio omundu yesi yesi owaboolela Wele ali,
‘Ese nekhaliliikhe siiukuumo se nja khukhola bubwoni lundi tawe,
njeyikie niko khabona tawe,
naaba ne nakhola bumayaanu, se nja khukhola ndio lundi tawe?’
Eku, acha khuruungia khuloondekhana ne nganakani yowo?
Sikila ewe wenya orobore, se ndi ese tawe,
khwako ewe loma niko omanyile!
Babaandu be likesi,
ne babaandu be limanya babaambulilanga ese banyala baloma bali,
‘Ayubu alomaloma mu khukorwa,
ne kamakhuwa kewe se kali ke bukesi tawe.’
Andi Ayubu akhakiilwe khukhwola khu siakamo,
sikila kamakobosia kewe keekesia kali niye ali nga omumayaanu.
Sikila niye atasa bureengu khu bwoni bwewe,
ayiingana ne nafwe,
lundi atasa khuloma kamakhuwa kewe ke khukhangaaranila Wele.”

Nio Elihu aachiililila khuloma ali,
“Ayubu, ewe wibaasia oli lino lili lia ng'ali?
Ewe oloma oli, ‘Ndi ng'ali ebweeni wa Wele,’
Ewe ne oreeba oli, ‘Nanyoolile bukhala siina naaba ne khakholile bubwoni tawe?
