Nanyoolile bukhala khukhila nga abeele mba ne kholile bubwoni?’
Ese ndakhukobosia,
ewe ne basaale bowo.
Lola likulu! Mala obone,
lola kamafuumbi kaali angaaki khuukhila ewe!
aba wakholilekho sisiindu siosi siosi khu Wele omwene ku?
Ne bumayaanu bwowo bwaaba ne bukucha,
omukholakho siina?
Waaba ne oli omuluungi, oyeeta Wele siina?
Namwe siina nisio anyoola khukhwama khwiwe?
Babaandu nga ewe buchuunisibwa sikila bumayaanu bwowo,
ne bulayi nibwo okhola buyeeta babaandu babaandi.
“Sikila bukali bwe bumiinikhi babaandu balilanga banyoole buyeeti,
benya buyeeti obwo nio baone khukhwama khu bukuluumi bwe babaandu be bunyali.
Ne kakhali se aliio aakhaba mulala oreeba ali, ‘Wele Omubuumbi wase,
oanaanga kamaani siilo,
Wele okhwekisianga lukali khukhila chisaang'i che khu sibala,
ne khukhukhola efwe khuba bakesi khukhila chinyuni ali waena?’ Tawe.
Balila, ne kakhali se abakobosia tawe,
sikila khukhwebonia khwe babaandu bamayaanu.
Ng'ali Wele se aulila kamalilo ka busa tawe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abibukulangamo lukeendo tawe.
Sili sisiindu sikeekhe lukali ewe ne oloma oli se wanyalile khumubona tawe,
lundi oli ekesi yowo eli ebweeni wewe,
ne wamuliindile niye!
Nono, sikila Wele se eekesia lirima liewe tawe,
ne khuloleelesia lukali bumayaanu bwe babaandu tawe,
Ayubu ewe otasa khulomaloma kamakhuwa ka busa,
se wamanyile kamakhuwa niko olomaloma tawe.”

Nio Elihu aachiililila khuloma ali,
“Njekhaliilikhekho atiiti, nase ndakhwekesia,
sikila siili ne likhuwa nilio nenya ndome mu bweyaangu bwa Wele.
Ndakhwekesia nga limanya liase ne lili likali,
mala ndarumikhira niko manyile khukhwekesia buluungi bwa Wele Omubuumbi wase.
Ng'ali niko ndikho ndoma se kali ke bubeeyi tawe,
oyo ooli omwichufu mu limanya ali nawe;
lundi mu bunyali bwewe, se alekhanga omwoni achiililile khumenya tawe.
“Ng'ali, Wele ali owe bunyali ne se afwocholangakho omundu yesi yesi tawe,
mu limanya liewe, niye ali owe bunyali bukali po!
Se alekhanga bamayaanu ne bachiililila khumenya tawe,
ne kakhali akholelanga babaapisibwa siibi bung'ali bwabwe.
Se alekhanga khuliinda abo baali baluungi tawe,
ne kakhali abamiianga buli lwoosi alala ne babaami, ne khubaelesia lukoosi.
Ne babaandu baaba ne baboebwa ne kiminyololo,
ne khuaambwa ne kimikoye kie buchuuni,
Wele abekesia busiro bwe bikholwa biabwe,
ne bubwoni bwe khukhwebonia nibwo bakholile sileka.
Abekulanga kamaru baulile kamekisio,
ne khubalaka barure mu bumayaanu.
Baaba ne baulila mala bamukholela,
bamalila chindaalo chabwe mu buiinda
ne kimiiko kie bulamu bwabwe mu busangaafu.
Ne kakhali baaba ne bakhamuulila niye tawe, babunila mwiie,
ne khufwa sikila se bali ne limanya tawe.
“Bakharia Wele mu miooyo kiabwe tawe basiima khuuba ne lirima,
Wele aakhababoa se bamusaba buyeeti tawe.
Bafwa ne basiili baele,
ne sisiakamo sie bulamu bwabwe siba sie chisoni chingali.
Wele asikulanga abo baali mu buchuuni khubirira mu buchuuni bwabwe,
lundi arumikhiranga butinyu bukali khubekula chimoni chabwe.
Wele lundi akhurusia mu butinyu bukali
ne khu khura abuundu alayi niio bumiinikhi bukhali tawe,
ne khu khurekekhera sisiaalwa sie binulu lukali.
“Ne kakhali luno wakhalakiilwe nga omumayaanu,
bukhalaki ne bung'ali biakhuambile ewe.
Yeliinda, okhafukiilila lirima liakhubea weundukuma,
namwe bukali bwe kumuruungo bukhutiimie tawe.
Eku, khulila khwowo khunyala khwakhurusia mu butinyu,
namwe kamaani kowo koosi kanyala kakhuyeeta?
Okhekoomba siilo sioole tawe,
siilo nisio babaandu barusibwanga niio bali tawe.
Yeliinda! Okhakobola mu bumayaanu tawe,
sikila waelesiibwe buchuuni nio oonisibwe khukhwama mu bumayaanu.
Lola, Wele afumisibwa lukali mu bunyali bwewe,
naanu ooli omwekisia nga niye?
Naanu omwekisia engila yewe,
namwe naanu oonyala aaloma ali, ‘Ewe wakholile kamabi?’
“Khebulila khufumia kumulimo kwewe,
nikwo babaandu bemba.
Babaandu boosi bakuboone,
buli mundu akuloleelela khukhwama aleeyi.
Ng'ali Wele ali omukali, ne efwe se khunyala khwamumanya tawe,
bukali bwe kimiiko kiewe se bunyala bwamanyikhana tawe.
Niye okhwesanga kamame ke kameechi khukhwama khwiloba,
ne khukhola kamame ke fula khukhwama mu namufweli.
Akholanga efula ne ekwa khukhwama mumafuumbi,
ne khuchukha efula engali khu baandu.
Naanu onyala aamanya nga kamafuumbi ne kakeenda,
namwe nga efula ne kukuma mwikulu, niio Wele amenyile?
Lola, asalanisianga lueni lwewe abuundu niio ali,
ne khufuunikha chisiba che nyanja ne sisiilima.
Khubirira khu fula aliindanga babaandu,
ne khubaelesia siakhulia sikali.
Atiila lueni mu makhono keewe,
mala alulaka khu khuupa abuundu niio eenya.
Liliatulukhana lie lueni liekesia khubaao khwewe.
Ali ne libuba khu bumayaanu, khwako lirima liewe liburukha.”

“Kumwoyo kwase kuterema sikila kano,
lundi kweliiya lukali ne kurura abuundu wakwo.
Rekeeresia khukhwatulukha khwe kumumilo kwa Wele,
ne likukuma liliama mu niye ne alomaloma.
Aruma lueni khwikulu khwoosi,
khukhwama lubeka lulala lwe sibala khukhwola lubeka luluundi.
Kumumilo kwewe kuulukhuma enyuma walwo,
akukuma ne kumumilo kwewe kwe luyali,
lundi se akhiingilila chimbeni kumumilo kwewe ne kuuliilikhana tawe.
Wele akukuma mu ngila eye liiukia ne kumumilo kwewe,
akholanga bibiindu bikali po nibio khukhanyala khwamanya tawe.
Alakanga kamaarara ali, ‘Kwa khu sibala,’
ne khu fula ali, ‘Kwa lukali.’
Emianga kimilimo kia buli mundu,
nio babaandu boosi bamanye kimilimo kiewe.
Chisaang'i che mundaa chingila niio chekisanga,
ne khuuba busa mu mabina kaacho.
Sisiifuusia siamila siafubo,
ne bunyifu khukhwama mu mbeo eye bunaswa.
Kumuuya kwa Wele kureerao eparaafu,
lundi kukaluukhasia kameechi ne kaba nga kamaarara.
Echusia kamafuumbi kamasiro ne bunyifunyifu,
kamafuumbi kasalanisia lueni lwewe.
Bioosi bibotookhelela khukhola koosi,
buli abuundu mu sibala sioosi,
khuloondekhana nga Wele ne abilaka.
Wele akhola lilienya liewe khu sibala,
libeele lie khuukuuma babaandu,
namwe khubekesia busiime bwewe.
“Ee Ayubu, rekeeresia lino,
sila mala wibaasie bibiindu bie khuukia nibio Wele akhola.
Eku, ewe omanyile nga Wele abilakanga,
ne khukhola lueni lwe lifuumbi liewe lukhosia?
Eku, ewe omanyile nga kamafuumbi ne kakelakelanga khwikulu,
kimilimo kie khuukia kio oyo oomanyile buli siindu?
Ewe oweulila oli wefwarire chingubo chireera lukesi lukali,
biise nibio embeo ebilile euucha khukhwama ebunafubo?
Eku, ewe onyala wachalaasia likulu nga Wele
ne khulikhola lilume nga sikioo sie sibia?
Kwekisie nilio khukhaboolele Wele,
sikila khuli mu siilima, se khumanyile nisio khuloma tawe.
Eku, naanu oonyala aamuboolela niye ali, nenya khulomaloma?
Naanu khuno owenya khuuba mu butinyu?
“Ne luno babaandu se banyala baloleelela mu buwaanga,
ne bukhosia khwikulu,
embeo ne euchile yarusiao kamafuumbi tawe.
Esahabu eemelamela yamila ebunaswa,
Wele efwarire luyali lwe khuukia.
Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niye khukhanyala khwamwimbiia tawe,
ali omukali mu bunyali ne mu bung'ali,
ali ne buluungi bukali ne se afuumbikhanga bung'ali tawe.
Khwako babaandu bamuria niye,
se abukulaanga lukeendo mu mundu yesi yesi ooli ne sileka tawe.”

Nio Omwami Wele aaboolela Ayubu khukhwamila mu siifuusia ali,
“Ewe naanu oomaliisia likaambila liase
mu makhuwa kakhali ke likesi tawe?
Yirekekha nga omundu owe siseecha,
ese nja khu khureeba, mala ewe ungobosie.
“Waaba waena ne ndao kimisiingi kie sibala?
Waaba ne oli ne limanya, mboolele.
Naanu owakhalaka buleeyi ne bukhiikha bwasio? Okhoya obe ne omanyile!
Namwe naanu owakololosia luusia khupiima sibala?
Eku, kimisiingi kiasio kiema khu siina
namwe naanu owakhwiikha enjeko yasio
nga ching'enieesi cha sulwe ne chaba chimbila alala,
mala babaana ba Wele bayokela khulwe khoyo?
nga kameechi kechula khukhwama mu chisiba chayo?
Ese niise owafuunikha enyanja ne kamafuumbi,
mala nakibotookhelesia sisiilima sikali.
Naraao chinjakha che nyanja,
ne khukikhiingilila ne bikiingi ne kimiliango,
nakiboolela ndi, ‘Okhabira ano tawe!
Ne kamaleesi kowo ke kamaani kaakama ano.’
“Eku Ayubu, ewe mu bulamu bwowo wakhalakilakho kumutikhinyi kubeo?
Wakholakho makhelebeende liamanya biise biako,
nio katiile sibala ne chinjika chako,
ne khutimania bamayaanu be mu sibala?
Sibala sikaluukhananga ne khuuba ne rangi nga engubo,
sikaluukhana sifwaana nga liloba lio mubuumbi ne likaluukhasibwaanga khuuba kumuuri.
Buwaanga se buaanwa khu bamayaanu tawe,
ne kumukhono nikwo basuta khu khuupa babaandu kulafunwa.
“Eku, ewe wengilakho mu fututusie che khu sibale sie nyanja?
Eku, ewe wekesibwakho bilibwa bie lifwa,
namwe bilibwa bie sisiilima sikali po?
Eku, omanyile bubalaayi bwe sibala?
Waaba ne omanyile koosi kano, mboolele.
“Ewe omanyile niio buwaanga bumenyile?
Omanyile niio sisiilima siamanga,
nio osiyile niio simenyanga,
ne khumenieelesia chingila chiicha niio simenyile?
Ewe okhoyeele omanye, sikila beele wasaalwa khale,
ne chindaalo chowo chili chingali lukali!
“Eku, wengilakho mwibiikhilo lie paraafu,
namwe wabonakho libiikhilo lie kamaarara,
nibio nabibiikha khulwe biise bie butinyu,
ne chindaalo che khu khuupana ne liie?
Ngila siina eecha abuundu niio buwaanga bururira,
namwe abuundu niio ekhuungu eye bukwe yamanga nio esalaanila khu sibala?
“Naanu owaarura lulwaakha nilwo efula namatoa eloonda,
namwe engila eye lueni,
khureera efula khu sibala abuundu niio omundu akhamenyile tawe,
mu siangalaamwe, siikhalimo omundu tawe,
khuchukhiilila kamaloba kamoomu lundi kakhali ke ngakha tawe,
ne khukhola liloba limelemo bunyaasi?
Eku, efula eli ne raraawe,
namwe naanu osaalile kamame ke luume?
Eku, ebarafu yaama munda mwa naanu?
Naanu owasaala kamaarara ke mwikulu?
Kameechi kaandalala ne kaba nga libaale,
ne khungaaki khwe nyanja khuambaana sikila bunyifu bukali.
eku, onyala waboa kiminyololo kia Kilimia,
namwe wakangulula buborore bwa Orioni?
Eku, onyala warangirira ching'enieesi cha Masaroti mu biise biacho,
namwe warangirira ling'u ne ching'ana chalio ku?
Eku, omanyile kamalaka karumikhirwa khuruka likulu?
Eku, onyala walirekekhera buruki bwalio khu sibala?
“Onyala waboolela kamafuumbi ne kumumilo kwe angaaki,
nio kakwisie efula engali ekhufuunikhe?
Eku, ewe onyala waruma chimbeni, mala chiche,
nio chikalukhe niio oli mala chikhuboolele chili, ‘Khuli ano?’
Naanu owaelesia enyuni elaangwa Ibisi limanya lie khumanya khukhwichula khwe luluuchi lwa Naili,
namwe owaboolela etaaywa bukesi bwayo?
Naanu ooli omukesi onyala aabala kamafuumbi?
Naanu oonyala eenamisia chioochwa che kameechi che mwikulu,
nio lufuumbi mu sibala lwebuusie,
ne liloba nalio liiambaane liekhole kamatosi?
“Onyala waaya khuelesia etalang'i siakhulia,
namwe wekusia ching'ana chayo
ne chekisile mu mabina kaacho,
namwe ne chilindiiliile abuundu niio chekisile?
Naanu oelesianga enyefwe siakhulia siayo,
kamaana kaayo ne kalilila Wele,
ne kayiiyayiiya sikila khutaamba siakhulia?”

“Eku, ewe omanyile biise nibio chimbusi che mu bikulu chisaalanga?
Namwe wabonakho chikicheu ne chisaala ku?
Eku, onyala wabala kimieesi nikio chikekaanga nio chisaale,
namwe omanyile siise nisio chisaalilamo?
“Nga ne chichochomala khusaala ching'ana chabwe,
lundi nga ne chisaala ching'ana chacho?
Ching'ana chacho chichoa ne chiba ne kamaani,
chikhula ne chili mundaa omwo,
nio chilekha chimaawe ne se chikobola lundi tawe.
“Naanu owaelesia chipunda mulia bulekhuule?
Naanu owa chikangulula chikeende busa?
Ese nachielesia sichiimi sibe mungo mwacho,
mala sibala sia chumbe sibe niio chimenya?
Chimenya sinaao khukhwama mu luyoka lwe mu lukoba,
se chiulila luyoka lwe khuchikhosia kimilimo tawe.
Chiyiiya mu bikulu,
nimwo chiimilisia siosi siili sibisi chilie.
“Eku, emboongo enyala yakhukholela ewe?
Enyala yakona mwitaala liowo?
Onyala wakiboa kumukoye mala yakhulimila,
namwe wakikhola yakhweesa embako?
Onyala wakiikina sikila kamaani kamakali kaayo,
namwe, onyala wakilekhela kumulimo kwowo?
Eku, onyala wakiikina ekobole,
ne khureera bikeswa niio bauulilanga?
“Chindaa che nyefwe chipapara lukali,
ne kakhali se enyala yapurukha nga khooro tawe?
Sikila enyefwe elekha kamaki kaayo khwiloba,
nio kanyoole bukhafu bwe asi,
ne kakhali yibilila eli sikele sinyala siakaara,
lundi yibilila eli esaang'i eye mundaa enyala yakaswalakilila.
Enyefwe ekuluumianga lukali kamaana kaayo oli manya ne kakhali kakaayo tawe,
kumulimo kwayo kwakhoonekha, se yeendekhelelakho tawe.
Sikila Wele aakikhola yebilila limanya liayo,
lundi se aakielesiakho bukesi tawe.
Ne kakhali ne erakikha khutima,
echekha aakhaba efarasi alala nende ookitimia.
“Eku, Ayubu, ewe niwe owaelesia chifarasi kamaani kacho,
mala wachira kamayeeye mu makosi?
Eku, ewe niwe ookholanga efarasi ne esunasuna nga esike?
Ekhola luyoka lukali lwe khuukia!
Ebuya liloba mu matooma ne kamaani,
etima khucha niio liie liili ne kamaani kaayo koosi.
Echekheelela busa buri, se yesiindukha tawe;
lundi se yiila enyuma ne eli mwiie tawe.
Bulwaani bwo oyo ookitimia
bwekhupanakho lukali ne khumeniuukhila mu buwaanga bwe nyanga.
Chirwandukha chimbilo mu burafu ne lirima,
ekhoombi ne yipa, se chiima cheoleelesia tawe.
Ekhoombi ne yipa, chikhola luyoka,
chiunyilisia liie ne chili aleeyi,
chiulila endiri eye bakhulu be banamae ne bayokela khurusia lilaka.
“Eku, kisiilili eika khupurukha khukhwama khwiwe,
ne khupurukha khuucha siafubo?
Eku, efuruusi epurukha angaaki lukali sikila lilaka liowo,
ne khukhwombakha siiswi siayo angaaki mu bikulu?
Ekhola lulwanda bukono bwayo,
ne bubwooki bwe kamabaale nibwo bubwilukhilo bwayo.
Ne eli ebweeneyo, elola ebone nisio enyala yaatiila yaalia,
chimoni chayo chisibonela aleeyi.
ne niio sisiindu sifwiile sili, ao niio yosi eli.”

Omwami Wele aachiililila khuboolela Ayubu ali,
“Eku, ewe oomenieelesia obone kamabi, onyala wayingana ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Yesi yesi ookhandarania Wele, akhoya akobosie kamareebo.”
Nio Ayubu aakobosia Omwami Wele ali,
“Lola, ese ndi busa sisiindu sitiiti, khukobosia ndi siina?
Se ndalomakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
Niko naloma kanyala, se niilamo lundi tawe,
naloma ne niililamo, ne kakhali se ndachiililila khuloma tawe.”
Nio Omwami Wele aakobosia Ayubu khukhwama mu siifuusia ali,
“Yiboa munda siseecha siene,
ndakhureeba ewe, ne ewe olakobosia kamareebo kaase.
Eku, olikho okhaka khukhwekesia oli ese nakhalaake bukhali bwa ng'ali tawe?
Ewe umbiiya nio obonekhe khuuba owa ng'ali?
Ewe oli ne kamaani nga Wele?
Onyala wakhookha ne kumumilo nga kukwase?
“Yeyekesia khuuba ooli ne lukoosi ne bukali,
yekesia oli oli owe luyali ne bulayi bukali.
Aambila babaandu lirima liowo likali
lola yesi yesi owe kibonio, mala omuupe asi.
Lola buli mundu owe sileka mala omwikhisie khangu,
swalakilila bamayaanu abuundu niio bali.
Basiikhe boosi alala mwiloba,
obaboe boosi asi mu sibala sie makoombe.
Nio ese sesi ndafukiilila ndi,
kamaani kowo wamwene kakhueleesie bukhili.
“Lola kufubu Behemoti nikwo nabuumba,
nikwo nabuumba bulayi nga ne nabuumba ewe,
kwaaya bunyaasi nga ekhaafu.
Kamaani kaakwo kali munda mwakwo,
ne bunyali bwakwo buli mu nyama che munda mwakwo.
Kwimia kumukhiinga kwakwo tatatata nga kumunyaali,
ne kimikotio kie binama biakwo kiaambaana alala ngilingili.
Kamakuumba kakwo kamalume nga kumukasa,
ne bikele biakwo bili nga bisiindi bie sichuuma.
“Nikwo kunyoa mu milimo kie khuukia kia Wele!
Owakubuumba yeng'ene niye onyala aakuula.
Bikulu niio chisaang'i che mundaa choosi chinyaila,
biaana siakhulia siakwo.
Kukona asi we kimisiru kie kamawa,
ne khukhwekisa mu bisere bie mu lureende.
Kwekisa mu siiniini sie kimirongooro kie kamawa,
kuli akari we bisaala bie khu luuchi.
Luluuchi lwakhechula, se kuria tawe,
kwelanguliila busa aakhaba luluuchi Yoritani ne lukhulukukha lukali mu moni mwakwo.
Eku, naanu oonyala aakutiimbia chimoni mala aakuaamba?
Naanu oonyala aakuruundura lilioolu liakwo ne kumureko?
Eku, onyala waloba kukweena Lefiatani ne kumulobo,
namwe waboa lulimi lwakwo ne kumukoye?
“Eku, onyala wara lusaala mu lioolu liakwo,
namwe wafutula lunyaanyilo lwakwo ne kumulobo?
Eku, ewe wibaasia oli kulakhwikoonjelela okulekhe?
Eku, kulalomaloma khwiwe kalaa?
Eku, kulakhola endakaano nawe,
okubukule kube nasioobi kwowo buli lwoosi?
Eku, olakubaya kube nga enyuni,
mala okukhole kube sisiindu sie khusangaasia bakhaana bowo bakhukholelanga ewe?
Eku, ewe wibaasia oli banaabi be ching'eeni balakhweesanila khu bukusi bwakwo?
Eku, baboofuli baleenya khukutonyamo ne khukabana?
Eku, onyala waunaka lisieelo liakwo ne kamafumo,
namwe kuurwe kwakwo ne lifumo lie khuunila ching'eeni?
Ewe khakakho busa khukutiilakho, olabona kaalekholekha khwiwe;
se okheloondekho lundi khukhola orio tawe!”

awa kamaani ne khuukwa asi.
Mbao omundu ooli omurafu oonyala aakuriikhirisia tawe.
Naanu nono oonyala eema ebweeni wase?
Naanu owambelesiakho siindu, nio nenyekhe khumukobosiela?
Buli siindu siili asi we likulu sili sisiase.
“Lekha mbaboolele khu bikele bie kukweena Lefiatani,
mala ninoosie nga ne kuli kuboofu lundi kwe kamaani.
Naanu oonyala aabaaka lisielo liakwo?
Naanu oonyala aafutula engubo eye siibia, eyakufuunikha sifuba?
Naanu oonyala aakwaasamia?
Kimiino kiakwo buli lubeka kili kie khuriisia!
Kumukoongo kwakwo kuli nga chingabo chingali chiaambaanisiibwe,
chichatiilana nga kumuuri kwe libaale.
Buli libaabi lieamba khu liindi tati,
aakhaba embeo se nyala yabira akari tawe.
Koosi kaambaana alala ngilingili,
mbao sinyala siakaukhasia tawe.
Ne kwasimula buwaanga bukali bukhosia,
ne chimoni chakwo chili chimbesemu nga enyanga ne esoa.
Mukhanwa mwakwo mwamamo chimuli chiburukha,
ne chinjaso che kumulilo nacho chifututusia.
Mu moolu kakwo mwamamo liliisi,
nga liliaama mu ndekhelo etotokhela,
nga chiikhu chicherika kumulilo.
Kumuuya kwakwo kubwaana kamanda,
ne chinjaso chama mukhanwa mwakwo.
Kamaani kamakali kali mwikosi mwakwo,
babaandu ne bakubona bawa kamaani sikila buuri.
Chinyama chakwo chaboraana alala,
chaandanakho tatatata nga sibia.
Kumwoyo kwakwo kuli kumuandalafu nga libaale,
kumuandalafu nga lususi.
Ne kwinyokha, banaitiriani baria,
bafwa kimiooyo sikila buuri,
bawa sio sikila buuri.
Embalu se nyala yakukholakho sisiindu tawe,
libeele lifumo, buembo, namwe kumusakhu.
Kubona sichuuma nga lukhaanja,
ne kumukasa nga kumusaala kukwabola.
Buembo se bukukhola kwelukha tawe,
kamabaale ke mburuusi kakwakalisia nga lunyaasi.
Chiruungu chili nga lukhaanja,
kuchekha busa babaandu ne bakuchukucha kamafumo.
Munda mwakwo muli nga bikoloonjo bibiooki,
ne kwekhuruurira mu matosi, kukhola kimikhuruuro, nga embako ne lima.
Kutumbuula enyanja,
nga kameechi kaasela mu nyuungu,
nga enyuungu eye kamalesi ne kasiuukha.
Ne kuchiila mu meechi,
kulekha enyuma engila eye lifuro liwaanga ne ling'enang'ena.
Khu sibala mbao nisio okukelaaniakho tawe,
kuli kusaang'i kukhali ne buuri tawe.
Kulekeelesia boosi baali ne kibonio,
kuli omwami owe chisaang'i choosi chindafu.”

Nio Ayubu aakobosia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali,
“Ese manyile ndi ewe onyala wakhola bibiindu bioosi,
liosi liosi nilio wenya khukhola, se linyala liakhiingililwa tawe.
Khwako, nalomaloome niko khamanyile tawe,
bibiindu bie khuukia lukali khwise,
nibio khamanyile tawe.
nja khu khureeba ewe, ne ewe olangobosia.
Abeele naulilakho busa khuloondekhana nawe,
ne kakhali luno samwene nakhuboone ewe ne chimoni chase.
Khwako ne leka samwene, ne khukhwibiiya,
nikanila mu khwiiakha lipukhuulu ne likokhe.
Nebona ndi se ndi siindu ebweeni wowo tawe.”
Enyuma wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khumala khulomaloma kamakhuwa kano khu Ayubu, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Elifasi Omutemani ali, “Nakhukhalaliile ewe ne basaale bowo babili, sikila se walomile ka ng'ali khuloondekhana nase nga omukholi wase Ayubu ne akholile tawe.
Khwako luno, bukula chiuunwa saba ne kamamiiku saba, mala muche khu mukholi wase Ayubu, mala muchiaane nga chimbosio che khukhwosia sikila mwabeene. Ne omukholi wase Ayubu, acha khumusaayila, sikila nja khufukiilila lisaaya liewe, mala ndekhe khumukholela khuloondekhana ne busilu bwenywe. Sikila se mwalomaloma bung'ali khuloondekhana nase nga omukholi wase Ayubu akholile tawe.”
Nono Elifasi Omutemani, Bilitati Omushuhi, ne Sofari Omunaamati, bacha bakhola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aababoolela, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aafukiilila lisaba lia Ayubu.
Mala bawandaaye ne bakooko boosi ba Ayubu, nende boosi babamumanya lutaayi bamukeniia mala baalia siakhulia naye munju mwewe. Bamukholela siisa siabwe mala bamuoleelesia khu butinyu bwoosi nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamureerakho. Nio buli mulala amuelesia chirupia ne embete eye sahabu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabiita chindaalo chimaliilisi cha Ayubu lukali khukhila che mu khurakikha. Ayubu aaba ne kamakheese chielefu ekhumi na chine, chingamia chielefu sita, chikhaafu chielefu chibili, ne chifarasi chewe chikhasi eelefu ndala.
Lundi aaba ne babaana basoleeli saba ne bakhaana bataru.
Nio aalaanga omukhulu ali Yemima, ne omuloonda ali Kesia, ne ookhola khataru ali Kereni-apuchu.
Mala mu sibala esio sioosi se babaamo bakhasi balayi nga bakhaana ba Ayubu tawe. Nono raarawabwe aabakabania kumukabo alala ne bawandaayabwe.
Enyuma wa kano Ayubu aamenya kimiiko emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane, mala aabona babaana bewe ne babaana be babechukhulu bewe ne bisoni biewe.
Nio aafwa ne ali omusaakhulu korio.

Ali ne chikhabi,
oyo oloba khukeenda khuloondekhana ne likaambila lie bamayaanu,
namwe ookheema mu ngila che babooni,
namwe ookheekhala mu siikhasio siabo balekelesia Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali ekhoya ne khuria lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne akanakana khu lilaka elio siilo ne kumuusi.
kukwabiaalwa aluuchi,
kukwaama kamatuunda buli lwoosi,
mala kamasaafu kakwo se kooma tawe.
Buli siindu nisio akhola siba silayi.
Babooni se bali bario tawe,
ne kakhali bali nga likhuuchi nilio embeo etamuusia.
Khwako bamayaanu se bakhebache bukhalaki bwa Wele tawe,
ne babooni se bakhabe mu libuusiana lie baluungi tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emeelelanga baluungi,
ne kakhali chingila che babooni chikhawele mu libuna.

siina sikila babaandu ne barekekha bia busa?
Babaami babwe bakwangwaana khukhola sileka,
baruki babwe bauliilisiana boosi khuloba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
no mwami omurobore wewe.
Baloma bali,
“Lekha khukitule kiminyololo kiabwe,
mala khumwaate kimikoye kiabwe
kikiakhuboa efwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we mwikulu abachekheelela, sikila
kamarekekha kabwe kali ka busa.
Abarafwira mu lirima liewe likali,
abariikhirisia mu burafu bwewe lundi ne aloma ali,
“Nareere omwami omurubore wase,
khu Sayuni
Ambooleele ali: Ewe oli omwana wase luno nabeele Paapa wowo.
Ne usaba ndakhola chikholo choosi chibe asi wowo,
ne sibala sioosi siliba asi wowo.
obaraakake nga enyuungu eye liloba.”
Khwako baami enywe, manya likhuwa lino,
enywe baruki be sibala, ulila engaani yino!
Kholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu buri ne lilieboombia.
Mwinamile, busa akhola ario aambwa lirima,
mala wafwa biise ne bisiili,
sikila lirima liewe lili khangu.
Ne kakhali bali ne chikhabi lukali,
abo boosi babelukhila
mu buliindi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

bali bakali babangaluukhaanekho!
Basiku balandomanga bali,
“Wele se alamuyeeta tawe.”
Ne kakhali ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ewe oli engabo yase,
umbechanga bukhili lundi undaamo kumwoyo.
Sabanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjeete,
ne khukhwama khu sikulu siewe sitakatifu
angobosia lisaba liase.
Ngona liilo siilo sioosi,
sisimukha lundi ne busiele,
sikila buliindi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Se nariire basiku bakhabalikha tawe,
basiku babangara khukhunjira tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, yiicha!
Ee Wele niye saayanga sikule!
Sikila oambianga chisoni basiku base boosi,
mala omalamo babooni abo kamaani nio bakhakhola kamabi khwise tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, buonia buli bubwowo,
biita babaandu bowo chikhabi!

Ee Wele, owekesianga bung'ali bwase,
ne khusaba buyeeti njeete!
Nga ne naba mu siboe, wambelesia bulekhuule.
Nono njalaale mala oulile lisaba liase.
Baandunywe, mulanjonakila lisina khukhwola siise siina?
Mulaloonda ke bubeeyi ne kamakhuwa ka busa khukhwola siise siina?
Ne kakhali manya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
eroborera baluungi babe babewe omwene,
ese ne saba, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulilanga lisaba liase.
mukhakhola bubwoni tawe,
ne mukona siilo, khebulila busa kamakhuwa kano mala musile busa.
Aana chimbosio chenywe mu ngila enuungi,
ne lilieyikina lienywe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baliio bakali basaba Wele bali,
“Khaba khwaba bulayi lundi!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khukholele siisa lundi!”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wambelesie ekhoyo engali khukhila eye babaandu abo,
akhaba ne bali ne siakhulia ne ndali engali po!
Ne niyalisia asi, liilo linjuula bwangu sikila kumuleembe,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe weng'ene oukholanga ne menya mu muleembe.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rekeeresia kakaase,
ulila khusikhiikha khwase.
Ulila khulila khwase unjeete,
oli Wele wase, lundi omwami wase,
sikila ese khusabanga ewe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mu mabwibwi oulila kumumilo kwase,
mu mutikhinyi mbaana lisaba
Sikila ewe soli Wele osangaalila bubwoni tawe,
ewe sofukiililanga be bubwoni tawe.
Se wikhaliilikha babaandu babebonia ebweeni wowo tawe,
babaandu be bubwoni boosi ewe wababiila.
Ewe obunia abo baloma bubeeyi,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiila babeeri ne babeeyi.
Ne kakhali ese khulwe busiime bwowo bukali,
ndingila munju yowo,
ne liria likali, ndikhusaayila mu Lukaangu lwowo lutakatifu.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndangirire mu buluungi bwowo sikila basiku base,
kwalaasia engila niyo wenya ese nonde.
benya khubunia khwong'ene.
Chilomo chabwe chili luriimba nilwo barekire,
bareka babaandu khulwe kamakhuwa kabwe.
Ee Wele, khalakila basiku base mala obauukuume,
lekha babune khulwe kimireko kiabwe babeene,
batimanie sikila bubwoni bwabwe bukali.
Ne kakhali lekha abo boosi banyoola buliindi mwiwe bekhoye,
lekha bembe khulwe khoyo buli lwoosi,
ne khusaba obaliinde,
nio abo babakhusiima ewe bekhoye mwiwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe obiita baluungi bowo,
wabasiima, ne khwako obaliinda lukali nga engabo.

namwe wambukuuma mu burafu bwowo tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kholele siisa sikila kamaani kambwele,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mbonie sikila kumubili kwase kwatekheele.
Ne samwene ndi mu liaayaaya likali.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, olakhiinda khukhumbonia khu siise sileeyi?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekheelela lirima liowo khwise mala umbonie,
khukhila ako, khulwe busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe sikule.
Sikila bafu se bakhukhebulila tawe,
se aliio onyala akhufumia ewe emakoombe tawe.
Naluiiliile khulwe sibeela siase,
buli ndaalo siilo bulili bwase butora sikila kamasika kase,
bulili bwase butekenyala khulwe khulila khwase.
Sikila khulila khwase, se mbona bulayi tawe,
chimoni chichuuna khulwe khulila sikila basiku base.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambulila ese ne musaba buyeeti.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi auliile lisaba liase,
khwako alangobosia ese.
Basiku base boosi baliambwa chisoni lundi bareenge,
sikila chisoni balikoyaana khangu busa mala belukhe.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, nyoolanga bubwilukhilo bwase mwiwe,
mbonie lundi usikule khukhwama khwaabo boosi babandimania.
Busa basiku base bakhola bario bandabulakamo nga etalang'i kaaba bali se umbonia tawe,
mala bakhanjire ne okundi yesi yesi se alibao ousikula tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase,
ese nakholelakho omundu yesi yesi kamabi ku,
ese nakholelakho kamabi owasiase oukholelaanga kamalayi ku,
naaba ne nakholela omusaale kamamayaanu
namwe nakholela omusiku wase kamabi nekhali ne sifuno tawe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, naaba bali nakholakho liosi liosi khu kano,
lekha basiku base bandimanie mala bandiile,
lekha banjire khulwe siikhupo,
mala bandekhe asi nefwiile.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khulwe burafu bwowo, yinyokha!
Yinyokha okhiingilile basiku base be lirima.
Ee Wele wase, ewe obisianga nio bung'ali bwikholekha, yinyokha!
Lekha babaandu boosi babuusiane ebweeni wowo,
ewe baruke noli mwikulu mu bwami bwowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omukhalaki owe babaandu boosi;
khalakile khuloondekhana ne buluungi bwase,
lundi khalakile khuloondekhana ne bung'ali buuli mwise.
ewe omanyanga kaali mu mebaasio ne mu miooyo kiefwe.
Kaania abo baali ne bubwoni bakhakhola bubwoni tawe,
mala oindiaasie abo bakhali ne bubwoni tawe.
Wele niye engabo yase,
aonianga baloonda kamalaka kewe.
Wele akhalakilanga babaandu mu buluungi,
ne buli lwoosi arafwiranga be bubwoni.
Be bubwoni ne bakhekanila tawe,
Wele acha khuakala embalu yewe abebwaakale,
akhare luembo mu buyiingo bwewe abalase.
Wele arekeekhe bulwaani bwewe bubwira,
abasile buembo bwewe bwokiie nga liwa.
Lola nga babaandu babi bebaasia khukhola ke bubwoni,
balimo kamakhuwa ke bubacha bukali,
lundi baboolela babaandu ke bubeeyi.
Bayaba liloo babaandu babaandi bakwemo,
ne mwiloo elio babeene bakwamo.
Bubwoni babwe bubakalukhila babeene,
ne sisiayuumba siabwe sibabunia babeene.
Khupila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio lukali,
sikila okholanga bung'ali,
niimbanga chinyimbo che khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, owe Angaaki Lukali.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omwami wefwe fweesi,
luyali lwowo lwechula sibala sioosi!
Luyali lwowo lwakaliia lwaakhila likulu lioosi.
khulwe fuma ng'ene eyo oula basiku bowo boosi,
okhiingilila basiku ne naabo babeyacha kamabi.
Ne ndola mala ne nibaasia bubalaayi bwe likulu liowo,
kumulimo kwowo,
ne ndola kumwesi ne ching'enieesi nicho wara abuundu wacho,
omundu busa nga ali ario nio ewe omuliinde?
Ne kakhali ewe wamukholile abeele omutiiti khwiwe weng'ene
ewe wamuelesia bunyali bukali ne luyali,
ne lukoosi khukhwama khwiwe.
ewe wareere bibiindu bioosi asi wewe:
Kamakheese ne chikhaafu choosi,
nende bie mu nyanja bioosi.
Chinyuni ne ching'eeni,
nende bie mu nyanja bioosi.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe Omwami wefwe,
luyali lwowo lwechula sibala.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndakhupila orio ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
ndaboola kamalayi ke khuukia niko wakhola koosi.
Ndeemba ne khoyo sikila ewe,
Wele owe Angaaki Lukali, ndeemba khukhufumia ewe.
Nga basiku base baba ne bakhwilukha,
bakwa asi mala babuna.
Sikila ewe obisianga bukhalaki mu buluungi,
khwako wakhalakiile ese mu bung'ali.
Ewe waukuumile Be Chikholo,
lundi wabuniisie bamayaanu,
se balikhebulilwa lundi tawe.
Se khulibona basiku befwe lundi tawe,
ewe wonakaake chingoba chabwe,
ne se aliio olibakhebulila tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omwami mindali,
akhwikhile endebe yewe eye bubwami khulwe bukhalaki.
Mala akhalakila sibala mu buluungi,
akhalakila babaandu mu bung'ali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali bubwilukhilo khwaabo babapisibwa siibi,
bubwilukhilo mu biise bie butinyu bioosi.
Ne abo bakhumanyile ewe balikhweyikina ewe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe se wanjuukhe abo bakhusaaya tawe.
Yimba ne khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oruka mu Sayuni!
Boolela babaandu Be Chikholo choosi kamalayi niko akholile koosi.
Wele akhebulilanga nibo babi bapia siibi,
ayeetanga abo bamumulilakho buli lwoosi,
lundi aukuuma abo bakholela baluungi kamabi.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, njalaale!
Lola siibi nisio ndimo sikila basiku base.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mbonie nio khafwa tawe.
Nio khufumie khulwe kamalayi niko ukholeele koosi,
khulwe buonia bwowo ndikhoya lukali,
ebweeni we babaandu ba Yerusalemu.
Babaandu Be Chikholo bakwile mwiloo nilio babeene bayaba,
mu lurimba nilwo babeene bareka.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga akhalakilanga babaandu mu bung'ali omwene ebululiile,
be bubwoni bakwa mu ndiimba nicho babeene barekire.
Lekha be bubwoni bakobole emakoombe,
ne naabo boosi baloba Wele.
Wele se akheebilile babaapisibwa siibi tawe,
buli lwoosi babanani balieyikina buyeeti bwa Wele.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, yiicha! Okhalekha babaandu bakhuminya ewe tawe!
Okhalekha khukhalakila Be Chikholo tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bakhole bakhurie ewe,
lekha bamanye bali nga babaandu busa bakhafwe.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siina sikila noba sinao?
Siina sikila ne wikisa siise nisio ese khupisibwa siibi?
Mu khwebonia babooni bapia bataambi siibi,
lekha bakwe mu mireko nikio babeene bareka.
Babooni bebonia sikila kamabi niko bekoomba,
be kumuliuliu balaama ne khukhwekaana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Babooni mu khwebonia khwabwe baloma bali “Wele se akhamanye tawe”
Kamebaasio kabwe koosi kali mbo, “Wele se aliio tawe.”
Banyoolanga buli siindu nisio benya.
Se bamanyile likhalaka lia Wele tawe.
Basiniola basiku babwe.
Baloma ali, “Se khulikhilwakho tawe,
Se khulibakho mu butinyu tawe.”
Bali khangu khuloma ke siikhonde ne kamabi.
Bekisa mu bichakha khu ngila mu birekere khukhwibuulila
abo bakhali ne kamabi tawe.
Bekhiina nibo benya khwira,
babekhiina niio bekisile nga etalang'i.
Bekhiina bataambi,
babatiilila mu mireko kiabwe ne khubakhuruura.
Bakhenyala tawe beerwa,
ne kamaani nga ka wanangali.
Babooni baloma bali, “Wele se abona tawe!
Afunyikhiliile, se anyala aabona tawe.”
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ukuuma babooni abo!
Okhebilila babapisibwa siibi tawe!
Siina sikila omwoni ne alekelesia Wele?
Siina sikila ne aloma ali, “Se alimbukuuma tawe?”
Ne kakhali ewe obona,
omanyile be butinyu ne siibi,
mala werekekha khubayeeta buli lwoosi.
Rusiao bunyali bwo mwoni,
muukuume khulwe bubwoni bwewe,
khukhwola bakhakholakho bario lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omwami owa buli lwoosi,
Be Chikholo che mu sibala siewe balibuna.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, olirekeeresia lisaba liabo bakhenyalila tawe.
Olibaramo kumwoyo.
Olikholela bung'ali bafuubi ne naabo babaminikha
nio babaandu busa bakhareerakho liiteremia lundi tawe.

Nilukhila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
munyala muriena mwamboolela muli,
“Yilukha nga enyuni ne purukha oche mungulu?
Sikila babooni bakangile buyiingo bwabwe,
mala barekekhe buembo bwabwe balasile baluungi mu siilima.
Kaaba bali kimisiingi kionakaakwe,
siina nisio omuluungi anyala akhola?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali mu lukaangu lwewe lutakatifu,
endebe eye bubwami eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli mwikulu,
aloleelela babaandu buli abuundu mala amanya niko balikho bakhola.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akelanga baluungi ne babooni,
mala abiila oyo owasiima sisiayuumba.
Akhachukhe kamaanda kaburukha
ekhuungu ekhafu eliba siiukuumo siabwe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuluungi,
asiima buluungi,
baluungi balimenya niio ali.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuyeete,
sikila balayi baweele,
basuubilwa se banyoolekhao lundi tawe.
Buli mundu abea owasie,
baloma ke bubeeyi ne bubacha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rusiao babeeyi boosi,
babeniinia lukali,
abo baloma bali, “Khulwe khubea khulanyoola nisio khwenya,
efwe khuli ne kiminwa,
naanu onyala akhuruka efwe?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sikila babanani bapisibwa siibi,
sikila bataambi balila buchuuni, ndeecha.
Ndabaelesia buliindi nibwo bekoombanga.”
Kamasuubisia ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kali kang'ali,
nga efwesa eyasiingwa mu mulilo kwe kumukuba,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuliinde,
khuliinde khukhwama khu selukho eye bubwoni yino.
Babooni bakhubotookheleele efwe,
ne babaandu bafumia bubwoni.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se olikhebulilakho ese lundi tawe?
Okhanjibilile buli lwoosi?
Olakisa bubweeni bwowo khukhwama khwise khukhwola liina?
Ndachiililila khuuba ne buchuuni mu mwoyo kwase khukhwola liila?
Ndaba mu sibeela endaalo khukhwola khu kiindi khukhwola liina?
Basiku base balekhoya khulwe butinyu bwase khukhwola liina?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase,
ngoboselie kamaani, okhalekha nafwa tawe.
Okhalekha basiku baloma bali, “Khwamuulile” tawe.
Okhalekha basiku base bebonia khulwe khukhumbula tawe.
Ne kakhali neyikina busiime bwowo bukhawechanga khwise tawe,
ndiekhoya khulwe buonia bwowo khwise.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khakhwimbile ewe,
sikila ukholeele ese kamalayi.

Boosi babeele babi busa,
bakholile kamabi kasinya.
Se aliio okhola kamalayi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ali mwikulu alolanga asi khu baandu,
abone bakesi ne balikhoo,
abone bamusayaanga ne balikhoo.
Ne kakhali boosi bakholile kamabi,
boosi alala babeele babi.
Se aliio okhola kamalayi tawe,
se aliio akhaba mulala tawe.
Babooni bano boosi se balimo bukesi tawe?
Bamila babaandu base oli bamila kumukaati,
mala se basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Nio baliba mu bireengo bikali,
sikila Wele ali lubeka lwe baluungi.
Babooni bachekheelela lilieyikina lio mubanani,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali bubwilukhilo bwewe.
Nekoomba ndi mbone bulekhuule ne bwolela Isiraeli khukhwama Sayuni!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga aliisiao kimiaandu kie babaandu bewe,
lisaaye lia Yakobo liliekhoya,
Baisiraeli balisangaala.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, naanu olicha mwieema liowo?
Naanu olimenya khu sikulu siowo sitakatifu.
Omundu oomenya limenya likhabiiywakho khu liosi liosi tawe, ne kakhali akhola kaali kamalayi,
lundi aloma bung'ali buuli mu mwoyo kwewe,
okhali ne kamakuto tawe,
mala se akholela owasie kamabi tawe,
namwe se aloma bubeeyi khu wasie tawe.
Omundu oyo alekelesia nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloba,
ne kakhali akoosia abo baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
akholanga koosi niko asuubisia, se akaluukhananga tawe, akhaba ne kali kamuumisia.
Omundu ario se ekopia khulwe khunyoola bukhala tawe,
se afukiilila asoya khulwe khunaania bakhali ne bubi tawe.
Oyo okhola kano koosi se alisisiikhwakho tawe.

Ee Wele, ndiinde sikila nilukhila mwiwe.
Naboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi, “Ewe Omwami wase,
se ndikho ne lilayi liosi liosi tawe,
ne kakhali ewe weng'ene.”
Ne khuloondekhana ne batakatifu baali mu sibala,
bali be lukoosi,
ne buli busangaafu bwase khukhwikhala nabo.
Abo basaaya bawele babaandi bakhabe mu bubeeleli bukali,
se ndiaana embosio khu bawele abo namwe ng'amulekho kamasina kabwe tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndi naye yeng'ene,
mala ambelesianga buli siindu nisio nenya,
bulamu bwase buli mu makhono kewe.
Wambelesie biianwa bilayi lukali,
ng'ali ndi ne kumukabwa kumulayi.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oungambilanga,
akhaba mu silo kamebaasio kase kanjekisia limenya.
Ali siimbi nase, khwako se ndakhilwa tawe.
Khwako ndasangaala ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi mala mbe ne khoyo,
kumubili kwase kwoosi kuuluukha mu muleembe.
namwe se okhalekhe omusuubilwa wowo abolele mu ng'ani tawe.
Ewe unjekesia engila eye bulamu,
khubao khwowo khuli ne khoyo engali,
busangaafu bwa mindali buli amukhono kwowo kumuseecha.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ulila khusaba khwase khulwe bung'ali,
rekeeresia khulila khwase khulwe buyeeti!
Ulila lisaba liase likhali lie bubeeyi tawe!
Khalakile mu bung'ali,
sikila omanyile bung'ali!
Kaaba bali okhaka kumwoyo kwase,
kaaba bali ungeniia siilo,
kaaba bali ukhaka,
se olanyoola mwise bumayaanu tawe.
Se ndomanga ke bubwoni tawe.
Khuloondekhana ne bikholwa bie babaandu,
ese nariire lilaka liowo,
ne se naloondile ke babaandu be sisiayuumba tawe.
Naloondile chingila chowo buli lwoosi,
ne senachilekhilekho tawe.
Ee Wele, ese khusaba ewe sikila olangobosia,
ndekeeresie mala oulile lisaba liase.
Ee Omuonia wabo bayiima bubwilukhilo mwiwe khukhwama khu basiku babwe,
yekesia busiime bwowo bwe khuukia bukhawa tawe.
Ndiinde nga oliinda endolelo eye moni yowo,
ngise mu siniini sie chindaa chowo.
Ngise khukhwama khu booni babakholela sisiayuumba,
khukhwama khu basiku babenya khu khunjira babambotookheleele.
Se balikho ne siisa tawe,
mala baloma ne sileka.
Basiku abo banoondakho,
nono bambotookheleele,
baliinda bubweyaangu bakhupe ngwe asi.
Bali nga etalang'i eyerekekhe khukhwira,
bali nga etalang'i eye kamaani ne yibuulila.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rakikha! Khupana nabo, bebwaakale!
Khulwe mbalu yowo, onia bulamu bwase khukhwama khu booni.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khulwe bunyali bwowo,
mbonie khukhwama khu basiku abo,
basiku babara limenya liabwe khu bie sibala busa.
Lekha banyalikhe khulwe siiukuumo nisio wabarekekhera,
lekha babaana babwe banyalikhe khutuuma sikelo,
lekha baramie sisiindi sibe sie babechukhulu benywe.
Ne kakhali ese ndikhubona sikila ndi omuluungi.
Ne ninyokha ndekhoya lukali khulwe khubao khwowo.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese nakhusiima,
ewe oli kamaani kase.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali lulwanda lwase,
niye ali lukoba lwase lwe bubwilukhilo lundi ali omusikuli wase.
Wele wase, lulwanda lwase,
bubwilukhilo bwase.
Engabo yase, lumako lwe buonia bwase,
lukoba lwase lusire.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Ese saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne ambonia khukhwama khu basiku base.
Kimikoye kie lifwa kiambotookhelela,
bibuli bie bubwonaki biaminya.
Kimikoye kie makoombe kiangara,
kimireko kie lifwa kiandiilile.
Mu butinyu bwase nasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nalilila Wele niye sayaanga anjeete.
Ne khukhwama mu Lukaangu lwewe aambulila,
mala bililo biase biamwolela mu maru kewe.
Nio sibala siareenga ne khukhwesisiikha,
kimisiingi kie bikulu kiosi kiaterema,
sikila Wele aaba ne lirima.
Arusia liliisi khukhwama mu moolu kewe,
afucha kumulilo kulasia khukhwama mukhanwa mwewe,
ne kamaanda kakesing'eng'ile kamwamamo.
Enamia likulu mala ekha asi,
ne lifuumbi limali lili asi we bikele biewe.
Aniina khu Kerubi mala apurukha,
echa khangu khu ndaa che mbeo.
Akhola sisiilima siaba sisibiimbilo siewe,
efuuma kamafuumbi ke fula kamasiro.
Kamaarara ne chinjaso che kumulilo biaama mu lueni ebweeni wewe,
mala biabirira mu mafuumbi kamamali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akukumila mwikulu nga efula,
ne kumumilo kwoyo owe Angaaki Lukali kwauliilikhana.
Alasa buembo bwewe asalanisia basiku bewe,
arusia chimbeni ne khubakoyaania.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga warafwira basiku bowo,
nga wabariikhirisia ne lirima liowo,
chisiba che nyanja checha chaba khwasie,
kimisiingi kie sibala kiabonekha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enaa khukhwama angaaki mala andiila,
andusia mu lusiba lwe kameechi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aasikula
khukhwama mu bunyali bwe basiku base be kamaani,
sikila baminya ese khulwe kamaani kabwe kamakali.
Nga naba mu butinyu, bandangana,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aniinda.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjeeta ne ndi mu butinyu,
asikula sikila namusiimisia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesia kumuruuru khulwe buluungi bwase,
ambiita chikhabi sikila se ndi ne bubi tawe.
Sikila naloonda chingila cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne se nalekhile Wele niye sayaanga tawe.
Nakhola koosi khulwe lilienya liewe,
ne se nafunakho kamalaka kewe tawe.
Se naba ne bubi ebweeni wewe tawe,
neliinda, se nakhola bubwoni tawe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesie kumuruuru khulwe buluungi bwase,
khulwe bulayi bwase ebweeni wewe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe omusuubilwa khwaabo baali basuubilwa, ewe
oli omulayi khwaabo baali balayi.
Khu baali bakwalaafu, weyekesianga khuuba omukwalaafu,
ne kakhali oli omurafu khwaabo baali bamayaanu.
Sikila asikulanga abo babeboombia,
ne kakhali abo babebonia ababoombia.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, undeereranga buwaanga,
undusiriangao sisiilima.
Nyala naula sipupu sie banamae khubirira khwiwe,
nyala nasuna lisiisi lie lukoba khulwe buyeeti bwa Wele wase.
Bikholwa bia Wele wase se bilimo bubi tawe,
endakaano ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli ng'ali,
ali engabo khwaabo boosi babelukhila mu niye.
Naanu ooli Wele ne akhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Naanu ooli lulwanda lwe buliindi ne akhali Wele wefwe?
Niye Wele yeng'ene oumbelesianga kamaani,
niye okholanga engila yase neba endayi.
ne anda mu muleembe khu bikulu.
Anjekesianga khu khuupana liie,
ne khufuumba buyiingo bwe kumukasa.
Ewe wambelesie engabo eye buonia bwowo,
kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha kwanjeetile,
khwako buyeeti bwowo bwakholile ese namanyikhaane.
Waniindile, se nareerwe mu siboe tawe,
ne khaulwakho tawe.
Ndimanianga basiku base mala mbatiila,
se mbalekhanga tawe khukhwola mbabunie.
Nabapa asi, ne se banyala khukhwinyokha tawe.
Balambaala asi mu bikele biase.
Ewe okholanga basiku base ne bakhilwa ebweeni wase,
sikila ewe umbelesianga kamaani ke khu khuupana liie.
Ewe okholanga basiku base banjilukha,
ne abo babambiila nababunia.
Basaba buyeeti, ne kakhali se abao obasikula tawe,
balilila akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne kakhali se abakobosia tawe.
Nabatubundula baaba nga lutamuusi nilwo ekhuungu etamuusia,
nabaswalakilila nga kamatosi khu ngila.
Ewe wasikula khukhwama mu siayuumba sie kholo yase,
ewe wakhola naba omwimeelesi we chikholo.
Chikholo nicho abeele khamanya tawe checha asi wase.
Nga baulilakho efuma yase, bambulila,
bareende becha basikamila.
Bareende bafwa kimiooyo,
barura mu ngoba chabwe chisire ne baterema mala becha.
Manyile ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amenyile mindali,
Lulwanda lwe buliindi bwase afume,
elesia luyali bunyali bwa Wele ousikulanga.
Niye Wele ounjiyachila,
oula chikholo chiili asi wase,
owasikula khukhwama khu basiku base,
Wele angoosia khukhila basiku base,
ewe wasikula khukhwama khu baandu be sisiayuumba.
mala niimbe khukhufumia ewe.
Aanaanga bukhili bukali khu mwami niye arobora,
lundi ekesianga busiime bukhawa tawe khu murobore wewe,
khu Daudi ne lisaaye liewe buli lwoosi.

Likulu liekesia luyali lwa Wele,
embaka elangilila kimilimo kiewe.
Buli ndaalo eboolela endaalo eloondakho,
buli siilo siboolela siilo siloondakho.
Khulomaloma namwe kamakhuwa se khuliio tawe,
kumumilo kwabio se kuuliilikhana tawe.
ne kamakhuwa kabio koola buli abuundu mu limala lioosi.
Wele ombakhamo enju eye nyanga,
nayo esoa nga omuseecha ocha khuselela ne arura mu siimba yewe,
nga omutimi owirekekhe khutima chimbilo.
Esoela lubeka lulala lwe likulu,
mala ebotookha yoola lubeka luluundi,
ne se siliio sisiekisa khukhwama khu bukhafu bwayo tawe.
Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili lilichufu,
litasa bulamu mu mundu.
Niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma kali ke khukhweyikinwa,
kaana limanya khwaabo babeboombia.
Kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kali ng'ali,
kasangaasia kumwoyo.
Lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili liluungi,
liaana limanya.
Buli bulayi khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khuchiililila buli lwoosi.
Niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abisia kaali ka ng'ali,
lundi koosi ke buluungi.
Kalimo engaanga khukhila esahabu,
kakhila akhaba esahabu endayi lukali.
Lundi kamanulu khukhila bubuukhi,
ne kumuketu kuli mwisasara.
Khutasa khwako ese omukholi wowo nyoolamo likaambila;
khulwe khukaloonda nyoola kumuruuru kumuboofu.
Ne kakhali naanu onyala amanya kamabi kewe omwene?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikule khukhwama mu mabi kase niko khamanyile tawe!
Okhandekha ese nakhola bubwoni ne manyile tawe,
okhalekha bubwoni bwanduka tawe!
Nio khabakho ne bubi tawe,
khabakho lundi mu bwoni tawe.
Ee Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lulwanda lwase lundi omusikuli wase,
Lekha kamakhuwa ke mukhanwa mwase ne kamebaasio ke mumwoyo mwase,
kafukiililwe ebweeni wowo,

Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuyeete ewe mu biise bie butinyu!
Lekha Wele niye Yakobo asaayanga akhuliinde!
Lekha akhuyeete ewe naali mu Lukaangu lwewe,
akhuabine naali khu sikulu sia Sayuni.
Lekha afukiilile biianwa biowo bioosi,
ne khusangaalila chimbosio chowo choosi.
Lekha akhuelesie nisio wikoomba,
ne khukhunyalila okhole koosi niko wibaasia!
Nio khukhayokele ne khukhwekhoya khulwe bukhili bwowo,
ne lekha khwekhoye khulwe bukhili bwowo mu khufumia Wele wefwe.
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhukholele ewe niko osaba koosi.
Nono namanyile ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alayeeta omwami omurobore wewe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne ali mwikulu atakatifu wewe alaulila lisaba lio mwami,
ne khulwe bunyali bwewe alamuelesia bukhili.
Balala bekinia khulwe kamakaari kabwe ke liie,
ne babaandi beyikina chifarasi chabwe,
ne kakhali efwe khweyikina bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.
Babaandu lukano olwo baliituya mala bakwe,
ne kakhali efwe khulinyokha mala khwime.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, elesia omwami bukhili,
khuulile efwe ne khu khusaba ewe okhuyeete

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omwami wefwe ekhoya khulwe bunyali bwowo,
mala asangaala lukali khulwe buyeeti bwowo!
Ewe wamuelesie nisio enya,
ne se walobile khumukholela niko asabile tawe.
Sikila ewe wamureereere chikhabi chingali,
ewe wamufwarire ekuutwa eye sahabu endayi khu murwe kwewe.
Akhusaba omuelesie bulamu mala wamuelesia,
limenya lileeyi lia buli lwoosi.
Abeele ne lukoosi lukali khulwe buyeeti bwowo,
wamuelesie efuma ne bunyali.
Ewe omubiita chikhabi buli lwoosi,
ewe omusangaasianga ne ekhoyo khulwe khubao khwowo.
Sikila omwami wefwe eyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne owe Angaaki Lukali ali ne busiime bukhawa tawe,
khwako omwami se ali ne buuri tawe.
Omwami alitiila basiku bewe boosi,

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khiingilila abo babakhiingilila,

Ne kakhali lekha abo boosi bakhwenya ewe,
basangaale ne khukhwekhoyela mwiwe.
Lekha abo babasiima buonia bwowo balome buli lwoosi bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Omukali!”
Ne samwene ndi omutaambi lundi omubanani,
ne kakhali Omwami aakhebulilanga ese.
Ee Wele wase, ewe niwe buyeeti,
ne buonia bwase, okhakhiinda tawe!

Abiitwa chikhabi oyo oyeeta bataambi!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimusikula mu biise bie butinyu,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimuliinda ne khumutasa bulamu,
alaangwa khuba owabiitwa chikhabi mu sibala,
ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se omulekha mu bunyali bwe basiku bewe tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuyeeta ne ali omulwale,
ne achuunwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe omuonia bulwaale bwewe bwoosi.
Samwene naloma ndi, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila ese nakhukholeele bubwoni, kholele siisa umbonie”
Basiku base bareeba mu khunjenyela kamabi bali,
“Akhafwe ndaalo siina mala ebililwe?”
Abo babeecha khu khumbona berusiamo busa,
bangalisia chilomo chimbi khwise,
mala bayiiya ne khuchilomela buli abuundu.
Babambiila boosi bali mu bimoonyo khwise,
bebaasia kamabi lukali khwise.
Baloma bali, “Alikho alwala lukali,
se alinyokha khu sisieelo siewe lundi tawe.”
oyo olichanga nase, angalukhaanekho.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kholele siisa mala umbonie,
ne ese ndieyacha khu basiku base.
Khwako omusiku wase se alambula tawe,
nio manye ndi nakhusiimiisie ewe.
Ne kakhali ewe wanindile sikila kholanga kamalayi,
mala wandeere niio ewe oli buli lwoosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli afume!
Amina Amina!

Ee Wele, ese khwikoomba ewe nga ekhisi
ne yikoomba kameechi.
Wele omenyile mindali, ese ndi ne bulesia bwe khuuba niio oli.
Ndiicha ndaalo sina niio oli mala khusaaye?
Ndila siilo ne kumuusi,
kamasika niko siakhulia siase siong'ene,
basiku base bachiililila khu khundeeba bali,
“Wele wowo ali waena?”
Kumwoyo kwase kuli kumusiro,
ne khebulila kakabira,
nga ne nachichanga munju eya Wele alala ne babaandu,
nga nabarangiriranga,
sipupu sie babaandu basangaafu,
babeemba ne khukalakasia
mu khufumia Wele.
Siina sikila ne sulunye?
Siina sikila ne khupwa siibi sino?
Ndara lilieyikina liase mu Wele,
ne khumufumia lundi,
oli omuonia wase lundi Wele wase.
Mu mbaambe muno ndi ne bubeeleli bukali,
ne khwako ndamweyikina.
Andereere bibuli bie bubeeleli bukali mu mwoyo kwase,
butinyu bumbatakho nga luluuchi lulwichuule,
nga kimikhula kiioloola ne kiikha mu luuchi lwa Yoritani,
khukhwama mu sikulu sia Herimoni ne Misiri.
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aasiime kumuusi ne busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe,
nio siilo ese mwimbile niye lulwimbo,
lisaba khu Wele oumbelesianga bulamu.
Nareeba Wele lulwanda lwe buliindi bwase ndi,
“Siina sikila ne unjibiliile?
Siina sikila ese ne njiililila khukhupisibwa siibi,
ne burafu bwe basiku base?”
Bukhomo bwabwe bwamalile,
nga bachiililila khu khundeeba bali, “Wele wowo ali waena?”
Siina sikila ne suluunye?
Siina sikila ne khupwa siibi sino?
Ndara lilieyikina liase mu Wele,
ne khumufumia lundi,

Ee Wele, bisia oli ese se ndikho ne bubi tawe,
mala uniinde khukhwama khu baandu bakhasuubila Wele tawe,
sikule khukhwama khu baandu babeeyi ne babi.
Sikila ewe niwe niye nilukhilamo,
siina sikila ne unjanjuukhe?
Siina sikila njililile khulila sikila basiku base bakhupia siibi?

ne khukhwimba khulwe khu khufumia ewe.
Siina sikila ne suluunye?
Siina sikila ne khupwa siibi sino?

Ee Wele, khwauliile ne kamaru kefwe,
bakuuka befwe bakhuboolele efwe,
bikholwa nibio wakholanga mu ndaalo chabwe,
mu ndaalo chichabira khaale,
ewe wamwene khulwe bung'ali bwowo watimania chikholo,
ne kakhali wesiao babaandu bowo,
ewe waukuuma chikholo,
ne kakhali waelesia bulekhuule babaandu bowo.
Sikila se banyoola sibala khulwe bulwaani bwabwe babeene tawe,
namwe se banyoola bukhili khulwe kamaani kabwe babeene tawe,
ne kakhali khulwe bunyali ne kamaani kowo,
ne bulayi bwe khubao khwowo,
sikila ewe wabasiima.

Oelesianga
Khubirira mwiwe efwe khuulaanga basiku befwe,
khubirira mwisina liowo khuswalakililanga bakhwibwaakala efwe.
Sikila se neyikine buyiingo bwase,
namwe embalu yase khukhumbonia tawe.
Ne kakhali ewe wakhuoniisie efwe khukhwama khu basiku befwe,
ne khukoyaania abo ba bakhubiila efwe.
Efwe khwachiililila khukhweyingila mu Wele,
ne efwe khulikhupila orio ewe Wele buli lwoosi.
Ne kakhali nono wakhwanjuukhe efwe lundi wakhulekhile efwe khuulwe,
mala se okeendelanga alala ne banamae befwe tawe.
Ewe wakila khwelukha basiku befwe,
mala bekhwaasia kimiaandu kiefwe.
Ewe wakhola khwaba nga kamakheese kayilwa khusiinjwa,
mala wakhusalanisia mu bibala.
Ewe wakusia babaandu bowo wamwene khu bukusi butiiti,
nga bakhalimo engaanga engali
Ewe wakhukholile efwe khwabeele sienya meno khu bachirani befwe,
abo ba baaba embi nafwe bakhuchekha efwe ne khu khulekelesia efwe.
Ewe wakhukholile efwe khwabeele chingacho akari we chikholo,
khwabeele chinjekho akari we chikholo.
Ese fwolobisibwa endaalo yoosi,
ne khuambwa chisoni,
khulwe kamakhuwa ke babaandu bakhuchekha efwe ne khu khukhoma efwe,
khulwe khubona basiku befwe nende babeyacha khwifwe.
Kano koosi kekholekhe khwifwe,
akhaba ne khukhakhwibiliile ewe namwe khwafunaka endakaano yowo nafwe tawe.
Se khwabeele bareengu khwiwe tawe,
namwe khwalekha engila yowo tawe.
Kakhaba kario ewe wakhulekha efwe ne khukhenyalila akari we chisolo,
ewe wakhwanjukha efwe mu siilima sikali po.
Liba bali efwe khwalekha khusaaya Wele wefwe,
mala khwasaba bawele Be Chikholo,
ng'ali andi Wele ewe wamanya likhuwa elio,
sikila ewe omanyile kamebaasio kaali mwifwe.
khubalwa nga kamakheese kaayilwa khukhwirwa.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sisimukha! Siina sikila nokona?
Yinyokha! Okhakhulekha efwe buli lwoosi tawe!
Siina sikila ne wikisa khukhwama khwifwe?
Siina sikila ne wibilila buchuuni ne butinyu bwefwe?

efwe khwalambaalile asi.

Khulwe busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe khusikule efwe!

Kumwoyo kwase kwechula kamakhuwa kamalayi,
ese nimbila omwami lulwimbo luno,
kumumilo kwase kuli nga omuandiki omulayi.
Ewe oli ne lukoondo lulayi khukhila baseecha boosi,
oli ne kumwalaalo kwe lulimi lulayi,
khwako Wele, akhubiitanga ewe chikhabi buli lwoosi.
Yee ewe owe kamaani,
yirekekha ne mbalu yowo mu sibaabi,
oli ne fuma ne lukoosi.
Chiililila mu lukoosi lwowo khunyoola bukhili,
khulwe khuliinda bung'ali ne buluungi!
Kamaani kowo kalikhuelesia ewe bukhili bukali.

bwira basiku bowo,
chikholo chiba asi wowo.
buliio mindali na mindali,
oruka babaandu bowo mu buluungi,
wasiima buluungi ne khubiila bubwoni.
Esio nisio sikila Wele, Wele wowo, ne akhurobore ewe,
mala akhutasile ewe busangaafu bukali,
khukhila babaami babaandi.
Chingubo chowo choosi chiunya kamafura ke bukusi bulayi nende uti,
babeembanga kimienya bakhwimbila ewe,
mu machipi niko basaa ne kimisaanga.
Bakhaana be babaami bali balala khu bakholi bowo be lukoosi,
ne kwini owifwarire kamamili,
ke esahabu emiliiu emile alubeka lwowo lwe kumukhono kumuseecha.
Ee mukhaana ulila, yibaasia ne khureka liiru liowo,
yibilila babaandu bowo ne balebe bowo,
ne omwami alasiima lukoondo lwowo,
niye omwami wowo, khwako okhoya omurie.
Babaandu ba Tiro balikhuelesia ewe biianwa,
baiinda balienya khu khusiimisia ewe.
Omwea wo mwami echa mwichipi,
ali ne lukoondo lulayi!
Engubo yewe yanabwa ne buusi bumelamela nga esahabu.
Ayilwa niio omwami ali ne efwarire engubo eye kamatoa kamalayi,
bakeesia bewe ne bamuelekesia,
mala bosi balikho bayilwa niio omwami ali.
Beecha mu busangaafu ne khoyo,
ne khukhwingila mwichipi lio mwami.
Ewe mwami wase, olinyoola babaana basoleeli bakali

ne olibakhola babe baruki be sibala sioosi.
Ndikhola lisina liowo lifumisibwe mu selukho choosi,
khwako chikholo chilikhufumia ewe mindali na mindali.

Wele ali bubwilukhilo ne kamaani kefwe,

Chinyanja chakhaoloola ne khusiukha

Luluuchi luliio lureeranga ekhoyo mu lukoba lwa Wele,

Wele aliluyeeta mu makhelebeende.

Baandunywe, ulila kano mweesi!
Rekeeresia, mumenyile mu sibala mweesi,
babenyalila nende bakhenyalila boosi,
baiinda alala ne babanani.
Khalome ke limanya,
kamebaasio kase kaliba ke bukesi.
Ndebaasia chisimo,
ne khukhwinoosia sifuno siacho,

Siina sikila mbe ne buuri mu biise bie butinyu,

Nisio omundu anyala aruunga se siolaana tawe,
achiililile khumenya buli lwoosi,
ne khuloba khufwa tawe.
Ng'ali alimanya ali akhaba be limanya bafwichanga,
basilu ne bang'ang'aafu bosi bafwichanga,
ne khulekhela babaandu kimiaandu kiabwe.
Biliindwa
niio bamenya khu selukho choosi,
akhaba babeene ne baba ne kimikuunda kiabwe.
Mu buiinda omundu se amanya ali alifwa tawe,

sisiakamo siabo
Bali nga kamakheese kayilwa khukhwirwa,

Emakoombe eliba lukoba lwabwe.
Ne kakhali Wele alimbukula ese,
alimbonia ese khukhwama mu bunyali bwe lifwa.
Okhaba ne liaayaaya omundu ne aindiaala tawe,
akhaba kimiaandu kiewe ne kiba kimikali tawe,
sikila ne alifwa se alicha na siindu tawe,
kimiaandu kiewe se kilimuloondakho tawe.

ne akhaba omundu ne anyoola efuma ne ekholela omwene kamalayi,
alicha emakoombe niio bakuuka bewe boosi bali,
niio sisiilima sili buli lwoosi.
Mu buiinda omundu se amanya ali alifwa tawe,
ne kakhali alifwa busa nga chisaang'i.

Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma,
alaanga babaandu be mu sibala sioosi khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo.

Wele wefwe alikho echa, se asilile busa tawe,
kumulilo kupupukhila ebweeni wewe,

nio akhalakile babaandu bewe.

abo babakhola endakaano nase,
khulwe khuana embosio khwise.”

Isiraeli, ndarusia buloli khubabiiya enywe.
Ese Wele, Wele wenywe.
Se ndikho mwikiicha enywe khulwe chimbosio chenywe,
ne biianwa bienywe bibiosie nibio mumbechanga buli lwoosi tawe.
Se neenya chiuunwa khukhwama mu mataala kenywe,
namwe chindurume khukhwama mu matuuli kenywe tawe.
Sikila buli esolo eye mundaa eli eyase,
ne chikhaafu chili khu ngulu chielefu.
Ese manyile chinyuni choosi,
ne bioosi bikeenda khu lukoongo bili bibiase.
“Mba ne njala, andi se nenaanile khubaboolela enywe tawe,
sikila sibala nende bioosi bilimo bili bibiase.
Ese ndichanga chinyama che chiuunwa,
namwe nywa kamalasile ke chimbusi ku?
Lekha khu khuupila ese Wele
ne khukholela ese owe Angaaki Lukali koosi niko mwelakana khwise.
Mu biise bie butinyu sabe ese,
ndimusikula enywe,
mala mukhafumie ese.”
Ne kakhali Wele areeba babooni ali,
“Siina sikila ne mubala busa kamalaka kase?
Siina sikila ne mulomaloma busa khuloondekhana ne ndakaano yase?
Sikila se mwenya mbakololosie enywe tawe,
se mwasiima kamalaka kase tawe.
Enywe ne mubona omwifwi, mufukiilisiana naye,
lundi muambaana ne baeeyi.
“Mwerekekha biise bioosi khuloma kamabi,
ne se mukhiinganga khuboola bubeeyi tawe.
Mwikhala khuloma kamabi khu wandaayenywe,
mukuta omwana owa maawenywe.
Mwakholile kano koosi ne se nang'amulekho siindu tawe,
nio mwebaasia muli ese ndi nga enywe?
Ne kakhali nono ese mwikiicha enywe,
mala napile likhuwa lino ebweeni wenywe.
“Rekeeresia kano enywe mukhambukulamo lukeendo tawe,
busa ese ndababunia enywe,
ne se alabao olabaonia enywe tawe.
Khu khupila ese orio niyo embosio ekobosia luyali khwise,
ne ng'ali ndionia boosi baulila kakaase.”

khuloondekhana ne busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe,
khuloondekhana ne siisa siowo sikali,
rusiao bubwoni bwase.
Siinge lukali nga osiinga engubo khukhwama mu bwoni bwase,

lundi biise bioosi khebulila bubwoni bwase.
ne khukhola kamabi ebweeni wowo,
khwako oli ng'ali mu khukhalakila ese,
oli na ng'ali khu khumbiiya ese.
Lola, ne mbulwa naba ne bubwoni,
ne nga naba munda mwa maayi naba ne bubwoni.
Lola, ewe wenya bung'ali mu mwoyo,
khwako njeyikie limanya.
Rusiao bubwoni bwase, mala ndamiliia,
siinge ese, mala ndaba omuwaanga nga kamaarara.
Yichusia mwise ekhoyo ne busangaafu,
lekha bikuumba nibio ewe ofuniakake biekhoye.
Mbeele bubwoni bwase,
ne khurusiao bubwoni bwase.
Ee Wele, sosia kumwoyo kumukwalaafu mwise,
mala ore liba liiya lundi lia ng'ali mwise.

ne okhandusiamo Roho wowo Omutakatifu tawe.
Ngoboselie ekhoyo eye buonia bwowo,
mala undeemo Roho wowo omulekhuule.
Nio ndekisia bamayaanu kamalaka kowo,
ne bamayaanu bakhakhukobolele.
Mbonie
Wele ewe oli buonia bwase,
ne ndilangilila lukali buonia bwowo.
Omwami, njeete khulomaloma bulayi,
ne ndikhufumia ewe.

andi nakhuelesie,
biianwa bie khukhwosia se bikhusiimisia tawe.

Ee Wele, ewe se oloba kumwoyo kukweboombia ne khukhwekanila tawe.
