ne biianwa bie khukhwosia,
ne chiuunwa chiliaanwa nga chimbosio khu alutare yowo.

bubwoni nibwo okholela babaandu batakatifu?
Orekekha libuna endaalo yoosi,
lulimi lwowo luli nga lubeko lulwooki,
ewe wibaasianga khukhola kamabi.
Ewe wasiima bubwoni khukhila buluungi,
ne khubea khukhila khuloma bung'ali.
Mubeeyi ewe, wasiima chilomo chichirisia babaandu!
Khwako Wele alikhubunia ewe buli lwoosi,
alikhutiila ne khu khurusia ewe mungo mwowo ne kamaani,
alikhurusia ewe mu sibala sie balamu.
Babaandu baluungi balibona kano mala barie,
nio balikhuchekha ewe ne baloma bali,
“Lola, omundu yuno se eyikina Wele khulwe buliindi tawe,
ne kakhali eyikina kimiaandu kiewe kimikali,
mala ayiima buliindi mu bwoni bwewe.”
Ne kakhali ese ndi nga kumuseituni munju eya Wele,
neyikina busiime bwa Wele bukhawa tawe, mindali na mindali.
Khakhupile orio buli lwoosi Wele sikila niko ewe ukholeele ese,
khalaangile ndi ewe omulayi ebweeni we babaandu bowo.

Boosi babeele babi busa.
Bakholile kamabi kasinya,
se aliio okhola kamalayi tawe.
Wele ne ali mwikulu alolanga asi khu baandu,
abone bakesi ne balikhoo,
bamusaayanga ne balikhoo.
Ne kakhali boosi bakholile kamabi,
boosi alala babeele babi.
Se aliio okhola kamalayi tawe,
se aliio akhaba mulala tawe.
Abo bakhola bubwoni se bali ne limanya tawe?
Bamila babaandu base oli balia siakhulia,
mala se basaaya Wele tawe?
Nio baliaamba bireengo bikali,
nibio bakhabaakho nabio tawe,
sikila Wele alisalanisia kimibili kie basiku bewe,
Wele abalobile,
ne khwako Baisiraeli bakhabaulile elala.
Nekoomba ndi mbone,
bulekhuule ne bwolela Isiraeli khukhwama Sayuni!
Omuonia Wele nga aliisiao kimiaandu kie babaandu bewe,
lulwibulo lwa Yakobo luliekhoya,
Baisiraeli balisangaala.

mu maani kowo mbelesie bulekhuule!
Ee Wele, ulila lisaba liase,
rekeeresia kamakhuwa kase.
Sikila babaandu babebonia bandangana ese,
babaandu bakuluumi benya khu khunjira ese,
se barangisia lia Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele ali omuyeeti wase.
Omwami niye omuliindi wase.
Lekha khulwe bubwoni bwabwe babeene,
Wele aukuume basiku base khulwe busuubilwa bwowo Wele, babunie.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese ndisangaala khuaana embosio khwiwe,
ese ndikhupila ewe orio sikila bulayi bwowo khwise.
Ewe wasikuule khukhwama mu butinyu bwase bwoosi,
lundi naboone basiku base ne bakhilwa.

Ee Wele, ulila lisaba liase,
ne khusaba okhalangula tawe.
Ndekeeresie mala unjeete,
butinyu bwase bwaminyile.
Birikhirisio bie basiku base binderemia ese,
bukuulumi bwe babooni bwaminyile.
Basiku base bandeerera butinyu,
bali ne lirima khwise lundi bambiile.
Ndi ne buuri bukali,
biriisio bie lifwa binderemia lukali.
Buuri ne khuterema biangwilekho,
bireengo biaminyile.
Lundi ndoma ndi, “Abaanga ndikho chindaa nga liuusi!
Nakhapurukhe nacha mala nauluukha.
Nakhapurukhe nacha aleeyi,
mala namenya mu sichiimi.
Nakhakholile khangu khunyoola niio nekhiinga
ekhuungu nende embembeesi.”
Ee Omwami, yonakaka kamarekekha ke basiku base,
koyaania lilomaloma liabwe,
sikila naboone sisiayuumba ne kamaaya mu lukoba.
Siilo ne kumuusi kabotookhelela lisiisi lie lukoba,
mala bumayaanu ne butinyu bili mu lukoba.
Bubwonaki buli buli abuundu mu lukoba,
bukuluumi ne bubwifwi biechuule khu ngila che mu lukoba.
Abaanga bali omusiku wase niye oukhoma ese, andi nefwiliisie.
Abaanga bali omuyingani wase niye owebonia khwise andi namwibachile.
Ne kakhali niwe, owasiase,
niye khwamanyana, omusaale omusiime wase.
Khwakachulanga bulayi nga basaale,
ne khusaayila alala mu Lukaangu.
Lekha lifwa litundubikhe basiku base,
lekha beekhe emakoombe ne basiili balamu,
bubwoni buli mu ngoba ne kimiooyo kiabwe.
Ne kakhali ese saba Wele,
ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimbonia ese.
Niloocha ne khulila mutikhinyi, mwiangilwe, ne akolooba,
mala alimbulila ese.
Alingobosia mu muleembe khukhwama mwiie,
niko khupana ne basiku babanjibwaakala bakali bario.
Wele, oorukanga khukhwama mindali,
aliimbulila mala abaule,
sikila balobile khukaluukhasia liba liabwe,
mala se baria Wele tawe.
Owasiase ebwakaale basaale bewe,
afuna endakaano yewe.
Chilomo chewe chiseletekha bulayi khukhila liboonda,
ne kakhali aba ne burangani mu mwoyo kwewe,
lulimi lwewe lwaola khukhila kamafura,
ne kakhali lukhaaba nga embalu eyokiia.
Lekhela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi busiro bwowo,
ne alakhuyeeta ewe,
se alifukiilila baluungi bakhilwe tawe.
Ne kakhali, ee Wele, olibamwaata mu ng'ani,
babaandu babeeri ne babeeyi,
se balimenya bakhalikhanie limenya liabwe tawe.
Ne kakhali ese khare lilieyikina liase mwiwe.

sikila babaandu banjibwakaale ese,
basiku base bakhupia ese siibi biise bioosi,
basiku base banjibwaakala biise bioosi,
sikila bakali mu sileka siabwe bapana nase, ee owe Angaaki Lukali.
Buuri ne bundiila ese,
nda lilieyikina liase mwiwe.
Ese neyikina mu Wele ne se ndi ne buuri tawe,
ese fumia Wele khulwe ndakaano yewe,
siina nisio omundu busa anyala akhola khwise?
Biise bioosi benya khukhwonaka kamarekekha kase,
mu mebaasio kabwe koosi beenya kamabi kanyoole ese.
Bebuusia alala abuundu niio bekisa,
ne khuloleelela buli siindu nisio ese khola,
mu khwenya khu khunjira.
Ee Wele, baukuume khulwe bubwoni bwabwe,
mwirima liowo ula babaandu abo!
Ewe omanyile khuluywa khwase,
wakelile khukhila khwase,
kano se kali mu sitabu siowo Wele?
Khu ndaalo niyo khusaba ewe,
basiku base balikhilwa.
Ese manyile ndi Wele
Mu Wele, niye ese fumia likhuwa liewe,
mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niye ese fumia likhuwa liewe,
se ndi ne buuri khu khweyikina mu Wele tawe,
siina nisio omundu busa anyala akhola khwise?
Ee Wele, ese khakhole niko nelakana khwise,
ese khakhuelesie biianwa bie khu khupila ewe orio.
Sikila ewe Wele wasikuule ese khukhwama mwifwa,
ne khu khuniinda ese khakhilwa tawe.
Ne khwako ese mba niio ewe oli Wele,
mu buwaanga bwe bulamu.

sikila ese nilukhila mwiwe,
ese nilukhila asi we chindaa chowo,
khukhwola nga biise nibio embembeesi eye libuna ewao.
Ese ndilila Wele owe Angaaki Lukali,
Wele owolesianga lilienya liewe khwise.
Alindeerera buonia khukhwama mwikulu ne khu khumbonia ese,
aliambia chisoni abo babanjibwaakala ese.
Wele alira khwise busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe ne busuubilifu bwewe.
Basiku bangarire ese,
bali nga chitalang'i chilichanga babaandu.
Kameeno kabwe kali nga kamafumo ne buembo,
chindimi chabwe chili nga chimbalu chinjoki.
Ee Wele, eebwa luyali angaaki we likulu!
Lekha luyali lwowo lukaliie khu sibala sioosi.
Basiku base barekekha luriimba khu khundiila ese,
ese neunamile khulwe bubeeleli.
Bayaba buko khu ngila yase,
ne kakhali bakwilemo babeene.
Ee Wele, ese ndi ne lilieyikina likali,
ndiimba ne khu khufumia ewe!
Siisimukha ee mwoyo kwase!
Siisimukha enywe lituungu ne siilili!
Ese ndasiisimusia kamakhelebeende!
Ee Omwami, ese ndakhupila ewe orio akari we chikholo,
ese ndakhufumia ewe akari we chikholo.
Sikila busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe buli bukali khukhwola mwikulu,
busuubilifu bwowo bwoola mu maleesi.
Ee Wele, eebwa luyali angaaki we likulu!
Lekha luyali lwowo lukaliie khu sibala sioosi!

Baruki
Mukhalakilanga babaandu boosi mu buluungi ku?
Tawe! Enywe mwibaasia busa khukhola kamabi,
ne khukhola bikholwa bie sisiayuumba mu sibala.
Babooni bakhola bubwoni khukhwama nga baba munda mwa mawaabwe,
bakhola kamabi khukhwama nga ne basaalwa,
balomanga ke bubeeyi.
Bali ne buchiba nga buchiba bwe ndemu,
baminyaala nga nafwo eyikaale kamaru,
Khwako se eulila kumumilo kwabo baosianga chindemu,
namwe lulwimbo lwo mutiili we chindemu omukesikesi tawe.
Ee Wele, pongola kameeno kabwe,
ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuula kameeno ke chitalang'i che kamaani!
Lekha baweo nga kameechi ne kateenya,
lekha baswalakililwe asi nga bunyaasi mala boome.
Lekha babe nga likhumuniu liwelelela ne liba nga limila,
lekha babe nga omwana owibulwa ne afwiile,
okhabonakho buwaanga tawe.
Basiulwa nga kamasibaayi ne bakhamanyile tawe,
mwirima liewe likali, Wele alibamwaata ne basiili balamu.
Baluungi balisangaala nga balibona babooni ne baukuumwa,
balibirira mu mafuki ke babooni.
Babaandu baliloma bali, “Ng'ali baluungi baebwa kumuruuru,
Ng'ali Wele ookhalakilanga sibala aliio.”

ndiinde ese khukhwama khwaabo babanjibwaakala!
Sikule ese khukhwama khwaabo bakhola bubwoni,
mala umbonie khukhwama khu beeri.
Lola! Banjekhiina banjire,
babaandu bakuluumi becha alala khu khunjibwaakala.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se lili khulwe bubwoni bwase bwosi bwosi namwe bumayaanu nibwo ese kholile,
namwe bubi bwase bwosi bwosi,
nio batimeo khukhwerekekha tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi,
yinyokha mala oukuume chikholo,
okhakholelakho siisa babooni be bubacha tawe!
Buli ekolooba bakobola,
baulukhuma nga chimbwa,
ne bakeendakeenda mu lukoba.
Rekeeresia bukhomo ne birikhirisio biabwe,
chindimi chabwe chili nga chimbalu mu minwa kiabwe,
ne eyi bebaasia bali se aliio oulila niko baloma tawe.
Ne kakhali ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, obachekha,
ewe ochekheelela chikholo choosi.
Ee maani kase, ese ndimba khu khufumia ewe,
sikila ee Wele, ewe oli bubwilukhilo bwase.
Wele wase mu busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe alinjeeta ese,
Wele wase alindekha mbone khuulwa khwe basiku base.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omuliindi wefwe,
okhabeera tawe, busa babaandu base bakhola bario bebilila,
khu maani kowo bakhole batalitaale mala obaule.
Bubwoni buli khu ndimi chabwe,
chilomo chabwe choosi chili che bubwoni.
Lekha batiilwe mu liebonia liabwe.
Mwirima liowo babunie,
babunisilie elala,
sikila balaama ne khubea,
Nio buli mundu alimanya ali Wele aruka mu Isiraeli,
alimanya ali buruki bwa Wele buli khu sibala sioosi.
Buli ekolooba bakobola,
baulukhuma nga chimbwa,
ne bakeendakeenda mu lukoba.
Bayiiyayiiya khuyiima siakhulia,
mala ne bakhekura tawe, baulukhuma.
Ne kakhali ese ndimba lukali mu mutikhinyi khufumia busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe.
Sikila ewe wabeele omuliindi wase,
ne bubwilukhilo bwase mu biise bie butinyu.
Ee maani kase, ese ndimba khu khufumia ewe,
sikila ee Wele, ewe oli bubwilukhilo bwase,
Wele ounjekesianga ese busiime bukhawa tawe.

ewe wabeele omukhalafu khwifwe,
ne kakhali nono khukobolele efwe.
Ewe wakholile sibala siatereeme,
lundi ewe wasiaruuremo,
nono yikasia chinjafwa chasio,
sikila silikho sikeyukhamo.
Ewe wakholile babaandu bowo baapwe siibi lukali,
efwe khutaalitaala oli ne khumeelile.
Ewe wamanyiisie abo babakhuria ewe,
nio banyale khukhwilukha libuna.
Khulwe bunyali bwowo khuonie efwe,
khuyeete khulwe lisaba liefwe,
nio babaandu nibo ewe wasiima basikulwe.
Wele alomeele Abuundu Atakatifu wewe ali,
“Mu bukhili bwase ndiaruramo lukoba lwa Shekemu,
mala ngabe babaandu base litooma lia Sukoti.
Kibeati sibala siase, Manase eyase,
ekholo eya Efuraimu ekofia yase eye sibia,
Yuda eruungu yase eye bubwami.
Sibala sia Moabu sili lucho lwase lwe khusaabilakho,
sibala sia Edomu sisiase,
ese khupa luyoka lwe bukhili khu sibala sie Bafilisiti.”
Ee Wele, naanu okhambile ese mu lukoba lusire?
Naanu oliindangirira ese khucha Edomu?
Ee Wele, ewe se wakhulobile efwe tawe ku?
Ee Wele, ewe se walobile khucha mwiie ne banamae befwe tawe ku?
Khuyeete khuule omusiku,
sikila buyeeti bwe babaandu se bukhola siindu tawe.
Wele nali lubeka lwefwe khulakhila,
alaula basiku befwe.

Ee Wele, ulila khulila khwase,
rekeeresia lisaba liase.
Khulilila ewe khukhwama khu siakamo sie sibala, nendi ne kumwoyo kufuniikhe,
ndangirire niine khu lwanda nilwo khanyala khuniina tawe;
sikila ewe omuliindi wase,
omuliindi wase owe kamaani khu basiku base.
Ndekhe ese menye Abuundu Atakatifu wowo,
ndekhe mbe ne kumuleembe asi we chindaa chowo.
Sikila ewe ee Wele, wauliile endakaano yase khwise,
ne ewe wambelesie ese kumukabwa nikwo oelesianga abo ba bakhuria ewe Wele.
Leeyia bulamu bwo mwami,
lekha kimiiko kiewe kichiililile khu selukho choosi!
Ee Wele, mulekhe aruke buli lwoosi ebweeni wowo,
liinda Omwami mu busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe,
ne bubweyikinwa bwowo.
Nio buli lwoosi ndiimba chinyimbo che khu khufumia ewe,
nga ne khukholela ewe niko nelakana khwiwe.

Ese ndindiilila mu liekhaliilikha Wele ambonie,
Ese neyikina niye yeng'ene.
Niye yeng'ene ali lulwanda lwase, lundi ali buonia bwase,
niye lukoba lwase lwe bubwilukhilo,
ne se ndateremakho tawe.
Enywe mweesi mwibwaakala omundu khukhwola siise siina?
Omundu otaamba kamaani nga lumako lulikho ne lutengaala?
Enywe murekekha khumukwisia niye khukhwama mu lukoosi lwewe.
Musangaalila bubeeyi.
Mubiita chikhabi emunwa busa,
ne kakhali munda mulaama.
Ese ndindiilila mu liekhaliilikha Wele ambonie,
ese neyikina niye yeng'ene.
Niye yeng'ene ali lulwanda lwase, lundi ali buonia bwase,
niye lukoba lwase lwe bubwilukhilo,
ne se ndateremakho tawe.
Buonia bwase ne lukoosi lwase biama khu Wele,
niye ali lulwanda lwase lwe kamaani, bubwilukhilo bwase buli mu Wele.
Baandu base, yeyikina mu Wele biise bioosi,
boolela Wele butinyu bwenywe bwoosi,
sikila niye ali bubwilukhilo bwefwe.
Babaandu boosi bali nga kumuuya busa,
babenyalila nende bakhenyalila bafwaanane,
se balimo engaanga tawe.
Bare khu sikelo, ne se babaamo busiro tawe,
bali babaangu khukhila kumuuya busa.
Okhara lilieyikina mu siayuumba tawe,
okheyikina khunyoola engaanga yosi yosi mu bunuuli tawe,
kimiaandu kiowo kiakhatasikha, okhakieyikina tawe.
Lwe bweeni Wele alomaloma,
nauliile kano biise bikali,
ndi bunyali buli bwa Wele,
sikila ewe ee Omwami, oelesia omundu kumuruuru
khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biewe.

nga omundu owe bulesia, kumwoyo kwase kukhwenya ewe,
ndi nga kamaloba kamoomu kakhalikhoomo engakha ne kameechi tawe.
Ndekhe ese khubone ewe abuundu wowo atakatifu,
ndekhe ese mbone bunyali ne lukoosi lwowo.
Sikila busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe bukhila bulamu,
ese ndikhufumia ewe.
Ndikhupila ewe orio mu biise bioosi bie bulamu bwase,
ndisuta mu ngaaki kamakhono kase mala mbaane lisaba khwise.
Kumwoyo kwase kusangaala nga kuuli mu naikara ne biinulu,
mala niimbe chinyimbo che busangaafu khu khufumia ewe.
Khukhebulilanga ewe ne ngonile khu sitanda,
khwibaasianga ewe siilo sioosi,
sikila obechanga omuyeeti wase buli lwoosi,
ese niimba khulwe khoyo mu siniini sie chindaa chowo.
Ese niimba khwiwe,
mala kumukhono kwowo kwe bunyali kuniinda ese.
Ne kakhali abo babenya khu khunjira ese,
baliikha emakoombe.
Baliirwa ne bali mwiie,
ne namuunyu kililia kimibili kiabwe.
Omwami aliekhoya sikila Wele amuelesianga bukhili.
Abo babelakana mwisina lia Wele balimufumia niye ne kakhali kiminwa kie babeeyi kikhaakamisibwe.

Wele, ese ndi mu butinyu, ulila lisaba liase!
Nariire basiku base, onia bulamu bwase!
Ngise ese khukhwama mu bukwangwaani bwe babooni mu bwikisi,
khukhwama mu bukwangwaani bwe babi.
Baakala chindimi chabwe nga chimbalu,
ne khulasa chilomo chindafu nga buembo,
Balasa khukhwama niio bekhiiniile bakhali ne bubi tawe,
babalasa mu khutundubikha ne se baria tawe.
Batinyilisiana mu marekekha kabwe ke bubwoni,
baboolana khurekekha chindimi mu bwikisi,
bebaasia bali, “Naanu onyala akhubona efwe?
Naanu onyala amanya bubwoni bwefwe?
Khwakwangwaanile khukhola likhuwa lie bubacha bukali.”
Sikila kamebaasio ne kumwoyo kwo mundu bili bibiindu bibiekisa!
Ne kakhali Wele alibalasa buembo bwewe,
baliumiia butundubikha.
Alibabunia khulwe chilomo chabwe
boosi balibabona balibakhondoola.
Nio babaandu boosi baliria,
baliboola niko Wele akholile,
lundi bebaasia niko akholile.
Lekha baluungi bekhoye mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala belukhile mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lekha baluungi boosi bamufumie!

Ee Wele, okhoya onyoole efuma mu Sayuni,
ne koosi ke ndakaano khwiwe kalikholwa.
Yee ewe Wele oulilanga lisaba liefwe!
Babaandu boosi baliicha khwiwe,
khulwe bubwoni bwabwe.
Bubwoni bwefwe ne bukhuminyile efwe,
ewe okhubeelanga.
Bali ne khabi abo nibo orobora,
nibo oreera khumenya abuundu wowo atakatifu.
Efwe khulinyalikha ne bulayi bwe nju yowo,
bulayi bwe Lukaangu lwowo lutakatifu!
Ewe okhuyeeta nga efwe khulwe khu khuelesia efwe bukhili,
lundi okhola nga bikholwa bie khuukia khu khusikula efwe.
Babaandu khu sibala sioosi,
nende baali engelekha we chinyanja aleeyi bakhweyikina ewe.
Wamwene waloonga bikulu khu maani kowo,
ne khukhwekesia bunyali bwowo.
Ewe owoleelesianga chinyanja chioloola,
ne bibuli biyokela,
owoleelesianga babaandu be sisiayuumba.
Babaandu be mu sibala boosi bauka lukali,
khulwe bikholwa bie khuukia nibio okholile.
Ewe oliindanga sibala mu khureera efula,
osiraamo engakha engali.
Oreeranga efula engali mu mikuunda,
ne khuchukhamo kameechi kamakali,
ewe oolaosianga liloba khulwe fula,
lundi okila bimelwa bitoro bikhula.
Ewe oanaanga likesa likali lie kumwiiko,
buli abuundu niio ocha bibiaamo bikali bibao.
Kamayilwe ke mu sichiimi kanerire,
ekhoyo yechuule mu ngulu,
chikeewa chechuule kiminyele kie bibiaayo,
kamatooma kechuule bibiaamo,
biyokela ne khukhwimbila alala nga babaandu khulwe khoyo.

Baandunywe mweesi,
fumia Wele ne luyoka lwe khoyo!
Yiimba luyali lwewe,
muelesie efuma eye luyali!
Boolela Wele muli, “Bikholwa biowo bili bie khuukia!
Kamaani kowo kali kamakali po,
khukhwola basiku bowo befuliabe ebweeni wowo.
Buli mundu khu sibala akhusaaya ewe,
beemba khu khufumia ewe,
beemba khufumia lisina liowo.”
Yiicha mubone niko Wele akholile,
akholile ke khuukia mu baandu.
bakuuka befwe bakeenda ne khukhwambukha luluuchi.
Ebweeneyo khwekhoya sikila niko aakhola.
Mu bunyali bwewe aruka buli lwoosi,
ne chimoni chewe chili khu kholo chichiindi.
Bareengu khu Wele bakhabao tawe.
Be chikholo enywe mweesi fumia Wele wefwe,
lekha khufumia khwenywe kuuliilikhane.
Se alekhile khu khuelesia efwe bulamu tawe,
lundi se akhulekhile efwe khuulwe tawe.
Sikila ewe, ee Wele, wakhukelile efwe,
ewe wakhukelile efwe nga okela efwesa.
Wakhulekha efwe khwakwa mu lurimba,
ne khu khutiuukha efwe busiro bukali.
Ewe walekha basiku bakhuswalakilila efwe,
efwe khwapisiibwe siibi oli babaandu bakwile mu mulilo ne kameechi,
ne kakhali nono wakhureerire abuundu we kumuleembe.
Ndireera biianwa bibiosie munju mwowo,
ndikhukholela niko nelakana khwiwe.
Ndikhukholela niko naloma ndi khakhole,
nga naba mu butinyu.
Ndiaana kamakheese ke khukhwosibwa khu alutare,
ndiaana embosio eye chiuunwa ne chimbusi,
ne liliisi liliniina mu ngaaki.
Enywe mweesi mu mwaria Wele, yiicha mala muulile,
ne ndaloma niko akholeele ese.
Nasaba Wele lukali khulwe buyeeti,
neemba khumufumia niye.
Abaanga bali nakisa bubwoni mu mwoyo kwase,
andi Omwami se andekeeresia tawe.
Ne kakhali ng'ali Wele ambuliile ese,
arekeeresie lisaba liase.
Wele afume,
sikila se alobile lisaba liase,
namwe se andusiisiekho busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe.

Lekha Wele abe ne kumwalaalo khwifwe,
ne khu khubiita efwe chikhabi,
lundi abe ne siisa khwifwe,
nio sibala sioosi simanye lilienya liowo,
chikholo choosi chimanye bunyali bwowo bwe buonia.
Ee Wele, lekha chikholo chikhufumie ewe,
lekha chikholo choosi chikhufumie ewe.
Lekha chikholo chisangaale ne khukhwimba khulwe khoyo,
sikila ewe okhalakilanga chikholo mu bung'ali,
ne khu khwimeelela chikholo khu sibala.
Ee Wele, lekha chikholo chikhufumie ewe,
lekha chikholo choosi chikhufumie ewe!
Sibala siaamile bibiaamo biasio,
Wele, Wele wefwe, akhubiitile efwe chikhabi.
Wele akhubiitile efwe chikhabi,
lekha babaandu boosi buli abuundu barie Wele.

Lekha Wele enyokhe basiku bewe basalanile.
Lekha abo bababiila Wele belukhe khukhwama ebweeni wewe!
Nga liliisi ne litamuusibwanga, nono batamuusie bache
bulayi bwene nga embuula ne inakulukhaanga ne eli siimbi ne kumulilo,
lekha bamayaanu babune ebweeni wa Wele!
Ne kakhali baluungi basangaala ne khukhwekhoyela ebweeni wewe,
bali ne busangaafu lundi bayokela khulwe khoyo.
Yiimbila Wele, yiimba khufumia Wele,
rekekhera oyo engila owichila khu mafuumbi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili lisina liewe,
sangaala ebweeni wewe!
Wele, amenyile mu Lukaangu lwewe Lutakatifu,
alelanga bafuubi ne khuliinda banamulekhwa.
Aelesianga be nyuunga lukoba khumenyamo,
lundi arangiriranga baboe khubayila mu bulekhuule bwe busangaafu,
ne kakhali bareengu balimenya mu siangalaamwe.
Ee Wele, nga ewe ne warangirira babaandu bowo,
nga wakeenda wabirira mu siangalaamwe,
sikila khubao khwa Wele owa Sinai,
sikila khubao khwa Wele owa Isiraeli.
Ewe wakila efula yakwa,
mala wakobosia engakha mu sibala siowo,
babaandu bowo bamenyamo,
mu bulayi bwowo waliinda babanani.
Omwami arusia lilaka
mala bakhasi bakali balaangilila likhuwa bali,
“Babaami ne banamae babwe balikho belukha!”
Bakhasi engo bakabana nibio banamae banuula mwiie,
bifwaani bie kamauusi bibiamaalwakho efwesa,
chindaa chabio chichabakho esahabu chamelamela.
(Siina sikila balala khwinywe ne mwekisa mu siko sie kamakheese khu ndaalo eye liie?)
Nga Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi ne asalanisia babaami eyo,
ebarafu yakwa khu Salimoni
Sikulu sia Bashani sileeyi lukali,
sikulu sie bikulu bikali!
Siina sikila ne olola ne siikhalikhali, ewe sikulu sie bikulu bikali,
khukhwama khu sikulu
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimenyakho buli lwoosi!
Omwami echa Abuundu Atakatifu khukhwama Sinai
ne kamakaari ke kamaani chielefu ne chielefu.
wacha ne baboe bakali,
wanyoola biianwa khukhwama khu baandu,
akhaba khukhwama khwabo bakhola bureengu,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oole khumenyakho.
Fumia Omwami,
omwami okhuyeetanga efwe buli ndaalo,
ali Wele okhuonianga efwe.
Wele wefwe ali Wele oonianga,
ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omwami wefwe,
okhusikulanga efwe khukhwama mwifwa.
Wele ng'ali alitubundula kimirwe kie basiku bewe,
kimirwe kiaabo babakhayila mu miima kiabwe kie bubwoni.
Omwami alomile ali,
“Ese ndikobosia basiku benywe khukhwama Bashani,
ese ndibakobosia khukhwama mu siba che nyanja,
nio enywe munyale khuswala mu mafuki kabwe,
mala chimbwa chenywe chinyale khukhoomba sikelo nisio chenya.”
Ee Wele, babaandu boosi babona likeenda liowo lie bukhili,
likeenda lia Wele, omwami wase,
ne acha Abuundu wewe Atakatifu.
Babeemba barangiire, ne bakhupi be kamatuungu bali enyuma,
bakhaana bakhupa chitamburini bali akari.
“Enywe lisaaye lia Yakobo fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
fumia Wele mu mukhung'aano kwe babaandu!”
Benjamini lurangira, lisaaye litiiti lukali,
nio babemeelesi ba Yuda ne sipupu siabwe baloondekho,
ne enyuma babemeelesi ba Sebuluni ne Nafutali.
Ee Wele, yekesia bunyali bwowo,
bunyali nibwo wekesia sikila efwe,
noli mu Lukaangu lwowo mu Yerusalemu,
niio babaami bakhurerera ewe biianwa.
Rafwira Misiri, esolo eye mu makoloolwe eyo,
rafwira chikholo, lituuli lie chiuunwa ne chimoosi chacho echo,
khukhwola boosi bakhurie ewe ne khu khuelesia ewe efwesa yabwe.
Babemeelesi baliicha khukhwama e Misiri,
Baesopia balisuta kamakhono kabwe mu ngaaki mwisaba khu Wele.
Yiimbila Wele, enywe babaandu be bibala bioosi,
yiibila Omwami efuma,
yiimbila oyo okeendanga khwikulu,
likulu liliabao khukhwama khaale.
Rekeeresia khu khokha khwe kamaani khwewe.
Langilila bunyali bwa Wele,
bubwami bwewe buli khu Isiraeli,
bunyali bwowo buli mwikulu.
Wele ali owe khuukia ne ama abuundu wewe atakatifu,
Wele owa Isiraeli!
Aelesianga babaandu bewe kamaani ne bunyali.
Wele afume!

Ee Wele, mbonie ese!
Sikila kameechi koolile mwikosi mwase.
Ndikho ngwa mu lutoondoyi,
abuundu niio nda sikele tua,
nakwiile mu lusiba lwe kameechi,
mala bibuli bie kameechi bili siimbi khu khusiikha.
Naluile lukali khulwe khulila khwase,
kumumilo kwase kwekaale.
Chimoni chase chaluiliile,
khulwe khuliinda buyeeti bwa Wele.
bali bakali khukhila lichuune lie khu murwe khwase.
Basiku base baloma ke bubeeyi khwise,
bali ne kamaani lundi benya khu khunjira.
Bambingilila ngobosieyo bibiindu nibio ese kheeba tawe.
Ee Wele, ewe omanyile busilu bwase,
ese se nyala nakhukisa ewe bubwoni bwase tawe.
Ee Omwami WELE owe banamae,
ese khakila abo bakhweyikina ewe baambwa chisoni tawe.
Ee Wele owa Isiraeli,
ese khakila abo bakhusaaya ewe bachangalaala tawe.
Sikila ewe Wele niwe okila ne bakhoma ese,
niwe okila ne mba ne chisoni chingali.
Ese nabeele nga omukwa khu balebe base,
nga okhamanyikhaane khu balebe base tawe.
mala bukhomo nibwo bakhukhoma ewe buba khwise.
Ese nga neboombia
bwaba bukhomo khwise.
Nga nakhola kamakuma kaba chingubo chase,
nekela chingacho chabwe.
Ne bali mu baandu baapa chimbakha khwise,
lundi bameesi beemba kimienya khwise.
Ne kakhali ese ndikhusaba ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele, njeete ese mu biise nibio ewe oroboore.
Njeete ese sikila busiime bwowo bukali,
sikila ewe okhola nga ne wasuubisia oli olimbonia.
Mbonie ese khakwa mu matosi tawe,
ndiinde ese khukhwama khu basiku base,
khukhwama mu lusiba lwe kameechi.
Okhalekha kumukhula kwakhulukusia ese tawe,
okhandekha nakwa mu lusiba,
namwe neekha emakoombe tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, njeete sikila busiime bwowo bulayi bukhawa tawe,
ndole ese khuloondekhana ne siisa siowo sikali.
Okhaloba khubonekhela omukholi wowo tawe,
sikila ndi mu butinyu khola bwangu khu khunjeeta.
Yiicha embi niio ndi, usikule,
mbelesie bulekhuule khukhwama khu basiku base.
Ewe omanyile nga bakhoma ese,
nga banjangalaasia ne khu khufwolobia ese.
Bukhomo bunjuunia kumwoyo lukali,
khukhwola ndaambe lilieyikina.
Nenya babakholela ese siisa,
ne kakhali se babao tawe,
nenya babamboleelesia,
ne se nabanyoola tawe.
nga naba bulesia, bambelesia endali endulu nywe.
lekha chinaikara che chimbosio chabwe chibatiile nga luriimba.
Lekha chimoni chabwe chitiimbe nio bakhanyala khubona tawe,
mala okhole kimikoongo kiabwe kitereme lukali.
Baweseliekho lirima liowo,
lekha lirima liowo libe khu nibo.
okhalekha omundu yesi yesi amenya mu maeema kabwe tawe.
Sikila bapia siibi oyo niye ewe oukuumile,
lundi bachuunia lukali oyo niye ewe wachuunia khale.
Batase siiukuumo khu siindi Wele,
bakhanyoolakho bulekhuule khukhwama khwiwe tawe.
bakharwa khu munjolooli kwe kamasina ke babaandu baluungi tawe.
Ne kakhali ese njuunwa ne khukhweendekhelela lukali,
ee Wele, mbukule ese mala umbonie!
Ese ndiimba lulwimbo khufumia Wele,
ese ndilangilila luyali lwewe mu khumupila niye orio.
Lino lilisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhila efwe
ne khumuelesia niye ekhaafu,
khukhila efwe ne khuaana euunwa ekhulu khuuba embosio.
Babapisibwa siibi ne balibona lino,
balisangaala.
Enywe muyiimanga Wele, lekha kimioyo kienywe kinyoole kamaani.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulilanga lisaba lie babanani,
ne se ebililanga babaandu bewe baali mu siboe tawe.
Lekha likulu, liloba, chinyanja,
nende buli siindu sie bulamu silimo bifumie Wele.
Sikila Wele alionia Sayuni,
ne khukhwombakha chingoba che sibala sia Yuda lundi,
mala bakholi bewe balisibukula ne khumenyamo,
siliba kumukabwa kwe babaana be bakholi bewe,
ne abo babamusiima niye balimenyamo.

Ee Wele, siima khu khusikula ese!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, yuuya khu khunjeeta ese!
Lekha abo bakhaka khu khunjira ese baulwe lundi bakoyaane.
Lekha abo baali ne busangaafu sikila butinyu bwase,
batimanisibwe lundi bachangalaasibwe.
Lekha abo babanjekhelela ese,
baambwe chisoni khulwe khuulwa khwabwe.
Lekha abo boosi bakhusaaya ewe,
bekhoye ne khusangaalila mwiwe.
Lekha abo babasiima buonia,
balome buli lwoosi bali, “Wele Omukali!”
Ne kakhali ese ndi omutaambi lundi omubanani,
ee Wele, yuuya khu khunjeeta ese!
Ewe oli buyeeti bwase lundi omuonia wase,
ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhakhiinda tawe!

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese nilukhila mwiwe,
okhalekha ese naambwa chisoni tawe!
Mu buluungi bwowo sikule ese mala umbonie,
reka liiru liowo umbulile ese mala umbonie!
Ba lulwanda lwase lwe bubwilukhilo,
lukoba lusire lwe khukhwilukhila
sikila ewe oli lulwanda lwase lundi oli bubwilukhilo bwase.
Ee Wele wase, umbonie ese khukhwama mu makhono ke babooni,
khukhwama mu bunyali bwe barangani ne bakuluumi.
Sikila ewe, Ee Omwami
oli lilieyikina liase.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lilieyikina liase khukhwama mu buele bwase.
Ese nakhweyikina ewe mu bulamu bwase bwoosi,
Ewe waniindile ese khukhwama endaalo niyo nasaalilwakho.
Ndikhufumia ewe buli lwoosi.
Bulamu bwase bwabeele likeleka khu bakali,
sikila ewe wabeele bubwilukhilo bwase bwe kamaani.
Ese khufumia ewe ne khulangilila luyali lwowo endaalo yoosi.
Mu biise bie bukofu bwase, okhandekha tawe;
kamaani kase ne kaweele, okhanjanjukha tawe.
Sikila basiku base balomaloma khuloondekhana nase,
abo babenya khu khunjira bangwangwanila ese,
ne baloma bali, “Wele amwanjuukhe,
mutimanie mala mu mutiile,
sikila omusikula se aliio tawe.”
Ee Wele, okhaba sinaao nase tawe,
ee Wele wase, yuuya unjeete!
Lekha abo babanjibwaakala ese baulwe ne khufulafusibwa.
Lekha abo bakhaka khu khunjira ese baambwe chisoni ne khuchangalaasibwa.
Ese ndira lilieyikina mwiwe buli lwoosi,
ese ndikhufumia ewe lundi ndikhufumia.
Ndilomaloma khu bikholwa biowo bie buluungi,
khu bikholwa biowo bie buonia endaalo yoosi,
sikila bili bikali khutuuma bukesi bwase.
Ndicha mu maani ko Mwami WELE,
ndiboola bulayi bwowo, bubwowo weng'ene.
Ee Wele, ewe wanjeyikia ese khukhwama mu buele bwase,
ne ese siboola bikholwa biowo bie khuukia.
Ee Wele, ese nakofuule lundi ndi ne chimbuchi,
okhanjanjukha tawe!
Ba nase mu bukesi nibio mboolelamo bunyali bwowo ne kamaani kowo,
khu selukho choosi chilibao.
Wele, buluungi bwowo bwoola mwikulu.
Ewe wakholile bibiindu bie khuukia.
Se aliio oli nga ewe tawe.
Ewe wakholile ese naboone butinyu bukali ne siibi,
ne kakhali ewe oliingobosela lundi bulamu,
ewe olanjinyosia lundi khukhwama mu lusiba lwe sibala.
Ewe olitasa lukoosi lwase,
ne khu khumboleelesia lundi.
Ee Wele wase, ng'ali ese ndikhufumia ewe ne lituungu,
khulwe busuubilwa bwowo.
Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli, ese ndikhwimbila ewe chinyimbo ne siilili siase.
Ne niimba chinyimbo che khu khufumia ewe,
ndiyokela khulwe khoyo,
ndikhwimbila ewe ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
sikila wamboniisie.
Ndilomaloma khu buyeeti bwowo buluungi endaalo yoosi,
sikila abo babenya khu khumbuumisia ese,
banyoolile chisoni ne khuchangalaasibwa.

Ee Wele, elesia omwami bung'ali bwowo,
elesia omwana wo mwami buluungi bwowo!
Lekha akhalakile babaandu bowo mu buluungi,
ne khukhalakila bataambi bowo mu bung'ali.
Lekha sibala siindiaale lukali,
lekha sibemo buluungi,
Lekha ayeete bataambi,
lekha asikule babanani,
ne khuula kuwanangali.
Lekha omwami amiie siise sileeyi nga enyanga,
amiie siise sileeyi nga kumwesi khu selukho choosi!
Lekha omwami abe nga efula mu mikuunda,
nga efula echukhiilila liloba.
Lekha buluungi bukuche mu bulamu bwewe,
ne buiindia bube kukali po khukhwola nga kumwesi ne kuwao.
khukhwama khu nyanja khukhwola khu kiindi,
khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati,
khukhwola chimbeka choosi che sibala.
Lekha basiku bewe bamwinamile niye,
lekha omwami abaule.
Lekha babaami ba Tarishishi nende be bibala bia aleeyi baelesie omwami biianwa,
lekha babaami ba Sheba ne Seba bamuelesie niye biianwa.
Lekha babaami boosi bamwinamile niye,
mala chikholo choosi chimukhalaabanile!
Sikila aonianga babanani ne bamusaba niye,
aonianga bataambi ne naabo bakhali nende omuyeeti tawe.
Wele akholelanga siisa batekhele ne babanani,
lundi aonianga bulamu bwe babanani.
Abaonianga khukhwama mu khupisibwa siibi,
ne mu siayuumba,
ne bulamu bwabwe buli bwe bukhala khu niye.
Lekha omwami amenye lukali,
lekha aebwe esahabu eya Sheba!
Lekha lisaba liaanwe khulwa niye buli lwoosi,
lekha Wele abiite omwami chikhabi buli lwoosi!
Lekha biakhulia bikali bibe mu sibala,
lekha chingulu chichulekho biakhulia nga chingulu chiili Lebanoni.
Lekha chingoba chibemo babaandu bakali,
bakali nga bunyaasi mu mikuunda.
Lekha lisina lio mwami likhebulilwe buli lwoosi,
lekha efuma yewe ebeo biise bileeyi nga enyanga.
Lekha chikholo choosi chibiitwe chikha khulwa niye,
baandu boosi bamulaange bali owabiitwa chikhabi.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli!
Niye yeng'ene okholanga kamakhuwa ke khuukia.
Fumia lisina liewe buli lwoosi,
lekha luyali lwewe lwichule mu sibala siosi. Amina! Amina!
Kamasaba ka Daudi okhwa Chesi kakamila ano.

Ng'ali Wele ali omulayi khu baluungi,
khwaabo baali ne kimiooyo kimilayi.
Ne kakhali ese ne nga khutibia lilieyikina liase,
ne nga khutibia lisuubila liase.
Sikila naba ne likhendekha khu baali ne liliebonia,
nga nabona babooni ne bachiililila khuindiaala.
Se bachuunwakho tawe,
bali ne kamaani lundi banefu.
Se baapwanga siibi nga babaandu babaandi tawe,
se banyoola butinyu nga babaandu babaandi tawe.
Khwako ekibonio eli nga sisiuuma siabwe,
sisiayuumba siabafuuma nga engubo.
Kimiooyo kiabwe kiechula bubwoni,
ne chinganakani chabwe chili busa khu marekekha ke bubwoni.
Bachekheelela babaandu babaandi,
ne khuloma ke bubwoni,
bebonia lundi barekekha khu khupia babaandi siibi.
Baloma kamabi khu Wele oli mwikulu,
ne bara kamalaka ke kibonio khu baandu mu sibala,
nio akhaba babaandu ba Wele babaloondakho,
lundi baba khangu khusuubila niko baloma koosi.
Baloma bali, “Wele amanya ariena?
Wele owe Angaaki Lukali se alinyoola bung'ali tawe.”
Babooni bali bario.
Bali mu buiinda lundi baindiaala buli lwoosi.
Khuba omuluungi ne khuloba khukhola bubwoni,
se khwanjeetilekho siindu tawe.
Ee Wele, ewe wandekhile ese nanaanisiibwe biise bioosi,
ne khuukuumwa buli mutikhinyi.
Abaanga bali naloma kamakhuwa kario,
andi se ndi nga mulala khu baandu bowo tawe.
Nakhaka khukhwibaasia manye nga butinyu buno buli,
ne kakhali khwise bwaba buandalafu lukali.
Khukhwola nga nacha mu Lukaangu lwowo.
Nio namanya kalinyoola babooni.
Ng'ali ewe olibara abuundu we bumiumiu,
olibakhola bakwe babune.
Babunisibwa khangu,
ne khurusibwao elala ne biriisio!
Ee Omwami, babooni bali nga kamarooro kawaao mu mutikhinyi,
ewe ne winyokha, nibo bawao.
Nga neulila bubi mu mwoyo kwase,
ne khuchuunisibwa mu mwoyo,
naba omusilu lundi omukaafu,
naba nga esaang'i ebweeni wowo.
Ne kakhaba kario ndi nawe buli lwoosi,
ewe undiilanga kumukhono kwase kumuseecha.
Ewe undangiriranga ese mu mekisio kowo,
ne ekhumaliilikha olinjakaanila ne lukoosi.
Ndi ne naanu mwikulu nokhali ewe?
Se siliio khu sibala siosi siosi nisio nikoomba nokhali ewe tawe.
Kumubili kwase ne kumwoyo kwase binyala biawa kamaani,
ne kakhali Wele ali kamaani ke kumwoyo kwase,
ali sitonyi siase khulwa mindali.
Lola abo bakhwanjukha ewe ng'ali bakhabune,
ewe olibunia abo bakhali basuubilwa khwiwe tawe.
Ne kakhali buli bulayi khwise khuba siimbi ne Wele,
nakholile Omwami WELE khuuba bubwilukhilo bwase,
nio ese mboole koosi niko akholeele.

Ee Wele, siina sikila nokhwanjuukhe mindali?
Siina sikila lirima liowo ne liburukha busa khu makheese kowo?
Khebulila babaandu bowo, nibo warobora babe babowo khaale,
nibo wasikula khukhwama mu mbaambe babe ekholo yowo wamwene.
Khebulila Sikulu sia Sayuni, nikhwo ewe omenyile.
Tuuma likuunda lino,
basiku befwe bonakaake buli siindu sili mu Lukaangu.
Basiku bowo bayokeele khulwe bukhili mu Lukaangu mwowo,
Bemeekhemo chipendera chabwe nga bimanyisio bie bukhili.
Baba nga bareenyanga chiikhu,
ne barema kimirongooro ne chiaaywa chabwe.
Baremakaka ne kamapango ne chinyundo,
buli siindu sisiang'oonwa khukhwama khu misaala.
Bonakaka ne khukhwosia Lukaangu lwowo,
banyaalutia abuundu niio ewe osaayilwangao.
Benya khu khuula efwe lukali,
boosia buli Abuundu Atakatifu mu sibala.
Bimanyisio bioosi bie bibiindu biefwe bitakatifu se biliio tawe,
bang'oosi se baramireo tawe,
ne se aliio omanyile kano kaliba kari khu siise buleeyi sina tawe.
Ee Wele, basiku befwe bacha khukhuchekha ewe khukhwola siise siina?
Balikhukhoma ewe buli lwoosi?
Siina sikila ne olobile khu khuyeeta efwe?
Siina sikila ne okharusia emukoongo kamakhono kowo tawe?
Kakhaba kario ee Wele, ewe wabeele omwami wefwe khukhwama khale,
wakhukholeele efwe ke buonia ke khuukia mu sibala.
ewe wafuniakaka kimirwe kie kiminaniinga kie mu nyanja.
ewe waelesia chinyama chakwo bibuumbe
Ewe wakhola chifututusie ne chisebele chabisia kameechi,
wakhola chinjichi chimboofu chateenya.
Ewe warao biise bie kumuusi ne biise bie siilo,
wara enyanga ne kumwesi abuundu wabio,
ewe warao chinjakha che sibala,
ewe wabaang'ana siimiyu ne kumunaane.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, manya lino,
manya nga omusiku akhukhoma ewe,
ne basilu nga bafwochola lisina liowo.
Okhara babaandu bowo bakhenyalila mu bunyali bwe basiku barafu tawe,
okhebilila babaandu bowo babapisibwa siibi tawe!
Khebulila endakaano yowo,
sikila buli abuundu niio sisiilima sili sisiayuumba sikali siliio.
Okhalekha babaapisibwa siibi baambwa chisoni tawe,
lekha bataambi ne babanani bakhufumie ewe.
Ee Wele, yinyokha, oboole bung'ali bwowo,
khebulila nga basilu bakhukhoma ewe biise bioosi!
Okhebilila luyoka lwe basiku bowo tawe,
sisiayuumba siikhawa nisio basiku bowo benyosia tawe.

Ee Wele, khu khupila orio,
efwe khu khupila ewe orio!
Efwe khuboola nga ewe oli omukali
ne khulomaloma khu bikholwa bie khuukia nibio okholile.
Wele aloma ali, “Nareereo siise sie likhalaka,
mala ndikhalaka mu bung'ali.
Buli sibuumbe siakhaterema,
mala sibala siosi siasisiikhwa,
ndikhola kimisiingi kiasio kilume.
Mboolela babebonia ndi, ‘Mukhebonia tawe,’
ne babooni ndi, ‘Mukhamela chinjika tawe.’
Mukhamela chinjika lukali,
namwe mwakhola sileka tawe.”
Bukhalaki se bwamanga ebukwe namwe mumbo tawe,
se bwamanga ebunaswa namwe siafubo tawe,
ne kakhali Wele niye omukhalaki,
ekhisia balala ne khuniinia babaandi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atiila sikoombe,
siechuule endali eyiile eye lirima liewe.
Akichukha, mala babooni boosi banywa,
bakinywa yoosi khukhwola khwime limaliilisi.
Ne kakhali ese ndiekhoya buli lwoosi,
ndiimba mu khufumia Wele owa Yakobo.
Alirusia bunyali bwe babooni,
ne kakhali bunyali bwe baluungi bulitasikha.

Wele amanyikhana mu Yuda,
aebwa luyali mu Isiraeli.
Amenyile mu Yerusalemu,
amenyile khu Sikulu sia Sayuni.
Afuniakakila ebweeneyo buembo bwo musiku,
afuniakaka chingabo ne kamapango kabwe,
ng'ali afuniakaka bulwaani bwabwe bwoosi.
Ewe oli ne luyali,
oli ne lukoosi lukhila lwe bikulu bia buli lwoosi.
Banamae babwe banyindaafu,
bamulilwe buli siindu nisio babeele nasio,
mala luno bali mwilo lie lifwa,
kamaani ne bukesi bwabwe bwoosi,
se bwabayeetakho siindu tawe.
Ee Wele owa Yakobo, nga wabarafwira,
chifarasi nende bachitimia bakwa bafwa.
Ne kakhali omwami Wele babaandu boosi bakhuria ewe.
Se aliio onyala eema niio oli noli ne lirima tawe.
Ewe wakhola bukhalaki bwowo bwamanyikhana noli mwikulu,
sibala siaba ne buuri mala siasila,
nga warakikha khubisia bukhalaki,
khuonia babaapisibwa siibi mu sibala boosi.
Ng'ali lirima lie babaandu liba efuma engali khwiwe Wele,
abo bakhafwila mwiie tawe balikhukholela ewe chinaikara.
Kholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe niko mwelakana khu niye,
enywe chikholo chili embi mweesi,
reerera Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biianwa.
Wele akholanga babaandu ne bamuria niye,
niye eeranga baruki,
ne khuriisia babaami be bunyali.

Ese ndilila Wele lukali,
ndilila Wele lukali nio ambulile.
Sabanga Omwami mu biise bie butinyu,
suta kamakhono kase mwisaba siilo sioosi,
ne kakhali se nyoola buoleelefu tawe.
Nibaasia khu Wele, lundi ndila,
nibaasia, lundi fwa kumwoyo.
Wele akhola ese ne mba meeso siilo siosi,
neendekheleele lukali, se nyala khulomaloma tawe.
Nibaasia chindaalo chichabira,
lundi khebulila kimiiko kie khaale.
Mba mu mebaasio kamakali siilo,
nibaasia
“Omwami alikhuloba efwe buli lwoosi?
Se alikhusiima efwe lundi tawe?
Alekhile khu khusiima efwe?
Endakaano yewe se eliio lundi tawe?
Wele ebiliile khuba ne siisa?
Lirima limurusiisiemo siisa siewe?”
Nio naloma ndi, “Lilinjuunia lukali nilio lino,
mbo owe Angaaki Lukali se asiili owe bunyali tawe”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese ndikhebulila bikholwa biowo bie khuukia,
ndikhebulila ke khuukia niko nakhola khaale.
Ndibaasia khu niko okholile kioosi,
ndibaasia khu bikholwa biowo bie bunyali.
Ee Wele, buli siindu nisio ewe okhola siili sitakatifu.
Wele owe bunyali okundi se aliio nga ewe tawe.
Ewe oli Wele okholanga ke khuukia,
Wele owekeesie bunyali bwowo akari we chikholo.
Waonia babaandu bowo,
lisaaye lia Yakobo ne Yosefu,
khulwe bunyali bwowo.
Ee Wele, nga kameechi kakhubona ewe,
kaba ne buuri nga omundu,
mala chisiba che nyanja chareenga.
Kamafuumbi kakwisia efula,
khukukuma khwauliilikha mwikulu,
ne chimbeni chameniuukhila chimbeka choosi.
Khupapalukha khwe likukuma liowo khwaba mu siifuusia,
chimbeni chowo chakhosia khu sibala,
sibala siaterema ne khukhwesisiikha.
Wabirira mu bibuli,
wambukha lusiba lwe nyanja,
ne kakhali lukele lwowo se lwabonekha tawe.
Ewe warangirira babaandu bowo
nga omwaayi oloonda bibiaayo
khubirira khu bwimeelesi bwa Musa ne Aruni.

Baandu base, rekeeresia kamekisio kase,
mala muulile niko ndoma.
ne khukhwinoosia kamakhuwa kakekisa khukhwama khale,
Kamakhuwa niko khwaulila ne khumanya,
kamakhuwa niko bakuuka befwe bakhuboolela efwe.
Se khukhakakise khu baana befwe tawe,
ne kakhali khukhakobolele eselukho eyiicha,
bikholwa bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bie efuma ne bunyali bwewe,
ne bikholwa bie khuukia nibio akholile.
Aabisia kamalaka khu Baisiraeli,
kamalaka khu lisaaye lia Yakobo.
Alaka bakuuka befwe,
khukhwekisia babaana babwe kamalaka kewe,
nio eselukho eloondakho ekamanye,
mala be selukho eya bosi yeyikie babaana babwe.
Mu ngila yino bosi balira lilieyikina liabwe,
mu Wele ne khuloba khukhwibilila niko akholile,
ne kakhali buli lwoosi barie kamalaka kewe.
Se baliba nga bakuuka babwe tawe,
babaandu bareengu lundi be sileka,
bakhaba ne lilieyikina likali mu Wele tawe,
lundi bakhaba basuubilifu khu niye tawe.
Baefuraimu, ba baaba ne bakangiile buyiingo ne buembo,
belukha omusiku biise bie liie.
Se baria endakaano yabwe ne Wele tawe,
baloba khuloonda kamalaka kewe.
Bebilila niko Wele akhola,
kamaya niko babona ne akhola.
bakuuka babwe ne baloleele.
aakhola kameechi kaaba nga kamasiisi.
ne kumulilo kwabarangirira siilo sioosi.
ne khubanywesia kameechi kamakali khukhwama asi mu siba.
Aakhola chisebele chama mu lwanda,
lundi aakhola kameechi keekha nga chinjichi.
Kakhaba kario bachiililila khu mukholela bubwoni,
ne mu biangalaamwe baaba bareengu khu owe Angaaki Lukali.
mu khuyingilila baebwe biakhulia nibio bekoomba.
Beng'ulung'unyila Wele ne baloma bali,
“Wele anyala akhuelesia efwe siakhulia mu sichiimi ku?
Lili ng'ali mbo aapa khu lwanda,
mala kameechi katubukhakho kachiririkha,
ne kakhali anyala lundi akhuelesia efwe siakhulia,
ne khu baandu bewe enyama ku?”
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga aulila,
aaba ne lirima likali,
kumulilo kwaba khu kholo eya Yakobo,
lirima liewe khu Isiraeli liakucha,
Sikila se baba ne lisuubila mu niye,
lundi se basuubila bali anyala abaonia tawe.
Kakhaba kario Wele alaka likulu,
ne khukhwikula chinjiki che mwikulu,
ne khubaelesia siakhulia sie mwikulu.
Khwako balia siakhulia sie bamalaika,
lundi Wele abaelesia bioosi nibio benya.
Akhola ekhuungu eyama ebukwe yaucha,
ne khu bunyali bwewe atasa ekhuungu eye ebunafubo,
lundi areerera babaandu bewe chinyuni chingali,
nga kumuyekhe khu nyanja,
chinyuni echo chakwa akari we kambi,
chaba buli abuundu amaeema kabwe.
Khwako babaandu abo balia mala bekura,
Wele aabaelesia nisio benya.
Ne kakhali kumwekho kwabwe ne kukhawa tawe,
biakhulia ne bisiili mu saya chabwe,
Wele abaambila lirima,
mala eera ba baaba be kamaani,
ne khumalao baseecha ba Isiraeli balayi.
Kakhaba kario bachiililila khukhola bubwoni,
akhaba Wele ne akhola ke khuukia se bamusuubila tawe.
Khwako akhola bulamu bwabwe bwaba bubwimbi,
ne lifwa liabatundubikha.
Buli nga eera balala khu nibo,
babaandi boosi bamukobolela,
bekanila ne khumusaaya lukali.
Bakhebulila bali Wele aaba lulwanda lwabwe,
bali owe Angaaki Lukali acha khubasikula.
Ne kakhali kamakhuwa kabwe koosi kaba ke bubeeyi,
se balomakho ka ng'ali tawe.
se baloonda endakaano yabwe ne Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele akholela babaandu bewe siisa.
Aababeela bubwoni bwabwe,
ne se aababunia tawe.
Biise bikali ekayila lirima liewe,
ne khukhwefwiilisia mu bukhalafu bwewe.
Akhebulila ali abo bali babaandu busa,
mu siangalaamwe,
biise bikali babeelesia Wele!
Bakholela Wele bureengu mu siangalaamwe khukhwola khenga
ne khumukhola abiyililwe mu sichiimi omwo!
Bara Wele mu makhako kamakhabi kamakali,
Babeelesia Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli oyo.
Se bakhebulila bunyali bwewe,
namwe endaalo niyo abasikulila khukhwama khu basiku babwe tawe,
Se bakhebulila endaalo niyo akhola ke khuukia mu Misiri,
ne kamaya niko akhola mu ngoongo cha Soani tawe.
mala Bamisiri bataamba kameechi ke khunywa.
ne chikhele chonakaka kimikuunda kiabwe.
ne khukhwonakaka kimikuunda kiabwe.
ne kimikhuyu kiabwe ne bunyifu bukali.
Areera kamaarara kera chikhaafu chabwe,
ne kiminyele kiabwe kiapwa ne chimbeni.
Aabachuunia lukali mu khwekesia lirima ne bukhalafu bwewe,
nibio bibiabareerera lifwa.
Se efwiilisia mu lirima liewe,
namwe alekha khubeera tawe.
ne khubabisilia mu siangalaamwe.
ne kakhali enyanja yaminya basiku babwe.
khu sikulu nisio anyoola khu maani kewe.
abaelesia kamaloba ke chikholo,
ne khuelesia Baisiraeli chinju che chikholo.
ne se baria kamalaka kewe tawe,
ne kakhali bakaloba ne khuba ne sileka nga bakuuka babwe,
baba nga buyiingo butiembukha,
se beyikinwa tawe.
Baambia Wele lirima nende abuundu aabwe niio be bubeeyi,
lundi bamukhalasia ne bifwaani biabwe.
Wele nga abona elio aambwa lirima,
khwako alobela babaandu bewe elala.
mu lukoba nilwo amenyanga akari wefwe.
simanyisio sie bunyali ne luyali lwewe.
Aba ne lirima khu baandu bewe omwene mala alekha,
basiku babwe babeera.
Basoleeli beerwa ne bali mwiie,
ne bakhaana se baba nende nibo bachakho mwilia tawe.
Basaayi babwe bafwa khulwe sisiayuumba,
ne banamulekhwa babwe se bafukiililwa khusooma tawe.
Ekhumaliilikha omwami enyokha oli owaama mwilo,
aaba nga omuseecha owe kamaani owetikita khulwe ndali.
Atimania basiku bewe,
aabaambia chisoni cha buli lwoosi.
Aaloba enju eya Yosefu,
se aarobora ekholo eya Efuraimu tawe,
ne kakhali aarobora ekholo eya Yuda,
sikulu sia Sayuni nisio asiima.
Ombakha Lukaangu lwewe nga lukoba lwewe luli mwikulu,
alukhola lwemela elala biise bioosi nga sibala sisiene.
aamurusia mu maayilwe,
niio ayaanga kiminyele kie bibiaayo,
mala amukhola aaba omwami owa Isiraeli,
omwaayi owe babaandu ba Wele.
Daudi abaliinda ne mu khwerusia
ne khubemeelela ne busicha.

Banyaalutisie lukaangu lwowo lutakatifu,
ne khukhola Yerusalemu khuba likuunda.
Balekhela chingosia kimilaambo kie babaandu bowo,
chisaang'i chilie kimilaambo kie bakholi bowo.
Bachukha sifuki sie babaandu bowo nga kameechi,
kamafuki keekha nga kameechi mu Yerusalemu lwoosi,
ne se abao owasikala khusiikha bafu tawe.
Chikholo chichakhubotookhelela efwe chikhukhoma efwe,
bachakha ne khukhuseya efwe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khukhwola siise siina? Olaba ne lirima buli lwoosi?
Bukhalafu bwe libuba liowo bulaburukha nga kumulilo?
Ra lirima liowo khu kholo chikhakhusaayanga ewe tawe,
khu baandu bakhakhusabanga ewe tawe,
ne khu baandu be bubwami,
bukhakhusaaya ewe tawe!
Sikila beerire babaandu bowo,
babunisie sibala siowo.
Okhakhuukuuma efwe khulwe bubwoni bwe bakuuka befwe tawe.
Nono khukholele efwe siisa,
khwatibiisie lilieyikina liefwe lioosi.
Ee Wele, khulwe lukoosi lwowo wamwene,
khuyeete ne khukhuonia efwe,
khusikule efwe mala okhubeele bubwoni bwefwe.
Siina sikila chikholo chikhureebe efwe chili,
“Wele wenywe ali waena?”
Lekha efwe khubone ne oukuuma chikholo
khulwe khuchukha sifuki sie bakholi bowo.
Ulila lilila lie baboe,
ne khu bunyali bwowo bukali,
elesia bulekhuule abo babakhalakilwa lifwa.
Omwami, ruungia chikholo chichiindi kamakhabi kamakali,
khulwe bukhomo bwoosi nibwo bareere khwiwe.
Nio efwe, babaandu bowo, kamakheese kowo,
khulikhupila ewe orio buli lwoosi,
ne khukhufumia ewe biise bibiicha bioosi.

ewe owimelelanga babaandu ba Yosefu nga omwaayi.
Ewe oli khu ndebe eye bubwami khu kerubi, yekesia bunyali bwowo,
ebweeni we chikholo cha Efuraimu, Benjamini ne Manase!
Yekesia kamaani kowo mala wiche okhuonie efwe!
Ee Wele, khwisieo khube nga khwaba!
Khukholele efwe siisa,
ne khulaona!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali,
olasinyikhwa ne kamasaba ke babaandu bowo khukhwola siise siina?
Ewe wakhuelesie efwe sibeela khulie,
wakhuelesie kamasika kamakali khunywe.
Ewe walekha chikholo chichakhubotookhelesia chapana khulwe khunyoola sibala siefwe,
basiku befwe bakhukhoma efwe.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi, khwisieo khube nga khwaba!
Khukholele efwe siisa, ne khulaona!
Warusia babaandu bowo e Misiri,
waoona babaandu Be Chikholo chichiindi,
ne khulekhela babaandu bowo sibala siacho.
Nga watimania chikholo chichiindi,
babaandu bowo beela mu sibala esio,
ne khumalatana mu sibala esio sioosi.
Babaandu bowo bamenya mu sibala sioosi,
khukhwa ebunaswa mu bikulu bia Lebanoni khukhwola siafubo.
Babalaaya sibala esio,
khukhwama khu nyanja eya Mediterenia,
khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Efurati.
Wele owe bunyali, siina sikila ne walekha basiku bebwaakala sibala sie Baisiraeli?
Nono Be Chikholo chichiindi becha mu sibala esio,
khukhwiba ne khukwonakaka.
Basitula lukali nga chingurwe che mundaa,
ne khusionakaka nga chisaang'i.
Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi, yiicha niio khuli!
Ne oli mwikulu lola asi okhubone efwe,
yiicha mala osikule babaandu bowo!
Yiicha mala osikule babaandu bowo,
nibo wareera ne khubakhola baaba,
ekholo eye kamaani.
Basiku befwe baremakake ne khukhwosia sibala siefwe,
mwirima liowo baukuume mala obabunie!
Lekhao babaandu nibo warobora mala obaliinde,
ekholo niyo wakhola yaaba eye kamaani lukali.
Se khulibakho bareengu khwiwe lundi,
khuelesie efwe bulamu ne khulikhufumia ewe.
Wele owe bunyali, khwisieo khube nga khwaba,
khukholele efwe siisa, ne khulaona.

Yimbila Wele omuliindi wefwe khulwe khoyo,
yimba efuma khu Wele owa Yakobo!
Yimba lulwimbo ne khu khupa chitamburini,
khupa kamatuungu ne biilili bulayi.
kumwesi ne kubalukha lundi ne kuangaale.
Lino lili lilaka mu Isiraeli,
lilaka khukhwama khu Wele owa Yakobo.
Aelesia lilaka lino khu baandu ba Isiraeli
nga aaba ne ebwaakala sibala sia Misiri.
“Narusia busiro khu mabeka kenywe,
ne khubarusia enywe khu milimo kimiandalafu.
mala namusikula enywe.
Namukhaka enywe asebele cha Meriba.
Baandu base, ulila engaani yase,
Isiraeli, nenya muulile kakaase!
mukhenanilakho wele okundi tawe.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe,
owabarusia enywe e Misiri,
yasama, ne ndaliisia enywe,
“Ne kakhali babaandu base se baulila kakaase tawe,
Isiraeli se baba barekerefu khwise tawe.
Khwako nabalekha bachiililila khukhola sileka,
ne khukhola kosi kosi niko benya.
Nenya babaandu base baulile kakaase,
nenya babe barekerefu khwise!
Nakhaulile khangu basiku babwe,
ne khuukuuma basiku babwe boosi.
Abo bambiila balinjinamila ese,
siiukuumo siabwe siliba sia buli lwoosi.
Ne kakhali nakhamuliisiisie enywe ne ngaanu endayi mu choosi,
nakhamwikuusie enywe ne bubuukhi bwe mu lwanda.”

Wele emeelela kumuse kwe mwikulu,
arusia bukhalaki mu siikhasio sie bawele ali,
“Mukhoya mulekhe bukhalaki bukhali ng'ali tawe,
mukhaba ne ekitombooli eye khuyeeta babooni tawe!
Kholela bung'ali babanani ne bafuubi,
yeeta bataambi nende bakhenyalila tawe.
Onia batekhele ne babanani,
basikule khukhwama mu bunyali bwe babooni.”
Se bali ne bukesi namwe limanya tawe,
babubukila mu siilima sie bubwoni,
kimisiingi kie bung'ali kioosi kiesiikha.
mweesi muli babaana boyo owe Angaaki Lukali,
kakhaba kario mukhafwe nga babaandu,
bulamu bwenywe buliwao nga bwo muruki yesi yesi.”
Ee Wele, yiicha, mala oruke sibala,
chikholo choosi chili chichowo.

Ee Wele, okhasila busa tawe,
okheoleelesia busa tawe, okhanyira busa tawe!
Lola! Basiku bowo benyosie sisiayuumba,
ne babakhubiila ewe bakhukholela ewe bureengu.
Bakwangwaana mu bwikisi khukholela babaandu bowo kamabi,
bakwangwaana khukhola kamabi khu baandu nibo ewe oliindanga.
Baloma bali, “Yiicha, lekha khumaleo sibala siabwe,
lisina lia Isiraeli likhakhebulilwakho lundi tawe.”
Bakwangwaana khukhola lirekekha liabwe,
ne khukhola buambaani khulwe khukhola kamabi khwiwe,
babaandu ba Edomu ne Baisimaeli,
babaandu ba Moabu ne Bahakari,
babaandu ba Kebali, Amoni ne Ameleki,
ne babaandu ba Filisiti ne Tiro.
Baashuru bosi baambanile nabo,
nga bayeeti be kamaani be Baamoni ne Bamoabu, lisaaye lia Lutu.
ne khu Sisera ne Yabini a luuchi lwa Kishoni,
Wabaula ne bali a Endori,
ne kimilaambo kiabwe kiabolela asi.
Ula baruki babwe boosi nga waula omwami Sebari ne Salimuna,
babaloma bali, “Lekha khubukule kamaloba
ka Wele kabe kakeefwe.”
Ee Wele, batamuusie nga lutamuusi,
ne likhuuchi ne liyilwa ne mbeo.
Batimanie nga kumulilo ne kwosia kumusiru
nga kumulilo ne kwosia chingulu,
batimanie ne mbembeesi yowo,
ne khubariisia ne ekhuungu yowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, baambie chisoni
mala obakhole babone bunyali bwowo.
Lekha baambwe chisoni ne khuriisibwa buli lwoosi,
lekha babunile mwifwolobia.
Lekha bamanye bali ewe weng'ene niwe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
oli owe Angaaki Lukali khu sibala sioosi.

Omwami Owe Banamae,
nasiima Lukaangu lwowo lukali!
Nikoomba khubaamo!
Nikoomba khuuba mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Fumia khulwe khoyo Wele omenyile mindali ne kumwoyo kwange kwoosi.
Omwami Owe Banamae, Omwami wase, lundi Wele wase,
akhaba nandolia chombakhe siswi,
ne opicho chili ne niio chimenya,
chilekhanga kamaana kaacho embi nende alutare yowo.
Abo bamenyile mu lukaangu lwowo bali basangaafu lukali,
buli lwoosi beemba khu khufumia ewe.
Abo banyoola kamaani kabwe khwiwe bali basangaafu lukali,
babekoomba khucha khu sikulu sia Sayuni.
Litooma litakhamo kameechi lia Baka,
liekela abuundu we chisebele ne babiriramo,
efula eye khunyoa yechusiamo kamatiisi.
Bachiililila khunyoola kamaani ne balikho bacha,
balabona Wele owe bawele mu Sayuni.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ulila lisaba liase,
Ee Wele owa Yakobo, rekeeresia.
Ee Wele, biita chikhabi khu mwami wefwe,
omwami niye ewe oroboore.
Khuba mu lukaangu lwowo endaalo ndala,
khukhila chindaalo eelefu ndala abuundu aandi osi osi,
Nabulayi nema a silibwa we nju eya Wele wase,
khukhila khumenya mu nju che babooni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuliindi wefwe lundi omwami owe luyali,
akhubiita efwe chikhabi che siisa ne lukoosi.
Se emananga abo bakhola ke buluungi
sisiindu silayi siosi siosi tawe.
Omwami Owe Banamae,
babeyikina mwiwe bali basangaafu lukali.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wabeele ne siisa khu sibala siowo,
waindiaaasia Isiraeli lundi.
Ewe wabeela babaandu bowo bubwoni bwabwe,
ne khubarusiakho bumayaanu bwabwe bwoosi.
Ewe walekha khubakhalalila,
wakayila lirima liowo likali.
Ee Wele omuonia wefwe, khukhole efwe khube lundi nga khwaba,
mala olekhe khu khubonela efwe bubi!
Olakhuambila efwe lirima buli lwoosi?
Lirima liowo se liliwa tawe?
Khukhole khube ne kamaani lundi,
ne efwe, babaandu bowo khulakhufumia ewe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khwekesie busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe,
ne khu khuelesia efwe buonia bwowo.
Ndikho ndekeeresia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma,
alikho alakiilisia kumuleembe khwifwe, babaandu bewe omwene,
aaba bali se khukalukhila bumayaanu bwefwe tawe.
Ng'ali buonia bwewe bwoleele abo bamuria niye,
nio luyali lube mu sibala siefwe.
Busiime bukhawa tawe ne bubweyikinwa biliakaanana,
buluungi ne kumuleembe biliekwayilana.
Busuubilifu bwo mundu buliama khu sibala buniine mu ngaaki,
ne buluungi bwa Wele buliama mwikulu bwiikhe asi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikhola efwe khuindiaale,
ne kamaloba kefwe kalibaamo bibiaamo bikali.
Buluungi buliba ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne bumurekekhera engila.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndekeeresie mala unjeete,
sikila ese ndi omutaambi lundi omubanani.
Mbonie khukhwama mwifwa, sikila ndi omurekeerefu khwiwe,
mbonie, sikila ndi omukholi wowo lundi khweyikina ewe.
Ewe oli Wele wase, khwako kholele siisa,
ese khusaaya ewe buli khase.
Ee Omwami, sangaasia omukholi wowo,
sikila lisaba liase likhwolela ewe.
Sikila ewe, ee Omwami oli omulayi lundi,
oli ne busiime bukhawa tawe khwaabo bakhusaba ewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rekeeresia lisaba liase,
ulila khulila khwase khulwe buyeeti.
Khusabanga ewe mu biise bie butinyu,
sikila ewe unjeetanga ese.
Ee Omwami, Wele okundi se aliio nga ewe tawe,
se aliio na mulala owakhola niko ewe wakhola tawe.
khwako choosi chileekha mala chikhwinamile ne khu khufumia ewe.
Sikila ewe oli omukali lundi okholanga ke khuukia,
ewe weng'ene niye Wele.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, njeyikie niko wenya ese khole,
ne ndaloonda kakowo mu busuubilifu,
njeyikie khu khukholela ewe mu khwerusia.
Ee Omwami Wele wase, ndikhupila ewe orio kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
lundi ndikhuelesia ewe luyali buli lwoosi.
Sikila busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe khwise buli bukali,
ewe wasikuule ese ndi siimbi khufwa.
Ee Wele, babaandu be kibonio balikho banjibwaakala,
sipupu sie bakuluumi silikho siikhaka khu khunjira,
babaandu bakhaulila kakowo tawe.
Ne kakhali ee Omwami, ewe oli Wele owe siisa ne busiime,
owe liliefwiilisia buli lwoosi, buli lwoosi owe kumwalaalo ne busuubilwa.
Ndole mala ukholele siisa,
eelesia omukholi wowo kamaani kowo,
mala osikule omwana owo mukholi wowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, njekesie simanyisio sie bulayi bwowo,
abo babambiila ese baliaambwa chisoni,
ne babona bali watinyiliisie ne khu khunjeeta.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ombakha lukoba lwewe khu sikulu sitakatifu
asiima lukoba lwa Yerusalemu,
khukhila buli abuundu mu Isiraeli.

“Ne mbala chikholo chiloondanga kakaase,
ndiraamo Misiri ne Babiloni,
ndibalila mu baandu baamenyile Yerusalemu babaandu ba Filisiti, Tiro ne Kushi

ne khuchibalila mu baandu ba Yerusalemu.
Boosi bakhina ne beemba bali,
“Khunyoola kamalayi koosi khukhwama mu Sayuni.”

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele, kumuusi khusaba unjeete,
ndila siilo ebweeni wowo.
Ulila lisaba liase,
rekeeresia lilila liase khulwe buyeeti.
Sikila ese ndi ne butinyu bukali,
mala ndi siimbi khufwa.
Ndi nga abo boosi baali siimbi khufwa,
kamaani kase koosi kambwelemo.
Nanjukhwe mu bafu,
ndi nga babeerwa mu biliindwa biabwe,
nga nibo okhakhebulilakho tawe,
nibo buyeeti bwowo bururirekho.
Ewe wamwaatiile ese khu sibale sie ng'ani,
wamwaatile ese mwiloo lileeyi lie sisiilima sikali.
Busiro bwe lirima liowo buli khwise,
ne bibuli bialio biaminyile nga bibuli bie kameechi.
Ewe wakilile babasiange banjibebee,
ewe wakholile ese nabeele sisiindu sie lisinye ebweeni wabwe.
Nekaliilwe mukari nio khanyala nelukha tawe,
chimoni chase chatofule khulwe buchuuni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khusabanga ewe buli endaalo,
ne khu khusutila ewe kamakhono kase mwisaba.
Okholelanga bafu ke khuukia ku?
Be emakoombe banyala benyokha bakhufumia ewe ku?
Busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe buboolwanga mu ng'ani,
namwe busuubilifu bwe abuundu we lilionakaka ku?
Bikholwa bie khuukia bibonekhanga abuundu we sisiilima,
namwe bulayi bwe mu sibala siaabo babeebililwa khale ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese khusabanga ewe buyeeti,
buli mutikhinyi khusaayanga ewe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siina sikila ne umwaata?
Siina sikila ne unjanjuukhe?
Nabeele mu buchuuni bukali khukhwama mu bwana bwase khukhwola ninge fwe,
naweele sio khulwe busiro bwe siiukuumo siowo.
Lirima liowo lili khwise,
lilibwaakala liowo liriisia lilikho limbunia.
Endaalo yoosi bimbotookhelela nga kameechi kakechuule,
banjuunia khukhwamila buli lubeka.
Ewe wakilile basaale base basiime banjanjuukhe,
ne sisiilima siong'ene nisio owasiase.

ndiboola busuubilifu bwowo buli lwoosi.

busuubilifu bwowo bwekhwiikhao busa nga likulu.
Ewe waloma oli, “Nakholile endakaano yase nomurobore wase,
nechubile Daudi omukholi wase ndi,
ne bubwami bwowo khu selukho choosi.’ ”
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha likulu lifumie ke khuukia kowo,
lifumie busuubilwa bwowo mwibusiana lie batakatifu!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se aliio mwikulu oli nga ewe tawe,
mu bibuumbe bie mwikulu se siliio sisiakana nawe tawe.
Oriibwa mu siikhasio sie batakatifu,
boosi bakhureengera ewe.
Omwami Owe Banamae, se aliio owe bunyali nga ewe tawe,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe omusuubilifu mu biindu bioosi.
Ewe oula enyanja eye bibuli,
bibuli biayo ne binyokha obiyeesia.
Ewe watubundulaka ling'u Rahabu
waula basiku bowo khulwe kamaani kowo.
Likulu liowo, sibala sioosi sisiowo,
waloonga sibala nende buli siindu siilimo.
Ewe wabaang'ana buli sisiindu siili ebunaswa ne buli sisiindu siili ebunafubo,
Sikulu sia Tabori ne sia Herimoni bikhufumia ewe khulwe khoyo.
Bunyali bwowo buli bukali,
kamaani kowo kali ke khuukia.
Buluungi ne bung'ali bili kimisiingi kie ndebe eye bubwami bwowo,
orangiriranga busiime bukhawa tawe ne bubweyikinwa.
Babaandu bakhusaaya ewe ne kimienya,
abo bamenyile mu buwaanga bwe bulayi bwowo!
Bekhoya endaalo yoosi sikila ewe,
lundi bakhufumia ewe khulwe bulayi bwowo.
Okhuelesianga bukhili bukali,
okhukholanga efwe ne khuba bakhili mu busiime bwowo.
Sikila engabo yefwe eli eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Omwami wefwe wo Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Khaale ewe walomalomela mu malola khu mukholi wowo omweyikinwa oli,
“Ese nayeetile omunamae owamanyikhana lukali,
naanile bubwami khuyo niye narobora khukhwama mu baandu.
mu khumuchukhakho kamafura kamatakatifu.
Kamaani kase kalaba naye buli lwoosi,
bunyali bwase bulamukhola abe ne kamaani.
Basiku se balimukhila tawe,
babooni se balimuula tawe.
Ese khape basiku bewe,
ne khubunia buli mundu omubiila niye.
Bubweyikinwa ne busiime bwase bukhawa bucha khuba ne naye,
ne khubirira mwise bunyali bwewe bulatasikha.
Ndikho nja khubalaayia bubwami bwewe,
khukhwama khu nyanja eya Mediterenia khukhwola khu luuchi lwa Efurati.
Daudi akhamboolele ese ali,
‘Ewe oli Paapa wase lundi Wele wase,
ewe oli Lulwanda lwe buonia bwase.’
omwami owe Angaaki Lukali khukhila be mu sibala boosi.
Ndimukholela niko namulaka niye biise bioosi,
ne ndakaano yase naye elibao buli lwoosi.
Lisaaye liewe lie bubwami lilibao biise bioosi,
omundu owe lisaaye liewe aliba omwami.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali lisaaye liewe lilekha lilaka liase,
ne khuloba khuliloonda,
ne bakhaulila niko mbaboolela tawe,
ne khulekha khuloonda kamalaka kase,
nio ndibaukuuma khulwe bubwoni bwabwe,
ndibapa khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe.
Ne kakhali se ndilekha khusiima Daudi,
namwe khilwe khumukholela niye niko namulaka tawe.
Se ndifuna endakaano yase,
namwe ngalukhasie likhuwa nilio naloma tawe.
Nechubile lulala lwong'ene khubirira mwisina liase litakatifu ndi,
se ndibea Daudi tawe.
Aliba ne lisaaye buli lwoosi,
lundi ndiliinda bubwami bwewe bubeeo biise bioosi.
Bulibaao biise bioosi nga kumwesi,
kuli nga omuloli omusuubilwa angaaki mwikulu.”
Ne kakhali ewe waambiile omwami omurobore wowo lirima,
ewe wamwanjuukhe lundi wamulobile niye.
Ewe wekaanile endakaano niyo wakhola no mukholi wowo,
ewe wapile asi ekuutwa yewe eye bubwami.
Ewe watechuule kamasiisi ke lukoba lwewe,
ne khukhwonakaka chingoba chewe che bubwilukhilo.
Babirirao boosi beeba kimiaandu kiewe,
bachirani bewe boosi bamuchekheelela.
Ewe waelesie basiku bewe bukhili,
wasangaasiisie basiku bewe boosi.
Ewe wafusiisie bulwaani bwewe bufu,
ne khumulekha aulwe mwiie.
Ewe wamunuulile esiimbo
ne khu khuupa asi bubwami bwewe.
Ewe wamukholile akofuule biise biewe ne bisiili,
ne khumuambia chisoni chingali.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khukhwola siise siina? Olakhwanjukha efwe buli lwoosi?
Lirima liowo lilaburukha nga kumulilo khukhwola siise siina?
Khebulile nga bulamu bwase buli bubwimbi,
khebulila nga wakhuloonga efwe fweesi khuba babaandu busa!
Naanu onyala amenya mala aaloba khufwa?
Omundu anyala ariena ebacha lifwa?
Omwami, busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe bubwama khale,
nibwo ewe walaka Daudi mu busuubilifu bwowo buli waena?

nga nilwo ese nekhaliilikhila bukhomo bwe babaandu
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, basiku bowo bakhoma omwami omurobore wowo!

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume buli lwoosi!
Amina Amina.

Omwami, ewe wabeele bumenyo bwefwe,
mu selukho choosi.
Ne okhabaang'ana chingulu nwamwe waraao sibala tawe,
ewe waba Wele khukhwama mindali,
lundi oliba Wele buli lwoosi.
Ewe oboolela omundu ekaluukhasie abe nga aaba,
omukaluukhasia naaba lipukhuulu lundi.
kili nga likolooba libirire khale,
nga siise sikeekhe mu silo.
Ewe orusiangao babaandu, bali nga kamarooro,
bali nga bunyaasi businina mu mutikhinyi,
mu mutikhinyi, bumela ne khu khula,
ekolooba buniala ne khukhwooma.
Lirima liowo likhubunia efwe,
burafu bwowo bukhuriisia efwe.
Wareere bubwoni bwefwe ebweeni wowo,
wareere bubwoni bwefwe bwe mu bwikisi abuundu niio obubona.
Bulamu bwefwe buwa khangu khulwe lirima liowo,
buwao khangu nga kumuuya.
Khuli ne kimiiko kamakhumi saba kong'ene,
ne kaaba bali khuli ne kamaani, kimiiko kamakhumi munaane,
kakhaba kario, kikhureerera efwe butinyu ne bubeeleli bwong'ene,
bulamu buwa khangu, ne se khubao tawe.
Naanu niye bunyali bwe lirima liowo bwabaakho?
Naanu omanyile buuri nibwo bukhalafu bwowo bunyala bwareera?
Khwekesie bubwimbi bwe bulamu bwefwe,
nio khube ne limanya.
Lirima liowo lilachiililila khukhwola siise siina?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kholela siisa bakholi bowo!
Khwikisie efwe mu mutikhinyi ne busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe,
nio khwekhoye ne khusangaala chindaalo chefwe choosi.
Nono khuelesie chindaalo che busangaafu chingali chicholaana,
ne bubeeleli nibwo ewe wakhuelesia mu miiko kioosi kie butinyu bwefwe.
Lekha bikholwa biowo bibibonekhele bakholi bowo,
ne bunyali bwowo bwe luyali khu baana babwe.
Lekha kumwalaalo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe kube khwifwe,
mala okhunyalile kimilimo kie kamakhono kefwe,
ng'ali, okhunyalile kimilimo kie kamakhono kefwe.

Oyo owilukhila mu Wele owe Angaaki Lukali khulwe buliindi,
oyo orama mu buliindi bwo munyali owa bioosi,
anyala aboolela Wele ali,
“Ewe oli bubwilukhilo ne buliindi bwase.
Ewe oli Wele wase, ese khweyikina ewe.”
Alakhusikula ewe khukhwama mu mireko kikhabonekha tawe,
ne bulwaale bubwiira.
Alakhubiimba ewe ne chindaa chewe,
olanyoola buliindi khukhwama khu niye,
busuubilifu bwewe bulakhuteecha ne khu khuliinda ewe.
Okhenaana khuria kimireko kiosi kiosi siilo,
namwe kamatinyu kakhukwakho kumuusi,
namwe lufu lurakikha mu siilima,
namwe bubi bubwira kumuusi tawe.
Babaandu eelefu ndala bakhakwa alubafu lwowo,
chielefu ekhumi bakhakwa kumukhono,
kwowo kumuseecha, butinyu se bukhakhwolele ewe tawe.
Olilola mala obone nga babooni baukuumwa.
Ewe wakholile Wele bubwilukhilo bwowo
owe Angaaki Lukali khuba omuliindi wowo.
Khwako butinyu bwosi bwosi se bulikwa khwiwe tawe,
sisiayuumba se siliba embi niio omenyile tawe.
khu khuliinda ewe buli niyo ewe ocha.
okhakhola orio wetuya khwibaale tawe.
okhatubuundule chitalang'i ne kimiremu.
Wele aloma ali, “Ndaonia abo babasiima ese,
ne khuliinda bamanya bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne basaba, ese khabayeete,
ese khabe nabo ne bali mu butinyu.
Khabasikule ne khubaelesia lukoosi.
Ndibaelesia kumuruuru kwe khumenya lukali,
ndibaonia.”

Buli bulayi khu khupila orio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khu khufumia ewe, ee ewe owe Angaaki Lukali.
Khuboola busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe mu mutikhinyi,
ne busuubilwa bwowo siilo,
ne chinyimbo che biilili,
ne kumumilo kwe lituungu.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kimilimo kiowo kie bunyali kiasangaasiisie ese,
niimba khulwe khoyo sikila niko ewe okholile.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kimilimo kiowo kili kie bunyali bukali!
Kamebaasio kowo kali kamasiro lukali khwifwe.

ne omusilu naye se akaulila tawe,

abo bakhola kamabi banyala baindiaala,

oli owe Angaaki buli lwoosi.

lundi khuli babooni boosi bakhaulwe.
Ewe wakholile ese nabeele ne kamaani kamakali nga ke mboongo,
wambiitile ese chikhabi che busangaafu.
Naboone basiku base ne baulwa,
lundi nauliile bililo bie babooni.

kamatuunda, akhaba ne kiangaale lukali,

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amiia, efwarire luyali,
Omwami efwarire, esayile kamaani.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruka ne bunyali bukali mwikulu,

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, kamalaka kowo kali ka mindali,
ne lukaangu lwowo ng'ali luli lutakatifu buli lwoosi.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli Wele oukuumanga,
yekesia lirima liowo!
Ewe oli omukhalaki owe babaandu boosi,

niko benyekha bakholelwe!

ne khukhwebonia khulwe kamabi kabwe khukhwola siise siina?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, babi baapa babaandu bowo,
baapia siibi abo baali babowo.

beera ne kamaani bakwa.

Wele owa Isiraeli se amanyanga tawe.”
Baandu base, mwamile muriena mwaba basilu balendaafu murio?
Khukhwola liina nio mumanye?
Wele aaloonga kamaru kefwe, se anyala aulila tawe ku?
Aaloonga chimoni chefwe, se anyala abona tawe ku?
Arafwiranga chikholo, se anyala achiukuuma tawe?
Niye Omwekesi owe babaandu boosi, se alikho ne bukesi tawe?
amanyile nga kamebaasio kabwe kali ke busilu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omundu niye ewe okaambila ali ne busangaafu,
oyo niye ewe weyikia kamalaka kowo!
Omuelesianga siuluukho khukhwama mu ndaalo che butinyu,
khukhwola nga ne oukuuma babooni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alilekha babaandu bewe tawe,
se alianjukha abo bali babewe tawe.
Bung'ali bucha khukholekha mu chikoti lundi,
ne babaandu baluungi boosi balibufukiilila.
Naanu owanjeeta khu khupana ne babooni?
Naanu owaba lubeka lwase khu khupana ne babi?
Abaanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aanjeeta tawe,
andi ese nacha khale emakoombe.
Naloma ndi, “Ndikho ngwa asi,”
ne kakhali ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe bwandiila.
Kumwoyo kwase ne kweendekhelela lukali,
liioleelesia liowo lisangaasia.
Baruki be bubwoni babukula kamabi ne bakarao khubirira mu malaka banyala baambaana nawe ku?
Balecha alala khubunia baluungi,
ne khukhalakila lifwa khwaabo bakhali ne bubi tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abeele lukoba lwase lusire,
lundi ali Wele wase,
niye ali lulwanda lwase lwe bubwilukhilo.
Alibaukuuma ne khubabunia khulwe bubwoni bwabwe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe alibabunia.

Yiicha, lekha khwimbile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Lekha khukhole luyoka lwe khoyo khuyo ooli lulwanda lwe buonia bwefwe!
