ne khwimba chinyimbo che khoyo mu khufumia.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele owe bunyali,
Omwami owe bunyali khu bawele boosi.
Arukanga sibala sioosi,
khukhwama asi mu mabina khukhwola khu ngulu chindeeyi lukali.
Aruka enyanja niyo aaloonga,
sibala siosi, nisio niye omwene aaloonga.
Yiicha, lekha khwumwinamile ne khumusaaya niye,
lekha khusikame ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
owakhubuumba efwe!
ne efwe khuli babaandu nibo aliindanga,
lundi khuli busa nga kamakheese ne niye omwaayi,
luno ulila niko aloma,
nga khu ndaalo eyo ne bali Masa mu siangalaamwe tawe.
Ebweeneyo, bakhaka ese ne khu khungela,
akhaba ne baba ne baboone niko nabakholela.
Nasinyikhwa ne babaandu abo khu miiko kamakhumi kane.
Naloma ndi, ‘Bali ne sileka lukali!
Baloba khuloonda kamalaka kase.’
‘Se mulicha mu sibala nisio andi,
ndibaeleseliamo enywe sie siuluukho tawe.’ ”

Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lulwimbo lukeni!
Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, babaandu boosi mu sibala!
Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khumufumia!
Boola buli endaalo burume bulayi muli Wele akhuonisie efwe.
Boola luyali lwewe mu kholo,
bikholwa biewe bie khuukia mu kholo choosi!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omukali ne akhoya aebwa efuma lukali,
akhoya aebwa luyali lukali khukhila bawele boosi.
Sikila bawele Be Chikholo boosi bali bifwaani busa,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabaang'ana likulu.
Wele ali ne luyali ne bunyali,
bunyali ne bulayi bili mu lukaangu lwewe.
fumia luyali ne bunyali bwewe.
Fumia lisina lie luyali lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
reera siianwa mala mwiche mu lukaangu lwewe.
Yinamila oyo oli Omutakatifu ne abonekha,
baandu be sibala mweesi, ba ne liria ebweeni wewe.
Boolela chikholo choosi muli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye omwami!
Sibala siekhwikhileo ne se sinyala siesisiikha tawe,
alikhalakila chikholo mu bung'ali.”
Lekha likulu lisangaale, lundi lekha sibala siekhoye,
lekha enyanja efumie nende bioosi bibiechulamo,
Lekha kamaloba kekhoye, nende buli siindu silimo!
Nio kimirongooro kie mundaa kioosi kiliimba khulwe khoyo,
ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila alikho echa,
sikila alikho echa khukhalakila sibala.
Alikhalakila sibala mu buluungi,
ne chikholo mu bung'ali bwewe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amiia, lekha sibala siekhoye,
lekha bibala bikali bili khu nyanja bisangaale!
Kamafuumbi ne sisiilima sikali biamubotookheleele,
aruka mu buluungi ne bung'ali.
Wele aruma kumulilo kwewe ebweeni wewe,
ne khukhwosia basiku bamubotookheleele.
Chimbeni chewe chikhosia sibala,
sibala sibona chimbeni echo mala siterema.
Bikulu binakulukha nga embula ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ebweeni wo Mwami owe sibala sioosi.
Likulu liekesia buluungi bwewe,
ne chikholo choosi chibona luyali lwewe.
Basaayanga bifwaani boosi baambwa chisoni,
abo babebonia khulwe bifwaani bitaamba bukhala,
bawele Be Chikholo boosi bamwinamila niye.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, babaandu ba Sayuni basangaalile,
ne chingoba che mu sibala sia Yuda chekhoya sikila bukhalaki bwowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila ewe oli owe angaaki,
lukali khu sibala sioosi,
ewe oli ne luyali lukali khukhila bawele boosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima abo bababiila bubwoni,
aliindanga bulamu bwe batakatifu bewe,
abasikula khukhwama mu bunyali bwe babooni.
Buwaanga buli khu baluungi,
ne busangaafu khu balayi.
Enywe mweesi muli baluungi sangaala sikila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile.
Khebulila niko Wele Omutakatifu akholile,
lundi mu mupile niye orio.

Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lulwimbo lukeni,
akholile kamakhuwa ke khuukia!
Aanyoolile bukhili khulwe bunyali ne kamaani kewe kamatakatifu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekesie bukhili bwewe,
aakhola bunyali bwe buonia bwewe bwamanyikhana khu baandu Be Chikholo.
Akhebulile busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe ne busuubilwa bwewe khu kholo eya Isiraeli.
Babaandu be chimbeka choosi che sibala baboone bukhili bwa Wele wefwe.
Babaandu be sibala mweesi, yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khoyo,
fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu mienya ne luyoka lwe khoyo!
Yimba khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Khupa bukhino bwe kamatuungu!
Khupa chikhoombi ne chinjika,
mala mupile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omwami wefwe luyoka lwe khoyo.
Lekha enyanja efumie, nende bioosi bibiechulamo,
sibala nende abo bamenyilemo!
Lekha chinjichi chifumie,
lekha chingulu chiimbile alala khulwe khoyo,
ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila echa khukhalakila sibala.
Alikhalakila sibala mu buluungi ne chikholo mu bung'ali.

Ekhaale khu ndebe eye bubwami eli khu kerubi,
lekha sibala sie sisiikhe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali owe bunyali mu Sayuni,
ali omukali lukali khu kholo choosi.
Buli mundu alifumia bukali ne lisina liewe lie khuukia.
Niye ali Omutakatifu!
Omwami owe bunyali, ewe wasiima bung'ali,
wareere bung'ali mu Isiraeli,
wareerire buluungi ne bung'ali.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe,
yinaamila Wele ebweeni we ndebe yewe eye bubwami!
Niye ali Omutakatifu!
Musa nende Aruni baba balala khu basaayi bewe,
Samweli yesi aaba mulala khwaabo babamusaayanga,
balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala abayeeta.
baloonda kamalaka niko aabaelesia.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, ewe wayeeta babaandu bowo,
wabekesia oli ewe oli Wele obeelanga babaandu bowo,
kakhaba kario wabaukuuma khulwe bubwoni bwabwe.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.
Musaaye khu sikulu siewe sitakatifu!
Omwami Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, ali Omutakatifu.

Babaandu be mu sibala mweesi, kholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luyoka lwe khoyo!
Saaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khoyo,
yiicha ebweeni wewe ne chinyimbo che busangaafu!
Manya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele!
Niye owakhubuumba efwe, ne efwe khuli babewe,
efwe khuli babaandu bewe, kamakheese ke kamaayilwe kewe.
Yingila mu bilibwa bie lukaangu lwewe ne mu mupila orio,
cha khu luuya khwalwo ne fuma.
Khupila Wele orio ne khumufumia.
busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe buliio buli lwoosi,
ne busuubilwa bwewe khu selukho choosi.

Lulwimbo lwase luli khu busuubilwa ne bung'ali,
ne ndakhwimbila ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Liba liase se lilabamo bubi tawe.
Oliicha niio ndi siise siina?
Ndimenya mu buluungi munju yase,
ne se ndifukiilila bibiindu biikhali ne bukhala mu moni chase tawe.
Nabiila bikholwa biabo balekha Wele,
se ndiba mu bulala nabo tawe.
Se ndiba omubacha tawe,
ne se ndiba alala ne bubwoni tawe.
Ndibunia abo baloma ke bubwoni khu mundu okundi,
se ndifukiilila omundu owe kibonio ne sileka tawe.
Ndifukiilila abo baali basuubilifu mu sibala
ne khubalekha bamenye mwichipi liase.
Abo bakhalikho ne bubacha tawe balifukiililwa khu khukholela ese.
Omubeeyi se alimenya mwichipi liase tawe,
omubacha se alimenya niio ndi tawe.
Buli ndaalo ndibunia babooni mu sibala siefwe,
ndirusia babooni khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, rekeeresia lisaba liase,
mala oulile lilila liase khulwe buyeeti!
Okhakisa bubweni bwowo ne ndi mu butinyu tawe!
Reka liiri liowo khwise,
ndekeeresie mala unjeete bwangu!
Sikila chindaalo che bulamu bwase chiwa bwangu nga liliisi,
ne bikuumba biase biburukha nga kumulilo kwe kumukuba.
Nawechekheleele nga bunyaasi bunialile,
se ndi ne kumwoyo kwe khulia siakhulia tawe.
Khulila khwase khuli khukali,
nabeele kamakuumba busa.
Ndi nga engosia eeli mu sichiimi,
nga kusikhiikhi mu makuunda.
Ngona burengeecha,
ndi nga enyuni eyiiyuuma ne eli khu lusuli lwe nju.
Basiku base bakhoma ese biise bioosi,
abo babanjekha ese bataacha lisina liase khulaama babaandi
Likokhe nilio siakhulia siase,
ne kamasika kase katubaana nende nibio nywa.
Khulwe lirima ne bukhalafu bwowo,
wambukula ese mala wamwaata.
Bulamu bwase buli nga sisiiniini sie ekolooba,
ndikho niaala nga bunyaasi.
Ne kakhali ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi wamiia buli lwoosi,
lisina liowo liliio khu selukho choosi.
Ewe olirakikha khukholela lukoba lwa Sayuni siisa,
sili siise sie khulwaala siise esio sioolile.
Akhaba ne lwonakaakwe,
bakholi bowo balusiima,
akhaba ne luli mwibuna,
balukholela siisa.
Chikholo chiliria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne babaami be khu sibala boosi baliria luyali lwewe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oliombakha Sayuni,
alibonekha mu luyali lwewe.
Akhaulile lisaba liabo babanjuukhwe,
ne se alilekelesia lisaba liabwe tawe.
Lekha kano kaandikilwe chiselukho chichiicha,
nio babaandu bakhebulwa tawe bafumie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalola asi khukhwama abuundu wewe angaaki atakatifu,
aalola asi khu sibala khukhwama mwikulu.
Aaulila bililo bie baboe,
mala alekhuula abo babakhalakilwa khufwa.
Khwako lisina liewe liliboolwa mu Sayuni,
mala afumisibwe mu Yerusalemu.
Chikholo ne bubwami bwe bibala biliicha alala
ne khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamalilemo kamaani ne siili muele,
embiisie bulamu bwase.
Ee Wele, okhandusiao ne siili khusaakhuluwa tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oliio buli lwoosi,
lundi waloonga likulu ne kamakhono kowo wamwene.
Ebio biliwao ne kakhali ewe olibao,
bioosi biliwao mala bitaambe bukhala nga engubo ekhale.
Ewe olibimwaata nga chingubo mala biweo.
Ne kakhali ewe orama busa orio,
ne bulamu bwowo se buwa tawe.
Babaana be bakholi bowo balimenya mu muleembe,
ne mu buliindi bwowo, lisaaye liabwe liliba ne kumuleembe.

Ee mwoyo kwase fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nende biili mwise bioosi, bifumia lisina liewe litakatifu!
Ee mwoyo kwase fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne okheebilila bulayi bwewe bwoosi tawe.
Ookhubeelanga bubwoni bwowo bwoosi,
ne khuonia bulwaale bwowo bwoosi.
Ookhusikulanga ewe khukhwama mwifwa,
ne khu khuraakho busiime bwewe buukhawa tawe ne siisa.
Akhwikusianga ne kamalayi mu bulamu bwowo bwoosi,
nio buele bwowo buba ne kamaani lundi nga efuruusi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arusia bukhalaki bulayi khwaabo bapapisibwa siibi,
ne khubakholela ke bung'ali.
Eekesia Musa chingila chewe,
ne khulekha Baisiraeli babone bikholwa biewe bie khuukia.
ali kalaa mu khuambwa lirima mala busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe buli bukali.
Se achiililila khurafua busa tawe,
se ali ne lirima buli lwoosi tawe.
Se akhuukuuma efwe nga khukhoyelwa tawe,
namwe akhukholele efwe khuloondekhana nga bubwoni ne bubi bwefwe buli tawe.
Busiime bwa Wele bwa buli lwoosi buli bukali,
khwaabo bamuelesia niye luyali,
nga likulu ne lili angaaki lukali khukhwama khu sibala.
Wele arusiao bubwoni bwefwe abuyila ataayi,
nga buleeyi bwe khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholela siisa abo bamuelesia niye luyali,
nga paapa ne akholela siisa babaana bewe.
Sikila amanyile nga efwe khwabuumbwa,
amanyile ali efwe khuli liloba busa.
Ne omundu, bulamu bwewe buli nga bunyaasi,
bumulikha nga siimuli sie mundaa,
mala ekhuungu esiuucha, ne sirurao,
mala abundu aasio se asimanyakho lundi tawe.
Ne kakhali busiime buukhawao tawe bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulibaao buli lwoosi,
ne bulayi bwewe khu selukho choosi khwaabo bamuelesia niye luyali,
abo baliinda endakaano yewe,
ne khuria kamalaka kewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amiia khukhwama mwikulu,
ne bubwami bwewe bwamiia buli abuundu.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ee enywe malaika bewe,
enywe be kamaani muria kamalaka kewe,
ne khuulila niko aloma!
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enywe banamae bewe mweesi,
enywe bakholi bewe mukhola lilienya liewe!
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enywe bibuumbe biewe bioosi,
mufumie niye buli abuundu niio ali omuruki.
Ee mwoyo kwase fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!

Ee mwoyo kwase fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, oli omukali lukali!
Ewe wechula bunyali ne luyali,
Webotookheleesie buwaanga nga chingubo.
Wakalaasia likulu nga liiema,
ne khukhwombakha lukoba lwowo khu meechi ke angaaki.
Okhola kamafuumbi kaba likaari liowo,
ne khutimila khu ndaa che mbeo.
ne kumulilo ne chinjaso chakwo chiba bakholi bowo.
Ewe wakhwikha sibala khu musiingi kwasio,
ne se silisisiikha tawe.
Ewe wasibiimba ne enyanja nga osifwara engubo,
mala kameechi kafuuma bikulu.
Nga warafwira kameechi, kelukha,
nga kaulila ne orafuwa lukali, karekukha bwangu.
Kabirira khu bikulu ne khukhwiikha mu matooma,
khukhwola abuundu niio ewe wakarekekhera.
Ewe warao lulwakha nilwo kakhanyala kabirakho tawe,
nio kakhechula khu sibala lundi tawe.
Ewe okhola chisebele ne chifututusia mu matooma,
ne chinjichi akari we chingulu.
Chiaana kameechi ke khunywa khu saang'i che mundaa,
chipunda che mundaa chinywamo.
Chinyuni chombakha biswi ne khukhwimbila khu mirongooro,
kiili embi ne chinjichi echo.
Oreranga efula khu ngulu khukhwama mwikulu,
lundi wechusie khu sibala kumwalaalo kwowo.
Okholanga bunyaasi bumela chikhaafu chaye,
ne bimelwa nibio omundu arumikhira,
nio anyale khubiaala biakhulia,
mala ang'oone endali emusangaasia,
ne kamafura ke kumuseituni khumumiliisia,
ne siakhulia khumuelesia niye kamaani.
Kimitarakwa kia Lebanoni kinyoola efula engali,
kimirongooro kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene, nikio aabiaala.
Chinyuni chombakhakho biswi biacho,
kamang'ang'a kamenyangakho.
Chimbusi che mundaa chimenyile mu bikulu bileeyi,
ne kicheu bikisa mu mabaale.
Ewe waloonga kumwesi khukhwekesia biise bie kumwiiko,
ne enyanga khukwa siise ne siolile.
Waraao biise bie siilo,
ne chisaang'i che mundaa chirakikha khukeenda mu siilima.
Chitalang'i ching'ana chiulukhuma ne chiaaya,
ne chieenja siakhulia nisio Wele achielesianga.
Chiloota enyanga ne esoa,
ne khukona mu mabina kacho.
Nio babaandu barura khukhola kimilimo kiabwe,
mala bachiililila khukhola kimilimo khukhwola ekolooba.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wabuumba bibiindu bikali po!
Wabibuumba bioosi ne limanya likali.
Sibala siechulamo bibuumbe biowo.
Eyo enyanja emboofu lundi embalaayi,
nimwo bibuumbe biikhabalikha bimenyile,
bibuumbe biboofu ne bitiiti sitube.
kuwanaangali kwe mu nyanja nikwo ewe wabuumba.
Bibuumbe bino bioosi bikhweyikina ewe,
obieelesie siakhulia mu biise bibienyekha.
Obieelesianga siakhulia mala bilia,
oanaanga siakhulia, mala bilia bikura.
Ne obilekha, bieendekhelela,
ne obinuula kumuuya kwe bulamu bwowo,
bifwa ne khukobola mwiloba nimwo biama.
Ne kakhali no bieelesia kumuuya,
bibao lundi,
oana bulamu buyia khu sibala.
Lekha luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lubeo buli lwoosi,
lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhoyele kumulimo kwewe,
oyo ololanga khu sibala mala siterema,
otiilanga khu bikulu mala bituukha!
Ndiimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu bulamu bwase bwoosi,
kheembe khufumia Wele biise bioosi bie bulamu bwase.
Lekha lulwimbo lwase lumusiimisie niye,
sikila busangaafu bwase bwamanga khu niye.
Lekha babooni baali mu sibala babune,
lekha bamayaanu baweo.
Ee mwoyo kwase fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!

Khupila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio, boola bukali bwewe,
boolela chikholo niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile.
Yiimba khufumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
boola ke khuukia niko akholile.
Sangaala khulwe lisina liewe litakatifu,
lekha kimioyo kiabo basaayanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kiekhoye.
Yiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
yiima kamaani kewe,
yiima khubaao khwewe buli lwoosi.
Enywe lwibulo lwa Aburahamu,
omukholi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enywe lwibulo lwa Yakobo,
omundu niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aarobora,
khebulila ke khuukia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola,
ne bukhalaki nibwo aana.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele wefwe,
bukhalaki bwewe buli buli abuundu mu sibala sioosi.
Aliliinda endakaano yewe buli lwoosi,
akholanga niko alaka khu selukho eelefu.
ne lisuubisia nilio echubila Isaaka.
endakaano elibaao buli lwoosi.
Aaloma ali, “Khakhuelesie sibala sia Kanaani,
siliba kumukabwa kwowo wamwene.”
Babaandu ba Wele baba batiiti busa,
baaba baakwa mu sibala sia Kanaani.
Bayiiyayiiya khukhwama mu sibala silala khukhwola mu siindi,
khukhwama mu bwami bulala khukhwola mu buundi.
akaania babaami khulwe khuliinda babaandu bewe ali,
“Mukhakholela bakholi barobore base libi tawe,
mukhaumisiakho bang'oosi base tawe.”
ne khurusiao biakhulia biabwe bioosi.
aruma Yosefu, owaba ne aakusibwa khuba nasioobi,
aafwara lusiinga lwe sichuuma mwikosi mwewe,
khukhwola nga niko aaloma nga kecha kekholekha.
Likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liamwekesia niye khuba owa ng'ali.
omuruki owe chikholo amuelesia niye bulekhuule.
ne khumuelesia buruki bwe sibala sioosi,
aamuelesia ne bunyali khu bemeelesi babaandi,
ne bunyali bwe khukhwikisia bakeleki bewe.
ne khuuba omukwa mu sibala esio.
lundi aabakhola baaba ne kamaani khukhila basiku babwe.
Aakhola Bamisiri babiila babaandu bewe,
ne khukholela bakholi bewe ke bubacha.
nende Aruni, niye omwene aaba ne aroboore.
Bakhola bikholwa bie bunyali bwa Wele,
ne khukhola ke khuukia mu Misiri.
ne kakhali Bamisiri se baloonda lilaka liewe tawe.
ne khukhwira ching'eeni chabwe choosi.
chikhele chechula akhaba mwichipi.
biebuusia mu sibala sioosi.
mu bweyaangu bwe fula.
Onakaka kimisabibu ne kimituli kiabwe,
ne khu khupa asi kimirongooro kioosi.
chisike chingali chikhabalikha tawe,
chisike chalia bimelwa bie mu sibala bioosi,
chalia biakhulia bie mu mikuunda bioosi.
munju che ba Misiri choosi.
Baisiraeli basuta efwesa ne esahabu,
mala se abakhoo na mulala mu kholo chabwe owetuya tawe.
Bamisiri baria Baisiraeli,
mala basangaala khulwe khurekukha khwe Baisiraeli.
ne kumulilo khubakhoselia siilo.
ne khubaelesia siakhulia sikali khukhwama mwikulu.
kakhulukukhila mu siangalaamwe nga luluuchi.
Aakhebulila endakaano yewe endakatifu,
khu mukholi wewe Aburahamu.
Khwako aarangirira babaandu barobore bewe khurura Misiri,
mala beemba ne khukhwikhoya lukali.
ne khubalekha babukule kamasamba ke chikholo chichiindi,
nio babaandu bewe baulile engaani yewe,
ne khuria kamalaka kewe.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!

Ee khupila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio, sikila niye ali omulayi,
sikila busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe buliio buli lwoosi!
Naanu onyala aboola bikholwa bie khuukia bioosi bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Naanu onyala amufumia niye nga kenyekhana?
Bali basangaafu abo baria kamalaka kewe,
bakholanga buluungi biise bioosi.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne wekesia babaandu bowo kumwalaalo,
khebulile ese,
ewe ne olikho obasikula, njeete,
nio seesi mbone buyiinda bwe barobore bowo,
nio seesi nekhoye mu busangaafu bwe kholo yowo,
nio seesi netikite nende abo baali babowo.
Efwe khwakholile bubwoni nga bakuuka befwe bosi,
khwakholile bumayaanu, lundi khwakholile kamabi.
se babukula bikholwa biowo bie khuukia khuba siindu tawe,
se bakhebulila bukali bwe busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe,
ne kakhali baba bareengu khu owe Angaaki Lukali khu Nyanja eya Shamu.
Ne kakhali aabaonia nga yaba aalakiilisia,
nio ekesie bunyali bukali bwewe.
mala abaraangirira khubira mu lusiba oli babirira khu siangalaamwe.
Khwako aabaonia khukhwama mu makhono ke basiku,
ne khubasikula khukhwama mu bunyali bwe basiku.
Mala kameechi katiimbia kera basiku babwe,
se aliio akhaba mulala owasikala tawe.
beemba khumufumia niye.
Ne kakhali bebilila bwangu bikholwa biewe,
se baliinda likaambila liewe tawe.
mala bara Wele mwikhako ne bali mu siangalaamwe,
aabaelesia nisio benya,
ne kakhali lundi aabarumirea bulwaale bubwiira.
nende Aruni, omukholi omutakatifu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio sibala siekukha mala siamila Tatani,
ne khusiikha Abiramu ne lulwibulo lwewe,
kumulilo kwakwa khu baloondi babwe,
ne khukhwosia babooni abo.
mala basisaaya,
babukula luyali lwa Wele mala barura,
khu sifwaanani sie saang'i elia bunyaasi.
Bebilila Wele, omuonia wabwe,
owakhola ke khuukia mu Misiri,
bikholwa bie khuukia mu sibala sia Hamu,
ne kamakhuwa ke khuriisia a Nyanja eya Shamu.
Khwako Wele aaloma ali alabunia babaandu bewe.
Abaanga Musa omukholi wewe omurobore se aalomaloma ne Wele,
mala ekoonjelela Wele akhaba ne lirima libunia babaandu bewe omwene tawe.
sikila se basuubila endakaano eya Wele tawe.
Bamenya mu maeema kabwe ne beng'ulung'unya,
ne se baulila ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Khwako echuba ali,
alibakhola babunile mu sichiimi,
ne khubaandakasia mu bibala tawe.
ne khulia chimbosio chichaanwa khu bawele bafu.
Baambia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirima khulwe bikholwa biabwe,
mala lufu lwabakwamo.
Ne kakhali Fineasi enyokha asi ne khuukuuma babaakhola bubwoni,
mala Wele arusiao lufu olwo.
Ne sikholwa esio sibalikhila khu niye khuba,
buluungi khukhwama khu selukho ndala khukhwola khu kiindi buli lwoosi.
mala Musa aba ne butinyu bukali sikila nibo.
Baambia Musa lirima likali,
nio aloma niko akhebaasiisie bulayi tawe.
ne kakhali batubaana ne chikholo,
ne khuloonda kimiima kie chikholo.
Babaandu ba Wele basaaya bifwaani,
mala sikholwa sino siaba kumureko kuubabunia.
nga chimbosio khu bisieeno.
mala sibala sianyaalutikha khulwe sifuki esio.
Baaba banyaalu khulwe bikholwa biabwe,
ne se baba basuubilifu khu Wele tawe, bulayi bwene nga baeeyi.
Wele asinyikhila babaandu bewe.
Aabalekha mu bunyali bwabo bakhasaayanga Wele tawe,
mala basiku babwe babaruka.
Basiku babwe babaapia nibo siibi,
mala bayingililwa khuba asi we basiku abo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asikula babaandu bewe kamakhabi kamakali,
ne kakhali barobora khuba bareengu khu Wele ne khukwa mu bwoni bukali.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeeta nga bamulililakho,
mala aabaonia butinyu bwabwe.
Aakhebulila endakaano yewe sikila nibo,
mala abakholela siisa khulwe busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe.
Wele aakhola ba baaba ne babaapia siibi boosi,
babakholela siisa.
mala okhukobosie ewefwe khukhwama mu kholo chichiindi,
nio khukhuupile ewe orio ne khufumia lisina liowo litakatifu.
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Baisiraeli,
mu fumie niye khukhwama mindali khukhwola mindali!
Lekha baandu boosi balome bali “Amina”

sikila busiime bwewe bukhawa buliio buli lwoosi!
Lekha basikulwe ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi balome bario,
nibo asikuule khukhwama mu butinyu,
ne khubara alala khukhwama mu bibala,
khukhwama ebukwe nende mumbo,
khukhwama ebunaswa nende siafubo.
Balala bayiiyayiiya ne bali akari we siangalaamwe,
ne se banyala khunyoola engila ebayila mu lukoba nio bamenyemo tawe.
Baba ne njala ne bulesia,
mala batibia lilieyikina lioosi.
Nio nga baba mu butinyu balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala Wele aabasikula khukhwama mu butinyu bwabwe.
Abaraangirira khu ngila engololofu,
khukhwola nga ne boola mu lukoba bamenyemo.
Lekha baapile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio khulwe busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe,
khulwe bikholwa biewe bie khuukia nibio akholela babaandu!
Sikila aelesianga be bulesia kameechi,
ne siakhulia khu be njala.
Balala bamenyanga mu khusulunya ne sisiilima,
baboe baapwa siibi ne kiminyololo,
sikila baba bareengu khu malaka ka Wele,
ne khuloba likaambila lioyo owe Angaaki Lukali.
Balua lukali khulwe kimilimo kimitinyu,
bakwiichanga asi, ne se abao obayeeta tawe.
Nio nga baba mu butinyu balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala Wele aabasikula khukhwama mu butinyu bwabwe,
Wele abarusia mu khusulunya ne sisiilima,
ne khukitulakamo kiminyololo kiabwe.
Lekha baapile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio khulwe busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe,
khulwe bikholwa biewe bie khuukia nibio aakholela babaandu!
Sikila afuniakakanga bilibwa bie kumukasa,
ne khukitulamo chinguulo che bichuuma.
Balala baba basilu, baapwa siibi sikila bubwoni bwabwe,
Se benya bapiekho khu siakhulia emoni tawe,
mala benga khufwa.
Nio nga baba mu butinyu balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala aabasikula khukhwama mu butinyu bwabwe,
Wele aaruma likhuwa, mala abaonia,
ne khubasikula khukhwama mu libuna.
Lekha bapile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio khulwe busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe,
khulwe bikholwa biewe bie khuukia nibio aakholela babaandu!
Lundi lekha baane chimbosio che khu khuupa orio,
ne khuboola khu bikholwa biewe mu mienya kie khoyo.
Balala bakeendela khu nyanja mu chimeeli,
ne bakholela bubwofuli khu nyanja chimbalaayi,
babona bikholwa bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
bikholwa biewe bie khuukia mu nyanja,
sikila aalaka, mala embeembesi engali yatasa khuucha,
mala yenyosia bibuli khu nyanja.
Chimeeli echo chasutwa angaaki mala chesiikha mu siba.
Mu butinyu burio bunyindaafu bwawa mu baandu,
betuya ne bataalitaala nga bameesi,
mala busicha bwabwe bwaba bwa busa.
Nio nga baba mu butinyu balilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala Wele aabasikula khukhwama mu butinyu bwabwe,
aasisia embeembesi,
mala bibuli biayeela.
Basangaala khulwe buoleelefu,
mala Wele abayila mu muleembe mwifubukho nimwo benya.
Lekha baapile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio khulwe busiime bwewe bukhawa tawe,
khulwe bikholwa biewe bie khuukia nibio akholela babaandu!
Lekha bamuelesie niye luyali mu mukhung'aano kwe babaandu,
ne khumufumia niye mu siikhasio sie babemeelesi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhola chinjichi chateenyela elala,
mala eemekha chisebele chikhabisia tawe.
Aakhola kamaloba ke ngakha khuba sisiangalaamwe,
sikila bubwoni bwabo bamenyilemo.
Aakhola kamaloba ke ngakha khuba sisiangalaamwe,
ne sibala sitakhamo kameechi siba chisebele.
Aalekha babaandu be njala bamenyemo,
mala bombakha lukoba bamenyemo.
Bamiicha bumiicho mu mikuunda ne khubiaala kimisabibu,
mala bakesa bibiaamo bikali.
Aabiita babaandu bewe chikhabi, mala banyoola babaana bakali,
se aalekha kamatuuli ke chikhaafu chabwe kaboomba tawe.
Nga babaandu ba Wele baulwa ne khuchangalaasibwa,
khulwe khu khupisibwa siibi lukali ne buchuuni,
Wele achekha ba baapianga nibo siibi,
mala aabakhola bayiiyayiiya mu siangalaamwe,
mukhali ne chingila tawe.
Ne kakhali aasikula babanani khukhwama mu buchuuni bwabwe,
mala aakhola lisaaye liabwe liatasikha lukali.
Baluungi babona kano mala basangaala,
ne kakhali babooni boosi se baba,
nende nilio balomamo tawe.
Lekha abo baali ne limanya baulile kamakhuwa kano,
lekha bamanye busiime bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bukhawa tawe.

Ee Wele, ese ndi ne lilieyikina likali!
Ese ndiimba kimienya ne khu khufumia ewe!
Siisimukha ee mwoyo kwase!
Lituungu ne siilili siisimukha!
Ese ndasiisimusia kamakhelebeende.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese ndakhupila ewe orio akari we chikholo,
ese ndakhufumia ewe akari we chikholo.
Sikila busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe buli bukali khukhwola angaaki we likulu,
busuubilifu bwowo bwoola mu maleesi.
Ee Wele, eebwa luyali angaaki we likulu!
Lekha luyali lwowo lukaliie khu sibala sioosi!
Khulwe bunyali bwowo khuonie efwe, ulila lisaba liase,
nio babaandu nibo ewe wasiima basikulwe.
Wele alomeele abuundu wewe atakatifu ali
“Mu bukhili bwase ndiaruramo lukoba lwa Shekemu mala ngabe babaandu base litooma lia Sukoti.
Kileati sibala siase, Manase eyase,
ekholo eya Efuraimu ekofia yase eye sibia,
Yuda eruungu yase eye bubwami.
Sibala sia Moabu sili lucho lwase lwe khusaabilakho,
sibala sia Edomu sisiase,
ese khupa luyoka lwe bukhili khu sibala sie Bafilisiti.”
Ee Wele, naanu okhambile ese mu lukoba lusire?
Naanu oliindangirira ese khucha Edomu?
Ee Wele, ewe sewakhulobile efwe tawe ku?
Ee Wele, ewe se walobile khucha mwiie ne banamae befwe tawe ku?
Khuyeete khuule omusiku,
sikila buyeeti bwe babaandu se bukhola siindu tawe.
Wele nali lubeka lwefwe khulakhila,
alaula basiku befwe.

Ese khufumia ewe, Wele okhasila busa tawe!
Babooni ne babeeyi banjibwaakala ese.
Baloma ke bubeeyi khwise,
lundi baloma kamabi khwise,
baloma kamabi khwise kaakhali ne sifuno tawe.
Akhaba ne nabasiima nibo,
ne khubasabila khu Wele,
se banjenya tawe.
Bakholela ese kamabi ne mbakholeele kamalayi,
lundi bambiila ne mbasiimile lukali.
Robora omukhalaki omubi akhalakile omusiku wase,
mala olekhe mulala khu basiku bewe omwene omusitake.
Lekha bayaale naye mala anyolekhe khuba omubi,
lekha akhaba khukhwechuba khwewe khubalikhe khuba bubwoni.
lekha omundu okundi akhole kumulimo kwewe!
Lekha babaana bewe babe bafuubi,
ne omukhasi wewe abe namulekhwa!
Lekha babaana bewe bayiiye-yiiye ne khusabiilisia,
lekha babatimanie khukhwama
Lekha bamubaanja babukule kimiaandu kiewe kioosi,
lundi lekha baakwa babukule bie lukesi lwewe bioosi.
Akhabao akhaba na mulala omukholela niye siisa,
namwe alela bafuubi nibo aalekha tawe.
Lekha be lisaaye bewe boosi bafwe,
mala lisina liewe libililwe khu selukho eloondakho.
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhebulile bubwoni bwe bakuuka bewe,
lundi bubwoni bwa maawe bukhabeelwa tawe.
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhebulile bubwoni bwabwe buli lwoosi,
ne kakhali babeene bakhoya beebililwe elala!
Omundu oyo se ebaasiakho ali abeemo siisa tawe,
aapia siibi ne khukhwira bataambi, babanani nende bakhenyala tawe.
Aasiima khulaama, lekha yesi alaamwe!
Se aasiima khubiita babaandu chikhabi tawe,
khwako omundu akhamubiitakho niye chikhabi tawe!
Khulaama khu niye khwaba nga khufwara engubo,
lekha bilaamo biewe bingile mu mubili kwewe nga kameechi niko anywa,
lundi bingile mu makuumba kewe nga kamafura niko eakha!
Lekha kamafuunikhe niye nga chingubo,
ne khumubakho biise bioosi nga kumukoye nikwo eboyile mu sibuno.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ukuuma basiku base mu ngila ng'ene eyo,
abo balomanga kamabi kario khwise!
Ne kakhali ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omwami wase, njeete nga ne welakana,
mala usikule ese sikila bulayi bwe busiime bwowo.
Sikila ndi omutaambi lundi omubanani,
ne kumwoyo kwase kuli mu buchuuni.
Ndi siimbi khuwao nga si siiniini sie ekolooba,
ndi nga esike niyo ekhuungu etaamusia.
Kamasikamo kase kafwokoye khulwe khutaamba siakhulia,
nabeele kamakuumba busa.
basisiikha kimirwe kiabwe mu khunjekheelela!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, njeete ese!
Mbonie ese khulwe busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lekha basiku bamanye bali bunyali buno buli bubwowo,
bali niwe oumboniisie ese!
Banyala balaama ese, ne kakhali ewe olambiita ese chikhabi.
Lekha babakhupia ewe siibi baulwe;
ne ndekhe ese, omukholi wowo, sangaale.
Lekha basiku base bachangalaasibwe lukali,
lekha babe ne chisoni chingali.
Ndiipila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio engali mu mumilo kwe angaaki,
ndimufumia niye mwibuusiana lie babaandu,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliindanga omubanani,
ne khumuonia niye khukhwama khwaabo bamukhalakila khufwa.

“Yikhala kumukhono kwase kumuseecha,
khukhwola nga ne khola basiku bowo babe mu bunyali bwowo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabalaaye bunyali bwe bubwami bwowo khukhwama Sayuni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ruka basiku bowo.”
Khu ndaalo niyo ewe upanilakho ne basiku bowo,
babaandu bowo bakherusie.
Basoleeli bowo bakheeche niio oli khu sikulu sitakatifu nga luume lwe kumutikhinyi.
ne se alikaluukhana tawe,
ali, “Ewe oli omusaayi owa buli lwoosi,
oliio busa nga Omusaayi Melikisedeki.”
Omwami ali nawe,
ne aliambwa lirima aliula babaami.
Alikhalakila chikholo,
ne khukhwira babaandu bakali,
aliula babaami khu sibala sioosi.
Omwami akhanywe kameechi ke mu sebele eli embi khu muyila,
ne anyoolile kamaani, akhabe omukhili.

Ese fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Ndiipila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi orio ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
mu libuusiana lie babaandu bewe.
Kamakhuwa niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholanga,
kali ke khuukia lukali!
Abo nibo kamakhuwa ako kasiimisia benya khukamanya.
Niko akhola koosi kechula luyali ne bunyali,
buluungi bwewe buli bwa mindali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhulekhanga efwe
ne khwibilila bikholwa biewe bie khuukia tawe,
ali owe kumwalaalo lundi owe siisa.
Aanaanga siakhulia khwaabo bamuelesia niye luyali,
se ebililanga endakaano yewe tawe.
Eekesie bunyali bwewe khu baandu bewe,
mu khubaelesia nibo kamaloba ke baakwa.
Niko akhola koosi kali kasuubisia lundi ka ng'ali,
kamalaka kewe koosi kali kakeyikinwa.
Kaliio biise bioosi,
kaanwa mu bung'ali ne buluungi.
Aasikula babaandu bewe,
ne khukhola endakaano eya mindali nabo.
Niye ali Omutakatifu lundi owe khuriisia lukali!
boosi bali nalio bali ne busicha bukali.
Efuma yewe eliio buli lwoosi.

Omundu oelesia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luyali ali ne busangaafu,
omundu owekhoyela khuria kamalaka kewe.
Lisaaye liewe liliba ne bunyali mu sibala,
eselukho eye baluungi eyo elibiitwa chikhabi.
Kimiaandu ne buiinda biliba mu nju yewe,
ne buluungi bwewe buliio buli lwoosi.
Buwaanga bukhoselanga babaandu baluungi mu siilima,
bukhoselianga abo baali ne siisa, kumwalaalo ne bung'ali.
Omundu oli omulekhuule mu khwikopia ne akheenyelakho bukhala tawe ali bulayi,
okholanga kimilimo kiewe mu bung'ali.
Omundu omuluungi se alikhilwa tawe,
alikhebulilwa biise bioosi.
Se aria khunyoola elomo khu matinyu kaliio tawe,
lisuubila liewe lili likali lundi ali ne lilieyikina mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Se eendekhelela namwe aaba ne buuri tawe,
ali na ng'ali ali alabona basiku bewe ne bakhilwa.
mala kumwalaalo kewe se kuli ne sisiakamo tawe,
aliba owe bunyali ne lukoosi.
Babooni babona kano mala baambwa lirima,
babiila omulayi lukali mala bafwa,
lilieyikina liabwe liwelao elala.

fumia lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

luno nende buli lwoosi.

nga lisaaye lia Yakobo liarura mu sibala sikeni,
Yuda yaba ekholo endakatifu yo Mwami,
Isiraeli yaba eyeewe omwene.
luluuchi lwa Yoritani lwalekha khubisia.

Chingulu chareenga chasuniakila nga kamameeme.
Enyanja ewe, siina sisiekholekha nio wateenya?
Ne ewe, ee Yoritani, siina sisiakila walekha khubisia?
Enywe bikulu, siina sisiakila mwaterema mwasuna nga chimbusi?
Enywe chingulu, siina sisiakila mwareenga mwasuniakila nga kamameeme?

ebweeni wa Wele owa Yakobo.
libaale liba esebele.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khwiwe weng'ene, khwiwe weng'ene,
ne luyali se lukhoyela lube khwifwe tawe,
sikila busiime bwowo bukhawa tawe ne busuubilwa bwowo.
Siina sikila chikholo chikhureebe efwe chili,
“Wele wenywe ali waena?”
Wele wefwe ali mwikulu,
akholanga lilienya liewe.
babaandu busa babing'oona.
Bili ne kiminwa ne kakhali se binyala khulomaloma tawe,
lundi bili ne chimoni ne kakhali se binyala khubona tawe.
Bili ne kamaru, ne kakhali se binyala khuulila tawe,
lundi bili ne kamoolu, ne kakhali se binyala khuunyila tawe.
Bili ne kamakhono, ne kakhali se binyala khutiila tawe,
lundi bili ne bikele, ne kakhali se binyala khukeenda tawe,
se binyala khulomaloma tawe.
Lekha bababing'oona boosi alala nende abo babieyikina,
babe nga bifwaani nibio bang'oona.

Amuyeetanga ne khumuliinda enywe.
Enywe mweesi musaayanga Wele, yeyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Amuyeetanga ne khumuliinda enywe.

akhabiite chikhabi babaandu ba Isiraeli,
ne basaayi ba Wele boosi.
babenyalila alala nende bakhenyalila bosi.

enywe ne babaana benywe boosi!
Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amubiite enywe chikhabi,
owabaang'ana likulu ne liloba!

ne kakhali ese ndia lilaka liowo.
Ese sangaala lukali sikila kamasuubisia kowo,
sangaala lukali nga oyo onyoolile sisiindu sie bukhala bukali.
Ese mbiilanga bubeeyi,
ne kakhali siimanga lilaka liowo.
Ese khufumianga ewe kamakhabi saba buli ndaalo,
khulwe bukhalaki bwowo bwe buluungi.
Abo babasiima lilaka liowo bali ne kumuleembe mu bwichufu,

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese neyikina khunyoola buonia bwowo,
lundi ndoonda kamalaka kowo.

Ese ndondanga kamalaka kowo,

sikila kamalaka kowo kali ka ng'ali.
Yirekekha khu khunjeeta biise bioosi,
sikila ese ndondanga kamalaka kowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ese nikoomba lukali buyeeti bwe buonia bwowo!
Ese sangaalila lilaka liowo.

lekha kamekisia kowo kanjeete.
Njiiya nga likheese litibile,
yiicha unjeete ese, omukholi wowo,
sikila se nalekhile kamalaka kowo tawe.

ewe niwe owanda munda mwa maayi wase.
Ese khufumia ewe sikila ese nabuumbwa mu ngila eye khuukia,
bikholwa biowo bioosi bili bie khuukia.
Ese manyile lino ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi.
Ewe wamanya khubao khwase,
ese ne ndikho khula munda mwa maayi wase,
ese ne ndikho khulilamo mu bwikisi.
Ewe wambona ne khebulwa tawe.
Chindaalo che bulamu bwase choosi chaandikwa mu sitabu siowo,
ne chikharakikha tawe.
Ee Wele, kamebaasio kowo kali kamatinyu lukali khwise,
kamebaasio kowo kali kamakali lukali!
Kaaba bali ese ngabala, kali kamakali khukhila kumuyekhe.
Ese ne siisimukha, siili busa nawe.
Ee Wele, nenya lukali ndi ewe wire babooni!
Nenya lukali ndi babaandu be sisiayuumba bakhandangana tawe!
Baloma ke bubwoni khwiwe,
baloma kamabi khwiwe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese nabiila lukali babakhubiila ewe!
Naleka lukali abo baali bareengu khwiwe!
Nababiila ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
mbabukula khuba basiku base.
Ee Wele, menieelesie mala omanye kali mu mwoyo kwase!
Ngele ese mala omanye kamebaasio kase!
Loleelesia omanye ne ndi omubi,
mala undangirire mu ngila eya mindali.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mbonie ese khukhwama khu baandu babi,
niinde khukhwama khu baandu be sisiayuumba.
Bakwangwaana khukhola kamabi biise bioosi,
bareera bulomani biise bioosi.
chilomo chabwe chili nga buchiba bwe khilakhima.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niinde khukhwama mu bunyali bwe babooni,
niinde khukhwama khu baandu be sisiayuumba,
bakwangwaana khu khukhupa ese asi.
Babaandu be sileka barekire luriimba lundiile ese,
bareereo kimireko,
ne khura chindiimba khu ngila nio bandiile ese.
Naboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi, “Ewe oli Wele wase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ulila khulila khwase khulwe buyeeti!
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omwami wase, omuliindi wase owe kamaani,
waniindile ese ne ndi mwiie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhaelesia babooni nisio benya tawe,
okhalekha niko bakwangwaana kekholekha tawe.
Okhalekha basiku base baaba bakhili tawe,
khola biriikhirisio biabwe khwise bibakobolele.
Lekha kamaanda kakesinge'ng'ile kabakwekho!
Lekha bamwaatwe mu maloo, bakharuramo lundi tawe!
Abo baloma ke bubeeyi khu baandi bakhaindiaala tawe,
lekha kamabi kanyoole be sisiayuumba mala kababunie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese namanyile ndi ewe oliindanga babanani,
ne bung'ali bwe bataambi.
Ng'ali baluungi bakhakhufumie ewe,
balimenya niio ewe oli.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese khusaba ewe, luno unjeete!
Ese ne khusaba ewe, rekeeresia.
kamakhono kase niko sutile mu ngaaki nga embosio eye ekolooba.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, liinda kumunwa kwase,
kamabi kakhaba khu minwa kiase tawe!
Okhandekha nenya khukhola kamabi tawe,
lundi okhandekha naba alala ne babi mu mabi kabwe tawe.
Okhandekha nabakho mu naikara chabwe tawe.
Omundu omulayi anyala ambukuuma ese,
ne khu khundafwira mu bulayi,
ne kakhali se ndifukiilila lukoosi khukhwama khu baandu babi tawe,
sikila sabanga biise bioosi khulwe khukhiingilila bikholwa biabwe biibi.
Ne bakharwe mu bunyali bwabo balibaukuuma,
balimanya bali likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili lia ng'ali.
Bikuumba biabwe bilisalanisibwa abiliindwa,
nga chiikhu chichasakwa ne khutonywakamo.
Omwami Owe Banamae, ne kakhali ese neyikina mwiwe.
Ese nenya buliindi bwowo,
okhandekha nafwa tawe!
Niinde khukhwama khu ndiimba nicho barekire bandiile,
khukhwama mu mireko kie babi.
Lekha babooni bakwe mu ndiimba chabwe babeene,
mala ese ndobe khunyoolakho butinyu tawe.

ese mwekoonjelela niye.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ulila lisaba liase!

se aliio okhali ne bubi ebweeni wowo tawe.

ne khu khumbula ese lukali.

Khwako kumwoyo kwambwelemo,

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nono njeete!

bwabwe babe nga bimelwa bie kamaani.

ndikhufumia ewe mindali na mindali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omukali lundi akhoyelwa afumisibwe lukali,

Nio babaandu bamanye bukesi ne kamekisio,
khumanya kamakhuwa ke bukesi,
khunyoola kamekisio mu khukhola sikesi,
buluungi, bung'ali ne bulekhaane,
nio likanakana lilayi lieelesibwe basilu,
ne limanya ne likanakana lilayi khu baele
Omukesi yesi anyala aulila mala atasakho khukhweyika,
ne omundu owe limanya anyoole busicha,
nio babaandu bamanye chisimo ne chingano,
kamakhuwa ke bakesi ne kiminayi kiabwe.
basilu balekelesia bukesi ne kamekisio.
Ulila, mwana wase, kamekisio ka raraao,
ne okhaloba liliekisio lia maao tawe,
sikila kaliba nga liliesaa khumurwe khwowo,
lundi nga bibiuma mwikosi mwowo.
Mwana wase, kaaba bali bamayaanu bakhuombelesia,
okhafukiilila tawe.
Kaaba bali baloma bali, “Yiicha khuche,
lekha khwikise mala khwire omundu,
lekha khwibuulile bakhali ne bubi tawe,
nga emakoombe lekha khubamile balamu,
bamuufu nga siliindwa ne sikholanga,
Khulanyoola bibiindu bie bukhala,
khulechusia chinju chefwe nende nibio khuyaayile,
ambaana nafwe,
khukhakabane nibio khunyoola.”
Mwana wase, okhacha ne nabo tawe,
okhengila mu ngila chabwe tawe,
sikila bali khangu khukhola kamabi,
ne bali khangu khuchukha sifuki.
Sikila kumureko ne kurekwa chinyuni ne chiloleeleele,
aba kumureko okwo kuli kwa busa.
Babaandu bano bekisa khuliinda sifuki siabwe babene,
beyibuulilanga babene.
Chingila nga chino chiri,
chili cha abo boosi banyoola bibiindu mu khurumikhira sisiayuumba,
sisiayuumba siiranga bali nasio.
Liniinianga kumumilo kwalio khu soko,
khu ngaaki khwe kamasiisi lilangilila,
a miliango kie bilibwa bie lukoba,
lilikho lilomaloma:
“Ee basilu! Mulachiililila khuba basilu khukhwola liina?
Babaandu be khulekelesia balachiililila khusangaalila khulekelesia khwabwe khukhwola liina?
Ne basilu khubiyila bukesi?
Ulila likololosia liase,
lola, ndakhuchukhila kaali mu nganakani chase,
nio omanye niko ekhwibaasilia.
Sikila namulaangile mala mwalobile khurekeeresia,
nalaangile ne mbao oundekereesie tawe.
Ne walekeleesie likaambila liase
mala se wafukiililekho likololosia liase tawe,
ne sesi ndakhuchekheelela ne oli mu butinyu,
ndikhukhoma ne onyoolile butinyu,
nga liaayaaya ne likhutundubikha nga ekhuungu,
lundi nga butinyu ne bwicha nga sisiifuusia,
nga buchuuni ne butinyu ne bukhwichakho.
Nio bakhanange ne kakhali se khabakobosie tawe,
bakhambiime ne kamaani koosi ne kakhali se bakhanyoole tawe.
Sikila babiila limanya
ne se barobora khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
se barekeeresia likaambila liase tawe,
lundi balekelesia likololosia liase,
khwako balilia kamatuunda ke chingila chabwe,
mala bechule kamabi kabwe.
Sikila basilu berwa mu khulekelesia,
lundi babunisibwa khulwe khulekha khukhwinaana,
ne kakhali oyo oumbulila alimenya mu muleembe,
ne baliba ne kumuleembe ne se balieendekhelela bubi bubwiicha tawe.”

Mwana wase, kaaba bali ofukiilila kamakhuwa kase,
mala obiikhe kamalaka kase mwiwe,
Oreke liiru liowo khuulila limanya,
mala okhole kumwoyo kwowo kube ne limanya.
Waaba ne osaba onyoole bukesi,
mala osabe lukali onyoole limanya,
waaba ne obuyiima nga oyiima efwesa,
lundi obuyiime nga oyiima kimiaandu kikiekisia,
aba olamanya khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala onyoole limanya lia Wele.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana bukesi,
ne khukhwama khu niye biamayo limanya ne liiulila,
abiikha bukesi bulayi khulwabo baali baluungi,
ali engabo khwaabo baali balayi,
aliindanga chingila cha ng'ali,
lundi aliindanga abo baali batakatifu bewe.
Nio olamanya buluungi ne bung'ali,
bulekhaani ne ngila endayi,
sikila bukesi bulingila mu mwoyo kwowo,
ne limanya lilikhusiimisia,
likanakana lilayi lilikhuliinda,
ne limanya liosi lilikhuliinda,
lilikhusikula ewe khukhwama mu ngila chimayaanu,
khukhwama khu baandu be chilomo chimbi,
balekha chingila chinuungi,
nio bakeende mu siilima,
babekhoya mu khukhola kamamayaanu,
lundi basiima sifwaabi,
babaandu be chingila chimbi,
lundi bamayaanu.
Olisikulwa khukhwama khu mukhasi omueeyani,
omutamba okhuombelesia ne kamakhuwa kamalayi,
alekha omuseecha niye abeelakho nasiili mukhaana,
mala ebilila endakaano niyo akhola ebweeni wa Wele wewe,
sikila enju yewe echa mu lifwa,
ne chingila chewe chiicha emakoombe,
bacha khu mukhasi oyo se bakobolanga tawe,
namwe se banyoolanga lundi chingila che bulamu tawe.
Nio olikeenda mu ngila che babaandu balayi,
lundi okeende mu ngila che baluungi.
Sikila baluungi balimenya mu sibala,
ne babaandu balayi baliramamo,
ne kakhali bamayaanu balirusibwa mu sibala,
ne babacha balinyosebwamo.

Mwana wase okhebilila kamekisio kase tawe,
ne kakhali, lekha kumwoyo kwowo kuliinde kamalaka kase,
Sikila kalikhutasa chindaalo ne kimiiko kie bulamu,
ne buiinda.
Okhalekha bubweyikinwa ne busuubilwa tawe,
biboe mwikosi mwowo,
biandike mu mwoyo kwowo.
ebweeni wa Wele ne babaandu.
Yeyikina mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi,
ne okheyikina kamakesi kowo wamwene tawe.
Mu ngila chowo choosi mukhebulile,
ne niye alakololosia chingila chowo.
ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala orure mu bumayaanu.
Bino bilaba buonia khu mubili kwowo
ne khukhuulusia mu makuumba kowo.
Ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kimiaandu kiowo,
ne bibiaamo biowo binyoa khukhwama bioosi,
nio birara biowo bicha khwichula swa,
ne chioochwa chenywe chikhechule endali lukali.
namwe akhalua ne alikho akhwikiicha tawe,
nga paapa ne abiiya omwana niye asiima.
Ali ne khabi omundu onyoola bukesi,
no mundu onyoola limanya,
sikila nisio onyoolamo sikhila sinyoolekha mu fwesa,
Ne bukhala bulimo bukhila esahabu.
Bukesi buli ne bukhala khukhila kamamili ke bukusi bwe angaaki,
ne mbao siosi siosi nisio wenya sinyala sialekhanisibwa ne nabwo tawe.
Buyindifu buli mu mukhono kwabwo kumuseecha,
ne mu mukhono kwabwo kumukhasi mulimo buiinda ne lukoosi.
Chingila chabwo chili che lisiimisia,
ne chingila chabwo choosi chili che kumuleembe.
Buli kumurongooro kwe bulamu khwaabo babubukula,
abo babuaamba ne kamaani balaangwa be ekhabi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaang'ana sibala khubirira khu bukesi,
khulwe limanya arao likulu,
khubirira khu limanya liewe chinjichi charundukha,
ne kamafuumbi kekhola efula.
Mwana wase liinda bukesi bulayi ne enganakani endayi,
bikhakhola birio biakhururakho tawe.
Ne bilaba bulamu khulwe kumwoyo kwowo,
ne buroni mwikosi mwowo.
Nio olikeenda khu ngila mu muleembe,
ne sikele siowo se siliituya tawe.
Ne wikhala asi se oliembeelela tawe,
nga nokona asi liilo liowo liliba lilayi.
Okheembeelela butinyu bwa matundubiikha,
namwe khubuna khwe butinyu ne khwicha tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaba lilieyikina liowo,
ne alikhuliinda khukhwama mu mireko.
Okhalekha khukhola bulayi khwaabo babenyekhana obakholele tawe,
liaba ne lili mu bunyali bwowo khola orio.
Okhaboolela chirani wowo oli, “Cha, okobole,
namwe muchuli khakhuelesie” noli nende sie khumuelesia tawe.
Okharekekhera kamabi owasio,
owakhweyikina tawe.
Okhayingana no omundu yesi yesi nokhali ne sifuno,
aaba nakhakhukholeele libi tawe.
Okhakhendekhela omundu okhola sisiayuumba tawe,
lundi okharobora chingila chewe tawe,
sikila omundu owe sifwaabi ali osinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali baluungi bali mu bwiyikinwa bwewe.
Silaamo sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sili khunju eye bamayaanu,
ne kakhali abiita chikhabi khunju eye babaandu ba ng'ali.
ne kakhali akholela kamalayi abo babeboombia,
bakesi balinyoola kumukabwa kwe lukoosi,
ne kakhali basilu balinyoola chisoni.

Ulila, baananywe likaambila lie baraarawenywe,
ne rekeeresia nio munyoole bukesi,
sikila muelesia enywe kamekisio kamalayi:
mukhalekha niko emwikisia tawe.
Nga naba omwana omusoleeli,
omuteelwa owa paapa ne maayi,
anjekesia ne amboolela ali,
“Lekha kumwoyo kwowo kutiile ne kamaani kamakhuwa kase,
liinda kamalaka kase nio omenye,
okhebilila namwe okhaukha, khu makhuwa kase tawe.
Nyoola bukesi, nyoola limanya.
Okhabulekha tawe, ne bulikhuliinda,
busiime, mala bulikhuliinda.
Khurakikha khwe bukesi khuli khuri, nyoola bukesi,
ne siosi siosi nisio onyoola, tasakho khunyoola limanya.
Buelesie bukhala lukali ne bulikhuelesia efuma,
bulikhuelesia lukoosi waba ne obubukula.
Bulira khu murwe kwowo bimuli bilayi,
bulikhuraakho ekutwa endayi.”
Ulila, mwana wase mala ofukiilile kamakhuwa kase
nio kimiiko kie bulamu bwowo kibe kimikali.
Nakhwekesie ewe engila eye bukesi,
nakhuyilile mungila che buluungi.
Nga ne okeenda se olikhiingililwa tawe,
wakhaba notima soliituya tawe.
Khebulila kamekisio,
ne okhakebilila tawe,
kaliinde, sikila kali bulamu bwowo.
Okhengila mungila che bamayaanu tawe,
ne okhakeenda mungila che babaandu bamayaanu tawe.
Kirurekho okhakichilakho tawe,
kilekhe mala oche engila yowo.
Sikila se bakona ne bakhakholile kamakhiikha tawe,
liilo se libaamba ne bakhaumisie omundu tawe.
Sikila bumayaanu buli nga siakhulia siabwe,
ne sisiayuumba sili nga endali yabwe eye khunywa.
Ne kakhali engila eye baluungi eli nga buwaanga bwe nyanga ne soa,
bukhosia ne buchiililila khuwangia khukhwola mwiangilwe.
Engila eye bamayaanu eli nga sisiilima sikali,
se bamanya betuya khu siindu siina tawe.
Mwana wase ulila niko ndoma,
rekeeresia kamakhuwa kase.
Okhalekha karura mu nganakani chowo tawe,
kabiikhe mu mwoyo kwowo.
Sikila kali bulamu khuyo okanyoola,
ne kamalesi khu mubili kwewe kwoosi.
Liinda kumwoyo kwowo khukhila bioosi,
sikila kuli esebele eye bulamu.
Yirusiakho lilomaloma liibi,
lundi yirusiakho chilomo chindabarwa.
Okhanyukanyuka tawe,
okhereerera chisoni tawe.
nio niko okhola kaliba kamalayi,
okhacha kumukhono kumuseecha,
namwe kumukhasi tawe, rura mu mamayaanu.

Mwana wase rekeeresia bukesi bwase,
ulila limanya liase,
nio obe ne bukesi bulayi,
mala kiminwa kiowo kilinde limanya.
Kiminwa kio omukhasi omueeyi kironya bubuukhi,
ne chilomo chewe chimbolu khukhilakho kamafura,
ne kakhali ekhumaliilikha ali omurafu nga chindang'unywe.
Lundi nga embalu eyokia chimbeka chombi.
Bikele biewe bicha mu lifwa,
khukeenda khwewe khuloonda engila echa emakoombe,
se arekeeresia ke engila eye bulamu tawe,
ne atiima mala se amanya tawe.
Nono baananywe, ndekeeresie,
mala mukhaukha khukhwama khu makhuwa kase tawe.
Okhaba siimbi ne naye tawe,
ne okhacha embi amuliango kwe enju yewe tawe,
nebusa okhola orio waelesia lukoosi lwowo babaandu babaandi,
ne bulamu bwowo babaandu bakhalimo siisa tawe,
nebusa bareende bayaaya kimiaandu kiowo,
mala kamaani kowo kache munju eyo okundi,
mala ekhumaliilikha khwe limenya liowo olile,
nga chinyama ne kumubili kwowo ne bichuuna,
nio ewe oliloma oli, “Siina sisiakila nalekelesia siiukuumo,
nio kumwoyo kwase kwalekelesia khubiiywa!
Se narekeeresia babekisia base,
namwe nabaulila tawe.
Naba nolile khu siise sie khuambwa chisoni,
mu libuusiana lie babaandu.”
Nywa kameechi khukhwama mu sebele yowo wamwene,
kameechi kakeekha khukhwama mu sebele yowo wamwene.
Kameechi kowo kakhoya kachukhwa buli abuundu ku?
Kakhoya kachukhwa khu ngila che chingoba ku?
Kakhoya kaba kakowo weng'ene,
se kali ke bakeni ne nawe tawe.
Lekha emoni eye esebele yowo ebiitwe chikhabi,
ne yikhoyela omukhasi owe buele bwowo,
owe lukoondo lulayi lundi osiimisia.
Nyalikha ne busiime ne busangaafu bwewe biise bioosi,
yekhoyela busiime bwewe buli lwoosi.
Mwana wase, siina sikila wekhoyele busiime bwo mukhasi omueeyani,
siina sikila wikwayile omukhasi owa beene?
Sikila chingila cho mundu chili ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amanyile chingila chewe choosi.
Bumayaanu bwo mumayaanu bumureka omwene,
ne anyoolwa mu bikholwa bie bumayaanu bwewe.
Afwa khulwe khuleka siiukuumo,
ne khulwe busilu bwewe bukali atiba.

Mwana wase, ne weaanile khukhwimeelela chirani wowo khulwe likobi liewe,
Kaaba bali waanile lisuubisia liowo sikila omundu oyo,
Aba warekibwe mu bulomalomi bwe kumunwa kwowo.
Watiiliilwe ne kamakhuwa kowo wamwene?
Nono khola ori mwana wase mala wionie,
sikila wakwile mu bunyali bwo wasio,
cha khangu olilile owasio.
Okhakonakho liilo tawe,
namwe bisike biowo bikhafunyikhakho tawe,
yionia nga kicheu khukhwama khu muuayi,
lundi nga enyuni khukhwama khu mureko.
Ewe mukara, cha olole kamake,
loleelela chingila chako mala obe omukesi.
Se kali no mwimeelesi,
omwimeelesi omukhulu namwe omwami tawe.
Ne kakhali karekekha biakhulia biako mu simiyu,
ne khubuusia biakhulia biako mwikesa.
Ewe mukara, olakona buleeyi siina ao?
Olisiisimukha khukhwama mwilo siise siina?
khukhwifumba kamakhono khutiiti khuri khuulukha,
nio butaambi bulikhwichakho nga omunuuli,
ne khutaamba nga omundu owe bulwaani.
Omundu owe sipoli, omundu omumayaanu,
akeenda keenda ne chilomo chimbi,
apakilisia bisike biewe ne khutunya bikele,
okeselela ne lulwala lwewe,
ne kumwoyo kumubi arekekha kamamayaanu,
buli lwoosi abiaala bubwaukhani,
Khwako butinyu bulimukwakho khangu khu siise sitiiti siri,
alifunikha khukhwola mu bweyaangu nibwo akhaona tawe.
Biindu biliio sita nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abiila,
saba biili bisinyisia khu niye.
Chimoni che lililola, lulimi lubea,
kamakhono kachukha sifuki sie bakhali ne bubi tawe,
kumwoyo kurekekha kamamayaanu,
bikele biili khangu khutima mu mamayaanu,
omuloli orusia buloli bwe bubeeyi,
ne omundu obiaala bubwaukhani mu balebe.
Mwana wase, liinda kamalaka ka raraao,
ne okhalekha kamekisio ka maao tawe.
Kare mu mwoyo kwowo buli lwoosi,
kaboe mwikosi mwowo.
Ne okeenda kalikhurangirira,
nokona kalikhuliinda,
ne winyokha kalilomaloma ne nawe.
Sikila kamalaka kali etaa ne kamekisio kali buwaanga,
lirafwira lie siiukuumo lili engila eye limenya,
khukhuliinda ewe khukhwama khu mukhasi omumayaanu.
Khukhwama khu lilomaloma lilayi lio mukhasi omueeyi.
Okhekoomba lukoondo lwewe tawe,
ne okhamulekha akhuoyela chimoni chewe tawe,
sikila omueeyi anyala akulibwa khulwe kumukaati mulala,
ne kakhali erisia omundu oyo omwene.
Omundu anyala asuta kumulilo khu sifuba siewe,
mala chingubo chewe chilekhe khuya ku?
Namwe omundu anyala akeenda khu manda ke kumulilo,
mala bikele biewe bialekha khuya ku?
Nono kali kario khuyo ocha khukona no mukhasi owa chirani wewe,
omundu yesi yesi otiila khu mukhasi oyo alinyoola kumunaanio.
Babaandu se balekelesianga omwifwi owiiba,
khumala enjala yewe tawe.
Ne kakhali aaba ne anyoolekha mu bwifwi,
aliruunga khukhwola kamakhabi saba,
aliaana buli sisiindu siili munju mwewe.
Oyo okhola bueeyi se ali ne nganakani endayi tawe,
oyo okhola ario ebunia omwene.
Alinyoola kamakoonjo ne khutamba lukoosi,
ne chisoni chewe se chiliwao tawe.
Sikila libuba likhola omundu aba omurafu,
ne salilekhakho siindu ne eyacha tawe.
Se alifukiilila kumuruungo tawe,
namwe lirima liewe se liwa akhaba ne aebwa biianwa bikali tawe.

Mwana wase, liinda kamakhuwa kase,
mala okhole kamalaka kase kabe ke bukhala khwiwe,
liinda kamalaka kase mala omenye,
liinda kamekisio kase nga noliinda endolelo ye moni yowo,
Kaboelele khu njala chowo,
kaandike mu mwoyo kwowo.
Boolela bukesi oli, “Ewe oli omukooko wase,”
ne laanga limanya oli omusaale niye wasiima lukali,
khukhuliinda ewe khukhwama khu mukhasi omueeyi,
khukhwama khu makhuwa kamalayi ko mukhasi omueeyi.
Sikila khukhwama munuma mwe nju yase,
naloleleele enje,
nabona mu baandu basilu,
nabona mu baele,
omusoleeli okhali ne enganakani endayi tawe,
alikho abira khu ngila,
siimbi a koona we chingila niio omukhasi omueeyi amenyile,
ali khu ngila echa wo mukhasi oyo.
Nga enyanga ne soa, ekolooba,
mu siise sie siilo ne mu siilima.
Ne bona omukhasi oyo amwakaanana,
afwarire nga omueeyi,
amuchayo ne sifuno.
Echa ne luyoka ne khutambamo buuri,
bikele biewe se bikhalanga engo tawe,
luno ali khungila,
lundi ali khu sooko,
ne buli a koona we chingila ekhiinilao.
Omukhasi oyo amukwakho ne khu mwikwayila,
amuungusa mumoni ne khumuboolela ali,
“Nenyekhana khuaana chimbosio,
ne luno nakholile niko nechuba,
nono luno nechile khukhwakaanana ewe,
nakhuyiimile ne kumwoyo kwoosi mala nakhunyoolile.
Nalile khu sitanda siase bulili,
bulili bwe engubo eye katani khukhwama e Misiri,
nareere khu sitaanda siase kamafura kaunya bulayi ka manemane,
udi ne mudalasini.
Yiicha khusiimane khukhwola kumutikhinyi,
lekha khwisangaasie ne busiime.
Sikila omuseecha wase se ali engo tawe,
achile khu lukeendo luleeyi,
abukule kumufuko kwe chirupia,
akhakobole engo kumwesi ne kuli chelechenje.”
Ne chilomo chingali che khuoya amukhongelesia,
ne lilomaloma lilayi amwikoonjelela,
khangu busa aloondile khu mukhasi oyo,
oli e eeyi ne echa mu sichinjilo,
namwe nga omusilu ne atiilwa,
khukhwola nga buembo ne bufutula enda yewe,
nga enyuni etima khucha khu mureko,
omundu yuno se amanyile ali alatibia bulamu bwewe tawe.
Ne nono, Ee bananywe, ndekeeresie,
ne ulila kamakhuwa kase.
Mukhalekha kimiooyo kienywe,
kiacha mungila cho mukhasi oyo tawe,
ne mukhekhiikha mwamuloondakho tawe,
sikila bali bakali nibo abunia,
ee, nibo eera bali lituuli.
Enju yewe eli engila eye khucha mu lifwa,
eli kumuyila kucha ekoombe.

ne limanya se lilikho liyokela ku?
Khu bikulu angaaki ne ngila,
ne bwemile khu chingila,
Embi a bilibwa ebweeni we lukoba,
abwingililo, bukesi bulikho bulangilila,
“Khwinywe ee baandu, ndikho ndaanga,
ne lilaanga liase lili khu buli mundu.
Ee basilu enywe, yeyika limanya,
Ee basilu, rekeeresia.
Ulila, sikila ndaloma kamalayi,
khukhwama mukhanwa mwase kalamamo kaali kamaluungi.
Sikila kumunwa kwase kulaloma bung'ali,
bumayaanu buli lisinya khwise.
Kamakhuwa koosi niko ndoma kali kamaluungi,
mbamo elomo emayaanu namwe eye kitiimo mu makhuwa kase tawe.
Koosi kali kamakololofu khuyo oulila,
ne kali kamaluungi khuyo onyoola limanya.
Robora kamekisio kase khukhila efwesa,
ne limanya khukhila esahabu endayi,
“Sikila bukesi bukhila kamamili,
ne bioosi nibio wikoomba se binyala bialekhaanisibwa nabwo tawe.
Ese bukesi, ndi ne liiulila,
ndi ne limanya ne bukhalaki bulayi.
Khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nikhwo khubiila kamamayaanu,
lilielola, sileka, ne chingila chimayaanu,
akhaba ne lilomaloma lie kitiimo, nabibiila.
Ndi ne likeleka ne bukesi bulayi,
endi ne limanya ne kamaani.
Njeeta babaami khukhwamiia,
ne babemeelesi khubisia kamalaka kang'ali,
Babemeelesi bandumikhira khukhwamiia,
ne bakoosi bemeelela sibala.
Siima abo babasiima,
ne abo babambiima ne kamaani banyoola.
Buyiinda ne lukoosi bili ne nase,
akhaba kimiaandu kikhawa tawe ne liindiala bili nase.
Bibiaamo biase bikhila esahabu,
akhaba esahabu endayi,
ne khukhwaama khwase khukhila efwesa endayi.
Ngende khu ngila eye buluungi,
lundi eya ng'ali,
Mbaana kimiaandu khwaabo babasiima,
ne khukhwichusia kamabiikhilo kabwe.
naaba owe khunyoa owe kimilimo kiewe kie khaale.
Narerwao mu miiko kie khaale,
mu khunyoa, sibala ne siikhabao tawe.
Chinyanja ne chikhabao tawe, nasaalwa,
chinjichi ne chikhabamo kameechi kamakali tawe.
Chingulu ne chikhakholwa tawe,
bikulu ne bikhabao tawe,
nasaalwa,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne asiili khukhola
liloba ne kimikuunda kialio,
namwe lipukhuulu lie khunyoa khu sibala.
Nga akhola likulu,
nabao,
nga akhola engara khu nyanja,
nga ne ara kamafuumbi khwikulu,
nga ne akhola kumusiingi kwe chinyanja,
nga arao chinjakha che enyanja,
nio kameechi kalekhe khutuuma
lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nga arao kimisiingi kie sibala,
nabaao nga omukholi omusicha,
naba esangaalo yewe,
Ne nikhoya ebweeni wewe buli lwoosi.
Nikhoya mu sibala siewe simenywamo,
ne khusangaalila babaandu.
“Nono baana base mbulile,
bali ne khabi abo batiila kamalaka kase.
Ulila kamekisio mala mube bakesi,
ne mukhakalekha tawe.
Ali ne khabi omundu oundekeeresia,
lundi olindiililanga buli lwoosi a silibwa siase.
Ne noyo olindiililanga a muliango kwase.
Sikila omundu ounyoola ese aba anyoolile bulamu
lundi anyoola kumwalaalo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali omundu okhanyoola tawe eumisia omwene,
boosi babambiila basiima lifwa.”

Bukesi bwombaakhe enju yabwo,
bwemiisie chinjeko chabwo saba.
Bwerire chisaang'i chabwo,
bwatubaniisie endali yabwo,
lundi bwalile sisialwa siabwo.
Bwarumire bakholi babwo be siikhasi,
balaangilile abuundu angaaki lukali mu lukoba,
“Yesi yesi oli omusilu,
lekha eche ano!”
Khuyo okhali ne bukesi bulayi tawe,
bukesi buloma buli,
“Yiicha olie khu siakhulia siase,
mala onywe khu ndali niyo ndubaaniisie.
Lekhana ne busilu, mala omenye,
ne keenda mungila che liiulila.”
Oyo okololosia owe sienya meno akhomwa,
oyo orafwira omumayaanu aumisibwa.
Okhakololosia owe sienya meno tawe,
alikhubiila,
rafwira omundu omukesi ne alikhusiima.
Elesia kamekisio khu mundu omukesi,
ne aliba omukesi lundi,
yekisia omundu omuluungi,
ne alitasa khu mekisio kewe.
lili lirakikha lie khuba ne bukesi,
ne khumanya Omutakatifu,
khuli bukesi bulayi.
Khubirira khwise chindaalo chowo chiliitasikha,
ne kimiiko kilitasikha khu bulamu bwowo.
Waaba ne oli omukesi oli omukesi khulwowo wamwene,
ne waaba ne olekelesia okhanyoole butinyu wamwene.
Omukhasi omusilu ali omuyoka,
ali omusilu lundi se ali ne chisoni tawe.
Ekhala a muliango kwe enju yewe,
ekhala khu ndebe abuundu angaaki mu lukoba,
alaanga abo babira siimbi,
baalikho baacha khu ngila chabwe naloma ali,
“Oyo oli omusilu lekha eche ano!”
Ne oyo okhali ne enganakani endayi tawe aloma ali,
“Kameechi kakebiilwe kali kamanulu
ne siakhulia siliibwa mu bwikisi sisiimisia.”
Ne kakhali se amanya ali bafu baliyo tawe,
se amanya ali bakeni bo mukhasi oyo bali Emakoombe tawe.

Omwana omukesi asangaasia raraawe
ne kakhali omwana omusilu abelesia maawe.
Kimiaandu kinyoolwa mu ngila chimbi se kireera bukhala tawe,
ne kakhali buluungi busikulanga omundu khukhwama mwifwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alekhanga omundu omuluungi aba ne enjala tawe,
ne kakhali akhiingilila kuluungo kwo omumayaanu.
Kumukhono kumukara kureera butaambi,
ne kakhali kumukhono kwe kamaani kureera buiinda.
Omwana okesa mu siimiyu ali omukesi,
ne kakhali omwana okona liilo mwikesa areera chisoni.
Chikhabi chili khu muluungi,
ne kakhali kumunwa kwo mumayaanu kwakisa sisiayuumba.
Likhebulila lie baluungi lili ekhabi,
ne kakhali lisina lie bamayaanu liliibililwa.
Ooli ne kamakesi aria kamalaka,
ne omusilu alibuna.
Okeendela mu buluungi akeenda ne ali ne kumuleembe,
Ne kakhali oyo okhali omuluungi tawe alinyoolekha.
Okhumiinila emoni areera butinyu,
ne oyo owikiicha mu bunyindaafu areera kumuleembe.
Kamakhuwa ko mundu omuluungi kali esebele eye bulamu,
ne kakhali kamakhuwa ko mumayaanu kakisa sisiayuumba.
ne kakhali busiime bufuunikha kamabi koosi.
Bukesi bunyoolekhana mu khulomaloma khwo mundu owe limanya,
ne kakhali omusilu akhoya apwa.
Babaandu bakesi babiikha limanya,
ne kakhali litoofwaani lio musilu lireera libuna lia khangu.
Kimiaandu kio muiinda,
nikio lukoba lwewe lwe kamaani,
ne kakhali butaambi bwo mutaambi buli libuna liewe.
Kumuruuru kwo muluungi kureera bulamu,
ne bukhala bwo mumayaanu bureera bumayaanu.
Oyo ofukiilila kamekisio ali khungila eye bulamu,
ne kakhali oyo oloba khukololosibwa atiima.
Oyo okisa libiila ali omubeeyi,
ne oyo obeela babaandi ali omusilu.
Kimilomo kimikali se kitaambamo kamamayaanu tawe,
ne kakhali oliinda lulimi lwewe ali omukesi.
Chilomo cho muluungi chili nga efwesa endayi,
ne chinganakani cho mumayaanu se chili ne bukhala tawe.
Chilomo cho muluungi chiyeeta bakali,
ne kakhali basilu bafwa khulwe khutaamba bukesi.
Ekhabi eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekhola babaandu baba baiinda,
ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi satasakho bubeeleli tawe.
Kuli nga kumwinyawe khu musilu khukhola bumayaanu,
ne kakhali kimiima kimilayi kisiimisia owe limanya.
Nisio omumayaanu aria nisio siikhamwichekho,
ne kakhali baluungi bakhanyoole nisio bekoomba.
Sisiifuusio ne sibira omumayaanu auchwa awao,
ne kakhali omuluungi aliimila elala.
Nga endali ne eluluwa khu lulimi,
namwe nga liliisi mu moni,
ali ario omundu omukara khwaabo babamuruma.
Khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khutasa bulamu,
ne kakhali kimiiko kio omumayaanu kikhembiie.
Lilieyikina lie baluungi likhawele mu busangaafu,
ne kakhali lie bamayaanu se liliba siindu tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliinda oyo oli omuluungi,
ne kakhali abunia bakhola kamamayaanu.
Baluungi baliba ne buliindi,
ne kakhali bamayaanu se bacha khumenya mu sibala tawe.
Omuluungi aloma ke bukesi,
ne lulimi luloma chindabarwa lucha khwakamisibwa.
Baluungi bamanyile kakenyekha khulomwa,
ne chilomo che bamayaanu chili chindabarwa.

Sikelo sie bubeeyi sisinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali sikelo sia ng'ali simusiimisia.
Lilielola ne liicha ekhumaliilikha lireera chisoni
ne kakhali babeboombia bali ne bukesi.
Buluungi bwe baluungi bubarangirira,
ne bukhiikha bwe bamayaanu bababunia.
Buyiinda se buli ne bukhala mu ndaalo eye lirima tawe,
ne kakhali buluungi busikula omundu khukhwama khu lifwa.
Buluungi bwo omundu okhali ne kamabi tawe bukololosia engila yewe,
ne kakhali bamayaanu bakhilwa ne bumayaanu bwabwe babeene.
Buluungi bwe baluungi bubasikula,
ne kakhali bamayaanu barekwa ne kumuluungo kwabwe.
Omundu omumayaanu ne afwa, afwa ne lilieyikina liewe,
ne lilieyikina lio mundu okharia Wele tawe se lili siindu tawe.
Omuluungi asikulwa mu butinyu,
ne kakhali omumayaanu engila mu butinyu.
Lilomaloma lio omundu okharia Wele tawe libunia owasie,
ne kakhali baluungi basikulwa.
Baluungi ne bali bulayi lukoba lusangaala,
ne bamayaanu ne babuna babaandu bekhoya.
Khubirira khu khabi che baluungi lukoba lunyoola lukoosi,
ne kakhali lukoba lubunisibwa khulwe chilomo che bamayaanu.
Oyo omochelesia owasie se ali ne bukesi bulayi tawe,
ne kakhali omundu owe limanya asila busa.
Omundu osusuuma ne khukuta abuula kamakise,
ne oyo oli omusuubilwa akisa likhuwa.
Niio bukeleki butaamba sibala sibuna,
ne kakhali bakambisi ne bali bakali kumuleembe kubao.
Oyo owimeelela niye akhamanyile tawe alikanyoola,
ne oyo oloba bubwimeeleli nga obwo aliba ne kumuleembe.
Omukhasi omulayi anyoola lukoosi,
ne kakhali babaandu be siyubuyubu banyoola kimiaandu kiong'ene.
Omundu oli omulayi anyoola bukhala,
ne omukuluumi eumisia omwene.
Omundu omumayaanu anyoola kumuruungo kwe kubeeyi,
ne kakhali oyo omiicha buluungi anyoola kumuruuru kwa ng'ali.
Oyo ochiililila mu buluungi alimenya,
ne oyo oloonda kamamayaanu alifwa.
Babaandu be chinganakani chingoyaani bali basinyisia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali chingila che baluungi chimusiimisia.
Manya oli omundu omumayaanu alinyoola kumunaanio,
ne kakhali abo baali baluungi balisikulwa.
Nga embete eye esahabu mu lioolu lie engurwe,
ali ario omukhasi owe lukoondo lulayi mala okhali ne limanya tawe.
Lilienya lio mundu omuluungi lili lilayi liong'ene,
ne lilieyikina lio mumayaanu lireera lirima.
Omundu mulala ali omuaani,
ne kakhali atasa khuba omuiinda,
ne okundi emana nisio akhoyeele aane,
ne kakhali achiililila khuba omutaambi.
Omundu omuaani alinyoola buiinda,
ne oyo oliisia babaandi aliliisibwa.
Omundu oloba khukusia biakhulia babaandu bamulaama,
ne kakhali babiita chikhabi oyo obikusia.
Oyo oyiima bulayi ne kamaani ayiima busiime,
ne kakhali kamabi keecha khuyo okayiima.
Owiyikina kimiaandu kiewe alakwa,
ne kakhali omuluungi alakhula nga kamasaafu.
Omundu okubeenga enju yewe salinyoola siindu tawe,
ne omusilu aliba nasioobi wo mukesi.
Bibiaamo bio mundu omuluungi bili kumurongooro kwe bulamu,
ne kakhali omukesi asiimisia kimiooyo kie babaandu.
baabi ne bamayaanu balinyoola khukhilao bariena?

Buli yesi yesi owasiima khuukuumwa asiima limanya,
ne oyo owabiila khukhwikiichibwa ali omusilu.
Omundu omulayi asiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalakila omumayaanu kamabi.
Omundu se eyombekha khulwe bumayaanu tawe,
ne kakhali baluungi se balirusibwao tawe.
Omukhasi omulayi areerera omuseecha wewe lukoosi,
ne omuaambia chisoni ali nga bubolo mu makuumba kewe.
Kamebaasio ko muluungi kali ka ng'ali,
ne bukeleki bwo mumayaanu buli bwe bubeeyi.
Kamakhuwa ko mumayaanu kali ke libuulila lie lifwa,
ne kakhali kamakhuwa ko muluungi kasikula babaandu.
Bamayaanu babunila elala ne se babao lundi tawe,
ne kakhali enju yo muluungi elibao.
Omundu abalwa omulayi khulwe bukesi bwewe,
ne kakhali oyo owe chinganakani chimbi alekwa.
Nabulayi omundu owe lilieboombia ne khukhwesakulila,
khukhila owikhola omuiinda ne kakhali atamba siakhulia.
Omundu omuluungi aliinda bulamu bwe bibiaayo biewe,
ne kakhali siisa sio omubi sili bukuluumi.
Olima kumukuunda kwewe alanyoola biakhulia bikali,
ne oyiima biikhali bie bukhala tawe ali ne bukesi butiiti.
Bamayaanu bekoomba bukhala bunyoolekha mungila chimbi,
ne kakhali siisina sie baluungi siaama.
Omundu omubi arekwa ne bumayaanu bwe lilomaloma liewe,
ne kakhali omuluungi ebacha butinyu.
Khukhwama mu matuunda ke kamakhuwa kewe omundu anyoola bulayi,
anyoola kumuruungo khulwe kimilimo kiewe.
Engila yo musilu eli eya ng'ali ebweeni wewe omwene,
ne kakhali omundu omukesi arekeeresia likaambila.
Khukhalala khwo musilu khumanyikhana khangu,
ne kakhali omundu omukesi alekelesia bukhomo.
Omundu olomaloma kang'ali arusia buloli bwa ng'ali,
ne kakhali omuloli omubeeyi alomaloma bubeeyi.
Chilomo che kamayino chiuna nga embalu,
ne kakhali lilomaloma lio mukesi lireera buonia.
Chilomo cha ng'ali chiindila,
ne kakhali bubeeyi buli bwe biise busa.
Bubeeyi buli mu mwoyo kwabo babebaasia bumayaanu,
ne abo barekekha kamalayi bali ne busangaafu.
Mbao libi liliekholekha khu muluungi tawe,
ne kakhali bamayaanu bayichula butinyu.
Chilomo che babeeyi chili chisinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali abo bakhola kameyikinwa bali esangaalo yewe.
Omundu omukesi akisa limanya liewe,
ne kakhali basilu balaangilila busilu bwabwe.
Okhola kimilimo ne kamaani aliamiia,
ne kakhali omukara aliba nasioobi.
Liliembeelela liiba omundu busangaafu,
ne kakhali elomo endayi emusiimisia.
Omundu omuluungi ebacha bumayaanu,
ne kakhali engila eye bamayaanu ebatibia babene.
Omuaayi omukara se areka waamba tawe,
ne kakhali omukesi anyoola buiinda bukhasala tawe.
Khungila eye buluungi bulamu bulikho,
ne kakhali engila embi erangirira khucha mu lifwa.

Omwana omukesi aulila raraawe ne amwekisia,
ne kakhali owembelekeu se arekeeresia bamurafwira tawe.
Omundu omulayi anyoola kumuruungo kumulayi khulwe kamakhuwa kewe,
ne kakhali liliekoomba lie babeeyi lili sisiayuumba.
Oliinda lulimi lwewe aliinda bulamu,
ne oyo owitwakatwaka alibuna.
Kumwoyo kwo omundu omukara kwikoomba,
ne kakhali se kunyoola sisiindu tawe,
ne kumwoyo kwoyo okhola kimilimo ne kamaani kunyoola bikali.
Omundu omuluungi abiila bubeeyi,
ne omundu omumayaanu akhola chisoni ne bie changalaalo.
Buluungi buliinda oyo oli omuluungi,
ne kakhali bumayaanu bubunia.
Omundu mulala ekhola khuba omuiinda khane apuliukha busa,
ne okundi ekhola khuba omutaambi khane ali ne kimiaandu kimikali.
Omuyiinda asikulwa ne kimiaandu kiewe,
ne kakhali omutaambi se ali ne engila eye khusikulwa tawe.
Buwaanga bwe baluungi bukhosia lukali,
ne bamayaanu bali nga etaa elikho esima.
Sileka sireera kamayiingamo kong'ene,
ne abo bafukiilila likaambila bali bakesi.
Kimiaandu nikio onyoola khangu kili kiiwa,
ne kakhali nikio onyoola kalaa kalaa kilitasikha.
Nisio weyikina ne siayilila silwasia kumwoyo,
ne lilienya ne lichusibwa likhwichusia ne busangaafu.
Omundu oleka elomo ereerera libuna omwene,
ne kakhali oyo oria lilaka alinyoola kumuruuru.
Kamekisio ko mukesi kali esebele eye bulamu,
nio kamuyeete akheengila mu mireko kie lifwa.
Kamakesi kamalayi kareera lisiima,
ne kakhali engila eye bakhali ne lisuubila tawe ebabunia.
Mu buli siindu, be bukesi bakhola ne limanya,
ne kakhali omusilu okesia busilu bwewe.
Omurumwa omubi amwaata babaandu mu butinyu,
noyo oli omweyikinwa areera buonia.
Butaambi ne chisoni biicha khuyo olekelesia kamekisio,
ne kakhali oyo oulila likololosia aebwa lukoosi.
Lilienya ne lichusibwa lili bunulu bwe kumwoyo,
ne kakhali khulekha kamamayaanu khuli khusinyisia basilu.
Okeenda ne bakesi aba omukesi,
ne kakhali okeenda ne basilu baliumiia.
Butinyu buloonda bamayaanu,
ne kakhali khuindiaala khuli kumuruungo kwe buluungi.
Omundu omulayi alekha kumukabwa khu bechukhulu bewe,
ne kakhali kimiaandu kio mumayaanu kibikhilwanga omuluungi.
Kumukuunda kwo mutaambi kwaama biakhulia bikali,
ne kakhali biyaywa khubirira mungila chikhali ng'ali tawe.
Oyo ookhapa omwana wewe ne akholile libi tawe aba amubiila,
ne kakhali oyo owamusiima aba khangu khumukololosia.
Omuluungi alia ekura,
ne kakhali omumayaanu aulila enjala.

Omukhasi omukesi ombakha enju yewe,
ne kakhali omusilu asambuula enju yewe.
Oyo okeenda mu buluungi aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali oyo owe chingila chimayaanu amulekelesia.
Lilomaloma lio musilu
limureerera siikhupo khumukoongo,
ne kakhali lilomaloma lie baluungi libaliinda.
Niio chieeyi chikhali mbao siakhulia,
ne biakhulia bikali biicha khulwe kamaani ke chieeyi.
Omuloli omweyikinwa se aloma bubeeyi tawe,
ne kakhali omuloli omubeeyi, aloma bubeeyi bwong'ene.
Owe sileka akhayiima bukesi se abunyoola tawe,
ne kakhali limanya linyoolekhana khangu ne nabo be bukesi.
Lekhana no mundu omusilu,
sikila se omunyoolakho kamakhuwa ke limanya tawe.
Bukesi bwo omundu owe bukesi,
buli limanya lie ngila yewe,
ne kakhali busilu bwe basilu buli bubeeyi.
Wele achekheelela basilu,
ne kakhali baluungi banyoola busiime bwewe.
Kumwoyo kumwene kumanyile buchuuni bwakwo,
mala mbao osaanga mu busangaafu bwakwo tawe.
Enju eyo mumayaanu elisambuulwa,
ne kakhali liiema lio muluungi lililama.
ne kakhali ekhumaliilikha khwayo eli eye lifwa.
Akhaba munjekho kumwoyo kuli ne khukhalala,
ne ematabusia we busangaafu buli bubeeleli.
Omundu owe chindabarwa,
alinyoola kumuruuru kwe chingila chabwe,
ne omundu omulayi aliruungwa khulwe bikholwa biewe.
Omusilu asuubila buli siindu,
ne omukesi aloleelesia niio alikho acha.
Omundu omukesi akhola mu khuloleelesia mala alekha bumayaanu,
ne kakhali omusilu se ekhiingilila lundi se enaana tawe.
Omundu owe lirima akholela bibiindu mu busilu,
ne omukesi ekhaliilikha.
Basilu banyoola busilu,
ne bakesi banyoola limanya.
Bamayaanu benamila balayi,
ne baabi a bilibwa bie baluungi.
Omutaambi abiilwa akhaba no wasie,
ne omuiinda ali ne basaale bakali.
Oyo olekelesia owasie ali omumayaanu,
ne ali ne khabi oyo oli omulayi khu mutaambi.
Barekekha kamamayaanu aba se be khiikhile?
Abo barekekha kamalayi banyoola buriaani ne bubweyikinwa.
Buli mulimo kulimo bukhala,
ne kakhali embakha busa ereera butaambi.
Kumuruuru kwe bakesi kuli kimiaandu kiabwe,
ne kakhali busilu bwe basilu buli buiinda bwabwe.
Omuloli wa ng'ali aonia bulamu,
ne oyo olomaloma bubeeyi ali omuchongani.
Mu khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
omundu anyoola lilieyikina,
ne babaana bewe baliba ne bumulilo.
Khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuli esebele eye bulamu,
nio wakana omundu anyala ebacha kimireko kie lifwa.
Luyali lwo mwami luli bukali bwe babaandu bewe,
ne ataamba babaandu abuna.
Omundu okhakhalala khangu tawe ali ne limanya likali,
ne oyo owe kumwoyo kwe lirima akaliya busilu.
Kamebaasio kalaba ne kumuleembe,
kakhola kumubili kwaaba kumulamu,
ne kakhali likhendekha libosia kamakuumba.
Omiinakilisia omutaambi akhoma owamubuumba,
ne kakhali okholela babanani siisa amuelesia lukoosi.
Omundu omumayaanu akwa khulwe bikholwa biewe bimayaanu,
ne kakhali omuluungi anyoola bubwilukhilo akhaba mu lifwa.
Bukesi bwikhala mu mebaasio ko mundu owe liiulila,
ne se bumanyikhaane mu mwoyo kwe basilu tawe.
Buluungi bukaliia sibala,
ne kakhali bumayaanu buli chisoni cha buli baandu.
Omukholi okhola bibiindu sikesi,
omwami amusiima,
ne kakhali lirima liewe licha khuyo okhola ke chisoni.

Likobosia lilayi liboombia lirima,
ne kakhali elomo ekhalafu yinyosia lirima.
Lilomaloma lie bakesi liekesia limanya,
ne kakhali lilomaloma lie basilu liekesia busilu.
Chimoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chili buli abuundu,
chiloleelela balayi ne baabi.
Lilomaloma lilayi lireera bulamu,
ne kakhali chindabarwa chonakaka kumwoyo.
Omusilu alekelesia kamekisio ka raraawe,
ne oyo oulila khubiiya ali omukesi.
Munju yo muluungi kilimo kimiaandu kimikali,
ne kakhali bukhala bwe bamayaanu bureera butinyu.
Chilomo cho mukesi chisalanisia limanya,
ne se kali kario khu musilu tawe.
Embosio yo mumayaanu esinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali lisaba lio muluungi lisangaasia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Engila yo omumayaanu esinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima omundu oloonda buluungi.
Kumunaanio kumurafu kuli khuyo oloba engila,
ne oyo owabiila khukololosibwa alifwa.
Emakoombe ne Libuna bili khwasie ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne aba kimiooyo kie babaandu kili kirio kiriena ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Olekelesia se enya khukhwikiichibwa namwe,
sanyala acha niio bakesi bali bamukelekela tawe.
Kumwoyo kumusangaafu kukhola omundu amuunamuuna,
ne kakhali bubeeleli bubiiyisia kumwoyo.
Kumwoyo kwo mundu owe bukesi kuyiima limanya,
ne kiminwa kie basilu kilia busilu.
Chindaalo cho mundu omutaambi choosi chili chimayaanu,
ne kakhali kumwoyo kumusangaafu kuli ne naikara echiililila.
Bulayi khuba ne kimiaandu mitiiti mala waria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khukhila noba ne kimiaandu kimikali mala obe ne butinyu.
Buli bulayi khulia siakhulia ne chinyenyi niio busiime buli,
khukhila khuliila enyama endayi niio libiila lili.
Omundu owe lirima arakikha bulomani,
ne kakhali okhakhalala khangu tawe asisia bulomani.
Engila eyo mukara yechula kamawa,
ne kakhali eyo muluungi eli kumuyila kukwayaasibwa.
Omwana omukesi asangaasia raraawe,
ne kakhali omusilu aleka maawe.
Busilu buli busangaafu khuyo okhali ne bukesi bulayi tawe,
ne owe limanya akeenda mungila chindayi.
Niio bukeleki bukhali tawe kimipaango kikhiikha,
ne kakhali bakambisi bakololosia.
Khukhola likobosia lia khangu lili busangaafu khu mundu,
ne elomo elomwalomwa mu siise sisienyekhana eli endayi lukali po!
Engila eyo mundu omukesi emurangirira khucha mu bulamu,
nio ebache emakoombe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atechula enju eya oyo owilola,
ne kakhali aliinda chinjakha cha namulekhwa.
Kamebaasio ko mumayaanu kasinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali kamakhuwa ke balayi kamusiimisia.
Oyo oli ne kumuliuliu kwe khunyoola bibiindu mungila embi areera butinyu khunju yewe,
ne kakhali oyo owabiila asoya alimenya.
Chinganakani cho muluungi chibaasia nga nilwo akobosia,
ne kakhali chilomo cho mumayaanu chikhaasa bumayaanu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali sinaao ne bamayaanu,
ne kakhali aulila lisaba lio muluungi.
Khumuunamuuna khusangaasia kumwoyo,
ne kamakhuwa kamalayi kakhukhola weulila bulayi.
Oyo oulila kamekiicho koosi,
aliba mulala khu bakesi.
Oloba kamekisio eleka omwene,
ne kakhali oyo orekeeresia lilikiicha anyoola limanya.
Khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khuli liliekisio lie bukesi,
ne liliboombia lirangirira lukoosi.

Lirekekha lie kumwoyo lili lio omundu,
ne kakhali likobosia lie lulimi liama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Chingila cho mundu choosi chili chindayi ebweeni wewe omwene,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akela kimiooyo.
Ra kimilimo kiowo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne lirekekha liowo likhemisibwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola buli sisiindu ne sifuno siasio,
akhaba bamayaanu ne ndaalo yabwe eye butinyu.
Buli oyo oli ne sileka asinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
manya oli ng'ali alinyoola siiukuumo.
Khubirira khu buriaani ne bubwiyikinwa bumayaanu bubeelwa,
ne khulwe khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omundu ebacha bumayaanu.
Chingila cho mundu ne chiba chisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
akhola akhaba basiku bewe baaba ne kumuleembe ne naye.
Nabulayi obe ne kimiaandu mitiiti mala kia ng'ali,
khukhila noba nakio kimikali mala kie bukhalukha.
Omundu akhola kamarekekha kewe mu mwoyo kwewe,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye obisia koosi.
Kamakhuwa ko mwami kali ng'ali burume khukhwama khu Wele,
se akhiikha kamakhuwa mu bukhalaki bwewe tawe.
Sipiimilo ne kamabaale ke khukela ka ng'ali,
bili nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enya.
Bikelo bioosi bili kumulimo kwewe.
Kali kasinyisia khu baami khukhola bumayaanu,
sikila endebe eye bubwami yimisibwa ne buluungi.
Chilomo cho omuluungi,
chisiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lirima lio mwami lili nga barumwa be lifwa,
ne omundu omukesi aliliosia.
Bubweeni bwo mwami ne buli bulayi bwekesia bulamu,
ne lilienya liewe lili nga lifuumbi lie efula eye khubiaala.
Khunyoola bukesi buli bulayi khukhila esahabu,
khunyoola limanya khukhila khurobora efwesa.
Kumukhoosi kwo muluungi kwaukha kamabi,
ne oyo oliinda engila yewe aliinda bulamu bwewe.
Khukhwilola khureera libuna,
ne kumwoyo kwe khukhwibonia kureera likwa.
Buli bulayi khuba ne kumwoyo kwe lilieboombia mala obe mulala khu bataambi,
khukhila khukabana bie bunuuli ne nabo babebonia.
Oyo oulila niko ekesebwa aliindiaala,
ne ali ne khabi oyo owiyikina mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Oli ne bukesi alaangwa omundu owe limanya,
ne lilomaloma lilayi litasa kamaani ke khukhongelesia.
Bukesi buli esebele eye bulamu khuyo oli ne nabwo,
ne kakhali busilu buli kumunaanio khu musilu.
Chinganakani cho mukesi chikhola lilomaloma liewe liaba ne kamaani,
ne litasa khukhongelesia.
Kamakhuwa kamalayi kali nga lisasara lie bubuukhi,
kali kamanulu mu mwoyo lundi kali bulamu mu makuumba.
ne kakhali ematabusia wayo echa mu lifwa.
Lilienya lie khulia likila omundu akhola kimilimo,
enda yewe ekila akhola.
Omundu owe sipoli arekekha kamamayaanu,
ne lilomaloma liewe lili nga kumulilo kukwosia.
Omundu owe chindabarwa areera bulomani,
ne owe kamakuto aukhasia basaale.
Omundu owe sisiayuumba aombelesia owasie,
mala amuyila mu ngila embi.
Oyo oupakilisia bisike ali orekekha kamamayaanu,
ne oyo okisa kamakhuwa akila bubi bwekholekha.
Chimbuchi khu murwe chili ekuutwa eye luyali,
chinyoolekhana mu limenya liluungi.
Oyo okhakhalala khangu tawe akhila owe kamaani,
ne oyo oliinda kumwoyo kwewe akhila ouula lukoba.
Chikura chipwa,
ne kakhali khubisia khuli khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Nabulayi khulia kumukaati kumwoomu ne kumuleembe,
khukhila enju elimo naikara alala ne bulomani.
Nasioobi omukesi aliamiia omwana omwenengo okhola bibiindu bie chisoni,
ne alinyoola kumukabwa nga mulala khu bawandaaye.
Enyuungu eye mu mukuba eyengusia efwesa ne sisioosio nasio siyengusia esahabu,
ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhaka kimiooyo.
Omumayaanu arekeeresia kamamayaanu,
