ne omubeeyi arekeeresia chilomo che bubeeyi.
Oyo ochekheelela omutaambi akhoma owabuumba omutaambi oyo,
ne osangaalila butinyu bwo kundi alinyoola kumunaanio.
Babechukhulu bali busangaafu bwe bakukawe,
bulayi bwene nga basoleeli ne basangaalila bararaawabwe.
Omusilu sanyala aloma chilomo chindayi tawe,
ne buli busilu bukali khuboolela omwami bubeeyi.
Asoya eli nga kamaya khuyo okiaana,
aindiaala mu buli nisio akhola.
Oyo obeela owasie kamabi ayiima busiime,
ne kakhali oyo okhebusia kakabira onaka busaale.
Omundu omukesi aulila lilikiicha,
khukhila omusilu, akhapwa chingumi emia.
Omundu omumayaanu ali omureengu buli lwoosi,
ne omurume omurafu alirumwa khumubunia.
Nabulayi omundu akaanana ne sibulukhu siikhasi sinuulilwe babaana basio,
khukhila ne akaanana ne omusilu mu busilu bwewe.
Omundu aaba ne aruungia kamabi khulwe kamalayi,
bumayaanu se buliwa munju mwewe tawe.
Lirakikha lie bulomani lili nga ne wikula emoni eye kameechi,
nono lekha kamayiingamo bulomani ne bukharakikha tawe.
Oyo obeela owe kamabi,
ne noyo okhalakila bubi omuluungi,
boombi bali basinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Sikila siina omusilu abe ne chirupia che khukula bukesi,
ne mala se ali ne limanya tawe?
Omusaale akhusiima biise bioosi,
ne wandaayo akhuyeeta mu biise bie butinyu.
Omundu okhali ne bukesi bulayi tawe,
emeelela owasie mwikobi.
Omundu owasiima bumayaanu asiima bulomani,
ne wefumia buli lwoosi aba olikho wereerera libuna.
Omundu owakoyaana munganakani se aindiaala tawe,
ne owe lulimi nende owe chilomo chindabarwa akwa mu butinyu.
Omwana omusilu ali bubeeleli khu raraawe,
ne raraawe wo musilu se ali ne busangaafu tawe.
Kumwoyo kumusangaafu kuli kamalesi kamalayi,
ne kumwoyo kwe bubeeleli kwomia bikuumba.
Omundu omumayaanu afukiilila khurusia asoya,
khukoyaania chingila che bung'ali.
Omundu owe limanya ayiima bukesi,
ne kakhali chimoni cho musilu chiaayaaya chimbeka choosi.
Omwana omusilu ali bubeeleli khu raraawe,
ne ali buchuuni khu maawe.
Khuruungia omuluungi se buli bulayi tawe,
ne khulacha omukoosi lili libi.
Omundu oliinda lilomaloma liewe ali owe limanya,
ne oyo oli ne kumwoyo kukhakhalala khangu tawe ali omundu owe liiulila.
Omusilu ne asila anyala ebaasibwa khuba omukesi,
ne akhalomaloma tawe ekesia limanya.

Omundu owiyaula khukhwama khu baandi eyimila kakeewe kong'ene,
safukiilila bukhalaki bwa ng'ali bubisiibwe tawe.
Omusilu se asangaalila limanya tawe,
enya aboole kakewe kong'ene.
Bumayaanu ne bukhomo bichila khulala,
ne khu taamba lukoosi khureera chisoni.
Chilomo cho omundu chili nga kameechi ke mu lusiba,
ne kakhali sinoko sie bukesi sili nga kameechi kamalayi kabisia.
Se buli bulayi khubeela omumayaanu namwe khukhwiima omuluungi,
bung'ali mu likhalaka tawe.
Chilomo cho musilu chireera bulomani,
ne omwene elaangila siikhupo.
Chilomo cho musilu chili libuna liewe,
ne lundi chili kumureko kwewe omwene.
Kamakhuwa ko muchwanjwaani kali nga siakhulia sinulu,
kasalaanila mu mubili mwoosi.
Omundu okaraarira kumulimo kwewe,
ali omubi nga omwonaki.
Lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili endeleelwa eye kamaani,
omuluungi elukhilamo mala aona.
Kimiaandu kio muiinda kili lukoba lwewe lwe kamaani,
kili nga lisiisi lileeyi limuliinda.
Libuna ne likhoola tawe kumwoyo kwo mundu kwilola,
ne kakhali lilieboombia liraangirira lukoosi.
Okobosia nakhaulila bulayi tawe,
buli busilu ne chisoni khu mweene.
Kumwoyo kwo mundu kunyala kwekhaliilikhila bulwaale,
ne kakhali naanu onyala ekhaliilikhila kumwoyo kwe bubeeleli?
Chinganakani cho mukesi chinyoola limanya,
ne kamaru ko mukesi kayiima limanya.
Siianwa sio mundu simunyoolela bubweyaangu,
simureera ebweeni we babaandu be lukoosi.
Onyoa aboola kumusaango abonekhana owa ng'ali,
khukhwola nga okundi ne amureeba.
Ekura emalao bulomani,
lundi ekhalaka akari we bayingani be kamaani.
Noyeeta wandaayo okholeelwe kamabi oba nga lukoba lusire khu niye,
ne kakhali bulomani bukabukhania nga bisiindi bie lukoba lusire.
Omundu alia khulwe munwa wewe,
ekura khukhwama mu niko aloma.
Lifwa ne bulamu bili mu niko oloma,
abo basiima niko baloma balilia bibiaamo bie chilomo echo.
Omundu onyoola omukhasi anyoola sisiindu silayi,
ne anyoola lifukiililwa khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omutaambi ekoonjelela,
ne omuiinda akobosia mu burafu.
Baliio basaale babekhola khuba basaale,
ne kakhali aliio omusaale owe aembi khukhila wandaayo.

Nabulayi omundu omutaambi mala omweyikinwa,
khukhila omundu omusilu olomaloma chindabarwa.
Se buli bulayi omundu khutaamba limanya tawe,
ne okhekhaliilikha tawe anyoola butinyu.
Busilu bwe babaandu bukila babuna,
ne kakhali enyuma wako bekiicha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kimiaandu kireera basaale bakali,
ne kakhali omundu omutaambi anjukhwa ne basaale bewe.
Omuloli omubeeyi alinyoola kumunaanio,
ne oyo olomaloma ke bubeeyi se alibacha tawe.
Bakali benya bulayi bwo mundu omuaani,
ne buli mundu ali omusaale owo mundu oaana biianwa.
Bawandaaye bo mutaambi boosi bamubiila,
aba basaale bewe balamwibaayakho bariena!
Abayiima khulwe khubekoonjelela ne se abanyoola tawe.
Onyoola bukesi esiima omwene,
ne oyo oliinda limanya aliindiaala.
Omuloli omubeeyi alinyoola kumunaanio,
noyo olomaloma bubeeyi acha khubuna.
Se buli bulayi omusilu amenya limenya lie liteende tawe,
bulayi bwene nga nasioobi ne akhakhoyeele amiia babaami tawe.
Bukesi bulayi bukhola omundu aba kalaa khuaambwa lirima,
aba kuli kumukabwa kwewe khubeela kamabi.
Burafu bwo mwami buli nga liulukhuma lie etalang'i,
ne bulayi bwewe buli nga luume khu bunyaasi.
Omwana omusilu ali libuna khu raraawe,
ne omukhasi owe lung'uunyo ali nga efula namunyekeele.
Enju ne kimiaandu bili nibio omundu anyoola khukhwama khu raraawe,
ne kakhali omukhasi owe bukesi ama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bukara bureera liilo lisiro,
noyo owikhala busa enjala emulia.
Oliinda lilaka aliinda bulamu bwewe,
ne olekelesia kamakhuwa alifwa.
Oyo oli omulayi khu bataambi ekopia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimuruunga khu sikholwa siewe.
Ukuuma omwana wowo lilieyikina ne lisiiliio,
okhamuloleelela busa ne alikho atiba tawe.
Lekha omundu owe lirima likali aruunge kumuruungo,
sikila wamusikula aba olimusikulanga buli lwoosi.
Rekeeresia kamakaambila mala ofukiilile kamekisio,
ne ekhumaliilikha onyoole bukesi.
Omundu ali ne kamarekekha kamakali,
ne kakhali lili khulwe lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio kemisibwa.
Lilienyekhana mu mundu lili bubwiyikinwa,
ne omundu omutaambi akhila omubeeyi.
Ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne olayindila,
oyo oria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aba ne kumuleembe,
butinyu se bulimunyoola tawe.
Omukara aroonga kumukhono kwewe mu sibuumba,
ne kakhali akhaba ekhuyila emunwa se anyala tawe.
Khupa omunywanywa ne omusilu aleyikilakho bukesi,
kaambila owe bukesi ne alanyoola limanya.
Oyo owinyosia sisiayuumba khu raraawe ne khuoona maawe,
ali omwana oreera chisoni ne khurusiao lukoosi.
Mwana owase, ne olekha khurekeeresia kamekisio,
aba olaukha khukhwama khu makhuwa ke limanya.
Omuloli owe sipoli afwochola bukhalaki bwa ng'ali,
ne chilomo che bamayaanu chili chimayaanu.
Bukhalaki bwalindiilila banywanywa,
ne siikhupo khu mikoongo kie basilu.

Kamalwa kali bukhomo ne bumeesi kamaaya,
noyo niye katiimia se ali omukesi tawe.
Lirima lio mwami liriisia lili nga khuulukhuma khwe etalang'i,
oyo omukhalasia omwene ereerera lifwa.
Luli lukoosi omundu ne ekaana bulomani,
ne kakhali buli omusilu asiima khulomana.
Omukara salima mu siise sisienyekha tawe,
ne kakhali mu siise sie likesa akhayiime mala salinyoola siindu tawe.
Sifuno sie munganakani cho omundu sili nga kameechi ke mu lusiba,
ne kakhali omundu owe limanya alichinyoola.
Babaandu bakali befumia bali bali babeyikinwa,
ne kakhali omundu omweyikinwa anyoolekhana waena?
Omundu omuluungi akeenda mungila chinuungi,
bali ne chikhabi babaana bewe enyuma wewe.
Omwami owikhala khu ndebe eye bukhalaki,
aseesa bumayaanu bwoosi ne chimoni chewe.
Naanu onyala aloma ali, “Nasiinga kumwoyo kwase kuli kumumiliiu,
se ndi ne bumayaanu tawe?”
Busiro ne bikelo biikhali ng'ali tawe bili bifwaanane,
bioombi bisinyisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Akhaba omwana amanyikhana khulwe bikholwa biewe,
bikholwa biewe ne bili bilayi namwe biibi.
Liiru ne emoni,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owabikhola.
Okhasiima liilo tawe busa olanyoola butaambi,
khola kimilimo ne olaba ne siakhulia sikali.
Omukuli aloma ali, “Se sili silayi tawe, se sili silayi tawe,”
ne kakhali nga arekukha ebonia.
Eliio esahabu ne kamabaale kamakali ke bukusi bwe angaaki,
ne kakhali chilomo che limanya chili limili lie bukusi bwe angaaki.
Bukula engubo eyo mundu owimeelela omukeni,
ne khupa kumusiingo oyo owimeelela omureende.
Biakhulia binyoolekhanila mu bubacha bili binulu khu mundu,
ne kakhali ekhumaliilikha mukhanwa mwewe mukhechule chimbaale.
Kamarekekha kemisibwa ne bukeleki,
ne khulwe likaambila lie bukesi khupana liie.
Omundu owe kamakuto abuululila ke mu bwikisi,
khwako okhaambaanakho no mundu owitwakatwaka sisilu tawe.
Olaama raraawe namwe maawe,
aliba nga etaa esima mu siilima simali ti.
Kimiaandu kinyoolekha khangu khangu mu khunyoa,
ekhumaliilikha se kikhabe kie chikhabi tawe.
Okhaloma oli, “Kane niyache bubi” tawe,
lindiilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alikhuyeeta.
Bikelo biikhali bie abwene tawe bili bisinyisia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne chikiilo che bubeeyi chili chimbi.
Likeenda lio mundu lirangirirwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne nono omundu anyala amanya engila yewe ariena?
Kuli kumureko khu mundu khulaka siianwa sitakatifu khangu khangu,
mala asikanakanekho enyuma we khukhwechuba.
Omwami omukesi aseleecha bamayaanu,
mala abaelesia kumunaanio mala se abakholela siisa tawe.
Etaa eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eyiima mumwoyo kwo mundu,
emenieelesia koosi kaali mukari mwewe.
Bung'ali ne bubwiyikinwa biliinda omwami,
ne ndebe yewe eye bubwami yimisibwa ne buluungi.
Luyali lwe basoleeli baele luli kamaani,
ne kakhali lukoondo lulayi khu basaakhulu luli chimbuchi chabwe.
Chinguumi chiuumisia chisiinga bumayaanu,
ne bukhupe khusiinga mwibili mwoosi.

Kumwoyo kwo mwami kuli nga luluuchi mu makhono ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
akuyila niio enya.
Buli engila eyo mundu eli eya ng'ali mumoni chewe,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi apiima kumwoyo.
Khukhola buluungi ne bung'ali,
lisiimisia lukali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhila embosio.
Chimoni chichiibonia ne kumwoyo kwe khukhwelola,
etaa eyo mumayaanu bili bumayaanu.
Lirekekha lie bakesi lireera bikali,
ne kakhali buli mundu oli khangu anyoola kumutaambo.
Khunyoola kimiaandu khulwe bubeeyi,
khuli nga namufweli.
Sisiayuumba sie bamayaanu silibeera,
sikila baloba khukhola kang'ali.
Engila yo mubi yakhiikha,
ne kakhali kimiima kio mukwalaafu kili kia ng'ali.
Nabulayi wamenya khulusuli lwenju,
khukhila munju embalaayi no mukhasi nalung'uunyo.
Kumwoyo kwo mumayaanu kwikoomba kamabi,
se ali ne siisa khu wasie tawe.
Owe sienyameeno naukuumwa omusilu akesiya,
omukesi ne ekisibwa anyoola limanya.
Wele Omuluungi aloleelela enju eyo mumayaanu,
mala ekhumaliilikha amubunia.
Owikala kamaru kewe alekhe khuulila lilila lie bataambi,
yesi alilila ne mbao olimurekeeresia tawe.
Siianwa sieebwa mu bwikisi sikhiingilila lirima,
ne asooya ekisiibwe mungubo eosia burafu bukali.
Bung'ali ne bwikholekha buli ekhoyo khu baluungi,
ne kakhali buli bubi khu bamayaanu.
Omundu orura khukhwama khu ngila eya ng'ali,
alinyoolekhana ne akonile mu bafu.
Omundu owasiima binulunulu alaba omutaambi,
nosiima endali ne kamafura se aliindiaala tawe.
Omundu omumayaanu anyoola siiukuumo nisio omuluungi akhanyoola tawe,
ne okhali ne lisuubila anyoola siiukuumo nisio owa ng'ali akhanyoola tawe.
Nabulayi khumenya mu sisiangalaamwe,
khukhila khumenya no mukhasi owe lirima ne lung'uunyo.
Libiikhilo lie bukhala binyoolekha munju yo mukesi,
ne kakhali omusilu asalanisia bioosi nibio ali nabio.
Oyo oyiima buluungi ne bulayi,
alinyoola bulamu ne lukoosi.
Omundu omukesi anyala ebwaakala lukoba lwe babaandu be kamaani,
ne khukwiisia lisiisi nilio beyikina.
Oyo owiyaya kumunwa kwewe ne chilomo chewe,
eliinda khukhwama mu butinyu.
“Owe sienyameeno” lili lisina lio mundu owelola,
oweniinia mala okhola biindu mu sileka.
Liliekoomba lio mukara limwiira,
sikila se enya khukhola kimilimo tawe.
Omumayaanu ekoomba endaalo yoosi,
ne kakhali omuluungi aana ne se emana tawe.
Embosio eyo mumayaanu eli esinyisia,
ne aba eli esinyisia lukali po kaaba bali akireera ne lilibaasia libi!
Omuloli omubeeyi alibuna,
ne kakhali chilomo cho omundu omuriani chilichiililila khufukiililwa.
Omundu omumayaanu ekholesia,
ne kakhali owa ng'ali aloleelesia chingila chewe.
Mbao bukesi, limanya namwe likeleka linyala liakhila
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Efarasi erekekhwa khulwe ndaalo eye liie,
ne kakhali bukhili buli bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Lisina lilayi likhoya liaroborwa khukhila kimiaandu kimikali,
ne bulayi bukhila efwesa namwe esahabu.
Omuyiinda no omutaambi balekhaana,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owababuumba boombi.
Omundu omukesi abona busiku mala ekisa,
ne kakhali omusilu abwingilamo mala aumiia.
Kumuruuru kwe lilieboombia ne khuuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
kuli buiinda, lukoosi ne bulamu.
Kamawa ne kimireko kili khu ngila yo mundu owakoyaana,
owiliinda omwene akatalaanda.
Yekesia omwana nga nilwo anyala amenya,
mala ne aliba omukhulu se alilekha limenya elio tawe.
Bayiinda bamiia bataambi,
ne owekopa ali nasioobi khuyo owamwekopia.
Omundu obiaala kakhali ng'ali tawe alikesa butinyu,
ne esiimbo yewe eye lirima elikhilwa.
Omundu omuaani alinyoola chikhabi,
sikila alia siakhulia siewe ne bataambi.
Timania owe sienyameeno ne bulomani buliwao,
lundi khu khuupana ne khukhomana khuliwa.
Oyo osiima bukwalaafu bwe kumwoyo,
mala ali ne lilomaloma lilayi omwami aliba omusaale wewe.
Chimoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chiliinda limanya,
ne kakhali arusiao kamakhuwa ko mubeeyi.
Omundu omukara aloma ali, “Etalang'i eli enje!
Ndeerwa khu ngila.”
Kamakhuwa ko mukhasi omueeyi kali liloo lileeyi,
oyo niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila lirima alikwamo.
Busilu buli mu mebaasio ko mwana,
ne kakhali ne alachwa kumukhomwa busilu bumururamo.
Oyo onaania omutaambi namwe oaana biianwa khu baiinda,
nio atase buiinda bwewe alichiililila khukhwekoomba.
Reka liiru liowo mala oulile kamakhuwa ke bakesi,
rumikhira kamekisio kase,
sikila bulaba bulayi waaba ne okabiikha mu mwoyo kwowo,
mala okarumikhire koosi.
Nio lilieyikina liowo libe mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lino nilio ndikho khwekesia ewe luno.
Se nakhuandikiile ewe chisimo kamakhumi kataru,
che khukhurafwira ewe ne khukhuelesia limanya,
khukhwekesia ewe buluungi ne bung'ali,
nio oaane likobosia lia ng'ali khwaabo babakhuruma?
Okhanuula omutaambi sikila ali omutaambi tawe,
namwe okhamumiinakilisia mu kooti tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alibasoola,
alinuula abo babanuula.
Okhasiimana ne omundu owe lirima tawe,
namwe okhakeenda no mundu omukhalafu tawe.
Okhola orio weyika chingila chewe,
mala wera wamwene mu mureko.
Okhaba mulala khwaabo balaka ne khukhwiyama,
khukhwimeelela babaandi mu makobi tawe.
Waaba ne okhali nende nisio oruunga tawe,
balikhubukula akhaba bulili bwowo nibwo okonakho.
Okharusiao lulwakha lukhale,
nilwo bakuuka benywe baraao tawe.
Sobona omundu owe bukesi bukali mu milimo kiewe?
Oyo aliima ebweeni we babaami,
se aliima ebweeni we babaandu busa tawe.

Ne wikhala asi khulia no mwami,
loleelela bulayi siina siili ebweeni wowo.
Yeliinda wamwene,
waaba noli owe lulie.
Okhekoomba biakhulia biewe binulu tawe,
sikila bili biakhulia bie siiomelo.
Okhafwilikhana khunyoola kimiaandu tawe,
ba omukesi mala onyalikhe.
Ne osiloleelela kimiaandu kiowo kiwao khangu,
kipurukha busa nga kiimelile chindaa,
kipurukha nga efuruusi ne eniina mungaaki.
Okhalia siakhulia sio mundu we chinge tawe,
okhekoombakho binulunulu biewe tawe,
Sikila ali nga oloma ali “Lia mala onywe!”
Ne kakhali kumwoyo se kulikho alala ne nawe tawe.
Olirusia nibio oliile,
mala otibie kamakhuwa kowo ke khumupila orio.
Okhalomaloma ne omusilu tawe,
sikila kane afwochole kamakhuwa kowo ke bukesi.
Okhenyosiao lulwaakha lukhale tawe,
namwe okhengilila kamaloba ke bafuubi tawe.
Sikila Omusikuli wabwe ali ne kamaani,
alibasoola khukhwama khwiwe.
Rekeeresia kamekisio,
mala weyike kamakhuwa ke limanya.
Okhalekha khuukuuma omwana tawe,
sikila wakhamulacha ne lusaala se afwa tawe.
Nomuchila lusaala olionia bulamu bwewe,
khukhwaama emakoombe.
Mwana wase waaba omukesi,
seesi ndisangaala;
kumwoyo kwase kuliekhoya,
waaba nolomaloma ka ng'ali.
Okhafukiilila kumwoyo kwowo kwa bubila bamayaanu tawe,
ne kakhali ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli lwoosi.
Mu ng'ali liliio lilieyikina lie limenya lie biise bibiicha,
ne lilieyikina lino se likhonakwe tawe.
Ulila, mwana owase, mala obe omukesi,
mala ore kamebaasio kowo khu ngila eya ng'ali.
Okhaambaana ne banywa kamalwa kamakali tawe,
namwe be lulie lwe enyama tawe,
sikila omumeesi nende owe lulie baliba bataambi,
mala ekhumaliilikha balifwara bitasi.
Rekeeresia raraao owa khusaala,
mala okhalekelesiakho maao nali omuloosi tawe.
Kula bung'ali, ne okhabukusia tawe,
kula bukesi, kamekisio ne limanya.
Raraawe owo muluungi alikhoya lukali,
noyo osaala omwana omukesi alimwikhoyela.
Lekha raraao ne maao basangaale,
lekha maao owakhusaala ekhoye.
Mwana wase ndekeeresie,
mala loonda chingila chase.
Sikila omueeyi ali liloo lileeyi,
ne omukhasi owe sifwaabi ali nga esebele eye lusiba.
Omukhasi nga oyo ebuulila nga omunuuli,
mala akhola be siseecha bakali balekha khuba basuubilwa.
Naanu oli ne butinyu? Naanu oli ne bubeeleli?
Naanu owe bulomani? Naanu owilung'uunya?
Naanu oli ne kamakuma kakhali ne sifuno tawe? Naanu orwakhile chimoni?
Abo babekhala siise sileeyi ne banywa endali,
abo banywa endali niyo batubaniisie.
Okhalola khu ndali ne eli embesemu tawe,
ne elikho ebiitakila mu mwendo,
ne yiikha bulayi emumilo tawe.
Ekhumaliilikha eluma nga endemu,
eluka nga endemu eye buchiba.
Chimoni chowo chilibona bibiindu bikeni,
ne olilomaloma chindabarwa.
Oliba nga okonile akari we nyanja,
nga oreengeechela khu mulapa kwe meeli.
Oliloma oli, “Bakhupile ne se naumiie tawe,
bakhupile ne se naulilakho tawe.
Kane ninyokhe liina mbiime endali ekiindi?”

Okhakhendekhela bamayaanu tawe,
namwe okhekoomba khuba omusaale wabwe tawe.
Sikila kamebaasio kabwe karekekha sisiayuumba,
ne balomaloma khukhola kamabi.
Khulwe bukesi enju yombakhwa,
ne khulwe limanya yimikhwa.
Khulwe limanya chisiro chiichusibwa,
ne kimiaandu kie bukhala lundi kisiimisia.
Omundu omukesi akhila omundu owe kamaani,
ne limanya likhila kamaani,
sikila khulwe burangirisi bwe bukesi upana liie,
ne niio bakambisi bali bakali bukhili buliio.
Bukesi buli angaaki lukali khu musilu,
se ali nende nilio aloma mu libuusia lie babaandu tawe.
Oyo orekekha khukhola bumayaanu,
alilaangwa omukuluumi.
Khukhola kamarekekha ke busilu buli bumayaanu,
ne owe sienyameeno ali osinyisia khu baandu.
Waaba notekheleela mu ndaalo eye butinyu,
aba kamaani kowo kali matiiti.
Onia abo babukuulibwe khucha khukhwiirwa,
okhakhiinda khureesia abo bacha khwiirwa tawe.
Waaba ne oloma oli, “Efwe se khwamanyakho kano tawe,”
oyo okela kimiooyo salimanyile tawe ku?
Oyo okhuliinda ewe salimanyile,
ne se aliruungia omundu khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiewe tawe ku?
Mwana wase, lia bubuukhi sikila buli bulayi,
ne kumuketu kwe kamasasara kuli kumunulu nochanjamakho.
Manya oli bukesi buli burio khu mwoyo kwowo,
waaba ne obunyoola oliba wanyoolile lilieyikina lie limenya lie biise bibiicha,
ne lilieyikina lino se likhonakwe tawe.
Okhebuulila nga omumayaanu khu bumenyo bwo muluungi tawe,
okhanuula bie mungo mwewe tawe,
sikila omundu owa ng'ali akhakwa khukhwola kamakhabi saba mala enyokha lundi,
ne kakhali bakahli baluungi banyoolekhana ne kamabi.
Okhasangaala omusiku wowo nanyoola butinyu tawe,
namwe okhafukiilila kumwoyo kwowo kwekhoya nakhilwa tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ario abona mala akhalala,
mala arusia lirima liewe khu mundu oyo.
Okhakhalala sikila bakhola kamamayaanu tawe,
namwe okhabakhendekhela tawe.
Sikila omundu omumayaanu se ali ne lilieyikina lie limenya lie biise bibiicha tawe,
alifwa nga etaa ne esima.
Mwana wase, ria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi no mwami,
ne okhalekha khubaria tawe.
Sikila butinyu khukhwama khu nibo buliicha matundubiikha,
ne naanu omanyile libuna liicha khukhwama khu nibo?
Chino chosi chili chisimo che bakesi.
Bukhalaki bukhali bwa ng'ali se buli bulayi tawe.
Oyo oboolela bamayaanu ali, “Se muli ne kumusaango tawe,”
alilaamwa ne babaandu mala abiilwe ne chikholo.
Ne kakhali abo barafwira bamayaanu balisangaala,
ne ekhabi endayi eliba khu nibo.
Likobosia lia ng'ali,
liekesia busaale bwa ng'ali.
Rekekha kimilimo kiowo enje,
yirekekhera buli siindu mu mukuunda,
ne enyuma wako yombakha enju yowo.
Okharusia buloli khu chirani wowo ne okhali ne sifuno tawe,
ne okhabea tawe.
Okhaloma oli, “Kane mukholele nga nilwo akholeele,
oli ndimwiyacha khu niko akholile tawe.”
Nabira a mukuunda wo mukara,
a mukuunda kwe kimisabibu kio mundu omusilu tawe,
mala lola, kwaba kwamela kwoosi kamawa,
liloba liafuunikhwa ne kumusiru
ne lisiisi lie kamabaale liatechukhaka.
Nio nalola mala nebaasia,
nalola mala nanyoola lilieyika.
khufuumba kamakhono akeekhe ne khuola,
butaambi bulakhwichakho nga omunuuli,
ne liliekoomba nga omundu okaangile bulwaani.

Chino chosi chili chisimo cha Solomoni nicho babaandu ba Hesekia omwami owa Yuda baandika.
Luli luyali lwa Wele khukisa bibiindu,
ne kakhali luyali lwe babaami luli khuyiima bibiindu.
Nga buniina bwe likulu ne buli bukali,
ne nga buleeyi bwe sibala ne buli bukali lukali,
kamebaasio ko mwami kosi se kamanyikhana tawe.
Norusia kamasengeli khukhwama mu fwesa,
oupa kumukuba anyoola nisio arumikhira khukhola bibiindu,
rusiao bamayaanu ebweeni wo mwami,
ne ndebe yewe eye bubwami ekhemisibwe mu buluungi.
namwe wekhola khuba omundu owe lukoosi tawe,
sikila buli bulayi oboolelwe bali, “yiicha wikhale ano,”
khukhila ne bakhwinyosia mala bakhwikhasie abuundu e asi akhali e lukoosi tawe.
Kamakhuwa niko wabona ne chimoni chowo
akhabireera khangu mu bukhalaki tawe,
sikila okhakhole oriena ekhumaliilikha,
nga chirani wowo ne akhuaambie chisoni?
Ng'oona weng'ene bulomani buuliio akari wowo ne chirani wowo ne muli mweng'ene,
ne mukhabuulana kamakhuwa kenywe tawe,
ne busa oulila akhola ario amureerera chisoni,
mala lisina liowo lionekha biise bioosi.
Elomo elomekha mu siise silayi sisienyekha,
eli nga bibiaamo bie esahabu mu ndubi eye efwesa.
Nga embete eye esahabu namwe limili lie esahabu,
akhaba omundu omukesi yesi ali ario narafwira omurekeeresia.
Nga ebarafu mu siise sie likesa,
akhaba omurumwa omweyikinwa yesi ali ario khwaabo bamuruma,
asangaasia babaami bewe.
Nga kamafuumbi ne embeo biikhalimo efula tawe,
akhaba omundu owifumia ali, ali ne siianwa ne se aana tawe yesi ali ario.
Ne liliekhaliilikha omwami anyala aulila,
ne lilomaloma lilayi liioleelesia kumwoyo.
Nonyoolile bubuukhi khomba bukhwola bwong'ene,
busa bukhusinya mala orusie.
Okhacha wa chirani wowo buli siise tawe,
akhola ario asinyikha ne nawe mala akhubiila.
Omundu orusia buloli khu wasie ali nga eruungu eye liie,
namwe nga embalu namwe luembo lulwoki.
Lilieyikina mu mundu okhali omusuubilwa tawe mu biise bie butinyu,
lili nga liliino libolile namwe sikele simiukha.
Oyo owimbila kimienya omundu obeelele,
ali nga omundu ofuula engubo khu ndaalo eye embeo namwe nga chumbe mwikoonjo.
ne aaba ne bulesia muelesie kameechi anywe,
sikila aba olikho omutiuukha kumulilo khu murwe kwewe,
ne Omwami acha khukhuruunga.
Nga embeo eye bunaswa nereera efula,
ne omundu owe kamakuto areera lirima.
Nabulayi wamenya khunju khungaaki,
khukhila khumenya no mukhasi nalung'uunyo.
Nga kameechi kamanyifu khu mundu owe bulesia,
chili chirio chilomo chindayi khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi.
Nga sitoolola sie kamatosi namwe esebele etubukhile,
ali ario omundu omuluungi ofukiilila bumayaanu.
Se buli bulayi khukhoomba bubuukhi bukali tawe,
namwe se buli bulayi khukhwiyimila lukoosi tawe.
Omundu okhekhaliilikha tawe ali nga lukoba lutechulwe kamasiisi,
mala luli khwasie khukhwibwaakalwa,

Nga ebarafu mu siimiyu namwe efula mu likesa,
luli lurio lukoosi lukhenyekhana tawe khu musilu.
Nga tindikiriri mu khupurukha khwayo,
Lundi nga opiicho mu khupurukha khwayo,
sili sirio silaamo siikhali ne sifuno tawe,
se sireera butinyu tawe.
Siboko sili sie farasi, ne chisenyenge che munwa khu punda,
ne esiimbo eli eye khukhupa basilu.
Okhakobosia omusilu khuloondekhana ne busilu bwewe tawe,
okhakhola orio wafwaanana ne naye.
Kobosia omusilu khuloondekhana ne busilu bwewe,
busa akhola ario ebaasia ali yesi ali omukesi.
Orumania burume bwewe khubirira khu musilu,
ekhala bikele biewe omwene lundi ereerera butinyu.
Nga bikele bio omuleme ne bikhali ne bukhala tawe,
luli lurio lusimo lulomwa no musilu.
Nga omundu oboela libaale mu lusia,
ali ario oyo oeelesia omusilu lukoosi.
Nga liwa ne liuna kumukhono kwo mumeesi,
luli lurio lusimo lulomwa no musilu.
Nga omulasi owe buyiingo nalasa buli mundu,
ali ario oyo oaana kimilimo khulwe kumuruungo khu musilu namwe khu mumeesi.
ali ario omusilu owila mu ke busilu bwewe.
Wabonakho omundu welanga omwene omukesi?
Lilieyikina liliio khulwo musilu khukhila khuniye.
Omukara aloma ali, “Etalang'i eli khu ngila!
Etalang'i eli khu ngila che lukoba!”
Nga lulwiiki ne lwisiubila khu bupata chalwo,
eli nga omukara khu sitanda siewe.
Omukara aroonga mu sibuumba,
ne kakhali khuyila emunwa butinyu khu niye.
Omukara elaanga ali ali omukesi,
khukhila babaandu saba baana kamakobosia ke bukesi.
Omundu owikhupa mu bulomani bukhali bubwewe tawe,
ali nga otiila khu maru ke mbwa elikho ebira.
Nga omukwamalalu olasa
chinjeso namwe buembo bubwira,
ali ario omundu obea owasie,
naloma ali, “Ndikho kholakho busa kumwinyawe!”
Khulwe khutaamba chiikhu kumulilo kusima,
ne niio omukuti ataamba khulomana mbao.
Nga kamaanda khu maanda kaburukha,
ne chiikhu khu mulilo,
ali ario omundu olomana khulwe khukhola bulomani buchiililile.
Kamakhuwa ko mukuti,
kali nga siakhulia sinulu,
kachilanga elala mu mubili mwoosi.
Nga efwesa eyafuunikha sibuumba,
chili chirio chilomo chindayi ne kumwoyo kumumayaanu.
Oyo obiila ekisa mulomo chewe,
mala abiikha bubeeyi mu mwoyo kwewe.
Ne nalomaloma bulayi okhamusuubila tawe,
sikila mu mwoyo mwewe bilimo bibiindu bisinyisia saba.
Akhaba libiila liewe ne lifuunikhwa ne bubeeyi,
bumayaanu bwewe bulibakalwa ebweeni we libuusiana.
Oyaba liloo omwene alilikwamo,
ne libaale lilimiina oyo orakikha khulipiringisia.
Oloma bubeeyi abiila nibo alomalomakho,
ne khulomalomaka kimilomo khureera libuna.

sikila sonyala wamanya kakeecha busiayo tawe.
Lekha okundi akhufumie,
okhefumia wamwene tawe,
lekha omukeni akhufumie.
Libaale lili lisiro ne kumuyekhe kwosi kuli kumusiro,
ne kakhali lirima lio musilu lili lisiro khukhila bioosi.
Lirima likali lili limemeu ne bukhalafu buukia,
ne naanu onyala wekhaliilikha likhendekha?
Lilikiicha lie abuwaanga,
likhila busiime bwe mu bwikisi.
Bukhupe nibwo onyoola khukhwama khu musaale bukhuyeeta,
ne kakhali liliekwayila likali lio omusiku lili bubeeyi busa.
Omundu owikuure aloba akhaba bubuukhi,
ne kakhali khu we njala buli siindu siakhaba silulu siba sinulu.
Nga enyuni erekukha khukhwama mu siswi siayo,
ali ario omundu otaaling'a khukhwama mungo mwewe.
Kamafura ne biiunya bulayi bie khukhwiakha bisiimisia kumwoyo,
ne kakhali butinyu bwonaka kumwoyo.
Okhebilila basaale bowo namwe basaale ba raraao tawe,
ne oli mu butinyu, okhasaba buyeeti khukhwama khu wandaayo tawe,
nabulayi chirani wowo ooli siimbi, khukhila wandaayo ooli aleeyi.
Ba omukesi, mwana owase,
mala osangaasie kumwoyo kwase,
nio enyala khukobosia oyo oufwochola.
Omukesi abona butinyu mala ekisa,
ne kakhali omusilu abwikhupamo mala aumiia.
Bukula engubo eyo mundu owimeelela omukeni,
ruungia kumusiingo owimeelela bareende.
Omundu ounana kumutikhinyi,
khukheesia owasie ne luyoka,
alibalwa nga olikho omulaama.
Efula namunyekeele,
no mukhasi nalung'uunyo bifwaanana,
nomukhiingilila oli nga okhiingilila embeo,
namwe khufumbara kamafura.
Sichuuma siakalanga sichuuma siasie,
ne omundu eyiika khukhwama khu wasie.
Omundu owaakila kumutuli alilia chinduli chakwo,
ne omukholi oliinda omwami wewe alanyoola lukoosi.
Nga bubweeni ne bung'enang'ena ne olola mu meechi,
bulayi bwene kamebaasio ko mundu kokesia omundu oyo nga nali.
Emakoombe ne kumulilo se biliikura tawe,
bulayi bwene chimoni cho mundu chosi se chinyalikha tawe.
Enyuungu eye mu mukuba ekela efwesa,
ne kumulilo kukela esahabu,
ne omundu akelwa khubirira khufuma yewe.
Wakhachunga omusilu mu sibwili alala ne biakhulia,
busilu bwewe se bulimururamo tawe.
Manya bulayi nga bibiaayo biowo ne bili,
mala obiliinde bulayi,
sikila kimiaandu se kimenya mindali na mindali tawe,
ne bubwami bunyala bwabao chiselukho choosi ku?
Bunyaasi ne buweele, mala bubuundi ne busisina,
ne bunyaasi bwe chingulu bubusiibwe,
onyala wanyoola chingubo khukhwama khu bufuumbo bwe kamakheese,
lundi wakula kumukuunda khukhwama mu rupia nicho okusiisie chimbusi.
Kamabeele kalibao khukhwama mu mbusi nga siakhulia siowo,
sie babaandu be nju yowo nende sie bakholi bowo.

Bamayaanu belukha akhaba omundu ne akhabatimania tawe,
ne kakhali baluungi bali banyindaafu nga etalang'i.
Sibala ne sikhola bumayaanu,
siba ne babaami bakali,
ne kakhali ne siba ne babaandu be limanya,
sichiililila khuba ne kumuleembe.
Omwami oupia sibi bataambi,
ali nga efula eye ekhuungu,
eyonaka biakhulia.
Abo baloba lilaka bafumia bamayaanu,
ne abo baliinda lilaka bayingana ne nabo.
Babaandu bamayaanu se bamanyile bung'ali tawe,
ne kakhali abo bayiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi balimanyiile elala.
Nabulayi omutaambi okeendela mu buluungi bwewe,
khukhila omuiinda oli ne chingila chimbi.
Oyo oliinda lilaka ali omwana omukesi,
ne kakhali omusaale owe babaandu be kumuluungo,
aambia raraawe chisoni.
Oyo okuchisia kimiaandu kiewe,
khulwe kumuruungo kumukali khu makobi,
abuusila omundu ooli omulayi khu bataambi.
Omundu okhaulila lilaka tawe,
akhaba lisaba liewe lili lisinyisia.
Oyo otiimia omundu omuluungi,
amuyila khu ngila eye bumayaanu,
alikwa mwiloo liewe omwene,
ne kakhali balayi balinyoola kumukabwa kumulayi.
Omuyiinda ebaasia ali,
ali omukesi omwene,
ne kakhali omutaambi ooli ne limanya,
amenyile khumukhilakho.
Baluungi ne bakhila luyali luliio lukali,
ne kakhali omumayaanu ne echa khu bwami,
babaandu bekisa.
Omundu ookisa bumayaanu bwewe,
se aindiaala mwimenya tawe,
ne kakhali obwiiyama mala abwikaana,
alinyoola siisa.
Ali ne khabi omundu oria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli lwoosi,
ne kakhali oyo olumia kumwoyo alikwa mu butinyu.
Nga etalang'i eulukhuma namwe nga sibulukhu sisirekeekhe khu khuupana,
ali ario omwami omumayaanu owaamiia bataambi.
Omwami otaamba limanya ali omukuluumi khu baandu,
ne oyo obiila linyoola likhali lia ng'ali tawe ayindila.
Kaaba bali omundu aaba ne eera okundi,
lekha abe oyiiyayiiya khukhwola nga afwa,
omundu yesi yesi akhamuyeeta tawe.
Oyo okeenda bulayi alionisibwa,
ne kakhali oyo owakoyaana alikwa mwiloo.
Oyo olima kumukuunda kwewe alaba ne biakhulia bikali,
ne kakhali oyo oloondelela kamakhuwa kakhali ne bukhala tawe,
alinyoola butaambi bukali.
Omundu omusuubilwa alaba ne chikhabi chingali,
ne kakhali oyo oakara khuindiaala alinyoola kumunaanio.
Khubabila lubeka lulala se khuli khulayi tawe,
ne kakhali omundu anyala akhola likhiika khulwe siakhulia silala siong'ene.
Omundu owe chinge aakara khunyoola kimiaandu,
ne se amanya ali liliekoomba lilamwichakho tawe.
Oyo owiikiicha owasie ekhumaliilikha alatasa khunyoola busiime,
khukhila omundu obea owasie ne kimilomo busa.
Oyo onuula raraawe namwe maawe,
mala aloma ali, “Obwo se buli bumayaanu tawe,”
se aukhana no mwifwi tawe.
Owe kumuluungo enyosia bulomani,
ne kakhali oyo owiyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliindiaala.
Oyo owiyikina omwene ali omusilu,
ne oyo okeendela mu bukesi alisikulwa.
Oyo oaana khu bataambi se alitaamba tawe,
ne kakhali oyo obemana alinyoola bilaamo bikali.
Babaandu baabi ne becha khu bwami,
babaandu babeene bekisa,
ne kakhali ne babuna, baluungi beecha khu bwami.

Omundu okaambilwa buli lwoosi nakhaulila tawe,
alikhebulila busa akwiile mu butinyu nibwo akharuramo tawe.
Baluungi ne bali khu bwami babaandu bekhoya,
ne kakhali bamayaanu ne baamiia babaandu beloocha.
Oyo owasiima bukesi asangaasia raraawe,
ne kakhali omusaale owe baeeyi onaka kimiaandu kiewe.
Khulwe bung'ali omwami akhola sibala siaba sie kamaani,
ne kakhali oyo obukula kimiaandu mungila embi asibunia.
Omundu olomaka chilomo khu wasie,
ereka omwene luriimba.
Omundu omumayaanu ereka mu bumayaanu bwewe,
ne kakhali omundu omuluungi emba ne khukhwikhoya.
Omundu omuluungi amanyile bung'ali bwo mutaambi,
omundu omumayaanu se ali ne limanya nga elio tawe.
Babaandu be kileki baambia lukoba,
ne kakhali babaandu bakesi baosia lirima.
Omundu omukesi aaba ne ayiingana no musilu,
omusilu ayokela busa ne khuchekha,
kumuleembe se kubao tawe.
Babaandu babeeri babiila babaandu balayi,
ne bayiima khukhwira balayi.
Omusilu ekesia lirima liewe lioosi,
ne kakhali omukesi ekhaliilikha ne nalio.
Omwami aaba ne arekeeresia ke bubeeyi,
babemeelesi bewe boosi baliba bamayaanu.
Omutaambi no mukuluumi balekhaana,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia boombi chimoni.
Omwami aaba ne akhalakila bataambi bulayi,
bubwami bwewe bulibaao buli lwoosi.
Esiimbo ne siiukuumo bireera bukesi
ne kakhali omwana olekhwa busa ario,
areerera maawe chisoni.
Bamayaanu ne baamiia bumayaanu butasikha,
ne baluungi balibona likwa lie bamayaanu.
Ukuuma omwana wowo ne alikhuwa kumuleembe,
alisangaasia kumwoyo kwowo.
Niio bung'oosi bukhali tawe,
babaandu se bekhaliilikha tawe,
ne ali owe khabi oyo oliinda lilaka.
Omukholi se aukuumwa ne kamakhuwa busa tawe,
sikila akhaulila se acha khufukiilila tawe.
Wabona omundu ouutula chilomo chewe?
Omusilu anyala eyikinwa khukhila niye.
Oyo oelesia omukholi wewe lukoosi khukhwama mu bwana bwo mukholi oyo,
ekhumaliilikha omukholi alibukula buli sisiindu nisio ali nasio.
Omundu owe burafu enyosia bulomani,
ne omundu owe lirima areera bumayaanu bukali,
Lilielola lio omundu limukwiisia,
ne kakhali oyo owe kumwoyo kwe liliboombia anyoola lukoosi.
Omusaale wo mwifwi,
abiila bulamu bwewe omwene.
Aulila silaamo, ne se abuula siindu tawe.
Liria li omundu lireera kumureko,
ne kakhali owiyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne kumuleembe.
Bakali bayiima omwami abasiime,
ne kakhali bung'ali bwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omundu okhali owa ng'ali ali osinyisia khu baluungi,
ne kakhali oyo owe ngila engololofu ali osinyisia khu mumayaanu.

Kano kali kamakhuwa ka Akuri okhwa Yake owa Masa. Kamakhuwa kano akaboolela Itieli, yee, khu Itieli ne Ukali aloma ali,
“Ng'ali ese ndi omundu omusilu lukali,
se ndi ne limanya lio mundu tawe.
Se neyikile bukesi namwe khuba ne limanya
lia Wele omutakatifu tawe.
Naanu owaniinakho mwikulu mala ekha asi?
Naanu owabuusia embeo mu fuusi mweewe?
Naanu owaboa kameechi mu ngubo yewe?
Naanu owarao chinjakha choosi che sibala?
Lisina liewe naanu, ne lisina lio mwana wewe bali naanu?
Ng'ali ewe omanyile!
“Buli likhuwa lia Wele lili lia ng'ali,
Wele ali engabo khwaabo bamwilukhilakho.
Okhatasakho khu makhuwa kewe tawe,
akhola ario akhurafwira mala wanyolekhana khuba omubeeyi.”
Khusaba bibiindu bibili khukhwama khwiwe,
okhanyuma bibiindu bino ne khafwa tawe:
Ndusiekho bukarangarani ne bubeeyi,
okhamba buiinda namwe butaambi tawe,
ndiisie ne siakhulia sisinjola,
busa khola ndio nekura mala nakhwikaana,
naloma ndi, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye naanu?”
Namwe khola ndio naba omutaambi mala neeba,
mala nafwochola lisina lia Wele wase.
Okhachonganila omukholi khu mwami wewe tawe,
akhola ario akhulaama mala wanyolekhana ne kumusaango.
Baliio abo balaama baraarawabwe,
mala se basabila ba maawabwe chikhabi tawe.
Baliio babebaasia bali bali bakwalaafu mu moni chabwe babeene,
ne se bekwalaasia khukhwama khu bubi bwabwe tawe.
Baliio abo bali ne lilielola,
ne lilola lie khukhwibonia.
Baliio abo nibo kameeno kabwe kali chimbalu,
lundi kimibano, khukhwira bataambi barure mu sibala,
ne babanani barure mu baandu.
Namukhuni ali ne bakhaana bewe babili balila bali, “Mbe! Mbe!”
Bibiindu bitaru bikhanyalikha tawe, bine bikhaliloma bili, “Khwanyalikhe tawe.”
Ekoombe, omukuumba,
liloba likhanyoola kameechi kaliola tawe,
ne kumulilo kukheekaana kuli, “Nanyalikhe ndio tawe.”
Omundu okhoma raraawe ne khufwochola maawe,
khooro be mwitooma balisoonya chimoni chewe,
mala chingoosia chibalie.
Bibiindu bitaru bili bie liukia khwise,
bine nibio ekhamanya tawe,
Engila eye Furuusi mu ngaaki,
engila eye ndemu khu lwanda,
engila eye meeli akari khu nyanja,
ne engila yo mundu ne asiimana no mukhaana.
Eyino niyo engila yo mukhasi omueeyi,
alia ne eeya emunwa,
mala aloma ali, “Se nakholile libi tawe.”
Biliio bibiindu bitaru biteremia sibala,
ne asi wa bine liloba se likhaliilikha tawe.
Nasioobi ne aba omwami,
omusilu ne ali ne biakhulia bikali,
omukhasi omubi ne acha munju,
ne omukhaana omukholi ne acha khu museecha owo mukhasi niye akholela.
Bibiindu biliio bine khu sibala biili bikeekhe,
ne kakhali bili bikesi lukali,
Kamake kali bibiindu biikhali ne kamaani tawe,
ne kakhali kabuunga biakhulia biako mu siimiyu.
Bikoneelwa bili bibiindu bitekhele,
ne kakhali biombakha chinju chabio mu lwanda.
Chisike se chili no mwami tawe,
ne kakhali choosi chikeendela mu bipupu.
Embakilia onyala wakitiila mukhono,
ne kakhali chinyoolekhana mu machipi ke babaami.
Biliio bibiindu bitaru bikeenda bulayi,
bine binauusia bulayi,
etalang'i ekhila chisolo choosi kamaani,
ne seria yosi yosi tawe,
etaaywa, endurume,
no mwami okeenda ebweeni we babaandu bewe.
Waaba ne wabeleenge omusilu ne weniinia,
namwe waaba ne warekekhanga kamamayaanu,
sila busa.
Sikila newisacha kamabeele kamafura kamamo,
ne wikuba liliolu kamafuki kamamo,
ne winyosia lirima bulomani bwamamo.

Kano kali kamakhuwa ko mwami Lemueli owa Masa. Maayi wewe niye owamuboolela. Amuboolela ali,
Tawe mwana wase, mwana wase niye nasaala,
tawe mwana wase niye nasaba nanyoola,
Okhamalila kamaani kowo khu bakhasi tawe,
kamaani kowo khwaabo babunia babaami tawe.
Babaami se bakhoyele banywa endali tawe, ee Lemueli,
babemeelesi se bakhoyele bekoomba kamalwa tawe,
bakhola bario banywa mala bebilila kakabisibwa,
mala balekha khukholela bung'ali baali ne butinyu.
Elesia kamalwa kamarafu oyo oolikho ne abuna,
ne elesia endali oyo ooli mu butinyu,
lekha banywe mala bebilile kumutaambo kwabwe,
lundi balekhe khukhebulila butinyu bwabwe.
Lomalomela abo bakhanyala khulomaloma tawe,
khupanila bung'ali bwabo bakhenyala tawe.
Lomaloma mala okhalake mu buluungi,
khupanila bung'ali bwe bataambi nende babanani.
Naanu onyala aanyoola omukhasi omulayi?
Omukhasi ario ali owe bukhala bukali khukhila bwe kamamili.
Kumwoyo kwo museecha wewe kumwiyikina niye,
ne se alilekha khunyoola bukhala tawe.
Akholela omuseecha wewe bulayi,
ne se amukholelakho kamabi tawe mu bulamu bwewe bwoosi.
Ayiima bufuumbo bwe likheese ne katani,
mala eerusia khunaba,
Ali nga chimeeli che baboofuli,
asakha biakhulia biewe khukhwama aleeyi.
Enyokha silo silo,
mala ayiimila be nju yewe biakhulia,
ne khukaba bakholi bewe kimilimo.
Ayiima kumukuunda mala akukula,
ne mu bibiaamo biewe abiaala liruuti lie kimisabibu.
Akhola kimilimo ne kamaani,
mala alumia mu khuumbo.
Abona ali bibiindu biewe bili ne bukhala,
Etaa yewe eburukha ne busia.
Omwene akhola buusi bwewe,
mala anaba chingubo chewe omwene.
Ali omuaani khu bataambi,
ne khu babanani.
Se aria ebarafu khulwe nju yewe tawe,
sikila be nju yewe boosi befwara chingubo che luluya.
Ekholela omwene bibiebiimbilo,
chingubo chewe chili che ngubo eya katani lundi chinapeenda.
Omuseecha wewe amanyikhaane mungoba,
nga ne ekhala akari we basaakhulu be sibala.
Anaba chingubo cha katani ne achikusia,
akusia kimisiipi khu baboofuli.
Ali ne kamaani ne lukoosi,
aliindilila kakeecha ne busangaafu.
Alomaloma sikesi mala ekesia ke bulayi,
akaambila babasie ke buaani.
Aliinda bulayi enju yewe,
ne se ali omukara tawe.
Babaana bewe benyokha ne bamulaanga bali owe khabi.
Akhaba omuseecha wewe yesi ario mala amufumia ali,
“Bakhasi bakali bakhola bulayi,
ne kakhali ewe obakhila boosi.”
Lukoondo lubea ne se luli siindu tawe,
ne kakhali omukhasi oria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya afumisibwa.
Musiime khulwe kimilimo kiewe,
ne lekha bikholwa biewe bimufumie mungoba.

Kano kali kamakhuwa ko mwilwachi owaba okhwa Daudi. Omwilwachi yuno aba omwami mu Yerusalemu.
Omwilwachi aloma ali, mbamo bukhala tawe, mbamo bukhala tawe,
buli siindu se silimo bukhala tawe.
Omundu anyoola bukhala siina,
mu milimo kiewe kioosi asi we nyanga?
Eselukho ebira, ekiindi yiicha,
ne kakhali sibala siliio buli lwoosi.
Enyanga erura, lundi enyanga ekwa,
ekobolanga lundi niio erurira.
Ekhuungu euucha ne elola ebunafubo,
lundi ekobola ebunaswa,
ne ebotookhelela ne ebotookhelela lundi,
mala ekobole niio yamile.
Chinjichi choosi chichukha mu nyanja,
ne enyanja se yiichula tawe,
kameechi kakobola niio chinjichi chakukha,
mala chichiililila khuchukhamo lundi.
Buli siindu sireera siluo,
siluo sikali nisio omundu akhanyala aboola nga ne sili tawe,
emoni se elua khubona tawe,
ne liiru se lilua khuulila tawe.
Kakabao khale niko kalibao lundi,
kakekholeekhe niko kaliekholekha,
ne se siliio sisiindu sikeni asi we enyanga tawe.
Siliio sisiindu nisio baloma bali,
“Lola, sino sili siiya ku?”
Siamala khubao, mu biise bikhale ne khukhasaalwa tawe.
Mbao okhebulila bibiindu bikhale tawe,
namwe se lilibao likhebulila lie bibiindu biliekholekha,
mwabo bakheeche enyuma tawe.
Ese, omwilwachi nabeele omwami owa Isiraeli ne ndi mu Yerusalemu.
Narumikhira kamebaasio kase ne limanya khuyiima ne khuenja bioosi bibiekholekha asi we nyanga. Sili sisiindu sie kumunaanio kumukali nisio Wele amala khuelesia babaana be babaandu khuba ne nasio.
Namalile khubona buli sisiindu sisiekholekha asi we nyanga, ne lola, bioosi se bilimo bukhala tawe. Bili nga ne otimania embeo.
Sisiefumbaka se sinyala siakololwa tawe,
ne siitaambao se sinyala siabalwa tawe.
Narumikhira kumurwe kwase khuyiima khumanya bukesi, kamalalu ne busilu. Namanya ndi kano koosi kali busa nga ne otimania embeo.
Sikila khuba ne bukesi bukali oba ne linaanisibwa likali, ne oyo otasa limanya likali atasa libeelela likali.

Nio ese naloma ndi, “Khe nje mu bukoote, nisangaasiekho.” Ne kakhali nanyoola ndi bino bioosi se bilimo bukhala bwosi bwosi tawe.
Ese naloma ndi “Chinjekho chili kamalalu ne esangaalo elimo nabukhala siina?”
Nebaasia khukhwesangaasia samwene khulwe ndali ne siili ne bukesi. Nakhalaka khuba omusilu nio emanye chingila chindayi nga babaandu ne bamenyile mu sibala khu ndaalo ndiiti.
Samwene nebiaalila kamaruuti lundi nang'oona ne abuundu e khuolela mala nabiaalao buli murongooro kwe kamatuunda.
Samwene nekholela kamatiisi niko namiamo kameechi ke khuchukhilila kumusiru kwe khukhusia kimirongooro.
Nakula banasioobi be siseecha nende be siikhasi, lundi naba ne banasioobi babasaalwa munju yase. Lundi naba ne kamatuuli ke chikhaafu ne bibiaayo, khukhila buli yesi owamenya mu Yerusalemu.
Lundi nabuusia efwesa ne sahabu khukhwama mwibiikhilo lie bubwami ne khukhwama mu ngoongo nicho namiia. Babaandu be siseecha nende be siikhasi bemba ne banjakaanila, mala naba ne bakhasi bakali nibo namenyia busa nga basaale, babasiimisianga.
Ne buli sisiindu nisio chimoni chase chabona nasikoomba. Naba se niberera nisio nikoomba tawe. Naba ndio sikila kumwoyo kwase kwasiimisibwa ne kimilimo kiase, ne kuno nikwo kukwaba kumuruuru kwe kimilimo kiase kioosi.
Nio nebaasia khu koosi niko nakhola, ne butinyu nibwo nanyoola ne ndikho ekhola, ne lola bioosi se biabamo bukhala tawe, biaba busa nga otimania embeo, mala mbao siosi siosi nisio onyoolamo asi we nyanga tawe.
Nio nakanakana khu bukhala bwe bukesi, kamalalu ne busilu. Omundu onyala amiia enyuma wo mwami anyala akhola siina? Ne kakhali liliakholwa liong'ene.
Nio namanya ndi bukesi bukhila busilu, nga buwaanga ne bukhila sisiilima.
Omundu omukesi abona niio alikho acha, ne omusilu akeendela mu siilima. Kakhaba kario, namanya ndi omundu owe limanya no musilu khutabusia khwabwe khuli busa khufwaanane.
Nio naloma ndi, “Sisiekholekha khu musilu silinjekholekhakho seesi. Nio sikila siina neemba omukesi lukali?” Mala naloma ndi khuba omukesi se khuli ne bukhala tawe.
Sikila mbao likhebulila lia mindali na mindali lio mukesi, namwe lio musilu tawe. Sikila chindaalo chichiicha boombi alala balibililwa. Omukesi afwa busa nga omusilu!
Nio nabiila bulamu, sikila bwakila nebaasia ndi buli sisiindu sisiekholekha asi we enyanga siambumisia ese. Sikila bioosi bukhala mbamo sili nga notimania embeo.
Nabiila kimilimo kiase kioosi nikio nakhola asi we nyanga. Khubona ndi omundu okundi busa alikiilakho.
Ne naanu omanya omundu oyo ne aliba omundu omukesi namwe omusilu? Kakhaba kario, akheele khu matuunda ke kimilimo kiase ne bukesi bwase asi we nyanga. Bino bioosi bukhala mbamo.
Nio nebaasia mala narusiakho kumwoyo khu milimo kiase nikio nakhola asi we enyanga.
Sikila siise silala omundu akhola sisiindu ne kamaani, arumikhira bukesi bwewe bwoosi, limanya, ne busicha, mala afwe asilekhele sioosi omundu okundi asangaalilekho okhaasikholakho tawe. Kano koosi bukhala mbamo, buno buli bumayaanu bukali!
Omundu anyoola siina mu milimo kioosi nikio akhola naluilakho asi we enyanga?
Chindaalo che bulamu bwo omundu choosi chili che buchuuni ne bubeeleli. Akhaba mu silo se aulukhanga chinganakani tawe. Kano koosi bukhala mbamo.
Sikila naanu onyala aalia namwe asangaala nakhali ne Wele tawe?
Sikila Wele aelesia limanya, bukesi ne busangaafu khu mundu omusiimisia. Ne aelesia omumayaanu kumulimo kwe khukhwangala ne khubuunga kimiaandu nikio alielesia oyo niye Wele asiimisibwa ne naye. Kano koosi bukhala mbamo lundi kali nga notimania embeo.

Buli sisiindu sisiekholekha asi we nyanga sili ne siise siasio:
siise sie khusaalwa, ne siise sie khufwa,
siise sie khumiicha, ne siise sie khukesa,
siise sie khukhwiira, ne siise sie khuonia,
siise sie khutechulaka, ne siise sie khukhwombakha,
siise sie khulila, ne siise sie khuchekha,
siise sie khusooma, ne siise sie khukhina,
siise sie khumwaata kamabaale, ne siise sie khubuusia kamabaale alala,
siise sie khukhwikwayila, ne siise sie khulekha khukhwikwayila,
siise sie khuyiima, ne siise sie khutibia,
siise sie khubiikha, ne siise sie khumwaata,
siise sie khutabula, ne siise sie khunaba,
siise sie khusila, ne siise sie khulomaloma,
siise sie khusiima, ne siise sie khubiila,
siise sie liie, ne siise sie kumuleembe.
Bukhala siina nibwo omukholi anyoola mu nikio akhola?
Naboone niko Wele aelesia babaandu khukhola.
Akhola buli sisiindu sibe sie lukoondo lulayi mu siise siasio. Lundi aelesia omundu liliekoomba lie khumanya kakheeche, ne kakhali Wele se aamunyalila khumanya bikholwa bia Wele khukhwama mu khurakikha khukhwola mu khumaliilikha tawe.
Manyile ndi mbao siilayi khu nibo tawe, ne khukhali khukhwisangaasia ne khukhwikhoya babene ne basiili balamu.
Buli mundu enyekha alie, anywe, mala ekhoyele mu milimo nikio akhola, sikila sino sili siianwa sia Wele khu mundu.
Manyile ndi buli siindu nisio Wele akhola silabao khulwa mindali na mindali. Se siliio sinyala siatasibwakho namwe siarusibwakho tawe. Wele akhola ario nio babaandu bamurie.
Buli sisiekholekha, siekholekhakho khale. Wele akhola bibiindu bino ne elelamo.
Mu khutasakho, naboone ndi mu sibala niio bung'ali bwenyekha onyoolao bukhali bung'ali tawe, ne abuundu niio buluungi bwenyekha lundi bukhiikha buliio.
Naloma mu mwoyo kwase ndi, “Wele acha khukhalakila baluungi ne bamayaanu sitube, sikila Wele akhola buli sisiindu siikholekha mu siise siasio sisiene.”
Naloma mu mwoyo kwase ndi, Wele alikho akhukhaka efwe, khukhwekesia ali se khuli balayi khukhila chisaang'i tawe.
Sikila butinyu bwo omundu ne bwe chisaang'i bulekhaana. Omundu afwa busa nga esaang'i. Biombi bili ne kumuuya kumufwaanane, ne omundu se alikho nende nisio akhilila chisaang'i tawe. Sikila bioosi se bili ne bukhala tawe.
Bioosi bilicha abuundu alala. Bioosi biama khwiloba bilikobola khwiloba.
Naanu onyala amanya kumwoyo kwo mundu ne kufwa ne kucha mwikulu, ne kumwoyo kwe saang'i, ne kwiikha asi mwiloba?
Nono nabona ndi mbao silayi nisio omundu akhoyeele ekhoyela khukhila kumulimo kwewe tawe, sikila okwo kuli kumukabwa kwewe. Naanu olimukobosia abone siicha khwikholekha enyuma we khufwa khwewe?

Lundi nabona bukuluumi bwoosi bubwekholekha asi we nyanga. Lundi lola, nabona kamasika ke babaandu bakuluumisibwa, mala se abao obaoleelesia tawe. Ba baabakuluumianga baba ne bunyali khu nibo, ne kakhali se baaba nende baabaoleelesia tawe.
Mala nebaasia ndi babaafwa bali bulayi khukhila balamu basiimenya.
Ne lukali khukhila okhila balamu ne bafu ali oyo okhasaalwa tawe. Okhaabonakho bikholwa bimayaanu bibiikholekha asi we nyanga tawe.
Lundi nabona sikila babaandu ne bakholanga kimilimo kimikali. Kali kario sikila baali ne siikhalikhali khu basiaabwe. Kano koosi bukhala mbamo lundi khuli busa nga khutimania embeo.
Omusilu se akhola kimilimo tawe, mala omwene eyira khulwe enjala.
Nabulayi khuba na sitiiti sie kumuleembe khukhila khunyoola bikali bie kimilimo kimikali khuli nga khutimania embeo.
Lundi, nabona biikhali ne bukhala asi we nyanga tawe.
Omundu oli busa yeng'ene okhalikho namwana namwe wandaaye tawe, ne kakhaba kario se alekha khukhola kimilimo kiewe buli lwoosi tawe, se anyalikha ne kimiaandu nikio ali ne nakio tawe. Nono khwako se ereeba ali, “Ekholela naanu ne neyimana samwene busangaafu?” Bino bioosi se bilimo bukhala tawe lundi butinyu bukali.
Nabulayi khuba babili khukhila mulala, sikila babili bali ne kumuruuru kumulayi khulwe kimilimo kiabwe.
Sikila mulala khu nibo aaba ne akwa, okundi amwinyosia. Ne butinyu bulinyoola oyo oli yeng'ene sikila ne akwa, se ali nokundi omwinyosia tawe.
Lundi, babili ne bakona alala, baba ne luluuya. Ne mulala yeng'ene anyoola luluuya ariena?
Babaandu babili banyala bakhiingilila busiku bunyala abeele bwakhilwa ne omundu mulala. Kumukoye kukwokusibwa bukoko butaru kuli kumuandalafu khukukitula.
Nabulayi, omusoleeli omuele omutaambi mala oli omukesi, khukhila omwami omusaakhulu mala oli omusilu, okhanyala afukiilila likaambila tawe.
Akhaba ne ama mu siboe khucha khu ndebe eye bubwami, namwe ne asaalwa omutaambi ne luno ali omwami.
Nabona babaandu boosi bamenyile khu sibala, nabona akhaba omusoleeli owenyekha amiie mu bweyaangu bwo mwami.
Se siabao sisiakamo sie babaandu boosi tawe. Abamiia bosi. Kakhaba kario abo bakheeche enyuma wewe, se balimwekhoyela tawe. Ng'ali bino bioosi bukhala mbamo lundi bili nga khutimania embeo.

Wiilinde ne olikho ocha munju mwa Wele. Buli bulayi khuchamo ne khurekeeresia khukhila khurusia embosio nga eye basilu. Babaandu basilu bali bakhamanyile bali balikho bakhola bumayaanu tawe.
Nyoa wibaasie ne okhalomaloma tawe, ne okhaba khangu mu khusuubisia liosi liosi khu Wele tawe. Niye ali mwikulu, ne ewe oli khu sibala, khwako lekha kamakhuwa kowo kabe matiiti.
Sikila kamarooro keecha khulwe kimilimo kimikali, ne kumumilo kwo musilu khulwe kamakhuwa kamakali.
Ne osuubisia Wele, okhaayilila khuruunga tawe, sikila se asiimisibwa ne basilu tawe. Ruunga nisio osuubisia.
Nabulayi olekhe khusuubisia khukhila osuubisie mala okhilwe khuruunga.
Okhafukiilila kamakhuwa kowo kakhuyila mu bumayaanu tawe, ne okhaboolela omurumwa owa Wele oli se wang'alilamo tawe. Siina sikila nokhola Wele akhukhalalile? Mala onake nibio wakhola?
Sikila kamarooro ne kali kamakali, kamakhuwa ka busa katasikha, ne kakhali ewe ria Wele.
Ne obona mu sibala bataambi ne bamiinibwa mala bung'ali ne buluungi se biliio tawe okhesiindukha tawe. Sikila ooli angaaki alolelelwa nende ooli angaakikho, ne baliio be angaaki lukali.
Ne kakhali mu koosi, omwami anyoola bukhala bwe kamaloba ke biluundu.
Oyo osiima chirupia, se anyalikha nacho tawe, namwe oyo osiima buiinda se anyalikha nabwo tawe. Bino bioosi se bilimo bukhala tawe.
Kimiaandu ne kikucha, bakilia boosi bakucha, ne bukhala siina nibwo omwenekio ali nabwo, ne khukhali khukilolakho busa?
Omukholi akona liilo likali akhaba ne alia bitiiti namwe bikali. Omuyiinda, aakhalia ekura se akona liilo tawe.
Buliio bumayaanu bubi lukali nibwo namala khubona asi we nyanga. Omundu abiikha kimiaandu kimuumisia omwene.
Ne kimiaandu ekio kiatiba sikila ekhabi embi. Ne omundu oyo a ba no mwana ne se ali ne sisiindu tawe.
Nga omundu ne ama munda mwa maawe ne ali sichula, bulayi bwene nga nilwo alirura mu sibala sichula ne akobola niio ama eyo. Alirura sichula nga ne echa, ne se alisuta siosi siosi sie kimilimo kiewe tawe.
Obuno bwosi buli bubi bukali. Nga nilwo asaalwa alifwa ario, ne bukhala siina nibwo anyoola khukhwama mu milimo kiewe,
ne khumalila chindaalo chewe choosi mu siilima ne buchuuni,
Lola, nilio malile khubona lili lilayi lundi likhoyela lili khulia ne khunywa ne khukhwekhoyela kimilimo kioosi nikio omundu akhola asi we nyanga mu ndaalo chindiiti nicho Wele amuelesia, sikila okuno kuli kumukabwa kwewe.
Buli mundu yesi niye Wele aelesia kimiaandu ne buiinda ne kamaani ke khukirumikhira, ne khufukiilila kumukabwa kwewe ne khukhwekhoyela kimilimo kiewe. Sino sili siianwa sia Wele.
Se alikhebulila khuwao khwe chindaalo chewe tawe. Sikila Wele alamuliinda ne khumukhola ekhoye buli lwoosi.

Buliio bumayaanu nibwo malile khubona asi we nyanga, mala bwakonela lukali babaandu.
Wele anyala aelesia omundu kimiaandu, buiinda, ne lukoosi, nio alekhe khutaamba siosi siosi nisio ekoomba tawe. Ne kakhaba kario, Wele se amuelesia kamaani ke khubilia tawe, ne akhali omukwa niye okilia. Elio bukhala mbamo mala lili nga likoonjo lichuuna.
Omundu aaba ne asaala babaana emia ndala, mala ayindila kimiiko kimikali nio chindaalo che kimiiko kiewe chibe chingali, ne kakhali alekha khunyalikha tawe mala lundi alekha khusiikhwa bulayi tawe, ndoma ndi, omwana omuusibwa amukhila.
Sikila omwana osaalilwe ne ali omufu se anyoolakho bukhala bwosi bwosi mu khusaalwa tawe. Achiililila busa khuuba mu siilima, mala lisina liewe likisibwa.
Khutasa khwako, omuusibwa se abonakho enyanga namwe amanyakho sisiindu siosi tawe, ne kakhaba kario, anyoola lioola khumukhila niye.
Akhaba abeele niye ne amenya kimiiko chielefu chibili, mala alekha khukisangaalila bulayi tawe, boombi se bacha abuundu alala tawe ku?
Omundu akholela enda, kakhaba kario, kumwoyo kwewe se kunyalikha tawe.
Sikila omukesi anyoola bukhala siina khukhila omusilu? Namwe omutaambi owe kimiima kimilayi anyoola bukhala siina?
Buli bulayi khunyalikha nende nibio khuli nabio khukhila liliekoomba. Kano kosi se kali ne bukhala tawe lili busa nga khutimania embeo.
Buli siindu sisiekholekha siamala khale khubisibwa, ne lundi limanyikhaane nga omundu ne ali. Omundu se anyala ayingana ne noyo oli ne bunyali khumukhila niye tawe.
Kamakhuwa kamakali, bukhala mbamo, nono oyiingana siina?
Ne naanu omanyile kaali kamalayi mu limenya lio mundu ne asiimenya chindaalo chewe chindiiti che bulamu bwa busa, nicho abiramo nga sisiiniini? Naanu onyala aboolela omundu kakheeche khubao nafwiile?

ne endaalo eye khufwa ekhila endaalo eye khusaalwa.
Buli bulayi khucha munju eye kamasika,
khukhila khucha munju eya naikara,
sikila lino lili liliakamo lie babaandu boosi,
ne omulamu ekhebusia ali yesi alifwa.
Bubeeleli bukhila enjekho,
sikila khulwe bubeeleli kumwoyo kusangaala.
Kumwoyo kwo mukesi kuli munju eye kamasika,
ne kakhali kumwoyo kwe basilu kuli munju eye sangaalo.
Buli bulayi omundu khuulila likaambila lio mukesi,
khukhila kumwenya kwe basilu.
Lichekha lio omusilu,
lili nga kumulilo kwe kamawa ne kurundukhaka mu mayika,
ako kosi kali ka busa.
Ng'ali limiinikhwa lisilwaasia omundu omukesi,
ne asooya ekoyaania kamebaasio.
Litabusia lie sisiindu likhila lirakikha liasio,
ne owikhaliilikha akhila oweniinia.
sikila lirima liamenya mu sifuba sie basilu.
Okhaloma oli, “Siina sikila chindaalo che khaale ne chaba chindayi khukhila chino?”
Sikila se lili lireeba lie bukesi tawe.
Bukesi buli kumukabwa kumulayi
buli bukhala khwaabo bali balamu.
Buliindi bwe bukesi buli nga buliindi bwe chirupia,
ne bukhala bwe limanya buli bukesi buloonda bulamu bwo omwenebwo.
Yibaasia kimilimo kia Wele,
naanu onyala akololosia sisiindu nisio niye alemasia?
Mu ndaalo eye buiinda sangaala, ne mu ndaalo eye butinyu khebulila. Wele akholanga chindaalo chombi echo nio omundu alekhe khumanya siindu siina siosi siicha khwekholekha enyuma tawe
Mu bulamu bwase butaamba bukhala, naboone buli sisiindu. Omundu omuluungi anyala afwila mu buluungi bwewe, ne omundu omumayaanu oyindila mu bulamu bwewe mu khukhola bumayaanu.
Nono okhaba omuluungi lukali tawe, lundi okhekhola khuba orio tawe, sikila siina wamwene wiyire?
Ne okhaba omumayaanu wabiriirira tawe, namwe omusilu tawe sikila siina weyire siise siowo ne sikhoola tawe?
Buli bulayi otiile lino, mala okharusiakho kumukhono kwowo tawe, sikila omundu oria Wele alarura mwako koosi.
Bukesi buelesia kamaani omundu omukesi khukhila ekookwa eye babaami ekhumi baali mu lukoba.
Ng'ali mbao omundu omuluungi mu sibala okhola bulayi mala alekha khukhola bumayaanu tawe.
Okhabiikha mu mwoyo kwowo niko babaandu baloma koosi tawe, busa okhola orio waulila omukholi wowo ne akhukhoma,
Wamwene omanyile mu mwoyo oli wesi walaama babaandu biise bikali.
Kano koosi nakakela khurumikhira bukesi. Naloma ndi, “Ndiba omukesi,” ne kakhali se naba ne bukesi tawe.
Omundu akhakhole siina khumanya sifuno sie bulamu? Likhuwa lino lilume lundi liaandalafu khwifwe po!
Ne samwene nakaluukhasia chinganakani chase khumanya ne khuyiima bukesi ne bibiindu khukhwiyiika bumayaanu ne busilu nga buli kamalalu.
Nanyoola sisiindu siili sie buchuuni khukhila lifwa, omukhasi owe kumwoyo kuli nga kimireko ne chindiimba, lundi owe kamakhono nga kiminyololo. Omundu osiimisia Wele niye omwifubarura, ne omumayaanu asiimisibwa ne omukhasi oyo.
Omwilwachi aloma ali, lola, ese nabona kano, nga naba ne ndasa sisiindu silala khu siindi nio nyoole bukali bwabio.
Nayiima ne nililamo ne se nanyoolile tawe, nabona omundu owe siseecha mulala mu baandu eelefu ndala niye nyala naria, ne esiili khunyoola owe siikhasi tawe.
Lola, nanyoola ndi, Wele abuumba babaandu baluungi, ne babeene bekhochoocha bibiindu bikali.

Naanu oli nga omundu omukesi?
Ne naanu omanyile khukaluukhasia elomo?
Bukesi bwo omundu bumukhola asangaala,
lundi bumukhola alekha khusulunya.
Khola niko omwami alaka, mala okhaba khangu khukhwechubila Wele tawe.
Rura niio omwami ali, okhaayilila kamakhuwa ne kakhali kasiimisia tawe, sikila omwami akhola sisiindu siosi siosi nisio enya.
Omwami akhola nga nilwo enya, ne mbao omundu yesi yesi onyala amureeba khu niko akhola tawe.
Oyo oria lilaka se acha khunyoola butinyu tawe, ne chinganakani cho mukesi chimanyile siise ne ngila niyo akholelamo.
Sikila buli likhuwa lili ne siise sialio ne ngila yalio, akhaba butinyu ne bwamenya khu mundu.
Sikila se amanyile siina silabao tawe, ne naanu okana amuboleele nga kalaba?
Mbao omundu oli ne bunyali bwe khukhiingilila kumwoyo namwe bunyali khu ndaalo yeewe eye lifwa tawe. Lino lili liie nilio khukhanyala khwebacha namwe khwakhola bubacha khwaona tawe.
Nabona kano koosi nga nebaasia khu biindu bibiikholekha asi we nyanga, niio babaandu balala bali ne bunyali khu baandi mala babaumisia.
Nio nabona babaandu bamayaanu ne basiikhwa. Bachichanga ne bengila ne khurura Abuundu Atakatifu, mala ne bafuma mu lukoba nimwo baba ne bakholiile bibiindu bienebio. Obuno bwosi se buli ne bukhala tawe.
Sikila kumunaanio khulwe bumayaanu se kwicha khangu tawe, ne babaandu berekekha khukhola bumayaanu.
Omumayaanu akhaba ne akhola bumayaanu khukhwola kamakhabi emia ndala mala amenya, ese manyile ndi abo baria Wele baliba bulayi sikila bamuria.
Ne kakhali bamayaanu se baliba bulayi tawe, akhaba omumayaanu se alileeyia bulamu bwewe nga sisiiniini tawe, sikila se aria Wele tawe.
Kakekholekha khu sibala se kali ne bukhala tawe. Babaandu baluungi banyoola kumunaanio kwe bamayaanu, ne babaandu bamayaanu banyoola kumuruuru kwe buluungi. Ndoma ndi kano koosi se kali ne bukhala tawe.
Ese fumia busangaafu, sikila omundu se ali ne sisiindu silayi asi we nyanga ne khukhali khulia, ne khunywa, ne khuchekha tawe. Sikila bino bicha khuba ne naye mu milimo kiewe khu ndaalo che bulamu bwewe nibwo Wele amua asi we nyanga.
Nga neyika khumanya bukesi ne kakekholekha khu sibala necha namanya ndi omundu anyala areengecha siilo ne kumuusi.
Nabona kimilimo kia Wele kioosi. Nabona ndi omundu se anyala amanya kimilimo kikiekholekhanga asi we nyanga tawe. Omundu akhakhaka ne kamaani ariena, se anyala khumanya tawe. Akhaba omundu omukesi ne aloma ali amanyile, se anyala amanya tawe.

Ne kakhali kano koosi nakebaasia. Nebaasia nga baluungi ne bakesi ne bikholwa biabwe ne bali mu buliindi bwa Wele. Bubeele busiime namwe ekileki, omundu se amanyile tawe. Buli sisiindu ebweeni wabwe se sili ne bukhala tawe.
Butinyu bulala busa obwo nibwo bubwiicha khu muluungi ne khu mumayaanu, khu mulayi, ne khu mubi
Buno buli bumayaanu khwako koosi kakekholekha asi we nyanga. Butinyu bulala bubwiicha khu baandu boosi. Ne kimiooyo kie babaandu kiechula bumayaanu ne kamalalu, ne basiili balamu khukhwola nga ne bafwa.
Ne oyo osiili omulamu ali ne lilieyikina, sikila embwa enamu ekhila Etalang'i efu.
Balamu bamanyile bali balifwa, ne kakhali bafu se bamanyilekho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe namwe se balikho ne kumuruuru kukuundi tawe. Kakaabwe kebililwa khale.
Lisiima liabwe, libiyila, ne libuba liabwe biabuna, ne se balikho lundi ne kumukabwa mu bioosi bibiikholekha asi we nyanga tawe.
Cha, olie siakhulia siowo ne busangaafu, mala onywe endali yowo ne liliekhoya. Sikila Wele amala khufukiilila nibio okhola.
Lekha chingubo chowo chibe chiwaanga buli lwoosi. Okhalekha khukhwiakha kamafura mumurwe mwowo tawe.
Menya mu busangaafu no mukhasi niye wasiima, chindaalo chowo choosi che bulamu bwa busa nibwo Wele akhuelesia asi we nyanga. Okwo nikwo kumukabwa kwe bulamu bwowo, ne kimilimo kiowo nikio okhola asi we nyanga.
Khola ne kamaani buli kumulimo nikwo onyala wakhola sikila e Makoombe niio olikho ocha eyo, mbaayo kumulimo, namwe kamebaasio namwe limanya namwe bukesi tawe.
Lundi nabona ndi asi we nyanga, batima chimbilo lukali se bali nibo baula mu mbilo buli lwoosi tawe, ne banyindaafu buli lwoosi se baula liie tawe. Babaandu bakesi se bali ne siakhulia buli lwoosi tawe, namwe be limanya se bali ne kimiaandu buli lwoosi tawe, namwe barekerefu se banyoola efuma buli lwoosi tawe. Ekhabi embi eli khu buli mundu.
Se aliio omundu omanyile siise siewe tawe. Ali nga ching'eeni chitiilwa mu lutiimba luubi, lundi nga chinyuni chiaambwa ne kumureko. Nono babaandu baambwa mu siise sibi, ne kabakwakho matundubiikha.
Lundi naboone sifwaani sie bukesi sino asi we nyanga, mala sialolekha khuba siboofu lukali khwise.
Lwabao lukoba lutiiti lulwaba ne babaandu batiiti babalumenyamo. Ne omwami owe kamaani alwibwaakala. Alupania mala alubotookhelesia ne banamae bewe.
Ne kakhali anyoolekhanamo omundu omutaambi mala omukesi lukali owaonia lukoba olwo. Ne kakhaba kario, mbao owakhebulila omundu omutaambi oyo tawe.
Ne kakhali ndoma ndi, bukesi bukhila kamaani, akhaba bukesi bwo mutaambi ne bufwocholwa, ne kamakhuwa keewe ne kakhaulilwa tawe.
Kamakhuwa ko mukesi kalomalomwa mu khweooya, kauliilikhana khukhila luyoka lwo mwami akari we kookwa eye basilu.
Bukesi bukhila bulwaani bwe liie, ne kakhali omumayaanu mulala onaka bulayi bukali.

Chiisi chifu chinyala chafuundia kamafura,
nono busilu bukeekhe buri bwonakaka bukesi ne lukoosi.
Omundu omukesi akhola kaali kamalayi,
ne kakhali omusilu akhola kaali kamabi.
Akhaba omusilu ne alikho akeenda khu ngila ataamba limanya,
ne ekesia buli mundu ali, ali omusilu.
Kaaba bali omwami akhurafuakila mu lirima, okhalekha khangu kimilimo nikio okhola tawe,
khukhwiboombia khukila kamabi karusibwao.
Buliio bumayaanu nibwo malile khubona asi we nyanga, bureerwa ne babaami.
Babaandu basilu baebwanga bubweyaangu bwe bunyali bwe angaaki ne babaandu baiinda babalangulakho busa.
Namalile khubona banasioobi ne baniinile khu farasi ne babaami bakeenda nga banasioobi.
Ne otechulaka lisiisi, endemu elamuluma.
Oyo owaara kamabaale alaumisibwa ne nako,
ne oyo owasaaka bichikhi ali mu busiku.
Sichuuma siaaba ne sili sifuu mala balekha khusiakala,
osirumikhira akhoya arumikhira kamaani kamakali,
ne kakhali bukesi bumuyeeta akhila.
Endemu yaaba ne luma ne bakhakisakania tawe,
aba okisaakania se enyibwa lundi tawe.
Lilomaloma lio mundu omukesi lili lie kumwalaalo,
ne kakhali lilomaloma lio musilu limwiira omwene.
Lirakikha lie khulomaloma khwewe lili busilu,
ne khumaliilikha khwewe khuli kamalalu.
Omusilu aloma ne elamo,
akhaba omundu ne akhamanyile kakeecha khubao tawe,
ne naanu onyala akhuboolela kaliekholekha enyuma we lifwa?
Kimilimo kio musilu kimuluya,
nio alekhe khumanya engila echa engo tawe.
Butinyu bwamunyoola ee baandu be sibala, omwami wenywe nasiili omwana,
ne babaami ne bakhola naikara kumutikhinyi.
Muli ne khabi, Ee baandu be sibala, omwami wenywe ne ali owe lukoosi,
ne babaami bakhola naikara biise bibienyekha,
khulwe kamaani, ne se khuli khulwe bumeesi tawe.
Liliefuufula likila enju yasulula,
ne bukara bukila silama siabwaama mu kari.
Naikara ekholwa khulwe chinjekho, ne endali ekhusangaasia,
ne chirupia chikula buli sisiindu.
Okhalaama omwami, akhaba mu mebaasio kowo tawe,
namwe okhalaamila omuiinda mu lusiro lwowo tawe,
sikila enyuni enyala yasuta kumumilo kwowo,
namwe sibuumbe sisiindi sie chindaa sinyala siakhubuula.

Mwata siakhulia siowo khu mechi,
sikila olinyoola bukhala
enyuma we chindaalo chingali.
Kabila bitonyi babaandu saba, namwe akhaba munaane,
sikila se omanya butinyu siina bunyala bwakwao khu sibala tawe.
Efula yaba ne eyita,
ekwa namatoa khu sibala,
ne kumurongooro kwaaba ne kukwa lubeka lwe siafubo namwe lwe ebunaswa,
abuundu niio kumurongooro kukwa, abwenao niio kwakama.
Oyo olindiilila embeo se amiicha tawe,
ne oyo olindiilila kamafuumbi se alikesa tawe.
Nga nilwo ewe ne okhamanya roho nga ne engilanga mu bikuumba bio mwana munda mwa maawe tawe, nono se onyala wamanya bikholwa bia Wele okholanga buli siindu tawe.
Miicha bumiicho kumutikhinyi akhaba ne ekolooba. Sikila se omanya bulala siina bulakhula tawe, buno namwe obwo, namwe wakana bwombi alala bucha khuba bulayi.
Buwaanga buli bulayi, ne lisangaasia khubona buwaanga bwe nyanga.
Sikila omundu aaba ne amenya kimiiko kimikali lekha akiekhoyele kioosi. Ne kakhali akhoya akhebulile ali chindaalo che sisiilima, chiliba chingali. Koosi kakeecha bukhala mbamo.
Yikhoyela buele bwowo ee, musoleeli, ne lekha kumwoyo kwowo kwikhoyele chindaalo che buele bwowo. Khola niko kumwoyo kwowo kwenya ne kwikoomba. Ne kakhali khebulila oli Wele acha khukhukhalakila khulwa buli nisio okhola.
Rusia liaayaaya mu mwoyo kwowo, yeliinda, okhanyoola buchuuni mu mubili kwowo tawe sikila buele ne sisiakamo sie limenya bili bia busa.

Khebulila Omubuumbi wowo mu ndaalo che buele bwowo, chindaalo chimbi ne chisiili khwola tawe, ne kimiiko ne kikhembiya tawe. Mu miiko ekio oliloma oli, “Ese se ndi ne busangaafu mu menako tawe.”
Biise ebio nibio enyanga ne buwaanga ne kumwesi, ne ching'enieesi bikhamaliyilekho, ne kamafuumbi kakhakobole enyuma we fula.
Mu ndaalo echo, baliindi be chinju bakhatereme, babaandu be kamaani baliinamikha, ne bakhasi basia mureko balilekha sikila bali batiiti. Abo balolela mu matirisia balibona sisiilimalima.
Siise nisio kimiliango kie kamaru kowo kikhabe kiekaalwe,
ne khuuliilikha khwe chireko se khukhabe khukali tawe.
Ne kakhali mu silo omundu akhenyokhe akhaba khulwe luyoka lwe nyuni ne yiimba.
Oliria khuniina bikiingi, olilola khuba busiro khucha lukeendo. Lichuune liowo liliwangia khumurwe nga bimuli bie kumurongooro kwa alimondi. Olikeenda ne oyikila nga liteete ne se oliba ne liliekoomba tawe.
Ne oliloota mungo mwowo mwa mindali na mindali. Ne babaandu baliicha kamasika kowo.
Siise esio lusia lwe esahabu lukhakhalikhe
epwakuli eye esahabu ekhatikhe,
enyuungu ekhatikhile mu sebele,
ne mu ngila eyo ne ng'ene kumukuu kwe khukhwesa kameechi kukhakhalikhe.
Ne liloba lilikobola khu liloba nga nilwo liaba,
ne roho elikobola khu Wele owakibuumba.
Omwilwachi aloma ali, bukhala mbamo, bukhala mbamo. Bioosi bukhala mbamo.
Ne khurusiakho omwilwachi khuuba owe limanya, ekisia babaandu bukesi. Aapiima chisimo chingali, acheyika ne khuchingoona bulayi.
Omwilwachi akhaka khuyiima kamakhuwa ke khusiimisia, aandika mu busicha kamakhuwa ke bung'ali.
Lilomaloma lie babaandu bakesi lili nga esiimbo eye khukhwayila, ne chisimo chichabuusibwa chili nga chimenya nga kimisumari kikiakhomwa kialuma, chichaama khu Wele, Omwaayi mulala owefwe fwesi.
Mwana wase, khukhila koosi, yiiyaya! Khuandika bitabu se khuli ne sisiakamo tawe, ne khusoma khukali khuluya kumubili.
Enyuma wa kano koosi, siliio sisiindu silala poli nisio ndoma sili sino: Ria Wele, mala otiile kamalaka kewe, sikila omundu abuumbwa khulwe bibieene ebio.
Sikila Wele acha khukhalakila buli sisiindu nisio khukhola, sibeele silayi namwe sibi, akhaba bibiindu bibiikholekhela mu bwikisi.

Ee, khaba wanjekhoyela ne khukhunuuna emunwa!
Sikila busiime bwowo bukhila endali.
Kamafura kowo ke khukhwiakha kaunya bulayi,
lisina liowo lili nga kamafura kamalayi,
khwako bakhaana bakhusiima.
Mbukule, khurekukhe khangu.
Omwami ambilile mu lusiro lwewe,
khulasangaala ne khukhwikhoya sikila ewe,
khulafumia busiime bwowo khukhila endali,
kano niko kakila bakhasi ne bakhusiima.
Ee, bakhaana be mu Yerusalemu,
Ese ndi omumali ti, ne kakhali ndi ne lukoondo lulayi,
nga kamaeema ka Kedari,
nga chingubo che mu lichipi lia Solomoni.
Mukhandekelesia sikila ndi omumali tawe,
sikila kumuumu kwanjosia.
Bawandaayase basoleeli bambambila lirima,
bakhola naba omuliindi owe kimikuunda kie kimisabibu,
ne kakhali se nang'oona kumukuunda kwase kwe kimisabibu tawe!
Musiime mboolele,
olaya waena kamakheese kowo?
Kalaolela waena mwiangilwe?
Siina sikila ese njiyayiiye ne khuyiima,
mu minyele kie kamakheese ke babaayi basio?
Mukelema wase somanyileyo tawe,
cha loonda lung'afuulo lwe kiminyele kie kamakheese,
cha waaye chimbusi echo siimbi a maeema ke babaayi.
Ewe musiime wase,
osiimisianga baseecha,
nga efarasi ekhasi ne siimisia chifarasi cha Farao chiseecha.
Chisaya chowo chili chisangasia nende bie khukhwesaa,
lundi likosi liowo liilimo chisiinga che kamamili.
Khulakhung'oonela bie khukhwesaa bie esahabu
bibiareebwamo efwesa.
Nga omwami aba nakonile khu sitanda siewe,
kamafura kase kamuunyila bulayi.
Omusiime wase ambunyila bulayi,
nga nakona akari we kamaturu kase.
Omusiime wase ali nga bimuli bie kamauwa kalaangwa hina ne kamuliikhe,
mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu kiili Engedi.
Omusiime wase ewe oli ne lukoondo lulayi,
lola, ewe oli owe lukoondo lulayi,
omoka bulayi nga liuusi.
Musiime wase lola,
ewe oli we lukoondo lulayi,
ng'ali oli omulayi elala,
Sitanda siefwe sili sie lubookha.
Kimitarakwa kili chinguulo che nju yefwe,
chikheti chefwe chili chisubasubi.

Ese ndi liua lia Sharoni,
simuli sie mu matooma.
Omusiime wase abonekha mu bakhaana,
nga simuli sie mu mawa.
Omusiime wase abonekha mu basoleeli,
nga kumupopayi mu mirongooro kie mu musiru.
Nekhala mu siniini siakwo mu busangaafu bukali,
ne lituunda liakwo lili linulu khwise.
Ambila munju eya naikara,
mala andakho kumukhono kwe busiime.
Ndwala sikila busiime,
njikusie ne kimisabibu kimiomu,
sangaasie ne kamapopayi.
Netikiiye kumukhono kwewe kumukhasi,
ne kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha kungwayila!
Ee, bakhaana ba Yerusalemu ndakilisie,
yechuba lukali,
muli se mulengilila busiime bwefwe tawe.
Nauliile kumumilo kwo musiime wase!
Alikho echela mu bikulu ne atima,
anausiaka mu ngulu.
Omusiime wase ali nga kicheu,
namwe nga ekhisi eng'ana.
Lola, emile ao enyuma we lisiisi liefwe,
aloleleele mu numa che kamatirisia,
aloleleele buniinilo.
Omusiime wase amboolela ali,
“Yinyokha khuche, musiime wase, khalayi wase,
yiicha khuche,
lola sikila kumunaane kwabirire,
efula yebachile.
Bimuli biamuliikhe khu sibala,
siise sie khukhwimba siolile,
ne kumumilo kwa musietuka,
kuuliilikhana mu sibala siefwe.
Kumutuli kwamile chinduli,
ne kimisabibu kiamuliikhe bimuli biakio biiunya bulayi.
Yinyokha khuche, musiime wase, khalayi wase yiicha khuche.
Oli nga liuusi,
liliekisile mu mbangaachi mwe lulwanda,
lekha mbone bubweeni bwowo buuli bulayi,
mala mbulile kumumilo kwowo kusiimisia.
“Khuambile chinjusi,
chinjusi ching'ana,
chichonakanga biluundu bie kimisabibu,
sikila kimisabibu kiefwe kiamile.”
Omusiime wase ali wase, ne ese ndi wewe,
aaya kumunyele kwe bibiaayo kwewe mu bimuli.
Khukhwola nga enyanga ne esoa,
mala nga bibiiniini ne biwelelela,
omusiime wase kobola, ba busa nga kicheu namwe nga ekhisi eng'ana,
khu bikulu bie kamabaale ka kakelekhana.

Nga mbechanga ne ngonile musilo,
ndooranga omusiime wase,
muyiimanga, ne kakhali se munyoolanga tawe.
“Luno ndenyokha nje muyiime mu lukoba luboofu,
khu ngila ne mu ngurianguria.
Ndayiima niye kumwoyo kwase kwasiima.”
Namuyiima ne se namunyoola tawe.
Baliindi baanyoola,
nga baba ne balambuula lukoba luboofu.
Nabareeba ndi, “Mwambonelekho omusiime wase?”
Siise sitiiti busa nga khwalekhana,
ne nyoola omusiime wase.
Namutiila mala se namulekhuula acha tawe,
khukhwola nga ne namuyila munju eya maayi,
mu lusiro nilwo nasaalilwamo.
Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu ndakilisie,
yechuba lukali,
muli se mulengilila busiime bwefwe tawe.
Siina sisiicha esio khukhwama mundaa,
sisieulukuse nga liliisi,
sili nga biiunya bulayi,
bikusibwa ne baboofuli?
Solomoni alikho echa bamumemeele mu ndebe yewe eye bubwami,
ali ne banamae bamuliinda kamakhumi sita,
baali barana mu Isiraeli.
Boosi barana baboyile chimbalu che liie,
bali babaalang'anyila liie,
buli mulala ne mbalu yewe khwiraango,
khukhwirekekha chingukuulo che siilo.
Omwami Solomoni ekholela omwene endebe niyo bamumemelamo,
khukhwama khu mirongooro kia Lebanoni.
Bikele biayo biaba bie efwesa,
kumukoongo kwayo kwe esahabu, endebe enapeenda
mukari yanabwa mu busiime,
ne bakhaana ba Yerusalemu.
Ee, bakhaana ba Sayuni,
yiicha,
lola omwami Solomoni,
ne kuutwa niyo maawe amufwara,
khu ndaalo eye siselelo siewe,
khu ndaalo eye busangaafu mu mwoyo mwewe.

Lolakho, oli ne lukoondo lulayi musiime wase,
lola oli ne lukoondo lulayi!
Omoka bulayi nga liuusi,
mu lububi lwowo.
Lichuune liowo likhinakhina oli kumunyele kwe chimbusi,
chichiikha khu mwiikha kwa Kileati.
Kameeno kowo kali kamawaanga nga chinyaange,
chichesiingile,
mbao etibile akhaba ndala tawe,
choosi chifwaanana.
Kiminwa kiowo kili nga luusi lubesemu,
ne lilomaloma liowo lisangaasia.
Chisaya chowo mu lububi lwowo chili nga chimbabia che lituunda likomanga.
Likosi liowo lili nga endeleelwa eya Daudi,
lilayi lundi limiuufu,
ne kamamili mwikosi nga chingabo eelefu.
Kamaturu kowo kali nga ching'ana chikhwana cha kicheu,
chichaya bimuli.
Ndaba khu lukulu lwe biiunya bulayi,
khukhwola mu mbeo eye mumakhelebende
sisiilima ne siwao.
Ewe oli omulayi ng'ali, musiime wase,
se olikho ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Yaa mukhaye, yiicha khurure Lebanoni,
yiicha khurure fwembi Lebanoni.
Yiikha khukhwama khu sikulu sia Amana,
khukhwama khu sikulu sia Seniri ne Herimoni,
khukhwama mu mabina ke chitalang'i,
khukhwama khu bikulu bie chingwe.
Ewe osangaasianga kumwoyo kwase, yaa, mukhaye wase,
osangaasianga kumwoyo kwase ne limoka liowo,
ne kamamili ke mwikosi mwowo.
Busiime bwowo buli bulayi yaa, mukhaye wase,
Busiime bwowo buli bulayi khukhila endali,
ne kamafura kowo
kakhila sisiindu sing'aa siosi siosi.
Mukhaaye wase, kumuketu kwe bubuukhi kuli khu minwa kiowo,
bubuukhi ne kamabeele bili khu lulimi lwowo,
chingubo chowo chiunya bulayi,
nga kamafura kamalayi ka Lebanoni.
Omusiime wase owe kumwoyo, omukhaaye wase ali siluundu sisiekisa,
siluundu sisire, eningilo yabeene.
Kimili kiowo kili liruuti lie kimirongooro kie kamatuunda kamakomanga
ne kamatuunda kamalayi lukali,
ne kamafura kalaangwa hena ne narito.
Narito ne Safarani ne kumuchai ne bing'aa bulayi,
ne kimirongooro kiosi kiunya bulayi,
ne manemane nende bioosi bing'ailisia bulayi.
Emoni eye sebele mu siluundu,
esebele eye kameechi ke bulamu,
ne chinjichi chibisia khukhwama mu Lebanoni.
Siisimukha, Ewe, ekhuungu eye bunaswa,
Ee, ekhuungu eye siafubo yiicha,
ucha khu siluundu siase,
lekha khuunya khulayi khufundeele.
Lekha omusiime wase eche mu siluundu siewe,
mala alie kamatuunda kasio kamalayi kakhila koosi.

Ningila mu siluundu siase,
musiime we kumwoyo kwase, mukhaye wase,
Mbuusia manemane yase ne bing'ailisia bulayi biase,
ndia lisasara liase ne bubuukhi bwase,
ese nywa endali ne kamabeele kase.
Lia, enywe basaale, ne nywa;
nywa lukali, enywe basiime!
Nga yaba nengonile, kumwoyo kwase kwanaania,
mala naroora ndi, omusiime wase alikho akhong'oonda khu muliango.
“Njikulileo yaa,
omusiime owe kumwoyo kwase, oli nga liuusi.
Kumurwe kwase kwanyirire khubeela luume,
ne lichuune liase lianyirire sikila kamame.”
Abeele nefuulile,
siina sikila nefware lundi?
Abeele nesiingile bikele,
siina sikila mbilabuusie lundi?
Omusiime wase aatiila khu sikhomekho sie kumuliango,
kumwoyo kwase kwekhoya.
Nenyokha khukhwikulilao omusiime wase,
ne kamakhono kase kechuule kamafura kamalayi,
ne chinjala chase chiroonya busa,
nga natiila khu sikhomekho sie kumuliango.
Nekulila omusiime wase,
ne kakhali omusiime wase aba achiile,
nekoomba khuulilakho kumumilo kwewe.
Namuyiima ne se namunyoola tawe.
Namulaanga, ne se angobosia tawe.
Baliindi baliindanga lukoba luboofu banyoola,
bakhupa mala nang'ukha,
baliindi chana bandabulaka chingubo.
Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu, mwekongochela,
ne munyoola omusiime wase,
muboolele muli ndwala sikila busiime.
Ee, omulayi lukali mu bakhasi,
omusiime wowo ali nasi khukhila omusiime okundi?
Omusiime wowo ali nasi khukhila omusiime okundi,
nio okhwekoonjeelele efwe orio?
Omusiime wase omumiliiu lundi omubesemu pe,
amanyikhaane mu baandu chielefu ekhumi.
Kumurwe kwewe kuli kumulayi nga esahabu endayi lukali,
ali ne lichuune lilayi,
limali nga nasimali.
Chimoni chewe chili chindayi nga che liuusi,
a sebele, esiingile eng'oonile bulayi.
Chisaya chewe chili nga biluundu bilayi,
kiminwa kiewe kili nga bimuli biroonya biiunya bulayi.
Kamakhono kewe kakhomela bulayi,
mala afwara chimbete ching'enang'ena che bukusi bukali.
Kumubili kwewe kuli kumumiufu nga kumusaanga,
kukwarerwamo kamabaale kang'enang'ena.
Bikele biewe bili nga chinjeko che libaale liwaanga,
chichasimikhwa mu maloo ke esahabu.
Lukoondo lwewe luli nga Lebanoni
lulayi nga kumutarakwa.
Lilomaloma liewe lilayi lukali,
mala ali osiimisia lukali.
Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu,
Oyuno ali omusiime wase,
lundi omusaale wase.

Ewe owe lukoondo lulayi mu bakhasi,
omusiime wowo achile waena?
Khuboolele achilile khuli?
Nio khuche nawe khumuyiime.
Omusiime wase achile e siluundu siewe,
niio bing'aa bulayi bikhula
khukhwaya kamakheese kewe mu biluundu,
ne khubuusia bimuli.
Ese ndi owo musiime wase, ne naye ali owase

Musiime wase,
oli ne lukoondo lulayi nga lukoba lwa Tirisa.
Osiimisia nga Yerusalemu,
busiime bwowo buli bwe kamaani nga banamae be chipendera.

sikila chimoni chowo chimbelesia liaayaaya.

Kameeno kowo kali kamawaanga nga chinyaange,

Chisaya chowo mu lububi lwowo chili nga chimbabia che lituunda likomanga.

Ne kakhali ese nasiima omukhasi mulala yeng'ene,
oli omuolu nga liuusi.
Ali omuteelwa mu mwabwe,
niye maawe asiima khukhila babaandi.
Bakhasi boosi bamubona mala bamufumia

“Naanu obonekha bulayi oyo nga enyanga ne soa?
Ali ne lukoondo lulayi lundi omumiliiu,
akhosia oli enyanga namwe kumwesi.”
Nacha mu mukuunda kwe chimbande,

khulola kimirongooro kimikomanga kimuliikhe.
Ne siili khumanya tawe,
omusiime wase anda mwikaari lio mukhoongo.
Kobola, kobola
Kobola, kobola khukhuloleelele.

Bikhandakilo biowo bisiimisia lukali mu biraaro!
Ewe owe yabwana owe ebwami,
Kamaraango kowo kali kamamiufu nga niko omundu aapilila.
Ekhofu yowo eli nga sibuumba siikhawamo endali tawe,
Enda yowo eli nga kumukuunda kwe ngaanu
kukwabotookhelelwa ne bimuli.
Kamaturu kowo kali nga chimbobo,
Likosi liowo lili lilayi nga kumusaanga,
chimoni chowo chindayi nga kamatiisi ka Heshiboni
embi ne silibwa sie lukoba luboofu.
Lilioolu liowo lili lilayi nga endeleelwa eya Lebanoni,

Kumurwe kwowo kuli angaki nga sikulu sia Karimeli,
ne lichuune liowo ling'enang'ena oli engubo eya Katani,
omwami anyala akhwekoomba.
Ewe oli omulayi lundi omusangaafu lukali,
omukhaana osangaasia lundi owasiimwa!
Ewe osiimisia nga lukheendu,
ne kamaturu kowo kali nga kamakheendu kalwo.
Ndoma ndi ndaniina khu mukheendu,
mala neambe khu sakia chakwo,
Ee, kamaturu kowo kabe nga bisusuuchu bie kumusabibu,
bulayi bwe kumuuya kwowo buli nga kamapopayi,
ne khukhunuuna khwowo emunwa khube nga endali endayi lukali,
eyiikha amumilo bulayi,
eyiseletekha khu munwa ne khu meno.
Ese ndi wo musiime wase,
ali ne silukuluku khwise.
