Musiime wase, yiicha khuche khukeende mu birekere,
mala khubeyo siilo sioosi.
Khuune makhelebeende mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu,
mala khuyame kimisabibu ne kiamile,
khulole chisabibu ne chimulikhe,
ne kimikomanga ne kimiliikhe.
Ebweeneyo ndakhwekesia busiime bwase.
Ee musiime wase, chimbuunwe chiunya kumuuya kumulayi,
ne amuliango wefwe,
kamatuunda kamalayi koosi kaliio
ka luno nende niko babuta khale
niko nakhubiikhila.

Ee, baanga oli wandayaase,
owanuuna lituru lia maayi!
Khunyoola enje andi nakhwekwayila,
andi se abao owandomayo tawe.
Andi nakhurangiriire ne khukhuyila munju mwa maayi,
ne mu lusiro lwa maayi wasaala.
Andi nakhuele endali etubasiibwe ne bing'aa bulayi onywe,
endali eye kamakomanga kase.
Ee, andi netikiiye kumukhono kwewe kumukhasi,
ne kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha kungwayila.
Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu yechuba muli,
se mulengilila busiime bwefwe tawe.
Naanu oyo olikho wicha khukhwama mu sichiimi,
ne batilaane no musiime wewe?
Nakhusiisimusia asi we kumupopayi,
Abwenao niio ewe wachuunila mao,
abwenao niio maao akhusaalila naali mu buchuuni.
Khole ese mbe kumuuri mu mwoyo kwowo,
mbe nga kumuuri khu mukhono kwowo,
sikila busiime buli ne kamaani nga lifwa,
likhendekha liabwo lili lirafu nga siliindwa,
Chimbeni chabwo chili chimbeni che kumulilo,
kumulilo kukwirika lukali.
Kameechi kamakali se kanyala kasimia busiime tawe,
namwe kameechi kakechula se kanyala kabusimia tawe.
Kaaba bali omundu akhaka khukula busiime,
kimiaandu kioosi kie munju mwewe kiliwa busa,
mala anyoole chisoni.
Efwe khuli no mukhaana wefwe,
mala se ali ne kamaturu tawe.
Khulikholela siina omwana wefwe yuno,
mu ndaalo niyo baliicha khumuselela?
Aaba ne ali lisiisi,
khuliombakhakho lukoba lwe fwesa,
ne kakhali aaba kumuliango,
khulimusirira lumako lwe kimitarakwa.
Ese naba lisiisi,
ne kamaturu kase kaba nga chindeleelwa,
nio mu moni chewe naba oreera kumuleembe.
Solomoni aba ne siluundu sie kimisabibu e Baali-hamoni,
apa siluundu kumusiingo khu baliindi be bibiaamo,
buli mulala alaka khureera bitonyi eelefu ndala bie fwesa.
Siluundu siase sie kimisabibu sili sisiase, sisiase samwene,
ewe, Ee, Solomoni, onyala waba ne eelefu,
ne baliindi be biluundu chimia chibili.
Ee, ewe ooli mu biluundu,
babasiaase berekekhe khuulila kumumilo kwowo.
Musiime wase, khola khangu,
mala obe nga kicheu namwe emboongo eng'ana,
khu bikulu khwe bing'aa bulayi.

Ulila, Ee likulu, ne rekeeresia Ee sibala,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali,
“Babaana nabalela ne khubakhusia,
ne kakhali bangalukhaanekho.
Eeyi emanyile owakibaya,
ne epunda emanyile lulweelo nilwo omwami wayo akilisiliakho.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli se bamanyile tawe,
babaandu base se baulila tawe.”
Aah, ekholo emayaanu,
babaandu babasuta kamamayaanu,
lisaaye lie bamayaanu,
babaana babakoyaana!
Banjuukhe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
bafwoochoole Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli,
mala bamulekeele elala.
Siina sikila muchiililile khukhupwa?
Ne musichiililila khukhunjekaana?
Isiraeli kumurwe kwowo kwoosi kulwala,
ne kumwoyo kwoosi kwabeleele.
Khukhwama mu siikhandakilo khukhwola khu lubotoosi,
mbao bulamu tawe,
ne kakhali khung'ukhaka ne kamabiimba,
ne kamakoonjo kakebeena,
se kasiingiilwe namwe se kaboebwe tawe,
namwe se kaakhibwe kamafura tawe.
Sibala sienywe sianjuukhwe,
chingoba chenywe chayiile
baakwa bayaaya kamaloba kenywe mumoni chenywe,
sibala sianjuukhwe sikila bakeni basibuniisie.
Yerusalemu lwaramire,
nga khasali mu liruuti lie kumusabibu
nga enju mu siluundu sie kamaoondo,
nga lukoba nilwo banamae babotookheleesie.
khwakhabunile nga Sodomu ne Komora.
Yerusalemu, babaami bowo ne babaandu bowo bali nga abo ba Sodomu ne Komora.
Ulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akhuboolela.
Rekeeresia niko Wele wefwe alikho akhwekesia.
nicho muchiililila khu khumbaanila?
Nanyalikhe ne biianwa bienywe bie kamakheese,
nibio mwosia nga chimbosio,
nende bie kiminaawa kie bibiaayo bienywe bilayi,
naluiiliile ne kamalasile ke chiuunwa,
ne kamakheese ne chimbusi.
Naanu omuboolele munderere bibiindu bino bioosi ne mwiicha khukhusaaya?
Naanu omuboolele khukeendakeenda khuno mu Lukaangu mwase?
Mbao bukhala khukhunderera biianwa bienywe tawe.
Nasinyiikhe ne kumuuya kwe bupaani nibwo mwosia,
se nyala nekhaliilikha naikara chenywe che kumwesi kumuya, chisabato chenywe,
nende libuusiana lienywe lie dini,
bioosi biabiyile khubeela bumayaanu bwenywe.
Nabiila chinaikara chenywe che kumwesi kumuya,
ne chindaalo chindakatifu chabeele chisiro khwise:
Naluiiliile khukhwekhaliilikha.
“Ne musuta kamakhono kenywe ne muli mu lisaba se khamubone tawe,
mwakhaba ne musaba kamasaba kamakali,
se ndirekeeresia tawe.
Sikila kamakhono kenywe kechula sifuki.
Yesiinga mumiliie.
Lekha bikholwa bimayaanu bino bioosi!
Nibio ndikho mbona ne mukhola.
Lekha khukhola bumayaanu.
Yeyika khukhola kamalayi,
yiima bung'ali,
rusiao bumiinikhi,
kholela bafuubi bung'ali bwabwe,
lundi babila banamulekhwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Yiicha nono khakhung'oone kakeefwe,
bubwoni bwenywe bwakhaba bubesemu lukali,
bulaba bawaanga chwe nga kamaarara;
bwakhaba bubesemu nga kamafuki,
bulaba buwaanga chererere nga efwamba.
Ne mwaba ne mufukiilila mala mwandia,
mulalia bibiaamo bilayi khukhwama mu liloba.
Ne mwaba ne mundekha,
mulaela muwe.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nalomile.”
Lukoba lulwaba lulweyikinwa
lwabeele nga omutaamba!
Lulwaba ne lwechula babaandu baluungi khale,
nekhali luno lulimo babeeri bong'ene.
Yerusalemu khale waba nga efwesa,
ne khali luno soli ne bukhala tawe,
waba nga endali endayi, luno oli busa nga kameechi.
Babemeelesi bowo bali bareengu,
lundi bali basaale be babeefwi,
Buli ndaalo bafukiilila biianwa,
nende chi asoya.
Se bababila bafuubi mu koti tawe,
namwe se barekeeresia kamalilo ke banamulekhwa tawe.
Nono luno rekeeresia niko
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele we kamaani owa Isiraeli, aloma:
“Nja khumweacha enywe basiku base,
mala se mulanania lundi tawe.
Ndamuukuuma. Ndamumiliia
nga sichuuma siing'oonangwa,
ne khurusiao bumayaanu bwenywe bwoosi.
Ndakhuelesia babemeelesi ne bakambisi nga bakhale abo.
Enyuma wako Yerusalemu lulilaangwa lukoba luluungi lundi lusuubilwa.”
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omuluungi,
akhaonie Yerusalemu na buli mundu olimo owekanila.
Ne kakhali alibunia buli mundu okhola bumayaanu
ne khumuchaama, aliira buli mundu omulekha.
Mukhaambisibwe chisoni khulwe kimikhoonge nikio mwasangalilanga,
ne mukhabe ne chisoni khulwe biluundu nibio muroboore.
Okhoome nga kumukhoonge,
lundi nga siluundu nisio bakhachukhangamo kameechi tawe.
Nga efuungo neambisibwa ne chinjaso,
kaliba kario babaandu be kamaani balibunisibwa,
ne bikholwa biabwe biibi, mala salibao na mulala,
onyala wakamia libuna lino tawe.

Buno nibwo burume nibwo Wele aelesia omung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amozi abona khu Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Mundaalo chichiicha,
sikulu sie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
siliba sileeyi mu bikulu bioosi,
Silisutwa sibe angaaki we bikulu bioosi,
ne chikholo choosi chilisiichakho.
Babaandu bakali baliicha mala balome bali,
“Yiicha khuche khu sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
mu Lukaangu lwa Wele owa Yakobo.
Nio akhwekesie efwe chingila chewe,
lundi nio khukeende mungila chewe.”
Sikila kamekisio ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kama Yerusalemu
ne khukhwama Sayuni alomaloma khu baandu bewe,
mala alimala kimisaango kie chikholo chingali,
ne chimbalu chabwe, balichikaluukhasia chibe chimbako,
ne kamafumo kabwe kabe chingeso chekhukhalisilia.
Sibala se silibanulila sibala sisiindi embalu tawe,
namwe se silieyika ke liie lundi tawe.
Ee enju eya Yakobo,
Yiicha, khukeende mu buwaanga bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ee Wele, ewe walobile babaandu bowo,
be nju eya Yakobo,
Sikila beechula bulakusi khukhwama ebukwe,
ne bafumu be bubeeyi nga Bafilisiti,
lundi basifukiilisiana ne bakeni.
Sibala siabwe siechulamo efwesa ne sahabu,
ne buiinda bwabwe buli bukali,
Sibala siabwe siechulamo chifarasi,
ne kamakaari kabwe ke liie kali kamakali.
Sibala siabwe siechulamo bifwaani,
besaaya kimilimo kie kamakhono kabwe,
khu niko babeene bakhola ne chinjala chabwe.
Buli sia mulala akhaambwe chisoni,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhababeela tawe!
mala mwikise asi,
khukhwama khu lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khukhwama khu luyali lwe bubwami bwewe.
Ekibonio yo mundu ekhekhisibwe,
ne khukhwilola khwe babaandu khuliboombisibwa,
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene niye oliebwa luyali mu ndaalo eyo.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae ali ne ndaalo,
khu babelola ne babebonia,
siosi siosi silieniinia siliikhisibwa,
khu mirongooro kimitarakwa kia Lebanoni,
kimileeyi lukali,
khu mikhoonge kimiboofu kia Baasha,
khu bikulu bileeyi bioosi,
ne khungulu chindeeyi choosi,
khu buli endeleelwa endeeyi,
ne khu buli lisiisi lisire,
khu buli meeli chosi cha Tarishishi,
ne khu buli chimeeli chosi chichakholwa bulayi,
ne khukhwebonia khwo mundu,
ne khukhwilola khwe babaandu khuliboombisibwa,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene niye olinyoola luyali mu ndaalo ng'eneyo,
ne bifwaani biliwelao elala.
Ne babaandu baliekisa mu mabina ke mu nyanda,
ne mu maloo khukhwilukha liriisia lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
ne khu luyali lwe bubwami bwewe,
nga nalinyokha khuteremia sibala.
Khu ndaalo eyo babaandu balimwaata bifwaani biabwe bie efwesa ne sahabu,
nibio beng'oonela babeene khubisaaya.
Balibimwaatila chifukho ne wambuto.
Baliekisa mu mabina ke chinyaanda,
ne munjafwa che kamabaale kamaleeyi,
khukhwilukha liriisia lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khukhwama khu luyali lwe bubwami bwewe,
nga ne alinyokha khuteremia sibala.
Lekha khukhweyikina omundu,
oeela kumuuya busa.
Ali nabukhala siina?

Nono lola Omwami, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae,
alikho arusia mu Yerusalemu ne mu Yuda,
buli siindu ne buli mundu niyo banyoolangakho buyeeti.
Biakhulia bioosi nibio balichanga.
Ne kameechi koosi niko banywechanga.
Babaandu be kamaani ne banamae,
bakhalaki ne bang'oosi,
balakusi ne basaakhulu,
bakhulu be banamae kamakhumi karaano,
ne babaandu be lukoosi,
bakeleki be babaandu bamanyile kamaya lukali,
ne balakusi bakesikesi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alifukiilila basoleeli babe babaami babwe,
ne babaana batiiti balibamiia.
Babaandu bacha khukhupisiana sibi,
Baele balabelekeela basaakhulu,
ne babaandu bakhali na siosi se baliria be lukoosi tawe.
Omundu alirobora wandaaye,
owe munju yabwe mala amuboleele ali,
“Ewe olikho ne ngubo,
khoobe omwimeelesi wefwe,
ne kamakuunda kano kakhabe asi we bubwami bwowo.”
Mu siise esio alibakobosia ne aloma ali,
“Se ndaba omuonia wenywe tawe,
munju mwase mbamo siakhulia namwe engubo tawe:
Se mulakhola mbe omwimeelesi wenywe tawe.”
Yerusalemu lwabunile,
ne Yuda yakwile,
Sikila lilomaloma ne bikholwa biabwe,
bili biibi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Balekelesia khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne luyali lwewe.
Khutamba bung'ali bwabwe mu bukhalaki buba buloli khu nibo,
Bakhola bumayaanu simwamu busa nga Sodomu,
se babukisakho tawe.
Silaamo sibe khu beene,
sikila babeene bereerera kamamayaanu.
Boolela baluungi oli bulaba bulayi
Sikila bakhalie lituunda lie kamalayi kabwe.
Bamayaanu balaamwe!
Baliba mu sibi,
sikila kamabi niko bakholela babaandu kalikholekha khu beene.
Babaandu base-babaana bali bakuluumi khu nibo,
ne bakhasi babaamiia.
Enywe baandu base, babemeelesi benywe bamutiimia,
ne bamurusia khungila che bung'ali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emile mu bweyaangu bwewe,
khukhalakila babaandu bewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arakikha bukhalaki khu basaakhulu,
ne babaana be babaami be babaandu bewe:
“Enywe ninywe mu mwonaka kumukuunda kwe kimisabibu,
mala chinju chenywe chechulamo bibiindu nibio mwanuula bataambi.
Omwami WELE owe banamae aloma ali,
muli na sifuno siina sie khuswalakilila babaandu base,
sie khumiinakilisia bataambi?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali:
“Sikila bakhaana ba Yerusalemu bali ne kukwebonio!
Bakeenda basutile kamakosi angaaki,
ne khumokamoka chimoni che bueeyi,
ne likeenda lie kukwebonio,
ne bapania chindeekwe khu bikele biabwe.
Khwako Wele acha khuelesia bibioole bakhaana be Yerusalemu,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, acha khwekesia sichula siabwe.”
Endaalo elikho yiicha niyo omwami acha khurusia khu bakhasi be mu Yerusalemu buli sisiindu nisio beboneseliangakho lukali. Bie khukhwesaa nga chinaalo nende nibio befwaranga mu kheng'engele, ne bibiuuma bie mu makosi bitambaa bie murwe.
Bitati, bikamata, bitambaa bie mu mukhono. Alarusiao lububi lwabwe.
Ne chikofio chabwe, chipangili, ne chikhoba che munda, chichupa che kamafura ke khukwiakha kaunya bulayi, ne chiriisi.
Kamamili niko bafwara khu njala chabwe, ne mu moolu mwabwe.
Chikutuusi chabwe chingwalaafu, chingubo chindeeyi, ne chingabulila ne chindayi,
chingubo chichekesia, chingubo cha katani, bileemba, ne chingubo che lububi.
Mu bwangu bwe kamafura ke khukhwiakha kaunya bulayi balaunya bubi.
Mu bwangu bwe chikhoba che munda chingwalaafu, balibooela kumukoye.
Mu bwangu bwe khuba ne lichuune lilayi balaba ne bibioole.
Mu bwangu bwe chingubo chingwalaafu, balafwara bitasi,
lukoondo lwabwe lulayi lulakaluukhana lwikele chisoni!
Baseecha benywe bakheerwe ne mbalu.
Ne be kamaani benywe bakhafwiile mwiie.
Bilibwa bie lukoba bilisooma ne khulila,
ne lukoba lulwene luliba nga omukhasi owikhaale asi khu sibala sichula.

Siise sikhoole bakhasi saba balikhayila khu museecha mulala mala bamuboolele bali, “Efwe khuleliisia ne khukhwifwara fwabeene, nosiima lekha busa khulangilwe khu lisina liowo, nio okhurusiekho chisoni.”
Mu ndaalo echo lusakia lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukhabe lulayi lundi lwe luyali. Ne simelwa sie mukuunda siikhasangaasie ne khurera luyali khu ba Isiraeli babarama.
Buli mundu olilekhwa mu Sayuni, olirama Yerusalemu alilaangwa omutakatifu ne buli mundu niye lisina liewe liaandikwa khulwe bulamu mu Yerusalemu.
Nga Omwami akhasiinge bumayaanu bwe bakhaana ba Sayuni, akhasiinge sifuki khukhwama mu Yerusalemu. Ang'oone lukoba ne Roho we bukhalaki ne kumulilo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alafuunikha sikulu sia Sayuni nende abo boosi babebuusiisie ebweeneyo ne lifuumbi mu siise sie kumuusi ne liliisi ne lumemu lwe chinjaso mu silo. Luyali lwoosi lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lulifunikha ne khukhiingilila buli siindu.
Lukhabe lulama lwe khulolelamo kumuumu kumuusi. Lundi lukhabe abuundu we khukhwilukhilao ne nju eye khukhwiyikama efula ne khuungu.

khuloondekhana ne liruuti lie kimisabibu kiewe.
Omusiime wase aba ne liruuti lie kimisabibu,
khu sikulu sie engakha engali.
Alilima ne khurusiamo kamabaale,
mala abiaalamo kimisabibu kimilayi:
ombakha akari wakio endeleelwa eye khulindilakho,
ayabamo liloo lie khukhamululilamo endali,
nio alindiilila liame chisabibu,
ne kakhali kumukuunda okwo kwama kamatuunda kamalulu.
Ne luno, bamenywa ba Yerusalemu ne babaandu ba Yuda,
musaba, mukhalake, akari wase ne kumukuunda kwase kwe kimisabibu.
Siina sisiindi sienyekhana khole mumukuunda kwase,
nisio khakhola tawe?
Nga nakuliindilila kwame chisabibu,
siina sikila ne kwaamile kamatuunda kamalulu?
Ne luno ndamuboolela nisio ndakhola khu liruuti liase lie kimisabibu.
Ndarusiao lumako lwalio,
mala lilonakwa.
Ndatechula lisiisi liakwo,
mala balakutula.
Ndakulekha enyoonyi esimbemo,
se ndakusonjoola namwe se ndakwakila tawe,
embululwe ne kamawa bilikhulamo,
Lundi ndalaka kamafuumbi, kalobe khurera efula mu mukuunda okwo.
Kumukuunda kwe kimisabibu kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae kuli enju eya Isiraeli,
ne babaandu ba Yuda bali sibiaalwa sisiimisia,
mala alindiilila bakhole bung'ali,
ne kakhali bakhola kakhali ng'ali tawe,
alindiilila khubona buluungi ne kakhali abona sifuki.
Bali ne silaamo abo bakula chinju ne khutasa khu chiindi,
ne kimikuunda ne batasa khu kiindi,
Khukhwola nga ne bamala koosi,
nio okundi yesi yesi se anyoola niio amenya tawe,
mala bamenya bong'ene mu mikuunda.
Nauliile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali ne echuba ali,
“Ng'ali chinju chingali chicha khurama busa,
chinju chimboofu chindayi se chilabamo babaandu tawe.
Sikila chieeka kumi che kumukuunda kwe kimisabibu,
chilaama sikono silala,
Ne lumicho lulala lulaama endubi ndala yong'ene.”
Bali ne silaamo abo babenyokha makhelebeende,
khuyiima enguuli,
banywa khukhwola siilo khukhwola nga bameela!
Bali ne siilili ne lituungu,
etamburini, kumulele ne ndali mu naikara chabwe,
ne se bebaasia khu bikholwa bia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namwe khubona kimilimo kiewe tawe.
Khwako babaandu base bacha mu mbaambe khulwe khutaamba limanya,
Babaandu babwe be lukoosi balafwichanga enjala,
ne babaandu babwe bakali bali ne bulesia.
Khwako emakoombe yabeele ne kameelu kamakali ke khubalia,
mala yasaame kumunwa kwayo kwabalaayile lukali,
ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu bakoosi,
ne babaandi boosi ba Yerusalemu balacha emakoombe,
alala ne busangaafu bwabwe na buli mundu owekhoyela Yerusalemu.
Buli mundu alafwa kumwoyo, mala alaambwa chisoni,
ne babaandu balaboombia bunyali,
ne abo babelola balaambwa chisoni.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae aebwe luyali mu bung'ali,
ne Wele omutakatifu weyokesie omwene khuba omutakatifu, khulwe khukhola kamaluungi.
Nio kamameeme kalaaya nga mu mayilwe mwako,
ne chimoosi ne chimeeme chilaaya mu makuunda.
Bali ne silaamo abo bareera bumayaanu ne kimikoye kie bubeeyi,
abo bakhweesa bumayaanu nga bakhweesa kimikoye kia korokocho.
Baloma bali, “Lekha akhole khaangu,
lekha akhole khangu mu milimo kiewe,
nio efwe khubone,
lekha sifuno sio Mutakatifu owa Isiraeli ne sicha,
lekha siche siimbi nio khusimanye!”
Bali ne silaamo abo balanga bumayaanu bali bulayi
ne bulayi bali bumayaanu,
bakhola sisiilima khuba buwaanga,
ne buwaanga khuba sisiilima.
Balaanga bululu bali bunulu,
ne bunulu bali bululu!
Bali ne silaamo abo babekhola bakesi,
ne bekhola bakesikesi lukali ebweeni wabwe babeene,
bali ne silaamo abo babekhola bamanyile lukali khunywa endali,
ne bamanyile lukali khutubaanisia kamalwa,
baelesia bung'ali omumayaanu, nio banyoole asoya,
ne khukhwimana omuluungi bung'ali bwewe.
Khwako, nga kumulilo ne kwoosia chikhaanja,
ne nga bunyaasi bubwoomu ne bumamulukha mu mulilo,
nono kumuli kwabwe kuli nga bubolo.
Ne khumulikha khwabwe khutamuukha busa nga lufuumbi.
Sikila balobile lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae,
mala balekelesia elomo yo Mutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne lirima khu baandu bewe,
mala asuta kumukhono kwewe abaape,
ne bikulu biaterema,
ne bafu baabwe baba nga kamaandu,
mu chingila che mu lukoba.
Khu kano koosi, lirima liewe likhaawa tawe,
Ne asiisuta busa kumukhono abaape.
Alokesia simanyisio khu sibala,
siili aleeyi mala ape kumulusi asilaange siiche,
khukhwama aleeyi mu sibala,
ne lola, silikho siicha khangu.
Mbao oluyile namwe owituyile tawe,
mbao ouungula namwe okona tawe,
mbao engubo emboela etebateba tawe,
mbao lukhoba lwe chingata lulwakhalikha tawe,
buembo bwabwe buli bubwooki,
buyiingo bwabwe bwoosi bwerekekhe khulasa,
bikhakayu bie chifarasi chabwe bili nga kamabaale,
Ne bikele bie kamakaari kabwe ke liie bili nga sisifuusia.
Liulukhuma lie banamae lili nga lie etalang'i,
baulukhuma nga chitalang'i chindoro,
chongolela mala chifwakhila esaang'i,
chisuta chirekukha nayo mala mbao onyala achinuula tawe,
khu ndaalo ng'eneyo, baliulukhuma khu ba Isiraeli,
nga khuoloola khwe nyanja.
Ne omundu aaba ne alola khu sibala,
alibona sisiilima ne butinyu,
ne buwaanga bulafuunikhwa ne kamafuumbi.

Bibuumbe bie chimemu biaba biamwimileo biamubotookheleele, buli silala khu nibio siaba ne chindaa sita. Buli sibuumbe siafuunikha mu moni mwasio ne chindaa chibili, ne siafuunikha kumubili kwasio ne chindaa chibili, mala siarumikhira chichiindi chibili khupurukha.
“Omutakatifu, Omutakatifu, Omutakatifu!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe kamae ke mwikulu ali omutakatifu!
Luyali lwewe lwechula sibala.”
Ese naloma ndi, “Ese silaamo sianyoola! Sikila ndi omutibi, buli nilio ndoma lili limayaanu ne namenya akari we bamayaanu mala, ese naboone Omwami, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe kamae ne chimoni chase!”
Nio silala khu bibuumbe bie chimemu siapurukha siekha asi niio ese ndi, siasutiile lilianda lilising'eng'ile mukhono nilio siabukulila luani khukhwama khu alutare.
Nio siandiisia lilianda lilising'eeng'ile elio khu minwa kiase mala siaboola sili, “Lino lietiilile khu minwa kiowo ne luno bumayaanu bwowo bwarurireo mala bumayaanu bwowo bwabeleelwe.”
Nio naulila Omwami ne aloma ali, “Ese ndaruma naanu? Naanu olaba omurumwa wefwe?” Ese nakobosia ndi, “Ese ndi ano, ndume ese!”
‘Enywe mwakhaba ne murekeeresia muriena, se mulaulila tawe.
Mwakhaba ne muloleelela muriena, se mulamanya silikho siikholekha tawe.’ ”
Nio amboolela ali, “Khola babaandu bano balendaale,
minyaasia kamaru kabwe ne khu bofusia chimoni chabwe, nio bakhabona, baulila namwe bamanya tawe.
Bakhola bario bangobolela mala nabaonia.”
Ese nareeba ndi, “Omwami lilabukula siise sina?”
Angobosia ali,
“Khukhwola nga chingoba chitechulwe chekela kamakubili ne khukhwanjukhwa,
chiliba busa khwasie mundumo tawe,
khukhwola nga sibala silianjukhwa sisiimbe busa.
Ese ndayila babaandu aleeyi mala khole sibala sioosi sianjukhwe busa ao.
Akhaba omundu mulala khu baandu ekhumi narama mu sibala,
niye yesi alabuna,
alaba nga sichikhi sie kumukhoonge.”
Sichikhi siakwo siliba nga lumiicho lutakatifu.

Nga Ahasi omwami owa Yuda ne baulila bali Siria baambaanile ne Efuraimu besiindukha kimiooyo, baba ne buuri bukali alala ne babaandu babwe besisiikha busa nga kimirongooro kie mu musiru nikio ekhuungu euucha.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Isaya ali, “Ewe cha, no mwana wowo Sheari-yashubu mwakaanane no mwami Ahasi. Mulamunyoola khu miila ambi niio baasonanga chingubo bekhalanga khundulo khwe kumutaaro kuureeranga kameechi khukhwama mu litiisi lie ngaaki.
Mala omuboolele oli yerekekha, otiile kumwoyo, okharia tawe, lundi okhafwa kumwoyo sikila lirima lio mwami Reseni ne Basiria bewe nende lio mwami Peka se lili lundi lie basiku khukhila liliisi liliama khu bichikhi bibili bibising'eeng'ela mu mulilo kalaa.
Sikila Siria ne Efuraimu ne okhwa Ramalia bekhochochile bakholile ekwangwaani embi khwiwe ne khuloma bali,
lekha khuche khwibwaakale Yuda khulurikhirisie, lekha khuluule lube lulwefwe mala khwamiie omwana owa Tabeeli abe omwami akari walwo.”
Omwami WELE aboola ali,
“Lino se lilabao tawe,
ne se lilakholekha tawe.
Sikila kamaani ka Siria kali Damasika,
kamaani ka Damasika kali Reseni.
(Mu siise sie kimiiko kie kamakhumi sita na kiraano Efuraimu ekhamalwe kamaani mala se liba lundi ekholo tawe.)
Ne kamaani ka Efuraimu kali Samaria.
Ne kamaani ka Samaria kali omwami Peka okhwa Ramalia.
Ne enywe barangirisi ba Yuda, mwaba ne mukhasuubila, ng'ali buyeeti bwenywe bulawao.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma burume bubuundi khu mwami Ahasi naboola ali,
“Reeba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo, simanyisio siakhaba ne sili asi nga emakoombe namwe angaaki nga mwikulu.”
Ne Ahasi akobosia ali, “Ese sendareeba simanyisio tawe, mala se ndakhaka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
Khwilio Isaya akobosia ali, “Ee enju eya Daudi rekeeresia! Mwakholile busa sisiindu sitiiti khunaania babaandu lundi mwenya khunaania ne Wele wase yesi?
Khwako Omwami omwene alakhuelesia simanyisio. Lola omukhaana owe yabwana alaesia mala asaale omwana omusoleeli ne olimutiuukha oli, ‘Emanueli’
Nga naliba nachoile oole khumanya bumayaanu ne bulayi, alilia libonda ne bubuukhi.
Sikila ebweeni omwana chana oyo ne akhamanya nga naloba bumayaanu ne khurobora bulayi tawe, bibala bia Isiraeli ne Siria nibio ewe oriire bilianjukhwa.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho acha khukhureerera ewe ne khu baandu bowo ne be nju eye bubwami yoosi chindaalo che butinyu bukhabaakhoo khukhwama mu ndaalo nicho bubwami bwa Isiraeli bwaukhila khukhwama khu Yuda tawe. Alikho acha khureera omwami owa Ashuru khu baapa.”
Mu ndaalo eyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alipa kumulusi asakule Bamisiri beche nga chiisi khukhwama aleeyi niio luluuchi lwa Naili lwakabukhanilamo chisakia ne lundi alisakula Baashuru beche khukhwama mu sibala siabwe nga enjukhi.
Mala boosi baliicha bamaasie mu matooma, mu mabina ke chinyaanda ne mu bichakha bie kamawa ne khu mayilwe koosi.
Mu ndaalo eyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliamisia omubeki khukhwama engelekha we luluuchi lwa Efurati omwami owe Baashuru eche ne lubeko amubeke enywe lichuune, kamaswa ke khu bikele akhaba ne bunwanwa bwosi.
Mu ndaalo eyo omubayi alirama ne khaafu ndala ne kamakheese kabili,
ne sikila bukali bwe kamabeele niko chilikhamwa, alilia libonda lie kamabeele, sikila buli mundu oolirama mu sibala alilia libonda ne bubuukhi.
Mu ndaalo eyo buli abuundu niio liruuti lie kimisabibu liaba, kimisabibu kikioolaana bukusi bwe fwesa eelefu ndala, liruuti lienelio liliikela embululwe ne kamawa.
Babaandu balibanula buyiingo ne buembo bache baayeyo, sikila sibala sioosi silifunikhwa ne mbululwe ne kamawa.
Ne bikulu bioosi nibio balimanga solichayo tawe, sikila oliria embululwe ne kamawa. Ne kakhali aliba abuundu e khukhwaya chikhaafu ne kamakheese.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Bukula sisiindu sie khuandikakho siboofu mala oandikekho chinyukuta chimboofu, oli, ‘Reka Khangu Nuula Khangu.’
Bukula babaandu babili babeyiikinwa, omusaayi Uria, ne Sakaria okhwa Yeberekia babe baloli bowo.”
Nio naaba no mukhasi wase omung'oosi, aesia mala asaala omwana owe seecha. Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Mutiuukhe lisina oli, ‘Reka Khangu Nuula Khangu.’
Sikila omwana oyo nakhachoa amanya khulaanga ali, Paapa namwe maayi tawe, kimiaandu kia Damasika ne biyayilwe mu Samaria, bikhabukulwe ebweni lwo mwami owa Ashuru mala bache ne nabio.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andomalomakho lundi.
Aloma ali, “Sikila babaandu bano balobile kameechi ke khakhechi kha Shiloa kakeekha busa kalaa, mala baterema ebweeni wo mwami Reseni no mwami Peka,
khwako, lola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alareera omwami owa Ashuru ne banamae bewe boosi khukhwibwaakala Yuda. Balaba busa oli luluuchi lwa Efurati ne lwichuule.
Balimalaatana nga kumukhula kukwichuule buli sikiingi, baleeya mu Yuda nga kumukhula kukwichuule kumale buli siindu. Wele ali ne nafwe!” Alabambula chindaa chewe chiliinde sibala.
Enywe chikholo yibuusia alala mu buri!
Enywe bibala bie aleeyi rekeeresia
banula mwirekekhe khukhupana mala mweboombie mu buri!
Banula murekekha khukhupana mala mweboombie mu buri.
Yerekekha! Ne se balakhola siindu tawe.
Lomaloma elomo ne selaba ne bukhala tawe,
sikila Wele ali ne nafwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi angaania ne kumukhono kwewe ali okhaloonda chingila che babaandu bano tawe. Aloma ali,
“Ewe okhaambaana ne babaandu bano mu kwangwaani yosi yosi niyo nibo balanga bali ekwangwaani tawe namwe mukharia nisio nibo baria tawe, namwe mukhaba mu khuterema tawe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae niye mukhoyele mumanye muli ali Omutakatifu. Khabe niye muria lundi abe niye muteremera.
Ne ndiba bubwilukhilo lundi nga libaale nilio babaandu betuyakho, ese ndi nga kumureko kulitiila babaandu be bubwami bwa Yuda ne Isiraeli ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu.
Bakali balituya balikwa bafunikhake. Bakhaambwe mala bayilwe mu mbaambe.”
Enywe baloondi base, mukhoyeele mulinde lundi mube ne burume bwa Wele nibwo ambeele.
Ndalindiilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi olikho okisa bubweeni bwewe khunju ya Yakobo. Ndara lilieyikina liase khu niye.
Ne babaandu ne bakhuboolela bali, “Reeba bamakoombe, balosi, babeera kimimilo ne khumoonya,” Babaandu se benyekha bareebe wele wabwe tawe ku? Benyekha bareebe bafu khu ke balamu tawe ku?
Ewe bakobosie oli, “Rekeeresia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akhwekesia! Mukharekeeresia bimakoombe tawe niko bamuboolela se kalamuyeeta bulayi bwosi bwosi tawe.”
Babaandu balibira mu sibala ne bafwiile kimiooyo ne bali ne bubeeleli, ne njala. Munjala yabwe ne lirima balilaama omwami wabwe ne bawele wabwe. Mala balikalama mungaaki,
namwe balilola asi ne se balibona sisiindu siosi siosi tawe ne bukhali butinyu ne sisiilima siriisia mu nisio balikho bayilwamo khu sibala.

Mu siise sisiabira Wele areerera sibala sie kholo eya Sebuluni ne kholo eya Nafutali chisoni ne mu siise simaliilisi alireera lukoosi lukali mu bibala bino, khukhwama khu nyanja eya Shamu khukhwola sie ngelekha owa Yoritani, akhaba Kalilaya sisiene nisio baakwa bamenyilemo.
Abo babamenyanga mu siilima sikali luno buwaanga bwabakhosiisiekho.
Wele ewe wakuchiisie ekholo,
ewe watasile liliekhoya liayo.
Bekhoyela ebweeni wowo,
nga liliekhoya lie likesa,
nga babaandu ne bekhoya ne balikho ne bakabana nibio bayaayile mwiie.
Sikila ewe wafunile lichooki liliabasitoela,
alala nende esiimbo eyabaapa kamabeka, eyo mukuluumi wabwe.
Ewe waulile ekholo eyananiaanga,
ne khuyaaya bie babaandu bowo,
bulayi bwene busa nga khale ne waula ekholo eye Bamidiani.
Buli siraaro sia buli omunamae sisiarumikha mwiie,
lundi buli engubo eyetuba kamafuki, biliya nga kamafura ke kumulilo.
Mwifwe omwana asaalilwe!
Khwaelesebwe omusoleeli,
ne bubwami buliba khu mabeka kewe,
ne lisina liewe lililaangwa bali, “Omukaambisi owe Khuukia,”
“Wele Wanyala Bioosi,”
“Paapa owa Mindali,”
“Omwami owe Kumuleembe.”
Alikobola khu bwami bwa Daudi,
ne bunyali bwewe buliba bwe bung'ali ne buluungi,
khukhwama luno mala bubeeo mindali na mindali.
Silukuluku sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Owe kamae ke mwikulu nisio silikhola kano koosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arumire bukhalaki khu Yakobo,
mala bukhabe khu Isiraeli.
Ne babaandu boosi balibumanya,
Efuraimu ne bamenyile mu Samaria.
Baalomela mu khweniinia ne mu busilu bwe kumwoyo bali,
“Chinju che kamatifari chakwiile,
ne efwe khukhakobosieo che kamabaale kamabeeche.
Bisiindi bie kimikhuyu biaremirwe,
ne efwe khukhakobosieo bie kumutarakwa biangafu.”
Nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arera basiku ba Reseni babebwaakale,
mala aachilisia basiku babwe.
Baashuru khukhwama e bukwe ne Bafilisiti khukhwama mumbo,
basame kiminwa kiabwe bamile Isiraeli.
Kakhaba kario lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi likhoola khu siakamo tawe,
ne asibekesielela kumukhono khubaa kumunaanio.
Babaandu se bakobolela oyo owabapa tawe.
Namwe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae tawe.
Nono mundaalo ndala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alapia siibi Isiraeli,
ne barangirisi basio,
ne babaandu basio,
alarema kumurwe ne kumukhiinga kwayo.
Omusaakhulu owe lukoosi ali kumurwe,
ne omung'oosi owekisianga bubeeyi ali kumukhiinga!
Sikila abo babarangirira babaandu bano,
babatiimia mala babakoyaanisilia elala.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alasangaalila baele babwe tawe,
ne se alakholela bafuubi ne banamulekhwa siisa tawe,
sikila buli mulala ali omumayaanu lundi akhola kamabi,
ne buli sisiindu nisio baloma sili sie busilu.
Khukano koosi, lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se liakamao tawe,
ne asibekesielela kumukhono kwewe.
Sikila bubi bwoselela nga kumulilo,
bwosia embululwe ne kamawa, buambia bichakha ne kumusiru,
mala liliisi liabio lieulukusa mungaaki.
Sikila lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae,
sibala siosiibwe,
ne babaandu bali nga chiikhu che kumulilo.
Se aliio na mulala okholela wandaaye siisa tawe.
Buli abuundu mu sibala,
babaandu balanuula ne khulia buli sitonyi sie siakhulia nisio banyala banyoola,
ne se bekura tawe.
Bakhalia babaana babwe babene se balekura tawe.
Babaandu ba Manase ne babaandu ba Efuraimu balebwaakalana,
ne enyuma boombi balebwaakala Yuda.
Mala khulwe kano koosi, lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se liakamao tawe,
asibekesielela busa kumukhono kwewe.

Bali ne silaamo abo babekhochoocha ne khurao kamalaka kamakhiikha,
ne babaandi bachiilililanga khuandika ke khukhupia sibi babaandu base!
Mukhiingilila bataambi khunyoola bung'ali ne buluungi bwabwe.
Muyaayanga murio kimiaandu kie banamulekhwa ne bafuubi.
Enywe mulakhola siina mu ndaalo niyo Wele alamuelesia siiukuumo.
Enywe mulakhola siina nga ndamureerera embembeesi eye butinyu khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi?
Mulelukhila wa naanu munyooleyo buyeeti?
Mulakisa wae kimiaandu kienywe?
Mbao sisiindu sisiindi tawe ne kakhali mwakhaba ne mwekisa mu baboe namwe mwakhakwa mu bafu.
Kakhaba kario lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se liliakamao tawe,
asibokeselela busa kumukhono kwewe khubaukuuma.
Ese ndumikhira Ashuru nga esiimbo khuukuuma abo nibo naambila lirima.
Ese nduma Ashuru khukhwibwaakala ekholo ekhamanyile Wele tawe,
babaandu babakhola ese naambwa lirima.
Ndabaruma bayaaye lundi beebe ne khuswalakilila babaandu nga eng'unda eye khu ngila.”
Ne Omwami owa Ashuru se ali ne lirekekha liewe,
namwe libaasia liewe khukhola kano tawe,
ne kakhali arekeekhe khubunia chikholo chingali.
Ebuyila ali, “Buli mundu khu bemeelesi base ali omwami?
Naula chingoba cha Kalino, Karikemishi,
chingoba cha Hamati ne Aripadi,
naula Samaria ne Damasika.
Nakololosia kumukhono kwase khuukuuma bubwami obwo busaaya bifwaani,
bifwaani bikali bikhila bia Yerusalemu ne Samaria.
Nabunia Samaria ne bifwaani biasio bioosi,
ne ndakhola ndio Yerusalemu ne bifwaani nibio basaayanga ebweeneyo.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Nga nemala nisio ndikho khola khu sikulu sia Sayuni ne mu Yerusalemu ndiukuuma omwami owa Ashuru khulwe liliebuyila liewe lioosi, ne liliebonia liewe.”
Omwami owa Ashuru ebuyila ali,
“Ese samwene wakholile koosi kano ne kamaani ke kumukhono kwase, sikila ndi omukesi,
narusiisieo chinjakha choosi, akari we chikholo mala nayaayile nibio babuunga.
Ese naba nga euunwa naswalakilila babaandu babamiiamo.
Chikholo che sibala chaba nga biswi bie chinyuni
mala nabuusia kimiaandu kiabwe bwangu busa nga obuusia kamaki kakhali no mwene tawe.
Ne seliio ekholo enyuma nandala eyapapasia lutaa khukhundiisia tawe,
ne seliio eyasama kumunwa namwe eyamboochelela tawe!”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Eaywa enyala yebuyila khuba eye bukhala khukhila okiremera ku?
Namwe kumusiameno kukhila omundu okukhalila ku?
Eruungu se sutanga omundu tawe, omundu niye osutanga eruungu.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
alikho acha khuruma lufu luniaasia banamae balia bulayi abo.
Mu mibili kiabwe kumulilo kukhabemo kuchiililila kuburukha.
Wele ooli buwaanga bwa Isiraeli akhekele nga kumulilo.
Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli alekela nga kumulilo kukwirika kukwosia buli sisiindu mu ndaalo ndala yong'ene,
akhaba kamawa ne embululwe.
Efuma eye kimisiru kiewe kie bulimi
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khwonaka kumwoyo ne kumubili,
nga lufu lulwiira ne lubunia omundu.
Kimirongooro kie kumusiru kuno kilirama mitiiti,
nikio akhaba omwana anyala khubala.
Endaalo elikho yiicha ba Isiraeli babarama se baleyikina lundi ekholo eyenga khubamala tawe. Ng'ali balisuubila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Babaandu batiiti babarama ba Yakobo balikobola khu Wele wabwe we bunyali.
Kakhaba kario babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhaba bakali nga kumuyekhe kwe nyanja, batiiti busa bari balikobola. Libuna liabisiibwe, mala liechuule ne buluungi.
Omwami WELE we banamae acha khukhola kano koosi,
mu sibala nga ne aloma ali alikhola.
Omwami WELE we banamae aboolela babaandu bewe ba baamenya mu Sayuni ali, “Enywe baandu base, mu menyile mu Sayuni, mukharia Baashuru tawe, bakhaba ne bamupia siibi nga Bamisiri ne bamukholelanga.
Siise siaramire sikeekhe siri ne ese ndamuukuuma enywe, mala ndabaambila nibo lirima ne khubabunia.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khabapile siboko siase nga ne naapa babaandu ba Midiani e Lwanda lwa Orebu. Ese khaukuume Ashuru bulayi bwene busa nga ne naukuuma Misiri mu nyanja.
Endaalo eyo ne lioola, ndimulekhuula enywe murure mu bunyali bwa Ashuru, ne lichooki liabwe se limusitoela khu mabeka kenywe tawe sikila kamafura.”
Omusiku omunamae waambile lukoba lwa Aiati!
Babiriire mu Mikironi!
Balekha biakhulia biabwe e Mikinashi!
Bambukhe bali sikelekha babirire abubiriro bakonile silo esio e Keba!
Babaandu be mu lukoba lwa Ramasi bariire lukali mala babaandu be mu Kileati,
lukoba lwo mwami Saulo belukhe.
Babaandu be Kalimu khupa lulwang'a!
Babaandu be Laisha, rekeeresia!
Babaandu be Anatoti, kobosia!
Babaandu be Matimena nende be Kebimu balikho belukha baone.
Luno basiku bali mu lukoba lwa Nobu,
ne ebweeneyo balikho basisiikha bifuusi biabwe khu sikulu sia Sayuni lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae alabatonya nga chisakia chiremirwe ne kamaani koosi,
chianukha khukhwama khu murongooro.
Babelola ne beniinia lukali khu nibo balaremwa baanulwe bakwe asi, mala balachangalasibwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabarema bakwe nga kimirongooro mu musiru akari ne kiremwa ne aywa,
nga akhaba kimirongooro kimilayi lukali nga kia Lebanoni ne kikwa!

ne lusakia luliaama khukhwama khu mili kiewe.
Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimubaakho,
Roho we limanya ne liiulila,
Roho we bukaambisi ne bunyali,
Roho we bukesi ne khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne busangaafu bwewe buliba mu buri bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Se alikhalaka khu niko abona ne chimoni chewe tawe,
namwe akhalake khulondekhana nga naulila ne kamaru kewe tawe,
mala akhalake abwene khulwa baolu be sibala,
aliipila sibala eruungu eye kumunwa kwewe,
ne aliira bamayaanu ne kumuuya kwe kiminwa kiewe.
ne busuubilwa kumusiipi kwe khukhwiboela mu sibuno mwewe.
ne engwe elikona alala ne meeme,
ne emoosi ne talang'i biliayila alala,
ne omwana omukeekhe alibirangirira.
Ekhaafu eliayila alala ne sibulukhu,
ching'ana chabio chilikona alala,
ne talang'i elilia bunyaasi nga ekhaafu.
Omwana onuuna alinyayila siimbi ne liloo lie ndemu kheendu,
ne omwana owalata alira lulwaala lwewe mu liloo lia nafwo.
se silibakho sisiindu siiumisia namwe simayaana tawe,
sibala silichula bukesi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nga chinyanja ne chechula kameechi.
Mu ndaalo eyo Omwami alirumikhira bunyali bwewe lukhola khabili khureera babaandu bewe babarama khukhwama e Ashuru, e Misiri, e Paturusi, e Kushi, Elamu, e Shinari, e Hamati, ne khukhwama khundulo khwe Nyanja.
Aliimikha simanyilo khulwe chikholo,
mala abuusie Baisiraeli babamwaatwa,
alibuusia Bayuda babasalaanila khukhwama mu mbeka chine che sibala.
Likhendekha lia Efuraimu liliruramo,
ne abo babakubenga Yuda baliakama,
Efuraimu se alibubilakho Yuda tawe,
ne Yuda se alikubenga Efuraimu tawe.
Ne kakhali boosi alala baliibwakala Bafilisiti baali lubeka lwe mumbo,
alala baliyaaya babaandu be bukwe.
Balipa babaandu ba Edomu ne Moabu,
ne Bamonite balifukiilila kakabwe.
ne mbeo yeewe eyomia,
alisisiikha kumukhono kwewe khu luuchi lwa Efurati.
Alilupamo chinjichi saba,
nio babaandu balwambukhe ne bikele biabwe bibalakafu.
Elibaayo engila emboofu khukhwama Ashuru,
khulwe babaandu bewe babarama,
nga ne liaba khu Isiraeli,
nga ne baama mu sibala sia Misiri.

Endaalo elikho yiicha babaandu balimba bali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Ese ndakhufumia ewe,
akhaba ne waba ne lirima nase,
ne luno olikho umboleelesia,
ne soli ne lirima lundi tawe.
ndamweyikina niye lundi se ndaria tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali kamaani kase lundi kumwenya kwase,
nono abeele omuonia wase.”
Ne busangaafu, olataa kameechi mu sebele che buonia.
Ne ndaalo elikho yiicha niio babaandu balimba bali,
khupa orio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Mulaange akhuyeete mu lisina liewe,
boolela chikholo choosi niko akholile!
Langilila lisina liewe muli lili lie luyali.
“Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chinyimbo che fuma,
sikila bibiindu bie fuma nibio akholile.
Lekha sibala sioosi simanye kano.
Lekha buli mundu omenyile mu Sayuni ayokele mala embe!
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli ali omukali,
mala amenyile mu baandu bewe.”

Ra simanyisio sie liie khu ndeleelwa khwe sikulu sili busa.
Langilila banamae mala basakule ne kumukhono kwowo,
nga simanyisio khukhwingila mu bilibwa bie lukoba lwe bukoosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alangile banamae bewe babebonia
lundi baali ne lilieyikina khu khupana liie litakatifu
mala aukuume abo nibo aambila lirima.
Rekeeresia luyoka khukhwama khu bikulu,
luuliilikha nga lwe sipupu siboofu sie babaandu,
liuliilikha lie libusiana lie chikholo ne bubwami.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we bunyali alikho arekekha banamae bewe khulwe liie.
Balikho bama mu bibala bie aleeyi,
khundulo khwe bibala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lirima liewe alikho acha khubunia sibala sioosi.
Endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli siimbi,
niyo Omunyali alirererakho libunia.
Khwako kamakhono ka buli mundu kiliwamo kamaani,
mala buli mundu aliyengukha kumwoyo.
Boosi baliria mala barangararwe ne buchuuni,
nga khulumwa khwo mukhasi nali siimbi khusaala.
Baliloleelelana babeene ne babeene mu buri,
mala baliambwa chisoni.
Endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, elikho yiicha,
endaalo ekhalafu eye lirima liewe liriisia ne burafu.
Sibala silikholwa sichiimi, ne buli omumayaanu alibunisibwa.
enyanga ekhakame khukhosia nelikho esoa,
ne kumwesi se kulikhosia tawe.
Ndaukuuma sibala khulwe butinyu bwasio,
ne babaandu bamayaanu boosi khulwe bubi bwabwe.
Buli mundu owebonia ndimuchangalasia,
mala aambie chisoni buli mundu owebonia nomukhalafu.
Baseecha bakhabe batiiti nga esahabu endayi,
babaandu boosi nga esahabu eya ofiri.
Khwako ndikhola likulu lireenge,
ne sibala siteremele abuundu wasio,
khu ndaalo niyo ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndiekeseliakho lirima liase.
Nga kicheu niyo baayile namwe kamakheese kataamba omwaayi,
buli mundu alikobola mu baandu bewe,
ne buli mundu aliilukha akobole mu sibala siewe.
Yesi yesi olinyoolekhana aliunakwa.
Yesi yesi oliaambwa aliirwa ne mbalu.
Babaana babwe baliremakakwa mumoni chabwe berwe,
kimiaandu kie mu chinju chabwe kiliyaaywa ne basiku chana balikwa khu bakhasi babwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ndikho mbachilisia Baamedi bebwaakale Babiloni,
se babala efwesa neli siindu tawe,
lundi se basangaalila esahabu tawe.
Bakhere basoleeli ne buembo.
Se balikholelakho batoro siisa tawe,
ne se balikholela babaana siisa tawe.
buli esaambo ne lukhole lwe Bakalutayo,
Ne, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikwisia Babiloni nga ne nakhola Sodomu ne Komora!
Salibao omundu na mulala olilumenyamo lundi tawe.
Salibao omwaraabu na mulala oliombakha liiema liewe ebweeneyo tawe,
namwe salibao omwaayi na mulala oliaya lituuli liewe ebweeneyo tawe.
nende niio chisikhiikhi chombakha biswi biacho.
Chinyeefwe chilimenyayo, ne bifwaani bie bawele bilikhinilayo.
Namuunyu kiliuumila mu ndeleelwa chabwe,
ne chingipwe mu machipi kabwe kamalayi.
Siise sia Babiloni siolile!
Chindaalo chalwo chaweele.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi alikholela babaandu ba Isiraeli siisa mala alibarobora lundi babe babewe. Alibalekhuula bamenye lundi mu sibala siabwe, baakwa baliambaana ne Isiraeli mala bamenyemo nabo.
Chikholo chingali chiliyeeta babaandu be nju eya Isiraeli bakobole mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia mala ebweeneyo chikholo chilikholela Isiraeli nga nasioobi. Isiraeli eliaamba abo ba baaba ne bakiamba niyo khale, mala babaandu be nju eya Isiraeli baliamiia khu baandu ba baapianga sibi khale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alielesia babaandu be nju eya Isiraeli liola khukhwama mu burafu ne buchuuni bwabwe ne khukhwama khu milimo kimiandalafu nikio bayingiliilwanga khukhola.
Nga ne aliba ne akhola kano, aliba alikho achekheelela Omwami owa Babiloni ne aloma ali,
“Omwami omukuluumi akwile!
Lundi se aliipia sibi omundu yesi yesi tawe!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaamie bunyali bwe babaami bamayaanu,
babapia siibi babaandu mwirima
ne se bakama khu khuupia sibi chikholo nicho baula tawe.
Nono luno khumaliilikha sibala sioosi siekhoyeele liola ne kumuleembe
mala buli mundu etikita ne khukhwimba.
Kimirongooro kia Saipurasi ne kimirongooro kimitarakwa kia Lebanoni,
kiekhoyela likwa lio mwami,
sikila se aliio luno okirema tawe! Sikila afwiile!
“Sibala sie makoombe silikho sierekekha khukhwakaanila omwami owa Babiloni.
Bimakoombe biabo bibiaba ne bunyali khu sibala bilikho biaachilisia.
Bimakoombe bie babaami bilikho binyokha mu ndebe chabwe che bubwami.
Boosi balikho bamulaanga ne baboola bali,
‘Luno ewe wesi wekelile omutekhele busa nga efwe!
Ewe wesi oli busa mulala khwifwe!
Wabechanga aa bakhuupila kamatuungu khulwe khu khukoosia
ne lola luno oli ano mu sibala sie makoombe.
Okona khu bulili bwe chinyeende mala sisibiimbilo siowo sili chinyeende ching'ene.’
Khale ewe waula chikholo, ne luno wekhisiibwe asi.
Ndaniina khukhwola mwikulu angaaki we ching'enieesi cha Wele,
ndara endebe eye bubwami bwase angaaki,
ndekhala khu sikulu siili ebunaswa, niio bawele babuusianila.
Waboola oli okhaniine khu ngaaki khwe kamaleesi,
mala obe nga owe Angaaki Lukali.
Ne kakhali wekhisiibwe asi,
wamwaatiilwe mu sibala sie makoombe asi pibibiibi.
“Bamakoombe balakhuungusa ne khukhurangaara mala bareebe bali,
‘Omundu yuno se ali niye owasisiikha sibala,
mala ateremia bubwami tawe ku?
Omundu yuno se ali niye owabunia chingoba,
ne se ali niye owakaluukhasia sibala siekela sisiangalaamwe tawe ku?
Omundu yuno se ali niye okhalekhuulanga baboe bewe be mu liie bakobola engo wabwe tawe ku?’
Babaami boosi be mu sibala basiikhwa mu biliindwa biabwe bie lukoosi buli mundu mu siewe,
ne ewe se oli ne siliindwa tawe,
ne kumubili kwowo kwamwaatiilwe enje kubole.
Kwafunikhwa ne kimibili kie banamae babererwa mwiie,
kwamwaatibwa alala ne kikiabwe mu luongwa lwe kamabaale mala kiaswalakiliilwe.
Sikila ewe wonaka sibala siowo,
mala wera babaandu bowo,
solisiikhwa ne lukoosi nga babaami babaandi tawe.
Se aliio na mulala omumayaanu khu be nju yowo olirama atiuukhwe lisina tawe.
Lekha khusiinja khwe basoleeli khurakikhe!
Basoleeli bo mwami yuno balifwa sikila bumayaanu bwe bakuka babwe
se aliio na mulala khu nibo oliamiia sibala
namwe ombakhe chingoba chimboofu chingali khu sibala tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae aboola ali, “Ndebwaakala Babiloni mala ndutechule. Se ndiramia sisiindu tawe, babaana se balirama tawe, mbao baliona na akeekhe ene tawe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
Ndikaluukhasia Babiloni lwikele ekeewa eye kamatiisi ne chingili chilimenyayo. Ndieyela Babiloni siyeywe sie khubunia. Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae nalomile.”
“Nga ndekeekhe kalaba kario.
Lundi nga mbisiisie nono kalaba busa kario.
Ndabunia Baashuru bali mu sibala sia Isiraeli,
mala mbaswalakilile khu bikulu biase.
Ndalekhuula babaandu base khukhwama khu lichooki lie Baashuru,
ne khukhwama khu busiro nibwo batiuukhwa khu mabeka.”
Buno nibwo bukhalaki bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khu sibala sioosi;
sino nisio siiukuumo nisio alarusia,
khu bibala bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae abisiisie khukhola lino,
okeseleele ne kumukhono kwewe khu khuupia siibi,
mala se aliio onyala amukhiingilila khukhola ario tawe.
ne se mulikho ne sifuno sie khusangaala tawe.
Nga endemu nefwa, ekiindi eye buchiba burafu yilao.
Liki lie ndemu lialula kuremu kuupurukha.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliba omwaayi khu baandu bewe bataambi
mala alibalekhuula bamenye bulayi mu muleembe.
Ne enywe Bafilisiti, akhamurumire enjala endafu,
mala se liramia mulala khwinywe omulamu tawe.
Enywe chingoba che Bafilisiti mweesi kukuula ne khulila!
Enywe mweesi ba ne buuri,
liliisi lieulukuse ebunaswa ne se aliio owimile tawe.
Efwe khulakobosia barumwa babamile Filisiti khuli sina?
Khulababoolela khuli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi emekhe Sayuni,
mala babaandu bewe babanaanisibwanga balinyoolamo buyeeti.”

Chingoba cha Ari ne Kiri chabunisibwa busa mu silo silala,
sikila sibala sia Moabu siayunile busa.
Babaandu ba Diboni baniina lukulu khucha balilile bifwaani ne besaaya.
Babaandu ba Moabu besasaara mu bubeeleli,
khulwe chingoba chimboofu cha Nebo ne Meteba,
babekile lichuune ne bunwanwa bwabwe mu sibeela.
Babaandu bali khu ngila che mu lukoba bafwarire kamakunia,
mu lukoba akari ne khunju khungaaki babaandu balasooma ne khulila.
Babaandu be mu Heshiboni ne Eliale balalila,
ne lilila liabwe linyala liauliilikha khukhwola Yahasi.
Akhaba banamae balaterema, bunyindaafu bwabwe bwabawelemo.
Kumwoyo kwase kulilila Moabu!
Babaandu belukhile mu lukoba lwa Soari ne Ekilati Shelishiya.
Balala baniinila khu ngila emboofu khucha e Luhiti ne balila,
balala bakhelukhile Horonaimu ne babeleele abuwaanga ne khulila lukali.
Luluuchi lwa Nimurimu lwateenyile,
bunyaasi bwe keewa yalwo bwomile,
ne bunyaasi butoro se bumela tawe.
Babaandu bambukha Litooma lia Mierebi,
bakhaka khukhwilukha ne bibiindu biabwe bioosi.
Buli abuundu mu maloba ka Moabu bililo biuliilikhayo.
Biuliilikha bioola mu ngoba cha Ekilaimu ne Beerelimu.
Mu lukoba lwa Diboni luluuchi lwabeseeme ne kamafuki,
ne Wele alatasa sifuki sikali khukhila.
Khukhabe ne khukhwirwa khukali khu buli mundu owarama mu Moabu.

Babaandu ba Moabu barumiire omwami owa Yerusalemu kamameeme,
nga siianwa khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Sela lwe mu siangalaamwe.
Balindiililanga khu sikiingi sie Luluuchi lwa Arimoni
mala bayiiya busa eyi ne neyi
nga chinyuni nicho bapurusie charura mu biswi biacho.
Baboolela babaandu ba Yuda bali,
“Khuboolele efwe nisio khukhola.
Khukhinge efwe nga kumurongooro ne kuaana sisiniini enyanga neangile,
ne lekha efwe khuolele musiniini siowo,
Efwe khuli babelukha busiku,
Khukukhuulile niio omundu akhakhunyoola tawe.
Khulekhe efwe khumenye mu sibala sienywe nga babelukha busiku,
khulinde khukhwama khwaabo babenya khu khubunia.”
Khukuluumia ne khu khuupia siibi biliakama, ne lilionaka liosi likhaweo.
Nono mulala khu be lisaaye lia Daudi aliba omwami
ne aliamiia babaandu ne busuubilwa ne busiime.
Aliba khangu khukhola lili liluungi mala alibona ali bung'ali bulikho bukholwa.
Babaandu ba Yuda baboola bali,
“Efwe khwaulila bali babaandu ba Moabu bali be liliebonia.
Khumanyile khuli bali be nginia, sileka ne khukhweniinia,
ne khukhwifumia khwabwe khuli busa.”
Khwako lekha babaandu ba Moabu balile
lekha buli mulala alilile Moabu,
lila, mwapilwe lukali khulwe biakhulia bie mu lukoba lwa Kiri-Hareseti.
Kimikuunda kili siimbi Heshiboni ne kimikuunda kie kimisabibu kia Sibuma kionakwe
kimikuunda kie kimisabibu nikio babaami be chikholo bameelanga kamalwa kiakio.
Asiise silala kimisabibu kialaama kiacha kiola mu lukoba lwa Yaseri,
ne khukhwola lubeka lwe bukwe mu siangalaamwe ne lubeka lwe mumbo,
elubeka luluundi lwe Nyanja eya Chumbe.
Khwako ese luno ndikho ndila kimisabibu kia Sibuma
bulayi bwene nga nendikho ndila Yaseri.
Ese ngwisilia Heshiboni kamasika ne Eleale,
sikila likesa selilio lisangaasia babaandu tawe.
Salikhoo omundu na mulala mu saambu che ngakha osangaalile tawe.
Se aliio na mulala oyokela namwe olikho wimba mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu tawe.
Se aliio na mulala osuura kimisabibu ang'oonemo endali tawe.
Buyoka bwe liliekhoya bwakaame.
Neunamila mu bubeeleli khulwa Moabu ne bukhalafu khulwa Kiri-Hareseti.
Bamoabu beluya busa khucha mu bikulu biabwe khukhwisaaya bifwaani ne mu ngaangu chabwe khu saba, se lilabayeetakho sisiindu tawe.
Obwo nibwo burume nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana khulwa Moabu mu ndaalo chichabira.
Ne luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Mu miiko kitaru nga kimiiko kio mukholi, efuma eya Moabu eliaambwa chisoni, yakhaba ne babaandu bakali balirama batiiti lundi batekhele.”

“Damasika se luliba lundi lukoba tawe,
ne kakhali luliba busa nga kamauumbu kakatechukha.
Chingoba chimboofu cha Ashuru chilianjukhwa elala.
Chiliba kamaayilwe ke bibiaayo ne chikhaafu,
ne se aliio olichitimania achirusiemo tawe.
Isiraeli se luliba nomuabini tawe,
ne Damasika lulitibia bubwami bwalwo.
Ne Baashuru baliirama baliba nga luyali lwe babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Endaalo elikho yiicha niyo luyali lwa Yakobo lulakama,
ne bunefu bwewe bulawa.
Isiraeli eliba nga lusaambu nilwo bakesilemo engaanu,
lwanjukhwe nga lusaambu lwe mu Litooma lia Refaimu
ne lukesilwe lwarama busa.
Babaandu bakeekhe busa bong'ene balirama,
mala Isiraeli eliba nga kumurongooro kumuseituni nikwo babutilekho chiseituni choosi,
baramiakho chibili namwe chitaru khu ngaaki lukali,
namwe charamakho ngekhe chiri busa mu sakia che asi.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli nalomile.”
Nga endaalo eyo neliola, babaandu balikobola baenje buyeeti khukhwama khu Mubuumbi wabwe, oli Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Se balieyikina chi alutare nicho bombakha babeene tawe, namwe basuubile mu nikio kamakhono kabwe kakhola, mu bifwaani bia wele omukhasi Ashera ne chi alutare che khukhwoseliakho biiunya kumuuya kumulayi tawe.
Nga endaalo eyo ne liola chingoba chimboofu chilianjukhwa mala chilekhwe ne chitechulwe ne chili mu maumbu nga chingoba che Bahibi ne Baamori, nga baliba ne belukha babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Sikila Ewe Isiraeli, webilila Wele owe buonia bwowo,
mala se wakhebulila lulwanda nilwo oonelamo tawe.
Ne kakhali wabiaala kimikuunda kimitakatifu nio osaaye wele be chikholo chichiindi.
Ne biakhaba ne bimela mala biamulikha kumutikhinyi kumwene nikwo biamiichilwakho,
likesa se lilibao tawe.
Butinyu bwong'ene ne burafu bukhaonesibwa tawe.
Chikholo che kamaani chakoyaanile,
ne liyoka nga lioola lie nyanja,
lundi nga bibuli bie kameechi.
Chikholo chiicha nga bibuli bie kameechi,
ne kakhali Wele acha khuchirafwira mala chicha khumwilukha chibe sinaao,
chiicha khutamuukha nga kamatere khu bikulu ebweeni we mbeo,
ne nga likhuuchi ebweeni we sisifuusia.
Lola, mu siise sie ekolooba bareera buuri!
Ne bukhaasia tawe aba siindu mbao,
sino nisio sitonyi siabo babakhwiba efwe,
ne lundi nikwo kumuruuru kwabo babakhuyaaya.

sibala siliio niio buyoka bwe chindaa buuliilikha.
Barumwa bamaanga mu sibala sienesio bekhela mu luuchi lwa Naili mu maaro ke bisele.
Enywe barume kobola engo khangu!
Kobosia burume mu sibala sienywe sisiakabukhanisibwamo ne chinjichi,
khu kholo yenywe eye kamaani lundi eye bunyali khu baandu benywe baleeyi lundi bamiliiu.
Ba bariisia babaandu mu sibala sioosi.
Enywe mweesi bamenywa be limala,
enywe mumenyile khu sibala,
simanyisio nga siikharerwe khu ngulu!
Nga ekhoombi ne ekhape rekeeresia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Ese nendi mwikulu,
ndalola asi kalaa nga luume ne lwamanga mu silo sie luluuya,
mu siise sie likesa nga liliteleela lie kumuumu kumurafu kwe ndaalo.
Kimisabibu ne kikhabutwa tawe, nga bimuli bioosi ne bikwile,
mala kimisabibu kilikho kiroba,
omusiku alibunia Baesopia kalaa busa nga kumubano ne kukhala chisakia che kimisabibu.
Banamae bafu balilekhelwa chinyuni che mu bikulu ne chisolo.
Chinyuni chilababocha mu siimiyu,
ne chisolo chilabalia mu munaane.”
Siise silikho siicha nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
alinyoola biianwa khukhwama mu sibala sisiakabukhasibwamo ne chinjichi sino,
khukhwama ekholo eye kamaani ne bunyali yino,
babaandu baleeyi lundi bamiliiu babarisia babaandu mu sibala sioosi.
Balecha khu Sikulu sia Sayuni
niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asaayangwa.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho echa e Misiri,
alikho atimila khu lileesi litima khangu.
Bifwaani bia Misiri biterema ebweeni wewe,
ne bunyindaafu bwe babaandu ba Misiri bwaweele.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ndasolosia liie mu Misiri mala ngalukhasie wandaaye apane ne wandaaye,
omundu apane nende niye apakana naye,
chingoba chimboofu chilapana buli ndala ne luluundi,
ne babaami ba babiilana balapana khubeela bubwami.
Mala ndikho nja khwonakaka lirekekha lie Bamisiri ne khukhwonaka silukuluku siabwe.
Balareeba bifwaani biabwe ne bafumu babayeete,
ne balacha mala bareebe bafumu ne bamakoombe khubakaambila.
Ndara Bamisiri khu mwami omubi lundi omurafu olabamiia.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Ne kameechi ke mu luuchi lwa Naili kalaboomba,
mala luteenye kalaa.
Kamakhono ke luluuchi kalaunya,
ne chisakia cha Naili lwa Misiri chilateenya.
Bisele ne kamaliki bilaniaala mala bibole.
Ne bimiichwa bioosi biili khu sikiingi sia Naili bilioma,
mala biuchibwe biche biwe.
Buli mundu omenyanga khulwe khuloba ching'eeni mu Naili,
alabeelela lukali ne khulila,
sikila chindobo chabwe ne chindiimba chabwe se chiliba ne bukhala tawe.
Abo banabanga chingubo cha katani baliesing'oong'a,
ne banabi be fwamba ewaanga.
Abo baali chinjeko che sibala, balifuniakakwa,
ne bakholi be kimilimo baruungwa baleunamila.
Babemeelesi be lukoba lwa Soani bali basilu!
Bakesi ba Misiri baboola likaambila lie siyingwa.
Banyala khuboolela omwami bariena bali,
efwe khuli bakobola mu bweyaangu bwe basomi ne babaami?
Omwami owa Misiri, bakambi bowo bakesi chana abo bali waena?
Lekha bakhuboolele niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we banamae arekeekhe khulwa Misiri.
Babaana be babaami ba Soani ne Memufisi bali basilu.
Benyekha khurangirira sibala ne kakhali basitimisie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abakholile baboole likaambila lie likoyania.
Khwako, Misiri sikhola buli sisiindu bubi,
lundi bataalitaala nga omumeesi namiukha mu marusio kewe omwene.
Se aliio omundu yesi yesi mu Misiri,
omuiinda namwe omutaambi,
omurie namwe okhamanyikhaane onyala waana buyeeti tawe.
Siise silikho siicha babaandu ba Misiri bacha khuba busa baari nga bakhasi. Baliterema mu buri bukali nga ne balibona bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali okeseleele kumukhono kwewe khubaukuuma.
Babaandu ba Misiri baliria Yuda buli siise ne bakhebusibwa kamabi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we banamae abarekekhele nibo.
Nga siise esio ne siliola, lulomo lwe Baeburania lulilomwalomwa mu ngoba chimboofu chiraano che Bamisiri. Babaandu ebweeneyo baliechuba mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lukoba lulala khwicho balilulanga bali, “Lukoba luboofu lwe Nyanja”
Nga siise esio ne siliola, elibao alutare khu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu sibala sia Misiri, ne enjeko eye libaale yareebwa alubeka Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi elwakha lwa Misiri.
Bilibao bimanyisio bie khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Misiri. Nga babaandu ne baliba na bakuluumisibwa ebweeneyo mala balilile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abayeete, alibarumira Omuonia abaonie.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliebuula omwene khu baandu ba Misiri ne balimufukiilila ne khumusaaya mala bamureerere bie mbosio ne biianwa. Balimusuubisia lukali ne khukhola niko bamusuubisie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliukuuma Bamisiri, ne lundi alibaonia. Balimukobolela mala aliulila kamasaba kabwe mala abaonie.
Nga siise esio ne silioola, kulibao kumuyila kumuboofu akari wa Misiri ne Ashuru, babaandu be bibala bibili ebio balicha eyi neyi akari wabio mala chikholo chibili echo chilisaayila alala.
Nga siise esio ne silioola Isiraeli sililekhaana ne Misiri ne Ashuru, mala chikholo chitaru chino chiliba ekhabi khu sibala sioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alibabiita chikhabi naboola ali, “Baandu base Misiri ndamubiita chikhabi, baandu base Ashuru enywe nibo nabuumba ndamubiita chikhabi, ne baandu base Isiraeli enywe nibo narobora, ndamubiita chikhabi.”

Khu malaka ka Sarikoni omwami owa Ashuru, omukhulu we banamae ba Ashuru, ebwaakala lukoba luboofu lwe Bafilisiti Ashitoti.
Mu siise esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma khubirira khu mung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amozi, naloma ali, “Cha, wefuule engubo eye kamakunia munda mwowo, ne biraaro,” mala akhola ario, akeenda sichula lundi mu bikele busa.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Nga omukholi wase Isaya nakeendile sichula lundi biraaro mu bikele tawe khu miiko kitaru sino sili nga simanyisio kakhekholekhe khu Misiri ne Esopia.
Nono omwami owa Ashuru alirangirira baambe ba Misiri ne ba Esopia bali mu mbaambe, baele sitube ne bakhulu, bakhakeende sichula lundi mu bikele busa, ne kamatakho kabwe sichula, khuambia Misiri chisoni.
Nio babeyikina Kushi ne khukhwibonia sikila Misiri bakhakoyaane ne lilieyikina liabwe likhonakibwe.
Ne bamenywa be khu nyanja yino endaalo eyo baliloma bali, ‘Lola kano kekholekhe khwaabo nibo khweyikina ne naabo nibo khwelukhilayo khunyoola buyeeti ne khuona khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru! Nono efwe, khulaonela waena?’ ”

Burume khuloondekhana ne Babiloni
Nga bibifusia bie Nekebu biama mu siangalaamwe khukhwama mu sibala siriisia lukali.
Nekesiibwe kamalola kamaandalafu,
kamalola ke khuchaama ne khukhwonaka.
Cha Elamu, niina angaaki yibwaakala, Metia,
nja khwakamia buchuuni bwewe bwoosi nibwo Babiloni areerire.
Khwako, mu mubili mwase mwechuule burafu,
buchuuni bwandiilile,
nga buchuuni bwo mukhasi ne alikho alumwa.
Nenaame asi sembulila tawe,
lundi nafwiile kumwoyo.
Kumwoyo kwase kuupa,
buuri bwandereemie,
khukhwilabula nikhwo nekoomba,
khwangalukhaanekho khwabeele literema.
Mu malola baala emesa
babakala bitambaa bakeni bekhalekho,
balikho balia ne khunywa!
Oli basiili, likhuwa liecha bali,
Yinyokha, bemeelesi,
mwirekekhele liie.
Lino nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboleele ali,
“Cha, oreo omuliindi,
lekha aboole niko alikho abona.
Aaba nabona babaandu ne balikho beecha
khu farasi babili babili,
ne babaandi khu punda ne khu ngamia,
akhoya abalolelela bulayi bwene.”
Nio oyo oliinda alaangilile ali,
“Ee mwami wase, ndiinda buli njililili abuundu wase kumuusi ne siilo.”
chifarasi babaandu babili babili.
Nio omuliindi aloma ali,
“Babiloni lwakwiile, lundi lwakwiile,
ne bifwaani bioosi bie bawele babwe biarakakiilwe khu liloba.”
Ee baandu base Isiraeli, mwauulwa busa nga engaanu,
ne kakhali muboolela kamakhuwa kamalayi niko mbuliile,
khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe banamae, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Buno buli burume khu Edomu.
Omundu mulala alikho anaanga khukhwama e Edomu,
“Ee, omuliindi, makhuwa siina ke siilo?
Omuliindi, makhuwa siina ke siilo?”
Omuliindi aloma ali,
“Busia ne bwilabula,
waaba noreeba, reeba, kobola lundi.”
Buno buli burume khu Arebia.
Enywe babaandu badedani, babene makaari
kali mu kambi eya Arebia, mulakona mu siangalaamwe sia Arebia.
Reerera be bulesia kameechi,
enywe bamenywa be mu sibala sie Tema.
Mwakaanile owilukha ne siakhulia siabwe,
Sikila belukha khukhwama khu mbalu,
khukhwama khu mbalu niio bachoolile,
khukhwama khu buyiingo bubwefuumba
ne khukhwama khu burafu bwe liie.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambooleele ali, “Mu siise sie kumwiiko mulala khuloondekhana ne khubala khwe kimiiko kio mukholi, luyali lwa Kedari lwoosi luliakama.
Abo banamae be buyiingo, nibo bali banyindaafu lukali ba Kedari, batiiti bari nibo balirama. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli nalomile.”

Buno nibwo burume khuloondekhana ne Litooma lie Kamalola,
siina silikho sisiekholekha?
Siina babaandu boosi be mu lukoba luboofu ne bali ne naikara yabwe khunju khungaaki?
Lukoba luboofu lwoosi lwechuule sisiayuumba,
lwechuule buyoka ne ekhoyo.
Babaandu bowo babeerwa se beererwa ne mbalu tawe,
namwe se bafwila mwiie tawe.
Barangirisi benywe boosi belukha
baambwa ne basiili khulasa buyiingo bwabwe.
Enywe mweesi mwanyoolwa mwaambwa nga baboe alala,
akhaba ne babelukha omusiku nasili aleeyi.
Khwako naloma ndi,
“Okhandoleelela tawe,
ndekhe ndile burafu,
okhakhakakho wamboleelesia tawe,
sikila libuna lie babaandu base.”
Omwami WELE we banamae ali ne ndaalo eye khunyaakhana,
khuswalakilila ne likoyaana mu litooma lie kamalola,
enyanga eye khutechula kamasiisi ne khulilila bikulu.
Banamae khukhwama Elamu
becha ne chifarasi ne buyiingo ne situukhu sie buembo,
banamae khukhwama Kiri, baba berekekhe ne chingabo chabwe.
Kamatooma kowo kamarobore kechuule kamakaari ke liie,
ne batimia chifarasi barumirwe a bilibwa bie chingoba.
Wamalile khurusiao sifunikho sia Yuda. Mu ndaalo eyo walola bulwaani bubwabiikhwa Munju eye Mumusiru,
namwe nga ne mwabona muli Lukoba lwa Daudi, lwatechukhaka akali, mala mwabuusila kameechi mu litiisi lie mwaalo.
Mwabala bibioneekhe mu chinju cha Yerusalemu mala mwatechulaka chinju chindala khu lumia lisiisi.
Mwabuumba enjikha eye kameechi akari we kamasiisi kabili khulwe kameechi ke Litiisi Likhale, ne kakhali se mwalola khu Wele owa likhola tawe, namwe semwenaana khu walirekekha khale akho tawe.
Mu ndaalo eyo Omwami WELE we banamae,
alaanga babaandu balile mala beunamile ne khubeka lichuune,
ne khukhwifwara chingubo che kamakunia.
khukhoonya chieeyi ne khusiinja kamakheese khulia chinyama ne khunywa endali! Ne khuloma muli,
“Khe khulie mala khunywe sikila khukhafwe muchuli!”
Nio Omwami WELE we banamae ebuulile omwene mu maru kase ali,
“Ng'ali semucha khubeelwa bumayaanu buno tawe,
khukhwola nga ne mulifwa.”
Ese Omwami, Wele we banamae nalomile.
Omwami WELE we banamae aloma ali, “yiicha oche khu mwimeelesi khu Shebuna, ooli omuliindi we lichipi mala olome oli,
olikho okhola ano siina? Ne naanu niye oli naye ano, nio wechoongeele eng'ani wamwene ano, wachoonga eng'ani yowo angaaki ne khukhwichoongela limenya mu lwanda?
Lola, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khukhurusiamo ne khukhumwaata ne kamaani, Ee ewe owe kamaani. Alakhutilila elala,
ng'ali alakhuuchilisia mala akhumwaate nga kumupiira, mu sibala sie aleeyi, olifwiila ebweeneyo, ne kamakaari ke lukoosi lwowo ke liie kaliba ebweneeyo, ewe waambia chisoni enju eyo mwami wowo!
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhurusia mu bwimeelesi mala akhwikhisie khukhwama abwikhalo bwowo bwe angaaki.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Shebuna ali, “Nga kamenako ne kalikholekha ndilanga omukholi wase Eliakimu okhwa Hilikia.
Ndimufwara ekutuusi yowo eye kimilimo, muboe kumusiipi mala muelesie bunyali bwoosi nibwo ewe wabelenge nabwo. Alaba nga raraawe owe babaandu ba Yerusalemu ne Yuda.
Ndamuela elala bunyali buli asi wo mwami, owe lisaaye lia Daudi. Aliba ne bufunguo bwenju eye kimilimo, niyo ekuule salibao omundu olikala ta, ne niyo ekale salibao omundu olikula tawe.
Ndimulumia taatatata, abuundu ao, aandalale nga sichaangi, mala alaba niye sinoko sie lukoosi lwenju yabwe.
“Ne balebe bewe boosi ne bamenywa bewe baliba busiro khu niye balimubwamakho nga chinyuungu ne bibuumba khu sichaangi!
Nga kamenako ne kalikholekha sichaangi sisiasimikhwa siaandalala silitekeya mala sikwe. Ne kano kalaba sisiakamo sia buli sisiindu sisiaba ne sietiila khu sichaangi” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.

Lila enywe chimeeli cha Tarishishi
sikila Tiro lwabunile mbao enju namwe bubwilukhilo tawe
khukhwama mu sibala sia Saipurasi kamanyikhane.
Sila busa, enywe bamenywa bali embi ne nyanja
Ee baboofuli ba Sidoni,
Mwaruma barumwa benywe engelekha we nyanja
kamapesa kenywe kaba bibiaamo bia Sihori,
likesa lia Naili,
enywe mwaba baboofuli be chikholo.
Aambwa chisoni ee Sidoni, sikila enyanja eya lomile,
ne chisiba chimboofu che nyanja chiboola chili,
“Ese se nalumwakho namwe nasaalakho tawe.
Se nakhusiakho babaana basoleeli namwe bakhaana tawe.”
Nga Bamisiri ne bakhanyoole likhuwa,
bakhabe mu bubeeleli khu likhuwa lino khu Tiro.
Yambukha Tarishishi,
lila enywe bamenywa be khu nyanja.
Oluno lunyala lwaba lukoba luboofu lwe liliekhoya lwa Tiro lulwarakikha khaale ku?
Oluno luli lukoba luboofu lulwaruma bamenywa baakwa khuamba bibala bikeni ne khubiamiia ku?
Naanu owarekekha khureera kano koosi khu Tiro,
lukoba luboofu lwe bubwami nilwo babaami balwo,
baboofuli baaba babaandu be lukoosi lwe angaaki lukali khu sibala ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalake.
Alurekekha ario khulwe khukhwakamia liliebonia liabwe lie fuma
ne khuchangalaasia babaandu babwe be lukoosi khu sibala.
Yichula mu sibala nga luluuchi lwa Naili
ee mukhaana owa Tarishishi!
Se siliio silamukhiingilila lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okeselelie kumukhono kwewe khu nyanja,
akwisiisie bubwami bukali.
Omwami aanile lilaka khu Kanaani,
khukhwonaka nibio beyikina.
Mala aloma ali
“Solasangaala lundi tawe
ee, ewe oupisibwa sibi omukhaana owa Sidoni.
Yinyokha, yambukha engelekha Saipurasi,
yakhaba ebweeneyo kumuleembe mbayo tawe.”
Lola sibala sia Babiloni! Bano nibo bachana se baba ba Ashuru tawe. Balekha chisaang'i chebwaakala lukoba lwa Tiro, bombakha chindeleelwa chabwe bosia abuundu wabwe babunia lukoba lwa Tiro.
Enywe chimeeli cha Tarishishi, kuukuula,
Sikila lukoba luboofu nilwo enywe mweyikina lwabunile.
Siise silikho siicha nisio Tiro lucha khwibililwa khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi saba, siise sie bulamu bwo mwami. Nga kimiiko ekio ne kiliwa, kaliekholekhana khu Tiro nga kumwenya kwo omueeyi kuboola kuli,
“Bukula lituungu,
cha mu lukoba luboofu,
ewe omueeyi niye bebilila!
Yimba bulayi,
wimbe kimienya kimikali,
Nio babaandu bakhukhebulile lundi!”
Nga kimiiko kamakhumi saba ne kiliwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikhebulila Tiro mala alilulekhuula lukobole khu bwofuli bwalwo, mala lulikhola bueeyi ne bubwami bwe sibala sioosi.
Chirupia nicho lulinyoola khulwe bubwofuli chilireebwa alubeka khulwe khuchiaana khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Selulibiikha mwibiikhilo tawe, ne abo basaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi balirumikhira chirupia chalwo khulwe khukula biakhulia ne chingubo nicho benya.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho acha khwonaka sibala mala asianjukhe busa.
Alabarusia khu sibala mala asalanisie babaandu basio.
Kaliba buli khu mundu, basaayi ne babaandu busa,
nasioobi ne babaami babwe,
bakuli ne bakusia, babekopia ne babekopa,
baiinda ne bataambi.
Sibala silanjukhwa elala ne khukhwonakwa elala
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile mala kalaba kario.
Sibala sioma mala siniala,
limala lioosi liekelile litekhele,
bioombi sibala ne likulu bilikho bibola.
Babaandu banyaalutia sibala sikila khufunaka kamalaka ka Wele
ne khufuna endakaano niyo Wele akhola emenye mindali na mindali.
Nono Wele alaangilile silaamo sibe khu sibala.
Babaandu basio balikho baruungwa niko bakholile.
Khwako bakeekhe busa bari barama.
Kimisabibu kilikho kiniala mala endali elikho etamba,
buli mundu owaba nasangaalile luno asulunye,
ne kimienya kie liliekhoya lie
kamatuungu ne ching'oma chabwe kiasilile.
Liliimba lie busangaafu bwe khunywa endali mbao,
se aliio omundu na mulala owekhoyela echamu yayo lundi tawe.
Buli siindu mu lukoba luboofu siakoyaanile
ne babaandu bekhomekheele mu chinju chabwe nio omundu akhengilamo tawe.
Babaandu baapa luyoka mu chingila che mu lukoba
sikila endali seliio lundi tawe.
Busangaafu bwachiliile elala bwarusiibwe mu sibala.
Lukoba luboofu lwakwile
ne bilibwa bialwo biafunaakwe.
Lino nilio licha khukholwa mu buli ekholo,
mu limala lioosi liliba nga limaliila lie likesa,
niio kimiseituni kibutiilwe kiawa
buli khu murongooro, ne chisabibu chimaliilisi ne chibutiilwe.
Abo balirama balamu balimba khulwe liliekhoya.
Abo bali mumbo baliboola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nali omukali,
ne abo bali ebukwe balimufumia.
Babaandu bamenyile khundulo khwe nyanja balifumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli.
Khukhwama mu bibala bie aleeyi bie limala,
khulaulila kimienya kie khufumia Isiraeli ekholo enuungi.
Ne ese se ndi ne lilieyikina tawe.
Ndikho ng'ayilila busa! Sikila bachamani bachiililila khukhunjama
ne buchami bwabwe butasa khuba bubi lukali.
Buli mundu ndekeeresie!
Biliio bibiindu biriisia, kamaloo, ne kimireko
kiamulindiilile.
Omundu yesi yesi okhaka khukhwibacha khukhwama khu kaarisia,
alakwa mu liloo,
ne omundu yesi yesi owebacha khukhwama mwiloo
alaambwa mu mureko.
Efula eye mbembeesi elakwa,
mala kumusiingi kwe sibala kulaterema.
Sibala silatienukha
mala siatikhe ne khukhwasamilila.
Sibala sisiene silatalitaala busa nga omumeesi,
ne khuyeng'aana nga khayu mu fula eye mbembeesi.
Bumayaanu bwe sibala bwasisitoela,
mala silatechukha sikwe ne sesilenyokha lundi tawe.
Siise silikho siicha nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khuukuuma bunyali bwe angaaki ne babaami be sibala.
Wele acha khubuusia alala babaami,
nga baboe mu liloo.
Alibakhomekhela mu siboe,
nabwila siise sie siiukuumo siabwe ne siola.
Kumwesi kulimaliia ne enyanga se likhosia tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we banamae aliba omwami.
Aliamiia mu Yerusalemu khu sikulu sia Sayuni,
mala barangilisi be babaandu balibona luyali lwewe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Wele wase
Ese ndakhukoosia ne khufumia lisina liowo,
Ewe wakhola bibiindu bie khuukia,
Wakhola mu busuubili lirekekha nilio wakhola khaale.
Ewe watechula chingoba chekela bibuuri bie kamaumbu,
mala wonaka kamasiisi kacho,
Kamachipi niko basiku befwe bombakha karuriireo elala.
Babaandu be chikholo che bunyali balakhufumia ewe,
ewe olaribwa mu ngoba che chikholo chindafu.
Bataambi ne bakhali ne buyeeti tawe belukhile niio oli,
mala balindwe bulayi mu siise sie butinyu.
Ewe olabaelesia niio beyikama embembeesi,
ne sisiniini sie khukhwikhiinga kumuumu.
Barafu babi bebwaakala nga embembeesi eye kumunaane,
nga bukhafu mu sibala sisioomu.
Ne ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi wasisiisie luyoka lwe baakwa,
nga bukhafu mu siniini sie lifuumbi,
khwako kumwenya kwe barafu kwemeekhwe.
Khu sikulu Sayuni khuno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aling'oonela chikholo che sibala choosi naikara, naikara eye biakhulia bilayi lukali ne ndali endayi.
Abwenao alarusiao lifuumbi lie bubeeleli khangu liliabeleenge khu kholo choosi.
Omwami WELE alionaka lifwa mindali na mindali. Alieya kamasika sia moni cha buli mundu mala arusieo chisoni nicho babaandu bewe banyoola mu sibala sioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene alomile!
Nga lilikholekha, buli mundu aliboola ali, “Ali Wele wefwe! Efwe khwara lisuubila liefwe mu niye mala akhuonia. Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Efwe khwara lisuubila liefwe mu niye mala luno khwasangaalile ne khukhwikhoya sikila akhuonisie.”
Balisuta kamakhono kabwe oli balikho bakhaka khusoka, ne kakhali Wele alibachangalasia, nio kamakhono kabwe keleele busa.
Alitechula kamasiisi ke chingoba cha Moabu ne kamasiisi kacho kamaleeyi ne khukamwaata asi mu lipukhuulu.

Endaalo elikho yiicha niyo babaandu balimba kumwenya kuno mu sibala sia Yuda:
Lukoba luboofu lwefwe luli lwe kamaani,
Wele omwene niye oliindanga kamasiisi kayo!
Yikula bilibwa bie lukoba luboofu,
mala mulekhuule ekholo esuubilwa yingilemo,
ekholo niyo babaandu baayo bakholaanga kali kamaluungi.
Ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aana kumuleembe kumwichufu,
khwaabo babaliinda likhuwa liowo bulayi,
mala bara lilieyikina liabwe mwiwe.
Suubila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mindali,
buli lwoosi alakhuliinda efwe.
Wekhisie abo ba baaba ne beniinia,
onaka chingoba che kamaani nicho bamenyangamo,
lundi asindiikhe kamasiisi kaumbukhakiile mu lipukhuulu.
Abo babamiinwa luno balukeendakho,
mala baluswalakilila.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe weeya engila yamiliia khulwe babaandu balayi.
Kumuyila nikwo bachilakho kwayasibwa.
Efwe khuloonda lilienya liowo,
mala khura lilieyikina liefwe mwiwe.
Ewe weng'ene niye efwe khwekoomba.
Mu silo ndakhwekoomba ewe ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
nga nolikhalakila sibala ne babaandu basio,
boosi balieyika bung'ali buli siina.
Ewe wakhaba noli omulayi
babaandu bamayaanu se beyika khukhola kali kamaluungi tawe.
Akhaba ano mu sibala sie babaandu baluungi,
basiikhola busa kamakhiikha,
baloba khumanya bunyali bwowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi baambie chisoni mala balekhe baumie,
mumunaanio nikwo ewe warekekha.
Bekesie nga ewe ne wasiima babaandu bowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe olakhuelesia kimiaandu,
buli siindu nisio khunyoolanga sili likobosio nilio ewe okhola.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe khwaminwa ne babaandi,
ne kakhali ewe weng'ene oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe.
Luno bali bafu ne se balilamukha lundi tawe.
Bimakoombe biabwe se bililamukha tawe,
sikila ewe wabaukuumile ne khubabunia.
Se aliio na mulala olibakhebulila lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe wabalaayisie ekholo yefwe,
wabalaayisie sibala siefwe buli lubeka,
mala lino liakhurereere ewe lukoosi.
Ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi waukuuma babaandu bowo,
ne mu buchuuni burafu bakhusaba ewe.
Ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi wakhukholile efwe khulile,
nga omukhasi olumwa nalila mu buchuuni,
efwe khwaba mu buchuuni bwe bubeeleli burafu,
mala se khwasaala siindu tawe,
se khwarererakho sibala siefwe bukhili tawe,
se khwakholakho siosi tawe.
Babaandu befwe babafwa abo balimenya lundi,
kimibili kiabwe kikhanyoole bulamu lundi.
Abo boosi babakona mu biliindwa biabwe,
balinyokha mala bembe khulwe liliekhoya.
Nga luume lung'enang'ena luosia liloba,
nio akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yesi alilamusia abo babafwa khaale.
Baandu base, yingila munju chenywe mala mwikaleo.
Yikukhuulila khulwe siise sikeekhe nabwila lirima lia Wele ne liwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho echa khukhwama abuundu wewe niio amenyanga
khuukuuma babaandu be sibala khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe.
Bubwiri bwe mu bwikisi bubwakholwa mu sibala bulifuunulwa,
ne sibala se silikisa lundi abo babeerwa tawe.

Khu ndaalo eyo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliloma ali,
“Yiimba lulwimbo khu mukuunda kwase kumulayi kwe kimisabibu,
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi omuliindi wakwo,
Nguchukhililanga kameechi buli siise.
Nio omundu akhakwonaka tawe.
Nguliinda siilo ne kumuusi.
Luno sendi ne lirima tawe.
Kaaba bali kamawa ne mbululwe bilimo nibio khupana nabio, ndi bionakaka,
ndibiosia bioosi alala.
Ne basiku be babaandu base baaba ne benya buliindi bwase,
lekha bakhole kumuleembe ne nase,
ee, lekha bakhole kumuleembe ne nase.”
Mu ndaalo chichiicha babaandu ba Isiraeli,
be lisaaye lia Yakobo, balikhisia chiisi
nga kumurongooro, ne kumulikha ne khukhwama.
Sibala silifunikhwa ne kamatuunda kakaama.
Abapile nga aapa abo bababaapa?
Namwe bafwiile nga babeeri ne berwa?
Sipiimo khu sipiimo mu mbaambe ewe wapana nabo.
Ababukula abayila aleeyi ne khungu endafu khukhwama ebukwe.
Khwako ne bumayaanu bwa Isiraeli bulibeelwa,
ne lino liliba lituunda liboofu lie khurusiao bumayaanu,
nga nalikhola kamabaale koosi ka alutare,
nga kamabaale ke luloongo mala alusie,
mbao Ashera namwe bupaani bwa alutare bulirama tawe.
Lukoba lwabotookhelesibwa ne kamasiisi lwatechuulwe lwakwile,
lwanjukhwe nga sichiimi siikhalimo siindu tawe.
Lwekelile kamayilwe ke chikhaafu, niio chiolela ne khukhwaya.
Chisakia che kimirongooro chomile ne khufunikha
bakhasi bachireenya nga chiikhu.
Sikila babaandu se bamanyile siindu siosi siosi tawe,
khwako Wele owabuumba se alabakholela siisa tawe,
Khu ndaalo eyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alibuusia babaandu bewe khukhwama khu luuchi Efurati khukhwola khu lwakha lwa Misiri, mulala sia mulala nga omundu naseesa engaanu abisia likhuuchi liruremo.
Nga endaalo eyo ne liola ekhoombi eliipwa, khulaanga Baisiraeli boosi bali mu mbaambe Ashuru ne Misiri bakobole. Balicha mala basaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Yerusalemu khu sikulu siewe sitakatifu.

Bubwami bwa Isiraeli bwakwile!
Luyali lwabwo lulikho lufulafulana nga ekuutwa eye bimuli khu mirwe kie barangirisi balwo bameesi,
kimirwe kiabwe kikieniinia kiaakhilwe kamafura kaunya bulayi,
ne kakhali balambaalile ao mu bumeesi bwe lifwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali no mundu owe kamaani lundi owe bunyali owerekeekhe khubebwaakala,
omundu oyo olicha nga embembeesi eye kamaarara,
nga efula engali, nga kameechi kamakali kakechuule buli abuundu.
Liliebonia lie barangirisi bameesi abo,
lilaswalakililwa.
Luyali lufulafulana lwe barangirisi babebonia abo lulawao,
nga chinduli chinyoaanga khuroba siimiyu ne sili siimbi.
Omundu ne achibona, achibuta khangu ne khuchilia abwene ne abwene.
Endaalo elikho yiicha niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
aliba nga ekuutwa eye luyali,
eye bimuli khulwe babaandu bewe balirama.
Aliaana roho we bung'ali khwaabo bakhola kimilimo nga bakhalaki,
mala aandalasie kimiooyo kiaabo baliindanga bilibwa bie lukoba luboofu khukhwama khu bwibwaakali.
Akhaba bang'oosi ne basaayi bameelile lukali balikho bataalitaala.
Banywele endali engali ne kamalwa bali mu ngoyaani.
Bang'oosi bameelile lukali se banyala bamanyilisia kamalola niko Wele abarumira tawe,
ne basaayi bosi bameelile lukali ata se banyala bakhalaka chikesi chireerwa khu nibo tawe.
Chimesa nicho bekhalangakho chechuule kamarusio
ne se aliio abuundu amiliiu aramire tawe.
Banjelung'unyakho,
baloma bali, “Omundu oyo ebaasia ali ekesia naanu?
Naanu owenya burume bwewe?
Burume bwewe buli bulayi khu baana balekhile khunuuna busa bari!
Alakhakanga khukhweyikia enyukuta khu nyukuta
ne lunyilili khu lunyilili, lilieyika khu lieyika.”
aba Wele alarumikhira bakeni balomaloma
lulomo lukeni, khumwekisia enywe lilieyika.
Amuelesia enywe mweesi siuluukho ne liioleelesia,
ne kakhali enywe mwaloba khu murekeeresia.
Elio nilio likila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alikho acha khumwekisia enywe enyukuta khu nyukuta,
lunyilili khu lunyilili, lilieyika khu lieyika.
Nono, mukhetuye nga mukhaka khukeenda.
Mukhapwe, mukharekwe, mala mubukulwe nga baboe.
Luno enywe baandu be liliebonia, mumwamiianga mu Yerusalemu muno khu baandu bano,
rekeeresia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho aboola.
Enywe mweniinia ne mweboola boola muli mwauliilisiane ne lifwa,
lundi mwakholile endakaano ne lsibala sie makoombe.
Enywe musuubila muli butinyu bulimulekha enywe nga buliicha,
sikila mweyikina bubeeyi ne bubacha khu muliinda.
“Lola, ese ndikho nda mu Sayuni libaale lie kumusiingi lili liaandalafu lundi lie kamaani.
Ndara mu nisio libaale lie mukona liaandalafu khu nilio kamakhuwa kano kaandikwa kali,
‘Lisuubila lili ng'ali lili lundi liliefwiilisia.’
Bung'ali buliba sikelo sie kumusiingi,
ne busuubilwa buliba sikelo sie bubwombakhi.”
Efula eye kamaarara elirusiao bubeeyi bwoosi nibwo enywe mweyikina,
ne kameechi kamakali kalionaka buliindi bwenywe.
Buambaani nibwo mwakhola ne lifwa bularusibwao,
ne endakaano yenywe ne sibala si bafu elarusibwao.
Nga butinyu bulimunyoola mulikhilwa.
Bulibelelela busa khumupa enywe,
busia busia, kumutikhinyi khu mutikhinyi.
Kalaba khwinywe kumuusi ne silo.
