Buli burume buyia khukhwama khu Wele buliba sirikhirisio sisiindi!
Enywe muliba nga omundu mu lusimo okhaka khukona khu sitanda sisiimbi nisio akhanyala khulambisia tawe,
ne sisibiimbilo sikeekhe lukali nisio akhanyala ebiimba tawe.
nio akhole niko enya khukhola,
kamakeni busa nga bikholwa biewe ne bibonekha.
Alimala kimilimo kiewe, kimilimo kiewe kie liukia.
Mukhachekheelela likania nilio ndikho muelesia enywe tawe!
Mwaba ne mukhola murio,
lilaba liaandalafu lukali khwinywe khukhwilukha.
Nauliile likhalaka lio Mwami WELE we banamae khubunia sibala sioosi.
Rekeeresia niko ese ndikho mboola,
ba ne kamaru murekeeresie niko ese ndikho muboolela.
Se aliio omulimi ochiilililanga busa khulima busia busia kumukuunda kwewe nakurekekha khumiicha tawe.
Nga namala khurekekha kumukuunda, abiaala binjari ne piripiri.
Amiicha chinyilili che ngano ne shayiri
ne khundulo khwe kimikuunda kiewe amiichakho biakhulia bibiindi.
Amanyile khukhola kimilimo kiewe,
sikila Wele amwekesia.
Sarumikhiranga kumwiini kumusiro khuula bumiicho bwa binjari namwe piripiri,
ne kakhali arumikhira kumwiini kumwangu.
Seonaka engaanu khulwe khuula khubi tawe,
lundi amanyile khukiula khulwe khubisiliakho ekorokocho,
mala se arakaka bumiicho tawe.
Limanya lino lioosi liama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kamarekekha niko Wele akhola kali ke limanya,
mala buli lwoosi kekholekhanga.

Alutare eya Wele, Yerusalemu lulwene lwabunile!
Lukoba luboofu nilwo Daudi amenyamo lwakwile.
Lekha kumwiiko kukundi,
namwe kibili kiche mala kibire,
ne naikara chakio ne biise biakio
mala Wele alareera kamabi khu lukoba luboofu lulaangwa luli, “Alutare eya Wele.”
Liliila ne liliesasaara bilabaao
mala lukoba lwoosi lulaba nga alutare eyichuulekho kamafuki
Wele alibwaakala lukoba luboofu alubotookhelele
mala alwekhiine.
Yerusalemu luliba nga simakoombe sikhola kamaani khulomalomela asi mu liloba
ne khunyelesia khamilo khukhwama mu lipukhuulu.
Yerusalemu, bakeni boosi babakhwibwaakala baliuchwa busa nga lutamuusi,
ne banamae babwe barisia balisalanila busa nga kamatere.
Ao ne nao, ne khulekha khumanya tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alimureesia enywe khukhwama khufula eye mbembeesi endafu,
ne literema lie sibala.
Aliruma sisifuusia ne kumulilo kukwerika.
Nio banamae boosi be chikholo chilikho ne chibwaakala lukoba luboofu lwe alutare eya Wele,
bulwaani bwabwe boosi ne bibiindu biabio, buli siindu siliwao busa nga kamarooro,
nga sisiindu nisio omundu ebaasiisie mu silo.
Chikholo choosi chibusiane alala khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu
chiliba nga omundu owe njala, oroora ali alikho alia
ne oli enyokha ali njala,
namwe nga omundu owe bulesia oroora ali alikho anywa kameechi
ne oli enyokha bulesia bwamukhayile.
Chiililila khuuba basilu! Chiililila khubofula!
Meela ne seli khulwe ndali yosi yosi tawe!
Meela busa ne yakhaba ne mukhanywelekho lilwa tawe.
mala ekaasie chimoni chenywe, enywe bang'oosi ne khubiimba kimirwe kienywe, baloli.
Ne kamalola kano koosi khwinywe kaliba nga burume nibwo baandiike mu sitabu nisio bafuuniikhe khulwe khusirakho kumuuri. Mwaba ne mu siyilila omundu yesi yesi onyala asooma ne mumuboolela muli “Soma kano,” alaloma ali, “Senyala khusisoma tawe, sikila siafuuniikhwe khulwe kumuuri.”
Ne baelesia omundu okhamanyile khusoma tawe, ne baloma bali, “Soma kano,” alaloma ali, “Senyala khusoma tawe.”
ne kakhali kamakhuwa kabwe kali ka busa, ne kimiooyo kiabwe kili abuundu aandi.
Edini yabwe eli busa siindumo tawe,
ne kakhali kali kamalaka ne kimiima kie babaandu babwe nikio batiila busa emurwe.
Abo bali bakesi balakaluukhana bekele basilu
ne bukesi bwabwe bwoosi bulaba bwa busa.”
Abo bakhaka khukisa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lirekekha liabwe bali ne silaamo.
Bakholela lirekekha liabwe mu bwikisi mala bebaasia bali se aliio olababona tawe,
namwe omanyile niko bakhola tawe.
Siina siboofu, khukhila sisiindi, omubuumbi namwe liloba?
Sisiindu nisio omundu abuumbile sinyala siamuboolela sili,
“Ewe se wambuumba tawe?” Namwe sinyala siamuboolela sili,
“Somanyile nisio olikho okhola tawe?”
Nga lusimo luboola luli,
enyuma we siise sitiiti kumusiru kulekela kumukuunda,
ne kumukuunda kulekela kumusiru.
Nga endaalo eyo neliola, bamiinyi baliulila sitabu ne sisomwa lukali,
ne babofu ba baamenya mu siilima balimoka ne khubona.
Bataambi ne babeboombia balinyoola busangaafu nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Omutakatifu, Wele owa Isiraeli aananga.
Sikila bamayaanu bakhabunisibwe,
balekelesia bakhatambeo,
Ne abo boosi baberekekhera kamamayaanu balafwa.
Wele alibunia abo babeelanga babaandi,
abo bakhiingililanga sinyaasio sie babi,
ne nabo balomanga bubeeyi khukhiingilila babaandu,
basuubilwa bakhanyoola bung'ali bwabwe tawe.
Nio luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli owareesia Aburahamu khukhwama mu butinyu aboola ali,
“Baandu base, enywe se mulaambwa chisoni lundi tawe,
ne se mulabiililwa mu moni lundi khulwe khuambwa chisoni tawe.
Nga ne mukhabone babaana nibo khamuelesie,
nono mukhafukiilile muli ese ndi Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Nio mulimanya muli ese ndi Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Mulimba ese luyali mala mwime mu buri khwise.
Babaandu basilu balieyika khumanyilisia
ne abo babanala khukhwelung'unya busiele,
balisangaalila khukhwekisibwa.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali,
“Bali ne silaamo babaana babakholela sileka.
Bakhola lirekekha liabwe likhali liliase tawe,
baali ne liambaana likhali lie lilienya liase tawe,
mala batasa bumayaanu khu bumayaanu.
Bacha Misiri khuyiima buyeeti,
ne bakhareebire likaambila liase tawe.
Benya Misiri sibaliinde,
nio basuubila mu mwami owa Misiri.
Ne khwako buyeeti bwo mwami owa Misiri bulekela chisoni,
ne buliindi mu siniini sia Misiri echangalaalo.
Akhaba barumwa babwe,
ne bolile khale mu ngoba cha Misiri cha Soani ne Hane,
babaandu ba Yuda bakhesonie
bali buli lwoosi basuubilanga ekholo ekhasuubilwa tawe,
ekholo ekhabayeeta tawe ne benya buyeeti.”
Obuno buli burume bwa Wele khu solo eye mu sichiimi sie bunaswa:
Barumwa bacha chingeendo chibira mu sibala sie busiku,
niio chitalang'i ne niio chindemu che bufwisi chili ne yabeebe.
Basutila khu punda ne khu ngamia biianwa bie bukusi bwe angaaki lukali,
khuyilila ekholo ekhanyala yabaelesia buyeeti bwosi bwosi tawe.
Buyeeti nibwo Misiri siaananga buli bwa busa.
Khwako nasilangile ndi, “Kunaniinga kukheera tawe.”
Wele amboolela ese, khuandika mu sitabu nga babaandu ne bali,
nio kabeo kamaandiko kakhawao tawe, nga bali bamayaanu.
Buli lwosi bali bareengu khu Wele,
buli lwosi bali babea,
buli lwosi baloba khurekeeresia kamekisio ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Baboolela bang'oosi basile busa.
Baboola bali, “Mukhakhuboolela ka ng'ali tawe.
Khemukhuboolele niko efwe khwenya khuulile,
lekha efwe khuulile kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi busa.
Khurure ebweeni, mala okhakhiingilila chingila chefwe tawe.
Efwe se khunyala khuulila ko mutakatifu wowo Wele owa Isiraeli tawe.”
Khwako kano niko Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli alikho aboola,
“Sikila enywe mulekelesia likhuwa lino,
musuubila mukhupia sibi ne bumayaanu ne khubieyikina.
Khwako bumayaanu buno bukhabe khwinywe.
Nga lulwafwa luuli mwisiisi lileeyi liikeyile,
liili siimbi khukwa,
nilio khukwa khwayo khwicha khangu busa.
Mulatikha busa nga enyuungu eye liloba eyatikhaake bubi,
mala se sinyoolekhao sicho sibalaayi,
sie khukhwanjalilakho kumulilo tawe,
namwe watayilakho kameechi khukhwama mu sebele tawe.”
Omwami WELE, Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli aboolela babaandu ali,
“Mukhwekanila ne khuulukha mulanyoola buonia.
Mubusisi ne busuubili bikhabe kamaani kenywe.” Ne mwaloba khukhola!
Nekhali enywe murekekha khukhwilukha khukhwama khu basiku benywe,
mu khutimia chifarasi chitima khangu.
Ne enywe muli ng'ali khukhwikoba lili nilio mukhoyeele mukhole!
Enywe mwibaasia muli chifarasi chenywe chitima khangu lukali,
ne abo bamutimania balaba khangu khu mukhila enywe!
Enywe eelefu ndala mulelukha nga mubona omusiku wenywe mulala,
ne basiku baraano banyala busa khumukhola enywe mweesi mwilukhe.
Se siliio sisiindu siosi siosi silarama sie banamae benywe,
nekhali lusaala lwe bendera yenywe lwong'ene nilwo lularama khu sikulu khungaaki!
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alindiliile khumukholela enywe siisa.
Werekekhe khumukholela siisa sikila buli lwosi akholanga kali ng'ali.
Bali nekhabi abo baara lisuubila liabwe mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Enywe babaandu mumenyile Yerusalemu se mulalila lundi tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne siisa ne mumulilila niye khukhwenya buyeeti, alamukholela.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukhola mu bire mu biise biiandalafu ne kakhali omwene alabao khumwekesia, mala se mulamwima lundi tawe.
Mwaba ne muyiiyayiiya khu ngila lubeka luseecha namwe lukhasi mulaulila kumumilo kwewe enyuma wenywe ne kuboola kuli, “Engila eli ano. Kendelakho.”
Mulabukula bifwaani bienywe bibiabakhwa ne efwesa ne bibiafuunukhwa esahabu mala mulabimwaata eyo nga binyaalu, ne mulayokela muli, “Ndure mu moni!”
Buli lwoosi nga mumiicha bumiicho bwenywe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaruma efula ebukhole bichoe mala alamukhola mube ne likesa lilayi, ne chikhaafu chenywe chilaba ne kamayilwe kamakali.
Chieeyi ne chipunda chilimanga kimikuunda kienywe chilalia bunyaasi ne kimilele kimilayi.
Khu ndaalo niyo chingoba che basiku benywe chilitiilwa ne babaandu bacho berwe, chinjichi chilikha khukhwama mu buli sikulu ne lukulu.
Kumwesi kulikhosia nga enyanga, ne enyanga elikhosia khukhwola saba khukhila nga ebechanga busiele, nga buwaanga bwe chindaalo saba ne bukhosia mu ndala. Kano kalikholekha nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naliba ne alikho asilikha kamakoonjo ke babaandu bewe niko abapa.
Lola lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liama aleeyi,
liburukha lirima ne liliisi likali.
Kumunwa kwewe kwechuule lirima liewe,
ne kamakhuwa kewe kali nga kumulilo kukwosia.
Kumuuya kwewe kuli nga luluuchi lulwichuule,
lwolile khu sikiingi,
khukabukhania chikholo ne sichichungo sie libunia,
ne khuchirakho sisiindu sibakhiingilila be khubatimia.
Ne kakhali enywe, babaandu ba Wele mulisangaala mala mwimbe nga mukholanga silo sia naikara endakatifu. Muliba basangaafu nga abo bakeendela khu mienya ne khu khuupa kimilele khu ngila yabwe ne bacha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omuliindi owa Isiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikhola buli mundu aulile kumumilo kwewe kwe saambo eye bubwami mala eulile kamaani ke lirima liewe. Bilabaao lilirika lie kumulilo, lirundukha lie kamafuumbi, kamaarara, ne fula eye luucho.
Baashuru baliterema nga baliulila kumumilo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala baulile kamaani ke siikhupo siewe.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nachiililila khukhupa babaandu bewe balichila alala ne kimienya kie ching'oma ne kamatuungu. Wele omwene alipana ne Baashuru.
Khaale abuundu abao arekekhwa niio kumulilo kumukali kulioselia omwami owa Ashuru. Abuundu abwene ali liloo liboofu lundi libalaayi. Kumulilo kuliyo ne chiikhu chingali. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhaele kumuuya kwe njaso kuambisie.

Bali ne butinyu abo bacha e Misiri khuyiima buyeeti, ne khukhweyika chifarasi,
Babeyikina kamakaari ke banamae sikila bali bakali,
ne mu farasi sikila chili ne kamaani lukali,
Ne kakhali se beyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli tawe,
namwe bamureeba niye buyeeti tawe.
Amanyile nisio alikho akhola!
Aruma butinyu.
Akholanga ke liriisia liewe khunyaasia babaandu bamayaanu,
ne nabo ba babaliindanga.
Bamisiri bali babaandu busa, se bali Wele tawe,
ne chifarasi chabwe chili chisaang'i busa se chili roho tawe.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakololosia kumukhono kwewe,
omuyeeti akhetuye ne niye bayeeta akwe asi,
mala boombi balifwila alala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Bakhaba babaayi ne baapa lulwang'a ne khuyokela bariena
se banyala barisia etalang'i yelukha,
yalekha sisiaayo nisio yirire tawe.
Kali kario se siliio sinyala siakhiingilila ese,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndekhe khuliinda sikulu Sayuni tawe.
Bulayi bwene nga enyuni ne bechanga khu siswi siayo,
ne liinda kamaana kayo,
nio ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikhiingilila Yerusalemu ne khu luliinda.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Baandu ba Isiraeli,
enywe mwakholile bumayaanu khwise ne khukhumbingania.
Ne luno khemungobolele.
Siise silikho sicha,
nisio enywe mweesi mulimwaatilakho bifwaani bie bumayaanu ebio,
nibio mwang'oona khukhwama khu fwesa ne khu sahabu.
Ashuru silibunisibwa mwiie,
ne kakhali se aliio omundu olisibunia tawe,
Baashuru balilukha khukhwama mwiie,
ne baele babwe baliambwa babakhole nasioobi.
Omwami wabwe alilukha mu buri,
ne babemeelesi baliba ne buuri bukali,
mala belukhe balekhe chipendera chabwe che liie.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye besaayanga mu Yerusalemu
ne niye kumulilo kwewe kuburukhanga khulwe chimbosio.

Endaalo ndala elibao niyo omwami alibao owamiia ne lukoosi,
lundi babaana be bubwami be kholo baliamiia ne bung'ali.
Buli mulala khu nibo aliba nga sisibiimbilo khu khuungu,
lundi nga abuundu e khukhwekhisia embembeesi.
Baliba nga chinjichi chibisia mu sichiimi,
nga sisiniini sie libaale liboofu mu sichiimi.
Chimoni chabwe ne kamaru,
biliikukha khulwe buyeeti bwe babaandu.
Se baliluyililakho lundi tawe,
ne kakhali balikhola mu limanyilisia,
mala niko baliboola kaliba niko benya.
Se aliio omundu olibaasia ali omusilu ali ne lukoosi,
namwe aboole ali omundu omubi ali owa ng'ali tawe.
Omusilu alomaloma ke busilu,
mala ebaasia bibiindu bimayaanu.
Niko akhola nende niko aboola kali bukhomo khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne salisianga be njala,
namwe saliaana sie khunywa khu baandu be bulesia tawe.
Omundu omusilu ali omumayaanu ne akholanga ke bumayaanu,
akwangwaana khumalao bataambi khulwe bubeeyi bwewe,
mala abakhiingilila bakhanyoola bung'ali bwabwe tawe.
Ne omundu we lukoosi akholanga bung'ali,
mala eema khu bung'ali.
Enywe bakhasi mumenyile ne mukheendekhelakho tawe,
rekeeresia niko ese ndikho ndoma.
Enywe luno munyala khuba ne mwikuure,
ne kakhali siise nga kumwiiko kukwiicha mukhafwe kumwoyo,
sikila chisabibu se chilibao nicho mufuna tawe.
Enywe mwamenyilenge limenya liliangu,
likhalimo simwiembelesia tawe, ne luno terema mu buri!
Yefuula chingubo chenywe,
mala mweboele bitasi mu bibuno.
Yeumba kamakhono kenywe mu bubeeleli
sikila kimikuunda kie ngakha
ne kimikuunda kie kimisabibu kionakwe,
mala bisaala bie kamawa ne mbululwe,
bilikho bimela mu maloba ke babaandu base.
Lila sikila chinju choosi nicho babaandu basangaalilamo,
ne lukoba luboofu lulwaba ne lwechula bulamu.
Akhaba lichipi liosi lilanjukhwa,
ne lukoba luboofu lulanjukhilwa elala.
Chingo ne chingoba, che kamasiisi kakaluliindanga,
kaliba kamatechule buli lwosi.
Chipunda che mundaa chilikeendakeendamo,
ne kamakheese kalinyoolayo kamayilwe.
Ne Wele lundi alikhurumira efwe roho wewe.
Kamaloba kakhalikho ne ngakha kalikela ke ngakha,
ne kimikuunda kiliama bibiaamo bilayi.
Buli abuundu mu sibala,
buluungi ne bung'ali bulikholwa.
Sikila buli mundu alikhola kang'ali,
kumuleembe ne buliindi bilibao buli lwosi.
Babaandu ba Wele se baliba ne lilieendekhelela tawe,
ne chingo chabwe chiliba ne kumuleembe ne buliindi.
(Ne kamaarara kalikwa mu musiru,
mala lukoba luboofu lulitechulwa lukwe.)
Buli mundu aliba omusangaafu ariena khuba ne kameechi kamakali khulwe biakhulia,
ne kamayilwe ke buliindi bulayi buli abuundu khulwe chipunda ne chikhaafu.

Basiku befwe balamilwe!
Banuulile lundi bachamilwe.
Ne kakhali siise siabwe sie khunuula ne khuchaama sikhawe,
ne babene bakhabe nibo banuula ne khuchongela.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukholele siisa.
Khwareere lilieyikina liefwe mwiwe,
ba engabo yefwe buli ndaalo mala okhuonie mu biise bie butinyu.
Nga ewe nokhupanila efwe,
chikholo chilukha buyoka bwe liie.
Kimiaandu kiabwe,
kinyoolekha mala kiyaaywa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omukali ariena!
Amia khu buli siindu.
Alichusia Yerusalemu bung'ali ne buluungi,
mala aelesie ekholo kumuleembe.
Buli lwoosi alilanga babaandu bewe,
mala abaelesie limanya ne bukesi.
Libiikhilo liabwe liboofu lili buriaani bwabwe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Banyindaafu balikho basaba buyeeti.
Barumwa ba bakhaka khureera kumuleembe balikho balila burafu.
Kimiyila kimiboofu kili ne busiku bukali,
mala se aliio na mulala okibirakho tawe.
Buambaani bwafuniikhe ne chindakaano chonaakwe.
Se aliio na mulala oelesibwa lukoosi lundi tawe.
Sibala sili busa mala sianjuukhwe,
kimisiru kia Lebanoni kiakhukhumuusie kamasaafu,
litooma lie ngakha lia Sharoni lili nga sisiangalaamwe.
Ne mu Bashani ne khu sikulu sia Karimeli kimirongooro kilikho kikhukhumusia kamasaafu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela chikholo ali,
“Ese luno ndakhola sikholwa,
ndekesia nga nendi ne bunyali.
Enywe mung'oona lirekekha likhali ne bukhala tawe,
ne buli siindu nisio mukhola sili busa.
Roho wase ali nga kumulilo kukhamubunie enywe.
Muliatikhaka nga kamabaale niko bosia bang'oonemo esimendi,
nga kamawa ne kayia kakwa esimendi.
Lekha buli mundu oli aambi ne aleeyi,
aulile niko ese nakholile mala afukiilile bunyali bwase.”
Babaandu bamayaanu ba Sayuni balikho baterema mu buri ne baboola bali,
“Bukhalaki bwa Wele buli kumulilo kukwosia buli lwosi.
Aliio khwifwe onyala akhila kumulilo kuno ku?”
Munyala mwakhila mwaba ne muboola ne khukhola kang'ali.
Mukharumikhira bunyali khubea bataambi,
lundi mukhakaanila asoya tawe.
Mukhaambaana ne baberi tawe,
namwe khukhola bibiindu bibiindi bimayaanu tawe.
Nio enywe mulaba ne kumuleembe,
mulaliindwa bulayi nga muli mu lukoba lwe kamasiisi ke kamaani,
mulaba ne biakhulia bie khulia ne kameechi ke khunywa.
Lundi enywe mulabona omwami ne amiia ne sambo endayi lukali,
khu sibala sibalaayi esio chimbeka choosi.
Buuri bwenywe bukhale bwe bakeni baroosia busuuru,
bulaba busa likhebulila.
Se mulibona lundi baakwa be kibonio,
balomaloma lulomo nilwo enywe mukhaulila tawe.
Lola Sayuni!
Lukoba luboofu nilwo efwe khukholelanga kimilimo kiefwe kie dini.
Lola Yerusalemu!
Aliba abuundu e buliindi bulayi ne khumenyamo!
Aliba nga liiema likhauyisibwa tawe,
nga nilio bichaangi bialio bikhakhuulwanga tawe,
lundi nga niio kimikoye kialio kikhakhalikhanga tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhwekesie efwe luyali lwewe.
Khukhamenye khundulo khwe chinjichi chimbalaayi ne chindiiti,
ne akhaba chimeeli che basiku se chilibiramo tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omukhalaki, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omwami wefwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Omwami wefwe mala akhakhuonie.
Kimikoye kie khu meeli echo choosi se kiyeeta siindu tawe,
se kitila kumurongooro kwe pendera kwime abwene tawe,
namwe engubo se bambukha tawe.
Nono biyaaywa biechuule swa, bilakabanwamo,
akhaba baleme balinyoola kumukabwa kwabwe.
Se aliio omumenywa oliloma ali “Ese ndwala”,
babaandu bamenyileyo,
balibeelwa bumayaanu bwabwe.

Babaandu be chikholo choosi khemwiche ano!
Khe mwebuusie ano mala murekeeresie.
Lekha sibala sioosi ne buli mundu osimenyilekho eche ano mala arekereesie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambile lirima chikholo choosi,
ne banamae babwe boosi.
Achikhalakile chibune.
Kimibili kiabwe se kilisiikhwa tawe,
ne kakhali kilibao busa kibole ne khuunya,
ne bikulu bilichula sifuki.
Likulu lilikoriokha nga sitabu ne siulukuuswe,
ne ching'enieesi chilikhukhumukha nga kamasaafu ne kakwa,
khukhwama khu musabibu namwe khu mutuli.
ne luno elarema Edomu,
babaandu nibo akhalakila khubuna.
Embalu yewe elifunikhwa ne kamafuki ne kamafura kabwe,
nga kamalasile ne kamafura ke chimbusi nibio baosia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliaana liiosio mu lukoba lwa Bosira,
alikhola lino libe lifwa likali mu sibala sia Edomu.
Babaandu balibunjakala busa nga chisaang'i che mundaa ne chiuunwa chinjoka,
mala sibala silichula sifuki ne khufunikhwa ne kamafura.
Sino sili siise nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alireeseliakho Sayuni,
mala alieliacha basiku ba Sayuni.
Chinjichi cha Edomu chilikaluukhana chikele elamu,
ne liloba lilikaluukhana likele kumulilo kumurafu.
Sibala sioosi siliya nga elamu.
ne liliisi liliitukha buli lwosi.
Sibala sikhabe sichiimi selukho na selukho,
ne se aliio olisibiramo lundi tawe mindali.
Ne kakhali kisilili ne chinjekeche chilisibina,
Chisikhiikhi ne khooro chilimenyamo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alibarerera chingoyaani,
ne sisiayuumba khu bemeelesi basio.
Salibao Omwami osiamiia tawe,
ne babemeelesi se balibao tawe.
Kamawa ne kamarakaru bilimela mu machipi ne mungoba che kamasiisi,
chingipwe ne chisikhiikhi chilimenyamo.
Chisolo che mundaa chilimenyamo,
ne kimisieno kililangana.
Kusolo kwe kamakana kulichayo ne kuyima abuundu niio kuolela.
Chisikhiikhi chiliombakha biswi biacho chireere kamaki,
chaluule mala chikhusie
chingosia chilibuusania sia ndala.
Menielesia mu sitabu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sie bibuumbe bilamu mala musome niko siboola,
se siliio silala khu bibuumbe bino silitambamo tawe,
ne se siliio silitamba sisiasie tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka libe lirio,
ne niye omwene akhabibuusie alala.
Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene niye olibakabaniamo sibala,
mala aelesie buli mulala kumukabwa kwewe.
Balimenya mu sibala selukho na selukho,
mala siliba sisiabwe mindali na mindali.

Sisiangalaamwe siliekhoya,
bimuli bilimulikha mu sichiimi.
Sisiangalamwe siikheembe ne khukhwekhoya,
siliba silayi nga bikulu bia Lebanoni
sie ngakha nga kimikuunda Karimeli ne Sharoni.
Buli mundu alibona bulayi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lolakho bukali bwewe ne bunyali.
ne kamasikamo kamatekhele.
Boolela buli mulala ofwiile kumwoyo oli,
“Ba ne kamaani ne mukharia tawe!
Wele alikho echa khumureesia,
akhapie sibi basiku benywe.”
Babofu balibona,
ne bamiinyi baliulila.
ne abo bakhalomaloma tawe, baliyokela ne bekhoya.
Chinjichi chilibisia mu siangalaamwe.
Kumuyekhe kuubilile kuliekela enyanja,
ne sibala sisioomu silichulamo chisebele.
Niio chinjusi chamenyanga aliekela litiisi,
eboonga elikela bisele ne kamakoloolwe.
Kumuyila kumuboofu kulibayo
kulilaangwa bali “Kumuyila kwe butakatifu.”
Se aliio omumayaanu olikeenda khu muyila okwo tawe.
Se aliio omusilu olitiimia abo bakubirirakho tawe.
Chitalang'i se chilibayo tawe,
chisaang'i chindafu se chilibirirakho tawe.
Abo nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aonia balikulotelakho engo.
Baliola Yerusalemu ne busangaafu,
balimba ne khukhwekhoya.
Balisangaala buli lwosi,
sikila se baliba ne ngunyi ne bubeeleli tawe.

Mu mwiiko kwa ekhumi na kine nikwo omwami Hesekia abelakho omwami owa Yuda, Senakeribu, omwami owa Ashuru ebwaakala chingoba che kamasiisi cha Yuda mala achiula.
Nio omwami owa Ashuru aruma Rabushake khukhwama Lakishi khu mwami Hesekia mu Yerusalemu ne banamae bakali khukhwenya omwami Hesekia eaane omwene khu nibo. Omwimeelesi eema khumuyila niio banabi be chingubo banabilanga, ambi alukhwakhwa lureeranga kameechi khukhwama mu litiisi lia ngaaki.
Bayuda bataru barura enje khumwakaanila, baba omwimeelesi we lichipi, Eliakimu okhwa Hilikia omuandiki owe koti, Shebuna, no mukhulu owemeelelanga biandike, Yoa okhwa Asafu.
Rabushake ababoolela ali omwami omukali enyile khumanya nisio omwami Hesekia asuubilemo lukali.
Ayingiilila ali, “Ewe wibaasia oli kamakhuwa kanyala kabukula bubweyaangu bwe burana ne kamaani ke banamae? Naanu niye weyikina nio alekelesie ba Ashuru?
Oleyikinanga Misiri sikhuyeete, ne lilieneli lilinga khurumikhira sisele nga esiimbo kane khafunikhe mala khakhuune kumukhono. Omwami owa Misiri ali ario khu omundu yesi yesi omweyikina.”
Rabushake achiililila khuloma ali, “Namwe enywe mumboolela muli mulikho mweyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe? Aba abuundu wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi e khusaayilao ne chialutare nicho Hesekia onaka, nga ne aboolela babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu khusaayila alutare ndala yong'ene.
Ese ndafukiilisiana nanywe mu lisina lio mwami. Ese ndamuelesia enywe chifarasi chielefu chibili mwaba ne munyala mwanyoola babaandu bakali abo bachitimia.
Enywe se muli kumusuumbu kumuboofu akhaba omwimeelesi Omuashuru omukeekhe tawe, ne kakhaba kario mweyikina Bamisiri khulwe banamae be kamakaari nende be chifarasi.
Enywe mwibaasia muli nebwaakala sibala sienywe ne khusibunia nekhali ne buyeeti bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe ku? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene amboolela ese khusiibwaakala ne khusibunia.”
Nio Eliakimu, Shebuna ne Yoa baboolela omwimeelesi omukhulu oyo bali, “Lomaloma Luaramaiki. Khulumanyile. Okhalomaloma Lueburania tawe, babaandu boosi bali khwisiisi barekereesie.”
Rabushake ali, “Enywe mwibaasia muli enywe no mwami mweng'ene nibo omwami wase andumirekho khumuboolela bibiindu bino bioosi? Se kario tawe, ese ndikho ndomaloma khu baandu babekhaale khu lisiisi bakhalie biibi biabwe ne khunywa kameenyi kabwe bulayi bwene busa nga enywe ne mukhakhole.”
Nio Rabushake chana oyo enyokha mala aloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki mu Lueburania ali, “Rekeeresia niko omwami owa Ashuru alikho amuboolela.
Alikho amukaambila enywe, mukhalekha Hesekia amubea tawe. Hesekia sanyala khumuonia enywe tawe.
Ne mukhamulekha amuombelesia khukhweyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Enywe mukhebaasia muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamuonia enywe namwe muli alakhiingilila banamae befwe be Baashuru khuula lukoba lwenywe tawe.
Mukharekeeresia ka Hesekia tawe! Omwami owa Ashuru alaka enywe murure enje we lukoba mala mwelekhuule. Enywe mulafukiililwa khulia chisabibu khukhwama khu misabibu kienywe ne chinduli khukhwama khu mirongooro kienywe ne khunywa kameechi khukhwama mu sebele chenywe,
khukhwola nga omwami namuuya amuyile mu sibala sili nga sisienywe sisiene niio kimikuunda kie kimisabibu kirusia endali kili, lundi engaanu eye khung'oona kimikaati.
Enywe mukhalekha Hesekia amusilwaasia mu khwibaasia muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamuonia tawe, wele be chikholo chichiindi chosi chosi baoniakho bibala biabwe khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru ku?
Bali waena luno, wele be Bahamali, ne Aripadi? Wele ba Sefaribaimu bali waena. Alikhoo owaoniakho Samaria ku?
Asina niio yesi yesi khu wele be bibala bino bioosi aoniakho sibala siabwe khukhwama khu mwami wefwe? Nono sina silamukholanga enywe ne mwibaasia muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala aonia Yerusalemu?”
Babaandu basila busa chu bulayi bwene busa nga omwami Hesekia ababoolele khusila, se balomaloma likhuwa liosi liosi tawe.
Nio Eliakimu, Shebuna ne Yoa batabula chingubo chabwe mu bubeeleli mala bacha baboolela omwami niko Rabushake owa Ashuru aboolile.

Ao nao nga Omwami Hesekia aulila liboola liabwe, atabula chingubo chewe mu bubeeleli, efwara kamakunia mala acha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aruma Eliakimu owimelelanga lichipi, Shebuna, omuandiki owe mu koti ne basaayi bakhulu khu mung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amosi. Boosi baba befwarire kamakunia.
Obuno nibwo burume nibwo abaruma babolele Isaya bali, “Luno eli endaalo eye kumunaanio khulikho khupa sibi mala khuli musoni. Efwe khuli nga omukhasi owirekekhe khusaala mala ali omutekhele lukali sanyala khusaala tawe.
Omwami owa Ashuru arumire Rabushake khukhoma Wele omenyile mindali. Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo aulile bukhomo buno mala apie sibi abo bamukhomile. Khwako saba Wele alinde babaandu befwe babaramayo.”
Nga Isaya ne anyoola burume bwo mwami Hesekia,
akabosiayo likhuwa lino: “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolela ewe ali okhalekha Baashuru bakhuriikhirisia tawe, khulwe liboola liabwe bali ese se nyala namuonia tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhola omwami owa Ashuru aulile ka bari, ne kalamukhola akobole mu sibala siewe, mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamukhola eererwe ebweeneyo.”
Rabushake amanya ali omwami arurire Lakishi mala alikho akhupana ne lukoba lwa Libuna. Acha ebweeneyo khumureeba.
Likhuwa liolela Baashuru lili banamae ba Misiri, barangiriirwe no mwami Tirihaka owa Esopia, balikho becha khubebwaakala. Nga omwami owa Ashuru ne aulila lino, arumira omwami Hesekia,
owa Yuda ebarwa khumuboolela ali, “Wele niye ewe olikho osuubilamo akhuboolele ali ewe solakwa mu makhono kase tawe, ne ewe okhalekha omwenoyo akhubea tawe.
Ewe waulila niko omwami owa Ashuru akholanga khu sibala siosi siosi nisio akhalake khukhwonaka. Ewe wibaasia oli onyala webacha ku?
Bakuuka base babunia chingoba chimboofu cha Kosani, Aruni, ne Resefu, mala bera babaandu ba Beseteni babamenyanga mu Telasari ne se aliio mulala khu wele babwe owanyala khubaonia tawe.
Babaami be chingoba chimboofu cha Hamati, Aripadi, Sefaribaimu, Hena ne Iba bali wae?”
Omwami Hesekia abukula ebarwa khukhwama khu barumwa akisoma. Mala acha engila mu Lukaangu, ara ebarwa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala asaba ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, owekhala khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami, angaaki we bibuumbe bie chindaa, ewe weng'ene oli Wele, wamiianga khu bwami bwoosi bwe sibala. Ewe wabaang'ana sibala ne likulu.
Luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khuulile efwe mala olole khu kalekholekhanga khwifwe. Rekeeresia koosi niko Senakeribu alikho aboola ke khukhukhoma ewe, Wele omenyile mindali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, efwe fweesi khumanyile khuli babaami ba Ashuru babunia chikholo chingali bakhola bibala biabwe bianjukhwa,
ne khukhwosia bawele babwe, bakhaaba bawele tawe, ne kakhali bifwaani bie kimirongooro busa ne kamabaale bibiang'oonwa no mundu.
Luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, khuonie khukhwama khu Baashuru, nio chikholo che sibala sioosi chilamanya chili ewe weng'ene oli Wele.”
Nio Isaya okhwa Amosi aruma burume khu Omwami Hesekia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa Isiraeli aboola ali: Sikila wasabile khuloondekhana no mwami Senakeribu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolile ali,
‘Lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lukhuchekheelela ewe Senakeribu,
ne khukhulekelesia.
Ewe wibaasia oli okhomilenge ne khuchekheelela nanu?
Ewe wabeele ne mbelekeu khwise, Omutakatifu Wele owa Isiraeli.
Ewe warumire bakholi bowo khukhwefumia ebweeni wase,
oli khulwe kamakaari ke liie waula bikulu bileeyi bia Lebanoni.
Wefumia oli ebweeneyo warema kimitarakwa kimileeyi ne sayipurasi kimilayi lukali,
mala oli wola mu musiru akari.
Wefumia oli wayaba chisebele mala wanywa kameechi mu bibala bikeni,
ne lundi oli banamae bowo baswalakilila luluuchi lwa Naili lwateenya.’
“Ewe sewaulilakho oli
ese narekekha lino lioosi khaale tawe?
Ne luno nalikholile.
Ese nakhuelesia ewe bunyali bwe khukaluukhasia chingoba chisire chibe kamaumbu.
Babaandu babamenyamo se baba ne kamaani tawe, baria ne khurangararwa.
Baaba nga bunyaasi mu mukuunda namwe enyoonyi echoanga khunju,
niyo luucho lubile lwe bukwe lwosiisie.
“Ne kakhali manyile buli siindu khwiwe,
nisio okhola nende niio ocha.
Namanya nga ewe ne wambiila.
Naboolelwa libiila lienelio ne lililola liowo elio,
ne ese luno ndakhukakia kumulobo mu lioolu ne ndekwe mukhanwa mwowo
mala ndakhubukula khukoboselie khu muyila nikwo wechelakho.”
Nio Isaya aboolela omwami Hesekia ali, “Esino sili simanyisio sie kakhekholekhe. Kumwiiko kuno ne kukwiicha mulangalisia busa biakhulia bie mundaa biong'ene ne mulia, ne kakhali kumwiiko kuloondakho mukhanyale khumiicha biakhulia bienywe mala mukese, lundi mubiaale kimisabibu mala mulie chisabibu.
Abo bali mu Yuda, babarama balimenya bulayi babe nga simelwa sisiekhisia kimili mwiloba mala siamanga kamatuunda.
Babaandu baliba mu Yerusalemu ne khu sikulu sia Sayuni balirama, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalake khukhola kano kakholekhe.
“Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolile khu mwami owa Ashuru: ‘Salingila mu lukoba luno, namwe asilase akhaba luembo lulala lwong'ene tawe. Se baliio banamae be chingabo baliicha embi ne lukoba luboofu luno tawe, ne babaandu se balilima lukhwakhwa balubotookhelesie tawe.
Alikobolela khungila niyo echelakho, salingila mu lukoba luboofu luno tawe. Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
Ndibabila lukoba luno ne khululiinda, khulwe samwene, sikila lisuubisia nilio nakhola ne Daudi omukholi wase.’ ”
Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha mu kambi eya Baashuru mala eera banamae chielefu emia ndala samaniini na tano oli mabwibwi, endaalo eloondakho baba balambalile bafwiile!
Nio, Senakeribu omwami owa Ashuru arekukha, akobola e Ninefe.
Endaalo ndala nga aba ne alikho asaaya mu Lukaangu lwa Nisiroki wele wewe, basoleeli bewe babili, Atameleki ne Sharesa bamwiira ne chimbalu chabwe mala belukhila mu sibala sia Ararati. Omusoleeli mulala khu basoleeli bewe bali Esarihatoni amiia nga omwami owa Ashuru.

Mu ndaalo echo omwami Hesekia alwala enga khufwa. Omung'oosi Isaya okhwa Amosi acha khumubona, mala amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ng'oona ke enju yowo, sikila olafwa solaona tawe.”
Nio Hesekia ayuukha alola siesiisi mala asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khebulila oli ese nakhukholeele ewe kimilimo mu busuubili ne buriaani bukali, mala buli lwosi ese nakhakilenge khukhola niko ewe wenya ese khole.” Mala alila lukali.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma Isaya
akobole khu Hesekia mala amuboleele ali, “Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa kukaao Daudi nauliile lisaba liowo lundi naboone kamasika kowo, ndakhulekha omenye kimiiko kikiindi ekhumi na kiraano.
Ese ndakhuonia ewe ne lukoba luboofu lwa Yerusalemu luno khukhwama khu mwami owa Ashuru, mala ndachiililila khuliinda lukoba luboofu luno.”
Isaya aboolela omwami afuluke sifuluko sie chinduli, asire khu libiimba mala alaona.
Nio omwami Hesekia areeba Isaya ali, “Simanyisio sina sisiekesia sili ese khanyale khucha mu Lukaangu?”
Isaya akobosia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhuelesia simanyisio khukhwekesia ali alakhola lilakiilisia liewe.
Khu sifwaani sie khukelekelakho bibiindu sisiombakhwa no mwami Ahasi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhola sisiniini sikobole enyuma bikele ekhumi, ne sisiniini siakobola enyuma bikele ekhumi.”
Hesekia naonile, aandika kumwenya kwe khufumia kuno,
nebaasia ndi mu ndaalo chindayi che bulamu
ndikho nja emakoombe,
se ndiba omulamu lundi tawe.
Naloma ndi se khabone Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
mu sibala sie balamu,
se khabonekho omundu lundi,
mu baandu be mu sibala tawe.
Niio emenyile asambuulwe arusiibweo khwise,
nga liiema lio mwaayi.
Nafumbile bulamu bwase nga omunabi,
Nebaasia ndi Wele akaamisie bulamu bwase.
Silo sioosi nalilila mu buchuuni,
oli etalang'i nelikho yimbepena bikuumba.
Nebaasia ndi Wele alikho akamia bulamu bwase.
Kumumilo kwase kwekala ne khu sibaala,
mala ese nalila busa nga liuusi.
Naluyilila chimoni khulwe khurangaara mwikulu
Omwami mbonie khukhwama mu butinyu buno.
Ese nyala naloma sina?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene akholile kano,
kumwoyo kwase kwabeleele se nyala nakona tawe.
Omwami ese ndamenya khulwowo weng'ene,
mbonie mala menye.
Bubeeleli bwase bulakaluukhana bwikele kumuleembe.
Ewe oonia bulamu bwase mu busiku bwoosi,
mbeele bumayaanu bwase bwoosi.
Se aliio omundu emakoombe onyala akhufumia ewe tawe,
Bafu se banyala beyikina mu busuubilifu bwowo tawe.
Balamu nibo bakhufumia ewe,
nga ese ne ndikho khufumia luno.
Bapaapa baboolelanga babaana babwe nga noli omusuubilwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wamboniisie
khulapa kamatuungu mala khwimbe efuma yowo,
khwimbe efuma mu Lukaangu lwowo ne khusiili balamu.

Mu siise esio, omwami owa Babiloni Merodaki-baladani okhwa Baladani aulila bali omwami Hesekia abeele omulwale, nio amurumira ebarwa ne siianwa.
Hesekia akanila barumwa mala abekesia buiinda bwewe, efwesa, ne sahabu, biiunya bulayi bie khura mu biakhulia kamafura kaunya bulayi, ne bibioki bie banamae bewe bioosi se siabao sisiindu mu libiikhilo namwe abuundu osi osi mu bwami bwewe nisio akhabekesia tawe.
Nio omung'oosi Isaya acha khu mwami Hesekia mala amureeba ali, “Babaandu bano bamile waena, ne bakhubooleele siina?”
Hesekia akobosia ali, “Bamile mu sibala sie aleeyi lukali, sia Babiloni.”
Babone sina mu lichipi liowo? Akobosia ali, “Babone buli siindu. Se siliio sisiindu mu libiikhilo nisio khabekeesie tawe.”
Nio Isaya aboolela Omwami ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali
siise silikho sicha nisio buli sisiindu mu lichipi, buli siindu nisio bakukaao babiikha khukhwola khu ndaalo yino, silibukulwa siyilwe e Babiloni. Se siliio silirama tawe.
Balala khu be lisaaye liowo liliene balibukulwa bayilwe aleeyi mala babalate babe bachili khulwe khukhola kimilimo mu lichipi lio mwami owa Babiloni.”
Nga omwami Hesekia ne aulila kano akanakana ali kumuleembe ne buliindi bilibao mu siise sie bulamu bwewe, nio akobosia ali, “Burume nibwo wama khumboolela khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli bulayi.”

Wele wefwe aloma ali,
“Olelesia babaandu base baolelelesie!
Andalasia babaandu ba Yerusalemu.
Baboolele oli ‘bachuunisibwe khu siise sileeyi,
ne luno bumayaanu bwabwe bwabelelwe.
Ese nabaukuumile mu bwichufu khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe bwoosi.’ ”
“Rekekhera Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi engila mu sichiimi!
Berera Wele wefwe engila mu siangalaamwe.
Yichusia buli litooma,
sikulu ne chingulu bilayaasibwa,
ne sibala siialafu silimiliisibwa.
Ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lulibonekha,
ne babaandu boosi bakhalubone
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene asuubisia.”
ne ese nakobosia ndi ndangilila siina.
Babaandu boosi bali busa nga bunyaasi,
lundi bulayi bwabwe buli busa nga bimuli bie mundaa.
Bunyaasi buniala, ne bimuli bikhukhumukha,
nga kumuuya kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kubibirakho,
ng'ali babaandu bali bunyaasi.
Bunyaasi buniala, bimuli bikhukhumukha,
ne likhuwa lia Wele wefwe lili lia mindali na mindali.
Yerusalemu cha khu sikulu angaaki, mala olangilile elomo endayi,
langilila ne kumumilo kumuboofu,
langilila chilomo chindayi.
Lomaloma okharia tawe.
Boolela chingoba cha Yuda oli Wele wenywe alikho echa!
alikho areera babaandu nibo aonia.
alibuusia kamameeme alala mala akameeme mu makhono mwewe,
mu khweoya alirangirira kanuunia.
Aliio omundu onyala akela enyanja mu fuusi,
namwe akela likulu ne kamakhono kewe ku?
Aliio omundu onyala asuta liloba lie khu sibala mu sikoombe,
namwe onyala akela bikulu ne chingulu mu sikelo siewe ku?
Naanu onyala amwekisia namwe amukaambila?
Wele areeba naanu limanya ne bukesi,
ne naanu owamweyikia engila eye buluungi,
ne naanu owamweyikia bukesi,
khu mwekesia engila eye liiulila.
Khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chikholo se chili siindu tawe,
se chikhila lime lie kameechi tawe,
bibala bie aleeyi bibiakarwa ne kameechi bili busa bibiaangu nga lutamuusi.
Chisaang'i choosi chili mu musiru kwa Lebanoni
se cholaana khuaana embosio khu Wele wefwe tawe,
ne kimirongooro kiakwo kili mikeekhe lukali khubwana kumulilo.
Chikholo choosi se chili siindu khu niye tawe.
Lundi se chibalikhakho nga siindu tawe.
Onyala wamwinoosia oli ali nga sina?
Se ali nga sifwaani nisio babaandu bakhola tawe,
nisio babasi babakhangakho esahabu mala basimikha khu musiingi kwe fwesa tawe.
Omundu okhanyala bukusi bwe fwesa namwe esahabu tawe,
aroboranga kumurongooro kukhabola tawe.
Ayimanga omubeechi oomanyile lukali khubeecha sifwaani siikhatengaala tawe.
Enywe se mumanyile tawe?
Enywe se mwaboolelwa khaale tawe ku?
Se mwaulila nga sibala ne siarakikha tawe ku?
Liang'oonwa ne naye owikhalanga khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami angaaki we liloba,
ne babaandu asi babonekha busa nga kamatete.
Abalaaya likulu liewe busa bulayi bwene busa nga liiema lie khumenyamo.
Ekhisianga babaami be kamaani,
mala ababoombia baba sisiindu busa.
Bali nga bimelwa bitoro bimela bulayi bwene nga bisiili khuromba.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naruma ekhuungu, bioma busa khangu,
mala biuchibwa nga chikhanja.
Wele omutakatifu anyala walekhaasibwa khu naanu?
Aliio omundu yesi yesi nga niye ku?
Lola mungaaki owabaang'ana ching'enieesi nicho olikho obona chino nanu?
Oyo ochirusianga enje nga banamae amanyile chili chinga.
Mala alanganga buli ndala lisina!
Bunyali bwewe buli bukali, lukali seliio ndala khu nicho ekhaliio tawe!
Siina nono Isiraeli ne welung'unya,
oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se wamanyile butinyu bwowo tawe,
namwe se akhuliinda noumiia mu kakhali ka ng'ali?
Ewe somanyile namwe se waulilakho tawe?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele owa mindali?
Abaang'ana sibala sioosi. Saluanga, namwe saluilila tawe,
se aliio mundu omanyanga kamebaasio kewe tawe.
Aechanga abo bali batekhele kamaani,
nabo bakhali ne kamaani tawe abatinyilisianga.
Akhaba abo bali baele balalua lundi baluilile,
ne baele be siseecha balaochama.
Ne kahali abo babasuubila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe buyeeti,
balinyoola kamaani kamaya ne balinina ne chindaa nga chifuruusi,
bakhatima se balilua tawe
balikeenda ne se balua tawe.

Wele aloma ali,
“Enywe bibala bie aleeyi, sila busa mala mundekeresie,
Yirekekha khuboola kakenywe mu siina,
mulaba ne bubweyaangu bwenywe bwe khulomaloma.
Khakhwiche alala khukhalake nanu oli ng'ali.
Naanu owareera omuuli khukhwama ebukwe,
mala wamukhola omukhili buli abuundu niio acha?
Naanu omuechanga bukhili khu baami ne khu kholo?
Abeera baba nga lipukhuulu.
Buembo bwewe bubasalanisia nga likhuuchi ebweeni we khuungu.
Abaloondangakho nabatimania mala akeenda mu bulekhuule,
atima lukali oli okhetiila asi tawe.
Naanu owakhola kano kakholekha?
Naanu owebaasia mala wabisia kakabira?
Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nabao mu khurakikha,
lundi ndibao ematabusia.
“Babaandu be bibala bie aleeyi baboone niko ese kholile,
bariire ne khurenga.
Nio boosi bebuusia alala ne khukhwicha.
Buli mulala atinyilisia owasie ne aloma ali,
‘Yaya, luma kumwoyo.’
Omubeechi aboolela omubasi ali, ‘Wakholile bulayi!’
Omundu oupilila sifwaani,
atinyilisia oyo osiikhomamo kimisimari.
Baloma bali, wosielele bulayi,
bakhoma sifwaani ne kimisumari.
Enywe muli babaandu base nibo ese narobora,
be sikuka sia Aburahamu omusaale wase.
Ese nakhureera khukhwama khu ndulo khwe sibala,
Ese nakhulaanga khukhwama aleeyi,
mala nakhuboolela ndi, ‘Ewe oli omukholi wase.’ Se nakhuloba tawe, ne kakhali nakhurobora.
Okharia tawe, ese ndi ne nawe!
Ese ndi Wele wowo siosi siosi siikhakhuriikhirisia tawe!
Ese ndakhukhola obe owe kamaani mala khuyeete.
Ese ndakhuliinda ne khukhuonia.
“Abo babakhuambila lirima,
balaambwa chisoni che khukhilwa.
Abo balomana ne nawe balafwa.
Ne se balaba khu sibala tawe.
Khubeela ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo,
nakhutiila kumukhono kumuseecha,
ese khutinyilisia ewe ne khukhuboolela ndi,
‘Okharia tawe, ese ndakhuyeeta.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Oli mutiiti lundi omutekhele ewe Isiraeli,
okharia tawe, ese ndakhuyeeta.
Ese Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli ese niye okhuonianga.
Ese ndakhukhola ewe obe nga kumwiini kuula,
kulikho bikundula biya bibioki bie bibia,
oliiula bikulu mala obionake,
chingulu chilabulungukha chibe lipukhuulu.
Olichitamuusia mu mbeo luucho lulicha nacho,
lundi chilisalanisibwa ne mbembeesi.
Nono ewe olisangaala sikila ese ndi Wele wowo,
olifumia ese Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
“Nga babaandu base bakhenyalila tawe
balienya kameechi mala bakhilwe khukanyoola,
mala emumilo wabwe yoome khulwe bulesia,
ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikobosia lisaba liabwe,
Ese Wele owa Isiraeli se ndibanjukha tawe.
Ndakhola chinjichi chakukhe mu ngulu bitalalie,
ne chisebele chibe mu matooma.
Ese ndakaluukhasia sisiangalaamwe sikele kamatiisi ke kameechi,
ne sibala sisioomu siekele chisebele.
Ndakhola kimitarakwa kimele mu siangalaamwe,
ne kimikunga, bimuli ne kimiseituni.
Kimisiru kilakhula mu sibala sie sitalalie,
kimisiru kia banasi, kimifunje ne Saipurasi.
Nio babaandu balibona kano,
mala balimanya bali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okholile.
Baliicha bamanye bali Wele Omutakatifu,
owa Isiraeli niye okholile kano kekholekha.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Omwami owa Isiraeli aboola ali,
“Enywe bawele be chikholo boola niko muli nako,
reera liyingana nilio muli nalio!
Khemwiche ano mala mung'oole kakhekholekhe,
nio oli kakholekha khumanye.
Khuboolele ke chindaalo chichabira,
mala mukhuboolele sifuno siako.
Khemukhuboolele kacha khubao,
nio khumanye khuli enywe muli bawele!
Khemukhole sisiindu silayi namwe reera busiku,
khemukhukhole khuambwe buuri ne khuterema.
Enywe nende niko mukhola koosi se sili siindu tawe,
abo bamusaayanga enywe balaba basinya!
“Ese naroboore omundu owamenya ebukwe,
khamureere ebwaakale khukhwama ebunaswa,
aswalakilile babaami nga kamatosi,
nga omubuumbi naniasia liloba.
Naanu khwinywe owang'oola ali kano kalikholekha,
nio khuboole khuli waboola kang'ali?
Se aliio na mulala khwinywe owaboola likhuwa lirio tawe,
se aliio omundu owaulila ewe noboola siindu sirio tawe!
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naba owe khunyoa khuboolela Sayuni chilomo chino.
Ese naruma omurumwa e Yerusalemu khuboola ali,
‘Babaandu bowo balikho becha engo ne lomo endayi.’
Nga ne naloleelesia mu bawele,
se abao owaba nende sie khuboola tawe,
se abao namulala owanyala khukobosia kamareeba niko ese nareeba tawe.
Bawele bano boosi se bali ne bukhala tawe,
se banyala bakhola sisiindu siosi siosi tawe,
bifwaani bino bili bitekhele lundi se bili ne bunyali tawe.”

“Oyuno ali omukholi wase niye ese naramo kamaani,
niye ese narobora lundi niye sangaalilanga.
Ese namwichusia roho wase,
mala akhareere bung'ali khu buli ekholo.
Saliyokela namwe alomalome lukali tawe,
namwe kumumilo kwewe kuuliilikhane khu ngila che lukoba tawe.
Salifunaka liteeka liliefumba,
namwe asimie etaa emwemwenda tawe.
Alireera bung'ali bwa mindali khu baandu boosi.
Salifwa kumwoyo namwe eendekhelele tawe,
alireera bung'ali khu sibala.
Bibala bie aleeyi bialindiilila,
ne silukuluku kamekisio kewe.”
ang'oona sibala nende buli siindu silimo,
aana bulamu ne kumuya khu baandu boosi.
Ne luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola khu mukholi wewe ali,
khubona oli bung'ali bukholwa khu sibala.
Khubirira mwiwe ese khakhole endakaano ne babaandu boosi.
Khubirira mwiwe ese khareere buwaanga khu kholo choosi.
Ewe okhekule chimoni che babofu,
mala olekhuule abo baali mu siboe sie sisiilima.
“Ese seng'ene ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo.
Se aliio wele okundi onyala akabana ne nase luyali tawe,
se ndilekha bifwaani bikabane efuma yase tawe.
Bibiindu nibio nang'oola luno biabeele ng'ali.
Luno ndamuboolela enywe ke bibiindu bikhamanyikhaane,
ne bikhekholekha tawe.”
Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kumwenya kumuya,
yimba efuma yewe sibala sioosi!
Khemumufumie niye enywe mweesi mu keendela mu meeli,
khemumufumie niye bibuumbe bioosi bie mu nyanja.
Yimba enywe muli mu bibala bie aleeyi ne nabo boosi bamenyileyo!
Lekha sisiangalaamwe ne chingoba chasio chifumie Wele,
lekha babaandu be birekere bia Kedari bamufumie!
Lekha abo bamenyile mu lukoba luboofu lwa Sela bembe khulwe liliekhoya,
ne bali khu ndeleelwa che bikulu!
Lekha baane luyali khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala bafumisilie omwami mu bibala bie aleeyi.
Omwami aruranga akhupana nga naitiriani,
erekekhe lundi ali ne silukuluku sie liie,
apa lulwang'a lwe liie ne khukhweyasa,
ekesia kamaani khu basiku bewe.
Wele aboola ali,
“Khulwe siise sileeyi ese nasila busa,
se nakobosia babaandu base tawe,
ne siise sie khumuyeeta siolile,
ndalila nga omukhasi olumwa.
Ndonaka chingulu ne bikulu,
ne khukhwomia bunyaasi ne kimirongooro.
Ndakaluukhasia kamatooma ke kameechi kekele bibiangalaamwe,
ne khutenyisia kamatiisi ke kameechi.
“Ndarangirira babaandu base babofu,
khu ngila nicho bakhabirirakho tawe.
Ndakaluukhasia sisiilima siabwe sikele buwaanga,
mala khole sibala siialafu similiye ebweeni wabwe.
Kano kali kamasuubisia kase,
mala ndakakhola se ndalekha tawe.
Boosi basuubila mu bifwaani,
balaanga bifwaani bali wele babwe,
balichangalaala ne khuambwa chisoni.”
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
Enywe bamiinyi rekeeresia!
Enywe muli babofu, loleelela!
Aliio omundu yesi yesi oli omubofu lukali khukhila omukholi wase,
namwe omumiinyi lukali khukhila omurumwa niye ese naruma ku?
Isiraeli enywe mwabona kamakali, ne kaba siina khwinywe?
Enywe muli ne kamaru ke khuulila ne siina nisio enywe ng'ali mwaulila?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele owe silukuluku sie khuonia,
nio afumia kamalaka kewe ne kamekisio,
mala enya babaandu bewe bakae lukoosi.
Ne kakhali babaandu bewe bayaayilwe,
bakhomekhelwe mu biboe bie sisiilima,
mala babakisile mu siboe.
Banuulwa ne khuyaaywa,
ne se baba no mundu obaabina abaonia tawe.
Alikhoo khwinywe olarekeeresia kano ku?
Khukhwama luno khuchiililila enywe mularekeeresia kano ku?
Naanu owaana Isiraeli baandu bayaaya?
Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene niye Isiraeli akholela bumayaanu.
Se khwamenya nga niye ne enya efwe khumenye tawe,
namwe se khwaria kamalaka niko niye akhuelesia efwe tawe.
Nio akhukhola efwe khwaulila kamaani ke lirima liewe,
ne khunyaasibwa ne burafu bwe liie.
Nga kumulilo, lirima liewe liosia mu Isiraeli mwoosi,
ne efwe se khwamanya sisiaba ne silikho siikholekha tawe,
efwe se khweyikakho siindu siosi siosi tawe.

Isiraeli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owamubuumba enywe aboola ali,
“Mukharia tawe, ese ndamuonia.
Ese khamulange lisina enywe muli babase.
Akhaba ne mubira mu lusiba lwe kameechi ese ndaba ne nanywe,
butinyu bwenywe se bulamuminya tawe,
mwakhamwaatwa mu mulilo se mulaya tawe,
kamakhako kamaandalafu kakeecha se kalamunyala tawe.
Sikila ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe, Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli omuonianga enywe.
Ese ndakhola Misiri amulekhuule enywe,
akhaba Esopia ne Seba.
Ndalekha chikholo chichiindi khumuonia enywe,
sikila enywe muli be bukhala khwise,
ne sikila ese namusiima enywe lundi muechanga lukoosi.
Mukharia tawe, ese ndi ne nanywe,
ndarera babaandu benywe engo,
khukhwama ebukwe ne mumbo aleeyi lukali.
Ndaboolela be bunaswa khubalekhuula bache,
nende be siafubo bakhabakhayilakho tawe.
Lekha babaandu base bakobole,
khukhwama mu bibala bie aleeyi,
khukhwama buli lubeka lwe sibala.
Bali babaandu base samwene nibo nabuumba
bambelesie ese luyali.”
Wele aboola ali,
“Laanga babaandu base beche mu siina.
Bali ne chimoni ne se babona tawe,
bali ne kamaru ne se baulila tawe.
Lekha chikholo chiche alala,
ne lekha chikholo chibuusiane,
Naanu onyala ang'oola ke chindaalo chichiicha,
ne khukhwekesia kakabira?
Lekha barere buloli bwabwe khukhwekesia bung'ali,
ne lekha baulile mala baboole bali kali kang'ali.
Enywe baandu ba Isiraeli muli baloli base,
ese namurobora enywe mube bakholi base,
nio enywe mumanye ne khukhusuubila ne khumanya muli niise oliio.
Se aliio Wele okundi owabao namwe olicha khubao tawe.
“Ese seng'ene niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
seng'ene onyala namuonia enywe.
Ese nang'oola kacha khukhwekholekha,
mala necha namuyeeta.
Se aliio wele okundi owakholakho kano tawe,
enywe muli baloli base.
Ese ndi Wele lundi ndiba busa ndio buli lwosi.
Se aliio omundu na mulala onyala aonia khukhwama mu bunyali bwase tawe,
se aliio onyala akaluukhasia niko ese khola tawe.”
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omuonianga enywe aboola ali,
“Khumuonia enywe ese kharume banamae bapane ne Babiloni,
khafuniakake bilibwa bie lukoba luboofu,
ne khukhwekhoya khwe babaandu balwo khulakaluukhana khwikele bililo.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo omutakatifu,
Isiraeli ese namubumba enywe mala ndi Omwami wenywe.”
Khaale Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ang'oona engila yabira mu nyanja,
engila yabira mu meechi kamakali.
Arangirira banamae be kamaani lukali bacha mu libuna,
banamae be kamakaari ke liie ne chifarasi.
Bakwa ne se balinyokha tawe,
barusibwao nga limuusi khu lutaambi luburukha.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Okhakhebulila kamakhale ako,
namwe wamenya mu khukebaasia tawe.
Lola nja khukhola sisiindu siiya,
ne siekholekhe khale, munyala mwasibona?
Ese ndang'oona engila mu sichiimi,
mala ebweeneyo muelesie enywe chinjichi.
Chakhaba chisolo ne chisaang'i che mundaa chilamba lukoosi,
chingipwe ne chinyefwe chilafumia nga ndakhola chinjichi chibe mu siangalaamwe,
khuana kameechi khu baandu base barobore.
Bali babaandu nibo samwene nebumbila,
balimba ese efuma.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ne enywe Isiraeli mwalua ne nase,
enywe se mwasaaya ese tawe.
Enywe se mwandeerera ese biturwa bie kamakheese ke mbosio ke khukhwosia tawe,
namwe enywe se mwangoosia ese ne liiosio lienywe tawe.
Ese senamutiuukha busiro khulwe khumubanja biturwa tawe,
namwe ese senamuluya enywe khulwe khukhureeba bimuli biiunya kumuya kumulayi tawe.
Enywe se mwangulila ese biiunya kumuya kumulayi,
namwe se mwanjikusia kumwoyo ne kiminawa kie bibiaayo bienywe tawe.
Nekhali enywe mwandiukha ese busiro bwe bumayaanu bwenywe,
mwanduyilisia ne kamabi niko mwakhola.
Ne khali ese ndi Wele obeelanga bumayaanu bwenywe mala ese khola kano sikila ndi Wele,
namubeleele bumayaanu bwenywe.
Khekhuche mu siina, boola liliikiicha lienywe.
Boola kakenywe kakekesia kali enywe muli mu bung'ali.
Bakuukawenywe bataayi bakhola bumayaanu,
barangirisi benywe bakholela ese bumayaanu
ne babaami benywe banyaalutia enju yase endakatifu.
Nio ese nareera libuna khu Isiraeli,
nalekha babaandu base samwene baambwe chisoni.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Isiraeli omukholi wase luno rekeeresia,
babaandu base barobore be lisaaye lia Yakobo.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owababuumba enywe khukhwama khu siise nisio mwasalilwakho,
ese namuyeetanga mukharia tawe, enywe muli bakholi base,
babaandu base barobore, nibo ese nasiima.
“Ese khaane kameechi khu sibala sie bulesia,
mala khole chinjichi chibisie khu sibala sisioomu para.
Ese ndaana Roho wase khu baana bowo,
ne chikhabi chase khu lisaaye liowo.
Balanera busa nga bunyaasi buchukhiililwanga kameechi,
nga kimierebi kie khuluuchi.
“Buli mulala babaandu baliboola bali,
‘Ese ndi owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’
Balecha bambaane ne babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Buli mulala alaandika lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu mukhono kwewe,
mala elaanga omwene ali, ali mulala khu baandu ba Wele.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola kano:
“Ese ndi Wele seng'ene owe khunyoa lundi omumaliilisi,
se aliio Wele okundi tawe ne khali ese seng'ene.
Aliio omundu yesi yesi abeele onyala akhola niko ese nakhola kano ku?
Naanu abeele onyala ang'oola koosi kakeecha khwekholekha,
khukhwama e khurakikha khukhwola khu siakamo sie siise?
Mukharia namwe mukhesiindukha baandu base tawe,
mumanyile muli khukhwama khu biise bie khaale khukhwola luno,
ese nang'oola koosi kakhekholekhe ne enywe muli baloli base.
Alikhoo wele okundi yesi yesi?
Aliio wele owe bunyali niye ese khaulilakho ku?”
Abo boosi bang'oonanga bifwaani bali busa bukhalamo tawe, ne bawele nibo bakusia bukusi bwe angaaki se bali ne buyeeti tawe. Abo basaayanga bawele bano bali babofu ne se bamanyile siindu tawe, mala baliambwa chisoni.
Se buli bulayi khung'oona sifwaani sie sibia ne khusisaaya nga wele tawe.
Buli mundu osisaayanga aliambwa chisoni. Babaandu bang'oonanga bifwaani bali babaandu busa, se balikho ne sisiindu sisiindi tawe. Khebeche babaoche mu siina, balaba bari lukali mala baambwe chisoni.
Omubasi abukulanga sitonyi sie sichuuma mala asiiuchila mu mulilo ne kumukuba, asiiranya ne kumukhono kwewe kwe kamaani kusuta enyundo khubasa bichuuma nga ne enya. Nga nabasa aulila enjala, bulesia ne siiluo.
Omubeechi akela kumurongooro, akela sifwaani ne lilianda mala abeecha ne mbechelo yewe mala asikhola sifwaani sio mundu, sifwaani sio mundu sie lukoondo lulayi, sie khura munju yewe.
Arema kimitarakwa, kimikhoonge namwe sayipurasi khukhwama mu musiru. Abiaala kumukhoonge ne khuliinda efula ekhusie.
Omundu arumikhirakho kumurongooro lubeka nga chiikhu ne lubeka khulwe khung'oonamo sifwaani. Ne sisiinja sisiindi abwana kumulilo ora mala apa kimikaati, ne lubeka luluundi ang'oonamo wele mala amusaaya.
Abwana kumulilo ne chiikhu osia chinyama alia mala ekura, ora kumulilo mala aboola ali, kuli kumulilo kumulayi lundi kwe luluuya.
Ne lukhu luramire abechakho sifwaani, mala asisikamila ne khusisaaya. Asisabanga naboola ali, “Ewe oli wele wase mbonie!”
Babaandu nga abo bario bali basilu lukali khumanya nisio bakhola tawe. Bafunyikhililanga chimoni ne kamebaasio kabwe khu bung'ali.
Omukholi we bifwaani se ali ne limanya namwe bukesi bwe khuboola ali, “Chiikhu chindala nosiisie, nakhupila kimikaati khu manda, nosielakho enyama nalia. Ne lukhu lulwarama nabechakho sifwaani. Ese niyooyu ano ninamila sitonyi sie lukhu.”
Akhomba likokhe, chinganakani chisilu chimutiimia, se anyala eonia namwe aloma ali nisio ndilile kumukhono kumuseecha kuno se buli bubeeyi tawe ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Isiraeli khebulila lino, khebulila muli enywe muli bakholi base,
Ese namubumba enywe mube bakholi base,
mala se ndimwibilila tawe.
Ese narusiisieo bumayaanu bwenywe nga lileesi khemungobolele,
ese niise omuonianga enywe.”
Likulu yimba, sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile kano,
Muli asi we sibala lukali yimba.
Ee bikulu, rakikha khukhwimba,
Ee musiru na buli murongooro kuulimo!
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aonisie Yakobo,
ne alaelesibwa luyali mu Isiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omuonia wenywe owamubuumba khukhwama munda mwa mawenywe aloma ali,
Ese niise Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabuumba bibiindu bioosi,
Ese seng'ene owakololosia likulu,
nga ese ne nabuumba sibala naanu owaba nase?
nonakaka bung'oosi bwe bamenieelesi ching'enieesi.
Ese ndoba kamakhuwa ke bakesi,
mala nekesia bukesi bwabwe khuba busilu.
Ne kakhali nga omukholi wase nang'oola,
nga ese nenduma omurumwa wase khufunula kamarekekha kase,
khola kamarekekha ako ne bung'oosi obwo khuba bwa ng'ali.
Ese mboolela Yerusalemu ndi babaandu bakhamenyemo lundi,
ne chingoba cha Yuda ndi chikhombakhwe lundi.
Chingoba echo chikheeme khukhwama mu maumbu.
Ne likhuwa lie lilaka liase,
ndenyisia enyanja emboofu.
“Ewe niwe oliamiia nga abele ese ne namiia,
okhakhole niko nenya okhole,
okharusie lilaka mala Yerusalemu lwombakhwe lundi,
kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu kwombakhwe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aroboore Sairasi khuba omwami!
Amuroboore khuula chikholo,
amuruma khunuula babaami bunyali bwabwe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamwikulile bilibwa bie chingoba chimboofu,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Sairasi ali,
“Ese samwene ndakhurekekhera engila khuyasilie bikulu ne chingulu,
ndafunaka bilibwa bie kumukasa,
mala ndusieo chinjeko che bichuuma.
Ese ndakhuelesia ewe kamabiikhilo kakekisa mu siilima ne kaali abuundu aekisa,
nio ewe olamanya oli ese niise Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala Wele owa Isiraeli akhulangile lisina.
Nakhurobora ewe oyeete omukholi wase Isiraeli babaandu nibo ese narobora.
Ese nakhuelesia ewe lukoosi lukali,
akhaba ewe nokhamanyile ese tawe.
“Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se aliio wele okundi tawe,
ese khakhuelesie kamaani niko wenya,
akhaba ewe ne okhaamanyile ese tawe.
Ese ndikho khola kano nio buli mundu khukhwama ebukwe we sibala
khukhwola mumbo amanye ali,
ese niise Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne se aliio wele okundi tawe.
Ese mbaang'ana bioombi buwaanga ne sisiilima,
nderanga bioombi chikhabi ne busiku.
Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okholanga bibiindu bino bioosi.
Ese kharume bukhili khukhwama mungaaki nga efula,
sibala sikhabwakanile,
mala sikhamulikhe bulekhuule ne bung'ali,
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndakhola lino likholekhe.”
enyuungu eli busa nga chichiindi choosi?
Liloba linyala liareeba omubumbi lili olikho okhola sina?
Enyuungu enyala yelung'unya eli omubumbi wayo se ali ne bukesi tawe?
Aliio omundu yesi yesi onyala anyindaala areeba basaasi bewe ali,
“Sikila siina ne mwasaala muri?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli,
oyo ong'oonanga ke chindaalo chichiicha aboola ali,
“Ewe soli ne bung'ali khukhundeeba ese ke babaana base tawe,
namwe khukhumboolela niko ese khoyela khukhola!
Ese niise owabaang'ana sibala mala nabuumba babaandu bamenyemo.
Khulwe bunyali bwase nabalaya likulu,
nimeelelanga enyanga, kumwesi ne ching'enieesi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
Ese samwene owamuruma Sairasi khukhola sikholwa,
khukhola sifuno siase sibe sia ng'ali ne khukololosia bibiindu.
Ndaluungisia buli ngila niyo abirirakho.
Aliombakha lundi lukoba lwase lwa Yerusalemu,
mala alekhuule babaandu be mu mbaambe,
se aliio omundu owamukula namwe owamuonga khukhola kano tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Isiraeli ali,
“Kimiaandu kia Misiri ne Esopia kikienywe,
ne babaandu baleeyi be Seba balaba nasioobi benywe,
balamuloondakho ne baboyilwe khu minyololo,
Balamusikamila enywe mala beyame baboole bali,
‘Wele ali ne nanywe, niye yeng'ene oli Wele.
Wele owa Isiraeli, oonianga babaandu bewe,
ali Wele owekukhuulila omwene.
Abo boosi bang'oonanga bifwaani,
boosi baliambwa chisoni,
boosi balichangalaala.
Ne kakhali Isiraeli mwaonisiibwe ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne bukhili bwa Isiraeli bulibaao buli lwosi,
babaandu ba Isiraeli se balichangalaala tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabaang'ana likulu niye oli Wele.
Abaang'ana sibala ne khusing'oona,
Asiikhola siaba siiandalafu lundi siyindila,
se asiikhola siaba busa tawe,
ne kakhali aramo babaandu bamenyemo.
Niye oboola ali,
“Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se aliio wele okundi tawe.
Ese se nalomaloma mu bwikisi tawe namwe nakisa sifuno siase tawe.
Ese senenya babaandu ba Isiraeli bambiime aali busa tawe.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala ndoma bung'ali lundi khola liili liluungi limanyikha.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Khemwiche alala, babaandu be chikholo,
boosi babarama mu likwa lie bubwami,
khemwiche mu siina mureebwe.
Babaandu babeene ba bebakala ne bifwaani biabwe bie kimirongooro,
mala basaba bawele bakhanyala khubaonia tawe,
babaandu bano se bamanyile sisiindu siosi siosi tawe!
Khemwiche muboole kakenywe mu siina,
lekha be kumusaango bareebane babeene khu beene.
Naanu owang'oola khaale kakhekholekhe?
Se naba ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oonianga babaandu bewe ta ku?
Se aliio wele okundi tawe.
“Ngobolele luno mala muonisibwe,
babaandu mu sibala sioosi!
Ese niise Wele seng'ene se aliio okundi tawe.
ese samwene nasuubisia khu koosi nga samwene ne ndi.
Buli mundu alecha asikame ebweeni wase,
mala echube khuba omusuubilwa khwise.
“Bakhaboole bali khubirira mwise seng'ene,
bukhili ne kamaani binyoolekha,
ne abo boosi babambiila ese balichangalasibwa.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khaonie be lisaaye lia Yakobo boosi,
mala balifumia ese.”

“Sino sisiakamo sie bawele ba Babiloni!
Beli ne Nebo khale basaaywa,
ne kakhali luno babirere khu punda,
busiro khu mikoongo kie chipunda chiluile.
Bifwaani se binyala bieonia bibieene tawe,
biaambwa mu mbaambe mala biilwa aleeyi,
sino sili sisiakamo sie bawele ba Babiloni!
“Ndekeeresie, enywe lisaaye lia Yakobo,
enywe mweesi mumwarama khukhwama khu baandu base.
Ese namuliinda enywe khukhwama khu siise nisio mwasaalilwamo.
Ese ndi Wele wenywe mala ndamuliinda,
khukhwola nga muliba ne mukofuule ne khumela chimbuchi.
Ese namubumba enywe mala ndamuliinda,
ese ndamuelesia enywe buyeeti ne khumuonia.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
Enywe mulandekhaasia ese khu nanu?
Aliio omundu yesi yesi oli nga ese ku?
Babaandu bekula chioochwa chabwe mala bachukhuluula esahabu,
bakela efwesa khu bikelo.
Baruunga omubasi ababasile wele,
mala benama ne khukhwesaaya.
Bara wele chana khu mabeka mala bamusuta,
bamura abuundu mala emao,
sanyala akeenda arura niio bamureere tawe.
Aaba omundu yesi yesi namusaba, sanyala amukobosia tawe,
namwe amuonia khukhwama mu busiku tawe.
“Khebulila kano, enywe bamayaanu,
yibaasia niko ese kholile.
Khebulila kakekholekha khaale,
fukiilila muli ese seng'ene niise Wele,
ne se aliio wele okundi nga ese tawe.
Khukhwama mu khurakikha ese nang'oola kalibao,
nang'oola khaale kaliekholekha.
Ese naboola ndi lirekekha liase se lilikhilwa tawe,
ndi ese ndikhola buli siindu nga ne nebaasia khukhola.
Ese ndikho ndanga omundu eche khukhwama ebukwe,
alafurusia busa ekhe asi nga siruuchu,
mala atabusie niko ese narekekha.
Nalomile mala kalekholekha.
“Ndekeeresie, enywe babaandu bareengu,
babebaasia bali bukhili buli aleeyi.
Ese ndikho ndeera endaalo eye bukhili siimbi,
seli aleeyi na akeekhe ene tawe.
Bukhili bwase se bulakhiinda tawe.
Ndaonia Yerusalemu
mala nderere lukoosi Isiraeli ebweeneyo.”

“Babiloni yiikha khukhwama khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami
mala wikhale asi mu lipukhuulu.
Ewe khale waba nga owe yabwana,
lukoba luboofu lukhaulwa tawe.
Ne luno ewe soli omuolu lundi omutekhele tawe.
Luno ewe oli nasioobi.
Rekekha lususi! Sia bufu!
Fuula sitambaala!
Fuula chingubo chowo chingwalaafu!
Niinia chingubo wambukhe chinjichi!
Babaandu balabona siichula siowo,
balakhubona ne wiboombia ne oambilwe chisoni.
Ese ndeyacha mala se aliio omundu olakhiingilila tawe.”
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli akhusikulanga efwe,
lisina liewe bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Babiloni ali,
“Yikhala osile busa mu siilima,
se balakhulaangakho lundi bali Kwini owe chikholo tawe!
Ese nakhalalila babaandu base,
nabakhola busa oli bakhali babase tawe,
nabara mu bunyali bwenywe mala enywe khubakholelakho siisa tawe,
bakhaba babakofula mwabapia siibi.
Enywe mwebaasia muli fwaana muliamiia nga Kwini buli lwosi,
mala se mwara bibiindu bino mu mebaasio,
namwe se mwebaasia litabusia liabio ne liliicha tawe.
mumwibaasianga muli muli bulayi lundi mwaliindwa.
Enywe muboola muli se aliio okundi nga enywe tawe.
Enywe mwebaasia muli se muliba namulekhwa tawe,
namwe muchuunisibwe khulwe khufwilwa babaana benywe tawe.
Bibiindu bino bioombi bilakholekha khangu busa mu ndaalo ndala,
mulafwisia baseecha ne babaana,
akhaba nemurumikhira kamayia.
“Mweulila mwabene muli, muli bulayi mu mamayaanu kenywe,
mala mwibaasia muli, ‘Se aliio omundu okhubona tawe.’
Limanya, ne bukesi lienywe biamutiimia,
mweboolela mwabene muli,
‘Se aliio okundi nga efwe tawe.’
Busiku bulakhwichakho,
ne se kaliio kamayia kowo kanyala kabukhiingilila tawe,
libuna lilamwichakho khangu nilio mukhamanyile tawe.
Biikha bie kamayia nende bie bufumu bienywe,
mwabirumikhira khukhwama bwana,
bikhola birio binyala biaba ne buyeeti khwinywe.
Wakana enywe munyala mwariikhirisia basiku benywe.
Se muli ne bunyali bwosi bwosi tawe,
akhaba ne munyoolanga likeleka.
Lekha bakesi benywe babemenieelesianga ke ching'enieesi barure beche bamuonie.
Abo babeyika ke ching'enieesi, baandika chinjakha che likulu,
mala bamuboolela enywe buli mwesi kalikho kacha khumwekholekhakho.
“Lola bali nga bitonyi bie chikhanja,
mala kumulilo kulabosia!
Se balinyala khukhweonia babeene khukhwama khu bumemu bwe kumulilo tawe.
Se kaliio kamaanda ke khukhwora tawe,
kumulilo okwo se kuli kwe khukhwora tawe.
Bubwenobu nibwo bulayi nibwo balakhukholela bakesi babemenieelesianga ching'enieesi abo,
nibo enywe mwareebanga mu bulamu bwenywe bwoosi.
Boosi balamulekha bamwaukhekho,
ne se aliio mulala olirama amuonie tawe.”

Rekeeresia kano, baandu ba Isiraeli,
enywe be lisaaye lia Yuda,
enywe mwechuba mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khuboola muli,
mulasaayanga Wele owa Isiraeli,
mala se mukhola niko muloma tawe.
Ne muboola ne kukwebonio muli,
efwe khuli babaandu be lukoba lutakatifu lundi mweyikina Wele owa Isiraeli,
omanyikhane bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Isiraeli ali,
“Ese nang'oola khale kalicha khukhwekholekha,
mala nakakhola khangu busa.
Ese namanya ndi enywe muliekesia khuba ne sileka,
muli balume nga sichuuma,
lundi baandalafu nga kumukasa.
Ne ese nang'oola khaale kakenywe,
ke chindaalo chichiicha,
naboola kakhekholekha tawe,
khumukhiingilila enywe mukhakhola murio mwaloma muli,
bifwaani ne bibechwa bienywe nibio bibiakhola kakekholekha kano tawe.
Koosi niko nang'oola kekholekhe,
enywe mukhoya mufukiilile,
muli bung'oosi bwase buli ng'ali.
Ne luno ndamuboolela ke bibiindu biyia bilikho bicha,
bikholwa nibio abeele khamwekesiakho tawe.
Ndikho khola bino bikholekhe luno lwong'ene,
sisiindu nga esio sirio sikhakholwakho mu ndaalo chichabira tawe.
Abanga siindu siri siekholekhakho, mwakhalomile muli efwe khwasimanya khale.
Enywe mukhaulilakho kario,
namwe mwakamanyakho tawe,
khukhwama khale kamaru kenywe kakhaulilakho kano tawe.
Sikila namanya ndi enywe se musuubila tawe,
ne khukhwama bwana muli barengu.
Nio babaandu bafumie lisina liase,
nalekhile lirima liase,
nalilekhile ne se ndakhubunia tawe.
Ese namura enywe khu likela,
namubisia mu mulilo kwe buchuuni,
nga efwesa ne yosiebwa mu bunoro.
Ne kakhali namuboone muli busa,
namukhakile mu mulilo kwe sinyaasio.
Niko ese khola kano kakholwa sikila ese samwene,
se ndilekha lisina liase lichangalasibwe tawe.
Namwe se ndilekha omundu yesi yesi aebwa luyali lwase tawe.”
Olwo luli lulwase lundi lulwase seng'ene.
“Ndekeeresie,
Isiraeli Ese ndi Wele,
onyoa, omaliilikha oli Wele seng'ene.
Kamakhono kase kabaang'ana kumusiingi kwe sibala,
mala kabalaya likulu,
nga ne nanga sibala ne likulu, bicha khangu bima ebweeni wase.
“Khemwibuusie alala mala murekeeresie mweesi.
Se aliio mulala khu bawele onyala ang'oola ali,
omundu niye ese narobora alibwaakala Babiloni,
alikhola niko ese nenya niye akhole tawe.
Ese niise owalomaloma mala namulaanga,
namurangirira mala namukhola aindiaala.
Luno khemwiche siimbi khwise mala muulile niko mboola,
khukhwama mu khurakikha ese nalomaloma busa abuwaanga,
mala buli lwosi ese nakhola kamakhuwa kase kabe ng'ali.”
(Luno Omwami WELE ambelesie ese bunyali bwewe mala andumire.)
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omuonia wenywe aboola ali,
“Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe,
owenya khumwekisia enywe khulwe bulayi bwenywe,
mala mwekesie khu ngila niye mukhoyele muchilekho.
Mubaanga mumwarekeeresia kamalaka kase,
andi chikhabi chekha khwinywe nga luluuchi lukhateenya tawe.
Bukhili andi bwamwichakho nga bibuli bie nyanja ne bipa sikiingi.
Andi lisaaye lienywe lili likali lukali nga kumuyekhe,
mala andi namusuubisia ndi se balibuna tawe.”
Yilwacha chilomo chindayi mu busangaafu,
khola chimanyikhe buli abuundu.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aonisie omukholi wewe Isiraeli!”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arangirira babaandu bewe babira mu siangalaamwe,
se baba ne bulesia tawe.
Abakholela kameechi karura mu lwanda,
aramo lulwanda mala kameechi kamamo.
“Kumuleembe se kuliio khu bamayaanu tawe.”

enywe babaandu mumenyile aleeyi!
Ese nekhasaalwa tawe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andobora,
mala anjimikha mbe omukholi wewe.
Andeecha ese ne kumukhono kwewe.
Akhola ese naba nga luembo,
aangisa mu situukhu siewe.
Amboolela ese ali,
“Isiraeli ewe oli omukholi wase,
sikila ewe, babaandu balafumia ese.”
Ne ese naboola ndi,
“Ese nakholile kimilimo ne se kilimo bukhala tawe.
Narumikhiire kamaani kase,
ne mbao nisio nyolilemo tawe.”
Kakhaba kario ese nyala khusuubila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi olababila kakaase,
alandunga kumuruuru khu niko nakhola.
Ese nekhasaalwa tawe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andobora,
akhola omukholi wewe ngobosie babaandu bewe,
ngobosie babaandu ba Isiraeli babasalanila.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesianga lukoosi,
ali sisina sie kamaani kase.
“Ese ndi ne kimilimo kimikali khwiwe, mukholi wase.
Se lili khukoboselia babaandu ba Isiraeli babarama bunyali liong'ene tawe,
ne khali lundi ese ndakhukhola ewe obe buwaanga khu kholo choosi,
nio sibal sioosi sionisibwe.”
Wele Omutakatifu lundi omuonia owa Isiraeli aboolela oyo,
olekelesebwe lukali,
oyo obiilwe ne chikholo
lundi oli omukholi we babaami.
“Babaami balikhubona ewe nolekhuulwa,
mala balinyokha bekesie buriaani bwabwe.
Babaana be babaami bosi balibubona,
mala baliinama khukhuelesia ewe lukoosi.”
Lino lilikholekha sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arobora omukholi wewe,
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli akhola lisuubisia liewe.
“Nga siise sie khumuonia ne siliola,
Ese ndimubabila enywe
mala ngobosie lilila lienywe khulwe buyeeti,
ndimuliinda ne khumuteecha,
mala khubirira mwinywe ese ndikhola endakaano yase ne babaandu boosi.
Ndimulekha mumenye lundi mu sibala sienywe, siikhalimo siindu tawe.
Ese ndiboolela baboe ndi, ‘Muli balekhuule.’
Ne abo bali mu siilima ndibaboolela ndi,
‘Khemwiche mu buwaanga.’
Baliba nga kamakheese kakaya khu ngulu,
Kumuumu ne luucho lwe siimiyu se kuliboosia tawe,
sikila balirangirirwa ne noyo owabasiima.
Alibayila khu sebele che kameechi.
Ndasenjula engila emboofu ebire mu bikulu,
ne khurekekha engila babaandu base babirirekho.
Babaandu base baliama aleeyi,
balama ebunaswa ne mumbo,
ne khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Aswani e bunafubo.”
Yimba, likulu!
Sibala yokela khulwe liliekhoya,
lekha chingulu chimbe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alioleelesia babaandu bewe,
alikholela siisa babaandu bewe babapwa sibi.
Ne kakhali babaandu ba Yerusalemu baboola bali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhwanjukha! Akhwibilila.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali,
omukhasi anyala webilila omwana wewe onuuna ku?
Mala alekhe khusiima omwana niye asaala?
Akhaba, maawe nanyala webilila omwana wewe,
ese sendimwibilila enywe na akeekhe ene tawe.
Yerusalemu, ese se nyala nakhwibilila ewe tawe!
Ese naandike lisina liowo mu bikalabo biase.
Abo balimwombakha balikho becha khangu,
ne abo babamubunia enywe balarekukha.
Lola eyi neyi mala obone kalekholekhanga.
Babaandu bowo balikho babusiana balikho beecha engo!
Nga ng'ali ese nendi Wele omenyile mindali,
olebonia khulwe babaandu bowo,
nga omwea ne ebonia khulwe kamamili kewe.
Sibala sienywe sionakakwa ne khukhwanjukhwa,
ne kakhali luno silaboomba khulwe balikho ne becha khu menyamo.
Ne abo babakhulekha mu makuunda,
balirusibwa khukhwama khwinywe bayilwe aleeyi.
Babaandu bowo babasaalwa mu mbaambe
endaalo ndala balikhuboolela bali,
“Sibala sino siaboombile,
khung'oonele abuundu khumenyeo.”
Nono ewe olireeba oli,
“Naanu owasaalila ese babaana bano boosi,
ese nafwisia babaana base mala abele senyala nanyoola babaandi tawe.
Nayilwa mu mbaambe?
Naanu owakhusia babaana bano,
babaana bano bama waena?”
Omwami WELE aboolela babaandu bewe ali,
“Ese khasakule chikholo,
mala chireere babaana bowo engo.
Babaami balaba nga paapa khwiwe,
Bakwini balaba nga bamaayi.
Balinama ebweeni wowo bole asi,
mala bakhuelesie lukoosi,
balieboombia, bakhwekesie buriaani bwabwe khwiwe.
Nono ewe olamanya oli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
se aliio omundu olilindiilila buyeeti bwase olibelela tawe.”
Ewe onyala wanuula naitiriani kimiaandu nikio ayaayile ku?
Ewe onyala wareesia baboe khukhwama khu mwami omululu ku?
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali,
Kamenako kario kacha khwekholekha.
Baboe ba naitiriani balalekhuulwa,
ne biyaaywa bio omwami omululu bilanuulwa.
Ese ndapana no mundu yesi yesi okhupania ewe,
mala ndareesia babaana bowo.
Ese ndakhola ba bakuluumia berane babeene ne babeene,
balameela bubwiri ne lirima.
Nono babaandu boosi balamanya bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Okhuonianga ewe mala akhulekhuula.
Balimanya bali ese ndi Wele owe bunyali owa Isiraeli.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Enywe mwibaasia muli ese naona babaandu base bacha,
nga omundu naona omukhasi wewe?
Nono kamaandiko ke khulekhana kali waena?
Enywe mwibaasia muli ese namukusia mu mbaambe,
nga omundu nakusia babaana bewe nga nasioobi?
Se kali kario tawe, enywe mwacha mu mbaambe sikila bumayaanu bwenywe,
mwayilwa sikila kamamayaanu kenywe.
Siina sikila babaandu base ne bakhilwa khukhungobosia,
nga nacha khu nibo khubaonia?
Sikila siina ne balekha khufukiilila nga ne nabalanga?
Ese ndi omutekhele lukali khubaonia ku?
Ese nyala nateenyesia enyanja ne lilaka liase,
ne khukaluukhasia chinjichi chikele sisiangalaamwe,
nio ching'eeni chilimo chifwe bulesia.
Ese nyala khukhola likulu liamaliia,
liaba nga lilila bafu.”
Omwami WELE anjekeesie nisio khoyele ndome
nio nyale khutinyilisia abo baluyile.
Buli sibuuyi akholanga ese mba ne silukuluku,
khuulila nisio alikho acha khukhusomia.
Omwami WELE ambelesie ese limanya,
mala se nakhola bureengu nanwe namulekelesia tawe.
ne abo babakhoma senabakhiingilila tawe,
nga baba ne bakhuula bunwanwa bwase
ne khukhufucha mumoni.
Ne likhoma liabwe selinyala khukhumbumisia tawe,
sikila Omwami WELE alanjeeta.
Netinyilisia khu kekhaliilikha koosi.
Ese manyile ndi se ndiambwa chisoni tawe,
ne aleekesia ali sendi ne bumayaanu tawe.
Aliio omundu onyala eana aboola bubi bwase ku?
Lekha khuche fwembi mu siina!
Lekha niye aboole bubi bwase!
Omwami WELE omwene niye ousolaanga,
nanu nono onyala ekesia ali ese ndi ne kumusaango?
Boosi babambayila kumusaango se balibao tawe,
balibao busa nga engubo niyo kamake kalile.
Enywe mweesi muria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khuria kamakhuwa ko mukholi wewe,
engila niyo mukeendelakho enyala yaaba eye sisiilima sikali,
ne kakhali suubila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala yeyikina Wele wenywe.
Enywe mweesi mukhola chikwangwachi che khubunia babasienywe,
mulibunisibwa ne chikwangwaani chenywe mwabeene.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene alikhola lino likholekhe,
mulichunisibwa ne ngunyi.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
Ndekeeresie, enywe mumwenya khuonisibwa,
enywe mumwichanga ese muyeete.
Yibaasia lulwanda nilwo mwamakho,
mu mabaale nimwo mwayabwa.
Lola Aburahamu raraawenywe,
ne Sara owamusaala enywe.
Namulaanga nakhali namwana tawe,
nio ese namubiita chikhabi namuelesia babaana.
Ese ndiekesia siisa khu Yerusalemu,
khu boosi bamenyile mu makuunda.
Yakhaba sibala sialwo ne sili sisiangalaamwe, ese ndasiikhola kumukuunda,
nga kumukuunda nikwo ese nabiaala mu Edeni.
Liliekhoya ne busangaafu bulibayo,
ne kimienya kie khufumia ne khukhupa orio khwise.
“Ndekeeresie baandu base,
rekeeresia niko ese mboola.
Ese mbelesia chikholo kamekisio kase,
kamalaka kase kalabarerera buwaanga.
Ese ndecha khangu mala mbaonie,
siise sie bukhili bwase sili siimbi.
Ese samwene ndamiia chikholo.
Bibala bie aleeyi binindiilila niche,
banindiilila ne lilieyikina mbaonie.
Lola mungaaki, lola asi!
Likulu lilirusibwao nga liliisi,
sibala siliwao nga engubo ekhale,
ne babaandu basio boosi balifwa nga chiisi.
Ne kakhali buonia nibwo ese ndeera bulibaao buli lwosi,
bukhili bwase buli bumalayo.
“Ndekeeresie, enywe mumwamanya kali kamaluungi,
enywe mumwatiila kamekisio kase mu miooyo kienywe.
Mukhaba bari nga babaandu ne bamuyingila ne khu mukhoma tawe,
balawao nga engubo niyo kamake kaliile!
Ne kakhali buonia nibwo ese ndeera bulibaao buli lwosi,
bukhili bwase bukhabeo biise bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yinyokha mala okhuyeete!
Rumikhira bunyali bwowo mala okhuonie,
burumikhire nga wakhola mu biise bikhale.
Niwe owaremakaka mu bitonyi Rahabu, kukuundu kwe mu nyanja kufwaana kuremu.
Waaba ewe lundi owakabukhasiamo enyanja mala wakhola engila yabira mu meechi,
nio abo nibo waba ne olikho oonia bambukha.
Abo nibo ewe waonia baliola Yerusalemu ne busangaafu
ne bemba ne khukhwekhoya.
Balisangaala buli lwosi,
se balieumba ne khukhola siisa lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ese niise omutinyilisianga enywe.
Siina sikila murie omundu onyala afwa,
Okhamenya khukhila bunyaasi tawe?
Ne enywe mwebiliile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owamubuumba,
Owababuumbila likulu mala aarao kimisiingi kie sibala?
Siina sikila enywe buli busiele mumenye mu buri,
bwe lirima liaabo bamukuluumia,
ne nabo baberekeekhe khu mubunia?
Lirima liabwe se linyala lundi liamwetiilakho tawe.
Abo bali baboe balalekhuulwa khangu,
balamenya bulamu buleeyi,
mala balaba ne biakhulia bioosi nibio benya.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe,
ese ninyosia enyanja mala khola bibuli bie kameechi biiolola.
Lisina liase lili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ese nabalaya likulu mala narao kimisiingi kie sibala,
mboolelanga Yerusalemu ndi, ‘Enywe muli babaandu base!
Ese namuelesia enywe kamekisio kase,
ne muliindanga ne kumukhono kwase.’ ”
Yinyokha mala wime!
Ewe onywele sikoombe sie siiukuumo siewe,
nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lirima liewe akhuelesia,
wasinywa mala siakhutalitaasia.
Se aliio na mulala okhurangirira tawe,
se aliio na mulala mu baandu bowo okhutiila kumukhono tawe.
Busiku bubili bwakhukwilekho,
sibala siowo sionakwe ne liie,
lundi babaandu bowo babeele ne njala.
Se aliio na mulala yeng'ene okhukholela siisa tawe.
Buli niio engila yakholela ekhuumbo,
babaandu bowo bakwa ruruuchu sikila butekhele,
bali nga kicheu naambilwe mu luriimba lwo muaayi.
Baboone kamaani ke lirima lia Wele.
Khwako ulila kano, mulikho mupisibwa sibi,
mwamelile ne kakhali se mwamelile khulwe ndali tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe omusoolanga aboola ali,
“Ese ndusiao sikoombe nisio namuelesia mu lirima liase.
Se mukhanywe lundi endali emumeesia mutalitaale tawe.
Khaelesie sikoombe sie lirima khwaabo babamupia sibi,
khwaabo babamukhola enywe mwalaambaala khu chingila,
mala bamuswalakilila oli enywe mu mwaba eng'unda.”

Lukoba lutakatifu lwa Wele yifwara chingubo che lukoosi!
Bakhasuubila mu Wele se balingila lundi mu bilibwa biowo tawe.
Khemwilekhuule Yerusalemu!
Khewinyokhe mwipukhulu mala wikhale khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami!
Khewikangulule kiminyololo kimuboyile enywe,
babaandu be mu mbaambe ba Sayuni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Nga enywe ne mwakholwa nasioobi se chiliio chirupia nicho enywe mwakulwa tawe, ne mu ngila ng'ene se siliio siikharuungwe khumulekhuula tawe.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, nga ne mwacha khumenya mu Misiri nga baakwa, mwakhola murio mu khwenya khwenywe mwabeene, kakhaba kario Ashuru siamubukula siamuyila ne kamaani, mala se siaruunga sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe enywe tawe.
