Ne luno kekholekhe kario mu Babiloni muli baambe mbao sisiaruungwa khulwe enywe tawe. Abo bamwamiia bebonia ne khukhwiniinia ne buli lwosi bandekelesia,
mu siise siliicha mulifukiilila muli ese ndi Wele lundi niise olomalome nanywe.”
nakhalisia khu bikulu nareera chilomo chindaayi chilomo che kumuleembe!
Alaangilila bukhili naboolela Sayuni ali,
“Wele wowo ali Omwami!”
Abo baliindanga lukoba bayokela,
bayokelela alala khulwe ekhoyo!
Banyala babona ne chimoni chabwe,
likobola lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Sayuni!
Yokela ne kimienya kie liliekhoya,
enywe kamakuunda ka Yerusalemu,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aolelesie babaandu bewe lundi aonisie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akharumikhire bunyali bwewe butakatifu,
akhaonie babaandu bewe,
mala sibala sioosi sikhabone bunyali bwa Wele wefwe.
enywe mweesi musutanga bibiindu bie Lukaangu!
Mukhatiila khu siindu siosi siosi sisiakanisibwa tawe,
khemwelinde mwabeene mube batakatifu mala murekukhe.
Siise sino, se mularekukha khangu tawe,
se mulaba mwilukha tawe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe alamurangirira lundi amulinde buli lubeka.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Omukholi wase akhakhole bulayi kimilimo kiewe.
Akhaelesebwe lukoosi lukali.
Babaandu bakali besiindukha nga bamubona,
lukoondo lwewe lwonakakwa ne liaba lilume khumanya oli mundu.
ne babaami se baliba nende nilio baloma tawe, baliiuka busa.
Balibona mala bamanye sisiindu nisio baba ne bakhamanyakho tawe.”

“Naanu abele onyala asuubila niko efwe khulikho khuboola luno?
Naanu abele onyala abona bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu kano?
Liaba lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali omukholi wewe
alachoa nga simelwa sisiikhisia kimili mu liloba liliomu,
se aba ne lukoosi namwe lukoondo lulayi lukhukhola efwe khwamumanya tawe.
Se siabao siikhusiimisia khu niye tawe, namwe se siabao siikhurera siimbi naye tawe.
Khwamuleka ne khumuloba,
ekhaliilikha khukhupwa sibi ne buchuuni,
se abao na mulala owenya khumulolakho tawe,
khwamulekelesia nga okhaba siindu tawe.
buchuuni nibwo andi efwe khwachuunwa.
Mukoosi kano efwe khwebaasia khuli khukhupwa siibi siewe,
siaba siiukuumo sirumirwe ne Wele.
apwa sikila kamabi niko efwe khwakhola.
Efwe khwaonisibwa ne siiukuumo nisio anyoola,
khwaona ne bukhupe nibwo niye anyoola.
buli mulala khwifwe achile engila yewe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola siiukuumo siaba khu niye,
siiukuumo nisio efwe fweesi khwakhoyele khunyoole.
nga likheese lili ambi khutetwa bufuumbo,
se alomaloma likhuwa tawe.
Atiilwa ne khukhalakilwa lifwa,
ne se aliio owamwiembeelela tawe.
Erwa sikila bumayaanu bwe babaandu befwe.
asiikhwa alala ne baiinda akhaba niye nakhakhola kamamayaanu tawe,
namwe alomakho bubeeyi tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Liaba lilienya liase apwe siibi,
lifwa liewe liaba embosio khureera khubeelwa.
Ne alibona be lisaaye liewe,
alimenya bulamu buleeyi,
ne khubirira mu niye lilienya liase liliekholekhana.
Enyuma we limenya lie khukhupwa, aliekhoya,
lundi alimanya ali se anaanisibwa busa tawe.
Omukholi wase owerusia ne kumwoyo kwoosi niye ese sangaalilanga,
alibukula siiukuumo sie bakali,
ne sikila niye, ese khababeele nibo.
Nio, ese khamuelesie niye abuundu e lukoosi,
abuundu e babaandu bakhulu ne bunyali.
Erusia, aana bulamu bwewe,
mala eyama siiukuumo sie babaandu bamayaanu.
Abukula abuundu e bamayaanu bakali,
mala asaba ali ne kanyalikha bole khubeelwa.”

ne luno onyala wemba mala wasangaala khulwe liliekhoya.
Ne kakhali luno ewe olaba ne babaana bakali,
khukhila omukhasi okhalekhanakho no museecha tawe.
Balaaya liiema nilio omenyilemo,
yiinga kimikoye kialio mala okhome bichaangi bilume!
Ewe olabalaaya chinjakha chowo mu mbeka choosi,
babaandu bowo bakhakalusibwe kamaloba,
niko chikholo chichiindi luno chimenyilemo.
Chingoba chimboofu chichanjukhwa chikhechulemo babaandu.
Okharia tawe, se okhaambwe chisoni lundi tawe,
ewe solichangalasibwa tawe.
Ewe okhebilile sifwaabi siowo sie bukhaana,
ne liaayaaya lie khulekhwa weng'ene nga namulekhwa.
Omubumbi Wowo aliba nga omuseecha wowo,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nilio lisina liewe.
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli alakhuonia ewe,
ali Omwami owe sibala sioosi.
Isiraeli, oli nga omukhasi omuele,
owanjukhwa no museecha wewe, mala ali mu bubeeleli bukali.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhulaanga ewe okobole khu niye, mala aboola ali:
“Khulwe siise sikeekhe siri ese nakhulekha,
Ne kakhali khulwe siisa sikali khakhukobosie.
Ese nalola elubeka mu lirima khulwe siise sikeekhe siri,
ne khakhwekesie busiime bwase buli lwosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ookhuonianga alomile ario.
se ndireera kameechi kechule sibala lundi tawe.
Luno khusuubisia ndi se ndikhuambila ewe lirima lundi tawe,
se ndikhurafwira namwe khuukuume tawe.
Bikulu ne chingulu bilikwa bitonyekhe,
ne busiime bwase khwiwe se buliakama tawe,
ese khaliinde lisuubisia liase lie kumuleembe lia buli lwosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owa khusiima ewe aboola ario.
“Ee Yerusalemu, ewe oupwa sibi lukoba lukhali ne buyeeti tawe,
se aliio omundu okhuoleelesia tawe,
ese ndombakha kimisiingi kiowo ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki.
Ndombakha chindeleelwa chowo ne kamabaale kamabesemu,
bilibwa biowo ndombakhila kamabaale ka kesing'eeng'a nga kumulilo,
ne lisiisi likhubotookhelela lie kamamili.
mala mbaelesie kimiaandu ne kumuleembe.
Bung'ali ne buluungi bulakhukhola obe ne kamaani,
olaliindwa bulayi khukhwama mu khumiinikhwa ne liriisia.
Yesi yesi okhwibwaakala,
akhola ario khulwewe omwene,
ese se namufukiilile tawe,
yesi yesi olapana ne nawe alakhilwa.
“Ese mbumbanga omubasi,
obwananga kumulilo mala eraanya bulwaani.
Akhaba lundi ese mbumbanga naitiriani orumikhiranga bulwaani khukhwira.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali,
ne kakhali se buliio bulwaani bunyala bwakhuumisia ewe tawe,
okhabe nende nilio okobosia abo boosi bakhusitaka.
Ese khababile bakholi base mala mbaelesie bukhili.”

“Buli mundu oli ne bulesia eche,
kameechi kali ano!
Khemwiche, enywe mukhali ne chirupia tawe,
kula biakhulia mala mulie,
khemwiche! Kula endali ne kamabeele,
se mularuunga siindu tawe.
Siina sikila enywe ne mumalila chirupia khu biindu nibio mukhekura tawe?
Siina sikila ne murumikhira kumuruungo kwenywe mala musili busa ne njala.
Ndekeresie mala mukhole niko mboola,
ne mulalia siakhulia silayi khukhila bioosi.
ne khemwiche mala mulaba ne bulamu!
Ese ndakhola endakaano eya buli lwosi ne nanywe,
mala muelesie chikhabi nicho nasuubisia Daudi.
Ese namukhola khuuba omwimeelesi lundi komanda owe chikholo,
ne khubira mu niye ese nabekesia bunyali bwase.
Luno ewe okhalange chikholo chingeni,
anyumao se bakhumanya bele tawe,
ne kakhali luno chilakhwichakho ne chitima!
Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo, Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli,
ndakhola kano koosi kakholekhe,
khakhuelesie ewe lukoosi ne fuma.”
Kobola khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mumusabe
ne asiili siimbi.
Lekha bamayaanu balekhe engila yabwe eye limenya
mala bakaluukhasie lilibaasia liabwe.
Khe bakobole khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ali owe siisa lundi ali khangu khubeela.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Kamebaasio kase se kali nga kakenywe tawe,
ne chingila chase chabukhana ne chichenywe.
Nga likulu ne lili angaaki khukhwama khu sibala,
bili birio, chingila ne kamebaasio kase khukhila kakenywe.
bibiichanga asi khukhwama mungaaki bisanya liloba.
Bikholanga biakhulia bichoa,
mala birusia bumiicho khulwe khumiicha ne biakhulia bie khulia.
Nio akhaba liliba lirio likhuwa liase nilio ndomaloma,
se lilikhilwa khukhola nilio nalirekekhera tawe,
lilikhola buli sisiindu nisio naliruma khukhola.
Mulirekukha murure mu Babiloni ne khoyo,
muli rangirirwa murure mu lukoba luboofu ne kumuleembe,
Bikulu ne chingulu bilirakikha khukhwimba,
ne kimirongooro kiliyokela khulwe khoyo.
Kimirongooro sayipurasi kilichoa niio luno embululwe eli,
bisaala bie kamasaafu kamakali bilamela abuundu e kamawa.
Lino lilaba simanyisio silabao buli lwosi,
siikhebusia niko ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakhola.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela babaandu bewe ali,
“Khemukhole kang'ali ne kamaluungi,
sikila siise sikeekhe siri mulabona buonia bwase bulecha, ne bulekhuule bulabonekha.
Ndabiita chikhabi abo bamanyanga e Sabato,
mala se bakirumikhiranga bubi tawe.
Ndabiita chikhabi abo bakhakholanga bumayaanu tawe.”
Omukeni owaambaana ne babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhaboola ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sakhafukiilile ese saaye alala ne babaandu bewe tawe.”
Ne omundu niye balata akhebaasiakho ali sikila sanyala anyoola babaana tawe,
namwe aba mulala khu baandu ba Wele tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela omundu nga oyo ali,
“Ewe waaba ne umba ese lukoosi khulwe khuloleelesia e Sabato,
ne waaba nokhola ka kasiimisia ese ne mu busuubilifu noliinda endakaano yase,
aba lisina liowo lilakhebulilwa mu Lukaangu lwase,
ne mu baandu base khulwe siise sileeyi khukhila nga abele noba ne basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Ewe solibililwa tawe.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela bakeni baliba balala khu baandu bewe,
babamusiima ne khumukholela,
baloleelesianga e Sabato mala mu busuubilifu baliinda endakaano yewe ali,
“Ese khakhureere e Sayuni, sikulu siase sitakatifu,
muelesie enywe ekhoyo munju yase eye lisaba,
mala fukiilile embosio niyo muaana khu alutare yase.
Lukaangu lwase lulalaangwa, enju eye lisaba khu baandu be chikholo choosi.”
Omwami WELE oreerire babaandu bewe ba Isiraeli khukhwama mu mbaambe,
alakilisie khurera babaandu babaandi khuba alala nabo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolele chikholo chingeni chiche nga chisolo,
mala chilie babaandu bewe.
Aboola ali,
“Barangirisi boosi babenyekha bakaambile babaandu base bali babofu!
Se bamanyile siindu tawe.
Bali busa nga embwa eliindanga amuliango ekhasamanga tawe,
khukona khwong'ene ne khuroora.
Basiima busa khukona.
Bali busa nga chimbwa chilia lukali ne se chikura tawe.
Barangirisi bano se bali ne limanya tawe.
Buli mulala akhola busa nga niye omwene nasiimisibwa,
mala ayiima bukhala bwewe omwene.
Bameesi bano baboola bali,
‘Khekhunyoole endali, mala khunywe koosi niko khunyala khwanywa.
Mutikhinyi khukhabe bulayi khukhila endaalo yino.’ ”

Babaandu balayi bafwa,
ne se aliio obukulamo lukeendo tawe,
ne kakhali bafwa nio bumayaanu bukhabanyoola tawe.
Abo bamenyanga limenya lilayi,
banyoolanga kumuleembe ne siuluukho mu lifwa.
Khemwiche ano mukhalakilwe enywe bamayaanu.
Enywe se muli balayi khukhila balakusi, bakhobani, ne baeeyi tawe.
Naanu niye enywe mukholela embelekeu?
Enywe babeyi, mulachekheelelanga nanu?
Enywe musaaya ba wele be lisaaye khulwe khukhola bueeyi
asi we kimirongooro kienywe kimitakatifu ekio.
Muaana babaana benywe nga chimbosio mu mabina siimbi ne sinoko sie luluuchi.
Mubukulayo kamabaale kamamiufu mala mukasaaya nga wele benywe.
Mukachukhakho endali nga siaanwa sie khunywa,
mala mukareerera biakhulia nga biturwa.
Enywe mwibaasia muli ese sangaalila kano koosi ku?
Enywe mucha khu bikulu bileeyi khuana embosio mala mukhola bueeyi.
Mura bifwaani bimayaanu mwenya bueeyi mukari alwiki wenywe.
Munjanjukha ese mufuula chingubo chenywe,
mala muniina khu bitaanda bienywe bibalaayi ne basiime benywe,
nibo muruunganga nio mukona nabo.
Ne abwenao mumala liliekoomba lienywe.
Mwebakha kamafura kaunya bulayi ne kamafura kakaandi,
mala mucha khusaaya wele Moleki.
Khunyoola bawele be khusaaya muruma barumwa aleeyi lukali,
akhaba emakoombe.
Mweluya mwabeene khuyiima bawele babaandi,
ne se mulekha khuyiima tawe.
Enywe mwibaasia mu bifwaani bienywe bimayaanu bilamuelesia kamaani,
ne se mulua tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Bawele sina bano bamukhola enywe muba ne buuri,
nio mumboolele ese bubeeyi ne khu khunjibilila elala?
Enywe mwalekhile khukhumbelesia ese lukoosi sikila nasila busa siise sileeyi?
Mwibaasia muli niko mukholanga kali kamaluungi,
ne kakhali ese ndabakala kimiima kienywe,
ne bifwaani bienywe se bilanyala khumuyeeta tawe.
Nga ne mulila khulwe buyeeti,
lekha bifwaani bienywe ebio bimuonie!
Lifuua lie kumuya ne luucho kulabisuta kuche nabio!
Ne kakhali abo basuubila mwise balamenya,
mu sibala mala balasaaya mu Lukaangu lwase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Lekha babaandu base bangobolele.
Rusiayo buli siindu sikhiingilila engila yabwe!
Senjula engila, mala mukirekekhe.”
“Ese ndi Wele we angaaki lundi omutakatifu, oliio mindali na mindali.
Ese menyanga abuundu angaaki lundi atakatifu,
ne akhaba lundi menyanga ne babaandu bali baolu lundi banyala bekanila,
nio ese mbakoboselia lisuubila ne lilieyikina.
Ese naelesia babaandu base bulamu,
ne se ndachiililila khubasitaka, namwe mbaambile lirima buli lwosi tawe.
Nabaambila lirima sikila bumayaanu bwabwe ne bulianga,
khwako nabaukuuma ne khubanjukha.
Ne kakhali baba bareengu ne khuchiililila ne chingila chabwe chimbi echo.
“Ese naboone nga bakholile, kakhaba kario ndabaonia.
Khabaraangirire ne khubayeeta, ne khaoleelesie abo balila.
Ese khaonie babaandu base.
Babaandu bamayaanu bali nga enyanja eye bibuli ekhaolanga tawe,
niyo bibuli biayo bikhakama khusiubulakha tawe, bireera bunyaalu ne siina eye kamasisie,
‘Kumuleembe se kuliio khu baandu bamayaanu tawe.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Yokela lukali, nga ne onyala!
Boolela babaandu base Isiraeli bumayaanu bwabwe.
Basaayanga ese buli ndaalo, betacha bali,
bali ne silukuluku khumanya chingila chase ne khufukiilila kamalaka kase.
Baboola bali benya ese mbae kamalaka kang'ali nio basangaale nga banjesaaya ese.”
Babaandu bareeba bali,
“Siina sikila efwe khweyimane khulia, kaaba bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abonamo siindu tawe?
Siina sikila efwe khweyimane khulia,
aaba niye nakhabukulamo lukeendo tawe?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ababoolela ali,
“Bung'ali buli buri asiise sie khukhweyimana,
mutima khunyoola bukhala bwenywe ne khumiina bakholi benywe.
Lilieyimana lienywe limukhola muba ne sisiayuumba ne khulomana ne khukhupana.
Enywe mwibaasia muli lilieyimana nga lino liri linyala liakhola ese narekeeresia lisaba lienywe ku?
Lino nilio lilieyimana nilio ndobora?
Endaalo yo mundu khukhweyimana ku?
Lili khukhwinamia kumurwe kwewe nga sisele?
Ne khuura chingubo che kamakunia khwikokhe ku?
Mulanga lino muli lilieyimana?
Ne ndaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afukiilila ku?
“Lino se lili lilieyimana nilio ese ndobora?
Ne khukangulula kiminyololo kie bumayaanu,
ne khukangulula bitorobo,
ne khulekhuula babamiinwa bache,
ne khufunaka buli lichooki tawe ku?
Ne khureera bakhali ne engo munju yowo,
nobona oli sichula, mufware,
ne okhekisa khu baandu bowo tawe.
“Nio busiime bwase khwiwe bulakhosia nga enyanga eye kumutikhinyi,
ne kamakoonjo kowo kalaona khangu.
Ese ndaba ne nawe buli lwosi khukhuonia, khubao khwase khulakhukhiinga buli lubeka.
Ne usaba ndakhukobosia.
Nga ne unaanga ndafukiilila.
Waaba ne wakamia limiina, mu buli sikholwa sie sileka,
ne buli likhuwa limayaanu,
waaba noana siakhulia khu bali ne njala ne khukhwikusia lilienya lie babapisibwa sibi,
nio buwaanga bowo bulakhosia mu siilima,
ne sisiilima siowo silaba nga enyanga mwiangilwe.
Ne buli lwoosi khakhuraangirire mala khwikusie ne bibiindu bilayi.
Ndakhuliinda obe ne kamaani lundi obe omulamu.
Okhabe nga kumukuunda kulimo kameechi kamakali,
nga emoni eye kameechi ekhateenyanga tawe.
Babaandu bowo lundi bakhombakhe mu makuunda kamakhale,
bombakhe lundi khu misiingi kimikhale.
Mulimanyikha nga babaandu babombakha lundi kamasiisi,
babesiao chinju chichaba ne chatechulwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Waaba ne okhola e sabato nga endakatifu,
ne se oyiima ke bukhala bwowo endaalo eyo tawe,
waaba nobona oli endaalo yase eli endakatifu,
mala okielesie lukoosi khulwe khulekha khucha chingeendo, khukhola kimilimo,
namwe khukhupa embakha ya busa khu ndaalo eyo,
nio ewe olanyoola ekhoyo eyaama mu khukholela ese.
Ese ndakhukhola obe ne lukoosi mu sibala sioosi,
mala olekhoyela sibala nisio ese naelesia kukaao Yakobo.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomaloome.”

Lola kumukhono kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se kuli kumwimbi khuonia tawe,
namwe liiru liewe se lili limiinyi bali se liiulila tawe.
Ne kakhali bumayaanu bwenywe bwamukabukhaanie,
ne Wele wenywe,
ne bumayaanu bwenywe bwakisile bubweeni bwewe,
nio se nyala khuulila tawe.
Sikila kamakhono kenywe kanyaalutisiibwe ne sifuki,
ne chinjala chenywe ne bumayaanu,
ne kiminwa kienywe kialomile bubeeyi,
ne chinimi chenywe chimoonya bumayaanu.
Se aliio ositaka mu bung'ali tawe,
se aliio ocha mu siina mu buluungi tawe,
beyama ke bubeeyi, baloma ke bubeeyi,
barekekha kamabi ne bareera bumayaanu.
Baalusia kamaki ka nafwo,
banaba buusi bwe lububi,
oyo olia kamaki kacho afwa,
mu liki liliatiikhe endemu yamamo.
Ne buusi bwe chimbubi se bularumikhwa nga chingubo tawe,
babaandu se balebiimba nibio bakhola ebio tawe.
Kimilimo kiabwe kili kie bumayaanu,
ne bikholwa biabwe bie sisiayuumba bili mumakhono kabwe.
ne bali khangu khuchukha sifuki sia busa,
kamebaasio kabwe kali ke bumayaanu,
lilianjukhwa ne libuna lili mungila chabwe.
Engila eye kumuleembe se bakimanyile tawe,
ne bung'ali se bulikho khu ngila chabwe tawe.
Bakoyanisie chingila chabwe,
se aliio ochilakho oba ne kumuleembe tawe.
Khwako bung'ali buli aleeyi khukhwama khwifwe,
ne buluungi se buli ne nafwe tawe,
khuyiima buwaanga, ne lola sisiilima,
khwenya khubone buwaanga ne khukeenda mu siilima.
Khuabasia khwisiisi nga babofu,
khuabasia nga bakhali ne chimoni tawe,
khwetuya kumuusi nga mu silo.
Mu balamu khuli nga bafu.
Khuulukhuma oli kamanani,
khwelisialisia oli kamauusi,
khuyiima bung'ali ne kakhali se buliio tawe,
khuyiima buonia ne kakhali buli aleeyi.
Sikila bumayaanu bwefwe bwatasiikhe ebweeni wowo,
bumayaanu bwefwe buli buloli khu fwabene.
Sikila bumayaanu bwefwe ne nafwe,
ne kamakhiikha kefwe khukamanyile.
Khukhola kamamayaanu ne khukhwekaana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khulekha khuloonda Wele,
khulomaloma bumiini ne khuuba bareengu,
khukanakana ne khuloma ke bubeeyi ke mu mwoyo.
Bung'ali bulobwa,
ne buluungi buli sinaao,
Bung'ali se buli mu siikhasio tawe,
ne buluungi se bunyoolekhana tawe.
Bung'ali se buliio tawe,
oyo owilukha bumayaanu ekhola omusiku.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abona lino, ne se liamusangaasia tawe,
sikila bung'ali se bwabao tawe.
auka ali se abao na mulala osoola tawe.
Nio kumukhono kwewe omwene kwamureerera bukhili,
ne buluungi bwewe bwamutinyilisia.
Alefwara lilienya lie khuluungisia bibiindu, ne khunyaasia,
ne khukhweyaacha khu makhiikha niko babaandu banyoola.
Akhaukuume basiku bewe khuloondekhana nende niko bakholile,
bakhaba abo bamenyile mu bibala bie aleeyi.
Khukhwama ebukwe khucha mumbo buli mundu alamuria ne bunyali bwewe bukali.
Aliicha nga luluuchi lubisia lukali, nga ekhuungu eye kamaani.
“Ese kheche e Yerusalemu,
khumubabila enywe ne khumuonia enywe mweesi mumwarura mu bumayaanu bwenywe.
Ne ese ndikhola endakaano ne nanywe. Ese namueleesie enywe bunyali bwase ne kamekisio kase bibe bibienywe buli lwosi, ne khukhwama luno enywe mulandia ese ne khukhwekisia babaana benywe ne lisaaye lienywe khu khundia ese khulwe siise siosi sisiicha.”

Yinyokha, Yerusalemu mala okhosie nga enyanga.
Luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lulikho lukhukhosiakho.
Ne chikholo chichiindi chilafuunikhwa ne sisiilima.
Ne kakhali buwaanga bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bulakhukhosiakho,
ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lulaba ne nanywe.
Chikholo chikheche mu buwaanga bwowo.
Ne babaami bakheche mu buwaanga nga enyanga ne likho esoa.
Lola chimbeka choosi niio oli ao,
mala obone sina silikho siekholekha.
Babaandu bowo balikho bebuusia alala beche engo!
Basoleeli bowo balama aleeyi.
Ne bakhaana bowo balamemwa nga babaana.
Olabona kano mala wichule ekhoyo,
olaterema khulwe khukhweulila bulayi,
sikila kimiaandu kie chikholo kilareerwa khwiwe khukhwama engelekha we nyanja,
buiinda bwabwe bulecha.
Kamatuuli ke chingamia kakheche khukhwama Midiani ne Efa.
Babaandu bakheche khukhwama Sheba, ne bareera esahabu ne biiunya bulayi.
Babaandu bakhaboole kamalayi khu niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile!
Kamakheese koosi ke Kedari ne Nabaloti kakhareerwe khwiwe nga chimbosio.
Ne khukaana khu alutare atakatifu khusiimisia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakhole Lukaangu lwewe lube lwe luyali lukali khukhila siise sisiabira.
Meeli siina chitima khangu oli kamaleesi chino?
Oli kamauusi kaloota?
Sikila bibala bie sia nyanja bilaniinda,
chimeeli cha Tarishishi chilanyoa,
khureera babaana benywe khukhwana aleeyi,
baleecha ne fwesa ne sahabu yabwe,
khuelesia lukoosi lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Wele Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli okholile chikholo choosi chielesie babaandu bewe lukoosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yerusalemu ali,
“Baakwa baliombakha lundi kamasiisi kowo,
lundi babaami babwe balikhukholela,
mu lirima liase nakhuukuuma,
ne luno ndakhwekesia buyeeti ne siisa siase.
nio babaami be chikholo bole khukhureerera ewe kimiaandu kiabwe.
Ne kakhali chikholo chikhakhukholela ewe kimilimo tawe,
chilonakilwa elala.
Kimirongooro kia miberoshi, chunipa ne sayipurasi,
kimirongooro kimikwalaafu kie kumusiru kwa Lebanoni,
kilareerwa kiombakhilwe lundi Yerusalemu,
khumiliyisia Lukaangu lwase khukhola lukoba lwase luboofu lube lwe luyali.
Abo boosi khaale babakhulekelesia ewe balasaaya mu bikele biowo,
Bakhakhulange bali, ‘Lukoba luboofu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,’
‘Sayuni, lukoba lwo Mutakatifu owa Isiraeli.’
Lundi ewe solianjukhwa ne khubiilwa na akeekhe ene tawe,
Lukoba luboofu lulwanjukhwa ne khuuywamo.
Ese ndakhukaliya ne khukhukhola obe owe lukoondo lulayi,
abuundu we khoyo buli lwosi.
Chikholo ne babaami balikhuliinda bulayi.
Nga maayi nalelanga omwana wewe.
Olimanya oli ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakhuonisie,
oli Wele we kamaani owa Isiraeli akhulekhuula.
Khakhureerere esahabu mu bweyaangu bwe kumukasa,
mu bweyaangu bwe sichuuma, khakhureerere efwesa,
mu bweyaangu bwe kimirongooro, khakhureerere kumukasa.
Ne mu bweyaangu bwe kamabaale ndakhureerera sichuuma
khakhole kumuleembe kukhwamiie,
mala buluungi bube omuruki wowo,
Liiuliilikha lie sisiayuumba se liliuliilikhana lundi tawe,
libuna se lilikwa mu sibala siowo lundi tawe.
Ndikhubabila ne khukhuliinda ewe nga lisiisi,
owe oliifumia sikila nakhuonia.
namwe kumwesi se kuliba buwaanga bwowo silo tawe,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliba buwaanga bwowo bwa buli lwosi.
Ne Wele wowo aliba luyali lwowo.
Chindaalo chowo che bubeeleli chiliola khu siakamo.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndaba buwaanga bwowo bwa buli lwosi.
Buyiindila khukhila enyanga ne kumwesi.
Babaandu bowo baliba baluungi,
baliba ne kamaloba buli lwosi,
kumurombo nikwo ese samwene nabiaala, kimilimo kie kamakhono kase,
nio mbelesibwe luyali.
Akhaba bakhabalikha tawe bakhekhole ekholo,
ne endiiti lukali ebe ekholo eye kamaani.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu biise biayo khakhole khangu.”

sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjukhilekho kamafura khurera Elomo Endayi khu bataambi,
ne khuoleelesia be bubeeleli mu miooyo,
khulangilila bulekhuule khu baambe,
ne khulekhuula abo bali mu siboe.
Bali siise siolile,
nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alionisiliamo babaandu bewe,
mala akhile basiku bewe.
Andumire ese khuoleelesia abo boosi balila.
Khuelesia abo balila mu Sayuni,
ekhoyo ne busangaafu mu bweyaangu bwe bubeeleli,
kumwenya kwe fuma mu bweyaangu bwe bubeeleli.
Balaba nga kimirongooro nikio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene abialile.
Boosi balikhola kali kamaluungi mala Wele alifumisibwa khu niko akholile.
Baliombakha chingoba chimboofu chi chatechulwa.
Babaandu base, baakwa balimukholela enywe, baliaaya kamakheese kenywe,
balime ne khuliinda kimikuunda kienywe kie kimisabibu.
Mala enywe mulimanyikhana nga basaayi ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
bakholi ba Wele wefwe.
Enywe muliekhoyela kimiaandu kie chikholo,
ne khukhwibonia muli kili kikienywe.
Chisoni chenywe ne changalaalo biakaame,
mukhamenye mu sibala sienywe mwabene,
ne kimiaandu kienywe kikhatasikhe,
ekhoyo yenywe eliba buli lwosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ese nasiima bung'ali,
ne nabiila bumiinikhi ne kamakhiikha,
Ese mu busuubili ndaana kumuruuru khu baandu base,
mala khole endakaano eya mindali.
Be lisaaye liabwe balimanyikha mu chikholo chosi,
ne babaana babwe mu chikholo,
boosi babona balibamanya bali bali ekholo niio Wele abiita chikhabi.”
kumwoyo kwase kulekhoya lukali mu Wele wase,
sikila afwarire engubo eye buonia,
ambimbile ne ngubo eye buluungi,
nga owe siselelo ne efwarire liua liewe,
lundi nga omwea ne efwarire kamamili kewe.
Nga sibala ne sirusia bimelwa biasio,
ne kumukuunda kurusia bimiichwa,
kario Omwami WELE alakhola buluungi ne efuma,
khukhwicha ebweeni we chikholo choosi.

Ese khalomalome khutinyilisia Yerusalemu,
se ndasila tawe, khukhwola nga lulaonisibwa.
Ne buonia bwalwo bulakhosia nga siiuna mu siilima.
Yerusalemu, chikholo chikhakhubone ewe noli owe bukhili!
Babaami babwe boosi bakhabone luyali lwowo.
Okhalangwe lisina liya,
lisina lilieebwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene.
Okhabe ekuutwa eye lukoondo mukhono mwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ekuutwa eye bubwami mukhono mwa Wele wowo.
Solilaangwa lundi bali “Nabulobe” tawe,
namwe sibala siowo silangwe, “Omukhasi Nabulobe tawe.”
Lisina liowo liya likhabe bali “Wele amusangaalile.”
Sibala siowo sikhalangwe “Nabukelema,”
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asangaasibwe ne nawe,
mala alaba nga omuseecha owe sibala siowo.
Nga omusoleeli nabeya omukhaana owe yabwana.
Oyo owakhubumba alakhubeya.
Nga owo mwea asiimisibwa no mwea wewe,
nio Wele wowo alasiimisibwa nawe.
Khu masiisi kowo Yerusalemu,
ese narereekho baliindi, bakhecha basila busa kumuusi namwe silo tawe.
Khukhwola bakhebusie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ke lisuubisia liewe,
ne bakhamulekha aliibilila tawe.
Bakhamuakho siiuluukho tawe nabwila ombakha Yerusalemu,
mala alukhole lukoba luboofu nilwo sibala sioosi sifumia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echuba elala ne kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha ne bunyali bwewe ali,
“Se khabukule lundi engaanu yowo mbelesie basiku benywe nga siakhulia siabwe tawe.
Ne baakwa se bakhanywe endali yowo niyo mukholile tawe.
Ne ewe owamiicha ne khufuna kamaindi okhalie,
mala ofumie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Enywe mumwaka ne khufuna chisabibu,
mulanywa endali mu luuya lwe Lukaangu lwase.”
Babaandu ba Yerusalemu rura enje we lukoba,
mala musenjule kumuyila khulwe babaandu benywe balikho ne bakobola!
Rekekha kumuyila kumuboofu,
rusiakho kamabaale!
Rakho simanyisio nio chikholo chimanye.
“Boolela babaandu ba Yerusalemu oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho echa khumuonia enywe,
alikho echa ne babaandu nibo aonisie.”
Enywe mulalaangwa bali,
“Babaandu ba Wele batakatifu.”
“Babaandu nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aonia.”
Yerusalemu lulilaangwa bali,
“Lukoba nilwo Wele asiima,”
“Lukoba nilwo Wele akhalekha tawe.”

Naanu owifwarire bulayi mu ngubo embesemu,
olikho nakeenda mu bunyali ne kamaani oyo?”
“Ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli ne bunyali bwe khuonia, ndikho nicha khulangilila bukhili bwase.”
“Siina sikila chingubo chewe ne chirobeereere,
chimbesemu nga cho mundu osuuranga chisabibu khung'oona endali?”
“Ese naswalakilila chikholo nga osuura chisabibu,
ne se aliio owecha khukhunjeeta tawe.
Nabaswalakilila mu lirima liase,
mala chingubo chase choosi cheakhile kamafuki kabwe.
Nakhalaka ndi siise sie khuonia babaandu base siolile,
sili siise sie khuukuuma basiku babwe.
Ne kakhali lirima liase liamba kamaani,
mala nanyoola bukhili samwene.
Mu lirima liase naswalakilila chikholo choosi nachibunia.
Nachukha sifuki siabwe khu sibala.”
Ese khaboole ke busiime bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bukhaliwao tawe.
Ndamufumia khu bioosi nibio akhukholele efwe.
Abiiitile chikhabi chingali khu babaandu ba Isiraeli
sikila siisa siewe ne busiime bwa buli lwosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Bali babaandu base se balimbea tawe.”
Ne khwako abaonia
khukhwama mu butinyu bwabwe bwoosi.
Se aba malaika tawe ne kakhali aba Wele omwene owabaonia.
Mu busiime ne siisa siewe abareesia.
Abaliindanga buli lwosi,
ne kakhali baba bareengu khu niye mala babelesia Roho Omutakatifu.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekela omusiku wabwe mala abapa.
Nio, bakhebulila kakabira, ke chindaalo cha Musa, omukholi wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mala bareebana bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi luno ali waena,
owaonia barangirisi be babaandu bewe khukhwama mu nyanja?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owaelesia Musa Roho wewe ali waena?
owakabukhaniamo enyanja mu moni chabwe khukhwielesia lukoosi buli lwosi.
Naanu owabarangirira mu nyanja?”
Nga efarasi mu siangalaamwe, se betuyakho tawe.
Nga chikhaafu ne chiicha mu litooma.
Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaelesia siuluukho.
Khwako ewe warangirira babaandu bowo,
khukhwielesia wamwene lisina lie luyali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khulolele khukhwama mwikulu,
niio ewe omenyile mu butakatifu ne luyali lwowo,
bukali bwowo bwe khukhwibaasia efwe buli waena?
Bunyali bwowo buli waena?
Busiime ne siisa siowo bili wae? Okhakhulekha tawe.
Ewe oli Paapa,
Bakuuka befwe Aburahamu ne Yakobo se bakhufukiilila efwe tawe,
ne kakhali ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli Paapa, oyo okhuonianga efwe busiele.
Sikila siina ewe nokhulekha efwe khwaukhe khu ngila chowo,
sikila siina ewe nokhukhola efwe khuba be siikhanyilisia mala khulekhe khu khuria tawe?
Kobola sikila abo bakhukholelanga ewe,
khulwe babaandu babechanga babowo buli busiele.
Efwe, babaandu bowo batakatifu,
khwatimanisibwa ne basiku befwe khu siise sikeekhe,
baswalakilila abutakatifu wowo.
Wakhukhola busa efwe oli ewe okhaaba Omwami wefwe tawe,
nga khukhaaba babaandu bowo tawe.

Siina sikila ewe nokhatabula likulu mala wekha asi?
Bikulu andi bilakhubona mala bitereme mu buri.
Andi bilaterema nga kameechi ne kasela.
Khewiche mala wekesie bunyali bwowo khu basiku bowo,
mala okhole chikholo chitereme ebweeni wowo.
Siise siabao nisio ewe wechelakho mala wakhola bibiindu bie khuriisia,
nibio khukhebaasia khuli bilabaao tawe,
bikulu biakhubona mala biaterema sikila buuri.
okholanga bikholwa nga ebio khwaabo babara lilieyikina liabwe mu niye.
Ewe wakanilanga abo babekhoyela khukhola kali kamaluungi,
abo bakhebulila nga ewe ne wenya bamenye.
Ewe wakhuambila efwe lirima,
ne kakhaba kario efwe khwachiililila busa khukhola bumayaanu,
akhaba mu lirima liowo likali efwe khwachiililila busa khukhola kamabi khukhwama khale.
Efwe fweesi khwabeele bamayaanu,
akhaba bikholwa biefwe bilayi khukhila, bili binyaalu khubiriirira.
Sikila bumayaanu bwefwe,
efwe khuli busa nga kamasaafu kaniaala ne kauchibwa ne khuungu.
Se aliio omundu okhusaba ewe tawe,
se aliio omundu na mulala owicha khwiwe khulwe buyeeti tawe.
Ewe wekisile khukhwama khwifwe,
mala wakhwanjukhe sikila bumayaanu bwefwe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne kakhali ewe oli Paapa wefwe.
Efwe khuli liloba ne ewe oli omubuumbi.
Efwe fweesi khuli kumulimo kwe kamakhono kowo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okhaba ne lirima likali tawe,
mala okhakhebulila bumayaanu bwefwe buli lwosi tawe.
Lola, yibaasia, oli fweesi khuli babaandu bowo.
Chingoba chowo chindakatifu chabeele sichiimi,
Sayuni lwabeele sichiimi,
ne Yerusalemu lwanjuukhwe,
Chinju chefwe chindayi ne chindakatifu,
niio bakuuka befwe bakhufumisilianga,
chosebwe ne kumulilo.
Ne abuundu wefwe alayi ekholile kamakuunda.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se olefwilisiakho mu biindu bino tawe ku?
Olasila busa mala okhupie sibi orio?

Naba nerekekha khuyiimwa ne naabo,
bakhasaba tawe,
nerekekha khunyoolwa ne naabo bakhambiima tawe.
Naloma ndi, “Ese ndi ano,”
Khukholo ekhasaba tawe.
bakeenda mu ngila ekhali endayi tawe,
khuloondelela kakabwe kamene,
ekholo eyinjiyakasiakho buli lwosi,
ne khuaana chimbosio mu mikuunda,
ne khukhwosia biiunya bulayi khu alutare che bakhamanyile Wele tawe.
Oli siilo bacha mu mabina ne mu biliindwa mu khureeba bimakoombe.
Balia enyama eye ngurwe.
Banywa kumuunyu kung'ooniilwe khukhwama mu nyama eanilwe,
mu mbosio che bakhamanyile Wele tawe.
Ne baboolela baandu bali, “Ba aleeyi nafwe, efwe khuli batakatifu lukali khwinywe khukhutilakho.”
Ese se nyala khukhwikhaliilikhila babaandu nga bano bario tawe,
lirima liase khu nibo lili nga kumulilo kukhasimanga tawe.
“Ese nabisia khale siiukuumo siabwe, mala likhalakilwa liabwe liaandikwa.
Ese se ndalekelesia niko bakholile tawe, ne kakhali ndabaruunga
khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe ne khulwe bumayaanu bwe bakuukawabwe.
Boosia biiunya bulayi khu bikulu bitakatifu bie bakhamanyile Wele tawe, mala baloma kamamayaanu khwise.
Khwako khabaukuume nga bikholwa biabwe bibiabira ne bikhoyela.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Se aliio omundu owonaka chisabibu chindayi tawe, ne kakhali bachikoyangamo endali.
Namwe ese se khabunie babaandu base boosi tawe, khaonie abo babakholelanga ese.
Khabiite chikhabi Baisiraeli be kholo eya Yuda,
ne lisaaye liabwe lilinyoola kumukabwa kwe kamaloba ke mu bikulu.
Babaandu base barobore, babakholelanga ese balimenyayo.
ne litooma lia Achori libe niio chikhaafu chiolela che babaandu base babambenja.
“Ne kakhali kakhabukhane khwinywe mumwandoba ese,
mumwalekelesia Sayuni, lukulu lwase lutakatifu,
mala musaaya Kadi ne Meni, bawele be khabi ne likhalaka.
Liliba likhalaka liowo khufwa lifwa lie sisiayuumba,
sikila se wafukiilila nga ese ne nakhulaanga,
namwe se warekeeresia nga ese ne nalomaloma tawe.
Ewe warobora khukhundeka ese ne khukhola kamabi.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Lola, bakholi base balilia, ne kakhali enywe muliba ne njala,
lola bakholi base balinywa, ne kakhali enywe muliba ne bulesia,
Lola bakholi base baliekhoya, ne kakhali enywe muliambwa chisoni.
Lola, bakholi base bakhembe khulwe busangaafu mu miooyo,
ne kakhali olilila khulwe buchuuni bwe kumwoyo,
ne oliesasaara mu burafu bwe kumwoyo.
Babaandu base barobore bakharumikhire lisina lienywe nga silaamo.
Ese Omwami WELE khamwire enywe.
Ne khaane lisina liya khu bakholi base.
Yesi yesi mu sibala osaba chikhabi alasaba abiitwe ne Wele Omweyikinwa.
Yesi yesi owichuba, alechubila mu lisina lia Wele Omweyikinwa.
Butinyu bubwabaao bulachila elala ne khukhwibililwa.”
“Ese ndikho mbaang'ana sibala siiya ne likulu liiya.
Bikholwa bie khale bilebililwa elala.
Sangaala ne khukhwekhoya buli lwosi mu niko ese mbaang'ana.
Yerusalemu luuya nilwo ese ng'oona lulechula ekhoyo ne babaandu balwo balasangaala.
Bililo se bilibamo tawe, khulaanga buyeeti se khulibamo tawe.
Babaana se balifwa lundi ne bali batoro tawe, ne babaandu boosi balamenya limenya lie bulamu bwabwe.
Omundu ne afwa owe kimiiko emia, alebaasibwa khuuba omuele.
Ne ne afwa kimiiko ekio ne kikhola tawe, alebaasibwa khuuba owe silaamo.
Babaandu balombakha chinju mala bamenyemo,
bakhabiaale kimisabibu mala balie chisabibu chayo.
Se baliombakha mala babaandi bamenyemo tawe.
Se balibiaala mala babaandi balie kamatuunda tawe.
Nga kimirongooro, babaandu base balamenya bulamu buleeyi.
Bakhekhoyele elala mu bwichufu kimilimo kie kamakhono kabwe.
Se balikhola kimilimo kia busa tawe,
namwe se balisaala babaana khukhupwa sibi tawe,
sikila baliba lisaaye liliabiitwa chikhabi ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne babaana babwe.
Ne bakhasaba tawe khabakobosie, ne basilomaloma khabaulile.
ne lufuumbi luliba siakhulia sie ndemu.
Se bikhaumisie namwe bionakake mu lukulu lwase lutakatifu tawe.”

“Likulu muli endebe yase eye bubwami,
ne sibala sili endebe niyo ese swalakho.
Nono enju lukano siina niyo enywe mulanjombakhila ese,
abuundu alukano siina niio ese mbulukhila?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, bibiindu bino bioosi kumukhono kwase kwabikhola.
Khwako bibiindu bino bioosi bili bibiase.
Ne kakhali yuno ali omundu niye khabonemo.
Ali oweboombia ne kumwoyo kwe khukhwekanila,
ne khuria likhuwa liase.
“Oyo okhoonya ekhaafu ali nga owira omundu,
oyo oaana limeeme nga embosio, ali busa nga ofunile embwa likosi,
oyo oaana biturwa bie siakhulia ali busa nga oaana kamalasile ke ngurwe,
oyo oaana siianwa sie likhebulila siunya bulayi ali busa nga oyo osaba sifwaani.
Abano barobora chingila chabwe babene,
ne kimiooyo kiabwe kisangaalila bumayaanu bwabwe.
Sesi khabaroborere butinyu,
mala mbareerere nisio baria,
sikila nga nalaanga se aliio owangobosia tawe,
nga ne nalomaloma se aliio owarekeeresia tawe.
Ne kakhali bakhola kamamayaanu ebweeni wase,
mala barobora likhasangaasia tawe.”
Rekeeresia Elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enywe muria likhuwa liewe.
“Balebe benywe babamubiila,
ne khumwekaana khulwe lisina liase,
balomile bali, ‘Lekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesibwe luyali
nio efwe khubone ekhoyo yenywe,’
ne kakhali niibo bakhaambwe chisoni.
Rekeeresia, luyoka khukhwama mu lukoba luboofu!
Kumumilo kwama mu Lukaangu!
Kumumilo kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aruungia basiku bewe kakenyibwa.
buchuuni ne bukhamwichakho tawe asaala omwana omusoleeli.
Naanu owaulila khu siindu sirio?
Naanu owabonakho kano?
Sibala sinyala siasaalwa mu ndaalo ndala?
Ekholo enyala yasaalwa mu siise silala?
Nga Sayuni ne anja khulumwa,
asaala babaana bewe basoleeli.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Nyala nareera babaandu base ambi khusaalwa, mala mbalekhe balobe khusaalwa?”
Wele wowo areeba ali,
“Ese okila ne basaala nyala nekala lusaaye?”
“Khemwekhoye ne Yerusalemu khemumusangaalile,
enywe mweesi mumwamusiima,
yekhoya ne naye,
enywe mweesi mumulila,
nio munuune mala mwikure,
ne kamaturu kewe kaoleelesia,
nio munywe lukali mu busangaafu,
khukhwama mu bukali bwe luyali lwewe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Lola Ese ndamutasa kimiaandu nga luluuchi,
ne kimiaandu kie chikholo nga luluuchi lulwichuule.
Mukhanuune mala mumemwe khu mukoongo khwewe
ne khusunia omwana khu bikele.
Nga niye maawe aoleelesia ndamuoleelesia,
mukhaolelesebwe mu Yerusalemu.
Mukhabone mala kimiooyo kienywe kiekhoye,
kamakuumba kenywe kakhabe kamalayi nga bunyaasi,
ne likhamanyikhane bali kumukhono kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kuli ne bakholi bewe,
ne lirima liewe lili khu basiku bewe.”
Lola
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akheechele mu mulilo,
ne kamakaari kewe nga embembeesi,
ne khukhwekesia lirima liewe mu bukhalafu,
ne lirafua liewe nga chinjaso che kumulilo.
Ne kumulilo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabisie likhala,
ne mbalu yewe khu baandu boosi,
naabo baberwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi baliba bakali.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Abo babetakaasa,
ne khukhwekwalaasia babene khucha mu mikuunda,
ne baloondanekho, ne khulia enyama eye ngurwe ne namuchunjusi, ne biakhulia bibiindi binyaalu,
boosi bakhabune.
Sikila namanya kimilimo ne kamebaasio kabwe, ne ndikho nicha khubusia chikholo choosi alala, ne bakheche mala babone luyali lwase,
mala khareo simanyisio akari wabwe khukhwama mu nibo kharume babarama mu kholo, khucha Tarishishi, Puti ne Luti, balasa buyiingo khucha Tubali ne Yafani, ne khu biaala bie sia nyanja aleeyi bikhaulilakho efuma namwe babona luyali lwase tawe, ne bakhafumie luyali lwase mu kholo ng'enecho.
Ne bakhareere balebe benywe khukhwama mu kholo choosi nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khu farasi, mu makaari, mu korokocho ne khu nyumbu, khu ngamia khucha Yerusalemu khu sikulu siase sitakatifu, nga Baisiraeli ne bareera siianwa sie siakhulia mu siindu similiiu munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali ndabukula balala khwaabo babe basaayi ne balawi.”
“Likulu liya ne sibala siyia,
nibio khakhole bikharame ebweeni wase,
kaliba kario khu lisaaye ne lisina liowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
‘Khukhwama khu mwesi kumuyia khukhwola khu kuundi,
ne khukhwama khu sabato khukhwola khu kiindi,
babaandu boosi balicha khukhusaba ese.’

Kamakhuwa ka Yeremia okhwa Hilikia, mulala khu basaayi be lukoba lwa Anatoti mu sibala sia Benjamini.
Elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yecha khu Yeremia khu mwiiko kwe khumi na kitaru nikwo Yosia okhwa Amoni aaba omwami owa Yuda,
lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma khu Yeremia nga Yehoyakimu okhwa Yosia ne aba omwami. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi alomaloma ne Yeremia biise bikali khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe khumi na mulala kwe bubwami bwa Sedekia okhwa Yosia nga omwami owa Yuda. Mu mwesi kwa kharaano kwe kumwiiko mwenokwo babaandu ba Yerusalemu batiilwa bayilwa mu mbaambe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Ese nakhurobora
ne khakhubuumba munda mwa mao,
lundi nakhutakaasa ne okhasaalwa tawe.
Nakhurobora khuba omung'oosi we chikholo.”
Ese nakobosia ndi, “Aa Omwami WELE! Lola se manyile khulomaloma tawe. Ese siili mwana.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Okhaboola oli ‘Ese siili mwana tawe.’
Sikila khu boosi nibo ndakhurumakho olacha,
mala obaboolele buli siindu nisio ese khulakiilisia.
Okhabaria tawe,
sikila ese ndaba alala
ne nawe khukhuliinda.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akololosia kumukhono kwewe, mala andiila khu munwa, nio amboolela ali,
“Lola, nareere kamakhuwa kase mukhanwa mwowo.
Endaalo yino ese nakhuelesie ewe bunyali,
khu kholo choosi ne khu bwami,
khurusiao khukhwonakaka,
khukhwombakha ne khubiaala.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andeeba ali, “Yeremia olikho obona siina?”
Ese namukobosia ndi, “Naboone lusakia lwe kumurongooro kwa Alimondi.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Waboone bulayi bwene, sikila ese ndaloleelelanga mbone ndi kamakhuwa kaase keecha khuuba ka ng'ali.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aandeeba lundi ali, “Siina sisiindi nisio olikho obona?”
Namukobosia ndi, “Naboone endekhelo efutare ebunaswa elikho yibuuya.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Libuna lilaama ebunaswa liche khu bamenywa be mu sibala sino boosi.
Sikila ese ndikho ndanga chikholo che bubwami bwe ebunaswa choosi chiiche. Chiliicha mala buli ekholo eliimikha bubwami bwayo asilibwa sia Yerusalemu, elibubotookhelela kamasiisi koosi ne kamasiisi ke chingoba cha Yuda.
Ne ese khalomalome bukhalaki bwase khu kholo echo, khulwe bumayaanu bwacho bwoosi bwe khukhundekha ese. Chosiisie biiunya bulayi khu bawele babaandi, ne khusaaya bibiindu nibio babaandu babeene bekholela.
Ne kakhali ewe Yeremia, yirekekha winyokhe obaboolele buli siindu nisio khulaka. Okhabaria tawe, ne busa ndakhuambia chisoni ebweeni wabwe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lola nakhukholile ewe luno khuba lukoba lusire, enjeko eye sichuuma, ne kamasiisi ke kumukasa khu sibala sioosi ne khu baami ba Yuda ne babaana babwe, basaayi ne babaandu bamwo.
Balapana nawe ne kakhali se balakhuula tawe sikila ndi nawe khukhuliinda.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Cha mala wilwachile babaandu ba Yerusalemu ne khubaboolela oli,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
Ese khebulila nga enywe ne mwaba basuubilwa ne musiili baele,
nga ne mwasiima ese mu khunyoa nga mwaba babeea,
nga mwandondakho mu sichiimi,
mu sibala siikhamiichwamo tawe.
Isiraeli, yaba endakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
kamatuunda kewe ke khunyoa.
Boosi babakaliakho banyoolekha khuba ne kamabi,
butinyu bwabakwakho,
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Ulila elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enywe lisaaye lia Yakobo ne enju yoosi eya Isiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
Bubi siina nibwo baraara benywe banyoola nio banjanjukha,
Basaaya bifwaani bitamba bukhala, mala babene batamba bukhala?
Se bareebakho bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali waena
owakhurusia efwe mu sibala sia Misiri,
owakhurangirira khwabira mu sichiimi,
mu sibala sie sisiangalaamwe ne kamaloo,
mu sibala sisioomu para lundi sie sisiilima sikali,
sibala nisio omundu akhabirangamo tawe,
nimwo omundu akhamenyilemo” tawe.
Ese nabareera mu sibala sie ngakha,
khukhwekhoyela kamatuunda kaasio,
ne bibiindu biasio bilayi.
Kakhaba kario nga mwachamo, mwonakaka kamaloba kase,
mala mwanyaalutia kumukabwa kwase.
Basaayi se bareeba bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali waena?” Tawe.
Basaayi base babene, se bamanya ese tawe,
Babaami bandekelesia,
bang'oosi bang'oola mu lisina lia Baali,
mala basaaya bifwaani biikhali ne bukhala tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ese ndi nende niko ndoma khwinywe,
lundi khaboolele babechukhulu benywe.
Yambukha muche mu bibala bili siimbi ne chinyanja,
e Saipurasi mala mubone,
namwe ruma omundu e Kedari,
mala muloleelesie burekeerefu,
Lola sisiindu nga esio sirio sikhabakhoo tawe.
Ekholo eliyo eyakaluukhasiakho bawele bayo,
akhaba ne bakhaba ba ng'ali tawe?
Ne kakhali babaandu base bakaluukhasie luyali lwabwe,
khulwe esio siikhali ne bukhala tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Yesiindukhila lino lukali, ee Likulu,
terema ne buuri bukali,
sikila babaandu base bakholile bumayaanu buno:
Bandekhile ese emoni eye kameechi ke bulamu,
mala beyabiile chisebele chabwe,
chisebele chiteenya.”
“Isiraeli se ali nasioobi tawe, se asaalwa mu nyinga cha nasioobi tawe,
siina sikila basiku bewe ne bamuaaya?
Chitalang'i chimuulukhumila,
chaulukhuume lukali.
Chakholile kamaloba kewe kabeele sisiangalaamwe,
Chingoba chewe chabunile,
bamenywa se balimo tawe.
Khutasa khwako, babaandu ba Memufisi ne Talipanihesi
bakhunulile ekuutwa yowo.
Isiraeli ewe wamwene wereerera kano,
wanjanjukha ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo,
nga naba ne khurangirira khu ngila.
Nono, munyoola siina khulwe khucha e Misiri?
Khunywa kameechi ke luluuchi lwa Naili?
Namwe siina nisio munyoola khulwe khucha Ashuru,
khunywa kameechi ke luluuchi lwa Efurati?
Bumayaanu bwowo bulakhuukuuma,
Ne liayaaya liowo mwisuubila lilakhurafwira.
Manya oli buli bumayaanu lundi burafu
khwiwe khulekha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo
Liria khwise se likhulimo tawe,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khale mwaloba bunyali bwase mwaloba khufukiilila kakaase,
ne khukhusaaya.”
Mwasaaya bifwaani bia wele we lisaaye,
khu buli sikulu sileeyi ne amurongooro.
Ne kakhaba kario ese namubiaala nga,
kumusabibu kumulayi,
khukhwama khu bumiicho bulayi.
Nono mwabeele murie nio mwakaluukhana,
mala mwekela kimisabibu kie mundaa?
Mwakhaba ne mwisiinga ne sisiaangu,
mala murumikhire esabuni engali,
engekheni eye bubi bwenywe busiimanyikhana busa khwise.
Munyala mwaloma muriena muli, “Se mwenyaalutisie tawe,
Lundi se mwasaayile Babaali tawe?”
Lola liiba lienywe mwitooma,
manya niko mukholile,
mwabeele nga engamia emasoti eunyiile eseecha.
Epunda eye mundaa eyanala mu sichiimi,
ne eunyiile eseecha se aliio okikhiingilila tawe,
eseecha ekiyiima ne se eluwa tawe,
biise bie khukhwilukha enyoolekhana khangu,
Isiraeli mukhaluya bikele bienywe tawe,
ne chikokopilo chenywe mukhaulila bulesia tawe
ne muli mukhuyiima bawele babaandi tawe.
Ne kakhali mwaloma muli “Se linyalikhana tawe,
sikila khwasiima bawele be chikholo chichiindi,
ne khulabarumikhira.”
“Nga omwifwi ne aambwa chisoni ne atiliilwe,
enju eya Isiraeli eliiambwa chisoni,
Nibo, babaami babwe, babemeelesi babwe,
basaayi babwe ne bang'oosi babwe.
Baboolela kumurongooro bali, ‘Ewe oli paapa wase,’
ne libaale bali, ‘Ewe maayi wase.’
Sikila ba khupiile kumukoongo,
ne bubweeni bwabwe balangule.
Ne kakhali mu biise bie butinyu bwabwe baloma bali,
‘yiicha okhuonie!’
Ne kakhali bawele benywe nibo mwebechela bali waena?
Baaba ne bamuonia mu biise bie butinyu bwenywe lekha benyokhe.
Baandu ba Yuda, bawele benywe bali bakali,
nga chingoba chenywe!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Siina sikila ne mumbiiya ese mu liloocha lienywe?
Mweesi mwakholeele sileka.
Naukuuma babaana benywe mu khwenaana,
liukuuma se liabakaluukhasia tawe,
enywe mwabeene mweera bang'oosi benywe ne chimbalu,
nga etalang'i eli njala.
Ne enywe! Selukho enywe, ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ese nabeele sichiimi khu Isiraeli,
Namwe sibala sie sisiilima sikali?
Siina sikila nono babaandu base ne baloma bali,
‘khuli balekhuule,
se khulakhukobolakho lundi tawe’?
Omwana omukhaana anyala ebilila bibiindu nibio efwaranga,
namwe omukhaana we siselelo ebilile engubo eye siselelo?
Ne kakhali babaandu base banjibiliile,
chindaalo chingali chikhabalikha tawe.
Mumanyile khuyiima basaale!
Akhaba bakhasi bamayaanu,
mwabeekia chingila chenywe.
Akhaba khu ngubo chenywe,
silikho sifuki sie babaandu batambi,
bakhali ne bumayaanu tawe.
Se wabanyoola ne beeba tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario,
Mwaloma muli, ‘Se khulikho ne bumayaanu tawe,
Ng'ali, Wele se alakhukhalalila tawe.’
Lola, ndamukhalakila,
khulwe khuloma muli, ‘Se mwakholile bubwoni tawe’
Mubukula khuuba liiolu khuyiiyayiiya,
ne mukaluukhasia chingila chenywe,
Bamisiri bakhamuambie chisoni.
Nga Ashuru yamuambia.
Akhaba mu Misiri muliruramo,
ne kamakhono kenywe khu mirwe oli baboe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alobile abo nibo mweyikina,
ne nibo se bakhamuyeete tawe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Omundu aaba ne aloba omukhasi wewe,
mala omukhasi oyo amururakho ache khu mundu okundi,
abe omukhasi wo mundu oyo,
omundu owamuloba oyo anyala amukobosia lundi ku?
Aba sibala esio se sianyaalutiibwe lukali ta ku?
Ewe wakhola bukhobani ne basaale bakali,
onyala wakobola khwise?
Suta chimoni olole khu bikulu khungaaki mala obone!
Waena niio ewe okhakona tawe?
Wekhalenge khu chingila nolindiilila basaale bowo,
nga omwaraabu nalindiilila omusiku mu sichiimi.
Ewe wanyaalutisie sibala ne bukhobani.
Khwako efula se lakwa tawe,
akhaba efula eye siruumbi se yechile tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario ewe oli ne chimoni che bueeyi,
waloba khuaambwa chisoni.
“Ewe se wama khunanga ese oli,
‘Paapa, ewe oli omusaale wase khukhwama mu buele bwase?
Ewe olakhalala mindali na mindali,
Ewe olaba ne lirima busa khukhwola khu siakamo?’
Lola, Ewe Isiraeli walomile orio,
ne kakhali wakholile bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo onyala wakhola.”
Ne ese nebaasia ndi alaba oli amalile khukhola kano koosi ne angobolela. Ne kakhali se akobola tawe. Ne wandaaye Yuda okhasuubilwa tawe abona kano.
Yuda abona ali sikila bukhobani bwoosi bwa Isiraeli okhali ne lisuubila tawe, ese namuoona ne kamaandike ke khulekhana. Kakhaba kario, wandaaye omubeeyi Yuda se aria tawe, ne kakhali akhaba yesi acha mala akhola bukhobani.
Sikila bueeyi bwaba likhuwa liiolu khu niye mala anyaalutia sibala, akhola bukhobani khulwe khusaaya kamabaale ne kimirongooro.
Ne akhaba koosi ne kaba kario, wandaaye wewe omubeeyi Yuda se akobola khwise ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi tawe, ne kakhali ekholakhosia busa.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Isiraeli okhali omusuubilwa tawe, ewe weyekesie wamwene oli se oli ne bumayaanu nga wandaayo omubeeyi Yuda tawe.
Cha wilwache kamakhuwa kano lubeka lwe bunaswa ne oloma oli,
‘Ewe Isiraeli okhali omusuubilwa tawe, kobola.’ Se ndakhukhalalila tawe,
sikila ndi ne siisa, se ndakhalala khulwa mindali tawe.
Ne kakhali fukiilila bumayaanu bwowo,
oli wakhola sileka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo
mala wasalanisia busiime bwowo,
mu bakwa asi owa buli murongooro,
lundi oli se wariire niko khuboolela tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ngobolele enywe babaana mukhali ne busuubilwa tawe,
sikila ese ndi omwami wenywe,
ndabukula mulala khukhwama mu buli lukoba ne babili,
khukhwama buli enju,
mala ndamureera e Sayuni.
Ne ndamuelesia babaayi basiimisia kumwoyo kwase, balamwimeelela ne limanya ne liiulila.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ne mumalile khutasikha mwaba bakali mu sibala mu ndaalo echo, babaandu se balirumburakho lisanduku lie endakaano lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe, se likhechekho mu mebaasio, namwe likhebulilwe mu nganakani namwe liekoombwe namwe likholwe lundi tawe.
Mu siise esio Yerusalemu lukhalaangwe Endebe eye bubwami bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne chikholo choosi chilibuusiamo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne se chikhabe chimiinyi khulwe khuloonda bumayaanu bwabwe lundi tawe.
Mu ndaalo echo be nju eya Yuda bakhaambane nende be nju eya Isiraeli, mala boosi alala bakhame mu sibala sie bunaswa beche mu sibala nisio ese naelesia bakuuka babwe sibe kumukabwa kwabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Isiraeli nenya khubukule ewe nga omwana wase,
mala khuelesie kamaloba kamalayi,
kamaloba kamalayi mu sibala sioosi.
Nenya unaange oli ‘Paapa’
nio olekhe khukhunjanjukha lundi.
Ee, be nju eya Isiraeli,
ng'ali nga omukhasi ookhali omusuubilwa ne alekha omuseecha wewe,
enywe se mwabeele basuubilwa khwise tawe.
“Kumumilo kuuliilikhana abuundu aesuta lukali,
liilila ne liliekoonjelela lie babaana ba Isiraeli,
sikila banyaaluutia limenya liabwe,
bebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.
Ee baana bakhali ne lisuubila tawe, kobola,
ndamuraamo lisuubila.
“Ne enywe muloma muli,
Lola khulikho khwicha,
sikila ewe oli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.
Ng'ali bikulu biakhutiimia,
akhaba ne chingulu,
Ng'ali mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe,
bulimo buonia bwa Isiraeli.
Ne kakhali khukhwama khale sisiindu sie chisoni sie khusaaya wele Baali siakila khwatibia bioosi nibio bakuuka befwe bakhola, kiminyele kiabwe ne kamatuuli, babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana.
Lekha khukone asi mu soni chefwe, ne lekha echangalaalo ekhwichulekho sikila khwakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe bubwoni, efwe ne bakuuka befwe khukhwama khale khukhwola endaalo yino. Ne se khwariakho kamalaka ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe tawe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu ba Isiraeli,
mwaba ne mwenya khukobola, aba ngobolele.
Mwaba ne muli basuubilwa khwise,
rusiao bifwaani nibio nabiila,
mwechuba muli ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali,’
mu bung'ali, mu buluungi ne mu ngila endayi,
aba ndabiita chikholo chikhabi,
mala chilebonia sikila ese.”
“Lima liirome lienywe,
ne mukhamiicha mu mawa tawe.
Baandu ba Yuda enywe nende bamenywa ba Yerusalemu,
Yekwalaasia sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
rusiakho lifuunga lie mu miooyo kieywe,
busa lirima liase lilaburukha nga kumulilo,
mala lichiililile khuburukha.
Mbao oolalisimia tawe,
sikila bumayaanu bwe bikholwa bienywe.”
Loma mu Yuda, mala wilwache mu Yerusalemu ne oloma oli,
“Khupa lulwiika mu sibala sioosi,
kukuula lukali mala mulome muli,
‘Yibuusia alala mala khuche,
mu ngoba chichakarwa ne lisiisi lie buliindi!’
Suta ependera wekeselele e Sayuni,
Yilukha muone, mukhaayilila tawe,
sikila ese ndikho ndeera butinyu khukhwama ebunaswa,
ne libuna likali.
Etalang'i yarurire mu sichakha siayo,
Omwonaki owe chikholo arurire amile abuundu wewe,
achile khukhwonaka sibala sienywe,
chingoba chenywe chilatechulwa chibe kamakubili, kakhalimo babaandu tawe.
Sikila kano yifwara kamakunia,
mwiunamile ne khulila,
sikila lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
se liakhulekhile tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, “Khu ndaalo eyo bunyindaafu bukhawe mu baami ne babemeelesi babwe, basaayi bakhesiindukhe ne bang'oosi bakharangararwe.”
Nio ese naloma ndi, “Aa, Omwami WELE, ng'ali ewe wabeyile babaandu bano lukali, ne Yerusalemu ne oloma oli, ‘Mulaba ne kumuleembe’ ne eyi lifwa liaboolilekho.”
Asiise esio babaandu bano nende be mu Yerusalemu baliboolelwa bali, “Ekhuungu embile khukhwama khu bikulu bibiomu mu siangalaamwe elauucha elole niio babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali. Se eli eye khubisia likhuchi namwe eye khuseesa tawe.
Eli ekhuungu engali khukhilakho yino, yiicha sikila ese luno Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndalomaloma bukhalaki bwase khu nibo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola omusiku alikho echela,
mu ngaaki nga kamafuumbi,
kamakaari kewe ke liie kali nga sisifuusia,
chifarasi chewe chili ne chimbilo khukhila chifuruusi.
Butinyu bwakhunyoolile, khwabunile!
Ee, Yerusalemu, siinga kumwoyo kwowo bumayaanu bururemo,
nio oonisibwe.
Olamenya ne kamebaasio kamamayaanu mwiwe khukhwola liina?
Sikila kumumilo khukhwama Dani,
ne khukaania bumayaanu khukhwama khu
sikulu sia Efuraimu.
Kaania chikholo oli alikho echa
boola mu Yerusalemu.
Balubotookheleesie baama mu sibala sie aleeyi,
bayokelela chingoba cha Yuda.
Nga baliindi be kumukuunda,
bakariire Yerusalemu,
sikila babaandu bamwo bakholeele ese sileka.
Chingila chowo ne bikholwa biowo,
biakhurereere kano,
lino lili libuna lienywe, lili lirafu,
mala limuchuunia kimiooyo.”
Ndi mu bubeeleli, ndi mu bubeeleli,
Ese niunamila mu buchuuni,
Yee, buli abuundu mu mwoyo mwase,
kumwoyo kulikho kuupa lukali,
se nyala nasila tawe,
sikila nauliile ekhoombi ne yipa,
lulwiika lwe liie.
Busiku buloondela busiku,
sibala sioosi sionakakwe,
kamaeema kase konakakwe
ne chisuuka chase mu siise sitiiti.
Ese ndabona ependera khulwe siise siina?
Ne mbulila ekhoombi ne yipa khulwe siise siina?
“Sikila babaandu base bali basilu,
se bamanyile ese tawe,
bali babaana basilu,
se bali ne limanya tawe,
bali bamanyile lukali khukhola bumayaanu,
ne se bamanyile khukhola kamalayi tawe.”
Nalola khu sibala,
siaba sionaakwe mala se silimo engakha tawe,
Ne mu ngaaki se mwabamo buwaanga tawe.
Nalola khu bikulu, biaba bilikho biterema,
ne bikulu bioosi bicha eyi ne neyi nga kumwesuubo.
Nalola mala omundu se abao tawe,
ne chinyuni choosi chaba chapuruukhe.
Nalola, mala nabona sibala sie bibiaamo
siekelile sisiangalaamwe,
ne chingoba choosi chatechuulwe chekholile kamakuunda,
ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ebweeni we lirima liewe lirafu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sibala sioosi silanjukhwa,
ne kakhaba kario, se ndasionakila elala tawe.
Sibala silalila,
ne likulu angaaki lilamaliia
sikila ese nalomile lundi nakhalake,
nabisiisie ne se ndakobola enyuma tawe.”
Khulwe buyoka bwe batimia chifarasi,
no munamae owe buyiingo,
buli babaandu be lukoba belukha,
bengila mu bichakha, baniina khu mabaale,
chingoba choosi chanjukhwe,
ne mbao omundu ochimenyamo tawe.
Ne ewe, Ee owonakwa,
olikho wibaasia siina nga wifwara chimbesemu orio
nio werona ne kamamili ke sahabu,
nio weakhe chimoni
weakhe lukoondo lwa busa.
Basiime bowo bakhulekelesia,
bayiima khukhwira.
Sikila naulila lilila nga lio mukhasi olumwa,
buchuuni nga bwoyo olikho osaala omwana wewe omubele.
Lilila lie babaandu ba Sayuni lie khuochaocha,
akololosia kamakhono kewe Sayuni ne khuloma ali,
“Butinyu bwanyoola!
Balikho becha khukhunjira!”

Enywe baandu ba Yerusalemu,
Tima khu ngila cha Yerusalemu,
ne mwola eyi neyi,
lola mala mubone!
Yiima niio bakusilia bibiindu,
munyala mwanyoola omundu okhola ka ng'ali?
Okhaka khuba omuluungi khu Wele?
Kaaba bali onyoola, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabeela Yerusalemu.
Bakhaba ne bechuba bali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali,”
bechuba busa bubeeyi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe soyimanga bung'ali?
Ewe wabapile, ne se baulila tawe,
ewe wababuniisie, ne baloba likololosia.
Babeele ne sileka sikali.
Baalobile khukhwekanila.
Nio naloma ndi, “Bano bali bataamba lundi bakhali ne limanya tawe,
bali basilu busa,
sikila se bamanyile niko Wele wabwe enya tawe,
niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enya bakhole tawe.
Ndacha khu be bunyali,
mala ndomalome nabo,
sikila bamanyile engila ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lilaka lia Wele wabwe.”
Ne kakhali boosi baloba lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nio balekha khumuria.
Khwako chitalang'i khukhwama mu musiru chilabeera,
bisuuche khukhwama mu siangalaamwe bilababunia.
Chingwe chalindiilile chingoba chabwe,
buli mundu orura mungoba echo alatabulwamo bitonyi,
sikila bubwoni bwabwe buli bukali,
ne buli siise baukhanga khukhwama khu Wele.
Ese nyala namubeela enywe ndiena?
Babaana benywe banjanjukha,
mala bechubile mu masina ke bawele bakhali ba ng'ali tawe.
Nga nabalisia bekura,
bakhola bueeyi, ne khubusiana mu chinju che baeeyi.
Baaba nga chifarasi chiuunwa chichikuure,
Buli mulala ekoomba omukhasi wo wasie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Ese se ndabaukuuma sikila bibiindu bino ta ku?”
Ne se ndeyacha ekholo nga yino ta ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndaruma basiku baremakake,
kimisabibu kie babaandu base,
ne se balarema kioosi tawe,
balachura chisakia chakio,
sikila ching'enechi se chili chichase tawe.
Sikila enju eya Isiraeli nende eya Yuda,
se chabeele ne busuubilwa khwise ne atiiti ene tawe.”
Balomile bubeeyi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lundi balomile bali “Se alakhola siindu tawe,
butinyu se bulakhwichakho tawe,
efwe se khulibona liie namwe enjala tawe.
Bang'oosi se bali siindu tawe, nibo bali embeo busa,
sikila elomo ya Wele se ebalimo tawe.”
Khwako kalaba kario khu nibo babeene!
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bunyali aloma ali,
“Sikila balomaloome likhuwa lino,
lola ndikho khola kamakhuwa kaase kabe nga kumulilo mukhanwa mwowo,
ne babaandu bano balaba nga chiikhu mala kumulilo kulababunia.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Be nju eya Isiraeli ndikho mureerera ekholo eya aleeyi,
eli ekholo eye kamaani,
eli ekholo ekhale,
ekholo niyo enywe mukhamanyile lulomo lwayo tawe,
namwe mwaulila niko baloma tawe.
Basuta buembo bali basikari be kamaani,
beera ne se bali ne siisa tawe.
Balalia bikeswa bienywe ne biakhulia,
balalia babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana,
balalia kamatuuli kenywe ke bibiaayo ne chikhaafu,
balalia chisabibu chenywe ne chinduli,
chingoba chenywe chisire nicho mweyikina,
chilatechulwa mwiie.”
“Ne akhaba mu ndaalo echo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, se alimubunisilia elala tawe
Ne babaandu benywe ne bareeba bali, ‘Siina sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe nakhukholeele efwe bibiindu bino bioosi?’ Mubaboolela muli, ‘Sikila enywe mwandekha ese mala mwasaaya bawele be chikholo chichiindi mu sibala sienywe. Nono mukhakholele baakwa mu sibala siikhali sisienywe tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali:
“Boola likhuwa lino khu baandu ba Yakobo,
liboole mu Yuda ne oloma oli,
Muli ne chimoni ne se mubona tawe,
muli ne kamaru ne se muulila tawe.
Se muterema ebweeni wase tawe?
Nara kumuyekhe mu nyanja kube lulwakha lwayo,
lukhiingilila lundi luukhawao tawe nio kameechi ke nyanja kakhabira tawe,
akhaba bibuli ne bipa se binyala biakutuuma tawe.
Ne kakhali babaandu bano bali banaania lundi bali ne sileka,
bangalukhaanekho mala bandekhile,
se bebaasia mu miooyo kiabwe bali,
‘Lekha khurie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe,
okhuelesianga efula mu siise siayo,
efula eye siruumbi ne fula eye kumunaane,
mala akhuelesia kamachuuma niko akhuroborera ke likesa’ tawe.
Bumayaanu bwenywe bwakhingiliile bino,
bubwoni bwenywe bwamwimaane enywe bilayi.
Sikila babaandu bamayaanu banyolekha mu baandu baase,
bebuliile babaandu oli bareka buboche khutiila chinyuni,
bareka khutiila babaandu.
Nga kutabuku kukhwichuule chinyuni,
chinju chabwe chechula bunuuli,
khwako babeele ne bunyali ne buiinda,
babeele banefu lundi bamiliiu.
Se bamanyile lulwakha lwe bumayaanu tawe,
se bakhalaka bung'ali tawe,
se bayeeta bafuubi tawe,
lundi se bakholela bung'ali babanani tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Ese se ndabaukuuma khulwe bibiindu bino tawe ku?
Ne se nyala neyacha khu kholo nga niyo tawe ku?
Sisiindu simayaanu lukali, lundi sie khuriisia
siekholeekhe mu sibala.
Bang'oosi bang'oola bubeeyi,
ne basaayi bamiia nga bang'oosi ne bababoolela,
babaandu base basiima kabe kario,
ne bakhakhole bariena sisiakamo ne sikhoole?”

Ee, baandu ba Benjamini,
yilukha khukhwama mu Yerusalemu muone,
khupa ekhoombi mu Tekoa,
ne yekesia simanyilo khu Beti-hakikeremu,
sikila butinyu bulikho bwama ebunaswa,
alala ne lilionaka liboofu.
Lukoba lwa Sayuni lulayi,
ne kakhali ndikho nja khulubunia.
Babaami balombakhamo ne banamae babwe,
balombakha kamaeema kabwe kamubotookhelele,
balombakha buli mundu abuundu niio enya.
Bakhalome bali, “Rekekha liie khu Yerusalemu,
yiicha khwibwaakale mwiaangilwe!”
Ne kakhali bakhalome bali,
“Butinyu bwakhunyoola, sikila endaalo elikho ewa,
sikila bibiniini bie ekolooba bilikho bilea!”
“Yiicha khwibwaakale mu silo,
mala khwonakake kamachipi kalwo!”
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wele owe bunyali aloma ali,
remakakila asi kimirongooro kiabwe,
khola lilibwaakala khu Yerusalemu,
luno luli lukoba lukhoyeele luukumibwe,
sikila mu nilwo sisiindu mbamo tawe ne likhali khukhupisiana sibi.
Nga esebele ne eli ne kameechi kamakwalaafu,
akhaba Yerusalemu lukwalaasia bumayaanu bwalwo,
sisiayuumba ne lilionakwa bilulimo,
bulwaale ne kamakoonjo bili ebweeni wase buli lwosi.
Baandu ba Yerusalemu,
lekha bibiindu bino
bibe engaani khwinywe,
ne busa ndamulekha ao,
mala ngaluukhasie lukoba lwenywe lube sisiangalaamwe,
kamaloba kakhamenywamo omundu yesi yesi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, amboolela ali,
“Isiraeli elaba nga kumukuunda kwe kimisabibu,
nikwo babutile kimisabibu bamalamo.
Khwako, khukhwola oonie buli mulala niye onyala siise ne sisiili.”
Ndaboolela naanu nio abakaanie,
nio baulile?
Lola, bekala kamaru,
se banyala baulila tawe,
lola, likhuwa lia Wele khu nibo lili busa lie chingacho,
se balisangaalila tawe.
Khwako nechuule lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
naluiliile khukhwefwiilisia nalio.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Lichukhe khu baana be khu ngila che lukoba,
ne khu libuusiana lie basoleeli basiili baele,
baseecha ne bakhasi sitube balabukulibwa,
akhaba basaakhulu bakofule lukali balatiilwa.
akhaba kimikuunda kiabwe ne bakhasi babwe,
sikila ndikho nja khuukuuma
babaandu be sibala sino.
Sikila khukhwama khu mutiiti khukhwola khu mukhoongo,
buli mundu eyiimila bukhala mungila ekhali ng'ali tawe,
ne khukhwama khu mung'oosi khukhwola mu musaayi,
buli mundu akhola ke bubeeyi.
baloma bali, ‘Khuli ne kumuleembe, kumuleembe’,
ne kumuleembe se kuliio tawe.
Baambwakho chisoni nga bakhola bumayaanu ku?
Tawe, se baambwakho chisoni akhaba atiiti tawe,
se bamanyile chisoni nisio siina tawe.
Khwako balakwa nga babaandi ne bakwa,
siise nisio ndibaelesialiakho siiukuumo, balikhilwa.”
“Yiima khu chingila, mala mulole.
Mala mureebe chingila chikhale,
niio engila endayi eli, mala muchiilekho,
mala munyoole siiuluukho mu miooyo kienywe.”
Ne kakhali baloma bali, “Se khulachiilakho tawe.”
Namuelesia baliindi ne khumuboolela ndi,
“Rekeeresia kumumilo kwe ekhoombi.”
Ne kakhali baloma bali, “Se khulakurekeeresia tawe.”
“Khwako ulila, enywe be chikholo,
lundi mumanye, liicha khwekholekha khu baandu baase.
Ulila, be sibala, lola ndikho ndeera butinyu khu baandu bano,
kamatuunda ke bumayaanu bwabwe,
sikila se bauliile kamakhuwa kase tawe,
lundi balobile akhaba lilaka liase.
Biunya bulayi khukhwama Sheba,
banderera biasi?
Namwe bie khuura mu biakhulia khukhwama
mu sibala sie aleeyi bili na bukhala siina?
Biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosia se bifukiililwa tawe,
ne chimbosio chenywe se chisiimisia ese tawe.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola, ndara ebweeni we babaandu bano,
bibiindu bie khubakwisia nibio balietuyangakho mala bakwe,
ba paapa ne babaana sitube,
niye bapakana no musaale bakhabune.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola, babaandu balikho becha khukhwama mu sibala sie ebunaswa,
ekholo eye kamaani khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi elikho yirekekhera liie.
Babukuule buyiingo bwabwe ne kamafumo,
bali barafu ne se bali ne siisa tawe,
kimimilo kiabwe kili nga liioloola lie nyanja.
Batimia chifarasi,
befwarire nga babaandu baberekekheele liie,
khukhupana ne nanywe, Ee baandu ba Yerusalemu!”
Babaandu ba Yerusalemu baloma bali,
“Khwauliile kamakhuwa kano,
mala kamaani kakhuweele mu khumbo,
khuli ne buchuuni bukali,
nga buchuuni bwo omukhasi olumwa.
Mukhacha mu mikuunda,
namwe mwakeenda khu muyila tawe,
sikila basiku befwe bali ne chimbalu,
ne butinyu buli abuundu buliio.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ee, baandu base yifwara kamakunia,
mala mwikalaangasie mwikokhe.
Lila oli mulila omwana omusoleeli omuteelwa,
lisooma libe lirafu lukali,
sikila omwonaki alikho echa khangu.
Ese nakhukholile ewe Yeremia khuuba ookela babaandu baase,
nio omanye mala okele chingila chabwe.
Boosi bali bareengu bamiinyi,
bakeesia bubeeyi,
bali kumukasa ne sichuuma,
boosi bakhola ke bumayaanu.
Sisiooso siburukha lukali,
kamabaati kayiila mu mulilo,
ne likela lichiililila,
sikila bamayaanu se barusibwao tawe.
Balaangwa bali ‘kamandu ke efwesa,’
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aabalobile.”

Elomo yecha khu Yeremia khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne burume buno:
Cha wime mu silibwa sie nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala wilwachile ebweeneyo elomo yino. Loma oli, “Ulila elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, enywe mweesi baandu ba Yuda mumwingilanga mu bilibwa bino khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali: Kololosia limenya lienywe ne bikholwa, mala ese ndamulekha mumenye abuundu ano.
Mukhasuubila kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi kaloma kali, ‘Luno luli Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ Tawe.
“Sikila mwaba ng'ali ne mukololosia limenya lienywe ne bikholwa, mwaba ng'ali ne mukhalaka mu bung'ali, buli mundu no wasie,
mwaba ne mukhapia omukwa siibi, namwe omufuubi, namwe namulekhwa tawe, namwe mwaba ne mukheera omundu ookhali ne buubi abuundu ano tawe. Lundi mwaba ne mukhasaaya bawele babaandi bakhamuyeeta tawe tawe,
ese ndamulekha mumenye muno, mu sibala nisio naelesia bakuuka benywe khaale khulwa mindali.
“Lola enywe musuubila kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi kakhali ne bukhala tawe.
Enywe muleeba, muleera, mulakhola bueeyi, mulechuba mu bubeeyi, muloselia Baali biiunya bulayi ne khuloonda bawele babaandi nibo mukhamanyile tawe.
Enyuma wako, mulecha mwiime ebweeni wase mu Lukaangu luno, lulangilwa khu lisina liase, mala muboole muli, ‘Efwe se khulikho ne butinyu tawe!’ Ne muchiililila khukhola bumayaanu buno?
Lukaangu luno lulangilwa khu lisina liase, luno lwekelile abuundu niio banuuli bekisa mu moni chenywe? Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ese samwene naboone.’
Nono khemuche abuundu wase, aaba e Shilo niio nakhola lisina liase limenyeo mu khunyoa, mala mubone niko ese nakholao. Nakholao ndio sikila bumayaanu bwe babaandu base Baisiraeli.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ne luno, sikila enywe mwakholile bibiindu bino bioosi, ne nga nabelelela khumuboolela, se mwandekeeresia tawe, ne nga namulaanga, se mwafukiilila tawe.
Khwako ndakhola khunju elaangilwa khu lisina liase, nimwo enywe mwasuubila, alala ne buli abuundu niio ese namuelesia enywe ne bakuuka benywe niko nakhola khu Shilo.
Ne ndamuoona enywe murure mu moni mwase bulayi bwene nga naoona balebe benywe boosi, be lisaaye lia Efuraimu boosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali, “Ne ewe, okhasabila babaandu bano, namwe okhabalilila namwe wanjekoonjelela khulwe khubasabila tawe. Sikila se ndakhuulila tawe.
Se waboone niko balikho bakhola mu chingoba cha Yuda ne khu ngila che mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu ta ku?
Babaana bareenya chiikhu, baraarawabwe babwana kumulilo, bakhasi bapaakha sifu khukholela wele owe siikhasi owe mwikulu chikeki. Ne khuchukhila bawele babaandi biianwa bie khunywa khu khumbambia ese lirima.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, ese niye baambia lirima? Se bereereranga babene likoyana ta ku?
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, nono lola, lirima ne bukhalafu bilachukhwa abuundu ano, khu baandu, khu saang'i, ne khu mirongooro kie mu mikuunda ne kamatuunda ke khu sibala. Lilaburukha ne se liasimisibwa tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Tasa biianwa bienywe bie khukhwosia, khu mbosio chenywe mala mulie chinyama.
Sikila khu ndaalo niyo narusilia bakuuka benywe mu sibala sia Misiri, se nababoolela namwe se nabalaka khuloondekhana ne biianwa bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio tawe.
Ne kakhali nabaelesia lilaka lino, ‘Ria lilaka liase ese ne ndaba Wele wenywe ne enywe mulaba babaandu base, mala mukeendele mu ngila choosi nicho mulaka nio mube ne kumuleembe.’
Ne kakhali se baria namwe barekeeresia ne kamaru kabwe tawe. Bakeenda busa mu lienya liabwe babene ne bulume bwe kimiooyo kiabwe kie sileka kimimayaanu, mala bakobola enyuma ne khucha bacha ebweeni tawe.
Khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo baraara benywe barurira mu sibala sia Misiri khukhwola luno, nachiililila khubarumira bakholi base bang'oosi boosi buli lwosi khukhwola luno.
Kakhaba kario se bandekeeresia tawe, ne kakhali bakhola sileka bakhola kamamayaanu khukhila baraarawabwe.
“Nono Yeremia ewe olababoolela kamakhuwa kano koosi, ne kakhali se balakhurekeeresia tawe. Olabalanga ne kakhali se bakhukosia tawe.
Ne ewe olababoolela oli, ‘Yino eli ekholo eye babaandu bakharia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe, ne se bafukiilila liukuuma tawe. Bung'ali bwabawamo, bwarura mu minwa kiabwe.’
“Beka lichuune lienywe mala mulimwaate,
yimbila kimienya kie kamasika khu ndeleelwa khwe bikulu,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alobile ne khukhwanjukha,
eselukho eyamukhalasia.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Basoleeli ba Yuda bakholile kamamayaanu mu moni chase. Bengisie bisinyisia munju eyalangilwa khu lisina liase khukinyaalutia.
Lundi bombaakhe abuundu aesuta khu sikulu sia Tofeti siili mwitooma lia okhwa Hinomu. Benya khukhwoseliao babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana. Lilienelio ese se nabalaka namwe liechakho mu mebaasio kase tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khwako lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha, se lulilaangwa lundi bali ‘Tofeti’ namwe ‘Litooma lia okhwa Hinomu’ tawe, ne kakhali likhalaangwe ‘Litooma lie Lifwa’ sikila balisiikhamo Tofeti, ne bubwangu se bukhasikalekho abuundu aandi osi osi tawe.
Ne bafu baliba siakhulia sie chinyuni ne chisolo ne se aliio omundu olichirisiarisia chilukhe tawe.
Ne khasisie mu ngoba cha Yuda ne khu ngila cha Yerusalemu kimimilo kie chingano che bubeeyi ne kimimilo kie busangaafu, ne kumumilo kwoyo obeyisie ne kumumilo kwo mwea, sikila sibala silianjukhwa.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Siise esio bikuumba bie babaami ba Yuda, bie babemeelesi, bie basaayi nende bie bang'oosi nende bie bamenywa ba Yerusalemu bikharusibwe mu biliindwa biabwe.
Ne bikhabakalwe mu buwaanga bwe nyanga ne kumwesi, ne bibiindu biili mwikulu angaaki bioosi nibio abeele basiima ne khukholela; nibio baloonda lundi nibio bareebanga ne khusaaya. Se bilibusibwa alala namwe bisikhwe tawe. Bikhabe busa nga kamasiisie khu sibala.
Babaandu boosi barama be nju emayaanu yino bakhekoombe lifwa khukhila bulamu, abuundu oosi niio belukhila bacha, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Owe banamae nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Okhababoolele oli ese nalomile kano:
Babaandu ne bakwile, se benyokhanga lundi tawe ku?
Omundu ne auukhe acha se akobolanga tawe ku?
Siina sikila nono babaandu ba Yerusalemu ne barura banjaukhakho
ne bakobola enyuma mu lisuubila?
Basuubila bubeeyi mala baloba khukhungobolela.
Nauliile ne khurekeeresia ne se balomaloome bung'ali tawe
ne se aliio omundu owebiiya bubwoni bwewe,
na khuloma ali, ‘Kholile siina sino, tawe?’
Buli mundu aloonda engila yewe bulayi bwene
nga efarasi etima lukali ne echa mwiie.
Akhaba likhuyi mungaaki limanyile siise sialio,
liuusi, liyoyo ne ng'ooli biamanya siise sie khuuya.
Ne kakhali babaandu base se bamanyile lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Enywe munyala mwelanga muriena muli, ‘Efwe khuli bakesi,’
ne khuli ne lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Bona, baandiki baandike ke bubeeyi.
Bakesi bakhaambwe chisoni,
bakharangararwe mala babukulwe,
lola, balobile elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
bali na bukesi siina?
ne kimikuunda kiabwe ndaelesia ba babaula,
sikila khukhwamila khu mutiiti khukhwola khu mukhoongo,
buli mulala ayiima bukhala bukhali bwa ng'ali tawe,
khukhwamila khu mung'oosi khukhwola khu musaayi,
buli mulala arumikhira bubeeyi.
Baloma bali, ‘Khuli ne kumuleembe’,
ne kakhali kumuleembe mbao.
Babaandu base baambwakho chisoni nga bakhola bumayaanu ku?
Tawe, se baambwakho chisoni ne atiiti ene tawe,
ne se bamanya khukhwisonia tawe.
Khwako bakhakwe nga babaandi ne bakwa,
Nga khabae siiukuumo bakhakhilwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Nenya khubuusia babaandu base
nga omulimi ne busia likesa,
ne kakhali bali kimisabibu kikhalikho siindu tawe,
lundi nga kimituli kiikhalikho chinduli tawe, akhaba kamasaafu komile,
khwako nafukiiliile babaandu be nje,
khuliinda kumukuunda okwo.”
Babaandu ba Wele bareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne khwikhala busa ano?
Khwibuusie alala mala khwingile mu ngoba chisire,
mala khufwiile mu bwenomwo.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akhulaamile khufwe,
lundi akhuelesie efwe kameechi kalimo bufwisi,
sikila khwakhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khwalindiilila kumuleembe mala khubonakho bulayi tawe,
siise sie buonia, ne kakhali khwabona busiku.
Khuechela khwe chifarasi khwauliliikhe mu Dani,
sibala sioosi silikho siterema sikila buyoka bwe chifarasi che liie.
Bechile bonakaake sibala ne bilimo bioosi, lukoba ne bamenyilemo boosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola ndikho nduma
chindemu mwinywe nafwo nicho mukhasangaalila tawe,
mala chilamuluma enywe.”
“Bubeeleli bwase butuuma liioleelesia,
kumwoyo kwase kulikho kulwaala.
Rekeeresia bililo biili buli abuundu,
mbulila babaandu base ne balila bali,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se asiili Sayuni tawe ku?
Omwami owa Sayuni achile waena?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Omwami wabwe abakobosia ali,
siina sikila ne mwambambia lirima khulwe khusaaya bifwaani,
ne khu khwinaamila bawele babaandi?’
Babaandu balila bali,
‘Likesa liaweele, siimiyu siakaame,
ne efwe se khwaonile tawe.’
Kumwoyo kwase kwabeleele,
sikila babaandu base beriirwe,
ndikho ndila, narangaraarwe.
Kamalesi se kali mu Kileati tawe ku?
Se khuli ne basilikhi tawe ku?
Siina sikila nono babaandu base ne bakhaona tawe?

Andi kumurwe kwase kuli esebele,
ne chimoni chibe esebele eye kamasika,
andi ndilanga kumuusi ne siilo,
khulwe khufwa khwe babaandu base!
Andi ndikho ne abuundu niio menya mu siangalaamwe,
aleeyi ne babaandu base!
Sikila boosi se bali basuubilwa tawe,
bali busa sipupu sie bachaami.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Buli lwosi berekekha khuloma bubeeyi,
bubacha bwechuule mu sibala,
Babaandu base bakhola bumayaanu ne batasa khu buundi.
Ne se baamanya ese nga Wele wabwe tawe.
“Buli mundu akhasuubila owasie tawe,
ne akheyikina mu wandaaye yesi yesi tawe,
sikila buli mundu ali omubeeyi nga Yakobo,
ne buli musaale ali omuchongani.
Buli mundu abea owasie,
ne se aliio oloma bung'ali tawe,
beyikia chinimi chabwe khuloma bubeeyi,
bakhola bumayaanu ne baluilila khukhwekanila.
Batasa buwanangali khu buundi,
lundi batasa bubeeyi khu buundi,
baloba khu khumanya ese.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Sikila kano,
ndabakwalaasia ne khubakhaka,
sikila se liliio liliindi nilio nyala nakholela,
babaandu base tawe.”
Chinimi chabwe chili nga luembo,
balomaloma bubeeyi,
buli mundu alomaloma ne kumunwa kwewe khu wasie mu muleembe,
ne kakhali mu mwoyo amwibaasilia kamabi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ese se ndabaelesia siiukuumo khulwe bibiindu bino tawe ku?”
Ne se ndeyacha khu kholo nga yino eri tawe ku?
Lilila ne khukhwesasaara khulwe bikulu,
ne khukhwiunamila khulwe kamayilwe ke mu sichiimi
sikila bianjukhwe se aliio ochayo tawe,
khumoloola khwe chikhaafu se khuuliilikhanilayo tawe,
chinyuni ne chisaang'i che mundaa cheluukhe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ese ndakhola Yerusalemu lube kamakuunda,
abuundu niio chingipwe chimenya,
ne ndakhola chingoba cha Yuda chibe sichiimi,
abuundu niio omundu akhamenya tawe.”
Mundu siina oli omukesi lukali onyala aulila lino? Naanu niye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abooleele nio aboolele babaandi? Siina sikila kamaloba ne konakaakwe mala kanjukhwe nga sichiimi, nio mbao obiramo tawe?
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali sikila balobile lilaka liase nilio nabaelesia ne se bandiire namwe baloondile niko nababoolela tawe.
Ne kakhali babeele bamiinyi ne khuloonda lilienya liabwe ne khusaaya bifwaani bia Baali nga bakuuka babwe ne babeyikia khukhola.
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owa Isiraeli, aloma ali lola ndaliisia babaandu bano nabululu ne khubaelesia kameechi ke bufwisi banywe.
Ndabasalanisia mu chikholo nicho nibo namwe baraarawabwe bakhamanya tawe. Ne ndibaloondiakho banamae babeere khukhwola nga ne mbabunia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali:
“Yibaasia mala mulange bakhasi balila beche,
rumania mulange bakhasi babemba chinyimbo che kamasika beche.
Lekha bakhole khangu bakukuule sikila efwe,
nio kamasika kalengalenge mu moni chefwe,
mala bisike biefwe bichukhe kamasika nga kameechi.”
Biililo biauliilikhanile Sayuni:
“Efwe khwabunile!
Khwanyoolile chisoni lukali,
sikila khwalekha sibala,
sikila batechula bumenyo bwefwe.”
Ee, bakhasinywe, ulila elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne lekha kamaru kenywe kaulile elomo yewe,
yekisia bakhaana benywe khukhwiunamila,
ne buli mulala khwinywe ekisie owasie,
kimienya kie kamasika.
Sikila lifwa liengiile khubirira mu matirisia kefwe,
mala liengiile mu chinju chefwe,
lierire babaana baweele khukhwama khu ngila che chingoba,
ne liamalile babaana basoleeli khu soko.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lomaloma,
kimibili kie bafu kilakwa nga kamasisie mu mukuunda,
nga kumukhebo kulekhwa enyuma we likesa,
ne se aliio olababuusia tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Bakesi bakhebonia sikila bukesi bwabwe tawe.
Ne owe kamaani akhebonia sikila kamaani kewe tawe.
Ne omuiinda akhebonia sikila buiinda bwewe tawe.
ali ambulila ne khukhumanya ese.
Lundi amanye ali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe busiime bukali bwa buli lwoosi,
owa ng'ali lundi omuluungi mu sibala.
