Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali ‘sikila asiimisibwa ne bibiindu bino.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho khaukuumilemo babaandu babakhebwa busa kimibili kiabwe kiong'ene.
Ndaukuuma babaandu ba Misiri, Yuda, Edomu, Baamoni, Moabu, ne naabo boosi bamenyile mu siangalaamwe babekanga lichuune liabwe. Babaandu bano boosi bali babaandu ne kakhali se batiila kumwiima kwe busaani tawe. Se aliio owatiila likhuwa liase tawe.”

Ee, baandu ba Isiraeli, ulila elomo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Mukhaloonda engila eye chikholo,
namwe mwanaanisibwa khulwe bimanyisio bie mungaaki tawe.
Sikila chikholo chinaanisibwa sikila nibio.
Sikila kimiima kie babaandu kili kie bubeeyi,
kumurongooro kwe mu musiru kuremwa,
mala kubeechwa ne eaywa no mubeechi.
Babaandu bakurona ne fwesa ne sahabu,
bakukhoma kimisumari ne nyundo,
kuluma ne se kusabukhamo tawe.
Bifwaani biabwe bili nga bifwaani biriikhirisia chinyuni,
ne se binyala bialomaloma tawe,
bisutwa busa sikila se binyala biakeenda tawe.
Mukhabiria tawe,
sikila se binyala biakhola kamamayaanu,
namwe biakhola kamalayi tawe.”
Se aliio nga ewe, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
ewe oli omukali ne lisina liowo lili lie bunyali.
Sikila ewe wenyekha liria
mu bakesi boosi Be Chikholo,
ne mu bwami bwabwe bwoosi,
se aliio oli nga ewe tawe.
Boosi bali basilu lundi bang'ang'afu,
banyala beyika sina khukhwama khu sifwaani sie kumusaala.
Efwesa eng'ooneebwe yareerwa khukhwama Tarishishi,
ne sahabu khukhwama Ufasi,
efwesa ne sahabu eli kimilimo kio mubeechi ne kamakhono ko mubasi.
Chingubo chabio chimbuusi ne chikupilia,
choosi chili kimilimo kio mundu owamanya kimilimo kiewe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele owa ng'ali
ali Wele omenyile mindali lundi Omwami owa mindali
Naambwa lirima sibala siterema
ne chikholo se chinyala chekhaliilikhila bukhalafu bwewe tawe.
Enywe mukhababoolele muli, “Bawele bakhaabuumba likulu ne liloba tawe, bakhonakwe ne se baliba abuundu osi osi khwiloba tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaang'ana liloba ne bunyali bwewe
abaang'ana sibala ne bukesi bwewe
ne khulwe limanya liewe abalaya likulu.
Ne alomaloma ne kumumilo kwewe kameechi ke mungaaki kaoloola
ne akhola namufweli afweela chimbeka choosi khwiloba.
Akholanga efula eba ne chimbeni
mala areera ekhuungu khukhwama munju che libiikhilo liewe.
Buli mundu ali omusilu, lundi se ali ne limanya tawe,
buli omubasi owe sahabu aambilwe chisoni khulwe bifwaani biewe,
sikila bifwaani biewe bili bie bubeeyi
ne bulamu se bubilimo tawe.
Bifwaani se bilimo bukhala tawe,
kimilimo kie khuombelesia busa
siise sie siiukuumo siabio bikhonakakwe.
Wele owa Yakobo se ali nga nibio tawe,
niye owabuumba buli siindu,
aroboore Isiraeli khuba babaandu bewe,
Lisina liewe bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buusia bibiindu bienywe,
Ee enywe muli mu siboe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola, ndarusia bamenywa be mu sibala siise sino
ne ndabareerera butinyu nibwo babona.”
Khuli ne silaamo sikila butinyu bwefwe
kamakoonjo kefwe se kalaona tawe,
Ne khwaloma khuli ng'ali buno buli butinyu nibwo khulekhaliilikha.
Kamaeema kefwe konakiibwe,
ne kimikoye kikiakaboa kiakituulwe
Babaana befwe boosi bachile se baliio tawe.
Se aliio oramire okhwombakhila kamaeema ne khurakho chipasia chikhiinga tawe.
Sikila babaayi bali basilu,
ne se bamanyile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
khwako se bali na siindu tawe
ne kamatuuli kabwe koosi kasalaniile.
Ulila burume bulikho bwicha
luyoka lwe likoyaana khukhwama ebunaswa
khukhola chingoba cha Yuda chibe sichiimi
abuundu we chingipwe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, namanya ndi chingila cho mundu se chili chichewe omwene tawe,
ne se aliio omundu omwene oli ne bunyali khu bulamu bwewe tawe.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ngololosie mu bung'ali
okhangololosia mwirima tawe, busa okhola orio wambunia.
Elesia kumunaanio chikholo chikhakhusaaya ewe tawe
ne khu baandu bakhakhumanyile tawe
sikila beera babaandu ba Yakobo
babeera ne khubabunia
mala bonakaake bumenyo bwabwe.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese Yeremia ali,
“Ulila kamakhuwa ke ndakaano yino, mala oboolele babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Olababoolela oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, alaamwe omundu okharia kamakhuwa ke ndakaano yino tawe.
Eli endakaano niyo nakhola ne bakuuka benywe nga ne nabarusia mu sibala sia Misiri, sibala sisiaba sibile nga sisiooso sie bichuuma khu nibo. Nababoolela ndi mbulile mala mukhole nga muboolela. Nababoolela ndi mulaba babaandu base ne ese ndaba Wele wenywe.
Nio nolisie lisuubisia nilio nasuubisia bakuuka babwe ndi, ndibaelesia sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetikhanga nisio bali nasio luno.” Nio naloma ndi, “Bulayi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela lundi ali, “Yilwacha kamakhuwa kano koosi mungoba cha Yuda ne khu ngila che lukoba lwa Yerusalemu noloma oli: Ulila kamakhuwa ke ndakaano yino mala mukhole nga kaloma.
Sikila nakaania bakuuka benywe ne mbandalasia nga nabarusia mu sibala sia Misiri. Nachililiile khubakaania khukhwola endaalo yino ne mboola ndi, murie niko muboolela.
Ne kakhaba kario se baria, namwe barekeeresia tawe. Buli mundu achiililila mu sileka sie bumayaanu bwewe. Nabalakiilisia batiile lilaka liase ne kakhali baloba. Khwako nabarakho siiukuumo sisiaandikwa mu lilaka lino.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi amboolela ali, “Sileka sili mu baandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu.
Bakoboole mu bwoni bwe bakuuka babwe ba baloba khukhumbulila mala baloondile ne khukholela ba wele babaandi. Baisiraeli ne Bayaudi bafunile endakaano niio nakhola ne bakuuka babwe.”
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndikho mbareerera butinyu nibwo bakhanyala bebacha tawe. Bakhaandilila se ndabarekeeresia tawe.
Nio chingoba cha Yuda ne babaandu ba Yerusalemu balacha balilile bawele nibo boselianga biiunya bulayi, ne kakhali bawele abo se bakhabaonie ne bali mu butinyu tawe.
Sikila bawele benywe Yuda babeele bakali nga chingoba chenywe, ne chialutare chenywe chili chingali mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu. Chialutare che chisoni echo mwarao khukhwoseliakho biiunya bulayi khu wele Baali.
Khwako okhasabilakho babaandu bano namwe walila namwe wasaba mu bweyaangu bwabwe tawe. Sikila sendabarekeeresia ne basaba ne bali mu butinyu bwabwe tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Babaandu nibo nasiima balikho bakhola bumayaanu. Bali na ng'ali siina khuuba munju mwase? Bebaasia bali banyoola bekayila butinyu khulwe khulaka ne khurusia chimbosio? Bibienebio bilabareerera busangaafu ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaanga enywe ali, ‘Kumuseituni kumubisi kwe kamatuunda kamakali kamalayi.’ Ne kakhali luno ndarakho kumulilo kuutirira oli efula mala malekho chisakia chakwo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalake khumureerera butinyu khwinywe sikila bumayaanu nibwo enju eya Yuda ne Yerusalemu bakholile. Bambaambiisie lirima khulwe khukhwoselia Baali biiunya bulayi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aamanyisia ese mala namanya
nio anjokesia ese bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
Ne kakhali naba nga limeeme lioolu nilio bayila abukhonyelo
Se namanya ndi barekekhanga kamamayaanu khwise tawe,
baloma bali, “Lekha khwonakake kumurongooro ne kamatuunda kakwo,
lekha khumurusie mu sibala sie balamu,
lekha khumwire alekhe khukhebulilwakho tawe.”
Ne kakhali, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhalakanga mu bung'ali,
opiimanga kimiooyo ne kamebaasio,
lekha ese mbone liliiyacha liowo khu nibo,
sikila ese nareere kakaase mwiwe.
Babaandu ba Anatoti, benya ese fwe, bamboolela bali balanjira naaba ne njiililila khukhwilwacha lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndabaelesia siiukuumo. Babaana babwe baele bakhererwe mwiie ne babaana babwe bakhafwe enjala.
Ne se aliio akhaba namulala okharame tawe. Sikila ndireera butinyu khu baandu ba Anatoti mu mwiiko kwe siiukuumo siabwe.”

Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe oli Omuluungi,
ne khwiloochela
ne kakhaba kario, ndakhweloochela butinyu bwase.
Siina sikila bamayaanu ne bali bulayi?
Siina sikila babaandu bachaama, ne bali bulayi?
Ewe obabiaala nga kumurongooro mala bekhisia chisia,
bachoa mala barakho kamatuunda,
baloma kamalayi khwiwe ne kiminwa kiabwe,
ne mu miooyo kiabwe bali aleeyi nawe.
Ne kakhali, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi umanyile ese,
ewe umbonanga mala ukhakanga chinganakani chase
barusie enje nga kamakheese ke khukhonywa
mala obaule obare alubeka khulwe ndaalo eye liikhonya.
Sibala silooma khulwe siise siina?
Ne bunyaasi bulooma khulwe siise siina?
Sikila bumayaanu bwe bamenywa bamwo
chisaang'i ne chinyuni chilafwa
sikila babaandu baloma bali, “Wele se alabona
khumaliilikha khwefwe tawe.”
“Aaba notimile ne babaandu mala bakhutimia waluwa,
olatima oriena ne chifarasi?
Ne aaba ne okwa khu sibala silayi sie kumuleembe,
olakhola oriena mu bichakha bia Yoritani.
Sikila bakhaba bawandaayo be nju eya raraao, bosi bakhuchonganiile,
balikho bakhuyiima bakhaba ne baloma kamalayi khwiwe
okhabasuubila tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Nanjuukhe Isiraeli,
nalobile ekholo yase endobore.
Naanile babaandu nibo nasiima
khu basiku babwe.
Babaandu base barobore bangaluukhanekho,
balikho bambulukhumila nga etalang'i eye mu musiru khwako nababiile.
Babaandu base barobore bali nga enyuni
eyibwakaalwe ne kisilili chimbeka choosi.
Laanga chisaang'i chiiche mu naikara.
Babaayi bakali bonaka kumukuunda kwase kwe kimisabibu,
baswalakilila kumukuunda kwase,
bakhola kumukuunda kwase kumulayi khuuba sichiimi sisianjukhwa.
Bakukhola kwekela sichiimi sisianjukhwa,
sili sichiimi ebweeni wase.
Sibala sioosi sili sichiimi,
mbao osikanakanakho tawe.
Khu buli siangalaamwe mu sikulu,
babaandu bechile khuyaaya
Narumire liie khu sibala sioosi
se aliio omundu olamenya ne kumuleembe tawe.
Babiaala engaanu mala bakesa kamawa
bakholile kia busa ne se banyoola bukhala tawe
sikila lirima liase likali
kimikuunda kiabwe kionekhe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali ndi nende nilio ndoma khu baandu bamenyile embi ne Isiraeli baboonake sibala nisio naelesia babaandu base ba Isiraeli, “Kharusie babaandu bamayaanu bano nga okhula kumurongooro mala mbonie Yuda.
Ne enyuma we khubarusiao khabakholele siisa lundi mala khabakobosie lundi buli mundu khu mukabwa kwewe ne buli mundu mu maloba kewe.
Ne kakhabe kari baaba ne bakhamenieelesie beyike chingila che babaandu base, bechubila mu lisina liase bali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali,’ bulayi bwene nga boosi ne beyikia babaandu base khukhwechuba mu lisina lia Baali, ne baliba babaandu base.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali ekholo yosi yosi se eulila tawe, aba ndakibunia mala ngionake.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Yeremia khoche okule esirwari eya katani mala ofware ne okhakira mu meechi tawe.”
Nio ese nakula esirwari khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala nefwara.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela lukhola khabili ali,
“Bukula esirwari chana niyo okulile mala winyokhe oche khu Luuchi lwa Efurati mala okikise mu lubangaachi.”
Nio nacha nakikisa khu luuchi lwa Efurati nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne andaka.
Enyuma we chindaalo chingali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Yinyokha oche khu luuchi lwa Efurati mala obukule esirwari niyo nakhulaka khukisayo.”
Nio nacha e luuchi lwa Efurati, nayaba nabukula esirwari abuundu niio naba ne nakikisa. Ne esirwari eyo yaba yoneekhe se yaba ne bukhala tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Nja khwonakaka lilielola lia Yuda ne lilielola likali lia Yerusalemu mu ngila yino.
Babaandu bamayaanu bano, baloba khuulila chilomo chase. Bali ne sileka baloonda kimiooyo kiabwe ne khuloonda bawele babaandi khubakholela ne khubasaaya. Bakhabe nga esirwari yino, ekhali ne bukhala tawe.
Bulayi bwene nga esirwari yiambanga khu mundu, nio seesi nakhola enju eya Isiraeli yoosi ne nju eya Yuda yoosi khukhwiamba khwise, nio babe babaandu base, ne kakhali se barekeeresia tawe.”
Okhababoolele oli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Buli mwendo kukhechule endali.’ ” Ne kakhali bakhakhuboolele ewe bali, “Eku, wibaasia oli efwe se khumanyile khuli buli mwendo kukhechusibwe endali tawe?”
Nio ewe obaboolele oli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ese ndameesia babaandu bamenyile mu sibala sino boosi, babaami be lisaaye lia Daudi, basaayi, bang'oosi ne babaandu bamenyile mu Yerusalemu boosi.
Ne ndabakhola babiilane, buli mundu no wasie, raraawe ne babaana babwe alala. Se ndabalekha namwe mbabeele namwe mbakholeele siisa nio ndekhe khubeera tawe.’ ”
Ulila mala murekeeresie, ne mukhelola tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.
Elesia luyali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe
ne akhareera sisiilima tawe,
ne mukhetuya khu sikulu tawe
ne musiyiima buwaanga,
alakaluukhana bube bubeeleli
ne sisiilima sikali.
Ne mukhaulila tawe,
ndalilila mu bwikisi sikila lilielola lienywe,
ndalila burafu mala kamasika keekhe khukhwama mu moni mwase
sikila lituuli lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liabukuliibwe khuyilwa mu mbaambe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Boolela omwami ne maayi wo mwami oli,
Bukula chindebe che lilieboombia
Sikila chikuutwa chenywe chafuliikhe charurire khu mirwe.”
Chingoba che ebunafubo wa Yuda chekaliilwe,
se aliio ochikula tawe.
Babaandu ba Yuda boosi bayiliilwe mu mbaambe
boosi bayiliilwe mu mbaambe.
“Suta chimoni chenywe mala mubone abo babecha khukhwama ebunaswa.
Kamakheese niko mwaebwa kali waena?
Kamakheese kenywe ke lukoondo lulayi?
Mulaloma muli siina ne bamwamiia enywe?
Babaandu nibo mwabeene mweyikia khuba basaale benywe?
Buchuuni se bulamubeela bukali nga bwo mukhasi olumwa?
Ne, ne muloma mu miooyo kienywe muli,
siina sikila bibiindu bino ne bikhwichilekho.
Kali kario sikila bukali bwe bumayaanu bwenywe
nilio likila chingubo chenywe ne chitabukha
lundi likila ne mupisibwa siibi.
Omundu omumali anyala akaluukhasia sikhoba siewe?
Namwe engwe enyala yerusiakho kamapala kayo?
Kaba ne kanyalikhana aba mwesi munyala mwakhola murio
enywe mumwasiima khukhola bumayaanu.
Ndamusalanisia enywe nga likhuuchi
litamuusibwa ne ekhuungu khukhwama mu siangalaamwe.
Sino nisio sitonyi sienywe
sikelo nisio nabisia khumuelesia,
sikila mwanjibilila ese mala mwasuubila bubeeyi
Ese samwene ndamufuula chingubo chenywe
mala muambie chisoni.
Naboone bisinyisia bienywe,
bueeyi bwenywe ne liliekoomba lie bukhobani bwenywe,
mu bikulu ne mungoongo
muli ne silaamo enywe baandu ba Yerusalemu!
Mulabukula siise siina nio mube bakwalaafu.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia khuloondekhana ne siimiyu sikali ali,
“Sibala sia Yuda silikho silila,
ne chingoba chasio chilikho chikwa
babaandu bamwo balikho basooma
ne lilila lia Yerusalemu liniina Liiuliilikha.
Bayiinda baruma bakholi babwe kameechi,
bacha kameechi mu chisebele,
ne se banyoolamo kameechi tawe
bakobolayo ne chisoongo busa,
baambiilwe chisoni mala bafwiile kimiooyo
bebiimba mu moni.
Sikila efula seliio tawe,
asi omile,
balimi balwala kimiooyo
bebiimba mu moni.
Akhaba kicheu mu ndaa anjukha eng'ana yayo,
sikila bunyaasi se buliio tawe.
Chipunda mulia chiima khu bikulu khu ngaaki,
chiyiima buelelo nga chingipwe,
se chibona bulayi tawe
sikila se chili ne kamayilwe tawe.
“Akhaba bumayaanu bwefwe ne buli bukali ebweeni wowo,
khuyeete, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila lisina liowo,
sikila khukhwila enyuma mu lisuubila liefwe khuli khukali,
khwakhukholeele ewe bubwoni.
Ewe weng'ene oli lilieyikina lia Isiraeli
Ewe niwe okhuonianga efwe siise sie butinyu,
siina sikila ewe obe nga omukeni mu sibala siefwe,
nga oli khu lukeendo okona abuundu siilo silala ne busia acha?
Siina sikila obe nga omundu owakoyaana,
nga omundu we kamaani mala okhanyala aonia tawe?
Ne kakhaba kario ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli akari wefwe,
ne efwe khuli babaandu bowo,
okhakhulekha tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khuloondekhana ne babaandu bano ali,
“Basiimile khuyiiyayiiya busa ne bacha aleeyi khukhwama khwise
se benya khukhwiikhala alala tawe,
khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abafukiilila tawe,
luno alakhebulila bumayaanu bwabwe,
mala abaukuume khulwe bubwoni bwabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Okhasaba ese njeete babaandu bano tawe.
Bakhaba ne basila khulia, ese se ndaulila lilila liabwe tawe, ne bakhaba ne baana biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie biakhulia, se ndabafukiilila tawe. Ne kakhali ndababunia mwiie ne njala ne bulwaale.”
Nio naloma ndi, “Aa, Omwami WELE! Lola bang'oosi bababoolela bali, se bakhabone liie namwe enjala tawe, ne kakhali babasuubisia kumuleembe abuundu ano.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Bang'oosi balikho bang'oola bubeeyi mu lisina liase. Ese se nabaruma namwe se nabalaka namwe se nalomaloma khu nibo tawe. Balikho bang'oola khwinywe kamalola ke bubeeyi, bulakusi bukhali ne bukhala tawe, ne bubeeyi bwe kamebaasio kabwe babeene.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma, khu bang'oosi bang'oola mu lisina liewe akhaba ne akhabaruma tawe, bang'oosi bang'oola bali liie namwe enjala se biliicha khu sibala tawe, bang'oosi abo balibunisibwa ne liie ne enjala.
Ne babaandu nibo bang'oosi abo bang'oolanga balimwaatwa khu ngila che mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, sikila enjala ne liie ne mbao olibasiikha nibo, namwe bakhasi babwe ne babaana babwe be sisoleeli nende be siikhana tawe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabaruungie bubwoni bwabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaka Yeremia ali,
“Baboolele likhuwa lino,
‘Lekha ndile siilo ne kumuusi
ne kamasika kakheema khukhwiikha tawe
sikila babaandu base babeene baumiie lukali,
mala banyoolile sikhupo sikali.
Ne nja mu ndaa,
mbona baberiirwa mwiie!
Ne nga nja mu lukoba,
mbona, bafwa enjala!
Bang'oosi ne basaayi sitube bayiiyayiiya mu sibala
ne se basimanyile nisio bakhola tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe walobela elala Yuda?
Ewe wabiila babaandu ba Sayuni?
Siina sikila ne okhuumisie lukali,
nio busilikhi se buliio tawe?
Khwayiima kumuleembe, ne kakhali bulayi se bwanyoolekha tawe
khwayiima busilikhi ne kakhali, khwanyoola butinyu.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khwamanyile bumayaanu bwefwe,
ne bumayaanu bwe bakuuka befwe,
sikila khwakhukholeele ewe bubwoni.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhakhumwaata tawe khulwe lisina liowo tawe,
okhaambia chisoni endebe yowo eye bubwami eye luyali tawe,
khebulila, ne okhafuna endakaano yefwe ne nawe tawe.
Alikhoo mu bawele be bubeeyi be chikholo onyala areera efula ku?
Namwe likulu linyala liaana efula liliene?
Se oli ewe, Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe?
Efwe khura lilieyikina liefwe mwiwe
sikila ewe okhola buli siindu.

Ne bakhureeba bali, ‘Khuche waena?’ Baboolele oli: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
‘Abo babenyekhana khufwa bulwaale, balafwa bulwaale,
ne abo babenyekha khufwila mwiie, balafwila mwiie,
abo babenyekha khufwa enjala, balafwa enjala,
ne abo babenyekha mu mbaambe, balacha mu mbaambe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ese nabisiisie bibiindu biibi bine biicha khubekholekhakho; balafwila mwiie, chimbwa chilakhuruura kimibili kiabwe chinyuni chikilie ne chisaang'i che mundaa chilalia kimibili kiiramire.
Ndakhola babaandu boosi mu sibala babesiindukhile sikila niko Manase okhwa Hesekia, omwami owa Yuda akhola mu Yerusalemu ne aba omwami.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Naanu olamukholela enywe siisa, ee baandu ba Yerusalemu,
namwe naanu olamulila?
Naanu olekhebukha khureeba ali muriena?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Mwandekhile ese,
muchiililila khukobola enyuma,
khwako nakololoosie kumukhono kwase khwinywe mala namubuniisie,
naluiliile khukhwekhaliilikha.
Nabaseesile ne euma eye khuseleecha
mu bilibwa bie chingoba che sibala siabwe
Nabakholile bafwiliilwe, nabuniisie babaandu base,
sikila se balekha bumayaanu bwabwe tawe.
Natasile bukali bwe banamulekhwa babwe
bakhila kumuyekhe kwe mu nyanja,
narereere maawe be basoleeli
omwiiri mwiangilwe
nabarereere bubeeleli ne butinyu
biabechilekho khangu.
Maayi owasaala babaana saba awele kamaani, aochaocha,
ayiima buelelo
kumuusi kwewe kwekele sisiilima,
aambwa chisoni ne khuchangalaala,
ne babaandi baramire boosi ndakhola bafwiile mwiie ebweeni we basiku babwe.”
Se ndi ne kumuleembe tawe! Siina maayi ne aasaala? Ndikho ndomana ne khuyingana na buli mundu mu sibala se nekopia namwe nekopa chirupia tawe, ne kakhali buli mundu andaama.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha bilaamo biabwe bindiile kaaba bali se nakhukholeele ewe bulayi tawe, kaaba bali se nakhwikoonjeleele khu butinyu ne siibi sie basiku base siise sie butinyu tawe.
Omundu anyala afuna sichuuma khukhwama ebunaswa, namwe kumukasa?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Ese ndareera basiku basute kimiaandu ne buiinda bwe babaandu base, elaba engila eye khubaukuuma khulwe bubwoni nibwo bakhola mu sibala sioosi.
Ndamukhola mube bakholi be basiku benywe mu sibala nisio mukhamanyile tawe, sikila lirima liase lilinga kumulilo, ne kulaburukha khulwa mindali na mindali.”
Nio Yeremia aboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali,
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe umanyile
khebulile ese mala unjeete,
mala ruungisia abo babakhupia siibi.
Mu khwekhaliilikha khwowo okhanjira tawe.
Manya oli ndikho khupwa siibi sikila ewe.
Ewe wamboolela kamakhuwa kowo
mala naulila buli likhuwa.
Lundi kasiimisia kumwoyo kwase,
sikila ese ndi owowo,
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe bunyali bwoosi.
Ese se nekhala ne babaandu babesangaasia tawe
namwe ne senekhoya tawe,
nekhala seng'ene, sikila ewe wambukuuma
ewe wanjichusia bubeeleli.
Siina sikila buchuuni bwase ne buchiililila khutasa?
Siina sikila likoonjo liase ne likhaona tawe,
Siina sikila ne liloba khuona?
Siina sikila ne umbea nga khakheechi,
nga khakheechi khateenyanga siise siosi siosi?”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Waaba ne okobola ndakhukobosia niio waba,
mala wiime ebweeni wase
noloma ke bukhala kakhali ka busa tawe,
olaba omung'oosi wase.
Baleecha niio ewe oli, ne ewe solacha niio bali tawe.
Ne ese ndakhukhola ewe obe nga lisiisi lisire lie kumukasa,
balakhupania ne se balakhukhila tawe,
sikila ese ndi nawe
khukhuonia ne khukhusikula,
Ndakhusikula khukhwama mu makhono ke bamayaanu,
mala khusikule khukhwama khu maani ke bakuluumi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Yeremia ali,
“Okhareera omukhasi namwe wasaala babaana abuundu ano tawe.
Ndakhuboolela kaacha khwekholekha khu baana balasaalwa ano ne khu basaasi babwe.
Balifwa lufu lubi. Mbao ookhabalile namwe ookhabasiikhe tawe. Kimibili kiabwe kikhabe busa nga kamasisie khwiloba. Bakhabunile mwiie, namwe bafwe enjala mala kimibili kiabwe kibe siakhulia sie chinyuni ne chisaang'i.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Okhengila munju eye kamasika namwe wacha khusooma bafu namwe wabalila tawe. Sikila ese narusiisie khu baandu bano kumuleembe kwase, busiime bwase bwa busiele ne siisa siase.
Bayiinda ne bataambi sitube balafwila mu sibala sino, se balasiikhwa tawe, ne se aliio olabalila namwe ekine namwe abeke kumurwe sikila nibo tawe.
Se aliio olalia ne khunywa khulwe khumuoleelesia ofwisiisie tawe. Se aliio olakholela siisa akhaba ofwisiisie raraawe namwe maawe tawe.
“Okhacha munju eya naikara wikhale nabo, namwe olie ne khunywa nabo tawe.
Rekeeresia niko Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele owa Isiraeli ndikho ndoma ndakamia busangaafu ne khoyo ne babaandu bano bakhabone ne kekholekha.
“Ne nga okhababoolele kamakhuwa kano bakhakhureebe sifuno sikila ne khalake khubaukuuma ne bukhalafu. Bakhareebe likoso siina nilio bakholile ne bwoni siina nibwo bakholeele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe?”
Ne ewe olibakobosia oli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Sikila baraara benywe banjanjukha mala baloonda bawele babaandi ne khubakholela lundi ne khubasaaya. Ne banjanjukha ese ne khulekha khuliinda lilaka liase.
Ne enywe mwakholile kamabi khukhila baraara benywe. Buli mulala khwinywe aloonda sileka sie lilienya liewe limayaanu mala aloba khukhundekeeresia.
Khwako, ndamuoona murure mu sibala sino muche mu sibala nisio enywe namwe baraara benywe bakhamanya tawe. Ne ebweeneyo, mukhakholele bawele babaandi kumuusi ne siilo sikila se ndekesiakho busiime khwinywe tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khwako, chindaalo chilikho chiicha, babaandu se bakhalomekho lundi bali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owarusia babaandu ba Isiraeli khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri,’ tawe.
Ne kakhali bakhalome bali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owarusia babaandu ba Isiraeli khukhwama mu sibala sie bunaswa ne khukhwama mu bibala bioosi nibio aabasalanisia bacha.’ Kaliba kario sikila ese khabakobosie mu sibala nisio naelesia bakuuka babwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola ndikho nduma balobi bakali mala balabatiila. Enyuma wako ndaruma baayi bakali mala balaaya babaandu bano mu buli sikulu ne lukulu ne mu mbangaachi che chinyaanda.
Sikila naboone chingila chabwe choosi se chanjekisilekho tawe namwe bubwoni bwabwe se bwanjekisilekho tawe.
Ese ndabaruungia khukhwola khabili khulwe bumayaanu ne bubwoni bwabwe, sikila banyaalutia sibala siase ne bifwaani biili nga kimibili kikiafwa, mala bechusia kumukabwa kwase ne bifwaani bisinyisia.”
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli kamaani ne buliindi bwase,
oli bubwilukhilo bwase biise bie butinyu
chikholo chiliicha khwiwe
khukhwama buli abuundu khu sibala mala chilome chili,
“Bakuuka befwe se baebwa kumukabwa kwosi kwosi tawe ne kakhali baebwa bawele be bubeeyi,
bibiindu bia busa, bitamba bukhala.
Eku, omundu anyala ekholela omwene bawele?
Babenabo se bali bawele nibo tawe!”
“Khwako ndabakhola bamanye lino. Ndabakhola bamanye bunyali bwase ne kamaani kase ne balamanya bali lisina liase lili ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Bubwoni bwa Yuda bwaandikwa ne kalamu eye sichuuma. Bwachongwa khu bipao bie kimiooyo kiabwe ne khu njika chabwe cha alutare ne kalamu eye kamamili.
Ne babaana babwe bakhebulila chialutare chabwe ne bifwaani bia wele Ashera buli abuundu a murongooro ne khu bikulu,
bakhebulila akhaba bili khu chingulu ne khu siangalaamwe. Kimiaandu kienywe nende bioosi nibio mwarakho kimiooyo ndabiaana mwiie nga kumuruungo khulwe bubwoni bwenywe mu sibala sienywe sioosi.
Se mulaba ne bunyali khu mukabwa nikwo namuelesia tawe, ne ndamukhola mukholele basiku benywe mu sibala nisio mukhamanyile tawe. Ndakhola ndio sikila lirima liase liaburuukhe nga kumulilo mala kulaburukha khulwa mindali.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Alaamwe omundu osuubila mu mundu wasie
mala eyikina kamaani ke kumubili
niye kumwoyo kwewe kwarura khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ali nga khachakha mu siangalaamwe,
mala se alibona kamalayi ne kecha tawe.
Alamenya abuundu aoomu para mu sichiimi,
mu sibala sie lutalalie nisio okhabiaalakho tawe.
Ali ne khabi omundu osuubila mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
niye lisuubila liewe lili mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
kukwikhisianga chiisi chakwo mu meechi
ne se kuria siimiyu ne siicha tawe,
sikila kamasaafu kakwo kachiilililanga khuba kamabisi,
se kubechanga ne liliembeelela siimiyu ne siicha tawe
sikila se kwimanga khuba ne kamatuunda tawe.
Kumwoyo kwo mundu kuli kumubeeyi khukhila bibiindu bioosi,
ne kuli kumumayaanu lukali
naanu onyala amanya kakaakwo?
mala khaka kumwoyo khu buli mundu khuloondekhana ne chingila chewe,
khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biewe.”
Nga enyuni ebuusianga kamaana niko ekhalula tawe
niye omundu onyoola buiinda mungila ekhali eya ng'ali tawe,
buiinda obwo bulamuwakho nali akari we bulamu bwewe
mala ekhumaliilikha khwewe aba omusilu.
Lukaangu lwefwe luli nga endebe eye bubwami eye luyali,
eli khu sikulu khukhwama mu khurakikha.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe oli lilieyikina lia Isiraeli,
abo boosi bakhulekha ewe bakhaambisibwe chisoni,
abo babakhwanjukha ewe kamasina kabwe kakhaandikwe mwiloba
sikila banjuukhe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sinoko sie kameechi ke bulamu.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, silikhe mala mbone,
mbonie ne ndaonisibwa
sikila ewe oli efuma yase.
Lola babaandu bandeeba bali,
“Likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lili waena? Lekha liche!”
Ee se nakhuyingiliile ewe khureera butinyu tawe,
namwe se nekoombile endaalo eye butinyu tawe,
ewe omanyile koosi niko nalomaloma kaba ebweeni wowo.
Okhandeerera butinyu tawe
ewe oli bubwilukhilo bwase mu siise sie butinyu.
Lekha abo babakhupia siibi baambwe chisoni
ne okhandekha ese naambwa chisoni tawe,
lekha barangaararwe ne ese kharangaararwa tawe,
bareerere endaalo eye bubi, babunie ne libuna khukhwola khabili.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Cha wime mu Silibwa sie ekholo eya Benjamini, nisio babaami ba Yuda babiriranga ne bengila ne khurura mu lukoba. Cha mu bilibwa bie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu bioosi
mala olome oli, ‘Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enywe babaami ba Yuda ne babaandu ba Yuda mweesi ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, mubiriranga mu bilibwa bino.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ba barekeerefu khulwe bulamu bwenywe ne mukhasutakho sisutwa khu ndaalo eya sabato namwe musibisilie mu bilibwa bie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu tawe.
Ne mukhasuta sisutwa khu ndaalo eye Sabato khukhwama munju yenywe, namwe mukhakhola kumulimo kwosi kwosi tawe, ne kakhali liinda endaalo eya Sabato ebe endakatifu, nga nalaka bakuuka benywe.
Ne nibo se barekeeresia namwe baulila tawe, ne kakhali bakhola sileka bakhakhola bario baulila mala bakaanila kamekisio tawe.
“Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Kaaba bali mundekeeresia mala mulekhe khusuta sisutwa mwingisie mu bilibwa bie lukoba luno khu ndaalo eya sabato, mulinde endaalo eya Sabato ebe endakatifu, lundi mulekhe khukhola kimilimo khu ndaalo ng'eneyo tawe,
aba babaami be lisaaye lia Daudi bakhengile mu bilibwa bie lukoba luno ne batimila khu makaari ne khu farasi. Akhaba babaana babwe, babaandu ba Yuda ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu bosi bakhakhole bario. Nio lukoba luno lulamenywamo khulwa mindali.
Lundi babaandu balama mu ngoba cha Yuda ne birekere bibiakara Yerusalemu, khukhwama mu maloba ka Benjamini ne khukhwama Shefela khukhwama mu sibala sie bikulu, ne khukhwama ebunaswa owa Yuda. Bakhareere biianwa bie khukhwosia ne chimbosio, biianwa bie biakhulia ne bupani buunya bulayi ne khureera biianwa bie khusiima munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali enywe mwaba ne mukhandekeeresia, ne khuliinda endaalo eye Sabato mu butakatifu ne khulekha khusuta sisutwa ne khukhwingila nasio mu bilibwa bia Yerusalemu khu ndaalo eye sabato tawe, aba ndabwana kumulilo mu bilibwa bialwo mala kulaburukha buli abuundu mu Yerusalemu mala se kulasima tawe.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Yinyokha oche munju yo mubuumbi ne noli mumwenomwo ndakhuboolela kamakhuwa kase.”
Nio nacha munju yo mubuumbi, ne munju omwo omubuumbi aaba alikho akhola kimilimo kiewe khu ngara eye khubuumbilakho.
Ne sisiindu sie liloba nisio aba ne abuumba sionekhela mu mukhono mwewe, mala asikaluukhasia asikholamo sisiindu sisiindi, nisio omubuumbi omwene alola ali bulayi khubuumba.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Ee, baandu be nju eya Isiraeli, ese se nyala namukhola enywe nga omubuumbi yuno ne ama khukhola tawe ku? Baandu ba Isiraeli, nga liloba ne lili mukhono kwo mubuumbi, bulayi bwene akhaba enywe mwesi muli busa murio mukhono kwase.
Siise siosi siosi ne mboolela ekholo namwe bubwami ndi ndabwonakaka mala mbubunie,
ne ekholo niyo ndomile yaaba ne kaluukhana yalekha bumayaanu, ndalekha khukhola kamabi niko abeele ndekeekhe khukikhola.
Ne siise siosi siosi nyala naboolela ekholo namwe bubwami ndi ndakiimikha mala ngiandalasie,
ne ekholo eyo yaba ne khola bumayaanu mu moni chase, ne khandekeresia tawe, aba ndalekha khukhola kamalayi niko narekekha khukikholela.
Khwako boolela babaandu ba Yuda ne babaandu bamenyile mu Yerusalemu kamakhuwa kase kano: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali lola ndikho murekekhera enywe butinyu. Ndikho mwibasilia kamabi. Buli mulala alekhe engila yewe emayaanu. Ng'oona likeenda lienywe ne bikholwa.
Ne kakhali balakobosia bali, ‘Ako ka busa! Efwe khulaloonda kamakhuwa kefwe fwabene, buli mundu alakhola sileka khuloondekhana ne kumwoyo kwewe kumumayaanu.’ ”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Reeba mu kholo choosi, naanu owaulilakho sisiindu nga sino?
Babaandu ba Isiraeli bakholile sisiindu sie khuukia.
Kamaarara ke khu sikulu sia Lebanoni kawechangakho ku?
Chinjichi chichakukha khu ngulu chiteenyanga,
chinjichi che kameechi kamanyifu?
Ne kakhali babaandu base banjibiliile
boselia bupani bawele bakhali ba ng'ali tawe,
batiimile chingila chabwe ne kimiyila kimikhale
mala bachile khu ngila chikhalisia
se baluungiikhe khumuyila tawe.
Bakholile sibala siabwe khuba sie khuukia
sisiindu sie khulekwa mindali na mindali
buli mundu yesi yesi obirao auka mala asisiikha kumurwe.
Ndabasalanisia ebweeni we basiku babwe nga ekhuungu eye bukwe,
ndabafutarira ne se ndabekhebukha,
mu siise sie butinyu bwabwe tawe.”
Nio babaandu baloma bali, “yiicha khukhole siindu khu Yeremia. Khukhabe ne basaayi buli lwoosi khukhwekisia elomo, bakesi khukhua likaambila, ne bang'oosi khukhwilwachila likhuwa lia Wele. Lekha khu musitake mala khukhaulilakho likhuwa liewe liosi liosi tawe.”
Nio nasaba ndi, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndekeeresie mala oulile liliekoonjelela liase
nende niko basiku base bandoma.
Bumayaanu buli kumuruungo kwe bulayi ku?
Ne kakhali banjabiile buko.
Khebulila nga nema ebweeni wowo ne ndomaloma bulayi bwabwe,
nio olekhe khuba ne lirima khu nibo.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lekha babaana babwe bafwe enjala,
lekha bafwiile mwiie.
Lekha bakhasi babwe bafwisie baseecha ne babaana,
lekha be siseecha bafwe lufu lubi,
ne basoleeli bafwiile mwiie.
Lekha bililo biuliilikhanile mu chinju chabwe,
ewe no obareerera babebwaakali matundubiikha!
Sikila bayabile buko khukhundusiao,
mala bandekire kimireko bikele.
Kakhaba kario, ewe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omanyile chikwangwaani chabwe choosi che khukhunjira.
Okhababeela bubwoni bwabwe,
namwe warusia bubi bwabwe ebweeni wowo tawe
lekha bakhilwe ebweeni wowo.
Bakholele kano mu lirima liowo.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Cha okule enyuungu. Amboolela lundi ali bukula basaakhulu balala ne basaayi bakhulu balala,
mala oche mu litooma lia okhwa Hinomu ebwingililo bwe silibwa sia Patisieti mala wilwachile ebweeneyo kamakhuwa niko nja khu khuboolela.
Olaloma kano: Enywe baami ba Yuda ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, ulila kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, lola ese ndikho ndeera butinyu buno abuundu ano nio buli omundu oulila aliesiindukha.
Kaliba kario sikila babaandu bano banjanjuukhe ese mala banyaalutisie abuundu ano khulwe khukhwoseliao bupani khu wele babaandi nibo babene namwe baraara babwe namwe babaami ba Yuda bakhamanya tawe. Lundi sikila bachukha abuundu ano sifuki sikali sie babaandu bakhali ne bubi tawe.
Lundi bombakhila Baali abuundu aesuta khukhwoseliao babaana babwe basoleeli nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khu wele Baali. Kano ese se nabalaka namwe nabisia namwe nebaasiakho tawe.
Khwako ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, ‘Lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha, abuundu ano se alilaangwa lundi bali Tofeti, namwe litooma lia okhwa Hinomu tawe, ne kakhali alilaangwa ali litooma lie khukhoonya.
Ne abuundu ano ndonaka lirekekha lie babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu litambe bukhala. Ne ndikhola babaandu bamwo bererwe mwiie ebweeni we basiku babwe ne nabo bayiima bulamu bwabwe. Khaane kimibili kiabwe kibe siakhulia sie chinyuni ne chisaang'i.
Ne khakhole lukoba luno lube sisiindu sie khuriisia, sisiindu nisio bauka. Buli mundu olibirao akhauke ne khusiisiikha kumurwe sikila kamaraba kaliio.
Ne ese ndibakhola balie babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana, ne buli mundu alalia kumubili kwo wasie sikila khukhwibulilwa ne butinyu nibwo basiku babwe ne nabo bayiima khu beera bakhabakholele.’
Nio olara enyuungu ebweeni we babaandu nibo olaba nabo abo,
mala olababoolela oli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Khwako khaare babaandu bano ne lukoba luno nga omundu ne aara enyuungu yo mubuumbi, ekhanyalikhana khubumbwa lundi tawe. Babaandu balisiikhwa mu Tofeti sikila abuundu aandi se alibao e khusiikha tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ndikhola ndio abuundu ano ne babaandu bamenyileo, mala khole lukoba lube nga Tofeti.
Chinju cha Yerusalemu, ne chinju che babaami ba Yuda, chinju choosi nicho bosiela bupani khu ngaaki khwacho khulwe ching'enieesi ne biianwa bie khunywa biachukhilwe khulwe bawele babaandi, chilanyaaluutwa nga Tofeti.’ ”
Nio Yeremia aama Tofeti niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuruma khung'oola mala aacha eema khu luuya lwe Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Aboolela babaandu boosi ali,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Lola ndikho ndeera khu lukoba luno ne khu ngoba chichiindi chindiiti choosi kamabi koosi niko khalake, sikila bakhola sileka, baloba khuulila kamakhuwa kase.”

Omusaayi Pashihuri, okhwa Imeri, owaba omwimeelesi we Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila Yeremia ne ang'oola bibiindu bino.
Nio Pashihuri arusia lilaka bape Yeremia mala amure khu minyololo embi ne silibwa sia ngaaki sie kholo eya Benjamini mu Lukaangu.
Nga bwasia, Pashihuri alekhuula Yeremia khukhwama khu minyololo. Nio Yeremia amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alakhulaanga lisina liowo, ali Pashihuri lundi tawe, ne kakhali alakhulaanga ali, ‘Liriisia buli Lubeka.’
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ese ndakhukhola ewe obe liriisia khu wamwene ne khu basaale bowo boosi. Balererwa mwiie ne basiku babwe ewe nololeleele. Ne ese khaane Yuda sioosi mu bunyali bwo mwami owa Babiloni. Ne akhababukule abayile Babiloni mu mbaambe mala ese khaberere ebweeneyo.
Khutasa khwako khaane kimiaandu kie lukoba lwa Yuda kioosi ne bibiindu bie bukhala nende bie bukusi bwe angaaki ne libiikhilo lie babaami ba Yuda mu bunyali bwe basiku babwe. Baliyaaya kimiaandu kiabwe ne khubaamba babayile e Babiloni.
Ne ewe Pashihuri, ne bamenyile munju mwowo boosi mukhache mu mbaambe e Babiloni, mala mukhafwiile ebweeneyo ne khusiikhwa ebweeneyo, ewe ne basaale bowo boosi nibo wang'oolelanga ke bubeeyi.’ ”
Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wambeyile ese,
ne ese nabeyiilwe
ewe oli ne kamaani khukhukhila ese
ne ewe wakhilile kamaani,
njekheelelwa na buli mundu,
buli mundu anjokelela ne khukhukhoma.
Buli lwosi ne ndomaloma, khukhwola ndile,
njokela ndi, “Sisiayuumba ne libuna!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, banjekheelela ne bandekelesia buli lwosi,
sikila nilwacha likhuwa liowo.
Ne ndoma ndi, “Ndebilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
namwe se ndomalomakho lundi mu lisina liewe tawe,”
Burume bwowo buba nga kumulilo mwise
bunjosia lukali khaka kamaani khu bukhiingilila
ne se kanyalikhana tawe.
Mbulila buli mundu namanya ali
“Butinyu buli, buli abuundu
lekha khumusitaake khu bakhoongo.”
Akhaba basaale base baali siimbi
basangaalila khuukwa khwase
baloma bali, “Khumukhake khulole
wakana khumunyoola mala weyacha.”
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe oli nase,
oli owe kamaani ne bunyali,
nabo babakhupia sibi balakhilwa,
balaambwa chisoni buli lwoosi,
sikila se banyala khukhukhila tawe.
Chisoni chabwe se chiliibililwa tawe.
Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
okhalakilanga babaandu mu bung'ali,
omanyile ke mumwoyo ne kamebaasio
lekha mbone lilieyacha liowo khu basiku base,
sikila ese nakhweyikiine ewe.
Yimbila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Fumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila areesiisie omubanani,
khukhwama khu bunyali bwe babaandu bamayaanu,
Endaalo niyo maayi asaalilakho ekhabiitwa chikhabi tawe.
Alaamwe omundu owaboolela paapa ali,
“Sangaala sikila wasalile omwana omusoleeli.”
Omundu oyo akhoya abe nga chingoba
nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akwiisia ne akhali ne siisa tawe,
lekha aulila lilila kumutikhinyi ne lulwiika mwiaangilwe,
sikila se anjirira munda ne khasaalwa tawe.
Endi enda eya maayi wase eli siliindwa siase.
Siina sikila ne nasaalwa?
Khubona sibi ne bubeeleli
ne mbe ne chisoni chindaalo che bulamu bwase choosi?

Omwami Sedekia owa Yuda aruma Pashihuri okhwa Kwini no musaayi Sefania okhwa Maseyi khwise ne burume buno.
Nosiima khusabile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila omwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni ne banamae bewe balikho bebwaakala lukoba luno. Wakana Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anyala akhukholela kamayia mala Nebukadinesa alekha khukhupa.
Nio Yeremia ababoolela ali,
“Cha muboolele Sedekia muli, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Lola ndakaluukhasia bibiooki bie liie nibio oli nabio, nibio olikho uupanisila omwami owa Babiloni ne Bakalidayo, bakhwibuuliile ewe enje we lisiisi, ese ndabareera alala bengile mu lukoba luno.
Ese samwene ndapana ne nawe ne kamaani koosi mu lirima ne mu burafu ne bukhalafu bukali.
Lundi ndapa bamenywa be lukoba luno, babaandu ne bibiaayo sitube balafwa lufu lurafu.
Ese samwene Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, enyuma wako, khakhuaane ewe Sedekia omwami owa Yuda ne bakholi bowo ne babaandu be mu lukoba luno baona lufu, liie ne njala, khu Nebukadinesa omwami we Babiloni, ne mu bunyali bwe basiku benywe, ne mu bunyali bwabo bayiima khumwiira enywe. Alabeera ne mbalu, se alibakholela siisa namwe abalekhe namwe ababeele tawe.’
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela khuboolela babaandu ndi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ndikho nda ebweeni wenywe engila eye bulamu nende eye lifwa.
Oyo olekhala mu lukoba luno aleerwa ne mbalu, ne njala, ne lufu. Ne kakhali oyo orura eaana khu Bakalidayo balikho bamwibuulila enywe alaona omulamu ne alanyoola bulamu bwewe nga kumuruuru kwe liie.
Sikila nakhalakile lukoba luno khulwe bumayaanu ne se kali kamalayi tawe. Lulaanwa mu bunyali bwo mwami owa Babiloni mala alalwosia ne kumulilo.’ ”
“Ne khu nju eye bubwami eya Yuda loma kamakhuwa kano: Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ee enju eya Daudi! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
‘Khalaka bung'ali kumutikhinyi
ne sikula oyo onuliilwe khukhwama khu bunyali bwa khayinga,
ne busa lirima liase lilaburukha nga kumulilo,
ne lilaburukha ne se aliio olalisimia tawe,
sikila bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu.’
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma kano: Lola, namubiile enywe, bamenywa be mwitooma
muli nga lulwanda lwe khumweyeywe.
Enywe muloma muli, ‘Naanu okhakhwibwaakale efwe, namwe naanu okheche niio khuli?’
Ndamuelesia siiukuumo khuloondekhana ne kamatuunda ke bikholwa bienywe,
khabwane kumulilo mu musiru, mala kulosia buli siindu siili siimbi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali, “Cha mu nju eyo mwami owa Yuda mala omuboolele elomo yino,
boola oli, ‘Ewe, omwami owa Yuda, owekhala khu sisala sie bubwami bwa Daudi, ne bakholi bowo boosi ne babaandu bowo boosi rekeeresia likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khola bung'ali ne buluungi mala mureesie abo babanuulwa khukhwama mu bunyali bwabo babapia siibi. Mukhakhola bubi namwe sisiayuumba khu bakeni namwe bafuubi namulekhwa namwe mukhachukha abuundu ano khu mundu okhali ne bubi tawe.
Sikila mwaba ng'ali ne muria likhuwa lino, aba babaami be lisaaye lia Daudi balachiililila khukhwamiia. Nibo alala ne bakholi babwe ne babaandu babwe balachiililila khukhwingila mu bilibwa bino ne batimila khu makaari ne khu farasi.
Ne mwaba nemukhaulila kamakhuwa kano tawe, nechuba ndi enju yino se eliamiia tawe.”
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khu mwami owa Yuda ali,
“Ewe oli nga Kileati khwise,
nga sisekese sia Lebanoni
ne kakhaba kario, ndakhukhola nga sisiangalaamwe,
lukoba lukhamenywamo tawe.
Ndarekekha babonaki khwiwe, buli mulala ne bulwaani bwewe,
balarema kimirongooro kiowo kimitarakwa kimilayi mala bakiosie.
“Ne chikholo chingali chilibira alukoba ano, ne buli mundu alireeba owasie ali, ‘Siina sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne aakhola lukoba luboofu luno ari?’
Ne nibo balikobosia bali, ‘Sikila banjukha endakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe, mala basaaya bawele babaandi ne khubakholela kimilimo.’ ”
Baandu ba Yuda mukhalila omwami Yosia tawe,
namwe mukhasooma lifwa liewe tawe.
Ne kakhali lila lukali omwana wewe Yoahasi
balikho bacha naye aleeyi
sakhakobole lundi tawe,
se akhabonekho lundi sibala nisio asaalwamo tawe.
Ne kakhali akhafwiile abuundu niio bamuyilile mu mbaambe, ne se akhabone sibala sino lundi tawe.”
“Alaamwe omundu owombakha enju yewe mu ngila chikhali cha ng'ali tawe,
ne khuramo chisiro mukorofa mu ngaaki mungila ekhali eye bung'ali tawe,
omundu okhola owasie amukholele kilimo kia busa,
se amuelesia kumuruungo kwewe tawe.
Oloma ali, ‘Ndombakha enju emboofu
eye chisiro chimbalaayi mukorofa,’
mala arekho kamatirisia,
ne khukibotookhelesia ne kimitarakwa
mala akaakhe bubesemu.
Wibaasia oli ewe oli omwami sikila wombakha enju eye kimitarakwa?
Raraao se alia ne khunywa
ne khukhola bung'ali ne buluungi ta ku?
Nio buli siindu sia mubeela bulayi.
Akholela bung'ali bataambi ne babanani,
nio buli siindu siamubeela bulayi.
Kano niko kakekesia bali wamanya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali ewe oli ne chimoni ne kumwoyo
khulwe khubona bukhala bukhali bwa ng'ali bwong'ene,
khulwe khuchukha sifuki sia busa,
ne khukhupia babaandu siibi ne khukhola sisiayuumba.”
Yehoyakimu okhwa Yosia omwami owa Yuda
“Se bakhamusoome ne baloma bali,
‘Ee wandaayase!’ Namwe bali, ‘Ee omukooko!’ Tawe.
Se bakhamusoome ne baloma bali,
‘Ee omwami!’ Namwe bali ‘Ee omwami owe lukoosi!’ Tawe.
Akhasiikhwe nga epunda,
Akhakhuruurwe amwaatwe enje we bilibwa bia Yerusalemu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Baandu ba Yerusalemu cha e Lebanoni mala muyokele.
Cha mu sibala sia Basiani mala mulile,
laanga ne muli khu bikulu bia Moabu
sikila basaale benywe boosi babunile.
Nalomaloma nanywe siise nisio mwabeela bulayi
ne kakhali mwaloba khurekeeresia,
lino nilio liba lienywe khukhwama bwana
se mwaria lilaka liase tawe.
Babemeelesi benywe balauchwa ne mbeo,
basaale benywe balatiilwa mwiie.
Chingoba chenywe chilaambwa chisoni,
sikila bubwoni bwenywe nibwo mwakhola.
Mwamenya abeele bulayi mu mitarakwa kikiama Lebanoni
mukhakholelwe siisa sikali siise sie buchuuni,
buchuuni nga bwo mukhasi olumwa!”
nakhura mu bunyali bwabo nibo weendekhelela babaandu bayiima bulamu bwowo. Ndakhura mu bunyali bwa Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni ne Bakalidayo.
Ese ndikho nja khukhuyila ne kamaani mu mbaambe ewe ne maao mu sibala sisiindi, nisio okhasaalwamo tawe, mala mwembi mukhafwilemo.
Ne oliekoomba khukobola mu sibala sino lundi ne se olikobolamo tawe.”
Yeremia areeba ali, omwami Yehoyakini yuno ali busa nga enyuungu eyatikha yalobwa,
sisiindu nisio omundu akhenya tawe?
Siina sikila niye ne babaana bewe ne bayilwa ne kamaani mu sibala nisio bakhamanyile tawe?
Ee, sibala, sibala, sibala
ulila elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Bala omundu yuno nga okhali no mwana tawe,
omundu okhaliindiaala mu bulamu bwewe tawe,
sikila mbao khu be lisaaye liewe oliila
khu ndebe eye bubwami eye lisaaye lia Daudi,
mala amiia lundi sibala sia Yuda tawe.”

“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Bali ne silaamo babaayi babeera ne khusalanisia kamakheese ke mumayilwe mwase!’ ”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Khuloondekhana ne babaayi baliinda babaandu base! Mwasalanisie kamatuuli kase mala mwakayilile aleeyi ne se mwakiliindile tawe. Lola, ndamuelesia kumunaanio khulwe bumayaanu nibwo mukholile.
Nio ndabuusia alala babaandu base babarama khukhwama mu bibala bioosi nibio nabasalanisia ne khubareera mu sibala siabwe. Ne bakhasaalane mala bakuche.
Ndibaelesia baruki bakhabaliinde. Ne se bakhabe ne buuri namwe lilieendekhelela tawe, ne se khabaukuume lundi tawe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Mu ndaalo che bubwami bwewe babaandu ba Yuda bakhaonisibwe ne Baisiraeli balimenya mu muleembe. Ne alilaangwa bali ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali buonia bwefwe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khwako, lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha, babaandu se baliechuba lundi bali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owarusia babaandu ba Isiraeli mu sibala sia Misiri’ tawe,
ne kakhali baliechuba bali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owarusia lisaaye lia Isiraeli mu sibala sie bunaswa ne khukhwama mu bibala bioosi nibio abeele bachamo.’ Nio balimenya mu sibala siabwe siene esio.”
Khuloondekhana ne bang'oosi,
kumwoyo kwase kwambwelemo
kamakuumba kase koosi kareenga,
ndi nga omundu omumeesi
nga omundu niye endali ebirire sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
lundi sikila kamakhuwa kewe kamatakatifu.
Sikila sibala siechuule bukhobani,
sibala sisooma sikila silaamo
ne kamayilwe ke mu sichiimi komile.
Bikholwa biabwe bili bimayaanu,
ne kamaani kabwe se kali ka ng'ali tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Bang'oosi ne basaayi se bakhola ka Wele tawe,
akhaba munju mwase nanyoolilemo bumayaanu bwabwe.
Khwako chingila chabwe khu nibo chilaba nga chingila che bumiumiu mu siilima,
mu nicho khabayile bache mala bakwemo,
sikila ndabareerera butinyu mu mwiiko kwe siiukuumo siabwe.
Mu bang'oosi ba Samaria naboone sisiindu sie busilu
bang'oola mu bunyali bwa Baali
mala batiimia babaandu base be nju eya Isiraeli.
naboone sisiindu simayaanu lukali
bakhola bueeyi ne khuloma bubeeyi,
bayeeta babaandu khukhola bumayaanu,
nio se aliio owekanila tawe,
boosi babeele nga Sodomu khwise
ne bamenywa bamwo nga Komora.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
aloma ali khuloondekhana ne bang'oosi,
“Lola ese ndabaliisia siakhulia silulu,
ne khubaelesia kameechi kalimo bufwisi,
sikila khukhwama khu bang'oosi ba Yerusalemu
bibiindu biikhali bie buwele tawe biasalaniile mu sibala sioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Mukharekeeresia kamakhuwa niko bang'oosi bang'oola khwinywe ne khumwichusia lilieyikina lie bubeeyi tawe. Balomaloma kamalola ke kamebaasio kabwe babeene ne se kaama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Bachiililila khuboolela abo baleka elomo ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, ‘Muli busa bulayi.’ Lundi baboolela buli mundu oloonda chingila chewe mu sileka bali, ‘Mbao butinyu bulikhwichakho tawe’ ”
Naanu mu bang'oosi bano owema mu muse kwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
khumanyilisia ne khuulila elomo yewe,
namwe naanu owarekeeresia elomo yewe mala akiulila.
Lola, embembeesi ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Lirima liarurire,
sisifuusia sikali silaba khu mirwe kie babooni.
Lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se lilawa tawe
khukhwola nga ne akhola buli siindu,
nisio enya khukhola mumebaasio kewe.
Mu ndaalo chichiicha mukhabimanye bulayi bubwene.
“Ese se naruma bang'oosi tawe,
ne kakhali bacha busa se nabalomalomakho tawe
ne kakhali bang'oola busa.
Abanga bema mu muse kwase
andi baboolela babaandu base kamakhuwa kase,
mala bakharurire khu ngila chabwe chimayaanu,
ne khu bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, “Ese ndi busa Wele owa aembi ne sendi Wele we aleeyi tawe ku?
Omundu anyala ekisa abwikisi nio khamubona tawe? Ese se ndi buli abuundu mwikulu ne khu sibala tawe?
Nauliile bang'oosi babeeyi bang'oola mwisina liase ne baloma bali, ‘Ndoorire! Ndoorire!’
Bubeeyi bulabao khukhwola siise siina mu mioyo kie bang'oosi bang'oola bubeeyi bwe kimiooyo kiabwe?
Bebaasia bali balakhola babaandu base banjibilile khubirira khu marooro kabwe niko baboolana. Bakhola bulayi bwene nga bakuuka babwe ne banjibilila mala baloonda Baali.
Lekha omung'oosi oli ne kamarooro aboole kamarooro kwewe, ne lekha oyo oli ne lomo yase akiboole mu busuubilifu. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali: Chikhanja che ngano chilekhana ne ngano ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Elomo yase seli nga kumulilo, lundi nga enyundo eyarakaka libaale mu bitonyi tawe ku?’
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Khwako lola, ese nabiile bang'oosi babebana chilomo mala bachiloma nga burume khukhwama khwise.’
Lundi nabiile bang'oosi baloma kakabwe babeene mala baboola bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola nabiile abo bang'oola kamarooro ke bubeeyi ne bababoolelanga mala batiimia babaandu base khulwe bubeeyi bwabwe ne busilu. Khwako se bali ne bukhala khu baandu bano tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali, “Mulala khu baandu bano, namwe khu bang'oosi namwe khu basaayi ne akhureeba ali, ‘Burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi buli siina?’ Ewe baboolele kamakhuwa kano: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Enywe ninywe burume mala ndikho nja khumumwaata.’
Ne omung'oosi, omusaayi namwe mulala khu baandu ne aloma ali, ‘Bumiinikhi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi’ ese nja khumuelesia siiukuumo nenju yewe.
Ne kakhali baboolele oli, buli mundu areebe owasie ne lundi buli mundu areebe wandaaye ali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosie ali siina?’ Namwe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomalome siina?
Ne kakhali burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi okhaburarakho lundi tawe, sikila burume buli likhuwa nilio buli mundu aloma, mala mukaluukhasia chilomo cha Wele omenyile mindali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali: Reeba bang'oosi oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosie ali siina?’ Namwe ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomalome siina?’
Ne kakhali baaba ne baloma bali, ‘Bumiinikhi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,’ baboolele oli sikila balomile kamakhuwa kano,
khwako lola, ese ng'ali ndababubukula mbamwaate bandure ebweeni wase. Ndabamwaata nibo ne lukoba nilwo naelesia bakuuka babwe.
Ndabaambia chisoni cha mindali ne liilekwa, ne sikholwa sino se siliibililwa tawe.”

Sikono silala siaba siechuule chinduli chindayi lukali, nga chinduli chibechanga che khunyoa khuroba, ne sikono sisiindi siaba siechuule chinduli chiimbi lukali, nicho omundu akhanyala alia tawe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba Yeremia ali, “Waboone siina?” Yeremia akobosia ali, “Chinduli chindayi lukali ne chinduli chimbi lukali nicho omundu akhanyala alia tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli mboola ndi, bulayi bwene nga chinduli chindayi chino, ese ndebaasilia ndio bulayi baboe babatiilwa khukhwama Yuda, nibo ese naoona barura ano bacha mu sibala sie Bakalidayo.
Ndabaloleelesia mbakholeele bulayi mala khabakobosie mu sibala sino. Khabombakhe ne se khabakwisie tawe, khabemekhe ne se khabarusieo tawe.
Ese khabaelesie kumwoyo kwe khumanya kuli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne nibo baliba babaandu base ne ese ndiba Wele wabwe, sikila balingobolela ne kumwoyo kwabwe kwoosi.
“Ne kakhali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, bulayi bwene nga chinduli chimbi lukali nicho omundu akhanyala alia tawe. Sesi nja khukholela ndio Sedekia omwami owa Yuda, babemeelesi, babaandu babarama Yerusalemu, ba baamenya mu sibala sino, ne nabo bamenyile mu sibala sia Misiri.
Ese nja khubakhola babe babi khu bwami bwe sibala sioosi. Balaba be khulekwa, bachekhelelwa ne khukhomwa lundi be silaamo buli abuundu niio ndibaoona bache.
Ndabarumira liie, enjala ne lufu, khukhwola nga ne balabunila elala boosi, barure mu sibala nisio ese nabaelesia nibo ne bakuuka babwe.”

Omung'oosi Yeremia aboolela babaandu ba Yuda boosi ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu boosi.
Ababoolela ali, “Khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kitaru khukhwamila khu mwiiko kwe khumi na kitaru kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yosia okhwa Amoni omwami owa Yuda khukhwola khu ndaalo yino Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolelanga ese elomo yewe mala ese muboolela buli busiele ne kakhali se mundekeresianga tawe.
Se mwarekeeresia namwe se mwaulila akhaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne achiililila khumurumira enywe bakholi bewe bang'oosi.
Bang'oosi bamuboolela enywe bali, ‘Luno buli mundu khwinywe akaluukhane khukhwama khu ngila yewe emayaanu ne bikholwa biibi mala amenye mu sibala nisio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuelesie enywe ne bakuuka benywe khukhwama khaale khulwa mindali na mindali.
Mukhacha khu bawele babaandi mwabakholela ne khubasaaya tawe, namwe mukhaambaambia lirima khulwe bikholwa bienywe tawe. Nio se ndamureerera kamabi tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ne kakhaba kario, se mwandekeresiisie tawe. Ne kakhali mwambambiisie lirima ne kimilimo kie kamakhono kenywe nio mwereerere mwabeene butinyu.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sikila enywe se mwaria kamakhuwa kase tawe,
lola ndalaanga chikholo che ebunaswa choosi, ne khulaanga Nebukadinesa, omwami owa Babiloni omukholi wase, ne ndabareera khukhupana ne sibala sino ne bamenywa bamwo, ne khukhupania chikholo che aembi choosi. Ndababunisilia elala mala mbakhole babe babi be khubiyilwa ne khukwa ne khulekwa mindali na mindali.
Khutasa khwako ndabarusiakho kumumilo kwe busangaafu, ne ekhoyo ne kumwenya kwe siselelo ne lisia lie lususi ne buwaanga bwe taa.
Sibala sino sioosi silonakwa ne khukhwanjukhwa ne chikholo chino chilakholela omwami owa Babiloni khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi saba.
Nio enyuma we kimiiko kamakhumi saba khareere siiukuumo khu mwami owa Babiloni ne sibala sie Bakalitayo sikila bumayaanu bwabwe mala khole sibala sianjukhwe khulwa mindali.
Khakhole khu sibala esio kamakhuwa koosi kamabi niko ndomile khu nisio, buli siindu sisiaandikwa mu sitabu sino, nisio Yeremia ang'oola khu kholo chino choosi.
Sikila chikholo chingali ne babaami be bunyali bakhabakhole nasioobi mala ese khabaruungie khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biabwe ne kimilimo kiabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboolela Yeremia ali, “Bukula sikoombe sie ndali sisichuule lirima liase sino, mala onywesie chikholo choosi nicho ese khurumakho.
Balanywa bameele batalitaale ne khulalukha sikila liie nilio ese ndikho nduma khu nibo.”
Khwako Yeremia abukula sikoombe khukhwama mukhono mwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala akhola chikholo choosi nicho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amurumakho chanywelamo.
Anywesia Yerusalemu ne chingoba cha Yuda, babaami ne babemeelesi khukhola chingoba chanjukhwe ne khutambamo omundu, khuba che khuuka ne lundi che silaamo, nga ne chili khukhwola luno.
Lundi anywesia Farao, omwami owa Misiri, bakholi bewe, babemeelesi, ne babaandu bewe boosi,
anywesia ne bakeni bamenyile ne Farao boosi babaami be sibala sia Usi boosi, ne babaami ba Filisiti boosi (Ashikeloni, Kasa, Ekironi ne babarama mu Ashitoti),
anywesia Edomu, Moabu ne ba okhwa Amoni, alala ne
babaami ba Tiro boosi babaami ba Sidoni boosi ne babaami be sikelekha sie nyanja.
Dedani, Tema, Busi ne naabo boosi babekanga binyoosi.
Anywesia Babaami boosi ba Arebia ne babaami boosi be chikholo chichatubaana chimenyile mu siangalaamwe.
Akhola ario akhaba khu baami boosi ba Simuri, babaami boosi ba Edomu ne babaami boosi ba Media.
Lundi anywesia babaami boosi be bunaswa be aleeyi ne aembi buli sia mulala, alala Bubwami bwoosi bwe mu sibala buli mu sibala sioosi. Mala enyuma wa bano boosi omwami owa Babiloni akhanywe.
Nio ewe Yeremia okhababoolele oli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Nywa, nywa mumeele murusie, mukwe mala mukhenyokha lundi tawe, sikila liie nilio ese ndikho nduma khwinywe.’
Ne baaba ne baloba khukhwakaanila sikoombe siili mukhono mwowo, olababoolela oli: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Khukhwola munywe!’
Lola, ese ndarakikha lilionaka mu lukoba lwase lulwene. Enywe mwibaasia muli se mulauukuumwa tawe? Ndikho nja khubauukuuma, nja khurera liie khu baandu boosi khu sibala. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Yeremia aboolele babaandu kamakhuwa kano koosi ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhokhela khu sikulu,
ne khukhwama mu bwikhalo bwewe butakatifu alalomaloma,
alakhokhela babaandu bewe ne kamaani,
mala ayokele nga abo basuura chisabibu,
ne khu bamenywa be mu sibala.
Kumumilo kulauliilikha buli abuundu mu sibala
sikila Wele ali ne kesi ne babaandu be chikholo
alikho engila mu bukhalaki ne babaandu boosi,
ne bamayaanu, alabeerera mwiie.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola butinyu bulikho burura,
bwama mu kholo ndala bucha mu kiindi
ne sisifuusia sie kamaani silikho siebuusia alala.
Ne kimibili kia abo nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akheere khu ndaalo eyo kilisalaanila khukhwama lubeka lulala lwe sibala khukhwola khu luundi. Se balibalila namwe kimibili kiabwe kibusibwe alala, namwe kisiikhwe tawe, kiliba busa nga esiina eye kamasisie.
Enywe babaayi lila,
enywe babaami yikalangasia mwikokhe, enywe babaami be lituuli,
sikila chindaalo che khukhonywa khwenywe ne khusalanila cholile
ne mulakhonywa nga kamamiiku kamanefu.
Se khabekhoo engila eye khukhwilukha tawe.
Ulila bililo bie babaayi
ne lilila lie babemeelesi be kamatuuli.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho onakaka kamayilwe kabwe,
ne kamayilwe kamalayi kalanjukhwa
sikila lirima likali lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Bulayi bwene nga etalang'i ne elekha libina liayo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalekhile babaandu bewe,
sikila sibala siabwe siabeele sisiangalaamwe
sikila liie lie owe kamaani
ne khulwe lirima lirafu lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali, “Yiima khu luya lwe Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala oboolele babaandu be chingoba cha Yuda boosi babecha khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Lukaangu kamakhuwa koosi niko ese khulaka khubaboolela. Okhalekhakho likhuwa akhaba lilala tawe.
Banyala barekeeresia mala buli mulala akaluukhana alekha bikholwa biewe bimayaanu. Baaba ne bakhola bario, ese ndakaluukhasia kamebaasio kase ndekhe khubareerera butinyu nga abeele ndekeekhe sikila bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
Baboolele kamakhuwa kano: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Enywe, mwaba ne mukhandekeeresia tawe, lundi ne mukharia lilaka liase nilio nara ebweeni wenywe,
ne khuulila kamakhuwa ke bakholi base bang'oosi nibo namurumira enywe khangu, ne se mwabarekeeresia tawe,
ese nja khukhola Lukaangu luno lube nga Shilo mala nja khukhola lukoba luno lube silaamo khulwe chikholo choosi che khu sibala.’ ”
Basaayi ne bang'oosi, ne babaandu boosi baulila Yeremia ne alomaloma kamakhuwa kano mu nju mwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne nga amala khulomaloma koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amulaka, basaayi, bang'oosi ne babaandu boosi bamufwakhila ne bamuboolela bali, “Ewe wolaana khufwa!
Siina sikila ewe ne ong'oolela mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi noloma oli, ‘Lukaangu luno lulaba nga Shilo ne lukoba luno lulanjukhwa, babaandu se balamenyamo tawe?’ ” Ne babaandu boosi bebuusia mala bakara Yeremia mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga babemeelesi ba Yuda ne baulila bibiindu bino, bama munju yo mwami becha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala bekhala khu ndebe chabwe ebweeni we silibwa siiya sie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio basaayi ne bang'oosi baboolela babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi bali, “Omundu yuno enyekha akhalakilwe lifwa, sikila ang'oolile kamabi khu lukoba luno nga enywe mwabene ne mwama khuulila ne kamaru kenywe.”
Nio Yeremia aboolela babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anduma ese khung'oola khu Lukaangu luno ne khu lukoba luno kamakhuwa koosi niko enywe mwama khuulila.
Khwako, luno enywe ng'oona chingila chenywe ne bikholwa bienywe mala murie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe alekhe kamabi niko aboolile khukhola.
Ne kakhali ese, lola ndi mu bunyali bwenywe. Kholekho nilio mubona muli lili lilayi lundi lia ng'ali.
Ne kakhali manya muli mwaba ne munjira mulereerera mwabene ne lukoba luno ne babaandu bamenyilemo sifuki sitamba bumayaanu, kali kario sikila ng'ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anduma ese khwinywe ndomalome kamakhuwa kano koosi enywe ne murekeeresie.”
Nio babemeelesi ne babaandu boosi baboolela basaayi ne bang'oosi bali, “Omundu yuno se enyekha akhalakilwe lifwa tawe, sikila alomalome khwifwe mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.”
Ne babemeelesi balala benyokha balomaloma khu babaandu babuusiane alala boosi, baloma bali,
Mika owe Moresheti ang'oola mu ndaalo cha Hesekia omwami owa Yuda. Aboolela babaandu boosi ba Yuda ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe Banamae aloma ali,
‘Sayuni lulilimwa nga kumukuunda
Yerusalemu lulekela situumi sie lilionakwa
ne sikulu nisio Lukaangu lulikho silaba kumusiru.’
Omwami Hesekia owa Yuda ne babaandu ba Yuda boosi beera Mika ku? Niye se aria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukholela siisa ta ku? Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe ke khubakhola kamabi niko aaba ne arekekhe ta ku? Ne kakhali efwe khuli siimbi khukhwireerera butinyu bukali lukali.”
Abao omundu okundi owang'oolelanga mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bali Uria okhwa Shemaya khukhwama Kiriati-Yearimu. Ang'oola kamabi khu Lukoba luno ne khu kholo yino, kamakhuwa nga ka Yeremia.
Ne nga omwami Yehoyakimu ne banamae bewe boosi ne babemeelesi baulila kamakhuwa kewe, omwami amuyiima amwire. Nga Uria ne aulila, aria mala elukhila e Misiri.
Nio omwami Yehoyakimu aruma omundu bali Elinatani okhwa Akibori ne babaandu babaandi alala ne naye bacha e Misiri khurera Uria.
Barusia Uria khukhwama e Misiri mala bamuyila khu mwami Yehoyakimu mala amwiira ne mbalu, amwaata kumubili kwewe niio basiikhanga babaandu bakhali ne lukoosi tawe.
Ne kakhali Yeremia aliindwa ne Ahikamu okhwa Safani nio se aanwa khu baandu bamwiire tawe.

Mu khurakikha khwe khukhwamiia khwa Hesekia okhwa Yosia omwami owa Yuda, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Khola bitorobo ne bisekeyi mala ofware mwikosi mwowo.
Ruma burume khu mwami owa Edomu, khu mwami owa Moabu, omwami owa Amoni, omwami owa Tiro ne khu mwami owa Sidoni khubirira khu barume babechile mu Yerusalemu khu Hesekia omwami owa Yuda.
Boolela barume bache baboolele babaami babwe kamakhuwa kano: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali,
‘Mu bunyali bwase bukali ne kamaani kase nabuumba sibala alala ne babaandu ne chisaang'i chilimo mala mbelesia bunyali khu mundu yesi yesi niye samwene siimile.
Luno nareere sibala sino sioosi mu bunyali bwa Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni, omukholi wase mala namueleesie akhaba chisaang'i che mundaa khumukholela kimilimo.
Chikholo choosi chilamukholela kimilimo. Chilakholela akhaba omusoleeli wewe no mwichukhulu wewe, khukhwola nga siise ne silioola sie khukwa khwe kholo yewe. Siise esio chikholo chingali ne babaami be bunyali balimukhola abe nasioobi wabwe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ne ekholo yosi yosi namwe bubwami bwaaba ne bukhakholela Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni yuno kimilimo, ne khufwara mwikosi liayo lichooki lie mu bunyali bwo mwami owa Babiloni tawe ese ndaelesia ekholo eyo kumunaanio ne liie, enjala ne lufu, khakhole ndio khukhwola nga ne mbunia ekholo eyo khulwe khurumikhira Nebukadinesa.
Khwako mukharekeeresia bang'oosi benywe, be chisaasi, be kamarooro, ne balakusi, ne bafumu, balamuboolelanga enywe bali, ‘Mukhakholela omwami owa Babiloni kimilimo tawe.’
Balikho bamung'oolela ke bubeeyi, nio enywe murusibwe mu sibala sienywe muyilwe aleeyi, ne ese ndamuona murure, mala mulabuna.
Ne ekholo yosi yosi efukiilila bubwami bwo mwami owa Babiloni ne khumukholela, ndalekha ekholo ng'ene eyo mu sibala siayo elime kimikuunda kiayo ne khumenyamo.”
Yeremia aboolela Sedekia omwami owa Yuda burume buno ne bubwene ali, “Fukiilila omwami owe Babiloni, mala mumukholele kimilimo, niye ne babaandu bewe nio mumenye.
Siina sikila ewe ne babaandu bowo mufwe khulwe liie, ne njala ne lufu nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile khuloondekhana ne kholo yosi yosi ekhakholela omwami owa Babiloni tawe?
Mukharekeeresia kamakhuwa ke bang'oosi bamuboolela bali, ‘Se mukhakholele omwami owa Babiloni kimilimo tawe,’ tawe sikila balikho bamung'oolela bubeeyi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali: Ese se nabaruma tawe. Balikho bang'oola bubeeyi mu lisina liase, ekhumaliilikha khamuoone muche mala mubune, enywe alala ne bang'oosi baalikho bamung'oolela.”
Nio Yeremia aboolela bang'oosi ne babaandu boosi ali, “Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma: Mukharekeeresia kamakhuwa ke bang'oosi benywe bamung'oolela ne baloma bali, ‘Lola bibiindu bie munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bilakobosebwa khukhwama Babiloni enyuma we siise sitiiti tawe. Balikho bamung'oolela bubeeyi.
Mukhabarekeeresia tawe, kholela omwami owa Babiloni kimilimo mala mumenye. Siina sikila lukoba luno lube likuunda?
Baaba ne bali bang'oosi mala bali ne burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lekha bekoonjelele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nio bibiindu bie mu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nende bie mu nju eyo mwami owa Yuda, nende bie mu Yerusalemu biramemo, bikhayilwa e Babiloni tawe.
Bibiindu nibio omwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni aakhabukula aacha nabio tawe, biaba chinjeko ne bibuumba, biteetwe ne bibiindu bibiindi.
Aabukula Yekoniya okhwa Yehoyakimu, omwami owa Yuda, ne babemeelesi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu ne bali baboe khukhwama Yerusalemu bayilwa e Babiloni.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Khuloondekhana ne bibiindu bibiarama mu nju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bie munju yo mwami owa Yuda ne Yerusalemu,
Bikhasutwe biyilwe e Babiloni mala birameyo khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo ndibibaasiliakho. Nio mbikobosie mala mbire abuundu ano.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Nafunaake lichooki lio mwami owa Babiloni.
Mu miiko kibili ndakobosia abuundu ano bibiindu bioosi bie mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nibio Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni abukula arusia abuundu ano acha nabio e Babiloni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lundi ese khakobosie abuundu ano Yekoniya okhwa Yehoyakimu, omwami owa Yuda alala ne baboe babayilwa e Babiloni boosi khukhwama Yuda, sikila ndafunaka lichooki lio mwami owa Babiloni.”
Nio omung'oosi Yeremia aboolela omung'oosi Hanania ebweeni we basaayi ne babaandu boosi ba baaba ne bemile mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali,
“Amina! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhola ario. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhola kamakhuwa niko wama khung'oola kaaba ng'ali mala akobosie abuundu ano bibiindu bie nju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baboe boosi khukhwama Babiloni.
Ne kakhali ulila luno likhuwa nilio mboola, ewe ne babaandu boosi.
Bang'oosi ba babao ebweeni wowo ne nase khaale akho bang'oola liie, enjala ne lufu, khu bibala bikali ne bubwami bwe bunyali bukali.
Ne omung'oosi nang'oola kumuleembe, mala bung'oosi bwo mung'oosi oyo bwecha bwabao ng'ali limanyikha lili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba arumire omung'oosi oyo.”
Nio omung'oosi Hanania abukula lichooki lie khukhwama khwikosi lio mung'oosi Yeremia mala alifunwa.
Ne Hanania alomaloma ebweeni we babaandu boosi ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, Akhaba seesi khafunemo lichooki lia Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni khukhwama khwikosi lie chikholo choosi mu miiko kibili.” Ne omung'oosi Yeremia echiila.
Siise sitiiti, enyuma wo mung'oosi Hanania khufunaka lichooki liarura khwikosi khwo mung'oosi Yeremia, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia kamakhuwa kano:
Cha oboolele Hanania oli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ewe wafunaake lichooki lie kumurongooro ne ese ndakhola ngobosieo lichooki lie sichuuma.’
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Naboyile lichooki lie sichuuma khu makosi ke babaandu be chikholo boosi, bakholele Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni. Balamukholela niye, sikila namueleesie niye bunyali akhaba khu saang'i che mundaa.’ ”
Ne Omung'oosi Yeremia aboolela Hanania ali, “Ulila Hanania, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhuruma tawe, ne ewe wakholile babaandu bano basuubile bubeeyi.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ndakhurusiao. Olafwa kumwiiko kuno ne kumwene sikila walomile kamakhuwa ke sileka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Mu mwiiko okwo kumwene, mu mwesi kwa saba, omung'oosi Hanania afwa.

Lino liekholekha enyuma wo mwami Yekoniya, maawe, bakholi be mwichipi, babemeelesi ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu, babeechi ne babasi ne barurire Yerusalemu.
Ebarwa yayilwa ne Elasa okhwa Siafani ne Kemaria okhwa Hilikia nibo omwami Sedekia owa Yuda aruma khu mwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni. Ebarwa eyo yasomwa eli:
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboolela baboe boosi nibo aayila mu mbaambe e Babiloni khukhwama Yerusalemu ali,
‘Yombakha chinju mala mumenyemo. Lima kimikuunda mala mulie bibiaamo biakio.
Reera bakhasi mala musaale babaana. Lekha babaana benywe bayilane, mala babe ne babaana. Khola murio nio mutasikhe mube bakali, ne mukhaba batiiti tawe.
Ne kakhali khola kamalayi khu ngoba nicho namuyilamo nga baambe. Basabile, sikila ne baindiaala mwesi mulaindiaala.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli mukaania enywe ndi, mukhalekha bang'oosi ne balakusi bamumenyilemo bamubea tawe. Lundi mukharekeeresia kamarooro niko baroora tawe,
sikila balikho bang'oola bubeeyi mu lisina liase, ne kakhali ese se nabaruma tawe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Enyuma we kimiiko kamakhumi saba ne kiwele mu Babiloni, ndamukanakana enywe mala mukholele niko namusuubisia mala emukobosie engo.”
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sikila manyile kamakhuwa niko namupangila enywe, kali kamakhuwa kamalayi ne se kali ke lie bubi tawe, khumuelesia limenya ne lilieyikina.
Nio mulandanga, mala mwiche musabe ne ese ndamuulila.
Mulambenja mala mulanyoola, mwaba ne mumbenja ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Mulanyoola mala ese ndamukoboselia chikhabi chenywe ne khumubuusia khukhwama mu kholo choosi, ne abuundu oosi niio namuyila mwacha.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ese ndamukobosia murure abuundu niio namuyila mu mbaambe.
Sikila enywe mwalomile muli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhueleesie bang'oosi mu Babiloni.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khuloondekhana no mwami owe lisaaye lia Daudi, ne babaandu boosi bamenyile mu lukoba luno, balebe benywe bakhayilwa nanywe mu mbaambe tawe.
Lola, ndikho mbarumira liie, enjala, ne lufu mala ndabakhola babe nga chinduli chimbi lukali nicho omundu akhanyala alia tawe.
Ndabaloondiakho liie, enjala ne lufu lundi ndabakhola babiilwe ne bubwami bwe sibala sioosi, babe silaamo, babaandu bariisia be khuukwa ne khukhomwa mu kholo choosi nimwo ese nabasalanisiamo.
Ndakhola ndio sikila se barekeeresia kamakhuwa kase niko ese nachiililila khubarumira khubirira khu bakholi base bang'oosi tawe, lundi enywe se mwenya khurekeeresia tawe.
Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enywe be mu mbaambe mweesi nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aarusia Yerusalemu mwacha Babiloni.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Khuloondekhana ne Ahabu okhwa Kolaya ne Sedekia okhwa Maaseya, balikho bang'oola bubeeyi mwisina liase. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndabaana khu mwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni mala Nebukadinesa alabeerera ebweeni wenywe.
Sikila nibo, silaamo sino silarumikhwa ne baambe boosi babaama Yuda bacha Babiloni. Baliloma bali ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhukhola waba nga Sedekia ne Ahabu nibo omwami owa Babiloni ooselia mu mulilo.’
Kakhabe kario sikila bakholile bubwoni mu Isiraeli, bakholile bueeyi ne bakhasi babeene mala balomile kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi niko ese khaabaruma mwisina liase tawe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, niise oomanyile lundi niise owabona.”
Khu Shemaya owa Nehelamu mubooleele kano:
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma kano: Ewe waruma chibarwa mwisina liowo khu baandu boosi baali mu Yerusalemu ne khu Sefania okhwa Maaseya omusaayi ne khu basaayi boosi ne oloma oli,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhukholile ewe khuuba omusaayi mu bweyaangu bwo musaayi Yehoyata, khukhwimeelela enju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khu buli mulala owe siseecha owekhola khuuba omung'oosi ne khubara khu mitalaachi ne khubara khu makosi.
Nono siina sikila ewe ne okharafwiriire Yeremia khukhwama Anatoti oolikho okhung'oola ewe tawe?
Sikila akhurumira efwe likhuwa mu Babiloni ali, ‘Embaambe yenywe elaba endeeyi. Yombakha chinju mumenyemo, lima kimikuunda mala mulie bibiaamo biakio.’ ”
Sefania omusaayi asoma ebarwa yino omung'oosi Yeremia ne arekereesie.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia kamakhuwa kano:
Rumania likhuwa khu baandu be mu mbaambe boosi obaboolele oli, “Khuloondekhana ne Shemaya owa Nehelamu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Shemaya ang'oolile khwinywe ne kakhali ese se namurumire tawe, mala amukholile enywe mwasuubiile bubeeyi.
Khwako ese ndaelesia Shemaya owa Nehelamu ne lisaaye liewe siiukuumo. Se akhabe no mundu yesi yesi mu baandu bano okhamenye abone bulayi nibwo ese khakholele babaandu base tawe, sikila niye aalomaloome ke sileka khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli
aboolela Yeremia ali, “Andika mu sitabu kamakhuwa koosi niko khuboleele.
Lola, chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho ese ndikoboselia babaandu base ba Isiraeli ne Yuda chikhabi, khabakobosie mu sibala nisio naelesia bakuuka babwe, mala bakhasibukule sibe sisiabwe.”
Kano niko kamakhuwa niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma khuloondekhana ne babaandu ba Yuda ne Isiraeli:
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khwauliile bililo bie bireengo,
bililo biriisia; ne kumuleembe se kuliio tawe.
Luno, reeba, mala mubone,
omundu we siseecha anyala asaala omwana?
Nono siina sikila ne mbona buli mundu we siseecha
ne atiililiile enda nga omukhasi olumwa?
Siina sikila buli mundu ne acheleleekhe?
Bona! Endaalo eyo eli emboofu,
se eliio ekiindi nga eng'eneeyo tawe,
sili siise sie bubeeleli khu baandu ba Yakobo,
ne kakhaba kario bakhasikulwe baruremo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Endaalo eyo ne eliola ese ndifunaka lichooki lirure khwikosi khwabwe mala ndikangulula kiminyololo kiabwe. Ne baakwa se balibakhola nibo lundi khuuba bakholi babwe tawe.
Ne kakhali bakhaakholele ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe ne omwami wabwe we lisaaye lia Daudi, niye ese ndira khu ndebe eye bubwami.”
“Ee, baandu ba Yakobo, bakholi base mukharia tawe,
namwe mukheembeelela tawe,
sikila ese khamuonie khukhwama aleeyi,
ne lisaaye lienywe khukhwama mu sibala siabwe sie embaambe.
Mulikobola mube ne kumuleembe ne bulayi
ne mbao olimuriikhirisia enywe tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Sikila ese ndi ne nanywe khumuonia,
Ese ndarusiao elala chikholo choosi nicho namusalanisiamo
ne se khamurusieo enywe elala tawe.
Ese khamuukuume enywe mu bung'ali
ne se khamulekhe busa ne khamuukumile tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela babaandu ali,
“Kamakoonjo kenywe se kaona tawe,
ne buchuuni bwenywe se buwa tawe.
Se aliio omundu omusilikha tawe,
kamalesi ke kamakoonjo kenywe se kaliio tawe.
Lilieyikina lie khuona mbao.
Basiime benywe boosi bamwibiliile,
se benanakho tawe.
Ese namwibuulile nga omusiku,
siiukuumo sienywe siabele sirafu
sikila bubwoni bwenywe buli bukali.
Lundi bumayaanu bwenywe buli bukali.
Mukheloocha sikila buchuuni bwenywe tawe,
Se muli ne busilikhi tawe.
Namuukuuma ndio
sikila bubwoni bwenywe buli bukali
lundi bumayaanu bwenywe buli bukali.
Khwako babaandu boosi bamwibwaakala enywe bakhebwaakalwe
ne basiku benywe boosi, baliyilwa mu mbaame ne bali baboe.
Boosi bamupia siibi, bakhapisibwe siibi,
abo bamuyaaya enywe kimiaandu bakhayaaywe.
Ese khamuonie,
khamuonie kamakoonjo kenywe,
akhaba basiku benywe ne baloma bali,
‘Sayuni lwalamiilwe, mbao olwibaasiakho tawe.’
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khakobosie babaandu base mu sibala siabwe,
mala kholele buli nju siisa.
Yerusalemu lukhombakhwe lundi
akhaba lichipi likhombakhwe lundi.
Babaandu bamenyilemo bakhaafumie mu nyiimbo,
bakhekhoye lukali,
khu khabi chase bakhatasikhe,
chikhabi chase chikhabareerere lukoosi.
Khabakoboseleo kamaani niko baba nako khale,
ne khubemekhela elala,
ne ese khaukuume abo ba baapia siibi boosi.
Omwami wabwe akhabe mulala khu nibo babeene
obamiia nibo okhame mu beene,
ese khamukhole eeche siimbi niio ndi ne mulaanga,
sikila naanu onyala eecha busa omwene ese ne khamulaangile?
Enywe mukhabe babaandu base
ne ese khabe Wele wenywe.”
Lola, embembeesi eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Bukhalafu bwewe bwaboneekhe
sisifuusia sikali sileecha khu mirwe kie babooni.
Lirima lirafu lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se lilakobola enyuma tawe,
khukhwola nga nakhola ne khumala ke lirekekha lie kamebaasio kewe.
Mu ndaalo chichiicha mukhamanye kano bulayi bwene.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Siise silikho sicha nisio
ese ndiba Wele owe Baisiraeli boosi,
ne abo baliba babaandu base.
Mu sichiimi omwo ese nekesia siisa,
khu baandu bakhafwila mwiie tawe.
Nga Baisiraeli ne bayiima siiuluukho,
nababonekhela khukhwama aleeyi,
baandu ba Isiraeli, buli lwosi
namusiima enywe ne busiime bwa mindali
khwako nachiililiile khuuba omusuubilwa khwinywe.
Khamwombakhe lundi.
Lundi mukhabukule chitamburini chenywe
mala mukhine ne mwimba ne khukhwekhoya.
Mukhabiaale lundi kimisabibu khu bikulu bia Samaria,
bamiichi balimiicha mala bekhoyele bibiaamo.
Sikila endaalo eliicha niio baliindi balilangila
