mu sibala sie bikulu sia Efuraimu bali,
‘Yinyokha khuche Sayuni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Yimbila Isiraeli ne busangaafu
ekholo eli emboofu lukali
yimba lulwimbo lwe fuma,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aoniisie babaandu bewe,
aasikuule boosi babarama.’ ”
Lola ndabarusia mu sibala sie bikulu sie ebunaswa,
mala mbabuusie khukhwama mu bibala bie aleeyi lukali,
mu nibo bakhabemo babofu ne baleme,
bakhasi be chinda ne bakhasi balumwa sitube,
bakhakobole ano mu sipupu siboofu.
Baliicha ne balila
ndibarangirira ne liioleelesia ne bakobola
khabakhole bakeendele a njichi che kameechi
khu ngila engololofu niyo bakhetuya tawe,
sikila ese ndi nga paapa khu Isiraeli
ne ekholo eya Efuraimu eli nga omwana wase omubele.
Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, baandu be chikholo,
mala muliboolela buli abuundu mu sibala
loma muli, “Oyo owasalanisia Baisiraeli alababuusia,
ne alabaliinda oli omwaayi ne aliinda kamakheese kewe.”
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asikuule babaandu ba Yakobo
mala abasikuule khukhwama khu baandu be kamaani khubakhila nibo.
Bakheche bembele lukali khu sikulu sia Sayuni
ne bakhasangaalile bulayi bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khu biakhulia, endali ne kamafura, ne kamameeme ne chimoosi
bulamu bwabwe bukhabe nga kumukuunda nikwo bachukhililanga kameechi,
ne se bakhabelesibwe lundi tawe.
Nio bakhaana baliekhoya mu bukhino,
ne basoleeli ne basaakhulu balisangaala
Ese ndikaluukhasia liilila liabwe libe liliekhoya,
khabaoleelesia mala mbaelesie busangaafu mu bweyaangu bwe bubeeleli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khaliisie basaayi biakhulia bikali,
ne babaandu base balinyalikha ne bulayi bwase.”
kumumilo kwauliilikhaniile Rama,
lisooma ne bililo birafu,
Raeli alikho alila babaana bewe,
alobile khuolelesibwa khulwe babaana bewe
sikila se baliio tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lekha khulila,
yeeya kamasika mu moni mwowo,
sikila kimilimo kiowo kilaebwa kumuruungo
ne balikobola khukhwama mu sibala sio musiku.
Lilieyikina mu ndaalo chichiicha liliio,
ne babaana bowo balikobola mu sibala siabwe.
“Nauliile ekholo eya Isiraeli ne lila mu bubeeleli eli,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khwaba nga ekhaafu niyo bakhafundisia tawe
ne kakhali ewe wakhwekesia khuria
khukobosie engo, ne efwe khwerekeekhe khukobola,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.
Sikila enyuma we khukaluukhana khwekanila,
ne enyuma we khukhwekisibwa khwabeelela,
khwaambwa chisoni ne khuchangalaasibwa
sikila khwaba ne bubwoni khukhwama khale.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
“Efuraimu se ali omwana wase omukoosi tawe ku?
Se ali omwana wase niye nasiima tawe ku?
Sikila akhaba ne mulomakho lukali,
njililila khumukhebulila,
khwako kumwoyo kwase kumwekoomba,
ng'ali ndamukholela siisa.
“Ra khu ngila bimanyisio bienywe
yiima engila niyo mwechelakho,
ee, baandu ba Isiraeli, kobola
kobola engo mu ngoba nicho mwalekha.
Mulaayaaya khukhwola liina,
ee, enywe babaandu mukhasuubila tawe?
Nabang'aane sisiindu lundi sikabukhaane,
nga omundu we siikhasi namenyia omundu we siseecha.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Lundi bakharumikhire kamakhuwa kano mu sibala sia Yuda ne mungoba chasio ne malile khubakoboselia bulayi bwabwe. Bakhalome bali,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhubiite ewe chikhabi, ee bumenyo bwe buluungi,
Ee, sikulu sitakatifu!’
Babaandu bakhamenye mu Yuda ne chingoba chasio choosi. Khukhabe ne balimi ne babaayi ne kamatuuli kabwe.
Sikila ese khauluusie baluiliile ne khuliisia be njala biakhulia.
Nio babaandu bakhalome bali, ‘Njiile nakona, oli ninyokha neulila bulayi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho ese nja khutasa be nju eya Isiraeli ne be nju eya Yuda, balasaalana babe bakali lundi bibiaayo biabwe bilasaalana bibe bikali.
Biise biliola nibio, bulayi bwene nga nabaloleelesia khulwe khubarusiao, khubasalanisia, khubakwisia ne khubonaka, ne khureera bumayaanu, akhaba lundi khabaloleleesie khulwe khubombakha ne khubabiaala.
Siise esio ne siicha babaandu se bakhalome bali,
‘Bapaapa baliile chisabibu chindulu
ne kameeno ke babaana kaburuukhe tawe.’
Ne kakhali buli mundu alafwa sikila bubwoni bwewe omwene, ne buli mundu olilia chisabibu chindulu kameeno kewe omwene kaliburukha.”
Se khabe endakaano nga niyo nakhola ne bakuuka babwe nga nabatiila kumukhono nabarusia mu sibala sia Misiri, endakaano yase niyo bafunaka akhaba ese ne naba nga omuseecha wabwe tawe.
Ne kakhali yino eli endakaano niyo ese nja khukhola nende be nju eya Isiraeli enyuma we chindaalo echo. Ese khabaremo lilaka liase mala khaliandike khu miooyo kiabwe. Ese khabe Wele wabwe ne nibo bakhabe babaandu base.
Ne se aliio omundu olieyikia owasie, namwe wandaaye naboola ali, ‘Manya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,’ sikila boosi bakhaamanye ese khukhwamila khu mukeekhe khukhwola khu mukhulu, sikila khababeele bubwoni bwabwe ne se khabukhebulile lundi tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
oanaanga enyanga khulwe buwaanga kumuusi,
ne kumwesi
ne ching'enieesi khulwe buwaanga siilo
ookholanga bibuli bie enyanja ne bioloola,
lisina liewe bali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Bibiindu bibiarebwao bino ne birusibwao,
ne lisaaye lia Isiraeli liosi lirusibwao
se eba lundi ekholo ebweeni wase khulwa mindali tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Likulu liaba ne linyala liakelwa,
ne kumusiingi kwe sibala ne kunyala kwamanyikha,
nono aba ese ndamwaata be lisaaye lia Isiraeli boosi khu koosi niko bakhola.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Chindaalo chilikho chiicha lukoba lucha khwombakhwa lundi khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Lukhombakhwe khukhwama khu ndeleelwa eya Hananeli mumbo khukhwola khu Silibwa sie mu koona.
Ne lulwakha lukhache lwole khu Lukulu lwa Karebu mumbo mala lukobole luche Koa.
Litooma lioosi lie baafu ne likokhe ne kimikuunda kioosi khukhwola khu sinoko sia Kitironi khu koona eye silibwa sie Farasi ebukwe, bilaba bitakatifu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Se bilatechulwa namwe bionakwe lundi tawe.”

Siise esio banamae bo mwami owa Babiloni baaba bebwakaale Yerusalemu, ne omung'oosi Yeremia aba ekaliliilwe mu luya lwe bubwami lulwaba mu lichipi lio mwami owa Yuda.
Omwami Sedekia aba aboyile Yeremia ebweeneyo ne areeba ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne ong'oola oli: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ese ndikho mbaana lukoba luno khu mwami owa Babiloni mala alalutiila.
Sedekia omwami owa Yuda se alebacha arure mu makhono ke Bakalitayo tawe, ne kakhali ng'ali alaanwa mu makhono ko mwami owa Babiloni, mala alalomaloma naye moni na moni ne amuloleleele.
Lundi alabukula Sedekia amuyile e Babiloni mala alamenya ebweeneyo khukhwola nga ndibonana naye. Sedekia akhapana ne Bakalidayo se alabaula tawe.’ ”
Yeremia aloma ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela niye ali,
“Lola Hanameli okhwa raraao Shalumu alecha khwiwe mala akhuboolele ali, ‘Kula kumukuunda kwase kuuli e Anatoti sikila niwe okhoyela khukusikula khulwe khukukula.’ ”
Nio wandaaye owa Yeremia Hanameli aamwichakho khu luuya lwe baliindi khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala amuboolela ali, “Kula kumukuunda kwase kuuli e Anatoti mu sibala sia Benjamini sikila ewe niwe oli ne bung'ali bwe khukusikula, kukule.” Nio Yeremia amanya ali lino liaba likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu niye.
Ne Yeremia akula kumukuunda okwo e Anatoti khukhwama khu Hanameli wandaaye. Yeremia amubalila chirupia bukusi bubwola bitonyi bie efwesa likhumi na saba.
Khwafukiilisiana, narakho kumukhono, nanyoola baloli namubalila chirupia chichenyibwa.
Nio nabukula chibarwa chombi che lifukiilisiana che likulaana, chilimo kamakhuwa kaloondekhana ne kumukuunda, ne ndala khwiyo yaba embambule.
Nakaanisia chibarwa che likulaana khu Baruku okhwa Neria, omwichukhulu owa Maiseya. Nakhola ndio mu moni cha Hanameli wandaayase ne mu moni che baloli babara kamakhono kabwe khu likulaana lienelio, ebweeni we babaandu ba Yuda boosi ba baaba ne bekhale mu luuya lwo mulindi.
Yeremia alaka Baruku mu moni chabwe ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Bukula chibarwa che likulaana chombi, niyo bafuumile ne eli khwasie mala ochire mu nyuungu eye liloba chibemo siise sileeyi.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali: Chinju ne kimikuunda ne kimikuunda kie kimisabibu kikhakulwe lundi mu sibala sino.’ ”
Enyuma wa Yeremia khukhwakanisia Baruku okhwa Neria chibarwa che likulaana, asaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu makhuwa kano:
“Ee, Omwami WELE, ewe niwe owabuumba likulu ne liloba khulwe bunyali bwowo bukali ne kamaani! Se siliio sisiindu siiandalafu khwiwe tawe.
Ewe wekesianga busiime bwa busiele khu baandu bakali, lundi oelesianga babaana siiukuumo khulwe bubwoni bwe baraara babwe. Ewe, oli Wele omukali lundi owe bunyali, lisina liowo lili Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
oli omukali owe likaambila, lundi owe bunyali mu bikholwa. Obonanga chingila choosi che babaandu. Oanaanga kumuruuru khu buli mundu khuloondekhana ne chingila chewe ne bikholwa biewe.
Mu ndaalo echo ewe wekesia kamayia nende bie liukia mu sibala sia Misiri, ne mu ndaalo chino osichiililila khukhwekesia kamayia mu Isiraeli ne mu baandu babaandi boosi, nio wamanyikhana buli abuundu.
Ewe warusia babaandu bowo Baisiraeli mu sibala sia Misiri ne kamayia nende ke liukia ne bunyali bwowo ne kamaani ne liriisia likali,
mala wabaelesia sibala nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetikhanga sino, nisio wasuubisia khuelesia bakuuka babwe.
Nio bengisia mala basibukula siaba sisiabwe. Ne kakhali se baria Lilaka liowo namwe bamenya ne buuri tawe. Se bakholakho sisiindu siosi siosi khu niko ewe wabalaka bakhole tawe. Khwako ewe wakholile butinyu buno bwoosi khubechakho.
“Bakalitayo babotookhelela lukoba benya khu luamba, balikho balwibwaakala. Liie, enjala ne lufu bilakila lukoba lukwe mu makhono ko musiku. Olabona oli koosi niko olomile kekholekhe.
Ne kakhaba kario ewe Omwami WELE wamboleele ese oli, ‘Kula kumukuunda khu rupia mala obe ne baloli akhaba lukoba luno ne luli siimbi khuambwa ne Bakalitayo.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Lola, ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe babaandu boosi. Mbao sisiindu siosi siosi siili siiandalafu khwise tawe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali: ‘Lola ese ndikho mbelesia lukoba luno khu Bakalitayo ne khu Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni mala alalubukula.
Bakalitayo balikho bapana ne Yerusalemu balecha baluambie kumulilo mala balwosie. Balosia akhaba ne chinju nicho babaandu boseliangamo biiunya kumuuya kumulayi khu Baali ne biianwa bie khunywa bibiachukhwa khulwe bawele babaandi khukhumbambia ese lirima.
Kalaba kario babaandu ba Isiraeli ne ba Yuda se bakholile sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, ne kakhali bumayaanu ebweeni wase, khukhwama khale.
Lukoba luno lwambambiisie lirima ne bukhalafu khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo lwombakhilwakho khukhwola khu ndaalo yino. Khwako ndalurusia mu moni mwase.
Ndakhola ndio sikila bumayaanu bwe babaandu ba Isiraeli ne ba Yuda nibwo bakhola alala ne babaami babwe, babemeelesi, basaayi ne bang'oosi khukhumbambia ese lirima.
Bandekelesia ne se bandekeeresia tawe. Nakhaba ne nachiililila khubasomia, se barekeeresia banyoola liliekesia tawe.
Bang'oona sisiindu sisinyisia ese mala basira munju yase khukifwolobia.
Bombakhila wele Baali abuundu aesuta mu litooma lia okhwa Hinomu, khuanilao babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana nga chimbosio khu wele Moleki, akhaba ese ne khabalaka tawe lundi se liaba mu mebaasio kase ndi bakhole lilisinyisia lino bario tawe, khukhola babaandu ba Yuda bakhole bubwoni.’ ”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma khu lukoba nilwo enywe mulomakho luno muli, “Lwaelesiibwe khu mwami owa Babiloni mungila eye liie, enjala ne lufu,”
lola ese ndababuusia alala khukhwama mu bibala bioosi nibio nabasalanisiamo mu lirima ne bukhalafu bwase ne burafu bukali. Ese khabakobosie abuundu ano mala mbakhole bamenye mu muleembe.
Bakhabe babaandu base ne ese khabe Wele wabwe.
Ese khabaelesie kumwoyo mulala ne ngila ndala mala bandie ese mindali na mindali khulwe bulayi bwabwe babeene, ne bwe babaana babwe akhaba babene ne bafwa.
Ese khakhole ne nabo endakaano eya mindali eloma eli se khalekhekho khubakholela bulayi tawe. Ne ndibakhola bandie nio bakhakhola bario banjanjukha lundi tawe.
Ese khekhoyele khubakholela bulayi mala khabakhole bamenyele elala mu sibala sino mu busuubili ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Bulayi bwene nga ne nareriire lilionaka likali lino lioosi khu baandu bano, khabareerere busa ndio bulayi bwoosi nibwo nabasuubisia.
Kimikuunda kikhakulwe mu sibala sino nisio enywe mulikho muloma muli, sianjuukhwe, omundu se alimo namwe esaang'i tawe, muli siaelesibwa Bakalitayo.
Kimikuunda kilakulwa chirupia, chibarwa che lifukiilisiana chikhaandikisibwe ne khureebwakho kamakhono ne khuba ne buloli, mu sibala sia Benjamini, siimbi Yerusalemu, mu ngoba cha Yuda, mu ngoba che mu sibala sie bikulu, mu ngoba cha Shefela ne mu ngoba che ebunafubo owa Yuda. Kakhabe kario sikila ese khakobosiele babaandu chikhabi chabwe.”

Nga Yeremia ne aaba ne asiili mu siboe mu luuya lwo muliindi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela lwe khabili ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabaang'ana sibala aasikhola siaaba nga sili, oolaangwa bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aloma ali,
‘Nange, ne ndakhukobosia mala khuboolele bibiindu biboofu bibiakukhuulilwa nibio ewe okhamanyile tawe.
Sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma kano: Khuloondekhana ne chinju cha Yerusalemu ne chinju che babaami ba Yuda, chikhatechulwe sikila khukhwibuulilwa ne liie.
Bakalidayo balikho becha khu khuupana ne khukhwira babaandu bakali, nibo ese ndeera ne mbambiilwe lirima ne bukhalafu. Ndakhola ndio sikila nafutariire babaandu be lukoba luno sikila bumayaanu bwabwe.
Lola ndabareerera bulamu ne busilikhi, mala ndabasilikha ne khubaelesia kimiaandu ne kumuleembe.
Khakoboselie babaandu ba Yuda nende ba Isiraeli kimiaandu kiabwe mala mbombakhe babe nga baaba khale.
Khabasiinge mbakhwalaasie khukhwama mu bwoni bwabwe nibwo bakholela ese, lundi ese ndababeela bubwoni bwabwe ne sileka siabwe khwise.
Ne Yerusalemu lulaba khwise lukoba lwe khoyo, efuma ne luyali ebweeni wase, buli kholo mu sibala ekhareenge ne khuterema nga ekhaulile kamalayi niko kholeele babaandu ba Yerusalemu ne kimiaandu nikio khaelesie lukoba luno.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu balikho baloma bali abuundu ano ali nga sichiimi, bali se aliio omundu namwe esaang'i emenyile ano tawe mala baloma ng'ali, chingoba cha Yuda ne chingila cha Yerusalemu omundu namwe esaang'i selikho tawe. Ne kakhali mukhaulile lundi
kimimilo kie khoyo ne busangaafu ne kimimilo kie liliekhoya lie siselelo kikhaulilikhemo. Kimimilo kiaabo babemba ne bareera biianwa bie khusiima mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne baloma bali,
‘Siima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omulayi
sikila busiime buli bwa mindali na mindali!’
Khakhole sibala sino siindiaale nga ne siaba khale. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sibala sili nga sisiangalaamwe sino siikhalimo omundu namwe saang'i tawe, khukhabemo lundi ne kamaayilwe niio babaayi baaya kamakheese kabwe.
Babaayi lundi balabala bibiaayo biabwe mu ngoba che sibala sie bikulu, mu ngoba cha Shefela ne mu ngoba cha Nekebu mu sibala sia Benjamini, birekere bia Yerusalemu, ne chingoba cha Yuda. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile”
Siise esio ese ndirobora omwami omuluungi khukhwama mu lisaaye lia Daudi. Omwami oyo alikhalaka bung'ali ne buluungi mu sibala.
Mu ndaalo echo bamenywa ba Yuda balionisibwa ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu baliliindwa bulayi. Ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lulilaangwa lisina bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali buluungi bwefwe.’
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lisaaye lia Daudi se lilitamba omundu owikhala khu ndebe eye bubwami bwenju eya Isiraeli tawe.
Ne lisaaye lia Lawi se lilitamba oaana biianwa bie khukhwosia, biianwa bie biakhulia ne chimbosio ebweeni wase khulwa mindali tawe.”
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
mwaba ne munyala khufunaka endakaano yase eye kumuusi nende eye siilo nio kumuusi ne siilo bikhabao mu siise siabio sisiaroborwa tawe,
nono aba akhaba endakaano yase ne Daudi omukholi wase yosi enyala khufunakwa nio akhabao omwana khu be lisaaye liewe oliikhala khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami amiie tawe. Akhaba lundi se munyala khufunaka endakaano yase eye basaayi be nju eya Lawi bakholi base tawe.
Ndakhola lisaaye lio mukholi wase Daudi ne lisaaye lie basaayi balawi lisaalane litasikhe mala babe bakali nga ching'enieesi namwe kumuyekhe kwe munyanja.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Ewe se warekeeresie niko babaandu bano balikho baloma bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alobile chinju chibili cha Isiraeli ne Yuda nicho arobora tawe?’ Khwako balekeleesie babaandu base ne luno se bali ekholo ebweeni wabwe lundi tawe.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Naaba ne khakhola endakaano yase eye kumuusi ne siilo, ne kamalaka ke mwikulu ne sibala tawe,
aba khalobe be lisaaye lia Yakobo ne lisaaye lia Daudi omukholi wase ne se ndirobora omundu mube lisaaye liewe amiie lisaaye lia Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo tawe. Kali kario sikila ese khakoboselie babaandu base kimiaandu mala mbakholeele siisa.”

“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, khoche olomalome khu Sedekia omwami owa Yuda mala omuboolele oli ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lola ese ndikho nja khuaana lukoba luno khu mwami owa Babiloni mala alalwosia.
Ewe se olamwibacha tawe ne kakhali ng'ali okhaambwe ne khuaanwa khu niye. Okhabonane no mwami owa Babiloni moni na moni ne khulomaloma naye mala okhache Babiloni.’
Ne kakhaba kario Ee, Sedekia omwami owa Yuda, ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khuloondekhana nawe ali: Ewe se okheererwe mwiie tawe.
Ewe okhafwe mu muleembe. Ne nga boselia bakuuka biiunya bulayi ne babasiikha ba baaba babaami ewe ne osiili khuba, akhaba ewe wesi babaandu bakhakhwoselie biiunya bulayi. Ne khu khusooma ne baloma bali ‘Ee! Omwami wefwe aafwiile!’ Sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomaloome likhuwa lino.”
Nio Yeremia omung'oosi, aboolela Sedekia omwami owa Yuda kamakhuwa kano koosi mu Yerusalemu.
Siise nisio banamae bo mwami owa Babiloni baba ne balikho bapana ne babaandu be mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu ne be mu ngoba cha Yuda choosi chichaba ne charama, chingoba cha Lakishi ne cha Aseka. Chingoba chibili chino nicho chong'ene chichaba ne charama mu Yuda khu ngoba chisire.
Omwami Sedekia aba akholile endakaano ne babaandu be mu Yerusalemu boosi khulangilila bulekhuule bwabwe.
Endakaano yaloma eli buli mundu enyekha alekhuule nasioobi bewe Baeburania be siseecha nende be siikhasi nio akhabao omundu yesi yesi okhola Omueburania wasie khuuba nasioobi tawe.
Nio babaandu ne babemeelesi babwe bafukiilila khulekhuula nasioobi babwe mala lundi bakhabakho ne nasioobi tawe. Nio bafukiilila khulekhuula nasioobi.
Ne kakhali enyuma wako bakaluukhana mala bakobosia nasioobi babwe be siseecha ne be siikhasi nibo balekhuula, mala babareera mu bunyali bwabwe nga nasioobi.
Enyuma wako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi, nakhola endakaano ne bakuuka benywe nga nabarusia mu sibala sia Misiri, munju eye bunasioobi. Naloma ndi,
‘Enyuma we kimiiko sita buli mulala khwinywe akhoya alekhuule Omueburania wasie owakusibwa khwiwe nga nasioobi mala akhukholeele kimilimo kimiiko sita. Okhoya omulekhuule, arure khu milimo kiowo.’ Ne kakhali bakuuka benywe se bandekeeresia namwe bambulila tawe.
Enywe mwekanile embi ari busa mala mwakhola kali ka ng'ali mu moni mwase khulwe khulangilila bulekhuule, buli omundu aboolela owase, mala mwakhola endakaano ebweeni wase mu Lukaangu lwase.
Ne kakhali luno enywe mwakaluukhane mala mwafwolobie lisina liase nga buli mulala khwinywe ne akoboosie nasioobi wewe owe siseecha nende owe siikhasi nibo mwaba ne mwalekhuula khuloondekhana ne liliekoomba liabwe. Ne mwabakoboosie mu bunyali bwenywe babe lundi nasioobi benywe.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Enywe se mwandire ese khulwe khulangilila bulekhuule, buli mundu khu wandaaye ne khu wasie tawe. Lola ese ndalaangilila khwinywe bulekhuule bwe liie, bwe lufu, nende bwe njala. Khamukhole mubiilwe ne bubwami bwe khu sibala bwoosi.
Ne babaandu babafunaka endakaano yase, mala se baliinda ke ndakaano niyo bakhola ebweeni wase tawe, ndabakhola babe nga emoosi niyo babeene batonya mu bitonyi bibili mala babirira akari we bitonyi ebio.
Babaandu bano bali babemeelesi ba Yuda, babemeelesi ba Yerusalemu, bakholi, basaayi ne babaandu boosi be mu sibala bababira akari we bitonyi bie moosi.
Ne ese ndabaana mu bunyali bwe basiku babwe ne nabo babenya khubeera. Kimibili kiabwe kilaba siakhulia sie chinyuni ne chisaang'i ne chisolo.
Ne ndaana Sedekia omwami owa Yuda ne babemeelesi bewe khu basiku babwe, ne khwaabo bayiima khubeera. Ndabaelesia banamae ba Babiloni barekukhe balekha khumwibwaka.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Lola ndalaka, mala ndabakobosia mu lukoba luno mala balalwibwaakala, mala baluambe ne khulwosia. Ndakhola chingoba cha Yuda chanjukhwe chibe busa nga sisiangalaamwe nisio omundu yesi yesi akhamenyamo tawe. Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”

“Cha khu be nju eya Rekabi mala olomalome ne nabo. Nomalile, bareere mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, obengisie mu lusiro lulalakho, mala obaelesie endali banywe.”
Nio Yeremia abukula Yaasania okhwa Yeremia (Yeremia aba okhwa Habasinia) ne bawandaaye, alala ne basoleeli bewe boosi ne be nju eya Rekabi boosi.
Abareera munju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lusiro lwe babaana ba Hanani (Hanani aba okhwa Ikidalia). Hanani aba omundu owa Wele. Lusiro olwo lwaba siimbi ne lusiro lwe babemeelesi, lundi lwaba angaaki we lusiro lwa Maaseya okhwa Shalumu, omuliindi we abuundu e khuulila.
Nio Yeremia abukula bikoombe ne bibuumba bibichuule endali ara ebweeni we Barekabi mala ababoolela ali, “Nywa endali yino.”
Ne kakhali Barekabi bakobosia Yeremia bali, “Efwe se khulanywa endali yosi yosi tawe, sikila Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu kuuka wefwe akhulaka ali, ‘Enywe mukhanywakho endali namwe basoleeli benywe tawe khulwa mindali na mindali.
Mukhombakha chinju namwe mukhamiicha tawe, mukhabiaala namwe mwaba ne liruuti lie kimisabibu tawe. Ne kakhali mulamenya mu maeema mu ndaalo che bulamu bwenywe choosi nio mumenye chindaalo chingali mu sibala nisio mwaramamo nga bakwa.’
Efwe khwaria lilaka lia kuuka wefwe Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu, khu koosi niko akhulaka, ali efwe, bakhasi befwe, basoleeli befwe ne bakhaana befwe khukhanywakho endali mu ndaalo che bulamu bwefwe choosi tawe.
Lundi khukhombakha chinju che khumenyamo tawe. Se khuli ne kimikuunda kie kimisabibu namwe kimikuunda kie khulima tawe.
Ne kakhali khwamenya mu maeema mala khwaria ne khukhola koosi niko Yonatabu paapa wefwe akhulaka.
Ne kakhali nga Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni ne ebwaakala sibala siefwe khwaloma khuli, ‘Yiicha khuche e Yerusalemu sikila khwariire banamae be Bakalitayo ne banamae ba Shamu.’ Niko kakila ne khumenyile mu Yerusalemu muno.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia kamakhuwa kano:
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi, “Cha mala oboolele babaandu ba Yuda ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu oli enywe se mukana khukhwekesibwa mala murie kamakhuwa kase tawe?
Lilaka nilio Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu alaka basoleeli bewe ali bakhanywakho endali tawe, lialiindwa mala khukhwola endaalo eya luno, se banywechanga endali tawe. Kali kario sikila baria lilaka lia kuuka wabwe. Ese namubooleele ne nilamo ne se mwandekeresiisie tawe.
Nachiililila khubarumira enywe bakholi base bang'oosi ne muboolela ndi, ‘Kaluukhana luno buli mundu khukhwama khu liba liewe limayaanu, mala mung'oone bikholwa bienywe ne mukhaloonda bawele babaandi mwabakholela ne khubasaaya tawe. Mwakhola murio mulamenya mu sibala nisio namuelesia enywe ne bakuuka benywe.’ Ne kakhali enywe se mwarekeeresia namwe mwambulila tawe.
Be nju eya Yonatabu, (Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu) baliindile lilaka nilio kuuka wabwe abaelesia, ne kakhali enywe baandu base se mwandiire ese tawe.
Khwako ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi, ‘Lola ndikho ndeera khu Yuda, ne khubamenywa ba Yerusalemu bubwonoki bwoosi nibwo naloma khubareerera. Kalaba kario sikila nalomaloma khu nibo mala se barekeeresia tawe, lundi nabalanga ne se bangobosia tawe.’ ”
Ne Yeremia aboolela be nju eya Rekabu ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Sikila enywe mwariire lilaka lia kuuka wenywe Yonatabu mala mwakholile koosi niko amulaka,
khwako ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi omundu se alitamba mu be lisaaye lia Yonatabu okhwa Rekabu oliikholela ese tawe.’ ”

“Bukula sitabu mala oandikemo kamakhuwa koosi niko ese khuboleele khuloondekhana ne Yuda ne Isiraeli ne chikholo choosi. Andika buli siindu nisio khuboleele khukhwama khale mu ndaalo nicho Yosia abeelakho omwami khukhwola luno.
Khola orio nio wakana babaandu ba Yuda baulile kamabi koosi niko nenya khubakhola wakana buli mundu alekha liba liewe limayaanu mala ese mbabeele bumayaanu ne bubwoni bwabwe.”
Nio Yeremia alanga Baruku okhwa Neria, mala amuboolela koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne amuboleele. Baruku akaandika koosi mu sitabu nga Yeremia amuboolelanga.
Ne Yeremia aboolela Baruku ali, “Ese nakhingiliilwe khukhwingila mu Lukaangu.
Nono ewe olacha, mala khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye khukhweyimana khulia, osomele mu Lukaangu kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko khuboleele waandika, babaandu boosi ne barekeeresie. Akhaba lundi okhasomele babaandu ba Yuda barurire mu ngoba chabwe.
Khola orio nio wakana basaba mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulila lundi wakana buli omundu alekha liba liewe limayaanu, sikila lirima ne bukhalafu nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile khu baandu bano buli bukali.”
Nio Baruku okhwa Neria akhola koosi bulayi bwene nga omung'oosi Yeremia ne aba namulakilisie. Asomela mu Lukaangu kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khukhwama mu sitabu.
Mu mwiiko kukhola kharaano kwa Yehoyakimu okhwa Yosia nga omwami owa Yuda, mu mweesi kwa tisa, babaandu boosi mu Yerusalemu ne babaandu boosi babarama mu ngoba cha Yuda bacha Yerusalemu balangiliila lilieyimana ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Baruku asoma kamakhuwa ka Yeremia khukhwama mu sitabu. Asomela mu Lukaangu, mu lusiro lwa Kemaria okhwa Siafani, (Siafani aba omuandiki we mu luuya lwo mwami.) Lusiro olwo lwaba khu luuya luboofu, abwingililo bwe silibwa siyia sienju ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Baruku asoma kamakhuwa kano babaandu boosi ne barekeeresie.
Nga Mikaya okhwa Kemaria, omwichukhulu owa Siafani, aulila kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi koosi khukhwama mu sitabu,
ekha acha munju yo mwami mu lusiro lwo muandiki, ne babemeelesi boosi baba bekhaale mumwenomu. Baaba Elisiama omuandiki, Delaya okhwa Shemaya, Elinatani okhwa Akibori, Kemaria okhwa Siafani, Sedekia okhwa Hanania ne babemeelesi boosi.
Nio Mikaya ababoolela kamakhuwa koosi niko aba ne nauliile Baruku ne asoma sitabu babaandu boosi ne barekeeresie.
Nio babemeelesi boosi baruma Yehuti okhwa Netania (Netania aba okhwa Selemia, ne Selemia aba okhwa Kushi) aboolele Baruku ali, “Bukula sitabu nisio osomeele babaandu mala wiche.” Nio Baruku okhwa Neria abukula sitabu mala acha niio babemeelesi baba.
Bamuboolela bali, “Yikhala asi mala okhusomele.” Nio Baruku abasomela.
Nga baulila kamakhuwa koosi, balolana buli omundu khu wasie mala baba ne buri. Nio baboolela Baruku bali, “Khukhwola khuboolele omwami kamakhuwa kano koosi.”
Nio bareeba Baruku bali, “Khuboolele, oandike oriena kamakhuwa kano koosi? Yeremia niye okhuboolelenge ne ewe oandika?”
Baruku abakobosia ali, “Yee amboolelenge kamakhuwa kano koosi ne ese ngaandika ne bubwino mu sitabu.”
Nio babemeelesi baboolela Baruku bali, “Cha mala mwekise, ewe ne Yeremia ne omundu yesi yesi akhamanya niio muli tawe.”
Nio babemeelesi bacha khu luuya niio omwami aba. Baaba babikhile sitabu mu lusiro lwa Elisiama, omuandiki, mala baboolela omwami kamakhuwa koosi.
Nio omwami aruma Yehuti khureera sitabu, mala asibukula khukhwama mu lusiro mwa Elisiama omuandiki. Yehuti asomela omwami ne babemeelesi boosi ba baaba ne bemile ne khubotookhelela omwami.
Kwaba kumwesi kwa tisa ne omwami aba ekhaale munju eye siise sie kumunaane ne kumulilo kwe kamaanda kwaba ebweeni wewe.
Nga Yehuti ne asomanga buli chikaratasi chitaru namwe chine mu sitabu, omwami achikhalanga ne kumubano kumufumba, mala achimwaata mu mulilo, khukhwola nga sitabu sioosi ne siaya siawa.
Ne kakhaba kario, omwami namwe mulala khu bakholi bewe babaulila kamakhuwa kano koosi, se baria namwe se bekesiakho liliekanila tawe.
Elinatani ne Tetaya ne Kemaria bekoonjelela omwami akhosia sitabu tawe, ne se arekeeresia tawe.
Nio omwami alaka Yeraimeeli, omusoleeli wewe, ne Seraya okhwa Asirieli ne Shelemia okhwa Abuteeli baambe Baruku omuandiki owa Yeremia no mung'oosi Yeremia omwene, ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abakisa.
Enyuma wo mwami Yehoyakimu khukhwosia sitabu sie kamakhuwa niko Yeremia aboolanga ne Baruku aandika, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Bukula sitabu sisiindi mala oandikemo kamakhuwa koosi kakabeele mu sitabu sie khunyoa, nisio Yehoyakimu omwami owa Yuda osiisie esio.
Ne khu Yehoyakimu omwami owa Yuda loma oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ewe wosiisie sitabu sino noloma oli, siina sikila noandikemo oli omwami owa Babiloni ng'ali alecha onake sibala sino, mala eere babaandu ne chisaang'i chasio?
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali khuloondekhana ne Yehoyakimu omwami owa Yuda, mbao omundu khu be lisaaye liewe olila khu bwami bwa Daudi tawe. Yehoyakimu akheerwe mala kumubili kwewe kubakalwe khu muumu ne mu bunyifu bwe siilo.
Ne ese khamuelesie niye siiukuumo alala ne lisaaye liewe ne bakholi bewe khulwe butinyu bwabwe. Khabareerere busiku bwoosi nibwo naloma khu baandu ba Yuda, khu bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, ne se bambulila tawe.’ ”
Nio Yeremia abukula sitabu sisiindi aelesia Baruku omuandiki, okhwa Neria. Yeremia amuboolelanga kamakhuwa koosi kakaba mu sitabu nisio Yehoyakimu omwami owa Yuda aba ne osiisie, mala atasakho kakaandi kamakali kafwaanana ne nako, mala Baruku aandika.

Ne kakhali Sedekia ne bakholi bewe ne babaandu bewe se barekeeresia kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko ababoolela khubirira khu mung'oosi Yeremia tawe.
Omwami Sedekia aruma Yehukali okhwa Shelemia no musaayi Sefania, okhwa Maaseya khu mung'oosi Yeremia bamuboolele bali, “Khusabile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe.”
Siise esio Yeremia aba asiili khubowa tawe, aba omulekhuule khukeenda mu baandu.
Banamae ba Babiloni baba babotookheleesie Yerusalemu, ne nga baulila bali banamae ba Misiri baambukhe kumupaka, se bacha ebweeni lundi tawe.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela omung'oosi Yeremia ali,
“Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi, ewe boolela omwami owa Yuda okhurumire usabe oli, ‘Banamae ba Farao bechile khumuabina bali siimbi khukobola e Misiri mu sibala siabwe.
Ne Bakalitayo balakobola bapane ne babaandu be lukoba luno. Balaluamba mala balwosie.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, mukhebea mwabene ne muloma muli, “Ng'ali Bakalitayo bachiliile elala tawe, sikila balakobola.
Ne mwakhaba ne muula banamae boosi be Bakalitayo balikho bamupania, mala barame baumiie bong'ene, buli mundu akone mu liiema liewe, babaandu abo balenyokha mala bosie lukoba luno.’ ”
Nga banamae be Bakalitayo ne babona banamae ba Farao ne bembiya, Bakalitayo barura mu Yerusalemu.
Yeremia acha mu sibala sie Babenjamini khunyoola kumukabwa kwewe kwe kimiaandu ebweeneyo, mu baandu bewe.
Nga ne aaba nali asilibwa sia Benjamini omwimeelesi we banamae owalaangwa bali Iriya okhwa Shelemia, omwichukhulu owa Hanania amuaamba ne aloma ali, “Ewe olikho wenya khuyeeta Bababiloni.”
Ne Yeremia amukobosia ali, “Bubeeyi, ese se ndikho njeeta Bababiloni tawe.” Ne Iriya se amurekeeresia tawe ne kakhali amuaamba mala amuyila khu bemeelesi.
Babemeelesi bakhalalila Yeremia lukali, bamupa mala bamura mu siboe munju eya Yonasani omuandiki, sikila bakikhola nga enju eye siboe.
Yeremia abowa mu sikoro munju eye siboe mala amenyamo khulwe chindaalo chingali.
Enyuma wako omwami Sedekia arumania bamureerere Yeremia, mala amwakaanila. Omwami amuyila munju mwewe mala amureeba mu bwikisi ali, “Burume bwosi bwosi bulikhoo khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?”
Yeremia amukobosia ali, “Yee buliio.” Mala amuboolela ali, “Ewe okhaambwe ne omwami owa Babiloni.”
Ne lundi Yeremia areeba omwami Sedekia ali, “Siina siibi nisio ese khukholeele ewe ne babemeelesi bowo namwe babaandu bano nio wanda ese mu siboe?
Bang'oosi bowo babakhung'oolelanga ewe ne baloma bali, ‘omwami owa Babiloni se alakhwibwaakala ewe namwe sibala sino tawe,’ bali waena?
Nono ulila, khusaba omwami, liliikoonjelela liase lie lilieboombia likhoya likhwolele mala okhangobosia munju eya Yonasani omuandiki tawe, ne busa khola ndio nafwilamo.”
Nio omwami Sedekia aana kamalaka, mala Yeremia abowa khu luuya lwo muliindi we lichipi mala bamuelesianga kumukaati mulala buli endaalo khukhwama munju eye kimikaati. Bakhola bario khukhwola nga kimikaati kie mu lukoba ne kiawa. Ne Yeremia achiililila khumenya mu luuya lwo muliindi we lichipi.

Nono Shefatia okhwa Matani, Ketalia okhwa Pashihuri, Yukali okhwa Shelemia ne Pashihuri okhwa Kwini, baulila koosi niko Yeremia aboolela babaandu boosi ali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, omundu olarama mu lukoba luno akhafwiile mwiie, namwe afwe enjala nga ta lufu, ne kakhali oyo oweana khu Bababiloni alaona. Alakhaka khuonia bulamu bwewe mala amenye.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, lukoba luno ng'ali lulaanwa khu banamae bo mwami owe Babiloni mala lulaambwa.”
Nio babemeelesi baboolela omwami bali, “Lekha omundu yuno erwe sikila alikho amala kamaani mu banamae babarama mu lukoba luno, ne mu baandu boosi khulwe khubaboolela kamakhuwa nga kano kari. Omundu yuno se ayiima kamalayi khu baandu bano tawe, ne kakhali abayimila busiku.”
Omwami Sedekia abakobosia ali, “Lola ali mu bunyali bwenywe, sikila ese se nyala namukholela enywe kamabi tawe.”
Khwako babukula Yeremia bamuboa kimikoye bamwikhisia mwiloo lie kameechi lia Kwini, omusoleeli wo mwami liliaba khu luya lwe lichipi. Nio bekhisilia Yeremia mwiloo elio khu mikoye. Liloo liaba liatenya ne kakhali kamatosi kabamo, mala Yeremia eyinikha mu matosi.
Ebetimeleki omukholi, omuchili khukhwama Kushi owaba munju yo mwami aulila bali bamwaatile Yeremia mwiloo. Siise esio omwami aba akhosia ekesi mu silibwa sia Benjamini.
Ebetimeleki arura munju yo mwami acha aboolela omwami ali,
“Omwami babaandu bano bakholile bumayaanu koosi niko bakholile khu mung'oosi Yeremia khulwe khumwikhisia mwiloo mala enjala elamwiriramo sikila kumukaati se kwaramirekho mu lukoba luno tawe.”
Nio omwami alaka Ebetimeleki omukushi ali, “Bukula ano babaandu bataru muche mukhweese omung'oosi Yeremia mumurusie enje nakhafwa tawe.”
Nio Ebetimeleki abukula babaandu bataru acha nabo munju yo mwami, engila mu kabati eye chingubo mala abukulamo chingubo chichatabukha. Alarira khu mikoye mala ekhisilia Yeremia mwiloo.
Nio Ebetimeleki Omukushi aboolela Yeremia ali, “Bukula chingubo echo ne kimikoye ore mukhwaa mwowo” Mala Yeremia akhola ario.
Nio bakhweesa Yeremia bamurusia mwiloo lie kameechi. Nio Yeremia arama khu luuya lwe lichipi lwe baliindi.
Omwami Sedekia arumania balanga omung'oosi Yeremia, nio amwakaanila amuliango kwe khataru kwe Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omwami aboolela Yeremia ali, “Ndakhureeba lireeba mala okhangisakho sisiindu tawe.”
Yeremia akobosia Sedekia ali, “Nakhuboolela bung'ali, ewe seunjira? Ne nakha khukaambila, ewe se olandekeeresia tawe.”
Nio omwami Sedekia, echubila Yeremia mu bwikisi ali, “Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali, owabuumba kimiooyo kiefwe, se ndakhwira namwe khuaane khu baandu babenya khukhwira bano tawe.”
Nio Yeremia aboolela Sedekia ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe banamae, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Waaba noleaana khu bemeelesi bo mwami owa Babiloni, aba olaonia bulamu bwowo, ne lukoba luno se lulosibwa tawe, ne ewe ne be nju bowo mulaona.
Ne kakhali waaba nokheaana khu bemeelesi bo mwami owa Babiloni tawe, nio aba lukoba luno lulaanwa khu Bababiloni mala balalwosia ne ewe solabebachakho tawe.’ ”
Omwami Sedekia akobosia Yeremia ali, “Ese nariire Baeburania baambanile ne Bababiloni, khola ndio naanwa khu nibo mala banjekheelela.”
Yeremia amuboolela ali, “Se olaanwa khu nibo tawe. Luno ria kamakhuwa ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niko khuboolela ne olaba bulayi mala olaona.
Ne kakhali waaba noloba khukhwilekhuula, kano niko kamalola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjekesie,
lola bakhasi balekhilwe munju yo mwami owa Yuda balikho barusibwa bayilwa khu bemeelesi bo mwami owa Babiloni mala bakhasi chana balikho baloma bali,
‘Omwami, basaale bowo basuubilwa bakhubeyile
mala bakhuulile luno bikele biowo biesikhile mu lutoondoyi,
nono bakhwanjukhe ao.’ ”
Yeremia aatasakho ali, “Bakhasi bowo boosi ne basoleeli balatiilwa bayilwe khu Bakalitayo ne ewe se olibebachakho tawe, ne kakhali olatiilwa no mwami owa Babiloni mala lukoba luno lulosibwa.”
Nio Sedekia akobosia Yeremia ali, “Okhaboolelakho omundu kamakhuwa kano tawe busa olafwa.
Kaaba bali banamae base ne baulila bali ndomaloome ne nawe mala bakhureebe bali, ‘Khuboolele niko waboleele omwami, nende niko omwami akhubooleele, okhakhukisakho sisiindu siosi tawe, aba solerwa tawe,’
baboolele oli, ‘Mu liboombia liase nekoonjeleele omwami akhangobosia munju eya Yonasani nafwilamo tawe.’ ”
Babemeelesi boosi bacha khu Yeremia bamureeba mala abakobosia bulayi bwene nga omwami ne amuboolela. Nio balekha khulomaloma ne naye sikila se baba bauliile elomo eya Yeremia no mwami tawe.
Ne Yeremia amenya khu luuya lwe lichipi lio mwami khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo baambilakho Yerusalemu.

Mu mwesi kwe khumi kwe kumwiiko kwa tisa kwa Sedekia nga omwami owa Yuda, Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni ne banamae bewe boosi becha babotookhelesia Yerusalemu.
Khu ndaalo eya tisa, eye kumwesi kwa khane kwe kumwiiko kukhola ekhumi na mulala kwa Sedekia nga omwami, lisiisi lie lukoba lwatechulwa.
Nga Yerusalemu ne lwaambwa, babemeelesi boosi bo mwami owa Babiloni becha bekhela mu silibwa sie akari. Babemeelesi abo baba Nerikalisiaresa, Samukarinebo, Saresekimu Omurabusari, Nerikali-siaresa Omurabumaki alala ne babemeelesi babaandi boosi bo mwami owa Babiloni.
Sedekia, omwami owa Yuda ne banamae bewe boosi babona banamae ba Babiloni. Nga bababona belukha mu silo barura mu lukoba, babirira khu ngila eye kumukuunda kwo mwami, babira mu silibwa siili akari we kamasiisi kabili mala bacha mwitooma lia Yoritani.
Ne kakhali banamae ba Bakalitayo babaloondakho mala batiilila Sedekia mu keewa eya Yeriko. Nga bamuaamba, bamureera khu Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni, e Ribula, mu sibala sia Hamati, mala amukhalakila ebweeneyo.
Omwami owa Babiloni eera basoleeli ba Sedekia mu moni cha Sedekia e Ribula, alala ne babemeelesi ba Yuda boosi.
Oli amala ario, arusiamo Sedekia chimoni mala amuboa kiminyololo amuyila e Babiloni.
Bababiloni bosia lichipi lio mwami Sedekia, ne chinju che babaandu bewe mala batechula kamasiisi ke lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Ekhumaliilikha Nebusaratani, omunamae omwimeelesi we baliindi abukula babaandu boosi abayila mu mbaambe e Babiloni, abo bababa ne baambana naye, alala ne babarama mu lukoba.
Nebusaratani, omunamae omwimeelesi alekha mu sibala sia Yuda batambi, bakhali na siindu tawe, mala abaelesia biluundu bie kimisabibu ne kimikuunda.
Ne omwami Nebukadinesa aelesia Lilaka Nebusaratani omunamae, omwimeelesi khuloondekhana ne Yeremia naboola ali,
“Bukula Yeremia, omulinde bulayi, okhamukholakho liibi liosi liosi tawe, ne kakhali mukholele nga akhuboolela.”
Nio Nebusaratani omunamae omwimeelesi, Nebusiasibani omurabusari, Nerikalisiaresa Omurabumaki ne babemeelesi babaandi boosi bo mwami owa Babiloni,
barumania babukula Yeremia khukhwama mu luuya lwo muliindi we lichipi. Bamwakaanisia Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu, omwichukhulu owa Siafani amuyile engo. Nio Yeremia amenya mu baandu bewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia nga ne aaba ne ekaliliilwe mu luuya lwe lichipi ali,
“Cha oboolele Ebetimeleki omukushi oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, lola ese ndakhola khu lukoba luno niko naloma. Ndalukholakho kamabi ne se kali kamalayi tawe. Ne endaalo niyo kaliekholekhela, kaliekhola ewe ne ololeleele.
Ne kakhali ndikhusikula ewe endaalo eyo ne seoliaanwa khu baandu nibo oriire abo tawe.
Sikila ng'ali khakhuonie ne se okhererwe mwiie tawe, ne kakhali okhaonie bulamu bwowo. Kakhabe kario sikila ewe wanjeyikina ese.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Yeremia enyuma wa Nebusaratani omunamae omwimeelesi ne alekhuulile Yeremia e Rama. Yeremia aba ayilwa Rama nali omuboe alala ne babaandu babaandi khukhwama Yerusalemu ne Yuda ba baaba ne bayilwa e Babiloni nga baboe.
Omunamae we baliindi abukula Yeremia amuyila alubeka mala amuboolela ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo alangiliile bubi buno bukwe abuundu ano.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile nga aloma. Kabeele kario, sikila enywe mwakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubwoni mala se mwaria niko aloma tawe, niko kakila busiku buno ne bumunyoolile enywe.
Lola endaalo yino ese ndikho khukanguluula kiminyololo kirure khu makhono kowo. Bwaba ne buli bulayi khwiwe, khuche e Babiloni fwembi, yiicha mala ese ndakhuliinda bulayi. Ne waaba nokheulila bulayi khucha ne nase e Babiloni tawe, okhecha tawe. Lola, sibala sioosi sili ebweeni wowo. Cha osi osi niio wibaasia oli ali alayi khwiwe.”
Nebusaratani achiililila khuloma ali, “Waaba norama, nono kobola khu Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu, omwichukhulu owa Siafani, niye omwami owa Babiloni arobora khuba omwimeelesi khu ngoba cha Yuda, mala omenye naye mu baandu bowo, namwe oche niio wibaasia oli ali alayi khwiwe.” Nio omwimeelesi we baliindi alaka Yeremia anyolenge siakhulia mala amuelesia siianwa ne khumulekhuula ache.
Ne Yeremia acha amenya ne Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu e Misipa, mala amenya ne babaandu boosi babarama mu sibala.
Nio banamae bakhulu abo bacha khu Ketalia e Misipa. Baba Ishimaeli okhwa Netania, Yoanani okhwa Karea, Sereya okhwa Tanihumeti, ba okhwa Efai omunetofa, Yesania okhwa Mumaaka alala ne babaandu babwe.
Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu omwichukhulu Shafani abechubila nibo ne babaandu babwe naloma ali, “Mukharia khukholela Bababiloni tawe. Menya mu sibala sino mala mukholele omwami owa Babiloni mala mulamenya busa bulayi.
Ne ese ndamenya e Misipa khu mubabila enywe ebweeni we Bababiloni bakhecha niio khuli tawe. Ne enywe, buusia endali, bibiaamo bie siimiyu ne kamafura mala mubikhe bulayi mu biindu. Ne menya mu ngoba chenywe nicho mubukulele.”
Ne Baisiraeli boosi ba baaba mu Moabu ne ba baba mu Baamoni, ne ba baaba mu Edomu ne mu bibala bibiindi nga baulila bali, omwami owa Babiloni aba alekha ba Isiraeli babarama bamenye mu Yuda mala aba aroboore Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu omwichukhulu Shafani nga omuruki wabwe.
Baisiraeli boosi bakobola khukhwama buli abuundu niio belukhila mala bakobola mu sibala sia Yuda, khu Ketalia e Misipa mala babuusia endali, bibiaamo bibiaba bie siimiyu bikali.
Enyuma wakano, Yoanani okhwa Karea ne babemeelesi boosi be mu lukoongo becha khu Ketalia e Misipa.
Bamuboolela bali, “Ewe omanyile oli Baalisi omwami we Baamoni arumire Ishimaeli okhwa Netania khukhwira ku?” Ne Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu se abasuubila tawe.
Nio Yoanani okhwa Karea acha e Misipa khu Ketalia alomaloma ne naye mu bwikisi ali, “Lekha ese nje niire Ishimaeli okhwa Netania ne omundu yesi yesi se alamanyakho tawe. Siina sikila akhwire ewe nio Bayaudi boosi bakhwibuusisieo basalanile? Siina sikila babaandu ba Yuda babarama babune?”
Ne kakhali Ketalia akobosia Yoanani okhwa Karea ali, “Okhakhola orio tawe, ewe olikho obeela busa Ishimaeli.”

Ishimaeli ne babaandu ekhumi abo benyokha mala beera Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu omwichukhulu Siafani ne mbalu omwami owa Babiloni aba arobora Ketalia khuba omuruki owa Yuda.
Ishimaeli lundi eera Bayaudi boosi ba baaba ne Ketalia e Misipa alala ne banamae ba Babiloni ba baaba ebweeneyo.
Endaalo eloondakho, enyuma we khukhwira Ketalia, omundu yesi yesi nakhamanyakho tawe,
babaandu kamakhumi munaane boola khukhwama e Shekemu, ne Silo ne Samaria. Baba babekile bunwanwa ne chingubo chabwe chatabuukhe lundi bekhalakaake, bareera biianwa bie biakhulia ne biiunya bulayi mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Ishimaeli arura enje khukhwama Misipa abakanile, aba alikho alila nga ne arura. Nga ne abakaanila, ababoolela ali, “yiicha mukari mubone Ketalia.”
Nga bengila mu lukoba busa bari, Ishimaeli ne babaandu bewe babeera mala bamwaata kimibili kiabwe mwiloo lie kameechi.
Ne kakhali babao babaandu ekhumi mu nibo ba baboolela Ishimaeli bali, “Nosiima okhakhwira tawe. Efwe khuli ne ngano, eshayiri, kamafura ke chisabibu ne bubuukhi, khwakisile mundaa.” Nio khubeera tawe, mu basiaabwe.
Liloo lie kameechi nilio Ishimaeli amwaatamo kimibili kie babaandu nibo eera liaba libalaayi lukali nilio Omwami Asa owa Yuda aba nayabile nga omwami Baasha owa Isiraeli nga aba ne amwibwaakale. Ishimaeli echusia liloo elio ne bafu.
Nio Ishimaeli ara mu siboe bakhaana bo mwami, alala ne babaandu babarama boosi, ba baaba mu Misipa, nibo Nebusaratani omunamae omuliindi aaba ne aara mu buliindi bwa Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu. Ishimaeli ababukula nga baboe mala atuuma nabo lulwakha alola mu sibala sie Baamori.
Ne nga Yoanani okhwa Karea, ne babemeelesi be banamae boosi ne baulila kamamayaanu koosi niko Ishimaeli aba akholile,
babukula babaandu babwe boosi mala bacha khukhwibwaakala Ishimaeli okhwa Netania. Bamuyila sie tiisi liboofu lili Kibeoni.
Nga baboe nibo Ishimaeli aba nabo boosi ne babona Yoanani ne babemeelesi be banamae, bekhoya.
Nio baboe boosi nibo Ishimaeli aba ne abukula khukhwama Misipa, batima bakobola bacha niio Yoanani ali ne babaandu bewe.
Ne kakhali Ishimaeli ne babaandu bewe munaane, belukha bebacha khu Yoanani, belukhila mu sibala sia Amoni.
Nio Yoanani ne banamae babemeelesi babukula babaandu abo boosi nibo Ishimaeli aba natiilile nga baboe khukhwama Misipa enyuma we khukhwira Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu. Yehonani akobosiayo banamae, ne bakhasi, babaana ne bachili khukhwama Kibeoni.
Ne bacha bamenya e Keruti Kimuamu siimbi e Betelehemu, ne benyanga khucha e Misiri,
sikila baba bariire Bababiloni, sikila Ishimaeli aba eerire Ketalia, niye Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni aaba ne amiisie nga omuruki we lukoongo lwa Yuda.

Nio babemeelesi be banamae boosi ne Yoanani okhwa Karea ne Asaria okhwa Hosiaya ne babaandu boosi khukhwamila khu mukeekhe khukhwola khu mukali bacha siimbi,
mala baboolela omung'oosi Yeremia bali, “Nosiima khukhusaba okhurekeeresie, mala okhusabile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo. Sikila nga wesi ne obona, khwaba bakali, mala luno khwaramire batiiti busa bari.
Khwako, khusabile nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo akhwekesie efwe engila niyo khuchila ne bibiindu nibio khukhoyele khukhole.”
Nio omung'oosi Yeremia abakobosia ali, “Namuulile, ndasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe khuloondekhana ne lisaba lienywe, ne liosi liosi nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amukobosia enywe, ese ndamuboolela, se ndamukisakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.”
Nio baboolela Yeremia bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abe omuloli owa ng'ali lundi omusuubilwa khwifwe, khwaba ne khukhakhola khuloondekhana ne burume bwewe bwoosi nibwo akhuruma ewe khwifwe tawe.
Bwakhaba ne buli bulayi namwe bubi efwe khulaulila nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe niye khulikho khukhurumakho, nio khunyoole bulayi khwaba ne khuloonda nilio aloma.”
Enyuma we chindaalo ekhumi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomaloma ne Yeremia.
Nio Yeremia alanga Yoanani okhwa Kerea ne banamae babemeelesi boosi ba baaba naye ne babaandu boosi khukhwamila khu mukeekhe khukhwola khu mukali.
Aababoolela kamakhuwa kano: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli niye enywe mundumirekho ese mbile lisaba lienywe ebweeni wewe aloma ali,
“Enywe mwaba ne murama mu sibala sino, ese ndamwombakha ne se ndamulekha tawe. Ndamwimikha ne se ndamwonaka tawe. Sikila ese nisonia khu butinyu nibwo namurereere enywe.
Mukharia omwami owa Babiloni niye muriire khale oyo tawe, sikila ese ndi ne nanywe khumuonia ne khumureesia khukhwama mu bunyali bwewe.
Ndamukholela enywe siisa, mala omwami owa Babiloni yesi amukholele siisa mala amulekhe muche mu sibala sienywe sisiene.”
Ne kakhali mwaba ne muloma muli, “Efwe se khwenya khwarama mu sibala sino tawe,” mwaba ne mukharia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe aloma tawe,
namwe mwaba ne muloma muli khulacha mu sibala sia Misiri niio khukhabona liie, namwe chikhoombi che liie namwe enjala tawe mala mumenye ebweeneyo,
aba ulila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma, ee enywe mumwarama mu Yuda. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Mwaaba ne mulola e Misiri muche mumenyeyo,
aba liie nilio muriire likhamunyoole mu sibala sie Misiri esio, ne enjala niyo muriire elamuloondakho ne kamaani mala emwirireyo.
Babaandu boosi baacha e Misiri khumenyayo baleerwa mwiie, mu njala, ne lufu, se balaba nende omundu olarama namwe olaona khukhwama khu busiku nibwo ndabareerera tawe.
“Sikila ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndoma ndi: Nga naambwa lirima likali, nakhalalila bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, bulayi bwene khaambwe lirima ne khumukhalalila enywe mwaba ne mucha e Misiri. Mulafwaana bubi lukali, muriisie mube nga silaamo lundi be khuchekheelelwa. Se mulibona abuundu ano lundi tawe.”
Ee, enywe mumwarama mu Yuda, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amuboolela ali, “Mukhacha e Misiri tawe. Manyila elala ng'ali muli namukaanisie endaalo yino
mwaukhe mala mweyire mwabeene. Sikila enywe mwanduma ese khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ne muboola muli, ‘Khusabile khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, ne liosi liosi nilio aloma, ewe khuboolele mala khulakhola.’
Ne endaalo yino ese namubooleele ne kakhali se mwariire burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu buli siindu nisio amboleele muboolele enywe tawe.
Khwako luno manya ng'ali muli mukhererwe mwiie ne njala, ne lufu mu sibala nisio mwikoomba khucha mumenyemo esio.”

Nga Yeremia ne amala khuboolela babaandu boosi, kamakhuwa koosi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe aba namurumire khu nibo,
Asaria okhwa Hosiaya ne Yoanani okhwa Karea ne babaandu be sileka boosi baboolela Yeremia bali, “Ewe olikho oboola bubeeyi. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe se akhurumire ewe wiche okhuboolele efwe ali khukhacha e Misiri khumenyeyo tawe.
Ne kakhali Baruku okhwa Neria niye okhurumire ewe oboole kamabi khwifwe, khukhura efwe mu bunyali bwe Bababiloni, bakhwire namwe bakhuaambe bakhuyile mu mbaambe mu Babiloni.”
Nio Yoanani okhwa Karea ne banamae babemeelesi boosi ne babaandu boosi se baria burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi barame mu sibala sia Yuda tawe.
Ne kakhali Yoanani okhwa Karea ne babemeelesi be banamae boosi babukula babaandu babarama mu Yuda boosi ba baba ne bakoboole khumenya mu sibala sia Yuda khukhwama mu kholo choosi nimwo bamulila babayila Misiri.
Abukula bakhaana be babaami, nende buli mundu niye Nebusaratani omunamae we baliindi be luuya lwo mwami aba ne alekhela Ketalia okhwa Ahikamu lundi omwichukhulu Siafani. Nebusaratani aba alekhela Ketalia mung'oosi Yeremia ne Baruku okhwa Neria.
Bacha mu sibala sia Misiri, sikila se baria niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma tawe. Bacha bola e Tahipanihesi.
Ebweeneyo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia ali,
“Bukula kamabaale kamaboofu mu makhono kowo okakukhulile mu sioso sie kamatifari, siili e muliango kwe lichipi lia Farao mu lukoba lwa Tahipanihesi muno. Ne lekha Baisiraeli balala babone nisio olikho okhola.
Baboolele oli: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Lola, ese ndarumania mbukule Nebukadinesa omwami owe Babiloni, omukholi wase mala alara endebe yewe eye bubwami khu ngaaki khwe kamabaale niko ngisile kano, mala akhakabimbe ne liiema liewe lie bubwami.
Nebukadinesa akheche mala ape sibala sia Misiri, lufu lukheere abo babalaamilwa lufu, ne siboe khwaabo babalaamilwa siboe, ne liie khwaabo babalaamwa khukhwirwa mwiie.
Akhabwane kumulilo osie chingaangu che bawele ba Misiri. Akhabukule bawele balala nga baboe ache nabo, mala akhakhole sibala sia Misiri, bulayi bwene nga omwaayi ne angala chinda mu ngubo. Omwami owa Babiloni akharure mu sibala sia Misiri ne bukhili mu muleembe.
Akhaare enjeko eya wele we nyanga eli e Heliopolisi mu sibala sia Misiri, mala osie chingaangu che bawele ba Misiri.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yeremia burume khu Bayaudi bamenyile mu sibala sia Misiri boosi e Mikitoli ne e Tahipanihesi, ne e Mefisi ne mu sibala sia Paturusi.
Aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboola ali, ‘Enywe mwaboone butinyu bwoosi nibwo nareera khu Yerusalemu ne khu ngoba cha Yuda choosi. Khukhwola luno chakwa kamakuunda se aliio omundu ochimenyilemo tawe,
sikila babaandu bamwo bakhola bumayaanu mala bambambia lirima. Baana chimbosio khu bawele babaandi ne khusaaya bawele nibo bakhamanya namwe nibo enywe mumanyile, namwe nibo bakuuka benywe basaaya tawe.
Ese nachiililila khubarumira bakholi base bang'oosi babamuboolela bali mukhakhola sisiindu sisinyisia nisio nabiila sino tawe.’
Ne kakhali, se barekeeresia namwe baulila tawe. Ne se balekha bumayaanu babwe bwe khuaana chimbosio khu bawele babaandi tawe.
Khwako nakhalala ne khuambila chingoba cha Yuda ne chingila che mu Yerusalemu lirima, ne khuchiambia. Nakhola Yuda ne Yerusalemu chakwa kamakuunda ne chiriisia khukhwola luno.
“Luno Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli ndeeba ndi, ‘Siina sikila ne mwereerera silaamo sikali sino khu mwabeene, mwenya khubunia babaandu be siseecha, be siikhasi, babaana ne bachweenge, nio akhabao yesi yesi orama mu Yuda ne mu baandu benywe tawe?
Siina sikila enywe ne mumbambia lirima khulwe bikholwa bienywe bie khukhwosia biiunya bulayi khu bawele babaandi mu sibala sia Misiri, niio mwechile khumenya. Mwenya khukhweyira mala mube silaamo ne kumwenya kwe khuchekheelela mu kholo choosi che sibala?
Enywe mwebiliile bumayaanu bwe bakuuka benywe, babaami ba Yuda, ne bakhasi babwe, ne bubwenywe mwabeene ne bumayaanu nibwo bakhasi benywe bakhola mu sibala sia Yuda ne khu ngila cha Yerusalemu?
Khukhwola luno mukheboombiakho namwe mwandiakho tawe. Se mwaloonda lilaka liase nilio namuelesia enywe ne bakuuka benywe tawe.’ ”
“Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, ‘Lola ese namufutariire enywe, khumureerera butinyu, babaandu ba Yuda mweesi.
Ndabukula Bayaudi babarama babenya khucha e Misiri bamenyeyo mala boosi balibuna. Balifwiila mu Misiri mwiie, ne njala, khukhwamila khu mutiiti khukhwola khu mukhulu. Ne bakhabe sisiindu sie khuriisia, silaamo nende sie khuchekhelelwa.
Sikila ndaukuuma abo bamenyile mu sibala sia Misiri bulayi bwene nga ne naelesia babaandu ba Yerusalemu liie, enjala ne lufu.
Se akhabeo omundu yesi yesi owa Yuda owarama owecha khumenya mu Misiri okhebache namwe aone namwe akobole mu sibala sia Yuda nisio bekoomba khukobolayo bamenyeyo tawe. Baakhakoboleyo baliba batiiti bari babelukha bong'ene.’ ”
Nio babaandu be siseecha boosi bamanya bali bakhasi babwe baana biiunya bulayi khu bawele babaandi, ne bakhasi boosi ba baaba ne bemileo, alala ne Baisiraeli ba baamenya ebunaswa owa Misiri ne babaandu bakali bakobosia Yeremia bali,
“Efwe khwalobile likhuwa nilio okhuboleele mwisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se khulakhurekeeresia tawe.
Ne kakhali khulakhola buli sisiindu nisio khwechuba khukhola. Khulosia biiunya bulayi khu wele omukhasi, omwami owe likulu ne khumuanila biianwa bie khunywa, bulayi bwene nga khwakholanga, efwe bakuuka befwe ne babaami ne babaana babwe mu ngoba cha Yuda khungila che mu Yerusalemu. Mu biise ebio khwabechanga ne biakhulia bikali ne kimiaandu mala se khwabonakho butinyu tawe.
Ne kakhali khukhwama nga khulekha khukhwosia biiunya bulayi khu wele omukhasi, omwami owe likulu ne khuaana biianwa bie khunywa khu niye, khwataambile buli siindu mala liie ne njala biakhwirire.”
Ne bakhasi nabo baloma bali, “Nga ne khwoselianga wele omukhasi, omwami owe likulu biiunya bulayi, ne khuaana biianwa bie khunywa, khwafukiililwa ne baseecha befwe. Nio khwamupilanga chikeki ne khurakho sifwaani siewe ne khumuchukhila biianwa bie khunywa.”
Nio Yeremia areeba babaandu boosi be siseecha nende be siikhasi babamukobosia abo ali,
“Mwibaasia muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhebulila biiunya bulayi nibio enywe ne bakuuka benywe, babaami ne babemeelesi alala ne babaandu mweesi mwoselianga mu ngoba cha Yuda ne Yerusalemu tawe? Se liechakho munganakani chewe tawe?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se anyala khukhwikhaliilikhila bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu lundi bisinyisia nibio mwakhola tawe. Khwako, sibala sienywe sianjuukhwe, mundumo tawe lundi siabeele silaamo mbao omenyilemo tawe.
Butinyu buno bwamwichilekho sikila mwaana chimbosio khu bawele babaandi mala mwakhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khulwe khuloba kamalaka kewe.”
Yeremia aboolela babaandu boosi alala ne bakhasi boosi kamakhuwa kano: Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, enywe babaandu ba Yuda mweesi muli mu sibala sia Misiri.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Enywe ne bakhasi benywe mwalomaloome ne kiminwa kienywe mala mwakholile ne kamakhono kenywe nga mwaloma muli, ‘Ng'ali, khulakhola niko khwasuubisia khuli khulosia biiunya bulayi khu wele omukhasi kwini owe likulu ne khumuanila biianwa bie khunywa.’ Nono khola nga mwasuubisia mu liechuba lienywe.
Ne kakhali ulila burume bwo Mwami WELE enywe mweesi babaandu ba Yuda mumenyile mu sibala sia Misiri. Lola, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nechubile mwisina liase likali ne ndoma ndi, ‘Lisina liase se lilararwakho lundi no mundu yesi yesi owa Yuda, mu sibala sioosi sia Misiri tawe.’ Mbao olaloma ali, ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali tawe.’
Lola, ndikho mbaloleelesia khubareerera butinyu, ne kakhali se ndabareerera kamalayi tawe. Babaandu ba Yuda boosi baali mu sibala sia Misiri balabuna khulwe liie ne njala khukhwola nga bawa.
Ne batiiti baliebacha liie mala barure mu sibala sia Misiri bakobole mu sibala sia Yuda, ne balirama be mu sibala sia Yuda, babecha khu menya mu sibala sia Misiri bakhamanye elomo eya naanu ekharame, eyase namwe eyabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Sino siliba simanyisio khwinywe, mbo nja khumuelesia siiukuumo ano, nio enywe mumanye muli ng'ali kamakhuwa kase niko ndomile khuloondekhana nanywe kali ka ng'ali.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khare omwami Farao Nofura, omwami owa Misiri mu bunyali bwe basiku bewe nende khwaabo bayiima khumwiira niye, bulayi bwene nga nara Sedekia, omwami owa Yuda mu bunyali bwa Nebukadinesa, omwami owa Babiloni, owaba omusiku wewe mala owayiimanga khumwiira.”

“Baruku, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli akhuboolela ewe ali
ewe waloma oli, ‘Ese ndi ne silaaamo! Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atasile bubeeleli khu buchuuni bwase. Naluiiliile khulila ne se nyoola buuluukhi tawe.’ ”
Khwako ese muboolela niye ndi, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ese ndikho ndechula nibio nombakha, ne ndikho khuula nibio nabiaala mu sibala sioosi.
Ne ewe olikho weyenyela bibiindu biboofu? Okheyenyela tawe, sikila lola ese ndikho ndeera lilionakwa khu baandu boosi. Ne kakhali ndakhuonia ewe abuundu osi osi niio ewe olacha, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi samwene nalomile.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Omung'oosi Yeremia kamakhuwa khuloondekhana ne chikholo,
ke khunyoa kaba ke sibala sia Misiri, ne lukali khu banamae bo mwami Neko, omwami owa Misiri, ba baaba a luuchi lwa Efurati e Karikemishi. Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni apane ne banamae abo e Karikemishi mala abaulile, mu mwiiko kwe khane kwe khukhwamiia khwa Yehoyakimu okhwa Yosia nga omwami owa Yuda.
Banamae ba Misiri baloma bali,
“Rekekha chingabo chindiiti ne chimboofu,
mala muche mwiie!
Rekekha chifarasi,
chiniinekho mala muche!
Bukula bubweyaangu bwenywe
mala mufware chikofiyo chenywe,
akala kamafumo kenywe
Fwara nibio mwetecha!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali,
Siina nisio mbona?
Baandu bariire
ne khukobola enyuma.
Banamae babwe bauliilwe
mala beluukhe mu buri
se bekhebukha enyuma tawe sikila buri buli buli lubeka!
Be chimbilo se bacha aleeyi tawe,
namwe banamae se bebacha tawe,
betuyile aluuchi lwa Efurati ebunaswa,
mala bakwiile.
Naanu yuno owinyokha nga luluuchi lwa Naili,
nga chinjichi nicho kameechi kechula mala kabira enje.
Misiri sienyokhe nga luluuchi lwa Naili,
nga chinjichi nicho kameechi kechula
Misiri sialoma sili, ndechula mala nichusie sibala,
ndonaka chingoba ne khubunia bamenywa bamwo.
Sibula chifarasi chiche,
ne kamakaari katime!
Ruma banamae bache
Banamae ba Esopia ne e Libia basute chingabo
ne babaandu ba Lidia, bamanyile bulayi lukali khurumikhira buyiingo.
Endaalo eyo eli endaalo yo Mwami WELE we banamae
eli endaalo eye khukhwiyacha basiku bewe.
Embalu elabalia mala yikure,
mala enywe kamafuki kabwe yikure.
Sikila Omwami WELE we banamae ali ne embosio
mu sibala sie lukoongo sie ebunaswa a luuchi lwa Efurati.
Ee, enywe baandu ba Misiri
cha Kileati mubukule kamalesi,
sikila mwarumikhira kamalesi kamakali kataamba bukhala
mbao busilikhi khwinywe tawe.
Chikholo chilaulila ke chisoni chenywe
ne sibala silechula bililo bienywe
sikila omunamae mulala aletuya khu kundi
mala boombi balakwa alala.”
“Langilila mu Misiri mala olangilile mu lukoba lwa Mikitoli
langiliila mu Memufisi ne mu Tahipanihesi,
loma oli, ‘Yerekekha khukhweliinda mwabene,
sikila liie lilamubunia enywe mweesi.’
Siina sikila wele wenywe Apisi ne eluukhe?
Siina sikila euunwa yenywe ne ekhemile?
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amupile asi.
Banamae benywe betuyile mala bakwile
mala babolaane bali,
‘Yinyokha khukobole engo niio babaandu befwe bali,
ne mu sibala nisio khusaalwamo,
sikila liie lio musiku wefwe.’
Laanga Farao omwami owa Misiri muli,
‘Omundu owe luyoka olekhanga biise biewe biwa busa.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ese ndi Wele omenyile mindali,
nga sikulu sia Tabori ne sikhila bikulu bibiindi
lundi nga sikulu sia Karimeli ne sili angaaki we nyanja,
omwibwaakala ali ne kamaani kario.
Ee Bamisiri, yerekekha khucha mu mbaambe,
ee bamenywa ba Misiri.
Sikila lukoba lwa Memufisi lukhanjukhwe
lukhabe likuunda likhamenywamo tawe.
Sibala sia Misiri sili nga ekhaafu eye kamabeele,
ne kakhali embuko khukhwama ebunaswa yakilumile.
Bakhaba banamae bali mu Misiri be kumuruungo
bali nga chimoosi chikhali ne buyeeti tawe
se bema khukhupana tawe, boosi belukha
sikila endaalo eye butinyu bwabwe abele yolile
siise sie libuna liabwe.
Bamisiri belukha ne bachina oli endemu,
sikila basiku babwe bengila ne kamaani,
mala bebwaakala Misiri ne chiaaywa,
nga abo barema kimirongooro.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Balarema kumusiru kwa Misiri
kukhanyalikhana khuremwa tawe
sikila bali bakali lukali khukhila chisike,
se babalikha tawe.
Babaandu be Misiri balaambwa chisoni
balaambwa ne babaandu khukhwama ebunaswa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali, “Lola ese ndikho ndeera siiukuumo khu Amoni wele owa Tebesi ne khu Farao ne sibala siewe sia Misiri, ne khu bawele basio, ne babaami ne nabo babamusuubila.
Ndabaana khwaabo bayiima khubeera, ndabakaanisia Nebukadinesa, omwami owa Babiloni ne khu bemeelesi bewe. Enyuma wako, babaandu balamenya lundi mu sibala sia Misiri nga bamenyanga khale.”
baandu ba Isiraeli mukharenga tawe,
ndamuonia khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi esio,
khukhwama mu sibala nisio muli baboe.
Mukhakobole engo mala mumenye mu muleembe.
Mukhabe ne buliindi ne mbao olibariikhirisia tawe.
Ndecha mala muonie.
Ndabunia chikholo choosi nicho namusalanisiamo,
ne kakhali se ndamubunia enywe tawe.
Ne se ndamulekha ne khamuukumile tawe,
ne kakhali ne muukuuma ndabakho ne siisa.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi olikho oloma.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola kameechi kalikho kenyokha khukhwama e bunaswa,
mala kalabisia nga luluuchi lulwichuule,
kalechula sibala kafuunikhe buli siindu.
Kalechula chingoba mala kamile abo bachimenyilemo
babaandu balakukuula khulwe khukhwenya buyeeti
buli mundu omenyile mu sibala esio alalila lukali.
Balaulila lutiri lwe chifarasi ne chitima,
balaulila liuuma lie kamakaari ke liie ne katima, ne lipiringikha lie kimikuu kiako,
nio basaasi se baliekhebukha babaana babwe tawe,
kamakhono kabwe kalakataala.
Siise siolile sie khubunia Bafilisiti,
khusikhala khukhwama khu Tiro ne Sidoni
boosi banyala baba be buyeeti.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikho nja khubunia Bafilisiti
boosi babama khu nyanja eya Kirete.
Bubeeleli bukali bwechile khu baandu ba Kasa
ne babaandu ba Ashikeloni basilile busa
Ne babaandu ba Filisiti balalila khukhwola siise siina?
Mulila ne muloma muli,
‘Mbalu eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Olachiililila khukhwira khukhwola siise siina?
Yikobosia mu sibaabi siowo mala oolelemo osile busa!’
Ne kakhali embalu eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi esila eriena?
Kaaba bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye okilakile?
Akilakile yibwaakale lukoba lwa Ashikeloni ne babaandu bamenyile mu sibala sie khu nyanja.”

“Sibala sia Nebo sialaamiilwe, sikila sianjuukhwe!
Lukoba lwa Kiriataimu lwatiliilwe mala lwanyoolile chisoni,
lukoba lusire lwakwile mala lwaambilwe chisoni.
Efuma eye sibala sia Moabu se eliio lundi tawe,
basiku batiilile lukoba lwa Heshiboni,
bafukiilisiana khurusiao ekholo eya Moabu ne baloma bali,
‘Yiicha, lekha khubabunie, bakhaba ekholo tawe!’
Lukoba lwe balalu lwosi lulasila chi.
Banamae balalwibwaakala.
Babaandu ba Horonaimu balila bali,
sisiayuumba! Libuna!
Sibala sia Moabu sionaakwe,
bililo biuliilikhana biola Soari.
Ulila khulila khabwe khu ngila echa Luhiti,
lilila lisaba buyeeti
biuliilikhana khukhwola Horonaimu.
Yilukha! Yeonia mwabeene!
Ba nga epunda eye mu siangalaamwe!
“Sikila enywe baandu ba Moabu mweyikina kamaani kenywe ne kimiaandu,
akhaba mwesi mulatiilwa mu mbaambe,
ne wele wenywe Chemoshi yesi alacha mu mbaambe,
alala ne basaayi bewe ne babemeelesi.
Omwonaki alecha khu buli lukoba,
ne se luliio lukoba lulebacha tawe,
sibala sie litooma silabuna
ne sibala sie kumweyeeywe silonakwa,
bulayi bwene nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alomile.
Limila sibala sia Moabu eng'ani
sikila sicha khubuna
chingoba chasio chilaba kamakuunda
omundu se alamenyamo tawe.
Omundu okhola kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kalaa alaamwe. Omundu okhenya khuchukha sifuki mwiie tawe alaamwe!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Sibala sia Moabu siamenya mu muleembe khukhwama khale,
siikhayilwakho mu mbaambe tawe.
Maobu sili nga endali eyakwalaala mu nyuungu niyo bakhachukha mu nyuungu omu ne nomu tawe,
echamu yayo ekhatibiakho bulayi bwayo tawe,
ne echamu yasio eli busa nga yaba.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho khasirumire babaandu bakhasikholekho kumulimo. Bakhachukhe bie khunywa biabwe birure mu nyuungu mala, baarakake chinyuungu mu bikolonjo.
Nio Moabu siliaambwa chisoni ne wele wabwe Chemoshi, bulayi bwene nga enju eya Isiraeli ne yaambwa chisoni sikila wele Beteli niye baba ne beyikina.
“Baandu ba Moabu, siina sikila
enywe ne muboola muli ‘Efwe khuli bakhili lundi banamae be kamaani?’
Ese ndi Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Omwonaki owa Moabu ne chingoba chasio nechile,
ne basoleeli baele balayi basio balerwa.
Libuna lia Moabu lili siimbi
ne buchuuni bwasio bulikho bwicha khangu.
Enywe mumenyile siimbi, lila sibala esio,
ne nabo boosi bamanyile efuma yasio loma muli,
‘Bubwami bwe kamaani bwakwiile,
luyali ne kamaani kalwo biaweele!’
“Ee, enywe mumenyile mu Diboni!
Yiikha khukhwama khu luyali lwenywe,
mala mwikhale asi mu lipukhuulu,
sikila Omwonaki owa Moabu echile,
khukhwonakaka chingoba chenywe chisire.
Ee enywe mumenyile mu Aroeri!
Yiima khu ngila muloleelele,
Reeba abo balikho belukha,
reeba muli, ‘Siina sisiekholeekhe?’ ”
Balakobosia bali,
“Moabu yaambisiibwe chisoni,
sikila yafunakaakwe;
kukuula, lila!
Langilila khu luuchi lwa Arinoni,
muli Moabu yabunisiibwe elala.”
“Bukhalaki bwechile khu ngoba che sibala sie kumweyeeywe. Bwechile khu lukoba lwa Holoni, Yahisa ne Mifaati.
Bwechile akhaba khu Diboni, Nebo ne Betitibulataimu.
Akhaba Kiriataimu, Betikamuli, Betimeoni,
Keriosi, Bosira alala ne chingoba choosi che mu sibala sia Moabu che aleeyi ne che aembi choosi bukhalaki bwachichilekho.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Kamaani ka Moabu kasiruriremo mala bunyali bwasio bwaweele.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Meesia Moabu, sikila sieniinia sialeka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nio Moabu silakwa asi sipiringikhe mu marusio kasio mala baandu balasichekha.
Baandu ba Moabu, khebulila muli enywe mwachekha Isiraeli! Enywe mwebaasia muli banyoolekha mu befwi, nio buli lwosi ne mwalomalomanga kakabwe mwasisiikhanga kimirwe?
Ee, enywe mumenyile mu Moabu,
yanjukha chingoba mala mumenye mu mbangaachi!
Ba nga liuusi liliombakha siswi siasio
amunwa kwe libina.
Khwaulila khukhwebonia khwa Moabu
siebonia lukali,
khwaulila lilieniinia liasio
khukhwelola khukhwefumia ne sileka
ne lilibaasia lie kimiooyo kiabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ese manyile ekitiaabi eya Moabu,
liliebonia liasio lili lie bubeeyi,
bikholwa biasio bili bie bubeeyi.
Khwako ndila Moabu
Ndakukuulila Bamoabu boosi,
ndalila babaandu ba Kiri-Hareseti.
Mulila enywe babaandu ba Sibima lukali,
khukhila babaandu ba Yaseri!
Nikwo chisakia chakwo chacha choola khu nyanja e Yaseri.
Bibiaamo bienywe bie mu simiyu ne chisabibu.
Omwonaki ebwakaale.
Busangaafu ne liliekhoya biarusiibweo
biarusiibwe mu sibala sie ngakha sia Moabu.
Ese nakholile endali ekharura mu bisuuriro tawe,
biakhabao bikalakala,
se bilaba bikalakala bie khusuura endali tawe.
“Babaandu be lukoba lwa Heshiboni nende ba Eleale bakukuula. Kimimilo kiabwe kiola Yahasi. Khukhwama Soari khukhwola Horonaimu ne Ekilatisielishiya chingukuulo chong'ene. Sikila akhaba kameechi ka Nimurimu kosi kateenyile.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ndarusia mu Moabu omundu oaana chimbosio abuundu aesuta ne khukhwosia biiunya bulayi khu wele wewe.’
“Khwako kumwoyo kwase kusooma Moabu ne babaandu be siseecha ba Kiri-Hareseti nga omundu oupa kumulele ne emba kumwenya kwe kamasika. Buli siindu nisio banyoola siatibile.
Boosi babekile kamachuune kabwe ne khubeka bunwanwa. Boosi bali ne chimbala khu makhono kabwe mala beboyile kamakunia munda.
Khu ngaaki khwe chinju choosi cha Moabu nende buli mu sikuuri, lisooma liong'ene. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Sikila narakaake Moabu nga owara enyuungu niyo babaandu baloba.
Moabu efunakaakwe lukali! Babaandu ba Moabu bakukuula bariena! Moabu siaambisiibwe chisoni lukalipo! Sibala sia Moabu siekelile chinjekho lundi siriisia khu baandu baali siimbi nasio.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola, ekholo ekhapurukhe ekwe khu Moabu nga efuruusi,
mala ebambule chindaa chayo khu Moabu,
Chingoba cha Moabu chilibukulwa
ne chingoba chisire chiliaambwa.
Kimiooyo kie banamae ba Moabu mu ndaalo ng'eneyo
kiliba nga kumwoyo kwo mukhasi olumwa,
Moabu elionakwa mala se elaba ekholo lundi tawe,
sikila yeniinia yakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sileka.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ee enywe baandu ba Moabu,
busiku, kamaloo ne buuko biamulindiliile.
Yesi yesi owilukha busiku
alakwa mwiloo,
ne oyo oniina arure mwiloo
alakwa mu buuko
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alareera busiku buno khu Moabu
mu mwiiko kwe siiukuumo siabwe.
“Babelukha liie bakhaka khukhweyikama mu siniini sia Heshiboni,
ne se bali ne kamaani tawe,
sikila kumulilo kwaburuukhe mu Heshiboni
lumemu lwamile munju eya Sihoni
lwosiisie bubweeni bwa Moabu
ne khurusiao bunyali bwe babaandu be kukwebonio.
Muli ne silaamo Bamoabu!
Babaandu basayaanga wele Chemoshi babunile,
sikila basoleeli benywe bayiliilwe mu mbaambe
akhaba bakhaana benywe bosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Kakhaba kario khakobosieo lundi chikhabi cha Moabu
mu ndaalo chichiicha.”
Bukhalaki khu Moabu buwela ao.

“Baisiraeli se bali ne basoleeli tawe?
Se bali ne nabo babeela khu miaandu kiabwe tawe?
Siina sikila nono basaaya wele Milikomu ne babukula kamaloba ke kholo eya Kati,
mala bamenyile mu chingoba chako?
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha
ndikhola chingukuulo che liie chiuliilikhane mu Raba,
lukoba lwe Baamoni lulianjukhwa, lukwe
ne birekere bialwo biliosibwa,
nio Baisiraeli abo balioona abo ba babaoona.
“Ee, Heshiboni kukuula sikila lukoba lwa Ai lwabunile!
Kukuula, ee bamenywa ba Raba!
Yefwara kamakunia mu bubeeleli
sooma, ne mutima ne mwoola eyi neyi mu masiisi
sikila wele Milikoni alacha mu mbaambe,
alala ne basaayi bewe ne babemeelesi.
Siina sikila ne mwibonesilia mu matooma kenywe,
enywe babaandu bataamba lisuubila,
mweyikina kimiaandu kienywe ne muloma muli,
‘Naanu olikhwibwaakala efwe?’ ”
Omwami WELE we banamae aloma ali,
“Lola, ndamureerera butinyu khukhwama khu nibo mwetikiyana
ne enywe, buli mulala alelukha,
ne se aliio olibuusia babelukha liie tawe.
“Ne kakhali enyuma wako, khakobosieo chikhabi che Baamoni.”
“Bukesi mu lukoba lwa Temani mu Edomu se bulimo lundi tawe?
Bukeleki bwaweele mu baandu bakesi?
Bukesi bwabwe bwaweele?
Baandu ba Dedani yilukha mala mwekise,
ndikho nja khubunia lisaaye lia Esau!
Sikila siise siolile sie khubaukuuma.
Kaaba bali babaandu babuta chisabibu ne bamwichakho,
se banyala balekhakho chisabibu ndiiti chiri tawe ku?
Kaaba bali babefwi becha siilo,
se beeba busa nibio banyala khusuta biong'ene tawe ku?
Ne kakhali ese nachuliile elala lisaaye lia Esau
nasimbuule bubwikisilo bwabwe
mala luno se banyala khukhwekisa tawe.
Babaana ba Esau ne bawandaaye
ne bamenyile siimbi boosi babunile se aliio oramire tawe.
Ndekhele ese bafuubi, mala ndabaliinda,
ne lekha banamulekhwa benywe banjeyikine ese.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kaaba bali abo bakholaana siiukuumo tawe, baukumwa, khulwe khunywela mu sikoombe sie siiukuumo, enywe mwibaasia muli se mulaukuumibwa tawe ku? Tawe, khukhwola munywele mu sikoombe esio.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echubile ali, “Lukoba lwa Bosira lulaba luriisia, lwe chinjekho, lulanjukhwa, lundi lwe silaamo ne chingoba chalwo chindiiti choosi se chilamenywamo tawe khulwa mindali.”
Ese Yeremia ndoma ndi, “Edomu, nanyoolile burume khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Arumire omurumwa khuboolela babaandu babuusie banamae babwe berekekhe khukhwibwaakala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho acha khukhumala kamaani, ne se aliio olakhuria ewe tawe.
Khukhwebonia khwowo khwakhutibiisie mbao okhuria ewe nga wibaasia tawe. Omenyile mu mbangaachi che chingulu ne wakhaba ne omenyile angaaki nga efuruusi, ese ndakhwikhisia okwe asi. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Libuna lilecha khu Edomu lilaba liboofu lundi liriisia, buli sia mulala obirao aliesiindukha mala auke.
Bibiindu bibiekholekha khu Sodomu ne Komora nibio bibieene bikhekholekhe khu Edomu. Chingoba echo ne chichaba siimbi chabuna. Se aliio olichimenyamo lundi tawe.
Lola lili nga etalang'i mu bichakha bia Yoritani ne yiicha khukhwebwaakala siko sie kamakheese sie kamaani. Nja khukhola Baedomu belukhe barure mu sibala siabwe, ne ndarobora omwami okona abamiie. Naanu oli nga ese? Naanu onyala wanjalaala ese? Omwaayi aliio onyala ambingania ese ku?
Khwako ulila lirekekha nilio ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndekeekhe khu Edomu ne niko mbisiisie khukhola khu baandu be lukoba lwa Temani. Akhaba babaana bosi balatiilwa. Buli mundu aliesiindukha.
Endaalo eye likwa lie babaandu ba Edomu, sibala siliterema mala khulila khwabwe khuliuliilikha khwole sia Nyanja Embesemu.
Lola, omusiku alibwaakala Bosira, abambule chindaa chewe khu lukoba mala apurukhe khangu oli efuruusi. Ne endaalo eyo kimiooyo kie banamae ba Edomu kiliba nga kumwoyo kwo mukhasi olumwa.”
“Babaandu be mu ngoba cha Hamati ne Aripadi beendekheleele,
sikila bauliile burume bubi.
Bayenguukhe mu buri mala banaanisibwa nga enyanja,
ekhasila tawe.
Babaandu ba Damasika batekhelaane mala belukhe
ne buri bwabaambile,
bali mu buchuuni ne burafu nga omukhasi olumwa,
lukoba lulwaba lwe fuma,
ne busangaafu
lwanjukhiilwe elala.
Khwako basoleeli balwo balererwa khu ngila
ne banamae balwo boosi balibuna endaalo eyo.”
Ndiosia kamasiisi ka Damasika,
lundi khosie kamachipi ko mwami Beni-hadadi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma khuloondekhana ne kholo eya Kedari ne bubwami bwa Hasori nibwo Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni aula ali,
“Yinyokha mwibwaakale Kedari!
Bunia babaandu be ebukwe abo!
Kamaeema kabwe ne bibiaayo bilabukulwa
akhaba chipasia chabwe che kamaeema ne kimiaandu kiabwe kioosi
chingamia chabwe chikhasaalile aleeyi khukhwama khu nibo,
ne babaandu balila bali, ‘Butinyu buli buli abuundu.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Yilukha, cha aleeyi mwikise mu mbangaachi che kamabaale,
ee baandu ba Hasori!
Sikila Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni
akholile lirekekha libi khwinywe,
mala abisiisie sikholwa siibi khwinywe.
Yinyokha mwibwaakale ekholo emenyile mu muleembe,
eli bulayi
ekholo etamba bilibwa namwe chinjiki
emenyile busa yong'ene.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Chingamia chabwe chiliaaywa,
ne chikhaafu chabwe chilinuulwa.
Ndisalanisia buli abuundu mu mbeo
abo babekanga binyoosi
Ne khabareerere butinyu khukhwama buli abuundu.
Lukoba lwa Hasori lukheekele sichiimi sie chingibwe,
abuundu aanjukhwa khulwa mindali,
se aliio omundu olimenyamo tawe,
ne se aliio omundu olichamo tawe.”
Mu khurakikha khwe khukhwamiia khwo mwami Sedekia owa Yuda, omwami alomaloma no mung'oosi Yeremia. Amuboolela kamakhuwa khuloondekhana ne Elamu.
Aloma ali, “Lola, ndafunaka buyiingo bwa Elamu, kamaani kabwe.
Ne ndareera khu Elamu embeo khukhwama chimbeka choosi chine mala salanisie babaandu basio buli lubeka. Se siliio sibala nisio omundu owa Elamu khu bakhaonwe barure mu Elamu akhalichamo tawe.
Khareengie Elamu ebweeni we basiku babwe ne nabo bayiima khubeera, khabareerere butinyu, lirima liase lirafu, khabaloondiekho liie khukhwola nga mbabunia.
Enyuma wako khareere bubwami bwase mu Elamu mala mbunie omwami wasio ne babemeelesi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Mu ndaalo chichiicha khakobosiele Elamu chikhabi.”

“Boolela babaandu kamakhuwa kano,
yilwacha mulomo muli,
‘Babiloni lwabukuliibwe
wele walwo Beli aambiilwe chisoni
Merodaki wele wabwe achangalaalile
bifwaani biabwe biachangalaalile.
Mukhabakisakho siindu tawe.’
“Sikila ekholo khukhwama ebunaswa yechile khukhwibwaakala Babiloni. Elakhola sibala sibe sichiimi, ne se siliio silasimenyamo tawe. Babaandu ne chisaang'i bilelukha.”
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, mu ndaalo echo ne mu biise ebio, babaandu ba Isiraeli ne babaandu ba Yuda, bakhebuusie alala mala beche ne balila. Balimbenja ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.
Balireeba engila echa Sayuni mala bachile khu ngila ng'eneyo baliloma bali, ‘yiicha khuambaane ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu ndakaano eya mindali ekhaliibililwa tawe.’
“Babaandu base babeele nga kamakheese niko babaayi batibisiilie mu bikulu. Batibile oli kamakheese kakama khu sikulu silala ne kacha khu siindi, mala bebiliile litaala engo wabwe.
Boosi ba banyoola babebwaakala. Basiku babwe baloma bali, ‘Efwe se khuli ne kumusaango tawe, sikila babene bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubwoni. Bakuuka babwe beyikina Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andi bosi bara lilieyikina liabwe mu niye.’
Sikila ese nja khusokosia mala ndeere khu Babiloni sipupu sie chikholo chimboofu khukhwama mu sibala sie bunaswa mala balebwaakala Babiloni. Balalwibwaka mulala sia mulala mala baluule. Bali banamae barana bakhaloota busa tawe.
Babiloni lulanuulwa ne boosi balunuula balibukula bioosi nibio benya. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Babaandu ba Babiloni,
mwanuula ekholo yase,
mwasangaalile lundi mwekhoyile
nga emoosi mu mayilwe
lundi nga chifarasi ne chichina.
Ne kakhali lukoba lwenywe luboofu
lulaambwa chisoni mala luchangalaale.
Ekholo eya Babiloni elaba ekholo eye asi khu kholo choosi,
sibala silaba sisiangalaamwe sisioomu siikhalimo kameechi tawe.
Sikila bukhalafu bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se silimenywamo tawe.
Ne kakhali silianjukhilwa elala.
Buli mundu osibiramo akhesiindukhe,
mala auke sikila kasiekholekhakho.
Enywe mweesi banamae
