kara lukoba lwa Babiloni mulwibwaakale
lulase buembo ne mukhasikasiakho luembo tawe,
sikila lwakholile bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Langilila liie khu Babiloni buli abuundu,
babaandu ba Babiloni,
chinjeko chalwo chakwiile,
kamasiisi kalwo katechuulwe,
sikila lino lili liliyacha lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
Yiyacha Babiloni,
bakholele niko bakholela babaandi.
Omumiichi akharamakho mu Babiloni tawe,
namwe okesa akhabukula engeso akese mu siise sie likesa tawe,
sikila liie lio musiku,
buli mundu alikobola ewabwe,
ne buli mundu aliilukha akobole mu sibala siewe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu ba Isiraeli bali nga kamakheese kayiimwa ne chitalang'i. Omwami owa Ashuru niye owanyoa abebwaakala, ne ekhumaliilikha omwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni abafunaake kamakuumba.”
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we Baisiraeli aloma ali, “Lola ese ndikho ndeera siiukuumo khu mwami owa Babiloni ne mu sibala siewe bulayi bwene nga ne naukuuma omwami owa Ashuru.
Khakobosie Baisiraeli mu sibala siabwe, bakhalie biakhulia bimiichwa khu sikulu sia Karimeli ne mu lukoongo lwa Basiani, mala bakhalie biakhulia bioosi bimiichwa mu bibala bia Efuraimu ne mu Kileati bekure.
Ne siise esio ne sikhoole, bubwoni se buliba mu Isiraeli namwe bumayaanu mu Yuda tawe. Kaliba kario sikila ese ndibeela abo nibo naramia. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Cha mwibwaakale sibala sia Merataimu
ne bamenywa ba Pekoti.
Beere mala mubabunisilie elala,
mala khola koosi niko ese mulakiliisie.
Lukukuulo lwe liie lulikho luuliilikha mu sibala,
mala lilionaka likali liliio.
Babiloni siebwaakala sibala sioosi,
ne luno kamaani kabwe kabaweele.
Chikholo choosi chesiinduukhe khu sibala esio.
Ee, Babiloni nakhureka buko mala bwakhuamba,
ne se wamanya tawe,
wanyolekhana mala watiilwa
sikila wayingana ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi erekeekhe ne bulwaani bwewe,
mala arusiisie bulwaani mu lirima liewe,
sikila Omwami WELE we banamae ali ne kumulimo khukhola
mu sibala sie Bakalitayo.
Khemwiche khukhwama chimbeka choosi mwibwaakale Babiloni,
funaka bibiaki bialwo
buunga nibio munuulile nga mubuunga biakhulia.
Yonakaka sibala,
siikharamakhomo sisiindu tawe.
Yiira banamae babwe boosi,
beere
Babaandu ba Babiloni balamiilwe,
siise siolile sie khubaukuuma.
“Bamula khukhwama mu sibala sia Babiloni ne becha Yerusalemu, mala baboola nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe ne eacha khu niko Babiloni siakhola khu Lukaangu lwewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khwako baele ba Babiloni balererwa khu ngila che mu lukoba, ne banamae balwo boosi balabuna khu ndaalo eyo.”
Omwami WELE we banamae aloma ali,
“Ese nakhufutariire ewe, ewe we sileka,
sikila endaalo yowo yolile,
siise nisio ndakhuukuumilakho.
Owe sileka aletuya mala akwe
ne se aliio olamwinyosia tawe,
ndabwana kumulilo mu ngoba chewe,
mala kulosia boosi bamukara.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, aloma ali, “Babaandu ba Isiraeli alala ne babaandu ba Yuda boosi balikho bapisibwa sibi. Abo ba babaamba babaliindile siimbi mbo se banyala belukha tawe.
Ne kakhali oyo olabasikula ali ne kamaani, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omwene alemeelela buli siindu mala areere kumuleembe khu sibala ne kakhali khu Babiloni ndareera butinyu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Liie liechile khu Bakalitayo
ne khu bamenywa ba Babiloni,
ne khu bemeelesi balwo ne babaandu balwo bakesi.
Liie khu bang'oosi balwo babeeyi
mala balaba basilu
liie khu banamae balwo mala balabuna.
Liie khu farasi chabwe ne khu makaari kabwe ke liie,
ne khu banamae babwe bakeni boosi,
mala balaba nga bakhasi!
Liie khu miaandu kiabwe kioosi mala balanuulwa!
Siimiyu silaba khu njichi chabwe
mala chilateenya
Sikila sili sibala sie bifwaani
mala kimiooyo kiabwe kioosi kili khu bifwaani.
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi onakaka Sodomu ne Komora ne chingoba chichaba siimbi, nio se aliio omundu yesi yesi olimenya mu Babiloni tawe, ne mbao omundu olibiramo tawe.
“Lola babaandu balikho becha khukhwama ebunaswa,
ekholo eye kamaani, ne babaami bakali
balikho basokosia khukhwama mu sibala sie aleeyi.
Babanuule buyiingo ne kamafumo,
bali bakhalafu lundi se bali be siisa tawe.
Bauuma busa nga enyanja,
batimia chifarasi,
Befwarire oli baberekekhele liie
khumwibwaakala enywe, ee baandu ba Babiloni!
“Omwami owa Babiloni auliile khukhwicha khwabwe,
mala kamakhono kewe kalikho kareenga,
bireengo biamuambile
buchuuni oli bwo mukhasi olumwa.
“Lola, nga etalang'i ne yama mu sichiimi sia Yoritani khukhwibwaakala litaala liboofu lie kamakheese, sesi ndabakhola belukhe sibala sia Babiloni mala ndarobora omwami niye nenya amiie sibala esio. Sikila naanu oli nga ese? Ne naanu onyala wanyala ese? Ne mwaayi siina onyala akhingiilila ese?
Khwako ulila kamarekekha kamabi niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile khu Babiloni, nende niko abisiisie khu maloba ke Bakalitayo. Ng'ali babaana balakhuruurwa bayilwe aleeyi mala ng'ali buli mundu alelaliila sikila butinyu bwabwe.
Liloba lilareenga sikila likwa lia Babiloni, ne bikukuulo bia Babiloni bilauliilikha mu kholo chingali.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola ese ndenyosia kumwoyo kwo mwonaki
khu Babiloni ne khu bamenywa basio.
Ndaruma baseesa e Babiloni
mala balaseesa sibala esio
basilekhile busa ne balisibwaakala buli lubeka
khu ndaalo eye butinyu bwasio.
Omulasi owe buembo akhalasa tawe,
namwe akhabanuula bulwaani tawe,
mukhalekha basoleeli basio baele baona tawe
yirira elala banamae basio.
Baleererwa mu sibala sie Bakalitayo
ne balaumiila mu ngila che chingoba chabwe.
Sikila babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda se balianjukhwa ne Wele,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
ne kakhali sibala sia Babiloni siechula bumayaanu
khu Mutakatifu owa Isiraeli.
Yilukha murure mu Babiloni,
buli mundu eonie omwene.
Omundu akherwa sikila bumayaanu bwa Babiloni tawe
sikila sino sili siise sie liliiyacha lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Alaruungia Babiloni nisio sikhoyela siruungwe.
Siakhola liloba lioosi liameela
chikholo choosi chanywa endali yasio chalalukha.
Babiloni siakwiile khangu mala sionaakwe
lila sikila Babiloni!
Siilile kamalesi sikila buchuuni bwasio
wakana sinyala siaona khukhwama khu bulwaale bwasio.”
“Khukhakile khusilikha Babiloni
ne kakhali se siiona tawe.
Khusianjukhe lekha khusianjukhe mala khuche
buli mundu mu sibala siewe
sikila bukhalaki bwasio bwolile mwikulu
lundi bwaniinile bwolile mu ngaaki.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekesia bung'ali bwefwe
khemwiche khulaangilile mu Sayuni
kimilimo nikio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe akholile.
Akala buembo!
Banula chingabo!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi enyoosie kimiooyo kie babaami ba Medesi, sikila enya abunie Babiloni. Lilienelio lili lilieyacha lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lilieyacha khulwe Lukaangu lwewe.
Suta e pendera eye khukhwibwaakala kamasiisi ka Babiloni
tasa banamae
raao baliindi.
Rekekha babebuulila Omwami
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile niko aarekekha
lundi niko aalaka khu bamenywa ba Babiloni.
mala muli baiinda mu mabiikhilo kenywe,
khumaliilikha khwenywe khwolile
bulamu bwenywe bwakituukhe nga buusi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi echubile ali,
“Alareera babaandu bakali bebwaakale Babiloni nga chisike
mala balekhoya sikila bamuulile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abuumba sibala khulwe bunyali bwewe,
mala emia sibala khulwe bukesi bwewe
ne khulwe limanya liewe abalaayia likulu.
Ne alomaloma ne kameechi ke mungaaki kaoloola
ne abuusianga kamafuumbi khukhwama buli lubeka khwiloba.
Akhola lueni ne lumeniuukhila mu fula,
mala areera ekhuungu khukhwama alibiikhilo liewe.
Buli mundu ali omusilu ne se ali ne limanya tawe,
buli omubasi aambwa chisoni,
khulwe bifwaani biewe bie bawele
sikila bifwaani ebio bili bie bubeeyi
ne se bili ne bulamu tawe.
Bili bibiindu biikhali ne bukhala tawe,
bikhoyeele bialekwa
mu biise bie bukhalaki bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bikhabune.
Wele owa Yakobo se ali nga nibio tawe.
Sikila niye ali Omubuumbi owe bibiindu bioosi
ne Isiraeli eli ekholo eye kumukabwa kwewe,
lisina liewe lili bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Babiloni ewe oli enyundo yase ne bulwaani bwe liie
khurumikhira ewe khukhwarakaka chikholo mu bitonyi
khurumikhira ewe khukhwonakaka bubwami.
Khurumikhira ewe chifarasi ne bachitimia,
khurumikhira ewe khukhwonakaka kamakaari ke liie ne bakatimia.
Khurumikhira ewe khukhwira babaandu be siseecha nende be siikhasi
khurumikhira ewe khukhwira basaakhulu ne baele
khurumikhira ewe khukhwira basoleeli ne bakhaana,
khurumikhira ewe khukhwira babaayi ne kamakheese kabwe,
khurumikhira ewe khukhwira balimi ne chieeyi chabwe.
Khurumikhira ewe khukhwira babaami ne banamae babemeelesi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kharuunge Babiloni ne bamenywa bamwo enywe ne muloleleele. Khakhole ndio sikila bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo bakhola mu Sayuni.
Babiloni, oli nga sikulu sinyala sionaka sibala sioosi.
Ne kakhali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
nakhakwa omusiku wowo.
Ndakhutiila khuupe
mala khukhuruurire asi,
mala khulekhe mwipukhuulu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Mbao libaale lilibukulwa khukhwama khwiwe liche liombakhilwe tawe
okhabe nga sichiimi khulwa mindali,
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Suta ependera khu sibala,
khupa ekhoombi mu kholo choosi
Rekekha chikholo chipane ne Babiloni
laanga babaami ba Ararati, Mini ne Ashikenasi balwibwaakale.
Robora banamae babemeelesi balwibwaakale
ruma chifarasi chingali nga chisike.
Rekekha chikholo chipane ne Babiloni,
babaami ba Medesi
ne babaami be chingoongo ne bayeeti babwe
alala ne bibala bioosi nibio bamiia.
Sibala sirenga ne khuterema mu buchuuni,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalaake kamabi khu Babiloni,
asikhole sibe sichiimi,
omundu akhasimenyamo tawe.
Banamae ba Babiloni balekhile khukhupana,
bali busa mu ngoba chabwe che kamaani,
kamaani kabawelemo
babeele busa nga bakhasi,
bumenyo bwa Babiloni bulikho buyia,
mala chinjeko chalwo chafuniikhe.
Omutimi atima ne akaanana no kundi,
ne omurume akaanana no murume wasie,
bacha khuboolela omwami owa Babiloni bali,
lukoba lwewe lwebwaakaalwe buli lubeka.
Kamafubukho kaambiilwe
ne chingoba che kamaani chosiibwe,
ne banamae balikho barenga.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aloma ali,
“Babaandu ba Babiloni bali nga luuya lwe khuulilakho biakhulia,
mu siise nisio baliswalakililwakho
ne enyuma we siise sitiiti siri
biise bie likesa bioola.
Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni akhwonakaka efwe akhubunia
akhukhola khwaba nga enyuungu ekhalimo siindu tawe,
akhumila nga endemu,
echuusie enda yewe ne bibiindu biefwe
mala akhukhasile.
Babaandu ba Babiloni balaruungwa bumayaanu nibwo bakhukholela efwe,
lekha babaandu ba Sayuni balome bali,
‘Sifuki siefwe sikhoya sibe khu baandu ba Babiloni.’
Lekha Yerusalemu lubole lurio lwoosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Lola, ndamupanila enywe,
mala neyache sikila enywe.
Ndateenyisia enyanja eya Babiloni
ne khukhola esebele yabwe eteenye,
mala Babiloni lulaba nga libuumbi lie kamakuunda,
abuundu niio chingipwe chisamila
abuundu ariisia lundi e khuukia
niio omundu akhamenya tawe.
Babaandu ba Babiloni balaulukhumila alala nga chitalang'i
balabuluula busa nga ching'ana che talang'i.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ne basiekoomba ndabarekekhera naikara
mbameesie bachekhe lukali
mala bakone liilo nilio bakhenyokha tawe,
ne se balisisimukha tawe.
Khabareere nga kamameeme kacha khwirwa
nga kamamiiku ne chindurume.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khu Babiloni lukoba nilwo sibala sioosi siafumia!
Iwaambilwe!
Babiloni lwabeele lwe khuukia
mumoni mwe chikholo chichiindi.
Enyanja yechile mu Babiloni,
yalufuunikha ne bibuli bie kameechi bisiuubulukha.
Chingoba cha Babiloni chabeele che khuriisia,
siabeele sibala sie enjala lundi sisiangalaamwe,
sibala nisio omundu akhamenyamo tawe,
lundi nisio omwana wo mundu akhanyala abiramo tawe.
Ne ese ndaukuuma wele owa Babiloni bali Beli,
mala mukhole afuche nisio efuunda.
Chikholo se chilamwichakho chingali lundi tawe,
lisiisi lia Babiloni liakwiile.
Baandu base, rura mu Babiloni
lekha buli mundu eonie
khukhwama khu burafu bwe lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Mukhafwa kimiooyo namwe mwaria,
sikila niko muulile khuloondekhana ne sibala esio tawe,
likhuwa liicha khu mwiiko mulala,
likhuwa liliindi liicha kumwiiko kuloondakho
kamakhuwa khuloondekhana ne sisiayuumba mu sibala,
ne khuloondekhana no mwami okhupana no kundi.
Khwako, lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha,
nicho ndaukuumilamo bifwaani bia Babiloni
sibala sia Babiloni sioosi siliaambwa chisoni,
ne baliirwa boosi balibamo bakali.”
“Nio likulu ne liloba,
ne nebio bioosi bilimo
bilimba ne khukhwekhoya sikila khukwa khwa Babiloni.
Sikila balibunia Babiloni baliama ebunaswa.
bulayi bwene nga babeerwa mu sibala sioosi ne bakwa sikila Babiloni.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Enywe mumwebacha lifwa,
cha mukhema tawe!
Khebulila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne muli mu sibala sie aleeyi,
mala mwibaasie Yerusalemu.
Muloma muli,
‘Efwe khwaambwa chisoni
sikila khwachangalaasibwa
sikila baakwa becha
mala bengila Abuundu Atakatifu munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khwako lola chindaalo chilikho chiicha,
nicho ese ndikholelamo bukhalaki khu bifwaani
ne mu sibala sia Babiloni sioosi bauniilwe baleundukuma
ne khuraacha.
Babiloni siakhaniina
mungaaki tibotibo,
mala siombakheyo chingoba che
kamasiisi che kamaani ese
ndaruma babonaki basibwaakale.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ulila bililo biama Babiloni
kumuulo kwe lilionakwa liboofu
kuuliilikha khukhwama mu sibala
sie Bakalitayo!
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho onaka Babiloni,
alasisia luyoka lwalwo lukali.
Bibuli bie basiku bilasiubulukha
busa nga kameechi kamakali
kimimilo kie khuoloola khwabwe kilauliilikha lundi.
Sikila omwonaki aleecha khukhwibwaakala Babiloni
banamae bakhulu ba Babiloni balaambwa
ne buyiingo bwabwe bulafunakwa
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele oruunga bumayaanu
ng'ali alaruungia Babiloni mu bwichufu.
Ndameesia baruki basio
babaandu be limanya, babemeelesi,
ne banamae balacha khukona ne se balenyokha tawe,
ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
Lisina liase bali Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe banamae aloma ali,
“Lisiisi lia Babiloni liboofu
lilayaasibwa liole khu liloba,
ne bilibwa bialwo bileeyi bilosibwa.
Babaandu bakhola kia busa,
chikholo cheluya busa, khulwe khukhwosibwa
ne kumulilo kwong'ene.”
Omung'oosi Yeremia alaka Seraya okhwa Neria omwichukhulu owa Maiseya, omukholi owo mwami Sedekia owa Yuda, mu mwiiko kwe khane kwe bubwami bwewe nga ne aaba nalikho aronga no mwami khucha e Babiloni.
Yeremia aba aandike mu sitabu bumayaanu bwoosi bubwaba khukhwola bwiche khu Babiloni, kamakhuwa koosi kakaba ne kaandikwa khu Babiloni.
Yeremia aboolela Sereya ali, “Nga ne woola Babiloni lola oli osoma kamakhuwa kano ne kumumilo kwe angaaki,
mala oboole oli, ‘Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe waboola oli okhonake abuundu ano, nio omundu namwe esaang'i akhamenyamo tawe, alanjukhwa khulwa mindali na mindali.’
Nga ne omala khu soma sitabu sino, boakho libaale mala osimwaate akari mu luuchi lwa Efurati,
mala oboole oli, ‘Babiloni lukhesiikhe lurio mala se lukhasiubulukhe lundi tawe, sikila bumayaanu nibwo ese ndikho nja khulureerera.’ ”
Kano niko kamakhuwa ka Yeremia.

Sedekia aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na mulala ne amiia khuba omwami owa Yuda, mala amiia Yerusalemu kimiiko ekhumi na mulala. Maawe aba bali Hamutali omukhaana owa Yeremia, owamenya mu lukoba lwa Libuna.
Omwami Sedekia akhola bubwoni khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne bulayi bweene nga nibwo Omwami Yehoyakimu akhola.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aba ne lirima likali khu baandu ba Yerusalemu ne Yuda mala abaukuuma ebweeni wewe.
Ne Sedekia aba omureengu khu mwami Nebukadinesa owa Babiloni.
Ne mu mwiiko kwa tisa, khu ndaalo eye khumi eye kumwesi kwe khumi kwe bubwami bwa Sedekia, Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni echa ne banamae bewe boosi khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu mala balwibuulila, bombakha kamasiisi ke khu khwibuulilamo kalukara.
Nio lukoba lwebuulilwa khukhwola khu mwiiko kwe khumi na mulala kwe liliamiia lio mwami Sedekia.
Oli khu ndaalo eya tisa eye kumwesi kwe khane enjala yaba endafu lukali mu lukoba se siabao siakhulia khu baandu be mu sibala tawe.
Nio lukoba lwebwaakalwa mala banamae boosi belukha barura mu lukoba mu silo, babirira khu ngila eye silibwa sie akari we kamasiisi engila ebiriira mu siluundu sio mwami, nga Bababiloni ne baba ne bakarire lukoba. Mala belukha balola lubeka lwa Araba.
Ne banamae be Bababiloni batimania omwami Sedekia, bamunyoolela khu mweyeeywe kwa Yeriko, mala banamae bewe boosi bamwanjukha.
Nio baamba omwami Sedekia mala bamureera khu mwami owa Babiloni mu lukoba lwa Ribula mu sibala sia Hamati. Ne ebweeneyo Nebukadinesa akhalakila Sedekia.
Omwami owa Babiloni eera basoleeli ba Sedekia mumoni chewe akhaba lundi eera babemeelesi ba Yuda mu Ribula.
Enyuma wako afutula Sedekia chimoni, amuboa kiminyololo mala amubukula amuyila e Babiloni. Sedekia arama mu siboe mu Babiloni nabwila afwa.
Khu ndaalo eye khumi eye kumwesi kwa kharaano, kukwaba kumwiiko kwe khumi ne kimiiko tisa kwe bubwami bwa Nebukadinesa, omwami owa Babiloni. Nebusaratani owaba omunamae omukhulu owaliindanga omwami owa Babiloni, becha bengila mu Yerusalemu.
Osia Lukaangu, lichipi lio mwami owa Yuda, ne chinju chichiindi choosi che babaandu bakhoongo mu Yerusalemu.
Nio banamae ba Babiloni ba baaba no munamae omukhulu, batechula kamasiisi koosi kakabotookhelela lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Ne Nebusaratani omunamae omukhulu abukula baboe babaandu ba baaba bataambi lukali mu baandu babaandi ne babaandu babarama mu lukoba ne babaandi babamulila khu mwami owa Babiloni alala ne bafundi babaandi boosi.
Nebusaratani omunamae omukhulu alekha bataambi balala bakile chisabibu ne khulima kimikuunda.
Babukula akhaba ne chinyuungu ne chimbako na buano ne chinjelo ne bibuumba bie biiunya bulayi, ne bibiindu bioosi bie kumukasa nibio bakholelanga kimilimo mu Lukaangu.
Babukula akhaba bibuumba bikeekhe ne bifuria ne chinjelo ne chinyuungu, ne biteetwe bie chitaa ne bibuumba bie khurakho biiunya bulayi ne bibuumba bie khusutilakho kamalasile ke khuosia. Omunamane omukhulu abukula buli sisiindu sie sahabu nga esahabu ne sie fwesa nga efwesa.
Ne chinjeko chibili che kumukasa, ne nyanja eyekhala khu uunwa ekhumi na chibili che kumukasa ne biteetwe bie kumukasa bisutibwa, nibio omwami Solomoni akhola khulwe Lukaangu, kumukasa kwe bibiindu bino bioosi kwaba kumusiro lukali.
Ne chinjeko chibili echo chaba chindekhaane, buli ndala yaba buleeyi chimita munaane khucha angaaki ne khubotookhelesia chimita chiraano ne bitonyi bitaru ne buboofu chimilimita ekhumi na chiraano. Chinjeko chaba chayikukha ekhoombe mukari.
Buli enjeko yaba ne siukutwa sie kumukasa, buleeyi bwe siukutwa bwaba chimita chibili ne bitonyi bibili, biukutwa bino biaba biaronwa ne bifwaani bie bibiaamo bie kamakomanga, ke kumukasa, kumukasa kwaba kwafuuma khu biukutwa khwoosi.
Biabao bifwaani bie bibiaamo bie kamakomanga kamakhumi tisa ne bifwaani sita chimbeka choosi bibiabonekha ne wimile asi ne buli enjeko yaba ne bifwaani bie bibiaamo emia ndala.
Nebusaratani omunamae omukhulu abukula Seraya Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne Sefania omusaayi oloondela omukhulu, ne baliindi be kumuliango bataru acha nabo ne bali baboe.
Ne khu barama mu lukoba abukula omunamae ne basaakhulu saba khu be kumuse kwo mwami babanyolekha mu lukoba, no muandiki owa komanda owe banamae owaandikanga babaandu be mu sibala ne babaandu kamakhumi sita khu baandu be mu sibala, babanyolekha mu lukoba.
Mala Nebusaratani omunamae omukhulu abaamba abareera khu Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni e Ribula.
Ne omwami Nebukadinesa abapa abeerera e Ribula mu sibala sia Hamasi.
Nono Yuda aambwa auyisibwa arusibwa mu sibala siewe.
Bano nibo baboe nibo Nebukadinesa abukula. Mu mwiiko kwewe kukhola saba abukula Bayaudi chielefu chitaru ne kamakhumi kabili na bataru.
Mu mwiiko kwewe kwe khumi na munaane abukula baboe mia naane salasina mbili khukhwama mu Yerusalemu.
Ne mu mwiiko kwewe kwe kamakhumi kabili na kitaru Nebusaratani omunamae wewe abukula baboe mia saba arubaina tano babaandu boosi alala ba babukulwa baba chielefu chine ne chimia sita.
Ne mu mwiiko kwe kamakhumi kataru na saba kwe khuuyisibwa khwa Yehoyakini omwami owa Yuda, mu mwesi kukhola ekhumi na kibili khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chiraano mu mwiiko nikwo
Ebilimerodaki amiisibwakho aba omwami owa Babiloni arusia Yehoyakini omwami owa Yuda mu siboe mala alomaloma ne naye bulayi mala amuelesia endebe eye lukoosi ekhila chindebe che babaami babaandi nibo aba nabo mu Babiloni.
Khwako Yehoyakini afukiililwa khufuula chingubo che mu siboe. Mala khulwe bulamu bwewe bwoosi bubwaba ne buramire, alichanga buli lwosi khu sialwa sio mwami.
Buli endaalo, omwami owa Babiloni aelesia Yehoyakini chirupia che khurumikhira khuloondekhana ne lilienya lia Yehoyakini khukhwola endaalo eye lifwa liewe.

Lie khuukia, lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lulwaba lwechula babaandu,
luno luli busa!
Lulwaba ne fuma mu sibala sioosi,
luno lwekelile nga namulekhwa,
Lulwaba lukoosi mu ngoba choosi,
luno lwekelile nasioobi.
Lukoba lulila lukali siilo sioosi, kamasika keekha.
Mu basiime balwo boosi, se aliio oluoleelesia tawe.
Basaale balwo baluchonganiile,
mala boosi bakwile basiku balwo.
Babaandu ba Yuda bachiile mu mbaambe,
mu butinyu ne khuuba banasioobi.
Bamenyile mu Be Chikholo, se bali nende niio baolela tawe.
Basiku babwe babakariire akari we butinyu bwabwe.
Kimiila kicha Sayuni kieteleelile,
sikila se aliio ocha mu naikara chicharoborwa tawe.
Bilibwa bialwo bioosi bianjuukhwe
basaayi be lukoba baana.
Bakhaana balwo bapisibwa sibi,
ne lulwene luli ne buchuuni bukali.
Basiku balwo balwamiie,
luno luli mu bunyali bwabwe.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alukholile lunaanisibwe
sikila bukali bwe bubwoni bwalwo.
Batilile babaana balwo,
mala babayilile aleeyi.
Bulayi bwa Yerusalemu obwo bwaweele.
Babemeelesi balwo bawelemo kamaani,
nga chimboongo chiili ne njala,
chiboombeleelwe kamaani,
ne chilukha abo bachaaya.
Mu ndaalo che butinyu ne buchuuni bwa Yerusalemu,
Yerusalemu lukhebulila bulayi bubwabaao.
Bibiindu bie bukusi bioosi,
bibiaba bialwo khukhwama khale.
Nga babaandu balwo ne bakwa,
mu bunyali bwo omusiku,
omundu se abao oluyeeta tawe.
Omusiku asangaala,
ne khuchekheelela khukwa khwalwo.
Lukoosi lwalwo lwawele, luli sichula lundi lwalekiilwe,
lulila mu buchuuni ne khuambwa chisoni.
Yerusalemu lwenyaalutisie ne bubwoni bubi lukali.
Bunyaalu bwalwo bweyaniikhiile,
ne se lweendekhelela libuna lialwo liliicha tawe.
Likwa lialwo lili lie khuriisia ne se aliio onyala aluoleelesia tawe.
Basiku balwo baluulile, mala lulilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alukholele siisa.
Basiku balwo balunuulile kamabiikhilo kalwo koosi,
lwababona ne bengila akhaba mu Lukaangu,
abuundu niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yaba akaania Be Chikholo khucha.
Babaandu balwo boosi beloocha ne bayiima siakhulia.
Boofula kamabiikhilo kabwe khulwe siakhulia nio babe ne kamaani.
Lukoba lulila luli, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bona siibi nisio ndimo.”
Lukoba lulilila buli obira luli,
“Lola salikhoo owabona buchuuni nga bubwase buno tawe.
Buchuuni nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andeerera mu siise sie lirima liewe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera kumulilo khukhwama mungaaki,
kwanjosiisie akhaba mu bikuumba.
Andekire luriimba, mala lwakhupile asi,
anjanjukhe ne khukhundekha mu buchuuni.
“Abala bubwoni bwase mala abura alala,
mala abura mwikosi mwase,
mala nabombelelwa kamaani.
Omwami anda mu makhono ke basiku base,
ne se nanyala khubakholakho siosi siosi tawe.
“Omwami achekheelela banamae base boosi be kamaani,
aruma banamae bewe khukhwira babase.
Aswalakiliile babaandu base oli osuura endali.
“Ese ndila sikila bibiindu bino,
kamasika keekha,
sikila Omuoleelesi wase ali aleeyi nase,
oyo oundamo kumwoyo,
babaana base banjuukhwe sikila omusiku ambulile.
“Sayuni lwasutile kamakhono kalwo mungaaki,
ne se aliio oluoleelesia tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abisiisie siiukuumo khunju eya Yakobo.
Ali bachirani khukhwola babe basiku bewe.
Yerusalemu lwekelile sisiindu sinyaalu mu nibo.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali owa ng'ali, sikila nalobile khuria likhuwa liewe,
ne kakhali ulila, enywe babaandu mweesi,
mala mubone linaanisibwa liase,
basoleeli ne bakhaana base baele bachiile mu mbaambe.
“Ese nalaanga basiime base ne kakhali bambea,
basaayi base ne babemeelesi babuniile mu lukoba,
nga baba ne balikho bayiima siakhulia balie banyoole kamaani.
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lola ese ndi mu buchuuni ne bubeeleli,
ne kumwoyo kwase kwesiindukhe sikila bubwoni bwase.
Bubwiri buli khu ngila che lukoba,
akhaba munju lifwa lilimo.
“Ulila nga ne ndila,
se aliio onyala amboleleesia tawe.
Basiku base boosi baulile butinyu bwase.
Basangaale sikila ewe obureerire.
Lekha endaalo niyo wabisia yoole,
ne lekha basiku base bapwe sibi nga ese.
“Bakhalakile khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe,
baukuume nga ne wambukuuma ese sikila bubwoni bwase.
Ndi mungunyi mala ndila mu buchuuni.”

Omwami mu lirima liewe areere babaandu ba Sayuni mu siilima,
bulayi nibwo baluelesia khukhwama mwikulu bwaweele,
mu siise sie lirima liewe anjukha Lukaangu lwewe.
Omwami onakake buli sirekere sia Yuda,
se abikholelakho siisa tawe,
atechuule kamasiisi kakaba ne kakhiingilila babaandu.
Areera chisoni khu baami ne khu baruki ba Yuda.
Mu lirima liewe likali abunia Isiraeli,
aloba khukhuyeeta endaalo niyo basiku bechela.
Akhwosia oli kumulilo, onakaka buli siindu.
Eerekekha khukhulasa efwe buembo bwewe nga omusiku,
eera babaandu befwe nibo khweyiikina.
Khwabona lirima liewe likali mu Yerusalemu.
Omwami abuniisie Isiraeli nga omusiku,
atechuule kamasiisi kakaliinda babaandu,
onakake kamachipi.
Arereere babaandu ba Yuda bubeeleli bukhawa tawe.
Atechula Lukaangu niio khwamusaayilanga,
akaamie chindaalo chindakatifu ne chisabato.
Lirima liewe liabele khu mwami no musaayi.
Omwami alobile alutare yewe ne khurura mu Lukaangu lwewe lutakatifu,
afukiilila omusiku khutechula lisiisi lialwo.
Basiku basangaalila bukhili bwabwe niio efwe khwasaayilanga ne khoyo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi beele abisiisie kamasiisi ka Sayuni katechulwe,
akapiima khumanya ali buli siindu sioneekhe,
se waresiisie kumukhono kwewe kwe khukhwonaka tawe.
Akholile enjeko ne lisiisi khusooma,
bililila alala.
Bilibwa bialwo biesikhile mwiloba,
atechule ne khufunaka kimitalaachi kialwo,
Omwami ne babemeelesi balwo bali balala khu Be Chikholo,
lilaka se liekisibwa lundi tawe,
ne bang'oosi balwo se banyoolanga kamalola khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Basaakhulu be babaandu ba Sayuni,
bekhala asi ne basila busa.
Bechukhile lipukhuulu khu mirwe kiabwe,
mala befwarire kamakunia.
Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu,
benamisie kimirwe kiabwe asi.
Chimoni chase chaluiliile sikila khulila.
Kumwoyo kwase kunaanisibwa,
naluiliile mu bubeeleli,
khulwe linaanisibwa lie babaandu base,
sikila babaana batoro ne bang'alia bafwila mu ngila che lukoba.
Balilila bamawaabwe bali,
“Khuli ne njala lundi khuli ne bulesia.”
Ne bafwa oli babaandu babapilwe mu ngila che mu lukoba,
ne bafwila khu bifuba bie bamawaabwe.
Ee ewe owa Yerusalemu,
ese ndome siina khwiwe?
Khulekhaasia khu siindu siina nio khuolelesie,
ee mundu owe Sayuni?
Sikila lilionakwa liowo lili libalaayi nga enyanja,
naanu onyala akhukobosia niio waba?
Bang'oosi bowo bakhubonele,
kamalola ke bubeeyi lundi katiimia,
se babakaale abuwaanga bumayaanu bwowo,
nio okobole niio waba tawe,
ne kakhali bakhung'oolela burume bwe bubeeyi lundi butiimia.
Boosi babirira khu ngila,
bamukhoma enywe,
bauka ne khusisiikha kimirwe kiabwe,
sikila lukoba lwa Yerusalemu,
bareeba bali,
“Luno nilwo lukoba lulwalaangwa,
lwe mu lukoondo lwoosi,
liliekhoya lie sibala sioosi ku?”
Basiku bowo boosi bakhuchekheelela ne khukhuloleelela ne libiila,
bauka ne khukhwikhana bali,
“Khwababunisie!
Aa, yino niyo endaalo niyo khwalindilenge,
luno yolile khwakibone!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile niko arekekha,
akholile niko ariikhirisia nga ne arao khukhwama khale,
atechule nakhali ne siisa tawe,
akholile omusiku asangaalile kamabi kakekholekha khwise,
mala afumisie kamaani ke basiku base.
Ee ewe mundu owa Sayuni!
Lilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukali!
Lekha kamasika keekhe nga luluuchi.
Siilo ne kumuusi!
Okhaolakho tawe,
chimoni chowo chikhabakho ne siuluukho tawe!
Yinyokha siilo olile,
lila buli khase siilo sioosi,
ra koosi kaali mu mwoyo kwowo ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mwikoonjelele mwisaba,
khulwe bulamu bwe babaana bowo,
balikho bafwa enjala buli abuundu khu ngila che lukoba.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lola mala obone!
Naanu nibo wakholelakho kano?
Ewe wenya bakhasi balie babaana babwe,
babaana nibo basiima?
Omusaayi no mung'oosi beererwe
Abuundu Atakatifu owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Baele ne basaakhulu,
bakonile mwipukhuulu lie chingila,
bakhaana ne baele base,
beriirwe ne mbalu mwiie,
waberiire mu ndaalo eye lirima liowo,
wabakhonyile nokhali ne siisa tawe.
“Ewe walanga basiku base khu ndaalo eya naikara eyaroborwa,
ne khu ndaalo eye lirima liowo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
se aliio owebacha namwe owarama tawe,
abo nibo nalela ne khukhusia,
beriirwe no musiku wase.”

Ese ndi omundu oboone buchuuni,
asi we siboko sie lirima lia Wele.
Amboonile anderire mu siilima,
niio buwaanga bwosi bwosi bukhali tawe.
Ng'ali akhupanga lukali
endaalo yoosi.
Atofusie kumubili kwase,
mala afunakake kamakuumba kase.
Anjibwaakale ne khusira,
mu buchuuni ne kumunaanio.
Akholile ese menye mu siilima,
nga omundu owafwa khaale.
Angarire ne lisiisi nio khanyala nelukha tawe,
amboele kiminyololo kimisiro,
nakhalanga ne khulila khulwe buyeeti,
Wele alobile khurekeeresia lisaba liase.
Ekaasie kimiyila kiase ne kamabaale,
akoyanisie chingila chase.
Khwise ali nga sibulukhu sisiibuulila,
nga etalang'i eyikhiinile.
Andusiisie khu ngila yase
andabulaakemo,
mala andekhile busa.
Arekekha buyiingo bwewe
mala aluungikha luembo lwewe khwise.
Andasile khu mwoyo,
buembo bwe mu situukhu siewe.
Ese nekelile chinjekho che babaandu boosi,
liliamanana lie kimienya kiabwe endaalo yoosi.
Anjichusiemo buchuuni,
anjikuusie ne nabululu.
Akholile kameeno kase kapepene chimbaale,
mala akholile nefulafusie mwikokhe,
kumuleembe mu mwoyo mbamo,
nebiliile busangaafu.
Nio ese ndoma ndi “Bulayi bwase bwawa,
akhaba nibio nenya khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Khebulila butinyu bwase ne buchuuni,
bululu nga endurwe!
Ese njililila khubibaasia,
mala neunamila.
Ne kakhali ese khebulila lino,
ne khwako ndi ne lilieyikina.
Busiime bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se buwechanga tawe,
siisa siewe se sili ne sisiakamo tawe.
Biyia buli mutikhinyi,
busuubilwa bwewe buli bukali.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali kumukabwa kwase,
khwako ndimweyikina.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omulayi,
khwaabo bamweyikina,
ne khu muyiima.
Buli bulayi omundu alindiilile mu liliekhaliilikha,
buonia bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Buli bulayi omundu khuba ne liliekhaliilikha na siili omuele.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne enyile ario,
lekha ekhale yeng'ene mala asile.
Lekha eboombie,
lilieyikina likhola lirio liabao.
Akhapwa ne khukhomwa,
khafukiilile koosi.
Sikila Omwami
se alikhulobela ewe elala tawe.
Ne akhaba nakhubeelesia,
akhakhukholele siisa,
khuloondekhana ne busiime bwewe bwa buli lwoosi.
Sikila se asiima khuchuunia,
namwe khubeelesia babaandu tawe.
Owe Angaaki Lukali se afukiilila khuswalakilila baboe mu sibala tawe,
Khukaluukhasia bung'ali bwo mundu,
ebweeni wewe tawe,
namwe se afukiilila
bukhalaki khu mundu bukhali ng'ali tawe,
Naanu onyala alaka likhuwa mala liekholekha,
Omwami nakhareerekho kumukhono tawe?
Bubi ne bulayi,
se biama khuyo owe Angaaki Lukali tawe ku?
Siina sikila omundu omulamu eng'ulung'uunye,
ne aukuumwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe?
Lekha efwe khupiime mala khumenieelesie liiba liefwe,
nio khukoboleele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Lekha kimiooyo kiefwe ne kamakhono kalekhuule,
ebweeni wa Wele oli mwikulu.
“Efwe khwakholile bubwoni ne bureengu,
mala ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se wakhubeeleele tawe.
“Ewe wakhutimanie mala wakhubunia,
lirima liowo liakisa siisa siowo,
khulwe lirima liowo likali,
lisaba liefwe se liakhwolela tawe.
Ewe wakhukhola efwe khwaba nga kamandu,
mu baandu Be Chikholo.
“Basiku befwe boosi,
bakhukhoma ne khukhuchekheelela efwe.
Efwe khwabirire mwibuna ne lilionakaka,
khuli mu butinyu ne buuri.
Ndila lukali,
kamasika keekha nga luluuchi,
khulwe libunia lie babaandu base.
“Se ndalekha khulila tawe,
ndachiililila busa,
khukhwola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi oli mwikulu,
alole asi mala akhukholele siisa.
Kumwoyo kwase kuchuuna,
ne mbona kakekholeekhe khu bakhasi be mu lukoba.
“Abo bakhaba ne sifuno khuba basiku base tawe,
bambaaya nga enyuni.
Bamwaata mwiloo ne siili omulamu,
mala barayo libaale.
Kameechi kechula kanjola khu murwe,
mala nebaasia ndi lifwa liolile.
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese nakhulilila Ewe,
ne ndi mwiloo.
Nakhwikoonjelela mala ewe waulila,
se waloba khuulila khulila khwase khulwe buyeeti tawe!
Nakhulaanga ewe wecha aembi,
wamboolela oli, ‘Okharia tawe!’
“Ee Omwami, ewe waulile kakaase,
wasikuule bulamu bwase.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ewe waboone kamabi niko nakholelwa,
ewe khalakile mu bung'ali bwase.
Ewe waboone lichonganila liabwe lioosi,
ne kamarekekha kabwe koosi khwise.
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wauliile khukhoma khwabwe,
ne kamarekekha kabwe koosi khwise.
Endaalo yosi kamakhuwa ne kamebaasio ke basiku base,
kali khwise.
Lola mu likhala ne lilinyokha liabwe,
ese ndi sifuno sie kimienya kiabwe.
“Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe okhabaukuume,
khulwe bikholwa biabwe.
Ewe okhabalendaasie,
ne silaamo siowo sikhabe khu nibo.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu lirima liowo okhabaoone mala obabunie,
barure khu sibala.”

Esahabu epuukhile eriena,
Esahabu emiliiu ekaluukhane eriena!
Kamabaale kamatakatifu kasalanile
khu ngila choosi.
Baele be siseecha ba Sayuni,
baba ne bukhala khwifwe nga esahabu,
ne kakhali luno babalwa nga chinyuungu.
Akhaba chingipwe chinunianga ching'ana chacho,
ne kakhali babaandu base babeele barafu,
nga chinyeefwe mu sichiimi.
Balekha batoro babwe bafwa khulwe njala ne bulesia,
ne babaana basaba siakhulia ne se aliio obaelesia tawe.
Abo babalichanga naikara che biakhulia bilayi,
balikho bafwila khu ngila che mu lukoba,
ne abo babachoela mu buiinda bakonile khu mabuumbi.
lukoba lulwakwa siise sikeekhe siri,
omundu nakhaluambilekho tawe.
Babemeelesi balwo baba bakwalaafu khukhila liaarara
bawaanga khukhila kamabeele,
baaba babesemu khukhila liloba asi we nyanja,
lukoondo lwe kimibili kiabwe oli libaale lie bukusi lia samawi.
Luno bamaliie khukhila embilo,
babira khu ngila ne babaandu se babamanya tawe.
Sikhoba siabwe siekhunaare khu bikuumba biabwe,
mala bomile busa nga chiikhu.
Bali ne busangaafu abo babafwila mwiie,
khukhila nibo enjala yeera,
nibo enjala yeera kalaa
sikila se baba ne siakhulia tawe.
bakhasi be busiime bateekhile babaana babwe khulwe siakhulia.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhalala lukali,
ekesia lirima likali,
mala aambia kumulilo mu lukoba lwa Sayuni,
kwalosia lwakubukha.
Babaami be khu sibala,
namwe yesi yesi khu ba baamenya mu sibala se basuubila,
bali omusiku anyala engila mu bilibwa bia Yerusalemu tawe.
Lino liekholekha sikila bubwoni bwe bang'oosi ba Yerusalemu,
ne bubwoni bwe basaayi balwo,
babachukha sifuki sie babaandu baluungi
akari walwo.
Babemeelesi balwo bayiiyayiiya khu ngila nga babofu,
se abao yesi yesi owabatiilakho tawe,
sikila baba beakhile kamafuki.
Babaandu babayokelela bali,
“Cha eyo! Enywe babeeri! Mukhakhwichao tawe!”
Khwako bayiiyayiiya mu bibala ne se abao owabakaanila tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene abasalanisie,
se alibebaasiakho lundi tawe,
Basaayi se baebwa lukoosi tawe,
ne basaakhulu se basiimwa tawe.
Efwe khwaluilila khukhwikhala meso,
mu khulindiilila buyeeti bukhaliio tawe,
mu khwikhala khwefwe khwalindiilila
ekholo ekhanyala yakhuonia tawe.
Basiku befwe bakhwibuulila,
se khwakeendakho khu ngila tawe,
chindaalo chefwe chaba chaweele,
lifwa liefwe liaba liolile.
Bakhutimania efwe baba ne chimbilo chingali,
khukhila waasio chiili angaaki,
bakhutimanisilia mu bikulu,
bakhwibuulila mu sichiimi.
Baamba sinoko sie bulamu bwefwe,
omwami owaroborwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
niye khweyikina khukhuabina efwe khukhwama khu buli musiku.
Enywe baandu Baedomu, yekhoya mala musangaale,
enywe mumenyile mu sibala sia Usi
ne kakhali wesi butinyu bukhakhwichekho,
olimeela mala wefuule orame sichula.
Ee ewe owa Sayuni,
siiukuumo khulwe bubwoni bwowo siawele,
Omwami se alalekha muchiililile khuba mu mbaambe tawe,
ne kakhali ewe mukhaana wa Edomu, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaukuuma bumayaanu bwowo,
mala asiimbule bubwoni bwowo.

Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khebulila butinyu bwefwe,
bona nga khuli mu soni!
Kimiaandu kiefwe kiakabilwe bakeni,
chingo chefwe chabeele che baakwa.
Efwe khwabeele bafuubi,
bamaayi befwe bali nga banamulekhwa.
Khukula kameechi ke khunywa,
chiikhu nicho khutekhela.
Khukhola kimilimo nga chipunda,
khwaluile, ne se khunyoola siuluukho tawe.
Khwakholeele Bamisiri ne Baashuru kimilimo
nio khunyoole siakhulia sisioola.
Bakuuka befwe bakhola bubwoni mala bafwa,
ne efwe khunaanisibwa sikila bubwoni bwabwe.
Nasioobi bakhwamiia efwe,
se aliio onyala akhurusia efwe mu bunyali bwabwe tawe.
Khunyoola siakhulia siefwe mu butinyu,
sikila basiku bali buli abuundu.
Bikhoba biefwe bibila nga sisiooso,
khwang'aile lukali sikila enjala elikho ekhulia.
Babaandu bakwa khu bakhasi befwe mu Sayuni,
akhaba khu bakhaana befwe be mu ngoba cha Yuda.
Babemeelesi basuungwa kamakhono kabwe mungaaki,
mbao oria basaakhulu tawe.
Basoleeli befwe bayingililwa khusia khu lususi,
ne babaana be siseecha bataalitaala ne chiikhu khu mirwe.
Basaakhulu balekhile khucha mu chikoti,
ne basoleeli balekhile khukhwimba.
Busangaafu mu miooyo kiefwe bwaweele,
bukhino bwefwe bwabeele sibeela.
Ekuutwa eye lukoosi lwefwe yakwile,
khuli mu sibi sikila khwakholile bubwoni!
Kimiooyo kiefwe kilwaala sikila kano,
sikila bibiindu bino chimoni chefwe chabofuule.
Sikulu sia Sayuni sianjuukhwe,
luno chingipwe chikeendakho busa.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe wamiia buli lwoosi,
endebe yowo eye bubwami eliio khu selukho choosi.
Siina sikila Ewe nokhwibilila efwe buli lwoosi?
Siina sikila nokhwanjukhe efwe khulwe siise sileeyi?
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khekhukhukobolele khube nga khwaba!
Kalukhasia chindaalo chino, chibe nga yaba khaale!
Namwe ewe wakhwekaaniile elala?
Ewe osikhuambila lirima likali?

Khu ndaalo eya kharaano eye kumwesi (kwaba kumwiiko kwa kharaano kwe siboe sie mbaambe sio mwami Yehoyakini)
Nga naba mu Babiloni ambi ne luluuchi lwa Kebari, naulila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne andomalomakho mala andaakho kumukhono kwewe.
Nga ne nalola, nabona embembeesi yama ebunaswa. Lueni lwaburukha khukhwama mwifuumbi liboofu, lwakhosia mu ngaaki ne luchiililila. Nga lueni lwabonekhanga, chinjaso che kumulilo chakhosia mala sisiindu nga kumukasa siabonekhana.
Ne akari we mbembeesi sisiindu siamamo sifwaana nga bibuumbe bine bie bulamu. Mala biaba bifwaana biri: Biafwaana babaandu.
Ne buli silala siaba ne bubweeni bune, buli silala siaba ne chindaa chine.
Bikele biabio bikololofu, ne bikhandakilo biabio biaba nga bikhakayu bie khaafu, mala biang'enang'ena nga kumukasa.
Asi we chindaa chabio chimbeka chine, biaba ne kamakhono nga ko mundu. Bioosi bine biaba birio,
chindaa chabio chaba chetilanakho, chapurukhanga bukololofu ne bibuumbe ebio se biayuukhangakho tawe.
Mu moni mwabio, buli silala siaba ne bubweeni nga bwo mundu, Bioosi bine biaba ne lubeka luseecha lwe mu moni mwabio nga mwe talang'i, ne lubeka lukhasi lwafwaana nga mwe uunwa, lundi biafwaana mu moni nga mwe furuusi lubeka lwe nyuma.
Mu moni mwabio mwaba murio. Biabambula chindaa chabio mu ngaaki, buli sibuumbe siaba ne chindaa chibili, buli lutaa lwetiila khu lutaa lwe sibuumbe sisiindi ne chindaa chibili chafuuma kimibili kiabio.
Buli silala siapurukha bukololofu ebweeni, biachichanga osi osi niye roho eenyanga ne se biekhebukhakho tawe.
Akari we bibuumbe bie bulamu siabao sisiindu sifwaana nga kumulilo kwe kamaanda, nga chinjaso ne chiicha eyi ne eyi akari we bibuumbe bilamu. Kumulilo kwaba kwesing'eeng'ile lukali lundi kwarusia chimbeni.
Bibuumbe bilamu ebio bioosi biatima ne bicha eyi ne eyi khangu nga lueni.
Chingara chine echo chafwaanana, chang'enang'ena nga libaale lie bukusi lilaangwa Sabarachati, chaba chombakhwa nga engara mu kiindi.
Nio nga chingara echo ne chatima chacha chimbeka choosi chine ne chikhayuukhakho tawe.
Chingara chine echo chaba ne chingarangarani, ne chingarangarani chaba ne chiwaya, mala chingarangarani echo chaba chechulamo chimoni chimbeka choosi.
Ne nga bibuumbe bie bulamu biarekukha, chingara echo charekukhila khulala nabio. Ne nga bibuumbe bie bulamu biarura khu sibala bianiina angaaki, aakhaba chingara chosi chaniina.
Osi osi niio roho eenya khucha biacha, ne chingara charekukhila khulala nabio, sikila roho owe bibuumbe ebio aaba mu ngara echo.
Buli nga bibuumbe ne biarekukhanga, chingara chosi charekukha, buli nga ne biemanga, chosi chema, ne nga bianiina khukhwama khu sibala chingara chosi chaniina alala nabio, sikila roho owe bibuumbe bilamu ebio aaba mu ngara echo.
Ne aasi we mbaka eyo chindaa che bibuumbe chabambulwa chakololokha, buli lutaa lwalola niio luluundi luli. Ne buli sibuumbe siaba ne chindaa chibili chifuumile kumubili kwasio.
Ne nga biarekukha, naulila luyoka lwe chindaa chabio ne luuliilikha oli manya kameechi ke nyanja namwe nga luyoka lwe banamae bakali namwe nga liliatulukha lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Nga biema, biekhisia chindaa chabio.
Nio kumumilo kwauliilikhana khukhwama mu mbaka eye khu mirwe kiabio, nga biema biekhisia chindaa chabio.
Sifwaanani esio sing'enang'ena oli kumukasa mu mulilo. Khukhwamila abuundu aaba nga mu sibuno, siakhosia nga kumulilo buli abuundu ne buwaanga bukali.
Buli lukoondo nga lwe lufutu mwileesi biise bie fula. Buno bwaba buwaanga bukali buli abuundu bubwekesia luyali lwe khubao khwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nga nabona kano nakwa asi mafumala. Nio naulila kumumilo kwo mundu ne aloma

Ali, “Mwana wo mundu, yinyokha wime, ese nenya khulomaloma nawe.”
Ne nga aba ne alomaloma, roho owo Mwami anjingilamo ne khu khuunjimikha mala naulila ne alomaloma khwise.
Aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, ese ndikho khuruma ewe khu baandu ba Isiraeli, khu kholo eye sileka, babaandu babanjekaana. Nibo ne baraara babwe bakholile bumayaanu khwise khukhwola endaalo yino.
Babaandu be siikhanyilisia ne sileka. Ese ndikho khuruma ewe obaboolele oli, ‘Omwami WELE aloma ali.’
Baaba ne baulila namwe ne baloba khuulila (sikila bali be nju eye sileka) bakhamanye bali omung'oosi beele ali akari wabwe.
Ne kakhali ewe mwana wo mundu, okhabaria nibo, namwe waria kamakhuwa kabwe tawe, walute ne kamawa biakhakhubotookhelela, namwe wakhaba nga oomenyile akari we chiwalute; okharia kamakhuwa kabwe tawe. Lundi okharangararwa sikila lukoondo lwabwe tawe, sikila eli ekholo eye sileka.
Ewe olababoolela burume bwase bakhaba ne baulila namwe ne baloba khuulila, sikila eli ekholo eye sileka.
“Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, ulila niko ese khuboolela, ewe okhaba owe sileka nga ekholo eye sileka eyo tawe. Yasama mala olie nisio ese ndikho khuelesia.”
Nga nalola, nabona kumukhono kwanjekeseleele ne khane beele kwatiilile sitabu sie liaandike.
Khwako aasibambula ebweeni wase, siaba ne kamaandiko chimbeka chombi, siabaakho kamakhuwa ke khusooma, ke liliiunamila nende ke ngunyi.

Khwako nasama mala ambelesia liaandike ndie.
Nio aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu lia sitabu sie kamaandiko nisio ndikho khuelesia sino mala wikure.” Nio nasilia, ne mukhanwa mwase siaba sinulu nga bubuukhi.
Nio aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, cha mu kholo eya Isiraeli mala obaboolele elomo yase.
Se ndikho khuruma khu kholo eloma lulomo lukeni lundi luandalafu tawe, ne kakhali khu kholo eye Baisiraeli.
Se khuli khu kholo chingali che chinimi chingeni lundi chimbandalafu nicho okhaulila tawe. Ng'ali abanga nakhurumire khu kholo nga echo andi chilakhurekeeresia.
Ne kakhali be kholo eya Isiraeli se balakhurekeeresia ewe tawe, se bakana khu khundekeeresia ese tawe, sikila ekholo eya Isiraeli yoosi yoma emurwe lundi eli ne kumwoyo kwe sileka.
Lola, ese ndakhukhola ewe obe owe sileka khu nibo nga nibo ne bali.
Ese nakhukholile ewe obe omuandalafu nga lulwanda, omulume nga libaale lie bukusi bwe angaaki ling'enang'ena. Okharia babaandu be sileka abo tawe.”
Lundi Wele aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, burume bwase bwoosi nibwo khakhuboolele, buulile bulayi bwene mala obukhebulile mu mwoyo kwowo.
Lundi cha khu balebe bowo baali mu mbaambe mala obaboolele niko ese Omwami WELE ndikho khuboolela, bauliile balobile khuulila.”
Nio Roho aasuta ese angaaki, mala luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabaao. Nio naulila enyuma wase luyoka lukali oli manya sibala ne sireenga.
Naulila chindaa che bibuumbe ne chekubanakho mu ngaaki ne luyoka lwe chingara oli manya sibala ne silikho sireenga.
Bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwanjichakho ne kamaani kamakali, ne nga Roho wewe ne asuta angaaki, naambwa lirima ne khubona buubi.
Nio noola e Teliabibu aambi ne Luluuchi lwa Kebari niio be mu mbaambe baaba ne bamenyile. Mala namenyayo nabo nekhalao khulwe chindaalo saba ne khiliilwe lukali sikila niko naba ne mboone ne khuulila.
Oli chindaalo saba chabira Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, ese nakhuroboore obe omuliindi khu kholo eya Isiraeli. Okhababoolele engaani niyo khuelesia.
Ese naaba ne mboolela omundu omwoni ndi, ng'ali ewe olafwa, mala ewe se omukaambila tawe, namwe se olomaloma wamukaambila khu limenya liewe lie bubwoni khulwe khuonia bulamu bwewe tawe. Omundu oyo alafwila mu bwoni bwewe, ne ese khakhubanje ewe kamafuki kewe.
Ne kakhali ewe waaba ne okaambila omundu omwoni ne se akaluukhana aarura mu bwoni namwe mwimenya liewe lie bubwoni tawe, niye alafwila mu bwoni bwewe, ne kakhali ewe olaonia bulamu bwowo.
“Lundi, omundu omuluungi ne aukha khu buluungi bwewe aakhola bubwoni, mala namura mu butinyu, alafwa waaba ne okhamukaambila tawe. Alafwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe, ne bikholwa biewe bie buluungi se bilikhebulilwakho tawe, ne ese khakhubanje ewe kamafuki kewe.
Ne kakhaba kario, ewe waaba ne okaambila omundu omuluungi akhakhola bubwoni tawe, mala aalekha khubukhola, ng'ali alaba omulamu sikila aauliile likaambila. Ne nawe olaba waoniisie bulamu bwowo.”
Nechusibwa bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala aamboolela ali, “Yinyokha oche mwitooma, ebweeneyo ndalomaloma ne nawe.”
Nio nenyokha nacha mwitooma, ne ebweeneyo nabona luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, bulayi bwene nga nalubona khu Luuchi lwa Kebari mala nakwa asi mafumala.
Ne kakhali Roho owa Wele aandiila aanjinyosia nema mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali, “Cha weyikaliilile munju yowo.
Mwana wo mundu, olabowa ne kimikoye ne se okhanyale khucha mu baandu tawe.
Ne ese khakhuandie lulimi, se okhanyale khukaambila babaandu be sileka bano tawe.
Ne kakhali ese khalomalome nawe lundi mala khukhole olomalome, okhababoolele niko ese Omwami WELE khuboolela. Balala bakharekeeresie, ne kakhali babaandi bakhalobe sikila bali ekholo eye sileka.”

Wele aaloma ali, “Mwana wo mundu, bukula litifari ore ebweeni wowo, mala obwatakekho sifwaanani sie lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Ne khufwaanania liliibuulila, yaba lubachangu, yombakha lisiisi, khola bibiabuusi, ne khulukara ne kimitalaachi kie khuteecha.
Lundi bukula esaani eye sichuuma mala okikhole ebe nga lisiisi akari wowo ne lukoba. Luloleelele nga lulwibuuliilwe, ne niwe oolikho ne olwibuulila. Sino sili simanyisio sie nju eya Isiraeli.
“Nio okonele lubeka lwowo lukhasi ne ese ndakhura khwiwe siuukuumo sie be nju eya Isiraeli khulwe bukali bwe chindaalo nicho olakonelakho, olabukula siuukuumo siabwe.
Sikila ese nakhulakile chindaalo chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi tisa, chilaba tekete ne bukali bwe kimiiko kie siuukuumo siabwe, buli ndaalo yimeelela kumwiiko mulala, olasuta siuukuumo sie be nju eya Isiraeli khu siise esio.
Ne nga ne omala chindaalo chino olakona asi lundi, mala olakonela lubeka luseecha, orio olabukula siuukuumo sie be nju eya Yuda khulwe chindaalo kamakhumi kane, nakhulakile ewe, buli ndaalo yimeelela kumwiiko mulala.
Ne ewe wiluungikhe liliibuulila lia Yerusalemu olwekeselele lulwala lwowo mala ong'oole ke lukoba.
Ne lola ese ndakhuboa kiminyololo nio okhanyala khuyuukha lubeka lwosi lwosi tawe, khukhwola nga ne omala chindaalo che liliibuulila liowo.
“Lundi bukula bufu bwe ngano, eshayiri, kamakaanda, chibalaayo, buulo ne bufu bunosie, obutubaasilie mu sipanga silala, mala obung'oonemo kimikaati. Mu ndaalo chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi tisa, che khukonela lubeka lukhasi lwowo, okhalichenge kimikaati kino.
Okhalichenge chikuramu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kataru che siakhulia, lulala khu ndaalo.
Olanywa kameechi bikoombe bibili biong'ene khu ndaalo.
Lundi okhabukule siakhulia sie shayiri mala ositeekhele khu mulilo kwe biibi bie babaandu mala olie babaandu ne baloleleele.”
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kano keekesia nga babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhalie biakhulia mu kholo nimwo ndibayila.”
Nio ese naloma ndi, “Ee, Omwami WELE! Lola, ese khenyaalutiakho khukhwama mu buele bwase khukhwola luno tawe. Ese khaliaakho esaang'i yosi yosi efwiile eng'ene, namwe niyo esolo yiirire tawe, lundi sisiindu sinyaalu sikhengilakho mukhanwa mwase tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Bona ndakhuelesia kamasisie ke chikhaafu mu bweyaangu bwe biibi bie babaandu niko olateekhela siakhulia siowo.”
Khutasa khwako aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu lola, ese nja khwonaka linyoola lie siakhulia mu Yerusalemu, babaandu ba Yerusalemu balalia siakhulia sie sikelo, ne buuri bukali, mala balanywa kameechi kamapiimwa mukhuayaaya.
Ese khakhole ndio bataambe biakhulia ne kameechi mala baloleelelane, buli mundu no wasie mu khuayaaya mala bang'ayile mu bwoni bwabwe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, “Ne ewe ee Mwana wo mundu, bukula embalu enjoki, mala okirumikhire nga lubeko lwo mubeki, bisia khu murwe wibeke lichuune ne bunwanwa, lundi bukula eratili mala okabemo lichuune elio.
Yosia khaboo khalala khu bitaru akari we lukoba, bukula khaboo khe khabili khu bitaru okhatonyakemo ne mbalu nga ne obotookheleele lukoba. Ne khaboo khamaliilisi khu bitaru okhasalanisie mu mbeo, ne ese ndaloondiakho embalu.
Ne olabukulakho khu lino likeekhe mala oboe khu ngubo yowo.
Ne khu lino olabukulakho lilala mala olimwaate mu mulilo mala olioosie. Khukhwama abwenao kumulilo kulamao kwingile mu kholo eya Isiraeli yoosi.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Oluno luli lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, ese nalura akari we chikholo ne bibala bialukara.
Lwabeele lureengu lukali khu lilakiilisia liase khukhila chikholo chichiindi, khubiiya lilaka liase khukhila bibala bibiindi bioosi bibialukara khulwe khuloba lilakiilisia liase ne khuloba khukeendela mu lilaka liase.
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, Sikila enywe mwakholile sisiayuumba khukhila chikholo chichamukara, ne se mwakeendela mu malaka kase namwe mwaliinda lilakiilisia liase tawe. Ne kakhali mwakhola khuloondekhana ne lilakiilisia lie chikholo chichamukara enywe.
Khwako ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, Ese seesi nabeele omusiku wenywe mala khakhole likhalaka liase khwinywe ebweeni we chikholo chichiindi.
Sikila bibiindu bienywe bioosi nibio mukhola bili nibio ese nabiila, ndaana siuukuumo khu Yerusalemu nisio khakholakho tawe, lundi se ndikholakho ndio tawe.
Khwako basaasi barama mu Yerusalemu bakhalie babaana babwe ne babaana bakhalie basaasi babwe. Khamuukuume enywe balamu mala musalanisie chimbeka choosi.
“Khwako nga ese Wele omenyile mindali, Omwami WELE aloma ali, sikila mwanyaalutia Lukaangu lwase ne bubwoni bwa buli lukano, ne bibiindu bimayaanu nibio mwakhola ndamwiira ne se ndamukholelakho siisa tawe.
Sitonyi silala khu bitaru mwinywe muleerwa ne lufu, ne njala. Sitonyi sia khabili khu bitaru balakwa mwiie enje we lukoba, ne sitonyi simaliilisi silasalaanila ne ese ndabaloondiakho liie.
“Mulaulila busiro bwe lirima ne bukhalafu bwase khukhwola nga ndinyalikha, ne kano koosi ne kekholekha, mukhamanye muli ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomaloome nanywe, sikila ndi ne lirima khu bumayaanu bwenywe.
Khutasa khwako, babaandu be chikholo chichiindi chichamukara, ne babira, bakhamuchekheelele enywe ne khubira sinaao.
“Nga ne khamuambile lirima, chikholo choosi chiili siimbi nanywe chikhesiindukhe. Bakhamubone mala bamuchekheelele.
Khakhiingilile linyoola lie biakhulia bienywe mala mube ne njala. Mukhaulile burafu bwe njala oli manya ne bamulasa ne buembo.
Khamureerere enjala ne chisolo khukhwira babaana benywe. Kharume lufu, sisiayuumba ne liie khumwiira enywe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lola e bikulu bia Isiraeli obiboolele elomo yase eye libunia.
Boolela Baisiraeli bamenyile mu bikulu baulile elomo eyo Mwami WELE, lundi baulile niko ese Omwami WELE mboolela be mu bikulu ne chingulu, chimbangaachi ne kamatooma ndi, lola ese, khareere liie khwinywe mala nonake abuundu angaaki niio mwinamilanga bifwaani.
Chialutare chenywe ne abuundu niio mwoselianga biiunya bulayi bicha khwonakakwa. Babaandu boosi bakheerwe ebweeni we bifwaani bienywe.
Ese khasalanisie Baisiraeli bafu ebweeni we bifwaani, lundi khasalanisie bikuumba bienywe bibotookhelele chialutare chenywe.
Chingoba choosi cha Isiraeli chikhonakwe ne chialutare chenywe choosi ne bifwaani bilaarakakwa. Ne chialutare nicho boseliangakho biiunya bulayi chilatechulwa, ne buli siindu nisio bakhola silarusibwao.
Ne babaandu mwinywe baleerwa buli abuundu, ne baalarama balamanya bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kakhaba kario ese khalekhe balala baone mala mbasalanisie mu kholo choosi,
niio mukhamenye mu mbaambe. Ebweeneyo bakhakhebulile ese mala bamanye bali nabaukuuma ne khubaambia chisoni, sikila bataamba lisuubila mala basaaya bifwaani mu bweyaangu bwase. Khwako, bakhebiiye babeene, sikila bumayaanu bwabwe ne bibiindu nibio bakhola.
Mu siise esio bakhamanye bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, lundi bakhamanye bali engaani yase se yaba eye khuriikhirisia busa tawe.”
Nio Omwami WELE aamboolela ali, “Ra kamakhono khu murwe, sooma, lila mu bubeeleli, sikila bumayaanu bwabwe, bakhafwe khulwe liie, enjala ne bulwaale.
Be aleeyi bakhalwaale bafwe ne be aembi bakhafwiile mwiie. Abo bakharame bakhafwe enjala. Bakhanyoole busiro bwe bukhalafu bwase.
Ne mukhamanye muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga baafu benywe ne bakhalambaale akari we bifwaani khu alutare chabwe. Kikhabe buli khu khakulu khaleeyi, khu bikulu, khu ndeleelwa, asi we kimirongooro nende asi we kimikhoonge niio baanilanga biianwa biiunya bulayi bisiimisia bifwaani biabwe.
Ese ndonakaka sibala siabwe, khasikhole sibe sichiimi khukhwama siafubo khukhwola mu lukoba lwa Ribula ebunaswa. Ne se ndalekhakho abuundu osi osi niio Baisiraeli bamenyile tawe. Nio buli mundu alamanya ali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, boolela Baisiraeli oli, Omwami WELE aboolela Baisiraeli ali: Libuna lioolile khu Baisiraeli boosi!”
Isiraeli libuna liolile, ese ndakhuambila lirima lundi ndakhukhalakila khuloondekhana nende niko wakholile, mala ndakhuruunga khulwe bikholwa biowo biibi.
Ese se ndakhulekha namwe se ndakhukholela siisa tawe, ne ndakhuukuuma khulwe bikholwa biowo biibi, nibio okholile. Nono ewe olamanya oli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Kano niko Omwami WELE aloma, “Busiku bulakhwichakho buli siise.
Libuna liechile, libuna lioolile! Enywe mwabunile!
Libuna lioolile khwinywe mumenyile mu sibala, siise sili siimbi, siise sie kumunaanio, ne se sili sie khukhwekhoyela binamwima bie mu bikulu tawe, ne kakhali likoyaana.
“Mu siise sitiiti siri, mulabona lirima liase. Ndikho mukhalakila khuloondekhana nende niko mukholile, lundi ndamuruunga khuloondekhana ne bikholwa bienywe bioosi bimayaanu.
Se ndakhulekha namwe khukholele ewe siisa tawe. Khamuukuume khuloondekhana ne bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu nibio mukholile, nio mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lundi nise oolikho omuukuuma enywe.”
Lola, endaalo eye libuna elikho yiicha khu kholo eya Isiraeli. Sisiayuumba siabeele sikali. Liliebonia liabiririire.
Sisiayuumba sireera bumayaanu bukali. Se aliio yesi yesi oolarama namwe sisiindu sienywe siosi siosi sie bukhala tawe.
Siise sioolile nisio buli mundu alabuna. Khukula ne khukusia se bilabaao tawe sikila Wele alaukuuma buli mundu.
Bakusia se baliyindila banyoole bukhala khu nibio batibia tawe. Sikila lirima lia Wele lili khu buli mundu, se lilakobola enyuma tawe lundi sikila bubwoni, se aliio olaba omulamu tawe.
Ekhoombi yiipa khurekekha buli mundu ne kakhali mbao oocha mwiie tawe, sikila lirima liase lili khu buli mundu.
Liie lili buli abuundu, bulwaale ne njala bili mu chinju, oyo ooli mu lukoongo alafwila mwiie, ne oyo ooli mu lukoba alafwa bulwaale ne njala.
Kaaba bali babaandu balala bakhabeeo baakhaone, bakhelukhile mu ngulu nga kamauusi niko baoonile khukhwama mu matooma. Buli mulala khu bwoni bwewe.
Buli mukhono kwa mulala kulawamo kamaani ne kamasikamo kabwe kalanikina.
Balafwara kamakunia ne khuterema. Balabeka kimirwe kiabwe mala baambwe chisoni.
Balamwaata efwesa ne sahabu khu ngila che mu lukoba, sikila se bilaba ne bukhala khu nibo tawe. Efwesa yabwe ne esahabu se bilabaonia khu ndaalo eye lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe. Se banyala bekura efwesa ne sahabu tawe, sikila biabayila mu bwoni.
Bebonia sikila bie kamamili biabwe mala babikhola biaaba bifwaani bisinyisia. Kano kakila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola kimiaandu kiabwe kiataamba bukhala khu nibo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndalekha bakeni babanuule bibiindu biabwe bioosi ne banuuli bonakake kimiaandu kiabwe.
Se ndakhiingilila banuuli ne bafwolobia ne khukhwonakaka libiikhilo lie Lukaangu lwase tawe.
“Buli siindu siakoyaanile, sibala siechuule babeeri ne chingoba chechuule sisiayuumba.
Ndareera ekholo emayaanu lukali mu kholo choosi ebukule chinju chabwe. Ndakamia sileka sie babaandu babwe be kamaani ne abuundu wabwe atakatifu alafwolobisibwa.
Lieendekhelela ne liicha, balayiima kumuleembe ne kakhali se kulabao tawe.
Busiku bulaloondekhana busa, balaulila kamabi kaloondakhane, balayiima kamalola khukhwama khu bang'oosi. Ne kakhali lilaka mu basaayi ne likaambila mu bemeelesi bilawao.
Omwami alasooma, omwimeelesi alafwa kumwoyo ne babaandu be sibala balaba ne buuri bukali. Khuloondekhana ne limenya liabwe ne likhalaka liabwe ese ndabakhalakila nio bamanye bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Khu ndaalo eya kharaano eye kumwesi kwa sita kwe kumwiiko kwa sita kwe mbaambe yefwe, naba nekhaale ne babemeelesi be mbaambe khukhwama Yuda munju mwase. Siise esio, kamaani ko Mwami WELE kanjichamo.
Nio naaba ne kamalola, nabona sifwaanani sio mundu nga kumulilo. Khukhwamila mu sibuno khukhwiikha, kumubili kwasio kwafwaana kumulilo, ne khukhwamila mu sibuno khuniina emurwe, siang'enang'ena nga kumukasa kumumiliiu.
Nio siakololosia sisiindu sisiafwaana nga kumukhono mala siandiila lichuune. Mu malola kano, Roho owa Wele aasuta angaaki aambila e Yerusalemu. Aambila mukari niio bengilila mu silibwa sie bunaswa sie Lukaangu, niio sifwaani siisinyisia Wele siaba.
Wele aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, lola ebunaswa.” Nalolayo mala nabona ambi nende alutare e silibwa sifwaani siisinyisia Wele.
Wele aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo Mundu, waboone niko balikho bakhola? Lola bibiindu bimayaanu nibio Baisiraeli balikho bakhola, bachiililila khu khuseenda ese aleeyi khukhwama abuundu wase atakatifu. Olabona bie chisoni lukali khukhila kano.”
Aambila mu silibwa sie luuya lwe nje mala aanjekesia liloo mwisiisi.
Aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, techula lisiisi ano.” Ne nga natechula lisiisi elio, kumuliango kwabao.
Ne amboolela ali, “Yingila mukari obone bumayaanu, ne kamabi niko balikho bakholamo.”
Nio nengilamo mala nabona, chipiicha che chindemu khwisiisi ne chisaang'i chichiindi chinyaalu, ne bifwaani nibio Baisiraeli basaayanga.
Babemeelesi kamakhumi saba Baisiraeli mulala khwabo Yasania okhwa Shafani. Buli mulala aaba ne lucho lwe khukhwoseliakho bupani, mala liliisi liabwo liebuuyanga ne liniina mu ngaaki.
Wele aandeeba ali, “Mwana wo Mundu, ewe waboone niko babemeelesi be Baisiraeli balikho bakhola mu bwikisi?” Buli mundu mu lusiro lwewe lulweechula bifwaani. Mu nganakani chabwe bebaasia bali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se akhubona efwe tawe. Anjuukhe sibala.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela lundi ali, “Olabona biisinyisia lukali khukhila nibio balikho bakhola bino.”
Nio aambila e silibwa sie bunaswa sie Lukaangu mala aanjekesia bakhasi balikho balila sikila lifwa lia wele wabwe Tamusi.
Lundi aamboolela ali, “Ee, mwana wo mundu, waboone kano? Lundi olabona bie lisinye bikali khukhila bino.”
Nio aambila khu luya lwe mukari lwe Lukaangu. Asilibwa sie Lukaangu, akari wa alutare ne ngila, babao babaandu kamakhumi kabili na baraano. Bapile kimikoongo Lukaangu baloleleele ebukwe balikho basaaya enyanga esoa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, waboone kano? Babaandu ba Yuda bano se banyaliikhe ne bumayaanu nibwo balakholanga buno ne khutasa sisiayuumba mu sibala sioosi tawe. Khukhwola beeche bakakholele mu Lukaangu luno lulwene khu khuumbaambia ese lirima. Lola nga bandekelesia mu ngila embi khukhila choosi.
Khwako balaulila busiro bwe lirima liase. Se ndabalekha namwe mbakholelekho siisa siosi siosi tawe. Bakhasaaya lukali bariena, se khabarekeeresiekho tawe.”

Nio naulila Wele ne aloma ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Enywe mucha khuukuuma lukoba luno, khe mweseende siimbi, yiicha ne bulwaani bwenywe.”
Babaandu sita becha khukhwama e silibwa sie nje sie ebunaswa we Lukaangu, buli mundu ne bulwaani bwewe. Khu baandu sita abo, aabaamo omundu owaba ne afwarire engubo eya katani, aasutile sisiindu nisio anyala aandikila. Boosi becha bema a alutare eye kumukasa.
Nio nabona buwaanga bukali bubwekesia khubao khwa Wele owa Isiraeli, bwaniina khukhwama khu kerubi niio bwabechanga, mala bwacha mu silibwa sie Lukaangu. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga omundu owafwara engubo eya katani, lundi owaba ne sisiindu sie khuandikila
aaloma ali, “Cha mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu mwoosi mala ore simanyisio khu bweeni bwa buli mundu ooli mu buchuuni ne sibeela sikila bie lisinye bioosi biili mu lukoba.”
Ese naulila Wele ne aboolela babaandi ali, “Cha mu lukoba mala mwiire babaandu. Mukhakholelakho omundu yesi yesi siisa tawe.
Yiira basaakhulu, basoleeli, bakhaana, bakhasi ne babaana. Ne kakhali mukheera omundu ooli ne simanyisio khu bweeni tawe. Rakikhira abuundu atakatifu wase ano.” Khwako baarakikhira khu bemeelesi ba baaba ne bemile ebweeni we nju eya Wele.
Nio Wele aababoolela ali, “Nyaalutia enju eyo. Yandakasia bafu khu luuya. Rakikha!” Khwako barakikha khukhwira babaandu mu lukoba.
Ne nga baba ne balikho beera bario, ese narama seng'ene. Nakwa mafumala mala nalila ndi, “Ee, Omwami WELE! Oleera Baisiraeli boosi babarama mu Yerusalemu sikila lirima liowo?”
Nio Wele aangobosia ali, “Babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda bakholile bubwoni bukali. Berire babaandu mu sibala sioosi mala bechuusie sifuki mu Yerusalemu. Ne eyi baloma bali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nanjuukhe sibala, lundi bali ese se mbabona tawe.
Ne kakhali se khabakholele siisa tawe, khabakhole nga ne nakholeele babaandi.”
Nio omundu owaba ne afwarire engubo eya katani aakobola aaboolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Nakholile nga ne undakile.”

Wele aaboolela omundu owaba ne afwarire engubo eya katani ali, “Cha akari we chingara chibotookhelela chiili aasi we bibuumbe bilamu, obukule kamanda kamakali kakesing'eeng'ile khukhwama akari wabio mala okasalanisie mu lukoba.”
Ese namuloleleela ne alikho acha.
Omundu oyo nga engilamo, chikerubi chaba chemile siafubo we Lukaangu, lifuumbi liafuunikha luuya lwe mukari.
Nio luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwama mu bibuumbe bilamu lwamalatana lwola esilibwa sie Lukaangu, mala luuya lwechula luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne luyoka lwe chindaa che bibuumbe bilamu ebio lwauliilikhana aakhaba enje we luuya nga kumumilo kwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi ne alikho alomaloma.
Ne nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alaka omundu owaba nafwarire engubo eya katani ali, “Bukula kumulilo khukhwama akari we chingara chilikho ne chibotookheleela khukhwama mu bibuumbe bilamu.” Engila acha ema a ngara.
Ne sibuumbe silamu silala siayila kumukhono kwasio khukhwama akari we bibuumbe bilamu khukhwola khu mulilo kukwaba akari we bibuumbe bilamu akubukulakho kumulilo mala akura mu makhono ko mundu owaba nafwarire engubo eya katani, abukula kumulilo mala arura nakwo enje.
Bibuumbe bilamu biabonekha nga bili ne kumukhono kwo mundu asi we chindaa chabio.
Ne nalola mala nabona, chabao chingara chine a bibuumbe bilamu buli engara ndala a sibuumbe sie bulamu silala, ne chingara echo chang'enang'ena nga kamabaale ke bukusi.
Ne bioosi bine biafwaanana, bulayi bwene busa oli fwaana engara eyaambaasibwa mu ngara ekiindi.
Ne nga bibuumbe bilamu bianyala khucha chimbeka chosi chosi ne bikhayuukhakho tawe. Niio silala silala siachiichanga bioosi bialoondangakho ne bikhayukhakho tawe.
Mala nabona ndi, chingara ne kimibili kiabwe, akhaba khu mikoongo, khu makhono, khu ndaa biaba biechula chimoni.
Naulila kumumilo ne kuloma kuli, “Chino chili chingara chibotookhelela.”
Ne buli sibuumbe silala siaba ne bubweeni bune, mu moni mwe khunyoa mwaba mufwaana nga euunwa. Ne mwa khabili mwaba mufwaana nga mwo mundu. Ne mwa khataru mwaba mufwaana nga mwe talang'i. Ne mwe khane mwaba mufwaana nga mwe furuusi.
Ne bibuumbe bilamu bino biaba busa ne bibieene nibio nabona a Luuchi lwa Kebari. Nga biapurukha
mala biacha, chingara chacha nabio. Ne nga biabambula chindaa khupurukha chingara chacha nabio.
Nga bibuumbe ne bima, chingara chosi chiima. Nga biapurukha chingara chosi chapurukha sikila kamaani ke bibuumbe kaba mu ngara.
Nio luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwarura esilibwa sie Lukaangu lwacha lwema angaaki we bibuumbe bilamu.
Nga naba ne ndoleleele bibuumbe biapurukha, ne chingara chosi chacha nabio. Biema a silibwa sie bukwe we Lukaangu ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwabao.
Nabikhebulila nga bibuumbe nibio nabona ebweeni owa Wele owa Isiraeli a Luuchi lwa Kebari.
Buli silala siaba ne bubweeni bune ne buli silala siaba ne chindaa chine, ne asi we chindaa kiabamo kikiafwaana nga kamakhono ko mundu.
Ne bubweeni bwabwe bwafwaana busa nga nibwo nabona a Luuchi lwa Kebari. Biarekukha buli silala siachichanga busa ebweeni.

Roho owa Wele aniinia angaaki mala andeera khu silibwa sie Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sisialoleelela ebukwe. Ne lola, nabona babaandu kamakhumi kabili na baraano amuliango kwe silibwa, ne mu nibo nabona abamo Yaasania okhwa Asuri, Pelatia okhwa Benaya, babemeelesi be babaandu.
Nio Wele amboolela ali, “Ewe mwana wo mundu, bano bali babaandu babekhochoochanga bumayaanu ne khukaambila kamakhiikha mu lukoba luno.
Baboola bali, ‘Khuli ambi khwombakha chinju lundi. Lukoba luli nga endekhelo, ne nafwe khulimo nga chinyama. Ne kakhali yakhukhiingilekho kumulilo.’
Nono mwana wo mundu, bekaane.”
Ne Roho owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amba kamaani mala amboolela ali, “Boola oli, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali: Enywe Baisiraeli, manyile kaali mu mebaasio kenywe.
Mwerire babaandu bakali mu lukoba luno mala chingila chechuule bafu.’ ”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ng'ali lukoba luno luli endekhelo, ne kakhali nibo mwirire nibo chinyama ne se mukhabe ano tawe khamurusie mu lukoba.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, Enywe mwaria lifwa? Khareere babaandu bamwire.
Khamurusie enywe mu lukoba mala mure mu makhono ke basiku, namukhalakiile lifwa.
Ne enywe mulafwila mwiie mu sibala sienywe. Buli mundu akhamanye ali ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lukoba luno se lukhamukhiinge nga endekhelo ne khiinga enyama tawe, ndamuukuumila osi osi niio mulaba, mu sibala sia Isiraeli.
Ne enywe mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne nga mwaloondanga kamalaka ke chikholo nicho mwaloondekhana, mwafunanga ne khulekelesia kamalaka kase.”
Nga ese naba ndomaloma, Pelatia okhwa Benaya akwa afwa. Ne ese nakwa mafumala, mala naloma ndi, “Kakhaba kario tawe Omwami WELE we bunyali! Olikhocha khwira buli mundu mu Isiraeli?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, bawandaayo akhaba balebe bowo, baambe basio, be nju eya Isiraeli yoosi, boosi bamenyile mu Yerusalemu baboola bali, ‘Babaandu baali mu mbaambe bali aleeyi lukali ne Yerusalemu khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Akhuelesie efwe sibala sino khuba kumukabwa kwefwe.’ ”
Khwako boola oli, “Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Nakhaba ne nabarusia nabayila mu kholo che aleeyi ne nakhaba ne nabasalanisia mu bibala bibiindi, ne kakhaba kario khulwe siise mu bibala nimwo bacha ndaba ne nabo.’
Khwako boola oli, Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Khamubuusie murusie mu baandu, mubuusie khukhwama mu bibala nimwo mwasalanisibwa, mala ndamuelesia sibala sia Isiraeli.’
Ne nga balikobola, ndarusiao bibiindu binyaalu ne bifwaani bisinyisia.
Ne khabaelesie kumwoyo mulala mala mbareemo bulamu buya. Khabarusiemo kumwoyo kwe sileka kuuli nga libaale mala mbaelesie kumwoyo kumuolu,
nio bamenye mu khuria kamalaka kase mala bakaliinde, ne balaba babaandu base mala ese ndaba Wele wabwe.
Ne Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Ne khwabo nibo kimiooyo kiabwe kiloondanga khu biindu biabwe binyaalu ne bisinyisia, khabaukuume khulwe bikholwa biabwe.’ ”
Ne luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwalekha Lukoba lwacha khu sikulu ebukwe we Lukoba.
Mwilola elio, Roho owa Wele ambukula andeera angobosia Babiloni mu malola, khu baali mu mbaambe. Nono kamalola niko naba nemboone kafulafulana.
Mala naboolela be mu mbaambe bibiindu bioosi nibio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaba ne anjekesia.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, ewe omenyile mu kholo eye sileka, bali ne chimoni ne se babona tawe, bali ne kamaru, ne se baulila tawe. Sikila bali be sileka.
Khwako mwana wo mundu boa biindu nga oyo ocha mu mbaambe, mala rakikha lukeendo ne bukhelabula tawe. Lekha buli mundu akhubone norekukha wakana be sileka abo bosi bakhubona.
Suta bibiindu biowo kumuusi nga ocha mu mbaambe, nio bakhubone norekukha ekolooba nga omundu ocha mu mbaambe.
Ne basiloleelela, futula enuma mwisiisi lie nju yowo mala obisiliemo bibiindu biowo.
Lekha bakhuloleelele ne ora bibiindu biowo khwibeka mala orekukhe mu siilima ne wefuumile mu moni. Orio se olabona niio ocha tawe. Niko olakhola kalaba simanyisio khu Isiraeli.”
Ne ese Esekieli nakhola nga nalakwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, narusia enje bibiindu biase kumuusi, bulayi bwene nga omundu omwene ne alikho acha mu mbaambe. Oli ekolooba nafutula enuma khwisiisi ne kamakhono kaase. Nasuta bibiindu biase khwibeka, narura enje mu siilima ne bamboone.
Oli kumutikhinyi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu babaandu be nju eya Isiraeli, be nju eye sileka, balakhureebanga bali, ‘Olakholanga siina?’
Baboolele oli: Omwami WELE aboola ali, ‘Burume buno buli khu be nju eye bubwami babamiia Yerusalemu ne be nju eya Isiraeli boosi balimo.’
Boola oli, ‘Ese, Esekieli ndi simanyisio khwinywe nga ne kholile ndio, mulikholwa murio. Mukhaambwe muuyisibwe, muyilwe mu mbaambe.
Ne omwami olikho obamiia alasuta bibiindu biewe khwibeka mu siilima mala akoriookhe. Alafutula enuma ebire mwisiisi mala alabiriramo elukhe. Alebiimba mu moni ne salabona niio alikho acha tawe.
Ndareka lurimba lwase mala muambilemo. Ne ndamuyila mu lukoba lwa Babiloni niio alifwila ne akhalubona tawe.
Ne khasalanisie boosi bali naye, bayeetibewe ne basikari bewe mu mbeka choosi, mala khabaloondiekho babaandu babayima babeere.
“ ‘Ne balamanya bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne ndabasalanisia mu kholo ne bibala bikeni.
Ne khalekhe batiiti khu nibo belukhe khukhwama mu liie, enjala ne bulwaale, ne boole khu khwiyama sifwabi siabwe sie lisaaya sioosi akari we chikholo nicho bachamo, nio bamanye bali ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lia nonywa mu khwiendekhelela.
Boolela ekholo yoosi oli, lino lili likhuwa lio Mwami WELE Omunyali owa Bioosi khu baandu ba Yerusalemu basiili mu sibala siabwe. Baliendekhelela ne balia ne khunywa, sikila sibala siabwe sikharame busa sikila babaandu babwe boosi bali ne sileka.
Ne chingoba chimboofu nicho babaandu bakali bamenyamo chilionakwa, ne sibala siliba sichiimi, mala mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lusimo siina nilwo Baisiraeli balomanga luno bali, ‘Biise bibira, mala buli kamalola se kali ka ng'ali tawe?’ ”
Khwako baboolele oli, “Omwami WELE Omunyali owa bioosi aloma ali: Ndakamia lusimo luno, mala se balalurumikhirakho lundi nga lusimo mu Isiraeli tawe. Ne ewe Esekieli baboolele oli, ‘Chindaalo cholile, ne buli kamalola kaleecha khuuba ka ng'ali.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Kamalola ke bubeeyi ne bufumu bwe bubeeyi se bilaba mu kholo eya Isiraeli tawe.
Ne ese Omwami WELE khababoolele ne niko mbaboolela kakekholeekhe. Ne khukhiinda se khulabao lundi tawe. Be sileka enywe, nja khukhola niko nalakiilisia, ese nalomile.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu lola abo be nju eya Isiraeli bebaasia bali, kamalola niko Esekieli aboone kali khulwe chindaalo chingali chichiicha, ne bung'oosi buliicha khale khukhwama luno:
Khwako baboolele oli, ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, ‘Ne khukhiinda se khulabao lundi tawe. Ne elomo niyo ndoma elekholekha. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, kaania bang'oosi ba Isiraeli, bang'oola ke bubeeyi baboolele oli, ‘Rekeeresia elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Bang'oosi basilu bano babunile, bang'oola ne khubona kamalola kabwe ke bubeeyi!
Ee, Isiraeli, bang'oosi bowo babeele nga chingipwe mu maumbu ke chingoba chichatechulwa.
Enywe se mwachiile khuliinda abuundu niio lisiisi liatechukha tawe, namwe se mwombakha lisiisi nga lumako khulwe be nju eya Isiraeli nilwo enyala yekisamo mu ndaalo eye liie eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Balomaloma bubeeyi mala bang'oola bubeeyi baboola bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,’ ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abarumirekho tawe, mala benya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhole niko baloma kabe ng'ali.
Ese mbaboolela ndi, kamalola ne bung'oosi bwenywe obwo buli bubeeyi. Muboola muli kali kamakhuwa kase, ne ese se nalomalomekho nanywe tawe!”
Khwako Omwami WELE ababoolela ali, “Kamakhuwa ne kamalola kenywe kali ke bubeeyi. Ese neaanyile khwinywe.
Ndaukuuma bang'oosi be kamalola ne bung'oosi bwe bubeeyi. Se balaba mu siikhasio sie babaandu base tawe. Lundi se balaandikwa mu sitabu sie kamasina ke nju eya Isiraeli, namwe bengile mu sibala sia Isiraeli tawe. Nio mumanye muli ese ndi Omwami WELE Omunyali owa bioosi.
Ewe Esekieli boolela bang'oosi balikho baakha luloongo oli lisiisi likhatechukhe. Efula engali ekhakwe, kamaarara kakhakwe ne khungu eye mbembeesi ekhaliuuche.
Ne nga lisiisi ne likhakwe babaandu bakhamureebe bali, ‘Luloongo nilwo mwaakha lwayeetakho siina?’ ”
Khwako, Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Mu lirima liase ndakhola embembeesi euuche, ne mu lirima ndakhola efula engali ekwe, ne kamaarara kakwa mu bukhalafu bwase khu khwonaka lisiisi.
Ne ndatechula lisiisi nilio mwaakhile luloongo, ne khulikwisia asi, mala kumusiingi kwalio kurame busa khwasie. Ne nga likwa enywe mukhafwilemo, mala mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Khwako ndakhalalila lisiisi alala ne naabo ba baliiakha erangi ewaanga, mala ndamuboolela enywe ndi: lisiisi se liliio lundi tawe, namwe abo ba babaliiakha luloongo se baliio tawe.
Bang'oosi abo babasuubisia Yerusalemu bali buli siindu siaba bulayi khane buli siindu se siaba bulayi tawe!” Omwami WELE alomile.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Mwana wo mundu, lola bang'oosi be siikhasi babeeyi baali mu kholo yowo. Bakaanie
mala obaboolele oli: Omwami WELE aloma ali:
“Bakhasi enywe mwabuna! Munabila buli mundu eriisi eboe khu mukhono ne khura khu maleso buli mundu ne efwara khu murwe kwewe nio babe ne bunyali khu bulamu bwe babaandu babaandi. Mwenya mube ne bunyali khu bulamu ne lifwa khu baandu base mala muburumikhire khulwe bukhala bwenywe mwabene.
Mundekelesia ebweeni we babaandu base nio munyoole efuusi ndala eye shayiri ne khulwe simesu sie kumukaati. Mwira babaandu bakholaana khukhwirwa tawe. Mulekha babolaana khukhwirwa. Khwako mubea babaandu base mala bamusuubila.”
Nono kano niko Omwami WELE aboola, “Ngaania chiriisi nicho murumikhiranga khuuba ne bunyali khu bulamu ne lifwa khu baandu base, ndabinabulula khu makhono kenywe mala ndekhe babaandu base babe balekhuule.
Akhaba chingubo chenywe nicho mwanabilakho chirisi ndachifuulaka mala ndeesie babaandu base barure mu bunyali bwenywe, mala enywe mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Khulwe bubeeyi bwenywe se mutinyilisia babaandu balayi nibo khenya mbumisie tawe. Mukhiingilila babaandu bamayaanu bakhekanila baonia bulamu bwabwe tawe.
Khwako kamalola kenywe ne bung'oosi bwe bubeeyi biakaame ao. Ndikho ndeesia babaandu base barure mu bunyali bwenywe. Nio mumanye muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Babemeelesi Baisiraeli balala banjichakho khukhundeeba lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu babaandu baana kimiooyo kiabwe khu bifwaani ne bafukiilila bifwaani biabwe khubayila mu bumayaanu mala bebaasia bali ese ndabakosia?”
Khwako lomaloma ne nabo obaboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Omundu yesi yesi owe nju eya Isiraeli osuubila bifwaani mu mwoyo kwewe ne afukiilila bifwaani khumuyila mu bumayaanu mala eecha khukhwenya likaambila khu mung'oosi Ese Omwami Wele samwene khamukobosie, likobosio khuloondekhana ne bifwaani biewe.
Bifwaani ebio bioosi biandusisekho kimiooyo kie ba Isiraeli, ne kakhali khulwe likobosia liase balaba basuubilifu khwise.”
Khwako boolela be nju eya Isiraeli kano: Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ngobolele mulekhe bifwaani bienywe biisinya.
Sikila yesi yesi khu kholo eya Isiraeli, namwe omukwa yesi yesi omenyile mu Isiraeli ounjaukhakho mala asuubila bifwaani mu mwoyo kwewe ne khubisaaya, mala echa khureeba omung'oosi kakewe, Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi samwene ndamukobosia.
Ndakhalalila omundu oyo, mukhole abe simanyisio sie khuukia ne khumurusia akari we babaandu base, ne enywe mulamanya muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kaaba bali omung'oosi aabeiilwe mala yesi abea, aba Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi natibiisie omung'oosi oyo mala ndamukhalalila niye ne khumwiira murusie akari we babaandu base Baisiraeli.
Bombi omung'oosi ne noyo oreebaanga omung'oosi balanyoola siuukuumo sifwaanana.
Ndakhola kano nio ba Isiraeli bakhandekha ne khukhwefwolobia babeene khulwe bubwoni bwabwe tawe, balaba babaandu baase ne Ese Wele wabwe. Ese Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, babaandu be mu sibala ne bakholela Ese bumayaanu khulwe khumenya ne bakhali ne lisuubila tawe, Ese ndapia siibi ne khurusiao linyoola lie siakhulia siabwe ne khureera enjala mala niire babaandu ne chisaang'i.
Ne akhaba babaandu bataru abo Noa, Danieli ne Ayubu ne bamenyilemo, bulayi bwabwe bubaonia babeene bong'ene.” Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.
Ese naaba ne nduma chisolo chabira mu sibala cheera babaandu mala siaaba sichiimi nisio omundu akhabiramo tawe sikila chisolo.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Akhaba babaandu bataru bano ne balimo, nga ese ne menyile mindali se banyala baonia babaana babwe basoleeli namwe bakhaana tawe. Ne kakhali bulamu bwabwe babeene.
Namwe naruma liie khu sibala esio, mala neera babaandu ne chisaang'i sitube.
Omwami WELE aloma ali: Akhaba babaandu bataru bano ne balimo, nga Ese ne menyile mindali, se banyala baonia babaana babwe basoleeli namwe bakhaana tawe. Ne kakhali bulamu bwabwe babeene.
Namwe Ese naaba ne nduma lufu mu sibala esio, mala mwirima liase neera babaandu ne chisaang'i sitube,
Omwami WELE aloma ali: Akhaba Noa, Danieli ne Ayubu ne bamenyilemo, nga Ese ne menyile mindali, se banyala baonia omwana omusoleeli namwe omukhaana tawe. Khulwe buluungi bwabwe, bakhaonie bulamu bwabwe babeene bwon'gene.
Ne kakhali Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Kalaba kariena nga ne ndaruma khu Yerusalemu bikholwa biase birafu bine bie likhalaka. Liie, enjala, chisolo ne lufu khukhwira babaandu ne chisaang'i!
