Ne kakhaba kario, balala bakhasikalemo, basoleeli ne bakhaana baakhareerwe; bakheche khwiwe. Ne obona chingila ne bikholwa biabwe, okhanyoole kamaani sikila butinyu nibwo ese ndeerire khu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, sikila koosi niko ese kholile khu Yerusalemu.
Okhabone chingila ne bikholwa biabwe mala onyoole kamaani; mala omanye oli koosi niko nakhola kali ne sifuno. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, kumusabibu kunyala kwalekhaana ne kumurongooro kwosi kwosi? Chisakia che kumusabibu chinyala chalekhaana chiriena ne kumurongooro kuuli mu musiru?
Silikhoo sibechwanga khukhwama khu lusakia lwe kumusabibu ku? Babaandu banyala barema lusaala khu musabibu baanikhakho siindu ku?
Lola, kumusabibu kuli busa kwe khubwanila kumulilo. Ne nga kumulilo ne kwosia chimbeka chombi mala kuya akari kukwa nono kulikho ne buyeeti bwosi bwosi ku?
Lola, nga ne kwaba ne kukhaya tawe, se khwarumikhirwa khu siosi siosi tawe, ne nga kuyile luno kwakwa, se kulikho ne bukhala bwosi bwosi khukhila nga beele ne kukhaya tawe?”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Bulayi bwene busa nga lusakia lwe kumusabibu ne lubukulwa mu musiru, nilwo ese ndusiisie lwosibwa ne kumulilo, mungila eyo ese khaane babaandu bamenyile mu Yerusalemu ndio.
Ne ndabakhalalila mala mbae kumunaanio. Bakhaba ne bakhaka belukhe kumulilo, kulaboosia mala mulamanya muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne ndamunyaasia enywe.
Lundi ese ndakhola sibala sikele sichiimi sikila se bamenyanga mu lisuubila tawe.” Kano niko Omwami WELE aloma.

Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, boolela Yerusalemu bibiindu bie lisinye nibio lukholile,
luboolele oli: Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Wasaalwa mu sibala sia Kanaani, raraao aba Omuamori ne maao aba Omuhiti.
Nga wasaalwa se aliio owakhala lulela lwowo tawe. Se wasiingwa ne kameechi ka chumbe, namwe se bakhura mu ngubo tawe.
Se abao omundu owakhukholela ewe siisa, namwe se aliio owakhusiima ewe tawe, ne kakhali wamwaatwa mu ndaa sikila wabiilwa khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo wasaalilwakho.
“Nga nabira nakhubona ne wikalangasia mu mafuki kowo, se nakhulekha wafwa tawe.
Nakhukhola wachoa bulayi nga kumurongooro. Mala waba omukhaana omukhulu. Kamaturu kecha, ne lichuune liakhumba, ne kakhali waba sichula busa.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Nga nabira lundi nakhubona, waba waangaale wolile khuselelwa mala osiili sichula. Nabukula engubo yase nakhubiimba sichula siowo. Ee nakhuselela mala nakhola ne nawe endakaano eye khuyilana nio ewe waba omukhasi wase.
“Nio nabukula kameechi mala nakhusiinga kamafuki mala nakhuakha kamafura.
Nakhufwara engubo niyo banabakho kamaua, biraaro, engubo eya katani, nakhufuunikha ne sitaambala silayi.
Nakhufwara kamamili khu makhono ne mwikosi.
Nakhufwara embete khu lioolu ne bipalakasa khu maru, ne kuutwa eye lukoondo lulayi.
Ewe wafwarwa bibiindu bie sahabu ne efwesa, engubo eya katani ne niyo banabakho kamaua. Siakhulia siowo siaba sie bufu bunosie ne bubuukhi ne kamafura. Ewe wakhomela bulayi, waba ne lukoondo mala waba omwami owe siikhasi.
Ne efuma eye lukoondo lwowo lulayi yasalanila mu kholo choosi, sikila naba ese owakhukhola wafwaana orio. Kano niko Omwami WELE aboola.
“Ne kakhali ewe wasuubila mu lukoondo ne fuma yowo mala wakhola bueeyi ne khukhwesasia khu buli mundu obira.
Wabukula chingubo chowo chindala waboa wang'oona abuundu wowo we khusaayilao, mala wakholelao bueeyi, bukhalikhoo, namwe bukhalibakhoo tawe.
Lundi wabukula bie khukhwisaa biowo bie sahabu ne fwesa yase, nibio nakhuelesia mala weng'oonelamo bifwaani bie babaandu mala waeyana nabio bibieene.
Ne ewe wabukula chingubo chowo che kamaua wabiimba bifwaani bienebio mala wabiakha kamafura ke kumuseituni ne biiunya kumuya kumulayi.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Akhaba siakhulia nisio nakhuelesia nakhuliisia bufu bunosie, ne kamafura, ne bubuukhi mala ewe wabiaana khu bifwaani chana khulwe khubisiimisia.
“Ne wabukula babaana bowo basoleeli ne bakhaana nibo wasaalila ese, wabeera wabaana nga embosio khu bifwaani. Wibaasia oli bueeyi bwowo bwaba siindu sitiiti?
Ne wibaasia oli khuaana babaana base nga embosio khu bifwaani siindu sitiiti nisio?
Ne mu bumayaanu bwowo bwoosi ne mu bueeyi, se wakhebulila chindaalo che mu buele bwowo, nga ne waba sichula busa ne wikalangasia mu mafuki kowo tawe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ewe wabunile! Wabunile! Wakhola bumayaanu obwo bwoosi mala
buli khundulo khwe kumuyila wombakha chinju che khusaayilamo bifwaani ne khukholelamo bueeyi.
Wonaka lukoondo lwowo mukhwefuliaba mu matosi. Welekhuula khu buli mundu owakhureeba mala wakhola bulaaya buli ndaalo.
Akhaba lundi ewe wakhola bueeyi ne Bamisiri, bachirani bowo babekoomba bueeyi, mala watasa bueeyi khu khumbambia lirima.
“Khwako lola, nakhukhalaliile ne khukhua kumunaanio ne khu khunuula kumukabwa kwowo nikwo waelesibwa. Nakhureere mu makhono ke bakhaana Bafilisiti, babakhubiila ne khusinyikhwa ne bikholwa biowo bie sifwabi.
“Wakhola sifwabi, akhaba ne Baashuru sikila sewanyalikha ne babaandi tawe, ee wakhola sifwabi nabo, ne kakhaba kario sewanyalikha tawe.
Watasa bueeyi akhaba ne Bababiloni be mu sibala sie bubwofuli, ne se wanyalikha nabo tawe.”
Lino nilio Omwami WELE aboola, “Wakholile bino bioosi nga omueeyi okhali ne chisoni tawe.
Buli khu ngila wombakhakho abuundu niio wesaayila bifwaani ne khukhola sifwabi. Ne kakhali se waruungianga chirupia oli omueeyi owa buli lwosi tawe.
Ewe oli nga omukhasi omukhobani, osiimana ne baseecha babaandi khukhila omuseecha wewe.
Babaandu be siseecha baruunganga bakhasi baeeyi, ne kakhali ewe waruunga ne khuonga basaale bowo khukhwama buli abuundu.
Khwako ewe waba lukano mu bueeyi bwowo khukhwama khu bakhasi babaandi. Saliio omundu owakhuyingilila khuba omueeyi tawe, ewe waruunganga, ewe se waelesibwanga kumuruungo kwe bueeyi tawe, khwako ewe waba lukano luluundi busa.”
Khwako Yerusalemu, mueeyi ewe! Ulila elomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Sikila wefuula chingubo chowo nga omueeyi mala chisoni chakhuamba ne batia bowo ne bifwaani, mala wera babaana bowo nga chimbosio khu bifwaani.
Sikila kano lola ndabuusia batia bowo boosi, nibo ewe wesangaasianga nabo, abo boosi nibo ewe wasiima ne nabo boosi nibo wabiila. Ndababuusia mbareere khukhwama buli lubeka, mala ese ndakhufuula ebweeni wabwe, bakhubone sichula siowo sioosi.
Ne ese ndakhukhalakila nga omwiiri lundi omukhobani, ne mu lirima ne bukhalafu ndakhua siuukuumo sie lifwa.
Ne ndakhura mu makhono ke batia bowo, balasambuula niio okholelanga bueeyi ne khutechula abuundu aesuta niio osaayilanga bifwaani. Balakhufuula chingubo ne khukhunuula bie khukhwisaa biowo, mala bakhulekhe sichula elala.
“Ne balaachilisia babaandu bakali khwiwe bakhupe kamabaale, mala bakhutonye mu bitonyi ne chimbalu chabwe.
Ne balosia chinju chowo, ne khukhukhalakila ebweeni we bakhasi bakali. Ndakhwakamia khukhola bueeyi mala solaruunga lundi batia bowo tawe.
Nio lirima ne likhendekha liase biwe ne se khabe nabio lundi tawe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Sikila ewe webilila nga ese ne nakhunyoola noli mwana ne kakhali wambambiisie lirima khulwe bikholwa biowo bioosi, kano kakila nekhuukuuma. Ne siina sikila ne watasa sifwabi khu bumayaanu bwowo buno?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu bakharumikhire lusimo luno khwiwe Yerusalemu. ‘Omukhaana ne maawe nasilala.’
Ewe ng'ali oli omukhaana owa maao, owabiila raraao ne bawandaayo, ne ewe ng'ali oli nga bakooko bowo ba babiila baseecha ne babaana babwe. Ewe ne chingoba chiili siimbi mwaba ne maawenywe Omuhiti ne raraawenywe aaba Omuamori.
“Ne omukooko wowo omukhulu ali Samaria owamenya ebunaswa wowo alala ne bakhaana bewe; ne omukooko wowo omutiiti ali Sodomu owamenya lubeka lwowo lwe siafubo alala ne bakhaana bewe.
Ne ewe waloonda limenya liabwe ne kimiima kiabwe mala waba omubi khukhilakho nibo.”
Ese Omwami WELE nechuba ne ndoma ndi, “Nga ese ne menyile mindali, omukooko wowo Sodomu ne bakhaana bewe se bakhola bumayaanu nga ewe ne bakhaana bowo mukholile tawe.
Lola, buno nibwo bumayaanu bwo mukooko wenywe Sodomu. Niye ne bakhaana bewe bebonia sikila baaba ne biakhulia lundi bamenya bulayi, ne se bayeeta bataambi ne baabanani tawe.
Bebonia lundi baaba ne sileka, bakhola bibiindu bimayaanu mu moni chase, khwako nabarusiao, nga mwesi mumanyile.
“Samaria se lwakhola bubwoni bukali nga bubwowo tawe, ewe Yerusalemu wakhola bubwoni bukali khubakhila nibo, ne olekhaasia bubwoni bwowo nende bwe bakooko bowo, nibo baaba balayi khukhila ewe.
Wakhaba wesi, olachangalaala lukali sikila ewe wababila bakooko bowo sikila bumayaanu nibwo wakhola buli buubi lukali khukhila bubwabwe, nibo balikho balayi khu khukhila ewe. Nono wakhaba wesi khoambwe chisoni, mala ochangalaasibwe sikila wakhola bakooko bowo babonekha khuuba baluungi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yerusalemu ali, “Khakhole Sodomu ne Samaria alala ne bakhaana babwe babe bulayi lundi. Akhaba ewe wesi alala nabo.
Olaambwa chisoni, ne chisoni chowo chilekesia bali bakooko bowo balayi khu khukhila ewe.
Sodomu ne Komora ne bakhaana babwe bakhabe bulayi lundi. Ne akhaba wesi ne bakhaana bowo.
Eku, ewe se wakholanga sieenya meno khu Sodomu chindaalo nicho webonianga,
bubwoni bwowo ne busiili khubonekha tawe? Ewe luno wesi oli nga niye, Baedomu nende Bafilisiti nende boosi bamenyile siimbi nawe balakhuchekheelelanga ewe.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, ‘Khukhwola oukuumwe khulwe bikholwa biowo bie lisinye nibio wakhola.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ndakhukholela nga wolaana khukholelwa sikila waleka niko welakana ne khufuna endakaano.
Ne kakhaba kario ese khakhebulile endakaano yase ne nawe mu ndaalo che buele bwowo mala ese ndakhola endakaano ne nawe eya buli lwosi.
Nono ewe olikhebulila liiba liowo mala oambwe chisoni nga ese ne ndibukula bakooko bowo boombi, omukhulu nende omutiiti babe nga bakhaana bowo. Akhaba ne bakhaaba mu ndakaano yase nawe tawe.
Ese ndakhola endakaano yase ne nawe, mala ewe okhamanye oli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khakhubeele bubwoni bwoosi nibwo wakhola, ne kakhali olibukhebulila oaambwe chisoni mala okhilwe khulomaloma. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, boolela Baisiraeli lusimo luno,
bolaane khumanya niko ese Omwami WELE mboola. Yabao efuruusi emboofu ne kamafumbo kamabalaayi ne chindaa chimboofu chichachalaala. Yapurukha yacha khu ngulu cha Lebanoni yakwa yabuta khasaafu khemusia khu mutarakwa,
nikho yayila mu sibala sie khukusia ne khukulaana mala yakhara mu lukoba luboofu lwe bakusia.
Nio yabukula lumiicho lwe mu sibala sia Isiraeli mala yalumiicha mu maloba ke ngakha a sireende.
Khasaala khamela khachoa khaba kumusabibu kukwalaamila asi, ne chisakia chachoa chaniina chalola niio efuruusi eli, ne kimili kiakwo kiekha asi. Nio kwekela kumusabibu, kwarakho chisakia ne kamasaafu.
“Nekhali yabao efuruusi ekiindi emboofu eye kamaani ne chindaa chimbalaayi ne kamafumbo kamakali. Ne lola, kumusabibu kuno kwayila kimili kiakwo niio efuruusi yino eli, ne kwarusia chisakia chakwo chalola niio eli, ne lilieyikina bali khulanyoola kameechi kamakali khukhila niio kwamela.
Ne kakhali kumusabibu beele kwabiaalwa khale mu ngakha niio kameechi kali kamakali niio kunyala kwaba ne chisakia kwame kamatuunda mala kube kumulayi.”
Omwami WELE areeba ali, “Kumusabibu kuno kulachoa ku? Efuruusi endaayi se lakukhuula ne khufuna chisakia mala kamatuunda kakwo koome ta ku? Se larumikhira kamaani kamakali namwe ekholo emboofu khukukhuula tawe.
Kwabiaalwa, ne kakhali kulakhula ku? Se kuloma siimiyu ne siicha tawe ku? Se ali abwene ne abwene niio kulomela tawe ku?”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese Esekieli ali,
“Reeba Baisiraeli barengu bano kaaba bali bamanyile niko lusimo luno luboola. Baboolele oli, ‘Lola omwami owa Babiloni echa Yerusalemu mala abukula omwami walwo ne babemeelesi balwo, mala abakobosia e Babiloni.
Ne abukulamo mulala owe lisaaye lie bubwami mala bafukiilisiana ne naye, ne amwechubia khuba omusuubilwa. Abukula babemeelesi nga baboe,
nio sibala silekhe khuba ne kamaani lundi tawe ne khubona mbo lifukiilisiana liekholekhe.
Ne kakhali Omwami owa Yuda aba omureengu khu niye, aruma wamwanda e Misiri asaba chifarasi ne banamae bakali. Alanyala ku? Omundu oyo anyala aona ku? Se anyala aloba khukhola niko bafukiilisiana mala aloba khuba ne siuukuumo tawe!’ ”
Omwami WELE echubile ali, “Nga ese nendi Wele omenyile mindali, omwami yuno alafwila mu Babiloni sikila afunaka embuliilisiani ne liliechuba nilio akhola no mwami owa Babiloni owamura khu bwami.
Akhaba banamae bo mwami owa Misiri se balamuyeeta mwiie tawe, nga Babiloni babuusia liloba ne khulima buko khulwe khukhwira babaandu bakali.
Sikila alekelesia liliechuba liewe ne mbuliilisiani yewe, sikila afukiilila mala khukhola nga nilwo kenyibwa tawe, se alebacha tawe.”
Khwako Omwami WELE echuba ali, “Nga ese Wele omenyile mindali, nja khumuukuuma khulwe khulekha khukhola niko elakana.
Ndareka lurimba lwase mala akwemo. Ndamuyila e Babiloni mala emuukuumileyo sikila sabeele omusuubilwa khwise tawe.
Ne banamae bewe boosi barana balafwila mwiie ne bakhaone bakhasalanisibwe chimbeka choosi nio enywe mulamanya muli Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Ese nase ndaniina khu mutarakwa kumuleeyi,
funakeyo lusakia lwe kamasaafu kamatoro,
khalubiaale khu sikulu sileeyi,
ndilubiaala khu sikulu sileeyi lukali sia Isiraeli.
Kukhareekho chisakia mala kwaame,
mala kube kumutarakwa kumulayi.
Ne chinyuni cha buli lukano chikhamenyekho,
mala chombakhekho biswi.
Kimirongooro kioosi kie mu sibala kikhamanye kili Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ndemanga kimirongooro kimileeyi,
mala khusia kimirongooro kimitiiti.
Nomia kimirongooro kimibisi,
mala khola kimiomu kiba kimibisi.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile mala ndalikhola.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andeeba lundi ali,
“Lusimo siina luno nilwo babaandu babeelelela khuloma mu sibala sia Isiraeli?
‘Basaasi balia chisabibu chindulu,
ne kakhali babaana bamila bululu.’ ”
Omwami WELE echubile ali, “Nga ese Wele omenyile mindali se mukharumikhirekho lusimo luno lundi mu Isiraeli tawe.
Bulamu bwa buli mundu bwama khwise, bubeele bwe basaasi namwe bwe babaana. Omundu okhola bubwoni niye okhafwe.
“Omundu aaba nali ng'ali omulayi, omuluungi lundi omusuubilwa.
Omundu oyo aaba nakhasaaya bifwaani bia Isiraeli, namwe nalia chimbosio nicho bakaania mu namwima, namwe sareebanga omukhasi owo wasie tawe, namwe se abechanga no mukhasi mu nyaanga chewe chimbi tawe.
Se abea namwe anuula omundu yesi yesi tawe, ne kakhali akobosiangayo nibio atililila bie likobi. Alisianga be njala, mala afwara bali sichula.
Se ekopianga chirupia khulwe khurakho bukhala namwe khunyoolelakho sie ngelu siosi siosi tawe. Sakholanga ke sifwabi tawe lundi aananga likhalaka lia ng'ali niio bulomani buli.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Omundu lukano olwo ofukiilila kamalaka kase ne khukaloonda, ali omuluungi ne alamenya.”
“Aaba no mwana omusoleeli omunuuli lundi omwiiri, okhola bibiindu nibio,
raraawe akhakholakho tawe. Olichanga chimbosio chichakaanisibwa mu namwima, oreebanga bakhasi babeene.
Apia babanani ne bataambi siibi, anuula babaandu bibiindu se akobosia nisio ekopile tawe. Acha mu binamwima ne asaaya bifwaani,
ekopa khulwe khunyoola bukhala. Omundu nga yuno amenya ku? Se alamenya siise sileeyi tawe. Aakholile bibiindu bie lisinye bino bioosi khwako alafwa. Omwene ereerere lifwa.
“Ne aaba ne omwana omusoleeli okundi obona bubwoni bwoosi nibwo raraawe akholile mala aria khu bukhola.
Okhalia chimbosio chiaanilwe khu bifwaani tawe, namwe sasaaya bifwaani bie kholo eya Isiraeli, namwe sareebanga omukhasi owo mundu tawe.
Sakholela omundu kamabi tawe. Akobosiayo nisio atililile, sanuula omundu siindu tawe ne kakhali alisia be njala ne khufwara bali sichula.
Ekhiingililanga khukhola bubwoni. Sabukulanga bukhala khu siindu namwe satasakho siindu tawe. Aloleelesianga kamalaka kase mala akeendela mu lilakiilisia liase, yuno salafwa sikila bubwoni bwa raraawe tawe, alamenya.
Ne khuka raraawe oyo sikila anyekhela babaandu, wanuula kimiaandu kia wandaaye ne akhola kakhali kamalayi tawe, mu baandu bewe, lola alafwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe.”
Nekhali enywe mureeba muli, “Siina sikila omwana nakhafwa khulwe bubwoni bwa raraawe?” Likobosio lili bali omwana akhola kang'ali ne kamalayi. Aliinda lilaka liase ne khuliloondela elala, khwako alamenya.
Omundu okhola bubwoni niye olafwa, omwana salafwa khulwe bubwoni bwa raraawe namwe raraawe salafwa khulwe bubwoni bwo mwana tawe. Omundu omulayi akhanyoole kumuruuru khulwe bulayi bwewe ne omwoni alafwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe.
“Omundu omwoni nalekha khukhola bubwoni mala aloonde kamalaka kase, akhole kaali kamalayi, alamenya ne se alafwa tawe.
Bubwoni bwewe bwoosi nibwo akhola bulabeelwa, alamenya sikila akholile kamaluungi.”
Omwami WELE areeba ali, “Ese sangaalilanga lifwa lio mundu omwoni ku? Ne kakhali nenya ekanile bubwoni bwewe mala amenye.
“Ne omundu omuluungi nalekha khukhola kamalayi mala arakikhe khukhola kamabi, ke lisinye niko babi bakholanga, omundu oyo alamenya ku? Tawe! Se silikhoo na silala silayi nisio akhola silikhebulilwa tawe. Akhafwe sikila khuloba khuba omusuubilwa ne khulwe bubwoni bwewe.
“Ne kakhali enywe muboola muli, ‘Niko Omwami akhola se kali kang'ali tawe,’ Baisiraeli ndekeresie. Enywe mwibaasia muli engila niyo kholelamo bibiindu seli ng'ali tawe? Chingila chenywe nicho chikhali cha ng'ali tawe.
Ne omundu omuluungi nalekha khukhola kamalayi mala arakikhe khukhola bubwoni, alafwa sikila bubwoni bwewe.
Omundu omwoni nalekha khukhola bubwoni mala arakikha khukhola kamalayi aleonia.
Namanya niko alikhakhola mala alekhe bubwoni, alamenya se alafwa tawe.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli enywe muboola muli, ‘Engila yo Mwami seli ng'ali tawe.’ Baisiraeli, mwibaasia muli engila yase seli ng'ali tawe? Chingila chenywe nicho chikhali cha ng'ali tawe.
“Khwako ese Omwami WELE muboolela enywe Baisiraeli ndi, khakhalakile buli sia mulala khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biewe. Lekha bubwoni nibwo mulakholanga mukhalekha bwamubunia tawe.
Lekha bubwoni bwenywe bwoosi nibwo mwakholilenge, mube ne kamebaasio ne kimiooyo kimiya. Baisiraeli siina sikila ne mwenya khufwa?
Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Se sangaalila lifwa lio mundu yesi yesi tawe, khwako yekanila bubwoni mala mumenye.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali yiimba kumwenya kwe bubeeleli kuno khuloondekhana ne baruki ba Isiraeli.
Maao aaba etalang'i enyindaafu ekhasi mu talang'i chiseecha!
Aakhusia ching'ana chewe mu talang'i chiseecha chisiili khukofula.
Aakhusia eng'ana ndala mala aakiekisia khuaaya,
eng'ana eyo yamanya khulia babaandu.
Chikholo chaulila kakaayo chakukuula.
Yarekwa yakwa mu buko bwabwe,
mala bakirusia mu buko ne bibiindu nga kimilobo
bakiyila mu sibala sie Misiri.
Nga maawe ne yabona eli yamuliindile lukali,
yarusiisiekho kumwoyo,
yabukula eng'ana ekiindi mu ng'ana chayo,
yakikhusia mala yaba etalang'i eseecha endafu.
Nga yakhula yakeenda ne chitalang'i chichiindi.
Yosi yeyika yamanya khuaaya ne khuulia babaandu.
Yacha mu ngoba chabwe che kamaani mala yatechula chingoba chimboofu
babaandu be mu sibala esio baria lukali ne nabo boosi bababaamo
nga baulilanga ne ulukhuma.
Nio chikholo chakiibwaakala,
chakireka buli lubeka.
Bareka lurimba lwabwe ebweeni wayo
yakwa mu buko.
Bakirusilia chingaki mala bakira mu kutabuku,
bakireera khu mwami owa Babiloni,
bakireera bakira mu siboe,
niio kumumilo kwayo kukhauliilikha khu bikulu bia Isiraeli tawe.
Maao aba nga kumusabibu mu mukuunda,
kukwasiuulwa kwabiaalwa ameechi,
kwama kamatuunda ne khusabia chisakia chingali,
khulwe khuba ne kameechi kamakali.
Siisina siakwo sie kamaani siekela esiimbo eyo mwami
kumusabibu kwachoa kwalea lukali mu bichakha bibiindi
kwabonekha khulwe buleeyi bwakwo ne chisakia chingali.
Ne kakhali kumusabibu kwafunwa mu bukhalafu kwakwa asi,
luucho lwe bukwe lwakwomia,
kamatuunda kakwo kamululwa,
siisina siakwo sie kamaani sioma,
mala kumulilo kwasiosia.
Luno kwabialiilwe mu sichiimi,
mu sibala sisioomu siikhali ne kameechi.
Ne kumulilo kwamile mu sisina siakwo
kwosiisie chisakia chakwo ne kamatuunda
se sili sie kamaani lundi tawe,
se sinyala siaba esiimbo eyo mwami tawe.
Kuno kuli kumwenya kwe bubeeleli mala kwimbwa buli siise.

Yaba endaalo eye likhumi kumwesi kwa kharaano mu mwiiko kukhola saba kwe khuuba mu mbaambe. Babemeelesi balala ba Isiraeli banjichakho khureeba lilienya lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala bekhala ebweeni wase.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lomaloma khu bemeelesi ba Isiraeli mala obaboolele oli: Omwami WELE areeba ali, ‘Enywe mwechile khukhundeeba lilienya liase?’ Omwami WELE eechubile ali: Nga ese Wele omenyile mindali, se ndamufukiilila enywe mundeebekho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.” Ese Omwami WELE.
“Mwana wo mundu, ewe werekeekhe khubakhalakila? Khola orio. Bakhebusie bibiindu bie lisinye nibio bakuukawabwe bakhola.
Baboolele niko ndikho ndoma, ‘Nga narobora Baisiraeli, nechubila lisaaye lie nju eya Yakobo. Neyekesia khu nibo ne bali e Misiri, nabechubila ndi, Ese ndi Omwami WELE, Wele wenywe.
Mu ndaalo niyo nabechubilamo ndi khabarusie mu sibala sie Misiri, mbareere mbengisie mu sibala nisio nabarekekhera. Sibala silayi nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetikhanga. Sibala silayi lukali mu bibala bioosi.
Nababoolela bamwaate bifwaani nibio basiima nio balekhe khukhwefwolobia ne bifwaani bie bubeeyi bie Misiri. Sikila Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Ne kakhali baba be sileka khwise mala se bandekeeresia tawe. Buli sia mulala se aalekha bibiindu bisinyisia tawe, namwe se balekha khusaaya bifwaani bie Misiri tawe. Nono nebaasia khubakhalalila lukali ne khubaambila lirima mu sibala sia Misiri.
Ne kakhali se nakhola ndio tawe, sikila lisina liase se liakhafumile tawe. Sikila beele babaandu nibo Baisiraeli bamenyilemo babona ese ne nemanyisia khu Baisiraeli khubirira mu khurusia Baisiraeli abo e Misiri.’ ”
Nio nabarangirira nabarusia mu sibala sia Misiri mala nabareera mu sichiimi.
Nabaelesia lilakiilisia liase ne khubekisia kamalaka kase. Omundu ne akaloonda alamenya bulayi.
Khutasa khwako nabaelesia Esabato, nga simanyisio akari wase ne nabo, nio boole khumanya bali Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mbakhola baba batakatifu.
Ne kakhali Baisiraeli baba ne sileka khwise mu sichiimi, se baloonda lilakiilisia liase tawe, ne kakhali baloba kamalaka kase niko abeele omundu ne aloonda amenya bulayi. Ne Esabato yase bakifwolobia lukali. Mu lirima liase nenya khubabunisilia mu sichiimi.
Ne kakhali se nakhola ndio tawe sikila abeele lisina liase likhakhola lirio liafwocholwa mu kholo nicho nabarusiamo e Misiri.
Khutasa khwako nabechubila mu sichiimi ndi se ndibareera mu sibala nisio naba ne nabaelesia tawe. Sibala silayi nisio kamabeele ne bubuukhi biseleetikhanga. Sibala silayi lukali mu bibala bioosi.
Sikila baloba kamalaka kase, lundi se baloonda lilakiilisia liase tawe ne khufwolobia esabato yase sikila kimiooyo kiabwe kiaba khu bifwaani.
Ne kakhaba kario, nabakholela siisa, mala se nababunia namwe nabeerera mu sichiimi tawe.
Nakaania babaana babwe ndi, “Mukhaloonda kamalaka ke bakuukawenywe tawe, mukhaloonda kimiima kiabwe, namwe mwenyaalutia khulwe bifwaani biabwe tawe.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndi Wele wenywe, loonda lilakiilisia liase mala murie lukali kamalaka kase.
Khola esabato ebe endaalo endakatifu nio sibe simanyisio sie ndakaano yase nanywe, nio mumanye muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe”.
Ne kakhali eselukho eyo yandekeelesia. Se baloonda lilakiilisia liase tawe, lundi se baba ne sinani mu khuria kamalaka kase tawe, kamalaka kareeranga bulamu khu buli mundu okaloonda. Bafwolobia esabato yase. Khwako nebaasia khubakhalalila lukali mu sichiimi ne khubabunia boosi.
Ne kakhali se nakhola ndio tawe, nio lisina liase likhakhola lirio liafwocholwa mu kholo nicho naba ne mbarusiisiemo e Misiri tawe.
Khwako nabechubila mu sichiimi ndi ndibasalanisia mu kholo ne khubayila mu bibala bioosi,
sikila se baloonda kamalaka kase tawe, nekhali baba balobile lilakiilisia liase ne khufwolobia esabato yase, ne khuloleelela busa bifwaani nibio bakuukawabwe basaayanga.
Nio nabaelesia kamalaka kakhali kamalayi tawe ne lilakiilisia nilio omundu ne aliloonda se anyala aamenya tawe.
Nabakhola benyaalutia babeene ne biianwa biabwe mala barusia babaana babwe babele nga chimbosio, sino siaba siuukuumo siriisia khu nibo nio bamanye bali, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khwako mwana wo mundu, boolela Baisiraeli oli, “Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Yino eli engila ndala niyo bakuukawenywe baakholela ese embelekeu, khulwe khuloba khuuba busuubilwa khwise.
Nabareera mu sibala nisio nabalaka. Nga babona chingulu ne kimirongooro, baana chimbosio chabwe khu nibio bioosi. Bambaambia lirima khulwe chimbosio nicho boosia nende endali niyo baana nga biianwa’.
Nabareeba ndi, ‘Abuundu siina aesuta niio muchichanga ao?’ Khukhwama endaalo eyo khukhwola luno balangaanga abuundu ao bali ‘Aesuta’.
Boolela Baisiraeli niko ese Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikho ndoma. Siina sikila mwenyaalutie mwabeene bulayi bwene nga bakuukawenywe baakholanga, ne khutiima ne muli mu bueeyi bwe khuloonda bibiindu biabwe biisinya?
Muaana biianwa ne khukhwenyaalutia mwabeene ne bifwaani bienywe biiunya ebio bioosi khulwe khuaana babaana benywe nga chimbosio mu mulilo khukhwola luno. Eku Baisiraeli enywe, ese nyala nafukiilila mwandeebakho likhuwa? Ng'ali busa nga ne ndi Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele omenyile mindali, se ndamufukiilila enywe mundeebekho likhuwa liosi liosi tawe.
Niko mwibaasia muli kalekholekha se kalekholekha tawe. Mwibaasia muli, ‘Lekha fwesi khube nga be chikholo ne bibala bibiindi mala khusaaye kimirongooro ne kamabaale.’ ”
Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Nga ese ne ndi Wele omenyile mindali, ng'ali mu lirima liase ese khabamiie enywe ne kamaani kase koosi.
Khamwekesie bunyali bwase ne lirima liase nga khamubuusie enywe alala khukhwama mu bibala nibio mwasalanisibwamo.
Khamureere enywe mu siangalaamwe sie chikholo mala ebweeneyo khamukhalakile enywe moni na moni.”
Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Khabakhalakile busa bulayi bwene nga ne nakhalakila bakuukawenywe mu siangalaamwe sia Sinai.
“Khamure mu bunyali bwase mala mukhole enywe murie endakaano yase.
Kharusie mwinywe be sileka nende abo babakholelanga ese bubwoni. Khabarusie mu sibala sie mbaambe ne se bakhengile mu sibala sia Isiraeli tawe. Nio enywe mumanye muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi.”
Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ne luno enywe Baisiraeli mweesi, khola niko mwenya! Chiililila khusaaya bifwaani bienywe biiunya ebio! Ne kakhali enyuma wa kano, ne mukhandekeeresia tawe, khukhwola mulekhe khufwochola lisina liase litakatifu khulwe biianwa bienywe ne bifwaani bienywe biiunya ebio.
Mu sibala esio khu sikulu siase sitakatifu, khu sikulu sileeyi mu Isiraeli, ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, Baisiraeli enywe mweesi mukhasaayilekho. Mukhasiimisie mala mundeerere chimbosio chenywe, biianwa bienywe bilayi lundi bitakatifu.
Nga ne khamurusie mu baandu ne khu mubuusia enywe khukhwama mu bibala nibio mwasalanisibwamo, khafukiilile embosio yenywe eye khukhwosia esiimisibwa. Mala khekesie butakatifu bwase mwinywe mu moni mwe chikholo.
Ne mukhamanye muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga ne khamukobosie mu sibala sia Isiraeli, sibala nisio nechuba ndi khaelesie bakuukawenywe.
Ne ebweeneyo mukhakhebulile likeenda lienywe ne bikholwa bienywe biibi nibio mwenyaalutisiliamo, ne mukhesonie khulwe bumayaanu bwoosi nibwo mwakhola.
Enywe mukhamanye muli ese ndi Omwami WELE, nga ne khakhole sikholwa khwinywe khulwe lisina liase, se khuli khuloondekhana ne chingila ne bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu tawe, ee Baisiraeli Omwami Wele aboola.”
Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu loleleela siafubo yilwacha kamabi khu be siafubo, mala ong'oole kamabi khu sibala sie kumusiru kwa Nekebu.”
Boolela kumusiru kwa Nekebu oli, “Ulila elomo eyo Omwami WELE.” Khwako Omwami Wele aboola ali, “Lola ndabwana kumulilo mwinywe mala kuloosia buli murongooro kumubisi ne kumwoomu mwinywe. Lilierika ne chimemu che kumulilo okwo se chilisimisibwa tawe, kumulilo kulosia buli mundu khukhwama siafubo khukhwola e bunaswa.
Babaandu boosi balamanya bali Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakubwanile ne se kukhasimisibwe tawe.”
Nio naboolela Omwami ndi, “Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi, okhakila nabikhola tawe! Buli mundu alikho eloocha khale ali ndomanga mungano buli lwosi.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lola Yerusalemu, yilwacha khu bubi bwe abuundu niio basaayilanga, ng'oola kamabi khu Baisiraeli
mala obaboolele oli, Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndoma ndi, ‘Lola, ese nakhaba omusiku wenywe, ndachoola embalu yase mu sibaabi, ndamwiira enywe mweesi, omuluungi nende omumayaanu.
Ndarusiao omuluungi nende omumayaanu, khwako ndarusia embalu yase mu sibaabi siayo khulwe khukhwira babaandu boosi khukhwama siafubo khukhwola ebunaswa.
Ne babaandu boosi bakhamanye bali Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nachoolile embalu yase khukhwama mu sibaabi siayo, se ndakikobosiamo lundi tawe.’
“Khwako mwana wo mundu, yeloocha, yeloocha ebweeni wa buli mundu khulwe buchuuni bwe kumwoyo ne bubeeleli burafu.
Ne bakhureeba bali, ‘Siina sikila ne weloocha?’ Baboolele oli, ‘Sikila kamakhuwa kamakeni kalikho kecha. Ne koolile, kimiooyo kiabwe kilechula buuri ne kamakhono koosi kakhekoye, bunyindaafu bwabwe bukhawe ne kamasikamo kosi kakhatereme busa. Siise sioolile, nisio sino. Ese Omwami WELE nalomaloome’ ”
Ne Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, ng'oola oboolele babaandu niko ese Omwami Wele ndoma,
Embalu! Ee embalu yaakaalwe mala elikho emeniuukha.
Yaakaalwe khukhwira,
emeniuukha nga lueni!
Eku, efwe khunyala khwekhoya?
Mwalekeleesie kumukhomwa ne liikololosia lioosi.
Embalu elikho emeniuukha,
bakirekeekhe erumikhwe,
yaakaalwe lundi elikho emeniuukha,
nio bakiakaanisie omwiiri.
Mwana wo mundu, lila lundi yeloocha,
sikila embalu yino yechile khukhwira babaandu base,
ne babemeelesi ba Isiraeli boosi.
Embalu elabeera nibo alala ne babaandu base.
Khupa sifuba siowo khulwe bubeeleli.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Ndikho ngela babaandu base,
baaba ne bakheenya khukhwekanila tawe,
bibiindu bino bioosi bilabekholekhakho.
“Nono mwana wo mundu, ng'oola. Khupa chimbi mala embalu elarema lundi ereme. Eli embalu eye khukhwira, eriisianga lundi esiinjanga.
Khwako babaandu base batibiisie bunyindaafu, lundi bakali bakwiile. Nareere bubwoki bwe embalu khu miliango kiabwe. Yaakaalwe, elikho emeniuukha nga lueni. Yasingibwe khukirekekha khulwe khusiinja.
Elarema lubeka luseecha ne lukhasi nende osi osi niio bubwoki bulolile.
Akhaba ese ndapa chimbi, ne lirima liase lilawa. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, loleelela chingila chibili nicho omwami owa Babiloni anyala echelakho ne mbalu yewe. Chombi chikhame mu sibala silala. Lundi ng'oona simanyisio sie lupao khu ngila, sire niio chingila chaukhanila.
Kumukhono mulala kukhekesie omwami engila echa Raba mu lukoba lwe Baamoni, ne kukuundi kwekesie engila echa Yuda mu lukoba lusire lwa Yerusalemu.
Omwami owa Babiloni emile niio chingila chaukhanila; niio chilola eyi neeyi amwate asi chisiimbi. Khumanya ngila siina niyo akhoya achiilekho, asisiikha buembo, areeba bifwaani biewe lundi emenieelesia siini sie saang'i niyo baanile nga embosio.
Mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha aba ne buembo nibwo baandikakho bali ‘Yerusalemu,’ bumuboolela khucha khubukula bibiindu bie khutechula, arusia lilaka bubwiri ne luyoka lwe liie bibeo, khura bibiindu bie khutechula asilibwa ne khubuusia liloba khu masiisi ne khukhwombakha kiminaara.
Babaandu ba Yerusalemu se balasuubila kano tawe, sikila embuliilisiani niyo bakhola. Ne kakhali bung'oosi buno bukhabakhebusie bubwoni bwabwe bukhakile bayilwe mu mbaambe.”
Lino nilio ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, “Bubwoni bwenywe bwamanyikhaane, buli mundu amanyile kumusaango kwenywe. Mwekesia bubweeni bwenywe mu buli sikholwa sienywe. Mulakhalakilwa, lundi ndamura mu bunyali bwo musiku.
“Ewe omwami owa Isiraeli omumayaanu, okhali omuluungi tawe, endaalo yowo emaliilisi eye siuukuumo yolile.
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Fuula ekuutwa ne sileemba. Buli siindu se silaba nga sibechanga tawe. Abo baali asi balaniinisibwa ne baali angaaki balekhisibwa!
Lukoba lwatechuulwe, lwatechuulwe, ndalutechula. Ne kakhali kano se kalekholekha tawe, khukhwola nga niye narobora ne echa. Nio ese nde lukoba luno mu makhano kewe.’ ”
‘Embalu yarekeekhwe khubunia,
yang'oonilwe khukhwirwa ne khumeniuukha nga lueni.’
Kamalola niko mubona kali ke bubeeyi, lundi mung'oola ke bubeeyi. Muli bamayaanu lundi baabi; ne ndaalo yenywe eye siuukuumo simaliilisi elikho yiicha.
“Kobosia embalu mu sibaabi. Ndakhukhalakila abuundu niio wasaalilwa.
Mulabona burafu bwe lirima liase bulayi bwene nga ne mubona bumemu bwe kumulilo. Ndamura mu makhono ke babaandu baabi, barafu lukali, baali ne limanya mu bwonaki.
Kumulilo kulababunia enywe. Kamafuki kenywe kalachichukha mu sibala sienywe. Se alikhowo oolimukhebulila enywe lundi tawe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu! Ewe werekeekhe khukhalakila lukoba lulwechula babeeri? Luboolele bikholwa bioosi bie lisinye nilwo lukholile.
Luboolele oli, Omwami WELE, Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Sikila mwerire babaandu benywe bakali mala mwenyaalutiisie mu khusaaya bifwaani, siise sienywe silikho siicha.
Enywe muli ne kumusaango sikila babaandu nibo mweera ne khukhwenyaaluutia khulwe bifwaani nibio mwakhola mala mwakholile endaalo yenywe yabeele siimbi, siise sisiaroborwa sie kimiiko kienywe siolile. Khwako nakhuambiisie chisoni mu kholo choosi. Ne bibala bioosi bilakhuchekheelela.
Babaandu bali siimbi ne naabo baali aleeyi khukhwama khwiwe balakhuchekheelela ewe ookhali ne fuma tawe, owechula sisiayuumba.
Lola, babemeelesi benywe ba Isiraeli, buli mundu eyikiine kamaani kewe, mala ali ne silukuluku sie khukhwira.
Enywe babaandu be mu lukoba luboofu se muria basaasi benywe tawe. Mubea bakeni, mubukula bufuubi ne bunamulekhwa khunyoolelakho bukhala.
Mwalekeelesia bibiindu biase bitakatifu ne se muloonda chisabato chase tawe.
Balala mwinywe bayingila babaandi bubeeyi bubwirisia. Babaandi balia chimbosio che bifwaani, ne babaandi bakhola bueeyi mwinywe.
Balala bacha khu bamaawabwe ba mukha raraawabwe. Balala baang'inya bakhasi baali mu ndaalo chabwe chimbi babe ne nabo.
Okundi akhola sifwabi nende mukho wasie, ne okundi acha khu mukho musaani, ne okundi naye acha khu mukooko wewe, omwana owa raraawe.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Balala mwinywe bakaanila asoya khukhwira babaandi. Ne balala mwinywe babukula bukhala khu nibo bekopiisie mala baindiaala khu nibio banyoolile. Ne banjibilile ese.
“Ndekhisia kumukhono kwase mala salanisie bukhala bwoosi nibwo mwanyoola mu ngila ekhali yang'ali tawe, eye bunuuli ne bubwiri.
Mwibaasia muli mukhabekho ne bunyindaafu namwe kamaani kakoola khusuta kumukhono ne malile khubaukuuma ku? ‘Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomaloome mala kalaba kario.’
Ndasalanisia babaandu benywe boosi mu buli kholo mala ndakamia bikholwa bienywe bimayaanu.
Mulaambwa chisoni mumoni mwe chikholo chichiindi ne kakhali mulamanya muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu Baisiraeli se balikho ne bukhala khwise lundi tawe. Bali nga kamasengeli kakaama khu mukasa, machweenu, sichuuma, ne sibia.”
Ese Omwami WELE ndikho mbaboolela ndi, “Se balikho ne bukhala tawe, bali busa oli kamasengeli ako. Khababuusie boosi mu Yerusalemu.
Bulayi bwene busa nga babaandu ne babuusianga burare bwe fwesa, bwe kumukasa, bwe sichuuma, sibia ne machweenu nibio bareere mu mulilo kwe kumukuba nio binukulukhile mu mulilo, nio mu lirima liase ndamumwaata mu mulilo mufwe.
Khababuusie mu Yerusalemu, mbwane kumulilo mala kuboosie bafwe.
Bakhafwiile mu Yerusalemu nga efwesa ne yinukulukha mu mulilo kwe kumukuba, mala bakhamanye bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abaambile lirima.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu boolela Baisiraeli kano: Enywe muli sibala sie sifwabi, khwako mu lirima liase ndikho mbaukuuma.
Babemeelesi bali nga chitalang'i chiulukhuma ne chiira chisaang'i nicho chiaayile. Beera babaandu babukule chirupia choosi nende buli nisio banyala khunyoola, khulwe bubwiri bwabwe bareerao bunamulekhwa bukali.
Basaayi ba Isiraeli bafunile lilaka liase mala banyaaluutiisie bibiindu biase bitakatifu. Se baukhasia akari we bibiindu bitakatifu nende birumikha busiele tawe, namwe se bekisia bubwabukhani buuli akari we sinyaalu ne sikwalaafu tawe. Lundi balekeelesia chisabato chase ne khu khuufwolobia.
Babemeelesi mu Isiraeli bali nga bisuuche biilikho ne biira esaang'i. Beera babaandu, bachukha sifuki khulwe khunyoola bukhala bukhali bwa ng'ali tawe.
Ne bang'oosi ba Isiraeli bakisile bubwoni buno nga baakha lisiisi luloongo, babona kamalola ke bubeeyi ne khung'oola bubeeyi. Bekhola khulomaloma likhuwa lio Mwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kakhali ese Omwami WELE se nalomaloomekho nabo tawe.
Bayiinda babea lundi banuula, bapia bataambi ne babanani siibi, ne lundi banyoola bukhala mu khubea bakeni.
Nayiima omundu mu nibo oonyala oombakha lisiisi, mala eema akari we sibaanga sie lisiisi litechuukhe nio ndekhe khubunia sibala, ne kakhali se namunyoolamo tawe.
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Nabaambiile lirima, ndaboosia ne kumulilo, ndababunia khulwe bikholwa biabwe.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, babao bakhasi babili, boombi baba bakhaana bo muloosi mulala.
Mu buele bwabwe ne basimenyile e Misiri, batibia buyabwana bwabwe mala baaba baeeyi.
Lisina lio mukhulu liaba bali Ohola ne omutiiti aaba bali Oholiba. Bekela babaase mala basaala basoleeli ne bakhaana. Ne khulwe kamasina kabwe, Ohola ali Samaria ne Oholiba ali Yerusalemu.
Ohola akhola bueeyi ne ali owase mala asiima batia bewe Baashuru,
naitiriani babefwarire chingubo chimbuusi, babaami bakhulu nende banaitiriani be kamalaka, baele basiimisia boosi, batimia chifarasi.
Abengisia mu bueeyi bwewe. Babaandu barobore ba Ashuru boosi, mala eefwolobia ne bifwaani bioosi bia buli mundu niye aasiima khuuba omutia wewe.
Se aalekha bueeyi bwewe nibwo aaba ne akholile khukhwama mu ndaalo chewe mu Misiri tawe, sikila mu buele bwewe babaandu bakona naye ne khunyaalutia buyabwana bwewe, ne khukhwolesia liliekoomba liabwe likali.
Khwako namwakaanisia mu makhono ke Baashuru, nibo niye aaba omutia wabwe.
Babaandu bano bamufuula chingubo, baamba babaana bewe basoleeli ne bakhaana, mala niye omwene bamwiira ne mbalu. Siuukuumo siewe esio siaaba khu lulimi lwa buli mukhasi buli abuundu.
“Omukooko wewe Oholiba abona kano, ne kakhaba kario aakhola bumayaanu bukali khukhila bwo mukooko wewe mu khusiima batia mu bueeyi bwewe, aaba omumayaanu khukhila omukooko wewe.
Asiima Baashuru babaami bakhulu, naitiriani be kamalaka, naitiriani bafwara chingubo chimbuusi be bibioki mu bwichufu, batimia chifarasi, boosi baaba babaandu basiimisia.
Ne nabona ndi ali omumayaanu lukali, ng'ali boombi baaba ne kumwiima mulala okwo.
“Ne kakhali niye aabisiao mala aacha aleeyi lukali mu bueeyi. Aabona bifwaani bie babaandu biaandikwa khu lisiisi, bifwaani bie Bakalitayo bibiaandikwa mu bubesemu.
Beboa chikhoba munda, ne bileemba khu mirwe kiabwe. Boosi babonekha nga bakhulu be bunyali, sifwaanani sie Bababiloni babeene be sibala sia Kalutayo.
Nga ne aababona, aabasiima mala aaruma barumwa khu nibo mu Kalutayo.
Bababiloni becha niio ali, bacha naye mu sitanda sie butia mala bamukhola sifwabi ne liliekoomba liabwe. Ne nga baaba ne bamalile khumufwolobia mu bueeyi, aabakaluukhanakho aababiila lukali.
Nga ne achiililila mu bueeyi bwewe abuwaanga lukali, efuula ekesia sichula siewe, namubiila bulayi bwene busa nga nabiila omukooko wewe.
Ne kakhaba kario atasa bueeyi bwewe khukhila mu ndaalo che buele bwewe nga ne akholanga bueeyi mu sibala sia Misiri.
Asiimisibwa ne batia benabo ebweeneyo ba baaba ne kimibili nga kie chipunda, namwe kamaani ke busecha nga chifarasi.
Khwako wekoomba sifwabi sie buele bwowo, Bamisiri bakhurumikhira mala bonakaka buyabwana bwowo.”
Khwako Ee, Oholiba, Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola ese ndenyosia basaale bowo nibo ewe wakaluukhanakho wabiila mala ndabareera khukhwama buli lubeka bakhubiile.
Babaandu nga Bababiloni ne Bakalitayo boosi, Bapekoti, ne Bashoa ne Bakoa ne Baashuru boosi alala. Baele basiimisia, babaami bakhulu, naitiriani be kamalaka lukali, boosi barangisi nende naitiriani boosi batimia chifarasi.
Basiku balakhwibwaakala ewe khukhwama e bunaswa alala ne kamakaari ke liie ne kamakaari ke khusuta bibiindu ne babaandu be chikholo bakhabalikha tawe. Balakhwibwaakala khukhwama buli lubeka ne bibiindu bie khukhweteecha, chingabo ne chikofio che sichuuma che khumurwe. Ese khabaelesie bunyali bwe bukhalaki, mala balakhukhalakila khuloondekhana ne bukhalaki bwabwe.
Sikila ndi ne lirima nawe, ndabalekha bakhukholele ke bukhalafu, Balakhukhala kamoolu ne kamaru, mala beere babaana bowo baramire ne mbalu. Balaamba babaana bowo basoleeli ne bakhaana, ne baramire balosebwa ne kumulilo.
Akhaba lundi balakhufuula chingubo mala bakhunuule bilayi nibio wisaanga.
Khwako ndakamia liliekoomba liowo lie bukhobani ne bueeyi bwowo nibwo wamia mu sibala sia Misiri nio okhaloleelela lundi Bamisiri, namwe wabakhebulilakho lundi tawe.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola ndakhuana khu baandu nibo ewe wabiila waukhakho.
Ne sikila bakhubiila ewe, balakhuyaaya buli siindu nisio wanyaakhana wanyoola, mala bakhunuule bakhwanjukhe busa ne oli sichula, sichula sie bueeyi silabonekha. Liliekoomba liowo lie bukhobani ne bueeyi,
biakhurereere kano, sikila waeeyana ne chikholo mala wekhola sifwabi khulwe bifwaani biabwe.
Ewe waloonda mu lung'afuulo lwo mukooko wowo. Khwako ndakhuukuuma ne siuukuumo siewe.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Olanyoola sikoombe sie siuukuumo sio mukooko wowo.
Buli mundu alakhuchekheelela,
ne khukhukholela siienyameno,
sikila silimo kamakali.
Silakhumeesia lundi obe mu sibi,
sikoombe sie buuri ne libunia,
sio mukooko wowo Samaria.
Ewe olanywa omalemo,
mala wikhuule lichuune ne khukhwibwara kamaturu,
sikila Omwami WELE aalomile.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Sikila ewe wanjibiliile ese ne khukhuumwaata ekoongo, khwako khosute busiro bubwama mu likoomba liowo lie sifwabi ne bueeyi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, ewe onyala wakhalakila Ohola ne Oholiba ku? Nono baboolele abuwaanga bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
Sikila bakholile bueeyi ne sifuki sie bubwiri sili mu makhono kabwe. Lundi bakholile bueeyi ne bifwaani biabwe, ne akhaba lundi baana basoleeli babwe nibo basaala khwise nga embosio eye siakhulia khu bifwaani.
Khutasa khwako, lundi bakholeele kano: Bafwolobie Lukaangu lwase lutakatifu, ne khu ndaalo ne ng'ene bafufuule chisabato chase.
Sikila nga ne baaba ne beerire babaana babwe nibo baana nga embosio khu bifwaani biabwe, ne khu ndaalo ne ng'ene becha mu Lukaangu lwase khulufwolobia!
“Baruma omurumwa khulaanga babaandu be siseecha khukhwama aleeyi, ne lola becha. Sikila nibo, wesiinga, werona sia moni mala wefwara kamamili ke bukusi bwe angaaki.
Wikhalanga khu sitanda silayi lukali ne mesa yalilwe ebweeni wasio nikhwo warengekha bupani bwase ne kamafura kase.
Luyoka lwe babaandu bakali babesangaasiisie lwauliilikha niio ali ne babaandu bakhali ne lukoosi tawe, bameesi ba busiele, bareerwa khukhwama mu sichiimi, bafwara bakhasi abo chipangili khu makhono ne khubafwara chikuutwa chichang'oonwa bulayi.
“Nono ese nareeba ndi, ‘Eku, balakhola bukhobani no mukhasi oweele sio sikila khukhola bueeyi?’
Sikila baba naye nga baseecha ne baba no mukhasi omutamba. Khwako bacha bario khu Ohola nende khu Oholiba bakhasi babelekhuula abo.
Ne babaandu baluungi bakhabekiiche babakhalakile ne likhalaka lie bukhobani ne bukhalaki bwe bakhasi babeeri bachukhanga sifuki sikila bali bakhobani ne sifuki sie bubwiri sili khu makhono kabwe.”
Niko kakila Omwami WELE ne aloma ali, “Reera kiminjoloolo kie babaandu kibebwaakale kibarengie ne khubayaaya kimiaandu.
Kiminjoloolo kie babaandu kilabapa kamabaale ne khubabunia ne mbalu, kileera babaana babwe basoleeli nende bakhaana ne khukhwosia chinju chabwe.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo khakamie bueeyi mu sibala nio bakhasi boosi boole khukaambilwa bakhakhola bueeyi nga enywe ne mwakholile tawe.
Ne enywe mulatiuukhwa busiro bwe bueeyi bwenywe ne khusuta kumuruungo kwe bumayaanu bwe khusaaya bifwaani mala mulamanya muli ese ndi Omwami WELE.”

Mu ndaalo eye khumi kumwesi kwe khumi, mu mwiiko kwa tisa kwe mbaambe yefwe, Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, andika chitare che ndaalo yino, yino eng'ene omwami owa Babiloni ebwakaale Yerusalemu endaalo yino ne ng'ene.
Boolela babaandu base be sileka lusimo luno oli, Omwami WELE aloma ali,
‘Ra endeekhelo khu mayika,
chukhamo kameechi.
Raamo bitonyi bie nyama,
bitonyi bilayi bie sietakho nende sia mbele,
robora bikuumba bilayi wichusiemo.
Bukula enyama eye likheese lilayi lirobore,
rekekha chiikhu asi we ndeekhelo,
teekha enyama alala ne bikuumba.’ ”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Silaamo khu lukoba luboofu lwe babeeri,
luuli nga endeekhelo eye ngekheni,
ekhali esiinge tawe!
Yomolamo enyama sia ndala ndala,
ne kakhali okharoboramo tawe.
Sikila sifuki nisio lwachukha,
sisiili akari walwo.
Lwachukha sifuki khu lwanda,
se lwachukha khwiloba,
niio lunyala lwakakisa mwipukhuulu tawe.
Khukhwinyosia lirima liase, niyache,
nalekha kamafuki ke babaandu nibo lweera khu lwanda,
nio kakhafuunikhwa tawe.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Silaamo khu lukoba luboofu lwe babeeri!
Akhaba seesi khabuungikhe chiikhu chingali.
Bungikha chiikhu, bwaana kumulilo,
teekha chinyama bulayi,
mala oteenyisie esuuto, olasie bikuumba!
Nono lekha endeekhelo khu maanda kakesing'eng'ile,
nio eye, ebeseme lukali,
nio kumukasa kuye,
engekheni eruremo,
mala endeekhelo eng'oone lundi.
Neluisienge khu kia busa,
khane kumulilo se kunyala kwarusiamo,
engekheni yayo esiro tawe.
Yerusalemu, bikholwa biowo biibi biakhwonake,
akhaba ese ne nakhaka khu khukwalaasia,
wachiililila busa khuuba omunyaalu.
Se olaba omukwalaafu lundi tawe,
khukhwola nga ndanyalikha ne lirima liase khwiwe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ese Omwami WELE nalomile, mala khukhwola likholekhe lirio. Ndalikhola, se ndakobola enyuma tawe, se ndalilekha tawe, lundi se ndesonia tawe. Ndakhuukuuma ne kumunaanio khuloondekhana ne chingila chowo ne bikholwa biowo.”
Lundi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, lola, ese ndi siimbi khu khuupa omusiime wowo lukali murusieo, ne kakhaba kario okhasooma namwe walila, namwe waalekha kamasika keekha tawe.
Sikhiikha busa ne wikhilisia kumwoyo ne okhalila oofwiile tawe. Fwara sileemba ne biraaro, ne okhafuunikha kumunwa tawe, namwe walia siakhulia sie amasika tawe.”
Khwako ese Esekieli nalomaloma khu baandu kumutikhinyi, ne ekolooba omukhasi wase afwa. Nga bwasia nakhola nga naba ne mboleelwe.
Babaandu bandeeba bali, “Khuboolele, bibiindu nibio okhola bino biboola siina khwifwe?”
Nono nababoolela ndi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambooleele kamakhuwa kano:
Boolela enju eya Isiraeli oli, “Omwami WELE Omunyali owa bioosi aloma ali, ‘Lola ndafwolobia Lukaangu lwase, ekibonio eye bunyali bwenywe, lisiimisibwa lienywe ne liliekoomba lie kimiooyo kienywe. Ne babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana nibo mwalekha e Yerusalemu balererwa mwiie.
Ne enywe mukhakhole nga ese nekholile, se mukhafuunikhe bubweeni bwenywe namwe mulie siakhulia sie amasika tawe.
Mulafwara bileemba bienywe ne biraaro, se mulasooma namwe se mulalila tawe, ne kakhali mulang'aa mu bumayaanu bwenywe ne khubeleela burafu buli mundu no kundi.
Khwako ese Esekieli khabe simanyisio khwinywe, mukhakhole koosi niko ese kholile, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, nga kano ne kakhakholekhe mukhamanye muli ese ndi Omwami WELE.’ ”
Ne Omwami Wele aloma ali, “Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, khu ndaalo eyo, nga ese kharusieo esio siili lilieyikina liabwe, ekhoyo yabwe ne lukoosi, sisiindu sibasiimisia ne basibona lundi siili kumwoyo kwabwe alala ne babaana babwe basoleeli ne bakhaana;
khu ndaalo ng'ene eyo, mulala owiluukhe khukhwama mu busiku akheche akhuboolele ewe kakekholeekhe.
Khu ndaalo ng'ene eyo, okhekulwe kumunwa olomalome nende oyo owiluukhe khukhwama mu busiku, mala okhalomalome; se okhabe lundi omumiinyi tawe. Khwako okhabe simanyisio khu nibo mala nibo bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi.”

Mwana wo mundu suta chimoni chowo ololeelele Baamoni mala ong'oole kamabi khu nibo.
Boolela Baamoni oli, “Ulila elomo eyo Mwami WELE, Omwami WELE aloma ali: Sikila nga Lukaangu lwase lwaba ne lufwolobisiibwe, lundi nga mwabona sibala sia Isiraeli ne sianjukhwe, lundi nga mwabona enju eya Yuda ne ambilwe yayilwa mu mbaambe, enywe mwasangaala.
Khwako, ese ndikho mwakaanisia babaandu be bukwe enywe mube babaabwe. Balamwombakhamo mala bamenye akari wenywe. Balalia bibiaamo bienywe ne khunywa kamabeele kenywe.
Ndakaluukhasia lukoba lwa Raba lube kamaayilwe ke chingamia, ne chingoba chimboofu che Baamoni chibe biko bie kamakheese. Nono enywe mulamanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Enywe mwapile chimbi ne khu khuupa chindiri che bikele bienywe ne khukhwekhoya ne kumwoyo kwe khuchekheelela sibala sia Isiraeli.
Sikila mwakhola kano, ndamuaana khu kholo chichiindi chiilamunuula ne khumwiira enywe lundi ndamubunisilia elala, se mulaba ekholo lundi namwe mube ne sibala sienywe tawe. Nio mumanye muli Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Khwako ndekula sibaanga mu Moabu khukhwama mu ngoba chimboofu che khu lwakha khwayo Beti-yeshimoti, Baalimeoni ne Kiriataimu; chingoba chiili luyali lwe sibala.
Ndasiakaanisia alala ne Baamoni khu baandu be bukwe mube babaabwe kumukabwa nio Baamoni bakhakhebulilwakho lundi mu kholo tawe.
Ne ndakhalakila Bamoabu. Nio bamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
khwako ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Ndaukuuma Edomu mala niire babaandu ne bibaywa. Ndasikhola sianjukhwe busa khukhwama Temani khukhwola Dedani, balafwila mwiie.
Ese ndeyacha khu Edomu khubirira khu mukhono kwe babaandu base Isiraeli. Balakhola bario mu Edomu khuloondekhana ne lirima ne bukhalafu bwase. Balamanya bukali bwe liliiyacha liase. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.’ ”
ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Lola ndauukuuma Bafilisiti; ndeera Bakereti ne khubunia bamenyile sia nyanja boosi.
Ndabawesieliakho lirima liase likali ne siuukuumo sie bukhalafu. Khwako balamanya bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.’ ”

“Mwana wo mundu sikila Tiro luchekheelela Yerusalemu ne luloma luli,
‘Aha, Silibwa siboofu sie Chikholo,
siabaayuulwe sikila ese,
nono ese ndanyoola bubweyaangu,
sikila buiinda bwalwo bwonakaakwe.’ ”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Lola ee Tiro, ese nakhweanyilekho!
Ndakhureerera chikholo chingali chikhwibwaakale,
bulayi bwene busa nga bibuli bie nyanja ne biichanga.
Balatechula kamasiisi ke lukoba lwa Tiro
ne khutechula chindeleelwa chalwo che khuliindilakho.
Ndaarakara liloba lialwo ndusiemo,
mala ndukhole lube busa khwasie nga lulwanda.
Lulaba mu nyanja akari,
abuundu e khureka chindiimba.
Ese Omwami WELE, nalomile.
Chikholo chilaluyaaya,
ne bakhaana balwo mu lukoongo,
balabunisibwa ne mbalu.
Nio bamanye bali ese ndi Omwami Wele.”
Sikila Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola, ese ndareera khu Tiro Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni khukhwama ebunaswa, nende chifarasi nende kamakaari ke liie, nende banamae be khu farasi nende kiminjolooli kie banamae.
Alereera mwiie bakhaana bowo,
baaliba ne baramire enje khu sibala.
Omusiku alayaba lukhwakhwa akhukare,
abuusie liloba libe lisiisi akhukare,
mala akhwibuulile,
akhukare ne chingabo chewe nga lulama.
Alalosia bitechula lisiisi,
khu masiisi kowo,
lundi alatechula chindeleelwa ne chiaywa.
Chifarasi chewe chilaba chingali lukali,
ne lutamuusi lwacho lulakhufuunikha,
kamasiisi kowo kalanikina sikila lutiri lwe batimia chifarasi,
nende endiri eye kamakaari ke khusuta bibiindu,
ne kamakaari ke liie.
Alengila mu bilibwa biowo,
bulayi bwene nga omundu owingila mu lukoba,
abuundu aatechulwa.
Alabisia batimia chifarasi chiswalakilile,
chingila che mu lukoba choosi ne bikhakayu biacho.
Aleera babaandu bowo ne mbalu,
ne lisiisi liboofu liili nga enjeko lilayabulukha.
Balayaaya kimiaandu kiowo,
bakhaatule basute bibiindu biowo nibio okusianga,
bakhatechule kamasiisi kowo,
mala bonakake chinju chowo chindayi.
Bakhabukule kamabaale kowo, chimbao chowo ne liloba,
mala bamwaate mu nyanja.
ne liuliilikha lie kamatuungu,
se lilabao lundi tawe.
Ndakhukhola wekele lulwanda busa,
olekela abuundu niio banikhila chindiimba.
Se oliombakhwa lundi tawe.
Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.”
Khwako, Omwami WELE aloma khu Tiro ali, “Bibala bie sia nyanja se bilaterema nga ne bilaulila likwa liowo, nga baumiie ne balila, lundi nga khufwa ne khulibao tawe ku?
Nono babemeelesi bakhulu be sia nyanja balarura khu ndebe chabwe che bubwami, mala befuule chingubo chabwe che bubwami, ne khukhwifuula chingubo chabwe chichanabwa mu ngila eye lukoosi lukali lwe khuchisaa. Bakhabe mu literema likali, bakhekhale asi mu maloba mala batereme buli siise ne khuuka lukali sikila kakekholeekhe khwiwe.
Bakhasute kumumilo bakhwimbile kumwenya kwe lisooma bali,
‘Ee, lukoba luboofu,
ewe wakoriokhile sia nyanja!
Lukoba lulwamanyikha, lulwaba ne kamaani khu nyanja,
ewe ne babaandu bowo wareera buuri khu buli mundu mu sibala.
Luno kamakenga kalikho katerema
khu ndaalo eye likwa liowo,
yee kamakenga kaali mu nyanja karangaraarwe
sikila liiela liowo!’ ”
Sikila kamene ako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne khukhola ewe khuuba lukoba luboofu lwanjuukhwe nga lukoba lukhamenywamo tawe, nga khakhusiikhe mu lusiba lwe nyanja, mala kameechi kamakali kakhusiikhe;
abwenao khakhumwaate asi emakoombe alala nende abo babeekhayo khale, khakhukhole oche omenye ne nabo mindali mu sibala sie asi mu makubili kakatechukha. Nono omundu se alakhumenyamo tawe, lundi se olaba ne bumenyo mu bibala bie balamu tawe.
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Ndakhureera khu siakamo siriisia mala olafwa, wakhaenjwa se olinyoolwa lundi tawe.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Luno ewe, mwana owo mundu, yimba kumwenya kwe khusooma sikila lukoba lwa Tiro,
mala oboolele Tiro luuli ebwingililo we sia nyanja, lulwofuli lwe babaandu khu bibala bikali biili sia nyanja, Omwami WELE aloma kano:
Ee, Tiro ewe waloma oli,
‘Ese ndi ne lukoondo lulayi elala.’
Lukoba lwowo luli mu nyanja akari,
baboombakhi bowo bang'oona lukoondo lwowo lwaba lulayi po!
Bombakhila kimirongooro kimilayi,
khukhwama khu sikulu Seniri,
babukula kimitarakwa khukhwama Lebanoni,
bakhung'oonela ewe kumuringoti.
Mu mikhoonge kia Bashani,
bakhung'oonelamo kimikaango kie khutimisilia kamaaro,
bang'oona lulwalo lwowo,
khukhwama khu murongooro,
kwa kainasi khukhwama sia nyanja,
ne Saipurasi ne khukitubaasia ne kimisaanga.
Engubo endayi eya katani,
eye kamapala khukhwama e Misiri,
enyala yabonekha ne oli aleeyi nga simanyisio,
embuusi ne bunapeenda,
khukhwama mu ngoongo che sia nyanja cha Elisha.
Bamenywa ba Sidoni ne Aribati
nibo babakhutimianga,
barana ba Senira baaba bamenya mwiwe,
nibo baaba bakhutimia.
Bang'ooni be chimeeli,
baaba bamanyile kimilimo kiabwe bulayi khukhwama Kebali
babeeseli khukhwama mu buli emeeli ebira khu nyanja,
bachitimilamo baaba mwiwe khulwe khukhwofula.”
Pasha ne Luti ne Putu baba banamae bowo, baanikhanga chingabo ne chikofio che sichuuma chabwe che mwiie mwiwe; bakhua lukoosi lwe saambo.
Banamae ba Aribati ne Heleki baba bakarire kamasisi kowo ne banamae ba Kamati baba khu ndeleelwa chenywe che khulindilakho, baanikha chingabo chabwe khu lisiisi liowo liliakhukara bakhola lukoondo lwowo lwaba lulayi elala.
Tarishishi lwakhola bubwofuli ne nawe sikila bukali bwe kimiaandu kiowo kia buli lukano, efwesa, sichuuma, machweenu ne sibia, bakholamo bie bukhala khulwe khukhwofulamo chingubo.
Yabani, Tubali ne Meshaka bakhola bubwofuli bwe bukhala ne nawe, khukusia nasioobi ne bibiindu bie kumukasa khulwe baboofuli bowo.
Be nju eya Beti-tokarima bakhola bubwofuli bwe chifarasi che kimilimo, chifarasi che liie ne chinyumbu khulwe bibiindu biowo.
Batetani baba baboofuli bowo, chingoongo che khu nyanja chaba nicho ewe wasiima khukholelayo bubwofuli bwowo, bareeranga kimisaanga kie chinjofu ne bupani mukulaasiana.
Babaandu ba Edomu bakaananaanga ne nawe sikila bukali bwe bibiindu nibio waba nabio. Bakulaana nawe bibiindu biowo bifwaana lubookha ne binapenda nende bie kamapala, chingubo cha katani, ne kamabaale kamangu ke mu nyanja kamabesemu mawaanga, ne kamabaale, kamaandalafu lukali kaalimo kamapala kamalayi.
Babaandu ba Yuda ne Isiraeli bofulana ne nawe khulwe khukulaana ne nawe engaanu, kamafura ka museituni ne chinduli che khunyoa, ne bubuukhi, kamafura ne bibiindu biiunya bulayi.
Babaandu ba Damasika bakulaana nawe mu bwofuli sikila bukali bwe bibiindu bie khukusia nibio waba nabio, sikila bukali bwe kimiaandu buli lukano, wareera endali eya Heliboni ne bufumbo bwe kamakheese buwaanga.
Vetani ne Yafani basuta bibiindu biowo khukhwama Usali; nga bichuuma bie kamaani lukali ne kumurongooro kuunya bulayi nende bie khunywa niibio bibiaba nibio wanyoola mu khukulaana.
Babaandu ba Dedani bofulana ne nawe khulwe khukulaana chingubo che khukhwikhalakho khu farasi.
Babaandu be Buarabu, ne babemeelesi be Kedari niibo ba baaba basiime bowo khu nibo wofulanga kamameeme, kamamiiku ne chimbusi.
Baboofuli ba Sheba ne Rama bakulaana nawe, bakulaana ne nawe khulwe bibiindu bilayi lukali mu bioosi biiunya bulayi, ne khulwe kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki, ne sahabu.
Babaandu ba Harani, Bakani ne Baeteni, Baashuru ne Bakilimati baakhola bubwofuli ne nawe.
Bano bofula ne nawe mu ngubo chindayi chindobore ne mu ngubo chimbuusi chichanabwa charobarobana, ne kamapala ne kimikeeka kie mu nju kie kamapala kikiabowa ne lusia khulwe khukiliinda bulayi. Mu ngila yino bakulaana ne nawe.
Chimeeli cha Tarishishi chakhusutilanga ewe bie khukusia. Khwako ewe wechusibwa mala wasitoa lukali mu nyanja akari.
Babaandu bowo batimia emeeli bakhureerire,
bakhwingisie mu nyanja,
mu meechi kamakali.
Ekhuungu eye bukwe yakhuuchile,
wachiile aleeyi mu nyanja.
Buyiinda bwowo, bibiindu biowo bie bubwofuli,
bakholi bowo be khu meeli nende batimia emeeli,
bafundi be meeli nende bakusia bibiindu.
Ne banamae boosi baali mwiwe,
nende boosi baali ne nawe,
besiikha mu meechi khu ndaalo niyo ewe olibunilakho.
Liilila lie babaandu bowo batimia chimeeli
liateremia lukoongo.
Bayuusia kimikaango kie meeli,
nende batimia emeeli,
beekha barura mu meeli chabwe,
bema khu sikiingi sie nyanja.
Bakhulila ewe burafu,
mu mumilo kwe angaaki.
Bechukha lipukhuulu khu mirwe kiabwe,
ne khukhwikalaangasia mwikokhe.
Bachwenula lichuune liabwe lioosi sikila ewe,
befwara kamakunia ne bakhulila burafu,
khulwe bubeeleli burafu bwe mu mwoyo,
ne khukhwiunamila khukali.
Mu liesasaara liabwe basooma sikila ewe,
bakhusooma ewe lukali ne baloma bali,
“Naanu owabunakho nga Tiro akari we nyanja.”
Nga bibiindu biowo nibio wofulanga
biechanga khukhwama mu nyanja,
ewe wakholanga babaandu bakali ne banyalikha,
ne bukali bwe kimiaandu kiowo nende bie khukhwofula,
ewe wayindaasia babaami be khu sibala.
Luno enyanja yakhutimbiisie,
ewe wabuniile mu lusiba lwe kameechi,
bie khukhwofula biowo ne bakholi be mu meeli bowo boosi,
besiikhile ne nawe.
“Baamenyile mu ngoongo che sia nyanja boosi,
besiindukhiile butinyu bwowo,
babaami babwe bariire lukali ne khurangararwa,
bubweeni bwabwe bwakaluukhaane.
Babaandu balala khu bofuli bakhupila ewe sikhoe,
ne baloma bali, ‘Ewe wolile khu siakamo simayaanu,
mala mindali na mindali se olinyokha lundi tawe.’ ”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela kano:
“Mwana wo mundu, boolela omwami owa Tiro oli, Omwami WELE aloma ali: Sikila kumwoyo kwowo kuli kwe khukhwibonia
mala ewe oloma oli, ‘Ese ndi wele nikhalanga khu ndebe eye bawele babaandi mu nyanja akari,’
ne kakhali ewe oli omundu busa, se oli wele tawe akhaba ne weibaasia oli, oli omukesi nga wele.
Ewe ng'ali oli omukesi khukhila Danieli,
se siliio sisiekisa khwiwe tawe.
Khulwe limanya liowo, ne liiulila liowo,
wenyoolela buiinda mala wabuusia esahabu ne fwesa mu mabiikhilo kowo.
Khulwe limanya liowo likali mu bwofuli,
watasa kimiaandu kiowo,
mala kumwoyo kwowo kwiboneselia khu miaandu nikio oli nakio.
Khwako Ese Omwami WELE ndoma kano:
Sikila ewe weyibaasia oli, oli omukesi nga bawele,
khwako, lola ndareera bakeni khwiwe,
bariisia lukali khu be chikholo,
mala balapana liie khu bulayi bwe limanya liowo,
mala balafwolobia lukoosi lwowo.
Balakhumwaata asi mwiloo,
mala olafwa lifwa lie babaandu babeererwa mu nyanja.
Eku, ewe olachiililila khuloma oli, ‘Ese ndi wele,’ ebweeni wabo bakhwira,
akhaba ne oli omundu busa ne se oli wele tawe mu makhono kaabo bakhwira?
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi,
‘Olafwa lifwa lie basiinde mu makhono kwe bakeni sikila ese nalomile.’ ”
Lundi Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu lilila butinyu bubwiicha khu mwami owa Tiro, mala omuboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali,
‘Ewe waba simanyisio silayi elala sisiechula bukesi,
ne lukoondo lulayi elala.
Ewe waba mu Edeni, mu mukuunda kwa Wele.
Buli libaale lie bukusi liaba sisibiimbilo siowo,
liwaanga ling'enang'ena, lie lubookha nga limali, lifwaana liiki,
nende libuusi lirandaafu ne libuusi ling'enang'ena, limali libesemu nende lie lubookha lufulaafulane, nende esahabu, yaba kimilimo kie bulayi bwe lukoondo lwowo. Khu ndaalo niyo wabumbilamwo, biabumbwa biarekekhwa sikila ewe.
Alala ne malaika owachukhwakho kamafura omuliindi kerubi nakhurao,
waba khu sikulu sitakatifu sia Wele,
mala ewe wakeendanga akari we kamabaale ke kumulilo.
Ewe se waba ne buubi bwosi bwosi,
khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo ewe wabumbilwakho,
khukhwola nga bumayaanu ne bwanyoolekha mwiwe tawe.
Mu bukali bwe bubwofuli bwowo,
waba wechula sisiayuumba,
mala wakhola bumayaanu,
nio nakhumwaata nga sisiindu sinyaalu,
nakhurusia khu sikulu sia Wele,
nio malaika oliindanga aakhuoona ewe,
aakhurusia akari we kamabaale ke kumulilo.
Kumwoyo kwowo kwaba kwe khukhwebonia,
sikila bulayi bwe lukoondo lwowo,
wonaka limanya liowo khulwe luyali lwowo.
Nakhumwaata asi nakhubakala ebweeni we babaami,
obe naikara eye khuliisia chimoni chabwe.
Khulwe bukali bwe bumayaanu bwowo,
mu bwofuli bwowo bukhali buluungi tawe,
wafwolobia abuundu atakatifu,
nio nabwaana kumulilo akari wowo,
kwakhwosia mala wekela likokhe khu sibala,
ebweeni wabo boosi babakhubona.
Babaandu boosi mu baandu babakhumanya ewe,
barangararwe mu buuri bukali,
nga bakhuboone ne wolile khu siakamo siibi lukali,
mala se olibao lundi khulwa mindali na mindali tawe.’ ”
“Mwana wo mundu, suta chimoni chowo olole khu Sidoni mala ong'oole kamabi khu nibo,
mala oboole kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali,
‘Ewe lola, ee Sidoni, Ese nakhweanyilekho,
Ese ndekesia luyali lwase akari wowo.
Ne balimanya bali Ese ndi Omwami WELE,
ne khakhole likhalaka liase khwiwe,
mala khekesie butakatifu bwase mwiwe.
Sikila kharume lufu luubi mwiwe,
ne sifuki khu ngila chowo,
ne baliirwa bakhakwe busa akari wowo,
ne mbalu buli lubeka,
nio balimanya bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Mbao ekholo mu kholo chichabotookhelela Isiraeli, chichabachekheelelanga chiili nga kamawa ne mbululwe ekhabachuunisie lundi tawe. Mala balimanya bali Ese ndi Omwami WELE.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Nga ne khabuusie be nju eya Isiraeli khukhwama mu kholo nicho Ese nabasalanisiamo ne khukhwekesia butakatifu bwase mu nibo ebweeni we chikholo, nono bakhamenye mu sibala siabwe nisio naelesia Yakobo omukholi wase.
Ne bakhamenye mu muleembe, mala bombakhe chinju ne khubiaala kimisabibu. Bakhamenye mu muleembe nga ese ne khabe ne ndikho mbisia bukhalaki khwabo boosi ba babachekheelelanga mala Baisiraeli bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.”

“Mwana wo mundu, biiya omwami owa Misiri. Muboolele nga niye ne sibala sioosi sia Misiri ne sicha khunyoola kumunaanio.
Rakikha khulomaloma, loma kano:
Omwami WELE aloma kano:
Lola, Ese nakhweanyilekho,
ewe Farao omwami owa Misiri,
kukuundu nga kuremu kuboofu,
kukwamenya mu luuchi akari,
kulomanga kuli, ‘Naili luli lulwase, ese samwene nalubuumba.’ ”
Ndakhukakia kimilobo mu saya chowo,
mala khole ching'eeni che mu luuchi,
chikhweambekho lukali,
ndakhukhwesa orure mu Naili,
ne ching'eeni che mu luuchi chikhweambilekho choosi.
Ndakhumwaata mu sichiimi,
ewe ne ching'eeni che mu luuchi choosi,
olakwa khu sibala sisiangalaamwe,
ne se olasiikhwa tawe.
Ese ndaelesia chinyuni ne chisolo,
kumubili kwowo nga siakhulia.
balamanya bali, Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Baisiraeli bamweyikinanga enywe Bamisiri khulwe buyeeti,
khane enywe muli busa nga esiimbo eye khakoyakoye.
Nga ne bamwiambakho ne kumukhono,
mwafunikha mala mwabauna kamabeka,
ne nga bamweambakho,
mwafunikha mala bakwa bafunikha kimikoongo.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola ese ndareera babaandu bakhwibwaakale ne mbalu mala beere babaandu bowo ne bibiaayo.
Ne sibala sia Misiri silanjukhwa sibe sisiangalaamwe. Nio bamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sikila waloma oli, ‘Naili luli lulwase, ese samwene nalubuumba.’
Khwako lola, Ese nakhweanyilekho, ewe nende Naili, ndakhola sibala sia Misiri sibe sisiangalaamwe, khukhwama Mikitoli ebunaswa khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Siyene siafubo khu lwakha lwa Esopia.
Omundu namwe esaang'i se bilibirakhoomo tawe khu miiko kamakhumi kane.
Ese ndakhola sibala sia Misiri sibe sisianjuukhwe lukali khukhila bibala bioosi. Chingoba chasio chilaba alala ne chingoba chichanjukhwa khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane. Ndasalanisia Bamisiri mu kholo chichiindi mala mbasalanisie mu bibala bamenye mu baandu babaandi.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Enyuma we kimiiko kamakhumi kane, ese khabuusie Bamisiri khukhwama mu baandu nimwo basalaanilamo,
ese khakobosiele Bamisiri chikhabi chabwe, ne khubakobosia mu sibala sia Paturusi, mu sibala nimwo basaalwa, ne ebweeneyo balaba bubwami butekhele.
Buliba bubwami butekhele khukhila bubuundi bwoosi, mala se bukheniiniekho lundi khu kholo chichiindi tawe, ne ese khabakhole babe bakeekhe bakhalinyala lundi bamiia chikholo chichiindi tawe.
Ne Baisiraeli se balieyikina lundi Bamisiri khulwe buyeeti tawe. Liiba lie Bamisiri lilikhebusia Baisiraeli nga ne bekhiikha khukhweyikina Bamisiri khulwe buyeeti. Nio Baisiraeli balimanya bali Ese ndi Omwami WELE.”
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko kukhola kamakhumi kabili na saba kie mbaambe, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni aakhola banamae bewe baakhola kimilimo kimiaandalafu kie khukhwibwaakala Tiro, buli murwe kwobukha sisioole, ne buli libeka liang'uukha ne kakhaba kario niye namwe banamae bewe se banyoola sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe khuruunga kimilimo kie khukhwibwaakala Tiro tawe.
Khwako Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Lola Ese ndaelesia Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni sibala sia Misiri, alayaaya kimiaandu kiasio mala abukule, arekukhe nakio, ne kimiaandu ekio kilaba nga kumuruungo kwe banamae bewe.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Namueleesie niye sibala sia Misiri sibe kumuruungo kwewe khulwe kimilimo nikio aakhola sikila baakholela Ese.
Khu ndaalo eyo khakhole Baisiraeli babe ne kamaani mala khakhwikule kumunwa ewe Esekieli olomalome mu Baisiraeli niio buli mundu anyala akhuulila, nio bamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”

Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi amboolela kano:
Mwana wo mundu, ng'oola olome oli Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Khemwesasaare, endaalo eye njoli elikho yiicha.
Sikila endaalo eli siimbi,
endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli siimbi,
eliba endaalo eye kamafuumbi,
siise sie kumunaanio khu kholo.
Liie likhabe mu Misiri,
lilieembeelela lilaba mu Esopia,
nga babaandu ne bakheererwe mu Misiri,
ne kimiaandu kiasio kilayaaywa mala sionakakwe.”
Banamae babaandikwa khukhwama Esopia, Putu, Libia, Arebia sioosi ne Kubu nende abo boosi ba baaba mu bulala bwa Misiri bakhafwiile mwiie.
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Abo babayeeta Misiri, bakhakwe
ne khukhwebonia khulwe kamaani khwabwe khukhakhilwe,
khukhwama Mikitoli, khukhwola Siyene,
bakhafwiile mwiie.
Ne Misiri silaba sisiaangalaamwe mu bibala biili bibiangalaamwe,
ne chingoba chasio chilaba mu ngoba chiili kamakuunda.
Nio bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nga khabe ne nosiisie Misiri,
ne khumala abo boosi basiyeetanga.”
Khu ndaalo eyo, nga Misiri ne siliba ne sionakaakwe, kharume barumwa bache khangu barikhirisie Baesopia ne bakherekeekhe tawe. Lilieendekhelela likhabechekho khu ndaalo eye njoli eya Misiri, bona liolile.
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Ndarumikhira Nebukadinesa omwami owa Babiloni,
khukhwakamia kimiaandu kia Misiri.
Niye ne babaandu bewe ba Babiloni,
ekholo endafu lukali mu kholo choosi,
bakhareerwe bonake sibala.
Bakhebwaakale Misiri ne mbalu,
mala sibala silaba ne bafu bakali.
Ndateenyisia Naili,
mala nde sibala sia Misiri,
mu bunyali bwe babaandu bamayaanu.
Ndakhola sibala sionakakwe,
alala nende buli siindu siilimo,
khulwe khurumikhira bakeni.
Ese Omwami Wele nalomaloome.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Ndonaka bifwaani mala nakamie wele be bubeeyi mu Memufisi,
omundu yesi yesi owe nju eye bubwami se alabao mu Misiri tawe.
Nono ndakhola Bamisiri babe baari.
Ndakhola Paturusi lukoongo lwe siafubo lwanjukhwe,
lundi ndoosia Soani lukoongo lwe bunaswa,
mala mbukuume Tebesi.
Ndarafwira Pelusiumu,
lukoba lwe kamaani mu Misiri,
mala ndukhole luulile burafu bwase,
lundi ndonakaka kimiaandu kia Tebesi.
Ndoosia Misiri,
Pelusiumu lukhabe mu buchuuni burafu.
Tebesi lukhatechulwe,
Memufisi lukhebuulilwe ne basiku kumuusi.
Babaandu be siseecha baraaka ba Oni ne Pibeseti,
bakhafwiile mwiie,
ne babaandu bamenyilemo bakhaambwe bayilwe mu mbaambe.
Tehafunesi eyo ekhabe sisiilima,
nga ne ndionaka bunyali bwa Misiri,
ne kamaani niko sieboneseliangakho kakhweo.
Sikhafuunikhwe ne lifuumbi,
mala babaandu basio bakhaambwe bayilwe mu mbaabe.
Ndauukuuma ndio Misiri,
mala babaandu bamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.”
Khu ndaalo eya saba, eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko kwe khumi na mulala kwe mbaambe yefwe, Omwami Wele aamboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, Ese nafunile Farao omwami owe Misiri kumukhono, mala lola, se kwaboilwe kimikhandaala kwiyonge kuone nio kunyoole kamaani kusute embalu tawe.
Khwako Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Lola, Ese neaanyile khu Farao omwami owe Misiri. Ndafuna kamakhono kewe koombi sitube, kumulamu nende kukwafunwa, mala ndakhola embalu eanukhe ekwe khukhwama mu mukhono kwewe.
Ndasalanisia Bamisiri mu kholo choosi lundi ndabasalanisia mu bibala bioosi.
Ndara kamaani mu makhono ko mwami owa Babiloni mala mwakaanisie embalu yase. Ne kakhali ndafuna kamakhono ka Farao mala alalambaala ebweeni wewe ne alenya nga omundu niye baunile.
Ndara kamaani mu makhono ko mwami owa Babiloni, ne kakhali kamakhono ka Farao kalakwa, mala balamanya bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele nga ndakaanisia embalu yase khu mwami owa Babiloni, alakibwaakalila sibala sia Misiri.
Ne ese khasalanisie Bamisiri mu kholo chichiindi lundi mbasalanisie mu bibala bioosi. Nio, bamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.’ ”

Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwa khataru kwe kumwiiko kukhola ekhumi na mulala, Omwami Wele amboolela ese Esekieli ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, boolela Farao omwami owe Misiri, ne babaandu bewe oli,
Bunyali bwenywe bufwaananisibwa ne bwa naanu?
Lola, Ese ndamufwaananisia ne kumurongooro kumutarakwa kwa Lebanoni,
kwe chisakia chindayi,
che sisiniini silayi,
kumurongooro kumuleeyi lukali.
Kameechi kabao kakakukhola kwachoa,
chimoni che chinjichi mwiloba asi niio kwabiaalwa,
kwabisia kameechi,
kolela kimirongooro kikiindi kioosi kie mu musiru.
Nio kwalea kwacha mu ngaaki,
kwakhila kimirongooro kioosi kie mundaa,
chimbasaana chakwo chachoa chaboofua,
chisakia chakaliia chaaba chindeeyi,
khukhwamanana ne kameechi kamakali mu bisaafu biakwo.
Chinyuni cha buli lukano,
chombakha biswi biacho mu mbasaana,
chisaang'i che mundaa choosi,
chasaalilana asi we chisakia,
babaandu bakali po, bekhalanga mu siniini siakwo.
Kwaba kumulayi lukali mu bukali bwakwo,
mu buleeyi bwe chisakia chakwo,
sikila kimili kiakwo kiaba kiacha asi,
khukhwola khu meechi.
abeele se kinyala kiakukhila tawe,
namwe kimirongooro kimiamori se kiaboofua chisakia chaaba nga chakwo tawe,
kimirongooro kie mundaa se kianyala khulekhaasibwa,
ne chisakia che kumutarakwa tawe.
Kumurongooro se kwabao mu mukuunda,
kukwafwaana bulayi nga nikwo tawe.
Nakukhola kwafwaana bulayi,
kwaaba ne chisakia chingali chichakalaasia,
mala kimirongooro kioosi kie mu Edeni,
kie mu mukuunda kwa Wele,
kiakukholela siikhalikhali.”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Sikila kwachoa kwalea lukali kwola mu maleesi, mala kumwoyo kwakwo kweniinia sikila buleeyi bwakwo.
Ese ndakwakanisia owe kamaani owe chikholo. Ng'ali alakukhola khuloondekhana ne bubwoni bwakwo. Nakumwaatile enje.
Bakeni, be kholo endafu lukali mu kholo, balakurema mala bakulekhe. Khu bikulu ne mumatooma koosi chisakia chakwo chilakwa ne chimbasaana chiakwo chilakwa chifunikhakile mu maloba nimwo kameechi kamaangamo mala babaandu be mu liloba belukhe barure mu siniini siakwo bakwanjukhe.
Chinyuni choosi chilamenya mu kusina kwakwo ne chisolo choosi chilamenya mu mbasaana chakwo.
Nono khukhwama luno kumurongooro kuuli ameechi kuulachoa kulee, namwe chisakia chilee choole mu maleesi se kulabao tawe. Kimirongooro kilanywa kameechi kilee kibe nga nikwo se kilabao tawe.
‘Sikila kioosi kiaanilwe kifwe,
kiche mu sibala sie asi,
alala ne babaandu boosi babeekha asi mwiloo.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Endaalo niyo kumurongooro kweekha asi Emakoombe, nalaka kamasika kabeo, nakhiingilila chisiba chichakubaakho mala nakufuunikha; nemekha chinjichi chakwo mala kameechi kamakali kateenya. Nakhola Lebanoni lweunamila sikila nikwo, ne kimirongooro kioosi kie mundaa kianiaala sikila nikwo.
Nakhola chikholo chaterema sikila luyoka lwe likwa liakwo khu ndaalo niyo nakumwaatilakho asi Emakoombe alala nende abo babeekha asi Mwiloo; ne kimirongooro kioosi kia Edeni kimirobore lundi kimilayi lukali mu Lebanoni, kioosi kikianyoola kameechi kakolaana, kiaolela mu sibala sie asi.
Bosi beekha asi Emakoombe alala ne nakwo, babeerwa ne mbalu, alala ne naabo ba baaba lubeka lwakwo, babamenyanga mu siniini siakwo akari we babaandu bakali.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Murongooro siina mu mirongooro kia Edeni kukwaba ne luyali ne bunyali nga ewe? Ewe okhekhisibwe asi alala ne kimirongooro kia Edeni mu sibala sie asi. Okhakone alala nende abo bakhamanyile Wele tawe, alala nende abo bareerwa ne bali mwiie.
“Kano niiko kakhanyoole Farao ne babaandu bewe boosi.”

Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eye kumwesi kwe khumi na kibili mu mwiiko kukhola ekhumi na kibili khukhwama nga khwayilwa mu mbaambe, Omwami Wele aamboolela ese Esekieli kano:
Mwana wo mundu rakikha lisooma sikila Farao omwami owe Misiri mala omuboolele oli,
“Ewe weyibaasia wamwene khuuba etalang'i mu kholo choosi,
ne kakhali oli busa nga kukuundu kufwaana kuremu mu nyanja;
witumbulanga eyi ne eyi mu njichi chowo,
otumbuulanga kameechi ne bikele biowo,
ne khunyaalutia chinjichi chowo.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Ndakhumwaatakho lutiimba lwase,
ebweeni we babaandu bakali;
mala khuupe ewe khu sikiingi ne lutiimba lwase.
Ndakhumwaata asi khwiloba,
ndakhufuruusia okwe mu sikuuri,
mala ndareera chinyuni choosi chikhwichulekho,
mala ndekhe chisaang'i choosi che mundaa khu sibala sioosi chikhulie.
Khasalanisie chinyama che kumubili kwowo khu bikulu,
lundi nichusie chinyama che kumubili kwowo mu matooma.
Ndachukha khwiloba kamafuki kowo kaalikho kachichukha,
khukhwola khu bikulu,
ne chinjichi chilechula kamafuki kowo.
mala khole ching'enieesi chimaliie,
khafuume enyanga ne lifuumbi,
ne kumwesi se kukhakhosie tawe.
Khakhole bibiindu bikhosia khwikulu bioosi,
bibe sisiilima,
mala ndareera sisiilima khu sibala siowo.
Ese Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi nalomile.
“Ndanaania kimiooyo kie babaandu bakali nga bakhaulile kamakhuwa ke mbaambe mu chikholo chichiindi, mu bibala nibio okhamanyile tawe.
Ndakhola chikholo chingali chesiinduukhe sikila ewe, ne babaami babwe bakharie lukali ebweeni wowo, nga ne khauche embalu yase ebweeni wabwe. Bakhatereme biise bioosi sikila khuuria lifwa. Buli sia mulala okhakhole ario, khu ndaalo eye libuna liowo.
“Sikila Ese Omwami WELE ndikho mboolela omwami owa Misiri kano ‘Omwami owa Babiloni alakhwibwaakala ne mbalu.
Ese ndakhola banamae be kamaani bakhwibwaakale ne mbalu, banamae baali barafu lukali mu kholo chichiindi choosi.
Balonakaka liliebonia lia Misiri,
mala Bamisiri bakali balafwa.
Ndeerera bibiaayo bia Misiri,
biili ameechi kamakali,
ne sikele sio mundu se sikhakatumbuule,
namwe bikhakayu bie chibibiaayo bikanyaalutie lundi tawe.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Nono ndakwalaasia kameechi ke Bamisiri ne khuyenjeesia chinjichi chabwe chibisie ne chiseletekha busa nga kamafura.
“Nga ne khakhole sibala sia Misiri sianjukhwe nga ne siliba ne siyaayilwe bioosi mala siarama sichula; nga ne ndiba ne niirire bamenywa biasio boosi, nio Bamisiri bamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.
Lino nilio lisooma nilio bakhembe. Bakhasi khukhwama mu kholo choosi bakhembe ne balikho basooma Misiri ne babaandu basio boosi. Omwami WELE aalomile”
Khu ndaalo eye khumi na chiraano eye kumwesi kwe khunyoa kwe kumwiiko kwe khumi na kibili kwe mbaambe yefwe, Omwami Wele aamboolela ese Esekieli ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, Yesasaara olile Bamisiri bakali,
Bayile asi, alala ne babaandu be chikholo che kamaani,
bache mu sibala sie asi,
alala nende abo baacha asi Mwiloo.
Eku, enywe mukhila naanu lukoondo?
Khe mwiikhe asi! Mubiikhwe muuluukhile alala nende abo bakhamanyile Wele tawe!”
Bamisiri babunile alala nende abo babeererwa mwiie. Embalu yarekeekhwe khubunia Misiri ne babaandu basio bakali.
Banamae be kamaani, nende abo ba bayeeta Bamisiri mwiie; ne bali Emakoombe akari bakhalome bali, “Bekhile asi, balambaalile ao, babaandu baakhamanyile Wele tawe, babeererwa mwiie.”
Omuasiria ali emakoombe eyo ne biliindwa bie banamae bewe boosi biamubotookhelela. Boosi beerwa ne mbalu.
Biliindwa biabwe bili Mwiloo asi. Ne be kumusuumbu bewe babotookheleele siliindwa siewe. Boosi beerwa, beerwa ne mbalu. Bareeranga biriisio bikali mu sibala sie balamu.
Elamu luliyo, ne babaandu balwo boosi asiliindwa sialwo; abo babeekha asi ne bakhamanyile Wele tawe lundi babaareeranga biriisio bikali mu sibala sie balamu, boosi beerwa, beerwa ne mbalu. Baambwa chisoni alala ne nende abo babeekha asi Mwiloo.
Elamu lukona akari waabo babeerwa alala ne babaandu balwo boosi. Biliindwa biabwe bialubotookhelela. Boosi baakhamanyile Wele tawe, babeerwa ne mbalu; sikila biriisio biabwe biasalaanila mu sibala sie balamu. Baambwa chisoni alala nende abo babeekha asi Mwiloo; bareerwe akari waabo babeerirwe.
Mesheki ne Tubali baliyo ne babaandu babwe boosi. Babotookheleelwe ne biliindwa bie banamae babwe. Babaandu abo boosi bakhamanyile Wele tawe, beerwa ne mbalu. Ne basiili balamu basalanisia biriisio mu sibala sie balamu.
Se basiikhwa alala ne banaitiriani be kamaani babaafwa khale, beekha asi Emakoombe ne bulwaani bwabwe tawe. Chimbalu chabwe charwa emirwe kiabwe lundi nibo chingabo chabwe chali khu bikuumba biabwe. Buuri sikila banaitiriani abo bwaba mu sibala sie balamu.
Nio enywe Bamisiri mukhafunakakwe mala mukone akari we babaandu bakhamanyile Wele tawe, alala nende abo babeerwa ne mbalu.
Baedomu baliyo, alala ne babaami babwe ne baruki babaaba be kamaani kamakali, ne kakhali luno bakonile alala nende abo babeerwa ne mbalu; bakonile nende abo bakhamanyile Wele tawe alala nende abo baacha asi Mwiloo.
Baruki be bunaswa baliyo boosi, ne Basidoni boosi. Babeekha asi mu soni alala nende abo babeerwa, sikila biriisio nibio bareera khulwe kamaani kabwe, bakonile ne basiili khumanya Wele alala nende babeerwa ne mbalu, lundi bali mu soni alala nende abo babeekha asi Mwiloo.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Nga Farao ne akhabone babereerwa ne mbalu, niye ne banamae bewe boosi bakhaoleelesibwe khulwe babaandu bwe boosi.
“Asalanisia biriisio mu sibala sie balamu; khwako, akhasiikhwe alala nende bakhamanyile Wele tawe, alala nende abo babeerwa ne mbalu, Farao alala ne banamae bewe bakali. Omwami WELE aalomile”

Omwami Wele amboolela ese Esekieli ali,
“Mwana wo mundu lomaloma ne babaandu bowo mala obaboolele oli, ‘Ese naaba ne ndeera liie mu sibala ne babaandu be mu sibala esio babukula omundu mulala mu baandu babwe, ne khumukhola omuliindi wabwe;
ne omundu oyo aaba nabo, busiku ne bwiicha mu sibala akhupa ekhoombi lundi aboolela babaandu.
