Nono omundu yesi yesi oulila ekhoombi ne yiipa, mala se abukulamo lukeendo tawe, omusiku ne eecha eera omundu oyo. Aba sifuki siewe sili khu mwene.
Aaulila ekhoombi ne yiipa mala aaleka; lifwa liewe lilaba khu niye omwene. Ne kakhali abanga aabukalomo lukeendo, andi omwene aaonia bulamu bwewe.
Ne kakhali omuliindi ne abona liie ne liicha ne se akhupa ekhoombi nio babaandu bamanye tawe, mala omusiku eeche eere omundu yesi yesi khu nibo, aba omundu oyo eereerwe mu bwoni bwewe, ne kakhali Ese khabanje omuliindi lifwa lio mundu oyo.
“ ‘Nio mwana wo mundu, ese nakhukholile omuliindi owe nju eya Isiraeli buli lwoosi ne oulila burume khukhwama mukhanwa mwase khukhwola obakaambile.
Ese naaba ne mboolela omwoni ndi, ee mwoni ewe, ng'ali olafwa mala ewe se olomaloma khu mwoni oyo omukaambila aukha alekha engila yewe tawe, omundu omwoni oyo alafwila mu bwoni bwewe, ne ese khakhubanje ewe kumurwe kwewe.
Ne ewe waaba ne okaambila omumayaanu alekhe bubwoni bwewe, ne kakhali se abulekha tawe, alafwila mu bwoni bwewe ne kakhali ewe olaba weonisie wamwene.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ese Esekieli kano: Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, boolela enju eya Isiraeli oli, “Enywe mwalomile muli, ‘Bamayaanu ne bubwoni bwefwe buli bukali. Khulikho khuwa sikila bumayaanu ne bubwoni; nono khunyala khwaba balamu khuriena?’ ”
Baboolele kano: Omwami WELE, Wele oomenyile mindali aloma ali, “Ese se sangaalilanga lifwa lio mwoni tawe, ne kakhali omwoni alekhe bubwoni bwewe mala amenye. Ee, enju eya Isiraeli lekha, lekha bubwoni bwowo! Siina sikila ofwe?
“Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, boolela Baisiraeli bowo kano: Omundu omuluungi ne akhola bubwoni, buluungi bwewe se bulamuonia tawe. Ne omundu omumayaanu ne akaluukhana aalekha bumayaanu, se alafwa tawe. Omuluungi ne akhola bubwoni se alamenya sikila buluungi bwewe tawe.
Ese nakhaba ne suubisia omuluungi ndi, ‘Ng'ali olamenya,’ ne akelao asuubila mu buluungi mala akhola bubwoni se siliio na silala khu bikholwa biewe bie buluungi siilikhebulilwa tawe. Alafwila mu bwoni nibwo akholile.
Lundi ese nakhaba ne mboolela omumayaanu ndi, ‘Ng'ali ewe olafwa,’ ne kakhaba kario aaba ne akaluukhana aalekha bubwoni mala aakhola liili lie lilaka ne lilayi;
omumayaanu ne akalusia nisio aambiiliile ne khukobosiayo nisio eebile, mala amenye mu lilakiilisia lie bulamu ne se akhola bubwoni tawe; ng'ali alamenya, se alafwa tawe.
Bubwoni bwewe bwosi bwosi nibwo akhola se bulikhebulilwa khulwe khumureerera butinyu tawe. Aakholile lie lilaka lundi lilayi, ng'ali alamenya.
“Ne kakhaba kario babaandu bowo baloma bali, ‘Niko Omwami Wele akhola se kali kamalayi tawe,’ khane niko nibo bakhola niiko kamamayaanu.
Omundu omuluungi ne akaluukhana aalekha buluungi mala aakhola bubwoni, alafwa sikila bubwoni bwewe.
Ne nga omwoni ne akaluukhana aalekha bubwoni mala aakhola kamalayi ke lilaka, alamenya sikila bikholwa bilayi biewe.
Ne kakhaba kario enywe muloma muli, ‘Niko Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi akhola se buli bung'ali tawe.’ Ee enju eya Isiraeli, Ese ndakhalakila buli mulala khwinywe khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biewe.”
Nono kamaani ka Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi kaaba khwise ekolooba omukwa oyo ne asiili khwicha, ne Wele aaba aanjikuule kumunwa mu siise nisio omundu oyo aulukhilakho ne se naanda lulimi lundi tawe, nanyala khulomaloma.
Omwami Wele amboolela ese Esekieli ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, babaandu bamenyile mu ngoba chichanjukhwa che mu sibala sia Isiraeli bachiililila khuloma bali, ‘Aburahamu aaba mulala yeng'ene, kakhaba kario aelesibwa sibala sioosi. Ne kakhali luno efwe khuli bakali, ng'ali khwaelesiibwe sibala sibe sisiefwe.’
“Khwako baboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Enywe mulia enyama ne kamalasile. Musaaya bifwaani, lundi muchukha sifuki. Eku, mwibaasia muli mulaebwa sibala sino sibe sisienywe?
Mweyikina chimbalu chenywe, mukhola bibiindu biisinya ne buli museecha mwinywe akhola sifwabi no mukhasi wo wasie! Eku, mwibaasia muli mulaebwa sibala sino sibe sisienywe?’
Baboolele kano: Omwami WELE echubile ali, ‘Nga ese ne menyile mindali, ng'ali abo baali mu ngoba chichonakakwa kane beerwe ne mbalu, ne abo baali enje we chingoba ndabaana khu saang'i che mundaa chimulie ne abo baali mu ngoba che kamaani ne mu mabina balafwa luufu.
Ndakhola sibala sianjukhwe ne khukhwonakakwa, ne liliebonia liasio lie sileka liloola khu siakamo. Bikulu bia Isiraeli bilanjukhwa lukali, se aliio oolibiramo tawe.
Nio bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi nga ne khabe ne kholile sibala khukhwanjukhwa ne khukhwonakakwa, sikila bibiindu bie khusinya nibio bakholile.’ ”
“Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, babaandu bowo bakachula khwiwe e masiisi nende emiliango kie chinju. Baboolanila; omundu mulala khu wasie bali, ‘Yiicha khuche khuulile burume siina bubwama khu Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi.’
Mala becha khwiwe nga babaandu ne becha mala bekhala ebweeni wowo nga babaandu base ne baulila niko obaboolela, ne se bakhola nga obaboolela tawe, sikila mu lilomaloma liabwe bekesia busiime bukali ne kimiooyo kiabwe kili khu ke bukhala bwabwe.
Ne lola, ewe khu nibo oli nga omundu owimba kimienya kie busiime mu mumilo kumulayi mala okhupa lituungu bulayi, sikila baulila niko oloma, ne se bakakhola tawe.
Ne nga burume bwowo ne bukhoole, mala khukhwola bwole! Bakhamanye bali omung'oosi aabelenge akari wabwe.”

Omwami Wele amboolela kano:
Mwana wo mundu, ng'oola wibwaakale babaayi ba Isiraeli. Ng'oola mala obaboolele oli, “Omwami WELE Omunyali owa bioosi aloma ali, ‘Ee! Enywe babaayi ba Isiraeli mumwelisiisienge mwabeene! Eku, babaayi se benyekhana baaye kamakheese?
Mulia kamafura, mufwara bulayi bufumbo bwe kamakheese, mwiira kamakhomefu ne mulia, ne kakhali se mwaaya kamakheese chana tawe.
Se muliinda kamatekhele tawe, se muonia kamalwale tawe, se muboa kayikila keyonga tawe, se mukobosia katibile tawe, se muenja katibile tawe. Mukayia ne kamaani ne burafu.
Nono, kasalanisibwa, sikila omwayi se alio tawe, mala kabe siakhulia sie chisang'i che mundaa choosi.
Kamakheese kase kasalanisibwa, kayiiya mu bikulu bioosi ne khuucha buli khu khakulu khaleeyi. Kamakheese kase kasalanisibwa khu sibala sioosi, ne kakhali se aliio ookalola namwe aakaenja tawe.’ ”
“Khwako enywe babaayi ulila burume nibwo Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikho muboolela enywe.
Ese Omwami WELE nechubile ndi, ‘Nga Ese ne menyile mindali, sikila kamakheese kase kabeele ke khukhwira mala kekeele siakhulia sie chisaang'i che mundaa khukhwama nga omwayi ne akhabao tawe; lundi sikila babaayi base se baenja kamakheese kase tawe. Ne kakhali babaayi belisiisie babeene ne se baayile kamakheese kase tawe.
Khwako, enywe babaayi ulila burume bwo Mwami Wele,
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi lola, Ese neaanyile khu baayi, mala ndabanuula kamakheese kase, ndabakania bakhaaya kamakheese tawe. Babaayi se baleliisia lundi tawe. Ndareesia kamakheese kase khukhwama mukhanwa mwabwe, kakhaba siakhulia siabwe tawe.’ ”
“Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Lola, Ese samwene ndalola kamakheese kase lundi ndakaenja.
Bulayi bwene nga omwayi ne aenjanga kamakheese kewe ne kasalaanile ese khaenje kamakheese kase, mala ngareesie khukhwama buli abuundu niio kasalanisiibwe khu ndaalo eye kamafuumbi ne sisiilima kotokoto.
Khakareere khukhwama mu kholo chingali ne khukabuusia khukhwama mu bibala bikeni. Khakakobosie mu sibala siako, mala ngaaye khu bikulu bia Isiraeli ne khu njichi ne mu ngoba choosi nicho babaandu bamenyilemo.
Khakaaye mu maayilwe kamalayi, ne bikulu bileeyi bia Isiraeli niibio bilaba kamaayilwe kamalayi kaako. Ebweeneyo kalakona asi mu sibala silayi sie kamaayilwe lundi kalaaya mu maayilwe kamalayi lukali khu bikulu bia Isiraeli.
Ese samwene khabe omwaayi owe kamakheese kase lundi Ese samwene khakakhole kakone asi khunyoola siuluukho. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.
Ese khaenje kakatiba, lundi khakobosie kakatiima, lundi khasilikhe kaumiie, mala ndinyilisie kaali kamatekhele ne kakhali khabunie kaali kamanefu lundi ke kamaani. Khakaaye mu bung'ali.’ ”
“Ne khwinywe lituuli liase, Ese Omwami WELE Omunyali owa bioosi ndoma kano: Lola Ese khalaka akari we likheese ne likheese, kamamiiku ne chindurume.
Eku, enywe se mwanyaliikhe khukhwaaya mu maayilwe kamalayi tawe, nio khukhwola muswaalakilile ne bikele bienywe kamaayilwe kenywe kaaramire? Eku, ne munywa kameechi kamakwalaafu, khukhwola mutumbuule kaaramire ne bikele bienywe?
Eku, khukhwola kamakheese kase kalie nibwo enywe muswaalakiliile ne bikele bienywe ne khunywa kameechi niko mutumbuulile ne bikele bienywe?
Khwako, Ese Omwami WELE ndoma kano: Lola Ese samwene khakhalake akari we kamakheese kamanefu ne kamang'au.
Sikila musindikhila lubeka ne kamabeka lundi muuna kamatekhele ne chinjika chenywe khukhwola nga ne mukasalanisia buli lubeka aleeyi.
Ese khaonie kamakheese kase. Se kalachiililila khuuba ke khu khupisibwa siibi tawe, lundi Ese khakhalake akari we likheese ne likheese.”
“Ese khabaelesie omwayi mulala, omukholi wase Daudi. Akhakaliisie ne khuuba omwaayi wako.
Ne Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khabe Wele wako ne Daudi omukholi wase akhabe omwami mu niko. Ese Omwami Wele nalomile.
Khakhole ne nabo endakaano eye kumuleembe, mala mbuuyisie chisaang'i che mundaa njirusie mu sibala nio bamenye mu sichiimi mala bakone mu bichakha mu muleembe.”
“Khabakhole bamenye ne khukara sikulu siase sitakatifu ne khubabiita chikhabi. Ndekhisia efula mu siise siayo, elaba efula eye chikhabi.
Kimirongooro kie mu mukuunda kilanenekha bibiaamo, ne kamaloba kalarusia bibiaamo biako mala bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele nga ne khafune biibia bie lichooki liabwe ne khubasikula khukhwama mu makhono kaabo babaabakhola nibo khuuba banasioobi babwe.
Se bakhabe lundi be khu khuupisibwa siibi ne bibala bibiindi tawe; lundi chisolo che mundaa se chilabeera ne khubalia tawe. Balamenya mu muleembe, ne se aliio oolabariikhirisia tawe.
Khabaelesie kamaloba ke ngakha ne kamaruuti mala ndusieo enjala mu sibala. Ne chikholo chichiindi se chikhabakhomekho lundi tawe.
Bakhamanye bali ese ndi Omwami WELE, Wele wabwe, ndi ne nabo ne nibo, be nju eya Isiraeli bali babaandu base. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.”
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, “Ne enywe muli kamakheese kase, kamakheese ke mu maayilwe mwase, ne Ese ndi Wele wenywe.”

Mwana wo mundu, yibwaakala sikulu sia Seiri mala osing'oolele kamabi.
Siboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola, sikulu sia Seiri ewe, Ese nakhweanyilekho, ndasuta kumukhono khwibwaakale mala khukhole wanjukhwe lundi obe likuunda.
Ndakhola chingoba chowo chisasikhe busa, ne olanjukhwa mala ewe olamanya oli ese ndi Omwami Wele.
“Ewe wabiikha ekhiinda eye busiku khu Baisiraeli, mala wabeera ne mbalu mu siise sie busiku bwabwe, mu siise sie sinyaasio siabwe simaliilisi.
Khwako Ese Omwami WELE nechubile, ndakhurekekhera lifwa ne lifwa lilakhuloondakho sikila oli ne kumusaango kwe khuchukha sifuki khwako lifwa lilakhutimakho.
Ese ndakhola sikulu sia Seiri sibe likuunda lundi sianjukhwe mala ndakamia abo boosi bakhwichangakho ne khu khururakho.
Babaandu bowo bakali balereerwa khu bikulu biowo, ne khu biili, ne mu matooma ne mu luongwa mwe chinjichi choosi. Boosi bakherwe ne mbalu bakhakwe ebweeneyo.
Ese khakhukhole ewe wanjukhwe buli lwoosi lundi babaandu se balamenya mu ngoba chowo tawe. Nio ewe omanye oli Ese ndi Omwami Wele.
“Sikila ewe walomile oli, ‘Chikholo chibili cha Yuda ne Isiraeli ne bibala biabwe bibili bilaba bibiase mala ndababukula babe babaase,’ akhaba Omwami Wele ne ali lubeka lwabwe.
Omwami WELE Eechubile kano: Nga Ese ne menyile mindali, ndakhukholela khuloondekhana ne lirima ne siikhalikhali nisio wekesia sikila wababiila. Mala khakhole samwene manyikhe kwiwe nga ne ndikhukhalakila ewe.
Ne ewe okhamanye oli Ese Omwami Wele naulila bukhomo bwowo bwoosi nibwo wakhoma bikulu bia Isiraeli ne oloma oli, ‘Bianjuukhwe, khwaelesibwe khubilie.’
Nauliile nga olebonianga ne khuloma kamakhuwa kamakali khwise.”
“Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi, ‘Khakhukhole wanjukhwe, mala sibala sioosi siikhoye.
Bulayi bwene nga ewe ne wekhoyela kumukabwa kwe nju eya Isiraeli sikila kwaba likuunda, nono Ese ndaba busa khwiwe; sikulu sia Seiri ewe nende Edomu sioosi, mulanjukhwa. Khwako bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.’ ”

Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, ng'oola khu bikulu bia Isiraeli olome kamakhuwa kano: Ee, bikulu bia Isiraeli, ulila burume bwo Mwami Wele.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Sikila omusiku aakhulomile ewe ali, ‘Aha! Bibiili bie khaale bileeyi biabeele kumukabwa kwefwe.’
“Khwako ng'oola mala olome kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Sikila, yee sikila bamukhola enywe mwanjukhwe, mala bamwibwaakala khukhwama buli lubeka bamuswalakilila nio enywe mwekela kumukabwa kwe chikholo choosi, mwekela bukhomo ne kamakuto ke babaandu.
Khwako bikulu bia Isiraeli ulila burume bwo Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela bikulu bia Isiraeli ne bibiili ne bitoloola bie kameechi ne kamatooma, kamakuunda ne chingoba chichanjukhwa, chichekeele lirakikha lie khuyaaya lundi sisiindu silekeelesibwa ebweeni we chikholo choosi chichachibotookhelesia.’ ”
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ese ndikho ndomaloma mu sikhalikhali sirafu sie busiku khu kholo chichiindi choosi ne khu Edomu, babekabila sibala siase nga kumukabwa kwabwe mu liekhoya lie kumwoyo; babukula sibala siase siaaba sisiabwe sikila kamaayilwe kasio nio basiyaaye.
Khwako ng'oolela sibala sia Isiraeli mala oboolele bikulu, ne bibiili, bitoloola bie kameechi ne kamatooma kamakhuwa kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Lola Ese ndikho ndomaloma mu siikhalikhali siase sirafu sikila chikholo chamuambia enywe chisoni.
Khwako Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi: Ese nechubile ndi chikholo chichamubotookhelesia ching'ene chosi chilaambwa chisoni.
Ne kakhali enywe Ee, bikulu bia Isiraeli, kimirongooro, chisakia chichoe mala chaame bibiaamo khulwe Baisiraeli base, sikila balikho bakobola engo khangu.
Sikila lola Ese ndi lubeka lwenywe mala ndamuboolela, mulalimwa mala mumiichwemo.
Lundi ndatasa babaandu mwinywe, enju eya Isiraeli yosi yosi, babaandu balamenya mu ngoba, ne chingoba chichanjukhwa chilombakhwa lundi.
Ndamutasa babaandu ne chikhaafu mala mulakucha mube bakali. Ndamukhola babaandu bamumenyemo nga biise bibiabira. Ndamukholela eywe bulayi lukali khukhila nga ne namukholelakho khale. Nono mukhamanye muli ese ndi Omwami Wele.
Ng'ali Ese khalekhuule babaandu bamukeendemo. Baisiraeli base, mukhabe babaabwe mala mube bumenyo bwabwe. Se oreerisia babaana babwe lundi tawe.’ ”
Omwami WELE aloma kano: Sikila babaandu bakhuboolelanga ewe bali “Ewe omuliindi owe babaandu mala wirisia babaana be kholo yowo.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Nono luno se olalia babaandu lundi tawe, ne se oreerisia babaana be kholo yowo lundi tawe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne se ndakhulekha oulile ke chisoni che chikholo lundi tawe. Lundi se olachangalaasibwa ne babaandu tawe, ne se ndakhola ekholo yenywe yetuye tawe.”
Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu, nga Baisiraeli baamenya mu sibala siabwe sisiene, baasifwolobia mu ngila chabwe ne mu bikholwa biabwe, liiba liabwe ebweeni wase liaba nga omukhasi ooli mu ndaalo chewe chimbi.
Nio nakhalala nabarafwira lukali sikila babaandu nibo beera mu sibala, ne khulwe bifwaani nibio basifwoloselia.
Nabasalanisia mu kholo mala baacha mu sibala sioosi. Nabakhalakila khuloondekhana ne limenya ne bikholwa biabwe.
Ne kakhali nga boola mu chikholo, buli niio boola bafwolobia lisina liase litakatifu mu lienelio babaandu baloma khu kabwe bali, ‘Bano bali babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kakhaba kario barura mu sibala siewe.’
Ne kakhali Ese naailisiamo busa lisina liase litakatifu nilio Baisiraeli bafwolobisia mu kholo nicho bachaamo.”
Khwako boolela Baisiraeli oli, “Omwami WELE, aloma ali, ‘Ee, Baisiraeli se lili sikila enywe, Ese ndi siimbi khukhola sikholwa tawe, ne likhali sikila lisina liase litakatifu nilio enywe mwafwolobia mu kholo nicho mwachaamo.
Ne khakwalaasie butakatifu bwe lisina liase liboofu liliafwolobisibwa mu kholo, lundi nilio enywe mwafwolobie mu kholo mala chikholo chilamanya chili Ese ndi Omwami Wele lundi nise Omwami WELE oolikho ne ndoma, nga khubirira mwinywe Ese ngwalaasia butakatifu bwase mu moni mwabwe.
Sikila khamukule enywe murusie mu kholo mala mubuusie khukhwama mu bibala bioosi mala mureere mu sibala sienywe sisiene.
Khamuanyekho kameechi kamakwalaafu mala mube bamiliiu khukhwama mu bunyalu bwenywe bwoosi lundi mukhakwalasibwe khukhwama mu bifwaani bienywe bioosi.
Khamuelesie enywe kumwoyo kumuya lundi khare mwinywe roho omuya; ne khamurusiemo kumwoyo kwe libaale mala muelesie kumwoyo kwe nyama.
Khare roho wase mwinywe mala mukhole enywe muloonde kamalaka kase lundi mube barekeerefu mu khuloonda kamalakiilisia kase.
Mukhamenye mu sibala nisio naelesia baraara benywe lundi mulaba babaandu base ne Ese ndaba Wele wenywe.
Khamureesie khukhwama mu sifwabi sienywe sioosi. Ndalaka biakhulia mala mbikhole bibe bikali lukali ne se ndamureerera enywe enjala tawe.
Ndakhola bibiaamo bie kimirongooro ne bibiaamo bie mu maloba bikuche, nio mukhaba ne chisoni che khunaanisibwa ne njala lundi mu chikholo tawe.
Nio mukhebulile chingila chenywe chimayaanu ne bikholwa bienywe biibi, mukhesonie mwabeene sikila bubwoni bwenywe ne bikholwa bienywe bie sifwabi.
Ee Baisiraeli, Ese Omwami WELE se ndakhola ndio sikila enywe tawe, lino limanyikhe khwinywe muambwe chisoni ne khurangaraarwa sikila chingila chenywe.’ ”
Ese Omwami WELE ndoma kano: Khu ndaalo niyo Ese khamukwalaasiliemo khukhwama mu bwoni bwenywe, khakhole babaandu bamenye mu chingoba, ne abuundu aali likuunda alombwakhwa lundi.
Kamaloba kakanjukhwa kalalimwa, kakhaba busa kakaanjukhwa mu moni che babaandu babira boosi tawe.
Ne babira bakhalome bali, “Sibala sisiaba ne sianjukhwa sino siekeele nga kumukuunda kwa Edeni, ne kamakuunda kakanjukhwa ne chingoba chichatechulwa, luno babaandu bamenyilemo ne khubotookhelesibwa ne kamasiisi.”
Nono chikholo chicharama chilamanya chili Ese Omwami Wele nombaakhe lundi abuundu aatechukha ne khubiaala kimikuunda kikiaba ne kianjukhwa. Ese Omwami Wele nalomile mala ndalikhola.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lino liosi khalekhe Baisiraeli bandeebe mbakholeele; babaandu babwe bakuche babe bakali nga kumunyele kwe kamakheese.
Babe nga kamakheese ke mbosio, nga kamakheese e Yerusalemu mu ndaalo cha naikara. Khwako chingoba chichaba ne chonakakwa chilechulamo babaandu bipupu bikali. Nono bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.”

Bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwecha khwise, mala roho wewe aambukula aanjikhisia mwitooma akari; litooma elio liaba liechula bikuumba.
Aandangirira nabibotookhelela, biaba bikali lukali mwitooma elio, abeele biaba biooma para.
Nio amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, bikuumba bino binyala biaaba ne bulamu ku?”
Ne ese mukobosia ndi, “Yee, Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ewe niwe omanyile.”
Lundi amboolela ali, “Ng'oolela bikuumba bino obiboolele oli: Ee, enywe bikuumba bibioomu, ulila burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Omwami WELE aboolela bikuumba ali, ‘Lola Ese ndamuraamo kumuuya mala mulaba ne bulamu.
Ndamuraakho chisia che kamafuki mala khole chinyama chimwichekho ne khumurakho sikhoba, ne khumuraamo kumuuya; mulaba ne bulamu mala mulamanya muli Ese ndi Omwami Wele.’ ”
Nio ese nang'oola nga ne nalakwa. Ne nga naba ne ng'oola, luyoka lwabao, mala naulila luyoka lwe bikuumba ne biekhupanakho, mala bikuumba ebio biecha alala, sikuumba khu sikuumba siasio.
Ne nga nalola nabona chisia che kamafuki khu nibio ne chinyama chechilekho, mala sikhoba siabifuuniikhe ne kakhali kimuuya se kwabibaamo tawe.
Wele aamboolela kano: Ng'oola khu miuuya, mwana wo mundu ng'oola, mala oboolele kimiuuya oli, “Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘yiicha khukhwama chimbeka chine, ee kimiuuya mala ofuelesie khu babeerwa bano boole khuuba ne bulamu.’ ”
Nono Wele amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, bikuumba bino bioosi bili be nju yoosi eya Isiraeli. Baloma bali, ‘Bikuumba biefwe bioomile, ne lilieyikina liefwe liaweele; se khuli ne limenya liliicha tawe.’ ”
Khwako ng'oola obaboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola, ndekula biliindwa bienywe mala mulamusie mururemo. Ee, baandu base mala ndamukobosia mu sibala sia Isiraeli.
Ne mulamanya muli Ese ndi Omwami Wele, nga ne khekule biliindwa bienywe mala mulamusie mururemo; ee baandu baase.
Khamufuemo kimiuuya kiase, ne mukhabe balamu mala khamure mu sibala sienywe sisiene. Nono mukhamanye muli Ese Omwami Wele nalomaloome mala nakholile ndio.”
Omwami Wele amboolela ali,
“Mwana wo mundu bukula lusaala mala oandikekho oli, ‘Lwa Yuda mala babaana ba Isiraeli baambaana ne naye.’ Nono bukula lusaala luluundi mala oandikekho oli ‘Lwa Yosefu, (lusaala lwa Efuraimu) ne Baisiraeli boosi babaambaana ne naye.’
Chiambaasie chibe lulala nio chikele lusaala lulala mukhono mwowo.
Babaandu bowo ne bakhureeba bali, ‘Eku, se olakhuboolela sifuno sia kano tawe?’
Baboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Lola, Ese ndi siimbi khubukula lusaala lwa Yosefu (luuli kamaani ka Efraimu) ne chikholo cha Isiraeli chichaambaana ne naye mala ndaluambaasia alala ne lusaala lwa Yuda mala njikhole chibe lusaala lulala nio chibe lusaala lulala mu mukhono kwase.’ ”
“Chisaala nicho oandiikekho ne chili mu mukhono kwowo ebweeni wabwe,
baboolele kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Lola Ese khabukule Baisiraeli mbarusie mu kholo nicho bachaamo, mala khababuusie khukhwama mu mbeka choosi mala mbareere mu sibala siabwe.
Khabakhole babe ekholo ndala mu sibala, mu bikulu bia Isiraeli, ne omwami mulala akhabamiie boosi. Se baliba lundi bubwami bubwakabukhana abili tawe.
Se bakhefwolobie lundi ne bifwaani biabwe ne bibiindu bie khusinya namwe bubwoni tawe. Ne Ese khabaonie khukhwama mu khukobola enyuma nimwo bakholeele bubwoni mbasiinge mbakwalaasie lundi bakhabe babaandu base ne Ese khabe Wele wabwe.
Omukholi wase Daudi akhabe omwami wabwe, lundi boosi alala balaba nende omwayi mulala. Bakhaloonde kamalakiilisia kase ne khuuba barekeerefu khuloonda lilaka liase.
Bakhamenye mu sibala nisio naelesia raarawabwe Yakobo. Mu sibala nimwo baraara babwe baamenyanga; nibo ne babaana babwe ne babechukhulu babwe bakhamenye ebweeneyo buli lwoosi. Daudi omukholi wase akhabe omwami wabwe buli lwoosi.
Khakhole endakaano eye kumuleembe ne nabo, ekhabe endakaano eya mindali ne nabo. Khababiite chikhabi mala mbakuchisie. Khabombakhemo abuundu wase aatakatifu ababeemo mindali na mindali.
Bumenyo bwase bukhabe mu nibo; ne Ese khabe Wele wabwe, ne nibo bakhabe babaandu base.
Nio chikholo chimanye chili Ese Omwami Wele okwalaasia Isiraeli nga abuundu wase aatakatifu ne ali akari wabwe buli lwoosi.’ ”

Omwami Wele amboolela kano:
Mwana wo mundu suta chimoni chowo olole Koku owe mu sibala sia Makoku, omwami omukhulu owa Roshi, Mesheki ne Tubali, ng'oola kamabi khu niye,
mala olome oli, “Omwami WELE aloma ali, ‘Lola, Ese nakhweanyilekho ee Koku, omwami omukhulu owa Roshi, Mesheki ne Tubali.
Ese khakhukaluukhasie mala khukakie chingaki mu nyanyilo chowo lundi khakhukhweese wichilekho ne banamae bowo boosi, chifarasi nende bachitimia, boosi bakangiile buli bulwaani, babaandu bakali, boosi ne bali ne chingabo ne bie khukhweteechela, lundi basutile chimbalu.
Babaandu khukhwama Ebapasha, Kushi ne Putu, bali alala ne nabo. Boosi bali ne chingabo ne chikofio che sichuuma.
Komeri ne banamae bewe boosi, Beti-tokarima khukhwama aleeyi ebunaswa ne banamae bewe boosi, chikholo chingali chili ne nawe.
Yerekekha, ewe ne banamae bowo boosi bakhwibusieo mala ewe obe omunamae wabwe omukhulu.
Enyuma we chindaalo chingali okhalakiilisibwe, mu miiko kimimaliilisi, okhache wibwaakale sibala sie babaandu babakobola khukhwama mwiie, sibala nisio babaandu bebuusiamo khukhwama mu kholo chingali khu bikulu bia Isiraeli, sisiaba ne siachiililila khuuba likuunda. Babaandu basio bareerwa khukhwama mu chikholo mala luno boosi bamenyile mu buliindi bulayi.
Ewe olebwaakala, olecha nga embembeesi; ewe ne banamae bowo boosi olaba nga lifuumbi lifuunikha sibala, ne chikholo chingali chiilaba ne nawe.’ ”
Omwami WELE akhuboolela ewe Koku ali, khu ndaalo eyo kamebaasio kalingila mu mwoyo kwowo mala okharekekhe lirekekha lie bubwoni.
Okhalome oli, “Ndaniina nje nibwaakale sibala sie birekere bikhakarwa ne kamasiisi tawe. Ndapania babaandu ba baamenya mu muleembe ne mu buliindi. Boosi bakhamenya mu ngoba chichabotookhelelwa ne kamasiisi tawe, lundi baakhali ne biilibwa bie biibia tawe.
Khufwakhila kimiaandu, khuyaaya ne khurekukha nakio. Khukhwibwaakala chingoba chichaba kamakuunda ne luno chilimo babaandu bababuusibwa khukhwama mu kholo choosi, bali luno ne chikhaafu ne bibiindu, bamenyile luno akari we sibala.
Babaandu ba Sheba nende ba Dedani nende baboofuli ba Tarishishi ne birekere biasio bioosi bakhakhureebe ewe bali, ‘Eku, ewe wechile khuyaaya kimiaandu? Eku, ewe wabuusiisie banamae bowo khusuta nibio oyaayile; khubukula efwesa ne sahabu, khubukula chikhaafu ne kimiaandu ne khufwakhila kimiaandu kimikali?’ ”
Khwako, mwana wo mundu, ng'oola mala oboolele Koku kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Mu ndaalo nicho Baisiraeli base baliba ne bamenyile mu muleembe, ewe okharakikhe lukeendo.
Okhaame ewowo, aleeyi ebunaswa, ewe ne chikholo chingali alala ne nawe, boosi bakhabe batimia chifarasi, banamae bakali lundi be kamaani.
Okheche wibwaakale Baisiraeli base nga lifuumbi ne lifuunikha sibala. Mu ndaalo chimaliilisi khakhureere wibwaakale sibala siase, nio chikholo choole khu khuumanya Ese nga bakhabone Ese ne nekesia butakatifu bwase ebweeni wabwe khubirira mwiwe ee Koku.”
Omwami WELE areeba ali, “Eku, ewe se oli niwe niye Ese nalomalomakho mu ndaalo chichabira khubirira mu bakholi base, bang'oosi ba Isiraeli, babang'oola mu ndaalo echo khulwe kimiiko kimikali bali Ese khakhureere obebwaakale?”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne khu ndaalo eyo, nga Koku alicha khukhwibwaakala sibala sia Isiraeli, Ese khakhalale lukali.
Sikila mu sikhalikhali siase, ne mu lirima liase lirafu Ese nechuba ndi, ‘Khu ndaalo eyo literema likali likhabe mu sibala sia Isiraeli.
Buli ng'eeni eye mu nyanja ne chinyuni che mu ngaaki, ne chisaang'i che mundaa nende bioosi bimoolanga khu liloba; ne babaandu boosi baali khu sibala bakhatereme ebweeni wase sikila bamboone. Ne bikulu bikhakwe asi ne chimbangaachi choosi chikhakwe asi ne buli lisiisi likhatechukhe likwe asi.’ ”
Omwami WELE, aloma ali, “Ese khalaange busiku bwoosi bwibwaakale Koku. Buli mundu khu baandu bewe akhabanulile wandaaye embalu.
Khamukhalakile lufu ne khuchukha sifuki. Khalekhuule efula engali eya namatoa, eye kamaarara, kumulilo ne kumulilo kumubuusi khu niye ne banamae bewe nende khu kholo choosi chiili alala ne naye.
Khwako khekesie bunyali bwase ne butakatifu bwase mala khole samwene manyikhane mu kholo chingali. Nio bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.”

Ne ewe mwana wo mundu, ng'oola busiku khu Koku olome kano: Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola Ese nakhweanyilekho ee Koku, omwami owa Roshi, Mesheki ne Tubali.
Ne Ese ndakhuyuusia mala khuyile ebweeni, mala khurusie khukhwama aleeyi mu bibala bie bunaswa, lundi khuraangirire wibwaakale bikulu bia Isiraeli.
Ese ndapa buyiingo bwowo bukwe khukhwama mu mukhono kwowo kumukhasi, lundi khole buembo bwowo bukwe khukhwama mu mukhono kwowo kumuseecha.
Okhafwiile khu bikulu bia Isiraeli, ewe alala ne banamae bowo boosi ne chikholo chiili alala ne nawe. Khakhuane khu nyuni nende buli solo chikhulie.
Okhafwiile mu lukoongo, sikila Ese Omwami WELE nalomaloome.
Khayile kumulilo khu Makoku nende khwaabo bamenyile mu muleembe mu bibala bie khu nyanja; mala bakhamanye bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele.
Ne Ese khakhole lisina liase litakatifu limanyikhe mu Baisiraeli base. Ne se khalekhe lisina liase litakatifu lifwolobisibwe lundi tawe. Ne chikholo chikhamanye chili Ese ndi Omwami Wele, Omutakatifu owa Isiraeli.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Lola endaalo elikho yiicha mala elareerwa. Yino niyo endaalo niyo nalomalomakho.
Nono babaandu ba baamenya mu ngoba cha Isiraeli balarura bache babuusie boosie bulwaani buulekhiilwe. Bakhosie chingabo, buyiingo, buembo, kamafumo ne chiruungu. Bakhabiore khulwe kimiiko saba.
Se bakhareenye chiikhu mundaa namwe bareme lwosi lwosi khukhwama mu musiru tawe, sikila bakhabwaane bulwaani nibwo baalekha nga chiikhu. Balayaaya bibiindu bia abo babayaaya ne khunuula. Omwami WELE aalomile.”
“Khu ndaalo eyo, Ese khaelesie Koku abuundu e khumusiikha mu Isiraeli; litooma lia Be khu Lukeendo, ebukwe we Nyanja eya chumbe, ekhakhinge engila eye babaandu be khu lukeendo, sikila Koku ne banamae bewe bakali bakhasiikhwe abwenao. Akhalaangwe, ‘Litooma lia Hamoni Koku.’
Sikila khu mieesi saba Baisiraeli bakhabe balikho basiikha bafu khulwe khukhweya khukwalaasia sibala.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Babaandu boosi be mu sibala bakhayeete khubasiikha mala bakhaelesibwe lukoosi khu ndaalo niyo Ese khekeseliekho luyali lwase.
Bakharobore babaandu be siseecha bache babire mu sibala sioosi busiele ne basiikha bafu ba baaba ne barama mu sibala nio basikwalaasie. Khu mieesi saba bakhakhole bario.
Ne nga bano bakhabire mu sibala mwoosi, ne omundu yesi yesi ne abona sikuumba sio mundu araao simanyisio, khukhwola nga abo basiikha ne basisiikha mu Litooma Hamoni koku.
(Lukoba Hamona lwosi luliyo) Khwako bakheye sibala sikwalaale sirio.”
Balalia chinyama che baafu be bunyali mala munywe kamafuki ke babaami be sibala, boosi bali nga kamamiiku, kamameeme ne chimbusi. Nga chikhaafu boosi bali banefu be Bashani.
Mulalia kiminawa khukhwola nga mwikura; lundi mulanywa kamafuki khukhwola nga mulameelela a naikara eye mbosio niyo Ese ndikho murekekhera.
Ne a sialwa wase mulekura chifarasi ne babaandu bachitimianga, mulekura banaitiriani be kamaani ne banamae chingano choosi. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile”
Omwami Wele aloma ali, “Ese khare luyali lwase mu kholo choosi, mala chikholo choosi chikhabone likhalaka liase nilio Ese khalake ne busiro bwe kumukhono kwase nikwo mbareerekho.
Baisiraeli balamanya bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele, Wele wabwe khukhwama endaalo eyo ne khuchiililila.
Ne chikholo chilamanya chili Baisiraeli bacha mu mbaambe sikila bubwoni bwabwe, sikila baba baabacha khwise nio nekisa bakhambona tawe, mala nabara mu makhono ke basiku babwe mala boosi beerwa ne mbalu.
Nabakhola khuloondekhana ne sifwabi siabwe ne bubwoni bwabwe mala nekisa bakhambona tawe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Luno ndakobosia lisaaye lia Yakobo ne khukholela siisa Baisiraeli mala ndaba ne siikhalikhali sikila lisina liase litakatifu.
Bakhebilile chisoni chabwe ne bubacha bwabwe bwoosi nibwo bakholela Ese nga ne baliba ne bamenyile mu muleembe mu sibala siabwe ne bakhali no mundu yesi yesi oobariikhirisia tawe.
Nga Ese ne ndiba ne mbakoboosie khukhwama mu kholo choosi ne khubabuusia khukhwama mu bibala bie basiku babwe; ne khubirira mu nibo, nekesie butakatifu bwase ebweeni we chikholo chingali.
Nio babaandu base balamanya bali Ese ndi Omwami Wele, Wele wabwe, sikila nabayila mu mbaambe mu chikholo, lundi nababuusia mu sibala siabwe babeene. Se khalekhe yesi yesi khu nibo arame mu kholo echo lundi tawe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne se khekise lundi khukhwama khu nibo tawe, nga ne khachukhe roho wase khu Baisiraeli.”

Mu mwiiko kukhola kimiiko kamakhumi kabili na kiraano kie mbaambe yefwe, kumwiiko ne kurakikha, khu ndaalo eye khumi, mu mwiiko kwe khumi na kine, enyuma we khuambwa khwa Yerusalemu, khu ndaalo eyo ne ng'ene bunyali bwo Mwami Wele bwaba khwise.
Ne andeera ne ndi mu malola mu sibala sia Isiraeli, mala anjikhisia khu sikulu sileeyi lukali. Ebweeni wase nabona sisiindu sisiafwaana nga lukoba.
Nga ne andeera ebweeneyo, lola, abayo omundu owe lukoondo nga kumukasa. Omundu yuno aaba ne lukoye lwe buusi bung'enang'ena ne sisele sie khupiimila mukhono mwewe. Aaba emile e silibwa.
Ne omundu oyo amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, lola ne chimoni chowo mala oulile ne kamaru kowo, lundi ra kamebaasio kowo khu koosi niko ndikho nja khukhwekesia. Sikila ewe wareerirwe ano nio ese noole khukhwekesia. Boolela Baisiraeli koosi niko obona.”
Nio aacha mu silibwa sisialola ebukwe, aaniina khu situumi siasio aapiima ebwingililo bwe silibwa; khukhwama khu ngaaki khucha asi siaba chimita chitaru,
ne chisiro che a lubeka chaba chimita chitaru bukhiikha, ne eye akari we chisiro yaba bubalaayi bwe chimita chibili ne nusu, ne khasiro khe silibwa ebweeni we ngila e lusiro we khufwaruriramo lulwaloleelela Lukaangu chimita chitaru.
Nio aapiima lusiro lwe khukhwefulilamo mukari e silibwa lwaba chimita chine.
Nio aapiima lisiisi liliaba emita ndala buboofu. Lusiro lwe khukhwefuulilamo lwaba mukari siimbi lukali ne Lukaangu.
Ne chisiro chabaao chitaru chimbeka chombi che ngila e silibwa sie bukwe. Chisiro chino chaba chaleekhaana busa ne buboofu bwe lisiisi; buli lubeka liaba lialeekhaana.
Nono omundu oyo aapiima bubalaayi bwe ngila eye silibwa, yaba chimita sita ne nusu ne bubalaayi bwe silibwa bwaba chimita chiraano.
Ebweeni we chisiro che buliindi, lisiisi liliimbi liabaao chisendimita kamakhumi karaano khucha angaaki ne chisendimita kamakhumi karaano buboofu.
Nio aapiima buleeyi khukhwama khwisiisi lie nyuma lie lusiro khukhwola khwisiisi lie nyuma ne okhalisia engila, liaba chimita ekhumi na chibili ne nusu.
Lusiro lwe aleeyi lwaba ne ngila eecha khu luuya lwe enje. Aapiima buleeyi bwe lusiro olwo, lwaba chimita ekhumi bubalaayi.
Buleeyi bwoosi bwe ngila yoosi khukhwama khwisiisi lie enje lie silibwa, khukhwola lubeka lwe khu ndulo khwe lusiro lumaliilisi lwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano.
Chinuma chabaao khumasiisi ke nje koosi ke chisiro, akhaba kamasiisi ke mukari akari we chisiro. Khwaba ne kamakheendu niko bara khu masiisi ke mukari kakaloleelela silibwa.
Nio aambila mu luuya lwe enje, chisiro ne luuya lwe kamabaale, bioosi biabotookhela luuya. Chisiro kamakhumi kataru ebweeni we luuya lwe kamabaale.
Luuya lwe kamabaale lwabira asilibwa, lwaba lulekhaana ne silibwa buleeyi, luno lwaba luuya lwe mwalo.
Yabao engila eye angaaki eyachichanga mu luuya lwe mukari, omundu oyo aapiima buleeyi akari we bilibwa bibili, aanyoola chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Nio omundu oyo aapiima buleeyi ne bubalaayi bwe silibwa sie bunaswa sisiachichanga khu luuya lwe nje.
Chisiro chitaru che buliindi chaba buli lubeka lwe ngila akari we kamasiisi ne chisiro, ne lusiro lwe amuliango; bioosi biaba ne buleeyi ne bubalaayi bubwakana nende biili mu silibwa sie bukwe. Buleeyi bwoosi bwe silibwa bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ne bukhiikha chimita likhumi na chibili ne nusu.
Lusiro lwe khunyoa, kamatirisia, ne kamakheendu kakefuumba biaba nga ebio bibiaba mu silibwa sie bukwe. Ano biaba bikele saba bie khuniina khukhwama khu silibwa, ne lusiro lwe muliango lwaba khu ndulo, lwaloleelela khu luya.
Nga ne obira luuya khukhwama khu silibwa sie ebunaswa, bulayi bwene nga sie ebukwe, silibwa sisiindi siabaao siicha khu luuya lwe mukari. Omundu oyo aapiima buleeyi akari we bilibwa bibili bino mala aanyoola ali bili chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Lilialoondakho, omundu yuno ambila elubeka lwe siafubo, mala silibwa sisiindi siabaayo. Aapiima buleeyi bwe kamasiisi ke mukari ne lusiro lwe muliango, mala bialekhaana busa ne bibiindi.
Kamatirisia kaba khu siro che silibwa bulayi bwene nga chichiindi. Buleeyi bwoosi bwe silibwa bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano, ne bubalaayi chimita ekhumi na chibili ne nusu.
Biaba bikele saba bie khuniina khukhwola khu silibwa, ne lusiro lwe muliango lwaba khu ndulo khukhwaloleelela luuya. Khwaba ne kamakheendu kakafuumbwa khu masiisi ke mukari kakaloleelela khu ngila.
Ano osi silibwa sisialoleelela khu luuya lwe mukari siabaao. Omundu oyo aapiima buleeyi khucha khu silibwa sie khabili sino, bwaba chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Nio omundu oyo aandeera khu luya lwe mukari khubirira mu silibwa sie siafubo, mala aapiima silibwa sie siafubo, siaba silekhaana ne bilibwa bibiindi.
Chisiro che lubeka, chisiro che buliindi nende chichiingila mukari chaba chilekhaana busa ne chichiindi, kamatirisia kabaakho buli lubeka ne khu chisiro che buliindi, buleeyi bwalwo bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ne bubalaayi ekhumi na chibili ne sisiinja.
Ne khwabao ne chisiro che mukari buli lubeka, buleeyi chimita ekhumi na chibili ne sisiinja ne bukhiikha chimita chibili ne sisiinja.
Lusiro olwo lwaloleelela luuya lwe enje, ne kamakheendu kaba khu siro che buliindi buli lubeka, ne engila yasio yaba bikele munaane bie khuniinilakho.
Nio omundu oyo aandeera khu luuya lwe mukari elubeka lwe bukwe mala aapiima buleeyi bwe silibwa. Siaba busa nga bibiindi.
Chisiro che lubeka, chisiro che buliindi ne chisiro che mukari, chaba busa nga chichiindi, chabaakho kamatirisia buli lubeka ne khu lusiro lwe mukari; buleeyi bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ne bukhiikha chimita ekhumi na chibili ne nusu.
Lusiro lwe muliango lwaloleelela khu luuya lwe nje mala lwaba ne kamakheendu khu siro che buliindi chimbeka chombi, ne engila yalwo yaba bikele munaane bie khuniinilakho.
Nio omundu oyo aandeera mu silibwa sie bunaswa aasipiima buleeyi; siaba busa nga bibiindi.
Siaba ne chisiro che lubeka, che buliindi nende che mukari chicharonwaronwa, lusiro lwe khucha mukari lwaba ne kamatirisia buli lubeka, buleeyi bwako bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ne bukhiikha chimita ekhumi na chibili ne nusu.
Lusiro lwe muliango lwaba lwaloleelela khu luuya lwe nje. Kamakheendu kaba khu siro che buliindi buli lubeka; ne engila yalwo yaba bikele munaane bie khuniinilakho.
Khu luya lwe nje yabao enju eyetiila khu silibwa sie mukari sisialoleelela ebunaswa. Enju yino yaba yaloleelela mu lusiro lwe mukari lulwaloleelela khu luya lwe nje niio basiingilanga chinyama che chisaang'i che chimbosio che khukhwosia.
Mu lusiro lwe muliango luno, chimesa chine chabaamo, chibili buli lubeka lwe lusiro. Khwaba khu mesa chino nikhwo beereranga chisaang'i che chimbosio che khukhwosia ne chimbosio che khurusiao bubwoni nende che kumuruungo kwe khurusiao bumayaanu.
Enje we lusiro, chabao chimesa chine chifwaanane, chibili buli lubeka lwe silibwa sie bunaswa.
Choosi chaba chimesa munaane nicho beererangakho chimbosio chine mu lusiro mukari ne chine enje khu luya.
Chimesa chine che kamabaale kamabeeche chino, mu nju ekiindi endasakho; charumikhwanga khurekekha chimbosio che khukhwosia. Chaba chisendimita kamakhumi karaano khucha angaaki, ne lulama lwacho lwaba chisendimita kamakhumi saba na chiraano buli lubeka. Buli siindu sisiarumikhanga mu khwira chisaang'i che chimbosio chino siabiikhwangwa khu mesa chino.
Ne chingaki buleeyi bwe kumukhono mulala chaba khu ndulo khwe chimesa echo mukari. Chinyama choosi che chimbosio charechwangwa khu mesa khu ngaaki.
Nio aandera khu luya lwe mukari; chabao chisiro chibili chichaloleelela khu luya lwe mukari. Lulala lwaloleelela siafubo siimbi ne silibwa sie bunaswa ne luluundi lwaloleelela ebunaswa embi ne silibwa sie siafubo.
Omundu oyo aamboolela ali, “Lusiro lulwaloleelela siafubo luli lwe basaayi babemeelelanga mu Lukaangu.
Ne lusiro lulwaloleelela ebunaswa, luli lwe basaayi babemeelelanga khu alutare. Basaayi boosi bamanga khu lisaaye lia Satoki. Nibo bong'ene be lisaaye lia Lawi, bafukiililwa khucha ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Omundu oyo, aapiima bubalaayi bwe luuya lwe mukari; lwaba chimita kamakhumi karaano buli lubeka. Alutare yaba ebweeni we Lukaangu.
Nio aambila mu lusiro lwe muliango kwe Lukaangu mala aapiima chisiro che buliindi nende che mukari. Chaba chimita chibili ne nusu chimbeka chichaloleelelana, ne bubalaayi bwe silibwa chimita saba, ne lisiisi lie khu silibwa emita ndala ne nusu chimbeka chombi.
Engila yabaao eye khuniinilakho khu lusiro lwe khucha mukari. Lusiro olwo lwaba bubalaayi chimita ekhumi ne chimita sita khucha asi. Chinjeko chibili chaba khu ndulo khwe chisiro che buliindi, buli lubeka enjeko ndala.

Nio omundu oyo aambila mu lusiro lwe akari, abuundu atakatifu aapiima bubalaayi bwe ngila eyingilamo; yaba chimita chitaru khucha asi,
ne chimita chiraano bubalaayi, ne kamasiisi ke silibwa chimita chibili ne nusu buboofu chimbeka chombi, Aapiima lusiro, lwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili buleeyi ne chimita likhumi bukhiikha.
Nio aacha mu lusiro lwe mukari lukali, mala aapiima engila akari we chisiro; yaba emita ndala khucha asi, ne chimita chitaru bubalaayi, ne kamasiisi chimbeka chombi che buboofu chimita chitaru ne nusu.
Aapiima bubalaayi bwe lusiro olwo; lwaba chimita ekhumi buli lubeka. Lusiro luno lwaba aleeyi khukhilakho lwe akari. Mala aamboolela ali, “Ano ali abuundu atakatifu po!”
Omundu oyo aapiima buboofu bwe lisiisi lie mukari lie Lukaangu; lioola chimita chitaru. Mwisiisi muno mwoosi mwabaamo biiyu bitiiti bibiabotookhelesia Lukaangu, bubalaayi chimita chibili.
Biiyu bino biaba biakelekhana khataru, ne chisiro kamakhumi kataru khu buli koroofa. Lisiisi lie nje lie Lukaangu khu buli koroofa liaba linyelele khukhila ekoroofa eye asi. Nio liaba bali biiyu bino binyale khukhwiima bulayi ne bikheaambile khwisiisi lie Lukaangu tawe.
Ne khwako kamasiisi ke Lukaangu, ne olola khukhwama enje, kalolekhana oli manya ne kalekhaana bubalaayi khukhwama asi khukhwola khu ngaaki. Embi ne kamasiisi ke Lukaangu, enje we biiyu, bombakha engila eye bikele eye khuniinilakho khubotookhelela Lukaangu nio linyalikhane bulayi khucha khu ngaaki ne khukhwiikha khu koroofa eye asi.
Lisiisi lie enje lie biiyu bino liaba bubalaayi chimita chibili ne nusu. Kwabao kumuliango mulala kucha mu biiyu bibiaba ebunaswa we Lukaangu ne kukuundi elubeka lwe siafubo. Nio nabona engila yaba bubalaayi chimita chibili ne nusu yabotookheleele Lukaangu. Yaba chimita chitaru khukhwama khwiloba, yaba yalekhaana ne kumusiingi kwe biiyu bibiaba mwisiisi lie Lukaangu. Akari we ngila ne chinju nicho basaayi barumikhiranga, sibaanga siabao chimita ekhumi khubotookhelela Lukaangu buli lubeka.
Ebweeni we sibaanga lubeka lwe mumbo lwe Lukaangu, enju yabaayo eye buleeyi chimita kamakhumi kane na chiraano ne bukhiikha chimita kamakhumi kataru na chiraano. Lisiisi liaba buboofu chimita chibili ne nusu khubotookhelela buli lubeka.
Omundu oyo aapiima enje we Lukaangu; lwaba buleeyi chimita kamakhumi karaano. Ne khukhwama enyuma we Lukaangu, khubira sibaanga khukhwola khu ndulo khwe lubeka lwe mumbo, lwosi lwaba buleeyi chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Bubalaayi ebweeni we ebukwe we Lukaangu, ne oraakho sibaanga buli lubeka, lwosi lwaba chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Omundu oyo aapiima buleeyi bwe nju elubeka lwe mumbo, ne oraakho chingila che lusiro chimbeka chombi; chosi chaba chimita kamakhumi karaano.
Mu lwe mu Lukaangu akari ne lusiro lwe mukari lukali, ne lusiro lwe khufwaruriramo lwe khu ndulo;
oosi arebwakho chimbao khukhwama asi khu bwelu khukhwola khu matirisia, kamatirisia kano kanyala beele kafuunikhwa.
Khukhwola mu numa angaaki we kumuliango, akhaba mu lusiro lwe mukari, ne nje. Ne khu masiisi koosi khubotookhelela lusiro lwe mukari nende akari we Lukaangu; bibiindu bibiabeechwa biabaao bibialoondekhana bulayi.
Biaba bifwaana kamakheendu ne chikerubi. Kamakheendu ne chikerubi bialoondekhananga khukhwama khu sino ne khuucha khu siindi, khwaba khurio busa khubotookhelela enju yoosi. Buli kerubi yaba ne bubweeni bubili:
bubweeni bwo mundu bubwaloleelela kumukheendu lubeka lulala, ne bubweeni bwe talang'i bubwaloleelela emukheendu lubeka luluundi. Biabeechwa khubotookhelesia Lukaangu lwoosi,
khukhwama asi khu bwelu khukhwola angaaki we kumuliango, chikerubi ne kimikheendu biabeechwa khwisiisi.
Bisiindi bie kumuliango kwe akari we Lukaangu biaba bilekhaana chimbeka choosi.
Ebweeni we abuundu atakatifu, sisiindu siabao sisiafwaana nga
alutare eye chimbao. Siaba emita ndala ne nusu khucha angaaki nende emita ndala bubalaayi. Mu koona, asi ne chimbeka choosi chaba chakholwa ne chimbao. Omundu oyo aamboolela ali, “Yino eli emesa ebechanga ebweeni wo Mwami Wele.”
Akari we Lukaangu nende abuundu atakatifu ombi aaba ne kumuliango kukwakabukhasibwamo akari.
Khwako buli muliango kwaba kunyala kwekulilwa akari ne kulola chimbeka chombi.
Chikerubi ne kimikheendu abeele biabeechwa khu miliango kie akari we Lukaangu. Biaba bifwaana nga bie khwisiisi; lulama lwe chimbao lwaba ebweeni lusiro lwe khukhwefwaruriramo lubeka lwe nje.
Mu mbeka che chisiro chino, kamatirisia kamatiiti kabaamo ne kimikheendu buli lubeka khu masiisi ke lusiro lwe khukhwefwaruriramo.

Nio omundu oyo aambukula aambila khu luuya lwe enje mala aandangirira aambila mu liombakho liliaba elubeka we bunaswa we Lukaangu; se aaba aleeyi khukhwama khu mombakho ke lubeka lwe mumbo we Lukaangu tawe.
Liliombakho lino liaba buleeyi chimita kamakhumi karaano ne bubalaayi chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano.
Lubeka lulala liliombakho elio lialoleelela abuundu aali busa chimita likhumi bubalaayi, aaba embi ne Lukaangu. Ne lubeka luluundi lialoleelela khu ndulo khwe luuya lwe enje. Yaba liliombakho lino liombakhwa mu ngila chitaru, buli ndala enyuma asi we kiindi.
Elubeka we bunaswa we liliombakho lino, engila yabaao chimita chiraano bubalaayi, ne chimita kamakhumi karaano buleeyi, ne bilibwa lubeka lwene olu.
Chisiro che chinju che khu ngaaki chaba chindiiti khukhila che akari nende asi. Sikila bachisendakho enyuma lukali.
Chisiro chino choosi chaba chakana ne se chaba chetiila khu njeko chosi chosi nga chichaba khu luuya enje tawe.
Elubeka lwe asi, lisiisi lie nje liaba lialolelaane ne chisiro lubeka lwe luuya enje. Buleeyi bwalio liaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ne nusu. Lubeka lwe enje khu ndulo, khwaba ne chisiro chichiindi mu mita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano buleeyi. Ne chichaba ne chachiloleelela lubeka luluundi chaba chimita kamakhumi karaano buleeyi.
Asi we chinju chibili chino, elubeka we bukwe we liliombakho niio lisiisi lie luuya lwe enje lurakikhira, silibwa siabao siicha khu luuya.
Elubeka we siafubo sie Lukaangu, liliombakho liliindi liabaao lifwaanana, nende liili elubeka we mumbo we Lukaangu.
Ebweeni we chisiro chino, engila yabaayo bulayi bwene nga eeli lubeka lwe bunaswa. Chisiro chino chaba chakaniilila buleeyi ne bukhiikha, bilibwa khaloondekhasia khwa buli siindu nende kimiliango biaba bifwaanana.
Kumuliango kwaba khu siro asi, lubeka lwe siafubo we liliombakho, elubeka lwe bukwe nga enju newa niio lisiisi liarakikhira.
Omundu oyo aamboolela ali, “Chisiro che bunaswa nende che siafubo chichafutarira luuya chili chindakatifu, nimwo basaayi babeecha khusaaya Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi baliila biianwa bitakatifu lukali. Balaraamo biianwa bitakatifu lukali, biinwa bie bibiaamo, biianwa khulwe khurusiao bubwoni nende bie kumuruungo khulwe khurusiao bumayaanu, sikila abuundu ao ali atakatifu.
Nga basaayi ne bacha aali atakatifu ano, se balarura bache enje niio babaandu bali ne bakhafuulile chingubo nicho babeele nacho ne basaba tawe, sikila chino chili chindakatifu. Balafwara chichiindi ne bakhaacha embi ne babaandu tawe.”
Nga omundu oyo ne amala khupiima mukari mwe siwanja sie Lukaangu, aambila enje khubirira mu silibwa sie bukwe mala aapiima bukali bwe siwanja.
Aabukula luusia lulala mala aapiima lubeka lwe ebukwe, lwaba chimita chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano.
Nio aapiima lubeka lwe bunaswa, siafubo, nende mumbo, buli lubeka lwaba chimita chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano.
Nio aapiima lisiisi liliabotookhelela, chimita chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano buli lubeka. Lisiisi elio liarumikhanga khukabukhania lubeka lutakatifu ne lubeka luukhali lutakatifu tawe.

Enyuma wako, omundu oyo, aandeera esilibwa sisialoleelela ebukwe.
Abwenao nabona luyali lwa Wele owa Isiraeli khukhwama ebukwe, ne liiuliilikhana liewe liaba nga kameechi kamakali ne kaoloola, ne sibala siakhosia khulwe luyali lwewe.
Kamalola niko nabona kaba nga kamalola niko nabona ne eecha khukhwonakaka lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, lundi nga kamalola niko nabona ne ndi khu luuchi lwa Chebari; mala nakwa asi mafuumala.
Nga luyali lwa Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi ne lwecha mu Lukaangu khubirira mu silibwa sisialoleelela ebukwe.
Roho wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaniinia mu ngaaki mala aandeera khu luya lwe mukari; mala luyali lwa Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi lwechula mu Lukaangu.
Omundu oyo eema embi nase; nio naulila Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi ne andomalomakho khukhwama mu Lukaangu.
Amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, abuundu ano ali abuundu we ndebe yase eye bubwami, abuundu niio Ese nda bikele biase. Ese khamenye ano mu baandu ba Isiraeli mala mbamiie buli lwoosi. Se balibao babaandu mu Isiraeli namwe babaami babwe bakhafwolobie lisina liase litakatifu khulwe khusaaya bawele babaandi namwe khulwe khusiikha babaami babwe abuundu ano tawe.
Babaami bombakhila kamachipi kabwe siimbi ne Lukaangu lwase lutakatifu, lisiisi liong'ene liaba likhukabukhania. Bafwolobia lisina liase litakatifu ne bibiindu biisinya nibio bakholanga, nio mu lirima liase nababunia.
Luno khukhwola balekhe khusaaya bawele babaandi ne khurusiao kimibili kie babaami babwe kibe aleeyi khukhwama niio ndi. Ne bakhola bario Ese khamenye ne nabo buli lwoosi.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aachiililila khuloma ali, “Mwana wo mundu, yinoosielia babaandu ba Isiraeli khuloondekhana ne Lukaangu nga luli, lekha bapiime ne baloonda nga lwombakhwa mala baambwe chisoni khulwe bumayaanu bwabwe.
Baaba ne baambwa chisoni khu niko bakholile, benoosiele nga Lukaangu ne luli, nga lwamela, bilibwa bibiingila nende biirura, buli siindu nga sili, ne kamalaka kalwo. Baandikile koosi asi, nio babone nga buli siindu ne siarekekhwa mala baloonde kamarekeka koosi ne kamalaka koosi.
Lino nilio lilaka lie Lukaangu: Buli abuundu lukoongo lulwabotookhelela Lukaangu khu sikulu khu ngaaki ali atakatifu lukali.”
Lubeka lwe asi bukali bwe alutare khukhwama khu musiingi yaba emita ndala khucha angaaki. Siseenge siloondakho siaba chisendimita kamakhumi karaano chimbeka choosi ne chimita chibili khucha angaaki. Siseenge siloondakho siosi siaba busa nga sitaayi chisendimita kamakhumi karaano buli lubeka.
Lubeka lwe angaaki luno, niio biianwa bioselwangwa, lwosi lwaba chimita chibili khucha angaaki. Chinjika choosi chine che mu koona chaba khukhila chimbeka chichiindi choosi.
Khungaaki khwa alutare, khwaba khwatekanilila busa chimbeka choosi, chimita sita buli lubeka.
Akari osi aba atekanilila busa chimbeka choosi, chimita saba buli lubeka ne lunika chisendimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano khucha mu ngaaki. Lubachangu lulabaao, chisendimita kamakhumi karaano bubalaayi. Engila eecha khu alutare yabaao; bikele biayo bie khuniinilakho bialola lubeka lwe ebukwe.
Basaayi be kholo eya Satoki nibo bong'ene babenyekha beeche khusaaya ebweeni wase. Ese Omwami WELE ndoma ndi mukhabaelesie euunwa endoro eaanwe nga embosio eye khurusiao bubwoni.
Mulabukula kamalasile kayo matiiti kari mala mukare khu njika chine cha alutare, ne mu koona akari ne khu lukina. Mu ngila yino, mukhakwalaasie alutare ne khukitakaasa.
Lundi mukhabukule euunwa eye mbosio eye khurusiao bubwoni mala mwosiele abuundu niio muroboore embi ne Lukaangu enje we abuundu atakatifu.
Endaalo eye khabili, mukhaane endurume ekhalikho buubi bwosi bwosi tawe khuuba siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni. Alutare ekhatakaaswe nga yatakaaswa ne uunwa.
Nga mwamalile khukhola murio mulabukula euunwa ekhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe, muaane nga siianwa nende limiiku khukhwama mwituuli likhalikho buubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Mulabira ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala basaayi balara chumbe khu nyama echo mala bosie nga siianwa sie khukhwosia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khu ndaalo saba mulaana embusi buli ndaalo khulwe siianwa sie khurusia bubwoni; lundi euunwa ne limiiku biikhalikho buubi bwosi bwosi tawe bilaanwa.
Khu ndaalo saba mulaana siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni khu alutare ne khukitakaasa; khwako mulakira alubeka khu Mwami Wele.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne mumalile chindaalo chino, nio khukhwama endaalo eya munaane khuchiililila, basaayi bakhaane khu alutare biianwa bie khukhwosia nende bie kumuleembe, ne Ese ndamufukiilila enywe.”

Nio omundu oyo aambila khu silibwa sie nje, siaba lubeka lwe bukwe lwe Lukaangu. Silibwa esio siaba sisiikale.
Aamboolela ali, “Silibwa sino silarama sisiikale, se silekulibwa tawe, se aliio olabiriramo tawe. Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli abiriiremo; khwako silarama sisiikale.
Omwami yeng'ene niye oonyala ekhalamo mala aliilamo siakhulia ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Alengilamo ne khurura mu silibwa siicha mukari.”
Nio omundu oyo ambisilia mu silibwa sie bunaswa ebweeni we Lukaangu; nalola mala nabona luyali lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lwechuule Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi; mala nakwa mafumala.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, lola bulayi, bona ne chimoni chowo wamwene, ulila ne kamaru kowo koosi niko nja khu khuboolela khuloondekhana ne bulayi bwabo banyala bafukiililwa mu Lukaangu nende abo bakhafukiililwamo tawe.
“Boolela babaandu ba Isiraeli be sileka oli, Ese Omwami WELE Omunyali Owa Bioosi, se ndekhaliilikha bibiindu biibi nibio bakholanga ebio tawe.
Banyaalutiisie Lukaangu lwase khulwe khufukiilila bakeni, babaandu bakhafukiilila Ese tawe, khukhwingila abuundu wase atakatifu; siise nisio balikho baaana khwise siakhulia siase, kiminawa ne kamalasile. Babaandu base, bafunake endakaano yase khulwe khukhola bibiindu biibi bino.
Se bemeleele kimilimo kimitakatifu kino mu Lukaangu lwase tawe, ne kakhali bafukiliile bakeni khukhwimeelela mu bweyaangu bwabwe.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Se aliio omundu owe sikeni, osiili khukhebwa namwe okhafukiilila Ese, oolacha mu Lukaangu lwase akhaba ne ali omukeni owamenya mu Baisiraeli tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Ndikho mbaana siuukuumo khu Balawi abo, alala ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ba banjanjukha baacha khukhwinamila bifwaani.
Banyala bandumikhira busa mu Lukaangu, khulwe khuliinda bilibwa ne khukhola kimilimo kikiindi kie mu Lukaangu. Banyala beera chisaang'i nicho babaandu bareerire nga chimbosio che khukhwosia, mala khukhwola babe khu milimo khuyeeta babaandu.
Ne sikila bemeelela babaandu ba Isiraeli mu khwinamila bifwaani, mala mu ngila yino bayila babaandu mu bumayaanu; Ese Omwami WELE nechuba ndi ndabaelesia siuukuumo.
Se bandumikhira nga basaayi namwe bache embi ne sisiindu siosi siosi siili sitakatifu khwise namwe bache abuundu atakatifu lukali tawe. Sino nisio siuukuumo nisio balanyoola khuloondekhana nende niko bakhola.
Ndikho mbaelesia kimilimo mitiiti kino bakholenge mu Lukaangu.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ne kakhali basaayi balawi, ba okhwa Satoki, ba baaba babemeelesi mu Lukaangu lwase, siise nisio babaandu ba Isiraeli baba ne banjauukhekho, babenabo balecha mala bandumikhire, mala balaambanila kamafura ne kamalasile.
Balengila mu Lukaangu lwase, mala besende khu mesa yase khukhundumikhira mala balaba babemeelesi.
Nga bengila mu bilibwa bie khucha mu nja che mukari, bakhafware chingubo cha katani, se bakhabekho ne chingubo che bufuumbo tawe, siise nisio bakhabe ne bakhola kumulimo kuno mu bilibwa bie mu luya lwe mukari nende chili siimbi.
Bakhabe ne bilemba bia katani khu mirwe kiabwe ne chisirwari mu bibuno biabwe. Sebaleboa sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala siareera lukesi tawe.
Ne bacha enje we luuya niio babaandu bali balafwarura chingubo nicho babele nacho, mala bachire mu siro chindakatifu, mala bafware chingubo chabwe bakhakhola bario barera butinyu khu baandu khubirira khu ngubo chabwe tawe.
‘Basaayi se bakhabeke lichuune namwe balekhe lilee tawe. Khukhwola babe ne lichuune likhali lileeyi namwe liliimbi tawe.
Basaayi bakhanywakho endali yosi yosi nakhacha mu luuya lwe mukari tawe.
Omusaayi yesi yesi akhayila omukhasi owalekhana no museecha tawe. Khukhwola ayile omukhaana owe yabwana owe kholo eya Isiraeli namwe namulekhwa wo musaayi.’
Nga kamayiingamo kang'ali ne kabao basaayi bakhakhalake khuloondekhana ne kamalaka. Balaloonda naikara eye dini khuloondekhana ne kamalaka mala balaria esabato endakatifu.”
Enyuma we khutila khu mufu, alaliinda chindaalo saba, oli chaweele aba nono alaba omukwalaafu.
Ne khu ndaalo niyo achila abuundu atakatifu, mu luuya lwe mukari khukhola kimilimo kio mwami, alaana siianwa siewe sie bumayaanu. Omwami WELE alomaloome.
Balalia biianwa bie biakhulia, biianwa bie bumayaanu, nende bie khukhweyama kamabi na buli siindu siianwa khuuba sitakatifu siikhabe sisiabwe.
Nabuli likesa lia buli siindu lie khunyoa, na buli siianwa sia buli siindu, khukhwama mwinywe, bikhabe bie basaayi. Lundi mukhae basaayi siakhulia sie khunyoa nio chikhabi chibe ne nju yenywe.
Basaayi se bakhalie sisiindu siosi siosi sifwiile ebeele enyuni namwe esaang'i efwiile eng'ene namwe nisio esaang'i yirire tawe.”

Ne mukabanamo kamaloba khuloondekhana nende buli kholo, sitonyi silala silaebwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Kamaloba buleeyi chikilomita likhumi na chibili ne nusu, ne bukhiikha chikilomita likhumi, kano koosi kalaba kamatakatifu.
Mu sibaanga sino, khulabao ne kamaloba ke Lukaangu buleeyi ne bukhiikha chimita chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano buli lubeka. Silabotookhelelwa ne bubwangu chimita kamakhumi kabili na chiraano.
Enusu eye sino, chimita likhumi na chibili ne siwanja nusu khu mita chiraano silarusibwakho, ano niio Lukaangu lukhabe, abuundu atakatifu khukhila oosi.
Ano akhabe atakatifu mu maloba aaroborwa khuuba we basaayi, bakholela OMWAMI Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu Lukaangu.
Enusu eramire khukhwola sirwe alubeka khu balawi nga kumukabwa kwabwe, abo baakhola kimilimo mu Lukaangu. Khukhabeo ne chingoba chabwe che khumenyamo.
Khuloondela abuundu atakatifu, enusu ekiindi buleeyi chikilomita likhumi na chibili ne nusu ne bukhiikha chikilomita chibili ne nusu siikharwe alubeka khulwe lukoba ne yesi yesi Omuisiraeli anyala amenyao.
Kamaloba kalarwa lundi alubeka khu mwami; khukhwama elubeka we lulwakha lwe mumbo we abuundu atakatifu khukhwola emwalo mu nyanja eya Mediterenia, ne khukhwama khu lwakha lwe bukwe, kakhoole khu ndulo khwe bukwe khwe sibala nio buleeyi bube busa nga buleeyi bwe kamaloba niko baelesia ekholo eya Isiraeli.
Abuundu ano alaba sitonyi sio mwami mu sibala sia Isiraeli, nio alekhe khukhuupia siibi babaandu, ne kakhali alalekha sibala sioosi, sibe sie Baisiraeli khuloondekhana ne chikholo chabwe.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Ee babaami ba Isiraeli, khe mwakamile ao! Lekha burafu ne khukhuupia babaandu siibi, mala mukhole bung'ali ne buluungi, lekha khuuyisia babaandu base; Ese OMWAMI Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
Efa eye khupiima siakhulia sisioomu, eleekhaana nende ebaasi eye khupiima kamafura. Biombi bili nende sitonyi silala khwikhumi sie homeri ndala.
Khupiima busiro khulaba khuri: Chingera kamakhumi kabili chileekhaana nende eshekeli ndala, chishekeli kamakhumi sita chileekhaana nende emina ndala.
Bino nibio bipiimilo nibio mukhaanilengekho biianwa bienywe: Sitonyi silala khu sita sie efa khukhwama mu homeri ndala eye ngaanu, nende sitonyi silala khu sita sie efa khukhwama mu homeri ndala eye shayiri.
Sipiimo sie kamafura silaba siri: Ebaasi ndala eye kamafura khukhwama mu buli kori (ekori ndala eleekhaana nende ehomeri ndala eeli nga chibaasi ekhumi).
Likheese lilala khukhwama mu lituuli lie kamakheese chimia chibili mumaayilwe ka Isiraeli.
“Enywe mularera biianwa bie bibiaamo, biianwa bie khukhwosia, nende biianwa bie kumuleembe, nio bumayaanu bwolaane khurusibwao. Ese Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi nalomile.
“Babaandu boosi be sibala, bakhaane biianwa bino khu mwami owe mu Isiraeli.
Kukhabe kumulimo kwo mwami khuaana biianwa bie khukhwosia, bibiaamo bie khunywa mu chinaikara, bie kumwesi ne kubalukha, nende bie chisabato, mu buli naikara eye nju eya Isiraeli. Akhaane biianwa bie khurusiao bubwoni, biianwa bie bibiaamo, bie khukhwosia, nende bie kumuleembe, nio bumayaanu burusibwe khu nju eya Isiraeli.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa, khu mweesi kwe khunyoa, mulareera euunwa ekhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe mala mukwalaasie abuundu wase atakatifu.
Omusaayi alabukula kamalasile malala ke siianwa sie khurusio bubwoni mala akaakhe khu bisiindi bie kimiliango kie Lukaangu, khu koona chine cha alutare, ne khu bisiindi bie silibwa siicha mu luya lwe mukari.
Khu ndaalo eya saba eye kumwesi, mulakhola murio, khu buli mundu oonyala aaba ne akholile bubwoni nibwo akheteekile khukhola tawe, namwe mu khukorwa. Mu ngila yino, mukwalaasie enju yo Mwami Wele.
Khu ndaalo ng'ene eyo, omwami khukhwola aane euunwa nga embosio eye khurusiao bubwoni bwewe nende bwe babaandu boosi.
Buli khu ndaalo mu ndaalo saba che naikara, alaana chiuunwa saba che chimbosio, ne kamamiiku saba kakhalimo buubi bwosi bwosi tawe khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala oosie bioosi. Lundi alaana endurume buli ndaalo nga siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni.
Khu buli uunwa nende buli limiiku nilio baanile nga embosio, mulaba ne biianwa bie efa ndala ndala eye siakhulia sisioomu nende ehini ndala eye kamafura khu buli efa eye siakhulia sisioomu.

Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Silibwa sie luuya lwe mukari, sisialoleelela ebukwe sikharame sisiikale khu ndaalo sita che kimilimo, ne kakhali endaalo eye sabato, ne endaalo niyo kumwesi kubalukhile sikhekulibwe.
Omwami akhabiriremo khukhwama mu luya lwe mukari khukhwama enje, mala eme khusisiindi sie silibwa. Basaayi bakhaane siianwa sie khukhwosia nende sisiewe sie kumuleembe, lundi alasaayila embi ne silibwa. Nio ache enje, ne kakhali silibwa sesilekalwa tawe khukhwola ekolooba.
Babaandu be sibala bakhenaamile OMWAMI Wele Omunyali owa Bioosi mu silibwa chindaalo che sabato nende chindaalo nicho kumwesi kubalukhilakho.
“Khu ndaalo eya sabato omwami alareera khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kamameeme sita ne limiiku bikhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe nga biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Ne khu buli limiiku alareererakho siianwa sie siakhulia sisioomu efa ndala; bibili ebio bilaba sikelo siosi siosi nisio eenya khuaana alala nende ehini ndala eye kamafura khu buli efa eye siakhulia sisioomu.
Khu ndaalo eye khukhwekhoyela kumwesi khubalukha, alaana euunwa endoro ekhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe, alala ne kamameeme sita nende limiiku lilala bikhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Ne buli uunwa nende buli limiiku bilaanwa alala nende efa ndala eye siakhulia sisioomu ne kamameeme sikelo nisio eenya, alala nende ehini ndala eye kamafura khu buli efa ndala eye siakhulia sisioomu.
Omwami ne engilamo, khukhwola abirire mu silibwa sie lusiro lwe khufwaaruriramo mala alure enje khu ngila eng'ene.
“Nga babaandu ne beecha khusaaya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu ndaalo yosi yosi eye khoyo, abo babengilila mu silibwa sie bunaswa, balarurira mu silibwa sie siafubo ne bamalile khusaaya. Ne abo babengilila mu silibwa sie siafubo balarurira mu silibwa sie bunaswa. Akhabakhoo yesi yesi orurira mu silibwa nisio echeelemo tawe; khukhwola arurire nikhwo akhecheele tawe.
Omwami aleecha siise nisio babaandu bosi bechelakho lundi alarura siise nisio barurirakho.
Khu ndaalo cha naikara ne khukhwekhoya, siianwa sie siakhulia sisioomu silaba efa ndala nende euunwa ne limiiku, ne sikelo siosi siosi eenya khuaana alala nende ehini ndala eye kamafura khu buli efa ndala eye siakhulia sisioomu.
“Omwami oolikho, ne eenya khuaana siianwa sie khukhwerusia khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia namwe sie kumuleembe, silibwa sie bukwe nisio bengilila mu luya lwe mukari, sileekulwa abiriremo. Alaana siianwa mu ngila niyo aanilangamo khu ndaalo eya sabato, ne silibwa sileekalwa ne amalile khururiramo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Buli mutikhinyi limeeme liili kumwiiko mulala liikhali ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe, liloosibwa lioosi nga siianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Siianwa sino khukhwola sirusibwe buli ndaalo.
Lundi siianwa sie siakhulia sisioomu buli mutikhinyi, sitonyi silala khu sita sie efa eye buufu, nende sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie hini eye kamafura khuolaosia buufu. Kamalaka ke siianwa sino kali ke biise bioosi.
Khwako limeeme, buufu, ne kamafura, bilaanwa buli mutikhinyi nga siianwa sie khukhwosia sia buli khase.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Omwami ne aana kamaloba khu mwana wewe owe siseecha nga kumukabwa kwewe, kalaba kakewe; sikila kali kumukabwa kwe nju yabwe.
Ne kakhali omwami ne aana kamaloba khu mukholi wewe yesi, kalaba kakewe khukhwola kumwiiko kwewe kwe khueebwa bulekhuule mala kamaloba ako kakobolele omwami oyo. Babaana bewe bong'ene niibo banyala baaba nako biise bioosi.
Omwami akhabukulakho ne kamaani kamaloba ke kumukabwa kosi kosi khu mundu tawe. Kamaloba niko aelesia omwana wewe khukhwola kabe niko omwene yesi aeebwa, nio akhaapia siibi babaandu base khulwe khubanuula kamaloba tawe.”
Nio omundu oyo aambisilia khu ngila eyaba alubeka we silibwa, ebunaswa we chisiro che basaayi chindakakatifu chichaloondekhana. Aanjekesia abuundu lubeka lwe mumbo lwe chisiro
mala aaloma ali, “Abuundu ano niio basaayi bakhateekhele chinyama nicho baanile nga siianwa sie bumayaanu namwe siianwa sie khurusiao bubwoni, ne khuteekha siianwa sie siakhulia sisioomu, nio sisiindu siosi siosi siili sitakatifu sikhasutwakho siacha enje khu luuya lwe enje niyo sinyala siaumisia babaandu tawe.”
Nio omundu oyo lundi aandeera khu luya lwe enje, mala andangirira khukhwola mu koona chine che luuya, mala buli koona yaba ne luuya lwayo;
mu koona chine che luuya chitekanilila, buli koona yaba ne luuya litiiti, buleeyi chimita kamakhumi kabili, ne bukhiikha chimita ekhumi na chiraano.
Buli luuya lutiiti lulala lwaba lwabotookhelesibwa ne khasiisi khe kamabaale ne kamaika asi we khasiisi.
Omundu chana aamboolela ali, “Chino chili chichikoni nicho bakholi be mu Lukaangu bakhateekhelemo biianwa nibio babaandu baana.”

Omundu oyo aambila enje we Lukaangu khubirira mu silibwa sie bunaswa, mala ambotookhelesia khukhwola mu silibwa sisialoleelela ebukwe. Kameechi kaba beele karurira lubeka lwe siafubo.
Omundu oyo apiima ne sipiimilo chimita chimia chiraano buleeyi khucha asi lubeka lwe bukwe, mala aambisilia mu meechi ako. Kameechi koola busa mu kheng'engele.
Nio aapiima lundi chimita chimia chiraano mala aambisilia mu meechi ako. Kameechi koola mu masikamo. Lundi aapiima chimita chichiindi chimia chiraano, mala aambisilia mu meechi ako. Kameechi koola mu sibuno.
Lundi aapiima chimita chimia chiraano, ne abwenao lwaba luluuchi nilwo khaanyala khukhwambukha tawe. Lwaba lusiba lukali mbo se onyala khukhwambukha busa ne okhasokile tawe.
Aamboolela ali, “Mwana wo mundu, loleelela bino bioosi bulayi bubwene.”
Nio omundu oyo, aangobosia khu lukuku lwe luluuchi,
ne nga noolakho nabona kimirongooro kimikali khu lukuku chimbeka chombi.
Aamboolela ali, “Kameechi kano kabira mu sibala khukhwola ebukwe mala koola mu litooma lia Yoritani ne khuchukha mu Nyanja eya Chumbe. Ne nga koola mu nyanja, kakaluukhania kameechi ka chumbe ne kaba kameechi kamalayi.
Osi osi niio luluuchi lucha, khukhabe ne chisaang'i cha buli lukano ne ching'eeni. Luluuchi luno lulakhola kameechi ke Nyanja eya Chumbe kabe kamalayi, ne osi osi niio kacha kalareerao bulamu.
Khukhwama khu sebele cha Engedi khukhwola khu sebele cha Engalaimu, khukhabe ne balobi khu ndulo khwe nyanja, mala bakhaanikhile chindiimba chabwe ao. Khukhabe ne ching'eeni chingali cha buli lukano nga chiili mu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Ne kakhali kameechi ke lureende ne kamatiisi kaali khu ndulo khwe nyanja se kakhabe kamalayi tawe. Kakharameo busa kabe nga sinoko sia chumbe.
Khu ndulo khwe luluuchi, kimirongooro kikhamelekho kia buli lukano kibe kie siakhulia. Kamasaafu kakio se kaliniaala tawe, ne se kililekha khukhwama kamatuunda tawe. Kikhabe ne kamatuunda kamaana buli mwesi, sikila kinyoolanga kameechi khukhwama mu Lukaangu. Kimirongooro kikhaame kamatuunda, ne kamasaafu nako kakhabe kamalesi.”
Omwami WELE aloma ali, “Chino nicho chinjakha che sibala, siikhakabwemo khu kholo ekhumi na chibili, ne kholo eya Yosefu ekhanyoole chimbeka chibili.
Ese nalakiilisa bakukaao lukali ndi khabaelesie sibala sino; nono kabana buleekhaane.
“Luno nilwo lulaba lulwakha lwe sibala: Ebunaswa, khukhwama khu nyanja eya Mediterenia, khubirira khu lukoba lwa Hetiloni, khukhwola Hamatipasi ne khuchiililila khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Setati.
Khukhwama ao lulacha mu ngoba cha Berota ne Siburaimu (luli akari wa Damasika ne Hamati) khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Haseri-hatikoni luuli khu lwakha lwa Haurani.
Khwako lulwakha lulaama Mediterenia ne kucha engaaki khukhwola khu lukoba lwa Hasari-enoni, luuli ebunaswa we lulwakha lwa Damasika, ne lulwakha ebunaswa.
“Lubeka lwe bukwe, akari wa Haurani ne Damasika, khuloonda luluuchi lwa Yoritani akari we sibala sia Isiraeli lubeka lwe mumbo ne Kileati, khukhwola Tamari khu Nyanja eya chumbe.
“Lulwakha lwe siafubo lulaamila Tamari khukhwola abuundu we kameechi mu Meriba-kateshi. Ne lubeka lwe akari we siafubo ne mumbo, embi ne lulwakha lwa Misiri khukhwola khu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
“Lulwakha lwe lubeka lwe mumbo lulaba enyanja eya Mediterenia mala luniine luche ebunaswa khukhwola abuundu e aaloleelana ne abuundu khukhwingila mu Lebo-hamati.
“Khwako mulakabana sibala sino khuloondekhana ne chikholo chenywe cha Isiraeli.
Silaba kumukabwa kwenywe buli lwosi. Baakwa bosi bamenyile nanywe, babasaalila babaana mu sibala sienywe, bosi bakhanyoole kumukabwa kwabwe ne mukabana sibala. Mukhababukule busa nga Baisiraeli basienywe mu ngila choosi, lundi mukhabaelesie kumukabwa ne khukabana nabo bulayi bwene nga ne mukabana ne Baisiraeli.
Baakwa babaandi ba bamumenyamo bakhanyoole kumukabwa kwabwe alala ne babaandu be kholo niyo bamenyilemo. Ese Omwami WELE nalomile.”

Kano niko kamasina ke chikholo: Khurakikhira khu lwakha lwe ebunaswa khu muyila kwa Hetiloni, khukhwama Lebo-hamati, khukhwola e Hasari-enoni (lukoba luuli khu lwakha lwa Damasika ne Hamati ebunaswa). Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Dani.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Dani, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Asheri.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Asheri, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Nafutali.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Nafutali, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Manase.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Manase, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Efuraimu.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Efuraimu, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Rubeni.
Khukhwamilila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Rubeni, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka luno lulaba lwe kholo eya Yuda.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Yuda, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Lubeka luno lulabaandwa; bukhiikha chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano, ne buleeyi butekanilile ne buleeyi bwe kamaloba ke kholo ndalakho, ebukwe khukhwola mumbo. Abuundu atakatifu alaba akari.
Lukoongo nilwo mulabaanda khulwo Mwami Wele lulaba chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano buleeyi ne chimita chielefu ekhumi bukhiikha.
Lukoongo lutakatifu lulakabwamo luri: Basaayi balanyoola abuundu wabwe chimita ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano lubeka lwe bunaswa, bukhiikha chimita chielefu chiraano lubeka lwe mumbo, bukhiikha chimita chielefu chiraano lubeka lwe bukwe, ne buleeyi chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano lubeka lwe siafubo. Abuundu atakatifu wo Mwami Wele alaba akari.
Lukoongo luno lulaba lwe basaayi babarwa alubeka khulwe khukholela Omwami Wele, be lisaaye lia Satoki. Abo babakholela Ese mu busuubilifu enyuma we Baisiraeli khu khuundurakho nga Balawi bosi baakhola.
Abuundu ano alaba kamaloba kabwe bong'ene khukhwama khu maloba kamatakatifu ke lukoongo olwo. Abuundu atakatifu lukali khukhwama khu lukoongo lwe Balawi.
Khu lukoongo lwe basaayi, Balawi balanyoola abuundu wabwe chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano buleeyi, ne bukhiikha chielefu chiraano. Buleeyi bwoosi bulaba chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano ne bukhiikha chimita chimita chielefu chiraano.
Se bakhakusiekho namwe bakhole bukulaani khu sitonyi siosi siosi sia abuundu ao tawe. Bakhakabakho omundu yesi yesi kamaloba ke abuundu aarobore ano tawe, sikila ali abuundu wa Wele atakatifu.
Lubeka lusikaale chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chiraano bukhiikha nende chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano buleeyi, akhabe abuundu we khukholelao bibiindu bie mulukoba, abuundu niio babaandu bamenyile nende e mikuunda. Lukoba lulaba akari.
Buboofu bwe lukoba lulaba luri: Chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano ebunaswa, chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano siafubo, chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano ebukwe, nende chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano mumbo.
Lukoba lulaba ne siwanja: chimita emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ebunaswa, chimita emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na chiraano siabubo, chimita emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili na chiraano ebukwe, nende chimita chimia chibili ne kamakhumi kabili na chiraano mumbo.
Lubeka lusikaale khuloonda kamaloba kamatakatifu alaba chimita chielefu chiraano ebukwe, nende chimita chielefu chiraano mumbo. Alaba ario khuloonda kamaloba kamatakatifu. Ano alaba abuundu we bulimi bwe biakhulia khu bakholi be mu lukoba.
Bakholi be mu lukoba abo, khukhwama mu kholo choosi cha Isiraeli, bakhalimemo.
Kamaloba niko mukhabaande koosi kakhabe chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne kamakhumi karaano buli lubeka khutekaniilila. Ano aba khwareere alala lubeka lwe kamaloba kamatakatifu ne lubeka lwe lukoba.
Kamaloba kasikala chimbeka chombi che kamaloba kamatakatifu ne abuundu we lukoba kalaba ko muruki. Khukhwamila niio chimita chielefu ekhumi na chibili ne chimia chiraano che kamaloba kamatakatifu chiweela khukhwola khu lwakha lwe bukwe; ne khulola mumbo khukhwamila niio chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chiraano chiweela khu lwakha lwe mumbo, khuloondekhana ne kamaloba ke chikholo. Abuundu ano alaba wo muruki. Kamaloba kamatakatifu nende abuundu atakatifu akari wako,
nende abuundu we Balawi ne lukoba bilaba akari we kamaloba ko muruki. Kamaloba ko muruki kalaba akari we lukoongo lwa Yuda ne lukoongo lwa Benjamini.
Chikholo chichiindi: Khukhwamila ebukwe khukhwola mumbo; lubeka olwo lulaba lwe kholo eya Benjamini.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Benjamini, khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo; lubeka luno lulaba lwe kholo eya Simioni.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Simioni, khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo; lubeka luno lulaba lwe kholo eya Isakari.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Isakari, khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo; lubeka luno lulaba lwe kholo eya Sebuluni.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Sebuluni, khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo; lubeka luno lulaba lwe kholo eya Kati.
Khukhwamila khu lukoongo lwe kholo eya Kati siafubo, lulwakha lukhabire khukhwama Tamari khukhwola abuundu we kameechi ka Meriba-kateshi; ne khubira ebukwe wa Misiri lwoole khu nyanja eya Mediterenia.
Kano niko kamaloba niko mukhakabemo nga kumukabwa khu kholo cha Isiraeli; kano niko kamaloba kabwe. Omwami WELE aalomile.
bilibwa bitaru. Bino bili silibwa sia Rubeni, silibwa sia Yuda, ne silibwa sia Lawi. Bilibwa bino biaalaangwa kamasina ke chikholo cha Isiraeli.
Lubeka lwe bukwe, luulaba buleeyi chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, bilibwa bitaru. Bino bili silibwa sia Yosefu, silibwa sia Benjamini, ne silibwa sia Dani.
Lubeka lwe siafubo, luulaba buleeyi chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, bilibwa bitaru. Bino bili silibwa sia Simioni, silibwa sia Isakari, ne silibwa sia Sebuluni.
Lubeka lwe mumbo, luulaba buleeyi chimita chielefu chibili ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi karaano, bilibwa bitaru. Bino bili silibwa sia Kati, silibwa sia Asheri, ne silibwa sia Nafutali.
Buleeyi khubotookhelela lukoba bulaba chimita chielefu tisa. Lisina lie lukoba khukhwamila siise esio khukhwola libe: “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ebweeneyo.”

Omwami Wele ara Yehoyakimu omwami owa Yuda, mu bunyali bwa Nebukadinesa, alala nende bibiindu bilalakho bie nju eya Wele. Nebukadinesa acha nabio mu sibala sia Shinari, abibiikha munju eya wele wewe.
Nio omwami alaka Ashipenasi, omwimeelesi omukhulu owe lichipi liewe, areere mwichipi omwo balala khu baele Baisiraeli babaama munju eye bubwami, ne chinju che lukoosi.
Benyekha babe baele bakhalikho ne libi liosi lioso tawe, be lukoondo lulayi, barekeerefu mu bukesi bwoosi, be limanya, ne liiulila mu mekisio, banyala bakhola mu lichipi lio mwami khulwe khukhweyika khusoma ne khuandika lulomo lwe Bababiloni.
Omwami aabaelesia sitonyi buli ndaalo khu biakhulia binulu nibio alichanga ne khu ndali niyo aanywechanga. Baele abo benyibwa bekisibwe khu miiko kitaru, mala bayilwe ebweeni wo mwami.
Mwabo baba Danieli, Hanania, Mishaeli, ne Asaria, boosi be kholo eya Yuda.
Nio omukholi omukhulu abatiuukha kamasina: Danieli amulaanga ali Beliteshasa, Hanania ali Shaduraka, Mishaeli amulaanga Meshaka, ne Asaria amulaanga ali Abedineko.
Ne kakhali Danieli abisia ali se alenyaalutia khulwe khulia siakhulia silayi sio mwami ne khunywa endali yewe tawe. Khwako asaba omwimeelesi omukhulu ali niye akhalia bibiindu ebio enyaalutie tawe.
Nio Wele akhola omwimeelesi omukhulu akholela Danieli siisa. Danieli aaba ne liifukiililwa mumoni cho mwimeelesi oyo.
Nio omwimeelesi omukhulu aboolela Danieli ali, “Neendekheleele sikila omwami wase owakhalaka biakhulia nende bie khunywa bienywe alabona ali muli batekhele khukhila baele basienywe. Khwako mulakhola omwami anjire.”
Nio Danieli aboolela omuliindi niye Ashipenasi arakho khumuliinda niye ne Hanania, Mishaeli ne Asaria ali,
“Nosiima khaka bakholi bowo khu ndaalo ekhumi. Khemukhuelesie chinyenyi che kamasafu busa ne kameechi.
Enyuma wako ewe kelaania lilolekha liefwe ne lilolekha lie baele balia khu biakhulia binulu bio mwami, mala okhole khu bakholi bowo khuloondekhana nga ne olabona.”
Abafukiilila babakhake bario khu ndaalo ekhumi.
Enyuma we chindaalo ekhumi, balolekhana khuuba balayi lundi banefu khukhila baele boosi babalichanga biakhulia bio omwami.
Nio omukholi arusiao biakhulia bilayi ne ndali eye khunywa, mala abaelesia chinyenyi.
Wele aelesia basoleeli bane abo bukesi ne bubwikhochochi mu biindu bioosi bie khuandikwa, ne limanya. Khutasa khwako, Danieli amanya khubuula bifuno bie kamalola ne kamarooro koosi.
Nga siise nisio omwami akhalaka khu Ashipenasi khureera basoleeli abo ebweeni wewe siola, omwimeelesi owe lichipi oyo areera basoleeli abo ebweeni wo mwami Nebukadinesa.
Omwami alomaloma nabo boosi, ne khwaabo boosi, se anyoolekhakho owaba nga Danieli, Hanania, Mishaeli, ne Asaria tawe. Khwako bekela bakholi bo mwami.
Mala omwami nga aabareebanga mu makhuwa koosi kakenyekha limanya ne bukhalaki bulayi, abona ali bali balayi lukali mala bakhila khukhwola ekhumi be kamayia ne bafumu boosi mu bwami bwewe mwoosi.
Danieli achiililila khukhola kimilimo mu lichipi lio mwami khukhwola kumwiiko kwe khunyoa kwo mwami Sairasi.

Mu mwiiko kwa khabili mu bwami bwa Nebukadinesa, Nebukadinesa aba ne kamarooro. Eendekhelela lukali mala arengecha.
Nio omwami akhalaka ali be kamayia, bafumu, balakusi ne Bababiloni beche khuulila kamarooro kewe. Becha mala bema ebweeni wewe.
Omwami ababoolela ali, “Ese ndoorire kamarooro. Neendekheleele nenya manye sifuno siako.”
Nio Bababiloni bakobosia omwami mu Luaramaiki bali, “Ee omwami, indila miiko na mindali! Khuboolele efwe bakholi bowo kamarooro ako, ne efwe nafwe khulakhuboolela sifuno siako.”
Omwami aboolela Bababiloni ali, “Nakhalake likhuwa ndi: ne mukhamboolela kamarooro ako ne sifuno siako tawe, mulatonywamo bitonyi, ne chinju chenywe chilonakwa sio.
Ne mwamboolela kamarooro ako ne sifuno siako, ndamuelesia biianwa bilayi ne lukoosi lukhilao. Khwako mboolele kamarooro ako ne sifuno siako.”
Bamukobosia lwe khabili bali, “Omwami khuboolele kamarooro ne efwe khulakhuboolela sifuno siako.”
Omwami abakobosia ali, “Manyile ndi mu bung'ali mulenyanga khumala biise, sikila mwaboone muli ese nakhalakile elala nilio ndakhola.
Ne mukhamboolela kamarooro kabeele siina tawe, nakhalaake sisiindu silala siong'ene khwinywe. Mwafukiilisiaane khuloma ebweeni wase bubeeyi ne kamakhuwa ke khu khundiimia ese khukhwola nga bibiindu ne bikaluukhana. Khwako mboolele kamarooro, nio manye ndi munyala mwamboolela sifuno siako.”
Bababiloni bakobosia omwami bali, “Se aliio omundu khu sibala onyala abuula niko omwami enya kano tawe. Sikila se aliio omwami owe bunyali namwe owe kamaani owareebakho sisiindu siri khu be kamayia namwe bafumu, namwe Bababiloni tawe.
Sisiindu nisio omwami areeba sili sitinyu lukali. Ne se aliio onyala asiekesia omwami tawe ne bakhali bawele bakhamenyile ne babaandu tawe.”
Mu khuulila kano, omwami Nebukadinesa aambwa ne lisinyikha likali, mala akhalaka ali babaandu bakesi boosi mu Babiloni berwe.
Nio lilaka liarusibwa khu bakesi boosi berwe, akhaba Danieli ne basaale bewe bayiimwe berwe.
