Nio Danieli, mu bukesi ne burekeerefu, akobosia Arioki, omukhulu owe baliindi bo mwami, lundi owaebwa kimilimo kie khukhwira bakesi ba Babiloni.
Areeba Arioki ali, “Siina sikila lilaka lio mwami ne lili lirafu lirio? Nio Arioki aboolela Danieli koosi kakekholekha.”
Nio Danieli acha areeba omwami amuelesie biise, nio aboolele omwami sifuno sie kamarooro kewe.
Mala Danieli acha engo wewe aboolela basaale bewe Hanania, Mishaeli ne Asaria.
Ababoolela basabe siisa khukhwama khu Wele owe mwikulu khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ke mu bwikisi kano nio Danieli ne babasie bakheerwa alala ne bakesi be mu Babiloni tawe.
Nio kamakhuwa ke mu bwikisi kano kabuulikha khu Danieli mu malola mu silo. Nio Danieli afumia Wele owe mwikulu.
Danieli aloma ali,
“Lisina lia Wele lieebwe luyali mindali na mindali.
Ali owe limanya ne bunyali.
Akaluukhasianga biise,
amiyaanga babaami ne khubalekhesia lundi
aananga limanya khu be limanya
ne bukesi khwaabo be liiulila.
Abuulululanga bibiindu bie mukari lukali bibiekisa lukali,
amanyile biili mu siilima,
ne buwaanga buli naye.
Khwiwe Ee Wele we bakuuka baase.
Khupila orio ne khu khufumia
sikila wambelesia bukesi ne kamaani
ne khumanyisia nisio khusabile
sikila wakhwekeesie kamakhuwa ko mwami.”
Nio Danieli acha khu Arioki, niye omwami alaka khukhwira babaandu bakesi ba Babiloni. Acha amuboolela ali, “Mukheera babaandu bakesi ba Babiloni tawe. Mbile wo mwami, ne nja khumuboolela sifuno sie kamarooro kewe.”
Nio Arioki ayila Danieli ebweeni wo mwami Nebukadinesa khangu, mala amuboolela ali, “Omwami, nanyoolile omundu mu baambe babaama Yuda onyala aboolela omwami sifuno sie kamarooro kewe.”
Omwami areeba Danieli oolaangwa Beliteshasa ali, “Onyala wamboolela kamarooro niko ndoorire ne sifuno siako ku?”
Danieli akobosia omwami ali, “Se baliio babaandu bakesi, be kamayia, bafumu namwe bamenieelesi be ching'enieesi banyala bekesia omwami ke liiukia niko omwami areebire tawe.
Ne kakhali aliio Wele mwikulu, obulululanga kakekisa koosi, mala abululiile omwami Nebukadinesa kamakhuwa kakhabeo chindaalo chichiicha. Nono kamarooro kowo nende kamalola kowo, nga waba ne okona, niko kano:
“Nga waba ne olikho okona omwami, waba ne kamebaasio khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa kakhabeo mu ndaalo chichiicha. Mala Wele obuulululaanga kamakhuwa kakekisa akhwekesia kamakhuwa kalikho kacha khukhwekholekha.
Ne khwise, se kali bali ndi ne bukesi khukhila babaandu babaandi tawe. Ne kakhali nio ewe omwami onyoole khumanya sifuno sie kamarooro kowo ne kamebaasio kowo.
“Omwami mu marooro kowo wabona sifwaani sio mundu siboofu lundi sie kamaani. Sifwaani sino siaba ne buwaanga bukali. Siaba siemile ebweeni wowo mala siariisia mukhubonekhana khwasio.
Kumurwe kwe sifwaani sino kwaba kwe esahabu endayi, sifuba ne kamakhono kasio biang'oonwa ne fwesa, enda ne kamaraango biaba bie kumukasa,
ne bikele biasio biaba bie sichuuma, ne bikhandakilo biasio biaba lubeka sichuuma, ne lubeka liloba.
Nga ne waba ne osiiloleelela, libaale liakhalikha khulwe kamaani ke buwele, omundu nakhalitiililekho tawe. Liapa bikhandakilo bie sifwaani bie sichuuma ne liloba ebio mala biafunikhakamo bimesu.
Nio sichuuma esio, liloba, kumukasa, efwesa, ne sahabu bioosi alala, biafunakwa bimesu, mala biekhola nga likhuuchi khu luuya lwe khuulila buyaaya mu siimiyu. Mala ekhuungu yatamuusia bioosi, yeyelao elala sio. Ne libaale liliafunaka sifwaani liakhula liekhola sikulu siboofu siafuunikha sibala sioosi.
“Kano niko ka kaba kamarooro kowo. Nono khakhuboolele omwami sifuno siako.
Ewe omwami, oli omwami we babaami. Wele owe mwikulu akhuele bubwami, kamaani, bunyali, ne luyali.
Akhukholile ewe khuuba omuruki owe babaandu boosi, ne chisaang'i che mundaa, ne chinyuni che mungaaki oosi oosi niio bili. Ewe niwe kumurwe kwe esahabu okwo!
Enyuma wowo, buliicha bubwami bubuundi, ne kakhali bukhabe bukeekhe khu bwowo. Buno bukhaloondelwe ne bubwami bwe khataru buufwaananisibwa ne kumukasa. Bubwami buno bukhamiie sibala sioosi.
Ne bulabao bubwami bwa khane, bwe kamaani nga sichuuma. Ne bulayi bwene nga sichuuma ne sifunakanga ne khubulungula buli siindu, bubwami buno bukhafunakake ne khubulungula bubwami butaayi bwoosi.
Bikhandakilo ne chinjala bibiaba lubeka sichuuma ne lubeka liloba biekesia bili bubwami buno bukhabe ne bubwabukhani.
Lubeka lulala lukhabe ne kamaani nga sichuuma ne luluundi lukhabe lutekhele nga liloba.
Ne nga wabona sichuuma ne situbaana ne liloba, kario bakhatubaane alala mu khukhwaana. Ne se baliambaana alala tawe, nga sichuuma ne liloba ne bikhaambaananga tawe.
Ne mu siise sie babaami abo, Wele owe mwikulu aliimikha bubwami. Bubwami buno se bukhonakibwe tawe. Se alikhoo omundu yesi yesi okhabukwisie tawe. Bukhatubundule bubwami buno bwoosi butambeo, ne kakhali bubweene bukhabeo mindali na mindali.
Esio nisio sifuno sie libaale liliakhalwa khukhwama khu sikulu ne kamaani ke buwele, libaale liliapa liabulungula sifwaani sie sichuuma, kumukasa, liloba, efwesa, ne esahabu biaba bufu. Wele omukali ekeesie omwami kakhekholekhe mu ndaalo chichiicha. Kamarooro kali ka ng'ali, ne sifuno siako siolaana khusuubilwa.”
Mala omwami Nebukadinesa enama asi oola khwiloba asikamila Danieli akhalaka ali bamurusirie chimbosio ne khukhwosia bupaani buunya bulayi ebweeni wewe.
Omwami aboolela Danieli ali, “Ng'ali Wele wowo ali Wele we bawele, omwami we babaami obululuulanga ke liiukia. Sikila ewe onyalile khubuluulula ke liukia kano.”
Nio omwami aelesia Danieli luyali lwe angaaki, amuelesia biianwa biboofu bikali, amwamiia khu sibala sia Babiloni sioosi, lundi amukhola khuuba omwimeelesi we bakesi be mu Babiloni boosi.
Danieli areeba omwami ara Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko khuliinda kamakhuwa koosi ke sibala sia Babiloni. Danieli, arama mwichipi lio mwami.

Omwami Nebukadinesa aang'oona sifwaani sie esahabu. Buleeyi bwasio bwaba chimita kamakhumi kabili na munaane, ne bukhiikha siaba chimita chitaru. Aasira khu siangalaamwe sia Dura, mu sibala sia Babiloni.
Mala omwami Nebukadinesa alakiilisia ali babemeelesi be kamae, baliindi, babaami, bakaambisi, babiikhi, bakhalaki, bakayi, ne babaami babaandi boosi be bibala beche khu mulukha kwe sifwaani nisio omwami Nebukadinesa eemikha.
Nio babemeelesi be kamae, baliindi, babaami, babiikhi, bakhalaki, bakayi, ne babaami babaandi boosi be bibala, bebuusiana alala khu mulukha kwe sifwaani nisio omwami Nebukadinesa eemikha. Mala bema ebweeni we sifwaani nisio Nebukadinesa emikha esio.
Nio omupi we lulwiika alangiliila ali, “Babaandu boosi Be Chikholo ne chinimi, mwakhalakiilwe muli,
nga ne muulila lulwiika ne luupa, kumulele, siilili, endongooli, lituungu, bukhana, nende buli bie kimienya bioosi, mwenyibwa mukwe asi musaaye sifwaani sie efwesa nisio omwami Nebukadinesa emeekhe.
Ne yesi yesi okhasikama asi ne khusaaya sifwaani tawe, alamwaatwa khangu mu bunoro, mu mulilo kukwerika.”
Khwako nga, babaandu boosi ne baulila khu khuupa khwe lulwiika, kumulele, siilili, endongooli, lituungu bukhana nende bibiindu bioosi bie kimienya ne biipa, babaandu boosi, chikholo nende be chinimi chiikabukhaane bakwa asi basaaya sifwaani sie esahabu nisio omwami Nebukadinesa aaba ne emeekhe.
Mu siise esio Bababiloni balala becha basitaka Bayaudi mu sikhalikhali.
Baboolela omwami Nebukadinesa bali, “Omwami menya mindali na mindali!
Omwami ewe wabisiisie oli buli mundu oulila khu khuupa khwe lulwiika, kumulele, siilili, endongooli, lituungu, bukhana nende buli kumwenya, akwe asi asaaye sifwaani sie esahabu.
Ne omundu ookhakwa asi ne khusisaaya tawe, alamwaatwa mu bunoro, mu mulilo kukwerika.
Baliio Bayaudi babaandi nibo wara mu buliindi bwe sibala sia Babiloni: Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko. Omwami, babaandu bano se bakhuria ewe tawe. Sebakholela bawele bowo tawe, namwe se basaaya sifwaani sie esahabu nisio wemeekhe tawe.”
Nio omwami Nebukadinesa, mwirima likali, akhalaka ali Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko bareerwe. Nio bareerwa ebweeni wo mwami.
Nebukadinesa abareeba ali, “Shaduraka, Meshaka, Abedineko, kali ng'ali bali semukholela bawele base tawe, ne se musaaya sifwaani sie esahabu nisio nemeekhe tawe?
Nono nga ne mulaulila lundi khukhupa khwe lulwiika, kumulele, siilili endongooli, lituungu, bukhana nende buli bie kimwenya ne biipa, mwaba ne mukwa asi mala mwasaaya sifwaani nisio ese kholile, aba bulayi. Ne mwaloba khusisaaya, mucha khumwaatwa khangu mu bunoro bwe kumulilo kuulikho kwerika. Ne wele siina olamuonia khukhwama mu makhono kase?”
Nio Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko bamukobosia bali, “Omwami Nebukadinesa, se khuli nende nilio khu khukobosia mu makhuwa kano tawe.
Ee omwami, Kaaba bali Wele wefwe niye khukholelanga anyala khu khuonia efwe khukhwama mu bunoro bwe kumulilo kukwerika kuno ne khu khuonia khukhwama mu makhono kowo, aba lekha akhuonie.
Ne kakhaloba khuba kario tawe, Ee omwami, lekha kamanyikhane abuwaanga mbo se khulakholela bawele bowo, namwe khusaaye sifwaani sie esahabu nisio wemeekhe tawe.”
Ne kakhali omwami Nebukadinesa echula kurima, mumoni mwewe mwaba mukhalafu lukali, asinyikhwa ne khubiila Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko. Nio alaka bekelesie kumulilo kubile lukali khukhwola saba angaaki khukhila nga kubechanga.
Nio alaka babaandu be kamaani lukali mu banamae bewe be liie, khuboa Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko, ne khubamwaata mu bunoro bwe kumulilo kukwerika lukali.
Nio babaandu bano babowa ne befwarire kamakooti kabwe, chikaanjo chabwe, chikofio chabwe ne chingubo chichiindi. Bamwaatwa akarikari we bunoro bwe kumulilo kumurafu okwo.
Sikila lilaka lio mwami liaba lirafu, ne kumulilo kwaba kumurafu khubiriirira, chimemo che bunoro chosia babaandu babatiila Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko.
Nio babaandu bataru bano Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko ne baboilwe, bakwa akari we bunoro, mu mulilo kukwerika.
Nio omwami Nebukadinesa esiindukha, enyokha khangu. Mala areeba bakambisi bewe ali, “Efwe se khuboyile babaandu bataru ne khubamwaata mu bunoro ta ku?” Bakobosia omwami bali “Yee omwami”
Nio omwami ayokela mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Lola! Ndikho mbona babaandu bane, bakanguluulwe, balikho bakeenda akari mu mulilo. Ne kumulilo se kwabosiisiekho na atiiti ene tawe. Mala khubonekha khwo omundu we khane alolekha nga omwana we bawele.”
Nio Nebukadinesa acha amuliango kwe bunoro mala alaanga ali, “Shaduraka! Meshaka! Abedineko! Bakholi ba Wele owe Angaaki lukali! Rura enje! Yiicha ano!” Nio Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko, barura enje, khukhwama mu mulilo.
Nio bakhulu be kamae, baliindi, baruki ne bakambisi bo mwami bebuusia alala mala babona bali kumulilo se kwosiisiekho omundu yesi yesi tawe. Lichuune liabwe, chingubo chabwe se biayilekho tawe, namwe khuunyakho liliisi tawe.
Omwami Nebukadinesa aloma ali, “Wele owa Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko afume! Orumire malaika wewe khuonia bakholi bewe, babamusuubila. Baloba lilaka lio mwami mala beana babeene, khukhila ne basaaya ne khukholela wele yesi yesi okhali Wele wabwe yeng'ene tawe.
“Khwako ese mbisia lilaka lino: babaandu bosi bosi, ekholo, namwe lulimi lwosi lwosi balomaloma embelekeu khu Wele owa Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko balatabulwa bitonyi, ne enju yabwe elabuna. Sikila se aliio Wele okundi onyala aonia ario tawe.”
Nio omwami aelesia Shaduraka, Meshaka ne Abedineko bunyali bukali mu sibala sia Babiloni.

Omwami Nebukadinesa aruma burume buno khu baandu boosi Be Chikholo, ne chinimi che liloba.
“Mube ne kumuleembe!
Rekeeresia ke liukia kase niko Wele owe Angaaki Lukali anjekeesie.
“Bimanyisio bia Wele bili bikali po!
Ke liukia niko akhola kali ke kamaani po!
Bubwami bwewe buli bwa mindali na mindali,
buruki bwewe buliio chiselukho choosi.
“Ese Nebukadinesa, beele namenya bulayi mu lichipi liase ne khusangaalila kimiaandu kiase.
Ne kakhali siilo silala naba ne kamarooro kakakila neendekhelela lukali; nabona kamalola nga naba ne ngonile mala kamba bireengo.
Khwako nakhalaka ndi bakesi boosi mu Babiloni bareerwe khwise nio bamboolele sifuno sie kamarooro kase.
Mala be kamayia, balakusi, balosi, ne babaandu bamenieelesianga ching'enieesi, bareerwa. Nio nababoolela kamarooro kase. Ne se bamboolela sifuno siako tawe.
Mala mukhumaliilikha Danieli niye batiuukha bali Beliteshasa, lisina lia wele wase echa. Roho owe bawele batakatifu aba mu niye. Mala namuboolela kamarooro, ne ndoma ndi:
Beliteshasa, omukhulu owe babaandu be kamayia, manyile ndi roho we bawele batakatifu akhulimo, ne se lilikhoo liliekisa liili litinyu khwiwe khubuula tawe. Nono mboolele sifuno sie kamarooro kase sili siina?”
Nga naba ne ngona, kamalola kase kaba kano: Lolakho, nabona kumurongooro akari we sibala. Kwaba kumuleeyi lukali.
Kumurongooro chana kwakhula mala kwakaliya, kwalea khukhwola mwikulu. Kwabonekhana khu buli mundu mu sibala sioosi.
Kamasaafu kakwo kang'enang'ena, kwanenekha kamatuunda kamakali, kaba biakhulia khu bioosi. Chisaang'i che mundaa chamenyanga mu siiniini siakwo, chinyuni chombakha biswi mu sakia chakwo, ne bibuumbe bioosi biakulichangakho.
Nga naba ne ngonile khu sitanda, nachiililila khulola kamalola ako: omuliindi, omutakatifu ekha khukhwama mwikulu.
Alanga lukali, ne aloma ali, “Rema kumurongooro okusonjoole chisakia, ochurure kamasafu kakwo ne khusalanisia kamatuunda kakwo. Lekha chisaang'i chisalanikhe khukhwama musisina ne chinyuni khukhwama mu sakia chakwo.
Ne lekha siisina ne kimili kiakwo mwiloba, osiboe ne kumusiipi kwe sichuuma ne kumukasa, mubonga eng'ana mundaa.
“Lekha esiinge luume khukhwama mwikulu. Lekha amenye alala ne chisaang'i che mundaa, alie bunyaasi mu sichiimi.
Lekha kamebaasio kewe ko mundu kakaluukhane, abe ne kamebaasio ke saang'i khu miaka saba.
Buno nibwo bukhalaki nibwo baliindi batangaasiisie. Buli bukhalaki bwaabo baali batakatifu, nio babaandu boosi buli abuundu boole khumanya bali Wele owe Angaaki Lukali ali ne bunyali khu bwami bwoosi bwe babaandu; Niye aelesianga bubwami omundu yesi yesi niye asiimile, akhaba ne ali omutiiti owe khumalayo.”
Ese Nebukadinesa, kamarooro kano niko ndoorire. Nono ewe, Beliteshasa, mboolele sifuno siako. Sikila be bukesi boosi mu bwami bwase se banyala bamboolela tawe. Ne ewe onyala, sikila roho owe bawele batakatifu akhulimo.
Nio Danieli, oolaangwa Beliteshasa, esiindukhakho akeekhe, mala lilibaasia liewe liamunania. Omwami amuboolela ali, “Beliteshasa, okhalekha kamarooro kano namwe sifuno siako bikhuriisie tawe.”
Beliteshasa akobosia ali, “Omwami wase, Lekha kamarooro kano kabe khu bakhakhwenya tawe, ne sifuno siako khu basiku bowo!
Kumurongooro, nikwo wabona kukwakhula ne kukalia, emusie wakwo yetiila khwikulu mala kwabonekha mu sibala sioosi,
Kamasaafu kakwo kang'enang'ena, kwanenekha kamatuunda, kaba biakhulia khu bibuumbe bioosi, Chisaang'i che mu ndaa cheyikamanga mu siiniini siakwo, ne chinyuni chombakha biswi mu chisakia chakwo,
“Kuli ewe omwami. Wabeele omukali lundi oli ne kamaani. Bukali bwowo bwabalaayile ne khukhwola mwikulu ne bunyali bwowo bwafuusiisie sibala sioosi.
Mala omwami ewe waboone lundi omuliindi, omutakatifu, ne ekha khukhwama mwikulu, ne arusia lilaka ali, ‘Rema kumurongooro mala kwonakwe, ne kakhali lekha siisina siakwo ne kimili birame mwiloba. Siboe ne kumusiipi kwe sichuuma ne kumukasa, sikarwe ne bonga eng'ana. Lekha luume khukhwama mwikulu lumunyisie, amenye ne chisaang'i che mundaa khu miiko saba.’
“Ee omwami, sino nisio sifuno sie kamarooro kowo. Ne niko Wele owe Angaaki Lukali abisiisie kalekholekha khwiwe.
Bakhakhutimanie obe aleeyi ne babaandu, ne olamenya ne chisaang'i che mundaa. Olalia bunyaasi nga eeyi ne okhanyirire khulwe luume khukhwama mwikulu. Kimiiko saba kikhabire ne oli orio khukhwola omanye oli Wele owe Angaaki Lukali aamiaanga bubwami buuli khu sibala, ne abuelesia yesi yesi niye enya.
Mala sifuno sie lilaka lie khulekha siisina ne kimili kiakwo mwiloba nisio sino: Ewe okhakobosebwe lundi bubwami bwowo khukhwama siise nisio olimanyilamo oli Wele owe mwikulu niye owamiia.
Khwako, ee omwami, loonda bukeleki bwase. Lekha khukhola bumayaanu, khola siili siluungi, lundi lekha kamabi kowo mala okholele siisa babamiinwa, khola orio wakana biise biowo bie khuindiaala bichiililila.”
Kano koosi kekholekha khu mwami Nebukadinesa.
Enyuma we kimiesi ekhumi na kibili, nga aba ne akeenda khu ngaaki khwe lichipi lie bubwami mu Babiloni,
areeba ali, “Se luli luno Babiloni lukoba luboofu nilwo nombakha ne bunyali bwase bukali nga lukoba lwase lwe ngalaasia khukhwekesia efuma ne bukhulu bwase?”
Nga omwami aaba ne asilomaloma kamakhuwa ako, kumumilo kwamila mwikulu kuli, “Ee omwami Nebukadinesa, rekeeresia burume buno khwiwe: Bubwami bwakhulekhile.
Mala ewe ocha khurusibwa mu baandu, olamenya ne chisaang'i che mundaa, ne khulia bunyaasi nga eeyi. Ne olamenya orio khu miiko saba, khukhwola nga ne olimanya oli Wele owe Angaaki Lukali niye okhalaka bubwami bwe babaandu, ne abuelesia yesi yesi niye enya.”
Ao ne nao kamakhuwa ke liikhalaka ako kekhola khu Nebukadinesa. Arusibwa mu baandu mala alia bunyaasi nga eeyi. Amenya mu luume lwe mwikulu. Lichuune liewe liaba lileeyi nga kamafuumbo ke furuusi, ne kamatere kewe nga kamatere ke nyuni.
Enyuma we kimiiko saba, ese Nebukadinesa nalola mwikulu, mala bukesi bwase bwangobolela.
Mala nafumia Wele owe Angaaki Lukali,
nafumia ne khuelesia lukoosi oyo omenyile mindali na mindali.
“Sikila bubwami bwewe buli bwa mindali na mindali,
ne bubwami bwewe buindila selukho na selukho.
Boosi bamenyile mu sibala se bali siindu tawe,
Wele akholanga nilio enya khu bibuumbe bie mwikulu
ne babaandu be khu sibala,
mala se aliio omukhiingilila
namwe amureeba ali, ‘Okhola siina?’ Tawe.”
Mu siise esio bukesi bwase bwangobolela. Lundi bangoboselia luyali lwe bubwami bwase, ne kamaani kase, ne fuma yase. Bakambisi base ne babemeelesi be bubwami bambenja mala namiia lundi. Nanyoola kamaani kamakali khukhila mataayi.
Luno, ese Nebukadinesa fumia Omwami owe mwikulu, muniinia angaaki lundi muelesia lukoosi.
Sikila bikholwa biewe bioosi bili bia ng'ali,
ne chingila chewe chili chinuungi.
Anyala aboombia abo be lukhole.

Endaalo ndala omwami Belishasa akhola naikara engali khu bakhulu bewe chielefu. Mala anywa nabo endali.
Nga baba ne banywa endali Belishasa arusia lilaka ali bareere bikoombe bie fwesa ne esahabu nibio raraawe Nebukadinesa aabukula khukhwama mu Lukaangu Yerusalemu. Omwami aabirumania nio omwami ne bakhulu bewe, bakhasi bewe, ne bakhasi nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale babinywelemo.
Nio bareera bikoombe bie fwesa ne sahabu nibio babukula khukhwama mu Lukaangu, Yerusalemu. Mala omwami ne bakhulu bewe, bakhasi bewe, ne bakhasi nibo aamenyia busa nga basaale babinywelamo.
Banywa endali ne bafumia bifwaani biabwe bie esahabu, efwesa, kumukasa, bichuuma, kimirongooro nende bie kamabaale.
Ao ne nao chinjala che kumukhono kwo mundu chabonekha mala chaandika khwisiisi lie lichipi lio mwami, ambi ne siteetwe sie etaa. Omwami omwene abona kumukhono nga kuandika.
Nio lukoondo lwo mwami lwakaluukhana, chinganakani chamunania. Kamakumba kewe kareenga ne kamasikamo katerema.
Omwami alaanga bareere bafumu, balosi ne bamenieelesia ching'enieesi. Nga ne bareerwa, omwami aboolela be bukesi be mu Babiloni abo ali, “Yesi yesi oosoma kamaandiko kano ne khu khumboolela sifuno siako, alafwarwa engubo eye bubwami eefwaana buseemwa, ne kumunyololo kwe esahabu mwikosi ne alaba owa khataru mu bwami buno.”
Nio bakesi boosi bo mwami becha, ne se banyala khusoma kamaandiko, namwe khuboolela omwami sifuno siako tawe.
Mala omwami Belishasa esiindukha lukali, abiililwa mumoni. Bakhulu bewe beendekhelela.
Khubeela kamakhuwa ko mwami ne bakhulu bewe, maawe kwini engila nimwo baba ne balikho baliila naikara, mala aloma ali, “Omwami menya mindali na mindali! Okheendekhelela tawe, namwe okhabiililwa tawe.
Aliio omundu mu bwami bwowo, olimo roho we bawele batakatifu. Mu biise bia raraao ne amiia, omundu yuno aanyoolekhana khuuba omundu oonyala khumanyilisia kamakhuwa kakekisa, ali omundu owe limanya lundi owe bukesi nga bwe bawele. Ne raraao, omwami Nebukadinesa, amukhola omwimeelesi we babaandu be kamayia, bafumu, balakusi, bang'oola ne bamenieelesia ching'enieesi mu Babiloni.
Sikila roho omulayi lukali, bukesi ne limanya lie khubuula sifuno sie kamarooro, khukhwinoosia kiminai, ne khuyeeta butinyu biaba mu Danieli niye omwami atiuukha Beliteshasa. Nono laanga Danieli, akhwekesie sifuno.”
Nio bareera Danieli ebweeni wo mwami. Omwami amureeba ali, “Ewe oli Danieli, mulala khu Bayaudi be mu mbaambe, nibo Paapa wase omwami, areera khukhwama e Buyuda?
Ese nauliile bali roho we bawele batakatifu akhulimo, lundi bali oli ne bubwikhochochi, bukesi ne limanya likali.
Nono babaandu base bakesi, ne bafumu bakhakile khusoma kamaandiko kano ne khu khumboolela sifuno siako ne kakhali bakhiliilwe.
Nauliile bali onyala waboola bifuno ne khu khumalila butinyu bwase. Nono waaba ne onyala khusoma kamaandiko kano, mala umboolele sifuno siako, olafwarwa engubo eefwaana buseemwa eye bubwami, olafwarwa kumunyololo kwe esahabu mwikosi mala olaba okhola khataru mu bwami buno.”
Nio Danieli akobosia omwami ali, “Lekha biianwa biowo bibe bibiowo. Bielesie okundi. Ne kakhali, nja khukhusomela kamaandiko mala khuboolele sifuno siako.
“Ee omwami, Wele owe Angaaki Lukali aelesia raraao Nebukadinesa bubwami, amukhola aaba omukali, amuelesia lundi luyali ne bunyali.
Mala khubeela bunyali nibwo amuelesia, babaandu boosi, chikholo ne chinimi baterema ne khumuria. Boosi nibo enya khukhwira eera, boosi nibo enya bamenye abalekha bamenya. Abo nibo enya khuniinia abaniinia ne abo nibo enya khukhwikhisia abekhisia.
Ne kakhali nga arakikha khuuba ne sileka, aaba ne kumwoyo kumulume lundi aaba owe kibonio, anuulwa endebe yewe eye bubwami, ne luyali lwewe.
Arusibwa mu baandu, mala kamebaasio kewe kaaba oli ke saang'i. Aamenya ne chipunda che mundaa, aliisibwa bunyaasi nga eeyi, mala esiinga luume lwe mwikulu, khukhwola nga ne amanya ali Wele owe Angaaki Lukali ali ne bunyali bwe khukhwamiia omundu yesi yesi niye enya.
“Ne ewe, omwana wewe, Belishasa, se weboombia tawe akhaba ne wamanya kano koosi.
Weniinia khukhila Omwami Wele owe mwikulu. Mala wareera bibiindu bie mu Lukaangu lwewe ebweeni wowo mala ewe, ne bakhulu bowo, bakhasi bowo, ne bakhasi nibo wamenyia busa nga basaale babinywelamo endali. Ne ewe wafumia bifwaani bie bawele babang'oonwa khu fwesa, khu sahabu, khu mukasa, khu bichuuma, khu mirongooro ne khu mabaale, bifwaani bikhabona namwe biaulila, namwe biamanya tawe. Ne se waria Wele oliindanga bulamu bwowo lundi omanyile chingila chowo tawe.
Ako niko kakakila Wele ne aruma kumukhono khuandika kamakhuwa kano.
“Ne kano niko kakaandikwa, ‘MENE, MENE, TEKELI, PARISINI.’
Ne sifuno siako nisiesi: MENE liboola lili Wele amalile khubala chindaalo che bubwami bwowo ne khubwaakamia.
TEKELI liboola lili wapimiibwe khu sikelo mala wanyoolekhaane khuuba omwaangu.
PARISINI liboola lili bubwami bwowo bwakabukhasiibwe ne khuebwa Baamedi ne Bapasha.”
Nio Belishasa, akhalaka khufwara Danieli engubo eye bubwami, ne khumufwara mwikosi kumunyololo kwe esahabu kwe lukoosi. Mala amwamiia nga omwami owa khataru mu bwami bwewe.
Silo esio ne sisiene Belishasa, omwami we Bakalidayo erwa.
Mala Dario, Omumedi amiia ne ali ne kimiiko kamakhumi sita na kibili.

Omwami Dario abisia khurobora babemeelesi emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili bamiie mu bwami bwewe bwoosi.
Arobora babemeelesi bataru, mulala khwaabo Danieli ne babaandi babili bemeelele babemeelesi babaandi ne khuliinda kimiaandu kio mwami, nio omwami akhatibiakho siosi tawe.
Nono Danieli amanyikhana khukhila babemeelesi ne bakhulu babaandi, sikila aaba ne roho eye khukhola buli siindu bulayi. Nio omwami apanga ali amiie Danieli khu bwami bwoosi.
Nio babemeelesi ne bakhulu bakhaka khunyoola sifuno sie khusitaka Danieli khu lubeka lwe bubwami. Ne se banyoolakho sifuno tawe, sikila Danieli aaba omusuubilwa ne se abakho ne kamakhiikha namwe bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Nio babaandu bano baboolana bali, “Se khulanyoola sifuno sie khusitaka Danieli tawe ne sikhali khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ke lilaka lia Wele wewe.”
Nio babemeelesi ne bakhulu bauliilisiana bacha wo mwami bamuboolela bali, “Ee omwami Dario, oiindile mindali!
Babemeelesi boosi mu bwami bwowo, baliindi ne babaloondela, bakeleki ne babemeelesi batiiti bafukiilisiane bali omwami arusie lilaka ne khuliimikha ne burafu. Yesi yesi osaba wele namwe omundu khu ndaalo kamakhumi kataru, khurusiakho ewe alamwaatwa mwiloo lie chitalang'i.
Nono omwami rusia lilaka lino ne khurakho kumukhono, lilekhe khukaluukhasibwa khuloondekhana ne lilaka lie Baamedi ne Bapasha, likhakaluukhana tawe.”
Nio omwami Dario arusia lilaka mala alirakho kumukhono.
Nga Danieli ne amanya ali lilaka elio liabisiibwe, acha munju mwewe mu mwaba ne kamatirisia kakaloleelela Yerusalemu. Asikama khukhwola khataru khu ndaalo, ne asaba ne khufumia Wele wewe bulayi bwene nga aakholanga anyuma ao.
Babemeelesi abo becha nga bafukiilisiane mala banyoola Danieli ne alikho asaba Wele wewe amukholele siisa.
Nio boosi bacha wo mwami khuabila Danieli ne baboola khu lilaka bali, “Omwami, ewe se wara esaini khu lilaka oli khu ndaalo kamakhumi kataru omundu yesi yesi osaba Wele namwe omundu ne okhali ewe tawe, alamwaatwa mwiloo lie chitalang'i?”
Omwami abakobosia ali, “Yee, kali kario khuloondekhana ne lilaka lie Baamedi ne Bapasha, se linyala liakaluukhasibwa tawe.”
Nio baboolela Omwami bali, “Danieli, mulala khu be mu mbaambe khukhwama Yuda, se akhuria ewe namwe khuria lilaka nilio walaka tawe. Asabanga khataru buli endaalo.”
Nga omwami ne aaulila kamakhuwa kano, esiindukha lukali, akhaka lukali khunyoola engila eye khureesia Danieli. Achiililila khukhaka khukhwola nga bwelabula.
Mala babaandu abo bakobola khu mwami ne bamuboolela bali, “Omwami omanyile oli lili lilaka lie Baamedi ne Bapasha, bali lilaka nilio omwami akhalake se linyalikha liakaluukhasibwa tawe.”
Nio Omwami akhalaka Danieli aambwe ne khumwaatwa mwiloo lie chitalang'i. Omwami aboolela Danieli ali, “Okhoya Wele wowo, niye okholelanga buli lwosi akhureesie.”
Mala bareera libaale bafuunikha emunwa we liloo. Omwami ara khu sifunikho kumukhono kwewe ne kumukhono kwe bakhulu bewe, nio siindu sikhekholekha khureesia Danieli tawe.
Mala omwami akobola mu lichipi liewe, mala siilo sioosi khuliakho siindu tawe. Aarengecha busa ne se bamureererakho siakhulia siosi siosi tawe.
Mala, makhelebeende omwami enyokha acha sieloo lie chitalang'i.
Nga eecha aambi ne mwiloo nimwo Danieli aaba, alaanga lukali ne liliiendekhelela, ne areeba ali, “Danieli, omukholi owa Wele omenyile mindali, Wele wowo niye okholelanga buli lwosi, akhureesiisie khukhwama khu talang'i ku?”
Nio Danieli akobosia omwami ali, “Omwami oiindile mindali!
Wele wase arumire malaika wewe afuunikha kiminwa kie chitalang'i nio chikhakholakho kamabi tawe. Sikila se ndikho ne bubi mumoni chewe tawe. Ne lundi omwami ese khakholakho bubi bwosi bwosi khwiwe tawe.”
Omwami asangaala lukali po, mala arusia lilaka ali Danieli arusibwe mwiloo. Nio bamurusiamo, ne se aaba aumiiekho abuundu oosi oosi tawe, sikila eyikina Wele wewe.
Omwami arusia lilaka khu babaandu babaasitaka Danieli bareerwe mala bamwaatwe mwiloo lie chitalang'i. Nibo, babaana babwe, na bakhasi babwe. Ne bakhoola asi khu sibale sie liloo tawe, chitalang'i chaberiekakho chabakaamula ne khutonyaka bikuumba biabwe bioosi.
Mala omwami Dario aandikila babaandu boosi, chikholo ne chinimi khu liloba ali, “Kimileembe khwinywe!
Ese khalaka ndi mu bwami bwase bwoosi, babaandu barie ne khuelesia luyali Wele owa Danieli.
“Sikila ali Wele omenyile mindali,
aindila khulwa mindali.
Bubwami bwewe se bulionakwa tawe,
ne liliamiia liewe lilibao mindali.
Aonia lundi areesianga;
akholanga ke khuukia ne kamakana,
mwikulu ne khu sibala.
Areesia Danieli khukhwama mu matere ke chitalang'i.”
Khwako Danieli yuno aindiala chindaalo che khukhwamiia khwo mwami Dario no mwami Sairasi Omupasia.

Mu mwiiko kwe khunyoa Belishasa ne ali omwami owa Babiloni, Danieli aroora kamarooro mala abona kamalola nga aaba ne akonile khu sitanda siewe. Aandika kamarooro kewe kano:
Ese Danieli mu malola mu silo nabona chimbeo chine khukhwama chimbeka choosi che sibala ne chitumbuula enyanja emboofu.
Mala chisaang'i chimboofu chine chiikhafwaanana tawe, charura khukhwama mu nyanja omwo.
Eye bweeni yafwaana nga etalang'i, mala yaba ne chindaa nga che furuusi. Nga naba ne siloleelela ndio, chindaa chayo chakhuulwa. Mala bakinyosia bakimisia khu bikele bibili nga omundu. Mala bakia bukesi bwo mundu.
Ne lola, esaang'i ekiindi eya khabili efwaana nga sibulukhu. Yaba yachochomaale, mala yaba ne chimbafu chitaru mukhanwa akarikari we kameeno kayo. Nio kumumilo kwakiboolela kuli, “Yinyokha olie babaandu bakali nga ne wenya!”
Enyuma owa kano nga ne naloleelela, ekiindi yabonekha efwaana nga engwe, mala eli ne chindaa che nyuni chine khu mokoongo khwayo. Esaang'i chana yaba ne kimirwe kine. Mala bakielesia bubwami.
Nga ne naloleelela chinjika echo, nabona lulwiika luluundi lukeekhe lwameelela akari we chichiindi ekhumi echo. Nio lunyoole bubweyaangu bwe khuchoa, bafunakila mu sisina chinjika che bweeni chitaru. Lulwiika luno lwaba ne chimoni nga cho mundu. Lwaba lundi ne kumunwa mala kumunwa okwo kwalomalomanga mu ngila eye sileka.
chindebe che bubwami charebwao
nio mulala, Omutaai lukali, khukhwama khaale, ekhalakho.
Chingubo chewe chiwaanga chererere nga liiarara,
ne lichuune liewe liaba likwalaafu nga bufuumbo bwe likheese.
Endebe yewe yaba chinjaso che kumulilo,
bikele biayo biaba kumulilo kuburukha.
luluuchi lwe kumulilo lwekha khukhwama ebweeni wewe.
Bamalaika chielefu ne chielefu bamukholela,
ne chimilioni chingali bema ebweeni wewe.
Ekoti yekhala khukhwirekekhera khukhola bukhalaki,
nio bitabu biekulibwa.
Nachiililila khuloleelela sikila naulila kamakhuwa kamakali niko lulwiika olwo lwalomalomaanga ne lwibonia. Ne nga naloleelela, beera esaang'i eyo, kumubili kwayo kwonakibwa mala bakuaana kwosibwe ne kumulilo.
Chisaang'i chichiindi echo chanuulwa bunyali bwacho, ne kakhali bachilekha chichiililile khumenya khu siise ne chindaalo.
nabona mulala owafwaana nga omwana owo mundu
ne echa khukhwama mu mafuumbi.
Acha niye Omutaai Oyo ali,
mala bamureera ebweeni wewe.
ne luyali ne liliamiia
nio babaandu boosi, chikholo, ne chinimi,
bamukholele.
Buruki bwewe, buli buruki bwa mindali,
se buliwao tawe
ne liliamiia liewe lili liliamiia
likhonakwa tawe.
Ese Danieli, nesiindukha lukali, mala kamalola ako kanjiendekhelesia lukali po.
Khwako nacha khu mulalakho khu ba baaba ne bemile andebe eye bubwami, mala namureeba sifuno sie kamakhuwa kano koosi. Nio amboolela sifuno siako ali:
“Chisaang'i chimboofu chine echo chili babaami bane bakheeche khu sibala.
Ne kakhali batakatifu ba Wele owe Angaaki Lukali bakhaebwe bubwami mala bakhabwamiie mindali na mindali.”
Mala nenya khumanya sifuno sie esaang'i eya khane eyo, eyaba ne bubwaukhani bukali ne chichiindi choosi. Yaba eriisia likali, yaba ne kameno ke sichuuma ne kamatere ke kumukasa, yalia ne nyanyakamo ne khutonya mala yaswalakilila bibiarama ne bikele biayo.
Lundi nenya khumanya ke chinjika ekhumi khu murwe kwayo ne lulwiika luluundi lulwamela ne lufunaka chinjika chitaru, lwaba ne chimoni ne kumunwa kwe khukhwibonia mu kisuunia. Mala lwalolekhana khukhila chichasie.
Ne kakhali Omutaai Lukali oyo enyokha, mala arusia bukhalaki aelesia batakatifu ba Wele owe Angaaki Lukali bung'ali bwabwe. Nga siise siola, batakatifu abo baebwa bubwami.
Nio aloma ali:
“Khuloondekhana nende esaang'i eye khane, bulibaao bubwami bwa khane khu sibala
buliaukhana ne bubwami bubuundi bwoosi
mala bulimila sibala sioosi.
Bukhasiswalakilile mala busitonyemo bitonyi.
babaami ekhumi bakhaame mu bwami buno
ne okundi aliamiia enyuma wabwe,
ne yuno akhaukhane ne bataayi,
mala aliula babaami bataru
mala apie siibi babaandu batakatifu ba Wele owe Angaaki Lukali.
Akhakhake khukalukhania lilaka ne chindaalo cha naikara chindakatifu.
Batakatifu bakhaanwe mu makhono kewe khu siise, biise bibili, nende enusu eye siise.
Ne kakhali ekoti ekhakhole sisiikhasio,
mala buruki bwewe bulibukulibwa.
Bulimilwa ne khukhwonakibwa elala,
asi we likulu lioosi
bulaanwa khu baandu be batakatifu ba
Wele owe Angaaki Lukali.
Bubwami bwabwe buliba bubwami bwa mindali,
ne buruki bwoosi bulibakholela nibo ne khubaria.”
Sino nisio sisiakamo sia kano. Ne ese Danieli, neendekhelela lukali, nakaluukhana lukoondo. Ne kakhali nabiikha buli siindu mu mwoyo kwase.

Mu mwiiko kwa khataru Belishasa ne ali omwami, Ese Danieli nabona kamalola kakaandi, Nabona kamalola ka khabili enyuma we khubona ke khunyoa ako.
Mu malola kano, nenyoola ndi Susa, lukoba luboofu lwe lukoongo lwa Elamu. Naba nemile aluuchi lulaangwa Ulai.
Nasuta bubweeni mala nabona limiiku liemile khu luuchi. Liaba ne kimisanga kibili, kiombi kimileeyi, mala mulala kumuleeyikho khukhila kukuundi. Kumuleeyikho kwamaliilikha khumela.
Nabona limiiku chana ne liipana ne licha elubeka lwe mumbo, ebunaswa, ne siafubo. Se yabakhoo esaang'i yosi yosi eyakhaka khulikhiingilila namwe eyefubarura kamaani kalio tawe. Ne se abakhoo yesi yesi owanyala khureesia khukhwama mu bunyali bwalio tawe. Liakhola siosi siosi nisio lienya mala liaba ne kamaani lukali.
Nga naba ne siloleelela, nabona endurume khukhwama lubeka lwe mumbo, ne elikho yiicha khangu khu sibala sioosi, mala se yetilangakho asi tawe. Endurume eyo yaba ne lulwiika luboofu akari we chimoni chayo.
Yacha niyo limiiku lie kimisaanga kibili, nilio nabona ne liimile aluuchi liaba. Yalitimakakho ne kamaani kamakali yaliuunaka, yafunaka kimisaanga kialio kiombi. Limiiku elio se liabakho ne kamaani ke khu khupania endurume eyo tawe. Yamwaata limiiku elio asi mala yaliswalakilila. Se abakhoo yesi yesi onyala areesia limiiku elio khukhwama khu maani ke ndurume eyo tawe.
Nakibona ne ibwaakala limiiku. Yaba ne lirima likali khu limiiku mala yaliuunaka yafuna kimisanga kialio kiombi. Limiiku se liabakho ne kamaani ke khuukipania tawe. Yamwaata limiiku elio asi mala yaliswalakilila, ne se abakhoo yesi yesi owanyala khureesia limiiku elio khukhwama khu maani ke ndurume eyo tawe.
Mala endurume yaselukha, yakhula yaba ne kamaani kamakali po. Ne kakhali nga yola khuuba ne kamaani kamakali ako, lulwiika lwayo luboofu olwo lwafunikha. Mala abuundu ao, amelao chinjika chine chichereka. Chaloleelela chimbeka chine che likulu.
Khukhwama mu lwiika lulalakho khu njika echo, lulwiika luluundi lukeekhe lwamela. Lwachoa lukali ne lulola lubeka lwe siafubo, ebukwe, ne elubeka we sibala silayi.
Lwakhula lukali lwolela bibuumbe bie mwikulu. Mala yamwaata asi ching'enieesi ndalakho yachiswalakilila asi.
Lwakhula lwalea lwoola khu mukhulu owe bibuumbe bie mwikulu. Mala yamurusiakho biianwa bia buli lwoosi bie khukhwosia. Nio yonaka abuundu wewe atakatifu.
Sikila bumayaanu, bibuumbe bie mwikulu biaanwa khu niyo, alala ne biianwa bie khukhwosia bia buli lwoosi.
Mala naulila omutakatifu mulala ne alomaloma no wasie. Owasie oyo amureeba ali, “Kamakhuwa niko kamalola kano kalikho kaboola kalachiililila khu siise siina? Biaanwa bie khukhwosia bia buli ndaalo bilarama ne bikaluukhasiibwe khu siise siina? Buutibi bwe khukhwonaka buli siindu bulachiililila khu siise siina? Ne Abuundu Atakatifu, alala ne bibuumbe bie mwikulu bilachiililila khuswalakililwa khu siise siina?”
Omutakatifu owe khunyoa oyo amukobosia ali, “Khu biise bie akolooba nende kumutikhinyi chielefu chibili ne chimia chitaru. Nio Abuundu Atakatifu akobosebwe liiba liao lia ng'ali.”
Nono ese, Danieli nga naba ne kamalola, nenya manye sifuno siako. Nio ao ne nao mulala eema ebweeni wase ofwaana nga omundu.
Naulila aluuchi lulaangwa Ulai kumumilo kwo mundu ne kulaanga kuli, “Kaburieli, yeeta omundu yuno amanye sifuno sie kamalola niko aboone.”
Nio Kaburieli echa siimbi nende niio naba ne nimile. Naria lukali mala nakwa asi mafumala. Ne kakhali amboolela ali, “Ulila mwana wo mundu, kamalola niko oboone kali khu ndaalo chimaliilisi.”
Oli asilomaloma nase, naambwa ne liilo likali ne ndikho ngona mafumala. Ne niye ambamba, anjimisia.
Mala amboolela ali, “Lolakho, ndikho khwekesia kacha khwikholekha lwanyuma mu siise sie lirima lia Wele. Kamalola ako kali ke chindaalo chimaliilisi.
“Ne ke khu limiiku nilio wabona ne kimisanga kibili, bali babaami ba Metia ne Pasha.
Mala endurume eli omwami we Bakiriki, ne lulwiika akari we chimoni chayo luli omwami we khunyoa.
Lulwiika lulwafunikha, mala chichiindi chine ne chimelao, chili bubwami bune buliama mu kholo yewe, ne kakhali bubwami bune obwo se buliba ne bunyali nga bwe bubwami bwe khunyoa obwo tawe.
“Nga bubwami obwo bukhoole khu siakamo siabwo, mala bumayaanu bwoosi bube bukali bwoole khu siakamo siabwo, omwami mulala akheche ookhabe ne bunyindaafu lundi omukesi.
Bunyali bwewe buliba bukali. Alisaasia bubwonaki bukali lukali mala alitabusia buli nilio akhakhole. Akhabunie babaandu be kamaani kamakali ne babaandu ba Wele.
Mu bubacha bwewe ne bubeeyi, akhanyale khukhola lirekekha liewe liibi. Mala akheniinie. Akhabunie baandu bakali ne bakhamanyile tawe. Akhenye khu khuupana nende Omukhulu owe bakhulu, ne kakhali akhabunisibwe ne kamaani kakhali ko mundu tawe.
Kamalola ke akolooba ne kumutikhinyi kakenoosiibwe, kali ka ng'ali. Nono kakise sikila kalabukula siise sileeyi.”
Nio ese, Danieli, naweelelela kamaani mala nakona asi nendi omulwale khu siise. Mala nenyokha khukhola kimilimo kio mwami. Ne kakhali kamalola ako kambukia, ne ese se nanyala khu kamanya tawe.

Mu mwiiko kwe khunyoa mu liamiia lia Dario, okhwa Ahuswero niye bamiia mu sibala sie Bakalidayo mu liamiia liewe lie khunyoa,
ese Danieli, namenieelesia kaali mu bitabu bitakatifu mala khukhwama mu nibio namanyilisia sifuno sie likhuwa nilio Omwami Wele aaboolela omung'oosi Yeremia khuloondekhana nende kimiiko kamakhumi saba ekio, Khuloondekhana ne khukhwonakwa khwa Yerusalemu.
Nio nasaba Omwami Wele mukhwikoonjelela namulilila, neyimana khulia, nefwara kamakunia, ne khukhwikhala mwikokhe.
Nasaba Omwami Wele, Wele wase ne khukhwiyama ndi:
“Ee Omwami Wele, ewe oli Wele Omukali lundi ooriisia. Oli omusuubilwa khu ndakaano yowo ne wekesianga busiime bwa ng'ali khwaabo babakhusiima ne khuloonda kamalaka kowo.
“Efwe khwakholile bubwoni lundi khwakholile kamabi. Khwabeele bamayaanu lundi khwabeele ne bureengu. Khwauukhe khukhwama khu malaka kowo ne lilakiilisia liowo.
Se khwarekeeresia bakholi bowo bang'oosi, babalomaloma mu lisina liowo khu baami befwe, khu bakhulu befwe, khu bikuuka biefwe ne khu sibala siefwe sioosi tawe.
Buluungi buli lubeka lwowo, ee Omwami. Ne kakhali chisoni nga chiliio luno luri chili khwifwe, babaandu ba Yuda, bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, ne Isiraeli yoosi, ne nabo nibo ewe wasalanisia mu bibala bie aembi ne aleeyi khulwe khulekha khuuba basuubilwa khwiwe.
Khwifwe Omwami Wele, kali likoyaana khu baami befwe, bakhulu befwe, bikuuka biefwe, sikila khwakhola kamabi ebweeni wowo.
Khwiwe Omwami Wele, kali siisa ne silekhelo, akhaba ne khwakhukholela kamabi.
Se khwakhurekeeresia tawe, ee Omwami Wele wefwe, nga ne khukhaloonda kamalaka kowo niko wakhuelesia efwe khubirira mu bakholi bowo bang'oosi.
Baisiraeli boosi bafunaka kamalaka kowo ne khuloba khukhurekeeresia. Silaamo ne sisiechubo bibiaandikwa mu lilaka lia Musa omukholi wa Wele, biakhwikholeekhekho, sikila khwakholile bubwoni khwiwe.
Wakholile koosi niko wakhukhalakila efwe ne babaami befwe, nga nilwo oukuumile lukoba lwa Yerusalemu burafu lukali khukhila lukoba luluundi lwosi lwosi khu sibala.
Ewe wakhuukuumile bulayi bwene nga ne kaandikwa mu malaka ka Musa, ne kakhali khukhwola luno, ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wefwe, se khwakhusabile okhubeele tawe. Se khwalekhile bubwoni bwefwe ne khukhwibaasia khu busuubilwa bwowo tawe.
Khwako ee Omwami Wele, Wele wefwe, waba werekeekhe khu khuukuuma efwe, mala wakhuukuuma, sikila buli lwoosi okholanga kaali kamaluungi, ne efwe se khwakhurekeeresia tawe.
“Ne siise sino, Omwami Wele wefwe, owarusia babaandu bowo khukhwama e Misiri mu bunyali bwowo bukali ne khukhola lisina liowo lieebwe luyali khukhwola luno. Khwakholile bumayaanu ne kamabi.
Ee Omwami, khulwe bikholwa biowo bia ng'ali okhaambwa ne lirima ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, ne sikulu siowo sitakatifu tawe. Ne sikila bumayaanu bwefwe nende kamabi ke bikuuka biefwe, Yerusalemu ne babaandu bowo babeele chisoni khu bibala biili siimbi.
Ee Wele wefwe, ulila lisaba lio omukholi wowo ne liliekoonjelela liewe. Nosiima ng'oona lundi Lukaangu lwowo nilwo bonaka.
Ee Wele, khurekereesie mala obone butinyu bwefwe nende bwe lukoba lulaangwa mwisina liowo. Se khulikho khu khusaba sikila buluungi bwefwe tawe, ne kakhali khulikho khukhusaba khulwe siisa siowo sikali.
Ee Omwami Wele, khuulile! Ee Omwami Wele, khubeele! Omwami Wele, khurekereesie, lundi okhole! Okhakhiinda tawe, Omwami Wele, sikila lukoba ne babaandu bowo balaangwa mwisina liowo.”
Nga naba ne saba, ne niyama bubwoni bwase ne bubwoni bwe babaandu base ba Isiraeli, ne khulilila Omwami Wele wase, khulwe sikulu sitakatifu sia Wele wase,
Omundu Kaburieli oyo, niye nabona mu malola kamataayi, echa khangu niio naba. Siaba siise sie khuaana chimbosio akolooba.
Echa mala amboolela ali, “Ee Danieli, ese nechile khuelesie bukesi ne liiulila.
Nga warakikha khusaba Wele, akhukobosia. Nono nechile khukhuboolela likobosio. Sikila ewe oli omusiime lukali. Khwako rekeeresia bulayi mala omanye sifuno sie kamalola.
“Kimiiko kamakhumi saba khukhwola saba kiakhalaakwe khu baandu bowo ne sikulu siowo sitakatifu, khumalao kamakhiikha, khukhwakamia bubwoni, khubeela bumayaanu, khureera buluungi bwa mindali, khuura kumuuri khu malola ne bung'oosi, ne khuakha kamafura Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali.
Khwako manya mala omanye bulayi likhuwa lino: Khukhwama siise nisio lilaka likharusibwe khukhwombakhwa lundi lukoba lwa Yerusalemu khukhwola khukhwicha khwo murobore owa Wele owaakhwa kamafura, silibao siise sie kamachuuma saba. Khu siise sie kamachuuma kamakhumi sita na kibili, lukoba lwa Yerusalemu luliombakhwa lundi ne chingila ne lisiisi lie kamaani, ne kakhali siise esio sikhabe sie butinyu.
Nio enyuma we kamachuuma kamakhumi sita na kabili ako, owaakhwa kamafura oyo akheerwe ne se akhabekho na sioosi tawe. Babaandu bo mwami wicha balionaka lukoba ne abuundu atakatifu. Ekhumaliilikha khwayo khulibao ne kameechi kamakali, liie ne lilionaka nilio Wele arekekha.
Omwami oyo alakhola lifukiilisiana lie kamaani ne babaandu bakali khulwe lichuuma lilala. Mala mu nusu eye lichuuma alakamia khuaana chimbosio ne biianwa. Mu bweyaangu bwabio mu Lukaangu silibao Sibiilisio sie Lilionaka khukhwola nga owaraao Sibiilisio oyo ne akhabunisibwe nga nilwo Wele ne aamurekekhera.”

Mu mwiiko kwa khataru Sairasi ne ali omwami owa Pasha, burume bwecha khu Danieli, niye batiuukha bali Beliteshasa. Burume obwo bwaba bwa ng'ali, ne kakhali bwaba buandalafu lukali, se bwamanyikhana tawe. Kakhaba kario, Danieli aamanya burume obwo sikila aamanya kamalola ako kosi.
Mu siise esio, ese Danieli, naba mu bubeeleli khu machuuma kataru.
Se naliakho siakhulia silayi tawe. Se naliakho enyama namwe nanywakho endali tawe. Se neakhakho kamafura mu bweeni bwase, namwe mwichuune liase tawe khukhwola kamachuuma kataru ne kawa.
Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chine che kumwesi kwe khunyoa, naba nemile khu lukuku lwe luluuchi lwa Tikiri,
nakalama angaaki, ne lola nabona omundu afwarire chingubo cha katani, ne eboyile mu sibuno kumusiipi kwe esahabu khukhwama Ufasi.
Kumubili kwewe kwakhosia nga limili. Bubweeni bwewe bung'enang'ena nga khumeniuukha khwe lueni, ne chimoni chewe nga chinjaso che kumulilo, kamakhono kewe ne bikele biakhosia nga kumukasa kusiliilwe, ne kumumilo kwewe kwauliilikhana nga luyoka lwe babaandu bakali.
Mala ese Danieli seng'ene niye owabona kamalola ako. Babaandu ba baaba ne nase se babona kamalola ako tawe, ne kakhali baterema, belukha mala bekisa.
Nio nalekhwao seng'ene, ne ndikho ndoleelela kamalola kamaboofu kano. Nawa kamaani, lukoondo lwase lwakaluukhana lukali lwonekha, nawechekheelela kamaani.
Nga naulila kumumilo kwewe, nakwa asi mafumala khumanya sisikholekha tawe.
Nio kumukhono kwanjinyosia, mala beele esiiterema kamakhono ne kamasikamo.
Malaika amboolela ali, “Danieli, Wele akhusiima. Yiima mala orekeeresie bulayi niko nja khukhuboolela, narumiirwe khwiwe.” Nga ne amala khuloma kano, ese nema, mala abeele esiiterema busa.
Mala amboolela ali, “Danieli, okharia tawe. Sikila khukhwama khu ndaalo eye khunyoa niyo wakhalaka khumanya ne khukhwiboombia ebweeni owa Wele wowo, lisaba liowo liauliilikha. Nechile sikila lisaba liowo elio.
Omukhulu owe bubwami bwa Pasha aakhiingilila khulwe chindaalo kamakhumi kabili na ndala. Mala Mikaili, mulala khu bamalaika bakhulu, echa khukhunjeeta, nio namulekhao no mukhulu owe bubwami bwa Pasha oyo.
Nechile khukhuyeeta omanye kakhekholekhe khu baandu bowo mu ndaalo chichiicha. Sikila kamalola niko waboone kali khuloondekhana ne chindaalo chichiicha.”
Nga aaba ne alikho amboolela kamakhuwa kano, ese nalola asi, nilio ndoma tawe.
Nio mulala ofwaana omundu atiila khu munwa kwase. Nio nasama naboolela oyo owaba ne emile siimbi nase ndi, “Ee Omwami wase, kamalola kano kandereere buchuuni bukali lundi kamalilemo kamaani.
Ndinga nasioobi owimile ebweeni wo mwami wewe. Se ndi ne kamaani namwe lulomaloma nawe tawe.”
Mulala oofwaana nga omundu oyo andilakho lundi mala nanyoola kamaani.
Amboolela ali, “Wele akhusiima, siosi siosi sikhakhwiendekhelesia namwe siakhuriikhirisia tawe.” Nga amboolela kamakhuwa kano, nanyoola kamaani mala naloma ndi, “Omwami wambelesie kamaani, mboolele niko wenya khukhumboolela.”
Nio aloma ali, “Omanyile sikila ne nichile khwiwe? Nono lie khunyoa ndikho ngobolayo khu khuupana no mukhulu owe bubwami bwa Pasha. Ne nga ndaba ne malile khumuula, omukhulu owe bubwami bwe bukiriki alecha.
Ne kakhali ndakhuboolela ako kakaandikwa mu sitabu sie bung'ali. Se ndikho no kundi owe khu khuunjeta tawe ne akhali malaika omiliindi wenywe Mikaili.

“Ne kakhali ese mu mwiiko kwe khunyoa kwo mwami Dario omumedi, nema khumuyeeta niye ne khumua kamaani.”
Nono ndakhuboolela bung'ali bwe kamakhuwa kano.
Lola babaami babaandi bataru baliruka sibala sia Pasha. Mala omwami owe khaane akhabe omuiinda khukhila babamuraangirira boosi. Ne nga akhabe ne kamaani sikila buiinda bwewe, akharakikhe khukhwibwaakala bubwami bwe Bakiriki.
“Ne omwami we kamaani kamakali aliicha. Aliamiia ne bunyali bukali ne khukhola niko niye enya.
Ne akari we bunyali bwe bubwami bwewe bulikabukhanamo bitonyi bine. Babaami bakali be lisaaye liewe balibukula bubweyaangu bwewe ne kakhali se baliba ne kamaani nga kakewe tawe.
“Omwami owa Misiri akhabe ne kamaani, mala mulala khu bemeelesi bewe aliba ne kamaani kamakali khumukhila, mala amiia sibala sikali,
enyuma we kimiiko omwami owa Misiri alikhola buambaani no mwami owa Ashuru mala amuakhile omukhaana wewe. Ne kakhali buambaani buno se bukhamale siise tawe. Sikila omukhaana yuno, no museecha wewe, no mwana wewe, ne bakholi babacha naye baliirwa.
Enyuma we siise sitiiti mulala khu balebe bo mukhaana yuno aliamiia. Alibwaakala banamae bo mwami owa Ashuru, mala engile mu lukoba lwabwe mala abaule.
Alisuta ayile e Misiri bifwaani bie bawele babwe ne bibiindu bie esahabu ne efwesa nibio bara alubeka khu bawele babwe. Enyuma we kimiiko kimikali kie kumuleembe,
omwami owa Ashuru, alibwaakala Misiri, ne kakhali lilimuyingilila akobole mu sibala siewe.
“Basoleeli bo mwami owa Ashuru balirekekha liie mala babuusie banamae bakali. Mulala khwaabo aliba ne kamaani kamakali mala ebwaakale lukoba lwe basiku.
Mu lirima liewe, omwami owa Misiri alipana liie no mwami owa Ashuru, ne aliula banamae bewe bakali.
Aliebonia sikila bukhili bwewe ne banamae bakali nibo eerire. Ne kakhali se alichiililila khuba ne bukhili tawe.
“Omwami owa Ashuru alikobolayo mala abuusie banamae bakali khukhila nibo aaba nabo. Ne siise silayi ne siolile alikobola ne banamae bakali baali ne bulwaani bulayi.
Nio babaandu bakali balilekelesia omwami owa Misiri. Ne babaandu be sisiayuumba mu kholo mwowo, Danieli, balilekelesia nio kamalola kano kechusibwe, ne kakhali balikhilwa.
Ne omwami owa Ashuru alibotookhelesia lukoba mala aluambe. Banamae ba Misiri se balichiililila khu khuupana tawe, akhaba be kamaani bariena se bakhabemo kamaani tawe.
Omwami owa Ashuru alibakholela liosi liosi nilio enya akhole, ne se alibakhoo yesi yesi omukhiingilila tawe. Akheme mu sibala sie luyali, mala biindu bioosi biliba mu bunyali bwewe.
“Omwami owa Ashuru alirekekha khucha mwiie ne banamae bewe boosi. Ne khukhwonakaka bubwami bwo musiku wewe, aliambaana naye mukhumuakhila omukhaana wewe. Ne kakhali lirekekha lino se likhanyalikhane tawe.
Enyuma wako alibwaakala chikholo chiili siimbi ne nyanja mala aule chingali. Ne kakhali komanda owe banamae alimukhila mala amuambie chisoni. Ng'ali ekibonio yewe elimuruunga omwene.
Omwami alikobola mungoba che mu sibala siewe, ne kakhali alikhilwa, ne khukhwenokhwo nikhwo khuliba sisiakamo siewe.
“Omwami okundi alimuloondela, oliruma omwimeelesi oliyiingilila babaandu khurusia bushuru khutasa buiinda bwe bubwami. Mu siise sitiiti omwami akheerwe ne kakhali se akhererwe mu lirima namwe mwiie tawe.”
Malaika achiililila naloma ali, “Omwami oloondakho owa Ashuru akhabe omumayaanu okhenyibwa abe omwami tawe. Ne kakhali aliicha mala ebwaakale bubwami ne kamaani mu bubeeyi.
Yesi yesi olimukhiingilila akhaba ne ali Omusaayi Omukhulu owa Wele akheerwe.
Mu liambaana liewe akhabee chikholo chingali, ne alitasa khunyoola kamaani kamakali akhaba ne amiia babaandu batiiti busa.
Alibwaakala sibala siinda nakhababoolele tawe. Mala alikhola bibiindu bikali nibio bakuuka babwe bakhakholakho tawe. Akhakabe kimiaandu, buiinda, nende bibiindu biewe nibio bayaaya khukhwama mwiie. Akherekekhe khukhwibwaakala chingoba che kamasiisi, ne kakhali sikhabe busa khu siise sitiiti.
“Mu bunyindaafu aliba ne banamae bakali khukhwibwaakala omwami owa Misiri olierekekha khu khuupana ne banamae be kamaani bakali. Ne kakhali balibea omwami owa Misiri mala se alinyala tawe.
Akhaba baloondi bewe baali siimbi balimwiira. Banamae bewe bakali bakherwe.
Mala babaami babili abo balikhala khu mesa ndala khulia, ne kakhali kamebaasio kabwe kaliba kamamayaanu sikila bakhabeane, se bakhanyoole nilio bekoomba tawe sikila siise sisiarebwao sikhoola tawe.
Omwami owa Ashuru alikobola engo wewe nende buiinda bukali, ne kakhali mu mwoyo kwewe akherusie khukhwonaka endakaano endakatifu. Akhakhole lilienya liewe mala akobole mu sibala siewe omwene.
“Mu siise sisiarekekhwa, alibwaakala sibala sia Misiri lundi ne siise sino kamakhuwa kakhakaluukhane, se kakhabe nga kaba mataayi tawe.
Barumi baliicha mu meeli ne khumwibwaakala mala aliria.
“Ne alikobola enyuma mwirima ne khukhaka khukhwonakaka edini eye babaandu ba Wele. Akhaloonde likaambila liabo babalekha edini eyo.
Banamae bewe balinyaalutia Lukaangu ne chingoba che kamasiisi. Baliakamia biianwa bie khukhwosia bia buli ndaalo ne khukhwisia mu lukaangu Sibiilisio sie Lilionaka.
Mu bubeeyi alinyoola buyeeti khwaabo babalekha endakaano, ne kakhali babaandu bamanyile Wele wabwe bakheme siriririri mala bakhole sikholwa.
Abo baali ne limanya akarikari wabwe bakhekisie bakali. Kakhaba kario khu siise bakherwe ne mbalu namwe kumulilo, bakhabaambe babayile mu mbaambe namwe banuulwe kimiaandu kiabwe.
Nga liliira ne likhabe ne lichiililila, babaandu ba Wele balinyoola buyeeti butiiti, ne kakhaba kario bakali baliambaana nabo balikhola bario mu khwikholesia busa.
Balala khu baandu be limanya bakherwe, nio boole khukwalaasibwa, khutakaasibwa, ne khusiingwa khukhwola khu sise simaliilisi. Siise esio khu sise sino sikhoola tawe.
Ne omwami oyo se alielesiakho liria liosi liosi khu bawele nibo bakuuka bewe bakholelanga, namwe khuyo niye bakhasi bekoombanga tawe. Akhalekelesie bawele babaandi boosi sikila akhebale khuuba owe bunyali bukali khukhila buli mulala khu bawele abo boosi.
Mu bweyaangu bwe bawele abo, niye aliinamila wele oliindanga chingoba, wele niye bakuukawe bakhaamanyakho tawe. Aliaana khu wele oyo esahabu, efwesa, kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki, ne biaanwa bibiindi bie bukusi bwe angaaki.
Akhebwaakale chingoba che kamaani lukali khulwe buyeeti bwa wele owe babaandu babaandi. Abo baamufukiilila niye khuuba omwami, akhabaelesie lukoosi lukali. Akhabare mu bwimeelesi bwe angaaki ne khubaelesia kimikuunda nga siaanwa siabwe.
“Nga siise simaliilisi sio mwami owa Ashuru ne sikhabe siimbi khukhwola, omwami owa Misiri alimwibwaakala, ne omwami owa Ashuru alipana naye ne kamaani kewe koosi, ne arumikhira kamakaari, chifarasi, ne chimeeli chingali. Akhebwaakale bibala bikali, nga kameechi kamakali po.
Alibwaakala sibala sie ndakaano esio mala eere babaandu chielefu ne chielefu. Ne kakhali bibala bia Edomu, Moabu, ne babaandu be lubeka lwa Amoni bakali baliona.
Nga alibwaakala bibala ebio bioosi, akhaba Misiri sesiliona tawe.
Alinuula libiikhilo lia Misiri lie sahabu ne fwesa ne bibiindu bibiindi bie bukusi bwe angaaki. Babaandu ba Libia nende Baesopia bakhaloonde kakewe.
Mala kamakhuwa khukhwama ebukwe ne ebunaswa kakhamuriisie. Mala akhenyokhe ne lirima likali khubunia ne khukhwira bakali.
Aliombakha kamaeema kewe kamaboofu akarikari we nyanja ne sikulu sie luyali lundi sitakatifu. Ne kakhaba kario akhabe oolile khu siakamo siewe, ne se akhabeo yesi yesi olimuyeeta tawe.”

Bakali khwaabo babafwa balilamukha: balilamukha lundi balala balinyoola bulamu bwa mindali, ne babaandi balinyoola chisoni cha mindali.
Abo baali ne limanya balikhosia nga buwaanga bwe khwikulu. Ne abo babekesianga babaandu khukhola kamaluungi balikhosia nga ching'enieesi mindali na mindali.”
Nio Ese Danieli nalola mala nabona babaandu babili bemile khulukuku lwe luluuchi mulala eyi ne okundi eyi.
Mulala khwaabo areeba malaika owaba ne efwarire engubo eya katani ne emile a luuchi angaaki ali, “bilabukula siise siina nio bibiindu bie liukia bino bikholekhe?”
Naulila niko aloma, ne kakhali se nakamanya tawe. Khwako nareeba ndi, “Omwami, sisiakamo sie kamakhuwa kano koosi sikhabe siriena?”
Angobosia ali, “Danieli khukhwola oche siise sino, sikila kamakhuwa kano kali ke mu bwikisi lundi kafuniikhwe ne kumuuri khukhwola siise simaliilisi.
Babaandu bakali bakhakwalaasibwe, batakaasibwe ne khusiigwa. Ne kakhali abo baali bamayaanu bakhachiililile khukhola bumayaanu. Se akhabeo khu bamayaanu abo akhaba mulala okhamanye tawe, ne kakhali abo baali ne limanya bakhamanye.
Bali ne khabi abo baliekhaliilikha khukhwola chindaalo e elefu ndala ne chimia chitaru ne kamakhumi kataru na chiraano ne chiwa!
“Ne ewe Danieli, ba omusuubilwa khukhwola khu siakamo. Mala olifwa ne olilamukha khunyoola kumuruuru kwowo mu siise simaliilisi.”

Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne alomaloma lwe khunyoa khu Isiraeli khubirira khu Hosea, amuboolela ali, “Cha oyile omukhasi, omukhasi yuno alaba omueeyi, ne alasaala babaana bamuloonde, bulayi bwene nga babaandu base ne bandekhile mala baloba khukhusuubila ese.”
Nio Hosea ayila Komeri, omukhaana owa Tibulaimu. Komeri asaala omwana omusoleeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Hosea ali, “Mutiuukhe oli ‘Yesireeli,’ sikila mu siise sitiiti ndaukuuma enju eya Yehu sikila sifuki sia Yesireeli. Ndikho nja khwakamia bubwami bwe enju eya Isiraeli.
Ne endaalo eyo ndibunia banamae ba Isiraeli mwitooma lia Yesireeli.”
Komeri anyoola omwana owa khabili, omukhaana. Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Hosea ali, “Mutiuukhe oli ‘Nabulobe,’ sikila ese se ndokesiakho siisa lundi khu nju eya Isiraeli tawe, namwe mbabeele tawe.
Ne kakhali khu baandu ba Yuda ndekesia siisa. Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe, ndabaonia. Ne se khabaonie ne liie, namwe ne chifarasi namwe ne babaandu bachitimia tawe.”
Nga Komeri alatia Nabulobe aesia lundi, asaala omwana omusoleeli.
Mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Mutiuukhe oli ‘Se-Bali-Babaandu-Base Tawe,’ sikila se muli babaandu base tawe, ne Ese se ndi Wele wenywe tawe.”
Nono babaandu ba Yuda ne babaandu ba Isiraeli balibuusiana alala. Balirobora omwimeelesi mulala mala baliindiala mu sibala siabwe. Ng'ali eliba endaalo emboofu eya Yesireeli.

Laanga wandaayo omusoleeli
Baana base yekoonjelela maawenywe,
akhaba luno ne akhali omukhasi wase tawe,
ne nase se ndi omuseecha wewe tawe,
mwekoonjelele alekhe bueeyi.
Kholandio namufuula
mala aba sichula nga khu ndaalo niyo asaalilwakho,
mala abe nga sichiimi,
mukhole oome nga sibala sisioomu
nio mwiire ne bulesia.
Khu baana bewe boosi se ndibakho ne siisa tawe
sikila bali babaana babasaalwa mu bueeyi.
Sikila mawaabwe akhola bueeyi
owabasaala akhola ke chisoni
sikila aloma ali, “Nja khuloonda khu basaale base
babambechanga siakhulia ne kameechi,
bufuumbo bwe kamakheese ne katani,
kamafura nende nibio enywa.”
Khwako ndisira engila yewe ne kamawa
mubotookhelesie lisiisi
saliba ne ngila eye khurura tawe.
Aliloondelela basaale bewe
ne kakhali se alibanyoola tawe,
alibayiima ne kakhali se alibanyoola tawe
mala aliloma ali, “Lekha ngobole wo museecha wase owambula
sikila nabakho bulayi siisa esio, khukhila luno.”
Ne se amanya ali ese niye
wamua biakhulia, endali ne kamafura,
owabaelesia efwesa ne esahabu engali
niyo arumikha khusaaya Baali tawe.
Khwako ndimunuula
biakhulia biase mu siise sie likesa
ne endali yase mu siise siayo
ndimunuula chingubo chase che bufuumbo bwe kamakheese ne katani
nibio namuelesia khukhwefwara.
Ndimufwarura arame sichula
ebweeni we batia bewe
ne se aliio olikhiingilila khukhola ndio tawe.
Ndiakamia busangaafu bwewe bwoosi
chinaikara chewe che kimieesi kimiya
ne chisabato chewe,
ne chinaikara chewe choosi chichalakwa.
Ndionaka kimisabibu ne kimituli kiewe
nikio aloma ali,
“Kino kili kumuruungo nikwo batia base baamba.”
Ndikikhola kibe kumusiru
ne chisaang'i che mundaa chilikionakaka.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndimuukuuma niye sikila chindaalo nicho akholela Baali naikara,
nga abooselia bupaani
ne esaa omwene embete ne kamamili
nio ache khuyiima batia bewe mala anjibilila ese.
“Khwako, nja khumuombelesia muyile mu sichiimi
mala ngachule naye bulayi.
mala khole litooma lia Akori
libe kumuliango kwe lilieyikina.
Nio ebweeneyo alilomaloma nga mu ndaalo chewe che buele
nga mu sise nisio aruriira e Misiri.”
Omwami Wele aloma ali, “Endaalo eyo ewe olinaanga oli ‘Omuseecha wase,’ se olilomakho lundi oli Baali wase tawe.”
Sikila ndirusia mu munwa kwewe kamasina ke ba Baali. Se balilangwakho lundi kamasina ako tawe.
Mala mu siise esio ndikhola endakaano ne chisaang'i che mundaa, ne chinyuni, ne bibiindu bioosi bimoola. Ndirusia buyiingo, embalu nende liie khu sibala. Ndikhukhola omenye mu muleembe.
Ne ese ndikhubukula obe omukhasi wase owa buli lwoosi. Oliba omukhasi wase mu busuubilifu ne mu bung'ali, mu busiime bukhawa ne mu siisa sia mindali.
Ndikhubukula obe omukhasi wase mu busuubilifu, mala omanye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali mu ndaalo eyo,
ndifukiilila lisaba lie babaandu base Isiraeli
ne khalekhuule efula ekwe,
ne sibala silikhusia biakhulia ne kamatuunda.
mala mbaelesie kimiaandu.
Ndiekesia busiime bwase khwaabo nibo balanganga bali “Nabulobe,”
ne khwaabo babalaangwa bali, “Se Bali Babaandu Base Tawe,” Ndiboola ndi, “Muli Babaandu Base”
ne nabo baliloma bali, “Nawe oli Wele wefwe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, “Cha lundi wekesie busiime khu mukhasi olikhokhola sifwaabi ne baseecha babaandi khukhwola omusiime nga Omwami Wele ne asiima babaandu ba Isiraeli, akhaba ne baloondanga bawele babaandi ne khusiima khuaana kimikaati kie limela khu bifwaani.”
Nio nakula omukhasi oyo bitonyi bie efwesa ekhumi na biraano ne likunia ne nusu lie eshayiri.
Nio namuboolela ndi, “Olamenya siise sikali, nokhakholakho bueeyi namwe sifwaabi no mundu okundi tawe. Ne sesi nja khuba omusuubilifu khwiwe.”
Mungila yino babaandu ba Isiraeli balimenya siise sileeyi ne bakhali no mwami namwe omwimeelesi tawe, ne bakhali ne biianwa bie chimbosio namwe enjeko eye kamabaale, namwe bifwaani ne bifwaanane bie bufumu.
Ne ekhumaliilikha babaandu ba Isiraeli balikobola mala basaaye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe, ne khuyiima Daudi omwami wabwe. Nio baliria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe ne khubona bulayi bwewe mu ndaalo chimaliilisi.

Ulila likhuwa lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
enywe baandu ba Isiraeli,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne libiiya khu baandu ba menyile mu sibala.
Busuubilifu namwe siisa se biliio tawe,
ne limanya lia Wele mu sibala mbamo.
Khuli ne khukhwechuba, bubeeyi, bubwiri, bubwifwi
ne khukhola bueeyi
bafuna kamalaka koosi
ne beera nandakhaola.
Khwako sibala sibeelela
ne boosi bamenyilemo beunamila,
nio akhaba chisaang'i che mundaa
ne chinyuni che mungaaki
akhaba ching'eeni che mu nyanja bilifwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Omundu yesi yesi alekhe khukhweloocha namwe khubiiya,
sikila omusaayi, lilieloocha liase lili khwiwe.
Olietuya kumuusi
omung'oosi yesi alietuya ne nawe mu siilo
ne ndibunia ekholo eya maao.
Babaandu base babuna sikila se bali ne limanya tawe,
sikila ewe waloba limanya,
sesi nakhulobile ewe khuba omusaayi wase.
Sikila webilila lilaka lia Wele wowo,
Ese sesi ndibilila babaana bowo.
“Nga basaayi ne bakucha,
nga nilwo batasa khukhola bubwoni,
ndikaluukhania efuma yabwe ebe chisoni.
Muindiaala sikila bubwoni bwe babaandu base,
khwako mwekoomba batase khukhola bubwoni.
Siiukuumo nisio babaandu babaandi balinyoola mwesi mukhasinyoole
khamuukuume enywe mala muruungie kamabi niko mwakhola.
Mukhalie chinaikara chenywe,
ne se mulikura tawe.
Mulisaaya bawele babaandi munyoole babaana
ne se mulinyoola tawe,
sikila mwanjanjukha mala mwasaaya wele babaandi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Endali ekhale ne mbia
erusia mu baandu base limanya!
Babaandu base benya khumanya kamakhuwa khu bisosono
ne lusaala lubekesia niko benya bamanye,
sikila kumwoyo kwe bueeyi kwabatibia
nono banjuukhe Wele wabwe khukhola bueeyi.
Baana chimbosio khu bikulu khungaaki,
ne khuaana biianwa khu ngulu,
mu mukhoonge ne mumurongooro kumuboofu,
sikila sisiiniini siakwo silayi.
Khwako bakhaana benywe bakhola bueeyi,
ne bakhasi be babaana benywe bakhobana.
Ne se nja khuukuuma bakhaana benywe,
ne bakhola bulaaya tawe.
Namwe bakhasi be babaana benywe ne bakhola bueeyi tawe
sikila baseecha baloondelela balaaya,
ne khuaana chimbosio mu ngila che balaaya
babaandu bakhali ne limanya balibuna.
Isiraeli enywe ne mukhola bueeyi,
Yuda se lulabalikha nga nilwo lukholile tawe.
Mukhacha mu Kilikali namwe Betifeni tawe,
ne mukhechuba muli ‘Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne amenyile mindali,’ tawe.
Nga emasoti eye sileka,
Isiraeli ali we sileka,
nono Omwami Wele anyala abaliisia,
nga limeeme mu mayilwe ku?
Lekha babaandu ba Isiraeli basaaya bifwaani babe.
Sipupu sie bameesi,
babene beaana khu bueeyi,
basiima chisoni khukhila lukoosi lwabwe.
Bakhasutibwe oli basutwa ne khuungu,
mala baliaambwa chisoni khulwe biianwa nibio barusilia ba wele babaandi.”

“Enywe basaayi ulila kano!
Rekeeresia enywe be nju eya Isiraeli!
Muulile enywe be lisaaye lie bubwami.
Mala likhalaka lili khwinywe,
sikila mwabele kumureko e Misipa
ne lutimba lwabakaalwe khu Tabori.
Mala bayaba liloo lileeyi e Sitimu
ne ese ndaukuuma boosi
Manyile Isiraeli
ne Isiraeli se yanjekisakho tawe
Ne luno, Isiraeli yakholile bueeyi
Isiraeli yafwolobisiibwe.”
Bikholwa biabwe bibakhiingilila khukobolela Wele wabwe,
sikila kumwiima kwe bueeyi kubalimo,
khwako se bamanyile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe.
Ekibonio eya Isiraeli ebonekha ebweeni wayo,
Isiraeli elikwa sikila bubwoni bwayo,
ne Yuda yosi elikwa ne nabo.
Baliaana bibiaayo biabwe ne chikhaafu khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne kakhali se balimunyoola tawe,
sikila aabanjuukhe.
Bafunaka lisuubila khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
sikila basaala babaana mu bakhasi bakeni.
Khwako kumwesi kumuyia kulibabunia
alala ne kimikuunda kiabwe.
Khupa ekhoombi mu Kibea,
ne lulwiika mu Rama.
Khupa lulwang'a e Beteli,
yirekekha, ewe Benjamini.
Isiraeli ekhabune
mu ndaalo eye siiukuumo,
mu kholo cha Isiraeli,
ng'ali ndoma ng'ali kaliekholekha.
Babemeelesi ba Yuda bali nga
abo barusiao chinjakha,
ndibachukhakho lirima liase
nga kameechi.
Isiraeli yapisibwe siibi
yaminiikhwe mu likhalakwa,
sikila yakhayilila khuyiima buyeeti bwa busa.
Khwako ndi nga sipurupuru khu Isiraeli,
ne nga sichikhi sibolile khu nju eya Yuda.
Nga Isiraeli yabona bulwaale bwayo
ne Yuda likoonjo liayo
mala Isiraeli yacha Asiria
ne khusaba omwami omukhulu buyeeti,
ne kakhali se anyala khukhusilikha namwe khuonia likoonjo tawe.
Sikila ese nja khuba nga etalang'i khu Isiraeli,
ne nga eng'ana eye etalang'i khu nju eya Yuda.
Ese, samwene, ndibatabulaka mala mbalekhe
ndibatiila, ne se aliio olibareesia tawe.
Ndianjukha babaandu base,
khukhwola bapisibwe siibi sisiolaana
sikila bubwoni bwabwe mala bambeenje.
Wakana mu butinyu bwabwe buno balikhaka khu khumbeenja.

Babaandu baloma bali, “Yiicha, khukobolele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
akhaba ne akhuumisia efwe, alakhuonia
akhaba ne akhuupakile efwe, alakhusilikha.
Enyuma we chindaalo chibili alikhulamusia,
khu ndaalo eya khataru alikhwinyosia,
nio khumenye ne naye.
Lekha khumumanye, khukhake khumanye Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khukhwicha khwewe khumanyikhaane busa nga enje ne buli khusia,
echa nga efula
nga efula eye mu siruumbi nekwa.”
Ewe Isiraeli ndikhukhola siina?
Nawe Yuda ndikhukhola siina?
Busiime bwowo buli nga namufweli eye kumutikhinyi,
buli nga luume luweelelela ne liaanga.
Ako niko kakila ne ndumire bang'oosi base,
ne burume bwe sikhalako ne libunia.
Niko nenya khwinywe kali busa abuwaanga lundi khwasie.
limanya lia Wele khukhila biianwa bie khukhwosia.
Ne kakhali bafunaka endakaano abundu alaangwa Adamu,
ebweeneyo se bakholela ne busuubilifu tawe.
Kileati luli lukoba lwe babonaki,
lulwechulamo sifuki.
Nga banuuli ne bebuulila omundu,
bali bario basaayi babuusiana alala,
beerera khu ngila echa Shekemu
ng'ali bakakhola siootia.
Nabona sisiindu sie khuukia munju eya Isiraeli,
babaandu base, benyaalutisie khulwe bueeyi.
Ne ewe wesi Yuda,
narereo siise sie siiukuumo,
khu niko mulikho mukhola.
Nga ndikobosia chikhabi che babaandu base.

Nga ne ndionia Isiraeli,
kamamayaanu ka Isiraeli kalimanyikha,
akhaba bikholwa bimayaanu bia Samaria,
sikila babeana.
Omwifwi afunaka chinju khukhwiba,
banuuli banuula babaandu khu ngila.
Ne kakhali se bebaasiakho bali,
ese khebulila bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu tawe.
Nono bikholwa biabwe biabakarire,
mala nabimanyile.
Basangaasia omwami ne kamamayaanu kabwe,
basangaasia babemeelesi ne bubacha bwabwe.
Boosi bali baeeyi
bali nga kumulilo mu sibero
nikwo oupa kimikaati alekha khukhwikelesiamo
khukhwamila khukaanda sifu
khukhwola nga ne siya.
Endaalo eye khukhwekhoya khwo mwami,
bameesia omwami ne babemeelesi bewe,
ne khubasilwasia ne ndali.
Ne nga bunoro,
kimiooyo kiabwe kiya busa ne liliekoomba libi,
lirima liabwe lising'eng'a siilo siosi,
ne kumutikhinyi lierika nga kumulilo kuburukha.
Boosi babila oli bunoro e sibero,
mala beera baruki babwe.
Babaami babwe boosi bakwiile,
ne se aliio owasaba ese buyeeti tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Isiraeli atubaanile ne chikholo chichiindi,
Isiraeli eli nga kumukaati kukwafuba,
Beyikina chikholo chichiindi.
Ne se bamanya bali,
lilieyikina liabwe lino liabamalile kamaani tawe,
Chindaalo chabwe chilikho chiwa ne se bamanyile tawe.
Ekibonio eya Isiraeli ebabuula babeene,
ne se bakobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe tawe,
namwe bamuyiime mu kano koosi tawe.
Isiraeli bali nga liuusi lisilu likhali ne limanya tawe,
balaanga Misiri, ne khukhwilukhila Asiria.
Ne nga bacha, nja khubafumakho lutimba lwase,
nja khubakwisia asi nga chinyuni che mu ngaaki,
nja khubaukuuma khulwe bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
“Bali ne silaamo, sikila banjilukha,
babunile, sikila bandekelesie,
nakhabaonisie,
ne kakhali baloma bubeeyi khwise.
Se baasaba khukhwama mu miooyo kiabwe tawe,
ne kakhali bakukuulila khu bitaanda biabwe
bekhalakaka babeene khulwe siakhulia ne ndali,
ne khukhundekelesia.
Akhaba ne nabekesia ne khura kamaani mu makhono kabwe,
bangwangwanila.
Basaaya Baali bali nga buyiingo nibwo okheyikina tawe,
babemeelesi babwe balifwila mwiie,
sikila ekibonio yabwe eye sileka
kano kaliba enjekho khu nibo mu sibala sia Misiri.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali:
Khupa lulwang'a!
Basiku becha khu sibala siase nga chifuruusi,
babaandu base bafunile endakaano niyo nakhola nabo,
mala balekeleesie lilaka liase.
Bandilila ne baloma bali,
“Wele wefwe efwe Baisiraeli khukhumanyile”
balobile kaali kamalayi
sikila kano basiku babwe balabebwaakala.
Baamiia babaami nibo ese khamanyile tawe,
barao babemeelesi, nibo ese khamanyile tawe,
Bakhola bifwaani bie efwesa ne esahabu yabwe bibabunia babeene.
Baandu ba Samaria,
ndi ne lirima khwinywe,
khukhwola siise sina nio mube baluungi
mu Isiraeli?
Omundu abing'oona ne se bili Wele tawe.
Sifwaani sia Samaria silifunakakwa sibe bitonyi.
Sikila bamiicha ekhuungu
nio balikesa sisifuusia
sibiaalwa se silimulikha tawe,
se silisaala siakhulia tawe,
ne silaba bareende balisilia.
Isiraeli yamilwa,
eli khale mu kholo chichiindi.
Ne seli ne bukhala tawe.
Sikila bachile khukhwola Asiria,
nga epunda eye mundaa ekeendakeenda yong'ene busa,
Isiraeli yakulile bakhola bueeyi nayo.
Akhaba ne bakula bayeeti mu kholo chichiindi
nja khubabuusia alala.
Nio mu siise sitiiti
balilekha khukhwamiisia omwami ne babemeelesi.
Sikila Isiraeli yeyombakhiile chi alutare
chingali che khukhola bubwoni
khu niyo chekholile chi alutare che khukhola bubwoni.
Nakhakiandikila kamalaka kase khukhwola chielefu ekhumi,
kalaba busa nga siindu sikeni.
Basiima bie chimbosio
baana chimbosio che chinyama ne khuchilia
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se abisiimakho tawe.
Nono alakhebulila bumayaanu bwabwe,
ne khubaukuuma sikila bubwoni bwabwe,
balikobola e Misiri.
Sikila Isiraeli yebiliile owakibuumba
mala yombaakhe kamachipi
ne Yuda yatasile khukhwombakha chingoba
ne kakhali nja khuruma kumulilo khu ngoba chayo
mala kuliosia chingoba chayo.

Baisiraeli mukhasangaala tawe,
mukhasachaala nga chikholo chichiindi tawe,
sikila mwakhola bueeyi
ne khulekha Wele wenywe.
Enywe mwasiima kumuruungo kwo mueeyi,
khu luya lwe khukhwanikhilakho biakhulia.
Mu siise sitiiti siri, se mulaba ne siakhulia ne kamafura kakoola tawe,
ne endali se elibao tawe.
Babaandu ba Isiraeli se balimenya mu sibala sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
ne kakhali balikobola e Misiri,
balilia biakhulia bibiakaanisibwa ne bali mu Asiria.
Se balichukhila biianwa bie endali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
ne se balimusiimisia ne chimbosio chabwe tawe.
Siakhulia siabwe siliba nga sie mu masika, buli osiliakho alibalikha khuba omunyaalu,
sikila siakhulia esio siliba sie mu njala,
se silichakho munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Mulikhola siina khu ndaalo yabisibwa eye kumulukha
ne khu ndaalo eya naikara eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Lola, balikho bacha Asiria
Misiri elibabuusia,
Memufisi elibasiikha,
enyoonyi elimela khu biindu biabwe bie lukoosi bie efwesa,
ne kamawa kalimela mu maeema kabwe.
chindaalo che kumuruuru cholile,
Isiraeli khukhwola bamanye chindaalo echo
Omung'oosi abeele omusilu,
omundu owa roho alaluukhe,
sikila bumayaanu bwenywe
ne sikhoonde sienywe sikali.
Omung'oosi ali omuliindi owa Efuraimu,
babaandu ba Wele wase,
ne buboche bwe enyuni buli khu ngila chewe choosi,
ne aambilwe sikhoonde munju eya Wele wewe.
nga mu ndaalo cha Kibea,
Wele alikhebulila bumayaanu bwabwe,
akhabaukuume sikila bubwoni bwabwe.
nga kimisabibu mu sichiimi,
nga enduli eenyoa khu mutuli,
mu sise sie siimiyu.
Ese nabona bakuuka benywe ne becha e Baali-peori,
mala beaana babeene khu Baali,
ne khuba babi nga bawele nibo basiima.
Lukoosi lwa Efuraimu lulipurukha nga enyuni,
babaana se bakhasaalwe tawe,
bakhasi se bakhaesie tawe,
khutasa lisaaye mbao.
Akhaba ne basaala babaana,
ndibeera boosi se ndilekhakho akhaba mulala tawe,
baliba ne silaamo,
siise nisio ndiba aleeyi nabo.
Naboone babaana ba Efuraimu
balakiilwe lifwa,
Efuraimu khukhwola ayile babaana
bewe khukhwirwa.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
siina nisio okhakholele babaandu?
Khola bakhasi babwe babe bakuumba,
bakhanuniakho tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Bubwoni bwabwe bwoosi bwarakikhira e Kilikali
ebweeneyo niyo narakikhira khubabiila.
Ndabarusia mu sibala siase sikila bubwoni nibwo bakhola,
se khabasiime lundi tawe,
babemeelesi babwe boosi bakholele sileka.
Isiraeli sili nga kumurongooro nikwo kimili kiomile,
kukhanyala kwaana kamatuunda tawe,
se balaba ne babaana tawe.
Ne akhaba baliba nabo
ndiira babaana babwe basiime.”
Wele wase niye esaayanga alibekaana,
sikila baloba khumurekeeresia,
baliba bakeendaani mu kholo choosi.

Babaandu Baisiraeli baba nga kumusabibu kukwanenekha.
Nga baindiaalanga,
bachililanga khukhwombakha chi alutare chichiindi.
Nga sibala siabwe siachiililila khuindiaala,
nabo bachiililila khusaa kamabaale kabwe niko basaaya.
Bali babeeyi,
nono bakhoyela banaanisibwe khu mabi kabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alifunaka chi alutare chabwe,
ne khukhwonaka chinjeko chabwe che khukhwesaaya.
Ne luno baloma bali,
“Se khuli no mwami tawe,
sikila se khuriakho Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
nono omwami naye, alikhukholela siina?”
Belomalomia busa kamakhuwa
bakhola chindakaano mu khwechuba khwe bubeeyi,
nono likhalaka linyokha busa nga
enyoonyi embi mu mukuunda kumulime.
Bamenywa ba Samaria baterema
khubeela euunwa eye Beteli.
Babaandu bayo balikilila,
ne basaayi bayo bakisaaya balikilila,
sikila lukoosi lwayo lwakilekhile.
Ee, sifwaani sisiene siliilwa Asiria,
nga kumuruungo khu mwami omukhulu.
Efuraimu aliambwa chisoni
ne Isiraeli eliambwa chisoni sikila sifwaani siayo.
Omwami owa Samaria alibukulwa,
nga sitonyi sie lukhu khu meechi.
niio Baisiraeli basaayilangao bifwaani,
bikhonakakwe.
Kamawa ne mbululwe bilimela khu alutare chabwe.
Baliboolela bikulu bali, “Khukise!”
Ne chingulu bali, “Khufuume!”
“Babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhalekhakho khu khukholela bubwoni tawe,
khukhwama siise nisio bakholela bubwoni e Kibea,
khwako, liie likhabanyoole e Kibea.
Ndibwaakala babaandu babooni bano ne khubaukuuma.
Chikholo chiliebuusia khubebwaakala,
mala baliukuumwa sikila bubwoni bwabwe bukali.
“Isiraeli yaba nga ekhaafu niyo beyikia bulayi khukhwesa lichooki,
ne kakhali se nara khwikosi liayo lilayi elio lichooki
namwe nakira khu milimo kimikali tawe.
Nakhola Yuda khukhwesa embako,
ne Isiraeli khubuusa.
kesa kamatuunda ke busiime bukhawa tawe,
lima liirome lienywe,
sikila sili siise sie khuyiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
nio amuelesie buonia.
Mwabiaala kamamayaanu
mwakesile kakhali kang'ali tawe,
mwaliile lituunda lie bubeeyi.
“Sikila mweyikina kamakaari ke chifarasi
ne bukali bwe banamae bowo,
khwako sisiayuumba sie liie
sikhabeo khu baandu bowo,
ne chingoba chowo choosi chikhonakwe,
nga Salimoni abunia Besaribeli mu ndaalo eye liie,
ne bamaayi ne babaana babwe batienuulwa bafwa.
Ee Isiraeli,
kano kaliekholekha khwinywe
sikila bubwoni bwenywe bukali,
omwami owa Isiraeli alifwila mu mbembeesi

“Nga Isiraeli ne aba omwana: Ese namusiima
ne namulaanga nga omwana wase
Ne nga nabelelela khumulaanga
nga eseenda aleeyi nase.
Babaandu base baana chimbosio khu Baali,
ne khukhwosia bupaani khu bifwaani.
Ne mala naba ese owekesia Isiraeli khukeenda.
Ese owabalela mu makhono kase,
ne se bamanya bali ese owabaonia tawe.
Nabalaanga ne lukoosi ne busiime,
nabara khu sifuba siase,
mala nabaliisia.
“Balikobola mu sibala sie Misiri,
ne Asiria silibamiia,
sikila balobile khu khungobolela.
Liie liliicha khu ngoba chabwe,
lilifunaka bikhomekho bie bilibwa biabwe,
ne khubeerera mu ngoba chabwe.
Babaandu base bakhailiile khukhunjilukha
khwako bakhalakiilwe lichooki
ne se aliio olibarusiakho tawe.
Isiraeli, nyala nakhumwaata ndiena?
Nyala ndiena khu khukhola ewe nga Atimai?
Khubukula ewe nga Seboimu ndiena?
Kumwoyo kwase se kungana nakakhola ndio tawe!
Busiime bwase khwiwe buli ne kamaani khukhila.
Se ndakhuukuuma ne siili ne lirima tawe,
se ndabunia Isiraeli lundi tawe.
Sikila Ese ndi Wele se ndi omundu tawe.
Ese Omutakatifu ndi nanywe,
nono se kheche ne lirima tawe.
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Balieenja Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
aliulukhuma nga etalang'i,
ee, aliulukhuma,
mala babaana bewe baliicha ne baterema khukhwama mumbo.
Baliicha ne baterema nga chinyuni khukhwama e Misiri,
ne nga kamauusi khukhwama mu sibala sia Asiria,
ne ndibakobosia mu ngoba chabwe.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Baisiraeli bambotookheleele ne bubeeyi ne bubacha,
ne Bayaudi basiikholela busa sileka,
ese oli omusuubilwa lundi Wele Omutakatifu.”

Efuraimu aaya embeo,
mala aloondeleela embeo eye ebunaswa endaalo yoosi,
batasa bubeeyi ne sisiayuumba
bakhola endakaano nende Asiria,
ne kamafura kayilwa e Misiri.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asitaka Yuda,
ne alaukuuma Yakobo khu bikholwa biewe,
ne khumua kumuruuru khu bikholwa biewe.
atiila wandaaye ekhukunyu,
ne mu bukhulu bwewe arekana ne Wele.
alila ne khusaba buyeeti bwewe,
akaanana nende Wele e Beteli,
ebweeneyo Wele alomaloma naye.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we banamae,
lisina liewe bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nono ewe, mu buyeeti bwa Wele wowo kobola,
lumilila khu busiime ne bung'ali,
chiililila khulindiilila Wele wowo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu ba Isiraeli bafwaanana busa ne Bakanaani mu bubeeyi,
basiima khukhwibila mu bipiimilo biabwe abo babakulakho.
Efuraimu alomile ali, ‘Aa, ndi omuiinda
nenyoolele samwene kimiaandu,’
ne kakhali kimiaandu kiewe kiosi
se kinyala khurusiao bumayaanu bumulikho tawe.
khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri,
nja khumukhola mumenye lundi mu maeema,
nga mu ndaalo che naikara yakhalakwa.
“Nalomaloma khu bang'oosi,
naba ese wakaliia kamalola,
naana chisimo khubirira mu bang'oosi.
Bumayaanu bwaaba ne buli mu Kileati,
se bulibayeeta siindu tawe,
ne baba ne baana chiuunwa nga chimbosio e Kilikali,
chi alutare chabwe chiliba nga bipupu bie kamabaale mu mukuunda kulimiilwe.”
ebweeneyo asiooba akhwe omukhasi
aaya kamakheese nio anyoole omukhasi.)
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arusia Isiraeli e Misiri,
mala Isiraeli aaliindwa no mung'oosi.
Efuraimu akholile ke lisinye likali po,
khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akalusia sifuki khu mwene,
ne acha khumuukuuma khu mamayaanu kewe.

Nga Efuraimu aalomaloma, babaandu baterema,
aaba we luyali mu Isiraeli
ne kakhali anyolekhana ne kamamayaanu
khubeela Baali mala afwa.
Nono bachiililila khukhola bubwoni,
nga bekholela bifwaani bibiinakulukha,
bifwaani bibiakholwa mu busicha ne fwesa yabwe,
bioosi bili kumulimo kwe babeechi
aboolela babaandu khuaana chimbosio khu bino,
ne khubikwayila.
Khwako baliba nga namufweli we kumutikhinyi,
namwe nga luume luwao bwangu,
nga likhuuchi nilio babisia,
namwe nga liliisi lirurira mwitirisia.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo,
khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri,
somanyile Wele okundi, ne khali ese tawe,
ne nekhali ese, omuonia okundi se aliio tawe.
mu sibala sie siimiyu.
Ne nga balia lukali bekurira elala,
basangaala,
mala banjibilila,
khwako nja khuba khu nibo nga etalang'i,
nga engwe, ndabebuulila khu ngila.
Ndi bafwakhila nga linani,
litibiisie ching'ana chalio,
nditabulaka bifuba biabwe,
ao ne nao khubalia nga etalang'i,
ne khubatabulaka nga esaang'i eye mundaa ne ebatabulaka.
Isiraeli, khamubunie enywe,
naanu olimuyeeta enywe?
Babemeelesi benywe bosi nabo bali waena bamuliinde?
Mwaboolela balala muli,
“Khuelesie omwami ne babemeelesi.”
ne mu lisinyikha liase nabarusiisieo.
Bumayaanu bwa Isiraeli bwaboyilwe
bubwoni bwewe bwabikhiilwe mu siaki.
Buchuuni bwe khusaala omwana bwama khu niye,
ne kakhali ali omwana omusilu,
nga owenya khusaalwa mala aloba khurura munda mwa maawe.
Ndibaonia khukhwama mwifwa ku?
Ee Makoombe, libuna liowo lili waena?
Se ndaba ne siisa lundi tawe.
Akhaba omulayi nga simelwa,
embeo eye ebukwe, eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
eliucha khukhwama mu sichiimi,
nio esebele yewe yoome
ne emoni eye kameechi kewe eteenye,
buli siindu sili silayi silinuulwa khukhwama mu libiikhilo liewe.
Samaria aliukuumwa sikila bumayaanu bwewe,
sikila aakholela Wele wewe sileka,
balifwila mwiie
babaana babwe baliremakwamo bitonyi
ne bakhasi babwe baali sisombo balitienulwamo.

Isiraeli, kobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo,
wakwile sikila bubwoni bwowo.
Yibaasia kamakhuwa kano,
mala okobolele Omwami Wele omuboolele oli,
“Rusiao bubwoni bwase bwoosi,
yakaanila ako kali kamalayi,
nio khu khufumie ne kiminwa kiefwe.
Asiria se elikhuonia tawe,
se khulikeendela khu farasi tawe,
se khulilaanga kimilimo kie kamakhono kefwe khuli, ‘Wele wefwe tawe.’
Ne omufuubi anyoolanga siisa khwiwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndikobosia babaandu base,
ndibasiima ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi,
nono se ndibaambila lirima lundi tawe.
Ndiba khu Baisiraeli nga luume,
ne balimulikha nga bimuli,
