ne khukhwikhisia kimili nga kimirongooro kia Lebanoni.
Kimili kiewe kilialaama mwiloba,
bulayi bwewe buliba nga kumusabibu,
ne elaafu yewe nga eye Lebanoni.
Balikobola bamenye mu siniini siase,
balimulikha nga kumusabibu,
elaafu yabwe eliba nga endali eye Lebanoni.
Ee Efuraimu, Ese ndi na siina ne bifwaani?
Ese niise omukobosianga ne musaba, lundi ese niise omuliindanga.
Ese ndi nga Saipurasi
bibiaamo biowo biama khwise.”
Ooli omukesi, aulile bibiindu bino,
ooli omurekeerefu, abimanye,
sikila chingila cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chili cha ng'ali,
baali baluungi bakeendelakho,
ne babooni betuya.

Buno nibwo burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu Yoeli okhwa Petueli.
Rekeeresia, enywe bakhulu,
buli sia mulala mu Yuda, ulila.
Siindu nga sino siri siekholekhakho mu biise bienywe,
namwe mu biise bie bakuukawenywe ku?
Boolela kano babaana benywe,
ne lekha babaana benywe baboolele babaana babwe
ne babaana babwe baboolele eselukho eloondakho.
Nibio chisike chiliile chalekha,
chisike chingali chilalia.
Nibio chisike chingali chilekhile,
kamatete kalalia,
ne nibio kamateete kalekhile
chisike chichonakaka chilamaliilisia.
Enywe bameesi, sisimukha mala mulile,
yisasaara enywe banywi be ndali mweesi,
sikila bamwimane endali enulu.
eli ne bunyali lundi se balikha tawe,
kameeno kayo kali nga ke etalang'i
eli ne kangekwe oli ke etalang'i ekhasi.
Ekholo yonakake kimisabibu kiase,
ne yasakakiilemo kimituli kiase,
Yakhoboolile kamoola ne khukamwaata asi,
chisakia chayo chawangiie.
Sooma nga omukhaana owe yabwana owiboyile kamakunia
nasooma omusoleeli wewe owe siselelo.
Mbao biianwa bie biakhulia namwe endali nibio khuaana mu Lukaangu tawe,
basaayi balila sikila se bali ne siianwa sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Kimikuunda kili busa,
sibala silila,
sikila biakhulia bionakakwe,
endali se eliio tawe,
akhaba kamafura mbao.
Enywe balimi yeunamila,
lila, enywe muliinda kimisabibu,
sikila engaanu, ne e shayiri,
Ee biakhulia bioosi bionakwe.
Kimisabibu kianialile,
kimituli kioosi kianialile ne khukhwooma,
kimikomanga, kimikhendu ne kimipopayi,
kimirongooro kioosi mu mikuunda kiomile
ng'ali ekhoyo mu baandu yosi mbao.
Yifwara kamakunia mala mulile,
enywe basaayi mukhola khu alutare!
Yingila mu Lukaangu mala mulile siilo sioosi!
Siakhulia namwe endali mbao khuaana khu Wele wowo.
Rusia kamalaka ke khukhweyimana,
laanga libuusiana!
Buusia babemeelesi
ne babaandu boosi ba Yuda
beche mu munju eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo,
mala mulilile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Endaalo niio Omunyali Owa Bioosi areera libuna.
Liriisia siina nilio endaalo eyo elireera!
Biakhulia biefwe biarusiibweo ebweeni wefwe,
ekhoyo ne busangaafu khukhwama munju eya Wele wefwe luno mbao.
Bumiicho bwomeele mumba,
mu birara siindu mbamo,
birara bionakakwe,
sikila biakhulia mbao.
Chikhaafu chimoloola mu butinyu
sikila kamayilwe mbao tawe,
akhaba kiminyele kie kamakheese kipwa sibi.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ese khulilila ewe
sikila kumulilo kwosiisie kamayilwe ne sichiimi,
mala kwosiisie kimirongooro kioosi kie mundaa.
Akhaba chisolo chikhulilila ewe
sikila chinjichi chateenyile
ne kumuumu kumurafu kwosiisie kamayilwe ke mu sichiimi.

Khupa ekhoombi mu Sayuni,
khupa ekengele khu sikulu siase sitakatifu
lekha bamenywa be mu sibala boosi batereme,
sikila endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi elikho yiicha, eli siimbi,
endaalo eye sisiilima ne bubeeleli,
endaalo eye kamafuumbi ne sisiilima sikali!
Nga bumali ne bumalatana khu bikulu,
babaandu be bunyali ne kamaani
bakhabakhoo khukhwama khale tawe,
namwe se bakhabeo lundi bario enyuma wabwe tawe,
mu selukho busa choosi.
Chilia bibiaalwa nga kumulilo,
ebweeni wacho sibala sili ne bibiaamo nga kumukuunda kwa Edeni,
Enyuma wacho eli nga sichiimi
mbakhoo silichefubarura tawe.
ne chitima nga chifarasi che liie.
Nga chisuna khu ngaaki khwe chingulu,
chisakaya oli kamakaari ke liie,
chirundukha nga kumulilo mu bunyaasi bubwomu.
Chili khu lunyilili nga banamae be kamaani
baberekekheere liie.
Nga ne chiicha buli mundu eendekhelele,
buli mundu anyisiisie.
Chibwaakala nga banamae,
chiniina kamasiisi nga banamae,
choosi chichiila alala
ne se chaukhakho tawe.
Ekiindi se khalisia ebweeni we yasie tawe,
chibira mu mako
ne se siliio sichikhiingilila tawe.
Chisuna khu lukoba
chitima khu masiisi,
chiniina khu chinju ne
mala chingilila mu numa nga babefwi.
likulu literema.
Enyanga ne kumwesi bimaliia,
ne ching'enieesi se chikhosia lundi tawe.
Bipupu bie banamae bimuria bili bikali lundi bie kamaani.
Eliba eriisia eriena endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Naanu olikibacha?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Akhaba luno,
yekanila mu bung'ali mala mungobolele
mu khweyimana khulia, khulila ne khweunamila.
Lekha kimiooyo kienywe kie bubeeleli kiekesie engunyi,
khutabula chingubo chenywe khwong'ene se khwolaana tawe.”
Kobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe
ali omulayi lundi ali ne siisa sikali,
ekhaliilikha lundi akhola nilio asuubisie,
buli lwoosi ali ne silekhelo ne se ali khangu khuukuuma tawe.
Naanu omanya nanyala akaluukhana mala amukholela siisa alekha chikhabi enyuma,
mala mvane siianwa sie biakhulia nende sie khunywa Khulwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe.
Khupila ekhoombi khu Sikulu sia Sayuni,
rusia kamalaka ke khukhweyimana khulia ne khulaanga libuusiana!
Buusia babaandu alala,
barekekhe khulwe libuusiana litakatifu
buusia bakofu,
buusia babaana,
ne batoro boosi.
Akhaba babeea
khukhwola barure munju chabwe beche.
Basaayi bakholela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
akari wa alutare ne silibwa sie Lukaangu,
khukhwola balile ne khusaba bali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ba ne siisa khu baandu bowo.
Okhalekha chikholo chichiindi chakhulekelesia ne khukhuchekheelela ne chireeba chili, ‘Wele wenywe ali waena?’ Tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekesia lilienaana khulwe sibala siewe,
mala aaba ne siisa khu baandu bewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia babaandu bewe ali,
“Luno ndikho muelesia
biakhulia ne ndali ne kamafura ke kimiseituni,
ne mulanyalikha.
Chikholo chichiindi se chilamulekelesia tawe.
Ndarusiao sipupu sie chisike chichecha khukhwama ebunaswa,
ne ndachisindikha mu siangalaamwe sitambamo siindu,
che ebweeni ndachisindikha ebukwe mu nyanja eye kumuunyu
ne che nyuma sia nyanja eya Mediterenia
kimibili kiacho kilaunya
ndachira sikila koosi niko chabakholela.
“Okharia tawe, ee liloba,
ne kakhali sangaala mala wikhoye,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile ke liukia.
Mukharia tawe enywe chisaang'i che mundaa,
sikila kamayilwe kali mu sichiimi kali kamalayi,
kumurongooro kwaama kamatuunda kakwo,
ne kumutuli ne kumuseituni kiamile kamatuunda.
“Sangaala, baandu ba Sayuni,
Yikhoyela niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe abakholela.
Amuelesie efula endayi eye siruumbi,
amuelesie efula eye kumunaane
ne efula eye khurakikha nga khale.
Biuulilo bikhechule biakhulia,
kamaloo ke khusuura kalechula endali ne
kamafura ke kimiseituni.
Ndamukoboselia nibio mwatibia
mu miiko nikio bipupu bie chisike bionakilamo biakhulia bienywe.
Naba ese owaruma banamae khwinywe.
Luno mulalia bikali mala mwikure.
Mulifumia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe,
owamukholeele bibiindu bie liukia.
Babaandu base se balaambwa chisoni lundi tawe.
Nio, Baisiraeli mulamanya muli ese ndi akari wenywe
lundi muli ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndi Wele wenywe ne se aliio okundi tawe
Babaandu base se baliambwa chisoni lundi tawe.
ndichukha Roho wase khu buli mundu,
babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana baling'oola,
basaakhulu baliroora kamarooro
ne baele benywe baliba ne kamalola.
Mu siise esio ndichukha Roho wase
akhaba khu bakholi be siseecha nende be.
“Ne khaane bimanyisio mwikulu ne khu sibala kamafuki, kumulilo ne liliisi.
Enyanga elimaliia, ne kumwesi kulibesema nga kamafuki, ebweeni we ndaalo emboofu eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eye khuriisia ne ekhoola tawe.
Lilicha liekholekhe mbo buli yesi yesi osaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhaonisibwe. Sikila khu sikulu sia Sayuni ne mu Yerusalemu bakhabemo babebacha nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naboolile, ne mwabo babaona balibamo nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alaanga.”

“Lola, mu ndaalo echo ne mu siise esio nga ndikobosia kimiaandu kia Yuda ne Yerusalemu,
Ndibuusia chikholo choosi ne khuchireera mu Litooma lie bukhalaki lia Yehoshafati. Ne ndichikhalakila ebweeneyo khulwe babaandu base ne kumukabwa kwase Isiraeli, sikila babasalanisia mu bibala bikeni ne khukabaniamo sibala siabwe.
Lundi bapile chikura khulwe babaandu base mala baanile omwana omusoleeli khulwe khuruunga bueeyi, ne khuaana omwana omukhaana khulwe khuruunga ndali, mala bakinywele.”
Sikila mwabukuule efwesa yase ne esahabu ne khusuta kamabiikhilo kase ke buiinda ne khuyila mu ngaangu chenywe.
Mwakusiisie babaandu base ba Yuda nende be mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu khu baandu ba Kiriki. Ne khubayila aleeyi khukhwama mu sibala siabwe.
Ne kakhali luno ndabaachilisia khukhwama niio mwabakusia, mala kheache khwinywe khu niko mwabakholela.
Ndakusia babaana benywe basoleeli ne bakhaana khu baandu ba Yuda mala babaandu ba Yuda balabakusia khu baandu ba Sabea, babaandu be aleeyi.”
“Langilila kano mu chikholo,
yerekekhera liie
laanga banamae benywe,
busia banamae benywe mala muche!
ne chingeso chenywe chibe kamafumo
akhaba batekhele khukhwola bache mwiie.
Yiicha khangu,
enywe mweesi chikholo chiili siimbi,
mwebuusie mwitooma.”
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ruma banamae bowo babebwaakale.
“Lekha Be Chikholo berekekhe
mala bache mwitooma lia Yehoshafati,
sikila ebweeneyo ndakhalakilayo
chikholo choosi chili siimbi.
Yingilamo mu chisuure,
sikila enjikha yechuule
ne chindemo chechuule chiicha asi,
sikila bumayaanu bwabwe buli bukali.”
Bipupu, bipupu,
mwitooma lie likhalaka!
Sikila endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli siimbi
mwitooma lie likhalaka.
Enyanga ne kumwesi biamaliie,
ne ching'enieesi se chikhosia tawe.
kumumilo kwewe kuuliilikhanila mu Yerusalemu
ne likulu ne liloba biterema
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali bubwilukhilo bwe babaandu base
lukoba khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Nio, Baisiraeli, mulimanya muli ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe,
menyile khu Sayuni, sikulu siase sitakatifu.
Yerusalemu lulaba lukoba lutakatifu,
banamae baakwa se balilutiilakho lundi tawe.
“Mu ndaalo eyo
bikulu biliroonya endali enulu,
ne chingulu chilikha kamabeele,
ne binoko bioosi bia Yuda bilibisia kameechi.
Ne esebele eliakukha khukhwama munju mwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khuchukha mwitooma lia Sitimu.
“Misiri siliba sisiangalaamwe,
ne Edomu sichiimi sisianjukhwa,
sikila sisiayuumba sisiakholekha khu baandu ba Yuda
sikila bachukhile sifuki sia busa mu sibala siabwe.
Ne kakhali sibala sia Yuda silimenywamo khulwa mindali,
ne Yerusalemu luliba lwe chiselukho choosi.
Ndiyacha sifuki siabwe,
ne se khabeele baberi tawe,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amenyile mu Sayuni.”

“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aulukhumila khu Sikulu sia Sayuni,
akhokha khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Khwako kamaayilwe khu sikulu sia Karimeli koomile ne bunyaasi bwaniaalile.”
“Babaandu ba Damasika babeelelela khukhola bubwoni,
ne sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Bakuluumia babaandu be mu Kileati ne burafu bukali.
Khwako ndaruma kumulilo khu lichipi liliombakhwa no mwami Hasaeli,
ne ndoosia kamasiisi ke chingoba cho mwami Benatati.
Ndatechula bilibwa bie lukoba lwa Damasika
ne khurusiamo bamenywa be litooma lia Afeni
no muruki owa Beseteni.
Babaandu ba Siria balabukulwa nga baboe khuyilwa mu sibala sia Kiri.”
“Babaandu ba Kasa babeleleele khukhola bubwoni,
sikila kano ndabaukuuma.
Baayila ekholo yase yoosi khukikusia khu baandu ba Edomu nga nasioobi.
Nio ndoosia lukoba lwa Kasa
ne kamasiisi kalwo.
Ndarusiao baruki be chingoba cha Ashitoti ne Ashikeloni.
Ndaukuuma lukoba lwa Ekironi, ne Bafilisiti babarama boosi balafwa.”
“Babaandu ba Tiro babelelela khukhola bubwoni,
sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Baayila ekholo yase yoosi mu mbaambe mu sibala sia Edomu,
ne se baloonda endakaano eye busaale niyo bakhola tawe.
Khwako ndoosia lukoba lwa Tiro
ne kamasiisi kalwo.”
“Babaandu ba Edomu babelelela khukhola bubwoni,
sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Bayimanga balebe babwe ba Isiraeli ne mbalu,
ne se babakholelakho siisa tawe.
Lirima liabwe se liaba ne sisiakamo tawe,
liabao buli lwoosi.
Khwako ndoosia lukoba lwa Temani
ne kamasiisi ka Bosira.”
sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Ne bali mwiie mu Kileati mu khwenya khukaliyia sibala,
batienulangamo bakhasi be bisombo.
Khwako ndoosia kamasiisi ke lukoba lwa Raba
ne kamasiisi kalwo.
Lukukuulo lulabao endaalo eye liie,
ne khu khuupana khulifundeela nga embembeesi.
Ne omwami ne baamuloondela balicha mu mbaambe.”

sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Se baaria bikuumba bio mwami owa Edomu tawe,
ne sikila babiosia biakwa likokhe.
Ndoosia sibala sia Moabu
ne kamasiisi ka Kerioti.
Babaandu ba Moabu balafwila mu luyoka lwe liie nga banamae ne bakukuula ne khu khuupa chikhoombi.
Ndeera omuruki owa Moabu ne babemeelesi be sibala boosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Babaandu ba Yuda babelelela khukhola bubwoni,
sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Balekelesia liliekesia liase lundi se baliinda kamalaka kase tawe.
Batiimisibwa ne bawele babeeyi chana abo nibo bakuuka babwe baasayaanga.
Khwako ndoosia Yuda ne kamasiisi ka Yerusalemu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Babaandu ba Isiraeli babeelelela khukhola bubwoni,
sikila kano ng'ali ndabaukuuma.
Bakusia baluungi mu mbaambe bakhanyala khuruunga kamakobi kabwe tawe,
babanani bakhanyala khukula biraaro tawe.
Baapia siibi
ne khura bataambi mu butinyu.
Omwana ne raraawe boombi bakhola sifwaabi no mukhasi nasioobi,
khwako banyaalutia lisina liase litakatifu.
Buli abuundu we khusaba, babaandu bakona khu ngubo nicho banuula bataambi nga buambilisi.
Mu Lukaangu lwa Wele wabwe,
banywa endali niyo banuula abo baali ne kamakobi kabwe ke chirupia.
babaandu ba baaba baleeyi nga kimitarakwa
lundi be kamaani nga kimikhoonge.
Namurusia enywe mu Misiri,
namubisilia mu sichiimi khulwe kimiiko kamakhumi kane,
mala namuelesia sibala sie Bamoriti khuba sisienywe.
ne babaandi khuba banadhiri bo Mwami.
Baisiraeli kano se kali kang'ali tawe ku?’
Ne mwanywesia baberusia khu mwami endali,
ne khuyingilila bang'oosi balekhe khuboola burume bwase.
Ne luno ndamuswalakilila asi,
ne mulalenya nga ekorokocho eyichuule biakhulia.
Akhaba babaalaba chimbilo se baleonia tawe,
nende be kamaani se balaba nako tawe,
ne banamae se balanyala khukhweonia tawe.
Babaandu be buyiingo se baleema khu khupana tawe, babaalaba se balanyala khukhwilukha tawe,
nende be khu farasi boosi se balaona tawe.
Khu ndaalo ng'ene eyo akhaba banamae banyindaafu lukali,
balalekhuula bibioki biabwe mala belukhe.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.

Baandu ba Isiraeli, rekeeresia burume buno nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile khwinywe, ekholo yoosi niyo aarusia e Misiri.
“Khu kholo choosi che khu sibala,
enywe mweng'ene nibo namanya ne khuliinda.
Sikila limanyikha ne buliindi buno bubwoni bwenywe bubalikha khuba bukali,
niko kakila khukhwola muukuume enywe.”
Babaandu babili banyala bakeendela alala
ne bakhafukiilisiane tawe ku?
Etalang'i eulukhumila mu musiru
ne khanyoolile nisio elia ku?
Etalang'i endoro enyala yekhuruura mwibina liayo
ne khaambile siindu tawe ku?
Enyuni enyala yaambwa
nokhareere khu lukili nisio yenya khulia tawe ku?
Kumureko kunyala kwatekukha sisiindu ne sikhetililekho ku?
Ekhoombi eye liie enyala yapa mu lukoba mala babaandu baloba khwesiindukha ku?
Butinyu bunyala bwakwa mu lukoba
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nakhabumanyile tawe ku?
Omwami WELE se akholanga sisiindu siosi siosi
nakhabuuliile lirekekha liewe khu bakholi ne bang'oosi bewe tawe.
Etalang'i ne ulukhuma,
naanu okhareenga tawe?
Omwami WELE ne alomaloma,
naanu onyala alekha khuboola burume bwewe?
Boolela boosi bamenyile mu machipi ka Misiri ne Ashitoti oli,
“Yebuusia alala mu ngulu chichabotookhelela Samaria,
mubone likoyaana likali,
ne kamabi kakekholekhamo.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Babaandu bano bechusia chinju chabwe bibiindu bibianuulwa ne kamaani mu siayuumba.
Ne se bali babeyikinwa tawe.
Khwako Omwami WELE aloma ali,
omusiku alabotookhelela sibala siabwe,
onake buliindi bwabwe ne khutechula chinju chabwe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Nga omwaayi ne areesia bileenge bibili biong'ene namwe liiru lie likheese nilio etalang'i eliile, kaliba kario khu bakhaone mu Samaria baliba batiiti ne luno balikho bauluukhila khu bitaanda bilayi.
Omwami WELE, Wele we banamae aloma ali,
‘Luno rekeeresia, lundi kaambila be lisaaye lia Yakobo,
ndonaka alutare eya Beteli. Chinjika cha buli alutare chilatechulwa.
Ndonaka chinju che siise sie kumunaane ne chinju che siise sie siimiyu.
Chinju nicho bombakhila kimisaanga chilonakwa,
buli enju emboofu elonakwa.’ ”

Rekeeresia kano, enywe bakhasi Basamaria,
muunera nga chikhaafu cha Basiani chiliisibwa bulayi,
musukiasukia bataambi, mupia siibi babanani,
ne khuyingilila baseecha benywe bamuelesie kamalwa!
Nga Omwami WELE ne ali Omutakatifu, asuubisia ali,
“Chindaalo chilicha nicho balimukhururira asi ne kimilobo,
buli mulala khwinywe aliba nga eng'eeni khu mulobo,
balimukhuruura bamuyile a lisiisi lilikho sibaanga
mala bamumwaate enje.”
Cha Beteli mukhole bubwoni;
“Khemuche Kilikali mutase bubwoni bwenywe lukali!
Reera chimbosio chenywe buli kumutikhinyi,
lundi buli enyuma we chindaalo chitaru
Chililiila khuaana siakhulia sienywe khulwe khu khupila Wele orio,
mala mwifumie nga mureera chi saka chengelu!
Kano niko mwasiima khukhola.
“Naba ese owareera enjala mungoba chenywe choosi,
ne se mwangobolela tawe.
Nabisia efula siise nisio biakhulia bienywe biakienyela lukali.
Nareera efula khu lukoba lulala ne khu lundi tawe.
Efula yakwa mu mukuunda mulala ne kukuundi kwoma.
Babaandu khukhwama mungoba chingali, baulila bulesia lundi baba batekhele, benya kameechi ne se bakanyoola tawe,
matiiti niko banyoola se kaboola tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario se mwangobolela tawe.
“Nareera siimiyu khulasia biakhulia bienywe.
Chisike chalia bimelwa mu mikuunda kienywe kioosi, kimisabibu, kimituli, ne kimiseituni.
Ne Kakhaba kario se mwangobolela tawe.
“Nareera bulwaale khwinywe nga bubwaba khu Bamisiri.
Neerera basoleeli benywe mwiie ne khu bukula chifarasi chenywe.
Nechusia bubolo bwe bafu bukali mu chikambi chenywe.
Ne kakhaba kario se mwangobolela tawe.”
“Nabunia balala mwinywe nga Sodomu ne Komora.
Babaona mwinywe baba nga lukhu lurusibwa mu mulilo ne lukhaamba tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario se mwangobolela tawe,
nio kario baandu ba Isiraeli, ndabaukuuma enywe.
Sikila nja khukhola kano, yirekekhera likhalaka liase!”
Wele niye owabaang'ana bikulu
ne khuungu.
Akholanga lilienya liewe limanyikhana khu baandu,
akaluukhasia kumuusi kwekhola siilo.
Akeendelanga angaaki we sibala. Lino nilio lisina liewe: Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!

Baandu ba Isiraeli, rekeeresia kumwenya kwe kamasika nikwo nja khu mwimbila kuno:
Isiraeli nga omukhaana owe yabwana, afwiile,
salamukha lundi tawe.
Bamwanjuukhe asi,
ne se aliio omwinyosia tawe.
Omwami WELE aloma ali,
“Banamae eelefu barumwa enje ne lukoba luuli mu Isiraeli,
ne bakobola emia bong'ene, luluundi luruma emia,
ne bakobola likhumi bong'ene.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali,
“Yiicha niio ndi, mala mumenye.
Mukhacha Beerisheba khusaaya tawe.
Mukhakhaka khu khumbiima e Beteli tawe,
Beteli lulabuna.
Mukhacha e Kilikali tawe,
Babaandu balwo bacha khuyilwa mu mbaambe.”
Kobolela Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala mumenye.
Nga tawe, alioosia babaandu be nju eya Isiraeli,
kumulilo kulioosia babaandu ba Beteli,
ne sakhabeo onyala akusimia tawe.
Enywe mwabunile, mukaluukhasia bung'ali bwe babaandu,
ne khulekha khubakholela bung'ali!
Akaluukhasia sisiilima siba buwaanga,
ne kumuusi kuba siilo.
Alanga kameechi ke nyanja,
mala akachukha khu sibala.
Lisina liewe bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Areranga libuna khu be kamaani,
ne khu ngoba chabwe.
Enywe mwabiila yesi yesi oloma bung'ali,
ne khu khwikiicha bukhali bung'ali tawe,
Khwako sikila mupia bataambi siibi,
ne khubanuula biakhulia biabwe.
Nono, se mulamenya mu chinju chindayi che kamabaale nicho mwombakha tawe,
ne se mulanywa endali khukhwama khu miseituni kimilayi nikio mubiaala tawe.
Sikila manyile bumayaanu ne bubwoni bwenywe bukali,
mupia baluungi siibi ne khulia asoya,
lundi mukhiingilila bataambi khunyoola bung'ali mu koti.
Khwako omundu omukesi alasila siise sie bubwoni esio,
khubela sili siise sibi.
Yiima kamalayi,
ne mukhayiima kamabi tawe,
nio mumenye bulayi.
Nio Omwami Owe Banamae alaba nanywe,
nga mwabene mulomile.
Biila kamabi mala musiime kamalayi,
mala mubone muli bung'ali bwekholekha mu koti.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele we bunyali aaba ne siisa khu baandu be lisaaye lia Yosefu basiili balamu.
Lundi nono Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khukhwisasaara ne khusooma khulwe bubeeleli khulaba khu ngila che lukoba.
Akhaba baalimi balecha kamasika ke bafu alala ne naabo babamanya khusooma.
Lundi khukhwisasaara khulaba mu mikuunda kie kimisabibu kioosi.
Lino liosi lilakholekha sikila ndabaukuuma enywe.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile.
Muli bubi enywe mu mwekoomba endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
Siina sikila mwenye endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Khwinywe elaba endaalo eye sisiilima ekhali ne buwaanga tawe.
Eliba nga omundu owilukha etalang'i, mala akaanana linani,
namwe nga omundu oli munju mala atiila khwisiisi
khana endemu elikho mala emuluma.
Endaalo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eliba ne sisiilima se buli buwaanga tawe,
endaalo ekhafuumbe se liba ne kumuumu tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Nabiila chinaikara che chi dini chenywe,
se nyala nasangaalila libuusiana lienywe tawe.
Ne mwakhanderera biianwa bie khukhwosia ne biianwa bie biakhulia, se ndabifukiilila tawe,
se ndafukiilila mundeerere bibiaayo bienywe binefu nga biianwa tawe.
Lekha khunjokesia ne kimienya kienywe,
se nenya khurekeeresia kamatuungu kenywe tawe.
Ne kakhali lekha bung'ali bupwomookhe nga kameechi,
ne buluungi nga kameechi ke mu nyanja.”
Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Baandu ba Isiraeli, mu miiko kamakhumi kane kino mwandererakho chimbosio ne biianwa mu sichiimi?
Ne luno, sikila mwasikamiile bifwaani bia Sakusi wele omwami wenywe, ne bia Kaiwani, eng'enieesi wele wenywe, nibio mwekholele mwabene
khwako ndamuyila mu mbaambe mu sibala siili embotookho wa Damasika.”

Muli bubi mumenyile mu Sayuni,
ne nanywe mu mwibona muli, muli ne kumuleembe mu Samaria.
Enywe mumanyikhaane nga babaandu be khunyoa akari we chikholo,
enywe nibo ba Isiraeli bechakho khulwe buyeeti!
Cha mala mulole lukoba lwa Kaline.
Mala muchiililile khukhwola mu lukoba lwa Hamasi ne khukhwiikha khucha Filisiti Lukoba lwa Kati.
Chaba chindayi khukhila bubwami bwa Yuda ne Isiraeli Ku?
Sibala siabwe siaba sikali khukhila sisienywe ku?
Se musuubila muli endaalo eye butinyu elikho yiicha tawe,
bikholwa bienywe bikila enyoe yoole.
Muli bubi mulambisia khu bitaanda bie kimisaanga,
ne chi naikara che kamameeme ne chimoosi.
Mwasiima kimienya kie khukhwekhochoocha,
nga Daudi nakholanga,
ne khukimbila mu matuungu kenywe.
Munywela endali khu pwakuli ne khurumikhira kamafura kaunya bulayi,
ne se mulila khulwe lilionakwa lia Isiraeli tawe.
Nio mulaba be khunyoa khucha mu mbaambe.
Chinaikara chenywe ne biakhulia bienywe bie ekolooba bilawao.
Omwami WELE omwene arusia likaambila likoosi ali,
“Nabiila liliebonia lie ba Isiraeli,
nalekelesia chinju chabwe chimboofu.
Ekhare mu makhono ko musiku lukoba lwabwe nende buli siindu siilimo.”
Ne kaaba bali babaandu ekhumi be nju ndala barama, balafwa.
Ne omulebe ofwisiisie lundi owimeleele kamasika, alarusia kumubili munju. Omulebe alareeba oyo osikaale munju ali, “Okundi alimo ku?” Omundu oyo alakobosia ali, “Tawe.” Abwenao omulebe alaloma ali, “Sila busa! Khukhakhola khurio khwararakho lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.”
Nga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naloma,
chinju chimboofu ne chingeekhe chilatechukhaka.
Chifarasi chinyala chatimila khu lwanda ku?
Omundu anyala alima mu nyanja ne chieeyi ku?
Ne kakhali enywe mwakaluukhasia siakhulia siaba buchiba,
ne bulayi khuba bubi.
Mwibonia muli mwaamba lukoba lwa Lotebari,
ne khuloma muli, “Khwaba ne kamaani kanyala kaamba Karinaimu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali aloma ali, “Baisiraeli, ndaruma ekholo engeni khuamba sibala sienywe. Balamupia enywe siibi khukhwama khu silibwa sia Hamati khukhwola khu kheechi kha Araba.”

Naba ne kamalola khukhwama khu Mwami WELE: Nabona sisusuuchu sie chisike niio omwami aba namalile khukhaa bunyaasi ne bele bwarakiikhe khusisina lundi.
Mumalola kase nabona chisike chalia buli simelwa mu sibala, mala naloma ndi,
“Ee Omwami WELE, beela babaandu bowo!
Babaandu bowo bamenya bariena?
Bali batiiti lukali lundi batekhele!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe ne khuloma ali,
“Niko oboone se kalekholekha tawe.”
Naba ne kamalola kakaandi khukhwama khu Mwami WELE. Namubona ne erekekha khuukuumila babaandu bewe kumulilo. Kwosia enyanja engali lukali mala kwarakikha khukhwosia ne sibala.
Nio naloma ndi,
“Lekha, ee Omwami WELE! Babaandu bowo bamenya bariena?
Bali batiiti lukali lundi batekhele!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe
mala aloma ali, “Akhaba kano se kalekholekho tawe. Omwami WELE aalomile”
Naba ne kamalola kakaandi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Namubona emile e siisi nilio bombakha khulwe khurumikhira ekabilo ne ekabilo eyo yaba mukhono mwewe.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi andeeba ali, “Amosi, olikho obona siina?” Nakobosia ndi,
“Naboone ekabilo.” Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndakirumikhiranga khukhwekesia ndi babaandu base balinga lisiisi liliekhiikha.
Se ndakaluukhasiakho lundi kamebaasio kase ke khubaukuuma tawe.
Abuundu niio lisaaye lia Isaaka lisaayilanga alonakwa,
abuundu owa Isiraeli atakatifu alonakakwa.
Ndakamia bubwami bwo mwami Yeroboamu.”
Amasia, omusaayi owa Beteli, aruma likhuwa khu Yeroboamu omwami owa Isiraeli ali, “Amosi alikho akhukwangwaanila ewe mu baandu. Lilomaloma liewe lilonaka sibala.
Kano niko aloma:
‘Yeroboamu alafwila mwiie,
ne babaandu ba Isiraeli balaambwa
bayilwe mu mbaambe.’ ”
Nio Amasia aboolela Amosi ali, “Wanyalile orio, mung'oosi! Kobola e Buyuda mala ochiililile khung'oolela ebweeneyo. Lekha bakhuruunge khu niko ong'oola.
Okhang'oolela mu Beteli muno lundi tawe. Ano ali abuundu wo mwami e khusaaya, Lukaangu lwe chikholo.”
Nio Amosi amukobosia ali, “Ese sendi omung'oosi namwe omwana wo mung'oosi tawe. Ese ndi omwaayi, lundi omwaki we kimikhuyu.
Ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambukula khukhwama khu milimo kiase nga omwaayi ne khukhumboolela ali, ‘Cha ong'oole khu baandu base Isiraeli.’
Nio luno rekeeresia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma.
Umboolela khulekha khung'oola,
ne khulekha khuboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli bubi bwabwe.
Amasia, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhuboolela ewe ali,
‘Omukhasi wowo alaba omutamba mu lukoba,
ne babaana bowo balererwa mwiie.
Sibala siowo silakabwamo mala siebwe babaandi,
ne ewe wamwene olafwila mu sibala sikhamanyile Wele tawe.
Ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ng'ali balaambwa bayilwe mu mbaambe.’ ”

Naba ne kamalola kakaandi khukhwama khu Mwami WELE, anjekesia sikono sisichuule kamatuunda ke mu siimiyu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areeba ali, “Amosi, olikho obona siina?” Nakobosia ndi, “Naboone sikono sie kamatuunda ke mu siimiyu.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali,
“Sisiakamo siechile khu baandu base ba Isiraeli.
Se ndakaluukhasia kamebaasio kase ke khubaukuuma tawe.
Khu ndaalo ng'eneyo kimienya kie mwichipi kilaba bililo. Bafu bakhandakane buli abuundu. Balisiikhwa sinywinywi.”
Rekeeresia kano, enywe mupia siibi babanani,
ne khukhaka khubunia bataambi mu sibala.
Muloma muli,
“Se khunyala khulindiilila chindaalo chindakatifu chibire nio khukusie biakhulia biefwe tawe.
Esabato eliakama liina, nio khurakikhe khukusia lundi?
Nio khuniinie bukusi, khurumikhire bipiimilo bie bubeeyi,
ne khukhwonakaka bipiimilo bibea bakuli befwe.
Nio khukharumikhire chirupia khukula bataambi
ne biraaro bibili biili khwasie bikhakule omubanani,
ne khukusia likhuuchi lie ngano.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli, echubile ali,
“Se ndibilila bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu tawe.
Ne sibala sikhesisiikhe khulwa kano,
ne buli mundu mu sibala alaba mu sibi.
Sibala sioosi sikhatengaale,
silenyokha ne khukwa nga luluuchi Naili.
Siise silikho sicha nisio ndakhola enyanga ekwe mwiangilwe,
ne sibala siilabule kumuusi.
Ese Omwami WELE, nalomile.
Ndakaluukhasia naikara chenywe chibe kamasika,
ne kimienya kienywe kioosi kie busangaafu bube khulila khwe ngunyi.
Ndamukhola mubeke kimirwe kienywe ne khufwara chingubo che kamakunia,
ne mulaba nga basaasi balila omwana wabwe omuteelwa.
Endaalo eyo eliba embi khukhwola khu siakamo.
Omwami WELE aloma ali, lola siise silikho siicha nisio ndareera enjala khu sibala,
enjala elalia babaandu, ne se eli eye siakhulia tawe,
balaba ne bulesia, ne se buli bwe kameechi tawe.
Balaulila enjala ne bulesia bwe Lomo eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
Babaandu balayiiyayiiya khukhwama khu nyanja eye Kumuunyu khukhwola Mediterenia,
lundi balatirimukha khukhwama e bunaswa khukhwola siafubo, khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo.
Balayiima buli abuundu burume khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne se balabunyoola tawe.
Endaalo ng'ene eyo bakhaba basoleeli be kamaani ne bakhaana,
balifwakho khulwe bulesia.
Abo babechuba khu bifwaanane bia Samaria,
ne baloma bali,
‘Khulwa wele owa Dani,’ namwe, ‘Khulwa wele owa Beerisheba’ babaandu abo balafwa.”

Nabona Omwami Wele emile alubeka we alutare mala aloma ali,
“Khupa lukali bisiindi bie Lukaangu nio kumusiingi kwesisiikhe.
Bifunake bikwe khu mirwe kie babaandu boosi,
nderera mwiie babaandu baramire ne se aliio olelukha tawe, akhaba na mulala salilukha tawe.
Bakhacha emakoombe ndabarusiao.
Bakhaniina mwikulu, ndabekhisia.
Baakhekisa khu Sikulu Karimeli,
ndabayiima mbanyoole.
Bakhanjekisakho bacha mu nyanja,
ndaboolela kunaninga kwe mu nyanja kubalume.
Basiku babwe babayila mu mbaambe,
ndabakhola babeere.
Nakhalake khubabunia, se ndabayeeta tawe.”
Omwami, WELE owe banamae,
etiila khu sibala, mala siesisikha boosi bamenyilekho balila.
Ne sibala sioosi sinyokha ne khukwa nga luluuchi Naili.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ombakha lukoba lwewe mwikulu,
aafuunikha sibala ne likulu
alaanga kameechi ke nyanja mala akachukha khu sibala.
Alaangwa bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Baisiraeli, Enywe khwise se muli nga Baesopia tawe ku?”
Se nareera Baisiraeli khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri,
Filisiti khukhwama Kurete,
ne Basiria khukhwama Kiri tawe ku?
Lola ese, Omwami WELE ndaloleelelanga bubwami bwe bubwoni bwa Isiraeli,
ne ndabwonaka burure khu sibala.
Ne kakhali se ndabunia boosi be lisaaye lia Yakobo tawe.
“Ndakhookha ne khusisikha Baisiraeli nga bachichunga nibio bakesile.
Ndasisikha mu kholo choosi khurusiamo boosi bakhakhoyela tawe.
Babooni boosi baali mu baandu base balererwa mwiie,
abo baloma bali, ‘Wele se alafukiilila busiku bwosi bwosi bukhwichekho tawe.’ ”
“Endaalo elikho yiicha niyo ndikobosia bubwami bwa Daudi,
buuli nga enju yakwa yabuna.
Ndang'oona kamasiisi kayo ne khukemekha.
Ndakiombakha lundi ne khukikhola ebe nga yaba mataayi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi olakhola kano aloma ali, “Baisiraeli balaula sibala sisiarama sia Edomu
ne chikholo choosi chichaba chichase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Chindaalo chilikho chiicha,
nicho bimiichwa bichoa khangu
kimisabibu kiosi kilachoa khangu
mala endali enyoolekhanemo;
ne endali enulu eleseletekha khukhwama mu bikulu,
mala yiikhe khukhwama khu ngulu.
Ndikobosia Baisiraeli base mu sibala siabwe.
Balombakha lundi chingoba chabwe chichonakwa mala bamenyeyo,
balabiaala kimisabibu ne khunywa endali,
balabiaala mu mikuunda ne khulia bikhulamo.
Khemekhe Baisiraeli babaandu base mu sibala nisio nabaelesia,
ne se balirusibwamo lundi tawe.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wowo alomile.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi arumire omurume wewe khu kholo chingali,
ne efwe khwaulile burume bwewe buloma buli,
“Yinyokha! Khuche mwiie khupane ne Edomu!”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Baedomu ali,
“Lola ndamumala enywe kamaani,
buli mundu alamulekelesia.
Ekibonio yenywe yamubeyile,
enywe mumenyile mu ngulu angaaki,
enywe muloma mu miooyo kienywe muli,
‘Naanu olikhuula efwe?’
Mwakhombakha angaaki nga efuruusi,
chinju chenywe chakhaba mu ngaaki nga ching'enieesi,
kakhaba kario ndamuula.
“Babefwi ne becha siilo,
beeba nibio benya biong'ene.
Babaandu ne babuta chisabibu,
balekhangakho ndiiti.
Ne kakhali basiku benywe bamubunisilie elala.
Lisaaye lia Esau liamunuulile kimiaandu kienywe!
Nibo mwaambana nabo boosi bamubeyile enywe,
bamutimanie mwolile khu lwakha,
basuubilwa benywe bamuulile enywe
basaale benywe babeyikinwa bamurekire buko,
mala enywe se mwamanyile tawe.
“Khu ndaalo niyo ndiukuumilakho Edomu,
ndibunia babaandu babwe bakesi,
ne khubarusiamo limanya liabwe lioosi.
Banamae be kamaani ba Temani baliterema,
ne buli omunamae mu Edomu aliirwa.
“Mulaambwa chisoni,
mala mubunisibwe khulwa mindali,
Sikila mwanuula ne khukhwira bawandaayenywe be lisaaye lia Yakobo.
Enywe mwema alubeka,
mu ndaalo nicho basiku basutilamo kimiaandu kia Yerusalemu,
Baakwa bengila mu bilibwa bie lukoba,
mala baapa chikura khu Yerusalemu
ne enywe mwaambana nabo.
Andi se mwasangaala nga bawandaayenywe
ne banyoola butinyu tawe.
Andi se mwasangaala mu ndaalo nicho babaandu ba Yuda
banyoolelamo butinyu tawe.
Andi se mwefumia mu ndaalo che butinyu tawe.
Andi se mwengila mu lukoba lwe babaandu base ne khu sangaalila butinyu bwabwe tawe,
ne lundi khubanuula kimiaandu kiabwe khu ndaalo eye libuna liabwe tawe.
andi se mwaana babarama khu basiku babwe khu ndaalo eye butinyu bwabwe tawe.
“Endaalo eli siimbi niyo Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndikhalakila chikholo choosi.
Baandu ba Edomu, niko mukholile kakhekholekhe khwinywe
nga nilwo mwakhola, mulikholelwa murio.
Babaandu base banywelele endali endulu mu sikoombe siase sie siiukuumo khu lukulu lwase lutakatifu.
Ne kakhali chikholo choosi chichaloondekhana chilanywa,
sikoombe sie endali endulu lukali sie siiukuumo,
balanywa boosi mala bakoriokhe.
“Ne kakhali khu sikulu sia Sayuni balibao babebacha
ne aliba Abuundu Atakatifu
Babaandu ba Yakobo balinyoola kamaloba kabwe mu bung'ali.
Babaandu ba Yakobo ne Yosefu baliba nga kumulilo,
balibunia babaandu ba Esau
nga kumulilo ne kwosia bichikhi
ne mbao owe lisaaye lia Esau olirama tawe.
Ese, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nalomile.
“Babaandu khukhwama e bunafubo owa Yuda balitila Edomu,
ne abo khukhwama mu maayo mwe chingulu balitiila Filisiti,
Baisiraeli balimenya mu bibala bia Efuraimu ne Samaria
ne babaandu ba Benjamini balitiila Kileati.
Banamae khukhwama e bunaswa owa Isiraeli
balikobola mala baule bamenyile mu Foenike khukhwola e Sarefati.
Baambe khukhwama Yerusalemu baali mu Sarite
balitiila chingoba chiili ebunafubo owa Yuda.
Babaandu ba Yerusalemu be bukhili
balibwaakala Edomu mala babamiie,
ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene aliba Omwami.”

ali, “Rekukha oche e Ninefe mu lukoba luboofu olwo, mala oboolele bamenyilemo bumayaanu bwabwe. Manyile ndi babaandu bamenyilemo bali bamayaanu.”
Ne kakhali Yona aarekukha aacha lubeka luluundi busa khukhwilukha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Eekha aacha, e Yopa, aanyoolayo emeeli eyaba ne elikho echa e Tarishishi. Aaruunga chirupia che lukeendo mala aniinamo alala ne babaandi khucha e Tarishishi nio abe aleeyi khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaruma ekhuungu eye kamaani khu nyanja, ne embembeesi yaba ne kamaani enyala yafuumalikha emeeli.
Babeseeli baria lukali ne khulila khukhwenya buyeeti khuhwama khu bawele babwe. Nio, bamwaataka bibiindu mu nyanja bali busiro buboombe. Siise esio, Yona aba eekhile asi khu sibale sie meeli, ali mwiilo likali.
Omwimeelesi we meeli aanyoola Yona aamureeba ali, “Okhola siina, okona? Yinyokha osabe wele wowo akhuyeete. Wakana akhola ario aakhukholela siisa aaonia bulamu bwefwe.”
Nio babeseeli be emeeli baboolana bali, “Lekha khumwaate chisimbi mala khunyoole naanu niye khubiiya khulwe khu khureerera efwe butinyu buno.” Bakhola bario, mala esiimbi yekesia Yona.
Nio bamureeba bali, “Nono khuboolele! Eku, siina sikila ne khuli mu butinyu buno? Okholanga mulimo siina? Waama mu sibala siina? Waama mu kholo siina?”
Yona aabakobosia ali, “Ese ndi Omueburania, saayanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owe mwikulu, owabuumba enyanja ne kamaloba.”
Nio Yona achiililila khubaboolela nga aaba ne alikho eelukha khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Khwako, babeseeli nga baaulila bario baatasa khuuba ne buuri bukali bamuboolela bali, “Siina nisio okholile sino!”
Siise esio, embembeesi yaba elikho echiililila khukucha, nio babeseeli abo bamureeba bali, “Khukhola siina khwiwe nio embembeesi yino eyenjeele?”
Yona aabakobosia ali, “Mwaate mu meechi, nio enyanja elayenjeele. Manyile ndi ese niise ookilile mwanyoolekha mu butinyu buno.”
Siise esio, babeseeli baakhaka lukali khuyila emeeli khu sikiingi, baatimia ne kamaani kabwe koosi mala khunyala tawe. Sikila embembeesi yachiililila khuuba engali po, mala baakhilwa nisio bakhola.
Nio baalilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bali, “Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khukhusaba nosiima khukhafwa khulwe khukhwiira omundu yuno tawe! Okhakhubalilakho kamafuki ko mundu yuno tawe. Sikila ewe ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wakholile nga ne osiimisiibwe.”
Nio baabukula Yona bamumwaata mu meechi, mala enyanja yayenjeela khangu.
Lino liakila babeseeli abo baaria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi lukali po! Baana embosio khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala beyama khumukholela.

Yona aasaba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wewe, ne ali munda mwe ng'eeni
ali, “Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mu butinyu bwase nakhusaba,
mala wangobosia.
Nasaba buyeeti ne ndi aasi emakoombe
mala wanjeeta.
Wamwaata ese mu lusiba,
khukhwola khu sibale sie nyanja,
niio kameechi kaangara chimbeka choosi,
bibuli biowo bie kamaani bioosi biambirirakho.
Nio naloma ndi, ‘Namwaatiibwe khukhwama ebweeni wowo,
ndikhola ndiena lundi nio mbone Lukaangu lwowo lutakatifu?’
Kameechi kandiimbia,
ne lusiba lwambotookhelela,
enyoonyi yamboelesia khu murwe
mu maayo mwe bikulu.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase, ese neekha asi naacha mu sibala nisio nekalilwamo mindali, ne kakhali ewe wandusia mu lusiba olwo.
Ee, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nga nabona ne nja khufwa,
nakhusaba ewe ne oli mu Lukaangu lwowo lutakatifu, mala waulila lisaba liase.
Abo basaaya bifwaani bia busa,
baalekhile khu khuloonda ewe.
Ne kakhali ese ndakhuelesia efuma,
ndaana embosio khwiwe,
lundi khole niko nasuubisia.
Buonia bwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi!”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aalaka eng'eeni ekhaase Yona khu sikiingi, mala yakhola erio.

Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaboolela Yona lukhola khabili ali,
“Rekukha oche e Ninefe, lukoba luboofu olwo, mala oboolele babaandu burume nibwo khueleesie buno.”
Khwako, Yona aaulila ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala aarekukha aacha e Ninefe lukoba luboofu olwo. Lukoba luboofu olwo abeele lubukula chindaalo chitaru khukeenda khuulubiramo.
Ne kakhali Yona arakikha khukeendelesia khuubira mu lukoba lube lukeendo lwe ndaalo ndala. Nio aaboola mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Mu ndaalo kamakhumi kane Ninefe lulabuna!”
Ne babaandu be Ninefe basuubila burume bwa Wele. Nio bakhalaka bali buli mundu akhoya eeyimana khulia, mala babaandu boosi khukhwama khu bakhoongo khukhwola khu be asi, beboa chingubo che kamakunia, khukhwekesia bali bekaniile.
Nga omwami owe Ninefe aaulila kamakhuwa ako, eenyokha khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami, eefuula ekanjo yewe eye bubwami, efwaala engubo eye likunia, mala eekhala asi mwikokhe.
Aaruma likhuwa khu baandu be Ninefe ali, “Lino lili lilaka khukhwama khu mwami ne bakeekhe bewe. Se aliio oolalia sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, aakhaba chikhaafu ne kamakheese se bilaaya ne khuunywa tawe.
Babaandu boosi befwaale kamakunia ne aakhaba bibiaayo bioosi khukhwola babiboe kamakunia. Buli mundu akhoya alilile Wele mu lieenya likali, lundi khukhwola buli mundu alekhe kimiima kiewe kie bumayaanu ne bikholwa biewe bie sisiayuumba.
Wakaana Wele alakaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe, alekhe khuuba ne lirima nio efwe khukhafwa tawe!”
Nga Wele ne abona ali baalekhile bumayaanu bwabwe, akaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe, mala khubauukuuma nga abeele alomile tawe.

Yona naye se asangaalila kano ne atiiti ene tawe, mala aambwa lirima.
Nio aasaba ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne khaama engo tawe se naloma ndi kano kali niko olakhola tawe ku? Kano niko kakakila nakhola kamaani khukhwilukhila e Tarishishi. Namanya ndi oli Wele owe kumwalaalo kumukali ne siisa, owe liliekhaliilikha, lundi oli ne busiime bukhawa tawe lundi buli lwoosi wenyanga khukaluukhasia kamebaasio kowo nio olekhe khuukuuma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, siise sino njire, sikila ese naafwa lukhila ne mba omulamu.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamukobosia ali, “Eku, oli na ng'ali siina khuambwa lirima?”
Nio Yona aarura aacha ebukwe we lukoba mala eekhala asi. Oombakha khasali mala eekhala mu siiniini siakho aliindiilila khubona sikane sikholekhe khu lukoba lwa Ninefe.
Abweene ao Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aakhusia lurabu khu khasali lwakhola sisiiniini niio Yona aaba ne eekhaale, nio eeuliile bulayi. Yona asiimisibwa lukali po, sikila lurabu olwo.
Ne endaalo eyaloondakho mu mabwiibwi, Wele aaruma liike liarema lurabu chana mala lwaniaala.
Oli enyanga yasoa, Wele aaruma ekhuungu eye bukhafu yauucha khukhwama ebukwe, mala Yona enga khukwa luluuchu sikila kumuumu kukwamwoosia khu murwe. Nio ekoomba lifwa mala aaloma ali, “Naafwa lukhila ne mba omulamu!”
Nio Wele aaboolela Yona ali, “Eku, oli na ng'ali siina khuambila lurabu lirima?”
Yona aakobosia ali, “Ndi na ng'ali po khuambwa lirima, lirima linyala liianjira!”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aamuboolela ali, “Lurabu luno lwachoile siilo silala, mala lwooma siilo sisialoondakho; ewe se wakholakho sisiindu siosi siosi khu nilwo tawe, lundi se walukhola lwachoa tawe, mala walubooneele buubi!
Nono khoya khukholela Ninefe lukoba luboofu olwo siisa sikali. Sikila lulimo babaana chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili baakhalikho ne buubi bwosi bwosi tawe, ne bibiaayo bikali!”

Ulila lino, enywe Be Chikholo mweesi,
rekeeresia lino, mweesi mumenyile khu sibala!
Omwami WELE alalomaloma khu mabi kenywe.
Rekeeresia alikho alomaloma khukhwama mu Lukaangu lwewe lutakatifu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho echa khukhwama abuundu wewe atakatifu,
alecha mala aswalakilile abuundu e khusaayila bifwaani.
Bikulu bilayengukhila asi wewe
nga embula mu mulilo,
bileekha asi mu matooma
nga kameechi ne keekha khu mwikha.
Kano koosi kalakholekha sikila sileka ne bubwoni bwe Baisiraeli khu Wele,
wikiicha naanu khulwe sileka sie Baisiraeli?
Se luli Samaria lukoba luboofu lwa Isiraeli!
Naanu okholeleesie khusaaya bifwaani mu Yuda?
Se bali babaandu ba Yerusalemu babeene!
Khwako, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndabunia lukoba lwa Samaria lube likuunda,
abuundu e khubiaala kimisabibu.
Ne ndichukha kamabaale kalwo mwitooma,
ne khusiulaka kimisiingi kialwo.
Bifwaani biomwo bioosi bikharakakwemo,
bioosi nibio baaelesia baeeyi be mu lukaangu bikhosibwe,
bifwaani bialwo bioosi bikhabe libuumbi
sikila babaandu balwo babinyoola khulwe bueeyi
ne luno basiku balwo balabisuta bayilile bakhola bueeyi abuundu aandi.”
Nio Mika aloma ali, “Sikila kano, khelooche ne khulila,
khechule mala ngende sichula,
khasame nga engipwe
mala ndile nga enyeefwe.
Kamakoonjo ka Samaria se kaona tawe,
mala luno kakwile khu Yuda,
libuna liolile khu bilibwa bie babaandu base bamenyile mu Yerusalemu.”
Mukhaboolelakho baali mu Kati khukhilwa khwefwe tawe,
bakhamubona ne mulila tawe.
Ne enywe babaandu ba Beti lafira,
yikalangasia mwipukhuulu khukhwekesia bubeeleli bwenywe.
Enywe bamenywa ba Safira,
mulacha mu mbaambe ne muli sichula mala muambwe chisoni.
Bamenywa ba Sanaani,
mukharura enje we lukoba tawe.
Ne muulila babaandu ba Beteseli ne balila,
manya muli bubwilukhilo bwenywe se buliyo tawe.
Sikila babaandu ba Marota
baliindilila siuluukho mu silukuluku
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi areerire libuna khu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Enywe mumenyile Lakishi,
boa chifarasi khu makaari ke liie.
Enywe mwaloonda bubwoni bwa Isiraeli,
mala mwakila babaandu ba Yerusalemu bakwa mu bwoni.
Khwako mulaana biianwa bie khuboolela babaandu ba Moresheti-kati muli muliindwe,
ne babaandu ba Akisibu balabea babaami ba Isiraeli.
Enywe babaandu ba Moresa,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamura enywe mumakhono ko musiku,
oolikho ocha khutiila lukoba lwenywe.
Babemeelesi ba Isiraeli bakhache bekise mwibina lia Adulamu.
Baandu ba Yuda, beka lichuune lienywe,
ne mulila babaana benywe nibo mwasiima,
ba ne bisule nga ng'ooli,
sikila babaana benywe balatiilwa bache mu mbaambe.

Bali ne silaamo abo barengeecha ne barekekha kamamayaanu,
oli busia bakhola niko barekekhe siilo,
sikila bali ne bunyali bwe khukhola bario.
Bekoomba ne khu nuula babaandu kimikuunda,
bekoomba chinju ne khuchibukula,
bapia omundu siibi ne lisaaye liewe,
ne khumunuula kumukabwa kwewe.
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndikho ndekekha butinyu khwinywe
butinyu nibwo mukhebacha tawe.
Mucha khukwa mu butinyu,
ne se mukheboniekho lundi tawe.
Siise esio ne siola babaandu balipa chimbakha khwinywe
babaandu balirumikhira kakekholekha khwinywe nga silolelo sie libuna,
mala bakhembe kumwenya kwe ngunyi kuno.
Efwe khwabuniile elala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abukule kimikuunda kiefwe
mala akiaanile khwaabo babakhura efwe mu mbaambe.”
Khwako siise ne sikhoole sie khukoboselia babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi kamaloba,
enywe se mukhanyoolekho khu mukabwa tawe.
Babaandu bamboolela bali, “Okhakhwilwachila tawe.
Okhelwacha khu makhuwa ako tawe.
Wele se acha khukhuambia efwe chisoni tawe.
Mwibaasia muli ba Isiraeli balaamiilwe ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atibisie liliekhaliilikha liewe ku?
Anyala akhola siindu sirio?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se alomalomanga kamalayi
khwaabo bakhola kamaluungi tawe ku?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali,
“Enywe mwibwaakala babaandu base nga basiku.
Babaandu bakobola khukhwama mwiie bebaasia bali, bali ne kumuleembe,
ne kakhali enywe mubanuula chingubo chabwe.
Muoona bakhasi be babaandu base
mala barura munju nicho basiima,
lundi mwanuulile babaana babwe chikhabi cha buli lwoosi.
Yinyokha muche,
sikila ano bubwilukhilo se buliio lundi tawe.
Sikila bubwoni bwenywe bwareerire libuna abuundu ano.
“Babaandu bano benya omung'oosi owechula bubeeyi obaboolela ali,
‘Endali ne kamalwa bilaba bikali.’
“Ne kakhali ndamubuusia enywe alala
ndabuusia babarama mu Isiraeli,
ndamubuusia alala
nga kamakheese mu siko siako
nga kumunyele mu mayilwe,
sibala sienywe silechula babaandu.”
Wele aliikula babaandu bewe khukhwama mu mbaambe,
balirura enje we bilibwa mala babe balekhuule.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli omwami wabwe,
omwene alibarangirira abarusie mu mbaambe.

Mika aloma ali,
“Bemeelesi ba Isiraeli rekeeresia!
Awenyekha mukhole bung'ali,
ne kakhali mwabiyila kamalayi mala mwasiima kamabi.
Mubaaka ne mutabulakamo babaandu base ne bakhaafwa tawe.
Enywe mubaaka ne khulia babaandu base
mufunaka bikuumba biabwe
ne khubasacha nga chinyama nicho mwenya khura mu ningilo.
Siise silikho siicha nisio mulililila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
ne kakhali salimukobosia tawe
sakharekeeresie kamasaba kenywe tawe,
sikila mwakholile bumayaanu.
“Babaandu base basiima bang'oosi,
ba babea bali khulaba ne kumuleembe
sikila babaruungire,
lundi barikhirisilia liie,
khwaabo bakhabaruunga tawe,
khu bang'oosi bano Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
‘Bang'oosi chindaalo chenywe chaweele,
sikila mutiimia babaandu base,
se mulaba ne kamalola tawe.
Se mung'oolakho siindu lundi tawe.’ ”
Bang'oola baliambwa chisoni
sikila niko bang'oolile se kekholekha tawe,
bakhaambwe chisoni,
sikila Wele sakhakhole niko bamusabile tawe.
Ne kakhali ese Mika Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjichusie Roho wewe ne kamaani,
mala ambelesie ese limanya lie bung'ali,
ne bunyindaafu bwe khuboolela Baisiraeli bubwoni bwabwe.
Ndekeresie enywe babemeelesi Baisiraeli,
enywe mumwabiila bung'ali
mala mukaluukhasia bulayi buba bubi,
mulombakhanga Yerusalemu lukoba lwa Wele
khu musiingi kwe sifuki ne bubeeyi.
Babemeelesi ba Yerusalemu banyoola asoya mu bwimeelesi bwabwe.
Basaayi basomia Lilaka khulwe khunyoola kumuruungo,
ne bang'oosi baruungia chirupia nio bang'oole,
mala boosi baloma bali,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne nabo.
Lundi bali, “Bubi se bulakhwichakho tawe
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali nafwe.”
Sayuni lulilimwa nga kumukuunda
lukoba lwa Yerusalemu luliba situumi sie libuna
ne sikulu siilikho Lukaangu siliba sichakha.

Mu ndaalo chichiicha
sikulu siilikho Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Siliba sileeyi khukhila bikulu bioosi,
khukhila chingulu choosi.
Chikholo chingali chikhebusiekho,
ne babaandu abo baliloma bali,
“Yiicha khuche khu sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mu Lukaangu lwa Wele owa Isiraeli.
Alakhusomia niko enya khukhole,
mala khukhole niko enya.
Sikila lilaka lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi liama Yerusalemu,
Wele alomaloma khu baandu bewe naali Sayuni.”
mu kholo che kamaani che aembi ne aleeyi
ne babaandu balibasa chimbalu chabwe chibe chimbako
ne kamafumo kabwe kabe chingeso.
Babaandu Be Chikholo se balipana lundi liie tawe
ne se balirekekha lundi ke liie tawe.
alibiaala kimisabibu kiewe omwene ne kimituli,
ne se aliio olimuriikhirisia tawe
sikila Omwami Owe Banamae alakiliisie ario.
Luno buli ekholo esaaya ne khuria Wele wayo,
ne kakhali efwe khulasaaya ne khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe khulwa mindali.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Siise silikho siicha,
nisio ndibuusia alala abo nibo naukuuma,
abo ba baaba mu sibi mu mbaambe.
Bali baleme lundi bali aleeyi khukhwama engo wabwe,
ne kakhali ndakhola limenya liya khwaabo ba barama
mala baliba ekholo emboofu.
Khukhwama siise esio ndibamiia ne ndi khu sikulu sia Sayuni khulwa mindali.”
Ne ewe Yerusalemu nilwo Wele emangakho
naliinda babaandu bewe nga omwaayi,
oliba lundi lukoba luboofu lwe bubwami bubwaba bubwowo.
Baandu ba Yerusalemu, siina sikila ne mulila lukali?
Siina sikila ne muumia nga omukhasi olumwa?
Sikila se muli no mwami tawe,
namwe babemeelesi benywe bafwa?
Ee baandu ba Yerusalemu, lila ne khusikhiikha nga omukhasi olumwa,
sikila luno mularura mu lukoba
mala mumenye aleeyi mu lukoongo.
Mulacha e Babiloni,
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
alimuonia khukhwama khu basiku benywe.
Chikholo chingali chebuusiisie khumwibwaakala enywe.
Baloma bali, “Khukhwola khubunie Yerusalemu!
Khulalubona ne lukwile kamaumbu.”
Ne kakhali chikholo chino
se chimanyile chinganakani cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe,
se bamanyile bali babuusibwe alala
khuukuumwa nga buulo nibwo benya khuula tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Baandu ba Yerusalemu, cha muukuume basiku benywe.
Ndamukhola mube ne kamaani nga euunwa
eye chinjika che bichuuma ne bikhakayu bie kumukasa.
Mulabunia babaandu Be Chikholo chingali
ne kimiaandu nikio banuula mu siayuumba,
mukhandeerere ese Omwami we sibala sioosi.”

Baandu ba Yerusalemu buusia banamae benywe!
Khwebwakaalwe!
Balikho bebwaakala omwimeelesi owa Isiraeli.
ewe oli lulala khu ngoba chindiiti lukali mu Yuda,
ne mwiwe ndamiamo omwami we Baisiraeli,
niye sikuuka siewe siama khale.”
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhanjukhe babaandu bewe ebweeni we basiku babwe,
khukhwola siise nisio omukhasi olikho olumwa asaalilakho.
Nio Baisiraeli boosi bali mu mbaambe,
bakobole niio babasiaabwe bali.
Omwami oyo ne echa aliamiia babaandu bewe ne kamaani ka Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
mu bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene.
Babaandu bewe balimenya mu muleembe,
sikila babaandu mu sibala sioosi balimanya bunyali bwewe,
lundi Omwami akhareere kumuleembe.
Nga Baashuru ne balibwaakala sibala siefwe
ne khutechula kamasiisi ke chingoba chefwe,
khuliruma babemeelesi befwe be kamaani khu khuupana nabo.
babemeelesi befwe be kamaani abo balirumikhira bulwaani khubaula
mala bakhuonie efwe.
Ne Baisiraeli bakhaafwila mu mbaambe tawe,
baliba nga efula eye mu siimiyu khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi esisinia bibiaamo.
Bakheyikine Wele
se bakheyikine babaandu lundi tawe.
Baisiraeli bakhaafwa abo tawe,
baliba nga etalang'i eyiima siakhulia mu musiru namwe mu mayilwe
enyoola kumunyele kwe kamakheese,
mala ekatiile ne khukatabulakamo
ne se aliio okasikula tawe.
Baisiraeli bakhaule basiku babwe,
balibabunia boosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali ne khu ndaalo eyo ndiira chifarasi chenywe
ne ndionakaka kamakaari kenywe ke liie.
Khatechule chingoba chenywe,
ne khukwisia kamasiisi ke chingoba chenywe koosi.
Ndionaka bibiindu bie bulosi nibio murumikhiranga bioosi
ne omufumu salinyoolekha mwinywe lundi tawe
ndirusiao bifwaani
ne chinjeko chenywe chindakatifu,
ne se mulisaayakho lundi bibiindu nibio mwabene mwekholela tawe.
Ndionakaka bifwaani bia Asiera wele we siikhasi
ne khukhwonaka chingoba chenywe.
Ne mwirima ne burafu ndiiyacha,
chikholo choosi chikhandia ese tawe.

Rekeeresia niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eundukuma khu Isiraeli,
Yinyokha mala wilooche ebweeni we chingulu,
ne lekha bikulu biulile niko oloma.
Enywe ngulu, ulila lilieundukuma lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enywe ninywe kimisiingi kie sibala kikiabao khukhwama khale,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne lilieundukuma khu baandu bewe
mala alikho acha khureebana nabo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ee baandu base, siina sibi nase?
Bubi bwase khwinywe buli siina? Mboolele!
namureesia khukhwama mu bunasioobi,
ne naruma Musa, Aruni ne Miriamu,
khuba barangirisi benywe.
ne niko Balamu okhwa Beori amuboolela,
kakekholekha ne mucha Kilikali khukhwama Sitimu,
mwolaane khumanya bikholwa bie buonia bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Siina nisio khareerere Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe mwikulu,
ne nicha khusaaya?
Eku, mureerere chimoosi nga biianwa bie khukhwosia?
Eku, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alasiimisibwa ne biianwa bie kamakheese chielefu,
namwe kamafura kamakali ka miseituni?
Nyala namuaanila omwana wase omubele khulwe bubwoni bwase?
Se kanyalikha tawe! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhwekesia efwe kaali kamalayi,
niko Wele enya efwe khukhole niko kano,
khukhola bung'ali ne khukhwekesia busiime buli lwoosi,
ne khumenya mu lieboombia mu bulala ne Wele wefwe.
Buli bulayi khuria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
aboolela lukoba ali,
“Rekeeresia enywe mumenyile mu lukoba luno,
mu nju che babaandu bamayaanu
khulimo ne buiinda nibwo banyoolela mu bubeeyi,
barumikhira bikelo bie bubeeyi sisiindu nisio ese mbiyisibwa nasio.
Ese nyala nabeela ndiena omundu orumikhira bikelo
bie bubeeyi.
Babaandu benywe baiinda babea ne khukhwiba bie bataambi
ne enywe mweesi muli babeeyi.
Khwako narakikhe khumubunia enywe,
sikila bubwoni bwenywe.
Mulalia ne kakhali se mulekura tawe
ata mulachiililila khuba ne njala.
Mwakhamusia bibiindu se mukhabionie tawe,
nibio mukhaka khuonia ndibionakakila mwiie.
Mulibiaala ne kakhali se mulikesa tawe,
mulisuura kamatuunda ke kimiseituni ne kakhali se muliamiamo kamafura tawe,
mulisuura kimisabibu ne kakhali se mulinywa endali yakio tawe.
no mwana wewe omwami Ahabu niko akhola
mala mwaloondile bukeleki bwabwe.
Khwako ndamubunia enywe mala buli mundu alimulekelesia
babaandu boosi balimukhoma.”

Ndi ne silaamo! Sikila nabeele nga omundu we njala okhanyoola lituunda liramire
khu murongooro kakaandi ne kabutibwe tawe
kamatuunda ke siimiyu kamalayi koosi kabutiibwe.
Se aliio omusuubilwa oramire mu sibala tawe,
se aliio oria Wele tawe.
Buli mulala alindiliile khukhwira,
ne buli mulala ayiima owasie.
Boosi bamanyile khukhola kamabi ne sinani,
babaami ne bakhalaki basaba asoya.
Ne kakhali owe lukoosi aloma niko kumwoyo kwewe kwenya,
khwako barekekhera alala niko benya.
Akhaba balayi lundi basuubilwa lukali mu nibo bali busa nga enyoonyi ekhali ne bukhala tawe.
Endaalo yolile niyo Wele acha khuukuumilakho babaandu bewe,
nga aboola khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe.
Luno bakoyaanile.
Okhasuubila owasio,
namwe ore lilieyikina mu musaale tawe,
ba omurekeerefu niko oloma,
akhaba khu mukhasi wowo.
bakhaana bayingania ba maawabwe
ne mukho musaani alomania masalaawe we siikhasi,
basiku bo mundu bali babaandu be nju yewe babeene.
Ne kakhali ese ndalindiilila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ndalindiilila Wele ne lilieyikina.
Wele alambonia.
Wele wase alambulila.
Basiku befwe, mukhekhoya sikila khwakwile tawe.
Khwakwile mala khulenyokha.
Luno khuli mu siilima
ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakhukhoselia.
Efwe khulekhaliilikha bukhalafu bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Sikila khwamukholeele bubwoni,
khulekhaliilikha khukhwola akhubabile kumusaango kwefwe.
Ne khu khurusiakho bukhalaki bwewe.
Alikhureera efwe mu buwaanga
khukhabone buonia bwewe.
Abwenao basiku befwe balibona kano
mala chisoni chiliaamba abo babakhuboolela efwe bali,
“Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali waena?”
Efwe khulibabona nga bakhilwa,
ne baliswalakililwa asi
nga kamatosi ke khu ngila che mu lukoba.
Baandu ba Yerusalemu,
Siise sie khukhwombakha lundi kamasiisi ke lukoba lwenywe siolile.
Siise esio chinjakha chikhabalae.
Babaandu benywe balimukobolela khukhwama buli abuundu,
khukhwama Ashuru ebukwe khukhwola e Misiri ebunafubo bali mwichakho
ne khukhwama mu bibala bie aluuchi lwa Efurati,
khukhwama mu nyanja che aleeyi ne chingulu che aleeyi.
Ne kakhali sibala siliba sisiangalaamwe,
sikila bubwoni bwe babaandu bamenyilemo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ba omwaayi khu baandu bowo nibo wamwene warobora.
Akhaba ne bamenyile bong'ene mu sichiimi,
kumukuunda kwe ngakha kuli embi nabo.
Lekha bamenye mu maloba ke ngakha ka Basiani ne Kileati
nga bamenyanga khale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Khukholele kamayia,
nga biise nibio wakhurusilia mu sibala sia Misiri.
Chikholo chichiindi chikhabone mala chiambwe chisoni,
chakhaba ne chili ne kamaani kamakali bakhasile busa,
mala baminyaale.
Balikhururira asi nga chindemu,
balirura mu ngoba chabwe chisire ne baterema,
mala bakobolele Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele wefwe ne liria,
mala baliba ne buuri sikila ewe Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi naanu oli Wele nga ewe, obeela bubwoni,
owibilila bumayaanu bwe babaandu be kumukabwa kwewe khwaabo bakhacha mu mbaambe tawe?
Ewe se obechanga ne lirima khulwa mindali tawe,
sikila wekesianga busiime bwa buli lwoosi.
Ewe olakhukholela efwe siisa lundi.
Olaswalakilila bubwoni bwefwe,
ne khubumwaata mu nyanja.
Ewe olekesia busuubilwa bwowo khu be nju eya Yakobo,
ne busiime bwowo khu lisaaye lia Aburahamu,
nga wasuubisia bakuuka befwe,
khukhwama khale.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi se ekhaliilikhanga bamwekelaniakho tawe,
Aukumanga abo bakhafukiilisiana naye tawe,
mwirima liewe aruungia kamabi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali kalaa khuambwa lirima,
ne kakhali ali ne bunyali,
se alekhanga khuukuuma babooni tawe.
Niio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akeenda embembeesi yinyokha,
Kamafuumbi kali lutamuusi nilwo bikele biewe binyosia.
Akhokhela enyanja, mala yooma
Ateenyia chinjichi.
Kimikuunda kia Bashani kiooma,
sikulu sia Karimeli siekhola sikupilia,
ne bimuli bia Lebanoni biniala.
Bikulu biterema ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
chingulu chinukulukha ebweeni wewe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga nabonekha sibala siesisikha,
sibala ne babaandu balio boosi baterema.
Naanu onyala wema ebweeni wewe naali ne lirima?
Naanu onyala ekhaliilikha burafu bwe lirima liewe?
Lirima liewe lirura nga kumulilo,
niye arakakangamo chinyaanda.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omulayi,
aliinda babaandu bewe mu siise sie butinyu
aliinda abo bamweyikina niye.
Ereera elala basiku bewe nga kameechi kakechuule,
eera abo bamuyingania.
Siina nisio mulakwangwaanilanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi?
Alamwiira.
Se aliio omuyingania khukhwola khabili tawe.
Bulayi bwene nga kamawa ne kosibwa
enywe bameesi mulosebwa murio.
Omundu owekutanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
ne khumwekesia enywe bubwoni se ama mwinywe tawe ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
bakhaba bakali lundi be kamaani
balonakakwa mala bafwe,
akhaba ne namupia enywe sibi
se ndakhola ndio lundi tawe.
Luno ndakamia kamaani ka Asiria khwinywe,
ne khukhalaka kiminyololo kikiamuboa.
Kano niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abisiisie khulwe ba Asiria:
“Se baliba ne lisaaye libatiuukha tawe.
Ndonaka bifwaanani bili mu chingaangu che ba wele babwe.
Ndarekekhanga eng'ani eye ba Asiria, se bakhoyela khumenya tawe!”
Ali khungila echa khulangilila bukhili! Baandu ba Yuda,
sangaala mu milukha kienywe mala muelesie Wele nibio mwamulaka mu khwechuba.
Babooni se balibwaakalakho sibala sienywe lundi tawe. Babunisiibwe elala.

Ninefe, balikho bakhwibwaakala,
kamaani kalakhusalanisia kolile.
Rekekha banamae benywe khulwe buliindi.
Liinda chingila!
Yirekekhera liie!
Sikila Omwami ali siimbi khukobosia efuma eye lukoba lwa Isiraeli nga ne lwaba, basiku balwo ne bakhaluyaaya tawe.
Banamae basiku basuta chingabo chimbesemu,
lundi befwara chingubo chifwaanana chimbesemu.
Balerekekhanga khukhwibwaakala!
Kamakaari kabwe kamwemukha nga kumulilo!
Chifarasi chabwe chitima!
Kamakaari ke liie kechula sifwaabi mu miyila.
Kacha enyuma ne ebweeni akari e lukoba,
kakhosia nga chitochi ne kameniuukha nga lueni.
Babemeelesi balaangwa,
betuya nga beyindilisia khucha ebweeni.
Babebwaakali batimaka sie siisi,
mala barayo engabo ekhiingilila sitikulula lisiisi.
Bilibwa biili eluuchi bikukha,
lichipi liechulamo kamariisio.
Kwini atiliilwe,
bakholi bewe beunamila nga kamauusi
ne bara kamakhono kabwe alusaya mu bubeeleli.
Babaandu belukha khukhwama mu Ninefe!
Nga kameechi kakaama mwitiisi likhungululwe,
Bayokela ne baloma bali, “Yiima! Yiima!” Ne se aliio owekhebukha tawe.
Khemuyaye efwesa!
Khemuyaye esahabu!
Lukoba lwechulamo kimiaandu!
Ninefe lwonakwe ne khu khwanjukhwa,
Kimiooyo kiechuule buuri,
kamasikamo katerema, kamaani kawelemo,
bubweeni bwakaluukhane.
Lukoba lulwabechanga nga kamabina ke chitalang'i luno luli waena?
Abuundu niio chitalang'i ching'ana chalisibwanga,
niio chitalang'i chachichanga,
nio ching'ana chacho chiliindwe.
Etalang'i yeera esaang'i yayo,
mala yakitabulakila chichasie
ne ching'ana chayo,
yechusia chinyama chindabulake mwibina mwayo.
Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Ese ndi omusiku wowo, Ndoosia kamakaari kowo. Banamae bowo balererwa mwiie, ne ndabukula buli siindu nisio wanuula babaandu babaandi. Lilienya lie barumwa bowo se liliuliilikhana lundi tawe.”

Lukoba lubeeyi lundi lwe babeeri, lulwechulamo kimiaandu luno, lwabunile.
Lulebwaakalwa ne biilimo khuyaaywa!
Rekeeresia! Khurundukha khwe siboko,
khusakaya khwe chingarangarani,
khutima khwe chifarasi,
khupiringikha khwe kamakaari!
Banamae be chifarasi bachirekusia chiche ebweeni,
chimbalu ne kamafumo bimeniuukha!
Bafu babusibwa bituumi,
bafu bakali bakhabalikha tawe
babaandu babetuyakho!
Ninefe lukoba lwe sifwaabi lulikho luukuumwa.
Lusiimisia mala lwechulamo bibiindu bie bulosi,
omukhasi owechula bufwisi oyo
aamba Be Chikholo ne sifwaabi siewe.
Omwami Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali,
“Ninefe, ndakhuukuuma!
Ndakhuchula mala Be Chikholo babone sichula siowo,
mala oambwe chisoni.
Ndakhulekelesia ne khukhunyaalutia,
babaandu balakhubona mala bauke.
Boosi balamubona enywe balesiindukha.
Balaloma bali, ‘Ninefe lwabunile!
Naanu olalukholela siisa?
Naanu oleenya aluoleelesie!’ ”
Ninefe, ewe oli omulayi khukhila Tebesi, lukoba luboofu lwa Misiri ku? Nilwo lwosi lwaba ne luluuchi lulwalukhiinga nga lisiisi, luluuchi olwo lwaba Naili.
Tebesi lwaruka Sudani ne Misiri, bunyali bwalwo se bwaba ne sisiakamo tawe, ne lwaba ne busaale ne Libia.
Ne babaandu ba Tebesi babukulwa khucha mu mbaambe. Buli khungila babaana babwe bapwangwa ne berwa. Banamae be basiku babara khu minyololo mala buli mundu acha ne babewe.
Ninefe, akhaba ewe olakwa mu kimeesi eye khuloba khumanya liliekholekha. Ne lundi olakhaka khukhwefubarura khu basiku bowo.
Chingoba chowo chisire choosi chilaba nga kimituli kiirobiisie chinduli chakio, sisiikha kimirongooro, ne lituunda lilakwa mukhanwa mwowo!
Banamae bowo balinga bakhasi, ne sibala siowo sili ao busa se sili ne oliinda busiku tawe. Kumulilo kulonaka kimitalaachi kikikala bilibwa biowo.
Khemutae kameechi mwirekekhele liie ne khukhatatasia chingoba chenywe! Swala liloba mupe kamatifari, ne rekekha bibiipa kamatifari!
Wakhakhola oriena, olosibwa namwe wirirwe mwiie. Olaba nga biakhulia biliibwa ne chisike. Mwasaalana nga buchunju.
Mwasaala baboofuli bakali khukhila ching'enieesi che khwikulu! Ne luno bachile, nga chisike chibambula chindaa chacho mala chipurukha.
Babemeelesi benywe bali nga chisike chiili mu masiisi khu ndaalo eye kumunyiri. Ne nga kumuumu ne kwicha, chipurukha, ne se aliio omanya niio chiicha tawe!
Omuruki owa Asiria ewe, baruki baali asi wowo bafwiile, ne babaandu bowo be lukoosi bali mwilo lia mindali! Babaandu bowo baasalaniile khu bikulu, ne se aliio onyala abakobosia engo lundi tawe.
Se siliio sirusiao khuchuunwa khwenywe tawe, ne kamakoonjo kenywe se kasilikhwa kaona tawe. Abo boosi baulila kamakhuwa ke lilionakwa lienywe baapa chimbi ne khukhwekhoya. Alikhoo namulala owifubarura burafu bwowo buli bukali ku?

Obuno nibwo burume nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ekesia omung'oosi Habakuku.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ndasaba buyeeti khu siise siina nio ewe okhuulile,
namwe nio okhuonie khukhwama khu siayuumba?
Siina sikila ne unda mu butinyu?
Wikhaliilikha oriena khubona bumayaanu?
Libuna ne sisiayuumba biambotookhelele,
bulomani ne bubupani bili buli abuundu.
Khwako lilaka se lili ne kamaani tawe,
ne bung'ali se buliio tawe,
sikila bamayaanu baindiaala khukhila baluungi,
ne bung'ali bwakoyaanisibwa.
“Chiililila khulola chikholo chiili siimbi nanywe,
mala mulesiindukhila niko mulabona.
Nja khukhola sikholwa nisio mulaulila mala mulekhe khusuubila tawe.
ekholo endafu eyayobayobana,
balikho bamaasia buli abuundu khuulila bibala bibiindi.
Bareera buuri ne liendekhelela,
mu lielola liabwe bekholela kamalaka babeene.
Chifarasi chabwe chili khangu khukhila chingwe,
chindafu khukhila bisuuche.
Bakeendela khu farasi bama mu bibala bie aleeyi
Chifarasi chabwe chibuya.
Chiicha khangu nga chifuruusi ne chiikha khukamula siindu.
Banamae becha ne sisiayuumba,
buli mundu ariire nga ne becha,
baambe babwe bali bakali nga buchunju.
Balekelesia babaami ne khuchekheelela babemeelesi.
Se luliio lumako lubakhiingilila tawe
sikila babuusia situumi bambukhile baluambe.
Bacha ebweeni oli embeo,
kamaani kabwe niko wele wabwe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, khukhwama khale ewe oli Wele.
Oli Wele wase omutakatifu lundi owa mindali?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, oli Wele lundi omuliindi wase,
warobora Bababuloni ne khubaa kamaani nio bakhuukuume efwe.
Ne kakhali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, wikhaliilikha oriena babaandu bachongani ne bamayaanu bano?
Chimoni chowo se chinyala chalola bumayaanu tawe
mala sonyala wekhaliilikha babaandu ne bakhola kamabi tawe.
Sina sikila nosilile busa babaandu bamayaanu ne babunia baluungi khubakhila?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, obukula oriena babaandu nga ching'eeni,
namwe nga bimoola bitamba omwimeelesi?
Bababiloni baloba babaandu oli ching'eeni.
Babatilila mu ndimba chabwe ne bekhoyela khutiilwa khwabwe.
Lundi basaaya chindiimba chabwe ne khuchiaanila chimbosio,
sikila chindiimba chibaanila buli siindu silayi nisio benya.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, balachiililila khurumikhira chimbalu chabwe buli lwoosi,
ne khubunia chikholo ne bakhabaakho ne siisa tawe?”

Habakuku aloma ali, “Ndaniina khu ndeleelwa yase,
mala ndindiilile nilio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela,
ne likobosia siina nilio amboolela.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akobosia ali,
“Andika bulayi bubwene khubipao niko nja khukhuboolela,
nio kabonekhe khu buli mundu osoma.
Ne kakhali silikho siicha khangu,
ne niko ekhwekesia kakheche kekholekhe.
Kanyala kaayilila ne kakhali kalindiilile
khukhwola kalekholekha.”
“Bali bamayaanu balafwa,
ne kakhali bali baluungi balamenya sikila bali ne lisuubila khu Wele.
“Khutasa khwako, endali emeesia
omundu owe kibonio se alayindila tawe,
kameelu kewe kali kamabalaayi nga emakoombe,
nga lifwa se ekura tawe,
apania chikholo choosi,
mala mwaamba babaandu bano boosi baba babenywe.
Babaandu babaulwa bakhachekheelele ba babaula.
Balibaboolela bali, ‘Mubukula biikhali bibienywe tawe,
ne kakhali mwabunile!
Mulachiililila khuba baiinda khu siise siina,
khulwe khuyingiilila be kamakobi kenywe bamuruunge?’ ”
Ne kakhali ne likhamanyikha tawe,
enywe mumwaula babaandi,
muliba mu makobi mwabene mala muyingililwe khuruunga bukhala.
Basiku bakheche bamurikhirisie. Ne bakhamubunie.
Sikila mwanuula chikholo chingali
ne kakhali abo babarama bakheyache sikila bubwiri nibwo mwakhola,
ne lundi sisiayuumba nisio mwakhola khu baandu be sibala sioosi ne chingoba chabwe.
Enywe mwabuna!
Mwayindisia chinju chenywe ne bibiindu nibio mwanuula musiayuumba
mala mwakhaka chingoba chenywe chione khukhwama khu busiku.
Ne kakhali lirekekha lienywe liareerire chisoni mu chinju chenywe,
mukhwibwaakala chikholo mwerereere libuna mwabene.
Akhaba kamabaale ke kamasiisi keloocha sikila enywe,
ne kimitalaachi kiosi kilila.
Enywe mwabuna!
Mwarakikha lukoba bubi mala mwalwombakhila khu sifuki.
Chikholo nicho mwaula chakhola kia busa,
ne bioosi nibio bakhola biakwa likokhe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye okholile kano.
nga kameechi ne kechula mu nyanja.
Ali ne silaamo oyo ookhola owasie ameele!
Oora bufwisi mu ndali yabwe,
nio ababone ne bekhaale sichula.
Ne mweesi mukhaambwe chisoni nga beele ne munyoola efuma.
Enywe mwabene mukhanywe mala mutalitaale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhamunywesie sikoombe sie siiukuumo,
ne efuma yenywe ekhekhole chisoni.
Enywe mwarema kumusiru kwa Lebanoni,
ne luno enywe mularemwa,
mweera chisaang'i chakwo
ne luno chisaang'i chilamuriisia.
Kano kakhekholekhe sikila sifuki nisio mwachukha
ne sisiayuumba nisio mwakholela babaandu ne chingoba
Sifwaani sili na bukhala siina?
Sili busa sisiindu nisio omundu akholile,
ne se sikhuboolela sisiindu tawe ne kakhali bubeeyi.
Sili nabukhala siina khu wasikhola nio asisuubilemo,
wele khakhalomaloma tawe!
Enywe mwabuna!
Muboolela sipichu sie kumurongooro muli, “Siisimukha!”
Namwe khu libaale muli, “Yinyokha!”
Sifwaani sinyala siakhuboolelakho siindu ku?
Banyala basisaa ne fwesa ne sahabu ne kakhali se sili ne bulamu tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali mu Lukaangu lwewe lutakatifu,
lekha buli mundu asile busa khu sibala niye ali.

Lisaba lio mung'oosi Habakuku.
Ee Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, nauliile efuma yowo mala nariire.
Nono khola orio lundi mu biise biefwe
bikholwa bikali nibio wakholanga,
akhaba noli ne lirima ba ne siisa.
Wele alikho akobola lundi khukhwama Edomu,
Wele omutakatifu alikho echa khukhwama khu bikulu bia Parani
luyali lwewe lwechuule likulu,
ne sibala siechuule efuma yewe.
Buwaanga bwewe buli nga bwe nyanga,
buwaanga bukhosia khukhwama mukhono mwewe,
mu bwene omwo nimwo bunyali bwewe buli.
Arangisia bulwaale,
ne alaka lifwa khumuloondakho.
Ne eema sibala siterema,
ne alola chikholo chiterema.
Nio chingulu cha mindali chibulungukha ne bikulu bia buli lwoosi biesikha,
bikulu nibio akeendangakho khale.
Nabona babaandu ba Kushi ne baria,
ne babaandu ba Midiani baterema.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, chaba chinjichi chichakhuambia lirima?
Yaba enyanja niyo eyakhukhalasia?
Ewe wakeendela khu mafuumbi,
lifuumbi lie mbembeesi liaba likaari liowo nga wareerera babaandu bowo bukhili.
Werekekha khurumikhira luyingo,
werekekha khulasa buembo bwowo.
Waarurura sibala mala chinjichi chatubukhamo.
Chingulu nga chakhubona chaterema,
kameechi kachichukha khukhwama mungaaki,
kameechi ke mu nyanja kaoloola,
mala bibuli biako bianiina angaaki.
Khulwe khumeniuukha khwe buembo bwowo bubweyuula,
ne khu melamela khwe lifumo liowo,
enyanga ne kumwesi biema.
Ewe wakeenda mu sibala mu lirima,
mala waswalakilila Be Chikholo mu bukhalafu.
Ewe wacha enje khuonia babaandu bowo,
khuonia omwami wowo omurobore.
Ewe wera omwimeelesi owe bamayaanu
ne khubunisilia elala baloondi bewe.
Buembo bwowo bwalasa omwimeelesi wewe owe banamae
nga becha oli sisifuusia, khu khusalanisia efwe,
nga basangaala oli abo bapaapia bataambi sibi mu bwikisi.
Ewe wakeenda khu nyanja ne chifarasi chowo,
wabira mu lusiba lukhulukukha.
Mbulila kano koosi mala nderema,
kiminwa kiase kiterema ne buuri.
Ese mbikila,
ne bikele biase bituya.
Ndasila busa mala ndinde siise siole
nisio Wele alieleseliamo kumunaanio abo bakhwibwaakala efwe.
Kumutuli kwakhalekha khurakho chinduli
namwe kumusabibu kwakhalekha khurakho chisabibu
kimiseituni kiakhatambao
ne kimikuunda kiakhatambamo bibiaamo,
mala bibiaayo ne chikhaafu biakhatamba mu mataala,
ese ndachiililila khusangaala ne khukhwekhoya,
sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali omuonia wase.
akholanga ngenda bulayi nga ekhisi,
mala anindanga akhaba khu bikulu.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Nja khubunia buli siindu khu sibala.
Ndabunia babaandu boosi, ne chisaang'i,
chinyuni ne ching'eeni.
Ndarusiao bamayaanu.
Ndeera babaandu boosi khu sibala,
ne se aliio olarama tawe.
“Ndaukuuma babaandu ba Yuda
alala ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu boosi.
Ndeera babaandu babarama basaayanga Baali,
ne se aliio okhakhebulile basaayi bakhamanyile wele nibo basaayanga tawe.
Khabunie yesi yesi oniinanga khu nju
ne khusaaya enyanga, kumwesi ne ching'enieesi
lundi khabunie abo basayaanga ne khukhwechuba mu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
mala lundi benamila ne khusaaya wele Moleki.
Ndabunia abo babakaluukhana balekha khu khunoonda ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
abo bakheecha niio ndi namwe beenya bukeleki bwase tawe.”
Endaalo eli siimbi niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi acha khukholelamo bukhalaki,
khwako sila busa ebweeni wo Mwami WELE,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho arekekha khu siinja babaandu bewe nga bibiaayo bie embosio
ne aalangile basiku ba Yuda khukhwicha bayaaye.
Ne khu ndaalo eye siiukuumo sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndiukuuma babemeelesi ne babaana be babaami
ne naabo boosi baloonda kimiima kie chikholo chichiindi.
Ndiukuuma abo boosi basaaya bulayi bwene nga babaandu bakhamanyile Wele tawe,
babeeba ne khukhwira nio bechusie enju yo mwami wabwe ne bibiindu bie bunuuli.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Khu ndaalo eyo,
mukhaulile biililo mu Silibwa silaangwa sie Ching'eeni, mu Yerusalemu
mukhaulile liliesasaara elubeka luuya lwe lukoba
ne kumuulo kumuboofu mu ngulu.
Yesasaara mala mulile ne muulila kano
enywe mumenyile emwaalo we lukoba
sikila babofuli bakhabe bafwiile boosi.
Siise esio ndibukula etaa mala khosie mu Yerusalemu.
Khaukuume babaandu baali nabio lundi babanyalikha,
baloma bali,
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi salakholakho bulayi
namwe bubi tawe.’
Kimiaandu kiabwe kilinuulwa
ne chinju chabwe chilianjukhwa
bakhaba ne bombakha chinju
se balichimenyamo tawe
bakhaba ne babiaala kimisabibu
se balinywa endali yakio tawe.”
Endaalo emboofu eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi eli siimbi
eli siimbi mala elikho yiicha khangu!
Endaalo eyo ekhabe eye lilieunamila
endaalo ng'eneyo akhaba banamae banyindaafu balifwa kimiooyo mala balile lukali.
Eliba endaalo eye lirima,
endaalo eye butinyu ne buchuuni,
endaalo eye libuna ne lilionaka,
endaalo eye sisiilima ne khufuumba,
endaalo eye kamafuumbi ne sisiilima sikali,
endaalo eye khukhupa ekhoombi eye liie
khu ngoba chisire
ne khu ndeleelwa chindeeyi.
Ndireera butinyu khu baandu
mala balikeenda nga babofu
sikila bakholeele ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bubwoni,
sifuki siabwe sikhachukhwe asi nga kameechi,
ne kimibili kiabwe kikhabolele asi.
Efwesa yabwe ne sahabu
se bikhabasikule khu ndaalo eye lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Sibala sioosi sikhabunisibwe ne kumulilo kwe lirima liewe,
alirao sisiakamo sia khangu
khu bamenywa boosi be mu sibala.

Enywe ekholo ekhali ne chisoni tawe,
khe mwebuusie alala,
ne mu siili khuuchwa nga likhuuchi tawe,
lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne lisiili khumwichakho tawe,
endaalo eye lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne khamwichakho tawe.
Enywe mweesi be lilieboombia mu sibala yiima Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
enywe mu mwaria kamalaka kewe,
Yiima buluungi,
yiima lilieboombia,
nio wakana munyala mwebacha,
endaalo eye lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Ashikeloni lulanjukhwa.
Babaandu ba Ashitoti balirusibwamo mwiangilwe
ne babaandu ba Ekironi balirusibwa mu lukoba lwabwe.
Bafilisiti enywe mwabunile!
Enywe babaandu mu menyile embi ne nyanja,
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amalile khumukhalakila,
alamubunia ne se aliio na mulala khwinywe olarama tawe.
Kamaloba kenywe kakalaanda khu nyanja kalaba kamayilwe,
ne kakhabemo bisali bie babaayi
ne biko bie kamakheese.
Babaandu ba Yuda baaliba balamu
bakhamenye mu sibala sienywe
bakhasikhole kamayilwe
ne balikonaanga mu chinju cha Ashikeloni.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe aliba nabo
mala abakoboselie lundi kimiaandu kiabwe.
“Nauliile babaandu ba Moabu ne Amoni ne bakhoma ne khuchekheelela babaandu base.
Belola bali balabukula kamaloba kabwe.
Wele owa Isiraeli,
nechuba ndi Moabu ne Amoni balikho bacha khubunisibwa
nga Sodomu ne Komora.
Bilakwa chumbe ne khuba abuundu we libuna lia mindali, enyoonyi elikhulamo.
Babaandu base balirama balinuula abo bibiindu ne khubukula kamaloba kabwe.”
Babaandu ba Moabu ne Amoni baliuukuumwa,
mu ngila yino sikila khukhwelola
ne khukhweniinia khwabwe,
ne khukhoma babaandu ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabateremie
alimalao bawele boosi be sibala,
ne buli ekholo elimusaaya niye
buli kholo abuundu wayo.
mulibunisibwa ne Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
khukhwonaka sibala sia Ashuru
ne alikhola lukoba lwa Ninefe lwanjukhwe
lutambemo kameechi nga sisiangalaamwe.
Aliba abuundu niio bibiaayo ne kamatuuli bimenya
ne chisaang'i cha buli lukano chilikonamo.
Ne chisikhiikhi chilibamo ne khusikhiikhila munuma chalwo
khooro kiliaanila amuliango.
Kimitarakwa nikio bombakhila se kilibao tawe.
Ako niko kakhekholekhe khu lukoba
lulwebonia sikila kamaani kalwo
mala lwakanakana luli, luli bulayi.
Babaandu balwo bakanakana bali lukoba lwabwe nilwo luboofu khukhila chingoba chichiindi choosi mu sibala.
Lukhanjukhwe lukali lube abuundu niio chisaang'i che mundaa chimenya. Buli obirao aliesiindukha.

Yerusalemu lukoba lubi, lwe sileka
lulupianga babaandu balwo siibi lwabunile.
Se lwarekeeresie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
namwe lwafukiilila likololosia liewe tawe.
Se lwasuubiile Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
namwe lwenya buyeeti khukhwama khu niye tawe.
Babemeelesi balwo bali nga chitalang'i chiulukhuma,
bakhalaki balwo bali nga bisuuche bie njala
bilia nandakhaola siilo sioosi.
Bang'oosi balwo se bali ne limanya tawe
lundi bachamani,
basaayi bafwolobia biili bitakatifu
mala bakoyania kamalaka ka Wele
khunyoola bukhala.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Wele walwo ali omuluungi,
sakholanga bubi tawe
buli kumutikhinyi ekesianga bung'ali bwewe,
buli mabwibwi se akhilwanga tawe,
ne kakhali bakhali bang'ali se baambwa chisoni tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Nabuniisie chikholo choosi,
nonakaake chingoba chabwe
ne khukhola kamasiisi ne chindeleelwa chabwe khuba kamakuunda
chingoba chabwe chanjukhwe,
se aliio omenyilemo tawe.
Ne khungila chabwe se aliio okeendakho tawe
Nebaasia ndi babaandu base balaba ne buuri khwise,
mala balafukiilila likololosia liase,
mala balekhe khukhwibilila niko bekesia tawe.
Ne kakhali enyuma we siise sitiiti siri bachiililila
khukhola bubwoni bukali.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Khwako ninde,
khu ndaalo niyo ndirusiria buloli.
Sikila libisia liase lili khubuusia chikholo ne bubwami,
khubaweseliakho lirima liase lioosi,
sibala sioosi silibuna khulwe lirima liase likali.
Nio khakaluukhasie babaandu Be Chikholo,
mala bakhasabe ese seng'ene
ne se bakhasabekho bawele babaandi tawe.
Boosi bakhafukiilile kakaase.
Akhaba khukhwama engelekha we chinjichi cha Esopia,
babaandu base babasalanila balinderera biianwa biabwe.
“Enywe baandu base, siise esio,
se muliambwa chisoni sikila mwakholela sileka tawe,
kharusieo buli mundu owebonia ne khukhweniinia,
ne lundi se mulikholela sileka
khu sikulu siase sitakatifu tawe.
Khalekhe mu lukoba lwase babeboombia lukali,
bakheeche buyeeti khwise.
se balikhola bubi khu mundu yesi yesi tawe
lundi se baliloma bubeeyi,
namwe bubeeyi se bulibakho khu nimi chabwe tawe.
Bakhabe nga kamakheese kakhaaye mu muleembe,
se aliio olibariikhirisia tawe.”
Baandu ba Isiraeli yiimba ne khukhwekhoya lukali,
yekhoya ne kimwoyo kienywe kioosi
baandu ba Yerusalemu.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekhile khumuukuuma enywe
arusiisieo basiku benywe boosi
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, omwami owa Isiraeli ali ne nanywe
se siliio sibariikhirisia luno tawe.
Siise silikho siicha nisio baliloma khu baandu ba Yerusalemu bali,
“Lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, okharia tawe
namwe okhaluwa tawe.
