Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe ali nanywe,
kamaani kewe kamua bukhili.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alamusangaalila enywe,
mu busiime bwewe, alamuelesia enywe bulamu buyia,
bakhembe ne khukhwekhoya sikila enywe,
nga babaandu baali mu naikara ne bekhoya.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
‘Nalekhile khumuriikhirisia ndi mulabuna ne khurusiao chisoni chenywe.’
Siise silikho siicha
nisio khaukuume abo boosi bamukuluumia enywe
khasikule baleme boosi
ne khukobosia engo be mu mbaambe.
Ndikaluukhasia chisoni chabwe chibe efuma,
ne babaandu be sibala boosi bakhabafumie.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Siise silikho siicha,
nisio ndikoboseliamo babaandu benywe be mu mbaambe engo
ndimukhola mumanyikhe mu sibala sioosi
mala mukhole mube baiinda lundi nga mwaba.”

Omwami Owe Banamae aboolela Hagai ali, “Babaandu bano baloma bali, sino se sili siise silayi sie khukhwombakha lundi Lukaangu tawe.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma omung'oosi Hagai aboolele babaandu ali,
“Baandu base, siina sikila enywe ne mumenya munju chichombakhwa bulayi ne Lukaangu lwase lwekelile likuunda?”
Khwako Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Kanakana limenya lienywe.
Mwabiaala biakhulia bikali, mala mwakesa bitiiti busa. Mulia ne se mwikura tawe. Munywa endali ne kakhali se liio engali emumeesia tawe. Mwifwara ne kakhali se munyoola luluuya tawe. Okhola kimilimo akhola kia busa.
Khwako kanakana limenya lienywe.
Cha mu ngulu mukeye kimirongooro mala mwombakhe lundi Lukaangu. Ndalusangaalila nio nekesie luyali lwase.
“Mweyikina khukesa bikali, ne kakhali mwakesa bitiiti busa. Ne nga mwareera engo, nabitamuusia. Sikila siina ne nakhola ndio? Sikila Lukaangu lwase lwekhola likuunda mala buli mundu khwinywe alikho akhaka kamaani khukhwombakha enju yewe omwene.
Khwako efula yalekhile khukwa ne kamaloba kabeele sitalalie.
Nareera siimiyu khu sibala. Khu ngulu, mu mikuunda, mu maruuti ke kimisabibu, khu miseituni ne khu bimelwa bioosi. Ne, khu baandu, khu saang'i ne khu buli siindu nisio mukhaka khubiaala.”
Nio Serubabeli okhwa Shealitieli ne Yoshua okhwa Yehosataki Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, ne babaandu babasikala boosi
Nio Hagai aboolela babaandu burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, “Ndaba nanywe, lino lili lisuubisia liase.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi atinyilisia buli mundu khukhwombakha Lukaangu. Atinyilisia Serubabeli, omuruki owa Yuda, Yoshua Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali alala ne babaandu babakobola khukhwama mu mbaambe boosi. Nio babaandu bano boosi barakikha khukhwombakha Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe.
Yino yaba endaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chine eye kumwesi kwa sita, mu mwiiko kwa khabili kwe bubwami bwa Dario.

Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na ndala eye kumwesi kwa saba mu mwiiko okwo, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela omung'oosi Hagai ali,
“Luno boolela Serubabeli omuruki owa Yuda okhwa Shealitieli, Yoshua Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ne babaandu babaandi oli,
‘Alikhoo mwinywe onyala akhebulila bulayi bwe Lukaangu luno nga lwaba ku? Luno lubonekha lurie ebweeni wenywe? Mukhoya mulubone oli lukhali siindu tawe.
Ne kakhali mukhafwa kimiooyo tawe. Khola kimilimo sikila ese ndi nanywe.
Nga mwama e Misiri nabasuubisia ndi ndiba nanywe buli lwoosi. Ese siili busa nanywe, khwako mukharia tawe.’
Ndaula chikholo choosi mala kimiaandu kiacho kioosi kireerwe. Nio Lukaangu lwichusibwemo buiinda.
Efwesa ne esahabu eye sibala bili bibiase.
Lukaangu luuya lulaba lulayi khukhila lukhale. Ne ndielesia babaandu base buiinda ne kumuleembe.’ ”
Khu ndaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chine kumwesi kwa tisa kwe kumwiiko kwe khabili nikwo Dario aba omwami, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela omung'oosi Hagai lundi ali,
“Reeba basaayi bukhalaki bwabwe khwikhuwa lino.
Kaaba bali omundu abukula sitonyi sie nyama sitakaasiibwe, mala asisutila mu ngubo yewe, ne alekha engubo yewe eyo yetiila khu siakhulia siosi siosi akhaba siteekhe, endali, kamafura, namwe biakhulia bie lukano lwosi lwosi. Engubo eyo enyala khukhola biakhulia ebio bioosi biaba bitakaasiibwe ku?”
Nio nga areeba ario, basaayi bamukobosia bali, “Se kanyalikhana tawe.”
Nio basaayi bakobosia bali, “Ee, silaba sinyaalu.”
Nio Hagai aloma ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, akhaba babaandu be ekholo yino bosi bali bario. Nono buli siindu nisio bakhola nende nisio baana khu alutare sili sinyaalu.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Nono bona kamakhuwa kacha khwekholekha. Ne mukharakikha khukhwombakha lundi Lukaangu tawe,
mwaba murie? Beele ne mucha khu fuuti eye kamaindi, niyo mukhoyele munyoolemo chikiilo chimia chibili, mwanyoolamo emia ndala yong'ene. Yaaba ne musuura endali niyo mwenyekha munyoolemo chilita emia ndala mwanyoolamo kamakhumi kane kong'ene.
Nabareerera ekhuungu, ne kamaarara khukhwonakaka buli siindu nisio mwakhaka khubiaala, ne kakhaba kario se mwekanila tawe.
Luno endaalo ekhola kamakhumi kabili na chine kumwesi kwa tisa, endaalo niyo kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu kumaliilwe khukhwombakha. Nono liinda mubone siicha khwekholekha khukhwama luno.
Akhaba siakhulia ne siweele, mala kimisabibu, kimituli, kimikomanga ne kimiseituni ne kikhaanakho kamatuunda tawe, ese khukhwama luno ndamubiita enywe chikhabi.”
Khu ndaalo ng'ene eyo, kumwesi okwo ne kuli kamakhumi kabili na chine, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Hagai burume bwe khabili,
khu Serubabeli, omuruki owa Yuda ali, “Ese ndi siimbi khuteremia likulu ne liloba,
khukhwakamia bubwami ne bunyali bwabwo. Ndaula kamakaari ke liie ne nabo bakatimia. Chifarasi chilifwa, ne babaandu bachitimia baliirana babeene khu beene.
Endaalo ng'ene eyo ndikhubukula ewe, Serubabeli omukholi wase, ne ndikhurobora ewe wamiie mu lisina liase. Ewe niye ndoboore.” Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owe bunyali bwoosi alomile.

Omwami Owe Banamae aboolela Sakaria khuboolela babaandu ali, “Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, naambila bakuuka benywe lirima.
Ne kakhali luno ndoma ndi, ‘Ngobolele ne ese ndamukobolela.
Mukhaba nga bakuuka benywe nibo bang'oosi baboolela burume bwase khaale akho, khubakaania balekhe chingila chabwe che bubwoni ne bikholwa biabwe biibi ne kakhali se baulila namwe baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi tawe.
Bakuuka benywe abo luno bali waena? Ne bang'oosi babwe chana baliio ku?
Naelesia bakuuka benywe kamalaka ne bukambisi bwase khubirira mu bakholi base bang'oosi, ne kakhali balekelesia mala banyoola butinyu. Nio bekanila mala bafukiilila bali ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owabaelesia siiukuumo nga baba ne benyekha lundi nga naba ne mbisiisie khukhola.’ ”
Mu mwiiko kwa khabili nikwo Dario abela omwami, endaalo eye kamakhumi kabili na chine eye kumwesi kwe khumi na mulala (okwo nikwo kumwesi kwa Sebati), mu silo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Sakaria burume mu malola.
Nio Sakaria aloma ali, “Mu silo mboone omundu natimia efarasi embesemu! Abeele emile mu mirongooro mwitooma, chifarasi chichiindi chibeele enyuma wewe chimbesemu, chingokhakokhe ne chiwaanga.”
Nio namureeba ndi, “Omwami, sifuno sie chifarasi chino sili siina?”
Angobosia ali, “Ndakhwekesia sifuno siacho.
‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi achirumire khucha khulambuula sibala.’ ”
Chifarasi chaboolela malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chili, “Khwalambuulile sibala mala khwaboone khuli sibala sioosi sili ne kumuleembe.”
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, “Ee Omwami Owe Banamae olalekha khuba ne siisa khu Yerusalemu ne chingoba cha Yuda khukhwola siise siina? Ewe wababiyiile khu miiko kamakhumi saba.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu likobosia aboolela malaika kamakhuwa ke khuoleelesia.
Nio malaika amboolela ali, “Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, ‘Boola. Ndi ne busiime bukali khu Yerusalemu, lukoba lwase lutakatifu.
Ne ese nakhalaliile babaandu Be Chikholo chichiindi bamenyile bulayi mu muleembe. Nga naba ne sikhiindia lirima liase khu baandu base, chikholo chana chatasa butinyu khu baandu base.’
Khwako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Nakoboole mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu khulukholela siisa. Enju yase elombakhwamo lundi. Ne Yerusalemu lukhapiimwe ne fuuti.’ ”
Malaika amboolela khuloma lundi ndi, “Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, chingoba chewe chilaindiaala lundi mala alayeeta Yerusalemu lundi alurobore nga lulwewe.”
Mumalola kakaandi nabona chinjika chine che chieeyi.
Nio nareeba malaika owaba naloma nase ndi, “Chinjika chino chili na sifuno siina?”
Angobosia ali, “Chiimeelela chikholo che kamaani mu sibala chisalanisie babaandu ba Yuda, Isiraeli ne Yerusalemu.”
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anjekesia bakholi batiilile chinyundo bane.
Nareeba ndi, “Babaandu bano bechile khukhola siina?” Angobosia ali, “Bechile khuriikhirisia ne khukwisia Be Chikholo babonakakila elala sibala sia Yuda ne khusalanisia babaandu basio.”

Mu malola kakaandi nabona Omundu nali ne fuuti mukhono mwewe.
Namureeba ndi, “Olikho ocha waena?”
Angobosia ali, “Khupiima Yerusalemu, nenya manye luli buleeyi ne bubalaayi balwo.”
Nio nabona malaika owaba ne alomaloome nase echa mala malaika okundi echa khukhwakaanana naye.
Malaika omutaayi aboolela okundi ali, “Tima oche oboolele omusoleeli ooli ne fuuti oyo kano: Yerusalemu lulaba lukoba luukhali ne kamasiisi tawe. Bibaywa ne babaandu bakali balichulamo mala baake.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asuubisie ali omwene alaba lisiisi lie kumulilo khufuusia lukoba ne khu lukhiinga, mala amenyemo mu luyali lwewe lwoosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela babaandu bewe ali, “Yilukhila ebunaswa sikila namusalaniisie mu mbeka choosi nga ekhuungu eyichilanga chimbeka chine.
Enywe mu mwacha Babiloni yilukhila Yerusalemu.”
Omwami Owe Banamae anduma ese ne burume buno khu kholo chichayaaya babaandu bewe, “Oyo otiila khwinywe aba atiilile khu ndolelo yase.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi omwene alapana nanywe ne babaandu ba baaba bakholi benywe bakhamunuule bibiindu bienywe.”
Nga bino ne bilikholekha, buli mulala alamanya ali Omwami Owe Banamae niye owanduma.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Baandu ba Yerusalemu, yimba ne khukhwekhoya sikila ndikho nicha khu menya mwinywe.”
Mu siise siene esio chikholo chingali chiliicha khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mala babe babaandu bewe. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali menya akari wenywe, mala enywe mulimanya muli Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi anduma ese khwinywe.
Babaandu ba Yuda baliba barobore ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi mu maloba kamatakatifu. Ne Yerusalemu luliba lukoba nilwo asiima lukali po.
Enywe mweesi sila busa ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, sikila alikho echa khukhwama abumenyo bwewe atakatifu.

Nio Malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Sietani ali, “Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya akhwikiiche ewe Sietani! Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi owasiima Yerusalemu, akhoya akhwikiiche! Omundu yuno ali nga lukhu nilwo bayuula khukhwama mu mulilo.”
Yoshua aba emile ebweeni wa malaika afwarire chingubo chinjaafu.
Malaika aboolela bakholi bewe be mwikulu ali, “Mufuule chingubo chinjaafu nicho afwarire.” Nio malaika aboolela Yoshua ali, “Lola nakhurusiisiekho bubwoni bwowo mala ndakhufwara chingubo chimbia.”
Nio malaika arusia lilaka bakholi bewe bafware Yoshua sileemba similiiu khu murwe kwewe. Bakhola bario, mala lundi bamufwara chingubo chimbia malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne emileo.
Nio malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Yoshua ali
Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Waaba ne oria kamalaka kase ne khukhola kimilimo nikio khuelesie, aba olachiililila khuliinda Lukaangu lwase ne luuya lwalwo, lundi ndaulila kamasaba kowo, bulayi bwene nga ne mbulilanga kamasaba ke bamalaika bali ebweeni wase.
Yoshua, ewe ooli Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, ne basaayi basio rekeeresia, sikila enywe muli silolelo silayi sie chindaalo chichiicha. Ndekesia omukholi wase, olaangwa bali Lusakia.
Ndikho nda ebweeni wa Yoshua libaale lilala liong'ene lie chimbeka saba. Ndabechakho kamaandike, mala khu ndaalo ndala yong'ene ndarusiao bubwoni bwe sibala sino.
Endaalo eyo ne yola buli mulala khwinywe alilanga owasie khukhwicha asangaalile kumuleembe ne buliindi. Ne buli mulala aliba akari we biluundu biewe bie kimisabibu ne kimituli.”

Malaika owaba ne alomaloome nase echa ne khu khusiisimusia oli beele ne ndikho ngona.
Andeeba ali, “Waboone siina?” Nakobosia ndi, “Naboone siteetwe sie tala sisiakholwa khukhwama khu sahabu.” Sibuumba sie kamafura siaba khu ngaaki khwasio. Khu siteetwe chilikho chitaa saba, buli ndala ne kumunwa kwe lutaambi, kioosi alala saba.
Kiliio kimirongooro kibili kia miseituni siimbi ne siteetwe, mulala kumukhono kumuseecha ne kukuundi kumukhono kumukhasi.
Nio nareeba malaika oyo ndi, “Sifuno sie bibiindu bino bioosi sili siina?”
Malaika angobosia ali, “Se omanyile tawe?” Nio ese namukobosia ndi, “Tawe Omwami.”
Malaika amboolela ali, “Chitaa saba chili chimoni saba cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi chibona buli abuundu mu sibala.”
Ne chisakia cha miseituni chibili chili mu mbafu mwe chikhoombi che sahabu nicho kamafura ka miseituni karuriramo chili na sifuno siina?”
Andeeba ali, “Se omanyile tawe?”
Namukobosia ndi, “Tawe, Omwami.” Se manyile tawe.
Nio aloma ali, “Babaandu babili bano bali nibo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi we sibala sioosi arobore ne khubachukhakho kamafura bamukholele.”
Bikhiingililo biboofu nga bikulu bilarura ebweeni wowo. Olombakha lundi Lukaangu, ne nga nora libaale limaliilisi abuundu walio, babaandu baliyokela ne baloma bali, ‘Kumwalaalo, kumwalaalo kubibekho!’ ”
Burume bubuundi bwanjichakho khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Aloma ali, “Serubabeli emekhe kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu luno mala alamala khulwombakha. Nga kano ne kekholekha, babaandu base balamanya bali ese niye owakhuruma ewe khu nibo.
Baabone bubi sikila se babone kimilimo kimikali tawe. Ne kakhali balabona Serubabeli nachiililila khukhwombakha Lukaangu mala balasangaala.”

Nalola lundi, mala luno nabona sitabu sipurukhila mu ngaaki.
Malaika andeeba ali, “Waboone siina?” Nakobosia ndi, “Naboone sitabu silikho sipurukha. Sili buleeyi chimita tisa ne bukhiikha chimita chine ne nusu.”
Nio Malaika amboolela ali, “Mu sitabu sino siaandikwamo silaamo sisicha khu sibala sioosi. Lubeka lulala lwekesia luli oyo owiiba alarusibwa khu sibala, ne lubeka luluundi luli oyo oboola bubeeyi mu khwichuba yesi alarusibwao.
Omwami Owe Banamae aboola ali acha khuruma silaamo sino mala sikhache munju mwa buli mwifwi ne munju mwa buli oboola bubeeyi mu khwechuba. Silaamo sino silarama mu chinju chabwe ne khubabunia.”
Nio Malaika niye nalomalomanga naye echa mala amboolela ali, “Lola! Sisiindu sisiindi silikho siicha!”
Nareeba ndi, “Siina nisio?”
Malaika angobosia ali, “Sino sili sikono nisio mala siekesia bubwoni bwe sibala sioosi.”
Sikono siaba ne sifunikho sisiakholwa khukhwama khu sibia. Nga naloleelela sifunikho siafuunulwa, ne omukhasi aba ekhaale mu sikono.
Malaika aloma ali, “Omukhasi yuno emeelela bumayaanu.” Nio Malaika amuminila mu sikono ne khu mufunikhilamo.
Nio nakalama mu ngaaki mala nabona bakhasi babili ne bapurukha ne becha niio ndi ne chindaa che kamaani nga cha namukhooli. Babukula sikono mala bapurukha nasio.
Nio nareeba malaika ndi, “Balikho basiyila waena?”
Malaika akobosia ali, “Basiyila Babiloni, niyo balasiombakhila lukaangu. Nga lukaangu ne lukhawe, bakhasireemo khusisaaya.”

Naba ne kamalola kakaandi. Mu siise sino nabona kamakaari ke liie kane ne kecha khukhwama akari we bikulu bibili bie kimikasa.
Likaari lie khunyoa liakhwesibwa ne chifarasi chimbesemu, lia khabili liakhwesibwa ne chimali,
ne lia khataru ne chifarasi chiwaanga ne lia khane ne chifarasi che kamapala.
Nio nareeba malaika ndi, “Omwami, kamakaari kano kekesia siina?”
Likaari liliakhwesibwa ne chifarasi chimali yaba lilikho licha ebunaswa e Babiloni, ne lie chiwaanga yaba lilikho licha mumbo, ne lie chifarasi che kamapala yaba licha ebunafubo.
Nga chifarasi che kamapala ne charura chenya chiche khangu khulambuula sibala. Malaika aloma ali, “Cha mulambuule sibala!” Mala chaacha.
Nio malaika amboolela ali, “Chifarasi chichacha ebunaswa e Babiloni chaosiisie lirima lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ambelesia burume buno,
aloma ali, “Bukula biianwa bibiaanwa ne Helitai, Tobiya ne Yetaya ba baaba mu mbaambe, mala muche khangu mungo mwa Yoshua okhwa Sefania. Babaandu bano boosi bakoboole khukhwama mu mbaambe e Babiloni.
Khola ekuutwa khukhwama khu sahabu ne fwesa niyo baanile, mukhole ekuutwa mala mufware Yoshua Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, okhwa Yehosataki.
Muboolele muli Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, ‘Omundu olaangwa bali Lusakia alarubura niio ali mala ombakhe lundi Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Niye oliombakha lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala anyoole luyali nga omwami, mala aliamiia babaandu bewe. Omusaayi alimuyeeta mu bwami bwewe mala boombi baliba ne kumuleembe ne liiuliilisiana.’
Ne ekuutwa elaba mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nga likhebusia khu Helitai, Tobiya, Yetaya ne Yosia.”
Babaandu bamenyile aleeyi baliicha bayeete khukhwombakha lundi Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne kano ne kekholekha, mulimanya muli Omwami Owe Banamae anduma ese khwinywe. Bino bioosi biliekholekha mwaba ne muria endakaano eya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe mu bwichufu.

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aruma Sakaria ne burume buno mu mwiiko kwa khane kwe khukhwamiia khwo omwami Dario, khu ndaalo eya khane eye kumwesi kwa tisa (okwo nikwo kumwesi nikwo balanga bali Kisilefu).
Babaandu ba Beteli baba barumire Saresa ne Rekemeleki ne babaandu babwe khucha mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khusaba chikhabi khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi
lundi ne khureeba basaayi ne bang'oosi bali, “Eku efwe khukhoya khuchiililile khulila sikila lilionakwa lie Lukaangu ne khukhweyimana kumwesi kwa kharaano nga ne khwakholilenge khulwe kimiiko kimikali kibirire ku?”
Buno nibwo burume nibwo nanyoola khukhwama khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi,
amboolela ali, “Boolela babaandu be sibala boosi ne basaayi oli, nga ne mweyimana ne mulila buli mwesi kwa kharaano ne kwa saba mu miiko kamakhumi saba kino, mweyimana sikila ese ku?
Ne nga mulichanga ne khunywa, se mukholanga murio khulwe lilienya lienywe mwabeene tawe ku?”
Nga babaandu bamenya mu Yerusalemu ne mu birekere biili siimbi nalwo ebunaswa ne mu maayo mu buiinda, kano se kali kamakhuwa niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe be khunyoa tawe ku?
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela Sakaria ali,
“Khola bukhalaki bwa ng'ali, ‘Khola bulayi mala buli mulala akholele owasie siisa.
Mukhapia siibi banamulekhwa, bafuubi, ne baakwa namwe babanani tawe. Ne mukhebaasilia basienywe kamabi tawe.’
“Ne kakhali babaandu base baloba khurekeeresia, bakhola sileka, bekasia kamaru kabwe nio balekhe khuulila.
Balumia kimiooyo kiabwe nga libaale. Sikila se baulila kamekisio niko nabaelesia khubirira mu bang'oosi ba babao tawe naambwa lirima likali.
Sikila naloma ne se baulila tawe khwako bosi basaba ne se nabakobosia tawe.
Nga sisifuusia nabasalanisia bamenye mu bibala bikeni. Kamaloba kamalayi kano karama busa.”

Omwami Owe Banamae aboolela Sakaria ali,
“Nekoomba njeete Yerusalemu sikila busiime bwase bukali khu baandu balwo, busiime bwakilile nakhalaliile basiku balwo.
Ndikobola mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu, lukoba lwase lutakatifu ndumenyemo. Yerusalemu lulilaangwa lukoba lusuubilwa ne sikulu sia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi Omunyali Owa Bioosi sililaangwa sikulu sitakatifu.
Basaakhulu ne baloosi, bakofu lukali, babetiila khu siimbo balikhala khu ngila che lukoba lwa Yerusalemu.
Basoleeli ne bakhaana balaba bakali ne benyayila khu ngila echo.
“Wakana lino lilalolekhana nga likhanyalikhana tawe khu kholo chicharama, ne kakhali khwise linyalikhana.
Ndareesia babaandu base khukhwama mu bibala nibio bayilwamo.
Ndabakobosia khukhwama ebukwe ne mumbo beche bamenye Yerusalemu. Balaba babaandu base, ne ese ndaba Wele wabwe, mbamiie mu busuubilifu ne bung'ali.
“Nyindaalila! Luno mulikho muulila kamakhuwa niko bang'oosi balomaloma mu siise nisio kumusiingi kwe Lukaangu kwaba ne kulikho kwombakhwa.
Biise ebio ne bikhoola tawe, kimilimo kie kumuruungo se kiabao khu mundu namwe khu saang'i tawe, ne kumuleembe se kwabao khukhwama khu musiku tawe. Nakhola babaandu babiilana.
Ne kakhali luno se ndakhola babaandu babarama nga nakhola siise sisiabira tawe.
Babaandu babarama balibiaala biakhulia biabwe mu muleembe. Kimisabibu kiliaama kamatuunda, ne liloba lilamamo bibiaamo, ne fula eliba engali. Khabiite chikhabi chino choosi khu baandu be kholo yase babarama.
Baandu ba Yuda ne Isiraeli! Khale baakwa balaamananga ne baloma bali, ‘Silaamo sibe khwiwe nga sisiaba khu Yuda ne Isiraeli!’ Ne kakhali ndamuonia enywe, nio baakwa abo balome bali, ‘Obiitwe chikhabi nga cha Yuda ne Isiraeli!’ Khwako ba banyindaafu mukharia tawe.”
Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Nga bakuuka benywe ne ba mbambia lirima, narekekha lilionaka khu nibo ne se nakaluukhasiakho kamebaasio kase tawe, nakhola niko naba ne ndekekhe.
Ne kakhali luno ndikho nirekekha khubiita chikhabi babaandu ba Isiraeli ne Yuda. Khwako mukharia tawe.
Mukhoya mukhole bibiindu bino, boolela basienywe bung'ali, khola bukhalaki bwa ng'ali mu koti bureera kumuleembe.
Mukharekekha khukholanila kamabi tawe, namwe mukhaboola bubeeyi ne mwechuba tawe. Ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi nabiila bubeeyi, bukhalaki bukhali bwa ng'ali tawe ne sisiayuumba.”
Omwami Owe Banamae lundi aboolela Sakaria ali,
“Khukhweyimana khwe kumwesi kwa khane, kwa kharaano, kwa saba nende kwe likhumi bilaba biise bie ekhoyo ne busangaafu khu baandu ba Yuda. Mukhoya musiime bung'ali ne kumuleembe.”
Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho babaandu khukhwama mu ngoba choosi baliicha Yerusalemu.
Abo babarama mu lukoba lulala baliboolela be luluundi bali, ‘Lekha khuche khusaaye Omwami Owe Banamae mala khu musabe niye chikhabi.’
Babaandu bakali ne chikholo che kamaani chiliicha Yerusalemu khusaaya Omwami Owe Banamae ne khusaba chikhabi chewe.
Mu ndaalo ng'ene echo baakwa likhumi baliicha khu muyaudi mulala ne khumuboolela bali, ‘Lekha khuche nawe sikila khwaulila bali Wele ali nanywe.’ ”

Lukoba lwa Hamasi lulwetiila khu Hatiraki lwosi luli lulwewe. Akhaba chingoba cha Tiro ne Sidoni ne bukesi bwabwe bwe khukhola kimilimo.
Lukoba lwa Tiro lwasirwa ne kamasiisi, lwaba ne efwesa ne sahabu engali, biasala nga kumuyekhe.
Ne kakhali Omwami alibukula buli siindu nisio luli nasio, alimwaata buiinda bwalwo mu nyanja ne lukoba lulwene luliya sio.
Babaandu Be Chikholo choosi khukhwama aleeyi balimenya mu Ashitoti. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, “Ndakamia lilielola lie ba Filisiti.
Babaandu balwo se baliliakho lundi enyama elimo kamalasile tawe, namwe biakhulia bibiindi nibio bakaania tawe. Babaramamo boosi baliba balala khu baandu base, khuba nga be lisaaye lie kholo eya Yuda. Babaandu ba Ekironi balibalikha nga babaandu base, bulayi bwene nga Bayebusi.
Ndiliinda kamaloba kase banamae se balibao bakhabiremo tawe, omukuluumi oupia siibi babaandu base se alibao lundi tawe, naboone siibi nisio babaandu base bapile.”
Ee baandu ba Yerusalemu, sangaala lukali!
Lola omwami wenywe alikho echa!
Echa ne khoyo ne bukhili
ne kakhali ali ne lilieboombia mala akeendela khu punda,
khu punda eng'ana.
ne khurusia chifarasi che liie mu Yerusalemu,
buyiingo burumikhirwanga mwiie bulafunakwa
Omwami wenywe alarao kumuleembe akari we chikholo,
alamiia khukhwama khu nyanja khukhwola khu kiindi,
khukhwama khu luuchi lwa Efurati khukhwola khu siakamo sie sibala.”
“Khulwe ndakaano yase nanywe eyakholwa khubirira khu malasile ke chimbosio,
ndalekhuula babaandu benywe,
khukhwama mu mbaambe nimwo kameechi kakhali tawe.
Kobola, baambe muli luno ne lilieyikina, kobola abwilukhilo bwenywe.
Luno ndoma ndi ndamuruunga khukhwola khabili khulwe siibi nisio mwapwa.
Ndarumikhira Yuda nga buyiingo bwo musikaari
ne Isiraeli nga buembo.
Ndarumikhira babaandu ba Sayuni nga embalu,
khu khuupana ne Bakiriki.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alabonekha angaaki we babaandu bewe,
alalasa buembo bwewe nga lueni.
Omwami WELE alapa ekhoombi yewe,
mala alakeendela mu mbembeesi khukhwama ebunafubo.
Omwami Owe Banamae akhaliinde babaandu bewe,
ne balibunia basiku babwe.
Baliyokela mwiie nga bamelile
ne balichukha kamafuki ke basiku babwe,
kalichichukha nga ke embosio
kachukhilwe khu alutare khukhwama khu sipwakuli.
Endaalo eyo ne yola Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alionia babaandu bewe,
nga omwaayi aonianga lituuli liewe khukhwama khu busiku.
Baling'enang'enela mu sibala siewe
nga kamamili ke kuutwa.
Sibala esio siliba silayi lukali!
Basoleeli ne bakhana baliba ne kamaani
khulwe bukali bwe likesa ne endali embia

“Saba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi efula
mu siise sie siruumbi khu mwiiko.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye oreeranga kamafuumbi,
oelesianga babaandu efula,
ne khuelesia buli mundu bibiaamo bikali.
ne khurumikhira bifwaani.
Ne kakhali buyeeti nibwo,
banyoola buli bwe bubeeyi.
Balala benoosia kamarooro ne kakhali bamutiimia busa
mala baana buolelesi butaamba bukhala
Khwako babaandu bayiiya nga kamakheese katibile.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Lirima liase lili likali khu baayi,
mala ndaukuuma babemeelesi,
sikila ese Omwami Owe Banamae ndindanga babaandu base be nju eya Yuda
ne ndabakhola babe nga chifarasi che kamaani mwiie.
Khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda khukhabe nende:
baruki be kamaani nga libaale lie kumusiingi,
balume nga sisiindi sie liiema,
buyiingo bwe liie
ne bakomanda buli ngano.
Babaandu ba Yuda baliba ne bukhili nga banamae baula basiku babwe mwiie
balipana sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali nabo,
mala baliiula akhaba basiku be khu farasi.
“Khaelesie babaandu ba Yuda kamaani,
khasikule babaandu ba Isiraeli.
Khabakholele siisa mala mbakobosie boosi engo.
Ndiba ne siisa khu nibo ndibakobosia engo lundi.
Ne baliba nga nibo yaba ese khekaana tawe.
Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wabwe, khaulile kamasaba kabwe.
Baisiraeli baliba ne kamaani nga banamae,
bakhasangaale oli banywele endali.
Lisaaye liabwe likhakhebulile bukhili buno
mala balisangaala sikila niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholile.
“Khalaange babaandu base mala mbare alala,
khabasikule
mala batasikhe babe bakali nga baba khale.
Akhaba ne mbasalanisie mu kholo,
balikhebulila ese, bakhaba aleeyi arie,
nibo ne babaana babwe baliiona mala bakobole engo.
Khabareere engo khukhwama mu sibala sia Misiri
mala mbabuusie khukhwama mu sibala sia Ashuru
Khabareere mu maloba ka Kileati ne mu Lebanoni
khukhwola nga balichulamo.
Ne babira mu nyanja yabwe eye butinyu,
ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndirusiao bibuli
ne lusiba lwe luluuchi lwa Naili luliteenya.
Babaandu ba Ashuru babelola baliambwa chisoni
ne kamaani ke Bamisiri kaliwa.”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alomile ali, “Ndikhola babaandu base babe ne kamaani,
mala bakhasaaye ese ne khu khumbulila.”

Yikula kimiliango kiowo Lebanoni,
nio kumulilo kwosie kimirongooro kiowo kimitarakwa!
Mirongooro kia Saipurasi, lila ne khu kukuula sikila kimitarakwa kiakwile,
kimirongooro kie fuma ekio kionakwe!
Mikhoonge kia Basiani, lila ne khu kukuula,
sikila baberire kumusiru kukwasiimba!
Ulila lukukuulo lwe babaayi,
sikila efuma yabwe yachile!
Rekeeresia liiulukhuma lie chitalang'i,
sikila baberire kumusiru kuuli khu luuchi lwa Yoritani!
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wase amboolela ali, “Ba nga omwaayi we kamakheese niko benya khwiira.
Babeeneko bakeera ne se banyoola siiukuumo tawe. Bakusia chinyama ne baloma bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi afume! Khuli baiinda!’ Akhaba babaayi bako babeene se bakakholela siisa tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aaloma ali, se ndakholela lundi siisa omundu yesi yesi khu sibala tawe. Ese samwene ndara babaandu boosi mu makhono ke babaayi ne babemeelesi babwe. Babaayi ne babemeelesi balonakaka sibala ne se ndasikula omundu khukhwama mu makhono kabwe tawe.”
Khwako ese Sakaria naba omwaayi we kamakheese niko bacheusi bacha khwiira. Nabukula chisiimbo chibili, ndala nakilanga ndi “Kumwalaalo” ne ekiindi nakilanga ndi “Buambaani.” Nio narakikha khukhwaya kamakheese.
Naluiilila ne babaayi bataru babambiila mala nabeera mu mweesi mulala.
Nio naboolela kamakheese ndi, “Se ndaba omwaayi wenywe lundi tawe. Ne mufwa mufwe, ne muramire mwakherana mwirane.”
Nio nabukula esiimbo yase eyalaangwa “Kumwalaalo” nakifuna khurusiao endakaano niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhola ne babaandu Be Chikholo choosi.
Khwako endakaano yarusibwao endaalo ng'eneyo, ne abo babakulanga kamakheese ne khukusia baba bandoleelele mala bamanya bali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owaba ne alomalome khubirira mu bikholwa nibio kholile.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela ali, bire mwibiikhilo lie Lukaangu, okwo kwaba kumuruungo kwase nikwo nenyekhanga khuruungwa khulwe kimilimo mu biise ebio. Nio nabukula bitonyi kamakhumi kataru bie fwesa ebio nara mu libiikhilo lie lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Nio nafuna esiimbo yase eya khabili eyalaangwa Buambaani mala buambaani bwa Yuda ne Isiraeli bwawao.
Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi amboolela lundi ali, “Ba lundi nga omwaayi otaamba bukhala.
Narereo omwaayi khukhwaaya kamakheese kase. Omwaayi yuno se ayeeta kamakheese kacha khwirwa, namwe ayiime katibile, namwe asilikhe kaumiie, namwe alisie kamalamu tawe. Ne kakhali aliamo kamanefu, alia akhaba ne bikhakayu biako biakharurakho se abala khuba siindu tawe.
Omwaayi wase okhali ne bukhala oyo tawe, alaamwe,
owanjukha kamakheese!
Embalu ekhoya yamurema kumukhono kwewe
nende emoni yewe!
Lekha kumukhono kwewe kufwokoye,
ne emoni yewe eseecha ebofule.”

Buno nibwo burume bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi khu kholo eya Isiraeli. Ali Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owabuumba likulu, ne sibala mala aelesia omundu bulamu bumulimo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali,
“Ndikhukhola lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lube nga sikoombe sie ndali, babaandu Be Chikholo babalubotookhelela balinywamo mala bataalitaale nga bameesi. Ne nga balibwaakala Yerusalemu akhaba chingoba chichiindi cha Yuda chosi chilibwaakalwa.
Siise esio ndikhola Yerusalemu lusitoe nga libaale. Ekholo yosi yosi elikhaka khulisuta eliiumisibwa. Ne chikholo choosi che sibala chiliambaana khulwibwaakala.
Ne mu siise esio ndiriikhirisia chifarasi chabwe choosi mala bachitimia balilalukha. Ndiloleelela babaandu ba Yuda, ne kakhali ndikhola chifarasi che basiku babwe chibofule.
Nio be kholo eya Yuda balibolana babene bali, ‘Omwami Owe Banamae aelesianga kamaani babaandu bewe bamenyile Yerusalemu.’
“Siise esio ndikhola chikholo cha Yuda chibe nga kumulilo mu musiru, namwe nga bumemu bwe kumulilo mu masakari mala baliosia buli baandu Be Chikholo chiili siimbi. Ne kakhali babaandu ba Yerusalemu bakhachiililile khumenya mu muleembe mu lukoba.
“Ne ese Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ndinyoa mbelesie Yuda bukhili nio efuma eye babaandu be lisaaye lia Daudi ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu balinyoola, ekhabi ekhila eye kholo eya Yuda yoosi tawe.
Siise esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aliliinda bamenywa ba Yerusalemu, nio akhaba batekhele lukali mu nibo balinyoola kamaani nga Daudi ne aba. Ne be lisaaye lia Daudi bakhemeelele babaandu ba Yuda nga malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi namwe nga Wele omwene.
Ne mu siise esio ndibunia chikholo choosi chikhaka khukhwibwaakala Yerusalemu.
Mu siise esio bililo mu Yerusalemu biliba bikali nga bibiaba khu Hatarimoni mu mweyeywe kwa Mekido.
Buli nju mu sibala elilila. Lisaaye lia Daudi, lisaaye lia Nasani, lisaaye lia Lawi ne Simei ne babaandi boosi. Buli nju elilila babaandu bayo, ne baseecha ne bakhasi se bakhalilile alala babaandu babwe tawe.”

Omwami Owe Banamae aloma ali, “Siise esio ne sioola esebele ekhatubukhe khukwalaasia babaandu be lisaaye lia Daudi ne bamenywa ba Yerusalemu khubakwalaasia khukhwama khu bwoni bwabwe ne khusaaya bifwaani.
Ne siise esio kharusieo kamasina ke bifwaani mu sibala ne se alibao na mulala olibikhebulila tawe. Kharusieo yesi yesi owilaanga khuba omung'oosi ne lilienya lie khusaaya bifwaani.
Ne omundu yesi yesi okhayilila ali niye ali omung'oosi, maawe ne raraawe bakhamuboolele bali, Ewe okhoya ofwe, sikila oboola bubeeyi mu lisina lia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Ne achiililila ne bung'oosi obwo maawe ne raraawe bakhamuunake afwe.
Siise esio ne sioola buli omung'oosi aliambwa chisoni khulwe kamalola kewe ne ali khang'oola, salibea babaandu khulwe khufwara chingubo che bung'oosi tawe.
Ne kakhali akhalome ali, ‘Ese se ndi omung'oosi tawe, ese omulimi busa, khukhwama bwana bwase ndi busa omulimi.’
Ne omundu ne areeba omung'oosi oyo ali, ‘Wanyoola oriena kamakoonjo kaali khu mukoongo kwowo kano?’ Akhakobosie ali, ‘Nanyoola munju mwe basaale base.’ ”
“Ee wanambalu, yinyokha wibwaakale omwaayi wase,
owimaanga siimbi nase
yiira omwaayi wase nio kamakheese kasalaanile,
ndebwaakala bakhenyalila tawe.
Khu buli baandu bataru mu sibala
babili bakhafwe mulala akhaone.
Khabare mu mulilo bakharame,
khubakwalaasia nga efwesa,
lundi nga esahabu.
Bakhasabe ese mala mbakobosie,
khalome ndi, ‘Bano bali babaandu base,’
nabo bakhalome bali, ‘Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali Wele wefwe.’ ”

Endaalo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhakholelekho bukhalaki yoolile. Khu ndaalo ng'eneyo bibiindu biili mu Yerusalemu bikhayaaywe mala babikabane ebweeni wenywe.
Sikila khabuusie Be Chikholo boosi bapanie Yerusalemu. Lukoba lulibukulwa, chinju chikhayaaywe mala babaandu balikwa khu bakhasi. Enusu eye babaandu be mu lukoba bakhayilwe mu mbaambe ne baramire se balirusibwa mu lukoba tawe.
Enyuma wako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alicha apane ne chikholo echo nga aapananga khale.
Mu siise esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akheeme khu sikulu sia Museituni siili ebukwe owa Yerusalemu. Nio sikulu chana sikhakabwemo khabili ne litooma liboofu likhaame ebukwe ne licha mumbo. Nio sitonyi silala sie sikulu siile ebunaswa ne sisiindi siafubo.
Ne litooma lie sikulu siase silimikhwa sikila litooma lie bikulu bililwitiilakho. Ne enywe mulilukha bulayi bwene nga bakuuka benywe ne belukha literema lie sibala mu biise bia Usia omwami owa Yuda. Enyuma wako Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele wenywe akheeche ne batakatifu bewe boosi.
Mu biise ebio, bunyifu, ebarafu namwe sisiilima se bikhabeo tawe.
Khukhabe ne kumuumu kwong'ene buli lwoosi, akhaba siilo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi yeng'ene niye omanyile endaalo eye bibiindu bino.
Siise esio, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabe omwami we sibala sioosi, ne buli mundu akhamusaaye niye nga Wele mala amumanye khu lisina lieneli.
Lukoongo lwoosi khukhwama Keba ebunaswa khukhwola Rimoni ebunafubo owa Yerusalemu lukheekele kumweyeywe. Ne kakhali Yerusalemu lulibonekha angaaki khukhwama khu silibwa sie Babenjamini khukhwola abuundu we silibwa sikhale, khukhwola khu silibwa sie mukoona, lundi lulibonekha angaaki khukhwama khu ndeleelwa eya Hananeli khukhwola niio basurira endali yo mwami.
Ne babaandu bakhamenye mu Yerusalemu mu muleembe ne se bakharikhirisibwe lundi tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhareere bulwaale bubi khu baandu boosi babebwaakala Yerusalemu. Balibola ne bakeenda. Chimoni chabwe chilibola ne chisili mu bikhookho, ne chinimi chabwe chilibola ne chisiili mukhanwa mwabwe.
Ne mu siise esio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhabareerere likoyaana nio buli mundu akhakaluukhane khu wasie oli siimbi amwibwaakale.
Babaandu ba Yuda bakhapane khuliinda lukoba lwa Yerusalemu. Bakhayaaye kimiaandu kie chikholo choosi biindu nga esahabu, efwesa ne chingubo chingali po.
Bulwaale bubi bulikwa akhaba khu farasi, chinyumbu, chingamia, chipunda ne chisaang'i chosi chosi nicho basiku baliba nacho mu biabuusi biabwe.
Kaaba bali chikholo chiili khu sibala se chiicha Yerusalemu khusaaya Omwami, Omwami Owe Banamae tawe, aba efula se ekhakwe mu sibala siabwe tawe.
Baaba bali Bamisiri baloba khukhola Naikara eye Bisali, aba bakhanyoole bulwaale nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikho akwiisia khu Be Chikholo bakhaliindanga Naikara eyo tawe.
Sino siliba siiukuumo khu Misiri nende Be Chikholo chichiindi boosi babaaba bakhaliinda Naikara eye Bisali tawe.
Mu siise siene esio akhaba kimisiipi kie chifarasi kiliaandikwakho kamakhuwa kano, “Kino kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.” Chindeekhelo che mu Lukaangu chiliba chindakatifu nga bibuumba bie khu alutare.
Buli endeekhelo mu Yerusalemu ne mu Yuda mwoosi bakhakire alubeka khulwe kimilimo kia Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi. Babaandu bakhaane chimbosio balibukula batekhelemo chinyama che chimbosio. Mu siise esio, omucheusi se aliba lundi mu Lukaangu lwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.

Obuno buli burume nibwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aelesia Malaki aboolele babaandu ba Isiraeli.
mala nabiila Esau ne lisaaaye liewe. Nonake sibala sie bikulu nisio be lisaaye lia Esau bamenyilemo. Nasianjukhe chisaang'i che mundaa chilamenyamo.”
Kaaba bali abo be lisaaye lia Esau, Baedomu baloma bali, “Chingoba chefwe chatechuulwe, ne kakhali khulachombakha lundi.” Nio Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alakobosia ali, “Lekha bachombakhe lundi. Ndachitechula lundi. Babaandu bakhachilaange bali ‘Sibala simayaanu lundi ekholo niyo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aambila lirima mindali na mindali.’ ”
Babaandu ba Isiraeli bacha khubona kano ne chimoni chabwe babeene, nio baliloma bali, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali ne kamaani akhaba enje we sibala sie Baisiraeli.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela basaayi ali, “Omwana aria raraawe ne omukholi aria owa muaandika. Ese ndi raraawenywe siina sikila ne mukhandia? Enywe mukhalaabanila ese, siina sikila ne mukhandia? Mundekelesia, ne mala mureeba muli, ‘Khwakhulekelesie khuriena?’
Mwandekelesie khulwe khuaana biakhulia binyaalu khu alutare yase. Ne mureeba muli, ‘Khwanyaalutisie khuriena?’ Ndamuboolela, se mwariire alutare yase tawe.
Enywe ne mureera sisiaayo sibofu, silwaale namwe sileme khukhumbaanila ese embosio, bubwenobwo se buli bumayaanu tawe ku? Khakakho khuaana bibiaayo nga bibienebio khu muruki wenywe. Anyala asiimisibwa nanywe namwe amukholela niko mwenya ku?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Nono saaya Wele akhukholele siisa. Nio abe ne kumwalaalo khwifwe. Ne biianwa nibio muli ne nabio mukhono bino. Wele alakholelakho siisa mulala khwinywe ku?”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Nakhabeele na mulala mwinywe owikala kimiliango kie Lukaangu nio enywe mukhabwana kumulilo kwa busa khu alutare yase tawe. Ese se nasiimisibwe nanywe tawe, ne se ndafukiilila biianwa bienywe nibio munderera tawe.
Babaandu buli abuundu mu sibala bandia. Banjoselia bupaani ne khukhumbanila biianwa bifukiililwa. Boosi bandia.
Ne kakhali enywe munyaalutia lisina liase khulwe khuloma muli alutare yase seli ne bukhala tawe, mala muaanilakho biakhulia nibio mwabene mwalekelesia.
Muloma muli, ‘Khwaluile lukali khukhola kano.’ Mala musinioola. Mureera biianwa bie bibiaayo bie bubwifwi ne bileme nende biili bilwaale. Mwibaasia muli ese nyala nafukiilila bibienebio khukhwama khwinywe?
Oyo obea khulwe khuaana embosio etaamba bukhala mala ali ne sisiaayo silayi mwituuli liewe nisio asuubisia khuaana alaamwe. Sikila ese ndi omwami omukali mala babaandu be chikholo choosi bandia.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboolela basaayi ali, “Enywe basaayi, lino lili lilaka khwinywe.
Khukhwola mumbe luyali mu bikholwa bienywe. Mwaba ne mukharekeeresia elomo niyo muboolela tawe, aba ndamulaama enywe ne bibiindu nibio munyoolanga khulwe buyeeti. Ne ng'ali nabilaamile khale sikila enywe se muli ne sinani khuria lilaka liase tawe.
Ndaukuuma babaana benywe mala maale mumoni mwenywe buuse bwe bibiaayo nibio muaananga ne embosio mala murusie enywe ebweeni wase.
Nio mulimanya muli ese namuelesia enywe kamalaka kano nio endakaano yase ne basaayi be lisaaye lia Lawi elekhe khufunikha tawe.
Bekisia bung'ali bwong'ene mala bamenya nase mu muleembe ne buluungi, lundi bayeeta bakali khulekha khukhola bubwoni.
Kuli kumulimo kwe basaayi khukhwikisia babaandu bung'ali bwa Wele. Babaandu bakhoyela bacha khu nibo khukhweyika niko neenya sikila nibo bali barumwa ba Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
“Ne kakhali enywe basaayi mwakaluukhane mwarurire khu ngila enuungi. Kamekisio kenywe kakilile bakali bakholile kamabi. Mwafunaake endakaano niyo ese nakhola nanywe.
Khwako, ese ndakhola babaandu ba Isiraeli bamulekelesie enywe sikila se mumbulila ne khukhola niko nenya tawe, lundi mutombolaanga babaandu mu mekisio kase.”
Efwe fweesi se khuli ne Paapa mulala tawe ku? Se ali Wele mulala oyo owakhubumba efwe fweesi? Nono siina sikila ne khufunakanga kamasuubisia niko khukholile fwabene khu beene mala khulekelesia endakaano niyo Wele aakhola ne bakuuka befwe?
Babaandu ba Yuda bafunake lisuubisia liabwe khu Wele. Bakholile kumwiima kukhafukiililwa mu Isiraeli ne Yerusalemu tawe. Banyaalutisie lukaangu nilwo Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi asiima. Babaandu be siseecha bakhweele bakhasi khukhwama mu kholo chisaaya bifwaani.
Abo babakhola kano, Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhoya abarusia mu Isiraeli mala bakhafukiililwakho lundi baana biianwa khu Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi.
Lundi mukholanga muri. Mulililaanga khu alutare ne khukukuula mala mutosia alutare ya Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne kamasika sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi leelo se afukiililanga biianwa nibio mu mureereranga tawe.
Ne mureeba sikila siina ne akhabifukiililanga tawe. Se abifukiililanga tawe sikila amanyile ali ewe wafunake endakaano yowo niyo wakhola no mukhasi owe mu buele bwowo. Aaba niye ewe okhoyela khumenya naye, ne kakhali wafunake lisuubisia liowo khu niye akhaba ne wasuubisia ebweeni wa Wele oli oliba omusuubilwa khu niye.
Wele nga ne amuambaasia mu mubili ne mu roho afunana siina? Afunana mube ne babaana baali babaandu ba Wele bang'ali khwako omundu yesi yesi akhafuna lisuubisia liewe khu mukhasi wewe tawe.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, Wele owa Isiraeli aboola ali, “Ese nabiila khulekhana. Nabiila omundu okhola likhuwa lie khuchunisia kumwoyo nga lino liri khu mukhasi wewe. Mukhebilila mwafuna lisuubisia lienywe khu bakhasi benywe tawe.”
Enywe mwaluisie Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne chilomo chenywe. Ne mureeba muli, “Khwamuluisie khuriena?” Mwamuluisie khulwe khuloma muli, “Buli mulala okhola bubi ali omulayi mumoni cha Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, mala niye abasangaalila.” Ne khureeba muli, “Wele okhola bung'ali ali waena?”

Aliicha khukhalakila babaandu nga oyo ora efwesa mu mulilo kwe kumukuba nio akikwalaasie. Omurume wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alikwalaasia basaayi nga omubasi ne akwalaasia efwesa ne esahabu mu mulilo nio basaayi abo bareerere Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi biianwa bia ng'ali.
Nio biianwa nibio babaandu ba Yuda ne Yerusalemu bareerera Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bilimusiimisia nga biamusiimisianga khale.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Ndimubonekhela khulwe khukhola bukhalaki mala ndusie buloli khukhwikiicha balakusi, baeeyi, bakiikha, babea ne khukhwiba kimiruungo kie bakholi babwe ne nabo babapia siibi banamulekhwa, bafuubi, ne babaandu be chikholo chichiindi ba baabamenyamo. Ndirusia buloli khwaabo boosi bakhandia tawe.
“Ese ndi Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi, ne se ngalukhananga tawe. Khwako enywe be lisaaye lia Yakobo, musiili khutibila elala tawe.
Enywe mwabeele nga bakuuka benywe khulwe khukhwaukha khukhwama khu malaka kase ne khulekha khukaloonda. Ngobolele mala sesi ndamukobolela. Ne kakhali mureeba muli, ‘Khukhola khuriena nio khukhukobolele?’
Mureeba ndi, omundu anyala anuula bia Wele? Ne kakhali enywe mulanuulanga. Ne kakhali mureeba muli khulakhunuulanga khuriena? Mulanuulanga khulwe khulekha khuruunga sitonyi silala khwi khumi lundi ne mu biianwa bienywe.
Enywe ekholo eya Isiraeli yoosi muli ne silaamo sikila mulanuulanga bibiase.
Reera sitonyi silala khwi khumi mu bwichufu mu nju mwase nio siakhulia sibemo. Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aloma ali, ‘Khake mala mulabona nga se ndamwikulila kamatirisia ke mwikulu ne khu muchukhila chikhabi chingali po.
Se ndalekha chikhungu chonake bibiaalwa bienywe tawe. Kimisabibu kienywe kiliaama kamatuunda kamakali.
Nio babaandu be chikholo choosi balimulaanga enywe bali be khabi, sikila sibala sienywe sikhabe sie busangaafu.’ ”
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Mwalomile chilomo chimbi khwise. Ne mureeba muli, ‘Khwakhulomile khuli siina?’
Enywe mwalomile muli, ‘Bukhala se buliio mu khukholela Wele kimilimo tawe.’ Lundi mureeba muli, ‘Bulayi siina buliio mu khukhola niko Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola namwe khumwekesia niye khuli niko khukholile kali kamabi.
Nga ne khubona, babaandu be sileka nibo baali ne ekhabi. Abo bakhola kamabi banyoola buiinda. Lundi bakhakhaka khulwe khukhola kamabi se baukuumwa tawe.’ ”
Nio babaandu ba baria Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi baboolanila. Mala Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abarekeeresia, aulila embakha yabwe. Ebweeni wa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi sitabu siaandikwa khu baandu abo.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Babaandu abo baliba ba base. Baliba kumukabwa kwase kukhasala tawe khu ndaalo niyo ndikholelamo sikholwa. Ndibakholela siisa nga paapa nakholela siisa omwana wewe omusoleeli omukholelanga kimilimo.
Nio lundi babaandu base baliaukhasia kakekholekha khu baluungi khukhwama khwako kakekholekha khu bamayaanu. Lundi baliaukhasia kakekholekha khu mundu oukholela kimilimo ne noyo okhakholelanga tawe.”

Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi aboola ali, “Endaalo elikho yiicha niyo babaandu babebonia ne bamayaanu boosi baliyia nga kamasakari. Endaalo ng'eneyo baliyia sio.
Ne kakhali enywe mumwandia ese, bunyali bwase bwe buonia bulamubonekhela nga enyanga ne khosia buwaanga bwayo. Mulisangaala mala mwekhoye nga chimoosi ne chaama mwitaala.
Khu ndaalo niyo ndikholela ndio, muli ula babaandu bamayaanu mala babe nga kamatosi mu bikhandakilo bienywe.
“Khebulila kamekisio ko mukholi wase Musa, kamalaka niko namueleselia niye khu sikulu sia Sinai, nio babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi bakaloonde.
Alireera alala babaana ne baraarawabwe lundi, busa aba ndecha nonakake sibala sienywe.”

Kano niko kamasina ke bakuuka ba Yesu Kristo, omwana owa Daudi, owe lisaaye lia Aburahamu.
Aburahamu aaba raraawe owa Isaaka ne Isaaka aaba raraawe owa Yakobo ne Yakobo aaba raraawe owa Yuda ne bawandaaye,
ne Yuda aaba raraawe owa Peresi ne Sera, mawaabwe aba Tamari, ne Peresi aaba raraawe owa Hesironi, Hesironi aaba raraawe owa Ramu,
Ramu aaba raraawe owa Aminatabu, ne Aminatabu aaba raraawe owa Nashoni, ne Nashoni aaba raraawe owa Salimoni,
ne Salimoni aaba raraawe owa Boasi, maawe aba Rahabu, ne Boasi aaba raraawe owa Obedi, maawe aba Ruthi, ne Obedi aaba raraawe owa Chesi,
Chesi aaba raraawe owo mwami Daudi.
Ne Daudi aaba raraawe owa Solomoni, maawe aba mukha Uria,
Solomoni aaba raraawe owa Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu aaba raraawe owa Abicha ne Abicha aaba raraawe owa Asa,
ne Asa aaba raraawe owa Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati aaba raraawe owa Yoramu, ne Yoramu aaba raraawe owa Usia,
Usia aaba raraawe owa Yosamu, ne Yosamu aaba raraawe owa Ahasi, Ahasi aaba raraawe owa Hesekia,
ne Hesekia aaba raraawe owa Manase, ne Manase aaba raraawe owa Amoni, ne Amoni aaba raraawe owa Yosia,
Yosia aaba raraawe owa Yekoniya ne bawandaaye, mu ndaalo nicho baambilwamo ne bayilwa Babiloni.
Enyuma we khuyilwa mu mbaambe e Babiloni, Yekoniya aaba raraawe owa Shealitieli, ne Shealitieli aaba raraawe owa Serubabeli.
Serubabeli aaba raraawe owa Abiuti, ne Abiuti aaba raraawe owa Eliakimu,
Eliakimu aaba raraawe owa Asori ne Asori aaba raraawe owa Satoki, ne Satoki aba raraawe owa Akimu ne Akimu aaba raraawe owa Eliuti,
ne Eliuti aaba raraawe owa Eliesa, ne Eliesa aaba raraawe owa Matani, ne Matani aaba raraawe owa Yakobo,
ne Yakobo aaba raraawe owa Yosefu, omuseecha owa Maria, owasaala Yesu, olaangwa Kristo.
Khwako chiselukho khukhwama khu Aburahamu khukhwola khu Daudi chaba ekhumi na chine, ne khukhwama khu Daudi khukhwola khu mbaambe eye khuyilwa Babiloni, chiselukho ekhumi na chine, ne khukhwama khu mbaambe eye khuyilwa Babiloni khukhwola khu lisaalwa lia Kristo chili chiselukho ekhumi na chine.
Yosefu omuseecha wewe, sikila aba omuluungi lundi se enya khuchangalaasia Maria tawe, ebaasia khumulekha niye mu bwikisi.
Ne, nga aba nasibaasia ario, malaika amubonekhela mu marooro naloma ali, “Yosefu mwana owa Daudi, okharia khubukula Maria abe omukhasi wowo tawe, sikila nisio aesiisie sili sia Roho Omutakatifu.
Alisaala Omwana omusoleeli, mala omutiuukhe oli Yesu, sikila alionia babaandu bewe khukhwama mu bwoni bwabwe.”
Kano koosi kakholekha khukhwichusia niko Omwami aloma khubirira mu mung'oosi ali,
mala asaale omwana owe siseecha, ne balimutiuukha bali, Emanueli.” (Liboola lili, “Wele ali nafwe.”)
Nio nga Yosefu aasiisimukha, aakhola nga malaika wo Mwami aamulaka, aareera Maria engo abe omukhasi wewe.
Ne se baba alala tawe, khukhwola nga ne asaala omwana, mala Yosefu aamutiuukha ali Yesu.

Yesu nga ne asaalwa mu lukoba lwa Betelehemu e Buyuda mu ndaalo cho mwami Herodi, babaandu bakesi baama ebukwe becha Yerusalemu, ne bareeba bali,
“Omwana osaalilwe khuba Omwami owe Bayaudi ali waena? Sikila khwaboone eng'enieesi yewe ebukwe, mala khwechile khumusaaya.”
Nga omwami Herodi aaulila kano, eendekhelela, akhaba be mu Yerusalemu boosi.
Abuusia basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki be Lilaka boosi, khukhwenya khumanya niio Kristo alisaalilwa.
Nio bamukobosia bali, “Mu Betelehemu, lwe Buyuda, sikila kano niko omung'oosi aandika,
se olaba omutiiti mu ngoba che Buyuda tawe,
sikila omuruki okhaame mwiwe akhaaye babaandu base Isiraeli.’ ”
Nio Herodi alaanga bakesi abo mu bwikisi amanyila elala khukhwama khu nibo siise nisio eng'enieesi yabonekha;
mala aabaruma Betelehemu, aabalaka ali, “Khemuche muenje omwana oyo bulayi, ne mumalile khumunyoola mundereere likhuwa nio sesi nje musaaye niye.”
Nga bamala khuulila ko mwami, barekukha bacha; oli basiili, babona eng'enieesi niyo babona ebukwe yarangiire, yecha yema abuundu niio omwana aba.
Ne nga babona eng'enieesi chana eyo basangaala, bekhoya lukali po,
oli bengila munju, babona Omwana ne maawe Maria; basaaya omwana ne khukangulula chioochwa chabwe, bamuturira esahabu ne bimuli bie kumuuya kumulayi nende manemane.
Nio Wele aabakaania mu marooro ali bakhakobola wa Herodi tawe, barekukha bela mu sibala siabwe, khubirira khu ngila ekiindi.
Baba oli bamalile khurekukha, malaika owa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi abonekhela Yosefu mumarooro aaloma ali, “Yinyokha obukule Omwana ne maawe, wilukhile e Misiri, mala omenyeyo nabwila ndikhureerera likhuwa, sikila Herodi alikhuyiima omwana enya khumwiira.”
Yosefu enyokha siilo aabukula Omwana ne maawe, acha e Misiri.
Bamenyayo nabwila Herodi afwa. Kano kaba kario khukhwichusia niko Omwami aboola khubirira mu Mung'oosi ali, “Nalaanga Omwana wase arure e Misiri.”
Herodi nga amanya ali bakesi chana abo bamubachile, aba ne lirima likali, abisia lilaka lie khukhwira babaana be siseecha boosi be bukhulu bwe kimiiko kibili khukhwila aasi mu Betelehemu, ne birekere biili siimbi nalwo, khukhwamila khu siise nisio amanyilamo bung'ali khukhwama khu bakesi chana abo khuloondekhana ne siise nisio eng'enieesi yabonekhelamo.
Nio niko omung'oosi Yeremia aaloma kekholekha,
ne bililo birafu ne khusooma.
Raeli alila babaana bewe,
alobile khuolelesibwa,
sikila boosi babunile.”
Nga Herodi ne afwa, malaika wo Mwami abonekhela Yosefu mu marooro e Misiri, amuboolela ali,
“Yinyokha obukule Omwana ne maawe, okobole mu sibala sia Isiraeli, sikila abo babenyanga khukhwira Omwana bafwa.”
Nio Yosefu enyokha abukula omwana ne maawe, mala bakobola mu sibala sia Isiraeli.
Ne nga Yosefu aulila bali Akelasi aamiie e Buyuda mu bweyaangu bwa raraawe Herodi, aria khucha ebweeneyo, nga nilwo aboolelwa mu marooro, akobola mu sibala sia Kalilaya.
Khwako acha khumenya mu lukoba lwa Nasareti, nio kakaboolwa ne bang'oosi kechusibwe bali, “Alilaangwa Omunasareti.”

Siise esio Yoana Omubatiisi echa mu sichiimi sie Buyuda mala arakikha khukhwilwacha ali,
“Yekanila, sikila bubwami bwe Mwikulu buli siimbi.”
Sikila yuno niye, omung'oosi Isaya aaloma ali,
“Kumumilo kwo mundu kuuliilikha mu sichiimi kuli,
‘Rekekha kumuila kwo Mwami, kololosia chingila chewe.’ ”
Mala babaandu be Yerusalemu nede e Buyuda ne lubeka lwe lukoongo luloondekhana khu Yoritani bacha niio ali.
Nio beyama bubwoni bwabwe mala babatiisibwa mu luuchi lwa Yoritani.
Nono khola bikholwa bibiolaana ne liliekanila lienywe.
Ne mukhebaasia muli, ‘Efwe khuli babaana ba Paapa Aburahamu, tawe!’ Sikila ese muboolela enywe ndi, Wele anyala akhola kamabaale kano kaaba babaana ba Aburahamu.
Akhaba luno luri eaywa yareerwe khu bisina bie kimirongooro, khwako buli murongooro kukhaama kamatuunda kamalayi tawe, kuliremwa ne khumwaatwa mu mulilo.
Ese mubatiisia enywe ne kameechi sikila liliekanila lienywe, ne oyo olikho owicha enyuma wase ali ne bunyali khukhukhila ese, ese se nolaana khusuta biraaro biewe tawe. Alimubatiisia enywe mu Roho Omutakatifu ne kumulilo.
Lutelu luli mukhono mwewe, alisenjula luuya lwewe mala abuunge engaanu yewe mu siaki, ne aliosela likhuuchi mu mulilo kukhasima tawe.”
Siise esio Yesu ama Kalilaya acha Yoritani Yoana amubatiisie.
Ne kakhali Yoana akhaka khumukaania ne aloma ali, “Ewe wicha khwise oriena mala ewe okhoyele umbatiisie ese?”
Ne kakhali Yesu amukobosia ali, “Lekha kabe kario siise sino, sikila buli bulayi efwe khutabusie niko Wele enya.” Khwako Yoana afukiilila.
Yesu nga ne amala khu batiisibwa, arura mu meechi, ne abwene ne abwene, likulu liamwikukhila, abona Roho owa Wele ne ekha nga liuusi mala aamwimakho.
Kumumilo kwama mwikulu ne kuloma kuli, “Yuno ali Omwana wase omusiime, ousiimisia lukali.”

Eyimana khulia chindaalo kamakhumi kane, siilo ne kumuusi mala enjala yamulia.
Nio Sietani amwichakho amuboolela ali, “Ewe waaba ne oli Omwana owa Wele khola kamabaale kano kabe kimikaati.”
Ne Yesu amukobosia ali, “Liaandikwa lili, ‘Omundu se alamenya khulwe siakhulia siong'ene tawe, ne kakhali amenya khulwe buli Lomo niyo Wele aloma.’ ”
Lundi Sietani chana amuyila mu Lukoba lutakatifu lwa Yerusalemu, amuniinia khu lusuli lwe Lukaangu,
amuboolela ali, “Ewe waaba ne oli Omwana owa Wele, suna aasi, sikila liaandikwa lili, ‘Wele alaruma bamalaika bewe balakhwakaniila mu makhono kabwe, okhakhola orio wetuya khwibaale tawe.’ ”
Lundi Sietani amuyila khu sikulu sileeyi lukali, amwekesia bubwami bwe sibala bwoosi ne luyali lwasio.
Amuboolela ali, “Ndakhuelesia bino bioosi, waaba bali ungwa mu bikele ne khu khusaaya.”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Sietani, rekukha oche! Sikila liaandikwa lili, ‘Olasaaya Omwami Wele wowo mala omukhalaabanile niye yeng'ene.’ ”
Nio Sietani amulekha, mala malaika becha bamuyeeta.
Nio aama Nasareti acha amenya Kaperinaumu, lukoba luuli khu sikiingi sie nyanja, mu njakha che lukoongo lwa Sebuluni ne Nafutali,
kakholekha kario, khukhwichusia niko omung'oosi Isaya aloma ali,
lubeka lwe sia nyanja, engelekha wa Yoritani, sibala sia Kalilaya sie Be Chikholo.
Babaandu ba baaba mu siilima baboone buwaanga bukali,
ne naabo ba baaba mu siniini sie lifwa, buwaanga bwabooleele.”
Yesu nga aaba ne akeenda khu sikiingi sie nyanja eya Kalilaya abona babaandu babili wandaaye ne wandaaye. Simoni olaangwa Petero ne Andereya, ne bamwaata lutiimba mu nyanja, sikila baba banaabi.
Ababoolela ali, “Nondekho mala ndamukhola enywe mube banaabi be babaandu.”
Balekha chindiimba chabwe khangu mala bamuloondakho.
Oli esendakho abweeni abona babaandi babili wandaaye ne wandaaye, Yakobo ne Yoana babaana ba Sebetayo. Baba mu liaaro ne raarawabwe ne bang'oona chindiimba chabwe. Yesu abalaanga,
abwene ne abwene balekha liliaaro ne raarawabwe, mala bamuloondakho.
Khwako efuma yewe yoola mu sibala sia Siria sioosi, lundi bamureerera balwaale boosi, lufu lwa buli lukano ne buchuuni chingano choosi, be bisieeno, be chiteleng'i nende babafwokoya, mala Yesu abaonia boosi.
Babaandu bakali bama Kalilaya ne Tekapoli ne Yerusalemu ne mu Buyuda, nende engelekha wa Yoritani, baloonda khu Yesu.

Nga Yesu abona babaandu bakali, aniina khu sikulu, oli ekhaale babeeka bewe beecha niio ali.
Arakikha khubekisia ali,
“Baali ne kumutaambo kwe mu roho bali ne chikhabi,
Sikila bubwami bwe mwikulu buli bubwabwe.
sikila Wele akhabaoleelesie.
sikila bakhaebwe sibala nisio Wele aabasuubisia.
sikila Wele akhabekusie.
“Baali ne siisa bali ne chikhabi,
sikila Wele akhabakholele siisa.
sikila bakhabone Wele.
“Bareera kumuleembe bali ne chikhabi,
Sikila bakhalaangwe babaana ba Wele.
sikila bubwami bwe mwikulu buli bubwabwe.
Yekhoya mala musangaale lukali sikila kumuruuru kwenywe kuuli mwikulu kuli kumuboofu, sikila baapia bang'oosi be khaale siibi bario.
Namwe omundu se aambia etaa mala akifunikhila mu sikono tawe, ne kakhali, akira khu siteetwe ekhoselie baali munju boosi.
Mu ngila ng'ene eyo lekha buwaanga bwenywe bukhosie ebweeni we babaandu, nio babone bikholwa bienywe bilayi, mala baelesie luyali Raraawenywe oli mwikulu.
“Mukhebaasia muli ese neecha khurusiao Lilaka lia Musa ne kamekisio ke bang'oosi tawe, se nechile khurusiao tawe, ne kakhali nechile kechusibwe.
Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, nabwila likulu ne liloba biliwao enyukuta namwe khatonyi khakeekhe khe Lilaka se khalirurakho tawe, khukhwola koosi kekholekhe.
Nono yesi yesi olifuna lilalakho khu malaka kaali kamakeekhe khu kano ne khukhwekisia babaandi khukhola bario, alilaangwa omukeekhe mu bwami bwe mwikulu. Ne kakhali oyo okatiila mala ekisie babaandi khukhola khurio, alilaangwa omukali mu bwami bwe mwikulu.
Ese muboolela enywe ndi, buluungi bwenywe ne bukhakhila bwe baandiki ne Bafarisayo tawe, se mulingila mu bwami bwe mwikulu tawe.
Ne ese muboolela enywe ndi yesi yesi oba ne lirima khu wandaaye olaana khukhalakilwa, yesi yesi okhoma wandaaye akhayaalwe, ne oboolela wandaaye ali, ‘Musilu ewe’ olaana khucha mu mulilo kwa mindali na mindali.
Kaaba bali olikho oana siianwa siowo khu alutare mala okhebulile oli wandaayo ali ne bulomani nawe,
lekha siianwa siowo ebweeni wa alutare mala oche khangu obelanile ne wandaayo, nio wiche orusie siianwa siowo khu Wele.
“Beelanila khangu nende niye mulomana naye, ne mukhoola mu koti tawe. Okhulomania akhola ario akhura mu makhono ko mukhalaki, ne omukhalaki naye khu muliindi, mala bakhuila mu siboe.
Ese khuboolela bung'ali, se olirura enje nosiili khuruunga esimiri emaliilisi tawe.
Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe ndi buli mundu yesi yesi olalola owe siikhasi ne moni eye khumwekoomba, aba amalile khukhola bueeyi naye mu mwoyo kwewe.
Nono kaba bali emoni eseecha ekila wakhola bubwoni, kitomole mala okimwaate eyo! Buli bulayi ewe khutibia siindu silala khu mubili kwowo khukhila kumubili kwowo kwoosi ne kumwaatwa mu mulilo emakoombe.
Lundi kaba bali kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha kukila wakhola bubwoni, kukhale mala okumwaate eyo! Buli bulayi ewe khutibia siindu silala khu mubili kwowo khukhila kumubili kwowo kwoosi ne kumwaatwa mu mulilo emakoombe.
Ne ese muboolela enywe ndi, buli mundu olekha omukhasi wewe, ne kakhali khu sifuno sie bueeyi, amukhola khuba omueeyi, lundi omundu yesi yesi oyila omukhasi niye balekha akhola bueeyi.
Ne ese muboolela enywe ndi, okhechubakho ne atiiti ene tawe, akhaba khuloondekhana ne likulu, sikila nilio lili endebe eya Wele eye bubwami,
namwe khu sibala, sikila nisio sili endebe eye bikele biewe, namwe khu Yerusalemu, sikila nilwo lukoba lwo Mwami omukali.
Lundi okhasuta kumukhono mu khwechuba tawe, sikila sonyala wakhola kumurwe kwamela chimbuchi namwe lichuune limali tawe.
Lekha nilio oloma libe ‘Yee’ namwe ‘Tawe’, sisiindu siosi siosi sikhila ao, siaama khu Musiku.
Ne ese muboolela enywe ndi: mukharuungisia kamabi khu mabi tawe. Ne kakhali yesi yesi okhuupa luui ewe khu lusaaya luseecha, muyusilie luluundi lwosi.
Lundi yesi yesi ne akhusitaka ali akhubukule lisiati liowo mulekhele ne likooti liosi.
Lundi yesi yesi okhuyingiilila khumusutila sisutwa emaili ndala, musutile kamaili kabili.
Okhusaba muelesie, ne okhemana owenya khukhwekopa tawe.
Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe ndi, siima basiku benywe, lundi musabile abo bamupia enywe siibi,
nio mube babaana ba Raraawenywe oli mwikulu, sikila akhola enyanga yewe ne khoselia bamayaanu ne balayi, lundi areera efula khu baluungi nende khu bakhali baluungi tawe.
Siina sikila Wele amuelesie enywe kumuruuru khulwe khusiima basaale benywe bong'ene? Akhaba baroosia busuuru bakholanga bario!
Lundi kaaba bali mukheesiana mwabeene khu beene mweng'ene, aba mukhililakho siina babaandi? Akhaba bakhamanyile Wele tawe, bosi se bakholanga bario?
Nono enywe mukhoya mube babechufu mu busiime nga Raraawenywe owe Mwikulu ne ali omwichufu.

“Nono ne oana siianwa, okheyokesiana tawe, nga babacha mu masinakooki ne khu ngila, nio babaandu ba baelesie efuma. Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi bamalile khunyoola biianwa biabwe.
Ne kakhali ne oana buyeeti okhalekha kumukhono kwowo kumukhasi kwamanya nisio kumuseecha kulikho kukhola tawe,
nono buyeeti bwowo bukhoya bube mu bwikisi; ne Raraao obona mu bwikisi niko okhola alakhuelesia siianwa.
Ne kakhali ne osaba, cha mu lusiro lwowo, wikaleyo lulwiiki mala osabe Raraao oli mu bwikisi ne Raraao chana oyo obonela mu bwikisi alakhuelesia siianwa.
“Ne muli mwisaba mukhechusia kamakhuwa ka busa nga babaandu bakhamanyile Wele tawe, sikila nibo bebaasia bali baulilwa sikila kamakhuwa kabwe kamakali.
Mukhaba nga nibo tawe. Sikila Raraawenywe amanyile nibio mwenya ne musiili khumureeba tawe. Nono mukhoyela khusaba muli:
‘Paapa wefwe oli mwikulu,
lisina liowo lifumisibwe.
Bubwami bwowo bwiche,
lilienya liowo likholwe mu sibala nga mwikulu.
Khuelesie luno siakhulia siefwe sia buli ndaalo.
Khubeele kamabi kefwe nga fwesi
khubeelanga bakhukholela efwe kamabi.
Okhakhura mu makhako tawe,
ne kakhali khureesie khukhwama khu Mumayaanu.’
Ne kakhali ne mukhabeela babaandu kamabi kabwe tawe, akhaba Raraawenywe yesi se amubeela enywe kamabi kenywe tawe.
“Lundi nga ne musila khulia, mukhanyiisia mumoni nga ba bacha tawe, sikila nibo bakaluukhasianga mumoni mwabwe nio babaandu bamanye bali basilile khulia. Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, banyoolile siianwa siabwe mu bwichufu.
Ne kakhali enywe ne musila khulia, kwalaasia kimirwe kienywe ne kamafura, lundi mwesaabe mumoni mwenywe,
nio babaandi bakhamanya bali mwasilile khulia tawe, ne kakhali Raraawenywe chana oyo obonanga nibio mukholelanga mu bwikisi, alamuelesia biianwa.
Ne kakhali yibiikhila mwibiikhilo lie mwikulu, nimwo eseseu namwe engekheni bikhanyala bionakaka tawe, namwe nimwo babefwi bakhanyala baatula mala beeba tawe.
Sikila niio libiikhilo liowo lili abwenao niio kumwoyo kwowo kulaba.
“Emoni eli etaa eye kumubili. Nono, emoni yowo yaaba neli enamu, kumubili kwowo kwoosi kulechula buwaanga;
ne emoni yowo yafwa, aba, kumubili kwowo kwoosi kulechula sisiilima. Kaaba bali buwaanga buuli mwiwe buli sisiilima, aba sisiilima sieneesio sili sikali lukali!
“Se aliio onyala khukholela babaami babili tawe, ne sifuno mbo, ne akhola ario abiila mulala ne khusiima okundi, namwe aleboombia khu mulala ne aleke okundi. Se onyala khukholela Wele ne kimiaandu tawe.
“Khwako ese muboolela enywe, mukheembeelela khulwe bulamu bwenywe tawe, nisio mukhalie namwe nisio mukhanywe, namwe kimibili kienywe, nisio mukhefware tawe. Bulamu se bukhila siakhulia, ne kumubili kukhila chingubo?
Lola chinyuni che mu ngaaki, se chimiicha namwe ne khukesa, namwe se chibuunga mu siaki tawe, ne kakhaba kario Raraawenywe we mwikulu achilisia. Enywe se muli be bukhala bukali khuchikhila nicho?
Naanu khwinywe onyala aatasa buleeyi bwe bulamu bwewe, khulwe khuuba ne lilieendekhelela?
“Nono siina sikila ne mwiendekhelela sikila chingubo? Se mumanyila khu bimuli bie mundaa nga bichoanga; se bisiobelanga namwe se binabilanga chingubo tawe.
Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe, akhaba omwami Solomoni mu luyali lwewe lwoosi, se efwara nga khamuli khalala khu bino tawe.
Ne kaba bali Wele afwara ario bunyaasi bwe mu lusaambu, bunyaasi buliio luno, ne busia bumwaatwa mu mulilo, se alamufwara enywe lukali khukhila ta ku? Enywe babaandu be lisuubila likeekhe!
“Khwako mukheendekhelela ne muloma muli, ‘Khulalia siina? Namwe, Khulanywa siina? Namwe, Khulefwara siina tawe?’ ”
Sikila bibienebio bioosi nibio Be Chikholo bayimanga; ne Raraawenywe owe mwikulu amanyile ali mwenyekha mube nende ebio bioosi.
Ne kakhali nyoa muyiime bubwami bwewe ne buluungi bwewe, ne mala bibiindu bino bioosi bilaba bibienywe.
Khwako mukheendekhelela sikila ke busia tawe, sikila busia, busia nende ke ndaalo ng'ene eyo. Lekha siibi sie ndaalo siolaane ne ndaalo eng'ene.

“Mukhakhalakila babaandi tawe, mwesi mukhakhola murio mwakhalakilwa tawe.
Sikila mulakhalakilwa khuloondekhana ne likhalaka nilio murumbura, lundi sikelo nisio mukelelamo mwesi mulakelelwamo.
Siina sikila ne obona khasosono khaali mumoni eya wandaayo, ne se obona lilindu lili mumoni yowo wamwene tawe?
Namwe olaboolela wandaayo oriena oli, ‘Lekha khurusie khasosono mumoni yowo,’ ne khane lilindu lili mumoni yowo wamwene?
Ewe omubacha, nyoa orusie lilindu chana elio lili mumoni yowo wamwene, nio obone bulayi nga ne orusia khasosono mumoni eya wandaayo.
“Mukhaelesia chimbwa siili sitakatifu tawe, chilakaluukhana chimwibwaakale, lundi mukhamwaatila chimbiichi chisiimbi chenywe tawe, chikhola chirio chachiswalakilila mu bikele mala chayuukha cha mwibwaakala mwabeene.
“Saba, ne mulaebwa, yiima, ne mulanyoola; khong'oonda, mala mulekulilwao.
Yesi yesi osaba aebwa, ne oyo oyiima anyoola, ne okhong'oonda ekulilwao.
Namwe mundu siina khwinywe, omwana wewe ne amusaba busuma, amuelesia libaale?
Namwe ne asaba eng'eeni amuelesia endemu?
Kaaba bali enywe muli bamayaanu, mumanyile khuana biianwa bilayi khu baana benywe Raraawenywe oli mwikulu alaana bibiindu bilayi bikali lukali khwaabo bamusaba!
“Yingilila mu silibwa sinyiki, sikila engila echa mu khubuna ebirira mu silibwa sibalaayi, ne mala lukeendo lwakhwo luli lulwangu, ne bakibirirakho bali bakali.
Engila echa mu bulamu ebirira mu silibwa sinyiki ne bakibona bali bakeekhe.
“Ba meso khulwe bang'oosi be bubeeyi babeecha niio muli ne befwarire kamasieelo ke kamakheese, ne mukari bali bisuuche bie kumuliuliu.
Mulabamanyila mu bikholwa biabwe. Babaandu babutangakho chisabibu khu binyenya, namwe chinduli khu marakaru ku?
“Khwako buli kumurongooro kumulayi kwaama kamatuunda kamalayi ne kumurongooro kumubi kwaama kamatuunda kamabi.
Kumurongooro kumulayi se kunyala kwaama kamatuunda kamabi tawe, namwe kumurongooro kumubi se kunyala kwaama kamatuunda kamalayi tawe.
Kumurongooro kwosi kwosi kukhaama kamatuunda kamalayi tawe, kuremwa ne khumwaatwa mu mulilo.
Khwako enywe mulamanyila bang'oosi be bubeeyi mu bikholwa biabwe.
“Se kali bali buli mundu oundanga ese ali, ‘Omwami, Omwami,’ alingila mu bwami bwe mwikulu tawe, ne kakhali abo bakholanga lilienya lia Paapa wase oli mwikulu bong'ene.
Endaalo ng'eneyo bakali balinjiloochela bali, ‘Omwami, Omwami, se khwang'oolela mwisina liowo, ne khukhola kamayia kamakali mwisina liowo!’
Mala ndibaboolela ndi, ‘Ese se namumanyakho enywe tawe, khemundureo, enywe mukholanga kamamayaanu!’
“Nono buli mundu oulila kamakhuwa kase kano ne khukakhola alaba nga omukesi owombakha enju khu lwanda;
mala efula yakwa, kimikhula kiekha, lundi ekhuungu yaucha ne khukhwikhupa khunju ng'ene eyo ne kakhali se yasiuukha tawe, sikila yaba yombakhwa khu lwanda.
“Ne kakhali buli mundu oulila kamakhuwa kase kano ne khulekha khukakhola aliba nga omusilu owombakha enju yewe mumuyekhe.
Efula yakwa kimikhula kiekha, lundi ekhuungu yauucha ne khukhwikhupa khunju ng'ene eyo, mala yasiukha, ne likwa liayo liaba liboofu lukali!”
Sikila abekisia nibo nga oyo owaba ne bunyali, se abekisia nga baandiki tawe!

Yesu nga ne ekha khukhwama khu sikulu, babaandu bakali bamuloondakho.
Nio omundu owe kamakele echa asikama ebweeni wewe, aloma ali, “Omwami, waaba ne wenya onyala wandakaasa.”
Yesu amutilakho ne aloma ali, “Nenya, takaasibwa.” Ne abwene ne abwene kamakele kamururakho.
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Rekeeresia, okhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, ne kakhali cha weyokesie khu musaayi, orusie siianwa nisio Musa alaka, nio babaandu boosi bamanye bali waonile.”
Yesu aba nga alikho engila mu lukoba lwa Kaperinaumu omunamae omukhulu owe Barumi amwichakho amwikoonjelela ne aloma ali,
“Omwami omukholi wase ali engo, akonile aasi se anyala akhaba khukhweyusia tawe.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Kane niche muonie.”
Ne omukhulu owe banamae chana amukobosia ali, “Tawe Omwami! Ese se nolaana ewe wiche munju mwase tawe, ne kakhali loma busa Elomo, mala omukholi wase alaona.
Sikila akhaba ese ndi ne omukhongo wase, ne lundi ndi ne banamae aasi wase, ne mboolela mulala ndi ‘Cha!’ Ne acha; okundi ndi, ‘Yiicha!’ Ne echa, ne nasioobi wase, ndi ‘Khola lino!’ Ne akhola!”
Yesu nga aulila kano, auka mala aboolela ba bamuloondakho ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, khanyoolakho lisuubila nga lino liri akhaba mu Isiraeli tawe.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, bakali baliama e bukwe ne mumbo mala bekhale khu siaalwa nende Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo mu Bwami bwe mwikulu.
Ne kakhali bakhoyelwa khuba mu Bwami bwene obwo balimwaatwa enje mu siilima, balililemo ne khukhwelumakaka.”
Yesu aboolela omukhulu owe banamae chana oyo ali, “Cha engo, lekha kabe nga ne osubiile.” Nio omukholi chana oyo aaona mu siise esio ne sisiene.
Yesu nga ne engila munju eya Petero, abona masalaawe owa Petero akonile aasi ali ne kumureengo.
Amutiila kumukhono; mala aona nio enyokha amuelesia siakhulia.
Ekolooba ao bamureerera babaandu bakali ba baaba ne bisieeno, mala Yesu abirusia khulwe khuloma elomo yewe, lundi aonia balwaale boosi.
Lino liaba lirio khukhwichusia niko omung'oosi Isaya aaloma ali,
“Aabukula butekhele bwefwe,
Lundi asuta bulwaale bwefwe.”
Yesu nga ne abona baandu bakali ne bamwichuleo, aboolela babeeka bewe bambukhe enyanja.
Nio omuandiki owe lilaka echa niio Yesu aba amuboolela ali, “Omwekisia, ndakhuloondakho buli osi osi niio ocha!”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Chinjusi chili ne kamaloo, ne chinyuni chili ne biswi, ne kakhali Omwana wo Mundu se ali ne abuundu niio auluukhila tawe.”
Okundi khu beeka bewe amuboolela ali, “Omwami lekha nje siikhe paapa nio.”
Ne kakhali Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nondekho, mala olekhe bafu babeene basiikhe bafu babwe.”
Yesu aniina mu liaaro, mala babeeka bewe bamuloondakho.
Nio embembeesi engali yaaba khu nyanja, yakila liliaaro liarakikha khutengaala sikila bibuli bie kameechi, ne Yesu aaba alikho akona.
Babeeka bamusiisimusia ne baloma bali, “Omwami, khuonie! Khulikho khubuna.”
Nio abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne muriire?” Muli ne lisuubila litiiti lukali! Enyokha arafwira embembeesi ne enyanja biyenjeele, mala biayenjeela.
Buli mundu auka lukali ne baloma bali, “Omundu owa lukano siina yuno, niye akhaba ekhuungu ne nyanja biria!”
Yesu nga oola engelekha mu sibala silaangwa Katara babaandu babili be bisieeno bamwakaanana, ne baama e biliindwa. Baba barafu lukali abele omundu yesi yesi se abirira khu ngila ng'ene eyo tawe.
Nio baapa lulwang'a bali, “Mwana owa Wele ewe wenya okhukhole oriena? Ewe wechile ano khu khuukuuma efwe endaalo ne siili khwola?”
Abeele chimbiichi chingali chilikho chaaya sinao khukhwama niio baba.
Mala bisieeno biekoonjelela Yesu bili, “Waaba ne okhurusia efwe enje, khuile mwituuli lie chimbiichi.”
Nio Yesu abiboolela ali, “Khemuche.” Abwenao biabaruramo biacha mu mbiichi, mala lituuli lioosi liasalamata khu mwikha kwe sikulu kumukali liaweela mu nyanja.
Nio babaayi belukha, bacha mu lukoba baboola bibiindu bioosi bibiekholeekhe khu be bisieeno chana abo.
Khwako be lukoba boosi barura, khukhwakaanana Yesu mala bamwekoonjelela bali arure mu sibala siabwe.

Yesu aniina mu liaaro, ambukha engelekha we nyanja, oola mu lukoba lwe wabwe
Niio, bamureerera omundu owafwokoya, naali khu sitanda, ne nga Yesu abona lisuubila liabwe aboolela owafwokoya oyo ali, “Mwana wase luma kumwoyo! Wabeleelwe bubwoni bwowo.”
Nio balala khu baandiki bamonyana bali, “Omundu yuno alikho akholela Wele embelekeu.”
Ne kakhali Yesu amanya kamebaasio kabwe mala abareeba, ali, “Siina sikila ne mwibaasia kamamayaanu mu miooyo kienywe?
Lilala siina liliangu, khuloma oli, ‘Wabeleelwe bubwoni bwowo’ namwe khuloma oli, ‘Yinyokha okeende’?
Khukhwola mumanye muli, Omwana wo Mundu ali ne bunyali khu sibala bwe khubeela bubwoni,” nio aboolela owafwokoya chana ali, “Yinyokha, bukula sitanda siowo oche engo!”
Nio owafwokoya enyokha acha engo.
Nga babaandu ne babona bario, baria, mala bafumia Wele, khulwe khuaana bunyali nga buno buri khu baandu.
Yesu arekukha khukhwama ao, mala oli alikho abira, abona omundu olaangwa Matayo ekhaale munju nimwo baroseriangamo busuuru, mala Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Nondekho.” Matayo enyokha amuloondakho.
Bafarisayo nga babona bario, bareeba babeeka ba Yesu bali, “Siina sikila omwekisia wenywe nalia ne babaandu nga bano bari?”
Yesu nga aulila ario abakobosia ali, “Baali balamu se beenya omusilikhi tawe, ne kakhali balwale bong'ene.
Cha mwiyike nisio kano kaboola, ‘Nenya siisa se neenya chimbosio tawe?’ Sikila se neecha khulaanga baluungi tawe, ne kakhali neecha khulaanga babooni.”
Nio babeeka ba Yoana Omubatiisi, beecha khu Yesu ne bareeba bali, “Siina sikila efwe ne Bafarisayo ne khweyimaane khulia, ne babeeka bowo se beyimanangakho khulia tawe?”
Yesu naye abakobosia ali, “Bakeni be siselelo banyala khu khweyimana khulia omusoleeli niye baakhiile ne asiili nabo ku? Se kanyalikhana tawe. Ne kakhali chindaalo chiliicha nicho niye baakhiile alibukulilwa khukhwama khu nibo, nio beyimane khulia.
“Se aliio yesi yesi onabila khu ngubo ekhale silaka siyia tawe, sikila silaka esio sikitabula mala kumwanya kwabalaa khukhila nga nebeele.
Namwe endali embia se chukhwa mu oochwa chikhale tawe, ne yaaba ne chukhwamo, chioochwa chitabukha, mala endali yachichukha aasi, ne kakhali endali embia echukhwa mu oochwa chimbia nio bioombi bibiikhwe bulayi.”
Yesu nga ne aba ne aloma kano, omwimeelesi muyaudi eecha niio ali asikama ebweeni wewe aaloma ali, “Omwana wase omukhaana ama khufwa busa ari, yiicha omureekho kamakhono kowo mala alalamukha.”
Yesu enyokha amuloondakho, ne babeeka bewe.
Omukhasi owakhobokhanga khu miiko likhumi na kibili aamila enyuma wa Yesu mala atiila khu likemo lie engubo yewe.
Ebaasia ali, “Natiilakho busa engubo yewe, ndaona.”
Yesu ekhebukha oli amubona aaloma ali, “Luma kumwoyo mukhaana wase! Lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie.” Abwene ne abwene omukhasi oyo aona.
Nga Yesu engila munju yo mwimeelesi chana oyo, abona bakhupi be kimilele, ne babaandu bakali, ne basooma,
aaloma ali, “Rura enje mweesi, sikila omukhaana yuno se aafwiile tawe, alikho akona!” Mala bamuchekha lukali.
Ne kakhali enyuma we babaandu khurusibwa enje, Yesu engila munju amutiila kumukhono mala omukhaana chana oyo enyokha.
Kamakhuwa ke sikholwa siene esio kasalanila mu ngoongo choosi.
Yesu nga aama abwenao eseenda abweeni, babofu babili bamuloondakho, ne baloma bali, “Mwana owa Daudi khukholele siisa!”
Yesu nga engila munju, babofu babili chana abo bamwichakho, mala Yesu abareeba ali, “Musuubila muli ese nyala namuonia enywe?” Bamukobosia bali, “Yee Omwami!”
Nio atiila khu moni chabwe, ne aloma ali, “Lekha kakholekhe khwinywe khuloondekhana ne lisuubila lienywe!”
Mala babona. Yesu abakaania lukali ali, “Mukhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi kano tawe!”
Ne kakhali nga bamao basalanisia efuma yewe mu sibala siene esio sioosi.
Nga babaandu abo baba ne bali khabeecha, babaandu babaandi bamureerera omundu owaanda lulimi sikila aba ne sisieeno.
Ne enyuma we khurusibwamo sisieeno omundu owaanda lulimi oyo aarakikha khulomaloma, mala babaandu bauka, ne baloma bali, “Sisiindu siosi siosi nga sino siri sikhabonekhakho mu Isiraeli tawe!”
Nga abona babaandu bakali, abakholela siisa, sikila baba beendekheleele ne lundi buyeeti mbao, bali busa nga kamakheese kakhali no mwaayi tawe.
Nio aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Likesa lili likali, ne kakhali bakholi bali bakeekhe.
Nono saba Omwami omwene likesa arume bakholi bache mwikesa.”

Yesu aalaanga babeeka bewe likhumi na babili, abaelesia bunyali bwe khu rusia bisieeno ne khuonia bulwaale bwa buli lukano ne butekhele.
Kamasina ke barumwa likhumi na bibili niko kano Omurangirisi, Simoni owalaangwa Petero, ne wandaaye Andereya, Yakobo omwana owa Sebetayo, ne wandaaye Yoana,
Filipo ne Baturimayo, Tomasi ne Matayo omuroosi owe busuuru, Yakobo omwana owa Alufayo, ne Tadayo,
Simoni Omukanaani, ne Yuda Isikarioti, owamuchaama.
Yesu aruma likhumi na babili abo, enje ne abalaka ali, “Mukhacha abuundu osi osi mu Be Chikholo, namwe mwengila mu lukoba lwe Basamaria tawe.
Ne kakhali khemuche khu makheese ka katiba ke nju eya Isiraeli.
Ne mucha yiilwacha muli, ‘Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli siimbi!’
Khemuonie balwaale, mulamusie bafu, muonie be kamakele mala murusie bisieeno. Mwanyoolile busa, aana busa.
Mukhasuta esahabu yosi yosi efwesa, namwe koopa mu mifuuko kienywe tawe;
mukhaba ne kumufuko kwe babaandu babesabiilisia khu lukeendo lwenywe tawe, namwe kamasiati kabili, namwe biraaro namwe esiimbo tawe. Sikila omukholi akhoya anyoole siakhulia siewe.
“Ne mucha mu lukoba namwe mu sirekere siosi siosi reeba yesi yesi naalimo onyala amwakaanila enywe, menya naye nabwila murekukha.
Ne mwingila munju kheesia baalimo muli, ‘kumuleembe kube nanywe.’
Babaandu be munju omwo ne bamwakaanila lekha kumuleembe kwenywe kube nabo, ne bakhamwakaanila tawe cha ne kumuleembe kwenywe.
Kaaba bali yesi yesi se amwakaanila namwe se amuulila, namwe se arekeeresia kamakhuwa kenywe tawe, yeyela abuundu bwenao lutamuusi lwe khu bikele bienywe.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, khu Ndaalo eye likhalaka, Wele alikholela siisa babaandu ba Sodomu ne Komora khukhila babaandu be lukoba lwene olwo!
Khemwiyaye khu baandu, sikila bakhabatiile bamuyaale, lundi bamupile mu masinakooki.
Bakhamukhurure ne bamuyila ebweeni we baruki ne babaami sikila ese, khubelwachila nibo nende Be Chikholo.
Ne bamuchongela enywe, mukheembeelela nga mukhalomalome, namwe niko mukhalome tawe, sikila niko mukhalome kakhaanwe khwinywe siise siene esio.
Se muli enywe mukhalomalome tawe, ne kakhali Roho owa Wele akhalomalomele mwinywe.
Buli mundu alimubiila enywe sikila ese. Ne kakhali oyo oliekhaliilikha khukhwola khu siakamo alionisibwa.
Ne bamupia enywe siibi mu lukoba lulala, yilukhila mu lundi, ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, se mukhamale mu ngoba cha Isiraeli choosi Omwana wo Mundu ne akhecha tawe.
Khwako kanyalikha omweeka khuba nga omwekisia wewe ne omukholi khuba nga omwami wewe. Kaaba bali balangile omwenenju bali Beelisebuli, aba balakhoma bariena bamenyile mu nju yewe!
Niko ese ndamuboolelanga enywe mu siilima mukhoya mukalomele abuwaanga, ne niko muulila ne kalomwa mu bwikisi, mukhoya mukalomele khu bisekese bie nju.
Mukharia babeera kumubili mala bakhilwa khukhwira kumwoyo tawe, ne khali murie Wele, oyo owonaka bioombi, kumwoyo ne kumubili emakoombe.
Opicho bibili se bikulwa limotole? Ne khalalakho se khanyala khakwa aasi Raraawenywe ne akhenyile ario tawe.
Akhaba lichuune lienywe lioosi liabalwa.
Nono mukharia tawe, enywe mukhila opicho bikali!
“Khwako buli mundu oufukiilila ese ebweeni we babaandu sesi ndimufukiilila niye ebweeni wa Paapa oli Mwikulu.
Ne yesi yesi ounjekaana ebweeni we babaandu, sesi ndimwekaana ebweeni wa Paapa oli Mwikulu.
“Mukhebaasia muli nechile khureera kumuleembe khu sibala tawe, se nechile khureera kumuleembe tawe, ne kakhali bulomani.
Ese necha khukhola omundu abiilane ne raraawe, ne omukhaana ne maawe, ne mukho mwana ne masalaawe,
ne basiku bo mundu baliba be nju yewe eng'ene.
“Yesi yesi osiima raraawe namwe maawe khu khukhila ese se olaana khuba omuloondi wase tawe, yesi yesi osiima omwana wewe omusoleeli namwe omukhaana khu khukhila ese se olaana khuba omuloondi wase tawe.
Ne yesi yesi okhabukula kumusalaba kwewe mala anondakho se olaana khuba omuloondi wase tawe.
Yesi yesi okhaka khuonia bulamu bwewe akhabutibie, ne yesi yesi otibia bulamu bwewe sikila ese akhabunyoole.
Yesi yesi owakaanila omung'oosi sikila ali omung'oosi alinyoola kumuruuru kwo mung'oosi, yesi yesi owakaanila omundu omuluungi sikila ali omuluungi alinyoola kumuruuru kwo muluungi.
Lundi yesi yesi oelesia sikoombe sie kameechi kamanyifu mulala khu bakeekhe bano sikila ali omweeka wase, ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, se alitibia kumuruuru kwewe tawe.”

Nga Yesu ne aamala khukhwekisia babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili, arura abuundu ao mala aachiililila khukhwekisia ne khukhwilwacha burume mu ngoba chabwe.
Nga Yoana Omubatiisi ne aulila naali mu siboe niko Kristo aaba ne akhola, aruma babeeka bewe balalakho khu niye.
Bamureeba bali, “Ewe niye oyo owenyibwa khukhwiicha, namwe khulindiilile okundi?”
Ne Yesu abakobosia ali, “Cha muboolele Yoana niko muulile nende niko muboone.
Babofu babona, baleme bakeenda, be kamakele baona, bamiinyi baulila, bafu balamukha, ne babanani belwachilwa Elomo Endayi.
Wele akhabiite chikhabi yesi yesi okhandoba ese sikila niko ekhola tawe.”
Oli baarekukha Yesu arakikha khureeba babaandu khuloondekhana ne Yoana ali, “Mwachiile mu sichiimi nimwo Yoana abechanga khubona siina? Lubembe nilwo ekhuungu euucha?
Nono siina sisiakila mwachayo? Khubona omundu owefwarire chingubo chindayi ku? Abo babefwara chingubo che bukusi bukali bali mu machipi ke babaami!
