Nono siina sisiakila mwachayo? Khubona omung'oosi? Yee ng'ali, ne kakhali mwabona okhila omung'oosi.
Yuno niye kaandikwakho ne kaboola kali,
‘Ndaruma omurumwa wase ebweeni wowo,
mala akharekekhe engila ebweeni wowo.’
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, Yoana omubatiisi akhila babaandu boosi ba baamenya khu sibala khuno, ne kakhali oyo ooli omukeekhe lukali mu Bwami bwe mwikulu akhila Yoana.
Khukhwama siise nisio Yoana elwacha burume bwewe khukhwola luno, bubwami bwe mwikulu bunyoolekhana mu maani ne be kamaani babunyoola
Khukhwola khu siise sia Yoana bang'oosi boosi ne Lilaka lia Musa bang'oola khu Bwami bwe mwikulu,
nono, mwaba ne mwenya khusuubila burume bwabwe, Yoana niye Elicha, niye bang'oola bali akheeche.
Oyo oli ne kamaru aulile!
“Nono ndekhaasia eselukho yino khu siindu siina? Eselukho yino eli nga babaana babekhaale khu soko ne balaanga nibo benyaanga nabo bali,
‘Khwamupila kimilele ne se mwakhina tawe! Khwemba kimienya kie kamasika ne se mwalila tawe!’
Nga Yoana ne echa, eyimana khulia ne se anywakho endali tawe, baloma bali, ‘Ali ne sisieeno!’
Omwana wo Mundu echa, aalia ne khunywa, baloma bali, ‘Lola omundu yuno! Ali owe lulie ne kimeesi, omusaale we baroosia busuuru ne babooni!’ Kakhaba kario, limanya lia Wele limanyikhana khuba liang'ali khubirira mu matuunda kayo.
“Mala Yesu arakikha khukhwikiicha chingoba nicho akholamo kamayia kewe, sikila babaandu se bekanila tawe.
Be Lukoba lwa Korasini muli ne silaamo, be lukoba lwa Betesaita muli ne silaamo, sikila abanga kamayia kakakholwa mwinywe niko kakakhola mu baandu bamwo Tiro ne Sidoni andi befwara khale kamakunia, ne khukhweakha likokhe khukhwekesia liliekanila liabwe.
Ne kakhali muboolela enywe, khu Ndaalo eye Likhalaka Wele alikholela siisa sikali khu baandu ba Tiro ne Sidoni khukhila enywe!
Ne ewe, Kaperinaumu! Wenyile weniinie wole khwikulu ku? Kane wikhisibwe wole emakoombe, sikila abanga kamayia kakekholekha mwinywe ako, niko kakekholekha mu lukoba lwa Sodomu, andi lusiiliio khukhwola endaalo yino!
Mumanye muli khu ndaalo eye likhalaka Wele alikholela Sodomu siisa sikali khukhila enywe!”
Siise esio Yesu aloma ali, “Paapa, Omwami owe mwikulu ne sibala ese khupila orio sikila ewe wakisa bakesi nende be limanya bibiindu bino, mala wabibuula khu bakhaasoma tawe.
Yee, Paapa, wasiima oli kakholekhe kario.
“Yiicha khwise, enywe mweesi muluile sikila khusuta bisiro, mala ese ndamuulusia enywe.
Khe mwireekho lichooki liase, mala mweyike khukhwama khwise, sikila ese ndi omuolu, lundi omukoosi mumwoyo, nanywe mulanyoola siiuluukho.
Sikila lichooki liase se lili litinyu khusuta tawe? Ne busiro bwase buli bubwangu.”

Ne nga Bafarisayo babona bario, baboolela Yesu bali, “Lola, babeeka bowo balikho bakhola sikhali sie lilaka khukhola khu ndaalo eye Sabato tawe.”
Niye ne babaandu bewe bengila munju eya Wele ne khulia kimikaati kikiaanwa khu Wele, akhaba lilaka ne likhabafukiilila nibo khukilia tawe. Basaayi bong'ene nibo ba bafukiililwa khulia?
Namwe mukhasomakho Mwilaka lia Musa nga buli ndaalo eya sabato basaayi mu Lukaangu bafunanga lilaka mala se babukulwa nga bafunile Lilaka tawe ku?
Ese muboolela enywe, sisiindu sili ano siboofu sikhila Lukaangu.
Lundi abanga enywe mwamanya niko kano kaboola, kali, ‘Nenya siisa se nenya chimbosio tawe,’ andi se mwakhalakila abo bakhafunile Lilaka tawe.
Sikila Omwana wo Mundu ali Omwami we Sabato.”
Yesu ama ebweeneyo acha mu sinakooki mwabwe,
nibwo omundu owafwokoya kumukhono aaba. Babaandu balala bareeba Yesu bali, “Lilaka liefwe lifukiilila khuonia omundu khu ndaalo eye Sabato ku?” Bareeba bario nio banyoole sifuno sie khuloma bali afunile Lilaka.
Omundu akhila likheese! Khwako lilaka liefwe likhufukiilila khuyeeta omundu khu ndaalo eye Sabato.”
Nio aboolela omundu owafwokoya kumukhono chana oyo ali, “Kololosia kumukhono kwowo!” Omundu oyo aakukololosia mala kwaona kwaba nga kukuundi.
Nio Bafarisayo barekukha bacha, mala bakhola ekwangwaani eye khukhwira Yesu.
Nga Yesu aulila ke kwangwaani eyo, arura ebweeneyo mala babaandu bakali bamuloondakho. Aonia balwaale boosi,
ne khubaboolela ali mukhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi khuloondekhana ne nase tawe.
Aakhola ario nio niko Wele alomela mu mung'oosi Isaya kechusibwe.
lundi ousiimisia lukali.
Ndamurakho Roho wase,
ne aliboolela Be Chikholo likhalaka liase.
Se aliyingana namwe ayokele tawe,
namwe alomalome lukali khu ngila tawe.
Aliba omuolu khwaabo baali batekhele,
lundi owe siisa khwaabo bakhanyoola buyeeti tawe.
Aliba ne sinani nabwila alikhola bung'ali bube ne bukhili,
ne chikholo choosi chiliba ne lilieyikina mu niye.”
Nio bareerera Yesu omubofu lundi owaanda lulimi sikila aba ne sisieeno, Yesu amuonia. Omundu oyo alomaloma, lundi abona.
Babaandu boosi bauka niko Yesu aaba nakholile ne bareebana bali, “Ng'ali yuno Omwana owa Daudi ku?”
Yesu amanya kamebaasio kabwe, nio ababoolela ali, “Bubwami bwosi bwosi bukabukhana mala bwapana bubwene khu bubwene se bubaao siise sileeyi tawe, lundi mbao lukoba luboofu namwe enju ekabukhana yapana eng'ene khu ng'ene enyala yaiindila tawe.
Ne liaba bali Sietani arusia Sietani aba akabukhanemo omwene, aba bubwami bwewe buleema buriena?”
Lundi liaba bali ese ndusia bisieeno mu maani ka Beelisebuli, aba babaana benywe babirusia enje mu maani ka naanu? Khwako nibo baliba bakhalaki benywe.
Ne kakhali ese naaba ne ndusia bisieeno mu maani ka Roho owa Wele, aba bubwami bwa Wele bwamwoleele enywe.
“Namwe omundu engila ariena munju yo mundu owe kamaani mala amunuula bibiindu biewe, nakhanyoile aboa omundu owe kamaani oyo nio? Amunuula bibiindu ne amalile khumuboa.
Khwako ese muboolela enywe ndi, babaandu banyala babeelwa buli bwoni ne embelekeu yabwe, ne kakhali okholela Roho Omutakatifu embelekeu se alibeelwa tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi oolomaloma likhuwa liibi khu Mwana wo Mundu anyala abeelwa, ne yesi yesi oolomaloma likhuwa liibi khu Roho Omutakatifu se alibeelwa siise sino namwe sisiicha tawe.
Enywe baana ba nafwo, munyala muriena mwaloma kamalayi ne muli bamayaanu? Sikila kumunwa kulomanga kamakali kaali mu mwoyo.
Omundu omulayi amia kamalayi mu mwoyo kwewe kumulayi, ne omundu omumayaanu amia kamamayaanu mu mwoyo kwewe kumumayaanu
“Ese muboolela enywe, khu ndaalo eye likhalaka buli mundu aliyaalwa sikila buli elomo niyo aloma.
Mulikhalaka olibalwa khuba omuluungi namwe omwoni sikila chilomo chowo.”
Sikila nga Yona aba munda mwe ng'eeni emboofu chindaalo chitaru siilo ne kumuusi, akhaba Omwana wo Mundu yesi aliba mwiloba chindaalo chitaru siilo ne kumuusi.
Khu ndaalo eye likhalaka babaandu ba Ninefe baliicha basitake eselukho yino, sikila nga Yona ne elwacha nibo bakaluukhana, ne sisiindu sikhilakho Yona sili ano!
Khu ndaalo eye likhalaka Kwini owa Sheba Siafubo aliicha asitake eselukho yino, ne khukikhalakila, sikila echa khukhwama khu siakamo sie sibala sino khuulila liliekisia lie limanya lio mwami Solomoni, ne sisiindu sikhilakho omwami Solomoni sili ano!
“Sisieeno ne sirurire mu mundu, sibirira a siangalaamwe, ne siyiima niio siiolela. Oli se sinyoola tawe,
ne siloma sili, ‘Ndakobola munju yase nimwo naama!’ Oli sikobola sinyoola eli busa, mala enjeye, lundi yang'oonile.
Nio sicha sireera bibiindi saba biili biibi khusikhilakho nisio, mala bingisia mu bweene omwo bimenyamo. Ne liiba lio omundu oyo liba libi khukhilakho mataayi. Kaliba kario khu selukho eya luno emayaanu.”
Siise esio Yesu nasilomaloma ne babaandu, maawe ne bawandaaye ba Yesu becha bema enje ne benya khulomaloma naye.
Omundu mulala aboolela Yesu ali, “Maao ne bawandaayo bemile enje, balikho benya khulomaloma nawe.”
Yesu akobosia omundu owamuboolela oyo ali, “Maayi niye naanu, ne bawandaayase nibo naanu?”
Nio ekesia babeeka bewe aloma ali, “Lola! Maayi ne bawandaayase nibo bano!
Yesi yesi okhola niko Paapa oli mwikulu enya, niye wandaayase omusoleeli, wandayaase omukhaana lundi maayi wase.”

Endaalo eyo ne eng'ene Yesu arura munju ekhala anyanja khukhwekisia.
Mala babaandu bakali bamwibusiao, bakila engila mu liaaro ekhalamo ne babaandu abo nabo bema khu sikiingi.
Yesu ababoolela bibiindu bikali mu ngano ne aloma ali:
“Omumiichi arura khucha khumiicha.
Nga aba namiicha bumiicho bulala bwakwa khu ngila, mala chinyuni checha chabuboocha.
Bubuundi bwakwa khu lwanda lukhalikho liloba likali tawe khwako bwarubura khangu.
Ne nga enyanga yarura kumuumu kwabwosia bwaniaala mala bwoma sikila bwaba bukhekhisia chiisi aasi tawe.
Bumiicho bubuundi bwakwa mu mawa, mala eng'eneeni eye kamawa yakila bwafwa.
Bumiicho bubuundi bwakwa mwiloba lilayi, bwaama bibiaamo, bulala khukhwola emia, bubuundi kamakhumi sita, bubuundi kamakhumi kataru.”
Yesu amaliilisia ali, “Ooli ne kamaru, aulile!”
Nio babeeka beecha bamureeba bali, “Siina sikila ne orumikhira chingano khulomaloma khu baandu?”
Abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwaelesebwa bubweyaangu bwe khumanya ke bubwami bwe mwikulu kakakiswa ne nibo tawe.
Oli nabio alaebwa bibiindi bikali, ne okhali nabio tawe, alanuulwa akhaba sitiiti nisio ali nasio.
Kano niko kakila ne ndoma nabo mu ngano, sikila khulola balola ne se babona tawe, lundi barekeeresia ne se baulila tawe, namwe se bamanya tawe.
Khu nibo kaba kario nio kechusibwe niko omung'oosi Isaya aaloma ali,
‘Mukharekeeresie ne se mukhaulile tawe,
mukhalole ne se mukhabone tawe.
Sikila kimiooyo kiabwe kimilume,
ne kamaru kabwe kaminyaalile,
ne chimoni chabwe chabofuule.
Busa andi baboone,
lundi andi bauliile,
ne khumanyilisia mu miooyo kiabwe,
mala bangobolela ese mbaonie.’
Ese muboolela enywe bung'ali, bang'oosi ne babaandu baluungi be khaale bakali bekoombanga khubona niko mubona kano, lundi khuulila niko muulila kano mala se bakaulila tawe.
“Rekeeresia mala mumanye sifuno sie lukano lwo mumiichi.
Yesi yesi oulila Elomo eye Bubwami bwe nwikulu ne se akimanya tawe, ali nga bumiicho bubwakwa khu ngila. Omumayaanu echaanga mala abukula kabialiilwe mu niye.
Ne bubwamiichwa mwiloba lie khu mabaale, buli nga oyo oulila Elomo akifukiilila bwangu ne liliekhoya.
Ne kakhali se akitiila tawe, elumilisiakho khulwe siise sitiiti, oli siibi ne butinyu bibao sikila Elomo eyo, ne bwangu akilekhuula.
Ne bubwamiichwa mu mawa buli nga abo baulila Elomo, ne kakhali bibiindu bie sibala ne khusiima buiinda biira Elomo eyo, mala se saala kamatuunda tawe.
Ne bubwamiichwa mu maloba kamalayi buli abo baulila Elomo bakimanya, basaala kamatuunda, balala emia ndala, babaandi kamakhumi sita ne babaandi kamakhumi kataru.”
Yesu ababoolela lukano luluundi ali, “Bubwami bwe mwikulu bunyala khufwaananisibwa khu mundu owamiicha bumiicho bulayi mu mukuunda kwewe.
Ne kakhali babaandu baba oli bakona, omusiku wewe echa amiicha libaye mu ngaanu, mala arekukha.
Khwako engaanu nga yamela oli eraakho, libaye chana liamanyikhana.
Bakholi bewe becha bamuboolela bali, ‘Omwami, ewe se wamiicha bumiicho bulayi mu mukuunda kwowo? Nono libaye nalio liamile waena?’
Abakobosia ali, ‘Omusiku niye okholile kano.’ Bakholi bamureeba bali, ‘Nono wenya khuche khulikhuule?’
Naye abakobosia ali, ‘Tawe, mukhola murio oli mulikhuula mwakhuulilamo engaanu.
Lekha bioombi bichoele alala khukhwola mwikesa, ndilaka bakesa ndi, nyoa mukhuule libaye muliboe mu bikala muliosie mala mukese engaanu mala mu kibuunge mu sirara siase.’ ”
Yesu ababoolela lukano luluundi ali, “Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli nga khamiicho khe kumupeeli nikho omundu abukula amiicha mu mukuunda kwewe.
Khali khakeekhe khukhila bumiicho bubuundi bwoosi, ne kakhali ne khakhulile khaba kumurongooro kumuboofu mu kioosi nikwo chinyuni chiicha ne chombakha biswi khu sakia chakwo.”
Yesu aabakanila lukano luluundi: “Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli nga limela nilio omukhasi abukula ne apaakhila mu bipanga bitaru bie bufu nabwila bwoosi buyiimba.”
Yesu aaboolela babaandu kano koosi mu ngano, se ababoolelakho sisiindu siosi siosi nekhali khubirira mu ngano tawe.
Aakhola ario nio niko omung'oosi aaloma kechusibwe.
“Ndilomaloma nabo mu ngano.
Ndiboola kakakiswa khukhwama nga sibala ne siabaang'anwa.”
Nga Yesu arura mu baandu engila munju, babeeka bewe bacha niio ali bamuboolela bali, “Khwinooselie lukano lwe libaye mu mukuunda nga luboola.”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Omiicha bumiicho bulayi ali Omwana wo Mundu;
sibala nisio kumukuunda, ne bumiicho bulayi nibwo babaandu be Bubwami; libaye lili babaandu bo Mumayaanu,
ne omusiku owabumiicha ali Sietani. Likesa lili Siieli sie sibala, ne bakesa bali malaika.
Nga libaye libuusibwa ne khukhwosebwa mu mulilo, kaliba kario mu siieli sie sibala.
Omwana wo Mundu aliruma malaika bewe mala babuusie khukhwama mu Bwami bwewe abo boosi batiimia babaandu khukhola bubwoni ne babaandi boosi bakhola bumayaanu,
mala bakhabamwaate mu sioso sie kumulilo, mu bwene omwo babaandu balilila ne khukhwelumakaka.
Nio baluungi balikhosia nga enyanga mu Bwami bwa Raarawabwe. Oli ne kamaru, aulile!
“Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli nga libiikhilo liliakisibwa mu mukuunda, nilio omundu anyoola elilisia mala mu khoyo yewe acha akusia bioosi nibio ali nabio, aakula kumukuunda mwene okwo.
“Lundi Bubwami bwe Mwikulu buli nga omwofuli, oenja chisiimbi chindayi.
Oli anyoola esiimbi ndala eye bukusi bukali, ne acha akusia bioosi nibio ali nabio mala akikule.
“Lundi Bubwami bwe Mwikulu buli nga lutiimba lulwamwaatwa mu nyanja mala lwabuusia ching'eeni buli lukano lwoosi.
Nga lwechula, babaandu balukhwesa balura khu sikiingi, bekhala aasi, mala bangalamo chindayi bachira mu bikono mala bamwaata chimbi.
Kaliba kario mu siieli sie sibala, malaika baliicha baukhasie babooni khukhwama mu baluungi,
mala bamwaate babooni mu sioso sie kumulilo, mu bwene omwo balilila ne khukhwelumakaka.”
Yesu abareeba ali, “Mwamanyile kano koosi ku?” Bamukobosia bali, “Yee.”
Nio ababoolela ali, “Khwako omuandiki we Lilaka yesi yesi owekisiibwe khulwe Bubwami bwe mwikulu ali nga, omwene mungo obukula khukhwama mwibiikhilo liewe, bibiindu biyia ne bikhale.”
Yesu nga ne amala chingano chino, arura ebweeneyo
akobola mu lukoba lwe wabwe. Ekisia mu sinakooki mwabwe mala babamurekeeresia bauka, baloma bali, “Omundu yuno amia waena bukesi ne kamayia kano?
Yuno se ali omwana owo omundu ong'oonanga bibiindu bie chimbao? Maawe se ali Maria? Lundi bawandaaye se bali Yakobo, Yosefu, Simoni ne Yuda?
Ne bakooko bewe boosi se bamenyile ano? Nono niye amia waena kano koosi?”
Bamubonela niye bubi. Ne Yesu ababoolela ali, “Omung'oosi se ali ne fuma mu sibala siewe ne munju yewe omwene tawe.”
Mala se akhola kamayia kamakali ebweeneyo tawe, sikila khutaamba lisuubila khwabwe.

Mu siise siene esio Herodi omuruki owa Kalilaya aulila efuma eya Yesu.
Aboolela babemeelesi ba baaba aasi wewe ali, “Yuno ali Yoana Omubatiisi asiukhile khukhwama mu bafu, aka niko kakila nakhola kamayia kano.”
Sikila Yoana amuboolela ali, “Lilaka se likhufukiilila ewe khukhwila khu Herotia tawe.”
Herodi enya khukhwira Yoana, ne kakhali aria babaandu, sikila bamanya bali Yoana aaba omung'oosi.
Nga endaalo eye khukhebulila khusaalwa khwa Herodi ne yoola, omwana owa Herotia omukhaana akhinila sisiikhasio, mala asiimisia Herodi lukali.
Khwako Herodi amulaka ne khu mwichubila ali alamuelesia siosi siosi nisio enya.
Nio Herotia aachilisia omwana ali loma oli, “Mbelesie kumurwe kwa Yoana Omubatiisi khu lutelu siise sino!”
Ne kakhali sikila aaba echubile ebweeni we bakeni bewe, alakiilisia ali bamuelesie.
Nio arumania munju eye baboe bakhala Yoana kumurwe.
Mala bareera kumurwe kwewe khu lutelu baelesia omukhaana oyo, naye ayilila maawe.
Babeeka ba Yoana becha babukula kumubili kwewe mala basiikha mala bacha baboolela Yesu.
Nga Yesu ne aulila kano, engila mu liaaro arura ebweeneyo acha abuundu niio babaandu bakhaba tawe aaba ebweeneyo yeng'ene. Nga babaandu bakali ne baulila, bama mu ngoba chabwe bamuloondakho khu bikele.
Oli eema khu sikiingi abona babaandu bakali mala abakholela siisa, aonia ba baaba balwaale.
Oli ekolooba, babeeka bewe bamwichakho baloma bali, “abuundu ano ali mu sichiimi, ne enje bwelabuule. Sibula babaandu bache mu birekere bakule biakhulia balie.”
Yesu aloma ali, “Bakhenaana khucha tawe, enywe baelesie siakhulia balie!”
Babeeka bewe bamuboolela bali, “Ano khuli ne kimikaati kiraano kiong'ene ne ching'eeni chibili.”
Ababoolela ali, “Bireere ano.”
Nio aboolela babaandu abo khukhwikhala aasi khu bunyaasi mala abukula kimikaati kiraano ekio ne ching'eeni chibili echo alola mu ngaaki apila Wele orio. Akimesula aelesia babeeka, mala babeeka bakaba babaandu.
Babaandu boosi balia bekura. Nio babeeka babuusia bitonyi bie kimikaati bibiarama mala biechula bikono ekhumi na bibili.
Ne babakilia baba babaandu chielefu chiraano be siseecha bong'ene nokhabaliilekho bakhasi ne babaana tawe.
Nio aboolela babeeka bengile mu liaaro banyoe bambukhe enyanja bache ebweeni wewe niye omwene nasisibula babaandu khurekukha.
Enyuma we khusibula babaandu acha mu sikulu yeng'ene khusaba mala bwelabulilayo.
Ne mu siise sieneesio liliaaro liaba aleeyi khukhwama khu sikiingi, ekhuungu yaba engali yakila bibuli bie kameechi bialitengaasia.
Mu makhelebeende Yesu echa niio babeeka bali, ne alikho akeenda khu meechi.
Ne babeeka nga bamubona nakeenda khu meechi buuri bwabaamba. Mala bakukuula bali, “Simakoombe nisio!”
Nio oli bakhasila tawe, Yesu ababoolela ali, “Niise nyindaalila, mukhaba ne buuri tawe.”
Nio Petero amukobosia ali, “Omwami, waba ne oli ewe loma sesi ngende khu meechi niche niio oli ao.”
Yesu aloma ali, “Yiicha.” Nio Petero arura mu liaaro akeenda khu meechi acha niio Yesu ali.
Ne nga Petero abona ekhuungu, aria, mala arakikha khukhwisiikha. Nio alila ali, “Omwami mbonie!”
Oli akhasila tawe, Yesu enaa aamutiila mala aloma ali, “Omundu we lisuubila likeekhe! Siina sikila ne okhali ne lisuubila?”
Nga bengila mu liaaro, ne ekhuungu eyenjeela.
Babeeka ba baaba mu liaaro basaaya Yesu, ne baloma bali, “Ng'ali khane ewe oli Omwana owa Wele.”
Nga baba ne bambuukhe enyanja, boola mu sibala sia Kenesareti,
ne nga babaandu be bweneyo bamanya bali niye, barumania bareere balwaale khukhwama mu ngoongo che eyo choosi khu Yesu.
Bamwikoonjelela bali balwaale batilekho khwikemo lie ngubo yewe; ne buli owatiilakho aona.

Bafarisayo ne baandiki be Lilaka bama Yerusalemu becha khu Yesu bamureeba bali,
“Siina sikila babeeka bowo ne bonaka kimiima kie sikuuka? Sikila nibo se basaabanga kamakhono nio balia tawe.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Siina sikila nanywe ne mukharia Lilaka lia Wele mala muloonda kamekisio kenywe?
Sikila Wele alaka ali, ‘Ria raraao ne maao’, lundi, ‘Oyo okholela raraawe namwe maawe embelekeu akhoya eerwe.’
Ne enywe muloma muli, ‘Kaaba bali omwana yesi yesi aboolela raraawe namwe maawe ali, sisiindu nisio akhoyeele abayeete aelesie Wele, aba se enaana khubaria tawe.’
Khwako, sikila kumwiima kwenywe, mwakhola Elomo eya Wele khuba sisiindu busa.
Babacha enywe! Isaya ang'oola abwene khwinywe, nga ne aloma ali:
ne kimiooyo kiabwe kili aleeyi khukhwama khwise.
Bakhola ka busa khu khusaaya ese,
bekisia kamalaka ke babaandu busa bali kakaase khana tawe.’ ”
Yesu alaanga babaandu becha mala ababoolela ali, “Ulila lundi mumanye,
se sili siicha mukhanwa sinyaalutia omundu tawe, ne kakhali sisiamamo.”
Nio babeeka bewe becha bamureeba bali, “Ewe omanyile oli Bafarisayo baboone bubi nga baulile niko olomile?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Buli simelwa nisio Paapa wase owe mwikulu akhabiaala tawe, silisiuulwa.
Balekhe babe, nibo bali barangirisi babofu. Kaaba bali omubofu arangirira omubofu wasie, boombi balakwa mwiloo.”
Ne kakhali Petero amuboolela ali, “Khwinooselie lusimo luno.”
Nio Yesu areeba ali, “Akhaba enywe musiili busa mukhamanya tawe?
Se mubona muli siosi siosi siicha mukhanwa sioola munda, lundi sirura mu mubili tawe ku?
Ne kakhali sirura mukhanwa siama mu mwoyo, mala sino sikhola omundu aaba omunyaalu.
Sikila mu mwoyo kamamo kamebaasio kamabi, bubwiri, bukhobani, bueeyi, bubwifwi, khurusia buloli bwe bubeeyi ne khukiikha.
Bino nibio binyaalutia omundu khuloondekhana ne Lilaka, ne khulekha khusaaba kamakhono se khunyaalutia omundu tawe.”
Yesu arura ebweeneyo acha mu sibala sia Tiro ne Sidoni.
Nio omukhasi Omukanaani owe mu sibala siene esio aulukha arakikha khukhwekoonjelela Yesu ali, “Kholele siisa! Omwami, Mwana owa Daudi, omwana wase omukhaana ali ne sisieeno sirafu.”
Ne Yesu se amukobosiakho tawe. Babeeka bewe becha bekoonjelela Yesu ne baloma bali, “Muboolele arekukhe ache eyo, sikila alikho akhuloondelela nalila.”
Yesu aloma ali, “Ese narumwa khu makheese kakatiba kong'ene, babaandu ba Isiraeli.”
Ne kakhali omukhasi chana eecha asikama ebweeni wewe aloma ali, “Omwami njeete.”
Nio Yesu aaloma ali, “Se buli buluungi khubukula kumukaati kwe babaana ne khu mwaatila chimbwa tawe.”
Omukhasi chana aloma ali, “Ako ka ng'ali, Omwami, ne kakhaba kario chimbwa chana echo chilia bimesu bikwa khukhwama khu mesa che babeenecho.”
Nio Yesu amukobosia ali, “Mukhasi ewe, lisuubila liowo lili likali po! Kho kholelwe nga wenyile.” Ne omukhaana wewe aona abwene na bwene.
Yesu aarura ebweeneyo aacha aabirira anyanja eya Kalilaya. Aniina khu sikulu, ekhala aasi.
Babaandu bakali bamwichakho, ne bamureerera ba balemala, ba bakataala, babofu, ba baanda chinimi ne khureera balwaale babaandi bakali ebweeni wewe; Yesu abaonia.
Nabwila babaandu bauka, nga babona ba baanda chinimi ne balomaloma, ba balemala ne bakeenda, lundi babofu ne babona. Nio baelesia Wele owa Isiraeli luyali.
Nio Yesu aalanga babeeka bewe aloma ali, “Ndikho kholela sipupu siisa, sikila khukhwola luno babeele nase chindaalo chitaru, ne se bali na siosi nisio balia tawe, ne se nenya mbaboolele bache ne enjala tawe. Bakhola bario bakwa khu ngila.”
Babeeka bewe bamureeba bali, “Mu siangalaamwe sisioomu sino efwe khwamia waena kimikaati kikiola khuliisia sipupu siboofu siri?”
Yesu aabareeba ali, “Muli ne kimikaati kinga?” Baloma bali, “Kimikaati saba ne ching'eeni chindiiti ngekhe chiri.”
Aaboolela sipupu khukhwikhala aasi mu maloba.
Aabukula kimikaati saba ne ching'eeni, aapa orio aakimesula aelesia babeeka, mala babeeka nabo bakaba bipupu.
Boosi balia, bekura; mala babuusia bimesu bibiaramirakho biechula bikono saba.
Abo babalia baba chielefu chine, nokhabaliilekho bakhasi ne babaana tawe.
Yesu aasibula babaandu khucha, ne omwene aniina mu liaaro aacha mu sibala sia Makadani.

Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Biise bie ekolooba, muloma muli, ‘Enje yalengaalile; sikila likulu liabeseeme.’
Ne oli kumutikhinyi muli, ‘Luno efula eye embembeesi elakwa, sikila likulu liabeseeme, lundi liriisia.’ Mwamanyilisia niko efwaani eye likulu yekesia, ne se mumanyile kamayia ke siise sino tawe!
Eselukho emayaanu, ekharia Wele, yenya kamayia. Ne kamayia se kalikhoo ne kakhali ka Yona tawe.” Khwako abalekha acha.
Babeeka nga boola engelekha baba bebiliile khusuta kimikaati.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Mulole bulayi lundi mumanye khukhweliinda khukhwama khu limela lie Bafarisayo ne Basatukayo.”
Nio baloma bali, “Aloma kano sikila se khusutilekho kumukaati kwosi kwosi tawe.”
Ne kakhali Yesu amanya niko balikho, abareeba ali, “Enywe baandu be lisuubila litiiti, siina sikila ne mulomaloma muli se mulikho ne kumukaati tawe?
Mukhamanyanga tawe? Se mukhebulila kimikaati kiraano nikio namesulemo kialiisia babaandu chielefu chiraano tawe? Ne mwabuusiisie bimesu bikono biinga?
Ne kimikaati saba khu baandu chielefu chine nakio? Ne mwabuusiisie bimesu bikono biinga?
Kanyalikha kariena enywe khukhilwa khumanya muli se nalomanga ke kumukaati tawe? Yeliinda khukhwama khu mamela ke Bafarisayo ne Basatukayo.”
Nio bamanya bali se ababoolela khukhwiyaya khukhwama khu mamela ke kumukaati tawe, ne kakhali khukhwama khu mekisio ke Bafarisayo ne Basatukayo.
Yesu oola mu sibala sia Kaesarea-filipi aareeba babeeka bewe ali, “Babaandu baloma bali Omwana wo Mundu ali naanu?”
Aabareeba ali, “Ne enywe muloma muli ese ndi naanu?”
Simoni Petero aakobosia ali, “Ewe niwe Kristo, Omwana owa Wele omenyile mindali.”
Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Oli ne khabi ewe, Simoni okhwa Yona! Sikila omundu se akhubuuliile kano tawe, nakhali Paapa wase oli mwikulu.
Khwako Petero ese khuboolela, ewe oli lulwanda, khu lwanda luno ndiombakhakho e kanisa yase, mala bunyali bwe lifwa se buli kiula tawe.
Ndikhuelesia chifunguo che bubwami bwe mwikulu, ne siosi siosi nisio okaania khu sibala sikanisibwa mwikulu, lundi siosi siosi nisio ofukiilila khu sibala sifukiililwa mwikulu.”
Nio Yesu akaania babeeka lukali ali bakhaboolela omundu yesi yesi bali ali Kristo tawe.
Khukhwamila siise sienesio Yesu aarakikha khuboolela babeeka bewe abuwaanga ali, “Khukhwola ese nje e Yerusalemu mala khupwe siibi lukali khukhwama khu bemeelesi, basaayi bakhulu ne babekisia be Lilaka. Kheerwe, ne kakhali enyuma we chindaalo chitaru khalamukhe.”
Nio Petero amulaanga alubeka arakikha khumurafwira, naloma ali, “Omwami, Wele akhiingilile kano! Kano se kalikholekhakho khwiwe tawe!”
Ne Yesu ayuukha mala aboolela Petero ali, “Sietani, kobola enyuma wase! Sikila kamebaasio kowo kano se kaama khu Wele tawe kaama khu mundu busa.”
Lundi yesi yesi owenya khuonia bulamu bwewe alibutibia, ne yesi yesi otibia bulamu bwewe sikila ese alibunyoola.
Omundu anyoola bukhala siina, aaba bali anyoola sibala sioosi mala atibie bulamu bwewe? Se anyoolamo siindu tawe! Se siliio nisio anyala aana khunyoola bulamu bwewe lundi tawe.
Omwana wo Mundu akheeche ne malaika bewe mu luyali lwa Raraawe, mala aruunge buli mundu khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biewe.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, bali ano balala se bakhachanjamekho lifwa ne bakhaabona Omwana wo Mundu ne echa mu Bwami bwewe tawe.”

Nga yaba ne baloleleele lukoondo lwa Yesu lwakaluukhana, mumoni mwewe mwakhosia nga enyanga, lundi chingubo chewe chawangia cherereere.
Nio babeeka chana babona Musa ne Elicha ne balomaloma ne Yesu.
Khwako Petero asuta kumunwa aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami buli bulayi efwe khuba ano, nosiima, lekha nombakhe ano kamaeema kataru, lilala liliowo, liliindi lia Musa ne liliindi lia Elicha.”
Babeeka nga baulila kano, bakwa mafumala, lundi buuri bukali bwabaamba.
Ne kakhali Yesu echa abatilakho, ababoolela ali, “Yinyokha, ne mukhaba ne buuri tawe.”
Nga basuta chimoni chabwe, se babona omundu yesi yesi tawe, nakhali Yesu yeng'ene.
Oli basungukha khukhwama khu sikulu, Yesu abakaania ali, “Mukhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi kaamalola kano tawe nabwila Omwana wo Mundu enyokha khukhwama mu bafu.”
Yesu aakobosia ali, “Elicha akhanyoe eeche, mala akharekekhe buli siindu.
Ne ese muboolela ndi Elicha echa khaale, ne se bamumanya tawe, mala bamukholela lilienya liabwe babeene. Nio akhaba Omwana wo Mundu yesi akhaapwe siibi ario mu makhono kabwe.”
Nio babeeka bamanyila elala bali alababoolelanga ka Yoana Omubatiisi.
Nga bakobola niio babaandu baaba omundu echa khu Yesu asikama ebweeni wewe,
mala aloma ali, “Omwami kholela siisa omusoleeli wase, sikila ali ne chiteleng'i lundi achuunwa burafu, buli busiele akwa mu mulilo ne mu meechi.
Mureerire khu beeka bowo, mala se banyalile khumuonia tawe.”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Enywe eselukho ekhali ne lisuubila tawe, lundi eyonekha, ndaba nanywe khukhwola liina? Ndamwikhaliilikha enywe khukhwola liina? Reera omusoleeli chana ano!”
Yesu arafwira sisieeno esio mala siamururamo ne omwana aona abwene na abwene.
Nio babeeka becha khu Yesu mu bwikisi bamureeba bali, “Siina sikila efwe ne khukhasirusiisie?”
Sisieeno lukano luno se sinyala siarura ne mukhasabile ne khukhweyimana khulia tawe.]”
Nga baba ne bebuusiisie mu Kalilaya, Yesu ababoolela ali, “Omwana wo Mundu ali siimbi khurebwa mu makhono ke babaandu,
mala bamwiire, ne enyuma we chindaalo chitaru akhalamukhe.”
Nio babeeka babiililwa lukali.
Petero abakobosia ali, “Yee.” Nga Petero engila munju, Yesu anyoa aalomaloma naye, amureeba ali, “Wibaasia siina, Simoni? Babaami be sibala baroosia busuuru khukhwama khu naanu? Khukhwama khu baana be sibala siabwe namwe khu bakeni.”
Petero akobosia ali, “Khukhwama khu bakeni.” Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nono kaaba kario aba babaandu be sibala esio bali balekhuule.
Ne kakhali khulekha khubaambia lirima, cha khu nyanja mala omwaatemo kumulobo, olobe eng'eeni enyoa khukhwicha khu mulobo, wasamie kumunwa kwayo, kene onyoolemo chirupia chicholaana khuruunga busuuru bwe Lukaangu. Bukula ching'enecho obaelesie nga busuuru bwase ne bubwowo.”

Yesu alanga omwana, amwimia akari wabwe,
mala aaloma ali, “Muboolela bung'ali, ne mukhakaluukhana mwaba nga babaana, se mulingilakho mu Bwami bwe mwikulu tawe.
Yesi yesi oweboombia aaba nga omwana yuno, niye oli omukali mu Bwami bwe mwikulu.
Yesi yesi owakaanila omwana mulala nga yuno ari, mwisina liase aba anjakaniile ese.
“Ne yesi yesi okila mulala khu batiiti babasuubila ese bano bakhola bubwoni, buli bulayi khukhila khu niye khurwa lususi luboofu mwikosi mwewe ne khusiikhwa mu lusiba lwe nyanja.
Silaamo sili khu sibala sikila kamakhako ke khukhola bubwoni! Khukhwola kamakhako kabeo, ne kakhali omundu oreera kamakhako ako ali ne silaamo.
Lundi kaaba bali emoni yowo ekila wakhola bubwoni, kitomole mala okimwaate eyo; buli bulayi khwiwe khukhwingila mu bulamu ne moni ndala khukhila ne chimoni chombi mala omwaatwe emakoombe mu mulilo kwa mindali.
“Mukhalekelesiakho mulala khu batiiti bano tawe. Sikila muboolela enywe ndi mwikulu malaika babwe busiele bali ebweeni wa Paapa wase we Mwikulu. [
Sikila Omwana wo Mundu echa khuonia babatiba.]
Mwibaasia muli siina? Omundu aaba ne kamakheese emia, mala lilalakho liatiba, salekha kamakhumi tisa na tisa mumaayilwe mu bikulu mala acha khuyiima lilala litibile elio tawe ku?
Ng'ali muboolela ndi, nalinyoolile aliekhoyela khukhila kamakhumi tisa na tisa kakhatibile tawe.
Bulayi bwene se lili lilienya lia Paapa oli mwikulu mulala khu bakeekhe bano atibe tawe.
Ne nakhakhuulila tawe, cha no mundu mulala namwe babili, nio buli likhuwa liaandalasibwe ne buloli bwe babaandu babili namwe bataru.
Kaaba bali aloba khubaulila, boolela e kanisa yoosi. Ekhumaliilikha nakhaulila ke kanisa tawe, mubukule nga omundu okhamanyile Wele tawe, namwe orosiaanga busuuru.
“Lundi muboolela ndi, kaaba bali babili khwinywe mufukiilisiana khu sibala khu siindu siosi siosi nisio musaba, mulakholelwa murio ne Paapa wase we mwikulu.
Sikila niio babili namwe bataru bebuusiisie mwisina liase, aba ndi nabo abwenao.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Se khuboolela ndi khukhwola kamakhabi saba tawe, ne kakhali kamakhabi kamakhumi saba khukhwola saba.
Khwako Bubwami bwe mwikulu bunyala khulekhasibwa no mwami owenya khumenieelesia bitabu bie chirupia bie bakholi bewe.
Nga arakikha khubala, mulala aareerwa khu niye owaba ne likobi lie chirupia chimilioni chingali,
ne nga nilwo akhanyala khuruunga tawe, Omwami wewe aalaka ali akusibwe, alala no mukhasi wewe ne babaana bewe nende nibio aba nabio bioosi, likobi liruungwe.
Nio omukholi oyo aamukwa mu bikele ne khumwikoonjelela ali, ‘Omwami kholele siisa khakhuruunge choosi!’
Omwami amukholela siisa, amubeela likobi aamulekhuula acha.
“Ne kakhali omukholi chana oyo, nga ne aarura enje, aanyoola mulala khu bakholi basie owaba ne likobi liewe lie chirupia emia, aamutiila enjasi ne aloma ali, ‘Nduunge likobi liase.’
Nio omukholi wasie oyo aamukwa mu bikele amwikoonjelela ali, ‘Kholele siisa, khakhuruunge choosi!’
Aaloba, mala aacha aamura niye mu siboe nabwila nga akharuunge likobi elio.
Nga bakholi basie babona bario babiililwa lukali, mala bacha baboolela omwami wabwe kakakholekha.
Nio omwami wewe aamulaanga amureeba ali, ‘Ewe omukholi omumayaanu! Khubeleele likobi liowo lioosi sikila unjikoonjelele!
Ne ewe nawe andi sokholeele omukholi wasio siisa nga sesi ne khukholeele?’
Omwami wewe aambwa lirima amumwaata mu cheela, nabwila aliruunga likobi liewe lioosi.”
Nio Yesu amaliilisia ali, “Akhaba Paapa wase owe mwikulu alikholela ario buli mulala khwinywe, kaaba bali se mubeela bawandaayenywe khukhwama mu miooyo kienywe tawe.”

Nga Yesu ne amala khuloma kamakhuwa ako arura Kalilaya acha mu sibala sie Buyuda engelekha we luluuchi lwa Yoritani.
Mala babaandu bakali bamuloondakho, abaoneseliayo.
Bafarisayo bamwichakho bamukhaka mu khumureeba bali, “Lilaka liefwe lifukiilila omundu khulekhana ne omukhasi wewe khulwe sifuno siosi siosi ku?”
Mala aloma ali, ‘Sikila sifuno sino omundu alalekha raraawe ne maawe mala aambaane no mukhasi wewe, mala boombi babe sisiindu silala.’
Khwako se basiili babili lundi tawe, ne khali ali mulala. Khwako nisio Wele aambasiisie, omundu yesi yesi akhaukhasia tawe.”
Bamureeba bali, “Nono siina sikila Musa ne aana lilaka omundu khuelesia ebarwa eye khulekhana khu mukhasi wewe mala amulekhe?”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Musa amufukiilila enywe khuoona bakhasi benywe sikila mwaluma emirwe, ne se kaba kario khukhwama mu khurakikha tawe.
Ne ese muboolela enywe ndi, yesi yesi oona omukhasi wewe, ne bukhali sikila bueeyi, mala aareera omukhasi okundi aba akhola bueeyi. Lundi oreera niye baoona, aba akhola bueeyi.”
Babeeka bamuboolela bali, “Kamakhuwa ko museecha no mukhasi wewe kaaba ne kali kario aba se buli bulayi khureera omukhasi tawe.”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Se bali babaandu boosi banyala khufukiilila liliekisia lino tawe, ne kakhali nibo Wele ekhelamo bong'ene.
Sikila baliio bachili babasaalwa bario, lundi baliio bachili nibo babaandu bakhola baba bario, lundi babaandi baliio babekhola babeene bachili sikila Bubwami bwe Mwikulu. Lekha oyo ofukiilila kamekisio kano akhole ario.”
Babaandu balala bareera babaana khu Yesu ne khubasabila ne kakhali babeeka barafwira babaandu abo.
Yesu aloma ali, “Lekha babaana beche mukhabakhiingilila tawe, sikila Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli bwabo baali nga babaana bano.”
Aabarakho kamakhono kewe mala aarekukha.
Omundu mulala echa, khu Yesu areeba ali, “Omwekisia, khola sikholwa siina silayi, nio nyoole bulamu bukhawa tawe?”
Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Siina sikila ewe ne undeeba khuloondekhana nende sikholwa silayi? Aliio Mulala yeng'ene oli omulayi. Ne wenya khukhwingila mu bulamu, tiila kamalaka ka Wele.”
ria raraao ne maao, lundi siima owasio nga ne wesiima wamwene.”
Omusoleeli chana amukobosia ali, “Kamalaka kano koosi naloonda, siina nisio mbombelelwa?”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Ne wenya khuba owolaana, cha okusie bioosi nibio oli nabio mala oeleesie bataambi chirupia, mala wiche unondekho ne olanyoola buiinda mwikulu.”
Nga omusoleeli oyo ne aulila ario arekukha na abiiliilwe, sikila aba ne kimiaandu kimikali.
Nio Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, buliba butinyu khu muyiinda khukhwingila mu Bwami bwe mwikulu.
Lundi muboolela enywe ndi, lili liliangu khu ngamia, khubirira mu mwanya kwe sindani khukhila omuiinda khukhwingila mu Bwami bwa Wele.”
Nga babeeka baulila kano bauka lukali, ne bareeba bali, “Naanu aba onyala aonisibwa?”
Yesu asuta chimoni abalola mala ababoolela ali, “Khu baandu kano se kali kanyalikha tawe, ne kakhali khu Wele bibiindu bioosi bili binyalikha.”
Nio Petero aakobosia ali, “Lola khwalekha bibiindu bioosi, mala khwakhuloondakho. Khukhanyoole siina?”
Yesi yesi olekhile chinju chewe namwe bawandaaye be siseecha nende be siikhasi, namwe raraawe ne maawe, namwe babaana namwe kamaloba, sikila lisina liase, alibinyoola bikali khukhwola emia ndala, mala abe bulamu bukhawa tawe.
Ne kakhali bakali babanyoa, balimaliilikha, ne bamaliilisi balinyoa.

“Bubwami bwe mwikulu buli nga omwene enju owauuna makhelebeende khuboolana ne babaandu khumukholela kumulimo mwiruuti lie kimisabibu.
Enyuma we khufukiilisiana ne bakholi bene abo chirupia che kumuruungo kwe ndaalo, aabayila mwiruuti liewe.
“Lundi oli acha khu soko embi mu saa eya khataru aabona babaandi bemilekho busa,
nabo aababoolela ali, ‘Enywe mweesi khemuche mwiruuti, ne ndamuruunga siosi siosi sisiolaana.’
Khwako bacha. Nio lundi khu saa eye mwiangilwe nende eya tisa, akhola ario.
Embi khu saa eye khumi na ndala acha lundi mala anyoola babaandi bemile, mala aabareeba ali, ‘Siina sikila enywe ne mwimile busa endaalo yoosi?’
Bamukobosia bali, ‘Sikila se aliio yesi yesi okhulangiile kumulimo tawe.’ Aababoolela ali, ‘Nono, ne kali kario, khemuche mukhole mwiruuti liase.’ ”
Nga babalaangwa khukhola kumulimo embi esaa eye khumi na ndala becha, buli mulala khu nibo anyoola kumuruungo kwe ndaalo ndala.
Oli be bweeni becha bebaasia bali wakana balanyoola chingali khukhilakho, ne kakhali buli mulala khu nibo boosi anyoola kumuruungo kwe ndaalo ndala.
Nga bakunyoola bakaamba ne khukhweng'ulung'unyila omwene liruuti,
baloma bali, ‘Bamaliilisi bano bakholile esaa ndala yong'ene, mala ewe walekhasiisie kumuruungo kwabwe ne kukwefwe, efwe khukhwekhaliilikhe kumuumu kumurafu khukhola kimilimo kie ndaalo.’
Naye aakobosia mulala khu nibo ali, ‘Omusaale, ese se ndikho khukholelakho kamakhiikha kosi kosi tawe, se khufukiilisiane nawe kumuruungo kwe ndaalo ndala?
Nono bukula bibiowo oche, ndoboore khuelesia omumaliilisi yuno nga khuelesie ewe.
Se ndi ne bulekhuule khurumikhira bibiase nga nenya tawe ku? Namwe okhendekha sikila buaani bwase bukali?’ ”
Nga Yesu ne aba nacha Yerusalemu, alaanga babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili alubeka mala alomaloma nabo nga yaba ne balikho bakeenda.
Ababoolela ali, “Rekeeresia, khulikho khucha khwoole Yerusalemu; niio Omwana wo Mundu alareebwa mu makhono ke basaayi bakhulu ne babekisia be Lilaka, balamukhalakila lifwa,
mala bamwakaanisie khu Be Chikholo achekhwe ne khu khupwa biboko ne khukhwirwa khu musalaba ne kakhali enyuma we chindaalo chitaru akhalamukhe.”
Nio mukha Sebetayo echa ne babaana bewe khu Yesu, asikama ebweeni wewe asaba Yesu amukholele sisiindu.
Yesu amureeba ali, “Wenya siina?” Aamukobosia ali, “Ndakiilisie oli babaana base babili bano balikhala mulala kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha ne okundi kumukhasi mu Bwami bwowo.”
Ne kakhali Yesu amukobosia ali, “Se mwamanyile nisio mulikho musaba tawe. Enywe munyala khunywa sikoombe sie buchuuni nisio ese ndi siimbi khunywa?” Bakobosia bali, “Yee, khunyala.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ng'ali mulanywa sikoombe siase, ne kakhali se kali kakaase khufukiilila mwikhale amukhono kwase kumuseecha namwe kumukhasi tawe, ne kakhali abuundu ao ali e babaandu nibo Paapa wase arekekhera.”
Ne nga babaandi likhumi abo ne baulila, babonela babili abo bubi.
Ne kakhali Yesu aabalaanga boosi alala becha niio ali mala ababoolela ali, “Mumanyile muli baruki Be Chikholo bekesianga kamaani khu nibo bamiia, lundi babemeelesi bali ne bunyali khu nibo.
Se kali kario khwinywe tawe. Mulala khwinywe aaba ne enya khuba omukali, khukhwola abe omukholi we babaandi;
ne yesi yesi owenya khuba owe bweeni khwinywe akhoya anyoe abe nasioobi wenywe,
bulayi bwene nga Omwana wo Mundu akheecha khukholelwa tawe, ne kakhali khukhalabanila babaandi ne khuaana bulamu bwewe khulwe khuonia bakali.”
Nga Yesu ne babeeka bewe baba ne bama mu Yeriko, babaandu bakali babaloondakho.
Babofu babili ba baaba ne bekhaale khundulo khwe ngila nga baulila bali Yesu alikho abira, bayokela bali, “Mwana owa Daudi khukholele siisa!”
Babaandu babarafwira, ne khu baboolela basile; ne kakhali batasa khuyokela ne baloma bali, “Omwami, Mwana owa Daudi khukholele siisa!”
Nio Yesu eema, mala aabalaanga, ne khubareeba ali, “Enywe mwenya mukholele siina?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omwami khola chimoni chefwe chibone!”
Yesu aabakholela siisa aatiila khu moni chabwe mala abwene ne abwene babona mala bamuloondakho.

Nga Yesu ne babeeka bewe baba siimbi khwoola Yerusalemu boola Betifake khu Sikulu sia Miseituni. Yesu aruma babeeka babili ebweeni
ababoolela ali, “Cha mu sirekere sie ataayi esio, ne mwolilemo kane mubone epunda yaboilwe, ne ng'ana alubeka; chikangulule chombi mundeerere.
Yesi yesi oloma siindu khwinywe, muboolele muli, ‘Omwami achenya’ ne alachilekhuula khangu.”
Kano kekholekha nio niko omung'oosi aaloma kechusibwe,
lola, omwami wowo alikho echa khwiwe!
Omuolu, mala ekhaale khu punda,
eng'ana eye punda.”
Nio babeeka bacha bakhola nga Yesu abalaka,
bareera epunda ne ng'ana, bakialakho chingubo chabwe mala Yesu akiikhalakho.
Babaandu bakali baala chingubo chabwe khu ngila, ne babaandi babuta kamasaafu khukhwama khu mirongooro baara khu ngila.
Babaandu bakali ba barangira ebweeni wewe ne babaandi baba enyuma wewe, bemba bali, “Efuma ebe khu mwana wa Daudi! Omwami Wele abiita chikhabi oyo owicha mwisina lio Mwami! Wele afume.”
Nga Yesu engila mu Yerusalemu, lutiri lwaba mu lukoba, babaandu bareeba bali, “Naanu niye?”
Babaandu bakali abo bakobosia bali, “Yuno ali Yesu omung'oosi owama Nasareti e Kalilaya.”
Yesu engila mu Lukaangu mala atimania boosi ba baaba ne bakusia ne baakula, afumalikhaka chimesa che babaandu bafunja chirupia ne chindebe chabo babakusianga kamauusi kamabaya,
ababoolela ali, “Kaandikwa kali, Wele aaloma ali, ‘Enju yase elilaangwa enju eye lisaba.’ Ne kakhali enywe mwakikholile libina lie banuuli!”
Babofu ne baleme becha niio ali mu Lukaangu mala aabaonia.
Ne kakhali nga basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki ne babona bibiindu bie khuukia nibio akhola, ne babaana khukhwimba mu Lukaangu bali, “Omwana wa Daudi afume!” Baambwa lirima.
Nio bareeba Yesu bali, “Olaulilanga niko baloma?” Aabakobosia ali, “Yee nauliile, enywe mukhasomakho liiandiko liboola lili, ‘Weyikia babaana batiiti ne banuuna khuaana efuma eya ng'ali’ tawe ku?”
Nio Yesu abalekha, arura enje we lukoba acha Betania akonelayo.
Nga Yesu aba ne akobola mu Yerusalemu enje ne busiele, enjala yamulia.
Oli abona kumutuli ao, achao mala khunyoolakho enduli yosi yosi tawe, ne kakhali kamasaafu kong'ene. Nio akulaama ali, “Chinduli chikhaamakho khwiwe lundi tawe!” Ne kumutuli kuniala abwene ne abwene.
Nga babeeka ne babona kano bauka, mala bareebana bali, “Kumutuli chana kwomile khangu busa kuriena?”
Ne muli ne lisuubila mulanyoola siosi siosi nisio musaba.”
Yesu akobola mu Lukaangu, ne nga aba ne ekisia, basaayi bakhulu, ne babemeelesi, becha mala bamureeba bali, “Bunyali siina nibwo olikho okholelamo bibiindu bino, lundi naanu owakhuelesia bunyali bwene obu?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ese sesi ndamureeba lireeba lilala, ne mungobosia aba sesi ndamuboolela bunyali nibwo kholelamo bibiindu bino.
Yoana amia waena bunyali bwe khubatiisia, bwama khu Wele namwe khu baandu?” Nio bayingana babeene ne babeene bali, “Kaaba bali khuloma khuli, ‘Khukhwama khu Wele,’ alaloma ali, ‘Siina sikila ne mukhamusuubila tawe?’
Lundi ne khuloma khuli, ‘Khukhwama khu baandu,’ khuli ne buuri khu niko babaandu banyala bakhola sikila boosi bamanya bali Yoana aba omung'oosi.”
Nio bakobosia Yesu bali, “Se khumanya tawe.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Sesi se muboolela bunyali siina nibwo kholelamo bibiindu bino tawe.
“Nono, enywe mwibaasia siina? Omundu aba ne babaana bewe basoleeli babili, acha khu mukhulu aaloma ali, ‘Mwana wase, luno cha okhole kimilimo mwiruuti lie kimisabibu.’
Omwana oyo amukobosia ali, ‘Se nja tawe’; ne kakhali akelao ebiiya mala aacha.
Lundi raraawabwe chana aacha khu owe khabili aloma niko aboolele omukhulu, omukeekhe aaloma ali, ‘Yee Paapa ndacha,’ ne kakhali se acha tawe.
Mulala siina khu babili abo owakhola lilienya lia raraawe?” Bamukobosia bali, “Omukhulu.” Yesu aababoolela ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, baroosia busuuru ne bakhobani balikho bacha mu bwami bwa Wele enywe ne mu siili.
Sikila Yoana Omubatiisi echa mwinywe amwekesia engila eye buluungi, ne se mwamusuubila tawe, ne kakhali baroosia busuuru ne bakhobani bamusuubila, akhaba nga ne mwabona kano, se mwakelao mwekanila mala mwamusuubila tawe.”
Nga siise sie khubuta chisabibu siola, aaruma nasioobi bewe khucha khu bakholi abo anyoole sikelo siewe.
Bakholi chana bebwaakala nasioobi bewe, baapa mulala, beera okundi, mala baapa okundi kamabaale.
Lundi aaruma nasioobi babaandi bakalikho khukhila bataayi, mala bakholi babakholela busa bosi bario.
Ekhumaliilikha aruma omwana wewe omusoleeli ne ebaasia ali, ‘Ng'ali balaria omwana wase.’
Nga bakholi abo ne babona omwana chana baboolana bali, ‘Yuno ali omwana wewe, yiicha khumwire nio efwe khukiilekho!’
Nio bamutiila bamuyiila enje we liruuti, bamwiira.”
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Khwako nga omwene liruuti nalikobola alikhola bakholi abo ariena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Aliira babaandu bamayaanu abo mala aelesie liruuti elio bakholi babaandi balimuelesia sikelo siewe mu siise sikhoyela.”
‘Libaale nilio babombakhi baloba,
liliene ne liene liabeele lie mu koona.
Likhuwa lino liakholwa no Mwami;
lola nga lili lie khuukia mumoni chefwe.’
“Khwako ese muboolela enywe ndi, mulinuulwa bubwami bwa Wele buebwe khu kholo ekhola bikholwa bibiolaana nabwo.” [
Ne yesi yesi okwa khwibaale lino alifunakwa mu bitonyi; ne ne liakwa khu mundu yesi yesi limutubundulaka.]
Nga basaayi bakhulu ne Bafarisayo baulila chingano chewe, bamanya bali alabalomanga nibo.
Ne kakhali nga bakhaka khumuaamba, baria babaandu bakali, sikila babaandu bamanya bali Yesu aba omung'oosi.

Lundi Yesu aaloma nabo mu ngano ali,
“Bubwami bwe mwikulu bunyala khufwaananisibwa khu mwami owakhola naikara eye siselelo sio omwana wewe omusoleeli.
Mala aruma bakholi bewe khulaanga bakeni beche mu naikara eye siselelo esio, ne kakhali se becha tawe.
Lundi aruma bakholi babaandi ne aloma ali, ‘Boolela bakeni muli, nang'oonile siakhulia, chieeyi chase ne chiunwa chinefu chakhonyilwe, mala narekeekhe buli siindu, khemwiche mu naikara eye siselelo sino.’
Ne kakhali belekela busa mala buli mundu echiila khu kiewe, mulala e mukuunda, okundi khukusia,
ne babaandi boosi batiila bakholi bewe babaapa ne khubeera.
Omwami oyo aambwa lirima likali, mala aruma banamae bewe bacha babunia babeeri abo, lundi bosia lukoba lwabwe.
Nio alaanga bakholi bewe ababoolela ali, ‘Narekeekhe naikara eye siselelo, ne kakhali balangiilwe se bolaana tawe.
Khwako khemuche khu ngila chimbalaayi, mulaange yesi yesi niye mwakaanana beche mu naikara.’
Mala bakholi abo barura bacha mu chingila chimbalaayi babuusia boosi nibo banyoola, babi ne balayi sitube nabwila enju eye siselelo yechula bakeni.
“Nga omwami engila munju khubonana ne bakeni abonamo omundu okhaba ne ngubo eye siselelo tawe.
Mala amureeba ali, ‘Musaale, ewe wingiile muno oriena nokhali ne ngubo eye siselelo tawe?’ Omundu oyo atamba niko aloma.
Mala omwami aboolela bakholi ali, ‘Muboe kamakhono ne bikele, mala mumumwaate mu siilima enje. Ebweeneyo alilila ne khukhwelumakaka.’ ”
Nio Yesu atabusia ali, “Bakali balaangwa ne kakhali batiiti ba baroborwa.”
Bafarisayo bacha bakhola etoloondo nga banyala khureka Yesu mu lilomaloma liewe.
Nio bamurumakho babeeka babwe, alala ne Baheroti, ne bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia khumanyile khuli ewe oli owa ng'ali, wekisia engila eya Wele mu bung'ali, se wesiindukhila omundu yesi yesi tawe, sikila sobala bukali bwo omundu tawe.
Nono khuboolele niko wibaasia? Lilaka likhufukiilila efwe khuruunga busuuru khu Kaisari namwe tawe?”
Yesu aba amanyile kumureko kwabwe, nio abareeba ali, “Enywe babacha, siina sikila ne mukhaka ese!
Njekesie erupia eye khuruunga busuuru!”
Mala bamureerera erupia.
Yesu abareeba ali, “Kumurwe kuulikho kuno ne lisina bia naanu nibio?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Bia Kaisari.”
Ne Yesu ababoolela ali, “Khwako elesia Kaisari biili bia Kaisari, ne elesia Wele biili bia Wele!”
Nga baulila kano bauka, mala bamwinyokhayo bacha.
“Omwekisia, Musa aaloma ali, ‘Kaaba bali omundu afwa nakhali ne babaana tawe, khukhwola wandaaye akobosie namulekhwa, asaalile wandaaye owafwa oyo babaana.’
Nono, babao wandaaye ne wandaaye saba babamenyanga nafwe, omubele areera omukhasi mala afwa ne akhasaalakho omwana tawe, alekhela wandaaye namulekhwa.
Lundi kaba kario khu owa khabili ne owa khataru khukhwola khu owa saba.
Ekhumaliilikha, namulekhwa oyo yesi afwa.
Nono, enyanga niyo bafu balilamukhila, aliba mukha naanu khu baseecha saba abo? Sikila boosi baba baseecha bewe.”
Ne Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwekhiikhile, sikila se mumanyile kamaandiko namwe kamaani ka Wele tawe.
Sikila babafwa ne balilamukha baliba nga malaika mwikulu se balireerana tawe.
Nono, mukhulamukha khwe bafu, enywe se mwasoma kakaboolwa khwinywe ne Wele, bali,
‘Ese ndi Wele owa Aburahamu, Wele owa Isaaka, lundi Wele owa Yakobo.’ Ali Wele we balamu, se ali Wele we bafu tawe.”
Nga babaandu ne baulila kano, bauka khu mekisio kewe.
Nga Bafarisayo baulila bali Yesu se anyalikhaane khukhakwa ne Basatukayo tawe, babuusiana alala.
Mala mulala khu nibo omwekisia owe Lilaka, amureeba lireeba, khumukhaka, ali,
“Omwekisia, Lilaka siina lili liboofu khukhila koosi?”
Lilaka lino nilio liboofu, lundi likhila koosi.
Ne lie khabili lili mbo, ‘Siima owasio nga ne wesiima wamwene.’
Lilaka lia Musa ne kamekisio ke bang'oosi bieyikina kamalaka kabili kano.”
Nga Bafarisayo baba ne bebuusiisie alala, Yesu abareeba ali,
“Mwibaasia siina khu Kristo? Omwana wa naanu niye?” Bamukobosia bali, “Ali Omwana owa Daudi.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Nono kaba kariena Daudi khubirira mu Roho aamulaanga ali, ‘Omwami’; sikila aloma ali,
Yikhala ano amukhono kwase kumuseecha,
khukhwola nga ndira basiku bowo mu bikele biowo.’
Ne, kaba bali, Daudi amulaanga ali, ‘Omwami,’ kanyalikha karie Kristo abe omwana wewe?”
Se abao yesi yesi onyala khukobosia Yesu likhuwa na lilala tawe, lundi khukhwamila endaalo ng'eneyo se abao owanyindaalila khumureeba kakaandi koosi tawe.

Mala Yesu aboolela babaandu ne babeeka bewe ali,
“Baandiki ne Bafarisayo nibo babaebwa bunyali bwe khukhwinoosia Lilaka lia Musa.
Khwako khukhwola murie ne khuloonda kosi kosi niko bamuboolela; ne kakhaba kario, mukhakhola nga nibo ne bakholanga tawe, sikila se bakholanga niko belwacha tawe.
Bara bisiro lukali khu mikoongo kie babaandu ne nibo babene se benya khutiilakho akhaba ne lulwala lwong'ene tawe.
Bakhola bikholwa biabwe bioosi bali nio babaandu bababone. Lola nga baandika chinyilili che liiandiko khu misiipi nikio beboa khu bweni ne khu makhono, lundi lola nga buyenje
Lundi basiima khukhwikhala ebweeni mu naikara ne khu ndebe che ebweeni mu chisinakooki;
lundi basiima khukhesebwa ne liria khu soko, ne khulaangwa ne babaandu bali ‘Rabii,’
Ne enywe mukhalaangwa muli, ‘Rabii’ tawe, sikila muli bo mwekisia mulala, ne enywe mweesi muli be nju ndala.
Lundi mukhalangakho omundu yesi yesi khwiloba khuno muli, ‘Paapa’ tawe, sikila muli ne Paapa mulala yeng'ene oli mwikulu.
Namwe enywe mukhalaangwakho bali, ‘Omwami’ tawe, sikila muli ne omwami mulala yeng'ene niye Kristo.
Oyo oli omukali khukhila boosi mwinywe alaba omukholi wenywe.
Yesi yesi oweniinia omwene kane ekhisibwe, ne oweboombia alaniinisibwa.
“Ne kakhali enywe muli ne silaamo baandiki ne Bafarisayo, enywe babacha! Sikila mwikala kumuliango kwe bubwami bwe mwikulu khu baandu; ne enywe mwabene semwingilamo tawe, mala mukhiingilila abo bakhaka khu khwingilamo! [
Muli ne silaamo baandiki ne Bafarisayo, enywe babacha! Mwingila mu chinju che banamulekhwa ne mubanuula bibiindu biabwe mala mubafufwasia ne khusaba kamasaba kamaleeyi; khwako mulinyoola sinyaasio sikhilakho sie babaandi.]
“Muli ne silaamo baandiki ne Bafarisayo, enywe babacha! Mwambukha enyanja ne bibala bioosi khukaluukhasia omundu mulala aambaane nanywe, ne mu munyoolile, mumukhola olaana khukhwola khabili khucha mu mulilo nga enywe mwabeene.
“Muli ne silaamo muuli bakeleki babofu! Mwikisia muli, ‘Kaaba bali yesi yesi echubila khu Lukaangu, sesili siindu tawe; ne kaba bali yesi yesi echubila khu sahabu eye mu Lukaangu, aba omwene eboyile.’
Enywe babofu muli basilu! Siina sikhila sisiindi, esahabu namwe Lukaangu lukhola esahabu eyo yaba endakatifu?
Lundi mwikisia muli, ‘Waaba bali yesi yesi aaba ne echubila khu alutare, se sili siindu tawe; ne aaba ne echubila khu siianwa sie khu alutare aba omwene eboyile.’
Enywe babofu muli basilu? Siina sikhila sisiindi, siianwa namwe alutare ekhola siianwa siaba sitakatifu?
Khwako oyo owichubila khu alutare, echubila khu nisio biianwa bioosi bilikho;
ne oyo owichuba khulwe Lukaangu echubila khu nilwo Wele amenyilemo,
ne oyo owichuba khulwe likulu, echubila khu ndebe eya Wele eye bubwami ne khuyo okikhalakho.
Bakeleki babofu enywe! Muli nga babaandu batiing'a eesi ne mala bamila engamia!
“Muli ne silaamo enywe baandiki ne Bafarisayo, enywe babacha! Sikila musiinga sikoombe ne sahani enje, ne mukari biechulemo bunuuli ne bukhalukha.
Enywe bafarisayo babofu! Nyoa musiinge sikoombe ne sahani bimiliie mukari, nio enje yosi ebe emiliiu.
Akhaba enywe mwesi mulolekha khuba baluungi khu baandu enje, ne kakhali mukari mwenywe mwechulamo bubacha ne bubwoni.
“Muli ne silaamo enywe baandiki ne Bafarisayo, enywe babacha! Sikila mwombakha biliindwa bie bang'oosi ne khusaa biliindwa bie ba baaba baluungi;
ne muloma muli, ‘Khubanga khukhwamenya mu ndaalo che bakuuka befwe, andi se khwaambaana nabo khuchukha sifuki sie bang'oosi tawe.
Khwako muaana buloli bumuboa enywe mwabene, sikila enywe muli babaana be babaandu babeera bang'oosi.’
Nono, chiililila mutabusie niko bakuuka benywe barakikha.
Enywe chindemu, baana ba nafwo mulaona murie khukhalakilwa khucha e makoombe?
Khwako namurumira bang'oosi ne bakesi ne baandiki. Balala khu nibo mulibeera ne babaandi muli beerera khu misalaba, ne babaandi muli bapila mu chisinakooki chenywe, lundi mubatimanie khukhwama mu lukoba khucha mu lundi.
Nio kamafuki ke baluungi boosi kakachukhwa khu sibala keche khwinywe, khukhwama khu mafuki kakhaaba ne bubi ka Abili khukhwola khu ka Sakaria okhwa Barakia, niye mwereera akari we atakatifu ne alutare.
Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, kano koosi kaliekholekha khu selukho yino.
“Ee! Yerusalemu Yerusalemu! Enywe mumwiira bang'oosi ne khu khupa kamabaale nibo Wele aruma khwinywe. Khukhwola khenga ne nenya khubuusia alala babaana benywe nga engokho ne buusia binywinywi biayo mundaa chayo, ne kakhali se mwakana tawe!
Khwako Lukaangu lwenywe lulanjuukhwa mala lube busa.
Sikila muboolela enywe ndi, khukhwama luno, se mulimbonakho ese lundi tawe, nabwila muliloma muli, ‘Ali ne khabi oyo owicha mu lisina lio Mwami.’ ”

Nga Yesu ne aba ne alikho acha khukhwama mu Lukaangu, babeeka bewe becha bamwekesia kamombakho ke Lukaangu.
Ne abakobosia ali, “Mwaboone kano koosi namwe tawe? Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, se lilirama ano libaale lilala khu ngaaki khwe liliindi, likhalimwaatwa aasi tawe.”
Nga Yesu ekhala khu sikulu sia Miseituni, babeeka bamwichakho mu bwikisi ne bamureeba bali, “Khuboolele, kano kaliba liina, lundi siina siliba simanyisio sie liliicha liowo nende sie siieli sie sibala?”
Mala Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ba meso, omundu yesi yesi akhamusilwaasia tawe.
Sikila bakali balichila mu lisina liase, ne baloma bali, ‘Ese niise Kristo!’ Mala balisilwasia bakali.
Lundi muli ulila liie ne kamakhuwa ke liie; mukheembeelela tawe; sikila khukhwola ako kakholekhe, ne kakhali aba sisiakamo sikhoola tawe.
Sikila sibala silibwaakala sibala sisiindi; bubwami bulibwaakala bubuundi, lundi enjala elibao ne khuterema khwe sibala mu mbeka chingali.
Kano koosi kali busa nga omukhasi olumwa ne buloonda.
Ne bakali balitibia lisuubila liabwe siise esio, balichamana ne khubiilana.
Lundi bang'oosi be bubeeyi bakali baliicha mala batiimie babaandu bakali.
Busiime bwe babaandu bakali buliboomba sikila bumayaanu khukucha.
Ne kakhali oyo owekhaliilikha khukhwola khu siakamo akhaone.
Ne Elomo Endayi eye Bubwami yino eliilwachwa mu sibala sioosi, nga buloli khukholo choosi; nio sisiakamo siiche.
nono lekha abo bali e Buyuda belukhile mu bikulu;
oyo oli khu nju khu ngaaki akheekha aasi khubukula siili munju mwewe tawe.
Lundi oyo oli e mukuunda akhakobola engo khubukula engubo yewe tawe.
Abo baliba sisombo namwe baliba ne banuunia mu ndaalo ng'ene echo balikhola siisa!
Khemusabe Wele khumula khwenywe khukhecha khwaba mu ndaalo che kumunaane namwe mu ndaalo eya Sabato tawe!
Sikila mu siise sienesio butinyu buliba bukali po, bukhabaakho mu sibala lundi se bulibakhoo burio tawe.
Ne takha Wele ne amala khale khukhwimbiyia chindaalo echo, andi omundu se akhaone akhaba mulala yeng'ene tawe. Ne kakhali sikila barobore bewe, Wele alembiiya chindaalo.
“Nio, kaaba bali omundu yesi yesi aloma ali, ‘Kristo oyu siina!’ Namwe, ‘niye oyo!’ Mukhasuubila tawe.
Ne kakhali babelaanga bali nibo Kristo ne bang'oosi be bubeeyi baleecha; ne khukhola kamayia ke khuukia kanyala khutiimia akhaba barobore ba Wele kaaba ne kanyalikhana.
Rekeeresia! Namubooleele enywe lino siise ne sikhoola tawe.
Khwako babaandu ne bamuboolela enywe bali, ‘Ali enje mu sichiimi!’ Mukharura mwachayo tawe, namwe ne baloma bali, ‘Oyu siina mu chisiro che nju!’ Mukhasuubila tawe.
Sikila Omwana wo Mundu alicha nga lueni ne luburukha khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo.
ne simanyisio sio Omwana wo Mundu silibonekha mu ngaaki, mala babaandu be chikholo che sibala boosi balilila nga balibona Omwana wo Mundu ne echela mu ngaaki mu bunyali ne luyali lukali.
Ekhoombi emboofu eliipa mala arume bamalaika bewe khubuusia barobore bewe khukhwama chimbeka choosi chine che sibala.
“Khemweyike khukhwama khu mutuli. Ne mubona lusakia lwakwo ne lukhukhumusia ne khusisina kamasaafu kamatoro, mumanya muli siimiyu sili siimbi.
Khwako, ne mubona bibiindu bino bioosi ne mumanya muli Omwana wo Mundu ali siimbi.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, eselukho yino se liwao tawe khukhwola bibiindu bino bikholekhe.
Likulu ne liloba biliwao, ne kakhali kamakhuwa kase se kaliwao tawe.
“Se aliio, omanyile, endaalo namwe esaa ekhoole liina tawe, akhaba malaika be mwikulu, akhaba Omwana se amanyile tawe, nakhali Paapa yeng'ene omanyile.
Liliicha lio Omwana wo Mundu liliba nga kakakholekha mu ndaalo cha Noa.
Mu ndaalo echo kameechi ne kasiili khwichula, babaandu baba bali mu khulia ne khunywa, baseecha ne bakhasi bayilana, khukhwola endaalo niyo Noa engila mu meeli,
ne se bamanyakho sisiekholekhanga tawe, nabwila kameechi kecha kabasiikha boosi. Omwana wo Mundu nga akheeche, kaliba kario.
Mu ndaalo echo babaandu babili baliba mu mukuunda; mulala akhabukulwe, okundi alekhwe.
Bakhasi babili baliba khebasiela khu lususi, mulala akhabukulwe, ne okundi alekhwe.
Khe mube meeso nono, sikila se mumanyile endaalo niyo Omwami wenywe akheeche tawe.
Nono khe mumanye kano; muli abanga omwene enju amanya siise sie siilo nisio omwifwi echelemo, andi aba meeso, lundi se alekha enju yewe yaatulwa tawe.
Khwako enywe mwesi mukhoya mwerekekha, sikila Omwana wo Mundu alikho eecha esaa niyo mukhamanyile tawe.
“Nono, omukholi omweyikinwa lundi omukesi niye naanu? Niye omwami wewe aara khuliinda be nju yewe, khubaelesia siakhulia mu siise sisienyekha?
Ali ne ekhabi omukholi niye omwami wewe nga alikobola alimunyoola ne akhola ario.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, alimukhola khuba omuliindi we kimiaandu kiewe kioosi.
Ne kakhali omukholi omubi owibaasia ali, ‘Omwami wase alabukula siise sileeyi nio akobole,’
mala arakikhe khu khuupa bakholi basie, lundi alie ne khunywa ne bameesi.
Omwami wo mukholi oyo akheeche endaalo niyo omukholi akhamwerekekhele tawe ne esaa niyo akhamanyile tawe.
Omwami wewe alimuukuuma ne khumura alala ne babacha. Ebweeneyo babaandu balilila ne khukhwelumakaka.

Baraano khu nibo baba basilu, ne baraano bakesi.
Basilu nga babukula chitaa chabwe, se basuta ne kamafura tawe.
Ne kakhali bakesi basuta kamafura mu chichupa ne chitaa chabwe.
Nga omusoleeli omwene siselelo akhiinda, liilo liabatiila boosi bakona.
“Oli siilo akari, bikalakala biakwa bali, ‘Omusoleeli omwene siselelo oolile! Yiicha mumwakaanile!’
Bakhaana abo boosi benyokha bang'oona chitaa chabwe.
Nio basilu baboolela bakesi bali, ‘Khuketelekho kamafura kenywe, sikila chitaa chefwe chilikho chisima.’
Ne kakhali bakesi ba bakobosia bali, ‘Se kalimo kakhwola efwe nanywe tawe; cha khu bakusia mukule kakenywe.’
Nga baba ne balikho bacha khukula omusoleeli omwene siselelo aulukha, nio baraano baberekekha bengila naye mu naikara eye siselelo; ne kumuliango kwekalwa.
Ne omusoleeli omwene siselelo abakobosia ali, ‘Se kanyalikhana tawe, ese se mumanyile enywe tawe.’ ”
Yesu atabusia ali, “Nono mulole bulayi, sikila se mumanyile endaalo namwe esaa tawe!
Aelesia buli mulala khuloondekhana ne limanya liewe: mulala chirupia chicholaana ne chitalanda chiraano, ne okundi chibili, ne okundi ndala. Mala aarekukha.
Oyo owanyoola chiraano, aacha ofula anyoola chichiindi chiraano.
Akhaba owanyoola chibili ofulamo chichiindi chibili.
Ne kakhali oyo owanyoola etalanda ndala acha aayaba liloo aasiikha etalanda yo omwami wewe.
“Enyuma we siise sileeyi, omwami we bakholi chana abo aakobola aareeba chitalanda chewe.
Owanyoola chitalanda chiraano echa, areera chichiindi chiraano bukhala, ne aloma ali, “Omwami, wambelesia chiraano; ano nanyoolilekho bukhala chichiindi chiraano.”
Omwami wewe amuboolela ali, “Wakholile bulayi, omukholi omulayi lundi omweyikinwa, wabeele omweyikinwa khu bitiiti, ndakhura khu buliindi bwe bikali; yiicha obe mu busangaafu bwo mwami wowo.”
Ne oyo owanyoola chitalanda chibili yesi eecha aloma ali, “Omwami wamba chitalanda chibili; ano nanyoolilekho bukhala chichiindi chibili.”
Omwami wewe aamuboolela ali “Wakholile bulayi, omukholi omulayi lundi omweyikinwa; wabeele omweyikinwa khu bitiiti, ndakhura khu buliindi bwe bikali; yiicha obe mu busangaafu bwo mwami wowo.”
Nio owanyoola etalanda ndala yesi eecha, aaloma ali, “Omwami, namanya ndi ewe oli omundu omulume, okesanga niio okhamiicha tawe, lundi obuusianga niio okhabakala tawe.
Khwako naria, mala nacha nakisa etalanda yowo mwiloba. Nono etalanda yowo niyeeyi.”
Omwami wewe amuboolela ali, “Ewe omukholi omumayaanu lundi omukara! Wamanya oli ngesaanga niio khamiicha, lundi mbuusianga niio khabakala tawe?
Nono andi wabiikha etalanda yase mu bengi nio oli ngobola nyoole etalanda yase ne bukhala bwayo.
Khwako munuule etalanda niyo ali nayo mala muelesie ooli ne nacho ekhumi.
Sikila buli mulala oli nabio alaebwa bibiindi, mala abe ne bikali khukhila; naye otaamba, alanuulwa akhaba sitiiti nisio ali nasio.
Mwata omukholi okhali ne bukhala oyu enje mu siilima, ebweeneyo babaandu balilila ne khukhwelumakaka.”
Chikholo choosi chikhakhung'ane alala ebweeni wewe mala aabukhasie ndala khukhwama khu kiindi nga omwaayi aabukhasia kamakheese ne chimbusi,
akhare kamakheese kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha ne chimbusi kumukhasi.
Nio omwami aliboolela be kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha ali, “Yiicha enywe nibo Paapa aabiita chikhabi, nyoola Bubwami nibwo mwang'oonelwa: khukhwama nga sibala ne siabaang'anwa.
Sikila naba ne njala mwambelesia siakhulia, naba ne bulesia mwambelesia sie khunywa, naba omukeni mwanjakaanila,
naba sichula mwafwara, naba omulwale mwecha mwambona, naba mu siboe mwecha mwambona.”
Abwenao baluungi balimureeba bali, “Omwami, khwakhubona ndaalo siina ne oli ne njala mala khwakhuelesia siakhulia, namwe ne oli ne bulesia mala khwakhuelesia kameechi wanywa?
Khwakhubona ndaalo siina ne oli omukeni mala khwakhwakaanila mu nju chefwe, namwe ne oli sichula khwakhufwara?
Lundi khwakhubona ndaalo siina ne olwaala namwe ne oli mu siboe khwecha khwakhubona?”
Omwami alibaboolela ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, koosi niko mwakholela mulala khu bawandaayase batiiti mu boosi bano, mwakholela ese!”
Aliboolela baali kumukhono kwewe kumukhasi ali, “Khemundureo, enywe muli ne silaamo, cha mu mulilo kwa mindali kukwang'oonelwa Sietani ne malaika bewe.
Sikila naba ne enjala mala se mwambelesia siakhulia tawe, naba ne bulesia ne kakhali se mwambelesia sie khunywa tawe,
naba omukeni ne kakhali se mwanjakaanila munju chenywe tawe, naba sichula ne kakhali se mwafwara tawe, naba omulwale lundi naba mu siboe ne kakhali se mwecha mwambona tawe.”
Nabo bosi balireeba bali, “Omwami, khwakhubona ndaalo siina ne oli ne njala namwe ne oli ne bulesia namwe ne oli omukeni namwe ne oli sichula namwe ne oli omulwale namwe ne oli mu siboe mala efwe khukhuyeeta tawe?”
Naye alibaboolela ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, nga nilwo mwaloba khukholela khu batiiti bano, aba se mwakholela ese tawe!
Khwako bano balinyoola siiukuumo sia mindali, ne baluungi bulamu bukhawa tawe.”

Nga Yesu aamala khukhwikisia ako koosi, aaboolela babeeka bewe ali,
“Mumanyile muli naikara eye Epasaka elabao enyuma we chindaalo chibili, ne Omwana wo Mundu alaambwa mala abaambwe khu musalaba!”
Nio basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi ne babaandu, bebuusia munju yo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owalaangwa Kayafa,
mala bakhola ekwangwaani baambe Yesu mu bwikisi mala bamwire.
Ne kakhali baloma bali, “Kakhakholekhela mu ndaalo eya naikara tawe, busa babaandu bakhola bario benyosia sisiayuumba.”
Yesu aaba e Betania munju mwa Simoni owalwaala kamakele.
Nga Yesu aaba ne alikho alia omukhasi amwichao ne kumwendo kwe kamafura kaunya bulayi ke bukusi bwe angaaki lukali, mala aakachukha khu murwe kwa Yesu.
Babeeka bewe nga babona bario, babiililwa mala bareebana bali, “Khuno se khuli khusasia?
Abeele kamafura kano kanyala kakusibwa bukusi bwe angaaki, mala chirupia echo chiche khu bataambi!”
Ne kakhali Yesu amanya kamebaasio kabwe, aabareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne munaania omukhasi yuno? Akholeele ese sisiindu silayi.
Muli ne bataambi buli lwoosi, ne kakhali se mukhabe nase buli lwoosi tawe.
Ama khuchukha kamafura kano khu mubili kwase, khu khundekekha ese khusiikhwa.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, niio Elomo Endayi yino yilwachwa osi osi mu sibala, sikholwa siewe sino sikhakhebulilwe.”
Nio mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili owalaangwa Yuda Isikarioti aacha khu basaayi bakhulu,
abareeba ali, “Mumba siina kaaba bali ese njaama Yesu mu muambe?” Bamubalila chirupia kamakhumi kataru.
Khukhwama siise esio Yuda ayiima bubweyaangu bulayi bwe khuchaama Yesu.
Khu ndaalo eye khunyoa eya naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, babeeka becha khu Yesu, bamureeba bali, “Wenya khu khurekekhele waena olileo Epasaka?”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Cha mu lukoba muboolele omundu mulala muli, ‘Omwekisia aloma ali, Esaa yase yoolile, ese ne babeeka base khulalia e naikara eye Pasaka munju mwowo.’ ”
Babeeka bakhola nga Yesu abalaka, barekekha siakhulia sie Pasaka.
Oli bwelabula, Yesu ekhala asialwa ne babeeka ekhumi na babili khulia.
Oli balikho balia, Yesu aloma ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, mulala khwinywe alanjaama.”
Babeeka babeelela lukali, mala barakikha khumureeba ne baloondekhana bali, “Omwami, ese namwe?”
Omwana wo Mundu akhafwe nga ne kaandikwa khu niye, ne, silaamo siliba khu mundu omuchaama! Nabulayi omundu oyo andi se asaalwa tawe!”
Yuda, omuchaami, aareeba ali, “Omwami, ese namwe?” Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Ewe walomile.”
Nga baba ne balikho balia, Yesu abukula kumukaati apila Wele orio akumesulamo mala aelesia babeeka bewe, mala ababoolela ali, “Bukula mulie, kuno kuli kumubili kwase.”
Lundi abukula sikoombe, oli amala khu khupila Wele orio aabaelesia, naloma ali, “Khe munywe, mweesi;
kano kamafuki kase, ke ndakaano, kachukhwa sikila babaandu bakali khulwe khubabeela bubwoni.
Ese muboolela enywe, se khanywekho lundi endali eye kumusabibu kuno tawe khukhwola endaalo niyo ndinywa endali embia nanywe mu Bwami bwa Paapa.”
Nga bamala khukhwimba kumwenya, bacha khu sikulu sia Miseituni.
Ne kakhali, ne ndamuukhe khache Kalilaya ebweeni wenywe.”
Petero amuboolela ali, “Boosi bakhakhwilukha ewe, ese se ndakhwilukha tawe!”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Ng'ali ese khuboolela ndi, siilo sia luno sisiene, etaaywa ne khakholiokha tawe, olanjekaana khataru!”
Petero aamuboolela ali, “Akhaba ne kaba bali ese khukhwola fwe nawe, se khwekaana tawe!” Babeeka babaandi boosi baloma bario.
Yesu aacha ne babeeka bewe abuundu alaangwa bali Ketisemani, mala ababoolela ali, “Khemwikhale ano, ese ndikho nja eyo khusaba.”
Aabukula Petero ne basoleeli babili ba Sebetayo, arakikha khubeelela ne khunanisibwa ne kumwoyo.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Kumwoyo kwase kwabeleele khubira sikelo khukhwola embi khufwa, khemwikhale ano meso nase.”
Esendakho sinao mala akwa aasi mafumala asaba ali, “Paapa, ne kanyalikhana, lekha sikoombe sie buchuuni sino simbire! Ne kakhali, kakhaba nga ese ne nenya tawe, kabe nga ewe ne wenya.”
Nio echa niio babeeka bewe bataru baba mala abanyoola bakona, aboolela Petero ali, “Basie, se munyala mwekhala meeso nase aakhaba esaa ndala yong'ene tawe?
Ba meso mala musabe nio mukhakwa mu makhako tawe. Kumwoyo kwenya ne kakhali kumubili kuli kumutekhele.”
Elayo lukhola khabili, mala asaba ali, “Paapa, ne kaaba bali sikoombe sie buchuuni sino se simbira tawe nabwila sinywa, aba lilienya liowo likholekhe.”
Lundi akobola abanyoola ne bakona, sikila yaba chimoni chabwe chasitoe.
Abwenao, Yesu abalekha lundi acha asaba lukhola khataru, naloma kamakhuwa chana ako busa.
Nio aakobola niio babeeka baba abareeba ali, “Musikona ne khuola? Lola! Esaa yolile niyo Omwana wo Mundu achamiilwe khurwa mu makhono ke babooni.
Yinyokha, khuche, lola ounjaama oolile!”
Yesu ne asilomaloma, Yuda owaba mulala khu ba baaba ekhumi na babili oola. Aba ne babaandu bakali ba baaba ne basutile kimibano ne chiruungu. Baaba barumirwe ne basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi.
Abeele omuchaami abaelesie simanyisio ali, “Omundu niye ndekwayila; niye omweneyo, muambe.”
Yuda eecha niio Yesu ali amukheesia ali, “Muleembe, omwekisia,” mala aamwikwayila.
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Omusaale, khola khangu nisio wichile khukhola!” Nio becha baamba Yesu.
Mulala khwaabo ba baaba ne Yesu aachoola embalu yewe, aarema liiru lio omukholi wo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, liakwa.
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Kobosia embalu yowo mu sibaabi; sikila yesi yesi orumikhira embalu, embalu ekhamwire.
Se mumanyile muli nyala nasaba Paapa wase, mala aandeerera khangu banamae bikoosi ekhumi na bibili bie ba malaika?
Ne kakhali aba niko kamaandiko kaboola kali kano khukhwola kakholekhe kalechusibwa kariena?”
Ne koosi kakholekhe, nio kamaandiko ke bang'oosi kolaane khukhwichusibwa.”
Mala babeeka bewe boosi belukha bamulekha.
Nio abo ba baaba ne baambile Yesu bamuyila wa Kayafa Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, niio baandiki be Lilaka ne babemeelesi baba bebuusiisie.
Petero amuloondakho enyuma kalaa, nabwila ola khu luuya lwo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali. Ekhala ne baliindi khubona sikane siekholekhe.
Basaayi bakhulu nende be kumuse kwoosi bayiima buloli bwe bubeeyi khu Yesu nio bamwire;
ne kakhali se banyoolakho siosi siosi tawe, akhaba babaandu bakali ne becha baloma ke bubeeyi khu niye. Ekhumaliilikha babaandu babili berusia beecha,
baloma bali, “Omundu yuno aaloma ali, ‘Ese nyala natechula Lukaangu lwa Wele, mala nalwombakhila mu ndaalo chitaru.’ ”
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali eenyokha eema aareeba Yesu ali, “Se oli nende nilio oloma khu niko bakhusitakiilekho kano tawe?”
Ne kakhali Yesu asila busa. Lundi Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali aloma ali, “Mwisina lia Wele omenyile mindali luno ese khwichubia ewe, khuboolele ne oli Kristo, Omwana owa Wele.”
Enywe mubona murie?”
Bamuboolela bali, “Kumusaango kwamukhilile akhoyeele afwe.”
ne baloma bali, “Kristo ng'oola! Naanu owama khu khupa ewe!”
Petero aba eekhaale khu luuya enje, omukholi owe siikhasi wo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali aamwichao, aaloma ali,
“Akhaba wesi wabeele ne Yesu Omukalilaya.”
Ne kakhali Petero ekaana ebweeni wabwe boosi ali, “Se manya niko olikho oloma tawe,”
mala Petero chana arura acha mumatooche. Omukholi owe siikhasi okundi amubona, mala aboolela babemile ali, “Omundu yuno abeele ne Yesu owa Nasareti.”
Lundi Petero ekaana ne khukhwechuba ali,
“Ese se manyile omundu oyo tawe!”
Enyuma we siise sitiiti babemile bacha baboolela Petero bali, “Ng'ali akhaba ewe oli mulala khu nibo, sikila lilomaloma liowo likhubuula.”
Mala Petero echuba, aaloma ali, “Ndikho mboola bung'ali! Ese se manyile omundu oyo tawe! Naaba ne mbea lekha Wele ambukuume.”
Oli asiloma ario etaaywa yakholiokha.
Nio Petero aakhebulila kamakhuwa niko Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Etaaywa ne khakholiokha tawe, olinjekaana khukhwola khataru, oli se umanyile tawe.” Petero arura enje aalila burafu.

Nga ne bwasia, basaayi bakhulu boosi ne babemeelesi be babaandu bakhola etoloondo eye khukhwira Yesu.
Bamuboa kiminyololo bacha naye, bamura mu makhono ka Pilato omuruki owe bubwami bwe Barumi.
Aaloma ali, “Nakholile bubwoni nga nachaamile omundu omuluungi khukhwirwa.” Bamureeba bali, “Kamene ako kali siina khwifwe? Wamwene koongo!”
Yuda amwaata chirupia chana aasi mu Lukaangu, aarekukha aacha ekoka.
Basaayi bakhulu, babukula chirupia chana echo, baloma bali, “Lilaka se likhufukiilila efwe khuchira mwibiikhilo tawe, sikila chili che sifuki.”
Bafukiilisiana mala bachibukula bakula, lusaambu lwo mubuumbi, khusiikhamo baakwa.
Khwako lusaambu lwene olwo lulaangwa lwe sifuki khukhwola endaalo yino.
barumikhira chirupia echo khukula lusaambu lwo mubuumbi, nga Omwami ne aandaka.”
Yesu eema ebweeni wa Pilato omuruki owe bubwami bwe Baruumi; mala Pilato chana aamureeba ali, “Ewe niwe Omwami we Bayaudi?” Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Ewe walomile orio.”
Ne kakhali nga basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi bamuloma se aabakobosia siindu tawe.
Khwako Pilato aamureeba ali, “Ewe se olikho oulila bibiindu nibio balikho bakhusataka tawe?”
Ne kakhali Yesu se aalomakho likhuwa liosi liosi tawe, nabwila omuruki oyo ne auka lukali.
Buli ndaalo eya naikara eye Pasaka omuruki we bubwami bwe Baruumi alekhuulaanga omuboe yesi yesi niye babaandu benyaanga.
Siise esio omuboe abao owamanyikhana khu mabi owalaangwa Baraba,
nono nga babuusiana Pilato abareeba ali, “Enywe mwenya mulekhulile naanu, Baraba namwe Yesu olaangwa Kristo?”
Amanya busa ali Bayaudi bamurereere Yesu sikila likhendekha liabwe.
Pilato aba ekhaale khu ndebe eye likhalaka, omukhasi wewe amurumira likhuwa ali, “Okhabakho ne sisiindu siosi siosi khu mundu omuluungi oyo tawe, luno naanisibwe lukali mu marooro sikila niye.”
Basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi baachiilisia babaandu basabe Baraba alekhuulwe ne Yesu eerwe.
Omuruki chana aabareeba lundi ali, “Mwenya mulekhulile mulala siina khu babili bano?” Bakobosia bali, “Baraba!”
Pilato aabareeba ali, “Nono ese khole ndiena Yesu olaangwa Kristo?” Ne boosi bayokela lukali bali, “Abaambwe.”
Nio Pilato aareeba ali, “Akholile mabi siina?” Ne kakhali bayokela lukali bali, “Abaambwe!”
Ne babaandu boosi baloma bali, “Sifuki siewe sibe khwifwe ne khu baana befwe!”
Nio aabalekhuulila Baraba, ne nga amala khu khuupa Yesu biboko, amuaana abaambwe!
Nio banamae bayila Yesu mwichipi lio muruki Pilato mala bebuusia ebweeni wewe boosi.
Bamufuula chingubo chewe, bamufwara ekaanjo embesemu,
baruka ekuutwa eye kamawa bamufwara khu murwe, bamuambia liteeka mukhono kwewe kumuseecha. Basikama ebweeni wewe ne bamuchekheelela ne baloma bali, “Muleembe Omwami owe Bayaudi!”
Bamufuchakho mala babukula liteeka chana bamupila khumurwe.
Oli bamala khumuchekheelela, bamufuula ekaanjo embesemu chana eyo, bamufwara chichewe mala bamuyila abaambwe.
Nga baaba ne balikho bacha, batundubikha omundu khukhwama Kireni niye balaanga lisina bali Simoni, mala banamae bamuyingiilila khusuta kumusalaba kwa Yesu.
Nga boola abuundu alaangwa bali Kolikota, lisina liboola lili, “abuundu we Siianga.”
Baelesia Yesu endali niio batubasiisie ne endurwe bali anywe; ne nga akichanjamakho aakiloba khukinywa tawe.
Enyuma wako bekhalao ne bamuloleelela.
Bara khu ngaaki khwe kumurwe kwewe kamaandiko ke kamasitako kaboola kali, “Yuno niye Yesu, Omwami we Bayaudi.”
Nio banuuli babili ba baambwa naye, mulala kumukhono kumuseecha ne okundi kumukhasi.
“Ewe niye owenya khutechula Lukaangu mala olwombakhe lundi mu ndaalo chitaru! Yeonia wamwene waaba ne oli Omwana owa Wele! Yama khu musalaba wikhe aasi khubone.”
Akhaba basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki be Lilaka ne babemeelesi, bamuchekheelela, ne baloma bali,
“Aonia babaandu; mala sanyala khukhwionia omwene tawe! Se ali Omwami owa Isiraeli? Khe ame khu musalaba ekhe aasi luno luri khubone, nio khumusuubile!
Eyikina mu Wele, ne khuloma, ali ese Omwana owa Wele. Nono kaba kario, lekha khubone nga Wele amuonia luno!”
Akhaba banuuli ba babambwa naye boosi bamukhoma mu ngila ng'eneyo.
Sisiilima siaba khu sibala sioosi khukhwama chisa sita che kumuusi khukhwola chisa tisa.
Oli yola esaa eya tisa Yesu aayulukha ne kumumilo kumukali ali, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaki tani?” Liboola lili, “Wele wase, Wele wase, siina sikila ne undekhile?”
Balala khu nibo babamwimao nga baulila bario baloma bali, “Omundu yuno alikho alaanga Elicha!”
Mulala khu nibo atima khangu aabukula sisiaangu, aasiinikha mu ndali enduruuchi asira khu liteeka mala akhaka khumuelesia bali anywe.
Ne kakhali babaandi baloma bali, “Liinda nio, khubone nga Elicha echa khumuonia.”
Yesu aayulukha lundi ne kumumilo kumukali mala akwiisia kumwoyo.
biliindwa bioosi biekukha, mala batakatifu ba Wele bakali babafwa balamukha.
Barura mu biliindwa, enyuma we khulamukha khwa Yesu bacha mu lukoba luboofu lutakatifu ne khubonekhela babaandu bakali.
Nga omunamae omukhulu ne banamae babaandi ba baaba alala naye, ne baloleelela Yesu, babona khuterema khwe sibala nende kakekholekha, buuri bwabaamba, baloma bali, “Ng'ali yuno abeele Omwana owa Wele!”
Balala khu nibo baba Maria Makatalena, ne Maria maawe owa Yakobo ne Yosefu, ne maawe we basoleeli ba Sebetayo.
Oli ekolooba, omuinda echa khukhwama Arimatea, owalaangwa bali Yosefu, yesi aba omweeka owa Yesu.
Acha khu Pilato asaba kumulaambo kwa Yesu. Nio Pilato alaka ali aebwe.
Nio Yosefu aabukula kumulaambo kwa Yesu, aakuboela mungubo eye khusiikhilamo eya katani emiliiu,
akura mu ng'ani yewe embia, niyo abeecha mu libaale. Apiringisia libaale libalaayi alikhiikha emuliango we siliindwa, mala arekukha.
Maria Makatalena ne Maria okundi oyo babao, bekhaale baloleelele esiliindwa.
Endaalo eyaloondakho, nio busie Sabato, basaayi bakhulu ne Bafarisayo babusiana ebweeni wa Pilato
ne baboola bali, “Omwami, efwe khukhebulila nga omubeeyi oyo aloma, nasiili omulamu ali, ‘Ndilamukha enyuma we chindaalo chitaru.’
Khwako laka oli siliindwa sibeo baliindi khukhwola endaalo eya khataru, babeeka bewe bakhola bario bacha bamwiba, mala baboolela babaandu bali, ‘Alamukhe khukhwama mu bafu’, mala aba bubeeyi bumaliilisi bulakhilakho butaayi.”
Pilato ababoolela ali, “Enywe muli ne baliindi, khe muche, mubareo nga mwenya.”
Khwako bacha, bamaalilila kumuuri khwibaale e muliango we siliindwa ne khurao baliindi basiliinde.

Oli endaalo eya Sabato yabira, busia bwe endaalo eye mwichuuma, Maria Makatalena ne Maria okundi oyo bacha khulola siliindwa.
Nio literema likali lie sibala liabao, sikila malaika wo Mwami ekha khukhwama mwikulu apiringisia libaale enyosiayo, mala aalikhalakho.
Aafwaana nga lueni, ne chingubo chewe chaba chiwaanga chwe nga enyaange.
Baliindi be siliindwa baba ne buuri bukali baterema baba nga bafu.
Ne kakhali Malaika aboolela bakhasi abo ali, “Mukharia tawe; sikila manyile ndi mulikho muenja Yesu owa baambwa.
Se ali ano tawe; sikila alamukhe, nga aaloma yiicha mubone niio bamurere.
Khe muche khangu muboolele babeeka bewe muli alamukhe khukhwama mu bafu, lundi arangiire ebweeni wenywe alikho acha Kalilaya; mulamubonela ebweeneyo! Khebulila niko ese mubooleele enywe.”
Khwako barekukha khangu ne buuri ne liliekhoya likali, batimaka khuboolela babeeka bewe.
Nio Yesu aabakaanana aababoolela ali, “Kumuleembe kube nanywe!” Becha bamukwa mu bikele bamusaaya.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Mukharia tawe; khemuche muboolele bawandaayase bache e Kalilaya, balambonela ebweeneyo.”
Nga bakhasi abo ne barekukha, balala khu baliindi ba baliinda siliindwa bacha mu lukoba luboofu mala baboolela basaayi bakhulu koosi kakakholeekhe.
Nio basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi nga bamala etoloondo yabwe; baana sikelo siboofu sie chirupia khu baliindi abo.
Baloma bali, “Boolela babaandu muli, ‘Babeeka bewe bechile siilo bamwiba efwe ne khukona.’
Ne aaba bali likhuwa lino liolela omuruki, efwe khulamwikusia ne enywe se mulaba mu butinyu tawe.”
Khwako baliindi babukula chirupia echo mala bakhola nga baboolelwe. Likhuwa elio liamanyikhana mu Bayaudi khukhwola endaalo eya luno.
Nga bamubona bamusaaya, ne kakhaba kario balala baayaaya.
Yesu echa siimbi ababoolela ali, “Bunyali bwe mwikulu ne bwe khu sibala bwoosi bwamalile khuebwa khwise.
Khwako enywe khemuche mukhole be chikholo choosi babe babeeka base, mubabatiisie mu Lisina lia Paapa nende lio Mwana nende lia Roho Omutakatifu,
ne mubekisia khutiila bioosi nibio malile khumulaka enywe. Khebulila muli, ndi nanywe chindaalo choosi, khukhwola khu siakamo sie chiselukho.”

Lirakikha lie Lomo Endayi eya Yesu Kristo Omwana owa Wele
nga omung'oosi Isaya ne aandika ali,
Wele aloma ali,
“Ndaruma Omurumwa wase ebweeni wowo,
khu khurekekhera ewe engila.”
“Rekekha kumuyila kwo Mwami,
kololosia chingila chewe nicho acha khubirirakho!”
Nio Yoana Omubatiisi abonekha mu sichiimi ne elwacha libatiisia lie liliekanila ne khubeelwa bubwoni.
Babaandu bakali khukhwama mu sibala sie Buyuda ne mu lukoba lwa Yerusalemu becha khumurekeeresia. Beyama bubwoni bwabwe, mala ababatiisia mu luuchi lwa Yoritani.
Elwacha ne aloma ali “Omundu oliicha enyuma wase ali omukali khu khukhila ese. Se nolaana khukhwinama aasi ngangulule biraaro biewe tawe,
ese mubatiisia enywe mu meechi, ne naye akhamubatiisie enywe mu Roho Omutakatifu.”
Mu ndaalo echo Yesu echa khukhwama Nasareti mu sibala sia Kalilaya, mala Yoana amubatiisia mu Yoritani.
Abwene ne abwene nga Yesu ne arura mu meechi, abona likulu liekuulwe mala Roho amwikhakho nga liuusi.
