Kumumilo kwauliilikhana khukhwama mwikulu ne kuloma kuli, “Ewe oli Omwana wase Omusiime. Nasiimisibwe nawe.”
Abwene ne abwene Roho amuyila mu sichiimi,
nimwo aamenya khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane, Sietani ne amukhaka. Chisaang'i che mundaa chosi chabaamo, ne kakhali malaika beecha bamuyeeta.
Enyuma wa Yoana khuaambwa, Yesu aacha mu Kalilaya mala elwacha Elomo Endayi eya Wele
ali, “Siise siolile, ne bubwami bwa Wele buli siimbi! Yekanila bubwoni bwenywe mala musuubile mu Lomo Endayi yino!”
Nga Yesu akeenda khu sikiingi sie nyanja eya Kalilaya, abona banaabi babili, Simoni ne wandaaye Andereya banaaba ching'eeni ne lutiimba.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Nondekho mala ndamwekisia khu naaba babaandu,”
abwene ne abwene balekha chindiimba chabwe bacha naye.
Nga ne esendakho atiiti, abona wandaaye ne wandaaye babili lundi, Yakobo ne Yoana basoleeli ba Sebetayo. Baba mu liaaro liabwe bang'oona chindiimba chabwe.
Ao ne ao Yesu ababona, abalaanga; mala balekha raarawabwe Sebetayo mu liaaro ne bakholi mala nibo bacha ne Yesu.
Yesu ne babeeka bewe bacha mu lukoba lwa Kaperinaumu, oli endaalo eya sabato yoola acha mu sinakooki arakikha khukhwikisia.
Engila niyo ekisiliangamo yakila babaandu babamuulila bauka lukali. Sikila se aaba nga babekisia be Lilaka tawe, ne kakhali, ekisianga ne bunyali.
Siise esio omundu owaba ne sisieeno echa mu sinakooki mala apa lulwang'a ali,
“Wenya siina khwifwe, Yesu owa Nasareti? Oli ano khu khubunia efwe? Nakhumanyile ndi ewe oli Omurumwa owa Wele Omutakatifu!”
Yesu arafwira sisieeno esio ali, “Sila mala orure mu mundu yuno!”
Sisieeno esio siasisiikha omundu oyo lukali, siapa lulwang'a mala siamururamo.
Babaandu boosi barangararwa mala barakikha khuloma bali, “Makana siina kano? Lundi bareebana bali se kanyala kaaba kamekisio kamaya tawe ku? Omundu yuno ali ne bunyali bwe khuyibila bisieeno mala bimuria!”
Mala kamakhuwa ka Yesu kasalanila khangu buli abuundu mu sibala sia Kalilaya.
Yesu ne babeeka bewe, alala ne Yakobo ne Yoana barura mu sinakooki mala bacha waaba Simoni ne Andereya.
Masalaawe owa Simoni aaba ne bulwaale bwe kumureengo mala aba akonile khu sitanda, nga Yesu ne olao bamuboolela ko muloosi oyo.
Acha, amutiila kumukhono, amuyeeta khukhwinyokha mala aona kumureengo arakikha khu baliisia.
Nio nga enyanga yakwa, babaandu bareera khu Yesu balwala bulwaale buli lukano nende be bisieeno.
Babaandu be mu lukoba olwo boosi bebuusia ebweeni we nju eyo.
Yesu aaonia babaandu bakali ba baaba ne bulwaale lukano na lukano, lundi aoona bisieeno bikali. Se aanakho bubweyaangu khu bisieeno bilome siindu siosi siosi tawe, sikila biaba biamumanya.
Mu makhelebeende, enje ne siili khubayuukha tawe Yesu enyokha arura munju acha enje we lukoba abuundu niio omundu akhaba tawe, asabilao.
Ne Simoni ne basaale bewe barura bacha khumuyiima.
Ne nga bamunyoola bamuboolela bali, “Buli mundu alakhuyiimanga ewe.”
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Lekha khuche mu birekere bibiindi biili siimbi. Khoya nilwache burume mu birekere ebio bioosi, sikila kano kakakila nio necha.”
Khwako akeenda mu Kalilaya mwoosi ne elwacha burume mu chisinakooki ne khurusia bisieeno.
Omundu we kamakele echa khu Yesu, asikama aasi, amwekoonjelela ali, “Waaba ne wenya khu khumbonia, onyala wambonia.”
Nio Yesu amukholela siisa sikali, amutilakho mala amukobosia ali, “Nenya, ona!”
Abwene ne abwene, omundu oyo aona bulwaale bwe kamakele.
Nio Yesu amuboolela arekukhe khangu
ne khumutanyilila ali, “Rekeeresia, okhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi kamakhuwa kano tawe. Ne kakhali yiluungikha oche khu musaayi akhubone khukhwekesia buli mundu abuwaanga mbo ewe waonile, mala oaane embosio niyo Musa alaka.”
Nio omundu oyo acha mala arakikha khusalanisia kamakhuwa kano buli abuundu. Ng'ali amubuyila abiriirira akhola Yesu khunyala khucha mu lukoba olwo abuwaanga tawe. Ne kakhali ekhala abwikisi yeng'ene mala babaandu becha niio ali khukhwama buli lubeka.

Enyuma we chindaalo ndiiti Yesu akobola mu Kaperinaumu mala kamakhuwa kasalanila bali echile ali engo.
Nio babaandu bakali becha bebuusia alala, mala bubwangu khubao bwosi bwosi akhaba mu matooche tawe. Yesu aba alikho abelwachila burume.
Babaandu bane boolao ne bameemile omundu owafwokoya khumuyila khu Yesu.
Ne se banyala khukhwosia omulwale khu Yesu tawe sikila babaandu baba bakali. Khwako bekula kumwanya khu nju khu ngaaki mala bekhisiliamo omulwale owaba nakonile khu mukeeka kwewe.
Yesu nga abona lisuubila liabwe, aboolela omulwale oyo ali, “Mwana wase bubwoni bwowo bwabeleelwe.”
Balala khu bekisia be Lilaka, ba baaba ne bekhaale abuundu ao bebaasia bali,
“Anyindalile ariena khuloma kano? Yino eli embelekeu khu Wele! Wele yeng'ene niye onyala abeela omundu bubwoni!”
Abwene ne abwene Yesu amanya niko baba ne bebaasia nio aababoolela ali, “Siina sikila ne mwibaasia biindu nga bino biri?
Lili liliangu khuboolela omundu owafwokoya yuno oli, ‘Bubwoni bwowo bwabeleelwe,’ namwe khuloma oli, ‘Yinyokha obukule kumukeeka kwowo mala oche?’
Ndamwekesia abuwaanga ndi Omwana wo Mundu ali ne bunyali bwe khubeela bubwoni khu sibala khuno.” Nio aboolela omundu owafwokoya oyo ali,
“Yinyokha obukule kumukeeka kwowo mala oche engo!”
Nga babaandu baba ne basiloleelela, omundu oyo enyokha eema, mala ao ne nao abukula kumukeeka kwewe arekukha, boosi ba babao barangararwa mala bafumia Wele. Ne khuloma bali, “Khukhabonakho siindu siri tawe!”
Yesu akobola lundi khu sikiingi sie nyanja eya Kalilaya. Babaandu bakali becha niio ali mala arakikha khubekisia.
Nga aba nakeenda, abona Lawi omwana owa Alufayo omuroosi owe busuuru ekhaale munju nimwo baroseriangamo busuuru. Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nondekho.” Lawi enyokha mala amuloondakho.
Nga aba ne ekhaale khu sialwa munju mwa Lawi, baroosi be busuuru bakali ne babooni baba bamuloondilekho mala boosi bekhala naye alala ne babeeka bewe.
Babekisi be kamalaka ka Musa, ba baaba Bafarisayo, babona bali Yesu alikho alia ne baroosi be busuuru ne babooni. Nio bareeba babeeka bewe bali, “Siina sikila nalia ne baroosi be busuuru ne babooni?”
Yesu aulila mala abakobosia ali, “Babaandu baali balamu se benya busilikhi bwo musilikhi tawe, ne kakhali baali balwale babenya busilikhi. Ese se necha khulaanga baluungi tawe, ne kakhali necha khulaanga babooni.”
Endaalo ekiindi babeeka ba Yoana Omubatiisi ne Bafarisayo baba beyimaane khulia. Babaandu balala becha khu Yesu mala bamureeba bali, “Siina sikila babeeka ba Yoana ne Bafarisayo beyimana khulia ne babowo tawe?”
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Bakeni mu siselelo banyala beyimana khulia mala omusoleeli niye baakhile naliio ku? Se kanyalikhana tawe. Omwene siselelo naliio se banyala beyimana khulia tawe.
Ne kakhali chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho omwene siselelo alikho acha khu baruramo, abwenao niio balieyimana khulia.
“Mbao onyala abukula silaka sie ngubo embia asinabila khu ngubo ekhale tawe. Sikila silaka siyia esio silekhuuna mala sitase khutabula engubo ekhale eyo.
Namwe se aliio onyala abukula endali embia akichukha mu oochwa eye ndali ekhale tawe, sikila endali embia elatabula eoochwa ekhale mala endali ne oochwa bioombi bionekhe. Khwako, endali embia khukhwola bakichukhe mu oochwa embia.”
Nio Bafarisayo baboolela Yesu bali, “Lilaka liefwe se lifukiilila babeeka bowo khukhola kano khu ndaalo eya sabato tawe.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Khaba mukhasomakho niko Daudi akhola siise nisio enyela siakhulia alie tawe? Niio abela ne njala alala ne babaandu bewe,
aacha munju eya Wele mala alia kumukaati nikwo baelesia Wele nga siianwa. Kano kekholekha siise nisio Abiatari aaba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali. Khuloondekhana ne Lilaka liefwe, abele basaayi bong'ene nibo banyala balia kumukaati kuno. Ne kakhali Daudi aalia mala aelesia ne babaandu bewe.”
Ne Yesu amaliilisia ali, “Esabato eliio sikila Omundu, omundu se abuumbwa sikila esabato tawe.
Sikila Omwana wo Mundu ali Omwami we ndaalo eya Sabato yosi.”

Nio Yesu akobola mu sinakooki mala omundu owafwokoya kumukhono abamo.
Babaandu balala babamo benya khu sitaka Yesu khulwe khuonia omundu oyo khu ndaalo eya sabato, khwako bamuloleelela babone ne amuonia namwe tawe.
Nio Yesu aboolela owafwokoya ali, “Yiicha ebweeni eno.”
Mala areeba babaandu ali, “Lilaka liefwe likhufukiilila efwe khukhola siina khu ndaalo eya Sabato? Khuyeeta namwe khukhola kamabi? Khuonia bulamu bwo mundu namwe khukhwira?” Babaandu abo se bamukobosiakho siindu tawe.
Yesu aambwa lirima abaloleelela, lundi siise esio abakholela siisa sikila khunaania ne khukorwa khwabwe, nio aboolela omundu oyo ali, “Kololosia kumukhono kwowo.” Akukololosia mala kwaona.
Khwako Bafarisayo barura mu sinakooki mala bakhola etoloondo ne babeeka be kumukaanda kwa Herodi, mala bakhola ekwangwaani eye khukhwira Yesu.
Yesu ne babeeka bewe bacha khu nyanja eya Kalilaya, mala babaandu bakali bamuloondakho. Baba bamile Kalilaya, e Buyuda,
e Yerusalemu, khukhwama mu sibala sia Itumeya, khukhwama mu sibala sie bukwe nooli mu Yoritani, lundi khukhwama embi ne chingoba cha Tiro ne Sidoni. Babaandu bano boosi beecha khu Yesu sikila baba bauliile niko Yesu aakholanga.
Babaandu baba bakali mala bakila Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, barekekhe liliaaro elwachilekho ne ali khu nyanja nio babaandu bakhamumiina tawe.
Aba aonisie babaandu bakali ne abo boosi ba baaba balwale baba balikho beyindikilisia bamwolekho mala bamutiilekho.
Ne buli lwosi babaandu ba baba ne bisieeno nga bamubonanga bakwichanga aasi ebweeni wewe ne khukukuula bali, “Ewe oli Omwana owa Wele!”
Yesu aboolela bisieeno ne aandalasia ali bikhaboolela omundu okundi yesi yesi bili niye ali naanu tawe.
Nio Yesu acha khu sikulu alaanga nibo asiima, beecha niio ali
ne arobora ekhumi na babili nibo alaanga ali Barumwa, ababoolela ali “Namuroboore enywe khuba ne nase. Lundi ndamuruma khucha khukhwilwacha burume
ne mulaba ne bunyali bwe khurusia bisieeno.”
Bano nibo ekhumi na babili nibo aarobora: Simoni (niye Yesu alaanga ali Petero),
Yakobo ne wandaaye Yoana babaana ba Sebetayo (nibo Yesu alaanga ali Boanerike, sifuno bali babaandu be lueni),
Andereya, Filipo, Baturimayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo omwana owa Alufayo, Tatayo, Simoni Omukanaani
ne Yuda Isikarioti owachaama Yesu.
Nio Yesu acha engo. Lundi babaandu baba bakali bakila Yesu ne babeeka bewe khuba ne siise sie khulia tawe.
Nga balebe bewe baulila bario, berusia khu muliinda sikila babaandu balomanga bali, “Alaluukhe.”
Nio Yesu abalaanga mala ababoolela mu Lukano ali, “Sietani anyala ariena arusia Sietani?
Bubwami ne bukabukhanamo, se buyiindila tawe,
enju yaaba ne kabukhanamo se yiima tawe.
Khwako bubwami bwa Sietani bwakabukhanamo bipupu, se buyiindila tawe. Ne kakhali busalaanila mala bwoole khu siakamo.
“Mbao yesi yesi onyala khwibwaakala enju yo mundu we kamaani mala amunuule bibiindu biewe ne akhanyoile aboa omwenenju tawe. Khukhwola aboe omwenenju nio anyale khunuula bibiindu biewe.
“Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, babaandu banyala babeelwa bubwoni bwabwe nende ke mbelekeu koosi niko banyala balomaloma.
Ne kakhali oyo okholela Roho Omutakatifu embelekeu se alibeelwa tawe. Sikila akholile bubwoni bwa mindali.”
(Yesu aaboola kano sikila babaandu balala baba baboola bali, “Ali ne bisieeno.”)
Mala maawe owa Yesu ne bawandaaye boola, beema enje mala barumania likhuwa mukari khumulaanga
sipupu sie babaandu baba bekhaale babotookheleele Yesu, mala bamuboolela bali, “Maao ne bawandaayo bali enje, benya bakhubone.”
Nio Yesu akobosia ali, “Maayi niye naanu? Ne wandaayase niye naanu?”
Alola babaandu bamwikhaaleo mala aloma ali, “Bano nibo maayi ne bawandaayase!
Oyo yesi yesi okhola lilienya lia Wele niye wandaayase, omukooko wase, lundi niye maayi.”

Arumikhira chingano khu bekisia bibiindu bikali, ne ababoolela ali,
“Rekeeresia! Omumiichi arura ne bumiicho, khucha khumiicha
nga namiicha bumiicho mu mukuunda, bulala bwakwa khu ngila, mala chinyuni checha chabuboocha,
bubuundi bwakwa khu lwanda nikhwo liloba likhaba likali tawe, khwako bwamela khangu.
Nga kumuumu ne kwarura kwosia bimelwa bioma sikila chiisi chaba chikhacha aasi tawe.
Bumiicho bubuundi bwakwa mumawa mala oli bukhula kamawa kauna bimelwa ebio khwaama siindu tawe.
Ne bumiicho bubuundi bwakwa mwiloba lilayi mala bwarura, bwakhula, mala bwaama. Bulala bwaama bibiaamo kamakhumi kataru, bubuundi kamakhumi sita ne bubuundi emia.”
Yesu amaliilisia ali, “Ne oli ne kamaru ulila!”
Nga Yesu ne aba yeng'ene, balala khwaabo babamuulila bamwichakho ne babeeka ekhumi na babili ne bamureeba abenooselie chingano chino.
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwafunulibwa kakekisa ke Bubwami bwa Wele, ne kakhali khu baandi boosi kali busa mu ngano,
bakhaulila se bamanya tawe.
Ne kakhali banga babona lundi baulila, andi bakobolele Wele mala ababeela.’ ”
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Se mumayile lukano luno tawe? Aba mukhamanye lukano luluundi lwosi lwosi muriena?
Omumiichi amiicha elomo eya Wele,
babaandu balala bali nga bumiicho bubwakwa khu ngila, nga baulila elomo abwene ne abwene Sietani echa akirusiamo.
Babaandi nabo bali nga bumiicho bubwakwa khu lwanda. Nga baulila elomo bakiakanila ne busangaafu.
Ne kakhali likhuwa elio se libekhalamo tawe. Lundi se liba ne chiisi mu miooyo kiabwe tawe. Nio oli butinyu namwe sinyaasio siicha khulwe elomo chana eyo, ne bakiekaana khangu.
Ne babaandi nabo bali nga bumiicho bubwakwa mumawa, bano bali baulila elomo,
mala liliendekhelela khwimenya lie biise bino, khusiima buiinda, ne liliekoomba lie bibiindu bibiindi bioosi lingilamo mala libakhiingilila khukhwaama bibiaamo.
Ne babaandu babaandi bali nga bumiicho bubwakwa mwiloba lilayi, baulila elomo, bakifukiilila mala baama bibiaamo kamakhumi kataru, babaandi sita ne babaandi emia.”
Siosi siosi nisio bakisa, sikhabuulwe, ne siosi siosi sisiafuunikhwa, sikhafuunulibwe.
Ne oli ne kamaru, ulila!”
Omundu ooli nabio, akhatasibwe bikali, ne omundu ooli busa, naye akhanuulwe aakhaba sitiiti nisio ali nasio.”
Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Bubwami bwa Wele buli nga lukano luno, omundu amiicha bumiicho mu mukuunda kwewe.
Siilo akona, enyokha ne busiele, mala nga akhola ario aba bumiicho bulikho busekesa, ne niye se amanyakho nga busekesa tawe.
Liloba liliene likhola bimelwa ne bichoa ne khukhwaama bibiaamo. Sirakho sisina sitoro lundi kamasaafu ne ekhumaliilikha sikala siichakho
nio oli sialabile, ne omundu eecha mala akesa, sikila chindaalo che likesa cholile.”
Yesu areeba ali, “Nono khunyala khwafwaananisia Bubwami bwa Wele nende siina? Lukano siina nilwo khunyala khwarumikhira khubwinoosia?
Bubwami bwa Wele buli nga omundu owabukula khamiicho khatiiti khe kumupeeli mala abiaala.
Enyuma we siise sitiiti khachoa khekhola kumurongooro kumuboofu khukhila kikiindi kioosi. Kuraakho chisakia chimboofu mala chinyuni chombakhakho biswi mala chimenyakho.”
Yesu elwachilanga babaandu narumikhira chingano chingali nga luno, ababoolela kamakali khuloondekhana ne limanya liabwe.
Abeele se anyala abalomalomakho nakharumikhire chingano tawe, ne kakhali ne ali ne babeeka bewe, abenooselianga buli siindu.
Oli ekolooba we ndaalo ng'eneyo, Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Khekhwambukhe engelekha we nyanja.”
Khwako bakabukhana ne babaandu, babeeka bewe bengila mu liaaro nilio aba ne ekhalemo, ne barekukha ne naye. Kamaaro kakaandi kabao.
Oli basiili embembeesi eye kamaani yaucha, mala bibuli bie kameechi biarakikha khu khupa liliaaro, aramira atiiti kameechi kechulemo.
Yesu aba enyuma we liliaaro alikho akona, etikiiye. Babeeka bamusiisimusia ne baloma bali, “Omwekisia, khaba se weendekheleelekho oli khunyala khwafwa tawe?”
Yesu enyokha eema mala arafwira embembeesi ali, “Yakama! Lundi aboolela bibuli ali yenjeela embembeesi yakama mala enyanja yayenjeela.”
Nio Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Siina ne muriire? Se muli ne lisuubila tawe?”
Ne kakhali baba ne buuri bukali mala bareebana bali, “Yuno naanu niye? Akhaba embembeesi ne bibuli bie kameechi bimuulila!”

Yesu ne babeeka bewe boola engelekha khu nyanja eya Kalilaya, mu sibala sie Bakerasi.
Nga Yesu narura mu liaaro, akaanana ne omundu owaba namenyile mu biliindwa, omundu yuno aaba ne sisieeno
mala aba amenya mu biliindwa. Se abao bele onyala amuboa khu minyololo tawe.
Kamakhabi kamakali bamuboanga bikele ne kamakhono, ne buli siise akitulanga kiminyololo kie khu makhono ne bikele. Aba ne kamaani kamakali lukali beele se aliio omunyala tawe.
Siilo ne kumuusi akeendanga mu biliindwa ne mu bikulu, ne apa lulwang'a ne khukhwikhalakaka ne kamabaale.
Nga ne abona Yesu ne asiili sinaao, atima mala amusaaya,
mala apa lulwang'a mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Yesu Omwana owa Wele owe Angaaki Lukali! Wenya orie khwise? Khu siisa sia Wele khusaba ndi, okhambukuuma tawe.”
(Aaloma ario sikila Yesu aba alikho aloma ali “Sisieeno rura mu mundu yuno.”)
Yesu amureeba ali, “Ewe bali naanu?” Amukobosia ali, “Lisina liase bali ‘Lechoni’ sikila khuli bakali.”
Abelelela khu saba Yesu ali akharusia bisieeno mu sibala esio tawe.
Liabao lituuli lie chingurwe liaba a sikulu liaaya.
Nio bisieeno biasaba Yesu bili, “Khulekhe khuche mungurwe echo.”
Nio biarura mu mundu oyo, abilekha biacha mungurwe. Lituuli lie chingurwe liaba liola embi chielefu chibili, liatirimukha liaweela mu nyanja mala liafwilamo.
Babaayi ba baaba ne baaya belukha, basalanisia kamakhuwa mu lukoba ne mu sirekere mwoosi. Babaandu bacha balola kakekholeekhe,
ne nga bacha niio Yesu ali babona omundu niye bisieeno biabamo ekhaale ao, efwarire chingubo lundi ali ne kamakesi kamalayi, mala buli mundu auka.
Abo ba babona kakekholeekhe baboolela babaandi ko mundu oyo ne chingurwe.
Khwako baboolela Yesu arure mu sibala siabwe.
Nga nilwo Yesu aba ne engila mu liaaro, omundu owaba ne bisieeno amusaaya ali, “Nosiima khuche fwembi!”
Ne kakhali Yesu se afukiilila ache naye tawe. Amuboolela ali, “Kobola engo wenywe mala oboolele balebe bowo niko Omwami akhukholeele lundi nga ali ne siisa khwiwe.”
Nio omundu oyo acha mu Tekapoli, aboolela babaandu niko Yesu amukholeele, ne boosi ba baulila bauka.
Yesu akobola engelekha we nyanja mala babaandu bakali becha niio aaba khu sikiingi.
Yairo mulala khu bemeelesi be sinakooki oola, nga ne abona Yesu, asikama ebweeni wewe.
Amusaba mu bung'ali ali, “Omwana wase omukhaana ali omulwale po, nosiima yiicha mala omurekho kamakhono, nio aone.”
Nio Yesu acha ne Yairo, babaandu bakali bamuloondakho.
Abao omukhasi mulala owaba ne ekibeeno khu miiko ekhumi na kibili.
Akhaba ne asilikhwa ne basilikhi bakali, ne khurumikhira chirupia chewe choosi, se aona tawe, ne kakhali bulwaale bwachiililila khutasa.
Aba auliile kamakhuwa ka Yesu, mala echela emukoongo wa Yesu mu lutiri olwo,
ne ebaasia ali, “Natiila busa khu ngubo yewe, ndaona.”
Atiila khu ngubo eya Yesu mala abwene ne abwene ekibeeno yakama. Mala eulila ali ng'ali aonile.
Abwene ne abwene Yesu amanya ali kamaani kamwamilemo, mala ekhebukha areeba ali, “Naanu otiilile khu ngubo yase?”
Babeeka bewe bamukobosia bali, “Se waboone babaandu nga bakhilile, siina sikila ne oreeba oli naanu okhutililekho?”
Yesu achiililila khulola eyi ne neyi khukhwenya khubona naanu omutiililekho.
Omukhasi oyo amanya kamwikholekhekho mala echa naterema mu buri, asikama ebweeni wa Yesu, mala amuboolela bung'ali bwoosi.
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Mukhaana wase, lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie, cha mumuleembe, mala oone bulwaale bwowo.”
Nga Yesu aba ne asilomaloma ario barumwa balala khukhwama munju eya Yairo becha bamuboolela bali, “Omukhaana wowo afwiile onaanisilia siina omwekisia?”
Yesu se abukulamo lukeendo mu makhuwa kabwe tawe. Ne kakhali aboolela Yairo ali, “Okharia tawe, suubila busa.”
Se afukiilila omundu okundi khucha naye tawe, ne kakhali Petero, Yakobo ne wandaaye Yoana.
Boola anju owa Yairo nio Yesu aulila bililo bikali lundi abona likoyaana,
Engila munju ababoolela ali, “Likoyaana lino lioosi lia siina? Mulalilanga siina? Omukhaana yuno se afwiile tawe ne kakhali alikho akona!”
Mala babaandu bamuchekha, naye abarusia munju, abukula maawe ne raraawe bo mwana ne babeeka bewe bataru, bacha mu lusiro nimwo omwana chana aba ne akonile.
Amutiila kumukhono amuboolela ali, “Talita kumi,” liboola lili, “Mukhaanawe yinyokha!”
Ne mala abwene ne abwene enyokha akeenda (aba kimiiko ekhumi na kibili). Nga kano kekholekha, boosi barangararwa lukali,
Yesu abatanyilila lukali ali bakhaboolelakho omundu okundi tawe, mala aboola ali, “Muelesiekho siindu alie.”

Yesu arura abuundu ao mala ela mu lukoba lwe wabwe, babeeka bewe bamuloondakho.
Khu ndaalo eya Sabato arakikha khukhwekisia mu sinakooki. Babaandu bakali babamo. Ne nga bamuulila, bauka bareeba bali, “Amisie waena kano koosi? Limanya siina nilio aelesiibwe lino? Akholanga ariena kamayia?
Se ali niye ong'oonanga bibiindu bie chimbao, omusoleeli owa Maria, lundi wandaaye owa Yakobo, Yosefu, Yuda ne Simoni? Bakooko bewe se bamenyile ano?” Khwako bamuloba.
Se akholakho kamayia kosi kosi tawe, ne kakhali ara kamakhono kewe khu balwale batiiti ne khubaonia.
Auka lukali sikila babaandu se baba ne lisuubila tawe.
Nio Yesu akeenda mu birekere ebweeneyo ne ekisia babaandu.
Alaanga babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili mala abaruma babili babili. Abaelesia bunyali bwe khurusia bisieeno,
mala abalakiilisia ali, “Mukhabukulakho sisiindu siosi siosi mwacha nasio khu lukeendo luno tawe, ne kakhali esiimbo yong'ene, mukhasutakho siakhulia, elolooti eye babaandu babesabiilisia namwe chirupia mu mifuko kienywe tawe.
Fwara biraaro, ne mukhasuta lisiati liliindi tawe.”
Lundi aloma ali, “Niyo bamwekhoyela, yikhala munju omwo khukhwola nga ne murekukha khukhwama abuundu ao.
Ne mucha mu lukoba nilwo bakhamwekhoyela tawe, namwe nimwo bakhamurekeeresia tawe, ruramo mala musiisimule lutamuusi lwe khu bikele bienywe. Olwo lukhabe buloli khu nibo!”
Nio bacha belwachila babaandu balekhe bubwoni bwabwe.
Barusia bisieeno bikali, lundi baakha balwale kamafura mala baona.
Babaandi baloma bali, “Yuno Elicha niye.” Babaandi baloma bali, “ali nga mulala khu bang'oosi be khaale.”
Nga Herodi ne aulila, aaloma ali, “Yuno ali Yoana Omubatiisi niye neera enyokhe khukhwama emakoombe.”
Herodi yuno niye owaana lilaka khutiila Yoana, bamuboe kiminyololo ne khumura mu siboe. Herodi aakhola kano sikila omukhasi Herotia niye anuula wandaaye Filipo.
Yoana Omubatiisi aboolelanga Herodi ali, “Se buli bulayi ewe khunuula wandaayo omukhasi tawe.”
Nio omukhasi Herotia, aambila Yoana sikhoonde mala enya khumwiira, ne se anyala tawe sikila Herodi.
Herodi aba aria Yoana sikila amanya ali Yoana aba omulayi lundi omutakatifu, khwako amuliinda bulayi. Aba asiima khumurekeeresia, akhaba ne ananisibwanga mu mwoyo kwewe buli siise nisio amurekeeresianga.
Ekhumaliilikha omukhasi Herotia anyoola bubweyaangu, yaba endaalo eye khukhebulila khusaalwa khwa Herodi, ateekhela bakhoongo boosi be bubwami biakhulia, nende bakomanda be banamae, ne babemeelesi boosi be mu lukoongo lwa Kalilaya.
Omukhaana wo mukhasi Herotia echa mala akhina, asangaasia Herodi ne bakeni bewe. Nio omwami Herodi aboolela omukhaana ali, “Sabe siosi siosi nisio wenya mala ndakhuelesia.”
Herodi echuba lukali ne aloma ali, “Siosi siosi nisio usaba ndakhuelesia akhaba khukabana bubwami bwase!”
Khwako omukhaana arura enje mala areeba maawe ali, “Sabe siina?” Maawe amukobosia ali, “Kumurwe kwa Yoana Omubatiisi.”
Omukhaana akobola khangu khu mwami Herodi mala aboola ali, nenya umbe kumurwe kwa Yoana Omubatiisi khu lutelu siise sino.
Lino liabeelesia omwami lukali ne kakhali, se anyala khuloba tawe sikila khukhwechuba nikhwo echuba ebweeni we bakeni bewe.
Khwako arumania omusikaari arere khangu kumurwe kwa Yoana. Omusikaari acha mu siboe akhalaka kumurwe kwa Yoana,
mala areerera khu lutelu kumurwe kwa Yoana aelesia omukhaana, ne omukhaana akaanisia maawe.
Nga babeeka ba Yoana ne baulila becha babukula kumubili kwewe bacha bakusiikha.
Barumwa bakobola niio Yesu ali mala bamuboolela koosi niko bakholile ne khukhweyikia.
Babaandu babeechanga ne khucha baba bakali bakila Yesu ne barumwa bewe khunyoola akhaba bubweyaangu bwe khulia tawe. Nio Yesu aboolela barumwa ali, “Khakhwesendekho sinao nio munyoole bubweyaangu bwe khuuluukha.”
Nio bengila mu liaaro bacha niio omundu akhaaba tawe.
Babaandu bakali ba babona ne barekukha mala bamanya bali ali Yesu ne babeeka bewe, khwako batimila khundulo khwe nyanja boola niio baba ne bacha.
Oli Yesu arura mu liaaro, abona babaandu bakali mala abakholela siisa, sikila baba nga kamakheese kakhali no mwaayi tawe, mala arakikha khubekisia bibiindu bikali.
Nga bwaba ne bulikho ne bwilabula, babeeka bewe bamwichakho bamuboolela bali, “Bona bulikho bwilabula, mala abuundu ano mundaa busa baandu se bamenyilemo tawe,
basibule bache mu sirekere abuundu niio banyala bakula biakhulia balia.”
Ne kakhali Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwabene baelesie siakhulia balie.” Nabo bamukobosia bali, “Wenya khubukule chirupia
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Muli ne kimikaati kiinga? Cha mulole.” Nga bamala khulola becha bamuboolela bali khuli nakio kiraano ne ching'eeni chibili.
Khwako Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe khuboolela babaandu bekabemo bipupu mala bekhale aasi.
Nio babaandu bekhala aasi munyilili mu bipupu bilala kamakhumi karaano ne bibiindi emia.
Yesu abukula kimikaati kiraano ne ching'eeni chibili alola mu ngaaki aana orio khu Wele, amesulamo kimikaati mala aelesia babeeka bewe khukabila babaandu, lundi akabamo ching'eeni chibili echo khu boosi.
Buli mundu aalia mala ekura.
Nio babeeka babuusia bitonyi bie kimikaati ne ching'eeni bioola bikono ekhumi na bibili.
Babaandu babalia baba chielefu chiraano.
Siise esio Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe khucha mu liaaro banyoe bache e Betesaita engelekha, niye ne asiboolela babaandu bakobole ewabwe.
Enyuma we khukheesia babaandu acha khu sikulu khusaba.
Oli bwelabula, Yesu aaba yeng'ene khu sikiingi ne liliaaro liaba liolile akari we nyanja.
Yesu abona ali babeeka bewe balikho banaanisibwa ne ekhuungu. Nio enje ne bucha khusia, Yesu abolakho ne alikho akeenda khu meechi. Aba alikho acha khu babirakho,
nga bamubona baloma bali, “Simakoombe nisio!” Bakukuula.
Boosi nga bamubona bauka lukali.
Yesu alomaloma khangu ababoolela ali, “Nyindaalila! Niise mukharia tawe!”
Nio engila mu liaaro mala ekhuungu yema. Babeeka bewe bauka lukali po,
sikila abeele basibaasia nga ne alisiisie babaandu chielefu chiraano. Bukesi bwabwe se bwanyala khumanyilisia bulayi sisiekholeekhe tawe.
Bambukha enyanja becha khu lukoongo lwa Kenesareti; niio baboa liliaaro khu sikiingi.
Nga ne barura mu liaaro, ne babaandu bamanya Yesu.
Khwako bacha mu lukoongo lwoosi ne bamureerera balwale babwe khu mikeeka buli niio baulilanga bali ali.
Buli osi niio Yesu achichanga bamureereranga balwale mu birekere, mu ngoba ne bamusaba bali balwale batiile khu likemo lie ngubo yewe mala baone, ne boosi babatiilakho baona.

Bafarisayo balala ne babekisi be kamalaka ka Musa ba baaba ne baamile e Yerusalemu bebuusia niio Yesu ali.
Bemenieelesia babona bali babeeka ba Yesu balalichanga ne bakhasaabile kamakhono tawe, lino liekesia kimiima kimibi sikila se baba basaabiile mu ngila niyo Bafarisayo benya tawe.
Bafarisayo ne Bayaudi boosi baloondanga kamekisio niko banyoola khukhwama khu sikuuka, se balichanga ne bakhasaabile mu ngila eyenyibwa tawe.
Namwe se banyala balia siosi siosi sisiamile khu sooko ne bakhasisiingile tawe. Lundi baloonda kamalaka kakaandi kamakali niko banyoola nga ke khusiinga bikoombe, bibuumba bie kumukasa ne bulili.
Nio Bafarisayo ne babekisi abo bareeba Yesu bali, “Siina sikila babeeka bowo ne bakhaloonda kamekisio niko bakuuka bakhwekisia tawe, lundi balia ne bakhasaabile kamakhono tawe?”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Isaya aba ng'ali, nga aang'oola liiba lienywe ali lili lie bubacha, bulayi bwene nga liaandikwa lili,
‘Babaandu bano bambelesianga efuma ne kiminwa kiabwe,
ne kakhali kimiooyo kiabwe kili aleeyi nase.
Se lilikho ne bukhala enywe khu khusaaya ese tawe,
sikila mwekisia kamekisio ne kamalaka ko mundu busa oli manya ne kali ka Wele!’
“Mura alubeka Lilaka lia Wele mala mufukiilila kamekisio ke babaandu.”
Nio Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Muli ne ngila eye khuloba Lilaka lia Wele nio mutiile kamekisio kenywe mwabeene.
Sikila Musa aalaka ali, ‘Ria raraao nende maao’ ne ‘Yesi yesi okholela raraawe namwe maawe embelekeu akhoya erwa.’
Ne kakhali enywe mwekisia muli omundu aaba naali ne sisiindu nisio andi arumikhire khuyeeta raraawe namwe maawe mala aboole ali, ‘Sino sili Korubani.’ (Liboola lili sili sia Wele.)
Abwenao muboola muli aba abeleelwe khuyeeta raraawe namwe maawe.
Mu ngila yino, kamekisio niko mwekisiana kafunaka elomo eya Wele. Lundi bibiindu bibiindi biliio bikali busa nibio mukholanga, bie lukano luno.”
Nio Yesu alaanga babaandu bakali ababoolela ali, “Ndekeeresie mweesi mala muulile.
Se siliio sicha munda khukhwama enje sinyala siakhola omundu aba omunyaalu tawe. Ne kakhali sisiama mu mwoyo simukhola aaba omunyaalu.” [
Nono waaba ne oli ne kamaru ulila!]
Nga alekhana ne babaandu engila munju, babeeka bewe bamureeba abenooselie sifuno sie kamakhuwa kano
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Khane mwesi se muli ne limanya tawe. Se mubona muli sisiama enje siengila munda mwo mundu se simunyaalutia tawe? Se siliio sisiama enje siacha munda siamunyaalutia tawe
sikila se sicha mu mwoyo tawe, ne kakhali sicha munda mala sikelao ne sirura.” (Mu khuloma khurio Yesu afukiilila biakhulia bioosi ali biolaana khuliibwa.)
Mala achiililila khuloma ali, “Sisiama mu mwoyo nisio sikhola omundu aaba omunyaalu.
Sikila khukhwama mu mwoyo kwo mundu, kamebaasio kamabi karangirira omundu khukhola kamamayaanu nga, khunuula, khukhwira,
khukhola bueeyi, bulianga ne khukhola kamamayaanu ke lukano woosi nga bubeeyi, bunyaalu, khububa, khukiikha, lilielola ne busilu.
Bibiindu biibi bino bioosi biama mu mwoyo mala bikhola omundu aaba omunyaalu.”
Khukhwama ao Yesu arekukha acha mu ngoongo cha Tiro ne Sidoni. Engila munju mala khwenya omundu yesi yesi amanye tawe, ne kakhali se anyala khukhwekisa tawe.
Abao omukhasi owaba no mwana omukhaana owabamo ne sisieeno. Omukhasi oyo aboolelwa niko Yesu akholanga mala echa khangu akwa mu bikele biewe.
Omukhasi oyo aba Omukiriki khukhwama mu Foenike mu sibala sia Siria. Aasaba Yesu arusie sisieeno mu mukhaana wewe.
Ne Yesu amukobosia ali, “Lekha khuliisie babaana nio, se buli bulayi khubukula siakhulia sie babaana mala omwaatile chimbwa tawe.”
Omukhasi oyo aamukobosia ali, “Omwami, akhaba chimbwa chichiikhalanga aasi we mesa, chilichanga bitonyi nibio babaana baliilenge ne bikwa aasi.”
Khwako Yesu amukobosia ali, “Sikila niko olomile, kobola engo, olanyoola sisieeno esio siarurire mu mukhaana wowo!”
Nio omukhasi oyo aakobola engo, anyoola omukhaana wewe akonile khu sitanda ne sisieeno siamururiremo.
Yesu aama mu sibala siili siimbi ne Tiro mala abirira mu lukoba lwa Sidoni acha khu nyanja eya Kalilaya; khubirira Tekapoli.
Nio babaandu babaandi bamureerera omundu omumiinyi, mala basaba Yesu amurekho kamakhono,
Yesu amurusia mu sipupu sie babaandu baaba bong'ene, ara chinjala chewe mu maru ko omumiinyi, amuakha kamare khu lulimi.
Yesu aalola mu ngaaki mala ekhilisia kumwoyo aboolela omumiinyi ali, “Efufata” liiboola lili, “Yikukha.”
Ao ne nao omundu oyo ekukha khuulila mala aarakikha khulomaloma bulayi.
Nio Yesu aatanyilila babaandu ali bakhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi tawe. Nga atasa khubatanyilila nabo nga batasa khuboola.
Ne boosi babaulila bauka lukali po ne khuloma bali, “Akhola buli siindu bulayi, akhaba ne khuonia bamiinyi.”

Se siabira siise sileeyi tawe babaandu babaandi baaba ne be busiisie, se baba ne siakhulia siosi siosi tawe. Nio Yesu alaanga babeeka bewe ababoolela ali,
“Ndi ne siisa khu baandu bano sikila babeele nase luno chindaalo chitaru mala se bali nende nisio balia tawe.
Nababoolela ndi khe muche engo ne bakhalia tawe, balakwa khu ngila sikila balala baama aleeyi.”
Babeeka bewe bamureeba bali, “Mu siangalaamwe muno omundu anyala aanyoola biakhulia bie babaandu boosi bari?”
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Muli ne kimikaati kiinga?” Bamukobosia bali, “Khuli nakio saba.”
Aaboolela babaandu khukhwikhala aasi, mala aabukula kimikaati saba chana, aapila Wele orio, akimesulamo mala aelesia babeeka bewe khukaba babaandu mala babeeka bewe bakhola bario.
Lundi baaba ne ching'eeni ndiiti chiri, Yesu apila Wele orio mala ababoolela khuelesia babaandu.
Buli mundu aalia ekura, mala babeeka bewe babuusia bitonyi bibiarama bikono saba swa.
Babaandu babalia baba embi chielefu chine.
Yesu aboolela babaandu barekukhe, mala naye engila mu liaaro alala ne babeeka bewe bacha mu sibala sia Talimanuta.
Ne kakhali Yesu abakobosia mu khwikhilisia kumwoyo ali, “Sikila siina babaandu be selukho yino beenya khubona kamayia? Ese muboolela enywe ndi! Se kalibakhoo kamayia kaebwa khu baandu bano tawe!”
Yesu abalekha aakobola mu liaaro mala arakikha khukhwambukha engelekha we nyanja.
Babeeka ba Yesu baba bebiliile khusuta kimikaati kikiolaana, baba nende mulala kwong'ene mu liaaro.
Yesu abakaambila ali, “Yeliinda lundi ba meeso khuloondekhana ne limela lie Bafarisayo ne lia Herodi.”
Barakikha khuyingana ne baloma bali, “Aloma ari sikila se khuli ne kimikaati tawe.”
Yesu amanya niko baba ne balomaloma mala abareeba ali, “Siina ne muyingana sikila se muli ne kimikaati tawe? Se mumanyilekho siosi siosi tawe? Mu siili busa bang'ang'aafu?
Muli ne chimoni ne se mubona tawe, muli ne kamaru ne se muulila tawe? Se mukhebulila nga
namesulamo kimikaati kiraano khuliisia babaandu chielefu chiraano tawe? Bikono biinga bibiechula bitonyi bie kimikaati bibiarama?” Bamukobosia bali, “Bikono ekhumi na bibili.”
Yesu areeba ali, “Ne nga ne aamesulamo kimikaati saba khuliisia babaandu chielefu chine, mwabuusia bikono biinga bie bitonyi bie kimikaati bibiarama?” Bamukobosia bali, “Bikono saba?”
Nio abareeba ali, “Mala khukhwola siisie sino mukhamanyanga tawe?”
Beecha Betesaita nio babaandu balala bareera omundu omubofu khu Yesu mala bamwikoonjelela amutilekho.
Yesu atiila omubofu kumukhono mala bacha enje we sirekere. Nio Yesu amufucha kamare khu moni mala amurakho kamakhono, amureeba ali, “Onyala wabonakho siosi siosi ku?”
Nio omubofu oyo alola mu ngaaki mala afukiilila ali, “Yee ndikho mbona babaandu, ne kakhali babonekha nga kimirongooro ne kikeenda.”
Lundi Yesu ara kamakhono khu moni chewe, omubofu alola bulayi bubweene, ne khubona khwewe khwaba khulayi mala abona buli siindu mu ngila endayi po.
Yesu amuboolela ache engo ne lilakiilisia ali, “Okhakobola mu sirekere esio lundi tawe.”
Nio Yesu ne babeeka bewe bacha mu birekere bia Kaesarea-filipi. Nga baba ne bacha Yesu aabareeba ali, “Mboolele, babaandu baloma bali ese naanu?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Balala baloma bali ewe Yoana Omubatiisi, babaandi bali, ewe Elicha, ne babaandi nabo bali, ewe oli mulala khu bang'oosi.”
Yesu aabareeba ali, “Nenywe nanywe? Muloma muli ese naanu?” Petero aakobosia ali, “Ewe oli Kristo.”
Nio Yesu aabatanyilila ali, “Mukhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi tawe.”
Abwenao Yesu arakikha khukhwikisia babeeka bewe ali, “Omwana wo Mundu khukhwola anyaasibwe lukali ne khubiilwa ne babemeelesi, basaayi bakhulu ne babekisia be Lilaka. Alerwa, mala enyuma we chindaalo chitaru alamukhe.”
Aababoolela kano abuwaanga. Khwako Petero aamuyila alubeka amurafwira.
Ne kakhali Yesu ekhebukha aalola babeeka bewe, mala arafuira Petero naloma ali, “Ndureo Sietani, kamebaasio kowo, se kaama khu Wele tawe ne kakhali kaama khu mundu!”
Sikila yesi yesi owenya khuonia bulamu bwewe akhabutibie ne kakhali yesi yesi otibia bulamu bwewe sikila ese ne Lomo ndayi yino akhabuonie.
Silikhoo nisio omundu anyala anyoola kaaba bali anyoola bie sibala sioosi mala atibie bulamu bwewe ku? Se siliio tawe!
Siina nisio omundu anyala aana khunyoola bulamu bwewe?
Omundu yesi yesi naambwa chisoni sikila ese, ne kamekisio kaase kano mu ndaalo chimayaanu che bueeyi chino, aakhaba Omwana wo Mundu nakheche mu luyali lwa Paapa wewe ne bamalaika batakatifu akhamukholele niye chisoni.”

Nio Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, bali ano balala bakhalifwa tawe, khukhwola babone bubwami bwa Wele ne bwiicha ne kamaani.”
mala chingubo chewe chaba chiwaanga chwe, chiwaanga lukali khaba mbao na mulala mu sibala siosi onyala asiinga choola chirio tawe.
Babeeka bataru bano babona Elicha ne Musa ne balomaloma ne Yesu.
Nio Petero aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami, buli bulayi po efwe khuba ano, khayo khung'oone bisali bitaru, silala sisiowo, sisiindi sia Musa ne sisiindi sia Elicha.”
Petero se amanya niko alomaloma tawe sikila niye ne babaandi baba ne buuri bukali.
Abwenao, lifuumbi liecha mala liabafuunikha mala kumumilo kwaama mwifuumbi ne kuloma kuli, “Yuno ali Omwana wase omusiime khemumurekeeresie!”
Oli balola lundi, khubonakho omundu okundi tawe nakhali Yesu yeng'ene owaba ne asiili nabo.
Nga baba ne balikho ne bekha aasi we sikulu Yesu abatanyilila ali, “Mukhaboolelakho omundu niko muboone tawe, khukhwola Omwana wo Mundu nga nalilamukha khukhwama mu bafu.”
Bafukiilila litanyilila liewe khuboolelakho omundu okundi tawe, ne kakhali barakikha khureebana bong'ene busa bali, “Khulamukha khukhwama mu bafu liboola siina?”
Mala bareeba Yesu bali, “Siina babekisi be lilaka lia Musa ne baboolanga bali Elicha akheeche nio?”
Nio ababoolela ali, “Ng'li Elicha alikho echa khurekekha bibiindu nio. Ne siina sikila kamaandiko ne kaboola kali Omwana wo Mundu alanyaasibwa lukali ne babaandu khu muloba?
Kakhaba kario, muboolela enywe ndi Elicha echa khale ne kakhali babaandu bamubukula mu ngila niyo babeene benyelamo, nga nilwo kamaandiko kaboola khuloondekhana naye.”
Nga ne becha bakaanana ne babeeka babaandi babona babaandu bakali ba babotookheleele, lundi babekisia be Lilaka baba bayingana nabo.
Nga babaandu babona Yesu bauka lukali, batima bacha niio ali mala bamukheesia.
Nio Yesu areeba babeeka bewe ali, “Mulayingananga khu siina?”
Omundu mulala khukhwama mu baandu aloma ali, “Omwekisia, ndeerire omwana wase khwiwe sikila ali ne sisieeno lundi se anyala khulomaloma tawe.
Abeechanga oli simutiila, simumwaata aasi, abiita lifuro, aluma kameno mala aangalala busa. Mboleele babeeka bowo ndi basirusie, ne kakhali se banyalile tawe.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Muli babaandu mukhasuubila tawe! Ndaba nanywe khu siise siina? Ndamwikhaliilikha enywe khu siise siina? Reera ano omusoleeli chana.”
Bamureerera.
Nga sisieeno siabona Yesu, siapa aasi omusoleeli chana, ekalangasia aasi nabiita lifuro.
Nga Yesu abona ario areeba raraawe ali, “Abeele ari khukhwama khu siise siina?”
Raraawe akobosia ali, “Khukhwama bwana.
Khu makhabi kamakali sisieeno siakhakile khumwiira mu ngila eye khumumwaata mu mulilo ne mu meechi, aaba ne onyala khukholele siisa mala okhuyeete!”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Waaba wamwene ne onyala! Buli siindu sinyalikhana khuyo oli ne lisuubila.”
Ao ne nao, raraawe owo mwana omulwale eloocha ali, “Nasuubiile, ne kakhali njeete mbe ne lisuubila likali!”
Yesu abona ali babaandu bakali balikho bamwesendao, mala arafuira sisieeno esio ali, “Ewe sisieeno sie bumiinyi ne sie khuanda lulimi khulakiilisia ndi, rura mu musoleeli yuno mala okhamukobolamo lundi tawe!”
Sisieeno siapa lulwang'a siapa aasi omwana mala siamururamo. Omusoleeli yuno abonekha nga ofwiile, buli mundu aloma ali, “Yuno afwiile!”
Yesu amutiila kumukhono amuyeeta khukhwinyokha mala omusoleeli oyo eema.
Nga Yesu aba yeng'ene munju, babeeka bewe bamureeba mu bwikisi bali, “Siina sikila efwe ne khukhanyalile khurusia sisieeno esio?”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Sisieeno lukano luno, sirusibwao ne lisaba liong'ene mbao sisiindi siosi siosi sinyala siasirusia tawe.”
Yesu ne babeeka bewe barura ao babira mu Kalilaya. Se enya omundu amanye niio aaba tawe,
sikila aba alikho ekisia babeeka bewe ne ababoolela ali, “Omwana wo Mundu aliaanwa mu makhono ke babaandu, mala bamwire. Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru namalile khufwa, alilamukha.”
Ne kakhali se bamanya niko aloma tawe. Mala baba ne buuri khumureeba.
Boola Kaperinaumu, oli bacha munju Yesu areeba babeeka bewe ali, “Muyinganenge siina khu ngila?”
Se bamukobosia tawe, sikila khu ngila bayingananga bali naanu ooli omukali mu nibo babeene.
Yesu ekhala aasi mala alaanga babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili ababoolela ali, “Owenya khuba omurangisi khukhwola abe omumaliilisi khu boosi lundi omukholi owa boosi.”
Mala abukula omwana abwenao amwimisia ebweeni wabwe, amutiila mumaa mala ababoolela ali,
“Yesi yesi owakaanila omwana nga yuno ari mu lisina liase, aba anjakaanile ese. Ne oyo ounjakaanila ese se anjakaanila ese tawe ne kakhali oyo akaanila owanduma.”
Yoana aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwekisia khwaboone omundu arusia bisieeno mu khurumikhira lisina liowo mala khwamukaania, sikila se abechanga nafwe tawe.”
Ne kakhali Yesu abakobosia ali, “Mukhamukaania tawe, se aliio onyala akhola kamayia mu lisina liase mala mu siise sitiiti akeleo alomaloma kamamayaanu khwise tawe.
Khwako okhakhwenyela efwe kamabi tawe aba ali owefwe.
Yesi yesi omuelesia kameechi mu sikoombe munywe sikila muli babaase, ng'ali salatibia kumuruuru kwewe tawe.
“Yesi yesi okila mulala khu batiiti bano atibie lisuubila liewe mwise, bwakhabeele bulayi omwene oyo bamuboe lususi luboofu mwikosi mala bamumwaate mu nyanja.
Khwako kumukhono kwowo kwaaba ne kukhukhola otibie lisuubila liowo, kureme kururekho. Buli bulayi khucha mu bulamu ne kumukhono mulala khukhila khuba nakio kiombi mala oche mu mulilo kukhasima tawe. [
Ebweeneyo chinyeende chibalia se chifwichanga tawe, lundi kumulilo kuboosia se kusimaanga tawe.]
Ne sikele siowo siaba ne sikhukhola okwe mu bwoni sireme. Buli bulayi khucha mu bulamu ne sikele silala khukhila khucha mu mulilo ne bikele bioombi. [
Ebweeneyo chinyeende chibalia se chifwichanga tawe lundi kumulilo kuboosia se kusimaanga tawe.]
Ne emoni yowo yaaba ne khuyila mu bwoni kitomolemo, buli bulayi khucha mu Bwami bwa Wele ne moni ndala khukhila khuba nacho chombi mala oche mu mulilo.
Ebweeneyo chinyeende chibalia se chifwichanga tawe, lundi kumulilo kuboosia se kusimaanga tawe!
“Buli sia mulala alikwalaasibwa ne kumulilo nga chinyama che embosio chikwalaasibwa ne kmuunyu kumukhelekha.

Nio Yesu arura ao arekukha acha mu lukoongo lwe Buyuda, mala ambukha luluuchi lwa Yoritani. Babaandu bacha niio aba mala abekisia nga abekisianga buli lwosi.
Bafarisayo bacha niio aba ne bakhaka khu mukhaka ne bamureeba bali, “Khuboolele, lilaka liefwe lifukiilila omundu khulekhana no mukhasi wewe namwe tawe?”
Yesu abakobosia ne lireeba ali, “Lilaka siina nilio Musa amuelesia enywe?”
Bakobosia bali, “Musa afukiilila ali, omundu anyala aandikila omukhasi wewe ebarwa eye khulekhana mala amuoone.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Musa amuandikila lilaka lino ario sikila muli balume emirwe,
ne kakhali khukhwama mu lirakikha lie libaang'ana, ‘Wele abuumba owe siseecha nende owe siikhasi nga nilwo liiandiko liloma.’
‘Ne sikila kano omundu alalekha raraawe ne maawe mala aambaane no mukhasi wewe,
mala boombi babe mulala’ khwako se bali lundi babili tawe, ne kakhali mulala.
Nisio Wele aambaasiisie omundu yesi yesi akhasiabukhasia tawe.”
Oli bakobola munju, babeeka bareeba Yesu kamakhuwa kano.
Ababoolela ali, “Omundu olekhana no mukhasi wewe mala areere okundi omwenoyo aba akholela omukhasi wewe kamabi mu khukhola bueeyi.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, omukhasi olekhana no museecha wewe mala ache khu mundu okundi akhola bueeyi.”
Babaandu balala bareera babaana khu Yesu bali abarekho kamakhono, mala babeeka bewe nabo babarafwira.
Nga Yesu abona ario aambwa lirima, aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Lekha babaana beche niio ndi, mukhabakhiingilila tawe, sikila Bubwami bwa Wele buli bwe babaandu nga bano bari.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi yesi yesi okhakaanila bubwami bwa Wele nga omwana tawe, se alibwingilamo tawe.”
Nio abukula babaana aara kumukhono khu buli mulala abaelesia chikhabi.
Nga Yesu aaba ne arakikha lukeendo lwewe lundi, omundu atima echa asikama ebweeni wewe, amureeba ali, “Omwekisia omulayi, khola ndiena nio nyoole bulamu bwa mindali?”
Nio Yesu amureeba ali, “Siina sikila ne unaanga oli omulayi? Mbao omulayi tawe ne akhali Wele yeng'ene.
Wamanya kamalaka: ‘Okheera tawe, okhakhola bueeyi tawe, okheeba tawe, okhakikhila omundu tawe, okhabea tawe, ria raraao ne maao.’ ”
Omundu oyo aakobosia ali, “Omwekisia, khukhwama bwana naria kamalaka kano koosi.”
Yesu aamuloleelela mala aamusiima aamuboolela ali, “Wataambile sisiindu silala, cha okusie bibiindu bioosi nibio oli nabio mala oeleesie bataambi chirupia ne olaba ne buiinda mwikulu, nio wiche unondekho.”
Nga oyo aaulila ario, aabeelela mala aarekukha aacha ne asulunye sikila aaba omuiinda lukali.
Yesu aaloleelela babeeka bewe mala aaloma ali, “Bukhabe bulume lukali khu baandu baiinda khukhwingila mu bwami bwa Wele!”
Nio babeeka bewe besiindukhila khu makhuwa kano, ne kakhali Yesu aachiililila khubaboolela ali, “Baana baase, buli bulume lukali khukhwingila mu Bwami bwa Wele!
Lili liliangu khu ngamia khubirira mu mwanya kwe sindani, khukhila omuiinda khukhwingila mu Bwami bwa Wele.”
Khu kano babeeka bewe bauka lukali mala bareebana bali, “Nono, aba naanu onyala aaonisibwa?”
Nio Yesu aabaloleelela mala aabakobosia ali, “Kano se kanyalikhana khu baandu tawe, ne kakhali khu Wele mbao sikhanyalikhana tawe, buli siindu sinyalikhana khu Wele.”
Petero aakobosia ne aloma ali, “Lola efwe khwalekha buli siindu mala khwakhuloonda.”
Nio Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Yee kali ng'ali, muboolela ndi yesi yesi oolekha mungo mwewe namwe bawandaaye, namwe maawe, namwe raraawe, namwe babaana, namwe kumukuunda sikila ese ne Lomo Endayi,
acha khunyoola bikali mu bulamu buno. Alanyoola khukhwola emia, chinju, bawandaaye, bamaawe, babaana, kimikuunda ne khu khupisibwa siibi khwosi, ne chindaalo chichiichayo alinyoola bulamu bwa mindali.
Bakali baaliba be khunyoa, baliba bamaliilisi, ne baliba bamaliilisi baliba, be khunyoa.”
Yesu ne babeeka bewe baba bali khu ngila bacha Yerusalemu. Yesu aba arangiire ne babeeka bewe ba baaba ne liliesiindukha baba bamuloondilekho, ne babaandu babaandi ba baloondakho baba ne buuri. Abwenao lundi Yesu alaanga babeeka bewe alubeka ababoolela bibiindu bilikho biicha khumwekholekhakho.
Ababoolela ali, “Rekeeresia, khulikho khucha e Yerusalemu niio Omwana wo Mundu acha khuanwa khu basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki. Balamukhalakila lifwa mala bamuaane khu Be Chikholo,
bacha khu muchekheelela, bamufuchekho kamare, bamunyweekhe kimikhomwa mala bamwire, ne enyuma we chindaalo chitaru akhalamukhe.”
Yakobo ne Yoana babaana ba Sebetayo becha khu Yesu bamuboolela bali, “Omwekisia, khuli nende nilio khwenya okhuyeete.”
Yesu abareeba ali, “Siina nisio?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Endaalo niyo oliikhalila khu ndebe yowo eye bubwami eye luyali, khwenya fwesi khwikhale ne nawe, mulala ekhale kumukhono kwowo kumuseecha ne okundi kumukhasi.”
Ne kakhali Yesu ababoolela ali, “Se mwamanyile nisio mulikho musaba tawe, munyala mwanywela mu sikoombe sie sinyaasio nisio khukhwola nywelemo ku? Munyala mwabatiisibwa mu ngila niyo ese nja khubatiisibilwamo ku?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Yee khunyala.” Nio Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ng'ali mukhanywele mu sikoombe nisio nja khunywelamo ne khubatiisibwa mu ngila niyo nja khubatiisibwamo.
Ne kakhali se ndi ne bunyali bwe khurobora naanu ocha khukhwikhala kumukhono kumuseecha namwe kumukhasi tawe. Ali Wele niye ocha khuaana bubweyaangu buno khwaabo nibo aarekekhera.”
Nga babeeka babaandi ekhumi baulila, baambila Yakobo ne Yoana lirima.
Nio Yesu abalaanga boosi alala ababoolela ali, “Mumanyile muli abo balaangwa babaami be babaandu Be Chikholo, bali ne bunyali khu baandu, lundi babemeelesi bali ne bunyali bwoosi.
Ne kakhali kano se kali niko kaali mwinywe tawe, mulala khwinywe aaba ne enya abe omukali, khukhwola abe omukholi owa boosi,
mulala khwinywe aaba ne enya abe owe khunyoa khukhwola abe nasioobi owa boosi.
Sikila akhaba Omwana wo Mundu se echa nio bamukholele tawe, ne kakhali echa khukholela babaandu mala aane bulamu bwewe bube embosio khulwe babaandu bakali.”
Boola Yeriko, mala nga nilwo Yesu aaba ne arekukha ne babeeka bewe alala ne babaandu bakali, omubofu owasabanga buyeeti niye balaanga bali Batimayo omwana owa Timayo aba ekhaale khu ndulo khwe ngila.
Nga ne aulila ali Yesu owe Nasareti niye olikho obira, arakikha khulaanga lukali ali, “Yesu Mwana owa Daudi, kholele siisa.”
Babaandu bakali bamurafuira ne bamuboolela khusila, naye achiililila khulaanga lukali po ali, “Mwana owa Daudi, kholele siisa.”
Yesu eema aloma ali, “Muboolele eche” Nio, baboolela omubofu chana bali, “Sangaala, alikho akhulaanga!”
Nio amwaata eyo engubo yewe, asuna angaaki echa niio Yesu ali.
Yesu amureeba ali, “Wenya khukholele siina?” Omubofu aloma ali, “Omwekisia, nenya mbone lundi.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Khoche, lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie.” Ao ne nao, abona mala aloonda khu Yesu khu ngila okhwo.

Nga baba ne becha Yerusalemu embi ne lukoba lwa Betifake ne Betania, boola khu sikulu sia Miseituni. Yesu aruma babeeka bewe babili ebweeni
ne kamalaka kano, “Cha mu sirekere siili ebweeni esio, nga mwolamo kane munyoole baboyile epunda eng'ana niyo bakhatimilakho tawe, kikangulule mala munderere.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne amureeba sikila ne mukikangulula, muboolele muli Omwami akienya mala alakikobosia khangu.”
Nio bacha banyoola epunda yino khu ngila bakiboyile a muliango. Nga yaba ne bakikangulula,
ba baaba ne bemileo bareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne mulikho mukangulula epunda yino?”
Nio bakobosia busa nga Yesu aba ne ababooleele, mala abo bafukiilila babeeka khucha nayo.
Bareera epunda niio Yesu ali, bamwaata chingubo chabwe khu mukoongo kwayo, mala Yesu akiikhalakho.
Babaandu bakali baala chingubo chabwe khu ngila ne babaandi bafuna chisakia che kamasaafu bachisalanisia khu ngila.
Babaandu ba baaba ebweeni ne nyuma barakikha khuyokela bali, “Hosana, ali ne chikhabi owicha mwisina lio Mwami.
Wele aane chikhabi khu Bwami bubwiicha bwa Paapa wefwe omwami Daudi, Hosana khuyo oli angaaki! Omwami afume!”
Yesu engila mu Yerusalemu, acha mu Lukaangu alola buli siindu sisiabamo. Sikila bwaba bwelabuule, arura acha mu lukoba lwa Betania ne babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili.
Endaalo ekhola khabili Yesu aba ne njala nga baba ne baama e Betania.
Abona kumutuli sinaao kwechuule kamasaafu, acha alolakho ne kulikho chinduli, ne nga ola siimbi anyoola kamasaafu kong'ene. Sikila se siaba siise sie khukhwaama tawe.
Yesu aboolela kumutuli okwo ali, “Se aliio yesi yesi olilia enduli khukhwama khwiwe lundi tawe!” Babeeka bewe baulila naloma ario.
Nga boola mu Yerusalemu, Yesu engila mu Lukaangu mala atimania boosi ba baaba ne bakula lundi ne bakusia. Afumalikha chimeesa che baboofuli be chirupia ne chindebe chaabo ba baaba ne bakusia kamauusi,
mala khwenya omundu yesi yesi asute siosi siosi a luuya we Lukaangu tawe.
Nio ekisia babaandu ali, “Se liaandikwa lili, ‘Enju yase elilaangwa enju eye lisaba khu baandu Be Chikholo choosi’ tawe ku? Ne kakhali enywe mwakikholile libina lie banuuli!”
Basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki nga baulila kano barakikha khuyiima chingila che khukhwira Yesu. Baba ne buuri khu niye sikila babaandu boosi bauka lukali khulwe liliekisia liewe.
Oli bwelabula Yesu ne babeeka bewe barura mu lukoba.
Nga ne babirao kumutikhinyi, babona kumutuli okwo kwomile ne chiisi chosi.
Petero akhebulila kakekholekhana mala aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami, lola! Kumutuli nikwo walaamile kwomile.”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Ba ne lisuubila mu Wele.
Musuubisia ndi yesi yesi oboolela sikulu sino khusiuukha siche mu nyanja mala se ali ne liaayaaya mu mwoyo kwewe tawe, ne kakhali asuubile ali nilio alomaloma licha khwekholekha, lilienelio acha khukholelwa.
Khwako muboolela enywe ndi, ne osaba sisiindu mwisaba, suubila oli wasinyoolile lundi olaebwa nisio osabile.
Lundi nga nilwo wima ne osaba, beela omundu yesi yesi khu siindu siosi siosi, nio Raraawenywe ooli mwikulu amubeele bubwoni bwenywe. [
Ne mwaba ne mukhabeela babaandi tawe, aakhaba Raraawenywe ooli mwikulu yesi se alamubeela bubwoni bwenywe tawe.”]
Lundi boola mu Yerusalemu, nga Yesu aba ne akeenda mu Lukaangu, basaayi bakhulu, baandiki ne babemeelesi bamwichakho
bamureeba bali, “Bunyali siina nibwo oli nabwo khukhola bibiindu bino? Naanu owakhuelesia bunyali buno?”
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ndamureeba busa lireeba lilala, ne mwaba ne mungobosia ndamuboolela bunyali siina nibwo ndi nabwo bwe khukhola bibiindu bino.
Mboolele, Yoana anyoola waena bunyali bwe khubatiisia, bwaama khu Wele namwe khu mundu?”
Barakikha khuyingana babeene ne babeene bareebana bali, “Khulaloma khuli siina? Ne khuloma khuli, ‘Bwaama khu Wele,’ alaloma ali, ‘Siina sikila ne mukhaamusuubila niye tawe?’
Ne kakhali khunyala khwaloma khuli, ‘Khukhwama khu mundu’ ku?” (Baba ne buuri khu baandu, sikila buli mulala aamanya ali Yoana aaba omung'oosi.)
Khwako likobosia liabwe khu Yesu liaba lili, “Se khumanya tawe.”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Aakhaba ese seesi se muboolela ndi na bunyali siina khukhola bibiindu bino tawe!”

Oli siise sie khubuta chisabibu aruma nasioobi khu bakholi be mwiruuti anyoole sitonyi siewe.
Bakholi abo batiila nasioobi bamupa mala bamuoona akobolayo makhono mataaka.
Omwene liruuti aruma nasioobi okundi, bakholi chana bamwara kamakuma ne khumuambia chisoni.
Omwene liruuti aruma nasioobi okundi naye bamwiira mala bakhola bario khu bakali khu khupa balala ne khukhwira babaandi.
Omundu owarama khurumwa aba omusoleeli wewe omusiime. Ekhumaliilikha aruma omwana wewe yuno khu bakholi bano aaloma ali, ‘Ndi nasuubi kane barie omwana owase.’
Bakholi chana baboolana bali, ‘Yuno omwana wewe, yiicha khumwire, mala kimiaandu kiewe kino kilaba kikiefwe!’
Nio batiila omwana oyo bamwiira mala bamwaata kumubili kwewe enje we liruuti.”
Yesu abareeba ali, “Nono omwene liruuti alakhola siina? Alecha mala eere bakholi be mwiruuti abo ne khuelesia liruuti babaandu babaandi.
Ng'ali mwasomakho liiandiko lino:
‘Libaale nilio babombakhi baloba bali se lili ne bukhala tawe,
liliene ne liliene liabeele lie bukhala khukhila koosi.
Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi niye owakhola kano,
kali ke khuukia mu moni chefwe.’ ”
Babemeelesi be Bayaudi bakhaka khutiila Yesu, sikila bamanya bali Lukano luno luli khu nibo. Ne kakhali baba ne buuri sikila babaandu babaao bakali, khwako bamulekha bacha.
Bafarisayo balala ne babaandu babaandi be kumukaanda kwa Herodi barumwa khukhaka Yesu ne kamareeba.
Becha niio ali baloma bali, “Omwekisia, khumanyile khuli olomanga kang'ali, se wieendekhelelanga niko baandu bebaasia tawe, se winananga khumanya naanu niye naanu tawe, ne kakhali wekisianga bung'ali bwe kamakhuwa niko Wele enya khu baandu. Khuboolele, kali ng'ali bali khufunanga Lilaka liefwe khuruunga busuuru khu mwami owe Burumi? Khuruunge namwe tawe?”
Yesu anyoa abona kumureko kwabwe mala abakobosia ali, “Siina sikila ne mukhaka? Reera erupia ndole.”
Nio bamureerera ndala mala abareeba ali, “Kumurwe ne lisina liilikho bia naanu?” Bamukobosia bali, “Bia Kaisari.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Khwako, elesia Kaisari biili bia Kaisari ne eelesia Wele biili bia Wele.”
Mala baba ne liuka khu Yesu.
“Omwekisia, Musa akhuandikila efwe Lilaka lino: ‘Omundu aba ne afwa mala aalekha omukhasi okhali na mwana tawe, wandaaye owo mundu oyo khukhwola eele khu namulekhwa yuno nio banyoole babaana balaangilwe khu mundu owafwa oyo.’
Babao basoleeli saba, omukhulu areera omukhasi mala afwa busa khaba mwana tawe.
Owa khabili eela khu mukhasi yuno mala yesi aafwa busa ario khaba mwana tawe, kaaba kario akhaba wandaaye owa khataru aafwa ario.
Kaaba kario khu boosi. Boosi saba beela khu mukhasi yuno mala bafwa bario mwana tawe, ekhumaliilikha omukhasi chana yesi aafwa.
Babaandu bano ne balilamukha, omukhasi yuno aliba owa naanu? Sikila boosi saba baba baseecha bewe.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Mwekhiikhile! Kano kakila ne mukhamanyile kamaandiko namwe bunyali bwa Wele tawe.
Sikila nga bafu ne bakhalamukhe, baliba nga malaika mwikulu mala se bakhareerane tawe.
Khuloondekhana ne bafu khulamukha, khaba enywe mukhasomakho mu Sitabu sia Musa kamakhuwa ke sichakha sisiaba ne siyia tawe ku? Mu bweene omwo kaandikwa kali Wele aboolela Musa ali, ‘Ndi Wele owa Aburahamu Wele owa Isaaka lundi Wele owa Yakobo.’
Ali Wele owe balamu se ali owe bafu tawe, mwekhiikhile lukali po.”
Siima Omwami Wele wowo ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi, ne liiba liowo lioosi, ne kamebaasio kowo koosi lundi ne kamaani kowo koosi!’
Lilaka lia khabili khukhila koosi nilio lino: ‘Siima owasio nga wesiima wamwene.’ Mbao lilaka liliindi liboofu liikhila kabili kano tawe.”
Khukhwola omundu asiime Wele ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi, ne kamebaasio kewe koosi, ne kamaani kewe koosi; lundi khukhwola asiime owasie nga esiima omwene. Lili liboofu khuria kabili kano khukhila khurusia biianwa bie bibiaayo nende bibiindu bie khukhwosia khu Wele.”
Yesu abona nga nilwo akobosie sikesi mala amuboolela ali, “Se oli aleeyi khukhwama khu Bwami bwa Wele tawe.”
Enyuma wa kano se abao yesi yesi owanyindaalila khureeba Yesu lireeba liosi liosi tawe.
Nga nilwo Yesu aba ne ekisia mu Lukaangu areeba lireeba ali, “Linyalikhana liriena baandiki khuboola bali Kristo aliama mu lisaaye lia Daudi?
Daudi omwene aloma khubirira mu Roho Omutakatifu ali,
‘Omwami aaboolela Omwami wase ali,
Yikhala ano khu mukhono kwase kumuseecha,
khukhwola nga ndara basiku bowo boosi aasi mu bikele biowo.’
Daudi omwene amulaanga ali, ‘Omwami,’ nio kaba kariena Kristo ama mu lisaaye lia Daudi?”
Babaandu bakali baba barekeeresie Yesu ne busangaafu.
Nga nilwo aba ne ekisia aloma ali, “Loleelela lukali baandiki babasiima khukeendela chikaanjo ne khukhesibwa mu ngila eye buuri khu soko.
Barobora chindebe chindayi mu sinakooki ne abuundu we lukoosi mu naikara.
Barumikhira bubweyaangu buno khukhwila khu banamulekhwa ne khubanuula kimiaandu kiabwe mala beyekesia mu khusaba lisaba lileeyi. Siiukuumo siabwe siliba sikali lukali.”
Nga Yesu aaba ne ekhaale siimbi ne lisanduku lie libiikhilo lie Lukaangu, aloleelela babaandu nga barusianga biianwa, baiinda bakali baraamo chirupia chingali.
Ekhumaliilikha namulekhwa omutaambi echa araamo bisimiri bia koopa bibili bitiiti, bibioola erupia ndala.
Nio Yesi alaanga babeeka bewe alala mala aloma ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, namulekhwa yuno areere mwisanduku lie siianwa lino sikali khukhila omundu okundi yesi yesi.
Sikila babaandi bareeremo nisio abeele babikhile khu buiinda bwabwe, ne kakhali namulekhwa yuno, mu mutaambo kwewe areeremo bioosi nibio abeele nabio, arusiisie sioosi nisio abeele nasio khulwe khumenya.”

Nga Yesu aaba narura mu Lukaangu, omweeka mulala aaloma ali, “Omwekisia, bona kamabaale kano, ne chiinju chino, bili bie liiukia!”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Mwaboone chinju chimboofu chino mbao libaale akhaba lilala liong'ene likharame abuundu alio tawe. Buli lilala likhamwaatwe aasi.”
Yesu aba ekhaale khu Sikulu sia Miseituni sisialoleelelana ne Lukaangu, nio Petero, Yakobo, Yoana ne Andereya bamwichakho mu bwikisi,
Bamureeba bali, “Khuboolele kano kalibao liina, lundi khuboolele siina siikhabe simanyisio khukhwekesia sili siise siolile sie bibiindu bino khukhwekholekha.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ba barekeerefu, ne mukhafukiilila omundu yesi yesi amubea enywe tawe.
Babaandu bakali bakheche mwisina liase ne baloma bali ‘Niise niye’ mala balibea babaandu bakali.
Lundi mukhanaanisibwa ne muulila luyoka lwe liie siimbi ne aleeyi tawe. Bibiindu birio khukhwola biekholekhe, ne kakhali se lili bali aba sisiakamo siolile tawe.
Bibala bicha khupana, bubwami ne bubwami bulebwaakalana, khuliba ne khuterema khwe sibala buli abuundu, lundi khuliba ne njala. Bibiindu bino bili busa nga omukhasi olumwa ne buloonda.
Ne, sisiakamo ne sikhoola tawe Elomo Endayi khukhwola yilwachibwe khu baandu boosi.
Ne bamutiila bamuyila mu koti, mukheendekhelela siise ne sikhoola khu niko kane mulome tawe. Siise ne siolile loma liosi liosi nilio muelesiibwe sikila kamakhuwa niko mucha khuloma se kali kakenywe tawe, kakhaame khu Roho Omutakatifu.
Babaandu baliaana bawandaayabwe babene khukhwirwa, ne bapaapa boosi bakhakhole bario khu babaana babwe. Babaana balikaluukhana khu basaasi babwe mala babakhole berwe.
Boosi balimubiila enywe sikila lisina liase. Ne kakhali oyo owikhaliilikha khukhwola khusiakamo niye olionisibwa.
omundu oli khunju yewe khukhwola alekhe khu mala siise bali ekhe engile munju khubukula sisiindu siosi siosi ache nasio tawe.
Omundu oli mu mukuunda akhacha munju khubukula engubo yewe tawe.
Kaliba kamabi lukali khu bakhasi bali ne bisoombo ne bamaayi bali ne babaana batoro.
Saba khu Wele muli bibiindu bino bikhakholekhana mu munaane tawe!
Sikila siibi sie chindaalo ng'enecho sikhabe siboofu khukhila sisiindi siosi siosi khukhwama mu lirakikha nga Wele ne abaang'ana sibala khukhwola siise sino. Lundi se silibao siibi sisiindi sikali lukano luno tawe.
Ne kakhali Omwami embiyisie chindaalo echo, abanga sakholile ario tawe, andi mbao oliona tawe. Khwako aboombisie chindaalo khulwe barobore bewe.
“Ne omundu yesi yesi nakhuboolela ali, ‘Lola Kristo oyu siina’ namwe ‘Lola niyo oyo’ okhamusuubila tawe.
Babelaanga kristo ne bang'oosi be bubeeyi baleecha. Balakhola kamayia ne kamakhuwa ke khuukia khukhwenya khubea akhaba barobore ba Wele, ne kanyalikhana.
Ba meso, namubooleele buli siindu biise ne bikhoola tawe.
ching'enieesi chilikwa khukhwama khwikulu, ne bunyali bwe mu ngaaki mwe sibala bulirusibwa niio bubechanga.
Abwenao Omwana wo Mundu alibonekha mu maleesi ne alikho echa ne bunyali bukali ne luyali.
Akharume malaika mu mbeka chine che sibala khubuusia barobore ba Wele khukhwama khundulo khwe sibala khukhwola khukhundi.
“Lekha kumutuli kumwekisie lilieka. Chisakia chakwo nechinenekha kamasaafu mala chirakikhe khu khukhumusia, mu manya muli aba siimiyu siolile.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, ne mubona bibiindu bino ne bikholekhana, mulamanya muli siise siolile.
Khebulila muli bino bioosi bikhekholekhane babaandu baliio luno ne bakhaafwa boosi tawe.
Likulu ne liloba biliwao, ne Elomo yase se liwao tawe.
Lindiilila, ba meso, sikila se mumanyile siise sie khukhwicha tawe.
Ali nga omundu owalekhela bakholi bewe kimilimo ne omuliindi khuliinda silibwa acha lukeendo.
Ba meso, sikila se mumanyile siise nisio omwami wenju alichilamo tawe, wakana ekolooba namwe mu siilo akari namwe mumakhelebeende namwe enyanga nesoa.
Ne aaba ne echa nokhamanyile, akhakhola ario akhunyoola nokona tawe.
Niko muboolela enywe mboolela babaandu boosi ndi, ba meso!”

Baaloma bali, khukhamuaamba siise sia naikara tawe, babaandu bakhola bario bakhola sisiayuumba.
Babaandu balala ba babao baambwa lirima mala baboola bali, “Sifuno sie khusasia kamafura kano sili siina?
Abele kanyala kakusibwa chirupia chibira chimia chitaru mala chiaanwe khu bataambi.” Mala babiiyia omukhasi yuno mu burafu.
Ne kakhali Yesu aaloma ali, “Mulekhe abe! Siina sikila ne mu munaania? Akholile sisiindu silayi khwise.
Buli lwoosi enywe muli ne bataambi, ne siise siosi siosi nisio mwenya khubayeeta munyala mwabayeeta. Ne kakhali se muliba nase buli lwoosi tawe.
Akholile niko anyala, ambakhile kamafura khukhwerekekhera siise sie lisiikhwa liase.
Nono, ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi buli osi niio Elomo Endayi yino echa khwilwachibwa mu sibala sioosi, niko omukhasi yuno akholile kaliboolwa khumukhebulila niye.”
Nio Yuda Isikarioti, mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili, acha khu basaayi bakhulu khukhwenya khuchaama Yesu.
Baba ne busangaafu khuulila niko ababoolela mala bamulaka khumuelesia chirupia, khwako Yuda arakikha khuyiima bubweyaangu bwe khuaana Yesu khu nibo.
Endaalo eye khurakikha Naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, endaalo niyo bererangamo kamameeme ke siakhulia sie Epasaka, babeeka ba Yesu bamureeba bali, “Wenya khuche khukhurekekhele siakhulia sie Epasaka waena?”
Yesu aruma babili khu nibo ne kamalaka kano, “Cha mu Lukoba mala mulakaanana omundu asutile esoongo eye kameechi. Muloondekho
khukhwola munju nimwo alacha, mala mureebe omwene enju muli, omwekisia areeba ali, ‘Lusiro siina nilwo ese ne babeeka baase khulalilamo siakhulia sie Epasaka?’
Alamwekesia lusiro luboofu lwe mukorofa nilwo barekeekhe. Mu bwenomwo khurekekhele buli siindu.”
Babeeka abo bacha mu lukoba mala banyoola buli sisiindu nga Yesu nababooleele mala barekekha siakhulia sie Epasaka.
Nga nilwo bwelabula Yesu echa ne babeeka bewe ekhumi na babili.
Nga baba ne bali khusialwa, Yesu aloma ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi mulala khwinywe olikho olia nase alanjaama.”
Babeeka besiindukha babona bubi mala buli mundu arakikha khumureeba ali, “Manya oloma ese?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Alaba mulala khwinywe nga muli ekhumi na babili, oyo olaronganga ne nase mu sibuumba silala.
Omwana wo Mundu akhafwe nga ne kaandikwa khu niye, ne silaamo siliba khu mundu oyo omuchaama! Nabulayi andi omundu mwene oyo se asaalwa tawe!”
Nga nilwo baba ne balia, Yesu abukula kumukaati apa orio khu Wele akumesulamo aelesia babeeka bewe mala ababoolela ali, “Bukula mulie, kuno kuli kumubili kwase.”
Lundi abukula sikoombe siilimo endali, oli amala khu khupila Wele orio, abaelesia mala boosi banywa.
Nio Yesu aloma ali, “Kano kali kamafuki kase ke ndakaano kachichukha khulwe babaandu bakali.
Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, se ndinywakho lundi endali eye kumusabibu yino tawe khukhwola endaalo niyo ndinywela endali embia mu Bwami bwa Wele.”
Nio bemba kumwenya mala barura bacha khu sikulu sia Miseituni.
Ne enyuma we khulamukha ndacha e Kalilaya enywe ne mukholayo tawe.”
Petero akobosia ali, “Se ndikhulekha tawe, akhaba boosi ne bakhulekha.”
Nio Yesu aboolela Petero ali, “Ng'ali khuboolela ndi, olanjekaana etaaywa ne khakholiokha khukhwola khabili siilo sia luno tawe, olanjekaana khukhwola khataru oli se umanyile tawe.”
Ne kakhali Petero akobosia naandalasia lukali ali, “Akhaba ne lili lifwa se ndikhwikaana ewe tawe.”
Babeeka babaandi bosi baloma bario.
Boola abuundu alaangwa Ketisemani mala Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Yikhala ano ese ndikho nja khusaba.”
Abukula Petero, Yakobo ne Yoana bacha naye. Aaba ne liaayaaya ne liliembeelela likali,
mala ababoolela ali, “Kumwoyo kwase kwabeleele khubira sikelo khukhwola embi khufwa, khemwikhale ano meso.”
Esendakho abweeni mala aakwa aasi, aasaba ali, ne kanyalikhana akhabirira mu saa eye sinyaasio esio tawe.
Aachiililila khusaba ali, “Paapa, bibiindu bioosi binyalikana khwiwe. Ndusirieo sikoombe sie sinyaasio sino, ne likhaba lilienya liase tawe, ne kakhali libe lilienya liowo.”
Nio akobola anyoola babeeka bataru chana bakona. Aboolela Petero ali, “Simoni, okona? Se onyala wekhala meso akhaba esaa ndala tawe?”
Nio ababoolela ali, “Ba meso, mala musabe muli mukhakhakwa tawe. Kumwoyo kwenya ne kakhali kumubili se kulimo kamaani tawe.”
Lundi Yesu akobolayo asaba, narumikhira kamakhuwa kameene ne kameene.
Oli echa anyoola babeeka bewe chana ne bali mwilo, akhaba khumoka khwong'ene se banyala tawe lundi se baamanya niko banyala bamuboolela tawe.
Nga ne akobola lukhola khataru ababoolela ali, “Musiuluukha ne khukona? Mwanyalile murio. Esaa yolile, lola, Omwana wo Mundu nono alaelesibwa mu bunyali bwe babooni.
Yinyokha, khuche. Lola ounjaama oliile!”
Yesu aba asilomaloma ne Yuda mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili oola. Babaandu bakali ba baaba ne Yuda baba basutile kimibano ne chiruungu. Basaayi bakhulu, baandiki ne babemeelesi baba babarumire.
Omuchaami aba abaelesie khale simanyisio ali, “Niye kane nekhoyele ne khumwikwayila aba niye mwenya. Mutiile muche naye.”
Nga Yuda oola, acha khu Yesu amwekwayila mala amulaanga ali, “Omwami.”
Nio baamba Yesu.
Ne mulala khwaabo ba baaba ne bemileo, achoola embalu mala aarema liiru lia nasioobi owo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali liakwa.
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Munyala mwecha ne kimibano ne chiruungu khu khumbamba nga ese oli omunuuli?
Buli lwoosi nabechanga nanywe mu Lukaangu ne nekisia, ne se mwambamba tawe. Ne kakhali khukhwola liiandiko lichusibwe.”
Nio babeeka boosi belukha bamulekha.
Omusoleeli mulala owaba ne eboyile esuuka eya katani yong'ene aloonda khu Yesu enyuma. Bakhaka khumuaamba,
mala atima sichula alekha esuuka chana enyuma.
Baayila Yesu munju mwo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe Lukaangu niio basaayi bakhulu boosi, babemeelesi, baandiki baba ne bebuusiisie.
Petero aloondakho enyuma mala acha ola khu luuya lwo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ekhala ne basikari oora kumulilo.
Basaayi bakhulu nende be kumuse boosi bakhaka khunyoola buloli nio bayaale Yesu mala bamwire, mala khubunyoola tawe.
Baloli bakali bakiikhila Yesu, ne kakhali chilomo chabwe chabirana.
Nio babaandu balala benyokha bema baboola bubeeyi khu Yesu bali,
“Khwamuulila naloma ali, ‘Ndatechula Lukaangu luno lulwombakhwa ne babaandu ne enyuma we chindaalo chitaru ndombakha luluundi lukhombakhwa ne babaandu tawe.’ ”
Kakhaba kario buloli bwabwe se bwafukiilisiana tawe.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali enyokha ebweeni wa boosi areeba Yesu ali, “Se olikho ne likobosio khu niko bakhuyaala tawe? Kali kariena kano?”
Ne kakhali Yesu asila busa khumukobosiakho tawe. Lundi Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali amureeba ali, “Ewe niye Masiiya, Omwana owa Wele owe chikhabi?”
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali etabulaka chingubo chewe aloma ali, “Se khwenya buloli bubuundi tawe!
Mwaboone embelekeu yewe. Nono mubisia siina?”
Nio boosi baapa ekura bali akhoyeele eerwa sikila anyoolekhane ne kamabi.
Balala barakikha khumufuchakho kamare ne khumufuuma chimoni, ne khumupa ne baloma bali, “Buula naanu okhupile?” Basikari bamuaamba mala bamupa chimbi.
Petero aba asiili busa khuluyia, nio mulala khu bakholi bakhaana bo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali echa.
Nga ne abona Petero oora kumulilo amuungusa mala aloma ali, “Ewe wesi wabele ne Yesu owe Nasareti.”
Ne kakhali Petero ekaana ali, “Se mumanyile tawe.” Lundi niko olalomalomanga se ngamanyile tawe. Nio acha mu silibwa, mala ao ne nao etaaywa yakholiokha.
Omukhaana chana oyo lundi abona Petero ebweeneyo mala arakikha khuboolela babaandu ba babao ali, “Yuno ali mulala khwaabo.”
Petero ekaana lundi.
Siise sitiiti, babemile baboolela Petero lundi bali, “Se onyala wekaana oli se oli mulala khwaabo tawe, sikila wesi wama Kalilaya.”
Ne kakhali Petero echuba ali, “Se manyile omundu yuno tawe.”
Abwenao etaaywa yakholiokha lukhola khabili mala Petero akhebulila nga Yesu ne amuboleele ali, “Etaywa ne khakholiokha khabili tawe, okhanjekaane khataru oli se umanyile tawe.” Mala Petero arundukha alila.

Nga bwasia kumutikhinyi basaayi bakhulu, babemeelesi, baandiki nende be kumuse boosi bakaanana khangu mala bakhola etoloondo. Baboa Yesu kiminyololo mala bamuila khu Pilato.
Pilato amureeba ali, “Ewe niye Omwami owe Bayaudi?”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Ewe walomile.”
Basaayi bakhulu basitaka Yesu khu biindu bikali,
nio Pilato amureeba lundi ali, “Se okobosiakhomo tawe? Rekeeresia kamasitako kano koosi.”
Yesu khukobosiakhomo likhuwa tawe, mala Pilato auka lukali.
Buli mu Naikara eye Epasaka, Pilato aba ne kumwiima kwe khulekhuula omuboe mulala niye babaandu benyile.
Siise sienesio omundu bali Baraba aba mu siboe ne babaandi ba baaba ne berire babaandu mu siayuumba.
Babaandu bakali bebuusia mala barakikha khureeba Pilato nga kwaba kumwiima kwewe,
abareeba ali, “Mwenya emulekhuulile Omwami owe Bayaudi?”
Aamanya bulayi bwene ali basaayi bakhulu baba bamureerere Yesu sikila baba ne sikhalikhali.
Basaayi bakhulu baachilisia babaandu basabe Pilato abalekhuulile Baraba, ne Yesu tawe.
Nio Pilato abareeba ali, “Nono mwenya khole ndiena omundu niye mulaanga muli Omwami owe Bayaudi?”
Bayokela bali, “Mubaambe!”
Ne kakhali Pilato areeba ali, “Akholile libi siina?”
Baatasa khuyokela bali, “Mubaambe!”
Sikila Pilato eenya khusangaasia babaandu, khwako aabalekhuulila Baraba, aapa Yesu kimisariti ne khumuaana abaambwe.
Nio basikari baayila Yesu mukari khu luuya lwe lichipi lio mwami mala baalaanga eng'etuuti yabwe yoosi baakaanane alala.
Bafwara Yesu ekaanjo efwaana buseemwa, baaruka ekuutwa eye kamawa mala baamufwara khu murwe.
Nio baarakikha khumukheesia bali, “Okhoya oyindile Omwami owe Bayaudi.”
Baamupa esiimbo khumurwe, bamufuchakho kamare, basikama ne khumwinamila.
Oli bamalile khumuchekheelela bario, bamufuula ekaanjo eyo mala bamufwara chingubo chewe ching'ene. Nio bamuila enje we lukoba khumubaamba.
Baayila Yesu abuundu niio balaanga bali Kolikota liboola lili, “abuundu we siianga.”
Abwenao bakhaka khumuelesia endali niyo batubanisie ne manemane, ne kakhali Yesu se anywa tawe.
Nio bamubaamba mala bakabana chingubo chewe mu khupa ekura khumanya naanu olabukula siina.
Chaba chisa chitaru che kumutikhinyi nicho bamubambilakho.
Kamaandiko ke kamasitako kaba bali, “Omwami owe Bayaudi.”
Babaamba banuuli babili alala ne Yesu, mulala khu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha ne okundi kumukhasi. [
Mu ngila yino liiandiko liboola lili, “Aabalwa alala ne babooni” liechusibwa.]
Nono yerusia khu musalaba mala weonie!”
Mu ngila ng'eneyo basaayi bakhulu boosi ne baandiki bakhoma Yesu ne baloma bali, “Aonia babaandi mala se anyala eonia omwene tawe!
Lekha khubone Masiiya Omwami owa Isiraeli, ekhe aasi khukhwama khu musalaba siise sino mala efwe khulamusuubila!”
Akhaba babili abo ba babaambwa ne Yesu boosi bamukhoma.
Oli choola chisa sita, sisiilima siaamba sibala sioosi khu saa chitaru.
Oli choola chisa tisa Yesu alila ne kumwoyo kwe angaaki ali, “Eloi Eloi lama sabakitani.” Nikhwo khuboola khuli, “Wele wase, Wele wase, siina ne undekhile?”
Babaandu balala bamuulila nalila ario mala baloma bali, “Rekeeresia alikho alaanga Elicha.”
Mulala khwaabo atima asanya sisiaangu mu ndali ekhali endulu tawe, mala aboa khu luteeka emusia, atilila khu munwa kwa Yesu naboola ali, “Liinda, lekha khubone nga Elicha echa khumurusia khu musalaba.”
Nio Yesu alila ne kumumilo kwe angaaki mala akwiisia kumwoyo.
Omusikaari owe liie owaba ne emile ebweeni we kumusalaba abona nga nilwo Yesu afwa mala aloma ali, “Ng'ali yuno abeele Omwana owa Wele.”
Bakhasi balala babao, baloleleele khukhwama ataayi balala khwaabo baba Maria Makatalena, Solome ne Maria maawe owa Yakobo ne Yosefu.
Baloondanga khu Yesu nga aba mu Kalilaya lundi bamuyeetanga. Bakhasi bakali abeele babechile e Yerusalemu ne naye boosi babao.
Yaba bulikho bwilabula ne Yosefu owe Arimatea oola. Aba omundu mulala niye be kumuse baria. Alindiililanga khukhwicha khwe Bubwami bwa Wele. Yaba Endaalo eye khukhwerekekhera esabato,
nio Yosefu anyindaalila acha khu Pilato mala asaba kumulaambo kwa Yesu.
Pilato esiindukha khuulila ali Yesu aaba afwiile khale. Nio alaanga omusikaari owe liie amureeba ali, “Khukhwama nga Yesu afwiile siabirire siise sileeyi?”
Enyuma wo musikaari khumuboolela, Pilato afukiilila Yosefu khubukula kumulaambo chana.
Yosefu akula esuuka eya katani ekhisia kumulaambo aasi, akuulukusila mu suuka mala akura mu ng'ani yaba eyabeechwa mu lwanda. Nio apiringisia kubaale kuboofu akukhiikha emuliango we siliindwa.
Maria Makatalena ne Maria maawe owa Yosefu baaba baloleleele babona niio ara kumulaambo kwa Yesu.

Oli Esabato yaawa, Maria Makatalena, Maria maawe owa Yakobo, ne Solome bakula kamafura kaunya bulayi khucha khuakha kumulaambo kwa Yesu.
Enyanga ne esoa chumapili bacha khu siliindwa.
Ne balikho ne bacha bareebana bali, “Naanu olakhupiringisilia libaale lirure emuliango we siliindwa?” (Liaba liboofu lukali.)
Oli balola babona bali libaale liarusiibweyo.
Nio bengila mu siliindwa babonamo omusoleeli ne ekhaale kumukhono kumuseecha, afwarire engubo ewaanga mala besiindukha.
Omusoleeli chana ababoolela ali, “Mukhesiindukha tawe, manyile ndi mulikho muenja Yesu owe Nasareti, niye babambile. Se ali ano tawe, alamusiibwe! Lola ano niio baamureere.
Nono khemuche muboolele babeeka bewe, alala ne Petero yesi muli, ‘Alikho acha Kalilaya oleyo enywe ne mukholayo tawe’, ebweeneyo mulamubona nga nilwo amuboolela.”
Nio barura mu ng'ani chimbilo sikila baba mu bireengo ne khukhwesiindukha mala khuboolelakho omundu yesi yesi tawe, sikila baba ne buuri bukali.
[
Enyuma wa Yesu khulamukha khukhwama mu lifwa makhelebeende chumapili, anyoa abonekhela Maria Makatalena niye arusiamo bisieeno saba.
Maria chana acha aboolela babaandu ba babechanga naye. Baba basooma ne khulila,
nga baulila naboola ali Yesu ali omulamu lundi amubone, se bamusuubila tawe.
Enyuma wakano, Yesu abonekhela babeeka bewe babili mu ngila ekabukhane ne balikho ne bacha mu birekere.
Bakobola baboolela babasiaabwe ne kakhali se babasuubila tawe.
Khumaliilikha Yesu abonekhela babeeka bewe ekhumi na mulala nga baba ne balikho balia. Abayibila, sikila se baba ne lisuubila tawe, lundi sikila baba ne kimiooyo kimilume se basuubila abo ba bamubona enyuma we khulamukha tawe.
Ababoolela ali, “Cha mu sibala sioosi mala mwilwache Elomo Endayi khu buli mundu.
Yesi yesi osuubila mala abatiisibwe alaonisibwa, ne oyo okhasuubila tawe, alakhalakilwa.
Basuubili balaebwa bunyali bwe khukhola kamayia, bakharusie bisieeno mu lisina liase. Bakhalomalome mu ndimi chimbia,
bakhatiila chindemu namwe banywa buchiba, se bakhanyoole butinyu bwosi bwosi tawe, balira kamakhono kabwe khu balwale mala baone.”
Babeeka bewe bacha belwacha buli abuundu, mala Omwami akhola kimilimo nabo, ne khukhwekesia bali kamelwacho ke burume kabwe kali ka ng'ali khuloondekhana ne kamayia niko bakholanga.]
[
Bakhasi bacha khu Petero ne basaale bewe mala bababoolela mu bwimbi koosi niko baboolelwe.
Enyuma wakano Yesu omwene arumikhira babeeka bewe khukhwama ebukwe khukhwola mumbo khulandisia burume bwewe butakatifu bwe buonia bwa mindali.]

Khu mukoosi Teofilo:
Babaandu bakali bakholile kamaani khukhwemenieelesia kamakhuwa ke bibiindu bibiekholeekhe mwifwe.
Baandika niko khwaboolelwa ne naabo ba babona bibiindu bino khukhwama mu khurakikha lundi ba baboola burume obwo.
Omukoosi, sikila nameniesele elala kamakhuwa kano koosi khukhwama mu khurakikha khwako, nebaasiisie ndi buli bulayi khuandikile bulayi nga kali.
Ese ndikho khuandikila ewe kano nio omanyile elala bung'ali bwa buli siindu nisio wekisiibwe.
Mu ndaalo nicho Herodi aba omwami owa Yuda, abao Omusaayi bali Sakaria, aba mulala khu basaayi ba Abicha, lisina lio mukhasi wewe liaba bali Lusabeti, aba owe luuya lwe basaayi.
Bombi baaba baluungi mu moni cha Wele lundi bariira elala kamalaka ka Wele koosi ne lilakiilisia liako.
Ne kakhali se babaakho ne omwana tawe, sikila Lusabeti aba omukuumba ne boombi baba bakofuule.
Endaalo ndala Sakaria aba alikho akhola kimilimo kiewe nga Omusaayi mu Lukaangu, mu bwasio bwewe.
Khuloondekhana ne kumwiima nikwo basaayi baloondanga, aroborwa ne kura khukhwosia bibiindu biiunya kumuuya kumulayi khu alutare. Nio engila mu Lukaangu lwo Mwami,
ne babaandu babaandi baba balikho basaba enje siise sie khukhwosia bupaani.
Malaika owo Mwami amubonekhela emile lubeka luseecha lwa alutare niio bupaani bwosibwanga.
Nga Sakaria ne amubona, esiindukha mala aba ne buuri bukali.
Ne malaika amuboolela ali, “Sakaria, okharia tawe! Wele auliile lisaba liowo, mala omukhasi wowo Lusabeti alakhusaalila omwana omusoleeli mala omutiuukhe oli Yoana.
Okhabe ne khoyo ne busangaafu lundi babaandu babaandi bakali balisangaala khulwe khusaalwa khwewe!
Aliba omundu omukali mu moni cho Mwami. Se alinywakho endali yosi yosi namwe siosi silulu tawe. Alichula Roho Omutakatifu ne akhasaalwa tawe,
mala alikobosia ba Isiraeli bakali khu Mwami Wele wabwe.
Akhanyoe ebweeni wo Mwami, aliba owe kamaani ne bunyali nga omung'oosi Elicha. Aliambaasia bapaapa ne babaana lundi alala; alikaluukhasia be sileka, bakobole khu ngila eye khukhwibaasia buluungi; alikhola babaandu bo Mwami bamwirekekhele.”
Nio Sakaria aboolela malaika ali, “Ese ndamanya ndiena ndi kano kaliba kario? Ese ne omuloosi wase khwakofuule.”
Ne kakhali ewe se wasuubiile burume bwase tawe, buliba bwa ng'ali mu siise silayi. Ne sikila se wasuubiile tawe, olaanda lulimi, khukhwola endaalo niyo nalaka ne khoole.”
Mu siise esio babaandu ba baaba ne baliindiilile Sakaria bauka bali, siina sikila ne abukule siise sileeyi mu Lukaangu?
Nga arura, aba aandile lulimi khulomaloma nabo tawe, mala bamanya bali abone kamalola mu Lukaangu. Sikila se anyala khulomaloma tawe, akeleka busa ne kamakhono.
Nga bubwasio bwewe bwe khukhola mu Lukaangu bwawa, Sakaria akobola engo.
Enyuma we siise esio, omukhasi wewe Lusabeti aesia mala khulwe kimieesi kiraano se aabonekhakho mu baandu tawe.
Aloma ali, “Luno, Omwami Wele anjeetile ese; andusiisiekho chisoni nicho mbechanga nacho ebweeni we babaandu!”
Lusabeti nali ne nda kimieesi sita, Wele aruma malaika Kaburieli mu lukoba lwa Kalilaya lulaangwa Nasareti.
Aba ne burume khu mukhaana owaba ne aseleelwe no mundu olaangwa bali Yosefu, owaba owe lisaaye lio mwami Daudi. Lisina lio mukhaana oyo liaba bali Maria.
Malaika aacha niio ali mala aloma ali, “kumuleembe kube ne nawe! Omwami ali nawe mala aakhubiitile chikhabi chingali.”
Ne kakhali Maria aayaaya lukali po nga ne aulila burume bubwareerwa ne malaika, mala auka nisio kamakhuwa kewe kaboola.
Nio Malaika amuboolela ali, “Maria, okharia tawe, Wele ali ne kumwalaalo khwiwe.
Olaesia mala osaale omwana omusoleeli, mala omutiuukhe oli Yesu.
