Aliba omukali lundi alilaangwa Omwana owa Wele owe Angaaki Lukali, Omwami Wele akhamwamiie nga kukaawe Daudi ne aba,
mala aliba omwami owe lisaaye lia Yakobo mindali na mindali, bubwami bwewe se buliwa tawe!”
Maria aboolela malaika ali, “Ese ndi omukhaana owe yabwana. Khwako, kano kanyalikhana kariena?”
Malaika akobosia ali, “Roho Omutakatifu alakhwichakho, mala bunyali bwa Wele owe Angaaki Lukali bulakhufuunikha nga sisiiniini, khulwe sifuno sino omwana oyo aliba omutakatifu mala alilaangwa Omwana owa Wele.
Khebulila omulebe wowo Lusabeti niye balomanga bali omukuumba, luno ali ne nda eye kimieesi sita, akhaba nakofuule.
Sikila se siliio sisiindu nisio Wele akhanyala khukhola tawe.”
Nio Maria amukobosia ali, “Ese ndi omukholi owo Mwami, lekha kekholekhe nga ne olomile.” Malaika aacha.
Siise esio Maria erekekha mala aacha khangu mu lukoba lwe mu sibala sie bikulu sie Buyuda.
Acha engila munju eya Sakaria mala akheesia Lusabeti.
Nga Lusabeti aulila kimileembe kia Maria, omwana esosia munda mwa Lusabeti. Lusabeti echusibwa Roho Omutakatifu
mala aaloma mu mumilo kumukali ali, “Ewe wabiitwa chikhabi lukali khukhila bakhasi boosi, ne omwana niye olisaala aabiitwa chikhabi!
Siina sikila sisiindu siboofu siri ne sinjekholekhakho, maawe owo Mwami wase angeniye ese?
Sikila nga mbulile kimileembe kiowo, ne omwana esosia munda mwase ne busangaafu.
Ali ne khabi oyo osuubila ali niko Omwami amuboolela kacha khwekholekha.”
“Kumwoyo kwase kufumia Omwami;
kumwoyo kwase kwekhoya sikila Wele Omuonia wase
Khukhwama luno babaandu balandanga bali owabiitwa chikhabi.
Sikila Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akholeele ese ke khuukia.
Lisina liewe lili litakatifu,
khukhwama khu selukho khukhwola khu kiindi,
akholelanga siisa abo bamuria.
Akololosianga kumukhono kwewe kwe kamaani,
mala asalanisia ba bebonia ne lirekekha liabwe lioosi.
khukhwama khu ndebe chabwe che bubwami,
mala aniinia ba beboombia.
Ekusia be njala ne bibiindu bilayi,
ne khulekha baiinda makhono mataaka.
Aliinda lilakiilisia nilio aelesia bakuuka befwe,
lundi echile khuyeeta omukholi wewe Isiraeli.
Ne khu lisaaye liewe lioosi mindali na mindali!”
Maria amenya ne Lusabeti embi kimieesi kitaru mala
akobola engo wewe.
Siise sia Lusabeti sie khusaala omwana siola, mala asaala omwana omusoleeli.
Baamenyile siimbi ne Lusabeti ne balebe bewe baulila nga Omwami ne abele omulayi khu Lusabeti, mala boosi bekhoya ne Lusabeti.
Ne kakhali maawe aloma ali, “Tawe! Lisina liewe lilaba bali Yoana.”
Baboolela Lusabeti bali, “Ewe se oli no mulebe we lisina elio tawe!”
Nio bakeleka khu raraawe, khukhwenya khumanya lisina siina nilio enya atiuukhe omwana.
Sakaria asaba sipao sie khuandikakho mala aandika ali, “Lisina liewe bali Yoana.” Boosi besiindukha.
Abwene ne abwene Sakaria anyala khulomaloma mala arakikha khufumia Wele.
Bamenyile siimbi naye boosi baba ne buuri, ne kamakhuwa kano kasalanila mu sibala sie bikulu sie Buyuda sioosi.
Buli mundu owakaulilakho akebaasiakho ne khureeba ali, “Omwana yuno acha khuba naanu?” Sikila liamanyikhana busa bali bunyali bwo Omwami Owe Banamae bwaba khu niye.
Sakaria, raraawe owa Yoana echusibwa ne Roho Omutakatifu, mala alomaloma burume bwa Wele ali:
“Lekha khufumie Omwami Wele owa Isiraeli!
Echile khuyeeta babaandu bewe mala abakholile babe balekhuule.
Akhuelesie efwe Omuonia owe kamaani,
owe lisaaye lio mukholi wewe Daudi.
Aasuubisia khaale khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe batakatifu,
ali alikhureesia efwe khukhwama khu basiku befwe.
Khukhwama khu bunyali bwabo boosi babakhubiila efwe.
Aaloma ali alikholela siisa bakuuka befwe,
ne khukhebulila endakaano yewe endakatifu,
ne lilichuba nilio echubila Aburahamu kuuka wefwe.
Aasuubisia khukhureesia khukhwama khu basiku befwe.
Nio khumukholele kimilimo ne khukhali ne buuri tawe,
mu butakatifu ne buluungi ebweeni wewe, chindaalo choosi che bulamu bwefwe.
Olirangira ebweeni wo Mwami khumung'oonela engila,
khuboolela babaandu bewe oli balaonisibwa,
sikila balabeelwa bubwoni bwabwe.
Wele wefwe ali owe siisa lundi omuolu.
Alakhola buwaanga bwe buonia bukhubekho.
khwaabo boosi bamenyile mu siilima sie sisiiniini sie lifwa,
khuluungisia likeenda liefwe mu ngila eye kumuleembe.”
Omwana chana achoa mala akhula ne mu roho. Amenya mu sichiimi khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo abonekha khu baandu ba Isiraeli.

Siise esio Omuruki Akosito arusia lilaka lie khubala babaandu mu bwami bwe Barumi bwoosi.
Khuno nikhwo khukhwaba khubalwa khwe khunyoa. Kurenio niye owaba omuruki owa Siria.
Khwako buli mulala acha khukhwiandikisia mu lukoba lwe wabwe.
Yosefu aama mu lukoba lwa Nasareti mu Kalilaya acha mu lukoba lwe Betelehemu mu Buyuda, abuundu niio Omwami Daudi asaalwa. Yosefu aacha ebweeneyo sikila aba owe lisaaye lio mwami Daudi.
Yosefu aacha khukhwiandikisia ne Maria niye aba naseleele, ne Maria aaba ali ne nda.
Nga ne baba mu Betelehemu siise sia Maria sie khukhwirusiakho siola.
Asaala omwana wewe omubele omusoleeli amura mu bikubo bie babaana mala amwalisia khu lwelo nilwo chikhaafu chaliilangakho, sikila se banyoola niio baulukhila munju eye bakeni tawe.
Babaayi babao mu sibala esio babayaanga kamatuuli kabwe akhaba siilo.
Malaika owo Mwami ababonekhela, mala luyali lwo Mwami lwabakhosiakho. Baaba ne buuri bukali po,
nio malaika ababoolela ali, “Mukharia tawe! Ndi ano ne Elomo Endayi khwinywe, ekhareere ekhoyo engali khu baandu boosi.
Endaalo yino mu Lukoba lwa Daudi Kristo Omwami omuonia wefwe asaalilwe!
Ne sino silaba simanyisio khwinywe: Mulanyoola omwana areerwe mu bikubo bie babaana mala bamwaliisie khu lwelo nilwo chikhaafu chililangakho.”
Siise esio bamalaika be mwikulu bakali babonekha ne bafumia Wele bali:
“Luyali lube khu Wele owe mwikulu oli angaaki lukali,
ne kumuleembe kube khu sibala khwaabo bamusiimisianga!”
Nga malaika ne babarurao bakobola mwikulu, babaayi baboolana bali, “Khe khuche e Betelehemu khubone sisiindu sisiikholeekhe sino nisio Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi akhubooleele efwe.”
Khwako, bacha khangu banyoola Maria ne Yosefu, mala babona omwana ali khu lwelo nilwo chikhaafu chaliilangakho.
Nga babaayi babona omwana baboolela basaasi niko malaika aaba nababooleele khu mwana.
Boosi babaulila niko babaayi baloma, bauka.
Maria abiikha kamakhuwa kano koosi mu mwoyo mala akebaasiakho lukali.
Babaayi bakobolayo ne bafumia Wele khulwe bibiindu bioosi nibio baba ne baulile ne khubona, biaba busa nga malaika ne aaba nababooleele.
nga liaandikwa mu Lilaka lio Mwami lili, “Buli omwana omubele omusoleeli aanwe khu Mwami.”
Lundi bacha khuaana embosio eye kamauusi ke mundaa namwe kamabaya kabili khuloondekhana ne Lilaka lio Mwami.
Siise esio abao omundu owalaangwa Simioni, amenyanga mu Yerusalemu. Aba omundu omulayi owaria Wele, mala alindiililanga buonia bwa Isiraeli. Roho Omutakatifu aaba naye,
mala aaba aamusuubisia ali khukhwola abone Masiiya owo Mwami owasuubisibwa nio afwe.
Simioni arangirirwa ne Roho acha mu Lukaangu. Nga basaasi bareera omwana Yesu mu Lukaangu bamukholele niko Lilaka lienya,
Simioni atiila omwana mu makhono kewe mala asiima Wele ali:
“Ee Omwami ewe waliinda lisuubisia liowo,
nono onyala walekhuula omukholi wowo afwe ne kumuleembe.
Naboone buonia bwowo ne chimoni chase,
nibwo orekeekhe mu moni che babaandu boosi.
mala bureere luyali khu baandu bowo Baisiraeli.”
Raraawe ne maawe bauka bibiindu nibio Simioni aloma khu mwana.
Nio Simioni ababiita chikhabi mala aboolela Maria, maawe owo mwana ali, “Omwana yuno aaroborwa ne Wele khulwe lilionakwa lie bakali, lundi khulwe buonia bwe bakali mu Isiraeli. Aliba simanyisio khukhwama khu Wele nisio bakali balilomakho kamabi
mala alibuula kamebaasio kabwe ke mu mwoyo. Ne ewe okhabe ne bubeeleli bukali bukhuchuune mu mwoyo nga niye baunile embalu.”
Abao omuloosi omung'oosi namulekhwa owalaangwa bali Ana, omukhaana owa Fanueli owe kholo eya Asieri. Amenya no museecha wewe kimiiko saba kiong'ene,
siise sino aaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi munaane na kine. Se arurangakho mu Lukaangu tawe; asaayanga Wele siilo ne kumuusi, eyimananga khulia nasaba wele.
Siise esio ne sisiene, ola mala apa orio khu Wele naloma kamakhuwa ko mwana khwaabo ba baalindiililanga Wele asikule Yerusalemu.
Omwana achoa mala aaba ne kamaani, limanya likali, ne chikhabi cha Wele.
Nga Yesu ne aba bukhulu bwe kimiiko ekhumi na kibili, bacha sia naikara nga buli lwoosi.
Yaba oli naikara yawa, barakikha khukobola engo, ne Yesu arama mu Yerusalemu. Basaasi bewe se bamanya tawe;
bebaasia bali Yesu alikho akeendela mu sipupu sie babaandu. Khwako bakeenda endaalo yoosi mala barakikha khu muyiima mu balebe ne mu basaale babwe.
Se bamunyoola tawe, nio bakobola Yerusalemu khu muyiima.
Oli endaalo ekhola khataru bamunyoola mu Lukaangu ekhaale ne Babekisia be Siyuda ne alikho abarekeeresia ne khubareeba kamareeba.
Boosi babamuulila bauka likobosia liewe lie bukesi bukali.
Basaasi bewe bauka nga bamubona, mala maawe amureeba ali, “Mwana wase, siina sikila ne okhukholela kano? Ese ne raraao abeele khweembeleele lukali mala khulakhuyiimanga ewe.”
Abakobosia ali, “Siina sikila ne mu mbeenja? Se mu manyile muli khukhwola mbe munju eya Paapa wase tawe?”
Ne kakhali se bamanyilisia niko aabakobosia tawe.
Nio Yesu aakobola nabo e Nasareti, mala ebweeneyo Yesu aria basaasi bewe. Maawe aabiikha kamakhuwa kano koosi mu mwoyo kwewe.
Yesu achoa, aba ne limanya, asiimisia Wele ne babaandu.

Kwaba kumwiiko kukhola likhumi lilala na kiraano kie buruki bwo mwami Tiberia; Pondio Pilato aaba omuruki we Ebuyuda, Herodi aba omwami owe Kalilaya ne wandaaye Filipo aaba omwami mu sibala sia Iturea ne Trakoniti, Lusania naye aaba omwami owe Abilini.
Anasi ne Kayafa baba basaayi bakhulu mu ndaalo nicho elomo eya Wele yecha khu Yoana okhwa Sakaria mu sichiimi.
Nio Yoana acha mu lukoongo lwe luluuchi lwa Yoritani ne elwacha ali, “Yekanila bubwoni bwenywe mala mubatiisibwe, ne Wele alamubeela enywe.”
Nga kaandikwa mu sitabu sio mung'oosi Isaya bali,
“Kumumilo kwo mundu kulikho kulomela mu sichiimi kuli,
‘Rekekha kumwiila kwo Mwami,
kololosia engila abirirekho.
Yichusia buli litooma, yaasia chingulu ne bikulu,
luungisia kimiila kikiekotakota,
ne khukwalaasia chingila che kamatikwi;
buli mundu alibona buonia bwa Wele!’ ”
Khola bikholwa bibiokesia bili enywe mwekanile bubwoni bwenywe. Ne mukharakikha khuloma muli Aburahamu ali kuuka wenywe tawe. Muboolela ndi Wele anyala khubukula kamabaale kano mala akakhole kabe babaana ba Aburahamu!
Eaywa yerekekhe khurema bisina bie kimirongooro, buli murongooro kukhaama kamatuunda kamalayi tawe kularemwa mala kumwaatwe mu mulilo.”
Nio babaandu bamureeba bali, “Nono khukhole siina?”
Abakobosia ali, “Buli mundu oli ne chingubo chibili akhoyeele aelesiekho ndala omundu okhalikho nayo tawe, ne buli mundu oli ne siakhulia akhoyeele akabekho owasie.”
Barosia busuuru balala becha babatiisibwe, mala bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia, efwe khukhole siina?”
Ababoolela ali, “Mukharoosia busuuru bukali khukhila bubwalakwa tawe.”
Banamae balala bosi bamureeba bali, “Nefwe nafwe khukhole siina?” Abakobosia ali, “Mukhanuula omundu yesi yesi chirupia chewe tawe, namwe mwasitaka omundu yesi yesi mu bubeeyi tawe. Munyalikhe ne kumuruungo kwenywe.”
Lilieyikina lie babaandu liarakikha khubonekha, mala barakikha khukhwibaasia bali wakana Yoana niye Masiiya.
Nio Yoana ababoolela boosi ali, “Ese mubatiisia enywe ne kameechi, ne kakhali okundi alikho echa oli omukali khu khuukhila ese. Ese se nolaana akhaba khukangulula biraaro biewe tawe. Alimubatiisia enywe ne Roho Omutakatifu ne kumulilo.
Ali ne euuma eye khuubisia engaanu khuluya mala auule engaanu yoosi abunge mu sirara; ne aliosia likhuuchi mu mulilo kukhasimanga tawe.”
Yoana elwacha Elomo Endayi khu baandu mu ngila chingali ne abekoonjelela bakaluukhane mu ngila chabwe.
Ne Yoana arafwira omwami Herodi sikila aaba abeyisie Herotia mukha wandaaye, lundi abele akholile kamabi kakaandi kamakali.
Khwako Herodi akhola sisiindu sisiindi sibi lukali, khulwe khura Yoana mu siboe.
Enyuma we babaandu boosi ne babatiisibwe, Yesu yesi abatiisibwa. Nga ne aaba ne alikho nasaba, likulu liekukha,
mala Roho Omutakatifu amwichakho mu sifwaanane sie liuusi. Kumumilo kwama mwikulu kuli, “Ewe oli Omwana wase Omusiime ousiimisia lukali.”
Nga Yesu ne arakikha kimilimo kiewe, aaba embi bukhulu bwe kimiiko kamakhumi kataru. (Okhwa Yosefu nga baandu ne bebaasianga). Yosefu aaba okhwa Heli,
Ne Heli aaba okhwa Matati, owaba okhwa Lawi, owaba okhwa Meliki, owaba okhwa Yanai, owaba okhwa Yosefu,
owaba okhwa Matatia, owaba okhwa Amosi, owaba okhwa Nahumu, owaba okhwa Esili, owaba okhwa Nakai,
owaba okhwa Maati, owaba okhwa Matatia, owaba okhwa Semeini, owaba okhwa Yoseki, owaba okhwa Yota,
owaba okhwa Yoanani, owaba okhwa Resa, owaba okhwa Serubabeli, owaba okhwa Shealitieli owaba okhwa Neri,
owaba okhwa Meliki, owaba okhwa Ati, owaba okhwa Kosamu, owaba okhwa elimatamu, owaba okhwa Eri,
owaba okhwa Yosia, owaba okhwa Elieseri, owaba okhwa Yorimu, owaba okhwa Matati, owaba okhwa Lawi,
owaba okhwa Simioni, owaba okhwa Yuda, owaba okhwa Yosefu, owaba okhwa Yonamu, owaba okhwa Eliakimu,
owaba okhwa Melea, owaba okhwa Mena, owaba okhwa Matatia, owaba okhwa Nasani, owaba okhwa Daudi,
owaba okhwa Chesi, okhwa Obeti, okhwa Boasi, okhwa Salimoni okhwa Nashoni,
owaba okhwa Aminatabu, owaba okhwa Atimini, owaba okhwa Arini, okhwa Hesironi, okhwa Peresi owaba okhwa Yuda,
owaba okhwa Yakobo, owaba okhwa Isaaka, owaba okhwa Aburahamu, okhwa Tera, okhwa Nahori, owaba okhwa
Seruki, owaba okhwa Reu, owaba okhwa Peleki, owaba okhwa Eberi, owaba okhwa Shela,
owaba okhwa Kainani, owaba okhwa Arifasati, owaba okhwa Shemu, owaba okhwa Noa, owaba okhwa Lameki,
owaba okhwa Metusela, owaba okhwa Enoka, owaba okhwa Yareti, owaba okhwa Mahalaleli, owaba okhwa Kenani,
owaba okhwa Enosi, owaba okhwa Seti, owaba okhwa Adamu, owaba Omwana owa Wele.

Yesu akobola khukhwama e Yoritani ne echuule Roho Omutakatifu mala arangirirwa ne Roho ayilwa mu sichiimi,
niio akhakwa ne Sietani khu ndaalo kamakhumi kane. Mu siise esio sioosi se aliakho siakhulia tawe, oli siise esio siawa enjala yamulia.
Sietani amuboolela ali, “Ewe waaba ne oli Omwana owa Wele boolela libaale lino likele siakhulia.”
Nio Sietani amuniinia khu sikulu mala amwekesia khangu bubwami bwe sibala sioosi.
Sietani amuboolela ali, “Ndakhuelesia ewe bunyali buno ne buiinda buno bwoosi. Naebwa bioosi, mala ese nyala naelesia omundu yesi yesi niye samwene nenya.
Nono, bino bioosi bilaba bibiowo waba ne usaaya ese.”
Nio Sietani amubukula amuyila Yerusalemu, mala amura khu sisekese sie Lukaangu, mala amuboolela ali, “Ewe waaba ne oli Omwana owa Wele, suna aasi khukhwama ano.
Sikila liiandiko liboola lili, ‘Wele alaboolela malaika bewe bakhuliinde bulayi.’
Lundi liboola lili, ‘Balakhutiila mu makhono kabwe nio okhetuya khu mabaale tawe.’ ”
Nga Sietani ne amala khukhaka Yesu mu buli ngila, amulekha khulwe siise.
Nio Yesu akobola mu Kalilaya mu maani ka Roho Omutakatifu. Lilomaloma lie babaandu khu niye liasalaanila mu sibala esio siosi.
Ekisia mu masinakooki mala aebwa efuma ne babaandu boosi.
Nio Yesu acha e Nasareti, niio achoela, mala oli mu Sabato acha mu sinakooki nga buli lwoosi. Enyokha khusoma kamaandiko
mala bamuelesia sitabu sio mung'oosi Isaya. Abambula sitabu mala anyoola abuundu niio kaandikwa kali,
sikila andobora ese khureera Elomo Endayi khu bataambi.
Andumire khukhwilwacha bulekhuule khu baambe,
khukhola baabofu babone, khulekhuula babapisibwa sibi,
ne khuboola ndi siise siolile,
nisio Omwami alaonia babaandu bewe.”
Yesu afuunikha sitabu, asiakanisia omukholi mala ekhala aasi. Babaandu boosi mu sinakooki baunguusa Yesu
nga ababoolela ali, “Endaalo yino kamakhuwa ke liiandiko kano kechusibwe mu moni chenywe.”
Boosi basiimisibwa naye mala bauka bulayi bwe kamakhuwa niko alomaloma. Baloma bali, “Se ali okhwa Yosefu ta ku?”
Ababoolela ali, “Ndi nang'ali ndi mulamboolela lusimo luno, ‘Musilikhi, yionia wamwene.’ ” Lundi mulamboolela khukhola mu lukoba lwase lwengo bibiindu bibieene ne bibieene nibio mwauliile bali biekholeekhe mu Kaperinaumu.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, se aliio omung'oosi ofukiililwa mu sibala siewe tawe.”
Muboolela enywe bung'ali ndi, “Babao banamulekhwa bakali mu Isiraeli mu ndaalo cha Elicha, nga efula ne yabira kimiiko kitaru ne kimieesi sita, mala enjala engali yaba mu sibala mwoosi.
Ne Elicha se arumwa khu mundu yesi yesi mu Isiraeli tawe, ne kakhali arumwa khu namulekhwa yeng'ene, owamenya mu e Sarefati mu sibala sia Sidoni.
Lundi be bulwaale bwe kamakele babaao bakali mu Isiraeli mu ndaalo cho mung'oosi Elisha, ne se aliio namulala khu nibo owaonisibwa tawe, nakhali Naamani owe Siria yeng'ene.”
Boosi ba baaba mu sinakooki omwo, nga baulila kano baambwa lirima.
Mala benyokha basindikha Yesu bamurusia enje we lukoba, bamuniinia khu sikulu nisio bombakhakho lukoba lwabwe. Beenya bamumwaate emaayo.
Ne kakhali ababiramo busa echiila.
Mala Yesu ekha acha e Kaperinaumu lukoba lwa Kalilaya, niio ekisia mu Sabato.
Babaandu bauka kamekisio kewe lukali sikila lilomaloma liewe liaba lie bunyali.
Ne omundu we sisieeno aaba mu sinakooki, mala akukuula lukali ali,
“Aa Yesu owe Nasareti, ewe wenya khukhola siina khwifwe? Wenya khukhubunia efwe? Ese khumanyile ndi ewe oli Omutakatifu owa Wele.”
Nio Yesu ayibila sisieeno chana naloma ali, “Sila, mala omururemo! Mala sisieeno siapa aasi omundu chana ebweeni we babaandu mala siamururamo busa khumuumisia tawe.”
Babaandu boosi bauka, mala bareebana bali, “Makhuwa siina kano? Sikila khulwe bunyali ne kamaani akhokhela bisieeno mala bicha!”
Mala kamakhuwa ka Yesu kasalaanila buli abuundu mu lukoongo olwo.
Yesu arura mu sinakooki mala acha engila munju mwa Simoni. Masalaawe owa Simoni aba alwala bulwaale bwe kumureengo, mala baboolela Yesu bulwaale bwa masalaawe chana.
Yesu amwimao mala ayibila bulwaale buwe mala bwawa. Omuloosi chana enyokha khangu ne khu bayeeta khurekekha siakhulia.
Nga enyanga yaba nelikho ekwa, boosi ba baaba ne basaale balwala bulwaale chingano na ngano, babareera khu Yesu ara kamakhono kewe khu buli sia mulala, mala abaonia boosi.
Bisieeno biarura mu baandu bakali, ne bilila bili, “Ewe oli Omwana owa Wele!”
Ne kakhali Yesu abikhokhela ne se abielesia kumunwa bilomalome lundi tawe, sikila biamanya bili niye ali Kristo.
Oli busia Yesu arura mu lukoba acha abuundu niio omundu akhaaba tawe. Babaandu barakikha khumuyiima mala nga bamunyoola khwenya abarureo tawe,
ne kakhali ababoolela ali, “Khukhwola nilwache Elomo Endayi eye Bubwami bwa Wele mu ngoba chichiindi chosi; sikila ako niko Wele anduma khole.”
Nio elwacha burume mu chisinakooki mu sibala sioosi.

Abona kamaaro kabili a nyanja, ne banaabi baba baruriremo balikho basiinga chindiimba chabwe.
Yesu engila mu liaaro lilala liliaba lia Simoni, amuboolela alirusie asikiingi alisende khu meechi. Nio Yesu ekhala khu liaaro mala ekisia babaandu.
Nga amala khulomaloma aboolela Simoni ali, “Yila liliaaro alusiba, mala mumwaate chindiimba chenywe mu meechi, mulaamba ching'eeni.”
Mala nga bakhola bario batiila ching'eeni chingali mala chindiimba chenga khukitukha,
basakula babasiaabwe babaaba mu liaaro liliindi beche babayeete. Becha mala bechusia ching'eeni mu maaro koombi, kaba siimbi khukhwesiikha.
Ne nga Simoni Petero abona ario, asikama ebweeni wa Yesu aloma ali, “Omwami, Ndureo! Ese ndi omundu omwoni!”
Petero ne babasie boosi, barangararwa bauka lukali, khulwe bukali bwe ching'eeni nicho baba ne batilile,
kaba kario khu Yakobo ne Yoana, ba okhwa Sebetayo, ba baaba basaangi ne Simoni. Nio Yesu aboolela Simoni ali, “Okharia tawe, khukhwama luno ewe olaba omunaabi owe babaandu.”
Mala bakhweesa bareera kamaaro kabwe khu sikiingi balekha buli siindu mala bamuloondakho.
Nga Yesu ne aba mu lukoba lulala, omundu niye kamakele kamala kumubili kwoosi amwichakho. Ne nga abona Yesu, asikama ebweeni wewe amusaba ali, “Omwami, waaba ne wenya, onyala wambonia!”
Yesu amutilakho, amuboolela ali, “Nenya, khoone.” Ne abwene ne abwene kamakele kamururakho.
Yesu atanyiliila omundu chana ali, “Okhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi tawe, ne kakhali khoche weyokesie khu musaayi, mala orusie siianwa sibe simanyisio khu baandu khulwe khuona khwowo nga Musa ne alaka.”
Ne kakhali kamakhuwa ka Yesu kasalaanila lukali, mala babaandu bakali becha bebuusia bamuulile lundi abaonie bulwaale bwabwe.
Ne kakhaba kario achichanga mu sichiimi yeng'ene khusaba.
Endaalo ndala, nga Yesu aaba ne alikho ekisia, Bafarisayo ne babekisia be lilaka baba bekhaleo, ba baaba ne bamile buli mu birekere bia Kalilaya ne mu Buyuda ne khukhwama Yerusalemu. Ne bunyali bwa Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi bwe khuonia bwaba naye.
Babaandu balala bareerera khu sitanda omundu owafwokoya. Bakhaka khu mureera munju bamure ebweeni wa Yesu.
Ne sikila babaandu baaba bakali, se banyoola engila eye khumwingisia mukari tawe. Baniina naye khunju barusiakho kamatifari, bekula sibanga mala bamwikhisilao niye ne sitanda siewe akari we babaandu ebweeni wa Yesu.
Ne nga Yesu ne abona lisuubila liabwe aboolela omundu oyo ali, “Omusaale, wabeleelwe bubwoni bwowo.”
Nio baandiki ne Bafarisayo barakikha khureeba ne baloma bali, “Naanu onyala abeela bubwoni nakhali Wele yeng'ene?”
Yesu amanya kamebaasio kabwe mala abareeba ali, “Siina sikila ne mwibaasia murio?
Lilala siina liliangu? Khuloma ndi, ‘Wabeleelwe bubwoni bwowo’, namwe ndi, ‘Yinyokha okeende?’
Ne ndamwekesia ndi Omwana wo Mundu ali ne bunyali khu sibala khubeela bubwoni.” Nio aboolela omundu owafwokoya chana ali, “Yinyokha obukule sitanda siowo mala oche engo!”
Abwene ne abwene omundu oyo enyokha ebweeni wabwe boosi, abukula sitanda siewe nisio akonangakho mala acha engo ne afumia Wele.
Nio boosi bauka, baria, mala bafumia Wele ne baloma bali, “Endaalo yino khwaboone bibiindu bikeni.”
Enyuma wa kano Yesu arura acha mala abona omundu owaroosianga busuuru owalaangwa bali Lawi, ekhaale mu ofisi eye busuuru. Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nondekho.”
Khwako Lawi alekha buli siindu mala enyokha amuloondakho.
Nio akholela Yesu naikara emboofu munju mwewe. Mu bakeni babalia naye, bakali baba babaroosianga busuuru.
Bafarisayo ne baandiki beng'ulung'unya khu beeka ba Yesu ne baloma bali, “Siina sikila enywe ne mulia ne khuunywa ne baroosi be busuuru ne babooni?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Bali balamu se beenya omusilikhi tawe, ne kakhali balwale nibo babeenya omusilikhi.
Se necha khulaanga baluungi tawe, ne kakhali necha khulaanga babooni bekanile.”
Babaandu balala baboolela Yesu bali, “Buli lwoosi babeeka ba Yoana beyimananga khulia ne basaba. Babeeka be Bafarisayo bosi bakholanga bario, ne kakhali babowo balia ne khunywa.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe munyala mwakhola bakeni be siselelo beyimana khulia niye baakhiile nali nabo ku? Se kali kario tawe.
Endaalo elecha niyo oakhiilwe alibukulwa abarureo. Mu ndaalo echo baliyimana khulia.”
Lundi ababoolela lukano ali, “Se aliio obukulanga silaka sie ngubo embia mala asipila khu ngubo ekhale tawe. Aaba nakhola ario aba atabuule embia, ne silaka sie ngubo embia esio se silafwaanana ne khale tawe.
Namwe se aliio omundu ochukhanga endali embia mu oochwa chikhale tawe, kaaba bali akhola ario aba endali oyo elatabula chioochwa echo mala echichukhe aasi, mala aba chioochwa chana chonekhe.
Ne kakhali khukhwola endali embia echukhwe mu oochwa chimbia.
Se aliio omundu owenya endali embia namalile khunywa endali ekhale tawe; sikila alaloma ali, ‘Endali ekhale eli endayi.’ ”

Balala khu Bafarisayo bareeba bali, “Sikila siina ne mukhola khu ndaalo eya Sabato nisio Lilaka liefwe likhafukiilila tawe?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Se mwasomakho niko Daudi akhola nga niye nende nibo aba nabo ne baba ne njala tawe ku?
Engila munju eya Wele abukula kimikaati kikiaba kiaanilwe khu Wele alia mala aelesia babaandu bewe bosi balia. Lilaka se lifukiilila omundu yesi yesi okhali Omusaayi khulia biaanilwe khu Wele tawe.”
Nio Yesu ababoolela ali, “Omwana wo Mundu ali Omwami owe Sabato.”
Khu Sabato ekiindi, Yesu engila mu sinakooki ekisia. Omundu owafwokoya kumukhono kumuseecha abamo.
Baandiki ne Bafarisayo bamureka babone nanyala aonia khu ndaalo eye Sabato, nio banyoole sifuno sie khumusitaka.
Ne kakhali Yesu amanya kamebaasio kabwe mala aboolela omundu owafwokoya kumukhono chana ali, “Yinyokha wiche wime ano.” Omundu chana enyokha emao.
Nio Yesu abareeba ali, “Lilaka likhufukiilila khukhola kamalayi mu Sabato namwe khukhwonaka, khuonia bulamu, namwe khuburusiao?”
Abaloleelela boosi mala aboolela omundu chana ali, “Kololosia kumukhono kwowo.” Akhola ario mala kumukhono kwewe kwaona.
Baambwa lirima mala bareebana nisio banyala bakhola khu Yesu.
Siise esio Yesu aniina khu sikulu khucha khusaba mala achiililila khusaba Wele siilo sioosi.
Nga ne bwasia, alaanga babeeka bewe mala aroboramo ekhumi na babili abalaanga ali barumwa.
Baba Simoni, (niye atiuukha ali Petero), ne Andereya wandaaye, Yakobo ne Yoana, Filipo ne Baturimayo,
Matayo ne Tomasi, Yakobo okhwa Alufayo, ne Simoni, (owalaangwa Siloti),
Yuda okhwa Yakobo, ne Yuda Isikarioti owecha aba omuchaami.
Nga Yesu ekha ne barumwa khukhwama khu sikulu, eema asiangalaamwe ne babeeka bewe bakali. Babaandu bakali khukhwama mu Buyuda mwoosi, Yerusalemu ne mu ngoba che khu nyanja cha Tiro ne Sidoni babao.
Baaba bechile khumuulila ne khuonisibwa bulwaale bwabwe. Abo babananisibwanga ne bisieeno bosi becha mala baonisibwa.
Babaandu boosi bakhaka khumwiambakho, sikila bunyali bwamwamangakho ne khuonia boosi.
Yesu asuta chimoni alola babeeka bewe mala aloma ali,
“Muli ne chikhabi muuli bataambi; sikila Bubwami bwa Wele buli bubwenywe.
“Muli ne chikhabi muuli ne njala luno,
sikila mulikura!
“Muli ne chikhabi mulila luno, sikila mulichekha!
“Sili silaamo khwinywe muuli baiinda luno;
sikila mwamenya limenya lie bukoote!
Sili silaamo khwinywe mu mwikuure luno,
sikila mulaba ne njala!
Sili silaamo khwinywe muchekha luno,
sikila mulasooma ne khulila!
“Sili silaamo khwinywe babaandu boosi ne balomaloma kamalayi khwinywe; sikila kali ako ne kamene niko bakuuka benywe baboolela bario bang'oosi be bubeeyi.
“Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe mu mumbulilanga ndi: Siima basiku benywe, kholela kamalayi abo ba bamubiila,
biita chikhabi abo bamulaama, sabila abo bamupia sibi,
khuyo okhuupa luui muelesie lusaya luluundi lwosi akhuupe; ne oyo okhubukula likooti okhamukhiingilila khu khubukula akhaba lisiati liowo tawe.
Buli mundu okhusaba muelesie, ne omundu obukula bibiowo okhamureeba tawe.
Nono siosi siosi nisio mwenya babaandu bamukholele, mwesi bakholele murio.
“Ne mwaba ne musiima ba bamusiima bong'ene aba mulanyoola muruuru siina? Sikila akhaba babooni basiima abo ba babasiima.
Ne mwaba ne mukholela kamalayi abo bamukholelanga kamalayi bong'ene, aba mulanyoola muruuru siina? Sikila akhaba babooni bakholanga bario!
“Ne mwaba ne mwekopia bakhamukoboselie bong'ene, aba mulanyoola siina? Akhaba babooni bakholanga bario!
Khwako siima basiku benywe ne khubakholela kamalayi, yekopia ne mukheyikina khuruungwa tawe. Ne mukhola murio kumuruuru kwenywe kuliba kumuboofu mala muliba babaana ba Wele owe Angaaki Lukali; sikila ali omulayi khu baandu bakhapanga orio khu sikholwa siosi siosi silayi tawe ne babemani bosi.
Ba be siisa, nga Raraawenywe owe mwikulu.
“Mukhakhalakila babaandi tawe, ne Wele se alamukhalakila enywe tawe, mukhabiiya babaandi tawe, ne Wele naye se alamubiiya enywe tawe; beela babaandi ne mwesi mulabeelwa.
Elesia babaandi, ne Wele naye alamuelesia enywe. Ng'ali mulanyoola sikono sisichuule, nisio basiinyile ne khusisikha nabwila bichichukha aasi. Sikila sikono nisio muanilamo sisiene ne sisiene nisio mulinyoolelamo khukhwama khu Wele.”
Oweyika se akhila omwekisia wewe tawe, ne buli omweyika ne ekisiibwe mubwichufu alaba nga omwekisia wewe.
Siina sikila nobona kha khandu khakeekhe khaali mu moni eya wandaayo ne se onyala wabona sisosono siili mu moni mwowo tawe?
Namwe onyala oriena khuboolela wandaayo oli, “Wandaayase, khola ese khurusie kha khandu khaali mu moni mwowo, ne ewe sobona sisosono siili mu moni mwowo wamwene tawe? Mubacha ewe, nyoa orusie sisosono siili mu moni mwowo ne nono olabona bulayi, nio orusie kha khandu khaali mu moni eya wandaayo.
“Kumurongooro kumulayi se kwaama kamatuunda kamabi tawe, namwe lundi kumurongooro kumubi se kwaama kamatuunda kamalayi tawe.
Buli murongooro kumanyikhana khulwe kamatuunda kakwo. Sikila sonyala wabuta chinduli khukhwama khu binyenya tawe, namwe se babutaanga chisabibu khukhwama khu marakaru tawe.
Omundu omulayi aananga kamalayi khukhwama mwibiikhilo lie kamalayi lili mu mwoyo kwewe; ne omundu omumayaanu aananga kamamayaanu khukhwama mwibiikhilo liewe limayaanu. Sikila kumunwa kwewe kulomaloma khukhwama khu makali ka kechula mu mwoyo mwewe.
“Siina sikila ne mundanga muli, ‘Omwami, Omwami,’ ne se mukhola niko ese muboolela tawe?
Buli mundu owichanga khwise mala aulila kamakhuwa kase mala akakhola, ndamwekesia enywe omundu oyo ali walukano siina:
Ali nga omundu owayaba kumusiingi khu lwaanda ombakhakho enju yewe. Oli chinjichi chiichula, kameechi kakiatilakho, ne se yakwa tawe, sikila yaba yombakhwa bulayi.
Ne oyo oulila elomo yase ne se akholakho siosi siosi tawe, ali nga omundu owombakha enju khu muyekhe busa, se ombakha khu musiingi tawe, nga chinjichi chechula, kameechi kakiatilakho mala yakwa khangu, ne likwa lienju eyo liaba liboofu po!”

Nga Yesu ne amala khulomaloma lino akari we babaandu babamuulilanga, acha mu Kaperinaumu.
Abao omukhulu we banamae be Barumi owaba no mukholi omukoosi khu niye, omukholi yuno aba omulwale lukali, aba siimbi khufwa.
Nga omukhulu owe banamae oyo aulila ka Yesu, aruma basaakhulu be Siyuda bamuboolele eche aonie omukholi wewe.
Nga basaakhulu abo boola khu Yesu bamwikoonjelela ne baloma bali, “Omundu yuno ng'ali olaana omuyeete.
Sikila asiima ekholo yefwe mala akhwombakhila esinakooki.”
Nio Yesu acha ne nabo. Nga ne aba nakana khukhwola khunju, omukhulu we banamae chana aruma basaale bewe khu Yesu namuboolela ali, “Omwami okhenaania busa tawe, ewe se wolaana khukhwingila munju mwase tawe,
namwe se nibaasia ndi nyala khukhwicha niio oli tawe. Ne kakhali loma busa elomo, mala omukholi wase aone.
Sikila ese ndi omundu ooli aasi we kamalaka, ndi ne banamae aasi wase: ne nyala khuboolela mulala ndi ‘Cha’ aacha ne khu kundi ndi, ‘Yiicha’ mala eecha; lundi nyala naboolela omukholi wase ndi, ‘Khola sino’ mala asikhola.”
Nga Yesu ne aulila kano, auka lukali mala eekhebukha, aaboolela babaandu bakali bamuloondilekho ali, “Muboolela enywe ndi, ese khaabonakho lisuubila liri mu Isiraeli tawe!”
Nga ba baaba ne barumirwe bakobola munju yo mukhulu owe banamae banyoola omukholi aonile.
Enyuma we siise sitiiti, Yesu ne babeeka bewe ne babaandu bakali bacha khu lukoba lulwalaangwa Naini.
Nga aba nali khwola a silibwa sie lukoba, abona babaandu bakali basutile omufu bamurusia enje. Ne omufu oyo aba omuteelwa owa namulekhwa.
Nga Yesu abona namulekhwa yuno amukholela siisa mala amuboolela ali, “Okhalila tawe.”
Nio acha atiila khu lisanduku lio mufu, ne basutile bema basila. Ne Yesu aloma ali, “Musoleeli! ‘Lamukha.’ ”
Omufu alamukha ekhala mala arakikha khulomaloma, mala Yesu amwakaanisia maawe.
Buuri bwabaamba boosi mala baelesia Wele luyali, ne baboola bali, “Omung'oosi we liukia aselukhe akari wefwe! Ne Wele echile khuonia babaandu bewe!”
Mala kamakhuwa kewe kano kasalanila mu sibala sia Yuda ne chingoongo chiichasibotookhelela choosi.
Nga babeeka ba Yoana bamuboolela bibiindu bino bioosi alangakho babili,
ne khubaruma khu Mwami bamureebe bali, “Ewe niwe niye Yoana aloma ali olikho wicha, namwe khwirekekhele okundi?”
Nga ne boola khu Yesu bamuboolela bali, “Yoana Omubatiisi akhurumire efwe khwiwe khu khureebe khuli, ‘Ewe niwe niye aloma ali olikho wicha namwe khwirekekhele okundi?’ ”
Mu siise esio Yesu aonia bakali ba baaba ne bulwaale ne lufu ne bisieeno ne babofu bakali babona.
Ne akobosia babeeka ba Yoana ali, “Khemuche muboolele Yoana niko muboone ne khuulila, babofu babona, baleme bakeenda, be kamakele baonile, bamiinyi balikho baulila, bafu balamusibwa ne Elomo Endayi yilwachibwa khu bataambi,
ali ne khabi osuubila koosi khwise.”
Nga babaandu nibo Yoana aaruma baba ne bakobolayo Yesu arakikha khulomaloma khu baandu khuloondekhana ne Yoana ali, “Enywe nga mwacha khu Yoana mu sichiimi, mwenya khubona siina? Lubembe nilwo ekhuungu euucha ku?
Mwacha khubona siina? Omundu owefwarire chingubo chindayi? Lola, abo babefwara chingubo chindayi che bukusi bamenya mu bukoote mu machipi ke babaami.
Siina nono nisio enywe mwacha khubona? Omung'oosi? Ee, ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi Yoana ali omukali khukhila omung'oosi.
Oyuno ali niye liiandiko liboola lili:
‘Ese ndaruma omurumwa wase ebweeni wowo,
olakhurekekhera ewe engila ebweeni wowo.’
“Muboolela enywe ndi, abo boosi nibo bakhasi basaala se aliio omukali khukhila Yoana tawe, ne kakhali oyo oli omukeekhe mu bwami bwa Wele ali omukali khumukhila niye.”
Ne kakhali Bafarisayo ne baandiki baloba sifuno sia Wele khu nibo mala khubatiisibwa ne Yoana tawe.
Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Nono nyala khufwaananisia babaandu be selukho yino khu siindu siina? Bali babaandu ba lukano siina?
Bali nga babaana babekhaale khu soko, mala balaangana bali, ‘Khumupiile enywe kumulele, mala semukhinile tawe, khwisasaarire, mala enywe khulila tawe!’
Sikila Yoana Omubatiisi echa, eyimana khulia ne khunywa endali, mala enywe mwaloma muli, ‘Ali ne sisieeno.’
Omwana wo Mundu echa alia ne khunywa, mala enywe mwaloma muli, ‘Lola owe kuluungo lundi omumeesi, omusaale owe baroosianga busuuru ne babooni!’
Ne kakhaba kario, limanya lia Wele liekesibwa khuba ng'ali khwaabo balifukiilila.”
Mulala khu bafarisayo aalanga Yesu khukhwikolooya naye, mala acha munju eyo ekhala khu sialwa.
Omukhasi omwoni aaba mu lukoba omwo, nga namanya ali Yesu ekhaale khu sialwa munju yo Mufarisayo echa ne echuupa eyichuulemo kamafura ke bukusi bwe angaaki kaunya bulayi,
omukhasi oyo eema enyuma wa Yesu abikele biewe. Aaba alikho alila ne atosia bikele bia Yesu ne kamasika kewe. Nio eeya bikele bia Yesu ne lichuune liewe. Omukhasi yuno ekwayila Yesu ne khumuakha bikele kamafura kaunya bulayi ako.
Nga Omufarisayo owamulanga oyo aboona kano ebaasia ali, “Omundu yuno aba omung'oosi andi amanyile omukhasi omutiililekho yuno ali naanu, lundi owalukano siina, sikila ali omwoni.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Simoni, ndi ne likhuwa nilio nenya khukhuboolela.” Ne Simoni amukobosia ali, “Omwekisia likhuwa siina?”
Yesu aamureeba ali, “Omundu owekopianga aaba ne be kamakobi babili; mulala aba ne likobi liewe lie chirupia chimia chiraano, ne okundi aba ne likobi lie chirupia kamakhumi karaano.
Nga bakhaywa khu muruunga ababeela boombi. Nono naanu khu babili bano olamusiima lukali?”
Simoni akobosia ali, “Nibaasia ndi oyo owabeelwa chingali.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Wakhalaake bulayi.”
Nio ekhebukha niio omukhasi chana ali, aboolela Simoni ali, “Waboone omukhasi yuno? Nga ningile munju yowo se mumbeele kameechi ke khusaaba bikele biase tawe, ne niye asiingile bikele biase ne kamasika kewe ne khubieya ne lichuune liewe.
Se munjikwayiile tawe ne niye khukhwama khu siise nisio nichiile muno se alekhilekho khukhunjikwayila tawe.
Se wambakhilekho kamafura mu murwe tawe, ne niye ambakhile kamafura bikele.
Khwako khuboolela ndi, bubwoni bwewe buuli bukali bwabeleelwe sikila ekeesie busiime bukali; ne kakhali oyo obeelwa makeekhe ali ne busiime bukeekhe.”
Nio Yesu aboolela omukhasi chana ali, “Bubwoni bwowo bwabeleelwe.”
Abo ba baaba khu sialwa ne Yesu barakikha khureebana bali, “Naanu yuno, obeela akhaba bubwoni?”
Ne kakhali Yesu aboolela omukhasi chana ali, “Lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie; khoche kumuleembe.”

Enyuma we siise sitiiti Yesu abira mu ngoba ne mu birekere ne elwacha Elomo Endayi eye Bubwami bwa Wele, ne aba ne barumwa bewe ekhumi na babili,
akhaba bakhasi balala babaonisibwa bulwaale ne khurusibwamo bisieeno baba naye. Nga Maria (owalaangwa Makatalena) niye bisieeno saba biaruramo;
Yoanina mukha Kusa omukholi owo mukhoongo Herodi, ne Susana ne bakali babaandi barumikhiranga kimiaandu kiabwe khuyeeta Yesu ne babeeka bewe.
Babaandu bachiililila khukhwicha khu Yesu khukhwama mu ngoba chingali. Nga bakucha Yesu abakanila lukano luno ali,
“Omumiichi mulala acha khumiicha bumiicho bwewe, ne nga aba ne alikho amiicha, bulala bwakwa khu ngila bwaswalwakililwa, mala chinyuni chabuboocha.
Bulala bwakwa khu lwanda, nga bwamela, oli bulikho buchoa mala bwoma sikila bwataamba kameechi.
Bulala bwakwa mu mawa, oli bwachoa kamawa kabuuna bwoma.
Bubuundi bwakwa mu maloba kamalayi, bwachoa, mala buli lulala lwaama emia.” Nga aba naboola lino amaliilisia ali, “Oyo oli ne kamaru ke khuulila lekha aulile!”
Babeeka bewe bamureeba sifuno sie lukano luno,
akobosia ali, “Khwinywe mwaelesibwa khumanya kakekisa ke Bubwami bwa Wele ne khu baandi kali mu ngano, nio bakhalola se balabona tawe, bakharekeeresia se bakhaulile tawe.
“Sifuno sie lukano luno nisiesi. Bumiicho buli elomo eya Wele.
Bumiicho bubwakwa khu ngila buli nga abo baulilanga elomo ne Sietani echa mala akibukula erura mu miooyo kiabwe nio bakhasuubila mala baonisibwe tawe.
Ne bumiicho bubwakwa khu lwanda buli nga abo ba bakaanila burume bwa Wele mu busangaafu mala se bali ne lisuubila likali tawe, basuubila khu siise sitiiti oli siise sie kamakhako siola ne bakwa.
Ne bumiicho bubwakwa mu mawa buli nga abo baulilanga burume bwa Wele ne kakhali bibiindu bikali bie mu limenya nga, liliembeelela, buiinda, ne limenya lie khukhwesangaasia babeene libakhola se baliinda lisuubila liabwe tawe.
Ne kakhali bumiicho bubwakwa mwiloba lilayi buli nga abo baulilanga burume, babutiila lukali mu miooyo kimilayi kie buriaani, mala bekhaliilikha khukhwola nga baama kamatuunda.
Nio maawe ne bawandaaye ba Yesu beecha niio aba ne se banyala khumwolela tawe, sikila bukali bwe babaandu.
Ne Yesu aboolelwa ali, “Maao ne bawandaayo bemile enje benya khukhubona ewe.”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Maayi ne bawandaayase bali abo baulila elomo eya Wele ne khukitiila.”
Endaalo ndala Yesu acha khu liaaro ne babeeka bewe mala ababoolela ali, “Khwambukhe enyanja.” Nio barakikha lukeendo.
Nga baba ne balikho bambukha liilo liaamba Yesu. Ekhuungu eye kamaani yaucha khu nyanja ne liliaaro liarakikha khukhwichula kameechi nio boosi baba mu butinyu.
Babeeka bacha mala bamusiisimusia ne baloma bali, “Omwami, Omwami! Khwabuna!”
Yesu asisimukha mala ayibila ekhuungu ne bibuli bie kameechi biboofu mala biasila, enyanja yayenjeela lukali.
Yesu abareeba ali, “Lisuubila lienywe lili waena?”
Bauka lundi baria, mala bareebana bali, “Omundu yuno naanu niye? Ayibila akhaba ekhuungu ne bibuli bie kameechi, mala bimuria!”
Yesu ne babeeka bewe boola mu sibala sie Bakerasi, sisialoleelelana ne sia Kalilaya.
Nga Yesu arura mu liaaro, omundu ama mu lukoba owaba ne bisieeno amwakaanana khulwe siise sileeyi omundu chana oyo se efwaranga chingubo tawe. Lundi se amenyanga mungo tawe, amenyanga mu biliindwa.
Nga abona Yesu ayokela lukali, akwa ebweeni wewe mala alomaloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Ndi na siina ne nawe, Yesu, Mwana owa Wele owe Angaaki Lukali, unjenyakho siina? Khwikoonjelela okhambukuuma tawe!”
Omundu oyo aloma ario sikila Yesu aba ayibiile sisieeno simulimo simururemo. (Sikila sisieeno esio siamulaasiaanga, akhaba babaandu ba bamuliindanga bamuboanga kiminyololo, ne bikoche, mala abikitulanga bioosi, ne sisieeno siamuyilanga mu siangalaamwe.)
Nio Yesu amureeba ali, “Lisina liowo bali naanu?” Amukobosia ali, “Lechoni,” sikila bisieeno bikali biaba biamwingilamo.
Mala biamwikoonjelela akhabiyiibila biacha mwiloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe.
Abwenao liabao lituuli liboofu lie chingurwe chaaya mu maayo mwe sikulu, mala bisieeno biamwikoonjelela abilekhuule bingile mu ngurwe. Mala abielesia kumunwa.
Nio bisieeno chana biarura mu mundu biengila mu ngurwe ne lituuli lioosi liasalamata liekha eluongwa mala liakwa mu nyanja liafwilamo.
Nga babaayi babona kakaba ne kekholekhe, belukha bacha mu lukoba ne mu birekere ne baboolela babaandu.
Mala babaandu barura bacha khulola liliaba ne likholekhe, ne boola khu Yesu mala banyoola omundu niye bisieeno biaba ne biruriremo ekhaale mu bikele bia Yesu, efwarire chingubo mala kamebaasio kewe kakoboole abweene, mala boosi barangararwa ne khuria.
Ne abo bababona liliaba ne likholekhe baboolela babaandu nga omundu oyo ne aonisiibwe.
Nio babaandu boosi be mu sibala sie Bakerasi baambwa buuri bukali po, mala basaaya Yesu arekukhe arure mu sibala siabwe. Khwako Yesu aniina mu liaaro arekukha.
Omundu chana niye bisieeno biaba ne bimururiremo ekoonjelela Yesu amue kumunwa ache naye; ne kakhali Yesu amukaania naloma ali,
“Kobola engo oboolele babaandu niko Wele akhukholeele.” Nio arekukha acha aboola mu lukoba mwosi niko Yesu amukholeele.
Nga Yesu ne akobola sikelekha sisiindi sie nyanja, babaandu bakali bamwakaanila, sikila boosi baba bamulindiilile.
Ne omundu olaangwa Yairo owaba omuliindi owe sinakooki, akwa mu bikele bia Yesu, amwikoonjelela ache mungo mwewe.
Sikila aba no mukhaana omuteelwa owaba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko embi ekhumi na kibili mala aba alikho afwa.
Nga Yesu ne aba ne alikho acha, babaandu bamukhumakho buli lubeka.
Mu baandu abo abamo omukhasi owaba ne kibeeni khulwe kimiiko ekhumi na kibili, omusilikhi se abao owanyala khumuonia tawe. Arumikhira bioosi nibio aba nabio khu basilikhi ne se banyala khumuonia tawe,
echela enyuma wa Yesu mala aatiila khu ngubo yewe, ne ekibeeni yiima.
Nio Yesu areeba ali, “Naanu oundiililekho?” Buli mundu ekaana, mala Petero amuboolela ali, “Omwami, babaandu bakali bakhukhumilekho!”
Yesu aloma ali, “Aliio omundu oundililekho, sikila neulile kamaani kanduriremo.”
Nga omukhasi chana abona ali sanyala khwikisa tawe, echa ne alikho aaterema mala aakwa ebweeni wa Yesu aboola mu moni che babaandu boosi sikilile ne amutilakho lundi nga aonile abwene ne abwene.
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Mwana wase, lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie. Cha ne kumuleembe.”
Nga Yesu aaba nasilomaloma kano, omundu omurumwa khukhwama wo muliindi owe sinakooki chana ola naboolela Yairo ali, “Omukhaana wowo afwiile, okhachiililila khunaania Omwekisia tawe.”
Yesu nga aulila kano aboolela Yairo ali, “Okharia tawe suubila mala alaona.”
Nga ola munju eya Yairo se afukiilila omundu yesi yesi khukhwingila ne naye munju tawe, nakhali Petero, Yoana, ne Yakobo, ne raraawe ne maawe wo mwana chana.
Mala yaba babaandu boosi balikho bamulila ne khukhwesasaara, Yesu ababoolela ali, “Mukhalila tawe, sikila se afwiile tawe ne kakhali alikho akona.”
Boosi bamuchekha sikila baba bamanyile bali omukhaana aba afwiile.
Nio Yesu amutiila kumukhono amulaanga ali, “Mwana wase sisimukha!”
Omwana chana alamukha abwene na bwene, mala Yesu aboola bamuelesie siakhulia alie.
Nio basaasi bewe bauka, ne kakhali Yesu arusia lilaka ali bakhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi kakekholeekhe kano tawe.

Yesu alanga alala babeeka ekhumi na babili, mala abaelesia kamaani, ne bunyali khurusia bisieeno bioosi ne khuonia bulwaale.
Abaruma khukhwilwacha Bubwami bwa Wele ne khuonia balwale.
Ababoolela ali, “Mukhabukula sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe lukeendo lwenywe tawe: mukhabukula esiimbo, namwe elolooti eye babaandu babesabiilisia namwe siakhulia, namwe chirupia tawe, namwe mulala khwinywe akhasuta kamasiati kabili tawe.
Ne munju yosi yosi niyo mwakaanilwemo menya munju mwenomwo nabwila murura mu lukoba omwo.
Ne osi osi niio bakhamwakaanila tawe, nga murura mu lukoba lwenolwo, yiyeya lutamuusi lwe mu bikele bienywe bube nga buloli bubekiicha nibo.”
Babeeka barekukha mala babira mu birekere bioosi ne belwacha Elomo Endayi ne khuonia babaandu buli abuundu.
Babaandi baloma bali Elicha abonekhe, ne babaandi bali mulala khu bang'oosi be khaale alamuukhe.
Herodi aloma ali, “Ese nasiinja Yoana namurusiakho kumurwe, ne bibiindu nga nibio mbulila bino bili bia naanu?” Mala akhaka kamaani khubona Yesu.
Barumwa bakobola baboolela Yesu niko baba ne bakholile. Nio ababukula mala barekukha bong'ene bacha mu lukoba lulaangwa Betesaita.
Nga babaandu bakali bamanya bamuloondakho abakaanila, alomaloma nabo ke Bubwami bwa Wele, ne khuonia abo babenya khuonisibwa.
Nga enyanga ne yaba ne likho ekwa, babeeka ekhumi na babili becha khu Yesu bamuboolela bali, “Sibula babaandu bache mu birekere ne mu chingo chili siimbi ano, banyoole niio bakona ne khulia; sikila khuli mu sichiimi busa.”
Ne kakhali Yesu ababoolela ali, “Enywe mwabeene baelesie siakhulia.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Se khuli ne sisiindu tawe ne kakhali khuli ne kimikaati kiraano ne ching'eeni chibili, wenya khuche khukule siakhulia sie babaandu bano boosi?”
(Babaandu be siseecha baba embi chielefu chiraano.)
Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Bekhasie aasi mu bipupu bie babaandu embi kamakhumi karaano buli silala.”
Oli babeeka bamalile khukhola bario,
Yesu abukula kimikaati kiraano chana ne ching'eeni chibili, alola mu ngaaki mala apa orio khu Wele. Amesulamo mala aelesia babeeka bewe khukabila bipupu.
Ne boosi balia bekura. Babeeka babuusia bitonyi bibiarama biechula bikono ekhumi na bibili.
Endaalo ndala Yesu nga aba ne alikho asaba yeng'ene, babeeka bewe becha niio ali mala abareeba ali, “Babaandu baloma bali ese ndi naanu?”
Petero akobosia ali, “Ewe oli Kristo owa Wele.”
Nio Yesu abakaania lukali ne khubaa lilaka ali bakhaboolelakho kano omundu yesi yesi tawe,
lundi ababoolela ali, “Khukhwola Omwana wo Mundu achunisibwe mu biindu bikali ne khulobwa ne babemeelesi, basaayi bakhulu, ne baandiki. Akheerwe ne khu ndaalo eya khataru arure mu bafu.”
Sikila yesi yesi owenya khuonia bulamu bwewe alabutibia, ne yesi yesi otibia bulamu bwewe sikila ese, alabuonia.
Namwe omundu alanyoola bukhala siina ne anyoola sibala sioosi mala omwene abune?
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne aambwa chisoni sikila ese ne kamekisio kase, akhaba Omwana wo Mundu akhamukholele niye chisoni nga aliicha mu luyali lwewe ne lwa Paapa ne lwe bamalaika batakatifu.
Ne kakhali ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, baliio balala babemile ano, bakhalifwa ne bakhabona Bubwami bwa Wele tawe.”
Nga ne aaba ne alikho asaba, lukoondo lwewe lwakaluukhana, ne chingubo chewe chaba chiwaanga chwe.
Siise esio babaandu babili balomaloma naye. Baba Musa ne Elicha,
babonekha mu luyali ne balomaloma ne Yesu ke lifwa liewe liliaba siimbi khukhwichusia lilienya lia Wele khulwe khufwiila mu Yerusalemu.
Petero ne babasie baba bakona, ne nga basisimukha babona luyali lwa Yesu ne babaandu babili ba baaba ne bemile naye.
Ne babaandu abo nga baba ne balekhana ne Yesu, Petero aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami, buli bulayi efwe khuba ano! Lekha khwombakhe kamaeema kataru, lilala liliowo, lilala lia Musa ne liliindi lia Elicha.” (Se amanya nisio aba ne alikho aloma tawe.)
Nga aba nasilomaloma ario lileesi liecha liabakhiinga, mala babeeka baria nga bengila mwileesi.
Ne kumumilo kwama mwileesi ne kuloma kuli, “Yuno ali Omwana wase, niye narobora, khe mumurekeeresie!”
Nga kumumilo kwamala khulomaloma, Yesu abonekhana yeng'ene. Mala babeeka basila busa chi, se baboolelakho omundu yesi mu ndaalo echo sisiindu siosi siosi khu niko baba ne baboone tawe.
Khu ndaalo eloondakho Yesu ne babeeka bewe bataru bekha khukhwama khu sikulu, babaandu bakali bamwakaanana.
Omundu mulala khukhwama mu baandu abo aloma ali, “Omwekisia! Khwikoonjelela ololekho omwana wase sikila ali omuteelwa!
Sisieeno simuyulanga mala aayulukha, simusukiasukia mala simumika khukhwola lufuro lurura emunwa mala sichiililila khumupia sibi lundi se simulekhuulanga tawe!
Nikoonjeleele babeeka bowo ndi bamurusiemo sisieeno sino, ne se banyalile khukhola bario tawe.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe muli babaandu be selukho ekhasuubila tawe lundi embi! Ese menye nanywe khukhwola liina? Ese nikhale nanywe buleeyi siina?” Nio aboolela omundu chana ali, “Reera ano omwana wowo.”
Nga omwana chana aaba ne alikho echa niio Yesu ali, sisieeno chana siamupa aasi, mala siamukoka. Yesu ayiibila sisieeno esio mala aonia omwana oyo ne khumwakaanisia raraawe.
Babaandu boosi bauka sikila bunyali bwa Wele.
Ne nga babaandu boosi ne baba ne basiuka buli sisiindu nisio Yesu aba nakholile, Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali,
“Mukhebilila niko nja khumuboolela kano tawe! Sikila Omwana wo Mundu alikho acha khuaanwa mu bunyali bwe babaandu.”
Ne kakhali babeeka se bamanya sifuno sie likhuwa lino tawe. Liaba liakukhuulilwa khukhwama khu nibo nio balekhe khulimanyilisia tawe, mala baria khumureeba sifuno sie likhuwa lino.
Yesu aba amanyile kamebaasio ke kimiooyo kiabwe nio abukula omwana amwimekha alubeka lwewe,
mala ababoolela ali, “Yesi yesi owakaanila omwana yuno mu lisina liase, aba anjakaanile ese, ne yesi yesi ounjakaanila ese aba akaaniile oyo owanduma ese, sikila oyo oli omukeekhe lukali mwinywe mweesi niye ooli omukali khukhila boosi.”
Yoana akobosia ali, “Omwami, khuboone omundu alikho arusia bisieeno mu lisina liowo mala khwamukaania sikila se ali mulala khwifwe tawe.”
Ne kakhali Yesu aloma ali, “Mukhakhakakho khumukaania tawe, sikila yesi yesi okhamwenyela enywe kamabi tawe, aba ali lubeka lwenywe.”
Siise sia Yesu khuyilwa mwikulu ne siembiya, akhalaka khucha e Yerusalemu.
Nio aruma barumwa bewe barangire, bache mala bengila mu sirekere sie Basamaria khumurekekhera buli sisiindu.
Ne kakhali babaandu be bweneyo se bamwakaanila tawe sikila bamanya busa bali aba khu lukeendo lwewe khucha e Yerusalemu.
Nga babeeka bewe Yakobo ne Yoana babona liliene lio, baloma bali, “Omwami wenya khulange kumulilo kwame mwikulu kwiche kubabunie!”
Yesu ekhebukha enyuma mala abarafwira.
Ne niye ne babeeka bewe bachiililila bola mu sirekere sisiindi.
Nga baba khu ngila ne balikho bacha, omundu aboolela Yesu ali, “Ndakhuloondakho buli niio ocha.”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Chinjusi chili ne kamaloo, ne chinyuni chili ne biswi, ne Omwana wo Mundu se ali na osi osi niio ara kumurwe aola tawe.”
Lundi aboolela okundi ali, “Nondekho.” Ne kakhali oyo amukobosia ali, “Omwami, lekha nyoe nje siikhe paapa nio.”
Nio Yesu amukobosia ali, “Lekha bafu basiikhe bafu babwe. Ne ewe khoche wilwache Bubwami bwa Wele.”
Omundu okundi aloma ali, “Omwami ndakhuloondakho, ne kakhali lekha nyoe nje kheesie bengo nio.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, omundu yesi yesi orakikha khulima mala ekhebukhaka enyuma se olaana khukhwingila mu Bwami bwa Wele tawe.

Enyuma wa kano, Omwami Yesu arobora babeeka babaandi kamakhumi saba na babili, abaruma babili babili bache ebweeni wewe mu buli lukoba ne abuundu niio omwene aaba ne enya khucha.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Likesa lili likali ne bakholi bali batiiti. Saba Omwami omwene mukuunda arume bakholi bakali mu likesa liewe.
Khemuche! Bona ndikho muruma enywe nga kamameeme mu bisuuche.
Mukhabukula sibeeti sie chirupia namwe elolooti eye babaandu babesabiilisia namwe biraaro tawe, mukhakheesia omundu yesi yesi khu ngila tawe.
Enju yosi yosi niyo mwingilamo nyoa mulome muli, ‘kumuleembe kube munju muno!’
Ne omundu owasiima kumuleembe aaba namenyile munju omwo, lekha likheesia lienywe lie kumuleembe libe ne naye, ne aaba nakhalimo tawe, lekha kumuleembe okwo kumukobolele enywe.
Menya munju omwo ne mulia ne munywa nibio bamueleesie, sikila omukholi olaana khuebwa kumuruungo kwewe. Mukhayiiyayiiya khukhwama munju omwo khucha mu kiindi tawe.
Buli lwosi ne mwingila mu lukoba mala bamwakaanile, lia siosi siosi nisio bamuelesie.
Khemuonie balwale be mu lukoba olwo mala muboolele babaandu bamwo muli, ‘Bubwami bwa Wele bwechile siimbi nanywe.’
Ne kakhali ne mwingila mu lukoba nilwo bakhamwakaanila tawe, ruramo mwime khu ngila mala mulome muli,
‘Akhaba lutamuusi lwe lukoba lwenywe lulwiambile khu bikele biefwe, khulweya lube nga buloli bumwikiicha enywe. Ne khebulila muli Bubwami bwa Wele bwechile siimbi nanywe!’
Ese muandalasilia ndi endaalo eye likhalaka, Wele akhekesie siisa sikali khu Sodomu khukhila lukoba olwo!
Wele akhekesie siisa sikali khu Tiro ne Sidoni khu Ndaalo eye likhalaka khukhila khwinywe.
Ne enywe Kaperinaumu! Mwenya khukhweniinia mwole mwikulu? Mulamwaatwa e makoombe.”
Baloondi kamakhumi saba na babili abo bakobola ne bekhoya mala baloma bali, “Omwami akhaba bisieeno bikhuriire efwe nga khurumbure lisina liowo!”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Mboone Sietani nakwa nga lueni ne lwama mwikulu.
Rekeeresia, namueleesie enywe bunyali khuswala khu ndemu ne khu walute, ne bunyali khu maani ko musiku ne se siliio silimuumisia enywe tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario mukhekhoya sikila bisieeno bimuria tawe ne kakhali mwekhoye sikila kamasina kenywe kaandikwa mwikulu.”
Mu siise esio sisiene Yesu ekhoya mu Roho Omutakatifu, mala aaloma ali, “Ese siima Omwami owe likulu ne liloba, sikila akukhuulila bibiindu bino khu bakesi ne be limanya mala abifunulila bali nga babaana mu limanya. Paapa, sikila wenya kabe kario.
Mala Yesu akobola khu beeka bewe ababoolela mu bwikisi ali, “Bali nekhabi babona nibio enywe mubona bino!
Sikila muboolela enywe ndi, bang'oosi bakali ne babaami bekoomba khubona nibio enywe mubona bino mala se babibona tawe, ne khuulila niko enywe muulila kano mala se bakaulilakho tawe.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Lilaka liloma lili siina?”
Ne kakhali omwekisia owe Lilaka oyo enya khukhweyekesia ali niye omulayi, nio areeba Yesu ali, “Owasiase niye naanu?”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Omundu aba ama Yerusalemu, ekha acha e Yeriko, banuuli bamwibwaakala bamufuula chingubo, bamupa mala bamulekha aochaocha.
Omusaayi yesi aba alikho achila khu ngila okhwo, nga abona omundu oyo atalanda.
Akhaba omulawi owaba yesi nabira nga amubona, atalanda.
Ne kakhali Omusamaria nga ne aba khu lukeendo lwewe, ola niio omundu chana aba, nga amubona, aamukholela siisa.
Aachao amulola, aachukha kamafura ne ndali mu makoonjo ne chimbala chewe aamusilikha, mala amwikhasia khu punda yewe omwene ne khumuila munju ndala eye bakeni, ne khumuliinda.
Ne endaalo eyaloondakho, abukula chidinari chibili aelesia omuliindi wenju chana eye bakeni, aloma ali, ‘Nindile omundu wase yuno, ne siosi siosi sikane sitasikhekho mu khurumikhira, nga khakobole khakhuruunge!’ ”
Nio Yesu areeba ali, “Khu bataru bano, naanu niye ewe wibaasia oli ekesia khuba owasie khu mundu owakwa mu banuuli?”
Omwekisia owe Lilaka amukobosia ali, “Oyo owamukholela siisa.” Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nono cha, mala wesi okhole orio.”
Marita aba ne wandaaye owalaangwa Maria, owekhala mu bikele bio Mwami narekeeresia liliekisia liewe.
Ne kakhali Marita akhalala khulwe bukali bwe kimilimo nikio aba nakhola, mala acha niio Yesu aba amureeba ali, “Omwami, se obonakho ne buli busiro khwise nga omwana wefwe ne andekhele ese khukhalabana seng'ene tawe? Muboolele anjeete!”
Nio Omwami amukobosia ali, “Marita, Marita, ewe weembeleele ne khunanisibwa khu biindu bikali po,
ne kakhali sisienyekha sili silala siong'ene. Maria aroboore sisiindu silayi, nisio akhalinuulwa tawe.”

Endaalo ndala Yesu aaba abuundu asaba. Ne nga amala, mulala khu beeka bewe amuboolela ali, “Omwami khwikisie khusaba nga Yoana ne ekisia babeeka bewe.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ne musaba saba muli:
‘Paapa, Lisina liowo lifumisibwe,
Bubwami bwowo bwiche.
Khuelesie busiele siakhulia siefwe sia buli ndaalo.
Khubeele bubwoni bwefwe,
sikila efwe khubeelanga boosi bakhukholela efwe kamabi,
ne okhakhuyila mu makhako tawe!’ ”
Nio lundi Yesu ababoolela ali, “Naanu khwinywe onyala aacha wo musaale wewe mu silo akari mala amusabe ali musaale, njekopiekho kimikaati kitaru
sikila omusaale wase ali khu lukeendo mala andundubiikhe, ne ese se ndi ne siakhulia nisio muelesia tawe!
Nio we munju amukobosia ali, ‘Okhanaania tawe, nekaaleyo kumuliango, ne ese ne babaana base khwakonile. Se nyala nenyokha nakhuelesia sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.’
Muboolela ndi, akhaba omusaale wewe ne alalekha khwinyokha sikila busaale, alenyokha amuelesie nisio enya sikila alikho abelelela khusaba.
“Nio muboolela enywe ndi, saba ne mulaebwa, yiima ne mulanyoola, khong'oonda mulekulilwa.
Sikila buli osaba aebwa, ne oyo oyiima anyoola, ne oyo okhong'oonda alekulilwa.
Paapa siina mwinywe niye omwana wewe asaba eng'eeni, ne naye mu bweyaangu bwe ng'eeni amuelesia endemu?
Namwe namusaba liki amuelesia walute?
Nono enywe muuli babi muri, mumanyile khuelesia babaana benywe biianwa bilayi, aba Paapa owe mwikulu salaana Roho Omutakatifu khwaabo bamusaba!”
Yesu aba alikho arusia mu mundu sisieeno sisiamuandia lulimi, nga ne siarura, arakikha khulomaloma, mala babaandu bauka lukali.
Ne kakhali balala baloma bali, “Arusia bisieeno mu bunyali bwa Beelisebuli omukhulu owe bisieeno.”
Ne babaandu babaandi benya khureka Yesu, khwako bamureeba akhole simanyisio sisiekesia sili Wele ali naye.
Yesu amanya kamebaasio kaabwe, mala ababoolela ali, “Buli bubwami bukabukhanamo bubwene khu bwene bukwa, ne nju eyakabukhanamo se yimaanga tawe.
Khwako bubwami bwa Sietani ne bukabukhanamo bipupu mala biapana bibieene khu bieene, bubwami bwewe obwo bunyala bwayiindila ku? Enywe muloma muli ese ndusia bisieeno sikila Beelisebuli amba bunyali khukhola ndio.
Ne ese naaba nendusia bisieeno mu bunyali bwa Beelisebuli aba babaandu benywe barusibwanga bisieeno mu bunyali bwa naanu? Khwako babaandu benywe bekesia bali se muli ng'ali tawe.
Ne naaba nendusia bisieeno mu bunyali bwa Wele, aba Bubwami bwa Wele bwechile khale mwinywe.
“Omundu owe kamaani ne aliinda lukoba lwewe, kimiaandu kiewe kiba bulayi busa;
Omundu we kamaani khu mukhila namwibwaakala mala amunuula bulwaani bwewe bwoosi nibwo eyikina, amuula mala akabana ne babaandi nibio anuulile mu lukoba olwo.
Yesi yesi okhali lubeka lwase tawe, aba anjenyela kamabi ne yesi yesi okhabuusia nase tawe aba akhasalanisia.
“Sisieeno ne sirura mu mundu, siyiiyayiiya mu siangalaamwe ne siyiima niio siolela; ne sikhanyoola abuundu osi osi tawe, siloma sili, ‘Ndakobola munju yase niyo namamo.’
Nga siolamo sinyoola enju chana yeyilwe ne khung'oonwa bulayi.
Nio sisieeno chana sicha mala sireera bisieeno bibiindi saba biibi lukali khusikhila nisio, mala singila ne khumenya mu mundu oyo. Khwako omundu oyo aba bubi lukali khukhilakho nga aba mataayi.”
Nga Yesu ne aboola kano, omukhasi mulala mu baandu aloma ali, “Omukhasi wakhusaala ne khu khukhusia ewe ali ne khabi.”
Ne kakhali Yesu aakobosia ali, “Bali ne khabi abo baulila elomo eya Wele ne khukitiila!”
Bulayi bwene nga omung'oosi Yona aaba simanyisio khu baandu ba Ninefe akhaba Omwana wo Mundu aliba ario khu selukho yino.
Endaalo eye likhalaka Kwini owa Sheba akheeche akhalakile babaandu be selukho yino, sikila ama aleeyi khukhwicha khuulila liliekisia lilayi lia Solomoni, ne lola sisiindu siboofu khukhila Solomoni sili ano.
Khu Ndaalo eye Likhalaka babaandu ba Ninefe bakheeme alala ne selukho yino mala bakikhalakile sikila nibo nga baulila kamelwacho ka Yona bekanila, ne ese mu suubisia enywe ndi, sisiindu siboofu khukhila Yona nisiesi ano!
Emoni yowo eli etaa eye kumubili kwowo, emoni yowo neli enamu, kumubili kwowo kwoosi kuba buwaanga, ne emoni yowo yaaba ne bofuule, kumubili kwowo kwoosi kuba mu siilima.
Khwako ba meso, buwaanga bukhulimo bukhaba sisiilima tawe.
Kumubili kwowo kwaaba ne kuli mu buwaanga, ne se kuli ne lubeka luuli mu siilima tawe, kwoosi kulakhosia nga etaa ne mukhoselianga enywe buwaanga bwayo.”
Nga Yesu amala khulomaloma kano, Omufarisayo mulala amuboolela bache banyoole siakhulia munju mwewe, nio acha mala aalia naye.
Omufarisayo auka nga abona Yesu nalia nakhasaaba tawe.
Ne Omwami amuboolela ali, “Enywe Bafarisayo mu siinganga sikoombe ne saani yenywe khu ngaaki, ne mukari mwenywe mwechulamo bunuuli ne bubi.
Basilu enywe! Wele owang'oona enje se ali niye owang'oona ne mukari tawe ku?
Ne kakhali yeeta bataambi bibiindu bie mu sikoombe ne chisaani chenywe nio buli sisiindu sibe sikwalaafu khwinywe.
“Sili silaamo khwinywe Bafarisayo! Sikila mwasiima chindebe che bweeni mu sinakooki ne khukhesibwa ne liria khu soko.
Sili silaamo khwinywe! Sikila muli nga biliindwa bikhabonekha tawe, nibio baandu bakeendakho ne se bamanya bali biliindwa nibio tawe.”
Mulala khu baandiki amuboolela ali, “Omwekisia nga noloma ori aba olikho khubiiya akhaba efwe fwesi!”
Ne kakhali Yesu amukobosia ali, “Sili silaamo akhaba khwinywe baandiki! Sikila mutiuukha babaandu bisutwa bisiro bikhasutikha tawe, ne enywe mwabene se mubitiilakho akhaba ne lulwala lulala tawe.
Sili silaamo khwinywe! Sikila mung'oona biliindwa bie bang'oosi nibo bakuuka benywe beera.
Nono, enywe mwabene muli baloli mala mufukiilila niko bakuuka benywe bakhola, sikila nibo beera bang'oosi abo ne enywe nanywe mung'oona biliindwa biabwe.
Sikila kano, Limanya lia Wele lialoma lili, ‘Ndi barumira bang'oosi ne barumwa, baliira balala khu nibo ne khukhupia siibi babaandi.’
Khwako eselukho yino elireebwa kamafuki ke bang'oosi boosi baberwa khukhwama sibala ne sirakikha
khukhwamila khu mafuki ka Abili khukhwola khu mafuki ka Sakaria niye bereera akari wa alutare ne Abuundu Atakatifu. Yee, ese muboolela enywe ndi eselukho yino elibaanjwa sifuki esio sioosi.
“Sili silaamo khwinywe baandiki! Sikila enywe mubukula lufunguo lwenju eye bukesi ne enywe mwabene se mwingilamo tawe, lundi mukhiingilila abo bakhaka khukhwingilamo!”
Nga Yesu ne aama abuundu ao baandiki ne Bafarisayo bakhaka khumueakasiakho ne khumureeba kamareeba kamakali,
bakhaka khumwekhakasia bamunyoolekho kamabi khukhwama mu niko aloma.

Se siliio sisiakisibwa sililekha khubonekha tawe, namwe sisiakukhuulilwa sikhalimanyikha tawe.
Khwako siosi siosi nisio mwaloma mu siilima sikhaulilikhile mu buwaanga ne nisio mwemoonyela mu lusiro sililomekhela khunju khungaaki.
“Ese muboolela enywe basaale base, mukharia abo babeera kumubili ne enyuma wako se banyala khukhola sisiindu situumao tawe.
Ne kakhali ndamuboolela niye mukhoyela khuria. Khemurie Wele onyala khwira kumubili mala enyuma wako akumwaate mumulilo. Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, ria omwenoyo!
“Opiicho biraano se bikulikhanga chisilingi chibili tawe ku? Mala Wele se ebililanga akhaba khalala khu nibio tawe.
Ng'ali, akhaba lichuune lienywe liosi liabalwa. Mukharia tawe; enywe muli be bukhala bukali khukhila opiicho bikali!
“Ne muboolela enywe ndi, buli mulala ounjiyama ebweeni we babaandu akhaba Omwana wo Mundu yesi akhamweyame ebweeni we bamalaika ba Wele.
Ne oyo ounjekaana ese ebweeni we babaandu, sesi khamwekaane ebweeni we bamalaika ba Wele.
Sikila Roho Omutakatifu alimwekisia niko mukhoyeele khuloma siise esio.”
Omundu mulala mu baandu bakali amuboolela ali, “Omwekisia, boolela wandaayase khukabane kimiaandu nikio paapa akhulekhela.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ewe munduwe, naanu owakhola ese khuba omukhalaki namwe omukabania enywe kimiaandu?”
Mala ababoolela ali, “Ba meso mala mweliinde khu bulianga bwe chingano choosi sikila bulamu bwo mundu se bukholwa khukhwama mu bukali bwe kimiaandu nikio ali nakio tawe.”
Nio Yesu ababoolela lukano ali, “Abao omuiinda mulala owaba ne kumukuunda kukwamuelesia likesa likali po,
mala ebaasia ali, ‘Khole siina, sikila se ndi ne niio mbunga likesa liase tawe?’
Mala aloma ali, ‘Ndasambula bibiaki biase mala khupe bibiindi bibalaayi nio mbungemo likesa ne bibiindu biase bioosi.
Mala mboolele kumwoyo kwase ndi, luno oli ne libiikhilo lie bibiindu bikali khulwe kimiiko kimikali, yesangaasia, lia, onywe wekhoye!’
Ne kakhali Wele amuboolela ali, ‘Musilu ewe! Siilo sino kumwoyo kwowo kulabukulwa, ne bibiindu nibio wabiikha mwibiikhilo bilaba bia naanu?’
Khwako yuno ali nga omundu wibikhilanga libiikhilo omwene, ne se ali omuiinda mu moni cha Wele tawe.”
Nio aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Khwako muboolela enywe ndi mukheendekhelela mu limenya lienywe nisio mulalia ne khufwara tawe.
Bulamu bukhila siakhulia, ne kumubili kukhila chingubo.
Yibaasia nga khooro kili, se kimiichanga namwe se kikesaanga tawe, se kili ne bibiaki nibio kibungamo tawe, ne kakhali Wele akiliisianga. Ne enywe muli be bukhala bukali khukhila chinyuni!
Ne naanu khwinywe oonyala aleeyiakho bulamu bwewe?
Waaba nono nokhanyala khukhola sisiindu sitiiti nga esio tawe, siina sikila ne weendekhelela ke bibiindu bibiindi?
Yibaasia bimuli bie mundaa nga bichoanga, se bikholanga kimilimo namwe se bienabilanga chingubo tawe. Ne kakhali muboolela enywe ndi, akhaba omwami Solomoni mu buiinda bwewe bwoosi, se efwara chingubo lukoondo lulayi nga simuli silala khu bino tawe.
Baandu be lisuubila litiiti enywe, kaaba bali Wele afwaraanga bimuli bie mundaa ario, bibao luno ne muchulu bimwaatwa mu mulilo, aba se anyala amuliinda enywe lukali khukhila bimuli tawe ku?
“Khwako mukhayiima nisio mulalia nende nisio mulanywa tawe, namwe mukhaayaaya tawe.
(Sikila Chikholo choosi che khu sibala sino chiyiimanga bibiindu bino;) ne Raraawenywe amanyile ali mwenyekhana mube nabio.
Ne kakhali, yiima Bubwami bwewe, ne bibiindu bino bioosi bilaba bibienywe.
“Enywe muuli batiiti, mukharia tawe, sikila buli busangaafu bwa Raraawenywe khu muelesia enywe Bubwami.
Khemukusie bibiindu nibio muli nabio, mala muelesie bataambi chirupia. Khemube ne chilolooti chikhakofula tawe, ne libiikhilo mwikulu likhawa tawe, niio omwifwi akhoola namwe kamasilili kaalia tawe.
Sikila niio libiikhilo liowo lili, abwenao niio kumwoyo kwowo kuli.
khemube nga bakholi baliindiliile omukhongo owabaandika ne echa engo khukhwama mu naikara eye siselelo, nio nga eecha akhong'oonde bamwikulileo khangu.
Bali ne khabi bakholi nibo omukhongo nga alikobola, anyoole ne bali meso! Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, alieboa kumusiipi abekhasie khusialwa mala abaelesie siakhulia.
Ne aliicha mu silo akari namwe mu makhelebeende, mala abanyoole ne bali meeso bario aba bakholi abo bali ne khabi!
Ne kakhali manya muli, omwene nju ne amanya esaa niyo omwifwi eechelakho, andi se aalekha enju yewe yafunakwa tawe.
Khukhwola enywe mwesi mwirekekhe, sikila Omwana owo Mundu alikho eecha esaa niyo mukhamwirekekhele tawe.”
Petero aloma ali, “Omwami olakhuboolelanga efwe lukano luno namwe khu baandu boosi?”
Ne Omwami akobosia ali, “Nono naanu oli omukholi omusuubilwa lundi omukesi, niye omukhongo wewe alira khu bwimeelesi bwenju yewe khukabila bakholi basie sikelo sie siakhulia khu siise sisienyibwa?
Ali ne khabi omukholi niye omukhongo wewe alikobola anyoole nakholanga ario.
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi alimura mu bwimeelesi bwe kimiaandu kiewe kioosi.
Ne omukholi oyo aaba ne ebaasia ali, ‘Omukhongo wase se alakobola khangu tawe,’ mala arakikhe khukhupa bakholi be siseecha nende be siikhasi, ne khulia ne khunywa ne ameela.
Omukhongo owo mukholi oyo alikobola khu ndaalo niyo akhamwirekekhele tawe, ne esaa niyo akhamanyile tawe. Alimurusia enje amuelesia siiukuumo ne khumura alala nende bakhali basuubilwa tawe.
“Ne omukholi owamanya lilienya lio mukhoongo wewe mala khwirekekha namwe khukhola nga lilienya lio mukhoongo ne lili tawe, alinyoola bukhupe bukali.
Ne kakhali omukholi okhamanyile lilienya lio mukhoongo wewe, ne akhola kakholaana tawe, alinyoola bukhupe butiiti. Buli mulala owaebwa bikali alienyekha khurusia bikali, ne niye babaandu baelesia bikali, balimwenyakho bikali.
“Necha khubwana kumulilo khu sibala mala andi kwaburuukhe khale!
Ndi ne libatiisia nilio khoyeele nyoole mala ndi ne liliendekhelela likali khukhwola nga likholekha.
Enywe mwibaasia muli necha khureera kumuleembe khu sibala? Ese muboolela enywe ndi, se kali kario tawe, ne kakhali necha khureera bubwaukhani mu baandu.
Khukhwama luno enju ndala elimo babaandu baraano balaukhana, bataru balabiila babili ne babili balibiila bataru.
Paapa akhabiile omwana wewe omusoleeli, ne omwana omusoleeli akhabiile raraawe, maayi akhabiile omwana wewe omukhaana, ne omukhaana akhabiile maawe, ne masalaawe owe siikhasi akhabiile mukho musaani, ne mukho musaani akhabiile masalaawe.”
Yesu aboolela babaandu ali, “Ne mubona lifuumbi lisiuukha mumbo, muloma muli efula eli siimbi mala kakholekhanga kario.
Ne mubona ekhuungu eye bunafubo ne ucha muboola muli, ‘Kumuumu kumurafu kulabao,’ mala kakholekhanga kario.
Babacha enywe! Siina ne mu manya lifwaana lie sibala ne likulu, ne se mumanyile nga mumanyilisia siise sia luno sino tawe?
“Ne siina sikila mwabeene ne mukhekhalakila niko mukhoya mukhole?
Ne olikho ocha nende niye mulomana naye ebweeni wo mukhalaki, khola kamaani ouliilisiane naye ne mu siili khu ngila, akhakhola ario akhwosia khu mukhalaki mala omukhalaki naye akhura mu makhono ko mukhulu owe siboe ne omukhulu owe siboe oyo naye akhumwaate mu siboe tawe.
Khuboolela ndi se olirura mu siboe omwo tawe, nabwila nga noruunga esilingi emaliilisi.”

Siise esio babaandu balala baboolela Yesu ke Bakalilaya nibo Pilato eera atubasia kamafuki kabwe ne chimbosio chabwe.
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe mwibaasia muli Bakalilaya bano baba babooni lukali khukhila Bakalilaya babaandi boosi, sikila ne banyaasibwa bario?
Muboolela ndi se kali kario tawe; ne mukhekanila bubwoni bwenywe tawe, mwesi mulabuna nga nibo.
Namwe ekhumi na munaane nibo lisiisi lie khulindilakho mu Siloamu liakwakho liera abo, enywe mwibaasia muli baba babooni lukali khukhila babaandi boosi bamenyile mu Yerusalemu?
Muboolela ndi se kali kario tawe, ne mukhekanila bubwoni bwenywe, mwesi mulabuna nga nibo.”
Nio Yesu ababoolela lukano luno ali, “Omundu aabiaala kumutuli mu mukuunda kwewe; acha khubutakho chinduli mala khunyoolakho tawe.
Nio aboolela omulimi wewe ali, ‘Khu miiko kitaru nichaanga ndi mbutekho chinduli ne kakhali se njinyoolangakho tawe. Khwako khokureme kurureo, siina sikila kwonake busa kamaloba?’
Ne kakhali omulimi amukobosia ali, ‘Omwami, lekha kube khulwe kumwiiko kuno kwong'ene, ndakwakila mala ndemo esiina.
Ne kwaaba ne kukhaame chinduli kumwiiko kukwiicha, bulayi, ne kwaaba ne kukhaama tawe, aba nono onyala wakurema.’ ”
Yesu aba alikho ekisia mu sinakooki mu ndaalo eye Sabato.
Omukhasi owaba ne sisieeno sisiamukhola efumba kumukoongo, abeele se anyala akololokha tawe.
Ne nga Yesu ne amubona, amulaanga mala amuboolela ali, “Mukhasiwe, oli omulekhuule khukhwama mu bulwaale bwowo.”
Yesu amurakho kamakhono aona ne khukololokha khangu, mala omukhasi yuno afumia Wele.
Omwimeelesi owe sinakooki akhalala sikila Yesu aonisie omundu khu ndaalo eya Sabato, nio aboolela babaandu ali, “Chiliio chindaalo sita, che khukhola kimilimo, yiicha mu ndaalo ng'ene echo mala muonisibwe, ne mukhecha mu Sabato tawe!”
Nio Omwami amukobosia ali, “Babacha enywe! Buli mulala khwinywe, se akangululanga ekhaafu namwe epunda yewe acha khunywesia khu ndaalo eya Sabato tawe ku?
Oyuno ali owe lisaaye lia Aburahamu niye Sietani ara mu siboe khu miiko ekhumi na munaane, se akhoyeele alekhuulwa khu ndaalo eya Sabato tawe ku?”
Likobosia liewe lino liaambia basiku bewe chisoni, ne babaandu boosi bekhoya khulwe bibiindu bioosi bie liukia nibio aaba ne akholile.
Yesu areeba ali, “Bubwami bwa Wele buli nga siina? Nyala nabufwaananisia khu siina?
Buli nga khamiicho khe kumupeeli nikho omundu abukula mala amiicha mu siluundu siewe, ne khamela, khachoanga kuba kumurongooro mala chinyuni chombakhamo biswi mu sakia chakwo.”
Lundi Yesu aboola ali, “Nyala nafwaananisia Bubwami bwa Wele khu siina?
Buli nga kamamela niko omukhasi aabukula mala aakapaakhila mu bipaange bitaru bie bufu nabwila bufu bwoosi bwayiimba.”
Yesu achiililila ne lukeendo lwewe lwe khucha Yerusalemu, mala ekisia nabirira mu ngoba ne mu birekere.
Ne omundu okundi amureeba ali, “Omwami, babaandu baliiona baliba busa bakeekhe bari?”
Yesu akobosia ali,
Khuboolela ndi, “Khola kamaani wingilile mu muliango kumunyiki sikila babaandu bakali balikhaka khukhwingila ne se balinyala tawe.
“Omwenenju ne enyokha mala ekalao, mukharakikhe khukhwima enje ne khukhong'oonda khu lwiki ne muloma muli, ‘Omwami khwikulileo.’ Ne alimukobosia ali, ‘Se manya niio mwama tawe.’
Ne nanywe mulirakikha khu muboolela muli, ‘Khwalia ne khunywa nawe, lundi wekisia mu lukoba lwefwe.’
Ne alikobosia ali, ‘Ese muboolela enywe ndi se manya niio mwama tawe, ndureo mweesi mukholanga kamamayaanu!’
Ne baandu baliama ebukwe ne mumbo lundi baliaama ebunaswa ne siafubo mala balikhala khu sialwa mu Bwami bwa Wele.
Be khunyoa baliba bamaliilisi, ne bamaliilisi baliba be khunyoa.”
Siise esio ne sisiene Bafarisayo balala becha khu Yesu bamuboolela bali, “Rura ano oche abuundu aandi, sikila Herodi eenya khukhwira.”
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Cha muboolele enjusi eyo muli, ‘Luno ne kumuchuli ndarusia bisieeno ne khuonia balwale, ne endaalo eya khataru aba namalile kimilimo.’
Ne kakhaba kario khukhwola nje lukeendo lwase endaalo eya luno ne kumuchuli ne busiayo; sikila se buli bulayi omung'oosi khufwila enje wa Yerusalemu tawe.
“Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu! Wira bang'oosi ne khukhupa kamabaale barumwa nibo Wele arumire khwiwe! Nenyile Khukhwola khenga khubuusia babaana bowo alala nga engokho ebuusianga binywinywi biayo mundaa chayo mala se wenyanga tawe!
Lukaangu lwenywe lwanjuukhwe. Mala muboolela enywe ndi se mulambonakho lundi tawe khukhwola nga muliloma muli, ‘Ali ne ekhabi oyo owichila mu lisina lio Mwami!’ ”

Khu Sabato ndala Yesu nga acha khulia munju eyo mukhoongo mulala khu Bafarisayo, babaandu bamuloleelesia lukali.
Ne omundu owaba ne bulwaale bwe biliinda echa niio Yesu ali.
Yesu areeba baandiki ne Bafarisayo ali, “Lilaka likhufukiliila khuonia mu Sabato namwe tawe?”
Basila busa. Nio Yesu aonia omundu oyo mala amulekha acha.
Nio abareeba ali, “Naanu khwinywe okhanyala arusia ekhaafu namwe omwana ne akwiile mwiloo khu ndaalo eye Sabato? Se akhweesa arusiamo?”
Lino liabakhaya khumukobosia.
Yesu nga ne abona bakeni balangiilwe ne barobora chindebe che abuundu e lukoosi, ababoolela lukano ali,
“Omundu nakhulangile mu naikara eye siselelo, okhekhala abuundu e lukoosi tawe. Akhola ario khane alangile omundu omukhongo khu khukhila ewe,
ne omulangile mwembi echa mala akhuboolela ewe ali, ‘Yinyokhela omwami yuno khu ndebe ng'eneyo.’ Ne abwenao olaambwa chisoni mala olekhala abuundu akhali e lukoosi tawe.
Ne kakhali nolangilwe, cha mala wikhale abuundu akhali we lukoosi tawe, nio okhulangile oli echa akhuboolele ali, ‘Musaale wase yiicha wikhale abuundu alayi ano.’ Lino lilakhureerera lukoosi ebweeni we bakeni boosi babekhaale khusialwa ne nawe.
Sikila buli mundu oweniinia alaboombisibwa, ne owe boombia alaniinisibwa.”
Nio Yesu aboolela omulangile khu siakhulia ali, “Noana siakhulia sie mwiangilwe, namwe sie ekolooba, okhalanga basaale bowo namwe bawandaayo, namwe balebe, namwe baiinda bamenyile nawe bong'ene tawe, sikila bakhola bario bosi bakhulanga mu ngila eye khu khuruunga niko wabakholela,
lundi ne oli ne naikara, laanga bataambi, babafwokoya, baleme ne babofu,
mala olabiitwa chikhabi sikila se banyala khu khuruunga tawe. Wele alikhuruunga ewe mu ndaalo niyo babaandu baluungi balinyokhela mu bafu.”
Nga mulala khwaabo ba baaba ne be khaale khu mesa aulila kano, aboolela Yesu ali, “Bali ne khabi abo balilia naikara mu Bwami bwa Wele!”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Abao omundu owakhola naikara emboofu, mala alaanga babaandu bakali.
Nga siise sia naikara ne siola aruma omukholi wewe khuboolela bakeni bewe ali, ‘Khemwiche, buli siindu siarekekhwe!’
Ne kakhali boosi barakikha khurusia bifuno bikila balekhe khucha, owe khunyoa aboolela omukholi ali, ‘Nakulile kumukuunda, ne khukhwola nje ngubone, nosiima umbeele.’
Ne okundi aboola ali, ‘Nakulile chieeyi ekhumi mala ndikho nja khu chikhaka ne chikhwesa, nosiima umbeele.’
Ne okundi aloma ali, ‘Ndi no mwea, khwako se nyala necha tawe.’
“Nio omukholi akobola engo mala aboolela omukhongo wewe bibiindu bino bioosi. Khwako omwene enju aambwa lirima mala aboolela omukholi wewe ali, ‘Cha khangu khu muyila, ne mu chingila che lukoba, mala mureere bataambi, babafwokoya, babofu ne baleme.’
Ne omukholi akobola khangu busa aboolela omukhongo wewe ali, ‘Omwami, niko olakiliisie kakholekhe, mala bubwangu busiilimo.’
Nio omwenenju aboolela omukholi oyo ali, ‘Cha khu miyila kimiboofu ne khu ngila chindiiti, mala oboolele babaandu mu ngila endayi beche nio enju yase yichule.
Khuboolela ewe bung'ali ndi, se aliio na mulala khu baandu babalaangwa olichanjamakho siakhulia siase tawe!’ ”
Siise esio babaandu bakali baba balikho bacha ne Yesu, mala Yesu ekhebukha ababoolela ali,
“Oyo owicha khwise, se anyala khuba omweeka wase ne akhasiimile ese lukali khukhila raraawe, maawe, omukhasi ne babaana, bawandaaye namwe omwene tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi okhasuta kumusalaba kwewe mala anondakho se anyala aba omweeka wase tawe.
“Naanu khwinywe owekoomba khukhwombakha endeleelwa, ookhanyoa ekhala aasi mala abala bukusi bwe khukhwombakha amanya ne ali ne kimiaandu kinyala khumala kimilimo namwe tawe?
Ne kakhali kario tawe, aba oli ombakha kumusiingi mala akhilwa khumala, mala boosi balasibona balarakikha khumuchekheelela ne khuloma bali,
‘Omundu yuno arakikha khukhwombakha mala se aba ne kamaani ke khumala tawe!’
“Namwe mwami siina ooli ne basikaari chielefu ekhumi ocha khupana no okundi owe basikaari chielefu kamakhumi kabili ne akherekekhere tawe?
Ne kalekha khuba kario tawe enyoela aruma barume bewe bacha basaba kumuleembe omwami okundi oyo nasiili sinao.
Khwako, omundu yesi yesi ne akhalekhile bioosi nibio ali nabio, se anyala aba omweeka wase tawe.
“Kumuunyu kumukhelekha kuli kumulayi, ne kwaaba ne kuwelemo bululu engila se eliio eye khukukhola kululue lundi tawe.
Se kuli kumulayi khu liloba namwe khukholwa esiina tawe; khwako babaandu bakufumula eyo. Noyo oli ne kamaru lekha aulile.”

Bafarisayo ne baandiki beng'ulung'unya ne baloma bali, “Omundu yuno akaanilanga babooni ne khulia nabo!”
Nio Yesu ababoolela lukano luno:
“Mundu siina khwinywe onyala aba ne kamakheese emia ndala, ne aaba natibia lilala khu niko, salekha kamakheese kamakhumi tisa na tisa mu sichiimi mala acha ayiima litibile khukhwola nga alinyoola tawe ku?
Ne alinyoolile alira khu mabeka ne ekhoya.
Ne oli ola engo, alaanga alala basaale bewe ne bamenyile siimbi nababoolela ali, ‘Khemwikhoye alala ne nase sikila nanyoolile likheese liase libeele litibile.’
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi kaliba busa kario, liliekhoya likali liliba mwikulu khulwo mwoni mulala owikanila, khukhila babaandu kamakhumi tisa na tisa babebukula khuba baluungi bakhenya khukhwikanila tawe.
“Namwe mukhasi siina ooli ne chisilingi ekhumi mala atibiakho ndala, se aambia etaa mala eeya munju mwoosi, ayiima ne kamaani khukhwola nga nakinyoola tawe ku?
Nga nakinyoola alaanga alala basaale bewe nende bamenyile siimbi naboola ali, ‘Khemwikhoye alala ne nase, sikila nanyoolile esilingi yase abeele etibile.’
Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi kaliba busa kario, liliekhoya liliba ebweeni we ba malaika ba Wele khulwo mwoni mulala owekanila.”
Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Abao omundu owaba ne babaana bewe be sisoleeli babili,
omutiiti aboolela raraawe ali, ‘Paapa kheumbelesie sitonyi siase sie kimiaandu.’ Omundu oyo akaba babaana bewe babili abo kimiaandu.
Enyuma we chindaalo ndiiti, omutiiti oyo abukula kimiaandu kiewe mala auyila mu sibala sie aleeyi, mala ebweeneyo asasia kimiaandu mu limenya lie sifwaabi.
Enyuma we khusasia buli siindu, enjala engali lukali yakwa mu sibala esio. Enjala yarakikha khu mulia ne se aba na siindu tawe.
Nio acha aandikwa khukholela omundu mulala owe sibala esio. Omundu oyo amuila mu mukuunda aliisienge chingurwe.
Omwana oyo ekoomba khulia kamoola niko chingurwe chalichanga, omundu onyala abeele amuelesiakho siakhulia siosi siosi se abao tawe.
Ekhumaliilikha kamakesi kamwichamo mala aloma ali, ‘Bakholi ba Paapa nibo aandika balia ne birama, ne ese ano enjala yinjira!
Ndenyokha, mala nje khu Paapa, ne ndamuboolela ndi: Paapa, nakholile bubwoni khu Wele nende khwiwe.
Se nolaana lundi khulaangwa omwana wowo tawe, khole khuuba nga mulala khu bakholi bowo.’ ”
Eenyokha, aarakikha lukeendo lwe khukobola engo. Ne nga aaba ne asiili sinao, raraawe aamubona mala aamukholela siisa, aatima aacha aamwikhoyela ne khumwekwayila.
“Omwana oyo aboolela raraawe ali, ‘Paapa, nakholile bubwoni khu Wele nende khwiwe, se nolaana lundi khulaangwa omwana wowo tawe.’
Ne kakhali raraawe aboolela bakholi bewe ali, ‘Reera khangu engubo endayi mala mu mufware, mure embete khu lwala lwewe mala mu mufware biraaro.
Khemuche mureere euunwa enefu mwire, mala khube ne naikara!
Sikila omwana wase yuno aba afwa mala luno omulamu; aba aatiba, ne luno anyoolekhe.’ Nio barakikha enaikara ne khukhwekhoya.
“Siise esio omusoleeli omukhulu aba achile e mukuunda ne nga aba ne alikho echa embiie engo, aulila kamatuungu kaapa ne bukhino.
Nio alaanga omukholi mulala amureeba ali, ‘Siina sisikholeekhe?’
Omukholi amukobosia ali, ‘Wandaayo echile mala raraao amwiriire euunwa enefu sikila akoboole ne ali omulamu.’
“Omusoleeli omukhulu chana akhalala lukali, mala aloba khukhwingila munju. Nio raraawe arura enje mala amwikoonjelela engile munju.
Ne kakhali naye akobosia raraawe ali, ‘Lola kimiiko kino kioosi nakhukholeele nga omukholi, ne se nalekhakho khuria lilaka liowo tawe, ne kakhaba kario ewe okhambakho khameeme khong'ene nalia nasangaala ne basaale base tawe!
Ne omwana wowo yuno, owasasia kimiaandu kiowo ne bakhasi baeeyi, nga ne echile omwiriire euunwa enefu!’
