Raraawe amuboolela ali, ‘Mwana wase, buli lwoosi ewe oli nase, ne bioosi nibio ndi nabio bili bibiowo.
Ne kakhali khukhoyeele khukholela wandaayo naikara mala khusangaale sikila wandaayo yuno aba afwa ne luno ali omulamu, aba atiba ne luno anyoolekhe.’ ”

Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Abao omuiinda owaba no mukholi owemeelela kimiaandu kiewe. Omuyiinda oyo aboolelwa ali omukholi wewe chana alikho onakaka kimiaandu kiewe.
Nio omuiinda oyo alanga omukholi wewe oyo mala amureeba ali, ‘Makhuwa siina niko ndaulilanga khwiwe kano? Kobosia bitabu bie kimilimo kiowo, sikila se olaba omwimeelesi lundi tawe.’
Omukholi ebaasia, aloma ali, ‘Omukhongo wase alikho andekhesia kimilimo, ndakhola siina? Se ndi ne kamaani ke khulima chikhwakhwa tawe, ne lundi chisoni khukhwesabiilisia.
Namanyile nilio ndakhola nio babaandu banjakaanile mu chinju chabwe, ne ndekhilwe kimilimo.’
“Nio alaanga be kamakobi ko mukhoongo wewe boosi buli sia mulala. Mala areeba owe khunyoa ali, ‘Ewe oli ne likobi lio mukhoongo wase sikelo siina?’
Oyo amukobosia ali, ‘Kamapiipa emia ndala ke kamafura ka miseituni.’ Omukholi amuboolela ali, ‘Yikhala aasi oandike khangu oli kamapiipa kamakhumi karaano.’
Ne areeba okundi ali, ‘Ne ewe oli ne likobi sikelo siina?’ Amukobosia ali, ‘Kamakunia emia ndala ke ngano.’ Omukholi chana amuboolela ali, ‘Bukula lukaratasi oandike oli kamakunia kamakhumi munaane.’
“Sisiakholekha, omwami owo mukholi okhali omweyikinwa yuno tawe, amufumia, sikila khukhola bibiindu sikesikesi, sikila babaandu be sibala sino bali bakesikesi lukali mu khukhola kakaabwe babeene khukhila babaandu bali be buwaanga.”
Ne Yesu achiililila khubaboolela ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi amba basaale khulwe buiinda bukhali bwe buluungi tawe, nio oli buwao boole khumwingisia mu chingo cha mindali.
Omundu yesi yesi oli omusuubilwa mu kaali matiiti ali omusuubilwa akhaba mu kali kamakali. Ne Omundu yesi yesi okhali omusuubilwa mu kaali matiiti tawe, se asuubilwa akhaba mu makali tawe.
Khwako enywe mwaba ne mukhali basuubilwa mu buiinda bwe sibala, naanu onyala amura mu buliindi bwe buiinda bwa ng'ali?
Ne mwaba ne mukhaba basuubilwa mu buiinda bwo kundi tawe, naanu onyala amuelesia enywe bubwenywe?
Nga Bafarisayo ne baulila kano balekelesia Yesu sikila basiima chirupia.
Ababoolela ali, “Enywe mwekhola khuba baluungi ebweeni we babaandu ne kakhali Wele amanyile kimiooyo kienywe. Sikila bibiindu bie bukhala bukali khu baandu bili bie lisinye mu moni cha Wele.
Lili liliangu likulu ne liloba khuwao khukhila enyukuta ndala eye Lilaka khurusibwao.
“Abao omuiinda mulala owefwaranga chingubo cha che bukusi bwe angaaki owamenya mu limenya lie bukoote ne khulia naikara buli endaalo.
Omutaambi owalaangwa bali Lasaro abechanga a silibwa sio muyiinda oyo. Lasaro chana aba ne kamakoonjo kumubili kwoosi mala bamumemanga ne bamura asilibwa sio muyiinda oyo.
Lasaro ekoombanga khulia bitonyi bie biakhulia bikwile khukhwama khu sialwa sio muyiinda oyo: ne chimbwa cho muyiinda chechanga ne chikhoomba mu makoonjo.
“Omutaambi oyo afwa mala malaika bamumeema bamuyila ekhala a lubeka lwa Aburahamu anaikara eye mwikulu. Omuyiinda oyo yesi afwa mala asiikhwa,
ne e makoombe, ne alikho na aya lukali, asuta chimoni mala abona Aburahamu ataayi ne Lasaro amwikhale a lubeka.
Nio alanga ali, ‘Paapa Aburahamu kholele siisa mala orume Lasaro aronge lulwala lwewe mumeechi mala ambosie lulimi, sikila ndi mu buchuuni bukali lukali mu mulilo kuno.’
“Ne Aburahamu amuboolela ali, ‘Mwana wase khebulila oli mu siise sie bulamu bwowo wanyoola bibiindu bilayi, ne Lasaro anyoola bibiindu biibi. Ne ano alikho aolelesibwa ne ewe oli mu buchuuni bukali.
Lundi litooma liboofu lili akari wefwe nawe. Khwako babenya khukhwicha niio oli khukhwama ano namwe babenya khukhwambukha beche eno khukhwama niio oli se banyala tawe.’
Ne omuiinda chana amuboolela ali, ‘Nono paapa Aburahamu khusaba ewe orume Lasaro munju eya Paapa wase.
Sikila ndiyo ne bawandaayase baraano. Lekha ache abakaambile, nio bakhakhola bario bosi becha abuundu we buchuuni ano tawe.’
“Nio Aburahamu aamukobosia ali, ‘Bawandaayo bali ne Musa ne bang'oosi khubakaambila, bawandaayo bakhoyeele baulile niko abo baloma.’
Omuyiinda oyo aaloma ali, ‘Paapa Aburahamu, se kaakama kario tawe. Ne kakhali omundu aalamukha khukhwama mu bafu mala aababoolela balekanila bubwoni bwabwe.’
Nio Aburahamu aamukobosia ali, ‘Baaba ne bakhaulila Musa ne bang'oosi tawe, se banyala baulila aakhaba omundu khukhwama emakoombe tawe.’ ”

Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Kamakhako ke khukhola bubwoni khukhwola kabeo, ne sili silaamo khuyo okareerera!
Bwakhabeele bulayi khu niye abanga aboyiilwe lususi mwikosi mala amwaatwa mu nyanja khukhila nakila mulala khu batiiti bano akhole bubwoni.
Khwako mwiyaye mu niko mukhola!
“Wandaayo aaba nakhola bubwoni, murafwire. Ne aaba ne ekanila, mubeele.
Ne aaba nakhukoseele kamakhabi saba khu ndaalo ndala mala akobola kamakhabi koosi saba naloma ali, ‘Mbeele,’ Khukhwola omubeele.”
Barumwa baboolela Omwami bali, “Khutase lisuubila.”
Ne Omwami abakobosia ali, “Mwaaba ne lisuubila nga khamiicho khe kumupeeli, onyala waboolela kumurongooro kumuboofu kuno oli, ‘Siukha oche wibiaale mu nyanja;’ mala kulakhola kurio.
“Mulala khwinywe aaba nali no mukholi omulimilanga namwe omwayilanga kamakheese, omukholi oyo naloota khukhwama e mukuunda owamuandika anyala amuboolela ali, ‘Yiicha khangu ano wikhale khu sialwa olie ku?’
Se anyala amuboolela ario tawe, ne kakhali amuboolela ali, ‘Ng'onele siakhulia sie ekolooba mala umbe ndie ne khunywa, ne malile nio nawe olie.’
Omukholi oyo se anyala apilwa orio sikila khuria kamalaka tawe.
Khwako kali kario khwinywe mwesi, ne mumalile khukhola niko mulakilwe, loma muli, ‘Efwe khuli bakholi bakhali ne bukhala tawe, khwakholile busa kimilimo nikio khwenyibwa khukhole.’ ”
Nga Yesu aba khu lukeendo lwe khucha Yerusalemu abirira khu lwakha lwa Samaria ne Kalilaya.
Yesu ne alikho engila mu sirekere akaanana ne babaandu ekhumi balwala bulwaale bwe kamakele. Bema sinao,
baboolela Yesu mu mumilo kwe angaaki bali, “Omwami Yesu khukholele siisa!”
Nga mulala khu nibo abona ali aonile, akobola ne alikho afumia Wele ne kumumilo kumuboofu.
Akwa mu bikele bia Yesu amupila orio. Omundu oyo aba Omusamaria.
Yesu areeba ali, “Babaandu baonisibwe se babeele ekhumi? Ne tisa bali waena?
Se aliio omundu okundi okoboole khu khupila Wele ali orio tawe nakhali omusamaria yuno yeng'ene?”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha oche, lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie.”
Bafarisayo balala bareeba Yesu bali, “Bubwami bwa Wele buliicha liina?” Abakobosia ali, “Bubwami bwa Wele se bwiicha ne bimanyisio nibio mubona tawe.
Namwe se baloma bali, ‘Lola buli ano!’ Namwe ‘Eyo tawe!’ Sikila Bubwami bwa Wele buli akari wenywe.”
Nio aboolela babeeka ali, “Chindaalo chilikho chiicha nicho muliekoomba khubona endaalo ndala khu ndaalo cho Mwana wo Mundu ne se mukhakibone tawe.
Balibao balimuboolela enywe bali, ‘Lola, oyosi eyo,’ namwe ‘Lola, oyusiina ano!’ Mukha chayo namwe mwabaloondakho tawe.
Sikila nga lueni ne lumeniuukha lukhosia mu ngaaki chimbeka chombi, nio akhaba Omwana wo Mundu alikhola ario khu ndaalo yewe.
Ne kakhali khukhwola apisibwe siibi mu biindu bikali, mala eselukho yino emulobe.
Nga kaba mu ndaalo cha Noa, kaliba kario akhaba mu ndaalo cho Mwana wo Mundu.
Buli mundu aachiililila khulia ne khunywa, ne khuyila bakhasi, khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo Noa engilila mu liaaro mala kameechi kechula keera boosi.
Bulayi bwene nga kaba mu ndaalo cha Luti, babaandu bachiililila khulia ne khunywa, khukula ne khukusia, khumiicha ne khukhwombakha.
Khu ndaalo niyo Luti arurira mu Sodomu, kumulilo kumurafu lukali kwecha aasi khukhwama mwikulu mala kwababunia boosi.
Nono kaliba kario mu ndaalo niyo Omwana owo Mundu aliichilakho.
Khebulila mukha Luti!
Omundu yesi yesi okhaka khuonia bulamu bwewe akhabutibie; ne oyo otibia bulamu bwewe akhabuonie!
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, siilo esio babaandu babili baliba bakonile khu sitanda, mulala alibukulwa nokundi arame.
Bakhasi babili baliba basiela alala, mulala alibukulwa ne okundi arame.
[Babaandu be siseecha babili baliba ne bakhola mu mukuunda, mulala alibukulwa, ne okundi alilekhwa enyuma.]”
Babeeka bamureeba bali, “Waena, Omwami?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Chingosia chibuusiananga niio sifwiile sili.”

Nio Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe lukano khubekisia ali khukhwola basabe buli lwoosi bakhafwa kimiooyo tawe.
Aloma ali, “Mu lukoba nabulebe abamo omukhalaki mulala okhaaria Wele tawe, lundi alekelesia buli mundu.
Ne abao namulekhwa mu lukoba lwene olwo owachichanga njilili njilili khu mukhalaki oyo ne aloma ali, ‘Njeete kholelwe bung'ali akari wase no musiku wase.’
Khu siise sileeyi omukhalaki oyo alobanga, ekhumaliliikha aloma ali, ‘Akhaba ne kharia Wele namwe ne khabala omundu khuba siindu tawe,
ne sikila namulekhwa yuno alikho anaania ese, ndamuyeeta, ne khakhola ndio tawe, alanduya khukhwiicha buli lwoosi!’ ”
Nio Yesu achiililila khuloma ali, “Ulila niko omukhalaki okhali omuluungi yuno aloma.
Nono, Wele se anyala khukhalakila babaandu bewe bulayi bamulililanga siilo ne kumuusi tawe ku? Alakhiinda khubayeeta ku?
Muboolela ndi alabayeeta khangu. Ne kakhaba kario, Omwana wo Mundu ne aliicha alinyoola lisuubila khu sibala ku?”
Lundi Yesu aboola lukano khu baandu balala ba baaba ne bebukula khuba baluungi, ne khulekelesianga babaandi. Aloma ali,
“Baandu babili bacha mu Lukaangu khusaba, mulala aaba Omufarisayo ne okundi aaba omuroosi owe busuuru.
Omufarisayo eema mala asaba ali, ‘Wele, ese khusiima, sikila se ndi omulianga, namwe ookhali omweyikinwa, namwe omueeyi nga babaandu babaandi tawe. Khusiima sikila se ndi nga omuroosi owe busuuru yuno tawe.
Ese neyimanaanga siakhulia khabili khwichuuma. Mbaananga silala khwikhumi sie bibiindu bioosi nibio nyoolanga.’
Ne omuroosi owe busuuru eema sinao, se anyala akhaba khulola chimoni chewe mu ngaaki tawe. Ne kakhali ekhupaka a sifuba naloma ali, ‘Wele ese omwoni, kholele siisa!’ ”
Yesu aababoolela ali, “Muboolela enywe ndi, omuroosi owe busuuru oyo aaba omuluungi khu Wele nga ne aakobola engo, ne Omufarisayo tawe. Sikila buli mundu oweniinia aliboombisibwa ne owe boombia aliniinisibwa.”
Babaandu balala bareera babaana batiiti khu Yesu abarekho kamakhono. Nga babeeka babona bario, babarafwira.
Ne kakhali Yesu alaanga, babaana aloma ali, “Lekha babaana beche niio ndi ne mukhabakhiingilila tawe, sikila Bubwami bwa Wele buli bwe babaandu nga bano bari.
Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi, yesi yesi okhakaanila Bubwami bwa Wele nga omwana tawe, se alibwingilamo tawe.”
Omwimeelesi omuyaudi areeba Yesu ali, “Omwekisia omulayi, khola ndiena nio nyoole bulamu bwa mindali?”
Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Siina sikila ne unaanga oli omulayi? Se alikhoo oli omulayi tawe, nakhali Wele yeng'ene.
Omanyile kamalaka kaboola kali, ‘Okhaba omueeyi tawe; okheera tawe; okheeba tawe; okhakiikha owasio tawe; orie raraao ne maao.’ ”
Omundu oyo aboolela Yesu ali, “Natiila kano koosi khukhwama mu bwana bwase.”
Nga Yesu ne aulila ario, amuboolela ali, “Wabombeleelwe ne sisiindu silala siong'ene. Kusia bioosi nibio oli nabio mala okabile bataambi, ne olaba ne libiikhilo mwikulu, mala wiche unondekho.”
Ne nga aulila kano abeelela sikila aba omuiinda lukali.
Nga Yesu ne abona nabeelele lukali aboola ali, “Buli buandalafu lukali khwaabo bali ne kimiaandu khukhwingila mu bwami bwa Wele!
Lili liliangu khu ngamia khubirira mu mwanya kwe sindani, khukhila omuiinda khukhwingila mu Bwami bwa Wele.”
Abo babaulila naloma bareeba bali, “Nono naanu onyala aonisibwa?”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Likhanyalikhana khu mundu tawe, linyalikhana khu Wele.”
Nio Petero aloma ali, “Lola! Efwe khwalekhile bioosi khu khuloondakho.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Yee ne ng'ali musuubisia ndi yesi yesi olekha enju yewe namwe omukhasi wewe, namwe wandaaye, namwe basaasi, namwe babaana, sikila Bubwami bwa Wele,
alanyoola bikali mu siise sino, ne mu siise sisiicha alinyoola bulamu bwa mindali.”
Yesu abukula babeeka ekhumi na babili abaila alubeka mala ababoolela ali, “Rekeeresia, khulikho khuniina khucha Yerusalemu mala buli siindu sisiaandikwa ne bang'oosi khu Mwana wo Mundu sicha khwichusibwa.
Acha khuaanwa khu Be Chikholo bamukholele siienya meno, bamuambie chisoni ne khumufuchakho.
Balamupa kimikhomwa mala bamwire, ne khu ndaalo ekhola khataru alilamukha.”
Ne kakhali babeeka se bamanyilisia siosi siosi khu biindu bino tawe namwe sifuno sie kamakhuwa kano tawe, se batiila nilio Yesu alomaloma tawe.
Nga Yesu aba nakana khwola e Yeriko, omubofu aba ekhaale khu ngila, asaba buyeeti.
Nga omubofu oyo aulila babaandu ne babira areeba ali, “Siina nisio?”
Bamuboolela bali, “Yesu owa Nasareti alikho abira.”
Aloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Yesu Mwana owa Daudi! Kholele siisa!”
Babaandu be bweeni bamurafwira bali sila. Ne kakhali atasa khuloma lukali ali, “Mwana owa Daudi kholele siisa!”
Nio Yesu eema mala aloma bareere omubofu oyo. Oli omubofu chana ola siimbi, Yesu amureeba ali,
“Wenya khukholele siina?” Omubofu amuboolela ali, “Omwami nenya mbone lundi.”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nono khobone! Lisuubila liowo liakhuoniisie.”
Ne ao ne nao abona, ne khuloonda khu Yesu ne aelesia Wele luyali. Nga babaandu boosi babona bario, bafumia Wele.

Yesu engila mu Yeriko ne ali khu lukeendo lwewe.
Abao omuiinda bali Sakayo owaba omukhongo we khurosia busuuru.
Ekoomba khubona Yesu amanye ali omundu lukano siina, ne se anyala khumubona tawe sikila babaandu baba bakali, mala niye aba omwiimbi.
Nio atima ebweeni aniina khu mukhuyu nio amubone sikila Yesu aba alabirira khu ngila eyo.
Nga Yesu ola a mukhuyu akalama angaaki, mala aboolela Sakayo ali, “Sakayo yiikha khangu, sikila endaalo yino khukhwola ningile munju mwowo.”
Nio Sakayo ekha khangu mala akaanila Yesu ne liliekhoya likali.
Babaandu boosi ba babona barakikha khukhwelung'unya, ne baloma bali, “Omundu yuno achiile khuba omukeni wo mundu omwoni!”
Sakayo enyokha mala aboolela Omwami ali, “Lola Omwami, ndaelesia bataambi enusu eye kimiaandu kiase. Ne naaba ne nabea omundu yesi yesi khu siindu siosi siosi, ndamukoboselia sikelo esio khukhwola khane.”
Ne Yesu amukobosia ali, “Endaalo yino buonia bwechile munju yino, sikila omundu yuno yesi ali owe lisaaye lia Aburahamu.
Sikila Omwana wo Mundu echa khuyiima ne khuonia babatiba.”
Nio ababoolela ali, “Abao omukhongo owaba ne alikho acha mu sibala sie aleeyi anyoole bubwami, mala ne anyoolile bubwami obwo, akobole engo.
Nakharekukha tawe, alaanga bakholi bewe ekhumi mala abaelesia chirupia, ababoolela ali, ‘Nyoola bukhala mu rupia chino nabwila ngobola.’
Babaandu be mu sibala siewe bamubiila, nio baruma bakholi enyuma wewe bali, ‘Se khwenya omundu yuno akhwamiie tawe.’
“Omundu oyo akholwa omwami mala akobola engo. Arusia lilaka khangu bakholi nibo aelesia chirupia balangwe amanye bukhala nibwo baba ne banyoolile.
Owe khunyoa echa ebweeni wewe amuboolela ali, ‘Omwami, erupia niyo wambelesia yareerire bukhala bwe chichiindi ekhumi.’
Omwami oyo aboolela omukholi ali, ‘Oli omukholi omulayi, wakholile bulayi! Sikila wabele omusuubilwa mu makeekhe, ndakhukhola obe omwimeelesi we chingoba ekhumi.’
Omukholi okhola khabili echa aloma ali, ‘Omwami, erupia yowo yareerire bukhala bwe chichiindi chiraano.’
Ne omwami, amuboolela ali, ‘Olaba omwimeelesi khu ngoba chiraano.’
“Omukholi omumaliilisi echa aloma ali, ‘Omwami, erupia yowo niyeeyi. Nakiboa mu sitambala mala nakikisa.
Nakhuria, sikila ewe oli omundu omurafu. Obukulanga nisio okhabiikha tawe, lundi okesanga nibio okhamiicha tawe.’
Omwami amuboolela ali, ‘Oli omukholi omubi, ndakhukhalakila khuloondekhana ne lilomaloma liowo wamwene! Wamanya oli ese ndi omundu omurafu, mbukulanga biikhali bibiase tawe, lundi ngesaanga nibio khamiicha tawe.
Nono siina, sisiakila ne waloba khura erupia yase mu bengi oli nicha nyoolelakho bukhala?’
“Nio omwami oyo aboolela abo ba baaba ne bemileo ali, ‘Munuule erupia niyo ali nayo muelesie oyo oli nacho ekhumi.’
Omwami, ‘Yuno ali nacho ekhumi!’
Abakobosia ali, ‘Muboolela ndi buli mundu oli ne sisiindu alaebwa bibiindi, ne oyo okhali na siindu tawe, akhaba sitiiti nisio ali nasio alanuulwa.
Ne basiku base bakheenyanga ese mbe omwami wabwe tawe, bareere ano mala mubeere ebweeni wase!’ ”
Yesu nga amala khuloma kano, achiililila ne lukeendo lwewe lwe khucha Yerusalemu.
Nga ne embiya e Betifake ne Betania a sikulu sia Miseituni, aruma babeeka bewe babili,
ne khubaa kamalaka kano ali, “Cha mu sirekere sie ataayi esio, nga ne mwingilamo, mulanyoola epunda enjoka niyo omundu akhakeendelakho tawe. Kikangulule mala mukireere ano.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne amureeba ali, ‘Siina sikila ne mukikangulula,’ muboolele muli Omwami akienya.”
Nio babeeka bacha mala banyoola buli siindu nga baba ne baboolelwe.
Ne oli balikho bakangulula epunda, babeeneyo bareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne mukikangulula?”
Bakobosia bali, “Omwami akienya,”
Mala bakirerera Yesu. Nio baala chingubo chabwe khu punda eyo ne khukhwikhasiakho Yesu.
Nga Yesu akeendela khu punda, babaandu baala chingubo chabwe khu ngila epunda yachikeendelakho.
Nga Yesu ne embiya Yerusalemu, niio engila esungukhila khu sikulu sia Miseituni, babeeka bewe boosi barakikha khukhwekhoya ne khufumia Wele ne kumumilo kwe angaaki khulwe kimilimo kimiboofu nikio baba ne baboone.
Ne baboola bali, “Wele biita chikhabi omuruki owichila mu lisina lio Mwami! Kumuleembe kube mwikulu ne luyali lube khu Wele!”
Nio Bafarisayo balala mu sipupu baboolela Yesu bali, “Omwekisia sisia babeeka bowo.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Muboolela enywe ndi basila kamabaale kalarakikha khu khufumia.”
Yesu nga ne ola siimbi ne lukoba lwa Yerusalemu alubona mala arakikha khululila ne aloma ali,
“Abaanga mu manyile endaalo eya luno bibiindu bibienyekha nio kumuleembe kubeo! Ne kakhali luno biakisiibwe se mubibona tawe!
Siise silikho siicha, basiku benywe bakhamubotookhelele mala bamwibwaakale khukhwama chimbeka choosi.
Balimubunisilia enywe elala, ne babaandu balimo. Ne se balilekha libaale khulindi tawe, sikila se mwakhebulila siise nisio Wele echelamo khumuonia enywe tawe.”
Nga Yesu ne engila mu Lukaangu arakikha khutimania baboofuli baruremo,
ababoolela ali, “Liaandikwa lili, ‘Enju yase elaba Enju eye lisaba,’ Ne kakhali enywe mwakikholile libina lie banuuli!”
ne kakhali se banyoola bubweyaangu bwe khukhola bario tawe, sikila babaandu boosi bachiililila khumurekeeresia mu burekereefu bukali.

Endaalo ndala nga Yesu aba mu Lukaangu ne alikho ekisia babaandu ne khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi, Basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki be lilaka ne babemeelesi becha alala,
ne bamuboolela bali, “Khuboolele bibiindu bino olabikholanga mu bunyali siina? Naanu owakhuelesia ewe bunyali buno?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Akhaba sesi ndamureeba mumboolele,
Yoana aamia waena bunyali bwe khubatiisia, khu Wele namwe khu baandu?”
Barakikha khuyingana akari wabwe babeene ne babeene bali, “Khwaloma khuli, ‘Bwama khu Wele’; alaboola ali ‘Siina, ne mukhamusuubila?’
Ne khwaboola khuli, ‘Bwama khu baandu’, babaandu bano boosi balakhuupa kamabaale; sikila basuubila bali Yoana aaba omung'oosi.”
Nio bamukobosia bali, “Se khumanya niio bwama tawe.”
Ne Yesu ababoolela ali, “Akhaba sesi, se muboolela kholaanga bibiindu bino mu bunyali bwa naanu tawe.”
Nga siise sie khubuta chisabibu sioola aruma nasioobi wewe khu bakholi abo, bamuelesie sikelo siewe sie chisabibu nicho babutile, ne kakhali bakholi abo bamupa mala bamutimania akobola engo mu makhono busa.
Omwene liruuti aruma nasioobi okundi mala bamukholela ke chisoni mala yesi bamutimania akobola engo makhono mataaka.
Omwene liruuti oyo aruma nasioobi owa khataru; yuno bamwara kamakuma mala bamumwaata enje we liruuti.
Nio, omwene liruuti aloma ali, ‘Ndakhola siina? Ndaruma Omwana wase Omusiime wakana banyala bamuria!’
Nga bakholi be mwiruuti abo bamubona, baboolana bali, ‘Yuno niye omwana wo mwene liruuti lino. Khekhumwire nio efwe khwiile khu miaandu.’
Nio, bamuyila enje we liruuti, mala bamwiira.”
Yesu areeba ali, “Nono omwene liruuti alikhola siina bakholi be mwiruuti abo?
Aliicha mala eere bakholi be mwiruuti mala areemo bakholi babaandi.”
Nga babaandu baulila kano baloma bali, “Se kakhoya kaaba kario tawe!”
‘Libaale nilio babombakhi baloba bali se lili ne bukhala tawe,
liliene ne liliene liabeele lie bukhala khukhila koosi.’
Buli mundu okwa khu libaale elio alitonyekhakamo bitonyi, ne likwa khu mundu lilimutubundulaka.”
Baandiki ne basaayi bakhulu bakhaka khuamba Yesu abwene ne abwene, sikila bamanya bali aboolile lukano luno khubekiicha nibo. Ne kakhali baria babaandu.
Nio bamwayilisia banyoole bubweyaangu. Baonga babaandu balala, mala babaruma khu Yesu nga bayooti. Bekhola khuba balayi khu niye nio bali bamutiile khu niko aloma mala bamuambe bamuyile khu be bunyali mala bamusitake khu muruki.
Bayooti abo bareeba Yesu bali, “Omwekisia, khumanyile khuli olomalomanga mala wekisia buluungi ne soyekhelanga lubeka lulala tawe, ne ng'ali wekisianga bung'ali bwe ngila eya Wele.
Khuboolele, lilaka likhufukiilila efwe khuruunga busuuru khu Kaisari, namwe tawe?”
Yesu amanya kumureko kwabwe mala ababoolela ali,
“Njekesie erupia. Kumurwe ne lisina liilikho bia naanu?” Bamukobosia bali, “Bia Kaisari.”
Nio Yesu ababoolela ali, “Khwako, eelesia Kaisari biili bia Kaisari ne eelesia Wele biili bia Wele.”
Se banyala khunyoola ke khu musitakilakho ebweeni bwe babaandu tawe ne kakhali bauka likobosia liewe mala basila busa.
becha khu Yesu, bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia, Musa aakhuandikila efwe lilaka ali, omulebe ne afwa ne alekha omukhasi ne akhali no mwana tawe, wandaaye khukhwola eele khu namulekhwa mala asaalile wandaaye owafwa oyo babaana.
Nono babao babaandu saba bo mundu mulala. Omubele aareera omukhasi mala omwene aafwa ne asiili khunyoolakho omwana tawe;
mala oomuloonda eela khu namulekhwa oyo, yesi aafwa,
owa khataru yesi aamwiilakho mala kaaba busa kario khu boosi saba, se banyoola babaana tawe.
Lumaliilisi, aakhaba namulekhwa oyo yesi aafwa.
Nono mu khulamukha, namulekhwa oyo aliba mukha naanu? Sikila boosi saba bamenya naye nga omukhasi wabwe.”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Babaandu be selukho yino bareerana,
ne baseecha ne bakhasi baakholaane khulamukha mala bamenye mu siise sisiicha se balireerana tawe.
Se banyala bafwa lundi tawe, sikila bakhabe busa nga malaika bakhanyala bafwa tawe, lundi bali babaana ba Wele, sikila balamuukhe khukhwama mu lifwa.
Lundi Musa ekesia abuwaanga ali babafwa balilamukha. Mumakhuwa ke sichakha siiya ne kumulilo Musa alaanga Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi ali, ‘Wele owa Aburahamu, Wele owa Isaaka, ne Wele owa Yakobo!’
Wele ali Wele we balamu se ali Wele we bafu tawe. Sikila khu niye boosi bali balamu.”
Balala khu baandiki bakobosia Yesu bali, “Omwekisia elio likobosio lilayi!”
Se bakhakakho lundi khu mureeba lireeba tawe.
Yesu abareeba ali, “Banyala baloma bariena bali Kristo ali omwana owa Daudi?
Sikila Daudi omwene aboola mu sitabu sie Chinyimbo ali,
‘Omwami aaboolela Omwami wase ali,
Yikhala kumukhono kwase kumuseecha
nabwila nga khola basiku bowo
babe nga endebe eye khuswalakho bikele biowo.’
Khwako Daudi amulaanga ali, ‘Omwami,’ nono linyalikhana liriena Kristo abe omwana owa Daudi?”
Nga babaandu boosi baba ne bamurekeeresia, Yesu aboolela babeeka bewe ali,
“Khe mwiyaye khuloondekhana ne baandiki be lilaka babasiima khukeendela chikaanjo ne khukhesebwa mu buriaani khu chisooko. Ne khu robora chindebe chindayi mu chisinakooki ne abuundu e lukoosi mu naikara.
Bebukulila bie banamulekhwa, ne eyi bekholesia mu khusaba kamasaba kamaleeyi! Balinyoola siiukuumo siboofu khukhila boosi!”

Yesu aloleelela baiinda ne bara biianwa biabwe mu libiikhilo lie mu Lukaangu,
mala abona namulekhwa omutaambi naramo bisimiri bia koopa bitiiti bibili.
Nio aloma ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, namulekhwa omutaambi yuno arusiisie sikali khukhila boosi.
Sikila babaandi boosi barusiisie sitiiti khu nibio bali nabio, ne niye mu butaambi bwewe, arusiisie sioosi nisio abeele nasio.”
Babeeka balala balomaloma ke Lukaangu nga lwaba lwombakhwa ne kamabaale kamamiliiu lukali ne biianwa nibio baana khu Wele. Yesu aloma ali,
“Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, kamabaale niko mubona kano se lilikhoo lilirama khu liindi tawe. Buli libaale likhamwaatwe aasi.”
Nio bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia, kano kaliba liina? Ne sisiekesia sili kano kali siimbi khukholekha sili siina?”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ba meso bakhamutiimia tawe; sikila bakali bakheeche mu lisina liase ne baboola bali, ‘Ese niye Kristo! Lundi siise siolile!’ Ne kakhali enywe mukhabaloondakho tawe.
Ne nga muulila ke kamae ne chingoyaani, mukharia tawe, sikila khukhwola kano kanyoe kekholekhe ne se kali bali aba siieli siolile tawe.”
Nio Yesu achiililila khu baboolela ali, “Bibala bilapana, bubwami bulebwaakalana,
lilabao literema likali lie sibala, enjala elabao ne lufu buli abuundu. Bibiindu bie kamakana biliikha khukhwama mwikulu.
Ne bino bioosi ne bikhekholekha tawe, balimuaamba enywe ne khumupia sibi bamuyile mu chisinakooki ne mu siboe. Ne mulireerwa ebweeni we babaami ne baruki sikila lisina liase.
Sino siliba siise sienywe sie khurusia buloli bwenywe.
Mukhembeelela mu mebaasio kenywe niko mucha khuloma tawe,
sikila ndimuelesia kamakhuwa ne limanya nilio basiku benywe bakhanyala khumanya namwe bakambuusiamo tawe.
Basaasi benywe, bawandaayenywe, balebe ne basaale bakhachaame balala mwinywe mala mwirwe.
Bakali balimubiila sikila lisina liase.
Ne kakhaba kario, akhaba lichuune lilala lie khumurwe se likharusibwekho tawe.
Mulionia bulamu bwenywe khulwe khukhwikhaliilikha.
“Nga mukhabone Yerusalemu ne lubotookhelelwe ne banamae, abwenao mu khamanye muli khukhwonakwa khwalwo khwolile.
Nio abo bali mu Buyuda khukhwola belukhile mu bikulu, ne abo bali mu lukoba khukhwola baruremo, ne abo bali enje bakhakobolamo tawe.
Sikila echo chikhabe chindaalo che siiukuumo, khukhwola koosi kakaandikwa kekholekhe.
Buliba bubi bukali khu bakhasi be chinda nende baliba ne banuunia! Sikila sibi sikali siliba khu sibala ne siiukuumo sia Wele khu baandu bano.
Balala bakhebwaakalwe beerwe, ne babaandi baliiyilwa mu mbaambe mu bibala bioosi, nende Be Chikholo baliswalakilila Yerusalemu khukhwola nga biise biabwe ne biliwa.
Babaandu baliiochaocha sikila buuri nga baliba ne baliindiilile siliba ne silikho sicha khukholekha khu sibala, sikila bunyali bwe mu ngaaki bulisiisiikhwa.
Bakhabone Omwana wo Mundu ne echela mwileesi ne bunyali ne luyali lukali.
Khwako nga bibiindu bino birakikha khukhwikholekha musute chimoni chenywe, sikila buonia bwenywe buliba buli siimbi.”
Nio Yesu ababoolela lukano luno ali, “Lolela khu mutuli ne kimirongooro kikiindi kioosi.
Ne nga mubona ne kusisiine kamasaafu kamatoro mumanya muli aba chindaalo che siimiyu chili siimbi.
Khwako, ne mubona bibiindu bino ne bikholekha, mumanye muli Bubwami bwa Wele buli siimbi.
“Ng'ali muboolela enywe ndi eselukho yino se labira, bibiindu bino ne bikhekholekha tawe.
Likulu ne liloba biliwao, ne Elomo yase se eliwao tawe.”
“Ba meeso! Mukhalekha kimiooyo kienywe kiaba khu naikara engali ne bumeesi ne liliembeelela lie bulamu likali mala Endaalo eyo emunyoolelesie emuambe
nga kumureko tawe. Sikila kaliicha khu baandu boosi bamenyile buli abuundu khu sibala.
Ba meso mala muchiililile khusaba buli siise, nio mube ne kamaani ke khuona mu biindu bikhekholekhe, mala mwime ebweeni wo Mwana wo Mundu.”
Buli ndaalo Yesu ekisiaanga mu Lukaangu, ne siilo achichanga enje we lukoba khukona khu sikulu silaangwa Miseituni.
Ne buli kumutikhinyi babaandu boosi beechanga niio ali mu Lukaangu khumurekeeresia.

Siise sia Naikara elaangwa Pasaka, eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela, siaba siimbi.
Ne basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki baba bariire babaandu, nio bakhaka mu bwikisi khunyoola engila, eye khukhwira Yesu.
Nio Sietani engila mu Yuda owalaangwa Isikarioti, owaba mulala khu barumwa ekhumi na babili.
Khwako Yuda acha akachula ne basaayi bakhulu ne baliindi bakhulu nga nanyala achaama Yesu khu nibo.
Basangaala, mala berusia khumuruunga chirupia.
Nio Yuda afukiilisiana nabo mala arakikha khuyiima bubweyaangu bulayi bwe khuchaama Yesu khu nibo bamuambe babaandu bakali ne bakhaliio tawe.
Endaalo eye Kumukaati Kukhalimo limela ne khukhwira kamameeme ke siakhulia sie Pasaka nga yoola,
Yesu aruma Petero, ne Yoana nabalakiilisia ali, “Cha mung'oone siakhulia sie Pasaka khulie.”
Bamureeba bali, “Wenya khusing'oonele waena?”
Abakobosia ali, “Ne mulikho mwingila mu lukoba mulakaanana omundu owe siseecha asutile esoongo eye kameechi. Muloondekho khukhwola munju nimwo alacha,
mala mureebe omwene enju muli, Omwekisia areeba ali, ‘Lusiro siina nilwo ese ne babeeka base khulaliilamo siakhulia sie Pasaka?’
Alamwekesia lusiro luboofu mu korofa lulimo buli siindu, mu bwenomwo rekekha buli siindu.”
Nio bacha mala banyoola buli siindu nga Yesu aba ne ababoolele, mala barekekha siakhulia sie Pasaka.
Nga esaa yoola, Yesu eekhala khu sialwa ne barumwa bewe.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Nekoombile lukali khulia siakhulia sie Pasaka sino ne nanywe ne khaambwa tawe!
Sikila muboolela enywe ndi, se ndilia lundi tawe khukhwola nga kaliba abuwaanga mu Bwami bwa Wele.”
Yesu abukula sikoombe, ne nga amala khu khupa orio khu Wele aloma ali, “Bukula sino mala munywe.
Sikila muboolela enywe ndi, khukhwama luno khuchiililila se ndanywa endali yino lundi tawe, khukhwola nga Bubwami bwa Wele buliicha.”
Abukula kumukaati apa orio khu Wele akumesulamo mala abaelesia naloma ali, [“Kuno kuli kumubili kwase kuulikho kuaanwa khubeela enywe. Khola murio khulwe khu khukhebulila ese.”
Mu ngila ne ng'ene, aabukula sikoombe enyuma we khukhwikolooya abaelesia aloma ali, “Sikoombe sino sili endakaano eya Wele embia eyichusiibwe ne kamafuki kase, kakachukhwa sikila enywe.]
“Ounjaama ali ano nase khu sialwa!
Omwana wo Mundu alafwa nga Wele aabisia, ne kakhali omundu omuchaama ali ne silaamo!”
Mala barakikha khureebana bali naanu olikho ocha khukhola kano.
Ne kakhali Yesu ababoolela ali, “Babaami be babaandu Be Chikholo bekesia bunyali khu baandu babwe mala baruki belaanga babeene bali, ‘Basaale be babaandu.’
Ne se kali kario khwinywe tawe, nakhali oli omukali lukali khwinywe khukhwola abe nga omwana khukhila boosi ne omwimeelesi khukhwola abe nga omukholi.
Naanu oli omukali lukali, oyo owikhala a sialwa khulia namwe oyo oreera khu mesa? Se ali oyo owikhalanga a sialwa tawe ku? Ne kakhali Ese ndi akari wenywe nga omukholi.
“Enywe mwachiililile khuba alala nase mu makhako kase,
nga Paapa ne amba bunyali bwe khuruka, akhaba sesi ndamuelesia enywe bunyali obwo.
Mulilia ne khunywa a sialwa siase mu Bwami bwase mala mwikhale khu ndebe mukhalakile chikholo ekhumi na chibili cha Isiraeli.
“Simoni, Simoni! Rekeeresia, Sietani enyile akhubukule ewe akhuseese nga omulimi aseesanga engaanu.
Ne kakhali nakhusabiile ewe Simoni ndi lisuubila liowo likhakwa tawe. Ne ungoboleele, khukhwola otinyilisie bawandaayo.”
Petero amukobosia ali, “Omwami, ese nerekekha khubowa ne khukhwirwa alala ne nawe!”
Ne Yesu amuboolela ali, “Ese khuboolela ewe Petero, ndi etaaywa ne khakholiokha siilo sia luno, olaba wanjikaanile khataru oli se umanyile tawe.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ne kakhali luno omundu yesi yesi oli ne sibeeti namwe elolooti khukhwola abukule; ne yesi yesi okhali ne mbalu tawe khukhwola akusie engubo yewe mala akule embalu.
Sikila muboolela enywe ndi liiandiko lino khukhwola lichusibwe mwise, ‘Bamura alala ne babooni’; sikila kakaandikwa khwise kalechusibwa.”
Babeeka bamuboolela bali, “Omwami, lola ano khuli ne chimbalu chibili.” Abakobosia ali, “Chanyalile.”
Yesu arura mu lukoba mala acha khu sikulu sia Miseituni nga buli lwoosi, babeeka boosi bacha naye.
Nga boola khu sikulu, Yesu ababoolela ali, “Khemusabe mukhakhola murio mwakwa mwikhako tawe.”
Nio abalekha esendakho sinao, mala asikama asaba ali,
“Paapa, waaba ne wenya ndusieo sikoombe sie kumunyakhano sino. Ne kakhaba kario, likhaba lilienya liase busa tawe, ne kakhali lilienya liowo likholekhe.”
[Malaika khukhwama mwikulu amubonekhela mala amutinyilisia.
Asaba ne kamaani ne ali mu buchuuni bukali, lukesi lwewe lwaba nga kamafuki ne karoonya aasi.]
Nga enyokha mwisaba akobola khu beeka bewe mala abanyoola balikho bakona sikila baba baluile ne khubeelela lukali.
Ababoolela ali, “Siina sikila ne mukona? Khemwinyokhe musabe nio mukhakhola murio mwakwa mu makhako tawe.”
Oli Yesu asiloma ario, sipupu siola siarangiriirwe no mundu olaangwa Yuda, mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili, echa khu Yesu ne khumwekwayila.
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Yuda, onyala wachaama Omwana wo Mundu khulwe khumwekwayila?”
Nga babeeka ba baaba ne Yesu babona sicha khwekholekha bamuboolela bali, “Omwami, khurumikhire chimbalu chefwe?”
Ne mulala khu nibo arema liiru lia nasioobi owo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali lie lubeka luseecha.
Nio Yesu aloma ali, “Wanyala orio!” Nabukula liiru alikobosia khu murwe.
Nio Yesu aboolela basaayi bakhulu ne baliindi be lukaangu ne babemeelesi ba baaba ne bechile khumuaamba ali, “Mwichile ne chimbalu ne chiruungu oli ese ndi omunuuli?
Nabelenge ne nanywe mu lukaangu buli endaalo mala se mwakhaka khu khumbamba tawe. Ne kakhali yino eli esaa yenywe ne bunyali bwe sisiilima.”
Nio baamba Yesu mala bamuila munju eyo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali. Petero aloondakho sinao.
Oli babwana kumulilo akari we luuya lwe kumuse balikho boora, Petero yesi abekhalamo.
Omukholi owe siikhasi nga amubona ekhaale asioso, amuungusa mala aloma ali, “Omundu yuno yesi abeele ne Yesu.”
Petero ekaana ali, “Mukhasiwe, ese se mu manyile tawe!”
Enyuma we siise sitiiti omundu okundi yesi aunguusa Petero mala aboola ali, “Ewe wesi oli mulala khwaabo.” Ne kakhali Petero amukobosia ali, “Munduwe, ese se ndi mulala khu nibo tawe!”
Enyuma we saa ndala omundu okundi yesi akhayilila busa khuboola ali, “Ng'ali omundu yuno yesi abele ne Yesu sikila ali Omukalilaya!”
Petero amukobosia ali, “Munduwe, olanialilisianga siina!”
Nio oli asikaana ario etaaywa yakholiokha.
Omwami ekhebukha mala alola Petero, mala Petero aakhebulila elomo niyo Omwami aaba ne amubooleele ali, “Siilo sia luno etaaywa ne khaakholiokha tawe, olaba wanjekaanile khukhwola khataru.”
Petero aarura enje aalila burafu po!
Babaandu ba baaba ne baliindile Yesu, bamukholela siienyameno ne khumuupa.
Bamufuunikha chimoni ne khu mureeba bali, “Ng'oola! Naanu owama khu khuupa?”
Mala bamuloma kamakhuwa kakaandi kamakali ke khumuseya.
Nga endaalo yola, kumuse kwe babemeelesi, basaayi bakhulu, ne baandiki bebuusia alala, mala bareera Yesu ebweeni we kumuse.
Bamureeba bali, “Khuboolele, ewe oli Kristo?”
Abakobosia ali, “Nakhamuboolela, se mulasuubila tawe,
ne nakhamureeba lireeba se mulaangobosia tawe.
Ne khukhwama luno khuchiliilila, Omwana wo Mundu alekhala kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.”
Nio boosi bamureeba bali, “Khwako ewe oli Omwana owa Wele?” Aabakobosia ali, “Enywe mwalomile murio.”
Nabo baloma bali, “Buloli siina bubuundi nibo khwenya? Fwabeene khwauliile niko omwene aama khuloma.”

Be kumuse abo boosi bayila Yesu ebweeni wa Pilato.
Mala barakikha khu musitaka ne baloma bali, “Khunyoolile omundu yuno atiimia babaandu befwe, ne khu bakaania ali bakharuunga busuuru khu Kaisari tawe, lundi omwene elaanga ali, niye Kristo, Omwami.”
Nio Pilato amureeba ali, “Ewe oli Omwami owe Bayaudi?” Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ewe walomile orio.”
Pilato aboolela basaayi bakhulu ne sipupu ali, “Se nanyoolile likila mukhalakile tawe.”
Ne kakhali bakhayilila lukali bali, “Khulwe liliekisia liewe alikho aachilisia babaandu khukhola sisiayuumba mu Buyuda mwoosi. Arakikhira mu Kalilaya luno oolile ano.”
Nga Pilato aulila kano, areeba ali, “Omundu yuno Omukalilaya?”
Ne nga amanya ali Yesu ama mu lukoongo lurukwa ne Herodi, amuruma khu Herodi, owaba yesi nali mu Yerusalemu siise esio.
Herodi nga abona Yesu, asangaala lukali sikila aba ekoomba lukali khumubona sikila aba aulila ka kewe mala eenyanga khubona Yesu nakhola kamayia.
Nio Herodi areeba Yesu kamareeba kamakali, ne kakhali Yesu se amukobosiakho tawe.
Basaayi bakhulu ne baandiki becha ebweeni mala basitaka Yesu lukali.
Herodi ne banamae bewe bakholela Yesu siienyameno ne khumulekelesia mala bamufwara engubo eye lukoondo lulayi lukali mala bamukobosia wa Pilato.
Endaalo eyo Herodi ne Pilato baamba busaale, kano ne kakhakholekha tawe, baba basiku.
Pilato alaanga alala basaayi bakhulu, babemeelesi ne babaandu,
mala ababoolela ali, “Mureerire omundu yuno ebweeni wase ne muboola muli abeele alikho atiimia babaandu. Ne enyuma we khumuocha ebweeni wenywe, se namunyoolilekho likoso liosi liosi lie khumukhalakila tawe.
Ne akhaba Herodi yesi se amunyoolilemo libi liosi liosi tawe, sikila namukoboosie khwifwe. Omundu yuno se akholilekho sisiindu siosi siosi sikila erwe tawe.
Khwako ndamupa biboko mala mulekhuule ache.”
[
Buli lwosi mu naikara eye Pasaka Pilato abalekhuulilanga omuboe mulala.]
Babaandu boosi bayokela ne baloma bali, “Mwire! Khulekhuulile Baraba!”
(Bara Baraba mu siboe sikila sisiayuumba sisiaba mu lukoba ne bubwiri.)
Pilato enya khulekhuula Yesu, khwako asaaya sipupu lundi.
Ne kakhali bayokela bali, “Mubaambe! Mubaambe!”
Pilato ababoolela lukhola khataru ali, “Siina sikila, akholile mabi siina? Se namunyoolilekho kamabi kakila erwe tawe! Khwako, ndamupa biboko mala mulekhuule ache.”
Ne kakhali bachiililila khuyokela lukali bali, Yesu khukhwola abaambwe, ne ekhumaliilikha lilienya liabwe liafukiililwa.
Nio Pilato akhalakila Yesu khuloondekhana ne lilienya liabwe.
Nio alekhuula Baraba niye benyaanga, mala abaelesia Yesu bakhole nga benyile.
Nio banamae babukula Yesu bacha naye. Nga baba ne balikho bacha, bakaanana omundu khukhwama Kireni owalaangwa Simoni ne alikho engila mu lukoba khukhwama enje. Bamutiila mala bamurakho asutile Yesu kumusalaba amuloondekho.
Babaandu bakali bamuloondakho, bakhasi ba baba mu sipupu omwo balila ne khukhwesasaara.
Yesu abekhebukha mala ababoolela ali, “Bakhaana ba Yerusalemu! Mukhandila ese tawe, ne kakhali khemwelilile mwabeene ne khulwe babaana benywe.
Sikila chindaalo chilikho chiicha, nicho babaandu baliloma bali, ‘Bakuumba bali ne khabi, ne chinda chikhasaalakho namwe kamaturu kakhanuuniakho tawe!’
Esio siliba siise nisio babaandu baliboolela bikulu bali, ‘Khukwekho!’ Lundi baliboolela chingulu bali, ‘Khukise!’
Ne babaandu baaba ne bakhola bario khu murongooro kumubisi, kacha khuba karie khu mwomu?”
Babaandu babili ba baaba banuuli bayilwa khukhwirwa alala ne Yesu.
Nga boola abuundu aalaangwa, “Siaanga,” Babaambilao Yesu, ne banuuli abo, mulala kumukhono kwa Yesu kumuseecha no kundi kumukhasi.
Yesu aloma ali, “Paapa babeele sikila se bamanyile niko bakhola tawe.”
Baapa ekura khukabana chingubo chewe.
Babaandu bemao baloleelela, ne kakhali babemeelesi be Bayaudi bamukholela embelekeu, ne baloma bali, “Aonianga babaandi, ne aaba nali Kristo lundi omurobore owa Wele lekha eonie omwene!”
mala baloma bali, “Waaba ne oli Omwami owe Bayaudi yeonia wamwene!”
Amurwe wewe kabao kamaandiko kano, “Yuno niye Omwami we Bayaudi.”
Mulala khu banuuli owaba nali khu musalaba aboolela Yesu ali, “Ewe se oli Kristo? Yeonia mala okhuonie nafwe!”
Ne okundi oyo arafwira owasie oyo aloma ali, “Ewe se oria Wele tawe? Akhaba ne khukhalakiilwe kamafwaanane.
Ne efwe ng'ali, mu bung'ali khwanyoolile kumuruuru kwe bikholwa biefwe ne kakhali omundu yuno se akholile sisiindu siibi tawe.”
Nio aboolela Yesu ali, “Ne woola mu Bwami bwowo ukhebulile.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Khusuubisia ndi luno olaba alala nase mu Paratiso.”
Oli choola embi chisa sita che kumuusi, sisiilima siaamba khu sibala sioosi khukhwola chi saa tisa che kumuusi.
Mala epasia eye mu Lukaangu yatabukhamo bitonyi bibili.
Nio Yesu alila ne kumumilo kumurafu ali, “Paapa, nda kumwoyo kwase mu makhono kowo!” Oli aboola kano ekhilisia kumuuya mala akwiisia kumwoyo.
Omukhulu owe kamae abona kakekholeekhe, afumia Wele naloma ali, “Ng'ali omundu yuno se abeelekho ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.”
Ne babaandu boosi ba baaba ne babuusiisie alala khuloleelela nga babona kakekholeekhe, boosi barekukha bakobola chingo chabwe ne barere kamakhono kabwe emukoongo mu bubeeleli.
Ne boosi babamanya Yesu alala ne bakhasi babamuloondakho khukhwama Kalilaya bema sinao khuloleelela mala babona bibiindu bino bioosi.
Abao omundu mulala owalaangwa Yosefu khukhwama mu lukoba lwe Buyuda lwa Arimatea. Aaba mulala khu be kumuse, omundu omulayi lundi omuluungi.
Se afukiilisiana ne babasie mu bukhalaki bwabwe khu Yesu tawe, alindiililanga liliicha lie Bubwami bwa Wele.
Omundu yuno acha khu Pilato asaba amuelesie kumulaambo kwa Yesu.
Nio akurusia khu musalaba, akuulukusilia mu suuka eya katani, akusiikha mu ng'ani embia niyo aabeecha mu lwanda niyo yaba bakhasiikhamo omundu tawe.
Yaba endaalo eye khukhwerekekhera e sabato sikila e sabato yaba eli siimbi khurakikha.
Bakhasi ba baaba ne baloondile khu Yesu khukhwama e Kalilaya, bacha ne Yosefu, mala babona eng'ani lundi babona nga kumulaambo kwa Yesu ne kwasiikhwamo.
Bakhasi abo bakobola engo mala bang'oona bibiindu biunyanga bulayi ne kamafura kaunyanga bulayi khulwe kumulaambo kwa Yesu.
Baola mu Sabato khuloondekhana ne Lilaka.

Bakhasi bacha e siliindwa asibuyi mwichuma, basutile bibiindu biiunya bulayi chana nibio baba ne bang'oonile.
Banyoola libaale liapiringisiibwe liarurire emuliango we siliindwa.
Nga bengilamo se banyoolamo kumubili kwa Yesu tawe.
Nga baba ne basiiuka, babona babaandu babili babemao befwarire chingubo ching'enang'ena lukali.
Bakhasi abo baambwa buuri, benamikha bubweeni bwabwe bwetiila aasi, mala babaandu abo baabareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne muyiima omulamu mu bafu?
Se ali ano tawe, alamusiibwe. Khebulila niko aamuboolela enywe, ne asiili e Kalilaya ali,
‘Omwana wo Mundu khukhwola aanwe khu baandu babooni, abaambwe khu musalaba, mala enyuma we chindaalo chitaru alamukhe.’ ”
Bakhasi abo bakhebulila kamakhuwa ka Yesu,
bakobola engo khukhwama e siliindwa mala baboolela babeeka ekhumi na mulala ne babaandi boosi bibiindu bino bioosi.
Bakhasi abo ba baboolela barumwa bibiindu bino baba Maria Makatalena, Yoanina ne Maria maawe owa Yakobo, ne bakhasi babaandi.
Ne kakhali barumwa bebaasia bali niko bakhasi bababoolele kali ka busa mala khusuubila tawe.
Ne kakhali Petero enyokha mala atima acha e siliindwa enama mala abona esuuka eya katani yaulukuuswe, ne sisiindu se siabamo tawe. Mala akobola engo nauka busa kakekholeekhe.
Khu ndaalo eyo neng'ene baloondi ba Yesu babili baba balikho bacha mu sirekere sisialaangwa bali Emau, embi chi kilomita ekhumi na ndala khukhwama e Yerusalemu,
ne baba balikho balomaloma ke bibiindu bioosi bibiaba ne biekholekhe.
Nga baba ne balikho baapa embakha eyo, Yesu omwene echa aba siimbi mala akeenda nabo.
Bamubona ne kakhali se bamumanya tawe.
Yesu abareeba ali, “Mulikho mulomaloma siina nga mulakeendanga?”
Bema mala bubweeni bwabwe bwekesia bubeeleli.
Mulala khu nibo owalaangwa Kilefasi amureeba ali, “Ewe weng'ene niwe omukeni mu Yerusalemu okhamanyile bibiindu bibiikholekhemo mu ndaalo ndiiti chibirire chino tawe?”
Naye abareeba ali, “Biindu siina?” Bamukobosia bali, “Bibiindu bibiekholeekhe khu Yesu owa Nasareti.” Omundu yuno abele omung'oosi owe kamaani mu khukhola ne mu khuboola buli sisiindu ebweeni wa Wele ne babaandu boosi.
Basaayi bakhulu ne babaami befwe bamuana akhalakilwe lifwa, mala abaambwa khu musalaba.
Ne abele khweyikina khuli niye olionia Isiraeli! Luno eli endaalo eya khataru khukhwama nga kano ne kekholekha.
Khutasa khwako bakhasi balala be kumukaanda kwefwe bakhuukisie, bachile makhelebeende khu siliindwa,
ne se banyoolilemo kumubili kwewe tawe, bakoboole ne baboola bali, malaika ba babonekheele ne khubaboolela bali alamuukhe.
Balala khwifwe bachiile khu siliindwa mala banyoola busa bulayi bwene nga bakhasi abo ne baboolile, ne kakhali se baboonekho Yesu omwene tawe.
Nio Yesu ababoolela ali, “Enywe muli basilu sina? Muli kalaa khusuubila buli sisiindu nisio bang'oosi baloma!
Se lienyekha Kristo anyaasibwe mu biindu bino bioosi, mala engile mu luyali lwewe tawe ku?”
Nio Yesu abenooselia kakewe koosi kakaba ne kaboolwa mu maandiko, khurakikhira khu Musa ne bang'oosi boosi.
Ne nga boola siimbi a sirekere nisio baba ne balikho bachamo Yesu ekholesia nga owenya khubirao;
ne kakhali bamukhayilakho ne baloma bali, “Enyanga yakwile mala sisiilima silikho sitiila kona ano nafwe.” Nio acha nabo.
Ekhala a sialwa khulia nabo, abukula kumukaati mala apa orio; mala akumesulamo abaelesia.
Nio chimoni chabwe chekukha, bamanya bali ali Yesu niye. Mala atambao.
Bareebana bali, “Kimiooyo kiefwe se kiyilenge nga alomalomenge nafwe khu muila nakhwinooselia kamaandiko?”
Benyokha khangu bakobola e Yerusalemu, mala banyoola babeeka ekhumi na mulala bebuusiisie alala ne babaandi nibo baba nabo,
mala baababoolela bali, “Ng'ali Omwami aalamukhe! Aama khubonekhela Simoni!”
Babili abo babenooselia kakekholeekhe khu muila, lundi nga bamanyile bali Yesu niye namalile khubaelesia kumukaati.
Nga babili abo baba ne basibaboolela kano, Yesu omwene eema akari wabwe ababoolela ali, “kumuleembe kube nanywe.”
Besiindukha lundi baria lukali mala bebaasia bali baboone simakoombe.
Ne kakhali ababoolela ali, “Siina sikila ne mwesiindukha mala nemuayaaya mu miooyo kienywe.
Lola kamakhono kase ne bikele, mala mumanye muli niise samwene. Ndilekho mala mu manye, sikila simakoombe se sili ne kumubili ne bikuumba nga mubona ese nendi nabio tawe.”
Oli ababoolela kano, abekesia kamakhono kewe ne bikele.
Kakhaba kario se basuubila tawe sikila liliekhoya ne liuka, nio abareeba ali, “Mulikho ne siakhulia siosi siosi?”
Bamuelesia sitonye sie ng'eeni endeekhe,
niyo abukula mala alia mu moni chabwe.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Kano kali kamakhuwa kase niko nalomaloma khwinywe nga naba ne siili nanywe, ndi, buli siindu sisiaandikwa khwise mu Lilaka lia Musa ne mu maandiko ke bang'oosi ne chinyimbo khukhwola kechusibwe.”
Nio ekula kamebaasio kabwe bamanye kamaandiko,
mala ababoolela ali, “Kaandikwa kali, Kristo khukhwola anyaasibwe mala alamusibwe mu bafu enyuma we chindaalo chitaru,
mala mu lisina liewe burume khu liekanila ne khubeelwa khwe bubwoni bwilwachibwe khu kholo choosi, khurakikhira mu Yerusalemu.
Enywe muli baloli be bibiindu bino.
Ne lola ese samwene ndamurumira enywe nisio Paapa wase asuubisia. Ne khukhwola mu lindiilile mu lukoba nabwila nga kamaani khukhwama mwikulu ne kamwichakho.”
Nga aba nasibabiita chikhabi, abukhana nabo mala abukulwa khucha mwikulu.
Bamusaaya mala bakobola Yerusalemu ne liliekhoya likali,
mala siise siabwe sioosi bachiililila khuba mu lukaangu ne khu khupila Wele orio.

Mu khurakikha, Elomo aabao, mala Elomo aaba ne Wele, lundi Elomo aaba Wele.
Khukhwama mu khurakikha, Elomo aaba ne Wele.
Wele abuumba bibiindu bioosi khubirira mu niye, se siliio sisiindu na silala mu bibuumbe bioosi sisiakholwa niye ne akhaliio tawe.
Elomo aaba sinoko sie bulamu ne bulamu buno bwareera buwaanga mu baandu.
Buwaanga bukhosianga mu siilima ne sisiilima se siabuminyile tawe.
owecha khuboolela babaandu ke buwaanga, nio boosi baulile burume mala basuubile.
Niye omwene se aba buwaanga tawe; echa khuboola ke buwaanga.
Buno bwaba buwaanga bwa ng'ali, buwaanga bubwiicha mu sibala ne khukhosia khu buli mundu.
Elomo aaba mu sibala ne akhaba Wele ne abuumba sibala khubirira mu niye, sibala se siamumanya tawe.
Eecha mu sibala siewe sisiene ne kakhali babaandu bewe se bamwakaanila tawe.
Kakhaba kario balala bamwakaanila mala basuubila mu niye nio abaelesia bunyali bwe khuba babaana ba Wele.
Se baba ba Wele mu ngila eya busiele, eye khusaalwa nga babaana bo mundu tawe; Wele omwene niye owaba Raarawabwe.
Elomo oyo eekhola aaba Omundu mala eechula kumwalaalo ne bung'ali, aamenya mwifwe. Khwabona luyali lwewe, luyali nilwo anyoola nga Omwana Omuteelwa owa Paapa.
Niye Yoana aalomalomakho ali, “Yuno niye naloma ndi, ‘Alikho eecha enyuma wase, ne kakhali ali omukali khu khukhila ese sikila aabao ese ne khasaalwa tawe.’ ”
Akhubiitanga efwe fweesi chikhabi chingali khukhwama mu bwichufu bwe kumwalaalo kwewe.
Wele aana Lilaka khubirira khu Musa ne kakhali kumwalaalo ne bung'ali biechela mu Yesu Kristo.
Se aliio Omundu owabonakho Wele tawe, ne akhali Omwana ooli Wele, lundi ooli ne Paapa, omwene oyo niye oomanyisia Wele khwifwe.
Bayaudi be bunyali mu Yerusalemu baruma basaayi balala ne Balawi khu Yoana bamureebe bali, “Ewe niwe naanu?”
Yoana se aloba khu bakobosia tawe, ne kakhali alomaloma busa abuwaanga ali, “Ese se ndi Kristo tawe.”
Bamureeba bali, “Nono ewe niwe naanu? Ewe oli Elicha?” Yoana abakobosia ali, “Se ndi niye tawe.” Bamureeba bali, “Ewe niwe omung'oosi chana?” Abakobosia ali, “Tawe.”
Bamuboolela bali, “Nono khuboolele, Khwenyekha khukobosele bakhurumire likhuwa. Ewe wamwene welanga oli naanu?”
Yoana aabakobosia mu khurumikhira kamakhuwa niko omung'oosi Isaya aaloma:
“Ese ndi kumumilo kwo mundu oboola ne ali mu sichiimi ali,
‘Kololosia engila Omwami abirirekho.’ ”
Barumwa barumirwe ne Bafarisayo,
bareeba Yoana bali, “Waaba ne okhali Kristo, namwe Elicha namwe omung'oosi tawe, siina sikila ne obatiisia?”
Yoana aabakobosia ali, “Ese mbatiisia ne kameechi, ne kakhali omundu mulala aamwimilemo niye enywe mukhamanyile tawe.
Alikho echa enyuma wase, ne ese se nolaana aakhaba khukangulula biraaro biewe tawe.”
Kano koosi kakholekha mu Betania, ebukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, niio Yoana aabatiisilianga.
Endaalo eloondakho Yoana abona Yesu ne echa niio ali. Aloma ali, “Lola Limeeme lia Wele lirusiao bubwoni bwe sibala!
Yuno niye nalomalomengekho nga naboolile ndi, Omundu alikho echa enyuma wase, mala ali omukali khukhukhila ese, sikila abao ese ne khasaalwa tawe.
Ese samwene se namumanya tawe, ne kakhali necha ne mbatiisia ne kameechi nio mumanyisie niye khu baandu ba Isiraeli.”
Ne Yoana arusia buloli bwewe ali: “Nabona Roho ne eekha nga liuusi khukhwama mwikulu mala aamubaakho.
Naba siili khumanya ndi niye tawe, ne kakhali Wele, owanduma khubatiisia ne kameechi aba aambooleele ali, ‘Olabona Roho ne eekha khu mundu; Omundu oyo niye oobatiisia ne Roho Omutakatifu.’ ”
Yoana aloma ali, “Namuboone niye, lundi ndusia buloli ndi ali Omwana owa Wele.”
Endaalo eloondakho Yoana aba emile ao lundi ne babeeka bewe babili,
nga abona Yesu ne alikho aabira aaloma ali, “Lola, elio lili Limeeme lia Wele!”
Babeeka babili chana baaulila ne aloma kano mala baloonda khu Yesu.
Yesu ekhebukha ababona ne bamuloondilekho, mala abareeba ali, “Mulikho muyiima siina?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Rabii, omenyile waena?” (Likhuwa Rabii liboola lili, “Omwekisia.”)
Abakobosia ali, “Yiicha mubone.” (Chaba embi chisa ekhumi che ekolooba.) Nio bacha naye babona niio amenya mala bekhala naye endaalo eyo yoosi.
Mulala khwaabo aba Andereya wandaaye owa Simoni Petero.
Ao ne nao anyoola wandaaye Simoni mala amuboolela ali, “Khwanyoolile Masiiya.” (Masiiya liboola, “Kristo.”)
Mala ayila Simoni khu Yesu.
Yesu alola Simoni mala aloma ali, “Lisina liowo lili Simoni okhwa Yoana, ne kakhali okhalangwe Kefa.” (Lisina Kefa nilio Petero sifuno sialio “Lulwanda.”)
Endaalo eloondakho Yesu arura khucha Kalilaya. Anyoola Filipo mala amuboolela ali, “Nondekho!”
Filipo aba ama mu Betesaita, mu lukoba nimwo Andereya ne Petero bamenya.
Filipo anyoola Natanieli mala amuboolela ali, “Khwanyoolile oyo niye Musa aandikakho mu sitabu sie Lilaka, bang'oosi bosi baandika khu makhuwa kewe. Ali Yesu okhwa Yosefu, khukhwama e Nasareti.”
Natanieli naye areeba ali, “Silayi siosi siosi sinyala siama Nasareti ku?” Filipo akobosia ali, “Yiicha mala obone.”
Nga Yesu ne abona Natanieli namwichakho aboolela Natanieli ali, “Lola Omuisiraeli wa ng'ali okhalimo bubacha tawe!”
Natanieli amureeba ali, “Umanyile oriena?” Yesu akobosia ali, “Khubone nga obeele ne wikhaale aasi we kumutuli Filipo nakhakhulaanga tawe.”
Natanieli amukobosia ali, “Omwekisia, ewe oli Omwana owa Wele! Ewe oli Omwami owa Isiraeli!”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ewe osuubila sikila namakhuloma ndi khubone ne wikhaale aasi we kumutuli? Olabona bibiindu bikali biboofu khukhila lino!”
Mala ababoolela ali, Ndikho muboolela bung'ali mulabona likulu liekuukhe mala Malaika ba Wele baniina ne beekha khu Mwana wo Mundu.

Enyuma we chindaalo chibili, siselelo siaba mu lukoba lwa Kana e Kalilaya. Maawe owa Yesu abaayo.
Ne akhaba Yesu ne babeeka bewe beele bosi balaangiilwe mu siselelo esio.
Nga endali ne yawa maawe owa Yesu aboolela Yesu ali, “Endali yaweele.”
Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Maayi se kali bali khukhwola umboolele nisio khola tawe. Esaa yase ekhoola tawe.”
Mala maawe owa Yesu aaboolela bakholi ali, “Khola sisiindu siosi siosi nisio amuboolela.”
Bayaudi bali ne kamalaka ke kumwiima kwe khusaaba, ne khulwe sifuno sino chabao chinjikha sita che kamabaale, buli ndala yaba ne bubalaayi bwe khu bukula kamatepe karaano namwe sita.
Nio Yesu aboolela bakholi ali, “Yichusia chinjikha chino kameechi.” Bachichusia choola khu munwa,
mala aababoolela ali, “Nono khemutaekho kameechi chana matiiti muyilile Omwimeelesi owe naikara!” Bamuyilila kameechi,
kakaba luno ne keekelile endali mala aakichanjamakho, se amanya endali yino yamile waena tawe (ne kakhali bakholi babataa kameechi bamanya); nio aalaanga omwene siselelo
mala aamuboolela ali, “Buli mundu yesi yesi anyoanga anywesia endali endayi ne oli bakeni bekura ne aloondiakho musoka. Ne kakhali ewe obiikhile endali endayi lukali khukhwola siise sino!”
Kamayia kano kaba ke khunyoa niko Yesu akhola mu Kana e Kalilaya; ebweeneyo ekesia luyali lwewe mala babeeka bewe basuubila mu niye.
Enyuma wa kano, Yesu ne maawe ne bawandaaye ne babeeka bewe bacha Kaperinaumu bamenyakhoyo chindaalo ndiiti.
Ebweeneyo aanyoola babaandu mu Lukaangu ne balikho bakusia chieeyi, kamakheese ne kamauusi kamabaya. Akhaba bafunja chirupia bosi baba bekhale khu mesa chabwe.
Nio akhola kumusariti kwe chisia mala aloonda khangu kamakheese koosi ne chikhaafu biarura mu Lukaangu, afuumalikha chimesa che bafunja chirupia, mala asalanisia chirupia chabwe,
mala arusia lilaka khwaabo bakusia kamauusi kamabaya ali, “Karusie muno! Lekha khukhola enju eya Paapa khuba esooko!”
Babeeka bewe bakhebulila bali liiandike liboolanga lili, “Wele, silukuluku siase khu nju yowo sioselela mwise nga kumulilo.”
Bayaudi be bunyali bamukobosia ne lireeba bali, “Mayia siina niko onyala wakhola kakhwekesia efwe kali oli ne bunyali bwe khukhola kano?”
Bamureeba bali, “Lukaangu luno lwabukula kimiiko kamakhumi kane ne kikiindi sita khulwombakha! Mala ewe olalwombakha mu ndaalo chitaru?”
Ne kakhali Lukaangu nilwo Yesu alomalomangakho lwaba kumubili kwewe.
Nio nga alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa, babeeka bewe bakhebulila bali aloma lino, mala basuubila liiandiko nende niko Yesu alomanga.
Nga Yesu aba mu Yerusalemu mu ndaalo cha Naikara eye Pasaka, bakali basuubila mu niye nga babona kamayia niko akhola.
Ne kakhali Yesu se abasuubila tawe; sikila aba abamanya boosi.
Se enaana omundu yesi yesi amuboleele liiba lie babaandu tawe, sikila niye omwene amanya koosi kaali mu miooyo kiabwe.

Abao omwimeelesi owe Bayaudi owalaangwa Nikodemu. Aba owe kumukaanda kwe Bafarisayo.
Siilo silala aacha khu Yesu mala amuboolela ali, “Rabii khumanyile khuli ewe oli omwekisia owarumwa ne Wele. Se aliio omundu onyala khukhola kamayia niko ewe olakholanga Wele nakhali naye tawe.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali khuboolela ewe ndi, se aliio omundu onyala abona Bubwami bwa Wele nakhasaalilwe khabili tawe.”
Nikodemu amureeba ali, “Omundu omukhulu anyala asaalwa lundi ariena? Ng'ali sanyala engila munda mwa maawe asaalwa lwa khabili tawe!”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali khuboolela ewe ndi, se aliio onyala engila mu Bwami bwa Wele nakhasaalilwe khubirira mu meechi ne Roho tawe.
Sisaalwa mu mubili siama khu mubili, ne sisaalwa mu roho sili sia Roho.
Okhesiindukha tawe sikila nakhubooleele ndi khukhwola mweesi musaalwe lukhola khabili.
Ekhuungu euchanga niio yenyile; ewe oulila busa luyoka nilwo ekhola ne se omanya niio yaama namwe niio elikho echa tawe. Kali busa kario khu buli mundu osaalwa mu Roho.”
Nikodemu amureeba ali, “Kano kanyalikhana kariena?”
Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Ewe oli omwekisia omanyikhaane mu Isiraeli, mala se omanyile kano tawe?
Ng'ali khuboolela ewe ndi, khulomalomanga nilio khumanyile lundi khuboolanga niko khuboone, ne kakhali se aliio khwinywe owenya khufukiilila burume bwefwe tawe.
Namubooleele enywe ke bibiindu bie khu sibala sino ne kakhali se musuubila ese tawe, nono mulasuubila muriena ne muboolela ke bibiindu bie mwikulu?
Mbao omundu yesi yesi owaniina mwikulu tawe ne akhali Omwana wo Mundu owekha khukhwama mwikulu.
nio buli yesi yesi osuubila mu niye abe ne bulamu bwa mindali.
Sikila Wele aasiima sibala lukali mala aana Omwana wewe Omuteelwa, nio yesi yesi osuubila mu niye akhafwa tawe, ne kakhali abe ne bulamu bwa mindali.
Sikila Wele se aaruma Omwana wewe mu sibala khuuba Omukhalaki wasio tawe, ne kakhali abe Omuonia wasio.
“Yesi yesi oosuubila mu Mwana se akhalakilwa tawe, ne oyo okhasuubila tawe, aakhalakilwa khale, sikila se asuubila mu Mwana omuteelwa owa Wele tawe.
Ne bukhalaki buli buri: Buwaanga bwecha mu sibala, ne babaandu basiima sisiilima khukhila buwaanga sikila bikholwa biabwe bili bimayaanu.
Abo boosi bakhola bibiindu bimayaanu babiila buwaanga mala se bacha mu buwaanga tawe, sikila se benya bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu bibonekhe tawe.
Ne kakhali abo bakhola kaali ng'ali beecha mu buwaanga nio buwaanga bwoole khukhwekesia buli, niko bakholile kali ke buriaani khu Wele.”
Enyuma wa kano, Yesu ne babeeka bewe bacha mu ngoongo che Buyuda, amenyayo nabo khu siise sisiimbi ne abatiisia babaandu.
Yoana yesi abatiisilianga abuundu bali Anoni, embi ne sirekere sia Salimu, sikila kameechi kabao abwenao kamakali. Babaandu bamuchichangakho nababatiisia.
(Siise esio Yoana abeele akhareebwa mu siboe tawe.)
Balala khu beeka ba Yoana barakikha khuyingana no mundu we siyuda khu makhuwa ke kumwiima kwe khusaaba.
Nio bacha khu Yoana bamuboolela bali, “Omwekisia, okhebulila omundu owaba ne nawe e bukwe we luluuchi lwa Yoritani, niye walomaloma khu kewe? Lola luno yesi alikho abatiisia, mala buli mundu alikho amuloondakho.”
Yoana aabakobosia ali, “Se aliio omundu onyala aaba ne sisiindu siosi siosi Wele ne akhamueleesie tawe.
Enywe mwabeene muli baloli base nga naloma ndi, ‘Ese se ndi Kristo tawe, ne kakhali narumwa ebweeni wewe.’
Niye baakhiile niye omwene mwea; ne omusaale emangao arekeeresia, mala asangaala ne aulila kumumilo kwoyo niye baakhiile. Busangaafu bwase seesi bwichusibwa burio.
Khukhwola niye atase khuuba omukali ne ese ndase khuuba omutiiti.”
Oyo owicha khukhwama mwikulu ali omukali khukhila boosi. Oyo owama mu sibala ali owe sibala mala alomaloma kamakhuwa ke sibala, ne kakhali owicha khukhwama mwikulu ali angaaki wa boosi.
Alomanga niko aboone ne khuulila, ne se aliio ofukiilila burume bwewe tawe.
Ne kakhali omundu yesi yesi ofukiilila burume bwewe aandalasia ne nakano ali Wele wa ng'ali.
Omundu niye Wele arumire aboolanga kamakhuwa ka Wele, sikila Wele amuelesianga Roho wewe mubwichufu.
Paapa asiima Omwana wewe lundi ara buli sisiindu mu bunyali bwewe.
Omundu yesi yesi osuubila mu Mwana ali ne bulamu bwa mindali. Ne yesi yesi okharia Omwana, se aliba ne bulamu bwa mindali tawe, ne kakhali alimenya aasi we siiukuumo sia Wele.

Bafarisayo baulila bali Yesu ali ne babeeka bakali lundi abatiisiisie babaandu bakali khukhila Yoana.
(Kang'ali Yesu omwene se abatiisiakho omundu yesi yesi tawe, babeeka bewe bong'ene nibo ba babatiisianga.)
Nio nga Yesu aulila kakaba ne kalomwa arura e Buyuda akobola e Kalilaya,
khu lukeendo lwewe khukhwola beele abirire mu Samaria.
Esebele eya Yakobo yaba abwenao, ne Yesu aba aluile khu lukeendo mala ekhala a sebele. Yaba embi chisa sita che kumuusi.
Omukhasi Musamaria echa khutaa kameechi, mala Yesu amusaba ali, “Mbekho kameechi nywe.”
(Babeeka bewe baba bachiile mu lukoba khukula siakhulia.)
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Abanga omanyile nisio Wele aananga ne khumanya naanu olakhusabanga ewe kameechi, andi omusabile mala akhuelesia kameechi ke bulamu.”
Omukhasi chana aloma ali, “Omwami, se oli ne sisiindu sie khutailamo kameechi tawe, mala liloo lie sebele lileeyi. Olanyoola waena kameechi ke bulamu ako?
Kuuka wefwe Yakobo niye owakhuelesia efwe esebele yino; niye ne babaana bewe banywechanga muno alala ne bibiaayo biewe, wibaasia oli ewe omukali khukhila Yakobo?”
Nio Yesu amukobosia ali, “Omundu yesi yesi onywa kameechi kano, bulesia buli mulia lundi;
ne kakhali yesi yesi onywa kameechi niko khamuelesie, se aliba ne bulesia lundi tawe. Kameechi niko ndamuelesia kalaba emoni eye kameechi ke bulamu mu niye, mala kalamuelesia bulamu bwa mindali.”
Omukhasi chana amuboolela ali, “Omwami, mbekho kameechi chana ako nywe! Nio bulesia bukhandia lundi tawe, namwe khecha lundi khutaa ano kameechi tawe.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Khoche olaange omuseecha wowo mala okobole ano.”
Akobosia ali, “Se ndi no museecha tawe.” Yesu naye amukobosia ali, “Kali ng'ali khuloma oli se oli no museecha tawe.
Wachiile khu baseecha baraano ne akhaba omuseecha niye omenyile naye luno se ali owowo tawe. Khwako niko oloma kali ka ng'ali.”
Omukhasi chana aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami, mbona ndi ewe oli Omung'oosi.
Bakuuka base Basamaria basaayanga Wele khu sikulu sino, ne kakhali enywe Bayaudi muloma muli khukhwola khusaaye Wele ne khuli mu Yerusalemu.”
Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Mukhasi ewe, suubile ese, esaa eleecha, se mulasaaya Paapa ne muli khu sikulu sino namwe e Yerusalemu tawe.
Enywe Basamaria ng'ali se mumanyile niye musaayanga tawe; ne kakhali efwe Bayaudi khumanyile niye khusaayanga, sikila buonia bwama mu Bayaudi.
Ne kakhali esaa elikho yiicha mala niyo yino, khubirira mu maani ka Roho owa Wele babaandu bakhasaaye Paapa nga ne ali, bakhamusaaye niye mu bung'ali nga enya.
Wele ali Roho, ne abo bamusaaya khukhwola bamusaaye mu Roho ne mu bung'ali.”
Omukhasi oyo amuboolela ali, “Ese manyile ndi Kristo akheeche, ne nga akheeche alikhuboolela koosi.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Niise, olikho olomaloma ne nawe.”
Ao ne nao babeeka ba Yesu bakobola, mala bauka lukali nga bamunyoola ne alikho alomaloma no mukhasi. Ne kakhali se abao owareeba ali, “Wenya siina?” Namwe areeba Yesu ali, “Siina sikila ne olikho okachula naye?” Tawe.
Nio omukhasi chana alekha esoongo akobola mu lukoba, mala aboolelayo babaandu ali,
“Yiicha mubone Omundu oumbooleele buli siindu nisio nakhola. Sanyala aaba nali Kristo tawe ku?”
Khwako barura mu lukoba bacha niio Yesu aba.
Mu siise sienesio babeeka baba balikho bekoonjelela Yesu bali, “Omwekisia liakho siakhulia!”
Ne kakhali abakobosia ali, “Ndi ne siakhulia nisio enywe mukhamanyile tawe.”
Nio babeeka barakikha khureebana bali, “Wakana omundu amurereere siakhulia?”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Siakhulia siase sili khukhola lilienya lioyo owanduma ne khumala kimilimo nikio ambelesia khukhola.
Mulomanga muli, ‘Kiaramire kimieesi kine nio likesa liole.’ Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe ndi, loleelesia chisaambu bulayi; luno bibiaamo biaalabile mala biolile likesa!
Omundu okesa anyoola kumuruungo lundi abuta kamatuunda ke bulamu bwa mindali, khwako omiicha nende okesa boosi bekhoyela.
Lusimo luboola ng'ali luli, ‘Omundu mulala amiicha, okundi aakesa.’
Namurumire enywe khukesa biakhulia mu masaamba niko mukhakholamo kimilimo tawe. Babaandi bakholamo, mala enywe mwanyoolile bukhala khukhwama khu milimo kiabwe.”
Basamaria bakali mu lukoba olwo basuubila mu Yesu sikila omukhasi oyo aba aboolile ali, “Amboleele buli siindu nisio nakhola.”
Nio nga Basamaria chana ne beecha khu Yesu bamwikoonjelela amenye nabo, mala Yesu abaayo chindaalo chibili.
Basamaria babaandi bakali basuubila sikila burume bwa Yesu.
Mala baboolela omukhasi chana bali, “Luno khwasuubiile ne se lili sikila niko ewe okhuboolele tawe, ne kakhali fwabeene khwamuuliile niye Omwene, mala khwamanyile khuli ng'ali ali Omuonia owe sibala.”
Enyuma we khubayo chindaalo chibili, Yesu arekukha mala acha Kalilaya.
Sikila Yesu omwene aba aalomile ali, “Omung'oosi sanyoolanga liria mu sibala siewe tawe.”
Babaandu ba Kalilaya bamwakaanila nga ne olayo sikila baba bakoboole khukhwama mu Naikara eye Pasaka mu Yerusalemu mala baba babone buli siindu nisio aaba nakholile mu ndaalo cha Naikara echo.
Nga naulila ali Yesu echile Kalilaya khukhwama e Buyuda, amuchakho, amusaba ali ache Kaperinaumu aonie omwana wewe owaba siimbi khufwa.
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Se aliio khwinywe olisuubila nakhaboone kamayia ne kamakhuwa ke khuukia tawe.”
Omwimeelesi oyo amukobosia ali, “Omwami khuche fwembi omwana wase nakhafwa tawe.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Khoche omwana wowo alamenya!” Omundu oyo asuubila kamakhuwa ka Yesu mala aacha.
Oli ali khu lukeendo acha engo, bakholi bewe bamwakaanila ne likhuwa bali, “Omwana wowo aonile!”
Aabareeba esaa niyo aonelemo, mala bamukobosia bali, “Aaonile likolooba esaa eya saba kumuusi.”
Nio raraawe aakhebulila ali yabeele esaa ng'eneyo ne ng'ene niyo Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Omwana wowo alamenya.” Khwako niye nende be nju yewe boosi basuubila.
Kano kaba kamayia ke khabili niko Yesu akhola enyuma we khukhwicha Kalilaya khukhwama e Buyuda.

Enyuma wa kano, Yesu acha Yerusalemu mu Naikara eye dini eye Bayaudi.
Mu Yerusalemu embi ne silibwa silaangwa sie kamakheese, litiisi liliio lili ne bilibwa biraano, litiisi lino mu Lueburania lilaangwa “Betisaata.”
Babaandu balwaale bakali, babofu, baleme ne babafwokoya bakonaanga khu luuya lwe bilibwa ebio. [Balindiililanga kameechi kasiubulukhe
sikila buli khase malaika wo Mwami ekhanga mwitiisi omwo mala akhola kameechi kasiubulukha. Abele omulwale onyoa khukhwetumbula mwitiisi elio kameechi ne kasiubulukha aona khukhwama khu bulwaale bwosi bwosi nibwo aba nabwo.]
Omundu abao owaba omulwale khu miiko kamakhumi kataru na munaane.
Yesu amubona ne akonileo, mala aamanya ali, omundu oyo aalwalile khu siise sileeyi sirio. Aamureeba ali, “Eku, wenya oone?”
Omulwale aamukobosia ali, “Omwami se ndi no mundu oundumbula mwitiisi kameechi ne kasiubulukha tawe, omundu okundi anyoanga olamo ese ne sikhaka khukwamo.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha, obukule kumukeeka kwowo mala okeende.”
Ao ne nao omundu oyo aona; abukula kumukeeka kwewe mala arakikha khukeenda. Kano kekholekha endaalo eya Sabato,
nio Bayaudi be bunyali baboolela omundu niye Yesu aonia oyo bali, “Yino eli e Sabato mala Lilaka liefwe se lifukiilila ewe khusuta kumukeeka tawe.”
Omundu oyo abakobosia ali, “Omundu oumboniisie amboleele khu bukula kumukeeka kwase mala ndekukhe.”
Bamureeba bali, “Naanu okhuboolele khukhola orio?”
Ne omundu niye Yesu aonia oyo se amanya Yesu aba naanu tawe, sikila babaandu bakali baba abuundu ao, mala Yesu amitiokha busa.
Enyuma wako Yesu amunyoola mu Lukaangu mala amuboolela ali, “Rekeeresia, ewe luno waonile, nono lekha khukhola bubwoni, busa siindu siibi lukali sinyala siakhwikholekhakho.”
Nio omundu chana arekukha mala acha aboolela Bayaudi be bunyali ali, Yesu niye waba namuoniisie.
Nio barakikha khu khupia Yesu siibi, sikila aonisie khu ndaalo eya Sabato.
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Buli lwosi Paapa wase akholanga kimilimo mala khukhwola sesi khole.”
Liboola lino liakhola Bayaudi be bunyali bakhaka lukali khumwiira, se khuli khufunaka Lilaka lie Sabato khwong'ene tawe, ne kakhali aba alomile ali Wele ali Raraawe omwene, ne mu ngila ng'eneyo elekhaasia khu Wele.
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, Omwana sanyala akhola sisiindu siosi siosi khu bwewe tawe, akhola nisio abonanga Raraawe nakhola siong'ene. Nisio Paapa akhola nisio Omwana yesi akhola.
Sikila Paapa asiima Omwana mala amwekesia bibiindu bioosi nibio omwene akholanga. Paapa alamwekesia niye bibiindu biboofu bie khukhola khukhila bino mala enywe mwesi mulauka.
Nga Paapa nalamusianga bafu ne khubaelesia bulamu, mu ngila ng'eneyo Omwana aananga bulamu khwaabo nibo enya khuelesia.
Paapa omwene sakhalakilanga omundu yesi yesi tawe. Aelesia Omwana wewe bunyali bwosi khukhalaka.
Nio boosi barie Omwana wewe mu ngila neng'ene nga barichanga Raraawe. Omundu yesi yesi okharia Omwana tawe, saria Raraawe owamuruma tawe.
“Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, abo baulila kamakhuwa kase ne khusuubila muyo owanduma, bali ne bulamu bwa mindali. Se balikhalakilwa tawe, ne kakhali babira khale mu lifwa bacha mu bulamu.
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali, esaa elikho yiicha, esaa chana yoolile khale, bafu bakhaulile kumumilo kwo Mwana owa Wele mala abo bakhaulile bakhalamukhe.
Nga Paapa omwene ne ali niye bulamu bwaakukhakho, mu ngila neng'ene akhola Omwana wewe khuba niye bulamu bwaakukhakho.
Khwako aelesia Omwana bunyali bwe khukhalaka, sikila ali Omwana wo Mundu.
Mukhauka sikila kano tawe; esaa elikho yiicha niyo bafu boosi bakhaulile kumumilo kwewe
mala barure mu biliindwa biabwe. Abo babakhola kamalayi bakhalamukhe mala bamenye, ne kakhali abo babakhola kamabi bakhalamukhe mala bakhalakilwe.
“Se nyala khukhola siindu siosi siosi khu bunyali bwase samwene tawe, ese khalaka busa nga Wele ne ambooleele khwako likhalaka liase lili ng'ali, sikila se ndakhakanga khukhola niko nenya tawe, ne kakhali niko oyo wanduma ese enya.
“Ne ndusia buloli khwise samwene, buloli bwase se bunyala bwafukiililwa khuuba bwe bung'ali tawe.
Ne kakhali omundu okundi aliio orusia buloli khwise nga abeele samwene ne ndusia, mala manyile ndi niko aloma khwise kali ka ng'ali.
Mwaruma barumwa khu Yoana, mala Yoana arusia buloli khu bung'ali.
Se kali bali khukhwola mbe ne buloli khukhwama khu mundu tawe; ndoma kano nio mwole khuonisibwa.
Yoana aba nga etaa eburukha ne khukhosia, mala mwafukiilila khulwe siise khukhwikhoyela buwaanga bwewe.
Ne kakhali ese ndi ne buloli khwise samwene, buli buboofu khukhila buloli nibwo Yoana arusia. Niko ese khola, kali niko Paapa wase anduma khukhola, karusia buloli khwise, mala kekesia kali Paapa andumire ese.
Paapa owanduma chana yesi arusia buloli khwise samwene nga abele ese ne ndusia. Se mwaulilakho kumumilo kwewe namwe mwabona bubweeni bwewe tawe,
ne se mubikhanga burume bwewe mu miooyo kienywe tawe, sikila se mwasuubila mu mundu niye aruma tawe.
Mumenieelesia Kamaandiko, sikila mwibaasia muli mulanyoolamo bulamu bwa mindali. Ne Kamaandiko kano ne kamene kaboola khwise,
mala se mufukiilila khukhwicha khwise nio mube ne bulamu tawe.
“Se ndayimanga efuma khukhwama khu baandu tawe.
Ne kakhali ese mumanyile enywe muli baandu ba lukano siina, manyile ndi se mwasiima Wele mu miooyo kienywe tawe.
Ese nechile ne bunyali bwa Paapa wase, ne se mwanjakaaniile tawe, ne omundu okundi ne echa ne bunyali bwewe omwene mulamwakaanila.
Enywe mwasiima khufumisiana, ne kakhali se mukhaka khunyoola efuma khukhwama khu mulala yeng'ene oli Wele tawe, nono aba, mulasuubila ese muriena?
Kakhaba kario, mukhebaasia muli ese oli musitaka enywe khu Paapa wase tawe. Musa niye mwaramo lilieyikina lienywe, oyo niye oli musitaka enywe.
Abanga ng'ali mwasuubila Musa, andi mwasuubiile ese, sikila Musa aandika khwise.
Ne sikila se musuubila niko aandika tawe, munyala mwasuubila muriena niko ese ndoma?”

Enyuma wa kano, Yesu ambukha Enyanja eya Kalilaya (lundi elaangwa bali Tiberia.)
Babaandu bakali bamuloondakho sikila baba baboone kamayia kewe ke khuonia balwale.
Yesu aniina khu sikulu mala ekhala aasi ne babeeka bewe.
Siise sia Naikara eye Pasaka siaba sili siimbi.
Yesu alola eyi neyi mala abona babaandu bakali ne balikho becha niio ali, nio areeba Filipo ali, “Khunyala khwakula wae siakhulia sisioola khuliisia babaandu bano boosi?”
(Aloma kano khukhaka Filipo, ng'ali aba amanyile khale nisio alakhola.)
Filipo amukobosia ali, “Kenyekhana khube ne chirupia chibira chimia chibili khukula siakhulia, nio buli mundu anyoolekho sitiiti.”
Mulala khu beeka bewe, Andereya, owaba wandaaye owa Simoni Petero aboola ali,
“Omwana omusoleeli ali ano ne kimikaati kiraano kie eshayiri ne ching'eeni chibili. Kakhaba kario se binyala biola babaandu bano boosi tawe!”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Yikhasia babaandu aasi. Nio babaandu boosi bekhala aasi.” Be siseecha baba embi chielefu chiraano.
Nio Yesu abukula kimikaati, apa orio khu Wele, mala aelesia babaandu ba baba ne bekhaleo. Akhola ario akhaba ching'eeni, mala boosi balia nga beenya.
Oli boosi bekura aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Buusia bitonyi biramire bioosi, mukhabisaakaniakho tawe.”
Nio babibuusia bioosi mala bechusia bikono ekhumi na bibili khukhwama khu mikaati kie shayiri nikio babaandu balia ekio.
Nga babaandu bao babona kamayia niko Yesu akhola baboola bali, “Ng'ali yuno ali Omung'oosi owaba owicha mu sibala!”
Yesu amanya ali baba siimbi khukhwicha bamutiile bamuelesie bubwami ne kamaani, nio acha mu sikulu yeng'ene.
Oli ekolooba, babeeka ba Yesu beekha sia nyanja,
baniina mu liaaro mala barakikha khukhwambukha enyanja bache Kaperinaumu. Siilo siola Yesu nakhakobola niio bali tawe.
Khu siise sienesio ekhuungu engali yaba elikho euucha ne ekhola bibuli khu meechi.
Babeeka baba bafukile liliaaro chi kilomita chiraano namwe sita, mala babona Yesu nakeenda khu meechi ne echa siimbi ne liliaaro, baria lukali po.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Mukharia tawe niise!”
Mala bafukiilila khu mwakaanila khu liaaro ne khangu liliaaro liola khu sikiingi abuundu niio baba ne balikho bacha.
Endaalo eloondakho babaandu bakali babarama sikelekha babona bali liliaaro lilala liong'ene liliabao. Bamanya bali Yesu se achiile ne babeeka bewe tawe, baba bachiile bong'ene.
Kaamaro kakaandi khukhwama Tiberia kecha khu sikiingi siimbi ne abuundu niio babaandu abo baliila kimikaati enyuma wo Mwami khu khupila Wele orio.
Nga babaandu bakali abo ne babona bali Yesu ne babeeka bewe se baliio tawe, baniina mu maaro mala bacha Kaperinaumu khu muyiima.
Nga babaandu banyoola Yesu e sikelekha, bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia wolile ano chisa chinga?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi, mulikho mumbenja sikila mwaliile kimikaati mwekura seli sikila mwamanyile sifuno sie kamayia kase tawe.
Mukhakholela kimilimo siakhulia sinyala siabola tawe, ne kakhali kholela siakhulia simenya khulwe bulamu bwa mindali. Sino sili siakhulia nisio Omwana wo Mundu akhamuelesie, sikila Wele, Paapa amurakho simanyilo siewe sie khumufukiilila.”
Nio bamureeba bali, “Khukhola siina nio khukhole niko Wele enya khukhole?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Niko Wele enya enywe mukhole kali khusuubila mu Mundu niye aruma.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Mayia siina niko ewe olakhola nio khubone mala khukhusuubile? Olakhola siina?
Bakuuka befwe balia mana mu sichiimi, nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili, ‘Wele abaelesia kumukaati khukhwama mwikulu balie.’ ”
Yesu aababoolela ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali kumukaati nikwo Musa amuelesia enywe se kwaba kumukaati khukhwama mwikulu tawe; Paapa wase niye omuelesianga enywe kumukaati kwa ng'ali khukhwama mwikulu.
Sikila kumukaati nikwo Wele aananga kuli oyo owama mwikulu mala aana bulamu khu sibala.”
Bamusaba bali, “Omwami khuelesie kumukaati kuno buli lwosi.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ese niise kumukaati kwe bulamu. Abo babecha khwise se baliba ne njala tawe; abo basuubila mwise se baliba ne bulesia tawe.
“Ne kakhali ese muboolela enywe ndi mwamboone mala se musuubila tawe;
boosi nibo Paapa wase amba balanjichila. Se ndi timania yesi yesi ounjichakho tawe.
Sikila se necha khukhwama mwikulu khukhola lilienya liase samwene tawe, ne kakhali lilienya lioyo owanduma.
Lili lilienya lioyo owanduma ese, bali, khatibia yesi yesi khwaabo boosi nibo ambelesia tawe; ne kakhali mbalamusie khu ndaalo emaliilisi.
Nisio Paapa wase enya sili bali, boosi babona Omwana ne khumusuubila babe ne bulamu bwa mindali, mala ndibalamusia khu ndaalo emaliilisi.”
Babaandu barakikha khu khweng'ulung'unya, sikila aaloma ali, “Ese ndi kumukaati kukwekha khukhwama mwikulu.”
Nio baloma bali, “Omundu yuno se ali Yesu okhwa Yosefu tawe ku? Khumanyile raraawe ne maawe. Nono aloma ariena ali ekha aasi khukhwama mwikulu?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe lekha khu khweng'ulung'unya.
Se aliio omundu onyala echa khwise Paapa owanduma ese nakhamureerire khwise tawe; mala khu ndaalo emaliilisi ndimulamusia.
Bang'oosi baandika bali, ‘Buli mundu aliekisibwa ne Wele.’ Buli mundu oulila ka Paapa ne khukhweyika khu niye echa khwise.
Lino se liboola lili omundu yesi yesi aabona Paapa tawe, ne kakhali oyo owama khu Wele yeng'ene niye owabona Paapa.
Ndikho muboolela enywe bung'ali. Oyo osuubila, ali ne bulamu bwa mindali.
Ese ndi kumukaati kwe bulamu.
Bakuuka benywe balia mana mu sichiimi, ne kakhaba kario bafwa.
Ne kumukaati kukwikha khukhwama mwikulu kuli kwe lukano luluundi, yesi yesi nakulia salifwa tawe.
Ese ndi kumukaati kwe bulamu kukwekha khukhwama mwikulu. Omundu yesi yesi aba nalia kumukaati kuno, alimenya mindali na mindali. Kumukaati nikwo ndamuelesia kuli kumubili kwase nikwo mbaana khulwe bulamu bwe sibala.”
Kano kakholeelesia kamayiingamo akari wabwe. Bareeba bali, “Omundu yuno anyala ariena khukhuelesia efwe kumubili kwewe khulie?”
Yesu aababoolela ali, “Ese ndikho muboolela enywe bung'ali! Mwaba ne mukhalia kumubili kwo Mwana wo Mundu ne khunywa kamafuki kewe, se mulaba ne bulamu mwinywe tawe.
Abo balia kumubili kwase ne khunywa kamafuki kaase bali ne bulamu bwa mindali, mala khabalamusie khu ndaalo emaliilisi.
Sikila kumubili kwase ne kamafuki bili siakhulia sia ng'ali.
Omundu yesi yesi olia kumubili kwase ne khunywa kamafuki kase, amenyile mwise, ne ese menyile mu niye.
Paapa oomenyile anduma ese, ne sesi menyile sikila niye. Mu ngila ng'eneyo yesi yesi olia kumubili kwase alamenya sikila ese.
Nono kuno kuli kumukaati kukwekha aasi khukhwama mwikulu; se kuli nga kumukaati nikwo bakuuka benywe balia mala bakelao bafwa tawe. Omundu olia kumukaati kuno alamenya mindali na mindali.”
Yesu alomaloma kano nga aba ne ekisia mu sinakooki mu Kaperinaumu.
Baloondi bewe bakali baulila kano mala baloma bali, “Kamekisio kano kali kamaandalafu lukali. Naanu onyala wakarekeeresia?”
Yesu amanya ali balikho belung'unya khulwa kano, akhaba nakhabolelwa tawe nio abareeba ali, “Kano kakilile mufwa kimiooyo?
Kalaba kariena nono ne mubona Omwana wo Mundu naniina niio aba khale?
Roho owa Wele niye oanaanga bulamu; bunyali bwo Mundu se buli na siosi tawe. Kamakhuwa niko nama khu muboolela enywe kano kali Roho lundi bulamu.
Ne kakhaba kario balala khwinywe se basuubila tawe.” (Yesu amanya khukhwama mu khurakikha balala siina bakhalisuubila tawe, ne mulala siina olimuchaama.)
Mala atasakho ali, “Sino nisio sifuno sisiakila ne muboolela enywe ndi, se aliio onyala echa khwise Paapa nakhakholile kanyalikha tawe.”
Baloondi ba Yesu bakali beela enyuma khulwe kamakhuwa kano mala khukeenda naye lundi tawe.
Nio areeba babeeka ekhumi na babili ali, “Ne enywe, mwesi mwenya murekukhe?”
Simoni Petero amukobosia ali, “Omwami khuche khu naanu? Ewe oli ne kamakhuwa ke bulamu bwa mindali.
Ne luno khwasuubiile mala khwamanyile khuli ewe oli Omutakatifu, oyo wichile khukhwama khu Wele.”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Ese namurobora enywe ekhumi na babili, ne mulala khwinywe se ali Sietani?”
Alomalomanga ka Yuda, okhwa Simoni Isikarioti. Sikila akhaba Yuda naaba mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili, aba alikho acha khumuchaama.

Enyuma wa kano, Yesu akeenda eyi ne neyi mu Kalilaya; se enya khukeenda e Buyuda tawe, sikila Bayaudi be bunyali ebweeneyo benyanga khumwiira.
Siise sia Naikara eye Bisali siaba siimbi,
nio bawandaaye ba Yesu bamuboolela bali, “Rura ano oche e Buyuda, nio babeeka bowo babone bibiindu nibio olikho okhola.
Se aliio Omundu okisanga niko alikho akhola aaba neenya amanyikhane tawe. Sikila olakholanga bibiindu bino, yeyekesia khu sibala sioosi!”
Akhaba bawandaaye se basuubila mu niye tawe.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Siise siase sikhoola tawe. Ne biise bienywe biliio buli lwosi.
Sibala se sinyala siamubiila enywe tawe, ne kakhali simbiila ese, sikila buli lwosi ese siboolelanga ndi chingila chasio chili chimbi.
Enywe mwabene khemuche sia naikara. Ese se ndikho nja sia naikara yino tawe, sikila biise biase bikhoola tawe.”
Aloma kano, mala arama mu Kalilaya.
Enyuma we bawandaaye khucha sia naikara, Yesu yesi abaloondakho mu bwikisi.
Bayaudi be bunyali baba balikho bamuenja sia naikara. Bareebanga bali, “Ali waena?”
Babaandu beng'ulung'unya lukali mu mukhung'aano. Balala bali, “Ali omundu omulayi.” Babaandi bali “Tawe, alikho atiimia babaandu.”
Ne se abao omundu owalomaloma ka Yesu abuwaanga busa tawe, sikila baria Bayaudi be bunyali.
Nga naikara yaba siimbi khukhwola akari, Yesu acha mu Lukaangu mala arakikha khukhwikisia.
Bayaudi be bunyali bauka lukali, mala baloma bali, “Omundu yuno amanyile kamakali ariena mala se asomelakho kano tawe?”
Nio Yesu abakobosia ali, “Kamekisio niko nekisia se kali kakaase samwene tawe, kaama khu Wele owanduma.
Omundu yesi yesi osiima khukhola niko Wele enya alamanya niko ese nekisianga, ne kali kakamanga khu Wele namwe ne ndomalomanga busa khu bunyali bwase samwene.
