Omundu olomaloma khu bunyali bwewe omwene akhaka khukhwenyoolela luyali omwene. Ne kakhali owenya luyali luchiile oyo owamuruma ali omusuubilwa, ne sisiindu siosi siosi sikhali sia ng'ali se simulimo tawe.
“Musa se amuelesia enywe Lilaka? Ne se aliio khwinywe oria Lilaka chana tawe. Siina sikila enywe ne mulakhakanga khu khunjira?”
Babaandu chana bamukobosia bali, “Oli ne sisieeno! Naanu olakhakanga khukhwira ewe?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Nakhola kamayia lulala, mala enywe mweesi mwauka.
Musa amulakiilisia mukhebe babaana benywe basoleeli (Akhaba kario se ali Musa owarakikha tawe ne kakhali bakuuka benywe) khwako mukheba omwana khu ndaalo eye Sabato.
Kaaba bali omwana akhebwa mu Sabato nio Lilaka lia Musa likhafunakwa tawe, siina sikila ne muambwa lirima sikila ese naoniisie omundu mu Sabato?
Mukhakhalakila omundu khuloondekhana nga abonekha busa tawe, khalaka mu bung'ali.”
Babaandu ba Yerusalemu balala baloma bali, “Omundu yuno se ali niye be bunyali balakhakanga khukhwira?
Bona! Alikho alomalomela busa mu baandu mala se baboolakho likhuwa liibi khu niye tawe! Kanyala khuba ka ng'ali be bunyali bano bamanyile bali niye Kristo?
Akhaba kario nga Kristo naliicha, se aliio omundu olimanya niio amile tawe. Ne fweesi khumanyile niio omundu oyo ama.”
Nga Yesu ne aba ne ekisia mu Lukaangu aboola mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Enywe ng'ali mu manyile ese ne khumanya niio naama ku? Se necha khulwe bunyali bwase samwene tawe. Oyo owanduma ese ali Omusuubilwa. Enywe se mu mumanyile tawe,
ne ese mumanyile, sikila nama khu niye lundi anduma ese.”
Nio bakhaka khumuaamba, ne kakhali se aliio owamutiilakho tawe, sikila esaa yewe yaba ekhoola tawe.
Ne bakali mu sipupu basuubila mu niye mala baloma bali, “Nga Kristo aliicha alikhola kamayia kamakali khukhila niko omundu yuno akholile ku?”
Bafarisayo baulila babaandu mu mukhung'aano ne balikho bemoonya bibiindu bino khu Yesu, nio nibo ne basaayi bakhulu baruma balala khu baliindi khu muaamba.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Ese siilikho nanywe akeekhe ari busa, mala ndarekukha nje woyo owanduma.
Muliimbenja, ne se muliinyoola tawe, sikila se munyala khucha niio ese khabe tawe.”
Bayaudi be bunyali bareebana bali, “Enya khucha waena niio khukhamunyoola tawe? Alacha mu ngoba che Bakiriki niio babaandu befwe bamenya mala ekisie Bakiriki?
Aloma ali khulamuenja mala se khulamunyoola tawe, lundi bali se khunyala khucha niio aliba tawe, kano kaboola siina?”
Nga liiandiko ne liboola, ‘Omundu yesi yesi osuubila mwise, chinjichi che kameechi kaana bulamu chilamiilila mu mwoyo kwewe.’ ”
Yesu aloma kano khu Roho Omutakatifu, niye abo basuubila mu Yesu bakhanyoole. Mu siise esio Roho aba asiili khuanwa sikila Yesu aba akhalamukha khukhwama mu lifwa ne khuebwa luyali tawe.
Babaandu balala mu sipupu bamuulila naboola kano mala baloma bali, “Omundu yuno ng'ali ali omung'oosi!”
Babaandi baloma bali, “Yuno Kristo!” Ne kakhali babaandi nabo bali, “Kristo saliama Kalilaya tawe!
Liiandiko liboola lili Kristo aliba we lisaaye lio mwami Daudi mala alisaalwa mu Betelehemu mu lukoba nilwo Daudi amenyangamo.”
Nio Yesu akila embuliilisiani khuba mu baandu abo tawe.
Balala benya bamuambe, ne sabao omundu namulala owamutiilakho tawe.
Nga baliindi bakobolayo, basaayi bakhulu ne Bafarisayo babareeba bali, “Siina sikila ne mukhamureerire?”
Baliindi babakobosia bali, “Omundu akhabakhoo olomaloma nga omundu yuno tawe!”
Bafarisayo babareeba bali, “Amusilwaasiisie akhaba enywe mwesi?
Enywe mwamanyakho akhaba mulala khu be bunyali namwe mulala khu Bafarisayo owasuubila mu niye ku?
Sipupu sino se simanyile Lilaka lia Musa tawe, khwako bali aasi we silaamo sia Wele!”
“Khuloondekhana ne Lilaka liefwe, se khunyala khukhalakila omundu ne khukhamuulila mala khwamenieelesia nisio akholile tawe.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Bulayi, wesi khane waama Kalilaya? Menielesia kamaandiko olabona oli omung'oosi se akhamekho e Kalilaya tawe.”
[
Mala buli mundu aloota ewewe,

Ne kakhali Yesu acha khu sikulu sia Miseituni.
Mumakhelebeende aakobola mu Lukaangu. Babaandu boosi bamukara; mala ekhala aasi arakikha khubeyikia.
Baandiki ne Bafarisayo bareera omukhasi niye banyoola mu bueeyi, mala bamwimisia ebweeni wabwe boosi.
Bareeba Yesu bali, “Omwekisia, omukhasi yuno anyoolekhe ne alikho akhola bueeyi.
Mu Lilaka liefwe Musa alaka ali omukhasi nga yuno ari khukhwola apwe kamabaale afwe. Ne, ewe oloma oli siina?”
Baboola kano khukhaka Yesu, nio banyoole engila eye khumuyaala. Ne kakhali Yesu enama aasi mala aandika mwiloba ne lulwala lwewe.
Nga bemao ne balikho bamureeba kamareeba, akololokha mala ababoolela ali, “Omundu yesi yesi khwinywe okhakholakho bubwoni tawe, abe owe khunyoa khumuchukucha libaale!”
Enama lundi mala aandika aasi.
Nga ne baulila kano boosi barakikha khurekukha sia mulala khukhwamila khu bakhulu. Balekhao Yesu yeng'ene no mukhasi chana oyo ne emile ao.
Yesu akololokha mala amureeba ali, “Bali wae? Se aliio na mulala oramireo khu khukhalakila tawe?”
Omukhasi chana amukobosia ali, “Omwami salikhoo tawe.”
Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Bulayi nono, akhaba ese se khukhalakila tawe. Khoche ne okhakhola lundi bubwoni tawe.”]
Bafarisayo bamuboolela bali, “Nono ewe olikho orusia buloli bwowo wamwene, niko oloma se kafukiililwa tawe.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Tawe, akhaba ne mboola kakaase samwene niko mboola kali ng'ali sikila manyile niio naama nende niio ndikho nja. Enywe se mumanyile niio naama, namwe niio ndikho nja tawe.
Mukhalaka likhalaka mu ngila eye kamebaasio ke babaandu. Ese se khalakila omundu yesi yesi tawe.
Ne abanga bali khola ndio, andi likhalaka liase lili ng'ali, sikila se ndi seng'ene mu khukhola ndio tawe, Paapa owanduma ali ne nase
kaandikwa mu Lilaka lienywe bali, buloli bwe babaandu babili bwaaba ne bufukiilisiana, aba nilio baboola lili lia ng'ali.
Ese ndusia buloli khwise samwene ne Paapa owanduma yesi ambambila engubo.”
Bamureeba bali, “Raraao ali wae?” Yesu abakobosia ali, “Se mumanyile ese namwe Paapa wase tawe. Abanga bali mwamanya ese andi akhaba Paapa yesi mwamumanya.”
Yesu aboola kano koosi nga ekisia mu Lukaangu, mu lusiro lwe khubiikha kamasanduku ke siianwa. Ne se aliio owamuaamba tawe, sikila esaa yewe yaba ekhoola tawe.
Yesu ababoolela lundi ali, “Ndarekukha nje ne enywe mulambiima mala mulafwila mu bwoni bwenywe. Se munyala mwacha niio ndikho nja tawe.”
Nio Bayaudi be bunyali baloma bali, “Aloma ali se khunyala khucha niio alikho acha tawe. Aba lino liboola lili aleyira omwene?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe muli be aasi ano ne ese naama angaaki. Enywe mwama khu sibala sino, ne ese se naama khu sibala sino tawe.
Ako niko kakila ne muboolela enywe ndi mulifwila mu bwoni bwenywe. Mala mulifwila mu bwoni bwenywe ne mukhasuubile muli, ‘Ese Niye’ tawe.”
Nio bamureeba bali, “Ewe naanu?” Yesu abakobosia ali, “Niko mubooleele khukhwama mu khurakikha.
Ndi ne kamakali niko mboola khwinywe, kamakali ke khumukhalakila. Ne kakhaba kario owanduma ese ali omusuubilwa ne ese mboolela sibala niko naulila khukhwama khu niye kong'ene.”
Se bamanyilisia bali Yesu aba alikho ababoolela khu Paapa tawe.
Nio ababoolela ali, “Nga mulisuta Omwana wo Mundu angaaki mulimanya muli, ‘Ese Niye,’ mala mu limanya muli se khola sisiindu siosi siosi khu bunyali bwase samwene tawe, ne kakhali mboola niko Paapa anjekisie ese khuloma kong'ene.
Ne oyo owanduma ese ali ne nase, se andekhile seng'ene tawe, sikila buli lwosi khola kamusiimisia niye.”
Bakali babaulila Yesu naboola bibiindu bino bamusuubila.
Nio Yesu aboolela babamusuubila ali, “Mwaaba ne muria kamekisio kase, aba enywe ng'ali muli babeeka base
mulamanya bung'ali ne bung'ali chana bulamukhola mube balekhuule.”
Yesu aababoolela ali, “Ndikho muboolela enywe bung'ali, omundu yesi yesi ookhola bubwoni ali nasioobi owe bubwoni.
Nasioobi se abechangao buli lwosi nga omwana we mungo mu bweene tawe, ne kakhali omwana niye owe mungo mu bweene buli lwosi.
Khwako omwana ne amukhola mwaba balekhuule, aba ng'ali mulabeela elala balekhuule.
Manyile ndi muli lisaaye lia Aburahamu mala mulakhakanga khukhunjira, sikila se munyala khufukiilila kamekisio kase tawe.
Ese ndomaloma khu niko Paapa wase anjekeesie, ne kakhali enywe mukhola niko raraawenywe amuboleele.”
Bamukobosia bali, “Paapa wefwe ali Aburahamu.” Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ng'ali muba babaana ba Aburahamu, andi mukholanga bibiindu ne bibieene nibio akhola.
Koosi niko kholile kali khumuboolela enywe bung'ali nibwo naulila khukhwama khu Wele, ne enywe nanywe mulakhakanga khukhunjira ese. Aburahamu sakhola sisiindu nga sino tawe!
Mulikho mukhola niko raraawenywe aakhola.” Bakobosia bali, “Wele omwene niye Paapa yeng'ene niye khuli naye ne efwe khuli babaana bewe ba ng'ali.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Wele aba ng'ali Raraawenywe andi mwasiima ese, sikila ese necha khukhwama khu Wele mala luno ndi ano. Ese se necha khu bunyali bwase samwene tawe, ne kakhali Wele aanduma.
Siina sikila ne mukhamanya niko muboolela tawe? Lili, sikila se munyala mwekhaliilikha khurekeeresia burume bwase tawe.
Enywe muli babaana ba raraawenywe Sietani, mala mwenya khuloonda liliekoomba lia raraawenywe. Aaba omwiiri khukhwama mu khurakikha ne khukhwola luno se abakho lubeka lwe bung'ali tawe, sikila bung'ali se bumulimo tawe. Ne aloma bubeeyi, aba alikho akhola ke liiba liewe, sikila ali omubeeyi, mala niye raraawe owe bubeeyi bwosi.
Ne kakhali Ese mboola bung'ali mala niko kakila ne mukhasuubila tawe.
Naanu khwinywe onyala ekesia ali ese ndi ne bubwoni? Ne naaba ne mboola bung'ali nono siina sikila ne mukhasuubila ese?
Oyo owiicha khukhwama khu Wele arekeeresianga Elomo eya Wele. Enywe, kakhaba kario, se mwama khu Wele tawe, mala niko kakila ne mukhakirekeeresia tawe.”
Bayaudi bakobosia Yesu bali, “Efwe se khuli ng'ali mu khuboola khuli ewe oli Omusamaria mala oli ne sisieeno?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Se ndi ne sisieeno tawe. Ese naelesia Paapa wase liria ne kakhali enywe se mumbelesia ese liria tawe.
Se ndikho neenjela liria tawe. Ne kakhali aliio owenyekha ariibwe, mala niye omukhalaki.
Ndikho muboolela enywe bung'ali ndi, Yesi yesi oria kamekisio kase salifwa tawe.”
Bamuboolela bali, “Nono khwanyoola bung'ali khuli ewe oli ne sisieeno! Aburahamu ne bang'oosi bafwa, ne nawe oboola oli yesi yesi oria kamekisio kowo salifwa tawe.
Paapa wefwe Aburahamu afwa. Ne ewe se olikho oboola oli, oli Omukali khukhila Aburahamu tawe, namwe oli omukali khumukhila? Ne akhaba bang'oosi bosi bafwa ewe weyibaasia oli, oli naanu?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Naaba ne neelesia samwene luyali, aba luyali olwo se lulaba ne bukhala bwosi bwosi tawe. Paapa wase niye oumbechanga luyali, niye mwesi mulomanga muli ali Wele wenywe.
Se mwamumanyakho na akeekhe ene tawe, ne ese namumanya. Naaba ne ndoma ndi, ese se mu manyile niye tawe, aba sesi nabeele omubeeyi nga enywe. Ese mumanyile lundi naria elomo yewe.
Raraawenywe Aburahamu ekhoya ali akhabone siise sie khukhwicha khwase; asibona mala aasangaala.”
Bayaudi abo bamuboolela bali, “Ewe se oli ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko akhaba kamakhumi karaano kong'ene tawe, nono oloma oriena oli wabona Aburahamu?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali, Aburahamu nakhasaalwa tawe, ‘Ese Ndiio.’ ”
Nio bangala kamabaale bali bamupe, ne Yesu amitiokha arura mu Lukaangu.

Nga Yesu aba ne alikho akeenda, abona omundu owasaalwa omubofu.
Babeeka bewe bamureeba bali, “Omwekisia, bubwoni bwa naanu bubwakila yuno aasaalwa omubofu? Bwaba bubwewe omwene namwe bwe basaasi bewe?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Bubofu bwewe se buli sikila bubwoni bwewe, namwe bwe basaasi bewe tawe. Ali omubofu nio kamaani ka Wele kabonekhe ne kakhola kimilimo mu niye.
Enje ne siili kumuusi, khukhwola khukhole kimilimo kioyo owanduma ese; siilo silikho siicha niio omundu akhanyala akhola kimilimo tawe.
Ese ne siili mu sibala, ndi buwaanga bwe sibala.”
Yesu namalile khuboola kano afucha aasi atubaasia liloba ne kamare mala abakha litosi chana siamoni wo mundu oyo
mala aboola ali, “Khoche osaabe mu moni mwitiisi lia Siloamu.” (Liboola lili “Owarumwa”). Omundu chana acha. Asaaba mu moni, mala akobola ne alikho abona.
Nio babamenya naye siimbi ne babaandu babamubona ne esabiilisia kano ne kakhekholekha, bareeba bali, “Omundu yuno se ali niye owikhalanga ne esabiilisia?”
Balala baloma bali, “Yee niye” ne babaandi baloma bali, “Se ali niye tawe, afwaanana busa naye.”
Nio omundu chana omwene aloma ali, “Niise.”
Bamureeba bali, “Kali kariena luno olikho obona?”
Akobosia ali, “Omundu olaangwa Yesu arokile litosi ambakha siamoni chase amboolela nje Siloamu saabe mu moni. Khwako njiile, mala nga saabile, abwene ne abwene, naona.”
Bamureeba bali, “Ali waena?” Naye abakobosia ali, “Se manya tawe.”
Babamenya naye siimbi bayila omundu oyo khu Bafarisayo.
Endaalo niyo Yesu akholelamo litosi ne khuonia omubofu yuno yaba eye Sabato.
Nio, Bafarisayo bareeba omundu chana lundi bali, “Wamile oriena Waona?” Aababoolela ali, “Aakhile litosi khu moni chase, nasaaba mu moni, mala luno nyala nabona.”
Bafarisayo balala baloma bali, “Omundu ookholile kano se anyala aaba ne aama khu Wele tawe, sikila se aria lilaka lie Sabato tawe.” Kakhaba kario, babaandi baloma bali, “Omundu omwoni anyala ariena khukhola kamayia nga kano.” Mala liliabukhana liabao akari wabwe.
Nio Bafarisayo bachana bareeba omundu oyo lundi bali, “Oloma oli akhuonisie ewe bubofu bwowo, ewe oboola siina khu niye?” Omundu chana abakobosia ali, “Omung'oosi niye.”
Bayaudi be bunyali, kakhaba kario, se bafukiilila khusuubila bali omundu oyo aba omubofu mala luno anyala abona tawe, khukhwola nga ne balaanga raraawe ne maawe.
Babareeba bali, “Yuno omwana wenywe niye muboolanga muli asaalwa omubofu; nono kabeele kariena luno anyala aabona?”
Basaasi bewe babakobosia bali, “Khu manyile khuli ali omwana wefwe mala asaalwa omubofu.
Ne se khumanya kali kariena nga luno anyalile khubona tawe namwe se khumanya abeele naanu omuonisie bubofu bwewe tawe. Mureebe omwene, ali omundu omukhulu busa omwene anyala akobosia!”
Basaasi bewe baloma bario sikila abeele bariire Bayaudi be bunyali ba baba ne bafukiilisiane bali balaoona khukhwama mu sinakooki omundu yesi yesi osuubila ali Yesu ali Kristo.
Esio nisio sisiakila basaasi bewe baloma bali, “Ali omundu omukhulu mureebe omwene!”
Lukhola khabili balaanga omundu owasaalwa omubofu chana mala bamuboolela bali, “Khusuubisie ebweeni wa Wele oli olaboola bung'ali! Khumanyile khuli omundu okhuonisie yuno ali omwoni.”
Omundu oyo abakobosia ali, “Ese se manya nali omwoni namwe nakhali omwoni tawe, ese manyile sisiindu silala, naba omubofu ne luno mbona.”
Bamureeba bali, “Siina nisio akhukholilekho? Akhuonisie bubofu bwowo ariena?”
Akobosia ali, “Namubooleele khale mala se mwenya khurekeeresia tawe. Siina sikila ne mwenya khuulila lundi? Namwe mwesi mwenyile khuba babeeka bewe?”
Bamulaama ne baloma bali, “Ewe oli Omweeka wo mundu oyo ne efwe khuli babeeka ba Musa.
Khu manyile khuli Wele alomaloma khu Musa; ne omundu oyo naye, se khu manyile akhaba niio aama tawe!”
Omundu chana aakobosia ali, “Likhuwa lino lili lie khuukia! Enywe se mumanyile niio aama tawe, mala aambonisie ese bubofu bwase!
Khumanyile khuli Wele se arekeeresianga babooni tawe; arekeeresianga babaandu bamuria ne khukhola niko niye enya.
Khukhwama mu khurakikha khwe sibala, se aliio owaulilakho bali omundu yesi yesi eekula chimoni cho mundu owasaalwa omubofu tawe.
Banga omundu yuno se eecha khukhwama khu Wele tawe, andi se aanyala khukholakho siosi siosi tawe!”
Bamukobosia bali, “Ewe wasaalwa mu bwoni lundi wakhulila mu bwoni onyala oriena khukhwekisia efwe?” Mala bamuoona, mu sinakooki.
Nga Yesu ne aulila kakaba ne kekholekhe, anyoola omundu chana mala amureeba ali, “Ewe osuubila mu Mwana wo Mundu?”
Omundu oyo aamukobosia ali, “Omwami, mboolele, naanu niye nio nyale khu musuubila!”
Yesu aamuboolela ali, “Wamuboone khale, niye olikholomaloma nawe siise sino.”
Omundu chana aaloma ali, “Omwami nasuubiile!” Mala aasikama ebweeni wa Yesu.
Yesu aaloma ali, “Necha khu sibala khuno khukhalaka, nio babofu babone ne abo babona bekele babofu.”
Bafarisayo balala ba babao bamuulila ne aloma kano mala bamureeba bali, “Aakhaba fwesi khuli babofu?”
Yesu aabakobosia ali, “Abanga bali muli babofu andi se muli ne bubwoni tawe; ne kakhali sikila muloma muli, mubona, aba lino liekesia lili enywe musiili ne bubwoni.”

Yesu aloma ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali, omundu ocha mu siiko sie kamakheese mala se engilila mu silibwa tawe ne kakhali abirira abuundu aandi osi osi, oyo ali omwifwi lundi omunuuli.
Omundu owingilila mu silibwa ali omwaayi we kamakheese.
Omuliindi owe silibwa amwikulilangayo, kamakheese kaulilanga kumumilo kwewe nga nalaanganga kamasina kaako buli sia lilala mala akarangirira akarusia enje.
Enyuma we khukareera enje, akarangirira mala kamuloondakho, sikila kamanyile kumumilo kwewe.
Se kanyala kaloonda khu mundu okundi busa tawe, kamwilukha, sikila se kamanyile kumumilo kwewe tawe.”
Yesu ababoolela lukano luno ne se bamanyilisia nisio abakho tawe.
Nio Yesu aboola lundi ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali, Ese niise silibwa sie kamakheese.
Babaandi boosi babeecha khale ebweeni wase bali babefwi lundi banuuli, ne kakhali kamakheese se kabarekeeresia nibo tawe.
Ese niise silibwa. Yesi yesi obirira mwise alaonisibwa; alengila mukari ne khurura enje mala alanyoola kamaayilwe.
Omwifwi echanga khukhwiba, khukhwira ne khukhwonaka khwong'ene. Ese nechile nio mwole khuba ne bulamu mu bwichufu.
“Ese niise omwaayi omulayi. Omwaayi Omulayi erusia khufwa khulwe kamakheese.
Omukholi busa okhali omwaayi omwene makheese tawe, nabona sisuuche ne siicha elukha, alekha kamakheese nio sisuuche sitiila kamakheese ne khukasalanisia.
Omukholi elukha sikila ali busa omuandike ne sabala kamakheese ne kali siindu khu niye tawe.
Ese niise omwaayi omulayi. Manyile baali babaase ne babaase bamanyile ese.
Nga Paapa ne nase ne khumanyaane, mu ngila ng'eneyo sesi manyile kamakheese kase ne kosi kamanyile. Ese fukiilila khuaana bulamu bwase fwe, sikila niko.
Kamakheese kase kakaandi kaliio kakhali mu siiko muno tawe. Khukhwola ngareere kosi; kalarekeeresia kumumilo kwase mala kalaba lituuli lilala no mwaayi mulala.
“Paapa asiima ese sikila nafukiilila khuaana bulamu bwase, nio mbunyoole lundi.
Se aliio omundu obukula bulamu bwase khukhwama khwise tawe. Mbuana mukhufukiilila khwase khwe mu bulekhuule. Ndi ne bunyali bwe khu buaana ne khu bubukula lundi. Kano niko Paapa wase andaka khukhola.”
Liliabukhana lundi liabao mu baandu sikila kamakhuwa kano.
Bakali balomanga bali, “Ali ne sisieeno! Alaluukhe! Siina sikila ne mu murekeeresia.”
Ne kakhali babaandi balomanga bali, “Omundu owe sisieeno se anyala alomaloma ari tawe! Sisieeno sinyala siriena khukhola babofu babone?”
Ne naikara eye khukhebulila khurwa alubeka khwe Lukaangu khu Wele yaba mu Yerusalemu mu biise bie kumunaane.
Yesu aba alikho akeenda mu matooche ka Solomoni mu Lukaangu
mala babaandu ne bamwibusiao bamureeba bali, “Ewe ola khuayaayisia mu mebaasio khukhwola liina? Khuboolele bung'ali abuwaanga, ewe Kristo?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Namubooleele khale, ne se mwasuubiile tawe. Bibiindu nibio ese khola khulwe bunyali bwa Paapa wase nibio bilomaloma nga abeele samwene ne ndoma;
ne kakhali enywe se musuubila tawe; sikila se muli kamakheese kase tawe.
Kamakheese kase karekeeresianga kumumilo kwase, ese ngamanyile, mala kanoondangakho.
Ngaelesianga bulamu bwa mindali, mala se kalifwa tawe. Se aliio onyala anuula tawe.
Paapa wase owambelesia kano ali omukali khukhila boosi, ne se aliio onyala akanuula khukhwama khu Paapa tawe.
Paapa nase khuli mulala.”
Babaandu lundi bangala kamabaale bali bamupe.
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Nakholile bikholwa bikali bilayi mu moni chenywe nibio Paapa ambelesia ese khole. Sikholwa siina sikila ne mwenya khu khukhupa ese kamabaale?”
khumanyile khuli niko liiandiko liboola kali ng'ali khulwa mindali; ne Wele alaanga babaandu nibo aelesia burume bwewe abo ali bawele.
Ne khwise, Paapa aandobora mala aanduma mu sibala. Munyala nono, khuboola muriena muli ese khola embelekeu sikila nalomile ndi, ese Omwana owa Wele?
Naaba ne khakhola bibiindu nibio Paapa wase eenya khole tawe, mukhasuubila ese tawe.
Ne kakhali naaba ne mbikhola, mwakhaba ne mukhasuubila ese tawe, mwenyekha musuubile bikholwa biase, nio mwoole khumanyila elala, muli, Paapa ali mwise ne ese ndi mu Paapa.”
Bakhaka lundi khuamba Yesu ne kakhali efubarura mu makhono kabwe atiba.
Babaandu bakali bamwichakho baloma bali, “Yoana se akholakho kamayia tawe, ne buli siindu nisio aaloma khuloondekhana no mundu yuno siaba ng'ali.”
Mala babaandu bakali ebweeneyo basuubila mu Yesu.

(Maria yuno niye owachukha kamafura kaunya bulayi, khu bikele bio Mwami mala akeeyela lichuune liewe; Lasaro owaba omulwale aba wandaaye.)
Bakooko bewe baruma likhuwa khu Yesu bali, “Omwami omusaale wowo omukoosi ali omulwale.”
Nga Yesu aulila, aloma ali, “Bulwaale buno se buleera Lasaro tawe; buliio khulwe khureera luyali khu Wele, mala elaba engila niyo Omwana owa Wele alanyoolelamo luyali.”
Yesu aba asiima Marita no mukooko wewe ne Lasaro.
Ne kakhaba kario nga anyoola likhuwa bali Lasaro ali omulwale, akona khabili niio aaba eyo.
Nio aboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Khe khukobole e Buyuda.”
Babeeka bewe chana bamukobosia bali, “Omwekisia nyinga eyo busa, babaandu be bweneyo benyile khu khupa ewe kamabaale, mala wenya khukobolayo?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enyanga se ebechangao chisa ekhumi na chibili buli ndaalo tawe ku? Khwako yesi yesi okeendela mu buwaanga bwe nyanga se etuya tawe, sikila abona buwaanga bwe sibala sino.
Ne aaba nakeenda mu silo etuya, sikila se ali ne buwaanga tawe.”
Yesu aloma kano, mala atasakho ali, “Omusaale wefwe Lasaro aakonile, ne ndacha mala musiisimusie.”
Babeeka bamukobosia bali, “Omwami, aaba ne alikho akona kane aone.”
Yesu aaba alikho alomaloma khuloondekhana ne lifwa lia Lasaro ne nibo bebaasia bali alomile ke khukona liilo lia busiele.
Nio Yesu ababoolela abuwaanga ali, Lasaro afwiile.
Ne ese nasangaalile sikila enywe, sikila se nabeleyo naye tawe, nio musuubile. Khe khuche niio ali.
Tomasi (olaangwa Mukhwana) aboolela babeeka basie ali, “Fweesi khe khuche nio khufwe naye.”
Nga Yesu ne ola, anyoola Lasaro amalile mu siliindwa chindaalo chine.
Betania lwaba embi chi kilomita chitaru khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Ne Bayaudi bakali baba bechile khubona Marita ne Maria khu baoleelesia sikila lifwa lia wandayaabwe.
Nga Marita ne aulila bali Yesu alikho echa, arura enje khucha khumwakaanila, ne Maria naye arama munju.
Marita aboolela Yesu ali, “Omwami, ewe obao andi wandaayase safwiile tawe!
Ne manyile ndi akhaba luno siosi siosi nisio olasaba Wele alakhuelesia.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Wandaayo alalamukha.”
Marita akobosia ali, “Manyile ndi alilamukha khu ndaalo emaliilisi.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Ese niise lilamukha ne bulamu. Yesi yesi osuubila mwise alamenya, akhaba nafwa;
ne yesi yesi omenya mala asuubila mwise salifwa tawe. Ewe osuubila kano?”
Marita amukobosia ali, “Yee Omwami, suubila ndi ewe oli Kristo, Omwana owa Wele, owarekekha khukhwicha mu sibala.”
Marita nga amala khuloma kano, akobolayo alaanga wandaaye Maria mu bwikisi mala amuboolela ali, “Omwekisia ali ano, mala alikho akhulaanga ewe.”
Nga Maria naulila kano, enyokha khangu arura enje khumwakaanana.
(Abeele Yesu akhoola mu sirekere tawe, aaba asiili abuundu niio Marita aba namwakaanane.)
Babaandu baba munju ne Maria ne bamuoleelesia. Nga babona ne enyokha khangu narura enje bamuloondakho. Bebaasia bali alikho acha khulilila esiliindwa.
Maria ola niio Yesu aaba, ne abwene ne abwene nga namubona, akwa mu bikele biewe. Aloma ali, “Omwami, obao andi wandaayase safwiile tawe!”
Yesu amubona ne alikho alila, lundi abona babaandu ba baba naye ne balikho balila. Nio kumwoyo kwewe kwechula bubeeleli, mala anaanisibwa lukali po.
Abareeba ali, “Mu musiikhile waena?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omwami, khowiche obone.”
Yesu aliila.
Bayaudi baloma bali, “Bona nga beele ne amusiima lukali!”
Ne balala khu nibo baloma bali, “Se akhola omubofu abona tawe ku? Andi sakhiingilile lifwa lia Lasaro?”
Yesu anaanisibwa lundi lukali mala acha e siliindwa. Siliindwa esio siaba nga libina mala baba bekalileyo kubaale.
Yesu arusia lilaka ali, “Rusiayo kubaale oku.”
Marita omukooko owo mundu ofwiile chana akobosia ali, “Omwami, bubolo bulaba bukali, abeele mu siliindwa chindaalo chine!”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Se khuboolele ndi waaba nosuubila kane obone luyali lwa Wele?”
Barusiayo kubaale mala Yesu alola mu ngaaki aloma ali, “Paapa, khuupila ewe orio, sikila ewe undekeeresianga.
Manyile ndi buli lwoosi ewe undekeeresianga, ne ndoma kano khulwe babaandu baali ano, nio basuubile bali ewe owanduma ese.”
Enyuma we khuloma kano, alaanga ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Lasaro rura enje!”
Lasaro arura enje, kamakhono kewe ne bikele biaba biaboelwe mu suuka che khu siikhilamo, ne mu moni mwewe baba bamuboyilemo esuuka ekiindi. Yesu ababoolela ali, “Khemumukangulule mala mumulekhe ache.”
Bayaudi bakali ba baba ne baloondile khu Maria babona niko Yesu akhola, mala bamusuubila.
Ne kakhali balala khu nibo bakobola khu Bafarisayo, mala bababoolela niko Yesu aba nakholile.
Nio Bafarisayo, ne basaayi bakhulu bekhala nende be kumuse mala baboolana bali, “Khulakhola siina? Lola kamayia kano koosi niko Omundu yuno alakholanga!
Khwaaba ne khumulekha busa achiililile mu ngila yino, buli mundu alamusuubila mala Barumi balecha bonake Lukaangu lwefwe ne kholo yefwe!”
Mulala khu nibo, olaangwa Kayafa, owaba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe Lukaangu kumwiiko mwenokwo aloma ali, “Enywe se mumanyilekho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
Se mubona muli buli bulayi khwinywe khulekha omundu mulala afwe khulwe babaandu khukhila ekholo yoosi ebune?”
Ng'ali se aboola kano omwene yeng'ene tawe, ne kakhali nga ne aba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe Lukaangu kumwiiko mwenokwo, aba alikho ang'oola ali Yesu alikho acha khufwa khulwe Bayaudi.
Ne seli khulwe Bayaudi bong'ene tawe, ne kakhali lundi aaba alikho acha khufwa nio areere mu mubili mulala babaandu ba Wele boosi babasalaanila.
Khukhwama khu ndaalo eyo Bayaudi be bunyali barakikha khuboolana nga ne banyala bamwiira.
Khwako Yesu se akeenda abuwaanga mu Buyuda tawe, ne kakhali arekukha acha abuundu aandi siimbi ne asiangalaamwe, alukoba nilwo balaanga bali Efuraimu. Nio amenya ebweeneyo ne babeeka bewe.
Siise sia Naikara eye Pasaka siaba siimbi ne babaandu bakali baama chimbeka chichiindi baacha mu Yerusalemu khukhola kimilukha kie khukhwekwalaasia, naikara ne khoola tawe.
Baenjanga Yesu, mala nga ne bebuusia alala mu Lukaangu, bareebana bali, “Mwibaasia muli siina? Ng'ali salikho echa mu naikara yino tawe, namwe aleecha?”
Basaayi bakhulu ne Bafarisayo baba baanile kamalaka bali Omundu yesi yesi omanyile niio Yesu ali, khukhwola abuule nio bamuambe.

Chindaalo sita Epasaka ne khoola tawe Yesu acha e Betania mungo mwa Lasaro, omundu niye aba ne alamusie khukhwama mu lifwa.
Bamung'oonelayo siakhulia sie khukhwikolooyia, mala Marita niye owara khu sialwa siakhulia esio. Lasaro aba mulala khwaabo babekhala asialwa ne Yesu.
Nio Maria abukula kamafura kaunya bulayi enusu eye lita, ke bukusi bwe angaaki, kakang'oonwa khukhwama khu narito endayi, akachukha khu bikele bia Yesu, mala akeeya ne lichuune liewe. Kumuuya kumulayi kwe kamafura ako kwechula enju yoosi.
Mulala khu beeka ba Yesu, Yuda Isikarioti, owaba ne alikho acha khumuchaama, aloma ali,
“Siina sikila kamafura kano ne kakhakusibwe chirupia chimia chitaru che fwesa, mala bachielesie bataambi?”
Se aloma kano sikila aba aasiima khuyeeta bataambi tawe, ne kakhali aba omwifwi. Asutaanga eoochwa eye chirupia mala buli lwoosi ebaangamo.
Ne Yesu aloma ali, “Mulekhe abe, mukhamunaania tawe! Lekha akhole nisio alikho akhola khulwe endaalo eye lisiikhwa liase.
Enywe muli ne bataambi buli lwosi, ne se mukhabe ne nase buli lwosi tawe.”
Babaandu balala baulila bali Yesu aba e Betania, nio bachayo, se khuli khubona Yesu yeng'ene tawe ne kakhali bacha khubona akhaba Lasaro yesi, niye Yesu aba ne alamusie khukhwama mu lifwa.
Nio basaayi bakhulu baboolana khukhwerekekha khukhwira Lasaro yesi.
Sikila khulwe kamayia ke khumulamusia niye, baloba basaayi mala basuubila mu Yesu.
Endaalo eloondakho babaandu bakali ba baba ne bechile mu Naikara eye Pasaka baulila bali Yesu alikho echa mu Yerusalemu.
Nio babukula chisakia che kamakheendu mala barura khucha khumwakaanila ne baapa luyoka lwe khoyo ne baloma bali, “Hosana! Ali ne chikhabi oyo owichila mwisina lio Mwami! Omwami owa Isiraeli!”
Yesu anyoola epunda akiikhalakho nga liiandiko liboolanga lili,
Bona Omwami wowo alikho echa ekhaale khu punda eng'ana.”
Mu siise esio babeeka bewe se bamanyilisia kano tawe; ne nga Yesu ne alamusibwa ne luyali bakhebulila bali kano kaandikwa khu niye mala kakholebwe busa kario.
Babaandu ba baba ne Yesu nga alaanga Lasaro khurura mu siliindwa, ne khumulamusia khukhwama mu lifwa baba baboolile kakaaba ne kekholekhe.
Kano niko kakakila babaandu bakali ne bamwakaanila, sikila baba bauliile bali akholile kamayia kano.
Nono Bafarisayo baboolana bali, “Bona se khulikho khukholakho sisiindu tawe! Lola babaandu sibala sioosi bamuloondilekho!”
Bakiriki balala baba mwabo ba baba ne bachile Yerusalemu khusaaya mu ndaalo cha naikara.
Bacha khu Filipo (aba owe Betesaita mu Kalilaya) mala baboola bali, “Omwami khwenya khubona Yesu.”
Filipo acha aboolela Andereya, boombi bacha mala baboolela Yesu.
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Esaa yolile niyo Omwana wo Mundu anyoolela luyali.
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi: lumiicho lwe ngano ne lukhakwile mu liloba mala lwafwa, lurama busa lwong'ene, ne lwaba ne lufwa lwaama engaanu engali.
Yesi yesi osiima bulamu bwewe alabutibia, ne yesi yesi obiila bulamu bwewe mu sibala sino alaba nabwo khulwe bulamu bwa mindali.
Yesi yesi owenya khu khuukholela ese kimilimo khukhwola anonde, nio omukholi wase abe nase niio ndi. Yesi yesi oukholelanga kimilimo, Paapa wase amuelesianga liria.
“Kumwoyo kwase luno kulikho kunaanisibwa, nono mboole siina? Mboole ndi, ‘Paapa okhalekha esaa yino yanjichakho tawe?’ Ne mala, ako niko kakakila necha. Necha nio noole khubira mu saa yino.
Paapa reera luyali khu lisina liowo!” Mala kumumilo kwauliilikha khukhwama mwikulu, ne kuboola kuli, “Nalieleesie luyali lundi ndakhola ndio.”
Babaandu bakali ba baba ne bemileo baulila kumumilo okwo. Balala baloma bali likukuma lie fula, babaandi nabo bali, “Malaika ama khulomaloma naye!”
Ne Yesu ababoolela ali, “Kumumilo kuno se kulomaloome sikila ese tawe, ne kakhali sikila enywe.
Luno sili siise sie sibala sino khu khalakilwa, luno omwami owe sibala sino alarusibwa khu bwami.
Ne nga ese nesutibwa angaaki khukhwama khu sibala ndakhola buli mulala anjichekho.”
(Mukhuloma kano aba ekesia lukano lwe lifwa nilio acha khufwa.)
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Buwaanga busiilikho nanywe khulwe siise sitiiti. Chiililila mu lukeendo lwenywe ne musiili ne buwaanga nio sisiilima sikhamufuunikha tawe, sikila oyo okeenda mu siilima se amanya niio alikho acha tawe.
Nono suubila mu buwaanga ne musiili nabwo, nio mube babaandu be buwaanga.”
Enyuma Yesu naboolile kano arekukha acha ekisa khukhwama khu baandu chana.
Akhaba ne aba nakholile kamayia kano koosi mu moni chabwe se bamusuubila tawe,
nio nilio Omung'oosi Isaya aboola liole khuba ng'ali:
“Omwami naanu owasuubila burume nibwo efwe khwaboola?
Omwami ekesia naanu bunyali bwewe?”
Nio se benya khusuubila tawe, sikila akhaba lundi Isaya aloma ali,
abaminyasiisie kamebaasio kabwe,
nio chimoni chabwe chikhabona tawe,
lundi kamebaasio kabwe kakhamanyilisia tawe,
mala Wele aloma ali,
‘Se balangobolela mbaonie tawe.’ ”
Isaya aloma kano sikila abona luyali lwa Yesu mala alomaloma khu kewe.
Kakhaba kario, Bayaudi bakali be bunyali basuubila mu Yesu, ne Bafarisayo bakila se bakalomalomakho abuwaanga tawe, nio bakhabatimania mu sinakooki tawe.
Basiima khufukiililwa ne babaandu khukhila khufukiililwa ne Wele.
Yesu aloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Yesi yesi osuubila mwise sasuubila mwise seng'ene tawe, ne kakhali aba asuubila akhaba mu wanduma yesi.
Yesi yesi oumbona ese abona akhaba oyo owanduma yesi.
Nechile mu sibala nga buwaanga, nio buli mundu osuubila mwise akharama mu siilima tawe.
Aaba bali omundu yesi yesi aulila burume bwase mala saburia tawe, se ndimukhalakila tawe, se necha khukhalakila sibala tawe, ne kakhali necha khusiionia.
Abo boosi babandoba ese ne khulekha khufukiilila burume bwase bali no mundu olibakhalakila. Kamakhuwa niko muboolele niko kaliba bukhalaki khu ndaalo emaliilisi!
Kano kali ng'ali sikila ese se nalomaloome khu bunyali bwase samwene tawe, ne kakhali Paapa wanduma niye owandaka nisio khoyela ndome.
Mala manyile ndi Lilaka liewe lireeranga bulamu bwa mindali. Niko ndoma nono kali niko Paapa ambooleele khuloma.”

Yaba endaalo ndala Naikara eye Pasaka ne khoola tawe. Yesu aamanya ali esaa yewe yaba yolile eye khurura mu sibala sino, mala ache wa Paapa. Buli lwosi aba asiima babewe ba baba mu sibala mala abasiima khukhwola esiakamo.
Yesu ne babeeka bewe baba asialwa sie lilikoloyia. Sietani aba areere khale kamebaasio ke khuchaama Yesu mu mwoyo kwa Yuda, okhwa Simoni Isikarioti.
Yesu amanya ali Paapa amuelesia bunyali bwoosi, amanya ali echa khukhwama khu Wele mala alikho acha wa Wele.
Nio enyokha khusialwa afuula ekaanjo yewe eye khu ngaaki, mala eboa etawulo mu sibuno.
Achukha kameechi khulukaraya mala arakikha khusiinga babeeka bewe bikele, ne khubieyela etawulo niyo aba naboyile mu sibuno.
Ola khu Simoni Petero, mala Petero amureeba ali, “Omwami, wenya khu khusiinga ese bikele?”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ewe luno somanyilisia nisio ese ndikho khola tawe, ne kakhali okhamanyilisie enyuma wakano.”
Petero aloma ali, “Se silikhoo siise siosi siosi nisio ewe olisiinga ese bikele tawe.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ne khakhusiinga bikele tawe, solaba omweeka wase lundi tawe.”
Simoni Petero amukobosia ali, “Omwami nono okhasiinga bikele biong'ene tawe! Siinge akhaba kamakhono ne kumurwe kwosi!”
Yesu aloma ali, “Yesi yesi owesiingile ali omumiliiu elala ne se esiinga lundi tawe, ne kakhali esiinga bikele. Enywe mweesi muli bamiliiu ne kakhali mulala khwinywe niye okhali omumiliiu tawe.”
(Yesu aba amanya khale owaba ne alikho acha khumuchaama, niko kakakila naloma ali, “Mweesi muli bamiliiu nakhali mulala khwinywe niye okhali omumiliiu tawe.”)
Mundanganga ese muli Omwekisia lundi muli Omwami, mala buli bulayi nga mukholanga murio, sikila ndi ndio.
Ese Omwami wenywe, lundi Omwekisia, nama khumusiinga bikele. Nono, enywe mukhoyela musiingane bikele.
Nakholile nisio mukhoyeele mulolelekho, nio mukhole busa nga nisio ese kholile khwinywe.
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi, nasioobi se ali omukali khukhila omwami wewe tawe, ne omurumwa se ali omukali khukhila owamuruma tawe.
Luno nga ne mu manyile bung'ali buno, mulasangaala lukali ne mubura mu bikholwa!
Se ndikho ndomaloma kakenywe mweesi tawe, namanya abo nibo narobora. Ne liiandiko liboolanga lili, ‘Omundu niye walia naye, niye okhuchaama’ khukhwola lichusibwe.
Ese muboolela enywe kano ne kakhekholekha tawe, nio ne kekholekha musuubile muli ‘Ese Niise.’
Ng'ali ese muboolela enywe ndi, Oyo owakaanila omundu yesi yesi niye ese nduma, aba anjakaanila ese; ne yesi yesi ounjakanila ese akaanila oyo owanduma ese.”
Enyuma Yesu nalomile kano, anaanisibwa mu mwoyo lukali mala aboola abuwaanga ali, “Ndikho muboolela bung'ali mulala khwinywe alikho acha khunjaama.”
Babeeka balolana ne bauka, khumanya naanu niye alikho alomakho tawe.
Mulala khu beeka, niye Yesu asiima aba ekhaale siimbi ne Yesu.
Simoni Petero amua simanyilo sie khukhwekesia sili, “Mureebe naanu niye alikho alomalomakho.”
Nio omweeka oyo eseenda siimbi khu Yesu mala amureeba ali, “Omwami naanu niye?”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Niye ndaronga kumukaati mu muunyu mala muelesie aba niye omwenoyo.” Nio abukula sitonyi sie kumukaati asironga mu muunyu, mala asielesia Yuda okhwa Simoni Isikarioti.
Abwene ne abwene nga Yuda ne alia kumukaati okwo, Sietani amwingilamo. Yesu amuboolela ali, “Yuuya khangu nisio wenya khukhola?”
Se aliio owaba asialwa owamanyilisia sisiakila Yesu namuboolela ario tawe.
Ne sikila Yuda aba omubiikhi we eoochwa eye chirupia, babeeka balala bebaasia bali Yesu amubooleele khucha akule nibio benya khulwa mu naikara, namwe aekho bataambi sisiindu.
Yuda afukiilila kumukaati mala arura enje khangu, siaba siilo.
Yuda ne amalile khurekukha, Yesu aaloma ali, “Luno Omwana wo Mundu aelesiiibwe luyali, luno luyali lwa Wele lwabuliikhe khubirira mu niye.
Ne luyali lwa Wele ne lubuliikhe khubirira mu niye, aba nono Wele alabuula luyali lwo Mwana wo Mundu mu niye omwene, mala alakhola ario khangu.
Baana base, se ndaba ne nanywe khu siise sileeyi lukali tawe. Mulambenja, ne luno muboolela enywe niko naboolela Bayaudi be bunyali, ‘Se munyala mwacha niio ese ndikho nja tawe.’
Ne luno ndikho muelesia enywe lilaka liya: Khemusiimane mwabeene ne mwabeene. Nga ese ne namusiima enywe, nio enywe khukhwola musiimane mwabeene ne mwabeene.
Mwaba ne busiime khu mwabeene ne mwabeene, aba buli mundu alamanya ali enywe muli babeeka base.”
Simoni Petero aamureeba ali, “Omwami, olikho ocha waena?” Yesu aamukobosia ali, “Se onyala wanondakho luno niio ndikho nja tawe, ne kakhali ekhumaliilikha okhanondekho.”
Petero amureeba ali, “Omwami, siina sikila ne khakhuloondakho siise sino? Ese nerekeekhe khukhufwila ewe!”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ng'ali ewe werekeekhe khukhufwila ese? Ndikho khuboolela bung'ali ndi etaaywa ne khakholiokha tawe, kane oboole khukhwola khataru oli se umanyile tawe.”

Yesu ababoolela ali, “Mukheembeelela ne khubeelela tawe. Suubila mu Wele ne lundi suubila akhaba mwise.
Munju eya Paapa chisiro chilimo chingali, mala ndikho nja khumung'oonela bukono, abanga se kali kario tawe, andi se muboolele kano tawe.
Ne enyuma nenjile khumung'oonela bukono, khakobole mala mu bukule mureere khu samwene, nio mube niio ese ndi.
Enywe mumanyile engila echa niio ese ndikho nja.”
Tomasi amuboolela ali, “Omwami se khumanyile niio olikho ocha tawe; nono khunyala khwamanya khuriena engila echayo?”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ese niise engila, bung'ali ne bulamu, se aliio omundu onyala acha wa Paapa nakhabirire khwise tawe.”
Ababoolela ali, “Luno nga mu manyile ese. Mulamanya akhaba Paapa wase yesi, ne khukhwama luno khuchilila, enywe mu mumanyile niye lundi mwamubona.”
Filipo amuboolela ali, “Omwami khwekesie Paapa, elio liong'ene nilio khwenya.”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Filipo, nabele ne nanywe mweesi khulwe siise sileeyi, khane se umanyile tawe? Omundu yesi yesi oumboone ese aba aboone Paapa. Nono siina sikila ne oloma oli, ‘Khwekesie Paapa?’
Filipo, ewe se osuubila oli ese ndi mu Paapa ne Paapa ali mwise tawe?” Yesu aaboolela babeeka bewe ali, “Kamakhuwa niko ndomaloome khwinywe, se kama khwise tawe. Paapa, omenyile mwise niye okholanga kimilimo kiewe omwene.
Suubile nga mboola ndi ese ndi mu Paapa ne Paapa ali mwise. Kaaba ne kakhali kario tawe, suubila sikila bibiindu nibio ndikho khola.
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi, omundu yesi yesi osuubila mwise alakhola niko ese khola, yee, alakhola bibiindu biboofu khukhila bino, sikila ese ndikho nja niio Paapa ali.
Nono ndakhola siosi siosi nisio mureeba mu lisina liase, nio luyali lwa Paapa lubonekhe khubirira mu Mwana.
Ne musaba sisiindu siosi siosi mu lisina liase, ndasikhola.
“Mwaba ne mwasiima ese mularia kamalaka kase.
Ndareeba Paapa, mala alamuelesia Omuyeeti okundi Roho owe bung'ali, olaba nanywe khulwa mindali.
Ali Roho obuulanga bung'ali bwa Wele. Be sibala se banyala khumusuubila tawe, sikila se banyala khumubona namwe khumumanya niye tawe. Ne enywe mu mumanyile niye sikila amenyanga nanywe lundi ali mwinywe.
Nga ese ne khache se mukharame mweng'ene tawe, khamukobolele.
Mu siise sikeekhe sibala se silambonakho ese lundi tawe, ne enywe mulambona, sikila ese menyile akhaba enywe mwesi mulamenya.
Nga endaalo eyo ne lioola, mulimanya muli ese ndi mu Paapa wase ne enywe muli mwise, bulayi bwene nga ese ne ndi mwinywe.
“Yesi yesi owakaanila kamalaka kase ne khukaria, niye owasiima ese. Paapa wase alasiima yesi yesi ousiima ese, akhaba sesi ndamusiima mala khole aamanye lukali.”
Yuda (se ali Yuda Isikarioti tawe) aloma ali, “Omwami, kali kariena ewe wemanyisie wamwene khwifwe ne khu be sibala tawe?”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Yesi yesi ousiima ese alaria kamekisio kase. Paapa wase alamusiima mala niye alala ne nase khulecha niio ali khumenye naye.
Yesi yesi okhasiima ese saria kamekisio kase tawe. Ne kamekisio niko mumalile khuulila se kali kakaase samwene tawe, ne kakhali kaama khu Paapa owanduma.
“Ese namubooleele kano ne siili ne nanywe.
Omuyeeti Roho Omutakatifu, niye Paapa akharume mu lisina liase, akhamweyikie buli siindu mala amukhole mukhebulile koosi niko ese muboolele enywe.
Kumuleembe nikwo ndikho mulekhela enywe, kuli kumuleembe kwase samwene nikwo ndikho muelesia. Se nguaana nga sibala ne siaananga tawe. Mukheembeelela ne khubeelela tawe, mukharia tawe.
Mwambulila ne ndoma ndi, ‘Ndikho ndekukha, ne kakhali khamukobolele.’ Abaanga mwasiima andi mulasangaala nga ese ne ndikho nja wa Paapa, sikila ali omukali khu khukhila ese.
Ne luno nanyoile khumuboolela kano koosi ne kakekholekha tawe, nio nga ne kaliekholekha, mwole khusuubila.
Se nyala nachiililila khulomaloma ne nanywe khu siise sileeyi tawe, sikila omwami owe sibala sino alikho echa ne se ali ne bunyali khwise tawe,
ese khola nga Paapa ne andakiilisie ne sibala khukhwola simanye sili ese nasiima Paapa; ako niko kakila ne khola buli siindu nga ne andaka.
“Yinyokha, khe khurekukhe khuche.

“Ese ndi kumusabibu kwa ng'ali ne Paapa wase ali omulimi.
Niye afunanga buli lusakia mwise lukhaananga kamatuunda tawe, mala asonjolanga buli lusakia lulwaama kamatuunda, nio lube lulayi ne khukhwama kamatuunda kamakali.
Enywe mwakholwa khale bamiliiu khulwe kamekisio niko namuelesia.
Menya mu buambaani ne nase, ne nase ndamenya mu buambaani ne nanywe. Lusakia se lunyala lwaama kamatuunda lwong'ene ne lukhali khu musabibu tawe. Mu ngila neng'ene enywe se munyala mwaama kamatuunda ne mukhamenyile mwise tawe.
“Ese ndi kumusabibu ne enywe muli chisakia chase. Yesi yesi omenya mwise mala ese menye mu niye alaama kamatuunda kamakali, sikila se munyala mwakhola siosi siosi ne mukhali ne nase tawe.
Yesi yesi okhamenya mwise tawe, amwaatwa aleeyi nga lusakia mala oome. Ne chisakia nga echo chirio, bachibusianga alala mala bachimwaata mu mulilo bachosia.
Mulaebwa sisiindu siosi siosi nisio mulasaba kaaba bali mulamenya mwise, mala kamakhuwa kase kosi kamenye mwinywe.
“Luyali lwa Paapa wase lwekesibwa ne nanywe nemwama kamatuunda kamakali ne mu ngila yino mwekela babeeka base.
Ese namusiima enywe busa nga Paapa ne asiima ese. Menya mu busiime bwase.
Mwaba ne muria kamalaka kase, mulamenya mu busiime bwase, nga ese sesi naria kamalaka ka Paapa wase mala namenya mu busiime bwewe.
Namubooleele kano nio ekhoyo yase ebe mwinywe lundi mwesi mube ne khoyo yenywe mubwichufu.
Lilaka liase nilieli: Siimana mwabene ne mwabene busa, nga ese ne namusiima enywe.
Mbao busiime bukali nibwo omundu anyala aba nabwo khu basaale bewe nga khuaana bulamu bwewe sikila nibo tawe.
Ne enywe muli basaale base, mwaba ne mukhola niko mulaka.
Ne se ndamulaanga enywe lundi ndi bakholi tawe, sikila omukholi samanyile niko omwami wewe akhola tawe. Ne kakhali, ndamulaanga enywe ndi basaale, sikila namubooleele enywe buli siindu nisio naulila khukhwama khu Paapa wase.
Enywe se mwandobora ese tawe, ese niye owamurobora enywe, mala namuruma ndi muche mwaame kamatuunda kamakali, lukano lwe kamatuunda kamenya lukali. Khwako Paapa akhamuelesie siosi siosi nisio mukhasabe mu lisina liase.
Kano nono, niko mulakiilisia enywe, siimana mwabeene ne mwabeene.
“Sibala ne simubiila, khebulila muli sianyoa siambiila ese.
Abanga enywe be sibala andi sibala siamusiima nga babaandu basio. Ne kakhali, namurobora khukhwama mu sibala ne se muli be sibala tawe ako niko kakila sibala ne simubiila enywe.
Khebulila niko namuboolela: ‘Se aliio nasioobi omukali khukhila Omwami wewe tawe.’ Baba ne bakhupia ese sibi akhaba enywe mwesi balamupia siibi, ne baba ne baria kamekisio kase balaria akhaba kakenywe kosi.
Ne bakhamukholele kano koosi sikila muli babase; ne se bamanyile oyo owaanduma tawe.
Abanga se necha mala mbaboolela tawe, andi se bali ne bubwoni tawe. Nono luno luri se banyala khuba ne sifuno nisio baloma bali siakila khwakhola bubwoni tawe.
Yesi yesi oumbiila ese abiila akhaba Paapa wase.
Se bakhabeele ne bubwoni tawe, abanga ese se nakhola mu nibo bibiindu nibio omundu okundi yesi yesi akhakholakho tawe. Nga ne kali, babona nibio nakhola mala bambiila ese ne Paapa wase yesi.
Kakhaba kario kano kolaana khukholekha nio kakaandikwa mu Lilaka liabwe koole khuba ng'ali: ‘Bambiila ese ne kakhali se babakho ne sifuno siosi siosi tawe.’
Omuyeeti alecha, Roho owama khu Paapa lundi owekesianga bung'ali bwa Wele. Kharume niye khwinywe khukhwama khu Paapa mala akhalome kakaase.
Ne akhaba enywe mwesi muli baloli base, sikila mwabele nase khukhwama mu khurakikha.

“Namubooleele kano, nio mukhalekha lisuubila lienywe tawe.
Bakhamuonele elala mu chisinakooki, mala siise silecha buli mundu omwiira enywe alebaasia ali nono alikho akholela Wele kimilimo.
Balikhola bibiindu bino khwinywe sikila se bamanyile ese namwe Paapa wase tawe.
Ne namubooleele kano nio siise ne sioolile khu nibo khukhola bibiindu bino, mulikhebulila muli nanyoa namuboolela.
“Se namubooleele bibiindu bino e khurakikha tawe, sikila bele ndi nanywe.
Ne luno ese ndikho nja khuyo owanduma, ne salikhoo mulala khwinywe oundeeba ali olikho ocha wae tawe.
Sikila namubooleele enywe luno kimiooyo kienywe kili ne bubeeleli bukali.
Ne ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi, buli bulayi khwinywe ese nje, sikila ne khacha tawe Omuyeeti salecha khwinywe tawe. Ne kakhali nenja, ndamuruma eche khwinywe.
Ne nga akheeche akheekesie babaandu be sibala ali, bali bakhiikha khuloondekhana ne bubwoni, khuloondekhana ne buluungi, ne khuloondekhana nende bukhalaki bwa Wele.
Bali bakhiikha khuloondekhana ne bubwoni sikila se basuubila ese tawe,
khuloondekhana ne buluungi, sikila ndikho nja niiko Paapa ali mala enywe se mulambonakho lundi tawe,
lundi bali bakhiikha khulwe bukhalaki, sikila omwami owe sibala sino akhalakiilwe khale.
“Ndi ne kamakali ke khumuboolela enywe, ne kakhali siise sino se mukanyala tawe.
Kakhaba kario, nga Roho owa ng'ali ne echa, owekesianga bung'ali bwa Wele; akhamwekesie bung'ali bwoosi. Sakhaboole khulwe bunyali bwewe omwene tawe, ne kakhali akhalomalome niko aulila, mala akhalomalome ke bibiindu bibiicha.
Akhambelesie ese luyali sikila akhabukule niko ese ndoma mala akhamuboolele enywe.
Bioosi nibio Paapa wase ali nabio bili bibiase, ako niko kakila ne mboola ndi Roho akhabukule niko ese muelesie niye mala amuboleele enywe.
“Mu siise sikeekhe se mulambonakho ese lundi tawe, ne enyuma we siise sikeekhe lundi mulambona.”
Balala khu beeka bewe bareebana babeene ne babeene bali, “Lino liboola siina? Akhuboolela efwe ali, mu siise sitiiti se khukhamubone tawe, mala enyuma we siise sitiiti khulamubona, ne lundi aloma ali, ‘Sikila ndikho nja niio Paapa ali.’ ”
Khwako baba ne bareebana bali, “Ne aloma ali, ‘Mu siise sitiiti,’ aba aafunaanisie siina? Se khwamanyile nisio alikho alomalomakho tawe!”
Yesu amanya niko benya khumureeba, nio ababoolela ali “Ndomile ndi mu siise sikeekhe se mulambona tawe, ne enyuma we siise sikeekhe mulambona. Kano se kali niko mulareebananga tawe ku?
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi, enywe mulalila ne khukhwiunamila, ne kakhali be sibala balasangaala, enywe mulaba ne bubeeleli, ne bubeeleli bwenywe bulakaluukhana bube busangaafu.
Omukhasi ne alikho alumwa ali ne bubeeleli sikila esaa yewe eye buchuuni yolile, ne nga omwana nasaalwa, ebilila buchuuni bwewe, ali omusangaafu sikila omwana asaalilwe mu sibala.
Kali busa kario khwinywe, luno muli ne bubeeleli, ne kakhali khamubone lundi, mala kimiooyo kienywe kikhechule busangaafu nibwo omundu yesi yesi akhamunuula tawe:
Ndikho muboolela bung'ali ndi nga endaalo eyo ne lioola, se muliisabakho siosi siosi tawe. Paapa akhamuelesie enywe buli nisio enywe musaba mu lisina liase.
Khukhwola luno se mwamusabilekho sisiindu siosi siosi mu lisina liase tawe. Saba mala mulanyoola, nio busangaafu bwenywe bwoole khukhwichulila elala.
“Narumikhiire chisimo khumuboolela enywe bibiindu bino. Ne kakhali esaa elikho yiicha niyo khalomalome ka Paapa khwinywe abuwaanga busa ne kharumikhira chisimo tawe!
Nga endaalo eyo ne khoole, mukhasabe mu lisina liase; ne mboola ndi, ese se khamusaabile enywe khu niye tawe,
sikila Paapa omwene amusiima enywe. Amusiima sikila mwasiima ese, mala mwasuubila muli ese nama wa Wele.
Ese nama wa Paapa ne necha mu sibala, mala luno ndikho ndura khu sibala nja wa Paapa.”
Nio babeeka bewe bamuboolela bali, “Luno olikho olomaloma busa abuwaanga se olikho orumikhira chisimo lundi tawe.
Khwamanyile luno khuli ewe wamanya buli siindu: se kali bali wenya omundu okundi akhureebe lireeba tawe. Lino likhukhola efwe khusuubile khuli ewe wama wa Wele.”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Enywe luno mwasuubiile?
Esaa elikho yiicha, mala eli ano khale, niyo enywe mweesi mulasalanisibwa, buli mundu alacha mungo mwewe, ne ese ndarama seng'ene. Ne kakhali ng'ali se ndi seng'ene tawe, sikila Paapa ali nase.
Namubooleele kano koosi nio mube ne kumuleembe khulwe khuambaasibwa khwise. Be sibala balamunyaasia enywe. Ne ba, banyindaafu! Ese naula sibala.”

Enyuma Yesu ne amalile khulomaloma kano, akalama angaaki mala aloma ali, “Paapa, esaa eyo yolile. Elesia Omwana wowo luyali, nio Omwana naye akhuelesie ewe luyali.
Sikila wamuelesia bunyali khu baandu boosi, nio ole khuana bulamu bwa mindali khwaabo boosi nibo ewe wamuelesia.
Ne bulamu bwa mindali buli khu khumanya ewe Wele owa ng'ali weng'ene, ne khumanya Yesu Kristo, niye waruma.
Ese nokesie luyali lwowo khu sibala, ese namalile kimilimo nikio ewe wambelesia ese khole.
Paapa! Luno mbelesie luyali mu moni chowo, luyali ne lulwene nilwo khwaba nalwo, ese ne nawe sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe.
“Ese nakhukhola ewe wamanyikhana khwaabo nibo ewe wambelesia khukhwama mu sibala, baba ba bowo mala wambelesia ese. Baria elomo yowo,
ne luno bamanyile bali, buli siindu nisio ewe wambelesia siaama khwiwe.
Ese nabaelesia nibo burume nibwo ewe wambelesia ese, mala babwakaanila, bamanyile bali lili ng'ali, ese nama khwiwe, mala basuubila bali ewe wanduma ese.
“Ese mbasabila nibo, se sabila sibala tawe, ne kakhali sabila abo nibo ewe wambelesia ese sikila bali babowo.
Boosi nibo ese ndi nabo bali babowo, ne boosi nibo ewe oli nabo bali babase, mala luyali lwase lwakhosisie khubirira mu nibo.
Ne luno ndikho nicha niio oli, se ndi lundi mu sibala tawe, ne nibo bali mu sibala. Paapa Omutakatifu! Baliinde bulayi mu bunyali bwe lisina liowo, lisina nilio ewe wambelesia ese, nio babe siindu silala busa nga ewe ne nase ne khuli siindu silala.
Nga naba ne siili nabo, nabaliinda bulayi ne bunyali bwe lisina liowo, lisina nilio wambelesia ese. Nabaliinda ne se aliio mulala khu nibo owatiba tawe, nakhali omwana we butibi oyo nio liiandiko liole khuba ng'ali.
Ne luno ese ndikho nicha niio oli mala mboola bibiindu bino mu sibala nio boole khuba ne liliekhoya liase mu miooyo kiabwe mu bwichufu.
Nabaelesia burume bwowo, mala sibala siababiila, sikila se bali be sibala sino tawe, nga ese sesi nekhali owe sibala tawe.
Se ndikho khusaba ewe obarusie mu sibala tawe, ne kakhali khusaba obalinde bulayi khukhwama khu Mumayaanu.
Nga ese nekhali owe sibala tawe, bosi se bali be sibala tawe.
Bakhole babe batakatifu khulwe bung'ali, elomo yowo niyo bung'ali.
Nabaruma nibo mu sibala nga ewe wesi ne wanduma ese mu sibala.
Ne sikila nibo, ese nerusia samwene khwiwe, nio akhaba nibo bosi boole khukhwirusia ng'ali khwiwe.
“Se mbasabila nibo bong'ene tawe, ne kakhali akhaba abo bosi basuubila mwise sikila burume bwabwe.
Saba ndi boosi babe siindu silala. Paapa! Nibo boole khuba mwifwe, nga ewe ne oli mwise ne ese mwiwe. Boole khuba siindu silala nio be sibala basuubile bali ewe wanduma ese.
Nabaelesia luyali lulwene nilwo ewe wambelesia ese, nio boole khuba siindu silala nga ewe ne nase khuli.
Ese mbe mu nibo ne ewe mwise, nio boole khubeela elala siindu silala, nio babaandu be sibala bamanye bali ewe wanduma ese lundi ewe wabasiima nibo nga ne wasiima ese.
Ewe Paapa wambelesia ese babaandu bano mala nenya babe nase niio ndi, nio boole khubona luyali lwase, luyali nilwo ewe wambelesia ese, sikila wasiima ese ebweeni we sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe.
Paapa Omuluungi! Babaandu be sibala se bakhumanyile ewe tawe, ne kakhali ese khumanyile, mala bano bamanyile bali ewe wanduma ese.
Nakhukhola ewe wamanyikha, mala ndachiililila khukhola ndio, nio busiime nibwo ewe oli nabwo khwise bwoole khuba mu nibo, nio akhaba sesi noole khuba mu nibo.”

Enyuma we lisaba lino, Yesu, arekukha ne babeeka bewe bacha engelekha we luluuchi lwa Kiduroni. Khakuunda khe kimirongooro khabao nikho baandu baolelangao, mala Yesu ne babeeka bewe bachaamo.
Yuda, omuchaami, abeele amanya niio khakuunda akho khaba, sikila Yesu aakaananilangao ne babeeka bewe biise bikali.
Nio Yuda ne kumukaanda kwe basikari be bubwami bwe Barumi, ne balala khu baliindi be Lukaangu ba barumwa ne basaayi bakhulu ne Bafarisayo, bacha mu khakuunda akho; baba babanuule bulwaani lundi basutile chitaa ne chinjaso.
Yesu amanya buli siindu sisiaba ne sicha khumwikholekhakho, nio eseenda ebweeni mala abareeba ali, “Naanu niye enywe mulikho muyiima?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Yesu owa Nasareti.”
Ababoolela ali, “Niise.” Yuda, omuchaami, aba emileo ne nabo.
Nga Yesu ne ababoolela ali, “Niise,” besenda enyuma mala bakwa aasi.
Yesu abareeba lundi ali, “Naanu niye enywe mulikho muyiima?” Baboola bali, “Yesu owa Nasareti.”
Yesu ababoolela ali, “Muboolele khale ndi niise. Nono, mwaba ne mulikho mumbenja ese, lekha babaandi bano bache.”
(Aboola kano nio niko aba aboola kolaane khuba ng'ali: “Paapa, se natibiakho akhaba mulala khu nibo ewe wamba tawe.”)
Simoni Petero aaba ne mbalu, akichoola mala arema nasioobi owo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali liiru lie lubeka luseecha liakwa aasi. Lisina lia nasioobi oyo liaba bali Maliko.
Yesu aboolela Petero ali, “kobosia embalu yowo mu sibaabi! Ewe wibaasia oli, ese se nyala nanywa sikoombe sie sinyaasio nisio Paapa wase ambelesie tawe?”
Nio basikari be bubwami bwe Barumi ne omukhulu wabwe ne baliindi be Siyuda baamba Yesu, bamuboa,
banyoa bamuyila khu Anasi, raraawe owa mukha Kayafa owaba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali kumwiiko okwo.
Kayafa aba niye owakaambila Bayaudi be bunyali ali buli bulayi omundu mulala afwiile babaandu boosi.
Simoni Petero ne omweeka okundi baloonda khu Yesu. Omweeka okundi oyo aba amanyikhana khu Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe Lukaangu, nio acha ne Yesu khu luuya lwe nju eyo Musaayi omukhulu,
Petero arama enje we silibwa. Nio omweeka okundi chana owamanyikhana khu Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali arura enje, alomaloma no mukhaana we a silibwa oliinda silibwa mala afukiilila Petero khukhwingila mukari.
Omukhaana we mu silibwa areeba Petero ali, “Ewe wesi se oli mulala khu beeka bo Mundu oyo tawe ku?” Petero amukobosia ali, “Se ndi mulalakho tawe.”
Bakholi ne baliindi baba babwanile kumulilo mala baba bemile bakubotookhelele, baba boora sikila embeo yabao. Nio Petero acha emao nabo ne ora.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali areeba Yesu kamareeba khu beeka bewe ne ke kamekisio kewe.
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ese buli lwosi ndomalomanga abuwaanga khu buli mundu; kamekisio kase koosi ne kisianga mu chisinakooki ne mu Lukaangu, niio babaandu boosi bebuusianga. Khaaboolakho sisiindu siosi siosi mu bwikisi tawe.
Siina sikila nono ne mundeeba ese? Reeba babaandu ba bambulila. Khemubareebe niko nababoolela. Nibo bamanyile niko nalomaloma.”
Nga Yesu aloma kano, mulala khu baliindi amupa luui mala aloma ali, “Olomaloma oriena khu Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali!”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Naaba ne mboolile sisiindu siosi siosi sibi, boolela ano buli mundu, sibele siina. Ne naaba ne ndi ng'ali mu niko ndomile, siina sikila ne ukhupa?”
Nio Anasi ayila Yesu nasiili omuboe, khu Kayafa Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali we Lukaangu.
Petero aba oora kumulilo. Nio babaandi bamuboolela bali, “Ewe wesi se oli mulala khu beeka bo mundu oyo tawe ku?”
Ne Petero ekaana lundi ali, “Se ndi mulalakho tawe.”
Mulala khu nasioobi bo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali we Lukaangu, omulebe wo mundu niye Petero arema liiru, amureeba ali, “Ese se khubone ewe ne naye mu khakuunda akho tawe ku?”
Petero aloma lundi ali, “Tawe.” Ne mala etaaywa ekholiokha.
Makhelebeende babukula Yesu bamurusia munju eya Kayafa bamuyila mwichipi mwo muruki. Bayaudi be bunyali se bengila mwichipi mwo muruki tawe, sikila benya khuba bakwalaafu mu miima kiabwe kie Siyuda nio balie siakhulia sie Pasaka.
Nio Pilato arura enje abareeba ali, “Muli na masitako sina khu mundu yuno?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Abanga sakholile kamabi tawe andi se khwamureerire khwiwe tawe.”
Pilato ababoolela ali, “Nono enywe mwabeene khemumubukule mala mumuyaale khuloondekhana ne Lilaka lienywe.” Nio bamukobosia bali, “Efwe se khufukiililwa khukhwira omundu yesi yesi tawe.”
[Kano kekholekha nio kamakhuwa niko Yesu aloma koole khuba kang'ali nga ne ekesia lifwa siina nilio alifwa.]
Pilato akobola mwichipi mala alaanga Yesu amureeba ali, “Ewe oli Omwami we Bayaudi?”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Lireeba lino liama khwiwe wamwene namwe babaandi bakhuboolele kakaase?”
Pilato amukobosia ali, “Wibaasia oli ese ndi Omuyaudi? Bali babaandu bowo babeene ne basaayi bakhulu bakhureerire khwise. Okholile siina?”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Bubwami bwase se buli bwe khu sibala sino tawe; Bubanga bwe khu sibala sino, andi babeeka base bapane ndekha khuaanwa khu Bayaudi be bunyali tawe. Bubwami bwase se buli bwe aasi ano tawe!”
Nio Pilato amureeba lundi ali, “Nono, ewe oli Omwami?” Yesu amukobosia ali, “Ewe oloma oli ese ndi Omwami. Nasaalwa mala necha mu sibala, sikila sifuno silala siong'ene nisio khulomaloma khu ke bung'ali. Omundu yesi yesi oli owe bung'ali andekeeresianga.”
Pilato amureeba ali, “Ne bung'ali nisio siina?”
Nio Pilato arura lundi enje mu baandu mala aloma ali, “Se nyala nanyoola sifuno siosi siosi sie khumukhalakilakho tawe.
Ne khuloondekhana ne kumwiima nikwo muli nakwo, buli lwosi mulekhulilanga omuboe mu Pasaka. Mwenya mulekhulile enywe Omwami we Bayaudi?”
Bamukobosia ne luyoka bali, “Tawe, niye tawe! Khwenya Barabasi!” (Barabasi aba omunuuli).

Nio Pilato abukula Yesu mala aamuraakho bamupe biboko.
Basikari bang'oona ekuutwa eye kamawa bamufwara khu murwe, lundi bamufwara ekaanjo efwaana buseemwa,
bamwichakho ne baloma bali, “Omwami we Bayaudi, oiindile!” Mala bamuupa chimbi.
Pilato aarura lundi enje mala aboolela babaandu ali, “Lola, ndikho mureera anje khwinywe, mubone muli ese, se namunyoolilemo sifuno siosi siosi sikila niye akhalakilwe tawe.”
Nio Yesu aarura anje, aafwarire ekuutwa eye kamawa ne kaanjo. Pilato ababoolela ali, “Lola! Omundu chana oyusiina!”
Nga basaayi bakhulu ne baliindi be Lukaangu bamubona, baapa luyoka bali, “Mubambe! Mubambe!” Pilato ababoolela ali, “Mu bukule mwabene mala mumubambe. Se namunyoolilekho sifuno sie khumukhalakila tawe.”
Babaandu bamukobosia bali, “Efwe khuli ne lilaka liboola lili akhoyeela khufwa, sikila elaanga khuuba Omwana owa Wele.”
Nga Pilato aulila kano, aba ne buuri bukali po.
Akobola mwichipi, mala areeba Yesu ali, “Ewe wama waena?” Ne Yesu se amukobosia tawe.
Pilato amureeba ali, “Solalomalomakho nase tawe? Khebulila oli, ese ndi ne bunyali khu khulekhuula namwe khukhukhola bakhubambe.”
Yesu akobosia ali, “Oli ne bunyali khwise sikila Wele niye owakhuelesia. Ne kakhali omundu oundeerire khwiwe ali ne kumusaango kwe bubwoni bubi lukali.”
Nga Pilato ne aulila kano akhaka khunyoola engila eye khulekhuula Yesu. Ne babaandu bamuyokelela bali, “Wamulekhuula, aba kaboola kali ewe se oli omusaale owo mwami Kaisari tawe! Omundu yesi yesi owelanganga ali, ali omwami se enyanga ko Mwami Omukhulu tawe!”
Nga Pilato aulila kamakhuwa kano, abukula Yesu amureera enje mala ekhala khu ndebe eye bukhalaki abuundu niio balanga bali, “Mumatooche”. (Mu Lueburania lisina elio lili “Kabata.”)
Yaba embi mwiangilwe, endaalo ndala nio Epasaka yole. Pilato aaboolela Bayaudi ali, “Omwami wenywe oyusiina!”
Bakobosia ne luyoka bali, “Mwire! Mwire! Mubaambe!”
Pilato aabareeba ali, “Mwenya ese mbaambe Omwami wenywe?” Basaayi bakhulu bakobosia bali, “Efwe khumanyile Omwami Kaisari yeng'ene!”
Mala Pilato aabakaanisia Yesu, bamubaambe.
Yesu arura enje nasutile kumusalaba kwewe, mala oola abuundu alaangwa bali, “Abuundu we siianga.” (Mu Lueburania alaangwa bali, Kolikota.)
Abwenao niio bamubambila ne babaandi babili, mulala buli lubeka ne Yesu akari wabwe.
Pilato aandika kamaandiko ali, “Yesu owa Nasareti, omwami we Bayaudi” akakhoma khu musalaba kwa Yesu.
Babaandu bakali bakasoma sikila abuundu niio Yesu abaambilwa, se aba aleeyi khukhwama mu lukoba tawe. Kamaandiko kaandikwa mu Lueburania, Lulatini ne Lukiriki.
Basaayi bakhulu baboolela Pilato bali, “Okhaandika oli, ‘Omwami owe Bayaudi’ tawe, ne kakhali andika oli, ‘Omundu yuno alomanga ali, Ese ndi Omwami we Bayaudi.’ ”
Pilato aaloma ali, “Niko mbandike kalarama busa kario.”
Nga basikari bamala khu bamba Yesu, babukula chingubo chewe bachikhalamo bitonye bine, buli musikaari sitonyi. Babukula ekaanjo yosi, eyanabwa ne kamakhono mu sitonyi silala siong'ene.
Basikari baboolana bali, “Khukhakitabulamo tawe; khe khuupe chikura khubone naanu olakibukula.” Lino liakholekha nio liiandiko lichusibwe liboola lili,
“Bakabana chingubo chase,
mala baapa chikura khu kaanjo yase.”
Kano niko basikari bakhola.
Maawe owa Yesu, ne wandaaye omukhaana, Maria mukha Kiliopa, ne Maria Makatalena baba bemile amusalaba.
Yesu abona maawe no mweka niye asiima bemileo; nio aboolela maawe ali, “Yuno omwana wowo.”
Nio aboolela omweeka oyo ali, “Yuno maao.” Khukhwama esaa eyo omweeka oyo abukula Maria maawe owa Yesu mala aamenya naye mungo mwewe.
Sibuumba siabao, ne ndali endulu yechulekho, nio benikha sisiaangu mu ndali endulu eyo, bauna sisiaangu esio khu lusaala, mala basuta bara emunwa wewe.
Yesu anywa endali mala aloma ali, “Kawele!” Mala enamikha kumurwe kwewe afwa.
Nio Bayaudi be bunyali bareeba Pilato abaelesie kumunwa bafunake bikele bie babaandu ba bambiilwe, mala barusie kimibili kiabwe khu misalaba. Bamureeba kano sikila yaba endaalo eya Ichuuma, mala se benya bafu babe khu misalaba khukhwola mu Sabato tawe, lundi khutasakho esabato eye Pasaka.
Khwako bacha mala bafuna bikele bio mundu owe khunyoa, lundi bacha bafuna okundi yesi owabambwa ne Yesu.
Ne nga boola khu Yesu, babona bali afwiile khale, khwako se bafunaka bikele biewe tawe.
Kakhaba kario mulala khu basikari, auna Yesu lifumo mumbafu, mala abwene na abwene kamafuki kachichukha ne kameechi.
(Oyo owabona kano ne kekholekha akalomalomekho, nio enywe mwesi mwole khusuubila muli, niko aboola kali kang'ali, mala amanyile ali alomanga bung'ali.)
Kano kakholekha khukhola liiandiko lichusibwe liboola lili, “Sikuumba siewe nasilala siong'ene se silifunakwa tawe.”
Ne liliio liiandiko liliindi liboola lili, “Babaandu balibona niye bauna.”
Enyuma wa kano, Yosefu, owama mu lukoba lwa Arimatea, areeba Pilato ne kali bali anyala abukula kumubili kwa Yesu. (Yosefu aba omuloondi owa Yesu, mu bwikisi, sikila aba aria Bayaudi be bunyali.) Pilato amuboolela ali anyala abukula kumubili kwa Yesu, nio Yosefu acha akubukula.
Nikodemu, owacha khubona Yesu mu silo, acha ne Yosefu. Aaba abukuule chikiilo embi kamakhumi kataru ka manemane ne bupaani.
Babili bano babukula kumubili kwa Yesu mala bakura mu suuka eya katani ne bupaani khuloondekhana ne kumwiima kwe Bayaudi, khukhwerekekhera lisiikha.
Khakuunda khaba abuundu niio bereera Yesu, mala mu khakuunda akho yabamo eng'ani embia, niyo omundu akhasiikhwakhomo tawe.
Eng'ani yaba siimbi ne lundi yaba yaramire endaalo ndala khukhwola khu Sabato. Khwako basiikha mu ng'ani omwo kumubili kwa Yesu.

Khu ndaalo eya Chumapili enje ne siili mabwibwi, Maria Makatalena acha khu siliindwa mala abona libaale liarusiibwe emuliango we siliindwa.
Atima acha ola khu Simoni Petero no mweka okundi, niye Yesu asiima, mala ababoolela ali, “Barusiisie Omwami mu siliindwa, mala se khwamanyile niio bamuyilile tawe!”
Nio Petero no mweka okundi oyo bacha khu siliindwa
Bombi baba balikho batima, omweeka okundi oyo atima lukali khukhila Petero, mala anyoa oola asiliindwa.
Enama mala abona chisuuka cha katani, ne se acha mukari tawe.
Simoni Petero echa enyuma wewe, mala acha khangu mu siliindwa. Abona chisuuka cha katani chili ao chong'ene.
Ne chingubo nicho yaba bamuboa emurwe, nacho se chaba alala ne cha katani tawe, chaba cheulukuuse chong'ene.
Nio omweeka okundi chana owanyoa oola asiliindwa yesi engilamo, abona mala asuubila.
(Baba basiili khumanyilisia liiandiko liboola lili, khukhwola alamukhe mu lifwa tawe.)
Mala babeeka bakobola engo.
Maria eema enje we siliindwa nalililao. Nga aba nasilila, enama mala alola mu siliindwa,
abona malaika babili bafwarire chingubo chiwaanga, bekhaale niio yaba kumubili kwa Yesu kwaba, mulala emurwe ne okundi ebikele.
Bamureeba bali, “Mukhasiwe olalilanga siina?” Abakobosia ali, “Babukule Omwami wase mala se manya niio bamuyilile tawe!”
Nio ekhebukha abona Yesu emileo, ne se amanya nali Yesu tawe.
Yesu amureeba ali, “Mukhasiwe, olalilanga siina? Olikho oyiima naanu?”
Maria ebaasia ali manya ali omulimi we khalundu, nio amuboolela ali, “Omwami waaba ne omubukuule, mboolele niio omuyilile ne ndacha mala mu bukule.”
Yesu amulaanga ali, “Maria!” Nio Maria, ekhebukha Yesu mala aboola mu Lueburania ali, “Raboni!” (Lino liboola lili, “Omwekisia.”)
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Okhandilakho tawe.” Sikila khaniina nakobola niye Paapa ali tawe. Ne kakhali khoche khu bawandaayase mala obaboolele oli, ese ndikho ngobola khuyo oli Paapa wase lundi Paapa wabwe, Wele wase lundi Wele wabwe.
Nio Maria Makatalena acha aboolela babeeka ali, abone Omwami, mala ababoolela niko Yesu aaba ne amuboleele.
Yaba Chumapili ekolooba, babeeka baba bebuusiisie alala munju mala bakhomekhe kimiliango, sikila baba barire Bayaudi be bunyali. Nio Yesu echa mala eema akari wabwe, aloma ali, “kumuleembe kube nanywe.”
Enyuma we khuloma kano, abekesia kamakhono kewe ne mumbafu. Babeeka be khoya lukali nga babona Omwami.
Yesu ababoolela lundi ali, “kumuleembe kube nanywe. Nga Paapa ne anduma ese, sesi ndikho muruma enywe.”
Abafuakho kumuuya mala aloma ali, “Khemunyoole Roho Omutakatifu.
Ne mubeela babaandu bubwoni bwabwe, aba balabeelwa, ne mwaba ne mukhababeela tawe, aba se balabeelwa tawe.”
Mulala khu beeka ekhumi na babili, Tomasi (Owalaangwa Mukhwana) se aba ne nabo nga Yesu ne echa tawe.
Nio babeeka babaandi bamuboolela bali, “Khwaboone Omwami!” Tomasi ababoolela ali, “Ese ne khabone chimbala che kimisimari mukhono mwewe, mala nde lulwala lwase khu mbala chewe, ne kumukhono kwase mu mbala che mumbafu, se suubila tawe.”
Enyuma we lichuuma, babeeka baba lundi alala munju mala bakhomekhe kimiliango. Tomasi aba ne nabo, Yesu echa mala eema akari wabwe aloma ali, “kumuleembe kube nanywe.”
Nio aboolela Tomasi ali, “Ra ano lulwala lwowo, mala olole mukhono mwase, ne reera kumukhono kwowo ore mu mbafu mwase lekha khuayaaya khube mala osuubile!”
Tomasi amukobosia ali, “Omwami wase, lundi Wele wase!”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Ewe wasuubiile sikila wamboone? Bali ne khabi abo basuubile ne bakhaboone tawe.”
Yesu akhola kamayia kakaandi kamakali ebweeni we babeeka bewe kakhaandikwa mu sitabu sino tawe.
Ne kano kaandikwe nio mwole khusuubila muli Yesu ali Kristo, Omwana owa Wele, ne khubirira mu lisuubila mu niye mwoole khuba ne bulamu.

Enyuma wa kano, Yesu abonekha lundi khu beeka bewe a nyanja eya Tiberia. Kaba kari.
Simoni Petero, Tomasi (olaangwa Mukhwana) Natanieli (owama Kana mu Kalilaya) bakhwa Sebetayo, ne babeeka babaandi babili ba Yesu baba alala boosi.
Simoni Petero aboolela babaandi ali, “Ndikho nja khunaaba.” Bamuboolela bali, “Khulacha ne nawe.” Nio bacha khu liaaro khu nyanja, ne siilo esio siosi, se banyoolakho eng'eeni tawe.
Nga enyanga yaba nesoa Yesu eema khu sikiingi sie nyanja, ne babeeka se bamanya nali niye tawe.
Mala abareeba ali, “Basoleeli, mwanyoolilekho siosi ku?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Se khwanyoolilekho siindu tawe.”
Omweeka niye Yesu asiima aboolela Petero ali, “Omwami niye!” Nga Petero aulila ali Omwami niye, eboa engubo yewe eye khu ngaaki (sikila aba akifuulile) mala asuna mu meechi.
Babeeka babaandi becha a sikiingi khu liaaro ne balikho bakhweesa lutimba se baba aleeyi khukhwama khu sibala tawe, embi chimita emia ndala.
Nga boola khu sikiingi, babona kumukaati ne ng'eeni khu mulilo.
Nio Yesu ababoolela ali, “Reerakho ano, ching'eeni chindala nicho mwama khutiila.”
Simoni Petero acha khu liaaro, mala akhweesa lutiimba nalureera khu sikiingi. Lwaba lwechuule ching'eeni chimboofu emia ndala ne kamakhumi karaano na chitaru choosi alala, akhaba ne chaba chingali chirio, lutiimba se lwakitukha tawe.
Yesu abalaanga ali, “Khemwiche mulie.” Sabao omweeka owenyiila khumureeba ali, “Ewe oli naanu tawe?” Sikila bamanya bali aaba Omwami.
Nio Yesu acha, abukula kimikaati ne ching'eeni mala abaelesia.
Luno lwaba lukhola khataru Yesu khubonekha khu beeka bewe enyuma we khulamukha khukhwama mu lifwa.
Enyuma we khulia, Yesu areeba Simoni Petero ali, “Simoni, okhwa Yoana, ewe wasiima ese khukhila babaandi bano ku?” Akobosia ali, “Yee Omwami, ewe Omanyile oli ese nakhusiima.”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Liinda kamameeme kase.”
Lukhola khabili Yesu areeba Petero ali, “Simoni okhwa Yoana, ewe wasiima?” Amukobosia ali, “Yee Omwami, ewe Omanyile oli ese nakhusiima ewe.” Yesu amuboolela ali, “Liinda kamakheese kase.”
Lukhola khataru Yesu amureeba ali, Simoni okhwa Yoana, ewe wasiima ese.
Petero akhalala sikila Yesu amureebire lukhola khataru ali, “Ewe wasiima ese ku?” Nio amuboolela ali, “Omwami ewe omanyile buli siindu, ewe omanyile oli nakhusiima!”
Yesu amuboolela ali, “Liisia kamakheese kase.
Ndikho khuboolela bung'ali: Nga ne waba nosiili omuele, werekekhanga mala ocha osi osi niio wenyanga khucha, ne kakhali nga okhasaakhuluwe, okhareo kamakhono kowo mala omundu okundi akhakhuboe mala akhuyile niio ewe okhenya khucha tawe.”
(Mukhuloma lino, Yesu aba alikho okesia engila niyo Petero alifwilamo, mala areere luyali khu Wele.) Nio Yesu amuboolela ali, “Nondekho!”
Nga Petero ne amubona areeba Yesu ali, “Omwami ne yuno naye?”
Yesu amukobosia ali, “Nakheenya niye amenye khukhwola nga ne nicha, lilienelio lili siina khwiwe? Ewe nondekho!”
Nio likhuwa liakeenda mu babeeka ba Yesu bali omweeka yuno se alifwa tawe. Kakhaba kario Yesu se aaloma ali omweeka oyo se alifwa tawe tawe, ne kakhali aaloma ali, “Naaba ne nenya amenye khukhwola nga nicha, lilienelio lili siina khwiwe.”
Yuno niye omweeka owalomaloma kamakhuwa kano, ne lundi ali niye owa kaandika, mala khu manyile khuli niko aloma kali kang'ali.
Ne kakhali, biliio bibiindu bibiindi bikali nibio Yesu akhola. Abanga biaandikwa sia silala mu bitabu, nibaasia ndi andi sibala sioosi se siakhabeele ne bubweyaangu bwe khubiikha bitabu ebio tawe.

Mu sitabu siase sitaayi, naandika bibiindu bioosi nibio Yesu aakhola ne khukhwikisia khukhwama nga ne arakikha kimilimo kiewe,
khukhwola endaalo niyo abukulilwakho ayilwa mwikulu. Ne akhabukulwa khuyilwa mwikulu tawe, aana lilakiilisia khubirira mu maani ka Roho Omutakatifu khu baandu nibo aarobora khuba barumwa bewe.
Mu ndaalo kamakhumi kane enyuma we lifwa liewe, aababonekhela barumwa bewe ne ekesia abuwaanga mu ngila choosi ali, aaba omulamu. Bamubona, mala alomaloma nabo ke bubwami bwa Wele.
Nga ne becha alala, abalakiilisia ali, “Mukharura mu Yerusalemu tawe, ne kakhali khemulindiilile siianwa nisio namuboolela, siianwa nisio Paapa asuubisia khuaana.
Yoana abatiisia ne kameechi, ne mu ndaalo ndiiti chichiicha, mulabatiisibwa mu Roho Omutakatifu.”
Nga barumwa bakaanana alala bareeba Yesu bali, “Omwami, mu siise sino olakoboselia Baisiraeli bubwami?”
Yesu abakobosia ali, “Se kali kakenywe khumanya siise namwe chindaalo nicho Paapa omwene aarao mu bunyali bwewe tawe.
Ne mulanyoola kamaani siise nisio Roho Omutakatifu akhamwichekho, mala mulaba baloli base mu Yerusalemu, mu Yuda mwoosi ne mu Samaria ne khukhwola khu siakamo sie sibala.”
Nga aamala khuloma ario, abukulwa aniina mwikulu ne bamuloleleele, mala lifuumbi liamutiimbia, nibo khumubona lundi tawe.
Oli basiiunguusa mu ngaaki bario, nga aaba ne alikho acha, ao ne nao babaandu babili, ba baaba ne chingubo chiwaanga ba bemao.
Ba baboolela bali, “Bakalilaya, sikila siina ne mwimile nekhuloleelela mu ngaaki? Yesu yuno, obukulwe khurura khwinywe engisibwa mwikulu, alikobola mu ngila ne ng'ene niyo mu mubonelemo nacha.”
Mala barumwa bakobola Yerusalemu khukhwama khu sikulu sia Miseituni embi e kilomita ndala.
Bengila mu lukoba mala baniina mu lusiro lwe angaki nimwo bamenyanga: Petero, Yoana, Yakobo ne Andereya, Filipo ne Tomasi, Baturimayo ne Matayo, Yakobo okhwa Alufayo, Simoni omusiloti ne Yuda okhwa Yakobo.
Bano boosi bebuusianga alala khusaba buli busiele alala ne babaandu ne bakhasi, ne Maria maawe owa Yesu, ne bawandaaye ba Yesu.
Mu ndaalo echo, Petero eema akari we basuubili (boosi baba babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kabili) mala aloma ali,
“Bawandaayase, liiandiko liaba khukhwola lichusibwe nilio Roho Omutakatifu alomalomela mu Daudi nga ne ang'oola ka Yuda, owarangirira abo ba babaamba Yesu.
Yuda aaba owe kumukaanda kwefwe, sikila aaba aaroborwa khukhola ne nafwe kimilimo kino.”
Babaandu boosi ba bamenya mu Yerusalemu baulila kakekholekha, nio kumukuunda okwo mu lulimi lwabwe bakulanga bali Akelitama, liboola lili, “Kumukuunda kwe sifuki.”)
‘Enju yewe erame busa;
omundu yesi yesi akhakimenyamo tawe.’
Lundi kaandikwa kali,
‘Omundu okundi abukule bubweyaangu bwewe.’
“Khwako, khukhwola omundu okundi aambaane nafwe nga omuloli khuloondekhana ne khulamukha khwo Mwami Yesu. Khukhwola abe mulala khu nibo khwabechanga nabo busiele nga ne khwakeendanga no Mwami Yesu
khurakikhira mu siise sie libatiisia lia Yoana khukhwola khu ndaalo niyo Yesu abukulilwamo khukhwama khwifwe khuniina mwikulu. Mulala khu bano khukhwola abe omuloli alala ne nafwe khu lilamukha liewe.”
Khwako bebaasia khu baandu babili: Yosefu, niye balanganga bali Barisaba (lundi amanyikhana bali Yusito), ne Matiasi.
Mala basaba Omwami bali, “Omwami, ewe omanyile kamebaasio ka buli mundu, nono, khwekesie mulala khu babili bano niye ewe oroboore
khukhwila mu bukholi nga omurumwa mu bweyaangu bwa Yuda owaukha akobola abuundu wewe.”
Mala baapa chikura, khu babili, nio Matiasi aroborwa atasibwa khu barumwa ekhumi na mulala.

Ao ne nao lutiri lwauliilikhana khukhwama mwikulu nga lwe khungu engali ne uucha, mala yechula munju nimwo baba ne bekhaale.
Nio, babona sisiabonekha nga chinimi che kumulilo, chasalaanila ne khukhwiikha khu buli mundu owabamo.
Boosi bechusibwa ne Roho Omutakatifu, barakikha khulomaloma mu nimi chichiindi nga Roho Omutakatifu ne aabanyalila khulomaloma.
Babao Bayaudi be dini ba bamenyanga mu Yerusalemu, ba bama mu mbeka choosi che sibala.
Nga ne baulila luyoka olwo, becha alala mala boosi besiindukha lukali, sikila buli mulala khu nibo aulila basuubili ne balomaloma buli mundu mu lulomo lwewe.
Mukhurangararwa ne mukhwisiindukha bareebana bali, “Babaandu balomaloma bano se bali Bakalilaya?
Nono, aba kali kariena, buli mulala khwifwe alaulilanga niko balomaloma mu nomo chefwe ching'ene?
Balala khu khwama Paritia, babaandi Medesi ne Elamu, ne babaandi Mesopotamia, e Buyuda, ne Kapatosia; nende be Pondiasi ne Esia,
khukhwama Firikia ne Pamufilia, khukhwama e Misiri ne lubeka lwa Libia embi Kireni. Balala khwifwe bakeni khwama e Burumi,
Bayaudi nende Be Chikholo ba bafukiilila edini eye Siyuda, ne balala khwifwe bama e Kurete ne Ebuaraabu ne kakhali fwesi khubaulila ne balomalomela mu nomo chefwe bibiindu biboofu nibio Wele akholile!”
Barangararwa lundi bauka lukali, mala bachiililila khureebana bali, “Kano kekesia siina?”
Ne kakhali, babaandi bakholela babasuubila siienyameno bali, “Babaandu bano bameelile!”
Mala Petero eema alala ne barumwa basie ekhumi na mulala, mala arakikha khuboolela babaandu bakali abo ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali:
“Bayaudi basiaase, ne nanywe mwesi mumenyile mu Yerusalemu, khemundekeeresie muboolele sifuno sie kamakhuwa kano.
Babaandu bano se bameelile nga ne mwibaasia tawe; chili busa chisa chitaru che kumutikhinyi.”
Ne kakhali kano niko omung'oosi Yoeli aaloma ali:
“Kano niko khakhole mundaalo chimaliilisi,
khachukhe Roho wase khu buli mundu,
basoleeli ne bakhaana benywe bakhang'oole,
baele benywe bakhabe ne kamalola,
ne basaakhulu bakharoore.
Yee, akhaba khu bakholi base,
be siseecha nende be siikhasi,
khabachukhekho Roho wase mundaalo ng'enecho,
mala bakhang'oole.
Ndikhola kamayia khwikula
ne kamakhuwa ke khuukia khu sibala.
Kamafuki, kumulilo, ne liliisi likali.
Enyanga elimaliya,
ne kumwesi kulibesema nga kamafuki,
ebweeni we Ndaalo yo Mwami emboofu lundi eye luyali ne ekhoola tawe.
Nio, yesi yesi okhalaange khu lisina lio Mwami akhaonisibwe.
“Rekeeresia kamakhuwa kano Baisiraeli basiaase! Yesu owa Nasareti, omundu owe bunyali bwe buwele bubwabonekha abuwaanga khwinywe, mu mayia koosi ne bibiindu bie khuukia nibio Wele aakhola khubirira mu niye, enywe mwabeene mumanyile kano sikila kakholekha ano mwinywe.
Khuloondekhana ne khurekekha khwa Wele, Wele aba aabisia khale ali Yesu aliaanwa khwinywe. Ne enywe mwamubaamba khu musalaba mwamwiira khurumikhira babaandu bali enje we lilaka.
Ne kakhali Wele amulamusia khukhwama mu lifwa, amurusia mu bunyali bwalio, sikila abele se kanyalikhana lifwa limutiile nga omuboe tawe.
Sikila Daudi alomaloma ka Yesu ali,
‘Nabona Omwami ebweeni wase biise bioosi,
sikila ali kumukhono kwase kumuseecha,
se ndabakho ne buuri tawe.
Khwako ndi ne busangaafu bukali,
ne kamakhuwa kase kali ke khoyo.
Ne ese akhaba ne ndi omundu ofwa,
ndaola mu lieyikina,
sikila se olindekha e makoombe tawe.
Se olilekha omukholi wowo omusuubilwa abolele mu siliindwa tawe.
Wanjekeesie chingila che bulamu;
ndiba ne khoyo khulwe khubaao khwowo.’
“Bawandaayefwe, khukhwola ese muboolele enywe abuwaanga ka kuuka wefwe owamanyikhana, Omwami Daudi. Aafwa mala aasiikhwa, ne siliindwa siewe sili nafwe ano khukhwola endaalo yino.
Aaba omung'oosi, mala aamanya niko Wele amusuubisia. Wele echubila Daudi ali, ‘Alikhola mulala khu be lisaaye liewe abe Omwami nga Daudi ne aba.’
Daudi aabona niko Wele aaba ne acha khukhola mu ndaalo chichiicha, nio alomaloma khu lilamukha lia Kristo nga ne aloma ali,
‘Se alianjukhwa e makoombe tawe,
kumubili kwewe se kulibolela mu siliindwa tawe.’
“Wele aalamusia Yesu chana oyo khukhwama mu lifwa, ne efwe fweesi khuli baloli khu kano.
Alamusibwe khuba kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele, oli Paapa wewe, mala anyoolile Roho Omutakatifu khukhwama khu niye, nga ne amusubisia. Nisio mulikho mubona luno ne khuulila sili siianwa siewe nisio akhuchukhiile efwe.
Sikila se aaba Daudi owaniina mwikulu tawe, ne kakhali aaloma ali,
‘Omwami aboolela Omwami wase ali,
Yikhala ano amukhono kwase kumuseecha,
khukhwola nga khola basiku bowo babe endebe eye bikele biowo.’
“Nono babaandu ba Isiraeli mwesi mumanye ng'ali muli Yesu yuno, niye enywe mwabambile khu musalaba, ali niye Wele akholile Omwami, lundi Kristo.”
Nga baulila bario, bananisibwa mu miooyo, mala baboolela Petero ne barumwa basie bali, “Bawandaayefwe, efwe nono khukhole siina?”
Petero abakobosia ali, “Buli mulala khwinywe khukhwola ekanile bubwoni bwewe mala abatiisibwe mu lisina lia Yesu Kristo, nio mubeelwe bubwoni bwenywe, mala mulanyoola siianwa sia Wele, niye Roho Omutakatifu.
Sikila lisuubisia lia Wele lili khwinywe ne khu baana benywe, ne khu baali aleeyi, boosi nibo Omwami wefwe Wele, akhalaange bamwichekho.”
Petero aabekoonjelela ne kamakhuwa kakaandi kamakali ne abachuuba naloma ali, “Khemwionie khukhwama khu sinyaasio sisiicha khu baandu be bubwoni bano!”
Bakali khu nibo basuubila burume bwewe mala babatiisibwa, embi babaandu chielefu chitaru batasikha khu sipupu esio endaalo ng'ene eyo.
Barumikhira biise biabwe khukhweyika khukhwama khu barumwa, khumenya alala mu busanganilo, ne bakabana biakhulia ne khusaba Wele.
Kamayia ne kamakhuwa ke khuukia kamakali kaba kalikho kekholekha khubirira mu barumwa, mala buuri bwaamba buli mundu.
Basuubili boosi bachiililila khuba alala mu busanganilo bwa siimbisiimbi ne khukabana kimiaandu kiabwe babeene ne babeene.
Bakusianga kimiaandu kiabwe, mala bakabana chirupia, khuloondekhana ne butinyu bwa buli mundu.
Bakaananilanga mu Lukaangu buli busiele, lundi balilaanga alala mu chingo chabwe. Balichanga ne busangaafu ne kimiooyo kimilayi.
