Bafumianga Wele ne khu fukiililwa ne babaandu boosi. Ne buli endaalo Omwami Wele atasaanga khu sipupu siabwe abo ba baonisibwanga.

Endaalo ndala Petero ne Yoana bacha mu Lukaangu, mu saa ekhola tisa ekolooba, esaa eye khusaba.
Omundu owalemala khukhwama mu khusaalwa khwewe aba asilibwa sisialaangwa bali Silayi Lukali. Buli endaalo bamumemaanga ne khumureera asilibwa khusaba chirupia khukhwama khu baandu babengilanga mu Lukaangu.
Nga abona Petero ne Yoana ne benya khwingila mu Lukaangu, abasaba bamuekho buyeeti.
Bombi bamuungusa, mala Petero aloma ali, “Khuloleelele!”
Nio omundu chana abaloleelela, ne erekekheere khunyoola sisiindu khukhwama khu nibo.
Ne Petero amuboolela ali, “Se ndi ne chirupia chosi chosi tawe, ne kakhali ndakhua nisio ndi nasio; mu lisina lia Yesu Kristo owa Nasareti yinyokha okeende!”
Nio, amutiila kumukhono kumuseecha amuyeeta khukhwinyokha. Ao ne nao bikhandakilo ne chikheng'engele biaba ne kamaani;
asuna mu ngaaki, eema mala arakikha khukeenda. Engila mu Lukaangu ne nabo, akeenda, lundi asuniakila mungaaki ne khufumia Wele.
Babaandu boosi bamubona nakeenda ne khufumia Wele,
ne nga bamumanya bali niye osabanga lundi owikhalanga asilibwa Silayi, boosi bauka ne khurangararwa khu kaba ne kamwekholekhekho.
Nga omundu chana ne eamba khu Petero ne Yoana mu matooche ka kalaangwa bali ka Solomoni, babaandu barangararwa mala batima ne becha niio Petero ne Yoana bemile.
Nga Petero ne abona babaandu, ababoolela ali, “Baisiraeli basiaase sikila siina ne muuka kano, lundi siina ne mukhuungusa efwe? Enywe mwibaasia muli khukholile omundu yuno akeenda khulwe bunyali bwefwe fwabeene namwe buwele bwefwe?
Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka, ne Yakobo, Wele owe bakuuka befwe, aanile luyali lwe buwele khu mukholi wewe Yesu. Ne kakhali enywe mwamuana khu baruki, mala mwamwikaana ebweeni wa Pilato, akhaba Pilato ne enya khumulekhuula.
Aba omutakatifu lundi omulayi, ne kakhali eywe mwamuloba, mala mwakhayilila khusaba Pilato amulekhuulile omwiiri.
Mwera oyo oreera bulamu, ne Wele amulamusia khukhwama mu lifwa, ne efwe khuli baloli ba kano.
Bubeele bunyali bwe lisina liewe bueleesie omuleme yuno kamaani. Kamakhuwa niko mubona ne khumanya kano, kekholekhe khulwe lisuubila mu lisina liewe. Lisuubila mu lisina lia Yesu nilio likholile omundu yuno aona nga mwesi ne mubona muri.
“Ne luno bawandaayase, manyile ndi niko enywe ne babemeelesi benywe mwakholela Yesu, kaba kario sikila busilu bwenywe.
Wele aaloma khaale khubirira mu bang'oosi boosi ali Kristo khukhwola anyaasibwe. Khwako aakhola bung'oosi buno khuba ng'ali mu ngila yino.
Nono, yekanila, mala mukobolele Wele nio amubeele bubwoni bwenywe. Ne mukhola murio,
biise bie kamaani karoho bileecha khukhwama khu Mwami, naye alaruma Yesu, oli Kristo niye aamuroborera enywe khale.
Khukhwola arame mwikulu nabwila siise siola sie khukhola bibiindu bioosi bibe biyia, nga Wele ne aaloma khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe batakatifu be khaale.
Sikila Musa aloma ali, ‘Omwami Wele wenywe akhamurumire omung'oosi, bulayi bwene nga ne anduma ese, aliba mulala khu baandu benywe babeene. Murie buli siindu nisio akhamuboolele khukhola.
Yesi yesi okharia omung'oosi oyo tawe, akharusibwe khukhwama mu baandu ba Wele ne khubunisibwa.’
Ne bang'oosi boosi ba balomaloma burume nga Samweli ne naabo babeecha enyuma wewe, boosi baba ne burume bwe kamakhuwa kalikho kekholekha mu ndaalo chino.
Lisuubisia lia Wele khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe lili lilienywe, mala musaanga mu ndakaano niyo Wele akhola ne bakuuka benywe. Nga ne aboolela Aburahamu ali, ‘Khubirira mu lisaaye liowo ndabiita chikhabi babaandu boosi khu sibala.’
Khwako Wele aarobora omukholi wewe, mala aanyoa amuruma khwinywe, khumuelesia enywe chikhabi mu khukhola buli mulala khwinywe alekhe chingila chewe chimayaanu.”

Petero ne Yoana nga baba ne basilomaloma ne babaandu, basaayi balala, omukhulu owe baliindi be Lukaangu, ne Basatukayo balala boola.
Baba beuliile bubi sikila Petero ne Yoana baba balikho bekisia babaandu bali Yesu aaba aalamusibwe khukhwama mu lifwa, liliekesia lili bafu bakhalamukhe.
Nio ba baamba mala ba bara mu siboe nabwila bwasia, sikila yaba ekolooba.
Ne bakali ba baulila burume obwo basuubila, mala babaandu bakucha boola embi chielefu chiraano.
Oli bwasia babaami be Bayaudi, babemeelesi ne baandiki, babuusiana mu Yerusalemu.
Bakaanana ne Anasi Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, ne Kayafa, Yoana, Alekisanda, ne babaandi ba baaba be luuya lwo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali.
Bemekha barumwa chana ebweeni wabwe ne babareeba bali, “Mukholile kano khu bunyali siina namwe murumikhiire lisina lia naanu khukhola kano?”
Petero, ne echusiibwe ne Roho Omutakatifu, abakobosia ali, “Enywe babaami be babaandu, ne ba bemeelesi:
khwaba ne khureebwa endaalo eya luno khulwe sikholwa silayi sisiakholeekhe khu muleme lundi nga ne aonile,
nono mwesi, ne babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi khemumanye muli omundu owimile ebweeni wenywe yuno, ali omulamu khubirira khu bunyali bwe lisina lia Yesu Kristo owa Nasareti niye enywe mwabaamba khu musalaba mala Wele amulamusia khukhwama mu lifwa.
Yesu ali niye liiandiko liboolanga lili,
‘Libaale nilio enywe babombakhi mwalekelesia,
liakaluukhana liaba lie mu koona.’
Buonia bunyoolekha khubirira mu Yesu yeng'ene, mu sibala sioosi se aliio na mulala niye Wele aana onyala khukhuonia efwe tawe.”
Be mu muse barangararwa nga ne babona bunyindaafu bwa Petero ne Yoana ne khumanya bali baba babaandu busa bakhaasoma tawe. Bakhebulila bali babelenge be kumusuumbu ne Yesu.
Ne khuba nende nilio baloma tawe, sikila babona omundu owaona oyo ne emile ao ne Petero nende Yoana.
Nio ba baboolela khurura enje, mala barakikha khureebana babeene ne babeene.
Bareebana bali, “Baabaandu bano khubakholakho siina? Buli mundu mu Yerusalemu amanyile ali bakholile kamayia ke khuukia kano, mala se khunyala khwakekaana tawe.
Khukhiingilila kamakhuwa kano, kakhasalanila mu baandu ne akeekhe ene tawe, khekhukaanie babaandu bano bakhalomaloma lundi khu mundu yesi yesi mu lisina lia Yesu tawe.”
Khwako ba balanga mukari mala ba bakaania balekhe khulomaloma ne khukhwekisilia mu lisina lia Yesu.
Ne Petero ne Yoana babakobosia bali, “Enywe mwabeene khalaka, lili ena lili lilayi mu moni mwa Wele, khumuria enywe namwe khuria Wele.
Sikila efwe se khunyala khwalekha khulomaloma niko fwabeene khwabona ne khuulila tawe.”
Nio be kumuse chana ba balaanga, babakaambila burafu ne mala babalekhuula. Babona bali se kanyalikha khubaukuuma tawe, sikila babaandu boosi baba balikho bafumia Wele sikila ka kekholekhe.
Omundu niye kamayia ke khuonia kekholekhakho aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko kibira kamakhumi kane.
Nga Petero ne Yoana ne balekhuulwa, bakobola mu sipupu siabwe mala bababoolela niko basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi ba babooleele.
Ne nga basuubili baulila kano boosi baambana alala mu khusaba Wele bali, “Omwami lundi Omubuumbi owe likulu, sibala, ne nyanja ne bioosi bilimo!
Mu bunyali bwa Roho Omutakatifu walomaloma khubirira mu kuuka wefwe Daudi omukholi wowo, nga aloma ali,
‘Sikila siina Be Chikholo ne bakhalaale;
sikila siina babaandu ne bakholile chikwangwaani cha busa?
Babaami be sibala berekekha,
ne baruki bakanaane alala khuyingania Omwami ne Kristo wewe.’
Babuusania khukhola buli siindu nisio ewe khulwe bunyali bwowo ne lilienya liowo waba wamala khubisia khale oli bikhekholekhe.
Ne luno, Omwami, loleelesia ke khuriikhirisia niko bakholile, mala okhulekhuule efwe bakholi bowo, khulomalome elomo yowo ne bunyindaafu bwoosi.
Kololosia kumukhono kwowo khuonia, lundi aana bie khuukia ne kamayia biole khukholwa khubirira mu lisina lio Mukholi wowo omutakatifu Yesu.”
Nga bamala khusaba, abuundu niio yaba bakaananile aterema. Boosi bechusibwa Roho Omutakatifu mala barakikha khukhwilwacha elomo eya Wele ne bunyindaafu.
Ne bunyali bukali barumwa baana buloli khu lilamukha lio Mwami Yesu, ne Wele abaelesia kumwalaalo kumukali.
Se abao na mulala khu nibo owataamba sisiindu tawe. Abo ba baaba ne kimikuunda namwe chinju bakusia, ne bayila chirupia nicho bakusiisiemo,
bachiaana khu barumwa, mala chirupia chikabwa khu buli mulala khuloondekhana ne butinyu bwewe.
Ne Yosefu, Omulawi niye barumwa batiuukha bali Baranaba owasaalwa abuundu bali Saipurasi (liboola lili, “Omwana we lichuuba”)
akusia kumukuunda nikwo aba nakwo, mala areera chirupia khu barumwa.

Ne abao omundu niye balanga bali Anania no mukhasi wewe Safira bakusia kumukuunda kwabwe.
Ne Anania afukiilisiana no mukhasi wewe aramiakho chirupia chindala ne chichiindi areerera barumwa.
Petero amuboolela ali, “Anania, siina sikila Sietani ne echile mu mwoyo kwowo akila wabea Roho Omutakatifu, webukulilakho sitonyi sie chirupia nicho okusiisie kumukuunda?
Nga wabeele ne okhaakukusia tawe, kwabeele kukwowo; ne nga wamala khu kukusia, chirupia chabeele chichowo. Nono siina sikila ne okhalaake khukhola sisiindu nga sino siri? Se wabeyile babaandu tawe, ne kakhali wabeyile Wele!”
Nga Anania naulila ario, akwa aasi afwa, mala buuri bwatiila boosi ba bakaulila.
Basoleeli bechamo, baboa kumubili kwewe mu ngubo, bakurusia enje, mala bakusiikha.
Enyuma we chisa nga chitaru chiri, omukhasi wewe echamo nakhamanyile kakekholeekhe tawe.
Petero amureeba ali, “Mboolele, echino nicho chirupia choosi nicho ewe no museecha wowo mwanyoolile khukhwama khu mukuunda kwenywe?” Akobosia ali, “Yee, nicho chino choosi.”
Nio Petero amuboolela ali, “Siina sikila ewe no museecha wowo ne mufukiilisiane khukhaka Roho owo Mwami? Babaandu basiikhile omuseecha wowo bali amuliango, akhaba ewe wesi balakhusiikha!”
Abwene ne abwene akwa mu bikele bia Petero mala afwa. Basoleeli bechamo babona afwiile, nio bamusuta bamusiikha embi no museecha wewe.
Ekanisa yoosi ne babaandi boosi babaulila kano baria lukali.
Kamayia kamakali ne bikholwa bie khuukia biaba bilikho bikholwa ne barumwa mu baandu. Basuubili boosi bakaananilanga mu matooche ka kalaangwa kali ka Solomoni mu lukaangu.
Akhaba babaandu ne ba bafumianga, se aliio na mulala wenje owerusia khusaanga nabo tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario babaandu bakali ne bakhasi basuubila mu Mwami, batasikha khu mukaanda kwe basuubili.
Khuloondekhana nende niko barumwa bakholanga, babaandu bameema balwale khu bitaanda ne khu mikeeka, ne babara khu chingila nio oli Petero abira sisiiniini siewe siole khu balala nga ne alikho abira ario.
Babaandu bakali becha khukhwama mu ngoba chichaba siimbi ne Yerusalemu, bareera abo ba baaba balwale namwe ne bisieeno, mala boosi baona
Nio Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, ne naabo boosi be kumusuumbu kwewe, ne basaangi be kumukaanda kwe Basatukayo bakhendekhela barumwa lukali, nio babisia khukhola sikholwa.
Baamba barumwa babara mu siboe.
Ne kakhali musilo malaika owo Mwami ekula bilibwa bie siboe, abarusiamo, mala ababoolela ali,
“Khemuche mwime mu Lukaangu mala muboolele babaandu burume bwoosi khuloondekhana ne bulamu buyia buno.”
Ne nga ne baulila bario, bacha bengila mu Lukaangu mu makhelebeende, mala barakikha khukhwekisia.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali chana nende be kumusuumbu kwewe balaanga babemeelesi Bayaudi mu muse mala barumania bareere barumwa ebweeni wabwe khu khwama mu siboe.
Nga baliindi ne boolayo, khunyoolamo barumwa tawe, bakobola mu muse ba baboolela bali,
“Nga ne khwolile mu siboe, khunyoolile siekaalwe lundi banamae boosi baliindile bilibwa, ne nga khwikuule bilibwa, se khunyoolilemo omundu tawe!”
Nga basaayi bakhulu ne omukhulu we banamae be Lukaangu baulila kano, bauka lukali khu kakekholeekhe khu barumwa.
Nio omundu okundi echa ababoolela ali, “Rekeeresia! Babaandu nibo mwareere mu siboe abosiina mu Lukaangu balikho bekisia babaandu!”
Mala omukhulu owe banamae ne babaandu bewe bacha bareera barumwa chana, kakhaba kario se barumikhira kamaani tawe, sikila baria bali babaandu banyala khubapa kamabaale.
Bareera barumwa mukari babemia ebweeni we kumuse mala Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali ababolela ali,
“Efwe khwaamukaaniisie mu burafu lukali khuli, ‘Mukhekisiakho mu lisina lio mundu yuno tawe,’ ne bona niko mukholile! Mwekiisie mu Yerusalemu mwoosi, lundi mwenya khukhurakho efwe kumusaango kwe lifwa liewe!”
Petero ne Barumwa babaandi bakobosia bali, “Khukhwola khurie Wele khukhila babaandu.
Wele owe ba raara befwe, alamusia Yesu niye mwera khulwe khu mubaamba khu musalaba.
Oyuno niye Wele aniinia mwikulu mu bwikhalo bwe kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha abe Omwimeelesi lundi Omuonia, aelesie babaandu ba Isiraeli bubweyaangu bwe khukhwekanila nio babeelwe bubwoni bwabwe.
Efwe khuli baloli khu biindu bino, akhaba Roho Omutakatifu yesi, oli siianwa sia Wele khwaabo bamuria.”
Nga be kumuse ne baulila kano, bakhalala lukali, benya bali barumwa berwe.
Ne mulala khu Bafarisayo owalaangwa bali Kamalieli, omwekisia owe Lilaka, niye baandu boosi baba baelesia liria, enyokha eema mu muse mala aana lilaka barumwa barusibwe enje.
Nio aboolela kumuse ali, “Baisiraeli basiaase, lola bulayi niko mwenya khukhola babaandu bano.
Mukhebulila omundu bali Teuta eecha ne elaanga khuba omundu omukali, babaandu embi chimia chine bamuloondakho. Teuta oyo nga eerwa, babeeka bewe boosi basalanila mala kumukaanda kwewe kufwa.
Enyuma wa kano Yuda Omukalilaya eecha mu biise bie khubala babaandu, aombelesia babaandu bakali bamuloondakho, ne kakhali yesi erwa, mala babeeka bewe boosi basalanila.
Bulayi bwene, muboolela ndi mukhakhalakila babaandu bano sisiindu siosi siosi tawe. Balekhe busa! Kaba bali niko barekekhe ne khukhola kali ko mundu busa aba kalawao,
ne kaba ne kali ka Wele, semulabanyala tawe. Kane mukhole murio mube ne muyingana ne Wele!”
Kumuse kwaloonda niko Kamalieli akukelekela.
Balaanga barumwa becha mukari, babaapa kimikhomwa ne khu bakaania balekhe khulomaloma mu lisina lia Yesu, mala babalekhuula.
Nga barumwa ne barura mu muse, baba basangaafu, sikila Wele alola ali bolaanile khu khupisibwa siibi sikila lisina lia Yesu.
Ne bachiililila khukhwekisia ne khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi eya Yesu Kristo buli ndaalo mu lukaangu ne mu chingo che babaandu.

Enyuma we siise sitiiti, nga esaabu eye babeeka yachiililila khu kucha, bulomani bwabao akari we Bayaudi ba balomalomanga Lukiriki ne Bayaudi babalomalomanga lulwabwe. Bayaudi babalomalomanga Lukiriki belila bali banamulekhwa babwe balebililwanga mu buaani bwe chirupia cha buli ndaalo.
Khwako barumwa ekhumi na babili balaanga basuubili boosi alala mala bababoolela bali, “Se buli bulayi khulekhe bubwilwachi bwe elomo eya Wele mala khwile khukaba chirupia tawe.
Nono bawandaayase, robora babaandu saba mwinywe bamanyikhaane, babechula Roho Omutakatifu ne limanya, ne efwe khulabara mu bwimeelesi bwe bibiindu bino.
Ne efwe fwabeene buli khase khulasaba ne khukhola kimilimo kie bubwilwachi.”
Babaandu boosi basangaalila lilibaasia lie barumwa elio, nio barobora Sitefano, omundu owechula lisuubila ne Roho Omutakatifu, Filipo, Porokoro, Nikanori, Timona, Parimena, ne Nikolao owe Chikholo khukhwama e Andioka owaba lutaayi ne engiile mu dini eye Bayaudi.
Basuubili ba bareera ebweeni we barumwa, mala ba basabila ne khubarakho kamakhono kabwe.
Nio elomo eya Wele yachiililila khusalanila. Esaabu eye babeeka yakucha lukali mu Yerusalemu, ne basaayi bakali bafukiilila lisuubila.
Sitefano, aaba ne kumwalaalo kumukali ne bunyali mala aakhola kamayia kamaboofu lukali ne bibiindu bie khuukia mu baandu.
Ne kakhali akhingiililwa ne babaandu ba baaba basaangi be sinakooki niyo balaanganga bali eye Balekhuule, Bayaudi khukhwama Kireni, ne Alekisanduria. Nibo ne Bayaudi babaandi khukhwama mu sibala sia Silisia ne Esia barakikha khuyingana ne Sitefano.
Ne kakhali se baanyala limanya ne Roho nibio Sitefano aaba nabio mu khulomaloma tawe.
Khwako baonga babaandu balala khuloma bubeeyi bali, “Khumuulile ne aloma kamakhuwa ke mbelekeu khu Musa ne Wele!”
Mu ngila yino baachilisia babaandu, babemeelesi ne baandiki be lilaka. Bafwakhila Sitefano mala bamuila ebweeni we kumuse.
Nio bareera babaandu babaandi khumubeela bali, “Omundu yuno busiele alomanga kamabi khu Lukaangu lwefwe lutakatifu ne khu Lilaka lia Musa.
Khwauliile ne aloma ali Yesu owa Nasareti yuno alonakila elala Lukaangu luno ne khurusiao kimiima nikio khwaebwa ne Musa!”
Abo boosi ba baaba ne bekhaale mu muse baunguusa chimoni chabwe khu Sitefano, babona mumoni mwewe mwafwaanana nga mwa malaika.

Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali areeba Sitefano ali, “Kano kali ka ng'ali?”
amuboolela ali, ‘Rura mu sibala siowo, olekhe balebe bowo mala oche mu sibala nisio khakhwekesie.’
Nio Aburahamu arura mu sibala siewe mala acha amenya e Harani. Raraawe owa Aburahamu nga afwa, Wele auuyia Aburahamu amureera mu sibala nisio luno mumenyilemo sino.
Abwene ao Wele se aelesiakho Aburahamu sitonyi sie kumukuunda okwo akhaba sikelo sie efuuti kube kukwewe tawe. Ne kakhali Wele asuubisia khumua niye kumukuunda okwo kube kukwewe nende be lisaaye liewe. Mu siise nisio Wele asuubisiliamo Aburahamu, se abaakho ne omwana tawe.
Kano niko Wele amuboolela ali: Lisaaye liowo lilimenya mu sibala sikeni, niyo liliba nasioobi ne lilinyasibwa lukali khulwe kimiiko chimia chine.
‘Ne kakhali ndikhalakila babaandu nibo balinyaakhanila, ne enyuma wako balirura mu sibala esio mala bakhanjesaile ano.’
Nio Wele aelesia Aburahamu sikhebo sibe sisiekesio sie endakaano eyo. Khwako Aburahamu akheba Isaaka khu ndaalo eya munaane khukhwama nga ne asaalwa; Isaaka akheba omwana wewe Yakobo, ne Yakobo akheba babaana bewe ekhumi na babili, bakuuka bamanyikhaane mu kholo yefwe.
mala amukobosia omulamu enyuma we khubirira mu matinyu kewe koosi. Nga Yosefu echa ebweeni wo mwami owa Misiri, Wele aelesia Yosefu lifukiililwa ne limanya nga echa ebweeni wo mwami Farao. Nio Farao akhola Yosefu aaba omuruki mu sibala sia Misiri ne khunju eye bubwami.
Mu nyanga echo enjala yakwa mu Misiri mwoosi ne mu Kanaani mala yareera butinyu bukali. Bakuuka befwe se banyoola bilio tawe,
Ne Yakobo nga aulila ali biakhulia bili e Misiri, arumayo babaana bewe bali bakuuka befwe khuchayo lwe bweeni.
Oli lukhola khabili Yosefu ebuula khu bawandaaye, mala omwami owe Misiri amanya be lisaaye lwa Yosefu.
Nio Yosefu arumania likhuwa khu raraawe Yakobo, khumuboolela niye ne babaana bewe boosi, babaandu baboola kamakhumi saba na baraano beche mu Misiri.
Nio Yakobo acha e Misiri, niyo niye omwene ne babaana bewe bafwila.
Kimibili kiabwe kiayilwa e Shekemu niio kiasiikhwa mu ng'ani niyo Aburahamu akula ne chirupia khukhwama khu kholo eya Hamori.
Ekhumaliilikha omwami okundi okhamanyakho Yosefu tawe arakikha khukhwamiia Misiri.
Abea bakuuka befwe lundi aaba omurafu khu nibo, abaingiilila barusie babaana babwe mu chingo chabwe nio bali bafwe.
Siaba siise sino nisio Musa aasalilwamo, mala aaba omwana owe lukoondo lulayi mu moni cha Wele. Alelelwa mungo khulwe kimieesi kitaru,
ne nga ne bamurusia mungo mwabwe, omukhaana owo mwami Farao, amwangala mala, acha naye amukhusia nga omwana wewe.
Musa eekisibwa limanya liosi lie ba Bamisiri, aaba omundu omukali mu makhuwa ne mu bikholwa.
Abona Omuisiraeli mulala ne akholelwa bubi ne omumisiri, nio aacha amuyeeta, mala eera Omumisiri khulwe khumwiyacha.
Ebaasia ali, manya babaandu bewe kane bamanye bali Wele alikho acha khubasoola nibo khumurumikhira niye khubalekhuula, ne kakhali se bamanya bario tawe.
Endaalo eya loondakho abona Baisiraeli babili ne bapana mala akhaka khubakaya ne aloma ali, ‘Balebe rekeeresia, enywe muli Baisiraeli mweng'ene; siina sikila ne mupana muri?’
Ne oyo owaba ne arangaane owasie asindikha Musa, ne khumureeba ali, ‘Naanu owakhukhola ewe khuba omwami lundi omukhalaki khwifwe?
Ewe wenya khukhunjira nga werire Omumisiri oyo likolooba?’
Nga Musa ne aulila kano, elukha mu Misiri acha amenya mu sibala sia Midiani, asaalilayo babaana babili be siseecha.
Musa aarangararwa khu niko abona, nga ne acha siimbi ne sichakha nio abone bulayi, aulila kumumilo kwo Omwami ne aloma ali,
‘Ese ndi Wele owe bakuuka bowo, Wele owa Aburahamu, Isaaka ne Yakobo.’ Musa aterema mala aambwa buuri khaba khulolayo tawe.
Omwami amuboolela ali, ‘Fuula biraaro biowo, sikila abuundu niio wimile ao, ali abuundu atakatifu.
Naboone siibi nisio babaandu baase balimo mu Misiri. Nauliile khukhweloocha khwabwe, mala nekhile aasi mbarusiemo. Nono yiicha; khurume e Misiri.’
Arangirira babaandu khurura mu Misiri, akholanga kamayia ne bikholwa bie liiukia mu Misiri, a nyanja eya Shamu, ne kakaandi mu sichiimi khu miiko kamakhumi kane.
Musa yuno niye owaboolela babaandu ba Isiraeli ali, ‘Wele alimurumira omung'oosi bulayi bwene nga anduma ese, ne aliba mulala khu baandu benywe.’
Musa yuno niye owaba ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ba babusania mu sichiimi; abayo ne bakuuka befwe ne malaika owalomaloma naye khu sikulu sia Sinai. Anyoola kamalaka kaana bulamu khukhwama khu Wele mala akhuelesia efwe.
“Ne kakhali bakuuka befwe baloba khumuria; bamulekelesia mala bekoomba bali andi bakoboole e Misiri.
Nio baboolela Aruni bali, ‘Khung'oonele bawele bakane bakhuraangirire. Se khwamanyile sisiekholeekhe khu Musa oyo, owakhureerire khurura mu Misiri tawe.’
Nio abwenao bang'oona sifwaani sifwaana euunwa, basiaanila embosio mala baba ne naikara khulwe lukoosi lwe sifwaani nisio babeene beng'ooneele.
Nio Wele abafutarira mala abalekhuula basaaye ching'enieesi nga ne kaandikwa mu sitabu sie bang'oosi kali:
‘Baandu ba Isiraeli!
Nga ne mwaba mu sichiimi khu miiko kamakhumi kane,
chimbosio che bibiaayo nicho mwarusia, se mwandusira ese tawe.
Liiema nilio mwasuta, liaba lia Moleki,
ne sifwaani sia wele Refani, wele wenywe we eng'enieesi,
biaba bifwaani nibio mwakhola nio mu bisaaye.
Khwako ndamuyila mu mbaambe engelekha owa Babiloni.’
Enyuma we siise, bakuuka befwe ba banyoola liiema khu ba raara babwe, balisuta bacha nalio nga baaba ne bacha ne Yoshua ne bela mu sibala nisio Wele aonamo Be Chikholo nga bakuuka befwe baaba ne bengilamo. Liamenyayo khukhwola mu siise sia Daudi.
Daudi asiimisia Wele mala amureeba amufukiilile aane bumenyo khulwa Wele owa Yakobo.
Ne kakhali aba Solomoni niye owamwombakhila enju.
“Ne kakhali Wele owe Angaaki Lukali se amenyanga mu chinju chichombakhwa ne babaandu tawe; nga omung'oosi ne aloma ali,
‘Mwikulu eli endebe yase eye bubwami,
ne sibala sili endebe eye bikele biase.
Mulanjombakhila enju eya lukano siina?
Waena niio ese nyala namenya?
Sendi ese samwene owabuumba bibiindu bino bioosi tawe ku?’ ”
Eku, aabakhoo omung'oosi yesi niye bakuuka benywe bakhapia siibi tawe? Beera barumwa ba Wele ba baboola khukhwicha khwo Omukholi wewe Omuluungi. Mala luno, enywe mwamuchaamile, ne khumwiira.
Enywe ninywe mumwanyoola lilaka lia Wele liliareerwa ne malaika, ne semwaliria tawe!”
Basaakhulu be kumuse nga ne baulila ka Sitefano, bakhalala lukali mala banyiisia mumoni.
Ne Sitefano, aaba echusiibwe ne Roho Omutakatifu, aalola mwikulu, mala abona luyali lwa Wele ne Yesu naye emile a kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele.
Aloma ali, “Lola! Naboone likulu liekuukhe ne Omwana wo Mundu emile kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele!”
Be kumuse bayokela lukali bafuunikha kamaru kabwe ne kamakhono, mala boosi batima bamutiila,
bamumwaata enje we lukoba, mala bamupa kamabaale. Baloli balekha kamakooti kabwe abikele bio musoleeli owalaangwa bali Saulo.
Bachiililila khu khupa Sitefano kamabaale, ne naye asaba Omwami ali, “Omwami Yesu, yakaanila kumwoyo kwase!”
Asikama aasi mala asaba ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Omwami! Okhabekiicha khulwe bubwoni buno tawe.” Oli amala khuloma ario ne asumbukha.

Endaalo ng'eneyo ekanisa mu Yerusalemu yarakikha khunyaasibwa burafu. Basuubili boosi, khurusiakho barumwa basalanila bacha mu ngoongo cha Yuda ne Samaria.
Babaandu basuubili basiikha Sitefano, basooma ne khumulila lukali.
Basuubili basalanila bacha buli abuundu, ne belwacha elomo endayi.
Filipo aaserengekha acha mu lukoba luboofu lwa Samaria elwacha elomo endayi eya Kristo khu baandu be ebweeneyo.
Babaandu bakali barekeeresia lukali niko Filipo ababoolela, nga bamurekeeresia mala babona kamayia niko akhola.
Bisieeno biarura mu baandu bakali ne bikukuula lukali. Babaandu bakali ba bafwokoya baona.
Nio ekhoyo engali yaaba mu lukoba olwo.
Ne abao omundu owamenyamo niye balanga bali Simoni, owakholanga bufumu bwewe ne aukia Basamaria, elangaanga ali, ali omundu omukali lukali,
ne buli mundu mu lukoba, khukhwama khu bakeekhe khukhwola khu bakhulu bamurekeeresianga niye ne baloma bali, “Omundu yuno ali, bunyali bwa Wele bulaangwa buli, ‘Bunyali Bukali’.”
Bamurekeeresianga sikila siise sileeyi aabaukianga khu bufumu bwewe.
Nga ne basuubila kamelwacho ka Filipo ke Lomo Endayi eye Bubwami bwa Wele, ne khu Yesu Kristo, baseecha ne bakhasi ba batiisibwa.
Akhaba Simoni chana yesi aasuubila, ne enyuma we khubatiisibwa, aaba siimbi ne Filipo mala auka nga ne abona bie khuukia bikali ne kamayia ka kaaba ne kakholwa.
Barumwa mu Yerusalemu baulila bali babaandu ba Samaria bafukiiliile Elomo eya Wele, nio ba barumira Petero ne Yoana.
Nga ne boolayo, basabila basuubili banyoole Roho Omutakatifu.
Sikila Roho Omutakatifu aba akhekhakho khu yesi yesi ebweeneyo tawe; baaba babatiisibwa busa mu lisina lio Mwami Yesu.
Nio Petero ne Yoana babarakho kamakhono kabwe, mala banyoola Roho Omutakatifu.
Simoni abona ali basuubili bamalile khuebwa Roho Omutakatifu khubirira mu khurebwakho kamakhono ne barumwa. Nio aana chirupia khu Petero ne Yoana,
ne aloma ali, “Mbe sesi bunyali buno, nio yesi yesi niye ndakho kamakhono anyoole Roho Omutakatifu.”
Ne Petero amukobosia ali “Wiuuma ne chirupia chowo, sikila wibaasia oli, onyala wakula siianwa sia Wele ne chirupia!
Se olikho ne kumukabwa namwe sitonyi mu milimo kiefwe tawe, sikila kumwoyo kwowo se kuli kumuluungi ebweeni wa Wele tawe.
Nono, khewekanile, lirekekha liowo limayaanu lino, mala osabe Omwami akhubeele khulwe khukhwibaasia sisiindu nga sino siri.
Sikila nakhuboone oli ne likhendekha likali mala oli omuboe owe bubwoni.”
Simoni aboolela Petero ne Yoana ali, “Ne musiima sabile khu Mwami, nio bibiindu nibio mulomalome bino bikhanjekholekhakho tawe.”
Ne enyuma we khuaana buloli ne khukhwilwacha elomo eyo Mwami, Petero ne Yoana bakobola e Yerusalemu. Khu lukeendo lwabwe belwacha Elomo Endayi mu birekere bikali bia Samaria.
Malaika owo Mwami aboolela Filipo ali, “Yirekekha wikhe emwalo siafubo, khu ngila yama e Yerusalemu necha Kasa.” (Engila yino leelo sebira tawe.)
Nio, Filipo erekekha acha. Mu siise siene esio abao Omuesopia omuchili owaba khu ngila naloota engo. Omundu yuno aaba omubiikhi omukhulu owe chirupia cha Kwini owa Esopia owalaangangwa bali Kandasi, aama Yerusalemu khusaaya Wele,
ne aaba ekhaale mwikaari, alasomanga sitabu sio mung'oosi Isaya.
Roho Omutakatifu aboolela Filipo ali, “Khoche siimbi ekaari ao mala oliloondekho.”
Filipo atima achao mala aulila ne alikho asoma sitabu sio omung'oosi Isaya, nio Filipo amureeba ali, “Olikho oelewa niko olikho osoma ku?”
Omuesopia chana amukobosia ali, “Nyala khumanya ndiena omundu na khanjinosieele” Mala alaanga Filipo aniine mwikaari ekhale naye.
Sitonyi sie liiandiko nisio aba ne alikho asoma siaba sino:
“Aba nga likheese lilikho ne liyilwa khu khwirwa,
nga limeeme likhameleela ne balibeka tawe.
Khwako, se ang'amula tawe.
Afwocholwa ne khukhwimwa bung'ali.
Se aliio onyala aboola ke lisaaye liewe tawe
sikila bulamu bwewe bwarusiibwe khu sibala.”
Omuesopia oyo areeba Filipo ali, “Mboolele, omung'oosi yuno alikho aloma khu naanu? Khu mwene namwe khu mundu okundi?”
Nio Filipo arakikha khulomaloma; khukhwama khu sitonyi sie liiandiko lino, amuboolela Elomo Endayi eya Yesu.
Nga ne baba ne bali khu ngila ne bacha, boola abuundu niio kameechi kali. Omuesopia chana aloma ali, “Bona, kameechi. Siina sisikhiingilila ese khubatiisibwa?” [
Filipo amukoboosia ali, “Waaba ne osuubila ne kumwoyo kwowo kwosi, onyala khubatiisibwa.” Naye akobosia ali, “Yee, nasuubiile ndi Yesu Kristo ali Omwana owa Wele.”]
Omuesopia oyo arusia lilaka likaari lime, nio Filipo ne omundu chana bekha mu meechi mala Filipo amubatiisia.
Nga ne barura mumeechi Roho owo Mwami abukula Filipo. Omuesopia khu mubonakho lundi tawe, mala achiililila ne lukeendo lwewe ne busangaafu.
Filipo akhebulila busa ali abuundu alaangwa Asetusi; abirira buli mu lukoba ne elwacha Elomo Endayi nabwila ola e Kaesarea.

Mu biise bienebio Saulo achiililila khuriikhirisia ne khukhwira babeeka bo Mwami. Acha wo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali,
mala asaba chibarwa che khukhwemanyisia khu masinakooki ke mu Damasika, ne anyoolayo babeeka be Engila yo Mwami, anyale khubaamba, baseecha ne bakhaasi, mala abakobosie Yerusalemu.
Nga Saulo embiyia lukoba lwa Damasika, ao ne nao buwaanga khukhwama mungaaki bwameniuukha niio aaba.
Akwa aasi mala aulila kumumilo ne kumuboolela kuli, “Saulo, Saulo! Siina sikila ne ukhupia siibi”
Saulo naye areeba ali, “Ewe naanu Omwami?” Kumumilo chana kwamukobosia kuli, “Ese ndi Yesu niye ewe olikho uupia siibi.
Yinyokha mala wingile mu lukoba, mubwenomwo olaboolelwa nisio okhoyela khukhola.”
Babaandu ba baroonga ne Saulo baba bemileo basilile busa. Baulila kumumilo okwo ne se babona omundu oloma tawe.
Saulo enyokha khukhwama aasi mala amoka, ne kakhali se anyala khubona siindu tawe. Nio bamutiila kumukhono bamuila mu Damasika.
Amala chindaalo chitaru nakhabona tawe, ne mu siise sienesio, se aliakho namwe anywa siindu tawe.
Abao omukristo mu Damasika lisina liewe bali Anania. Abona kamalola Omwami ne amuboolela ali, “Anania!” Akobosia ali, “Omwami, ndi ano.”
Omwami amuboolela ali, “Yinyokha oche khu ngila elaangwa Eyaluungikha, munju eya Yuda, reebera mumwenomwo omundu owaama e Tasasi niye balanga bali Saulo. Alikho asaba.
Ne mu malola Saulo abona omundu lisina liewe bali Anania, engila mukari mala amurakho kamakhono nio ole khubona lundi.”
Anania akobosia ali, “Omwami, babaandu bakali bambooleele ko mundu yuno lundi nauliile bibiindu biibi bioosi nibio akholile khu batakatifu bowo mu Yerusalemu.
Luno echile mu Damasika ne bunyali khukhwama khu basaayi bakhulu khuboa babaandu boosi bakhusaayanga ewe.”
Ne kakhali Omwami amuboolela ali, “Khoche, sikila namuroboore niye khukhukholela kimilimo, khukhola lisina liase limanyikhane khu Be Chikholo ne khu baami ne khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Ne ese samwene kane mwekesie koosi niko akhoyela anyaasibwe khulwe lisina liase.”
Nio Anania acha, engila munju nimwo Saulo aaba, mala amurakho kamakhono ne khuloma ali, “Wandaayase Saulo, Omwami Yesu omwene owakhubonekheele ne oli khu ngila ne wiicha, andumire obone lundi mala wichusibwe Roho Omutakatifu.”
Abwene ne abwene bibiindu nga kamabaambu biakwa khukhwama khu moni cha Saulo, nio abona lundi. Enyokha mala abatiisibwa;
anyoola kamaani namalile khulia.
Saulo aamenya chindaalo ndiiti ne basuubili mu Damasika.
Aacha mu masinakooki ne khurakikha khukhwilwacha ali Yesu ali Omwana owa Wele.
Boosi babamuulila baraangararwa ne khureebana bali, “Se ali niye no mwene owerirenge abo basaaya omundu Yesu chana mu Yerusalemu? Lundi se echile ano khulwe sifuno sino sisiene ne sisiene, khuaamba babaandu baasaya Yesu abakobosie khu basaayi bakhulu?”
Ne kakhaba kario lililwacha lia Saulo liachiililila khuba ne kamaani lukali, ne liliekisia liewe liboola lili Yesu aaba Kristo, liengila mu Bayaudi bamenyile mu Damasika batamba nilio bamukobosia.
ne kakhali aboolelwa ekwangwaani eyo. Baliindanga khu bilibwa bie lukoba kumuusi ne siilo bali bamwire.
Ne siilo silala, babeeka ba Saulo bamubukula bamura mu muiinda mala bamwepesielia mu mwanya kwe lisiisi lie lukoba.
Saulo acha mu Yerusalemu mala akhaka khuambaana ne babeeka, ne se basuubila bali luno aabeele omweeka tawe, mala boosi bamuria.
Ne Baranaba echa abukula Saulo amuyila khu barumwa. Abenooselia nga Saulo aabona Omwami khu ngila, nga Omwami ne alomaloma naye, lundi ababoolela nga Saulo ne elwachile lisina lia Yesu mu bunyindaafu mu Damasika.
Khukhwama ao Saulo amenya nabo, akeenda mu Yerusalemu mwoosi, ne elwacha mu bunyindaafu mu lisina lio Mwami.
Alomalomanga ne khukhabiisiana ne Bayaudi babalomanga Lukiriki, nio bakhaka khumwiira.
Nga basuubili ne bamanya bario, babukula Saulo bamureera e Kaesarea mala bamulekha ache e Tasasi.
Khwako ekanisa mu Yuda mwoosi, Kalilaya, ne Samaria yaba ne siise sie kumuleembe. Khubirira mu buyeeti bwa Roho Omutakatifu, yanyoola kamaani mala yakucha ne khumenya mu buri bwo Mwami.
Petero akeenda buli abuundu, ne endaalo ndala aacha khubona babaandu ba Wele bamenyile mu lukoba lwa Lita.
Ebweeneyo anyoola omundu owafwokoya, lisina liewe bali Ainea, okhanyalanga khukhwinyokha khu sitanda siewe khu miko munane tawe.
Petero amuboolela ali, “Ainea, Yesu Kristo aakhuoniisie. Yinyokha mala wale sitanda siowo.” Ao ne nao Ainea enyokha.
Babaandu boosi ba baamenya mu Lita ne mu Sharoni bamubona, mala bakobolela Omwami.
Mu Yopa, abao omukhasi lisina bali Tabisa owaba omusuubili, lisina liewe mu Lukiriki bali Dorikasi, sifuno bali “Ekhisi.” Aaba ne bikholwa bilayi bie busiime khu bataambi.
Siise sienesio Dorikasi alwala mala afwa. Babaandu basiinga kumubili kwewe, bakwalisia mu korofa.
Yopa ne Lita bili busa siimbi, nga basuubili ne baulila bali Petero ali Lita, baruma babaandu babili khumulaanga, bali, “Nosiima yiicha khangu.”
Khwako Petero arekukha mala acha nabo. Ne nga olayo, bamuyila mu korofa chana. Banamulekhwa boosi babusiana niio Petero aaba ne balila ne khumwekesia chingubo choosi nicho Dorikasi anabaanga nasiili mulamu.
Petero aabarusia enje boosi. Asikama aasi asaba; mala amubolela ali, “Tabisa, yinyokha!” Tabisa amoka, ne nga ne abona Petero, enyokha ekhala.
Petero amwesendao amwinyosia mala alanga basuubili alala ne banamulekhwa chana, mala abaelesia Tabisa nali omulamu.
Kamakhuwa kano kasalanila buli abuundu mu Yopa, mala babaandu bakali basuubila mu Mwami.
Petero amenya mu Yopa chindaalo chingali ne Simoni omuali owe kamaafu.

Abao omundu mu Kaesarea lisina liewe bali Korinelio, owaba omwimeelesi omukhulu we banamae be bubwami bwe Barumi ba balaangwa bali, “Sikoosi sie banamae ba Italia.”
Aba omundu owe dini owaria Wele. Niye nende be lisaaye lwewe boosi basaayanga Wele. Akholanga kamakali khuyeeta Bayaudi bataambi ne lundi asabanga Wele busiele.
Embi chisa tisa che kumuusi, aba ne kamalola abona malaika owa Wele ne echa niio ali mala amulaanga ali, “Korinelio!”
Korinelio aloleelela malaika chana mu buri mala aloma ali, “Omwami, siina?”
Malaika chana amukobosia ali, “Wele asimisiibwe ne lisaba liowo ne bikholwa bie buaani, mala erekeekhe khu khukobosia.
Khorume babaandu balala e Yopa balange omundu olaangwa bali Simoni Petero.
Ali omukeni munju mwa Simoni omuali owe kamaafu omenyile siimbi ne nyanja.”
Nga malaika arekukha acha, Korinelio alaanga bakholi bewe babili no musikaari, omundu waria Wele mulala khu bakholi bewe ba busiele.
Ababoolela kakaba ne kekholekhe koosi mala abaruma khucha Yopa.
Endaalo eyaloondakho, nga baaba khu lukeendo ne benya khwola Yopa, Petero aniina khunju khusaba, chaba embi chisa sita che kumuusi.
Enjala yamulia mala enya khulia, nga siakhulia ne siaba ne sising'oonwa, aaba ne kamalola.
Abona likulu liekuukhe ne sisiindu silekhanga aasi sisiabonekha nga esuuka embalaayi elikho yikhisibwa ne kimikhanda kine khwiloba.
Mu niyo chabamo chisaang'i chingano choosi, che bikele bine, ne chichiindi nga chimbakilia ne chinyuni che mundaa.
Kumumilo kwecha kwaloma kuli, “Petero, yinyokha; wire mala olie!”
Nio Petero aloma ali, “Omwami sekholakho ndio ata atiiti ene tawe. Ese khaliakho sisiindu siosi siosi sie kumusaango namwe sili sinyaalu tawe.”
Kumumilo chana kwamubolela lundi kuli, “Okhebaasia sisiindu siosi siosi nisio Wele afukiilila khuba sikwalaafu sibe sie kumusaango tawe.”
Kano kekholekha khukhwola khataru, mala sisiindu chana siabukulwa ne khuyilwa mwikulu.
Oli Petero asiiuka sifuno sie kamalola ako, babaandu chana nibo Korinelio aba na arumire yaba bareebire niyo enju eya Simoni yaba mala abele nono bolile asilibwa bemile.
Balaanga, bareeba bali, “Munju muno alimo omukeni olaangwa bali Simoni Petero?”
Petero aaba asikhaka khumanyilisia niko kamalola ako kaboola, ne Roho amuboolela ali, “Ulila! Babaandu bataru balikho bakhuyiima.
Nono yirekekha mala wikhe, okhakhiinda khucha nabo tawe, sikila ese niye oobarumire.”
Khwako Petero ekha aasi mala aboolela babaandu abo ali, “Ese niye mulayiimanga. Mwenyile siina?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Omwimeelesi we banamae Korinelio akhurumire. Ali omundu omulayi owaria Wele lundi niye Bayaudi boosi baria. Malaika owa Wele amubooleele khukhulaanga ewe oche munju mwewe, nio aulile niko omuboolela.”
Nio Petero abakaanila, mala abasaaya bakone munju omwo siilo esio.
Nga bwasia, Petero aacha nabo, ne basuubili balala babama Yopa bosi bacha ne naye.
Endaalo eloondakho boola Kaesarea, Korinelio alala ne balebe ne basaale bewe, nibo aaba ne alangile, baaba bamuliindile.
Nga Petero aaba nakana khwingila munju, Korinelio arura enje khumwakaanila, aasikama aasi ne khumusaaya.
Ne kakhali Petero amwinyosia ne khumuboolela ali, “Yiima, sikila ese ndi omundu busa nga ewe.”
Petero achiililila khulomaloma ne Korinelio ne balikho bengila munju. Aanyoolamo babaandu bakali bebuusiisiemo.
Petero aababoolela ali, “Enywe mumanyile bulayi bwene muli Omuyuda yesi yesi se afukiililwa mu lilaka lie dini yewe akeniye namwe aambaane ne babaandu Be Chikholo chichiindi tawe. Ne kakhali Wele aanjekeesie ndekhe khwibaasia ndi kuli kumusilo khukhola ndio.
Nio nga ne wanaangile, nechile sendobile tawe. Nono, khureeba ndi, sikila siina ne unaangile?”
Korinelio aaloma ali, “Yabeele esaa nga yino eri, chindaalo chitaru chiweele, chisa tisa che ekolooba, naba munju mwase ndikho saba. Ao ne nao omundu okundi eema ebweeni wase aba efwarire chingubo ching'enang'ena
ne aloma ali, ‘Korinelio! Wele aulile lisaba liowo ne buaani bwowo biafukiiliilwe.
Ruma omundu e Yopa khu mundu olaangwa bali Simoni Petero. Akeniiye mungo mwa Simoni omuali owe kamaafu, omenyile siimbi ne nyanja.’
Khwako khulangile khangu, ne wakholile bulayi khukhwicha. Luno khuli ano fweesi ebweeni wa Wele, khwaliindiliile khuulila liosi liosi nilio Omwami akhuelesie khu khubolela.”
Wele afukiilila omundu yesi yesi owe ekholo yosi yosi omwisaaya ne khukhola kali ng'ali.
Mumanyile burume nibwo Wele aruma khu baana ba Isiraeli; ne elwacha Elomo Endayi eye kumuleembe khubirira mu Yesu Kristo, ooli Omwami owa boosi.
Mumanyile kamakali kakakholeekhe mu sibala sia Isiraeli sioosi, khurakikhira Kalilaya, Yoana ne amalile khukhwilwacha ke libatiisia.
Mumanyile ka Yesu owa Nasareti nga Wele aamua Roho Omutakatifu ne bunyali, Acha buli abuundu nakhola kamalayi ne khuonia boosi babamiinwa ne Sietani, sikila Wele abechanga ne naye.
Efwe khuli baloli ba buli siindu nisio akhola mu sibala sia Isiraeli ne mu Yerusalemu. Bamwiira mungila eye khumubamba khu musalaba.
Ne kakhali Wele amulamusia khukhwama mu bafu enyuma we chindaalo chitaru, amukhola abonekhe.
Se abonekha khu baandu boosi tawe, ne kakhali khu baloli nibo Wele arobora khaale, efwe khukhwalia ne khunywa naye namalile khulamukha khurura mu lifwa.
Lundi akhulaka khukhwilwachila babaandu Elomo Endayi, ne khubaboolela nga Wele ne amurobora niye khuba Omukhalaki owe balamu ne bafu.
Bang'oosi boosi bamulomalomangakho, ne baloma bali yesi yesi omusuubila, bubwoni bwewe bulabeelwa khubirira mu maani ke lisina liewe.”
Nga Petero aba nasilomaloma ario, Roho Omutakatifu ekha khu boosi ba baaba ne barekeeresie burume bwewe.
Bayaudi basuubili ba baaba ne bechile khukhwama e Yopa ne Petero, bauka nga Wele naba ne aanile siianwa siewe sia Roho Omutakatifu khu Be Chikholo bosi.
Sikila babaulila ne balomaloma mu nimi chingeni ne khufumia Wele. Abwenao Petero alomaloma ali,
“Babaandu bano banyoolile Roho Omutakatifu, nga efwe fwesi ne khwanyoola. Nono aliio omundu yesi yesi onyala khubakhiingilila khubatiisibwa ne kameechi ku?”
Khwako aaloma babatiisibwe mu lisina lia Yesu Kristo. Nio bamureeba amenye nabo chindaalo ngekhe.

Barumwa ne basuubili babaandi be mu Buyuda mwoosi baulila bali Be Chikholo bosi banyoolile elomo eya Wele.
Nga Petero ne acha e Yerusalemu, Bayaudi chana babenyanga Be Chikholo bakhebwe, bamwikiicha ne baloma bali,
“Siina sikila ewe ne wachiile walia ne babaandu basiinde?”
Nio Petero ababoolela mubwichufu koosi kakaba ne kekholeekhe, khukhwama mu khurakikha. Ababoolela ali,
“Nga ne naba ne saba mu lukoba lwa Yopa, naba ne kamalola nabona sisiindu siikha aasi sifwaana nga esuuka embalaayi ne yikhisibwa aasi mu mikhanda chayo chine khukhwama mwikulu, mala yakamila niio ese naba.
Nekhecha mukari mala nabonamo bibiaayo ne chisaang'i che mundaa, nga chimbakilia ne chinyuni che mundaa.
Nio naulila kumumilo ne kuloma khwise kuli, ‘Petero, yinyokha, ochiire olie!’
Ne kakhali naloma ndi, ‘Tawe, Omwami! Sikila sisiindu sie kumusaango namwe sinyaalu sikhengilakho mukhanwa mwase tawe.’
Kumumilo chana kwalomaloma lundi khukhwama mwikulu kuli, ‘Nibio Wele ang'oona okhabilanganga oli binyaalu tawe.’
Lino liakholekha khukhwola khataru, ekhumaliilikha biakobosebwa mwikulu.
Siise siene esio ne sisiene babaandu bataru baba barumirwe khwise khukhwama Kaesarea, abele boolile anju niio naba.
Roho aamboolela ali nje nabo khatitila tawe. Khwacha ne basuubili basiaase sita bano khukhwama Yopa khukhwola Kaesarea, mala fweesi khwengila munju mwa Korinelio.
Korinelio akhuboolela nga ne abona malaika ne emile munju mwewe, ne amuboolela ali, ‘Ruma omundu mulala Yopa alaange omundu olaangwa bali Simoni Petero.
Alakhuboolela burume bulakhuonia ewe wamwene nende be nju yowo boosi.’
Ne nga narakikha khulomaloma, Roho Omutakatifu abekhakho bulayi bwene nga ekha khwifwe mu khurakikha.
Abwenao nakhebulila kamakhuwa niko Omwami aaloma ali, ‘Yoana arumikhira kameechi khu batisia, ne enywe mulabatiisibwa ne Roho Omutakatifu.’
Kaaba bali Wele aabaelesia siianwa sisiene nga ne akhuwa efwe nga ne khwasuubila mu Mwami Yesu Kristo, abeele ese naanu ooyingania Wele?”
Nga ne baulila kano, balekha kamayiingamo kabwe mala bafumia Wele, ne baloma bali, “Nono aba Wele aelesie akhaba Be Chikholo boosi bubweyaangu bwe khukhwikanila mala bamenye.”
Ne basuubili babaandi, babama Saipurasi ne Kireni, bacha e Andioka basalanisia burume obwo akhaba khu Bakiriki, ne belwacha Elomo Endayi eyo Mwami Yesu.
Kamaani ko Mwami kaba nabo, babaandu bakali basuubila ne khukobolela Omwami.
Kamakhuwa kano kolela ekanisa mu Yerusalemu, nio baruma Baranaba ache e Andioka.
Nga ne ola ne khubona nga Wele ne aelesie baandu chikhabi, asangaala nekhubaa kumwoyo boosi babe basuubilifu lundi bang'ali khu Mwami ne kimiooyo kiabwe kioosi.
Baranaba aba omundu omulayi, owechusibwa Roho Omutakatifu ne lisuubila, ne babaandu bakali beecha khu Mwami.
Mala Baranaba acha e Tasasi khuyiima Saulo.
Nga ne amunyoola, amuyila e Andioka, ne khu mwiiko kwosi boombi babonanga babaandu be kanisa ne bekisia sipupu siboofu. Yaba e Andioka niyo basuubili banyoela khulaangwa bali, “Bakristo.”
Mu siise sienesio, bang'oosi balala bacha Andioka khukhwama Yerusalemu.
Mulala khu nibo lisina bali Akabasi, eema ne khulwe kamaani ka Roho ang'oola ali enjala engali elikho yiicha khu sibala sioosi. (Enjala yino yecha mu liamiia lia Kilautio).
Babeeka abo bafukiilisiana bali, buli mundu khu nibo arume siosi siosi nisio anyala khuyeeta babasiaabwe bamenyile e Buyuda.
Bakhola bario, mala barumira babemeelesi be kanisa chirupia khubirira khu Baranaba ne Saulo.

Mu siise sienesio, Omwami Herodi arakikha khunyaasia balala khu beeka be kanisa.
Era Yakobo wandaaye owa Yoana ne embalu.
Nga ne abona ali liasiimisie Bayaudi, achiililila ario mala aamba ne Petero yesi. (Kano kakholekha mu siise sia naikara eye kimikaati kikhalimo limela tawe.)
Petero namalile khuaambwa areebwa mu siboe, baamurakho banamae bipupu bine. Buli silala siaba ne banamae bane khu muliinda. Herodi arekekha khumureera mu lisitakwa ebweeni we babaandu Epasaka ne wele.
Nio Petero aarama mu siboe, ne kakhali e kanisa yachiililila khusaba Wele ne kumwoyo kwoosi.
Mu silo, nio busie Herodi areere Petero ebweeni we babaandu, Petero aaba akonile akari we banamae babili. Yaba bamuboyile kiminyololo kibili, lundi banamae baaba esilibwa we siboe baliindiilile.
Ao ne nao, malaika owo Mwami emao, mala buwaanga bwakhosia mu siboe omwo. Nio malaika chana asisiikha Petero libeka, amusiisimusia ne aloma ali, “Yinyokha Khangu!” Ao ne nao kiminyololo kiakwa khukhwama khu makhono ka Petero.
Nio malaika aloma ali, “Yeboa kumusiipi kwowo, mala wefware biraaro biowo.” Petero akhola ario, nio malaika chana amuboolela ali, “Yefwara likooti liowo khuche.”
Petero amuloondakho ne se amanya ali, niko malaika akhola ako kaba kang'ali tawe; akelanga ali kamalola.
Babira khu musikaari owe khunyoa nende owa khabili, ekhumaliilikha beecha khu silibwa sie bichuuma siicha mu lukoba. Silibwa esio sisiene siekukha, mala barura enje. Bekha khu ngila eya mwalo, mala ao ne nao malaika alekha Petero.
Nio Petero amanya kamwikholekhekho, mala aloma ali, “Nono nakhamanya ndi kali ng'ali! Omwami arumire malaika wewe khukhundusia mu bunyali bwa Herodi, ne khurura mu buli siindu nisio Bayaudi bebaasianga bali silakholekha.”
Nga ne amanya ario, acha munju mwa Maria maawe owa Yoana owe lisina liliindi bali Mariko, ebweeneyo babaandu bakali baba bebuusiisieyo khu saba.
Petero akhong'oonda khu lwiiki lwenje, mala omukhaana bali Roda omukholi owe munju omwo acha khukhwikula.
Omukhaana chana amanya kumumilo kwa Petero, mala ekhoya lukali. Busangaafu bwakila khwikulayo tawe, ne kakhali atima akobola munju ababoolela ali, “Petero ali khu muliango!”
Baboolela omukhaana oyo bali, “Okwa kamalalu ewe!” Ne kakhali niye aandalasilia elala ali kali kang'ali. Nio bamukobosia bali, “Oyo malaika wewe.”
Siise esio Petero achiililila khukhong'oonda. Ekhumaliilikha bekula lulwiiki, ne nga bamubona, bauka.
Petero abasisia ne kumukhono kwewe mala basila, ababolela nga Omwami ne amurusiisie mu siboe. Nio aloma ali, “Boolela Yakobo ne basuubili babaandi boosi kano.” Nga amala ario arekukha acha abuundu aandi.
Oli bwasia, bulomani bwabao akari we banamae khu kakaaba ne kekholeekhe khu Petero.
Herodi arusia lilaka bayime Petero, ne se bamunyoola tawe. Nio areeberesia banamae mala arusia lilaka berwe. Enyuma wa kano, Herodi arura e Buyuda acha amenyakakho mu Kaesarea.
Herodi aakhalalila lukali babaandu ba Tiro ne Sidoni, khwako becha mu bipupu khumubona. Banyoa bafukiilisiana ne Bulasito omwimeelesi we lichipi khuba lubeka lwabwe nio bali abayeete. Nio bacha khu Herodi bamusaba kumuleembe, sikila sibala siabwe siasakhanga biakhulia khukhwama mu sibala sio mwami oyo.
Khu ndaalo nabulebe, Herodi efwara chingubo che bubwami, ekhala khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami, mala alomaloma khu baandu.
Babaandu baapa luyoka ne baloma bali, “Se ali omundu olikho olomaloma tawe, ne kakhali Wele!”
Abwene ne abwene malaika wo Mwami eera Herodi sikila se aelesia Wele luyali tawe. Chinyeende chamulia siise esio aafwa.
Elomo eya Wele yachiililila khubalaa.
Baranaba ne Saulo bamaliilisia kimilimo kiabwe mala bakobola khukhwama Yerusalemu, becha ne Yoana olaangwa Mariko.

Mu kanisa eya e Andioka babaamo bang'oosi ne babekisia. Khu nibo aaba Baranaba, Simioni, (owalaangwa Mumali), Lukio (owa Kireni), Manaeni (niye Herodi akhusia), ne Saulo.
Nga baba ne basaaya Omwami, ne khukhweyimana khulia, Roho Omutakatifu ababoolela ali, “Ra alubeka Baranaba ne Saulo, bakhole kimilimo nikio mbalangiile.”
Enyuma we khukhweyima khulia ne khusaba, ba barakho kamakhono ne khubasibula bache.
Nga Baranaba ne Saulo ne bamala khurumwa ne Roho Omutakatifu, bacha Seleusia bengilila emeeli abwenao, bacha khu sibala sisiakarwa ne kameechi sia Saipurasi.
Nga ne boola e Salamisi, belwacha elomo eya Wele mu masinakooki ke Bayaudi. Yoana olaangwa Mariko aba nabo khubayeeta kimilimo.
Bakeenda khu sibala okhwo bola Pafosi, bakaananayo omundu ookhola kamaya omuyaudi owalaangwa Bari-Yesu. Omundu yuno aaba omung'oosi we bubeeyi.
Abechanga omusaale wo muruki owe sibala esio bali Serikio Paulo, owaba omundu omukesi. Omuruki oyo alaanga Baranaba ne Saulo beecha niio aba sikila enya khuulila elomo eya Wele.
Ne kakhali Elimasi (liboola lili omundu ookhola kamaya mu Lukiriki), abayingania, nakhaka khurusia omuruki chana khu lisuubila.
Ne kakhali Saulo owamanyikhana lundi bali Paulo, mukhwichusibwa ne Roho Omutakatifu; aunguusa omufumu oyo mumoni
ne aloma ali, “Ewe oli omwana owa Sietani! Oli omusiku owa buli siindu siosi siosi siili silayi. Oli ne buubacha bwa Sietani chingano choosi, ne buli lwoosi obelelelanga khukhaka khukaluukhasia bung'ali bwo Mwami bube bubeeyi!
Luno omwami alakhukhola ewe obofule lundi se olabona buwaanga khu siise tawe.”
Ao ne nao Elimasi arakikha khubona sisiilima, namufweli yamufuunikha chimoni, arakikha khukeenda nabotookhelela akhaka khunyoola yesi yesi amutile kumukhono.
Nga omuruki chana oyo abona ario, asuubila. Sikila auka lukali nga ne aulila kamekisio ko Mwami.
Paulo ne babasie bama Pafosi baniina emeeli bacha boola mu lukoba lwa Perika, mu Pamufilia. Ao Yoana olaangwa Mariko abalekha akobola e Yerusalemu.
Khukhwama Perika boola e Andioka eya Pisitia, ne mu sabato bacha mu sinakooki mala bekhala aasi.
Nga ne bamala khusoma Lilaka lia Musa ne kamaandiko ke bang'oosi, babemeelesi be sinakooki ba barumira likhuwa bali, “Bawandaayefwe, mwabakho ne likhuwa lie khutinyilisia babaandu, ne musiima lomaloma.”
Paulo enyokha eema asuta kumukhono mala achiililila khuloma ali, “Baana ba Isiraeli nende Be Chikholo mwesi muli ano musaayanga Wele ndekeeresie!
Abekhaliilikha khu miiko kamakhumi kane nga ne baaba mu sichiimi.
Arusiamo chikholo saba mu sibala sia Kanaani aelesia babaandu bewe sibala esio khuba sisiabwe.
Kano koosi kabukula embi kimiiko chimia chine ne kamakhumi karaano.
“Enyuma wa kano, aabaelesia bakhalaki khukhwola khu sise sio mung'oosi Samweli.
Ne nga basaba khuba no mwami, Wele abaelesia Saulo okhwa Kishi khukhwama mu kholo eya Benjamini, khuba omwami wabwe, khu miiko kamakhumi kane.
Ne amalile khumurusiao, Wele akhola Daudi khuba Omwami wabwe. Kano niko Wele alomaloma khuloondekhana ne Daudi ali, ‘Nanyoolile Daudi okhwa Chesi, ali omundu osiimisia kumwoyo kwase, omundu okana khu khola koosi niko nenya ndi akhole.’
Khubirira mu lisaaye lia Daudi, niye Wele akhola khuba Omuonia owe babaandu ba Isiraeli, nga aba ne alaka.
Yesu ne akharakikha kimilimo kiewe tawe, Yoana elwachila babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi ali, bekanile bubwoni bwabwe nio babatiisibwe.
Nga Yoana aaba ne alikho amaliilisia kimilimo kiewe aboolela babaandu ali, ‘Mwibaasia muli ese naanu niye? Ese sendi niye mulindiililanga oyo tawe. Ne kakhali rekeeresia! Alikho echa enyuma wase, ne ese se nolaana khukaangulula biraaro biewe tawe.’
“Bawandaayase, ba Isiraeli, be lisaaye lia Aburahamu ne nanywe Be Chikholo mweesi musaayanga Wele, Efwe nifwe khukhwarumirwa burume bwe buonia buno!
Sikila babaandu bamenyile mu Yerusalemu ne babemeelesi babwe se bamanya bali ali Omuonia tawe, namwe se bamanyilisia kamakhuwa ke bang'oosi ka kasomwanga buli Esabato tawe. Khwako baakhola kamakhuwa ke bang'oosi kechusibwa nga ne bakhalakila Yesu.
Ne kakhaba kario se banyoola sifuno sie khumukhalakila lifwa tawe, babolela Pilato khumukhalakila lifwa.
Ne nga ne bamala khukhola buli siindu nisio kamaandiko kaboola khu niye, bamwikhisia khu musalaba ne khumura mu ng'ani.
Ne kakhali Wele amwinyosia khukhwama mu lifwa,
chindaalo chingaali abonekhela nibo aakeendanga nabo khukhwama Kalilaya khucha Yerusalemu. Bano nibo baloli khu niye khu baandu ba Isiraeli.
Ne efwe khuliano khubareerera Elomo Endayi: nga Wele ne asuubisia bakuuka befwe ali alikhola.
Luno amalile khukhukholela, efwe khuuli lisaaye liabwe, khulwe khulamusia Yesu khukhwama mu bafu. Nga kaandikwa mu sitabu sie chinyimbo sie khabili kali,
‘Ewe oli omwana wase omusoleeli;
endaalo eya luno nabeele Raraao.’
‘Ndakhuelesia chikhabi chindakatifu lundi cha ng'ali nicho nasuubisia Daudi.’
‘Se olalekha omutakatifu wowo abolele mu siliindwa tawe.’
“Nono, Daudi mu siise siewe akhola niko Wele aafunaana, afwa. Aasiikhwa alala ne bakuuka bewe, mala kumubili kwewe kwabolela mu siliindwa.
Ne se keekholekha kario khuyo niye Wele alamusia khukhwama mu lifwa tawe.
Enywe mwesi, Baisiraeli basiaase, manya muli burume bwe khubeelwa bubwoni bwilwachibwa khwinywe khubirira mu Yesu.
Ne yesi yesi osuubila mu niye aaba omulekhuule khukhwama khu bwoni bwoosi nibwo Lilaka lia Musa likhanyala liamukhola aba omulekhuule tawe.
Nono lola bulayi, niko bang'oosi baloma kakhakhola kario kekholekha khwinywe tawe:
‘Lola, enywe be chilomo che khuuina!
Khemurangararwe mala mufwe!
Sikila nisio ndikho khola luno,
sili sisiindu nisio mukhalisuubila tawe,
omundu yesi yesi akhamwinooselia.’ ”
Nga Paulo ne Baranaba baaba ne barura mu sinakooki omwo, babaandu abo babenya bakobole lundi mu ndaalo eye sabato eloondakho, balomalome lukalikho khu biindu bienebio.
Enyuma we babaandu ne barurire mu khubuusiana okhwo, Bayaudi bakali nende Be Chikholo ba baaba ne bekaniile ne khuba be kumukaanda kwe ba Yuda, baloonda khu Paulo ne Baranaba. Nio barumwa abo baloma nabo ne khubachuuba bachiililile khumenya mu mwalaalo kwa Wele.
Esabato yaloondakho, embi buli mundu mu lukoba olwo echa khurekeeresia elomo yo Mwami.
Nga Bayaudi ne babona babaandu bakali abo sikhalikhali siabechulamo; baloba niko Paulo aba ne alomaloma lundi bamukhoma.
Kakhaba kario Paulo ne Baranaba balomalomela abuwaanga mu bunyindaafu bali, “Liaba lie bukhala bali elomo eya Wele ekhoyela khunyoa khulomalomwa khwinywe. Ne sikila mwakikaanile, mwilola muli se mwolaana khunyoola bulamu bwa mindali tawe, khulamulekha mala khuche mu Be Chikholo.
Sikila lino lili lilaka nilio Omwami akhuelesia efwe nga aloma ali,
‘Nakhukholile ewe khuuba buwaanga khu Be Chikholo, nio sibala sioosi sionisibwe.’ ”
Nga Be Chikholo ne baulila kano, basangaala ne khufumia burume bwo Mwami, ne boosi babaroborwa khu bulamu bwa mindali basuubila.
Elomo eyo Mwami yasalaanila buli abuundu mu lukoongo olwo lwoosi.
Ne kakhali Bayaudi baachilisia bakhulu be mu lukoba ne bakhasi be liria mu Be Chikholo ba basaayanga Wele. Barakikha khunyaasia Paulo ne Baranaba babaona barure mu lukoongo lwabwe olwo.
Nio Paulo ne Baranaba ba basisakulilakho lutamuusi lwe khu bikele biabwe nga sibwaabo, mala bacha Ikoni.
Basuubili mu Andioka baba ne liliekhoya likali lundi bechusibwa Roho Omutakatifu.

Ne bali Ikoni bengila boombi mu sinakooki eye Bayaudi, mala belwacha. Babaandu bakali Bayaudi ne Bakiriki alala basuubila.
Ne Bayaudi bakhasuubila tawe, baachilisia Be Chikholo ne khubakhola babiile basuubili.
Ne kakhali Paulo ne Baranaba bachiililila khumenyayo lukali ne balomaloma ne bunyindaafu ko Mwami. Omwami naye aandalasia burume bwabwe bwe kumwalaalo kwewe mu khubaelesia kamaani khukhola kamayia ne bikholwa bie liiukia.
Babaandu be mu lukoba babukhana, balala baloonda Bayaudi ne babaandi barumwa.
Enyuma wako Bakiriki balala ne Bayaudi, ne babemeelesi babwe, bakhalaka khu khupia siibi barumwa ne khubapa kamabaale.
Nga barumwa ne bamanya kamene ako, belukhila mu ngoba cha Lisitura ne Teribe mu Likaonia ne chingoongo chiili siimbi ne nao.
Ebweeneyo belwacha Elomo Endayi.
Mu Lisitura abamo omundu omuleme owalemala khukhwama mu khusaalwa khwewe, aba sanyala khukeenda tawe.
Omundu mwenoyo aba ekhaale arekeeresie nga Paulo ne elwacha. Paulo amuloleelela mala abona ali, ali ne lisuubila linyala liamuonia.
Aloma ne kumumilo kwe aangaki ali, “Yinyokha wime!” Omundu oyo enyokha khangu, mala arakikha khukeenda.
Babaandu bakali abo nga ne babona niko Paulo akhola, barakikha khu khuupa luyoka mu lulomo lwabwe Lulikaonia bali, “Bawele becheele mu lukoondo lwe babaandu!”
Batiuukha Baranaba bali Seusi, Paulo bali Herimesi sikila niye aaba omulomalomi Omukhulu.
Mala omusaayi owa wele niye balaanga bali Seusi, niye lukaangu lwewe lwaba enje we lukoba, areera chiuunwa ne bimuli esilibwa, sikila niye ne babaandu abo benya khurusia embosio khu barumwa.
Baranaba ne Paulo nga ne baulila niko babaandu benya khukhola, batabulaka chingubo chabwe mala batimaka bacha akari we babaandu abo ne khuyokela bali,
“Balebe, sikila siina ne mulikho mukhola kamakhuwa kano? Efwe khuli babaandu busa bulayi bwene nga enywe! Khuli ano khumureerera Elomo Endayi, khumuboolela enywe murure khu biindu bikhamuyeeta tawe, muche khu Wele omenyile mindali owabuumba likulu, sibala, enyanja nende bioosi bilimo.
Khaale Wele alekha babaandu boosi bakhole nga ne benya.
Kakhaba kario, buli lwoosi Wele aananga buloli bubwekesia buli aliio, khubirira mu biindu bilayi nibio akholanga. Amureereranga efula khukhwama mungaaki ne khumuelesia bibiaalwa mu siise silayi. Lundi amuelesianga biakhulia ne busangaafu mu miooyo kienywe.”
Ne akhaba ne baloma bario, bwaba bulume khu khiingilila babaandu abo balekhe khubarusilia embosio.
Nio Bayaudi balala becha khukhwama e Andioka mu Pisitia ne Ikoni, bafukiilisiana ne babaandu abo, baapa Paulo kamabaale, bakela bali afwiile nio bamukhuruura bamurusia enje we lukoba.
Ne nga basuubili ne babuusiana bamubotookhelela niio aaba, enyokha mala akobola mu lukoba. Endaalo yaloondakho niye ne Baranaba bacha e Teribe.
Paulo ne Baranaba belwacha Elomo Endayi mu Teribe banyoola babeeka bakali. Nio bakobola e Lisitura ne Ikoni, lundi boola e Andioka mu Pisitia.
Batinyilisia basuubili ne khubachuuba bachiililile mu lisuubila. Bababoolela bali, “Khukhwola khubirire mu butinyu bukali nio khwingile mu bwami bwa Wele.”
Buli mu kanisa barobora babemeelesi, ne khubirira mu lisaba ne khukhweyima khulia, babara ebweeni wo Mwami, niye basuubila.
Nga ne bamala bario, babirira mu ngoongo cha Pisitia, boola e Pamufilia.
Nga bamala khukhwilwacha elomo mu Perika ne mala bacha Atalia,
ne khukhwama ebweeneyo bakobolela mu liaro e Andioka, abuundu yaba niio babara aasi we kumwalaalo kwa Wele khulwe kimilimo nikio yaba batabusiisie.
Nga ne boola e Andioka, babuusia alala babaandu be kanisa ne khubaboolela koosi niko Wele aaba ne abarumikhiire khukhola, lundi nga aaba ne ekuule engila khu Be Chikholo khusuubila.
Nio bamenyayo siise sileeyi ne basuubili.

Paulo ne Baranaba bayingana nabo lukali khu likhuwa lino, nio liakhalakwa bali Paulo ne Baranaba alala ne babaandikho khube mu sibala sia Andioka, bache Yerusalemu babonane ne barumwa ne babemeelesi khu likhuwa lino.
Barumwa ne kanisa, ne nga baba ne bacha babirira Foenike ne Samaria, ne baboola nga Be Chikholo ne balakobolelanga Wele. Kamakhuwa mene ako kareera busangaafu bukali khu basuubili.
Nga ne boola mu Yerusalemu, bakaanilwa ne kanisa, barumwa, ne babemeelesi. Nio bababoolela koosi niko Wele aaba ne akholile khubirira mu nibo.
Nio balala khu basuubili ba baaba be mumukaanda kwe Bafarisayo benyokha baloma bali, “Be Chikholo khukhwola bakhwebwe, lundi baboolelwe khuria Lilaka lia Musa.”
Barumwa ne babemeelesi be kanisa bekhala alala khukhwinoosia lireeba liene elio.
Enyuma we khuloleelela mwikhuwa elio khu siise sileeyi, Petero enyokha aloma ali, “Bawandaayase, mumanyile muli Wele andobora khaale khukhwama mwinywe nilwache burume bwe Elomo Endayi khu Be Chikholo, nio baulile ne khusuubila.
Ne Wele, omanyile kamebaasio ka buli mundu ekesia abuwaanga ali afukiliile be Chikholo khulwe khubaelesia Roho Omutakatifu bulayi bwene nga ne akhuelesia efwe fwesi.
Se atomboola akari wefwe ne nabo tawe. Ababeela bubwoni bwabwe sikila basuubila.
Khwako, siina sikila enywe luno ne mwenya khukhaka Wele nga ne mularechanga busiro khu mikoongo kie basuubili khaba nibwo akhaba efwe fwabeene namwe bakuuka befwe baakhanyala khusuta tawe?
Efwe khusuubila khuli khubirira mu mwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu, efwe khulaonisibwa bulayi bwene nga nibo.”
Babaandu boosi basila ne khurekeeresia Baranaba ne Paulo, nga baboola kamayia nende bie khuukia nibio Wele aaba ne akholile mu Be Chikholo khubirira mu nibo.
Nga bamala khulomaloma, Yakobo asuta kumumilo kwewe aloma ali, “Bawandaayase, ndekeeresie!
Simoni ama khukhwinoosia nga Wele mu khunyoa ne echa mu Be Chikholo khubukulamo babaandu khulwe lisina liewe.
Chilomo che bang'oosi chifukiilisiana elala ne nakano, niio liiandiko liloma lili,
‘Enyuma we kamakhuwa kano ndakobola,
ndakobosiao bubwami bwa Daudi.
Niio bwatechukha ndabwombakha lundi,
mala mbukhole bube bwe kamaani lundi.
Nio babaandu baramire Be Chikholo boosi nibo nalaanga khuuba babaase samwene, balecha niio ndi.
Omwami owakhola kano kamanyikhana khaale aloma ario.’ ”
Yakobo achiililila khuloma ali, “Ese ndola ndi, se khukhoyeele khwanaania Be Chikholo balakobolelanga Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali, khukhoyeele khubaandikile ebarwa khubaboolela balekhe khulia siakhulia siosi siosi siili sie kumusaango, siaanilwe nga siianwa khu bifwaani, be bebee bukhobani, lundi bakhalia enyama yosi yosi, niyo bakokile, namwe khulia ne khunywa kamalasile tawe.
Sikila Lilaka lia Musa liasomilwe khu siise sileeyi mu masinakooki buli endaalo eye Sabato, ne kamakhuwa kewe kelwachibwanga mu buli lukoba.”
Nio barumwa, ne babemeelesi alala ne kanisa yoosi bakhalaka khurobora babaandu balala khukhwama mu sipupu esio bache e Andioka alala ne Paulo ne Baranaba. Barobora babaandu babili nibo basuubili baria lukali, Yuda owalaangwa Barisaba ne Sila.
Ba baruma ne ebarwa yino: “Efwe, barumwa ne babemeelesi be kanisa, khuli bawandaayenywe, khuruma kimileembe khu bawandaayefwe boosi ba basaalwa mu Chikholo ba bamenya e Andioka, Siria ne Silisia.
Khwaulile bali babaandu babaandi ba barura mwifwe, bamunaanisie ne khumwonaka kimiooyo kienywe sikila niko baloma, ne efwe se khwabalakakho balome likhuwa liosi liosi tawe.
Khwako, khwekhaale alala mala fwesi khwafukiilisiana khurobora barumwa, khubarume khwinywe. Balecha ne basaale befwe bakoosi Baranaba ne Paulo,
babeana bulamu bwabwe khukholela Omwami Yesu Kristo.
Nono, khulikho khuruma Yuda ne Sila; kane babenabo bamuboolele ne kumunwa niko khuandiike kano.
Lialolekhaane lilayi khu Roho Omutakatifu ne nafwe, khukhamutiuukha enywe busiro bukali tawe, ne kakhali kamalaka kali ne bukhala niko kano;
Mukhalia biakhulia bie kimisaango nibio baosiisie khu bifwaani, namwe kamalasile, namwe enyama eye sisiaayo sikokiilwe tawe. Mwiyaye mukhaba be sifwaabi tawe. Mulaba bulayi mwaba ne mweliinda khu makhuwa kano. Muliindwe.”
Basibula barumwa chana abo bacha e Andioka, ebweeneyo balaanga basuubili alala mala babaelesia ebarwa eyo.
Nga ne basoma ebarwa eyo, kamakhuwa kakabaamo, kabasangaasia ne khubachuuba.
Yuda ne Sila ba baaba bang'oosi, bakachula ne balebe abo khu siise sileeyi ne ba bachuuba ne khubaramo kamaani.
Enyuma we khubayo khulwe siise, basuubili ba basibula mu muleembe bakobola niyo ba baabaruma baba. [
Ne kakhali Sila akhalaka khuramayo.]
Paulo ne Baranaba barama e Andioka khulwe siise, baambaana ne babaandi ne bekisia ne khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi eyo Mwami.
Nga chindaalo ngekhe chabira, Paulo aboolela Baranaba ali, “Khukoboleyo khulambuule bawandaayefwe mu buli lukoba nimwo khwelwacha elomo eyo Mwami, khubone nga ne balikho bachiililila.”
Baranaba enya bache ne Yoana Mariko yesi.
Ne kakhali Paulo se enya bache ne Mariko tawe, sikila aabalekha e Pamufilia, aloba khuchiililila nabo mumilimo kiabwe.
Kamayiingamo kamarafu kabao, mala baukhana. Baranaba abukula Mariko, baniina emeeli bambukha Saipurasi.
Ne Paulo arobora Sila mala bacha, enyuma we basuubili khubara mu buliindi bwe kumwalaalo kwo Mwami.
Nio Paulo abirira mu Siria ne Silisia ne atinyilisia chikanisa.

Paulo achiililila ola e Teribe ne Lisitura, niio omukristo niye balanga bali Timoteo amenya. Maawe aaba omuyaudi mala yesi aaba omukristo, ne raraawe aaba Omukiriki.
Basuubili boosi mu Lisitura ne mu Ikoni balomaloma bulayi bwa Timoteo.
Paulo enya khubukula Timoteo ache ne naye, khwako amukheba. Akhola ario sikila Bayaudi boosi ba bamenya mu sibala esio bamanya bali raraawe owa Timoteo aba Omukiriki.
Nga ne baba ne babira mu ngoba echo, baelesia basuubili kamalaka niko barumwa ne babemeelesi be kanisa mu Yerusalemu babisia, ne khubaboolela bakarie.
Nio chikanisa chatinyilisibwa mu lisuubila ne khukucha buli endaalo.
Babirira mu ngoongo cha Firikia ne Kalatia, sikila Roho Omutakatifu se abafukiilila khukhwilwacha mu lukoongo lwa Esia tawe.
Nga ne boola khulwakha lwa Misia, bakhaka khukhwingila mu sibala sia Bisinia, ne kakhali Roho owa Yesu se abafukiilila tawe.
Khwako, babirira mu Misia, bachiililila boola e Turoa.
Oli musilo Paulo aba ne kamalola, abona omundu mulala owa Masedonia emile alikho amuboolela ali, “Yambukha wiche e Masedonia okhuyeete!”
Nga Paulo amala khubona kamalola kano, khwerekekha khucha Masedonia, sikila khwamanya khuli Wele akhulangile khucha khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi khu baandu abo.
Khukhwama Turoa, khwambukhila mu meeli khwola e Samotirake, oli bwasia lundi khwola e Neapoli.
Khukhwama ao, khwacha khwola mu sibala sia Filipi, lukoba luboofu mu lukoongo lwa Masedonia mala luli mu bwami bwe Barumi. Khwamenya mu lukoba olwo chindaalo ndiiti chiri.
Endaalo eye Sabato khwarura enje we lukoba, khwacha aluuchi niio khwebaasia khuli manya Bayaudi basabilangao. Khwekhala aasi khwalomaloma khu bakhasi ba baaba ne bebuusiisieyo.
Khu bakhasi ba bakhurekeeresia ne khulomaloma, abakho mulala owaria Wele, lisina liewe bali Litia, amenyanga mu lukoba lwa Siatira. Aakusianga chingubo chifwaana buseemwa. Omwami ekula kumwoyo kwewe aulila kamakhuwa niko Paulo alomanga.
Niye ne be nju bewe ne bamalile khubatiisibwa, akhulaanga ewewe ne aloma ali, “Mwaaba ng'ali ne muboone muli ese nasuubiile Omwami, yiicha mwikhale munju mwase.” Khwako akhwikoonjelela khuche naye.
Endaalo ndala, yaba khulikho khucha abuundu e khuusaba, khwakaanana omukhaana mulala nasioobi owaba ne kumusaambwa kwe bulakusi. Omukhaana yuno mu bulakusi bwewe areereranga bakhoongo bewe chirupia chingali.
Omukhaana yuno aloonda khu Paulo ne nafwe, ne akukuula ali, “Babaandu bano bali bakholi ba Wele owe Angaaki Lukali, balikho bamuboolela engila eye buonia.”
Achiililila khukhola ario khu ndaalo chingali. Ekhumaliilikha Paulo abiililwa mala amurafwira, ne khuboolela sisieeno esio ali, “Mu lisina lia Yesu Kristo, khurafwira omururemo!” Ao ne nao sisieeno siarura mu mukhana oyo.
Bakhoongo bo mukhaana oyo nga ne babona bali lilieyikina liabwe lie khunyoola kimiaandu liawele, baamba Paulo ne Sila, ba bakhurura babaila khu soko ebweeni we babemeelesi.
Babareera ebwami we Barumi baloma bali, “Babaandu bano Bayaudi nibo ne kakhali balakoyanianga lukoba lwefwe.
Bekisia kimiima kikhafukiilisania ne lilaka liefwe nga Baruumi tawe, lundi efwe se khukhoyela khukikhola tawe.”
Babaandu baambaana nabo, baapa Paulo ne Sila.
Bakhalaki babafula chingubo ne kamaani mala baboula kimikhomwa.
Oli bamala khuboula babekaliilila mu siboe, mala banamae be mu siboe baboolelwa khubaliinda lukali.
Khuloondekhana ne kamalaka niko omunamae oyo aebwa, abara munju eye mukari lukali eye baboe ne khubaboa bikele khu bisiindi bisiro.
Oli embi mu silo akari, Paulo ne Sila baba ne basaba ne khukhwimba kimienya kifumia Wele, baboe babaandi baba barekeeresie.
Siise esio, sibala siarakikha khuterema lukali, enju eye baboe yaterema. Ao ne nao kimiliango kioosi kiekukha, ne kiminyololo kikiaboa buli mundu kiakangulukha.
Omunamae oliindanga baboe enyokha abona ali kimiliango kie siboe kiekuukhe, ebaasia ali fwaana baboe boosi belukhe, nio arusia embalu yewe mala enya khukhweyira.
Nio Paulo alaanga ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Okheyira tawe, efwe fweesi khuli muno.”
Omunamae oyo alaanga bareere etaa, mala atima eengila mukari, akwa mu bikele bia Paulo ne Sila nareenga.
Nio abarusia enje abareeba ali, “Khola ndiena nio mbonisibwe?”
Bamukobosia bali, “Khosuubile mu Mwami Yesu mala olaonisibwa alala ne be nju yowo boosi.”
Nio bamwilwachila elomo eyo Mwami, niye ne be nju yewe boosi.
Omunamae chana oyo ababukula mu saa eyo abasiinga kamakoonjo kabwe, ne abwene ne abwene, niye omwene nende be nju yewe boosi baabatiisibwa.
Nio abukula Paulo ne Sila abaila ewewe, abaelesia siakhulia. Niye ne be nju yewe boosi bakhola naikara bekhoya sikila siise sino abele basuubile Wele.
Nga ne bwasia, Barumi be bunyali baruma banamae babwe khu muliindi we siboe oyo bali, “Lekhuula babaandu abo bache.”
Nio omunamae wenju eye baboe aboolela Paulo ali, “Bakhulu barumire lilaka bali ewe ne Sila mulekhuulwe. Luno munyala mwarura mala mwacha engo mu muleembe.”
Ne kakhali Paulo aboolela bakhulu be banamae ali, “Efwe khuli Baruumi, mala baakhuupile bariena ebweeni we babaandu ne khukhura mu siboe ne bakhakhuyaalile tawe? Luno bebaasia bali banyala bakhuulekhuula mu bwikisi! Se kali kario tawe. Babeene khukhwola beche ano bakhuulekhule.”
Nio banamae bacha baboolela bakhulu be Barumi koosi, ne nga baulila bali Paulo ne Sila bali be mu bwami bwe Baruumi, baaba ne buuri.
Kakila bacha ba basaba sibelwa, mala babarusia mu siboe ne khubekoonjelela barure mu lukoba olwo.
Paulo ne Sila bacha munju eya Litia. Mu mwenemwo bakaananilamo ne basuubili, bababoolela kamakhuwa ke khubachuuba mala nibo bacha.

Paulo ne Sila babirira Amufipoli ne Apolonia, boola e Tesalonike niio esinakooki eye Bayaudi yaba.
Khuloondekhana ne kumwiima kwa Paulo kwa busiele, acha mu sinakooki. Ebweeneyo mu chisabato che kamachuuma kataru, ayingananga ne babaandu khu maandiko kamatakatifu,
ababoolela ne khubekisia nga abeele khukhwola Kristo anyaasibwe ne khulamukha khukhwama mu lifwa. Paulo ababolela ali, “Yesu niye ndikho muboolela, yuno niye Masiiya.”
Babaandu balala bafukiilila ka Paulo mala bacha ne Paulo ne Sila; akhaba bakhasi babemeelesi bosi bakhola bario ne Bakiriki bakali babesaaya Wele.
Ne kakhali Bayaudi balala bakhasuubila tawe bakhendekha mala babuusia babaandu bamayaanu be mu soko mu chingila, batubaana alala baba sipupu, mala benya khurakikha sisiayuumba mu sirekere. Babotookhelela lukoba lwa Chasoni ne bayiima Paulo ne Sila, nio ba bareere ebweeni we babaandu boosi babuusanie.
Ne nga ne bakhabanyoola tawe, bakhuruura Chasoni ne basuubili babaandi khukhwola khu bakhulu be lukoba, ne beyasa bali, “Babaandu bano bakaluukhaasie sibala sioosi buli abuundu, ne luno bali mu lukoba lwefwe luno,
ne Chasoni abengisie munju yewe. Boosi balafunakaanga lilaka lio mwami, ne baloma bali aliio omwami okundi niye balanga bali Yesu.”
Nio babaandu ne babemeelesi be lukoba nga baulila kano baambwa lirima.
Bakhulu baruungia Chasoni ne babasie chirupia nio balekhuulwa.
Oli mu silo, basuubili babukula Paulo ne Sila ba bayila e Berea. Nga boolayo bacha mu sinakooki.
Babaandu be bweeneyo baba barekerefu khukhila be Tesalonike. Barekeeresia burume obwo ne silukuluku sikali, ne bemenieelesia kamaandiko kamatakatifu buli endaalo, nio bamanyilisie kaaba bali niko Paulo ne Sila balomanga kaba kang'ali.
Bakali khu nibo basuubila, ne bakhasi Bakiriki be liria ne babaandu boosi basuubila.
Ne nga Bayaudi ba Tesalonike ne baulila bali Paulo elwachile elomo eya Wele mu Berea mwosi, bechayo, barakikha sisiayuumba ne khuachilisia babaandu.
Mu khangu busa basuubili abo, bayila Paulo acha sia nyanja; ne Sila ne Timoteo barama mu Berea.
Babaandu babayila Paulo bacha naye khukhwola Ateni, mala bakobola ne lilakiilisia khukhwama khu Paulo bali, Sila ne Timoteo bamuloondekho khangu nga ne banyala.
Nga Paulo aaba nasilindiilila Sila ne Timoteo mu Ateni abiililwa lukali nga abona bifwaani bikali mu lukoba olwo.
Nio mu sinakooki ayingana ne Bayaudi ne babaandu Be Chikholo ba basaayanga Wele, ne buli ndaalo khu soko aayingananga ne babaandu babechanga embi naye.
Balala khu bekisia be Epikuro ne Basitoiki bayingana naye. Babaandi khu nibo bareeba bali, omusilu owibonia yuno alakhakanga khukhuboolela efwe siina? Balala bakobosia bali, “Kalolekhana olalomalomanga ke ba wele bakeni.” Baloma bario sikila Paulo aba alikho elwacha ka Yesu ne ke lilamukha.
Khwako babukula Paulo, bamuila ebweeni we kumuse kwe lukoba bali Areopako, baloma bali, “Khwenya khumanye liliekisia liya nilio olikho olomakho lino.
Bibiindu bilala nibio khuulile ne kamaru kefwe, bilolekha khuba bikeni busa khwifwe, nono khwenya khumanye bifuno biabio bili siina.”
(Sikila babaandu boosi mu Ateni ne bakeni boosi bamenyilemo barumikhiranga biise biabwe khulomaloma ne khuulila kamakeni.)
Paulo eema ebweeni we kumuse kwe lukoba mala aloma ali, “Naboone ndi enywe babaandu mu menyile mu Ateni muli babaandu be dini mu ngila choosi.
Sikila nga nakeendile mu lukoba lwenywe luno ne khubona abuundu niio musaayilanga, nanyoolile alutare niyo baandikakho bali, ‘Khu Wele okhamanyikhaane oyo.’ Khwako Wele niye musaayanga ne mukhamumanyile oyo, omwene oyo, ali niye ese luno ndikho mwilwachila.
Wele, owabuumba sibala ne bilimo bioosi, ali Omwami owe likulu ne liloba, ne se amenyanga mu ngaangu chichombakhwa ne babaandu tawe.
Namwe se enya sisiindu siosi siosi nisio khunyala khwaana khulwe khumurumikhira tawe, sikila ali omwene oanaanga bulamu, kumuya nende buli siindu khu buli mundu.
Khukhwama khu mundu mulala, abuumba Chikholo che babaandu choosi achikhola khumenya buli abuundu mu sibala sioosi. Omwene anyoa akhalaka khale siise ne chinjakha cha buli abuundu niio bakhoyela khumenya.
Akhola ario, nio bamuyiime, wakana bamunyoola. Ne kakhaba kario, Wele se ali aleeyi khu buli mulala khwifwe tawe.
Nga omundu mulala aloma ali,
‘Mu niye efwe khumenya,
lundi khukeenda lundi khubaao!’
Kali nga balala mu mienya kienywe baaloma bali,
‘Akhaba efwe fwesi khuli babaana bewe.’
Ne nga khuli babaana ba Wele, se khukhoyeele khwebaasia khuli, liba liewe lili busa nga esahabu namwe efwesa namwe libaale liliabeechwa ne busicha bwo mundu tawe.
Mu siise nisio babaandu babeela basilu, Wele ekhola nga okhabona tawe. Ne luno, alaka babaandu boosi buli abuundu bekanile.
Sikila amala khurao endaalo niyo alikhalalilamo sibala sioosi, mu buluungi mu ngila eyo mundu mulala niye arobora, Wele ekesia babaandu nga alamusia omundu chana oyo khukhwama mu lifwa!”
Nga ne baulila Paulo nalomaloma ke khulamukha khukhwama mu lifwa, balala bamuchekha ne babaandi baloma bali, “Khwenya khuulile lundi kamakhuwa menako.”
Nio Paulo arura mu libuusiana acha.
Baandu balala baambana naye mala basuubila. Balala khu beene abo aaba Tonisio mulala khube kumuse, ne omukhasi yesi abakho lisina liewe bali Tamara, ne babaandu babaandi.

Enyuma wa kano, Paulo arura Ateni acha e Korinjo.
Ebweeneyo anyoolayo Omuyaudi khukhwama Pondiasi lisina liewe bali Akwila, aba aamile e Butaliani no mukhasi wewe Pirisila, sikila omwami Kilautio aaba akhalake ali Bayaudi boosi barure mu Rumi. Paulo acha ababona,
aamenya ne khukhola nabo kimilimo, sikila bosi baaba banabi be kamaeema nga niye.
Buli endaalo eye Sabato, Paulo achiichanga mu Sinakooki ne alomaloma khu Bayaudi ne Bakiriki.
Nga Sila ne Timoteo ne boola khukhwama Masedonia. Paulo aana siise siewe sioosi khukhwilwacha burume, ne aatinyilisia Bayaudi ali Yesu niye Kristo.
Nga ne bamuyingania ne khuloma kamakhuwa kamabi khu niye, ariina ne khusiisimula lutamuusi lwe khu ngubo chewe ne khubaboolela ali, “Kamafuki kenywe kabe khu mwabene, sendikho ne bubi nanywe tawe. Khukhwama luno ne khu chiililila ndacha mu Be Chikholo.”
Nio abalekha acha khumenya munju eyo mulala khu Be Chikholo niye balanga bali Tito Yusito, owasaayanga Wele. Enju yewe yaba siimbi ne sinakooki.
Kurisipo, owaba omwimeelesi owe sinakooki, asuubila mu Mwami, alala ne be nju bewe boosi, ne babaandu babaandi bakali mu Korinjo baulila burume, basuubila, mala ba batiisibwa.
Silo silala Paulo aaba ne kamalola nimwo, Omwami amuboolela ali, “Okharia tawe, chiililila khulomaloma okhafwa kumwoyo tawe,
sikila ndi nawe. Se aliio yesi yesi olanyala khu khukholakho siosi siosi sibi tawe, sikila ndi ne babaandu bakali mu lukoba luno bali babase.”
Nio Paulo amenya ebweeneyo kumwiiko mulala ne nusu ne ekisia babaandu elomo eya Wele.
Nga omundu bali Kalio ne akholwa khuuba omuruki owa Akaya, Bayaudi babuusiana alala mala, batila Paulo, bamuyila mu koti.
Ne baloma bali, “Omundu yuno, alakhakanga khuombelesia babaandu basaaye Wele mu ngila niyo lilaka likhafukiilila tawe!”
Paulo aaba ali siimbi khulomaloma, ne omuruki Kalio aboolela Bayaudi abo ali, “Rekeeresia Bayaudi enywe! Abanga likhuwa lino lili khu bwonaki namwe khu mabi kakaandi kosi kosi andi libeele ng'ali khwise khukhwefwiilisia khwinywe.
Ne sikila lili likhuwa lie khuyingana khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ne kamasina ke lilaka lienywe, khukhwola enywe mwabeene muling'oone. Ese senenya khuba omukhalaki owe bibiindu nga bino biri tawe.”
Khwako abaoona barure mu koti.
Nio boosi bafwakhila Sositini owaba omwimeelesi owe sinakooki mala bamupila ebweeni we koti. Ne omuruki Kalio se abukulamo lukeendo tawe.
Boola Efeso, Paulo alekhayo Pirisila ne Akwila, aacha mu sinakooki aayingana ne Bayaudi.
Babaandu bamuboolela bali amenyekhoyo lukali, ne naye khufukiilila tawe.
Ne nga ne aba narekukha, ababoolela ali, “Wele nasiima khakobole lundi koo.” Nio arura mu Efeso ne emeeli.
Nga ne ola e Kaesarea, acha Yerusalemu akheesia ekanisa, mala acha e Andioka.
Oli amalayo siise sitiiti siri, arurayo acha abirira mungoongo cha Kalatia ne Firikia, ne aatinyilisia basuubili boosi.
Mu siise siene esio Omuyaudi mulala, lisina liewe bali Apolo, owasaalwa mu Alekisanduria, eecha Efeso. Aaba omulomalomi omulayi, lundi aaba owasoma lukali kamaandiko kamatakatifu.
Aaba ekisibwa Engila eyo Mwami, ne silukuluku Apolo elwacha ne khukhwikisia bulayi kamakhuwa ka Yesu, ne kakhaba kario aba aamanya libatiisia lia Yoana liong'ene.
Aarakikha khulomaloma mu sinakooki ne bunyindaafu. Ne Nga Pirisila ne Akwila bamuulila, bamubukula baacha naye engo mala bamwinioselia mu bwichufu Engila eya Wele.
Siise esio Apolo akhalaka khucha e Akaya, nio basuubili ba baaba mu Efeso bamuramo kumwoyo lundi bamuyeeta khulwe khuandikila ebarwa basuubili ba baaba mu Akaya, bamwakaanile. Nga ne olayo, aaba owe buyeeti bukali khwaabo ba baaba ne basuubiile khubirira mu mwalaalo kwa Wele.
Khulwe lilomaloma liewe lie kamaani, aaula Bayaudi mu maingano mu moni che babaandu nga ne aandalasia kamaandiko kamatakatifu ali Yesu niye Masiiya.

Apolo ne asiili mu Korinjo, Paulo aakeenda mu ngoongo ng'ene echo mala ola mu Efeso, mu bwenomwo aanyoolamo babeeka,
nio abareeba ali, “Nga ne mwasuubila mwanyoola Roho Omutakatifu?” Bamukobosia bali, “Khaba khukhaulilakho sisiindu bali Roho Omutakatifu siliio tawe”
Paulo areeba ali, “Kaba kario, aba libatiisia lia lukano siina nilio enywe mwanyoola?” Bamukobosia bali, “Libatiisia lia Yoana.”
Nga ne baulila kano, babatiisibwa mu lisina lio Mwami Yesu.
Paulo abarakho kamakhono kewe, ne Roho Omutakatifu abekhakho; balomaloma mu nimi chimbia ne khung'oola.
Boosi baaba embi babaandu ekhumi na babili.
Paulo aacha mu sinakooki, mala khulwe kimieesi kitaru alomalomanga ne babaandu bunyindaafu. Ayinganaanga nabo ne khubasaaya khulwe bubwami bwa Wele.
Ne kakhali balala baba ne sileka, baloba khusuubila, barakikha abuwaanga khuloma kamabi khuloondekhana ne Ngila yo Mwami. Kakila Paulo abalekha abukula basuubili bewe aacha nabo ne abeyikia buli ndaalo munju eye khukhwikisia eya Turanu.
Achiililila khukhola ario khu siise sie kimiiko kibili, nabwila babaandu boosi ba baamenya mu lukoongo lwa Esia, Bayaudi ne Bakiriki baulila elomo eyo Mwami.
Wele aakhola kamaya kakhasala tawe khubirira mu Paulo.
Babaandu babukulanga bitambaa bie mukhono ne chingubo cha Paulo, ne bachiyilila balwale mala bulwaale bwabwe buwa. Ne akhaba ba baaba ne bisieeno biabaruramo.
Bayaudi balala ba bakeendanaanga busa eyi ne neyi ne barusia bisieeno, boosi bakhaka khurumikhira lisina lio Mwami Yesu khurusia bisieeno. Ne baboolela bisieeno bali, “Khumurafwira mu lisina lia Yesu, niye Paulo elwachanga.”
Babao basoleeli saba bo Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe Bayaudi, owalaangwa bali Sikeba bakholanga bario.
Ne kakhali sisieeno siababoolela sili, “Ese manyile Yesu, lundi Paulo yesi mumanyile, ne enywe naanu?”
Nio omundu owabamo sisieeno oyo, abachunukhila ne kamaani kamakali mala abakhila boosi. Bekhupa enje ne chimbala ne chingubo chabwe chatabulwake.
Bayaudi ne Bakiriki boosi ba baamenya Efeso baulila kano koosi, baambwa buuri, ne lisina lio Mwami Yesu liaebwa efuma engali.
Basuubili bakali beecha, ne beyama abuwaanga koosi niko bakholaanga.
Bakali ba bakholanga bufumu, babuusia bitabu biabwe alala, mala babiosela ebweeni we babaandu boosi. Bakhola esaabu eye bukusi bwe bitabu ebio bwoola chirupia chielefu khamusini.
Mu ngila eye kamaani yino, elomo eyo Mwami yachiililila khusalanila ne khuba ne kamaani kamakali.
Enyuma we kamakhuwa ako, Paulo akhalaka mu Roho khucha Yerusalemu khubirira Masedonia ne Akaya. Aaloma ali, “Enyuma we khukhwola Yerusalemu lilamiina nole akhaba e Rumi yosi.”
Nio aruma babili khu bayeeti bewe, Timoteo ne Rasito, bacha Masedonia ne naye arama Esia khu siise sitiiti.
Siaba siise sino nisio sisiayuumba sibi siabela mu Efeso sikila Engila eyo Mwami.
Abamo omubasi owe bibia lisina liewe Demetirio, owabasanga bifwaani bie lukaangu lwa wele owe siikhasi niye balanga bali Aritemi. Bubasi obwo bwareereranga Demetirio ne baabasi basie bukhala bukali.
