Nio Demetirio abuusia baabasi basie abo boosi ne babaandi be kimilimo nga kimiene ekio, mala ababoolela ali, “Baandu enywe, mumanyile muli buiinda bwefwe bwamanga mu milimo kino.
Nono, mwabeene munyala khubona ne khuulila niko omundu Paulo yuno alakholanga. Alaboolanga ali ba wele babakholwa no mundu babenabo se bali bawele tawe, mala aakaluukhasie babaandu mu Efeso muno ne embi mu ngoongo cha Esia choosi.
Nono khuli ne busiku, kumulimo kwefwe kulaba ne lisina libi. Se kali ako kong'ene tawe, aba lundi lukaangu lwa wele omukhasi omukali Aritemi se lulaba ne sifuno tawe, ne bulayi bwewe bulonakwa mala niye ali wele niye buli mundu asaayanga mu Esia mwoosi, ne mu sibala sioosi.”
Nga babaandu bakali abo ne baulila kamakhuwa kano, lirima liabakhaya, baapa luyoka bali, “Aritemi owa Efeso ali Omukali!”
Luyoka lwechula mu lukoba lwoosi. Nio bafwakhila Kayo ne Arisitakaasi ne Bamasedonia babili ba bakeendanga ne Paulo, baabakhuruura ba bareera munju eye kiminyawe.
Paulo omwene enya khucha ebweeni we babaandu abo, ne kakhali basuubili bamukhaya.
Bakhulu babaandi ba Esia, ba baaba basaale bewe, barumira Paulo likhuwa ne bamukaania bali akhacha ebaandu abo munju eye kiminyawe tawe.
Siise siene esio likoyana liabao, buli mundu aapa luyoka; balala baloma kano babaandi kakaandi, ne babaandi khaba khumanya sikilile ne babusania alala tawe.
Balala khu baandu abo bebaasia bali Alekisanda niye owaba mwene makhuwa ako, sikila Bayaudi bamukhola niye acha ebweeni. Ne Alekisanda ne kumukhono kwewe abasisia khu khwenya bamurekeeresie, mala akhaka khulomaloma ne khukhwikaana.
Ne nga bamanya bali aaba Omuyaudi, boosi baapila alala luyoka lwe kamakhuwa kamafwaanane khulwe chisa chibili; bali, “Aritemi owa Efeso ali Omukali”
Ekhumaliilikha omuandiki omukhulu mu lukoba, asisia babaandu, ababoolela ali, “Baandu base ba Efeso, buli mundu amanyile ali lukoba lwa Efeso luno luli luliinda lukaangu lwa Aritemi ne libaale litakatifu liliakwa khukhwama mwikulu.
Se aliio onyala khuyingana kamakhuwa kano tawe. Nono khwako, khukhwola mulekhe sisiayuumba, mukhakhola sisiindu siosi siosi mu khuyuyukhana tawe.
Mwareerire babaandu bano ano ne se bakhunuulile bie mu lukaangu namwe khuloma bibiindu biibi khu bawele befwe tawe.
Demetirio ne bakholi bewe ne bali ne kamasitako khu mundu yesi yesi, khuli ne baruki lundi khuli ne chindaalo che chikesi, khwako kamasitako kanyala kakholebwa ebweeneyo.
Ne mwaba ne mwenya sisiindu sisiindi sikhilakho ao, aba kane sikololosibwe mu siikhasio siifukiililwa sie babaandu boosi.
Sikila khunyala khwasitakwa khu siayumba khulwe kakekholeekhe endaalo eya luno. Se khuli nga khubeelwa khu luyoka luno tawe, ne lundi se khuli ne sifuno silayi khu siayuumba sino tawe.”
Enyuma we khuloma kano, aabolela babaandu baloote.

Sisiayuumba sie Efeso nga siawa, Paulo alaanga basuubili boosi becha alala, abatinyilisia mala niye acha Masedonia.
Abirira mu ngoongo echo ne atinyilisia babaandu ne burume bukali. Nio ola Akaya,
niyo amenyayo kimieesi kitaru. Nga aaba ne erekeekhe khucha Siria aamanya ali Bayaudi bamukwangwaanile; mala akhalaka khukobola Efeso ne abirira mu Masedonia.
Sosipateri okhwa Pairasi owama Berea, aronga naye, akhaba Arisitakaasi ne Sekundo khukhwama Tesalonike, Kayo khukhwama Teribe, ne Timoteo, Tichikasi ne Turofimo khukhwama mu sibala sia Esia.
Barangira ebweeni bakhuliindila efwe e Turoa.
Enyuma wa Naikara eye kumukaati kukhalimo limela tawe, khwaniina mu liaaro e Filipi, ne enyuma we chindaalo chiraano khwola mu Turoa mala khwamenyamo lichuuma lilala.
Khu ndaalo eye ebweeni eye lichuuma, khwebusia alala khunyoola siakhulia sie busangaanilo. Paulo aaba enyile khurekukha endaalo eloondakho, khwako achilila khukhwilwachila babaandu khukhwola mu silo akari.
Chitaa chingali chaba chilikho chikhosia mukorofa nimwo khwaba ne khwakaananiile.
Omusoleeli mulala owalaangwa bali Yutiko aaba ekhaale khwitirisia, Paulo nga aaba nachiililila khukhwilwacha, Yutiko arakikha khuungula kalaa kalaa nabwila liilo liamuyuula mala akona. Oli asili ario aanukha khukhwama khu korofa ekhola khataru mala akwa aasi, aba oli bamwinyosia banyoola afwiile khale.
Ne kakhali Paulo ekha aasi mala enama amutilakho, amuoleelesia mala aloma ali, “Mukheendekhelela tawe, sikila asili omulamu!”
Nio Paulo aniina lundi mukorofa omwo, mala, amesula kumukaati ne khulia, mala achilila khukhwilwacha khu siise sileeyi nabwila bwasia ne arekukha.
Babaandu bayila omusoleeli chana oyo engo nali omulamu busa, mala batinyilisibwa lukali.
Efwe khwaniina mu meeli khwarangira khwacha Asosi niyo khwaba ne khucha khuelekesia Paulo nga aaba ne alaka, sikila se enya khurumikhira emeeli tawe, enya khukeenda busa.
Nga akhunyoola efwe Asosi, khwamuniinia mu meeli, khwacha e Mitilene.
Khwachila mumeeli oli busia khwola e Kiosi. Endaalo eya loondakho khwola Samosi, oli busia lundi khwola e Mileto.
Paulo aaba akhalaake ali alachiililila ne lukeendo alekhe khubirira Efeso, nio akhatibia siise sikali mu Esia tawe. Ayuyanga ario, nio oole Yerusalemu ne kanyalikhana mu ndaalo emboofu eya Pendekositi.
Paulo ne aaba e Mileto aarumania likhuwa khu bemeelesi be ekanisa eya Efeso bakaanaane naye.
Nga becha ababoolela ali, “Enywe mumanyile nga ese namenyanga mwinywe siise sioosi khukhwama endaalo niyo nolela mu sibala sia Esia.
Mumanyile nga narumikhira Omwami mu khwiboombia khwosi, ne kamasika kamakali. Nakhola kimilimo kiase nga omukholi owo Mwami mu sinyasio sisianjichakho sikila ekwangwaani eye Bayaudi.
Mumanyile muli nga nelwachanga burume ne khukhwikisia abuwaanga ne mu chingo chenywe, se nalekha khumuboolela sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala khuuba sie buyeeti khwinywe tawe.
Khu Bayaudi nende Be Chikholo boosi, nabakaambila ndi bakhoya bekanile bubwoni bwabwe mala bakobolele Wele ne khusuubila mu Mwami wefwe Yesu.
Ne luno, mu khuria Roho Omutakatifu, ndikho nja e Yerusalemu, semanya kakane kanjekholekhekho ebweeneyo tawe.
Ne kakhali Roho Omutakatifu alasuubisianga ali siboe ne sibi bianindiliile mu buli lukoba.
Ne seneyibaasilia bulamu bwase samwene khuba sisiindu khwise tawe; nisio nenya siong'ene sili khutabusia burume bwase ne khumala kimilimo kiase nikio Omwami Yesu ambelesia khukhola, ne nikio kino, khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi eye kumwalaalo kwa Wele.
“Ese nakeendilenge ei neyi mwinywe mwesi ne nilwacha bubwami bwa Wele. Ne luno, namanyile ndi se aliio namulala khwinywe okhambonekho lundi tawe.
Khwako muboolela abuwaanga endaalo eya luno ndi: Aaba bali mulala khwinywe acha khutiba, kamafuki kewe se kalaba khwise tawe.
Sikila se nalekhakho khumubuulila enywe sifuno sia Wele sioosi tawe.
Nono khemweliinde mwabeene ne kamakheese niko Roho Omutakatifu aara mu makhono kenywe ali muliinde. Khemube babaayi be kanisa eya Wele, niyo omwene akhola khuba yewe, khubirira mu mafuki ko Mwana wewe.
Manyile ndi ne ngane ndureo, bisuuche birafu bilamwingilamo, ne se bilakholelakho siisa kamakheese tawe.
Siise siloola nisio babaandu balala bakharure mumukaanda kwenywe mwabeene mala balome bubeeyi ne khutiimia basuubili nio babaloondekho.
Ba meso, mala mukhebulile muli, khu miiko kitaru, nekisia buli mulala khwinywe silo ne kumuusi ne ndila.
“Ne luno mubiikha mu buliindi bwa Wele ne mu burume bwe kumwalaalo kwewe, burume bunyala khumwombakha ne khumuelesia enywe chikhabi nicho Wele aabiikhila babaandu bewe boosi.
Se nekoombakho efwesa, namwe esahabu namwe engubo yo mundu yesi yesi tawe.
Enywe mwabeene mumanyile muli nakhola kimilimo ne kamakhono kase kano, nio nyoole buli siindu nisio ese ne babasiaase khwenya.
Namwekesia mu biindu bioosi ndi, mu khukhola kimilimo ne kamaani khuri, khukhwola khuyeetekho batekhele, ne khukhebulila kamakhuwa niko Omwami Yesu omwene aloma ali, ‘Chikhabi chingali chili mu khuaana khukhila mu khwakaanila.’ ”
Nga Paulo ne amala ario, asikama aasi nabo asaba.
Boosi baba balikho balila nga bamwekwayila ne bamukheesia kimileembe kie khulekhana.
Babiililwa lukali sikila aba alomile ali se bakhamubonekho lundi tawe. Nio bacha naye sia meeli.

Ne Khumalile khulekhana nabo ne khukhwingila mu meeli, emeeli yaluungikha busa khwola abuundu bali Kosi. Endaalo yaloondakho, khwola Rotesi mala khukhwama ao khwacha abuundu bali Patara.
Ebweeneyo khwanyoolayo emeeli eyaba ne elikho echa Foenike, nio khwengilamo khwarekukha.
Khwacha khwola abuundu niio khunyala khubona Saipurasi mala khwabirira siafubo wayo nabwila khwola Siria. Khwacha khu sikiingi e Tiro yaba niio emeeli echa khurusibwamo bisutwa.
Ebweeneyo khwanyoolayo basuubili mala khwamenya nabo lichuuma. Khubirira mu Roho bakaania Paulo alekhe khucha e Yerusalemu.
Ne siise siefwe ne nabo nga siawa, khwarekukha khwacha. Boosi alala ne bakhasi babwe ne babaana barura mu lukoba bakhuroongia khukhwola sia nyanja nio fwesi khwasikama khwasaba.
Khwakheesiana kimileembe kie khulekhana mala efwe khwacha mumeeli ne nabo bakobola engo.
Khwachiililila ne lukeendo lwefwe khukhwama e Tiro khwola e Tolemai niio khwakheesia basuubili mala khwekhala nabo endaalo ndala.
Endaalo yaloondakho khwarekukha khwola mu Kaesarea. Ebweeneyo khwamenya munju mwo mwilwachi Filipo, mulala khu baandu saba babaroborwa khuba nga bayeeti mu Yerusalemu.
Aba ne babaana bewe bakhaana bane bakhacha munju tawe, baba ne siianwa sie bung'oosi.
Khwaba khwabeleyo chindaalo chingali kho, omung'oosi bali Akabasi ola khukhwama e Buyuda.
Echa niio khwaba, abukula kumusiipi kwa Paulo, eboa bikele ne kamakhono kewe, mala aloma ali, “Kano niko Roho Omutakatifu aloma, Omwene musiipi kuno alabowa mu ngila yino ne Bayaudi mu Yerusalemu, mala bamure mu bunyali bwe babaandu Be Chikholo.”
Nga khwaulila khurio, efwe ne babaandi ba babao khwekoonjelela Paulo alekhe khucha e Yerusalemu.
Nio abakobosia ali, “Mulakholanga siina? Mulenyanga ese fwe kumwoyo? Ese senerekeekhe khubowa mu Yerusalemu khwong'ene tawe, nerekeekhe akhaba khufwilayo sikila lisina lio Mwami Yesu.”
Se khwanyala khu muyusia chinganakani tawe, nio khwarusiakho kumwoyo mala khwaloma khuli, “Lekha lilienya lio Mwami likholekhe.”
Enyuma we khubaayo khulwe siise, khwarekekha bibiindu biefwe khwacha Yerusalemu.
Balala khu beeka ba Kaesarea bacha nafwe, bakhuyila munju niyo khwaba ne khucha khumenya eya Munasoni owama Saipurasi, mulala khu beeka be khunyoa.
Nga ne khwola Yerusalemu, basuubili bakhwakaanila ne busangaafu.
Endaalo yaloondakho khwacha ne Paulo owa Yakobo, mala babemeelesi be kanisa boosi baabayo.
Paulo abakheesia ne khubaboolela koosi niko Wele aaba ne akholile mu Be Chikholo khubirira mu milimo kiewe.
Nga ne bamala khumu ulila, boosi bafumia Wele ne khuloma bali, “Wandaayefwe Paulo, onyala khubona oli Bayaudi chielefu bekelile basuubili, mala boosi beanile khutiila Lilaka.
Baboolelwe bali ewe olekisianga Bayaudi boosi bamenyile mu sibala sie babaandu Be Chikholo banjukhe Lilaka lia Musa, ne khubaboolela bakhakheba babaana babwe namwe baloonde kimiima kie Bayaudi tawe.
Nono aba khukhola khurie? Sikila balaulila bali wechile.
Lino nilio khwenya ewe okhole. Babaandu bane bali ano babechubile.
Khoche, oambaane nabo mu mulukha kwe khukhwekwalaasia obaruungire kimiruungo kiabwe; nio banyale khubeka lichuune liabwe. Mu ngila yino buli mundu kane amanye ali, bung'ali se bulikho mu biindu nibio balaboolelwanga khwiwe bino tawe, ne ewe wamwene omenyile khuloondekhana ne Lilaka lia Musa.
Ne khu basuubili bali mu Be Chikholo, khwabarumiire ebarwa ebaboolela nga khwafukiilisiane khuli khukhwola balekhe khulia siakhulia siosi siosi siianilwe khu bifwaani. Lundi bakhalia kamalasile, namwe sisiaayo nisio bakokile tawe, ne kakhali khukhwola beliinde khuloondekhana ne sifwaabi.”
Nio Paulo abukula babaandu abo, ne endaalo eyaloondakho akhola kumulukha kwe khukhwekwalaasia alala nabo. Nio engila mu Lukaangu, ne khubamanyisia esaabu eye chindaalo che khukhwekwalaasilamo. Nio embosio eanwe khulwa buli mulala.
Chaba oli chindaalo saba echo chili embi khuwa, Bayaudi balala khukhwama Esia babona Paulo mu Lukaangu. Baachilisia babaandu boosi mala bafwakhila Paulo.
Baapa luyoka bali, “Baana ba Isiraeli, khuyeete! Yuno niye omundu owikisianga babaandu boosi buli abuundu kamakhuwa kamabi khu baandu ba Isiraeli, khu Lilaka lia Musa, ne khu Lukaangu luno. Ne akhaba luno areerire Be Chikholo mu Lukaangu ne khunyaalutia Abuundu Atakatifu ano!”
(Baloma kano sikila baba baboone Turofimo Omuefeso nali ne Paulo mu lukoba, nio bebaasia bali Paulo aba amuilile mu Lukaangu.)
Chingoyaani chaba mu lukoba mwoosi mala babaandu boosi batima babusiana, bafwakhila Paulo bamukhuruura bamurusia mu Lukaangu. Nio bilibwa bie Lukaangu biekalwa ao ne nao.
Nga babaandu abo bakhakanga khukhwira Paulo, likhuwa liolela naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae bali sisiayuumba sili mu Yerusalemu mwoosi.
Ao ne nao naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae oyo abukula banamae balala ne babemeelesi babwe batimaka mu lukoba niio babaandu chana baba. Nga babaandu abo ne babona banamae, balekha khukhupa Paulo.
Naitiriani oyo acha niio Paulo ali, amuaamba, ne khurusia lilaka ali abowe kiminyololo kibili. Nio areeba ali, “Omundu yuno naanu niye, ne akholile siina?”
Baapa luyoka ne baloma bibiindu bibiabukhaane. Kumukoyaano kwabao kwakila omukhulu owe kamae aakorwa khumanya sisiikholeekhe sisiene, kakila aboolela banamae bewe bayile Paulo mu kambi eye banamae.
Oli boola abuniinilo, sisiayuumba siakucha siakila banamae bamema Paulo mungaaki.
Boosi bamuloondangakho ne beyasa bali, “Mwire!”
Nga banamae ne baba siimbi khukhwingisia Paulo mu lukoba, alomaloma khu naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae ali, “Nosiima lekha ndomalomekho khwiwe?” Naitiriani oyo amukobosia ali, “Ewe omanyile Lukiriki?
Ewe se oli Omumisiri, owarakiikhe sisiayuumba anyumakho ao, mala wekhupa mu sichiimi ne babaandu babeeri chielefu chine, ba baaba ne bulwaani tawe ku?”
Paulo akobosia ali, “Ese ndi Omuyaudi, nasaalwa Tasasi mu Silisia, lukoba lulwamanyikhana lukali. Ne musiima ndekhe ndomalome ne babaandu bano.”
Nio naitiriani oyo amuelesia kumunwa, mala Paulo eema khu buniinilo, asisia babaandu ne kumukhono. Nga ne basila, Paulo alomalomela mu Lueburania ali,

“Bawandaayase ne bapaapa, khemundekeeresie nga nimile ndi ebweeni wenywe!”
Nga ne bamuulila ne alomalomela mu Lueburania, basila chu, nio Paulo achiililila ali,
Napia siibi lukali ne khukhwira babaandu babaloondanga Engila yino. Naambanga babaandu be siseecha nende be siikhasi ne mbamwaata mu siboe.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali nende be kumuse boosi banyala khufukiilila bali mboola ka ng'ali. Nanyoolanga chibarwa khukhwama khu nibo chiandikwe khu Bayaudi bali mu Damasika, mala njayo mbaamba ne khubareera Yerusalemu ne bali khu minyololo nio banyoole siiukuumo.
“Nga naba khu lukeendo embi Damasika, yaba mwiangilwe mala ao ne nao buwaanga bukali khukhwama mungaaki bwakhosiakho, naba akari wabwo,
nakwa asi mala naulila kumumilo ne kumboolela kuli, ‘Saulo! Saulo! Siina sikila ne unyaasia?’
Nakobosia ndi, ‘Ne ewe naanu Omwami?’ Aloma ali ‘Ese Yesu owe Nasareti niye olanyaasianga’.
Babaandu nibo naba nabo babona buwaanga, ne se baulila kumumilo kwoyo owalomalomanga khwise tawe.
Nareeba ndi, ‘Omwami, khole siina?’ Ne Omwami amboolela ali, ‘Yinyokha oche mu Damasika, ebweeneyo kane oboolelwe buli siindu nisio Wele aarobore ewe khukhola!’
Buwaanga bukali obwo bwakhola nabofula, nio babasiaase nibo naba nabo bandiila kumukhono bambila mu Damasika.
“Mu lukoba lwene olwo abamo omundu lisina liewe bali Anania. Aaba omundu owaria Lilaka lundi aaba omurie lukali ebweeni we Bayaudi boosi ba baamenya mu Damasika.
Eecha niio naba, anjimao, mala aloma ali, ‘Wandaayase Saulo, moka obone lundi!’ Mu saa eyo ne ng'ene, chimoni chase chamoka mala namubona.
Nio aloma ali, ‘Wele owe bakuuka befwe akhurobore ewe khumanya lilienya liewe, obone oyo oli Omuluungi mala oulile kumumilo khukhwama mukhanwa mwewe.
Sikila okhabe omuloli wewe khuboolela buli mundu niko oboone ne khuulila.
Nono oliindile sina? Yinyokha mala obatiisibwe nio bubwoni bwowo buweo khulwe khulaanga lisina liewe.’
“Nakobola Yerusalemu, ne nga naba mu Lukaangu ne ndikho saba, naba ne kamalola.
Nabona Omwami, andomalomakho ali, ‘Yuuya orure mu Yerusalemu khangu, sikila babaandu ano se balafukiilila buloli bwowo khwise tawe.’
Nakobosia ndi, ‘Omwami, bamanyile bulayi bwene bali ese nachilenge mu sinakooki ne ndila ne khukhupa abo ba bakhusuubila ewe.
Ne omuloli wowo Sitefano nga ne aaba ne eerwa, ese samwene nabao ne mbona ne chimoni chase ne nindile kamakooti kaabo ba baaba ne bamwiira.’
Omwami amboolela ali, ‘Cha! Sikila ndakhuruma aleeyi mu Be Chikholo.’ ”
Babaandu barekeeresia ka Paulo nabwila amala khulomaloma, nio barakikha khu khuupa luyoka lukali bali, “Murusieo! Mwire! Se akhoyeela khumenya tawe!”
Bakukuulanga ne basisakula chingubo chabwe, ne khuaanya lutuukhulu mungaaki.
Naitiriani omukhulu oyo aana lilaka babaandu bewe khuyila Paulo mu kambi, lundi ababoolela bamuupe biboko nio bamanye sikila siina Bayaudi ne bakukuula lundi ne bakhamwenya tawe.
Nga bamala khumuboa bali nio bamupe biboko, Paulo areeba omunamae owaba ne emileo ali, “Lifukiililwa mu lilaka ewe khukhupa Omuromani na nakhayaalwa tawe?”
Nga omunamae oyo ne aulila ario, acha khu naitiriani ne khumureeba ali, “Ewe olakholanga siina? Omundu oyo ali Omurumi.”
Nio naitiriani acha areeba Paulo ali, “Mboolele, ewe oli Omurumi?” Paulo akobosia ali, “Yee.”
Naitiriani aloma ali, “Ese nekela Omurumi khulwe khuruunga chirupia chingali.”
Nio Paulo amukobosia ali, “Ese nase nasaalwa Omurumi.”
Siise esio babaandu ba baaba ne benya khureeba Paulo bamururao, nio buuri bwatiila naitiriani omukhulu oyo nga amanya ali Paulo aaba Omurumi mala naye amuboyile kiminyololo.
Naitiriani oyo enya khumanya sifuno sisiakila Bayaudi ne basitaka Paulo, nio nga bwasia, bamukaangulula Paulo kiminyololo, mala alaka basaayi bakhulu nende be kumuse kwosi bakaanane. Nio abukula Paulo amwimia ebweeni wabwe.

Paulo aloleelela be kumuse chana mala aloma ali, “Baisiraeli basiaase! Khukhwola endaalo yino, kumwoyo kwase mukari kuli kumukololofu ebweeni wa Wele khuloondekhana ne liimenya liase.”
Abwene ao Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Anania aboolela ba baaba ne bemile embi ne Paulo khumupa e munwa.
Paulo amuboolela ali, “Ng'ali Wele alakhupa ewe, oli nga lisiisi liliaakhwa luloongo! Wekhaale ao khukhukhalakila khuloondekhana ne Lilaka ne ewe wamwene olikho ofunaka Lilaka chana khulwe khubolela bano bakhupe ese.”
Babaandu chana ba baaba siimbi khu Paulo bamuboolela bali, “Olikho okhoma Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owa Wele!”
Nga amala khuloma ario, Bafarisayo ne Basatukayo barakikha khulomana, mala kumuse kwabukhanamo.
(Sikila Basatukayo balomanga bali lilamukha se liliio tawe. Lundi balomanga bali mbao malaika namwe siindu bali roho tawe, ne Bafarisayo basuubila mu bioosi bitaru bino.)
Luyoka Lwabao lukali. Balala khu baandiki ba baaba mu mukaanda kwe Bafarisayo beema bayingania Basatukayo ne baloma bali, “Se khwaboone sisiindu siibi siosi siosi khu mundu yuno tawe! Wakana ng'ali roho namwe malaika aalomaloma naye!”
Kamayiingamo kareera sisiayuumba sikali siakila naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae aaba ne buuri ali banyala beera Paulo. Nio aboolela banamae bewe khukhwingila mu sipupu siene esio, barusiemo Paulo bamukobosie mu kambi.
Silo sienesio, Wele aboolela Paulo ali, “Okharia tawe! Waanile buloli bwase mu Yerusalemu muno, ne khukhwola okhole orio mu Rumi mwosi.”
Nga bwasia, Bayaudi balala babusania bakhola ekwangwaani, bechuba bali se balalia namwe banywe sisiindu siosi siosi ne bakherire Paulo tawe.
Babaandu ba baakhola ekwangwaani yino baaba babira kamakhumi kane.
Mala bacha khu basaayi bakhulu ne khu bemeelesi baloma bali, “Khwechubile khuli se khulalia sisiindu siosi siosi tawe khukhwola khwire Paulo.
Khwako enywe ne kumuse khe murume likhuwa khu naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae amurereere Paulo, mufwaane nga mukana khureeberesia khunyoola bung'ali khukhwama khu niye. Ne efwe khulerekekha khumwire khaba ne akhoola ano tawe.”
Ne omwiwaana owa Paulo omusoleeli aulila ke ekwangwaani eyo mala atimaka mu kambi aboolela Paulo.
Nio Paulo alaanga mulala khu banamae bakhulu amuboolela ali, “Yila omusoleeli yuno khu naitiriani omukhulu sikila ali ne likhuwa nilio eenya amuboleele.”
Nio omunamae oyo amubukula, amuyila khu naitiriani, aloma ali, “Omuboe Paulo anangile amboolela khureera omusoleeli yuno khwiwe, ali ne sisiindu nisio enya khukhuboolela.”
Naitiriani oyo amutiila kumukhono, arekukha naye baba bong'ene mala amureeba ali, “Oli na siina nisio wenyile khu khumboolela?”
Aloma ali, “Bayaudi bafukiilisiane khu khureeba kumutikhinyi oyile Paulo mu muse, khu khwekhola nga babenya khumanyilisia kamakhuwa kewe lukali.
Ne okhabarekeeresia tawe. Sikila babaandu baliio angaaki we kamakhumi kane bamwibuulile khungila. Bechubile bali se balalia namwe banywe sisiindu siosi siosi ne bakherire Paulo tawe. Siise sino berekeekhe khukhola bario mala baliindiilile likhalaka liowo.”
Nio Naitiriani oyo aloma ali, “Okhaboolelakho omundu yesi yesi oli wamboleele kamakhuwa kano tawe.” Abwenao alekhuula omusoleeli chana oyo arekukha.
Nio naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae alaanga babili khu banamae bewe bakhulu aloma ali, “Bukula banamae chimia chibili berekekhe khucha e Kaesarea, alala ne be chifarasi kamakhumi saba, nende be kamafumo chimia chibili, mala mwirekekhe khurekukha luno chisa chitaru che silo.
Ana chifarasi chindala khu Paulo mumuyile bulayi wo muruki Felikisi.”
Nio naitiriani oyo aandika ebarwa eboola eli:
“Ese Kilautio Lisia, khuandikila ewe owe lukoosi, omuruki Felikisi: Nakhukheesiisie!
Bayaudi baafwakhiile omundu yuno benga khumwiira, nga naboolelwa bali ali omurumi, naacha ne banamae base namureesia.
Namuyilile mu muse kwabwe mu khwenya khumanya sikila ne benyile khumwiira.
Nio nanyoola ndi, sesilio nisio akhola sikila bamwire namwe khubowa tawe. Khumusitaka khwabwe khuloondekhana ne kamareeba ke lilaka liabwe.
Ne nga naboolelwa bali bamukwangwaaniile, ne khangu busa khalaka khumureera khwiwe. Nabooleele bamusitakile, baboole niko bamusitakilekho ebweeni wowo.”
Khwako banamae abo babukula Paulo nga baba ne balakiilwe bamuyila Andipaturo silo siene esio.
Nga bwasia banamae be khu bikele bakobola mu kambi ne be chifarasi bacha naye.
Bola e Kaesarea, mala bakaanisia omuruki Felikisi Paulo alala ne ebarwa eyo.
Omuruki asoma ebarwa eyo mala areeba Paulo ama mu lukoongo siina, nga ne anyoola ali ama mu Silisia,
mala aloma ali, “Ndaulila kakowo bakhusitakile ne boolile.” Nio aana kamalaka Paulo aliindwe bulayi mu lichipi lio mwami.

Enyuma we chindaalo chiraano, Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali Anania ola Kaesarea ne babemeelesi babaandi no mundu oweyika kamalaka lisina liewe bali Terutulo. Bacha ebweeni wo muruki Felikisi ne bamuboolela lisitaka liabwe khu Paulo.
Paulo alaangwa mala Terutulo arakikha khumusitaka ne aloma ali
“Owe lukoosi Felikisi, bubwimeelesi bwowo bwe limanya bwa khurereere kumuleembe khu siise sileeyi, lundi bibiindu bikali biakalukhaane khulwe bulayi bwe sibala siefwe sino.
Khusiima lukali po fwesi buli abuundu lundi buli khase.
Se nenya khu khumalila siise siowo sikali tawe, ne kakhali, khusaba mu bulayi bwowo obe ne siisa okhurekeeresie kamalilo kefwe mu bwimbi.
Khwaboone omundu yuno anyala arera busiku, alikho arera sisiayuumba mu Bayaudi buli abuundu mu sibala siosi, lundi ali omwimeelesi owe kumukaanda kwe Banasareti.
Lundi aakhakile khunyaalutia Lukaangu, mala khwamuaamba. [Khwenya khumukhalakila khuloondekhana ne lilaka liefwe.
Ne kakhali Lusia, naitiriani owe liie, eyingisiamo, amubukula ne kamaani khukhwama mumakhono kefwe.
Nio aboolela babamusitaka beche ebweeni wowo.]
Bayaudi baambaana alala mu lisitaaka baloma bali, “Kano koosi kali kang'ali.”
Nio omuruki asibula Paulo khulomaloma, mala Paulo aloma ali,
“Manyile ndi wabeele omukhalaki owe kholo yino khulwe kimiiko kimikali, ndi ne busangaafu khulomaloma kano ebweeni wowo.
Nga wamweene nonyala khureeberesia wamanya, chindaalo se chabirire ekhumi na chibili nga ne nachiile mu Yerusalemu khusaaya tawe.
Bayaudi se banyoolakho ne mbingana no mundu yesi yesi mu Lukaangu tawe. Se banyoolakho mu Sinakooki, namwe abuundu osi osi mu lukoba ne ndikho mbaachilisia babaandu khukhola sisiayuumba tawe.
Ne se banyala khurusia buloli bwosi bwosi khu niko basitakiilekho kano tawe.
Ne kano niko fukiilila khwiwe; Saayanga Wele owe bakuuka befwe mu khuloonda Engila niyo nibo baboola bali eli eye bubeeyi. Lundi suubila mu buli siindu sisiaandikwa mu Lilaka lia Musa ne mu bitabu bie bang'oosi.
Ese ndi ne lilieyikina mu Wele bulayi bwene nga nilio bano boosi bali nalio, ndi khukhabeo khulamukha khwe babaandu baluungi ne nabo bakhali baluungi tawe.
Buli lwosi khakanga kamaani khuba ne kumwoyo kumukololofu mukari ebweeni wa Wele ne babaandu.
Nga naba nendikho khola kano, banyoola mu Lukaangu. Naba nemalile kumulukha kwe khukhwekwalaasia. Babaandu se babakhoo nase bakali, namwe bali kamaaya kabeo tawe.
Ne kakhali Bayaudi balala khukhwama mu sibala sia Esia nibo ba babao. Nibo bakhoya beche ebweeni wowo basitake ne bali ne sisiindu khwise.
Namwe lekha babaandu bano bakhuboolele mabi siina niko nakhola nga nema ebweeni we kumuse,
ne sikhali sisiindu silala nisio naloma nga nema ebweeni wabwe. Naloma ndi, ‘Ndikho njaalwa ano endaalo eya luno sikila, suubila ndi bafu balilamukha.’ ”
Felikisi aaba amanyilisie bulayi ke Ngila oyo. Nio amaliilisia sisiina ali, “Ndakhalaka kumusaango kwenywe naitiriani Lusia omukhulu we kamae ne olile.”
Nio alaka omunamae omukhulu khura Paulo mu buliindi, mala abe ne bulekhuule bwe khufukiilila basaale bewe khumuelesia nibio enya.
Chindaalo ne chibirirekho, Felikisi echa no mukhasi wewe Turusila owaba Omuyaudi. Alaanga Paulo mala amurekeeresia ne alomaloma ke lisuubila mu Yesu Kristo.
Ne Paulo nga ne achiililila khulomaloma khuloondekhana ne bung'ali, ke khukhweliinda wamwene, ne khukhwicha khwe Ndaalo eye likhalakilwa, Felikisi aambwa buuri aloma ali, “Onyala wacha nono. Ndakhulaanga lundi ne nyoolile bubweyaangu.”
Siise esio ebaasianga ali fwaana Paulo alamua chirupia nio kakila alanganga Paulo busiele nalomaloma naye.
Oli kimiiko kibili kiabira, Porukio Fesito ela mu bukono bwa Felikisi nga omwami. Felikisi mu khwenya Bayaudi bamusiime, alekha Paulo mu siboe.

Chindaalo chitaru ne chibirire, enyuma wa Fesito khukhwola mu lukoongo olwo, aama Kaesarea, aacha Yerusalemu.
Basaayi bakhulu alala ne babemeelesi be Bayaudi bamuboolela kamasitako ka Paulo. Bekoonjelela Fesito
abareerere Paulo e Yerusalemu; sikila baba bakholile ekwangwaani eye khumwirira khu ngila.
Nio Fesito akobosia ali, “Paulo ali omuboe e Kaesarea ne ese ambi ari ndachayo.
Lekha babemeelesi benywe ne nase khuche e Kaesarea mala basitake omundu yuno aaba ne akhola sisiindu siosi siosi sibi.”
Fesito aamala nabo chindaalo munaane namwe ekhumi mala aacha e Kaesarea. Oli Endaalo eloondakho, ekhala mu koti khu khalaka mala arumania bareere Paulo.
Nga Paulo ne oola, Bayaudi babaama Yerusalemu benyokha bema bamubotookhelela mala barakikha khuloma bibiindu bikali biibi bie bubeeyi khu Paulo nibio babeene bakhanyala bekesia ne bili biang'ali tawe.
Ne kakhali Paulo ekaana ali, “Ese se nakholakho libi liosi liosi khu Lilaka lie Bayaudi, namwe khu Lukaangu, namwe khu mwami we Barumi tawe.”
Ne Fesito enya Bayaudi bamusiime, nio areeba Paulo ali, “Onyala khufukiilila khucha Yerusalemu mala oyaalwe kamasitako kano ebweeni wase?”
Paulo aloma ali, “Nemile ebweeni we koti yo mwami eye bukhalaki, niio khoyela njaalwe. Nga ewe wamwene nomanyile ese se nakholelakho Bayaudi sisiindu sibi tawe.
Aba bali nafuna lilaka ne khukhola sisiindu sisiolaana khalakilwe khufwa, se saba ndekhwe busa tawe. Ne kaba bali bung'ali se buli mu niko basitakilakho tawe, aba se aliio omundu onyala anda mumakhono kabwe tawe. Ndeloochela omwami Kaisari.”
Nga Fesito amala khulomaloma nende be koti yewe akobosia ali, “Wenya wiloochele omwami Kaisari, nono ndakhuyila owa Kaisari.”
Enyuma we siise sitiiti, omwami Akuripa ne Banisi beecha e Kaesarea, khu khwakaanila Fesito.
Oli bamalayo chindaalo chingali, Fesito aboolela omwami ka Paulo: ali, “Omundu ali ano niye Felikisi aalekha mu siboe
ne nga nacha Yerusalemu, basaayi bakhulu ne babemeelesi bamusitaka mala bandeeba mukhalakile.
Ne nababoolela ndi, efwe Barumi, se khuli ne kumwiima kwe khuyila ebweeni omundu yesi yesi ositakiilwe khu musaango nasiili khubonana ne bamusitakile moni na moni ne khuba ne bubweyaangu bwe khuloma kakeewe tawe.
Nga ne becha ano, senatibiakho siise tawe, endaalo yaloondakho ne ng'ene nekhala mu koti naana lilaka, omundu oyo areerwe mukari.
Babamusitaka benyokha bema, ne se bamusitakakho khu liosi liosi khu niko nebaasia ndi banyala bamusitakakho tawe.
Ne kakhali niko baba nako kaba kamayiingamo khuloondekhana ne dini yabwe ne omundu niye balanga bali Yesu, owafwa, ne kakhali Paulo aloma ali, Yesu ali omulamu.
Senamanya nisio khola nio manye kamakali khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa kano tawe. Nio nareeba Paulo aba ne afukiilila khucha e Yerusalemu khuyaalwa khu makhuwa kano.
Ne Paulo eloocha aoche ebweeni wa Kaisari. Asaba khuliindwa nio Kaisari akhalake kumusaango kwewe. Khwako narusia kamalaka aliindwe nabwila nendi muyila khu mwami Kaisari.”
Akuripa aboolela Fesito ali, “Nenya mbulile ko mundu yuno samwene.”
Fesito akobosia ali, “Okhakaulile muchuli.”
Nga ne bwasia, Akuripa ne Banisi beecha ne esambo engali ne bengila abuundu niio baaulililanga kamakhuwa. Baaba alala ne naitiriani be kamae ne babemeelesi be lukoba. Nio Fesito arusia lilaka, mala Paulo areerwa mukari.
Fesito aloma ali, “Omwami Akuripa ne babaandi mwesi muli ano nafwe, bona omundu yuno niye Bayaudi boosi bali ano ne mu Yerusalemu bakheenya tawe, bandereere lilieloocha liabwe. Ne bakukuula bali, se akhoyeela abe omulamu tawe.
Ne se namunyoolilekho ne sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala khukila akhalakilwe lifwa tawe. Sikila niye omwene asabile khukhwiloochela omwami Kaisari, nakhalake muyileyo.
Ne se ndi ne sisiindu nisio nyala khuandikila omwami Kaisari tawe. Nono namureerire ano ebweeni wenywe, ne lukali khwiwe omwami Akuripa, nio nemalile khukhwemenieelesia kakeewe mbe nende nisio nyala khuandika.
Sikila nibaasia ndi lili lie busilu khwise khuyila omuboe ne khaboolile abuwaanga kamasitako kewe tawe.”

Akuripa aboolela Paulo ali, “Nakhusibuule olomalome kakowo wamwene.” Paulo okesia ne kumukhono mala alomaloma kakewe ali,
“Omwami Akuripa: Samwene mbona ndi, luno ndi ne ekhabi khuba ebweeni wowo ne nekaana bibiindu nibio Bayaudi basitakile bino, sikila
ewe wamwene omanyile bulayi kimiima kiosi kie Bayaudi ne bibiindu nibio baukhanilamo. Nono, khusaba wekhaliilikhe undekeeresie.
“Bayaudi boosi babeene bamanyile nga namenya khukhwama mu bwana bwase. Bamanyile chingila nicho menyeelemo ne bulamu bwase bwoosi, khurakikhira mu sibala siase sisiene, ne mu Yerusalemu.
Aba bali benya khuaana buloli bwase, bamanyile bali khukhwama mu khurakikha namenyanga nga omusaangi owe kumukaanda kuliinda kamalaka ke dini yefwe kwe Bafarisayo.
Ne luno ndi ano mu muse khuyaalwa sikila lilieyikina nilio ndi nalio mu lisuubisia nilio Wele alakiilisia bakuuka befwe,
lilieyikina chana nilio Chikholo ekhumi na chibili che babaandu befwe cheyikina khunyoola nga ne basaaya Wele kumuusi ne siilo. Ne omwami lilieyikina lino nilio likila ne sitakwa ne Bayaudi bano!
Siina sikila enywe muli ano nemubona muli se kanyalikha khusuubila muli Wele alamusia ba bafwa?
Kameene ako niko nakhola mu Yerusalemu. Nanyoola bunyali khukhwama khu basaayi bakhulu mala nayila babaandu ba Wele bakali mu siboe; ne nga bakhalakilwa khufwa, sesi narakho kumukhono ndi bafwe.
Siise sikali nabanyaasianga mu masinakooki ne khukhaka khubakhola bekaane lisuubila liabwe. Naba ne lirima likali khu nibo, liakila nacha ne mu ngoba chingeni khubapia sibi.
“Esino sisiakila nenja e Damasika ne bunyali ne kamalaka khukhwama khu basaayi bakhulu.
Omwami nga naba khu ngila mwiangilwe, nabona buwaanga bukhila bwe nyaanga, bwecha khukhwama mu ngaaki bwakhosia, bwambotookhelela ese ne babaandu nibo naba nabo.
Fweesi khwakwa aasi, mala naulila kumumilo ne kulomaloma khwise mu Lueburania kuli, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Siina sikila ne unyaasia? Olikho wenyaasia wamwene, oli nga eeyi ne esaamba esiimbo eyo Mwami wayo owakibaya.’
Nareeba ndi, ‘Ewe naanu, Omwami?’ Nio Omwami akobosia ali, ‘Ese Yesu, niye ewe olanyaasianga.
Ne kakhali yinyokha wime. Nakhubonekheele khukhurobora obe omukholi wase. Okhoyela khuboolela babaandi niko oboone khwise luno, nende niko khakhwekesie mu ndaalo chichiicha.
Kane khuonie khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli ne khu Be Chikholo nibo ndi khurumamo.
Obekule chimoni ne khubarusia mu siilima obayile mu buwaanga, lundi obarusie mu bunyali bwa Sietani bache khu Wele, nio khubirira mu lisuubila liabwe mwise, bubwoni bwabwe bubeelwe nio banyoole bubwikhalo bwabwe mu barobore ba Wele.’
“Khwako, Omwami Akuripa, se nakhola sileka khu malola niko nanyoola khukhwama mwikulu tawe.
Khurakikhira mu Damasika, ne mu Yerusalemu, ne mu Buyuda mwoosi ne mu Be Chikholo. Ese nelwacha ndi, khukhwola bekanile bubwoni bwabwe, bakobolele Wele, mala bakhole bikholwa bibiekesia bili bekaniile.
Siaba sifuno sino sisiakila Bayaudi bafwakhila nga naba ne ndi mu Lukaangu, mala bakhaka khu khunjira.
Wele anjeetile khukhwola endaalo yino, khwako nemile ano khuana buloli bwase khu boosi, khu bakhoongo ne bakhali bakhoongo tawe sitube. Nilio ndoma lili busa lilala elio nilio bang'oosi ne Musa baloma bali licha khwekholekha.
Bali khukhwola Kristo anyaasibwe mala abe owe khunyoa khulamukha khukhwama mu lifwa, elwache buwaanga bwe buonia khu Bayaudi ne khu Be Chikholo.”
Nga Paulo ne aloma ario, Fesito amuyibila ali, “Paulo, ewe oli ne kamalalu! Busomi bowo bukali bwakhulaluusie!”
Paulo akobosia ali, “Omwami, ese se nalalukhekho tawe! Ndikho ndoma bung'ali mu milengaala.
Omwami Akuripa! Omanyile bibiindu bino bioosi, nyala khulomaloma khwiwe ne bunyindaafu bwoosi sikila manyile ndi mbao siosi siosi sisiekisa khwiwe tawe, sikila kano se kakholekha mu bwikisi tawe.
Omwami Akuripa, osuubila mu bang'oosi? Manyile ndi obasuubila!”
Akuripa akobosia Paulo ali, “Wibaasia oli mu siise sitiiti sino olakhola sesi mbe Omukristo?”
Paulo amukobosia ali, “Sibeele siise sitiiti namwe sikali, lisaba liase khu Wele lili mbo, ewe ne babaandi babandekereesie luno babe nga ese ne endi, ne kakhali se khuli khubowa chipiingo nga ese tawe!”
Nio omwami, ne omuruki, Banisi, ne babaandi boosi ba baaba ne bekhaale nabo benyokha,
oli barekukha baloma bali, “Omundu yuno se akholakho sisiindu siosi siosi sikila afwe namwe abowe tawe?”
Nio Akuripa aboolela Fesito ali, “Omundu yuno andi alekhuulilwe abanga bali se asaba kumunwa khubona omwami Kaisari tawe.”

Nga ne liabisibwa bali khukhoyeela khucha Italia khu birira khu nyanja, baana Paulo ne baboe babaandi khu Chuliasi owaba Naitiriani omukhulu owe kamae, owemeelelanga sipupu silaangwa sili “Sipupu sia Kaisari.”
Khwaniina e meeli khukhwama Aturamitio, eyaba ne yerekekhe khucha khubirira mu mafubukho ke chimeeli mu sibala sia Esia. Nio khwacha ne Arisitakaasi, Omumasedonia khukhwama e Tesalonike.
Nga bwasia khwola e Sidoni. Chuliasi aba omulayi khu Paulo mala amufukiilila khucha khubona basaale bewe, bamuyeete nibio aaba ne enya.
Khwama abwenao khwachiililila, sikila ekhuungu yauchanga khukhwama ebweeni, khwabirira lubeka lwe sibala sia Saipurasi, sisiakarwa ne kameechi, ebweeneyo ekhuungu yaaba engeekhe.
Khwambukha enyanja eya Silisia ne Pamufilia, khwacha khwola Mira mu Lukia.
Abwenao, naitiriani chana oyo anyoola e meeli eyama Alekisanduria eyaba necha Italia, mala akhwingisiamo.
Khwacha kalaa khulwe chindaalo chingali mala ekhumaliilikha khwola siimbi mu lukoba lwa Nito ne khubirira mu butinyu bukali. Ekhuungu se yakhufukiilila khukhwesenda lundi aleeyi lubeka lwene olwo tawe, khwako khwekha khwabirira lubeka lwe sibala sisiakarwa ne kameechi sia Kurete, ne khulandila khu lukuku lwa Salimoni.
Khwalandilanga khundulo khwalwo siimbi siimbi, mala mu butinyu bukali khwola abuundu alaangwa bali, “Lifubukho lie Buonelo,” se ali aleeyi khukhwama mu lukoba lwa Lase tawe.
Khwemao siise sileeyi, lialolekhana ne buli busiku khuchiililila ne lukeendo, sikila Endaalo eye khukhweyimana khulia yaba yabirire. Nio Paulo abakaambila ali,
“Basaakhulu, naboone ndi lukeendo luno khukhwama ano lulaba ne busiku. Emeeli ne bisutwa bilonekha akhaba ne bulamu bwefwe bwoosi bunyala khutiba.”
Ne kakhali Naitiriani aulila niko Kaputeni ne omwene meeli baloma, mala aloba ka Paulo.
Ne sikila mwifubukho omwo se mwaba mulayi khumenyamo mu munaane tawe, bakali bafukiilisiana khuchiililila ne lukeendo, ne kanyalikhana boole e Foenike, bamenyeyo mu munaane. Foenike lili lifubukho lia Kurete lilialoleelela akari we siafubo ne mumbo ne akari we siafubo ne bunaswa.
Ekhuungu eya kalaa yaucha khukhwamila siafubo, nono babaandu bebaasia bali balakhola niko benyile khukhola, kakila bakhuula sichaangi sie meeli, barakikha khuchila siimbi siimbi khu lukulu lwa Kurete nga kanyalikha.
Ne ao ne nao ekhuungu eye kamaani kamakali niyo balanga bali, “Eye Bunaswa-bukwe” yaucha khukhwama e sikiingi.
Yaucha emeeli mala nga ne bwaba butinyu khucha lubeka nilwo yama, khwalekha yakhuyila niio yaba ne elikho elosia.
Khwanyoola niio khwekhiinga nga ne khwaba ne khulanda siafubo eye khabala khalaangwa Keuta. Abwene ao, mu butinyu bwenobwo khwanyala khuonia liliaro ne emeeli.
Khwalikhwesa liecha khu sikiingi khu ngaaki mala khwaliboela kimikoye khu meeli tatatata. Baba ne buuri bali wakana banyala bengila mu muyekhe kwe khu sikiingi siili siimbi ne lukuku lwa Libia, nio baulukusa engubo eye meeli nio emeeli euchwe busa ne ekhuungu.
Embembeesi eye kamaani yachiililila khuucha, ne nga ne bwasia barakikha khumwaata mu meechi bisutwa bie khu meeli,
ne endaalo eloondakho bamwaata lundi bilala khu biindu bie khu meeli mu nyanja.
Khulwe chindaalo chingali enyanga namwe ching'enieesi se biabonekhanakho tawe, ne kakhali ekhuungu yachiililila khuucha lukali. Ekhumaliilikha lilieyikina liefwe lie khuona liakhuwamo.
Enyuma we babaandu khuba ne njala khulwe siise sileeyi, Paulo eema ebweeni wabwe mala aloma ali, “Basaakhulu, abanga mwambulila andi se mwarura e Kurete tawe; mala andi se khwengiile mu butinyu buno ne khutibia nibio khwabeele nabio tawe.
Ne kakhali luno musaba mube banyindaafu! Se aliio namulala khwinywe okane atibie bulamu bwewe tawe; emeeli yong'ene ekane yonekhe.
Sikila silo sia luno, malaika owa Wele wase niye saayanga anjichilekho
mala aloma ali, ‘Paulo, okharia tawe! Khukhwola wime ebweeni wo mwami Kaisari. Bulayi bwa Wele khwiwe bwaoniisie bulamu bwe babaandu boosi bali khu lukeendo luno ne nawe.’
Nono, nyindaalila basaakhulu sikila suubila mu Wele ndi kalakholekha bulayi bwene nga ne mboolelwe.
Ne kakhali ekhuungu elakhuyila khwikhupe khu sikiingi sie sibala nabulebe.”
Mwaba mu silo muukhola ekhumi na khane, ne khwaba khulikho khuuchwa ne embembeesi khu nyanja eya Mediterenia. Embi mu silo akari babaandereba be meeli baabona bali khwembiisie khu sibala.
Nio bekhisia kumukoye mu meechi kuboelwekho busiro, banyoola bali buli buleeyi bwe chimita kamakhumi kane. Oli khwesendakho atiiti bakhola bario lundi mala ne banyoola bali buli buleeyi bwe chimita kamakhumi kataru.
Baria bali kane e meeli yikhupe khu lwanda, nio bekhisia mu nyanja bichaangi bine khukhwama enyuma we meeli mala basaba bali busie khangu.
Nio babaandereba be meeli bakhaka khukhwilukha khurura mu meeli; bekhisia liliaaro mumeechi bekhola nga bali khucha khu khwikhisia bichaangi mu meechi khukhwama ebweeni we meeli.
Nio Paulo aboolela naitiriani omukhulu owe liie ne banamae ali, “Kaaba bali be mu meeli se balikho bacha khurama mu meeli tawe, aba se mulaona tawe.”
Nio banamae bakhala kimikoye kikiaamba liliaro, mala balilekha liche ne embembeesi.
Oli makhelebeende, Paulo abasaba boosi balie siakhulia ali, “Mu ndaalo ekhumi na chine, mwama khuba ne liaayaaya, ne khu ndaalo chino choosi se mwalilenge sisiindu tawe.
Nono, musaba mulie siakhulia nio mube balamu. Se aliio olatibia akhaba lichuune lilala liewe tawe.”
Nga Paulo aamala khuloma ario, abukula kumukaati, aapa orio khu Wele ebweeni wabwe boosi, akumesula, mala arakikha khulia.
Banyindaalila kimiooyo, mala buli mulala alia.
Fweesi alala mu meeli khwaba babaandu chimia chibili ne kamakhumi saba na sita.
Boosi nga balia bekura, bamwaata engaanu yoosi mu nyanja banguyia emeeli.
Nga bwasia, ba baaba mu meeli khumanya sikiingi tawe, nio babona lukhuna lwe nyanja ne lukulu lwe kumuyekhe, nio bakhalaka bali, ne kanyalikhana, bayile e meeli khu sikiingi esio.
Nio balekha bichaangi bisiikhe mu nyanja, ne mu siise sienesio bakangulula kimikoye kikiabowa khu makhono kaluungisia e meeli. Nio baboa engubo ebweeni we meeli nio ekhuungu eyile emeeli ebweeni, mala khwacha e sikiingi.
Ne kakhali emeeli yekhupa khu sikiingi sie kumuyekhe mala yaanda ebweeni khunyala khucha tawe. Ne lubeka lwe enyuma emeeli yafunikhaka mu bitonyi sikila bibuli bie kameechi bikali.
Banamae berekekha khukhwira baboe boosi bali bakhakhola bario basoka boola khu sikiingi mala belukha tawe.
Ne kakhali naitiriani omukhulu oyo enya khuonia Paulo, kakila abakhiingilila khukhola bario. Ne kakhali arusia lilaka boosi bamanyile khusoka banyoe basune khurura mu meeli basoke boole khu sikiingi;
baramire baloondekho, ne beambile khu mbao namwe khu bitonyi bie chimbao che meeli eyaba nefunikhaakemo. Kaba kario nio fweesi khwola bulayi khu sikiingi.

Nga ne khwola khu sikiingi bulayi, khwamanya khuli sibala esio silaangwa bali Malita.
Basaalwa be sibala esio baba balayi lukali khwifwe. Efula yaba yarakiikhe khukwa, ne bunyifu bwaba bukali, nio babwana kumulilo mala bakhulaanga khwore.
Paulo abuusia chiikhu ara khu mulilo mala bukhafu bwe kumulilo bwarusia nafwo mu lukhu, mala yeboelela khu mukhono kwewe.
Basaalwa be mu sibala omwo nga babona endemu ne lelechela khu mukhono kwa Paulo, baboolana bali, “Omundu yuno khukhwola abe omwiiri, ne Bung'ali se bulamulekha amenye tawe akhaba ne aonile khufwila mu nyanja.”
Ne kakhali Paulo asisakulila endemu chana mumulilo mala khu nyoolakho butinyu bwosi bwosi tawe.
Balindiilila bamubone na abiimba namwe akwe aasi khangu afwe. Oli baliindilila siise sileeyi khubona sisikholekha khu niye tawe, bakaluukhasia kamebaasio kabwe baloma bali, “Ali wele niye!”
Simbi busa khukhwama abuundu ao, kiabao kimikuunda kio mwami Pabuliasi, omwami owe sibala esio. Omwami yuno akhwakaanila bulayi, mala khwaba bakeni bewe khu ndaalo chitaru.
Raraawe owa Pabuliasi aba mu sitanda, alwala kumureengo ne lukhenene. Paulo acha engila niio aba, amusabila ne khumurakho kamakhono, mala amuonia.
Nga kano ne kekholekha kario, balwale boosi khu sibala esio becha mala baonisibwa.
Bakhuelesia biianwa bikali, ne nga khwaba ne khururayo, bara mu meeli nibio khwenya khu lukeendo.
Enyuma we kimieesi kitaru, khwarakikha lundi lukeendo ne meeli eyama e Alekisanduria mu Misiri, eyaba ne yimiile mu Melita mundaalo che kumunaane sikila chaba chindaalo che mbeo engali. Emeeli eyo yaba yaandikwakho bali, “Wele Bakhwana,”
Khwola mu lukoba lwa Sirakusi mala khwabamo chindaalo chitaru.
Khukhwama abwenao khwachiililila khwola mu lukoba lwa Rekiomu. Endaalo eyaloondakho ekhuungu yarakikha khuucha khukhwama siafubo, ne khu ndaalo ekhola khabili khwola mu lukoba lwa Puteoli.
Khwanyoolamo basuubili mu Yesu, bakhusaaya khumenye nabo lichuuma lilala, Mala enyuma we lichuuma khwarekukha khucha Rumi.
Basuubili balala ba baaba mu Rumi baulila kamakhuwa kefwe mala becha bakhwakaanila khu soko eya Apiusi nende anju che bakeni chitaru. Nga Paulo ababona afumia Wele mala atinya kumwoyo lukali.
Nga ne khwola Rumi, Paulo afukiililwa khumenya yeng'ene ne omunamae omuliinda.
Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru Paulo alaanga babemeelesi be Bayaudi mu siikhasio. Nga baba ne bebuusiisie, ababoolela ali, “Baisiraeli basiaase, ese akhaba ne khakhola sisiindu siosi siosi siibi khu baandu befwe namwe kimiima kie bakuuka befwe tawe, bamboa mu Yerusalemu mala naanwa mumakhono ke Barumi.
Nga Barumi ne banjaala, benya khukhundekhuula sikila se banyoolakho sifuno sikila nirwe tawe.
Ne nga Bayaudi ne baloba kano, liamiina ese esabe khukhweloochela omwami Kaisari, akhaba ne khabakho ne likhuwa liosi liosi likila sitaake babaandu base tawe.
Niko kakilile nasaba khubonana ne khulomaloma nanywe. Khwako ndi omuboe khu minyololo kino sikila lilieyikina lie babaandu ba Isiraeli.”
Nio bamuboolela bali, “Khukhanyoolakho ebarwa yosi yosi khukhwama e Buyuda eboola kamakhuwa kowo, namwe yesi yesi khu baandu befwe khukhwama ebweeneyo, akhechakho ne likhuwa liosi liosi liibi khwiwe tawe.
Ne kakhali khwenya khuulile kamebaasio kowo, sikila khumanyile khuli, buli abuundu osi osi babaandu se balenyanga edini yowo yino tawe.”
Khwako barekekha siise bakaanane ne Paulo. Endaalo eye khukhwakaanana nga yola, babaandu bakali becha niio Paulo aaba ne amenya. Khukhwama kumutikhinyi khukhwola ekolooba, Paulo abenooselia burume bwe bubwami bwa Wele mu khurumikhira Lilaka lia Musa ne kamaandiko ke bang'oosi, ne akhaka khubayuusia baloonde Yesu.
Balala khu nibo baafukiilila niko aaloma, ne babaandi khusuubila tawe.
Nga balekha khufukiilisiana babeene ne babeene, barekukha bacha, nio Paulo aloma ali, “Kali ng'ali lundi kali abwene nga Roho Omutakatifu alomalomela mu mung'oosi Isaya khu bakuuka benywe!
Sikila aloma ali,
‘Cha, mala oboolele babaandu bano.
Mulirekeeresia lundi murekeeresie,
ne se mulimanyilisia tawe.
Mulilola lundi mulole,
ne se mulibona tawe.
Sikila kimiooyo kie babaandu bano kimilume,
kamaru kabwe kekala,
lundi bafunikhwa chimoni chabwe.
Bakhola bario, chimoni chabwe chabona,
kamaru kabwe kaulila,
kimiooyo kiabwe kiamanyilisia, mala bangobolele mbaonie.’ ”
Nio Paulo amaliilisia ali, “Nono, mukhoyeele mumanye muli burume bwe buonia bwa Wele buno, bwarumirwe khu Be Chikholo. Balaburekeeresia!”
[
Paulo nga ne amala khuloma kano Bayaudi barekukha ne bayingana burafu babeene ne babeene.]
Khulwe kimiiko kibili Paulo amenya abuundu niio eruungilanga enju omwene. Ebweeneyo akaanilanga boosi babamukeniianga.
Elwachanga ke bubwami bwa Wele ne khukhwekisia kamakhuwa ko Mwami Yesu Kristo mu bunyindaafu, ne mu bulekhuule.

Khukhwama khu Paulo omukholi owa Yesu Kristo lundi omurumwa niye Wele arobora ne khulaanga nio elwache Elomo yewe Endayi,
niyo asuubisia khaale khubirira mu bang'oosi bewe, mu maandiko kamatakatifu.
Eli Elomo Endayi khu ko Mwana wewe owebulwa mu lisaaye lia Daudi. Khulwe liiba liewe nga omundu,
ne khulwe butakatifu bwewe bwe buwele, okesibwa ne bunyali bukali po, khuba Omwana owa Wele nga ne alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa.
Khubirira mu niye Wele ambelesia ese bubweyaangu bwe khuba omurumwa khulwa Kristo nio ndangirire babaandu Be Chikholo choosi basuubila ne khuria.
Lino liambaasia akhaba enywe muli mu Rumi, nibo Wele alangile mube ba Yesu Kristo.
Nono muandikila enywe mwesi muli mu Rumi nibo Wele asiima, mala amulaanga mube babaandu bewe omwene.
Lekha Wele Paapa wefwe no Mwami Yesu Kristo amuelesie kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Nyoa khusiima Wele wase khubirira mu Yesu Kristo sikila enywe mweesi, sikila sibala siosi silikho siulila lisuubila lienywe.
Wele ali omuloli wase, nilio mboola lili ng'ali, Wele niye kholelanga kimilimo ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi mukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi khu ko Mwana wewe. Wele amanyile ali mukhebulilanga enywe
buli nga ne saba. Saba ndi Wele mu lienya liewe lilayi akhole kanyalikhe khwise luno mukeniye enywe.
Sikila ne koomba lukali khumubona enywe nio saange mu khabi cha roho ne nanywe, khumukhola enywe mube ne kamaani.
Nilio ndikho mboola lili lino; enywe ne nase khunyoole buyeeti, mulala khukhwama khu kuundi. Enywe munyoole buyeeti khukhwama khwisuubila liase, ne ese khukhwama khu lienywe.
Sikila ndi ne likobi mu mwoyo khu baandu boosi, khu bakesi ne basilu, babasoma ne bakhamanyile siindu tawe.
Nono, ndi ne silukuluku khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi akhaba khwinywe mumenyile mu Rumi.
Sikila Elomo Endayi ebuula nga Wele nakholanga babaandu khuba baluungi khu niye omwene. Lili khubirira mu lisuubila, khukhwama mu khurakikha khukhwola khu siakamo. Nga liiandiko ne liboola lili, “Omundu oluungisibwa ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila alamenya!”
Lirima lia Wele libuulikha khukhwama mwikulu khu bwoni bwoosi ne bumayaanu bwe babaandu bakhiingilila bung'ali bukhamanyikhana tawe khulwe chingila chabwe chimayaanu.
Wele abaelesia siiukuumo sikila kanyala kamanyikhana khu Wele nga ne ali abuwaanga busa khu nibo, sikila Wele omwene akakhola kabe abuwaanga.
Khukhwama nga Wele ne abaang'ana sibala, liba liewe likhabonekha tawe, bunyali bwewe bwa mindali ne liba liewe lie buwele, bioombi biabonekha abuwaanga, bibonekhana mu biindu nibio Wele abuumba. Khwako babaandu abo se bali ne nisio bebeelakho siosi siosi tawe!
Bamanya Wele, ne kakhali se bamuechanga liria liewe nga Wele tawe, lundi se bamupilanga orio tawe. Sisiilima siayichula mu mebaasio kabwe lundi se kalimo limanya tawe.
Baboola bali, bali bakesi, ne khana bali basilu,
mu bweyaangu bwe khusaaya Wele omenyile mindali khulwa mindali na mindali basaaya bifwaani bibiang'oonwa biafwaana nga omundu, chinyuni, chisaang'i namwe chimbulu ne chindemu.
Khwako Wele alekhuulile babaandu abo bakhole bibiindu binyaalu nibio kimiooyo kiabwe kikoomba, mala bakholanila ke chisoni buli mundu no okundi.
Bakaluukhasia bung'ali khu Wele khulwe bubeeyi, basaaya ne khukholela kimilimo nibio Wele abuumba mu bweyaangu bwe khusaaya ne khukholela kimilimo omubuumbi omwene, ofumisibwa mindali na mindali! Amina.
Sikila bakhola kano, Wele abalekhuula bakhole ke liliekoomba lili lie chisoni. Akhaba bakhasi babwe bakaluukhasia kumwiima kwe siikhasi kwa ng'ali, mala bakhola kukhali kwe siikhasi tawe.
Akhaba baseecha boosi balekha liba liabwe lie khuba ne bakhasi babwe mala bekoombana babeene ne babeene. Baseecha bakholanila ke chisoni mulala no kundi, mala nga kamakobosio bererera babene siiukuumo nisio bolaana banyoole khulwe likhola liabwe lie sifwaabi.
Sikila babaandu abo baloba khura mu mebaasio limanya lia ng'ali khu Wele, Wele abalekhuula babe ne kamebaasio kamakhiikha, nio bakhole bibiindu nibio bakhakhoyeele bakhole tawe.
Bukhiikha chingano choosi bwabechulamo, sifwaabi, kumuluungo ne bunyaalu. Likhalikhililwa, bubwiri bukhupani, bubacha, bulosi, bakutana,
mala bakikhana babeene ne babeene. Bali babiila Wele, bakhalafu, bebonia, ne khukhola be lukhole, bebaasia chingila chingali che khukhola kamamayaanu, se baria basaasi babwe tawe,
se bali ne liba lie khumanya kamalayi tawe, bafunaka lisuubisia liabwe, mala se bakhola kamalayi namwe kakekesia siisa khu baandi tawe.
Bamanya bali lilaka lia Wele liboola lili babaandu bamenya mu ngila yino bolaana lifwa. Mala nibo bachiililila khukhola bibiindu bino ne khufukiilila babaandi babikhola.

Khumanyile khuli Wele ali omuluungi nga akhalakilanga babaandu bakholanga bibiindu nga bino birio.
Ne ewe, musaale, okhola bibiindu nibio okhalakilangakho babaandi! Ewe wibaasia oli olebacha likhalaka lia Wele ku?
Namwe wakana ewe olekelesianga bulayi bwewe buli buboofu, liliekhaliilikha, ne liliefwiilisia liewe. Ng'ali omanyile oli Wele ali omulayi, sikila alikho akhaka khukhureera mu bweyaangu khukhwikanila.
Ne kakhali oli ne kumwoyo kumuandalafu lundi kwe sikakhanyafu, aba nono olikho wereerera wamwene siiukuumo sili siboofu khu Ndaalo niyo lirima lia Wele ne bukhalaki buluungi bulibuulikha.
Sikila Wele aliaana kumuruuru khu buli mundu khuloondekhana nende niko akholile.
Baandu balala bachiililila khukhola kamalayi, mala baenja luyali, lukoosi, ne bulamu buliio mindali, khu nibo Wele alabaelesia bulamu bwa mindali na mindali.
Babaandu babaandi bali be khukhweyenyela lundi baloba kali kamaluungi mala baloonda kali kamakhiikha, lirima lia Wele ne bukhalafu bwewe bilababaakho.
Siiukuumo ne buchuuni bilabaao khulwa boosi bakholanga kamamayaanu, khunyoela khu Bayaudi nio akhaba khu Bakiriki bosi.
Ne kakhali Wele alaana luyali, lukoosi, ne kumuleembe khwaabo boosi bakholanga kamalayi, khunyoela, khu Bayaudi ne akhaba khu Bakiriki bosi.
Sikila Wele arumikhira sikelo silala khukhalakila buli mundu.
Be Chikholo se bali ne Lilaka lia Musa tawe, bakhola bubwoni mala batiba bakhatamba Lilaka. Bayaudi bali ne Lilaka, bakhola bubwoni mala bakhalakilwa ne nalio.
Sikila babaandu se baluungisibwa ne Wele khulwe khuulila lilaka tawe, ne kakhali khulwe khukhola niko lilaka lilakiilisia.
Be Chikholo se bali ne Lilaka tawe, ne bakhebulilanga busa bakholile niko Lilaka lilakiilisianga, khukhola khurio khuli lilaka liabwe, akhaba ne bakhali ne lilaka tawe.
Liba liabwe lino liekesia lili, bibiindu nibio lilaka lilakiilisianga, biaandikwa mu miooyo kiabwe. Liba liabwe lie kamebaasio ke mu miooyo liosi liekesia lili, kano kali ng'ali, sikila mu biise bilala kamebaasio kabekesia kamabi kabwe ne biise bibiindi kabaambila engubo.
Nono khuloondekhana ne Elomo Endayi niyo nilwacha, kaliba kario khu ndaalo eyo nga Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo alikhalakila kamebaasio ke mu bwikisi ke babaandu boosi.
Ne ewe nawe? Welanga oli ewe oli Omuyuda, wayiamba khu Lilaka mala webonia khulwa Wele,
omanyile nisio wele enya okhole, mala Lilaka liakhwikisia khurobora siili siluungi.
Oli na ng'ali, oli oli omurangilisi owe babofu, lundi buwaanga khwaabo baali mu siilima,
omwekisia khulwe basilu, lundi omwekisia, owa abo bakhamanyile siindu tawe. Oli na ng'ali oli oli ne bukesi ne bung'ali mu bwichufu khukhwama mu Lilaka.
Wekisianga babaandi, siina sikila nokheyika wamwene? Wilwacha oli, “Okheeba tawe” ne ewe wamwene wiibanga?
Oboola oli, “Okhakhola bueeyi tawe” ne ewe wamwene okhola bueeyi? Ewe wabiila bifwaani ne ewe wamwene onuula mu chingaangu?
Wibonia khulwe khuba ne lilaka lia Wele, ne oreeranga chisoni khu Wele khulwe khufunaka lilaka liewe?
Waaba ne oria Lilaka lia Wele, aba likhebwa liowo lili lie bukhala, ne waaba nokharia Lilaka tawe, bwakhabeele bulayi andi se wakhebwa tawe.
Aaba bali owe Chikholo, okhakhebwa tawe, aria lilakiilisia lie Lilaka, aba Wele salamubukula busa nga owakhebwa ta ku?
Khwako enywe Bayaudi mulikhalakilwa nende Be Chikholo sikila mu funakanga Lilaka, mwakhaba ne muli nalio mu buandike, mala lundi mwakhebwa, nibo baria Lilaka, akhaba mu mibili ne bakhakhebwa tawe.
Ne kakhaba kario naanu niye Omuyuda owa ng'ali, owakhebwa mu bung'ali? Se ali Omuyuda wenje busa, niye likhebwa liewe lili lie mu mubili busa tawe.
Omuyuda owa ng'ali ali omundu oli Omuyuda mukari, niye kumwoyo kwewe kukhebilwe, mala kino kili kimilimo kia Roho owa Wele, se kili kie Lilaka liliaandikwa tawe. Omundu nga oyo anyoolanga efuma yewe khukhwama khu Wele, ne seli khukhwama khu mundu tawe.

Siina nono nisio Bayaudi bakhililakho Chikholo? Namwe bukhala bwosi bwosi bulikhoo mukhukhebwa ku?
Ng'ali buliio bukali! Mu khunyoa, Wele aelesia Bayaudi burume bwewe.
Ne, balala khu nibo baba ne bakhaba basuubilwa tawe? Lino liboola lili aba Wele se ali omusuubilwa tawe?
Se kali kario tawe! Khukhwola Wele abe wa ng'ali akhaba, buli mundu nali omubeeyi. Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili,
“Ewe ne olomaloma weyekesia khuuba owe bung'ali.
Ne oyaalwa okhila kumusaango.”
Ne kakhali aaba bali bumayaanu bwefwe nibwo bubwekesia bung'ali bwa Wele, aba nono khuloma khuli siina? Khuloma khuli Wele se ali ng'ali khura lirima liewe khwifwe ku? (Ndomaloma kano mungila eye liba lio mundu.)
Se kali kario mu ngila yosi yosi tawe! Wele anyala ariena khukhalakila sibala kaaba bali se ali owa ng'ali tawe?
Ne bubeeyi bwase ne bureera luyali lwa Wele khulwe khukhola bung'ali bwewe bubonekhane abuwaanga, siina sikila ne sikhalakilwa nga omwoni?
Nono siina sikila ne khaboola ndi, khekhukhole kamamayaanu nio kamalayi koole khukhwicha? Ng'ali babaandu balala basitakile ese khulwe khuboola sisiindu sino mala bwaba bukhomo khwise! Bakhakhalakilwe nga ne benyekha.
Nono efwe Bayaudi khulikho bulayi mu ngila yosi yosi khukhila Bakiriki ku? Se kali kario tawe! Nekesie khaale ndi Bayaudi nende Be Chikholo bafwaanana, boosi bali aasi we bunyali bwe bubwoni.
“Se aliio oli omuluungi tawe
Se aliio oli omukesi tawe,
namwe osaayanga Wele tawe.
Boosi bayaukha khu Wele;
boosi bayikhiikha;
se aliio na mulala okholanga kali kamaluungi tawe,
se aliio akhaba na mulala yeng'ene tawe.
chinimi chabwe chechula bukhiikha,
ne khurikhirisila butinyu,
nga buchiba bwe ndemu, khukhwama muminwa kiabwe.
Buli oosi niio bacha, balekha libunia ne lilionaka.
Se bamanyile engila eye kumuleembe tawe,
Luno khwamanyile khuli buli siindu mu Lilaka sili khwaabo bamenyile aasi we Lilaka nio bifuno bioosi bioosi nibio omundu eambilakho birusibweo mala sibala sioosi siche aasi we likhalaka lia Wele.
Sikila se aliio omundu omuluungi na mulala mumoni cha Wele khulwe khukhola niko Lilaka lienyanga tawe, nisio Lilaka likholanga sili khukhola omundu amanye ali akholile bubwoni.
Ne luno engila eya Wele eye khukhola babaandu babe baluungi khu mwene yamalile khufunulwa. Seli ne sisiindu siosi siosi khu Lilaka tawe, akhaba Lilaka lia Musa ne bang'oosi ne baana buloli bwabwe khu nilio.
Wele akhola baandu khuba baluungi khubirira mu lisuubila liabwe mu Yesu Kristo. Wele akholanga kano khwaabo boosi basuubila mu Kristo, sikila se buliio bubwaukhani bwosi bwosi tawe,
sikila baandu boosi bakhola bubwoni, mala bali aleeyi khukhwama khu luyali lwa Wele.
Ne khulwe siianwa sia busa sie kumwalaalo kwa Wele, boosi bakholwa baluungi naye khubirira mu Yesu Kristo obakholanga babe balekhuule.
Wele aana Yesu nio, khulwe lifwa liewe ole khuba engila niyo bubwoni bwe babaandu bubeelwakho khubirira mu lisuubila liabwe mu niye. Wele akhola kano nio okesie ali, ali Omuluungi. Khaale aba owefwiilisia ne saloleelesianga bubwoni bwe babaandu tawe.
Ne mu biise bia luno nio okesie buluungi bwewe salekha busa bubwoni tawe. Mu ngila yino Wele eyekesianga ali, ali Omuluungi lundi akhola buli sia mulala osuubila mu Yesu khuba omuluungi.
Nono, aba efwe sikila khwebonie siina? Siindu tawe! Ne sifuno sia kano sili siina? Kali bali khurichanga lilaka ku? Se kali kario tawe, lili busa lisuubila.
Sikila khutabusia khuli Omundu akholwa Omuluungi ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila liong'ene, ne se khuli khulwe khukhola niko Lilaka lilakiilisianga tawe.
Namwe Wele ali Wele we Bayaudi bong'ene? Se ali Wele owe Be Chikholo choosi ta ku? Ng'ali ali ario.
Wele ali mulala, mala alikhola Bayaudi babe baluungi ne naye omwene khulwe lisuubila liabwe, lundi alikhola Be Chikholo babe baluungi khubirira mu lisuubila liabwe.
Aba lino liboola lili khulwe lisuubila khurusiao Lilaka ku? Se kali kario tawe, ne kakhali khuliinda Lilaka.

Nono, khuboole khuli siina, khu kuuka wefwe Aburahamu? Kaba karie khu niye?
Wele amukhola khuba omuluungi khulwe bibiindu nibio akhola, andi aba ne sisiindu sie khukhwebonesiliakho, ne se muli mumoni cha Wele tawe.
Liiandiko liboola lili, “Aburahamu asuubila Wele, ne khulwe lisuubila liewe Wele amufukiilila nga omuluungi.”
Omundu okholanga kimilimo aruungangwa kumuruungo kwewe, ne se kubalwa nga siianwa tawe, sili sisiindu nisio akhoyeele anyoole.
Ne omundu omenyela khu lisuubila ookheyikina bikholwa biewe omwene tawe, lundi osuubilanga mu Wele, oboolanga ali owe kumusaango se ali ne bubwoni bwosi bwosi tawe, lili lisuubila lino nilio Wele abalanga nio amukhola aba omuluungi ne naye.
Lino nilio Daudi abakho nga ne alomaloma khu ke busangaafu bwo mundu niye Wele afukiililanga nga omuluungi, mu khulekha khubalilila sisiindu siosi siosi nisio akholanga.
nibo bubwoni bwabwe bubeeleelwe!
Ali ne busangaafu omundu niye Omwami alilekha khubala bubwoni bwewe!”
Busangaafu nibwo Daudi alomalomakho buno bwaba khwaabo babakhebwa bong'ene ku? Se kali kario tawe! Bwaba akhaba khu basiinde boosi. Sikila khwabukuule mu liiandiko, “Aburahamu asuubila Wele, ne sikila lisuubila liewe Wele amufukiilila nga Omuluungi.”
Kano kakholekha liina? Kaba enyuma namwe ebweeni we khukhebwa khwa Aburahamu? Karangila ebweeni we khukhebwa khwewe seli enyuma tawe.
Akhebwa enyuma wako, ne likhebwa liewe liaba simanyisio sisiekesia sili, sikila lisuubila liewe Wele aba amufukiilile nga omuluungi nakhakhebwa tawe. Nono khwako Aburahamu ali raraawe owa boosi mu Roho, abo basuubila mu Wele mala bafukiililwa nga baluungi ne naye, akhaba ne bali basiinde.
Ali lundi Paapa owe babaandu, nibo, mukhutasakho khu likhebwa, bamenyanga limenya lie liliene ne liliene nga nilio Paapa wefwe Aburahamu amenya nakhakhebwa tawe.
Ne kaba bali niko Wele asuubisia kaanwa khwaabo baria Lilaka, nono aba lisuubila se lili ne sifuno tawe, ne lisuubisia lia Wele selili ne bukhala tawe.
Lilaka lireeranga lirima lia Wele, ne niio lilaka likhali tawe, lifunaka lie Lilaka se liliio tawe.
nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Nakhukholile raraawe owe Chikholo chingali.” Nono lisuubisia lili lilayi mumoni cha Wele niye Aburahamu asuubilamo, Wele olamusianga bafu, ne khukhila bibiindu bikhabechangao tawe, bibao khu Lilaka liewe.
Abwenao Aburahamu aba ne bukhulu bwe kimiiko embi emia ndala, ne akhaba kario lisuubila liewe se liatekhelana nga ebaasia kumubili kwewe tawe, kukwaba ne kwafwa khaale, namwe nga Sara aba nakhanyala asaala babaana tawe.
Lisuubila liewe se liamuwamo tawe, ne se aayaaya khu lisuubisia lia Wele tawe, lisuubila liewe liamwichusiamo bunyali, mala waana efuma khu Wele.
Aba ne bung'ali elala ali Wele anyala khukhola niko asuubisia.
Lino nilio liliakila Aburahamu, khubirira mu lisuubila, “Afukiililwa nga omuluungi ne Wele.”
Kamakhuwa, “Afukiililwa nga omuluungi” se kaandikwa khulwa niye yeng'ene tawe.
Kaandikwa akhaba khulwe babaandu nga efwe, khulafukiililwa nga baluungi, basuubila mu niye owalamusia Yesu Omwami wefwe khukhwama mu lifwa.
Sikila bubwoni bwefwe, aanwa afwe, mala alamusibwe nio akhukhole efwe khube baluungi ne Wele.

Luno khwakholebwe khuba baluungi ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila, khuli ne kumuleembe ne Wele khubirira mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo.
Khubirira mu niye khwanyolile engila eye khukhwolela kumwalaalo kuno nikwo khwimamo. Ne khwekhoya khulwe lilieyikina liefwe nilio khuli nalio lie khusaanga mu luyali lwa Wele!
Ne khwekhoya lukali mu binyaasio biefwe, sikila khumanyile khuli binyaasio bisasiaanga liliekhaliilikha,
liliekhaliilikha lisasiaanga liba ne liba lisaasia lilieyikina.
Lilieyikina lino se likhukhalasia efwe tawe, sikila Wele achukhile busiime bwewe mu miooyo kiefwe mu ngila eya Roho Omutakatifu, oli siianwa sia Wele khwifwe.
Sikila nga khwaba ne khusiili batekhele, Kristo afwila bakhiikha mu siise nisio Wele arobora.
Sili sisiindu siaandalafu khu mundu khufwila omundu omuluungi. Ne kanyala kaba mbo omundu anyala ekhiinda khufwa khulwo omundu omulayi.
Ne Wele akhwekesie efwe nga ne akhusiima lukali, lili nga ne khwaba ne khusiili babooni Kristo akhufwila!
Khulwe kamafuki kewe, akhukholile khwabele baluungi ne Wele, Kristo alakhuonia lukali khukhwama khu lirima lia Wele!
Khwaba basiku ba Wele, mala akhukhola basaale bewe khubirira mu lifwa lio Mwana wewe. Luno nga ne khuli basaale ba Wele, aba khulaonisibwa lukali khulwe bulamu bwa Kristo!
Ne se kali kamenako kong'ene tawe, khwekhoya khu niko Wele akholile khubirira mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo, okhukholile efwe luno khuba basaale ba Wele.
Bubwoni bwaba mu sibala Lilaka ne likhaanwa tawe, ne bubwoni se bubalikhanga niio Lilaka likhali tawe.
Ne khukhwama mu siise sia Adamu khukhwola khu siise sia Musa lifwa liamiia khu baandu boosi, akhaba khwaabo bakhakhola bubwoni mu ngila nga niyo Adamu akholelamo mukhulekha khuria lilakiilisia lia Wele tawe.
Adamu aba sisiiniini sioyo olikho owicha.
Ne babili chana se bafwaanana tawe, sikila siianwa sia busa sia Wele se silekhaana ne bubwoni bwa Adamu tawe, kali ng'ali bali babaandu bakali bafwa sikila bubwoni bwo mundu mulala oyo. Ne kumwalaalo kwa Wele kuli kumukali khukhila, ne sili siianwa siewe sia busa khu baandu bakali khubirira mu mwalaalo kwo Mundu mulala chana oyo, Yesu Kristo.
Ne bubwabukhani buliio akari we siianwa sia Wele ne bubwoni bwo mundu mulala chana. Enyuma we bubwoni bulala obwo, likhalaka lie khuboola mbo “Bali ne kumusaango,” ne ekhumaliilikha we bubwoni bukali, siicha siianwa nisio omundu akhakhoyeela khunyoola tawe “Bali kumusaango mbao!”
Kali ng'ali khubirira mu bwoni bwo mundu mulala lifwa liarakikha khukhwamiia sikila Omundu mulala oyo. Ne kamakobosio kali kamaboofu lukali ke kumulimo kwo mundu mulala, Yesu Kristo! Abo boosi banyoola kumwalaalo kwa Wele mu bukali ne khukholebwa baluungi ne naye, bakhamiie mu bulamu khubirira mu Kristo.
Nono, nga bubwoni bulala obwo bwakhalakila babaandu boosi, mu ngila ng'eneyo sikholwa silala siluungi sikhola babaandu boosi baba balekhuule, mala sibaelesia bulamu.
Ne nga babaandu boosi ne bakholwa babooni khulwe khulekha khuria lilakiilisia lio mundu mulala, mu ngila ng'eneyo boosi bakholebwa baluungi khulwe buriaani bwo Mundu mulala Yesu Kristo.
Lilaka liarebwao, nio khukhola kamabi khutasikhe, ne niio bubwoni bwatasikha, kumwalaalo kwa Wele kwatasikha lukali khukhila.
Nono, nga bubwoni ne bwamiia khubirira mu lifwa, kumwalaalo kwa Wele kwamiia khubirira mu buluungi, ne bukhurangilira efwe khucha mu bulamu bwa mindali khubirira mu Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe.

Nono khuboole khuli siina? Khuchiililile khumenya mu bwoni nio kumwalaalo kwa Wele kutasikhe?
Ng'ali se kali kario tawe! Efwe khwafwa khu bwoni khunyala nono khwachiililila khubumenyamo khuriena?
Sikila ng'ali mumanyile muli nga ne khwabatiisibwa mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, khwabatiisibwa mu buambaani ne lifwa liewe.
Nono, khulwe libatiisibwa liefwe, khwasiikhwa ne naye mala khwasaanga mu lifwa liewe, nio bulayi bwene nga Kristo alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa khulwe bunyali bwe luyali lwa Paapa, nio akhaba efwe fwesi khwole khumenya bulamu buyia.
Sikila khwekela mulala ne naye mu lifwa nga niye ne afwa, mu ngila eyo khuliba nga omundu mulala ne naye khulwe khulamusibwa khube ne bulamu nga niye ne alamusibwa.
Ne khumanyile khuli liba liefwe likhaale lieriirwe ne Kristo khu musalaba kwewe, nio bunyali bwe kumubili kwe bubwoni bwonakwe, mala khukhabakho lundi barumwa be bubwoni tawe.
Sikila nga omundu ne afwa aba akholiilwe omulekhuule khukhwama mu bunyali bwe bubwoni.
Ne sikila khwafwiile ne Kristo khusuubila khuli akhaba fwesi khukhamenye naye.
Sikila khumanyile khuli Kristo alamusibwe khukhwama mu lifwa ne salifwa lundi tawe, mala lifwa se lilimwamiakho lundi tawe.
Nono, sikila afwa, bubwoni se buli ne bunyali khu niye tawe, mala luno amenyanga bulamu bwewe mu busaanganilo ne Wele.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, mukhoyela mweyibaasie mwabeene nga bafu, khuloondekhana ne bubwoni nga buli, mala mumenye mu busaanganilo ne Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo.
Bubwoni bukheecha bwamiia lundi mu mibili kienywe nio murie liliekoomba lie liba lienywe lie khukhweyenyela tawe.
Namwe khukhwola mukhaanakho sitonyi sienywe siosi siosi khu bwoni sirumikhirwe khulwe bifuno bie bumayaanu ne bubwoni tawe. Ne kakhali, khemwiaane mwabeene khu Wele, nga balamusibwe khukhwama mu lifwa khucha mu bulamu, mala mwiaane mwabene mu bwichufu khu niye khulwe khurumikhirwa khulwe bifuno biluungi.
Khukhwola bubwoni bukhaba omwami wenywe tawe, sikila se mumenyile aasi we Lilaka tawe, ne kakhali mu menyile aasi we kumwalaalo kwa Wele.
Nono, siina? Khukhole bubwoni sikila se khuli aasi we Lilaka tawe, ne kakhali khuli aasi we kumwalaalo kwa Wele? Se kali kario tawe!
Ng'ali mu manyile muli ne mwiaana mwabeene nga nasioobi khuria omundu okundi, aba ng'ali muli busa nasioobi bo mwami niye muria oyo, bunyala bwaba bubwoni, bureera, lifwa, namwe buriaani bukhola mwaba baluungi ne Wele.
Ne orio echa khu Wele! Sikila akhaba a siise silala ne mwaba nasioobi khu bwoni, mwaria ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi bung'ali bunyoolekha mu mekisio niko mwanyoola.
Mwakholwa balekhuule khukhwama khu bwoni mala mwekela nasioobi be buluungi.
(Ndumikhira lulomo lwa buli ndaalo sikila butekhele bwe liba lienywe lie kumubili.) A siise silala mweana mwabene elala nga nasioobi khu bunyaalu ne bumayaanu khulwe bifuno bimayaanu. Mu ngila ng'eneyo khukhwola luno mweane mwabeene elala nga nasioobi be buluungi khulwe bifuno bitakatifu.
Nga ne mwaba nasioobi be bubwoni chana, mwaba balekhuule khukhwama mu buluungi.
Mwanyoola bukhala siina khukhwama mu khukhola bibiindu nibio luno munyolelakho chisoni? Ekhumaliilikha we bibiindu ebio lili lifwa!
Ne luno mwakholiilwe balekhuule khukhwama khu bwoni mala muli nasioobi ba Wele. Bukhala bwenywe buli limenya lie khukhwirusira elala khu niye ne ekhumaliilikha wayo buli bulamu bwa mindali.
Sikila kumuruungo kwe bubwoni kuli lifwa, ne siianwa sia busa sia Wele sili bulamu bwa mindali mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe.

Bawandaayase, ng'ali mulamanya nilio ndi siimbi khuboola, sikila enywe mweesi mumanyile ke lilaka. Lilaka liamianga khu baandu ne basiili balamu.
Lolela khu mukhasi owabeela, abowa ne lilaka khu museecha wewe nga nilwo omuseecha wewe oyo nasiili omulamu, ne nafwiile, nono aba alekhuulilwe khukhwama mu Lilaka liliamuboa khu museecha wewe.
Nono, aaba namenya no mundu okundi omuseecha wewe nasiili omulamu, aba alalaangwa omukhobani, ne kakhali omuseecha wewe nafwa, aba ali omukhasi omulekhuule khu lilaka, mala ne acha khu mundu okundi aba sakhola bukhobani tawe.
Bawandaayase, kali busa kario khwinywe. Nga khulwe khuloondekhana ne lilaka nga lili, enywe mwesi mwafwa sikila muli sitonyi sie kumubili kwa Kristo, mala luno muli booyo owalamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa nio khwole khuba be bukhala mu bukhalabani bwa Wele.
Sikila nga nilwo khwamenyanga khuloondekhana khu liba liefwe lio mundu lilaka liakholeelesia, liliekoomba lie bubwoni mu mibili kiefwe, mala fweesi khwamaliilisila mu lifwa.
Kakhaba kario, luno, khuli balekhuule khukhwama mu Lilaka, sikila khwafwa khwilio liliakhwikalilila efwe khwaba baboe. Se khurumikha lundi mu ngila ekhale eye lilaka liliaandikwa tawe, ne kakhali khurumikha mu ngila embia eya Roho.
Ne mu ngila eye lilaka elio bubwoni bwanyoola bubweyaangu khukholeelesia liliekoomba lie khukhweyenyela bibiindu chingano choosi mwise. Lilaka ne likhaliio tawe, bubwoni buli sisiindu sisiafwa.
Ese samwene lulala, naba omulamu ne khali ne Lilaka tawe, ne nga Lilaka liecha, bubwoni bwalamukha,
mala nafwa. Ne Lilaka lilienyekha lireere bulamu mwise, liareera lifwa.
Bubwoni bwanyoola bubweyaangu bwabwo, ne mu ngila eye Lilaka bwambea mala bwanjira.
Nono, Lilaka liliene lili litakatifu, liluungi, lundi lilayi.
Ne lino aba liboola lili, Lilaka liaba lilayi mala liareera lifwa liase? Se kali kario tawe! Bubwoni nibwo bubwakhola kano, bwandeerera lifwa khulwe khurumikhira Lilaka lili lilayi, nio liba liabwo liang'ali nga bubwoni liole khubuulwa. Khwako, khulwe engila eye lilaka bubwoni bwekesibwa khuba bubwoni bumayaanu khukhila.
Khumanyile khuli Lilaka lili lie buroo, ne ese se ndi omundu we buroo tawe nakusibwa nga nasioobi khu bwoni.
Se manyilisianga nisio kholanga tawe, sikila se kholanga nisio nenya khukhola tawe, ne kakhali kholanga nisio nabiila.
Sikila nisio kholanga sili nisio khenyanga khukhola tawe, lino liekesia lili fukiilila ndi Lilaka lili liluungi.
Nono ng'ali se ndi ese okholanga sisiindu sino tawe, ne kakhali bubwoni bumenyanga mwise nibwo bukholanga.
Manyile ndi bulayi se bumenyanga mu liba liase nga omundu busa tawe. Sikila akhaba liliekoomba lie khukhola bulayi ne lindimo, se nyala khulikhola tawe.
Se kholanga lilayi nilio nenya khukhola tawe, ne kakhali, kholanga limayaanu nilio kheenya khukhola tawe.
Naaba ne kholanga niko kheenya khukhola tawe, lino liekesia lili aba se ndi ese okholanga tawe, ne kakhali, bubwoni bubumenyilemo nibwo bukholanga.
Nono aba lino liba lilaka, sikila ne nenya khukhola lili liluungi, libi liosi aba lili siimbi.
Liba liase lie mukari lisangaalilanga Lilaka lia Wele.
Ne kakhali mbona Lilaka lie lukano luluundi mu mubili kwase Lilaka likhupana ne lilaka nilio kamebaasio kase kafukiilila, likholanga mba omuboe khu lilaka lie bubwoni lili mu mubili kwase.
Ese ndi omundu we bubeeleli lukali! Naanu olimbonia ese khukhwama mu mubili kulikho ne kumbila mu lifwa kuno?
Orio ebe khu Wele, okholanga kano khubirira mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo!
Nono, lino, lili liiba liase. Khwise samwene nyala naria Lilaka lia Wele mu mebaasio mwong'ene, ne liba liase nga omundu busa ndumikhirwa khu lilaka lie bubwoni.

Luno likhalakilwa se liliio tawe khwaabo bamenyile mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo!
Sikila Lilaka lia Roho, likhurereraanga efwe bulamu mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, liakholile ese nabele omulekhuule khukhwama mu lilaka lie bubwoni ne lifwa.
Niko lilaka liakhilwa khukhola, sikila liba lio mundu liaba litekhele, Wele akhola. Akhalakila bubwoni mu liba lio mundu khulwe khuruma Omwana wewe Omwene, owecha ne liba nga liba lio mundu lie bubwoni, arusieo bubwoni.
Wele akhola lino nio echusie kakenyekha ne Lilaka nga buluungi ne bukhoyela bube mwifwe khumenyile khuloondekhana ne Roho, ne se khuli khuloondekhana ne liba lio mundu tawe.
Kamebaasio kabo bamenyanga nga liba liabwe lio mundu libaboolelanga, kemeelelwa nende niko liba lio mundu lienyanga. Kamebaasio kabo bamenyanga nga Roho nababoolelanga, kemeelelwa nende nisio Roho enyanga.
Khukhwimeelelwa ne liba lio mundu khureraanga lifwa, khukhwimeelelwa ne Roho khureeranga bulamu ne kumuleembe.
Nono, babaandu bekela basiku ba Wele ne bemeelelwa ne liba liabwe lio mundu, sikila se baria Lilaka lia Wele tawe, mala ng'ali se banyala baliria tawe.
Abo bakholanga nga liba liabwe lio mundu ne lienya se banyala basiimisia Wele tawe.
Ne se mumenyile nga liba lio mundu lienya tawe, ne kakhali, mu menyile nga liba lia Roho limuboolelanga, aba, bali, Roho owa Wele amenya mwinywe. Omundu yesi yesi okhali ne Roho owa Kristo tawe aba se ali wewe tawe.
Ne Kristo aba namenyanga mwinywe, Roho ali bulamu khwinywe, sikila Wele amukhola baluungi, akhaba kimibili kienywe ne kilikho kicha khufwa sikila bubwoni.
Aaba bali Roho owa Wele owalamusia Yesu khukhwama mu lifwa, amenyanga mwinywe, nono oyo owalamusia Kristo khukhwama mu lifwa, akhamuelesia akhaba enywe bulamu khu mibili kienywe kie lifwa khulwe khubao khwa Roho wewe mwinywe.
Bawandaayase, nono khuli ne kimilimo, mala se kili khumenya nga liba liefwe lie kimibili likhwenyelanga tawe.
Sikila mulikho mucha khufwa mwaba ne mumenyanga khuloondekhana ne liba lienywe lio mundu, ne mwaba ne mumenyanga khulwa Roho mwera bikholwa bienywe bie bubwoni, mulamenya.
Abo barangirirwa ne Roho owa Wele bali babaana ba Wele.
Ali Roho owa Wele omwene oanaanga buloli ne roho wefwe khuboola khuli efwe khuli babaana ba Wele.
Ne sikila khuli babaana bewe, khuliba ne chikhabi nicho abikhila babaandu bewe, ne lundi khulisaanga Kristo mu nibio Wele amubikhila niye, sikila khwaaba ne khusaanga mu binyaasio bia Kristo, khulisaanga akhaba mu luyali lwewe lwosi.
Mbona ndi niko khunyaasibwamo mu siise sia luno sino se kanyala kalekhasibwa na akeekhe ene ne luyali lulikho lwicha khubuulwa khwifwe tawe.
Bibuumbe bioosi bilindiililanga ne lilienya lie silukuluku khulwa Wele khubuula babaana bewe.
Sikila bibuumbe biakhalakilwa khutibia sifuno siabio, Wele enya bibe birio ne seli khulwe lilienya liabio bibiene tawe. Ne kakhaba kario lilieyikina liliio
mbo endaalo ndala bibuumbe bibieene bililekhuulwa khukhwama mu burumwa bwabio bwe khubola, mala bisaange mu bulekhuule bwe luyali lwe babaana ba Wele.
Sikila khumanyile khuli khukhwola khu siise sia luno sino, bibuumbe bioosi bililila mu buchuuni, nga omukhasi nasaala omwana.
Ne se bili busa bibuumbe biong'ene bilila tawe, efwe khuli ne Roho nga siianwa sia Wele sie khunyoa, akhaba efwe fwesi khulilila mu buchuuni mukari wefwe, nga khulindiililanga Wele khukhukhola efwe babaana bewe mala akhole liba liefwe liosi libe lilekhuule.
Sikila efwe khwaonisibwa khulwe lilieyikina, ne khwaaba ne khubona nisio khweyikina, aba elio se lili lilieyikina lia ng'ali tawe.
Ne khwaaba ne khweyikina khu nisio khukhabona tawe, aba khusilindiilila ne liliefwiilisia.
Mu ngila eyo Roho yesi echanga khukhuyeeta efwe batekhele nga khuli khuri. Sikila se khumanyile nga khukhoyeele khusabe tawe, Roho omwene ekoonjelelanga Wele mu bweyaangu bwefwe mu makhuwa ke khulila kakhanyala kalomalomekha tawe.
Mala Wele, obonanga mu miooyo kiefwe, amanyile kamebaasio ka Roho nga kali, sikila Roho ekoonjelelanga Wele khulwe babaandu bewe ne khuloondekhana ne lilienya liewe.
Khumanyile khuli Wele akholanga bulayi mu biindu bioosi ne nabo babamusiima niye, abo balangilwe khuloondekhana ne sifuno siewe.
Abo nibo Wele arobora khaale, mala lundi abara alubeka bekele nga Omwana wewe nali, nio Omwana chana abe owe khunyoa mu bawandaaye bakali.
Nono nibo Wele aara alubeka, abalanga, ne nibo alaanga abakhola baba baluungi khu niye Omwene, mala asaanga mu luyali lwewe ne nabo.
Khu kano koosi, khunyala khwaboola siina? Wele aba nali nafwe, naanu onyala waba omusiku wefwe?
Wele, okhakhwima Omwana wewe omwene tawe, amuaana sikila efwe fweesi, sanyala akhuelesia bibiindu bioosi nenaye tawe ku?
Naanu olisitaka barobore ba Wele? Wele omwene ababoolelanga ali, “Se bali ne bubwoni tawe!”
Nono, naanu, olibakhalakila? Se ali Yesu Kristo, owafwa mala alamusibwa, aba omulamu ne ali kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele, ekongochela Wele sikila efwe!
Naanu, nono, onyala akhwaukhasia khukhwama khu busiime bwa Kristo? Kumunaanio kunyala kwakhola kurio, namwe buandalafu, namwe linyaasia, namwe enjala, namwe bubanani, namwe busiku, namwe lifwa?
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Khuli mu busiku bwe lifwa biise bioosi sikila ewe,
khukholelwa nga kamakheese kalikho ne kacha khwirwa.”
Tawe, mu biindu bino bioosi khuli angaaki we bakhili khubirira mu oyo owakhusiima efwe!
Sikila ndi ng'ali ndi se siliio sinyala siakhwaukhasia efwe khukhwama khu busiime bwewe tawe. Se lili lifwa namwe bulamu, malaika namwe babaami babaandi be mwikulu, se bali baliio luno namwe be chindaalo chichiicha,
bali mu sibala sie mu ngaaki namwe mu sibala sie aasi, se siliio sisiindu mu bibuumbe bioosi silinyala khukhwaukhasia efwe khukhwama khu busiime bwa Wele buli bubwefwe khubirira mu Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe tawe.

Ndikho ndomaloma bung'ali, ese ndi owa Kristo ne se mbea tawe. Kamebaasio kase ke mu mwoyo, niko Roho Omutakatifu amiia, koosi kasuubisia kali se ndikho mbea tawe
nga ne mboola ndi, ndi ne bubeeleli buli bukali, ne buchuuni mu mwoyo kwase bukhawa tawe,
nikoomba ndi bwakhabeele bulayi ese samwene mbe ne silaamo khukhwama khu Wele naukhasibwe khukhwama khu Kristo lundi mbe aleeyi ne Kristo mu bweyaangu bwe babaandu base mu mubili ne mu mafuki.
Bali babaandu ba Wele, abakhola babaana bewe mala ababuulila luyali lwewe, akhola chindakaano chewe ne nabo mala abaelesia Lilaka, bali ne lisaaya lia Wele lia ng'ali, banyoola lisuubisia lia Wele,
sikuuka siabwe bali Baeburania babamanyikhana, ne Kristo, nga omundu, ali owe kholo ng'ene eyo. Wele, owamiianga khu boosi, ole khufumisibwa mindali! Amina.
Se ndikho mboola ndi elomo eya Wele yakhilwa tawe, sikila babaandu ba Isiraeli boosi se bali boosi babaana ba Wele tawe.
Lundi lisaaye lia Aburahamu se bali boosi babaana ba Wele tawe. Wele aboolela Aburahamu ali, “Oliba ne lisaaye nilio nakhusuubisia khubirira mu Isaaka.”
Lino liekesia lili babaana babasaalwa khulwe kumubili
Sikila lisuubisia lia Wele liakholwa mu makhuwa kano, “Mu siise sisienyekha khakobole mala Sara aliba no mwana.”
Ne se kali kano kong'ene tawe. Basoleeli ba Rabeka baba ne raarawabwe mulala kuuka wefwe Isaaka.
Nio burobosi bwo mwana mulala bube khuloondekhana ne sifuno sia Wele Omwene,
Wele aamuboolela ali, “Omukhulu alikholela omutiiti.” Aaloma kano ne bakhasaalwa tawe, lundi basiili khukhola sisiindu siosi siosi silayi namwe siibi, nio burobosi bwa Wele bwaba khuloondekhana ne kumulaango kwewe omwene, ne se bwaba khu siindu siosi siosi nisio baba ne bakholile tawe.
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Nasiima Yakobo, mala nabiila Esau.”
Nono, khunyala khwaboola khuli, Wele se ali owa ng'ali tawe ku? Se kali kario tawe.
Sikila aboolela Musa ali, “Ndakholela siisa omundu yesi yesi niye nenya. Khukholela siisa.”
Nono, buli siindu sili khuloondekhana ne siisa sia Wele siong'ene ne seli khu niko omundu enya namwe akholanga tawe.
Sikila liiandiko liboolela khu mwami owa Misiri lili, “Nakhukhola obe omwami nio ekhurumikhire khukhwekesia bunyali bwase ne khukeesia efuma yase mu sibala sioosi.”
Nono, Wele ali ne siisa khu mundu yesi yesi niye enyanga, ne akholanga omundu yesi yesi niye enyanga abe omuandalafu okhaulila tawe.
Ne mulala khwinywe alamboolela ese ali, “Kano kaba ne kali kario, Wele anyala khunyoola ariena kamakhiikha khu mundu yesi yesi? Naanu onyala akhiingilila lilienya lia Wele?”
Ne musaale wase, ewe nawe naanu, okobosia Wele? Enyuungu eye liloba ereebanga omubuumbi wayo eli, “Siina sisiakila ne umbuumba ori?”
