Sikila omubuumbi ali omulekhuule khurumikhira liloba nga ne enya, mala abuumbe chinyuungu chibili khukhwama mwikenya lilala, ndala erumikhe mu biise bie bakeni ne ekiindi erumikha mu kia busiele.
Niko Wele akholile kosi kali busa kario. Enyile khukhwekesia lirima liewe mala akhole bunyali bwewe bumanyikhe. Ne aaba owe khukhwefwiilisia lukali mu khwekhaliilikha abo babamuambianga lirima, ba baaba ne balikho bacha khubunisibwa.
Ne Wele enya lundi khubuula luyali lwewe luli lukali po, lulwecha khwifwe nibo aakholela siisa. Efwe khukhwakholwa khwerekekha khunyoola luyali lwewe.
Sikila efwe khuli babaandu nibo alaanga, ne se akhulaanga khukhwama mu Bayaudi bong'ene tawe, ne kakhali khukhwama akhaba mu be Chikholo bosi.
Kano niko aboolanga khukhwama mu sitabu sia Hosea ali.
“Babaandu bakhaaba babase tawe,
ndabalanga ndi, ‘babaandu base.’
Ekholo niyo khasiima tawe,
ndakilanga ndi, ‘Eyase niyo nasiima.’
Ne buli abuundu ao nao niio baboolelwa bali,
‘Se muli babaandu base tawe,’
abwenao balalaangwa bali,
babaana ba Wele omenyile mindali.”
Ne Isaya enoosia ka Isiraeli ali, “Akhaba babaandu ba Isiraeli ne bali bakali nga kumuyekhe kwe khu sikiingi sie nyanja, bakeekhe mu nibo busa balionisibwa,
sikila Omwami alakhalakila babaandu bali khu sibala bwangu lundi lumaliilisi.”
Kali nga Isaya ne aboola khale ali, “Abanga Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi alekha khuramisiliakho nibo efwe khusaalwakho tawe, andi khwekela nga Sodomu, andi khwaba nga Komora.”
Nono khuboola khuli Be Chikholo, bakhakhakanga babeene khuba baluungi khu Wele tawe, bakholwa baluungi ne naye khubirira mu lisuubila,
ne babaandu ba Wele, babayiimanga lilaka bali libakhole baluungi ne Wele, se balinyoola tawe.
Siina sisiakila? Sikila se beamba khu lisuubila tawe, ne kakhali beamba khu niko bakhola. Khwako betuya, khu libaale, “Lie khukhwetuyakho.”
Nilio liiandiko lilomalomangakho lili.
“Lola, nda mu Sayuni libaale likhola babaandu betuye,
lulwanda lulibakhola bakwe.
Ne yesi yesi osuubila mu niye se aliaambwa chisoni tawe.”

Bawandaayase, liliekoomba lie kumwoyo kwase, ne lisaba liase lili mbo babaandu base ba Isiraeli baonisibwe.
Nyala namusuubisia enywe ndi bali ne sinani sikali khu Wele, ne kakhali sinani siabwe se sili khuloondekhana ne bukesi bwa ng'ali tawe.
Se bamanya engila niyo Wele akholelangamo baandu baaba baluungi khu niye omwene tawe, ne kakhali, bakhaka khurao engila yabwe babeene mala mu khukhola khurio se beaana babeene khu ngila niyo Wele araao eye khukhola baandu baaba baluungi tawe.
Sikila Kristo areera Lilaka khu siakamo, nio buli mundu yesi yesi osuubila akholwa omuluungi ne Wele.
Ne nilio liiandiko liboola khulwe khukholwa omuluungi ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila lili lino, “Se wereeba wamwene oli, Naanu olaniina mwikulu?” (Khucha khukhwikhisia Kristo aasi).
Namwe sewereeba oli, “Naanu oleekha aasi mwiloba?” (Khucha khureera Kristo khukhwama mu lifwa.)
Nilio liboola nilio eli, “Burume bwa Wele buli busa siimbi nawe, khu minwa kiowo ne mu mwoyo kwowo” buli burume bwe lisuubila nibwo khwilwachanga.
Waaba ne wiyama oli Yesu ali Omwami mala osuubile oli Wele amulamusia niye khukhwama mu lifwa, olaonisibwa.
Sikila khukholwa khuba baluungi khulwe lisuubila liefwe ne khuonisibwa khulwe khukhweyama khwefwe.
Liiandiko liboola lili, “Omundu yesi yesi osuubila mu niye se aliaambwa chisoni tawe.”
Lino lituba alala buli mundu yesi yesi, sikila bubwabukhani se bulikho akari we Bayaudi nende Be Chikholo tawe, Wele ali Omwami mulala oyo busa owa boosi, mala abiitanga chikhabi boosi bamulililanga.
Nga liiandiko liboola lili, “buli mundu yesi yesi olaanga khu lisina lio Omwami khulwe buyeeti alaonisibwa.”
Ne banyala bamulaanga bariena khulwe buyeeti baba ne bakhamusuubila tawe? Ne banyala basuubila bariena ne bakhaulila burume? Ne banyala baulila bariena burume ne bukhelwachiibwe?
Ne burume bunyala bwelwachibwa buriena barume baba ne bakharumwa tawe? Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Lilicha lie barumwa bareera Elomo Endayi lili lilayi lukali!”
Ne kakhali se bali boosi babafukiilila Elomo Endayi tawe. Isaya omwene aboola ali, “Omwami, naanu owasuubila burume bwefwe?”
Khwako, lisuubila liamanga mu khuulila burume, ne burume bwichanga khubirira mu khwilwacha Kristo.
Ne kakhali ese ndeeba ndi, kali ng'ali se baulila burume tawe? Ng'ali baulila sikila nga liiandiko liboola lili.
“Liiuliilikha lie kumumilo kwabwe liola mu sibala sioosi,
kamakhuwa kabwe koola khu siakamo sie sibala.”
“Ndarumikhira khakholo nabulebe,
khukhola babaandu base bakhalikhililwe,
ne ndaambia babaandu base lirima khulwe khurumikhira ekholo eye basilu.”
“Nanyoolekhana ne nabo bakhambimanga tawe,
nabonekhela abo bakhaba ne bandeeba tawe.”

Wele se aloba babaandu bewe nibo arobora khukhwama mu khurakikha tawe. Mumanyile niko liiandiko liboola, niio Elicha ekongochela Wele khulwe khu sitaka Isiraeli,
“Omwami, berire bang'oosi bowo ne khutechulaka alutare chowo. Ese seng'ene niye oramire mala balakhakanga khukhunjira.”
Wele amukobosia ali siina? “Ndi ne babaandu chielefu saba bakhasaayakho sifwaani sia Baali tawe.”
Kali busa kario akhaba luno. Eliio esaabu ndiiti eye babaandu baramire nibo Wele arobore sikila kumwalaalo kwewe.
Burobosi bwewe se buli khulwe bikholwa biabwe tawe, ne kakhali buli khulwe kumwalaalo kwewe. Sikila abanga bali burobosi bwewe buli khu niko babaandu bakhola, andi kumwalaalo kwewe se kuli ng'ali tawe.
Nono siina? Babaandu ba Isiraeli se banyoola niko bayimanga tawe. Sipupu sitiiti nisio Wele arobora siong'ene nisio sisianyoola. Ne baramire boosi baminyalila kumulaango kwa Wele.
Nga liiandiko liboola, “Wele akhola kamebaasio kabwe ne kimiooyo kiabwe kialendaala, khukhwola khu ndaalo yino, se banyala babona namwe baulila tawe.”
Ne Daudi aboola ali,
“Bakhoya barekwe ne khutiililwa mu naikara chabwe
Bakhoya bakwe, bakhoya baukuumwe,
Chimoni chabwe chikhoya chabofula, nio balekhubona tawe,
mala bakholwe beunamile mu minaanio kiabwe biise bioosi.”
Nono, ndeeba ndi. Nga Bayaudi ne betuya bakwa, babunila elala ku? Se kali kario mu ngila yosi yosi tawe! Sikila bakhola bubwoni, buonia bwachile khu Be Chikholo, nio Bayaudi bakhalikhililwe.
Bubwoni bwe Bayaudi bwareera chikhabi che buiinda mu sibala, ne kumutaambo kwabwe kwe mumwoyo kwareera chikhabi che buiinda khu Be Chikholo. Nono, chikhabi chiliba chingali chiriena nga esaabu eye Bayaudi ne ekhechusibwe!
Ndikho luno ndomaloma khwinywe Be Chikholo. Nga ese ne ndi Omurumwa khu Be Chikholo, ndebonia khulwe kimilimo kiase.
Wakana nyala nakhola babaandu be kholo yase eng'ene bakhalikhililwa, nio nyale khuoniakho balala khu nibo.
Sikila nga Bayaudi balobwa, babaandu boosi bakaluukhasibwa khukhwama mu khuba basiku ba Wele baba basaale bewe. Nono, kaliba kariena nga bafukiililwa? Buliba bulamu khu bafu!
Kaaba bali sitonyi sie khunyoa sie kumukaati
Chisakia ndalakho che kumurongooro kumuseituni kumubiaalwa chafuniilwe ne khurusibwakho, ne lusakia lwa Museituni kwe mundaa lwaambaasiibwe khu museituni kumubiaalwa chana. Enywe be Chikholo muli nga kumurongooro kwa museituni kwe mundaa, mala luno mulikho musaanga mu bulamu bwe kamaani bwa roho bwe Bayaudi.
Nono, khukhwola mulekhe khulekelesia abo babafunakwa barusibwao nga chisakia. Munyala mwesuunia muriena? Enywe muli busa lusakia, se mutiililila kimili tawe, kimili nikio kimutiililila enywe.
Ne ewe olaboola oli, “Yee, chisakia charemwa charurakho khuaana bubweyaangu khwise.”
Ako kali ng'ali baremwa barusibwakho sikila se basuubila tawe, ne ewe warama mu bweyaangu obwo sikila wasuubila. Ne okheboneselia khu lienelio tawe, ne kakhali ba omuri.
Wele saramia Bayaudi tawe, bali nga chisakia che kumurongooro, ewe wibaasia oli alakhuramia ku?
Ano khubona nga Wele nali omulayi ne lundi nga nali omurafu. Ali omurafu khwaabo bakwile, ne omulayi khwiwe waaba nochiililila mu bulayi bwewe. Ne waaba nokhakhola orio tawe, wesi olaremwa.
Ne Bayaudi baba ne balekha khusuubila khwabwe, balakalusibwa mu bweyaangu nimwo babamo, sikila Wele anyala khukhola kamene ako.
Enywe Be Chikholo muli nga lusakia lwe kumuseituni kwe mundaa nilwo baremire mala nono, liaukhana ne liba lia busiele, lwaambaasiibwe khu murongooro kumuseituni kumubiaalwa. Bayaudi bali nga kumurongooro kwa miseituni kumubiaalwa, mala liliba liliangu lukali khu Wele khuambaasia chisakia chicharemwa chino khu murongooro kwacho lundi.
Bawandaayase, buliio bung'ali bubwakukhuulilwa nibwo nenya mumanye, sikila bulamuliinda mukhakhola murio mweyibaasia nga muli bakesi tawe. Sileka sie babaandu ba Isiraeli se silibao buli lwoosi tawe. Siliio khukhwola nga esaabu eye Be Chikholo eyolaana eliicha khu Wele.
Ne abwenao Baisiraeli boosi balionisibwa nga liiandiko ne liboola,
“Omuonia aliama Sayuni,
mala arusieo bumayaanu bwoosi,
khukhwama mu be lisaaye lia Yakobo.
nga ne ndirusiao bubwoni bwabwe.”
Sikila baloba Elomo Endayi. Bayaudi bali basiku ba Wele, khu bulayi bwenywe Be Chikholo. Ne kakhali sikila burobosi bwa Wele, bali basaale bewe sikila bakuuka babwe.
Sikila Wele sakaluukhasianga kamebaasio kewe khulwo oyo niye arobora ne khubiita chikhabi tawe.
Ne khwinywe Be Chikholo, mu ndaalo chichabira mwaba mukharia Wele tawe, ne luno mwanyoolile siisa sia Wele sikila sileka sie Bayaudi.
Mu ngila neng'ene, sikila siisa nisio mwanyoolile, Bayaudi luno se baria Wele tawe, nio akhaba boosi luno boole khunyoola siisa sia Wele.
Sikila Wele akholile babaandu boosi baboe be sileka, nio ekesie siisa khu nibo boosi.
Nga liiandiko ne liboola lili,
“Naanu omanyile kamebaasio ko Mwami?
Naanu onyala amukaambila?
nio ekhumaliilikha amuruunge?”

Nono, bawandaayase, sikila siisa sia Wele sikali khwifwe, mwekoonjelela enywe ndi, yiaana mwabeene khu Wele nga liiosio lie bulamu, liaanwa khu bukholi bwewe lundi limusiimisia niye. Lino nilio lisaaya lia ng'ali khu Wele nilio mukhoya khurusia.
Mukhaloonda ke sibala sino tawe, ne lekha Wele amukaluukhasie enywe mukari khulwe khukaluukhasilia elala kamebaasio kenywe. Nio mulanyala khumanya lilienya lia Wele, sili silayi lundi sisiimisia khu niye, mala sisiichufu.
Ne sikila siianwa sia Wele sie kumwalaalo khwise mboola khu buli mulala khwinywe. Mukheyibaasia khuba be angaaki khukhila nga muli tawe. Ne kakhali mube ne kamebaasio kakolaana mala mwikhalakile mwabeene khuloondekhana khu bukali bwe lisuubila nilio Wele amuelesie enywe.
Khuli ne bitonyi bikali mu mubili mulala, ne bitonyi bino bioosi bili ne kimilimo kikiabukhana.
Mu ngila neng'ene, khwakhaba ne khuli bakali, khuli kumubili mulala mu buambaani ne Kristo, mala fweesi khwaambaasibwa khu buli sia mulala nga bitonyi bibiabukhaane bie kumubili mulala.
Nono khukhoya khurumikhira biianwa biefwe bibiaukhaane khuloondekhana ne kumwalaalo nikwo Wele akhuelesie efwe. Siianwa siefwe siaba ne sili khung'oola, khwolaana khukhole khurio khuloondekhana ne lisuubila nilio khuli nalio,
siaba ne sili khukhalabana, khwolaana khukhalabane, siaba ne sili khukhwekisia khwolaana khwekisie,
siaba ne sili khuramo babaandi kumwoyo khwolaana khukhole khurio. Oyo yesi yesi osaanganga ne babaandi olaana akhole ario mu buaani, oyo yesi yesi oli ne bunyali olaana akhole kimilimo ne kamaani, oyo yesi yesi owekesianga bulayi khu baandi olaana akhole mu busangaafu.
Busiime khukhwola bube bukwalaafu elala. Biila lili limayaanu, tiila lili lilayi.
Siimana mwabeene ne mwabeene nga bawandaaye ne wandaaye mu Kristo, mala mube ne silukuluku khukhwekesia buriaani buli mundu no wasie.
Khola kimilimo ne kamaani ne mukhaba bakara tawe. Kholela Omwami kimilimo ne kumwoyo kwe khu khweana khukali.
Lekha lilieyikina lienywe limuelesie kumwikhoyo, ba babefwiilisia mu minaanio kienywe, mala saba biise bioosi.
Saanga mu miaandu kienywe ne bakristo basienywe bakhali nabio tawe, ne yikula chingo chenywe chakaanile bakeni.
Sangaala ne nabo bali basangaafu, lila ne nabo balikho ne balila.
Menya mu buambaani, buli mulala ne owasie. Mukhaba be kisuunia tawe, ne fukiilila kimilimo kie khukhweboombia. Mukheyibaasia mwabeene nga be limanya tawe.
Omundu yesi yesi ne akhukholele kamabi, okhamuruungia ne kamabi kakaandi tawe. Khaka khukhola niko buli mundu ebaasia ali kali kamalayi.
Khola koosi niko onyala lubeka lwowo omenye mu muleembe ne buli mundu.
Basaale base, mukharuungia bubi khu bubi tawe, ne kakhali lekhela lirima lia Wele likhole lirio. Sikila liiandiko liboola lili, “Omwami aboola ali, Ndeyacha, ndaruungia.”
Ne khali, nga liiandiko liboola: “Omusiku wowo aaba ne ali ne njala, mue alie, aaba ne ali ne bulesia, muelesie sie khunywa, sikila khulwe khukhola murio, mulamuambia chisoni,”
mukhalekha kamamayaanu kamuula enywe tawe, ne khali muule kamamayaanu khulwe khukhola kamalayi.

Buli mundu khukhwola arie be bunyali mu serekari, sikila bunyali se bunyala bwabao ne bukhamile khu Wele tawe, ne bunyali buliio, bwareebwao ne Wele.
Omundu yesi yesi oyingania bunyali buliio ayingania niko Wele arobobore, ne omundu yesi yesi okhola ario ereerera omwene likhalakilwa.
Sikila bakhola kamalayi se baria babaami tawe, ne kakhali bakhola kamamayaanu nibo baria. Wenya olekhe khuba ne buuri khu baami? Nono, khola kali kamalayi, mala balakhufumia,
sikila bali bakholi ba Wele bakhola kimilimo nio ewe obe bulayi. Ne waaba nokhola kamamayaanu, barie sikila bunyali bwabwe bwe khuaana khuukuuma buli ng'ali. Bali bakholi ba Wele mala baananga siiukuumo sia Wele khwaabo bakholanga kamamayaanu.
Khulwe sifuno sino khukhwola murie be bunyali. Ne semuria busa sikila siiukuumo sia Wele tawe, ne kakhali muria khulwe khuba ne kumuleembe mu mebaasio ke mu miooyo kienywe.
Elio nilio likila ne muruunganga busuuru, sikila babaami be bunyali balikho bakholela Wele kimilimo nga ne balikho ne bakhola kimilimo kiabwe.
Baruunge nibio benya, yeruungila wamwene ne kimiaandu kiowo mala wekesie buriaani khu nibo boosi.
Mukhaba ne likobi liosi liosi khu mundu tawe, nekhali mube ne likobi lie khusiimana buli mundu ne owasie. Omundu yesi yesi okholanga ario aria Lilaka.
Kamalaka, “Okhakhola bueeyi tawe, okhera tawe, okheba tawe, okhekoomba sio wasio tawe” kano koosi, ne kakaandi kosi kosi kali alala nako, katasibwa alala mala kaba Lilaka lilala, “Siima owasio nga ne wesiima wamweene.”
Waaba nosiima omundu yesi yesi, sonyala wamukholela kamabi tawe, nono, khuli khuria Lilaka lioosi khuli khusiima.
Khukhwola mukhole lino, sikila manya muli siise siamwolilekho khu sisimukha khukhwama mwilo lienywe. Sikila siise sie khuonisibwa khwefwe sili siimbi luno khukhila nga mataayi ne khwasuubila lwe khunyoa.
Silo sili siimbi khuwao, kumuusi kuli siimbi ano. Khekhwakame khukhola bibiindu bie sisiilima, mala khubukule bulwaani bwe khukhupanila mu buwaanga.
Likeenda liefwe libe lilayi, nga babaandu bamenyile mu buwaanga bwe kumuusi, likhabao lilia lie sifwaabi namwe bumeesi tawe, sifwaabi namwe liba libi, khu khuupana namwe khukhalikhililwa tawe.
Ne kakhali bukula bulwaani bwo Mwami Yesu Kristo, mala mukharekeeresia ke liba lienywe lie bubwoni ne khukhola ke liliekoomba lialio tawe.

Lisuubila lio mundu mulala limufukiilila khulia siindu siosi siosi, ne omundu oli omutekhele mu lisuubila alia chinyenyi chong'ene.
Omundu olichanga buli siindu akhalekelesia okhalia tawe, ne olichanga chinyenyi chong'ene akhakhalakila olia buli siindu tawe, sikila Wele amufukiilila.
Ewe niwe naanu okhalakila omukholi wo mundu okundi? Omwami wewe omwene niye olibisia, omukholi wewe oyo nalibira namwe nalikwa. Ne alibira, sikila Omwami anyala khumukhola abire.
Omundu mulala ebaasianga ali endaalo nabulebe eyo eli emboofu khukhila chindaalo chichiindi, ne okundi naye ebaasia ali chindaalo choosi chili chifwaanane. Buli mundu akhoyela khukhola bukhalaki bwewe.
Oyo owibaasilia endaalo na bulebe khuba emboofu akholanga ario mu khuria Omwami, yesi yesi olia sisiindu siosi siosi akholanga ario mu lukoosi lwo Mwami, sikila aanilanga Wele orio khulwe siakhulia. Yesi yesi olobanga khulia bibiindu nabulebe, akholanga ario khuria Omwami, mala aanila Wele orio.
Se aliio omundu khwifwe omenyanga khu lienya liewe liong'ene tawe, namwe se aliio omundu khwifwe ofwa khu lienya liewe omwene yeng'ene tawe.
Sikila ne khumenya, aba khumenya sikila Omwami ne khufwa, aba khufwa khulwo Mwami. Nono khwakhamenya namwe khwakhafwa khuli bo Mwami.
Sikila Kristo afwa mala alamukha, nio abe Omwami we balamu ne bafu.
Nono ewe, olichanga chinyenyi chong'ene siina sikila nobisia likhalaka khu wandaayo? Ne ewe olichanga sisiindu siosi siosi, siina sikila nolekelesia wandaayo? Fweesi khuliima ebweeni wa Wele akhukhalakile.
Sikila liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Omwami aboolanga ali,
nga ng'ali nendi Wele omenyile mindali
buli sia mulala alisikama ebweeni wase,
mala buli mundu alifukiilila ali ese ndi Wele.”
Nono, buli mulala khwifwe, aliboola kakewe omwene khu Wele.
Nono, khekhulekhe khukhalakanila. Ne kakhali, mwolaane khukhalaka khulekha, khukholakho sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala siakhola wandaayefwe etuya namwe akhola bubwoni.
Buambaani bwase no Mwami Yesu bukholanga mba ne ng'ali ndi siakhulia se siliio siosi siosi sili sinyaalu khu siene busa tawe omundu aba nasuubilanga ali siakhulia silala sili sinyaalu, nono aba siikela sinyaalu khu niye.
Waaba nonyaala wandaayo sikila siakhulia nisio olichanga, aba solakholanga khulwe busiime tawe. Okhalekha siakhulia nisio olia sionaka omundu niye Kristo afwila tawe!
Okhalekha nisio obukulanga khuba silayi siaba ne lisina libi tawe.
Sikila bubwami bwa Wele se buli sisiindu sie khulia ne khunywa busa tawe, ne kakhali buli bwe buluungi, kumuleembe, ne kumwikhoyo nikwo Roho Omutakatifu aananga.
Ne babaandu ne bakhalabanila Kristo mu ngila yino, basiimisia Wele ne khufukiililwa ne babaandi.
Nono, khukhwola buli lwoosi khwiluungikhe bibiindu bireera kumuleembe ne biyeeta khukhola omundu okundi aba ne kamaani.
Okhonaka nisio Wele akholile sikila siakhulia tawe. Biakhulia bioosi binyala bialiibwa, ne kakhali lili likhiika khulia sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala siakhola omundu okundi akhola bubwoni.
Sisiindu silayi sili khulekha khulia enyama, khunywa endali, namwe khukhola sisiindu siosi siosi sinyala siakwiisia wandaayo.
Nono siosi siosi nisio wasuubila mu makhuwa kano lekha sibe akari wowo ne Wele. Omundu okheulilanga ali ali ne kumusaango tawe ali ne khabi, ne alikho akhola sisiindu siosi siosi nisio akhalakanga ali sili siluungi!
Ne aba ne aayaayanga khu nisio alichanga, aba Wele amubiiyanga nga nasilia sikila sikholwa siewe se sili khuloondekhana ne lisuubila tawe. Ne sisiindu siosi siosi sikhali khuloondekhana ne lisuubila tawe, sili bubwoni.

Efwe khuli be kamaani mu lisuubila khwolaana khuyeete batekhele khulwe khubukula busiro bwabwe. Khukhesiimisia fwabeene tawe.
Ne kakhali, fweesi khwolaana khusiimisie bawandaayefwe khulwe bulayi bwabwe, babeene nio khwole khubombakha mu lisuubila.
Sikila Kristo se esiimisia omwene tawe. Ne kakhali nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Bukhomo nibwo bakhukhoma ewe bwakwa khwise.”
Buli sisiindu sisiaandikwa mu maandiko siaandikwa khukhwikisia efwe, nio khwolaane khuba ne lilieyikina khubirira mu lifwiilisia ne khuramo kumwoyo nibio kamaandiko kaananga.
Ne Wele niye, liliefwiilisia ne khuramo kumwoyo biamangakho, amukhole enywe mube ne buambaani khu mwabeene ne mwabeene khulwe khuloonda likhola lia Kristo Yesu,
nio enywe mweesi alala mwole khufumia Wele lundi Paapa owo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo ne kumumilo mulala.
Nono, yakaanilana mwabeene ne mwabeene, khulwe luyali lwa Wele, nga Kristo amwakaanile enywe.
Sikila muboolela ndi bulamu bwe bukholi bwa Kristo bwaba khulwe Bayaudi, khukhwekesia khuli Wele ali omusuubilwa, khukhola lisuubisia liewe khu bakuuka babwe libe ng'ali,
ne khukhola akhaba Be Chikholo banyale khufumia Wele khulwe siisa siewe. Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Nono khakhufumie ewe
mu Be Chikholo.”
Ndimba efuma eye lisina liowo.
Lundi liiandiko liboola lili, “Yekhoya, Be Chikholo, ne babaandu ba Wele!”
babaandu mwesi mufumie!”
“Owe lisaaye lia Chesi alicha,
alicha khukhwamiia Be Chikholo, mala balimweyikina.”
Wele niye lilieyikina liakukhakho oole khumwichusia enywe ne kumwikhoyo kwoosi ne kumuleembe khubirira mu lisuubila lienywe mu niye, nio lilieyikina lienywe lichiililile khuchoa khulwe bunyali bwa Roho Omutakatifu.
Bawandaayase. Ese samwene ne ulila ng'ali ndi enywe muli ne bulayi bukali, ndi muli ne bukesi bwoosi, mala mwabeene munyala khukhwekisiana.
Ne mu barwa yino nabeele ne bunyindaafu khulwe kamakhuwa nabulebe niko mukhebusie enywe. Nabeele omunyindaafu sikila bubweyaangu nibwo Wele ambelesie
khulwe khuba omukholi owa Yesu Kristo khukholela Be Chikholo. Khola nga omusaayi mu khwilwacha Elomo Endayi khukhwama khu Wele, nio Be Chikholo boole khuba siianwa sifukiililwa khu Wele, sisiianwa khu niye ne Roho Omutakatifu.
Nono, mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, nyala nesuunia khulwe bukholi bwase khulwa Wele.
Ndaba Omunyindaafu mala ndomalome khu niko Kristo akholile kong'ene khubirira mwise khukhola Be Chikholo barie Wele. Akholile kano khubirira mu makhuwa ne bikholwa,
khulwe bunyali bwe kamaya nende ke khuukia, ne khulwe bunyali bwa Roho owa Wele. Nono, khu lukeendo lwoosi khukhwama Yerusalemu khukhwola Iluriko, nelwachile elala Elomo Endayi khu Kristo.
Silukuluku siase buli lwoosi sibechanga khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi abuundu niio bakhaulilakho Kristo tawe, nio khakholandio nombakha khu musiingi nikwo omundu okundi ombakha tawe.
Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili,
“Abo nibo bakhaboolela kakewe
tawe, balibona, ne abo bakhaulila tawe balimanyilisia.”
Ne luno nga ne malile kimilimo kiase mungoongo chino lundi nga nama khwenyanga khulwe kimiiko kimikali niche mubone enywe,
neyikina khukhola ndio luno. Nenya khumubona enywe nendi khu lukeendo lwe khucha Sipeini, mala nenya munjeete nje eyo, enyuma we khukhwekhoyela khumubona enywe khulwe siise.
Ne luno luri, ndikho nja Yerusalemu mu bukholi bwe babaandu ba Wele ebweeneyo.
Sikila mu bulekhuule chikanisa mu Masedonia ne Akaya chabisia khuaana siianwa khuyeeta bataambi mu baandu ba Wele mu Yerusalemu.
Libisia elio liaba liliabwe babeene, ne, khulwa ng'ali, bakhoyela babayeeta nibo. Sikila Bayaudi basaanga mu khabi chabwe cha Roho nende Be Chikholo. Be Chikholo bolaana khurumikhira chikhabi che kimiaandu khuyeeta Bayaudi.
Nga ne khamale kimilimo kino mala mbaelesie chirupia choosi chiaanibwe khu nibo, kharakikhe lukeendo lwe khucha Sipeini ne khamukeniye enywe nendi khu lukeendo lwenolu.
Nga nekheche khwinywe, manyile ndi kheche ne sikelo sisichufu sie chikhabi cha Kristo.
Bawandaayase ese muchuuba enywe, khulwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo ne khulwe busiime nibwo Roho aananga. Ambaana ne nase khusabe ne kumwoyo kwoosi khu Wele, sikila ese.
Saba muli ndindwe bulayi khukhwama khu bakhasuubila tawe, bali mu Buyuda mala bukholi bwase mu Yerusalemu bwoole khufukiililwa ne babaandu ba Wele ebweeneyo.
Ne kheche khwinywe mu bwichufu bwe kumwikhoyo, liaba ne lili lilienya lia Wele, mala nekhoye khuolela mu bukeni ewenywe.
Wele, niye kumuleembe kwefwe kwamakho, ole khuba alala ne nanywe mwesi. Amina.

Siima khumuboolela ndi yaaya Fwepe okholelanga e kanisa eya Senjirea ali omulayi.
Mwakaanile mu lisina lio Mwami, nga babaandu ba Wele bakhoyeela khukhola, mala mu muelesie buyeeti bwosi bwosi nibwo wakana enya khukhwama khwinywe, sikila niye omwene abeele omusaale omulayi khu baandu bakali akhaba khwise sesi.
Kheesia Pirisila ne Akwila, bakholi basiaase mu bukholi bwa Yesu Kristo,
beana bulamu bwabwe embi khufwa sikila ese. Mbapila orio lukali po, ne sendi seng'ene tawe, akhaba chikanisa che Be Chikholo choosi.
Kheesia akhaba e kanisa eyakaananilanga munju mwabwe.
Kheesia omusaale wase omukoosi Painito, owaba omundu we khunyoa mungoongo cha Esia khu suubila mu Kristo.
Kheesia Maria, omukholeele enywe kimilimo ne kamaani.
Kheesia akhaba Androniko ne Yunia, Bayaudi basiaase ba baaba mu siboe alala ne nase, bamanyikhana lukali mu barumwa, lundi nibo baba bakristo ebweeni wase ese ne khaba tawe.
Kimileembe kiase kiolele Ambiliato, omusaale wase omukoosi mu busaanganilo bwo Mwami.
Kheesia akhaba Uribano, yesi omukholi wasiefwe mu bukholi bwa Kristo, ne kheesia akhaba Sitakisi, omusaale wase omukoosi.
Kheesia Apele, niye buriaani bwewe khu Kristo bufukiililwe. Kheesia be nju eya Arisitobulo.
Kheesia Herotioni, Omuyuda wasiefwe, ne bawandaayefwe bakristo be nju eya Narikiso.
Kheselie Trufena ne Trufosa, bakholanga kimilimo kio Mwami, ne lundi kheesia omusaale wase omukoosi Perisisi, okholile kimilimo kimikali po, khu lwo Mwami.
Nduma kimileembe khu Rufo, omukholi owamanyikhana oyo mu bukholi bwo Mwami, ne khu maawe, oumbukulanga ese buli lwosi nga omwana wewe.
Kheesia Asingirito, Fulekoni, Herimesi, Patiropa, Harima ne bawandaayefwe bakristo babaandi boosi bali nabo.
Kimileembe khu Fulolokasi ne Chulia, khu Nerea no mukooko wewe, khu Olimba ne khu baandu ba Wele boosi nibo bali nabo.
Khesiana mwabeene ne mwabeene mu khwekwayilana. Chikanisa cha Kristo choosi chamukheesiisie.
Bawandaayase, muchuuba ndi loleelesia abo bareera liliabukhana ne babonaka lisuubila lie babaandu ne khukhwonaka kamekisio niko mwanyoolile. Yaukhana ne nabo!
Sikila abo bakholanga bibiindu nga ebio birio se balikho bakholela Omwami wefwe Kristo tawe, nekhali kumuluungo kwabwe babeene. Batiimia babaandu baluungi khulwe kamakhuwa kabwe kamalayi ne lilomaloma liabwe lie khuombelesia.
Buli mundu auliile buriaani bwenywe khu Lomo Endayi, ne khulwe sifuno sino ese namusangaaliile. Nenya mube ne limanya khu kali kamalayi, mala mube mukhamanyile koosi kali kamamayaanu tawe.
Ne embi ari Wele, niye kumuleembe kwefwe kwamakho alatubundulakila Sietani mu bikele bienywe. Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu kube ne nanywe.
Ese, Taritio, omuandiki we barwa yino, namurumiire kimileembe kia Kristo.
Kayo owanjakanila omwenenju niyo e kanisa yakaananilangamo, amurumira kimileembe kiewe. Rasito, omubiikhi we chirupia che Lukoba luno, ne wandaayefwe Kwarito bamurumira kimileembe kiabwe. [
Kumwalaalo kwo Omwami wefwe Kristo kube nanywe mwesi. Amina.]
Khekhuelesie Wele luyali! Anyala khumukhola enywe mwatinya mu lisuubila lienywe, khuloondekhana ne Elomo Endayi eya Yesu Kristo niyo nilwacha ne khuloondekhana khu lifuunula lie bung'ali bubwakukhuulilwa mu mase kamakali kakabira.
Luno, bung'ali obwo bwarerirwe abuwaanga khubirira mu maandiko ke bang'oosi, lundi bwakholiibwe khumanyikha khu kholo choosi, khulwe Lilaka lia Wele owa mindali nio boosi boole khusuubila ne khuria.
Khu Wele ooli yeng'ene, oli we limanya khu bioosi abe ne luyali khubirira mu Yesu Kristo mindali na mindali! Amina.

Khukhwama khu Paulo, owalaangwa khubirira mu lienya lia Wele khuba omurumwa owa Kristo Yesu, lundi khukhwama khu wandaayefwe Sositini.
Wele Paapa wefwe no Mwami Yesu Kristo bamuelesie enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Buli lwoosi ese khupilanga Wele wase orio sikila enywe khulwe kumwalaalo nikwo amuelesie khubirira mu Yesu Kristo.
Khulwe buambaani bwenywe ne Kristo mwabeele baiinda mu biindu bioosi, mu lilomaloma ne mu bukesi bwoosi.
Burume khu makhuwa ka Kristo bwaandalasiibwe lukali mwinywe,
se mwatambile siianwa sia Roho siosi siosi tawe, nga mulindiililanga lukali Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo afunulibwe.
Lundi akhamuandalasie khukhwola khu siakamo nio mukhaba ne buubi bwosi bwosi mu ndaalo yo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo tawe.
Wele ali omusuubilwa. Ali niye owamulaanga enywe khusaanga no Mwana wewe Yesu Kristo, Omwami wefwe.
Mu bunyali bwo Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo mwikoonjelela enywe mweesi, bawandaayase, mufukiilisiane mu niko muboolana, nio bubwaukhani bulekhe khubao mwinywe. Ambaanila elala, mube ne kamebaasio malala kong'ene, ne sifuno silala.
Basaale babaandu balala khukhwama munju eya Kuloe, bambooleele ese abuwaanga busa, bali bulomani buli mwinywe.
Lekha ndome ndi, buli mulala mwinywe alomanga sisiindu sisiaukhaane, mulala alomanga ali, “Ese owa Paulo,” okundi ali, “Ese owa Apolo,” okundi ali, “Ese owa Petero,” ne okundi ali, “Ese owa Kristo”
Kristo akabukhasiibwe mu bipupu! Aba Paulo niye owamufwiila enywe khu musalaba ku? Enywe mwabatiisibwa nga babeeka ba Paulo ku?
Se aliio na mulala nono, onyala aaloma ali mwabatiisibwa nga babeeka base tawe.
(Ee ng'ali nabatiisia akhaba Sitefano nende be nju yewe yong'ene ne se khebulila ne nabatiisiakho okundi yesi yesi tawe.)
Kristo se aanduma khubatiisia tawe. Aanduma khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi, mala ndekhe khukilwacha ne ndumikhira lulomo lwe bukesi bwe babaandu, nio kabe ng'ali kali lifwa lia Kristo khu musalaba se linuulwa bunyali bwalio tawe.
Sikila burume bwe lifwa lia Kristo khu musalaba buli busilu khwaabo balikho ne batiba, ne khwifwe khulikho ne khuonisibwa buli bunyali bwa Wele.
Liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Ndonaka bukesi bwe bakesi
Mala nde alubeka limanya liaabo babasoma.”
Nono, ako kalekha bakesi, namwe babasoma waena? Namwe ba bamanya khuyingana be mu sibala sino? Wele ekeesie ali bukesi bwe sibala sino buli busilu!
Sikila Wele mu bukesi bwewe akhola lilekhe khunyalikhana khu baandu khu mumanya niye khulwe bukesi bwabwe bubwene tawe. Ne kakhali, khulwe burume nibwo khwilwacha bulaangwa buli “busilu,” Wele abisia khuonia abo basuubila.
Bayaudi benya kamayia nga sisiekesio ne Bakiriki baenja bukesi.
Ne kakhali khwifwe, khwilwacha Kristo owabambwa, burume buno bukhalasia Bayaudi lundi buli busilu khu Be Chikholo,
ne khwaabo nibo Wele alaangile, Bayaudi alala nende Be Chikholo, burume buno buli Kristo, Kristo oli bunyali bwa Wele ne bukesi bwa Wele.
Sikila sibonekha khuba busilu bwa Wele sili sie bukesi khukhila bukesi bwo mundu, ne sibonekha khuba butekhele bwa Wele sili sie kamaani khukhila kamaani ko mundu.
Bawandaayase, luno khebulila nga mwaba, nga Wele ne amulaanga. Mu khulola khwo mundu bakeekhe mwinywe mwaba bakesi, namwe be bunyali, namwe babasaalwa munju eye buriaani,
Wele mu sifuno siewe arobora nibo sibala sibaasia sili basilu nio aambie bakesi chisoni, lundi arobora nibo sibala sibaasia khuuba batekhele nio aambie be bunyali chisoni.
Arobora nibio sibala silolela mu bufuumbo ne lifwochola ne sibaasia sili se bili siindu tawe, nio onake nibio sibala sibaasia sili bili ne bukhala.
Kano kekesia kali se aliio na mulala onyala webonia ebweeni wa Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele amureerire enywe mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, lundi Wele akholile Kristo khuba bukesi bwefwe. Khulwa niye khukholwa khuba baluungi ebweeni wa Wele, khuba batakatifu ba Wele lundi balekhuule.
Nono, nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Oyo yesi yesi owenya khukhwibonia khukhwola ebonie khu niko Omwami akholile.”

Bawandaayase, nga ne necha mwinywe khukhwilwacha bung'ali bwa Wele nibwo mwaba ne mukhamanyile tawe, se narumikhira kamakhuwa kamaboofu ne busomi bwe angaaki tawe.
Sikila nga naba nanywe, nakhalaka khukhwibilila buli siindu, khurusiakho Yesu Kristo yeng'ene, ne lukali lifwa liewe khu musalaba.
Nono nga necha mwinywe, naba omutekhele lundi naterema kumubili kwoosi khulwe buuri,
ne liliekisia liase ne burume se biaboolwa ne kamakhuwa ke busicha bwe bukesi bwo mundu busa tawe, ne kakhali ne simanyisio sie kamaani ka Roho owa Wele.
Nio, lisuubila lienywe, lilekhe khwima khu bukesi bwo mundu tawe, ne kakhali lime khulwe kamaani ka Wele.
Nilwacha burume bwe bukesi khwaabo baali bakhulu mu lisuubila. Ne kakhali se buli bukesi bwe sibala sino namwe bwe bubwami bubwamiia sibala sino, bubwami bulatibianga kamaani kabwo tawe.
Bukesi nibwo nilwacha buli bukesi bwa Wele bwe mu bwikisi, nibwo aarobora khale khulwe luyali lwefwe sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe.
Se alikhoo na mulala khu baami be sibala sino owamanya bukesi buno tawe. Abanga babumanya andi se babaamba khu musalaba Omwami owe luyali tawe.
Kakhaba kario, nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili,
“Nisio yesi yesi akhabonakho namwe aulila tawe,
nisio yesi yesi akhebaasiakho ali siliikholekha tawe,
sili sisiene ne sisiene nisio Wele aarekekha khulwa abo ba bamusiima niye.”
Ne kakhali Wele akhumanyisia efwe burume bwewe bwe mu bwikisi khubirira mu Roho wewe, Roho ayimilisianga buli siindu, akhaba bibiindu bibiekisa bie sifuno sia Wele.
Ali roho owo mundu yeng'ene mu niye omanyanga kakewe koosi, ne mu ngila ng'eneyo, Roho owa Wele yeng'ene niye omanyanga ka Wele koosi.
Se khwanyoola roho owe sibala sino tawe, ne kakhali khwanyoola Roho owarumwa ne Wele, nio khumanye bioosi nibio Wele akhuelesia efwe.
Nono, se khulomaloma mu makhuwa kakekisibwa ne bukesi bwo mundu busa tawe, ne kakhali khulomaloma kamakhuwa kakekisibwa ne Roho, nga ne khwinoosia bung'ali bwe mu roho khwaabo baali ne Roho.
Yesi yesi okhali ne Roho tawe, se anyala anyoola biianwa bibiaama khu Roho owa Wele tawe. Omundu nga yuno ng'ali sabimanya tawe, bili bie busilu khu niye, sikila bukhala bwabio bumanyikha busa khubirira mu roho mwong'ene.
Yesi yesi oli ne Roho, anyala khumanya bukhala bwa buli siindu, ne se aliio onyala amukhalakila niye tawe.
Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili,
“Naanu owamanya liliibaasia lio Mwami?
Naanu onyala amukaambila niye?”
Ne kakhali efwe khuli ne
liliibaasia lia Kristo.

Bawandaayase, ese ng'ali ndoma ndi, se nalomaloma khwinywe nga olomaloma khu baandu bakhulu bali ne Roho tawe. Nalomaloma khwinywe nga olomaloma khu bali mu mubili, nga babaana bang'aalie mwisuubila lie bukristo.
Namunywesia enywe kamabeele, se biaba biakhulia biiandalafu tawe, sikila se mwaba ne mu biirekekheere tawe. Ne akhaba luno luri mukhabiirekekhera tawe,
sikila musimenya nga babaandu be sibala. Likhendekha ne bulomani biaba ne bili mwinywe aba lino se liekesia lili muli be sibala sino mala mu menyile nga baandu babaandi bosi ne bamenyile?
Mulala khwinywe ne aloma ali, “Ese owa Paulo,” ne okundi ali “Ese owa Apolo” aba se mulikho mukhola nga babaandu be sibala busa ta ku?
Ne, Apolo niye naanu? Namwe Paulo niye naanu? Khuli busa bakholi ba Wele, khubirira mu abo ba bamukhola mwasuubila. Buli sia mulala khwifwe akholanga kimilimo nikio Omwami amuelesia khukhola.
Ese namiicha lumiicho, Apolo achukhiilila lwamela, ne kakhali Wele niye owakhola siachoa.
Oyo omiicha, ne noyo ochukhiilila, ng'ali se balikho siindu tawe. Wele niye akholanga sisiamela siachoa.
Oyo omiicha ne noyo ochukhiilila bali ne sifuno silala. Ne buli mulala akhanyoole kumuruuru khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiewe.
Sikila efwe khuli bakholi alala ne Wele, ne enywe muli kumukuunda kwa Wele. Lundi enywe muli liliombakho lia Wele.
Khuloondekhana ne kumwalaalo nikwo Wele amba, nakhola kimilimo kio mwombakhi omusicha lukali, lundi nombakha kumusiingi kwe liliombakho mala omundu okundi alikho ombakhakho. Ne kakhali buli sia mulala khukhwola aloleelesie bulayi nga ne ombakha.
Sikila se aliio omundu yesi yesi onyala arao kumusiingi kukuundi tawe, ne kukhali kukwarebwao khale kuuli Yesu Kristo.
Nono omundu yesi yesi ne arumikhira esahabu namwe efwesa, kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki, chimbao, bunyaasi namwe chikhanja khwombakha khu musiingi okwo.
Buli mulimo kwo mundu, kulibonekhana sikila Endaalo eya Kristo elikibakala abuwaanga. Sikila khu Ndaalo ng'eneyo kumulilo kulibuula buli mulimo kwa buli mundu. Kumulilo kulikhaka kwekesie, ng'ali kuli kumulimo kwa lukano siina.
Ne omwombakhi akhanyoole kumuruuru kaaba bali nisio ombaakhe se siya tawe.
Ne kaaba bali kumulimo kwo mundu yesi yesi kwosibwa, aba alitibia kumuruuru kwewe, ne niye omwene alionisibwa nga owibachile khubirira mu mulilo.
Nono, omundu yesi yesi aaba ne onaka Lukaangu lwa Wele, Wele akhamwonake niye. Sikila Lukaangu lwa Wele luli lutakatifu, ne enywe mwabeene muli Lukaangu olwo.
Omundu yesi yesi akhesilwasia tawe. Mulala mwinywe aaba ne ebaasianga ali, ali omukesi khulwe bikelo bie sibala sino akhoyeele ebukule khuba omusilu, nio abe omukesi ng'ali.
Sikila niko sibala sino sibaasia khuba bukesi, buli busilu ebweeni wa Wele. Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Wele arekanga bakesikesi mu bukesi bwabwe,”
ne liiandiko liliindi liboola lili, “Omwami aamanyile ali kamebaasio ke bakesikesi kali ka busa.”
Yesi yesi nono akhabao onyala weboneselia khu niko babaandu banyala bakhola tawe. Ng'ali buli siindu sili sisienywe.
Abeele Paulo, namwe Apolo, namwe Petero, namwe sibala sino, namwe bulamu ne lifwa, namwe bia luno nende bie chindaalo chichiicha, bino bioosi bili bibienywe,
ne enywe muli ba Kristo, ne Kristo ali owa Wele.

Mukhoyeele mwakhwibaasia efwe nga bakholi ba Kristo, bamalile khuelesebwa bung'ali bwa Wele bubwekisa.
Sisiindu sisienyekha khu mukholi nga yuno sili abe omusuubilwa khu Mwami wewe.
Luno se mbukulamo lukeendo khukhalakilwa ne nanywe namwe ne sikelo siosi siosi sio omundu tawe. Lundi se nikhalakila samwene tawe.
Se ndikho ne siiukuumo mu mwoyo mwase tawe, ne kakhali elio se liekesia lili ese se ndikho ne kamabi tawe. Omwami omwene niye obisia likhalaka khwise.
Nono se mukhoyeele mwakhalakila omundu yesi yesi siise sisienyekha ne sikhoola tawe. Likhalaka limaliilisi liliinda khukhwola nga Omwami naliicha, alibuula abuwaanga bimoonyo bie musiilima ne khura abuwaanga bifuno bibiekisa bie mumebaasio ke babaandu. Mala buli mundu alinyoola khukhwama khu Wele efuma niyo akhoyeele anyoole.
Bawandaayase, sikila enywe, narumikhiire Apolo ne samwene, mu kano koosi nga simanyisio, nio mweyike niko lusimo lwekisia luli, “Loonda kamalaka kamalayi.” Akhabao mwinywe owebonia khu mundu mulala mala amochelesie okundi tawe.
Naanu wamukhola enywe bakhoongo khu baandi? Se ali Wele owamuelesia enywe buli siindu nisio muli nasio tawe ku? Kaaba kario nono, munyala mwebonia muriena, oli muloma muli nibio muli nabio, se bili siianwa khukhwama khu Wele tawe?
Muli khale nabuli siindu nisio mwenya? Muli khale baiinda? Mwekelile babaami, akhaba efwe ne khukhali babaami tawe? Bulayi, nikoomba ndi andi ng'ali muli babaami, nio efwe khube babaami alala ne nanywe.
Sikila ese mbona ndi, Wele akhuelesie efwe barumwa bubweyaangu bumaliilisi, nga babaandu bakhalakilwe khufwila mu baandu sikila khwabeele nga siloli khu sibala sioosi, khu ba malaika nende sie babaandu.
Efwe khuli basilu sikila Kristo, ne kakhali enywe muli bakesi mu buambaani ne Kristo, efwe khuli batekhele, ne enywe muli be kamaani! Efwe bakhumocha, ne kakhali enywe bamukoosia!
Khukhwola siise sino khukeenda ne njala ne bulesia, khwafwarire chingubo chichatabukha, khupwa, khuyiiyayiiya,
khulua khulwe kimilimo kimiiandalafu. Ne khulaamwa khubiita chikhabi, ne nga khupisibwa siibi khwikhaliilikha,
ne khukhomwa, khukobosia ne kamakhuwa kamalayi, khubalikha busa nga eng'uunda eye sibala sino, khuli kamaandu ke khu sibala khukhwola siise sino!
Se muandikila kano, sikila bali nenya khumuambia enywe chisoni tawe, ne kakhali, khumwekisia nga babaana base basiime.
Sikila akhaba bali muli ne baliindi chielefu ekhumi mu limenya lienywe lie Bukristo, muli busa ne raraawenywe mulala yeng'ene. Sikila mu limenya lienywe mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo ese nabeele Paapa wenywe khulwe khumureerera enywe Elomo Endayi
Mwekoonjelela enywe nono, mulolele khwise.
Khulwe sifuno sino ndikho nduma Timoteo khwinywe, oli omwana wase omusiime lundi omusuubilwa mu limenya lie Bukristo. Akhamukhebusie enywe kamekisio niko ese nondaanga mu limenya liiya mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, lundi niko nikisianga mu chikanisa choosi buli abuundu.
Balala mwinywe mwakwile be sileka sikila mwebasisienge muli abeele ese se khamukenie enywe tawe.
Omwami aaba ne enya, ese khamukenie embi ari, mala samwene khebonele bunyali nibwo babaandu be sileka bano bali nabwo, kakhaba niko baloma busa tawe.
Sikila Bubwami bwa Wele se buli sisiindu sie kamakhuwa busa tawe, buli bwe bunyali.
Silala siina nisio mwenya? Niiche ne kumukhomwa namwe niiche ne kumwoyo kwe busiime ne buolu?

Nono munyala mwebonia muriena? Ne kakhali, mukhoyeele mwaba ne bubeeleli, mala omundu okholile sisiindu sie lukano luno arusibwe mu busaangi bwenywe.
Ne akhaba ne ndi aleeyi nanywe mu mubili, siili busa nanywe mu roho, lundi ndi nga oliyo ne nanywe, mu lisina lio Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo nabisiisie khale likhalaka khu mundu okholile sisiindu sie chisoni sino.
Nga ne mwakaanana alala, nga nakaanana nanywe mu mwoyo kwase, ne khulwe bunyali bwo Mwami wefwe Yesu buli alala ne nafwe,
mukhoyeele mwakaanisie omundu yuno khu Sietani onakake kumubili kwewe, nio kumwoyo kwewe kwole khuonisibwa mu Ndaalo yo Mwami.
Khukhwola mwinyosieo limela litaayi lie bubwoni nio mube bakwalaafu lukali. Nio mube nga sipakhilo sie sifu siiya sikhalimo limela tawe, ng'ali manyile ndi muli murio. Sikila naikara eye Epasaka yefwe yoolile, sikila luno Kristo, limeeme lie Epasaka yefwe, aaniilwe nga embosio.
Lekha khusangaalile Epasaka yefwe, se kuli ne kumukaati kulimo kamamela kamakhale ke bubwoni ne bubi tawe, ne kakhali ne kumukaati kukhalimo kamamela tawe, kumukaati kwe bukwalaafu ne bung'ali.
Mu barwa niyo namuandikila enywe namuboolela ndi mukhaambaana ne babaandu be sifwaabi tawe.
Nono se nekesia ndi bakhamanyile Wele nibo bali be sifwaabi, namwe balianga, namwe bali babefwi, namwe banuuli, namwe babesaaya bifwaani tawe. Abanga kario andi mukhoyeele khukhwinyokhela elala mu sibala.
Niko nekisia kali, mulekhe khuambaana no mundu owilanga ali omusuubili mu Kristo ne khana ali owe sifwaabi, namwe omulianga, namwe osaaya bifwaani, namwe owe bitina, namwe omumeesi, namwe omwifwi. Mukhekhalakho khu siaalwa silala no mundu nga oyo ario tawe.
Kakhaba kario ng'ali, se kali kakaase khukhalakila be nje tawe.
Wele akhabakhalakile. Ne enywe se munyala mwakhalakila babaandu be lisaanga lienywe mwabeene ta ku? Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili, “Timania omundu omumayaanu mu mukaanda kwenywe.”

Mulala mwinywe aba nalomana no mukristo wasie, anyala acha ariena khu bakhalaki bakhasuubila tawe, mala alobe khulekhela babaandu ba Wele bamuyaasie?
Mukhamanya muli babaandu ba Wele balikhalakila sibala tawe? Ne nono, kaaba bali munyala mwakhalakila sibala se munyala mwarusia bukhalaki mu biindu bikeekhe tawe ku?
Mukhamanya muli khulikhalakila ne malaika tawe? Nono, aba bibiindu bie mu bulamu buno khubikhalakila!
Ne kaaba bali kamakhuwa nga kano kechao, mulakayila khuyaswa ne babaandu bakhamanyikhaane mu Kanisa tawe?
Chisoni chibe khwinywe! Ng'ali, omundu akhaba mulala omukesi mu busaangi bwenywe onyala wakaya bulomani akari we bakristo aliio.
Ne kakhali omukristo mulala ayila owasie mu koti mala alekhela bakhasuubila mu Wele khurusia bukhalaki tawe!
Khusitakana mwabene khu mwabene khwekesia khuli mwakhiliilwe elala. Se bwakhabeele bulayi busa khwinywe khukholelwa kamabi tawe ku? Se bwakhabeele bulayi khwinywe akhaba khunuulwa?
Ne kakhali enywe mukholanila kamabi ne khunuulana, munuula akhaba bawandaayenywe babeene!
Ng'ali mumanyile muli babooni se balinyoola Bubwami bwa Wele tawe. Mukheesilwasia tawe, babaandu be sifwaabi, namwe basaaya bifwaani, namwe baeeyi, namwe baseecha babeelanakho,
namwe babeefwi, namwe balianga, namwe bameesi, namwe bakholela babasiaabwe bitina, namwe banuuli, salikhoo namulala khu bano olinyoola Bubwami bwa Wele tawe.
Balala mwinywe mwaba murio. Ne kakhali mwakwalaasibwa khukhwama mu bwoni, mwaanibwe khu Wele, mwakholebwe khuba baluungi ebweeni wa Wele no Mwami Yesu Kristo, lundi ne Roho owa Wele Wefwe.
Omundu anyala aloma ali, “Siakhulia sili sie enda, ne enda eli eye siakhulia.” Yee, ne kakhali Wele akhare sisiakamo khu bioombi. Kumubili se kukhoyeele kwarumikhirwa khulwe sifwaabi sie bukhobani tawe, ne kakhali kukholela Omwami, ne Omwami aananga khulwe kumubili.
Wele alamusia Omwami khukhwama mu lifwa, mala lundi akhakhulamusie efwe khubirira mu bunyali bwewe.
Mumanyile muli kimibili kienywe kili bitonyi bie kumubili kwa Kristo. Nyala nabukula sitonyi sie kumubili kwa Kristo mala sikhole sitonyi sie kumubili kwo mulaaya ku? Se kanyalikhana tawe!
Namwe wakana se mumanyile muli omundu oambaasia kumubili kwewe no mulaaya ekela siindu silala ne naye tawe? Liiandiko liboolanga abuwaanga busa lili, “Bombi bakhekele kumubili mulala.”
Ne kakhali oyo oambaana no Mwami ekela sisiindu silala naye mu roho.
Lekhana ne sifwaabi. Bubwoni bwe lukano luluundi nibwo omundu akhola se bwiamba khu mubili kwewe tawe, ne kakhali omundu ooli mu bwoni bwe sifwaabi sie bukhobani akholela kumubili kwoosi bubwoni,
Se mumanyile muli kimibili kienywe kili Lukaangu lwa Roho Omutakatifu, omenyanga mwinywe mala niye Wele amuelesia tawe? Se muli khu bwenywe mwabeene tawe, ne kakhali muli ba Wele.
Wele aamukula enywe khu bukusi. Nono, rumikhira kimibili kienywe khulwe luyali lwa Wele.

Nono, khuloondekhana ne bibiindu nibio mwambandikila, omundu akhola bulayi aaba bali se areera omukhasi tawe.
Ne sikila sifwaabi siliio sikali, buli mundu akhoyeele abe no mukhasi wewe omwene, ne buli mukhasi akhoyeele aaba no museecha wewe omwene.
Omundu akhoyeele khutabusia kumulimo kwewe nga omuseecha, ne omukhasi akhoyeele khutabusia kumulimo kwewe nga omukhasi, ne buli mundu akhoyeele khukhola lilienya lio owasie.
Omukhasi se ali ne bunyali khu mubili kwewe tawe, ne kakhali omuseecha wewe ali nabwo, mu ngila ng'eneyo omuseecha se ali ne bunyali khu mubili kwewe tawe, ne kakhali omukhasi ali nabwo.
Mukhalobana tawe, ne kakhali mukhole murio ne mufukiilisiane khukhola murio khu siise sitiiti nio mube ne siise sienywe sie khusaba, mala mwile alala lundi nga babareerana. Mu ngila yino mulaliindana khukhwama mu khukhakwa khwa Sietani khulwe khulekha khwenywe khuba ne lilieliinda.
Ese se muboolela enywe lino nga omuyingilila tawe, ne kakhali nga omukaambila.
Ng'ali busa nakhenyile ndi enywe mweesi mube nga nilwo ndi, ne buli mundu ali ne siianwa siewe khukhwama khu Wele, omundu mulala siianwa sino, okundi esio.
Nono, khu bakhareerana tawe, ne khu banamulekhwa ese ndoma ndi, andi bwakhabeele bulayi khwinywe khuchiililila khumenya mweng'ene nga ese.
Ne mukhanyala mwekhaliilikha liliekoomba lienywe tawe, mureerane. Buli bulayi khureera khukhila khuba ne liliekoomba lie kumubili likali.
Khu baandu babareerana ndi ne lilaka likhali liliase samwene tawe, ne kakhali lio Mwami omukhasi khukhwola akhalekha omuseecha wewe tawe,
ne kakhali ne akhola ario, akhoya arame busa yeng'ene, namwe akobole wo museecha wewe, ne omuseecha akhalekhana no mukhasi wewe tawe.
Khu baandi, ese samwene, ne se ali Omwami tawe, ndoma ndi, omukristo aaba nali no mukhasi okhasuubila tawe mala omukhasi oyo afukiilile khuchiililila khumenya naye, khukhwola akhamulekha tawe.
Ne omukhasi omukristo aaba ne ali no museecha okhasuubila tawe, mala omundu oyo afukiilile khuchiililila khumenya naye, khukhwola akhamulekha tawe.
Sikila omuseecha okhasuubila tawe, afukiililwa ebweeni wa Wele khulwe khuba mu buambaani no mukhasi wewe, ne omukhasi okhasuubila tawe, afukiililwa ebweeni wa Wele khulwe khuambaasibwa no museecha wewe omukristo. Kano kaloba khuba kari, andi babaana babwe baaba busa nga babaana bakhamanyile ka Wele tawe, ne kakhali nga ne kali, bafukiililwa ebweeni wa Wele.
Ne okhasuubila tawe aaba ne ekoomba khulekha owasie omukristo, aba khekabe kario. Ne kaaba kario aba owasie omukristo oyo, abeele omuseecha, namwe omukhasi, ali omulekhuule. Wele aamubooleele enywe khumenya mu muleembe.
Omukhasi omukristo ewe onyala waaba na ng'ali oriena, oli sokhaonie omuseecha wowo tawe? Namwe omuseecha omukristo ewe, onyala waaba na ng'ali oriena, oli sokhaonie omukhasi wowo tawe?
Buli mundu mwinywe akhoyeele achiililila khumenya khuloondekhana ne siianwa nisio Omwami aamuelesia niye, lundi nga nilwo aaba Wele ne amulaanga. Lino lili lilaka nilio nikisianga mu Kanisa choosi.
Ne omusaani aaba ne afukiilila kumulaango kwa Wele, se akhoyeele akhaka khukhwiyinyosiakho chimbala che busaani tawe, ne omusiinde aaba ne afukiiliile kumulaango kwa Wele, se akhoyeele akhebwa tawe.
Sikila omundu abeele omusaani namwe omusiinde se liekesiakho siindu tawe. Siliio sili khuria kamalaka ka Wele.
Buli mundu akhoyeele arama nga aaba ne alikho afukiilila kumulaango kwa Wele.
Wele ne aakhulaanga ewe, waba nasioobi? Bulayi, likhakhwiembeelesia tawe, lundi ne oli ne bubweyaangu khuuba omulekhuule burumikhire.
Sikila nasioobi niye Omwami alangile ali omulekhuule khulwo Mwami, mu ngila ng'eneyo, omundu omulekhuule olangilwe ne Kristo ali nasioobi wewe.
Wele aamukula enywe khu bukusi bwe angaaki lukali, nono mukhaba nasioobi be babaandu tawe.
Basaale, buli mulala arame mu busaangi ne Wele mu liba nilio abamo nga alaangwa.
Nono, khuloondekhana nende niko mwambandikila khu baandu basiili khureerana tawe. Se ndi ne lilaka khukhwama khu Mwami tawe, ne kakhali mbaana kamebaasio kase samwene nga omundu okhoyeele khusuubilwa khulwe siisa sio Mwami.
Khuloondekhana siibi siliio luno, nibaasia ndi buli bulayi khu mundu khumenya nga ne ali.
Oli no mukhasi? Nono, okhakhaka khumulekha tawe. Ewe omusuumba? Nono, okhareera omukhasi tawe.
Ne kakhali noreera omukhasi, aba se wakholile bubwoni tawe, ne omukhaana okhaacha liilia tawe, ne acha liilia, aba se akholile bubwoni tawe. Ne kakhali bareerana bakhabe ne kamatinyu kamakali mala ese se nenya enywe mube nako tawe.
Basaale, niko ese ndoma kali kano, se siaramire siise sikali tawe, mala khukhwama luno, babaandu babareerana bakhoyeele bamenya nga bakhareerana tawe,
Baalila, nga bakhali ne bubeeleli tawe, bachekha nga bakhali ne busangaafu tawe, bakula nga bakhali babeene biindu nibio bakulile tawe,
Bakusia bibiindu, nga bakhali mu milimo kiene ekio elala tawe. Sikila sibala sino, nga ne sili luno, se silabao khu siise sileeyi tawe.
Se nenya enywe mwiendekhelele tawe. Omusuumba eembeelela kimilimo kio Mwami, sikila akhaka khusiimisia Omwami.
Ne kakhali omundu owareera omukhasi eembeelela bibiindu bie sibala, sikila enya khusiimisia omukhasi wewe,
khwako se eluungikha lubeka lulala tawe. Omukhaana okhaacha liilia tawe, namwe owe yabwana eembeelela kimilimo kio Mwami, sikila enya khukhwirusilia elala, mu mubili ne mu mwoyo, ne kakhali omukhasi owacha liilia eembeelela kie sibala sikila enya khusiimisia omuseecha wewe.
Ndikho ndoma kano sikila nenya khumuyeeta enywe. Se ndikho khaka khumurakho lilaka tawe. Ne kakhali nenya mukhole kamaluungi lundi ke abwene, mala mwirusilie elala khukholela Omwami.
Khwaabo baselelaane, mala bakhakhalaka khureerana tawe. Kaaba bali omundu eulila ali salikho akholela omukhaana kimiima kimilayi tawe, lundi kaaba bali lilikoomba liewe lili likali mala eulila ali bakhoyeele bareerane, aba khe bareerane. Bubwoni se bulikhoo mu kano tawe.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali omundu aakhalake khulekha khureera mala se ayingiliilwe khukhola ario tawe, ne kakhali ekuumisie mu lienya liewe aba akholile bulayi khulekha khureera omukhaana oyo.
Khwako omundu oreera omukhasi akhola bulayi, ne oyo okhareera tawe, akhola bulayi lukali.
Omukhasi owacha liilia se ali omulekhuule omuseecha wewe ne asiili omulamu tawe, ne kakhali kaaba bali omuseecha wewe afwiile, aba ali omulekhuule khucha khu mundu yesi yesi niye enya oli omukristo.
Kakhaba kario, akhabe ne busangaafu bukali aaba namenya nga nali. Eyo niyo enganakani yase, ne ese seesi suubila ndi, ndi ne Roho owa Wele.

Nono, khuloondekhana nende ke biakhulia biianwa khu bifwaani niko mwaandika.
Kali ng'ali, “efwe fweesi khuli ne bukesi”, nga balomanga. Ne bukesi burio kakhaba kario, buniinia omundu aaba ne sileka, ne kakhali busiime bwombakhanga.
Yesi yesi owibaasianga ali amanyile siindu, ng'ali samanyile nga ne akhoyeele khumanya tawe.
Ne omundu owasiima Wele amanyikhana khu Wele.
Nono, khuloondekhana khulia biakhulia biianwa khu bifwaani. Khumanyile khuli sifwaani ng'ali siekesia sisiindu sikhaliio tawe, khumanyile khuli Wele mulala yeng'ene niye oliio.
Akhaba bali biliio bilaangwa “bawele” Mwikulu namwe khu sibala, ne akhaba ne bilaangwa “bawele” ne “babaami” biliio bikali,
khwifwe Wele mulala yeng'ene niye oliio, Wele ali Paapa omubuumbi owe bibiindu bioosi ne khubirira mu niye efwe khumenya, lundi aliio Omwami mulala yeng'ene, Yesu Kristo, bibiindu bioosi biabuumbwa khubirira mu niye mala efwe khumenya khubirira mu niye.
Ne buli mundu se amanyile bung'ali buno tawe. Babaandu balala banala bifwaani lukali, akhaba khukhwola luno, ne balia biakhulia nga bino bebaasia bali bili biakhulia bie bifwaani, liiba liabwe lie mu mebaasio lili litekhele, lundi bebaasia bali banyaalutisibwa ne siakhulia esio.
Ne kakhali siakhulia, se sinyala, siang'oona liiambaana liefwe ne Wele tawe, se khutibia sisiindu siosi siosi ne khukhalia tawe, namwe se khunyoola siosi siosi ne khulia tawe.
Lola bulayi, nono, mukhalekha bulekhuule bwenywe mu bikholwa bukhole abo bali batekhele mu lisuubila bakwe mu bwoni tawe.
Ne kakhali, omundu owe liiba lie mumebaasio litekhele aaba bali mu makhuwa kano amubonanga enywe mu mwilanga muli, “Muli ne bukesi” ne muliila mu Lukaangu lwe bifwaani, kano, se kalamutasa kumwoyo khulia biakhulia biianibwe khu bifwaani?
Nono omundu omutekhele yuno, wandaayenywe niye Kristo afwiila, alabuna sikila, “bukesi” bwenywe!
Ne mu ngila yino mulakhola bubwoni khu Kristo ne mukholela bawandaayenywe bakristo bubwoni mu khunyaala liiba liabwe lie mu mebaasio liili litekhele.
Nono, siakhulia siaaba ne sikhola wandaayase akwe mu bwoni, se ndisilia lundi tawe, nio ese khakhola wandaayase aakwa mu bwoni tawe.

Ese se ndi omulekhuule tawe ku? Ese se ndi omurumwa tawe ku? Ese siili khubonakho Yesu Omwami wefwe tawe ku? Ne enywe se muli kimilimo kiase khu Mwami tawe ku?
Akhaba babaandi ne bakhafukiilila ese nga omurumwa tawe, ng'ali enywe mufukiilila ese! Sikila bulamu bwenywe mu buambaani no Mwami, enywe mwabeene muli simanyisio muli ng'ali ese ndi omurumwa.
Babaandu ne banjikiicha, nibabilanga ndi,
se ndi na ng'ali khuebwa siakhulia nende sie khunywa khulwe kimilimo kiase tawe ku?
Se ndi ne bung'ali khulolela khu barumwa babaandi ne bawandaaye bo Mwami ne Petero, mu khukeenda no mukhasi omukristo mungendo chase tawe ku?
Namwe Baranaba nase fweng'ene khukhoyeele khukhola kimilimo nio khulie?
Musikari siina owiruungiranga bibiindu nibio arumikhira mu busikari? Mulimi siina okhalichanga khu biaamo bibiaama mu mukuunda kwewe? Mwaayi siina okharumikhiranga kamabeele khukhwama mwituuli liewe?
Se khoyeele mbaane bilolelo bie bibiindu bia busiele biong'ene tawe, sikila Lilaka lilomanga lirio.
Liiandike lie Lilaka lia Musa liloma lili, “Okhaboa eeyi emunwa ne olikho okirumikhira khuula tawe.” Mwibaasia muli Wele alomaloma khuloondekhana ne eeyi ku?
Ne aalomaloma ario aba ng'ali se ali khwifwe tawe ku? Ee, ako kaandikwa khwifwe. Omundu olima nende okesa bakhoyeele bakhola kimilimo kiabwe mu lieyikina lie khunyoolamo sikelo sie bibiaamo.
Khwamiichile lumiicho lwa roho mwinywe. Nono bubi siina buliio khwaba ne khunyoola mwinywe bibiindu bie khurumikhira?
Ne babaandi baaba ne bali na ng'ali eye khunyoola bino khukhwama khwinywe, efwe aba se khuli na ng'ali khukhilakhoo?
Ne se khwarumikhiire ng'ali yino tawe ne kakhali, khwekhaliliikhe buli siindu nio khukharao sikhiingililo siosi siosi ebweeni we Lomo Endayi eya Kristo tawe.
Ng'ali mu manyile muli babaandu bakholanga kimilimo mu Lukaangu, banyoolanga siakhulia siabwe khukwama mu Lukaangu, ne abo bakholanga kimilimo khu alutare, banyoolangakho sikelo siabwe khu biindu biaanilwe nga chimbosio.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo Omwami aalaka ali abo babelwacha Elomo Endayi bakhoyeele banyoola nibio balia khubirira mu milimo miene ekio.
Ne kakhali se narumikhirekho ng'ali yino tawe, namwe se ndikho mbandika kano luno nio niyenyele samwene ng'ali yino tawe. Buli bulayi ese khufwa khukhila omundu anyime ng'ali yase niyo niboneselakho!
Se ndi na ng'ali eye khukhwibonia sikila nilwacha Elomo Endayi tawe. Ne kakhaba kario, ndi aasi we kamalaka khukhola ndio. Buli bubi bukali khwise nekhelwacha Elomo Endayi tawe!
Aaba bali khola kumulimo kuno mu khwenya khwase, aba nyala nalindiilila khuruungwa, ne kakhali khola kumulimo kuno nga oyo okhoyela akukhole, sikila Wele aambelesia ese kumulimo kuno.
Nono ese nyoolanga muruungo siina? Kumuruungo kwase kuli khuuba ne bubweyaangu bwe khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi ne kharuungiakho siindu tawe, lundi ne khabaanja khukholelwa ng'ali yase khulwe kumulimo kuno.
Ese ndi omulekhuule, se ndi nasioobi owo mundu tawe, ne kakhali samwene nikholanga mba nasioobi owa buli mundu nio nyale khureera bakali nga kanyalikhana.
Ne ndi khola kimilimo mu Bayaudi, menya nga Omuyaudi nio mbareere, lundi akhaba ese samwene nekhali aasi we Lilaka lia Musa tawe, menyanga nga oli aasi walio, ne ndikho khola kimilimo akari waabo baali aasi walio nio mbareere.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, ne ndikho khola kimilimo mu Be Chikholo, menyanga nga mulala khwaabo, okhali aasi we Lilaka lie Bayaudi tawe, nio ndeere Be Chikholo khu Kristo. Kano se kekesia kali se naria Lilaka lia Wele tawe, ng'ali ndi aasi we Lilaka lia Kristo.
Ne ndi mu baali ne lisuubila litiiti nikholanga nga mulala khwaabo, nio mbareere khu Kristo. Khwako, nabeele nga omundu owa buli mwima khu baandu boosi, nio wakana mboniekho balala mu nibo mu ngila chosi chosi chinyalikhana.
Kholanga kano koosi khulwe Lomo Endayi, nio noole khusaanga mu khabi chayo.
Ng'ali mumanyile muli batimi be chimbilo bakali babechanga mu mbilo, ne kakhali mulala yeng'ene niye onyoolanga kumuruuru. Nono tima mu ngila ng'eneyo munyoole kumuruuru.
Buli mutimi ne alikho eyika eananga mukhunyoola sinyaasio sirafu nio khufwarwe engara eye bimuli bibioma busa, ne kakhali efwe khukholela kumuruuru kwa mindali na mindali.
Ako kakila ne ndimanga mu bukololofu khucha ekhutabusia, ako kakila ne ndi nga omukhupani okhonaka busa bifuusi biewe khu khuupa embeo tawe.
Mbangasianga kumubili kwase ne bifuusi, mala ngukhola ne kunaliilila nio khakhola ndio samwene nakhilwa khunyoola kumuruuru enyuma we khukhwilwachila babaandi tawe.

Boosi babatiisibwa mwifuumbi ne mu nyanja nga babeeka ba Musa.
Boosi balia siakhulia sia roho silala esio
ne khunywa sia roho silala esio. Banywa khukhwama mu lwanda lwa roho lulwachichanga nabo, ne lulwanda olwo lwaba Kristo omwene.
Ne kakhaba kario bakali khu nibo se basiimisia Wele tawe, mala asalanisia kimibili kiabwe mu sichiimi.
Mukhasaaya bifwaani nga balala khu nibo baakholanga tawe. Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili, “Babaandu bekhala aasi mu naikara eyakaluukhana yekela sifwaabi sie khunywa, ne khukhobana.”
Khukhwola khukhaba ne sifwaabi tawe, nga balala khu nibo ne bakhola mala khu ndaalo ndala babaandu chielefu kamakhumi kabili na chitaru berwa.
Khukhwola khukhakhaka Omwami, nga balala khu nibo ne bakhola mala chindemu chabeera tawe.
Khukhwola khukheng'ulung'unya nga balala khu nibo ne bakhola mala babunisibwa ne Malaika we Lifwa tawe.
Bibiindu bino bioosi biekholekha khu nibo nio babaandi babonelekho, mala biaandikwa khu khukaambila efwe, sikila khumenyile mu biise nibio sisiakamo sili siimbi khwoola.
Yesi yesi owibaasia ali emile bulayi khukhwola alole bulayi, nio akhakwa tawe.
Buli likhako nilio mwanyoolile lili nga ako kakeechanga khu baandu buli lwoosi. Ne kakhali Wele ali omusuubilwa, lundi sakhamulekhe mukhakwe khutuuma bunyali bwenywe bwe khukhwima mu lisuubila tawe, siise sie khukhakwa, akhamuelesie enywe kamaani khukhwekhaliilikha ne engila eye khuula.
Nono, basaale baase bakoosi, mukhasaaya bifwaani tawe.
Ndomaloma khwinywe nga babaandu be limanya, mwabene khe mukhalakile niko ndoma.
Sikoombe nisio khurumikhira khu alutare yo Mwami, nisio efwe khupilanga Wele orio, lundi ne khunywelamo, aba se khulikho khusaanga mu mafuki ka Kristo? Ne kumukaati nikwo khumesula, nga nekhukulia, aba se khulikho khusaanga mu mubili kwa Kristo?
Sikila kuliio kumukaati mulala, efwe fweesi, khwakhaba bakali, khuli kumubili mulala, sikila khusaanganga khu mukaati mulala okwo.
Yibaasia khu baandu ba Isiraeli, abo ba baliichanga siianiibwe nga embosio, basaanga mu khukhalabanila Wele khu alutare.
Nono, ndikho ndoma ndi siina? Biakhulia biianiibwe khu bifwaani namwe bifwaani bibieene bili siindu ku?
Tawe! Nisio ndikho ndoma sili mbo embosio niyo abo bakhamanyile Wele baananga, baananga khu bisieeno ne se khuli khu Wele tawe. Ne se nenya enywe muambaane ne bisieeno tawe.
Se munyala mwanywa mu sikoombe sio Mwami lundi mwanywa mu sie bisieeno tawe. Se munyala mwalia khu siaalwa sio Mwami lundi mulie khu siaalwa sie bisieeno tawe.
Namwe khwenya khukhole Omwami abe ne likhendekha? Khwibaasia khuli efwe khuli ne kamaani kamakali khumukhila niye?
Omundu yesi yesi akheyenyela omwene busa kamalayi tawe, ne kakhali enyele babaasie kamalayi.
Muli balekhuule khulia siosi siosi sikusibwa khu soko eye chinyama, ne mukhareebakho kamareeba kosi kosi sikila liba lienywe lie mu mebaasio tawe.
Sikila liiandiko ne liboolanga lili, “Sibala nende buli siindu siilimo bili bio Mwami”
Omundu okhasuubila tawe, ne akhulaanga olie siakhulia mala ofukiilile khucha, lia siosi siosi nisio akhuelesia okhareebakho kamareeba kosi kosi sikila liba liowo lie mumebaasio tawe.
Ne omundu nakhuboolela ali, “Biakhulia bino biianibwe khu bifwaani,” okhabilia tawe, khulwa oyo okhuboolele ewe nende khulwe liiba lie mumebaasio,
ne se lili liba liowo wamwene tawe, ne kakhali liba lie mumebaasio lio mundu okundi oyo.
Omundu mulala alareeba ali, “Bulayi nono, siina bulekhuule bwase bwe khukhola siosi siosi ne bukhiingililwe ne liiba lie mumebaasio lio kundi busa?
Ne naaba ne khupila Wele orio khulwe siakhulia siase, siina omundu yesi yesi ne ambiiya sikila siakhulia nisio khupiile Wele orio esio?”
Bulayi, bioosi nibio mukhola, nemulia namwe ne munywa, bikhole khulwe luyali lwa Wele.
Menya mu ngila ekhareerera Bayaudi butinyu, namwe, khu Be Chikholo namwe khu Kanisa eya Wele tawe.
Khola busa nga ese kholanga, ese khakanga khusiimisia buli mundu mu bioosi nibio kholanga, ne khebaasiakho kamalayi ndi kabe khwise samwene tawe, ne kakhali ndi kamalayi khu boosi, nio wakana baonisibwe.

Mufumia enywe sikila buli lwoosi mukhebulilanga ese, lundi muloondanga kamekisio niko namuelesia.
Ne kakhali nenya mumanye muli Kristo ali omukali khukhila buli mundu, omuseecha ali omukali khukhila omukhasi wewe, ne Wele ali omukali khukhila Kristo.
Khwako omuseecha osabanga namwe owilwachanga burume bwa Wele mu libukaana ne efuumile emurwe aambianga Kristo chisoni.
Ne omukhasi yesi yesi osabanga namwe owilwachanga burume bwa Wele mu libukaana ne akhefuumile emurwe tawe, aambianga omuseecha wewe chisoni, bubwaukhani se buliio khu niye no mukhasi obekile emurwe tawe.
Ne omukhasi aaba ne akhefuuma emurwe wewe tawe, lukhila abekwe. Ne sikila sili sisiindu sie chisoni omukhasi khubeka lichuune liewe, akhoyeela khufuuma kumurwe kwewe.
Omuseecha se enaana khufuuma kumurwe kwewe tawe, sikila niye ali sifwaanani lundi luyali lwa Wele. Ne Omukhasi ali lukoosi lwo museecha.
Sikila omuseecha se abuumbwa khukhwama khu mukhasi tawe, ne kakhali omukhasi aabuumbwa khukhwama khu museecha.
Namwe omuseecha se aabumbwa sikila omukhasi tawe, ne kakhali omukhasi sikila omuseecha.
Lino nilio likila, omukhasi ne enyekha abe ne sisiindu sie khufuuma emurwe wewe sikila bamalaika, khukhwekesia ali, ali aasi wo museecha wewe.
Kakhaba kario, mu bulamu bwefwe mu Mwami, omukhasi se abukhana no museecha tawe, namwe omuseecha no mukhasi tawe.
Sikila nga omukhasi aabuumbwa khukhwama khu museecha, mu ngila ng'eneyo omuseecha asaalwa khubirira mu mukhasi, ne bibiindu bioosi biaama khu Wele.
Nono mwabeene bisia, ne buli bulayi khu mukhasi khusaba Wele mu libukaana nakhali ne sisiindu sifuuma emurwe wewe tawe?
Liiba lie bulamu khu sibala liliene se limwekesianga lili lichuune lileeyi khu museecha lili chisoni,
ne kakhali khu mukhasi lili sisiindu sie lukoosi? Omukhasi aebwa lichuune lileeyi elio nga sie khufuuma.
Ne omundu yesi yesi ne enya khuyingana khu kano, ndoma ndi, efwe namwe chikanisa cha Wele se chili ne kumwiima kukuundi kwosi kwosi mu lisaaya tawe.
Ese se mufumia enywe mu biindu nibio muboolela luno tawe, sikila mu mabukaana kenywe ng'ali mukholanga kamabi kamakali khukhila kamalayi.
Mukhunyoa, nauliile bali buliio mu mabukaana kenywe, mala ese suubila ndi kanyala kaaba ng'ali.
(Ng'ali khukhwola bubwabukhani bube mwinywe nio abo bali mu bung'ali boole khubonekha abuwaanga.)
Ne mwakaanana, se sili siakhulia sie liliikolooya lio Mwami nisio mulichanga tawe.
Sikila ne mulia, buli sia mulala achiilililanga ne siakhulia siewe omwene, khwako balala bali ne enjala ne babaandi bameela.
Se muli ne chingo chenywe nicho muliilamo ne khunywa tawe? Namwe mwenya mulekeelesie e kanisa eya Wele ne khuaambia chisoni abo bakhenyalila tawe? Mwenya ese muboolele enywe ndi siina khu kano? Mwenya mufumie enywe? Ng'ali se nyala nakhola ndio tawe!
Sikila nanyoola khukhwama khu Mwami liliekisia nilio namubooleele enywe, ndi siilo nisio Omwami Yesu aachaamwa, aabukula kumukaati,
aakhupila Wele orio, aakumesulamo aaloma ali, “Kuno kuli kumubili kwase kuuli khulwe enywe. Khola kano mu khukhebulila ese.”
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, enyuma we siakhulia abukula sikoombe, aaloma ali, “Sikoombe sino sili endakaano embia, eyichusiibwe khubirira mu mafuki kase. Mu siise siosi siosi ne munywaamo, khola muri khu khuukhebulila ese.”
Sikila mu siise siosi siosi kano kekesia kali buli lwoosi ne mulia kumukaati kuno lundi ne munywa mu sikoombe sino mwilwachanga lifwa lio Mwami khukhwola nga akheeche.
Khwako, omundu yesi yesi nalia kumukaati kwo Mwami, namwe nanywa khukhwama mu sikoombe siewe mu ngila eye khulekha khumuria tawe, aba aakholeele bubwoni kumubili ne kamafuki ko Mwami.
Nono, buli mundu akhoyeele anyoe emenieelesie omwene, nio alie kumukaati ne khunywa mu sikoombe sio Mwami
Sikila aaba bali omundu sanyala amanya nilio kumubili kwo Mwami kwekisia tawe, nga alia kumukaati ne khunywa mu sikoombe, aba ereerera omwene bukhalaki nga nalia ne khunywa.
Ako kakila bakali mwinywe ne bali batekhele lundi balwaale, lundi bakali bafwa.
Abanga khunyoanga khwimenieelesia fwabeene, andi Wele se akhukhalakilanga tawe.
Ne kakhali omwami akhukhalakilanga ne khu khuelesia efwe siiukuumo khube balayi, nio khukheecha khwakhalakilwa alala ne sibala tawe.
Khwako bawandaayase, ne mwibuusia alala khulia, buli mulala akhoyeele aliinde owasie.
Ne mulala khwinywe aaba nali ne njala, akhoyeele alie engo wewe, nio Wele akhamukhalakila enywe ne mukhung'aana tawe. Ne khu makhuwa kakaandi ako, khakaluungisie ne nichile.

Nono, khuloondekhana nende niko mwambandikiile khu biianwa khukhwama khu Roho Omutakatifu. Bawandaayase, nenya mu manye bung'ali khu biianwa bino.
Mu manyile muli nga ne mwaba ne mu siili khumanya Wele, mwatiimisibwanga mu ngila chingali, khukhwola mu khusaaya bifwaani biikhalimo bulamu tawe.
Nenya mu manye muli se aliio yesi yesi orangirirwa ne Roho owa Wele, onyala aaloma ali, “Silaamo khu Yesu tawe!” Ne se aliio onyala eyama ali “Yesu ali Omwami” nakharangiriirwe ne Roho Omutakatifu tawe.
Kimilimo kikiabukhana kiliio. Ne kakhali khukholelanga Omwami mulala oyo.
Limanya lie khukhola kimilimo liabukhana, ne Wele chana oyo niye oanaanga limanya lie kimilimo khu buli mundu khuloondekhana ne kimilimo kiewe.
Khubao khwa Roho khwekesibwanga mu ngila chichabukhana mu buli mundu khulwe khukhola kamalayi khu boosi.
Roho aananga khu mundu mulala burume bwe limanya, ne khu mundu okundi Roho mwene oyo aananga burume bwe bukesi.
Roho mulala omwene oyo aananga lisuubila khu mundu mulala, ne khu kundi aananga bipawa bie khuonia.
Roho aananga khu mundu mulala kamaani ke khukhola kamayia, ne khu kundi, siianwa sie khulomaloma burume bwa Wele, ne khu kundi, bunyali khumanya bubwabukhani akari we biianwa bibiaama khu Roho ne biianwa bikhaama khu Roho tawe. Khu mundu mulala aananga bunyali khuloma mu nimi chingeni, ne khu kundi aananga bunyali khukhwinoosia kaboolilwe.
Ne kakhali ali Roho mulala mwene oyo okholanga ako koosi, nga omwene ne enya, aananga siianwa lukano khu buli mundu.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, efwe fwesi, khubeele Bayaudi namwe be Chikholo, nasioobi namwe balekhuule, khwabatiisibwa mu mubili mulala okwo ne Roho mulala chana oyo, mala fweesi khwaebwa Roho mulala oyo.
Sikila kumubili kumwene se kwabumbwa sitonyi silala tawe, ne kakhali bitonyi bikali.
Abaanga sikhandakilo siloma sili, “Sikila se ndi kumukhono tawe, se ndi owe kumubili tawe, lilienelio se lisikhiingilila khuba sitonyi sie kumubili tawe”
Abaanga liiru nalio liloma lili, “Sikila se ndi emoni tawe, se ndi owe kumubili tawe,” lilienelio se lilikhiingilila khuba sitonyi sie kumubili tawe.
Abaanga bali kumubili kwoosi busa kuli emoni, andi kuulila kuriena? Ne abanga kwoosi kuli liiru liong'ene, andi kuunyilisia kuriena?
Ne kakhali, Wele aara buli sitonyi lukano khu mubili nga ne enya kube.
Abaanga kumubili, kwoosi kuli sitonyi silala siong'ene andi se kuliio tawe!
Nga ne kali, biliio bitonyi bikali ne kakhali kumubili mulala.
Nono, emoni se nyala yaboolela kumukhono eli, “Se khwenya ewe tawe!” Namwe kumurwe se kunyala kwaboolela bikhandakilo kuli, “Se khwenya tawe!”
Ne kakhali se khunyala khwamenya, ne khukhali ne bitonyi bie kumubili bibonekhana khuba bitekhele lukali tawe,
ne bitonyi bie kumubili nibio khwibaasia khuli se bilimo bukhala tawe, bili nibio efwe khukhoyeele khuliinde ne bubweela lukali, ne bitonyi bie kumubili bikhabonekhana bilayi tawe, bikhoya khuliindwa lukali,
nibio bitonyi bilayi lukali bikheenya tawe. Wele omwene aara kumubili alala mu ngila eye khuaana lukoosi khu bitonyi bibienya sitonyi esio.
Nono bubwabukhani mu mubili se buliio tawe, ne kakhali bitonyi biakwo biyeetana.
Ne sitonyi silala sie kumubili siaaba ne sichuunwa, bitonyi bibiindi bioosi bichuunwa nasio, ne silala siaaba ne sifumisibwa, bitonyi bibiindi bioosi bisaanga mu busangaafu bwasio.
Enywe mweesi muli kumubili kwa Kristo, ne buli mulala ali sitonyi siakwo.
Mu Kanisa Wele aara bioosi mu bweyaangu bwabio. Mukhurakikha barumwa, lwa khabili bang'oosi, lwa khataru babekisia, nio abo bakhola kamayia, baloondelwa nende abo babaebwa bunyali khuonia namwe khuyeeta babaandi, namwe khubaluungisia, namwe khulomaloma mu nimi chingeni.
Boosi se bali barumwa, namwe bang'oosi namwe babekisia tawe. Buli mundu se akhola kamayia,
namwe khuonia bulwaale namwe khuloma mu nimi chingeni namwe khukhwinoosia kalikho ne kalomwa tawe.
Ra kimiooyo kienywe nono, khu biianwa bibienyekhana lukali. Nono khukhila bioosi, eli engila eloondakho yino.

Nyala naloma chinomo che babaandu nende che bamalaika boosi, ne kakhali ese ne khali ne busiime tawe, lilomaloma liase se likhila luyoka lwe sibia namwe bibiindu bie khu khuupaniakho mu mienya tawe.
Nyala naaba ne siianwa sie bung'oosi, nyala naaba ne bukesi bwoosi, nyala naaba ne lisuubila lioosi, lilienyekha khuuyisia bikulu, ne kakhali ne khali ne busiime tawe, aba se ndi siindu tawe.
Nyala naana bioosi nibio ndi nabio, mbaane akhaba kumubili kwase kwosebwe, ne kakhali ne khali ne busiime tawe, kano se kanjeetakho siindu siosi siosi tawe.
Busiime buli khukhwifwiilisia ne kumwoyo kumulayi. Se buli ne likhendekha, namwe khukhwiniinia, namwe ekibonio tawe,
busiime se buli ne kimiima kimibi namwe chinge tawe, se bubiililwanga tawe, busiime se buloondelesianga kamabi tawe,
busiime se busangaalilanga bubwoni tawe, ne kakhali busangaalilanga bung'ali,
busiime bwefwiilisia mu biindu bioosi, busuubila koosi, bweyikina koosi, lundi bwekhaliilikha mu koosi.
Busiime buli bwa mindali. Burume bubwama khu Wele buliio, ne kakhali se bulibaao buli lwoosi tawe, biianwa bie khulomaloma mu nimi chingeni biliio, ne kakhali biliakama, bukesi buliio, ne buliwao.
Sikila biianwa biefwe bie bukesi nende bie burume bubwama khu Wele biliio khu siise sitiiti busa,
ne kakhali bili bibiichufu ne bikheeche, biikhali bibiichufu tawe, bikhaweo.
Nga ne naba omwana, lilomaloma liase, khukhwiulila, ne kamebaasio kase biaba bie lulwana, ne luno ndi omundu omukhulu, se mbona nisio kholela bibiindu bie lulwana tawe.
Nisio khubona luno sili nga sifwaanani sifulaafulane mu sikioo, ne kakhali khukhabone moni na moni. Luno namanyile atiiti, ne khamanye mu bwichufu nga Wele ne aamanyile ese mu bwichufu.
Ne khusiili khuri bitaru bino nibio biliio, lisuubila, lilieyikina, ne busiime, mala siboofu lukali khu bino sili busiime.

Busiime nibwo mukhoyeele muyiime. Ra kimiooyo kienywe khu biianwa bia Roho, ne lukali siianwa sie khung'oola.
Omundu olomaloma mu nimi chingeni salomaloma khu baandu tawe, ne kakhali khu Wele, se aliio yesi yesi omuulila tawe. Alikho alomaloma bung'ali bwe mu bwikisi mu bunyali bwa Roho.
Ne oyo ong'oola alomaloma khu baandu ne khubaelesia buyeeti, abaraamo kumwoyo ne khubaoleelesia.
Oyo olomalomanga mu nimi chingeni eyombakhanga omwene, ne oyo ong'oola ayeetanga e kanisa yoosi.
Nikoomba ndi andi mweesi mulomaloma mu nimi chingeni, ne kakhali nenya lukali po ndi andi mwanyoolile siianwa sie khung'oola. Sikila ong'oola ali owe bukhala bukali khukhila oyo olomalomanga mu nimi chingeni, omundu akhoyeele abeo onyala aakaluukhasia niko alomaloma, nio e Kanisa yoosi enyoole buyeeti.
Bawandaayase, nono ne nicha khwinywe, ndaba owa buyeeti siina ne ndomaloma mu nimi chingeni? Se ndabakho owe buyeeti bwosi bwosi khwinywe, nekhamureerere lifuunulwa khukhwama khu Wele namwe bukesi namwe bung'oosi namwe liliekisia tawe.
Bukula bibiindu biikhalimo bulamu bibiipanga kimienya nga kumulele, namwe lituungu, omundu yesi yesi amanya ariena kumwenya kulikho ne kupwa liaba bali se bikubuula bulayi tawe?
Ne omundu oupa ekhoombi aba bali se akiipa bulayi tawe, naanu okherekekhele liie?
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, omundu yesi alamanyilisia ariena niko mulikho mulomalomakho, ne kaaba bali burume bwenywe nibwo muaana mu nimi chingeni se buuliilikha bulayi tawe? Kamakhuwa kenywe kalatibila mu mbeo!
Chinomo chingali chichabukhana chili mu sibala, ne kakhali se luliio lukhalimo nende nisio lwekesia tawe.
Ne naaba nekhamanyile lulomo lulikho ne lulomwa tawe, omundu olurumikhira alaba omukeni khwise ne ese ndaba omukeni khu niye.
Sikila muli ne silukuluku khunyoola biianwa bia Roho, khukhwola mukhake khutuuma bibiindu bioosi khurumikhira bulayi biianwa biyeeta khukhwombakha e Kanisa.
Nono, omundu olomaloma mu nimi chingeni khukhwola asabe khulwe siianwa sie khukaluukhasia niko alomaloome.
Ne naaba ne saba mu lulimi luno, ng'ali roho wase asaba ne kamebaasio kase se kali siimbi tawe.
Nono ese khole ndiena? Ndasaba ne roho wase, lundi ndasaba akhaba ne kamebaasio kaase, ndemba ne roho wase, lundi nimbe ne kamebaasio kase.
Ne mupila Wele orio mu roho mwong'ene kanyalikha kariena omundu, okundi oli mwibukaana alome ali “Amina” mu lisaba lienywe lie khu khupa orio? Se ali ne ngila eye khumanya niko mulikho mulomaloma tawe.
Akhaba lisaba lienywe lie khu khupila Wele orio ne lili lilayi, omundu okundi oyo se anyoolakho buyeeti na akeekhe ene tawe.
Ese khupila Wele orio sikila ndomalomanga mu nimi chingeni khumukhila enywe mweesi.
Ne mubukaana mu Kanisa bwakhabeele bulayi ndomalome kamakhuwa karaano kanyala khuulilwa, nio nyale khukhwikisia babaandi, khukhila khulomaloma kamakhuwa chielefu mu nimi chingeni.
Bawandaayase, mukhaba nga babaana mu libaasia lienywe tawe. Ba nga babaana mu khuba aleeyi khukhwama khu bwoni, lundi ba bakhulu mu mebaasio kenywe.
Liaandikwa mu maandiko bali,
“Khubirira mu ngila eye babaandu khulomaloma mu ndomo chingeni,
Omwami aloma ali,
ndalomaloma khu baandu base.
Ndalomaloma khubirira mu minwa kie bakeni,
ne kakhaba kario babaandu base se bakhandekeeresie tawe.”
Khwako siianwa sie khulomaloma mu nimi chingeni sili buloli khu bakhasuubila tawe, se sili khu basuubila tawe, ne siianwa sie khung'oola sili sisiekesia khu babasuubila.
Ne kaaba nono, bali e Kanisa yoosi yakaanana ne buli mundu arakikha khulomaloma mu nimi chingeni, ne kaaba bali omundu busa namwe okhasuubila tawe, echamo, se alaloma ali mweesi mwakwile ne kamalalu tawe ku?
Ne kakhali buli mundu aaba ne alikho ang'oola mala okhasuubila tawe, namwe omundu okhamanyile siindu tawe echamo, alaboolelwa bubwoni bwewe khubirira mu niko aulila. Alakhalakilwa khubirira mu koosi niko aulila,
kamebaasio kewe ke mu bwikisi kalamanyikhana, khwako alasikama mala asaaye Wele alome ali, “Ng'ali Wele ali ano mwinywe!”
Bawandaayase, kano kali niko mboola. Ne mwakaanana mwibukaana, omundu mulala ali ne kumwenya, okundi liliekisia, okundi lifunulwa khukhwama khu Wele, okundi burume mu nimi chingeni, okundi khukaluukhasia kalomilwe. Buli siindu khukhwola sibe sie buyeeti khu kanisa.
Ne omundu aaba ne alikho acha khulomaloma mu nimi chingeni, bakhoyeele balomaloma babili namwe bataru bong'ene, mulala sia mulala, ne omundu okundi akhoyeele akaluukhasie kalikho ne kalomwa.
Ne kaaba bali se aliio onyala akaluukhasia tawe, oyo olomaloma mu nimi chingeni khukhwola asile busa mala omwene alomalome khu Wele.
Babili namwe bataru banyoolile burume bwa Wele bakhoyeele balomalome, ne babaandi nabo baloleelesie niko abo balikho ne baloma.
Ne kaaba bali omundu owikhaale mu libukaana anyoola burume khukhwama khu Wele, oyo olikho ne alomaloma akhoyeele asile.
Enywe mweesi munyala khung'oola mulala sia mulala, nio buli mundu eyike ne khuraamwo kumwoyo.
Siianwa sie khung'oola khukhwola sibe mu bunyali bwo mundu olikho ng'oola.
Sikila Wele se ali Wele owe likoyaano tawe, ne kakhali ali Wele we kumuleembe.
Nga kabechaanga mu chikanisa choosi che babaandu ba Wele, bakhasi bakhoyeele basila busa ne bali mwibukaana. Se bafukiililwa khulomaloma tawe, nga Lilaka lie Bayaudi liboola, khukhwola bakhaba mu bwimeelesi tawe.
Ne benya khumanya sisiindu, bakhoyeele bareebe baseecha babwe engo, sili sisiindu sie chisoni khu mukhasi khulomalomela mu Kanisa.
Eku, mwibaasia muli elomo eya Wele yama mwinywe? Namwe enywe mweng'ene nibo yechamo?
Omundu yesi yesi ne ebukula khuuba omung'oosi, namwe ali ali ne siianwa sia Roho, khukhwola amanye ali niko muandikila kano kali lilaka lio Mwami.
Ne omundu nakharekeeresia khu kano tawe, mukhamurekeeresia niye tawe.
Bawandaayase, nono, yekoomba lukali khung'oola, lundi mukhakaania khulomalomela mu nimi chingeni tawe.
Buli siindu khukhwola sikholelwe mu ngila endayi lundi eye lirekekha lilayi.

Bawandaayase, luno nenya khumukhebusia enywe, Elomo Endayi niyo namwilwachila, niyo mwafukiilila ne khukisuubila lukali.
Eyo eli Elomo Endayi, burume nibwo nelwacha khwinywe. Muonisibwa khubirira khu Lomo Endayi mwaba ne mukisuubila lukali, ngeeba mwaba ne mukhasuubila khulwe khunyoolamo sisiindu siosi siosi tawe.
aasiikhwa mala alamusibwa enyuma we chindaalo chitaru, nga kaandikwa mu maandiko,
abonekhela Petero lundi abonekhela barumwa boosi ekhumi na babili.
Lundi aabonekhela babeeka bewe babira chimia chiraano siise silala, bakali basiili balamu, akhaba balala ne bafwa.
Lundi aabonekhela Yakobo, nio aabonekhela barumwa bewe boosi.
Sikila ese ndi omukeekhe khu barumwa boosi, khaba se khoyeele khulaangwa omurumwa tawe, sikila naapia e kanisa eya Wele siibi.
Ne kakhali khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele ndi nga ne ndi ndi, ne kumwalaalo nikwo aambelesia ese se kwaba kwa busa tawe. Ne kakhali kwa njeeta nakhola kimilimo lukali khukhila barumwa babaandi boosi, ne ng'ali se siaba sikholwa siase samwene tawe, kwaba kumwalaalo kwa Wele kuuli mwise.
Nono kakhaba bali kaama khwise namwe khu nibo, kano niko efwe fweesi khwilwacha ne kano niko enywe musuubila.
Nono, sikila burume bwefwe, buli bali, Kristo alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa, balala mwinywe banyala baloma bariena bali bafu se bakhalamusibwe tawe?
Ne kaaba bali ako kali ng'ali, keekesia kali Kristo se alamusibwa tawe,
ne kaaba bali Kristo se alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa tawe, nono efwe se khuli nende siosi nisio khwilwacha tawe, ne nanywe se muli ne sisiindu nisio musuubila tawe.
Khutasa khwako, khwekesiibwe khuli khulikho khubea khuloondekhana ne Wele, sikila khwaloma khuli aalamusia Kristo khukhwama mu lifwa ne kakhali kaaba ng'ali bali bafu se banyala balamusibwa tawe, aba se aalamusia Kristo tawe.
Sikila bafu baaba ne bakhalamusibwa tawe, aba Kristo yesi se aalamusibwa tawe.
Ne Kristo aaba nakhaalamusibwa tawe, aba lisuubila lienywe lili kamarooro busa, mala musitibila mu bwoni bwenywe.
Lundi kalekesia kali babasuubila mu Kristo mala bafwa, batiba.
Ne kaaba bali lilieyikina liefwe mu Kristo lili lilayi khulwe bulamu buno bwong'ene, nono aba khukhoyeele khwakholelwa siisa lukali khukhila omundu okundi yesi yesi mu sibala sioosi.
Ne kakhali bung'ali buli bali, Kristo alamusibwa khukhwama mu lifwa nga lisuubisia mbo, abo bakona mu lifwa boosi balilamusibwa.
Sikila nga lifwa liecha khubirira mu omundu, mu ngila ng'eneyo lilamukha khukhwama mu lifwa liicha khubirira mu mundu.
Sikila nga babaandu boosi bafwa khulwe buambaani bwabwe ne Adamu, mu ngila ng'eneyo boosi balilamusibwa khulwe buambaani bwabwe ne Kristo.
Ne kakhali buli mulala alilamusibwa mu siise siewe. Kristo, ebweeni wa boosi, nio, mu siise sie liliicha liewe, abo baali babewe baloondekho.
Nio sisiakamo siiche. Kristo akhaule babaami ba roho boosi, be bunyali, nende be kamaani, lundi akhaane Bubwami khu Wele Paapa.
Sikila Kristo khukhwola aamiie, khukhwola nga Wele akhaule basiku boosi, mala abare aasi we bikele biewe.
Omusiku omumaliilisi khuulwa aliba lifwa.
Sikila liiandiko liboola lili, “Wele aara bibiindu bioosi aasi we bikele biewe.” Limanyikhaane busa mbo kamakhuwa “Bibiindu bioosi” se katubaasiliamo Wele omwene yesi orechanga bibiindu bioosi aasi owa Kristo tawe.
