Ne bibiindu bioosi nebimalile khureerwa aasi we buruki bwa Kristo, nono niye omwene, nga Omwana abe aasi owa Wele, owara bibiindu bioosi aasi wewe, nio Wele abe buli siindu khu buli mundu.
Ne kali kariena khu baandu ba baatiisibwa mu bweyaangu mwe babaandu babafwa? Beyikina khunyoola siina? Ne kaaba bali kali ng'ali nga balala balomanga, bali bafu se balamusibwa tawe, siina sikila babaandu abo ne balikho ba baatiisibwa mu bweyaangu mwe bafu?
Siina sikila nono efwe ne khuli mu busiku biise bioosi?
Bawandaayase, ese mbechanga siimbi khufwa buli ndaalo! Ekisuuni niyo ndi nayo mwinywe, mu bulamu bwefwe mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe, ekila ese ne ndoma kano.
Ne naaba bali, napaane ne “Kamanani” ano mu Efeso, ne lilienya lie babaandu, aba nanyoolilekho siina? Ne nekaba bali bafu se balamusibwa tawe, kaaba kario aba nga ne kaboolwa, “Lekha khulie mala khunywe, sikila busiayo khukhafwe.”
Mukhasilwaasibwa tawe, “Kumusuumbu kumubi kwonaka kumwiima kumulayi.”
Siisimukha mwibaasie bulayi mala mulekhe chingila che bubwoni. Mboola abuwaanga khumuambia enywe chisoni ndi balala mwinywe se bamanyile Wele tawe.
Omundu mulala anyala areeba ali, “Bafu banyala balamusibwa bariena? Bakhabe ne kumubili lukano sina?”
Musilu ewe! Nomiicha lumiicho mwiloba ne lukhafwiile se lumela tawe.
Mumiichanga lumiicho lubalule, wakana lumiicho lwe ngano namwe luluundi busa, se sili simelwa sisiamela khale sikhakeleo sirure tawe.
Wele aananga khu lumiicho olwo kumubili nikwo omwene enya, aelesianga buli lumiicho kumubili kwalwo.
Kumubili kwe bibiindu bie bulamu bioosi se kuli lukano lulala tawe, babaandu bali ne kumubili lukano lulala, chisaang'i luluundi, chinyuni luluundi ne ching'eeni luluundi.
Ne kiliio kimibili kie mwikulu ne kimibili kie khu sibala, lukoondo lwe kimibili kie mwikulu se lufwaanana ne lukoondo lwe kimibili kie khu sibala tawe.
Enyanga eli ne lukoondo lwayo lulwene, kumwesi ne luluundi, ne ching'enieesi luluundi, mala akhaba mu ng'eeniesi lulimo lukoondo chingano chingali.
Kaliba kario bafu nga balilamusibwa. Kumubili ne kusiikhwa, kubola, ne kakhali ne kulamusibwa se kubola tawe.
Ne kusiikhwa, kufwaana bubi lundi kumutekhele, ne kulamusibwa kuba ne lukoondo lulayi lundi kwe kamaani.
Ne kusiikhwa kuli kumubili busa, ne ne kulamusiibwa kuba kumubili kwa roho. Kumubili kwe chinyama ne kamafuki kuliio, khwako khukhwola kumubili kwa roho kubeo.
Sikila liiandiko liboola lili, “Omundu owe khunyoa, Adamu, abuumbwa nga sibuumbe sie bulamu,” ne kakhali Adamu omaliilikha ali Roho oanaanga bulamu.
Se kuli kumubili kwa roho kunyoanga tawe, ne kakhali kumubili kukhali kwa roho tawe, nio kwa roho kuloondekho.
Adamu owe khunyoa, owabuumbwa khukhwama khwiloba aama khwiloba, Adamu owa khabili aama mwikulu.
Abo bali be khwiloba bali nga oyo owabuumbwa khukhwama khwiloba, abo bali be mwikulu bali nga oyo owecha khukhwama mwikulu.
Bulayi bwene nga efwe khufwaana omundu owabuumbwa khukhwama khwiloba, khwako khulifwaana Omundu owama mwikulu.
Bawandaayase, niko ese ndoma kali kari, sisiabuumbwa khukhwama khu mubili ne kamafuki se sinyala siasaanga mu Bwami bwa Wele tawe, ne sisiindu sibola se sinyala siabao buli lwoosi tawe.
Sikila sisiindu sibola khukhwola sikaluukhasibwe sibe sikhanyala siabola tawe, sifwa khukhwola sikaluukhasibwe sibe sikhanyala siafwa tawe.
Khwako kano ne kekholekha, sibola ne siakaluukhasibwe siaba sikhabola tawe, ne aba liiandiko liboola lili, “Lifwa lionakibwe, bukhili bwechusiibwe!” Liliba ng'ali.
Lifwa, kamaani kowo ke khureera buchuuni kali waena?”
Lifwa linyoolanga kamaani ke khureera buchuuni khukhwama khu bwoni, ne bubwoni bunyoolanga bunyali bwabwo khukhwama khu Lilaka.
Ne kakhali khupila Wele orio, Wele okhuelesianga efwe bukhili khubirira mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo!
Bawandaayase bakoosi, nono mwiandalasie lundi mube meeso. Ba ne sinani mu milimo kienywe khulwo Mwami, sikila mu manyile muli siindu siosi siosi nisio mukhola mu khukhalabanila Omwami se sitaambamo bukhala tawe.

Buli khu ndaalo eyo Mwami buli sia mulala khwinywe khukhwola are alubeka chirupia, khuloondekhana nende nisio anyoolile mu muruungo, mala muchibiikhe nio mukhenaana khubuusia chirupia ne nichile tawe.
Ne nichile, khaelesie babaandu nibo muroboore chibarwa che khubamanyisia mala mbarume bayile siianwa sienywe Yerusalemu.
Ne kaaba bali buli bulayi ese khucha, aba khache nabo.
Nyala nabakho nanywe khu siise, wakana kumunaane kwoosi, mala aba munyala mwanjeeta khuchiililila ne lukeendo lwase, osi osi niio khakeleo nje lundi.
Nenya khumubonela elala busa khaba se khuli khumubonakho akeekhe busa ne ndikho mbira tawe. Niyikina khuba nanywe khu siise sileeyi, kaaba bali Omwami afukiilila.
Bubweyaangu bwe khukhola kimilimo kimiboofu buli eno, akhaba babemelekhana nase ne baliio bakali.
Omundu yesi yesi akhamulekelesia tawe, ne kakhali khukhwola mu muyeete achiililile ne lukeendo lwewe mu muleembe, nio aangalukhiile lundi, sikila namwirekekheele akalukhe ne bawandaayefwe.
Ne, khuloondekhana ne wandaayase Apolo, buli lwoosi namurechangamo kumwoyo amukeniie enywe alala ne basuubili babaandi, ne se aasuubila lukali ali akhoyeele khukhwicha mu siise sino tawe. Kakhaba kario, nga ne akhanyoole bubwiyaangu akheche.
Ba meeso, yiiandalasia mwisuubila, nyindaalila, ba ne kamaani.
Khola buli siindu mu busiime.
muloonde burangirisi bwe babaandu nga bano, nende bwo kundi yesi okholanga kimilimo nabo.
Ndi ne busangaafu khuloondekhana ne liliicha lia Sitefano, Fochunetasi, ne Akika, baliio nga abeele enywe ne muliio.
Mala basangaasiisie ese, lukali busa nga bamusangaasia enywe. Babaandu nga bano bakhoyeele khukhebulilwa.
Chikanisa mu sibala sia Esia chimurumira enywe kimileembe kiabwe, Akwila ne Pirisila ne kanisa eyakaanananga munju yabwe bamukhesiisie kimileembe kimikali mu Mwami.
Basuubili boosi ano baruma kimileembe kiabwe. Khesiana buli sia mulala ne mwikwayilana mu ngila endakatifu.
Ne kumukhono kwase kumwene mbandika kano. Kimileembe khukhwama khu Paulo.
Yesi yesi okhasiima Omwami tawe, silaamo sibe khu niye! Maranata, Omwami wefwe yiicha!
Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu kube nanywe.
Busiime bwase bube nanywe mweesi mu Yesu Kristo.

Khu kanisa eya Wele mu Korinjo ne batakatifu ba Wele boosi baali mu sibala sia Akaya sioosi.
Paapa wefwe Wele no Mwami Yesu Kristo bakhoya bamuelesie enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Lekha efwe khupile Wele lundi oli Paapa owo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo orio, Paapa we siisa, Wele niye buyeeti bwoosi bwamangakho!
Akhuyeetanga efwe mu matinyu kefwe koosi nio nafwe khunyale khuyeeta babaandi baali ne butinyu chingano choosi, khubirira mu buyeeti, nibwo khunyoolile khukhwama khu Wele.
Bulayi bwene nga ne khusaanga mu khupisibwa siibi khwa Kristo, lundi aba khubirira mu Kristo mwenoyo khusaanga mu buyeeti buboofu bwa Wele.
Efwe ne khupisibwa siibi, lili khulwe buyeeti khwinywe ne buonia; ne khunyoola buyeeti aba nono mwesi mwanyoolile buyeeti mala mwaelesiibwe kamaani khukhwekhaliilikha mu lifwiilisia siibi nga nisio akhaba efwe fwesi khubiriramo.
Nono lilieyikina liefwe mwinywe lili likali po, khumanyile khuli nga ne musaanga mu khupisibwa siibi khwefwe, musaanga akhaba mu buyeeti nibwo efwe khunyoola.
Khweulila khuli khwakhalakiilwe lifwa. Ne kakhali kano kakholekha nio khukhakhola khurio khweyikina mu fwabeene tawe ne kakhali khweyikine mu Wele yeng'ene, olamusianga bafu.
Aakhuonia efwe khukhwama khu busiku bwe lifwa nga obwo burio ne lundi akhakhuonie efwe. Khwareere lilieyikina liefwe mu niye khuli lundi akhakhuonie efwe.
Enywe mwesi khukhwola mukhuyeete efwe mu khukhusabila efwe. Nio bakali baape orio mu bweyaangu bwefwe khu khabi nicho khuelesibwe khulwe kamasaba kamakali.
Khukhwibonia khwefwe nikhwo khuno. Khwiboneselia buloli bwe kimiooyo kiefwe. Kikhusuubisianga efwe kili limenya liefwe mu sibala muno, ne lukali mu buambaani bwefwe nanywe bwabeele bwe butakatifu lundi bwa ng'ali, khulwe bunyali bwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele, ne seli khulwe limanya lio mundu busa tawe.
Khumuandikila enywe niko munyala mwasoma mala mwakamanya kong'ene. Ne akhaba luno enywe ne mukhakhumanya efwe bulayi tawe, neyikina ndi mulakhumanya efwe bulayi,
nio oli khu Ndaalo yo Mwami wefwe Yesu mukhwebonisiliekho nga fwesi ne khukhebonisilie khwinywe.
Mu kano koosi naba nasuubi lukali, kakila ne narekekha mu khunyoa khu mukeniia enywe, nio mubiitwe chikhabi khabili.
Sikila narekekha khumukeniia ne ndi khu lukeendo lwase lwe khucha e Masedonia lundi ne ndikho ngobola, nio nyoole buyeeti khukhwama khwinywe bwe lukeendo lwase lwe khucha e Buyuda.
Mukhurekekha khuno, naba nga okaluukhana busa? Kholanga lirekekha liase ne kumwoyo kwe khukhwiyenyela? Ne khukhwerekekha nikhwo ndoma ndi, “Yee,” nende “Tawe” mu siise sisiene ne sisiene?
Wele ali ng'ali omusuubilwa. Khwako likhuwa liefwe khwinywe se lili “Yee” nende “Tawe” tawe.
Sikila Yesu Kristo Omwana owa Wele niye Sila, Timoteo ne nase khwelwacha mwinywe se ali owa, “Yee” nende “Tawe” tawe. Ne kakhali buli lwoosi ali, “Yee” eya Wele;
sikila lisuubisia lia Wele lioosi lili “Yee” mu Kristo. Lino nilio likila khubirira mu Yesu Kristo “Amina” yefwe elomwa khu luyali lwa Wele.
Wele omwene niye okhwombakhanga efwe ne nanywe mu Kristo ne khu khura alubeka.
Akhurakho efwe simanyisio siewe khube babeewe, mala akhuelesia Roho Omutakatifu mu miooyo kiefwe, nga rubuni khu koosi niko aakhusuubisia efwe.
Ndanga Wele abe omuloli wase, amanyile kumwoyo kwase! Nabisia ndi se nicha Korinjo tawe, khulwe khumukholela enywe siisa.
Se khulakhakanga khumuyingiilila enywe khu nisio mukhoya musuubile tawe; khumanyile khuli muli ne kamaani mu lisuubila, ne kakhali efwe khukhola kimilimo mwinywe khulwe busangaafu bwenywe.

Nono nabisia mu mebaasio kase ndi se nicha emukhole mubelele lundi tawe.
Sikila naaba ne mukhola enywe mubeelele, naanu aba olarama onyala aasangaasia ese ne bakhali babaandu nibo mbeelesie?
Ako niko kakakila namuandikila enywe ebarwa eyo, se nenya niche ebweeneyo mala babaandu chana bakhoya basangaasie bakhole mbeelele tawe. Sikila suubila ndi nga ne sangaala aba mwesi musangaala.
Namuandikiile ne kumwoyo kunaanisibwa lukali ne bubeeleli ne kamasika kamakali po, sifuno siase se siabeele khu mubeelesia enywe tawe, ne kakhali khumukhola enywe mumanye nga namusiima mwesi lukali.
Nono omundu yesi yesi nabeelesiisie okundi, aba se ambeelesie ese tawe, ne kakhali mu ngila ndala aba amubeelesie enywe mweesi, (Ndoma kano sikila se nenya mbe omurafu khu niye lukali tawe).
Omundu yuno anyoolile siiukuumo mu ngila yino khukhwama khu bakali khwinywe, mala kanyalile kario.
Ne luno, mwenyekha mu mubeele mala mu mutinyilisie nio akhakhola ario abeelela lukali ne khutibisilia elala lilieyikina liewe tawe.
Khwako ese musaba enywe mu mukhole niye amanye ali ng'ali mwamusiima.
Namuandikila ebarwa eyo sikila nenya khumanya nga ne mwabira likela bulayi lundi nga mwirekekhanga buli lwosi khuria kamekisio kase.
Ne mubeela omundu khu niko akholile akhaba sesi mubeela niye. Sikila ese ne mubeela aba ng'ali nenyekha khubeela sisiindu siosi siosi, khola ndi ebweeni wa Kristo sikila enywe
nio khiingilile Sietani akhakhuula efwe tawe, sikila khumanyile lirekekha liewe nga lili.
Ne kakhali naba ne khukhwiiembeelela khukali po, sikila se nanyoolayo wandaayefwe Tito tawe. Khwako, nakheesia babaandu be bweneyo, mala nabalekha nacha e Masedonia.
Ese khupila Wele orio! Sikila buli lwosi akhurangiriranga mu bukhili mu Kristo. Lundi akhurumikhiranga efwe khusalanisia efuma eya Kristo buli abuundu nga kumuuya kwe bimuli biiunya bulayi.
Sikila efwe khuli nga bupaani buunya bulayi burusibwe ne Kristo khu Wele; nibwo liliisi liabwo lifwelaanga akari waabo balikho ne baonisibwa ne naabo balikho ne batiba.
Khwaabo balikho ne batiba bupaani buno buli bubolo bubwira, ne khwaabo balikho ne baonisibwa kuli kumuuya kumulayi kureeranga bulamu. Nono, naanu onyala khukhola kimilimo nga kino kiri?
Se khuli nga babaandu babaandi bakali, baboorabooranga Elomo eya Wele nga bibiindu bikusibwa biikhali ne bukhala tawe. Ne kakhali sikila Wele aakhuruma efwe, khulomaloma mu bung'ali ebweeni wewe nga bakholi ba Kristo.

Lino lilolekha nga efwe ne khulikho khwebonia lundi ku? Kanyala kaaba nga babaandu balala bakholanga, chibarwa chiboola khu bulayi bwefwe chenyibwa chireerwe khwinywe namwe chame khwinywe ku?
Enywe mwabeene muli chibarwa nicho khuli nacho, chaandikwa khu miooyo kiefwe nio buli mundu amanye mala asome.
Limanyikhane lili Kristo omwene aandika ebarwa yino mala aakhuruma efwe khukireera. Se yaandikwa ne bubwino tawe, ne kakhali yaandikwa ne Roho owa Wele omenyile mindali, ne se yaandikwa khu mabaale ke kamalaka tawe, ne kakhali yaandikwa khu miooyo kie babaandu.
Khuloma kano sikila khuli ne bunyindaafu mu Wele khubirira mu Kristo.
Siindu siosi siosi se silikhoo mwifwe sikhuelesia efwe kumunwa khulome khuli khunyala khukhola kimilimo kino tawe. Bunyali nibwo khuli nabwo bwamanga khu Wele;
niye owakhunyalila efwe khurumikhwa khu Ndakaano Embia, ekhali eye lilaka liiandike tawe, ne kakhali eli eya Roho. Lilaka liiandike lireeranga lifwa, ne Roho aana bulamu.
aba luyali lwe kimilimo kia Roho luli lukali po!
Chindaalo che likhalakilwa, chaba ne luyali; ne sikholwa sireeranga buonia nasio aba silaba ne luyali lukali po!
Wakana khunyala khwaloma khuli, sikila luyali lung'enang'ena lukali luno, luyali lulwang'enang'ena khaale lwawao.
Sikila kaaba bali luyali lwaba mwako kakabao khu siise sikeekhe aba luyali luliio lukali po, mwako kaliio luno mindali na mindali!
Khuli banyindaafu lukali sikila khuli ne lilieyikina lino.
Se khuli nga Musa tawe, owafwaranga lububi mumoni nio babaandu ba Isiraeli bakhabona khung'enang'ena ne khulikho khufulafulana ne khuwelelela tawe,
ng'ali kamebaasio kabwe kaba kafuunikhwa, ne akhaba khukhwola endaalo yino kamebaasio kabwe kafuunikhwa ne lububi chana nga basoma bitabu bie Ndakaano Ekhale. Omundu arusibwa mu lububi olwo khubirira mu khuambaanisibwa ne Kristo khwong'ene.
Akhaba luno, nga ne basoma Lilaka lia Musa, lububi lusibafuunikha kamebaasio kabwe.
Ne kakhali lububi lurusibwao omundu ne akobola khu Omwami.
Nono Omwami niye Roho ne niio Roho owo Mwami ali, aba bulekhuule buliio.
Khwako, efwe fweesi mumoni mwefwe musibuulwe mukhosianga luyali lwo Mwami, ne luyali olwo lulwene ne lulwene lwamanga khu Mwami oli Roho, lukhukaluukhasianga efwe khufwaanane naye khukhwama khu sikelo sie luyali silala khucha khu siindi.

Wele khubirira mu siisa siewe akhuelesia efwe kimilimo kino khukhole. Khwako se khufwa kumwoyo tawe.
Khura alubeka bikholwa bie mu bwikisi bie chisoni; se khukholela mu bubeeyi tawe, namwe se khukholela elomo eya Wele bubeeyi tawe. Ne kakhali khwekesia bung'ali mu khukhola bung'ali, khwako khwireera aasi we bukhalaki bwe kimiooyo kie babaandu ebweeni wa Wele.
Sikila abanga bali Elomo Endayi niyo khwilwacha yakiswa, aba yakisiibwe khwaabo balikho ne batiba bong'ene.
Se basuubila tawe, sikila wele khe sibala sino khaabi khekaliilila kamebaasio kabwe mu siilima. Khabekaliililanga nio bakhabona bali buwaanga bulikho bubakhosiakho tawe, buwaanga bwe Lomo Endayi eye luyali lwa Kristo oli busa bulayi bwene nga Wele.
Sikila efwe se khweyilwacha fwabeene tawe, khwilwacha Yesu Kristo nga Omwami; ne efwe fwabeene nga bakholi benywe khulwa Yesu.
Wele owaloma ali, “Buwaanga bulakhosia ne buli mu siilima!” Ali Wele chana no mwene owakhola buwaanga bwewe bwakhosia mu miooyo kiefwe, khu khureerera efwe bukesi bwe luyali lwa Wele lukhosia ebweeni wa Kristo.
Ne efwe khuli ne libiikhilo lia roho lino khuli nga chinyuungu chisala busa, nio khwekesie khuli bunyali bwoosi buli bwa Wele ne se buli khwifwe tawe.
Buli lwosi khunyoola butinyu ne se khutibia lilieyikina tawe, biise bilala khuba mu liaayaaya, ne se khufwa kumwoyo tawe;
basiku baliio bakali, ne se khutaamba omusaale tawe, ne akhaba biise bilala ne khuyaalwa lukali, se khubunisibwa tawe.
Buli lwosi khusutanga lifwa lia Kristo mu mibili kiefwe nga babaandu busa, nio bulamu bwewe bwosi bwoole khubonekha mu mibili kiefwe.
Buli lwosi mu bulamu bwefwe bwoosi khuli mu butinyu bwe khufwa khulwa Yesu, nio bulamu bwewe bwolaane khubonekha mu mibili kiefwe nga babaandu busa kie khuwao kino.
Lino liekesia lili lifwa lili khu milimo mwifwe, ne bulamu buli khu milimo mwinywe.
Khumanyile khuli Wele, owalamusia Omwami Yesu, akhakhulamusie efwe fwesi ne Yesu mala akhubukule akhuyile efwe alala ne nanywe ebweeni wewe.
Kano koosi kali sikila enywe; ne nga kumwalaalo kwa Wele kuchiililila khukhwolela babaandu bakali balaana lisaba likali lie khu khuupa orio khulwe luyali lwa Wele.
Khulwe sifuno sino, se khufwa kumwoyo tawe. Akhaba liiba liefwe lienje ne lilikho likora kalaa, liiba liefwe lia roho lilikho likholwa liya buli ndaalo.
Ne butinyu butiiti bwe siise sitiiti nibwo khuli nabwo buno bulakhureera efwe mu luyali lukali lwa mindali lukhila butinyu.
Sikila se khura kimiooyo kiefwe khu biindu bibonekha tawe, ne kakhali khura khu bikhabonekha tawe. Bibonekhana binyala biabonekha khu siise sitiiti, ne kakhali bikhabonekha tawe bimenyanga mindali na mindali.

Sikila khumanyile khuli liiema nilio khumenyilemo khu sibala khuno ne lionaakwe, khuli ne nju eya mindali mwikulu khukhwama khu Wele enju ekhombakhwa ne kamakhono tawe.
Ne luno khulila ne liliekoomba likali khuli khufware mungo mwefwe mumwichanga khukhwama mwikulu.
Ne khumalile khukhwifwara se khukhabe sichula tawe.
Ne khusimenya mu liiema lie khu sibala khuno, khuchuunisibwa ne kamebaasio ke khumiinikhwa, se kali bali khwenya khulekha kumubili kwefwe kwe khu sibala tawe, ne kakhali khwenya khufwaarwe kumubili kwe mwikulu, nio kwe khufwa kukaluukhasibwe ne bulamu.
Wele niye owakhukholile khwerekekhera likaluukhana lino, mala aakhuelesia Roho wewe nga kumusiingo, kuli khu bioosi nibio aakhubikhila efwe.
Nono buli lwosi khuli ne kumwoyo kwe khuandalala, khumanyile khuli ne khuli mu mibili kino, aba khuli aleeyi khukhwama khu Mwami.
Sikila khukeenda khulwe lisuubila, ne seli khulwe khubona tawe.
Khuli ne bunyindaafu, ne khwakharoboore khurura mungo mwefwe mu mubili mala khube engo no Mwami.
Ne kakhali siindu siboofu lukali khukhila bioosi sili mbo, efwe khwenya khumusiimisia niye, khwakhaba mungo mwefwe ano namwe eyo.
Sikila fweesi khukhwola khwiche ebweeni wa Kristo, akhukhalakile. Buli mulala alinyoola kakenyekha anyoole khuloondekhana khu buli siindu nisio akholile mu bulamu bwe kumubili buno, silayi namwe siibi.
Sikila efwe khumanyile khuria Omwami nisio siina, khukhaka khuboolela babaandi beche. Wele akhumanyile efwe bulayi, mala neyikina ndi mu miooyo kienywe mumanyile ese sesi.
Se khulakhakanga lundi khumuboolela enywe bulayi bwefwe fwabeene tawe, ne kakhali khulakhakanga khumuelesia enywe sifuno silayi sie khukhwebonia sikila efwe, nio munyale khukobosia abo babebonia sikila khubonekha khwenje khwe babaandu ne seli khulwe kimiima kiabwe tawe.
Khwaaba ne khulaluukhe, aba khuli khurio khulwa Wele. Namwe ne khuli ne limanya lilayi, aba kali sikila enywe.
Busiime bwa Kristo bukhurukanga efwe sikila khumanyile khuli niye aafwiila buli mundu, nono liekesia lili boosi basaanga mu lifwa liewe.
Aafwiila boosi, nio abo bamenya, bakhamenya lundi sikila babeene tawe, ne kakhali bamenyele oyo yeng'ene owafwa, ne khulamusibwa sikila nibo.
Khwako, efwe se khukhalakila omundu yesi yesi khulwe sikelo sio mundu tawe. Akhaba fweesi asiise silala ne khwakhalakila Kristo khulwe sikelo sio mundu, se khukhola khurio lundi tawe.
Khwako, omundu yesi yesi ne ali mu Kristo, aba ali sibuumbe siya, kamakhale kabirire, kamaya kechile.
Kano koosi kakholwa ne Wele, owakhukaluukhasia efwe khubirira mu Kristo, khukhwaba basiku khwekela basaale bewe, mala aakhuelesia efwe kimilimo kie khukhola babaandu boosi babe basaale bewe.
Burume bwefwe buli buno, Wele aba alikho akhola babaandu boosi babe basaale bewe khubirira mu Kristo. Wele se aabalilila bubwoni bwabwe tawe, mala akhuelesie efwe burume bukhuboolela nga niye nabakholanga nibo khuba basaale bewe.
Nono, efwe khulomaloma mu bweyaangu bwa Kristo, bulayi bwene oli Wele omwene ne alikho ekoonjelela khubirira mwifwe. Khulwa Kristo khumwekoonjelela enywe, lekha Wele amukaluukhasie enywe mulekhe khuba basiku mube basaale bewe!
Kristo se aaba ne bubwoni tawe, ne sikila efwe Wele amukhola niye asaange mu bwoni bwefwe mala mu buambaani naye khwole khusaanga mu buluungi bwa Wele.

Nono mu milimo kiefwe alala ne Wele, khumusaba enywe mu mwanyoola kumwalaalo kwa Wele mukhakulekha kwasasikha busa tawe.
Ulila niko Wele alomanga:
“Nga siise siase
sie khukhubabila ne siola nakhuulila;
nga endaalo eye khu khuonia ne yola, nakhuyeeta.”
Rekeeresia! Sino sili siise sie khubabilwa ne Wele; Luno eli endaalo eye khuonisibwa!
Se khwenya omundu yesi yesi anyoole kamakhiikha mu milimo kiefwe tawe, khwako se khukhaka khura sikundula khu ngila yo mundu yesi yesi tawe.
Ne kakhali, buli mu siindu siosi siosi nisio khukhola khwekesia khuli efwe khuli bakholi ba Wele khulwe khukhwifwiilisia ne khukhwikhaliilikha mu linaanisibwa, mu buandalafu, ne mu butinyu.
Khwakhupwa, khwabowa, ne khusangililwa; khwakhosibwa kimilimo lukali, khwareengecha ne khuonga enjala.
Khulwe bukwalaafu bwefwe ne bukesi ne liliefwiilisia ne kimiooyo kimilayi khweyekesie fwabeene khuba bakholi ba Wele khulwa Roho Omutakatifu, khulwe busiime bwefwe bwa ng'ali,
khulwe burume bwefwe bwe bung'ali ne bunyali bwa Wele. Khuli ne buluungi nga bulwaani bwefwe bwe khu khupanila ne khukhwitechela.
Khuelesebwa lukoosi ne lundi khuchangalaasibwa, khukhomwa lundi khufumisibwa. Khwabukulwa khuba babeeyi, ne khane khulomaloma bung'ali;
nga khukhamanyikhe tawe, ne khane khwamanyikha khu boosi, oli khukhwafwa ne kakhali khuli balamu nga mubona. Khwaba ne khuukuumwa, se khwirwa tawe;
khwakhaba ne khubeelesibwa, khuli basangaafu buli lwosi; khubonekha khuba bataambi, ne kakhali khukhola bakali khuba baiinda, khubonekha nga khukhali ne sisiindu tawe, ne khane ng'ali khuli na buli siindu.
Basaale bakoosi muli mu Korinjo! Khwalomalome khwinywe abuwaanga, khwamwikulila kimiooyo kiefwe.
Efwe se khwaloba khumusiima enywe tawe, enywe ninywe mumwaloba khu khusiima efwe.
Luno ndomaloma busa oli enywe muli babaana base. Lekha kamebaasio kenywe khwifwe kabe nga niko efwe khuli nako khwinywe, yikula kimiooyo kienywe!
Mukhaambaana ne babaandu bakhasuubila tawe, sikila se linyala liakholekha tawe. Buwaanga bunyala bwaambaana ne sisiilima ku?
Kristo ne Sietani banyala bafukiilisiana ku? Omusuubili no mundu okhasuubila baambanila khu siina?
Lukaangu lwa Wele lunyala lwafukiilisiana ne bifwaani bie bakhamanyile Wele luriena? Sikila efwe khuli Lukaangu lwa Wele omenyile mindali! Nga Wele omwene ne aalomile ali,
“Ndakhola mungo mwase mu baandu base
mala mbamenyemo.
Ese khabe Wele wabwe,
ne nibo bakhabe babaandu base.”
“Khukhwola mubaruremo mala mubeyaulekho,
mukhatiilakho sisiindu sili sinyaalu tawe
mala ndamufukiilila enywe.
Ndaba Raraawenywe,
ne nanywe mulaba babaana base basoleeli ne bakhaana.”

Basaale base bakoosi sikila lisuubisia lino lioosi lili khwifwe, nono khekhwikwalaasie khukhwama khu buli siindu sinyaalutianga kumubili namwe kumwoyo, mala khubeele elala batakatifu khwole khumenya mu khuria Wele.
Khe mukhwikulile bubweyaangu mu miooyo kienywe, se khwarumikhiirekho omundu yesi yesi khulwa fwabeene tawe.
Se ndikho ndoma kano khumukhalakila enywe tawe, nga naloma khaale, enywe muli bakoosi lukali khwifwe, buli lwoosi khuli alala akhaba ne khumenya namwe ne khufwa.
Ndi na suubi engali khwinywe, nebonia lukali sikila enywe! Mu butinyu bwefwe bwoosi, ese siili ne bunyindaafu, ndi ne liliekhoya likali po.
Ne kakhali Wele, ochuubanga bafwiile kumwoyo, aakhuchuuba efwe khubirira mu khwicha khwa Tito.
Se khwaba khukhwicha khwewe khwong'ene khukhwakhusangaasia efwe tawe ne kakhali buloli bwewe nga mwamuchuuba niye bwosi bwakhusangaasia. Aakhuboolela efwe nga enywe ne mwenya lukali khu khumbona ese, ne musaba khubeelwa khu niko mwakhola. Lundi amboolela nga nilwo mwerekekhera khu khusoola ese. Nono ese ndi omusangaafu lukali po.
Sikila akhaba ebarwa yase ne yamubeelesia enywe ese se nisonia ndi nakiandika tawe (akhaba ne nisonia sikila mbona ndi ebarwa eyo yamubeelesia, akhaba ne yaba khu siise sitiiti).
Nono luno ndi omusangaafu, ne se lili sikila namubeelesia enywe tawe, ne kakhali sikila bubeeleli obwo bwarumikhirwa ne Wele, khumukhola enywe mukaluukhane mu ngila chenywe. Nono se khwamunyaalakho enywe mu ngila yosi yosi tawe.
Sikila bubeeleli burumikhirwa ne Wele bureraanga likaluukhana lie kumwoyo lireera buonia, ne mu lienelio khukhwesonia mbamo! Ne kakhali bubeeleli buli bwo mundu busa, busaasianga lifwa.
Lola niko Wele akholile khurumikhira bubeeleli bwenywe buno: bwamukholile muli ne sinani, lundi muli ne silukuluku sie khukhwekesia muli se muli ne bubi tawe, bwamukholile mwabeele ne lirima ne buuri. Bwakila mwenya sisiindu sikhoyela sikholekhe sikholebwe mwekesia mwabeene muli se muli ne kamakhiikha mu kano koosi tawe.
Nono nakhaba ne naandika ebarwa eyo, se yaba sikila mulala owakhola kamabi namwe mulala owakholelwa kamabi tawe. Ne kakhali nakiandika khumwekesia enywe abuwaanga, mumoni cha Wele, nga sinani sienywe khwifwe ne sili sikali.
Ako niko kakakhuraamo efwe kumwoyo.
Se khuli khuchuubwa khwong'ene tawe; Tito akhusangaasia efwe lukali ne busangaafu bwewe nga enywe mwesi mwamusangaasia!
Nebonia khu niye sikila enywe, ne enywe se mwambeelesie tawe. Buli lwosi khwalomalomanga bung'ali khwinywe, ne mu ngila eyo ne ng'ene ekibonio niyo nakholela Tito yechile khuba eya ng'ali.
Nono busiime bwewe khwinywe butasikhanga buba bwe kamaani po, nga nakhebulila, nga enywe mwesi ne mwerekekha khuria kamekisio kewe, nga ne mwamwakaanila ne buuri bukali.
Ndi omusangaafu lukali sikila nyala na mweyikina enywe!

Babeele mu makhako lukali po ne linaanisibwa nilio babiriiremo; ne kakhaba kario ekhoyo yabwe yaba engali lukali. Sikila ekhoyo yino, baba baani lukali akhaba ne bali babanani.
Nyala namusuubisia enywe ndi mu bulekhuule bwe kumwoyo baana bikali lukali nga baba banyala, lundi baana batumakho lilienyalila liabwe.
Bakhusaba efwe ne khukhwekoonjelela khulwe bubweyaangu bwe khuyeeta babaandu ba Wele mu Buyuda.
Bwaba buyeeti bukali khukhila nga ne khweyikina! Khunyoa beaana babeene khu Mwami, mala khulwe lilienya lia Wele beaana babeene akhaba khwifwe fwesi.
Khwako khwatinyilisia Tito, owarakikha kimilimo kino, achiililile nakio mala amuyeete enywe mumale bukholi bwe busiime buno.
Muli baiinda lukali mu bioosi nibio muli nabio: mu lisuubila, lilomaloma ne bukesi, mu silukuluku sienywe sie khuyeeta ne mu busiime bwenywe khwifwe. Nono khwenya mwesi mube baani mu bukholi bwe busiime buno.
Se ndikho ndaao kamalaka kosi kosi tawe. Ne kakhali nga ndikho mwekesia nga babaandi ne bali ne silukuluku sie khuyeeta, nda khakanga khumanya nga busiime bwenywe ne buli.
Enywe mumanyile kumwalaalo kwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo; aaba omuiinda mala omwene ekhola omutaambi sikila enywe, nio amukhole enywe mube baiinda khulwe butaambi bwewe.
Ese nibaasia ndi buli bulayi mumaliile luno kimilimo nikio mwarakikha kumwiiko kukwabirire. Enywe mwaba be khunyoa khukhwirusia khukhola lundi be khunyoa khukhola khwosi.
Nono chiililila mala mumaliile kimilimo chana! Ba ne silukuluku sie khukimaliila nga ne mwaba nasio mu khurekekha, mala kikhole khurumikhira nisio muli nasio luno.
Mwaba ne muli ne silukuluku sie khuaana, Wele alafukiilila siianwa sienywe khuloondekhana nende khuaana nisio muli nasio, seli khuloondekhana nende nisio mukhali nasio tawe.
Se ndakhakanga khuuluusia babaandi mu khu muluyia enywe tawe, ne kakhali sikila siise sino muli nabio bikali, buli bulayi enywe muyeete abo bakhali nabio tawe.
Nanywe oli se muli nabio tawe, ne nibo bali nabio bikali, bakhamuyeete enywe, mu ngila yino mwembi mulakholelwa kamafwaanane.
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Omundu owabuusia bikali se aba nabio bikali lukali tawe, ne omundu owabuusia bikeekhe se biaboomba tawe.”
Efwe khuupila Wele orio khulwe khukhola Tito abe ne silukuluku nga efwe ne khuli khumuyeeta enywe!
Se kali busa bali aafukiilila nga ne khwamusaba tawe, yesi aba ne silukuluku sikali sie khuyeeta, mala khulwe bulekhuule bwewe omwene aakhalaka khukhwicha khwinywe.
Alala ne naye khulikho khuruma wandaayefwe omurie lukali mu chikanisa choosi khulwe kimilimo kiewe mu khwilwacha Elomo Endayi.
Ne alala ne nako aroborwa ne khuelesibwa kimilimo ne chikanisa khucha nafwe nga khukhola kimilimo kie busiime kino khulwe luyali lwo Mwami ne khwekesia khuli khwenya khuyeeta.
Khuli ne liloleelesia likali khukhakhola khurio khwenyosia liliilung'unya khulwe mu ngila niyo khubukulilamo siianwa sino tawe.
Sifuno siefwe sili khukhola lili liluungi ebweeni wo Mwami, nende ebweeni we babaandu.
Nono khulikho khuruma wandaayefwe alala ne nabo; khwamukhosia likela biise bikali mala khwanyoola khuli buli lwosi ali ne silukuluku sikali sie khuyeeta. Ne luno nga ali ne lisuubila likali mwinywe, ali ne silukuluku sikali sie khuyeeta.
Ne Tito naye ali omukholi owasiase mala akholanga alala nase khumuyeeta enywe; ne khulwe bawandaayefwe babaandi balikho ne becha naye, balikho becha mu bweyaangu bwe chikanisa lundi bareera luyali khu Kristo.
Bekesie busiime bwenywe, nio chikanisa choosi chibe na ng'ali khu busiime bwenywe mala bamanye bali efwe khuli ng'ali khukhwibonia sikila enywe.

Sifuno sisiene se siliio khwise khu muandikila khulwe buyeeti bulikho ne burumwa khu baandu ba Wele mu Yuda tawe.
Manyile ndi mwerusia khuyeeta, mala namwiboneseliakho khu baandu be mu Masedonia. Ndomile ndi, “Bawandaayefwe mu Akaya baba berekekha khuyeeta, khukhwama kumwiiko kukwaweele.” Silukuluku sienywe siaelesia bakali khu nibo kamaani.
Nono ndikho nduma bawandaayefwe bano, nio ekibonio yefwe khwinywe mu makhuwa kano ekhaba kamakhuwa ka busa tawe. Ne nga naloma busa ndio, mwerekekha ne buyeeti bwenywe.
Kakhaba kario babaandu khukhwama Masedonia baaba ne becha nase mala khumunyoole enywe se mwerekeekhe tawe, aba khulaambwa chisoni chingali ne chichenywe nacho chilatuumakho sikila efwe khwamweyikiine enywe lukali.
Khwako nebaasiisie ndi buli bulayi ndeebe bawandaayefwe bano banyoe beche ebweeneyo ese ne khecha tawe, mala mwirekekhe ne siianwa nisio mwasuubisia siise ne sisiili. Nio ne noola, nyoole ne siliio, mala liekesie lili muaana sikila mwenya khuaana, ne seli sikila bali mukhoya khukhola murio tawe.
Khebulila muli omundu omiicha bumiicho bukeekhe akesa bukeekhe, ne oyo omiicha bumiicho bukali akesa bukali.
Buli mulala enyekha aane nono nga ne abisiisie, akhakelao esonia tawe, namwe akhaana sikila enyekha khukhola ario tawe, sikila Wele asiima omundu oanilanga mu busangaafu.
Ne Wele anyala aamuelesia enywe bikali khukhila nga ne mwenya, nio buli lwosi mube na bioosi nibio mwenya ne bikali lukali khulwe kimilimo kimilayi.
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Aanaanga bikali khu bakhali nabio tawe;
bulayi bwewe bubechangao mindali na mindali.”
Buli lwosi alamukhola mube baiinda lukali khulwe khuba baani mu biise bioosi, nio bakali baapile Wele orio khu biianwa bienywe nibio banyoolanga khukhwama khwifwe.
Sikila bukholi nibwo mukhola buno, se buli busa khulwe lilienya lie babaandu ba Wele bong'ene tawe, bukilanga babaandu ba Wele ne bamupila niye orio lukali.
Ne khulwe sisiokesia nisio bukholi bwenywe buno bureeranga, bakali balaelesia Wele luyali khulwe buriaani bwenywe khu Lomo eya Kristo niyo mweyamanga, khulwe buaani bwenywe mu khusaanga nabo nende buli mundu yesi yesi.
Nono balamusabila enywe, ne kumwoyo kwe busiime kumukali sikila kumwalaalo nikwo Wele amwekesie enywe.
Lekha khupile Wele orio khulwe siianwa siewe sikhakulikha tawe!

Ese samwene Paulo mwikoonjelela enywe, ese niye balomanga bali ndi omuolu ne ndi nanywe, ne nendi aleeyi mba omurafu khwinywe. Khulwe buolu ne bulayi bwa Kristo
musaba enywe ndi nga ne niicha mukhambingiilila ndafue tawe, sikila ndi na ng'ali ndi nyala narafwira abo balomanga bali efwe khukholanga kimilimo khuloondekhana ne lilienya lie sibala.
Ng'ali efwe khumenyile mu sibala, ne se khupana nga sibala ne siipana tawe.
Bulwaani nibwo khurumikhira mwiie liefwe se buli bwe sibala tawe, ne kakhali buli bulwaani bwa Wele bwe bunyali, nibwo khurumikhiranga khukhwonakaka ching'etuuti che kamaani. Khwonakakanga kamayiingamo ke bubeeyi;
khurusiangao buli sikundula sie khukhwibonia sikhiingililanga bukesi bwa Wele, khuaamba buli mebaasio mala khukakhola karia Kristo.
Ne mumalile khukhwekesia mu bwichufu buriaani bwenywe, khulerekekha khuukuuma sikholwa siosi siosi sikhali sie buriaani tawe.
Mulikho muloleelela libonekha lienje lie bibiindu. Aliio omundu ebweeneyo owemanyile ali, ali owa Kristo ku? Bulayi, lekha lundi, omwene eyibaasie sikila akhaba efwe fwesi khuli ba Kristo bulayi bwene nga niye yesi nali.
Sikila se ndi ne chisoni tawe, akhaba abulala ne nebonia lukali khulwe bunyali nibwo Omwami akhuelesia efwe, bunyali bwe khumwombakha enywe se buli bwe khumusambuula tawe.
Se nenya mbonekhe ndi ndakhakanga khumuriikhirisia enywe ne chibarwa chase tawe.
Omundu mulala anyala aaloma ali, “Chibarwa cha Paulo chili chindafu lundi chindinyu, oli omwene ali alala nafwe, ali omutekhele, ne kamakhuwa kewe se kalimo sisiindu tawe!”
Omundu nga oyo ario khukhwola amanye ali bubwabukhani se buliio akari we kamakhuwa niko efwe khuandika mu barwa chefwe ne khuli aleeyi nende niko khukhola ne khuli ebweeneyo ne nanywe tawe.
Ng'ali, efwe se khunyala khwakhaka khukhwefwaanania, namwe khukhwilekhaasia khwaabo babeniinia lukali bario tawe. Se bali ne limanya tawe! Bekholela bikelo bie khukhwilekhaasiakho babeene, mala bekhalakila babeene khuloondekhana ne sikelo siaabwe!
Ne kakhali efwe, liliebonia liefwe se libira sikelo tawe, liakamila khu sikelo sie kimilimo nikio Wele akhuelesia efwe, kimilimo kiefwe mwinywe kiosi kili mu sikelo sino.
Ne sikila enywe mulimo, se khwabira sisiakamo siefwe nga khwecha ewenywe ne khureera Elomo Endayi eya Kristo tawe.
Nono se khweboniselia kimilimo nikio babaandi bakhola kiibira bibiakamo nibio Wele akhurerao efwe tawe. Ne kakhali khwikoomba lisuubila lienywe lichoe mala khube ne khunyala khukhola kimilimo kimiboofu lukali mwinywe buli lwosi mu biakamo nibio Wele akhurerao.
Khwako, khunyala khwelwacha Elomo Endayi mu bibala bibiindi engelekha, ne se khunyala khweboniselia khu milimo kikholekhe khale mu mukuunda kwo mundu okundi tawe.
Sikila omundu ofukiililwa, ali niye Omwami ebaasiilie bulayi, ne seli nga omundu omwene ne eyibaasilia tawe.

Nekoomba munjikhaliilikhe, akhaba nendi omusilu. Ne musiima njekhaliilikhile!
Ese ndi ne likhalikhililwa khwinywe nga Wele yesi ne ali: muli nga omukhaana omukwalaafu owe yabwana niye nasuubisia khureerana no museecha mulala yeng'ene, Kristo omwene.
Ese ndi ne buuri ndi kamebaasio kenywe kalonakwa mala mulalekha lilierusia lienywe lie mu bwichufu ne bukwalaafu khu Kristo, mu ngila ne ng'ene niyo endemu mu bukesi bwayo yabeelamo Hawa.
Sikila mu busangaafu mufukiililanga buli mundu yesi yesi owichanga khwinywe mala elwacha Yesu okundi okhali niye efwe khwelwacha tawe; lundi mufukiililanga roho ne elomo endayi eyaukhanila elala ne Roho ne Elomo Endayi niyo mwanyoola khukhwama khwifwe!
Se neyibaasia ndi ese ndi omukeekhe khwaabo balaangwa, “Barumwa” benywe abo tawe!
Wakana ese ndi omukeekhe mu khulomaloma, ne ng'ali ese ndi omusomi, buli siise khwara kano koosi abuwaanga khwinywe.
Se namuruungiakho siindu nga namwilwachila enywe Elomo Endayi eya Wele tawe. Neboombia ndi, nio mukhole enywe mube bakhoongo. Aba nakhola bubi ku?
Nga ne naba ne khola kimilimo mwinywe, naruungwa ne chikanisa chichiindi. Nabanuulanga nibo nio muyeete enywe.
Ne mu siise nisio nabelamo nanywe se namunaanianga nga ne nenyanga buyeeti bwe chirupia tawe; bawandaayefwe babaama e Masedonia bandeerera buli siindu nisio nenya. Nga ne kaba mu ndaalo chichabira, kaliba kario mu ndaalo chichiicha: se ndibaakho busiro khwinywe tawe!
Khulwe bung'ali bwa Kristo buuli mwise, suubisia ndi liliebonia liase lino se aliio olilisisia abuundu osi osi mu Akaya mwoosi tawe.
Ndikho ndoma kano sikila bali se namusiima enywe tawe? Akhaba Wele amanyile ali namusiima!
Ndachiililila khukhola niko ndikho khola luno, nio khiingilile “barumwa” babaandi abo bakhaba ne sifuno siosi siosi sie khukhwebonia ne khuloma bali bakholanga kimilimo mu ngila neng'ene nga efwe khukholanga tawe.
Babaandu abo se bali barumwa ng'ali tawe, bali barumwa be bubeeyi; babeana khulwe kimilimo kiabwe mala bekaluukhasia babeene babonekha nga ng'ali barumwa ba Kristo.
Se lili lie khuukia tawe! Akhaba Sietani anyala ekaluukhasia omwene afwaana nga malaika owe buwaanga!
Nono se lili likhuwa liboofu bakholi bewe ne bekaluukhasia bafwaana nga bakholi be buluungi tawe. Ekhumaliilikha balinyoola niko benyekha banyoole khulwe bikholwa biabwe.
Ngobolamo: Omundu yesi yesi akhebaasia ali ese ndi omusilu tawe. Ne kakhali ne mwibaasia murio, aba fukiilile ese khuba omusilu nio mbe nende sitiiti sie khukhwiboneseliakho.
Niko ndikho ndoma kano se kali niko Omwami enya ndome tawe, mu makhuwa ke khukhwibonia kano ng'ali ndikho ndomaloma nga omusilu.
Ne sikila babaandu baliio bakali babebonia khulwe bifuno bie sibala sino, sesi ndakhola ndio.
Enywe mwabeene muli bakesi po, mala mufukiilila basilu mu busangaafu!
Mufukiilila omundu yesi yesi omusukiasukia namwe omundu omurumikhira namwe omurekania, namwe omulekeelesia enywe, namwe omupanga luui.
Ese ndi ne chisoni khufukiilila ndi khwaba ne buuri bukali khukhola bibiindu biewe ebio!
Ne omundu yesi yesi aaba nakhaka khukhweboneselia khu siindu siosi siosi, ese ndikho ndomaloma nga omusilu, aba sesi nyala nakhaka khusieboneseliakho.
Baeburania nibo ku? Akhaba sesi ndi ndio. Baisiraeli? Akhaba sesi ndi ndio. Nibo bali be lisaaye lia Aburahamu? Akhaba sesi ndi ndio.
Nibo bakholi ba Kristo ku? Ese ndi omulayi khubakhila. Ndikho ndomaloma nga omulalu, nakhola kimilimo ne kamaani lukali khubakhila, naba mu siboe biise bikali khubakhila napwa lukali khubakhila, naba siimbi ne lifwa kamakhabi kamakali.
Kamakhabi karaano Bayaudi bakhupa kimikhomwa kamakhumi kataru na tisa;
kamakhabi kataru Barumi bakhupa: ne lulala napwa kamabaale. Nesiikha mu nyanja ne meeli kamakhabi kataru ne lulala nekhala mumeechi chisa kamakhumi kabili na chine.
Mu ngeendo chase chingali nabeele mu busiku bwe khuyilwa ne kameechi kakechuule ne mu busiku bwe banuuli. Nabeele mu busiku khukhwama khu Bayaudi ba siase ne khukhwama khu Be Chikholo; busiku bwabeleo mu ngoba ne mu sichiimi, busiku khu nyanja, ne busiku khukhwama khu basaale be bubeeyi.
Kimilimo kimiandalafu kiabeleo, lukali narengecha busa, naba ne njala ne bulesia, lukali nabeele ne siakhulia sikhanjola tawe, enju twa, chingubo twa.
Ne khaloma ne bibiindu bibiindi tawe, buli endaalo mbechanga mu khwiembeelela khulwe chikanisa choosi.
Omundu yesi yesi ne aba omutekhele, akhaba sesi neulila khuba omutekhele, ne omundu yesi yesi nakwa mu bwoni, ese mba ne bubeeleli bukali po.
Ne ndi bali khukhwola nebonie, aba nebonesia khulwe bibiindu bibiekesia nga ese ne ndi omutekhele.
Wele lundi Paapa owo Mwami Yesu, lisina liewe lifumisibwa mindali na mindali! Niye amanyile ali se ndikho mbea tawe.
Nga naba mu Damasika omuruki owaba aasi wo mwami Areta ara baliindi a bilibwa bambaambe.
Mala nekhisibwa mu sikono khubirira mu numa eye mwisiisi namwikobakho.

Ndebonia akhaba ne khanyoolamo sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, ne luno ndakachula khulwe kamalola ne lifuunulwa nilio naelesibwa no Mwami.
Manyile omukristo nabulebe owayuulwa ayilwa mwikulu lie khataru, kimiiko kiabirire ekhumi na kine. (Se manya kano ng'ali ne kakholekha, namwe naba ne kamalola busa tawe, Wele yeng'ene niye omanyile.)
Ne, manyile ndi omundu yuno ayuulwa ayilwa mu Paratiso. (Lundi se manya ng'ali kano ne kakholekha namwe ne kaaba kamalola busa tawe, Wele yeng'ene niye omanyile.)
Ne ebweeneyo aulila bibiindu bikhaboolekha tawe, bibiindu nibio kiminwa kio mundu kikhanyala kialomaloma tawe.
Nono ndeboneselia khu mundu yuno, ne se ndebonia khulwa samwene tawe, ne kakhali khu biindu bibiokesia nga ese ne ndi omutekhele.
Abanga nenya khukhwebonia andi se mbeele omusilu tawe, sikila aba ndikho ndoma bung'ali. Ne kakhali se ndebonia tawe, sikila se nenya omundu yesi yesi anjibaasilie kamakali khukhila niko amboone ne khola, nende niko auliile ese ne ndoma tawe.
Ne kakhali khu khuukhingila ese khebonia lukali sikila lifuunulwa likali lie khuukia nilio nabona tawe, naelesibwa buchuuni mu mubili mwase nga liiwa buuli omurumwa owa Sietani khu khukhupa ne khu khuukhiingilila ese khakhola ndio nebonia tawe.
Nasaba Omwami kamakhabi kataru, nemureeba ndi andusiemo sisiindu sino.
Ne kakhali aangobosia ali, “Kumwalaalo kwase kukhunyala sikila bunyali bwase bubonekha lukali po mu butekhele bwowo.” Nono ese ndi omusangaafu lukali khukhweboneselia khu butekhele bwase, nio bunyali bwa Kristo bumenye mwise.
Nanyalikha ne butekhele, bukhomo, buandalafu, kiminaanio, ne butinyu khulwa Kristo. Sikila ne ndi omutekhele aba ndi ne kamaani.
Ndikho khola nga omusilu, ne enywe ninywe mukilile. Enywe ninywe mukhoya mwekesie mwafukiliile ese. Sikila akhaba ne khali siindu tawe, se ndikho omukeekhe mu ngila yosi yosi khu “Barumwa bakhoongo” benywe abo tawe.
Kamayia kamakali ne kamakhuwa ke khuukia, ne bikholwa bie kamaani bibiekesia bili ese ndi omurumwa, biekholekha akari wenywe ne liliifwiilisia likali.
Siina nisio namwimana mala nakholela chikanisa chichiindi? Ne kakhali se namunaania enywe mu khu musaba buyeeti bwe chirupia tawe? Ne musiima mumbeele khulwe khumwimana enywe bung'ali obwo!
Luno nerekeekhe khumukeniia lukhola khataru, mala se ndenya mumbelesie siosi siosi tawe. Enywe nibo nenya, se chili chirupia chenywe tawe. Babaana se bakhoya babe nibo barusilia basaasi babwe tawe, ne kakhali basaasi nibo bakhoya barusilia babaana babwe.
Ndaba omusangaafu khurumikhira bioosi nibio ndi nabio, lundi akhaba samwene nderusia nio muyeete enywe. Munyala mwasiima ese akeekhe sikila ese namusiima enywe lukali ku?
Khwako mufukiilila muli ese se namuluyiakho enywe tawe. Ne kakhali omundu okundi anyala aaloma ali, naba omukesikesi, mala namureka enywe ne bubeeyi.
Ese namunyoolakho enywe bukhala ndiena khubirira khu yesi yesi khu nibo naruma khwinywe?
Nekoonjelela Tito ache, mala namuruma niye ne wandaayefwe omukristo okundi. Munyala mwaloma muli Tito anyoolela khwinywe bukhala ku? Niye nase se khukholanga ne lilienya ne liba lifwaanane lundi mu ngila ndala?
Wakana mwibaasia muli mu kano koosi efwe khukhakanga khukhwebabila ebweeni wenywe. Se kali kario tawe! Khulomaloma nga Kristo ne enya khulomalome ebweeni wa Wele, ne buli siindu nisio khukhola bakoosi, khukhola khumuyeeta enywe.
Ese ndi ne buuri ndi nga ndiola ebweeneyo ndi munyoola enywe ne mwakaluukhana mwaba lukano lundi busa khuloondekhana nga nenya mube, nanywe mukhabone sesi ne ndi lukano lundi busa khuloondekhana nga ne mwenya mbe. Ndi ne buuri ndi khanyoole bulomani ne likhalikhililwa, kurima ne khukhweyenyela, bukhomo ne kamakuto, ekibonio ne likoyaana.
Ndi ne buuri ndi siise sisiindi ne niicha Wele wase alimbambia chisoni ebweeni wenywe, mala khalile khulwe bakali babakhola bubwoni mu ndaalo chibirire, mala bakhekanila bibiindu biabwe bie sifwaabi nibio bakhola tawe, liliekoomba liabwe ne bubwoni bwabwe bwe bueeyi.

Nenya khuboolela balala khwinywe babakhola bubwoni mu ndaalo chichabirire, ne babaandi boosi. Nalilomakho khale nga namukeniia enywe lukhola khabili, ne luno nga ne ndi aleeyi ndaliloma lundi. Ne ndiicha lwanyuma, se aliio okhekobe siiukuumo tawe.
Mukhanyoole bung'ali nibwo mwenya nio mubone muli Kristo alomalomelanga mwise. Khwinywe Kristo se ali omutekhele tawe, ekesianga bunyali bwewe, mwinywe.
Akhaba mu butekhele ne abaambwa khu musalaba, amenyanga sikila bunyali bwa Wele. Mu bulala naye akhaba efwe fweesi khuli batekhele; ne mu buambaani bwefwe ne nanywe khulasaanga mu bunyali bwa Wele mu bulamu bwewe.
Khe mwire khu likela mala mwikhalakile nio mwimanye ne mwamenya mu lisuubila namwe tawe. Ng'ali se mumanyile muli Yesu Kristo ali mwinywe tawe ku? Ngeba mwaba ne mwakwila elala.
Suubila ndi mulamanya muli efwe se khuli babakhilwa tawe.
Khusaba Wele khuli mukhakhola kamabi tawe, se kali bali nio khwekesie khuli khwabira tawe, ne kakhali nio enywe mwole khukhola liili liluungi, akhaba wakana ne khubonekha nga babakhilwa.
Sikila se khunyala khwakhola sisiindu siosi siosi khulwe khulekeelesia bung'ali tawe. Khukhola sie bung'ali bwong'ene.
Khusangaala ne khuli batekhele ne kakhali enywe muli be kamaani. Mala khusaba khuli mwesi mube babechufu.
Sino nisio sikila ne mbandika lino ne ndi aleeyi khukhwama niio muli, mbandika lino nio ne khoole ebweeneyo khakhola ndio narumikhira bunyali nibwo Omwami aambelesia khumubiiya enywe mu bukhalafu tawe, bunyali buno buli bwe khu mwombakha enywe, ne se buli bwe khumusambuula tawe.
Nono, bawandaayase, muliindwa! Khaka kamaani mube babechufu, rekeeresia liliekoonjelela liase; mwabeene fukiilisiana; menya mu muleembe. Mala Wele owe busiime ne kumuleembe alaba nanywe.
Khesiana mu khwekwayilana nga wandaaye ne wandaaye.
Batakatifu boosi bamukhesiisie. Kumwalaalo kwo Omwami Yesu Kristo ne busiime bwa Wele ne busaanganilo bwa Roho Omutakatifu bube nanywe mweesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo, niye kumulaango kwe khuuba omurumwa kuukhaama khu mundu namwe khu maani ko mundu tawe, ne kakhali khukhwama khu Yesu Kristo ne Wele Paapa owamulamusia niye khukhwama mu lifwa.
Bawandaayase boosi bali ano baambanile nase khuruma kimileembe khu kanisa cha Kalatia.
Wele Paapa wefwe no Mwami Yesu Kristo akhoya amuelesie enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Kristo eana omwene khulwe bubwoni bwefwe, mu khuloonda lilienya lia Wele lundi Paapa wefwe, nio akhusikule efwe khukhwama khu selukho emayaanu yino.
Luyali lube khu Wele mindali na mindali! Amina.
Enywe mumbukia! Mu siise sikeekhe busa mulikho mwanjukha oyo owamulaanga enywe khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Kristo, mala mulikho muloonda elomo ekiindi.
Ng'ali, “Elomo Endayi” ekiindi se liio tawe, ne kakhali ese mboola ndio sikila babaandu balala baliio balikho bamunaania enywe, ne khukhaka khukaluukhasia Elomo Endayi eya Kristo.
Ne kakhali khwakhaba efwe namwe malaika khukhwama mwikulu ne elwacha khwinywe elomo lukano luluundi khukhwama khu niyo khwamwilwachila, akhoya alaamwe!
Khwalomakho khale, ne luno ndoma lundi, aaba bali yesi yesi amwilwachila elomo eli lukano luluundi khukhwama khu niyo mwafukiilila, akhoyeele alaamwe!
Kano kalolekha nga ese olikho okhaka khufukiililwa ebweeni we babaandu busa ku? Ng'ali se kali kario tawe! Nilio nenya lili khufukiililwa ebweeni wa Wele! Namwe kalolekha nga ese olikho okhaka khukhwimanyisia khu baandu? Abanga ese ndikho khaka khukhola ndio, andi se ndi omukholi owa Kristo tawe.
Lekha muboolele enywe bawandaayase, ndi Elomo Endayi niyo nilwacha se yaama khu mundu busa tawe.
Se nakinyoola khukhwama khu mundu tawe, namwe omundu yesi se anjikisia tawe. Yesu Kristo omwene niye owafunulila.
Mwaboolelwe ke limenya liase lie khaale, nga naba ne nerusilia elala khu dini eye Bayaudi. Napia ekanisa eya Wele siibi ne se nabakho ne siisa siosi siosi tawe, mala nakhola kamaani khu kionakaka.
Naba ebweeni we Bayaudi basiaase be selukho yase mu likhola liase lie dini eye Bayaudi, mala nerusia lukali khuloonda kimiima kie bakuuka befwe.
khukhumanyisia ese Omwana wewe, nio nolaane khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi yewe khu Be Chikholo, se nacha khu mundu yesi khulwe khukaambilwa tawe,
namwe se nacha Yerusalemu khubonana ne naabo ba baaba barumwa ebweeni wase tawe. Ne kakhali, nacha bwangu Ebuaraabu, mala lundi nakobola Damasika.
Kimiiko kitaru kiabira nio nacha Yerusalemu khunyoola kamakhuwa khukhwama khu Petero, mala namenya naye kamachuuma kabili.
Se nabonakho omurumwa okundi tawe, nakhali Yakobo wandaaye owo Mwami yeng'ene.
Niko mbandika kali kang'ali. Wele amanyile ali se ndikho mbea tawe!
Enyuma wa kano nacha mu ngoongo cha Siria ne Silisia.
Siise siene esio basaangi be chikanisa mu Buyuda baba bakhamanya ese bulayi tawe.
Baulilanga busa niko babaandi balomanga bali, “Omundu owakhupianga efwe siibi luno alikho elwacha lisuubila nilio akhakanga khukhwonaka!”
Khwako bafumia Wele sikila ese.

Nacha sikila Wele afunulila ali khoyeele nje. Mu siikhasio sie mu bwikisi ne babemeelesi, nenoosia Elomo Endayi niyo nilwachanga khu Be Chikholo. Se nenya kimilimo kiase kia luno nende kie khaale kitaambe bukhala tawe.
Owasiase Tito, akhaba ne aaba Omukiriki, se aayingililwa khukhebwa tawe,
akhaba balala ne benya akhebwe. Mu khwikhola khuba basuubili basiefwe, babaandu bano bengila mu sipupu siefwe nga bayooti nio babone bulekhuule nibwo khuli nabwo khubirira mu bulala bwefwe ne Yesu Kristo. Benya khu khukhola efwe khube nasioobi,
ne kakhali mu khuliinda bung'ali bwe Lomo Endayi sikila enywe, se khwafukiilila kakaabwe akhaba khu siise sitiiti tawe.
Ne kakhali, babona bali Wele aba ambelesia ese kimilimo kie khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi khu Be Chikholo, nga aba ne aelesia Petero kimilimo kie khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi khu Bayaudi.
Sikila khubirira mu bunyali bwa Wele, nakholwa omurumwa khu be Chikholo, bulayi bwene nga Petero ne akholwa omurumwa khu Bayaudi.
Yakobo, Petero ne Yoana, ba babonekha khuba babemeelesi, babona bali Wele aaba ambelesie ese kumulimo kuno, khwako bakheesia Baranaba nase, nga simanyisio mbo efwe fweesi khwaba basaangi alala. Khwafukiilisiana khuli Baranaba nase khukhole mu Be Chikholo ne nibo mu Bayaudi.
Khu koosi niko bareeba kaba bali khukhoyeele khukhebulile bataambi mu sipupu siabwe, ne sino sili sisiindu nisio nabeelenge ne silukuluku khukhola.
Nga Petero ne echa Andioka, ese nemelekhana naye sikila abonekha abuwaanga ne ekhiikhile.
Babaandu ba baaba ne barumirwe ne Yakobo ne bakhoola tawe, Petero alichanga alala ne bawandaayefwe Be Chikholo. Ne nga babaandu bano ne boola, enyokhao aloba khulia nende Be Chikholo abo. Sikila aria abo babenyanga khukhebwa khwe Be Chikholo.
Bawandaayefwe babaandi be Siyuda boosi baba baari alala ne Petero; ne akhaba Baranaba yesi aba mu sikholwa siabwe sie buuri esio.
Nga ne nabona ndi se balikho bakeenda mu ngila enuungi khuloondekhana ne bung'ali bwe Elomo Endayi tawe, naboolela Petero ebweeni wabwe boosi ndi, “Ewe oli Omuyaudi, ne mala wama khumenyanga nga owe Chikholo, se wabeele nga Omuyaudi tawe. Onyala oriena, nono, wakhaka khuyingiilila Be Chikholo bamenye nga Bayaudi?”
Ng'ali, khuli Bayaudi mu khusaalwa, se khuli “Be Chikholo baali ne bubwoni” tawe, nga ne balaangwa.
Ne khumanyile khuli omundu aluungisibwanga ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila mu Yesu Kristo liong'ene, seli khulwe khukhola niko lilaka lienya tawe. Akhaba fweesi khwasuubila mu Yesu Kristo nio khwaluungisibwe ne Wele khubirira mu lisuubila liefwe mu Kristo ne se kali mu khukhola busa niko lilaka lienya tawe.
Ne khwaaba, ne khukhaka khuba baluungi khu Wele khulwe bulala bwefwe ne Kristo, khunyoolekhana khuba babooni, bulayi bwene nga Be Chikholo ne bali. Khwako aba lino liekesia lili Kristo alikho areera bubwoni ku? Khaba ta!
Ne naaba ne ndakikha khukhwombakha niko nonakakanga, aba niyekesia khuba omundu ofunaka Lilaka.
Khuloondekhana nga Lilaka ne lili, ese ndi omufu, neerwa ne Lilaka liliene nio nolaane khumenya khulwa Wele. Neerwa khubirira mu lifwa ne Kristo khu musalaba khwewe,
khwako se ndi ese lundi omenyanga tawe, ne kakhali ali Kristo omenyanga mwise. Limenya nilio menya luno, menya khulwe lisuubila liase mu Mwana owa Wele, owasiima ese, mala aafwiila.
Ndoba khukhwikaana kumwalaalo kwa Wele! Ne kakhali aaba bali Wele aluungisia omundu khubirira mu Lilaka, aba liekesia lili Kristo afwa busa!

Enywe Bakalatia basilu! Naanu owamulokile enywe? Ebweeni wenywe, mwaboolelwa bulayi bwene khu lifwa lia Yesu Kristo khu musalaba!
Mboolele ese siindu silala sino. Mwanyoola Roho owa Wele khulwe khukhola niko lilaka lienya namwe khulwe khuulila Elomo Endayi ne khukisuubila?
Muli basilu muriena! Mwarakikha ne Roho owa Wele; ne luno mwenya khumala ne bunyali bwenywe mwabeene!
Kakamubakho koosi kaaba ka busa? Ng'ali kekesia siindu!
Wele amuelesia enywe Roho Omutakatifu ne khukhola kamayia mwinywe sikila mukhola niko Lilaka lienya, namwe sikila mwaulila Elomo Endayi ne khukisuubila?
Mukhoya mumanye, nono, muli lisaaye lia Aburahamu lia ng'ali bali babaandu be lisuubila.
Liiandiko liang'oola lili Wele alikhola Be Chikholo babe baluundi khu niye omwene khubirira mu lisuubila. Khwako liiandiko liaboolela Aburahamu Elomo Endayi lili, “Khubirira mwiwe Wele alabiita babaandu boosi chikhabi.”
Aburahamu asuubila mala aabiitwa chikhabi; ne boosi ba basuubila babiitwa chikhabi nga niye.
Luno kamanyikhaane kali yesi yesi saluungisibwa ne Wele khulwe Lilaka tawe, sikila liiandiko liloma lili, “Omundu okholwa ne Wele khuba omuluungi khubirira mu lisuubila alamenya.”
Ne Lilaka se liiambaanakho ne lisuubila tawe. Ne kakhali, nga liiandiko ne liloma lili, “Yesi yesi okhola buli siindu nisio Lilaka lienya alamenya.”
Kristo akhola kano nio chikhabi nicho Wele asuubisia khu Aburahamu chiaanwe khu Be Chikholo khubirira mu Kristo Yesu, nio khubirira mu lisuubila khwole khunyoola Roho niye Wele asuubisia khuruma.
Bawandaayase enywe, ndikho nja khurumikhira silolelo sia buli ndaalo. Babaandu babili ne bafukiilisiana khwikhuwa mala baandikisiana, se aliio onyala alifunaka namwe atasakho siindu tawe.
Nono, Wele asuubisia Aburahamu nende owe lisaaye liewe. Liiandiko se lirumikhira mu bukali lili, “Be lisaaye,” tawe, ne kakhali lili mu bulala lili, “Oyo owe lisaaye liewe,” khukhwekesia khuli ali omundu mulala yeng'ene, olaangwa Kristo.
Nilio ndikho ndoma lili liri, Wele aakhola endakaano ne Aburahamu mala aasuubisia khukikhola. Lilaka liliaanwa enyuma we kimiiko chimia chine ne kamakhumi kataru se linyala liafunaka endakaano eyo ne khurusiao lisuubisia lia Wele tawe.
Kaaba bali siianwa sia Wele siamanana ne Lilaka, aba se siamanana ne lisuubisia lia Wele tawe. Kakhaba kario, khulwe lisuubisia liewe, Wele aelesia Aburahamu siianwa.
Nono, sifuno sie Lilaka siaba siina? Lilaka liatasibwakho khukhwekesia kamakhiikha nisio siina. Ne Lilaka lieenyekha khubao khukhwola nga owe lisaaye lia Aburahamu ne echa sikila ali niye owasuubisibwa. Lilaka liaanwa ne bamalaika, liechela khu mundu owaba akari we babaandu ne Wele.
Nono omundu owe akari oyo ekesia ali babaandu babaandi baliio bakali. Ne kakhali Wele ali mulala.
Kano kekekesia kali Lilaka se lienya lisuubisia lia Wele tawe ku? Se kali kario tawe! Sikila abanga omundu anyoola Lilaka lireera bulamu, andi buli mundu aluungisibwa ne Wele khulwe khuliloonda.
Ne kakhali liiandiko liloma lili sibala sioosi sili mu bunyali bwe bubwoni; khwako siianwa sisiasuubisibwa khulwe lisuubila mu Yesu Kristo siaelesibwa khwaabo babasuubila.
Ne kakhali siise sie lisuubila ne sikhoola tawe, Lilaka lia khwikaliilila efwe fweesi nga baboe khukhwola nga lisuubila liliicha, ne limanyikha.
Khwako Lilaka lia khwimeelela efwe khukhwola nga Kristo ne echa, nio khukholwe baluungi khu Wele khubirira mu lisuubila.
Ne sikila siise sie lisuubila siliio, Lilaka se lilikho likhwimeelela efwe tawe.
Khubirira mu lisuubila mweesi muli babaana ba Wele mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo.
Mwabatiisibwa mu buambaani ne Kristo, ne luno muli ne bulamu bwa Kristo omwene.
Khwako likabukhana se liliio akari we Bayaudi nende be Chikholo, nasioobi ne balekhuule, namwe akari we baseecha ne bakhasi tawe. Mweesi muli siindu silala mu buambaani ne Kristo Yesu.

Niko ndikho mboola niko kano, omwana olinyoola kimiaandu kia raraawe kioosi akholwanga busa nga nasioobi nasiili mwana, akhaba mu bung'ali kimiiandu kioosi ne kili kikiewe.
Nasiili mwana, baliio bamuliinda ne bamuyeeta mu bikholwa khukhwola siise nisio raraawe aarao.
Mu ngila ng'ene eyo akhaba fwesi khwaba nasioobi be bisieeno bie mu sibala ne khukhakhula mwisuubila tawe.
Ne kakhali nga siise sisienyekha ne siola, Wele aaruma Omwana wewe omuteelwa. Echa nga Omwana owo mukhasi, mala amenya aasi we Lilaka lie Bayaudi,
khusikula abo ba baaba aasi we Lilaka nio khube babaana ba Wele.
Wele aruma Roho owo Mwana wewe mu miooyo kiefwe khukhwekesia ali muli babaana bewe, Roho olaanganga ali, “Paapa, Paapa wase.”
Khwako se oli lundi nasioobi tawe, ne kakhali oli omwana owe mungo. Ne sikila oli omwana wewe, Wele alakhuelesia bioosi nibio ali nabio khulwe babaana bewe.
Khaale mwaba se mwamanya Wele tawe, khwako mwaba nasioobi be bibiindu biikhali bia Wele tawe.
Ne luno mumanyile Wele, namwe khe ndome ndi, luno Wele amumanyile enywe, kali kariena mwenya khukalukha lundi khu bisieeno bibiamiianga mu sibala? Siina enywe ne mwenya khuba nasioobi babio lundi?
Mukholanga kimilukha kie chindaalo nabulebe, ne kimieesi, ne biise, ne kimiiko.
Neembeleele sikila enywe! Kanyala kaba bali kimilimo kiase khwinywe kioosi kiabele kia busa?
Musaba enywe wandaayase, mube nga ese, sikila sesi nekhola khuba nga enywe, ne se mwakholelekho ese kamabi tawe.
Mukhebulila sikila ne nelwacha Elomo Endayi khwinywe mu siise sie khunyoa; sikila naba ndwala.
Ne kakhaba bali liba liase lie kumubili liaba likhako liboofu khwinywe, se mwanjikuta namwe mwandoba tawe. Ne kakhali, mwanjakaanila ese nga malaika khukhwama mwikulu; mwanjakaanila ese nga mumwakaanila Yesu Kristo.
Mwaba basangaafu lukali! Siina sisiekholekha? Ese samwene nyala naloma ndi muba munyala, andi mwerusiamo chimoni chenywe mwambelesia ese.
Ne luno nabeele omusiku wenywe khulwe khumuboolela bung'ali?
Babaandu babaandi abo bekesia busiime bukali mwinywe, ne kakhali kamebaasio kabwe se kali kamalayi tawe. Niko benya busa kali khumurusia enywe khwise, nio mubenanekho nibo nga nibo boosi ne bamwinanaangakho.
Buli bulayi khuba ne busiime bukali kaaba bali sifuno sili silayi, kano kali ka ng'ali buli lwoosi, ne se kali busa kario ese ne ndi nanywe tawe.
Baana base bakoosi! Lundi, kali busa nga omukhasi oli siimbi khusala seesi ndi ne buchuuni burio khwinywe khukhwola nga liiba lia Kristo ne libao mwinywe.
Nikoomba ndi luno andi ndi nanywe, nio mbe ne lilibaasia liliindi khwinywe. Ese niiembeelela lukali khwinywe.
Lekha ndeebe abo mwinywe babeenya khuba aasi we Lilaka ndi: Se mumanyile niko Lilaka liboola tawe?
Liboola lili Aburahamu aba ne babaana babili, mulala owo mukhasi nasioobi ne okundi owo mukhasi omubula.
Omwana wewe wo mukhasi nasioobi asaalwa nga baandu boosi, ne omwana wewe owo mukhasi omubula asaalwa enyuma we khulakiilisia khwa Wele.
Bibiindu bino binyala biabonekha nga sisiekesio, bakhasi babili abo bekesia Chindakaano chibili. Oyo owe babaana babasaalwa mu siboe ali
Haka, owima nga Sikulu sia Sinai Ebuaraabu, ali sifwaani sisiekesia lukoba lwa Yerusalemu lwa luno, luuli mu siboe ne babaandu balwo boosi
Ne kakhali Yerusalemu lwe mwikulu luli Lulekhuule, lundi luli maayi wefwe.
Sikila liiandiko liloma lili,
“Ewe omukhasi mukuumba, ba omusangaafu!
Ewe okhabaakho mu buchuuni bwe khusaala tawe,
yokela ne khukhwekhoya lukali!
Sikila omukhasi owalekhwa aliba ne babaana bakali
khukhila omukhasi niye omuseecha akhalekha tawe.”
Luno, enywe, bawandaayase, muli babaana ba Wele khulwe lisuubisia liewe, nga Isaaka ne aba.
Siise esio omwana owasaalwa nga babaandu boosi aapia siibi owasaalwa khubirira mu Roho owa Wele; luno kali busa kario.
Ne kakhali liiandiko liloma siina, “Oona omukhasi nasioobi no mwana wewe, sikila omwana owo mukhasi nasioobi se alaba ne kumukabwa khu miaandu kia raraawe alala no mwana owo mukhasi omubula tawe.”
Khwako, wandaayase efwe se khuli babaana ba nasioobi tawe, ne kakhali khuli bo mukhasi omubula.

Khuli ne bulekhuule, Kristo aakhukholile khuba balekhuule! Yiima nono nga babaandu balekhuule ne mukhelekhuula khuba banasioobi lundi tawe.
Rekeeresia! Ese, Paulo muboolela enywe ndi mwaba ne mwilekhuula mukhebwe, aba liekesia lili Kristo salikho owe bukhala khwinywe na atiiti ene tawe.
Lundi Ese ngambila buli mundu yesi yesi owilekhuula akhebwe ndi aba nono enyekha khuria Lilaka lioosi.
Abo khwinywe bakhaka khuba baluungi ebweeni wa Wele khulwe khuria Lilaka beyaule khukhwama khu Kristo. Aba muli enje we kumwalaalo kwa Wele.
Ne khwifwe, lilieyikina liefwe lili liri, Wele akhakhuluungisie efwe khu mwene; ne kano kali niko khulindiililanga khulwe bunyali bwa Roho owa Wele okholaanga kimilimo khubirira mu lisuubila liefwe.
Sikila efwe khuli mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, khukhebwa namwe khulekha khukhebwa se bili siindu tawe; lilienyekha lili lisuubila libeo khubirira mu busiime.
Mwachiilililenge busa bulayi po! Naanu owamukhola enywe mwalekha khukhola bung'ali? Aamuombelesia enywe ariena?
Se kakholwa ne Wele omulaanganga enywe tawe.
Balomanga bali, “Kali kamamela matiiti kakholanga sifu mu sipakhilo siyiimba,”
ne kakhali ese ndi ne lilieyikina mwinywe. Limenya liefwe mu buambaani no Mwami likholanga ese ne mba ne lilieyikina ndi se mukhabe ne kamebaasio kakaandi tawe, ne omundu omubeelesia enywe, akhaba ne ali naanu, aliukuumwa ne Wele.
Ne kakhali khwise, enywe bawandaayase, naaba ne njiililila khukhwilwacha ndi sikhebo sikhoyeela sibeo, siina sikila ne bakhupia ese siibi? Ne kaba bali ako kaba kang'ali, aba lililwacha liase khuloondekhana ne kumusalaba kwa Kristo se liakhareerirekho butinyu tawe.
Nikoomba ndi babaandu balamubeelesianga enywe andi bamalileyo elala, lekha bachiililile mala belate babeene!
Ne kakhali, bawandaayase enywe, mwalaangwa khuba balekhuule. Ne mukhalekha bulekhuule buno khwaba nisio mwiambilakho nio mukhole khulwe lilienya lienywe lie kumubili tawe. Ne kakhali, lekha busiime bukile muyeetane.
Sikila Lilaka lioosi liaambaasibwa mu bwimbi lili mbo, “Siima owasio nga ne wesiima wamwene.”
Ne mwaba ne bikholwa nga chisaang'i che mundaa ne mulumana ne khuliichana, aba khe mube meeso, ne busa mulamalanao.
Niko ndoma niko kano, lekha Roho amuraangirire enywe mwimenya lienywe, ne se mulekusia lilikoomba lie liba lio mundu tawe.
Sikila niko liiba liefwe lienya se kacha alala nende niko Roho enya tawe, ne nisio Roho enya se sicha alala nende nisio liiba liefwe lienya tawe. Bibili bino bili bisiku, ne liekesia lili sonyala wakhola nilio wenya khukhola tawe!
Roho aaba ne amurangirira enywe, aba se muli aasi we Lilaka tawe.
Niko liba lio mundu likholanga kabonekha busa abuwaanga. Lieyekesia liliene mu sifwaabi, bunyaalu, ne kimiima kimibi;
mu khusaaya bifwaani ne bulosi. Babaandu bakwa basiku mala bapana; bakwa be likhendekha, be lirima ne be khukhweyenyela. Bekabukhasia mu mikaanda ne bipupu;
bali ne libuba, bameela, bakhola sifwaabi ne bibiindu bibiindi bili nga bino. Mukaambila luno nga namukaambilakho abweeni ao ndi bakholanga bibiindu bino se balinyoola bubwami bwa Wele tawe.
Ne kakhali lituunda lia Roho lili busiime, ekhoyo, kumuleembe, liliefwiilisia, kumwoyo kumulayi, bulayi, busuubilifu,
lilieboombia, ne khukhwiliinda. Se lilikhoo lilaka likaania khu biindu nga bino biri tawe.
Ne abo bali ba Yesu Kristo balekhile liiba liabwe ne lisiima lialio ne lilikoomba lialio lioosi.
Roho akhuele efwe bulamu, mala akhoya lundi emeelele limenya liefwe.
Khukhoyela khulekhe khukhwibonia namwe khuambia babasiefwe lirima, namwe khukhendekhanila.

Enywe bawandaayase, kaaba bali yesi yesi anyoolekhane mu sikholwa siibi siosi siosi, abo khwinywe babemeelelwa ne Roho khukhwola mumukololosie, ne mukhoyeele mumukololosie mu buolu mala mweliinde nio mwesi mukhakhakwa tawe.
Yeetana khusuta busiro bwenywe, nio mungila eyo murie lilaka lia Kristo.
Ne kaaba bali yesi yesi ebaasianga ali, ali siindu ne khane ng'ali se ali siindu tawe, aba alikho ebea omwene.
Buli mundu akhoyeele amanya liba liewe omwene. Ne kaaba bali lili lilayi, anyala ebonia sikila nibio omwene akholile, nio akhekelaania khu niko omundu okundi akholile tawe.
Sikila buli mundu akhoyeele khusuta sisutwa siewe omwene.
Omundu olikho wikisibwa elomo eye bukristo akhoyeele akabekho omwekisia wewe bibiindu bilayi bioosi nibio ali nabio.
Mukhebea tawe; se aliio onyala aasilwasia Wele tawe. Omundu akhakese nisio amiicha sisiene.
Kaaba bali omundu amiicha mu mukuunda kwe liiba lie liliekoomba, khukhwama mu bwenomwo alikesa likesa lie lifwa, ne kaaba bali amiicha mu mukuunda kwa Roho alikesamo likesa lie bulamu bwa mindali.
Khwako khukhaluilila mu khukhola kamalayi tawe, sikila khwaba ne khukhafwa kimiooyo tawe, siise sikheche nisio khukhakeselemo likesa.
Nono, buli lwoosi nga ne khuba ne bubweyaangu, khukhoyeele khukholele buli mundu kamalayi, ne lukali khu basiefwe mu lisuubila.
Bona chinyukuta chimboofu nicho ndikho muandikila enywe luno ne kumukhono kwase kumwene!
Babaandu balakhakanga khumuyingiilila enywe mukhebwe nibo babenya khukhwiyokesia ne khukhwibonia khulwe bibiindu bie anje. Kakhaba kario, bakhola bario nio bakhapisibwa siibi khulwe kumusalaba kwa Kristo tawe.
Akhaba abo bakholanga sikhebo se barichanga Lilaka tawe, benya enywe mukhebwe nio bebonie bali mweanile khu mwiima kwe kumubili kuno.
Kakhaba kario, ese khebonie khulwe kumusalaba kwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo yeng'ene, sikila khulwe kumusalaba kwewe, sibala siafwiile khwise ne sesi nafwiile khu ke sibala.
Khuba omusaani namwe omusiinde se lili ne bukhala tawe. Sie bukhala sili khuba sibuumbe siya.
Ne khwaabo baloonda lilaka lino mu bulamu bwabwe, kumuleembe ne siisa bibe nabo, alala ne babaandu ba Wele boosi!
Khumaliilisia, yesi yesi akhananiakho lundi tawe, sikila chimbala nicho ndi nacho khu mubili khwase chekesia chili ndi nasioobi owa Yesu.
Wandaayase enywe, kumwalaalo kwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo kube alala ne nanywe mweesi. Amina.

Lekha Paapa Wele ne Omwami Yesu Kristo bamuelesie enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Lekha khuupe orio khu Wele lundi Paapa owo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo! Sikila mu buambaani bwefwe ne Kristo akhubiita chikhabi khulwe khukhuelesia buli ekhabi eya Roho mwikulu.
Sibala ne sikhabuumbwa tawe Wele yaba akhurobora efwe khaale khuba babewe khubirira mu buambaani bwefwe ne Kristo, nio khwole khuuba batakatifu, lundi bakhali ne kamabi ebweeni wewe tawe.
Sikila busiime bwewe
Wele aba abisia khaale ali khubirira mu Yesu Kristo alakhukhola efwe khube babaana bewe, kano kaaba busangaafu ne sifuno siewe.
Khekhufumie Wele khulwe kumwalaalo kwewe kwe luyali, khulwe siianwa sia busa nisio akhuelesia efwe mu Mwana wewe Omukoosi!
Sikila khulwe kamafuki ka Kristo khuli balekhuule, bubwoni bwefwe bwabeelwa. Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kuli kumuboofu,
akhuelesia efwe mu sikelo siboofu!
Mu limanya liewe lioosi ne limanyilisia lie mukari
Wele akhola nisio afunaana, mala akhubuulila efwe khwamanya lirekekha lie abwikisi nilio aba abisia khaale khulimalila, khulwa Kristo.
Lirekekha lino nilio, Wele alimalila nga siise sisiolaana ne siliola, khuli khureera bibiindu bioosi alala, buli siindu siosi siosi mwikulu ne khu sibala, ne Kristo nga kumurwe kwabio.
Bibiindu bioosi bikholwa khuloondekhana ne lirekekha lia Wele, ne Wele akhurobora efwe khuba babaandu bewe mu buambaani ne Kristo, sikila lilienya liewe omwene, khuloondekhana khu niko aba ne abisia khukhwama mu khurakikha khukhwene.
Lekha nono efwe, khukhwaba be khunyoa khu khweyikina mu Kristo, khufumie luyali lwa Wele!
Ne akhaba enywe mwesi mwekela babaandu ba Wele nga mwaulila elomo eya ng'ali. Elomo Endayi eyamureerera buonia mu Kristo, mala Wele amurakho simanyisio sisiokesia sili enywe muli babewe khulwe khumuelesia Roho Omutakatifu niye amusuubisia.
Roho ali rubuni eyekesia bali khukhanyoole niko Wele asuubisia babaandu bewe, ne lino likhusuubisia efwe lili Wele alaana bulekhuule mu bwichufu khwaabo bali babewe. Lekha khufumie luyali lwewe!
Khulwe sifuno sino, khukhwama nga ne naulila ke lisuubila lienywe mu Mwami Yesu ne busiime bwenywe khulwe babaandu ba Wele boosi,
se nalekha khukhupa orio khu Wele sikila enywe tawe. Mukhebulilanga mu lisaaya liase,
mala ndeeba Wele wo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo, Paapa we luyali, amuelesie enywe Roho, olamukhola mukesiie, mala amufunulile Wele, nio mumumanye.
Saba ndi kamebaasio kenywe koole khukhwikulwa mubone buwaanga bwewe, nio mulamanya lilieyikina nilio amulangila lili siina, chikhabi nicho asuubisia babaandu bewe chili che buiinda bwe khuukia,
ne bunyali buno buli bukali lukali khu milimo mwifwe khu suubila. Bunyali bukhola kimilimo mwifwe buno, buli busa bulala nga kamaani kamakali
niko arumikhira khulamusia Kristo khukhwama mu lifwa mala amwikhasia kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha mwikulu.
Kristo aruka ebweeneyo khukhila baruki be mwikulu boosi, be bunyali, be kamaani, ne babaami, ali ne lisina likhila kamasina koosi ke bunyali mu sibala sino ne sisiicha.
Wele ara bibiindu bioosi aasi mu bikele bia Kristo mala amuana khu kanisa nga Omwami omukali khu biindu bioosi.
Ekanisa eli kumubili kwa Kristo. Limaliilisia liewe omwene omalanga bibiindu bioosi buli abuundu.

Mu siise esio mwaloonda engila emayaanu eye sibala, mwaria omwami owe bunyali bwa roho mu ngaaki, roho yuno owibinanga babaandu bakharia Wele tawe.
Ng'ali efwe fweesi khwaba nga nibo, khwamenyanga khuloondekhana ne liba liefwe lie lilikoomba, khwakhola liosi liosi lie lilienya lie kimibili kiefwe ne kamebaasio. Mu liba liefwe lia busiele, efwe, nga omundu yesi yesi khwalaakilwa khunyoola siukuumo mu lirima lia Wele.
Ne kakhali siisa sia Wele siili sikali, ne busiime bwewe khwifwe buli bukali po,
nga ne khwaba ne khusiili bafu mu roho mukhulekelesia khwefwe, akhureera mu bulamu ne Kristo. Lili khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele bali enywe luno mwaonisiibwe.
Mu bulala bwefwe ne Yesu Kristo aakhulamusia efwe ne naye khwamiie ne naye mwikulu.
Akhola kano khukhwekesia khulwe siise siosi sisiicha, bukali bukhali ne sikelo tawe, bwe kumwalaalo kwewe mu busiime nibwo akhwekesia efwe mu Yesu Kristo.
Sikila khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele mwaonisibwa khubirira mu lisuubila.
Se kali khulwe khukhola kamaani kenywe tawe, sili siianwa sia Wele, nio omundu yesi sakhoya, eboneseliakho tawe.
Wele aakhukhola efwe khuba nga ne khuli khuri, ne mu bulala bwefwe ne Yesu Kristo, akhubumbile efwe khulwe bulamu bwe bikholwa bilayi nibio akhung'oonela khaale efwe khukhole.
Enywe Be Chikholo sikila lisaalwa lienywe, nibo Bayaudi babelanganga bali “babaandu,” balanganga enywe bali “basiinde” (liboola, sikhebo khu mibili kiabwe), khebulila nga mwaba khaale.
Mu siise esio mwaba mwaukha khukhwama khu Kristo. Mwaba baakwa, ne se mwaba babaandu bali barobore ba Wele tawe. Semwaba ne kumukabwa mu ndakaano tawe. Chindakaano chichaloondekhana ne lisuubisia lia Wele khu baandu bewe, mala mwamenya mu sibala sino ne mukhali ne lilieyikina lundi ne mukhali ne Wele tawe.
Ne luno, mu Yesu Kristo, enywe mu mwaba aleeyi lukali mwareerirwe aembi khulwe lifwa lia Kristo.
Sikila Kristo omwene akhureerera kumuleembe khulwe khukhola Bayaudi nende Be Chikholo khuuba ekholo ndala. Ne kumubili kwewe, aatechula lisiisi liliabaukhasianga ne khubalekha nga basiku.
Arusiao Lilaka lie Bayaudi ne kamalaka kalio, nio khukhwama mu kholo chibili abuumbe babe be kholo ndala mu niye omwene, mungila yino, areera kumuleembe.
Khulwe lifwa liewe khu musalaba Kristo arusiao busiku bwabwe, khulwe engila eye khu musalaba aambaasia Chikholo chombi mu mubili mulala, mala achikobosia khu Wele.
Nio Kristo echa mala elwacha Elomo Endayi, eye kumuleembe khu boosi, khwinywe Be Chikholo mu mwaba aleeyi khukhwama khu Wele ne khu Bayuda, ba baaba aembi khu niye
lili khubirira mu Kristo bali efwe fweesi, Bayuda ne Chikholo, khunyala khwecha mu Roho mulala ebweeni wa Paapa
Nio luno, enywe Be Chikholo se muli baakwa namwe bareende lundi tawe, luno muli batakatifu lundi babaandu be enju eya Wele.
Akhaba enywe mwesi mwombakhwa khu musiingi kukwombakhwa ne barumwa ne bang'oosi, enjeko niye Yesu Kristo omwene.
Niye ali owatililila liliombakho lioosi alala ne khulikhola lichoe libe lukaangu lutakatifu lulwaanwa khu Mwami.
Mu Kristo akhaba enywe mwesi mulikho mwombakhwa alala ne babaandi boosi abuundu niio Wele amenyanga khubirira mu Roho wewe.

Khulwe sifuno sino ese, Paulo, omuboe owa Yesu Kristo sikila enywe Be Chikholo, musabila enywe khu Wele.
Ng'ali mwaulila muli Wele mu mwalaalo kwewe amba ese kimilimo kino khukhola khulwe bulamu bwenywe.
Wele abuula lirekekha liewe lie abwikisi mala alikhola liamanyikhana khwise. (Naandike kano mu bwimbi khulwa kano,
ne mwaba ne musoma niko mbandike kano, munyala mweyika khulwe limanyilisia liase lie abwikisi mu Kristo).
Mu siise sisiabira babaandu se baboolelwa bibiindu bino tawe, ne luno Wele arumbure ne Roho khu barumwa bewe batakatifu ne bang'oosi.
Esiiri eli bali khulwe Lomo Endayi Be Chikholo bali ne sitonyi ne Bayuda mu khabi cha Wele. Bali basaangi be kumubili mulala okwo mala basaanga mu lisuubisia nilio Wele ang'oona khubirira mu Yesu Kristo.
Ese nakholwa omukholi owe Lomo Endayi khulwe siianwa sie kumwalaalo kwa Wele nisio ambelesia khubirira mu khukhola khwe bunyali bwewe.
Ese ndi omukeekhe lukali khu baandu ba Wele boosi, ne kakhaba kario Wele ambelesia bubweyaangu buno, mbilile Be Chikholo Elomo Endayi yino, eye buiinda bwa Kristo bukhali ne sikelo tawe,
mala mbukhole babaandu boosi babone nga lirekekha lia Wele liliekukhuulilanga ne licha khureerwa mu bukhalabani. Wele, oli omuluungi owe bibiindu bioosi akisa esiiri yewe khu selukho chichabira choosi,
nio mu siise sino, khulwe kanisa, baruki, be bumalaika ne bunyali bwe mwikulu bole khukhweyika ke limanya liewe, mungila chalio choosi lukano na lukano.
Wele akhola kano khuloondekhana ne sifuno siewe sia mindali, nisio akhola khubirira mu Kristo Omwami wefwe.
Mu buambaani ne Kristo mala khubirira mu lisuubila liefwe mu niye khuli ne bunyindaafu khucha ebweeni wa Wele ne lisuubila lioosi.
Mwikoonjelela enywe nono, mukhafwa kimiooyo sikila ese khupwa siibi sikila enywe tawe, lili khulwe bukhala bwenywe.
Khulwe sifuno sino ese sikamanga ebweeni wa Paapa.
Khukhwama mu niye buli luuya mwikulu ne khu sibala lunyoolanga lisina lialwo lia ng'ali.
Saba Wele khukhwama mu buiinda bwe luyali lwewe, amuelesie enywe bunyali khubirira mu Roho wewe mube be kamaani mu liba lienywe lie mukari,
ne saaya ndi Kristo akhoya amenya mu miooyo kienywe khubirira mu lisuubila. Ese saaya ndi mukhoya mube ne kimili kienywe ne kumusiingi mu busiime,
nio enywe alala ne babaandu ba Wele mwole khuba ne bunyali khumanyilisia bubalaayi, ne buleeyi, nga khucha angaaki ne aasi lukali busiime bwa Kristo.
Yee, mwole khumanya busiime bwewe akhaba ne bukhanyala bwamanyikhila elala tawe, mala nio mwichusibwe elala ne liiba lia Wele liliene.
Khu niye, khulwe bunyali bwewe bukholanga kimilimo mwifwe anyala khukhola ario khukhila nga ne khumusaba namwe akhaba nga khwibaasiakho.
Khu Wele lube luyali mu Kanisa ne mu Yesu Kristo khulwe siise siosi mindali na mindali. Amina.

Ese mwekoonjelela enywe, ese oli omuboe sikila kholelanga Omwami kimilimo. Menya limenya lilekhaana ne sikelo nisio Wele arao nga amulaanga enywe.
Buli lwosi yeboombia, mube baolu, lundi be khukhwifwiilisia. Yokesia busiime bwenywe khulwe khukhwekhaliilikhana.
Khola kamaani khuliinda bulala nibwo Roho aananga khulwe kumuleembe kumuambaasianga enywe alala.
Khuli ne kumubili mulala ne Roho mulala, bulayi bwene busa nga ne liliio lilieyikina lilala nilio Wele amulangilamo enywe,
Aliio Omwami mulala, lisuubila lilala, libatiisia lilala,
aliio Wele mulala, Raraawe owe babaandu boosi, oli Omwami owa boosi, akholanga kimilimo khubirira mu boosi, mala ali mu boosi.
Buli mulala khwifwe anyoola kumwalaalo khuloondekhana siianwa nisio Kristo amwelesia.
Nga liiandiko ne liboola lili,
“Nga ne aniina mu ngaaki elala,
acha nende be mbaambe bakali, aana biianwa khu baandu.”
Nono, khuloma khuli aaniina mu ngaaki liboola lili siina? Ne kakhali aba anyoa, ekha aasi khu sibala.
Nio oyo owekha aasi niye owachana oyo owaniina mu ngaaki, angaaki lundi khutuuma likulu, nio khubao khwewe khwichusie liimala lioosi.
Aba niye, “owaana biianwa khu baandu,” arobora balala khuba barumwa, babaandi khuba bang'oosi, babaandi balandaasia elomo eya Wele, babaandi khuuba babelwachi, ne babeekisia.
Akhola kano khurekekha babaandu ba Wele boosi khulwe kimilimo kia Kristo, nio ombakhe kumubili kwa Kristo.
Nio efwe fweesi khukheche alala mu bulala bwene obu mu lisuubila liefwe ne limanya liefwe lio Mwana owa Wele, khulaba babaandu bakhulu, khwolele bubwichufu bwe bukhulu bwa Kristo.
Nono, se khulaba lundi babaana tawe ba sutwa ne bubeeyi bwa buli lukano ne kamekisio ke babaandu babacha barangirira babaandu babaandi khucha mu mamayaanu khulwe bubacha nibwo bekhochoochanga tawe.
Ne khali khuloma bung'ali mu Roho we busiime, khukhwola khuchoe mu buli ngila mu Kristo, oli kumurwe.
Mu bwimeelesi bwewe bitonyi bie kumubili biaambaana alala, mala kumubili kwoosi kuambaasibwa alala na buli bwongelo, nibwo khwaebwa. Nio nga buli silala sikhola kimilimo nga ne sienyibwa sikhole, kumubili kwosi kuchoa mala kweyombakha kumwene khubirira mu busiime.
Nono, mu lisina lio Mwami, mukaambila enywe. Mukhachiililila khumenya nga bakhamanyile Wele tawe, nibo kamebaasio kabwe kakhali ne bukhala tawe.
Ne nibo kamebaasio kabwe kaali mu siilima. Se bali ne sitonye mu bulamu nibwo Wele aananga tawe, sikila se bamanyilekho siindu na akeekhe ene tawe, lundi be sileka.
Se baambwanga chisoni tawe, berusia khukhola sifwaabi ne khukhola bibiindu bioosi binyaalu, ne bakhekhingililakho tawe.
Kamenako se kali niko mweyika khu Kristo tawe!
Ng'ali mwaulila, ne nga babeeka bewe mwekisibwa bung'ali buli mu Yesu.
Nio yerusiekho liba lienywe likhale, liliamukhola mwamenya nga mwamenyanga, liba likhale liliaba ne lilikho lionakwa, liliekoomba lialio lie bubeeyi.
Kimiooyo kienywe ne kamebaasio, khukhwola bikholwe biyia elala,
mala khukhwola mufware liba liya liliakholwa mu khufwaana khwa Wele, mu buluungi bwa ng'ali ne butakatifu.
Aaba ne muambwa lirima mukhalilekha liamuyila mu bwoni tawe, ne mukhalekha enyanga yakwa ne muli ne lirima chana tawe.
Mukhaelesia Sietani bubweyaangu tawe.
Babefwi bakheeba lundi tawe. Khukhwola balekhe khukhwiba mala barakikhe khukhola kimilimo ne kamakhono kabwe nio bosi banyoole bie limenya liabwe liluungi, mala bayeete bataambi.
Kamakhuwa kamabi kakhaama mukhanwa mwenywe tawe, ne kakhali kamakhuwa ke buyeeti kong'ene, ako kanyala khukhwombakha ne khuaana kakenyekha, nio liosi nilio muboola likhole kamalayi khwaabo bamuulila.
Ne mukhabelesia Roho Omutakatifu owa Wele tawe, sikila Roho ali simanyisio sia Wele khwinywe sisiekesia sili muli babewe. Ali rubuni khukhwekesia khuli endaalo elikho yiicha niyo Wele alimusikulila enywe.
Lekhela elala bukhalafu bwoosi, libiila ne lirima, luyoka ne khukhoma. Lekha bumayaanu bwoosi!
Mube balayi be kimiooyo kimilayi khu mwabeene ne mwabeene, mala mubeelanile buli mulala nga Wele ne aamubeela enywe khubirira mu Kristo.

Nga muli babaana bakoosi ba Wele, khukhwola mukhake kamaani mube nga niye.
Bulamu bwenywe khukhwola bwimeelelwe ne busiime, bulayi bwene nga Kristo akhusiima efwe mala aana bulamu bwewe khwifwe nga siianwa sie kumuuya kumulayi nende sie khukhwosia sisiimisia Wele.
Nga enywe muli babaandu ba Wele, se buli bulayi kamakhuwa kosi kosi ke liiba lie bueeyi namwe bunyaalu namwe bulianga kalomekhekho mwinywe tawe.
Namwe se buli bulayi khwinywe khurumikhira lulomo lwe bunyaalu, lwe sifwaabi namwe lubi tawe, ne kakhali mupile Wele orio.
Mube na suubi muli se aliio yesi yesi owe sifwaabi, bunyaalu, namwe bulianga (sikila bulianga buli nga khusaaya bifwaani) oli ne kumukabwa mu Bwami bwa Kristo ne Wele tawe.
Mukhalekha omundu yesi yesi amubea ne kamakhuwa ke busilu tawe, sikila bili bibiindu bino ne bibieene nibio lirima lia Wele likheche khwaabo bakhamuria niye tawe.
Khwako mukhaambaana ne nabo mu siindu siosi siosi nisio bakhola tawe.
Enywe mwabeene mwaba mu siilima, ne khukhwama nga ne mwaba babaandu bo Mwami muli mu buwaanga. Nio enywe khukhwola mumenye nga babaandu baali mu buwaanga,
sikila buli buwaanga
Khaka khu khweyika ako kasiimisia Omwami.
Mukhaba ne buambaani nende bibiindu biikhali ne bukhala nibio babaandu bakholanga tawe, bibiindu bie sisiilima. Ne kakhali bireere mu buwaanga.
(Ng'ali lili lie chisoni lukali khuloma khu biindu nibio bakhola mu bwikisi.)
Ne nga bibiindu bioosi ne bireerwa mu buwaanga, nono liba liabwe ng'ali liekesebwa abuwaanga.
Sikila sisiindu siekesebwa abuwaanga siekela buwaanga. Elio nilio likila ne liboolwa lili,
“Ewe oolikho okona, siisimukha,
ne lamukha khukhwama mu lifwa,
ne Kristo alakhua buwaanga.”
Nio yiliinda nga mumenya, mukhamenya nga babaandu bakhali ne limanya tawe, mumenye nga bakesi.
Rumikhira bulayi buli bubweyaangu nibwo muli nabwo, sikila chino chili chindaalo chimayaanu.
Khwako, mukhaba basilu tawe, khaka mumanye niko Omwami enya mukhole.
Mukhameela endali tawe, elamwonaka busa, ne kakhali yichusibwa ne Roho.
Lomaloma buli mundu no wasie kamakhuwa ke kimienya kia Wele ne chinyimbo chindakatifu, yimba chinyimbo ne kimienya khu Mwami ne khumufumia mu miooyo kienywe.
Mu lisina lio Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo buli lwoosi khupila orio Wele Paapa khu buli siindu.
