Richana mwabeene ne mwabeene sikila buriaani bwenywe khu Kristo.
Sikila omuseecha ali ne bunyali khu mukhasi wewe nga Kristo nali ne bunyali khu Kanisa, mala Kristo omwene ali Omuonia owe kanisa, niyo eli kumubili kwewe.
Ne bakhasi khukhwola bariire elala baseecha babwe mu buli siindu nga e kanisa ne yaria Kristo.
Akhola kano khuaana e kanisa khu Wele khulwe Elomo yewe, namalile khukikwalaasia khulwe khukisiinga ne kameechi,
nio akiaane khu niye omwene, lukoondo lulayi lwayo lwoosi mu bukwalaafu ne ekhalimo kamabi, lipala namwe ekhalimo linyiisia tawe, namwe limayaanu liosi liosi tawe.
Baseecha khukhwola basiime bakhasi babwe nga ne basiima kimibili kiabwe. Omundu owasiima omukhasi wewe esiima omwene.
(Se aliio omundu obiila kumubili kwewe omwene tawe. Ne khali akuliisia, ne khukuliinda, bulayi bwene nga Kristo nakholanga e kanisa,
sikila efwe khuli basaangi mu mubili kwewe.)
Nga liiandiko ne liboolanga lili, “Khulwe sifuno sino omundu we siseecha alalekha raraawe ne maawe mala aambaane no mukhasi wewe, mala babili babe mulala.”
Eliio esiiri eye mukari eye bung'ali bubwafuunulwa mwiaandiko lino, nilio manyile ndi liboola khu Kristo ne kanisa.
Ne liboola akhaba khwinywe. Buli omuseecha khukhwola asiime omukhasi wewe nga esiima omwene, ne buli omukhasi khukhwola arie omuseecha wewe.

“Ria raraao ne maao,” lino lili lilaka lie khunyoa lili ne lisuubisia bali.
“Nio koosi kakhuchiile ewe bulayi, nio omenye siise sileeyi mu sibala.”
Mukhakhola kano sikila bamuboone nio kakile bamusiime enywe tawe, khola ne kumwoyo kwoosi niko Wele eenya, nga banasioobi ba Kristo.
Khola kimilimo kienywe nga banasioobi mu busangaafu bulayi bwene nga mulikho mukhalaabanila Omwami se bali babaandu busa tawe.
Manya muli Omwami akhaelesie buli mundu kumuruuru, abeele nasioobi namwe ooli omulekhuule, sikila kimilimo kimilayi nikio akholanga.
Khumaliilisia, ba ne kamaani mu Mwami mu buyeeti bwe bunyali bwewe.
Fwara bibanulwa bioosi nibio Wele amuelesia, nio mwole khunyala khukhila kimireko kimimayaanu kia Sietani.
Sikila se khulikho khupana ne babaandu tawe, ne kakhali khulikho khupana ne kamaani kamamayaanu ka roho we mungaaki, baruki, bunyali, kamaani ke sibala sie sisiilima sino.
Khwako luno banula bibanulwa bia Wele! Nio oli endaalo eye bumayaanu yola, munyale khukhwiteecha omusiku ne amwibwaakala enywe, mala enyuma we khu khuupana se mulikhilwa tawe.
ne nga biraaro bienywe yerekekha khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi eye kumuleembe.
Khutasa khwako koosi, suta lisuubila nga engabo, sikila ne muli nalio munyala khusimia buembo buuburukha bulasiilwe no Mumayaanu.
Lundi fukiilila buonia nga ekofio eye sichuuma eye mwiie, ne likhuwa lia Wele nga embalu ya Roho.
Saba mu Roho biise bioosi, ne musaba buyeeti bwa Wele. Ba meeso musabile babaandu ba Wele boosi.
Ne akhaba sesi sabilekho nio Wele ambelesie elomo nga nerekekha khulomaloma, nio nole khulomaloma ne bunyindaafu, mala khole esiiri eye Elomo Endayi emanyikhe.
Khulwe Elomo yino ese ndi omurumwa, ne luno ne ndi mu siboe. Saba nio mbe ne bunyindaafu mukhulomaloma ke Elomo Endayi nga ne khuyela ndome.
Niko kakila ne muruma niye khwinywe, khumuboolela nga efwe fweesi ne khulikho khuchiililila ne khumuramo enywe kumwoyo.
Paapa Wele ne Omwami Yesu Kristo bakhoya baelesie bawandaayefwe bakristo kumuleembe ne busiime ne lisuubila.
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kube nabo boosi babasiima Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo ne busiime bukhaliwa tawe.

Khu baandu ba Wele boosi bali e Filipi bali mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo, alala ne ba bishopu ne bayeeti be mu Kanisa.
Lekha Paapa Wele wefwe no Mwami Yesu Kristo bamuelesie enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Ese khupilanga Wele wase orio buli siise nisio mukhebulilanga enywe,
ne buli siise nisio musabilanga enywe mweesi sabanga ne liliekhoya
sikila nga ne mwanjeeta mu milimo kie Elomo Endayi khukhwama khu ndaalo eye khunyoa khukhwola luno.
Khwako ndi nasuubi ndi Wele owarakikha kimilimo kimilayi kino mwinywe, alachiililila khu kikhola khukhwola nga akimala khu Ndaalo eya Yesu Kristo.
Buli lwoosi enywe muli mu mwoyo kwase! Khwako buli bulayi ese khukhweulila ndio khwinywe. Sikila enywe mweesi mwasaanga nase mu mwalaalo nikwo Wele ambelesia ese, luno nga ne ndi mu siboe, lundi nga naba omulekhuule khu khuupanila Elomo Endayi ne khukiandalasia lukali.
Wele ali omuloli wase ali ese ndikho ndoma bung'ali ndi busiime bwase khwinywe mweesi bwama mu mwoyo kwa Yesu Kristo omwene.
Ese saba ndi busiime bwenywe alala ne limanya lia ng'ali ne busicha bilachiililila khuba bikali mwinywe,
nio munyale khurobora lili lilayi. Khwako mulaba balekhuule khukhwama khu bunyaalu bwoosi ne khubiiywa khu Ndaalo eya Kristo.
Limenya lienywe lilaba ne kamatuunda ke buluungi niko Yesu Kristo yeng'ene anyala aana, khulwe luyali ne fuma eya Wele.
Basaale, nenya enywe mumanye muli bibiindu bibianjikholeekhekho ng'ali biayeetile lichiililila lie Elomo Endayi.
Khwako, banamae be lichipi ne babaandi boosi ano, bamanyile bali ese ndi mu siboe sikila ndi omukholi owa Kristo.
Ne khuba khwase mu siboe khwakholile bawandaayefwe bakali khuba ne lilieyikina likali mu Mwami, khwako bachiililile khuba banyindaafu lukali, khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi.
Ng'ali balala khu nibo belwacha Kristo sikila bali ne sikhalikhali lundi bali ne bulomani, ne kakhali babaandi belwacha khulwe lilienya lilayi.
Babelwacha khulwe lilienya lilayi bakhola bario khukhwama mu busiime, sikila bamanyile bali Wele ambelesia ese kimilimo kie khu khupanila Elomo Endayi.
Babaandi se bafumianga Kristo mu bung'ali tawe, ne kakhali bakholanga bario mu mwoyo kwe khukhwiyenyela babeene, bebaasianga bali banyala bakila ese napisibwa siibi lukali nga ne ndi mu siboe.
Se sili siindu khwise tawe, sikila akhaba ne khuli mu khwiyenyela namwe mu lienya lilayi, Kristo alikho elwachibwa. Khwako ese ndachiililila khuba omusangaafu,
sikila manyile ndi khubirira mu masaba kenywe ne buyeeti bubwamanga khu Roho owa Yesu Kristo ese khalekhuulwe.
Lilienya liase liboofu ne lilieyikina lili mbo khakhilwa mu milimo kiase tawe, ne kakhali mu biise bioosi, ne lukali luno luri, mbe ne bunyindaafu bukali, nio ne kumwoyo kwase kwoosi ndeere efuma khu Kristo, nakhaba ne menya namwe nefwa.
Sikila khuloondekhana nase, khumenya ali Kristo ne khufwa buli bukhala.
Ne kakhali kaaba bali ne njiililila khumenya nyala natasa khukhola kimilimo kie bukhala, aba nono se ndi nasuubi siina nisio nenyekha ndobore tawe.
Chingila chibili changalikaanie. Nenya lukali ndure mu bulamu buno mala mbe ne Kristo, sikila liliene elio lili lilayi lukali,
ne kakhali sikila enywe, lili lie bukhala bukali ese khuba omulamu.
Ese ndi nasuubi khu kano, khwako namanyile ndi ndamenya. Ndachiililila khumenya ne nanywe mweesi, khutasa khu lichiililila lienywe lilayi ne liliekhoya mwisuubila,
nio mbo ne ndi nanywe lundi mulaba ne sifuno siboofu sie khu khunjeboneseliakho mu limenya mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo.
Nono sisiindu siboofu sili mbo limenya lienywe likhoya libe nga Elomo Endayi eya Kristo ne yenya, nio ese nakhanyala khukhwicha khumubona enywe namwe tawe, khaulile ndi mwemile bulayi mu sifuno silala, lundi mulikho mupanila lisuubila ne Lomo Endayi ne liliekoomba lilala liong'ene.
Mukharia basiku benywe tawe, ba banyindaafu buli lwoosi, mala lino lilabekesia lili balakhilwa ne enywe mulabaula sikila Wele niye omuelesianga enywe bukhili.
Enywe mwaelesibwa bubweyaangu bwe khukholela Kristo, ne se khuli khusuubila mu niye khwong'ene tawe, ne kakhali akhaba khu khupisibwa siibi sikila niye.
Nono munyala mwaba alala nase mwiie lino. Lili liie liliene nilio mwabona ese nekhupana mu ndaalo chichabira, ne nga mu manyile, lili nilio ese siipana.

Limenya lienywe mu Kristo limukholanga enywe muba ne kamaani, ne busiime bwewe bumuoleelesianga enywe. Enywe muli ne bulala ne Roho Omutakatifu lundi mukholanila siisa ne khuoleelesiana.
Nono muchuuba enywe musangaasie ese lukali khulwe khuba ne kamebaasio malala, khusaanga mu busiime, ne khuba ne liiba lilala ne kamebaasio malala.
Mukhakhola sisiindu siosi siosi mu khweyenyela namwe mukhwenya khukhwibonia tawe, ne kakhali mwiboombie khu mwabeene ne mwabeene, buli lwoosi mubone babaandi khuba balayi khumukhilakho mwabeene.
Omundu akhabao okhola kamuyeeta omwene yeng'ene tawe, ne kakhali kayeeta babasie bosi.
Mukhoya mwaba ne liiba nga nilio Yesu Kristo aaba nalio.
Buli lwoosi aaba Wele,
ne se aakhaka khukhaabilila alekhaane ne Wele tawe,
Ne kakhali, khu lienya liewe omwene aalekha bioosi nibio aaba nabio,
mala aba nga nasioobi.
Aaba nga babaandu, abonekha mu fwaani yo mundu.
Eboombia mala aaba omurekeerefu khukhwola aakhaba khufwa, lifwa lie khu musalaba.
Khulwe sifuno sino Wele aamuniinia mu bukono bwe angaaki lukali,
mala amuelesia lisina liboofu lukali likhila kamasina koosi.
ne khu sibala ne emakoombe bilisikama,
mala bioosi biliboola abuwaanga bili Yesu Kristo ali Omwami
khulwe luyali lwa Paapa Wele.
Khwako, basaale base bakoosi, nga buli lwoosi ne mwaloondanga kakaase nga nabechanga nanywe, lili liboofu luno muloonde kakaase ne ndi aleeyi khukhwama niio muli. Chiililila khukhola mu buri ne mu khuterema mumaliilisie buonia bwenywe,
sikila buli lwoosi Wele ali khu milimo mwinywe khumukhola enywe mufukiilile ne khunyala khuria lilienya liewe omwene.
Khola buli siindu ne mukhali ne khukhwilung'unya namwe khukhandarana tawe.
Nio mube babaana ba Wele bakhabiiywakho khu liosi liosi tawe lundi bakwalaafu bamenyile mu sibala siibi ne mu baandu babooni. Mukhoya mukhosie akari wabwe nga ching'enieesi ne chikhosianga mu ngaaki
ne mubaboolela burume bwe bulamu. Mwaba ne mukhola murio khabe ne sifuno sie khumweboneseliakho khu Ndaalo eya Kristo, sikila likhekesie lili khukhola kamaani khwase ne kimilimo kiase, se biaba bia busa tawe.
Lisuubila lienywe mu Mwami ne bukholi bwenywe bili nga embosio niyo oaanile khu Wele. Kaaba kario ese ndi ne busangaafu bukali, mala ese saanga nanywe mweesi mu liekhoya liase.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, mweesi mukhoya mube basangaafu mala musaange nase mu liekhoya lienywe.
Liaba ne lili lilienya lio Mwami, nyala naruma Timoteo khangu, nio noole khureebwamwo kumwoyo khulwe khuulila nga muli.
Niye yeng'ene osaanganga mu mebaasio kase lundi ng'ali owibaasianga kamalayi khwinywe.
Buli mundu eembeelela khu kewe kong'ene, se kali khulwe sifuno sia Yesu Kristo tawe.
Ne enywe mwabeene mu manyile nga ne eyekesia khuba owe bukhala, nga niye nase khwakholelanga alala kimilimo nga omwana ne raraawe khulwe Elomo Endayi.
Khwako neyikine khu muruma niye khwinywe khangu, ne manyile bibiindu nga bilikho bicha khuba.
Lundi suubila mu Mwami ndi kakhanyalikhane bwangu akhaba ese samwene mukeniye.
Nibaasiisie ndi nenyekha ndume wandaayefwe Epafurodito khwinywe owakhola ne khu khupana alala nase lundi owabeele nga omurumwa wenywe mu khunjeeta ese.
Ali ne liliekoomba likali khu mubona enywe mweesi ne abeleele lukali sikila enywe mwaulila muli aaba omulwale.
Ng'ali aaba omulwale enga khufwa. Ne kakhali Wele amukholela siisa, ne se aamukholela niye yeng'ene siisa tawe, akhaba ese sesi, sikila andi natasa bubeeleli khu buundi.
Nono ese ndi ne silukuluku sikali po khumuruma niye khwinywe, nio lundi mube basangaafu ne mu mubona, ne aba sesi bubeeleli bwase bulawa.
Khwako mwakaanile ne liliekhoya, nga wandaayefwe mu Mwami. Yokesia buriaani khu baandu boosi nga bano,
sikila alekha bulamu bwewe bwaba mu busiku, mala enga khufwa sikila kimilimo kia Kristo, nio aambelesia buyeeti nibwo enywe mukhanyala abeele mwamba tawe.

Bawandaayase, mu khumaliilisia yikhoya mu bulala bwenywe no Mwami. Se ndalua khuandika lundi niko naandike khale tawe, ne mulaba bulayi lukali kaaba bali khola ndio.
Yeliinda khukhwama khwaabo bakhola kamabi, chimbwa echo, babaandu baandalasia sikhebo sie kumubili.
Nifwe khukhwanyoola sikhebo sia ng'ali, se bali nibo tawe, sikila khusaayanga Wele khubirira mu Roho wewe lundi khwikhoya mu limenya liefwe mu bulala ne Yesu Kristo. Se khura lisuubila liosi liosi mu misaango kienje busa tawe.
Ng'ali andi ese nara lisuubila liase mu biindu biri. Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne ebaasianga ali anyala khusuubila mu biindu bienje busa, ese ndi ne sifuno siboofu khukhwibaasia mu ngila ng'eneyo.
Ese nakhebwa ne ndi ne bukhulu bwe chindaalo munaane. Ndi Omuisiraeli mu khusaalwa, owe kholo eya Benjamini, owe kamafuki ko Mueburania omwene, ne khuloondekhana mu khuliinda lilaka lie Bayaudi, ese naba Omufarisayo,
lundi mu khuloonda lilaka elio lukali, napianga e kanisa siibi. Ne khuloondekhana ne buluungi bwe khuria Lilaka, se naba ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Ne kakhali bibiindu bioosi nibio ese nyala nabala khuba bie bukhala, luno mbibukula khuba nga khutibia sikila Kristo.
Se bili bibiindu ebio biong'ene tawe, mbukula buli siindu khuba khutibisilia elala sikila sisiindu esio siili ne bukhala bukali lukali, khumanya Yesu Kristo Omwami wase. Namwaata buli siindu sikila niye. Mbukula bioosi khuba nga kamandu busa nio nolaane khunyoola Kristo
mala mbe siindu silala naye, nekhali ne buluungi bwase samwene nibwo omundu anyoola khulwe khuria Lilaka tawe, ne kakhali mbe ne buluungi buaanwa khubirira mu lisuubila mu Kristo, buluungi bubwama khu Wele lundi bubaao sikila lisuubila.
Nilio nenya liong'ene lili khumanya Kristo ne kamaani ke lilamukha liewe, saange mu khupisibwa siibi khwewe mala mbe nga niye mu lifwa liewe,
mu lieyikina ndi ese samwene khalamusibwe.
Se nyala naloma ndi, nanyoola khale bukhili namwe ndi naba omuluungi khale tawe. Njiilililanga khukhola kamaani nyoole kumuruuru ne sikila nikwo Yesu Kristo aambukula mbe wewe.
Bawandaayase, ng'ali ese se nibaasianga ndi nanyoola khale kumuruuru tawe, ne kakhali kholanga sisiindu silala siong'ene, khu khwibilila kakabira ne khukhola kamaani noole khu kaali ebweeni.
Khwako ndimanga noole khu lukoye nio nyoole kumuruuru kuli kumulaango kwa Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo khucha mu bulamu bwe angaaki.
Efwe fweesi khuli bakhulu mwisuubila khwenyekha khube ne liiba nga lino. Ne kakhali balala khwinywe baaba ne liiba liliindi busa, Wele alalikhola libe abuwaanga khwinywe.
Ne kakhaba ne kanyala kaba kario, lekha efwe khuchiililile ne kamalaka niko khuloondanga khukhwama khale.
Namuboolela enywe lino kamakhabi kamakali, ne luno ngobolelamo ne ndila, baliio bakali nibo limenya liabwe libakholanga baba basiku be lifwa lia Kristo khu musalaba.
Sisiakamo siabwe sili mu siiukuumo sia mindali na mindali, sikila liliekoomba lie kimibili kiabwe nilio wele wabwe. Beboneselia khu ke chisoni lundi bebaasia busa ke sibala sino.
Kakhaba kario, efwe khuli babaandu be mwikulu lundi khuli ne silukuluku mu khulindiilila Omuonia wefwe, Omwami Yesu Kristo, eche khukhwama mwikulu.
Akhakaluukhasie kimibili kiefwe kimitekhele, mala akikhole kibe kie luyali nga kukwewe, mu khurumikhira bunyali nibwo anyala arumikhira khuruka buli siindu.

Khwako basaale, enywe muli bakoosi khwise po! Nekoomba lukali mubone enywe! Mukholanga ese ne mba omusangaafu, lundi nibonia lukali sikila enywe! Basaale base, mukhoya mube murio mu khwetinya mu limenya lienywe mu Mwami.
Yutia ne Sindike enywe, ne musiima, mukhake khufukiilisiana nga bayaaya mu Mwami.
Ne akhaba ewe wesi, wasiaase omusuubilwa nenya oyeete bakhasi bano, sikila bakhola kamaani nase khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi alala ne Kelemendi, ne bakholi basiaase babaandi boosi, nibo kamasina kabwe kali mu sitabu sia Wele sie balamu.
Buli lwoosi khe mube babekhoya mu buambaani bwenywe no Mwami. Ndoma lundi ndi, yikhoya!
Ba baolu khu buli mundu. Omwami ali siimbi khwicha.
Mukheembeelela khu siindu siosi siosi tawe, ne kakhali mu masaba kenywe koosi reeba Wele nisio mwenya, buli lwoosi mureebere mu mwoyo kwe khumupila niye orio.
Ne kumuleembe kwa Wele kukhila limanya lio mundu, kulaliinda bulayi kimiooyo ne kamebaasio kenywe mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo.
Basaale, mu khumaliilisia, yibaasia lukali bibiindu bilayi, lundi bibiolaana efuma, bibiindu bia ng'ali, biluungi bisiimisia lundi bie lukoosi.
Khola niko mweyika nende niko mwabonela khwise, khubirira mu makhuwa kase ne mu bikholwa biase ne Wele okhuechanga efwe kumuleembe alaba nanywe.
Mu bulamu bwase mu buambaani no Mwami lili liliekhoya liboofu khwise sikila enyuma we siise sileeyi, mwanyoolile lundi bubweyaangu bwe khukhwekesia muli mu khebulilanga ese. Se ndikho ndoma ndi abeele mwanjibilila tawe, ne kakhali se mwaba ne bubweyaangu khukhola murio tawe.
Se ndikho ndoma lino sikila neulila ndi nanjuukhwe tawe, sikila buli lwoosi nayeika khunyalikha nende nisio ndi nasio.
Ese manyile khutaamba ne khuba nabio bikali. Nayeika likhuwa lino ndi, buli abuundu osi osi siise siosi siosi nyalikhe nakhaba ne nikuure namwe ne ndi ne njala, nakhaba ne ndi nabio bikali lukali namwe ne ndi nabio bikeekhe lukali.
Ndi ne kamaani ke khubirira mu koosi khulwe bunyali nibwo Kristo ambelesianga.
Ne kakhali bwaba bulayi lukali khwinywe khu khunjeeta ese mu matinyu kase.
Enywe Bafilipi, mwabeene mu manyile bulayi bweene muli nga naama Masedonia mu ndaalo che khunyoa che khukhwilwacha Elomo Endayi, enywe mwaba e kanisa yanjeeta yong'ene, enywe mweng'ene mu mwasaanga mu bukhala bwase ne khutibia khwase.
Nga nenya buyeeti ne ndi mu Tesalonike mwandumira kamakhabi kamakali.
Se kali busa bali nenya khunyoola biianwa tawe, ne kakhali nenya khubona bukhala ne butasikha khu libiikhilo lienywe.
Nono, nanyoolile buli siindu nisio mwandumiire, mala bili bikali lukali. Epafurodito aandereere biianwa bienywe bioosi, ne luno ndi nende nibio nenya bioosi. Bili nga siianwa khu Wele sie kumuuya kumulayi, embosio efukiililwa lundi esiimisia Wele.
Wele wase, khulwe buiinda bwewe bukali bwoosi, khubirira mu Yesu Kristo, alamuelesia enywe buli siindu nisio mwenya.
Luyali lube khu Wele wefwe lundi Paapa wefwe, mindali na mindali! Amina.
Kimileembe khu buli mulala khu baandu ba Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo. Bawandaayefwe bali ano ne nase bamurumiire enywe kimileembe kiabwe.
Babaandu ba Wele ano boosi baruma kimileembe, lukali be mwichipi lia Kaisari.
Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu Kristo kube nanywe mwesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo, oli omurumwa owa Yesu Kristo khulwe lilienya lia Wele, lundi khukhwama khu wandaayefwe Timoteo —
Khu baandu ba Wele mu kolosayi lundi, bali basaale basuubilwa mu bulala ne Kristo:
Wele Paapa wefwe akhoya amuelesia enywe kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Buli lwosi Khupilanga Wele orio, ooli Paapa owo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo, nga ne khumusabilanga enywe.
Sikila khwaulila lisuubila lienywe mu Yesu Kristo ne busiime bwenywe khu baandu ba Wele boosi.
Nga burume bwa ng'ali bwe Elomo Endayi bwamwolela enywe lwe bweeni, mwaulila lilieyikina nilio bwaana. Khwako lisuubila ne busiime bwenywe biama khu niko enywe mwabiikhilwa bulayi mwikulu.
Elomo Endayi elikho echiililila khureera chikhabi lundi elikho yoola buli abuundu mu sibala, nga ne echiililila mwinywe khukhwama khu ndaalo niyo mwaulila khuloondekhana ne kumwalaalo kwa Wele lwe bweeni mala mwakumanya nga ng'ali kuli.
Mweyika khuloondekhana ne kumwalaalo kwa Wele khubirira khu Epafura omukholi owasiefwe, oli omukholi omusuubilwa owa Kristo mu bweyaangu bwefwe.
Akhuboolele efwe busiime bwenywe mu Roho.
Khulwe sifuno sino khumusabilanga enywe buli lwoosi, khukhwama nga ne khwaulila kakenywe. Khusabanga Wele amuelesie enywe limanya likali lie lilienya liewe, ne limanya lioosi nilio Roho wewe aananga.
Nio munyale khumenya nga Omwami ne enya, ne khukhola buli lwoosi kamusiimisia niye. Bulamu bwenywe bukhabemo buli sikholwa silayi, ne khutasa khumanya Wele lukali.
Kamaani ka Wele ke bunyali kakhabaelesie enywe liliefwiilisia ne kamaani kakolaana khukhwikhaliilikha buli siindu ne khuba basangaafu ng'ali.
Saba ndi enywe mupile Wele orio khulwe khubalekha enywe musaange mu ndakaano niyo aakholela babaandu bewe be mu bwami bwe Mwikulu mu buwaanga.
Aakhureesia efwe khukhwama mu maani ke sisiilima ne khu khureera efwe bulayi, mu bwami bwo Mwana wewe Omukoosi.
Khubirira mu niye efwe khuli balekhuule ne bubwoni bwefwe bwarusibwao.
Kristo niye sifwaanani sia Wele okhabonekha tawe,
aabaao Wele ne akhabuumbakho sisiindu siosi siosi tawe, mala ali angaaki we bibuumbe bioosi.
Sikila khubirira mu niye
Wele aabaang'ana buli siindu sie mwikulu ne khu sibala,
bibonekha nende bikhabonekha tawe,
alala ne bunyali bwa roho, babaami, baruki ne bunyali.
Wele aabaang'ana limala lioosi khubirira mu niye lundi sikila niye.
Kristo abao ebweeni wa buli siindu,
ne mu bulala naye bibiindu bioosi
bili niio bienyibwa khuba.
niye sinoko sie bulamu bwe kumubili okwo.
Niye lirakikha
Omubele khulamusibwa khukhwama mwifwa,
nio abe owe bweeni mu buli siindu.
Sikila Wele omwene akhalaka ali,
omwana wewe abe ne liiba lia Wele lioosi.
Wele aakhalaka ali limala lioosi likobole khu mwene.
Wele aareerao kumuleembe khubirira mu lifwa lie mbosio
lio Mwana wewe khu musalaba,
khwako eekobosiakho bibiindu bioosi khu sibala ne mwikulu.
Khale akho mwaba aleeyi khukhwama khu Wele, lundi mwaba basiku bewe sikila bibiindu bimayaanu nibio mwakholanga ne khukhwibaasia.
Ne kakhali luno, khulwe lifwa lio Mwana wewe, Wele aamukholile enywe khuba basaale bewe, nio amureere enywe ebweeni wewe ne muli, batakatifu, bakwalaafu, lundi nibo bakhabiyakho khu siindu siosi siosi ebweeni wewe tawe.
Kakhaba kario mukhoya muchiililile khutiila lisuubila lukali nga kumusiingi kwe kamaani. Mukhafukiilila khurusibwa khu lieyikina nilio mwanyoola nga mwaulila Elomo Endayi tawe. Ese Paulo nakholwa omukholi sikila Elomo Endayi yino, eyelwachibwa khu buli mundu mu sibala.
Luno ese sangaalila khu khupwa siibi sikila enywe, sikila khubirira mu khupisibwa siibi khwase mu sibala muno, njeeta khukhwichusiao sisiasikalilakho mu khupisibwa siibi khwa Kristo mu bweyaangu bwe kumubili kwewe, nikwo ekanisa.
Wele aakholile ese khuba omukholi owe kanisa. Wele owamba kumulimo kuno khukukhola, khulwe ngaanga khwinywe. Kuli kumulimo kwe khukhwilwacha elomo yewe mu bwichufu,
lili liliekisia nilio aakisa khukhwama khu selukho choosi ne babaandu boosi ne luno abooleele babaandu bewe.
Lirekekha lia Wele lili khukhola liliekisa liewe lino limanyikhe khu baandu bewe, simoonyo siie buiinda sino lundi sie luyali nisio khulwe babaandu boosi. Liliekisa lie buiinda ne luyali lino lili nilio ali nalio khulwe babaandu boosi. Liliekisa lino liboola lili Kristo ali mwinywe, ne liekesia lili enywe mukhasaange mu luyali lwa Wele.
Khwako khwilwacha Kristo khu buli mundu. Khukaambila ne khubekisia ne limanya linyalikhana lioosi nio khureere buli sia mulala ebweeni wa Wele nga omundu okhulile mu bulala ne Kristo.
Nio lino liekholekhe, ese khalabananga lukali ne nirana, ne khurumikhira kamaani kamakali niko Kristo aananga lundi kaali khu milimo mwise.

Lekha muboolele enywe nga namukhalaabanila enywe lukali alala ne babaandu ba Laotikia ne babaandi boosi bakhabonanakho nase tawe.
Kholanga nio babe banyindaafu lukali lundi bolaane khureerwa alala mu busiime, khwako bali ne lilieyikina likali nilio limanya lia ng'ali lireeranga. Mu ngila yino bakhamanye lilienya lia Wele liliekisa, niye Kristo Omwene.
Buyiinda ne bukesi bwa Wele bwoosi bwakukhuulilwa mu niye.
Nono ese muboolela enywe ndi, mukhalekha yesi yesi amubea enywe khubirira mu mayiingano ke bubeeyi akhaba ne kabonekhana khuba kamalayi tawe.
Sikila akhaba ne khali ne nanywe mu mubili tawe, ndi nanywe mu Roho, lundi ndi ne busangaafu nga ne mbona khukhwirusia khwenywe khukali mu bulala bwe lisuubila mu Kristo.
Sikila mwafukiliile Yesu Kristo nga Omwami, menya mu bulala naye.
Yiandalasia lukali mu Kristo mala mu mubukule niye khuba kumusiingi kwe bulamu bwenywe. Ba ne lisuubila likali khuloondekhana nga mwekisibwa. Nio mube babapa orio engali.
Nono, mukhalekha yesi yesi amubea enywe ne kamayiingamo busa tawe. Kamayiingamo ako kanyala kalolekha khuba ke limanya, ne kakhali kamekisio ke babaandu niko. Ke bunyali bwe mu sibala muno busa, se kali ka Kristo tawe.
Sikila liba lia Wele lioosi lili mu Kristo ooli omundu,
ne enywe mwaelesibwa bulamu bwoosi mu bulala naye. Ali omukhulu khu buli omuruki owa roho ne bunyali bwoosi.
Mwakhebwa mu bulala ne Yesu, ne se sili sikhebo sikholwa ne babaandu tawe, ne kakhali sikhebo sikholwa ne Kristo. Sikhebo sino sili siaana bulekhuule khu maani ke bubwoni.
Sikila mu khubatiisibwa khwenywe mwasiikhwa ne Kristo, lundi mu batisimu mwene omwo, enywe mwalamusibwa alala ne Kristo khubirira mu lisuubila lienywe mu bunyali bwa Wele owalamusia Kristo.
Siise sisiabira esio mwaba bafu mu Roho sikila bubwoni bwenywe, lundi sikila se mwaba babaandu ba Wele tawe. Ne kakhali Wele luno aamuelesie enywe bulamu ne Kristo. Wele aakhubeela efwe bubwoni bwefwe bwoosi.
Aarusiao efaili eye kamakobi kefwe alala ne kamalaka kayo kamarafu, afuuta kano koosi akarusirao elala mu khukakhoma khu musalaba.
Khu musalaba okhwo, Kristo akhila bunyali ne kamaani ka roho. Aalekha sibala sioosi siabona nga baba ne bayilwa nga baambe, Kristo na baraangirire mu bukhili bwewe.
Bibiindu bino bioosi bili busa sisiiniini sie bibiindu bikheeche; bung'ali buli Kristo.
Mukhalekha omundu yesi yesi owe bukula khuba omulayi lukali khukhila enywe sikila kamalola kewe, lundi owenya busa lilieboombia lie bubeeyi ne khusaaya ba malaika tawe. Ne kakhali ako koosi kali ka busa sikila kamebaasio kabwe kali kasaangasia babeene,
ba benabo balekha khuba mu bulala ne Kristo ooli kumurwe kwe kumubili kwoosi. Kristo aelesianga kumubili kamaani, lundi arumikhiranga bubwongelo bwe kumubili kwoosi khu kuambaania nga kukhula khubirira mu bunyali bwa Wele.
Mwafwa ne Kristo mala mwalekhuulwa khukhwama khu baroho ba bamiia mu limala. Siina sikila nono, ne mu menya nga be sibala sino? Siina sikila ne muria kamalaka nga,
“Mukhatiila khu sino tawe, mukhachanjaama esio tawe,” namwe “Mukhetiila khu siindu esio tawe”?
Kano koosi kali busa khu biindu bitaamba bukhala ne bimalile khurumikhirwa. Kano kali kamalaka ne kamekisio ke babaandu busa.
Kamalaka nga ako kalolekhana khuba ke limanya mu khu saaya bamalaika khwabwe khwe khuyingililwa, ne lilieboombia lie bubeeyi ne khura kumubili mu buchuuni, ne kakhali se bili ne bukhala bwa ng'ali mu khukhiingilila liliekoomba lie kumubili tawe.

Ra kamebaasio kenywe khu biindu biili ebweeneyo, se khuli khu biindu biili khu sibala sino tawe.
Sikila enywe mwafwa, ne bulamu bwenywe bwakisibwa alala ne Kristo mu Wele.
Bulamu bwenywe bwa ng'ali buli Kristo ne nga akhabonekhe, enywe mweesi mukhabonekhe naye mala musaange mu luyali lwewe!
Nono khukhwola mwire liliekoomba lie sibala lie bubwoni lili mwinywe, bibiindu nga sifwaabi, bunyaalu, liliekoomba libi, kameelu ne bulianga (sikila bulianga buli nga khusaaya bifwaani).
Lirima lia Wele likhabe khwaabo bakhamuria niye tawe sikila bibiindu nga bino biri.
Siise siabao nisio enywe mwabeene mwamenyanga khuloondekhana ne liliekoomba lirio, siise nisio limenya lienywe liechulamo liliekoomba liene elio.
Ne kakhali luno khukhwola mulekhane ne bibiindu bino bioosi, lirima, lisinye, ne kamakuto. Bukhomo ne chilomo chimbi chiikhaamakho mukhanwa mwenywe tawe.
Mukhabeana tawe, sikila mwefuula liiba lienywe lie khaale ne kimiima kialio
mala mwefwara liiba liya lino. Lili liiba liya nilio Wele, omubuumbi walio, buli busiele akaluukhasianga lifwaanane naye nio amukhole enywe mu mumanye niye bulayi.
Khwako bubwabukhani se buliio lundi akari we babaandu Be Chikholo ne Bayaudi tawe, akari we babaandu ne basiinde, akari we basomi ne bakhali basomi tawe, nasioobi ne baleekhule tawe. Ne kakhali Kristo ali bioosi, lundi Kristo ali mu bioosi.
Mwekhaliilikhane ne khubeelanila, mulala khwinywe aaba ne ali ne likhuwa khu wasie. Mukhoya mubeelanile nga Omwami ne aamubeela enywe.
Ne khu biindu bino bioosi, tasakho busiime, busiime bureera alala bibiindu bioosi mu bwichufu.
Lekha kumuleembe nikwo Kristo aana kube mu miooyo kienywe. Sikila Wele enya enywe mube alala mu muleembe nga kumubili mulala. Lundi khe mupe orio.
Elomo eya Kristo mu buiinda bwayo bwoosi ekhoya emenye mu miooyo kienywe. Yekisiana ne khukambilana ne limanya lioosi. Yimba kimienya ne chinyimbo chindakatifu, yimbila Wele ne khumupila niye orio mu miooyo kienywe.
Khwako buli siindu nisio mukhola namwe muloma, sikhoya siekholekhe mwisina lio Mwami Yesu, nga ne mupila orio Wele Paapa khubirira mu niye.
Bananywe, ria basaasi benywe buli lwoosi, sikila elio nilio lisiimisia Wele.
Lioosi lioosi nilio mukhola, likhole ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi, oli mulikho mukholela Omwami ne se bali babaandu tawe.
Manya muli Omwami akhamue enywe kumuruuru nikwo aabiikhila babaandu bewe. Sikila Kristo ali Omwami owa ng'ali niye mukholelanga.
Ne buli okhola kamabi akharuungwe khuloondekhana ne kamabi niko aakholanga, sikila Wele akhalakilanga buli sia mulala mu bung'ali.

Ba ne sinani khusaba, lundi ba meso ne mulikho musaba, ne khu khupila Wele orio.
Lundi khusabilekho efwe fwesi, nio Wele akhuelesie efwe bubweyaangu bulayi khukhwilwacha Elomo yewe khuloondekhana nende limanya lia Kristo liliekisa. Lino nilio likila ese ne ndi mu siboe luno.
Nono enywe saba muli ese nyale khulomaloma nga khoyela, mu ngila eye khulikhola limanyikhe bulayi.
Lilomaloma lienywe buli lwoosi likhoya libe lilayi lundi lisiimisia, lundi mumanye nga mukobosia bulayi buli mundu.
Ako kakila nendikho muruma omwene, khumutinyilisia enywe kimiooyo khulwe khumuboolela nga ne khulikho khuchiililila.
Alikho echa ne Onesimo wandaayefwe omukoosi lundi omusuubilwa, owe sipupu sienywe. Balamuboolela enywe buli siindu silekholekhanga eno.
Yoshua, lundi olaangwa Yusito, yesi aamurumiire enywe kimileembe. Bataru bano bong'ene nibo Bayaudi basuubili bakholanga nase kimilimo khulwe bubwami bwa Wele, mala babeele be buyeeti bukali po khwise.
Ese samwene nyala narusia buloli bwe kimilimo kiewe mwinywe ne babaandu ba Laotikia ne Hirapoli.
Luka omusilikhi wefwe omusiime ne Tema bamukhesiisie enywe.
Khesele bawandaayefwe mu Laotikia ne Nimufa ne basuubili babuusiananga munju mwewe.
Ne mumalile khusoma ebarwa yino, lola muli yasomeelwe mu kanisa eya Laotikia. Ne siise sisienesio, musome ebarwa niyo bawandaayefwe mu Laotikia balamurumira enywe.
Ne boolela Arikipo muli, “Lola oli wamalile kumulimo nikwo waebwa khu kholela Omwami.”
Ese Paulo ndikho mbandika kimileembe kino ne kumukhono kwase samwene. Mukhebilila muli ndi mu siboe tawe!
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kube nanywe.

Khu kanisa eye ba Tesalonike, baali ba Wele Paapa no Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe bibe khwinywe.
Buli lwosi efwe khupanga orio khu Wele sikila enywe mweesi, ne buli lwoosi khu murumburangakho mu masaba kefwe.
Sikila khukhebulila ebweeni wa Wele wefwe lundi Paapa nga ne mwara lisuubila lienywe mu bikholwa, nga busiime bwenywe bwamukhola mwakhola kimilimo ne kamaani, ne lundi nga lilieyikina lienywe mu Mwami Yesu Kristo ne lili liiandalafu.
Bawandaayefwe, efwe khumanyile khuli Wele amusiima enywe mala amurobora mube babeewe.
Sikila se khwamureerera burume bwe Lomo Endayi, mu makhuwa kong'ene tawe, ne kakhali yecha ne bunyali ne Roho Omutakatifu, ne lisuubisia lioosi lie bung'ali bwayo. Mumanyile limenya liefwe, nga ne khwaba nanywe, liaba khulwe bulayi bwenywe.
Mwaba babeeka befwe lundi bo Mwami, ne akhaba ne mwaba mu sinyaasio sikali, mwakaanila burume ne liliekhoya liliama khu Roho Omutakatifu.
Khwako mwaba be khulolelakho khu basuubili boosi mu Masedonia ne mu Akaya.
Sikila burume bwo Mwami se bwaba bwong'ene bubwama khwinywe bwacha mu Masedonia ne mu Akaya tawe, akhaba ne kamakhuwa ke lisuubila lienywe mu Wele kacha buli abuundu. Nono, se siliio sisiindu nisio khunyala khwaloma tawe.
Babaandu abo boosi bafumia nga ne mwakhwakaanila efwe siise nisio khwamukeniia, lundi nga mwalekha bifwaani ne khukobolela Wele, ne khukholela kimilimo Wele Omenyile mindali lundi owa ng'ali.
Ne khulindiilila liliicha lio Mwana wewe khukhwama mwikulu, Omwana wewe Yesu, niye alamusia khukhwama mu lifwa, okhuonianga khukhwama khu lirima lia Wele lilikho liliicha.

Bawandaayefwe, enywe mwabene mu manyile muli khu mukeniia khwefwe se khwaba khwa busa tawe.
Mu manyile nga khwaba ne khunyaasibwe ne khukhomwa mu Filipi ne khukheecha Tesalonike niyo muli eyo tawe. Ne akhaba ne khwaba ne butinyu bukali, Wele wefwe akhutasa kumwoyo khumuboolele enywe Elomo Endayi, eyaama khu niye.
Liliekoonjelela liefwe khwinywe, se lili nio efwe khukhole kakhenyibwa namwe kamabi tawe, namwe se khukhakanga khureka yesi yesi tawe.
Se khulomalomanga nio khusiimisie babaandu tawe, ne kakhali khulomalomanga khusiimisie Wele, owakhusuubila efwe mala khwafukiililwa mu moni chewe khukeesia burume bwe Lomo Endayi, nio apiime kimiooyo kiefwe.
Mumanyile bulayi bwene muli se khwecha khwinywe ne lulimi lwe khuombelesia tawe, namwe se khwarumikhira kamakhuwa ke khukisa bulianga tawe, Wele ali omuloli wefwe!
Se khwakhaka khunyoola efuma khukhwama khu yesi yesi, namwe khwinywe namwe khu baandi tawe, akhaba ne khwaba ne bung'ali bwe khumwenyakho kumuruungo nga barumwa ba Kristo.
Ne kakhali khwaba baolu bulayi bwene nga maayi ne alelanga babaana bewe.
Sikila busiime bwefwe khwinywe, se khwerekekha khusaanga nanywe mu Lomo Endayi khukhwama khu Wele yong'ene tawe, khwasaanga akhaba limenya liefwe liosi. Mwaba basiime lukali khwifwe!
Bawandaayefwe ng'ali mukhebulila nga ne khwakhola ne khunyaakhana! Khwakhola kimilimo siilo ne kumuusi, nio khukhaba butinyu khwinywe tawe, siise nisio khwamwilwachila Elomo Endayi khukhwama khu Wele.
Enywe muli baloli befwe, ne akhaba Wele yesi, liba liefwe khwinywe basuubila liaba litakatifu, liluungi, ne likhalikhomo kamabi kosi kosi tawe.
Mu manyile muli khwabukula buli sia mulala khwinywe bulayi bwene busa nga Paapa ne akholelanga babaana bewe.
Khwamuramo kamaani, ne khumuoleelesia, mala khwachiililila khumuchuuba enywe mumenye limenya lisiimisia Wele, omulaanganga enywe musaange mu Bwami bwewe ne luyali.
Ne siliio sifuno sisiindi sikila ne khupanga orio buli lwoosi khu Wele. Nga khwamureerera enywe burume bwa Wele, mwabuulila mala mwabufukiilila, nga burume bukhali bwe babaandu tawe, ne kakhali mwabubukula nga burume bwa Wele, mala ng'ali buli bwa Wele. Sikila Wele akhola kimilimo mwinywe mumwasuubila.
Bawandaayefwe, bibiindu bibieene ne bibieene bibiamwikholekhekho, biekholekha khu chikanisa cha Wele mu Buyuda, khu baandu baali ba Yesu Kristo ebweeneyo. Binyaasio nibio mwanyoola khukhwama khu baandu be mu sibala sienywe sisiene bili busa bibieene ne bibieene nibio nibo banyaasibwa khukhwama khu Bayaudi,
babeera Omwami Yesu ne bang'oosi, mala bakhunyaasia efwe. Bali bakhasiimisia Wele tawe! Bali basiku bayingania buli mundu!
Lundi bakhaka khukhukhiingilila efwe khulekhe khwilwacha burume khu Be Chikholo, burume bunyala bwabareerera buonia. Mu ngila ng'eneyo bamalile elala khukhwichusia esaabu eye bubwoni bwabwe. Ne luno lirima lia Wele liamalile khubechakho!
Ne efwe, bawandaayefwe, nga khwaba ne khwaukhaane nanywe khu siise sitiiti mu mubili, se khwamurusia mumebaasio kefwe tawe, khwamwikoombile mala khwakhaka lukali khumukeniye lundi!
Khwenyile khwiche lundi. Ese samwene nakhakile lukali khukhwicha, ne kakhali Sietani se enya khwiche tawe.
Kakhaba kario, enywe muli, lilieyikina liefwe, liliekhoya liefwe, ne sifuno siefwe sie khukhwibonia khu bukhili bwefwe ebweeni wo Mwami Yesu nga ne akheeche.
Ng'ali enywe muli liliebonia liefwe ne liliekhoya liefwe.

mala khwaruma Timoteo, wandaayefwe okholanga ne nafwe khulwa Wele mu khwilwacha Elomo Endayi eya Kristo. Khwamuruma khwinywe amuandalasie mu lisuubila lienywe lundi amuchuube,
nio yesi yesi khwinywe akhela enyuma sikila binyaasio bino tawe. Enywe mwabeene mu manyile muli binyaasio biri, bili bilala khu lienya lia Wele khwifwe.
Sikila nga khwaba ne khu siili ne nanywe, khwanyoa khwamuboolela khuli khulikho khucha khunyaasibwa, ne nga ne mu manyile bulayi bwene, ako niko busa kamene kakekholekha.
Ako niko kakakila naruma Timoteo. Beele se nyala khukhwekhaliilikha lundi tawe, nio namuruma manye lisuubila lienywe. Naba ne buuri ndi wakana abeele Omusiku amukhakile enywe mala kimilimo kiefwe kiabele kia busa!
Khwako bawandaayefwe, mu butinyu ne buchuuni bwefwe bwoosi, khwaandalasiibwe kimiooyo sikila enywe. Lisuubila lienywe nilio liliakhuandalasia efwe kimiooyo,
sikila luno ng'ali khumenya, mwaba ne mweandalasia mu limenya lienywe mu buambaani no Mwami.
Luno khunyala khwapila Wele wefwe orio sikila enywe. Khumupila orio sikila liliekhoya nilio khuli nalio ebweeni wewe sikila enywe.
Siilo ne kumuusi khumusabanga niye ne kumwoyo mulala akhulekhuule efwe khumubone enywe moni na moni, mala khumuelesie nibio mukhoyela mu lisuubila lienywe.
Khusaba Wele wefwe lundi oli Paapa Omwene no Mwami wefwe Yesu akhuraangirire efwe khumukeniye enywe!
Omwami akhoyeele atasa busiime bwenywe khu buli mulala ne khu baandu boosi bukuche ne khutasikha, mala bube bukali nga bubwefwe khwinywe.
Mu ngila yino akhamuandalasie, mala mu khabe baluungi lundi batakatifu ebweeni wa Wele wefwe, lundi oli Paapa, nga Omwami wefwe Yesu ne akheeche ne naabo boosi bali babeewe.

Ekhumaliilikha, bawandaayefwe, mweyikile khukhwama khwifwe nga nemukhoyeele khumenya nio musiimisie Wele. Eyino niyo engila niyo mwama khumenyelangamo. Ne luno khumusaba enywe ne khumuchuuba mu lisina lio Mwami Yesu mukhole kamakali khukhilakhoo.
Sikila mumanyile kamekisio niko khwamwekisia mu bunyali bwo Omwami Yesu.
Sikila lino nilio lilienya lia Wele, mube batakatifu mu bwichufu, lundi mwibebee sifwaabi sie bueeyi.
Buli sia mulala khwinywe oli omuseecha, khukhwola amanye khumenya no mukhasi wewe mungila endakatifu lundi eye lukoosi,
ne seli eye liliekoomba limayaanu nga bakhamanyile Wele tawe.
Mu makhuwa kano, nono, omundu akhakholela omukristo wasie kamabi, namwe anyooleleo bubweyaangu bwe khu khola kamabi tawe. Khwanyoa khwamuboolela kano, ne khumukaambila lukali khuli Omwami akhaukuume abo bakholanga bario.
Wele se akhulaanga efwe khumenya mu sifwaabi tawe, ne kakhali mu butakatifu.
Khwako, oyo yesi yesi oloba liliekisia lino, se alikho aloba omundu tawe, ne kakhali aloba Wele omuelesianga enywe Roho wewe Omutakatifu.
Se siliio sikila khumuandikile enywe khulwe busiime khu basuubili basienywe tawe. Enywe mwabeene mwekisibwa ne Wele nga ne mukhoyeele mwasiimana.
Ne mala ng'ali mwakholile murio khu bawandaayenywe boosi be mu Masedonia mwoosi. Khwako bawandaayefwe, khumusaba enywe, mukhole khukhilakhoo.
Khola libe lilienya lienywe khumenya limenya lili litembelefu, ne mukhola kimilimo kienywe, mala munyoole kumuruungo kwenywe, bulayi bwene nga khwanyoa khwamuboolela.
Mu ngila yino mukhanyoole lukoosi khukhwama khwaabo bakhasuubila tawe, mala se mukhabe butinyu khu mundu yesi khu nisio mwenya tawe.
Bawandaayefwe, se khwenya mulekhe khumanya kamakhuwa kabo ba baafwa tawe, nio mulekhe khuba ne bubeeleli, nga abo bakhali ne lilieyikina tawe.
Khusuubila khuli Yesu aafwa mala aalamukha, lundi khusuubila khuli Wele akhakobosie Yesu alala ne naabo babaafwa ne bamusuubile niye.
Lilaka lilirusibwa mu mumilo kwe angaaki lukali ne malaika omukhulu, liiuliilikhana lie ekhoombi eya Wele libeo, mala Omwami omwene akhekhe khukhwama mwikulu. Abo babafwa ne basuubile Kristo balinyoa balamukhe,
ne efwe khuuliba balamu mu sibala siise esio, khulibukulibwa alala ne nabo mu maleesi, mala khwakaanile Omwami mu ngaaki. Nio buli lwoosi khuliba alala no Mwami.
Nono, khemuoleelesiane ne kamakhuwa kano.

Bawandaayefwe, se silikhoo sikila khumuandikile enywe, khuloondekhana ne biise nibio bibiindu bino bikhekholekhelemo tawe.
Sikila enywe mwabene mumanyile bulayi bwene muli Endaalo yo Mwami ekheeche butundubikha nga omwifwi ne echa mu silo.
Babaandu nga bakhabe ne balikho baloma bali, “Luno khuli ne kumuleembe, butinyu mbakhoo tawe” khane siise esio nisio lilionaka lilikho libanyoola! Liliicha khangu busa nga khulumwa khwo mukhasi ne enya khusaala, mala babaandu se baliebachakho tawe.
Ne enywe bawandaayefwe, se muli mu siilima tawe, Endaalo eyo se khoya yamutundubikha nga omwifwi ne atundubikha tawe.
Enywe mweesi muli babaandu be mu buwaanga, be kumuusi. Se khuli be siilo namwe be sisiilima tawe.
Khwako, se khukhoyeele khwakona nga babaandi tawe, khukhoya khube meso lundi milengaala.
Babaandu bakonaanga siilo, lundi bameelanga siilo.
Ne efwe khuli be kumuusi khwako khukhoyeele khwaba milengaala. Khukhwola khwifware lisuubila ne busiime nga engabo eteecha sifuba, ne lilieyikina lie buonia nga ekofio eye sichuuma ekisa kumurwe.
Wele se akhurobora efwe khuukuumwe mu lirima liewe tawe, ne kakhali khunyoole buonia khubirira mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo,
owakhufwiila efwe nio khwole khumenya alala ne naye nga ne akheeche akhunyoole balamu namwe bafu.
Nono, khemuchuubane ne khuyeetana mwabeene ne mwabeene, nga luno ne mulakholanga.
Khumusaba enywe, bawandaayefwe, mube ne buuri khwaabo bakhola kimilimo mwinywe, bamurangirira ne bamwekisia enywe mu liimenya lie Bukristo.
Baelesie liria likali ne busiime sikila kimilimo nikio bakhola. Ba ne kumuleembe khu mwabeene ne mwabeene.
Khumuchuuba enywe, bawandaayefwe, kaambila bakara. Tasa kamaani baari, yeeta batekhele, mala mube ne khukhwefwiilisia khu buli sia mulala.
Lola muli omundu yesi yesi se aruungia kamabi khu mabi tawe, ne buli lwoosi yeluungikha khukhola kamalayi khu buli mundu ne khu baandu boosi.
Yekhoya buli lwoosi,
saba biise bioosi,
ba mumupa orio mu buli siindu siosi siosi. Sikila lino lili lilienya lia Wele mu Yesu Kristo khwinywe.
Mukhasimia Roho Omutakatifu tawe,
mukhalekelesia burume bwe bung'oosi tawe.
Ne kakhali ra buli siindu khwikela. Tililila siili silayi.
Yebacha buli bubwafuma bumayaanu bwoosi.
Wele okhuelesianga efwe kumuleembe, akhoya amukhola enywe mwaba batakatifu mu buli ngila, mala aliinde roho, kumwoyo, ne kumubili, bilobe khubakho ne bubi bwosi bwosi khu ndaalo niyo Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo akheechelekho.
Oyo omulaanganga enywe akhakhole ario, sikila ali omusuubilwa.
Bawandaayefwe, khusabilekho akhaba fweesi.
Kheesia basuubili boosi ne liliekwayila litakatifu.
Musaba enywe mu bunyali bwo Mwami, musome ebarwa yino khu basuubili boosi.
Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo kube ne nanywe.

Kumwalaalo kube khwinywe ne kumuleembe khukhwama khu Wele Paapa wefwe no Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Bawandaayefwe, khukhwola khupile Wele orio buli siise sikila enywe. Buli bulayi khwifwe khukhola khurio, sikila lisuubila lienywe lilikho litasikha lukali ne busiime nibwo buli mulala khwinywe ali nabwo khu basie bulikho butasikha.
Ako niko kakila efwe ne khwebonia sikila enywe mu chikanisa cha Wele. Khwebonia nga ne muchiililila khukhwekhaliilikha ne khusuubila khubirira mu binyaasio bioosi alala ne khuchuunisibwa nikhwo mulikho munyoola.
Kano koosi kekesia kali likhalaka lia Wele lili lia ng'ali, ne khulwako mulaba babolaana khuba mu Bwami bwewe, sikila nibwo bukila ne mulikho mupwa siibi.
Wele alakhola kaali kang'ali, alareera sinyaasio khwaabo bamunyaasianga enywe,
ne alamuuluusia enywe mu mupa siibi ne nafwe fweesi. Akhakhole kano nga Omwami Yesu akhabonekhe khukhwama mwikulu ne malaika bewe be kamaani,
ne kumulilo kwe lumemu, khuukuuma abo ba baloba Wele, ne khuloba khuria Elomo Endayi eyo Mwami wefwe Yesu.
Bakhanyoole siiukuumo sie libunia lia mindali, bakhaukhasibwe khukhwama ebweeni wo Mwami ne khukhwama khu luyali lwewe lwe kamaani,
nga ne akheeche khu Ndaalo eye khunyoola luyali khukhwama khu baandu bewe boosi, ne lukoosi khukhwama khu boosi ba basuubila. Ne enywe mweesi mukhabe balala khu nibo, sikila mwasuubila elomo niyo khwamuboolela.
Ako niko kakila buli lwoosi ne khumusabilanga enywe. Khusabanga Wele wefwe amukhole enywe mwole khumenya limenya nilio amulangila mumenye. Akhoyeele mu bunyali bwewe amuelesie liliekoomba lienywe lioosi khulwe bulayi, mala atabusie kimilimo kienywe kie lisuubila.
Mu ngila yino lisina lio Mwami wefwe Yesu lilanyoola luyali khukhwama khwinywe, ne enywe munyoole khukhwama khu niye, khulwe kumwalaalo kwa Wele wefwe nende kwo Mwami Yesu Kristo.

Mukhaba bakoyanisibwa khangu mu khwibaasia khwenywe, namwe mwayusibwa mu miooyo khulwe khuboolelwa muli Endaalo eyo Mwami yoola khale tawe. Wakana mwibaasia muli khwaboola lino nga khwaba ne khung'oola, namwe ne khwilwacha, namwe muli khwaliandika mu barwa.
Mukhalekha omundu yesi yesi amubee mu ngila yosi yosi tawe. Sikila Endaalo eyo se liola khuloba Wele khumaliilisi, ne khukhabao ne Omumayaanu owalaamilwa khucha mu nyanja eye kumulilo ne akhabao tawe.
Aliyingania buli olaangwa wele namwe sisiindu siosi siosi nisio basaayanga. Omwene alieniinia angaaki wabio bioosi, lundi akhache ekhale mu Lukaangu lwa Wele, mala elaange khuba Wele.
Khaba se mukhebulila tawe? Namuboolela kano koosi nga naba nanywe.
Ne siliio sisiindu sikhiingilila kano kalekhe khukhwekholekha luno tawe, mala musimanyile. Mu siise sisialakwa, Omumayaanu oyo akhabonekhe.
Omumayaanu chana ali khale khu milimo, ne kakhali kakewe ako se kalekholekha tawe, khukhwola nga oyo okakhiingililanga ne akharusibweo.
Ne nga arusibwao, Omumayaanu oyo akhabonekhe, ne nga Omwami Yesu ne akheeche, akhamwire ne kumuya khukhwama mukhanwa mwewe ne khumubunia ne khubao khwe liliicha liewe.
Omumayaanu oyo akheeche ne bunyali bwa Sietani ne khukhola kakafuma kamayia koosi ke bubeeyi ne bibiindu bie khuukia,
mala arumikhire bubwafuma bubeeyi khwaabo bakhabune. Bakhabune sikila se bakaanila ne khusiima bung'ali nio baonisibwe tawe.
Khwako Wele abarumira bunyali bwe khubatiimia bubakhole basuubile kaali ke bubeeyi.
Ekhumaliilikha abo boosi babesangaasia mu bwoni ne bakhasuubila bung'ali tawe, ba khakhalakilwe.
Khukhwola bawandaayefwe khupile Wele orio mu biise bioosi sikila enywe, enywe nibo Omwami asiima. Sikila Wele amurobora enywe nga be khunyoa muonisibwe ne bunyali bwa Roho, amukhole enywe mube babaandu bewe batakatifu khulwe lisuubila lienywe mu bung'ali.
Wele amulaanga enywe khu kano khubirira mu Lomo Endayi niyo khwamwilwachila; amulaanga enywe munyoole sitonyi sienywe sie luyali lwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo.
Bawandaayefwe nono, yeandalasia ne khuamba bung'ali nibwo khwamwekisia obwo, mulilwacha liefwe ne mu barwa yefwe.
Akhoya Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo omwene ne Wele Paapa wefwe, owakhusiima efwe, akhuelesia litinyilisia lia mindali ne lilieyikina lilayi mu mwalaalo kwewe,
amutinyilisie kumwoyo ne khumutasa kamaani buli lwoosi mukhole ne khulomaloma kaali kamalayi.

Ekhumaliilikha, bawandaayefwe, khusabile nio burume bwo Omwami buchiililile khusalanila khangu ne khukhwakanilwa ne lukoosi, bulayi bwene nga ne bwafukiililwa mwinywe.
Saba lundi muli Wele akhuonie efwe khukhwama khu baandu baabi lundi bamayaanu; sikila se kali bali buli mundu asuubila burume buno tawe.
Ne kakhali Omwami ali omusuubilwa, ne alamutasa kamaani ne khumuliinda bulayi khukhwama khu Mumayaanu oyo.
Ne khuli ne lisuubila mu Mwami khwinywe khuli mulikho mukhola, lundi mulachiililila khukhola niko khumuboolela.
Omwami akhoyeele amuelesie limanya mu miooyo kienywe mu busiime bwa Wele ne liliekhaliilikha nilio Kristo aananga.
Bawandaayefwe, khumulakiilisia enywe mu lisina lio Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo khuli, yeyaula khu bawandaayefwe abo boosi bamenyile limenya lie bukara lundi bakhaloonda kamekisio niko khwamuelesia tawe.
Enywe mwabene mumanyile bulayi bwene muli, mukhoyele khukhola niko efwe khwakhola nga ne khwaba nanywe. Se khwaba bakara tawe.
Se khwafukiilila buyeeti bwo mundu yesi yesi ne khukhamuruungire tawe. Ne kakhali, khwakhola kimilimo lukali po; siilo ne kumuusi nio khukhaba butinyu khu mundu yesi yesi khwinywe tawe.
Mu khukhola kano, se kali bali khwataamba bung'ali bwe khureeba buyeeti bwefwe tawe; ne kakhali khwekhola khuba nibo mubonelakho nio mukhole murio.
Nga ne khwaba nanywe, khwamuboolelanga enywe khuli, “Yesi yesi oloba khukhola kimilimo akhalia tawe.”
Khuloma kano sikila khulaulilanga bali balimo balala mwinywe, balekhalanga busa ne khumenya limenya lie bukara mala se bakholakho siosi tawe, nekhali khukhwekhupa mu makhuwa ke babaandu babaandi.
Mu lisina lio Mwami Yesu Kristo khulakiilisia babaandu bano ne khubakaambila bamenye limenya lilayi, mala bakhole kimilimo banyoole sie khukhweyeeta mu limenya liabwe.
Ne enywe, wandaayefwe, khukhwola mukhalua khukhola kamalayi tawe.
Yesi yesi oloba khuria niko khulikho khuandika mu barwa yino, omwenoyo mumanye, mala mukhaambaanakho naye mu ngila yosi yosi tawe, nio aambwe chisoni.
Ne mukhamubukula nga omusiku tawe, ne kakhali, mukaambile nga wandaayefwe.
Nono Omwami owe kumuleembe omwene, akhoya amuelesie kumuleembe mu biise bioosi lundi mu ngila choosi. Omwami abe nanywe mweesi.
Ese Paulo mbandika kimileembe kino ne kumukhono kwase kumwene. Eyino niyo engila niyo mbikhilangamo esayini yase. Mbandikanga ndi mu buli ebarwa yase.
Kumwalaalo kwo Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo kukhoya kwaaba nanywe mweesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo, omurumwa owa Yesu Kristo khulwe lilaka lia Wele Omuonia wefwe ne Yesu Kristo ooli lilieyikina liefwe.
Nenya ewe orame mu Efeso, nga ne nakhutanyilila ne ndi khu lukeendo lwase khucha e Masedonia. Babaandu balala ebweeneyo balikho bekisia kamekisio ke bubeeyi ne khukhwola obakaanie balekhe.
Baboolele balekhe chingano echo ne kamasina kamakali ke bakuuka, kareeranga khuyingana khwong'ene se kayeetangakho siosi siosi khu lirekekha lia Wele limanyikhananga khubirira mu lisuubila tawe.
Sifuno sie lilaka lino sili khusanyulusia busiime bubwamanga mu mwoyo kumukwalaafu, liba lilayi ne lisuubila lia ng'ali.
Babaandu balala bauukhe khukhwama khu kano mala batibile mu mbakha che siisilu.
Benya khuba babekisia be lilaka lia Wele, ne se bamanyile niko babeene baloma tawe, namwe bibiindu nibio balomalomakho ne sinani sikali tawe.
Khumanyile khuli Lilaka lili lilayi liaba bali lirumikhirwa nga ne likhoyeele.
Khukhwola khukhebulile, kakhaba kario khuli, kamalaka se karebwao sikila babaandu balayi tawe, ne kakhali karebwao sikila abo bafunaka kamalaka, babi, bakhasuubila mu Wele tawe, ne babooni. Lundi karebwao sikila abo bakhali mu dini, namwe mu roho tawe. Karebwao sikila abo babeera baraarawabwe namwe bamaawabwe, ne babeeri.
Sikila abo bakhola kamabi, nende be luuswa, baamba babaandu, babea nende barusia buloli bwe bubeeyi khu baandi namwe bakhola siosi siosi sikhacha alala ne kamekisio kamaluungi tawe.
Liliekisia elio linyoolekhana mu lomo eya Wele eyaanwa khwise ngiboole, Elomo Endayi khukhwama khu Wele owe luyali lundi owe fuma.
Khupila orio Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe, owambelesie ese kamaani khu milimo kiase. Ese mupila niye orio khulwe khu khumbukula ese khuuba owenyekhana ne khu khundobora ese khumukholela,
akhaba khaale ne naloma kamabi khu niye ne khumupia siibi ne khumukhoma. Ne Wele akholela ese siisa sikila abeele ese khaba ne lisuubila tawe, khwako se namanya niko nakholanga tawe.
Ne Omwami wefwe aanjalaala lukali mala aambelesia lisuubila ne busiime, bili bibiefwe mu bulala ne Yesu Kristo.
Yino eli elomo eya ng'ali ekhoyeele khufukiililwa elala ne khusuubilwa: Kristo echa mu sibala khuonia babooni. Ese ndi omubi khukhila nibo boosi,
ne kakhali Wele aakholela ese siisa nio Kristo efwiilisie lukali mu khunjeeta ese owe bubwoni bukali mu boosi, nio mbe sisiekesio khwaabo bakhakeleo bamusuubile niye mala banyoole bulamu bwa mindali.
Khu Mwami owa mindali, okhanyala afwa tawe, lundi okhabonekha tawe. Wele mulala yeng'ene abe ne lukoosi buli lwoosi! Amina.
Timoteo, mwana wase ese ndikho khuelesia ewe lilaka lino, liloondekhana ne kamakhuwa ke bung'oosi kakalomwa khaale khwiwe. Rumikhira kamakhuwa ako nga bulwaani nio upane bulayi,
lundi oliinde lisuubila liowo ne liiba liowo lie mukari libe lilayi. Babaandu balala se baloonda liiba liabwe lie mukari tawe, mala bonake lisuubila liabwe.
Balala khwaabo bali Himenea ne Alekisanda, nibo ese mbukuumile khubirira mu khubara nibo mu bunyali bwa Sietani; kano kakhabekisie khulekha embelekeu yabwe khu Wele.

Mu khurakikha, ese mwikoonjelela enywe ndi, kamasaba ne khu khuupa orio khu Wele bikholwe khulwe babaandu boosi,
khulwe babaami ne babaandi boosi bali ne bunyali, nio khumenye limenya lie kumuleembe mu khuria Wele lukali ne liiba lilayi.
Kano kali kamalayi lundi kasiimisia Wele Omuonia wefwe,
owenya buli mundu aonisibwe mala amanye bung'ali.
Sikila Wele ali mulala, ne oreeranga Wele ne babaandu alala ali omundu mulala, Yesu Kristo,
oweana khuonia babaandu boosi. Buno buli buloli mu siise silayi, buloma buli Wele enya omundu aonisibwe,
ne elio nilio liliakila ese narumwa nga omurumwa lundi nga omwekisia khu Be Chikholo, khuboola elomo eye lisuubila ne bung'ali. Se ndikho mbea tawe, ndikho ndoma bung'ali!
Buli mu Libusiana lie kanisa nenya baseecha basabe, baseecha babeana khu Wele basute kamakhono kabwe mu lisaba ne bakhali ne lirima namwe kamayiingamo tawe.
Lundi nenya bakhasi boosi bafware chingubo chikhoyela, lundi befware bulayi, ne se khuli mu khusuuka lichuune namwe khukhwifwara esahabu namwe chisiimbi namwe chingubo che bukusi bwe angaaki tawe,
ne kakhali babe ne bikholwa bilayi, nga bakhasi babelanga khuba be dini ne bakhoya babe.
Bakhasi bakhoyeele khukhweyika mu khwioleelesia ne lilieboombia likali.
Se mbafukiilila nibo khukhwekisia namwe khuba ne bunyali khu baseecha tawe; bakhoya basile busa.
Sikila Adamu anyoa abumbwa nio Hawa aloondakho.
Sietani se abea Adamu tawe, abea omukhasi mala afuna lilaka lia Wele.
Ne kakhali omukhasi alaonisibwa khubirira mu khusaala babaana, aaba ne achiililila mu lisuubila ne busiime ne butakatifu.

Elomo yino eli eya ng'ali, omundu aaba ne ali ne silukuluku khuuba Bishopu owe kanisa, aba ekoombile kimilimo kimilayi.
Nono Bishopu owe kanisa akhaba obiiywakho khwikhuwa liosi liosi tawe, akhoya abe no mukhasi mulala yeng'ene, abe milengaala, abe owiliinda, lundi owe busicha, akhoya abe owakaanila bakeni mungo mwewe; akhoya abe onyala wekisia,
akhaba omumeesi namwe owe sisiayuumba tawe, ne kakhali akhoyeele abe omuolu, owe kumuleembe, ne akhasiima chirupia tawe;
akhoya abe onyala khukhwimeelela enju yewe bulayi ne khukhwekisia babaana bewe khu muria niye ne buriaani bwoosi.
Sikila omundu okhanyala khukhwimeelela enju yewe omwene tawe, anyala ariena aaliinda e kanisa eya Wele?
Akhoya abe ne lisuubila likali, nio akhelola mala aanyoola silaamo nga Sietani alaamwa tawe.
Akhoya abe omundu niye babaandu be nje we kanisa baria nio akhabiiywa ne khukwa mu mureko kwa Sietani tawe.
Bayeeti be mu kanisa boosi bakhoya babe ne kimiima kimilayi ne khuba basuubilwa; bakhanywa endali engali namwe baliukhile chirupia tawe;
bakhoyeele beambe khu bung'ali bubwafuunulwa bwe lisuubila ne liiba lie mu mebaasio lilayi.
Bakhoyeele banyoa khukelwa, ne babira likela elio babe bakholi.
Bakhasi babwe bosi bakhoya babe be kimiima kimilayi, lundi bakhaba ne kamakuto tawe, khukhwola babe milengaala lundi basuubilwa mu buli siindu.
Omuyeeti owe kanisa khukhwola abe no mukhasi mulala yeng'ene, abe onyala emeelela babaana bewe nenju yewe bulayi.
Bayeeti bakhola kimilimo kiabwe bulayi banyoola lisiima lilayi lundi banyala khulomaloma mu bunyindaafu khuloondekhana ne lisuubila liabwe mu Yesu Kristo.
Nga ndikho mbandika ebarwa yino khwiwe, ndi ne lilieyikina ndi kheeche khu khubona ewe embi ari.
Ne kakhali naaba ne kheecha bwangu tawe, ebarwa yino ekhakhumanyisie ewe nga ne khukhoyeele khumenya ne khuli munju eya Wele, eli ekanisa eya Wele omenyile mindali, enjeko ne kumusiingi kwe bung'ali.
Se aliio onyala akorwa bukali bwe lusimo lwe dini yefwe tawe,
Abonekhana mu mubili nga omundu,
Okesebwa ne Roho khuba omuluungi!
Lundi bamalaika bamubona niye.
Elwachwa khu Be Chikholo,
Aasuubilwa mu sibala sioosi, lundi aayilwa mwikulu.

Roho aloma abuwaanga busa ali babaandu balala balilekha lisuubila mu biise bimaliilisi. Balifukiilila roho babeeyi ne khuloonda kamekisio ke bisieeno.
Kamekisio nga ako kario kasalanisibwanga ne babaandu babeeyi nibo liiba lie mu mebaasio kabwe liafwa, oli liliosibwa ne sichuuma sibilile pie.
Babaandu nga bano bari bekisia bali, buli bubi khureerana ne khulia biakhulia chingano nabulebe. Wele abuumba biakhulia ebio khuliibwa ne babaandu basuubila, enyuma we lisaba lie khu khuupila Wele orio.
Buli siindu nisio Wele abuumba sili silayi, siakhulia se siliio sinyala sialobwa tawe, ne kakhali buli siindu sikhoya siakaanilwe ne lisaba lie khu khuupila Wele orio,
sikila elomo eya Wele ne lisaba elio bikila siafukiililwa khu Wele.
Waaba no aana kamalaka kano khu bawandaayo, olaba omukholi omulayi owa Yesu Kristo nga ne weliisia mu roho khu makhuwa ke lisuubila nende ke liliekisia lia ng'ali nilio waloondile.
Ne kakhali yiyaula khukhwama khu mbakha chikhali cha Wele, chikholaana khuboolwa tawe, wenasie mu mekisio ke bulamu bwe busuubilifu khu Wele.
Khunasia kumubili khuli ne bukhala, ne kakhali khukhwenasia ka roho khuli ne bukhala mu buli ngila, sikila khusuubisia khubao khwe bulamu bwa luno nende bwe chindaalo chichiicha.
Yino eli elomo eya ng'ali, ekhoyeele khufukiililwa ne khusuubilwa.
Khwekumianga ne khukhola kimilimo ne kamaani, sikila khwareere lilieyikina liefwe mu Wele omenyile mindali ooli Omuonia owa boosi ne lukali abo basuubila.
Baelesie kamalaka ne kamekisio kano.
Okhalekha yesi yesi akhulekelesia ewe bali sikila oli omwana tawe, ne kakhali ba sisiekesio khu basuubili khubirira mu lilomaloma ne liiba liowo, busiime bwowo, lisuubila ne bukwalaafu bwowo.
Nabwila nga ne ndiicha, aana siise siowo ne kamaani khusoma kamaandiko mu baandu, khukhwilwacha ne khukhwekisia.
Okhalekha khurumikhira siianwa nisio wanyoola khubirira mu niko bang'oosi baloma, lundi nga basaakhulu bakhurakho kamakhono kabwe tawe.
Yeana khukhola kano ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi nio babaandu boosi babone lichiililila liowo.
Weyaye wamwene ne khuliinda kamekisio kowo. Chiililila khukhola kano, sikila nokakhola, oleonia wamwene ne naabo bakhurekeeresianga ewe.

Okharafuira omundu omukhulu khwiwe tawe, ne kakhali mulomalomekho nga olomaloma khu raraao. Bukula baele nga bawandaayo,
baloosi nga bamaao ne bakhasi baele nga bakooko bowo, mu bukwalaafu bwoosi.
Ba ne buriaani khu banamulekhwa bali bong'ene.
Ne kakhali namulekhwa aaba ne ali ne babaana namwe babechukhulu, bakhoyeele banyoa beyika khukhola kimilimo kiabwe kie dini khu be nju yabwe eng'ene, ne mu ngila yino baruunge basaasi ne bakuuka babwe, sikila ako niko kasiimisia Wele.
Namulekhwa oli yeng'ene busa, okhali nende omuliinda tawe, arechanga lilieyikina liewe mu Wele lundi achiililila khusaba buyeeti bwa Wele siilo ne kumuusi.
Ne kakhali namulekhwa omenya limenya lie khukhwelekhuula aba afwa khaale, akhaba nasiili omulamu.
Baelesie kamalaka kano nio bakhabiiywakho khu siindu siosi siosi tawe.
Ne kakhali yesi yesi nakhaliinda balebe bewe tawe, lukali be nju yewe, aba ekaanile lisuubila mala aba ali omubi lukali khukhila okhasuubila tawe.
Okhatasa namulekhwa yesi yesi khu masina ke banamulekhwa, nakhali ne ali angaaki we kimiiko kamakhumi sita tawe. Lundi khukhwola, abe owacha mwilia lulala lwong'ene,
mala aamanyikhana khuba ne bikholwa bilayi. Abe omukhasi owakhusia babaana bewe bulayi, owakaanila bakeni mungo mwewe, akhola kimilimo kie khukhwioleelesia khu bakristo basie, ayeeta babaandu mu butinyu, mala eaana omwene khukhola kamalayi.
Ne kakhali okhatasa namulekhwa baele khu masina ako tawe, sikila nga liliekoomba liabwe ne libakhola ne beenya khucha mwilia, baukha khukhwama khu Kristo,
khwako bamanyikhana khuba bafunake lisuubisia lie khunyoa nilio baakhola khu niye.
Lundi beyika khumalila biise biabwe mu khuyiiya khukhwama munju ndala khukhwola mu kiindi; ne khutumao, beyika khuba be kamakuto lundi babeyingisia mu kabeene, ne khukachula bibiindu nibio bakhakhoyeele tawe.
Nono ese nenya banamulekhwa baele bache liilia, babe ne babaana, mala baliinde chinju chabwe, nio bakhaelesia basiku befwe bubweyaangu bwe khuloma kamabi khwifwe tawe.
Sikila banamulekhwa balala bakaluukhane khale ne khuloonda Sietani.
Ne kakhali omukhasi omukristo yesi yesi aaba ne ali ne banamulekhwa munju mwewe, akhoya abaliinde mala alekhe khutiuukha busiro khu kanisa, nio ekanisa nayo eliinde banamulekhwa bamenyile bong'ene.
Basaakhulu bakhola kimilimo kimilayi nga babemeelesi bakhoya babukulwe khuba babolaana khunyoola kumuruungo kumuboofu, lukali abo bakhola kamaani mu khwilwacha ne khukhwekisia.
Sikila liiandiko liloma lili, “Mukhaboa eeyi emunwa ne mulikho mu kirumikhira khuula engaanu tawe” ne “Omukholi akhoyeele khuebwa kumuruungo kwewe.”
Okharekeeresia lisitako khu musaakhulu ne likhareerirwe ne baloli babili namwe bakali tawe.
Rafwira mu baandu abo boosi bakhola bubwoni, nio babaandi barie.
Ebweeni wa Wele ne Yesu Kristo ne malaika batakatifu khusaba orie kamalaka kano ne okhabiila omundu yesi yesi mala osiime okundi mu buli siindu nisio okhola tawe.
Okhakhola khangu khura kamakhono khu mundu yesi yesi khumwaula khu milimo kio Mwami tawe. Okhasaanga mu bwoni bwe babaandi tawe, yeliinda mu bukwalaafu.
Okhanywa kameechi kong'ene tawe, ne kakhali nywakho endali ngekhe khuyeeta enda yowo, sikila obechanga omulwale buli khase.
Bubwoni bwe babaandu balala bubonekhana busa abuwaanga, mala bubwoni bwabwe bubarangirira mu khukhalakilwa, ne kakhali bubwoni bwe babaandi bukelao nio bwabonekha ekhumaliilikha.
Mu ngila ng'ene eyo bikholwa bilayi bibonekhanga abuwaanga, akhaba ebio biikhali abuwaanga tawe, se binyala biakisibwa tawe.

Abo baali nasioobi khukhwola babe ne liria likali khu bakhulu babwe, nio yesi yesi akhaloma kamabi khu lisina lia Wele ne khu liekisia liefwe tawe.
Nasioobi nibo bakhulu babwe bali bakristo khukhwola bakhabalekelesia tawe, sikila bali bawandaayabwe. Ne kakhali, bakhoyeele babakholele bulayi khukhilakho, sikila abo banyoola bukhala khukhwamanana ne kimilimo kiabwe bali basuubili nibo basiima.
Khukhwola wekisie ne khukhwilwacha bibiindu bino.
Yesi yesi owikisia kamekisio kali lukano ne safukiilisiana ne kamakhuwa kang'ali ko Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo, ne kamekisio ke dini yefwe tawe,
aba ali ne lilielola likali ne se amanyile siindu tawe. Ali ne liliekoomba libi lie khuyingana ne khulomana khuloondekhana ne kamakhuwa lundi areera likhendekha, bulomani, bukhomo, khukhwibaasilia babaandi kamabi,
ne kamayiingamo kamakali khukhwama khu baandu bakhalimo bung'ali tawe lundi be kamebaasio kakhakhola siindu tawe. Bebaasia bali buwele buli engila eye khunyoola buiinda.
Ng'ali khuli ne bukhala bukali mu khuba ne buwele ne khunyalikha nende nibio khuli nabio.
Siina nisio efwe khwareera mu sibala? Siindu tawe! Siina nisio khunyala khurusia mu sibala? Siindu tawe!
Khwako kaaba bali khuli ne biakhulia ne chingubo, ebio bili bibiolaana khwifwe.
Ne kakhali abo babeenya khuba baiinda bakwichanga mu makhako ne khuaambwa mu mureko kwe liliekoomba lie busilu ne lilionaka, libara mu lionaka ne libunia.
Sikila khusiima chirupia khuli sisina sie buubi bwoosi. Balala babeele ne liliekoomba likali khuchinyoola mala bauukhe khukhwama khu lisuubila, mala kimiooyo kiabwe kianyoolile buchuuni bukali.
Ne kakhali ewe, mundu owa Wele, okhabakho mu biindu bino tawe. Khaka lukali khuloondelela buluungi, khuloondelela khuria Wele, lisuubila, busiime, liliekhaliilikha, ne buolu.
Khupana liie lie lisuubila, mala onyoole bulamu bwa mindali, sikila Wele akhulaanga ewe wiche mu bulamu buno nga ne waboola lisuubila liowo ne kumwoyo kwowo kwoosi ebweeni we baloli bakali.
Ebweeni wa Wele, oanaanga bulamu khu biindu bioosi, ne ebweeni wa Yesu Kristo, owaandalasia lisuubila liewe ebweeni wa Pondio Pilato, ese khutanyilila
orie kamalaka kano ne khukaloonda mu busuubilifu khukhwola khu Ndaalo niyo Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo akheeche.
Liliicha liewe lilireerwa ne Wele mu siise sisiolaana, Wele oli Omuruki yeng'ene ooli ne luyali ne bunyali, Omwami owe babaami lundi Omuruki owe baruki.
Niye yeng'ene ali okhalifwa tawe; amenya mu buwaanga nibwo omundu yesi yesi akhanyala embiyao tawe. Se aliio owamubonakho tawe; lundi se aliio onyala amubona tawe. Lukoosi ne bunyali bwa mindali bube khu niye! Amina.
Laka abo bali baiinda mu biindu bie bulamu bwe khu sibala khukhwola bakhebonia tawe, bakhara lilieyikina liabwe mu biindu biikhali ne ngaanga nga buiinda tawe. Ne kakhali bare lilieyikina mu Wele okhuelesianga buli siindu mu buaani bwewe bukali khulwe khoyo yefwe.
Batanyilile bakhole kamalayi, babe baiinda mu bikholwa bilayi, babe baani lundi babe baberekekha khuyeeta babaandu.
Mu ngila yino bakhebungile buiinda buliba kumusiingi kumulayi khulwe chindaalo chichiicha. Lundi nio bolaane khunyoola bulamu buuli bwa ng'ali.
Timoteo, liinda bulayi nisio waebwa khuliinda. Okhaba mu lomo che sifwaabi lundi che kamayiingamo ke busilu niko babaandu balala mu khutiima balaanga bali, “Bukesi” tawe.
Sikila balala balomanga bali, bali nabwo barurire khu ngila eye lisuubila.
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kube nanywe mweesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo, omurumwa owa Yesu Kristo khulwe lilienya lia Wele, owarumwa khulangilila bulamu bubwalakwa nibwo khuli nabwo mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo.
Wele Paapa ne Yesu Kristo Omwami wefwe akhoya akhuelesie kumwalaalo, akhukholele siisa lundi akhuelesie kumuleembe.
Khupila Wele orio, Wele niye kholelanga ne ndi ne liiba lie mukari likhebiiyakho khu liosi liosi tawe, nga sikuuka siase siakhola. Mupilanga niye orio nga ne khukhebulilanga ewe buli lwoosi mu masaba kase siilo ne kumuusi.
Ese khebulilanga kamasika kowo mala nenya khukhubona ewe lukali po, nio nikhoye lukali.
Khebulila lisuubila lia ng'ali nilio oli nalio, lisuubila nilio kukhuo Loisi ne Maao Yunisi bosi baba nalio. Ndi ne bung'ali ndi ewe wesi oli nalio.
Khulwe sifuno sino khukhebusia ewe ndi khola siianwa sia Wele sibe sie kamaani mwiwe, siianwa nisio wanyoola khukhwama nga ne nakhurakho kamakhono kase.
Sikila Roho niye Wele akhuelesia efwe se akhukhola efwe khwaba ne buuri tawe; ne kakhali, Roho wewe akhwichusianga mwifwe kamaani, busiime, ne lilieliinda.
Khwako okhaba ne chisoni, khuboola ko Mwami wefwe tawe, namwe okhaba ne chisoni sikila ese nga nendi omuboe khulwa Kristo tawe. Ne kakhali, saanga mu khupisibwa siibi khulwe Elomo Endayi, sikila Wele akhuelesianga ewe kamaani khukhola orio.
Aakhuonia efwe mala akhulaanga khube babaandu bewe omwene, se kali sikila niko khwakhola tawe, ne khali khulwe sifuno siewe omwene ne kumwalaalo kwewe. Aakhuelesia efwe kumwalaalo kuno khubirira mu Yesu Kristo siise ne sikharakikha khubao tawe.
Ne kakhali luno kwareerwe abuwaanga khwifwe khubirira mu liicha lio muonia wefwe, Yesu Kristo. Owakamia bunyali bwe lifwa ne khubirira mu Lomo Endayi aareere abuwaanga bulamu bukhawao tawe.
Wele aandobora ese nga omwilwachi, omurumwa lundi omwekisia, khulangilila Elomo Endayi,
lundi lino nilio likila ese ne khupwa siibi sikila bibiindu bino. Ne kakhali ndi ne lilieyikina likali sikila manyile niye subiile lundi ndi na ng'ali ndi ali ne bunyali bwe khuliinda nisio ambeleesie khukhwola Endaalo eyo.
Yiandalasia khu makhuwa ka ng'ali niko nakhwikisia, nga siilolelo khwiwe khuloonda, lundi ba mu lisuubila ne mu busiime buli bubwefwe mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo.
Khubirira mu bunyali bwa Roho Omutakatifu, omenyile mwifwe, liinda bibiindu bilayi nibio oelesiibwe.
Omanyile oli buli mundu mu lukoongo lwa Esia aanjanjukhe, akhaba Fikelo ne Herimokene.
Omwami akhoya akholela siisa enju eya Onesifora, sikila andaamo kumwoyo biise bikali. Se aambwa chisoni ali ese ndi mu siboe tawe,
ne kakhali nga oola busa ari mu lukoba lwa Rumi, arakikha khu khumbiima ese lukali nabwila nga aanyoola.
Omwami akhoyeele aamukholela siisa khu Ndaalo eyo! Ne ewe omanyile bulayi bwene nga ne anjeeta mu Efeso.

Ne ewe, mwana wase, yiiandalasia khubirira mu mwalaalo kuuli kukwefwe mu bulala ne Yesu Kristo.
Yekisia babaandu basuubilifu banyala khukhwikisia babaandi bosi kamekisio niko waulila ne nikisia ebweeni we baloli bakali.
Wesi khe upwe siibi nga omunamae omusuubilwa owa Yesu Kristo.
Omunamae ooli khu milimo enyanga khusiimisia omukhongo wewe, khwako se aba mu makhuwa kakaandi busa tawe.
Omundu otima chimbilo se anyala anyoola kumuruuru ne akhaloondile kamalaka ke chimbilo echo tawe.
Omulimi okholile kimilimo ne kamaani akhoyeele anyoola sikelo sie khunyoa mu likesa.
Yibaasia khu niko ndikho ndoma, sikila Omwami alakhukhola ewe okamanye koosi.
Khebulila Yesu Kristo, owalamusibwa, owe lisaaye lia Daudi, nga liekisibwa mu Lomo Endayi niyo nilwacha.
Ese khupwa siibi lundi bamboyile kiminyololo nga ofunile lilaka sikila nilwachanga Elomo Endayi. Ne kakhali Elomo eya Wele seli mu minyololo tawe,
khwako nikhaliilikhila buli siindu khulwe babaandu barobore ba Wele, nio bosi banyoole buonia bubwiichanga khubirira mu Yesu Kristo ne khureera luyali lwa mindali.
Lino lili likhuwa lia ng'ali:
“Khwaba ne khwafwa naye,
khukhamenye lundi naye.
fwesi khukhamiie naye.
Efwe ne khumwikaana niye,
yesi akhakhwikaane efwe.
Khwaba ne khukhali basuubilifu khu niye tawe,
niye ali busa omusuubilifu khwifwe sikila niye se anyala ebea tawe.”
Khebusia babaandu bowo kano, mala obakaambile lukali ebweeni wa Wele balekhe khukhangarana ne kamakhuwa. Se kalikho ne bulayi tawe, ne kakhali khutiimia busa babaandu bakarekeeresia.
Khaka nga onyala ofukiililwe mu moni cha Wele, nga omukholi okhaambwa chisoni khu milimo kiewe tawe, oyo owikisianga Elomo eye bung'ali eya Wele nga eli.
Okhapa chimbakha che sifwaabi ne busilu tawe, chirusianga busa babaandu khu Wele.
Liliekisia lirio, lili nga likoonjo liboofu lichiililila khubalaa. Babaandu babili babekisia bibiindu nga bino biri bali Himenea ne Fileto.
Balekhile engila eye bung'ali mala balikho bonaka lisuubila liili mu baandu balala mu khuloma bali lilamukha liefwe liakholekha khale.
Ne kakhali siboofu nisio Wele ombakha se sinyala siasiisiikhwa tawe; lundi siaandikwakho kamakhuwa kano: “Omwami amanyile abo bali babewe” ne “Boosi balomanga bali bali bo Mwami khukhwola balekhe khukhola kamabi.”
Munju embalaayi bitelu ne bibuumba bia buli lukano bilimo. Bilala bie efwesa ne bibiindi bie sahabu, bibiindi bie chimbao ne liloba. Bilala birumikha mu siise sirobore, ne bibiindi birumikha siise siosi siosi.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba ne emiliyisia khukhwama khu biindu bimayaanu ebio bioosi, aba akharumikhirwe khu sifuno sisiaroborwa, sikila aba eerusia lundi ali owe bukhala khu Mukhulu wewe. Eerekekha khurumikhirwa khu buli sikholwa silayi.
Okhaba ne liliekoomba lie buele tawe, ne kakhali khola kamaani obe omuluungi, obe ne lisuubila, busiime, ne kumuleembe, alala ne nabo basaba Wele buyeeti ne kumwoyo kumukwalaafu.
Ne okhaba mu mayiingano ke busilu ne bulendaafu tawe, omanyile oli kamaliilikhilanga mu bulomani.
Omukholi owo Mwami khukhwola abe okharangana tawe, khukhwola abe omwekisia omulayi lundi owefwiilisia,
omuolu mu khuluungisia bayingana naye, sikila wakana Wele anyala aabaelesia bubweyaangu bwe khukhwekanila ne khumanya bung'ali.
Khwako bakhakesiie mala belukhe khukhwama mu mireko kia Sietani owabaamba ne khubakhola baloonde lilienya liewe.

Khebulila oli biise bitinyu bikhabeo mu ndaalo chimaliilisi.
Babaandu bakhabe be chinge, balianga, babelola, lundi be kisuunia; be chilomo chimbi, bakharia basaasi babwe tawe, bakhasiima kamalayi tawe lundi babooni.
Baliba babi, bakhalimo siisa tawe, bakiikha ba basiaabwe, be sisiayuumba, lundi barafu; balibiila kali kamalayi.
Baliba bakesikesi, be sifwaabi, lundi babechula ekibonio, balisiima khukhwisangaasia babeene khukhila Wele.
Baliloonda ke dini enje busa, ne khuloba bunyali bwayo bubwene. Mukhaba siimbi ne babaandu nga bano bari tawe.
Balala khu nibo bacha munju che babaandi ne khuminya bakhasi bakhali ne kamaani tawe, bakhasi baali ne busiro bwe bubwoni bwabwe ne liliekoomba lia buli lukano,
bakhasi bakhakanga buli lwoosi khukhweyika ne kakhali se bamanya bung'ali tawe.
Nga Yane ne Yambure bayingania Musa, khwako babaandu bano boosi bayingania ne bung'ali, babaandu nibo chinganakani chabwe chikhakhola kimilimo tawe, lundi ba bakwa mu lisuubila.
Ne kakhali se balicha aleeyi tawe, sikila buli mundu akhabone busilu bwabwe. Ako niko kakekholekha khu Yane ne Yambure.
Ne kakhali waloonda liliekisia liase, liba liase, ne sifuno siase mwimenya, ewe waboone lisuubila liase, liliifwiilisia liase, busiime bwase, ne liliekhaliilikha liase.
Waboone khu khupisibwa siibi khwase, ne khuchuunisibwa. Omanyile siibi sikali nisio nabiriramo ne koosi kakanjikholekhakho mu Andioka, Ikoni, ne mu Lisitura! Ne kakhali Omwami aasikula mu koosi.
Yesi yesi owenya khumenya limenya lie buwele mu buambaani ne Yesu Kristo akhapisibwe siibi,
lundi babooni nende babeebea busa bakhachiililile khuba babi lukali, ne babea balala ne khukhwibea babeene.
Ne kakhali ewe chiililila mu bung'ali nibwo wekisibwa lundi nibwo wasuubila lukali. Omanyile babekisia bowo baba naanu,
lundi okhebulila oli khukhwama mu bwana bwowo, wamanya kamaandiko kamatakatifu, kanyala kakhuelesia ewe limanya likhurangirira mu buonia khubirira mu lisuubila mu Yesu Kristo.
Kamaandiko koosi kama khu Wele lundi ke bukhala mu khwekisia bung'ali, khukaania kamakhiikha, khuluungisia kakhali ng'ali tawe ne khuaana likaambila khuloondekhana ne limenya lie buluungi,
nio omundu okhalabanila Wele abe ne bioosi nibio enya nio akhole buli siindu siili silayi.

Ebweeni wa Wele ne Yesu Kristo, oolikhalakila balamu ne bafu, lundi sikila alikho echa khukhwamiia nga Omwami, ese khuchuuba lukali
boola burume obwo. Obe ne sinani sie khukiboola (siise siakhaba ne sili silayi namwe tawe), yilwacha khusuubisia, khurafwira ne khuraamo kumwoyo nga ne wekisia ne liliefwiilisia likali.
Siise silecha nisio babaandu bakhalekhe khuloonda kamekisio kamalayi, mala baloonde lilienya liabwe ne khutasa khukhwerao babekisia bakali balibaboolela niko bebeene bekoomba khuulila.
Bakhalekhe khurekeeresia bung'ali mala barekeeresie chingano busa.
Ne kakhali okhoya weliinda mu buli siindu, yikhaliilikha mu butinyu, khola kimilimo kio mwilwachi owe Elomo Endayi, lundi khola kimilimo kiowo kioosi nga omukholi owa Wele.
Khwise, siise siase sie khurusibwa nga embosio siolile. Siise siase sie khurura mu bulamu buno nisio sino.
Napaane liie bulayi namalile chimbilo chase lundi naliindile lisuubila liase.
Nono kumuruuru kwe bukhili mu khuba omuluungi ebweeni wa Wele kwanindile, kumuruuru nikwo Omwami, omukhalaki omuluungi, akhambelesie khu Ndaalo eyo, ne se ndi ese seng'ene tawe, akhaba khwaabo boosi baliindiilila mu busiime khukhwicha khwewe.
Khaka nga ne onyala wiche niio ndi khangu.
Demasi asiima sibala sino mala aanjanjuukha, aacha Tesalonike. Kuresike aacha Kalatia, ne Tito aacha Dalimatia.
Luka yeng'ene niye oli ano nase. Khoenje Mariko wiche naye, sikila anyala aanjeeta mu milimo.
Naruma Tichikasi Efeso.
Ne wicha ndeerere likooti nilio nalekha mu Turoa mu makhono ka Karipo; reera bitabu ebio bioosi, lukali bie kamasieelo.
Ba meeso, yeliinda khukhwama khu niye, sikila ali ne sisiayuumba mu khwimelekhana khu lomo yefwe.
Se aliio owaba nase siise sie khunyoa nga naba ne mbaana buloli bwase tawe, boosi banjanjukha. Wele akhababalila kamabi tawe!
Ne kakhali Omwami aaba nase lundi aamba kamaani nio nanyala khuboola burume mu bwichufu khu Be Chikholo baulile; lundi naona khukhwama mu khukhalakilwa lifwa.
Ne Omwami akhambonie khukhwama mu mabi koosi mala ambile mu Bwami bwewe bwe mwikulu mu muleembe. Luyali lube khu niye mindali na mindali! Amina.
Rasito aarama mu Korinjo, lundi nalekha Turofimo mu Mileto, sikila aba omulwale.
Khaka kamaani kowo koosi wiche kumunaane ne kukhoola tawe.
Eyubulo, Puteni, Lino, ne Kilautia barumire kimileembe kiabwe, akhaba bawandaayefwe babaandi Bakristo boosi.
Omwami abe nawe mu mwoyo kwowo.
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kube nanywe mweesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo omukholi owa Wele lundi omurumwa owa Yesu Kristo.
Ese naroborwa mala narumwa khutasa lisuubila mu barobore ba Wele ne khubarangirira mu bung'ali nibwo edini yefwe yekisia,
eyetiila khu lieyikina lie bulamu bwa mindali. Wele, okhabea tawe, aakhusuubisia efwe bulamu buno sibala ne sikhabaao tawe,
ne mu siise silayi aaliekesia khubirira mu lomo yewe. Elomo yino yaelesibwa khwise, mala ese ngilwacha khuloondekhana ne lilaka lia Wele Omuonia wefwe.
Wele Paapa ne Yesu Kristo Omuonia wefwe bakhoya bakhuelesie kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe.
Nakhulekha mu Kurete, nio ong'oone bibiindu bibienyekha khung'oonwa, ne khurobora babemeelesi be kanisa mu buli lukoba. Khebulila niko nakhuboolela.
Omwimeelesi akhaba omundu obiiywakho khu liosi liosi tawe, akhoya abe no mukhasi mulala yeng'ene ne babaana babasuubila mu Wele ne bakhaba ne fuma eye siyubuyubu namwe babe be sileka tawe.
Sikila omwimeelesi owe kanisa ali omuliindi owe kimilimo kia Wele, se akhoyela aabiiywakho khu siindu siosi siosi tawe, akhaba omiinyakilisia babaandi namwe oambwa lirima bwangu, namwe omumeesi, namwe owe sisiayuumba, namwe owe kumuluungo kwe chirupia tawe.
Khukhwola abe owakaanila bakeni lundi osiima lili lilayi. Akhoya abe omundu owifwiilisia, omuluungi, omutakatifu, lundi owe kimiima kimilayi.
Akhoya atiile lukali elomo enyala khusuubilwa lundi efukiilisiana ne kamekisio. Mu ngila yino akhanyale khura kumwoyo mu baandu babaandi khubirira mu mekisio ka ng'ali ne khukhwekesia kamakhiikha kaabo bakhakafukiilila tawe.
Sikila baliio bakali, ne lukali abo babaamile mu dini eye Bayaudi, balalobanga kamekisio ne babea babaandi mu makhuwa kabwe ka busa.
Khwenyekha khwimikhe chilomo chabwe, sikila balikho bonaka chingoba khubirira mu khwekisia niko bakhakhoyela bekisie tawe, mala kano koosi khulwe sifuno sie chisoni sie khukhwenya khunyoola chirupia.
Aabao Omukurete omwene, mulala khu bang'oosi babwe, owaloma ka ng'ali ali, “Bakurete buli lwoosi bali babeeyi, bali chisolo chimayaanu, lundi bali bakara lundi be kumuliuliu.”
Sikila sifuno sino ewe okhoya obarafwire lukali, nio babe ne lisuubila lia nabalamu.
Ne bakhachiililila khuloonda chingano che Siyuda ne kamalaka ke babaandu kakaama khu baandu ba baloba bung'ali tawe.
Buli siindu sili sikwalaafu khwaabo baali bakwalaafu; ne kakhali sikwalaafu se siliio khwaabo bali banyaalu lundi bakhasuubila tawe. Sikila kamebaasio ne liiba liabwe bianyaalutiikhe.
Baloma bali bamanyile Wele, ne kakhali bikholwa biabwe bikaania. Bali be sikhoonde lundi be sileka, se bolaana khukhola sisiindu siosi siosi silayi tawe.

Ne kakhali ewe okhoya wekisie kamakhuwa kafukiilisiana ne kamekisio kamalayi.
Kambila basaakhulu khuba be limanya lilayi, be bukesi, lundi ba beliinda; khuba be lisuubila lilayi, busiime, ne liliekhaliilikha.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo kaambila baloosi khuba ne kimiima kimilayi nga bakhasi bamenyile limenya litakatifu ne bakhoyela babe. Bakhaba be kamakuto namwe banasioobi be kamalwa tawe. Bakhoya bekisie kaali kamalayi,
nio beyikie bakhasi baele khusiima baseecha ne babaana babwe,
babe babeliinda lundi bakwalaafu, ne khuba bakhasi balayi munju, ba beana babeene khu baseecha babwe, nio omundu yesi yesi akhalomakho kamabi khuloondekhana ne elomo eya Wele tawe.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo; ndanyilila basoleeli babe babeliinda.
Ewe wamwene okhoya obe sisiekesio sie kimiima kimilayi mu buli siindu. Ba omuluungifu lundi owe sinani sikali mu khwikisia khwowo.
Rumikhira kamakhuwa kamalayi kakhanyala kabiyisibwa tawe, nio basiku bowo baambwe chisoni khulwe khutamba sisiindu sibi nisio baloma khuloondekhana khwifwe.
Nasioobi bakhoya berusia khu bakhulu babwe ne khu basiimisia mu biindu bioosi. Bakhabakobosiakho siindu,
namwe beebe khukhwama khu nibo tawe. Ne kakhali, bakhoya bekesie bali buli lwoosi bali balayi lundi basuubilwa nio lireere efuma endayi khu mekisio ka Wele Omuonia wefwe mu bioosi nibio bakhola.
Sikila Wele ekesie kumwalaalo kwewe khulwe buonia bwe babaandu boosi.
Kumwalaalo okwo kukhwekisia efwe khulekhe limenya likhali lie buwele, ne liliekoomba lie mu sibala, mala khumenye limenya lie khukhweyaya, lie buluungi, ne limenya lie khuria Wele mu sibala muno
ne khulindiilila Endaalo eye chikhabi niyo khweyikina, niyo luyali lwa Wele wefwe omukali no Muonia Yesu Kristo lulifunukha.
Omwene eaana sikila efwe, khu khuonia efwe khukhwama mu mabi koosi ne khu khukhola efwe khube bakwalaafu, babaandu baali babewe yeng'ene, lundi bali ne silukuluku sie khukhola kamalayi.
Yekisia bibiindu bino, mala orumikhire bunyali bwowo bwoosi ne olikhoraamo kumwoyo ne khurafwira bakhurekeeresia. Okhalekha omundu yesi yesi khu nibo aakhulekelesia ewe tawe.

Khebusia babaandu bowo barie baruki ne kamalaka kaliio, babe barekeerefu khu nibo ne khukhwerekekha khukhola kamalayi mu ngila choosi.
Baboolele bakhalomaloma kamabi khu mundu yesi yesi tawe, ne kakhali babe be kumuleembe ne busaale, lundi bekesie liiba lie lukoosi khu buli mundu buli lwoosi.
Sikila efwe fwabene khale khwaba basilu, be sileka, lundi be kitiimo. Khwaba banasioobi be liliekoomba ne busangaafu bwe chingano choosi. Khwamenya mu sikhoonde ne sikhalikhali, babaandi bakhubiila mala fwesi khwababiila.
Ne kakhali nga siisa ne busiime bwa Wele Omuonia wefwe bwabonekha,
aakhuonia efwe. Se kaba khulwe bikholwa bilayi bioosi bioosi nibio khwakhola fwabene tawe, ne kakhali sikila siisa siewe omwene, khubirira mu Roho Omutakatifu, okhuelesianga efwe lisaalwa liya ne bulamu buyia khulwe khu khusiinga efwe.
