Wele areera Roho Omutakatifu mu bukali lukali khubirira mu Yesu Kristo Omuonia wefwe,
nio khubirira mu mwalaalo kwewe efwe khube baluungi ebweeni wa Wele, mala khunyoole bulamu bwa mindali, nibwo khweyikinanga khuli khukhanyoole.
Elomo yino eli eya ng'ali.
Nenya ewe okhatatasie kamakhuwa kano lukali, nio abo basuubila mu Wele babe ne sinani sie khura siise siabwe mu khukhola bikholwa bilayi, bie buyeeti khu buli mundu.
Ne kakhali okhaba mu mayiingano ke busilu, kamasina kamakali ke bakuuka, bulomani ne khu khupana sikila lilaka tawe. Ako se kali ke buyeeti ne bukhala tawe.
Kambila khukhwola khabili omundu oreera liliabukhana, ne nakhaulila tawe, okhaba ne likhuwa liosi liosi lundi khu niye tawe.
Ewe omanyile oli omundu nga oyo onekha, ne bubwoni bwewe bwekesia buli ali otiimile.
Nga ne ndaruma Aritema namwe Tichikasi khwiwe, khaka kamaani nga nonyala khukhwicha niio ndi mu Nikopoli, sikila nenya khumenyamo mu ndaalo che kumunaane.
Khola nga nonyala khuyeeta Senasi oweyika kamakhuwa ke lilaka ne Apolo barakikhe chingeendo chabwe, mala olole oli bali nende buli siindu nisio benya.
Babaandu befwe bakhoya beyike khurumikhira siise siabwe mu khukhola kamalayi, nio bayeete abo babenyekhana buyeeti bwa khangu, bakhamenya limenya likhali lie buyeeti tawe.
Boosi bali ano nase bamurumira enywe kimileembe. Elesia kimileembe kiefwe basaale befwe mu lisuubila.
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kube nanywe mweesi.

Khukhwama khu Paulo omuboe khulwa Yesu Kristo alala ne Timoteo wandaayefwe —
Khu musaale wefwe lundi omukholi wasiefwe Filimona,
ne khu kanisa eyakaananilaanga munju mwewe, ne khu yaya Afia ne khu musikaari wasiefwe Arikipo:
Nyoola kumwalaalo ne kimileembe khukhwama khu Paapa wefwe Wele no Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Wandaayase, Filimona, buli nga ne sabanga khukhebulilanga ewe ne khu khupila Wele wase orio.
Sikila nyoolanga efuma eye busiime bwowo khu baandu ba Wele boosi, ne lisuubila nilio oli nalio mu Mwami Yesu.
Lisaba liase lili mbo busangaanilo bwefwe nanywe nga basuubila, bureere limanyilisia likali lia buli ekhabi niyo khuli nayo mu bulamu bwefwe mu buambaani ne Kristo.
Wandaayase omusiime, busiime bwowo bwandereere ekhoyo engali ne khu khundamo kumwoyo lukali! Ewe wasangaasiisie babaandu ba Wele boosi.
Khulwe sifuno sino ese ndaba omunyindaafu lukali nga wandaayo mu Kristo khu khulakila ewe okhole sikhoya sikholekhe.
Ne kakhali ese khusaba busa sikila nakhusiima. Ese khola lino akhaba nendi Paulo, wamwanda owa Yesu Kristo, ne lundi luno luri ndi mu siboe sikila niye.
Khwako ese khusaba ewe mu bweyaangu bwa Onesimo omwana wase omwene mu Kristo, sikila nga naba mu siboe nekela raraawe mu roho.
Siise siabao nisio akhaaba owe bukhala khwiwe tawe, ne kakhali luno ali owe bukhala khwifwe fwembi.
Nono ndikho muruma niye omwene akobole ewowo ne kumwoyo kwase kulechela mu niye.
Nenyile amenye nase ne siili mu siboe khulwe Elomo Endayi nio anjeete mu bweyaangu bwowo.
Kakhaba kario se nenya khuyingiilile khu khunjeeta tawe, ne kakhali nenya okhole lino mu bulekhuule bwe lilienya liowo. Khwako se nyala nakhola sisiindu siosi siosi ewe nokhafukiilile tawe.
Kanyala kaba bali Onesimo aakhulekha ewe khu siise sitiiti nio akhukobolele ewe omenye naye elala.
Ne luno niye se ali nasioobi busa tawe, ne kakhali akhila nasioobi lukali, ali wandaayefwe omusiime mu Kristo. Khwise ali omusiime lukali po! Ne khwiwe alaba omusiime lukali nga nasioobi lundi nga wandaayo mu Mwami.
Khwako kaaba bali wibaasia oli ese ndi owasio, mwakaanile akobole nga abeele ne unjakanila ese.
Ne kaaba bali akhukholela kamabi kosi kosi namwe waaba ne omubaanja sisiindu siosi siosi mbaanje ese.
Nono ano ndaandika lino ne kumukhono kwase kumwene, ese Paulo, khakhuruunge ewe. (Kakhaba kario, se khoyela khukhebusie ndi, ewe wamwene oli likobi liase tawe.)
Khwako wandaayase nosiima kholele likhuwa lilayi lino mwisina lio Mwami; nga wandaayo mu Kristo, sangaasie!
Ndi nasuubi, nga ne mbandika kano ndi, olakhola nisio khusabile, ng'ali namanyile ndi olakhola khukhilakhoo.
Lundi ndekekhere lusiro sikila ndi ne lilieyikina ndi Wele alaulila lisaba lienywe mweesi, mala andeere lundi mwinywe.
ne akhaba bakholi basiaase, Mariko, Arisitariko, Demasi ne Luka boosi bamukhesiisie.
Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu Kristo kube nanywe mweesi.

Khaale Wele aalomaloma khu bakuuka befwe mu biise bikali lundi mu ngila chingali khubirira mu bang'oosi,
ne kakhali mu ndaalo chimaliilisi chino alomaloome khwifwe khubirira mu Mwana wewe. Wele abuumba sibala khubirira mu niye, lundi aamurobora niye khuba ne bibiindu bioosi ekhumaliilikha.
Ne obona Omwana aba waboone luyali lwa Wele lundi Omwana oyo ali sifwaanane sisiene ne sisiene sia Wele omwene. Atikiya limala lioosi khulwe lomo yewe eye bunyali. Nga amala khureera khubeelwa khwe bubwoni bwe babaandu, ekhala mwikulu kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele, mu bunyali bukali.
Omwana aakholwa omukali khukhila bamalaika, nga lisina nilio Wele amuelesia niye lili liboofu khukhila kakaabwe.
Sikila Wele se aboolakho khu malaika wewe yesi yesi ali,
“Ewe oli Omwana wase;
Luno Ese nabeele Paapa wowo,” tawe.
Namwe Wele se alomalomakho khu malaika yesi yesi ali
“Ese khabe Paapa wewe,
Ne niye akhabe Omwana wase,” tawe.
“Lekha bamalaika ba Wele boosi bamusaaye niye.”
“Wele akholanga bamalaika bewe baba embeo,
Ne bakholi bewe abakholanga khuuba chimemu che kumulilo.”
“Bubwami bwowo, ee Wele,
bulibaao mindali na mindali!
Wamiaanga babaandu bowo mu buluungi.
Wasiima buluungi ne khubiila bumayaanu.
Khwako Wele, Wele wowo,
aakhurobora ewe ne khu khura ewe angaaki we babaasio
lundi ne khu khuchukhakho kamafura ke khoyo.”
Lundi aaloma ali,
“Ewe, Omwami, mu khurakikha wabaang'ana sibala,
mala wabuumba likulu ne kamakhono kowo kamene.
Bikhaweo, ne kakhali ewe okhasikaleo;
bioosi bikhatabukhe nga chingubo.
Okhabifumbemo nga ekaanjo,
mala bilikaluukhasibwa nga chingubo.
Ne kakhali ewe oli busa nga waba buli lwoosi,
ne kimiiko kiowo se kiliwa tawe.”
“Yikhala ano kumukhono kwase kumuseecha
nabwila nga khare basiku bowo babe endebe niyo oswalakho bikele biowo tawe.”
Nono malaika nisio siina? Malaika bali roho bakhalabanila Wele lundi Wele abarumanga khuyeeta abo bakhoyeele banyoole buonia.

Khwako khukhwola khuloonde lukali bung'ali nibwo khwaulila, nio khukhatiima khwabururakho tawe.
Bamalaika baelesia bakuuka befwe burume bubwekesibwa khuuba bwa ng'ali, yesi yesi okhabuloonda namwe aaburia tawe, aanyoola siiukuumo nisio akhoyelwa anyoole.
Nono aba efwe khukhebache khuriena khwaba ne khulekeelesia buonia bukali nga buno buri? Omwami omwene mu khurakikha aaboola buonia buno, mala abo babamuulila niye bakhwekesia efwe bali buli bwa ng'ali.
Siise sienesio Wele aatasa buloli bwewe khu buonia obwo khubirira mu khukhola bimanyisio, kamakhuwa ke khuukia, kamayia ne khuaana biaanwa bia Roho Omutakatifu khuloondekhana ne lilienya liewe.
Wele se aaraao bamalaika khuuba babaami be sibala siiya silibao nisio khulalomalomangakho tawe,
ne kakhali, nga ne kaboolwanga abuundu aandi mu maandiko kali:
“Omundu ali siina, khwiwe,
nio ewe omwibaasie, omundu busa nga ali ario nio ewe omuliinde?
Ewe wamukhola niye aba omutiitikho khu bamalaika,
“Ewe wamuelesia bunyali bukali ne luyali
ne lukoosi khukhwama khwiwe.
“Wareere bibiindu bioosi aasi we bikele biewe.”
Mu khura bibiindu bioosi aasi we bikele biewe, se aalekhakho siindu siosi siosi anje we bubwimeelesi bwewe tawe. Ne nga ne kali, se khubona bibiindu bioosi ne bili aasi wewe luno tawe
Ne kakhali khubona Yesu, niye khu siise sikeekhe akholwa aaba aasi khukhila bamalaika nio khubiriirira mu mwalaalo kwa Wele olaane khufwila buli sia mulala. Khumubona niye luno aafwarirwe ekuutwa eye luyali ne lukoosi khulwe lifwa nilio aafwa.
Mu khureera babaana bakali basaange mu luyali, liaba busa bulayi mbo Wele obuumbanga ne khuliinda biindu bioosi, akhoya akhole omurangirisi we buonia bwabwe abe omwichufu khubirira mu sinyaasio.
Akwalaasianga babaandu khukhwama mu bwoni bwabwe, mala niye alala nende abo boosi babakholwa bakwalaafu bali ne Paapa mulala oyo. Ako niko kakila Yesu nakhaambwa chisoni khubalanga ali bawandaaye tawe.
Aboolelanga Wele ali,
“Ndaboolela bawandaayase niko wakholile;
“Khakhufumie ewe mu siikhasio siabwe.”
Sikila babaana, nga abalaanganga bali babaandu be kumubili ne kamafuki, Yesu omwene ekela nga nibo mala asaanga mu liba liabwe lio mundu. Akhola ario nio khubirira mu lifwa liewe abunie Sietani, oli ne bunyali khu lifwa,
khwako mu ngila yino alekhuule abo ba baaba nasioobi mu bulamu bwabwe bwoosi khulwe khuria lifwa.
Sikila kali abuwaanga bali se bali malaika nibo ayeetanga tawe. Ne kakhali, nga liiandiko liboola lili, “Ayeetanga be lisaaye lia Aburahamu.”
Lino liekesia lili abe nga bawandaaye mu ngila choosi, nio abe Omusaayi wabwe Omukhulu Lukali Omukhulu Omusuubilwa lundi owe siisa mukhukhalabanila Wele, nio bubwoni bwe babaandu bwoole khubeelwa.
Nono anyala aayeeta abo baali mu makhako, sikila niye omwene apisibwa siibi mu khukhakwa.

Bawandaayase bakristo, lundi nibo Wele alaanga! Yibaasia khu Yesu, niye Wele aruma khuuba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe lisuubila nilio khwiyama.
Aaba omusuubilwa khu Wele, owamurobora khukhola kimilimo kino, bulayi bwene nga Musa ne aba omusuubilwa mu milimo kiewe munju eya Wele.
Omundu owombakha enju anyoolanga lukoosi lukali khukhila enju eng'ene. Mu ngila ng'eneyo Yesu akhoya abe ne lukoosi lukali khukhila Musa.
Buli enju, kakhaba kario, yombakhangwa no mundu, mala Wele niye owombakha bibiindu bioosi.
Musa aba omusuubilwa munju eya Wele nga omukholi, mala alomaloma khuloondekhana ne bibiindu nibio Wele akhalome mu ndaalo chichiicha.
Ne kakhali Kristo ali omusuubilwa nga omwana weseecha mu bwimeelesi bwenju eya Wele. Efwe khuli enju yewe ne khuchiililila khuba ne bunyindaafu ne lisuubila mu nibio khwiyikina.
“Ne muulila kumumilo kwa Wele luno,
mukhaba ne sileka, nga bakuuka benywe ne baba tawe, nga ne
bariina khu Wele,
khu ndaalo niyo baba bamukhaka mu siangalaamwe
ebweeneyo bararaawenywe bakhaka ese,
akhaba ne babona nibio nakhola khu miko kamakhumi kane.
Khwako naba ne lirima khu baandu abo mala naloma ndi,
‘Bakholanga sileka buli lwoosi lundi baloba khuloonda kamalaka kase.’
Naba ne lirima mala nechuba ndi:
‘Se balingila abuundu niio andi khabaelesie khuolelao tawe!’ ”
Basuubili basiaase, lola bulayi, yesi yesi mwinywe akhaba owe kumwoyo kuli kumubi lukali lundi kukhasuubila tawe, akhola ario alekha khusuubila Wele omenyile mindali.
Ne kakhali, nio yesi yesi khwinywe alekhe khuombelesibwa ne bubwoni mala abe ne sileka tawe, mukhoya muchuubane buli ndaalo, nga likhuwa “Luno” mu maandiko lichiililila khuboola khwifwe.
Sikila efwe khuli basaangi ne Kristo, khwaba ne khwiandalasia khukhwola ematabusia mu lieyikina nilio khwaba nalio ekhurakikha.
Naanu nibo Wele aakhalalila khu miiko kamakhumi kane? Aakhalalila babaandu babakhola bubwoni bafwila mu siangalaamwe.
Nga Wele ne echuba ali, “Se balingila mu sibala nimwo andi khabaelesie khuolelamo tawe.” Aba alikho alomaloma khuloondekhana ne naanu? Khuloondekhana nende abo babariina.
Nono, khubona, khuli se banyala khukhwingila mu sibala esio tawe, sikila se basuubila tawe.

Nono, Wele aakhusuubisie efwe ali nio khwole khunyoola siuluukho nisio aalomalomakho. Lekha khulole bulayi nono, yesi yesi khwinywe akhakhilwa khukhwingila mu siuluukho sisialakwa esio tawe.
Sikila efwe khwaulila Elomo Endayi nga nibo. Baulila burume ne se bwabayeeta tawe, sikila nga baulila, se batubania burume obwo ne lisuubila tawe.
Khwako, efwe khusuubila, khunyoola siuluukho nisio Wele asuubisia esio. Kali busa nga ne aaboola ali,
“Naba ne lirima mala nechuba ndi:
‘Se balingila mu sibala nimwo andi khabaelesie khuolelamo tawe!’ ”
Aloma ario akhaba abeele ne amala kimilimo khukhwama siise nisio abaang'anilamo sibala.
Sikila abuundu aliio mu maandiko niio kano kaboolwa khuloondekhana ne ndaalo eya saba: “Wele aauluukha khu ndaalo eya saba khukhwama khu milimo kiewe kioosi”.
Likhuwa lino liliene lundi lilomwa lili: “Se balingila mu sibala nisio nenya khubaelesia baolelemo tawe.”
Abo babanyoa baulila Elomo Endayi se banyoola siuluukho esio tawe, sikila se basuubila tawe. Nono, babaandi baliio babafukiililwa khunyoola siiuluukho esio.
Lino liekesiebwanga abuwaanga mbo Wele araao endaalo ekiindi, elaangwa “Luno.” Enyuma we kimiiko kimikali Wele alomaloma khu ndaalo eyo khubirira mu Daudi mwiandiko liliararwakho khale lili:
“Ne mwaba ne muulila kumumilo kwa Wele luno, mukhaba bamiinyi tawe.”
Abanga Yoshua niye owaana siuluukho nisio Wele asuubisia babaandu andi Wele se akelao aalomaloma khuloondekhana ne ndaalo ekiindi tawe.
Kakhaba kario siuluukho sisiliio khu baandu ba Wele nga siuluukho sia Wele khu ndaalo eya saba.
Sikila yesi yesi onyoola siuluukho nisio Wele aasuubisia esio, auluukha khukhwama khu milimo kiewe omwene, bulayi bwene busa nga Wele ne aaola khukhwama khu kiewe.
Nono, lekha khukhake nga ne khunyala khunyoole siuluukho esio, nio yesi yesi khwifwe akhakhilwa nga nibo ne bakhilwa sikila khutaamba lisuubila khwabwe tawe.
Elomo eya Wele eli enamu lundi eli ne kamaani, eli enjoki khukhila embalu yosi yosi eye bubwoki chimbeka chombi. Ekhalakanga khukhwola niio kumwoyo ne roho biakaananila. Niio bubwongelo ne kamafura ke mu bikuumba biakaananilanga. Ekhalakilanga liliekoomba ne kamebaasio ke kumwoyo kwo mundu.
Se siliio sinyala siakisibwa khukhwama khu Wele tawe; buli sisiindu mu bibuumbe bioosi sibonekha lundi sieyanikhila busa ebweeni wewe. Ne khukhwola, efwe fweesi khumuboolele niye ke bikholwa biefwe bioosi.
Nono, lekha efwe, khutiilile elala lisuubila nilio khwiyamanga. Sikila khuli no Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owingiile mu luyali lwa Wele, Yesu Kristo, Omwana owa Wele.
Omusaayi wefwe Omukhulu se ali onyala aloba khukhukholela efwe siisa khulwe butekhele bwefwe tawe. Ne kakhali, khuli no Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owakhakwa buli mu ngila nga nicho efwe khulikho khukhakilwamo, ne kakhali se akholakho bubwoni tawe.
Nono, lekha khube banyindaafu, mala khwisende siimbi ne ndebe eya Wele eye bubwami, niio kumwalaalo kuli. Ebweeneyo khulikholelwayo siisa mala khunyooleyo kumwalaalo mu biise nibio khukwenya.

Buli Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali aroborwanga khukhwama mu baandu basie mala akhalabanila Wele mu bwangu bwabwe, khuaana embosio ne biaanwa khulwe bubwoni.
Sikila niye omwene ali omutekhele mu ngila chingali, anyala khuba omuolu khwaabo bakhamanyile siindu tawe lundi bakhola kamakhiikha.
Ne sikila niye omwene ali omutekhele, khukhwola aane embosio ne se khuli khulwe bubwoni bwe babaandu busa tawe ne kakhali akhaba khulwe bubwoni bwewe omwene.
Se aliio owiroboreranga omwene lukoosi lwe khuba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali tawe. Lili busa khubirira mu mulaango kwa Wele, nio omundu abe Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, bulayi bwene nga Aruni ne aaba.
“Ewe oli Omwana wase,
luno nabeele Paapa wowo.”
“Oliba Omusaayi buli lwosi, bulayi bwene nga Melikisedeki.”
Ne kakhali akhaba ne aba Omwana owa Wele, eeyika khuba omuriani khubirira mu khupisibwa siibi.
Nga akholwa omwichufu, ekela lirakikha lie buonia bwe mwikulu khwaabo boosi bamuria niye,
mala Wele amura niye khuba Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali bulayi bwene nga Melikisedeki.
Kaliio kamakali niko khukhoyeele khuloma khuloondekhana ne likhuwa lino, ne kakhali lili litinyu khuliinoosia khwinywe, sikila muli kalaa lukali khumanya.
Luno luri andi enywe muli babekisia, ne kakhali mu sienya omundu amwekisie enywe kamekisio ke khunyoa ke burume bwa Wele. Mwalekhile khulia biakhulia biaandalafu, mu siili busa khu mabeele.
Yesi yesi osiinywa kamabeele asiili omwana, se amanyile sisiindu siosi siosi mumakhuwa ke buluungi namwe bubi tawe.
Mu ngila ekiindi biakhulia biaandalafu bili bie babaandu bakhulu, khubirira mu khwenasia banyala khukhwabukhasia kamalayi ne kamabi.

Nono, lekha khuche ebweeni, mu mekisio kamaandalafu mala khwibilile kamekisio ke khunyoa ke burume bwe sikristo. Se khukhoyeele khwombakhe lundi kumusiingi kwe khumwekisia liliekanila ne khulekha bikholwa bireera lifwa, lisuubila mu Wele,
khu ke khubatiisia ne khurakho kamakhono, ke khulamukha khwe bafu ne likhalakilwa lia mindali tawe.
Lekha khuche ebweeni! Wele ne afukiilila, khukhakhole kano.
Sikila abo babanjukha lisuubila liabwe banyala bakholwa bariena nio bekanila lundi? Babakho khale mu buwaanga bwa Wele, bachanjaama khu siaanwa sie mwikulu mala banyoola kumukabwa kwabwe kwa Roho Omutakatifu;
bamanya khukhwama mu khunala bali elomo eya Wele eli endayi, mala baba bamanya bunyali bwe sisiiko sisiicha.
Mala nono banjukha lisuubila liabwe! Se kanyalikhana khubakobosia mu khwikanila lundi tawe, sikila balikho babamba Omwana owa Wele lundi khu musalaba, ne khumuambia chisoni mu baandu.
Wele abiitanga chikhabi liloba linywechanga kameechi ke efula elikwichangakho kamakhabi kamakali mala lichoyia bimelwa bili bie bukhala khwaabo babibiaalanga.
Ne kakhali liaba ne lichoyia kamawa ne nyonyi, aba se lilimo bukhala bwosi bwosi tawe; lili mu butinyu bwe khulaamwa ne Wele mala kumulilo kuliosie.
Basaale basiime, khwakhaba ne khulomaloma khuri, khuli na suubi khwinywe. Khumanyile khuli muli ne chikhabi chindayi che buonia bwenywe.
Wele ali omuluungi. Sakhebilile kimilimo nikio mwakhola namwe busiime nibwo mwekesia khu niye mu buyeeti nibwo mwaana, mala lundi musiaananga busa buyeeti chana obwo khu bakristo basienywe tawe.
Liliekoomba liefwe likali lili mbo buli mulala khwinywe achiililile khuba ne sinani nio bibiindu nibio mweyikina biole khuba ng'ali.
Se khwenya enywe mube bakara tawe, ne kakhali khwenya mube nga abo basuubila lundi babefwiilisia, mala banyoola nisio Wele asuubisia.
Nga Wele asuubisia Aburahamu, echuba khukhola niko asuubisia sikila se abao omukali okundi khumukhila niye tawe, echuba mwisina liewe liliene.
Aaloma ali, “Khusuubisia ndi khakhubiite chikhabi mala khuelesie lisaaye likali.”
Aburahamu efwiilisia, khwako aanyoola, nisio Wele asuubisia.
Omundu ne echuba, echuba mwisina lio mundu omukali khumukhila niye, ne khukhwechuba okhwo khumalanga kamayiingamo koosi.
Khwaabo ba baaba ne bacha khunyoola nisio asuubisia, Wele enya khukhwekesia abuwaanga ali, salikaluukhasia sifuno siewe tawe; nio atasa khukhwechuba khu lisuubisia liewe.
Nono, bibiindu bibili bino biliio, bikhanyala biakaluukhana tawe, ne khu nibio, Wele se anyala aabea tawe. Khwako efwe khukhwanyoolile bubwilukhilo mu niye khwarerwemo kumwoyo lukali khutiila elala lilieyikina lili ebweeni wefwe.
Khuli ne lilieyikina lino nga sichaangi khulwe bulamu bwefwe. Sili sie bubwilukhilo lundi sia ng'ali, lundi sibiriranga mu pasia eye Lukaangu lwe mwikulu ne sicha mu bwikhalo bwe mukari.
Yesu arangira aacha mu bwene omwo mu bweyaangu bwefwe mala aabeele Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali mindali na mindali, bulayi bwene nga Melikisedeki.

mala Aburahamu amuelesia silala khwi khumi khu bioosi nibio aba ne abukule. (Sifuno sie khunyoa sie lisina Melikisedeki sili, “Omwami owe buluungi” ne sikila aaba omwami owa Salemu, lisina liewe lundi liboola lili “Omwami owe kumuleembe.”)
Se ali ne raraawe namwe maawe namwe sikuuka tawe. Liiandiko lie khusaalwa khwewe namwe lie lifwa liewe se lilikhoo tawe. Ali nga Omwana owa Wele, aliba omusaayi mindali na mindali.
Mwaboone nono nga ne aaba Omukali. Aburahamu, kuuka wefwe omanyikhaane, amuelesia silala khwi khumi khu bioosi nibio anyoola mwiie.
Ne be lisaaye lia Lawi bali basaayi ba balakwa ne Lilaka khubukula silala khwi khumi khukhwama khu baandu ba Isiraeli bali be mu sibala siabwe sisiene, akhaba babaandu be mu sibala siabwe sisiene abo ne bali basaalwa khu Aburahamu.
Melikisedeki se asaalwa khu Lawi tawe, ne kakhali abukula silala khwi khumi khukhwama khu Aburahamu mala abiita Aburahamu chikhabi, owaba ne lisuubisia lia Wele.
Khuli na ng'ali khuli oyo obiita chikhabi ali omukali khukhila obiitwa tawe.
Ne khuloondekhana ne basaayi, silala khwi khumi sibuusibwanga ne babaandu bafwa; ne khulwa Melikisedeki silala khwi khumi siabuusibwa ne noyo omenya, nga liiandiko lilomanga.
Khwako, nga Aburahamu ne aruunga silala khwi khumi, Lawi, (niye lisaaye liewe liabuusianga silala khwi khumi,) yesi aruunga.
Sikila abeele Lawi akhasaalwa tawe, ne kakhali aaba mu kukaawe Aburahamu nga Melikisedeki ne amwakaanana.
Lilaka liaebwa khu baandu ba Isiraeli khuloondekhana ne bubwisaayi bwe Balawi. Nono abanga bali bubwichufu bwanyoolekhana khubirira mu milimo kie basaayi be silawi, andi lilienya lio musaayi lukano luluundi se liabao tawe, oyo owilao khuloondekhana nga Melikisedeki ne aaba, okhali owa Aruni tawe.
Sikila busaayi ne bukaluukhasibwa, likaluukhania likhoyeele khubao akhaba mwilaka.
Ne Omwami wefwe, niye bibiindu bino biboolwakho, aaba owe kholo ekiindi busa, mala se aliio na mulala khu be kholo yewe owakhalabakho nga omusaayi tawe.
Limanyikhaane bulayi bwene mbo Omwami wefwe asaalwa mu kholo eya Yuda, mala Musa se ararakho khu kholo eyo kamakhuwa ke busaayi tawe.
Likhuwa lino libonekha bulayi nga omusaayi lukano luluundi ne abonekha, omusaayi oli nga Melikisedeki.
Se aakholwa omusaayi, khulwe kamalaka ne lilienya lio mundu tawe, ne kakhali khubirira mu bunyali bwe bulamu bukhali ne sisiakamo tawe.
Sikila liiandiko liloma lili,
“Oliba Omusaayi buli lwosi, bulayi bwene nga Melikisedeki.”
Nono, lilaka likhale liarwa alubeka, sikila liaba litekhele lundi liaba likhalimo bukhala tawe.
Sikila Lilaka lia Musa liaba selinyala khukhola sisiindu siosi siosi khuba sisichufu tawe. Ne luno lilieyikina lilayi khukhilakho liareerweo, nilio khubiriramo nio khuche siimbi ne Wele.
Lundi, khukhwichuba khwa Wele khuliio. Khukhwechuba khurio se khwabao nga babaandi ne bakholwa basaayi tawe.
Ne kakhali Yesu ekela omusaayi khubirira mu khwechuba khwa Wele ali,
“Omwami echubile, ne se alakaluukhasia kamebaasio kewe tawe!
‘Ewe oli omusaayi buli lwosi.’ ”
Bubwabukhani buno nono, bwosi bukhola Yesu abe lisuubisia lie Ndakaano endayi khukhilakho.
Bubwabukhani bubuundi buliio. Basaayi babaandi abo baba bakali, sikila lifwa liabakhiingililanga khuchiililila ne kimilimo kiabwe kie busaayi.
Ne kakhali Yesu achiilililanga khumenya buli lwosi, ne kimilimo kiewe nga omusaayi se kiila khu mundu okundi tawe.
Khwako anyala khuonia abo babecha khu Wele khubirira mu niye luno nende biise bioosi, sikila amenyile buli lwosi khukhwekoonjelela Wele mu masaba sikila nibo.
Nono, Yesu ali Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali okhuyeetanga efwe. Ali omutakatifu, se ali ne kamabi namwe bubwoni bwosi bwosi tawe. Aukhasiibwe khukhwama mu be bubwoni ne khuniinisibwa angaaki we likulu.
Se ali nga basaayi bakhulu babaandi abo tawe; se enyekhana khuaana chimbosio buli ndaalo khulwe bubwoni bwewe nio arusie chichiindi khulwe bubwoni bwe babaandu babaandi tawe. Aana embosio ndala lulala lwong'ene, nga eerusia omwene.
Lilaka lia Musa liroboraanga babaandu busa khuba basaayi bakhulu; ne kakhali lisuubisia lia Wele liakholwa ne liliechuba, liliecha enyuma we Lilaka, lirobora Omwana owakholwa khuba omwichufu buli lwosi.

Akhalabananga nga Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali abuundu atakatifu lukali, niio, liiema lia ng'ali lili, likhombakhwa no mundu tawe ne kakhali liombakhwa no Mwami.
Buli Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali aroborwa khuaana biaanwa ne chimbosio khu Wele, khwako Omusaayi wefwe Omukhulu khukhwola yesi abe nende sie khuaana.
Abanga bali aba khu sibala, andi se aaba omusaayi tawe, sikila basaayi balikho baana biaanwa bibienyekha ne Lilaka lie Bayaudi baliio.
Kimilimo nikio bakhola nga basaayi ng'ali kili busa nga sifwaanani ne sisiiniini sie bibiindu bie mwikulu. Kali busa nga ne kaba khu Musa. Nga aaba siimbi khukhwombakha liiema, Wele amuboolela ali, “Khola buli siindu khuloondekhana nga ne wekesebwa ne oli khu sikulu.”
Ne kakhali luno, Yesu aeleseebwe kumulimo kwe busaayi kumuboofu khukhila kikiabwe, nga endakaano niyo aarao akari wa Wele ne babaandu bewe eli endayi lukali, sikila eli ne lisuubisia lie bibiindu bilayi lukali.
Abanga sisiindu siibi se siabao mu ndakaano eye khunyoa tawe, andi eye khabili se yenyekha tawe.
Ne kakhali Wele abonanga kamabi mu baandu bewe ne aaloma ali,
“Omwami aloma ali, chindaalo chilikho chiicha, nicho ese khakholelemo endakaano embia ne babaandu ba Isiraeli ne babaandu ba Yuda.
Se ekhabe nga endakaano niyo nakhola ne bakuuka babwe,
khu ndaalo niyo nabatiila kumukhono ne mbarusia e Misiri tawe.
Se baba basuubilwa khu ndakaano niyo nakhola nabo tawe, khwako se nabarekeeresia tawe.
Luno, Omwami aloma ali, yino niyo endakaano niyo khakhole
ne babaandu ba Isiraeli mu ndaalo chichiicha.
Khare kamalaka kase mu mebaasio kabwe mala nga aandike khu miooyo kiabwe. Ese khabe Wele wabwe, nabo bakhabe babaandu base.
Se aliio khu nibo okhekisie owasie owe mu sibala siewe namwe aboolele wandaaye ali, ‘Manya Omwami’ tawe. Boosi bakhamanye ese, khukhwama khu mukeekhe khukhwola khu mukali.
Khababeele bubwoni bwabwe ne se khakhebulile kamabi kabwe tawe.”
Nga Wele alomaloma khu ke ndakaano embia, aaba aakholile eye khunyoa khuuba ekhale. Ne buli siindu ne siba sikhale ne khukofula, aba sienya khuwao.

Endakaano eye khunyoa yaba ne kamalaka khulwe khusaaya lundi yaba ne abuundu niio babaandu bang'oona khulwe khusaayilao.
Liiema liombakhwa, ne lusiro lwalio lwe bweeni lwalaangwa Abuundu Atakatifu we Butakatifu. Siteetwe sie khurakho etaa ne mesa eyabakho kumukaati kukwaanwa khu Wele biabamo.
Liiema lilialaangwa Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali liaba enyuma we pasia eya khabili.
Alutare eye sahabu eye khukhwoseliakho bupaani, alala ne Lisanduku lie Ndakaano nilio basaa esahabu, ne kumwendo kwe sahabu kukwabamo mana, ne siimbo eya Aruni eyaba ne sisiinekho kamasaafu, ne bipande bibili bie kamabaale bibiaandikwakho kamalaka biabaamo.
Bibuumbe bie chindaa bibiekesia khubao khwa Wele, biaba angaaki we Lisanduku lundi biabambula chindaa chabwe choola abuundu niio babeelangao baandu bubwoni. Ne kakhali luno se sili siise sie khukhwinoosia buli siindu mu bwichufu tawe.
ne kakhali Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali achichanga mwiiema lie mukari, ne akholanga ario lulala lwong'ene khu mwiiko. Aasutanga kamalasile niko aananga khu Wele khulwo mwene ne khulwe bubwoni nibwo babaandu bakhola ne bakhamanyile bali balikho bakhola bubwoni tawe.
Roho Omutakatifu ekesianga abuwaanga khukhwama mu lirekekha lino lioosi ali, engila eye khucha Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali ekhekulwa tawe, khu siise sioosi liiema lie nje ne liliio.
Sino sili simanyisio sisiekesia siise sia luno. Siekesia sili biaanwa ne chimbosio chaanwa khu Wele se chinyala chakhola kimiooyo kiaabo bamusaaya niye kiaba kimichufu tawe,
sikila biianwa ebio bialoondekhananga ne khulia, khunywa ne kimisaango kie khukwalaasia kiong'ene. Kano koosi kali kamalaka ke nje busa, kaliio khukhwola siise nisio Wele aliraao lilaka liiya.
Ne kakhali Kristo eechile khale nga Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali owe bibiindu bilayi bili ano khale. Liiema nilio akhalabanamo lili liboofu lundi lilichufu lukali; se lili liiema liliang'oonwa ne kamakhono ko mundu tawe, ne se lilikho ne sitonye sie sibala sisiabaang'anwa sino tawe.
Nga Kristo abirira mu Liiema mala engila lulala lwong'ene Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali, se abukula kamalasile ke chimbusi ne chiuunwa khuaana nga embosio tawe; ne kakhali, abukula kamafuki kewe omwene mala akhunyoolela efwe buonia bwa mindali.
Kamalasile ke chimbusi ne chiuunwa ne likokhe lie moosi yosiibwe biaanwangwa khulwe baandu ba baaba ne bakholile kimisilo, ne bino biabakwalaasianga khulwe khubarusiakho bubi obwo.
Khubeela kano kali kang'ali, aba kamafuki ka Kristo kakhola bikali lukali! Khubirira mu Roho owa mindali, Kristo erusia omwene khu Wele nga embosio eye bubwichufu. Kamafuki kewe kakhukwalaasia efwe kamebaasio kefwe khukhwama mu miima kikhalimo bukhala tawe, nio khukhalabanile Wele omenyile mindali.
Khulwe sifuno sino Kristo ali niye oreeranga endakaano embia, nio abo nibo Wele alaangile boole khunyoola chikhabi cha mindali nicho abasuubisia. Kano kanyala kekholekha sikila lifwa liielesianga babaandu bulekhuule khukhwama mu mabi niko bakhola khuloondekhana ne endakaano eye khunyoa.
Omundu owalekha lilienya liewe ali baliloonde ne afwiile, afwichanga nio baliloonda.
Lilienya elio se lili ne sifuno siosi siosi omundu owasuubisia omwene ne asiili mulamu tawe, likholanga kimilimo nafwiile.
Esio nisio sikila endakaano eye khunyoa ne yechao khulwe khurumikhira kamalasile.
Ekhunyoa, Musa aaboolela babaandu kamalaka koosi nga ne karebwao mu Lilaka lia Musa. Nio abukula kamalasile ke chiuunwa ne chimbusi, akatubasia ne kameechi, mala aarumikhira sisiaangu ne bufuumbo bubesemu khukaanyaka khu sitabu sie Lilaka lia Musa ne khu baandu boosi.
Aloma ali, “Kano niko kamalasile ke endakaano niyo Wele amulakile enywe muloonde.”
Mu ngila ng'eneyo Musa aanyaka kamalasile khwiema lie Ndakaano ne khu biindu bioosi bibiarumikhirwanga mu lisaaya.
Ng'ali, khuloondekhana ne Lilaka, kamalasile kakwalaasianga embi buli siindu, ne kamalasile ne kakhachichukhe, khubeelwa khwe bubwoni se khuliio tawe.
Bibiindu nibio Musa aakhola ebio, bifwaanana nende bie mwikulu bibieene bikwalaasibwa birio. Ne kakhali bibiindu bie mwikulu bienyekha biielesibwe chimbosio chindayi lukali khukhila chino.
Sikila Kristo se acha Abuundu Atakatifu niio omundu aang'oona ali sifwaanane sie Abuundu ang'ali tawe. Acha mwikulu mu bweene, nimwo luno abonekhela ebweeni wa Wele mu bweyaangu bwefwe.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali achichanga Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali buli mwiiko ne kamalasile ke sisiaayo. Ne kakhali Kristo se achao khukhwirusia omwene kamakhabi kamakali tawe,
busa aandi apisibwa siibi kamakhabi kamakali khukhwama nga sibala siabaang'anwa. Ne kakhali, luno nga biise bie chindaalo bioosi ne bimbiya sisiakamo, aabonekha lulala lwong'ene mala akama, khurusiao bubwoni khubirira mu khweana omwene nga embosio.
Buli mulala khukhwola afwe lulala, mala ne afwiile, Wele amukhalakile.
Mu ngila ne ng'ene Kristo yesi aanwa nga embosio lulala lwong'ene khurusiao bubwoni bwe bakali. Se akhabonekhe lukhola khabili khu rusiao bubwoni tawe, ne kakhali akhabonekhe khuonia abo bamulindiliile niye.

Khwako sikila Lilaka lie Bayaudi lili busa sisiiniini sie bibiindu bilayi bibiaba ne bilikho biicha, ne se lili bibieene tawe, chimbosio chiaanwanga buli lwosi buli mwiiko, se chinyala chakhola babaandu babecha khu Wele mu ngila eyo baba babechufu tawe.
Abanga babaandu basaayanga Wele mu ngila eyo ng'ali bakwalasibwa khukhwama mu bwoni bwabwe, andi se beulila ne bali ne bubwoni lundi tawe, lundi andi chimbosio choosi chakama.
Ne kakhali chimbosio chiaanwanga buli mwiiko khukhebusia babaandu bubwoni bwabwe.
Sikila kamalasile ke chiuunwa ne chimbusi se kanyala karusiao bubwoni tawe.
“Ewe se wenya chimbosio ne biaanwa tawe, ne kakhali wandekekheere ese kumubili.
Ewe se osiimisibwa ne bibiaayo bibiosiibwe khu alutare tawe,
namwe chimbosio khulwe khurusiao bubwoni tawe.
Nio naloma ndi,
‘Ee Wele, ese ndi ano khukhola lilienya liowo nga kaandikwa khwise mu sitabu sie Lilaka.’ ”
Khunyoa aloma ali, “Se wenya namwe se osiimisibwanga ne chimbosio nende bie khuaana namwe ne bibiaayo bie khukhwoselia khu Alutare ne chimbosio che khurusiao bubwoni tawe.” Aloma kano akhaba chimbosio chino ne chirusibwa khuloondekhana ne Lilaka.
Nio aloma ali, “Ee Wele, ese ndi ano, khukhola lilienya liowo.” Khwako Wele arusiangao chimbosio chikhale choosi ne khu khwisiao embosio eya Kristo.
Efwe fweesi khwakwalaasibwa khukhwama mu bwoni ne mbosio eye kumubili kwa Yesu Kristo omwene niyo aakhola lulala mala aakama ario sikila aakhola niko Wele eenya akhole.
Ne kakhali Kristo, aana embosio ndala khulwe khurusiao bubwoni, embosio eya buli lwosi mala nga ne amala ario eekhala kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele.
Eyo nono, aaliindile Wele are basiku bewe aasi nga endebe eye khuswalakho bikele biewe.
Khwako, khubirira mu mbosio ndala aakhole bakwalaasibwe khukhwama mu bwoni babe babechufu buli lwosi.
Ne Roho Omutakatifu yesi akhuelesianga efwe buloli bwewe. Khunyoa aloma ali,
yino eli endakaano niyo khakhole nabo mu ndaalo chichiicha:
Khare kamalaka kase mu miooyo kiabwe mala ngaandike mu mebaasio kabwe.”
Khwako nga bino ne bimalile khubeelwa, siaanwa sie khurusiao bubwoni se sienyekha lundi tawe.
Nono, bawandaayase, efwe khuli ne bulekhuule bubwichufu khucha Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali khulwe khubirira mu lifwa lia Yesu.
Akhwikulila efwe engila embia, engila eye bulamu, khubirira mu pasia eyo, nikhwo khubirira mu mubili kwewe omwene.
Khuli no Musaayi omukali owimeelela enju eya Wele.
Khwako lekha khwiche siimbi ne Wele ne kumwoyo kumulekhuule ne lisuubila lia ng'ali, ne kimiooyo kikwalaasiibwe khukhwama mu liba lie mukari libi, lundi ne kimibili kisingiibwe mu meechi kamakwalaafu.
Lekha khwiandalasilie elala mu lieyikina nilio khwiyamanga, sikila khwiyikina khuli Wele alakhola niko akhusuubisie efwe.
Lekha khuechane kimiooyo fwabene khu fwabene, khuyeetane fwabene khu fwabene, khuba ne busiime ne khukhola kamalayi.
Khukhalekha kumwiima kwe khukhwakaanana alala, nga balala ne balikho bakhola tawe. Ne kakhali, lekha khutase khutinyilisiana, nga ne khubona khuli Endaalo yo Mwami elikho yimbiya.
Sikila embosio ekiindi yosi yosi erusiao bubwoni se elikhoo kaaba bali mwenyelamo khuchiililila khukhola bubwoni enyuma we khuboolelwa bung'ali tawe.
Ne kakhali, siramireo sili khulindiilila mu buri liliicha lie likhalaka ne kumulilo kumurafu kulibunia abo bayingania Wele!
Yesi yesi okharia Lilaka lia Musa tawe akhoyeele eerwe ne akhalakilwe khuba omwoni khuloondekhana ne buloli bwe baloli babili namwe bakali, ne akhakholelwakho siisa tawe.
Nono, kakhabe kariena, khu mundu olekelesianga Omwana owa Wele? Naanu obukulanga kamafuki ke ndakaano eya Wele kakamukwalaasia khukhwama mu bwoni khuba ka busa? Naanu okhomanga Roho owe kumwalaalo? Yibaasia siiukuumo nisio akhanyoole sikhabe sibi lukali!
Sikila efwe khumanyile owaloma ali, “Ese kheyache, ekharuungie;” lundi owaloma ali, “Omwami akhakhalakile babaandu bewe.”
Sili sisiindu sie khuriisia khukwa mu makhono ka Wele omenyile mindali!
Khebulila nga ne kaba khaale khwinywe. Mu ndaalo echo, enyuma we buwaanga bwa Wele khukhosia khwinywe, mwaapwa siibi lukali, ne kakhali se mwakhilwa mu khunyaakhana khwenywe tawe.
Biise bilala mwakhomwanga ebweeni we babaandu ne mukholelwa kamabi, ne mu biise bibiindi mwaba mwerekekha khuambaana nabo ba baaba ne bakholelwa bario.
Mwasanga mu khupisibwa khwe baboe, mala nga bibiindu bienywe bioosi biabukulwa mwekhaliilikha butinyu obwo mu busangaafu, sikila mwamanya muli mwaba mu siili ne sisiindu silayi lukali, sisiindu sinyala siamenya buli lwosi.
Nono, mukhalekha khuba banyindaafu tawe, sikila bunyindaafu bureranga kumuruuru kumuboofu.
Mukhoyeele mwefwiilisia, nio mukhole lilienya lia Wele mala munyoole nisio asuubisia khumuelesia.
Sikila, nga liiandiko ne lilomanga lili,
“Siise siasikaale sitiiti,
oolikho wiicha akheeche, se akhakhiinde tawe.
Ne kakhali omundu wase omuluungi
akhamenye khulwe lisuubila,
ne kakhali ne akobola enyuma,
se khamusangaalile tawe.”
Efwe se khuli babaandu bakobola enyuma ne khutiba tawe. Ne kakhali, khuli abo bali ne lisuubila lie khuonia kimiooyo kiefwe.

Khuba ne lisuubila khuli khuba na ng'ali khu biindu nibio khweyikina, khuba nasuubi khu biindu nibio khukhanyala khwabona tawe.
Wele aafukiilila babaandu be khaale khulwe lisuubila liabwe.
Se aliio yesi yesi onyala asiimisia Wele nakhali ne lisuubila tawe, sikila oyo yesi yesi owiicha khu Wele khukhwola abe ne lisuubila ali Wele aliio, lundi aelesianga kumuruuru bamuyimanga niye.
Khulwe lisuubila amenya nga omukeni mu sibala nisio Wele aaba ne amusuubisie. Amenyanga mu maeema, bulayi bwene nga Isaaka ne Yakobo ne bamenyanga, ba baaba ne lisuubisia lilala ne Aburahamu.
Sikila Aburahamu alindiililanga lukoba luuli ne kimisiingi nikio Wele omwene aang'oona ne khu khwombakha
Lisuubila nilio liliakhola Sara anyoola bunyali bwe khuba ne nda, akhaba kimiiko kiewe ne kiaba ne kibirire, sikila amanya ali Wele omusuubisie ali omusuubilwa.
Akhaba Aburahamu ne aaba nga wafwa khale, khukhwama khu mundu mulala yuno babaandu basaalwa bakali nga ching'enieesi che mwikulu, bakali nga kumuyekhe kwe khu sikiingi sie nyanja, kukhabalikha tawe.
Babaandu balomanga kamakhuwa nga ako, babechanga khwasie busa bali balikho bayiima sibala siabwe babeene.
Abanga bali bachiililila khukhwibaasia sibala nisio baba ne baruriremo, andi bakhola bario, baba ne bubweyaangu bwe khukobolayo.
Ne kakhali, nisio benyanga sili sibala silayi, sibala sie mwikulu. Khwako Wele se aba ne chisoni khulwa nibo khumulaangwa Wele wabwe tawe, sikila aabarekekheere nibo lukoba luboofu.
Omwana niye abeele Wele aamuboleele ali, “Khubirira khu Isaaka, ewe okhanyoole lisaaye nilio nakhusuubisia.”
Aburahamu amanya ali Wele anyala khulamusia Isaaka khukhwama mu lifwa, ne Aburahamu ng'ali akoboselwa Isaaka khukhwama mu lifwa.
Arobora khu khuupisibwa siibi alala ne babaandu ba Wele khukhila khusangaala mu bwoni khu siise sitiiti.
Akhebulila ali khukhomwa sikila Kristo oliicha khwaba khwe bukhala bukali khukhila kamabiikhilo ke buiinda koosi ke mu Misiri, sikila aaba ne lilieyikina lie kumuruuru kuliicha ekhumaliilikha.
Lisuubila nilio liliamukhola arao Epasaka mala alaka kamalasile kaanywe khu miliango nio, malaika owe lifwa akheera babaana be siseecha babele be Baisiraeli tawe.
Lisuubila nilio lilialiinda omueeyi Rahabu khwirwa alala ne nabo babalekelesia Wele tawe, sikila akaanila bayooti Baisiraeli mu busaale.
Khubirira mwisuubila bapanianga bibala bioosi mala babiula. Bakholanga kamaluungi mala banyoola nisio Wele asuubisia khubaelesia. Bafuunikha kiminwa kie chitalang'i,
basimia kimililo kimirafu, baona khukhwirwa ne mbalu. Baba batekhele, ne kakhali baaba be kamaani; baba barafu mwiie mala baula banamae be basiku.
Khubirira mwisuubila bakhasi babona balebe babwe ba baaba ne bafwiile balamusibwa.
Babaandi, nga baloba khufukiilila bulekhuule, bafwiila mu khupisibwa siibi, nio bolaane khulamusibwa mu bulamu bulayi khukhilakhoo.
Balala bakhomwa ne khu khuupwa biboko, ne babaandi babowa ne kiminyololo mala barebwa mu siboe.
Bapwa kamabaale, bakhalwamo abili ne kumusiameno, berwa ne mbalu. Bakeendelanga kamasieelo ke kamakheese ne chimbusi. Baba bataambi, bapisibwa siibi ne khukuulumisibwa.
Bulayi bwe sibala se bwaba siindu khu nibo tawe! Bayiiyayiiyanga nga baakwa mu biangalaamwe ne mu bikulu, bamenyanga mu mabina ne mu maloo.
Bano boosi babonekha khuba banyindaafu khulwe lisuubila liabwe! Ne kakhaba kario se banyoola nisio Wele asuubisia khubaelesia,
sikila yaba Wele aakhurekekhera efwe kamalayi lukali. Sifuno siewe siaba bali nibo bolaane khuba babechufu ne bali nafwe.

Khwako sikila khuli ne baloli bakali bari, khe khulekhe buli siindu sikhukhiingililanga, ne bubwoni bubwakhutiila tatatatata, mala khutime chimbilo chili ebweeni wefwe ne liliekhaliilikha.
Lekha khure chimoni chefwe khu Yesu, orakikhanga ne khutabusia lisuubila liefwe. Kumusalaba se kwakila aafwa kumwoyo tawe! Ne kakhali, sikila ekhoyo niyo aaba ne alikho acha khunyoola, se abonakho sisiindu simuambia chisoni mu khufwila khu musalaba tawe, ne luno ekhaale alubeka luseecha lwe ndebe eye bubwami eya Wele.
Yibaasia khu niko abiriramo, nga efwiilisia mu khubiilwa ne babooni! Khwako mukhafukiilila khufwa kimiooyo tawe.
Sikila mukhukhaka khwenywe khuloba bubwoni, se mwapaane ne bubwoni khukhwola khukhwiirwa tawe.
Mwebiliile kamakhuwa ke khumutinyilisia enywe niko Wele aamuboolela nga babaana bewe?
“Mwana wase, rekeeresia Omwami,
ne akhukololosia,
ne okhafwa kumwoyo, nga ne akhurafwira tawe.
Sikila Omwami akololosianga buli mundu niye asiima,
lundi aukuumanga buli mundu niye abukula khuba omwana wewe.”
Yekhaliilikhila buchuuni nibwo mubiriramo nga siiukuumo khukhwama khu paapa wenywe; khuchuunisibwa khwenywe khwekesia khuli Wele alikho amukholela enywe nga babaana bewe. Omwana yesi yesi abakhoo niye raraawe akhaukuumanga tawe ku?
Ne kaaba bali se muukuumwa nga babaana bewe tawe, liekesia lili aba se muli babaana bewe bang'ali tawe; ne kakhali babaana be yasiimba.
Ne bapaapa befwe be mu sibala bakhuukuumanga efwe mala khwabaria. Nono, aba khweaana khuriena khu Paapa owe kimiooyo kiefwe mala khumenye!
Bapaapa befwe be mu sibala bakhuukuumanga efwe khu siise sitiiti, khuloondekhana nga balibona khuba lie buluungi, ne kakhali Wele akhukholelanga ario khulwe nganga yefwe fwabeene, nio wakana khusaange mu butakatifu bwewe.
Ne khuukuumwa, khubonekhananga siise esio khuba sisiindu sie khu khukhuchuunia efwe kimiooyo, se sili sie khu khusangaasia tawe. Ne kakhali enyuma wako, abo baluungisibwa ne siiukuumo nga esio sirio banyoola kumuruuru kwe bulamu bwe buluungi.
Chiililila khukeenda khu ngila chingololofu, nio mbo sikhandakilo sisialemala sikhaba sileme tawe, ne kakhali sione.
Khaka khuba mu muleembe na buli mundu, mala mukhake khumenya limenya litakatifu, sikila se aliio na mulala okhabone Omwami ne akhali omutakatifu tawe.
Mwelinde mukhakhola murio mwaukha khukhwama khu mwalaalo kwa Wele tawe. Mukhalekha omundu yesi yesi aaba nga simelwa silulu sichoanga mala sireera butinyu bukali ne buchiba bwasio khu biindi tawe.
Mukhalekha yesi yesi aaba ne sifwaabi namwe aaba okhali owa roho nga Esau, owakusia kumukabwa kwewe nga omwana omubele khulwe siakhulia silala siong'ene tawe.
Ekhumaliilikha, mu manyile muli enya anyoole chikhabi cha raraawe; mala khunyoola tawe, sikila raraawe se aaba ne ngila yosi yosi eye khukaluukhasia nisio aaba ne akholile tawe, akhaba ne achiyiima ne alila.
sikila abeele se banyala benyala mwilaka lilialoma lili, “Akhaba esaang'i ne yetiila khu sikulu, khukhwola yipwe kamabaale efwe.”
Kakabonekha kaba kariisia lukali nio Musa aloma ali, “Nariire ne khuterema!”
Ne kakhali, mwechile khu Sikulu sia Sayuni lundi mu lukoba lwa Wele omenyile mindali, Yerusalemu lwe mwikulu, ne ba Malaika balwo chielefu bali ne khoyo.
Mwechile mu libuusiana lie babaana babele ba Wele, nibo kamasina kabwe kaandikwa mwikulu. Mwechile khu Wele, oli omukhalaki owe babaandu boosi; ne khu roho che babaandu balayi babakholwa khuba babechufu.
Mwechile khu Yesu ooli owe akari we babaandu ne Wele mu ndakaano embia, lundi mwechile khu mafuki kakachichukha kasuubisia bibiindu bilayi lukali khukhila kamafuki ka Apili
Nono, lola bulayi mukhakhola murio mwaloba khuulila oyo olomaloma tawe. Abo babaloba khuulila oyo owalomanga burume bwa Wele khu sibala se beebacha tawe. Nono, efwe khukhebache khuriena, kaaba bali se khuulila oyo olomalomanga khukhwama mwikulu tawe!
Kumumilo kwewe kwasisiikha sibala siise esio, ne kakhali luno asuubisie ali, “Khasisiikhe lundi sibala ne likulu liosi.”
Likhuwa “Lundi” liekesia abuwaanga lili bibiindu bibiabuumbwa bioosi bikhasisiikhwe birusibweo nio bikhanyala biasisiikhwa birameo.
Nono, lekha khuupe orio, sikila khwanyoola bubwami bukhanyala bwasisiikhwa tawe. Lekha khuupe orio mala khusaaye Wele mu ngila emusiimisia niye, mu khweboombia ne mu buri bukali,
sikila Wele wefwe ng'ali ali kumulilo kubunia.

Chiililila khusiimana nga wandaaye ne wandaaye.
Mukhalekha khukhwakaanila bakeni mu chingo chenywe tawe. Balala baliio babakhola bario mala bakaanila bamalaika ne bakhamanyile tawe.
Khebulila abo bali mu siboe, oli muli mu siboe ne abo. Khebulila balikho baapwa siibi oli enywe ne mulikho mupwa siibi nabo.
Limenya lie khureerana likhoyeele linyoole lukoosi khukhwama khu baandu boosi, ne khukhwola busuubilifu bube akari wo museecha no mukhasi. Wele akhakhalakile be sifwaabi nende abo bakhola bueeyani.
Khwako nono efwe khunyala khuloma ne bunyindaafu khuli,
“Omwami ali omuyeeti wase, se ndaria tawe.
Omundu onyala akhola siina khwise?”
Khebulila ba baaba babemeelesi benywe, babamuboolela enywe burume bwa Wele. Yibaasia nga bamenyanga limenya liabwe, mala muloonde lisuubila liabwe.
Yesu Kristo ali busa omwene no mwene likolooba, luno nende buli lwosi.
Mukhalekha kamekisio kamakeni kosi kamurusia enywe khu ngila enuungi tawe. Buli bulayi khunyoola kamaani ke mukari khukhwama khu mwalaalo kwa Wele, ne se khuli khulwe khuria kamalaka kaloondekhana ne biakhulia tawe; abo babaria kamalaka kano se bayeetwakho nako tawe.
Basaayi bakhalabananga abuundu niio Bayaudi basaayilanga Wele se bali ne bunyali bwosi bwosi khuliakho sie mbosio siosi siosi khu alutare yefwe endakatifu tawe.
Omusaayi Omukhulu Lukali, areranga kamalasile ke bibiaayo Abuundu Atakatifu Lukali khukaana nga embosio khulwe bubwoni; ne kakhali bibiaayo bibieene biosebwanga enje we lukoba.
Khulwe sifuno sino Yesu yesi aafwiila enje we lukoba, nio akwalaasie babaandu khukhwama mu bwoni khu mafuki kewe omwene.
Lekha nono, khuche niio ali enje we lukoba, mala khusaange mu soni chewe.
Sikila lukoba lwa mindali khwifwe se luli khu sibala khuno tawe, khulikho khuyiima lukoba lulikho ne lwicha.
Nono, lekha efwe biise bioosi, khuanenge efuma khu Wele, nga embosio yefwe khubirira mu Yesu, siaanwa sie kiminwa kimwiyamanga niye nga Omwami.
Mukhebilila khukhola kamalayi ne khuyeetana tawe, sikila biaanwa nga bino bisiimisia Wele.
Ria babemeelesi benywe mala muloonde kamalaka kabwe. Baliindanga kimiooyo kienywe nandakhaola, sikila khukhwola benoosiele Wele ke bukhalabani bwabwe. Mwaba ne mu baria balakhola kimilimo kiabwe mu busangaafu, ne kalekha khuba kario tawe, balakikhola ne basulunye, mala ako se kaba ne buyeeti khwinywe tawe.
Chiililila khu khusabila efwe. Khuli na ng'ali khuli, khuli ne liba lie mumebaasio lilayi, sikila khwenya khukhole kamaluungi biise bioosi.
Lundi mwikoonjelela enywe mu busuubilifu ndi musabe muli Wele angobosie mwinywe khangu.
Nono lekha Wele owe kumuleembe owalamusia Omwami wefwe Yesu khukhwama mu lifwa, ooli Omwaayi omukali owe kamakheese. Khuloondekhana ne lifwa liewe nga embosio eye ndakaano eya mindali,
amuelesie enywe buli siindu silayi nisio mwenya nio mukhole lilienya liewe, khubirira mu Yesu Kristo. Luyali lube khu Yesu khu niye mindali na mindali! Amina.
Bawandaayase, ese mwikoonjelela enywe, murekeeresie mu khwifwiilisia burume bwe khumuraamo kimiooyo buno; sikila ebarwa niyo ese muandikile yino seli endeeyi lukali tawe.
Nenya mumanye muli wandaayefwe Timoteo alekhuulibwe khukhwama mu siboe. Aaba ne aleecha khangu, aba khabe naye nga khamukeniie enywe.
Elesia kimileembe kiefwe babemeelesi benywe boosi ne babaandu ba Wele boosi. Bawandaayefwe khukhwama Italia bamurumiire enywe kimileembe kiabwe.
Kumwalaalo kwa Wele kukhoya kube nanywe mweesi.

Basaale, ne munyoola kamakhako ka buli lukano, kabukule khuba ekhoyo,
sikila mu manyile muli lisuubila lienywe ne libirira mu makhako nga ako kario, ekhumaliilikha munyoola kamaani ke khukhwikhaliilikha.
Lekha khukhwekhaliilikha khwenywe khumutinyilisie khukhwola ekhumaliilikha, nio mube babolaana lundi babechufu bakhatamba siindu tawe.
Ne kakhali omundu yesi yesi khwinywe aaba nakhali ne limanya tawe, akhoya asabe Wele, oelesianga babaandu boosi mu buaani bukali ne kumwalaalo.
Ne musaaya, mukhoya musuubile, mukhaba ne liaayaaya liosi liosi tawe. Yesi yesi oba ne liaayaaya ali nga siibuli ne siyilwa eyi neyi, ne khuungu khu nyanja.
Omundu nga oyo ario, akhebasiakho ali anyala anyoola sisiindu siosi siosi khukhwama khu Mwami tawe.
Ali ne liaayaaya ne se amanyile nisio akhoyeele akhole mu buli siindu tawe.
Omukristo oli omutaambi akhoya asangaale Wele ne amuniinia,
ne omukristo omuiinda akhoya asangaale Wele ne amukhola khuba omutaambi sikila baiinda baliwao busa nga bimuli bie mundaa.
Enyanga esoanga ne lumemu mala yosia simelwa, khamuli khasio khakwa aasi, mala bulayi bwakho bwonakwa. Mu ngila ng'eneyo omuiinda akhaweo ne alikho achiililila khukhola kakeewe busa.
Ali ne busangaafu oyo owikhaliilikha mu makhako, sikila ne abirire likela elio, akhanyoole ekutwa eye bulamu nibwo Wele asuubisia ali alielesia abo ba bamusiima niye.
Ne khukelwa mu makhako kario, khukhaloma khuli, “Likhako lino liamile khu Wele tawe.” Sikila Wele sanyala khukhakwa ne kamabi tawe, lundi niye omwene sakhakanga omundu yesi yesi tawe.
Ne kakhali buli mundu akhakangwa ne liliekoomba liewe libi limutiimia enyuma we khumuombelesia.
Liliekoomba libi lino liiesianga ne khusaala bubwoni, ne bubwoni ne bukhulile, busaala lifwa.
Wandaayase bakoosi enywe, siindu sikhamubea tawe!
Buli siianwa silayi lundi sisichufu siamanga mwikulu khu Paapa, oli omubuumbi we buwaanga bwe mwikulu, okhakaluukhananga nga sisiiniini tawe.
Khulwe lilienya liewe omwene aakhubuumba efwe khubirira mulomo eya ng'ali, nio khube be khunyoa mu bibuumbe biewe bioosi.
Wandaayase bakoosi, khebulila lino. Buli mundu akhoya abe khangu khurekeeresia ne kakhali abe kalaa khulomaloma lundi abe kalaa mu khuambwa lirima.
Lirima lio omundu se lireeranga buluungi bwa Wele tawe.
Khwako lekha buli mwima kwe sifwaabi ne liiba libi lioosi. Yiboombia khu Wele mala mufukiilile elomo niyo abiaala mu miooyo kienywe, elomo enyala yamuonia enywe.
Mukhebea mwabeene mu khurekeeresia busa elomo yewe tawe, ne kakhali khola niko eboola.
Omundu yesi yesi orekeeresia elomo mala sakikhola tawe, ali nga omundu owilolela busa mu sikioo ebone nga nali.
Sikila elolelamo bulayi mala arekukha khangu, ebilila nga afwaana.
Ne kakhali oyo omalilanga bukesi bwewe khu lilaka lilichufu liielesianga babaandu bulekhuule, lundi se arekeeresia busa ne ebilila tawe ne kakhali alikhebulila ne khulira mu bikholwa biewe, Wele akhamubiite chikhabi mu koosi niko akhola.
Omundu yesi yesi mwinywe owibaasia ali, ali owe dini mala se anyala khuliinda lulimi lwewe tawe, edini yewe eyo aba se eli ne ngaanga tawe lundi aba alikho ebea busa.
Edini niyo Wele Paapa abala khuba engwalaafu lundi eya ng'ali niyo yino: Khuliinda bafuubi ne banamulekhwa mu sibi siabwe, ne khukhweliinda wamwene, sibala sikhakhutibia tawe.

Wandaayase enywe, nga basuubili mu Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo, Omwami we luyali, mukhatomboola babaandu balala khuloondekhana nga babonekha busa enje tawe.
Kaaba bali omuiinda owefwarire embete eye sahabu ne chingubo chindayi echa mu siikhasio sienywe, ne omubanani owefwarire bitabutabu yesi echa.
Ne mwekesia buriaani khu omundu ofwarire bulayi ne khumuboolela muli, “Yikhala ano khu ndebe endayi yino,” mala muboolele omubanani muli, “Khewime ao namwe khewikhale aasi mu bikele biase,”
aba enywe muli ne bubi bwe khutomboolana ne khukhalakila babaandi khuloondekhana ne bifuno biikhali bilayi tawe.
Enywe wandaayase bakoosi rekeeresia! Wele aarobora babanani be sibala sino khuba baiinda mwisuubila ne khunyoola bubwami nibwo aasuubisia abo babamusiima niye.
Ne kakhali enywe ne mupia siibi babanani! Naanu bamupianga enywe siibi ne khumukhuruura ne bamuyila mu koti? Se bali baiinda?
Se bali nibo balomanga kamabi khu lisina lilayi elio nilio enywe mwaelesibwa?
Ne kakhali ne mubukula babaandu balala khuba balayi khukhila babaandi khuloondekhana nga ne babonekha aba mwakholile bubi, ne kamaandiko kekisia kali aba mwakholile bubwoni.
Yesi yesi ofuna lilaka lilala aba ali nga ofunile koosi.
Sikila mulala oyo owaloma ali: “Okhakhola bueeyi tawe,” niye lundi owaloma ali; “Okheera tawe.” Wakhaba nokhakholanga bueeyi tawe, mala waaba omwiiri aba wabeele omufunaki owe lilaka.
Khwako lomaloma ne khukhola bikholwa bienywe nga babaandu mulikhalakilwa ne lilaka likhuelesianga efwe bulekhuule.
Khola murio, sikila khu ndaalo eye likhalaka, siisa se sikhabeo khwaabo bakhakholelakho babaandu siisa tawe. Ne kakhali akhaba mu khukhalaka, Wele ali ne siisa!
Basaale base, lili ne bulayi siina omundu khuloma ali ali ne lisuubila ne bikholwa biewe se biekesia lisuubila chana tawe? Lisuubila elio linyala liamuonia ku?
Kaaba bali wandaayefwe aliio otaamba chingubo ne siakhulia,
mala mulala khywinywe amuboleele ali “Wele akhuliinde! Cha wore kumulilo mala olie bulayi!” Kaaba bali se wamueleesie bibienyekha mu limenya tawe? Aba nono wakholile ndai siina?
Kali busa kario ne lisuubila, ne likhali ne bikholwa tawe, aba liafwa.
Ne kakhali omundu alaloma ali, “Ewe oli ne lisuubila, ne ese ndi ne bikholwa.” Ese ngobosia ndi, “Njekesie, omundu yesi yesi onyala aaba ne lisuubila ne se ali ne bikholwa tawe. Nase ndakhwekesia lisuubila liase khubirira mu bikholwa biase.”
Ewe osuubila oli Wele aliio mulala yeng'ene? Bulayi! Akhaba bisieeno bisuubila ne khuterema khulwe buuri.
Musilu ewe! Ewe wenya wekesibwe oli lisuubila likhalimo bikholwa se lili ne bukhala tawe?
Kuuka wefwe Aburahamu aaba ariena omuluungi ebweeni wa Wele? Bikholwa biewe nibio bibiakila, nga ne arusia omwana wewe Isaaka khu alutare.
Se onyala wabona tawe? Lisuubila ne bikholwa biewe biaba alala. Lisuubila liewe liakholwa khuba lilichufu khubirira mu bikholwa biewe.
Ne kakhali liiandiko liloma lili, “Aburahamu asuubila Wele, ne sikila lisuubila liewe Wele amufukiilila niye khuuba omuluungi,” liecha liaba ng'ali. Khwako Aburahamu aalaangwa omusaale owa Wele.
Nono mwabone muli bikholwa biefwe nibio bikhukhola efwe khwaba baluungi ebweeni wa Wele, ne se lili lisuubila liong'ene busa tawe.
Khwako, nga kumubili kukhalimo kumwoyo ne kuli kumufu, lisuubila likhalimo bikholwa liosi lili liifu.

Bawandaayase enywe, bakali mwinywe mukhaba babekisia tawe. Nga mumanyile, efwe babekisia khulikhalakilwa mu khumenieelesibwa lukali khukhila babaandi.
Efwe fweesi khwekhiikhangakho mu biise bikali. Ne kakhali kaaba bali omundu se ekhiikhaangakho mu niko aloma tawe, aba niye ali omwichufu lundi anyala khukhweliinda mu liiba liewe lioosi.
Khurechanga endekwe mukhanwa mwe farasi nio ekhole niko khwenya ekhole lundi khunyala khwakikhola yacha niio khwenya eche.
Namwe yibaasia emeeli, nabuboofu obwo bwoosi ne khuyilwa ne khuungu esiro enyala yayusibwa ne ngara eye khukitimia eeli ndiiti eri, ne emeeli eyo enyala yacha osi osi niio omundu otimia enya eche.
Lulimi lwosi luli lurio, nabutiiti obwo bwoosi; lunyala lwebonia khu biindu biboofu.
Yibaasia busa nga kumusiru kumubalaayi kunyala kwosibwa ne khamuli khe kumulilo khalala.
Ne lulimi luli nga kumulilo. Luli ne kamakhiikha kamakali po mu mibili kiefwe, lundi lureera bubi mu liba liefwe liosi. Lurechanga limenya liefwe lioosi mu mulilo ne nalwo lwosi lwosibwa ne kumulilo kwa mindali na mindali.
Omundu anyala khubaya, lundi aabaya bibuumbe bibiindi bioosi, chisaang'i ne chinyuni, ne chindemu ne ching'eeni.
Ne se aliio akhaba mulala onyala khubaya lulimi tawe. Lulimo kamabi lundi se lunyala lwemeelelwa tawe, luli ne buchiba bubwira bukali.
Khurumikhiranga lulimi khufumia Omwami ne Paapa, lundi khulurumikhiranga khulaama babaandu babaandi. Babaandu bababuumbwa mu sifwaanani sia Wele.
Kamakhuwa ke khufumia ne kamakhuwa ke khulaama kama mukhanwa chana omwo. Basaale base, lino se lienyibwa liekholekhe tawe!
Kameechi kamanulu ne kamalulu kanyala kama mu moni ndala khulala ku?
Basaale base, kumutuli se kunyala kwama kamatuunda ke khu museituni tawe, kumusabibu se kunyala kwaama chinduli tawe, ne esebele eye kameechi kamalulu se nyala yamamo kameechi kamalayi tawe.
Aliio mwinywe oli ne limanya ne bukesi ku? Yekesia lilienelio mu khumenya bulayi, mu bikholwa biewe bilayi nibio akhola mu khwiboombia ne limanya.
Ne kakhali mu miooyo kienywe mwaba ne muli ne likhalikhililwa, bukhalafu ne khukhweyenyela, aba mulikho mukhola bubwoni khu bung'ali mu khwebonia muli muli ne limanya.
Limanya nga elio se liamanga mwikulu tawe, lili busa lie mu sibala, se lili lia roho tawe, ne kakhali lia Sietani.
Niio likhalikhililwa ne khukhweyenyela khuli, abwenao osi aba sisiayuumba ne bubi chingano choosi biliio.
Ne kakhali limanya liliama angaaki lili likwalaafu, lie kumuleembe, lie buolu lundi lie busaale. Lili lie siisa sikali lundi lireera bikholwa bilayi, se lilimo ekitombooli namwe bubacha tawe.
Ne likesa lie buluungi libialwanga mu muleembe ne nabo bareeranga kumuleembe.

Bulomani ne bukhupani buno mwinywe bilaamilanga waena? Se bilamilanga mu liekoomba lienywe lie kumubili limunaanianga enywe?
Mwekoomba ne se munyoola tawe, khwako mwirekekha akhaba khukhwira nio mu binyoole, mwekoomba bibiindu, ne kakhali se mu binyoola tawe, khwako mulomana ne khu khupana. Se munyoolanga nibio mwenya tawe sikila se musabanga Wele tawe.
Ne nga musaba, se munyoolanga tawe, sikila bifuno bienywe bie khusaba se bili bilayi tawe. Musabanga nio mubirumikhire khukhwisangaasia mwabeene.
Babaandu mukhali basuubilifu tawe enywe! Se mumanyile muli khuba omusaale we sibala aba oli omusiku owa Wele tawe? Yesi yesi owenya khuba omusaale we sibala aba abeele omusiku owa Wele.
Mukhebaasia muli liiandiko liloma lili, “Roho niye Wele aara mwifwe ali ne libuba likali,” se lilimo bung'ali tawe.
Khwako, khe mwiaane khu Wele, mukhiingilile Sietani ne naye alamwilukha.
Yisenda siimbi khu Wele, naye alesenda siimbi nanywe. Enywe babooni! Saaba kamakhono kenywe, ne enywe babacha, kwalaasia kimiooyo kienywe.
Khe mube ne bubeeleli, lila, ne khukhwiunamila; kaluukhasia chinjekho chenywe chibe bililo, ekhoyo yenywe ebe khusulunya!
Yiboombia ebweeni wo Mwami, mala naye alamuniinia.
Wandaayase enywe mukhaloma kamabi khu basienywe tawe, Yesi yesi oloma kamabi khu wasie namwe okhalakila omukristo wasie aba alikho aloma kamabi khu lilaka ne khulikhalakila. Ne yesi yesi okhalakila lilaka aba se ali omuloondi we lilaka elio tawe ne kakhali ali omukhalaki walio.
Ali Wele yeng'ene oanaanga lilaka lundi ali niye yeng'ene oli omukhalaki. Ali yeng'ene onyala aaonia lundi aabunia. Ne ewe okhalakila owasio nga naanu?
Rekeeresia enywe mulomanga muli, “Endaalo yino namwe muchuli khukhache lukeendo mu lukoba nabulebe, niio khumenyeyo kumwiiko mala khurakikhe khukhwofula khunyoole chirupia chingali,” luno ulila kakaase.
Se mu manyile muchuli bulamu bwenywe bukhabe buriena tawe! Muli nga liliisi lifwela, libao khu siise sitiiti busa ne liwaao.
Nilio mukhoyeele mulome nilio lino, “Omwami nafukiilila khubeo, khukhakhole lino namwe elio.”
Ne kakhali luno muli ne sileka lundi mwebonia. Khukhwebonia khurio khwoosi se khuli khulayi tawe.
Khwako, yesi yesi omanyile bung'ali ne se akhola bung'ali obwo tawe, aba aakholile bubwoni.

Ne luno, enywe baiinda rekeeresia niko ndoma! Yiiunamila ne khulila sikila engunyi elikho yiicha khwinywe!
Buyiinda bwenywe bwabolile, bwaweele ne chiseseu chalile chingubo chenywe.
Esahabu ne fwesa yenywe biapile engekheni, ne engekheni yino elaba buloli bubi khwinywe mala elamulia nga kumulilo. Mwabuungile kimiaandu mu ndaalo chimaliilisi chino.
Se mwaruungirekho siosi siosi khu baandu ba bakholile kimilimo mu mikuunda kienywe tawe. Ulila khukhwiloocha khwabwe! Wele Omwami Omunyali Owa Bioosi aauliile bililo bie babaandu bamukeselanga biakhulia abo.
Limenya lienywe khu sibala khuno liama khuba lie kumusasio ne khukhwesangaasia. Ne kakhali luno muli nga chikhaafu chinefu chiicha khusinjwa.
Mwakhalakila ne khukhwira babaandu bakhalikho ne bubi tawe, mala se bamukhiingililakho enywe tawe.
Bawandaayase nono mwefwiilisie, khukhwola nga Omwami ne echa. Bona nga omulimi efwilisianga ne aliindile bie mukuunda bilabe. Alindiililanga mu khwefwiilisia nabwila efula eye kumunaane nende eye siruumbi ekwa.
Enywe mwesi mukhoya mube be khukhwifwiilisia. Ba ne lilieyikina likali, sikila endaalo eye khukhwicha khwo Mwami eli siimbi.
Bawandaayase, mukhekichana tawe, nio Wele naye yesi akhamukhalakila enywe tawe. Omukhalaki ali embi, enya khwicha.
Wandaayase mwesi khebulila bang'oosi babalomaloma mu lisina lio Mwami. Babukule nga sisiekesio sie khukhweyikilakho liliefwiilisia ne liliekhaliilikha mu khupisibwa siibi.
Babaandu ba baaba ne liliekhaliilikha, khubabala khuli bali ne busangaafu. Mwaulila khukhwifwiilisia khwa Ayubu lundi mu manyile niko Omwami aamukholela niye ekhumaliilikha, sikila Omwami ali owe siisa sikali.
Aliio yesi yesi mwinywe oli mu butinyu? Akhoya asabe Wele. Aliio yesi yesi oli omusangaafu? Akhoya afumie Wele.
Aliio yesi yesi oli omulwale? Akhoya arumanie babemeelesi be kanisa, balamusabila mala bamuakhe kamafura ke kumuseituni mu lisina lio Mwami.
Lisaba lino ne bakholela mu lisuubila lilaonia omulwale. Omwami alamuonia lundi omulwale oyo ne ali ne bubwoni alabeelwa.
Khwako, khe mwiyamanile bubwoni bwenywe mala musabanile nio muone. Lisaba lio muluungi lili lie kamaani lundi likholanga ke khuukia.
Elicha aba busa omundu nga efwe ne khuli khuri. Asaba ne lisuubila ali efula ekhabao tawe, mala kimiiko kitaru ne kimieesi sita efula khukwakho khu sibala tawe.
Lundi elakho aasaba likulu lialekhuula efula yakwa, mala sibala siamelakho bibiaamo biasio.
Bawandaayase, mulala khwinywe aaba ne atiima khu ngila eye bung'ali mala okundi amukobosie,
khebulila lino, yesi yesi, oyusia omwoni khukhwama khu ngila embi, alaonia kumwoyo kwo mwoni oyo khukhwama mu lifwa lundi akile khubeelwa khwe bubwoni bukali khubeo.

Khukhwama khu Petero, omurumwa owa Yesu Kristo, khu baandu ba Wele barobore ba basalaanila ne khumenya nga baakwa mu sibala sia Pondiasi, Kalatia, Kapatosia, Esia, ne Bisinia.
Mwaroborwa khuloondekhana ne sifuno sia Paapa Wele mala mwakholwa batakatifu ne Roho wewe, khulwe khuria Yesu Kristo ne khukwalaasibwa ne kamafuki kewe.
Kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe bikhoya bibeele elala bibienywe mu bwichufu.
Lekha khupe orio khu Wele lundi ooli Paapa owo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo! Sikila mu siisa siewe sikali, akhuelesia efwe bulamu buyia khulwe khulamusia Yesu Kristo khukhwama mu lifwa. Kano kakhuelesia efwe lilieyikina lie bulamu likali,
mala khweyikinanga khunyoola chikhabi che buiinda nicho Wele abikhilanga babaandu bewe. Amubikhila enywe chikhabi echo mwikulu, nimwo chikhanyala chabola namwe chonekha namwe chafulaafulana tawe.
Chili chichenywe, khubirira mu lisuubila ne bunyali bwa Wele khu buonia bubwerekekha khubuulikha esiakamo sie siise.
Ba basangaafu khu kano, akhaba ne munyala khuba ne bubeeleli khulwe siise sikeekhe, sikila kamakhako kamakali niko mulikho mubiriramo.
Sifuno siako sili khukhwekesia mbo lisuubila lienywe lili lia ng'ali, bulayi bwene nga ne barechanga Esahabu mu mulilo khumanya neli endayi. Khwako lisuubila lienywe lili lie bukusi bukali khukhila esahabu, khukhwola liosi lipimwe, nio liole khukhwikhaliilikha. Nio mukhanyoole efuma ne luyali ne lukoosi khu Ndaalo niyo Yesu Kristo alibonekhela.
Mwamusiima, akhaba ne mukhamubonakho tawe, ne mwasuubila mu niye, akhaba ne mukhamubona luno tawe. Khwako mwikhoye ne khoyo eye luyali lukali lukhaboolekha tawe,
sikila mulikho munyoola buonia bwe kimiooyo kienywe, sili sifuno sie lisuubila liefwe mu niye.
Liaba khuloondekhana ne buonia buno liakila bang'oosi bayimilisia ne khukhwemenieelesia, mala bang'oola ke siianwa sino nisio andi Wele akhamuelesie.
Bakhaka khumanya siise siliba liina ne silicha sirie. Sino siaba siise nisio Roho owa Kristo mu nibo ekesia, mu khung'oola buchuuni nibwo Kristo aaba ne alikho acha khwikhaliilikha ne luyali lulwaba ne lucha khuloondakho.
Wele abuulila bang'oosi bano ali kimilimo kiabwe sekiaba khulwe bukhala bwabwe babeene tawe, ne kakhali bubwenywe, nga ne baloma khu biindu ebio nibio mwama khuulila luno khukhwama khu barume babelwacha Elomo Endayi khulwe bunyali bwa Roho Omutakatifu owarumwa khukhwama mwikulu. Bino bili bibiindu nibio akhaba malaika benyanga khumanya.
Khwako rekekha kamebaasio kenywe khulwe bikholwa. Yerekekha mala mureere elala lilieyikina lienywe khu khabi nicho mukhaebwe nga Yesu Kristo aliicha.
Khe mube baria Wele, mukhaloonda liliekoomba nilio mwaba nalio nga mwaba ne musiili mu busilu bwenywe tawe.
Ne kakhali, ba batakatifu mu bioosi nibio mukhola, nga Wele owamulaanga enywe nali omutakatifu.
Liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Ba batakatifu sikila ese ndi omutakatifu.”
Kaaba bali mulaanganga Wele muli Paapa, Wele okhalakilanga babaandu boosi mu bung'ali, kholoondekhana ne bikholwa bia buli mundu, menya limenya lie buuri khu niye siise sioosi sie limenya lienywe nga baakwa.
Sikila mu manyile sisiaruungwa khumulekhuula enywe khurura mu miima kie limenya likhalimo bukhala tawe, nikio mwaelesebwa ne bakuuka benywe, se siaba sisiindu sinyala sionakwa nga efwesa namwe esahabu tawe.
Kaaba kamafuki ka Kristo ke bukhala bukali khukhila buli siindu, owaba nga limeeme likhalikho ne bubi bwosi bwosi tawe.
Yaba aroborwa ne Wele sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe, nio abonekhe mu ndaalo chimaliilisi chino sikila enywe.
Khubirira mu niye mwasuubila mu Wele, owamulamusia khukhwama mu lifwa ne khumua luyali; nio lisuubila lienywe ne lilieyikina bibe khu Wele.
Luno sikila mwekwalaasiisie mwabeene khulwe khuria bung'ali, nio mube ne busiime bwa ng'ali khu basuubili basienywe, mukhoyeele mwasiimana mwabeene ne mwabeene lukali ne kumwoyo kwenywe kwoosi.
Sikila mwasaaliilwe lukhola khabili, ne se mwasaaliilwe khu lumiicho lunyala lwabola tawe, ne kakhali mwasaaliilwe khu lumiicho lukhabola tawe lwe elomo eya Wele eye bulamu lundi eya mindali.
Nga liiandiko ne lilomanga lili:
“Babaandu boosi bali nga bunyaasi,
ne luyali lwabwe luli nga bimuli bie mundaa.
Bunyaasi bunialanga ne bimuli bikhukhumukhanga,
ne kakhali elomo eyo Mwami eliio mindali na mindali.”
Elomo yino eli Elomo Endayi eyelwachibwa khwinywe.

Nono, rura mu bumayaanu bwoosi, mukhabea lundi namwe mwekholesie namwe mukhalikhililwe namwe mube ne kamakuto tawe.
Nga babaana bachwenge, ba ne bulesia bwe kamabeele ka kiroho kamakwalaafu, nio khulwe khukanywa mwole khuchoa mala muonisibwe,
mwaba ng'ali ne muchanjaamilekho ne khumanya muli Omwami ali omulayi.
Yiicha khu Mwami, libaale lie bulamu lilialobwa no mundu nga likhalimo bukhala tawe, ne kakhali liaroborwa ne Wele nga lie bukhala.
Yiicha nga kamabaale kamalamu, mala mwilekhuule mu khurumikhirwa mu khwombakha Lukaangu lwa roho, nimwo mukhakhole nga basaayi batakatifu khurusia bie khuosia bia roho, mala bifukiililwa khu Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo.
Sikila liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Narobora libaale lie bukhala,
Nilio ndikho ndaao nga libaale lie khu koona mu Sayuni;
Mala yesi yesi oosuubila mu niye se aliambwa chisoni tawe.”
“Libaale nilio babombakhi baloba, liekelile liboofu lie mu koona.”
Ne liiandiko liliindi liboolanga lili,
“Lino nilio libaale likhakhole babaandu betuye, lulwanda lukhabape aasi.” Bakhetuye sikila se basuubila mwikhuwa nga lilienya lia Wele ne lili khu nibo tawe.
Mu ndaalo echo se mwaba babaandu ba Wele tawe, ne luno muli babaandu bewe, mu ndaalo echo se mwamanya siisa sia Wele tawe, ne luno mwanyoolile siisa siewe.
Basaale base, mwikoonjelela enywe, nga bakeni lundi baakwa mu sibala sino! Mukhelekhuula khu liekoomba lie kumubili, lili mwiie buli lwoosi ne kumwoyo tawe.
Liiba lienywe mu bakhamanyile Wele tawe, likhoyeele liaba lilayi lukali, nio ne bamusitaka enywe khuba bakhola kamamayaanu, bakhoyeele babona bikholwa bienywe bilayi nio bafumie Wele khu Ndaalo eye liliicha liewe.
Sikila Omwami, khe murie buli bunyali. Lukali bunyali buuli khu muruki ooli khu bwami bwe angaaki,
ne babaami babaandi, babaroborwa ne naye, khuukuuma bakhola bumayaanu ne khufumia abo bakhola kamalayi.
Sikila Wele enyanga enywe khusisia lilomaloma lie babaandu basilu likhali lie limanya tawe, khulwe bibiindu bilayi nibio mukhola.
Menya nga babaandu balekhuule; ne mukharumikhira bulekhuule bwenywe khukisa kamamayaanu kosi kosi tawe, ne kakhali menya nga nasioobi ba Wele.
Ria buli mundu, siima basuubili basienywe, ba ne buuri khu Wele, mala murie omwami Kaisari.
Enywe banasioobi khukhwola murie bakhulu benywe mala mu bekesiele elala buriaani. Mukhekesia busa khwaabo bali balayi ne baolu bong'ene tawe, ne kakhali akhaba khwaabo baali barafu.
Wele akhamubiite chikhabi khu kano, kaaba bali mwekhaliilikha buchuuni bwe sinyaasio nisio mukhakhoyeele khunyoola tawe, sikila mu manyile lilienya liewe.
Bukhala siina buliio kaaba bali mwekhaliilikha bukhupe nibwo mukhoyeele khunyoola ne mukholile kamabi? Ne kakhali mwaba ne mwikhaliilikha buchuuni sikila mukholile buluungi, Wele akhamubiite chikhabi khu nibwo.
Bino nibio Wele amulangila, sikila Kristo omwene anyaasibwa sikila enywe mala amulekhela enywe sie khulolelakho, nio mwole khuloonda kakewe.
Se akholakho bubwoni bwosi bwosi tawe, ne se aliio owaulila bubeeyi ne bwama mukhanwa mwewe tawe.
Nga ne akhomwa, se akobosiamo ne khukhoma tawe; nga anyaasibwa se ariikhirisiakho tawe, ne kakhali aara lilieyikina liewe mu Wele, Omukhalaki owa ng'ali.
Kristo omwene asuta bubwoni bwefwe khu mubili kwewe acha nabwo khu musalaba, nio khwolaane khulekha bubwoni mala khumenye khulwe buluungi. Ne khulwe kamakoonjo kewe, enywe mwaonile.
Mwaba nga kamakheese kakatiima engila, ne luno mwayusiibwe khuloonda Omwaayi lundi omuliindi owe kimiooyo kienywe.

sikila bakhabone bikholwa bienywe ne bili bilayi lundi bie buriaani.
Se mukhoyeele mwesaa nio bali mung'oone lukoondo, ne bibiindu nga khu suuka lichuune, namwe bipalakasa bie khu maru nibio mwarakho, namwe chingubo nicho mufwara tawe.
Ne kakhali, bulayi bwenywe bukhoyeele bwaba bwe liiba lienywe lie mukari lia ng'ali, bulayi bukhawao tawe, bwe kumwoyo kukweoleelesia lundi kwe kumuleembe, kuuli kwe bukhala bukali ebweeni wa Wele.
Sikila bakhasi baberusia be khaale ba bara lilieyikina liabwe mu Wele baba balayi khulwe khuria baseecha babwe.
Sara aaba ario; aria Aburahamu ne khumulaanga ali omwami. Luno muli babaana bewe be sikhaana mwaba ne mukhola bulayi, ne mukharia siindu siosi siosi tawe.
Mukhumaliilisia, khukhwola mweesi mube ne kumwoyo mulala, lundi mube ne siisa, khe musiimane mwabeene ne mwabeene nga bawandaaye ne wandaaye, lundi mube balayi lundi baolu khu mwabeene ne mwabeene.
Mukharuungisia bubi ne bubi tawe, namwe mukhalaama tawe, ne kakhali, biita chikhabi, sikila chikhabi chili nicho Wele alakiilisia khumuelesia enywe nga aamulaanga.
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili,
“Yesi yesi owenya khukhwikhoyela bulamu
ne ekoomba khubona biise bilayi,
khukhwola alekhe khulomaloma bumayaanu
lundi alekhe khuloma bubeeyi.
Khukhwola, alekhe khukhola bumayaanu mala akhole kamalayi;
khukhwola ayiime kumuleembe ne kumwoyo kwewe kwoosi.
Sikila chimoni cho Mwami chiloleelelanga baluungi
ne khurekeeresia kamasaba kabwe;
ne kakhali Omwami abiyilanga abo bakhola bumayaanu.”
Nono naanu okhamunyaale mwaba ne muli ne silukuluku sie khukhola kamalayi?
Ne mwakhaba bali mukhoyeele khunyaasibwa khulwe khukhola kang'ali, sangaala! Mukhaba ne buuri khu mundu yesi yesi tawe, lundi mukheembeelela tawe.
Ne kakhali ba ne buuri khu Kristo mu miooyo kienywe, lundi mu musiime nga Omwami. Yerekekha mu biise bioosi khukobosia yesi yesi omureeba enywe khumwinooselia lilieyikina nilio muli nalio, ne khola murio ne lilieboombia ne buuri.
Lekha limanya lienywe lie mu mebaasio libe lie abuwaanga, nio ne mukhomwa, abo bamuloma kamamayaanu khu liiba lienywe nga babeeka ba Kristo baambwe chisoni khu nibio baloma.
Sikila buli bulayi khunyaasibwa khulwe khukhola bulayi, liaba ne lili lilienya lia Wele, khukhila khunyaasibwa khulwe khukhola kamamayaanu.
Sikila Kristo yesi aafwa khulwe bubwoni lulala lwong'ene mala akama, aaba omuluungi mala afwila bakhali baluungi tawe nio akhureere efwe khu Wele. Erwa kumubili, ne kakhali aakholwa omulamu mu roho,
ne mu roho omwo aacha elwachila roho chichaba mu siboe.
Chino chaba chiroho chikharia Wele tawe, nga alindiililanga ne liliefwiilisia mu ndaalo nicho Noa ombakhilamo emeeli yewe. Babaandu munaane bong'ene ba baaba mu meeli eyo nibo babaona khubirira mu meechi,
sino siaba simanyisio sisiekesia libatiisia lilamuonianga enywe luno, ne se khuli khulwe khukhwisiinga ne khukhwirusiakho liikho tawe, ne kakhali lili lisaba khu Wele lie khuuba ne liiba lie mu mebaasio lili lilayi, Limuonianga enywe khubirira mu lilamukha lia Yesu Kristo,
owacha mwikulu ne luno ali kumukhono kumuseecha kwa Wele. Amiianga bamalaika boosi, lundi bubwami bwe mwikulu ne bunyali bwoosi bili aasi wewe.

Khubeela Kristo aapisibwa siibi mu mubili, enywe mwesi khukhwola mube ne kamebaasio menako sikila oyo yesi oupisibwa siibi mu mubili se amenya mu bwoni lundi tawe.
Khukhwama luno khucha ebweeni, khukhwola mu menye limenya lienywe lie chindaalo chimuramirekho mu sibala muno mu khwimeelelwa ne lilienya lia Wele ne kakhaba khulwe liliekoomba lie kumubili tawe.
Enywe mwarumikhira chindaalo chiweele chingali khukhola niko bakhamanyile Wele tawe basiima khukhola. Limenya lienywe liaba khukhola bumayaanu, liliekoomba, bumeesi, sifwaabi, bipupu bie bunywi, ne liliesaaya lie bifwaani.
Ne luno bakhamanyile Wele abo tawe, bauka nga ne mukhaambananga nabo, mu limenya lie sifwaabi elio tawe, khwako bamukhomanga enywe.
Ne bakhaboole kakabwe koosi khu Wele, owerekekha khukhalakila balamu ne bafu.
Ako niko kakakila Elomo Endayi yelwachibwa akhaba khu bafu, nio akhaba ne baaba ne bakhalakilwe mu liba liabwe lie kumubili, boole khumenya mu roho nga Wele.
Sisiakamo sie bibiindu bioosi sili embi. Khukhwola mube ne lilieliinda lundi ne bukesi, nio munyale khusaba.
Khutuuma bibiindu bioosi, siimana mwabeene ne mwabeene ne busiime bukhawa tawe, sikila busiime bufunikhanga bubwoni bukali.
Yekhoyela babasienywe mu chingo chenywe, ne mukhelung'unyakho tawe.
Buli sia mulala nga omwimeelesi omulayi owe biianwa bia Wele lukano na lukano, khukhwola abirumikhire khulwe bulayi bwe babasie.
Yesi yesi owilwacha khukhwola elwache nga burume bwa Wele; yesi yesi okholanga kia Wele khukhwola akhole ne kamaani niko Wele amuelesianga, nio mu biindu bioosi efuma yoole khuaanwa khu Wele khubirira mu Yesu Kristo oli ne luyali ne bunyali mindali na mindali. Amina.
Basaale base basiime, mukhesindukhila kamakhako kamarafu niko mulikho muchuunisibwamo, nga kali sisiindu sikeni silamwikholekhangakho tawe.
Ne kakhali ba ne busangaafu nga mulikho musaanga mu khuchuunisibwa khwa Kristo, nio mwole khuuba ne khoyo engali nga luyali lwewe lulibonekha.
Muli ne chikhabi mwaba ne mukhomwa sikila muli babeeka ba Kristo; sikila liekesia lili Roho owa Wele owe luyali, amulimo.
Ne kaaba bali yesi yesi khwinywe aukuumwa, likhaba bali sikila ali omwiiri namwe omwifwi namwe omundu omubi namwe owekhupa mu makhuwa ke babaandu babaandi tawe.
Ne kaaba bali oukuumwa sikila oli Omukristo, likhakhuambia chisoni tawe, ne kakhali elesia Wele luyali mu lisina elio.
Siise siolile sie likhalaka khurakikha, mala babaandu ba Wele bakhabe be khunyoa khukhalakilwa. Ne liaba bali likharakikhire khwifwe, aba kakhabe kariena khwaabo bakhasuubila Elomo Endayi khukhwama khu Wele tawe?
Nga liiandiko liboolanga lili, “Kaaba bali buli butinyu khu baandu balayi khuonisibwa; aba siina nono, sikhekholekhe khu booni bakhasuubila Wele tawe?”
Khwako, abo bachuunisibwa sikila lili lilienya lia Wele khu nibo, bakhoyeele khulwe bikholwa biabwe bilayi basuubile elala babeene mu mubuumbi wabwe, oliindanga lisuubisia liewe buli lwoosi.

Ese, nga omuloli we khunyaasibwa khwa Kristo lundi omusaakhulu, mulalakho khu basaangi be luyali lulifunulibwa. Nikoonjelela basaakhulu be chikanisa mwinywe, ndi
ba babaayi be kamakheese niko Wele amuelesia enywe ne khukaliinda khulwe khukhwerusia. Ne mukhaba babaayi khulwe khweyingiilila tawe, ne kakhali khola kimilimo ekio khukhwama mu liekoomba lia ng'ali khukhola.
Mukhakhaka khukhwamiia abo baali aasi we buliindi bwenywe tawe, ne kakhali khe mube silolelo khu makheese ako.
Ne nga Omwaayi Omukhulu ne aliicha, mukhanyoole ekutwa eye luyali ekhatibia buwaanga bwayo tawe.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo, enywe basoleeli baele, khukhwola murie basaakhulu. Khukhwola enywe mweesi mwefware liliefwiilisia, murichane mwabeene ne mwabeene, sikila liiandiko libolanga lili, “Wele akhiingililanga babebonia ne kakhali aananga kumwalaalo khwaabo babeboombia”
Khwako yeboombia mwabeene aasi we kumukhono kwa Wele kwe kamaani, nio amusute angaaki mu siise sisiolaana.
Mulekhele niye liliendekhelela lienywe lioosi, sikila niye amwinaanilanga.
Yeliinda lundi ba meso! Omusiku wenywe Sietani enyolanga kalaa nga etalang'i eulukhuma, eyima khulia omundu.
Mukhiingilile lukali mu lisuubila lienywe nio mu mukhaye, sikila mumanyile muli basuubili basenywe mu sibala sioosi balikho babirira mu sinyaasio sifwaanane ne sisienywe sino.
Ne enyuma we khunyaasibwa khulwe siise sikeekhe, Wele we kumwalaalo kwoosi, owamulaanga enywe khunyoola luyali lwa mindali mu Kristo, omwene akhamukhole babechufu ne khumuelesia kamaani, ne khuandalasibwa khwa ng'ali.
Bunyali bube khu niye mindali na mindali! Amina.
Khesiana buli sia mulala ne khukhwekhoyanila mu busiime bwe bukristo. Kumuleembe kukhoyeele kube ne nanywe muli ba Kristo.

Khukhwama khu Simoni Petero, omukholi no murumwa owa Yesu Kristo, khwaabo khubirira mu buluungi bwa Wele wefwe no muonia Yesu Kristo, baelesibwe lisuubila lilayi nga liliefwe:
Kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe bikhoyela khubela elala bibienywe mu bwichufu ne mu bukesi bwenywe bwa Wele ne Yesu Omwami wefwe.
Bunyali bwe buwele bwakhuele efwe buli siindu nisio khwenya nio khumenye limenya lie khuria Wele khulwe khumanya oyo owakhulaanga khusaange mu luyali ne bulayi bwewe omwene.
Mu ngila ne ng'ene akhuelesia biianwa bie bukhala bukali lundi bilayi nibio asuubisia, nio mu khubirira mu biianwa bino mwole khukhwibacha khukhwama mu liba lie liliekoomba libi mu sibala.
Sikila kano khaka nga ne munyala khutasa bulayi khu lisuubila lienywe, khu bulayi bwenywe tasakho bukesi;
khu bukesi bwenywe tasakho liliefwiilisia; khu liefwiilisia lienywe, tasakho liliekhaliilikha; khu liekhaliilikha lienywe, tasakho butakatifu,
ne khu butakatifu bwenywe, tasakho busiime bwe bukristo, ne khu busiime bwe bukristo tasakho busiime.
Bino bili bibiindu bibienyekhana, ne mwaba ne muli nabio mu bukali, bilamukhola mube bakholi balayi mu khumanya Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo.
Ne oyo yesi okhali ne bibiindu bino tawe, aba abona aembi busa lundi ali omubofu, lundi ebiliile ali aakwalaasibwa khukhwama khu bwoni bwewe bwe chindaalo chichabira.
Nio, bawandaayase, khakakho lukali khukhola khu mulaango kwa Wele ne burobosi bwewe khwinywe khuba limanya likhawao tawe. Mwaba ne mukhola murio, se mulilekha lisuubila lienywe tawe.
Mu ngila ne ng'ene, muliiebwa kumunwa khu khwingila mu bwami bwa mindali bwo Mwami lundi Omuonia wefwe Yesu Kristo.
Ne khamukhebusienge buli lwoosi bibiindu bino, akhaba ne mwabimanya khale, lundi mwabiiandalasia mu bung'ali nibwo muli nabwo luno.
Nibaasia busa ndi, buli buluungi khwise khumukhebusia enywe bibiindu bino ne siili omulamu.
Manyile ndi embi kherusiekho kumubili kwe khufwa kuno nga Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo ne amboleele abuwaanga.
Ndakhaka kamaani khubona mbo mukhebulila kamakhuwa kano buli lwosi enyuma we lifwa liase.
Se khwaloonda chingano che khukhwekhochoocha khulwe khukhola mumanye khukhwicha khwe kamaani khwo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo tawe. Ne chimoni chefwe ching'ene, khwabona bunyali bwewe.
Sikila anyoola khu Wele Paapa lukoosi ne luyali, nga kumumilo ne kwamwichakho khukhwama mu luyali lwe angaaki, ne kuboola kuli, “Yuno ali Omwana wase omukoosi, ousiimisia ese!”
Efwe fwabene khwaulila kumumilo kuno ne kwicha khukhwama mwikulu, nga ne khwaba naye khu sikulu sitakatifu.
Nio efwe khuli ne lilieyikina likali lie burume bubwelwachwa ne bang'oosi. Mulakhola bulayi mwaba ne muburekeeresia, sikila buli nga etaa ekhosia mu siilima khukhwola nga enje ne bayuukha ne buwaanga bwe eng'enieesi eya sulwe ekhosia mu miooyo kienywe.
Khutuuma bioosi, khebulila muli se alikhoo omundu yesi yesi omwene onyala aboola ke bung'oosi mu maandiko nga omwene enya tawe.
Sikila se bulikhoo burume bwe bang'oosi bubwechao busa khulwe lilienya lio mundu tawe, ne kakhali babaandu barangirirwa ne Roho Omutakatifu nga ne baloma burume bubwama khu Wele.

Nga bang'oosi be bubeeyi ne baaukha mu baandu anyumao, mu ngila ne ng'ene babekisia be bubeeyi balibonekha mwinywe, balireera mu bwikisi kamekisio kakonaka ke bubeeyi, lundi baliekaana Omwami owabasikula, nio baliereerera lilionaka lia khangu.
Kakhaba kario, bakali baliloonda chingila chabwe che sifwaabi; sikila babekisia be bubeeyi bano, babaandi baliloma kamamayaanu khu Ngila eye bung'ali.
Mu bulianga bwabwe babekisia be bubeeyi bano balinyoola bukhala khukhwama khwinywe mu khumuboolela enywe kamakhuwa ke bubeeyi. Sikhalako siabwe siamala khubisibwa khale ne se sili sia busa tawe, ne libuna liabwe se lilakhiinda tawe.
Kaaba bali Wele se alekha malaika babakhola bubwoni tawe, ne kakhali aabamwaata emakoombe, niio babowa ne kiminyololo mu siilima, baliindililanga bukhalaki.
Wele se aalekha busa sibala sie khaale tawe, ne kakhali aareera kameechi khu sibala sie babaandu bakhamanya Wele tawe, ne kakhali aaonia Noa omwilwachi we buluungi ne babaandi saba bong'ene,
lundi Wele aakhalakila chingoba cha Sodomu ne Komora aachibunia ne kumulilo, mala aachikhola sisiekesio khu kaliekholekha khu baandu bakhali ba Wele tawe.
Wele aareesia Luti, omundu omulayi, owaba ne amiinwa ne liiba lie sifwaabi lie babaandu baakhaba ne lilaka tawe.
Omundu omulayi oyo aabamenyamo, ne buli endaalo achuunisibwanga burafu nga abonanga ne khuulila bikholwa biabwe bimayaanu.
Nono, Omwami amanyile nga ne areesia babaandu bamanyile Wele khukhwama mu makhako kabwe, ne khuli nga ne abiikha bakhali baluungi tawe mu sinyaasio, khukhwola khu ndaalo eye bukhalaki,
lukali abo babaloonda liiba liabwe lie sifwaabi, lie liliekoomba lie kumubili, baleka bunyali bwa Wele.
