Babekisia be bubeeyi bano bali banyindaafu lundi be khukhwebonia ne se bekesiana buriaani khu be luyali be mu ngaaki tawe; ne kakhali, balekelesia.
Akhaba malaika, bali be kamaani lukali khukhila babekisia be bubeeyi bano, se babasitaka ne khu bakhomela ebweeni wo Mwami tawe.
Ne babaandu bano nga chisaang'i chikhali ne bukesi tawe, chichasalwa khuambwa ne khukhwirwa bakhola bibiindu busa ne bakhakanakaane tawe, bebwaakala ne khukhoma buli siindu siosi siosi nisio bakhamanyile tawe. Balibunisibwa nga chisaang'i che mundaa,
ne baliruungwa ne khuchuunisibwa ne buchuuni nibwo basasia. Busangaafu khu nibo buli khukhola siosi siosi kumuusi, sisikusia kameelu kabwe ke kumubili; bali ne chisoni ne buuri nga ne baambana nanywe khu sialwa, mu siise sikeekhe, basangalila chingila chabwe che bubeeyi!
Se beenya khubonakho siosi siosi tawe, ne bakhali bakhasi be sifwaabi; kameelu kabwe ke bubwoni se kawechanga tawe. Bayilaanga babaandu batekhele mu mureko. Kimiooyo kiabwe kiekisibwa khuba kie bulianga. Bali aasi we silaamo sia Wele!
Baukha khu ngila enuungi mala batibisie engila yabwe, baloondile engila eya bukulwa ne Balamu okhwa Beori, owasiima chirupia che khunyoola khulwe khukhola kamabi,
ne kakhali aayibilwa khulwe bubwoni bwewe. Epunda yewe yaloma ne kumumilo kwo mundu yemekha sikholwa sio mung'oosi sie siyingwa.
Babaandu bano bali nga chimoni che chisebele chichateenya, nga kamafuumbi kauchwa ne ekhuungu engali; Wele aabiikha bubwangu khu nibo mu siilima sikali.
Balomanga bibiindu bie khukhwesiima ne bie khukhwesilwasia, ne barumikhira liliekoomba lie sifwaabi lie kimibili khureka abo barakikhe khukhwilukha khukhwama khu baandu bamenya mu mabi.
Babasuubisia bulekhuule ne babeene bali nasioobi be kimiima kikionaka, sikila omundu ali nasioobi owa buli siindu sisiamwibina.
Ne baba bali babaandu belukhe khukhwama mu maani ke bubwonaki ke sibala, khubirira mu bukesi bwabwe bwo Mwami wefwe lundi Omuonia Yesu Kristo, ne lundi baambwa ne baulwa nabo, babaandu nga abo bari bali mu liiba libi esiakamo khukhila nga ne baba ekhurakikha.
Bwakhabeele bulayi lukali khu nibo khulekha khumanya engila eye buluungi tawe, khukhila khukimanya mala baukhe khukhwama khu lilaka litakatifu nilio baelesibwa.
Kakekholekha khu nibo kekesia kali chisimo chino chili cha ng'ali: “Embwa elichanga kamarusi kayo” ne “Embiichi niyo basiingile ekobolanga mala yekalangasia mu matosi lundi.”

Basiime base, ebarwa yino eli eya khabili khu muandikila enywe. Mu barwa chombi nakhakile khusiisimusia kamebaasio kamalayi mwinywe khulwe khumukhebusia bibiindu bino.
Nenya mukhebulile kamakhuwa kakalomekha khaale ne bang'oosi batakatifu, ne lilaka khukhwama khu Mwami lundi omuonia nilio mwaebwa ne barumwa benywe.
Khunyoa, khukhwola mumanye muli mu ndaalo chimaliilisi babaandu balala bakheeche ne liliekoomba liabwe babeene. Balimukholela enywe embelekeu,
ne khumureeba enywe bali; “Se alakiilisia khukhwicha? Ali waena? Ba paapa befwe bafwa, ne buli siindu sisiili busa nga ne siaba khukhwama nga sibala ne sibuumbwa!”
Balekelesia likhuwa lino, khaale Wele aaloma elomo, mala likulu ne liloba biabuumbwa. Liloba liabuumbwa khukhwama khu meechi khubirira khu meechi,
ne lundi kaba kameechi kamakali niko kakonaka sibala sie khaale.
Ne likulu ne liloba biliio luno, biabikhiilwe ne lilaka lia Wele ne liliene, nio bionakwe ne kumulilo. Bilikho bibikhwa khulwe endaalo niyo babaandu bakharia Wele tawe, balikhalakilwamo ne khubunisibwa.
Omwami se ali kalaa khukhola nisio alakiilisia nga balala ne bebaasia tawe. Ne kakhali amwekhaliilikha enywe, sikila se eenya yesi yesi khubunisibwa tawe, ne kakhali eenya boosi bekanile.
Kaaba bali bibiindu bino bioosi bilionakwa mu ngila yino, nono aba, mukhoyele khuuba babaandu lukano siina? Bulamu bwenywe bukhoyeele khuuba butakatifu lundi bubwaanwa khu Wele,
nga ne mulindiilila endaalo eya Wele ne mukhaka kamaani khukikhola khukhwicha khangu, endaalo niyo likulu liliosebwa ne khu khwonakwa, ne bie mwikulu biliyengusibwa ne kumulilo.
Ne khulindiilila khu nibio Wele alakiilisia: likulu liiya ne liloba liiya, niyo buluungi bumenyile.
Nono, basaale base, nga ne mulindiilila endaalo eyo, khaka nga munyala khuba ne kumuleembe ne naye, lundi bakwalaafu bakhali ne chisoni tawe.
Bala liliefwiilisia lio Mwami wefwe nga bubwangu nibwo alamuelesianga enywe khuonisibwamo, khuli nga wandaayefwe omusiime Paulo ne aandika khwinywe, narumikhira limanya nilio Wele amuelesia.
Kano kali niko aaloma mu barwa chewe choosi nga ne aandika. Biliio bibiindu bilala biiandalafu mu barwa chewe nibio babaandu bakhamanyile lundi bakhali baluungi se banyala khubinoosia mu bubeeyi tawe, khuli nga ne bakholanga ne kamaandiko kakaandi, khulwe khukhwereerera libuna khu beene.
Ne enywe, basaale ne munyoile khumanya kano, yeliinda mwabeene mukhecha mwekisibwa ne babaandu bakhaloonda lilaka tawe mala mukwe khukhwama mu buonelo bwenywe tawe.
Ne chiililila khukhula mu mwalaalo ne limanya lio Mwami wefwe lundi Omuonia Yesu Kristo. Niye abe ne luyali, luno nende buli lwoosi! Amina.

Nga bulamu buno ne bwabonekha, khwabubona, khwako, khubulomalomakho ne khumuboolela enywe ke bulamu bwa mindali bubwaba ne Paapa mala bwakholwa bwamanyikhana khwifwe.
Niko khwabona mala khwaulila khuboolela akhaba enywe mwesi, nio nanywe muambaane ne nafwe mu busangaanilo nibwo efwe khuli nabwo ne Paapa alala no Mwana wewe Yesu Kristo.
Khulikho Khuandika kano nio liliekhoya liefwe liichusibwe.
Burume nibwo khwaulila khukhwama khu niye mala nibwo khulikho khumuboolela enywe nibwobu: Wele ali buwaanga, ne mu niye sisiilima se simulikhomo ne atiiti ene tawe.
Nono, kaaba bali efwe khuloma khuli, khuli ne busangaanilo ne naye, mala mu siise sisiene ne sisiene, khumenya mu siilima, aba khulikho khubea mala aba se khumenyile khuloondekhana ne bung'ali tawe.
Ne khwaaba ne khumenyile mu buwaanga nga niye ne ali mu buwaanga, aba khuli ne busangaanilo khu fwabeene ne fwabeene, ne kamafuki ka Yesu, Omwana wewe, kakhukwalaasia efwe khukhwama mu buli bwoni bwoosi.
Khwaaba bali khuloma khuli se khuli ne bubwoni tawe, aba khwebea fwabeene, mala aba bung'ali se buli mwifwe tawe.
Ne khwaaba ne khweyama bubwoni bwefwe khu Wele, niye ali omusuubilwa lundi omuluungi, khwako alakhubeela efwe bubwoni bwefwe lundi akhukwalaasie khukhwama khu bikholwa biefwe biikhali biluungi tawe.
Kaaba bali khuloma khuli khu khakholakho bubwoni tawe, aba khukhola Wele khuba omubeeyi ne elomo yewe aba se eli mwifwe tawe.

Baana base, ndikho muandikila enywe, nio mukhakhola murio mwakhola bubwoni tawe; ne omundu yesi yesi aaba nakhola bubwoni, khuli no mundu okhusabila khu Paapa mu bweyaangu bwefwe, niye Yesu Kristo, oli omuluungi.
Ne Kristo omwene niye engila niyo bubwoni bwefwe bubeelwangwakho, ne se buli bubwoni bwefwe bwong'ene tawe, akhaba bubwoni bwa buli mundu yesi yesi.
Nono khwaaba ne khuria kamalaka ka Wele, aba khuli ne lisuubila khuli khumumanyile.
Babaandu balomanga bali bamumanyile mala se baria kamalaka kewe tawe bali babeeyi, lundi bung'ali se bubalimo tawe.
Abo boosi babaria elomo yewe, nibo ng'ali busiime bwabwe khu Wele bwechusiibwe. Yino niyo engila niyo khunyala khwaba ne lisuubila khuli, khuli mu buambaani ne Wele:
Yesi yesi oloma ali amenyile mu buambaani ne Wele akhoyela amenye bulayi bwene nga Kristo ne amenyanga.
Basaale base bakoosi, lilaka nilio ndikho muandikila lino se lili liya tawe, lili likhale, nilio mwaba nalio khukhwama mu khurakikha. Lilaka lino lili elomo niyo mwaulila khale.
Ne kakhaba kario, ndikho nono muandikila enywe lilaka liya, sikila bung'ali bwalio bubonekhela mu Kristo lundi akhaba mwinywe mwesi. Sikila sisiilima silikho sibira, ne buwaanga bwa ng'ali bwakhosiisie khale.
Yesi yesi oloma ali amenyanga mu buwaanga, ne khane aabiila wandaaye, asili busa mu siilima khukhwola esaa yino.
Yesi yesi owasiima wandaaye aba amenyile mu buwaanga, mala sisiindu se siliio mu niye sinyala siakila omundu okundi akhola bubwoni tawe.
Ne yesi yesi obiila wandaaye ali mu siilima, asikeendamo; mala se amanyile niio alikho acha tawe, sikila sisiilima siamubofuusie.
Baana base, ndikho muandikila enywe, sikila bubwoni bwenywe bwabeelwa khulwa Kristo.
Ba paapa, ndikho muandikila enywe, sikila mu mumanyile oyo obechangao khukhwama mu lirakikha. Baele, ndikho muandikila enywe sikila mwaula Omumayaanu chana.
Baana base, ndikho muandikila sikila enywe mumanyile Paapa. Ba paapa, ndikho muandikila enywe sikila mumanyile oyo owabao khukhwama mu lirakikha. Baele, ndikho muandikila enywe, sikila muli ne kamaani, elomo eya Wele emenyanga mwinywe mala mwaula Omumayaanu chana oyo.
Mukhasiima sibala namwe bibiindu bie sibala tawe, omundu yesi yesi osiima sibala aba se aasiima Paapa tawe.
Sikila bioosi bili mu sibala, liliekoomba lie kumubili, liliekoomba lie chimoni, ne sileka sie khukhwiboneselia khu biindu bie mu bulamu buno, bioosi bino se biaama khu Paapa tawe, bili bie sibala.
Ne sibala ne bibiindu bioosi bilimo nibio babaandu bekoomba bino bilikho bibira, ne oyo okholanga lilienya lia Wele amenya mindali.
Baana base, yino eli esaa emaliilisi! Enywe mwaboolelwa muli Omusiku owa Kristo alikho echa, ne luno basiku ba Kristo bakali bechile khale, khwako khwamanyile khuli esaa yino eli emaliilisi.
Babaandu bano baama mwifwe, ne se baba babefwe tawe, sikila baba babefwe, andi bachiililila nafwe. Ne kakhali bakhururamo nio limanyikhe abuwaanga lili boosi se bali babefwe tawe.
Ne kakhali enywe mwaakhwa lubakho ne Omutakatifu Omwene khwako enywe mwesi mumanyile bung'ali.
Nono ese ndikho muandikila enywe, ne se kali bali sikila se mumanyile bung'ali tawe, ne kakhali sikila mu bumanyile, mala mumanyile lundi muli bubeeyi se bwamanga mu bung'ali tawe.
Nono, naanu oli omubeeyi? Ali omundu yesi yesi olomanga ali, Yesu se ali Kristo tawe. Omundu nga oyo ali Omusiku owa Kristo, owikaana Paapa no Mwana.
Sikila yesi yesi owikaana Omwana aba ekaana ne Paapa yesi, ne yesi yesi ofukiilila Omwana ali ne Paapa yesi.
Nono, khu niko mwaulila khukhwama mu lirakikha karame mwinywe. Burume nibwo mwaulila khukhwama mu lirakikha ne burama mwinywe, aba nono mwesi mularama mu Mwana ne mu Paapa.
Ne lino nilio Kristo omwene akhusuubisia khu khuelesia efwe; bulamu bwa mindali.
Ndikho mbandika kano khwinywe khuloondekhana ne nabo balakhakanga khumubea enywe.
Ne kakhali enywe, Kristo amuelesia luubakho lwa Roho wewe, nga Roho yuno ne asiili mwinywe se mwenyekha omundu okundi khumwekisia tawe. Sikila Roho wewe amwekisianga buli siindu, mala niko ekisianga kali kang'ali, se buli bubeeyi tawe. Fukiilila niko Roho ekisia, nio murame mu bulala ne Kristo.
Nono, baana base, khemurame mu niye, nio nga ne aakhabonekhe efwe khwole khuba ne bunyindaafu, nio khukhekisa khu niye mu liicha liewe sikila chisoni tawe.
Mumanyile muli Kristo ali omuluungi, nono, khukhwola lundi mumanye muli buli mundu okholanga kaali kamaluungi ali Omwana owa Wele.

Basaale base bakoosi, luno khuli babaana ba Wele, ne kasiili khumanyikha abuwaanga nga khukhabe. Ne kakhali khumanyile khuli nga Kristo akhabonekhe khukhabe nga niye sikila khukhamubone nga niye ne ali.
Buli mundu oli ne lilieyikina lino mu Kristo, eliindanga aba omukwalaafu bulayi bwene nga Kristo ne ali omukwalaafu.
Yesi yesi okhola bubwoni, aba afunake lilaka lia Wele, sikila bubwoni buli khufunaka lilaka.
Mumanyile muli Kristo aabonekha nio arusieo bubwoni, ne bubwoni se bulikho mu niye tawe.
Nono omundu yesi yesi omenyanga mu buambaani ne Kristo se abelelela khukhola bubwoni tawe, ne yesi yesi obelelela khukhola bubwoni aba se amubonakho namwe amumanya tawe.
Baana base, mukhalekha omundu yesi yesi amubea tawe! Yesi yesi okhola kaali kamaluungi ali omuluungi bulayi bwene nga Kristo ne ali omuluungi.
Omundu yesi yesi obelelela khukhola bubwoni ali owa Sietani, sikila Sietani akholile bubwoni khukhwama mu lirakikha liewe. Sino nisio sifuno sisiakila Omwana owa Wele abonekha, nio onakake kimilimo kia Sietani.
Omundu yesi yesi oli Omwana owa Wele, se abelelela khukhola bubwoni tawe, sikila liiba lia Wele liliene limulimo. Ne sikila Wele ali Raraawe, se anyala abelelela khukhola bubwoni tawe.
Buno buli bubwabukhani bumanyisia akari we babaana ba Wele, ne babaana ba Sietani: omundu yesi yesi okholanga kakhali kamaluungi tawe, namwe okhasiima wandaaye tawe, aba se ali Omwana owa Wele tawe.
Khukhaba nga Kaini owaba owo Mumayaanu mala eera wandaaye Apili tawe. Siina sisiakila ne amwiira? Sikila bibiindu nibio omwene akholanga biaba bimayaanu, ne bikholwa bia wandaaye biaba biluungi.
Nono bawandaayase, kaaba bali babaandu be sibala ne bamubiila, mukhesiindukha tawe.
Khumanyile khuli khweyama lifwa, khwecha mu bulamu. Khulimanyile khurio sikila khwasiima bawandaayefwe. Yesi yesi okhasiima tawe, asiili aasi we bunyali bwe lifwa.
Yesi yesi obiila wandaaye ali omwiiri, ne enywe mumanyile muli se aliio omwiiri yesi yesi ooli ne bulamu bwa mindali mu Kristo tawe.
Efwe khumanya nga busiime mu ngila yino; Kristo aana bulamu bwewe sikila efwe. Nono, akhaba efwe khukhoyela khwaana bulamu bwefwe sikila bawandaayefwe!
Omundu aaba ne ali omuiinda mala abone wandaaye ataamba, mala alekhe khumuelesiakho siindu tawe, omuiinda oyo anyala aloma ariena ali, asiima Wele?
Baana base, busiime bwefwe bukhaba bwe munwa busa tawe; khukhwola bube busiime bwa ng'ali bubweyokesia bubwene mu bikholwa.
Ne efwe khwaaba be bung'ali, khulemanyila khu lino, mala likile khube ne bunyindaafu ebweeni wa Wele.
Kaaba bali kamebaasio kefwe ke mu miooyo kakhukhalakila, khumanyile khuli Wele ali omukali khukhila kamebaasio ke mu miooyo kiefwe mala lundi amanyile buli siindu.
Khwako, basaale base bakoosi, kaaba bali kamebaasio ke mu miooyo kiefwe se kakhukhalakila tawe, aba khuli ne bunyindaafu ebweeni wa Wele.
Efwe khunyoola siosi siosi nisio khusaba khukhwama khu niye, sikila khwaria kamalaka kewe, mala khukholanga bibiindu bimusiimisia niye.
Ne lino nilio lilaka liewe; khukhoyeele khusuubile mwisina lio Mwana wewe Yesu Kristo, mala khusiimane fwabeene ne fwabeene bulayi bwene nga ne akhulakiilisia.
Omundu yesi yesi oria kamalaka ka Wele amenya mu buambaani ne Wele mala Wele yesi amenya mu buambaani ne naye. Ne sikila Roho niye Wele aakhuelesia efwe, khumanyile khuli Wele amenyile mu buambaani ne nafwe.

Basaale base bakoosi, mukhasuubila boosi baloma bali, bali ne Roho tawe, ne kakhali bakhake nio mumanye roho niye bali naye ne aama khu Wele. Sikila bang'oosi be bubeeyi bakali bachile buli abuundu.
Ne Roho ne ali owa Wele, munyala mwamanya mu ngila yino: Omundu yesi yesi ofukiilila ali Yesu Kristo echa nga omundu, ali ne Roho owaama khu Wele.
Ne buli roho okhafukiilila Kristo tawe, se ali roho khukhwama khu Wele tawe. Ali roho ooyingania Kristo niye mwaulila bali alikho eecha, mala luno ali khale mu sibala.
Ne enywe baana base, muli ba Wele, mala mwaula bang'oosi be bubeeyi abo sikila ooli mwinywe ali omukali khukhila oyo ooli mu sibala.
Bang'oosi be bubeeyi abo balomaloma kamakhuwa ke sibala, mala sibala sibarekeeresia nibo sikila bali be sibala.
Ne efwe khuli ba Wele. Omundu yesi yesi omanyile Wele akhurekeeresia efwe; yesi yesi okhali owa Wele tawe, se akhurekeeresia efwe tawe. Nono lino nilio likhola khwabukhasia Roho owe bung'ali ne roho owe bubeeyi.
Basaale bakoosi, kha khusiimane sikila busiime bwaama khu Wele. Yesi yesi osiima ali Omwana owa Wele lundi amanyile Wele.
Yesi yesi okhasiima tawe, se amanyile Wele tawe, sikila Wele ali busiime.
Ne Wele eekesia busiime bwewe khwifwe, khulwe khuruma Omwana wewe omuteelwa mu sibala nio efwe khwole khuba ne bulamu khubirira mu niye.
Busiime nibwo buno: se kali bali efwe khwasiima Wele tawe, ne kakhali niye akhusiima efwe mala aaruma Omwana wewe khuba engila niyo efwe khwekanilamo bubwoni bwefwe.
Bakoosi, kaaba bali Wele akhusiima efwe ari, nono fwesi khukhoya khusiimane.
Se aliio omundu owabona Wele tawe, ne khwaaba ne khusiimana, aba Wele amenyile mwifwe, ne lundi busiime bwewe buli bubwichufu mwifwe.
Sikila kano khuli nasuubi khuli khumenyile mu niye, ne naye amenyile mwifwe, sikila akhuelesia Roho wewe.
Efwe khwabona mala khuboolela babaandi khuli Paapa aruma Omwana wewe khuba Omuonia we sibala.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba nalomanga ali Yesu ali Omwana owa Wele, Wele amenyile mu niye ne naye amenyile mu Wele.
Khwako efwe khumanyile lundi khusuubila busiime nibwo Wele ali nabwo khwifwe.
Wele ali busiime, ne omundu yesi yesi omenya mu busiime amenyanga mu Wele ne Wele amenyanga mu niye.
Busiime bukholwa khuba bubwichufu mwifwe nio khwole khuba ne bunyindaafu khu Ndaalo eye Likhalakilwa; mala khuliba ne bunyindaafu sikila limenya liefwe mu sibala sino lili bulayi bweene nga lia Kristo.
Mu busiime, buuri mbamo; ne busiime bubwichufu burusiangao buuri bwoosi. Khwako, busiime bukhechusibwa mu mundu oli omuri tawe, sikila buuri buli khulwe siiukuumo.
Khusiima sikila Wele anyoa akhusiima efwe.
Omundu yesi yesi aaba nalomanga ali asiima Wele, mala abiila wandaaye, ali omubeeyi. Sikila nakhasiima wandaaye niye abonanga tawe, se anyala asiima Wele niye akhabonakho tawe.
Lilaka nilio Kristo akhuelesia efwe lili lino: Omundu yesi yesi owasiima Wele khukhwola asiime wandaaye yesi.

Omundu yesi yesi osuubila ali Yesu ali Kristo, aba ali Omwana owa Wele, ne yesi yesi osiima Paapa asiimanga ne Omwana wewe yesi.
Lino nilio khumanyilakho ne khwasiima babaana ba Wele, khuli khusiima Wele ne khuria kamalaka kewe.
Sikila busiime bwefwe khu Wele nibwo buno, efwe khurie kamalaka kewe. Ne kamalaka kewe se kali kamaandalafu khwifwe tawe,
sikila buli Omwana owa Wele anyala khukhila ke sibala. Ne ngila eye khukhila ke sibala eli lisuubila liefwe.
Naanu onyala khukhila ke sibala? Ali omundu osuubila ali Yesu ali Omwana owa Wele.
Yesu Kristo niye yeng'ene owecha ne kameechi ke libatiisia liewe ne kamafuki ke lifwa liewe. Se echa ne kameechi kong'ene tawe, echa nabio bioombi, kameechi ne kamafuki. Ne Roho omwene aboola ali kano kali ng'ali, sikila Roho ali bung'ali.
Baloli baliio bataru:
Roho, kameechi ne kamafuki; mala bioosi bitaru biboola kamafwaanane.
Efwe khusuubilanga buloli bwe babaandu, ne kakhali buloli bwa Wele buli ne kamaani lukali, mala niye aanile buloli buno khu Mwana wewe.
Khwako omundu yesi yesi osuubila mu Mwana owa Wele ali ne buloli buno mu mwoyo kwewe, ne omundu yesi yesi okhasuubila Wele tawe, akhola Wele khuba omubeeyi, sikila se asuubila niko Wele aaloma khu Mwana wewe tawe.
Buloli nibwo buno: Wele akhuelesia efwe bulamu bwa mindali, mala bulamu buno bwakukha mu Mwana wewe.
Omundu yesi yesi oli no Mwana ali ne bulamu buno, yesi yesi okhali no Mwana owa Wele se ali ne bulamu tawe.
Ese ndikho mbandika kano khwinywe mu mwasuubila mu Mwana owa Wele nio mwole khumanya muli, muli ne bulamu bwa mindali.
Khuli ne bunyindaafu ebweeni wa Wele, sikila khuli nang'ali khuli akhuulilanga ne khumusaba sisiindu siosi siosi khuloondekhana ne lilienya liewe.
Kaaba bali khumanyile khuli mu koosi niko khumusabanga akhuulilanga, nono aba khumanya khuli koosi niko khumusabile, khulanyoola.
Kaaba bali obona wandaayo ne akhola bubwoni bukhamuyila mu lifwa tawe, okhoyela wasaba Wele, olamuelesia bulamu. Lino lili khwaabo nibo bubwoni bwabwe bukhareeranga lifwa tawe. Ne bubwoni buliio bureera lifwa, ne ese se ndikho mboola ndi mukhoyeele musabe Wele khulwe bubwenobwo tawe.
Buli sikholwa sibi siosi siosi buli bubwoni, ne bubwoni buliio bukhayila omundu mu lifwa tawe.
Efwe khumanyile khuli se aliio omwana owa Wele obelelelanga khukhola bubwoni tawe, sikila Yesu Omwana owa Wele amuliindanga, nio Omumayaanu alekhe khumutiilakho tawe.
Khumanyile khuli efwe khuli ba Wele akhaba sibala sioosi ne sili aasi we bubwami bwo Mumayaanu.
Khumanyile khuli Omwana owa Wele echa mala akhuelesia efwe limanya, nio khumanye Wele wa ng'ali. Khumenyile mu buambaani ne Wele wa ng'ali ne mu buambaani no Mwana wewe Yesu Kristo. Yuno ali Wele wa ng'ali, ne buno buli bulamu bwa mindali.
Baana base, yeliinda mwabene khukhwama khu wele be bubeeyi!

Ese omwimeelesi — khu mukhaaye omukoosi ne babaana bewe, nibo nasiima mu bung'ali. Ne se ndi seng'ene tawe, ne naabo boosi bamanyile bung'ali bamusiima enywe,
sikila bung'ali buli mwifwe mala bulaba nafwe mindali.
Lekha Paapa Wele ne Yesu Kristo, oli Omwana owa Paapa, bakhuelesie efwe kumwalaalo ne siisa, ne kumuleembe, bibe bibiefwe mu bung'ali ne mu busiime.
Naba omusangaafu lukali khunyoola balala khu baana bowo ne bamenyile mu bung'ali nga Paapa ne akhulakiilisia.
Ne luno, omukhaaye khusaba ewe ndi, lekha fwesi khusiimane buli mulala nowasie. Se ndikho khuandikila lilaka liya tawe; lili lilaka nilio khwaba nalio khukhwama khale.
Busiime buli bali khumenye mu khuloonda kamalaka ka Wele. Lilaka nga mwesi ne mwaulila khukhwama mu khurakikha, lili bali mweesi khukhwola mumenye mu busiime.
Babeeyi bakali bamalile khucha mu sibala siosi, babaandu bakhafukiilila bali Yesu Kristo echa nga omundu tawe. Omundu nga oyo ario ali omubeeyi lundi Omusiku owa Kristo.
Mube meso, nio mulekhe khutibia nisio mwakholela kimilimo, ne mulanyoola kumuruuru kwenywe mu bwichufu.
Omundu yesi yesi obiriirira kamekisio ka Kristo ne khulekha khu kamenyamo tawe, se ali ne Wele tawe. Ne oyo omenya mu mekisio ka Kristo aba ali ne Paapa no Mwana boombi.
Nono, omundu yesi yesi ne echa okhekisia liliekisia lino tawe, mukhamwakaanila mu chingo chenywe tawe, namwe mwamukheesia tawe.
Sikila yesi yesi owenyela omundu lukano luno kumuleembe, aba yesi afukiilisiana naye mu mamayaanu niko omundu oyo akholanga.
Ndi ne kamakali ke khu muboolela, ne se nyala khu kaboolela khu karatasi ne bubwino tawe; ne kakhali, ndola ndi ndamukeniia enywe nio ndomalome nanywe moni na moni, nio khusangaale mu bwichufu.
Babaana bo mukhaana wenywe omukoosi bamurumiire enywe kimileembe kiabwe.

Omusaale wase omukoosi, khusabila ndi buli siindu sibe silayi khwiwe lundi obe omulamu. Manyile ndi oli omulamu mu roho.
Nasangaala lukali nga balala khu bawandaayefwe bakristo ne boola mala bamboolela nga ne oli omusuubilwa khu bung'ali, nga buli lwoosi nomenyanga mu bung'ali.
Se siliio sisisiimisia lukali khukhila khuulila bali babaana base bamenyile mu bung'ali tawe.
Omusaale wase omukoosi oli omusuubilwa khu milimo nikio okholelanga bakristo basio, akhaba ne bali bakeni.
Baboolela e kanisa kamakhuwa ke busiime bwowo. Nosiima bayeete bachiililile ne lukeendo lwabwe mu ngila ekhasiimisie Wele.
Sikila barakikha lukeendo lwabwe khu milimo kia Kristo, ne bakhafukiililakho buyeeti bwosi bwosi khukhwama khu baandu bakhasuubila tawe.
Efwe bakristo nono, khukhwola khuyeete babaandu bano, nio khusaange mu milimo kiabwe khulwe bung'ali.
Naandike ebarwa enyiimbi khu kanisa; ne Tioturefe, owenyanga khuba omwimeelesi wabwe, mala se eenya khurekeeresia niko mboola tawe.
Nga ne ndecha, ndalomaloma koosi niko akholile, kamabi niko alomaloma khwifwe ne bubeeyi nibwo aboolanga! Ne se kali ako kong'ene tawe; se akaanilanga bawandaayefwe Bakristo nga ne bechanga tawe, ne lundi akhingiililanga abo babenyanga khubakaanila, ne khukhaka khubaoona barure mu kanisa!
Musaale wase omukoosi, okhaloonda kamabi tawe, ne kakhali loonda kamalayi. Yesi yesi okhola kamalayi aba ali owa Wele; yesi yesi okhola kamabi aba akhaabonakho Wele tawe.
Buli mundu alomanga khu bulayi bwa Demetirio; bung'ali bubwene bulomanga bulayi bwewe. Ne sesi ndasakho khuboola buloli bwewe, ne ewe omanyile oli buloli bwase buli bwa ng'ali.
Ndi ne kamakali khukhuboolela, ne kakhali se nenya khukhola ndio ne kalamu ne bubwino tawe.
Ndi suubi khu khubona bwangu, nio khulomalome moni na moni.
Kumuleembe kube nawe.
Basaale bowo boosi bakhurumire ewe kimileembe. Kheesia basaale befwe boosi moni na moni.

Khwaabo nibo Wele aalanga, bamenyile mu busiime bwa Paapa Wele ne mu buliindi bwa Yesu Kristo:
Nyoola siisa sia Wele, kumuleembe ne busiime mu bwichufu.
Basaale base bakoosi, nakholanga kamaani khumuandikila kamakhuwa ke buonia nibwo khuli nabwo, nga ne neulila ndi nenyekha mbaandike ebarwa khangu khumutinyilisia enywe mu khupanila lisuubila nilio Wele aelesia khale babaandu bewe.
Sikila babaandu balala bakhamanyile Wele tawe, baakhwichilemo mu bwikisi, babaandu bayuusia elomo eye kumwalaalo kwa Wele wefwe nio bachiililile khukhola ke sifwaabi ne khuloba Yesu Kristo, oli yeng'ene Omwami lundi Wele wefwe. Kamaandiko kang'oola khaale siiukuumo nisio bakhanyoole.
Khebulila malaika bakhanyalikha ne bunyali bwabwe bwa ng'ali tawe, ne kakhali baalekha bumenyo bwabwe. Baabowa kiminyololo kia mindali na mindali aasi mu siilima, niio Wele aababiikha khukhwola khu Ndaalo emboofu niyo bakhakhalakilwekho.
Khebulila Sodomu ne Komora, ne chingoba che aembi, che babaandu babakhola nga malaika abo bakhola ne khukhwiyingisia mu bukhobani ne sifwaabi. Banyoola siiukuumo sie kumulilo kwa mindali nga sisiekesio sia abuwaanga khu boosi.
Mu ngila ng'ene eyo, babaandu bano bali ne kamalola kabakhola ne bakhola bubwoni mu mibili kiabwe; balekelesia bunyali bwa Wele ne khukhoma bibuumbe bie luyali bili angaaki.
Akhaba malaika omukhulu Mikaili se akhola kano tawe. Mukhulomaloma khwewe ne Sietani, nga bayinganilanga khu mubili kwa Musa, Mikaili se aakhalakila Sietani khu mukhoma tawe, ne kakhali aloma ali, “Wele omwene akhurafwire!”
Ne kakhali babaandu bano beela mu khukhoma sisiindu siosi siosi nisio bakhamanyile tawe; ne bibiindu nibio bamanyile mu ngila eye kumwiima, nga eye chisaang'i che mundaa, bino nibio bibiindu bibieene bibabunia.
Bali ne silaamo! Baloondile engila niyo Kaini aabirirakho. Chirupia chakilile beyingiisie mu mabi niko Balamu aakhola. Bakholile sileka nga Kora ne aakhola mala bosi babunile nga niye.
Ne luyoka lwabwe bukhalimo chisoni tawe, bali nga kamarokondo ke buchafu mu naikara chenywe che kumuleembe. Beyibaasia busa babeene lundi bali nga kamafuumbi niko ekhuungu euucha ne se kareera efula tawe. Bali nga kimirongooro kikhaama kamatuunda akhaba mu siise siakio tawe. Bali nga kimirongooro kikiakhuulwa ne kimili kiakio lundi bafwiile sio.
Bali nga bibuli bie kamaani khu nyanja, ne bikholwa biabwe bie chisoni bibonekha nga lifuro. Bali nga ching'enieesi chiyiiya-yiiya, nicho Wele aabiikhila abuundu we sisiilima siboofu po!
khukhalakila babaandu boosi, ne khuukuuma boosi khulwe bikholwa biikhali bie buwele nibio bakhola lundi khulwe kamakhuwa kamabi koosi niko babaandu bakhamanyile Wele tawe balomaloma khuloondekhana naye!”
Babaandu bano busiele belung'unya ne khubiiya babaandi. Baloonda liliekoomba liabwe libi embakha yabwe eye khukhwebonia ne khukhwalisia lulimi khu baandi, nio banyoole nisio benya.
Ne kakhali enywe, basaale base khebulila niko mwaboolelwa khaale ne barumwa bo Mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo.
Bamuboolela enywe bali, “Nga chindaalo chimaliilisi ne chiliola, babaandu baliicha bali mukholela enywe sienya meno, babaandu baloonda liliekoomba liabwe likhali lie buwele tawe.”
Bano nibo babaandu bareera liliabukhana, baloonda busa liliekoomba lie kimibili kiabwe, bakhali ne Roho tawe.
Ne kakhali enywe, basaale base, khemuchiililile khukhwiyombakha mu lisuubila litakatifu lukali. Khemusabile mu bunyali bwa Roho Omutakatifu,
lundi mwebikhe mu busiime bwa Wele, nga ne mu silindiilila Omwami wefwe Yesu Kristo mu siisa siewe amuelesie enywe bulamu bwa mindali.
Kholela siisa abo bakhali nasuubi mwisuubila tawe,
yulakho balala, mubaonie khukhwama mu mulilo; ne khu baandi bakhoolele siisa ne buuri, ne kakhali biila chingubo chabwe chilikho kamarokondo ke liliekoomba liabwe lie bubwoni.
Khuyo onyala khumuliinda enywe nio mukhakwa tawe ne khumureera enywe mu buluungi ne khukhwikhoyela ebweeni we khubao khwewe khwe luyali
khu Wele yeng'ene Omuonia wefwe, abe owe luyali, Omukali, Omunyali Owa Bioosi ne bunyali khubirira mu mwami wefwe Yesu Kristo khukhwama khaale ne naluno, nende buli lwoosi. Amina.

Sitabu sino sili kamakhuwa ke bibiindu nibio Yesu Kristo afuunula. Wele aamuelesia niye lifunulwa lino nio naye ekesie bakholi bewe kamakhuwa kaali siimbi khukhwekholekha, Kristo aakhola bibiindu bino biamanyikha khu mukholi wewe Yoana khulwe khumurumira malaika,
mala Yoana aaboolile bioosi nibio aabona. Lino nilio liboola liewe khuloondekhana ne burume bubwama khu Wele ne bung'ali bubwafuunulwa ne Yesu Kristo.
Omundu osoma sitabu sino aabiitwa chikhabi, lundi barekeeresianga kamakhuwa ke bung'oosi bwe burume buno, mala baria kakaandikwa mu sitabu sino babiitwa chikhabi! Sikila siise sie bibiindu bino khukhwekholekha sili siimbi.
Kumwalaalo ne kumuleembe khukhwama khu Wele omenyile mindali, owabao lundi okheeche, khukhwama khu roho saba baali ebweeni we Ndebe yewe eye bubwami,
lundi khukhwama khu Yesu Kristo omuloli omusuubilwa, owe khunyoa mukhulamusibwa khukhwama mu bafu lundi ooli omuruki owe babaami be sibala bibe nanywe.
Aakhusiima efwe, ne khulwe lifwa lie khukhwerusia aakhuonia efwe khukhwama mu bwoni bwefwe;
mala aakhukhola efwe khuba basaayi khukhalabanila Wele wewe ooli Paapa wewe. Luyali ne bunyali bibe khu Yesu Kristo mindali na mindali! Amina.
Ese Yoana, wandaayenywe, lundi ooli omuloondi wa Yesu, ese ndi omusaangi wasienywe mu lifwiilisia khulwe khukhwekhaliilikhila siibi sisiichanga khwaabo bali be Bubwami bwewe. Namwaatwa khu sibala sisiakarwa ne kameechi sia Patimo, sikila naba nelwachile elomo eya Wele, ne bung'ali nibwo Yesu afunula.
Khu ndaalo yo Mwami naba mu Roho, mala naulila kumumilo kwe angaaki kukwauliilikha nga ekhoombi, ne kulomaloma enyuma wase.
Kwaloma kuli, “Aandika mu sitabu niko olikho obona mala oyile mu chikanisa saba mu ngoba chino: Efeso, Simina, Perikamo, Siatira, Sarite, Filatelefia ne Laotikia.”
Nekhebukha mbone olikho oolomaloma khwise, mala nabona biteetwe bie chitaa saba bie sahabu,
ne akari wabio aabao mulala ofwaana nga Omwana wo mundu afwarire ekaanjo endeeyi eyoola aasi khu bikhandakilo biewe, lundi aaba eboyile kumusiipi kwe sahabu khu sifuba siewe.
Lichuune liewe liaba liwaanga chwe nga bufuumbo buwaanga, ne chimoni chewe chaba nga chinjaso che kumulilo;
bikele biewe biang'enang'ena nga kumukasa nikwo boselia mu mulilo baapilila ne khumiuusia, ne kumumilo kwewe kwauliilikha nga kameechi ke mwikhupo ne kaoloola.
Asuta angaaki ching'enieesi saba mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha, ne mbalu enjoki chimbeka chombi yama mukhanwa mwewe. Bubweeni bwewe bwakhosia nga enyanga.
Nga namubona, nakwa mu bikele biewe nga omufu. Andaakho kumukhono kwewe kumuseecha mala amboolela ali, “Okharia tawe! Ese ndi owe khunyoa lundi omumaliilisi.
Ese ndi omulamu! Naba nafwa, ne luno ndi omulamu mindali na mindali. Ese ndi ne bunyali khu lifwa ne khu sibala sie bafu.
Nono, andika bibiindu nibio olikho obona, alala ne bibiindu biliio luno ne bilikho bicha khwikholekha.
Sino sili sifuno sisiakukhuulilwa sie ching'enieesi saba nicho oboone mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha, ne biteetwe saba bie sahabu bie chitaa: ching'enieesi saba, chili malaika be chikanisa saba, ne biteetwe saba bili chikanisa saba.

“Khu malaika ooli mu kanisa eye Efeso andika oli:
“Burume buno bwama khuyo owasuta ching'enieesi saba mu mukhono kwewe kumuseecha, mala okeendanga akari we biteetwe bie sahabu bie chitaa.
Manyile niko okholile; manyile nga okholile ne kamaani, ne liliefwiilisia liowo. Manyile ndi sonyala wekhaliilikha babaandu bamayaanu tawe, lundi wakhaka abo balomanga bali, bali barumwa khane se bali barumwa tawe, lundi wamanyile oli bali babeeyi.
Ewe oli owefwiilisia, wapisibwa siibi sikila ese, ne se wafwiile kumwoyo tawe.
Ne kakhali lino nilio khwikiicha; se wasiimile ese nga waba ne wasiima mu khunyoa tawe.
Yibaasia niio wakwila! Yikanila mala olekhe bubwoni bwowo okhole niko wakholanga mu khunyoa. Kaaba nokhekanila bubwoni bwowo tawe, ndeecha mala ndusieo siteetwe sie taa siowo abuundu wasio.
Ne kano niko kamalayi niko oli nako. Wabiyila niko Banikolayi bakholanga, nga seesi nakabiyila.
“Khwaabo balaula ndabafukiilila khulia kamatuunda ke kumurongooro kwe bulamu kuli mu Paratiso eya Wele.
“Burume buno bwama khuyo oli owe khunyoa lundi owe khumaliilisia, owafwa mala alamukha.
Ese manyile butinyu bwowo ese manyile ndi, oli omutaambi ne khane ng'ali oli omuiinda! Ese manyile bibiindu bimayaanu biboolwa khwiwe ne naabo babelangaanga bali, bali Bayuda khane tawe, bali sipupu sia Sietani!
Okharia siosi siosi nisio oli siimbi khubiriramo tawe. Rekeeresia! Sietani alamura mwikhako khulwe khumwaata balala khwinywe mu siboe, ne butinyu bwowo bulamala chindaalo ekhumi. Ba basuubilwa khwise, khukhwola khufwa mala ndamuelesia ekuutwa eye bulamu.
“Abo baliiula se banyoola lifwa lie khabili tawe.
“Khu malaika oli mu kanisa eye Perikamo andika oli:
“Burume buno bwama khu mulala oli ne mbalu enjoki chimbeka chombi.
Ese manyile niio ewe wamenya, abwenao niio Sietani ali ne ndebe yewe eye bubwami. Ewe oli owa ng'ali khwise, ne se wanjukha lisuubila liowo mwise tawe, akhaba mu ndaalo nicho Andipa omuloli wase omusuubilwa eererwa, abuundu niio Sietani amenya.
Ne kakhali biliio bibiindu bikeekhe nibio ese khwikiichilakho ewe, babaandu balala bali akari wenywe baloondanga kamekisio ka Balamu, owekisia Balaki nga anyala ayila babaandu ba Isiraeli mu bwoni khulwe khubaombelesia balie biakhulia biaanibwe khu bifwaani ne khukhola sifwaabi.
Mu ngila ng'eneyo ne ng'ene muli ne babaandu akari wenywe baloondanga kamekisio ke Banikolayi.
Nono yikanila mulekhe bubwoni bwenywe! Mwaba ne mukhakhola murio tawe, ndecha khangu mala ndumikhire embalu eyaama mukhanwa mwase khu khuupana ne babaandu abo.
“Khwaabo baula ndabaelesia emana eyakukhuulilwa. Lundi ndaelesia buli mundu khu nibo libaale liwaanga liliaandikwakho lisina liya nilio omundu yesi yesi akhamanyilekho tawe, nakhali oyo olinyoola yeng'ene.
“Khu malaika ooli mu kanisa eye Siatira andika oli:
“Burume buno bwama khu Mwana wa Wele; owe chimoni nga lumemu lwe kumulilo. Owe bikele bing'enang'ena nga kumukasa nikwo bosiisie.
Ese manyile niko okholanga. Manyile busiime bwowo, lisuubila liowo, bukhalabani bwowo, ne liliefwiilisia liowo. Ese manyile ndi luno olakholanga kamakali khukhila mu khunyoa.
Ne lino nilio khwikiichilakho ewe: wikhaliilikha omukhasi Yesebeli, owilangaanga ali, omurumwa owa Wele. Khulwe kamekisio kewe atiimia bakholi baase, bakhola sifwaabi ne khulia biakhulia biianibwe khu bifwaani.
Namuelesia siise sie khukhwikanila bubwoni bwewe, ne se eenya khulekha sifwaabi tawe.
Khwako ndamumwaata khu sitanda, nisio niye nende abo ba baeyananga naye balichuunwa lukali. Luno ndakhola ndio baaba ne bakhekanila bibiindu biibi nibio bakholanga naye tawe.
Lundi ndeera baloondi bewe, nio chikanisa choosi chimanye chili ese niye omanyile kamebaasio kali mu buli mundu ne lilienya liewe. Ndaruunga buli mundu khwinywe khuloondekhana nende niko akholile.
“Ne kakhali muramire mu Siatira mweesi mu khaloonda kamekisio kamamayaanu kano tawe; se mweyika niko babaandi balangaanga bali, ke simoonyo sie mukari sia Sietani tawe. Ese muboolela enywe ndi se ndamutiuukha enywe busiro bubuundi tawe.
Ne nabwila ndikobola, khukhwola mukhayile khu nisio muli nasio.
Khuyo oula, achiililile khukhola niko ese nenya khukhwola khu siakamo ndamuelesia bunyali bufwaanana nende nibwo nanyoola khukhwama khu Paapa. Ndamuelesia bunyali khu kholo choosi,
alabaamiia ne siimbo eye sichuuma, ne khu baaraakakamo nga chinyuungu.
Lundi ndamuelesia niye eng'enieesi eya sulwe.
“Oyo oli ne kamaru, arekeeresie niko Roho aboolela chikanisa!

“Khu malaika oli mu kanisa mu Sarite andika oli:
“Burume buno bwama khu mulala oli ne roho saba ba Wele ne ching'enieesi saba. Ese manyile niko olikho okhola; manyile ndi oli ne fuma eye khuba omulamu; ne kakhali wafwa!
Yinyokha! Waramire ne kamaani matiiti, koosi kali siimbi khuwa. Khwako khaka obe ne kamaani. Naboone ndi niko olakholanga se kali kamechufu ebweeni wa Wele tawe.
Nono khebulila niko wekisibwa nende niko waulila; karie mala wekanile, ndeecha nga omwifwi; ne se okhamanye esaa niyo khechelekho tawe.
Ne kakhali bakeekhe khwinywe mu Sarite omwo mumwaliinda chingubo chenywe mu bumiliiu. Mulakeenda nase, mwefwarire chiwaanga, sikila mwolaana khukhola murio.
Abo baula balafwarwa mu waanga; mala se ndarusia kamasina kabwe mu sitabu sie balamu tawe. Ebweeni wa Paapa ne bweni wa malaika bewe ndabeyama abuwaanga ndi bano bali babaase.
“Oyo oli ne kamaru, arekeeresie niko Roho aboolela chikanisa!
“Burume buno bwama khuyo ooli omutakatifu lundi owa ng'ali. Ali ne lufunguo lulwaba lwa Daudi; ne ekula kumuliango se aliio onyala wekala tawe, ne nga akwikala, se aliio onyala aakwikula tawe.
Ese manyile niko okholanga, manyile ndi oli ne kamaani matiiti, waloonda kamekisio kase mala waaba omusuubilwa khwise. Nakhwikulila kumuliango nikwo omundu akhanyala ekala tawe.
Rekeeresia! Sipupu sia Sietani esio, babeeyi balomanga bali nibo Bayuda ne se bali Bayuda tawe, ndabakhola beche basikame mu bikele biowo. Balamanya bali ese nakhusiima.
Sikila waliinda lilaka liase ne khukhwekhaliilikha, sesi ndakhuliinda bulayi mu saa eye kamakhako kalikho kakeecha khu sibala sioosi khukhaka babaandu be khu sibala.
Ese ndikho nicha khangu. Liinda bulayi nisio oli nasio nio omundu akhakhola ario akhunuula kumuruuru kwowo kwe liiula tawe.
Ndakhola oyo oula abe enjeko mu Lukaangu lwa Wele wase, mala se aliruramo tawe. Ndamuandikakho lisina lia Wele wase, ne lisina lie lukoba lwa Wele wase, Yerusalemu luya, lukheekhe aasi khukhwama mwikulu wa Wele wase. Lundi ndamuandikakho lisina liase liiya.
“Oyo ooli ne kamaru, arekeeresie niko Roho aboolela chikanisa!
“Burume buno bwama khu Amina; omusuubilwa lundi omuloli owa ng'ali, lirakikha lia bioosi nibio Wele abuumba.
Ese manyile niko wakholile; namanya ndi se oli omunyifu namwe omubile tawe. Ese nenya ndi, andi oli silala khu bino.
Ne sikila oli busa siyambola, se oli omubile namwe omunyifu tawe, ndikho nja khu khufuucha orure mukhanwa mwase!
Ewe olomanga oli, ‘Ese ndi omuiinda, lundi ndi busa bulayi, ndi na buli siindu.’ Ne kakhali se wamanyile nga ne oli owe ngunyi lundi owe bubeeleli tawe! Ewe oli omutaambi, oli sichula, lundi omubofu.
Khwako khusaba okule esahabu khukhwama khwise esahabu engwalaafu nio oindiaale. Lundi kula chingubo chiwaanga wifware mala webiimbe sichula siowo. Lundi okule kamafura weakhe chimoni nio obone.
Ese ndarafwiranga ne khuukuuma abo boosi nibo nasiima. Nono ba ne silukuluku mala wekanile bubwoni bwowo.
Rekeeresia! Ese nemile amuliango ndikhokhong'oonda, omundu yesi yesi oulila kumumilo kwase mala ekula kumuliango, ndengila munju mwewe mala ndie naye.
Oyo oula, ndamuelesia niye bung'ali bwe khukhwikhala nase khu Ndebe yase eye bubwami, bulayi bwene nga sesi ne naula mala luno nekhaale alala ne Paapa wase khu Ndebe yewe eye bubwami.
“Oyo, ooli ne kamaru; arekeeresie niko Roho aboolela chikanisa.”

Enyuma wa kano naba ne kamalola kakaandi mala nabona kumuliango kuuli khwasie mwikulu. Nio kumumilo kwauliilikha nga ekhoombi nikwo abeele naba naulilakho khale, kwalomaloma nase, ne kuloma kuli, “Niina wiche ano mala ndakhwekesia niko khukhwola kakholekhe enyuma wa kano”
Abwenao Roho aanjichulamo. Mwikulu omwo Endebe eye bubwami yabaamo, ne omundu aba aakikhaalekho,
mumoni mwewe mung'enang'ena nga kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki kamawaanga, kamelamela ne kamarandaafu; ne lufutu lwaba lwakarire Endebe yoosi, lukoondo lwe lubookha.
Chindebe che bubwami chichiindi kamakhumi kabili na chine chabotookhelela Endebe eye bubwami, ne basaakhulu kamakhumi kabili na bane baba bachiikhaalekho, befwarire chingubo chiwaanga ne chikuutwa che sahabu.
Khuburukhaka khwe lueni, likukuma ne libalukhaka lie fula biama mu Ndebe eye bubwami. Ebweeni we Ndebe eye bubwami, chinjaso saba chaba chikhosia, chino chaba roho saba ba Wele.
Lundi ebweeni we Ndebe eye bubwami siabao sisiafwaana nga enyanja eye sikioo sikwalaafu sibonekha nga epirauli.
Bibuumbe bilamu bine bibiechula chimoni ebweeni nende nyuma biabotookhelela Endebe eye bubwami.
Sie khunyoa siafwaana nga etalang'i, sie khabili siafwaana nga euunwa, sie khataru siafwaana mumoni nga omundu, ne sie khane siafwaana nga efuruusi epuruukhe.
Buli silala khu bibuumbe bie bulamu bine chana, siaba ne chindaa sita; mala siechulakho chimoni mukari ne nje. Kumuusi ne siilo, se bilekhanga khukhwimba bili:
“Omutakatifu, Omutakatifu, Omutakatifu
ali Omwami Wele Omunyali Owa Bioosi;
Owabao, oliio, lundi oolikho owiicha.”
Bibuumbe bilamu bine chana ebio biemba chinyimbo che luyali, ne lukoosi ne khu khuupila orio oyo owikhaale khu Ndebe eye Bubwami, omenyile mindali na mindali. Nga biakholanga birio,
basaakhulu kamakhumi kabili na bane abo basikama ebweeni woyo owikhaale khu Ndebe eye bubwami, mala basaaya oyo omenyile mindali na mindali. Bamwaata aasi chikuutwa chabwe che bubwami ebweeni we Ndebe eye bubwami mala bemba bali:
“Omwami wefwe lundi Wele wefwe!
Ewe wolaana oeebwe luyali, lukoosi ne bunyali,
Sikila ewe wabuumba bibiindu bioosi,
ne khulwe lilienya liowo biaebwa limenya ne bulamu.”

Lundi nabona malaika owe Bunyali bukali lukali, aaloma ne kumumilo kumuboofu, ali, “Naanu owolaana khurusiakho kimiiuri kino mala abambule sitabu sino?”
Ne se abao na mulala yeng'ene mwikulu namwe khu sibala namwe aasi we sibala onyala abambula sitabu chana mala alolemo tawe.
Nio nalila lukali sikila se abao na mulala owolaana khubambula sitabu chana, namwe aasilolemo tawe.
Nio, mulala khu basaakhulu abo amboolela ali, “Okhalila tawe. Lola! Etalang'i khukhwama mu kholo eya Yuda, Omukali, owe lisaaye lia Daudi, abeele omukhili mwiie, ne anyala arusiakho kimiiuri saba mala abambula sitabu esio.”
Limeeme liaacha mala liabukula sitabu chana khukhwama mu mukhono kumuseecha kwoyo owikhalanga khu Ndebe eye Bubwami.
Nga ne liakhola lirio bibuumbe bilamu bine chana ne basaakhulu kamakhumi kabili na bane chana bakwa aasi ebweeni we Limeeme. Buli sia mulala aba ne lituungu ne sibuumba sie sahabu siechuule bimuli bie khukhwosia biiunya kumuuya kumulayi, bimuli bino bili lisaba lie babaandu ba Wele.
Bemba kumwenya kumuya bali:
“Ewe wolaana khubukula sitabu
ne khurusiakho kimiiuri kiasio, osibambule.
Sikila ewe werwa, mala khulwe lifwa liowo lie khukhwerusia
wasikula babaandu ba Wele khukhwama mu buli kholo,
lulomo, baandu ne lukoondo lwe babaandu boosi.
khukhalabanila Wele wefwe,
mala balamiia khu sibala.”
mala bemba ne kumumilo kwe angaaki bali:
“Limeeme lilierwa lili liliolaana
khunyoola bunyali, kimiaandu,
limanya, ne kamaani, lukoosi, luyali ne fuma!”
Nio naulila buli sibuumbe mwikulu, khu sibala, mu sibala sie aasi ne mu nyanja, bibuumbe bilamu bioosi mu limala lioosi biembanga bili;
“Khuyo owikhalanga khu Ndebe eye bubwami
ne khu Limeeme,
efuma ne lukoosi, luyali ne bunyali
bibe khwinywe mindali na mindali.”
Bibuumbe bilamu bine chana biakobosia bili, “Amina!” Basaakhulu chana bakwa aasi mala basaaya

Nio nabona Limeeme liafunaka kumuuri kwe khunyoa khu miuuri saba, mala naulila silala khu bibuumbe bine, ne siboola mu mumilo kukwauliilikha nga likukuma lie fula ne kuloma kuli, “Yiicha!”
Nalola mala nabona efarasi ewaanga. Okitimia aba asutile buyiingo mu ngaaki, mala aebwa ekuutwa eye bubwami. Aakitimia nga omuuli ocha khuula.
Nga, Limeeme liekula kumuuri kwa khabili, naulila sibuumbe silamu sia khabili ne siloma sili, “Yiicha!”
Efarasi ekiindi, embesemu yarura enje. Okitimia aebwa bunyali khureera liie khu sibala nio babaandu berane babene khu beene. Aebwa embalu emboofu.
Naulila sisiauliilikha nga kumumilo kukwama akari we bibuumbe bilamu bine, kwaloma kuli, “Sikalabo silala sie bufu bwe ngano khulwe kumuruungo kwe ndaalo, ne bikalabo bitaru bie shayiri khulwe kumuruungo kwe ndaalo. Ne kakhali okhonaka kamafura ka museituni namwe liruuti lie kimisabibu tawe.”
Nga, Limeeme liekula kumuuri kwa khane; naulila sibuumbe silamu sikhola khane ne siloma sili, “Yiicha!”
Nalola, nabona efarasi emuluku yabao. Lisina lioyo okitimia bali Lifwa, ne Makoombe yakiloondakho siimbi. Baebwa bunyali khu sitonyi silala khu bine bie sibala; beere khulwe khurumikhira liie, enjala, bulwaale, ne chisaang'i che mundaa.
Nga, Limeeme liekula kumuuri kwa kharaano. Nabona aasi owa alutare kimiooyo kiaabo babeerwa sikila khuboola elomo eya Wele, ne khuba basuubilwa khu buloli bwabwe.
Baapa luyoka mu mumilo kwe angaaki ne baloma bali, “Omwami owe Bunyali, omutakatifu lundi owa ng'ali! Lilabukula siise siina nio khalakile babaandu be khu sibala ne khubaelesia sinyaasio khulwe khukhwira efwe?”
Buli mulala khu nibo aebwa ekaanjo ewaanga, mala baboolelwa khuola khu siise, khukhwola bukali bwe bakholi basiaabwe, ne bakristo berwe nga bosi baba.
Ching'enieesi chakwa khu sibala nga chinduli chimbisi ne chikwa khukhwama khu mutuli ekhungu engali ne ucha.
Likulu liakoriokha nga sitabu nisio baulukuuse ne buli sikulu ne likenga biarusibwa niio bibechanga.
Nio babaami be khu sibala ne baruki, bakhulu be liie, baiinda nende be bunyali ne babaandu babaandi boosi, nasioobi ne balekhuule, bekisa mu mabina ne mu mbangaachi mwe chinyaanda ne khu bikulu.
Balaanga bikulu ne chinyaanda bali, “Khemukhukwekho mala mukhukise khukhwama mumoni choyo owikhaale khu Ndebe eye Bubwami; ne khu lirima lie Limeeme!
Endaalo emayaanu eye lirima liabwe yolile ne naanu onyala emao?”

Lundi nabona malaika okundi ne aniina khukhwama ebukwe ne kumuuri kwa Wele omenyile mindali. Alaanga malaika bane ne kumumilo kumuboofu, malaika nibo Wele aelesia bunyali khukhwonaka sibala ne nyanja.
Malaika oyo aloma ali, “Mukhonaka sibala ne nyanja namwe kimirongooro tawe; khukhwola nga ne khura kumuuri khu bweeni bwe bakholi ba Wele.”
Mala naboolelwa ndi bukali bwaabo ba barerwakho kumuuri kwa Wele khu bweeni bwabwe baba babaandu chielefu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane na bane. Bama mu kholo likhumi na chibili cha Isiraeli,
be kholo eya Yuda baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Rubeni baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Kati baba chielefu likhumi na chibili.
Be kholo eya Asheri baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Nafutali baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Manase baba chielefu likhumi na chibili.
Be kholo eya Simioni baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Lawi baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Isakari baba chielefu likhumi na chibili.
Be kholo eya Sebuluni baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Benjamini baba chielefu likhumi na chibili. Be kholo eya Yusufu baba babaandu chielefu likhumi na chibili.
Enyuma wa kano nabona babaandu bakali po, babaandu nibo omundu akhanyala abala boosi tawe! Khukhwama buli sibala, buli luuya, buli kholo nende buli lulomo, bema ebweeni we ndebe eye bubwami eye Limeeme befwarire chingubo chiwaanga, mala basutile mu ngaaki kamakheendu.
Baloma ne kumumilo kumuboofu bali, “Buonia buli bwa Wele wefwe, owikhalanga khu Ndebe, ne khukhwama khu Limeeme!”
Ne bamalaika boosi benyokha bema, babotookhelela endebe eye bubwami, basaakhulu, ne bibuumbe bilamu bine. Baakwa aasi mafumala ebweeni we Ndebe chana, ne basaaya Wele;
ne baloma bali; “Amina! Efuma, luyali, limanya, khu khupa orio, lukoosi, kamaani, ne bunyali bili bia Wele wefwe mindali na mindali! Amina!”
Mulala khu basaakhulu andeeba ali, “Baandu siina babefwarire chingubo chiwaanga bano, ne bamile waena?”
Ne amboolela ali, “Bano bali babaandu baonile khubirira mu khupisibwa siibi. Basiinga chingubo chabwe mu malasile ke Limeeme.
Kano kakila ne bema ebweeni we Ndebe eya Wele ne khumukholela niye siilo ne kumuusi mu Lukaangu lwewe. Khubao khwoyo owikhalanga khu Ndebe eye bubwami khulabaliinda.
Se baliiulilakho enjala namwe bulesia namwe enyanga namwe bukhafu bwosi bwosi se bulibosia tawe,
sikila Limeeme liili akari we Ndebe eye bubwami, lilaba omwaayi wabwe, ne alabarangirira abayile a sebele che kameechi kaananga bulamu. Mala Wele alabeeya kamasika mumoni mwabwe.”

Nga Limeeme liekula kumuuri kukhola saba, mwikulu mwasila busa chi, khulwe nusu eye saa ndala.
Nio nabona malaika saba bemile ebweeni wa Wele, mala baebwa chikhoombi saba.
Ne liliisi lie biiunya kumuuya kumulayi lianiina alala ne lisaba lie babaandu ba Wele khukhwama mukhono mwa malaika owimile ebweeni wa Wele.
Nio malaika chana abukula sibuumba sie khukhwoseliakho biiunya kumuuya kumulayi, echusiakho kamaanda ke kumulilo khukhwama khu alutare, mala akachukha khu sibala. Likukuma, libalukha, chimbeni ne literema lie sibala biabao.
Nio malaika saba be chikhoombi saba berekekha khuchipa.
Malaika okhola khabili apa ekhoombi yewe. Sisiindu sisiafwaana nga sikulu siboofu silikho ne siyia siamwaatwa mu nyanja. Sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie nyanja siakaluukhana siekela kamafuki,
sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie bibuumbe bilamu bie mu nyanja biafwa, ne sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie chimeeli chonakwa.
(Lisina lie eng'enieesi chana bali, “Bululu”) sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie kameechi siakaluukhana siekela silulu, mala babaandu bakali bafwa sikila banywa kameechi, kakalukhaane kekela kamalulu.
Nio, nalola, mala naulila efuruusi eyaba ne purukha mu ngaaki tibotibo, yaloma mu mumilo kumuboofu eli, “Engunyi! Engunyi! Engunyi khwaabo abo boosi bamenyile khu sibala nga bakhaulile khu khupwa khwe chikhoombi nicho malaika babaandi bataru khukhwola bape!”

Nio malaika okhola kharaano aapa ekhoombi yewe. Ese nabona eng'enieesi eyaba ne ekwile aasi khu sibala, mala yaebwa lufunguo lwe liloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe.
Eng'enieesi yekula liloo elio, mala liliisi liamamo nga liliisi khukhwama mu mwanya kwe bukhafu kumuboofu; buwaanga bwe nyanga ne mbeo biamaliisibwa ne liliisi khukhwama mu mwanya omwo.
Chisike chaama mu mwanya mala checha khu sibala mala chaebwa bunyali busa nga bwa walute.
Chaboolelwa chikhonakakho bunyaasi namwe kimirongooro namwe simelwa sisiindi siosi siosi tawe; ne kakhali khunyaasia babaandu ba baaba ne bakhali ne kumuuri kwa Wele khu bweeni bwabwe tawe.
Chisike chino se chasibulwa khukhwira babaandu bano tawe, ne kakhali khubaa sinyaasio siong'ene khu miesi kiraano. Burafu bwe sinyaasio siacho buli nga burafu bwe luboola lwa walute.
Mu miesi kiraano ekio, bakhayime lifwa, ne se bakhalinyoole tawe; bakhenye khufwa, ne kakhali lifwa likhabelukhe.
Lichuune liacho liaba nga lie bakhasi, kameno kacho kaba nga kameno ke talang'i.
Bifuba biacho biafuumwa ne sisiabonekhana nga chingabo che bichuuma, ne luyoka lulwakholwa ne chindaa chacho lwaba nga luyoka lwe kamakaari kamakali kakakhweswanga ne chifarasi ne kacha mwiie.
Chili ne bibuno ne chimboola nga cha walute, ne bibuno biacho bilimo kamaani ke khunyaasia babaandu khulwe kimieesi kiraano.
Chili no mwami ochamiia, niye malaika owimelelanga liloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe. Lisina liewe mu Lueburania lili Abadoni; mu Lukiriki lili Apoliyoni (liboola lili “Omwonaki”)
Sinyaasio sie khunyoa siawele, enyuma wa sino, bisiliio binyaasio bibili bibiindi bikheche.
Kumumilo chana kwaboolela malaika okhola sita kuli, “Kangulula malaika bane abo, bababowa e luuchi luboofu lwa Efurati!”
Malaika bane abo balekhuulwa; ba baaba ne berekekhe esaa eyo eye endaalo ng'ene, ne kumwesi kwene ne kumwiiko kwene khukhwira sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie babaandu boosi.
Naboolelwa bukali bwe banamae, baba chimilioni chimia chibili.
Ne mu malola kase nabona chifarasi, ne bachitimia baba ne chingabo che khu bifuba chimbesemu nga kumulilo, chimbuusi ching'enang'ena, ne chifwaana kamaki nga kumulilo kumubuusi kuburukha. Kimirwe kie chifarasi kiaba nga kimirwe kie chitalang'i ne mukhanwa mwacho kumumilo kwamamo, liliisi, ne kumulilo kumurafu kufwaana kamaki.
Sitonyi silala khu bitaru sie babaandu sieerwa ne lufu chingano chitaru echo: kumulilo; liliisi, ne kumulilo kufwaana kamaki kukwama mukhanwa mwe chifarasi.
Sikila bunyali bwe chifarasi buli mukhanwa mwacho ne mu mikhiinga kiacho. Kimikhiinga kiacho kili nga chindemu chiili ne kimirwe, mala chikirumikhira khuumisia babaandu.
Se bekanila bubwiri bwabwe, bufumu bwabwe, sifwaabi siabwe namwe bubwifwi bwabwe tawe.

Nio nabona malaika okundi owe kamaani ekha aasi khukhwama mwikulu. Aaba aboelwe mu lifuumbi, ne lufutu lwamukarire khu murwe kwewe; mumoni mwewe mwaba nga enyanga, ne bikele biewe biaba nga chinjeko che kumulilo.
Aaba ne sitabu sitiiti sibambulwe mukhono mwewe. Aswaala sikele siewe siseecha khu nyanja, ne sikele siewe siikhasi khu sibala,
mala alaanga ne kumumilo kumuboofu kukwauliilikhana nga liiulukhuma lie chitalang'i. Nga amala khulaanga, libalukha saba liakobosia ne liiulukhuma.
Ne nga libalukha saba liauliilikha, naba nenya khuandika, ne kakhali naulila kumumilo khukhwama mwikulu ne kuloma kuli, “Ra mu mwoyo nga esiiri niko libalukha saba liboolile. Okhakaandika aasi tawe.”
ne echuba mwisina lia Wele, olimenya mindali na mindali, owabuumba likulu, sibala, ne nyanja nende buli siindu silimo. Malaika aloma ali, “Se khulaba lundi ne liiayilila tawe!
Ne kakhali nga malaika okhola saba ne apa ekhoombi yewe, aba Wele alamaliilisia lirekekha liewe lie mu bwikisi, nga ne aaboolela bakholi bewe, bang'oosi.”
Nacha khu malaika na musaba ambelesia khatabu khatiiti akho, mala amboolela ali, “Khabukule mala okhalie; khalaba khalulu munda mwowo, ne mukhanwa mwowo khalaba khanulu nga bubuukhi.”
Nabukula khatabu khatiiti chana khukhwama mukhono mwewe mala nakhalia; mala khaba khanulu nga bubuukhi mukhanwa mwase. Ne nga ne nakhamila, khaba khalulu munda mwase.
Nio naboolelwa ndi, “Khukhwola lundi oboole burume bwa Wele khu kholo chingali, ne babaandu be chinomo chingali ne babaami.”

Ne okhapiima luuya luuli enje we Lukaangu tawe, sikila lwaanwa khu Be Chikholo, bakhetuye khu Lukoba lutakatifu khu miesi kamakhumi kane na kibili.
Kharume baloli base babili ba befwarire kamakunia, mala bakhaboole burume bwa Wele khu ndaalo e elefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi sita echo.”
Ne omundu yesi yesi aaba nakhaka khubanyaasia nibo, kumulilo kukharure mukhanwa mwabwe khubunia basiku babwe; ne mu ngila ng'eneyo yesi yesi okhaka khubanyaasia akheerwe.
Bali ne bunyali khukhwikala likulu nio efula elekhe khukwa mu sise nisio belwachilamo burume bwa Wele. Lundi bali ne bunyali khu sebele choosi khuchikaluukhasia chibe kamafuki; lundi bali ne bunyali khureera lufu lwa buli lukano mu sibala siise siosi siosi.
ne kimibili kiabwe kimifu kiliba khu ngila che lukoba luboofu niio Omwami wabwe abaambilwa. Lisina lie lukoba olwo mu khulufwaananisia lulaangwa bali Sodomu, namwe Misiri.
Babaandu khukhwama mu bibala bioosi mu kholo choosi, chinomo ne babaandu khukhwama buli abuundu balilola khu mibili kiabwe kimifu khu ndaalo chitaru ne nusu mala se balibafukiilila nibo bakisiikhe tawe.
Babaandu be sibala baliba ne busangaafu sikila lifwa lie babaandu babili bano. Baliekhoya ne khurumanila biianwa, sikila bang'oosi babili abo bareera buchuuni bukali khu baandu.
Enyuma we chindaalo chitaru ne nusu kumuuya kuaana bulamu kwecha khukhwama khu Wele ne khubengilamo, mala benyokha; ne boosi ba babona banikina lukali.
Bang'oosi babili chana abo baulila kumumilo kumuboofu khukhwama mwikulu ne kubaboolela kuli, “Niina mwiche ano!” Bachiila mu lifuumbi baniina mwikulu basiku babwe ne ba baloleleele.
Mu siise siene esio literema lie sibala likali liabao. Sitonyi silala khu bitonyi ekhumi bie lukoba bionakwa, mala babaandu chielefu saba beerwa. Babaandi bareenga mala bafumia bukali bwa Wele owe mwikulu.
Sinyaasio sia khabili siawele, ne kakhali sinyaasio sia khataru silikho siicha khangu!
Nio basaakhulu kamakhumi kabili na bane babekhaale khu ndebe chaabwe che bubwami ebweeni wa Wele, bakwa mafumala mala basaaya Wele,
ne baloma bali:
“Omwami Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi,
oliio lundi owabao!
Khu khupila orio nga obukuule bunyali bwowo bukali,
mala warakiikhe khukhwamiia!
lirima liowo siolile, siise sie khukhalakilakho bafu.
Siise siolile sie khuelesia bakholi bowo bang'oosi
kumuruuru, ne babaandu bowo boosi,
boosi ba bakhuria, babenyalila nende bakhenyalila sitube,
siise siolile sie khubunia abo babonaka sibala!”

Nio, libonekha liboofu lundi lie kamakana liabonekhana mu ngaaki. Omukhasi aabaao, engubo yewe yaba enyanga lundi aaba ne kumwesi aasi we bikele biewe, ne kuutwa eye ching'enieesi ekhumi na chibili khu murwe khwewe.
Aaba siimbi khusaala, ne buchuuni bwe khulumwa bwakila niye aalila.
Ne kumukhiinga kwakwo kwarusia sitonye silala khu bitaru sie ching'enieesi khukhwama mu ngaaki, mala kwachimwaata khu sibala. Kwema ebweeni wo mukhasi chana oyo, nio kulindiilile omwana khusaalwa mala kumulie.
Nio omukhasi oyo, aasaala omwana omusoleeli oliamiia chikholo choosi ne esiimbo eye sichuuma. Omwana chana ayuulwa mala ayilwa khu Wele, ne khu ndebe yewe eye bubwami.
Nio omukhasi elukha acha mu sichiimi, abuundu niio Wele aaba ne amurekekheele, niio akhaliindwe khu ndaalo e elefu ndala ne chimia chibili ne kamakhumi sita.
ne kakhali kuremu kwaulwa, ne bamalaika bakwo se bafukiililwa khumenya mwikulu lundi tawe.
Kuremu kuboofu chana kwamwaatwa aasi, kuremu kwe khaale okwo, kulaangwa bali Omumayaanu, namwe Sietani, kukwabeanga sibala sioosi. Kwamwaatwa khu sibala, ne bamalaika bakwo boosi.
Bawandaayefwe bamukhila niye khulwe kamafuki ke Limeeme ne khulwe bung'ali nibwo belwacha; lundi baba berusia khuana bulamu bwabwe ne khufwa.
Ne ewe, likulu sangaala, ne nanywe mweesi mu menyilemo! Ne kakhali silaamo sili khu sibala ne nyanja! Sikila Omumayaanu ekhile mwinywe, mala ali omukhalafu, sikila amanyile ali aramire ne siise sitiiti.”
Nga Kuremu chana kwakhebulila kuli kwamwaatiilwe khu sibala, kwarakikha khutimania omukhasi owaba ne asaalile omwana omusoleeli.
Ne kakhali omukhasi oyo aebwa chindaa chibili che efuruusi emboofu, nio apurukhe ache abuundu wewe mu sichiimi, niio aliliindwa khu miiko kitaru ne nusu, aliindwe bulayi kuremu kukhamwibwaakala tawe.
Kuremu kwakhaasa kameechi nga luluuchi khukhwama mukhanwa mwakwo khuloonda khu mukhasi chana, kamwire.
Ne kakhali sibala siayeeta omukhasi oyo; siasama kumunwa kwasio mala siamila kameechi kakaba ne kechile khukhwama mukhanwa mwe kuremu.
Kuremu chana kwakhalalila omukhasi oyo, mala kwacha khu khupana ne lisaaye lio mukhasi oyo lioosi nende abo boosi babaria kamalaka ka Wele ne basuubili khu bung'ali bubwafuunulwa ne Yesu.
Mala kuremu okwo kwema khu sikiingi sie nyanja.

Esaang'i chana yafwaana nga engwe, ne bikele biafwaana nga bikele bie ling'u ne kumunwa nga kumunwa kwe talang'i. Kuremu kwaelesia esaang'i kamaani kakwo, endebe eye bubwami bwakwo, ne bunyali bwakwo bukali.
Kumurwe kwe esaang'i mulala kwaba ne mbala eye likuma liboofu, ne likuma elio liaba liaonile. Sibala sioosi siauka mala sialoonda khu saang'i chana.
Buli mundu osaaya kuremu chana, sikila yaba kwaelesia esaang'i bunyali. Akhaba lundi babaandu basaaya esaang'i bosi baloma bali, “Naanu oli nga esaang'i? Naanu onyala apana nayo?”
Yarakikha khulaama Wele, lisina liewe, abuundu niio amenyile, nende abo boosi bamenyile mwikulu.
Yafukiililwa khu khupana ne babaandu ba Wele ne khubaula, lundi yaebwa bunyali khu buli luuya, ekholo, lulomo, ne babaandu babaandi.
Babaandu boosi bamenyile mu sibala bakhakisaaye, khurusiakho abo nibo kamasina kabwe kaandikwa mu sitabu sie bulamu sie Limeeme lilieerwa sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe.
“Rekeeresia nono, omundu aaba ne ali ne kamaru khaulile!
Yesi yesi okhoyeele khuambwa ng'ali akhaambwe; oyo okhoyeele khukhwirwa ne mbalu akheerwe ng'ali ne mbalu. Kano kenya liliekhaliilikha ne lisuubila khu baandu ba Wele.”
Nio nabona esaang'i ekiindi yama aasi mwiloba. Yaba ne chinjika chibili nga chinjika che Limeeme, lundi yalomaloma nga kuremu.
Yarumikhira bunyali bukali bwe esaang'i eye khunyoa, ebweeni wayo, yayingiilila sibala nende abo boosi bamenyilemo basaaye esaang'i eye khunyoa, eye likuma liliaba ne liionile.
Esaang'i eya khabili yino yakhola kamayia ke khuukia; yakhola kumulilo kwekha khukhwama mwikulu kwola khu sibala ebweeni wa buli mundu.
Lundi yabea babaandu boosi bamenyile khu sibala mu ngila eye kamayia niko yafukiililwa khukhola ebweeni we esaang'i eye khunyoa. Esaang'i yaboolela boosi khukhwombakha sifwaani khulwe khuana lukoosi khu saang'i yaba ne remirwe ne mbalu mala yaba esiili enamu.
Esaang'i eya khabili yafukiililwa khuela kumuuya kwe bulamu mu sifwaani sie saang'i eye khunyoa, nio sifwaani sinyale khulomaloma mala siire abo boosi bakhenya khusisaaya nisio tawe.
Esaang'i chana yayingilila babaandu boosi, batiiti ne bakhoongo, baiinda ne bataambi, nasioobi ne balekhuule, khura simanyisio khu mikhono kiabwe kimiseecha namwe khu bweni bwabwe.
Se aabaao akhaba mulala owanyala khukula namwe khukusia nakhali ne simanyisio sino tawe, lili, lisina lie saang'i namwe enamba eboola lisina liayo.
Lino lienyekhana limanya. Yesi yesi oli omukesi anyala akanakana sifuno sie namba eye saang'i yino. Sikila enamba yino yimeelela lisina lio mundu. Enamba yino eli 666.

Lundi naulila kumumilo khukhwama mwikulu kukwauliilikha nga khuoloola khwe kameechi ke mwikhupo, nga khubalukha khwe fula khukali, lundi khwauliilikha nga kimienya kie bakhupa ka matuungu, ne baapa kamatuungu kabwe.
Babaandu chana emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane na bane abo bema ebweeni we ndebe eye bubwami, bibuumbe bine bilamu, ne basaakhulu; baba balikho bemba kumwenya kumuya. Se aabao onyala eyika kumwenya okwo tawe, ne kakhali babaandu emia ndala ne kamakhumi kane na bane abo ba baaba ne baonisibwe khukhwama khu sibala.
Bali babaandu babeliinda mu bukwalaafu se bakholanga sifwaabi ne bakhasi tawe; sikila baloba bakhasi. Baloondanga khu Limeeme buli niio licha. Baonisibwe khukhwama khu baandu babaandi boosi mala bali be khunyoa khuanwa khu Wele ne khu Limeeme.
Se bamanyikhanakho mu khuloma bubeeyi tawe, bali baluungi.
Nio nabona malaika okundi apurukha mu ngaaki lukali, ne burume bwa buli lwoosi bwe Lomo Endayi naboolela baandu be sibala, ba buli lukoondo lwe babaandu, buli luuya, buli lulomo, nende buli ekholo.
Aaloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali, “Ria Wele lundi mufumie bukali bwewe! Sikila esaa yewe eye khukhalakila babaandu yolile, saaya oyo owabuumba likulu, liloba, enyanja, ne chimoni che kameechi!”
Malaika owa khataru aaloonda khu bataayi babili, ne aloma ne kumumilo kwe angaaki ali; “Yesi yesi olasaaya esaang'i chana ne sifwaani siayo, mala anyoole simanyisio khu bweeni bwewe namwe khu mukhono kwewe,
omweneyo akhanywe endali eya Wele, endali eye burafu bwewe, niyo achukhile ne kamaani koosi mu sikoombe sie lirima liewe! Boosi bakhola lino bakhanyaasibwe mu mulilo kumubuusi ebweeni wa malaika batakatifu ne Limeeme.
Liliisi libanyaasianga nibo lituukhanga mu ngaaki mindali na mindali. Basaaya esaang'i ne sifwaani siayo, nende omundu yesi yesi oli ne simanyisio sie lisina liayo se balikho ne siiuluukho siilo ne kumuusi tawe.”
Ano niio liliekhaliilikha lie babaandu ba Wele lienyekhanga, abo ba baria kamalaka ka Wele, mala bali basuubilwa khu Yesu.
Nio naulila kumumilo khukhwama mwikulu ne kuloma kuli, “Andika kano: Abo bafwiila mu khu khalabanila Omwami khukhwama luno ne khuchilila babiitwa chikhabi!”
Ne Roho akobosia ali, “Yee ng'ali! Bakhekhoyele liiola khukhwama khu milimo kiabwe kimiandalafu, sikila bikholwa biabwe bikhabaloondekho.”
Nio, malaika okundi echa khukhwama mu Lukaangu ne aboolela mu mumilo kwe angaaki oyo owaba ne ekhaale khu lifuumbi, ali, “Rumikhira engeso yowo mala okese, sikila esaa eye likesa yolile, sibala sialabile siolile likesa!”
Nio, oyo owaba ne ekhaale khu lifuumbi auucha engeso yewe khu sibala, mala sibala siakesibwa.
Lundi nabona malaika okundi arura mu lukaangu mwikulu, mala yesi aba ne engeso enjoki.
Nio, abwenao malaika okundi, owimeelela kumulilo, aama khu alutare aochelela ne kumumilo kwe angaaki malaika owaba ne engeso enjoki ali, “Rumikhira engeso yowo, mala okhale kamatuunda ke kumusabibu khukhwama mu mukuunda kwe sibala, sikila chisabibu charobire!”
Nio malaika oyo auucha engeso yewe khu sibala, akhala kamatuunda ke kumusabibu khukhwama khu sakia aakamwaata mu sisuuriro sie endali eye burafu bwe lirima lia Wele.
Kamatuunda ke kumusabibu kakhamululilwa mu sisuuriro sie endali enje we lukoba, mala kamafuki kama mu sisuuriro sie ndali kumukhula buleeyi bwe chikilomita chimia chitaru ne embi chimita chimia chibili khukhwiikha aasi.

Nio, nabona mu ngaaki sisiindu sisiindi sie kamakana, siboofu lundi sie khuukia. Babaamo malaika saba ne lufu saba, luli lumaliilisi sikila luli liliekesia limaliilisi lie lirima lia Wele.
Lundi, nabona sisiabonekhana nga enyanja eye sikioo yatubaanile ne kumulilo. Lundi nabona abo ba baaba ne baulile esaang'i ne sifwaani siayo, nende oyo niye lisina liewe liaanwa ne namba. Baba bemile a nyanja eye sikioo, baambile kamatuungu niko Wele aaba ne abaelesie,
baapa ne khukhwimba lulwimbo lwa Musa, omukholi owa Wele, ne kumwenya kwe Limeeme bali:
“Omwami Wele owe bunyali,
bikholwa biowo bili biboofu lundi bie khuukia!
Omwami owe chikholo,
chingila chowo chili chinungi lundi cha ng'ali!
Naanu okhalobe khufumia bukali bwowo?
Ewe weng'ene oli omutakatifu.
Chikholo choosi chikheche
chikhusaaye ewe,
sikila bikholwa biowo biluungi biabonekhaane khu boosi.”
Malaika saba chana ba baaba ne lufu saba barura mu lukaangu, befwarire chingubo cha katani ching'enang'ena lundi beboyile kimisiipi kie sahabu mu bifuba biabwe.
Ne, mulala khu bibuumbe bine bilamu aelesia malaika saba abo bibuumba saba bie sahabu biechuule lirima lia Wele omenyile mindali na mindali.
Lukaangu lwechula liliisi khukhwama khu luyali ne bunyali bwa Wele, ne se aliio owanyala khukhwingila mu lukaangu chana olwo tawe khukhwola nga lufu saba lulwareerwa ne malaika saba olwo lwawa.

Nio, naulila kumumilo kwe angaaki khukhwama mu lukaangu ne kuloma khu malaika saba kuli: “Cha muchukhe bibuumba saba bie lirima lia Wele khu sibala!”
Malaika owa khabili aachukha sibuumba siewe khu nyanja. Kameechi kekela nga kamafuki ko mufu, ne buli sibuumbe silamu mu nyanja siafwa.
Naulila malaika owimeelela kameechi aloma ali, “Bukhalaki nibwo mukholile buli buluungi, Ewe Omutakatifu, Ewe oliio lundi owabao!
Bachukha kamafuki ke babaandu ba Wele nende ke bang'oosi, khwako nawe wabaeele kamafuki banywe. Balikho banyoola nisio bakhoyeele banyoole!”
Nio, naulila kumumilo khukhwama khu alutare ne kuloma kuli, “Omwami Wele owe bunyali! Likhalaka liowo lili lia ng'ali lundi liluungi!”
Malaika owa khaane aachukha sibuumba siewe khu nyanga, mala enyanga yasibulwa khukhwosia babaandu ne kumuumu kwayo kumurafu.
Bosebwa ne kumuumu kumurafu, mala balaama lisina lia Wele ooli ne bunyali khu lufu luno. Ne kakhali se bekanila bubwoni bwabwe, ne khuelesia Wele efuma tawe.
mala balaama Wele owe mwikulu khulwe buchuuni bwabwe ne kamabiimba, ne se bekanila bubwoni bwabwe tawe.
Nio, nabona roho bataru bamayaanu ba bafwaana nga chikhele. Bama mukhanwa mwe kuremu, mukhanwa mwe esaang'i, ne mukhanwa mwo omung'oosi owe bubeeyi.
Baba roho be bisieeno baakhola kamayia. Baroho bataru bano bacha khu baami boosi be mu sibala, khu bareera alala mwiie khu Ndaalo emboofu eya Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.
Nio, malaika owa saba aachukha sibuumba siewe mu mbeo. Kumumilo kwe angaaki kwama khu ndebe eye bubwami eye mu Lukaangu, ne kuloma kuli, “Kakholekhe!”
Liburukha lie chimbeni, litirira, ne khubalukha khwe fula, ne khuterema khwe sibala khukali po khwabao. Literema lie sibala lie lukano olwo likhabakhoo khukhwama nga omundu ne abuumbwa tawe, lino liaba literema liboofu limalayo!
Lukoba luboofu lwakabukhanamo bitonyi bitaru, ne chingoba che bibala choosi chonakwa. Wele akhebulila Babiloni omukali mala amunywesia endali khukhwama mu sikoombe siewe, endali eye lirima liewe lirafu.
Kamakenga koosi kataambao, bikulu bioosi bianywelulukha biawa.
Kamaarara kamaboofu, buli lilala busiro embi chikiilo kamakhumi karaano, kakwa khu baandu ba balaama Wele khulwe lufu lwe kamaarara, sikila lwaba lufu lubi po.

Babaami be sibala bakhola sifwaabi naye, lundi babaandu be sibala bameela endali eye sifwaabi siewe.”
Omukhasi chana aba efwara engubo enapeenda ne mbesemu, afuniikhwe ne bibiuma bie sahabu, kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki ne chisiimbi. Mukhono mwewe aba aambile sikoombe sie sahabu siechule bibiindu bie bunyaalu lundi biibi, bibiekesia bueeyi bwewe.
Khu bweeni bwewe lisina liaba liaandikwakho, lisina lie sifuno sisiekisa sili; “Babiloni omukali, maawe owe baeeyi boosi ne babi mu sibala.”
Nio nabona omukhasi chana ameelile kamafuki ke batakatifu ba Wele, ne kamafuki kaabo babeerwa sikila baba basuubila Yesu.
Nga ne namubona, narangararwa lukali.
Malaika aandeeba ali, “Siina sikila norangaraarwe? Ndakhuboolela sifuno sisiekesia omukhasi ne saang'i emumemanga, esaang'i eye kimirwe saba ne chinjika ekhumi.
Esaang'i eyo yabechanga enamu, ne luno yafwiile, eli siimbi khurura mwiloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe, mala eche ebunisibwe. Babaandu ba baamenya khu sibala be kamasina kakhaandikwa mu sitabu sie bulamu, sibala ne sikhabaang'anwa tawe, nga balibona esaang'i eyaba enamu eyo, ne luno yafwiile, balirangararwa, ne kakhali ekhabonekhe lundi.
“Kano kenya bukesi ne limanya. Kimirwe saba kili bikulu saba, nikhwo omukhasi chana ekhalanga. Lundi bali babaami saba,
baraano khu nibo bakwiile, mulala asiamiia, ne okundi akhecha tawe nga akheche, aliamiia busa siise sitiiti.
Ne esaang'i chana eyaba enamu, ne luno yafwiile, eng'ene eli omwami owa munaane eli ndala khu saba mala echa khubunisibwa.
Ekhumi bano boosi bali ne sifuno silala, mala baana kamaani ne bunyali bwabwe khu saang'i.
Bakhapane ne Limeeme, ne kakhali Limeeme, alala ne baloondi bewe basuubilwa, babalaangwa lundi babaroborwa, balibaula, sikila ali Omwami owe babaami lundi Omuruki we baruki.”
Lundi malaika aamboolela ali, “Kameechi niko waboone, niko omueeyi ekhaalemo, kali chikholo, babaandu, lukoondo lwe babaandu, ne chinomo.
Chinjika ekhumi nicho waboone echo ne saang'i bikhabiile omueeyi oyo; bilimubukula buli siindu nisio ali nasio, mala bimulekhe sichula; chikhalie kumubili kwewe, mala chimwosie ne kumulilo.
Wele ara mu miooyo kiabwe lilienya lie khukhola sifuno siewe, khulwe khukholela alala ne khuelesia esaang'i bunyali bwabwe yamiie nabwila nga kamakhuwa niko Wele aaloma kekholekha.
“Omukhasi niye mwaboone ali lukoba luboofu lulwamiia babaami be sibala.”

Enyuma wa kano, nabona malaika okundi ne ekha khukhwama mwikulu. Aba ne bunyali bukali, ne luyali lwewe lwakhosia khu sibala sioosi.
Aalomaloma mu mumilo kwe angaaki ali: “Lwakwiile! Babiloni luboofu lwakwiile! Luno lwekholile bumenyo bwe bisieeno ne baroho babi, ekholile abuundu niio chinyuni chinyaalu choosi nende nicho babiila chimenya.
Sikila chikholo choosi chanywele endali eluluue eye liliekoomba lie sifwaabi sialwo. Babami be sibala bakhola bueeyi naye, ne baboofuli be sibala baindiaala sikila liliekoomba lialwo likali.”
ne kuloma kuli,
“Baandu base, khemurure! Khemurure
mu lukoba olwo!
Mukhaambaana nalwo mu bwoni bwalwo tawe;
mukhakhola murio mwasaanga mu siiukuumo sialwo tawe!
mala Wele akhebulila chingila chalwo chimayaanu.
ruruungie khabili khu koosi niko lukholile.
Yichusia sikoombe sialwo khukhwola khabili
nga nisio lwamuelesia enywe.
nga luyali ne bukoote nibwo lwaba nalwo.
Sikila lwachiilililanga khuloma luli,
‘Ese ndi Kwini, nekhaale ano!
Se ndi namulekhwa tawe,
se ndimanya bubeeleli nisio siina tawe!’
Bulwaale, bubeeleli ne njala.
Ne aliosebwa ne kumulilo,
Sikila Omwami Wele, omukhalakilanga ali ne bunyali.”
Babaami be sibala ba baaba mu sifwaabi ne kumuliuliu naye, bakhalile ne khukhwiunamila mu lukoba nga balibona liliisi ne lituukha khukhwama khu memu chilwosia.
Bakhemele ataayi, sikila bakharie khusaanga mu sinyaasio siewe. Bakhalome bali, “Engunyi! Engunyi engali! Babiloni lukoba luboofu lundi lwe kamaani luno, khu saa ndala yong'ene siiukuumo siakhunyoola!”
se aliio akhaba mulala okula esahabu yabwe, efwesa, kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki, chisiimbi, chingubo chabwe cha katani, chingubo chifwaana buseemwa, laasi, ne chimbesemu, ne chimbako choosi chikhasala tawe, ne bibiindu bibiindi bioosi bibiakholwa khukhwama khu misaanga, nende bie chimbao che bukusi bwe angaki, bie kimikasa, bie bichuuma, nende bie kamabaale kamamiliiu,
ne kumutalasini ne bing'aa bulayi bie mu biakhulia, bupaani, manemane, uti; endali ne kamafura ka museituni, bufu bunosie ne ngano, chikhaafu ne kamakheese, chifarasi ne kamakaari ke liie, nasioobi, aakhaba ne bulamu bwe babaandu.
Baboofuli baboolela omukhasi oyo bali, “Bibiindu bilayi bioosi nibio wekoombanga khuba nabio biaweeleo; ne kimiaandu kiowo nikio weboneseliakho kiaelile, ne se olikinyoola lundi tawe.”
Baboofuli ba baindiala khulwe khukhwofulila mu lukoba olwo, bakhemele aleeyi, sikila bariire khusaanga mu buchuuni bwewe. Balalila ne khusooma,
lundi balaloma bali, “Engunyi! Engunyi engali! Lwaba lwanala khukhwifwara chingubo cha katani, chifwaana buseemwa ne chindandaafu, ne khukhwekwalaasia ne bibiuma bie sahabu, kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki, ne chisiimbi.
Mu saa ndala lwaba lwatibiisie buiinda!”
Bakhulu boosi be chimeeli nende ba chikeendelamo, ba baandereba baacho ne babaandi boosi banyoolanga kumuruungo khu nyanja, bemela aleeyi,
mala balila nga babona liliisi liliama khu memu che kumulilo kulwosia bali, “Lukhabakhoo lukoba luboofu luluundi nga luno tawe!”
Bepuuka lipukhuulu khu mirwe kiabwe, balila ne khu sooma, ne baloma bali, “Engunyi! Engunyi engali khu lukoba luboofu! Luli lukoba nilwo be chimeeli chikeenda mu nyanja baindialilamo khuloondekhana ne buiinda bwalwo! Mala mu saa ndala yong'ene lwatibiisie buli siindu!”
Buwaanga bwe taa se bulibonekha mwiwe lundi tawe; namwe kumumilo kwo mundu niye baakhile se kuliuliilikhanakho lundi mwiwe tawe. Baboofuli bowo baba be kamaani kamakali khukhila mu sibala sioosi, khubirira mu bufumu bwowo bwe bubeeyi wabea babaandu be mu sibala!”

Enyuma wa kano naulila kumumilo nga kwe babaandu bakali khukhwama mwikulu, ne kuloma kuli, “Fumia Wele, buonia, luyali ne kamaani bili bia Wele wefwe!
Sikila likhalaka liewe lili lia ng'ali lundi liluungi! Wele akhalakile omueeyi omukhulu oyo owonaka sibala sikila sifwaabi siewe. Wele amuukuuma sikila eera bakholi bewe.”
Lundi baloma bali, “Wele afume! Liliisi liliama khu memu chibunia lukoba luboofu, liniinanga mu ngaaki mindali na mindali.”
Babemeelesi kamakhumi kabili na bane ne bibuumbe bine bilamu biakwa aasi basaaya Wele owaba ne ekhaale khu ndebe eye bubwami. Baloma bali, “Amina! Wele afume!”
Naulila sisiindu siauliilikhana nga babaandu bakali, lundi nga khuoloola khwe kameechi kasuungukha mwikhupo, lundi nga khubalukha khwe fula. Naulila ne baloma bali, “Wele afume! Sikila Omwami Wele wefwe Owe Bunyali Bwoosi, ali Omuruki!
Lekha efwe khwikhoye lundi khusangaale; lekha khufumie bunyali bwewe! Sikila siise sie siselelo sie Limeeme siolile, ne omwea wewe amwirekekheele.
Aaebwa bunyali khufwara enaanga emiliiu eng'enang'ena.” (Engubo eya katani emiliiu eyo, aba bikholwa bilayi bie babaandu ba Wele.)
Nakwa mu bikele biewe nenya khu musaaya mala amboolela ali, “Okhakhola orio tawe! Ese ndi omukholi wasio ne omusuubili wasienywe, ne naabo boosi batiila bung'ali nibwo Yesu afuunula. Saaya Wele! Sikila bung'ali nibwo Yesu afuunula nibwo kamaani ke bang'oosi.”
Chimoni chewe chaba nga lumemu lwe kumulilo, mala aafwara chikuutwa chingali khu murwe kwewe. Aandikwakho lisina, ne se aliio omanyile sifuno sialio tawe, nakhali omwene yeng'ene.
Ekaanjo niyo efwara yaba yenikhwa mu mafuki. Lisina liewe bali, “Elomo eya Wele.”
Banamae be liie be mwikulu bamuloondakho, ne batimia chifarasi chiwaanga, baba befwarire chingubo cha katani chiwaanga.
Embalu enjoki niyo akhaulile chikholo yaba mukhanwa mwewe. Alibarukira esiimbo eye sichuuma, lundi aliswalakilila endali mu sisuuriro sie lirima lirafu lia Wele Owe Bunyali Bwoosi.
Khu ngubo yewe, ne khwiraango khwewe lisina liaandikwakho: “Omwami owe babaami lundi Omuruki we baruki.”
Yiicha mubooche kimilaambo kie babaami, babemeelesi be liie, ne banamae, chinyama che chifarasi, ne kimilaambo kie bachitimia, ne babaandu boosi, nasioobi ne balekhuule, babenyalila nende bakhenyalila.”
Nio, lwanyuma nabona esaang'i chana, ne babaami be sibala ne banamae babwe babuusiana khu khupana ne noyo owaba otimia efarasi ne banamae bewe.
Esaang'i chana yaambwa alala no mung'oosi we bubeeyi owaba nakholile kamayia ebweeni wewe. (Khulwe kamayia ako, aba atiimia abo ba baaba ne simanyisio sie saang'i, ne naabo babasaaya sifwaani sie saang'i.) Esaang'i chana no mung'oosi owe bubeeyi boombi bamwaatwa balamu mu nyanja eye kumulilo kumurafu kumubuusi.
Banamae be liie babaandi boosi berwa ne mbalu eyaama mukhanwa mwoyo owaba ne atimia efarasi chana; mala chinyuni choosi chaboocha kimilaambo kiabwe mu khuyaayana.

Nio, nabona malaika ne ekha khukhwama mwikulu, atiilile lufunguo mukhono mwewe lwe liloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe, ne kumunyololo kumusiro.
Akhamara sisieeno sie khaale esio, nisio khulaanga khuli Omumayaanu namwe Sietani mala asiboa kumunyololo khulwe kimiiko eelefu ndala.
Malaika chana aasimwaata mwiloo likhali ne sisiakamo tawe, ekasia ne khulitiimbia, nio sikhatiimia chikholo lundi tawe, nabwila kimiiko eelefu ndala ne kiwa. Enyuma wako khukhwola silekhuulwe khu siise sitiiti.
(Bafu babaandi, se balamukha tawe nabwila kimiiko eelefu ndala ne kiawa.) Lino nilio lilamukha lie bafu lie khunyoa.
Abo baali mu lilamukha lie khunyoa lino babiitwa chikhabi. Lifwa lia khabili se lili ne bunyali khu nibo tawe; balaba basaayi ba Wele lundi ba Kristo, mala baliamiia alala naye khulwe kimiiko eelefu ndala.
Enyuma we kimiiko eelefu ndala ekio, Sietani alikangululwa khukhwama mu siboe,
mala alirura ache khubea be chikholo ba basalanila mu sibala sioosi, nibo Koki ne Makoki. Sietani alibabuusia alala boosi, khulwe liie, mala baliba bakali nga kumuyekhe kwe khu nyanja.
Bamaasia mu sibala sioosi, babotookhelela ekambi eye batakatifu ba Wele, ne lukoba nilwo aasiima. Ne kakhali kumulilo kwama mwikulu mala kwababunia.
Nio, Sietani chana owababea, amwaatwe mu nyanja eye kumulilo kumubuusi, nimwo esaang'i no mung'oosi omubeeyi bamwaatwa khale; mala balinyaasibwa kumuusi ne siilo, khulwa mindali na mindali.
Nabona babafwa, babenyalila nende bakhenyalila sitube, bemile ebweeni we ndebe eye bubwami. Bitabu biabambulwa mala lundi sitabu sisiindi siabambulwa, sitabu sie bulamu. Ne babafwa bakhalakilwa khuloondekhana ne bikholwa biabwe, nga ne kaandikwa mu bitabu.
Nio, enyanja yarusia bafu baayo. Lifwa ne makoombe bioosi biarusia bafu ba babamo. Mala boosi bakhalakilwa khuloondekhana nende niko bakhola.
Nio, lifwa ne makoombe biamwaatwa mu nyanja eye kumulilo. (Enyanja eye kumulilo yino nilio lifwa lia khabili.)
Omundu yesi yesi niye lisina liewe likhaandikwa mu sitabu sie bulamu tawe, amwaatwa mu nyanja eye kumulilo.

Lundi nabona lukoba lutakatifu, nilwo Yerusalemu, luya, ne lwikha khukhwama mwikulu wa Wele, lwefwarire lwerekekhe nga omwea nacha khukhwakanila omuseecha wewe.
Naulila kumumilo kwe angaaki kumuboofu ne kuloma khukhwama mu ndebe eye bubwami kuli, “Lola! Bumenyo bwa Wele buli mu baandu! Alamenya nabo, mala balaba babaandu bewe. Wele omwene alaba nabo lundi alaba Wele wabwe.
Alabeeya kamasika koosi sia moni. Lifwa se lilibao lundi tawe, lisooma, namwe khulila namwe buchuuni tawe. Sikila bibiindu bie khaale biabirire.”
Nio, oyo owikhaale khu ndebe eye bubwami aloma ali, “Ne luno ese khola bibiindu bioosi khuba biiya!” Lundi aamboolela ese ali, “Andika kano, sikila kamakhuwa kano kali ka ng'ali, lundi kanyala khusuubilwa.”
Nio aamboolela ali, “Kakholekhe! Ese ndi owe khunyoa lundi omumaliilisi. Khuyo oli ne bulesia ndamua bunyali khunywa kameechi khukhwama mu sebele eye kameechi ke bulamu niko akharuunga tawe.
Abo baula balinyoola kumuruuru kuno khukhwama khwise: Ese ndiba Wele wabwe ne nabo baliba babaana base.
Ne kakhali baari, bachongani, batiimia, babeeri, be sifwaabi, bafumu, basaayanga bifwaani, ne babeeyi boosi, abuundu wabwe aliba mu nyanja eye kumulilo kumubuusi; lino nilio lifwa lia khabili.”
Mulala khu malaika saba, ba baaba ne bibuumba saba, bibiechula lufu chingano saba, chimaliilisi echa mala aamboolela ali, “Khowiche mala kane khwekesie Omwea, omukhasi owe Limeeme.”
Roho amwichamo mala malaika aasuta ese aaniinia khu sikulu sileeyi lukali. Anjokesia Yerusalemu Lukoba Lutakatifu, lulwaba ne lwikha khukhwama mwikulu wa Wele,
lwakhosia ne luyali lwa Wele. Lukoba lwakhosia nga libaale lie bukusi bukali, nga libaale liwaanga limelamela nga sikioo
Lwaba ne lisiisi liboofu lileeyi, lie bilibwa ekhumi na bibili, ne malaika ekhumi na babili baliinda bilibwa ebio. Khu bilibwa kamasina ke chikholo ekhumi na chibili che babaana ba Isiraeli kaandikwakho.
Buli lubeka lwaba ne bilibwa bitaru; ebukwe bitaru, ebunaswa bitaru, siafubo bitaru, ne mumbo bitaru.
Lisiisi lie lukoba liombakhwa khu misiingi kie kamabaale ekhumi na kabili ne khu nikio, kamasina ke barumwa be Limeeme kaandikwakho, ekhumi na kabili.
Malaika chana owalomalomanga ne nase aba ne lusaala lwe sahabu lwe khupiima lukoba, bilibwa bialwo, ne lisiisi lialwo.
