Lukoba olwo lwalekhaana chimbeka choosi, bubalaayi ne buleeyi bwalwo. Malaika chana apiima lukoba chana ne lusaala lwe khupiima; lwaba buleeyi chikilomita chielefu chibili ne chimia chine, ne bukhiikha balwo ne khucha mu ngaaki bialekhaana.
Malaika chana apiima lisiisi lioosi, liaba chimita kamakhumi sita khucha angaaki, khuloondekhana ne sikelo sie khupiima nisio arumikhiranga.
Lisiisi elio liaba liombakhwa ne kamabaale ke bukusi bwe angaaki kamanapenda kamelamela, ne lukoba lulwene lwaba lwombakhwa ne sahabu engwalaafu nga sikioo similiiu.
Kamabaale ke kumusiingi kwe lisiisi lie lukoba kaba kang'oonwa mu ngila endayi eye kamabaale ke khurobarobana ke bukusi bwe angaaki. Libaale lie lukhelela lwe khunyoa mu musiingi liaba libuusi elala, lia khabili liaba lie kamabuusi, lia khataru likokhakokhe, lia khane libookha,
lia kharaano libuusi lifulaafulane, lia sita libesemu, lia saba linapenda, lia munaane liaba libuusi libookha, lia tisa liaba likokhakokhe, lie khumi liaba lifwaana lufutu, lie khumi na lulala liaba lia mayayi nga liki, lie khumi na chibili liaba linakhanyuusi.
Bilibwa ekhumi na bibili ebio biaba chisiimbi ekhumi na chibili. Ne buli silibwa silala siakholwa khukhwama mu siimbi ndala. Engila eye mu lukoba yaba eye sahabu engwalaafu nga sikioo sing'enang'ena.
Se nabona Lukaangu mu lukoba tawe, sikila Lukaangu lwalwo luli Omwami Wele Owanyala bioosi ne Limeeme.
Lukoba olwo se lwenya enyanga namwe, kumwesi khu lukhosiakho tawe. Sikila luyali lwa Wele lulukhosiangakho, ne Limeeme nilio etaa yalwo.
Babaandu be mu sibala balakeendela mu buwaanga bwalwo. Ne babaami balareeramo buiinda bwabwe,
Bilibwa bie lukoba bilirama khwasie endaalo yoosi; se biliikalwa tawe, sikila siilo se silibayo tawe.
Lukoosi ne buiinda bwe chikholo bulireerwa mu lukoba.
Ne siosi siosi siili sinyaalu se silingila mu lukoba olwo tawe, namwe yesi yesi okhola bibiindu bie chisoni namwe omubeeyi se alingilamo tawe. Ne kakhali abo nibo kamasina kabwe kaandikwa mu sitabu sie bulamu sie Limeeme bong'ene balingilamo.

mala kekhela akari we kumuyila kwe lukoba. Kumurongooro kwe bulamu kwaba buli lubeka lwe luluuchi, kukwama kamatuunda mu biise ekhumi na bibili khu mwiiko, buli mwesi; ne kamasaafu kakwo kali kaonia chikholo.
Se silibao siosi siosi nisio Wele aalaama silinyoolekha mu lukoba olwo tawe.
Endebe eye bubwami eya Wele nende eye Limeeme eliba mu lukoba lwene olwo, lundi bakholi bewe balimusaaya niye.
Balibona bubweeni bwewe, ne lisina liewe liliaandikwa khu bweni bwabwe.
Siilo se silibao lundi tawe, ne se balienya buwaanga bwe chitaa, namwe bwe nyanga tawe; sikila Omwami Wele omwene aliba buwaanga bwabwe, mala baliamiia nga babaami mindali na mindali.
Nio, malaika chana amboolela ali, “Kamakhuwa kano kali ka ng'ali lundi kolaana khusuubilwa. Omwami Wele, Omwami oelesianga bang'oosi Roho wewe, aarumire malaika wewe ekesie bakholi bewe kakhekholekhe ambi ari.”
Yesu aloma ali, “Rekeeresia! Ndikho nicha bwangu! Oyo oria kamakhuwa ke bung'oosi bwe sitabu sino aabiitwa chikhabi!”
Ese Yoana samwene naulila ne khubona bibiindu bino bioosi. Ne nga na mala khuulila ne khubibona, nakwa aasi mu bikele bia malaika owaba ne anjekesie ese bibiindu bino abeele ndi siimbi khumusaaya.
Ne kakhali aamboolela ali, “okhakhola orio tawe! Ese ndi omukholi wasio lundi owe bawandaayo bang'oosi nende abo boosi baria kamakhuwa ke mu sitabu sino. Saaya Wele!”
Lundi aamboolela ali, “Okhakukhuulila kamakhuwa ke bung'oosi bwe mu sitabu sino tawe, sikila siise siako sili siimbi nisio kano koosi kalekholekhelakho.
Omwoni khukhwola achiililile ario mu bwoni bwewe; ne owe sifwaabi khukhwola achiililile ario mu sifwaabi siewe; ne omulayi khukhwola achiililile ario khukhola kamalayi kewe, ne ooli omutakatifu achiililile khuuba omutakatifu.”
Ese ndi Alufa ne Omeka, owe khunyoa ne khumaliilikha, owe khurakikha ne khutabusia.”
Ne enje we lukoba chimbwa chiliyo nende abo bakhola bufumu, be sifwaabi, babeeri, abo basaaya bifwaani nende abo baali babeeyi mu makhuwa ne mu bikholwa.
Buli mundu yesi yesi oulila kano akhoyeela yesi aaloma ali, “Yiicha!” Lekha yesi yesi oli ne bulesia eche; anywe kameechi ke bulamu kakhali ne bukusi tawe.
Ne omundu yesi yesi aaba narusiakho siosi siosi khu makhuwa ke bung'oosi bwe sitabu sino, Wele alamunuula kumukabwa kwewe kwe kamatuunda ke kumurongooro kwe bulamu nende kwe mu lukoba lutakatifu, nga ne kenoosibwa mu sitabu sino.
Oyo obonanga bibiindu bino bioosi aloma ali, “Yee, ng'ali! Ndikho nicha bwangu!” Amina. “Nio kabe kario.” Yiicha Omwami Yesu!
Kumwalaalo kwo Mwami Yesu kube ne batakatifu boosi. Amina.
